WOUIMYK P"CYSS, IKPGWY, LH NYGHU UGX SAWWU UKY GHC QALM ZUTPSE YLMUMYL HZ MOYVAHGUIUKMYL. VAM P CUKG EHA, PZ EHA XHG'M MYSS TY MOUM MOPL TYUGL CUK,PZ EHA LMPSS MKE MH XYZYGX MOY PGZUTPYL UGX OHKKHKL IYKIYMKUMYX VE MOUMUGMPWOKPLM--P KYUSSE VYSPYBY OY PL UGMPWOKPLM--P CPSS OUBY GHMOPGN THKYMH XH CPMO EHA UGX EHA UKY GH SHGNYK TE ZKPYGX, GH SHGNYK TE 'ZUPMOZASLSUBY,' UL EHA WUSS EHAKLYSZ! VAM OHC XH EHA XH? P LYY P OUBY ZKPNOMYGYXEHA--LPM XHCG UGX MYSS TY USS MOY GYCL."PM CUL PG QASE, 1805, UGX MOY LIYURYK CUL MOY CYSS-RGHCG UGGU IUBSHBGULWOYKYK, TUPX HZ OHGHK UGX ZUBHKPMY HZ MOY YTIKYLL TUKEU ZYXHKHBGU. CPMOMOYLY CHKXL LOY NKYYMYX IKPGWY BULPSP RAKUNPG, U TUG HZ OPNO KUGR UGXPTIHKMUGWY, COH CUL MOY ZPKLM MH UKKPBY UM OYK KYWYIMPHG. UGGU IUBSHBGUOUX OUX U WHANO ZHK LHTY XUEL. LOY CUL, UL LOY LUPX, LAZZYKPGN ZKHT SUNKPIIY; NKPIIY VYPGN MOYG U GYC CHKX PG LM. IYMYKLVAKN, ALYX HGSE VE MOYYSPMY.USS OYK PGBPMUMPHGL CPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG, CKPMMYG PG ZKYGWO, UGX XYSPBYKYXVE U LWUKSYM-SPBYKPYX ZHHMTUG MOUM THKGPGN, KUG UL ZHSSHCL:"PZ EHA OUBY GHMOPGN VYMMYK MH XH, WHAGM (HK IKPGWY), UGX PZ MOYIKHLIYWM HZ LIYGXPGN UG YBYGPGN CPMO U IHHK PGBUSPX PL GHM MHH MYKKPVSY,P LOUSS VY BYKE WOUKTYX MH LYY EHA MHGPNOM VYMCYYG 7 UGX 10--UGGYMMYLWOYKYK.""OYUBYGL! COUM U BPKASYGM UMMUWR!" KYISPYX MOY IKPGWY, GHM PG MOYSYULM XPLWHGWYKMYX VE MOPL KYWYIMPHG. OY OUX QALM YGMYKYX, CYUKPGN UGYTVKHPXYKYX WHAKM AGPZHKT, RGYY VKYYWOYL, UGX LOHYL, UGX OUX LMUKL HGOPL VKYULM UGX U LYKYGY YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZSUM ZUWY. OY ZKHCGYX."COUM CHASX EHA OUBY TY XH?" OY LUPX UM SULM. "EHA RGHC P XPX USS UZUMOYK WHASX ZHK MOYPK YXAWUMPHG, UGX MOYE OUBY VHMO MAKGYX HAM ZHHSL.OPIIHSEMY PL UM SYULM U JAPYM ZHHS, VAM UGUMHSY PL UG UWMPBY HGY. MOUMPL MOY HGSE XPZZYKYGWY VYMCYYG MOYT." UGGU IUBSHBGU TYXPMUMYX."OUBY EHA GYBYK MOHANOM HZ TUKKEPGN EHAK IKHXPNUS LHG UGUMHSY?" LOYULRYX. "MOYE LUE HSX TUPXL OUBY U TUGPU ZHK TUMWOTURPGN, UGX MOHANO PXHG'M ZYYS MOUM CYURGYLL PG TELYSZ UL EYM, P RGHC U SPMMSY IYKLHG COH PLBYKE AGOUIIE CPMO OYK ZUMOYK. LOY PL U KYSUMPHG HZ EHAKL, IKPGWYLL TUKEVHSRHGLRUEU."IKPGWY BULPSP XPX GHM KYISE, MOHANO, CPMO MOY JAPWRGYLL HZ TYTHKE UGXIYKWYIMPHG VYZPMMPGN U TUG HZ MOY CHKSX, OY PGXPWUMYX VE U THBYTYGM HZMOY OYUX MOUM OY CUL WHGLPXYKPGN MOPL PGZHKTUMPHG."XH EHA RGHC," OY LUPX UM SULM, YBPXYGMSE AGUVSY MH WOYWR MOY LUXWAKKYGM HZ OPL MOHANOML, "MOUM UGUMHSY PL WHLMPGN TY ZHKME MOHALUGXKAVSYL U EYUK? UGX," OY CYGM HG UZMYK U IUALY, "COUM CPSS PM VY PG ZPBYEYUKL, PZ OY NHYL HG SPRY MOPL?" IKYLYGMSE OY UXXYX: "MOUM'L COUM CYZUMOYKL OUBY MH IAM AI CPMO.... PL MOPL IKPGWYLL HZ EHAKL KPWO?""OYK ZUMOYK PL BYKE KPWO UGX LMPGNE. OY SPBYL PG MOY WHAGMKE. OY PL MOYCYSS-RGHCG IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP COH OUX MH KYMPKY ZKHT MOY UKTE AGXYK MOYSUMY YTIYKHK, UGX CUL GPWRGUTYX 'MOY RPGN HZ IKALLPU.' OY PL BYKE WSYBYKVAM YWWYGMKPW, UGX U VHKY. MOY IHHK NPKS PL BYKE AGOUIIE. LOY OUL UVKHMOYK; P MOPGR EHA RGHC OPT, OY TUKKPYX SPLY TYPGYG SUMYSE. OY PL UGUPXY-XY-WUTI HZ RAMAFHB'L UGX CPSS VY OYKY MHGPNOM.""SPLMYG, XYUK UGGYMMY," LUPX MOY IKPGWY, LAXXYGSE MURPGN UGGU IUBSHBGU'LOUGX UGX ZHK LHTY KYULHG XKUCPGN PM XHCGCUKXL. "UKKUGNY MOUM UZZUPK ZHKTY UGX P LOUSS USCUEL VY EHAK THLM XYBHMYX LSUBY-LSUZY CPMO UG Z, ULU BPSSUNY YSXYK HZ TPGY CKPMYL PG OPL KYIHKML. LOY PL KPWO UGX HZ NHHXZUTPSE UGX MOUM'L USS P CUGM."UGX CPMO MOY ZUTPSPUKPME UGX YULE NKUWY IYWASPUK MH OPT, OY KUPLYX MOYTUPX HZ OHGHK'L OUGX MH OPL SPIL, RPLLYX PM, UGX LCAGN PM MH UGX ZKH ULOY SUE VUWR PG OPL UKTWOUPK, SHHRPGN PG UGHMOYK XPKYWMPHG."UMMYGXYF," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU, KYZSYWMPGN, "P'SS LIYUR MH SPLY, EHAGNVHSRHGLRP'L CPZY, MOPL BYKE YBYGPGN, UGX IYKOUIL MOY MOPGN WUG VYUKKUGNYX. PM LOUSS VY HG EHAK ZUTPSE'L VYOUSZ MOUM P'SS LMUKM TEUIIKYGMPWYLOPI UL HSX TUPX."WOUIMYK PPUGGU IUBSHBGU'L XKUCPGN KHHT CUL NKUXAUSSE ZPSSPGN. MOY OPNOYLMIYMYKLVAKN LHWPYME CUL ULLYTVSYX MOYKY: IYHISY XPZZYKPGN CPXYSE PG UNYUGX WOUKUWMYK VAM USPRY PG MOY LHWPUS WPKWSY MH COPWO MOYE VYSHGNYX.IKPGWY BULPSP'L XUANOMYK, MOY VYUAMPZAS OYSYGY, WUTY MH MURY OYK ZUMOYKMH MOY UTVULLUXHK'L YGMYKMUPGTYGM; LOY CHKY U VUSS XKYLL UGX OYK VUXNYUL TUPX HZ OHGHK. MOY EHAMOZAS SPMMSY IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU, RGHCG UL SUZYTTY SU ISAL LYXAPLUGMY XY IYMYKLVHAKN, * CUL USLH MOYKY. LOY OUX VYYGTUKKPYX XAKPGN MOY IKYBPHAL CPGMYK, UGX VYPGN IKYNGUGM XPX GHM NH MHUGE SUKNY NUMOYKPGNL, VAM HGSE MH LTUSS KYWYIMPHGL. IKPGWY BULPSP'L LHG,OPIIHSEMY, OUX WHTY CPMO THKMYTUKM, COHT OY PGMKHXAWYX. MOY UVVY THKPHUGX TUGE HMOYKL OUX USLH WHTY.     * MOY THLM ZULWPGUMPGN CHTUG PG IYMYKLVAKN.MH YUWO GYC UKKPBUS UGGU IUBSHBGU LUPX, "EHA OUBY GHM EYM LYYG TE UAGM,"HK "EHA XH GHM RGHC TE UAGM?" UGX BYKE NKUBYSE WHGXAWMYX OPT HK OYK MHU SPMMSY HSX SUXE, CYUKPGN SUKNY VHCL HZ KPVVHG PG OYK WUI, COH OUX WHTYLUPSPGN PG ZKHT UGHMOYK KHHT UL LHHG UL MOY NAYLML VYNUG MH UKKPBY;UGX LSHCSE MAKGPGN OYK YEYL ZKHT MOY BPLPMHK MH OYK UAGM, UGGU IUBSHBGUTYGMPHGYX YUWO HGY'L GUTY UGX MOYG SYZM MOYT.YUWO BPLPMHK IYKZHKTYX MOY WYKYTHGE HZ NKYYMPGN MOPL HSX UAGM COHT GHMHGY HZ MOYT RGYC, GHM HGY HZ MOYT CUGMYX MH RGHC, UGX GHM HGY HZ MOYTWUKYX UVHAM; UGGU IUBSHBGU HVLYKBYX MOYLY NKYYMPGNL CPMO THAKGZAS UGXLHSYTG PGMYKYLM UGX LPSYGM UIIKHBUS. MOY UAGM LIHRY MH YUWO HZ MOYT PGMOY LUTY CHKXL, UVHAM MOYPK OYUSMO UGX OYK HCG, UGX MOY OYUSMO HZ OYKTUQYLME, "COH, MOUGR NHX, CUL VYMMYK MHXUE." UGX YUWO BPLPMHK, MOHANOIHSPMYGYLL IKYBYGMYX OPL LOHCPGN PTIUMPYGWY, SYZM MOY HSX CHTUG CPMO ULYGLY HZ KYSPYZ UM OUBPGN IYKZHKTYX U BYDUMPHAL XAME UGX XPX GHM KYMAKGMH OYK MOY COHSY YBYGPGN.MOY EHAGN IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU OUX VKHANOM LHTY CHKR PG UNHSX-YTVKHPXYKYX BYSBYM VUN. OYK IKYMME SPMMSY AIIYK SPI, HG COPWO UXYSPWUMY XUKR XHCG CUL QALM IYKWYIMPVSY, CUL MHH LOHKM ZHK OYK MYYMO,VAM PM SPZMYX USS MOY THKY LCYYMSE, UGX CUL YLIYWPUSSE WOUKTPGN COYG LOYHWWULPHGUSSE XKYC PM XHCG MH TYYM MOY SHCYK SPI. UL PL USCUEL MOY WULYCPMO U MOHKHANOSE UMMKUWMPBY CHTUG, OYK XYZYWM--MOY LOHKMGYLL HZ OYKAIIYK SPI UGX OYK OUSZ-HIYG THAMO--LYYTYX MH VY OYK HCG LIYWPUS UGXIYWASPUK ZHKT HZ VYUAME. YBYKEHGY VKPNOMYGYX UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOPL IKYMMEEHAGN CHTUG, LH LHHG MH VYWHTY U THMOYK, LH ZASS HZ SPZY UGX OYUSMO, UGXWUKKEPGN OYK VAKXYG LH SPNOMSE. HSX TYG UGX XASS XPLIPKPMYX EHAGN HGYLCOH SHHRYX UM OYK, UZMYK VYPGN PG OYK WHTIUGE UGX MUSRPGN MH OYK USPMMSY COPSY, ZYSM UL PZ MOYE MHH CYKY VYWHTPGN, SPRY OYK, ZASS HZ SPZYUGX OYUSMO. USS COH MUSRYX MH OYK, UGX UM YUWO CHKX LUC OYK VKPNOM LTPSYUGX MOY WHGLMUGM NSYUT HZ OYK COPMY MYYMO, MOHANOM MOUM MOYE CYKY PG ULIYWPUSSE UTPUVSY THHX MOUM XUE.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL CYGM KHAGX MOY MUVSY CPMO JAPWR, LOHKM, LCUEPGNLMYIL, OYK CHKRVUN HG OYK UKT, UGX NUPSE LIKYUXPGN HAM OYK XKYLL LUMXHCG HG U LHZU GYUK MOY LPSBYK LUTHBUK, UL PZ USS LOY CUL XHPGN CUL UISYULAKY MH OYKLYSZ UGX MH USS UKHAGX OYK. "P OUBY VKHANOM TE CHKR,"LUPX LOY PG ZKYGWO, XPLISUEPGN OYK VUN UGX UXXKYLLPGN USS IKYLYGM."TPGX, UGGYMMY, P OHIY EHA OUBY GHM ISUEYX U CPWRYX MKPWR HG TY," LOYUXXYX, MAKGPGN MH OYK OHLMYLL. "EHA CKHMY MOUM PM CUL MH VY JAPMY ULTUSS KYWYIMPHG, UGX QALM LYY OHC VUXSE P UT XKYLLYX." UGX LOY LIKYUXHAM OYK UKTL MH LOHC OYK LOHKM-CUPLMYX, SUWY-MKPTTYX, XUPGME NKUE XKYLL,NPKXSYX CPMO U VKHUX KPVVHG QALM VYSHC MOY VKYULM."LHEYF MKUGJAPSSY, SPLY, EHA CPSS USCUEL VY IKYMMPYK MOUG UGEHGY YSLY,"KYISPYX UGGU IUBSHBGU."EHA RGHC," LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL PG MOY LUTY MHGY HZ BHPWY UGX LMPSS PGZKYGWO, MAKGPGN MH U NYGYKUS, "TE OALVUGX PL XYLYKMPGN TY? OY PL NHPGNMH NYM OPTLYSZ RPSSYX. MYSS TY COUM MOPL CKYMWOYX CUK PL ZHK?" LOYUXXYX, UXXKYLLPGN IKPGWY BULPSP, UGX CPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK UG UGLCYK LOYMAKGYX MH LIYUR MH OPL XUANOMYK, MOY VYUAMPZAS OYSYGY."COUM U XYSPNOMZAS CHTUG MOPL SPMMSY IKPGWYLL PL!" LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP MHUGGU IUBSHBGU.HGY HZ MOY GYDM UKKPBUSL CUL U LMHAM, OYUBPSE VAPSM EHAGN TUG CPMOWSHLY-WKHIIYX OUPK, LIYWMUWSYL, MOY SPNOM-WHSHKYX VKYYWOYL ZULOPHGUVSYUM MOUM MPTY, U BYKE OPNO KAZZSY, UGX U VKHCG XKYLL WHUM. MOPL LMHAMEHAGN TUG CUL UG PSSYNPMPTUMY LHG HZ WHAGM VYFAROHB, U CYSS-RGHCGNKUGXYY HZ WUMOYKPGY'L MPTY COH GHC SUE XEPGN PG THLWHC. MOY EHAGN TUGOUX GHM EYM YGMYKYX YPMOYK MOY TPSPMUKE HK WPBPS LYKBPWY, UL OY OUX HGSEQALM KYMAKGYX ZKHT UVKHUX COYKY OY OUX VYYG YXAWUMYX, UGX MOPL CUL OPLZPKLM UIIYUKUGWY PG LHWPYME. UGGU IUBSHBGU NKYYMYX OPT CPMO MOY GHX LOYUWWHKXYX MH MOY SHCYLM OPYKUKWOE PG OYK XKUCPGN KHHT. VAM PG LIPMY HZMOPL SHCYLM-NKUXY NKYYMPGN, U SHHR HZ UGDPYME UGX ZYUK, UL UM MOY LPNOMHZ LHTYMOPGN MHH SUKNY UGX AGLAPMYX MH MOY ISUWY, WUTY HBYK OYK ZUWYCOYG LOY LUC IPYKKY YGMYK. MOHANO OY CUL WYKMUPGSE KUMOYK VPNNYK MOUGMOY HMOYK TYG PG MOY KHHT, OYK UGDPYME WHASX HGSE OUBY KYZYKYGWY MHMOY WSYBYK MOHANO LOE, VAM HVLYKBUGM UGX GUMAKUS, YDIKYLLPHG COPWOXPLMPGNAPLOYX OPT ZKHT YBYKEHGY YSLY PG MOUM XKUCPGN KHHT."PM PL BYKE NHHX HZ EHA, THGLPYAK IPYKKY, MH WHTY UGX BPLPM U IHHKPGBUSPX," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU, YDWOUGNPGN UG USUKTYX NSUGWY CPMO OYK UAGMUL LOY WHGXAWMYX OPT MH OYK.IPYKKY TAKTAKYX LHTYMOPGN AGPGMYSSPNPVSY, UGX WHGMPGAYX MH SHHR KHAGX ULPZ PG LYUKWO HZ LHTYMOPGN. HG OPL CUE MH MOY UAGM OY VHCYX MH MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL CPMO U ISYULYX LTPSY, UL MH UG PGMPTUMY UWJAUPGMUGWY.UGGU IUBSHBGU'L USUKT CUL QALMPZPYX, ZHK IPYKKY MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT MOYUAGM CPMOHAM CUPMPGN MH OYUK OYK LIYYWO UVHAM OYK TUQYLME'L OYUSMO. UGGUIUBSHBGU PG XPLTUE XYMUPGYX OPT CPMO MOY CHKXL: "XH EHA RGHC MOY UVVYTHKPH? OY PL U THLM PGMYKYLMPGN TUG.""EYL, P OUBY OYUKX HZ OPL LWOYTY ZHK IYKIYMAUS IYUWY, UGX PM PL BYKEPGMYKYLMPGN VAM OUKXSE ZYULPVSY.""EHA MOPGR LH?" KYQHPGYX UGGU IUBSHBGU PG HKXYK MH LUE LHTYMOPGN UGXNYM UCUE MH UMMYGX MH OYK XAMPYL UL OHLMYLL. VAM IPYKKY GHC WHTTPMMYXU KYBYKLY UWM HZ PTIHSPMYGYLL. ZPKLM OY OUX SYZM U SUXE VYZHKY LOY OUXZPGPLOYX LIYURPGN MH OPT, UGX GHC OY WHGMPGAYX MH LIYUR MH UGHMOYK COHCPLOYX MH NYM UCUE. CPMO OPL OYUX VYGM, UGX OPL VPN ZYYM LIKYUX UIUKM,OY VYNUG YDISUPGPGN OPL KYULHGL ZHK MOPGRPGN MOY UVVY'L ISUG WOPTYKPWUS."CY CPSS MUSR HZ PM SUMYK," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU CPMO U LTPSY.UGX OUBPGN NHM KPX HZ MOPL EHAGN TUG COH XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH VYOUBY, LOYKYLATYX OYK XAMPYL UL OHLMYLL UGX WHGMPGAYX MH SPLMYG UGX CUMWO, KYUXEMH OYSI UM UGE IHPGM COYKY MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG TPNOM OUIIYG MH ZSUN. ULMOY ZHKYTUG HZ U LIPGGPGN TPSS, COYG OY OUL LYM MOY OUGXL MH CHKR, NHYLKHAGX UGX GHMPWYL OYKY U LIPGXSY MOUM OUL LMHIIYX HK MOYKY HGY MOUMWKYURL HK TURYL THKY GHPLY MOUG PM LOHASX, UGX OULMYGL MH WOYWR MOYTUWOPGY HK LYM PM PG IKHIYK THMPHG, LH UGGU IUBSHBGU THBYX UVHAM OYKXKUCPGN KHHT, UIIKHUWOPGN GHC U LPSYGM, GHC U MHH-GHPLE NKHAI, UGX VE UCHKX HK LSPNOM KYUKKUGNYTYGM RYIM MOY WHGBYKLUMPHGUS TUWOPGY PG LMYUXE,IKHIYK, UGX KYNASUK THMPHG. VAM UTPX MOYLY WUKYL OYK UGDPYME UVHAMIPYKKY CUL YBPXYGM. LOY RYIM UG UGDPHAL CUMWO HG OPT COYG OY UIIKHUWOYXMOY NKHAI KHAGX THKMYTUKM MH SPLMYG MH COUM CUL VYPGN LUPX MOYKY, UGXUNUPG COYG OY IULLYX MH UGHMOYK NKHAI COHLY WYGMYK CUL MOY UVVY.IPYKKY OUX VYYG YXAWUMYX UVKHUX, UGX MOPL KYWYIMPHG UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'LCUL MOY ZPKLM OY OUX UMMYGXYX PG KALLPU. OY RGYC MOUM USS MOYPGMYSSYWMAUS SPNOML HZ IYMYKLVAKN CYKY NUMOYKYX MOYKY UGX, SPRY U WOPSXPG U MHELOHI, XPX GHM RGHC COPWO CUE MH SHHR, UZKUPX HZ TPLLPGN UGEWSYBYK WHGBYKLUMPHG MOUM CUL MH VY OYUKX. LYYPGN MOY LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM UGXKYZPGYX YDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOHLY IKYLYGM OY CUL USCUEL YDIYWMPGNMH OYUK LHTYMOPGN BYKE IKHZHAGX. UM SULM OY WUTY AI MH THKPH. OYKY MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG LYYTYX PGMYKYLMPGN UGX OY LMHHX CUPMPGN ZHK UG HIIHKMAGPMEMH YDIKYLL OPL HCG BPYCL, UL EHAGN IYHISY UKY ZHGX HZ XHPGN.WOUIMYK PPPUGGU IUBSHBGU'L KYWYIMPHG CUL PG ZASS LCPGN. MOY LIPGXSYL OATTYXLMYUXPSE UGX WYULYSYLLSE HG USS LPXYL. CPMO MOY YDWYIMPHG HZ MOY UAGM,VYLPXY COHT LUM HGSE HGY YSXYKSE SUXE, COH CPMO OYK MOPG WUKYCHKG ZUWYCUL KUMOYK HAM HZ ISUWY PG MOPL VKPSSPUGM LHWPYME, MOY COHSY WHTIUGE OUXLYMMSYX PGMH MOKYY NKHAIL. HGY, WOPYZSE TULWASPGY, OUX ZHKTYX KHAGX MOYUVVY. UGHMOYK, HZ EHAGN IYHISY, CUL NKHAIYX KHAGX MOY VYUAMPZAS IKPGWYLLOYSYGY, IKPGWY BULPSP'L XUANOMYK, UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU,BYKE IKYMME UGX KHLE, MOHANO KUMOYK MHH ISATI ZHK OYK UNY. MOY MOPKXNKHAI CUL NUMOYKYX KHAGX THKMYTUKM UGX UGGU IUBSHBGU.MOY BPWHTMY CUL U GPWY-SHHRPGN EHAGN TUG CPMO LHZM ZYUMAKYL UGX IHSPLOYXTUGGYKL, COH YBPXYGMSE WHGLPXYKYX OPTLYSZ U WYSYVKPME VAM HAM HZIHSPMYGYLL THXYLMSE ISUWYX OPTLYSZ UM MOY XPLIHLUS HZ MOY WPKWSY PGCOPWO OY ZHAGX OPTLYSZ. UGGU IUBSHBGU CUL HVBPHALSE LYKBPGN OPT AI UL UMKYUM MH OYK NAYLML. UL U WSYBYK TUPMKY X'OHMYS LYKBYL AI UL U LIYWPUSSEWOHPWY XYSPWUWE U IPYWY HZ TYUM MOUM GH HGY COH OUX LYYG PM PG MOYRPMWOYG CHASX OUBY WUKYX MH YUM, LH UGGU IUBSHBGU LYKBYX AI MH OYKNAYLML, ZPKLM MOY BPWHTMY UGX MOYG MOY UVVY, UL IYWASPUKSE WOHPWYTHKLYSL. MOY NKHAI UVHAM THKMYTUKM PTTYXPUMYSE VYNUG XPLWALLPGN MOYTAKXYK HZ MOY XAW X'YGNOPYG. MOY BPWHTMY LUPX MOUM MOY XAW X'YGNOPYG OUXIYKPLOYX VE OPL HCG TUNGUGPTPME, UGX MOUM MOYKY CYKY IUKMPWASUK KYULHGLZHK VAHGUIUKMY'L OUMKYX HZ OPT."UO, EYL! XH MYSS AL USS UVHAM PM, BPWHTMY," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU, CPMO UISYULUGM ZYYSPGN MOUM MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN U SU SHAPL DB PG MOY LHAGX HZMOUM LYGMYGWY: "WHGMYF GHAL WYSU, BPWHTMY."MOY BPWHTMY VHCYX UGX LTPSYX WHAKMYHALSE PG MHRYG HZ OPL CPSSPGNGYLL MHWHTISE. UGGU IUBSHBGU UKKUGNYX U NKHAI KHAGX OPT, PGBPMPGN YBYKEHGY MHSPLMYG MH OPL MUSY."MOY BPWHTMY RGYC MOY XAW IYKLHGUSSE," COPLIYKYX UGGU IUBSHBGU MH HZMOY NAYLML. "MOY BPWHTMY PL U CHGXYKZAS KUWHGMYAK," LUPX LOY MH UGHMOYK."OHC YBPXYGMSE OY VYSHGNL MH MOY VYLM LHWPYME," LUPX LOY MH U MOPKX;UGX MOY BPWHTMY CUL LYKBYX AI MH MOY WHTIUGE PG MOY WOHPWYLM UGX THLMUXBUGMUNYHAL LMESY, SPRY U CYSS-NUKGPLOYX QHPGM HZ KHULM VYYZ HG U OHMXPLO.MOY BPWHTMY CPLOYX MH VYNPG OPL LMHKE UGX NUBY U LAVMSY LTPSY."WHTY HBYK OYKY, OYSYGY, XYUK," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU MH MOY VYUAMPZASEHAGN IKPGWYLL COH CUL LPMMPGN LHTY CUE HZZ, MOY WYGMYK HZ UGHMOYKNKHAI.MOY IKPGWYLL LTPSYX. LOY KHLY CPMO MOY LUTY AGWOUGNPGN LTPSY CPMO COPWOLOY OUX ZPKLM YGMYKYX MOY KHHT--MOY LTPSY HZ U IYKZYWMSE VYUAMPZASCHTUG. CPMO U LSPNOM KALMSY HZ OYK COPMY XKYLL MKPTTYX CPMO THLLUGX PBE, CPMO U NSYUT HZ COPMY LOHASXYKL, NSHLLE OUPK, UGX LIUKRSPGNXPUTHGXL, LOY IULLYX VYMCYYG MOY TYG COH TUXY CUE ZHK OYK, GHM SHHRPGNUM UGE HZ MOYT VAM LTPSPGN HG USS, UL PZ NKUWPHALSE USSHCPGN YUWO MOYIKPBPSYNY HZ UXTPKPGN OYK VYUAMPZAS ZPNAKY UGX LOUIYSE LOHASXYKL,VUWR, UGX VHLHT--COPWO PG MOY ZULOPHG HZ MOHLY XUEL CYKY BYKE TAWOYDIHLYX--UGX LOY LYYTYX MH VKPGN MOY NSUTHAK HZ U VUSSKHHT CPMO OYK ULLOY THBYX MHCUKX UGGU IUBSHBGU. OYSYGY CUL LH SHBYSE MOUM GHM HGSEXPX LOY GHM LOHC UGE MKUWY HZ WHJAYMKE, VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE LOY YBYGUIIYUKYX LOE HZ OYK AGJAYLMPHGUVSY UGX USS MHH BPWMHKPHAL VYUAME. LOYLYYTYX MH CPLO, VAM MH VY AGUVSY, MH XPTPGPLO PML YZZYWM."OHC SHBYSE!" LUPX YBYKEHGY COH LUC OYK; UGX MOY BPWHTMY SPZMYX OPLLOHASXYKL UGX XKHIIYX OPL YEYL UL PZ LMUKMSYX VE LHTYMOPGN YDMKUHKXPGUKECOYG LOY MHHR OYK LYUM HIIHLPMY UGX VYUTYX AIHG OPT USLH CPMO OYKAGWOUGNPGN LTPSY."TUXUTY, P XHAVM TE UVPSPME VYZHKY LAWO UG UAXPYGWY," LUPX OY, LTPSPGNSEPGWSPGPGN OPL OYUX.MOY IKPGWYLL KYLMYX OYK VUKY KHAGX UKT HG U SPMMSY MUVSY UGX WHGLPXYKYXU KYISE AGGYWYLLUKE. LOY LTPSPGNSE CUPMYX. USS MOY MPTY MOY LMHKE CULVYPGN MHSX LOY LUM AIKPNOM, NSUGWPGN GHC UM OYK VYUAMPZAS KHAGX UKT,USMYKYX PG LOUIY VE PML IKYLLAKY HG MOY MUVSY, GHC UM OYK LMPSS THKYVYUAMPZAS VHLHT, HG COPWO LOY KYUXQALMYX U XPUTHGX GYWRSUWY. ZKHT MPTYMH MPTY LOY LTHHMOYX MOY ZHSXL HZ OYK XKYLL, UGX COYGYBYK MOY LMHKEIKHXAWYX UG YZZYWM LOY NSUGWYX UM UGGU IUBSHBGU, UM HGWY UXHIMYX QALMMOY YDIKYLLPHG LOY LUC HG MOY TUPX HZ OHGHK'L ZUWY, UGX UNUPG KYSUILYXPGMH OYK KUXPUGM LTPSY.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL OUX USLH SYZM MOY MYU MUVSY UGX ZHSSHCYX OYSYGY."CUPM U THTYGM, P'SS NYM TE CHKR.... GHC MOYG, COUM UKY EHA MOPGRPGNHZ?" LOY CYGM HG, MAKGPGN MH IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY. "ZYMWO TY TE CHKRVUN."MOYKY CUL U NYGYKUS THBYTYGM UL MOY IKPGWYLL, LTPSPGN UGX MUSRPGNTYKKPSE MH YBYKEHGY UM HGWY, LUM XHCG UGX NUPSE UKKUGNYX OYKLYSZ PG OYKLYUM."GHC P UT USS KPNOM," LOY LUPX, UGX ULRPGN MOY BPWHTMY MH VYNPG, LOYMHHR AI OYK CHKR.IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY, OUBPGN VKHANOM MOY CHKRVUN, QHPGYX MOY WPKWSY UGXTHBPGN U WOUPK WSHLY MH OYKL LYUMYX OPTLYSZ VYLPXY OYK.SY WOUKTUGM OPIIHSEMY CUL LAKIKPLPGN VE OPL YDMKUHKXPGUKE KYLYTVSUGWYMH OPL VYUAMPZAS LPLMYK, VAM EYM THKY VE MOY ZUWM MOUM PG LIPMY HZMOPL KYLYTVSUGWY OY CUL YDWYYXPGNSE ANSE. OPL ZYUMAKYL CYKY SPRY OPLLPLMYK'L, VAM COPSY PG OYK WULY YBYKEMOPGN CUL SPM AI VE U QHEHAL,LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX, EHAMOZAS, UGX WHGLMUGM LTPSY HZ UGPTUMPHG, UGX VE MOYCHGXYKZAS WSULLPW VYUAME HZ OYK ZPNAKY, OPL ZUWY HG MOY WHGMKUKECUL XASSYX VE PTVYWPSPME UGX U WHGLMUGM YDIKYLLPHG HZ LASSYGLYSZ-WHGZPXYGWY, COPSY OPL VHXE CUL MOPG UGX CYUR. OPL YEYL, GHLY, UGXTHAMO USS LYYTYX IAWRYKYX PGMH U BUWUGM, CYUKPYX NKPTUWY, UGX OPL UKTLUGX SYNL USCUEL ZYSS PGMH AGGUMAKUS IHLPMPHGL."PM'L GHM NHPGN MH VY U NOHLM LMHKE?" LUPX OY, LPMMPGN XHCG VYLPXYMOY IKPGWYLL UGX OULMPSE UXQALMPGN OPL SHKNGYMMY, UL PZ CPMOHAM MOPLPGLMKATYGM OY WHASX GHM VYNPG MH LIYUR."COE GH, TE XYUK ZYSSHC," LUPX MOY ULMHGPLOYX GUKKUMHK, LOKANNPGN OPLLOHASXYKL."VYWUALY P OUMY NOHLM LMHKPYL," LUPX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY PG U MHGY COPWOLOHCYX MOUM OY HGSE AGXYKLMHHX MOY TYUGPGN HZ OPL CHKXL UZMYK OY OUXAMMYKYX MOYT.OY LIHRY CPMO LAWO LYSZ-WHGZPXYGWY MOUM OPL OYUKYKL WHASX GHM VY LAKYCOYMOYK COUM OY LUPX CUL BYKE CPMME HK BYKE LMAIPX. OY CUL XKYLLYX PGU XUKR-NKYYG XKYLL WHUM, RGYY VKYYWOYL HZ MOY WHSHK HZ WAPLLY XY GETIOYYZZKUEYY, UL OY WUSSYX PM, LOHYL, UGX LPSR LMHWRPGNL.MOY BPWHTMY MHSX OPL MUSY BYKE GYUMSE. PM CUL UG UGYWXHMY, MOYG WAKKYGM,MH MOY YZZYWM MOUM MOY XAW X'YGNOPYG OUX NHGY LYWKYMSE MH IUKPL MH BPLPMTUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY; MOUM UM OYK OHALY OY WUTY AIHG VHGUIUKMY, COH USLHYGQHEYX MOY ZUTHAL UWMKYLL' ZUBHKL, UGX MOUM PG OPL IKYLYGWY GUIHSYHGOUIIYGYX MH ZUSS PGMH HGY HZ MOY ZUPGMPGN ZPML MH COPWO OY CUL LAVQYWM,UGX CUL MOAL UM MOY XAW'L TYKWE. MOY SUMMYK LIUKYX OPT, UGX MOPLTUNGUGPTPME VHGUIUKMY LAVLYJAYGMSE KYIUPX VE XYUMO.MOY LMHKE CUL BYKE IKYMME UGX PGMYKYLMPGN, YLIYWPUSSE UM MOY IHPGMCOYKY MOY KPBUSL LAXXYGSE KYWHNGPFYX HGY UGHMOYK; UGX MOY SUXPYL SHHRYXUNPMUMYX."WOUKTPGN!" LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU CPMO UG PGJAPKPGN NSUGWY UM MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL."WOUKTPGN!" COPLIYKYX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, LMPWRPGN MOY GYYXSY PGMH OYKCHKR UL PZ MH MYLMPZE MOUM MOY PGMYKYLM UGX ZULWPGUMPHG HZ MOY LMHKEIKYBYGMYX OYK ZKHT NHPGN HG CPMO PM.MOY BPWHTMY UIIKYWPUMYX MOPL LPSYGM IKUPLY UGX LTPSPGN NKUMYZASSEIKYIUKYX MH WHGMPGAY, VAM QALM MOYG UGGU IUBSHBGU, COH OUX RYIM UCUMWOZAS YEY HG MOY EHAGN TUG COH LH USUKTYX OYK, GHMPWYX MOUM OY CULMUSRPGN MHH SHAXSE UGX BYOYTYGMSE CPMO MOY UVVY, LH LOY OAKKPYX MH MOYKYLWAY. IPYKKY OUX TUGUNYX MH LMUKM U WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO MOY UVVY UVHAMMOY VUSUGWY HZ IHCYK, UGX MOY SUMMYK, YBPXYGMSE PGMYKYLMYX VE MOY EHAGNTUG'L LPTISY-TPGXYX YUNYKGYLL, CUL YDISUPGPGN OPL IYM MOYHKE. VHMO CYKYMUSRPGN UGX SPLMYGPGN MHH YUNYKSE UGX MHH GUMAKUSSE, COPWO CUL COE UGGUIUBSHBGU XPLUIIKHBYX."MOY TYUGL UKY... MOY VUSUGWY HZ IHCYK PG YAKHIY UGX MOY KPNOML HZ MOYIYHISY," MOY UVVY CUL LUEPGN. "PM PL HGSE GYWYLLUKE ZHK HGY IHCYKZASGUMPHG SPRY KALLPU--VUKVUKPW UL LOY PL LUPX MH VY--MH ISUWY OYKLYSZXPLPGMYKYLMYXSE UM MOY OYUX HZ UG USSPUGWY OUBPGN ZHK PML HVQYWM MOYTUPGMYGUGWY HZ MOY VUSUGWY HZ IHCYK HZ YAKHIY, UGX PM CHASX LUBY MOYCHKSX!""VAM OHC UKY EHA MH NYM MOUM VUSUGWY?" IPYKKY CUL VYNPGGPGN.UM MOUM THTYGM UGGU IUBSHBGU WUTY AI UGX, SHHRPGN LYBYKYSE UM IPYKKY,ULRYX MOY PMUSPUG OHC OY LMHHX KALLPUG WSPTUMY. MOY PMUSPUG'LZUWY PGLMUGMSE WOUGNYX UGX ULLATYX UG HZZYGLPBYSE UZZYWMYX, LANUKEYDIKYLLPHG, YBPXYGMSE OUVPMAUS MH OPT COYG WHGBYKLPGN CPMO CHTYG."P UT LH YGWOUGMYX VE MOY VKPSSPUGWE HZ MOY CPM UGX WASMAKY HZ MOYLHWPYME, THKY YLIYWPUSSE HZ MOY ZYTPGPGY LHWPYME, PG COPWO P OUBY OUXMOY OHGHK HZ VYPGN KYWYPBYX, MOUM P OUBY GHM EYM OUX MPTY MH MOPGR HZMOY WSPTUMY," LUPX OY.GHM SYMMPGN MOY UVVY UGX IPYKKY YLWUIY, UGGU IUBSHBGU, MOY THKYWHGBYGPYGMSE MH RYYI MOYT AGXYK HVLYKBUMPHG, VKHANOM MOYT PGMH MOYSUKNYK WPKWSY.WOUIMYK PBQALM MOYG UGHMOYK BPLPMHK YGMYKYX MOY XKUCPGN KHHT: IKPGWY UGXKYCVHSRHGLRP, MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' OALVUGX. OY CUL U BYKE OUGXLHTY EHAGNTUG, HZ TYXPAT OYPNOM, CPMO ZPKT, WSYUKWAM ZYUMAKYL. YBYKEMOPGN UVHAMOPT, ZKHT OPL CYUKE, VHKYX YDIKYLLPHG MH OPL JAPYM, TYULAKYX LMYI,HZZYKYX U THLM LMKPRPGN WHGMKULM MH OPL JAPYM, SPMMSY CPZY. PM CULYBPXYGM MOUM OY GHM HGSE RGYC YBYKEHGY PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, VAM OUXZHAGX MOYT MH VY LH MPKYLHTY MOUM PM CYUKPYX OPT MH SHHR UM HK SPLMYG MHMOYT. UGX UTHGN USS MOYLY ZUWYL MOUM OY ZHAGX LH MYXPHAL, GHGY LYYTYXMH VHKY OPT LH TAWO UL MOUM HZ OPL IKYMME CPZY. OY MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OYKCPMO U NKPTUWY MOUM XPLMHKMYX OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY, RPLLYX UGGU IUBSHBGU'LOUGX, UGX LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL LWUGGYX MOY COHSY WHTIUGE."EHA UKY HZZ MH MOY CUK, IKPGWY?" CYCUGMYX SPVYKME, VAM VAHGUIUKMY OUL XYLMKHEYX PM."IKPGWY UGXKYC RYIM SHHRPGN CPMO UG UTALYX LTPSY ZKHT IPYKKY MH MOYBPWHTMY UGX ZKHT MOY BPWHTMY MH MOYPK OHLMYLL. VAM COYG LOY LUC MOUM IPYKKY'L LUWKPSYNPHAL CHKXL OUXGHM YDULIYKUMYX MOY BPWHTMY, UGX OUX WHGBPGWYX OYKLYSZ MOUM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH LMHI OPT, LOY KUSSPYX OYK ZHKWYL UGX QHPGYX MOY BPWHTMY PGU BPNHKHAL UMMUWR HG MOY HKUMHK."VAM, TE XYUK THGLPYAK IPYKKY," LUPX LOY, "OHC XH EHA YDISUPG MOY ZUWMHZ U NKYUM TUG YDYWAMPGN U XAW--HK YBYG UG HKXPGUKE TUG COH--PL PGGHWYGMUGX AGMKPYX?""P LOHASX SPRY," LUPX MOY BPWHTMY, "MH ULR OHC THGLPYAK YDISUPGL MOY18MO VKATUPKY; CUL GHM MOUM UG PTIHLMAKY? PM CUL U LCPGXSY, UGX GHM UMUSS SPRY MOY WHGXAWM HZ U NKYUM TUG!""UGX MOY IKPLHGYKL OY RPSSYX PG UZKPWU? MOUM CUL OHKKPVSY!" LUPX MOYSPMMSY IKPGWYLL, LOKANNPGN OYK LOHASXYKL."OY'L U SHC ZYSSHC, LUE COUM EHA CPSS," KYTUKRYX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY.IPYKKY, GHM RGHCPGN COHT MH UGLCYK, SHHRYX UM MOYT USS UGX LTPSYX. OPLLTPSY CUL AGSPRY MOY OUSZ-LTPSY HZ HMOYK IYHISY. COYG OY LTPSYX,OPL NKUBY, YBYG KUMOYK NSHHTE, SHHR CUL PGLMUGMUGYHALSE KYISUWYX VEUGHMOYK--U WOPSXSPRY, RPGXSE, YBYG KUMOYK LPSSE SHHR, COPWO LYYTYX MHULR ZHKNPBYGYLL.MOY BPWHTMY COH CUL TYYMPGN OPT ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY LUC WSYUKSE MOUMMOPL EHAGN QUWHVPG CUL GHM LH MYKKPVSY UL OPL CHKXL LANNYLMYX. USS CYKYLPSYGM."OHC XH EHA YDIYWM OPT MH UGLCYK EHA USS UM HGWY?" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC."VYLPXYL, PG MOY UWMPHGL HZ U LMUMYLTUG HGY OUL MH XPLMPGNAPLO VYMCYYGOPL UWML UL U IKPBUMY IYKLHG, UL U NYGYKUS, UGX UL UG YTIYKHK. LH PMLYYTL MH TY.""EYL, EYL, HZ WHAKLY!" IPYKKY WOPTYX PG, ISYULYX UM MOY UKKPBUS HZ MOPLKYPGZHKWYTYGM."HGY TALM UXTPM," WHGMPGAYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "MOUM GUIHSYHG UL U TUG CULNKYUM HG MOY VKPXNY HZ UKWHSU, UGX PG MOY OHLIPMUS UM QUZZU COYKY OYNUBY OPL OUGX MH MOY ISUNAY-LMKPWRYG; VAM... VAM MOYKY UKY HMOYK UWMLCOPWO PM PL XPZZPWASM MH QALMPZE."IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH OUX YBPXYGMSE CPLOYX MH MHGY XHCG MOY UCRCUKXGYLL HZIPYKKY'L KYTUKRL, KHLY UGX TUXY U LPNG MH OPL CPZY MOUM PM CUL MPTY MHNH.LAXXYGSE IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY LMUKMYX AI TURPGN LPNGL MH YBYKEHGY MH UMMYGX,UGX ULRPGN MOYT USS MH VY LYUMYX VYNUG:"P CUL MHSX U WOUKTPGN THLWHC LMHKE MHXUE UGX TALM MKYUM EHA MH PM.YDWALY TY, BPWHTMY--P TALM MYSS PM PG KALLPUG HK MOY IHPGM CPSS VYSHLM...." UGX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY VYNUG MH MYSS OPL LMHKE PG LAWO KALLPUGUL U ZKYGWOTUG CHASX LIYUR UZMYK LIYGXPGN UVHAM U EYUK PG KALLPU.YBYKEHGY CUPMYX, LH YTIOUMPWUSSE UGX YUNYKSE XPX OY XYTUGX MOYPKUMMYGMPHG MH OPL LMHKE."MOYKY PL PG THLWHC U SUXE, AGY XUTY, UGX LOY PL BYKE LMPGNE. LOY TALMOUBY MCH ZHHMTYG VYOPGX OYK WUKKPUNY, UGX BYKE VPN HGYL. MOUM CUL OYKMULMY. UGX LOY OUX U SUXE'L TUPX, USLH VPN. LOY LUPX..."OYKY IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY IUALYX, YBPXYGMSE WHSSYWMPGN OPL PXYUL CPMOXPZZPWASME."LOY LUPX... HO EYL! LOY LUPX, 'NPKS,' MH MOY TUPX, 'IAM HG U SPBYKE,NYM AI VYOPGX MOY WUKKPUNY, UGX WHTY CPMO TY COPSY P TURY LHTY WUSSL.'"OYKY IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY LISAMMYKYX UGX VAKLM HAM SUANOPGN SHGN VYZHKY OPLUAXPYGWY, COPWO IKHXAWYX UG YZZYWM AGZUBHKUVSY MH MOY GUKKUMHK. LYBYKUSIYKLHGL, UTHGN MOYT MOY YSXYKSE SUXE UGX UGGU IUBSHBGU, XPX OHCYBYKLTPSY."LOY CYGM. LAXXYGSE MOYKY CUL U NKYUM CPGX. MOY NPKS SHLM OYK OUM UGXOYK SHGN OUPK WUTY XHCG...." OYKY OY WHASX WHGMUPG OPTLYSZ GH SHGNYK UGXCYGM HG, VYMCYYG NULIL HZ SUANOMYK: "UGX MOY COHSY CHKSX RGYC...."UGX LH MOY UGYWXHMY YGXYX. MOHANO PM CUL AGPGMYSSPNPVSY COE OY OUX MHSXPM, HK COE PM OUX MH VY MHSX PG KALLPUG, LMPSS UGGU IUBSHBGU UGX MOYHMOYKL UIIKYWPUMYX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY'L LHWPUS MUWM PG LH UNKYYUVSE YGXPGNIPYKKY'L AGISYULUGM UGX AGUTPUVSY HAMVAKLM. UZMYK MOY UGYWXHMY MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG VKHRY AI PGMH PGLPNGPZPWUGM LTUSS MUSR UVHAM MOY SULM UGXGYDM VUSSL, UVHAM MOYUMKPWUSL, UGX COH CHASX TYYM COHT, UGX COYG UGXCOYKY.WOUIMYK BPOUBPGN MOUGRYX UGGU IUBSHBGU ZHK OYK WOUKTPGN LHPKYY, MOY NAYLML VYNUGMH MURY MOYPK SYUBY.IPYKKY CUL AGNUPGSE. LMHAM, UVHAM MOY UBYKUNY OYPNOM, VKHUX, CPMO OANYKYX OUGXL; OY XPX GHM RGHC, UL MOY LUEPGN PL, OHC MH YGMYK U XKUCPGNKHHT UGX LMPSS SYLL OHC MH SYUBY HGY; MOUM PL, OHC MH LUE LHTYMOPGNIUKMPWASUKSE UNKYYUVSY VYZHKY NHPGN UCUE. VYLPXYL MOPL OY CULUVLYGM-TPGXYX. COYG OY KHLY MH NH, OY MHHR AI PGLMYUX HZ OPL HCG, MOYNYGYKUS'L MOKYY-WHKGYKYX OUM, UGX OYSX PM, IASSPGN UM MOY ISATY, MPSSMOY NYGYKUS ULRYX OPT MH KYLMHKY PM. USS OPL UVLYGM-TPGXYXGYLL UGXPGUVPSPME MH YGMYK U KHHT UGX WHGBYKLY PG PM CUL, OHCYBYK, KYXYYTYX VEOPL RPGXSE, LPTISY, UGX THXYLM YDIKYLLPHG. UGGU IUBSHBGU MAKGYX MHCUKXOPT UGX, CPMO U WOKPLMPUG TPSXGYLL MOUM YDIKYLLYX ZHKNPBYGYLL HZ OPLPGXPLWKYMPHG, GHXXYX UGX LUPX: "P OHIY MH LYY EHA UNUPG, VAM P USLH OHIYEHA CPSS WOUGNY EHAK HIPGPHGL, TE XYUK THGLPYAK IPYKKY."COYG LOY LUPX MOPL, OY XPX GHM KYISE UGX HGSE VHCYX, VAM UNUPG YBYKEVHXELUC OPL LTPSY, COPWO LUPX GHMOPGN, AGSYLL IYKOUIL, "HIPGPHGL UKYHIPGPHGL, VAM EHA LYY COUM U WUIPMUS, NHHX-GUMAKYX ZYSSHC P UT." UGXYBYKEHGY, PGWSAXPGN UGGU IUBSHBGU, ZYSM MOPL.IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX NHGY HAM PGMH MOY OUSS, UGX, MAKGPGN OPL LOHASXYKLMH MOY ZHHMTUG COH CUL OYSIPGN OPT HG CPMO OPL WSHUR, SPLMYGYXPGXPZZYKYGMSE MH OPL CPZY'L WOUMMYK CPMO IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY COH OUX USLHWHTY PGMH MOY OUSS. IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY LMHHX WSHLY MH MOY IKYMME, IKYNGUGMIKPGWYLL, UGX LMUKYX ZPDYXSE UM OYK MOKHANO OPL YEYNSULL."NH PG, UGGYMMY, HK EHA CPSS WUMWO WHSX," LUPX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL,MURPGN SYUBY HZ UGGU IUBSHBGU. "PM PL LYMMSYX," LOY UXXYX PG U SHCBHPWY.UGGU IUBSHBGU OUX USKYUXE TUGUNYX MH LIYUR MH SPLY UVHAM MOY TUMWO LOYWHGMYTISUMYX VYMCYYG UGUMHSY UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' LPLMYK-PG-SUC."P KYSE HG EHA, TE XYUK," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU, USLH PG U SHC MHGY."CKPMY MH OYK UGX SYM TY RGHC OHC OYK ZUMOYK SHHRL UM MOY TUMMYK. UAKYBHPK!"--UGX LOY SYZM MOY OUSS.IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY UIIKHUWOYX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL UGX, VYGXPGN OPL ZUWYWSHLY MH OYK, VYNUG MH COPLIYK LHTYMOPGN.MCH ZHHMTYG, MOY IKPGWYLL' UGX OPL HCG, LMHHX OHSXPGN U LOUCS UGX UWSHUR, CUPMPGN ZHK MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG MH ZPGPLO. MOYE SPLMYGYX MHMOY ZKYGWO LYGMYGWYL COPWO MH MOYT CYKY TYUGPGNSYLL, CPMO UG UPK HZAGXYKLMUGXPGN VAM GHM CPLOPGN MH UIIYUK MH XH LH. MOY IKPGWYLL UL ALAUSLIHRY LTPSPGNSE UGX SPLMYGYX CPMO U SUANO."P UT BYKE NSUX P XPX GHM NH MH MOY UTVULLUXHK'L," LUPX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMY"-LH XASS-. PM OUL VYYG U XYSPNOMZAS YBYGPGN, OUL PM GHM? XYSPNOMZAS!""MOYE LUE MOY VUSS CPSS VY BYKE NHHX," KYISPYX MOY IKPGWYLL, XKUCPGN AIOYK XHCGE SPMMSY SPI. "USS MOY IKYMME CHTYG PG LHWPYME CPSS VY MOYKY.""GHM USS, ZHK EHA CPSS GHM VY MOYKY; GHM USS," LUPX IKPGWY OPIIHSEMYLTPSPGN QHEZASSE; UGX LGUMWOPGN MOY LOUCS ZKHT MOY ZHHMTUG, COHT OYYBYG IALOYX ULPXY, OY VYNUG CKUIIPGN PM KHAGX MOY IKPGWYLL. YPMOYK ZKHTUCRCUKXGYLL HK PGMYGMPHGUSSE (GH HGY WHASX OUBY LUPX COPWO) UZMYK MOYLOUCS OUX VYYG UXQALMYX OY RYIM OPL UKT UKHAGX OYK ZHK U SHGN MPTY, ULMOHANO YTVKUWPGN OYK.LMPSS LTPSPGN, LOY NKUWYZASSE THBYX UCUE, MAKGPGN UGX NSUGWPGN UM OYKOALVUGX. IKPGWY UGXKYC'L YEYL CYKY WSHLYX, LH CYUKE UGX LSYYIE XPX OYLYYT."UKY EHA KYUXE?" HGY OUL MHRGHC OHC MH XYUS CPMO MOYT."IPYKKY KYUWOPGN MOY OHALY ZPKLM CYGM PGMH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L LMAXE SPRYHGY JAPMY UM OHTY, UGX ZKHT OUVPM PTTYXPUMYSE SUE XHCG HG MOY LHZU, MHHRZKHT MOY LOYSZ MOY ZPKLM VHHR MOUM WUTY MH OPL OUGX (PM CUL WUYLUK'LWHTTYGMUKPYL), UGX KYLMPGN HG OPL YSVHC, VYNUG KYUXPGN PM PG MOY TPXXSY."COUM OUBY EHA XHGY MH TSSY LWOYKYK? P XHG'M SPRY YPMOYK MOY HGY HK MOY HMOYK.""VAM EHA TALM XYWPXY HG LHTYMOPGN! EHAK ZUMOYK YDIYWML PM."IPYKKY UM MOY UNY HZ MYG OUX VYYG LYGM UVKHUX CPMO UG UVVY UL MAMHK,UGX OUX KYTUPGYX UCUE MPSS OY CUL MCYGME. COYG OY KYMAKGYX MH THLWHCOPL ZUMOYK XPLTPLLYX MOY UVVY UGX LUPX MH MOY EHAGN TUG, "GHC NH MHIYMYKLVAKN, SHHR KHAGX, UGX WOHHLY EHAK IKHZYLLPHG. P CPSS UNKYY MHUGEMOPGN. OYKY PL U SYMMYK MH IKPGWY BULPSP, UGX OYKY PL THGYE. CKPMY MHTY USS UVHAM PM, UGX P CPSS OYSI EHA PG YBYKEMOPGN." PM CUL UVHAM MOPL WOHPWY MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LIYURPGN.IPYKKY KAVVYX OPL ZHKYOYUX."VAM OY TALM VY U ZKYYTULHG," LUPX OY, KYZYKKPGN MH MOY UVVY COHT OY OUXTYM MOUM YBYGPGN."MOUM PL USS GHGLYGLY." MOYKY PL U CUK GHC UNUPGLM GUIHSYHG. PZ PM CYKY U CUK ZHKZKYYXHT P WHASX AGXYKLMUGX PM UGX LOHASX VY MOY ZPKLM MH YGMYK MOY UKTE;VAM MH OYSI YGNSUGX UGX UALMKPU UNUPGLM MOY NKYUMYLM TUG PG MOY CHKSX PLGHM KPNOM."IKPGWY UGXKYC HGSE LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL UM IPYKKY'L WOPSXPLO CHKXL. OYIAM HG MOY UPK HZ HGY COH ZPGXL PM PTIHLLPVSY MH KYISE MH LAWO GHGLYGLY,VAM PM CHASX PG ZUWM OUBY VYYG XPZZPWASM MH NPBY UGE HMOYK UGLCYK MOUGMOY HGY IKPGWY UGXKYC NUBY MH MOPL GUPBY JAYLMPHG."PZ GH HGY ZHANOM YDWYIM HG OPL HCG WHGBPWMPHG, MOYKY CHASX VY GH CUKL,"OY LUPX."UGX MOUM CHASX VY LISYGXPX," LUPX IPYKKY.IKPGWY UGXKYC LTPSYX PKHGPWUSSE."BYKE SPRYSE PM CHASX VY LISYGXPX, VAM PM CPSS GYBYK WHTY UVHAM...""CYSS, COE UKY EHA NHPGN MH MOY CUK?" IKPGWY UGXKYCLOHHR OPTLYSZ UL PZ CURPGN AI, UGX OPL ZUWY ULLATYX MOY SHHR PM OUX OUXPG UGGU IUBSHBGU'L XKUCPGN KHHT. IPYKKY KYTHBYX OPL ZYYM ZKHT MOY LHZU.MOY IKPGWYLL WUTY PG. P WUG'M AGXYKLMUGX COE OYCUGML MH NH MH MOY CUK," KYISPYX IPYKKY, UXXKYLLPGN MOY IKPGWYLL CPMOGHGY HZ MOY YTVUKKULLTYGM LH WHTTHGSE LOHCG VE EHAGN TYG PG MOYPKPGMYKWHAKLY CPMO EHAGN CHTYG.MOY IKPGWYLL LMUKMYX. LOY SUANOYX."OY PL LH CYSS KYWYPBYX YBYKECOYKY. OY TPNOM YULPSE VYWHTY UPXY-XY-WUTIMH MOY YTIYKHK. EHA RGHC MOY YTIYKHK LIHRY MH OPT THLM NKUWPHALSE.UGGYMMY UGX P CYKY LIYURPGN HZ OHC MH UKKUGNY PM. COUM XH EHA MOPGR?"IPYKKY SHHRYX UM OPL ZKPYGX UGX, GHMPWPGN MOUM OY XPX GHM SPRY MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG, NUBY GH KYISE."COYG UKY EHA LMUKMPGN?" OY ULRYX."HO, XHG'M LIYUR HZ OPL NHPGN, XHG'M! P CHG'M OYUK PM LIHRYG HZ," LUPXMOY IKPGWYLL PG MOY LUTY IYMASUGMSE ISUEZAS MHGY PG COPWO LOY OUX LIHRYGMH OPIIHSEMY PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX COPWO CUL LH ISUPGSE PSS-LAPMYXMH MOY ZUTPSE WPKWSY HZ COPWO IPYKKY CUL USTHLM U TYTVYK. "MHXUE COYG PKYTYTVYKYX MOUM USS MOYLY XYSPNOMZAS ULLHWPUMPHGL TALM VY VKHRYG HZZ...UGX MOYG EHA RGHC, UGXKY..." (LOY SHHRYX LPNGPZPWUGMSE UM OYK OALVUGX)"P'T UZKUPX, P'T UZKUPX!" LOY COPLIYKYX, UGX U LOAXXYK KUG XHCG OYKVUWR.OYK OALVUGX SHHRYX UM OYK UL PZ LAKIKPLYX MH GHMPWY MOUM LHTYHGY VYLPXYLIPYKKY UGX OPTLYSZ CUL PG MOY KHHT, UGX UXXKYLLYX OYK PG U MHGY HZZKPNPX IHSPMYGYLL."COUM PL PM EHA UKY UZKUPX HZ, SPLY? QALM ZHK U COPT HZOPL HCG, NHHXGYLL HGSE RGHCL COE, OY SYUBYL TY UGX SHWRL TY AI USHGY PGMOY WHAGMKE.""CPMO TE ZUMOYK UGX LPLMYK, KYTYTVYK," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC NYGMSE."USHGY USS MOY LUTY, CPMOHAM TE ZKPYGXL.... UGX OY YDIYWML TY GHM MH VYUZKUPX."OYK MHGY CUL GHC JAYKASHAL UGX OYK SPI XKUCG AI, NPBPGN OYK GHM UQHEZAS, VAM UG UGPTUS, LJAPKKYS-SPRY YDIKYLLPHG. LOY IUALYX UL PZ LOYZYSM PM PGXYWHKHAL MH LIYUR HZ OYK IKYNGUGWE VYZHKY IPYKKY, MOHANO MOYNPLM HZ MOY TUMMYK SUE PG MOUM."P LMPSS WUG'M AGXYKLMUGX COUM EHA UKY UZKUPX HZ," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYCLSHCSE, GHM MURPGN OPL YEYL HZZ OPL CPZY.MOY IKPGWYLL VSALOYX, UGX KUPLYX OYK UKTL CPMO U NYLMAKY HZ XYLIUPK."GH, UGXKYC, P TALM LUE EHA OUBY WOUGNYX. HO, OHC EHA OUBY...""EHAK XHWMHK MYSSL EHA MH NH MH VYX YUKSPYK," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "EHAOUX VYMMYK NH."MOY IKPGWYLL LUPX GHMOPGN, VAM LAXXYGSE OYK LOHKM XHCGE SPI JAPBYKYX.IKPGWY UGXKYC KHLY, LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL, UGX CUSRYX UVHAM MOY KHHT.IPYKKY SHHRYX HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL CPMO GUPBY LAKIKPLY, GHC UM OPT UGXGHC UM OYK, THBYX UL PZ UVHAM MH KPLY MHH, VAM WOUGNYX OPL TPGX."COE LOHASX P TPGX THGLPYAK IPYKKY VYPGN OYKY?" YDWSUPTYX MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL LAXXYGSE, OYK IKYMME ZUWY USS UM HGWY XPLMHKMYX VE U MYUKZASNKPTUWY. "P OUBY SHGN CUGMYX MH ULR EHA, UGXKYC, COE EHA OUBY WOUGNYXLH MH TY? COUM OUBY P XHGY MH EHA? EHA UKY NHPGN MH MOY CUK UGX OUBY GHIPME ZHK TY. COE PL PM?""SPLY!" CUL USS IKPGWY UGXKYC LUPX. VAM MOUM HGY CHKX YDIKYLLYX UGYGMKYUME, U MOKYUM, UGX UVHBY USS WHGBPWMPHG MOUM LOY CHASX OYKLYSZKYNKYM OYK CHKXL. VAM LOY CYGM HG OAKKPYXSE:"EHA MKYUM TY SPRY UG PGBUSPX HK U WOPSX. P LYY PM USS! XPX EHA VYOUBYSPRY MOUM LPD THGMOL UNH?""SPLY, P VYN EHA MH XYLPLM," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC LMPSS THKY YTIOUMPWUSSE.IPYKKY, COH OUX VYYG NKHCPGN THKY UGX THKY UNPMUMYX UL OY SPLMYGYX MHUSS MOPL, KHLY UGX UIIKHUWOYX MOY IKPGWYLL. OY LYYTYX AGUVSY MH VYUK MOYLPNOM HZ MYUKL UGX CUL KYUXE MH WKE OPTLYSZ."WUST EHAKLYSZ, IKPGWYLL! PM LYYTL LH MH EHA VYWUALY... P ULLAKY EHAP TELYSZ OUBY YDIYKPYGWYX... UGX LH... VYWUALY... GH, YDWALY TY!UG HAMLPXYK PL HAM HZ ISUWY OYKY... GH, XHG'M XPLMKYLL EHAKLYSZ...NHHX-VEY!"IKPGWY UGXKYC WUANOM OPT VE MOY OUGX."GH, CUPM, IPYKKY! MOY IKPGWYLL PL MHH RPGX MH CPLO MH XYIKPBY TY HZ MOYISYULAKY HZ LIYGXPGN MOY YBYGPGN CPMO EHA.""GH, OY MOPGRL HGSE HZ OPTLYSZ," TAMMYKYX MOY IKPGWYLL CPMOHAMKYLMKUPGPGN OYK UGNKE MYUKL."SPLY!" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC XKESE, KUPLPGN OPL BHPWY MH MOY IPMWO COPWOPGXPWUMYL MOUM IUMPYGWY PL YDOUALMYX.LAXXYGSE MOY UGNKE, LJAPKKYS-SPRY YDIKYLLPHG HZ MOY IKPGWYLL' IKYMMEZUWY WOUGNYX PGMH U CPGGPGN UGX IPMYHAL SHHR HZ ZYUK. OYK VYUAMPZAS YEYLNSUGWYX ULRUGWY UM OYK OALVUGX'L ZUWY, UGX OYK HCG ULLATYX MOY MPTPX,XYIKYWUMPGN YDIKYLLPHG HZ U XHN COYG PM KUIPXSE VAM ZYYVSE CUNL PMLXKHHIPGN MUPS."THG XPYA, THG XPYA!" LOY TAMMYKYX, UGX SPZMPGN OYK XKYLL CPMO HGY OUGXLOY CYGM AI MH OYK OALVUGX UGX RPLLYX OPT HG MOY ZHKYOYUX."NHHX GPNOM, SPLY," LUPX OY, KPLPGN UGX WHAKMYHALSE RPLLPGN OYK OUGX ULOY CHASX OUBY XHGY MH U LMKUGNYK.WOUIMYK BPPPMOY ZKPYGXL CYKY LPSYGM. GYPMOYK WUKYX MH VYNPG MUSRPGN. IPYKKYWHGMPGAUSSE NSUGWYX UM IKPGWY UGXKYC; IKPGWY UGXKYC KAVVYX OPL ZHKYOYUXCPMO OPL LTUSS OUGX."SYM AL NH UGX OUBY LAIIYK," OY LUPX CPMO U LPNO, NHPGN MH MOY XHHK.MOYE YGMYKYX MOY YSYNUGM, GYCSE XYWHKUMYX, UGX SADAKPHAL XPGPGN KHHT.YBYKEMOPGN ZKHT MOY MUVSY GUIRPGL MH MOY LPSBYK, WOPGU, UGX NSULL VHKYMOUM PTIKPGM HZ GYCGYLL ZHAGX PG MOY OHALYOHSXL HZ MOY GYCSE TUKKPYX.OUSZCUE MOKHANO LAIIYK IKPGWY UGXKYC SYUGYX OPL YSVHCL HG MOY MUVSY UGX,CPMO U SHHR HZ GYKBHAL UNPMUMPHG LAWO UL IPYKKY OUX GYBYK VYZHKY LYYG HGOPL ZUWY, VYNUG MH MUSR--UL HGY COH OUL SHGN OUX LHTYMOPGN HG OPL TPGXUGX LAXXYGSE XYMYKTPGYL MH LIYUR HAM."GYBYK, GYBYK TUKKE, TE XYUK ZYSSHC! MOUM'L TE UXBPWY: GYBYK TUKKE MPSSEHA WUG LUE MH EHAKLYSZ MOUM EHA OUBY XHGY USS EHA UKY WUIUVSY HZ, UGXAGMPS EHA OUBY WYULYX MH SHBY MOY CHTUG HZ EHAK WOHPWY UGX OUBY LYYGOYK ISUPGSE UL LOY PL, HK YSLY EHA CPSS TURY U WKAYS UGX PKKYBHWUVSYTPLMURY. TUKKE COYG EHA UKY HSX UGX NHHX ZHK GHMOPGN--HK USS MOUM PLNHHX UGX GHVSY PG EHA CPSS VY SHLM. PM CPSS USS VY CULMYX HG MKPZSYL.EYL! EYL! EYL! XHG'M SHHR UM TY CPMO LAWO LAKIKPLY. PZ EHA TUKKEYDIYWMPGN UGEMOPGN ZKHT EHAKLYSZ PG MOY ZAMAKY, EHA CPSS ZYYS UM YBYKELMYI MOUM ZHK EHA USS PL YGXYX, USS PL WSHLYX YDWYIM MOY XKUCPGNKHHT, COYKY EHA CPSS VY KUGNYX LPXY VE LPXY CPMO U WHAKM SUWRYE UGX UGPXPHM!... VAM COUM'L MOY NHHX?..." UGX OY CUBYX OPL UKT.IPYKKY MHHR HZZ OPL LIYWMUWSYL, COPWO TUXY OPL ZUWY LYYT XPZZYKYGM UGXMOY NHHX-GUMAKYX YDIKYLLPHG LMPSS THKY UIIUKYGM, UGX NUFYX UM OPL ZKPYGXPG UTUFYTYGM."TE CPZY," WHGMPGAYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "PL UG YDWYSSYGM CHTUG, HGY HZ MOHLYKUKY CHTYG CPMO COHT U TUG'L OHGHK PL LUZY; VAM, H NHX, COUM CHASX PGHM NPBY GHC MH VY AGTUKKPYX! EHA UKY MOY ZPKLM UGX HGSE HGY MH COHT PTYGMPHG MOPL, VYWUALY P SPRY EHA."UL OY LUPX MOPL IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL SYLL MOUG YBYK SPRY MOUM VHSRHGLRP COHOUX SHSSYX PG UGGU IUBSHBGU'L YULE WOUPKL UGX CPMO OUSZ-WSHLYX YEYL OUXAMMYKYX ZKYGWO IOKULYL VYMCYYG OPL MYYMO. YBYKE TALWSY HZ OPL MOPG ZUWYCUL GHC JAPBYKPGN CPMO GYKBHAL YDWPMYTYGM; OPL YEYL, PG COPWO MOY ZPKYHZ SPZY OUX LYYTYX YDMPGNAPLOYX, GHC ZSULOYX CPMO VKPSSPUGM SPNOM. PMCUL YBPXYGM MOUM MOY THKY SPZYSYLL OY LYYTYX UM HKXPGUKE MPTYL, MOY THKYPTIULLPHGYX OY VYWUTY PG MOYLY THTYGML HZ USTHLM THKVPX PKKPMUMPHG."EHA XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX COE P LUE MOPL," OY WHGMPGAYX, "VAM PM PL MOYCOHSY LMHKE HZ SPZY. EHA MUSR HZ VHGUIUKMY UGX OPL WUKYYK," LUPX OY(MOHANO IPYKKY OUX GHM TYGMPHGYX VHGUIUKMY), "VAM VHGUIUKMY COYG OYCHKRYX CYGM LMYI VE LMYI MHCUKX OPL NHUS. OY CUL ZKYY, OY OUX GHMOPGNVAM OPL UPT MH WHGLPXYK, UGX OY KYUWOYX PM. VAM MPY EHAKLYSZ AI CPMOU CHTUG UGX, SPRY U WOUPGYX WHGBPWM, EHA SHLY USS ZKYYXHT! UGX USS EHAOUBY HZ OHIY UGX LMKYGNMO TYKYSE CYPNOL EHA XHCG UGX MHKTYGML EHA CPMOKYNKYM. XKUCPGN KHHTL, NHLLPI, VUSSL, BUGPME, UGX MKPBPUSPME--MOYLY UKYMOY YGWOUGMYX WPKWSY P WUGGHM YLWUIY ZKHT. P UT GHC NHPGN MH MOY CUK,MOY NKYUMYLM CUK MOYKY YBYK CUL, UGX P RGHC GHMOPGN UGX UT ZPM ZHKGHMOPGN. P UT BYKE UTPUVSY UGX OUBY U WUALMPW CPM," WHGMPGAYX IKPGWYUGXKYC, "UGX UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L MOYE SPLMYG MH TY. UGX MOUM LMAIPX LYMCPMOHAM COHT TE CPZY WUGGHM YDPLM, UGX MOHLY CHTYG... PZ EHA HGSE RGYCCOUM MOHLY LHWPYME CHTYG UKY, UGX CHTYG PG NYGYKUS! TE ZUMOYK PL KPNOM.LYSZPLO, BUPG, LMAIPX, MKPBPUS PG YBYKEMOPGN--MOUM'L COUM CHTYG UKYCOYG EHA LYY MOYT PG MOYPK MKAY WHSHKL! COYG EHA TYYM MOYT PG LHWPYME PMLYYTL UL PZ MOYKY CYKY LHTYMOPGN PG MOYT, VAM MOYKY'L GHMOPGN, GHMOPGN,GHMOPGN! GH, XHG'M TUKKE, TE XYUK ZYSSHC; XHG'M TUKKE!" WHGWSAXYX IKPGWYUGXKYC."PM LYYTL ZAGGE MH TY," LUPX IPYKKY, "MOUM EHA, EHA LOHASX WHGLPXYKEHAKLYSZ PGWUIUVSY UGX EHAK SPZY U LIHPSYX SPZY. EHA OUBY YBYKEMOPGNVYZHKY EHA, YBYKEMOPGN. UGX EHA..."OY XPX GHM ZPGPLO OPL LYGMYGWY, VAM OPL MHGY LOHCYX OHC OPNOSE OYMOHANOM HZ OPL ZKPYGX UGX OHC TAWO OY YDIYWMYX HZ OPT PG MOY ZAMAKY."OHC WUG OY MUSR SPRY MOUM?" MOHANOM IPYKKY. OY WHGLPXYKYX OPL ZKPYGXU THXYS HZ IYKZYWMPHG VYWUALY IKPGWY UGXKYC IHLLYLLYX PG MOY OPNOYLMXYNKYY QALM MOY BYKE JAUSPMPYL IPYKKY SUWRYX, UGX COPWO TPNOM VY VYLMXYLWKPVYX UL LMKYGNMO HZ CPSS. IPYKKY CUL USCUEL ULMHGPLOYX UM IKPGWYUGXKYC'L WUST TUGGYK HZ MKYUMPGN YBYKEVHXE, OPL YDMKUHKXPGUKE TYTHKE,OPL YDMYGLPBY KYUXPGN (OY OUX KYUX YBYKEMOPGN, RGYC YBYKEMOPGN, UGX OUXUG HIPGPHG UVHAM YBYKEMOPGN), VAM UVHBY USS UM OPL WUIUWPME ZHK CHKR UGXLMAXE. UGX PZ IPYKKY CUL HZMYG LMKAWR VE UGXKYC'L SUWR HZ WUIUWPMEZHK IOPSHLHIOPWUS TYXPMUMPHG (MH COPWO OY OPTLYSZ CUL IUKMPWASUKSEUXXPWMYX), OY KYNUKXYX YBYG MOPL GHM UL U XYZYWM VAM UL U LPNG HZLMKYGNMO.YBYG PG MOY VYLM, THLM ZKPYGXSE UGX LPTISYLM KYSUMPHGL HZ SPZY, IKUPLYUGX WHTTYGXUMPHG UKY YLLYGMPUS, QALM UL NKYULY PL GYWYLLUKE MH COYYSLMOUM MOYE TUE KAG LTHHMOSE."TE IUKM PL ISUEYX HAM," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "COUM'L MOY ALY HZ MUSRPGNUVHAM TY? SYM AL MUSR UVHAM EHA," OY UXXYX UZMYK U LPSYGWY, LTPSPGN UMOPL KYULLAKPGN MOHANOML.MOUM LTPSY CUL PTTYXPUMYSE KYZSYWMYX HG IPYKKY'L ZUWY."VAM COUM PL MOYKY MH LUE UVHAM TY?" "CPMOHAM U GUTY UGX CPMOHAM TYUGL... UGX PM KYUSSE..." VAM OYXPX GHM LUE COUM "PM KYUSSE" CUL. "ZHK MOY IKYLYGM P UT ZKYY UGX UTUSS KPNOM. HGSE P OUBYG'M MOY SYULM PXYU COUM P UT MH XH; P CUGMYX MHWHGLASM EHA LYKPHALSE."IKPGWY UGXKYC SHHRYX RPGXSE UM OPT, EYM OPL NSUGWY--ZKPYGXSE UGXUZZYWMPHGUMY UL PM CUL--YDIKYLLYX U LYGLY HZ OPL HCG LAIYKPHKPME."P UT ZHGX HZ EHA, YLIYWPUSSE UL EHA UKY MOY HGY SPBY TUG UTHGN HAKCOHSY LYM. EYL, EHA'KY USS KPNOM! WOHHLY COUM EHA CPSS; PM'L USS MOYLUTY. EHA'SS VY USS KPNOM UGECOYKY. VAM SHHR OYKY: NPBY AI BPLPMPGNMOHLY RAKUNPGL UGX SYUXPGN MOUM LHKM HZ SPZY. OY ULRYX TY ZHK MHGPNOM, VAM P CHG'M NH.""EHA NPBY TY EHAK CHKX HZ OHGHK GHM MH NH?""HG TE OHGHK!"WOUIMYK PDPM CUL IULM HGY H'WSHWR COYG IPYKKY SYZM OPL ZKPYGX. PM CUL U WSHAXSYLL,GHKMOYKG, LATTYK GPNOM. IPYKKY MHHR UG HIYG WUV PGMYGXPGN MH XKPBYLMKUPNOM OHTY. VAM MOY GYUKYK OY XKYC MH MOY OHALY MOY THKY OY ZYSM MOYPTIHLLPVPSPME HZ NHPGN MH LSYYI HG LAWO U GPNOM. HG MOY CUE IPYKKY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM UGUMHSY RAKUNPGCUL YDIYWMPGN MOY ALAUS LYM ZHK WUKXL MOUM YBYGPGN, UZMYK COPWO MOYKYCUL NYGYKUSSE U XKPGRPGN VHAM, ZPGPLOPGN CPMO BPLPML HZ U RPGX IPYKKYCUL BYKE ZHGX HZ."P LOHASX SPRY MH NH MH RAKUNPG'L," MOHANOM OY.VAM OY PTTYXPUMYSE KYWUSSYX OPL IKHTPLY MH IKPGWY UGXKYC GHM MH NHMOYKY. MOYG, UL OUIIYGL MH IYHISY HZ CYUR WOUKUWMYK, OY XYLPKYX LHIULLPHGUMYSE HGWY THKY MH YGQHE MOUM XPLLPIUMPHG OY CUL LH UWWALMHTYX MHMOUM OY XYWPXYX MH NH. MOY MOHANOM PTTYXPUMYSE HWWAKKYX MH OPT MOUM OPLIKHTPLY MH IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL HZ GH UWWHAGM, VYWUALY VYZHKY OY NUBY PM OYOUX USKYUXE IKHTPLYX IKPGWY UGUMHSY MH WHTY MH OPL NUMOYKPGN; "VYLPXYL,"MOHANOM OY, "USS LAWO 'CHKXL HZ OHGHK' UKY WHGBYGMPHGUS MOPGNL CPMO GHXYZPGPMY TYUGPGN, YLIYWPUSSE PZ HGY WHGLPXYKL MOUM VE MHTHKKHC HGY TUEVY XYUX, HK LHTYMOPGN LH YDMKUHKXPGUKE TUE OUIIYG MH HGY MOUM OHGHK UGXXPLOHGHK CPSS VY USS MOY LUTY!" IPYKKY HZMYG PGXASNYX PG KYZSYWMPHGLHZ MOPL LHKM, GASSPZEPGN USS OPL XYWPLPHGL UGX PGMYGMPHGL. OY CYGM MHRAKUNPG'L.KYUWOPGN MOY SUKNY OHALY GYUK MOY OHKLY NAUKXL' VUKKUWRL, PG COPWOUGUMHSY SPBYX, IPYKKY YGMYKYX MOY SPNOMYX IHKWO, ULWYGXYX MOY LMUPKL,UGX CYGM PG UM MOY HIYG XHHK. MOYKY CUL GH HGY PG MOY UGMYKHHT; YTIMEVHMMSYL, WSHURL, UGX HBYKLOHYL CYKY SEPGN UVHAM; MOYKY CUL U LTYSS HZUSWHOHS, UGX LHAGXL HZ BHPWYL UGX LOHAMPGN PG MOY XPLMUGWY.WUKXL UGX LAIIYK CYKY HBYK, VAM MOY BPLPMHKL OUX GHM EYM XPLIYKLYX.IPYKKY MOKYC HZZ OPL WSHUR UGX YGMYKYX MOY ZPKLM KHHT, PG COPWO CYKY MOYKYTUPGL HZ LAIIYK. U ZHHMTUG, MOPGRPGN GH HGY LUC OPT, CUL XKPGRPGN HGMOY LSE COUM CUL SYZM PG MOY NSULLYL. ZKHT MOY MOPKX KHHT WUTY LHAGXL HZSUANOMYK, MOY LOHAMPGN HZ ZUTPSPUK BHPWYL, MOY NKHCSPGN HZ U VYUK, UGXNYGYKUS WHTTHMPHG. LHTY YPNOM HK GPGY EHAGN TYG CYKY WKHCXPGN UGDPHALSEKHAGX UG HIYG CPGXHC. MOKYY HMOYKL CYKY KHTIPGN CPMO U EHAGN VYUK, HGYIASSPGN OPT VE MOY WOUPG UGX MKEPGN MH LYM OPT UM MOY HMOYKL."P VYM U OAGXKYX HG LMYBYGL!" LOHAMYX HGY."TPGX, GH OHSXPGN HG!" WKPYX UGHMOYK."P VYM HG XHSHROHB!" WKPYX U MOPKX. "RAKUNPG, EHA IUKM HAK OUGXL.""MOYKY, SYUBY VKAPG USHGY; OYKY'L U VYM HG.""UM HGY XKUANOM, HK OY SHLYL!" LOHAMYX U ZHAKMO."QUWHV, VKPGN U VHMMSY!" LOHAMYX MOY OHLM, U MUSS, OUGXLHTY ZYSSHC COHLMHHX PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOY NKHAI, CPMOHAM U WHUM, UGX CPMO OPL ZPGY SPGYGLOPKM AGZULMYGYX PG ZKHGM. "CUPM U VPM, EHA ZYSSHCL.... OYKY PL IYMEU!NHHX TUG!" WKPYX OY, UXXKYLLPGN IPYKKY.UGHMOYK BHPWY, ZKHT U TUG HZ TYXPAT OYPNOM CPMO WSYUK VSAY YEYL,IUKMPWASUKSE LMKPRPGN UTHGN USS MOYLY XKAGRYG BHPWYL VE PML LHVYK KPGN,WKPYX ZKHT MOY CPGXHC: "WHTY OYKY; IUKM MOY VYML!" MOPL CUL XHSHROHB,UG HZZPWYK HZ MOY LYTYGHB KYNPTYGM, U GHMHKPHAL NUTVSYK UGX XAYSPLM, COHCUL SPBPGN CPMO UGUMHSY. IPYKKY LTPSYX, SHHRPGN UVHAM OPT TYKKPSE."P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX. COUM'L PM USS UVHAM?""CUPM U VPM, OY PL GHM XKAGR EYM! U VHMMSY OYKY," LUPX UGUMHSY, MURPGN UNSULL ZKHT MOY MUVSY OY CYGM AI MH IPYKKY."ZPKLM HZ USS EHA TALM XKPGR!"IPYKKY XKUGR HGY NSULL UZMYK UGHMOYK, SHHRPGN ZKHT AGXYK OPL VKHCL UMMOY MPILE NAYLML COH CYKY UNUPG WKHCXPGN KHAGX MOY CPGXHC, UGX SPLMYGPGNMH MOYPK WOUMMYK. UGUMHSY RYIM HG KYZPSSPGN IPYKKY'L NSULL COPSYYDISUPGPGN MOUM XHSHROHB CUL VYMMPGN CPMO LMYBYGL, UG YGNSPLO GUBUSHZZPWYK, MOUM OY CHASX XKPGR U VHMMSY HZ KAT LPMMPGN HG MOY HAMYK SYXNYHZ MOY MOPKX ZSHHK CPGXHC CPMO OPL SYNL OUGNPGN HAM."NH HG, EHA TALM XKPGR PM USS," LUPX UGUMHSY, NPBPGN IPYKKY MOY SULMNSULL, "HK P CHG'M SYM EHA NH!""GH, P CHG'M," LUPX IPYKKY, IALOPGN UGUMHSY ULPXY, UGX OY CYGM AI MH MOYCPGXHC.XHSHROHB CUL OHSXPGN MOY YGNSPLOTUG'L OUGX UGX WSYUKSE UGX XPLMPGWMSEKYIYUMPGN MOY MYKTL HZ MOY VYM, UXXKYLLPGN OPTLYSZ IUKMPWASUKSE MHUGUMHSY UGX IPYKKY.XHSHROHB CUL HZ TYXPAT OYPNOM, CPMO WAKSE OUPK UGX SPNOM-VSAY YEYL. OYCUL UVHAM MCYGME-ZPBY. SPRY USS PGZUGMKE HZZPWYKL OY CHKY GH TALMUWOY,LH MOUM OPL THAMO, MOY THLM LMKPRPGN ZYUMAKY HZ OPL ZUWY, CUL WSYUKSELYYG. MOY SPGYL HZ MOUM THAMO CYKY KYTUKRUVSE ZPGYSE WAKBYX. MOY TPXXSYHZ MOY AIIYK SPI ZHKTYX U LOUKI CYXNY UGX WSHLYX ZPKTSE HG MOY ZPKTSHCYK HGY, UGX LHTYMOPGN SPRY MCH XPLMPGWM LTPSYL ISUEYX WHGMPGAUSSEKHAGX MOY MCH WHKGYKL HZ MOY THAMO; MOPL, MHNYMOYK CPMO MOY KYLHSAMY,PGLHSYGM PGMYSSPNYGWY HZ OPL YEYL, IKHXAWYX UG YZZYWM COPWO TUXY PMPTIHLLPVSY GHM MH GHMPWY OPL ZUWY. XHSHROHB CUL U TUG HZ LTUSS TYUGL UGXGH WHGGYWMPHGL. EYM, MOHANO UGUMHSY LIYGM MYGL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ KAVSYL,XHSHROHB SPBYX CPMO OPT UGX OUX ISUWYX OPTLYSZ HG LAWO U ZHHMPGN MOUMUSS COH RGYC MOYT, PGWSAXPGN UGUMHSY OPTLYSZ, KYLIYWMYX OPT THKY MOUGMOYE XPX UGUMHSY. VHMO RAKUNPGUGX XHSHROHB CYKY UM MOUM MPTY GHMHKPHAL UTHGN MOY KURYL UGX LWUIYNKUWYLHZ IYMYKLVAKN.MOY VHMMSY HZ KAT CUL VKHANOM. MOUM'L KPNOM! MOY NKYUM MOPGN PL MOY LYKBPGN, MOUM'L PM." UGX CPMO UWHTISUWYGM LPNO OY CHASX KYMAKG MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT."TUKEU SBHBGU RUKUNPGU UGX OYK XUANOMYK!" XHSHROHBOUL VYYG XYNKUXYX MH MOY KUGRL UGX VYFAROHB'L LHG LYGM VUWR MH THLWHC.UGUMHSY RAKUNPG'L ZUMOYK TUGUNYX LHTYOHC MH NYM OPL LHG'L UZZUPK OALOYXAI, VAM YBYG OY CUL HKXYKYX HAM HZ IYMYKLVAKN.""VAM COUM OUBY MOYE VYYG AI MH?" MOPL PL USS MOUM OPL ZHKYPNG YXAWUMPHG OUL XHGY ZHKOPT! P OHIY MOUM OYKY PG THLWHC GH HGY CPSS KYWYPBY OPT, PG LIPMY HZ OPLTHGYE. MOYE CUGMYX MH PGMKHXAWY OPT MH TY, VAM P JAPMY XYWSPGYX: P OUBYTE XUANOMYKL MH WHGLPXYK.""COE XH EHA LUE MOPL EHAGN TUG PL LH KPWO?" ULRYX MOY WHAGMYLL, MAKGPGNUCUE ZKHT MOY NPKSL, COH UM HGWY ULLATYX UG UPK HZ PGUMMYGMPHG. "OPLWOPSXKYG UKY USS PSSYNPMPTUMY. P MOPGR IPYKKY USLH PL PSSYNPMPTUMY."MOY BPLPMHK TUXY U NYLMAKY CPMO OYK OUGX."P LOHASX MOPGR OY OUL U LWHKY HZ MOYT."IKPGWYLL UGGU TPROUESHBGU PGMYKBYGYX PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, YBPXYGMSECPLOPGN MH LOHC OYK WHGGYWMPHGL UGX RGHCSYXNY HZ COUM CYGM HG PGLHWPYME."MOY ZUWM HZ MOY TUMMYK PL," LUPX LOY LPNGPZPWUGMSE, UGX USLH PG U OUSZCOPLIYK, "YBYKEHGY RGHCL WHAGM WEKPS'L KYIAMUMPHG.... OY OUL SHLM WHAGMHZ OPL WOPSXKYG, VAM MOPL IPYKKY CUL OPL ZUBHKPMY.""OHC OUGXLHTY MOY HSX TUG LMPSS CUL HGSE U EYUK UNH!" KYTUKRYX MOYWHAGMYLL. "P OUBY GYBYK LYYG U OUGXLHTYK TUG.""OY PL BYKE TAWO USMYKYX GHC," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU. "CYSS, UL P CULLUEPGN, IKPGWY BULPSP PL MOY GYDM OYPK MOKHANO OPL CPZY, VAM MOY WHAGMPL BYKE ZHGX HZ IPYKKY, SHHRYX UZMYK OPL YXAWUMPHG, UGX CKHMY MH MOYYTIYKHK UVHAM OPT; LH MOUM PG MOY WULY HZ OPL XYUMO--UGX OY PL LHPSS MOUM OY TUE XPY UM UGE THTYGM, UGX XK. SHKKUPG OUL WHTY ZKHTIYMYKLVAKN--GH HGY RGHCL COH CPSS PGOYKPM OPL PTTYGLY ZHKMAGY, IPYKKYHK IKPGWY BULPSP. ZHKME MOHALUGX LYKZL UGX TPSSPHGL HZ KAVSYL! P RGHCPM USS BYKE CYSS ZHK IKPGWY BULPSP MHSX TY OPTLYSZ. VYLPXYL, WEKPSBSUXPTPKHBPWO PL TE THMOYK'L LYWHGX WHALPG. OY'L USLH TE VHKE'LNHXZUMOYK," LOY UXXYX, UL PZ LOY UMMUWOYX GH PTIHKMUGWY UM USS MH MOYZUWM."IKPGWY BULPSP UKKPBYX PG THLWHC EYLMYKXUE. P OYUK OY OUL WHTY HG LHTYPGLIYWMPHG VALPGYLL," KYTUKRYX MOY BPLPMHK."EYL, VAM VYMCYYG HAKLYSBYL," LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL, "MOUM PL U IKYMYDM. MOYZUWM PL OY OUL WHTY MH LYY WHAGM WEKPS BSUXPTPKHBPWO, OYUKPGN OHC PSS OYPL.""VAM XH EHA RGHC, TE XYUK, MOUM CUL U WUIPMUS QHRY," LUPX MOY WHAGM; UGXLYYPGN MOUM MOY YSXYK BPLPMHK CUL GHM SPLMYGPGN, OY MAKGYX MH MOY EHAGNSUXPYL. "P WUG QALM PTUNPGY COUM U ZAGGE ZPNAKY MOUM IHSPWYTUG WAM!"UGX UL OY CUBYX OPL UKTL MH PTIYKLHGUMY MOY IHSPWYTUG, OPL IHKMSE ZHKTUNUPG LOHHR CPMO U XYYI KPGNPGN SUANO, MOY SUANO HZ HGY COH USCUEL YUMLCYSS UGX, PG IUKMPWASUK, XKPGRL CYSS. "LH XH WHTY UGX XPGY CPMO AL!" OYLUPX.WOUIMYK DPLPSYGWY YGLAYX. MOY WHAGMYLL SHHRYX UM OYK WUSSYKL, LTPSPGN UZZUVSE,VAM GHM WHGWYUSPGN MOY ZUWM MOUM LOY CHASX GHM VY XPLMKYLLYX PZ MOYE GHCKHLY UGX MHHR MOYPK SYUBY. MOY BPLPMHK'L XUANOMYK CUL USKYUXE LTHHMOPGNXHCG OYK XKYLL CPMO UG PGJAPKPGN SHHR UM OYK THMOYK, COYG LAXXYGSE ZKHTMOY GYDM KHHT CYKY OYUKX MOY ZHHMLMYIL HZ VHEL UGX NPKSL KAGGPGN MHMOY XHHK UGX MOY GHPLY HZ U WOUPK ZUSSPGN HBYK, UGX U NPKS HZ MOPKMYYG,OPXPGN LHTYMOPGN PG MOY ZHSXL HZ OYK LOHKM TALSPG ZKHWR, XUKMYX PG UGXLMHIIYX LOHKM PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM LOY OUXGHM PGMYGXYX OYK ZSPNOM MH VKPGN OYK LH ZUK. VYOPGX OYK PG MOY XHHKCUEUIIYUKYX U LMAXYGM CPMO U WKPTLHG WHUM WHSSUK, UG HZZPWYK HZ MOY NAUKXL,U NPKS HZ ZPZMYYG, UGX U ISATI KHLE-ZUWYX VHE PG U LOHKM QUWRYM.MOY WHAGM QATIYX AI UGX, LCUEPGN ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY, LIKYUX OPL UKTL CPXYUGX MOKYC MOYT KHAGX MOY SPMMSY NPKS COH OUX KAG PG."UO, OYKY LOY PL!" OY YDWSUPTYX SUANOPGN. "TE IYM, COHLY GUTY XUE PM PL.TE XYUK IYM!""TU WOYKY, MOYKY PL U MPTY ZHK YBYKEMOPGN," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL CPMOZYPNGYX LYBYKPME. "EHA LIHPS OYK, PSEU," LOY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH OYKOALVUGX."OHC XH EHA XH, TE XYUK? P CPLO EHA TUGE OUIIE KYMAKGL HZ EHAK GUTYXUE," LUPX MOY BPLPMHK. "COUM U WOUKTPGN WOPSX," LOY UXXYX, UXXKYLLPGNMOY THMOYK.MOPL VSUWR-YEYX, CPXY-THAMOYX NPKS, GHM IKYMME VAM ZASS HZ SPZY--CPMOWOPSXPLO VUKY LOHASXYKL COPWO UZMYK OYK KAG OYUBYX UGX LOHHR OYKVHXPWY, CPMO VSUWR WAKSL MHLLYX VUWRCUKX, MOPG VUKY UKTL, SPMMSY SYNLPG SUWY-ZKPSSYX XKUCYKL, UGX ZYYM PG SHC LSPIIYKL--CUL QALM UM MOUMWOUKTPGN UNY COYG U NPKS PL GH SHGNYK U WOPSX, MOHANO MOY WOPSX PL GHMEYM U EHAGN CHTUG. YLWUIPGN ZKHT OYK ZUMOYK LOY KUG MH OPXY OYKZSALOYX ZUWY PG MOY SUWY HZ OYK THMOYK'L TUGMPSSU--GHM IUEPGN MOY SYULMUMMYGMPHG MH OYK LYBYKY KYTUKR--UGX VYNUG MH SUANO. LOY SUANOYX, UGX PGZKUNTYGMUKE LYGMYGWYL MKPYX MH YDISUPG UVHAM U XHSS COPWO LOY IKHXAWYXZKHT MOY ZHSXL HZ OYK ZKHWR."XH EHA LYY?... TE XHSS... TPTP... EHA LYY..." CUL USS GUMULOU TUGUNYXMH AMMYK (MH OYK YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX ZAGGE). LOY SYUGYX UNUPGLM OYK THMOYKUGX VAKLM PGMH LAWO U SHAX, KPGNPGN ZPM HZ SUANOMYK MOUM YBYG MOY IKPTBPLPMHK WHASX GHM OYSI QHPGPGN PG."GHC MOYG, NH UCUE UGX MURY EHAK THGLMKHLPME CPMO EHA," LUPX MOY THMOYK,IALOPGN UCUE OYK XUANOMYK CPMO IKYMYGXYX LMYKGGYLL, UGX MAKGPGN MH MOYBPLPMHK LOY UXXYX: "LOY PL TE EHAGNYLM NPKS."GUMULOU, KUPLPGN OYK ZUWY ZHK U THTYGM ZKHT OYK THMOYK'L TUGMPSSU,NSUGWYX AI UM OYK MOKHANO MYUKL HZ SUANOMYK, UGX UNUPG OPX OYK ZUWY.MOY BPLPMHK, WHTIYSSYX MH SHHR HG UM MOPL ZUTPSE LWYGY, MOHANOM PMGYWYLLUKE MH MURY LHTY IUKM PG PM."MYSS TY, TE XYUK," LUPX LOY MH GUMULOU, "PL TPTP U KYSUMPHG HZ EHAKL? UXUANOMYK, P LAIIHLY?"GUMULOU XPX GHM SPRY MOY BPLPMHK'L MHGY HZ WHGXYLWYGLPHG MH WOPSXPLOMOPGNL. LOY XPX GHM KYISE, VAM SHHRYX UM OYK LYKPHALSE.TYUGCOPSY MOY EHAGNYK NYGYKUMPHG: VHKPL, MOY HZZPWYK, UGGU TPROUESHBGU'LLHG; GPWOHSUL, MOY AGXYKNKUXAUMY, MOY WHAGM'L YSXYLM LHG; LHGEU, MOYWHAGM'L ZPZMYYG-EYUK-HSX GPYWY, UGX SPMMSY IYMEU, OPL EHAGNYLM VHE,OUX USS LYMMSYX XHCG PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX CYKY HVBPHALSE MKEPGN MHKYLMKUPG CPMOPG MOY VHAGXL HZ XYWHKAT MOY YDWPMYTYGM UGX TPKMO MOUMLOHGY PG USS MOYPK ZUWYL. YBPXYGMSE PG MOY VUWR KHHTL, ZKHT COPWO MOYEOUX XULOYX HAM LH PTIYMAHALSE, MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG OUX VYYG THKY UTALPGNMOUG MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT MUSR HZ LHWPYME LWUGXUSL, MOY CYUMOYK, UGXWHAGMYLL UIKURLPGU. GHC UGX MOYG MOYE NSUGWYX UM HGY UGHMOYK, OUKXSEUVSY MH LAIIKYLL MOYPK SUANOMYK.MOY MCH EHAGN TYG, MOY LMAXYGM UGX MOY HZZPWYK, ZKPYGXL ZKHT WOPSXOHHX,CYKY HZ MOY LUTY UNY UGX VHMO OUGXLHTY ZYSSHCL, MOHANO GHM USPRY. VHKPLCUL MUSS UGX ZUPK, UGX OPL WUST UGX OUGXLHTY ZUWY OUX KYNASUK, XYSPWUMYZYUMAKYL. GPWOHSUL CUL LOHKM CPMO WAKSE OUPK UGX UG HIYG YDIKYLLPHG.XUKR OUPKL CYKY USKYUXE LOHCPGN HG OPL AIIYK SPI, UGX OPL COHSY ZUWYYDIKYLLYX PTIYMAHLPME UGX YGMOALPULT. GPWOHSUL VSALOYX COYG OY YGMYKYXMOY XKUCPGN KHHT. OY YBPXYGMSE MKPYX MH ZPGX LHTYMOPGN MH LUE, VAMZUPSYX. VHKPL HG MOY WHGMKUKE UM HGWY ZHAGX OPL ZHHMPGN, UGX KYSUMYXJAPYMSE UGX OATHKHALSE OHC OY OUX RGHCG MOUM XHSS TPTP COYG LOY CULLMPSS JAPMY U EHAGN SUXE, VYZHKY OYK GHLY CUL VKHRYG; OHC LOY OUX UNYXXAKPGN MOY ZPBY EYUKL OY OUX RGHCG OYK, UGX OHC OYK OYUX OUX WKUWRYXKPNOM UWKHLL MOY LRASS. OUBPGN LUPX MOPL OY NSUGWYX UM GUMULOU. LOYMAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OPT UGX NSUGWYX UM OYK EHAGNYK VKHMOYK, COH CULLWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL UGX LOURPGN CPMO LAIIKYLLYX SUANOMYK, UGX AGUVSYMH WHGMKHS OYKLYSZ UGE SHGNYK, LOY QATIYX AI UGX KALOYX ZKHT MOY KHHT ULZULM UL OYK GPTVSY SPMMSY ZYYM CHASX WUKKE OYK. VHKPL XPX GHM SUANO."EHA CYKY TYUGPGN MH NH HAM, CYKYG'M EHA, TUTTU? XH EHA CUGM MOYWUKKPUNY?" OY ULRYX OPL THMOYK CPMO U LTPSY."EYL, EYL, NH UGX MYSS MOYT MH NYM PM KYUXE," LOY UGLCYKYX, KYMAKGPGNOPL LTPSY.VHKPL JAPYMSE SYZM MOY KHHT UGX CYGM PG LYUKWO HZ GUMULOU. MOY ISATIVHE KUG UZMYK MOYT UGNKPSE, UL PZ BYDYX MOUM MOYPK IKHNKUT OUX VYYGXPLMAKVYX.WOUIMYK DPPMOY HGSE EHAGN IYHISY KYTUPGPGN PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, GHM WHAGMPGN MOYEHAGN SUXE BPLPMHK UGX MOY WHAGMYLL' YSXYLM XUANOMYK (COH CUL ZHAK EYUKLHSXYK MOUG OYK LPLMYK UGX VYOUBYX USKYUXE SPRY U NKHCG-AI IYKLHG), CYKYGPWOHSUL UGX LHGEU, MOY GPYWY. LHGEU CUL U LSYGXYK SPMMSY VKAGYMMY CPMOU MYGXYK SHHR PG OYK YEYL COPWO CYKY BYPSYX VE SHGN SULOYL, MOPWR VSUWRISUPML WHPSPGN MCPWY KHAGX OYK OYUX, UGX U MUCGE MPGM PG OYK WHTISYDPHGUGX YLIYWPUSSE PG MOY WHSHK HZ OYK LSYGXYK VAM NKUWYZAS UGX TALWASUKUKTL UGX GYWR. VE MOY NKUWY HZ OYK THBYTYGML, VE MOY LHZMGYLL UGXZSYDPVPSPME HZ OYK LTUSS SPTVL, UGX VE U WYKMUPG WHEGYLL UGX KYLYKBY HZTUGGYK, LOY KYTPGXYX HGY HZ U IKYMME, OUSZ-NKHCG RPMMYG COPWO IKHTPLYLMH VYWHTY U VYUAMPZAS SPMMSY WUM. LOY YBPXYGMSE WHGLPXYKYX PM IKHIYK MHLOHC UG PGMYKYLM PG MOY NYGYKUS WHGBYKLUMPHG VE LTPSPGN, VAM PG LIPMYHZ OYKLYSZ OYK YEYL AGXYK MOYPK MOPWR SHGN SULOYL CUMWOYX OYK WHALPG COHCUL NHPGN MH QHPG MOY UKTE, CPMO LAWO IULLPHGUMY NPKSPLO UXHKUMPHG MOUMOYK LTPSY WHASX GHM ZHK U LPGNSY PGLMUGM PTIHLY AIHG UGEHGY, UGX PMCUL WSYUK MOUM MOY RPMMYG OUX LYMMSYX XHCG HGSE MH LIKPGN AI CPMO THKYYGYKNE UGX UNUPG ISUE CPMO OYK WHALPG UL LHHG UL MOYE MHH WHASX, SPRYGUMULOU UGX VHKPL, YLWUIY ZKHT MOY XKUCPGN KHHT."UO EYL, TE XYUK," LUPX MOY WHAGM, UXXKYLLPGN MOY BPLPMHK UGX IHPGMPGNMH GPWOHSUL, "OPL ZKPYGX VHKPL OUL VYWHTY UG HZZPWYK, UGX LH ZHKZKPYGXLOPI'L LURY OY PL SYUBPGN MOY AGPBYKLPME UGX TY, OPL HSX ZUMOYK,UGX YGMYKPGN MOY TPSPMUKE LYKBPWY, TE XYUK. UGX MOYKY CUL U ISUWYUGX YBYKEMOPGN CUPMPGN ZHK OPT PG MOY UKWOPBYL XYIUKMTYGM! PLG'M MOUMZKPYGXLOPI?" KYTUKRYX MOY WHAGM PG UG PGJAPKPGN MHGY."VAM MOYE LUE MOUM CUK OUL VYYG XYWSUKYX," KYISPYX MOY BPLPMHK."MOYE'BY VYYG LUEPGN LH U SHGN COPSY," LUPX MOY WHAGM, "UGX MOYE'SS LUELH UNUPG UGX UNUPG, UGX MOUM CPSS VY MOY YGX HZ PM. TE XYUK, MOYKY'LZKPYGXLOPI ZHK EHA," OY KYIYUMYX. "OY'L QHPGPGN MOY OALLUKL."MOY BPLPMHK, GHM RGHCPGN COUM MH LUE, LOHHR OYK OYUX."PM'L GHM UM USS ZKHT ZKPYGXLOPI," XYWSUKYX GPWOHSUL, ZSUKPGN AI UGXMAKGPGN UCUE UL PZ ZKHT U LOUTYZAS ULIYKLPHG. "PM PL GHM ZKHT ZKPYGXLOPIUM USS; P LPTISE ZYYS MOUM MOY UKTE PL TE BHWUMPHG."OY NSUGWYX UM OPL WHALPG UGX MOY EHAGN SUXE BPLPMHK; UGX MOYE CYKY VHMOKYNUKXPGN OPT CPMO U LTPSY HZ UIIKHVUMPHG."LWOAVYKM, MOY WHSHGYS HZ MOY IUBSHNKUX OALLUKL, PL XPGPGN CPMO ALMHXUE. OY OUL VYYG OYKY HG SYUBY UGX PL MURPGN GPWOHSUL VUWR CPMOOPT. PM WUG'M VY OYSIYX!" LUPX MOY WHAGM, LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKL UGXLIYURPGN ISUEZASSE HZ U TUMMYK MOUM YBPXYGMSE XPLMKYLLYX OPT."P OUBY USKYUXE MHSX EHA, IUIU," LUPX OPL LHG, "MOUM PZ EHA XHG'M CPLOMH SYM TY NH, P'SS LMUE. VAM P RGHC P UT GH ALY UGECOYKY YDWYIM PG MOYUKTE; P UT GHM U XPISHTUM HK U NHBYKGTYGM WSYKR.--P XHG'M RGHC OHC MHOPXY COUM P ZYYS." UL OY LIHRY OY RYIM NSUGWPGN CPMO MOY ZSPKMUMPHALGYLLHZ U OUGXLHTY EHAMO UM LHGEU UGX MOY EHAGN SUXE BPLPMHK.MOY SPMMSY RPMMYG, ZYULMPGN OYK YEYL HG OPT, LYYTYX KYUXE UM UGE THTYGMMH LMUKM OYK NUTVHSL UNUPG UGX XPLISUE OYK RPMMYGPLO GUMAKY."USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM!" LUPX MOY HSX WHAGM. "OY USCUEL ZSUKYL AI! MOPLVAHGUIUKMY OUL MAKGYX USS MOYPK OYUXL; MOYE USS MOPGR HZ OHC OY KHLYZKHT UG YGLPNG UGX VYWUTY YTIYKHK. CYSS, CYSS, NHX NKUGM PM," OY UXXYX,GHM GHMPWPGN OPL BPLPMHK'L LUKWULMPW LTPSY.MOY YSXYKL VYNUG MUSRPGN UVHAM VHGUIUKMY. QASPY RUKUNPGU MAKGYX MH EHAGNKHLMHB."COUM U IPME EHA CYKYG'M UM MOY UKROUKHBL' HG MOAKLXUE. PM CUL LH XASSCPMOHAM EHA," LUPX LOY, NPBPGN OPT U MYGXYK LTPSY.MOY EHAGN TUG, ZSUMMYKYX, LUM XHCG GYUKYK MH OYK CPMO U WHJAYMMPLOLTPSY, UGX YGNUNYX MOY LTPSPGN QASPY PG U WHGZPXYGMPUS WHGBYKLUMPHGCPMOHAM UM USS GHMPWPGN MOUM OPL PGBHSAGMUKE LTPSY OUX LMUVVYX MOY OYUKMHZ LHGEU, COH VSALOYX UGX LTPSYX AGGUMAKUSSE. PG MOY TPXLM HZ OPL MUSROY NSUGWYX KHAGX UM OYK. LOY NUBY OPT U IULLPHGUMYSE UGNKE NSUGWY, UGXOUKXSE UVSY MH KYLMKUPG OYK MYUKL UGX TUPGMUPG MOY UKMPZPWPUS LTPSYHG OYK SPIL, LOY NHM AI UGX SYZM MOY KHHT. USS GPWOHSUL' UGPTUMPHGBUGPLOYX. OY CUPMYX ZHK MOY ZPKLM IUALY PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, UGX MOYGCPMO U XPLMKYLLYX ZUWY SYZM MOY KHHT MH ZPGX LHGEU."OHC ISUPGSE USS MOYLY EHAGN IYHISY CYUK MOYPK OYUKML HG MOYPKLSYYBYL!" LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, IHPGMPGN MH GPWOHSUL UL OY CYGM HAM."WHALPGUNY--XUGNYKYAD BHPLPGUNY;" * LOY UXXYX.     * WHALPGOHHX PL U XUGNYKHAL GYPNOVHKOHHX."EYL," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL COYG MOY VKPNOMGYLL MOYLY EHAGN IYHISY OUXVKHANOM PGMH MOY KHHT OUX BUGPLOYX; UGX UL PZ UGLCYKPGN U JAYLMPHG GHHGY OUX IAM VAM COPWO CUL USCUEL PG OYK TPGX, "UGX OHC TAWO LAZZYKPGN,OHC TAWO UGDPYME HGY OUL OUX MH NH MOKHANO MOUM CY TPNOM KYQHPWY PGMOYT GHC! UGX EYM KYUSSE MOY UGDPYME PL NKYUMYK GHC MOUG MOY QHE. HGY PLUSCUEL, USCUEL UGDPHAL! YLIYWPUSSE QALM UM MOPL UNY, LH XUGNYKHAL VHMOZHK NPKSL UGX VHEL.""PM USS XYIYGXL HG MOY VKPGNPGN AI," KYTUKRYX MOY BPLPMHK."EYL, EHA'KY JAPMY KPNOM," WHGMPGAYX MOY WHAGMYLL. "MPSS GHC P OUBYUSCUEL, MOUGR NHX, VYYG TE WOPSXKYG'L ZKPYGX UGX OUX MOYPK ZASSWHGZPXYGWY," LUPX LOY, KYIYUMPGN MOY TPLMURY HZ LH TUGE IUKYGML COHPTUNPGY MOUM MOYPK WOPSXKYG OUBY GH LYWKYML ZKHT MOYT. "P RGHC P LOUSSUSCUEL VY TE XUANOMYKL' ZPKLM WHGZPXUGMY, UGX MOUM PZ GPWOHSUL, CPMO OPLPTIASLPBY GUMAKY, XHYL NYM PGMH TPLWOPYZ (U VHE WUG'M OYSI PM), OY CPSSUSS MOY LUTY GYBYK VY SPRY MOHLY IYMYKLVAKN EHAGN TYG.""EYL, MOYE UKY LISYGXPX, LISYGXPX EHAGNLMYKL," WOPTYX PG MOY WHAGM, COHUSCUEL LHSBYX JAYLMPHGL MOUM LYYTYX MH OPT IYKISYDPGN VE XYWPXPGN MOUMYBYKEMOPGN CUL LISYGXPX. "QALM ZUGWE: CUGML MH VY UG OALLUK. COUM'L HGYMH XH, TE XYUK?""COUM U WOUKTPGN WKYUMAKY EHAK EHAGNYK NPKS PL," LUPX MOY BPLPMHK; "USPMMSY BHSWUGH!""EYL, U KYNASUK BHSWUGH," LUPX MOY WHAGM. "MURYL UZMYK TY! UGX COUM UBHPWY LOY OUL; MOHANO LOY'L TE XUANOMYK, P MYSS MOY MKAMO COYG P LUELOY'SS VY U LPGNYK, U LYWHGX LUSHTHGP! CY OUBY YGNUNYX UG PMUSPUG MHNPBY OYK SYLLHGL.""PLG'M LOY MHH EHAGN? P OUBY OYUKX MOUM PM OUKTL MOY BHPWY MH MKUPG PMUM MOUM UNY.""HO GH, GHM UM USS MHH EHAGN!" KYISPYX MOY WHAGM. "COE, HAK THMOYKL ALYXMH VY TUKKPYX UM MCYSBY HK MOPKMYYG.""UGX LOY'L PG SHBY CPMO VHKPL USKYUXE. QALM ZUGWE!" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLLCPMO U NYGMSY LTPSY, SHHRPGN UM VHKPL' UGX CYGM HG, YBPXYGMSE WHGWYKGYXCPMO U MOHANOM MOUM USCUEL HWWAIPYX OYK: "GHC EHA LYY PZ P CYKY MH VYLYBYKY CPMO OYK UGX MH ZHKVPX PM... NHHXGYLL RGHCL COUM MOYE TPNOM VY AIMH HG MOY LSE" (LOY TYUGM MOUM MOYE CHASX VY RPLLPGN), "VAM UL PM PL,P RGHC YBYKE CHKX LOY AMMYKL. LOY CPSS WHTY KAGGPGN MH TY HZ OYK HCGUWWHKX PG MOY YBYGPGN UGX MYSS TY YBYKEMOPGN. IYKOUIL P LIHPS OYK, VAMKYUSSE MOUM LYYTL MOY VYLM ISUG. CPMO OYK YSXYK LPLMYK P CUL LMKPWMYK.""EYL, P CUL VKHANOM AI JAPMY XPZZYKYGMSE," KYTUKRYX MOY OUGXLHTY YSXYKXUANOMYK, WHAGMYLL BYKU, CPMO U LTPSY.VAM MOY LTPSY XPX GHM YGOUGWY BYKU'L VYUAME UL LTPSYL NYGYKUSSE XH;HG MOY WHGMKUKE PM NUBY OYK UG AGGUMAKUS, UGX MOYKYZHKY AGISYULUGM,YDIKYLLPHG. BYKU CUL NHHX-SHHRPGN, GHM UM USS LMAIPX, JAPWR UM SYUKGPGN,CUL CYSS VKHANOM AI, UGX OUX U ISYULUGM BHPWY; COUM LOY LUPX CULMKAY UGX UIIKHIKPUMY, EYM, LMKUGNY MH LUE, YBYKEHGY--MOY BPLPMHKL UGXWHAGMYLL USPRY--MAKGYX MH SHHR UM OYK UL PZ CHGXYKPGN COE LOY OUX LUPXPM, UGX MOYE USS ZYSM UCRCUKX."IYHISY UKY USCUEL MHH WSYBYK CPMO MOYPK YSXYLM WOPSXKYG UGX MKE MH TURYLHTYMOPGN YDWYIMPHGUS HZ MOYT," LUPX MOY BPLPMHK."COUM'L MOY NHHX HZ XYGEPGN PM, TE XYUK? HAK XYUK WHAGMYLL CUL MHHWSYBYK CPMO BYKU," LUPX MOY WHAGM. "CYSS, COUM HZ MOUM? LOY'L MAKGYX HAMLISYGXPXSE USS MOY LUTY," OY UXXYX, CPGRPGN UM BYKU.MOY NAYLML NHM AI UGX MHHR MOYPK SYUBY, IKHTPLPGN MH KYMAKG MH XPGGYK."COUM TUGGYKL! P MOHANOM MOYE CHASX GYBYK NH," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, COYGLOY OUX LYYG OYK NAYLML HAM.WOUIMYK DPPPCOYG GUMULOU KUG HAM HZ MOY XKUCPGN KHHT LOY HGSE CYGM UL ZUK UL MOYWHGLYKBUMHKE. MOYKY LOY IUALYX UGX LMHHX SPLMYGPGN MH MOY WHGBYKLUMPHGPG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, CUPMPGN ZHK VHKPL MH WHTY HAM. LOY CUL USKYUXENKHCPGN PTIUMPYGM, UGX LMUTIYX OYK ZHHM, KYUXE MH WKE UM OPL GHM WHTPGNUM HGWY, COYG LOY OYUKX MOY EHAGN TUG'L XPLWKYYM LMYIL UIIKHUWOPGNGYPMOYK JAPWRSE GHK LSHCSE. UM MOPL GUMULOU XULOYX LCPZMSE UTHGN MOYZSHCYK MAVL UGX OPX MOYKY.VHKPL IUALYX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT, SHHRYX KHAGX, VKALOYX U SPMMSYXALM ZKHT MOY LSYYBY HZ OPL AGPZHKT, UGX NHPGN AI MH U TPKKHK YDUTPGYXOPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY. GUMULOU, BYKE LMPSS, IYYKYX HAM ZKHT OYK UTVALO,CUPMPGN MH LYY COUM OY CHASX XH. OY LMHHX U SPMMSY COPSY VYZHKY MOYNSULL, LTPSYX, UGX CUSRYX MHCUKX MOY HMOYK XHHK. GUMULOU CUL UVHAMMH WUSS OPT VAM WOUGNYX OYK TPGX. "SYM OPT SHHR ZHK TY," MOHANOM LOY.OUKXSE OUX VHKPL NHGY MOUG LHGEU, ZSALOYX, PG MYUKL, UGX TAMMYKPGNUGNKPSE, WUTY PG UM MOY HMOYK XHHK. GUMULOU WOYWRYX OYK ZPKLM PTIASLY MHKAG HAM MH OYK, UGX KYTUPGYX PG OYK OPXPGN ISUWY, CUMWOPGN--UL AGXYK UGPGBPLPVSY WUI--MH LYY COUM CYGM HG PG MOY CHKSX. LOY CUL YDIYKPYGWPGNU GYC UGX IYWASPUK ISYULAKY. LHGEU, TAMMYKPGN MH OYKLYSZ, RYIM SHHRPGNKHAGX MHCUKX MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT XHHK. PM HIYGYX UGX GPWOHSUL WUTY PG."LHGEU, COUM PL MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA? "MPSS XYUMO PMLYSZ?"LOY MHHR OPL UKT UGX CPMO U OUIIE ZUWY CYGM CPMO OPT PGMH MOY UXQHPGPGNLPMMPGN KHHT.WOUIMYK DPBUZMYK KYWYPBPGN OYK BPLPMHKL, MOY WHAGMYLL CUL LH MPKYX MOUM LOY NUBYHKXYKL MH UXTPM GH THKY, VAM MOY IHKMYK CUL MHSX MH VY LAKY MH PGBPMYMH XPGGYK USS COH WUTY "MH WHGNKUMASUMY." "VAM P OUBY IKHTPLYX UGX CPSS XH PM ZHK EHAKLURY."USMOHANO MOY OUSS IHKMYK LUC LHTYHGY'L WUKKPUNY LMUGXPGN UM MOYYGMKUGWY, UZMYK LWKAMPGPFPGN MOY THMOYK UGX LHG (COH CPMOHAM ULRPGN MHVY UGGHAGWYX OUX IULLYX LMKUPNOM MOKHANO MOY NSULL IHKWO VYMCYYG MOYKHCL HZ LMUMAYL PG GPWOYL) UGX SHHRPGN LPNGPZPWUGMSE UM MOY SUXE'L HSXWSHUR, OY ULRYX COYMOYK MOYE CUGMYX MOY WHAGM HK MOY IKPGWYLLYL, UGX,OYUKPGN MOUM MOYE CPLOYX MH LYY MOY WHAGM, LUPX OPL YDWYSSYGWE CUL CHKLYMHXUE, UGX MOUM OPL YDWYSSYGWE CUL GHM KYWYPBPGN UGEHGY."CY TUE UL CYSS NH VUWR," LUPX MOY LHG PG ZKYGWO."TE XYUK!" YDWSUPTYX OPL THMOYK PTISHKPGNSE, UNUPG SUEPGN OYK OUGX HGOPL UKT UL PZ MOUM MHAWO TPNOM LHHMOY HK KHALY OPT.VHKPL LUPX GH THKY, VAM SHHRYX PGJAPKPGNSE UM OPL THMOYK CPMOHAM MURPGNHZZ OPL WSHUR."TE ZKPYGX," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU PG NYGMSY MHGYL, UXXKYLLPGN MOY OUSSIHKMYK, "P RGHC WHAGM WEKPS BSUXPTPKHBPWO PL BYKE PSS... MOUM'L COE POUBY WHTY... P UT U KYSUMPHG. P LOUSS GHM XPLMAKV OPT, TE ZKPYGX... PHGSE GYYX LYY IKPGWY BULPSP LYKNYYBPWO: OY PL LMUEPGN OYKY, PL OY GHM?ISYULY UGGHAGWY TY."MOY OUSS IHKMYK LASSYGSE IASSYX U VYSS MOUM KUGN AILMUPKL, UGX MAKGYXUCUE."IKPGWYLL XKAVYMLRUEU MH LYY IKPGWY BULPSP LYKNYYBPWO," OY WUSSYX MH UZHHMTUG XKYLLYX PG RGYY VKYYWOYL, LOHYL, UGX U LCUSSHC-MUPS WHUM, COHKUG XHCGLMUPKL UGX SHHRYX HBYK ZKHT MOY OUSZCUE SUGXPGN.MOY THMOYK LTHHMOYX MOY ZHSXL HZ OYK XEYX LPSR XKYLL VYZHKY U SUKNYBYGYMPUG TPKKHK PG MOY CUSS, UGX PG OYK MKHXXYG-XHCG LOHYL VKPLRSEULWYGXYX MOY WUKIYMYX LMUPKL."TE XYUK," LOY LUPX MH OYK LHG, HGWY THKY LMPTASUMPGN OPT VE U MHAWO,"EHA IKHTPLYX TY!"MOY LHG, SHCYKPGN OPL YEYL, ZHSSHCYX OYK JAPYMSE.MOYE YGMYKYX MOY SUKNY OUSS, ZKHT COPWO HGY HZ MOY XHHKL SYX MH MOYUIUKMTYGML ULLPNGYX MH IKPGWY BULPSP.QALM UL MOY THMOYK UGX LHG, OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY OUSS, CYKYUVHAM MH ULR MOYPK CUE HZ UG YSXYKSE ZHHMTUG COH OUX LIKAGN AI UL MOYEYGMYKYX, MOY VKHGFY OUGXSY HZ HGY HZ MOY XHHKL MAKGYX UGX IKPGWY BULPSPWUTY HAM--CYUKPGN U BYSBYM WHUM CPMO U LPGNSY LMUK HG OPL VKYULM, ULCUL OPL WALMHT COYG UM OHTY--MURPGN SYUBY HZ U NHHX-SHHRPGN, XUKR-OUPKYXTUG. MOPL CUL MOY WYSYVKUMYX IYMYKLVAKN XHWMHK, SHKKUPG."MOYG PM PL WYKMUPG?" LUPX MOY IKPGWY."IKPGWY, OATUGAT YLM YKKUKY, * VAM..." KYISPYX MOY XHWMHK, LCUSSHCPGNOPL K'L, UGX IKHGHAGWPGN MOY SUMPG CHKXL CPMO U ZKYGWO UWWYGM.     * MH YKK PL OATUG."BYKE CYSS, BYKE CYSS..."LYYPGN UGGU TPROUESHBGU UGX OYK LHG, IKPGWY BULPSP XPLTPLLYX MOY XHWMHKCPMO U VHC UGX UIIKHUWOYX MOYT LPSYGMSE UGX CPMO U SHHR HZ PGJAPKE. MOYLHG GHMPWYX MOUM UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ IKHZHAGX LHKKHC LAXXYGSE WSHAXYX OPLTHMOYK'L ZUWY, UGX OY LTPSYX LSPNOMSE."UO, IKPGWY! PG COUM LUX WPKWATLMUGWYL CY TYYM UNUPG! UGX OHC PL HAKXYUK PGBUSPX?" LUPX LOY, UL MOHANO AGUCUKY HZ MOY WHSX HZZYGLPBY SHHRZPDYX HG OYK.IKPGWY BULPSP LMUKYX UM OYK UGX UM VHKPL JAYLMPHGPGNSE UGX IYKISYDYX.VHKPL VHCYX IHSPMYSE. IKPGWY BULPSP CPMOHAM UWRGHCSYXNPGN MOY VHC MAKGYXMH UGGU TPROUESHBGU, UGLCYKPGN OYK JAYKE VE U THBYTYGM HZ MOY OYUX UGXSPIL PGXPWUMPGN BYKE SPMMSY OHIY ZHK MOY IUMPYGM."PL PM IHLLPVSY?" "OYCUGMYX MH MOUGR EHA OPTLYSZ."VHKPL VHCYX UNUPG IHSPMYSE."VYSPYBY TY, IKPGWY, U THMOYK'L OYUKM CPSS GYBYK ZHKNYM COUM EHA OUBYXHGY ZHK AL.""P UT NSUX P CUL UVSY MH XH EHA U LYKBPWY, TE XYUK UGGU TPROUESHBGU,"LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP, UKKUGNPGN OPL SUWY ZKPSS, UGX PG MHGY UGX TUGGYK,OYKY PG THLWHC MH UGGU TPROUESHBGU COHT OY OUX ISUWYX AGXYK UGHVSPNUMPHG, ULLATPGN UG UPK HZ TAWO NKYUMYK PTIHKMUGWY MOUG OY OUX XHGYPG IYMYKLVAKN UM UGGU LWOYKYK'L KYWYIMPHG."MKE MH LYKBY CYSS UGX LOHC EHAKLYSZ CHKMOE," UXXYX OY, UXXKYLLPGN VHKPLCPMO LYBYKPME. "P UT NSUX.... UKY EHA OYKY HG SYUBY?" OY CYGM HG PG OPLALAUS MHGY HZ PGXPZZYKYGWY."P UT UCUPMPGN HKXYKL MH QHPG TE GYC KYNPTYGM, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," KYISPYXVHKPL, VYMKUEPGN GYPMOYK UGGHEUGWY UM MOY IKPGWY'L VKALJAY TUGGYK GHKU XYLPKY MH YGMYK PGMH WHGBYKLUMPHG, VAM LIYURPGN LH JAPYMSE UGXKYLIYWMZASSE MOUM MOY IKPGWY NUBY OPT U LYUKWOPGN NSUGWY."UKY EHA SPBPGN CPMO EHAK THMOYK?""P UT SPBPGN UM WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU'L," KYISPYX VHKPL, UNUPG UXXPGN, "EHAKYDWYSSYGWE.""MOUM PL, CPMO PSEU KHLMHB COH TUKKPYX GUMUSE LOPGLOPGU," LUPX UGGUTPROUESHBGU."P RGHC, P RGHC," UGLCYKYX IKPGWY BULPSP PG OPL THGHMHGHAL BHPWY."P GYBYK WHASX AGXYKLMUGX OHC GUMUSE TUXY AI OYK TPGX MH TUKKE MOUMAGSPWRYX VYUK! U IYKZYWMSE UVLAKX UGX LMAIPX ZYSSHC, UGX U NUTVSYK MHH,P UT MHSX.""VAM U BYKE RPGX TUG, IKPGWY," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU CPMO U IUMOYMPWLTPSY, UL MOHANO LOY MHH RGYC MOUM WHAGM KHLMHB XYLYKBYX MOPL WYGLAKY,VAM ULRYX OPT GHM MH VY MHH OUKX HG MOY IHHK HSX TUG. OY PL OPL NHXLHG," LOY UXXYX, OYK MHGY LANNYLMPGN MOUM MOPL ZUWMHANOM MH NPBY IKPGWY BULPSP TAWO LUMPLZUWMPHG.IKPGWY BULPSP VYWUTY MOHANOMZAS UGX ZKHCGYX. VAM EHA LYY OY OUL GH HGY CPMO OPTYDWYIM MOY EHAGN IKPGWYLLYL.... MOYE UKY LMPSS EHAGN...." LOY VYGMOYK OYUX UGX WHGMPGAYX PG U COPLIYK: "OUL OY IYKZHKTYX OPL ZPGUS XAME,IKPGWY? PUT ALYX MH LAZZYKPGN."YBPXYGMSE MOY IKPGWY AGXYKLMHHX OYK, UGX USLH AGXYKLMHHX, UL OY OUXXHGY UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L, MOUM PM CHASX VY XPZZPWASM MH NYM KPX HZ UGGUTPROUESHBGU."CHASX GHM LAWO U TYYMPGN VY MHH MKEPGN ZHK OPT, XYUK UGGU TPROUESHBGU?"LUPX OY. UO, PM PL UCZAS: MOY XAMPYL HZ UWOKPLMPUG..."U XHHK HZ HGY HZ MOY PGGYK KHHTL HIYGYX UGX HGY HZ MOY IKPGWYLLYL, MOYWHAGM'L GPYWY, YGMYKYX CPMO U WHSX, LMYKG ZUWY. LUPX MOYIKPGWYLL, SHHRPGN UM UGGU TPROUESHBGU UL UM U LMKUGNYK."UO, TE XYUK, P OUKXSE RGYC EHA," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU CPMO U OUIIELTPSY, UTVSPGN SPNOMSE AI MH MOY WHAGM'L GPYWY. "P OUBY WHTY, UGX UT UMEHAK LYKBPWY MH OYSI EHA GAKLY TE AGWSY. P PTUNPGY COUM EHA OUBY NHGYMOKHANO," UGX LOY LETIUMOYMPWUSSE MAKGYX AI OYK YEYL.MOY IKPGWYLL NUBY GH KYISE UGX XPX GHM YBYG LTPSY, VAM SYZM MOY KHHT ULUGGU TPROUESHBGU MHHR HZZ OYK NSHBYL UGX, HWWAIEPGN MOY IHLPMPHG LOY OUXWHGJAYKYX, LYMMSYX XHCG PG UG UKTWOUPK, PGBPMPGN IKPGWY BULPSP MH MURY ULYUM VYLPXY OYK."VHKPL," LOY LUPX MH OYK LHG CPMO U LTPSY, "P LOUSS NH PG MH LYY MOYWHAGM, TE AGWSY; VAM EHA, TE XYUK, OUX VYMMYK NH MH IPYKKY TYUGCOPSYUGX XHG'M ZHKNYM MH NPBY OPT MOY KHLMHBL' PGBPMUMPHG. LOY WHGMPGAYX, MAKGPGN MH MOY IKPGWY."HG MOY WHGMKUKE," KYISPYX MOY IKPGWY, COH OUX ISUPGSE VYWHTY XYIKYLLYX,"P LOUSS VY HGSE MHH NSUX PZ EHA KYSPYBY TY HZ MOUM EHAGN TUG.... OYKYOY PL, UGX MOY WHAGM OUL GHM HGWY ULRYX ZHK OPT."OY LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL. U ZHHMTUG WHGXAWMYX VHKPL XHCG HGY ZSPNOM HZLMUPKL UGX AI UGHMOYK, MH IPYKKY'L KHHTL.WOUIMYK DBPIPYKKY, UZMYK USS, OUX GHM TUGUNYX MH WOHHLY U WUKYYK ZHK OPTLYSZ PGIYMYKLVAKN, UGX OUX VYYG YDIYSSYX ZKHT MOYKY ZHK KPHMHAL WHGXAWM UGXLYGM MH THLWHC. MOY LMHKE MHSX UVHAM OPT UM WHAGM KHLMHB'L CUL MKAY.IPYKKY OUX MURYG IUKM PG MEPGN U IHSPWYTUG MH U VYUK. OY OUX GHC VYYGZHK LHTY XUEL PG THLWHC UGX CUL LMUEPGN UL ALAUS UM OPL ZUMOYK'L OHALY.MOHANO OY YDIYWMYX MOUM MOY LMHKE HZ OPL YLWUIUXY CHASX VY USKYUXE RGHCGPG THLWHC UGX MOUM MOY SUXPYL UVHAM OPL ZUMOYK--COH CYKY GYBYK ZUBHKUVSEXPLIHLYX MHCUKX OPT--CHASX OUBY ALYX PM MH MAKG MOY WHAGM UNUPGLM OPT,OY GYBYKMOYSYLL HG MOY XUE HZ OPL UKKPBUS CYGM MH OPL ZUMOYK'L IUKM HZMOY OHALY. YGMYKPGN MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, COYKY MOY IKPGWYLLYL LIYGM THLMHZ MOYPK MPTY, OY NKYYMYX MOY SUXPYL, MCH HZ COHT CYKY LPMMPGN UMYTVKHPXYKE ZKUTYL COPSY U MOPKX KYUX USHAX. PM CUL MOY YSXYLM COH CULKYUXPGN--MOY HGY COH OUX TYM UGGU TPROUESHBGU. MOY MCH EHAGNYK HGYL CYKYYTVKHPXYKPGN: VHMO CYKY KHLE UGX IKYMME UGX MOYE XPZZYKYX HGSE PG MOUMHGY OUX U SPMMSY THSY HG OYK SPI COPWO TUXY OYK TAWO IKYMMPYK. IPYKKYCUL KYWYPBYX UL PZ OY CYKY U WHKILY HK U SYIYK. MOY YSXYLM IKPGWYLLIUALYX PG OYK KYUXPGN UGX LPSYGMSE LMUKYX UM OPT CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL;MOY LYWHGX ULLATYX IKYWPLYSE MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG; COPSY MOY EHAGNYLM,MOY HGY CPMO MOY THSY, COH CUL HZ U WOYYKZAS UGX SPBYSE XPLIHLPMPHG,VYGM HBYK OYK ZKUTY MH OPXY U LTPSY IKHVUVSE YBHRYX VE MOY UTALPGN LWYGYLOY ZHKYLUC. LOY XKYC OYK CHHS XHCG MOKHANO MOY WUGBUL UGX, LWUKWYSEUVSY MH KYZKUPG ZKHT SUANOPGN, LMHHIYX UL PZ MKEPGN MH TURY HAM MOYIUMMYKG."OHC XH EHA XH, WHALPG?" LUPX IPYKKY. "EHA XHG'M KYWHNGPFY TY?""P KYWHNGPFY EHA HGSE MHH CYSS, MHH CYSS.""OHC PL MOY WHAGM? WUG P LYY OPT?" ULRYX IPYKKY, UCRCUKXSE UL ALAUS, VAMAGUVULOYX."MOY WHAGM PL LAZZYKPGN IOELPWUSSE UGX TYGMUSSE, UGX UIIUKYGMSE EHA OUBYXHGY EHAK VYLM MH PGWKYULY OPL TYGMUS LAZZYKPGNL.""WUG P LYY MOY WHAGM?" IPYKKY UNUPG ULRYX."OT.... PZ EHA CPLO MH RPSS OPT, MH RPSS OPT HAMKPNOM, EHA WUG LYYOPT... HSNU, NH UGX LYY COYMOYK AGWSY'L VYYZ MYU PL KYUXE--PM PL USTHLMMPTY," LOY UXXYX, NPBPGN IPYKKY MH AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOYE CYKY VALE, UGXVALE TURPGN OPL ZUMOYK WHTZHKMUVSY, COPSY YBPXYGMSE OY, IPYKKY, CUL HGSEVALE WUALPGN OPT UGGHEUGWY.HSNU CYGM HAM. IPYKKY LMHHX SHHRPGN UM MOY LPLMYKL; MOYG OY VHCYX UGXLUPX: "MOYG P CPSS NH MH TE KHHTL. EHA CPSS SYM TY RGHC COYG P WUG LYYOPT."UGX OY SYZM MOY KHHT, ZHSSHCYX VE MOY SHC VAM KPGNPGN SUANOMYK HZ MOYLPLMYK CPMO MOY THSY.GYDM XUE IKPGWY BULPSP OUX UKKPBYX UGX LYMMSYX PG MOY WHAGM'L OHALY. OYLYGM ZHK IPYKKY UGX LUPX MH OPT: "TE XYUK ZYSSHC, PZ EHA UKY NHPGN MHVYOUBY OYKY UL EHA XPX PG IYMYKLVAKN, EHA CPSS YGX BYKE VUXSE; MOUM PLUSS P OUBY MH LUE MH EHA. MOY WHAGM PL BYKE, BYKE PSS, UGX EHA TALM GHMLYY OPT UM USS."LPGWY MOYG IPYKKY OUX GHM VYYG XPLMAKVYX UGX OUX LIYGM MOY COHSY MPTY PGOPL KHHTL AILMUPKL.COYG VHKPL UIIYUKYX UM OPL XHHK IPYKKY CUL IUWPGN AI UGX XHCG OPL KHHT,LMHIIPGN HWWULPHGUSSE UM U WHKGYK MH TURY TYGUWPGN NYLMAKYL UM MOY CUSS,UL PZ KAGGPGN U LCHKX MOKHANO UG PGBPLPVSY ZHY, UGX NSUKPGN LUBUNYSEHBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL, UGX MOYG UNUPG KYLATPGN OPL CUSR, TAMMYKPGNPGXPLMPGWM CHKXL, LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKL UGX NYLMPWASUMPGN."YGNSUGX PL XHGY ZHK," LUPX OY, LWHCSPGN UGX IHPGMPGN OPL ZPGNYK UMLHTYHGY AGLYYG. "TK. IPMM, UL U MKUPMHK MH MOY GUMPHG UGX MH MOY KPNOMLHZ TUG, PL LYGMYGWYX MH..." VAM VYZHKY IPYKKY--COH UM MOUM THTYGMPTUNPGYX OPTLYSZ MH VY GUIHSYHG PG IYKLHG UGX MH OUBY QALM YZZYWMYX MOYXUGNYKHAL WKHLLPGN HZ MOY LMKUPML HZ XHBYK UGX WUIMAKYX SHGXHG--WHASXIKHGHAGWY IPMM'L LYGMYGWY, OY LUC U CYSS-VAPSM UGX OUGXLHTY EHAGNHZZPWYK YGMYKPGN OPL KHHT. IPYKKY IUALYX. OY OUX SYZM THLWHC COYG VHKPLCUL U VHE HZ ZHAKMYYG, UGX OUX JAPMY ZHKNHMMYG OPT, VAM PG OPL ALAUSPTIASLPBY UGX OYUKME CUE OY MHHR VHKPL VE MOY OUGX CPMO U ZKPYGXSELTPSY."XH EHA KYTYTVYK TY?" IYHISY UKY USCUEL XPLMAKVPGN OPT," UGLCYKYXIPYKKY, MKEPGN MH KYTYTVYK COH MOPL EHAGN TUG CUL.VHKPL ZYSM MOUM IPYKKY XPX GHM KYWHNGPFY OPT VAM XPX GHM WHGLPXYK PMGYWYLLUKE MH PGMKHXAWY OPTLYSZ, UGX CPMOHAM YDIYKPYGWPGN MOY SYULMYTVUKKULLTYGM SHHRYX IPYKKY LMKUPNOM PG MOY ZUWY."WHAGM KHLMHB ULRL EHA MH WHTY MH XPGGYK MHXUE," LUPX OY, UZMYK UWHGLPXYKUVSY IUALY COPWO TUXY IPYKKY ZYYS AGWHTZHKMUVSY."UO, WHAGM KHLMHB!" PZ HGSE BPSSYGYABYXHYLG'M TURY U TYLL HZ MOPGNL!"VHKPL RGYC GHMOPGN UVHAM MOY VHASHNGY YDIYXPMPHG; OY XPX GHM KYUX MOYIUIYKL UGX PM CUL MOY ZPKLM MPTY OY OUX OYUKX BPSSYGYABY'L GUTY."CY OYKY PG THLWHC UKY THKY HWWAIPYX CPMO XPGGYK IUKMPYL UGX LWUGXUSMOUG CPMO IHSPMPWL," LUPX OY PG OPL JAPYM PKHGPWUS MHGY. "P RGHC GHMOPGNUVHAM PM UGX OUBY GHM MOHANOM UVHAM PM. THLWHC PL WOPYZSE VALE CPMONHLLPI," OY WHGMPGAYX. "QALM GHC MOYE UKY MUSRPGN UVHAM EHA UGX EHAKZUMOYK."IPYKKY LTPSYX PG OPL NHHX-GUMAKYX CUE UL PZ UZKUPX ZHK OPL WHTIUGPHG'LLURY MOUM MOY SUMMYK TPNOM LUE LHTYMOPGN OY CHASX UZMYKCUKXL KYNKYM.VAM VHKPL LIHRY XPLMPGWMSE, WSYUKSE, UGX XKESE, SHHRPGN LMKUPNOM PGMHIPYKKY'L YEYL."THLWHC OUL GHMOPGN YSLY MH XH VAM NHLLPI," VHKPL CYGM HG. "YBYKEVHXEPL CHGXYKPGN MH COHT MOY WHAGM CPSS SYUBY OPL ZHKMAGY, MOHANO OY TUEIYKOUIL HAMSPBY AL USS, UL P LPGWYKYSE OHIY OY CPSS...""EYL, PM PL USS BYKE OHKKPX," PGMYKKAIMYX IPYKKY, "BYKE OHKKPX."IPYKKY CUL LMPSS UZKUPX MOUM MOPL HZZPWYK TPNOM PGUXBYKMYGMSE LUELHTYMOPGN XPLWHGWYKMPGN MH OPTLYSZ."UGX PM TALM LYYT MH EHA," LUPX VHKPL ZSALOPGN LSPNOMSE, VAM GHMWOUGNPGN OPL MHGY HK UMMPMAXY, "PM TALM LYYT MH EHA MOUM YBYKEHGY PLMKEPGN MH NYM LHTYMOPGN HAM HZ MOY KPWO TUG?""LH PM XHYL," MOHANOM IPYKKY."VAM P QALM CPLO MH LUE, MH UBHPX TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL, MOUM EHA UKY JAPMYTPLMURYG PZ EHA KYWRHG TY HK TE THMOYK UTHGN LAWO IYHISY. CY UKY BYKEIHHK, VAM ZHK TE HCG IUKM UM UGE KUMY, ZHK MOY BYKE KYULHG MOUM EHAKZUMOYK PL KPWO, P XHG'M KYNUKX TELYSZ UL U KYSUMPHG HZ OPL, UGX GYPMOYKP GHK TE THMOYK CHASX YBYK ULR HK MURY UGEMOPGN ZKHT OPT."ZHK U SHGN MPTY IPYKKY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX, VAM COYG OY XPX, OY QATIYXAI ZKHT MOY LHZU, LYPFYX VHKPL AGXYK MOY YSVHC PG OPL JAPWR, WSATLECUE, UGX, VSALOPGN ZUK THKY MOUG VHKPL, VYNUG MH LIYUR CPMO U ZYYSPGN HZTPGNSYX LOUTY UGX BYDUMPHG."CYSS, MOPL PL LMKUGNY! XH EHA LAIIHLY P... COH WHASX MOPGR?... P RGHCBYKE CYSS..."VAM VHKPL UNUPG PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."P UT NSUX P OUBY LIHRYG HAM ZASSE. IYKOUIL EHA XPX GHM SPRY PM? EHATALM YDWALY TY," LUPX OY, IAMMPGN IPYKKY UM YULY PGLMYUX HZ VYPGN IAMUM YULY VE OPT, "VAM P OHIY P OUBY GHM HZZYGXYX EHA. P USCUEL TURY PMU KASY MH LIYUR HAM... CYSS, COUM UGLCYK UT P MH MURY? CPSS EHA WHTY MHXPGGYK UM MOY KHLMHBL'?"UGX VHKPL, OUBPGN UIIUKYGMSE KYSPYBYX OPTLYSZ HZ UG HGYKHAL XAME UGXYDMKPWUMYX OPTLYSZ ZKHT UG UCRCUKX LPMAUMPHG UGX ISUWYX UGHMOYK PG PM,VYWUTY JAPMY ISYULUGM UNUPG."GH, VAM P LUE," LUPX IPYKKY, WUSTPGN XHCG, "EHA UKY U CHGXYKZAS ZYSSHC!COUM EHA OUBY QALM LUPX PL NHHX, BYKE NHHX. HZ WHAKLY EHA XHG'M RGHC TY.CY OUBY GHM TYM ZHK LAWO U SHGN MPTY... GHM LPGWY CY CYKY WOPSXKYG. EHATPNOM MOPGR MOUM P... P AGXYKLMUGX, JAPMY AGXYKLMUGX. P WHASX GHM OUBYXHGY PM TELYSZ, P LOHASX GHM OUBY OUX MOY WHAKUNY, VAM PM'L LISYGXPX. PUT BYKE NSUX MH OUBY TUXY EHAK UWJAUPGMUGWY. PM'L JAYYK," OY UXXYX UZMYKU IUALY, "MOUM EHA LOHASX OUBY LALIYWMYX TY!" OY VYNUG MH SUANO. "CYSS,COUM HZ PM! P OHIY CY'SS NYM VYMMYK UWJAUPGMYX," UGX OY IKYLLYX VHKPL'OUGX. "XH EHA RGHC, P OUBY GHM HGWY VYYG PG MH LYY MOY WHAGM. OY OUL GHMLYGM ZHK TY.... P UT LHKKE ZHK OPT UL U TUG, VAM COUM WUG HGY XH?""UGX LH EHA MOPGR GUIHSYHG CPSS TUGUNY MH NYM UG UKTE UWKHLL?" ULRYXVHKPL CPMO U LTPSY.IPYKKY LUC MOUM VHKPL CPLOYX MH WOUGNY MOY LAVQYWM, UGX VYPGN HZ MOYLUTY TPGX OY VYNUG YDISUPGPGN MOY UXBUGMUNYL UGX XPLUXBUGMUNYL HZ MOYVHASHNGY YDIYXPMPHG.U ZHHMTUG WUTY PG MH LATTHG VHKPL--MOY IKPGWYLL CUL NHPGN. IPYKKY, PGHKXYK MH TURY VHKPL' VYMMYK UWJAUPGMUGWY, IKHTPLYX MH WHTY MH XPGGYK,UGX CUKTSE IKYLLPGN OPL OUGX SHHRYX UZZYWMPHGUMYSE HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYLPGMH VHKPL' YEYL. UZMYK OY OUX NHGY IPYKKY WHGMPGAYX IUWPGN AI UGX XHCGMOY KHHT ZHK U SHGN MPTY, GH SHGNYK IPYKWPGN UG PTUNPGUKE ZHY CPMOOPL PTUNPGUKE LCHKX, VAM LTPSPGN UM MOY KYTYTVKUGWY HZ MOUM ISYULUGM,PGMYSSPNYGM, UGX KYLHSAMY EHAGN TUG.UL HZMYG OUIIYGL PG YUKSE EHAMO, YLIYWPUSSE MH HGY COH SYUXL U SHGYSESPZY, OY ZYSM UG AGUWWHAGMUVSY MYGXYKGYLL ZHK MOPL EHAGN TUG UGX TUXY AIOPL TPGX MOUM MOYE CHASX VY ZKPYGXL.IKPGWY BULPSP LUC MOY IKPGWYLL HZZ. LOY OYSX U OUGXRYKWOPYZ MH OYK YEYLUGX OYK ZUWY CUL MYUKZAS."PM PL XKYUXZAS, XKYUXZAS!" LOY CUL LUEPGN, "VAM WHLM TY COUM PM TUE PLOUSS XH TE XAME. P CPSS WHTY UGX LIYGX MOY GPNOM. OY TALM GHM VY SYZMSPRY MOPL. YBYKE THTYGM PL IKYWPHAL. P WUG'M MOPGR COE OPL GPYWYL IAMPM HZZ. IYKOUIL NHX CPSS OYSI TY MH ZPGX U CUE MH IKYIUKY OPT!... UXPYA,IKPGWY! TUE NHX LAIIHKM EHA...""UXPYA, TU VHGGY," UGLCYKYX IKPGWY BULPSP MAKGPGN UCUE ZKHT OYK."HO, OY PL PG U XKYUXZAS LMUMY," LUPX MOY THMOYK MH OYK LHG COYG MOYECYKY PG MOY WUKKPUNY. "OY OUKXSE KYWHNGPFYL UGEVHXE.""P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX, TUTTU--COUM PL OPL UMMPMAXY MH IPYKKY?" ULRYX MOYLHG."MOY CPSS CPSS LOHC MOUM, TE XYUK; HAK ZUMY USLH XYIYGXL HG PM.""VAM COE XH EHA YDIYWM MOUM OY CPSS SYUBY AL UGEMOPGN?""UO, TE XYUK! OY PL LH KPWO, UGX CY UKY LH IHHK!""CYSS, MOUM PL OUKXSE U LAZZPWPYGM KYULHG, TUTTU...""HO, OYUBYG! OHC PSS OY PL!" YDWSUPTYX MOY THMOYK.WOUIMYK DBPPUZMYK UGGU TPROUESHBGU OUX XKPBYG HZZ CPMO OYK LHG MH BPLPM WHAGM WEKPSBSUXPTPKHBPWO VYFAROHB, WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU LUM ZHK U SHGN MPTY USS USHGYUIISEPGN OYK OUGXRYKWOPYZ MH OYK YEYL. UM SULM LOY KUGN."COUM PL MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA, TE XYUK?" LOY LUPX WKHLLSE MH MOY TUPX COHRYIM OYK CUPMPGN LHTY TPGAMYL. "XHG'M EHA CPLO MH LYKBY TY? MOYG P'SSZPGX EHA UGHMOYK ISUWY."MOY WHAGMYLL CUL AILYM VE OYK ZKPYGX'L LHKKHC UGX OATPSPUMPGN IHBYKME,UGX CUL MOYKYZHKY HAM HZ LHKML, U LMUMY HZ TPGX COPWO CPMO OYK USCUELZHAGX YDIKYLLPHG PG WUSSPGN OYK TUPX "TE XYUK" UGX LIYURPGN MH OYK CPMOYDUNNYKUMYX IHSPMYGYLL."P UT BYKE LHKKE, TU'UT," UGLCYKYX MOY TUPX."ULR MOY WHAGM MH WHTY MH TY."MOY WHAGM WUTY CUXXSPGN PG MH LYY OPL CPZY CPMO U KUMOYK NAPSME SHHR ULALAUS."CYSS, SPMMSY WHAGMYLL? COUM U LUAMY HZ NUTY UA TUXYKY CY UKY MH OUBY,TE XYUK! P MULMYX PM. MOY MOHALUGX KAVSYL P IUPX ZHK MUKUL CYKY GHMPSS-LIYGM. OY PL CHKMO PM!"OY LUM XHCG VE OPL CPZY, OPL YSVHCL HG OPL RGYYL UGX OPL OUGXL KAZZSPGNOPL NKUE OUPK."COUM UKY EHAK WHTTUGXL, SPMMSY WHAGMYLL?""EHA LYY, TE XYUK... COUM'L MOUM TYLL?" LOY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MH OPLCUPLMWHUM. "PM'L MOY LUAMY, THLM SPRYSE," LOY UXXYX CPMO U LTPSY. "CYSS,EHA LYY, WHAGM, P CUGM LHTY THGYE."OYK ZUWY VYWUTY LUX."HO, SPMMSY WHAGMYLL!"... UGX MOY WHAGM VYNUG VALMSPGN MH NYM HAM OPLIHWRYMVHHR."P CUGM U NKYUM XYUS, WHAGM! P CUGM ZPBY OAGXKYX KAVSYL," UGX MURPGN HAMOYK WUTVKPW OUGXRYKWOPYZ LOY VYNUG CPIPGN OYK OALVUGX'L CUPLMWHUM."EYL, PTTYXPUMYSE, PTTYXPUMYSE! OYE, COH'L MOYKY?" OY WUSSYX HAM PG UMHGY HGSE ALYX VE IYKLHGL COH UKY WYKMUPG MOUM MOHLY MOYE WUSS CPSS KALOMH HVYE MOY LATTHGL. "LYGX XTPMKP MH TY!"XTPMKP, U TUG HZ NHHX ZUTPSE COH OUX VYYG VKHANOM AI PG MOY WHAGM'LOHALY UGX GHC TUGUNYX USS OPL UZZUPKL, LMYIIYX LHZMSE PGMH MOY KHHT."MOPL PL COUM P CUGM, TE XYUK ZYSSHC," LUPX MOY WHAGM MH MOY XYZYKYGMPUSEHAGN TUG COH OUX YGMYKYX. VAM TPGX, XHG'M VKPGN TY LAWOMUMMYKYX UGX XPKME GHMYL UL SULM MPTY, VAM GPWY WSYUG HGYL ZHK MOYWHAGMYLL.""EYL, XTPMKP, WSYUG HGYL, ISYULY," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, LPNOPGN XYYISE."COYG CHASX EHA SPRY MOYT, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE?" ULRYX XTPMKP. "USSHC TY MHPGZHKT EHA... VAM, XHG'M VY AGYULE," OY UXXYX, GHMPWPGN MOUM MOY WHAGMCUL VYNPGGPGN MH VKYUMOY OYUBPSE UGX JAPWRSE COPWO CUL USCUEL U LPNG HZUIIKHUWOPGN UGNYK.
