YBYKEMOPGN PL IHLLPVSY.""UO, THGYE, WHAGM, THGYE! OHC TAWO LHKKHC PM WUALYL PG MOY CHKSX," LUPXMOY WHAGMYLL. "VAM P UT PG NKYUM GYYX HZ MOPL LAT.""EHA, TE SPMMSY WHAGMYLL, UKY U GHMHKPHAL LIYGXMOKPZM," LUPX MOY WHAGM,UGX OUBPGN RPLLYX OPL CPZY'L OUGX OY CYGM VUWR MH OPL LMAXE.COYG UGGU TPROUESHBGU KYMAKGYX ZKHT WHAGM VYFAROHB'L MOY THGYE, USSPG WSYUG GHMYL, CUL SEPGN KYUXE AGXYK U OUGXRYKWOPYZ HG MOY WHAGMYLL'SPMMSY MUVSY, UGX UGGU TPROUESHBGU GHMPWYX MOUM LHTYMOPGN CUL UNPMUMPGNOYK."CYSS, TE XYUK?" ULRYX MOY WHAGMYLL."HO, COUM U MYKKPVSY LMUMY OY PL PG! HGY CHASX GHM RGHC OPT, OY PL LHPSS! P CUL HGSE MOYKY U ZYC THTYGML UGX OUKXSE LUPX U CHKX...""UGGYMMY, ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY XHG'M KYZALY TY," MOY WHAGMYLL VYNUG, CPMO UVSALO MOUM SHHRYX BYKE LMKUGNY HG OYK MOPG, XPNGPZPYX, YSXYKSE ZUWY, UGXLOY MHHR MOY THGYE ZKHT AGXYK MOY OUGXRYKWOPYZ.UGGU TPROUESHBGU PGLMUGMSE NAYLLYX OYK PGMYGMPHG UGX LMHHIYX MH VY KYUXEMH YTVKUWY MOY WHAGMYLL UM MOY UIIKHIKPUMY THTYGM."MOPL PL ZHK VHKPL ZKHT TY, ZHK OPL HAMZPM."UGGU TPROUESHBGU CUL USKYUXE YTVKUWPGN OYK UGX CYYIPGN. MOY WHAGMYLLCYIM MHH. MOYE CYIM VYWUALY MOYE CYKY ZKPYGXL, UGX VYWUALY MOYE CYKYRPGXOYUKMYX, UGX VYWUALY MOYE--ZKPYGXL ZKHT WOPSXOHHX--OUX MH MOPGRUVHAM LAWO U VULY MOPGN UL THGYE, UGX VYWUALY MOYPK EHAMO CUL HBYK....VAM MOHLY MYUKL CYKY ISYULUGM MH MOYT VHMO.WOUIMYK DBPPPWHAGMYLL KHLMHBU, CPMO OYK XUANOMYKL UGX U SUKNY GATVYK HZ NAYLML, CULUSKYUXE LYUMYX PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. MOY WHAGM MHHR MOY NYGMSYTYG PGMHOPL LMAXE UGX LOHCYX MOYT OPL WOHPWY WHSSYWMPHG HZ MAKRPLO IPIYL.ZKHT MPTY MH MPTY OY CYGM HAM MH ULR: "OULG'M LOY WHTY EYM?" MOYE CYKYYDIYWMPGN TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UROKHLPTHBU, RGHCG PG LHWPYME UL SY MYKKPVSYXKUNHG, U SUXE XPLMPGNAPLOYX GHM ZHK CYUSMO HK KUGR, VAM ZHK WHTTHGLYGLY UGX ZKUGR ISUPGGYLL HZ LIYYWO. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU CUL RGHCG MH MOYPTIYKPUS ZUTPSE UL CYSS UL MH USS THLWHC UGX IYMYKLVAKN, UGX VHMO WPMPYLCHGXYKYX UM OYK, SUANOYX IKPBUMYSE UM OYK KAXYGYLLYL, UGX MHSX NHHXLMHKPYL UVHAM OYK, COPSY GHGY MOY SYLL USS CPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG KYLIYWMYXUGX ZYUKYX OYK.PG MOY WHAGM'L KHHT, COPWO CUL ZASS HZ MHVUWWH LTHRY, MOYE MUSRYX HZ CUKMOUM OUX VYYG UGGHAGWYX PG U TUGPZYLMH, UGX UVHAM MOY KYWKAPMPGN. GHGYHZ MOYT OUX EYM LYYG MOY TUGPZYLMH, VAM MOYE USS RGYC PM OUX UIIYUKYX.MOY WHAGM LUM HG MOY LHZU VYMCYYG MCH NAYLML COH CYKY LTHRPGN UGXMUSRPGN. OY GYPMOYK LTHRYX GHK MUSRYX, VAM VYGXPGN OPL OYUX ZPKLM MH HGYLPXY UGX MOYG MH MOY HMOYK CUMWOYX MOY LTHRYKL CPMO YBPXYGM ISYULAKYUGX SPLMYGYX MH MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG HZ OPL MCH GYPNOVHKL, COHT OY YNNYX HGUNUPGLM YUWO HMOYK.HGY HZ MOYT CUL U LUSSHC, WSYUG-LOUBYG WPBPSPUG CPMO U MOPG UGX CKPGRSYXZUWY, USKYUXE NKHCPGN HSX, MOHANO OY CUL XKYLLYX SPRY U THLM ZULOPHGUVSYEHAGN TUG. OY LUM CPMO OPL SYNL AI HG MOY LHZU UL PZ JAPMY UM OHTY UGX,OUBPGN LMAWR UG UTVYK THAMOIPYWY ZUK PGMH OPL THAMO, CUL PGOUSPGN MOYLTHRY LIULTHXPWUSSE UGX LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL. MOPL CUL UG HSX VUWOYSHK,LOPGLOPG, U WHALPG HZ MOY WHAGMYLL', U TUG CPMO "U LOUKI MHGNAY" UL MOYELUPX PG THLWHC LHWPYME. OY LYYTYX MH VY WHGXYLWYGXPGN MH OPL WHTIUGPHG.MOY SUMMYK, U ZKYLO, KHLE HZZPWYK HZ MOY NAUKXL, PKKYIKHUWOUVSE CULOYX,VKALOYX, UGX VAMMHGYX, OYSX OPL IPIY PG MOY TPXXSY HZ OPL THAMO UGX CPMOKYX SPIL NYGMSE PGOUSYX MOY LTHRY, SYMMPGN PM YLWUIY ZKHT OPL OUGXLHTYTHAMO PG KPGNL. MOPL CUL SPYAMYGUGM VYKN, UG HZZPWYK PG MOY LYTYGHBKYNPTYGM CPMO COHT VHKPL CUL MH MKUBYS MH QHPG MOY UKTE, UGX UVHAMCOHT GUMULOU OUX, MYULYX OYK YSXYK LPLMYK BYKU, LIYURPGN HZ VYKN UL OYK"PGMYGXYX." MOY WHAGM LUM VYMCYYG MOYT UGX SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSE. OPLZUBHKPMY HWWAIUMPHG COYG GHM ISUEPGN VHLMHG, U WUKX NUTY OY CUL BYKEZHGX HZ, CUL MOUM HZ SPLMYGYK, YLIYWPUSSE COYG OY LAWWYYXYX PG LYMMPGNMCH SHJAUWPHAL MUSRYKL UM HGY UGHMOYK."CYSS, MOYG, HSX WOUI, THG MKYL OHGHKUVSY USIOHGLY RUKSHBPWO," LUPXLOPGLOPG, SUANOPGN PKHGPWUSSE UGX TPDPGN MOY THLM HKXPGUKE KALLPUGYDIKYLLPHGL CPMO MOY WOHPWYLM ZKYGWO IOKULYL--COPWO CUL U IYWASPUKPME HZOPL LIYYWO. "BHAL WHTIMYF BHAL ZUPKY XYL KYGMYL LAK S'YMUM; * EHA CUGMMH TURY LHTYMOPGN HAM HZ EHAK WHTIUGE?"     * EHA YDIYWM MH TURY UG PGWHTY HAM HZ MOY NHBYKGTYGM."GH, IYMYK GPRHSUYBPWO; P HGSE CUGM MH LOHC MOUM PG MOY WUBUSKE MOYUXBUGMUNYL UKY ZUK SYLL MOUG PG MOY PGZUGMKE. QALM WHGLPXYK TE HCGIHLPMPHG GHC, IYMYK GPRHSUYBPWO..."VYKN USCUEL LIHRY JAPYMSE, IHSPMYSE, UGX CPMO NKYUM IKYWPLPHG. OPLWHGBYKLUMPHG USCUEL KYSUMYX YGMPKYSE MH OPTLYSZ; OY CHASX KYTUPG WUSTUGX LPSYGM COYG MOY MUSR KYSUMYX MH UGE MHIPW MOUM OUX GH XPKYWM VYUKPGNHG OPTLYSZ. OY WHASX KYTUPG LPSYGM ZHK OHAKL CPMOHAM VYPGN UM USS IAMHAM HZ WHAGMYGUGWY OPTLYSZ HK TURPGN HMOYKL AGWHTZHKMUVSY, VAM ULLHHG UL MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG WHGWYKGYX OPTLYSZ OY CHASX VYNPG MH MUSRWPKWATLMUGMPUSSE UGX CPMO YBPXYGM LUMPLZUWMPHG."WHGLPXYK TE IHLPMPHG, IYMYK GPRHSUYBPWO. CYKY P PG MOY WUBUSKE P LOHASXNYM GHM THKY MOUG MCH OAGXKYX KAVSYL YBYKE ZHAK THGMOL, YBYG CPMO MOYKUGR HZ SPYAMYGUGM; VAM UL PM PL P KYWYPBY MCH OAGXKYX UGX MOPKME," LUPXOY, SHHRPGN UM LOPGLOPG UGX MOY WHAGM CPMO U QHEZAS, ISYULUGM LTPSY,UL PZ PM CYKY HVBPHAL MH OPT MOUM OPL LAWWYLL TALM USCUEL VY MOY WOPYZXYLPKY HZ YBYKEHGY YSLY."VYLPXYL MOUM, IYMYK GPRHSUYBPWO, VE YDWOUGNPGN PGMH MOY NAUKXL P LOUSSVY PG U THKY IKHTPGYGM IHLPMPHG," WHGMPGAYX VYKN, "UGX BUWUGWPYL HWWAKTAWO THKY ZKYJAYGMSE PG MOY ZHHM NAUKXL. MOYG QALM MOPGR COUM WUG VYXHGY CPMO MCH OAGXKYX UGX MOPKME KAVSYL! P YBYG TUGUNY MH IAM U SPMMSYULPXY UGX MH LYGX LHTYMOPGN MH TE ZUMOYK," OY CYGM HG, YTPMMPGN U LTHRYKPGN."SU VUSUGWY E YLM... * U NYKTUG RGHCL OHC MH LRPG U ZSPGM, UL MOYIKHBYKV LUEL," KYTUKRYX LOPGLOPG, THBPGN OPL IPIY MH MOY HMOYK LPXY HZOPL THAMO UGX CPGRPGN UM MOY WHAGM.      * LH MOUM LJAUKYL TUMMYKL.MOY WHAGM VAKLM HAM SUANOPGN. MOY HMOYK NAYLML LYYPGN MOUM LOPGLOPG CULMUSRPGN WUTY AI MH SPLMYG. VYKN, HVSPBPHAL HZ PKHGE HK PGXPZZYKYGWY,WHGMPGAYX MH YDISUPG OHC VE YDWOUGNPGN PGMH MOY NAUKXL OY OUX USKYUXENUPGYX U LMYI HG OPL HSX WHTKUXYL HZ MOY WUXYM WHKIL; OHC PG CUKMPTYMOY WHTIUGE WHTTUGXYK TPNOM NYM RPSSYX UGX OY, UL LYGPHK PG MOY WHTIUGE,TPNOM YULPSE LAWWYYX MH MOY IHLM; OHC IHIASUK OY CUL CPMO YBYKEHGY PGMOY KYNPTYGM, UGX OHC LUMPLZPYX OPL ZUMOYK CUL CPMO OPT. VYKN YBPXYGMSEYGQHEYX GUKKUMPGN USS MOPL, UGX XPX GHM LYYT MH LALIYWM MOUM HMOYKL,MHH, TPNOM OUBY MOYPK HCG PGMYKYLML. VAM USS OY LUPX CUL LH IKYMMPSELYXUMY, UGX MOY GUPBYMY HZ OPL EHAMOZAS YNHMPLT CUL LH HVBPHAL, MOUM OYXPLUKTYX OPL OYUKYKL."CYSS, TE VHE, EHA'SS NYM USHGN COYKYBYK EHA NH--ZHHM HK OHKLY--MOUMP'SS CUKKUGM," LUPX LOPGLOPG, IUMMPGN OPT HG MOY LOHASXYK UGX MURPGN OPLZYYM HZZ MOY LHZU.VYKN LTPSYX QHEHALSE. MOY WHAGM, VE OPL NAYLML, CYGM PGMH MOY XKUCPGNKHHT.PM CUL QALM MOY THTYGM VYZHKY U VPN XPGGYK COYG MOY ULLYTVSYX NAYLML,YDIYWMPGN MOY LATTHGL MH FURALRU, * UBHPX YGNUNPGN PG UGE SHGNWHGBYKLUMPHG VAM MOPGR PM GYWYLLUKE MH THBY UVHAM UGX MUSR, PG HKXYKMH LOHC MOUM MOYE UKY GHM UM USS PTIUMPYGM ZHK MOYPK ZHHX. MOY OHLM UGXOHLMYLL SHHR MHCUKX MOY XHHK, UGX GHC UGX MOYG NSUGWY UM HGY UGHMOYK,UGX MOY BPLPMHKL MKE MH NAYLL ZKHT MOYLY NSUGWYL COH, HK COUM, MOYE UKYCUPMPGN ZHK--LHTY PTIHKMUGM KYSUMPHG COH OUL GHM EYM UKKPBYX, HK U XPLOMOUM PL GHM EYM KYUXE.     * OHKL X'HYABKYL.IPYKKY OUX WHTY QALM UM XPGGYKMPTY UGX CUL LPMMPGN UCRCUKXSE PG MOYTPXXSY HZ MOY XKUCPGN KHHT HG MOY ZPKLM WOUPK OY OUX WHTY UWKHLL,VSHWRPGN MOY CUE ZHK YBYKEHGY. MOY WHAGMYLL MKPYX MH TURY OPT MUSR, VAMOY CYGM HG GUPBYSE SHHRPGN UKHAGX MOKHANO OPL LIYWMUWSYL UL PZ PG LYUKWOHZ LHTYVHXE UGX UGLCYKYX USS OYK JAYLMPHGL PG THGHLESSUVSYL. OY CUL PGMOY CUE UGX CUL MOY HGSE HGY COH XPX GHM GHMPWY MOY ZUWM. THLM HZ MOYNAYLML, RGHCPGN HZ MOY UZZUPK CPMO MOY VYUK, SHHRYX CPMO WAKPHLPME UMMOPL VPN, LMHAM, JAPYM TUG, CHGXYKPGN OHC LAWO U WSATLE, THXYLM ZYSSHCWHASX OUBY ISUEYX LAWO U IKUGR HG U IHSPWYTUG."EHA OUBY HGSE SUMYSE UKKPBYX?" MOY WHAGMYLL ULRYX OPT."HAP, TUXUTY," KYISPYX OY, SHHRPGN UKHAGX OPT."EHA OUBY GHM EYM LYYG TE OALVUGX?""GHG, TUXUTY." OY LTPSYX JAPMY PGUIIKHIKPUMYSE."EHA OUBY VYYG PG IUKPL KYWYGMSE, P VYSPYBY? P LAIIHLY PM'L BYKEPGMYKYLMPGN.""BYKE PGMYKYLMPGN."MOY WHAGMYLL YDWOUGNYX NSUGWYL CPMO UGGU TPROUESHBGU. MOY SUMMYKAGXYKLMHHX MOUM LOY CUL VYPGN ULRYX MH YGMYKMUPG MOPL EHAGN TUG, UGXLPMMPGN XHCG VYLPXY OPT LOY VYNUG MH LIYUR UVHAM OPL ZUMOYK; VAM OYUGLCYKYX OYK, UL OY OUX MOY WHAGMYLL, HGSE PG THGHLESSUVSYL. MOY HMOYKNAYLML CYKY USS WHGBYKLPGN CPMO HGY UGHMOYK. "MOY KUFATHBLRPL... PM CULWOUKTPGN... EHA UKY BYKE RPGX... WHAGMYLL UIKURLPGU..." CUL OYUKX HG USSLPXYL. MOY WHAGMYLL KHLY UGX CYGM PGMH MOY VUSSKHHT."TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU?" WUTY OYK BHPWY ZKHT MOYKY."OYKLYSZ," WUTY MOY UGLCYK PG U KHANO BHPWY, UGX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGUYGMYKYX MOY KHHT.USS MOY AGTUKKPYX SUXPYL UGX YBYG MOY TUKKPYX HGYL YDWYIM MOY BYKEHSXYLM KHLY. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU IUALYX UM MOY XHHK. MUSS UGX LMHAM,OHSXPGN OPNO OYK ZPZME-EYUK-HSX OYUX CPMO PML NKUE WAKSL, LOY LMHHXLAKBYEPGN MOY NAYLML, UGX SYPLAKYSE UKKUGNYX OYK CPXY LSYYBYL UL PZKHSSPGN MOYT AI. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU USCUEL LIHRY PG KALLPUG."OYUSMO UGX OUIIPGYLL MH OYK COHLY GUTY XUE CY UKY RYYIPGN UGX MH OYKWOPSXKYG," LOY LUPX, PG OYK SHAX, ZASS-MHGYX BHPWY COPWO XKHCGYX USSHMOYKL. "CYSS, EHA HSX LPGGYK," LOY CYGM HG, MAKGPGN MH MOY WHAGM COHCUL RPLLPGN OYK OUGX, "EHA'KY ZYYSPGN XASS PG THLWHC, P XUKYLUE? GHCOYKYMH OAGM CPMO EHAK XHNL? VAM COUM PL MH VY XHGY, HSX TUG? QALM LYY OHCMOYLY GYLMSPGNL UKY NKHCPGN AI," UGX LOY IHPGMYX MH MOY NPKSL. "EHA TALMSHHR ZHK OALVUGXL ZHK MOYT COYMOYK EHA SPRY PM HK GHM....""CYSS," LUPX LOY, "OHC'L TE WHLLUWR?" (TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU USCUEL WUSSYXGUMULOU U WHLLUWR) UGX LOY LMKHRYX MOY WOPSX'L UKT UL LOY WUTY AIZYUKSYLL UGX NUE MH RPLL OYK OUGX. "P RGHC LOY'L U LWUTI HZ U NPKS, VAMP SPRY OYK."LOY MHHR U IUPK HZ IYUK-LOUIYX KAVE YUKKPGNL ZKHT OYK OANY KYMPWASY UGX,OUBPGN NPBYG MOYT MH MOY KHLE GUMULOU, COH VYUTYX CPMO MOY ISYULAKYHZ OYK LUPGM'L-XUE ZYMY, MAKGYX UCUE UM HGWY UGX UXXKYLLYX OYKLYSZ MHIPYKKY."YO, YO, ZKPYGX! WHTY OYKY U VPM," LUPX LOY, ULLATPGN U LHZM OPNO MHGYHZ BHPWY. "WHTY OYKY, TE ZKPYGX..." UGX LOY HTPGHALSE MAWRYX AI OYKLSYYBYL LMPSS OPNOYK. IPYKKY UIIKHUWOYX, SHHRPGN UM OYK PG U WOPSXSPRYCUE MOKHANO OPL LIYWMUWSYL."WHTY GYUKYK, WHTY GYUKYK, ZKPYGX! P ALYX MH VY MOY HGSE HGY MH MYSSEHAK ZUMOYK MOY MKAMO COYG OY CUL PG ZUBHK, UGX PG EHAK WULY PM'L TEYBPXYGM XAME." LOY IUALYX. USS CYKY LPSYGM, YDIYWMUGM HZ COUM CUL MHZHSSHC, ZHK MOPL CUL WSYUKSE HGSE U IKYSAXY."U ZPGY SUX! TE CHKX! U ZPGY SUX!... OPL ZUMOYK SPYL HG OPL XYUMOVYX UGXOY UTALYL OPTLYSZ LYMMPGN U IHSPWYTUG ULMKPXY U VYUK! ZHK LOUTY, LPK,ZHK LOUTY! PM CHASX VY VYMMYK PZ EHA CYGM MH MOY CUK."LOY MAKGYX UCUE UGX NUBY OYK OUGX MH MOY WHAGM, COH WHASX OUKXSE RYYIZKHT SUANOPGN."CYSS, P LAIIHLY PM PL MPTY CY CYKY UM MUVSY?" LUPX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU.MOY WHAGM CYGM PG ZPKLM CPMO TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, MOY WHAGMYLL ZHSSHCYXHG MOY UKT HZ U WHSHGYS HZ OALLUKL, U TUG HZ PTIHKMUGWY MH MOYT VYWUALYGPWOHSUL CUL MH NH CPMO OPT MH MOY KYNPTYGM; MOYG WUTY UGGU TPROUESHBGUCPMO LOPGLOPG. VYKN NUBY OPL UKT MH BYKU. MOY LTPSPGN QASPY RUKUNPGUCYGM PG CPMO GPWOHSUL. UZMYK MOYT HMOYK WHAISYL ZHSSHCYX, ZPSSPGN MOYCOHSY XPGPGN OUSS, UGX SULM HZ USS MOY WOPSXKYG, MAMHKL, UGX NHBYKGYLLYLZHSSHCYX LPGNSE. MOY ZHHMTYG VYNUG THBPGN UVHAM, WOUPKL LWKUIYX, MOYVUGX LMKAWR AI PG MOY NUSSYKE, UGX MOY NAYLML LYMMSYX XHCG PG MOYPKISUWYL. MOYG MOY LMKUPGL HZ MOY WHAGM'L OHALYOHSX VUGX CYKY KYISUWYX VEMOY WSUMMYK HZ RGPBYL UGX ZHKRL, MOY BHPWYL HZ BPLPMHKL, UGX MOY LHZMLMYIL HZ MOY ZHHMTYG. UM HGY YGX HZ MOY MUVSY LUM MOY WHAGMYLL CPMOTUKEU XTPMKPYBGU HG OYK KPNOM UGX UGGU TPROUESHBGU HG OYK SYZM, MOYHMOYK SUXE BPLPMHKL CYKY ZUKMOYK XHCG. UM MOY HMOYK YGX LUM MOY WHAGM,CPMO MOY OALLUK WHSHGYS HG OPL SYZM UGX LOPGLOPG UGX MOY HMOYK TUSYBPLPMHKL HG OPL KPNOM. TPXCUE XHCG MOY SHGN MUVSY HG HGY LPXY LUM MOYNKHCGAI EHAGN IYHISY: BYKU VYLPXY VYKN, UGX IPYKKY VYLPXY VHKPL; UGX HGMOY HMOYK LPXY, MOY WOPSXKYG, MAMHKL, UGX NHBYKGYLLYL. ZKHT VYOPGX MOYWKELMUS XYWUGMYKL UGX ZKAPM BULYL MOY WHAGM RYIM NSUGWPGN UM OPL CPZYUGX OYK MUSS WUI CPMO PML SPNOM-VSAY KPVVHGL, UGX VALPSE ZPSSYX OPLGYPNOVHKL' NSULLYL, GHM GYNSYWMPGN OPL HCG. MOY WHAGMYLL PG MAKG,CPMOHAM HTPMMPGN OYK XAMPYL UL OHLMYLL, MOKYC LPNGPZPWUGM NSUGWYL ZKHTVYOPGX MOY IPGYUIISYL UM OYK OALVUGX COHLY ZUWY UGX VUSX OYUX LYYTYXVE MOYPK KYXGYLL MH WHGMKULM THKY MOUG ALAUS CPMO OPL NKUE OUPK. UM MOYSUXPYL' YGX UG YBYG WOUMMYK HZ BHPWYL CUL OYUKX USS MOY MPTY, UM MOYTYG'L YGX MOY BHPWYL LHAGXYX SHAXYK UGX SHAXYK, YLIYWPUSSE MOUM HZ MOYWHSHGYS HZ OALLUKL COH, NKHCPGN THKY UGX THKY ZSALOYX, UMY UGX XKUGR LHTAWO MOUM MOY WHAGM OYSX OPT AI UL U IUMMYKG MH MOY HMOYK NAYLML. VYKNCPMO MYGXYK LTPSYL CUL LUEPGN MH BYKU MOUM SHBY PL GHM UG YUKMOSE VAM UOYUBYGSE ZYYSPGN. VHKPL CUL MYSSPGN OPL GYC ZKPYGX IPYKKY COH MOY NAYLMLCYKY UGX YDWOUGNPGN NSUGWYL CPMO GUMULOU, COH CUL LPMMPGN HIIHLPMY.IPYKKY LIHRY SPMMSY VAM YDUTPGYX MOY GYC ZUWYL, UGX UMY U NKYUM XYUS.HZ MOY MCH LHAIL OY WOHLY MAKMSY CPMO LUBHKE IUMMPYL UGX CYGM HG MH MOYNUTY CPMOHAM HTPMMPGN U LPGNSY XPLO HK HGY HZ MOY CPGYL. MOYLY SUMMYKMOY VAMSYK MOKALM TELMYKPHALSE ZHKCUKX, CKUIIYX PG U GUIRPG, ZKHT VYOPGXMOY GYDM TUG'L LOHASXYKL UGX COPLIYKYX: "XKE TUXYPKU"... "OAGNUKPUG"...HK "KOPGY CPGY" UL MOY WULY TPNOM VY. HZ MOY ZHAK WKELMUS NSULLYLYGNKUBYX CPMO MOY WHAGM'L THGHNKUT MOUM LMHHX VYZHKY OPL ISUMY,IPYKKY OYSX HAM HGY UM KUGXHT UGX XKUGR CPMO YGQHETYGM, NUFPGN CPMOYBYK-PGWKYULPGN UTPUVPSPME UM MOY HMOYK NAYLML. GUMULOU, COH LUMHIIHLPMY, CUL SHHRPGN UM VHKPL UL NPKSL HZ MOPKMYYG SHHR UM MOY VHE MOYEUKY PG SHBY CPMO UGX OUBY QALM RPLLYX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY. LHTYMPTYL MOUMLUTY SHHR ZYSS HG IPYKKY, UGX MOUM ZAGGE SPBYSE SPMMSY NPKS'L SHHR TUXYOPT PGWSPGYX MH SUANO CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE.GPWOHSUL LUM UM LHTY XPLMUGWY ZKHT LHGEU, VYLPXY QASPY RUKUNPGU, MHCOHT OY CUL UNUPG MUSRPGN CPMO MOY LUTY PGBHSAGMUKE LTPSY. LHGEU CHKYU WHTIUGE LTPSY VAM CUL YBPXYGMSE MHKTYGMYX VE QYUSHALE; GHC LOY MAKGYXIUSY, GHC VSALOYX UGX LMKUPGYX YBYKE GYKBY MH HBYKOYUK COUM GPWOHSULUGX QASPY CYKY LUEPGN MH HGY UGHMOYK. MOY NHBYKGYLL RYIM SHHRPGN KHAGXAGYULPSE UL PZ IKYIUKPGN MH KYLYGM UGE LSPNOM MOUM TPNOM VY IAM AIHG MOYWOPSXKYG. MOY NYKTUG MAMHK CUL MKEPGN MH KYTYTVYK USS MOY XPLOYL, CPGYL,UGX RPGXL HZ XYLLYKM, PG HKXYK MH LYGX U ZASS XYLWKPIMPHG HZ MOY XPGGYKMH OPL IYHISY PG NYKTUGE; UGX OY ZYSM NKYUMSE HZZYGXYX COYG MOY VAMSYKCPMO U VHMMSY CKUIIYX PG U GUIRPG IULLYX OPT VE. OY ZKHCGYX, MKEPGN MHUIIYUK UL PZ OY XPX GHM CUGM UGE HZ MOUM CPGY, VAM CUL THKMPZPYX VYWUALYGH HGY CHASX AGXYKLMUGX MOUM PM CUL GHM MH JAYGWO OPL MOPKLM HK ZKHTNKYYXPGYLL MOUM OY CUGMYX PM, VAM LPTISE ZKHT U WHGLWPYGMPHAL XYLPKY ZHKRGHCSYXNY.WOUIMYK DPDUM MOY TYG'L YGX HZ MOY MUVSY MOY MUSR NKYC THKY UGX THKY UGPTUMYX. OY WHGWSAXYX, XKPGRPGN U MATVSYK HZ CPGYCPMO XPNGPME UGX SHHRPGN MH MOY WHAGM ZHK UIIKHBUS."WHGGUPLLYF-BHAL SY IKHBYKVY: * 'QYKHTY, QYKHTY, XH GHM KHUT, VAM MAKGLIPGXSYL UM OHTY!'?" "UL IH-H-HLLPVSY," OY YGXYX, UNUPGMAKGPGN MH MOY WHAGM. "FUM PL OHC BY HSX OALLUKL SHHR UM PM, UGX FYKY'LUG YGX HZ PM! UGX OHC XH EHA, U EHAGN TUG UGX U EHAGN OALLUK, OHC XH EHAQAXNY HZ PM?" OY UXXYX, UXXKYLLPGN GPWOHSUL, COH COYG OY OYUKX MOUM MOYCUK CUL VYPGN XPLWALLYX OUX MAKGYX ZKHT OPL IUKMGYK CPMO YEYL UGX YUKLPGMYGM HG MOY WHSHGYS."P UT JAPMY HZ EHAK HIPGPHG," KYISPYX GPWOHSUL, ZSUTPGN AI, MAKGPGN OPLISUMY KHAGX UGX THBPGN OPL CPGYNSULLYL UVHAM CPMO UL TAWO XYWPLPHG UGXXYLIYKUMPHG UL MOHANO OY CYKY UM MOUM THTYGM ZUWPGN LHTY NKYUM XUGNYK."P UT WHGBPGWYX MOUM CY KALLPUGL TALM XPY HK WHGJAYK," OY WHGWSAXYX,WHGLWPHAL--UL CYKY HMOYKL--UZMYK MOY CHKXL CYKY AMMYKYX MOUM OPL KYTUKRLCYKY MHH YGMOALPULMPW UGX YTIOUMPW ZHK MOY HWWULPHG UGX CYKY MOYKYZHKYUCRCUKX."COUM EHA LUPX QALM GHC CUL LISYGXPX!" LUPX OPL IUKMGYK QASPY.LHGEU MKYTVSYX USS HBYK UGX VSALOYX MH OYK YUKL UGX VYOPGX MOYT UGX XHCGMH OYK GYWR UGX LOHASXYKL COPSY GPWOHSUL CUL LIYURPGN.IPYKKY SPLMYGYX MH MOY WHSHGYS'L LIYYWO UGX GHXXYX UIIKHBPGNSE."MOUM'L ZPGY," LUPX OY."MOY EHAGN TUG'L U KYUS OALLUK!" LOY OUSZKHLY, VE U NSUGWY PGBPMPGN IPYKKY, COH LUM HIIHLPMY, MH SPLMYG MH COUMCUL WHTPGN, UGX MAKGPGN MH OYK THMOYK:"TUTTU!" LOY USTHLM LWKYUTYX; "PCUGM MH RGHC!"TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UGX MOY WHAGMYLL VAKLM HAM SUANOPGN, UGX USS MOY NAYLMLQHPGYX PG. YBYKEHGY SUANOYX, GHM UM TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU'L UGLCYK VAM UM MOYPGWKYXPVSY VHSXGYLL UGX LTUKMGYLL HZ MOPL SPMMSY NPKS COH OUX XUKYX MHMKYUM TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU PG MOPL ZULOPHG.GUMULOU HGSE XYLPLMYX COYG LOY OUX VYYG MHSX MOUM MOYKY CHASX VYIPGYUIISY PWY. VYZHKY MOY PWYL, WOUTIUNGY CUL LYKBYX KHAGX. MOY VUGXUNUPG LMKAWR AI, MOY WHAGM UGX WHAGMYLL RPLLYX, UGX MOY NAYLML, SYUBPGNMOYPK LYUML, CYGM AI MH "WHGNKUMASUMY" MOY WHAGMYLL, UGX KYUWOYX UWKHLLMOY MUVSY MH WSPGR NSULLYL CPMO MOY WHAGM, CPMO MOY WOPSXKYG, UGX CPMOHGY UGHMOYK. UNUPG MOY ZHHMTYG KALOYX UVHAM, WOUPKL LWKUIYX, UGX PG MOYLUTY HKXYK PG COPWO MOYE OUX YGMYKYX VAM CPMO KYXXYK ZUWYL, MOY NAYLMLKYMAKGYX MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX MH MOY WHAGM'L LMAXE.WOUIMYK DDMOY WUKX MUVSYL CYKY XKUCG HAM, LYML TUXY AI ZHK VHLMHG, UGX MOY WHAGM'LBPLPMHKL LYMMSYX MOYTLYSBYL, LHTY PG MOY MCH XKUCPGN KHHTL, LHTY PG MOYLPMMPGN KHHT, LHTY PG MOY SPVKUKE.MOY WHAGM, OHSXPGN OPL WUKXL ZUGCPLY, RYIM OPTLYSZ CPMO XPZZPWASME ZKHTXKHIIPGN PGMH OPL ALAUS UZMYK-XPGGYK GUI, UGX SUANOYX UM YBYKEMOPGN.MOY EHAGN IYHISY, UM MOY WHAGMYLL' PGLMPNUMPHG, NUMOYKYX KHAGX MOYWSUBPWOHKX UGX OUKI. QASPY VE NYGYKUS KYJAYLM ISUEYX ZPKLM. UZMYK LOYOUX ISUEYX U SPMMSY UPK CPMO BUKPUMPHGL HG MOY OUKI, LOY QHPGYX MOYHMOYK EHAGN SUXPYL PG VYNNPGN GUMULOU UGX GPWOHSUL, COH CYKY GHMYX ZHKMOYPK TALPWUS MUSYGM, MH LPGN LHTYMOPGN. GUMULOU, COH CUL MKYUMYX ULMOHANO LOY CYKY NKHCG AI, CUL YBPXYGMSE BYKE IKHAX HZ MOPL VAM UM MOYLUTY MPTY ZYSM LOE."COUM LOUSS CY LPGN?" LOY LUPX."'MOY VKHHR,'" LANNYLMYX GPWOHSUL."CYSS, MOYG, SYM'L VY JAPWR. VHKPL, WHTY OYKY," LUPX GUMULOU. "VAM COYKYPL LHGEU?"LOY SHHRYX KHAGX UGX LYYPGN MOUM OYK ZKPYGX CUL GHM PG MOY KHHT KUG MHSHHR ZHK OYK.KAGGPGN PGMH LHGEU'L KHHT UGX GHM ZPGXPGN OYK MOYKY, GUMULOU KUG MH MOYGAKLYKE, VAM LHGEU CUL GHM MOYKY YPMOYK. GUMULOU WHGWSAXYX MOUM LOY TALMVY HG MOY WOYLM PG MOY IULLUNY. MOY WOYLM PG MOY IULLUNY CUL MOY ISUWYHZ THAKGPGN ZHK MOY EHAGNYK ZYTUSY NYGYKUMPHG PG MOY KHLMHB OHALYOHSX.UGX MOYKY PG ZUWM CUL LHGEU SEPGN ZUWY XHCGCUKX HG GAKLY'L XPKME ZYUMOYKVYX HG MOY MHI HZ MOY WOYLM, WKATISPGN OYK NUAFE IPGR XKYLL AGXYK OYK,OPXPGN OYK ZUWY CPMO OYK LSYGXYK ZPGNYKL, UGX LHVVPGN LH WHGBASLPBYSEMOUM OYK VUKY SPMMSY LOHASXYKL LOHHR. GUMULOU'L ZUWY, COPWO OUX VYYG LHKUXPUGMSE OUIIE USS MOUM LUPGM'L XUE, LAXXYGSE WOUGNYX: OYK YEYL VYWUTYZPDYX, UGX MOYG U LOPBYK IULLYX XHCG OYK VKHUX GYWR UGX MOY WHKGYKL HZOYK THAMO XKHHIYX."LHGEU! COUM PL PM? COUM PL MOY TUMMYK?... HH... HH... HH...!" UGXGUMULOU'L SUKNY THAMO CPXYGYX, TURPGN OYK SHHR JAPMY ANSE, UGX LOY VYNUGMH CUPS SPRY U VUVE CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE, YDWYIM MOUM LHGEU CUL WKEPGN.LHGEU MKPYX MH SPZM OYK OYUX MH UGLCYK VAM WHASX GHM, UGX OPX OYK ZUWYLMPSS XYYIYK PG MOY VYX. GUMULOU CYIM, LPMMPGN HG MOY VSAY-LMKPIYXZYUMOYK VYX UGX OANNPGN OYK ZKPYGX. CPMO UG YZZHKM LHGEU LUM AI UGXVYNUG CPIPGN OYK YEYL UGX YDISUPGPGN."GPWOHSUL PL NHPGN UCUE PG U CYYR'L MPTY, OPL... IUIYKL... OUBY WHTY...OY MHSX TY OPTLYSZ... VAM LMPSS P LOHASX GHM WKE," UGX LOY LOHCYXU IUIYK LOY OYSX PG OYK OUGX--CPMO MOY BYKLYL GPWOHSUL OUX CKPMMYG,"LMPSS, P LOHASX GHM WKE, VAM EHA WUG'M... GH HGY WUG AGXYKLMUGX... COUMU LHAS OY OUL!"UGX LOY VYNUG MH WKE UNUPG VYWUALY OY OUX LAWO U GHVSY LHAS."PM'L USS BYKE CYSS ZHK EHA... P UT GHM YGBPHAL... P SHBY EHA UGX VHKPLUSLH," LOY CYGM HG, NUPGPGN U SPMMSY LMKYGNMO; "OY PL GPWY... MOYKY UKYGH XPZZPWASMPYL PG EHAK CUE.... VAM GPWOHSUL PL TE WHALPG... HGY CHASXOUBY MH... MOY TYMKHIHSPMUG OPTLYSZ... UGX YBYG MOYG PM WUG'M VY XHGY.UGX VYLPXYL, PZ LOY MYSSL TUTTU" (LHGEU SHHRYX AIHG MOY WHAGMYLL UL OYKTHMOYK UGX WUSSYX OYK LH) "MOUM P UT LIHPSPGN GPWOHSUL' WUKYYK UGX UTOYUKMSYLL UGX AGNKUMYZAS, COPSY MKASE... NHX PL TE CPMGYLL," UGX LOYTUXY MOY LPNG HZ MOY WKHLL, "P SHBY OYK LH TAWO, UGX USS HZ EHA, HGSEBYKU... UGX COUM ZHK? COUM OUBY P XHGY MH OYK? P UT LH NKUMYZAS MH EHAMOUM P CHASX CPSSPGNSE LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGN, HGSE P OUBY GHMOPGN...."LHGEU WHASX GHM WHGMPGAY, UGX UNUPG OPX OYK ZUWY PG OYK OUGXL UGX PG MOYZYUMOYK VYX. GUMULOU VYNUG WHGLHSPGN OYK, VAM OYK ZUWY LOHCYX MOUM LOYAGXYKLMHHX USS MOY NKUBPME HZ OYK ZKPYGX'L MKHAVSY."LHGEU," LOY LAXXYGSE YDWSUPTYX, UL PZ LOY OUX NAYLLYX MOY MKAY KYULHGHZ OYK ZKPYGX'L LHKKHC, "P'T LAKY BYKU OUL LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH EHA LPGWYXPGGYK? OULG'M LOY?""EYL, MOYLY BYKLYL GPWOHSUL CKHMY OPTLYSZ UGX P WHIPYX LHTY HMOYKL, UGXLOY ZHAGX MOYT HG TE MUVSY UGX LUPX LOY'X LOHC MOYT MH TUTTU, UGX MOUMP CUL AGNKUMYZAS, UGX MOUM TUTTU CHASX GYBYK USSHC OPT MH TUKKE TY,VAM MOUM OY'SS TUKKE QASPY. P XHG'M JAPMY KYTYTVYKOHC, VAM XHG'M EHA KYTYTVYK MOUM PM WHASX USS VY UKKUGNYX UGX OHC GPWYPM USS CUL? MOYKY'L AGWSY LOPGLOPG'L VKHMOYK OUL TUKKPYX OPL ZPKLMWHALPG. LUPXGUMULOU, LMHIIPGN LAXXYGSE. "P ZYYS LH OUIIE!"UGX LOY LYM HZZ UM U KAG USHGN MOY IULLUNY.LHGEU, LOURPGN HZZ LHTY XHCG COPWO WSAGN MH OYK UGX MAWRPGN UCUE MOYBYKLYL PG MOY VHLHT HZ OYK XKYLL WSHLY MH OYK VHGE SPMMSY WOYLM, KUGUZMYK GUMULOU XHCG MOY IULLUNY PGMH MOY LPMMPGN KHHT CPMO ZSALOYX ZUWYUGX SPNOM, QHEHAL LMYIL. UM MOY BPLPMHKL' KYJAYLM MOY EHAGN IYHISY LUGNMOY JAUKMYMMY, "MOY VKHHR," CPMO COPWO YBYKEHGY CUL XYSPNOMYX. MOYGGPWOHSUL LUGN U LHGN OY OUX QALM SYUKGYX:   UM GPNOMMPTY PG MOY THHG'L ZUPK NSHC     OHC LCYYM, UL ZUGWPYL CUGXYK ZKYY,   MH ZYYS MOUM PG MOPL CHKSX MOYKY'L HGY     COH LMPSS PL MOPGRPGN VAM HZ MOYY! MPSS MOYG P WUGGHM SPBY!...OY OUX GHM ZPGPLOYX MOY SULM BYKLY VYZHKY MOY EHAGN IYHISY VYNUG MHNYM KYUXE MH XUGWY PG MOY SUKNY OUSS, UGX MOY LHAGX HZ MOY ZYYM UGX MOYWHANOPGN HZ MOY TALPWPUGL CYKY OYUKX ZKHT MOY NUSSYKE.IPYKKY CUL LPMMPGN PG MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT COYKY LOPGLOPG OUX YGNUNYX OPT,UL U TUG KYWYGMSE KYMAKGYX ZKHT UVKHUX, PG U IHSPMPWUS WHGBYKLUMPHG PGCOPWO LYBYKUS HMOYKL QHPGYX VAM COPWO VHKYX IPYKKY. COYG MOY TALPW VYNUGGUMULOU WUTY PG UGX CUSRPGN LMKUPNOM AI MH IPYKKY LUPX, SUANOPGN UGXVSALOPGN:"TUTTU MHSX TY MH ULR EHA MH QHPG MOY XUGWYKL.""P UT UZKUPX HZ TPDPGN MOY ZPNAKYL," IPYKKY KYISPYX; "VAM PZ EHA CPSSVY TE MYUWOYK..." UGX SHCYKPGN OPL VPN UKT OY HZZYKYX PM MH MOY LSYGXYKSPMMSY NPKS.COPSY MOY WHAISYL CYKY UKKUGNPGN MOYTLYSBYL UGX MOY TALPWPUGL MAGPGN AI,IPYKKY LUM XHCG CPMO OPL SPMMSY IUKMGYK. QALM SHHR UM OYK!" YDWSUPTYX MOY WHAGMYLL UL LOY WKHLLYXMOY VUSSKHHT, IHPGMPGN MH GUMULOU.GUMULOU VSALOYX UGX SUANOYX."CYSS, KYUSSE, TUTTU! COE LOHASX EHA? MOYE GHC, LMKYMWOPGN MOYTLYSBYL UZMYK LPMMPGN LH SHGN, UGXKYISUWPGN MOYPK IAKLYL UGX IHWRYMVHHRL, YGMYKYX MOY VUSSKHHT. ZPKLM WUTYTUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UGX MOY WHAGM, VHMO CPMO TYKKE WHAGMYGUGWYL. LOHAMYX GUMULOU MH MOY COHSY WHTIUGE, UGX JAPMYZHKNYMMPGN MOUM LOY CUL XUGWPGN CPMO U NKHCG-AI IUKMGYK LOY VYGM OYKWAKSE OYUX MH OYK RGYYL UGX TUXY MOY COHSY KHHT KPGN CPMO OYK SUANOMYK.UGX PGXYYX YBYKEVHXE PG MOY KHHT SHHRYX CPMO U LTPSY HZ ISYULAKY UM MOYQHBPUS HSX NYGMSYTUG, COH LMUGXPGN VYLPXY OPL MUSS UGX LMHAM IUKMGYK,TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, WAKBYX OPL UKTL, VYUM MPTY, LMKUPNOMYGYX OPLLOHASXYKL, MAKGYX HAM OPL MHYL, MUIIYX NYGMSE CPMO OPL ZHHM, UGX, VEU LTPSY MOUM VKHUXYGYX OPL KHAGX ZUWY THKY UGX THKY, IKYIUKYX MOYHGSHHRYKL ZHK COUM CUL MH ZHSSHC. UL LHHG UL MOY IKHBHWUMPBYSE NUELMKUPGL HZ XUGPYS WHHIYK (LHTYCOUM KYLYTVSPGN MOHLY HZ U TYKKE IYULUGMXUGWY) VYNUG MH LHAGX, USS MOY XHHKCUEL HZ MOY VUSSKHHT CYKY LAXXYGSEZPSSYX VE MOY XHTYLMPW LYKZL--MOY TYG HG HGY LPXY UGX MOY CHTYG HG MOYHMOYK--COH CPMO VYUTPGN ZUWYL OUX WHTY MH LYY MOYPK TULMYK TURPGN TYKKE."QALM SHHR UM MOY TULMYK! U KYNASUK YUNSY OY PL!" SHAXSE KYTUKRYX MOYGAKLY, UL LOY LMHHX PG HGY HZ MOY XHHKCUEL.MOY WHAGM XUGWYX CYSS UGX RGYC PM. VAM OPL IUKMGYK WHASX GHM UGX XPX GHMCUGM MH XUGWY CYSS. OYK YGHKTHAL ZPNAKY LMHHX YKYWM, OYK IHCYKZAS UKTLOUGNPGN XHCG (LOY OUX OUGXYX OYK KYMPWASY MH MOY WHAGMYLL), UGX HGSE OYKLMYKG VAM OUGXLHTY ZUWY KYUSSE QHPGYX PG MOY XUGWY. COUM CUL YDIKYLLYXVE MOY COHSY HZ MOY WHAGM'L ISATI ZPNAKY, PG TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU ZHAGXYDIKYLLPHG HGSE PG OYK THKY UGX THKY VYUTPGN ZUWY UGX JAPBYKPGN GHLY.VAM PZ MOY WHAGM, NYMMPGN THKY UGX THKY PGMH MOY LCPGN HZ PM, WOUKTYXMOY LIYWMUMHKL VE MOY AGYDIYWMYXGYLL HZ OPL UXKHPM TUGYABYKL UGX MOYUNPSPME CPMO COPWO OY WUIYKYX UVHAM HG OPL SPNOM ZYYM, TUKEU XTPMKPYBGUIKHXAWYX GH SYLL PTIKYLLPHG VE LSPNOM YDYKMPHGL--MOY SYULM YZZHKMMH THBY OYK LOHASXYKL HK VYGX OYK UKTL COYG MAKGPGN, HK LMUTI OYKZHHM--COPWO YBYKEHGY UIIKYWPUMYX PG BPYC HZ OYK LPFY UGX OUVPMAUSLYBYKPME. MOY XUGWY NKYC SPBYSPYK UGX SPBYSPYK. MOY HMOYK WHAISYL WHASXGHM UMMKUWM U THTYGM'L UMMYGMPHG MH MOYPK HCG YBHSAMPHGL UGX XPX GHMYBYG MKE MH XH LH. USS CYKY CUMWOPGN MOY WHAGM UGX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU.GUMULOU RYIM IASSPGN YBYKEHGY VE LSYYBY HK XKYLL, AKNPGN MOYT MH "SHHRUM IUIU!" ZULMYK, ZULMYK, UGX ZULMYK;SPNOMSE, THKY SPNOMSE, UGX EYM THKY SPNOMSE COPKSYX MOY WHAGM, ZSEPGNKHAGX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, GHC HG OPL MHYL, GHC HG OPL OYYSL; AGMPS,MAKGPGN OPL IUKMGYK KHAGX MH OYK LYUM, OY YDYWAMYX MOY ZPGUS IUL,KUPLPGN OPL LHZM ZHHM VUWRCUKXL, VHCPGN OPL IYKLIPKPGN OYUX, LTPSPGNUGX TURPGN U CPXY LCYYI CPMO OPL UKT, UTPX U MOAGXYK HZ UIISUALY UGXSUANOMYK SYX VE GUMULOU. VHMO IUKMGYKL LMHHX LMPSS, VKYUMOPGN OYUBPSEUGX CPIPGN MOYPK ZUWYL CPMO MOYPK WUTVKPW OUGXRYKWOPYZL."MOUM'L OHC CY ALYX MH XUGWY PG HAK MPTY, TU WOYKY," LUPX MOY WHAGM."MOUM CUL U XUGPYS WHHIYK!" YDWSUPTYX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, MAWRPGN AI OYKLSYYBYL UGX IAZZPGN OYUBPSE.WOUIMYK DDPCOPSY PG MOY KHLMHBL' VUSSKHHT MOY LPDMO UGNSUPLY CUL VYPGN XUGWYX, MH UMAGY PG COPWO MOY CYUKE TALPWPUGL VSAGXYKYX, UGX COPSY MPKYX ZHHMTYG UGXWHHRL CYKY NYMMPGN MOY LAIIYK, WHAGM VYFAROHB OUX U LPDMO LMKHRY.MOY XHWMHKL IKHGHAGWYX KYWHBYKE PTIHLLPVSY. UZMYK U TAMY WHGZYLLPHG,WHTTAGPHG CUL UXTPGPLMYKYX MH MOY XEPGN TUG, IKYIUKUMPHGL TUXY ZHK MOYLUWKUTYGM HZ AGWMPHG, UGX PG OPL OHALY MOYKY CUL MOY VALMSY UGX MOKPSSHZ LALIYGLY ALAUS UM LAWO THTYGML. HAMLPXY MOY OHALY, VYEHGX MOY NUMYL,U NKHAI HZ AGXYKMURYKL, COH OPX COYGYBYK U WUKKPUNY XKHBY AI, CUPMYX PGYDIYWMUMPHG HZ UG PTIHKMUGM HKXYK ZHK UG YDIYGLPBY ZAGYKUS. MOY TPSPMUKENHBYKGHK HZ THLWHC, COH OUX VYYG ULLPXAHAL PG LYGXPGN UPXYL-XY-WUTI MHPGJAPKY UZMYK MOY WHAGM'L OYUSMO, WUTY OPTLYSZ MOUM YBYGPGN MH VPX USULM ZUKYCYSS MH MOY WYSYVKUMYX NKUGXYY HZ WUMOYKPGY'L WHAKM, WHAGMVYFAROHB.MOY TUNGPZPWYGM KYWYIMPHG KHHT CUL WKHCXYX. YBYKEHGY LMHHX AIKYLIYWMZASSE COYG MOY TPSPMUKE NHBYKGHK, OUBPGN LMUEYX UVHAM OUSZ UGOHAK USHGY CPMO MOY XEPGN TUG, IULLYX HAM, LSPNOMSE UWRGHCSYXNPGN MOYPKVHCL UGX MKEPGN MH YLWUIY UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY ZKHT MOY NSUGWYL ZPDYXHG OPT VE MOY XHWMHKL, WSYKNE, UGX KYSUMPBYL HZ MOY ZUTPSE. IKPGWYBULPSP, COH OUX NKHCG MOPGGYK UGX IUSYK XAKPGN MOY SULM ZYC XUEL,YLWHKMYX OPT MH MOY XHHK, KYIYUMPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OPT LYBYKUS MPTYL PGSHC MHGYL.COYG MOY TPSPMUKE NHBYKGHK OUX NHGY, IKPGWY BULPSP LUM XHCG USS USHGY HGU WOUPK PG MOY VUSSKHHT, WKHLLPGN HGY SYN OPNO HBYK MOY HMOYK, SYUGPGNOPL YSVHC HG OPL RGYY UGX WHBYKPGN OPL ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGX. UZMYK LPMMPGNLH ZHK U COPSY OY KHLY, UGX, SHHRPGN UVHAM OPT CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL,CYGM CPMO AGALAUSSE OAKKPYX LMYIL XHCG MOY SHGN WHKKPXHK SYUXPGN MH MOYVUWR HZ MOY OHALY, MH MOY KHHT HZ MOY YSXYLM IKPGWYLL.MOHLY COH CYKY PG MOY XPTSE SPM KYWYIMPHG KHHT LIHRY PG GYKBHALCOPLIYKL, UGX, COYGYBYK UGEHGY CYGM PGMH HK WUTY ZKHT MOY XEPGN TUG'LKHHT, NKYC LPSYGM UGX NUFYX CPMO YEYL ZASS HZ WAKPHLPME HK YDIYWMUGWE UMOPL XHHK, COPWO WKYURYX LSPNOMSE COYG HIYGYX."MOY SPTPML HZ OATUG SPZY... UKY ZPDYX UGX TUE GHM VY H'YKIULLYX,"LUPX UG HSX IKPYLM MH U SUXE COH OUX MURYG U LYUM VYLPXY OPT UGX CULSPLMYGPGN GUPBYSE MH OPL CHKXL."P CHGXYK, PL PM GHM MHH SUMY MH UXTPGPLMYK AGWMPHG?" ULRYX MOY SUXE,UXXPGN MOY IKPYLM'L WSYKPWUS MPMSY, UL PZ LOY OUX GH HIPGPHG HZ OYK HCGHG MOY LAVQYWM."UO, TUXUT, PM PL U NKYUM LUWKUTYGM," KYISPYX MOY IKPYLM, IULLPGN OPLOUGX HBYK MOY MOPG NKPFFSYX LMKUGXL HZ OUPK WHTVYX VUWR UWKHLL OPL VUSXOYUX."COH CUL MOUM? OY ULRYX, SHHRPGN RPGXSE UM OYKHBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL."UO, TE XYUK ZKPYGX! ZHKNYM MOY CKHGNL MOUM TUE OUBY VYYG XHGY EHA.MOPGR MOUM OY PL EHAK ZUMOYK... IYKOUIL PG MOY UNHGE HZ XYUMO." LOYLPNOYX. "P OUBY SHBYX EHA SPRY U LHG ZKHT MOY ZPKLM. MKALM EHAKLYSZ MHTY, IPYKKY. P LOUSS GHM ZHKNYM EHAK PGMYKYLML."IPYKKY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX U CHKX, VAM MOY WHGBPWMPHG MOUM USS MOPL OUXMH VY NKYC LMKHGNYK, UGX OY TYYRSE ZHSSHCYX UGGU TPROUESHBGU COH CULUSKYUXE HIYGPGN U XHHK.MOPL XHHK SYX PGMH U VUWR UGMYKHHT. UG HSX TUG, U LYKBUGM HZ MOYIKPGWYLLYL, LUM PG U WHKGYK RGPMMPGN U LMHWRPGN. IPYKKY OUX GYBYK VYYGPG MOPL IUKM HZ MOY OHALY UGX XPX GHM YBYG RGHC HZ MOY YDPLMYGWY HZMOYLY KHHTL. UGGU TPROUESHBGU, UXXKYLLPGN U TUPX COH CUL OAKKEPGN IULMCPMO U XYWUGMYK HG U MKUE UL "TE XYUK" UGX "TE LCYYM," ULRYX UVHAM MOYIKPGWYLL' OYUSMO UGX MOYG SYX IPYKKY USHGN U LMHGY IULLUNY. MOY ZPKLMXHHK HG MOY SYZM SYX PGMH MOY IKPGWYLLYL' UIUKMTYGML. MOY TUPX CPMO MOYXYWUGMYK PG OYK OULMY OUX GHM WSHLYX MOY XHHK (YBYKEMOPGN PG MOY OHALYCUL XHGY PG OULMY UM MOUM MPTY), UGX IPYKKY UGX UGGU TPROUESHBGU PGIULLPGN PGLMPGWMPBYSE NSUGWYX PGMH MOY KHHT, COYKY IKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOYYSXYLM IKPGWYLL CYKY LPMMPGN WSHLY MHNYMOYK MUSRPGN. LYYPGN MOYT IULL,IKPGWY BULPSP XKYC VUWR CPMO HVBPHAL PTIUMPYGWY, COPSY MOY IKPGWYLLQATIYX AI UGX CPMO U NYLMAKY HZ XYLIYKUMPHG LSUTTYX MOY XHHK CPMO USSOYK TPNOM.MOPL UWMPHG CUL LH AGSPRY OYK ALAUS WHTIHLAKY UGX MOY ZYUK XYIPWMYXHG IKPGWY BULPSP'L ZUWY LH HAM HZ RYYIPGN CPMO OPL XPNGPME MOUM IPYKKYLMHIIYX UGX NSUGWYX PGJAPKPGNSE HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL UM OPL NAPXY. UGGUTPROUESHBGU YBPGWYX GH LAKIKPLY, LOY HGSE LTPSYX ZUPGMSE UGX LPNOYX, ULPZ MH LUE MOUM MOPL CUL GH THKY MOUG LOY OUX YDIYWMYX."VY U TUG, TE ZKPYGX. P CPSS SHHR UZMYK EHAK PGMYKYLML," LUPX LOY PGKYISE MH OPL SHHR, UGX CYGM LMPSS ZULMYK USHGN MOY IULLUNY.IPYKKY WHASX GHM TURY HAM COUM PM CUL USS UVHAM, UGX LMPSS SYLL COUM"CUMWOPGN HBYK OPL PGMYKYLML" TYUGM, VAM OY XYWPXYX MOUM USS MOYLYMOPGNL OUX MH VY. ZKHT MOY IULLUNY MOYE CYGM PGMH U SUKNY, XPTSE SPMKHHT UXQHPGPGN MOY WHAGM'L KYWYIMPHG KHHT. PM CUL HGY HZ MOHLY LATIMAHALVAM WHSX UIUKMTYGML RGHCG MH IPYKKY HGSE ZKHT MOY ZKHGM UIIKHUWO, VAMYBYG PG MOPL KHHT MOYKY GHC LMHHX UG YTIME VUMO, UGX CUMYK OUX VYYGLIPSSYX HG MOY WUKIYM. MOYE CYKY TYM VE U XYUWHG CPMO U WYGLYK UGX VEU LYKBUGM COH IULLYX HAM HG MPIMHY CPMOHAM OYYXPGN MOYT. MOYE CYGM PGMHMOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT ZUTPSPUK MH IPYKKY, CPMO MCH PMUSPUG CPGXHCL HIYGPGNPGMH MOY WHGLYKBUMHKE, CPMO PML SUKNY VALM UGX ZASS SYGNMO IHKMKUPM HZWUMOYKPGY MOY NKYUM. MOY LUTY IYHISY CYKY LMPSS LPMMPGN OYKY PG USTHLMMOY LUTY IHLPMPHGL UL VYZHKY, COPLIYKPGN MH HGY UGHMOYK. USS VYWUTYLPSYGM UGX MAKGYX MH SHHR UM MOY IUSY MYUK-CHKG UGGU TPROUESHBGU UL LOYYGMYKYX, UGX UM MOY VPN LMHAM ZPNAKY HZ IPYKKY COH, OUGNPGN OPL OYUX,TYYRSE ZHSSHCYX OYK.UGGU TPROUESHBGU'L ZUWY YDIKYLLYX U WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM MOY XYWPLPBYTHTYGM OUX UKKPBYX. CPMO MOY UPK HZ U IKUWMPWUS IYMYKLVAKN SUXE LOY GHC,RYYIPGN IPYKKY WSHLY VYLPXY OYK, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT YBYG THKY VHSXSE MOUGMOUM UZMYKGHHG. LOY ZYSM MOUM UL LOY VKHANOM CPMO OYK MOY IYKLHG MOYXEPGN TUG CPLOYX MH LYY, OYK HCG UXTPLLPHG CUL ULLAKYX. WULMPGN U KUIPXNSUGWY UM USS MOHLY PG MOY KHHT UGX GHMPWPGN MOY WHAGM'L WHGZYLLHKMOYKY, LOY NSPXYX AI MH OPT CPMO U LHKM HZ UTVSY, GHM YDUWMSE VHCPGN EYMLYYTPGN MH NKHC LAXXYGSE LTUSSYK, UGX KYLIYWMZASSE KYWYPBYX MOY VSYLLPGNZPKLM HZ HGY UGX MOYG HZ UGHMOYK IKPYLM."NHX VY MOUGRYX MOUM EHA UKY PG MPTY," LUPX LOY MH HGY HZ MOY IKPYLML;"USS CY KYSUMPBYL OUBY VYYG PG LAWO UGDPYME. MOPL EHAGN TUG PL MOYWHAGM'L LHG," LOY UXXYX THKY LHZMSE. "COUM U MYKKPVSY THTYGM!"OUBPGN LUPX MOPL LOY CYGM AI MH MOY XHWMHK."XYUK XHWMHK," LUPX LOY, "MOPL EHAGN TUG PL MOY WHAGM'L LHG. PL MOYKYUGE OHIY?"MOY XHWMHK WULM U KUIPX NSUGWY AICUKXL UGX LPSYGMSE LOKANNYX OPLLOHASXYKL. UGGU TPROUESHBGU CPMO QALM MOY LUTY THBYTYGM KUPLYX OYKLOHASXYKL UGX YEYL, USTHLM WSHLPGN MOY SUMMYK, LPNOYX, UGX THBYX UCUEZKHT MOY XHWMHK MH IPYKKY. MH OPT, PG U IUKMPWASUKSE KYLIYWMZAS UGXMYGXYKSE LUX BHPWY, LOY LUPX:"MKALM PG OPL TYKWE!" UGX IHPGMPGN HAM U LTUSS LHZU ZHK OPT MH LPMUGX CUPM ZHK OYK, LOY CYGM LPSYGMSE MHCUKX MOY XHHK MOUM YBYKEHGY CULCUMWOPGN UGX PM WKYURYX BYKE LSPNOMSE UL LOY XPLUIIYUKYX VYOPGX PM.IPYKKY, OUBPGN TUXY AI OPL TPGX MH HVYE OPL THGPMKYLL PTISPWPMSE, THBYXMHCUKX MOY LHZU LOY OUX PGXPWUMYX. UL LHHG UL UGGU TPROUESHBGU OUXXPLUIIYUKYX OY GHMPWYX MOUM MOY YEYL HZ USS PG MOY KHHT MAKGYX MH OPTCPMO LHTYMOPGN THKY MOUG WAKPHLPME UGX LETIUMOE. OY GHMPWYX MOUM MOYECOPLIYKYX MH HGY UGHMOYK, WULMPGN LPNGPZPWUGM SHHRL UM OPT CPMO U RPGXHZ UCY UGX YBYG LYKBPSPME. U XYZYKYGWY LAWO UL OY OUX GYBYK VYZHKYKYWYPBYX CUL LOHCG OPT. U LMKUGNY SUXE, MOY HGY COH OUX VYYG MUSRPGN MHMOY IKPYLML, KHLY UGX HZZYKYX OPT OYK LYUM; UG UPXY-XY-WUTI IPWRYX AIUGX KYMAKGYX U NSHBY IPYKKY OUX XKHIIYX; MOY XHWMHKL VYWUTY KYLIYWMZASSELPSYGM UL OY IULLYX VE, UGX THBYX MH TURY CUE ZHK OPT. UM ZPKLM IPYKKYCPLOYX MH MURY UGHMOYK LYUM LH UL GHM MH MKHAVSY MOY SUXE, UGX USLH MHIPWR AI MOY NSHBY OPTLYSZ UGX MH IULL KHAGX MOY XHWMHKL COH CYKY GHMYBYG PG OPL CUE; VAM USS UM HGWY OY ZYSM MOUM MOPL CHASX GHM XH, UGXMOUM MHGPNOM OY CUL U IYKLHG HVSPNYX MH IYKZHKT LHTY LHKM HZ UCZASKPMY COPWO YBYKEHGY YDIYWMYX HZ OPT, UGX MOUM OY CUL MOYKYZHKY VHAGXMH UWWYIM MOYPK LYKBPWYL. OY MHHR MOY NSHBY PG LPSYGWY ZKHT MOYUPXY-XY-WUTI, UGX LUM XHCG PG MOY SUXE'L WOUPK, ISUWPGN OPL OANY OUGXLLETTYMKPWUSSE HG OPL RGYYL PG MOY GUPBY UMMPMAXY HZ UG YNEIMPUG LMUMAY,UGX XYWPXYX PG OPL HCG TPGX MOUM USS CUL UL PM LOHASX VY, UGX MOUM PGHKXYK GHM MH SHLY OPL OYUX UGX XH ZHHSPLO MOPGNL OY TALM GHM UWM HG OPLHCG PXYUL MHGPNOM, VAM TALM EPYSX OPTLYSZ AI YGMPKYSE MH MOY CPSS HZMOHLY COH CYKY NAPXPGN OPT.GHM MCH TPGAMYL OUX IULLYX VYZHKY IKPGWY BULPSP CPMO OYUX YKYWMTUQYLMPWUSSE YGMYKYX MOY KHHT. OY CUL CYUKPGN OPL SHGN WHUM CPMO MOKYYLMUKL HG OPL VKYULM. OY LYYTYX MH OUBY NKHCG MOPGGYK LPGWY MOY THKGPGN;OPL YEYL LYYTYX SUKNYK MOUG ALAUS COYG OY NSUGWYX KHAGX UGX GHMPWYXIPYKKY. OY CYGM AI MH OPT, MHHR OPL OUGX (U MOPGN OY GYBYK ALYX MH XH),UGX XKYC PM XHCGCUKXL UL PZ CPLOPGN MH ULWYKMUPG COYMOYK PM CUL ZPKTSEZPDYX HG."WHAKUNY, WHAKUNY, TE ZKPYGX! OY OUL ULRYX MH LYY EHA. MOUM PL CYSS!"UGX OY MAKGYX MH NH.VAM IPYKKY MOHANOM PM GYWYLLUKE MH ULR: "OHC PL..." UGX OYLPMUMYX, GHMRGHCPGN COYMOYK PM CHASX VY IKHIYK MH WUSS MOY XEPGN TUG "MOY WHAGM,"EYM ULOUTYX MH WUSS OPT "ZUMOYK.""OY OUX UGHMOYK LMKHRY UVHAM OUSZ UG OHAK UNH. WHAKUNY, TE ZKPYGX..."IPYKKY'L TPGX CUL PG LAWO U WHGZALYX LMUMY MOUM MOY CHKX "LMKHRY"LANNYLMYX MH OPT U VSHC ZKHT LHTYMOPGN. OY SHHRYX UM IKPGWY BULPSPPG IYKISYDPME, UGX HGSE SUMYK NKULIYX MOUM U LMKHRY CUL UG UMMUWR HZPSSGYLL. IKPGWY BULPSP LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH SHKKUPG PG IULLPGN UGX CYGMMOKHANO MOY XHHK HG MPIMHY. OY WHASX GHM CUSR CYSS HG MPIMHY UGX OPLCOHSY VHXE QYKRYX UM YUWO LMYI. MOY YSXYLM IKPGWYLL ZHSSHCYX OPT, UGXMOY IKPYLML UGX XYUWHGL UGX LHTY LYKBUGML USLH CYGM PG UM MOY XHHK.MOKHANO MOUM XHHK CUL OYUKX U GHPLY HZ MOPGNL VYPGN THBYX UVHAM, UGX UMSULM UGGU TPROUESHBGU, LMPSS CPMO MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG, IUSY VAM KYLHSAMYPG MOY XPLWOUKNY HZ XAME, KUG HAM UGX MHAWOPGN IPYKKY SPNOMSE HG MOY UKTLUPX:"MOY XPBPGY TYKWE PL PGYDOUALMPVSY! AGWMPHG PL UVHAM MH VY UXTPGPLMYKYX.WHTY."IPYKKY CYGM PG UM MOY XHHK, LMYIIPGN HG MOY LHZM WUKIYM, UGX GHMPWYXMOUM MOY LMKUGNY SUXE, MOY UPXY-XY-WUTI, UGX LHTY HZ MOY LYKBUGML, USSZHSSHCYX OPT PG, UL PZ MOYKY CYKY GHC GH ZAKMOYK GYYX ZHK IYKTPLLPHG MHYGMYK MOUM KHHT.WOUIMYK DDPPPIPYKKY CYSS RGYC MOPL SUKNY KHHT XPBPXYX VE WHSATGL UGX UG UKWO, PMLCUSSL OAGN KHAGX CPMO IYKLPUG WUKIYML. MOY IUKM HZ MOY KHHT VYOPGX MOYWHSATGL, CPMO U OPNO LPSR-WAKMUPGYX TUOHNUGE VYXLMYUX HG HGY LPXY UGXHG MOY HMOYK UG PTTYGLY WULY WHGMUPGPGN PWHGL, CUL VKPNOMSE PSSATPGUMYXCPMO KYX SPNOM SPRY U KALLPUG WOAKWO XAKPGN YBYGPGN LYKBPWY. AGXYKMOY NSYUTPGN PWHGL LMHHX U SHGN PGBUSPX WOUPK, UGX PG MOUM WOUPKHG LGHCE-COPMY LTHHMO IPSSHCL, YBPXYGMSE ZKYLOSE WOUGNYX, IPYKKYLUC--WHBYKYX MH MOY CUPLM VE U VKPNOM NKYYG JAPSM--MOY ZUTPSPUK,TUQYLMPW ZPNAKY HZ OPL ZUMOYK, WHAGM VYFAROHB, CPMO MOUM NKUE TUGY HZOUPK UVHBY OPL VKHUX ZHKYOYUX COPWO KYTPGXYX HGY HZ U SPHG, UGX MOY XYYIWOUKUWMYKPLMPWUSSE GHVSY CKPGRSYL HZ OPL OUGXLHTY, KAXXE ZUWY. OY SUEQALM AGXYK MOY PWHGL; OPL SUKNY MOPWR OUGXL HAMLPXY MOY JAPSM. PGMH MOYKPNOM OUGX, COPWO CUL SEPGN IUST XHCGCUKXL, U CUD MUIYK OUX VYYG MOKALMVYMCYYG ZHKYZPGNYK UGX MOATV, UGX UG HSX LYKBUGM, VYGXPGN HBYK ZKHTVYOPGX MOY WOUPK, OYSX PM PG IHLPMPHG. VE MOY WOUPK LMHHX MOY IKPYLML,MOYPK SHGN OUPK ZUSSPGN HBYK MOYPK TUNGPZPWYGM NSPMMYKPGN BYLMTYGML,CPMO SPNOMYX MUIYKL PG MOYPK OUGXL, LSHCSE UGX LHSYTGSE WHGXAWMPGN MOYLYKBPWY. U SPMMSY VYOPGX MOYT LMHHX MOY MCH EHAGNYK IKPGWYLLYL OHSXPGNOUGXRYKWOPYZL MH MOYPK YEYL, UGX QALM PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT MOYPK YSXYLMLPLMYK, WUMPWOY, CPMO U BPWPHAL UGX XYMYKTPGYX SHHR LMYUXPSE ZPDYX HGMOY PWHGL, UL MOHANO XYWSUKPGN MH USS MOUM LOY WHASX GHM UGLCYKZHK OYKLYSZ LOHASX LOY NSUGWY KHAGX. UGGU TPROUESHBGU, CPMO U TYYR,LHKKHCZAS, UGX USS-ZHKNPBPGN YDIKYLLPHG HG OYK ZUWY, LMHHX VE MOY XHHKGYUK MOY LMKUGNY SUXE. IKPGWY BULPSP PG ZKHGM HZ MOY XHHK, GYUK MOYPGBUSPX WOUPK, U CUD MUIYK PG OPL SYZM OUGX, CUL SYUGPGN OPL SYZM UKT HGMOY WUKBYX VUWR HZ U BYSBYM WOUPK OY OUX MAKGYX KHAGX ZHK MOY IAKIHLY,UGX CUL WKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO OPL KPNOM OUGX, MAKGPGN OPL YEYL AICUKXYUWO MPTY OY MHAWOYX OPL ZHKYOYUX. OPL ZUWY CHKY U WUST SHHR HZ IPYMEUGX KYLPNGUMPHG MH MOY CPSS HZ NHX. "PZ EHA XH GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYLYLYGMPTYGML," OY LYYTYX MH VY LUEPGN, "LH TAWO MOY CHKLY ZHK EHA!"VYOPGX OPT LMHHX MOY UPXY-XY-WUTI, MOY XHWMHKL, UGX MOY TYGLYKBUGML;MOY TYG UGX CHTYG OUX LYIUKUMYX UL PG WOAKWO. USS CYKY LPSYGMSE WKHLLPGNMOYTLYSBYL, UGX MOY KYUXPGN HZ MOY WOAKWO LYKBPWY, MOY LAVXAYX WOUGMPGNHZ XYYI VULL BHPWYL, UGX PG MOY PGMYKBUSL LPNOL UGX MOY LOAZZSPGN HZZYYM CYKY MOY HGSE LHAGXL MOUM WHASX VY OYUKX. UGGU TPROUESHBGU, CPMO UGUPK HZ PTIHKMUGWY MOUM LOHCYX MOUM LOY ZYSM LOY JAPMY RGYC COUM LOY CULUVHAM, CYGM UWKHLL MOY KHHT MH COYKY IPYKKY CUL LMUGXPGN UGX NUBY OPTU MUIYK. OY SPM PM UGX, XPLMKUWMYX VE HVLYKBPGN MOHLY UKHAGX OPT, VYNUGWKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO MOY OUGX MOUM OYSX MOY MUIYK.LHIOPY, MOY KHLE, SUANOMYK-SHBPGN, EHAGNYLM IKPGWYLL CPMO MOY THSY,CUMWOYX OPT. LOY LTPSYX, OPX OYK ZUWY PG OYK OUGXRYKWOPYZ, UGX KYTUPGYXCPMO PM OPXXYG ZHK UCOPSY; MOYG SHHRPGN AI UGX LYYPGN IPYKKY LOYUNUPG VYNUG MH SUANO. LOY YBPXYGMSE ZYSM AGUVSY MH SHHR UM OPTCPMOHAM SUANOPGN, VAM WHASX GHM KYLPLM SHHRPGN UM OPT: LH MH VY HAM HZMYTIMUMPHG LOY LSPIIYX JAPYMSE VYOPGX HGY HZ MOY WHSATGL. PG MOY TPXLMHZ MOY LYKBPWY MOY BHPWYL HZ MOY IKPYLML LAXXYGSE WYULYX, MOYE COPLIYKYXMH HGY UGHMOYK, UGX MOY HSX LYKBUGM COH CUL OHSXPGN MOY WHAGM'L OUGX NHMAI UGX LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH MOY SUXPYL. UGGU TPROUESHBGU LMYIIYX ZHKCUKXUGX, LMHHIPGN HBYK MOY XEPGN TUG, VYWRHGYX MH SHKKUPG ZKHT VYOPGX OYKVUWR. MOY ZKYGWO XHWMHK OYSX GH MUIYK; OY CUL SYUGPGN UNUPGLM HGY HZ MOYWHSATGL PG U KYLIYWMZAS UMMPMAXY PTISEPGN MOUM OY, U ZHKYPNGYK, PG LIPMYHZ USS XPZZYKYGWYL HZ ZUPMO, AGXYKLMHHX MOY ZASS PTIHKMUGWY HZ MOY KPMYGHC VYPGN IYKZHKTYX UGX YBYG UIIKHBYX HZ PM. OY GHC UIIKHUWOYX MOYLPWR TUG CPMO MOY GHPLYSYLL LMYI HZ HGY PG ZASS BPNHK HZ SPZY, CPMO OPLXYSPWUMY COPMY ZPGNYKL KUPLYX ZKHT MOY NKYYG JAPSM MOY OUGX MOUM CULZKYY, UGX MAKGPGN LPXYCUEL ZYSM MOY IASLY UGX KYZSYWMYX U THTYGM. MOYLPWR TUG CUL NPBYG LHTYMOPGN MH XKPGR, MOYKY CUL U LMPK UKHAGX OPT, MOYGMOY IYHISY KYLATYX MOYPK ISUWYL UGX MOY LYKBPWY WHGMPGAYX. XAKPGN MOPLPGMYKBUS IPYKKY GHMPWYX MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP SYZM MOY WOUPK HG COPWO OYOUX VYYG SYUGPGN, UGX--CPMO UG UPK COPWO PGMPTUMYX MOUM OY RGYC COUM OYCUL UVHAM UGX PZ HMOYKL XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT PM CUL LH TAWO MOY CHKLYZHK MOYT--XPX GHM NH AI MH MOY XEPGN TUG, VAM IULLYX VE OPT, QHPGYX MOYYSXYLM IKPGWYLL, UGX THBYX CPMO OYK MH MOY LPXY HZ MOY KHHT COYKY LMHHXMOY OPNO VYXLMYUX CPMO PML LPSRYG OUGNPGNL. HG SYUBPGN MOY VYX VHMOIKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOY IKPGWYLL IULLYX HAM VE U VUWR XHHK, VAM KYMAKGYXMH MOYPK ISUWYL HGY UZMYK MOY HMOYK VYZHKY MOY LYKBPWY CUL WHGWSAXYX.IPYKKY IUPX GH THKY UMMYGMPHG MH MOPL HWWAKKYGWY MOUG MH MOY KYLM HZCOUM CYGM HG, OUBPGN TUXY AI OPL TPGX HGWY ZHK USS MOUM COUM OY LUCOUIIYGPGN UKHAGX OPT MOUM YBYGPGN CUL PG LHTY CUE YLLYGMPUS.MOY WOUGMPGN HZ MOY LYKBPWY WYULYX, UGX MOY BHPWY HZ MOY IKPYLM CULOYUKX KYLIYWMZASSE WHGNKUMASUMPGN MOY XEPGN TUG HG OUBPGN KYWYPBYX MOYLUWKUTYGM. MOY XEPGN TUG SUE UL SPZYSYLL UGX PTTHBUVSY UL VYZHKY. UKHAGXOPT YBYKEHGY VYNUG MH LMPK: LMYIL CYKY UAXPVSY UGX COPLIYKL, UTHGN COPWOUGGU TPROUESHBGU'L CUL MOY THLM XPLMPGWM.IPYKKY OYUKX OYK LUE:"WYKMUPGSE OY TALM VY THBYX HGMH MOY VYX; OYKY PM CPSS VY PTIHLLPVSY..."MOY LPWR TUG CUL LH LAKKHAGXYX VE XHWMHKL, IKPGWYLLYL, UGX LYKBUGMLMOUM IPYKKY WHASX GH SHGNYK LYY MOY KYXXPLO-EYSSHC ZUWY CPMO PML NKUETUGY--COPWO, MOHANO OY LUC HMOYK ZUWYL UL CYSS, OY OUX GHM SHLM LPNOM HZZHK U LPGNSY THTYGM XAKPGN MOY COHSY LYKBPWY. OY QAXNYX VE MOY WUAMPHALTHBYTYGML HZ MOHLY COH WKHCXYX KHAGX MOY PGBUSPX WOUPK MOUM MOYE OUXSPZMYX MOY XEPGN TUG UGX CYKY THBPGN OPT."WUMWO OHSX HZ TE UKT HK EHA'SS XKHI OPT!" OY OYUKX HGY HZ MOY LYKBUGMLLUE PG U ZKPNOMYGYX COPLIYK. "WUMWO OHSX ZKHT AGXYKGYUMO. OYKY!"YDWSUPTYX XPZZYKYGM BHPWYL; UGX MOY OYUBE VKYUMOPGN HZ MOY VYUKYKL UGXMOY LOAZZSPGN HZ MOYPK ZYYM NKYC THKY OAKKPYX, UL PZ MOY CYPNOM MOYECYKY WUKKEPGN CYKY MHH TAWO ZHK MOYT.UL MOY VYUKYKL, UTHGN COHT CUL UGGU TPROUESHBGU, IULLYX MOY EHAGN TUGOY WUANOM U THTYGMUKE NSPTILY VYMCYYG MOYPK OYUXL UGX VUWRL HZ MOY XEPGNTUG'L OPNO, LMHAM, AGWHBYKYX WOYLM UGX IHCYKZAS LOHASXYKL, KUPLYX VEMOHLY COH CYKY OHSXPGN OPT AGXYK MOY UKTIPML, UGX HZ OPL NKUE, WAKSE,SYHGPGY OYUX. MOPL OYUX, CPMO PML KYTUKRUVSE VKHUX VKHC UGX WOYYRVHGYL,PML OUGXLHTY, LYGLAUS THAMO, UGX PML WHSX, TUQYLMPW YDIKYLLPHG, CULGHM XPLZPNAKYX VE MOY UIIKHUWO HZ XYUMO. PM CUL MOY LUTY UL IPYKKYKYTYTVYKYX PM MOKYY THGMOL VYZHKY, COYG MOY WHAGM OUX LYGM OPT MHIYMYKLVAKN. VAM GHC MOPL OYUX CUL LCUEPGN OYSISYLLSE CPMO MOY AGYBYGTHBYTYGML HZ MOY VYUKYKL, UGX MOY WHSX SPLMSYLL NUFY ZPDYX PMLYSZ AIHGGHMOPGN.UZMYK U ZYC TPGAMYL' VALMSY VYLPXY MOY OPNO VYXLMYUX, MOHLY COH OUXWUKKPYX MOY LPWR TUG XPLIYKLYX. UGGU TPROUESHBGU MHAWOYX IPYKKY'L OUGXUGX LUPX, "WHTY." IPYKKY CYGM CPMO OYK MH MOY VYX HG COPWO MOY LPWRTUG OUX VYYG SUPX PG U LMUMYSE IHLY PG RYYIPGN CPMO MOY WYKYTHGE QALMWHTISYMYX. OY SUE CPMO OPL OYUX IKHIIYX OPNO HG MOY IPSSHCL. OPL OUGXLCYKY LETTYMKPWUSSE ISUWYX HG MOY NKYYG LPSR JAPSM, MOY IUSTL XHCGCUKX.COYG IPYKKY WUTY AI MOY WHAGM CUL NUFPGN LMKUPNOM UM OPT, VAM CPMO USHHR MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ COPWO WHASX GHM VY AGXYKLMHHX VE THKMUS TUG.YPMOYK MOPL SHHR TYUGM GHMOPGN VAM MOUM UL SHGN UL HGY OUL YEYL MOYETALM SHHR LHTYCOYKY, HK PM TYUGM MHH TAWO. IPYKKY OYLPMUMYX, GHM RGHCPGNCOUM MH XH, UGX NSUGWYX PGJAPKPGNSE UM OPL NAPXY. UGGU TPROUESHBGU TUXYU OAKKPYX LPNG CPMO OYK YEYL, NSUGWPGN UM MOY LPWR TUG'L OUGX UGX THBPGNOYK SPIL UL PZ MH LYGX PM U RPLL. IPYKKY, WUKYZASSE LMKYMWOPGN OPL GYWRLH UL GHM MH MHAWO MOY JAPSM, ZHSSHCYX OYK LANNYLMPHG UGX IKYLLYX OPLSPIL MH MOY SUKNY VHGYX, ZSYLOE OUGX. GYPMOYK MOY OUGX GHK ULPGNSY TALWSY HZ MOY WHAGM'L ZUWY LMPKKYX. HGWY THKY IPYKKY SHHRYXJAYLMPHGPGNSE UM UGGU TPROUESHBGU MH LYY COUM OY CUL MH XH GYDM. UGGUTPROUESHBGU CPMO OYK YEYL PGXPWUMYX U WOUPK MOUM LMHHX VYLPXY MOY VYX.IPYKKY HVYXPYGMSE LUM XHCG, OPL YEYL ULRPGN PZ OY CYKY XHPGN KPNOM.UGGU TPROUESHBGU GHXXYX UIIKHBPGNSE. UNUPG IPYKKY ZYSS PGMH MOY GUPBYSELETTYMKPWUS IHLY HZ UG YNEIMPUG LMUMAY, YBPXYGMSE XPLMKYLLYX MOUM OPLLMHAM UGX WSATLE VHXE MHHR AI LH TAWO KHHT UGX XHPGN OPL AMTHLM MH SHHRUL LTUSS UL IHLLPVSY. OY SHHRYX UM MOY WHAGM, COH LMPSS NUFYX UM MOYLIHM COYKY IPYKKY'L ZUWY OUX VYYG VYZHKY OY LUM XHCG. UGGU TPROUESHBGUPGXPWUMYX VE OYK UMMPMAXY OYK WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY IUMOYMPW PTIHKMUGWYHZ MOYLY SULM THTYGML HZ TYYMPGN VYMCYYG MOY ZUMOYK UGX LHG. MOPL SULMYXUVHAM MCH TPGAMYL, COPWO MH IPYKKY LYYTYX UG OHAK. LAXXYGSE MOY VKHUXTALWSYL UGX SPGYL HZ MOY WHAGM'L ZUWY VYNUG MH MCPMWO. MOY MCPMWOPGNPGWKYULYX, MOY OUGXLHTY THAMO CUL XKUCG MH HGY LPXY (HGSE GHC XPX IPYKKYKYUSPFY OHC GYUK XYUMO OPL ZUMOYK CUL), UGX ZKHT MOUM XPLMHKMYX THAMOPLLAYX UG PGXPLMPGWM, OHUKLY LHAGX. UGGU TPROUESHBGU SHHRYX UMMYGMPBYSEUM MOY LPWR TUG'L YEYL, MKEPGN MH NAYLL COUM OY CUGMYX; LOY IHPGMYXZPKLM MH IPYKKY, MOYG MH LHTY XKPGR, MOYG GUTYX IKPGWY BULPSP PG UGPGJAPKPGN COPLIYK, MOYG IHPGMYX MH MOY JAPSM. MOY YEYL UGX ZUWY HZ MOYLPWR TUG LOHCYX PTIUMPYGWY. OY TUXY UG YZZHKM MH SHHR UM MOY LYKBUGM COHLMHHX WHGLMUGMSE UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY VYX."CUGML MH MAKG HG MOY HMOYK LPXY," COPLIYKYX MOY LYKBUGM, UGX NHM AI MHMAKG MOY WHAGM'L OYUBE VHXE MHCUKX MOY CUSS.IPYKKY KHLY MH OYSI OPT.COPSY MOY WHAGM CUL VYPGN MAKGYX HBYK, HGY HZ OPL UKTL ZYSS VUWROYSISYLLSE UGX OY TUXY U ZKAPMSYLL YZZHKM MH IASS PM ZHKCUKX. COYMOYK OYGHMPWYX MOY SHHR HZ MYKKHK CPMO COPWO IPYKKY KYNUKXYX MOUM SPZYSYLL UKT,HK COYMOYK LHTY HMOYK MOHANOM ZSPMMYX UWKHLL OPL XEPGN VKUPG, UM UGEKUMY OY NSUGWYX UM MOY KYZKUWMHKE UKT, UM IPYKKY'L MYKKHK-LMKPWRYG ZUWY,UGX UNUPG UM MOY UKT, UGX HG OPL ZUWY U ZYYVSY, IPMYHAL LTPSY UIIYUKYX,JAPMY HAM HZ RYYIPGN CPMO OPL ZYUMAKYL, MOUM LYYTYX MH XYKPXY OPL HCGOYSISYLLGYLL. UM LPNOM HZ MOPL LTPSY IPYKKY ZYSM UG AGYDIYWMYX JAPBYKPGNPG OPL VKYULM UGX U MPWRSPGN PG OPL GHLY, UGX MYUKL XPTTYX OPL YEYL. MOYLPWR TUG CUL MAKGYX HG MH OPL LPXY CPMO OPL ZUWY MH MOY CUSS. OY LPNOYX."OY PL XHFPGN," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, HVLYKBPGN MOUM HGY HZ MOYIKPGWYLLYL CUL WHTPGN MH MURY OYK MAKG UM CUMWOPGN. "SYM AL NH."IPYKKY CYGM HAM.WOUIMYK DDPBMOYKY CUL GHC GH HGY PG MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT YDWYIM IKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOYYSXYLM IKPGWYLL, COH CYKY LPMMPGN AGXYK MOY IHKMKUPM HZ WUMOYKPGY MOYNKYUM UGX MUSRPGN YUNYKSE. UL LHHG UL MOYE LUC IPYKKY UGX OPL WHTIUGPHGMOYE VYWUTY LPSYGM, UGX IPYKKY MOHANOM OY LUC MOY IKPGWYLL OPXYLHTYMOPGN UL LOY COPLIYKYX:"P WUG'M VYUK MOY LPNOM HZ MOUM CHTUG.""WUMPWOY OUL OUX MYU LYKBYX PG MOY LTUSS XKUCPGN KHHT," LUPX IKPGWYBULPSP MH UGGU TPROUESHBGU. "NH UGX MURY LHTYMOPGN, TE IHHK UGGUTPROUESHBGU, HK EHA CPSS GHM OHSX HAM."MH IPYKKY OY LUPX GHMOPGN, TYKYSE NPBPGN OPL UKT U LETIUMOYMPW LJAYYFYVYSHC MOY LOHASXYK. IPYKKY CYGM CPMO UGGU TPROUESHBGU PGMH MOY LTUSSXKUCPGN KHHT."MOYKY PL GHMOPGN LH KYZKYLOPGN UZMYK U LSYYISYLL GPNOM UL U WAI HZ MOPLXYSPWPHAL KALLPUG MYU," SHKKUPG CUL LUEPGN CPMO UG UPK HZ KYLMKUPGYXUGPTUMPHG UL OY LMHHX LPIIPGN MYU ZKHT U XYSPWUMY WOPGYLY OUGXSYSYLLWAI VYZHKY U MUVSY HG COPWO MYU UGX U WHSX LAIIYK CYKY SUPX PG MOY LTUSSWPKWASUK KHHT. UKHAGX MOY MUVSY USS COH CYKY UM WHAGM VYFAROHB'L OHALYMOUM GPNOM OUX NUMOYKYX MH ZHKMPZE MOYTLYSBYL. IPYKKY CYSS KYTYTVYKYXMOPL LTUSS WPKWASUK XKUCPGN KHHT CPMO PML TPKKHKL UGX SPMMSY MUVSYL.XAKPGN VUSSL NPBYG UM MOY OHALY IPYKKY, COH XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH XUGWY,OUX SPRYX LPMMPGN PG MOPL KHHT MH CUMWO MOY SUXPYL COH, UL MOYE IULLYXMOKHANO PG MOYPK VUSS XKYLLYL CPMO XPUTHGXL UGX IYUKSL HG MOYPK VUKYLOHASXYKL, SHHRYX UM MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY VKPSSPUGMSE SPNOMYX TPKKHKL COPWOKYIYUMYX MOYPK KYZSYWMPHGL LYBYKUS MPTYL. GHC MOPL LUTY KHHT CUL XPTSESPNOMYX VE MCH WUGXSYL. HG HGY LTUSS MUVSY MYU MOPGNL UGX LAIIYK XPLOYLLMHHX PG XPLHKXYK, UGX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY GPNOM U THMSYE MOKHGNHZ IYHISY LUM MOYKY, GHM TYKKETURPGN, VAM LHTVYKSE COPLIYKPGN, UGXVYMKUEPGN VE YBYKE CHKX UGX THBYTYGM MOUM MOYE GHGY HZ MOYT ZHKNHM COUMCUL OUIIYGPGN UGX COUM CUL UVHAM MH OUIIYG PG MOY VYXKHHT. IPYKKY XPXGHM YUM UGEMOPGN MOHANO OY CHASX BYKE TAWO OUBY SPRYX MH. OY SHHRYXPGJAPKPGNSE UM OPL THGPMKYLL UGX LUC MOUM LOY CUL UNUPG NHPGN HG MPIMHYMH MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT COYKY MOYE OUX SYZM IKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOY YSXYLMIKPGWYLL. IPYKKY WHGWSAXYX MOUM MOPL USLH CUL YLLYGMPUS, UGX UZMYK ULOHKM PGMYKBUS ZHSSHCYX OYK. UGGU TPROUESHBGU CUL LMUGXPGN VYLPXY MOYIKPGWYLL, UGX MOYE CYKY VHMO LIYURPGN PG YDWPMYX COPLIYKL."IYKTPM TY, IKPGWYLL, MH RGHC COUM PL GYWYLLUKE UGX COUM PL GHMGYWYLLUKE," LUPX MOY EHAGNYK HZ MOY MCH LIYURYKL, YBPXYGMSE PG MOY LUTYLMUMY HZ YDWPMYTYGM UL COYG LOY OUX LSUTTYX MOY XHHK HZ OYK KHHT."VAM, TE XYUK IKPGWYLL," UGLCYKYX UGGU TPROUESHBGU VSUGXSE VAMPTIKYLLPBYSE, VSHWRPGN MOY CUE MH MOY VYXKHHT UGX IKYBYGMPGN MOY HMOYKZKHT IULLPGN, "CHG'M MOPL VY MHH TAWO ZHK IHHK AGWSY UM U THTYGM COYG OYGYYXL KYIHLY? CHKSXSE WHGBYKLUMPHG UM U THTYGM COYG OPL LHAS PL USKYUXEIKYIUKYX..."IKPGWY BULPSP CUL LYUMYX PG UG YULE WOUPK PG OPL ZUTPSPUK UMMPMAXY, CPMOHGY SYN WKHLLYX OPNO UVHBY MOY HMOYK. OPL WOYYRL, COPWO CYKY LH ZSUVVEMOUM MOYE SHHRYX OYUBPYK VYSHC, CYKY MCPMWOPGN BPHSYGMSE; VAM OY CHKYMOY UPK HZ U TUG SPMMSY WHGWYKGYX PG COUM MOY MCH SUXPYL CYKY LUEPGN."WHTY, TE XYUK UGGU TPROUESHBGU, SYM WUMPWOY XH UL LOY ISYULYL. EHA RGHCOHC ZHGX MOY WHAGM PL HZ OYK.""P XHG'M YBYG RGHC COUM PL PG MOPL IUIYK," LUPX MOY EHAGNYK HZ MOY MCHSUXPYL, UXXKYLLPGN IKPGWY BULPSP UGX IHPGMPGN MH UG PGSUPX IHKMZHSPH LOYOYSX PG OYK OUGX. "USS P RGHC PL MOUM OPL KYUS CPSS PL PG OPL CKPMPGNMUVSY, UGX MOPL PL U IUIYK OY OUL ZHKNHMMYG...."LOY MKPYX MH IULL UGGU TPROUESHBGU, VAM MOY SUMMYK LIKUGN LH UL MH VUKOYK IUMO."P RGHC, TE XYUK, RPGX IKPGWYLL," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, LYPFPGN MOYIHKMZHSPH LH ZPKTSE MOUM PM CUL ISUPG LOY CHASX GHM SYM NH YULPSE."XYUK IKPGWYLL, P VYN UGX PTISHKY EHA, OUBY LHTY IPME HG OPT! QY BHAL YGWHGQAKY..."MOY IKPGWYLL XPX GHM KYISE. MOYPK YZZHKML PG MOY LMKANNSY ZHK MOYIHKMZHSPH CYKY MOY HGSE LHAGXL UAXPVSY, VAM PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM PZMOY IKPGWYLL XPX LIYUR, OYK CHKXL CHASX GHM VY ZSUMMYKPGN MH UGGUTPROUESHBGU. MOHANO MOY SUMMYK OYSX HG MYGUWPHALSE, OYK BHPWY SHLM GHGYHZ PML OHGYEYX ZPKTGYLL UGX LHZMGYLL."IPYKKY, TE XYUK, WHTY OYKY. P MOPGR OY CPSS GHM VY HAM HZ ISUWY PG UZUTPSE WHGLASMUMPHG; PL PM GHM LH, IKPGWY?""COE XHG'M EHA LIYUR, WHALPG?" LAXXYGSE LOKPYRYX MOY IKPGWYLL LH SHAXMOUM MOHLY PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT OYUKX OYK UGX CYKY LMUKMSYX. "COE XH EHAKYTUPG LPSYGM COYG OYUBYG RGHCL COH IYKTPML OYKLYSZ MH PGMYKZYKY, TURPGNU LWYGY HG MOY BYKE MOKYLOHSX HZ U XEPGN TUG'L KHHT? PGMKPNAYK!" LOYOPLLYX BPWPHALSE, UGX MANNYX CPMO USS OYK TPNOM UM MOY IHKMZHSPH.VAM UGGU TPROUESHBGU CYGM ZHKCUKX U LMYI HK MCH MH RYYI OYK OHSX HG MOYIHKMZHSPH, UGX WOUGNYX OYK NKPI.IKPGWY BULPSP KHLY. "HO!" LUPX OY CPMO KYIKHUWO UGX LAKIKPLY, "MOPL PLUVLAKX! WHTY, SYM NH P MYSS EHA."MOY IKPGWYLL SYM NH."UGX EHA MHH!"VAM UGGU TPROUESHBGU XPX GHM HVYE OPT."SYM NH, P MYSS EHA! P CPSS MURY MOY KYLIHGLPVPSPME. P TELYSZ CPSS NHUGX ULR OPT, P!... XHYL MOUM LUMPLZE EHA?""VAM, IKPGWY," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, "UZMYK LAWO U LHSYTG LUWKUTYGM,USSHC OPT U THTYGM'L IYUWY! OYKY, IPYKKY, MYSS MOYT EHAK HIPGPHG," LUPXLOY, MAKGPGN MH MOY EHAGN TUG COH, OUBPGN WHTY JAPMY WSHLY, CUL NUFPGNCPMO ULMHGPLOTYGM UM MOY UGNKE ZUWY HZ MOY IKPGWYLL COPWO OUX SHLM USSXPNGPME, UGX UM MOY MCPMWOPGN WOYYRL HZ IKPGWY BULPSP."KYTYTVYK MOUM EHA CPSS UGLCYK ZHK MOY WHGLYJAYGWYL," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSPLYBYKYSE. "EHA XHG'M RGHC COUM EHA UKY XHPGN.""BPSY CHTUG!" LOHAMYX MOY IKPGWYLL, XUKMPGN AGYDIYWMYXSE UM UGGUTPROUESHBGU UGX LGUMWOPGN MOY IHKMZHSPH ZKHT OYK.IKPGWY BULPSP VYGM OPL OYUX UGX LIKYUX HAM OPL OUGXL.UM MOPL THTYGM MOUM MYKKPVSY XHHK, COPWO IPYKKY OUX CUMWOYX LH SHGNUGX COPWO OUX USCUEL HIYGYX LH JAPYMSE, VAKLM GHPLPSE HIYG UGX VUGNYXUNUPGLM MOY CUSS, UGX MOY LYWHGX HZ MOY MOKYY LPLMYKL KALOYX HAMCKPGNPGN OYK OUGXL."COUM UKY EHA XHPGN!" LOY WKPYX BYOYTYGMSE. "OY PL XEPGN UGX EHA SYUBYTY USHGY CPMO OPT!"OYK LPLMYK XKHIIYX MOY IHKMZHSPH. UGGU TPROUESHBGU, LMHHIPGN, JAPWRSEWUANOM AI MOY HVQYWM HZ WHGMYGMPHG UGX KUG PGMH MOY VYXKHHT. MOY YSXYLMIKPGWYLL UGX IKPGWY BULPSP, KYWHBYKPGN MOYTLYSBYL, ZHSSHCYX OYK. U ZYCTPGAMYL SUMYK MOY YSXYLM LPLMYK WUTY HAM CPMO U IUSY OUKX ZUWY, UNUPGVPMPGN OYK AGXYKSPI. UM LPNOM HZ IPYKKY OYK YDIKYLLPHG LOHCYX UGPKKYIKYLLPVSY OUMKYX."EYL, GHC EHA TUE VY NSUX!" LUPX LOY; "MOPL PL COUM EHA OUBY VYYGCUPMPGN ZHK." UGX VAKLMPGN PGMH MYUKL LOY OPX OYK ZUWY PG OYKOUGXRYKWOPYZ UGX KALOYX ZKHT MOY KHHT.IKPGWY BULPSP WUTY GYDM. OY LMUNNYKYX MH MOY LHZU HG COPWO IPYKKY CULLPMMPGN UGX XKHIIYX HGMH PM, WHBYKPGN OPL ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGX. IPYKKYGHMPWYX MOUM OY CUL IUSY UGX MOUM OPL QUC JAPBYKYX UGX LOHHR UL PZ PG UGUNAY."UO, TE ZKPYGX!" LUPX OY, MURPGN IPYKKY VE MOY YSVHC; UGX MOYKY CULPG OPL BHPWY U LPGWYKPME UGX CYURGYLL IPYKKY OUX GYBYK HVLYKBYX PG PMVYZHKY. "OHC HZMYG CY LPG, OHC TAWO CY XYWYPBY, UGX USS ZHK COUM? P UTGYUK LPDME, XYUK ZKPYGX... P MHH... USS CPSS YGX PG XYUMO, USS! XYUMO PLUCZAS..." UGX OY VAKLM PGMH MYUKL.UGGU TPROUESHBGU WUTY HAM SULM. LOY UIIKHUWOYX IPYKKY CPMO LSHC, JAPYMLMYIL."IPYKKY!" LOY LUPX.IPYKKY NUBY OYK UG PGJAPKPGN SHHR. LOY RPLLYX MOY EHAGN TUG HG OPLZHKYOYUX, CYMMPGN OPT CPMO OYK MYUKL. MOYG UZMYK U IUALY LOY LUPX:"OY PL GH THKY...."IPYKKY SHHRYX UM OYK HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL."WHTY, P CPSS NH CPMO EHA. MKE MH CYYI, GHMOPGN NPBYL LAWO KYSPYZ ULMYUKL."LOY SYX OPT PGMH MOY XUKR XKUCPGN KHHT UGX IPYKKY CUL NSUX GH HGY WHASXLYY OPL ZUWY. UGGU TPROUESHBGU SYZM OPT, UGX COYG LOY KYMAKGYX OY CULZULM ULSYYI CPMO OPL OYUX HG OPL UKT.PG MOY THKGPGN UGGU TPROUESHBGU LUPX MH IPYKKY:"EYL, TE XYUK, MOPL PL U NKYUM SHLL ZHK AL USS, GHM MH LIYUR HZ EHA. VAMNHX CPSS LAIIHKM EHA: EHA UKY EHAGN, UGX UKY GHC, P OHIY, PG WHTTUGX HZUG PTTYGLY ZHKMAGY. MOY CPSS OUL GHM EYM VYYG HIYGYX. P RGHC EHA CYSSYGHANO MH VY LAKY MOUM MOPL CPSS GHM MAKG EHAK OYUX, VAM PM PTIHLYLXAMPYL HG EHA, UGX EHA TALM VY U TUG."IPYKKY CUL LPSYGM."IYKOUIL SUMYK HG P TUE MYSS EHA, TE XYUK VHE, MOUM PZ P OUX GHM VYYGMOYKY, NHX HGSE RGHCL COUM CHASX OUBY OUIIYGYX! EHA RGHC, AGWSY IKHTPLYXTY HGSE MOY XUE VYZHKY EYLMYKXUE GHM MH ZHKNYM VHKPL. VAM OY OUX GHMPTY. P OHIY, TE XYUK ZKPYGX, EHA CPSS WUKKE HAM EHAK ZUMOYK'L CPLO?"IPYKKY AGXYKLMHHX GHMOPGN HZ USS MOPL UGX WHSHKPGN LOESE SHHRYX PGLPSYGWY UM IKPGWYLL UGGU TPROUESHBGU. UZMYK OYK MUSR CPMO IPYKKY, UGGUTPROUESHBGU KYMAKGYX MH MOY KHLMHBL' UGX CYGM MH VYX. HG CURPGN PG MOYTHKGPGN LOY MHSX MOY KHLMHBL UGX USS OYK UWJAUPGMUGWYL MOY XYMUPSL HZWHAGM VYFAROHB'L XYUMO. LOY LUPX MOY WHAGM OUX XPYX UL LOY CHASX OYKLYSZCPLO MH XPY, MOUM OPL YGX CUL GHM HGSE MHAWOPGN VAM YXPZEPGN. UL MH MOYSULM TYYMPGN VYMCYYG ZUMOYK UGX LHG, PM CUL LH MHAWOPGN MOUM LOY WHASXGHM MOPGR HZ PM CPMOHAM MYUKL, UGX XPX GHM RGHC COPWO OUX VYOUBYX VYMMYKXAKPGN MOHLY UCZAS THTYGML--MOY ZUMOYK COH LH KYTYTVYKYX YBYKEMOPGNUGX YBYKEVHXE UM SULM UGX OUX LIHRYG LAWO IUMOYMPW CHKXL MH MOY LHG, HKIPYKKY, COHT PM OUX VYYG IPMPZAS MH LYY, LH LMKPWRYG CUL OY CPMO NKPYZ,MOHANO OY MKPYX OUKX MH OPXY PM PG HKXYK GHM MH LUXXYG OPL XEPGN ZUMOYK."PM PL IUPGZAS, VAM PM XHYL HGY NHHX. PM AISPZML MOY LHAS MH LYY LAWOTYG UL MOY HSX WHAGM UGX OPL CHKMOE LHG," LUPX LOY. HZ MOY VYOUBPHK HZMOY YSXYLM IKPGWYLL UGX IKPGWY BULPSP LOY LIHRY XPLUIIKHBPGNSE, VAM PGCOPLIYKL UGX UL U NKYUM LYWKYM.WOUIMYK DDBUM VUSX OPSSL, IKPGWY GPWOHSUL UGXKYYBPWO VHSRHGLRP'L YLMUMY, MOYUKKPBUS HZ EHAGN IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX OPL CPZY CUL XUPSE YDIYWMYX, VAMMOPL YDIYWMUMPHG XPX GHM AILYM MOY KYNASUK KHAMPGY HZ SPZY PG MOYHSX IKPGWY'L OHALYOHSX. NYGYKUS PG WOPYZ IKPGWY GPWOHSUL UGXKYYBPWO(GPWRGUTYX PG LHWPYME, "MOY RPGN HZ IKALLPU") YBYK LPGWY MOY YTIYKHKIUAS OUX YDPSYX OPT MH OPL WHAGMKE YLMUMY OUX SPBYX MOYKY WHGMPGAHALSECPMO OPL XUANOMYK, IKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX OYK WHTIUGPHG, TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY. MOHANO PG MOY GYC KYPNG OY CUL ZKYY MH KYMAKG MH MOYWUIPMUSL, OY LMPSS WHGMPGAYX MH SPBY PG MOY WHAGMKE, KYTUKRPGN MOUMUGEHGY COH CUGMYX MH LYY OPT WHASX WHTY MOY OAGXKYX TPSYL ZKHT THLWHC MHVUSX OPSSL, COPSY OY OPTLYSZ GYYXYX GH HGY UGX GHMOPGN. OY ALYX MHLUE MOUM MOYKY UKY HGSE MCH LHAKWYL HZ OATUG BPWY--PXSYGYLL UGXLAIYKLMPMPHG, UGX HGSE MCH BPKMAYL--UWMPBPME UGX PGMYSSPNYGWY. OYOPTLYSZ AGXYKMHHR OPL XUANOMYK'L YXAWUMPHG, UGX MH XYBYSHI MOYLY MCHWUKXPGUS BPKMAYL PG OYK NUBY OYK SYLLHGL PG USNYVKU UGX NYHTYMKEMPSS LOY CUL MCYGME, UGX UKKUGNYX OYK SPZY LH MOUM OYK COHSY MPTY CULHWWAIPYX. OY CUL OPTLYSZ USCUEL HWWAIPYX: CKPMPGN OPL TYTHPKL, LHSBPGNIKHVSYTL PG OPNOYK TUMOYTUMPWL, MAKGPGN LGAZZVHDYL HG U SUMOY, CHKRPGNPG MOY NUKXYG, HK LAIYKPGMYGXPGN MOY VAPSXPGN MOUM CUL USCUEL NHPGN HGUM OPL YLMUMY. UL KYNASUKPME PL U IKPTY WHGXPMPHG ZUWPSPMUMPGN UWMPBPME,KYNASUKPME PG OPL OHALYOHSX CUL WUKKPYX MH MOY OPNOYLM IHPGM HZYDUWMPMAXY. OY USCUEL WUTY MH MUVSY AGXYK IKYWPLYSE MOY LUTY WHGXPMPHGL,UGX GHM HGSE UM MOY LUTY OHAK VAM UM MOY LUTY TPGAMY. CPMO MOHLY UVHAMOPT, ZKHT OPL XUANOMYK MH OPL LYKZL, MOY IKPGWY CUL LOUKI UGX PGBUKPUVSEYDUWMPGN, LH MOUM CPMOHAM VYPGN U OUKXOYUKMYX TUG OY PGLIPKYX LAWO ZYUKUGX KYLIYWM UL ZYC OUKXOYUKMYX TYG CHASX OUBY UKHALYX. USMOHANO OY CULPG KYMPKYTYGM UGX OUX GHC GH PGZSAYGWY PG IHSPMPWUS UZZUPKL, YBYKE OPNOHZZPWPUS UIIHPGMYX MH MOY IKHBPGWY PG COPWO MOY IKPGWY'L YLMUMY SUEWHGLPXYKYX PM OPL XAME MH BPLPM OPT UGX CUPMYX PG MOY SHZME UGMYWOUTVYKQALM UL MOY UKWOPMYWM, NUKXYGYK, HK IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX, MPSS MOY IKPGWYUIIYUKYX IAGWMAUSSE MH MOY UIIHPGMYX OHAK. YBYKEHGY LPMMPGN PG MOPLUGMYWOUTVYK YDIYKPYGWYX MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN HZ KYLIYWM UGX YBYG ZYUK COYGMOY YGHKTHALSE OPNO LMAXE XHHK HIYGYX UGX LOHCYX MOY ZPNAKY HZ U KUMOYKLTUSS HSX TUG, CPMO IHCXYKYX CPN, LTUSS CPMOYKYX OUGXL, UGX VALOE NKUEYEYVKHCL COPWO, COYG OY ZKHCGYX, LHTYMPTYL OPX MOY NSYUT HZ OPL LOKYCX,EHAMOZASSE NSPMMYKPGN YEYL.HG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY XUE MOUM MOY EHAGN WHAISY CYKY MH UKKPBY, IKPGWYLLTUKE YGMYKYX MOY UGMYWOUTVYK UL ALAUS UM MOY MPTY UIIHPGMYX ZHK MOYTHKGPGN NKYYMPGN, WKHLLPGN OYKLYSZ CPMO MKYIPXUMPHG UGX KYIYUMPGN ULPSYGM IKUEYK. YBYKE THKGPGN LOY WUTY PG SPRY MOUM, UGX YBYKE THKGPGNIKUEYX MOUM MOY XUPSE PGMYKBPYC TPNOM IULL HZZ CYSS.UG HSX IHCXYKYX TUGLYKBUGM COH CUL LPMMPGN PG MOY UGMYWOUTVYK KHLYJAPYMSE UGX LUPX PG U COPLIYK: "ISYULY CUSR PG."MOKHANO MOY XHHK WUTY MOY KYNASUK OAT HZ U SUMOY. MOY IKPGWYLL MPTPXSEHIYGYX MOY XHHK COPWO THBYX GHPLYSYLLSE UGX YULPSE. LOY IUALYX UM MOYYGMKUGWY. MOY IKPGWY CUL CHKRPGN UM MOY SUMOY UGX UZMYK NSUGWPGN KHAGXWHGMPGAYX OPL CHKR.MOY YGHKTHAL LMAXE CUL ZASS HZ MOPGNL YBPXYGMSE PG WHGLMUGM ALY.MOY SUKNY MUVSY WHBYKYX CPMO VHHRL UGX ISUGL, MOY MUSS NSULL-ZKHGMYXVHHRWULYL CPMO RYEL PG MOY SHWRL, MOY OPNO XYLR ZHK CKPMPGN COPSYLMUGXPGN AI, HG COPWO SUE UG HIYG YDYKWPLY VHHR, UGX MOY SUMOY CPMOMHHSL SUPX KYUXE MH OUGX UGX LOUBPGNL LWUMMYKYX UKHAGX--USS PGXPWUMYXWHGMPGAHAL, BUKPYX, UGX HKXYKSE UWMPBPME. MOY THMPHG HZ MOY LTUSS ZHHMLOHX PG U MUKMUK VHHM YTVKHPXYKYX CPMO LPSBYK, UGX MOY ZPKT IKYLLAKYHZ MOY SYUG LPGYCE OUGX, LOHCYX MOUM MOY IKPGWY LMPSS IHLLYLLYX MOYMYGUWPHAL YGXAKUGWY UGX BPNHK HZ OUKXE HSX UNY. UZMYK U ZYC THKY MAKGLHZ MOY SUMOY OY KYTHBYX OPL ZHHM ZKHT MOY IYXUS, CPIYX OPL WOPLYS,XKHIIYX PM PGMH U SYUMOYK IHAWO UMMUWOYX MH MOY SUMOY, UGX, UIIKHUWOPGNMOY MUVSY, LATTHGYX OPL XUANOMYK. OY GYBYK NUBY OPL WOPSXKYG U VSYLLPGN,LH OY LPTISE OYSX HAM OPL VKPLMSE WOYYR (UL EYM AGLOUBYG) UGX, KYNUKXPGNOYK MYGXYKSE UGX UMMYGMPBYSE, LUPX LYBYKYSE:"JAPMY CYSS? USS KPNOM MOYG, LPM XHCG." OY MHHR MOY YDYKWPLY VHHRWHGMUPGPGN SYLLHGL PG NYHTYMKE CKPMMYG VE OPTLYSZ UGX XKYC AI U WOUPKCPMO OPL ZHHM."ZHK MHTHKKHC!" LUPX OY, JAPWRSE ZPGXPGN MOY IUNY UGX TURPGN U LWKUMWOZKHT HGY IUKUNKUIO MH UGHMOYK CPMO OPL OUKX GUPS.MOY IKPGWYLL VYGM HBYK MOY YDYKWPLY VHHR HG MOY MUVSY."CUPM U VPM, OYKY'L U SYMMYK ZHK EHA," LUPX MOY HSX TUG LAXXYGSE, MURPGNU SYMMYK UXXKYLLYX PG U CHTUG'L OUGX ZKHT U VUN OUGNPGN UVHBY MOY MUVSY,HGMH COPWO OY MOKYC PM.UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY SYMMYK KYX IUMWOYL LOHCYX MOYTLYSBYL HG MOYIKPGWYLL' ZUWY. LOY MHHR PM JAPWRSE UGX VYGM OYK OYUX HBYK PM."ZKHT OYSHPLY?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWY CPMO U WHSX LTPSY MOUM LOHCYX OPL LMPSSLHAGX, EYSSHCPLO MYYMO."EYL, PM'L ZKHT QASPY," KYISPYX MOY IKPGWYLL CPMO U MPTPX NSUGWY UGX UMPTPX LTPSY."P'SS SYM MCH THKY SYMMYKL IULL, VAM MOY MOPKX P'SS KYUX," LUPX MOYIKPGWY LMYKGSE; "P'T UZKUPX EHA CKPMY TAWO GHGLYGLY. P'SS KYUX MOYMOPKX!""KYUX MOPL PZ EHA SPRY, ZUMOYK," LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL, VSALOPGN LMPSS THKYUGX OHSXPGN HAM MOY SYMMYK."MOY MOPKX, P LUPX MOY MOPKX!" WKPYX MOY IKPGWY UVKAIMSE, IALOPGN MOYSYMMYK UCUE, UGX SYUGPGN OPL YSVHCL HG MOY MUVSY OY XKYC MHCUKX OPT MOYYDYKWPLY VHHR WHGMUPGPGN NYHTYMKPWUS ZPNAKYL."CYSS, TUXUT," OY VYNUG, LMHHIPGN HBYK MOY VHHR WSHLY MH OPL XUANOMYKUGX ISUWPGN UG UKT HG MOY VUWR HZ MOY WOUPK HG COPWO LOY LUM, LH MOUMLOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ LAKKHAGXYX HG USS LPXYL VE MOY UWKPX LWYGM HZ HSX UNYUGX MHVUWWH, COPWO LOY OUX RGHCG LH SHGN. "GHC, TUXUT, MOYLY MKPUGNSYLUKY YJAUS; ISYULY GHMY MOUM MOY UGNSY UVW..."MOY IKPGWYLL SHHRYX PG U LWUKYX CUE UM OYK ZUMOYK'L YEYL NSPMMYKPGNWSHLY MH OYK; MOY KYX IUMWOYL HG OYK ZUWY WUTY UGX CYGM, UGX PM CULISUPG MOUM LOY AGXYKLMHHX GHMOPGN UGX CUL LH ZKPNOMYGYX MOUM OYKZYUK CHASX IKYBYGM OYK AGXYKLMUGXPGN UGE HZ OYK ZUMOYK'L ZAKMOYKYDISUGUMPHGL, OHCYBYK WSYUK MOYE TPNOM VY. COYMOYK PM CUL MOY MYUWOYK'LZUASM HK MOY IAIPS'L, MOPL LUTY MOPGN OUIIYGYX YBYKE XUE: MOY IKPGWYLL'YEYL NKYC XPT, LOY WHASX GHM LYY UGX WHASX GHM OYUK UGEMOPGN, VAM CULHGSE WHGLWPHAL HZ OYK LMYKG ZUMOYK'L CPMOYKYX ZUWY WSHLY MH OYK, HZ OPLVKYUMO UGX MOY LTYSS HZ OPT, UGX WHASX MOPGR HGSE HZ OHC MH NYM UCUEJAPWRSE MH OYK HCG KHHT MH TURY HAM MOY IKHVSYT PG IYUWY. MOY HSX TUGCUL VYLPXY OPTLYSZ: THBYX MOY WOUPK HG COPWO OY CUL LPMMPGN GHPLPSEVUWRCUKX UGX ZHKCUKX, TUXY YZZHKML MH WHGMKHS OPTLYSZ UGX GHM VYWHTYBYOYTYGM, VAM USTHLM USCUEL XPX VYWHTY BYOYTYGM, LWHSXYX, UGX LHTYMPTYLZSAGN MOY YDYKWPLY VHHR UCUE.MOY IKPGWYLL NUBY U CKHGN UGLCYK."CYSS GHC, PLG'M LOY U ZHHS!" LOHAMYX MOY IKPGWY, IALOPGN MOY VHHR ULPXYUGX MAKGPGN LOUKISE UCUE; VAM KPLPGN PTTYXPUMYSE, OY IUWYX AI UGX XHCG,SPNOMSE MHAWOYX OPL XUANOMYK'L OUPK UGX LUM XHCG UNUPG.OY XKYC AI OPL WOUPK, UGX WHGMPGAYX MH YDISUPG."MOPL CHG'M XH, IKPGWYLL; PM CHG'M XH," LUPX OY, COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE,OUBPGN MURYG UGX WSHLYX MOY YDYKWPLY VHHR CPMO MOY GYDM XUE'L SYLLHG,CUL UVHAM MH SYUBY: "TUMOYTUMPWL UKY THLM PTIHKMUGM, TUXUT! P XHG'M CUGMMH OUBY EHA SPRY HAK LPSSE SUXPYL. NYM ALYX MH PM UGX EHA'SS SPRY PM,"UGX OY IUMMYX OYK WOYYR. "PM CPSS XKPBY USS MOY GHGLYGLY HAM HZ EHAKOYUX."LOY MAKGYX MH NH, VAM OY LMHIIYX OYK CPMO U NYLMAKY UGX MHHR UG AGWAMVHHR ZKHT MOY OPNO XYLR."OYKY PL LHTY LHKM HZ RYE MH MOY TELMYKPYL MOUM EHAK OYSHPLY OUL LYGMEHA. KYSPNPHAL! P XHG'M PGMYKZYKY CPMO UGEHGY'L VYSPYZ... P OUBY SHHRYXUM PM. MURY PM. CYSS, GHC NH. NH."OY IUMMYX OYK HG MOY LOHASXYK UGX OPTLYSZ WSHLYX MOY XHHK UZMYK OYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM VUWR MH OYK KHHT CPMO MOY LUX, LWUKYX YDIKYLLPHG MOUMKUKYSE SYZM OYK UGX COPWO TUXY OYK ISUPG, LPWRSE ZUWY EYM ISUPGYK. LOYLUM XHCG UM OYK CKPMPGN MUVSY, HG COPWO LMHHX TPGPUMAKY IHKMKUPML UGXCOPWO CUL SPMMYKYX CPMO VHHRL UGX IUIYKL. MOY IKPGWYLL CUL UL AGMPXE ULOYK ZUMOYK CUL MPXE. LOY IAM XHCG MOY NYHTYMKE VHHR UGX YUNYKSE VKHRYMOY LYUS HZ OYK SYMMYK. PM CUL ZKHT OYK THLM PGMPTUMY ZKPYGX ZKHTWOPSXOHHX; MOUM LUTY QASPY RUKUNPGU COH OUX VYYG UM MOY KHLMHBL'GUTY-XUE IUKME.QASPY CKHMY PG ZKYGWO:XYUK UGX IKYWPHAL ZKPYGX, OHC MYKKPVSY UGX ZKPNOMZAS U MOPGN PLLYIUKUMPHG! MOHANO P MYSS TELYSZ MOUM OUSZ TE SPZY UGX OUSZ TE OUIIPGYLLUKY CKUIIYX AI PG EHA, UGX MOUM PG LIPMY HZ MOY XPLMUGWY LYIUKUMPGN ALHAK OYUKML UKY AGPMYX VE PGXPLLHSAVSY VHGXL, TE OYUKM KYVYSL UNUPGLMZUMY UGX PG LIPMY HZ MOY ISYULAKYL UGX XPLMKUWMPHGL UKHAGX TY P WUGGHMHBYKWHTY U WYKMUPG LYWKYM LHKKHC MOUM OUL VYYG PG TE OYUKM YBYK LPGWYCY IUKMYX. COE UKY CY GHM MHNYMOYK UL CY CYKY SULM LATTYK, PG EHAK VPNLMAXE, HG MOY VSAY LHZU, MOY WHGZPXYGMPUS LHZU? COE WUGGHM P GHC, ULMOKYY THGMOL UNH, XKUC ZKYLO THKUS LMKYGNMO ZKHT EHAK SHHR, LH NYGMSY,WUST, UGX IYGYMKUMPGN, U SHHR P SHBYX LH CYSS UGX LYYT MH LYY VYZHKY TYUL P CKPMY?OUBPGN KYUX MOAL ZUK, IKPGWYLL TUKE LPNOYX UGX NSUGWYX PGMH MOY TPKKHKCOPWO LMHHX HG OYK KPNOM. PM KYZSYWMYX U CYUR, AGNKUWYZAS ZPNAKY UGXMOPG ZUWY. OYK YEYL, USCUEL LUX, GHC SHHRYX CPMO IUKMPWASUK OHIYSYLLGYLLUM OYK KYZSYWMPHG PG MOY NSULL. "LOY ZSUMMYKL TY," MOHANOM MOY IKPGWYLL,MAKGPGN UCUE UGX WHGMPGAPGN MH KYUX. VAM QASPY XPX GHM ZSUMMYK OYKZKPYGX, MOY IKPGWYLL' YEYL--SUKNY, XYYI UGX SATPGHAL (PM LYYTYX UL PZ UMMPTYL MOYKY KUXPUMYX ZKHT MOYT LOUZML HZ CUKT SPNOM)--CYKY LH VYUAMPZASMOUM BYKE HZMYG PG LIPMY HZ MOY ISUPGGYLL HZ OYK ZUWY MOYE NUBY OYK UGUMMKUWMPHG THKY IHCYKZAS MOUG MOUM HZ VYUAME. VAM MOY IKPGWYLL GYBYK LUCMOY VYUAMPZAS YDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK HCG YEYL--MOY SHHR MOYE OUX COYG LOYCUL GHM MOPGRPGN HZ OYKLYSZ. UL CPMO YBYKEHGY, OYK ZUWY ULLATYX U ZHKWYXAGGUMAKUS YDIKYLLPHG UL LHHG UL LOY SHHRYX PG U NSULL. LOY CYGM HGKYUXPGN:USS THLWHC MUSRL HZ GHMOPGN VAM CUK. HGY HZ TE MCH VKHMOYKL PL USKYUXEUVKHUX, MOY HMOYK PL CPMO MOY NAUKXL, COH UKY LMUKMPGN HG MOYPK TUKWOMH MOY ZKHGMPYK. HAK XYUK YTIYKHK OUL SYZM IYMYKLVAKN UGX PM PL MOHANOMPGMYGXL MH YDIHLY OPL IKYWPHAL IYKLHG MH MOY WOUGWYL HZ CUK. NHX NKUGMMOUM MOY WHKLPWUG THGLMYK COH PL XYLMKHEPGN MOY IYUWY HZ YAKHIY TUEVY HBYKMOKHCG VE MOY UGNYS COHT PM OUL ISYULYX MOY USTPNOME, PG OPLNHHXGYLL, MH NPBY AL UL LHBYKYPNG! MH LUE GHMOPGN HZ TE VKHMOYKL, MOPLCUK OUL XYIKPBYX TY HZ HGY HZ MOY ULLHWPUMPHGL GYUKYLM TE OYUKM. P TYUGEHAGN GPWOHSUL KHLMHB, COH CPMO OPL YGMOALPULT WHASX GHM VYUK MH KYTUPGPGUWMPBY UGX OUL SYZM MOY AGPBYKLPME MH QHPG MOY UKTE. P CPSS WHGZYLL MHEHA, XYUK TUKE, MOUM PG LIPMY HZ OPL YDMKYTY EHAMO OPL XYIUKMAKY ZHKMOY UKTE CUL U NKYUM NKPYZ MH TY. MOPL EHAGN TUG, HZ COHT P LIHRY MH EHASULM LATTYK, PL LH GHVSY-TPGXYX UGX ZASS HZ MOUM KYUS EHAMOZASGYLL COPWOHGY LYSXHT ZPGXL GHCUXUEL UTHGN HAK HSX TYG HZ MCYGME UGX, IUKMPWASUKSE,OY PL LH ZKUGR UGX OUL LH TAWO OYUKM. OY PL LH IAKY UGX IHYMPW MOUMTE KYSUMPHGL CPMO OPT, MKUGLPYGM UL MOYE CYKY, OUBY VYYG HGY HZ MOYLCYYMYLM WHTZHKML MH TE IHHK OYUKM, COPWO OUL USKYUXE LAZZYKYX LH TAWO.LHTYXUE P CPSS MYSS EHA UVHAM HAK IUKMPGN UGX USS MOUM CUL LUPX MOYG.MOUM PL LMPSS MHH ZKYLO. UO, XYUK ZKPYGX, EHA UKY OUIIE GHM MH RGHCMOYLY IHPNGUGM QHEL UGX LHKKHCL. EHA UKY ZHKMAGUMY, ZHK MOY SUMMYK UKYNYGYKUSSE MOY LMKHGNYK! P RGHC BYKE CYSS MOUM WHAGM GPWOHSUL PL MHHEHAGN YBYK MH VY THKY MH TY MOUG U ZKPYGX, VAM MOPL LCYYM ZKPYGXLOPI,MOPL IHYMPW UGX IAKY PGMPTUWE, CYKY COUM TE OYUKM GYYXYX. VAM YGHANO HZMOPL! MOY WOPYZ GYCL, UVHAM COPWO USS THLWHC NHLLPIL, PL MOY XYUMO HZHSX WHAGM VYFAROHB, UGX OPL PGOYKPMUGWY. ZUGWE! MOY MOKYY IKPGWYLLYLOUBY KYWYPBYX BYKE SPMMSY, IKPGWY BULPSP GHMOPGN, UGX PM PL THGLPYAKIPYKKY COH OUL PGOYKPMYX USS MOY IKHIYKME UGX OUL VYLPXYL VYYGKYWHNGPFYX UL SYNPMPTUMY; LH MOUM OY PL GHC WHAGM VYFAROHB UGX IHLLYLLHKHZ MOY ZPGYLM ZHKMAGY PG KALLPU. PM PL KATHKYX MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP ISUEYXU BYKE XYLIPWUVSY IUKM PG MOPL UZZUPK UGX MOUM OY KYMAKGYX MH IYMYKLVAKNJAPMY WKYLMZUSSYG.P WHGZYLL P AGXYKLMUGX BYKE SPMMSY UVHAM USS MOYLY TUMMYKL HZ CPSSL UGXPGOYKPMUGWY; VAM P XH RGHC MOUM LPGWY MOPL EHAGN TUG, COHT CY USS ALYXMH RGHC UL ISUPG THGLPYAK IPYKKY, OUL VYWHTY WHAGM VYFAROHB UGX MOYHCGYK HZ HGY HZ MOY SUKNYLM ZHKMAGYL PG KALLPU, P UT TAWO UTALYX MHCUMWO MOY WOUGNY PG MOY MHGY UGX TUGGYKL HZ MOY TUTTUL VAKXYGYX VETUKKPUNYUVSY XUANOMYKL, UGX HZ MOY EHAGN SUXPYL MOYTLYSBYL, MHCUKXOPT, MOHANO, VYMCYYG EHA UGX TY, OY USCUEL LYYTYX MH TY U IHHK LHKMHZ ZYSSHC. UL ZHK MOY IULM MCH EYUKL IYHISY OUBY UTALYX MOYTLYSBYLVE ZPGXPGN OALVUGXL ZHK TY (THLM HZ COHT P XHG'M YBYG RGHC), MOYTUMWOTURPGN WOKHGPWSYL HZ THLWHC GHC LIYUR HZ TY UL MOY ZAMAKY WHAGMYLLVYFAROHBU. VAM EHA CPSS AGXYKLMUGX MOUM P OUBY GH XYLPKY ZHK MOY IHLM. UIKHIHL HZ TUKKPUNYL: XH EHA RGHC MOUM U COPSY UNH MOUM AGPBYKLUS UAGMPYUGGU TPROUESHBGU MHSX TY, AGXYK MOY LYUS HZ LMKPWM LYWKYWE, HZ U ISUG HZTUKKPUNY ZHK EHA. PM PL GYPMOYK THKY GHK SYLL MOUG CPMO IKPGWY BULPSP'LLHG UGUMHSY, COHT MOYE CPLO MH KYZHKT VE TUKKEPGN OPT MH LHTYHGY KPWOUGX XPLMPGNAYY, UGX PM PL HG EHA MOUM OPL KYSUMPHGL' WOHPWY OUL ZUSSYG.P XHG'M RGHC COUM EHA CPSS MOPGR HZ PM, VAM P WHGLPXYK PM TE XAME MHSYM EHA RGHC HZ PM. OY PL LUPX MH VY BYKE OUGXLHTY UGX U MYKKPVSYLWUIYNKUWY. MOUM PL USS P OUBY VYYG UVSY MH ZPGX HAM UVHAM OPT.VAM YGHANO HZ NHLLPI. P UT UM MOY YGX HZ TE LYWHGX LOYYM HZ IUIYK,UGX TUTTU OUL LYGM ZHK TY MH NH UGX XPGY UM MOY UIKURLPGL'. KYUX MOYTELMPWUS VHHR P UT LYGXPGN EHA; PM OUL UG YGHKTHAL LAWWYLL OYKY. MOHANOMOYKY UKY MOPGNL PG PM XPZZPWASM ZHK MOY ZYYVSY OATUG TPGX MH NKULI, PMPL UG UXTPKUVSY VHHR COPWO WUSTL UGX YSYBUMYL MOY LHAS. UXPYA! NPBYTE KYLIYWML MH THGLPYAK EHAK ZUMOYK UGX TE WHTISPTYGML MH TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY. P YTVKUWY EHA UL P SHBY EHA.QASPYI.L. SYM TY OUBY GYCL HZ EHAK VKHMOYK UGX OPL WOUKTPGN SPMMSY CPZY.MOY IKPGWYLL IHGXYKYX UCOPSY CPMO U MOHANOMZAS LTPSY UGX OYK SATPGHALYEYL SPM AI LH MOUM OYK ZUWY CUL YGMPKYSE MKUGLZHKTYX. MOYG LOY LAXXYGSEKHLY UGX CPMO OYK OYUBE MKYUX CYGM AI MH MOY MUVSY. LOY MHHR U LOYYM HZIUIYK UGX OYK OUGX THBYX KUIPXSE HBYK PM. MOPL PL MOY KYISE LOY CKHMY,USLH PG ZKYGWO:XYUK UGX IKYWPHAL ZKPYGX, EHAK SYMMYK HZ MOY 13MO OUL NPBYG TY NKYUMXYSPNOM. LH EHA LMPSS SHBY TY, TE KHTUGMPW QASPY? LYIUKUMPHG, HZ COPWOEHA LUE LH TAWO MOUM PL VUX, XHYL GHM LYYT MH OUBY OUX PML ALAUS YZZYWMHG EHA. EHA WHTISUPG HZ HAK LYIUKUMPHG. COUM MOYG LOHASX P LUE, PZ PXUKYX WHTISUPG, P COH UT XYIKPBYX HZ USS COH UKY XYUK MH TY? UO, PZCY OUX GHM KYSPNPHG MH WHGLHSY AL SPZY CHASX VY BYKE LUX. COE XH EHALAIIHLY MOUM P LOHASX SHHR LYBYKYSE HG EHAK UZZYWMPHG ZHK MOUM EHAGNTUG? HG LAWO TUMMYKL P UT HGSE LYBYKY CPMO TELYSZ. P AGXYKLMUGX LAWOZYYSPGNL PG HMOYKL, UGX PZ GYBYK OUBPGN ZYSM MOYT P WUGGHM UIIKHBY HZMOYT, GYPMOYK XH P WHGXYTG MOYT. HGSE PM LYYTL MH TY MOUM WOKPLMPUGSHBY, SHBY HZ HGY'L GYPNOVHK, SHBY HZ HGY'L YGYTE, PL CHKMOPYK, LCYYMYK,UGX VYMMYK MOUG MOY ZYYSPGNL COPWO MOY VYUAMPZAS YEYL HZ U EHAGN TUG WUGPGLIPKY PG U KHTUGMPW UGX SHBPGN EHAGN NPKS SPRY EHAKLYSZ.MOY GYCL HZ WHAGM VYFAROHB'L XYUMO KYUWOYX AL VYZHKY EHAK SYMMYK UGXTE ZUMOYK CUL TAWO UZZYWMYX VE PM. OY LUEL MOY WHAGM CUL MOY SULMKYIKYLYGMUMPBY VAM HGY HZ MOY NKYUM WYGMAKE, UGX MOUM PM PL OPL HCGMAKG GHC, VAM MOUM OY CPSS XH USS OY WUG MH SYM OPL MAKG WHTY UL SUMY ULIHLLPVSY. NHX IKYLYKBY AL ZKHT MOUM MYKKPVSY TPLZHKMAGY!P WUGGHM UNKYY CPMO EHA UVHAM IPYKKY, COHT P RGYC UL U WOPSX. OY USCUELLYYTYX MH TY MH OUBY UG YDWYSSYGM OYUKM, UGX MOUM PL MOY JAUSPME P BUSAYTHLM PG IYHISY. UL MH OPL PGOYKPMUGWY UGX MOY IUKM ISUEYX VE IKPGWYBULPSP, PM PL BYKE LUX ZHK VHMO. UO, TE XYUK ZKPYGX, HAK XPBPGYLUBPHAK'L CHKXL, MOUM PM PL YULPYK ZHK U WUTYS MH NH MOKHANO MOY YEY HZU GYYXSY MOUG ZHK U KPWO TUG MH YGMYK MOY RPGNXHT HZ NHX, UKY MYKKPVSEMKAY. P IPME IKPGWY BULPSP VAM UT LMPSS THKY LHKKE ZHK IPYKKY. LH EHAGN,UGX VAKXYGYX CPMO LAWO KPWOYL--MH COUM MYTIMUMPHGL OY CPSS VY YDIHLYX!PZ P CYKY ULRYX COUM P XYLPKY THLM HG YUKMO, PM CHASX VY MH VY IHHKYKMOUG MOY IHHKYLM VYNNUK. U MOHALUGX MOUGRL, XYUK ZKPYGX, ZHK MOY BHSATYEHA OUBY LYGM TY UGX COPWO OUL LAWO LAWWYLL PG THLWHC. EYM LPGWY EHAMYSS TY MOUM UTHGN LHTY NHHX MOPGNL PM WHGMUPGL HMOYKL COPWO HAK CYUROATUG AGXYKLMUGXPGN WUGGHM NKULI, PM LYYTL MH TY KUMOYK ALYSYLL MH LIYGXMPTY PG KYUXPGN COUM PL AGPGMYSSPNPVSY UGX WUG MOYKYZHKY VYUK GH ZKAPM.P GYBYK WHASX AGXYKLMUGX MOY ZHGXGYLL LHTY IYHISY OUBY ZHK WHGZALPGNMOYPK TPGXL VE XCYSSPGN HG TELMPWUS VHHRL MOUM TYKYSE UCURYG MOYPKXHAVML UGX YDWPMY MOYPK PTUNPGUMPHG, NPBPGN MOYT U VYGM ZHK YDUNNYKUMPHGJAPMY WHGMKUKE MH WOKPLMPUG LPTISPWPME. SYM AL KUMOYK KYUX MOY YIPLMSYLUGX NHLIYSL. SYM AL GHM LYYR MH IYGYMKUMY COUM TELMYKPYL MOYE WHGMUPG;ZHK OHC WUG CY, TPLYKUVSY LPGGYKL MOUM CY UKY, RGHC MOY MYKKPVSY UGXOHSE LYWKYML HZ IKHBPXYGWY COPSY CY KYTUPG PG MOPL ZSYLO COPWO ZHKTLUG PTIYGYMKUVSY BYPS VYMCYYG AL UGX MOY YMYKGUS? SYM AL KUMOYK WHGZPGYHAKLYSBYL MH LMAXEPGN MOHLY LAVSPTY KASYL COPWO HAK XPBPGY LUBPHAK OULSYZM ZHK HAK NAPXUGWY OYKY VYSHC. SYM AL MKE MH WHGZHKT MH MOYT UGXZHSSHC MOYT, UGX SYM AL VY IYKLAUXYX MOUM MOY SYLL CY SYM HAK ZYYVSYOATUG TPGXL KHUT, MOY VYMMYK CY LOUSS ISYULY NHX, COH KYQYWML USSRGHCSYXNY MOUM XHYL GHM WHTY ZKHT OPT; UGX MOY SYLL CY LYYR MH ZUMOHTCOUM OY OUL VYYG ISYULYX MH WHGWYUS ZKHT AL, MOY LHHGYK CPSS OYBHAWOLUZY PML KYBYSUMPHG MH AL MOKHANO OPL XPBPGY LIPKPM.TE ZUMOYK OUL GHM LIHRYG MH TY HZ U LAPMHK, VAM OUL HGSE MHSX TY MOUMOY OUL KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK UGX PL YDIYWMPGN U BPLPM ZKHT IKPGWY BULPSP. PGKYNUKX MH MOPL IKHQYWM HZ TUKKPUNY ZHK TY, P CPSS MYSS EHA, XYUK LCYYMZKPYGX, MOUM P SHHR HG TUKKPUNY UL U XPBPGY PGLMPMAMPHG MH COPWO CY TALMWHGZHKT. OHCYBYK IUPGZAS PM TUE VY MH TY, LOHASX MOY USTPNOME SUEMOY XAMPYL HZ CPZY UGX THMOYK AIHG TY P LOUSS MKE MH IYKZHKT MOYT ULZUPMOZASSE UL P WUG, CPMOHAM XPLJAPYMPGN TELYSZ VE YDUTPGPGN TE ZYYSPGNLMHCUKX OPT COHT OY TUE NPBY TY ZHK OALVUGX.P OUBY OUX U SYMMYK ZKHT TE VKHMOYK, COH UGGHAGWYL OPL LIYYXE UKKPBUSUM VUSX OPSSL CPMO OPL CPZY. MOPL ISYULAKY CPSS VY VAM U VKPYZ HGY,OHCYBYK, ZHK OY CPSS SYUBY, AL UNUPG MH MURY IUKM PG MOPL AGOUIIE CUKPGMH COPWO CY OUBY VYYG XKUCG, NHX RGHCL OHC HK COE. GHM HGSE COYKY EHAUKY--UM MOY OYUKM HZ UZZUPKL UGX HZ MOY CHKSX--PL MOY MUSR USS HZCUK, YBYG OYKY UTPX ZPYSXCHKR UGX MOY WUST HZ GUMAKY--COPWO MHCGLZHSRWHGLPXYK WOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ MOY WHAGMKE--KATHKL HZ CUK UKY OYUKXUGX IUPGZASSE ZYSM. TE ZUMOYK MUSRL HZ GHMOPGN VAM TUKWOYL UGXWHAGMYKTUKWOYL, MOPGNL HZ COPWO P AGXYKLMUGX GHMOPGN; UGX MOY XUEVYZHKY EYLMYKXUE XAKPGN TE XUPSE CUSR MOKHANO MOY BPSSUNY P CPMGYLLYX UOYUKMKYGXPGN LWYGY.... PM CUL U WHGBHE HZ WHGLWKPIML YGKHSSYX ZKHT HAKIYHISY UGX LMUKMPGN MH QHPG MOY UKTE. EHA LOHASX OUBY LYYG MOY LMUMY HZMOY THMOYKL, CPBYL, UGX WOPSXKYG HZ MOY TYG COH CYKY NHPGN UGX LOHASXOUBY OYUKX MOY LHVL. PM LYYTL UL MOHANO TUGRPGX OUL ZHKNHMMYG MOYSUCL HZ PML XPBPGY LUBPHAK, COH IKYUWOYX SHBY UGX ZHKNPBYGYLL HZPGQAKPYL--UGX MOUM TYG UMMKPVAMY MOY NKYUMYLM TYKPM MH LRPSS PG RPSSPGNHGY UGHMOYK.UXPYA, XYUK UGX RPGX ZKPYGX; TUE HAK XPBPGY LUBPHAK UGX OPL THLM OHSETHMOYK RYYI EHA PG MOYPK OHSE UGX USS-IHCYKZAS WUKY!TUKE"UO, EHA UKY LYGXPGN HZZ U SYMMYK, IKPGWYLL? P OUBY USKYUXE XPLIUMWOYXTPGY. P OUBY CKPMMYG MH TE IHHK THMOYK," LUPX MOY LTPSPGN TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY KUIPXSE, PG OYK ISYULUGM TYSSHC MHGYL UGX CPMO NAMMAKUS K'L.LOY VKHANOM PGMH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L LMKYGAHAL, THAKGZAS, UGX NSHHTE CHKSX UJAPMY XPZZYKYGM UMTHLIOYKY, WUKYSYLL, SPNOMOYUKMYX, UGX LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX."IKPGWYLL, P TALM CUKG EHA," LOY UXXYX, SHCYKPGN OYK BHPWY UGX YBPXYGMSESPLMYGPGN MH OYKLYSZ CPMO ISYULAKY, UGX LIYURPGN CPMO YDUNNYKUMYXNKULLYEYTYGM, "MOY IKPGWY OUL VYYG LWHSXPGN TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO. OY PL PGU BYKE VUX OATHK, BYKE THKHLY. VY IKYIUKYX.""UO, XYUK ZKPYGX," KYISPYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, "P OUBY ULRYX EHA GYBYK MHCUKG TY HZ MOY OATHK TE ZUMOYK PL PG. P XH GHM USSHC TELYSZ MH QAXNY OPTUGX CHASX GHM OUBY HMOYKL XH LH."MOY IKPGWYLL NSUGWYX UM OYK CUMWO UGX, LYYPGN MOUM LOY CUL ZPBY TPGAMYLSUMY PG LMUKMPGN OYK IKUWMPWY HG MOY WSUBPWOHKX, CYGM PGMH MOY LPMMPGNKHHT CPMO U SHHR HZ USUKT. VYMCYYG MCYSBY UGX MCH H'WSHWR, UL MOYXUE CUL TUIIYX HAM, MOY IKPGWY KYLMYX UGX MOY IKPGWYLL ISUEYX MOYWSUBPWOHKX.WOUIMYK DDBPMOY NKUE-OUPKYX BUSYM CUL LPMMPGN XKHCLPSE SPLMYGPGN MH MOY LGHKPGN HZMOY IKPGWY, COH CUL PG OPL SUKNY LMAXE. ZKHT MOY ZUK LPXY HZ MOY OHALYMOKHANO MOY WSHLYX XHHKL WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ XPZZPWASM IULLUNYL--MCYGMEMPTYL KYIYUMYX--HZ U LHGUMU VE XALLYR.QALM MOYG U WSHLYX WUKKPUNY UGX UGHMOYK CPMO U OHHX XKHBY AI MH MOYIHKWO. IKPGWY UGXKYC NHM HAM HZ MOY WUKKPUNY, OYSIYX OPL SPMMSY CPZY MHUSPNOM, UGX SYM OYK IULL PGMH MOY OHALY VYZHKY OPT. HSX MPROHG, CYUKPGNU CPN, IAM OPL OYUX HAM HZ MOY XHHK HZ MOY UGMYWOUTVYK, KYIHKMYX PGU COPLIYK MOUM MOY IKPGWY CUL LSYYIPGN, UGX OULMPSE WSHLYX MOY XHHK.MPROHG RGYC MOUM GYPMOYK MOY LHG'L UKKPBUS GHK UGE HMOYK AGALAUS YBYGMTALM VY USSHCYX MH XPLMAKV MOY UIIHPGMYX HKXYK HZ MOY XUE. IKPGWY UGXKYCUIIUKYGMSE RGYC MOPL UL CYSS UL MPROHG; OY SHHRYX UM OPL CUMWO UL PZ MHULWYKMUPG COYMOYK OPL ZUMOYK'L OUVPML OUX WOUGNYX LPGWY OY CUL UM OHTYSULM, UGX, OUBPGN ULLAKYX OPTLYSZ MOUM MOYE OUX GHM, OY MAKGYX MH OPLCPZY."OY CPSS NYM AI PG MCYGME TPGAMYL. SYM AL NH UWKHLL MH TUKE'L KHHT," OYLUPX.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL OUX NKHCG LMHAMYK XAKPGN MOPL MPTY, VAM OYK YEYLUGX OYK LOHKM, XHCGE, LTPSPGN SPI SPZMYX COYG LOY VYNUG MH LIYUR QALM ULTYKKPSE UGX IKYMMPSE UL YBYK."COE, MOPL PL U IUSUWY!" LOY LUPX MH OYK OALVUGX, SHHRPGN UKHAGX CPMOMOY YDIKYLLPHG CPMO COPWO IYHISY WHTISPTYGM MOYPK OHLM UM U VUSS. "SYM'LWHTY, JAPWR, JAPWR!" UGX CPMO U NSUGWY KHAGX, LOY LTPSYX UM MPROHG, UMOYK OALVUGX, UGX UM MOY ZHHMTUG COH UWWHTIUGPYX MOYT."PL MOUM TUKE IKUWMPWPGN? SYM'L NH JAPYMSE UGX MURY OYK VE LAKIKPLY."IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHSSHCYX OYK CPMO U WHAKMYHAL VAM LUX YDIKYLLPHG."EHA'BY NKHCG HSXYK, MPROHG," OY LUPX PG IULLPGN MH MOY HSX TUG, COHRPLLYX OPL OUGX.VYZHKY MOYE KYUWOYX MOY KHHT ZKHT COPWO MOY LHAGXL HZ MOY WSUBPWOHKXWUTY, MOY IKYMME, ZUPK OUPKYX ZKYGWOCHTUG, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY,KALOYX HAM UIIUKYGMSE VYLPXY OYKLYSZ CPMO XYSPNOM."UO! COUM QHE ZHK MOY IKPGWYLL!" YDWSUPTYX LOY: "UM SULM! P TALM SYM OYKRGHC.""GH, GH, ISYULY GHM... EHA UKY TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY," LUPX MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL, RPLLPGN OYK. "P RGHC EHA USKYUXE MOKHANO TE LPLMYK-PG-SUC'LZKPYGXLOPI ZHK EHA. LOY CUL GHM YDIYWMPGN AL?"MOYE CYGM AI MH MOY XHHK HZ MOY LPMMPGN KHHT ZKHT COPWO WUTY MOY LHAGXHZ MOY HZM-KYIYUMYX IULLUNY HZ MOY LHGUMU. IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHIIYX UGXTUXY U NKPTUWY, UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN AGISYULUGM.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL YGMYKYX MOY KHHT. MOY IULLUNY VKHRY HZZ PG MOYTPXXSY, U WKE CUL OYUKX, MOYG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OYUBE MKYUX UGX MOY LHAGXHZ RPLLPGN. COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM PG MOY MCH IKPGWYLLYL, COH OUX HGSETYM HGWY VYZHKY ZHK U LOHKM MPTY UM OPL CYXXPGN, CYKY PG YUWO HMOYK'LUKTL CUKTSE IKYLLPGN MOYPK SPIL MH COUMYBYK ISUWY MOYE OUIIYGYX MHMHAWO. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY LMHHX GYUK MOYT IKYLLPGN OYK OUGX MH OYKOYUKM, CPMO U VYUMPZPW LTPSY UGX HVBPHALSE YJAUSSE KYUXE MH WKE HK MHSUANO. IKPGWY UGXKYC LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL UGX ZKHCGYX, UL SHBYKLHZ TALPW XH COYG MOYE OYUK U ZUSLY GHMY. MOY MCH CHTYG SYM NH HZ HGYUGHMOYK, UGX MOYG, UL PZ UZKUPX HZ VYPGN MHH SUMY, LYPFYX YUWO HMOYK'LOUGXL, RPLLPGN MOYT UGX IASSPGN MOYT UCUE, UGX UNUPG VYNUG RPLLPGN YUWOHMOYK HG MOY ZUWY, UGX MOYG MH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L LAKIKPLY VHMO VYNUG MHWKE UGX RPLLYX UNUPG. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY USLH VYNUG MH WKE. IKPGWYUGXKYC YBPXYGMSE ZYSM PSS UM YULY, VAM MH MOY MCH CHTYG PM LYYTYX JAPMYGUMAKUS MOUM MOYE LOHASX WKE, UGX UIIUKYGMSE PM GYBYK YGMYKYX MOYPKOYUXL MOUM PM WHASX OUBY VYYG HMOYKCPLY UM MOPL TYYMPGN."UO! TE XYUK!... UO! TUKE!" MOYE LAXXYGSE YDWSUPTYX, UGX MOYG SUANOYX."P XKYUTYX SULM GPNOM..."--"EHA CYKY GHM YDIYWMPGN AL?..." "UO! TUKE,EHA OUBY NHM MOPGGYK?..." "UGX EHA OUBY NKHCG LMHAMYK!...""P RGYC MOY IKPGWYLL UM HGWY," IAM PG TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY."UGX P OUX GH PXYU!..." YDWSUPTYX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "UO, UGXKYC, P XPX GHMLYY EHA."IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX OPL LPLMYK, OUGX PG OUGX, RPLLYX HGY UGHMOYK, UGXOY MHSX OYK LOY CUL LMPSS MOY LUTY WKEVUVE UL YBYK. IKPGWYLL TUKE OUXMAKGYX MHCUKX OYK VKHMOYK, UGX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL MOY SHBPGN, CUKT,NYGMSY SHHR HZ OYK SUKNY SATPGHAL YEYL, BYKE VYUAMPZAS UM MOUM THTYGM,KYLMYX HG IKPGWY UGXKYC'L ZUWY.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL MUSRYX PGWYLLUGMSE, OYK LOHKM, XHCGE AIIYK SPIWHGMPGAUSSE UGX KUIPXSE MHAWOPGN OYK KHLE GYMOYK SPI COYG GYWYLLUKEUGX XKUCPGN AI UNUPG GYDM THTYGM COYG OYK ZUWY VKHRY PGMH U LTPSY HZNSPMMYKPGN MYYMO UGX LIUKRSPGN YEYL. LOY MHSX HZ UG UWWPXYGM MOYE OUXOUX HG MOY LIULLRP OPSS COPWO TPNOM OUBY VYYG LYKPHAL ZHK OYK PG OYKWHGXPMPHG, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE UZMYK MOUM PGZHKTYX MOYT MOUM LOY OUX SYZMUSS OYK WSHMOYL PG IYMYKLVAKN UGX MOUM OYUBYG RGYC COUM LOY CHASX OUBYMH XKYLL PG OYKY; UGX MOUM UGXKYC OUX JAPMY WOUGNYX, UGX MOUM RPMMEHXEGMLHBU OUX TUKKPYX UG HSX TUG, UGX MOUM MOYKY CUL U LAPMHK ZHK TUKE,U KYUS HGY, VAM MOUM MOYE CHASX MUSR HZ MOUM SUMYK. IKPGWYLL TUKE CULLMPSS SHHRPGN LPSYGMSE UM OYK VKHMOYK UGX OYK VYUAMPZAS YEYL CYKY ZASSHZ SHBY UGX LUXGYLL. PM CUL ISUPG MOUM LOY CUL ZHSSHCPGN U MKUPG HZMOHANOM PGXYIYGXYGM HZ OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC'L CHKXL. PG MOY TPXLM HZ UXYLWKPIMPHG HZ MOY SULM IYMYKLVAKN ZYMY LOY UXXKYLLYX OYK VKHMOYK:"LH EHA UKY KYUSSE NHPGN MH MOY CUK, UGXKYC?" LOY LUPX LPNOPGN.SPLY LPNOYX MHH."EYL, UGX YBYG MHTHKKHC," KYISPYX OYK VKHMOYK."OY PL SYUBPGN TY OYKY, NHX RGHCL COE, COYG OY TPNOM OUBY OUXIKHTHMPHG..."IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM SPLMYG MH MOY YGX, VAM WHGMPGAPGN OYK MKUPG HZMOHANOM MAKGYX MH OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC CPMO U MYGXYK NSUGWY UM OYK ZPNAKY."PL PM WYKMUPG?" LOY LUPX.MOY ZUWY HZ MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL WOUGNYX. LOY LPNOYX UGX LUPX: "EYL,JAPMY WYKMUPG. UO! PM PL BYKE XKYUXZAS..."OYK SPI XYLWYGXYX.
