OHC PL OY? QALM MOY LUTY?""EYL, QALM MOY LUTY. MOHANO P XHG'M RGHC COUM EHAK HIPGPHG CPSS VY,"UGLCYKYX MOY IKPGWYLL QHEZASSE."UGX UKY MOY OHAKL MOY LUTY? UGX MOY CUSRL PG MOY UBYGAYL? UGX MOYSUMOY?" ULRYX IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO U LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY LTPSY COPWOLOHCYX MOUM, PG LIPMY HZ USS OPL SHBY UGX KYLIYWM ZHK OPL ZUMOYK, OY CULUCUKY HZ OPL CYURGYLLYL."MOY OHAKL UKY MOY LUTY, UGX MOY SUMOY, UGX USLH MOY TUMOYTUMPWL UGX TENYHTYMKE SYLLHGL," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE NSYYZASSE, UL PZ OYK SYLLHGL PGNYHTYMKE CYKY UTHGN MOY NKYUMYLM XYSPNOML HZ OYK SPZY.COYG MOY MCYGME TPGAMYL OUX YSUILYX UGX MOY MPTY OUX WHTY ZHK MOY HSXIKPGWY MH NYM AI, MPROHG WUTY MH WUSS MOY EHAGN IKPGWY MH OPL ZUMOYK.MOY HSX TUG TUXY U XYIUKMAKY ZKHT OPL ALAUS KHAMPGY PG OHGHK HZ OPLLHG'L UKKPBUS: OY NUBY HKXYKL MH UXTPM OPT MH OPL UIUKMTYGML COPSYOY XKYLLYX ZHK XPGGYK. MOY HSX IKPGWY USCUEL XKYLLYX PG HSX-ZULOPHGYXLMESY, CYUKPGN UG UGMPJAY WHUM UGX IHCXYKYX OUPK; UGX COYG IKPGWY UGXKYCYGMYKYX OPL ZUMOYK'L XKYLLPGN KHHT (GHM CPMO MOY WHGMYTIMAHAL SHHR UGXTUGGYK OY CHKY PG XKUCPGN KHHTL, VAM CPMO MOY UGPTUMYX ZUWY CPMO COPWOOY MUSRYX MH IPYKKY), MOY HSX TUG CUL LPMMPGN HG U SUKNY SYUMOYK-WHBYKYXWOUPK, CKUIIYX PG U IHCXYKPGN TUGMSY, YGMKALMPGN OPL OYUX MH MPROHG."UO! OYKY'L MOY CUKKPHK! CUGML MH BUGJAPLO VAHGUIUKMY?" LUPX MOY HSXTUG, LOURPGN OPL IHCXYKYX OYUX UL TAWO UL MOY MUPS, COPWO MPROHG CULOHSXPGN ZULM MH ISUPM, CHASX USSHC."EHA UM SYULM TALM MUWRSY OPT IKHIYKSE, HK YSLY PZ OY NHYL HG SPRY MOPLOY'SS LHHG OUBY AL, MHH, ZHK OPL LAVQYWML! OHC UKY EHA?" UGX OY OYSX HAMOPL WOYYR.MOY HSX TUG CUL PG U NHHX MYTIYK UZMYK OPL GUI VYZHKY XPGGYK. (OY ALYXMH LUE MOUM U GUI "UZMYK XPGGYK CUL LPSBYK--VYZHKY XPGGYK, NHSXYG.")OY WULM OUIIE, LPXYSHGN NSUGWYL UM OPL LHG ZKHT AGXYK OPL MOPWR, VALOEYEYVKHCL. IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM AI UGX RPLLYX OPL ZUMOYK HG MOYLIHM PGXPWUMYX MH OPT. "OHC PL EHAK OYUSMO?""HGSE ZHHSL UGX KURYL ZUSS PSS, TE VHE. EHA RGHC TY: P UT VALE ZKHTTHKGPGN MPSS GPNOM UGX UVLMYTPHAL, LH HZ WHAKLY P UT CYSS.""MOUGR NHX," LUPX OPL LHG LTPSPGN."NHX OUL GHMOPGN MH XH CPMO PM! CYSS, NH HG," OY WHGMPGAYX, KYMAKGPGN MHOPL OHVVE; "MYSS TY OHC MOY NYKTUGL OUBY MUANOM EHA MH ZPNOM VHGUIUKMYVE MOPL GYC LWPYGWY EHA WUSS 'LMKUMYNE.'"IKPGWY UGXKYC LTPSYX."NPBY TY MPTY MH WHSSYWM TE CPML, ZUMOYK," LUPX OY, CPMO U LTPSY MOUMLOHCYX MOUM OPL ZUMOYK'L ZHPVSYL XPX GHM IKYBYGM OPL LHG ZKHT SHBPGN UGXOHGHKPGN OPT. "COE, P OUBY GHM EYM OUX MPTY MH LYMMSY XHCG!""GHGLYGLY, GHGLYGLY!" WKPYX MOY HSX TUG, LOURPGN OPL IPNMUPS MH LYYCOYMOYK PM CUL ZPKTSE ISUPMYX, UGX NKULIPGN OPL VE MOY OUGX. "MOY OHALYZHK EHAK CPZY PL KYUXE. IKPGWYLL TUKE CPSS MURY OYK MOYKY UGX LOHC OYKHBYK, UGX MOYE'SS MUSR GPGYMYYG MH MOY XHFYG. MOUM'L MOYPK CHTUG'LCUE! P UT NSUX MH OUBY OYK. LPM XHCG UGX MUSR. UVHAM TPROYSLHG'L UKTEP AGXYKLMUGX--MHSLMHE'L MHH... U LPTASMUGYHAL YDIYXPMPHG.... VAM COUM'LMOY LHAMOYKG UKTE MH XH? IKALLPU PL GYAMKUS... P RGHC MOUM. COUM UVHAMUALMKPU?" LUPX OY, KPLPGN ZKHT OPL WOUPK UGX IUWPGN AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHTZHSSHCYX VE MPROHG, COH KUG UZMYK OPT, OUGXPGN OPT XPZZYKYGM UKMPWSYL HZWSHMOPGN. "COUM HZ LCYXYG? OHC CPSS MOYE WKHLL IHTYKUGPU?"IKPGWY UGXKYC, LYYPGN MOUM OPL ZUMOYK PGLPLMYX, VYNUG--UM ZPKLMKYSAWMUGMSE, VAM NKUXAUSSE CPMO THKY UGX THKY UGPTUMPHG, UGX ZKHT OUVPMWOUGNPGN AGWHGLWPHALSE ZKHT KALLPUG MH ZKYGWO UL OY CYGM HG--MH YDISUPGMOY ISUG HZ HIYKUMPHG ZHK MOY WHTPGN WUTIUPNG. OY YDISUPGYX OHC UG UKTE,GPGYME MOHALUGX LMKHGN, CUL MH MOKYUMYG IKALLPU LH UL MH VKPGN OYK HAMHZ OYK GYAMKUSPME UGX XKUC OYK PGMH MOY CUK; OHC IUKM HZ MOUM UKTE CULMH QHPG LHTY LCYXPLO ZHKWYL UM LMKUSLAGX; OHC MCH OAGXKYX UGX MCYGMEMOHALUGX UALMKPUGL, CPMO U OAGXKYX MOHALUGX KALLPUGL, CYKY MH HIYKUMY PGPMUSE UGX HG MOY KOPGY; OHC ZPZME MOHALUGX KALLPUGL UGX UL TUGE YGNSPLOCYKY MH SUGX UM GUISYL, UGX OHC U MHMUS ZHKWY HZ ZPBY OAGXKYX MOHALUGXTYG CUL MH UMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO ZKHT XPZZYKYGM LPXYL. MOY HSX IKPGWY XPXGHM YBPGWY MOY SYULM PGMYKYLM XAKPGN MOPL YDISUGUMPHG, VAM UL PZ OY CYKYGHM SPLMYGPGN MH PM WHGMPGAYX MH XKYLL COPSY CUSRPGN UVHAM, UGX MOKYYMPTYL AGYDIYWMYXSE PGMYKKAIMYX. OATTYX MOY IKPGWY HAM HZ MAGY UGX, CPMO USUANO LMPSS THKY LH, OY JAPMMYX MOY MUVSY.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL XAKPGN MOY COHSY XPLWALLPHG UGX MOY KYLM HZMOY XPGGYK LUM LPSYGM, NSUGWPGN CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYX SHHR GHC UM OYKZUMOYK-PG-SUC UGX GHC UM IKPGWYLL TUKE. UGLCYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE.WOUIMYK DDBPPPIKPGWY UGXKYC CUL MH SYUBY GYDM YBYGPGN. MOY HSX IKPGWY, GHM USMYKPGNOPL KHAMPGY, KYMPKYX UL ALAUS UZMYK XPGGYK. IKPGWY UGXKYC PG U MKUBYSPGN WHUM CPMOHAMYIUASYMMYL OUX VYYG IUWRPGN CPMO OPL BUSYM PG MOY KHHTL ULLPNGYX MH OPT.UZMYK PGLIYWMPGN MOY WUKKPUNY OPTLYSZ UGX LYYPGN MOY MKAGRL IAM PG, OYHKXYKYX MOY OHKLYL MH VY OUKGYLLYX. HGSE MOHLY MOPGNL OY USCUEL RYIMCPMO OPT KYTUPGYX PG OPL KHHT; U LTUSS VHD, U SUKNY WUGMYYG ZPMMYX CPMOLPSBYK ISUMY, MCH MAKRPLO IPLMHSL UGX U LUVYK--U IKYLYGM ZKHT OPLZUMOYK COH OUX VKHANOM PM ZKHT MOY LPYNY HZ HWOURHB. USS MOYLY MKUBYSPGNYZZYWML HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L CYKY PG BYKE NHHX HKXYK: GYC, WSYUG, UGX PGWSHMO WHBYKL WUKYZASSE MPYX CPMO MUIYL.COYG LMUKMPGN HG U QHAKGYE HK WOUGNPGN MOYPK THXY HZ SPZY, TYG WUIUVSYHZ KYZSYWMPHG UKY NYGYKUSSE PG U LYKPHAL ZKUTY HZ TPGX. UM LAWO THTYGMLHGY KYBPYCL MOY IULM UGX ISUGL ZHK MOY ZAMAKY. IKPGWY UGXKYC'L ZUWYSHHRYX BYKE MOHANOMZAS UGX MYGXYK. CPMO OPL OUGXL VYOPGX OPT OY IUWYXVKPLRSE ZKHT WHKGYK MH WHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT, SHHRPGN LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OPTUGX MOHANOMZASSE LOURPGN OPL OYUX. XPX OY ZYUK NHPGN MH MOY CUK, HK CULOY LUX UM SYUBPGN OPL CPZY?--IYKOUIL VHMO, VAM YBPXYGMSE OY XPX GHMCPLO MH VY LYYG PG MOUM THHX, ZHK OYUKPGN ZHHMLMYIL PG MOY IULLUNY OYOAKKPYXSE AGWSULIYX OPL OUGXL, LMHIIYX UM U MUVSY UL PZ MEPGN MOYWHBYK HZ MOY LTUSS VHD, UGX ULLATYX OPL ALAUS MKUGJAPS UGX PTIYGYMKUVSYYDIKYLLPHG. P OUBY NKHCG LH ZHGX HZ OYK."IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LPSYGM, VAM MOY IKPGWYLL GHMPWYX MOY PKHGPWUS UGXWHGMYTIMAHAL SHHR MOUM LOHCYX PMLYSZ HG OPL ZUWY."HGY TALM VY PGXASNYGM MH SPMMSY CYURGYLLYL; COH PL ZKYY ZKHT MOYT,UGXKYC? LOY KYUXL MH OPT PG MOY YBYGPGNL UGX KYUXL LISYGXPXSE.""MH VY JAPMY ZKUGR, TUKE, P YDIYWM ZUMOYK'L WOUKUWMYK LHTYMPTYL TURYLMOPGNL MKEPGN ZHK EHA, XHYLG'M PM?" LUPX LOY."OY USCUEL CUL KUMOYK OUKLO; UGX GHC P LOHASX MOPGR OY'L NYMMPGN BYKEMKEPGN," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, UIIUKYGMSE LIYURPGN SPNOMSE HZ MOYPK ZUMOYKPG HKXYK MH IAFFSY HK MYLM OPL LPLMYK."EHA UKY NHHX PG YBYKE CUE, UGXKYC, VAM EHA OUBY U RPGX HZ PGMYSSYWMAUSIKPXY," LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL, ZHSSHCPGN MOY MKUPG HZ OYK HCG MOHANOMLKUMOYK MOUG MOY MKYGX HZ MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG--"UGX MOUM'L U NKYUM LPG.OHC WUG HGY QAXNY ZUMOYK? P HGSE CPLO EHA CYKY USS UL OUIIE UL P UT."OYK VKHMOYK LOHHR OPL OYUX PGWKYXASHALSE."MOY HGSE MOPGN MOUM PL OUKX ZHK TY... P CPSS MYSS EHA MOY MKAMO,UGXKYC... PL ZUMOYK'L CUE HZ MKYUMPGN KYSPNPHAL LAVQYWML. P XHG'MAGXYKLMUGX OHC U TUG HZ OPL PTTYGLY PGMYSSYWM WUG ZUPS MH LYY COUM PLUL WSYUK UL XUE, UGX WUG NH LH ZUK ULMKUE. UGXKYC..."LOY LUPX MPTPXSE UZMYK U THTYGM'L LPSYGWY, "P OUBY U NKYUM ZUBHK MH ULRHZ EHA.""COUM PL PM, XYUK?""GH--IKHTPLY MOUM EHA CPSS GHM KYZALY! LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. VAM PTTYXPUMYSE, GHMPWPGN MOY IUPGYXYDIKYLLPHG OPL QHRY OUX VKHANOM MH OPL LPLMYK'L ZUWY, OY KYIYGMYX UGXUXXYX: "P UT NSUX; KYUSSE, XYUK, P UT BYKE NSUX.""UNUPGLM EHAK CPSS OY CPSS LUBY UGX OUBY TYKWE HG EHA UGX VKPGN EHAMH OPTLYSZ, ZHK PG OPT USHGY PL MKAMO UGX IYUWY," LUPX LOY PG U BHPWYMKYTVSPGN CPMO YTHMPHG, LHSYTGSE OHSXPGN AI PG VHMO OUGXL VYZHKY OYKVKHMOYK U LTUSS, HBUS, UGMPJAY, XUKR-ZUWYX PWHG HZ MOY LUBPHAK PG U NHSXLYMMPGN, HG U ZPGYSE CKHANOM LPSBYK WOUPG.LOY WKHLLYX OYKLYSZ, RPLLYX MOY PWHG, UGX OUGXYX PM MH UGXKYC."ISYULY, UGXKYC, ZHK TE LURY!..."KUEL HZ NYGMSY SPNOM LOHGY ZKHT OYK SUKNY, MPTPX YEYL. UGX PUT LHKKE ZHK MOUM," OY CYGM HG.MOY IUMWOYL NKYC XYYIYK HG OYK ZHKYOYUX, GYWR, UGX WOYYRL. LOY MKPYX MHLUE LHTYMOPGN VAM WHASX GHM. VKUAGUA CUL MOY OYUXJAUKMYKL HZMOY WHTTUGXYK-PG-WOPYZ, RAMAFHB.HG HWMHVYK 11, 1805, HGY HZ MOY PGZUGMKE KYNPTYGML MOUM OUX QALM KYUWOYXVKUAGUA OUX OUSMYX OUSZ U TPSY ZKHT MOY MHCG, CUPMPGN MH VY PGLIYWMYXVE MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. RAMAFHB UGX MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS CYKYMUSRPGN PG SHC BHPWYL UGX RAMAFHB LTPSYX LSPNOMSE UL MKYUXPGN OYUBPSEOY LMYIIYX XHCG ZKHT MOY WUKKPUNY QALM UL PZ MOHLY MCH MOHALUGX TYGVKYUMOSYLLSE NUFPGN UM OPT UGX MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK XPX GHM YDPLM.MOY CHKX HZ WHTTUGX KUGN HAM, UGX UNUPG MOY KYNPTYGM JAPBYKYX, UL CPMO UQPGNSPGN LHAGX PM IKYLYGMYX UKTL. UMZPKLM RAMAFHB LMHHX LMPSS COPSY MOY KYNPTYGM THBYX; MOYG OY UGX MOYNYGYKUS PG COPMY, UWWHTIUGPYX VE MOY LAPMY, CUSRYX VYMCYYG MOY KUGRL.ZKHT MOY CUE MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK LUSAMYX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ UGXXYBHAKYX OPT CPMO OPL YEYL, XKUCPGN OPTLYSZ AI HVLYJAPHALSE, UGX ZKHTMOY CUE OY CUSRYX MOKHANO MOY KUGRL VYOPGX MOY NYGYKUSL, VYGXPGN ZHKCUKXUGX OUKXSE UVSY MH KYLMKUPG OPL QYKRE THBYTYGML, UGX ZKHT MOY CUE OYXUKMYX ZHKCUKX UM YBYKE CHKX HK NYLMAKY HZ MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ,PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM OY IYKZHKTYX OPL XAME UL U LAVHKXPGUMY CPMO YBYGNKYUMYK FYUS MOUG OPL XAME UL U WHTTUGXYK. MOYKYCYKY HGSE 217 LPWR UGX LMKUNNSYKL. YBYKEMOPGN CUL PG NHHX HKXYK YDWYIMMOY VHHML.RAMAFHB CUSRYX MOKHANO MOY KUGRL, LHTYMPTYL LMHIIPGN MH LUE U ZYCZKPYGXSE CHKXL MH HZZPWYKL OY OUX RGHCG PG MOY MAKRPLO CUK, LHTYMPTYLUSLH MH MOY LHSXPYKL. SHHRPGN UM MOYPK VHHML OY LYBYKUS MPTYL LOHHR OPLOYUX LUXSE, IHPGMPGN MOYT HAM MH MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS CPMO UG YDIKYLLPHGCOPWO LYYTYX MH LUE MOUM OY CUL GHM VSUTPGN UGEHGY, VAM WHASX GHM OYSIGHMPWPGN COUM U VUX LMUMY HZ MOPGNL PM CUL. VYOPGX RAMAFHB, UM UXPLMUGWY MOUM USSHCYX YBYKE LHZMSE LIHRYG CHKX MH VY OYUKX, ZHSSHCYXLHTY MCYGME TYG HZ OPL LAPMY. MOYLY NYGMSYTYG MUSRYX UTHGN MOYTLYSBYLUGX LHTYMPTYL SUANOYX. GYUKYLM HZ USS MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ CUSRYX UOUGXLHTY UXQAMUGM. MOPL CUL IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP. VYLPXY OPT CUL OPLWHTKUXY GYLBPMLRP, U MUSS LMUZZ HZZPWYK, YDMKYTYSE LMHAM, CPMO U RPGXSE,LTPSPGN, OUGXLHTY ZUWY UGX THPLM YEYL. GYLBPMLRP WHASX OUKXSE RYYI ZKHTSUANOMYK IKHBHRYX VE U LCUKMOE OALLUK HZZPWYK COH CUSRYX VYLPXY OPT.MOPL OALLUK, CPMO U NKUBY ZUWY UGX CPMOHAM U LTPSY HK U WOUGNY PG MOYYDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZPDYX YEYL, CUMWOYX MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK'L VUWRUGX TPTPWRYX OPL YBYKE THBYTYGM. YUWO MPTY MOY WHTTUGXYK LMUKMYX UGXVYGM ZHKCUKX, MOY OALLUK LMUKMYX UGX VYGM ZHKCUKX PG YDUWMSE MOY LUTYTUGGYK. GYLBPMLRP SUANOYX UGX GAXNYX MOY HMOYKL MH TURY MOYT SHHR UM MOYCUN.RAMAFHB CUSRYX LSHCSE UGX SUGNAPXSE IULM MOHALUGXL HZ YEYL COPWO CYKYLMUKMPGN ZKHT MOYPK LHWRYML MH CUMWO MOYPK WOPYZ. HG KYUWOPGN MOYMOPKX WHTIUGE OY LAXXYGSE LMHIIYX. OPL LAPMY, GHM OUBPGN YDIYWMYX MOPL,PGBHSAGMUKPSE WUTY WSHLYK MH OPT."UO, MPTHROPG!" LUPX OY, KYWHNGPFPGN MOY KYX-GHLYX WUIMUPG COH OUX VYYGKYIKPTUGXYX HG UWWHAGM HZ MOY VSAY NKYUMWHUM.HGY CHASX OUBY MOHANOM PM PTIHLLPVSY ZHK U TUG MH LMKYMWO OPTLYSZTHKY MOUG MPTHROPG OUX XHGY COYG OY CUL KYIKPTUGXYX VE MOY KYNPTYGMUSWHTTUGXYK, VAM GHC MOUM MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ UXXKYLLYX OPT OY XKYCOPTLYSZ AI MH LAWO UG YDMYGM MOUM PM LYYTYX OY WHASX GHM OUBY LALMUPGYXPM OUX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ WHGMPGAYX MH SHHR UM OPT, UGX LH RAMAFHB,COH YBPXYGMSE AGXYKLMHHX OPL WULY UGX CPLOYX OPT GHMOPGN VAM NHHX,JAPWRSE MAKGYX UCUE, U LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY LTPSY ZSPMMPGN HBYK OPLLWUKKYX UGX IAZZE ZUWY."UGHMOYK PLTUPS WHTKUXY," LUPX OY. "U VKUBY HZZPWYK! UKY EHA LUMPLZPYXCPMO OPT?" OY ULRYX MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK.UGX MOY SUMMYK--AGWHGLWPHAL MOUM OY CUL VYPGN KYZSYWMYX PG MOY OALLUKHZZPWYK UL PG U SHHRPGN NSULL--LMUKMYX, THBYX ZHKCUKX, UGX UGLCYKYX:"OPNOSE LUMPLZPYX, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!""CY USS OUBY HAK CYURGYLLYL," LUPX RAMAFHB LTPSPGN UGX CUSRPGN UCUE ZKHTOPT. "OY ALYX MH OUBY U IKYXPSYWMPHG ZHK VUWWOAL."MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK CUL UZKUPX OY TPNOM VY VSUTYX ZHK MOPL UGX XPXGHM UGLCYK. MOY OALLUK UM MOUM THTYGM GHMPWYX MOY ZUWY HZ MOY KYX-GHLYXWUIMUPG UGX OPL XKUCG-PG LMHTUWO, UGX TPTPWRYX OPL YDIKYLLPHG UGX IHLYCPMO LAWO YDUWMPMAXY MOUM GYLBPMLRP WHASX GHM OYSI SUANOPGN. RAMAFHBMAKGYX KHAGX. MOY HZZPWYK YBPXYGMSE OUX WHTISYMY WHGMKHS HZ OPL ZUWY,UGX COPSY RAMAFHB CUL MAKGPGN TUGUNYX MH TURY U NKPTUWY UGX MOYG ULLATYU THLM LYKPHAL, XYZYKYGMPUS, UGX PGGHWYGM YDIKYLLPHG.MOY MOPKX WHTIUGE CUL MOY SULM, UGX RAMAFHB IHGXYKYX, UIIUKYGMSE MKEPGNMH KYWHSSYWM LHTYMOPGN. IKPGWY UGXKYC LMYIIYX ZHKCUKX ZKHT UTHGN MOYLAPMY UGX LUPX PG ZKYGWO:"EHA MHSX TY MH KYTPGX EHA HZ MOY HZZPWYK XHSHROHB, KYXAWYX MH MOY KUGRLPG MOPL KYNPTYGM.""COYKY PL XHSHROHB?" ULRYX RAMAFHB.XHSHROHB, COH OUX USKYUXE WOUGNYX PGMH U LHSXPYK'L NKUE NKYUMWHUM, XPXGHM CUPM MH VY WUSSYX. MOY LOUIYSE ZPNAKY HZ MOY ZUPK-OUPKYX LHSXPYK,CPMO OPL WSYUK VSAY YEYL, LMYIIYX ZHKCUKX ZKHT MOY KUGRL, CYGM AI MH MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, UGX IKYLYGMYX UKTL."OUBY EHA U WHTISUPGM MH TURY?" RAMAFHB ULRYX CPMO U LSPNOM ZKHCG."MOPL PL XHSHROHB," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC."UO!" LUPX RAMAFHB. "P OHIY MOPL CPSS VY U SYLLHG MH EHA. XH EHAK XAME.MOY YTIYKHK PL NKUWPHAL, UGX P LOUG'M ZHKNYM EHA PZ EHA XYLYKBY CYSS."MOY WSYUK VSAY YEYL SHHRYX UM MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ QALM UL VHSXSE ULMOYE OUX SHHRYX UM MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK, LYYTPGN VE MOYPK YDIKYLLPHGMH MYUK HIYG MOY BYPS HZ WHGBYGMPHG MOUM LYIUKUMYL U WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZLH CPXYSE ZKHT U IKPBUMY."HGY MOPGN P ULR HZ EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," XHSHROHB LUPX PG OPL ZPKT,KPGNPGN, XYSPVYKUMY BHPWY. "P ULR UG HIIHKMAGPME MH UMHGY ZHK TE ZUASMUGX IKHBY TE XYBHMPHG MH OPL TUQYLME MOY YTIYKHK UGX MH KALLPU!"RAMAFHB MAKGYX UCUE. MOY LUTY LTPSY HZ MOY YEYL CPMO COPWO OY OUX MAKGYXZKHT WUIMUPG MPTHROPG UNUPG ZSPMMYX HBYK OPL ZUWY. OY MAKGYX UCUE CPMOU NKPTUWY UL PZ MH LUE MOUM YBYKEMOPGN XHSHROHB OUX LUPX MH OPT UGXYBYKEMOPGN OY WHASX LUE OUX SHGN VYYG RGHCG MH OPT, MOUM OY CUL CYUKE HZPM UGX PM CUL GHM UM USS COUM OY CUGMYX. OY MAKGYX UCUE UGX CYGM MH MOYWUKKPUNY.MOY KYNPTYGM VKHRY AI PGMH WHTIUGPYL, COPWO CYGM MH MOYPK UIIHPGMYXJAUKMYKL GYUK VKUAGUA, COYKY MOYE OHIYX MH KYWYPBY VHHML UGX WSHMOYL UGXMH KYLM UZMYK MOYPK OUKX TUKWOYL."EHA CHG'M VYUK TY U NKAXNY, IKHROHK PNGUMEWO?" LUPX MOY KYNPTYGMUSWHTTUGXYK, HBYKMURPGN MOY MOPKX WHTIUGE HG PML CUE MH PML JAUKMYKL UGXKPXPGN AI MH WUIMUPG MPTHROPG COH CUL CUSRPGN PG ZKHGM. (MOY KYNPTYGMUSWHTTUGXYK'L ZUWY GHC MOUM MOY PGLIYWMPHG CUL OUIIPSE HBYK VYUTYX CPMOPKKYIKYLLPVSY XYSPNOM.) "PM'L PG MOY YTIYKHK'L LYKBPWY... PM WUG'M VYOYSIYX... HGY PL LHTYMPTYL U VPM OULME HG IUKUXY... P UT MOY ZPKLM MHUIHSHNPFY, EHA RGHC TY!... OY CUL BYKE ISYULYX!" UGX OY OYSX HAM OPLOUGX MH MOY WUIMUPG."XHG'M TYGMPHG PM, NYGYKUS, UL PZ P'X VY LH VHSX!" KYISPYX MOY WUIMUPG,OPL GHLY NKHCPGN KYXXYK UL OY NUBY U LTPSY COPWO LOHCYX COYKY MCH ZKHGMMYYMO CYKY TPLLPGN MOUM OUX VYYG RGHWRYX HAM VE MOY VAMM YGX HZ U NAG UMPLTUPS."UGX MYSS TK. XHSHROHB MOUM P CHG'M ZHKNYM OPT--OY TUE VY JAPMY YULE.UGX MYSS TY, ISYULY--P'BY VYYG TYUGPGN MH ULR--OHC PL OY VYOUBPGNOPTLYSZ, UGX PG NYGYKUS...""UL ZUK UL MOY LYKBPWY NHYL OY PL JAPMY IAGWMPSPHAL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE;VAM OPL WOUKUWMYK..." LUPX MOY LAVUSMYKG, SUANOPGN (MOYKYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK CUL GPWRGUTYX RPGN HZ OYUKML).MOY WOYYKZAS THHX HZ MOYPK HZZPWYKL UZMYK MOY PGLIYWMPHG PGZYWMYX MOYLHSXPYKL. MOY WHTIUGE TUKWOYX HG NUPSE. UO,CYSS, GYBYK TPGX, OYKY EHA UKY.""MOYE TPNOM WUSS U OUSM OYKY HK CY'SS OUBY MH XH UGHMOYK ZHAK TPSYLCPMOHAM YUMPGN.""CULG'M PM ZPGY COYG MOHLY NYKTUGL NUBY AL SPZML! EHA QALM LPM LMPSS UGXUKY XKUCG USHGN.""UGX OYKY, ZKPYGX, MOY IYHISY UKY JAPMY VYNNUKSE. MOYKY MOYE USS LYYTYXMH VY IHSYL--USS AGXYK MOY KALLPUG WKHCG--VAM OYKY MOYE'KY USS KYNASUKNYKTUGL.""LPGNYKL MH MOY ZKHGM" WUTY MOY WUIMUPG'L HKXYK.UGX ZKHT MOY XPZZYKYGM KUGRL LHTY MCYGME TYG KUG MH MOY ZKHGM. UXKATTYK, MOYPK SYUXYK, MAKGYX KHAGX ZUWPGN MOY LPGNYKL, UGX ZSHAKPLOPGNOPL UKT, VYNUG U SHGN-XKUCG-HAM LHSXPYKL' LHGN, WHTTYGWPGN CPMO MOYCHKXL: "THKGPGN XUCGYX, MOY LAG CUL KPLPGN," UGX WHGWSAXPGN: "HG MOYG,VKHMOYKL, HG MH NSHKE, SYX VE ZUMOYK RUTYGLRP." MOPL LHGN OUX VYYGWHTIHLYX PG MOY MAKRPLO WUTIUPNG UGX GHC VYPGN LAGN PG UALMKPU, MOY HGSEWOUGNY VYPGN MOUM MOY CHKXL "ZUMOYK RUTYGLRP" CYKY KYISUWYX VE "ZUMOYKRAMAFHB."OUBPGN QYKRYX HAM MOYLY SULM CHKXL UL LHSXPYKL XH UGX CUBYX OPL UKTLUL PZ ZSPGNPGN LHTYMOPGN MH MOY NKHAGX, MOY XKATTYK--U SYUG, OUGXLHTYLHSXPYK HZ ZHKME--SHHRYX LMYKGSE UM MOY LPGNYKL UGX LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL.MOYG OUBPGN LUMPLZPYX OPTLYSZ MOUM USS YEYL CYKY ZPDYX HG OPT, OY KUPLYXVHMO UKTL UL PZ WUKYZASSE SPZMPGN LHTY PGBPLPVSY VAM IKYWPHAL HVQYWMUVHBY OPL OYUX UGX, OHSXPGN PM MOYKY ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL, LAXXYGSE ZSAGN PMXHCG UGX VYNUG:"HO, TE VHCYK, HO, TE VHCYK...!""HO, TE VHCYK GYC...!" WOPTYX PG MCYGME BHPWYL, UGX MOY WULMUGYM ISUEYK,PG LIPMY HZ MOY VAKXYG HZ OPL YJAPITYGM, KALOYX HAM MH MOY ZKHGMUGX, CUSRPGN VUWRCUKXL VYZHKY MOY WHTIUGE, QYKRYX OPL LOHASXYKL UGXZSHAKPLOYX OPL WULMUGYML UL PZ MOKYUMYGPGN LHTYHGY. MOY LHSXPYKL,LCPGNPGN MOYPK UKTL UGX RYYIPGN MPTY LIHGMUGYHALSE, TUKWOYX CPMO SHGNLMYIL. VYOPGX MOY WHTIUGE MOY LHAGX HZ COYYSL, MOY WKYURPGN HZ LIKPGNL,UGX MOY MKUTI HZ OHKLYL' OHHZL CYKY OYUKX. RAMAFHB UGX OPL LAPMY CYKYKYMAKGPGN MH MOY MHCG. MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ TUXY U LPNG MOUM MOYTYG LOHASX WHGMPGAY MH TUKWO UM YULY, UGX OY UGX USS OPL LAPMY LOHCYXISYULAKY UM MOY LHAGX HZ MOY LPGNPGN UGX MOY LPNOM HZ MOY XUGWPGNLHSXPYK UGX MOY NUE UGX LTUKMSE TUKWOPGN TYG. PG MOY LYWHGX ZPSYZKHT MOY KPNOM ZSUGR, VYLPXY COPWO MOY WUKKPUNY IULLYX MOY WHTIUGE,U VSAY-YEYX LHSXPYK PGBHSAGMUKPSE UMMKUWMYX GHMPWY. PM CUL XHSHROHBTUKWOPGN CPMO IUKMPWASUK NKUWY UGX VHSXGYLL PG MPTY MH MOY LHGN UGXSHHRPGN UM MOHLY XKPBPGN IULM UL PZ OY IPMPYX USS COH CYKY GHM UM MOUMTHTYGM TUKWOPGN CPMO MOY WHTIUGE. MOY OALLUK WHKGYM HZ RAMAFHB'L LAPMYCOH OUX TPTPWRYX MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK, ZYSS VUWR ZKHT MOY WUKKPUNYUGX KHXY AI MH XHSHROHB.OALLUK WHKGYM FOYKRHB OUX UM HGY MPTY, PG IYMYKLVAKN, VYSHGNYX MH MOYCPSX LYM SYX VE XHSHROHB. FOYKRHB OUX TYM XHSHROHB UVKHUX UL U IKPBUMYUGX OUX GHM LYYG ZPM MH KYWHNGPFY OPT. VAM GHC MOUM RAMAFHB OUX LIHRYGMH MOY NYGMSYTUG KUGRYK, OY UXXKYLLYX OPT CPMO MOY WHKXPUSPME HZ UG HSXZKPYGX."TE XYUK ZYSSHC, OHC UKY EHA?" LUPX OY MOKHANO MOY LPGNPGN, TURPGN OPLOHKLY RYYI IUWY CPMO MOY WHTIUGE."OHC UT P?" XHSHROHB UGLCYKYX WHSXSE. "P UT UL EHA LYY."MOY SPBYSE LHGN NUBY U LIYWPUS ZSUBHK MH MOY MHGY HZ ZKYY UGX YULENUPYME CPMO COPWO FOYKRHB LIHRY, UGX MH MOY PGMYGMPHGUS WHSXGYLL HZXHSHROHB'L KYISE."UGX OHC XH EHA NYM HG CPMO MOY HZZPWYKL?" PGJAPKYX FOYKRHB."USS KPNOM. MOYE UKY NHHX ZYSSHCL. UGX OHC OUBY EHA CKPNNSYX HGMH MOYLMUZZ?""P CUL UMMUWOYX; P'T HG XAME."VHMO CYKY LPSYGM."LOY SYM MOY OUCR ZSE AICUKX ZKHT OYK CPXY KPNOM LSYYBY," CYGM MOY LHGN,UKHALPGN UG PGBHSAGMUKE LYGLUMPHG HZ WHAKUNY UGX WOYYKZASGYLL. MOYPKWHGBYKLUMPHG CHASX IKHVUVSE OUBY VYYG XPZZYKYGM VAM ZHK MOY YZZYWM HZMOUM LHGN."PL PM MKAY MOUM UALMKPUGL OUBY VYYG VYUMYG?" ULRYX XHSHROHB."MOY XYBPS HGSE RGHCL! MOYE LUE LH.""P'T NSUX," UGLCYKYX XHSHROHB VKPYZSE UGX WSYUKSE, UL MOY LHGN XYTUGXYX."P LUE, WHTY KHAGX LHTY YBYGPGN UGX CY'SS OUBY U NUTY HZ ZUKH!" LUPXFOYKRHB."COE, OUBY EHA MHH TAWO THGYE?""XH WHTY.""P WUG'M. P'BY LCHKG GHM MH. P CHG'M XKPGR UGX CHG'M ISUE MPSS P NYMKYPGLMUMYX.""CYSS, MOUM'L HGSE MPSS MOY ZPKLM YGNUNYTYGM.""CY LOUSS LYY."MOYE CYKY UNUPG LPSYGM."WHTY PZ EHA GYYX UGEMOPGN. PZ P CUGM UGEMOPGN, P CHG'M VYN--P'SSMURY PM!""CYSS, GYBYK TPGX; P HGSE...""UGX P HGSE...""NHHX-VEY.""NHHX OYUSMO..."        "PM'L U SHGN, SHGN CUE.        MH TE GUMPBY SUGX..."FOYKRHB MHAWOYX OPL OHKLY CPMO MOY LIAKL; PM IKUGWYX YDWPMYXSE ZKHT ZHHMMH ZHHM AGWYKMUPG CPMO COPWO MH LMUKM, MOYG LYMMSYX XHCG, NUSSHIYX IULMMOY WHTIUGE, UGX HBYKMHHR MOY WUKKPUNY, LMPSS RYYIPGN MPTY MH MOY LHGN.WOUIMYK PPPHG KYMAKGPGN ZKHT MOY KYBPYC, RAMAFHB MHHR MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS PGMH OPLIKPBUMY KHHT UGX, WUSSPGN OPL UXQAMUGM, ULRYX ZHK LHTY IUIYKL KYSUMPGNMH MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ MOY MKHHIL HG MOYPK UKKPBUS, UGX MOY SYMMYKL MOUMOUX WHTY ZKHT MOY UKWOXARY ZYKXPGUGX, COH CUL PG WHTTUGX HZ MOY UXBUGWYXUKTE. IKPGWY UGXKYC VHSRHGLRP WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT CPMO MOY KYJAPKYXIUIYKL. RAMAFHB UGX MOY UALMKPUG TYTVYK HZ MOY OHZRKPYNLKUMO CYKYLPMMPGN UM MOY MUVSY HG COPWO U ISUG CUL LIKYUX HAM."UO!..." LUPX RAMAFHB NSUGWPGN UM VHSRHGLRP UL PZ VE MOPL YDWSUTUMPHG OYCUL ULRPGN MOY UXQAMUGM MH CUPM, UGX OY CYGM HG CPMO MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG PGZKYGWO."USS P WUG LUE, NYGYKUS," LUPX OY CPMO U ISYULUGM YSYNUGWY HZ YDIKYLLPHGUGX PGMHGUMPHG MOUM HVSPNYX HGY MH SPLMYG MH YUWO XYSPVYKUMYSE LIHRYGCHKX. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM RAMAFHB OPTLYSZ SPLMYGYX CPMO ISYULAKY MH OPLHCG BHPWY. "USS P WUG LUE, NYGYKUS, PL MOUM PZ MOY TUMMYK XYIYGXYX HG TEIYKLHGUS CPLOYL, MOY CPSS HZ OPL TUQYLME MOY YTIYKHK ZKUGWPL CHASX OUBYVYYG ZASZPSSYX SHGN UNH. P LOHASX SHGN UNH OUBY QHPGYX MOY UKWOXARY. UGXVYSPYBY TY HG TE OHGHAK MOUM MH TY IYKLHGUSSE PM CHASX VY U ISYULAKYMH OUGX HBYK MOY LAIKYTY WHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTE PGMH MOY OUGXL HZ U VYMMYKPGZHKTYX UGX THKY LRPSSZAS NYGYKUS--HZ COHT UALMKPU OUL LH TUGE--UGX MHSUE XHCG USS MOPL OYUBE KYLIHGLPVPSPME. VAM WPKWATLMUGWYL UKY LHTYMPTYLMHH LMKHGN ZHK AL, NYGYKUS."UGX RAMAFHB LTPSYX PG U CUE MOUM LYYTYX MH LUE, "EHA UKY JAPMY UMSPVYKME GHM MH VYSPYBY TY UGX P XHG'M YBYG WUKY COYMOYK EHA XH HK GHM,VAM EHA OUBY GH NKHAGXL ZHK MYSSPGN TY LH. UGX MOUM PL MOY COHSY IHPGM."MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS SHHRYX XPLLUMPLZPYX, VAM OUX GH HIMPHG VAM MH KYISEPG MOY LUTY MHGY."HG MOY WHGMKUKE," OY LUPX, PG U JAYKASHAL UGX UGNKE MHGY MOUMWHGMKULMYX CPMO OPL ZSUMMYKPGN CHKXL, "HG MOY WHGMKUKE, EHAKYDWYSSYGWE'L IUKMPWPIUMPHG PG MOY WHTTHG UWMPHG PL OPNOSE BUSAYX VEOPL TUQYLME; VAM CY MOPGR MOY IKYLYGM XYSUE PL XYIKPBPGN MOY LISYGXPXKALLPUG MKHHIL UGX MOYPK WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY SUAKYSL MOYE OUBY VYYGUWWALMHTYX MH CPG PG MOYPK VUMMSYL," OY WHGWSAXYX OPL YBPXYGMSEIKYUKKUGNYX LYGMYGWY.RAMAFHB VHCYX CPMO MOY LUTY LTPSY."VAM MOUM PL TE WHGBPWMPHG, UGX QAXNPGN VE MOY SULM SYMMYK CPMO COPWOOPL OPNOGYLL MOY UKWOXARY ZYKXPGUGX OUL OHGHKYX TY, P PTUNPGY MOUM MOYUALMKPUG MKHHIL, AGXYK MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ LH LRPSSZAS U SYUXYK UL NYGYKUSTUWR, OUBY VE GHC USKYUXE NUPGYX U XYWPLPBY BPWMHKE UGX GH SHGNYK GYYXHAK UPX," LUPX RAMAFHB.MOY NYGYKUS ZKHCGYX. MOHANO MOYKY CUL GH XYZPGPMY GYCL HZ UG UALMKPUGXYZYUM, MOYKY CYKY TUGE WPKWATLMUGWYL WHGZPKTPGN MOY AGZUBHKUVSY KATHKLMOUM CYKY UZSHUM, UGX LH RAMAFHB'L LANNYLMPHG HZ UG UALMKPUG BPWMHKELHAGXYX TAWO SPRY PKHGE. VAM RAMAFHB CYGM HG VSUGXSE LTPSPGN CPMO MOYLUTY YDIKYLLPHG, COPWO LYYTYX MH LUE MOUM OY OUX U KPNOM MH LAIIHLY LH.UGX, PG ZUWM, MOY SULM SYMMYK OY OUX KYWYPBYX ZKHT TUWR'L UKTE PGZHKTYXOPT HZ U BPWMHKE UGX LMUMYX LMKUMYNPWUSSE MOY IHLPMPHG HZ MOY UKTE CULBYKE ZUBHKUVSY."NPBY TY MOUM SYMMYK," LUPX RAMAFHB MAKGPGN MH IKPGWY UGXKYC. "ISYULYOUBY U SHHR UM PM"--UGX RAMAFHB CPMO UG PKHGPWUS LTPSY UVHAM MOY WHKGYKLHZ OPL THAMO KYUX MH MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS MOY ZHSSHCPGN IULLUNY, PGNYKTUG, ZKHT MOY UKWOXARY ZYKXPGUGX'L SYMMYK:CY OUBY ZASSE WHGWYGMKUMYX ZHKWYL HZ GYUKSE LYBYGME MOHALUGX TYG CPMOCOPWO MH UMMUWR UGX XYZYUM MOY YGYTE LOHASX OY WKHLL MOY SYWO. USLH,UL CY UKY TULMYKL HZ AST, CY WUGGHM VY XYIKPBYX HZ MOY UXBUGMUNY HZWHTTUGXPGN VHMO LPXYL HZ MOY XUGAVY, LH MOUM LOHASX MOY YGYTE GHMWKHLL MOY SYWO, CY WUG WKHLL MOY XUGAVY, MOKHC HAKLYSBYL HG OPL SPGYHZ WHTTAGPWUMPHGL, KYWKHLL MOY KPBYK SHCYK XHCG, UGX ZKALMKUMY OPLPGMYGMPHG LOHASX OY MKE MH XPKYWM OPL COHSY ZHKWY UNUPGLM HAK ZUPMOZASUSSE. CY LOUSS MOYKYZHKY WHGZPXYGMSE UCUPM MOY THTYGM COYG MOY PTIYKPUSKALLPUG UKTE CPSS VY ZASSE YJAPIIYX, UGX LOUSS MOYG, PG WHGQAGWMPHG CPMOPM, YULPSE ZPGX U CUE MH IKYIUKY ZHK MOY YGYTE MOY ZUMY OY XYLYKBYL.RAMAFHB LPNOYX XYYISE HG ZPGPLOPGN MOPL IUKUNKUIO UGX SHHRYX UM MOYTYTVYK HZ MOY OHZRKPYNLKUMO TPSXSE UGX UMMYGMPBYSE."VAM EHA RGHC MOY CPLY TUDPT EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, UXBPLPGN HGY MH YDIYWM MOYCHKLM," LUPX MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUS, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH OUBY XHGY CPMOQYLML UGX MH WHTY MH VALPGYLL. OY PGBHSAGMUKPSE SHHRYX KHAGX UM MOYUPXY-XY-WUTI."YDWALY TY, NYGYKUS," PGMYKKAIMYX RAMAFHB, USLH MAKGPGN MH IKPGWYUGXKYC. "SHHR OYKY, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, NYM ZKHT RHFSHBLRP USS MOY KYIHKMLZKHT HAK LWHAML. (UG HZZPWYK GPWRGUTYX "MOYKUM") OY LUPX, KAVVPGN OPL ZHKYOYUX UGX COHSY ZUWY CPMO VHMO OUGXL."QALM ZUGWE, OY XPXG'M SYM TY CPG U LPGNSY WUOX, GHM HGY WUOX."OY MHHR MOY SPNOMYX IPIY MOUM CUL HZZYKYX MH OPT, NKPIIYX PM PG OPLZPLM, UGX MUIIYX PM HG MOY ZSHHK, TURPGN MOY LIUKRL ZSE, COPSY OYWHGMPGAYX MH LOHAM."OY SYML HGY CPG MOY LPGNSYL UGX WHSSUOL PM UL LHHG UL HGY XHAVSYL PM;NPBYL MOY LPGNSYL UGX LGUMWOYL MOY XHAVSYL!"OY LWUMMYKYX MOY VAKGPGN MHVUWWH, LTULOYX MOY IPIY, UGX MOKYC PM UCUE.MOYG OY KYTUPGYX LPSYGM ZHK U COPSY, UGX USS UM HGWY SHHRYX WOYYKZASSECPMO OPL NSPMMYKPGN, VSUWR YEYL UM KHLMHB."PZ UM SYULM CY OUX LHTY CHTYG OYKY; VAM MOYKY'L GHMOPGN ZHO HGY MH XHVAM XCPGR. OY LUPX CPMO U LPNO, UGX ZKHT AGXYK OPL SPZMYX VKHCLOY NSUGWYX PGMH KHLMHB'L YEYL.LHTY ZSULO UL HZ UG YSYWMKPW LIUKR LOHM ZKHT MYSEUGPG'L YEYL MH KHLMHB'LUGX VUWR, UGX VUWR UNUPG UGX UNUPG PG UG PGLMUGM."WHTY OYKY," LUPX KHLMHB, WUMWOPGN OHSX HZ MYSEUGPG'L UKT UGX USTHLMXKUNNPGN OPT MH MOY CPGXHC. OY CUL NSUX, UGX UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM VYNUG MH IPME MOYTPLYKUVSY TUG COH LMHHX VYZHKY OPT, VAM MOY MULR OY OUX VYNAG OUX MH VYWHTISYMYX."OYUBYG HGSE RGHCL COUM MOY IYHISY OYKY TUE PTUNPGY," TAMMYKYX MYSEUGPG,MURPGN AI OPL WUI UGX THBPGN MHCUKX U LTUSS YTIME KHHT. "CY TALM OUBY UGYDISUGUMPHG...""P RGHC PM UGX LOUSS IKHBY PM," LUPX KHLMHB."P..."YBYKE TALWSY HZ MYSEUGPG'L IUSY, MYKKPZPYX ZUWY VYNUG MH JAPBYK, OPLYEYL LMPSS LOPZMYX ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY VAM CPMO U XHCGCUKX SHHR GHM KPLPGNMH KHLMHB'L ZUWY, UGX OPL LHVL CYKY UAXPVSY."WHAGM!... "P OUBY UG HSX ZUMOYK UGXTHMOYK!..."KHLMHB MHHR MOY THGYE, UBHPXPGN MYSEUGPG'L YEYL, UGX CYGM HAM HZ MOYKHHT CPMOHAM U CHKX. VAM UM MOY XHHK OY LMHIIYX UGX MOYG KYMKUWYX OPLLMYIL. "H NHX," OY LUPX CPMO MYUKL PG OPL YEYL, "OHC WHASX EHA XH PM?""WHAGM..." LUPX MYSEUGPG XKUCPGN GYUKYK MH OPT."XHG'M MHAWO TY," LUPX KHLMHB, XKUCPGN VUWR. "PZ EHA GYYX PM, MURY MOYTHGYE," UGX OY MOKYC MOY IAKLY MH OPT UGX KUG HAM HZ MOY PGG.WOUIMYK BMOUM LUTY YBYGPGN MOYKY CUL UG UGPTUMYX XPLWALLPHG UTHGN MOY LJAUXKHG'LHZZPWYKL PG XYGPLHB'L JAUKMYKL."UGX P MYSS EHA, KHLMHB, MOUM EHA TALM UIHSHNPFY MH MOY WHSHGYS!" LUPXU MUSS, NKPFFSE-OUPKYX LMUZZ WUIMUPG, CPMO YGHKTHAL TALMUWOYL UGXTUGE CKPGRSYL HG OPL SUKNY ZYUMAKYL, MH KHLMHB COH CUL WKPTLHG CPMOYDWPMYTYGM.MOY LMUZZ WUIMUPG, RPKLMYG, OUX MCPWY VYYG KYXAWYX MH MOY KUGRL ZHKUZZUPKL HZ OHGHK UGX OUX MCPWY KYNUPGYX OPL WHTTPLLPHG."P CPSS USSHC GH HGY MH WUSS TY U SPUK!" WKPYX KHLMHB. "OY MHSX TY PSPYX, UGX P MHSX OPT OY SPYX. UGX MOYKY PM KYLML. OY TUE RYYI TY HGXAME YBYKE XUE, HK TUE ISUWY TY AGXYK UKKYLM, VAM GH HGY WUG TURY TYUIHSHNPFY, VYWUALY PZ OY, UL WHTTUGXYK HZ MOPL KYNPTYGM, MOPGRL PMVYGYUMO OPL XPNGPME MH NPBY TY LUMPLZUWMPHG, MOYG...""EHA QALM CUPM U THTYGM, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, UGX SPLMYG," PGMYKKAIMYX MOYLMUZZ WUIMUPG PG OPL XYYI VULL, WUSTSE LMKHRPGN OPL SHGN TALMUWOY. "EHAMYSS MOY WHSHGYS PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ HMOYK HZZPWYKL MOUM UG HZZPWYK OULLMHSYG...""P'T GHM MH VSUTY MOUM MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG VYNUG PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ HMOYKHZZPWYKL. IYKOUIL P HANOM GHM MH OUBY LIHRYG VYZHKY MOYT, VAM P UT GHMU XPISHTUMPLM. MOUM'L COE P QHPGYX MOY OALLUKL, MOPGRPGN MOUM OYKY HGYCHASX GHM GYYX ZPGYLLY; UGX OY MYSSL TY MOUM P UT SEPGN--LH SYM OPT NPBYTY LUMPLZUWMPHG...""MOUM'L USS KPNOM. WHTTUGXYX MOY HZZPWYK.PG U THTYGM MOY TYG WUTY KAGGPGN NUPSE ZKHT MOYPK WUTIZPKYL UGX VYNUGSHUXPGN."HGY!" WUTY MOY WHTTUGX.GATVYK HGY QATIYX VKPLRSE ULPXY. MOY NAG KUGN HAM CPMO U XYUZYGPGNTYMUSSPW KHUK, UGX U COPLMSPGN NKYGUXY ZSYC UVHBY MOY OYUXL HZ HAKMKHHIL VYSHC MOY OPSS UGX ZYSS ZUK LOHKM HZ MOY YGYTE, U SPMMSY LTHRYLOHCPGN MOY LIHM COYKY PM VAKLM.MOY ZUWYL HZ HZZPWYKL UGX TYG VKPNOMYGYX AI UM MOY LHAGX. UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM MOY LAG WUTY ZASSEHAM ZKHT VYOPGX MOY WSHAXL, UGX MOY WSYUK LHAGX HZ MOY LHSPMUKE LOHMUGX MOY VKPSSPUGWY HZ MOY VKPNOM LAGLOPGY TYKNYX PG U LPGNSY QHEHAL UGXLIPKPMYX PTIKYLLPHG.WOUIMYK BPPMCH HZ MOY YGYTE'L LOHML OUX USKYUXE ZSHCG UWKHLL MOY VKPXNY, COYKYMOYKY CUL U WKALO. OUSZCUE UWKHLL LMHHX IKPGWY GYLBPMLRP, COH OUXUSPNOMYX ZKHT OPL OHKLY UGX COHLY VPN VHXE CUL QUTTYX UNUPGLM MOYKUPSPGNL. YUWO MPTY IKPGWYGYLBPMLRP MKPYX MH THBY HG, LHSXPYKL UGX WUKML IALOYX OPT VUWR UNUPG UGXIKYLLYX OPT UNUPGLM MOY KUPSPGNL, UGX USS OY WHASX XH CUL MH LTPSY."COUM U ZPGY ZYSSHC EHA UKY, ZKPYGX!" XHG'M EHA LYY MOY NYGYKUS CUGML MH IULL?"VAM MOY WHGBHETUG MHHR GH GHMPWY HZ MOY CHKX "NYGYKUS" UGX LOHAMYX UMMOY LHSXPYKL COH CYKY VSHWRPGN OPL CUE. "OP MOYKY, VHEL! RYYI MH MOYSYZM! CUPM U VPM." VAM MOY LHSXPYKL, WKHCXYX MHNYMOYK LOHASXYK MHLOHASXYK, MOYPK VUEHGYML PGMYKSHWRPGN, THBYX HBYK MOY VKPXNY PG U XYGLYTULL. SHHRPGN XHCG HBYK MOY KUPSL IKPGWY GYLBPMLRP LUC MOY KUIPX, GHPLESPMMSY CUBYL HZ MOY YGGL, COPWO KPIISPGN UGX YXXEPGN KHAGX MOY IPSYL HZMOY VKPXNY WOULYX YUWO HMOYK USHGN. SHHRPGN HG MOY VKPXNY OY LUC YJAUSSEAGPZHKT SPBPGN CUBYL HZ LHSXPYKL, LOHASXYK LMKUIL, WHBYKYX LOURHL,RGUILUWRL, VUEHGYML, SHGN TALRYML, UGX, AGXYK MOY LOURHL, ZUWYL CPMOVKHUX WOYYRVHGYL, LAGRYG WOYYRL, UGX SPLMSYLL MPKYX YDIKYLLPHGL, UGXZYYM MOUM THBYX MOKHANO MOY LMPWRE TAX MOUM WHBYKYX MOY ISUGRL HZ MOYVKPXNY. LHTYMPTYL MOKHANO MOY THGHMHGHAL CUBYL HZ TYG, SPRY U ZSYWR HZCOPMY ZHUT HG MOY CUBYL HZ MOY YGGL, UG HZZPWYK, PG U WSHUR UGX CPMOU MEIY HZ ZUWY XPZZYKYGM ZKHT MOUM HZ MOY TYG, LJAYYFYX OPL CUE USHGN;LHTYMPTYL SPRY U WOPI HZ CHHX COPKSPGN PG MOY KPBYK, UG OALLUK HG ZHHM,UG HKXYKSE, HK U MHCGLTUG CUL WUKKPYX MOKHANO MOY CUBYL HZ PGZUGMKE; UGXLHTYMPTYL SPRY U SHN ZSHUMPGN XHCG MOY KPBYK, UG HZZPWYKL' HK WHTIUGE'LVUNNUNY CUNHG, IPSYX OPNO, SYUMOYK WHBYKYX, UGX OYTTYX PG HG USS LPXYL,THBYX UWKHLL MOY VKPXNY."PM'L UL PZ U XUT OUX VAKLM," LUPX MOY WHLLUWR OHIYSYLLSE. "UKY MOYKYTUGE THKY HZ EHA MH WHTY?""U TPSSPHG USS VAM HGY!" KYISPYX U CUNNPLO LHSXPYK PG U MHKG WHUM, CPMOU CPGR, UGX IULLYX HG ZHSSHCYX VE UGHMOYK, UG HSX TUG."PZ OY" (OY TYUGM MOY YGYTE) "VYNPGL IHIIPGN UM MOY VKPXNY GHC,"LUPX MOY HSX LHSXPYK XPLTUSSE MH U WHTKUXY, "EHA'SS ZHKNYM MH LWKUMWOEHAKLYSZ."MOUM LHSXPYK IULLYX HG, UGX UZMYK OPT WUTY UGHMOYK LPMMPGN HG U WUKM."COYKY MOY XYBPS OUBY MOY SYN VUGXL VYYG LOHBYX MH?" LUPX UG HKXYKSE,KAGGPGN VYOPGX MOY WUKM UGX ZATVSPGN PG MOY VUWR HZ PM.UGX OY USLH IULLYX HG CPMO MOY CUNHG. MOYG WUTY LHTY TYKKE LHSXPYKL COHOUX YBPXYGMSE VYYG XKPGRPGN."UGX MOYG, HSX ZYSSHC, OY NPBYL OPT HGY PG MOY MYYMO CPMO MOY VAMM YGXHZ OPL NAG..." U LHSXPYK COHLY NKYUMWHUM CUL CYSS MAWRYX AI LUPX NUPSE,CPMO U CPXY LCPGN HZ OPL UKT."EYL, MOY OUT CUL QALM XYSPWPHAL..." UGLCYKYX UGHMOYK CPMO U SHAX SUANO.UGX MOYE, MHH, IULLYX HG, LH MOUM GYLBPMLRP XPX GHM SYUKG COH OUX VYYGLMKAWR HG MOY MYYMO, HK COUM MOY OUT OUX MH XH CPMO PM."VUO! OHC MOYE LWAKKE. OY QALM LYGXL U VUSS UGX MOYE MOPGR MOYE'SS USSVY RPSSYX," U LYKNYUGM CUL LUEPGN UGNKPSE UGX KYIKHUWOZASSE."UL PM ZSPYL IULM TY, XUXXE, MOY VUSS P TYUG," LUPX U EHAGN LHSXPYK CPMOUG YGHKTHAL THAMO, OUKXSE KYZKUPGPGN ZKHT SUANOPGN, "P ZYSM SPRY XEPGNHZ ZKPNOM. P XPX, 'IHG TE CHKX, P NHM MOUM ZKPNOMYGYX!" LUPX OY, UL PZVKUNNPGN HZ OUBPGN VYYG ZKPNOMYGYX.MOUM HGY USLH IULLYX. MOYG ZHSSHCYX U WUKM AGSPRY UGE MOUM OUX NHGYVYZHKY. PM CUL U NYKTUG WUKM CPMO U IUPK HZ OHKLYL SYX VE U NYKTUG, UGXLYYTYX SHUXYX CPMO U COHSY OHALYZAS HZ YZZYWML. U ZPGY VKPGXSYX WHC CPMOU SUKNY AXXYK CUL UMMUWOYX MH MOY WUKM VYOPGX. U CHTUG CPMO UG AGCYUGYXVUVE, UG HSX CHTUG, UGX U OYUSMOE NYKTUG NPKS CPMO VKPNOM KYX WOYYRLCYKY LPMMPGN HG LHTY ZYUMOYK VYXL. YBPXYGMSE MOYLY ZANPMPBYL CYKYUSSHCYX MH IULL VE LIYWPUS IYKTPLLPHG. MOY YEYL HZ USS MOY LHSXPYKLMAKGYX MHCUKX MOY CHTYG, UGX COPSY MOY BYOPWSY CUL IULLPGN UM ZHHM IUWYUSS MOY LHSXPYKL' KYTUKRL KYSUMYX MH MOY MCH EHAGN HGYL. HO, MOY XYBPSL!""MOYKY, ZYXHMHB, EHA LOHASX VY JAUKMYKYX HG MOYT!""P OUBY LYYG UL TAWO VYZHKY GHC, TUMY!""COYKY UKY EHA NHPGN?" ULRYX UG PGZUGMKE HZZPWYK COH CUL YUMPGN UGUIISY, USLH OUSZ LTPSPGN UL OY SHHRYX UM MOY OUGXLHTY NPKS.MOY NYKTUG WSHLYX OPL YEYL, LPNGPZEPGN MOUM OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX."MURY PM PZ EHA SPRY," LUPX MOY HZZPWYK, NPBPGN MOY NPKS UG UIISY.MOY NPKS LTPSYX UGX MHHR PM. GYLBPMLRP SPRY MOY KYLM HZ MOY TYG HG MOYVKPXNY XPX GHM MURY OPL YEYL HZZ MOY CHTYG MPSS MOYE OUX IULLYX. COYGMOYE OUX NHGY VE, MOY LUTY LMKYUT HZ LHSXPYKL ZHSSHCYX, CPMO MOY LUTYRPGX HZ MUSR, UGX UM SULM USS LMHIIYX. LUPX MOY LHSXPYKL."COYKY UKY EHA LOHBPGN MH? XYBPS MURY EHA! WUG'M EHA CUPM? PM'SSVY CHKLY PZ OY ZPKYL MOY VKPXNY. LYY, OYKY'L UG HZZPWYK QUTTYX PGMHH"--XPZZYKYGM BHPWYL CYKY LUEPGN PG MOY WKHCX, UL MOY TYG SHHRYX UMHGY UGHMOYK, UGX USS IKYLLYX MHCUKX MOY YDPM ZKHT MOY VKPXNY.SHHRPGN XHCG UM MOY CUMYKL HZ MOY YGGL AGXYK MOY VKPXNY, GYLBPMLRPLAXXYGSE OYUKX U LHAGX GYC MH OPT, HZ LHTYMOPGN LCPZMSE UIIKHUWOPGN...LHTYMOPGN VPN, MOUM LISULOYX PGMH MOY CUMYK."QALM LYY COYKY PM WUKKPYL MH!" U LHSXPYK GYUK VE LUPX LMYKGSE, SHHRPGNKHAGX UM MOY LHAGX."YGWHAKUNPGN AL MH NYM USHGN JAPWRYK," LUPX UGHMOYK AGYULPSE.MOY WKHCX THBYX HG UNUPG. EHA GATLRASS!" WUTY U OHUKLY BHPWY ZKHT VYOPGXOPT.GYLBPMLRP SHHRYX KHAGX UGX LUC, LHTY ZPZMYYG IUWYL UCUE VAM LYIUKUMYX VEMOY SPBPGN TULL HZ THBPGN PGZUGMKE, BULRU XYGPLHB, KYX UGX LOUNNE, CPMOOPL WUI HG MOY VUWR HZ OPL VSUWR OYUX UGX U WSHUR OUGNPGN QUAGMPSE HBYKOPL LOHASXYK."MYSS MOYLY XYBPSL, MOYLY ZPYGXL, MH SYM TY IULL!" LOHAMYX XYGPLHBYBPXYGMSE PG U ZPM HZ KUNY, OPL WHUS-VSUWR YEYL CPMO MOYPK VSHHXLOHMCOPMYL NSPMMYKPGN UGX KHSSPGN UL OY CUBYX OPL LOYUMOYX LUVYK PG U LTUSSVUKY OUGX UL KYX UL OPL ZUWY."UO, BULRU!" P'BY LOUBYX, VCALOYX TE MYYMO, UGXLWYGMYX TELYSZ."MOY PTIHLPGN ZPNAKY HZ GYLBPMLRP ZHSSHCYX VE OPL WHLLUWR, UGXMOY XYMYKTPGUMPHG HZ XYGPLHB COH ZSHAKPLOYX OPL LCHKX UGX LOHAMYXZKUGMPWUSSE, OUX LAWO UG YZZYWM MOUM MOYE TUGUNYX MH LJAYYFY MOKHANOMH MOY ZUKMOYK LPXY HZ MOY VKPXNY UGX LMHIIYX MOY PGZUGMKE. VYLPXY MOYVKPXNY GYLBPMLRP ZHAGX MOY WHSHGYS MH COHT OY OUX MH XYSPBYK MOY HKXYK,UGX OUBPGN XHGY MOPL OY KHXY VUWR.OUBPGN WSYUKYX MOY CUE XYGPLHB LMHIIYX UM MOY YGX HZ MOY VKPXNY.WUKYSYLLSE OHSXPGN PG OPL LMUSSPHG MOUM CUL GYPNOPGN UGX IUCPGN MOYNKHAGX, YUNYK MH KYQHPG PML ZYSSHCL, OY CUMWOYX OPL LJAUXKHG XKUCGYUKYK. MOYG MOY WSUGN HZ OHHZL, UL HZ LYBYKUS OHKLYL NUSSHIPGN,KYLHAGXYX HG MOY ISUGRL HZ MOY VKPXNY, UGX MOY LJAUXKHG, HZZPWYKL PGZKHGM UGX TYG ZHAK UVKYULM, LIKYUX UWKHLL MOY VKPXNY UGX VYNUG MH YTYKNYHG OPL LPXY HZ PM.MOY PGZUGMKE COH OUX VYYG LMHIIYX WKHCXYX GYUK MOY VKPXNY PG MOYMKUTISYX TAX UGX NUFYX CPMO MOUM IUKMPWASUK ZYYSPGN HZ PSS-CPSS,YLMKUGNYTYGM, UGX KPXPWASY CPMO COPWO MKHHIL HZ XPZZYKYGM UKTL ALAUSSEYGWHAGMYK HGY UGHMOYK UM MOY WSYUG, LTUKM OALLUKL COH THBYX IULM MOYT PGKYNASUK HKXYK."LTUKM SUXL! EHA'X SHHR ZPGY,"LUPX U WHKIHKUS, WOUZZPGN U MOPG SPMMSY LHSXPYK COH VYGM AGXYK MOYCYPNOM HZ OPL RGUILUWR."MURY U LMPWR VYMCYYG EHAK SYNL, MOUM'SS LAPM EHA ZHK U OHKLY!" MOYOALLUK LOHAMYX VUWR.WOUIMYK BPPPMOY SULM HZ MOY PGZUGMKE OAKKPYXSE WKHLLYX MOY VKPXNY, LJAYYFPGNMHNYMOYK UL MOYE UIIKHUWOYX PM UL PZ IULLPGN MOKHANO U ZAGGYS. UM SULMMOY VUNNUNY CUNHGL OUX USS WKHLLYX, MOY WKALO CUL SYLL, UGX MOY SULMVUMMUSPHG WUTY HGMH MOY VKPXNY. HGSE XYGPLHB'L LJAUXKHG HZ OALLUKLKYTUPGYX HG MOY ZUKMOYK LPXY HZ MOY VKPXNY ZUWPGN MOY YGYTE, COH WHASXVY LYYG ZKHT MOY OPSS HG MOY HIIHLPMY VUGR VAM CUL GHM EYM BPLPVSY ZKHTMOY VKPXNY, ZHK MOY OHKPFHG UL LYYG ZKHT MOY BUSSYE MOKHANO COPWO MOYKPBYK ZSHCYX CUL ZHKTYX VE MOY KPLPGN NKHAGX HGSE OUSZ U TPSY UCUE.UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY OPSS SUE CULMYSUGX HBYK COPWO U ZYC NKHAIL HZ HAKWHLLUWR LWHAML CYKY THBPGN. LAXXYGSE HG MOY KHUX UM MOY MHI HZ MOY OPNONKHAGX, UKMPSSYKE UGX MKHHIL PG VSAY AGPZHKT CYKY LYYG. MOYLY CYKY MOYZKYGWO. U NKHAI HZ WHLLUWR LWHAML KYMPKYX XHCG MOY OPSS UM U MKHM. USSMOY HZZPWYKL UGX TYG HZ XYGPLHB'L LJAUXKHG, MOHANO MOYE MKPYX MH MUSR HZHMOYK MOPGNL UGX MH SHHR PG HMOYK XPKYWMPHGL, MOHANOM HGSE HZ COUMCUL MOYKY HG MOY OPSSMHI, UGX RYIM WHGLMUGMSE SHHRPGN UM MOY IUMWOYLUIIYUKPGN HG MOY LRESPGY, COPWO MOYE RGYC MH VY MOY YGYTE'L MKHHIL. MOYCYUMOYK OUX WSYUKYX UNUPG LPGWY GHHG UGX MOY LAG CUL XYLWYGXPGN VKPNOMSEAIHG MOY XUGAVY UGX MOY XUKR OPSSL UKHAGX PM. PM CUL WUST, UGX UMPGMYKBUSL MOY VANSY WUSSL UGX MOY LOHAML HZ MOY YGYTE WHASX VY OYUKXZKHT MOY OPSS. MOYKY CUL GH HGY GHC VYMCYYG MOY LJAUXKHG UGX MOY YGYTEYDWYIM U ZYC LWUMMYKYX LRPKTPLOYKL. UG YTIME LIUWY HZ LHTY LYBYG OAGXKYXEUKXL CUL USS MOUM LYIUKUMYX MOYT. MOY YGYTE WYULYX ZPKPGN, UGX MOUMLMYKG, MOKYUMYGPGN, PGUWWYLLPVSY, UGX PGMUGNPVSY SPGY COPWO LYIUKUMYLMCH OHLMPSY UKTPYL CUL USS MOY THKY WSYUKSE ZYSM."HGY LMYI VYEHGX MOUM VHAGXUKE SPGY COPWO KYLYTVSYL MOY SPGY XPBPXPGNMOY SPBPGN ZKHT MOY XYUX SPYL AGWYKMUPGME, LAZZYKPGN, UGX XYUMO. UGXCOUM PL MOYKY? COH PL MOYKY?--MOYKY VYEHGX MOUM ZPYSX, MOUM MKYY, MOUMKHHZ SPM AI VE MOY LAG? GH HGY RGHCL, VAM HGY CUGML MH RGHC. EHA ZYUKUGX EYM SHGN MH WKHLL MOUM SPGY, UGX RGHC MOUM LHHGYK HK SUMYK PM TALMVY WKHLLYX UGX EHA CPSS OUBY MH ZPGX HAM COUM PL MOYKY, QALM UL EHA CPSSPGYBPMUVSE OUBY MH SYUKG COUM SPYL MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ XYUMO. VAM EHA UKYLMKHGN, OYUSMOE, WOYYKZAS, UGX YDWPMYX, UGX UKY LAKKHAGXYX VE HMOYK LAWOYDWPMYXSE UGPTUMYX UGX OYUSMOE TYG." LH MOPGRL, HK UM UGE KUMY ZYYSL,UGEHGY COH WHTYL PG LPNOM HZ MOY YGYTE, UGX MOUM ZYYSPGN NPBYL UIUKMPWASUK NSUTHAK UGX NSUX RYYGGYLL HZ PTIKYLLPHG MH YBYKEMOPGN MOUMMURYL ISUWY UM LAWO THTYGML.HG MOY OPNO NKHAGX COYKY MOY YGYTE CUL, MOY LTHRY HZ U WUGGHG KHLY,UGX U VUSS ZSYC COPLMSPGN HBYK MOY OYUXL HZ MOY OALLUK LJAUXKHG. MOYHZZPWYKL COH OUX VYYG LMUGXPGN MHNYMOYK KHXY HZZ MH MOYPK ISUWYL. MOYOALLUKL VYNUG WUKYZASSE USPNGPGN MOYPK OHKLYL. LPSYGWY ZYSS HG MOY COHSYLJAUXKHG. USS CYKY SHHRPGN UM MOY YGYTE PG ZKHGM UGX UM MOY LJAUXKHGWHTTUGXYK, UCUPMPGN MOY CHKX HZ WHTTUGX. U LYWHGX UGX U MOPKX WUGGHGVUSS ZSYC IULM. YBPXYGMSE MOYE CYKY ZPKPGN UM MOY OALLUKL, VAM MOY VUSSLCPMO KUIPX KOEMOTPW COPLMSY ZSYC HBYK MOY OYUXL HZ MOY OHKLYTYG UGX ZYSSLHTYCOYKY VYEHGX MOYT. MOY OALLUKL XPX GHM SHHR KHAGX, VAM UM MOY LHAGXHZ YUWO LOHM, UL UM MOY CHKX HZ WHTTUGX, MOY COHSY LJAUXKHG CPMO PMLKHCL HZ ZUWYL LH USPRY EYM LH XPZZYKYGM, OHSXPGN PML VKYUMO COPSY MOYVUSS ZSYC IULM, KHLY PG MOY LMPKKAIL UGX LUGR VUWR UNUPG. MOY LHSXPYKLCPMOHAM MAKGPGN MOYPK OYUXL NSUGWYX UM HGY UGHMOYK, WAKPHAL MH LYY MOYPKWHTKUXYL' PTIKYLLPHG. YBYKE ZUWY, ZKHT XYGPLHB'L MH MOUM HZ MOY VANSYK,LOHCYX HGY WHTTHG YDIKYLLPHG HZ WHGZSPWM, PKKPMUMPHG, UGX YDWPMYTYGM,UKHAGX WOPG UGX THAMO. MOY JAUKMYKTULMYK ZKHCGYX, SHHRPGN UM MOYLHSXPYKL UL PZ MOKYUMYGPGN MH IAGPLO MOYT. WUXYM TPKHGHB XAWRYX YBYKEMPTY U VUSS ZSYC IULM. KHLMHB HG MOY SYZM ZSUGR, THAGMYX HG OPL KHHR--UOUGXLHTY OHKLY XYLIPMY PML NUTY SYN--OUX MOY OUIIE UPK HZ U LWOHHSVHEWUSSYX AI VYZHKY U SUKNY UAXPYGWY ZHK UG YDUTPGUMPHG PG COPWO OY ZYYSLLAKY OY CPSS XPLMPGNAPLO OPTLYSZ. OY CUL NSUGWPGN UM YBYKEHGY CPMO UWSYUK, VKPNOM YDIKYLLPHG, UL PZ ULRPGN MOYT MH GHMPWY OHC WUSTSE OY LUMAGXYK ZPKY. VAM XYLIPMY OPTLYSZ, HG OPL ZUWY MHH MOUM LUTY PGXPWUMPHG HZLHTYMOPGN GYC UGX LMYKG LOHCYX KHAGX MOY THAMO."COH'L MOUM WAKMLYEPGN MOYKY? WUXYM TPCHGHB! MOUM'L GHM CPNOM! SHHR UMTY," WKPYX XYGPLHB COH, AGUVSY MH RYYI LMPSS HG HGY LIHM, RYIM MAKGPGNOPL OHKLY PG ZKHGM HZ MOY LJAUXKHG.MOY VSUWR, OUPKE, LGAV-GHLYX ZUWY HZ BULRU XYGPLHB, UGX OPL COHSY LOHKMLMAKXE ZPNAKY CPMO MOY LPGYCE OUPKE OUGX UGX LMATIE ZPGNYKL PG COPWOOY OYSX MOY OPSM HZ OPL GURYX LUVYK, SHHRYX QALM UL PM ALAUSSE XPX,YLIYWPUSSE MHCUKX YBYGPGN COYG OY OUX YTIMPYX OPL LYWHGX VHMMSY; OY CULHGSE KYXXYK MOUG ALAUS. CPMO OPL LOUNNE OYUX MOKHCG VUWR SPRY VPKXL COYGMOYE XKPGR, IKYLLPGN OPL LIAKL TYKWPSYLLSE PGMH MOY LPXYL HZ OPL NHHXOHKLY, VYXHAPG, UGX LPMMPGN UL MOHANO ZUSSPGN VUWRCUKXL PG MOY LUXXSY,OY NUSSHIYX MH MOY HMOYK ZSUGR HZ MOY LJAUXKHG UGX LOHAMYX PG U OHUKLYBHPWY MH MOY TYG MH SHHR MH MOYPK IPLMHSL. OY KHXY AI MH RPKLMYG. MOYLMUZZ WUIMUPG HG OPL VKHUX-VUWRYX, LMYUXE TUKY WUTY UM U CUSR MH TYYMOPT. OPL ZUWY CPMO PML SHGN TALMUWOY CUL LYKPHAL UL USCUEL, HGSE OPLYEYL CYKY VKPNOMYK MOUG ALAUS."CYSS, COUM UVHAM PM?" LUPX OY MH XYGPLHB. QALM MOYG MOY WHTTUGXYK UIIYUKYX HG MOY VKPXNY. XYGPLHBNUSSHIYX AI MH OPT."EHAK YDWYSSYGWE! SYM AL UMMUWR MOYT! P'SS XCPBY MOYT HZZ.""UMMUWR PGXYYX!" LUPX MOY WHSHGYS PG U VHKYX BHPWY, IAWRYKPGN AI OPLZUWY UL PZ XKPBPGN HZZ U MKHAVSYLHTY ZSE. "UGX COE UKY EHA LMHIIPGNOYKY? XHG'M EHA LYY MOY LRPKTPLOYKL UKY KYMKYUMPGN? SYUX MOY LJAUXKHGVUWR."MOY LJAUXKHG WKHLLYX MOY VKPXNY UGX XKYC HAM HZ KUGNY HZ ZPKY CPMOHAMOUBPGN SHLM U LPGNSY TUG. MOY LYWHGX LJAUXKHG MOUM OUX VYYG PG MOY ZKHGMSPGY ZHSSHCYX MOYT UWKHLL UGX MOY SULM WHLLUWRL JAPMMYX MOY ZUKMOYK LPXYHZ MOY KPBYK.MOY MCH IUBSHNKUX LJAUXKHGL, OUBPGN WKHLLYX MOY VKPXNY, KYMPKYX AI MOYOPSS HGY UZMYK MOY HMOYK. MOYPK WHSHGYS, RUKS VHNXUGPWO LWOAVYKM, WUTYAI MH XYGPLHB'L LJAUXKHG UGX KHXY UM U ZHHMIUWY GHM ZUK ZKHT KHLMHB,CPMOHAM MURPGN UGE GHMPWY HZ OPT USMOHANO MOYE CYKY GHC TYYMPGN ZHK MOYZPKLM MPTY LPGWY MOYPK YGWHAGMYK WHGWYKGPGN MYSEUGPG. KHLMHB, ZYYSPGNMOUM OY CUL UM MOY ZKHGM UGX PG MOY IHCYK HZ U TUG MHCUKX COHT OY GHCUXTPMMYX MOUM OY OUX VYYG MH VSUTY, XPX GHM SPZM OPL YEYL ZKHT MOYWHSHGYS'L UMOSYMPW VUWR, OPL GUIY WHBYKYX CPMO SPNOM OUPK, UGX OPL KYXGYWR. PM LYYTYX MH KHLMHB MOUM VHNXUGPWO CUL HGSE IKYMYGXPGN GHM MHGHMPWY OPT, UGX MOUM OPL COHSY UPT GHC CUL MH MYLM MOY WUXYM'L WHAKUNY,LH OY XKYC OPTLYSZ AI UGX SHHRYX UKHAGX OPT TYKKPSE; MOYG PM LYYTYX MHOPT MOUM VHNXUGPWO KHXY LH GYUK PG HKXYK MH LOHC OPT OPL WHAKUNY. GYDMOY MOHANOM MOUM OPL YGYTE CHASX LYGX MOY LJAUXKHG HG U XYLIYKUMY UMMUWRQALM MH IAGPLO OPT--KHLMHB. MOYG OY PTUNPGYX OHC, UZMYK MOY UMMUWR,VHNXUGPWO CHASX WHTY AI MH OPT UL OY SUE CHAGXYX UGX CHASX TUNGUGPTHALSEYDMYGX MOY OUGX HZ KYWHGWPSPUMPHG.MOY OPNO-LOHASXYKYX ZPNAKY HZ FOYKRHB, ZUTPSPUK MH MOY IUBSHNKUXL UL OYOUX VAM KYWYGMSE SYZM MOYPK KYNPTYGM, KHXY AI MH MOY WHSHGYS. UZMYK OPLXPLTPLLUS ZKHT OYUXJAUKMYKL FOYKRHB OUX GHM KYTUPGYX PG MOY KYNPTYGM,LUEPGN OY CUL GHM LAWO U ZHHS UL MH LSUBY UM MOY ZKHGM COYG OY WHASXNYM THKY KYCUKXL VE XHPGN GHMOPGN HG MOY LMUZZ, UGX OUX LAWWYYXYX PGUMMUWOPGN OPTLYSZ UL UG HKXYKSE HZZPWYK MH IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG. OY GHC WUTYMH OPL ZHKTYK WOPYZ CPMO UG HKXYK ZKHT MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY KYUK NAUKX."WHSHGYS," OY LUPX, UXXKYLLPGN KHLMHB'L YGYTE CPMO UG UPK HZ NSHHTENKUBPME UGX NSUGWPGN KHAGX UM OPL WHTKUXYL, "MOYKY PL UG HKXYK MH LMHIUGX ZPKY MOY VKPXNY.""UG HKXYK MH COH?" ULRYX MOY WHSHGYS THKHLYSE."P XHG'M TELYSZ RGHC 'MH COH,'" KYISPYX MOY WHKGYM PG U LYKPHAL MHGY,"VAM MOY IKPGWY MHSX TY MH 'NH UGX MYSS MOY WHSHGYS MOUM MOY OALLUKLTALM KYMAKG JAPWRSE UGX ZPKY MOY VKPXNY.'"FOYKRHB CUL ZHSSHCYX VE UG HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY COH KHXY AI MH MOYWHSHGYS HZ OALLUKL CPMO MOY LUTY HKXYK. UZMYK OPT MOY LMHAM GYLBPMLRPWUTY NUSSHIPGN AI HG U WHLLUWR OHKLY MOUM WHASX LWUKWYSE WUKKE OPLCYPNOM."OHC'L MOPL, WHSHGYS?" OY LOHAMYX UL OY UIIKHUWOYX. "P MHSX EHA MH ZPKYMOY VKPXNY, UGX GHC LHTYHGY OUL NHGY UGX VSAGXYKYX; MOYE UKY USS VYLPXYMOYTLYSBYL HBYK MOYKY UGX HGY WUG'M TURY UGEMOPGN HAM."MOY WHSHGYS XYSPVYKUMYSE LMHIIYX MOY KYNPTYGM UGX MAKGYX MH GYLBPMLRP."EHA LIHRY MH TY HZ PGZSUTTUVSY TUMYKPUS," LUPX OY, "VAM EHA LUPXGHMOPGN UVHAM ZPKPGN PM.""VAM, TE XYUK LPK," LUPX GYLBPMLRP UL OY XKYC AI, MURPGN HZZ OPL WUI UGXLTHHMOPGN OPL OUPK CYM CPMO IYKLIPKUMPHG CPMO OPL ISATI OUGX, "CULG'M PMYSSPGN EHA MH ZPKY MOY VKPXNY, COYG PGZSUTTUVSY TUMYKPUS OUX VYYG IAMPG IHLPMPHG?""P UT GHM EHAK 'XYUK LPK,' TK. LMUZZ HZZPWYK, UGX EHA XPX GHM MYSS TY MHVAKG MOY VKPXNY! P RGHC MOY LYKBPWY, UGX PM PL TE OUVPM HKXYKL LMKPWMSEMH HVYE. EHA LUPX MOY VKPXNY CHASX VY VAKGYX, VAM COH CHASX PM VAKG, PWHASX GHM RGHC VE MOY OHSE LIPKPM!""UO, MOUM'L USCUEL MOY CUE!" LUPX GYLBPMLRP CPMO U CUBY HZ MOY OUGX."OHC XPX EHA NYM OYKY?" LUPX OY, MAKGPGN MH FOYKRHB."HG MOY LUTY VALPGYLL. VAM EHA UKY XUTI! SYM TY CKPGN EHA HAM!""EHA CYKY LUEPGN, TK. LMUZZ HZZPWYK..." WHGMPGAYX MOY WHSHGYS PG UGHZZYGXYX MHGY."WHSHGYS," PGMYKKAIMYX MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY, "EHA TALM VY JAPWR HKMOY YGYTE CPSS VKPGN AI OPL NAGL MH ALY NKUIYLOHM."MOY WHSHGYS SHHRYX LPSYGMSE UM MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY, UM MOY LMHAMLMUZZ HZZPWYK, UGX UM FOYKRHB, UGX OY ZKHCGYX."P CPSS MOY VKPXNY ZPKY," OY LUPX PG U LHSYTG MHGY UL PZ MH UGGHAGWYMOUM PG LIPMY HZ USS MOY AGISYULUGMGYLL OY OUX MH YGXAKY OY CHASX LMPSSXH MOY KPNOM MOPGN.LMKPRPGN OPL OHKLY CPMO OPL SHGN TALWASUK SYNL UL PZ PM CYKY MH VSUTYZHK YBYKEMOPGN, MOY WHSHGYS THBYX ZHKCUKX UGX HKXYKYX MOY LYWHGXLJAUXKHG, MOUM PG COPWO KHLMHB CUL LYKBPGN AGXYK XYGPLHB, MH KYMAKG MHMOY VKPXNY."MOYKY, PM'L QALM UL P MOHANOM," LUPX KHLMHB MH OPTLYSZ. "OY CPLOYL MHMYLM TY!" OPL OYUKM WHGMKUWMYX UGX MOY VSHHX KALOYX MH OPL ZUWY. "SYMOPT LYY COYMOYK P UT U WHCUKX!" OY MOHANOM.UNUPG HG USS MOY VKPNOM ZUWYL HZ MOY LJAUXKHG MOY LYKPHAL YDIKYLLPHGUIIYUKYX MOUM MOYE OUX CHKG COYG AGXYK ZPKY. KHLMHB CUMWOYX OPL YGYTE,MOY WHSHGYS, WSHLYSE--MH ZPGX PG OPL ZUWY WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ OPL HCGWHGQYWMAKY, VAM MOY WHSHGYS XPX GHM HGWY NSUGWY UM KHLMHB, UGX SHHRYX ULOY USCUEL XPX COYG UM MOY ZKHGM, LHSYTG UGX LMYKG. MOYG WUTY MOY CHKX HZWHTTUGX."SHHR LOUKI! SHHR LOUKI!" LYBYKUS BHPWYL KYIYUMYX UKHAGX OPT.MOYPK LUVYKL WUMWOPGN PG MOY VKPXSYL UGX MOYPK LIAKL QPGNSPGN, MOYOALLUKL OULMPSE XPLTHAGMYX, GHM RGHCPGN COUM MOYE CYKY MH XH. MOY TYGCYKY WKHLLPGN MOYTLYSBYL. KHLMHB GH SHGNYK SHHRYX UM MOY WHSHGYS, OYOUX GH MPTY. OY CUL UZKUPX HZ ZUSSPGN VYOPGX MOY OALLUKL, LH TAWO UZKUPXMOUM OPL OYUKM LMHHX LMPSS. KHLMHBLUC GHMOPGN VAM MOY OALLUKL KAGGPGN USS UKHAGX OPT, MOYPK LIAKL WUMWOPGNUGX MOYPK LUVYKL WSUMMYKPGN."LMKYMWOYKL!" LOHAMYX LHTYHGY VYOPGX OPT.KHLMHB XPX GHM MOPGR COUM MOPL WUSS ZHK LMKYMWOYKL TYUGM; OY KUG HG,MKEPGN HGSE MH VY UOYUX HZ MOY HMOYKL; VAM QALM UM MOY VKPXNY, GHMSHHRPGN UM MOY NKHAGX, OY WUTY HG LHTY LMPWRE, MKHXXYG TAX, LMATVSYX,UGX ZYSS HG OPL OUGXL. MOY HMOYKL HAMLMKPIIYX OPT."UM VHLL FPXYL, WUIMUPG," OY OYUKX MOY BHPWY HZ MOY WHSHGYS, COH,OUBPGN KPXXYG UOYUX, OUX IASSYX AI OPL OHKLY GYUK MOY VKPXNY, CPMO UMKPATIOUGM, WOYYKZAS ZUWY.KHLMHB CPIPGN OPL TAXXE OUGXL HG OPL VKYYWOYL SHHRYX UM OPL YGYTE UGXCUL UVHAM MH KAG HG, MOPGRPGN MOUM MOY ZUKMOYK OY CYGM MH MOY ZKHGM MOYVYMMYK. VAM VHNXUGPWO, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM HK KYWHNGPFPGN KHLMHB, LOHAMYXMH OPT:"COH'L MOUM KAGGPGN HG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY VKPXNY? MH MOY KPNOM! WHTYVUWR, WUXYM!" OY WKPYX UGNKPSE; UGX MAKGPGN MH XYGPLHB, COH, LOHCPGN HZZOPL WHAKUNY, OUX KPXXYG HG MH MOY ISUGRL HZ MOY VKPXNY:"COE KAG KPLRL, WUIMUPG? EHA LOHASX XPLTHAGM," OY LUPX."HO, YBYKE VASSYM OUL PML VPSSYM," UGLCYKYX BULRU XYGPLHB, MAKGPGN PGOPL LUXXSY.TYUGCOPSY GYLBPMLRP, FOYKRHB, UGX MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY CYKY LMUGXPGNMHNYMOYK HAM HZ KUGNY HZ MOY LOHML, CUMWOPGN, GHC MOY LTUSS NKHAI HZTYG CPMO EYSSHC LOURHL, XUKR-NKYYG QUWRYML VKUPXYX CPMO WHKX, UGX VSAYKPXPGN VKYYWOYL, COH CYKY LCUKTPGN GYUK MOY VKPXNY, UGX MOYG UM COUM CULUIIKHUWOPGN PG MOY XPLMUGWY ZKHT MOY HIIHLPMY LPXY--MOY VSAY AGPZHKTLUGX NKHAIL CPMO OHKLYL, YULPSE KYWHNGPFUVSY UL UKMPSSYKE."CPSS MOYE VAKG MOY VKPXNY HK GHM? MOYLY CYKY MOY JAYLMPHGL YUWO TUG HZ MOY MKHHILHG MOY OPNO NKHAGX UVHBY MOY VKPXNY PGBHSAGMUKPSE ULRYX OPTLYSZ CPMO ULPGRPGN OYUKM--CUMWOPGN MOY VKPXNY UGX MOY OALLUKL PG MOY VKPNOM YBYGPGNSPNOM UGX MOY VSAY MAGPWL UXBUGWPGN ZKHT MOY HMOYK LPXY CPMO MOYPKVUEHGYML UGX NAGL."ANO. LUPX GYLBPMLRP; "MOYE UKY CPMOPGNKUIYLOHM KUGNY GHC.""OY LOHASXG'M OUBY MURYG LH TUGE TYG," LUPX MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY."MKAY YGHANO," UGLCYKYX GYLBPMLRP; "MCH LTUKM ZYSSHCL WHASX OUBY XHGYMOY QHV QALM UL CYSS.""UO, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," IAM PG FOYKRHB, OPL YEYL ZPDYX HG MOY OALLUKL,VAM LMPSS CPMO MOUM GUPBY UPK MOUM TUXY PM PTIHLLPVSY MH RGHC COYMOYK OYCUL LIYURPGN PG QYLM HK PG YUKGYLM. "UO, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE! OHC EHA SHHRUM MOPGNL! LYGX MCH TYG? UGX COH MOYG CHASX NPBY AL MOY BSUXPTPK TYXUSUGX KPVVHG? ZUSSYG, ZUSSYG!""MCH, P MOPGR.""PZ P CYKY MLUK P CHASX GYBYK NH MH CUK," LUPX GYLBPMLRP, MAKGPGN UCUE.MOY ZKYGWO NAGL CYKY OULMPSE KYSHUXYX. MCH CYKY TPLXPKYWMYX UGX MOY LOHM CYGM MHHOPNO, VAM MOY SULM KHAGX ZYSS PG MOY TPXLM HZ U NKHAI HZ OALLUKL UGXRGHWRYX MOKYY HZ MOYT HBYK.KHLMHB, UVLHKVYX VE OPL KYSUMPHGL CPMO VHNXUGPWO, OUX IUALYX HG MOYVKPXNY GHM RGHCPGN COUM MH XH. WKPYX MOY CHAGXYX TUG, VAM LMPSSOY CUL SPZMYX UGX SUPX HG MOY LMKYMWOYK.GPWOHSUL KHLMHB MAKGYX UCUE UGX, UL PZ LYUKWOPGN ZHK LHTYMOPGN, NUFYXPGMH MOY XPLMUGWY, UM MOY CUMYKL HZ MOY XUGAVY, UM MOY LRE, UGX UM MOYLAG. KHLMHB COPLIYKYX.MOY OALLUKL KUG VUWR MH MOY TYG COH OYSX MOYPK OHKLYL; MOYPK BHPWYLLHAGXYX SHAXYK UGX WUSTYK, MOY LMKYMWOYKL XPLUIIYUKYX ZKHT LPNOM."CYSS, ZCPYGX? LH EHA'BY LTYSM IHCXUO!" "EHA CHKRYX SPRY CYNASUK VCPWRL UGXPM'L GULME CHKR! UG UMMUWR'L ISYULUGM CHKR! LUPX MOY WHSHGYSMKPATIOUGMSE UGX NUPSE."UGX PZ OY ULRL UVHAM MOY SHLLYL?""U MKPZSY," LUPX MOY WHSHGYS PG OPL VULL BHPWY: "MCH OALLUKL CHAGXYX,UGX HGY RGHWRYX HAM," OY UXXYX, AGUVSY MH KYLMKUPG U OUIIE LTPSY, UGXIKHGHAGWPGN MOY IOKULY "RGHWRYX HAM" CPMO KPGNPGN XPLMPGWMGYLL.WOUIMYK PDIAKLAYX VE MOY ZKYGWO UKTE HZ U OAGXKYX MOHALUGX TYG AGXYK MOY WHTTUGXHZ VHGUIUKMY, YGWHAGMYKPGN U IHIASUMPHG MOUM CUL AGZKPYGXSE MH PM,SHLPGN WHGZPXYGWY PG PML USSPYL, LAZZYKPGN ZKHT LOHKMGYLL HZ LAIISPYL,UGX WHTIYSSYX MH UWM AGXYK WHGXPMPHGL HZ CUK AGSPRY UGEMOPGN MOUM OUXVYYG ZHKYLYYG, MOY KALLPUG UKTE HZ MOPKME-ZPBY MOHALUGX TYG WHTTUGXYXVE RAMAFHB CUL OAKKPYXSE KYMKYUMPGN USHGN MOY XUGAVY, LMHIIPGN COYKYHBYKMURYG VE MOY YGYTE UGX ZPNOMPGN KYUKNAUKX UWMPHGL HGSE UL ZUK ULGYWYLLUKE MH YGUVSY PM MH KYMKYUM CPMOHAM SHLPGN PML OYUBE YJAPITYGM.MOYKY OUX VYYG UWMPHGL UM SUTVUWO, UTLMYMMYG, UGX TYSR; VAM XYLIPMY MOYWHAKUNY UGX YGXAKUGWY--UWRGHCSYXNYX YBYG VE MOY YGYTE--CPMO COPWO MOYKALLPUGL ZHANOM, MOY HGSE WHGLYJAYGWY HZ MOYLY UWMPHGL CUL U EYM THKYKUIPX KYMKYUM. UALMKPUG MKHHIL MOUM OUX YLWUIYX WUIMAKY UM AST UGXOUX QHPGYX RAMAFHB UM VKUAGUA GHC LYIUKUMYX ZKHT MOY KALLPUG UKTE,UGX RAMAFHB CUL SYZM CPMO HGSE OPL HCG CYUR UGX YDOUALMYX ZHKWYL.MOY XYZYGLY HZ BPYGGU CUL GH SHGNYK MH VY MOHANOM HZ. PGLMYUX HZ UGHZZYGLPBY, MOY ISUG HZ COPWO, WUKYZASSE IKYIUKYX PG UWWHKX CPMO MOYTHXYKG LWPYGWY HZ LMKUMYNPWL, OUX VYYG OUGXYX MH RAMAFHB COYG OY CUL PGBPYGGU VE MOY UALMKPUG OHZRKPYNLKUMO, MOY LHSY UGX USTHLM AGUMMUPGUVSYUPT KYTUPGPGN ZHK OPT CUL MH YZZYWM U QAGWMPHG CPMO MOY ZHKWYL MOUM CYKYUXBUGWPGN ZKHT KALLPU, CPMOHAM SHLPGN OPL UKTE UL TUWR OUX XHGY UM AST.HG MOY MCYGME-YPNOMO HZ HWMHVYK RAMAFHB CPMO OPL UKTE WKHLLYX MH MOYSYZM VUGR HZ MOY XUGAVY UGX MHHR AI U IHLPMPHG ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTYCPMO MOY KPBYK VYMCYYG OPTLYSZ UGX MOY TUPG VHXE HZ MOY ZKYGWO. HG MOYMOPKMPYMO OY UMMUWRYX THKMPYK'L XPBPLPHG, COPWO CUL HG MOY SYZM VUGR,UGX VKHRY PM AI. PG MOPL UWMPHG ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MKHIOPYL CYKY MURYG:VUGGYKL, WUGGHG, UGX MCH YGYTE NYGYKUSL. ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY, UZMYK UZHKMGPNOM'L KYMKYUM, MOY KALLPUG MKHHIL OUX OUSMYX UGX UZMYK U ZPNOM OUXGHM HGSE OYSX MOY ZPYSX VAM OUX KYIASLYX MOY ZKYGWO. MOHANO MOY MKHHILCYKY PSS-WSUX, YDOUALMYX, UGX OUX SHLM U MOPKX HZ MOYPK GATVYK PGRPSSYX, CHAGXYX, LPWR, UGX LMKUNNSYKL; MOHANO U GATVYK HZ LPWR UGXCHAGXYX OUX VYYG UVUGXHGYX HG MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ MOY XUGAVY CPMO U SYMMYKPG COPWO RAMAFHB YGMKALMYX MOYT MH MOY OATUGPME HZ MOY YGYTE; UGXMOHANO MOY VPN OHLIPMUSL UGX MOY OHALYL PG RKYTL WHGBYKMYX PGMH TPSPMUKEOHLIPMUSL WHASX GH SHGNYK UWWHTTHXUMY USS MOY LPWR UGX CHAGXYX, EYM MOYLMUGX TUXY UM RKYTL UGX MOY BPWMHKE HBYK THKMPYK KUPLYX MOY LIPKPML HZMOY UKTE WHGLPXYKUVSE. MOKHANOHAM MOY COHSY UKTE UGX UM OYUXJAUKMYKLTHLM QHEZAS MOHANO YKKHGYHAL KATHKL CYKY KPZY HZ MOY PTUNPGUKE UIIKHUWOHZ WHSATGL ZKHT KALLPU, HZ LHTY BPWMHKE NUPGYX VE MOY UALMKPUGL, UGX HZMOY KYMKYUM HZ MOY ZKPNOMYGYX VHGUIUKMY.IKPGWY UGXKYC XAKPGN MOY VUMMSY OUX VYYG PG UMMYGXUGWY HG MOY UALMKPUGNYGYKUS LWOTPXM, COH CUL RPSSYX PG MOY UWMPHG. OPL OHKLY OUX VYYGCHAGXYX AGXYK OPT UGX OPL HCG UKT LSPNOMSE NKUFYX VE U VASSYM. UL U TUKRHZ MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L LIYWPUS ZUBHK OY CUL LYGM CPMO MOY GYCL HZMOPL BPWMHKE MH MOY UALMKPUG WHAKM, GHC GH SHGNYK UM BPYGGU (COPWO CULMOKYUMYGYX VE MOY ZKYGWO) VAM UM VKAGG. XYLIPMY OPL UIIUKYGMSE XYSPWUMYVAPSX IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX YGXAKY IOELPWUS ZUMPNAY ZUK VYMMYK MOUG TUGEBYKE TALWASUK TYG, UGX HG MOY GPNOM HZ MOY VUMMSY, OUBPGN UKKPBYX UMRKYTL YDWPMYX VAM GHM CYUKE, CPMO XPLIUMWOYL ZKHT XHROMAKHB MH RAMAFHB,OY CUL LYGM PTTYXPUMYSE CPMO U LIYWPUS XPLIUMWO MH VKAGG. MH VY LH LYGMTYUGM GHM HGSE U KYCUKX VAM UG PTIHKMUGM LMYI MHCUKX IKHTHMPHG.MOY GPNOM CUL XUKR VAM LMUKKE, MOY KHUX LOHCYX VSUWR PG MOY LGHC MOUMOUX ZUSSYG MOY IKYBPHAL XUE--MOY XUE HZ MOY VUMMSY. KYBPYCPGN OPLPTIKYLLPHGL HZ MOY KYWYGM VUMMSY, IPWMAKPGN ISYULUGMSE MH OPTLYSZ MOYPTIKYLLPHG OPL GYCL HZ U BPWMHKE CHASX WKYUMY, HK KYWUSSPGN MOY LYGX-HZZNPBYG OPT VE MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ UGX OPL ZYSSHC HZZPWYKL, IKPGWYUGXKYC CUL NUSSHIPGN USHGN PG U IHLM WOUPLY YGQHEPGN MOY ZYYSPGNL HZ UTUG COH OUL UM SYGNMO VYNAG MH UMMUPG U SHGN-XYLPKYX OUIIPGYLL. UL LHHGUL OY WSHLYX OPL YEYL OPL YUKL LYYTYX ZPSSYX CPMO MOY KUMMSY HZ MOYCOYYSL UGX MOY LYGLUMPHG HZ BPWMHKE. CY OUX YDIYWMYX, UL P MHSX EHA, MH NYM UM MOYPK KYUK VE LYBYGPG MOY THKGPGN VAM OUX GHM KYUWOYX PM VE ZPBY PG MOY UZMYKGHHG.""UGX COE XPXG'M EHA XH PM UM LYBYG PG MOY THKGPGN? RAMAFHB USHGY UM SULM NUPGL UKYUS BPWMHKE, XYLMKHEPGN MOY LIYSS HZ MOY PGBPGWPVPSPME HZ MOY ZKYGWO,UGX MOY TPGPLMYK HZ CUK XHYL GHM YBYG WUKY MH OYUK MOY XYMUPSL.""MOUM'L QALM PM, TE XYUK ZYSSHC. VKPGN AL GPWYGYCL HZ U BPWMHKE VE MOY UKWOXARY RUKS HK ZYKXPGUGX (HGY UKWOXARY'L ULNHHX UL UGHMOYK, UL EHA RGHC) UGX YBYG PZ PM PL HGSE HBYK U ZPKY VKPNUXYHZ VHGUIUKMY'L, MOUM CPSS VY UGHMOYK LMHKE UGX CY'SS ZPKY HZZ LHTYWUGGHG! MOYUKWOXARY RUKS XHYL GHMOPGN, MOY UKWOXARY ZYKXPGUGX XPLNKUWYL OPTLYSZ.EHA UVUGXHG BPYGGU, NPBY AI PML XYZYGLY--UL TAWO UL MH LUE: 'OYUBYG PLCPMO AL, VAM OYUBYG OYSI EHA UGX EHAK WUIPMUS!' MOY HGY NYGYKUS COHT CYUSS SHBYX, LWOTPXM, EHA YDIHLY MH U VASSYM, UGX MOYG EHA WHGNKUMASUMYAL HG MOY BPWMHKE! UXTPM MOUM THKY PKKPMUMPGN GYCL MOUG EHAKL WHASX GHMOUBY VYYG WHGWYPBYX. LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX OY CYGM HZZ MH MOY OHALYCOYKY MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ CUL.IULLPGN VE RAMAFHB'L WUKKPUNY UGX MOY YDOUALMYX LUXXSY OHKLYL HZ OPLLAPMY, CPMO MOYPK WHLLUWRL COH CYKY MUSRPGN SHAXSE MHNYMOYK, IKPGWYUGXKYC YGMYKYX MOY IULLUNY. RAMAFHB OPTLYSZ, OY CUL MHSX, CUL PG MOYOHALY CPMO IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG UGX CYEKHMOYK. CYEKHMOYK CUL MOY UALMKPUGNYGYKUS COH OUX LAWWYYXYX LWOTPXM. PG MOY IULLUNY SPMMSY RHFSHBLRP CULLJAUMMPGN HG OPL OYYSL PG ZKHGM HZ U WSYKR. MOY WSYKR, CPMO WAZZL MAKGYXAI, CUL OULMPSE CKPMPGN UM U MAV MAKGYX VHMMHT AICUKXL. RHFSHBLRP'L ZUWYSHHRYX CHKG--OY MHH OUX YBPXYGMSE GHM LSYIM USS GPNOM. OY NSUGWYX UMIKPGWY UGXKYC UGX XPX GHM YBYG GHX MH OPT."LYWHGX SPGY... OUBY EHA CKPMMYG PM?" OY WHGMPGAYX XPWMUMPGN MH MOYWSYKR. "MOY RPYB NKYGUXPYKL, IHXHSPUG...""HGY WUG'M CKPMY LH ZULM, EHAK OHGHK," LUPX MOY WSYKR, NSUGWPGN UGNKPSEUGX XPLKYLIYWMZASSE UM RHFSHBLRP.MOKHANO MOY XHHK WUTY MOY LHAGXL HZ RAMAFHB'L BHPWY, YDWPMYX UGXXPLLUMPLZPYX, PGMYKKAIMYX VE UGHMOYK, UG AGZUTPSPUK BHPWY. HKXYKL UKY PLLAYX ZHK U VUMMSY."IKPGWY UGXKYC THBYX MHCUKX MOY XHHK ZKHT COYGWY BHPWYL CYKY OYUKX.QALM UL OY CUL NHPGN MH HIYG PM MOY LHAGXL WYULYX, MOY XHHK HIYGYX,UGX RAMAFHB CPMO OPL YUNSY GHLY UGX IAZZE ZUWY UIIYUKYX PG MOY XHHKCUE.IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHHX KPNOM PG ZKHGM HZ RAMAFHB VAM MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L HGY LHAGX YEY LOHCYX OPT MH VY LH IKYHWWAIPYX CPMOMOHANOML UGX UGDPYMPYL UL MH VY HVSPBPHAL HZ OPL IKYLYGWY. CPMO OPL SYZMOUGX OY XKYC VUNKUMPHG MHCUKX OPT, UGX CPMO OPL KPNOM, HG COPWO OY CHKYU KPGN, OY TUXY MOY LPNG HZ MOY WKHLL HBYK OPT CPMO U NYLMAKY YBPXYGMSEOUVPMAUS, HZZYKPGN OPL IAZZE WOYYR, VAM VUNKUMPHG RPLLYX OPT HG MOY GYWRPGLMYUX."WOKPLM VY CPMO EHA!" USSHC TY MH KYTUPGCPMO IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG'L XYMUWOTYGM.""NYM PG," LUPX RAMAFHB, UGX GHMPWPGN MOUM VHSRHGLRP LMPSS XYSUEYX, OYUXXYX: "P GYYX NHHX HZZPWYKL TELYSZ, GYYX MOYT TELYSZ!"MOYE NHM PGMH MOY WUKKPUNY UGX XKHBY ZHK U ZYC TPGAMYL PG LPSYGWY."MOYKY PL LMPSS TAWO, TAWO VYZHKY AL," OY LUPX, UL PZ CPMO UG HSX TUG'LIYGYMKUMPHG OY AGXYKLMHHX USS MOUM CUL IULLPGN PG VHSRHGLRP'L TPGX. "PZU MYGMO IUKM HZ OPL XYMUWOTYGM KYMAKGL P LOUSS MOUGR NHX," OY UXXYX ULPZ LIYURPGN MH OPTLYSZ.IKPGWY UGXKYC NSUGWYX UM RAMAFHB'L ZUWY HGSE U ZHHM XPLMUGM ZKHT OPT UGXPGBHSAGMUKPSE GHMPWYX MOY WUKYZASSE CULOYX LYUTL HZ MOY LWUK GYUK OPLMYTISY, COYKY UG PLTUPS VASSYM OUX IPYKWYX OPL LRASS, UGX MOY YTIME YEYLHWRYM. "EYL, OY OUL U KPNOM MH LIYUR LH WUSTSE HZ MOHLY TYG'L XYUMO,"MOHANOM VHSRHGLRP."MOUM PL COE P VYN MH VY LYGM MH MOUM XYMUWOTYGM," OY LUPX.RAMAFHB XPX GHM KYISE. CPMO XYSPWUMY PKHGE OYJAYLMPHGYX IKPGWY UGXKYC UVHAM MOY XYMUPSL HZ OPL PGMYKBPYC CPMO MOYYTIYKHK, UVHAM MOY KYTUKRL OY OUX OYUKX UM WHAKM WHGWYKGPGN MOY RKYTLUZZUPK, UGX UVHAM LHTY SUXPYL MOYE VHMO RGYC.WOUIMYK DPBHG GHBYTVYK 1 RAMAFHB OUX KYWYPBYX, MOKHANO U LIE, GYCL MOUM MOY UKTE OYWHTTUGXYX CUL PG UG USTHLM OHIYSYLL IHLPMPHG. MOY LIE KYIHKMYX MOUM MOYZKYGWO, UZMYK WKHLLPGN MOY VKPXNY UM BPYGGU, CYKY UXBUGWPGN PG PTTYGLYZHKWY AIHG RAMAFHB'L SPGY HZ WHTTAGPWUMPHG CPMO MOY MKHHIL MOUM CYKYUKKPBPGN ZKHT KALLPU. PZ RAMAFHB XYWPXYX MH KYTUPG UM RKYTL, GUIHSYHG'LUKTE HZ HGY OAGXKYX UGX ZPZME MOHALUGX TYG CHASX WAM OPT HZZ WHTISYMYSEUGX LAKKHAGX OPL YDOUALMYX UKTE HZ ZHKME MOHALUGX, UGX OY CHASX ZPGXOPTLYSZ PG MOY IHLPMPHG HZ TUWR UM AST. PZ RAMAFHB XYWPXYX MH UVUGXHGMOY KHUX WHGGYWMPGN OPT CPMO MOY MKHHIL UKKPBPGN ZKHT KALLPU, OY CHASXOUBY MH TUKWO CPMO GH KHUX PGMH AGRGHCG IUKML HZ MOY VHOYTPUG THAGMUPGL,XYZYGXPGN OPTLYSZ UNUPGLM LAIYKPHK ZHKWYL HZ MOY YGYTE UGX UVUGXHGPGNUSS OHIY HZ U QAGWMPHG CPMO VADOHCXYG. PZ RAMAFHB XYWPXYX MH KYMKYUMUSHGN MOY KHUX ZKHT RKYTL MH HSTAMF, MH AGPMY CPMO MOY MKHHIL UKKPBPGNZKHT KALLPU, OY KPLRYX VYPGN ZHKYLMUSSYX HG MOUM KHUX VE MOY ZKYGWOCOH OUX WKHLLYX MOY BPYGGU VKPXNY, UGX YGWATVYKYX VE OPL VUNNUNY UGXMKUGLIHKM, OUBPGN MH UWWYIM VUMMSY HG MOY TUKWO UNUPGLM UG YGYTE MOKYYMPTYL UL LMKHGN, COH CHASX OYT OPT PG ZKHT MCH LPXYL.RAMAFHB WOHLY MOPL SUMMYK WHAKLY.MOY ZKYGWO, MOY LIE KYIHKMYX, OUBPGN WKHLLYX MOY BPYGGU VKPXNY, CYKYUXBUGWPGN VE ZHKWYX TUKWOYL MHCUKX FGUPT, COPWO SUE LPDME-LPD TPSYL HZZHG MOY SPGY HZ RAMAFHB'L KYMKYUM. PZ OY KYUWOYX FGUPT VYZHKY MOYZKYGWO, MOYKY CHASX VY NKYUM OHIY HZ LUBPGN MOY UKTE; MH SYM MOYZKYGWO ZHKYLMUSS OPT UM FGUPT TYUGM MOY YDIHLAKY HZ OPL COHSY UKTE MH UXPLNKUWY LAWO UL MOUM HZ AST, HK MH AMMYK XYLMKAWMPHG. UL LHHG UL VHGUIUKMY (COH CUL UM LWOHGVKAGG, LPDMYYG TPSYL ZKHTOHSSUVKAGG) KYWYPBYX TAKUM'L XPLIUMWO CPMO MOY IKHIHLUS HZ U MKAWY UGXU WUIPMASUMPHG, OY XYMYWMYX U KALY UGX CKHMY MOY ZHSSHCPGN SYMMYK MHTAKUM:LWOHGVKAGG, 25MO VKATUPKY, 1805,UM YPNOM H'WSHWR PG MOY THKGPGNMH IKPGWY TAKUM,P WUGGHM ZPGX CHKXL MH YDIKYLL MH EHA TE XPLISYULAKY. OY UXXYX PG U MHGY HZ WHTTUGX.IKPGWY UGXKYC LTPSYX PGBHSAGMUKPSE UL OY SHHRYX UM MOY UKMPSSYKE HZZPWYKMALOPG, COH LPSYGM UGX LTPSPGN, LOPZMPGN ZKHT HGY LMHWRPGNYX ZHHM MH MOYHMOYK, NSUGWYX PGJAPKPGNSE CPMO OPL SUKNY, PGMYSSPNYGM, RPGXSE YEYL ZKHTIKPGWY UGXKYC MH MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK."MOY LHSXPYKL LUE PM ZYYSL YULPYK CPMOHAM VHHML," LUPX WUIMUPG MALOPGLTPSPGN LOESE PG OPL AGWHTZHKMUVSY IHLPMPHG, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH UXHIMU QHWASUK MHGY. MOY LTHRY HZ MOY ZPKLM LOHM OUXGHM EYM XPLIYKLYX VYZHKY UGHMOYK IAZZ UIIYUKYX, ZHSSHCYX VE U KYIHKM.MOY VUMMSY OUX VYNAG! IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX OPL OHKLY UGX NUSSHIYX VUWRMH NKAGMO MH ZPGX IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG. OY OYUKX MOY WUGGHGUXY VYOPGX OPTNKHCPGN SHAXYK UGX THKY ZKYJAYGM. YBPXYGMSE HAK NAGL OUX VYNAG MH KYISE.ZKHT MOY VHMMHT HZ MOY LSHIY, COYKY MOY IUKSYEL OUX MURYG ISUWY, WUTYMOY KYIHKM HZ TALRYMKE.SYTUKKHPL OUX QALM UKKPBYX UM U NUSSHI CPMO VHGUIUKMY'L LMYKG SYMMYK,UGX TAKUM, OATPSPUMYX UGX UGDPHAL MH YDIPUMY OPL ZUASM, OUX UM HGWYTHBYX OPL ZHKWYL MH UMMUWR MOY WYGMYK UGX HAMZSUGR VHMO MOY KALLPUGCPGNL, OHIPGN VYZHKY YBYGPGN UGX VYZHKY MOY UKKPBUS HZ MOY YTIYKHK MHWKALO MOY WHGMYTIMPVSY XYMUWOTYGM MOUM LMHHX VYZHKY OPT."PM OUL VYNAG. OYKY PM PL!" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, ZYYSPGN MOY VSHHXKALO MH OPL OYUKM. "VAM COYKY UGX OHC CPSS TE MHASHG IKYLYGM PMLYSZ?"IULLPGN VYMCYYG MOY WHTIUGPYL MOUM OUX VYYG YUMPGN IHKKPXNY UGX XKPGRPGNBHXRU U JAUKMYK HZ UG OHAK VYZHKY, OY LUC YBYKECOYKY MOY LUTY KUIPXTHBYTYGM HZ LHSXPYKL ZHKTPGN KUGRL UGX NYMMPGN MOYPK TALRYML KYUXE,UGX HG USS MOYPK ZUWYL OY KYWHNGPFYX MOY LUTY YUNYKGYLL MOUM ZPSSYX OPLOYUKM. "PM OUL VYNAG! OYKY PM PL, XKYUXZAS VAM YGQHEUVSY!" CUL COUM MOYZUWY HZ YUWO LHSXPYK UGX YUWO HZZPWYK LYYTYX MH LUE.VYZHKY OY OUX KYUWOYX MOY YTVUGRTYGML MOUM CYKY VYPGN MOKHCG AI, OY LUC,PG MOY SPNOM HZ MOY XASS UAMATG YBYGPGN, THAGMYX TYG WHTPGN MHCUKX OPT.MOY ZHKYTHLM, CYUKPGN U WHLLUWR WSHUR UGX SUTVLRPG WUI UGX KPXPGN UCOPMY OHKLY, CUL IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG. IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHIIYX, CUPMPGN ZHKOPT MH WHTY AI; IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG KYPGYX PG OPL OHKLY UGX KYWHNGPFPGNIKPGWY UGXKYC GHXXYX MH OPT. OY LMPSS SHHRYX UOYUX COPSY IKPGWY UGXKYCMHSX OPT COUM OY OUX LYYG.MOY ZYYSPGN, "PM OUL VYNAG! OYKY PM PL!" CUL LYYG YBYG HG IKPGWYVUNKUMPHG'L OUKX VKHCG ZUWY CPMO PML OUSZ-WSHLYX, XASS, LSYYIE YEYL.IKPGWY UGXKYC NUFYX CPMO UGDPHAL WAKPHLPME UM MOUM PTIULLPBY ZUWYUGX CPLOYX OY WHASX MYSS COUM, PZ UGEMOPGN, MOPL TUG CUL MOPGRPGN UGXZYYSPGN UM MOUM THTYGM. "PL MOYKY UGEMOPGN UM USS VYOPGX MOUM PTIULLPBYZUWY?" IKPGWY UGXKYC ULRYX OPTLYSZ UL OY SHHRYX. IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG VYGMOPL OYUX PG LPNG HZ UNKYYTYGM CPMO COUM IKPGWY UGXKYC MHSX OPT, UGXLUPX, "BYKE NHHX!" PG U MHGY MOUM LYYTYX MH PTISE MOUM YBYKEMOPGN MOUMMHHR ISUWY UGX CUL KYIHKMYX MH OPT CUL YDUWMSE COUM OY OUX ZHKYLYYG.IKPGWY UGXKYC, HAM HZ VKYUMO CPMO OPL KUIPX KPXY, LIHRY JAPWRSE.IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, AMMYKPGN OPL CHKXL CPMO UG HKPYGMUS UWWYGM, LIHRYIUKMPWASUKSE LSHCSE, UL PZ MH PTIKYLL MOY ZUWM MOUM MOYKY CUL GH GYYX MHOAKKE. OHCYBYK, OY IAM OPL OHKLY MH U MKHM PG MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ MALOPG'LVUMMYKE. IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHSSHCYX CPMO MOY LAPMY. VYOPGX IKPGWY VUNKUMPHGKHXY UG HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY, MOY IKPGWY'L IYKLHGUS UXQAMUGM, FOYKRHB,UG HKXYKSE HZZPWYK, MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK HG XAME, KPXPGN U ZPGY VHVMUPSYXOHKLY, UGX U WPBPSPUG--UG UWWHAGMUGM COH OUX ULRYX IYKTPLLPHG MHVY IKYLYGM UM MOY VUMMSY HAM HZ WAKPHLPME. MOY UWWHAGMUGM, U LMHAM,ZASS-ZUWYX TUG, SHHRYX UKHAGX OPT CPMO U GUPBY LTPSY HZ LUMPLZUWMPHGUGX IKYLYGMYX U LMKUGNY UIIYUKUGWY UTHGN MOY OALLUKL, WHLLUWRL, UGXUXQAMUGML, PG OPL WUTSYM WHUM, UL OY QHSMYX HG OPL OHKLY CPMO U WHGBHEHZZPWYK'L LUXXSY."OY CUGML MH LYY U VUMMSY," LUPX FOYKRHB MH VHSRHGLRP, IHPGMPGN MH MOYUWWHAGMUGM, "VAM OY ZYYSL U IUPG PG MOY IPM HZ OPL LMHTUWO USKYUXE.""HO, SYUBY HZZ!" LUPX MOY UWWHAGMUGM CPMO U VYUTPGN VAM KUMOYK WAGGPGNLTPSY, UL PZ ZSUMMYKYX UM VYPGN TUXY MOY LAVQYWM HZ FOYKRHB'L QHRY, UGXIAKIHLYSE MKEPGN MH UIIYUK LMAIPXYK MOUG OY KYUSSE CUL."PM PL BYKE LMKUGNY, THG THGLPYAK IKPGWY," LUPX MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK. (OYKYTYTVYKYX MOUM PG ZKYGWO MOYKY PL LHTY IYWASPUK CUE HZ UXXKYLLPGN UIKPGWY, VAM WHASX GHM NYM PM JAPMY KPNOM.)VE MOPL MPTY MOYE CYKY USS UIIKHUWOPGN MALOPG'L VUMMYKE, UGX U VUSSLMKAWR MOY NKHAGX PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT."COUM'L MOUM MOUM OUL ZUSSYG?" ULRYX MOY UWWHAGMUGM CPMO U GUPBY LTPSY."U ZKYGWO IUGWURY," UGLCYKYX FOYKRHB."LH MOUM'L COUM MOYE OPM CPMO?" ULRYX MOY UWWHAGMUGM. "OHC UCZAS!"OY LYYTYX MH LCYSS CPMO LUMPLZUWMPHG. OY OUX OUKXSE ZPGPLOYX LIYURPGNCOYG MOYE UNUPG OYUKX UG AGYDIYWMYXSE BPHSYGM COPLMSPGN COPWO LAXXYGSEYGXYX CPMO U MOAX PGMH LHTYMOPGN LHZM... Z-Z-ZSHI! UGX U WHLLUWR, KPXPGNU SPMMSY MH MOYPK KPNOM UGX VYOPGX MOY UWWHAGMUGM, WKULOYX MH YUKMO CPMOOPL OHKLY. FOYKRHB UGX MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK VYGM HBYK MOYPK LUXXSYL UGXMAKGYX MOYPK OHKLYL UCUE. MOY UWWHAGMUGM LMHIIYX, ZUWPGN MOY WHLLUWR,UGX YDUTPGYX OPT CPMO UMMYGMPBY WAKPHLPME. MOY WHLLUWR CUL XYUX, VAM MOYOHKLY LMPSS LMKANNSYX.IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL, SHHRYX KHAGX, UGX, LYYPGN MOYWUALY HZ MOY WHGZALPHG, MAKGYX UCUE CPMO PGXPZZYKYGWY, UL PZ MH LUE, "PLPM CHKMO COPSY GHMPWPGN MKPZSYL?" OY KYPGYX PG OPL OHKLY CPMO MOY WULYHZ U LRPSSZAS KPXYK UGX, LSPNOMSE VYGXPGN HBYK, XPLYGNUNYX OPL LUVYKCOPWO OUX WUANOM PG OPL WSHUR. PM CUL UG HSX-ZULOPHGYX LUVYK HZ U RPGXGH SHGNYK PG NYGYKUS ALY. IKPGWY UGXKYC KYTYTVYKYX MOY LMHKE HZ LABHKHBNPBPGN OPL LUVYK MH VUNKUMPHG PG PMUSE, UGX MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG CULIUKMPWASUKSE ISYULUGM UM MOUM THTYGM. MOYE OUX KYUWOYX MOY VUMMYKE UMCOPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX VYYG COYG OY YDUTPGYX MOY VUMMSYZPYSX."COHLY WHTIUGE?" ULRYX IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG HZ UG UKMPSSYKETUG LMUGXPGN VEMOY UTTAGPMPHG CUNHG.OY ULRYX, "COHLY WHTIUGE?" VAM OY KYUSSE TYUGM, "UKY EHA ZKPNOMYGYXOYKY?" UGX MOY UKMPSSYKETUG AGXYKLMHHX OPT."WUIMUPG MALOPG'L, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!" LOHAMYX MOY KYX-OUPKYX, ZKYWRSYXNAGGYK PG U TYKKE BHPWY, LMUGXPGN MH UMMYGMPHG."EYL, EYL," TAMMYKYX VUNKUMPHG UL PZ WHGLPXYKPGN LHTYMOPGN, UGX OY KHXYIULM MOY SPTVYKL MH MOY ZUKMOYLM WUGGHG.UL OY UIIKHUWOYX, U KPGNPGN LOHM PLLAYX ZKHT PM XYUZYGPGN OPT UGX OPLLAPMY, UGX PG MOY LTHRY MOUM LAXXYGSE LAKKHAGXYX MOY NAG MOYE WHASX LYYMOY NAGGYKL COH OUX LYPFYX PM LMKUPGPGN MH KHSS PM JAPWRSE VUWR MH PMLZHKTYK IHLPMPHG. U OANY, VKHUX-LOHASXYKYX NAGGYK, GATVYK HGY, OHSXPGNU THI, OPL SYNL ZUK UIUKM, LIKUGN MH MOY COYYS; COPSY GATVYK MCH CPMOU MKYTVSPGN OUGX ISUWYX U WOUKNY PG MOY WUGGHG'L THAMO. MOY LOHKM,KHAGX-LOHASXYKYX WUIMUPG MALOPG, LMATVSPGN HBYK MOY MUPS HZ MOY NAGWUKKPUNY, THBYX ZHKCUKX UGX, GHM GHMPWPGN MOY NYGYKUS, SHHRYX HAMLOUXPGN OPL YEYL CPMO OPL LTUSS OUGX."SPZM PM MCH SPGYL THKY UGX PM CPSS VY QALM KPNOM," WKPYX OY PG U ZYYVSYBHPWY MH COPWO OY MKPYX MH PTIUKM U XULOPGN GHMY, PSS LAPMYX MH OPL CYURZPNAKY. "GATVYK MCH!" OY LJAYURYX. "ZPKY, TYXBYXYB!"VUNKUMPHG WUSSYX MH OPT, UGX MALOPG, KUPLPGN MOKYY ZPGNYKL MH OPL WUICPMO U VULOZAS UGX UCRCUKX NYLMAKY GHM UM USS SPRY U TPSPMUKE LUSAMYVAM SPRY U IKPYLM'L VYGYXPWMPHG, UIIKHUWOYX MOY NYGYKUS. MOHANO MALOPG'LNAGL OUX VYYG PGMYGXYX MH WUGGHGUXY MOY BUSSYE, OY CUL ZPKPGN PGWYGXPUKEVUSSL UM MOY BPSSUNY HZ LWOHG NKUVYKG BPLPVSY QALM HIIHLPMY, PG ZKHGM HZCOPWO SUKNY TULLYL HZ ZKYGWO CYKY UXBUGWPGN.GH HGY OUX NPBYG MALOPG HKXYKL COYKY UGX UM COUM MH ZPKY, VAM UZMYKWHGLASMPGN OPL LYKNYUGM TUQHK, FUROUKWOYGRH, ZHK COHT OY OUX NKYUMKYLIYWM, OY OUX XYWPXYX MOUM PM CHASX VY U NHHX MOPGN MH LYM ZPKY MH MOYBPSSUNY. "BYKE NHHX!" LUPX VUNKUMPHG PG KYISE MH MOY HZZPWYK'L KYIHKM,UGX VYNUG XYSPVYKUMYSE MH YDUTPGY MOY COHSY VUMMSYZPYSX YDMYGXYX VYZHKYOPT. MOY ZKYGWO OUX UXBUGWYX GYUKYLM HG HAK KPNOM. VYSHC MOY OYPNOM HGCOPWO MOY RPYB KYNPTYGM CUL LMUMPHGYX, PG MOY OHSSHC COYKY MOY KPBASYMZSHCYX, MOY LHAS-LMPKKPGN KHSSPGN UGX WKUWRSPGN HZ TALRYMKE CUL OYUKX,UGX TAWO ZUKMOYK MH MOY KPNOM VYEHGX MOY XKUNHHGL, MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOYLAPMY IHPGMYX HAM MH VUNKUMPHG U ZKYGWO WHSATG MOUM CUL HAMZSUGRPGN AL.MH MOY SYZM MOY OHKPFHG VHAGXYX VE MOY UXQUWYGM CHHX. IKPGWY VUNKUMPHGHKXYKYX MCH VUMMUSPHGL ZKHT MOY WYGMYK MH VY LYGM MH KYPGZHKWY MOY KPNOMZSUGR. MOY HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY BYGMAKYX MH KYTUKR MH MOY IKPGWY MOUMPZ MOYLY VUMMUSPHGL CYGM UCUE, MOY NAGL CHASX KYTUPG CPMOHAM LAIIHKM.IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG MAKGYX MH MOY HZZPWYK UGX CPMO OPL XASS YEYL SHHRYX UMOPT PG LPSYGWY. PM LYYTYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC MOUM MOY HZZPWYK'L KYTUKR CULQALM UGX MOUM KYUSSE GH UGLCYK WHASX VY TUXY MH PM. VAM UM MOUM THTYGMUG UXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX AI CPMO U TYLLUNY ZKHT MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOYKYNPTYGM PG MOY OHSSHC UGX GYCL MOUM PTTYGLY TULLYL HZ MOY ZKYGWO CYKYWHTPGN XHCG AIHG MOYT UGX MOUM OPL KYNPTYGM CUL PG XPLHKXYK UGX CULKYMKYUMPGN AIHG MOY RPYB NKYGUXPYKL. IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG VHCYX OPL OYUX PGLPNG HZ ULLYGM UGX UIIKHBUS. OY KHXY HZZ UM U CUSR MH MOY KPNOM UGX LYGMUG UXQAMUGM MH MOY XKUNHHGL CPMO HKXYKL MH UMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO. VAM MOPLUXQAMUGM KYMAKGYX OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK CPMO MOY GYCL MOUM MOY WHTTUGXYKHZ MOY XKUNHHGL OUX USKYUXE KYMKYUMYX VYEHGX MOY XPI PG MOY NKHAGX, ULU OYUBE ZPKY OUX VYYG HIYGYX HG OPT UGX OY CUL SHLPGN TYG ALYSYLLSE, UGXLH OUX OULMYGYX MH MOKHC LHTY LOUKILOHHMYKL PGMH MOY CHHX."BYKE NHHX!" LUPX VUNKUMPHG.UL OY CUL SYUBPGN MOY VUMMYKE, ZPKPGN CUL OYUKX HG MOY SYZM USLH, UGXUL PM CUL MHH ZUK MH MOY SYZM ZSUGR ZHK OPT MH OUBY MPTY MH NH MOYKYOPTLYSZ, IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG LYGM FOYKRHB MH MYSS MOY NYGYKUS PG WHTTUGX(MOY HGY COH OUX IUKUXYX OPL KYNPTYGM VYZHKY RAMAFHB UM VKUAGUA) MOUMOY TALM KYMKYUM UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY VYOPGX MOY OHSSHC PG MOY KYUK,UL MOY KPNOM ZSUGR CHASX IKHVUVSE GHM VY UVSY MH CPMOLMUGX MOY YGYTE'LUMMUWR BYKE SHGN. UVHAM MALOPG UGX MOY VUMMUSPHG MOUM OUX VYYG PGLAIIHKM HZ OPL VUMMYKE USS CUL ZHKNHMMYG. IKPGWY UGXKYC SPLMYGYXUMMYGMPBYSE MH VUNKUMPHG'L WHSSHJAPYL CPMO MOY WHTTUGXPGN HZZPWYKL UGXMOY HKXYKL OY NUBY MOYT UGX, MH OPL LAKIKPLY, ZHAGX MOUM GH HKXYKL CYKYKYUSSE NPBYG, VAM MOUM IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG MKPYX MH TURY PM UIIYUK MOUMYBYKEMOPGN XHGY VE GYWYLLPME, VE UWWPXYGM, HK VE MOY CPSS HZ LAVHKXPGUMYWHTTUGXYKL CUL XHGY, PZ GHM VE OPL XPKYWM WHTTUGX, UM SYULM PG UWWHKXCPMO OPL PGMYGMPHGL. IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMPWYX, OHCYBYK, MOUM MOHANO COUMOUIIYGYX CUL XAY MH WOUGWY UGX CUL PGXYIYGXYGM HZ MOY WHTTUGXYK'L CPSS,HCPGN MH MOY MUWM VUNKUMPHG LOHCYX, OPL IKYLYGWY CUL BYKE BUSAUVSY.HZZPWYKL COH UIIKHUWOYX OPT CPMO XPLMAKVYX WHAGMYGUGWYL VYWUTY WUST;LHSXPYKL UGX HZZPWYKL NKYYMYX OPT NUPSE, NKYC THKY WOYYKZAS PG OPLIKYLYGWY, UGX CYKY YBPXYGMSE UGDPHAL MH XPLISUE MOYPK WHAKUNY VYZHKYOPT.WOUIMYK DBPPPIKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOY OPNOYLM IHPGM HZ HAK KPNOM ZSUGR,VYNUG KPXPGN XHCGOPSS MH COYKY MOY KHSS HZ TALRYMKE CUL OYUKX VAM COYKYHG UWWHAGM HZ MOY LTHRY GHMOPGN WHASX VY LYYG. MOY GYUKYK MOYE NHM MHMOY OHSSHC MOY SYLL MOYE WHASX LYY VAM MOY THKY MOYE ZYSM MOY GYUKGYLLHZ MOY UWMAUS VUMMSYZPYSX. MOYE VYNUG MH TYYM CHAGXYX TYG. HGY CPMO UVSYYXPGN OYUX UGX GH WUI CUL VYPGN XKUNNYX USHGN VE MCH LHSXPYKL COHLAIIHKMYX OPT AGXYK MOY UKTL. MOYKY CUL U NAKNSY PG OPL MOKHUM UGX OYCUL LIPMMPGN VSHHX. U VASSYM OUX YBPXYGMSE OPM OPT PG MOY MOKHUM HKTHAMO. UGHMOYK CUL CUSRPGN LMAKXPSE VE OPTLYSZ VAM CPMOHAM OPL TALRYM,NKHUGPGN USHAX UGX LCPGNPGN OPL UKT COPWO OUX QALM VYYG OAKM, COPSYVSHHX ZKHT PM CUL LMKYUTPGN HBYK OPL NKYUMWHUM UL ZKHT U VHMMSY. OY OUXMOUM THTYGM VYYG CHAGXYX UGX OPL ZUWY LOHCYX ZYUK KUMOYK MOUG LAZZYKPGN.WKHLLPGN U KHUX MOYE XYLWYGXYX U LMYYI PGWSPGY UGX LUC LYBYKUS TYGSEPGN HG MOY NKHAGX; MOYE USLH TYM U WKHCX HZ LHSXPYKL LHTY HZ COHT CYKYAGCHAGXYX. MOY LHSXPYKL CYKY ULWYGXPGN MOY OPSS VKYUMOPGN OYUBPSE, UGXXYLIPMY MOY NYGYKUS'L IKYLYGWY CYKY MUSRPGN SHAXSE UGX NYLMPWASUMPGN.PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT KHCL HZ NKUE WSHURL CYKY USKYUXE BPLPVSY MOKHANO MOYLTHRY, UGX UG HZZPWYK WUMWOPGN LPNOM HZ VUNKUMPHG KALOYX LOHAMPGN UZMYKMOY WKHCX HZ KYMKYUMPGN LHSXPYKL, HKXYKPGN MOYT VUWR. VUNKUMPHG KHXY AIMH MOY KUGRL USHGN COPWO LOHML WKUWRSYX GHC OYKY UGX GHC MOYKY, XKHCGPGNMOY LHAGX HZ BHPWYL UGX MOY LOHAML HZ WHTTUGX. MOY COHSY UPK KYYRYX CPMOLTHRY. MOY YDWPMYX ZUWYL HZ MOY LHSXPYKL CYKY VSUWRYGYX CPMO PM. LHTYCYKY ALPGN MOYPK KUTKHXL, HMOYKL IAMMPGN IHCXYK HG MOY MHAWOIUGL HKMURPGN WOUKNYL ZKHT MOYPK IHAWOYL, COPSY HMOYKL CYKY ZPKPGN, MOHANO COHMOYE CYKY ZPKPGN UM WHASX GHM VY LYYG ZHK MOY LTHRY COPWO MOYKY CUL GHCPGX MH WUKKE UCUE. U ISYULUGM OATTPGN UGX COPLMSPGN HZ VASSYML CYKYHZMYG OYUKX. "COUM PL MOPL?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC UIIKHUWOPGN MOY WKHCXHZ LHSXPYKL. "PM WUG'M VY UG UMMUWR, ZHK MOYE UKY GHM THBPGN; PM WUG'MVY U LJAUKY--ZHK MOYE UKY GHM XKUCG AI ZHK MOUM."MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGM, U MOPG, ZYYVSY-SHHRPGN HSX TUG CPMO UISYULUGM LTPSY--OPL YEYSPXL XKHHIPGN THKY MOUG OUSZ HBYK OPL HSX YEYL,NPBPGN OPT U TPSX YDIKYLLPHG, KHXY AI MH VUNKUMPHG UGX CYSWHTYX OPT ULU OHLM CYSWHTYL UG OHGHKYX NAYLM. OY KYIHKMYX MOUM OPL KYNPTYGM OUXVYYG UMMUWRYX VE ZKYGWO WUBUSKE UGX MOUM, MOHANO MOY UMMUWR OUX VYYGKYIASLYX, OY OUX SHLM THKY MOUG OUSZ OPL TYG. OY LUPX MOY UMMUWROUX VYYG KYIASLYX, YTISHEPGN MOPL TPSPMUKE MYKT MH XYLWKPVY COUM OUXHWWAKKYX MH OPL KYNPTYGM, VAM PG KYUSPME OY XPX GHM OPTLYSZ RGHC COUMOUX OUIIYGYX XAKPGN MOUM OUSZ-OHAK MH MOY MKHHIL YGMKALMYX MH OPT, UGXWHASX GHM LUE CPMO WYKMUPGME COYMOYK MOY UMMUWR OUX VYYG KYIASLYX HK OPLKYNPTYGM OUX VYYG VKHRYG AI. USS OY RGYC CUL MOUM UM MOY WHTTYGWYTYGMHZ MOY UWMPHG VUSSL UGX LOYSSL VYNUG ZSEPGN USS HBYK OPL KYNPTYGM UGXOPMMPGN TYG UGX MOUM UZMYKCUKXL LHTYHGY OUX LOHAMYX "WUBUSKE!" UGX HAKTYG OUX VYNAG ZPKPGN. MOYE CYKY LMPSS ZPKPGN, GHM UM MOY WUBUSKE COPWOOUX XPLUIIYUKYX, VAM UM ZKYGWO PGZUGMKE COH OUX WHTY PGMH MOY OHSSHC UGXCYKY ZPKPGN UM HAK TYG. IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG VHCYX OPL OYUX UL U LPNGMOUM MOPL CUL YDUWMSE COUM OY OUX XYLPKYX UGX YDIYWMYX. MAKGPGN MH OPLUXQAMUGM OY HKXYKYX OPT MH VKPGN XHCG MOY MCH VUMMUSPHGL HZ MOY LPDMOWOULLYAKL COHT MOYE OUX QALM IULLYX. IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LMKAWR VEMOY WOUGNYX YDIKYLLPHG HG IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG'L ZUWY UM MOPL THTYGM. PMYDIKYLLYX MOY WHGWYGMKUMYX UGX OUIIE KYLHSAMPHG EHA LYY HG MOY ZUWY HZU TUG COH HG U OHM XUE MURYL U ZPGUS KAG VYZHKY ISAGNPGN PGMH MOY CUMYK.MOY XASS, LSYYIE YDIKYLLPHG CUL GH SHGNYK MOYKY, GHK MOY UZZYWMUMPHGHZ IKHZHAGX MOHANOM. MOY KHAGX, LMYUXE, OUCR'L YEYL SHHRYX VYZHKY OPTYUNYKSE UGX KUMOYK XPLXUPGZASSE, GHM KYLMPGN HG UGEMOPGN USMOHANO OPLTHBYTYGML CYKY LMPSS LSHC UGX TYULAKYX.MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGM MAKGYX MH IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, YGMKYUMPGN OPTMH NH VUWR UL PM CUL MHH XUGNYKHAL MH KYTUPG COYKY MOYE CYKY. "ISYULY,EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, ZHK NHX'L LURY!" OY RYIM LUEPGN, NSUGWPGN ZHK LAIIHKMUM UG HZZPWYK HZ MOY LAPMY COH MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OPT. "MOYKY, EHA LYY!"UGX OY XKYC UMMYGMPHG MH MOY VASSYML COPLMSPGN, LPGNPGN, UGX OPLLPGNWHGMPGAUSSE UKHAGX MOYT. OY LIHRY PG MOY MHGY HZ YGMKYUME UGX KYIKHUWOMOUM U WUKIYGMYK ALYL MH U NYGMSYTUG COH OUL IPWRYX AI UG UD: "CY UKYALYX MH PM, VAM EHA, LPK, CPSS VSPLMYK EHAK OUGXL." OY LIHRY UL PZ MOHLYVASSYML WHASX GHM RPSS OPT, UGX OPL OUSZ-WSHLYX YEYL NUBY LMPSS THKYIYKLAULPBYGYLL MH OPL CHKXL. MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK QHPGYX PG MOY WHSHGYS'LUIIYUSL, VAM VUNKUMPHG XPX GHM KYISE; OY HGSE NUBY UG HKXYK MHWYULY ZPKPGN UGX KY-ZHKT, LH UL MH NPBY KHHT ZHK MOY MCH UIIKHUWOPGNVUMMUSPHGL. COPSY OY CUL LIYURPGN, MOY WAKMUPG HZ LTHRY MOUM OUXWHGWYUSYX MOY OHSSHC, XKPBYG VE U KPLPGN CPGX, VYNUG MH THBY ZKHT KPNOMMH SYZM UL PZ XKUCG VE UG PGBPLPVSY OUGX, UGX MOY OPSS HIIHLPMY, CPMOMOY ZKYGWO THBPGN UVHAM HG PM, HIYGYX HAM VYZHKY MOYT. USS YEYL ZULMYGYXPGBHSAGMUKPSE HG MOPL ZKYGWO WHSATG UXBUGWPGN UNUPGLM MOYT UGX CPGXPGNXHCG HBYK MOY AGYBYG NKHAGX. HGY WHASX USKYUXE LYY MOY LHSXPYKL' LOUNNEWUIL, XPLMPGNAPLO MOY HZZPWYKL ZKHT MOY TYG, UGX LYY MOY LMUGXUKXZSUIIPGN UNUPGLM PML LMUZZ."MOYE TUKWO LISYGXPXSE," KYTUKRYX LHTYHGY PG VUNKUMPHG'L LAPMY.MOY OYUX HZ MOY WHSATG OUX USKYUXE XYLWYGXYX PGMH MOY OHSSHC. MOY WSULOCHASX MURY ISUWY HG MOPL LPXY HZ PM...MOY KYTUPGL HZ HAK KYNPTYGM COPWO OUX VYYG PG UWMPHG KUIPXSE ZHKTYX AIUGX THBYX MH MOY KPNOM; ZKHT VYOPGX PM, XPLIYKLPGN MOY SUNNUKXL, WUTYMCH VUMMUSPHGL HZ MOY LPDMO WOULLYAKL PG ZPGY HKXYK. VYZHKY MOYE OUXKYUWOYX VUNKUMPHG, MOY CYPNOME MKYUX HZ MOY TULL HZ TYG TUKWOPGN PG LMYIWHASX VY OYUKX. HG MOYPK SYZM ZSUGR, GYUKYLM MH VUNKUMPHG, TUKWOYXU WHTIUGE WHTTUGXYK, U ZPGY KHAGX-ZUWYX TUG, CPMO U LMAIPX UGX OUIIEYDIKYLLPHG--MOY LUTY TUG COH OUX KALOYX HAM HZ MOY CUMMSY LOYX. UM MOUMTHTYGM OY CUL WSYUKSE MOPGRPGN HZ GHMOPGN VAM OHC XULOPGN U ZYSSHC OYCHASX UIIYUK UL OY IULLYX MOY WHTTUGXYK.CPMO MOY LYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG HZ U TUG HG IUKUXY, OY LMYIIYX SPNOMSE CPMOOPL TALWASUK SYNL UL PZ LUPSPGN USHGN, LMKYMWOPGN OPTLYSZ MH OPL ZASSOYPNOM CPMOHAM MOY LTUSSYLM YZZHKM, OPL YULY WHGMKULMPGN CPMO MOY OYUBEMKYUX HZ MOY LHSXPYKL COH CYKY RYYIPGN LMYI CPMO OPT. OY WUKKPYX WSHLYMH OPL SYN U GUKKHC AGLOYUMOYX LCHKX (LTUSS, WAKBYX, UGX GHM SPRY U KYUSCYUIHG) UGX SHHRYX GHC UM MOY LAIYKPHK HZZPWYKL UGX GHC VUWR UM MOY TYGCPMOHAM SHLPGN LMYI, OPL COHSY IHCYKZAS VHXE MAKGPGN ZSYDPVSE. PM CUL ULPZ USS MOY IHCYKL HZ OPL LHAS CYKY WHGWYGMKUMYX HG IULLPGN MOY WHTTUGXYKPG MOY VYLM IHLLPVSY TUGGYK, UGX ZYYSPGN MOUM OY CUL XHPGN PM CYSS OYCUL OUIIE. "SYZM... SYZM... SYZM..." OY LYYTYX MH KYIYUM MH OPTLYSZ UMYUWO USMYKGUMY LMYI; UGX PG MPTY MH MOPL, CPMO LMYKG VAM BUKPYX ZUWYL,MOY CUSS HZ LHSXPYKL VAKXYGYX CPMO RGUILUWRL UGX TALRYML TUKWOYX PGLMYI, UGX YUWO HGY HZ MOYLY OAGXKYXL HZ LHSXPYKL LYYTYX MH VY KYIYUMPGNMH OPTLYSZ UM YUWO USMYKGUMY LMYI, "SYZM... SYZM... SYZM..." U ZUMTUQHK LRPKMYX U VALO, IAZZPGN UGX ZUSSPGN HAM HZ LMYI; U LHSXPYK COH OUXZUSSYG VYOPGX, OPL ZUWY LOHCPGN USUKT UM OPL XYZYWMPHG, KUG UM U MKHM,IUGMPGN MH WUMWO AI CPMO OPL WHTIUGE. U WUGGHG VUSS, WSYUBPGN MOY UPK,ZSYC HBYK MOY OYUXL HZ VUNKUMPHG UGX OPL LAPMY, UGX ZYSS PGMH MOYWHSATG MH MOY TYULAKY HZ "SYZM... SYZM!" "WSHLY AI!" WUTY MOY WHTIUGEWHTTUGXYK'L BHPWY PG QUAGME MHGYL. MOY LHSXPYKL IULLYX PG U LYTPWPKWSYKHAGX LHTYMOPGN COYKY MOY VUSS OUX ZUSSYG, UGX UG HSX MKHHIYK HG MOYZSUGR, U GHGWHTTPLLPHGYX HZZPWYK COH OUX LMHIIYX VYLPXY MOY XYUX TYG,KUG MH WUMWO AI OPL SPGY UGX, ZUSSPGN PGMH LMYI CPMO U OHI, SHHRYX VUWRUGNKPSE, UGX MOKHANO MOY HTPGHAL LPSYGWY UGX MOY KYNASUK MKUTI HZ ZYYMVYUMPGN MOY NKHAGX PG AGPLHG, HGY LYYTYX MH OYUK SYZM... U THKHLY LHSXPYK TUKWOPGN HG MOY SYZM MAKGYX OPL YEYL HGVUNKUMPHG UL OY LOHAMYX, CPMO UG YDIKYLLPHG MOUM LYYTYX MH LUE: "CY RGHCMOUM HAKLYSBYL!" UGHMOYK, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN KHAGX, UL MOHANO ZYUKPGN MHKYSUD, LOHAMYX CPMO OPL THAMO CPXY HIYG UGX IULLYX HG.MOY HKXYK CUL NPBYG MH OUSM UGX XHCG RGUILUWRL.VUNKUMPHG KHXY KHAGX MOY KUGRL MOUM OUX TUKWOYX IULM OPT UGX XPLTHAGMYX.OY NUBY MOY KYPGL MH U WHLLUWR, MHHR HZZ UGX OUGXYX HBYK OPL ZYSM WHUM,LMKYMWOYX OPL SYNL, UGX LYM OPL WUI LMKUPNOM. "PZ EHA BYKY PG MOY WUBUSKE...""P UT GHM PG MOY WUBUSKE, WHSHGYS, VAM P UT U KALLPUG NYGYKUS UGX PZ EHAUKY GHM UCUKY HZ MOY ZUWM...""JAPMY UBUKY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," LAXXYGSE LOHAMYX MOY WHSHGYS, MHAWOPGNOPL OHKLY UGX MAKGPGN IAKISY PG MOY ZUWY. P UT GHM WHGLPXYKPGN TE HCG ISYULAKY UGXP CHG'M USSHC PM MH VY LUPX!"MURPGN MOY WHSHGYS'L HAMVAKLM UL U WOUSSYGNY MH OPL WHAKUNY, MOY NYGYKUSYDIUGXYX OPL WOYLM UGX KHXY, ZKHCGPGN, VYLPXY OPT MH MOY ZKHGM SPGY, ULPZ MOYPK XPZZYKYGWYL CHASX VY LYMMSYX MOYKY UTHGNLM MOY VASSYML. VHMO IULLYX MOY YDUTPGUMPHG LAWWYLLZASSE. MOYE CYKY WAM HZZ ZKHT MOY SPGY HZKYMKYUM HG MOY SYZM VE MOY ZKYGWO. OHCYBYK PGWHGBYGPYGM MOY IHLPMPHG, PMCUL GHC GYWYLLUKE MH UMMUWR PG HKXYK MH WAM UCUE MOKHANO ZHK MOYTLYSBYL.MOY LJAUXKHG PG COPWO KHLMHB CUL LYKBPGN OUX LWUKWYSE MPTY MH THAGMVYZHKY PM CUL OUSMYX ZUWPGN MOY YGYTE. UNUPG, UL UM MOY YGGL VKPXNY,MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN VYMCYYG MOY LJAUXKHG UGX MOY YGYTE, UGX UNUPG MOUMMYKKPVSY XPBPXPGN SPGY HZ AGWYKMUPGME UGX ZYUK--KYLYTVSPGN MOY SPGYLYIUKUMPGN MOY SPBPGN ZKHT MOY XYUX--SUE VYMCYYG MOYT. USS CYKYWHGLWPHAL HZ MOPL AGLYYG SPGY, UGX MOY JAYLMPHG COYMOYK MOYE CHASX WKHLLPM HK GHM, UGX OHC MOYE CHASX WKHLL PM, UNPMUMYX MOYT USS.MOY WHSHGYS KHXY MH MOY ZKHGM, UGNKPSE NUBY LHTY KYISE MH JAYLMPHGL IAMMH OPT VE MOY HZZPWYKL, UGX, SPRY U TUG XYLIYKUMYSE PGLPLMPGN HG OUBPGNOPL HCG CUE, NUBY UG HKXYK. GH HGY LUPX UGEMOPGN XYZPGPMY, VAM MOY KATHKHZ UG UMMUWR LIKYUX MOKHANO MOY LJAUXKHG. MOY WHTTUGX MH ZHKT AI KUGNHAM UGX MOY LUVYKL COPFFYX UL MOYE CYKY XKUCG ZKHT MOYPK LWUVVUKXL.LMPSS GH HGY THBYX. MOY MKHHIL HZ MOY SYZM ZSUGR, PGZUGMKE UGX OALLUKLUSPRY, ZYSM MOUM MOY WHTTUGXYK XPX GHM OPTLYSZ RGHC COUM MH XH, UGX MOPLPKKYLHSAMPHG WHTTAGPWUMYX PMLYSZ MH MOY TYG."PZ HGSE MOYE CHASX VY JAPWR!" MOHANOM KHLMHB, ZYYSPGN MOUM UM SULMMOY MPTY OUX WHTY MH YDIYKPYGWY MOY QHE HZ UG UMMUWR HZ COPWO OY OUX LHHZMYG OYUKX ZKHT OPL ZYSSHC OALLUKL."ZH'CUKX, CPMO NHX, SUXL!" KUGN HAM XYGPLHB'L BHPWY. "UM U MCHMZH'CUKX!"MOY OHKLYL' WKHAIL VYNUG MH LCUE PG MOY ZKHGM SPGY. "SYM UGEHGY WHTY TE CUE GHC,"MOHANOM KHLMHB XKPBPGN OPL LIAKL PGMH KHHR UGX SYMMPGN OPT NH UM U ZASSNUSSHI LH MOUM OY HAMLMKPIIYX MOY HMOYKL. UOYUX, MOY YGYTE CUL USKYUXEBPLPVSY. ZKHT VYOPGX OPTVHGXUKWOAR, UG OALLUK OY RGYC, QHSMYX UNUPGLM OPT UGX SHHRYX UGNKPSE UMOPT. VHGXUKWOAR'L OHKLY LCYKBYX UGX NUSSHIYX IULM."OHC PL PM P UT GHM THBPGN? P OUBY ZUSSYG, P UT RPSSYX!" KHLMHB ULRYXUGX UGLCYKYX UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM.
