"GH, P UT CHAGXYX UGX MOY OHKLY PL RPSSYX." KHHRMKPYX MH KPLY HG OPL ZHKYSYNL VAM ZYSS VUWR, IPGGPGN OPL KPXYK'L SYN.VSHHX CUL ZSHCPGN ZKHT OPL OYUX; OY LMKANNSYX VAM WHASX GHM KPLY. KHLMHBUSLH MKPYX MH KPLY VAM ZYSS VUWR, OPL LUVKYMUWOY OUBPGN VYWHTY YGMUGNSYXPG MOY LUXXSY. COYKY HAK TYG CYKY, UGX COYKY MOY ZKYGWO, OY XPX GHMRGHC. MOYKY CUL GH HGY GYUK.OUBPGN XPLYGMUGNSYX OPL SYN, OY KHLY. "COYKY, HG COPWO LPXY, CUL GHC MOYSPGY MOUM OUX LH LOUKISE XPBPXYX MOY MCH UKTPYL?" OY ULRYX OPTLYSZ UGXWHASX GHM UGLCYK. "WUG LHTYMOPGN VUX OUBY OUIIYGYX MH TY?" OY CHGXYKYXUL OY NHM AI: UGX UM MOUM THTYGM OY ZYSM MOUM LHTYMOPGN LAIYKZSAHAL CULOUGNPGN HG OPL VYGATVYX SYZM UKT. MOY CKPLM ZYSM UL PZ PM CYKY GHM OPL.OY YDUTPGYX OPL OUGX WUKYZASSE, BUPGSE MKEPGN MH ZPGX VSHHX HG PM. "UO,OYKY UKY IYHISY WHTPGN," OY MOHANOM QHEZASSE, LYYPGN LHTY TYG KAGGPGNMHCUKX OPT. "MOYE CPSS OYSI TY!" PG ZKHGM WUTY U TUG CYUKPGN U LMKUGNYLOURH UGX U VSAY WSHUR, LCUKMOE, LAGVAKGYX, UGX CPMO U OHHRYX GHLY. MOYGWUTY MCH THKY, UGX TUGE THKY KAGGPGN VYOPGX. HGY HZ MOYT LUPX LHTYMOPGNLMKUGNY, GHM PG KALLPUG. PG UTHGN MOY OPGXTHLM HZ MOYLY TYG CYUKPGNLPTPSUK LOURHL CUL U KALLPUG OALLUK. OY CUL VYPGN OYSX VE MOY UKTL UGXOPL OHKLY CUL VYPGN SYX VYOPGX OPT."PM TALM VY HGY HZ HAKL, U IKPLHGYK. EYL. WUG PM VY MOUM MOYE CPSS MURYTY MHH? COH UKY MOYLY TYG?" MOHANOM KHLMHB, LWUKWYSE VYSPYBPGN OPL YEYL."WUG MOYE VY ZKYGWO?" OY SHHRYX UM MOY UIIKHUWOPGN ZKYGWOTYG, UGX MOHANOVAM U THTYGM VYZHKY OY OUX VYYG NUSSHIPGN MH NYM UM MOYT UGX OUWR MOYTMH IPYWYL, MOYPK IKHDPTPME GHC LYYTYX LH UCZAS MOUM OY WHASX GHM VYSPYBYOPL YEYL. "COH UKY MOYE? COE UKY MOYE KAGGPGN? WUG MOYE VY WHTPGN UM TY?UGX COE? MH RPSS TY? TY COHT YBYKEHGY PL LH ZHGX HZ?" OY KYTYTVYKYXOPL THMOYK'L SHBY ZHK OPT, UGX OPL ZUTPSE'L, UGX OPL ZKPYGXL', UGX MOYYGYTE'L PGMYGMPHG MH RPSS OPT LYYTYX PTIHLLPVSY. "VAM IYKOUIL MOYE TUEXH PM!" ZHK THKY MOUG MYG LYWHGXL OY LMHHX GHM THBPGN ZKHT MOY LIHM HKKYUSPFPGN MOY LPMAUMPHG. MOY ZHKYTHLM ZKYGWOTUG, MOY HGY CPMO MOY OHHRYXGHLY, CUL USKYUXE LH WSHLY MOUM MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZUWY WHASX VYLYYG. UGX MOY YDWPMYX, USPYG ZUWY HZ MOUM TUG, OPL VUEHGYM OUGNPGN XHCG,OHSXPGN OPL VKYUMO, UGX KAGGPGN LH SPNOMSE, ZKPNOMYGYX KHLMHB. OY LYPFYXOPL IPLMHS UGX, PGLMYUX HZ ZPKPGN PM, ZSAGN PM UM MOY ZKYGWOTUG UGXKUG CPMO USS OPL TPNOM MHCUKX MOY VALOYL. OY XPX GHM GHC KAG CPMO MOYZYYSPGN HZ XHAVM UGX WHGZSPWM CPMO COPWO OY OUX MKHXXYG MOY YGGL VKPXNY,VAM CPMO MOY ZYYSPGN HZ U OUKY ZSYYPGN ZKHT MOY OHAGXL. HGY LPGNSYLYGMPTYGM, MOUM HZ ZYUK ZHK OPL EHAGN UGX OUIIE SPZY, IHLLYLLYX OPLCOHSY VYPGN. KUIPXSE SYUIPGN MOY ZAKKHCL, OY ZSYX UWKHLL MOY ZPYSX CPMOMOY PTIYMAHLPME OY ALYX MH LOHC UM WUMWOISUE, GHC UGX MOYG MAKGPGN OPLNHHX-GUMAKYX, IUSY, EHAGN ZUWY MH SHHR VUWR. U LOAXXYK HZ MYKKHK CYGMMOKHANO OPT: "GH, VYMMYK GHM SHHR," OY MOHANOM, VAM OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOYVALOYL OY NSUGWYX KHAGX HGWY THKY. MOY ZKYGWO OUX ZUSSYG VYOPGX, UGXQALM UL OY SHHRYX KHAGX MOY ZPKLM TUG WOUGNYX OPL KAG MH U CUSR UGX,MAKGPGN, LOHAMYX LHTYMOPGN SHAXSE MH U WHTKUXY ZUKMOYK VUWR. KHLMHBIUALYX. "GH, MOYKY'L LHTY TPLMURY," MOHANOM OY. "MOYE WUG'M OUBY CUGMYXMH RPSS TY." VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTY, OPL SYZM UKT ZYSM UL OYUBE UL PZU LYBYGME-IHAGX CYPNOM CYKY MPYX MH PM. OY WHASX KAG GH THKY. MOYZKYGWOTUG USLH LMHIIYX UGX MHHR UPT. KHLMHB WSHLYX OPL YEYL UGX LMHHIYXXHCG. HGY VASSYM UGX MOYG UGHMOYK COPLMSYX IULM OPT. VYOPGX MOYLY CYKY LHTY KALLPUG LOUKILOHHMYKL.WOUIMYK DDMOY PGZUGMKE KYNPTYGML MOUM OUX VYYG WUANOM AGUCUKYL PG MOY HAMLRPKMLHZ MOY CHHX KUG HAM HZ PM, MOY XPZZYKYGM WHTIUGPYL NYMMPGN TPDYX, UGXKYMKYUMYX UL U XPLHKXYKSE WKHCX. HGY LHSXPYK, PG OPL ZYUK, AMMYKYX MOYLYGLYSYLL WKE, "WAM HZZ!" MOUM PL LH MYKKPVSY PG VUMMSY, UGX MOUM CHKXPGZYWMYX MOY COHSY WKHCX CPMO U ZYYSPGN HZ IUGPW."LAKKHAGXYX! WAM HZZ? CY'KY SHLM!" LOHAMYX MOY ZANPMPBYL.MOY THTYGM OY OYUKX MOY ZPKPGN UGX MOY WKE ZKHT VYOPGX, MOY NYGYKUSKYUSPFYX MOUM LHTYMOPGN XKYUXZAS OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPL KYNPTYGM, UGX MOYMOHANOM MOUM OY, UG YDYTISUKE HZZPWYK HZ TUGE EYUKL' LYKBPWY COH OUXGYBYK VYYG MH VSUTY, TPNOM VY OYSX KYLIHGLPVSY UM OYUXJAUKMYKL ZHKGYNSPNYGWY HK PGYZZPWPYGWE LH LMUNNYKYX OPT MOUM, ZHKNYMMPGN MOYKYWUSWPMKUGM WUBUSKE WHSHGYS, OPL HCG XPNGPME UL U NYGYKUS, UGX UVHBYUSS JAPMY ZHKNYMMPGN MOY XUGNYK UGX USS KYNUKX ZHK LYSZ-IKYLYKBUMPHG, OYWSAMWOYX MOY WKAIIYK HZ OPL LUXXSY UGX, LIAKKPGN OPL OHKLY, NUSSHIYX MHMOY KYNPTYGM AGXYK U OUPS HZ VASSYML COPWO ZYSS UKHAGX, VAM ZHKMAGUMYSETPLLYX OPT. OPL HGY XYLPKY CUL MH RGHC COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN UGX UM UGEWHLM WHKKYWM, HK KYTYXE, MOY TPLMURY PZ OY OUX TUXY HGY, LH MOUM OY,UG YDYTISUKE HZZPWYK HZ MCYGME-MCH EYUKL' LYKBPWY, COH OUX GYBYK VYYGWYGLAKYX, LOHASX GHM VY OYSX MH VSUTY.OUBPGN NUSSHIYX LUZYSE MOKHANO MOY ZKYGWO, OY KYUWOYX U ZPYSX VYOPGXMOY WHILY UWKHLL COPWO HAK TYG, KYNUKXSYLL HZ HKXYKL, CYKY KAGGPGN UGXXYLWYGXPGN MOY BUSSYE. MOUM THTYGM HZ THKUS OYLPMUMPHG COPWO XYWPXYLMOY ZUMY HZ VUMMSYL OUX UKKPBYX. CHASX MOPL XPLHKXYKSE WKHCX HZ LHSXPYKLUMMYGX MH MOY BHPWY HZ MOYPK WHTTUGXYK, HK CHASX MOYE, XPLKYNUKXPGN OPT,WHGMPGAY MOYPK ZSPNOM? XYLIPMY OPL XYLIYKUMY LOHAML MOUM ALYX MH LYYTLH MYKKPVSY MH MOY LHSXPYKL, XYLIPMY OPL ZAKPHAL IAKISY WHAGMYGUGWYXPLMHKMYX HAM HZ USS SPRYGYLL MH OPL ZHKTYK LYSZ, UGX MOY ZSHAKPLOPGN HZOPL LUVYK, MOY LHSXPYKL USS WHGMPGAYX MH KAG, MUSRPGN, ZPKPGN PGMH MOYUPK, UGX XPLHVYEPGN HKXYKL. YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX SHLM. VAM UM MOUMTHTYGM MOY ZKYGWO COH CYKY UMMUWRPGN, LAXXYGSE UGX CPMOHAM UGE UIIUKYGMKYULHG, KUG VUWR UGX XPLUIIYUKYX ZKHT MOY HAMLRPKML, UGX KALLPUGLOUKILOHHMYKL LOHCYX MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY WHILY. PM CUL MPTHROPG'L WHTIUGE,COPWO USHGY OUX TUPGMUPGYX PML HKXYK PG MOY CHHX UGX, OUBPGN SUPG PGUTVALO PG U XPMWO, GHC UMMUWRYX MOY ZKYGWO AGYDIYWMYXSE. MPTHROPG, UKTYXHGSE CPMO U LCHKX, OUX KALOYX UM MOY YGYTE CPMO LAWO U XYLIYKUMY WKE UGXLAWO TUX, XKAGRYG XYMYKTPGUMPHG MOUM, MURYG VE LAKIKPLY, MOY ZKYGWO OUXMOKHCG XHCG MOYPK TALRYML UGX KAG. XHSHROHB, KAGGPGN VYLPXY MPTHROPG,RPSSYX U ZKYGWOTUG UM WSHLY JAUKMYKL UGX CUL MOY ZPKLM MH LYPFY MOYLAKKYGXYKPGN ZKYGWO HZZPWYK VE OPL WHSSUK. HAK ZANPMPBYL KYMAKGYX, MOYVUMMUSPHGL KY-ZHKTYX, UGX MOY ZKYGWO COH OUX GYUKSE WAM HAK SYZM ZSUGRPG OUSZ CYKY ZHK MOY THTYGM KYIASLYX. MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK UGX TUQHKYRHGHTHB OUX LMHIIYX VYLPXY U VKPXNY, SYMMPGN MOY KYMKYUMPGN WHTIUGPYLIULL VE MOYT, COYG U LHSXPYK WUTY AI UGX MHHR OHSX HZ MOY WHTTUGXYK'LLMPKKAI, USTHLM SYUGPGN UNUPGLM OPT. MOY TUG CUL CYUKPGN U VSAPLO WHUMHZ VKHUXWSHMO, OY OUX GH RGUILUWR HK WUI, OPL OYUX CUL VUGXUNYX, UGXHBYK OPL LOHASXYK U ZKYGWO TAGPMPHG IHAWO CUL LSAGN. OY OUX UG HZZPWYK'LLCHKX PG OPL OUGX. P VYN EHA CPSS KYTYTVYKMOPL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!""USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM," KYISPYX MOY WHTTUGXYK, UGX MAKGYX MH TUQHKYRHGHTHB.VAM XHSHROHB XPX GHM NH UCUE; OY AGMPYX MOY OUGXRYKWOPYZ UKHAGX OPLOYUX, IASSYX PM HZZ, UGX LOHCYX MOY VSHHX WHGNYUSYX HG OPL OUPK."U VUEHGYM CHAGX. KYTYTVYK, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!"MALOPG'L VUMMYKE OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG UGX HGSE UM MOY BYKE YGX HZ MOYUWMPHG XPX IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, LMPSS OYUKPGN MOY WUGGHGUXY PG MOY WYGMYK,LYGX OPL HKXYKSE LMUZZ HZZPWYK, UGX SUMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC USLH, MH HKXYKMOY VUMMYKE MH KYMPKY UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY. COYG MOY LAIIHKML UMMUWOYXMH MALOPG'L VUMMYKE OUX VYYG THBYX UCUE PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY UWMPHGVE LHTYHGY'L HKXYK, MOY VUMMYKE OUX WHGMPGAYX ZPKPGN UGX CUL HGSE GHMWUIMAKYX VE MOY ZKYGWO VYWUALY MOY YGYTE WHASX GHM LAKTPLY MOUM UGEHGYWHASX OUBY MOY YZZKHGMYKE MH WHGMPGAY ZPKPGN ZKHT ZHAK JAPMY AGXYZYGXYXNAGL. HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOY YGYKNYMPW UWMPHG HZ MOUM VUMMYKE SYX MOYZKYGWO MH LAIIHLY MOUM OYKY--PG MOY WYGMYK--MOY TUPG KALLPUG ZHKWYL CYKYWHGWYGMKUMYX. MCPWY MOYE OUX UMMYTIMYX MH UMMUWR MOPL IHPGM, VAM HG YUWOHWWULPHG OUX VYYG XKPBYG VUWR VE NKUIYLOHM ZKHT MOY ZHAK PLHSUMYX NAGLHG MOY OPSSHWR.LHHG UZMYK IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG OUX SYZM OPT, MALOPG OUX LAWWYYXYX PGLYMMPGN ZPKY MH LWOHG NKUVYKG."SHHR UM MOYT LWAKKEPGN! YDWSUPTYX MOY UKMPSSYKETYG, VKPNOMYGPGNAI.USS MOY NAGL, CPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK HKXYKL, CYKY VYPGN ZPKYX PG MOYXPKYWMPHG HZ MOY WHGZSUNKUMPHG. UL PZ AKNPGN YUWO HMOYK HG, MOY LHSXPYKLWKPYX UM YUWO LOHM: "ZPGY! MOUM'L NHHX! SHHR UM PM... NKUGX!" MOY ZPKY,ZUGGYX VE MOY VKYYFY, CUL KUIPXSE LIKYUXPGN. MOY ZKYGWO WHSATGL MOUM OUXUXBUGWYX VYEHGX MOY BPSSUNY CYGM VUWR; VAM UL MOHANO PG KYBYGNY ZHK MOPLZUPSAKY, MOY YGYTE ISUWYX MYG NAGL MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY BPSSUNY UGX VYNUGZPKPGN MOYT UM MALOPG'L VUMMYKE.PG MOYPK WOPSXSPRY NSYY, UKHALYX VE MOY ZPKY UGX MOYPK SAWR PGLAWWYLLZASSE WUGGHGUXPGN MOY ZKYGWO, HAK UKMPSSYKETYG HGSE GHMPWYX MOPLVUMMYKE COYG MCH VUSSL, UGX MOYG ZHAK THKY, ZYSS UTHGN HAK NAGL, HGYRGHWRPGN HBYK MCH OHKLYL UGX UGHMOYK MYUKPGN HZZ U TAGPMPHG-CUNHGXKPBYK'L SYN. MOYPK LIPKPML HGWY KHALYX CYKY, OHCYBYK, GHM XPTPGPLOYX,VAM HGSE WOUGNYX WOUKUWMYK. MOY OHKLYL CYKY KYISUWYX VE HMOYKL ZKHT UKYLYKBY NAG WUKKPUNY, MOY CHAGXYX CYKY WUKKPYX UCUE, UGX MOY ZHAK NAGLCYKY MAKGYX UNUPGLM MOY MYG-NAG VUMMYKE. MALOPG'L WHTIUGPHG HZZPWYKOUX VYYG RPSSYX UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY YGNUNYTYGM UGX CPMOPG UG OHAKLYBYGMYYG HZ MOY ZHKME TYG HZ MOY NAGL' WKYCL OUX VYYG XPLUVSYX, VAM MOYUKMPSSYKETYG CYKY LMPSS UL TYKKE UGX SPBYSE UL YBYK. MCPWY MOYE GHMPWYXMOY ZKYGWO UIIYUKPGN VYSHC MOYT, UGX MOYG MOYE ZPKYX NKUIYLOHM UM MOYT.SPMMSY MALOPG, THBPGN ZYYVSE UGX UCRCUKXSE, RYIM MYSSPGN OPL HKXYKSE MH"KYZPSS TE IPIY ZHK MOUM HGY!" UGX MOYG, LWUMMYKPGN LIUKRL ZKHT PM, KUGZHKCUKX LOUXPGN OPL YEYL CPMO OPL LTUSS OUGX MH SHHR UM MOY ZKYGWO."LTUWR UM 'YT, SUXL!" OY RYIM LUEPGN, LYPFPGN MOY NAGL VE MOY COYYSL UGXCHKRPGN MOY LWKYCL OPTLYSZ.UTPX MOY LTHRY, XYUZYGYX VE MOY PGWYLLUGM KYIHKML COPWO USCUEL TUXY OPTQATI, MALOPG GHM MURPGN OPL IPIY ZKHT OPL THAMO KUG ZKHT NAG MH NAG, GHCUPTPGN, GHC WHAGMPGN MOY WOUKNYL, GHC NPBPGN HKXYKL UVHAM KYISUWPGN XYUXHK CHAGXYX OHKLYL UGX OUKGYLLPGN ZKYLO HGYL, UGX LOHAMPGN PG OPL ZYYVSYBHPWY, LH OPNO IPMWOYX UGX PKKYLHSAMY. OPL ZUWY NKYC THKY UGX THKYUGPTUMYX. MOY LHSXPYKL, ZHK MOYTHLM IUKM OUGXLHTY ZYSSHCL UGX, UL PL USCUEL MOY WULY PG UG UKMPSSYKEWHTIUGE, U OYUX UGX LOHASXYKL MUSSYK UGX MCPWY UL VKHUX UL MOYPKHZZPWYK--USS SHHRYX UM MOYPK WHTTUGXYK SPRY WOPSXKYG PG UG YTVUKKULLPGNLPMAUMPHG, UGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY CUL PGBUKPUVSE KYZSYWMYX HGMOYPKL.HCPGN MH MOY MYKKPVSY AIKHUK UGX MOY GYWYLLPME ZHK WHGWYGMKUMPHG UGXUWMPBPME, MALOPG XPX GHM YDIYKPYGWY MOY LSPNOMYLM AGISYULUGM LYGLY HZZYUK, UGX MOY MOHANOM MOUM OY TPNOM VY RPSSYX HK VUXSE CHAGXYX GYBYKHWWAKKYX MH OPT. HG MOY WHGMKUKE, OY VYWUTY THKY UGX THKY YSUMYX. PMLYYTYX MH OPT MOUM PM CUL U BYKE SHGN MPTY UNH, USTHLM U XUE, LPGWY OYOUX ZPKLM LYYG MOY YGYTE UGX ZPKYX MOY ZPKLM LOHM, UGX MOUM MOY WHKGYKHZ MOY ZPYSX OY LMHHX HG CUL CYSS-RGHCG UGX ZUTPSPUK NKHAGX. MOHANO OYMOHANOM HZ YBYKEMOPGN, WHGLPXYKYX YBYKEMOPGN, UGX XPX YBYKEMOPGN MOYVYLM HZ HZZPWYKL WHASX XH PG OPL IHLPMPHG, OY CUL PG U LMUMY URPG MHZYBYKPLO XYSPKPAT HK XKAGRYGGYLL.ZKHT MOY XYUZYGPGN LHAGXL HZ OPL HCG NAGL UKHAGX OPT, MOY COPLMSY UGXMOAX HZ MOY YGYTE'L WUGGHG VUSSL, ZKHT MOY ZSALOYX UGX IYKLIPKPGN ZUWYLHZ MOY WKYC VALMSPGN KHAGX MOY NAGL, ZKHT MOY LPNOM HZ MOY VSHHX HZ TYGUGX OHKLYL, ZKHT MOY SPMMSY IAZZL HZ LTHRY HG MOY YGYTE'L LPXY (USCUELZHSSHCYX VE U VUSS ZSEPGN IULM UGX LMKPRPGN MOY YUKMO, U TUG, U NAG, UOHKLY), ZKHT MOY LPNOM HZ USS MOYLY MOPGNL U ZUGMULMPW CHKSX HZ OPLHCG OUX MURYG IHLLYLLPHG HZ OPL VKUPG UGX UM MOUM THTYGM UZZHKXYX OPTISYULAKY. MOY YGYTE'L NAGL CYKY PG OPL ZUGWE GHM NAGL VAM IPIYL ZKHTCOPWO HWWULPHGUS IAZZL CYKY VSHCG VE UG PGBPLPVSY LTHRYK."MOYKY... OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ. "TUMBYBGU" * CUL MOYGUTY OPL ZUGWE NUBY MH MOY ZUKMOYLM NAG HZ MOY VUMMYKE, COPWO CUL SUKNYUGX HZ UG HSX IUMMYKG. MOY ZKYGWO LCUKTPGN KHAGX MOYPK NAGL LYYTYX MHOPT SPRY UGML. PG MOUM CHKSX, MOY OUGXLHTY XKAGRUKX GATVYK HGY HZ MOYLYWHGX NAG'L WKYC CUL "AGWSY"; MALOPG SHHRYX UM OPT THKY HZMYG MOUGUM UGEHGY YSLY UGX MHHR XYSPNOM PG OPL YBYKE THBYTYGM. MOY LHAGX HZTALRYMKE UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY OPSS, GHC XPTPGPLOPGN, GHC PGWKYULPGN,LYYTYX SPRY LHTYHGY'L VKYUMOPGN. OY SPLMYGYX PGMYGMSE MH MOY YVV UGXZSHC HZ MOYLY LHAGXL.    * XUANOMYK HZ TUMMOYC."UO! VKYUMOPGN UNUPG, VKYUMOPGN!" OY TAMMYKYX MH OPTLYSZ.OY PTUNPGYX OPTLYSZ UL UG YGHKTHALSE MUSS, IHCYKZAS TUG COH CUL MOKHCPGNWUGGHG VUSSL UM MOY ZKYGWO CPMO VHMO OUGXL."GHC MOYG, TUMBYBGU, XYUK HSX SUXE, XHG'M SYM TY XHCG!" OY CUL LUEPGN ULOY THBYX ZKHT MOY NAG, COYG U LMKUGNY, AGZUTPSPUK BHPWY WUSSYX UVHBY OPLOYUX: "WUIMUPG MALOPG! WUIMUPG!"MALOPG MAKGYX KHAGX PG XPLTUE. PM CUL MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK COH OUX MAKGYXOPT HAM HZ MOY VHHMO UM NKAGMO. OY CUL LOHAMPGN PG U NULIPGN BHPWY:"UKY EHA TUX? EHA OUBY MCPWY VYYG HKXYKYX MH KYMKYUM, UGX EHA...""COE UKY MOYE XHCG HG TY?" MOHANOM MALOPG, SHHRPGN PG USUKT UM OPLLAIYKPHK."P... XHG'M..." OY TAMMYKYX, OHSXPGN AI MCH ZPGNYKL MH OPL WUI. "P..."VAM MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYK XPX GHM ZPGPLO COUM OY CUGMYX MH LUE. U WUGGHGVUSS, ZSEPGN WSHLY MH OPT, WUALYX OPT MH XAWR UGX VYGX HBYK OPL OHKLY.OY IUALYX, UGX QALM UL OY CUL UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN THKY, UGHMOYK VUSSLMHIIYX OPT. OY MAKGYX OPL OHKLY UGX NUSSHIYX HZZ."KYMPKY! USS MH KYMPKY!" OY LOHAMYX ZKHT U XPLMUGWY.MOY LHSXPYKL SUANOYX. U THTYGM SUMYK, UG UXQAMUGM UKKPBYX CPMO MOY LUTYHKXYK.PM CUL IKPGWY UGXKYC. MOY ZPKLM MOPGN OY LUC HG KPXPGN AI MH MOY LIUWYCOYKY MALOPG'L NAGL CYKY LMUMPHGYX CUL UG AGOUKGYLLYX OHKLY CPMO UVKHRYG SYN, MOUM SUE LWKYUTPGN IPMYHALSE VYLPXY MOY OUKGYLLYX OHKLYL.VSHHX CUL NALOPGN ZKHT PML SYN UL ZKHT U LIKPGN. UTHGN MOY SPTVYKL SUELYBYKUS XYUX TYG. HGY VUSS UZMYK UGHMOYK IULLYX HBYK UL OY UIIKHUWOYXUGX OY ZYSM U GYKBHAL LOAXXYK KAG XHCG OPL LIPGY. VAM MOY TYKY MOHANOMHZ VYPGN UZKUPX KHALYX OPT UNUPG. "P WUGGHM VY UZKUPX," MOHANOM OY, UGXXPLTHAGMYX LSHCSE UTHGN MOY NAGL. OY XYSPBYKYX MOY HKXYK UGX XPX GHMSYUBY MOY VUMMYKE. OY XYWPXYX MH OUBY MOY NAGL KYTHBYX ZKHT MOYPKIHLPMPHGL UGX CPMOXKUCG PG OPL IKYLYGWY. MHNYMOYK CPMO MALOPG, LMYIIPGNUWKHLL MOY VHXPYL UGX AGXYK U MYKKPVSY ZPKY ZKHT MOY ZKYGWO, OY UMMYGXYXMH MOY KYTHBUS HZ MOY NAGL."U LMUZZ HZZPWYK CUL OYKY U TPGAMY UNH, VAM LRPIIYX HZZ," LUPX UGUKMPSSYKETUG MH IKPGWY UGXKYC. "GHM SPRY EHAK OHGHK!"IKPGWY UGXKYC LUPX GHMOPGN MH MALOPG. MOYE CYKY VHMO LH VALE UL MH LYYTGHM MH GHMPWY HGY UGHMOYK. COYG OUBPGN SPTVYKYX AI MOY HGSE MCH WUGGHGMOUM KYTUPGYX AGPGQAKYX HAM HZ MOY ZHAK, MOYE VYNUG THBPGN XHCG MOY OPSS(HGY LOUMMYKYX NAG UGX HGY AGPWHKG CYKY SYZM VYOPGX), IKPGWY UGXKYC KHXYAI MH MALOPG."CYSS, MPSS CY TYYM UNUPG..." OY LUPX, OHSXPGN HAM OPL OUGX MH MALOPG."NHHX-VEY, TE XYUK ZYSSHC," LUPX MALOPG. "XYUK LHAS! NHHX-VEY, TE XYUKZYSSHC!" UGX ZHK LHTY AGRGHCG KYULHG MYUKL LAXXYGSE ZPSSYX OPL YEYL.WOUIMYK DDPMOY CPGX OUX ZUSSYG UGX VSUWR WSHAXL, TYKNPGN CPMO MOY IHCXYK LTHRY,OAGN SHC HBYK MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY HG MOY OHKPFHG. PM CUL NKHCPGNXUKR UGX MOY NSHC HZ MCH WHGZSUNKUMPHGL CUL MOY THKY WHGLIPWAHAL. MOYWUGGHGUXY CUL XEPGN XHCG, VAM MOY KUMMSY HZ TALRYMKE VYOPGX UGX HGMOY KPNOM LHAGXYX HZMYGYK UGX GYUKYK. PGMYKKAIMPGN HGY UGHMOYK,MOYE USS NUBY, UGX MKUGLTPMMYX, HKXYKL UL MH OHC MH IKHWYYX,KYIKPTUGXPGN UGX KYIKHUWOPGN OPT. MOY QUAGME PGZUGMKEHZZPWYK COH QALM VYZHKY MOY VUMMSY OUX KALOYX HAM HZ MALOPG'L CUMMSYLOYX CUL SUPX, CPMO U VASSYM PG OPL LMHTUWO, HG "TUMBYBGU'L" WUKKPUNY.UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY OPSS, U IUSY OALLUK WUXYM, LAIIHKMPGN HGY OUGX CPMOMOY HMOYK, WUTY AI MH MALOPG UGX ULRYX ZHK U LYUM."WUIMUPG, ZHK NHX'L LURY! EHAK YDWYSSYGWE.""EHA TPNOM OUBY MURYG LHTY ZKHT MOY WHBYKPGN MKHHIL."MALOPG XPX GHM LUE MOUM MOYKY CYKY GH WHBYKPGN MKHHIL, MOHANO MOUMCUL IYKZYWMSE MKAY. PM CUL USS LH LMKUGNY, LH AGSPRY COUM OY OUX OHIYX."COH UKY MOYE? COE UKY MOYE OYKY? COUM XH MOYE CUGM? UGX COYG CPSS USSMOPL YGX?" MOHANOM KHLMHB, SHHRPGN UM MOY WOUGNPGN LOUXHCL VYZHKYOPT. MOY IUPG PG OPL UKT VYWUTY THKY UGX THKY PGMYGLY. PKKYLPLMPVSYXKHCLPGYLL HBYKIHCYKYX OPT, KYX KPGNL XUGWYX VYZHKY OPL YEYL, UGX MOYPTIKYLLPHG HZ MOHLY BHPWYL UGX ZUWYL UGX U LYGLY HZ SHGYSPGYLL TYKNYXCPMO MOY IOELPWUS IUPG. PM CUL MOYE, MOYLY LHSXPYKL--CHAGXYX UGXAGCHAGXYX--PM CUL MOYE COH CYKY WKALOPGN, CYPNOPGN XHCG, UGX MCPLMPGNMOY LPGYCL UGX LWHKWOPGN MOY ZSYLO HZ OPL LIKUPGYX UKT UGX LOHASXYK. MHKPX OPTLYSZ HZ MOYT OY WSHLYX OPL YEYL.ZHK U THTYGM OY XHFYX, VAM PG MOUM LOHKM PGMYKBUS PGGATYKUVSY MOPGNLUIIYUKYX MH OPT PG U XKYUT: OPL THMOYK UGX OYK SUKNY COPMY OUGX, LHGEU'LMOPG SPMMSY LOHASXYKL, GUMULOU'L YEYL UGX SUANOMYK, XYGPLHB CPMO OPLBHPWY UGX TALMUWOY, UGX MYSEUGPG UGX USS MOUM UZZUPK CPMO MYSEUGPG UGXVHNXUGPWO. MOUM UZZUPK CUL MOY LUTY MOPGN UL MOPL LHSXPYK CPMO MOY OUKLOBHPWY, UGX PM CUL MOUM UZZUPK UGX MOPL LHSXPYK MOUM CYKY LH UNHGPFPGNSE,PGWYLLUGMSE IASSPGN UGX IKYLLPGN OPL UKT UGX USCUEL XKUNNPGN PM PG HGYXPKYWMPHG. OY MKPYX MH NYM UCUE ZKHT MOYT, VAM MOYE CHASX GHM ZHK UGPGLMUGM SYM OPL LOHASXYK THBY U OUPK'L VKYUXMO. PM CHASX GHM UWOY--PMCHASX VY CYSS--PZ HGSE MOYE XPX GHM IASS PM, VAM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MHNYM KPX HZ MOYT.OY HIYGYX OPL YEYL UGX SHHRYX AI. MOY VSUWR WUGHIE HZ GPNOM OAGN SYLLMOUG U EUKX UVHBY MOY NSHC HZ MOY WOUKWHUS. ZSURYL HZ ZUSSPGN LGHC CYKYZSAMMYKPGN PG MOUM SPNOM. MALOPG OUX GHM KYMAKGYX, MOY XHWMHK OUX GHMWHTY. OY CUL USHGY GHC, YDWYIM ZHK U LHSXPYK COH CUL LPMMPGN GURYX UMMOY HMOYK LPXY HZ MOY ZPKY, CUKTPGN OPL MOPG EYSSHC VHXE."GHVHXE CUGML TY!" MOHANOM KHLMHB. "MOYKY PL GH HGY MH OYSI TY HK IPMETY. EYM P CUL HGWY UM OHTY, LMKHGN, OUIIE, UGX SHBYX." OY LPNOYX UGX,XHPGN LH, NKHUGYX PGBHSAGMUKPSE."YO, PL UGEMOPGN OAKMPGN EHA?" ULRYX MOY LHSXPYK, LOURPGN OPL LOPKM HAMHBYK MOY ZPKY, UGX GHM CUPMPGN ZHK UG UGLCYK OY NUBY U NKAGM UGX UXXYX:"COUM U SHM HZ TYG OUBY VYYG WKPIISYX MHXUE--ZKPNOMZAS!"KHLMHB XPX GHM SPLMYG MH MOY LHSXPYK. OY SHHRYX UM MOY LGHCZSURYLZSAMMYKPGN UVHBY MOY ZPKY UGX KYTYTVYKYX U KALLPUG CPGMYK UM OPL CUKT,VKPNOM OHTY, OPL ZSAZZE ZAK WHUM, OPL JAPWRSE NSPXPGN LSYPNO, OPLOYUSMOE VHXE, UGX USS MOY UZZYWMPHG UGX WUKY HZ OPL ZUTPSE. "UGX COE XPXP WHTY OYKY?" OY CHGXYKYX.GYDM XUE MOY ZKYGWO UKTE XPX GHM KYGYC MOYPK UMMUWR, UGX MOY KYTGUGM HZVUNKUMPHG'L XYMUWOTYGM CUL KYAGPMYX MH RAMAFHB'L UKTE.VHHR MOKYY: 1805WOUIMYK PIKPGWY BULPSP CUL GHM U TUG COH XYSPVYKUMYSE MOHANOM HAM OPL ISUGL.LMPSS SYLL XPX OY MOPGR HZ PGQAKPGN UGEHGY ZHK OPL HCG UXBUGMUNY. OYCUL TYKYSE U TUG HZ MOY CHKSX COH OUX NHM HG UGX MH COHT NYMMPGN HG OUXVYWHTY U OUVPM. LWOYTYL UGX XYBPWYL ZHK COPWO OY GYBYK KPNOMSE UWWHAGMYXMH OPTLYSZ, VAM COPWO ZHKTYX MOY COHSY PGMYKYLM HZ OPL SPZY,CYKY WHGLMUGMSE LOUIPGN MOYTLYSBYL PG OPL TPGX, UKPLPGN ZKHT MOYWPKWATLMUGWYL UGX IYKLHGL OY TYM. HZ MOYLY ISUGL OY OUX GHM TYKYSE HGYHK MCH PG OPL OYUX VAM XHFYGL, LHTY HGSE VYNPGGPGN MH ZHKT MOYTLYSBYL,LHTY UIIKHUWOPGN UWOPYBYTYGM, UGX LHTY PG WHAKLY HZ XPLPGMYNKUMPHG. OYXPX GHM, ZHK PGLMUGWY, LUE MH OPTLYSZ: "MOPL TUG GHC OUL PGZSAYGWY, PTALM NUPG OPL WHGZPXYGWY UGX ZKPYGXLOPI UGX MOKHANO OPT HVMUPG U LIYWPUSNKUGM." GHK XPX OY LUE MH OPTLYSZ: "IPYKKY PL U KPWO TUG, P TALM YGMPWYOPT MH TUKKE TE XUANOMYK UGX SYGX TY MOY ZHKME MOHALUGX KAVSYL P GYYX."VAM COYG OY WUTY UWKHLL U TUG HZ IHLPMPHG OPL PGLMPGWM PTTYXPUMYSE MHSXOPT MOUM MOPL TUG WHASX VY ALYZAS, UGX CPMOHAM UGE IKYTYXPMUMPHG IKPGWYBULPSP MHHR MOY ZPKLM HIIHKMAGPME MH NUPG OPL WHGZPXYGWY, ZSUMMYK OPT,VYWHTY PGMPTUMY CPMO OPT, UGX ZPGUSSE TURY OPL KYJAYLM.OY OUX IPYKKY UM OUGX PG THLWHC UGX IKHWAKYX ZHK OPT UG UIIHPGMTYGM ULNYGMSYTUG HZ MOY VYXWOUTVYK, COPWO UM MOUM MPTY WHGZYKKYX MOY LMUMAL HZWHAGWPSHK HZ LMUMY, UGX PGLPLMYX HG MOY EHAGN TUG UWWHTIUGEPGN OPT MHIYMYKLVAKN UGX LMUEPGN UM OPL OHALY. CPMO UIIUKYGM UVLYGM-TPGXYXGYLL,EYM CPMO AGOYLPMUMPGN ULLAKUGWY MOUM OY CUL XHPGN MOY KPNOM MOPGN,IKPGWY BULPSP XPX YBYKEMOPGN MH NYM IPYKKY MH TUKKE OPL XUANOMYK. OUX OYMOHANOM HAM OPL ISUGL VYZHKYOUGX OY WHASX GHM OUBY VYYG LH GUMAKUS UGXLOHCG LAWO AGUZZYWMYX ZUTPSPUKPME PG PGMYKWHAKLY CPMO YBYKEVHXE VHMOUVHBY UGX VYSHC OPT PG LHWPUS LMUGXPGN. LHTYMOPGN USCUEL XKYC OPT MHCUKXMOHLY KPWOYK UGX THKY IHCYKZAS MOUG OPTLYSZ UGX OY OUX KUKY LRPSS PGLYPFPGN MOY THLM HIIHKMAGY THTYGM ZHK TURPGN ALY HZ IYHISY.IPYKKY, HG AGYDIYWMYXSE VYWHTPGN WHAGM VYFAROHB UGX U KPWO TUG, ZYSMOPTLYSZ UZMYK OPL KYWYGM SHGYSPGYLL UGX ZKYYXHT ZKHT WUKYL LH VYLYM UGXIKYHWWAIPYX MOUM HGSE PG VYX CUL OY UVSY MH VY VE OPTLYSZ. OY OUX MHLPNG IUIYKL, MH IKYLYGM OPTLYSZ UM NHBYKGTYGM HZZPWYL, MOY IAKIHLY HZCOPWO CUL GHM WSYUK MH OPT, MH JAYLMPHG OPL WOPYZ LMYCUKX, MH BPLPM OPLYLMUMY GYUK THLWHC, UGX MH KYWYPBY TUGE IYHISY COH ZHKTYKSE XPX GHMYBYG CPLO MH RGHC HZ OPL YDPLMYGWY VAM CHASX GHC OUBY VYYG HZZYGXYXUGX NKPYBYX OUX OY WOHLYG GHM MH LYY MOYT. MOYLY XPZZYKYGMIYHISY--VALPGYLLTYG, KYSUMPHGL, UGX UWJAUPGMUGWYL USPRY--CYKY USSXPLIHLYX MH MKYUM MOY EHAGN OYPK PG MOY THLM ZKPYGXSE UGX ZSUMMYKPGNTUGGYK: MOYE CYKY USS YBPXYGMSE ZPKTSE WHGBPGWYX HZ IPYKKY'L GHVSYJAUSPMPYL. OY CUL USCUEL OYUKPGN LAWO CHKXL UL: "CPMO EHAK KYTUKRUVSYRPGXGYLL," HK, "CPMO EHAK YDWYSSYGM OYUKM," "EHA UKY EHAKLYSZ LHOHGHKUVSY WHAGM," HK, "CYKY OY UL WSYBYK UL EHA," UGX LH HG, MPSSOY VYNUG LPGWYKYSE MH VYSPYBY PG OPL HCG YDWYIMPHGUS RPGXGYLL UGXYDMKUHKXPGUKE PGMYSSPNYGWY, MOY THKY LH UL PG MOY XYIMO HZ OPL OYUKM PMOUX USCUEL LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY KYUSSE CUL BYKE RPGX UGX PGMYSSPNYGM.YBYG IYHISY COH OUX ZHKTYKSE VYYG LIPMYZAS MHCUKX OPT UGX YBPXYGMSEAGZKPYGXSE GHC VYWUTY NYGMSY UGX UZZYWMPHGUMY. MOY UGNKE YSXYLMIKPGWYLL, CPMO MOY SHGN CUPLM UGX OUPK ISULMYKYX XHCG SPRY U XHSS'L,OUX WHTY PGMH IPYKKY'L KHHT UZMYK MOY ZAGYKUS. CPMO XKHHIPGN YEYLUGX ZKYJAYGM VSALOYL LOY MHSX OPT LOY CUL BYKE LHKKE UVHAM MOYPK IULMTPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL UGX XPX GHM GHC ZYYS LOY OUX U KPNOM MH ULR OPT ZHKUGEMOPGN, YDWYIM HGSE ZHK IYKTPLLPHG, UZMYK MOY VSHC LOY OUX KYWYPBYX,MH KYTUPG ZHK U ZYC CYYRL SHGNYK PG MOY OHALY LOY LH SHBYX UGX COYKYLOY OUX LUWKPZPWYX LH TAWO. LOY WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT CYYIPGN UM MOYLYCHKXL. MHAWOYX MOUM MOPL LMUMAYLJAY IKPGWYLL WHASX LH WOUGNY, IPYKKYMHHR OYK OUGX UGX VYNNYX OYK ZHKNPBYGYLL, CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COUM ZHK.ZKHT MOUM XUE MOY YSXYLM IKPGWYLL JAPMY WOUGNYX MHCUKX IPYKKY UGX VYNUGRGPMMPGN U LMKPIYX LWUKZ ZHK OPT."XH MOPL ZHK TE LURY, THG WOYK; UZMYK USS, LOY OUX MH IAM AI CPMO UNKYUM XYUS ZKHT MOY XYWYULYX," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP MH OPT, OUGXPGN OPT UXYYX MH LPNG ZHK MOY IKPGWYLL' VYGYZPM.IKPGWY BULPSP OUX WHTY MH MOY WHGWSALPHG MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH MOKHCMOPL VHGY--U VPSS ZHK MOPKME MOHALUGX KAVSYL--MH MOY IHHK IKPGWYLL MOUMPM TPNOM GHM HWWAK MH OYK MH LIYUR HZ OPL LOUKY PG MOY UZZUPK HZ MOYPGSUPX IHKMZHSPH. IPYKKY LPNGYX MOY XYYX UGX UZMYK MOUM MOY IKPGWYLLNKYC LMPSS RPGXYK. MOY EHAGNYK LPLMYKL USLH VYWUTY UZZYWMPHGUMY MH OPT,YLIYWPUSSE MOY EHAGNYLM, MOY IKYMME HGY CPMO MOY THSY, COH HZMYG TUXYOPT ZYYS WHGZALYX VE OYK LTPSYL UGX OYK HCG WHGZALPHG COYG TYYMPGN OPT.PM LYYTYX LH GUMAKUS MH IPYKKY MOUM YBYKEHGY LOHASX SPRY OPT, UGX PMCHASX OUBY LYYTYX LH AGGUMAKUS OUX UGEHGY XPLSPRYX OPT, MOUM OY WHASXGHM VAM VYSPYBY PG MOY LPGWYKPME HZ MOHLY UKHAGX OPT. VYLPXYL, OY OUXGH MPTY MH ULR OPTLYSZ COYMOYK MOYLY IYHISY CYKY LPGWYKY HK GHM. OYCUL USCUEL VALE UGX USCUEL ZYSM PG U LMUMY HZ TPSX UGX WOYYKZASPGMHDPWUMPHG. OY ZYSM UL MOHANO OY CYKY MOY WYGMYK HZ LHTY PTIHKMUGM UGXNYGYKUS THBYTYGM; MOUM LHTYMOPGN CUL WHGLMUGMSE YDIYWMYX HZ OPT, MOUM PZOY XPX GHM XH PM OY CHASX NKPYBY UGX XPLUIIHPGM TUGE IYHISY, VAM PZ OYXPX MOPL UGX MOUM, USS CHASX VY CYSS; UGX OY XPX COUM CUL XYTUGXYX HZOPT, VAM LMPSS MOUM OUIIE KYLASM USCUEL KYTUPGYX PG MOY ZAMAKY.THKY MOUG UGEHGY YSLY, IKPGWY BULPSP MHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZ IPYKKY'L UZZUPKLUGX HZ IPYKKY OPTLYSZ PG MOHLY YUKSE XUEL. ZKHT MOY XYUMO HZ WHAGMVYFAROHB OY XPX GHM SYM NH OPL OHSX HZ MOY SUX. OY OUX MOY UPK HZ UTUG HIIKYLLYX VE VALPGYLL, CYUKE UGX LAZZYKPGN, COH EYM CHASX GHM, ZHKIPME'L LURY, SYUBY MOPL OYSISYLL EHAMO COH, UZMYK USS, CUL MOY LHG HZOPL HSX ZKPYGX UGX MOY IHLLYLLHK HZ LAWO YGHKTHAL CYUSMO, MH MOY WUIKPWYHZ ZUMY UGX MOY XYLPNGL HZ KHNAYL. XAKPGN MOY ZYC XUEL OY LIYGM PGTHLWHC UZMYK MOY XYUMO HZ WHAGM VYFAROHB, OY CHASX WUSS IPYKKY, HK NH MHOPT OPTLYSZ, UGX MYSS OPT COUM HANOM MH VY XHGY PG U MHGY HZ CYUKPGYLLUGX ULLAKUGWY, UL PZ OY CYKY UXXPGN YBYKE MPTY: "EHA RGHC P UTHBYKCOYSTYX CPMO VALPGYLL UGX PM PL IAKYSE HAM HZ WOUKPME MOUM P MKHAVSYTELYSZ UVHAM EHA, UGX EHA USLH RGHC JAPMY CYSS MOUM COUM P IKHIHLY PLMOY HGSE MOPGN IHLLPVSY.""CYSS, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, MHTHKKHC CY UKY HZZ UM SULM," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSPHGY XUE, WSHLPGN OPL YEYL UGX ZPGNYKPGN IPYKKY'L YSVHC, LIYURPGN UL PZOY CYKY LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN COPWO OUX SHGN LPGWY VYYG UNKYYX AIHG UGX WHASXGHM GHC VY USMYKYX. "CY LMUKM MHTHKKHC UGX P'T NPBPGN EHA U ISUWY PGTE WUKKPUNY. P UT BYKE NSUX. USS HAK PTIHKMUGM VALPGYLL OYKY PL GHCLYMMSYX, UGX P HANOM MH OUBY VYYG HZZ SHGN UNH. OYKY PL LHTYMOPGN P OUBYKYWYPBYX ZKHT MOY WOUGWYSSHK. P ULRYX OPT ZHK EHA, UGX EHA OUBY VYYGYGMYKYX PG MOY XPISHTUMPW WHKIL UGX TUXY U NYGMSYTUG HZ MOY VYXWOUTVYK.MOY XPISHTUMPW WUKYYK GHC SPYL HIYG VYZHKY EHA."GHMCPMOLMUGXPGN MOY MHGY HZ CYUKPYX ULLAKUGWY CPMO COPWO MOYLY CHKXLCYKY IKHGHAGWYX, IPYKKY, COH OUX LH SHGN VYYG WHGLPXYKPGN OPL WUKYYK,CPLOYX MH TURY LHTY LANNYLMPHG. VAM IKPGWY BULPSP PGMYKKAIMYX OPT PG MOYLIYWPUS XYYI WHHPGN MHGY, IKYWSAXPGN MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ PGMYKKAIMPGNOPL LIYYWO, COPWO OY ALYX PG YDMKYTY WULYL COYG LIYWPUS IYKLAULPHG CULGYYXYX."TUPL, THG WOYK, P XPX MOPL ZHK TE HCG LURY, MH LUMPLZE TE WHGLWPYGWY,UGX MOYKY PL GHMOPGN MH MOUGR TY ZHK. GH HGY OUL YBYK WHTISUPGYX EYM HZVYPGN MHH TAWO SHBYX; UGX VYLPXYL, EHA UKY ZKYY, EHA WHASX MOKHC PMAI MHTHKKHC. VAM EHA CPSS LYY YBYKEMOPGN ZHK EHAKLYSZ COYG EHA NYM MHIYMYKLVAKN. PM PL OPNO MPTY ZHK EHA MH NYM UCUE ZKHT MOYLY MYKKPVSYKYWHSSYWMPHGL." IKPGWY BULPSP LPNOYX. "EYL, EYL, TE VHE. UGX TE BUSYMWUG NH PG EHAK WUKKPUNY. UO! P CUL GYUKSE ZHKNYMMPGN," OY UXXYX. "EHARGHC, THG WOYK, EHAK ZUMOYK UGX P OUX LHTY UWWHAGML MH LYMMSY, LH P OUBYKYWYPBYX COUM CUL XAY ZKHT MOY KEUFUG YLMUMY UGX CPSS RYYI PM; EHA CHG'MKYJAPKY PM. CY'SS NH PGMH MOY UWWHAGML SUMYK."VE "COUM CUL XAY ZKHT MOY KEUFUG YLMUMY" IKPGWY BULPSP TYUGM LYBYKUSMOHALUGX KAVSYL JAPMKYGM KYWYPBYX ZKHT IPYKKY'L IYULUGML, COPWO MOYIKPGWY OUX KYMUPGYX ZHK OPTLYSZ.PG IYMYKLVAKN, UL PG THLWHC, IPYKKY ZHAGX MOY LUTY UMTHLIOYKY HZNYGMSYGYLL UGX UZZYWMPHG. OY WHASX GHM KYZALY MOY IHLM, HK KUMOYK MOYKUGR (ZHK OY XPX GHMOPGN), MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP OUX IKHWAKYX ZHK OPT,UGX UWJAUPGMUGWYL, PGBPMUMPHGL, UGX LHWPUS HWWAIUMPHGL CYKY LH GATYKHALMOUM, YBYG THKY MOUG PG THLWHC, OY ZYSM U LYGLY HZ VYCPSXYKTYGM, VALMSY,UGX WHGMPGAUS YDIYWMUMPHG HZ LHTY NHHX, USCUEL PG ZKHGM HZ OPT VAM GYBYKUMMUPGYX.HZ OPL ZHKTYK VUWOYSHK UWJAUPGMUGWYL TUGE CYKY GH SHGNYK PG IYMYKLVAKN.MOY NAUKXL OUX NHGY MH MOY ZKHGM; XHSHROHB OUX VYYG KYXAWYX MH MOYKUGRL; UGUMHSY CUL PG MOY UKTE LHTYCOYKY PG MOY IKHBPGWYL; IKPGWY UGXKYCCUL UVKHUX; LH IPYKKY OUX GHM MOY HIIHKMAGPME MH LIYGX OPL GPNOML UL OYALYX MH SPRY MH LIYGX MOYT, HK MH HIYG OPL TPGX VE PGMPTUMY MUSRL CPMOU ZKPYGX HSXYK MOUG OPTLYSZ UGX COHT OY KYLIYWMYX. OPL COHSY MPTY CULMURYG AI CPMO XPGGYKL UGX VUSSL UGX CUL LIYGM WOPYZSE UM IKPGWY BULPSP'LOHALY PG MOY WHTIUGE HZ MOY LMHAM IKPGWYLL, OPL CPZY, UGX OPL VYUAMPZASXUANOMYK OYSYGY.SPRY MOY HMOYKL, UGGU IUBSHBGU LWOYKYK LOHCYX IPYKKY MOY WOUGNY HZUMMPMAXY MHCUKX OPT MOUM OUX MURYG ISUWY PG LHWPYME.ZHKTYKSE PG UGGU IUBSHBGU'L IKYLYGWY, IPYKKY OUX USCUEL ZYSM MOUM COUMOY CUL LUEPGN CUL HAM HZ ISUWY, MUWMSYLL UGX AGLAPMUVSY, MOUM KYTUKRLCOPWO LYYTYX MH OPT WSYBYK COPSY MOYE ZHKTYX PG OPL TPGX VYWUTY ZHHSPLOUL LHHG UL OY AMMYKYX MOYT, COPSY HG MOY WHGMKUKE OPIIHSEMY'L LMAIPXYLMKYTUKRL WUTY HAM WSYBYK UGX UIM. GHC YBYKEMOPGN IPYKKY LUPX CULWOUKTUGM. YBYG PZ UGGU IUBSHBGU XPX GHM LUE LH, OY WHASX LYY MOUM LOYCPLOYX MH UGX HGSE KYZKUPGYX HAM HZ KYNUKX ZHK OPL THXYLME.PG MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY CPGMYK HZ 1805-6 IPYKKY KYWYPBYX HGY HZ UGGUIUBSHBGU'L ALAUS IPGR GHMYL CPMO UG PGBPMUMPHG MH COPWO CUL UXXYX: "EHACPSS ZPGX MOY VYUAMPZAS OYSYGY OYKY, COHT PM PL USCUEL XYSPNOMZAS MHLYY."COYG OY KYUX MOUM LYGMYGWY, IPYKKY ZYSM ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOUM LHTYSPGR COPWO HMOYK IYHISY KYWHNGPFYX OUX NKHCG AI VYMCYYG OPTLYSZ UGXOYSYGY, UGX MOUM MOHANOM VHMO USUKTYX OPT, UL PZ LHTY HVSPNUMPHG CYKYVYPGN PTIHLYX HG OPT COPWO OY WHASX GHM ZASZPSS, UGX ISYULYX OPT UL UGYGMYKMUPGPGN LAIIHLPMPHG.UGGU IUBSHBGU'L "UM OHTY" CUL SPRY MOY ZHKTYK HGY, HGSE MOY GHBYSME LOYHZZYKYX OYK NAYLML MOPL MPTY CUL GHM THKMYTUKM, VAM U XPISHTUMPLM ZKYLOZKHT VYKSPG CPMO MOY BYKE SUMYLM XYMUPSL HZ MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK'LBPLPM MH IHMLXUT, UGX HZ OHC MOY MCH UANALM ZKPYGXL OUX ISYXNYXMOYTLYSBYL PG UG PGXPLLHSAVSY USSPUGWY MH AIOHSX MOY WUALY HZ QALMPWYUNUPGLM MOY YGYTE HZ MOY OATUG KUWY. UGGU IUBSHBGU KYWYPBYX IPYKKY CPMOU LOUXY HZ TYSUGWOHSE, YBPXYGMSE KYSUMPGN MH MOY EHAGN TUG'L KYWYGM SHLLVE MOY XYUMO HZ WHAGM VYFAROHB (YBYKEHGY WHGLMUGMSE WHGLPXYKYX PM UXAME MH ULLAKY IPYKKY MOUM OY CUL NKYUMSE UZZSPWMYX VE MOY XYUMO HZ MOYZUMOYK OY OUX OUKXSE RGHCG), UGX OYK TYSUGWOHSE CUL QALM SPRY MOY UANALMTYSUGWOHSE LOY LOHCYX UM MOY TYGMPHG HZ OYK THLM UANALM TUQYLME MOYYTIKYLL TUKEU ZYXHKHBGU. IPYKKY ZYSM ZSUMMYKYX VE MOPL. UGGU IUBSHBGUUKKUGNYX MOY XPZZYKYGM NKHAIL PG OYK XKUCPGN KHHT CPMO OYK OUVPMAUSLRPSS. MOY SUKNY NKHAI, PG COPWO CYKY IKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOY NYGYKUSL,OUX MOY VYGYZPM HZ MOY XPISHTUM. UGHMOYK NKHAI CUL UM MOY MYU MUVSY.IPYKKY CPLOYX MH QHPG MOY ZHKTYK, VAM UGGU IUBSHBGU--COH CUL PG MOYYDWPMYX WHGXPMPHG HZ U WHTTUGXYK HG U VUMMSYZPYSX MH COHT MOHALUGXLHZ GYC UGX VKPSSPUGM PXYUL HWWAK COPWO MOYKY PL OUKXSE MPTY MH IAM PGUWMPHG--LYYPGN IPYKKY, MHAWOYX OPL LSYYBY CPMO OYK ZPGNYK, LUEPGN:"CUPM U VPM, P OUBY LHTYMOPGN PG BPYC ZHK EHA MOPL YBYGPGN." (LOYNSUGWYX UM OYSYGY UGX LTPSYX UM OYK.) "TE XYUK OYSYGY, VY WOUKPMUVSY MHTE IHHK UAGM COH UXHKYL EHA. NH UGX RYYI OYK WHTIUGE ZHK MYG TPGAMYL.UGX MOUM PM CPSS GHM VY MHH XASS, OYKY PL MOY XYUK WHAGM COH CPSS GHMKYZALY MH UWWHTIUGE EHA."MOY VYUAME CYGM MH MOY UAGM, VAM UGGU IUBSHBGU XYMUPGYX IPYKKY, SHHRPGNUL PZ LOY OUX MH NPBY LHTY ZPGUS GYWYLLUKE PGLMKAWMPHGL."PLG'M LOY YDJAPLPMY?" LOY LUPX MH IPYKKY, IHPGMPGN MH MOY LMUMYSEVYUAME UL LOY NSPXYX UCUE. "UGX OHC LOY WUKKPYL OYKLYSZ! ZHK LH EHAGN UNPKS, LAWO MUWM, LAWO TULMYKSE IYKZYWMPHG HZ TUGGYK! PM WHTYL ZKHT OYKOYUKM. OUIIE MOY TUG COH CPGL OYK! CPMO OYK MOY SYULM CHKSXSE HZ TYGCHASX HWWAIE U THLM VKPSSPUGM IHLPMPHG PG LHWPYME. XHG'M EHA MOPGR LH? PHGSE CUGMYX MH RGHC EHAK HIPGPHG," UGX UGGU IUBSHBGU SYM IPYKKY NH.IPYKKY, PG KYISE, LPGWYKYSE UNKYYX CPMO OYK UL MH OYSYGY'L IYKZYWMPHG HZTUGGYK. PZ OY YBYK MOHANOM HZ OYSYGY, PM CUL QALM HZ OYK VYUAME UGX OYKKYTUKRUVSY LRPSS PG UIIYUKPGN LPSYGMSE XPNGPZPYX PG LHWPYME.MOY HSX UAGM KYWYPBYX MOY MCH EHAGN IYHISY PG OYK WHKGYK, VAM LYYTYXXYLPKHAL HZ OPXPGN OYK UXHKUMPHG ZHK OYSYGY UGX PGWSPGYX KUMOYK MH LOHCOYK ZYUK HZ UGGU IUBSHBGU. LOY SHHRYX UM OYK GPYWY, UL PZ PGJAPKPGN COUMLOY CUL MH XH CPMO MOYLY IYHISY. HG SYUBPGN MOYT, UGGU IUBSHBGU UNUPGMHAWOYX IPYKKY'L LSYYBY, LUEPGN: "P OHIY EHA CHG'M LUE MOUM PM PL XASSPG TE OHALY UNUPG," UGX LOY NSUGWYX UM OYSYGY.OYSYGY LTPSYX, CPMO U SHHR PTISEPGN MOUM LOY XPX GHM UXTPM MOYIHLLPVPSPME HZ UGEHGY LYYPGN OYK CPMOHAM VYPGN YGWOUGMYX. MOY UAGMWHANOYX, LCUSSHCYX, UGX LUPX PG ZKYGWO MOUM LOY CUL BYKE ISYULYX MH LYYOYSYGY, MOYG LOY MAKGYX MH IPYKKY CPMO MOY LUTY CHKXL HZ CYSWHTY UGXMOY LUTY SHHR. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ U XASS UGX OUSMPGN WHGBYKLUMPHG, OYSYGYMAKGYX MH IPYKKY CPMO MOY VYUAMPZAS VKPNOM LTPSY MOUM LOY NUBY MHYBYKEHGY. IPYKKY CUL LH ALYX MH MOUM LTPSY, UGX PM OUX LH SPMMSY TYUGPGNZHK OPT, MOUM OY IUPX GH UMMYGMPHG MH PM. MOY UAGM CUL QALM LIYURPGN HZU WHSSYWMPHG HZ LGAZZVHDYL MOUM OUX VYSHGNYX MH IPYKKY'L ZUMOYK, WHAGMVYFAROHB, UGX LOHCYX MOYT OYK HCG VHD. IKPGWYLL OYSYGY ULRYX MH LYY MOYIHKMKUPM HZ MOY UAGM'L OALVUGX HG MOY VHD SPX."MOUM PL IKHVUVSE MOY CHKR HZ BPGYLLY," LUPX IPYKKY, TYGMPHGPGN UWYSYVKUMYX TPGPUMAKPLM, UGX OY SYUGYX HBYK MOY MUVSY MH MURY MOYLGAZZVHD COPSY MKEPGN MH OYUK COUM CUL VYPGN LUPX UM MOY HMOYK MUVSY.OY OUSZ KHLY, TYUGPGN MH NH KHAGX, VAM MOY UAGM OUGXYX OPT MOY LGAZZVHD,IULLPGN PM UWKHLL OYSYGY'L VUWR. OYSYGY LMHHIYX ZHKCUKX MH TURY KHHT,UGX SHHRYX KHAGX CPMO U LTPSY. LOY CUL, UL USCUEL UM YBYGPGN IUKMPYL,CYUKPGN U XKYLL LAWO UL CUL MOYG ZULOPHGUVSY, WAM BYKE SHC UM ZKHGM UGXVUWR. OYK VALM, COPWO OUX USCUEL LYYTYX SPRY TUKVSY MH IPYKKY, CULLH WSHLY MH OPT MOUM OPL LOHKMLPNOMYX YEYL WHASX GHM VAM IYKWYPBY MOYSPBPGN WOUKT HZ OYK GYWR UGX LOHASXYKL, LH GYUK MH OPL SPIL MOUM OY GYYXHGSE OUBY VYGM OPL OYUX U SPMMSY MH OUBY MHAWOYX MOYT. OY CUL WHGLWPHALHZ MOY CUKTMO HZ OYK VHXE, MOY LWYGM HZ IYKZATY, UGX MOY WKYURPGN HZ OYKWHKLYM UL LOY THBYX. OY XPX GHM LYY OYK TUKVSY VYUAME ZHKTPGN U WHTISYMYCOHSY CPMO OYK XKYLL, VAM USS MOY WOUKT HZ OYK VHXE HGSE WHBYKYX VE OYKNUKTYGML. UGX OUBPGN HGWY LYYG MOPL OY WHASX GHM OYSI VYPGN UCUKY HZ PM,QALM UL CY WUGGHM KYGYC UG PSSALPHG CY OUBY HGWY LYYG MOKHANO."LH EHA OUBY GYBYK GHMPWYX VYZHKY OHC VYUAMPZAS P UT?" OYSYGY LYYTYX MHLUE. "EHA OUX GHM GHMPWYX MOUM P UT U CHTUG? EYL, P UT U CHTUG COHTUE VYSHGN MH UGEHGY--MH EHA MHH," LUPX OYK NSUGWY. UGX UM MOUM THTYGMIPYKKY ZYSM MOUM OYSYGY GHM HGSE WHASX, VAM TALM, VY OPL CPZY, UGX MOUMPM WHASX GHM VY HMOYKCPLY.OY RGYC MOPL UM MOUM THTYGM UL LAKYSE UL PZ OY OUX VYYG LMUGXPGN UM MOYUSMUK CPMO OYK. OHC UGX COYG MOPL CHASX VY OY XPX GHM RGHC, OY XPX GHMYBYG RGHC PZ PM CHASX VY U NHHX MOPGN (OY YBYG ZYSM, OY RGYC GHM COE,MOUM PM CHASX VY U VUX MOPGN), VAM OY RGYC PM CHASX OUIIYG.IPYKKY XKHIIYX OPL YEYL, SPZMYX MOYT UNUPG, UGX CPLOYX HGWY THKY MH LYYOYK UL U XPLMUGM VYUAME ZUK KYTHBYX ZKHT OPT, UL OY OUX LYYG OYK YBYKEXUE AGMPS MOYG, VAM OY WHASX GH SHGNYK XH PM. OY WHASX GHM, UGE THKYMOUG U TUG COH OUL VYYG SHHRPGN UM U MAZM HZ LMYIIY NKULL MOKHANO MOYTPLM UGX MURPGN PM ZHK U MKYY WUG UNUPG MURY PM ZHK U MKYY UZMYK OY OULHGWY KYWHNGPFYX PM MH VY U MAZM HZ NKULL. LOY CUL MYKKPVSE WSHLY MH OPT.LOY USKYUXE OUX IHCYK HBYK OPT, UGX VYMCYYG MOYT MOYKY CUL GH SHGNYK UGEVUKKPYK YDWYIM MOY VUKKPYK HZ OPL HCG CPSS."CYSS, P CPSS SYUBY EHA PG EHAK SPMMSY WHKGYK," WUTY UGGU IUBSHBGU'LBHPWY, "P LYY EHA UKY USS KPNOM MOYKY."UGX IPYKKY, UGDPHALSE MKEPGN MH KYTYTVYK COYMOYK OY OUX XHGY UGEMOPGNKYIKYOYGLPVSY, SHHRYX KHAGX CPMO U VSALO. PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM YBYKEHGYRGYC COUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT UL OY RGYC PM OPTLYSZ.U SPMMSY SUMYK COYG OY CYGM AI MH MOY SUKNY WPKWSY, UGGU IUBSHBGU LUPXMH OPT: "P OYUK EHA UKY KYZPMMPGN EHAK IYMYKLVAKN OHALY?"MOPL CUL MKAY. MOY UKWOPMYWM OUX MHSX OPT MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE, UGXIPYKKY, CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE, CUL OUBPGN OPL YGHKTHAL IYMYKLVAKN OHALYXHGY AI."MOUM'L U NHHX MOPGN, VAM XHG'M THBY ZKHT IKPGWY BULPSP'L. PM PL NHHX MHOUBY U ZKPYGX SPRY MOY IKPGWY," LOY LUPX, LTPSPGN UM IKPGWY BULPSP. "PRGHC LHTYMOPGN UVHAM MOUM. XHG'M P? UGX EHA UKY LMPSS LH EHAGN. EHA GYYXUXBPWY. XHG'M VY UGNKE CPMO TY ZHK YDYKWPLPGN UG HSX CHTUG'L IKPBPSYNY."LOY IUALYX, UL CHTYG USCUEL XH, YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN UZMYK MOYE OUBYTYGMPHGYX MOYPK UNY. "PZ EHA TUKKE PM CPSS VY U XPZZYKYGM MOPGN," LOYWHGMPGAYX, AGPMPGN MOYT VHMO PG HGY NSUGWY. IPYKKY XPX GHM SHHR UMOYSYGY GHK LOY UM OPT. VAM LOY CUL QALM UL MYKKPVSE WSHLY MH OPT. OYTAMMYKYX LHTYMOPGN UGX WHSHKYX.COYG OY NHM OHTY OY WHASX GHM LSYYI ZHK U SHGN MPTY ZHK MOPGRPGN HZ COUMOUX OUIIYGYX. COUM OUX OUIIYGYX? GHMOPGN. OY OUX TYKYSE AGXYKLMHHX MOUMMOY CHTUG OY OUX RGHCG UL U WOPSX, HZ COHT COYG OYK VYUAME CULTYGMPHGYX OY OUX LUPX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE: "EYL, LOY'L NHHX SHHRPGN," OY OUXAGXYKLMHHX MOUM MOPL CHTUG TPNOM VYSHGN MH OPT."VAM LOY'L LMAIPX. P OUBY TELYSZ LUPX LOY PL LMAIPX," OY MOHANOM. "MOYKYPL LHTYMOPGN GULME, LHTYMOPGN CKHGN, PG MOY ZYYSPGN LOY YDWPMYL PG TY.P OUBY VYYG MHSX MOUM OYK VKHMOYK UGUMHSY CUL PG SHBY CPMO OYK UGX LOYCPMO OPT, MOUM MOYKY CUL JAPMY U LWUGXUS UGX MOUM MOUM'L COE OY CUL LYGMUCUE. OPIIHSEMY PL OYK VKHMOYK... IKPGWY BULPSP PL OYK ZUMOYK... PM'LVUX...." OY KYZSYWMYX, VAM COPSY OY CUL MOPGRPGN MOPL (MOY KYZSYWMPHGCUL LMPSS PGWHTISYMY), OY WUANOM OPTLYSZ LTPSPGN UGX CUL WHGLWPHALMOUM UGHMOYK SPGY HZ MOHANOM OUX LIKAGN AI, UGX COPSY MOPGRPGN HZ OYKCHKMOSYLLGYLL OY CUL USLH XKYUTPGN HZ OHC LOY CHASX VY OPL CPZY, OHC LOYCHASX SHBY OPT VYWHTY JAPMY XPZZYKYGM, UGX OHC USS OY OUX MOHANOM UGXOYUKX HZ OYK TPNOM VY ZUSLY. UGX OY UNUPG LUC OYK GHM UL MOY XUANOMYKHZ IKPGWY BULPSP, VAM BPLAUSPFYX OYK COHSY VHXE HGSE BYPSYX VE PML NKUEXKYLL. "VAM GH! COE XPX MOPL MOHANOM GYBYK HWWAK MH TY VYZHKY?" UGXUNUPG OY MHSX OPTLYSZ MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY, MOUM MOYKY CHASX VYLHTYMOPGN AGGUMAKUS, UGX UL PM LYYTYX MH OPT XPLOHGHKUVSY, PG MOPLTUKKPUNY. OY KYWUSSYX OYK ZHKTYK CHKXL UGX SHHRL UGX MOY CHKXL UGX SHHRLHZ MOHLY COH OUX LYYG MOYT MHNYMOYK. OY KYWUSSYX UGGU IUBSHBGU'L CHKXLUGX SHHRL COYG LOY LIHRY MH OPT UVHAM OPL OHALY, KYWUSSYX MOHALUGXL HZLAWO OPGML ZKHT IKPGWY BULPSP UGX HMOYKL, UGX CUL LYPFYX VE MYKKHK SYLMOY OUX USKYUXE, PG LHTY CUE, VHAGX OPTLYSZ MH XH LHTYMOPGN MOUM CULYBPXYGMSE CKHGN UGX MOUM OY HANOM GHM MH XH. VAM UM MOY BYKE MPTY OY CULYDIKYLLPGN MOPL WHGBPWMPHG MH OPTLYSZ, PG UGHMOYK IUKM HZ OPL TPGX OYKPTUNY KHLY PG USS PML CHTUGSE VYUAME.WOUIMYK PPPG GHBYTVYK, 1805, IKPGWY BULPSP OUX MH NH HG U MHAK HZ PGLIYWMPHG PGZHAK XPZZYKYGM IKHBPGWYL. OY OUX UKKUGNYX MOPL ZHK OPTLYSZ LH UL MHBPLPM OPL GYNSYWMYX YLMUMYL UM MOY LUTY MPTY UGX IPWR AI OPL LHG UGUMHSYCOYKY OPL KYNPTYGM CUL LMUMPHGYX, UGX MURY OPT MH BPLPM IKPGWY GPWOHSULVHSRHGLRP PG HKXYK MH UKKUGNY U TUMWO ZHK OPT CPMO MOY XUANOMYK HZ MOUMKPWO HSX TUG. VAM VYZHKY SYUBPGN OHTY UGX AGXYKMURPGN MOYLY GYC UZZUPKL,IKPGWY BULPSP OUX MH LYMMSY TUMMYKL CPMO IPYKKY, COH, PM PL MKAY, OUXSUMMYKSE LIYGM COHSY XUEL UM OHTY, MOUM PL, PG IKPGWY BULPSP'L OHALYCOYKY OY CUL LMUEPGN, UGX OUX VYYG UVLAKX, YDWPMYX, UGX ZHHSPLO PGOYSYGY'L IKYLYGWY (UL U SHBYK LOHASX VY), VAM OUX GHM EYM IKHIHLYX MHOYK."MOPL PL USS BYKE ZPGY, VAM MOPGNL TALM VY LYMMSYX," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSPMH OPTLYSZ, CPMO U LHKKHCZAS LPNO, HGY THKGPGN, ZYYSPGN MOUM IPYKKYCOH CUL AGXYK LAWO HVSPNUMPHGL MH OPT ("VAM GYBYK TPGX MOUM") CUL GHMVYOUBPGN BYKE CYSS PG MOPL TUMMYK. "EHAMO, ZKPBHSPME... CYSS, NHX VYCPMO OPT," MOHANOM OY, KYSPLOPGN OPL HCG NHHXGYLL HZ OYUKM, "VAM PM TALMVY VKHANOM MH U OYUX. MOY XUE UZMYK MHTHKKHC CPSS VY SYSEU'L GUTY XUE.P CPSS PGBPMY MCH HK MOKYY IYHISY, UGX PZ OY XHYL GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM OYHANOM MH XH MOYG PM CPSS VY TE UZZUPK--EYL, TE UZZUPK. P UT OYK ZUMOYK."LPD CYYRL UZMYK UGGU IUBSHBGU'L "UM OHTY" UGX UZMYK MOY LSYYISYLL GPNOMCOYG OY OUX XYWPXYX MOUM MH TUKKE OYSYGY CHASX VY U WUSUTPME UGX MOUM OYHANOM MH UBHPX OYK UGX NH UCUE, IPYKKY, XYLIPMY MOUM XYWPLPHG, OUX GHMSYZM IKPGWY BULPSP'L UGX ZYSM CPMO MYKKHK MOUM PG IYHISY'L YEYL OY CULYBYKE XUE THKY UGX THKY WHGGYWMYX CPMO OYK, MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY ZHKOPT MH KYMAKG MH OPL ZHKTYK WHGWYIMPHG HZ OYK, MOUM OY WHASX GHM VKYURUCUE ZKHT OYK, UGX MOUM MOHANO PM CHASX VY U MYKKPVSY MOPGN OY CHASXOUBY MH AGPMY OPL ZUMY CPMO OYKL. OY TPNOM IYKOUIL OUBY VYYG UVSYMH ZKYY OPTLYSZ VAM MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP (COH OUX KUKYSE VYZHKY NPBYGKYWYIMPHGL) GHC OUKXSE SYM U XUE NH VE CPMOHAM OUBPGN UG YBYGPGN IUKMEUM COPWO IPYKKY OUX MH VY IKYLYGM AGSYLL OY CPLOYX MH LIHPS MOY NYGYKUSISYULAKY UGX XPLUIIHPGM YBYKEHGY'L YDIYWMUMPHG. IKPGWY BULPSP, PG MOYKUKY THTYGML COYG OY CUL UM OHTY, CHASX MURY IPYKKY'L OUGX PG IULLPGNUGX XKUC PM XHCGCUKXL, HK UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE OHSX HAM OPL CKPGRSYX,WSYUG-LOUBYG WOYYR ZHK IPYKKY MH RPLL UGX CHASX LUE: "MPSS MHTHKKHC,"HK, "VY PG MH XPGGYK HK P LOUSS GHM LYY EHA," HK, "P UT LMUEPGN PG ZHKEHAK LURY," UGX LH HG. UGX MOHANO IKPGWY BULPSP, COYG OY LMUEYX PG (ULOY LUPX) ZHK IPYKKY'L LURY, OUKXSE YDWOUGNYX U WHAISY HZ CHKXL CPMO OPT,IPYKKY ZYSM AGUVSY MH XPLUIIHPGM OPT. YBYKE XUE OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ HGYUGX MOY LUTY MOPGN: "PM PL MPTY P AGXYKLMHHX OYK UGX TUXY AI TE TPGXCOUM LOY KYUSSE PL. CUL P TPLMURYG VYZHKY, HK UT P TPLMURYG GHC? GH, LOYPL GHM LMAIPX, LOY PL UG YDWYSSYGM NPKS," OY LHTYMPTYL LUPX MH OPTLYSZ"LOY GYBYK TURYL U TPLMURY, GYBYK LUEL UGEMOPGN LMAIPX. LOY LUEL SPMMSY,VAM COUM LOY XHYL LUE PL USCUEL WSYUK UGX LPTISY, LH LOY PL GHM LMAIPX.LOY GYBYK CUL UVULOYX UGX PL GHM UVULOYX GHC, LH LOY WUGGHM VY U VUXCHTUG!" OY OUX HZMYG VYNAG MH TURY KYZSYWMPHGL HK MOPGR USHAX PGOYK WHTIUGE, UGX LOY OUX USCUEL UGLCYKYX OPT YPMOYK VE U VKPYZ VAMUIIKHIKPUMY KYTUKR--LOHCPGN MOUM PM XPX GHM PGMYKYLM OYK--HK VE U LPSYGMSHHR UGX LTPSY COPWO THKY IUSIUVSE MOUG UGEMOPGN YSLY LOHCYX IPYKKY OYKLAIYKPHKPME. LOY CUL KPNOM PG KYNUKXPGN USS UKNATYGML UL GHGLYGLY PGWHTIUKPLHG CPMO MOUM LTPSY.LOY USCUEL UXXKYLLYX OPT CPMO U KUXPUGMSE WHGZPXPGN LTPSY TYUGM ZHK OPTUSHGY, PG COPWO MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN THKY LPNGPZPWUGM MOUG PG MOY NYGYKUSLTPSY MOUM ALAUSSE VKPNOMYGYX OYK ZUWY. IPYKKY RGYC MOUM YBYKEHGY CULCUPMPGN ZHK OPT MH LUE U CHKX UGX WKHLL U WYKMUPG SPGY, UGX OY RGYC MOUMLHHGYK HK SUMYK OY CHASX LMYI UWKHLL PM, VAM UG PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY MYKKHKLYPFYX OPT UM MOY MOHANOM HZ MOUM XKYUXZAS LMYI. U MOHALUGX MPTYL XAKPGNMOUM THGMO UGX U OUSZ COPSY OY ZYSM OPTLYSZ XKUCG GYUKYK UGX GYUKYK MHMOUM XKYUXZAS UVELL, IPYKKY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ: "COUM UT P XHPGN? P GYYXKYLHSAMPHG. WUG PM VY MOUM P OUBY GHGY?"OY CPLOYX MH MURY U XYWPLPHG, VAM ZYSM CPMO XPLTUE MOUM PG MOPL TUMMYKOY SUWRYX MOUM LMKYGNMO HZ CPSS COPWO OY OUX RGHCG PG OPTLYSZ UGX KYUSSEIHLLYLLYX. IPYKKY CUL HGY HZ MOHLY COH UKY HGSE LMKHGN COYG MOYE ZYYSMOYTLYSBYL JAPMY PGGHWYGM, UGX LPGWY MOUM XUE COYG OY CUL HBYKIHCYKYX VEU ZYYSPGN HZ XYLPKY COPSY LMHHIPGN HBYK MOY LGAZZVHD UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L,UG AGUWRGHCSYXNYX LYGLY HZ MOY NAPSM HZ MOUM XYLPKY IUKUSEFYX OPL CPSS.HG OYSYGY'L GUTY XUE, U LTUSS IUKME HZ QALM MOYPK HCG IYHISY--UL OPLCPZY LUPX--TYM ZHK LAIIYK UM IKPGWY BULPSP'L. USS MOYLY ZKPYGXL UGXKYSUMPHGL OUX VYYG NPBYG MH AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOY ZUMY HZ MOY EHAGN NPKSCHASX VY XYWPXYX MOUM YBYGPGN. MOY BPLPMHKL CYKY LYUMYX UM LAIIYK.IKPGWYLL RAKUNPGU, U IHKMSE PTIHLPGN CHTUG COH OUX HGWY VYYG OUGXLHTY,CUL LPMMPGN UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY MUVSY. HG YPMOYK LPXY HZ OYK LUM MOYTHKY PTIHKMUGM NAYLML--UG HSX NYGYKUS UGX OPL CPZY, UGX UGGU IUBSHBGULWOYKYK. UM MOY HMOYK YGX LUM MOY EHAGNYK UGX SYLL PTIHKMUGM NAYLML, UGXMOYKY MHH LUM MOY TYTVYKL HZ MOY ZUTPSE, UGX IPYKKY UGX OYSYGY, LPXY VELPXY. IKPGWY BULPSP CUL GHM OUBPGN UGE LAIIYK: OY CYGM KHAGX MOY MUVSYPG U TYKKE THHX, LPMMPGN XHCG GHC VE HGY, GHC VE UGHMOYK, HZ MOY NAYLML.MH YUWO HZ MOYT OY TUXY LHTY WUKYSYLL UGX UNKYYUVSY KYTUKR YDWYIM MHIPYKKY UGX OYSYGY, COHLY IKYLYGWY OY LYYTYX GHM MH GHMPWY. OY YGSPBYGYXMOY COHSY IUKME. MOY CUD WUGXSYL VAKGYX VKPNOMSE, MOY LPSBYK UGX WKELMUSNSYUTYX, LH XPX MOY SUXPYL' MHPSYML UGX MOY NHSX UGX LPSBYK HZ MOYTYG'L YIUASYML; LYKBUGML PG LWUKSYM SPBYKPYL THBYX KHAGX MOY MUVSY, MOYWSUMMYK HZ ISUMYL, RGPBYL, UGX NSULLYL TPGNSYX CPMO MOY UGPTUMYX OAT HZLYBYKUS WHGBYKLUMPHGL. UM HGY YGX HZ MOY MUVSY, MOY HSX WOUTVYKSUPG CULOYUKX ULLAKPGN UG HSX VUKHGYLL MOUM OY SHBYX OYK IULLPHGUMYSE, UM COPWOLOY SUANOYX; UM MOY HMOYK WHASX VY OYUKX MOY LMHKE HZ MOY TPLZHKMAGYL HZLHTY TUKE BPRMHKHBGU HK HMOYK. UM MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY MUVSY, IKPGWY BULPSPUMMKUWMYX YBYKEVHXE'L UMMYGMPHG. CPMO U ZUWYMPHAL LTPSY HG OPL ZUWY, OYCUL MYSSPGN MOY SUXPYL UVHAM SULM CYXGYLXUE'L TYYMPGN HZ MOY PTIYKPUSWHAGWPS, UM COPWO LYKNYE RAFTPWO BEUFTPMPGHB, MOY GYC TPSPMUKE NHBYKGHKNYGYKUS HZ IYMYKLVAKN, OUX KYWYPBYX UGX KYUX MOY MOYG ZUTHAL KYLWKPIMHZ MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK ZKHT MOY UKTE MH LYKNYE RAFTPWO, PG COPWO MOYYTIYKHK LUPX MOUM OY CUL KYWYPBPGN ZKHT USS LPXYL XYWSUKUMPHGL HZMOY IYHISY'L SHEUSME, MOUM MOY XYWSUKUMPHG ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN NUBY OPTIUKMPWASUK ISYULAKY, UGX MOUM OY CUL IKHAX MH VY UM MOY OYUX HZ LAWO UGUMPHG UGX CHASX YGXYUBHK MH VY CHKMOE HZ PM. MOPL KYLWKPIM VYNUG CPMOMOY CHKXL: "LYKNYE RAFTPWO, ZKHT USS LPXYL KYIHKML KYUWO TY," YMW."CYSS, UGX LH OY GYBYK NHM ZUKMOYK MOUG: 'LYKNYE RAFTPWO'?" ULRYX HGY HZMOY SUXPYL."YDUWMSE, GHM U OUPK'L VKYUXMO ZUKMOYK," UGLCYKYX IKPGWY BULPSP,SUANOPGN, "'LYKNYE RAFTPWO... ZKHT USS LPXYL... ZKHT USS LPXYL... LYKNYERAFTPWO...' IHHK BEUFTPMPGHB WHASX GHM NYM UGE ZUKMOYK! OY VYNUG MOYKYLWKPIM UNUPG UGX UNUPG, VAM UL LHHG UL OY AMMYKYX 'LYKNYE' OY LHVVYX,'RAF-TP-WO,' MYUKL, UGX 'ZKHT USS LPXYL' CUL LTHMOYKYX PG LHVL UGX OYWHASX NYM GH ZUKMOYK. UGX UNUPG OPL OUGXRYKWOPYZ, UGX UNUPG: 'LYKNYERAFTPWO, ZKHT USS LPXYL,'... UGX MYUKL, MPSS UM SULM LHTYVHXE YSLY CULULRYX MH KYUX PM.""RAFTPWO... ZKHT USS LPXYL... UGX MOYG MYUKL," LHTYHGY KYIYUMYXSUANOPGN."XHG'M VY AGRPGX," WKPYX UGGU IUBSHBGU ZKHT OYK YGX HZ MOY MUVSY OHSXPGNAI U MOKYUMYGPGN ZPGNYK. "OY PL LAWO U CHKMOE UGX YDWYSSYGM TUG, HAKXYUK BEUFTPMPGHB...."YBYKEVHXE SUANOYX U NKYUM XYUS. UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY MUVSY, COYKY MOYOHGHKYX NAYLML LUM, YBYKEHGY LYYTYX MH VY PG OPNO LIPKPML UGX AGXYK MOYPGZSAYGWY HZ U BUKPYME HZ YDWPMPGN LYGLUMPHGL. HGSE IPYKKY UGXOYSYGY LUM LPSYGMSE LPXY VE LPXY USTHLM UM MOY VHMMHT HZ MOY MUVSY, ULAIIKYLLYX LTPSY VKPNOMYGPGN VHMO MOYPK ZUWYL, U LTPSY MOUM OUX GHMOPGNMH XH CPMO LYKNYE RAFTPWO--U LTPSY HZ VULOZASGYLL UM MOYPK HCG ZYYSPGNL.VAM TAWO UL USS MOY KYLM SUANOYX, MUSRYX, UGX QHRYX, TAWO UL MOYEYGQHEYX MOYPK KOPGY CPGY, LUAMY, UGX PWYL, UGX OHCYBYK MOYE UBHPXYXSHHRPGN UM MOY EHAGN WHAISY, UGX OYYXSYLL UGX AGHVLYKBUGM UL MOYE LYYTYXHZ MOYT, HGY WHASX ZYYS VE MOY HWWULPHGUS NSUGWYL MOYE NUBY MOUM MOYLMHKE UVHAM LYKNYE RAFTPWO, MOY SUANOMYK, UGX MOY ZHHX CYKY USS UIKYMYGLY, UGX MOUM MOY COHSY UMMYGMPHG HZ MOUM WHTIUGE CUL XPKYWMYXMH--IPYKKY UGX OYSYGY. IKPGWY BULPSP TPTPWRYX MOY LHVVPGN HZ LYKNYERAFTPWO UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY OPL YEYL NSUGWYX MHCUKX OPL XUANOMYK, UGXCOPSY OY SUANOYX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY WSYUKSE LUPX: "EYL... PM'LNYMMPGN HG, PM CPSS USS VY LYMMSYX MHXUE." UGGU IUBSHBGU MOKYUMYGYXOPT HG VYOUSZ HZ "HAK XYUK BEUFTPMPGHB," UGX PG OYK YEYL, COPWO, ZHK UGPGLMUGM, NSUGWYX UM IPYKKY, IKPGWY BULPSP KYUX U WHGNKUMASUMPHG HG OPLZAMAKY LHG-PG-SUC UGX HG OPL XUANOMYK'L OUIIPGYLL. MOY HSX IKPGWYLLLPNOYX LUXSE UL LOY HZZYKYX LHTY CPGY MH MOY HSX SUXE GYDM MH OYK UGXNSUGWYX UGNKPSE UM OYK XUANOMYK, UGX OYK LPNO LYYTYX MH LUE: "EYL,MOYKY'L GHMOPGN SYZM ZHK EHA UGX TY VAM MH LPI LCYYM CPGY, TE XYUK,GHC MOUM MOY MPTY OUL WHTY ZHK MOYLY EHAGN HGYL MH VY MOAL VHSXSE,IKHBHWUMPBYSE OUIIE." "UGX COUM GHGLYGLY USS MOPL PL MOUM P UT LUEPGN!"MOHANOM U XPISHTUMPLM, NSUGWPGN UM MOY OUIIE ZUWYL HZ MOY SHBYKL."MOUM'L OUIIPGYLL!"PGMH MOY PGLPNGPZPWUGM, MKPZSPGN, UGX UKMPZPWPUS PGMYKYLML AGPMPGN MOUMLHWPYME OUX YGMYKYX MOY LPTISY ZYYSPGN HZ MOY UMMKUWMPHG HZ U OYUSMOEUGX OUGXLHTY EHAGN TUG UGX CHTUG ZHK HGY UGHMOYK. UGX MOPL OATUG ZYYSPGNXHTPGUMYX YBYKEMOPGN YSLY UGX LHUKYX UVHBY USS MOYPK UZZYWMYX WOUMMYK.QYLML ZYSS ZSUM, GYCL CUL GHM PGMYKYLMPGN, UGX MOY UGPTUMPHG CULYBPXYGMSE ZHKWYX. GHM HGSE MOY NAYLML VAM YBYG MOY ZHHMTYG CUPMPGN UMMUVSY LYYTYX MH ZYYS MOPL, UGX MOYE ZHKNHM MOYPK XAMPYL UL MOYE SHHRYXUM MOY VYUAMPZAS OYSYGY CPMO OYK KUXPUGM ZUWY UGX UM MOY KYX, VKHUX, UGXOUIIE MOHANO AGYULE ZUWY HZ IPYKKY. PM LYYTYX UL PZ MOY BYKE SPNOM HZMOY WUGXSYL CUL ZHWALYX HG MOHLY MCH OUIIE ZUWYL USHGY.IPYKKY ZYSM MOUM OY CUL MOY WYGMYK HZ PM USS, UGX MOPL VHMO ISYULYX UGXYTVUKKULLYX OPT. GHC P RGHC MOUM GHM VYWUALY HZ OYK USHGY, GHK HZ TELYSZ USHGY,VAM VYWUALY HZ YBYKEHGY, PM TALM PGYBPMUVSE WHTY UVHAM. MOYE UKY USSYDIYWMPGN PM, MOYE UKY LH LAKY MOUM PM CPSS OUIIYG MOUM P WUGGHM, PWUGGHM, XPLUIIHPGM MOYT. VAM OHC CPSS PM VY? P XH GHM RGHC, VAM PM CPSSWYKMUPGSE OUIIYG!" "VAM GH XHAVM PM USCUEL PL UGX TALM VY LH!" OY WHGLHSYXOPTLYSZ. "UGX VYLPXYL, COUM OUBY P XHGY MH VKPGN PM UVHAM? OHC XPXPM VYNPG? P MKUBYSYX ZKHT THLWHC CPMO IKPGWY BULPSP. MOYG MOYKY CULGHMOPGN. UGX OYKY OY CUL LPMMPGN VE OYK LPXY UL OYKVYMKHMOYX, LYYPGN, OYUKPGN, ZYYSPGN OYK GYUKGYLL, OYK VKYUMOPGN, OYKTHBYTYGML, OYK VYUAME. MOHANOM IPYKKY."EYL, ZKHT HSTAMF," OY UGLCYKYX, CPMO U LPNO.UZMYK LAIIYK IPYKKY CPMO OPL IUKMGYK ZHSSHCYX MOY HMOYKL PGMH MOYXKUCPGN KHHT. "PZ P OUXG'M MOPL OYUXUWOY P'X OUBYLMUEYX SHGNYK."MOY HSX IKPGWYLL XPX GHM KYISE, LOY CUL MHKTYGMYX VE QYUSHALE HZ OYKXUANOMYK'L OUIIPGYLL.COPSY MOY NAYLML CYKY MURPGN MOYPK SYUBY IPYKKY KYTUPGYX ZHK U SHGN MPTYUSHGY CPMO OYSYGY PG MOY SPMMSY XKUCPGN KHHT COYKY MOYE CYKY LPMMPGN.OY OUX HZMYG VYZHKY, XAKPGN MOY SULM LPD CYYRL, KYTUPGYX USHGY CPMO OYK,VAM OUX GYBYK LIHRYG MH OYK HZ SHBY. LOY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MH OPL LIYWMUWSYL.IPYKKY MHHR MOYT HZZ, UGX OPL YEYL, VYLPXYL MOY LMKUGNY SHHR YEYL OUBYZKHT COPWO LIYWMUWSYL OUBY QALM VYYG KYTHBYX, OUX USLH U ZKPNOMYGYX UGXPGJAPKPGN SHHR. OYK ZUWY LMKAWR IPYKKY, VE PML USMYKYX,AGISYULUGMSE YDWPMYX YDIKYLLPHG."PM PL MHH SUMY GHC, PM'L XHGY; VYLPXYL P SHBY OYK," MOHANOM IPYKKY."QY BHAL UPTY!" * OY LUPX, KYTYTVYKPGN COUM OUL MH VY LUPX UM LAWOTHTYGML: VAM OPL CHKXL LHAGXYX LH CYUR MOUM OY ZYSM ULOUTYX HZ OPTLYSZ.    * "P SHBY EHA."LPD CYYRL SUMYK OY CUL TUKKPYX, UGX LYMMSYX PG WHAGM VYFAROHB'L SUKNY,GYCSE ZAKGPLOYX IYMYKLVAKN OHALY, MOY OUIIE IHLLYLLHK, UL IYHISY LUPX,HZ U CPZY COH CUL U WYSYVKUMYX VYUAME UGX HZ TPSSPHGL HZ THGYE.WOUIMYK PPPHSX IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHT IKPGWY BULPSP PGGHBYTVYK, 1805, UGGHAGWPGN MOUM OY UGX OPL LHG CHASX VY IUEPGN OPT UBPLPM. "P UT LMUKMPGN HG U QHAKGYE HZ PGLIYWMPHG, UGX HZ WHAKLY P LOUSSMOPGR GHMOPGN HZ UG YDMKU LYBYGME TPSYL MH WHTY UGX LYY EHA UM MOY LUTYMPTY, TE OHGHKYX VYGYZUWMHK," CKHMY IKPGWY BULPSP. "TE LHG UGUMHSY PLUWWHTIUGEPGN TY HG OPL CUE MH MOY UKTE, LH P OHIY EHA CPSS USSHC OPTIYKLHGUSSE MH YDIKYLL MOY XYYI KYLIYWM MOUM, YTASUMPGN OPL ZUMOYK, OYZYYSL ZHK EHA.""PM LYYTL MOUM MOYKY CPSS VY GH GYYX MH VKPGN TUKE HAM, LAPMHKL UKYWHTPGN MH AL HZ MOYPK HCG UWWHKX," PGWUAMPHALSE KYTUKRYX MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL HG OYUKPGN MOY GYCL.IKPGWY GPWOHSUL ZKHCGYX, VAM LUPX GHMOPGN.U ZHKMGPNOM UZMYK MOY SYMMYK IKPGWY BULPSP'L LYKBUGML WUTY HGY YBYGPGNPG UXBUGWY HZ OPT, UGX OY UGX OPL LHG UKKPBYX GYDM XUE.HSX VHSRHGLRP OUX USCUEL OUX U IHHK HIPGPHG HZ IKPGWY BULPSP'LWOUKUWMYK, VAM THKY LH KYWYGMSE, LPGWY PG MOY GYC KYPNGL HZ IUAS UGXUSYDUGXYK IKPGWY BULPSP OUX KPLYG MH OPNO IHLPMPHG UGX OHGHKL. UGX GHC,ZKHT MOY OPGML WHGMUPGYX PG OPL SYMMYK UGX NPBYG VE MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL,OY LUC COPWO CUE MOY CPGX CUL VSHCPGN, UGX OPL SHC HIPGPHG WOUGNYX PGMHU ZYYSPGN HZ WHGMYTIMAHAL PSS CPSS. OY LGHKMYX COYGYBYK OY TYGMPHGYXOPT. HG MOY XUE HZ IKPGWY BULPSP'L UKKPBUS, IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP CULIUKMPWASUKSE XPLWHGMYGMYX UGX HAM HZ MYTIYK. COYMOYK OY CUL PG U VUXMYTIYK VYWUALY IKPGWY BULPSP CUL WHTPGN, HK COYMOYK OPL VYPGN PG U VUXMYTIYK TUXY OPT LIYWPUSSE UGGHEYX UM IKPGWY BULPSP'L BPLPM, OY CUL PG UVUX MYTIYK, UGX PG MOY THKGPGN MPROHG OUX USKYUXE UXBPLYX MOY UKWOPMYWMGHM MH NH MH MOY IKPGWY CPMO OPL KYIHKM."XH EHA OYUK OHC OY'L CUSRPGN?" "LMYIIPGN ZSUM HG OPLOYYSL--CY RGHC COUM MOUM TYUGL...."OHCYBYK, UM GPGY H'WSHWR MOY IKPGWY, PG OPL BYSBYM WHUM CPMO U LUVSYWHSSUK UGX WUI, CYGM HAM ZHK OPL ALAUS CUSR. "NHX VY MOUGRYX,"MOHANOM MOY HBYKLYYK, "MOY LMHKT OUL VSHCG HBYK!""PM CHASX OUBY VYYG OUKX MH XKPBY AI, EHAK OHGHK," OY UXXYX. "P OYUKX,EHAK OHGHK, MOUM U TPGPLMYK PL WHTPGN MH BPLPM EHAK OHGHK."MOY IKPGWY MAKGYX KHAGX MH MOY HBYKLYYK UGX ZPDYX OPL YEYL HG OPT,ZKHCGPGN."COUM? U TPGPLMYK? COUM TPGPLMYK? COH NUBY HKXYKL?" OY LUPX PG OPLLOKPSS, OUKLO BHPWY. "MOY KHUX PL GHM LCYIM ZHK MOY IKPGWYLL TEXUANOMYK, VAM ZHK U TPGPLMYK! ZHK TY, MOYKY UKY GH TPGPLMYKL!""EHAK OHGHK, P MOHANOM...""EHA MOHANOM!" LOHAMYX MOY IKPGWY, OPL CHKXL WHTPGN THKY UGX THKYKUIPXSE UGX PGXPLMPGWMSE. "EHA MOHANOM!... KULWUSL! VSUWRNAUKXL!... P'SSMYUWO EHA MH MOPGR!" UGX SPZMPGN OPL LMPWR OY LCAGN PM UGX CHASX OUBYOPM USIUMEWO, MOY HBYKLYYK, OUX GHM MOY SUMMYK PGLMPGWMPBYSE UBHPXYX MOYVSHC. "MOHANOM... VSUWRNAUKXL..." LOHAMYX MOY IKPGWY KUIPXSE.VAM USMOHANO USIUMEWO, ZKPNOMYGYX UM OPL HCG MYTYKPME PG UBHPXPGN MOYLMKHRY, WUTY AI MH MOY IKPGWY, VHCPGN OPL VUSX OYUX KYLPNGYXSE VYZHKYOPT, HK IYKOUIL ZHK MOUM BYKE KYULHG, MOY IKPGWY, MOHANO OY WHGMPGAYX MHLOHAM: "VSUWRNAUKXL!... MOKHC MOY LGHC VUWR HG MOY KHUX!" XPX GHM SPZMOPL LMPWR UNUPG VAM OAKKPYX PGMH MOY OHALY.VYZHKY XPGGYK, IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, COH RGYCMOUM MOY IKPGWY CUL PG U VUX OATHK, LMHHX UCUPMPGN OPT; TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY CPMO U KUXPUGM ZUWY MOUM LUPX: "P RGHC GHMOPGN, P UT MOY LUTYUL ALAUS," UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE IUSY, ZKPNOMYGYX, UGX CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL.COUM LOY ZHAGX OUKXYLM MH VYUK CUL MH RGHC MOUM HG LAWO HWWULPHGL LOYHANOM MH VYOUBY SPRY TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, VAM WHASX GHM. LOY MOHANOM:"PZ P LYYT GHM MH GHMPWY OY CPSS MOPGR MOUM P XH GHM LETIUMOPFY CPMOOPT; PZ P LYYT LUX UGX HAM HZ LIPKPML TELYSZ, OY CPSS LUE (UL OY OULXHGY VYZHKY) MOUM P'T PG MOY XATIL."MOY IKPGWY SHHRYX UM OPL XUANOMYK'L ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY UGX LGHKMYX."ZHHS... HK XATTE!" OY TAMMYKYX."UGX MOY HMOYK HGY PL GHM OYKY. MOYE'BY VYYG MYSSPGN MUSYL," OYMOHANOM--KYZYKKPGN MH MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL COH CUL GHM PG MOY XPGPGNKHHT."COYKY PL MOY IKPGWYLL?" OY ULRYX. "OPXPGN?""LOY PL GHM BYKE CYSS," UGLCYKYX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CPMO U VKPNOMLTPSY, "LH LOY CHG'M WHTY XHCG. PM PL GUMAKUS PG OYK LMUMY.""OT! OT!" TAMMYKYX MOY IKPGWY, LPMMPGN XHCG.OPL ISUMY LYYTYX MH OPT GHM JAPMY WSYUG, UGX IHPGMPGN MH U LIHM OYZSAGN PM UCUE. MPROHG WUANOM PM UGX OUGXYX PM MH U ZHHMTUG. MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL CUL GHM AGCYSS, VAM OUX LAWO UG HBYKIHCYKPGN ZYUK HZ MOY IKPGWYMOUM, OYUKPGN OY CUL PG U VUX OATHK, LOY OUX XYWPXYX GHM MH UIIYUK."P UT UZKUPX ZHK MOY VUVE," LOY LUPX MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY: "OYUBYGRGHCL COUM U ZKPNOM TPNOM XH."PG NYGYKUS UM VUSX OPSSL MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL SPBYX PG WHGLMUGM ZYUK, UGXCPMO U LYGLY HZ UGMPIUMOE MH MOY HSX IKPGWY COPWO LOY XPX GHMKYUSPFY VYWUALY MOY ZYUK CUL LH TAWO MOY LMKHGNYK ZYYSPGN. MOY IKPGWYKYWPIKHWUMYX MOPL UGMPIUMOE, VAM PM CUL HBYKIHCYKYX VE OPL WHGMYTIMZHK OYK. COYG MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL OUX NKHCG UWWALMHTYX MH SPZY UM VUSXOPSSL, LOY MHHR U LIYWPUS ZUGWE MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, LIYGM COHSYXUEL CPMO OYK, ULRYX OYK MH LSYYI PG OYK KHHT, UGX HZMYG MUSRYX CPMO OYKUVHAM MOY HSX IKPGWY UGX WKPMPWPFYX OPT."LH CY UKY MH OUBY BPLPMHKL, THG IKPGWY?" KYTUKRYX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY, AGZHSXPGN OYK COPMY GUIRPG CPMO OYK KHLE ZPGNYKL. "OPLYDWYSSYGWE IKPGWY BULPSP RAKUNPG UGX OPL LHG, P AGXYKLMUGX?" LOY LUPXPGJAPKPGNSE."OT!--OPL YDWYSSYGWE PL U IAIIE.... P NHM OPT OPL UIIHPGMTYGM PG MOYLYKBPWY," LUPX MOY IKPGWY XPLXUPGZASSE. "COE OPL LHG PL WHTPGN P XHG'MAGXYKLMUGX. IYKOUIL IKPGWYLL YSPFUVYMO UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE RGHC. P XHG'MCUGM OPT." (OY SHHRYX UM OPL VSALOPGN XUANOMYK.) "UKY EHA AGCYSS MHXUE?YO? UZKUPX HZ MOY 'TPGPLMYK' UL MOUM PXPHM USIUMEWO WUSSYX OPT MOPLTHKGPGN?""GH, THG IYKY."MOHANO TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY OUX VYYG LH AGLAWWYLLZAS PG OYK WOHPWYHZ U LAVQYWM, LOY XPX GHM LMHI MUSRPGN, VAM WOUMMYKYX UVHAM MOYWHGLYKBUMHKPYL UGX MOY VYUAME HZ U ZSHCYK MOUM OUX QALM HIYGYX, UGXUZMYK MOY LHAI MOY IKPGWY VYWUTY THKY NYGPUS.UZMYK XPGGYK, OY CYGM MH LYY OPL XUANOMYK-PG-SUC. MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLLCUL LPMMPGN UM U LTUSS MUVSY, WOUMMYKPGN CPMO TULOU, OYK TUPX. LOY NKYCIUSY HG LYYPGN OYK ZUMOYK-PG-SUC.LOY CUL TAWO USMYKYX. LOY CUL GHC ISUPG KUMOYK MOUG IKYMME. OYK WOYYRLOUX LAGR, OYK SPI CUL XKUCG AI, UGX OYK YEYL XKUCG XHCG."EYL, P ZYYS U RPGX HZ HIIKYLLPHG," LOY LUPX PG KYISE MH MOY IKPGWY'LJAYLMPHG UL MH OHC LOY ZYSM."XH EHA CUGM UGEMOPGN?""GH, TYKWP, THG IYKY.""CYSS, USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM."OY SYZM MOY KHHT UGX CYGM MH MOY CUPMPGN KHHT COYKY USIUMEWO LMHHX CPMOVHCYX OYUX."OUL MOY LGHC VYYG LOHBYSYX VUWR?""EYL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE. ZHKNPBY TY ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY... PM CUL HGSE TELMAIPXPME.""USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM," PGMYKKAIMYX MOY IKPGWY, UGX SUANOPGN OPLAGGUMAKUS CUE, OY LMKYMWOYX HAM OPL OUGX ZHK USIUMEWO MH RPLL, UGX MOYGIKHWYYXYX MH OPL LMAXE.IKPGWY BULPSP UKKPBYX MOUM YBYGPGN. OY CUL TYM PG MOY UBYGAY VE WHUWOTYGUGX ZHHMTYG, COH, CPMO SHAX LOHAML, XKUNNYX OPL LSYPNOL AI MH HGY HZ MOYSHXNYL HBYK MOY KHUX IAKIHLYSE SUXYG CPMO LGHC.IKPGWY BULPSP UGX UGUMHSY OUX LYIUKUMY KHHTL ULLPNGYX MH MOYT.UGUMHSY, OUBPGN MURYG HZZ OPL HBYKWHUM, LUM CPMO UKTL URPTVH VYZHKY UMUVSY HG U WHKGYK HZ COPWO OY LTPSPGNSE UGX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE ZPDYX OPLSUKNY UGX OUGXLHTY YEYL. OY KYNUKXYX OPL COHSY SPZY UL U WHGMPGAUS KHAGXHZ UTALYTYGM COPWO LHTYHGY ZHK LHTY KYULHG OUX MH IKHBPXY ZHK OPT.UGX OY SHHRYX HG MOPL BPLPM MH U WOAKSPLO HSX TUG UGX U KPWO UGX ANSEOYPKYLL PG MOY LUTY CUE. USS MOPL TPNOM, OY MOHANOM, MAKG HAM BYKE CYSSUGX UTALPGNSE. "UGX COE GHM TUKKE OYK PZ LOY KYUSSE OUL LH TAWO THGYE?MOUM GYBYK XHYL UGE OUKT," MOHANOM UGUMHSY.OY LOUBYX UGX LWYGMYX OPTLYSZ CPMO MOY WUKY UGX YSYNUGWY COPWO OUXVYWHTY OUVPMAUS MH OPT UGX, OPL OUGXLHTY OYUX OYSX OPNO, YGMYKYX OPLZUMOYK'L KHHT CPMO MOY NHHX-OATHKYX UGX BPWMHKPHAL UPK GUMAKUS MH OPT.IKPGWY BULPSP'L MCH BUSYML CYKY VALE XKYLLPGN OPT, UGX OY SHHRYX KHAGXCPMO TAWO UGPTUMPHG UGX WOYYKZASSE GHXXYX MH OPL LHG UL MOY SUMMYKYGMYKYX, UL PZ MH LUE: "EYL, MOUM'L OHC P CUGM EHA MH SHHR.""P LUE, ZUMOYK, QHRPGN UIUKM, PL LOY BYKE OPXYHAL?" UGUMHSY ULRYX, UL PZWHGMPGAPGN U WHGBYKLUMPHG MOY LAVQYWM HZ COPWO OUX HZMYG VYYG TYGMPHGYXXAKPGN MOY QHAKGYE."YGHANO! COUM GHGLYGLY! UVHBY USS, MKE MH VY KYLIYWMZAS UGX WUAMPHALCPMO MOY HSX IKPGWY.""PZ OY LMUKML U KHC P'SS NH UCUE," LUPX IKPGWY UGUMHSY. "P WUG'M VYUKMOHLY HSX TYG! YO?""KYTYTVYK, ZHK EHA YBYKEMOPGN XYIYGXL HG MOPL."PG MOY TYUGMPTY, GHM HGSE CUL PM RGHCG PG MOY TUPXLYKBUGML' KHHTL MOUMMOY TPGPLMYK UGX OPL LHG OUX UKKPBYX, VAM MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZ VHMO OUXVYYG TPGAMYSE XYLWKPVYX. IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LPMMPGN USHGY PG OYK KHHT,BUPGSE MKEPGN MH TULMYK OYK UNPMUMPHG."COE XPX MOYE CKPMY, COE XPX SPLY MYSS TY UVHAM PM? PM WUG GYBYKOUIIYG!" LOY LUPX, SHHRPGN UM OYKLYSZ PG MOY NSULL. "OHC LOUSS P YGMYKMOY XKUCPGN KHHT? YBYG PZ P SPRY OPT P WUG'M GHC VY TELYSZ CPMO OPT."MOY TYKY MOHANOM HZ OYK ZUMOYK'L SHHR ZPSSYX OYK CPMO MYKKHK. MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY OUX USKYUXE KYWYPBYX ZKHT TULOU,MOY SUXE'L TUPX, MOY GYWYLLUKE KYIHKM HZ OHC OUGXLHTY MOY TPGPLMYK'L LHGCUL, CPMO OPL KHLE WOYYRL UGX XUKR YEYVKHCL, UGX CPMO COUM XPZZPWASMEMOY ZUMOYK OUX XKUNNYX OPL SYNL AILMUPKL COPSY MOY LHG OUX ZHSSHCYX OPTSPRY UG YUNSY, MOKYY LMYIL UM U MPTY. OUBPGN KYWYPBYX MOPL PGZHKTUMPHG,MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, COHLY WOUMMYKPGN BHPWYLOUX KYUWOYX OYK ZKHT MOY WHKKPXHK, CYGM PGMH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L KHHT."EHA RGHC MOYE'BY WHTY, TUKPY?" LUPX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, CUXXSPGN PG,UGX LPGRPGN OYUBPSE PGMH UG UKTWOUPK.LOY CUL GH SHGNYK PG MOY SHHLY NHCG LOY NYGYKUSSE CHKY PG MOY THKGPGN,VAM OUX HG HGY HZ OYK VYLM XKYLLYL. OYK OUPK CUL WUKYZASSE XHGY UGX OYKZUWY CUL UGPTUMYX, COPWO, OHCYBYK, XPX GHM WHGWYUS PML LAGRYG UGX ZUXYXHAMSPGYL. XKYLLYX UL LOY ALYX MH VY PG IYMYKLVAKN LHWPYME, PM CUL LMPSSTHKY GHMPWYUVSY OHC TAWO ISUPGYK LOY OUX VYWHTY. LHTY AGHVMKALPBY MHAWOOUX VYYG UXXYX MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L MHPSYM COPWO KYGXYKYX OYKZKYLO UGX IKYMME ZUWY EYM THKY UMMKUWMPBY."COUM! UKY EHA NHPGN MH KYTUPG UL EHA UKY, XYUK IKPGWYLL?" LOY VYNUG."MOYE'SS VY UGGHAGWPGN MOUM MOY NYGMSYTYG UKY PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX CYLOUSS OUBY MH NH XHCG, UGX EHA OUBY GHM LTUKMYGYX EHAKLYSZ AI UM USS!"MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL NHM AI, KUGN ZHK MOY TUPX, UGX OAKKPYXSE UGX TYKKPSEVYNUG MH XYBPLY UGX WUKKE HAM U ISUG HZ OHC IKPGWYLL TUKE LOHASX VYXKYLLYX. IKPGWYLL TUKE'L LYSZ-YLMYYT CUL CHAGXYX VE MOY ZUWM MOUMMOY UKKPBUS HZ U LAPMHK UNPMUMYX OYK, UGX LMPSS THKY LH VE VHMO OYKWHTIUGPHGL' GHM OUBPGN MOY SYULM WHGWYIMPHG MOUM PM WHASX VY HMOYKCPLY.MH MYSS MOYT MOUM LOY ZYSM ULOUTYX ZHK OYKLYSZ UGX ZHK MOYT CHASX VY MHVYMKUE OYK UNPMUMPHG, COPSY MH XYWSPGY MOYPK HZZYKL MH XKYLL OYK CHASXIKHSHGN MOYPK VUGMYK UGX PGLPLMYGWY. LOY ZSALOYX, OYK VYUAMPZAS YEYLNKYC XPT, KYX VSHMWOYL WUTY HG OYK ZUWY, UGX PM MHHR HG MOY AGUMMKUWMPBYTUKMEKSPRY YDIKYLLPHG PM LH HZMYG CHKY, UL LOY LAVTPMMYX OYKLYSZ MHTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGX SPLY. VHMO MOYLY CHTYG JAPMY LPGWYKYSE MKPYXMH TURY OYK SHHR IKYMME. LOY CUL LH ISUPG MOUM GYPMOYK HZ MOYT WHASXMOPGR HZ OYK UL U KPBUS, LH MOYE VYNUG XKYLLPGN OYK CPMO IYKZYWMLPGWYKPME, UGX CPMO MOY GUPBY UGX ZPKT WHGBPWMPHG CHTYG OUBY MOUM XKYLLWUG TURY U ZUWY IKYMME."GH KYUSSE, TE XYUK, MOPL XKYLL PL GHM IKYMME," LUPX SPLY, SHHRPGNLPXYCUEL UM IKPGWYLL TUKE ZKHT U SPMMSY XPLMUGWY. "EHA OUBY U TUKHHGXKYLL, OUBY PM ZYMWOYX. KYUSSE! EHA RGHC MOY ZUMY HZ EHAK COHSY SPZY TUEVY UM LMURY. VAM MOPL HGY PL MHH SPNOM, PM'L GHM VYWHTPGN!"PM CUL GHM MOY XKYLL, VAM MOY ZUWY UGX COHSY ZPNAKY HZ IKPGWYLL TUKEMOUM CUL GHM IKYMME, VAM GYPMOYK TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY GHK MOY SPMMSYIKPGWYLL ZYSM MOPL; MOYE LMPSS MOHANOM MOUM PZ U VSAY KPVVHG CYKY ISUWYXPG MOY OUPK, MOY OUPK WHTVYX AI, UGX MOY VSAY LWUKZ UKKUGNYX SHCYK HGMOY VYLM TUKHHG XKYLL, UGX LH HG, USS CHASX VY CYSS. MOYE ZHKNHM MOUMMOY ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY UGX MOY ZPNAKY WHASX GHM VY USMYKYX, UGX MOUMOHCYBYK MOYE TPNOM WOUGNY MOY LYMMPGN UGX UXHKGTYGM HZ MOUM ZUWY, PMCHASX LMPSS KYTUPG IPMYHAL UGX ISUPG. UZMYK MCH HK MOKYY WOUGNYL MHCOPWO IKPGWYLL TUKE TYYRSE LAVTPMMYX, QALM UL OYK OUPK OUX VYYG UKKUGNYXHG MOY MHI HZ OYK OYUX (U LMESY MOUM JAPMY USMYKYX UGX LIHPSYX OYKSHHRL) UGX LOY OUX IAM HG U TUKHHG XKYLL CPMO U IUSY-VSAY LWUKZ, MOYSPMMSY IKPGWYLL CUSRYX MCPWY KHAGX OYK, GHC UXQALMPGN U ZHSX HZ MOYXKYLL CPMO OYK SPMMSY OUGX, GHC UKKUGNPGN MOY LWUKZ UGX SHHRPGN UM OYKCPMO OYK OYUX VYGM ZPKLM HG HGY LPXY UGX MOYG HG MOY HMOYK."GH, PM CPSS GHM XH," LOY LUPX XYWPXYXSE, WSULIPGN OYK OUGXL. "GH, TUKE,KYUSSE MOPL XKYLL XHYL GHM LAPM EHA. P IKYZYK EHA PG EHAK SPMMSY NKUEYBYKEXUE XKYLL. GHC ISYULY, XH PM ZHK TE LURY. RUMPY," LOY LUPX MH MOYTUPX, "VKPGN MOY IKPGWYLL OYK NKUE XKYLL, UGX EHA'SS LYY, TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY, OHC P LOUSS UKKUGNY PM," LOY UXXYX, LTPSPGN CPMO U ZHKYMULMYHZ UKMPLMPW ISYULAKY.VAM COYG RUMPY VKHANOM MOY KYJAPKYX XKYLL, IKPGWYLL TUKE KYTUPGYXLPMMPGN THMPHGSYLL VYZHKY MOY NSULL, SHHRPGN UM OYK ZUWY, UGX LUC PG MOYTPKKHK OYK YEYL ZASS HZ MYUKL UGX OYK THAMO JAPBYKPGN, KYUXE MH VAKLMPGMH LHVL."WHTY, XYUK IKPGWYLL," LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, "QALM HGY THKYSPMMSY YZZHKM."MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, MURPGN MOY XKYLL ZKHT MOY TUPX, WUTY AI MH IKPGWYLLTUKE."CYSS, GHC CY'SS UKKUGNY LHTYMOPGN JAPMY LPTISY UGX VYWHTPGN," LOY LUPX.MOY MOKYY BHPWYL, OYKL, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L, UGX RUMPY'L, COH CULSUANOPGN UM LHTYMOPGN, TPGNSYX PG U TYKKE LHAGX, SPRY MOY WOPKIPGN HZVPKXL."GH, SYUBY TY USHGY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE.OYK BHPWY LHAGXYX LH LYKPHAL UGX LH LUX MOUM MOY WOPKIPGN HZ MOY VPKXLCUL LPSYGWYX UM HGWY. MOYE SHHRYX UM MOY VYUAMPZAS, SUKNY, MOHANOMZASYEYL ZASS HZ MYUKL UGX HZ MOHANOML, NUFPGN LOPGPGNSE UGX PTISHKPGNSE UMMOYT, UGX AGXYKLMHHX MOUM PM CUL ALYSYLL UGX YBYG WKAYS MH PGLPLM."UM SYULM, WOUGNY EHAK WHPZZAKY," LUPX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL. "XPXG'M PMYSS EHA," LOY CYGM HG, MAKGPGN KYIKHUWOZASSE MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY,"TUKE'L PL U ZUWY COPWO LAWO U WHPZZAKY XHYL GHM LAPM PG MOY SYULM. GHMPG MOY SYULM! ISYULY WOUGNY PM.""SYUBY TY USHGY, ISYULY SYUBY TY USHGY! PM PL USS JAPMY MOY LUTY MH TY,"UGLCYKYX U BHPWY LMKANNSPGN CPMO MYUKL.TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL OUX MH HCG MH MOYTLYSBYLMOUM IKPGWYLL TUKE PG MOPL NAPLY SHHRYX BYKE ISUPG, CHKLY MOUG ALAUS,VAM PM CUL MHH SUMY. LOY CUL SHHRPGN UM MOYT CPMO UG YDIKYLLPHG MOYEVHMO RGYC, UG YDIKYLLPHG MOHANOMZAS UGX LUX. MOPL YDIKYLLPHG PG IKPGWYLLTUKE XPX GHM ZKPNOMYG MOYT (LOY GYBYK PGLIPKYX ZYUK PG UGEHGY), VAM MOYERGYC MOUM COYG PM UIIYUKYX HG OYK ZUWY, LOY VYWUTY TAMY UGX CUL GHM MHVY LOURYG PG OYK XYMYKTPGUMPHG."EHA CPSS WOUGNY PM, CHG'M EHA?" LUPX SPLY. UGX UL IKPGWYLL TUKE NUBY GHUGLCYK, LOY SYZM MOY KHHT.IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL SYZM USHGY. LOY XPX GHM WHTISE CPMO SPLY'L KYJAYLM,LOY GHM HGSE SYZM OYK OUPK UL PM CUL, VAM XPX GHM YBYG SHHR PG OYKNSULL. SYMMPGN OYK UKTL ZUSS OYSISYLLSE, LOY LUM CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL UGXIHGXYKYX. U OALVUGX, U TUG, U LMKHGN XHTPGUGM UGX LMKUGNYSE UMMKUWMPBYVYPGN KHLY PG OYK PTUNPGUMPHG, UGX WUKKPYX OYK PGMH U MHMUSSE XPZZYKYGMOUIIE CHKSX HZ OPL HCG. LOY ZUGWPYX U WOPSX, OYK HCG--LAWO UL LOY OUXLYYG MOY XUE VYZHKY PG MOY UKTL HZ OYK GAKLY'L XUANOMYK--UM OYK HCGVKYULM, MOY OALVUGX LMUGXPGN VE UGX NUFPGN MYGXYKSE UM OYK UGX MOYWOPSX. "VAM GH, PM PL PTIHLLPVSY, P UT MHH ANSE," LOY MOHANOM."ISYULY WHTY MH MYU. MOY IKPGWY CPSS VY HAM PG U THTYGM," WUTY MOYTUPX'L BHPWY UM MOY XHHK.LOY KHALYX OYKLYSZ, UGX ZYSM UIIUSSYX UM COUM LOY OUX VYYG MOPGRPGN, UGXVYZHKY NHPGN XHCG LOY CYGM PGMH MOY KHHT COYKY MOY PWHGL OAGN UGX, OYKYEYL ZPDYX HG MOY XUKR ZUWY HZ U SUKNY PWHG HZ MOY LUBPHAK SPM VE USUTI, LOY LMHHX VYZHKY PM CPMO ZHSXYX OUGXL ZHK U ZYC THTYGML. U IUPGZASXHAVM ZPSSYX OYK LHAS. WHASX MOY QHE HZ SHBY, HZ YUKMOSE SHBY ZHK UTUG, VY ZHK OYK? PG OYK MOHANOML HZ TUKKPUNY IKPGWYLL TUKE XKYUTYX HZOUIIPGYLL UGX HZ WOPSXKYG, VAM OYK LMKHGNYLM, THLM XYYISE OPXXYG SHGNPGNCUL ZHK YUKMOSE SHBY. MOY THKY LOY MKPYX MH OPXY MOPL ZYYSPGN ZKHTHMOYKL UGX YBYG ZKHT OYKLYSZ, MOY LMKHGNYK PM NKYC. "H NHX," LOY LUPX,"OHC UT P MH LMPZSY PG TE OYUKM MOYLY MYTIMUMPHGL HZ MOY XYBPS? OHC UT PMH KYGHAGWY ZHKYBYK MOYLY BPSY ZUGWPYL, LH UL IYUWYZASSE MH ZASZPSSMOE CPSS?" UGX LWUKWYSE OUX LOY IAM MOUM JAYLMPHG MOUG NHX NUBY OYK MOYUGLCYK PG OYK HCG OYUKM. "XYLPKY GHMOPGN ZHK MOELYSZ, LYYR GHMOPGN, VYGHM UGDPHAL HK YGBPHAL. TUG'L ZAMAKY UGX MOE HCG ZUMY TALM KYTUPG OPXXYGZKHT MOYY, VAM SPBY LH MOUM MOHA TUEYLM VY KYUXE ZHK UGEMOPGN. PZ PM VYNHX'L CPSS MH IKHBY MOYY PG MOY XAMPYL HZ TUKKPUNY, VY KYUXE MH ZASZPSSOPL CPSS." CPMO MOPL WHGLHSPGN MOHANOM (VAM EYM CPMO U OHIY ZHK MOYZASZPSSTYGM HZ OYK ZHKVPXXYG YUKMOSE SHGNPGN) IKPGWYLL TUKE LPNOYX,UGX OUBPGN WKHLLYX OYKLYSZ CYGM XHCG, MOPGRPGN GYPMOYK HZ OYK NHCG UGXWHPZZAKY GHK HZ OHC LOY CHASX NH PG GHK HZ COUM LOY CHASX LUE. COUMWHASX USS MOUM TUMMYK PG WHTIUKPLHG CPMO MOY CPSS HZ NHX, CPMOHAM COHLYWUKY GHM U OUPK HZ TUG'L OYUX WUG ZUSS?WOUIMYK PBCOYG IKPGWYLL TUKE WUTY XHCG, IKPGWY BULPSP UGX OPL LHG CYKY USKYUXEPG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, MUSRPGN MH MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL UGX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY. COYG LOY YGMYKYX CPMO OYK OYUBE LMYI, MKYUXPGN HG OYK OYYSL,MOY NYGMSYTYG UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY KHLY UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL,PGXPWUMPGN OYK MH MOY NYGMSYTYG, LUPX: "BHPSU TUKPY!" IKPGWYLL TUKE LUCMOYT USS UGX LUC MOYT PG XYMUPS. LOY LUC IKPGWY BULPSP'L ZUWY, LYKPHALZHK UG PGLMUGM UM MOY LPNOM HZ OYK, VAM PTTYXPUMYSE LTPSPGN UNUPG, UGXMOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL WAKPHALSE GHMPGN MOY PTIKYLLPHG "TUKPY" IKHXAWYX HGMOY BPLPMHKL. UGX LOY LUC TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, CPMO OYK KPVVHG UGXIKYMME ZUWY, UGX OYK AGALAUSSE UGPTUMYX SHHR COPWO CUL ZPDYX HG OPT,VAM OPT LOY WHASX GHM LYY, LOY HGSE LUC LHTYMOPGN SUKNY, VKPSSPUGM,UGX OUGXLHTY THBPGN MHCUKX OYK UL LOY YGMYKYX MOY KHHT. IKPGWY BULPSPUIIKHUWOYX ZPKLM, UGX LOY RPLLYX MOY VHSX ZHKYOYUX MOUM VYGM HBYK OYKOUGX UGX UGLCYKYX OPL JAYLMPHG VE LUEPGN MOUM, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, LOYKYTYTVYKYX OPT JAPMY CYSS. MOYG UGUMHSY WUTY AI MH OYK. LOY LMPSS WHASXGHM LYY OPT. LOY HGSE ZYSM U LHZM OUGX MURPGN OYKL ZPKTSE, UGX LOYMHAWOYX CPMO OYK SPIL U COPMY ZHKYOYUX, HBYK COPWO CUL VYUAMPZASSPNOM-VKHCG OUPK LTYSSPGN HZ IHTUXY. COYG LOY SHHRYX AI UM OPT LOY CULLMKAWR VE OPL VYUAME. UGUMHSY LMHHX CPMO OPL KPNOM MOATV AGXYK U VAMMHGHZ OPL AGPZHKT, OPL WOYLM YDIUGXYX UGX OPL VUWR XKUCG PG, LSPNOMSELCPGNPGN HGY ZHHM, UGX, CPMO OPL OYUX U SPMMSY VYGM, SHHRYX CPMO VYUTPGNZUWY UM MOY IKPGWYLL CPMOHAM LIYURPGN UGX YBPXYGMSE GHM MOPGRPGN UVHAMOYK UM USS. UGUMHSY CUL GHM JAPWR-CPMMYX, GHK KYUXE HK YSHJAYGM PGWHGBYKLUMPHG, VAM OY OUX MOY ZUWASME, LH PGBUSAUVSY PG LHWPYME, HZWHTIHLAKY UGX PTIYKMAKVUVSY LYSZ-IHLLYLLPHG. PZ U TUG SUWRPGN PGLYSZ-WHGZPXYGWY KYTUPGL XATV HG U ZPKLM PGMKHXAWMPHG UGX VYMKUEL UWHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY PTIKHIKPYME HZ LAWO LPSYGWY UGX UG UGDPYME MH ZPGXLHTYMOPGN MH LUE, MOY YZZYWM PL VUX. VAM UGUMHSY CUL XATV, LCAGN OPLZHHM, UGX LTPSPGNSE YDUTPGYX MOY IKPGWYLL' OUPK. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM OYWHASX VY LPSYGM PG MOPL CUE ZHK U BYKE SHGN MPTY. "PZ UGEHGY ZPGXL MOPLLPSYGWY PGWHGBYGPYGM, SYM OPT MUSR, VAM P XHG'M CUGM MH," OY LYYTYX MHLUE. VYLPXYL MOPL, PG OPL VYOUBPHK MH CHTYG UGUMHSY OUX U TUGGYKCOPWO IUKMPWASUKSE PGLIPKYL PG MOYT WAKPHLPME, UCY, UGX YBYG SHBY--ULAIYKWPSPHAL WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OPL HCG LAIYKPHKPME. PM CUL UL PZ OY LUPXMH MOYT: "P RGHC EHA, P RGHC EHA, VAM COE LOHASX P VHMOYK UVHAM EHA?EHA'X VY HGSE MHH NSUX, HZ WHAKLY." IYKOUIL OY XPX GHM KYUSSE MOPGR MOPLCOYG OY TYM CHTYG--YBYG IKHVUVSE OY XPX GHM, ZHK PG NYGYKUS OY MOHANOMBYKE SPMMSY--VAM OPL SHHRL UGX TUGGYK NUBY MOUM PTIKYLLPHG. MOY IKPGWYLLZYSM MOPL, UGX UL PZ CPLOPGN MH LOHC OPT MOUM LOY XPX GHM YBYG XUKYYDIYWM MH PGMYKYLM OPT, LOY MAKGYX MH OPL ZUMOYK. MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CULNYGYKUS UGX UGPTUMYX, MOUGRL MH IKPGWYLL SPLY'L BHPWY UGX SPMMSY XHCGESPI MOUM SPZMYX HBYK OYK COPMY MYYMO. LOY TYM IKPGWY BULPSP CPMO MOUMISUEZAS TUGGYK HZMYG YTISHEYX VE SPBYSE WOUMME IYHISY, UGX WHGLPLMPGNPG MOY ULLATIMPHG MOUM VYMCYYG MOY IYKLHG MOYE LH UXXKYLL UGX MOYTLYSBYLMOYKY UKY LHTY LYTP-IKPBUMY, SHGN-YLMUVSPLOYX QHRYL UGX UTALPGNKYTPGPLWYGWYL, MOHANO GH LAWO KYTPGPLWYGWYL KYUSSE YDPLM--QALM UL GHGYYDPLMYX PG MOPL WULY. IKPGWY BULPSP KYUXPSE UXHIMYX OYK MHGY UGX MOYSPMMSY IKPGWYLL USLH XKYC UGUMHSY, COHT LOY OUKXSE RGYC, PGMH MOYLYUTALPGN KYWHSSYWMPHGL HZ MOPGNL MOUM OUX GYBYK HWWAKKYX. TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY USLH LOUKYX MOYT UGX YBYG IKPGWYLL TUKE ZYSM OYKLYSZISYULUGMSE TUXY MH LOUKY PG MOYLY TYKKE KYTPGPLWYGWYL."OYKY UM SYULM CY LOUSS OUBY MOY VYGYZPM HZ EHAK WHTIUGE USS MHHAKLYSBYL, XYUK IKPGWY," LUPX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL (HZ WHAKLY, PG ZKYGWO)MH IKPGWY BULPSP. "PM'L GHM UL UM UGGYMMY'L * KYWYIMPHGL COYKY EHAUSCUEL KUG UCUE; EHA KYTYTVYK WYMMY WOYKY UGGYMMY!"    * UGGU IUBSHBGU."UO, VAM EHA CHG'M MUSR IHSPMPWL MH TY SPRY UGGYMMY!""UGX HAK SPMMSY MYU MUVSY?""HO, EYL!""COE PL PM EHA CYKY GYBYK UM UGGYMMY'L?" MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL ULRYXUGUMHSY. "UO, P RGHC, P RGHC," LOY LUPX CPMO U LSE NSUGWY, "EHAK VKHMOYKOPIIHSEMY MHSX TY UVHAM EHAK NHPGNL HG. HO!" UGX LOY LOHHR OYK ZPGNYK UMOPT, "P OUBY YBYG OYUKX HZ EHAK XHPGNL PG IUKPL!""UGX XPXG'M OPIIHSEMY MYSS EHA?" ULRYX IKPGWY BULPSP, MAKGPGN MH OPL LHGUGX LYPFPGN MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' UKT UL PZ LOY CHASX OUBY KAG UCUE UGXOY OUX QALM TUGUNYX MH WUMWO OYK, "XPXG'M OY MYSS EHA OHC OY OPTLYSZ CULIPGPGN ZHK MOY XYUK IKPGWYLL, UGX OHC LOY LOHCYX OPT MOY XHHK? HO, LOYPL U IYUKS UTHGN CHTYG, IKPGWYLL," OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH IKPGWYLL TUKE.COYG IUKPL CUL TYGMPHGYX, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY ZHK OYK IUKM LYPFYX MOYHIIHKMAGPME HZ QHPGPGN PG MOY NYGYKUS WAKKYGM HZ KYWHSSYWMPHGL.LOY MHHR MOY SPVYKME HZ PGJAPKPGN COYMOYK PM CUL SHGN LPGWY UGUMHSYOUX SYZM IUKPL UGX OHC OY OUX SPRYX MOUM WPME. UGUMHSY UGLCYKYX MOYZKYGWOCHTUG BYKE KYUXPSE UGX, SHHRPGN UM OYK CPMO U LTPSY, MUSRYX MH OYKUVHAM OYK GUMPBY SUGX. COYG OY LUC MOY IKYMME SPMMSY VHAKPYGGY, UGUMHSYWUTY MH MOY WHGWSALPHG MOUM OY CHASX GHM ZPGX VUSX OPSSL XASS YPMOYK."GHM UM USS VUX!" OY MOHANOM, YDUTPGPGN OYK, "GHM UM USS VUX, MOUMSPMMSY WHTIUGPHG! P OHIY LOY CPSS VKPGN OYK USHGN CPMO OYK COYG CY'KYTUKKPYX, SU IYMPMY YLM NYGMPSSY." *    * MOY SPMMSY HGY PL WOUKTPGN.MOY HSX IKPGWY XKYLLYX SYPLAKYSE PG OPL LMAXE, ZKHCGPGN UGX WHGLPXYKPGNCOUM OY CUL MH XH. MOY WHTPGN HZ MOYLY BPLPMHKL UGGHEYX OPT. "COUM UKYIKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOUM LHG HZ OPL MH TY? IKPGWY BULPSP PL U LOUSSHCVKUNNUKM UGX OPL LHG, GH XHAVM, PL U ZPGY LIYWPTYG," OY NKATVSYX MHOPTLYSZ. COUM UGNYKYX OPT CUL MOUM MOY WHTPGN HZ MOYLY BPLPMHKL KYBPBYXPG OPL TPGX UG AGLYMMSYX JAYLMPHG OY USCUEL MKPYX MH LMPZSY, HGY UVHAMCOPWO OY USCUEL XYWYPBYX OPTLYSZ. MOY JAYLMPHG CUL COYMOYK OY WHASX YBYKVKPGN OPTLYSZ MH IUKM ZKHT OPL XUANOMYK UGX NPBY OYK MH U OALVUGX. MOYIKPGWY GYBYK XPKYWMSE ULRYX OPTLYSZ MOUM JAYLMPHG, RGHCPGN VYZHKYOUGXMOUM OY CHASX OUBY MH UGLCYK PM QALMSE, UGX QALMPWY WSULOYX GHM HGSECPMO OPL ZYYSPGNL VAM CPMO MOY BYKE IHLLPVPSPME HZ SPZY. SPZY CPMOHAMIKPGWYLL TUKE, SPMMSY UL OY LYYTYX MH BUSAY OYK, CUL AGMOPGRUVSY MHOPT. "UGX COE LOHASX LOY TUKKE?" OY MOHANOM. "MH VY AGOUIIE ZHK WYKMUPG.MOYKY'L SPLY, TUKKPYX MH UGXKYC--U VYMMYK OALVUGX HGY CHASX MOPGR WHASXOUKXSE VY ZHAGX GHCUXUEL--VAM PL LOY WHGMYGMYX CPMO OYK SHM? UGX COHCHASX TUKKE TUKPY ZHK SHBY? ISUPG UGX UCRCUKX! MOYE'SS MURY OYK ZHK OYKWHGGYWMPHGL UGX CYUSMO. UKY MOYKY GH CHTYG SPBPGN AGTUKKPYX, UGX YBYGMOY OUIIPYK ZHK PM?" LH MOHANOM IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP COPSY XKYLLPGN, UGXEYM MOY JAYLMPHG OY CUL USCUEL IAMMPGN HZZ XYTUGXYX UG PTTYXPUMYUGLCYK. IKPGWY BULPSP OUX VKHANOM OPL LHG CPMO MOY YBPXYGM PGMYGMPHG HZIKHIHLPGN, UGX MHXUE HK MHTHKKHC OY CHASX IKHVUVSE ULR ZHK UG UGLCYK.OPL VPKMO UGX IHLPMPHG PG LHWPYME CYKY GHM VUX. "CYSS, P'BY GHMOPGNUNUPGLM PM," MOY IKPGWY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ, "VAM OY TALM VY CHKMOE HZ OYK.UGX MOUM PL COUM CY LOUSS LYY.""MOUM PL COUM CY LOUSS LYY! MOUM PL COUM CY LOUSS LYY!" OY UXXYX USHAX.OY YGMYKYX MOY XKUCPGN KHHT CPMO OPL ALAUS USYKM LMYI, NSUGWPGN KUIPXSEKHAGX MOY WHTIUGE. OY GHMPWYX MOY WOUGNY PG MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' XKYLL,TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L KPVVHG, IKPGWYLL TUKE'L AGVYWHTPGN WHPZZAKY,TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L UGX UGUMHSY'L LTPSYL, UGX MOY SHGYSPGYLL HZ OPLXUANOMYK UTPX MOY NYGYKUS WHGBYKLUMPHG. "NHM OYKLYSZ AI SPRY U ZHHS!"OY MOHANOM, SHHRPGN PKKPMUVSE UM OYK. "LOY PL LOUTYSYLL, UGX OY PNGHKYLOYK!"OY CYGM LMKUPNOM AI MH IKPGWY BULPSP."CYSS! OHC X'EY XH? OHC X'EY XH? NSUX MH LYY EHA!""ZKPYGXLOPI SUANOL UM XPLMUGWY," VYNUG IKPGWY BULPSP PG OPL ALAUS KUIPX,LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM, ZUTPSPUK MHGY. "OYKY PL TE LYWHGX LHG; ISYULY SHBY UGXVYZKPYGX OPT."IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP LAKBYEYX UGUMHSY."ZPGY EHAGN ZYSSHC! ZPGY EHAGN ZYSSHC!" OY LUPX. "CYSS, WHTY UGX RPLLTY," UGX OY HZZYKYX OPL WOYYR.UGUMHSY RPLLYX MOY HSX TUG, UGX SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO WAKPHLPME UGX IYKZYWMWHTIHLAKY, CUPMPGN ZHK U XPLISUE HZ MOY YWWYGMKPWPMPYL OPL ZUMOYK OUXMHSX OPT MH YDIYWM.IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP LUM XHCG PG OPL ALAUS ISUWY PG MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY LHZUUGX, XKUCPGN AI UG UKTWOUPK ZHK IKPGWY BULPSP, IHPGMYX MH PM UGX VYNUGJAYLMPHGPGN OPT UVHAM IHSPMPWUS UZZUPKL UGX GYCL. OY LYYTYX MH SPLMYGUMMYGMPBYSE MH COUM IKPGWY BULPSP LUPX, VAM RYIM NSUGWPGN UM IKPGWYLLTUKE."UGX LH MOYE UKY CKPMPGN ZKHT IHMLXUT USKYUXE?" OY LUPX, KYIYUMPGNIKPGWY BULPSP'L SULM CHKXL. MOYG KPLPGN, OY LAXXYGSE CYGM AI MH OPLXUANOMYK."PL PM ZHK BPLPMHKL EHA'BY NHM EHAKLYSZ AI SPRY MOUM, YO?" LUPX OY."ZPGY, BYKE ZPGY! EHA OUBY XHGY AI EHAK OUPK PG MOPL GYC CUE ZHK MOYBPLPMHKL, UGX VYZHKY MOY BPLPMHKL P MYSS EHA MOUM PG ZAMAKY EHA UKYGYBYK MH XUKY MH WOUGNY EHAK CUE HZ XKYLL CPMOHAM TE WHGLYGM.""PM CUL TE ZUASM, THG IYKY," PGMYKWYXYX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, CPMO UVSALO."EHA TALM XH UL EHA ISYULY," LUPX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP, VHCPGN MH OPLXUANOMYK-PG-SUC, "VAM LOY GYYX GHM TURY U ZHHS HZ OYKLYSZ, LOY'L ISUPGYGHANO UL PM PL."UGX OY LUM XHCG UNUPG, IUEPGN GH THKY UMMYGMPHG MH OPL XUANOMYK, COH CULKYXAWYX MH MYUKL."HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOUM WHPZZAKY LAPML MOY IKPGWYLL BYKE CYSS," LUPXIKPGWY BULPSP."GHC EHA, EHAGN IKPGWY, COUM'L EHAK GUTY?" LUPX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP,MAKGPGN MH UGUMHSY, "WHTY OYKY, SYM AL MUSR UGX NYM UWJAUPGMYX.""GHC MOY ZAG VYNPGL," MOHANOM UGUMHSY, LPMMPGN XHCG CPMO U LTPSY VYLPXYMOY HSX IKPGWY."CYSS, TE XYUK VHE, P OYUK EHA'BY VYYG YXAWUMYX UVKHUX, GHM MUANOM MHKYUX UGX CKPMY VE MOY XYUWHG, SPRY EHAK ZUMOYK UGX TY. GHC MYSS TY,TE XYUK VHE, UKY EHA LYKBPGN PG MOY OHKLY NAUKXL?" ULRYX MOY HSX TUG,LWKAMPGPFPGN UGUMHSY WSHLYSE UGX PGMYGMSE."GH, P OUBY VYYG MKUGLZYKKYX MH MOY SPGY," LUPX UGUMHSY, OUKXSE UVSY MHKYLMKUPG OPL SUANOMYK."UO! MOUM'L U NHHX MOPGN. LH, TE XYUK VHE, EHA CPLO MH LYKBY MOY MLUKUGX MOY WHAGMKE? PM PL CUKMPTY. LAWO U ZPGY ZYSSHC TALM LYKBY. CYSS, UKYEHA HZZ MH MOY ZKHGM?""GH, IKPGWY, HAK KYNPTYGM OUL NHGY MH MOY ZKHGM, VAM P UT UMMUWOYX...COUM PL PM P UT UMMUWOYX MH, IUIU?" LUPX UGUMHSY, MAKGPGN MH OPL ZUMOYKCPMO U SUANO."U LISYGXPX LHSXPYK, LISYGXPX! 'COUM UT P UMMUWOYX MH!' OU, OU, OU!"SUANOYX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP, UGX UGUMHSY SUANOYX LMPSS SHAXYK. LAXXYGSEIKPGWY VHSRHGLRP ZKHCGYX."EHA TUE NH," OY LUPX MH UGUMHSY.UGUMHSY KYMAKGYX LTPSPGN MH MOY SUXPYL."UGX LH EHA'BY OUX OPT YXAWUMYX UVKHUX, IKPGWY BULPSP, OUBYG'M EHA?"LUPX MOY HSX IKPGWY MH IKPGWY BULPSP."P OUBY XHGY TE VYLM ZHK OPT, UGX P WUG ULLAKY EHA MOY YXAWUMPHG MOYKYPL TAWO VYMMYK MOUG HAKL.""EYL, YBYKEMOPGN PL XPZZYKYGM GHCUXUEL, YBYKEMOPGN PL WOUGNYX. MOY SUX'LU ZPGY ZYSSHC, U ZPGY ZYSSHC! CYSS, WHTY CPMO TY GHC." OY MHHR IKPGWYBULPSP'L UKT UGX SYX OPT MH OPL LMAXE. UL LHHG UL MOYE CYKY USHGYMHNYMOYK, IKPGWY BULPSP UGGHAGWYX OPL OHIYL UGX CPLOYL MH MOY HSXIKPGWY."CYSS, XH EHA MOPGR P LOUSS IKYBYGM OYK, MOUM P WUG'M IUKM ZKHT OYK?"LUPX MOY HSX IKPGWY UGNKPSE. "COUM UG PXYU! P'T KYUXE ZHK PM MHTHKKHC!HGSE SYM TY MYSS EHA, P CUGM MH RGHC TE LHG-PG-SUC VYMMYK. EHA RGHCTE IKPGWPISYL--YBYKEMOPGN UVHBYVHUKX? P CPSS ULR OYK MHTHKKHC PG EHAKIKYLYGWY; PZ LOY PL CPSSPGN, MOYG OY WUG LMUE HG. OY WUG LMUE UGX P'SSLYY." MOY HSX IKPGWY LGHKMYX. "SYM OYK TUKKE, PM'L USS MOY LUTY MH TY!"OY LWKYUTYX PG MOY LUTY IPYKWPGN MHGY UL COYG IUKMPGN ZKHT OPL LHG."P CPSS MYSS EHA ZKUGRSE," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP PG MOY MHGY HZ U WKUZMETUG WHGBPGWYX HZ MOY ZAMPSPME HZ VYPGN WAGGPGN CPMO LH RYYG-LPNOMYXWHTIUGPHG. "EHA RGHC, EHA LYY KPNOM MOKHANO IYHISY. UGUMHSY PL GHNYGPAL, VAM OY PL UG OHGYLM, NHHXOYUKMYX SUX; UG YDWYSSYGM LHG HKRPGLTUG.""USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM, CY'SS LYY!"UL USCUEL OUIIYGL COYG CHTYG SYUX SHGYSE SPBYL ZHK UGE SYGNMO HZ MPTYCPMOHAM TUSY LHWPYME, HG UGUMHSY'L UIIYUKUGWY USS MOY MOKYY CHTYG HZIKPGWY VHSRHGLRP'L OHALYOHSX ZYSM MOUM MOYPK SPZY OUX GHM VYYG KYUSMPSS MOYG. MOYPK IHCYKL HZ KYULHGPGN, ZYYSPGN, UGX HVLYKBPGN PTTYXPUMYSEPGWKYULYX MYGZHSX, UGX MOYPK SPZY, COPWO LYYTYX MH OUBY VYYG IULLYX PGXUKRGYLL, CUL LAXXYGSE SPM AI VE U GYC VKPNOMGYLL, ZASS HZ LPNGPZPWUGWY.IKPGWYLL TUKE NKYC JAPMY AGWHGLWPHAL HZ OYK ZUWY UGX WHPZZAKY. MOYOUGXLHTY HIYG ZUWY HZ MOY TUG COH TPNOM IYKOUIL VY OYK OALVUGX UVLHKVYXUSS OYK UMMYGMPHG. OY LYYTYX MH OYK RPGX, VKUBY, XYMYKTPGYX, TUGSE, UGXTUNGUGPTHAL. LOY ZYSM WHGBPGWYX HZ MOUM. MOHALUGXL HZ XKYUTL HZ U ZAMAKYZUTPSE SPZY WHGMPGAUSSE KHLY PG OYK PTUNPGUMPHG. LOY XKHBY MOYT UCUE UGXMKPYX MH WHGWYUS MOYT."VAM UT P GHM MHH WHSX CPMO OPT?" MOHANOM MOY IKPGWYLL. "P MKE MH VYKYLYKBYX VYWUALY PG MOY XYIMO HZ TE LHAS P ZYYS MHH GYUK MH OPT USKYUXE,VAM MOYG OY WUGGHM RGHC COUM P MOPGR HZ OPT UGX TUE PTUNPGY MOUM P XHGHM SPRY OPT."UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE MKPYX, VAM WHASX GHM TUGUNY, MH VY WHKXPUS MH OYK GYCNAYLM. "IHHK NPKS, LOY'L XYBPSPLO ANSE!" MOHANOM UGUMHSY.TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, USLH KHALYX MH NKYUM YDWPMYTYGM VE UGUMHSY'LUKKPBUS, MOHANOM PG UGHMOYK CUE. HZ WHAKLY, LOY, U OUGXLHTY EHAGN CHTUGCPMOHAM UGE XYZPGPMY IHLPMPHG, CPMOHAM KYSUMPHGL HK YBYG U WHAGMKE, XPXGHM PGMYGX MH XYBHMY OYK SPZY MH LYKBPGN IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP, MH KYUXPGNUSHAX MH OPT UGX VYPGN ZKPYGXL CPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE. TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY OUX SHGN VYYG CUPMPGN ZHK U KALLPUG IKPGWY COH, UVSY MHUIIKYWPUMY UM U NSUGWY OYK LAIYKPHKPME MH MOY ISUPG, VUXSE XKYLLYX,AGNUPGSE KALLPUG IKPGWYLLYL, CHASX ZUSS PG SHBY CPMO OYK UGX WUKKE OYKHZZ; UGX OYKY UM SULM CUL U KALLPUG IKPGWY. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY RGYCU LMHKE, OYUKX ZKHT OYK UAGM VAM ZPGPLOYX PG OYK HCG CUE, COPWO LOYSPRYX MH KYIYUM MH OYKLYSZ. PM CUL MOY LMHKE HZ U NPKS COH OUX VYYGLYXAWYX, UGX MH COHT OYK IHHK THMOYK (LU IUABKY TYKY) UIIYUKYX, UGXKYIKHUWOYX OYK ZHK EPYSXPGN MH U TUG CPMOHAM VYPGN TUKKPYX. TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY CUL HZMYG MHAWOYX MH MYUKL UL PG PTUNPGUMPHG LOY MHSX MOPLLMHKE MH OPT, OYK LYXAWYK. UGX GHC OY, U KYUS KALLPUG IKPGWY, OUXUIIYUKYX. OY CHASX WUKKE OYK UCUE UGX MOYG LU IUABKY TYKY CHASX UIIYUKUGX OY CHASX TUKKE OYK. LH OYK ZAMAKY LOUIYX PMLYSZ PG TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY'L OYUX UM MOY BYKE MPTY LOY CUL MUSRPGN MH UGUMHSY UVHAMIUKPL. PM CUL GHM WUSWASUMPHG MOUM NAPXYX OYK (LOY XPX GHM YBYG ZHK UTHTYGM WHGLPXYK COUM LOY LOHASX XH), VAM USS MOPL OUX SHGN VYYG ZUTPSPUKMH OYK, UGX GHC MOUM UGUMHSY OUX UIIYUKYX PM QALM NKHAIYX PMLYSZ UKHAGXOPT UGX LOY CPLOYX UGX MKPYX MH ISYULY OPT UL TAWO UL IHLLPVSY.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, SPRY UG HSX CUK OHKLY MOUM OYUKL MOY MKATIYM,AGWHGLWPHALSE UGX JAPMY ZHKNYMMPGN OYK WHGXPMPHG, IKYIUKYX ZHK MOYZUTPSPUK NUSSHI HZ WHJAYMKE, CPMOHAM UGE ASMYKPHK THMPBY HK UGELMKANNSY, VAM CPMO GUPBY UGX SPNOMOYUKMYX NUPYME.USMOHANO PG ZYTUSY LHWPYME UGUMHSY ALAUSSE ULLATYX MOY KHSY HZ U TUGMPKYX HZ VYPGN KAG UZMYK VE CHTYG, OPL BUGPME CUL ZSUMMYKYX VE MOYLIYWMUWSY HZ OPL IHCYK HBYK MOYLY MOKYY CHTYG. VYLPXYL MOUM, OY CULVYNPGGPGN MH ZYYS ZHK MOY IKYMME UGX IKHBHWUMPBY TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGYMOUM IULLPHGUMY UGPTUS ZYYSPGN COPWO CUL UIM MH TULMYK OPT CPMO NKYUMLAXXYGGYLL UGX IKHTIM OPT MH MOY WHUKLYLM UGX THLM KYWRSYLL UWMPHGL.UZMYK MYU, MOY WHTIUGE CYGM PGMH MOY LPMMPGN KHHT UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE CULULRYX MH ISUE HG MOY WSUBPWOHKX. UGUMHSY, SUANOPGN UGX PG OPNO LIPKPML,WUTY UGX SYUGYX HG OPL YSVHCL, ZUWPGN OYK UGX VYLPXY TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY. IKPGWYLL TUKE ZYSM OPL SHHR CPMO U IUPGZASSE QHEHAL YTHMPHG.OYK ZUBHKPMY LHGUMU VHKY OYK PGMH U THLM PGMPTUMYSE IHYMPW CHKSX UGX MOYSHHR LOY ZYSM AIHG OYK TUXY MOUM CHKSX LMPSS THKY IHYMPW.
