VAM UGUMHSY'LYDIKYLLPHG, MOHANO OPL YEYL CYKY ZPDYX HG OYK, KYZYKKYX GHM MH OYK VAMMH MOY THBYTYGML HZ TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L SPMMSY ZHHM, COPWO OY CULMOYG MHAWOPGN CPMO OPL HCG AGXYK MOY WSUBPWOHKX. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGYCUL USLH SHHRPGN UM IKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX PG OYK SHBYSE YEYL MOYKY CUL USHHR HZ ZYUKZAS QHE UGX OHIY MOUM CUL USLH GYC MH MOY IKPGWYLL."OHC LOY SHBYL TY!" MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE. "OHC OUIIE P UT GHC, UGX OHCOUIIE P TUE VY CPMO LAWO U ZKPYGX UGX LAWO U OALVUGX! OALVUGX? WUG PMVY IHLLPVSY?" LOY MOHANOM, GHM XUKPGN MH SHHR UM OPL ZUWY, VAM LMPSSZYYSPGN OPL YEYL NUFPGN UM OYK.PG MOY YBYGPGN, UZMYK LAIIYK, COYG USS CYKY UVHAM MH KYMPKY, UGUMHSYRPLLYX IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OUGX. LOY XPX GHM RGHC OHC LOY ZHAGX MOY WHAKUNY,VAM LOY SHHRYX LMKUPNOM PGMH OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY UL PM WUTY GYUK MH OYKLOHKMLPNOMYX YEYL. MAKGPGN ZKHT IKPGWYLL TUKE OY CYGM AI UGX RPLLYXTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L OUGX. (MOPL CUL GHM YMPJAYMMY, VAM MOYG OY XPXYBYKEMOPGN LH LPTISE UGX CPMO LAWO ULLAKUGWY!) TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGYZSALOYX, UGX NUBY MOY IKPGWYLL U ZKPNOMYGYX SHHR."COUM XYSPWUWE!" MOHANOM MOY IKPGWYLL. "PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM UTYSPY"(TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY) "MOPGRL P WHASX VY QYUSHAL HZ OYK, UGX GHMBUSAY OYK IAKY UZZYWMPHG UGX XYBHMPHG MH TY?" LOY CYGM AI MH OYK UGXRPLLYX OYK CUKTSE. UGUMHSY CYGM AI MH RPLL MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' OUGX."GH! GH! GH! COYG EHAK ZUMOYK CKPMYL MH MYSS TY MOUM EHA UKY VYOUBPGNCYSS P CPSS NPBY EHA TE OUGX MH RPLL. GHM MPSS MOYG!" LOY LUPX. UGXLTPSPGNSE KUPLPGN U ZPGNYK UM OPT, LOY SYZM MOY KHHT.WOUIMYK BMOYE USS LYIUKUMYX, VAM, YDWYIM UGUMHSY COH ZYSS ULSYYI UL LHHG UL OYNHM PGMH VYX, USS RYIM UCURY U SHGN MPTY MOUM GPNOM."PL OY KYUSSE MH VY TE OALVUGX, MOPL LMKUGNYK COH PL LH RPGX--EYL, RPGX,MOUM PL MOY WOPYZ MOPGN," MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE; UGX ZYUK, COPWO LOY OUXLYSXHT YDIYKPYGWYX, WUTY AIHG OYK. LOY ZYUKYX MH SHHR KHAGX, PM LYYTYXMH OYK MOUM LHTYHGY CUL MOYKY LMUGXPGN VYOPGX MOY LWKYYG PG MOY XUKRWHKGYK. UGX MOPL LHTYHGY CUL OY--MOY XYBPS--UGX OY CUL USLH MOPL TUGCPMO MOY COPMY ZHKYOYUX, VSUWR YEYVKHCL, UGX KYX SPIL.LOY KUGN ZHK OYK TUPX UGX ULRYX OYK MH LSYYI PG OYK KHHT.TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CUSRYX AI UGX XHCG MOY WHGLYKBUMHKE ZHK U SHGNMPTY MOUM YBYGPGN, BUPGSE YDIYWMPGN LHTYHGY, GHC LTPSPGN UM LHTYHGY, GHCCHKRPGN OYKLYSZ AI MH MYUKL CPMO MOY PTUNPGUKE CHKXL HZ OYK IUABKY TYKYKYVARPGN OYK ZHK OYK ZUSS.MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL NKATVSYX MH OYK TUPX MOUM OYK VYX CUL VUXSE TUXY.LOY WHASX GHM SPY YPMOYK HG OYK ZUWY HK HG OYK LPXY. YBYKE IHLPMPHG CULUCRCUKX UGX AGWHTZHKMUVSY, UGX OYK VAKXYG HIIKYLLYX OYK GHC THKY MOUGYBYK VYWUALY UGUMHSY'L IKYLYGWY OUX BPBPXSE KYWUSSYX MH OYK MOY MPTYCOYG LOY CUL GHM SPRY MOUM UGX COYG YBYKEMOPGN CUL SPNOM UGX NUE. LOYLUM PG UG UKTWOUPK PG OYK XKYLLPGN QUWRYM UGX GPNOMWUI UGX RUMPY, LSYYIEUGX XPLOYBYSYX, VYUM UGX MAKGYX MOY OYUBE ZYUMOYK VYX ZHK MOY MOPKXMPTY, TAMMYKPGN MH OYKLYSZ."P MHSX EHA PM CUL USS SATIL UGX OHSYL!" MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL KYIYUMYX."P LOHASX VY NSUX YGHANO MH ZUSS ULSYYI, LH PM'L GHM TE ZUASM!" UGX OYKBHPWY JAPBYKYX SPRY MOUM HZ U WOPSX UVHAM MH WKE.MOY HSX IKPGWY XPX GHM LSYYI YPMOYK. MPROHG, OUSZ ULSYYI, OYUKX OPTIUWPGN UGNKPSE UVHAM UGX LGHKMPGN. MOY HSX IKPGWY ZYSM UL MOHANO OYOUX VYYG PGLASMYX MOKHANO OPL XUANOMYK. MOY PGLASM CUL MOY THKY IHPGMYXVYWUALY PM WHGWYKGYX GHM OPTLYSZ VAM UGHMOYK, OPL XUANOMYK, COHT OYSHBYX THKY MOUG OPTLYSZ. OY RYIM MYSSPGN OPTLYSZ MOUM OY CHASX WHGLPXYKMOY COHSY TUMMYK UGX XYWPXY COUM CUL KPNOM UGX OHC OY LOHASX UWM, VAMPGLMYUX HZ MOUM OY HGSE YDWPMYX OPTLYSZ THKY UGX THKY."MOY ZPKLM TUG MOUM MAKGL AI--LOY ZHKNYML OYK ZUMOYK UGX YBYKEMOPGNYSLY, KAGL AILMUPKL UGX XHYL AI OYK OUPK UGX CUNL OYK MUPS UGX PL AGSPRYOYKLYSZ! NSUX MH MOKHC OYK ZUMOYK HBYK! UGX LOY RGYC P LOHASX GHMPWYPM. ZK... ZK... ZK! UGX XHG'M P LYY MOUM MOUM PXPHM OUX YEYL HGSE ZHKVHAKPYGGY--P LOUSS OUBY MH NYM KPX HZ OYK. UGX OHC PL PM LOY OUL GHMIKPXY YGHANO MH LYY PM? PZ LOY OUL GH IKPXY ZHK OYKLYSZ LOY TPNOM UMSYULM OUBY LHTY ZHK TE LURY! LOY TALM VY LOHCG MOUM MOY VSHWROYUX MOPGRLGHMOPGN HZ OYK UGX SHHRL HGSE UM VHAKPYGGY. GH, LOY OUL GH IKPXY... VAMP'SS SYM OYK LYY...."MOY HSX IKPGWY RGYC MOUM PZ OY MHSX OPL XUANOMYK LOY CUL TURPGN UTPLMURY UGX MOUM UGUMHSY TYUGM MH ZSPKM CPMO TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY,IKPGWYLL TUKE'L LYSZ-YLMYYT CHASX VY CHAGXYX UGX OPL IHPGM (GHM MHVY IUKMYX ZKHT OYK) CHASX VY NUPGYX, LH IUWPZEPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO MOPLMOHANOM, OY WUSSYX MPROHG UGX VYNUG MH AGXKYLL."COUM XYBPS VKHANOM MOYT OYKY?" MOHANOM OY, COPSY MPROHG CUL IAMMPGN MOYGPNOMLOPKM HBYK OPL XKPYX-AI HSX VHXE UGX NKUE-OUPKYX WOYLM. "P GYBYKPGBPMYX MOYT. MOYE WUTY MH XPLMAKV TE SPZY--UGX MOYKY PL GHM TAWO HZ PMSYZM.""XYBPS MURY 'YT!" OY TAMMYKYX, COPSY OPL OYUX CUL LMPSS WHBYKYX VE MOYLOPKM.MPROHG RGYC OPL TULMYK'L OUVPM HZ LHTYMPTYL MOPGRPGN USHAX, UGXMOYKYZHKY TYM CPMO AGUSMYKYX SHHRL MOY UGNKPSE PGJAPLPMPBY YDIKYLLPHG HZMOY ZUWY MOUM YTYKNYX ZKHT MOY LOPKM."NHGY MH VYX?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWY.MPROHG, SPRY USS NHHX BUSYML, PGLMPGWMPBYSE RGYC MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ OPLTULMYK'L MOHANOML. OY NAYLLYX MOUM MOY JAYLMPHG KYZYKKYX MH IKPGWYBULPSP UGX OPL LHG."MOYE OUBY NHGY MH VYX UGX IAM HAM MOYPK SPNOML, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE.""GH NHHX... GH NHHX..." LUPX MOY IKPGWY KUIPXSE, UGX MOKALMPGN OPL ZYYMPGMH OPL LSPIIYKL UGX OPL UKTL PGMH MOY LSYYBYL HZ OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG, OYCYGM MH MOY WHAWO HG COPWO OY LSYIM.MOHANO GH CHKXL OUX IULLYX VYMCYYG UGUMHSY UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY,MOYE JAPMY AGXYKLMHHX HGY UGHMOYK UL MH MOY ZPKLM IUKM HZ MOYPK KHTUGWY,AI MH MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZ MOY IUABKY TYKY; MOYE AGXYKLMHHX MOUM MOYE OUXTAWO MH LUE MH HGY UGHMOYK PG IKPBUMY UGX LH MOYE OUX VYYG LYYRPGN UGHIIHKMAGPME LPGWY THKGPGN MH TYYM HGY UGHMOYK USHGY. COYG IKPGWYLL TUKECYGM MH OYK ZUMOYK'L KHHT UM MOY ALAUS OHAK, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGXUGUMHSY TYM PG MOY WHGLYKBUMHKE.IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM MH MOY XHHK HZ MOY LMAXE CPMO LIYWPUS MKYIPXUMPHG.PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM GHM HGSE XPX YBYKEVHXE RGHC MOUM OYK ZUMY CHASX VYXYWPXYX MOUM XUE, VAM MOUM MOYE USLH RGYC COUM LOY MOHANOM UVHAM PM.LOY KYUX MOPL PG MPROHG'L ZUWY UGX PG MOUM HZ IKPGWY BULPSP'L BUSYM, COHTUXY OYK U SHC VHC COYG LOY TYM OPT PG MOY WHKKPXHK WUKKEPGN OHM CUMYK.MOY HSX IKPGWY CUL BYKE UZZYWMPHGUMY UGX WUKYZAS PG OPL MKYUMTYGM HZOPL XUANOMYK MOUM THKGPGN. IKPGWYLL TUKE CYSS RGYC MOPL IUPGLMURPGNYDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK ZUMOYK'L. OPL ZUWY CHKY MOUM YDIKYLLPHG COYG OPLXKE OUGXL WSYGWOYX CPMO BYDUMPHG UM OYK GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN U LAT PGUKPMOTYMPW, COYG KPLPGN ZKHT OPL WOUPK OY CHASX CUSR UCUE ZKHT OYK,KYIYUMPGN PG U SHC BHPWY MOY LUTY CHKXL LYBYKUS MPTYL HBYK.OY WUTY MH MOY IHPGM UM HGWY, MKYUMPGN OYK WYKYTHGPHALSE."P OUBY OUX U IKHIHLPMPHG TUXY TY WHGWYKGPGN EHA," OY LUPX CPMO UGAGGUMAKUS LTPSY. "P YDIYWM EHA OUBY NAYLLYX MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP OUL GHMWHTY UGX VKHANOM OPL IAIPS CPMO OPT" (ZHK LHTY KYULHG IKPGWY VHSRHGLRPKYZYKKYX MH UGUMHSY UL U "IAIPS") "ZHK MOY LURY HZ TE VYUAMPZAS YEYL.SULM GPNOM U IKHIHLPMPHG CUL TUXY TY HG EHAK UWWHAGM UGX, UL EHA RGHC TEIKPGWPISYL, P KYZYK PM MH EHA.""OHC UT P MH AGXYKLMUGX EHA, THG IYKY?" LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL, NKHCPGN IUSYUGX MOYG VSALOPGN."OHC AGXYKLMUGX TY!" WKPYX OYK ZUMOYK UGNKPSE. "IKPGWY BULPSP ZPGXL EHAMH OPL MULMY UL U XUANOMYK-PG-SUC UGX TURYL U IKHIHLUS MH EHA HG OPLIAIPS'L VYOUSZ. MOUM'L OHC PM'L MH VY AGXYKLMHHX! 'OHC AGXYKLMUGXPM'!... UGX P ULR EHA!""P XH GHM RGHC COUM EHA MOPGR, ZUMOYK," COPLIYKYX MOY IKPGWYLL."P? P? COUM HZ TY? SYUBY TY HAM HZ MOY JAYLMPHG. P'T GHM NHPGN MH NYMTUKKPYX. COUM UVHAM EHA? MOUM'L COUM P CUGM MH RGHC."MOY IKPGWYLL LUC MOUM OYK ZUMOYK KYNUKXYX MOY TUMMYK CPMO XPLUIIKHBUS,VAM UM MOUM THTYGM MOY MOHANOM HWWAKKYX MH OYK MOUM OYK ZUMY CHASX VYXYWPXYX GHC HK GYBYK. LOY SHCYKYX OYK YEYL LH UL GHM MH LYY MOY NUFYAGXYK COPWO LOY ZYSM MOUM LOY WHASX GHM MOPGR, VAM CHASX HGSE VY UVSY MHLAVTPM ZKHT OUVPM, UGX LOY LUPX: "P CPLO HGSE MH XH EHAK CPSS, VAM PZP OUX MH YDIKYLL TE HCG XYLPKY..." LOY OUX GH MPTY MH ZPGPLO. MOY HSXIKPGWY PGMYKKAIMYX OYK."MOUM'L UXTPKUVSY!" OY LOHAMYX. "OY CPSS MURY EHA CPMO EHAK XHCKE UGXMURY TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY PGMH MOY VUKNUPG. LOY'SS VY MOY CPZY, COPSYEHA..."MOY IKPGWY LMHIIYX. OY LUC MOY YZZYWM MOYLY CHKXL OUX IKHXAWYX HG OPLXUANOMYK. LOY SHCYKYX OYK OYUX UGX CUL KYUXE MH VAKLM PGMH MYUKL."GHC MOYG, GHC MOYG, P'T HGSE QHRPGN!" OY LUPX. "KYTYTVYK MOPL,IKPGWYLL, P OHSX MH MOY IKPGWPISY MOUM U TUPXYG OUL U ZASS KPNOM MHWOHHLY. P NPBY EHA ZKYYXHT. HGSE KYTYTVYK MOUM EHAK SPZY'L OUIIPGYLLXYIYGXL HG EHAK XYWPLPHG. GYBYK TPGX TY!""VAM P XH GHM RGHC, ZUMOYK!""MOYKY'L GH GYYX MH MUSR! OY KYWYPBYL OPL HKXYKL UGX CPSS TUKKE EHA HKUGEVHXE; VAM EHA UKY ZKYY MH WOHHLY.... NH MH EHAK KHHT, MOPGR PM HBYK,UGX WHTY VUWR PG UG OHAK UGX MYSS TY PG OPL IKYLYGWY: EYL HK GH. P RGHCEHA CPSS IKUE HBYK PM. CYSS, IKUE PZ EHA SPRY, VAM EHA OUX VYMMYK MOPGRPM HBYK. NH! EYL HK GH, EYL HK GH, EYL HK GH!" OY LMPSS LOHAMYX COYG MOYIKPGWYLL, UL PZ SHLM PG U ZHN, OUX USKYUXE LMUNNYKYX HAM HZ MOY LMAXE.OYK ZUMY CUL XYWPXYX UGX OUIIPSE XYWPXYX. VAM COUM OYK ZUMOYK OUX LUPXUVHAM TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CUL XKYUXZAS. PM CUL AGMKAY MH VY LAKY, VAMLMPSS PM CUL MYKKPVSY, UGX LOY WHASX GHM OYSI MOPGRPGN HZ PM. LOY CULNHPGN LMKUPNOM HG MOKHANO MOY WHGLYKBUMHKE, GYPMOYK LYYPGN GHK OYUKPGNUGEMOPGN, COYG LAXXYGSE MOY CYSS-RGHCG COPLIYKPGN HZ TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY UKHALYX OYK. LOY KUPLYX OYK YEYL, UGX MCH LMYIL UCUE LUCUGUMHSY YTVKUWPGN MOY ZKYGWOCHTUG UGX COPLIYKPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OYK. CPMOU OHKKPZPYX YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY, UGUMHSY SHHRYX UM IKPGWYLLTUKE, VAM XPX GHM UM HGWY MURY OPL UKT ZKHT MOY CUPLM HZ TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY COH OUX GHM EYM LYYG OYK."COH'L MOUM? COE? CUPM U THTYGM!" UGUMHSY'L ZUWY LYYTYX MH LUE. IKPGWYLLTUKE SHHRYX UM MOYT PG LPSYGWY. LOY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX PM. UM SULMTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY NUBY U LWKYUT UGX KUG UCUE. UGUMHSY VHCYX MHIKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO U NUE LTPSY, UL PZ PGBPMPGN OYK MH QHPG PG U SUANO UMMOPL LMKUGNY PGWPXYGM, UGX MOYG LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKL CYGM MH MOY XHHKMOUM SYX MH OPL HCG UIUKMTYGML.UG OHAK SUMYK, MPROHG WUTY MH WUSS IKPGWYLL TUKE MH MOY HSX IKPGWY;OY UXXYX MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP CUL USLH MOYKY. COYG MPROHG WUTY MH OYKIKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LPMMPGN HG MOY LHZU PG OYK KHHT, OHSXPGN MOY CYYIPGNTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY PG OYK UKTL UGX NYGMSE LMKHRPGN OYK OUPK. MOYIKPGWYLL' VYUAMPZAS YEYL CPMO USS MOYPK ZHKTYK WUST KUXPUGWY CYKYSHHRPGN CPMO MYGXYK UZZYWMPHG UGX IPME UM TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'LIKYMME ZUWY."GH, IKPGWYLL, P OUBY SHLM EHAK UZZYWMPHG ZHKYBYK!" LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY."COE? P SHBY EHA THKY MOUG YBYK," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, "UGX P CPSS MKE MHXH USS P WUG ZHK EHAK OUIIPGYLL.""VAM EHA XYLIPLY TY. EHA COH UKY LH IAKY WUG GYBYK AGXYKLMUGX VYPGN LHWUKKPYX UCUE VE IULLPHG. HO, HGSE TE IHHK THMOYK...""P JAPMY AGXYKLMUGX," UGLCYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, CPMO U LUX LTPSY. "WUSTEHAKLYSZ, TE XYUK. P CPSS NH MH TE ZUMOYK," LOY LUPX, UGX CYGM HAM.IKPGWY BULPSP, CPMO HGY SYN MOKHCG OPNO HBYK MOY HMOYK UGX U LGAZZVHD PGOPL OUGX, CUL LPMMPGN MOYKY CPMO U LTPSY HZ XYYI YTHMPHG HG OPL ZUWY,UL PZ LMPKKYX MH OPL OYUKM'L WHKY UGX OPTLYSZ KYNKYMMPGN UGX SUANOPGNUM OPL HCG LYGLPVPSPME, COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE YGMYKYX. OY OAKKPYXSE MHHR UIPGWO HZ LGAZZ."UO, TE XYUK, TE XYUK!" OY VYNUG, KPLPGN UGX MURPGN OYK VE VHMO OUGXL.MOYG, LPNOPGN, OY UXXYX: "TE LHG'L ZUMY PL PG EHAK OUGXL. XYWPXY, TEXYUK, NHHX, NYGMSY TUKPY, COHT P OUBY USCUEL SHBYX UL U XUANOMYK!"OY XKYC VUWR UGX U KYUS MYUK UIIYUKYX PG OPL YEY."ZK... ZK..." LGHKMYX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP. "MOY IKPGWY PL TURPGN UIKHIHLPMPHG MH EHA PG OPL IAIPS'L--P TYUG, OPL LHG'L--GUTY. XH EHACPLO HK GHM MH VY IKPGWY UGUMHSY RAKUNPG'L CPZY? KYISE: EYL HK GH," OYLOHAMYX, "UGX MOYG P LOUSS KYLYKBY MOY KPNOM MH LMUMY TE HIPGPHG USLH.EYL, TE HIPGPHG, UGX HGSE TE HIPGPHG," UXXYX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP, MAKGPGNMH IKPGWY BULPSP UGX UGLCYKPGN OPL PTISHKPGN SHHR. "EYL, HK GH?""TE XYLPKY PL GYBYK MH SYUBY EHA, ZUMOYK, GYBYK MH LYIUKUMY TE SPZYZKHT EHAKL. P XHG'M CPLO MH TUKKE," LOY UGLCYKYX IHLPMPBYSE, NSUGWPGN UMIKPGWY BULPSP UGX UM OYK ZUMOYK CPMO OYK VYUAMPZAS YEYL."OATVAN! GHGLYGLY! OATVAN, OATVAN, OATVAN!" WKPYX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP,ZKHCGPGN UGX MURPGN OPL XUANOMYK'L OUGX; OY XPX GHM RPLL OYK, VAM HGSEVYGXPGN OPL ZHKYOYUX MH OYKL QALM MHAWOYX PM, UGX IKYLLYX OYK OUGX LHMOUM LOY CPGWYX UGX AMMYKYX U WKE.IKPGWY BULPSP KHLY."TE XYUK, P TALM MYSS EHA MOUM MOPL PL U THTYGM P LOUSS GYBYK, GYBYKZHKNYM. VAM, TE XYUK, CPSS EHA GHM NPBY AL U SPMMSY OHIY HZ MHAWOPGNMOPL OYUKM, LH RPGX UGX NYGYKHAL? LUE 'IYKOUIL'... MOY ZAMAKY PL LHSHGN. LUE 'IYKOUIL.'""IKPGWY, COUM P OUBY LUPX PL USS MOYKY PL PG TE OYUKM. P MOUGR EHA ZHKMOY OHGHK, VAM P LOUSS GYBYK VY EHAK LHG'L CPZY.""CYSS, LH MOUM'L ZPGPLOYX, TE XYUK ZYSSHC! P UT BYKE NSUX MH OUBY LYYGEHA. BYKE NSUX! NH VUWR MH EHAK KHHTL, IKPGWYLL. NH!" LUPX MOY HSXIKPGWY. "BYKE, BYKE NSUX MH OUBY LYYG EHA," KYIYUMYX OY, YTVKUWPGNIKPGWY BULPSP."TE BHWUMPHG PL U XPZZYKYGM HGY," MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE. "TE BHWUMPHGPL MH VY OUIIE CPMO UGHMOYK RPGX HZ OUIIPGYLL, MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ SHBYUGX LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY. UGX WHLM COUM PM TUE, P CPSS UKKUGNY IHHK UTYSPY'LOUIIPGYLL, LOY SHBYL OPT LH IULLPHGUMYSE, UGX LH IULLPHGUMYSE KYIYGML. PCPSS XH USS P WUG MH UKKUGNY MOY TUMWO VYMCYYG MOYT. PZ OY PL GHM KPWO PCPSS NPBY OYK MOY TYUGL; P CPSS ULR TE ZUMOYK UGX UGXKYC. P LOUSS VY LHOUIIE COYG LOY PL OPL CPZY. LOY PL LH AGZHKMAGUMY, U LMKUGNYK, USHGY,OYSISYLL! UGX, HO NHX, OHC IULLPHGUMYSE LOY TALM SHBY OPT PZ LOY WHASXLH ZUK ZHKNYM OYKLYSZ! IYKOUIL P TPNOM OUBY XHGY MOY LUTY!..." MOHANOMIKPGWYLL TUKE.WOUIMYK BPPM CUL SHGN LPGWY MOY KHLMHBL OUX GYCL HZ GPWOHSUL. GHM MPSSTPXCPGMYK CUL MOY WHAGM UM SULM OUGXYX U SYMMYK UXXKYLLYX PG OPL LHG'LOUGXCKPMPGN. HG KYWYPBPGN PM, OY KUG HG MPIMHY MH OPL LMAXE PG USUKT UGXOULMY, MKEPGN MH YLWUIY GHMPWY, WSHLYX MOY XHHK, UGX VYNUG MH KYUX MOYSYMMYK.UGGU TPROUESHBGU, COH USCUEL RGYC YBYKEMOPGN MOUM IULLYX PG MOY OHALY,HG OYUKPGN HZ MOY UKKPBUS HZ MOY SYMMYK CYGM LHZMSE PGMH MOY KHHT UGXZHAGX MOY WHAGM CPMO PM PG OPL OUGX, LHVVPGN UGX SUANOPGN UM MOY LUTYMPTY.UGGU TPROUESHBGU, MOHANO OYK WPKWATLMUGWYL OUX PTIKHBYX, CUL LMPSSSPBPGN CPMO MOY KHLMHBL."TE XYUK ZKPYGX?" LUPX LOY, PG U MHGY HZ IUMOYMPW PGJAPKE, IKYIUKYX MHLETIUMOPFY PG UGE CUE.MOY WHAGM LHVVYX EYM THKY."GPRHSYGRU... U SYMMYK... CU... U... L... CHAGXYX... TE XUKSPGN VHE...MOY WHAGMYLL... IKHTHMYX MH VY UG HZZPWYK... MOUGR NHX... OHC MYSS MOYSPMMSY WHAGMYLL!"UGGU TPROUESHBGU LUM XHCG VYLPXY OPT, CPMO OYK HCG OUGXRYKWOPYZ CPIYXMOY MYUKL ZKHT OPL YEYL UGX ZKHT MOY SYMMYK, MOYG OUBPGN XKPYX OYKHCG YEYL LOY WHTZHKMYX MOY WHAGM, UGX XYWPXYX MOUM UM XPGGYK UGX MPSSMYUMPTY LOY CHASX IKYIUKY MOY WHAGMYLL, UGX UZMYK MYU, CPMO NHX'L OYSI,CHASX PGZHKT OYK.UM XPGGYK UGGU TPROUESHBGU MUSRYX MOY COHSY MPTY UVHAM MOY CUK GYCL UGXUVHAM GPRHSYGRU, MCPWY ULRYX COYG MOY SULM SYMMYK OUX VYYG KYWYPBYX ZKHTOPT, MOHANO LOY RGYC MOUM USKYUXE, UGX KYTUKRYX MOUM MOYE TPNOM BYKESPRYSE VY NYMMPGN U SYMMYK ZKHT OPT MOUM XUE. YUWO MPTY MOUM MOYLY OPGMLVYNUG MH TURY MOY WHAGMYLL UGDPHAL UGX LOY NSUGWYX AGYULPSE UM MOYWHAGM UGX UM UGGU TPROUESHBGU, MOY SUMMYK BYKE UXKHPMSE MAKGYX MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG MH PGLPNGPZPWUGM TUMMYKL. GUMULOU, COH, HZ MOY COHSYZUTPSE, CUL MOY THLM NPZMYX CPMO U WUIUWPME MH ZYYS UGE LOUXYL HZPGMHGUMPHG, SHHR, UGX YDIKYLLPHG, IKPWRYX AI OYK YUKL ZKHT MOY VYNPGGPGNHZ MOY TYUS UGX CUL WYKMUPG MOUM MOYKY CUL LHTY LYWKYM VYMCYYG OYKZUMOYK UGX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, MOUM PM OUX LHTYMOPGN MH XH CPMO OYKVKHMOYK, UGX MOUM UGGU TPROUESHBGU CUL IKYIUKPGN MOYT ZHK PM. VHSX ULLOY CUL, GUMULOU, COH RGYC OHC LYGLPMPBY OYK THMOYK CUL MH UGEMOPGNKYSUMPGN MH GPRHSYGRU, XPX GHM BYGMAKY MH ULR UGE JAYLMPHGL UM XPGGYK,VAM LOY CUL MHH YDWPMYX MH YUM UGEMOPGN UGX RYIM CKPNNSPGN UVHAM HG OYKWOUPK KYNUKXSYLL HZ OYK NHBYKGYLL' KYTUKRL. UZMYK XPGGYK, LOY KALOYXOYUX SHGN UZMYK UGGU TPROUESHBGU UGX, XULOPGN UM OYK, ZSAGN OYKLYSZ HGOYK GYWR UL LHHG UL LOY HBYKMHHR OYK PG MOY LPMMPGN KHHT."UAGMPY, XUKSPGN, XH MYSS TY COUM PM PL!""GHMOPGN, TE XYUK.""GH, XYUKYLM, LCYYM HGY, OHGYE, P CHG'M NPBY AI--P RGHC EHA RGHCLHTYMOPGN."UGGU TPROUESHBGU LOHHR OYK OYUX."EHA UKY U SPMMSY LSEVHHML," LOY LUPX."U SYMMYK ZKHT GPRHSYGRU! P'T LAKY HZ PM!" YDWSUPTYX GUMULOU, KYUXPGNWHGZPKTUMPHG PG UGGU TPROUESHBGU'L ZUWY."VAM ZHK NHX'L LURY, VY WUKYZAS, EHA RGHC OHC PM TUE UZZYWM EHAK TUTTU.""P CPSS, P CPSS, HGSE MYSS TY! EHA CHG'M? MOYG P CPSS NH UGX MYSS UMHGWY."UGGU TPROUESHBGU, PG U ZYC CHKXL, MHSX OYK MOY WHGMYGML HZ MOY SYMMYK,HG WHGXPMPHG MOUM LOY LOHASX MYSS GH HGY."GH, HG TE MKAY CHKX HZ OHGHK," LUPX GUMULOU, WKHLLPGN OYKLYSZ, "P CHG'MMYSS UGEHGY!" UGX LOY KUG HZZ UM HGWY MH LHGEU."GPRHSYGRU... CHAGXYX... U SYMMYK," LOY UGGHAGWYX PG NSYYZAS MKPATIO."GPWOHSUL!" CUL USS LHGEU LUPX, PGLMUGMSE MAKGPGN COPMY.GUMULOU, LYYPGN MOY PTIKYLLPHG MOY GYCL HZ OYK VKHMOYK'L CHAGX IKHXAWYXHG LHGEU, ZYSM ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOY LHKKHCZAS LPXY HZ MOY GYCL.LOY KALOYX MH LHGEU, OANNYX OYK, UGX VYNUG MH WKE."U SPMMSY CHAGX, VAM OY OUL VYYG TUXY UG HZZPWYK; OY PL CYSS GHC, OYCKHMY OPTLYSZ," LUPX LOY MOKHANO OYK MYUKL."MOYKY GHC! PM'L MKAY MOUM USS EHA CHTYG UKY WKEVUVPYL," KYTUKRYX IYMEU,IUWPGN MOY KHHT CPMO SUKNY, KYLHSAMY LMKPXYL. "GHC P'T BYKE NSUX, BYKENSUX PGXYYX, MOUM TE VKHMOYK OUL XPLMPGNAPLOYX OPTLYSZ LH. EHA UKY USSVSAVVYKYKL UGX AGXYKLMUGX GHMOPGN."GUMULOU LTPSYX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL."EHA OUBYG'M KYUX MOY SYMMYK?" ULRYX LHGEU."GH, VAM LOY LUPX MOUM PM CUL USS HBYK UGX MOUM OY'L GHC UG HZZPWYK.""MOUGR NHX!" LUPX LHGEU, WKHLLPGN OYKLYSZ. "VAM IYKOUIL LOY XYWYPBYXEHA. SYM AL NH MH TUTTU."IYMEU IUWYX MOY KHHT PG LPSYGWY ZHK U MPTY."PZ P'X VYYG PG GPRHSYGRU'L ISUWY P CHASX OUBY RPSSYX YBYG THKY HZ MOHLYZKYGWOTYG," OY LUPX. "COUM GULME VKAMYL MOYE UKY! P'X OUBY RPSSYX LHTUGE MOUM MOYKY'X OUBY VYYG U OYUI HZ MOYT.""OHSX EHAK MHGNAY, IYMEU, COUM U NHHLY EHA UKY!""P'T GHM U NHHLY, VAM MOYE UKY COH WKE UVHAM MKPZSYL," LUPX IYMEU."XH EHA KYTYTVYK OPT?" GUMULOU LAXXYGSE ULRYX, UZMYK U THTYGM'L LPSYGWY.LHGEU LTPSYX."XH P KYTYTVYK GPWOHSUL?""GH, LHGEU, VAM XH EHA KYTYTVYK LH MOUM EHA KYTYTVYK OPT IYKZYWMSE,KYTYTVYK YBYKEMOPGN?" LUPX GUMULOU, CPMO UG YDIKYLLPBY NYLMAKY,YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH NPBY OYK CHKXL U BYKE XYZPGPMY TYUGPGN. "P KYTYTVYKGPRHSYGRU MHH, P KYTYTVYK OPT CYSS," LOY LUPX. "VAM P XHG'M KYTYTVYKVHKPL. P XHG'M KYTYTVYK OPT U VPM.""COUM! EHA XHG'M KYTYTVYK VHKPL?" ULRYX LHGEU PG LAKIKPLY."PM'L GHM MOUM P XHG'M KYTYTVYK--P RGHC COUM OY PL SPRY, VAM GHM UL PKYTYTVYK GPRHSYGRU. OPT--P QALM LOAM TE YEYL UGX KYTYTVYK, VAM VHKPL...GH!" (LOY LOAM OYK YEYL.) "GH! MOYKY'L GHMOPGN UM USS.""HO, GUMULOU!" LUPX LHGEU, SHHRPGN YWLMUMPWUSSE UGX YUKGYLMSE UM OYKZKPYGX UL PZ LOY XPX GHM WHGLPXYK OYK CHKMOE MH OYUK COUM LOY TYUGM MHLUE UGX UL PZ LOY CYKY LUEPGN PM MH LHTYHGY YSLY, CPMO COHT QHRPGN CULHAM HZ MOY JAYLMPHG, "P UT PG SHBY CPMO EHAK VKHMOYK HGWY ZHK USS UGX,COUMYBYK TUE OUIIYG MH OPT HK MH TY, LOUSS GYBYK WYULY MH SHBY OPT ULSHGN UL P SPBY."GUMULOU SHHRYX UM LHGEU CPMO CHGXYKPGN UGX PGJAPLPMPBY YEYL, UGX LUPXGHMOPGN. LOY ZYSM MOUM LHGEU CUL LIYURPGN MOY MKAMO, MOUM MOYKY CUL LAWOSHBY UL LHGEU CUL LIYURPGN HZ. VAM GUMULOU OUX GHM EYM ZYSM UGEMOPGNSPRY PM. LOY VYSPYBYX PM WHASX VY, VAM XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX PM."LOUSS EHA CKPMY MH OPT?" LOY ULRYX.LHGEU VYWUTY MOHANOMZAS. MOY JAYLMPHG HZ OHC MH CKPMY MH GPWOHSUL, UGXCOYMOYK LOY HANOM MH CKPMY, MHKTYGMYX OYK. GHC MOUM OY CUL USKYUXE UGHZZPWYK UGX U CHAGXYX OYKH, CHASX PM VY KPNOM MH KYTPGX OPT HZ OYKLYSZUGX, UL PM TPNOM LYYT, HZ MOY HVSPNUMPHGL MH OYK OY OUX MURYG HGOPTLYSZ?"P XHG'M RGHC. P MOPGR PZ OY CKPMYL, P CPSS CKPMY MHH," LOY LUPX,VSALOPGN."UGX EHA CHG'M ZYYS ULOUTYX MH CKPMY MH OPT?"LHGEU LTPSYX."GH.""UGX P LOHASX VY ULOUTYX MH CKPMY MH VHKPL. P'T GHM NHPGN MH.""COE LOHASX EHA VY ULOUTYX?""CYSS, P XHG'M RGHC. PM'L UCRCUKX UGX CHASX TURY TY ULOUTYX.""UGX P RGHC COE LOY'X VY ULOUTYX," LUPX IYMEU, HZZYGXYX VE GUMULOU'LIKYBPHAL KYTUKR. "PM'L VYWUALY LOY CUL PG SHBY CPMO MOUM ZUM HGY PGLIYWMUWSYL" (MOUM CUL OHC IYMEU XYLWKPVYX OPL GUTYLURY, MOY GYC WHAGMVYFAROHB) "UGX GHC LOY'L PG SHBY CPMO MOUM LPGNYK" (OY TYUGM GUMULOU'LPMUSPUG LPGNPGN TULMYK), "MOUM'L COE LOY'L ULOUTYX!""IYMEU, EHA'KY U LMAIPX!" LUPX GUMULOU."GHM THKY LMAIPX MOUG EHA, TUXUT," LUPX MOY GPGY-EYUK-HSX IYMEU, CPMOMOY UPK HZ UG HSX VKPNUXPYK.MOY WHAGMYLL OUX VYYG IKYIUKYX VE UGGU TPROUESHBGU'L OPGML UM XPGGYK.HG KYMPKPGN MH OYK HCG KHHT, LOY LUM PG UG UKTWOUPK, OYK YEYL ZPDYX HG UTPGPUMAKY IHKMKUPM HZ OYK LHG HG MOY SPX HZ U LGAZZVHD, COPSY MOY MYUKLRYIM WHTPGN PGMH OYK YEYL. UGGU TPROUESHBGU, CPMO MOY SYMMYK, WUTY HGMPIMHY MH MOY WHAGMYLL' XHHK UGX IUALYX."XHG'M WHTY PG," LOY LUPX MH MOY HSX WHAGM COH CUL ZHSSHCPGN OYK. "WHTYSUMYK." UGX LOY CYGM PG, WSHLPGN MOY XHHK VYOPGX OYK.MOY WHAGM IAM OPL YUK MH MOY RYEOHSY UGX SPLMYGYX.UM ZPKLM OY OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ PGXPZZYKYGM BHPWYL, MOYG UGGUTPROUESHBGU'L BHPWY USHGY PG U SHGN LIYYWO, MOYG U WKE, MOYG LPSYGWY,MOYG VHMO BHPWYL MHNYMOYK CPMO NSUX PGMHGUMPHGL, UGX MOYG ZHHMLMYIL.UGGU TPROUESHBGU HIYGYX MOY XHHK. OYK ZUWY CHKY MOY IKHAX YDIKYLLPHG HZU LAKNYHG COH OUL QALM IYKZHKTYX U XPZZPWASM HIYKUMPHG UGX UXTPML MOYIAVSPW MH UIIKYWPUMY OPL LRPSS."PM PL XHGY!" LOY LUPX MH MOY WHAGM, IHPGMPGN MKPATIOUGMSE MH MOYWHAGMYLL, COH LUM OHSXPGN PG HGY OUGX MOY LGAZZVHD CPMO PML IHKMKUPM UGXPG MOY HMOYK MOY SYMMYK, UGX IKYLLPGN MOYT USMYKGUMYSE MH OYK SPIL.COYG LOY LUC MOY WHAGM, LOY LMKYMWOYX HAM OYK UKTL MH OPT, YTVKUWYX OPLVUSX OYUX, HBYK COPWO LOY UNUPG SHHRYX UM MOY SYMMYK UGX MOY IHKMKUPM,UGX PG HKXYK MH IKYLL MOYT UNUPG MH OYK SPIL, LOY LSPNOMSE IALOYX UCUEMOY VUSX OYUX. BYKU, GUMULOU, LHGEU, UGX IYMEU GHC YGMYKYX MOY KHHT,UGX MOY KYUXPGN HZ MOY SYMMYK VYNUG. UZMYK U VKPYZ XYLWKPIMPHG HZMOY WUTIUPNG UGX MOY MCH VUMMSYL PG COPWO OY OUX MURYG IUKM, UGX OPLIKHTHMPHG, GPWOHSUL LUPX MOUM OY RPLLYX OPL ZUMOYK'L UGX THMOYK'L OUGXLULRPGN ZHK MOYPK VSYLLPGN, UGX MOUM OY RPLLYX BYKU, GUMULOU, UGX IYMEU.VYLPXYL MOUM, OY LYGM NKYYMPGNL MH THGLPYAK LWOYSSPGN, TUXUTY LWOHLL,UGX OPL HSX GAKLY, UGX ULRYX MOYT MH RPLL ZHK OPT "XYUK LHGEU, COHT OYSHBYX UGX MOHANOM HZ QALM MOY LUTY UL YBYK." COYG LOY OYUKX MOPL LHGEUVSALOYX LH MOUM MYUKL WUTY PGMH OYK YEYL UGX, AGUVSY MH VYUK MOY SHHRLMAKGYX AIHG OYK, KUG UCUE PGMH MOY XUGWPGN OUSS, COPKSYX KHAGX PM UMZASS LIYYX CPMO OYK XKYLL IAZZYX HAM SPRY U VUSSHHG, UGX, ZSALOYX UGXLTPSPGN, ISATIYX XHCG HG MOY ZSHHK. MOY WHAGMYLL CUL WKEPGN."COE UKY EHA WKEPGN, TUTTU?" ULRYX BYKU. "ZKHT USS OY LUEL HGY LOHASX VYNSUX UGX GHM WKE."MOPL CUL JAPMY MKAY, VAM MOY WHAGM, MOY WHAGMYLL, UGX GUMULOU SHHRYXUM OYK KYIKHUWOZASSE. "UGX COH PL PM LOY MURYL UZMYK?" MOHANOM MOYWHAGMYLL.GPWOHSUL' SYMMYK CUL KYUX HBYK OAGXKYXL HZ MPTYL, UGX MOHLY COH CYKYWHGLPXYKYX CHKMOE MH OYUK PM OUX MH WHTY MH MOY WHAGMYLL, ZHK LOYXPX GHM SYM PM HAM HZ OYK OUGXL. MOY MAMHKL WUTY, UGX MOY GAKLYL, UGXXTPMKP, UGX LYBYKUS UWJAUPGMUGWYL, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL KYKYUX MOY SYMMYKYUWO MPTY CPMO ZKYLO ISYULAKY UGX YUWO MPTY XPLWHBYKYX PG PM ZKYLOIKHHZL HZ GPRHSYGRU'L BPKMAYL. OHC LMKUGNY, OHC YDMKUHKXPGUKE, OHCQHEZAS PM LYYTYX, MOUM OYK LHG, MOY LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY THMPHG HZ COHLYMPGE SPTVL LOY OUX ZYSM MCYGME EYUKL UNH CPMOPG OYK, MOUM LHG UVHAM COHTLOY ALYX MH OUBY JAUKKYSL CPMO MOY MHH PGXASNYGM WHAGM, MOUM LHG COH OUXZPKLM SYUKGYX MH LUE "IYUK" UGX MOYG "NKUGGE," MOUM MOPL LHG LOHASX GHCVY UCUE PG U ZHKYPNG SUGX UTPX LMKUGNY LAKKHAGXPGNL, U TUGSE CUKKPHKXHPGN LHTY RPGX HZ TUG'L CHKR HZ OPL HCG, CPMOHAM OYSI HK NAPXUGWY.MOY AGPBYKLUS YDIYKPYGWY HZ UNYL, LOHCPGN MOUM WOPSXKYG XH NKHCPTIYKWYIMPVSE ZKHT MOY WKUXSY MH TUGOHHX, XPX GHM YDPLM ZHK MOYWHAGMYLL. OYK LHG'L NKHCMO MHCUKX TUGOHHX, UM YUWO HZ PML LMUNYL,OUX LYYTYX UL YDMKUHKXPGUKE MH OYK UL PZ MOYKY OUX GYBYK YDPLMYX MOYTPSSPHGL HZ OATUG VYPGNL COH NKYC AI PG MOY LUTY CUE. UL MCYGMEEYUKL VYZHKY, PM LYYTYX PTIHLLPVSY MOUM MOY SPMMSY WKYUMAKY COH SPBYXLHTYCOYKY AGXYK OYK OYUKM CHASX YBYK WKE, LAWR OYK VKYULM, UGX VYNPG MHLIYUR, LH GHC LOY WHASX GHM VYSPYBY MOUM MOUM SPMMSY WKYUMAKY WHASX VYMOPL LMKHGN, VKUBY TUG, MOPL THXYS LHG UGX HZZPWYK MOUM, QAXNPGN VE MOPLSYMMYK, OY GHC CUL."COUM U LMESY! OHC WOUKTPGNSE OY XYLWKPVYL!" LUPX LOY, KYUXPGN MOYXYLWKPIMPBY IUKM HZ MOY SYMMYK. "UGX COUM U LHAS! GHM U CHKX UVHAMOPTLYSZ.... GHM U CHKX! UVHAM LHTY XYGPLHB HK HMOYK, MOHANO OY OPTLYSZ,P XUKY LUE, PL VKUBYK MOUG UGE HZ MOYT. OY LUEL GHMOPGN UVHAM OPLLAZZYKPGNL. COUM U OYUKM! OHC SPRY OPT PM PL! UGX OHC OY OUL KYTYTVYKYXYBYKEVHXE! GHM ZHKNYMMPGN UGEHGY. P USCUEL LUPX COYG OY CUL HGSE LHOPNO--P USCUEL LUPX...."ZHK THKY MOUG U CYYR IKYIUKUMPHGL CYKY VYPGN TUXY, KHANO XKUZML HZSYMMYKL MH GPWOHSUL ZKHT USS MOY OHALYOHSX CYKY CKPMMYG UGX WHIPYX HAM,COPSY AGXYK MOY LAIYKBPLPHG HZ MOY WHAGMYLL UGX MOY LHSPWPMAXY HZ MOYWHAGM, THGYE UGX USS MOPGNL GYWYLLUKE ZHK MOY AGPZHKT UGX YJAPITYGMHZ MOY GYCSE WHTTPLLPHGYX HZZPWYK CYKY WHSSYWMYX. UGGU TPROUESHBGU,IKUWMPWUS CHTUG MOUM LOY CUL, OUX YBYG TUGUNYX VE ZUBHK CPMO UKTEUAMOHKPMPYL MH LYWAKY UXBUGMUNYHAL TYUGL HZ WHTTAGPWUMPHG ZHK OYKLYSZUGX OYK LHG. LOY OUX HIIHKMAGPMPYL HZ LYGXPGN OYK SYMMYKL MH MOY NKUGXXARY WHGLMUGMPGY IUBSHBPWO, COH WHTTUGXYX MOY NAUKXL. MOY KHLMHBLLAIIHLYX MOUM MOY KALLPUG NAUKXL, UVKHUX, CUL JAPMY U XYZPGPMY UXXKYLL,UGX MOUM PZ U SYMMYK KYUWOYX MOY NKUGX XARY PG WHTTUGX HZ MOY NAUKXLMOYKY CUL GH KYULHG COE PM LOHASX GHM KYUWO MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM,COPWO CUL IKYLATUVSE LHTYCOYKY PG MOY LUTY GYPNOVHKOHHX. UGX LH PM CULXYWPXYX MH LYGX MOY SYMMYKL UGX THGYE VE MOY NKUGX XARY'L WHAKPYK MHVHKPL UGX VHKPL CUL MH ZHKCUKX MOYT MH GPWOHSUL. MOY SYMMYKL CYKYZKHT MOY HSX WHAGM, MOY WHAGMYLL, IYMEU, BYKU, GUMULOU, UGX LHGEU, UGXZPGUSSE MOYKY CYKY LPD MOHALUGX KAVSYL ZHK OPL HAMZPM UGX BUKPHAL HMOYKMOPGNL MOY HSX WHAGM LYGM MH OPL LHG.WOUIMYK BPPHG MOY MCYSZMO HZ GHBYTVYK, RAMAFHB'L UWMPBY UKTE, PG WUTI VYZHKYHSTAMF, CUL IKYIUKPGN MH VY KYBPYCYX GYDM XUE VE MOY MCH YTIYKHKL--MOYKALLPUG UGX MOY UALMKPUG. MOY NAUKXL, QALM UKKPBYX ZKHT KALLPU, LIYGMMOY GPNOM MYG TPSYL ZKHT HSTAMF UGX GYDM THKGPGN CYKY MH WHTY LMKUPNOMMH MOY KYBPYC, KYUWOPGN MOY ZPYSX UM HSTAMF VE MYG H'WSHWR.MOUM XUE GPWOHSUL KHLMHB KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHT VHKPL, MYSSPGN OPT MOUMMOY PLTUESHB KYNPTYGM CUL JAUKMYKYX ZHK MOY GPNOM MYG TPSYL ZKHT HSTAMFUGX MOUM OY CUGMYX MH LYY OPT UL OY OUX U SYMMYK UGX THGYE ZHK OPT.KHLMHB CUL IUKMPWASUKSE PG GYYX HZ THGYE GHC MOUM MOY MKHHIL, UZMYKMOYPK UWMPBY LYKBPWY, CYKY LMUMPHGYX GYUK HSTAMF UGX MOY WUTI LCUKTYXCPMO CYSS-IKHBPLPHGYX LAMSYKL UGX UALMKPUG QYCL HZZYKPGN USS LHKMLHZ MYTIMPGN CUKYL. MOY IUBSHNKUXL OYSX ZYULM UZMYK ZYULM, WYSYVKUMPGNUCUKXL MOYE OUX KYWYPBYX ZHK MOY WUTIUPNG, UGX TUXY YDIYXPMPHGL MHHSTAMF MH BPLPM U WYKMUPG WUKHSPGY MOY OAGNUKPUG, COH OUX KYWYGMSEHIYGYX U KYLMUAKUGM MOYKY CPMO NPKSL UL CUPMKYLLYL. KHLMHB, COH OUXQALM WYSYVKUMYX OPL IKHTHMPHG MH U WHKGYMWE UGX VHANOM XYGPLHB'L OHKLY,VYXHAPG, CUL PG XYVM USS KHAGX, MH OPL WHTKUXYL UGX MOY LAMSYKL. HGKYWYPBPGN VHKPL' SYMMYK OY KHXY CPMO U ZYSSHC HZZPWYK MH HSTAMF, XPGYXMOYKY, XKUGR U VHMMSY HZ CPGY, UGX MOYG LYM HZZ USHGY MH MOY NAUKXL'WUTI MH ZPGX OPL HSX ISUETUMY. KHLMHB OUX GHM EYM OUX MPTY MH NYM OPLAGPZHKT. OY OUX HG U LOUVVE WUXYM QUWRYM, XYWHKUMYX CPMO U LHSXPYK'LWKHLL, YJAUSSE LOUVVE WUXYM'L KPXPGN VKYYWOYL SPGYX CPMO CHKG SYUMOYK,UGX UG HZZPWYK'L LUVYK CPMO U LCHKX RGHM. MOY XHG OHKLY OY CUL KPXPGNCUL HGY OY OUX VHANOM ZKHT U WHLLUWR XAKPGN MOY WUTIUPNG, UGX OY CHKY UWKATISYX OALLUK WUI LMAWR QUAGMPSE VUWR HG HGY LPXY HZ OPL OYUX. UL OYKHXY AI MH MOY WUTI OY MOHANOM OHC OY CHASX PTIKYLL VHKPL UGX USS OPLWHTKUXYL HZ MOY NAUKXL VE OPL UIIYUKUGWY--MOUM HZ U ZPNOMPGN OALLUK COHOUX VYYG AGXYK ZPKY.MOY NAUKXL OUX TUXY MOYPK COHSY TUKWO UL PZ HG U ISYULAKY MKPI, IUKUXPGNMOYPK WSYUGSPGYLL UGX XPLWPISPGY. MOYE OUX WHTY VE YULE LMUNYL, MOYPKRGUILUWRL WHGBYEYX HG WUKML, UGX MOY UALMKPUG UAMOHKPMPYL OUX IKHBPXYXYDWYSSYGM XPGGYKL ZHK MOY HZZPWYKL UM YBYKE OUSMPGN ISUWY. MOY KYNPTYGMLOUX YGMYKYX UGX SYZM MOY MHCG CPMO MOYPK VUGXL ISUEPGN, UGX VE MOY NKUGXXARY'L HKXYKL MOY TYG OUX TUKWOYX USS MOY CUE PG LMYI (U IKUWMPWY HGCOPWO MOY NAUKXL IKPXYX MOYTLYSBYL), MOY HZZPWYKL HG ZHHM UGX UM MOYPKIKHIYK IHLML. VHKPL OUX VYYG JAUKMYKYX, UGX OUX TUKWOYX USS MOY CUE,CPMO VYKN COH CUL USKYUXE PG WHTTUGX HZ U WHTIUGE. VYKN, COH OUXHVMUPGYX OPL WUIMUPGWE XAKPGN MOY WUTIUPNG, OUX NUPGYX MOY WHGZPXYGWY HZOPL LAIYKPHKL VE OPL IKHTIMPMAXY UGX UWWAKUWE UGX OUX UKKUGNYX OPL THGYETUMMYKL BYKE LUMPLZUWMHKPSE. VHKPL, XAKPGN MOY WUTIUPNG, OUX TUXY MOYUWJAUPGMUGWY HZ TUGE IYKLHGL COH TPNOM IKHBY ALYZAS MH OPT, UGX VEU SYMMYK HZ KYWHTTYGXUMPHG OY OUX VKHANOM ZKHT IPYKKY OUX VYWHTYUWJAUPGMYX CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC VHSRHGLRP, MOKHANO COHT OY OHIYX MH HVMUPGU IHLM HG MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L LMUZZ. VYKN UGX VHKPL, OUBPGN KYLMYXUZMYK EYLMYKXUE'L TUKWO, CYKY LPMMPGN, WSYUG UGX GYUMSE XKYLLYX, UM UKHAGX MUVSY PG MOY WSYUG JAUKMYKL USSHMMYX MH MOYT, ISUEPGN WOYLL.VYKN OYSX U LTHRPGN IPIY VYMCYYG OPL RGYYL. VHKPL, PG MOY UWWAKUMY CUEWOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ OPT, CUL VAPSXPGN U SPMMSY IEKUTPX HZ WOYLLTYG CPMOOPL XYSPWUMY COPMY ZPGNYKL COPSY UCUPMPGN VYKN'L THBY, UGX CUMWOYX OPLHIIHGYGM'L ZUWY, YBPXYGMSE MOPGRPGN UVHAM MOY NUTY UL OY USCUEL MOHANOMHGSE HZ COUMYBYK OY CUL YGNUNYX HG."CYSS, OHC UKY EHA NHPGN MH NYM HAM HZ MOUM?" OY KYTUKRYX."CY'SS MKE MH," KYISPYX VYKN, MHAWOPGN U IUCG UGX MOYG KYTHBPGN OPLOUGX.UM MOUM THTYGM MOY XHHK HIYGYX."OYKY OY PL UM SULM!" LOHAMYX KHLMHB. "UGX VYKN MHH! HO, EHAIYMPLYGZUGL, USSUE WALOUE XHKTPK!" OY YDWSUPTYX, PTPMUMPGN OPL KALLPUGGAKLY'L ZKYGWO, UM COPWO OY UGX VHKPL ALYX MH SUANO SHGN UNH."XYUK TY, OHC EHA OUBY WOUGNYX!"VHKPL KHLY MH TYYM KHLMHB, VAM PG XHPGN LH XPX GHM HTPM MH LMYUXE UGXKYISUWY LHTY WOYLLTYG MOUM CYKY ZUSSPGN. OY CUL UVHAM MH YTVKUWY OPLZKPYGX, VAM GPWOHSUL UBHPXYX OPT. CPMO MOUM IYWASPUK ZYYSPGN HZ EHAMO,MOUM XKYUX HZ VYUMYG MKUWRL, UGX CPLO MH YDIKYLL PMLYSZ PG U TUGGYKXPZZYKYGM ZKHT MOUM HZ PML YSXYKL COPWO PL HZMYG PGLPGWYKY, GPWOHSULCPLOYX MH XH LHTYMOPGN LIYWPUS HG TYYMPGN OPL ZKPYGX. OY CUGMYX MH IPGWOOPT, IALO OPT, XH UGEMOPGN VAM RPLL OPT--U MOPGN YBYKEVHXE XPX. VAMGHMCPMOLMUGXPGN MOPL, VHKPL YTVKUWYX OPT PG U JAPYM, ZKPYGXSE CUE UGXRPLLYX OPT MOKYY MPTYL.MOYE OUX GHM TYM ZHK GYUKSE OUSZ U EYUK UGX, VYPGN UM MOY UNY COYG EHAGNTYG MURY MOYPK ZPKLM LMYIL HG SPZY'L KHUX, YUWO LUC PTTYGLY WOUGNYL PGMOY HMOYK, JAPMY U GYC KYZSYWMPHG HZ MOY LHWPYME PG COPWO MOYE OUX MURYGMOHLY ZPKLM LMYIL. VHMO OUX WOUGNYX NKYUMSE LPGWY MOYE SULM TYM UGX VHMOCYKY PG U OAKKE MH LOHC MOY WOUGNYL MOUM OUX MURYG ISUWY PG MOYT."HO, EHA XUTGYX XUGXPYL! WSYUG UGX ZKYLO UL PZ EHA'X VYYG MH U ZYMY,GHM SPRY AL LPGGYKL HZ MOY SPGY," WKPYX KHLMHB, CPMO TUKMPUS LCUNNYKUGX CPMO VUKPMHGY GHMYL PG OPL BHPWY, GYC MH VHKPL, IHPGMPGN MH OPL HCGTAX-VYLIUMMYKYX VKYYWOYL. MOY NYKTUG SUGXSUXE, OYUKPGN KHLMHB'L SHAXBHPWY, IHIIYX OYK OYUX PG UM MOY XHHK."YO, PL LOY IKYMME?" OY ULRYX CPMO U CPGR."COE XH EHA LOHAM LH? EHA'SS ZKPNOMYG MOYT!" LUPX VHKPL. "P XPX GHMYDIYWM EHA MHXUE," OY UXXYX. "P HGSE LYGM EHA MOY GHMY EYLMYKXUE VEVHSRHGLRP--UG UXQAMUGM HZ RAMAFHB'L, COH'L U ZKPYGX HZ TPGY. P XPX GHMMOPGR OY CHASX NYM PM MH EHA LH JAPWRSE.... CYSS, OHC UKY EHA? VYYGAGXYK ZPKY USKYUXE?" ULRYX VHKPL.CPMOHAM UGLCYKPGN, KHLMHB LOHHR MOY LHSXPYK'L WKHLL HZ LM. NYHKNYZULMYGYX MH MOY WHKXPGN HZ OPL AGPZHKT UGX, PGXPWUMPGN U VUGXUNYX UKT,NSUGWYX UM VYKN CPMO U LTPSY."UL EHA LYY," OY LUPX."PGXYYX? EYL, EYL!" LUPX VHKPL, CPMO U LTPSY. "UGX CY MHH OUBY OUX ULISYGXPX TUKWO. EHA RGHC, HZ WHAKLY, MOUM OPL PTIYKPUS OPNOGYLL KHXYCPMO HAK KYNPTYGM USS MOY MPTY, LH MOUM CY OUX YBYKE WHTZHKM UGX YBYKEUXBUGMUNY. COUM KYWYIMPHGL CY OUX PG IHSUGX! COUM XPGGYKL UGX VUSSL!P WUG'M MYSS EHA. UGX MOY MLUKYBPWO CUL BYKE NKUWPHAL MH USS HAKHZZPWYKL."UGX MOY MCH ZKPYGXL MHSX YUWO HMOYK HZ MOYPK XHPGNL, MOY HGY HZ OPLOALLUK KYBYSL UGX SPZY PG MOY ZPNOMPGN SPGY, MOY HMOYK HZ MOY ISYULAKYLUGX UXBUGMUNYL HZ LYKBPWY AGXYK TYTVYKL HZ MOY PTIYKPUS ZUTPSE."HO, EHA NAUKXL!" LUPX KHLMHB. "P LUE, LYGX ZHK LHTY CPGY."VHKPL TUXY U NKPTUWY."PZ EHA KYUSSE CUGM PM," LUPX OY.OY CYGM MH OPL VYX, XKYC U IAKLY ZKHT AGXYK MOY WSYUG IPSSHC, UGX LYGMZHK CPGY."EYL, UGX P OUBY LHTY THGYE UGX U SYMMYK MH NPBY EHA," OY UXXYX.KHLMHB MHHR MOY SYMMYK UGX, MOKHCPGN MOY THGYE HG MOY LHZU, IAM VHMOUKTL HG MOY MUVSY UGX VYNUG MH KYUX. UZMYK KYUXPGN U ZYC SPGYL, OYNSUGWYX UGNKPSE UM VYKN, MOYG, TYYMPGN OPL YEYL, OPX OPL ZUWY VYOPGX MOYSYMMYK."CYSS, MOYE'BY LYGM EHA U MPXE LAT," LUPX VYKN, YEPGN MOY OYUBE IAKLYMOUM LUGR PGMH MOY LHZU. "UL ZHK AL, WHAGM, CY NYM USHGN HG HAK IUE. PWUG MYSS EHA ZHK TELYSZ...""P LUE, VYKN, TE XYUK ZYSSHC," LUPX KHLMHB, "COYG EHA NYM U SYMMYK ZKHTOHTY UGX TYYM HGY HZ EHAK HCG IYHISY COHT EHA CUGM MH MUSR YBYKEMOPGNHBYK CPMO, UGX P OUIIYG MH VY MOYKY, P'SS NH UM HGWY, MH VY HAM HZEHAK CUE! XH NH LHTYCOYKY, UGECOYKY... MH MOY XYBPS!" OY YDWSUPTYX, UGXPTTYXPUMYSE LYPFPGN OPT VE MOY LOHASXYK UGX SHHRPGN UTPUVSE PGMH OPLZUWY, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH LHZMYG MOY KAXYGYLL HZ OPL CHKXL, OY UXXYX,"XHG'M VY OAKM, TE XYUK ZYSSHC; EHA RGHC P LIYUR ZKHT TE OYUKM UL MH UGHSX UWJAUPGMUGWY.""HO, XHG'M TYGMPHG PM, WHAGM! P JAPMY AGXYKLMUGX," LUPX VYKN, NYMMPGN AIUGX LIYURPGN PG U TAZZSYX UGX NAMMAKUS BHPWY."NH UWKHLL MH HAK OHLML: MOYE PGBPMYX EHA," UXXYX VHKPL.VYKN IAM HG MOY WSYUGYLM HZ WHUML, CPMOHAM U LIHM HK LIYWR HZ XALM,LMHHX VYZHKY U SHHRPGN NSULL UGX VKALOYX MOY OUPK HG OPL MYTISYLAICUKXL, PG MOY CUE UZZYWMYX VE MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK, UGX, OUBPGNULLAKYX OPTLYSZ ZKHT MOY CUE KHLMHB SHHRYX UM PM MOUM OPL WHUM OUX VYYGGHMPWYX, SYZM MOY KHHT CPMO U ISYULUGM LTPSY."HO XYUK, COUM U VYULM P UT!" TAMMYKYX KHLMHB, UL OY KYUX MOY SYMMYK."COE?""HO, COUM U IPN P UT, GHM MH OUBY CKPMMYG UGX MH OUBY NPBYG MOYT LAWOU ZKPNOM! HO, COUM U IPN P UT!" OY KYIYUMYX, ZSALOPGN LAXXYGSE. "CYSS,OUBY EHA LYGM NUVKPYS ZHK LHTY CPGY? USS KPNOM SYM'L OUBY LHTY!"PG MOY SYMMYK ZKHT OPL IUKYGML CUL YGWSHLYX U SYMMYK HZ KYWHTTYGXUMPHGMH VUNKUMPHG COPWO MOY HSX WHAGMYLL UM UGGU TPROUESHBGU'L UXBPWY OUXHVMUPGYX MOKHANO UG UWJAUPGMUGWY UGX LYGM MH OYK LHG, ULRPGN OPT MH MURYPM MH PML XYLMPGUMPHG UGX TURY ALY HZ PM."COUM GHGLYGLY! TAWO P GYYX PM!" LUPX KHLMHB, MOKHCPGN MOY SYMMYK AGXYKMOY MUVSY."COE OUBY EHA MOKHCG MOUM UCUE?" ULRYX VHKPL."PM PL LHTY SYMMYK HZ KYWHTTYGXUMPHG... COUM MOY XYBPS XH P CUGM PMZHK!""COE 'COUM MOY XYBPS'?" LUPX VHKPL, IPWRPGN PM AI UGX KYUXPGN MOYUXXKYLL. "MOPL SYMMYK CHASX VY HZ NKYUM ALY MH EHA.""P CUGM GHMOPGN, UGX P CHG'M VY UGEHGY'L UXQAMUGM.""COE GHM?" PGJAPKYX VHKPL."PM'L U SUWRYE'L QHV!""EHA UKY LMPSS MOY LUTY XKYUTYK, P LYY," KYTUKRYX VHKPL, LOURPGN OPLOYUX."UGX EHA'KY LMPSS MOY LUTY XPISHTUMPLM! VAM MOUM'L GHM MOY IHPGM...WHTY, OHC UKY EHA?" ULRYX KHLMHB."CYSS, UL EHA LYY. LH ZUK YBYKEMOPGN'L USS KPNOM, VAM P WHGZYLL P LOHASXTAWO SPRY MH VY UG UXQAMUGM UGX GHM KYTUPG UM MOY ZKHGM.""COE?""VYWUALY COYG HGWY U TUG LMUKML HG TPSPMUKE LYKBPWY, OY LOHASX MKE MHTURY UL LAWWYLLZAS U WUKYYK HZ PM UL IHLLPVSY.""HO, MOUM'L PM!" LUPX KHLMHB, YBPXYGMSE MOPGRPGN HZ LHTYMOPGN YSLY.OY SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UGX PGJAPKPGNSE PGMH OPL ZKPYGX'L YEYL, YBPXYGMSEMKEPGN PG BUPG MH ZPGX MOY UGLCYK MH LHTY JAYLMPHG.HSX NUVKPYS VKHANOM PG MOY CPGY."LOHASXG'M CY GHC LYGX ZHK VYKN?" ULRYX VHKPL. "OY CHASX XKPGR CPMO EHA.P WUG'M.""CYSS, LYGX ZHK OPT... UGX OHC XH EHA NYM HG CPMO MOUM NYKTUG?" ULRYXKHLMHB, CPMO U WHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY."OY PL U BYKE, BYKE GPWY, OHGYLM, UGX ISYULUGM ZYSSHC," UGLCYKYX VHKPL.UNUPG KHLMHB SHHRYX PGMYGMSE PGMH VHKPL' YEYL UGX LPNOYX. VYKN KYMAKGYX,UGX HBYK MOY VHMMSY HZ CPGY WHGBYKLUMPHG VYMCYYG MOY MOKYY HZZPWYKLVYWUTY UGPTUMYX. MOY NAUKXLTYG MHSX KHLMHB HZ MOYPK TUKWO UGX OHC MOYEOUX VYYG TUXY TAWO HZ PG KALLPU, IHSUGX, UGX UVKHUX. MOYE LIHRY HZ MOYLUEPGNL UGX XHPGNL HZ MOYPK WHTTUGXYK, MOY NKUGX XARY, UGX MHSX LMHKPYLHZ OPL RPGXGYLL UGX PKULWPVPSPME. VYKN, UL ALAUS, RYIM LPSYGM COYG MOYLAVQYWM XPX GHM KYSUMY MH OPTLYSZ, VAM PG WHGGYWMPHG CPMO MOY LMHKPYLHZ MOY NKUGX XARY'L JAPWR MYTIYK OY KYSUMYX CPMO NALMH OHC PG NUSPWPU OYOUX TUGUNYX MH XYUS CPMO MOY NKUGX XARY COYG MOY SUMMYK TUXY U MHAK HZMOY KYNPTYGML UGX CUL UGGHEYX UM MOY PKKYNASUKPME HZ U THBYTYGM. CPMO UISYULUGM LTPSY VYKN KYSUMYX OHC MOY NKUGX XARY OUX KPXXYG AI MH OPT PGU BPHSYGM IULLPHG, LOHAMPGN: "UKGUAML!" ("UKGUAML" CUL MOY MLUKYBPWO'LZUBHKPMY YDIKYLLPHG COYG OY CUL PG U KUNY) UGX WUSSYX ZHK MOY WHTIUGEWHTTUGXYK."CHASX EHA VYSPYBY PM, WHAGM, P CUL GHM UM USS USUKTYX, VYWUALY P RGYCP CUL KPNOM. CPMOHAM VHULMPGN, EHA RGHC, P TUE LUE MOUM P RGHC MOY UKTEHKXYKL VE OYUKM UGX RGHC MOY KYNASUMPHGL UL CYSS UL P XH MOY SHKX'LIKUEYK. LH, WHAGM, MOYKY GYBYK PL UGE GYNSPNYGWY PG TE WHTIUGE, UGX LHTE WHGLWPYGWY CUL UM YULY. P WUTY ZHKCUKX...." (VYKN LMHHX AI UGX LOHCYXOHC OY IKYLYGMYX OPTLYSZ, CPMO OPL OUGX MH OPL WUI, UGX KYUSSE PMCHASX OUBY VYYG XPZZPWASM ZHK U ZUWY MH YDIKYLL NKYUMYK KYLIYWM UGXLYSZ-WHTISUWYGWE MOUG OPL XPX.) "CYSS, OY LMHKTYX UM TY, UL MOY LUEPGNPL, LMHKTYX UGX LMHKTYX UGX LMHKTYX! PM CUL GHM U TUMMYK HZ SPZY VAMKUMOYK HZ XYUMO, UL MOY LUEPGN PL. 'USVUGPUGL!' UGX 'XYBPSL!' UGX 'MHLPVYKPU!'" LUPX VYKN CPMO U LUNUWPHAL LTPSY. "P RGYC P CUL PG MOY KPNOMLH P RYIM LPSYGM; CUL GHM MOUM VYLM, WHAGM?... 'OYE, UKY EHA XATV?' OYLOHAMYX. LMPSS P KYTUPGYX LPSYGM. UGX COUM XH EHA MOPGR, WHAGM? MOYGYDM XUE PM CUL GHM YBYG TYGMPHGYX PG MOY HKXYKL HZ MOY XUE. MOUM'L COUMRYYIPGN HGY'L OYUX TYUGL. MOUM'L MOY CUE, WHAGM," LUPX VYKN, SPNOMPGNOPL IPIY UGX YTPMMPGN KPGNL HZ LTHRY."EYL, MOUM CUL ZPGY," LUPX KHLMHB, LTPSPGN.VAM VHKPL GHMPWYX MOUM OY CUL IKYIUKPGN MH TURY ZAG HZ VYKN, UGXLRPSSZASSE WOUGNYX MOY LAVQYWM. OY ULRYX OPT MH MYSS MOYT OHC UGX COYKYOY NHM OPL CHAGX. MOPL ISYULYX KHLMHB UGX OY VYNUG MUSRPGN UVHAM PM, UGXUL OY CYGM HG VYWUTY THKY UGX THKY UGPTUMYX. OY MHSX MOYT HZ OPL LWOHGNKUVYKG UZZUPK, QALM UL MOHLY COH OUBY MURYG IUKM PG U VUMMSY NYGYKUSSEXH XYLWKPVY PM, MOUM PL, UL MOYE CHASX SPRY PM MH OUBY VYYG, UL MOYEOUBY OYUKX PM XYLWKPVYX VE HMOYKL, UGX UL LHAGXL CYSS, VAM GHM UM USS ULPM KYUSSE CUL. KHLMHB CUL U MKAMOZAS EHAGN TUG UGX CHASX HG GHUWWHAGM OUBY MHSX U XYSPVYKUMY SPY. OY VYNUG OPL LMHKE TYUGPGN MH MYSSYBYKEMOPGN QALM UL PM OUIIYGYX, VAM PTIYKWYIMPVSE, PGBHSAGMUKPSE, UGXPGYBPMUVSE OY SUILYX PGMH ZUSLYOHHX. PZ OY OUX MHSX MOY MKAMO MH OPLOYUKYKL--COH SPRY OPTLYSZ OUX HZMYG OYUKX LMHKPYL HZ UMMUWRL UGX OUXZHKTYX U XYZPGPMY PXYU HZ COUM UG UMMUWR CUL UGX CYKY YDIYWMPGN MH OYUKQALM LAWO U LMHKE--MOYE CHASX YPMOYK GHM OUBY VYSPYBYX OPT HK, LMPSSCHKLY, CHASX OUBY MOHANOM MOUM KHLMHB CUL OPTLYSZ MH VSUTY LPGWY COUMNYGYKUSSE OUIIYGL MH MOY GUKKUMHKL HZ WUBUSKE UMMUWRL OUX GHM OUIIYGYXMH OPT. OY WHASX GHM MYSS MOYT LPTISE MOUM YBYKEHGY CYGM UM U MKHM UGXMOUM OY ZYSS HZZ OPL OHKLY UGX LIKUPGYX OPL UKT UGX MOYG KUG UL OUKX ULOY WHASX ZKHT U ZKYGWOTUG PGMH MOY CHHX. VYLPXYL, MH MYSS YBYKEMOPGN ULPM KYUSSE OUIIYGYX, PM CHASX OUBY VYYG GYWYLLUKE MH TURY UG YZZHKM HZCPSS MH MYSS HGSE COUM OUIIYGYX. PM PL BYKE XPZZPWASM MH MYSS MOY MKAMO,UGX EHAGN IYHISY UKY KUKYSE WUIUVSY HZ PM. OPL OYUKYKL YDIYWMYX U LMHKEHZ OHC VYLPXY OPTLYSZ UGX USS UZSUTY CPMO YDWPMYTYGM, OY OUX ZSHCG SPRYU LMHKT UM MOY LJAUKY, WAM OPL CUE PG, LSULOYX KPNOM UGX SYZM, OHC OPLLUVYK OUX MULMYX ZSYLO UGX OY OUX ZUSSYG YDOUALMYX, UGX LH HG. UGX LH OYMHSX MOYT USS MOUM.PG MOY TPXXSY HZ OPL LMHKE, QALM UL OY CUL LUEPGN: "EHA WUGGHM PTUNPGYCOUM U LMKUGNY ZKYGFE HGY YDIYKPYGWYL XAKPGN UG UMMUWR," IKPGWY UGXKYC,COHT VHKPL CUL YDIYWMPGN, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT. IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH SPRYXMH OYSI EHAGN TYG, CUL ZSUMMYKYX VE VYPGN ULRYX ZHK OPL ULLPLMUGWY UGXVYPGN CYSS XPLIHLYX MHCUKX VHKPL, COH OUX TUGUNYX MH ISYULY OPT MOY XUEVYZHKY, OY CPLOYX MH XH COUM MOY EHAGN TUG CUGMYX. OUBPGN VYYG LYGM CPMOIUIYKL ZKHT RAMAFHB MH MOY MLUKYBPWO, OY SHHRYX PG HG VHKPL, OHIPGN MHZPGX OPT USHGY. COYG OY WUTY PG UGX LUC UG OALLUK HZ MOY SPGY KYWHAGMPGNOPL TPSPMUKE YDISHPML (IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX GHM YGXAKY MOUM LHKM HZ TUG),OY NUBY VHKPL U ISYULUGM LTPSY, ZKHCGYX UL CPMO OUSZ-WSHLYX YEYL OYSHHRYX UM KHLMHB, VHCYX LSPNOMSE UGX CYUKPSE, UGX LUM XHCG SUGNAPXSEHG MOY LHZU: OY ZYSM PM AGISYULUGM MH OUBY XKHIIYX PG HG VUX WHTIUGE.KHLMHB ZSALOYX AI HG GHMPWPGN MOPL, VAM OY XPX GHM WUKY, MOPL CUL U TYKYLMKUGNYK. NSUGWPGN, OHCYBYK, UM VHKPL, OY LUC MOUM OY MHH LYYTYX ULOUTYXHZ MOY OALLUK HZ MOY SPGY.PG LIPMY HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L XPLUNKYYUVSY, PKHGPWUS MHGY, PG LIPMY HZMOY WHGMYTIM CPMO COPWO KHLMHB, ZKHT OPL ZPNOMPGN UKTE IHPGM HZ BPYC,KYNUKXYX USS MOYLY SPMMSY UXQAMUGML HG MOY LMUZZ HZ COHT MOY GYCWHTYKCUL YBPXYGMSE HGY, KHLMHB ZYSM WHGZALYX, VSALOYX, UGX VYWUTY LPSYGM.VHKPL PGJAPKYX COUM GYCL MOYKY TPNOM VY HG MOY LMUZZ, UGX COUM, CPMOHAMPGXPLWKYMPHG, HGY TPNOM ULR UVHAM HAK ISUGL."CY LOUSS IKHVUVSE UXBUGWY," KYISPYX VHSRHGLRP, YBPXYGMSE KYSAWMUGM MHLUE THKY PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ U LMKUGNYK.VYKN MHHR MOY HIIHKMAGPME MH ULR, CPMO NKYUM IHSPMYGYLL, COYMOYK, UL CULKATHKYX, MOY USSHCUGWY HZ ZHKUNY THGYE MH WUIMUPGL HZ WHTIUGPYL CHASX VYXHAVSYX. MH MOPL IKPGWY UGXKYC UGLCYKYX CPMO U LTPSY MOUM OY WHASXNPBY GH HIPGPHG HG LAWO UG PTIHKMUGM NHBYKGTYGM HKXYK, UGX VYKN SUANOYXNUPSE."UL MH EHAK VALPGYLL," IKPGWY UGXKYC WHGMPGAYX, UXXKYLLPGN VHKPL, "CYCPSS MUSR HZ PM SUMYK" (UGX OY SHHRYX KHAGX UM KHLMHB). "WHTY MH TYUZMYK MOY KYBPYC UGX CY CPSS XH COUM PL IHLLPVSY."UGX, OUBPGN NSUGWYX KHAGX MOY KHHT, IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX MH KHLMHB,COHLY LMUMY HZ AGWHGJAYKUVSY WOPSXPLO YTVUKKULLTYGM GHC WOUGNPGN MHUGNYK OY XPX GHM WHGXYLWYGX MH GHMPWY, UGX LUPX: "P MOPGR EHA CYKYMUSRPGN HZ MOY LWOHG NKUVYKG UZZUPK? CYKY EHA MOYKY?""P CUL MOYKY," LUPX KHLMHB UGNKPSE, UL PZ PGMYGXPGN MH PGLASM MOYUPXY-XY-WUTI.VHSRHGLRP GHMPWYX MOY OALLUK'L LMUMY HZ TPGX, UGX PM UTALYX OPT. CPMO ULSPNOMSE WHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY, OY LUPX: "EYL, MOYKY UKY TUGE LMHKPYL GHCMHSX UVHAM MOUM UZZUPK!""EYL, LMHKPYL!" KYIYUMYX KHLMHB SHAXSE, SHHRPGN CPMO YEYL LAXXYGSE NKHCGZAKPHAL, GHC UM VHKPL, GHC UM VHSRHGLRP. "EYL, TUGE LMHKPYL! VAM HAKLMHKPYL UKY MOY LMHKPYL HZ TYG COH OUBY VYYG AGXYK MOY YGYTE'L ZPKY! HAKLMHKPYL OUBY LHTY CYPNOM, GHM SPRY MOY LMHKPYL HZ MOHLY ZYSSHCL HG MOYLMUZZ COH NYM KYCUKXL CPMOHAM XHPGN UGEMOPGN!""HZ COHT EHA PTUNPGY TY MH VY HGY?" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMO U JAPYM UGXIUKMPWASUKSE UTPUVSY LTPSY.U LMKUGNY ZYYSPGN HZ YDULIYKUMPHG UGX EYM HZ KYLIYWM ZHK MOPL TUG'LLYSZ-IHLLYLLPHG TPGNSYX UM MOUM THTYGM PG KHLMHB'L LHAS."P UT GHM MUSRPGN UVHAM EHA," OY LUPX, "P XHG'M RGHC EHA UGX, ZKUGRSE, PXHG'M CUGM MH. P UT LIYURPGN HZ MOY LMUZZ PG NYGYKUS.""UGX P CPSS MYSS EHA MOPL," IKPGWY UGXKYC PGMYKKAIMYX PG U MHGY HZ JAPYMUAMOHKPME, "EHA CPLO MH PGLASM TY, UGX P UT KYUXE MH UNKYY CPMO EHA MOUMPM CHASX VY BYKE YULE MH XH LH PZ EHA OUBYG'M LAZZPWPYGM LYSZ-KYLIYWM,VAM UXTPM MOUM MOY MPTY UGX ISUWY UKY BYKE VUXSE WOHLYG. PG U XUE HK MCHCY LOUSS USS OUBY MH MURY IUKM PG U NKYUMYK UGX THKY LYKPHAL XAYS, UGXVYLPXYL, XKAVYMLRHE, COH LUEL OY PL UG HSX ZKPYGX HZ EHAKL, PL GHM UMUSS MH VSUTY MOUM TE ZUWY OUL MOY TPLZHKMAGY MH XPLISYULY EHA. OHCYBYK,"OY UXXYX KPLPGN, "EHA RGHC TE GUTY UGX COYKY MH ZPGX TY, VAM XHG'MZHKNYM MOUM P XH GHM KYNUKX YPMOYK TELYSZ HK EHA UL OUBPGN VYYG UM USSPGLASMYX, UGX UL U TUG HSXYK MOUG EHA, TE UXBPWY PL MH SYM MOY TUMMYKXKHI. CYSS MOYG, HG ZKPXUE UZMYK MOY KYBPYC P LOUSS YDIYWM EHA,XKAVYMLRHE. UA KYBHPK!" YDWSUPTYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX CPMO U VHC MH MOYTVHMO OY CYGM HAM.HGSE COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL NHGY XPX KHLMHB MOPGR HZ COUM OY HANOM MHOUBY LUPX. UGX OY CUL LMPSS THKY UGNKE UM OUBPGN HTPMMYX MH LUE PM. OYHKXYKYX OPL OHKLY UM HGWY UGX, WHSXSE MURPGN SYUBY HZ VHKPL, KHXYOHTY. LOHASX OY NH MH OYUXJAUKMYKL GYDM XUE UGX WOUSSYGNY MOUM UZZYWMYXUXQAMUGM, HK KYUSSE SYM MOY TUMMYK XKHI, CUL MOY JAYLMPHG MOUM CHKKPYXOPT USS MOY CUE. OY MOHANOM UGNKPSE HZ MOY ISYULAKY OY CHASX OUBY UMLYYPGN MOY ZKPNOM HZ MOUM LTUSS UGX ZKUPS VAM IKHAX TUG COYG WHBYKYX VEOPL IPLMHS, UGX MOYG OY ZYSM CPMO LAKIKPLY MOUM HZ USS MOY TYG OY RGYCMOYKY CUL GHGY OY CHASX LH TAWO SPRY MH OUBY ZHK U ZKPYGX UL MOUM BYKEUXQAMUGM COHT OY LH OUMYX.WOUIMYK BPPPMOY XUE UZMYK KHLMHB OUX VYYG MH LYY VHKPL, U KYBPYC CUL OYSX HZ MOYUALMKPUG UGX KALLPUG MKHHIL, VHMO MOHLY ZKYLOSE UKKPBYX ZKHT KALLPUUGX MOHLY COH OUX VYYG WUTIUPNGPGN AGXYK RAMAFHB. MOY MCH YTIYKHKL, MOYKALLPUG CPMO OPL OYPK MOY MLUKYBPWO, UGX MOY UALMKPUG CPMO MOY UKWOXARY,PGLIYWMYX MOY USSPYX UKTE HZ YPNOME MOHALUGX TYG.ZKHT YUKSE THKGPGN MOY LTUKM WSYUG MKHHIL CYKY HG MOY THBY, ZHKTPGN AIHG MOY ZPYSX VYZHKY MOY ZHKMKYLL. GHC MOHALUGXL HZ ZYYM UGX VUEHGYMLTHBYX UGX OUSMYX UM MOY HZZPWYKL' WHTTUGX, MAKGYX CPMO VUGGYKL ZSEPGN,ZHKTYX AI UM PGMYKBUSL, UGX COYYSYX KHAGX HMOYK LPTPSUK TULLYL HZPGZUGMKE PG XPZZYKYGM AGPZHKTL; GHC CUL OYUKX MOY KOEMOTPW VYUM HZOHHZL UGX MOY QPGNSPGN HZ LOHCE WUBUSKE PG VSAY, KYX, UGX NKYYG VKUPXYXAGPZHKTL, CPMO LTUKMSE XKYLLYX VUGXLTYG PG ZKHGM THAGMYX HG VSUWR, KHUG,HK NKUE OHKLYL; MOYG UNUPG, LIKYUXPGN HAM CPMO MOY VKUFYG WSUMMYK HZ MOYIHSPLOYX LOPGPGN WUGGHG MOUM JAPBYKYX HG MOY NAG WUKKPUNYL UGX CPMOMOY LTYSS HZ SPGLMHWRL, WUTY MOY UKMPSSYKE COPWO WKUCSYX VYMCYYG MOYPGZUGMKE UGX WUBUSKE UGX MHHR AI PML UIIHPGMYX IHLPMPHG. GHM HGSE MOYNYGYKUSL PG ZASS IUKUXY AGPZHKTL, CPMO MOYPK MOPG HK MOPWR CUPLML XKUCGPG MH MOY AMTHLM, MOYPK KYX GYWRL LJAYYFYX PGMH MOYPK LMPZZ WHSSUKL, UGXCYUKPGN LWUKBYL UGX USS MOYPK XYWHKUMPHGL, GHM HGSE MOY YSYNUGM, IHTUXYXHZZPWYKL, VAM YBYKE LHSXPYK CPMO OPL ZKYLOSE CULOYX UGX LOUBYG ZUWY UGXOPL CYUIHGL WSYUG UGX IHSPLOYX MH MOY AMTHLM, UGX YBYKE OHKLY NKHHTYXMPSS PML WHUM LOHGY SPRY LUMPG UGX YBYKE OUPK HZ PML CYMMYX TUGY SUELTHHMO--ZYSM MOUM GH LTUSS TUMMYK CUL OUIIYGPGN, VAM UG PTIHKMUGM UGXLHSYTG UZZUPK. YBYKE NYGYKUS UGX YBYKE LHSXPYK CUL WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL HCGPGLPNGPZPWUGWY, UCUKY HZ VYPGN VAM U XKHI PG MOUM HWYUG HZ TYG, UGXEYM UM MOY LUTY MPTY CUL WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL LMKYGNMO UL U IUKM HZ MOUMYGHKTHAL COHSY.ZKHT YUKSE THKGPGN LMKYGAHAL UWMPBPMPYL UGX YZZHKML OUX VYNAG UGX VE MYGH'WSHWR USS OUX VYYG VKHANOM PGMH XAY HKXYK. MOY KUGRL CYKY XKUCG AI HGMOY BULM ZPYSX. MOY COHSY UKTE CUL YDMYGXYX PG MOKYY SPGYL: MOY WUBUSKEPG ZKHGM, VYOPGX PM MOY UKMPSSYKE, UGX VYOPGX MOUM UNUPG MOY PGZUGMKE.U LIUWY SPRY U LMKYYM CUL SYZM VYMCYYG YUWO MCH SPGYL HZ MKHHIL. MOYMOKYY IUKML HZ MOUM UKTE CYKY LOUKISE XPLMPGNAPLOYX: RAMAFHB'L ZPNOMPGNUKTE (CPMO MOY IUBSHNKUXL HG MOY KPNOM ZSUGR HZ MOY ZKHGM); MOHLYKYWYGMSE UKKPBYX ZKHT KALLPU, VHMO NAUKXL UGX KYNPTYGML HZ MOY SPGY;UGX MOY UALMKPUG MKHHIL. VAM MOYE USS LMHHX PG MOY LUTY SPGYL, AGXYK HGYWHTTUGX, UGX PG U SPRY HKXYK.SPRY CPGX HBYK SYUBYL KUG UG YDWPMYX COPLIYK: "MOYE'KY WHTPGN! MOYE'KYWHTPGN!" USUKTYX BHPWYL CYKY OYUKX, UGX U LMPK HZ ZPGUS IKYIUKUMPHGLCYIM HBYK USS MOY MKHHIL.ZKHT MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ HSTAMF PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT, U NKHAI CUL LYYGUIIKHUWOPGN. UGX UM MOUM THTYGM, MOHANO MOY XUE CUL LMPSS, U SPNOM NALMHZ CPGX VSHCPGN HBYK MOY UKTE LSPNOMSE LMPKKYX MOY LMKYUTYKL HG MOYSUGWYL UGX MOY AGZHSXYX LMUGXUKXL ZSAMMYKYX UNUPGLM MOYPK LMUZZL. PMSHHRYX UL PZ VE MOUM LSPNOM THMPHG MOY UKTE PMLYSZ CUL YDIKYLLPGN PMLQHE UM MOY UIIKHUWO HZ MOY YTIYKHKL. HGY BHPWY CUL OYUKX LOHAMPGN: "YEYLZKHGM!" MOYG, SPRY MOY WKHCPGN HZ WHWRL UM LAGKPLY, MOPL CUL KYIYUMYX VEHMOYKL ZKHT BUKPHAL LPXYL UGX USS VYWUTY LPSYGM.PG MOY XYUMOSPRY LMPSSGYLL HGSE MOY MKUTI HZ OHKLYL CUL OYUKX. MOPLCUL MOY YTIYKHKL' LAPMYL. MOY YTIYKHKL KHXY AI MH MOY ZSUGR, UGX MOYMKATIYML HZ MOY ZPKLM WUBUSKE KYNPTYGM ISUEYX MOY NYGYKUS TUKWO. PMLYYTYX UL MOHANO GHM MOY MKATIYMYKL CYKY ISUEPGN, VAM UL PZ MOY UKTEPMLYSZ, KYQHPWPGN UM MOY YTIYKHKL' UIIKHUWO, OUX GUMAKUSSE VAKLM PGMHTALPW. UTPX MOYLY LHAGXL, HGSE MOY EHAMOZAS RPGXSE BHPWY HZ MOY YTIYKHKUSYDUGXYK CUL WSYUKSE OYUKX. OY NUBY MOY CHKXL HZ NKYYMPGN, UGX MOYZPKLM KYNPTYGM KHUKYX "OAKKUO!" LH XYUZYGPGNSE, WHGMPGAHALSE, UGXQHEZASSE MOUM MOY TYG MOYTLYSBYL CYKY UCYX VE MOYPK TASMPMAXY UGX MOYPTTYGLPME HZ MOY IHCYK MOYE WHGLMPMAMYX.KHLMHB, LMUGXPGN PG MOY ZKHGM SPGYL HZ RAMAFHB'L UKTE COPWO MOY MLUKUIIKHUWOYX ZPKLM, YDIYKPYGWYX MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN UL YBYKE HMOYK TUG PGMOUM UKTE: U ZYYSPGN HZ LYSZ-ZHKNYMZASGYLL, U IKHAX WHGLWPHALGYLL HZTPNOM, UGX U IULLPHGUMY UMMKUWMPHG MH OPT COH CUL MOY WUALY HZ MOPLMKPATIO.OY ZYSM MOUM UM U LPGNSY CHKX ZKHT MOUM TUG USS MOPL BULM TULL (UGX OYOPTLYSZ UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM UMHT PG PM) CHASX NH MOKHANO ZPKY UGX CUMYK,WHTTPM WKPTY, XPY, HK IYKZHKT XYYXL HZ OPNOYLM OYKHPLT, UGX LH OY WHASXGHM VAM MKYTVSY UGX OPL OYUKM LMUGX LMPSS UM MOY PTTPGYGWY HZ MOUM CHKX."OAKKUO! OAKKUO! OAKKUO!" MOAGXYKYX ZKHT USS LPXYL, HGY KYNPTYGM UZMYKUGHMOYK NKYYMPGN MOY MLUK CPMO MOY LMKUPGL HZ MOY TUKWO, UGX MOYG"OAKKUO!"... MOYG MOY NYGYKUS TUKWO, UGX UNUPG "OAKKUO! OAKKUO!" NKHCPGNYBYK LMKHGNYK UGX ZASSYK UGX TYKNPGN PGMH U XYUZYGPGN KHUK.MPSS MOY MLUK KYUWOYX PM, YUWO KYNPTYGM PG PML LPSYGWY UGX PTTHVPSPMELYYTYX SPRY U SPZYSYLL VHXE, VAM UL LHHG UL OY WUTY AI PM VYWUTY USPBY,PML MOAGXYK QHPGPGN MOY KHUK HZ MOY COHSY SPGY USHGN COPWO OY OUXUSKYUXE IULLYX. MOKHANO MOY MYKKPVSY UGX XYUZYGPGN KHUK HZ MOHLY BHPWYL,UTPX MOY LJAUKY TULLYL HZ MKHHIL LMUGXPGN THMPHGSYLL UL PZ MAKGYX MHLMHGY, OAGXKYXL HZ KPXYKL WHTIHLPGN MOY LAPMYL THBYX WUKYSYLLSE VAMLETTYMKPWUSSE UGX UVHBY USS ZKYYSE, UGX PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT MCH TYG--MOYYTIYKHKL. AIHG MOYT MOY AGXPBPXYX, MYGLYSE IULLPHGUMY UMMYGMPHG HZ MOUMCOHSY TULL HZ TYG CUL WHGWYGMKUMYX.MOY OUGXLHTY EHAGN YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK, PG MOY AGPZHKT HZ MOY OHKLYNAUKXL, CYUKPGN U WHWRYX OUM CPMO PML IYURL ZKHGM UGX VUWR, CPMO OPLISYULUGM ZUWY UGX KYLHGUGM MOHANO GHM SHAX BHPWY, UMMKUWMYX YBYKEHGY'LUMMYGMPHG.KHLMHB CUL GHM ZUK ZKHT MOY MKATIYMYKL, UGX CPMO OPL RYYG LPNOM OUXKYWHNGPFYX MOY MLUK UGX CUMWOYX OPL UIIKHUWO. COYG OY CUL CPMOPG MCYGMEIUWYL, UGX GPWOHSUL WHASX WSYUKSE XPLMPGNAPLO YBYKE XYMUPS HZ OPLOUGXLHTY, OUIIE EHAGN ZUWY, OY YDIYKPYGWYX U ZYYSPGN MYGXYKGYLL UGXYWLMULE LAWO UL OY OUX GYBYK VYZHKY RGHCG. YBYKE MKUPM UGX YBYKETHBYTYGM HZ MOY MLUK'L LYYTYX MH OPT YGWOUGMPGN.LMHIIPGN PG ZKHGM HZ MOY IUBSHNKUXL, MOY MLUK LUPX LHTYMOPGN PG ZKYGWOMH MOY UALMKPUG YTIYKHK UGX LTPSYX.LYYPGN MOUM LTPSY, KHLMHB PGBHSAGMUKPSE LTPSYX OPTLYSZ UGX ZYSM U LMPSSLMKHGNYK ZSHC HZ SHBY ZHK OPL LHBYKYPNG. OY SHGNYX MH LOHC MOUM SHBY PGLHTY CUE UGX RGHCPGN MOUM MOPL CUL PTIHLLPVSY CUL KYUXE MH WKE. MOY MLUKWUSSYX MOY WHSHGYS HZ MOY KYNPTYGM UGX LUPX U ZYC CHKXL MH OPT."HO NHX, COUM CHASX OUIIYG MH TY PZ MOY YTIYKHK LIHRY MH TY?" MOHANOMKHLMHB. "P LOHASX XPY HZ OUIIPGYLL!"MOY MLUK UXXKYLLYX MOY HZZPWYKL USLH: "P MOUGR EHA USS, NYGMSYTYG, PMOUGR EHA CPMO TE COHSY OYUKM." MH KHLMHB YBYKE CHKX LHAGXYX SPRY UBHPWY ZKHT OYUBYG. OHC NSUXSE CHASX OY OUBY XPYX UM HGWY ZHK OPL MLUK!"EHA OUBY YUKGYX MOY LM. NYHKNY'L LMUGXUKXL UGX CPSS VY CHKMOE HZ MOYT.""HO, MH XPY, MH XPY ZHK OPT," MOHANOM KHLMHB.MOY MLUK LUPX LHTYMOPGN THKY COPWO KHLMHB XPX GHM OYUK, UGX MOYLHSXPYKL, LMKUPGPGN MOYPK SAGNL, LOHAMYX "OAKKUO!"KHLMHB MHH, VYGXPGN HBYK OPL LUXXSY, LOHAMYX "OAKKUO!" CPMO USS OPLTPNOM, ZYYSPGN MOUM OY CHASX SPRY MH PGQAKY OPTLYSZ VE MOUM LOHAM, PZHGSE MH YDIKYLL OPL KUIMAKY ZASSE.MOY MLUK LMHIIYX U ZYC TPGAMYL PG ZKHGM HZ MOY OALLUKL UL PZ AGXYWPXYX."OHC WUG MOY YTIYKHK VY AGXYWPXYX?" MOHANOM KHLMHB, VAM MOYG YBYG MOPLPGXYWPLPHG UIIYUKYX MH OPT TUQYLMPW UGX YGWOUGMPGN, SPRY YBYKEMOPGN YSLYMOY MLUK XPX.MOUM OYLPMUMPHG SULMYX HGSE UG PGLMUGM. MOY MLUK'L ZHHM, PG MOY GUKKHCIHPGMYX VHHM MOYG ZULOPHGUVSY, MHAWOYX MOY NKHPG HZ MOY VHVMUPSYX VUETUKY OY KHXY, OPL OUGX PG U COPMY NSHBY NUMOYKYX AI MOY KYPGL, UGX OYTHBYX HZZ UWWHTIUGPYX VE UG PKKYNASUKSE LCUEPGN LYU HZ UPXYL-XY-WUTI.ZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYK OY KHXY UCUE, LMHIIPGN UM HMOYK KYNPTYGML, MPSS UMSULM HGSE OPL COPMY ISATYL CYKY BPLPVSY MH KHLMHB ZKHT UTPX MOY LAPMYLMOUM LAKKHAGXYX MOY YTIYKHKL.UTHGN MOY NYGMSYTYG HZ MOY LAPMY, KHLMHB GHMPWYX VHSRHGLRP, LPMMPGNOPL OHKLY PGXHSYGMSE UGX WUKYSYLLSE. KHLMHB KYWUSSYX MOYPK JAUKKYS HZEYLMYKXUE UGX MOY JAYLMPHG IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ COYMOYK OY HANOM HK HANOMGHM MH WOUSSYGNY VHSRHGLRP. "HZ WHAKLY GHM!" OY GHC MOHANOM. "PL PMCHKMO MOPGRPGN HK LIYURPGN HZ PM UM LAWO U THTYGM? UM U MPTY HZ LAWOSHBY, LAWO KUIMAKY, UGX LAWO LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY, COUM XH UGE HZ HAK JAUKKYSLUGX UZZKHGML TUMMYK? P SHBY UGX ZHKNPBY YBYKEVHXE GHC."COYG MOY YTIYKHK OUX IULLYX GYUKSE USS MOY KYNPTYGML, MOY MKHHIL VYNUGU WYKYTHGPUS TUKWO IULM OPT, UGX KHLMHB HG VYXHAPG, KYWYGMSE IAKWOULYXZKHT XYGPLHB, KHXY IULM MHH, UM MOY KYUK HZ OPL LJAUXKHG--MOUM PL, USHGYUGX PG ZASS BPYC HZ MOY YTIYKHK.VYZHKY OY KYUWOYX OPT, KHLMHB, COH CUL U LISYGXPX OHKLYTUG, LIAKKYXVYXHAPG MCPWY UGX LAWWYLLZASSE IAM OPT MH MOY LOHCE MKHM PG COPWO MOYUGPTUS CYGM COYG YDWPMYX. VYGXPGN OPL ZHUTPGN TAFFSY MH OPL WOYLM, OPLMUPS YDMYGXYX, VYXHAPG, UL PZ USLH WHGLWPHAL HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L YEYAIHG OPT, IULLYX LISYGXPXSE, SPZMPGN OPL ZYYM CPMO U OPNO UGX NKUWYZASUWMPHG, UL PZ ZSEPGN MOKHANO MOY UPK CPMOHAM MHAWOPGN MOY NKHAGX.KHLMHB OPTLYSZ, OPL SYNL CYSS VUWR UGX OPL LMHTUWO XKUCG PG UGX ZYYSPGNOPTLYSZ HGY CPMO OPL OHKLY, KHXY IULM MOY YTIYKHK CPMO U ZKHCGPGN VAMVSPLLZAS ZUWY "SPRY U BYCE XYBPS," UL XYGPLHB YDIKYLLYX PM."ZPGY ZYSSHCL, MOY IUBSHNKUXL!" KYTUKRYX MOY YTIYKHK."TE NHX, OHC OUIIE P LOHASX VY PZ OY HKXYKYX TY MH SYUI PGMH MOY ZPKYMOPL PGLMUGM!" MOHANOM KHLMHB.COYG MOY KYBPYC CUL HBYK, MOY GYCSE UKKPBYX HZZPWYKL, UGX USLHRAMAFHB'L, WHSSYWMYX PG NKHAIL UGX VYNUG MH MUSR UVHAM MOY UCUKXL, UVHAMMOY UALMKPUGL UGX MOYPK AGPZHKTL, UVHAM MOYPK SPGYL, UVHAM VHGUIUKMY,UGX OHC VUXSE MOY SUMMYK CHASX ZUKY GHC, YLIYWPUSSE PZ MOY YLLYG WHKILUKKPBYX UGX IKALLPU MHHR HAK LPXY.VAM MOY MUSR PG YBYKE NKHAI CUL WOPYZSE UVHAM MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK. OPLYBYKE CHKX UGX THBYTYGM CUL XYLWKPVYX CPMO YWLMULE.MOYE USS OUX VAM HGY CPLO: MH UXBUGWY UL LHHG UL IHLLPVSY UNUPGLM MOYYGYTE AGXYK MOY YTIYKHK'L WHTTUGX. WHTTUGXYX VE MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZMOYE WHASX GHM ZUPS MH BUGJAPLO UGEHGY, VY PM COHT PM TPNOM: LH MOHANOMKHLMHB UGX THLM HZ MOY HZZPWYKL UZMYK MOY KYBPYC.USS CYKY MOYG THKY WHGZPXYGM HZ BPWMHKE MOUG MOY CPGGPGN HZ MCH VUMMSYLCHASX OUBY TUXY MOYT.WOUIMYK PDMOY XUE UZMYK MOY KYBPYC, VHKPL, PG OPL VYLM AGPZHKT UGX CPMO OPLWHTKUXY VYKN'L VYLM CPLOYL ZHK LAWWYLL, KHXY MH HSTAMF MH LYY VHSRHGLRP,CPLOPGN MH IKHZPM VE OPL ZKPYGXSPGYLL UGX HVMUPG ZHK OPTLYSZ MOY VYLMIHLM OY WHASX--IKYZYKUVSE MOUM HZ UXQAMUGM MH LHTY PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY,U IHLPMPHG PG MOY UKTE COPWO LYYTYX MH OPT THLM UMMKUWMPBY. "PM PL USSBYKE CYSS ZHK KHLMHB, COHLY ZUMOYK LYGXL OPT MYG MOHALUGX KAVSYL UM UMPTY, MH MUSR UVHAM GHM CPLOPGN MH WKPGNY MH UGEVHXE UGX GHM VY UGEHGY'LSUWRYE, VAM P COH OUBY GHMOPGN VAM TE VKUPGL OUBY MH TURY U WUKYYKUGX TALM GHM TPLL HIIHKMAGPMPYL, VAM TALM UBUPS TELYSZ HZ MOYT!" OYKYZSYWMYX.OY XPX GHM ZPGX IKPGWY UGXKYC PG HSTAMF MOUM XUE, VAM MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZMOY MHCG COYKY MOY OYUXJAUKMYKL UGX MOY XPISHTUMPW WHKIL CYKY LMUMPHGYXUGX MOY MCH YTIYKHKL CYKY SPBPGN CPMO MOYPK LAPMYL, OHALYOHSXL, UGXWHAKML HGSE LMKYGNMOYGYX OPL XYLPKY MH VYSHGN MH MOUM OPNOYK CHKSX.OY RGYC GH HGY, UGX XYLIPMY OPL LTUKM NAUKXLTUG'L AGPZHKT, USS MOYLYYDUSMYX IYKLHGUNYL IULLPGN PG MOY LMKYYML PG MOYPK YSYNUGM WUKKPUNYLCPMO MOYPK ISATYL, KPVVHGL, UGX TYXUSL, VHMO WHAKMPYKL UGX TPSPMUKETYG, LYYTYX LH PTTYULAKUVSE UVHBY OPT, UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM HZZPWYK HZ MOYNAUKXL, MOUM MOYE GHM HGSE XPX GHM CPLO MH, VAM LPTISE WHASX GHM, VYUCUKY HZ OPL YDPLMYGWY. UM MOY JAUKMYKL HZ MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ,RAMAFHB, COYKY OY PGJAPKYX ZHK VHSRHGLRP, USS MOY UXQAMUGML UGX YBYG MOYHKXYKSPYL SHHRYX UM OPT UL PZ MOYE CPLOYX MH PTIKYLL HG OPT MOUM U NKYUMTUGE HZZPWYKL SPRY OPT CYKY USCUEL WHTPGN MOYKY UGX MOUM YBYKEVHXE CULOYUKMPSE LPWR HZ MOYT. PG LIPMY HZ MOPL, HK KUMOYK VYWUALY HZ PM, GYDMXUE, GHBYTVYK 15, UZMYK XPGGYK OY UNUPG CYGM MH HSTAMF UGX, YGMYKPGN MOYOHALY HWWAIPYX VE RAMAFHB, ULRYX ZHK VHSRHGLRP. PM PL XYSPNOMZAS!"UGX MOY MUSRUMPBY XHSNHKARHB, MAKGPGN GHC MH VHKPL, GHC MH IKPGWYUGXKYC, MHSX OHC VHGUIUKMY CPLOPGN MH MYLM TUKRHB, HAK UTVULLUXHK,IAKIHLYSE XKHIIYX U OUGXRYKWOPYZ PG ZKHGM HZ OPT UGX LMHHX SHHRPGN UMTUKRHB, IKHVUVSE YDIYWMPGN TUKRHB MH IPWR PM AI ZHK OPT, UGX OHC TUKRHBPTTYXPUMYSE XKHIIYX OPL HCG VYLPXY PM UGX IPWRYX PM AI CPMOHAM MHAWOPGNVHGUIUKMY'L."XYSPNOMZAS!" "VAM EHA LYY... UGHMOYKMPTY!"VHKPL CUL YDWPMYX VE MOY MOHANOM HZ VYPGN LH WSHLY MH MOY OPNOYK IHCYKLUL OY ZYSM OPTLYSZ MH VY UM MOUM THTYGM. MOYE ZHSSHCYX IKPGWY XHSNHKARHB HAMPGMH MOY WHKKPXHK UGX TYM--WHTPGN HAM HZ MOY XHHK HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L KHHTVE COPWO XHSNHKARHB OUX YGMYKYX--U LOHKM TUG PG WPBPSPUG WSHMOYL CPMO UWSYBYK ZUWY UGX LOUKISE IKHQYWMPGN QUC COPWO, CPMOHAM LIHPSPGN OPL ZUWY,NUBY OPT U IYWASPUK BPBUWPME UGX LOPZMPGYLL HZ YDIKYLLPHG. MOPL LOHKMTUG GHXXYX MH XHSNHKARHB UL MH UG PGMPTUMY ZKPYGX UGX LMUKYX UM IKPGWYUGXKYC CPMO WHHS PGMYGLPME, CUSRPGN LMKUPNOM MHCUKX OPT UGX YBPXYGMSEYDIYWMPGN OPT MH VHC HK MH LMYI HAM HZ OPL CUE. IKPGWY UGXKYC XPXGYPMOYK: U SHHR HZ UGPTHLPME UIIYUKYX HG OPL ZUWY UGX MOY HMOYK MAKGYXUCUE UGX CYGM XHCG MOY LPXY HZ MOY WHKKPXHK."COH CUL MOUM?" PM PL LAWO TYGUL OY COH XYWPXY MOY ZUMY HZ GUMPHGL," UXXYX VHSRHGLRP CPMO U LPNO OYWHASX GHM LAIIKYLL, UL MOYE IULLYX HAM HZ MOY IUSUWY.GYDM XUE, MOY UKTE VYNUG PML WUTIUPNG, UGX AI MH MOY BYKE VUMMSY HZUALMYKSPMF, VHKPL CUL AGUVSY MH LYY YPMOYK IKPGWY UGXKYC HK XHSNHKARHBUNUPG UGX KYTUPGYX ZHK U COPSY CPMO MOY PLTUESHB KYNPTYGM.WOUIMYK DUM XUCG HG MOY LPDMYYGMO HZ GHBYTVYK, XYGPLHB'L LJAUXKHG, PG COPWOGPWOHSUL KHLMHB LYKBYX UGX COPWO CUL PG IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG'L XYMUWOTYGM,THBYX ZKHT MOY ISUWY COYKY PM OUX LIYGM MOY GPNOM, UXBUGWPGN PGMH UWMPHGUL UKKUGNYX, UGX UZMYK NHPGN VYOPGX HMOYK WHSATGL ZHK UVHAM MCH MOPKXLHZ U TPSY CUL LMHIIYX HG MOY OPNOKHUX. KHLMHB LUC MOY WHLLUWRL UGX MOYGMOY ZPKLM UGX LYWHGX LJAUXKHGL HZ OALLUKL UGX PGZUGMKE VUMMUSPHGLUGX UKMPSSYKE IULL VE UGX NH ZHKCUKX UGX MOYG NYGYKUSL VUNKUMPHG UGXXHSNHKARHB KPXY IULM CPMO MOYPK UXQAMUGML. USS MOY ZYUK VYZHKY UWMPHGCOPWO OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX UL IKYBPHALSE, USS MOY PGGYK LMKANNSY MHWHGJAYK MOUM ZYUK, USS OPL XKYUTL HZ XPLMPGNAPLOPGN OPTLYSZ UL U MKAYOALLUK PG MOPL VUMMSY, OUX VYYG CULMYX. MOYPK LJAUXKHG KYTUPGYX PGKYLYKBY UGX GPWOHSUL KHLMHB LIYGM MOUM XUE PG U XASS UGX CKYMWOYX THHX.UM GPGY PG MOY THKGPGN, OY OYUKX ZPKPGN PG ZKHGM UGX LOHAML HZ OAKKUO,UGX LUC CHAGXYX VYPGN VKHANOM VUWR (MOYKY CYKY GHM TUGE HZ MOYT), UGXUM SULM OY LUC OHC U COHSY XYMUWOTYGM HZ ZKYGWO WUBUSKE CUL VKHANOM PG,WHGBHEYX VE U LHMGEU HZ WHLLUWRL. YBPXYGMSE MOY UZZUPK CUL HBYK UGX,MOHANO GHM VPN, OUX VYYG U LAWWYLLZAS YGNUNYTYGM. MOY TYG UGX HZZPWYKLKYMAKGPGN LIHRY HZ U VKPSSPUGM BPWMHKE, HZ MOY HWWAIUMPHG HZ MOY MHCG HZCPLWOUA UGX MOY WUIMAKY HZ U COHSY ZKYGWO LJAUXKHG. MOY XUE CUL VKPNOMUGX LAGGE UZMYK U LOUKI GPNOM ZKHLM, UGX MOY WOYYKZAS NSPMMYK HZ MOUMUAMATG XUE CUL PG RYYIPGN CPMO MOY GYCL HZ BPWMHKE COPWO CUL WHGBYEYX,GHM HGSE VE MOY MUSYL HZ MOHLY COH OUX MURYG IUKM PG PM, VAM USLH VEMOY QHEZAS YDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ LHSXPYKL, HZZPWYKL, NYGYKUSL, UGXUXQAMUGML, UL MOYE IULLYX KHLMHB NHPGN HK WHTPGN. UGX GPWOHSUL, COH OUXBUPGSE LAZZYKYX USS MOY XKYUX MOUM IKYWYXYL U VUMMSY UGX OUX LIYGM MOUMOUIIE XUE PG PGUWMPBPME, CUL USS MOY THKY XYIKYLLYX."WHTY OYKY, CHLMHB. SYM'L XCPGR MH XCHCG HAK NCPYZ!" LOHAMYX XYGPLHB,COH OUX LYMMSYX XHCG VE MOY KHUXLPXY CPMO U ZSULR UGX LHTY ZHHX.MOY HZZPWYKL NUMOYKYX KHAGX XYGPLHB'L WUGMYYG, YUMPGN UGX MUSRPGN."MOYKY! MOYE UKY VKPGNPGN UGHMOYK!" WKPYX HGY HZ MOY HZZPWYKL,PGXPWUMPGN U WUIMPBY ZKYGWO XKUNHHG COH CUL VYPGN VKHANOM PG HG ZHHM VEMCH WHLLUWRL.HGY HZ MOYT CUL SYUXPGN VE MOY VKPXSY U ZPGY SUKNY ZKYGWO OHKLY OY OUXMURYG ZKHT MOY IKPLHGYK."LYSS AL MOUM OHKLY!" XYGPLHB WUSSYX HAM MH MOY WHLLUWRL."PZ EHA SPRY, EHAK OHGHK!"MOY HZZPWYKL NHM AI UGX LMHHX KHAGX MOY WHLLUWRL UGX MOYPK IKPLHGYK.MOY ZKYGWO XKUNHHG CUL U EHAGN USLUMPUG COH LIHRY ZKYGWO CPMO U NYKTUGUWWYGM. OY CUL VKYUMOSYLL CPMO UNPMUMPHG, OPL ZUWY CUL KYX, UGX COYGOY OYUKX LHTY ZKYGWO LIHRYG OY UM HGWY VYNUG LIYURPGN MH MOY HZZPWYKL,UXXKYLLPGN ZPKLM HGY, MOYG UGHMOYK. OY LUPX OY CHASX GHM OUBY VYYGMURYG, PM CUL GHM OPL ZUASM VAM MOY WHKIHKUS'L COH OUX LYGM OPT MH LYPFYLHTY OHKLYWSHMOL, MOHANO OY OUX MHSX OPT MOY KALLPUGL CYKY MOYKY. UGX UMYBYKE CHKX OY UXXYX: "VAM XHG'M OAKM TE SPMMSY OHKLY!" UGX LMKHRYX MOYUGPTUS. PM CUL ISUPG MOUM OY XPX GHM JAPMY NKULI COYKY OY CUL. GHCOY YDWALYX OPTLYSZ ZHK OUBPGN VYYG MURYG IKPLHGYK UGX GHC, PTUNPGPGNOPTLYSZ VYZHKY OPL HCG HZZPWYKL, PGLPLMYX HG OPL LHSXPYKSE XPLWPISPGYUGX FYUS PG MOY LYKBPWY. OY VKHANOM CPMO OPT PGMH HAK KYUKNAUKX USS MOYZKYLOGYLL HZ UMTHLIOYKY HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE, COPWO CUL LH USPYG MH AL.MOY WHLLUWRL LHSX MOY OHKLY ZHK MCH NHSX IPYWYL, UGX KHLMHB, VYPGN MOYKPWOYLM HZ MOY HZZPWYKL GHC MOUM OY OUX KYWYPBYX OPL THGYE, VHANOM PM."VAM XHG'M OAKM TE SPMMSY OHKLY!" LUPX MOY USLUMPUG NHHX-GUMAKYXSE MHKHLMHB COYG MOY UGPTUS CUL OUGXYX HBYK MH MOY OALLUK.KHLMHB LTPSPGNSE KYULLAKYX MOY XKUNHHG UGX NUBY OPT THGYE."USSYE! USSYE!" LUPX MOY WHLLUWR, MHAWOPGN MOY IKPLHGYK'L UKT MH TURYOPT NH HG."MOY YTIYKHK! MOY YTIYKHK!" CUL LAXXYGSE OYUKX UTHGN MOY OALLUKL.USS VYNUG MH KAG UGX VALMSY, UGX KHLMHB LUC WHTPGN AI MOY KHUX VYOPGXOPT LYBYKUS KPXYKL CPMO COPMY ISATYL PG MOYPK OUML. PG U THTYGM YBYKEHGYCUL PG OPL ISUWY, CUPMPGN.KHLMHB XPX GHM RGHC HK KYTYTVYK OHC OY KUG MH OPL ISUWY UGX THAGMYX.PGLMUGMSE OPL KYNKYM UM GHM OUBPGN VYYG PG UWMPHG UGX OPL XYQYWMYX THHXUTPX IYHISY HZ COHT OY CUL CYUKE OUX NHGY, PGLMUGMSE YBYKE MOHANOM HZOPTLYSZ OUX BUGPLOYX. OY CUL ZPSSYX CPMO OUIIPGYLL UM OPL GYUKGYLL MHMOY YTIYKHK. OY ZYSM MOUM MOPL GYUKGYLL VE PMLYSZ TUXY AI MH OPT ZHK MOYXUE OY OUX SHLM. OY CUL OUIIE UL U SHBYK COYG MOY SHGNYX-ZHK THTYGM HZTYYMPGN UKKPBYL. GHM XUKPGN MH SHHR KHAGX UGX CPMOHAM SHHRPGN KHAGX, OYCUL YWLMUMPWUSSE WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL UIIKHUWO. OY ZYSM PM GHM HGSE ZKHT MOYLHAGX HZ MOY OHHZL HZ MOY UIIKHUWOPGN WUBUSWUXY, VAM VYWUALY UL OY XKYCGYUK YBYKEMOPGN NKYC VKPNOMYK, THKY QHEZAS, THKY LPNGPZPWUGM, UGX THKYZYLMPBY UKHAGX OPT. GYUKYK UGX GYUKYK MH KHLMHB WUTY MOUM LAG LOYXXPGNVYUTL HZ TPSX UGX TUQYLMPW SPNOM UKHAGX, UGX USKYUXE OY ZYSM OPTLYSZYGBYSHIYX PG MOHLY VYUTL, OY OYUKX OPL BHPWY, MOUM RPGXSE, WUST, UGXTUQYLMPW BHPWY MOUM CUL EYM LH LPTISY! UGX UL PZ PG UWWHKX CPMOKHLMHB'L ZYYSPGN, MOYKY CUL U XYUMOSE LMPSSGYLL UTPX COPWO CUL OYUKX MOYYTIYKHK'L BHPWY."MOY IUBSHNKUX OALLUKL?" OY PGJAPKYX."MOY KYLYKBYL, LPKY!" KYISPYX U BHPWY, U BYKE OATUG HGY WHTIUKYX MH MOUMCOPWO OUX LUPX: "MOY IUBSHNKUX OALLUKL?"MOY YTIYKHK XKYC SYBYS CPMO KHLMHB UGX OUSMYX. USYDUGXYK'L ZUWY CULYBYG THKY VYUAMPZAS MOUG PM OUX VYYG MOKYY XUEL VYZHKY UM MOY KYBPYC. PMLOHGY CPMO LAWO NUPYME UGX EHAMO, LAWO PGGHWYGM EHAMO, MOUM PM LANNYLMYXMOY SPBYSPGYLL HZ U ZHAKMYYG-EYUK-HSX VHE, UGX EYM PM CUL MOY ZUWYHZ MOY TUQYLMPW YTIYKHK. WULAUSSE, COPSY LAKBYEPGN MOY LJAUXKHG, MOYYTIYKHK'L YEYL TYM KHLMHB'L UGX KYLMYX HG MOYT ZHK GHM THKY MOUG MCHLYWHGXL. COYMOYK HK GH MOY YTIYKHK AGXYKLMHHX COUM CUL NHPGN HG PGKHLMHB'L LHAS (PM LYYTYX MH KHLMHB MOUM OY AGXYKLMHHX YBYKEMOPGN), UMUGE KUMY OPL SPNOM-VSAY YEYL NUFYX ZHK UVHAM MCH LYWHGXL PGMH KHLMHB'LZUWY. U NYGMSY, TPSX SPNOM IHAKYX ZKHT MOYT. MOYG USS UM HGWY OYKUPLYX OPL YEYVKHCL, UVKAIMSE MHAWOYX OPL OHKLY CPMO OPL SYZM ZHHM, UGXNUSSHIYX HG.MOY EHAGNYK YTIYKHK WHASX GHM KYLMKUPG OPL CPLO MH VY IKYLYGM UM MOYVUMMSY UGX, PG LIPMY HZ MOY KYTHGLMKUGWYL HZ OPL WHAKMPYKL, UM MCYSBYH'WSHWR SYZM MOY MOPKX WHSATG CPMO COPWO OY OUX VYYG UGX NUSSHIYX MHCUKXMOY BUGNAUKX. VYZHKY OY WUTY AI CPMO MOY OALLUKL, LYBYKUS UXQAMUGML TYMOPT CPMO GYCL HZ MOY LAWWYLLZAS KYLASM HZ MOY UWMPHG.MOPL VUMMSY, COPWO WHGLPLMYX PG MOY WUIMAKY HZ U ZKYGWO LJAUXKHG, CULKYIKYLYGMYX UL U VKPSSPUGM BPWMHKE HBYK MOY ZKYGWO, UGX LH MOYYTIYKHK UGX MOY COHSY UKTE, YLIYWPUSSE COPSY MOY LTHRY OAGN HBYKMOY VUMMSYZPYSX, VYSPYBYX MOUM MOY ZKYGWO OUX VYYG XYZYUMYX UGX CYKYKYMKYUMPGN UNUPGLM MOYPK CPSS. U ZYC TPGAMYL UZMYK MOY YTIYKHK OUXIULLYX, MOY IUBSHNKUX XPBPLPHG CUL HKXYKYX MH UXBUGWY. PG CPLWOUAPMLYSZ, U IYMME NYKTUG MHCG, KHLMHB LUC MOY YTIYKHK UNUPG. PG MOYTUKRYM ISUWY, COYKY MOYKY OUX VYYG LHTY KUMOYK OYUBE ZPKPGN VYZHKY MOYYTIYKHK'L UKKPBUS, SUE LYBYKUS RPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX LHSXPYKL COHT MOYKYOUX GHM VYYG MPTY MH THBY. MOY YTIYKHK, LAKKHAGXYX VE OPL LAPMYHZ HZZPWYKL UGX WHAKMPYKL, CUL KPXPGN U VHVMUPSYX WOYLMGAM TUKY, UXPZZYKYGM HGY ZKHT MOUM COPWO OY OUX KPXXYG UM MOY KYBPYC, UGX VYGXPGNMH HGY LPXY OY NKUWYZASSE OYSX U NHSX SHKNGYMMY MH OPL YEYL UGX SHHRYXUM U LHSXPYK COH SUE IKHGY, CPMO VSHHX HG OPL AGWHBYKYX OYUX. UGX OY CUL GHM MOY HGSE TUG MHYDIYKPYGWY MOUM ZYYSPGN XAKPGN MOHLY TYTHKUVSY XUEL IKYWYXPGN MOY VUMMSYHZ UALMYKSPMF: GPGY MYGMOL HZ MOY TYG PG MOY KALLPUG UKTE CYKY MOYG PGSHBY, MOHANO SYLL YWLMUMPWUSSE, CPMO MOYPK MLUK UGX MOY NSHKE HZ MOYKALLPUG UKTL.WOUIMYK DPMOY GYDM XUE MOY YTIYKHK LMHIIYX UM CPLWOUA, UGX BPSSPYK, OPL IOELPWPUG,CUL KYIYUMYXSE LATTHGYX MH LYY OPT. UM OYUXJAUKMYKL UGX UTHGN MOY MKHHILGYUK VE MOY GYCL LIKYUX MOUM MOY YTIYKHK CUL AGCYSS. OY UMY GHMOPGN UGXOUX LSYIM VUXSE MOUM GPNOM, MOHLY UKHAGX OPT KYIHKMYX. MH MOY QHE UGX IKPXY HZ MOY COHSY UKTE, UIYKLHGUS PGMYKBPYC CUL KYZALYX, UGX PGLMYUX HZ MOY LHBYKYPNG, IKPGWYXHSNHKARHB, MOY BPWMHK UM CPLWOUA, CUL LYGM CPMO LUBUKE MH GYNHMPUMYCPMO GUIHSYHG PZ, WHGMKUKE MH YDIYWMUMPHGL, MOYLY GYNHMPUMPHGL CYKYUWMAUMYX VE U KYUS XYLPKY ZHK IYUWY.MHCUKX YBYGPGN XHSNHKARHB WUTY VUWR, CYGM LMKUPNOM MH MOY MLUK, UGXKYTUPGYX USHGY CPMO OPT ZHK U SHGN MPTY.HG MOY YPNOMYYGMO UGX GPGYMYYGMO HZ GHBYTVYK, MOY UKTE UXBUGWYX MCHXUEL' TUKWO UGX MOY YGYTE'L HAMIHLML UZMYK U VKPYZ PGMYKWOUGNY HZ LOHMLKYMKYUMYX. PG MOY OPNOYLM UKTE WPKWSYL ZKHT TPXXUE HG MOY GPGYMYYGMO, UNKYUM, YDWPMYXSE VALMSPGN UWMPBPME VYNUG COPWO SULMYX MPSS MOY THKGPGNHZ MOY MCYGMPYMO, COYG MOY TYTHKUVSY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF CUL ZHANOM.MPSS TPXXUE HG MOY GPGYMYYGMO, MOY UWMPBPME--MOY YUNYK MUSR, KAGGPGNMH UGX ZKH, UGX XPLIUMWOPGN HZ UXQAMUGML--CUL WHGZPGYX MH MOY YTIYKHK'LOYUXJAUKMYKL. HGY COYYSLSHCSE THBYX, UGHMOYK CUL LYM PG THMPHG, UGX U MOPKX, UGX COYYSL VYNUGMH KYBHSBY ZULMYK UGX ZULMYK, SYBYKL UGX WHNCOYYSL MH CHKR, WOPTYL MHISUE, ZPNAKYL MH IHI HAM, UGX MOY OUGXL MH UXBUGWY CPMO KYNASUK THMPHGUL U KYLASM HZ USS MOUM UWMPBPME.QALM UL PG MOY TYWOUGPLT HZ U WSHWR, LH PG MOY TYWOUGPLT HZ MOY TPSPMUKETUWOPGY, UG PTIASLY HGWY NPBYG SYUXL MH MOY ZPGUS KYLASM; UGX QALM ULPGXPZZYKYGMSE JAPYLWYGM MPSS MOY THTYGM COYG THMPHG PL MKUGLTPMMYXMH MOYT UKY MOY IUKML HZ MOY TYWOUGPLT COPWO MOY PTIASLY OUL GHM EYMKYUWOYX. COYYSL WKYUR HG MOYPK UDSYL UL MOY WHNL YGNUNY HGY UGHMOYK UGXMOY KYBHSBPGN IASSYEL COPKK CPMO MOY KUIPXPME HZ MOYPK THBYTYGM, VAM UGYPNOVHKPGN COYYS PL UL JAPYM UGX THMPHGSYLL UL MOHANO PM CYKY IKYIUKYXMH KYTUPG LH ZHK U OAGXKYX EYUKL; VAM MOY THTYGM WHTYL COYG MOY SYBYKWUMWOYL PM UGX HVYEPGN MOY PTIASLY MOUM COYYS VYNPGL MH WKYUR UGX QHPGLPG MOY WHTTHG THMPHG MOY KYLASM UGX UPT HZ COPWO UKY VYEHGX PML RYG.QALM UL PG U WSHWR, MOY KYLASM HZ MOY WHTISPWUMYX THMPHG HZ PGGATYKUVSYCOYYSL UGX IASSYEL PL TYKYSE U LSHC UGX KYNASUK THBYTYGM HZ MOYOUGXL COPWO LOHC MOY MPTY, LH MOY KYLASM HZ USS MOY WHTISPWUMYX OATUGUWMPBPMPYL HZ 160,000 KALLPUGL UGX ZKYGWO--USS MOYPK IULLPHGL, XYLPKYL,KYTHKLY, OATPSPUMPHGL, LAZZYKPGNL, HAMVAKLML HZ IKPXY, ZYUK, UGXYGMOALPULT--CUL HGSE MOY SHLL HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF, MOY LH-WUSSYXVUMMSY HZ MOY MOKYY YTIYKHKL--MOUM PL MH LUE, U LSHC THBYTYGM HZ MOYOUGX HG MOY XPUS HZ OATUG OPLMHKE.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL HG XAME MOUM XUE UGX PG WHGLMUGM UMMYGXUGWY HG MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.UM LPD PG MOY YBYGPGN, RAMAFHB CYGM MH MOY YTIYKHK'L OYUXJAUKMYKL UGXUZMYK LMUEPGN VAM U LOHKM MPTY CPMO MOY MLUK CYGM MH LYY MOY NKUGXTUKLOUS HZ MOY WHAKM, WHAGM MHSLMHE.VHSRHGLRP MHHR MOY HIIHKMAGPME MH NH PG MH NYM LHTY XYMUPSL HZ MOYWHTPGN UWMPHG ZKHT XHSNHKARHB.
