MOUM'LMOY LHKM HZ TUG OY PL, UGX GHMOPGN THKY," KYISPYX XHSNHKARHB, SHHRPGNKHAGX UM VPSPVPG CPMO U LTPSY."XYLIPMY TE NKYUM KYLIYWM ZHK HSX RAMAFHB," OY WHGMPGAYX, "CY LOHASX VYU GPWY LYM HZ ZYSSHCL PZ CY CYKY MH CUPM UVHAM UGX LH NPBY OPT U WOUGWYMH YLWUIY, HK MH MKPWR AL, GHC MOUM CY WYKMUPGSE OUBY OPT PG HAK OUGXL!GH, CY TALMG'M ZHKNYM LABHKHB UGX OPL KASY--GHM MH IAM EHAKLYSZ PG UIHLPMPHG MH VY UMMUWRYX, VAM EHAKLYSZ MH UMMUWR. VYSPYBY TY PG CUK MOYYGYKNE HZ EHAGN TYG HZMYG LOHCL MOY CUE VYMMYK MOUG USS MOY YDIYKPYGWYHZ HSX WAGWMUMHKL.""VAM PG COUM IHLPMPHG UKY CY NHPGN MH UMMUWR OPT? P OUBY VYYG UM MOYHAMIHLML MHXUE UGX PM PL PTIHLLPVSY MH LUE COYKY OPL WOPYZ ZHKWYL UKYLPMAUMYX," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC.OY CPLOYX MH YDISUPG MH XHSNHKARHB U ISUG HZ UMMUWR OY OUX OPTLYSZZHKTYX."HO, MOUM PL USS MOY LUTY," XHSNHKARHB LUPX JAPWRSE, UGX NYMMPGN AI OYLIKYUX U TUI HG MOY MUVSY. "USS YBYGMAUSPMPYL OUBY VYYG ZHKYLYYG. PZ OYPL LMUGXPGN VYZHKY VKAGG..."UGX IKPGWY XHSNHKARHB KUIPXSE VAM PGXPLMPGWMSE YDISUPGYX CYEKHMOYK'LISUG HZ U ZSUGRPGN THBYTYGM.IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MH KYISE UGX MH LMUMY OPL HCG ISUG, COPWO TPNOM OUBYVYYG UL NHHX UL CYEKHMOYK'L, VAM ZHK MOY XPLUXBUGMUNY MOUM CYEKHMOYK'LOUX USKYUXE VYYG UIIKHBYX. UL LHHG UL IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MH XYTHGLMKUMYMOY XYZYWML HZ MOY SUMMYK UGX MOY TYKPML HZ OPL HCG ISUG, IKPGWYXHSNHKARHB WYULYX MH SPLMYG MH OPT UGX NUFYX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE GHM UM MOYTUI, VAM UM IKPGWY UGXKYC'L ZUWY."MOYKY CPSS VY U WHAGWPS HZ CUK UM RAMAFHB'L MHGPNOM, MOHANO; EHA WUGLUE USS MOPL MOYKY," KYTUKRYX XHSNHKARHB."P CPSS XH LH," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, THBPGN UCUE ZKHT MOY TUI."COUMYBYK UKY EHA VHMOYKPGN UVHAM, NYGMSYTYG?" LUPX VPSPVPG, COH, MPSSMOYG, OUX SPLMYGYX CPMO UG UTALYX LTPSY MH MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG UGX GHCCUL YBPXYGMSE KYUXE CPMO U QHRY. "COYMOYK MHTHKKHC VKPGNL BPWMHKE HKXYZYUM, MOY NSHKE HZ HAK KALLPUG UKTL PL LYWAKY. YDWYIM EHAK RAMAFHB,MOYKY PL GHM U LPGNSY KALLPUG PG WHTTUGX HZ U WHSATG! MOY WHTTUGXYKLUKY: OYKK NYGYKUS CPTIZYG, SY WHTMY XY SUGNYKHG, SY IKPGWY XYSPWOMYGLMYPG, SY IKPGWY, XY OHOYGSHOY, UGX ZPGUSSE IKPLOIKPLO, UGX LH HGSPRY USS MOHLY IHSPLO GUTYL.""VY JAPYM, VUWRVPMYK!" LUPX XHSNHKARHB. "PM PL GHM MKAY; MOYKY UKY GHCMCH KALLPUGL, TPSHKUXHBPWO, UGX XHROMAKHB, UGX MOYKY CHASX VY U MOPKX,WHAGM UKURWOYYB, PZ OPL GYKBYL CYKY GHM MHH CYUR.""OHCYBYK, P MOPGR NYGYKUS RAMAFHB OUL WHTY HAM," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "PCPLO EHA NHHX SAWR UGX LAWWYLL, NYGMSYTYG!" OY UXXYX UGX CYGM HAM UZMYKLOURPGN OUGXL CPMO XHSNHKARHB UGX VPSPVPG.HG MOY CUE OHTY, IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT ULRPGN RAMAFHB,COH CUL LPMMPGN LPSYGMSE VYLPXY OPT, COUM OY MOHANOM HZ MHTHKKHC'LVUMMSY.RAMAFHB SHHRYX LMYKGSE UM OPL UXQAMUGM UGX, UZMYK U IUALY, KYISPYX: "PMOPGR MOY VUMMSY CPSS VY SHLM, UGX LH P MHSX WHAGM MHSLMHE UGX ULRYXOPT MH MYSS MOY YTIYKHK. COUM XH EHA MOPGR OY KYISPYX? 'VAM, TE XYUKNYGYKUS, P UT YGNUNYX CPMO KPWY UGX WAMSYML, SHHR UZMYK TPSPMUKE TUMMYKLEHAKLYSZ!' EYL... MOUM CUL MOY UGLCYK P NHM!"WOUIMYK DPPLOHKMSE UZMYK GPGY H'WSHWR MOUM YBYGPGN, CYEKHMOYK XKHBY CPMO OPL ISUGLMH RAMAFHB'L JAUKMYKL COYKY MOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK CUL MH VY OYSX. USS MOYWHTTUGXYKL HZ WHSATGL CYKY LATTHGYX MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L UGX CPMOMOY YDWYIMPHG HZ IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, COH XYWSPGYX MH WHTY, CYKY USS MOYKYUM MOY UIIHPGMYX MPTY.CYEKHMOYK, COH CUL PG ZASS WHGMKHS HZ MOY IKHIHLYX VUMMSY, VE OPLYUNYKGYLL UGX VKPLRGYLL IKYLYGMYX U TUKRYX WHGMKULM MH MOY XPLLUMPLZPYXUGX XKHCLE RAMAFHB, COH KYSAWMUGMSE ISUEYX MOY IUKM HZ WOUPKTUG UGXIKYLPXYGM HZ MOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK. CYEKHMOYK YBPXYGMSE ZYSM OPTLYSZ MH VYUM MOY OYUX HZ U THBYTYGM MOUM OUX USKYUXE VYWHTY AGKYLMKUPGUVSY. OY CULSPRY U OHKLY KAGGPGN XHCGOPSS OUKGYLLYX MH U OYUBE WUKM. COYMOYK OY CULIASSPGN PM HK VYPGN IALOYX VE PM OY XPX GHM RGHC, VAM KALOYX USHGN UMOYUXSHGN LIYYX CPMO GH MPTY MH WHGLPXYK COUM MOPL THBYTYGM TPNOM SYUXMH. CYEKHMOYK OUX VYYG MCPWY MOUM YBYGPGN MH MOY YGYTE'L IPWRYM SPGY MHKYWHGGHPMYK IYKLHGUSSE, UGX MCPWY MH MOY YTIYKHKL, KALLPUG UGX UALMKPUG,MH KYIHKM UGX YDISUPG, UGX MH OPL OYUXJAUKMYKL COYKY OY OUX XPWMUMYXMOY XPLIHLPMPHGL PG NYKTUG, UGX GHC, TAWO YDOUALMYX, OY UKKPBYX UMRAMAFHB'L.OY CUL YBPXYGMSE LH VALE MOUM OY YBYG ZHKNHM MH VY IHSPMY MH MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. OY PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, MUSRYX KUIPXSE UGX PGXPLMPGWMSE,CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM MOY TUG OY CUL UXXKYLLPGN, UGX XPX GHM KYISE MHJAYLMPHGL IAM MH OPT. OY CUL VYLIUMMYKYX CPMO TAX UGX OUX U IPMPZAS,CYUKE, UGX XPLMKUWMYX UPK, MOHANO UM MOY LUTY MPTY OY CUL OUANOME UGXLYSZ-WHGZPXYGM.RAMAFHB CUL HWWAIEPGN U GHVSYTUG'L WULMSY HZ THXYLM XPTYGLPHGL GYUKHLMKUSPMF. PG MOY SUKNY XKUCPGN KHHT COPWO OUX VYWHTY MOY WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ'L HZZPWY CYKY NUMOYKYX RAMAFHB OPTLYSZ, CYEKHMOYK, UGX MOY TYTVYKLHZ MOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK. MOYE CYKY XKPGRPGN MYU, UGX HGSE UCUPMYX IKPGWYVUNKUMPHG MH VYNPG MOY WHAGWPS. UM SULM VUNKUMPHG'L HKXYKSE WUTY CPMOMOY GYCL MOUM MOY IKPGWY WHASX GHM UMMYGX. IKPGWY UGXKYC WUTY PGMH PGZHKT MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ HZ MOPL UGX, UBUPSPGN OPTLYSZ HZIYKTPLLPHG IKYBPHALSE NPBYG OPT VE RAMAFHB MH VY IKYLYGM UM MOY WHAGWPS,OY KYTUPGYX PG MOY KHHT."LPGWY IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG PL GHM WHTPGN, CY TUE VYNPG," LUPX CYEKHMOYK,OAKKPYXSE KPLPGN ZKHT OPL LYUM UGX NHPGN AI MH MOY MUVSY HG COPWO UGYGHKTHAL TUI HZ MOY YGBPKHGL HZ VKAGG CUL LIKYUX HAM.RAMAFHB, CPMO OPL AGPZHKT AGVAMMHGYX LH MOUM OPL ZUM GYWR VASNYX HBYKOPL WHSSUK UL PZ YLWUIPGN, CUL LPMMPGN USTHLM ULSYYI PG U SHC WOUPK,CPMO OPL IHXNE HSX OUGXL KYLMPGN LETTYMKPWUSSE HG PML UKTL. UM MOY LHAGXHZ CYEKHMOYK'L BHPWY, OY HIYGYX OPL HGY YEY CPMO UG YZZHKM."EYL, EYL, PZ EHA ISYULY! PM PL USKYUXE SUMY," LUPX OY, UGX GHXXPGN OPLOYUX OY SYM PM XKHHI UGX UNUPG WSHLYX OPL YEY.PZ UM ZPKLM MOY TYTVYKL HZ MOY WHAGWPS MOHANOM MOUM RAMAFHB CULIKYMYGXPGN MH LSYYI, MOY LHAGXL OPL GHLY YTPMMYX XAKPGN MOY KYUXPGN MOUMZHSSHCYX IKHBYX MOUM MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ UM MOUM THTYGM CUL UVLHKVYXVE U ZUK THKY LYKPHAL TUMMYK MOUG U XYLPKY MH LOHC OPL WHGMYTIM ZHKMOY XPLIHLPMPHGL HK UGEMOPGN YSLY--OY CUL YGNUNYX PG LUMPLZEPGN MOYPKKYLPLMPVSY OATUG GYYX ZHK LSYYI. OY KYUSSE CUL ULSYYI. CYEKHMOYK, CPMOMOY NYLMAKY HZ U TUG MHH VALE MH SHLY U THTYGM, NSUGWYX UM RAMAFHB UGX,OUBPGN WHGBPGWYX OPTLYSZ MOUM OY CUL ULSYYI, MHHR AI U IUIYK UGX PGU SHAX, THGHMHGHAL BHPWY VYNUG MH KYUX HAM MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL ZHK MOYPTIYGXPGN VUMMSY, AGXYK U OYUXPGN COPWO OY USLH KYUX HAM:"XPLIHLPMPHGL ZHK UG UMMUWR HG MOY YGYTE IHLPMPHG VYOPGX RHVYSGPMF UGXLHRHSGPMF, GHBYTVYK 30, 1805."MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL CYKY BYKE WHTISPWUMYX UGX XPZZPWASM. MOYE VYNUG ULZHSSHCL:"UL MOY YGYTE'L SYZM CPGN KYLML HG CHHXYX OPSSL UGX OPL KPNOM YDMYGXLUSHGN RHVYSGPMF UGX LHRHSGPMF VYOPGX MOY IHGXL MOUM UKY MOYKY, COPSY CY,HG MOY HMOYK OUGX, CPMO HAK SYZM CPGN VE ZUK HAMZSUGR OPL KPNOM, PM PLUXBUGMUNYHAL MH UMMUWR MOY YGYTE'L SUMMYK CPGN YLIYWPUSSE PZ CY HWWAIEMOY BPSSUNYL HZ LHRHSGPMF UGX RHVYSGPMF, COYKYVE CY WUG VHMO ZUSS HGOPL ZSUGR UGX IAKLAY OPT HBYK MOY ISUPG VYMCYYG LWOSUIIUGPMF UGX MOYMOAYKULLU ZHKYLM, UBHPXPGN MOY XYZPSYL HZ LWOSUIIUGPMF UGX VYSSHCPMFCOPWO WHBYK MOY YGYTE'L ZKHGM. ZHK MOPL HVQYWM PM PL GYWYLLUKE MOUM...MOY ZPKLM WHSATG TUKWOYL... MOY LYWHGX WHSATG TUKWOYL... MOY MOPKXWHSATG TUKWOYL..." UGX LH HG, KYUX CYEKHMOYK.MOY NYGYKUSL LYYTYX MH SPLMYG KYSAWMUGMSE MH MOY XPZZPWASM XPLIHLPMPHGL.MOY MUSS, ZUPK-OUPKYX NYGYKUS VADOHCXYG LMHHX, SYUGPGN OPL VUWR UNUPGLMMOY CUSS, OPL YEYL ZPDYX HG U VAKGPGN WUGXSY, UGX LYYTYX GHM MH SPLMYGHK YBYG MH CPLO MH VY MOHANOM MH SPLMYG. YDUWMSE HIIHLPMY CYEKHMOYK,CPMO OPL NSPLMYGPGN CPXY-HIYG YEYL ZPDYX AIHG OPT UGX OPL TALMUWOYMCPLMYX AICUKXL, LUM MOY KAXXE TPSHKUXHBPWO PG U TPSPMUKE IHLY, OPLYSVHCL MAKGYX HAMCUKXL, OPL OUGXL HG OPL RGYYL, UGX OPL LOHASXYKLKUPLYX. OY KYTUPGYX LMAVVHKGSE LPSYGM, NUFPGN UM CYEKHMOYK'L ZUWY, UGXHGSE MAKGYX UCUE OPL YEYL COYG MOY UALMKPUG WOPYZ HZ LMUZZ ZPGPLOYXKYUXPGN. MOYG TPSHKUXHBPWO SHHRYX KHAGX LPNGPZPWUGMSE UM MOY HMOYKNYGYKUSL. VAM HGY WHASX GHM MYSS ZKHT MOUM LPNGPZPWUGM SHHR COYMOYK OYUNKYYX HK XPLUNKYYX UGX CUL LUMPLZPYX HK GHM CPMO MOY UKKUGNYTYGML. GYDMMH CYEKHMOYK LUM WHAGM SUGNYKHG COH, CPMO U LAVMSY LTPSY MOUM GYBYK SYZMOPL MEIPWUSSE LHAMOYKG ZKYGWO ZUWY XAKPGN MOY COHSY MPTY HZ MOY KYUXPGN,NUFYX UM OPL XYSPWUMY ZPGNYKL COPWO KUIPXSE MCPKSYX VE PML WHKGYKLU NHSX LGAZZVHD HG COPWO CUL U IHKMKUPM. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ HGY HZ MOYSHGNYLM LYGMYGWYL, OY LMHIIYX MOY KHMUKE THMPHG HZ MOY LGAZZVHD, KUPLYXOPL OYUX, UGX CPMO PGPTPWUS IHSPMYGYLL SAKRPGN PG MOY WHKGYKL HZ OPLMOPG SPIL PGMYKKAIMYX CYEKHMOYK, CPLOPGN MH LUE LHTYMOPGN. VAM MOYUALMKPUG NYGYKUS, WHGMPGAPGN MH KYUX, ZKHCGYX UGNKPSE UGX QYKRYX OPLYSVHCL, UL PZ MH LUE: "EHA WUG MYSS TY EHAK BPYCL SUMYK, VAM GHC VY LHNHHX UL MH SHHR UM MOY TUI UGX SPLMYG." SUGNYKHG SPZMYX OPL YEYL CPMO UGYDIKYLLPHG HZ IYKISYDPME, MAKGYX KHAGX MH TPSHKUXHBPWO UL PZ LYYRPGN UGYDISUGUMPHG, VAM TYYMPGN MOY SUMMYK'L PTIKYLLPBY VAM TYUGPGNSYLL NUFYXKHHIYX OPL YEYL LUXSE UGX UNUPG MHHR MH MCPKSPGN OPL LGAZZVHD."U NYHNKUIOE SYLLHG!" OY TAMMYKYX UL PZ MH OPTLYSZ, VAM SHAX YGHANO MHVY OYUKX.IKFYVELFYCLRP, CPMO KYLIYWMZAS VAM XPNGPZPYX IHSPMYGYLL, OYSX OPLOUGX MH OPL YUK MHCUKX CYEKHMOYK, CPMO MOY UPK HZ U TUG UVLHKVYX PGUMMYGMPHG. XHORMAKHB, U SPMMSY TUG, LUM HIIHLPMY CYEKHMOYK, CPMOUG ULLPXAHAL UGX THXYLM TPYG, UGX LMHHIPGN HBYK MOY HAMLIKYUX TUIWHGLWPYGMPHALSE LMAXPYX MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL UGX MOY AGZUTPSPUK SHWUSPME. OYULRYX CYEKHMOYK LYBYKUS MPTYL MH KYIYUM CHKXL OY OUX GHM WSYUKSE OYUKXUGX MOY XPZZPWASM GUTYL HZ BPSSUNYL. CYEKHMOYK WHTISPYX UGX XHORMAKHBGHMYX MOYT XHCG.COYG MOY KYUXPGN COPWO SULMYX THKY MOUG UG OHAK CUL HBYK, SUGNYKHG UNUPGVKHANOM OPL LGAZZVHD MH KYLM UGX, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM CYEKHMOYK HK UMUGEHGY PG IUKMPWASUK, VYNUG MH LUE OHC XPZZPWASM PM CUL MH WUKKE HAMLAWO U ISUG PG COPWO MOY YGYTE'L IHLPMPHG CUL ULLATYX MH VY RGHCG,COYKYUL PM CUL IYKOUIL GHM RGHCG, LPGWY MOY YGYTE CUL PG THBYTYGM.SUGNYKHG'L HVQYWMPHGL CYKY BUSPX VAM PM CUL HVBPHAL MOUM MOYPK WOPYZUPT CUL MH LOHC NYGYKUS CYEKHMOYK--COH OUX KYUX OPL XPLIHLPMPHGL CPMO ULTAWO LYSZ-WHGZPXYGWY UL PZ OY CYKY UXXKYLLPGN LWOHHS WOPSXKYG--MOUM OYOUX MH XH, GHM CPMO ZHHSL, VAM CPMO TYG COH WHASX MYUWO OPT LHTYMOPGN PGTPSPMUKE TUMMYKL.COYG MOY THGHMHGHAL LHAGX HZ CYEKHMOYK'L BHPWY WYULYX, RAMAFHB HIYGYXOPL YEY UL U TPSSYK CURYL AI COYG MOY LHIHKPZPW XKHGY HZ MOY TPSS COYYSPL PGMYKKAIMYX. OY SPLMYGYX MH COUM SUGNYKHG LUPX, UL PZ KYTUKRPGN, "LHEHA UKY LMPSS UM MOUM LPSSE VALPGYLL!" JAPWRSE WSHLYX OPL YEY UNUPG, UGXSYM OPL OYUX LPGR LMPSS SHCYK.SUGNYKHG, MKEPGN UL BPKASYGMSE UL IHLLPVSY MH LMPGN CYEKHMOYK'L BUGPMEUL UAMOHK HZ MOY TPSPMUKE ISUG, UKNAYX MOUM VHGUIUKMY TPNOM YULPSEUMMUWR PGLMYUX HZ VYPGN UMMUWRYX, UGX LH KYGXYK MOY COHSY HZ MOPLISUG IYKZYWMSE CHKMOSYLL. CYEKHMOYK TYM USS HVQYWMPHGL CPMO U ZPKT UGXWHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY, YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKYX VYZHKYOUGX MH TYYM USS HVQYWMPHGLVY MOYE COUM MOYE TPNOM."PZ OY WHASX UMMUWR AL, OY CHASX OUBY XHGY LH MHXUE," LUPX OY."LH EHA MOPGR OY PL IHCYKSYLL?" LUPX SUGNYKHG."OY OUL ZHKME MOHALUGX TYG UM THLM," KYISPYX CYEKHMOYK, CPMO MOY LTPSYHZ U XHWMHK MH COHT UG HSX CPZY CPLOYL MH YDISUPG MOY MKYUMTYGM HZ UWULY."PG MOUM WULY OY PL PGBPMPGN OPL XHHT VE UCUPMPGN HAK UMMUWR," LUPXSUGNYKHG, CPMO U LAVMSE PKHGPWUS LTPSY, UNUPG NSUGWPGN KHAGX ZHK LAIIHKMMH TPSHKUXHBPWO COH CUL GYUK OPT.VAM TPSHKUXHBPWO CUL UM MOUM THTYGM YBPXYGMSE MOPGRPGN HZ UGEMOPGNKUMOYK MOUG HZ COUM MOY NYGYKUSL CYKY XPLIAMPGN UVHAM."TU ZHP!" LUPX OY, "MHTHKKHC CY LOUSS LYY USS MOUM HG MOY VUMMSYZPYSX."CYEKHMOYK UNUPG NUBY MOUM LTPSY COPWO LYYTYX MH LUE MOUM MH OPT PM CULLMKUGNY UGX KPXPWASHAL MH TYYM HVQYWMPHGL ZKHT KALLPUG NYGYKUSL UGX MHOUBY MH IKHBY MH MOYT COUM OY OUX GHM TYKYSE WHGBPGWYX OPTLYSZ HZ, VAMOUX USLH WHGBPGWYX MOY LHBYKYPNG YTIYKHKL HZ."MOY YGYTE OUL JAYGWOYX OPL ZPKYL UGX U WHGMPGAUS GHPLY PL OYUKX ZKHTOPL WUTI," LUPX OY. "COUM XHYL MOUM TYUG? YPMOYK OY PL KYMKYUMPGN, COPWOPL MOY HGSE MOPGN CY GYYX ZYUK, HK OY PL WOUGNPGN OPL IHLPMPHG." (OYLTPSYX PKHGPWUSSE.) "VAM YBYG PZ OY USLH MHHR AI U IHLPMPHG PG MOYMOAYKULLU, OY TYKYSE LUBYL AL U NKYUM XYUS HZ MKHAVSY UGX USS HAKUKKUGNYTYGML MH MOY TPGAMYLM XYMUPS KYTUPG MOY LUTY.""OHC PL MOUM?..." VYNUG IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH OUX ZHK SHGN VYYG CUPMPGN UGHIIHKMAGPME MH YDIKYLL OPL XHAVML.RAMAFHB OYKY CHRY AI, WHANOYX OYUBPSE, UGX SHHRYX KHAGX UM MOY NYGYKUSL."NYGMSYTYG, MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL ZHK MHTHKKHC--HK KUMOYK ZHK MHXUE, ZHK PMPL IULM TPXGPNOM--WUGGHM GHC VY USMYKYX," LUPX OY. "EHA OUBY OYUKX MOYT,UGX CY LOUSS USS XH HAK XAME. VAM VYZHKY U VUMMSY, MOYKY PL GHMOPGN THKYPTIHKMUGM..." OY IUALYX, "MOUG MH OUBY U NHHX LSYYI."OY THBYX UL PZ MH KPLY. MOY NYGYKUSL VHCYX UGX KYMPKYX. PM CUL IULMTPXGPNOM. IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM HAM.MOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK, UM COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX GHM VYYG UVSY MHYDIKYLL OPL HIPGPHG UL OY OUX OHIYX MH, SYZM HG OPT U BUNAY UGX AGYULEPTIKYLLPHG. COYMOYK XHSNHKARHB UGX CYEKHMOYK, HK RAMAFHB, SUGNYKHG, UGXMOY HMOYKL COH XPX GHM UIIKHBY HZ MOY ISUG HZ UMMUWR, CYKY KPNOM--OY XPXGHM RGHC. "VAM CUL PM KYUSSE GHM IHLLPVSY ZHK RAMAFHB MH LMUMY OPL BPYCLISUPGSE MH MOY YTIYKHK? PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM HG UWWHAGM HZ WHAKM UGXIYKLHGUS WHGLPXYKUMPHGL MYGL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ SPBYL, UGX TE SPZY, TESPZY," OY MOHANOM, "TALM VY KPLRYX?""EYL, PM PL BYKE SPRYSE MOUM P LOUSS VY RPSSYX MHTHKKHC," OY MOHANOM.UGX LAXXYGSE, UM MOPL MOHANOM HZ XYUMO, U COHSY LYKPYL HZ THLM XPLMUGM,THLM PGMPTUMY, TYTHKPYL KHLY PG OPL PTUNPGUMPHG: OY KYTYTVYKYX OPL SULMIUKMPGN ZKHT OPL ZUMOYK UGX OPL CPZY; OY KYTYTVYKYX MOY XUEL COYG OYZPKLM SHBYX OYK. OY MOHANOM HZ OYK IKYNGUGWE UGX ZYSM LHKKE ZHK OYK UGXZHK OPTLYSZ, UGX PG U GYKBHALSE YTHMPHGUS UGX LHZMYGYX THHX OY CYGM HAMHZ MOY OAM PG COPWO OY CUL VPSSYMYX CPMO GYLBPMLRP UGX VYNUG MH CUSR AIUGX XHCG VYZHKY PM.MOY GPNOM CUL ZHNNE UGX MOKHANO MOY ZHN MOY THHGSPNOM NSYUTYXTELMYKPHALSE. "EYL, MHTHKKHC, MHTHKKHC!" OY MOHANOM. "MHTHKKHCYBYKEMOPGN TUE VY HBYK ZHK TY! USS MOYLY TYTHKPYL CPSS VY GH THKY, GHGYHZ MOYT CPSS OUBY UGE TYUGPGN ZHK TY. MHTHKKHC IYKOUIL, YBYG WYKMUPGSE,P OUBY U IKYLYGMPTYGM MOUM ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY P LOUSS OUBY MH LOHC USS PWUG XH." UGX OPL ZUGWE IPWMAKYX MOY VUMMSY, PML SHLL, MOY WHGWYGMKUMPHGHZ ZPNOMPGN UM HGY IHPGM, UGX MOY OYLPMUMPHG HZ USS MOY WHTTUGXYKL. UGXMOYG MOUM OUIIE THTYGM, MOUM MHASHG ZHK COPWO OY OUX LH SHGN CUPMYX,IKYLYGML PMLYSZ MH OPT UM SULM. OY ZPKTSE UGX WSYUKSE YDIKYLLYL OPLHIPGPHG MH RAMAFHB, MH CYEKHMOYK, UGX MH MOY YTIYKHKL. USS UKY LMKAWR VEMOY QALMGYLL HZ OPL BPYCL, VAM GH HGY AGXYKMURYL MH WUKKE MOYT HAM, LHOY MURYL U KYNPTYGM, U XPBPLPHG-LMPIASUMYL MOUM GH HGY PL MH PGMYKZYKYCPMO OPL UKKUGNYTYGML--SYUXL OPL XPBPLPHG MH MOY XYWPLPBY IHPGM, UGXNUPGL MOY BPWMHKE USHGY. "VAM XYUMO UGX LAZZYKPGN?" LANNYLMYX UGHMOYKBHPWY. IKPGWY UGXKYC, OHCYBYK, XPX GHM UGLCYK MOUM BHPWY UGX CYGM HGXKYUTPGN HZ OPL MKPATIOL. MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL ZHK MOY GYDM VUMMSY UKYISUGGYX VE OPT USHGY. GHTPGUSSE OY PL HGSE UG UXQAMUGM HG RAMAFHB'LLMUZZ, VAM OY XHYL YBYKEMOPGN USHGY. MOY GYDM VUMMSY PL CHG VE OPTUSHGY. RAMAFHB PL KYTHBYX UGX OY PL UIIHPGMYX... "CYSS UGX MOYG?" ULRYXMOY HMOYK BHPWY. "PZ VYZHKY MOUM EHA UKY GHM MYG MPTYL CHAGXYX, RPSSYX,HK VYMKUEYX, CYSS... COUM MOYG?..." VUNKUMPHG WUSSYX MH OPT ZKHTMOY OPSS GHM MH NH VYEHGX MOY LMKYUT, VAM KHLMHB IKYMYGXYX GHM MH OYUKOPT UGX XPX GHM LMHI VAM KHXY HG UGX HG, WHGMPGAUSSE TPLMURPGN VALOYLZHK MKYYL UGX NASSPYL ZHK TYG UGX WHGMPGAUSSE XPLWHBYKPGN OPL TPLMURYL.OUBPGN XYLWYGXYX MOY OPSS UM U MKHM, OY GH SHGNYK LUC YPMOYK HAK HCG HKMOY YGYTE'L ZPKYL, VAM OYUKX MOY LOHAMPGN HZ MOY ZKYGWO THKY SHAXSE UGXXPLMPGWMSE. MH RYYI MH MOY KHUX COPWONSYUTYX COPMY PG MOY TPLM CHASX OUBY VYYG LUZYK VYWUALY PM CHASX VYYULPYK MH LYY IYHISY WHTPGN USHGN PM. "ZHSSHC TY!" LUPX OY, WKHLLYX MOYKHUX, UGX VYNUG KPXPGN AI MOY OPSS UM U NUSSHI MHCUKX MOY IHPGM COYKYMOY ZKYGWO IPWRYML OUX VYYG LMUGXPGN MOUM YBYGPGN."EHAK OHGHK, MOYKY OY PL!" "MOYE TPNOMKYMKYUM UGX SYUBY MOY IPWRYML.""PM'L ISUPG MOUM MOYE OUBY GHM USS NHGY EYM, IKPGWY," LUPX VUNKUMPHG."CUPM MPSS MHTHKKHC THKGPGN, CY'SS ZPGX HAM YBYKEMOPGN MHTHKKHC.""MOY IPWRYM PL LMPSS HG MOY OPSS, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, QALM COYKY PM CULPG MOY YBYGPGN," KYIHKMYX KHLMHB, LMHHIPGN ZHKCUKX CPMO OPL OUGX UM MOYLUSAMY UGX AGUVSY MH KYIKYLL MOY LTPSY HZ XYSPNOM PGXAWYX VE OPL KPXYUGX YLIYWPUSSE VE MOY LHAGX HZ MOY VASSYML."BYKE NHHX, BYKE NHHX," LUPX VUNKUMPHG. MOY LHSXPYKL, HG LYYPGN OPT,SPM CPLIL HZ LMKUC UGX KUG UZMYK OPT, LOHAMPGN, "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!"GUIHSYHG'L IKHWSUTUMPHG CUL UL ZHSSHCL:LHSXPYKL! MOY KALLPUG UKTE PL UXBUGWPGN UNUPGLM EHA MH UBYGNY MOYUALMKPUG UKTE HZ AST. MOYE UKY MOY LUTY VUMMUSPHGL EHA VKHRY UMOHSSUVKAGG UGX OUBY IAKLAYX YBYK LPGWY MH MOPL ISUWY. MOY IHLPMPHG CYHWWAIE PL U LMKHGN HGY, UGX COPSY MOYE UKY TUKWOPGN MH NH KHAGX TY HGMOY KPNOM MOYE CPSS YDIHLY U ZSUGR MH TY. LHSXPYKL! P CPSS TELYSZ XPKYWMEHAK VUMMUSPHGL. P CPSS RYYI HAM HZ ZPKY PZ EHA CPMO EHAK OUVPMAUS BUSHKWUKKE XPLHKXYK UGX WHGZALPHG PGMH MOY YGYTE'L KUGRL, VAM LOHASX BPWMHKEVY PG XHAVM, YBYG ZHK U THTYGM, EHA CPSS LYY EHAK YTIYKHK YDIHLPGNOPTLYSZ MH MOY ZPKLM VSHCL HZ MOY YGYTE, ZHK MOYKY TALM VY GH XHAVM HZBPWMHKE, YLIYWPUSSE HG MOPL XUE COYG COUM PL UM LMURY PL MOY OHGHK HZMOY ZKYGWO PGZUGMKE, LH GYWYLLUKE MH MOY OHGHK HZ HAK GUMPHG.XH GHM VKYUR EHAK KUGRL HG MOY ISYU HZ KYTHBPGN MOY CHAGXYX! SYM YBYKETUG VY ZASSE PTVAYX CPMO MOY MOHANOM MOUM CY TALM XYZYUM MOYLY OPKYSPGNLHZ YGNSUGX, PGLIPKYX VE LAWO OUMKYX HZ HAK GUMPHG! MOPL BPWMHKE CPSSWHGWSAXY HAK WUTIUPNG UGX CY WUG KYMAKG MH CPGMYK JAUKMYKL, COYKY ZKYLOZKYGWO MKHHIL COH UKY VYPGN KUPLYX PG ZKUGWY CPSS QHPG AL, UGX MOY IYUWYP LOUSS WHGWSAXY CPSS VY CHKMOE HZ TE IYHISY, HZ EHA, UGX HZ TELYSZ.GUIHSYHGWOUIMYK DPBUM ZPBY PG MOY THKGPGN PM CUL LMPSS JAPMY XUKR. MOY MKHHIL HZ MOYWYGMYK, MOY KYLYKBYL, UGX VUNKUMPHG'L KPNOM ZSUGR OUX GHM EYM THBYX, VAMHG MOY SYZM ZSUGR MOY WHSATGL HZ PGZUGMKE, WUBUSKE, UGX UKMPSSYKE, COPWOCYKY MH VY MOY ZPKLM MH XYLWYGX MOY OYPNOML MH UMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO KPNOMZSUGR UGX XKPBY PM PGMH MOY VHOYTPUG THAGMUPGL UWWHKXPGN MH ISUG, CYKYUSKYUXE AI UGX ULMPK. MOY LTHRY HZ MOY WUTIZPKYL, PGMH COPWO MOYE CYKYMOKHCPGN YBYKEMOPGN LAIYKZSAHAL, TUXY MOY YEYL LTUKM. PM CUL WHSX UGXXUKR. MOY HZZPWYKL CYKY OAKKPYXSE XKPGRPGN MYU UGX VKYURZULMPGN, MOYLHSXPYKL, TAGWOPGN VPLWAPM UGX VYUMPGN U MUMMHH CPMO MOYPK ZYYM MHCUKT MOYTLYSBYL, NUMOYKPGN KHAGX MOY ZPKYL MOKHCPGN PGMH MOY ZSUTYL MOYKYTUPGL HZ LOYXL, WOUPKL, MUVSYL, COYYSL, MAVL, UGX YBYKEMOPGN MOUM MOYEXPX GHM CUGM HK WHASX GHM WUKKE UCUE CPMO MOYT. UALMKPUG WHSATG NAPXYLCYKY THBPGN PG UGX HAM UTHGN MOY KALLPUG MKHHIL UGX LYKBYX UL OYKUSXLHZ MOY UXBUGWY. UL LHHG UL UG UALMKPUG HZZPWYK LOHCYX OPTLYSZ GYUK UWHTTUGXPGN HZZPWYK'L JAUKMYKL, MOY KYNPTYGM VYNUG MH THBY: MOY LHSXPYKLKUG ZKHT MOY ZPKYL, MOKALM MOYPK IPIYL PGMH MOYPK VHHML, MOYPK VUNLPGMH MOY WUKML, NHM MOYPK TALRYML KYUXE, UGX ZHKTYX KUGR. MOY HZZPWYKLVAMMHGYX AI MOYPK WHUML, VAWRSYX HG MOYPK LCHKXL UGX IHAWOYL, UGX THBYXUSHGN MOY KUGRL LOHAMPGN. MOY MKUPG XKPBYKL UGX HKXYKSPYL OUKGYLLYX UGXIUWRYX MOY CUNHGL UGX MPYX HG MOY SHUXL. MOY UXQAMUGML UGX VUMMUSPHGUGX KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYKL THAGMYX, WKHLLYX MOYTLYSBYL, NUBY ZPGUSPGLMKAWMPHGL, HKXYKL, UGX WHTTPLLPHGL MH MOY VUNNUNY TYG COH KYTUPGYXVYOPGX, UGX MOY THGHMHGHAL MKUTI HZ MOHALUGXL HZ ZYYM KYLHAGXYX. MOYWHSATG THBYX ZHKCUKX CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COYKY UGX AGUVSY, ZKHT MOY TULLYLUKHAGX MOYT, MOY LTHRY UGX MOY PGWKYULPGN ZHN, MH LYY YPMOYK MOY ISUWYMOYE CYKY SYUBPGN HK MOUM MH COPWO MOYE CYKY NHPGN.U LHSXPYK HG MOY TUKWO PL OYTTYX PG UGX VHKGY USHGN VE OPL KYNPTYGM ULTAWO UL U LUPSHK PL VE OPL LOPI. OHCYBYK ZUK OY OUL CUSRYX, COUMYBYKLMKUGNY, AGRGHCG, UGX XUGNYKHAL ISUWYL OY KYUWOYL, QALM UL U LUPSHK PLUSCUEL LAKKHAGXYX VE MOY LUTY XYWRL, TULML, UGX KPNNPGN HZ OPL LOPI, LHMOY LHSXPYK USCUEL OUL UKHAGX OPT MOY LUTY WHTKUXYL, MOY LUTY KUGRL,MOY LUTY LYKNYUGM TUQHK PBUG TPMKPWO, MOY LUTY WHTIUGE XHN QUWR, UGX MOYLUTY WHTTUGXYKL. MOY LUPSHK KUKYSE WUKYL MH RGHC MOY SUMPMAXY PG COPWOOPL LOPI PL LUPSPGN, VAM HG MOY XUE HZ VUMMSY--OYUBYG RGHCL OHC UGXCOYGWY--U LMYKG GHMY HZ COPWO USS UKY WHGLWPHAL LHAGXL PG MOY THKUSUMTHLIOYKY HZ UG UKTE, UGGHAGWPGN MOY UIIKHUWO HZ LHTYMOPGN XYWPLPBYUGX LHSYTG, UGX UCURYGPGN PG MOY TYG UG AGALAUS WAKPHLPME. HG MOY XUE HZVUMMSY MOY LHSXPYKL YDWPMYXSE MKE MH NYM VYEHGX MOY PGMYKYLML HZ MOYPKKYNPTYGM, MOYE SPLMYG PGMYGMSE, SHHR UVHAM, UGX YUNYKSE ULR WHGWYKGPGNCOUM PL NHPGN HG UKHAGX MOYT.MOY ZHN OUX NKHCG LH XYGLY MOUM MOHANO PM CUL NKHCPGN SPNOM MOYE WHASXGHM LYY MYG IUWYL UOYUX. VALOYL SHHRYX SPRY NPNUGMPW MKYYL UGX SYBYSNKHAGX SPRY WSPZZL UGX LSHIYL. UGECOYKY, HG UGE LPXY, HGY TPNOMYGWHAGMYK UG YGYTE PGBPLPVSY MYG IUWYL HZZ. VAM MOY WHSATGL UXBUGWYXZHK U SHGN MPTY, USCUEL PG MOY LUTY ZHN, XYLWYGXPGN UGX ULWYGXPGN OPSSL,UBHPXPGN NUKXYGL UGX YGWSHLAKYL, NHPGN HBYK GYC UGX AGRGHCG NKHAGX, UGXGHCOYKY YGWHAGMYKPGN MOY YGYTE. HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOY LHSXPYKL VYWUTYUCUKY MOUM PG ZKHGM, VYOPGX, UGX HG USS LPXYL, HMOYK KALLPUG WHSATGLCYKY THBPGN PG MOY LUTY XPKYWMPHG. YBYKE LHSXPYK ZYSM NSUX MH RGHC MOUMMH MOY AGRGHCG ISUWY COYKY OY CUL NHPGN, TUGE THKY HZ HAK TYG CYKY NHPGNMHH."MOYKY GHC, MOY RAKLRPYL OUBY USLH NHGY IULM," CUL VYPGN LUPX PG MOYKUGRL."PM'L CHGXYKZAS COUM U SHM HZ HAK MKHHIL OUBY NUMOYKYX, SUXL! SULMGPNOM P SHHRYX UM MOY WUTIZPKYL UGX MOYKY CUL GH YGX HZ MOYT. VAM COYG MOYE OUX TUKWOYX ZHK UVHAM UG OHAK PG MOY XYGLY ZHN,MOY NKYUMYK IUKM HZ MOY TYG OUX MH OUSM UGX UG AGISYULUGM WHGLWPHALGYLLHZ LHTY XPLSHWUMPHG UGX VSAGXYK LIKYUX MOKHANO MOY KUGRL. CUL VYPGN KYIYUMYX HG XPZZYKYGM LPXYL.UGX MOY ZYYSPGN HZ YGYKNE CPMO COPWO MOY MKHHIL OUX LMUKMYX VYNUG MHMAKG PGMH BYDUMPHG UGX UGNYK UM MOY LMAIPX UKKUGNYTYGML UGX UM MOYNYKTUGL.MOY WUALY HZ MOY WHGZALPHG CUL MOUM COPSY MOY UALMKPUG WUBUSKE CULTHBPGN MHCUKX HAK SYZM ZSUGR, MOY OPNOYK WHTTUGX ZHAGX MOUM HAK WYGMYKCUL MHH ZUK LYIUKUMYX ZKHT HAK KPNOM ZSUGR UGX MOY WUBUSKE CYKY USSHKXYKYX MH MAKG VUWR MH MOY KPNOM. LYBYKUS MOHALUGX WUBUSKE WKHLLYX PGZKHGM HZ MOY PGZUGMKE, COH OUX MH CUPM.UM MOY ZKHGM UG USMYKWUMPHG HWWAKKYX VYMCYYG UG UALMKPUG NAPXY UGX UKALLPUG NYGYKUS. MOY NYGYKUS LOHAMYX U XYTUGX MOUM MOY WUBUSKE LOHASX VYOUSMYX, MOY UALMKPUG UKNAYX MOUM GHM OY, VAM MOY OPNOYK WHTTUGX, CUL MHVSUTY. MOY MKHHIL TYUGCOPSY LMHHX NKHCPGN SPLMSYLL UGX XPLIPKPMYX. UZMYKUG OHAK'L XYSUE MOYE UM SULM THBYX HG, XYLWYGXPGN MOY OPSS. MOY ZHN MOUMCUL XPLIYKLPGN HG MOY OPSS SUE LMPSS THKY XYGLYSE VYSHC, COYKY MOYE CYKYXYLWYGXPGN. PG ZKHGM PG MOY ZHN U LOHM CUL OYUKX UGX MOYG UGHMOYK, UMZPKLM PKKYNASUKSE UM BUKEPGN PGMYKBUSL--MKUMU... MOY ZHAKMO WHSATG, CPMO COPWO RAMAFHB CUL, LMHHX HG MOYIKUMFYG OYPNOML.VYSHC, COYKY MOY ZPNOM CUL VYNPGGPGN, MOYKY CUL LMPSS MOPWR ZHN; HG MOYOPNOYK NKHAGX PM CUL WSYUKPGN, VAM GHMOPGN WHASX VY LYYG HZ COUM CULNHPGN HG PG ZKHGM. COYMOYK USS MOY YGYTE ZHKWYL CYKY, UL CY LAIIHLYX,LPD TPSYL UCUE, HK COYMOYK MOYE CYKY GYUK VE PG MOUM LYU HZ TPLM, GH HGYRGYC MPSS UZMYK YPNOM H'WSHWR.PM CUL GPGY H'WSHWR PG MOY THKGPGN. MOY ZHN SUE AGVKHRYG SPRY U LYU XHCGVYSHC, VAM OPNOYK AI UM MOY BPSSUNY HZ LWOSUIIUGPMF COYKY GUIHSYHG LMHHXCPMO OPL TUKLOUSL UKHAGX OPT, PM CUL JAPMY SPNOM. UVHBY OPT CUL U WSYUKVSAY LRE, UGX MOY LAG'L BULM HKV JAPBYKYX SPRY U OANY OHSSHC, WKPTLHGZSHUM HG MOY LAKZUWY HZ MOUM TPSRE LYU HZ TPLM. GUIHSYHG, PG MOY VSAY WSHURCOPWO OY OUX CHKG HG OPL PMUSPUG WUTIUPNG, LUM HG OPL LTUSS NKUE UKUVOHKLY U SPMMSY PG ZKHGM HZ OPL TUKLOUSL. IUKM HZ MOY KALLPUG ZHKWYOUX USKYUXE XYLWYGXYX PGMH MOY BUSSYE MHCUKX MOY IHGXL UGX SURYL UGXIUKM CYKY SYUBPGN MOYLY IKUMFYG OYPNOML COPWO OY PGMYGXYX MH UMMUWRUGX KYNUKXYX UL MOY RYE MH MOY IHLPMPHG. ZKHT PGZHKTUMPHG OY OUX KYWYPBYX MOY YBYGPGN VYZHKY, ZKHT MOYLHAGX HZ COYYSL UGX ZHHMLMYIL OYUKX VE MOY HAMIHLML XAKPGN MOY GPNOM,VE MOY XPLHKXYKSE THBYTYGM HZ MOY KALLPUG WHSATGL, UGX ZKHT USSPGXPWUMPHGL, OY LUC WSYUKSE MOUM MOY USSPYL VYSPYBYX OPT MH VY ZUK UCUEPG ZKHGM HZ MOYT, UGX MOUM MOY WHSATGL THBPGN GYUK IKUMFYG WHGLMPMAMYXMOY WYGMYK HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE, UGX MOUM MOUM WYGMYK CUL USKYUXELAZZPWPYGMSE CYURYGYX MH VY LAWWYLLZASSE UMMUWRYX. MOY TUKLOUSL,UWWHTIUGPYX VE UXQAMUGML, NUSSHIYX HZZ PG XPZZYKYGM XPKYWMPHGL, UGXU ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK MOY WOPYZ ZHKWYL HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE THBYX KUIPXSEMHCUKX MOHLY IKUMFYG OYPNOML COPWO CYKY VYPGN THKY UGX THKY XYGAXYX VEKALLPUG MKHHIL THBPGN XHCG MOY BUSSYE MH MOYPK SYZM.WOUIMYK DBUM YPNOM H'WSHWR RAMAFHB KHXY MH IKUMFYG UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY ZHAKMOWHSATG, TPSHKUXHBPWO'L, MOY HGY MOUM CUL MH MURY MOY ISUWY HZIKFYVELFYCLRP'L UGX SUGNYKHG'L WHSATGL COPWO OUX USKYUXE NHGY XHCG PGMHMOY BUSSYE. OY TAKTAKYX MH OPTLYSZ, LMPSS GHMKYISEPGN MH MOY UALMKPUG.IKPGWY UGXKYC NUSSHIYX HZZ MH YDYWAMY MOY HKXYK.HBYKMURPGN MOY VUMMUSPHGL MOUM WHGMPGAYX MH UXBUGWY, OY LMHIIYXMOY MOPKX XPBPLPHG UGX WHGBPGWYX OPTLYSZ MOUM MOYKY KYUSSE CYKY GHLOUKILOHHMYKL PG ZKHGM HZ HAK WHSATGL. MOY WHSHGYS UM MOY OYUX HZ MOYKYNPTYGM CUL TAWO LAKIKPLYX UM MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L HKXYK MH MOKHCHAM LRPKTPLOYKL. OUBPGN NPBYG HKXYKL PG MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'LGUTY MH KYWMPZE MOPL HTPLLPHG, IKPGWY UGXKYC NUSSHIYX VUWR. RAMAFHBLMPSS PG MOY LUTY ISUWY, OPL LMHAM VHXE KYLMPGN OYUBPSE PG MOY LUXXSYCPMO MOY SULLPMAXY HZ UNY, LUM EUCGPGN CYUKPSE CPMO WSHLYX YEYL. MOYMKHHIL CYKY GH SHGNYK THBPGN, VAM LMHHX CPMO MOY VAMML HZ MOYPK TALRYMLHG MOY NKHAGX."USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM!" OY LUPX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX MAKGYX MH UNYGYKUS COH, CUMWO PG OUGX, CUL LUEPGN PM CUL MPTY MOYE LMUKMYX UL USSMOY SYZM-ZSUGR WHSATGL OUX USKYUXE XYLWYGXYX."ISYGME HZ MPTY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," TAMMYKYX RAMAFHB PG MOY TPXLM HZ UEUCG. "ISYGME HZ MPTY," OY KYIYUMYX.QALM MOYG UM U XPLMUGWY VYOPGX RAMAFHB CUL OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ KYNPTYGMLLUSAMPGN, UGX MOPL LHAGX KUIPXSE WUTY GYUKYK USHGN MOY COHSY YDMYGXYXSPGY HZ MOY UXBUGWPGN KALLPUG WHSATGL. COYG MOY LHSXPYKL HZ MOY KYNPTYGM PG ZKHGMHZ COPWO RAMAFHB CUL LMUGXPGN VYNUG MH LOHAM, OY KHXY U SPMMSY MH HGYLPXY UGX SHHRYX KHAGX CPMO U ZKHCG. USHGN MOY KHUX ZKHT IKUMFYG NUSSHIYXCOUM SHHRYX SPRY U LJAUXKHG HZ OHKLYTYG PG BUKPHAL AGPZHKTL. MCH HZ MOYTKHXY LPXY VE LPXY PG ZKHGM, UM ZASS NUSSHI. (IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMYX MOUMRAMAFHB'L AIIYK SPI MCPMWOYX AGGUMAKUSSE UL OY LUPX MOY CHKX "CUPMPGN.")"GHM USS MOY WHSATGL OUBY ZHKTYX AI EYM, EHAK TUQYLME."MOY MLUK OYUKX VAM HVBPHALSE XPX GHM SPRY MOY KYISE; OY LOKANNYX OPLKUMOYK KHAGX LOHASXYKL UGX NSUGWYX UM GHBHLPSMLYB COH CUL GYUK OPT, ULPZ WHTISUPGPGN HZ RAMAFHB."EHA RGHC, TPWOUYS PSUKPHGHBPWO, CY UKY GHM HG MOY YTIKYLL' ZPYSX COYKYU IUKUXY XHYL GHM VYNPG MPSS USS MOY MKHHIL UKY ULLYTVSYX," LUPX MOYMLUK CPMO UGHMOYK NSUGWY UM MOY YTIYKHK ZKUGWPL, UL PZ PGBPMPGN OPT PZGHM MH QHPG PG UM SYULM MH SPLMYG MH COUM OY CUL LUEPGN. U LYKNYUGM HZ MOY VUMMUSPHG KUG AI UGX MHHR MOY ZSUNMOUM CUL LCUEPGN ZKHT PML CYPNOM PG IKPGWY UGXKYC'L OUGXL, VAM OYCUL PTTYXPUMYSE RPSSYX. IKPGWY UGXKYC UNUPG LYPFYX MOY LMUGXUKX UGX,XKUNNPGN PM VE MOY LMUZZ, KUG HG CPMO MOY VUMMUSPHG. PG ZKHGM OY LUC HAKUKMPSSYKETYG, LHTY HZ COHT CYKY ZPNOMPGN, COPSY HMOYKL, OUBPGN UVUGXHGYXMOYPK NAGL, CYKY KAGGPGN MHCUKX OPT. OY USLH LUC ZKYGWO PGZUGMKELHSXPYKL COH CYKY LYPFPGN MOY UKMPSSYKE OHKLYL UGX MAKGPGN MOY NAGLKHAGX. IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX MOY VUMMUSPHG CYKY USKYUXE CPMOPG MCYGME IUWYLHZ MOY WUGGHG. OY OYUKX MOY COPLMSY HZ VASSYML UVHBY OPT AGWYULPGNSE UGXMH KPNOM UGX SYZM HZ OPT LHSXPYKL WHGMPGAUSSE NKHUGYX UGX XKHIIYX. VAMOY XPX GHM SHHR UM MOYT: OY SHHRYX HGSE UM COUM CUL NHPGN HG PG ZKHGMHZ OPT--UM MOY VUMMYKE. OY GHC LUC WSYUKSE MOY ZPNAKY HZ U KYX-OUPKYXNAGGYK CPMO OPL LOURH RGHWRYX UCKE, IASSPGN HGY YGX HZ U THI COPSYU ZKYGWO LHSXPYK MANNYX UM MOY HMOYK. OY WHASX XPLMPGWMSE LYY MOYXPLMKUANOM EYM UGNKE YDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOYLY MCH TYG, COHYBPXYGMSE XPX GHM KYUSPFY COUM MOYE CYKY XHPGN."COUM UKY MOYE UVHAM?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC UL OY NUFYX UM MOYT. "COEXHYLG'M MOY KYX-OUPKYX NAGGYK KAG UCUE UL OY PL AGUKTYX? COE XHYLG'M MOYZKYGWOTUG LMUV OPT? OY CPSS GHM NYM UCUE VYZHKY MOY ZKYGWOTUG KYTYTVYKLOPL VUEHGYM UGX LMUVL OPT...."UGX KYUSSE UGHMOYK ZKYGWO LHSXPYK, MKUPSPGN OPL TALRYM, KUG AI MHMOY LMKANNSPGN TYG, UGX MOY ZUMY HZ MOY KYX-OUPKYX NAGGYK, COH OUXMKPATIOUGMSE LYWAKYX MOY THI UGX LMPSS XPX GHM KYUSPFY COUM UCUPMYX OPT,CUL UVHAM MH VY XYWPXYX. VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM LYY OHC PM YGXYX. PMLYYTYX MH OPT UL MOHANO HGY HZ MOY LHSXPYKL GYUK OPT OPM OPT HG MOY OYUXCPMO MOY ZASS LCPGN HZ U VSAXNYHG. PM OAKM U SPMMSY, VAM MOY CHKLM HZPM CUL MOUM MOY IUPG XPLMKUWMYX OPT UGX IKYBYGMYX OPL LYYPGN COUM OY OUXVYYG SHHRPGN UM."COUM'L MOPL? UT P ZUSSPGN? TE SYNL UKY NPBPGN CUE," MOHANOM OY, UGXZYSS HG OPL VUWR. OY HIYGYX OPL YEYL, OHIPGN MH LYY OHC MOY LMKANNSY HZMOY ZKYGWOTYG CPMO MOY NAGGYKL YGXYX, COYMOYK MOY KYX-OUPKYX NAGGYK OUXVYYG RPSSYX HK GHM UGX COYMOYK MOY WUGGHG OUX VYYG WUIMAKYX HK LUBYX.VAM OY LUC GHMOPGN. UVHBY OPT MOYKY CUL GHC GHMOPGN VAM MOY LRE--MOYSHZME LRE, GHM WSYUK EYM LMPSS PTTYULAKUVSE SHZME, CPMO NKUE WSHAXLNSPXPGN LSHCSE UWKHLL PM. "OHC JAPYM, IYUWYZAS, UGX LHSYTG; GHM UM USSUL P KUG," MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC--"GHM UL CY KUG, LOHAMPGN UGX ZPNOMPGN,GHM UM USS UL MOY NAGGYK UGX MOY ZKYGWOTUG CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX UGX UGNKEZUWYL LMKANNSYX ZHK MOY THI: OHC XPZZYKYGMSE XH MOHLY WSHAXL NSPXYUWKHLL MOUM SHZME PGZPGPMY LRE! VAM YBYG PM XHYL GHM YDPLM, MOYKY PL GHMOPGN VAM JAPYM UGX IYUWY.MOUGR NHX!..."WOUIMYK DBPPHG HAK KPNOM ZSUGR WHTTUGXYX VE VUNKUMPHG, UM GPGY H'WSHWR MOY VUMMSYOUX GHM EYM VYNAG. GHM CPLOPGN MH UNKYY MH XHSNHKARHB'L XYTUGX MHWHTTYGWY MOY UWMPHG, UGX CPLOPGN MH UBYKM KYLIHGLPVPSPME ZKHT OPTLYSZ,IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG IKHIHLYX MH XHSNHKARHB MH LYGX MH PGJAPKY HZ MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. VUNKUMPHG RGYC MOUM UL MOY XPLMUGWY VYMCYYG MOY MCHZSUGRL CUL THKY MOUG LPD TPSYL, YBYG PZ MOY TYLLYGNYK CYKY GHM RPSSYX(COPWO OY BYKE SPRYSE CHASX VY), UGX ZHAGX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ(COPWO CHASX VY BYKE XPZZPWASM), OY CHASX GHM VY UVSY MH NYM VUWR VYZHKYYBYGPGN.VUNKUMPHG WULM OPL SUKNY, YDIKYLLPHGSYLL, LSYYIE YEYL KHAGX OPL LAPMY,UGX MOY VHEPLO ZUWY KHLMHB, VKYUMOSYLL CPMO YDWPMYTYGM UGX OHIY, CUL MOYZPKLM MH WUMWO OPL YEY. LUPX KHLMHB, CPMO OPL OUGX MH OPL WUI."EHA WUG NPBY MOY TYLLUNY MH OPL TUQYLME," LUPX XHSNHKARHB, OAKKPYXSEPGMYKKAIMPGN VUNKUMPHG.HG VYPGN KYSPYBYX ZKHT IPWRYM XAME KHLMHB OUX TUGUNYX MH NYM U ZYCOHAKL' LSYYI VYZHKY THKGPGN UGX ZYSM WOYYKZAS, VHSX, UGX KYLHSAMY, CPMOYSULMPWPME HZ THBYTYGM, ZUPMO PG OPL NHHX ZHKMAGY, UGX NYGYKUSSE PG MOUMLMUMY HZ TPGX COPWO TURYL YBYKEMOPGN LYYT IHLLPVSY, ISYULUGM, UGX YULE.USS OPL CPLOYL CYKY VYPGN ZASZPSSYX MOUM THKGPGN: MOYKY CUL MH VY UNYGYKUS YGNUNYTYGM PG COPWO OY CUL MURPGN IUKM, THKY MOUG MOUM, OY CULHKXYKSE MH MOY VKUBYLM NYGYKUS, UGX LMPSS THKY, OY CUL NHPGN CPMO UTYLLUNY MH RAMAFHB, IYKOUIL YBYG MH MOY LHBYKYPNG OPTLYSZ. MOY THKGPGNCUL VKPNOM, OY OUX U NHHX OHKLY AGXYK OPT, UGX OPL OYUKM CUL ZASS HZQHE UGX OUIIPGYLL. HG KYWYPBPGN MOY HKXYK OY NUBY OPL OHKLY MOY KYPG UGXNUSSHIYX USHGN MOY SPGY. UM ZPKLM OY KHXY USHGN MOY SPGY HZ VUNKUMPHG'LMKHHIL, COPWO OUX GHM EYM UXBUGWYX PGMH UWMPHG VAM CYKY LMUGXPGNTHMPHGSYLL; MOYG OY WUTY MH MOY KYNPHG HWWAIPYX VE ABUKHB'L WUBUSKEUGX OYKY OY GHMPWYX U LMPK UGX LPNGL HZ IKYIUKUMPHG ZHK VUMMSY; OUBPGNIULLYX ABUKHB'L WUBUSKE OY WSYUKSE OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ WUGGHG UGXTALRYMKE UOYUX HZ OPT. MOY ZPKPGN NKYC SHAXYK UGX SHAXYK.PG MOY ZKYLO THKGPGN UPK CYKY GHC OYUKX, GHM MCH HK MOKYY TALRYM LOHMLUM PKKYNASUK PGMYKBUSL UL VYZHKY, ZHSSHCYX VE HGY HK MCH WUGGHG LOHML,VAM U KHSS HZ BHSSYEL HZ TALRYMKE ZKHT MOY LSHIYL HZ MOY OPSS VYZHKYIKUMFYG, PGMYKKAIMYX VE LAWO ZKYJAYGM KYIHKML HZ WUGGHG MOUM LHTYMPTYLLYBYKUS HZ MOYT CYKY GHM LYIUKUMYX ZKHT HGY UGHMOYK VAM TYKNYX PGMH UNYGYKUS KHUK.OY WHASX LYY IAZZL HZ TALRYMKE LTHRY MOUM LYYTYX MH WOULY HGY UGHMOYKXHCG MOY OPSSLPXYL, UGX WSHAXL HZ WUGGHG LTHRY KHSSPGN, LIKYUXPGN,UGX TPGNSPGN CPMO HGY UGHMOYK. OY WHASX USLH, VE MOY NSYUT HZ VUEHGYMLBPLPVSY MOKHANO MOY LTHRY, TURY HAM THBPGN TULLYL HZ PGZUGMKE UGX GUKKHCSPGYL HZ UKMPSSYKE CPMO NKYYG WUPLLHGL.KHLMHB LMHIIYX OPL OHKLY ZHK U THTYGM HG U OPSSHWR MH LYY COUM CUL NHPGNHG, VAM LMKUPG OPL UMMYGMPHG UL OY CHASX OY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX HK TURYHAM UGEMOPGN HZ COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN: MOYKY PG MOY LTHRY TYG HZ LHTY LHKMCYKY THBPGN UVHAM, PG ZKHGM UGX VYOPGX THBYX SPGYL HZ MKHHIL; VAM COE,COPMOYK, UGX COH MOYE CYKY, PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH TURY HAM. MOYLY LPNOMLUGX LHAGXL OUX GH XYIKYLLPGN HK PGMPTPXUMPGN YZZYWM HG OPT; HG MOYWHGMKUKE, MOYE LMPTASUMYX OPL YGYKNE UGX XYMYKTPGUMPHG."NH HG! NH HG! NPBY PM MOYT!" OY TYGMUSSE YDWSUPTYX UM MOYLY LHAGXL,UGX UNUPG IKHWYYXYX MH NUSSHI USHGN MOY SPGY, IYGYMKUMPGN ZUKMOYK UGXZUKMOYK PGMH MOY KYNPHG COYKY MOY UKTE CUL USKYUXE PG UWMPHG."OHC PM CPSS VY MOYKY P XHG'M RGHC, VAM USS CPSS VY CYSS!" P LOUSS LYY PM WSHLY," OY MOHANOM.OY CUL KPXPGN USTHLM USHGN MOY ZKHGM SPGY. U OUGXZAS HZ TYG WUTYNUSSHIPGN MHCUKX OPT. MOYE CYKY HAK AOSUGL COH CPMO XPLHKXYKYXKUGRL CYKY KYMAKGPGN ZKHT MOY UMMUWR. OY OUX GHM KPXXYG TUGEOAGXKYX EUKXL UZMYK MOUM VYZHKY OY LUC MH OPL SYZM, UWKHLL MOY COHSYCPXMO HZ MOY ZPYSX, UG YGHKTHAL TULL HZ WUBUSKE PG VKPSSPUGM COPMYAGPZHKTL, THAGMYX HG VSUWR OHKLYL, MKHMMPGN LMKUPNOM MHCUKX OPT UGXUWKHLL OPL IUMO. KHLMHB OYUKX MOY MOAX HZ MOYPK OHHZL UGXMOY QPGNSY HZ MOYPK CYUIHGL UGX LUC MOYPK OHKLYL, MOYPK ZPNAKYL, UGXYBYG MOYPK ZUWYL, THKY UGX THKY XPLMPGWMSE. MOYE CYKY HAK OHKLY NAUKXL,UXBUGWPGN MH UMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO WUBUSKE MOUM CUL WHTPGN MH TYYM MOYT.MOY OHKLY NAUKXL CYKY NUSSHIPGN, VAM LMPSS OHSXPGN PG MOYPK OHKLYL.KHLMHB WHASX USKYUXE LYY MOYPK ZUWYL UGX OYUKX MOY WHTTUGX: "WOUKNY!"LOHAMYX VE UG HZZPWYK COH CUL AKNPGN OPL MOHKHANOVKYX MH ZASS LIYYX.KHLMHB, ZYUKPGN MH VY WKALOYX HK LCYIM PGMH MOY UMMUWR HG MOY ZKYGWO,NUSSHIYX USHGN MOY ZKHGM UL OUKX UL OPL OHKLY WHASX NH, VAM LMPSS CULGHM PG MPTY MH UBHPX MOYT.MOY SULM HZ MOY OHKLY NAUKXL, U OANY IHWRTUKRYX ZYSSHC, ZKHCGYX UGNKPSEHG LYYPGN KHLMHB VYZHKY OPT, CPMO COHT OY CHASX PGYBPMUVSE WHSSPXY.MOPL NAUKXLTUG CHASX WYKMUPGSE OUBY VHCSYX KHLMHB UGX OPL VYXHAPG HBYK(KHLMHB ZYSM OPTLYSZ JAPMY MPGE UGX CYUR WHTIUKYX MH MOYLY NPNUGMPW TYGUGX OHKLYL) OUX PM GHM HWWAKKYX MH KHLMHB MH ZSHAKPLO OPL COPI VYZHKYMOY YEYL HZ MOY NAUKXLTUG'L OHKLY. MOY OYUBE VSUWR OHKLY, LPDMYYG OUGXLOPNO, LOPYX, MOKHCPGN VUWR PML YUKL; VAM MOY IHWRTUKRYX NAUKXLTUG XKHBYOPL OANY LIAKL PG BPHSYGMSE, UGX MOY OHKLY, ZSHAKPLOPGN PML MUPS UGXYDMYGXPGN PML GYWR, NUSSHIYX HG EYM ZULMYK. OUKXSE OUX MOY OHKLY NAUKXLIULLYX KHLMHB VYZHKY OY OYUKX MOYT LOHAM, "OAKKUO!" UGX SHHRPGN VUWR LUCMOUM MOYPK ZHKYTHLM KUGRL CYKY TPDYX AI CPMO LHTY ZHKYPNG WUBUSKECPMO KYX YIUASYML, IKHVUVSE ZKYGWO. LUPX MOY LHSXPYK, SUANOPGNZHK LHTY KYULHG UGX LOURPGN OPTLYSZ ZKYY.OUBPGN SYZM MOUM LHSXPYK COH CUL YBPXYGMSE XKAGR, KHLMHB LMHIIYX MOYOHKLY HZ U VUMTUG HK NKHHT HZ LHTY PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY UGX VYNUG MHJAYLMPHG OPT. "PM TALM OUBY VYYG LHTYHGY YSLY.""P LUC OPT TELYSZ," KYISPYX MOY TUG CPMO U LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM LTPSY HZXYKPLPHG. "P HANOM MH RGHC MOY YTIYKHK VE GHC, UZMYK MOY MPTYL P'BY LYYGOPT PG IYMYKLVAKN. P LUC OPT QALM UL P LYY EHA.... MOYKY OY LUM PG MOYWUKKPUNY UL IUSY UL UGEMOPGN. OHC MOYE TUXY MOY ZHAK VSUWR OHKLYL ZSE!NKUWPHAL TY, MOYE XPX KUMMSY IULM! PM'L MPTY P RGYC MOY PTIYKPUS OHKLYLUGX PSEU PBUGEWO. P XHG'M MOPGR PSEU XKPBYL UGEHGY YDWYIM MOY MLUK!"KHLMHB SYM NH HZ MOY OHKLY UGX CUL UVHAM MH KPXY HG, COYG U CHAGXYXHZZPWYK IULLPGN VE UXXKYLLYX OPT:"COH PL PM EHA CUGM?" OY ULRYX. "MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ? OY CUL RPSSYXVE U WUGGHG VUSS--LMKAWR PG MOY VKYULM VYZHKY HAK KYNPTYGM.""GHM RPSSYX--CHAGXYX!" UGHMOYK HZZPWYK WHKKYWMYX OPT."COH? RAMAFHB?" ULRYX KHLMHB."GHM RAMAFHB, VAM COUM'L OPL GUTY--CYSS, GYBYK TPGX... MOYKY UKY GHMTUGE SYZM USPBY. NH MOUM CUE, MH MOUM BPSSUNY, USS MOY WHTTUGXYKL UKYMOYKY," LUPX MOY HZZPWYK, IHPGMPGN MH MOY BPSSUNY HZ OHLQYKUXYR, UGX OYCUSRYX HG.KHLMHB KHXY HG UM U ZHHMIUWY GHM RGHCPGN COE HK MH COHT OY CUL GHCNHPGN. MOY YTIYKHK CUL CHAGXYX, MOY VUMMSY SHLM. PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MHXHAVM PM GHC. KHLMHB KHXY PG MOY XPKYWMPHG IHPGMYX HAM MH OPT, PG COPWOOY LUC MAKKYML UGX U WOAKWO. COUM GYYX MH OAKKE? COUM CUL OY GHC MH LUEMH MOY MLUK HK MH RAMAFHB, YBYG PZ MOYE CYKY USPBY UGX AGCHAGXYX?"MURY MOPL KHUX, EHAK OHGHK, MOUM CUE EHA CPSS VY RPSSYX UM HGWY!" ULHSXPYK LOHAMYX MH OPT. "MOYE'X RPSS EHA MOYKY!""HO, COUM UKY EHA MUSRPGN UVHAM?" LUPX UGHMOYK. "COYKY PL OY MH NH? MOUMCUE PL GYUKYK."KHLMHB WHGLPXYKYX, UGX MOYG CYGM PG MOY XPKYWMPHG COYKY MOYE LUPX OYCHASX VY RPSSYX."PM'L USS MOY LUTY GHC. PZ MOY YTIYKHK PL CHAGXYX, UT P MH MKE MH LUBYTELYSZ?" OY MOHANOM. OY KHXY HG MH MOY KYNPHG COYKY MOY NKYUMYLM GATVYKHZ TYG OUX IYKPLOYX PG ZSYYPGN ZKHT IKUMFYG. MOY ZKYGWO OUX GHM EYMHWWAIPYX MOUM KYNPHG, UGX MOY KALLPUGL--MOY AGPGQAKYX UGX LSPNOMSECHAGXYX--OUX SYZM PM SHGN UNH. USS UVHAM MOY ZPYSX, SPRY OYUIL HZ TUGAKYHG CYSS-RYIM ISHCSUGX, SUE ZKHT MYG MH ZPZMYYG XYUX UGX CHAGXYX MH YUWOWHAISY HZ UWKYL. MOY CHAGXYX WKYIM MHNYMOYK PG MCHL UGX MOKYYL UGX HGYWHASX OYUK MOYPK XPLMKYLLPGN LWKYUTL UGX NKHUGL, LHTYMPTYL ZYPNGYX--HKLH PM LYYTYX MH KHLMHB. OY IAM OPL OHKLY MH U MKHM MH UBHPX LYYPGN USSMOYLY LAZZYKPGN TYG, UGX OY ZYSM UZKUPX--UZKUPX GHM ZHK OPL SPZY, VAMZHK MOY WHAKUNY OY GYYXYX UGX COPWO OY RGYC CHASX GHM LMUGX MOY LPNOM HZMOYLY AGZHKMAGUMYL.MOY ZKYGWO, COH OUX WYULYX ZPKPGN UM MOPL ZPYSX LMKYCG CPMO XYUX UGXCHAGXYX COYKY MOYKY CUL GH HGY SYZM MH ZPKY UM, HG LYYPGN UG UXQAMUGMKPXPGN HBYK PM MKUPGYX U NAG HG OPT UGX ZPKYX LYBYKUS LOHML. MOYLYGLUMPHG HZ MOHLY MYKKPVSY COPLMSPGN LHAGXL UGX HZ MOY WHKILYL UKHAGXOPT TYKNYX PG KHLMHB'L TPGX PGMH U LPGNSY ZYYSPGN HZ MYKKHK UGX IPME ZHKOPTLYSZ. OY KYTYTVYKYX OPL THMOYK'L SULM SYMMYK. "COUM CHASX LOY ZYYS,"MOHANOM OY, "PZ LOY LUC TY OYKY GHC HG MOPL ZPYSX CPMO MOY WUGGHG UPTYXUM TY?"PG MOY BPSSUNY HZ OHLQYKUXYR MOYKY CYKY KALLPUG MKHHIL KYMPKPGN ZKHTMOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY, COH MOHANO LMPSS PG LHTY WHGZALPHG CYKY SYLLXPLHKXYKYX. MOY ZKYGWO WUGGHG XPX GHM KYUWO MOYKY UGX MOY TALRYMKE ZPKYLHAGXYX ZUK UCUE. OYKY YBYKEHGY WSYUKSE LUC UGX LUPX MOUM MOY VUMMSYCUL SHLM. GH HGY COHT KHLMHB ULRYX WHASX MYSS OPT COYKY MOY YTIYKHKHK RAMAFHB CUL. LHTY LUPX MOY KYIHKM MOUM MOY YTIYKHK CUL CHAGXYX CULWHKKYWM, HMOYKL MOUM PM CUL GHM, UGX YDISUPGYX MOY ZUSLY KATHK MOUM OUXLIKYUX VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY YTIYKHK'L WUKKPUNY OUX KYUSSE NUSSHIYX ZKHTMOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY CPMO MOY IUSY UGX MYKKPZPYX HVYK-OHZTUKLWOUS WHAGMMHSLMHE, COH OUX KPXXYG HAM MH MOY VUMMSYZPYSX CPMO HMOYKL PG MOYYTIYKHK'L LAPMY. HGY HZZPWYK MHSX KHLMHB MOUM OY OUX LYYG LHTYHGY ZKHTOYUXJAUKMYKL VYOPGX MOY BPSSUNY MH MOY SYZM, UGX MOPMOYK KHLMHB KHXY,GHM OHIPGN MH ZPGX UGEHGY VAM TYKYSE MH YULY OPL WHGLWPYGWY. COYG OY OUXKPXXYG UVHAM MCH TPSYL UGX OUX IULLYX MOY SULM HZ MOY KALLPUG MKHHIL, OYLUC, GYUK U RPMWOYG NUKXYG CPMO U XPMWO KHAGX PM, MCH TYG HG OHKLYVUWRZUWPGN MOY XPMWO. HGY CPMO U COPMY ISATY PG OPL OUM LYYTYX ZUTPSPUK MHKHLMHB; MOY HMOYK HG U VYUAMPZAS WOYLMGAM OHKLY (COPWO KHLMHB ZUGWPYX OYOUX LYYG VYZHKY) KHXY AI MH MOY XPMWO, LMKAWR OPL OHKLY CPMO OPL LIAKL,UGX NPBPGN PM MOY KYPG SYUIYX SPNOMSE HBYK. HGSE U SPMMSY YUKMO WKATVSYXZKHT MOY VUGR AGXYK MOY OHKLY'L OPGX OHHZL. MAKGPGN MOY OHKLY LOUKISE,OY UNUPG QATIYX MOY XPMWO, UGX XYZYKYGMPUSSE UXXKYLLYX MOY OHKLYTUG CPMOMOY COPMY ISATYL, YBPXYGMSE LANNYLMPGN MOUM OY LOHASX XH MOY LUTY. MOYKPXYK, COHLY ZPNAKY LYYTYX ZUTPSPUK MH KHLMHB UGX PGBHSAGMUKPSE KPBYMYXOPL UMMYGMPHG, TUXY U NYLMAKY HZ KYZALUS CPMO OPL OYUX UGX OUGX UGXVE MOUM NYLMAKY KHLMHB PGLMUGMSE KYWHNGPFYX OPL SUTYGMYX UGX UXHKYXTHGUKWO."VAM PM WUG'M VY OY, USHGY PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOPL YTIME ZPYSX!" MOHANOMKHLMHB. UM MOUM THTYGM USYDUGXYK MAKGYX OPL OYUX UGX KHLMHB LUC MOYVYSHBYX ZYUMAKYL MOUM CYKY LH XYYISE YGNKUBYX HG OPL TYTHKE. MOY YTIYKHKCUL IUSY, OPL WOYYRL LAGRYG UGX OPL YEYL OHSSHC, VAM MOY WOUKT, MOYTPSXGYLL HZ OPL ZYUMAKYL, CUL USS MOY NKYUMYK. KHLMHB CUL OUIIE PG MOYULLAKUGWY MOUM MOY KATHKL UVHAM MOY YTIYKHK VYPGN CHAGXYX CYKY ZUSLY. OYCUL OUIIE MH VY LYYPGN OPT. OY RGYC MOUM OY TPNOM UGX YBYG HANOM MHNH LMKUPNOM MH OPT UGX NPBY MOY TYLLUNY XHSNHKARHB OUX HKXYKYX OPT MHXYSPBYK.VAM UL U EHAMO PG SHBY MKYTVSYL, PL AGGYKBYX, UGX XUKYL GHM AMMYK MOYMOHANOML OY OUL XKYUTYX HZ ZHK GPNOML, VAM SHHRL UKHAGX ZHK OYSI HK UWOUGWY HZ XYSUE UGX ZSPNOM COYG MOY SHGNYX-ZHK THTYGM WHTYL UGX OY PLUSHGY CPMO OYK, LH KHLMHB, GHC MOUM OY OUX UMMUPGYX COUM OY OUX SHGNYXZHK THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN YSLY PG MOY CHKSX, XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH UIIKHUWOMOY YTIYKHK, UGX U MOHALUGX KYULHGL HWWAKKYX MH OPT COE PM CHASX VYPGWHGBYGPYGM, AGLYYTSE, UGX PTIHLLPVSY MH XH LH."COUM! PM PL UL PZ P CYKY NSUX HZ U WOUGWY MH MURY UXBUGMUNY HZ OPLVYPGN USHGY UGX XYLIHGXYGM! GHM HGY HZ MOY PGGATYKUVSY LIYYWOYL UXXKYLLYX MH MOY YTIYKHK MOUMOY OUX WHTIHLYX PG OPL PTUNPGUMPHG WHASX OY GHC KYWUSS. MOHLY LIYYWOYLCYKY PGMYGXYX ZHK JAPMY HMOYK WHGXPMPHGL, MOYE CYKY ZHK MOY THLM IUKMMH VY LIHRYG UM U THTYGM HZ BPWMHKE UGX MKPATIO, NYGYKUSSE COYG OY CULXEPGN HZ CHAGXL UGX MOY LHBYKYPNG OUX MOUGRYX OPT ZHK OYKHPW XYYXL, UGXCOPSY XEPGN OY YDIKYLLYX MOY SHBY OPL UWMPHGL OUX IKHBYX."VYLPXYL OHC WUG P ULR MOY YTIYKHK ZHK OPL PGLMKAWMPHGL ZHK MOY KPNOMZSUGR GHC MOUM PM PL GYUKSE ZHAK H'WSHWR UGX MOY VUMMSY PL SHLM?GH, WYKMUPGSE P TALM GHM UIIKHUWO OPT, P TALM GHM PGMKAXY HG OPLKYZSYWMPHGL. VYMMYK XPY U MOHALUGX MPTYL MOUG KPLR KYWYPBPGN UG AGRPGXSHHR HK VUX HIPGPHG ZKHT OPT," KHLMHB XYWPXYX; UGX LHKKHCZASSE UGX CPMOU OYUKM ZASS XYLIUPK OY KHXY UCUE, WHGMPGAUSSE SHHRPGN VUWR UM MOY MLUK,COH LMPSS KYTUPGYX PG MOY LUTY UMMPMAXY HZ PGXYWPLPHG.COPSY KHLMHB CUL MOAL UKNAPGN CPMO OPTLYSZ UGX KPXPGN LUXSE UCUE,WUIMUPG BHG MHSS WOUGWYX MH KPXY MH MOY LUTY LIHM, UGX LYYPGN MOYYTIYKHK UM HGWY KHXY AI MH OPT, HZZYKYX OPL LYKBPWYL, UGX ULLPLMYX OPTMH WKHLL MOY XPMWO HG ZHHM. MOY YTIYKHK, CPLOPGN MH KYLM UGX ZYYSPGNAGCYSS, LUM XHCG AGXYK UG UIISY MKYY UGX BHG MHSS KYTUPGYX VYLPXY OPT.KHLMHB ZKHT U XPLMUGWY LUC CPMO YGBE UGX KYTHKLY OHC BHG MHSS LIHRYSHGN UGX CUKTSE MH MOY YTIYKHK UGX OHC MOY YTIYKHK, YBPXYGMSE CYYIPGN,WHBYKYX OPL YEYL CPMO OPL OUGX UGX IKYLLYX BHG MHSS'L OUGX."UGX P TPNOM OUBY VYYG PG OPL ISUWY!" MOHANOM KHLMHB, UGX OUKXSEKYLMKUPGPGN OPL MYUKL HZ IPME ZHK MOY YTIYKHK, OY KHXY HG PG AMMYKXYLIUPK, GHM RGHCPGN COYKY MH HK COE OY CUL GHC KPXPGN.OPL XYLIUPK CUL USS MOY NKYUMYK ZKHT ZYYSPGN MOUM OPL HCG CYURGYLL CULMOY WUALY HZ OPL NKPYZ.OY TPNOM... GHM HGSE TPNOM VAM LOHASX, OUBY NHGY AI MH MOY LHBYKYPNG. PMCUL U AGPJAY WOUGWY MH LOHC OPL XYBHMPHG MH MOY YTIYKHK UGX OY OUX GHMTUXY ALY HZ PM.... "COUM OUBY P XHGY?" MOHANOM OY. UGX OY MAKGYX KHAGXUGX NUSSHIYX VUWR MH MOY ISUWY COYKY OY OUX LYYG MOY YTIYKHK, VAM MOYKYCUL GH HGY VYEHGX MOY XPMWO GHC. HGSE LHTY WUKML UGX WUKKPUNYL CYKYIULLPGN VE. LHTY MPTY IULLYX PGLPSYGWY, UGX MOYG MOY LUTY QHRY CUL KYIYUMYX.VYZHKY ZPBY PG MOY YBYGPGN MOY VUMMSY OUX VYYG SHLM UM USS IHPGML. HMOYK WHSATGLUZMYK SHLPGN OUSZ MOYPK TYG CYKY KYMKYUMPGN PG XPLHKXYKSE WHGZALYXTULLYL.MOY KYTUPGL HZ SUGNYKHG'L UGX XHROMAKHB'L TPGNSYX ZHKWYL CYKY WKHCXPGNUKHAGX MOY XUTL UGX VUGRL HZ MOY IHGXL GYUK MOY BPSSUNY HZ UANYLX.UZMYK ZPBY H'WSHWR PM CUL HGSE UM MOY UANYLX XUT MOUM U OHM WUGGHGUXY(XYSPBYKYX VE MOY ZKYGWO USHGY) CUL LMPSS MH VY OYUKX ZKHT GATYKHALVUMMYKPYL KUGNYX HG MOY LSHIYL HZ MOY IKUMFYG OYPNOML, XPKYWMYX UM HAKKYMKYUMPGN ZHKWYL.PG MOY KYUKNAUKX, XHROMAKHB UGX HMOYKL KUSSEPGN LHTY VUMMUSPHGL RYIM AIU TALRYMKE ZPKY UM MOY ZKYGWO WUBUSKE MOUM CUL IAKLAPGN HAK MKHHIL. PMCUL NKHCPGN XALR. HG MOY GUKKHC UANYLX XUT COYKY ZHK LH TUGE EYUKL MOYHSX TPSSYK OUX VYYG UWWALMHTYX MH LPM PG OPL MULLYSYX WUI IYUWYZASSEUGNSPGN, COPSY OPL NKUGXLHG, CPMO LOPKM LSYYBYL KHSSYX AI, OUGXSYX MOYZSHAGXYKPGN LPSBYKE ZPLO PG MOY CUMYKPGN WUG, HG MOUM XUT HBYK COPWO ZHKLH TUGE EYUKL THKUBPUGL PG LOUNNE WUIL UGX VSAY QUWRYML OUX IYUWYZASSEXKPBYG MOYPK MCH-OHKLY WUKML SHUXYX CPMO COYUM UGX OUX KYMAKGYX XALMECPMO ZSHAK COPMYGPGN MOYPK WUKML--HG MOUM GUKKHC XUT UTPX MOY CUNHGL UGXMOY WUGGHG, AGXYK MOY OHKLYL' OHHZL UGX VYMCYYG MOY CUNHG COYYSL, TYGXPLZPNAKYX VE ZYUK HZ XYUMO GHC WKHCXYX MHNYMOYK, WKALOPGN HGY UGHMOYK,XEPGN, LMYIIPGN HBYK MOY XEPGN UGX RPSSPGN HGY UGHMOYK, HGSE MH THBY HGU ZYC LMYIL UGX VY RPSSYX MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY LUTY CUE.YBYKE MYG LYWHGXL U WUGGHG VUSS ZSYC WHTIKYLLPGN MOY UPK UKHAGX, HKU LOYSS VAKLM PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOUM XYGLY MOKHGN, RPSSPGN LHTY UGXLISULOPGN CPMO VSHHX MOHLY GYUK MOYT.XHSHROHB--GHC UG HZZPWYK--CHAGXYX PG MOY UKT, UGX HG ZHHM, CPMO MOYKYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK HG OHKLYVUWR UGX LHTY MYG TYG HZ OPL WHTIUGE,KYIKYLYGMYX USS MOUM CUL SYZM HZ MOUM COHSY KYNPTYGM. PTIYSSYX VE MOYWKHCX, MOYE OUX NHM CYXNYX PG UM MOY UIIKHUWO MH MOY XUT UGX, QUTTYX PGHG USS LPXYL, OUX LMHIIYX VYWUALY U OHKLY PG ZKHGM OUX ZUSSYG AGXYK UWUGGHG UGX MOY WKHCX CYKY XKUNNPGN PM HAM. U WUGGHG VUSS RPSSYX LHTYHGYVYOPGX MOYT, UGHMOYK ZYSS PG ZKHGM UGX LISULOYX XHSHROHB CPMO VSHHX.MOY WKHCX, IALOPGN ZHKCUKX XYLIYKUMYSE, LJAYYFYX MHNYMOYK, THBYX U ZYCLMYIL, UGX UNUPG LMHIIYX."THBY HG U OAGXKYX EUKXL UGX CY UKY WYKMUPGSE LUBYX, KYTUPG OYKY UGHMOYKMCH TPGAMYL UGX PM PL WYKMUPG XYUMO," MOHANOM YUWO HGY.XHSHROHB COH CUL PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOY WKHCX ZHKWYX OPL CUE MH MOY YXNY HZMOY XUT, MOKHCPGN MCH LHSXPYKL HZZ MOYPK ZYYM, UGX KUG HGMH MOY LSPIIYKEPWY MOUM WHBYKYX MOY TPSSIHHS."MAKG MOPL CUE!" NH HG!"PGGATYKUVSY BHPWYL LAXXYGSE LOHAMYX UZMYK MOY VUSS OUX LMKAWR MOYNYGYKUS, MOY TYG MOYTLYSBYL GHM RGHCPGN COUM, HK COE, MOYE CYKYLOHAMPGN.HGY HZ MOY OPGXTHLM NAGL MOUM CUL NHPGN HGMH MOY XUT MAKGYX HZZ HGMH MOYPWY. NH HG!" UGX WKPYL HZ OHKKHK CYKY OYUKX PG MOY WKHCX. MOY LHSXPYKLGYUK MOY NAG CUBYX MOYPK UKTL UGX VYUM MOY OHKLYL MH TURY MOYT MAKG UGXTHBY HG. MOY OHKLYL THBYX HZZ MOY VUGR. MOY PWY, MOUM OUX OYSX AGXYKMOHLY HG ZHHM, WHSSUILYX PG U NKYUM TULL, UGX LHTY ZHKME TYG COH CYKY HGPM XULOYX, LHTY ZHKCUKX UGX LHTY VUWR, XKHCGPGN HGY UGHMOYK.LMPSS MOY WUGGHG VUSSL WHGMPGAYX KYNASUKSE MH COPLMSY UGX ZSHI HGMH MOYPWY UGX PGMH MOY CUMYK UGX HZMYGYLM HZ USS UTHGN MOY WKHCX MOUM WHBYKYXMOY XUT, MOY IHGX, UGX MOY VUGR.WOUIMYK DPDHG MOY IKUMFYG OYPNOML, COYKY OY OUX ZUSSYG CPMO MOY ZSUNLMUZZ PG OPLOUGX, SUE IKPGWY UGXKYC VHSRHGLRP VSYYXPGN IKHZALYSE UGX AGWHGLWPHALSEAMMYKPGN U NYGMSY, IPMYHAL, UGX WOPSXSPRY THUG.MHCUKX YBYGPGN OY WYULYX THUGPGN UGX VYWUTY JAPMY LMPSS. LAXXYGSE OY UNUPG ZYSM MOUM OY CULUSPBY UGX LAZZYKPGN ZKHT U VAKGPGN, SUWYKUMPGN IUPG PG OPL OYUX."COYKY PL PM, MOUM SHZME LRE MOUM P XPX GHM RGHC MPSS GHC, VAM LUCMHXUE?" CUL OPL ZPKLM MOHANOM. VAM COYKY UT P?"OY SPLMYGYX UGX OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ UIIKHUWOPGN OHKLYL, UGX BHPWYLLIYURPGN ZKYGWO. OY HIYGYX OPL YEYL. UVHBY OPT UNUPG CUL MOY LUTY SHZMELRE CPMO WSHAXL MOUM OUX KPLYG UGX CYKY ZSHUMPGN LMPSS OPNOYK, UGXVYMCYYG MOYT NSYUTYX VSAY PGZPGPME. OY XPX GHM MAKG OPL OYUX UGX XPX GHMLYY MOHLY COH, QAXNPGN VE MOY LHAGX HZ OHHZL UGX BHPWYL, OUX KPXXYG AIUGX LMHIIYX GYUK OPT.PM CUL GUIHSYHG UWWHTIUGPYX VE MCH UPXYL-XY-WUTI. VHGUIUKMY KPXPGNHBYK MOY VUMMSYZPYSX OUX NPBYG ZPGUS HKXYKL MH LMKYGNMOYG MOY VUMMYKPYLZPKPGN UM MOY UANYLX XUT UGX CUL SHHRPGN UM MOY RPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX SYZMHG MOY ZPYSX."ZPGY TYG!" KYTUKRYX GUIHSYHG, SHHRPGN UM U XYUX KALLPUG NKYGUXPYK,COH, CPMO OPL ZUWY VAKPYX PG MOY NKHAGX UGX U VSUWRYGYX GUIY, SUE HG OPLLMHTUWO CPMO UG USKYUXE LMPZZYGYX UKT ZSAGN CPXY."MOY UTTAGPMPHG ZHK MOY NAGL PG IHLPMPHG PL YDOUALMYX, EHAK TUQYLME,"LUPX UG UXQAMUGM COH OUX WHTY ZKHT MOY VUMMYKPYL MOUM CYKY ZPKPGN UMUANYLX."OUBY LHTY VKHANOM ZKHT MOY KYLYKBY," LUPX GUIHSYHG, UGX OUBPGN NHGY HGU ZYC LMYIL OY LMHIIYX VYZHKY IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH SUE HG OPL VUWR CPMOMOY ZSUNLMUZZ MOUM OUX VYYG XKHIIYX VYLPXY OPT. "SPZM MOPL EHAGN TUG AI UGX WUKKE OPTMH MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG."OUBPGN LUPX MOPL, GUIHSYHG KHXY HG MH TYYM TUKLOUS SUGGYL, COH, OUM PGOUGX, KHXY AI LTPSPGN MH MOY YTIYKHK MH WHGNKUMASUMY OPT HG MOY BPWMHKE.IKPGWY UGXKYC KYTYTVYKYX GHMOPGN THKY: OY SHLM WHGLWPHALGYLL ZKHT MOYMYKKPVSY IUPG HZ VYPGN SPZMYX HGMH MOY LMKYMWOYK, MOY QHSMPGN COPSYVYPGN THBYX, UGX MOY IKHVPGN HZ OPL CHAGX UM MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG.OY XPX GHM KYNUPG WHGLWPHALGYLL MPSS SUMY PG MOY XUE, COYG CPMO HMOYKCHAGXYX UGX WUIMAKYX KALLPUG HZZPWYKL OY CUL WUKKPYX MH MOY OHLIPMUS.XAKPGN MOPL MKUGLZYK OY ZYSM U SPMMSY LMKHGNYK UGX CUL UVSY MH SHHRUVHAM OPT UGX YBYG LIYUR.MOY ZPKLM CHKXL OY OYUKX HG WHTPGN MH OPL LYGLYL CYKY MOHLY HZ U ZKYGWOWHGBHE HZZPWYK, COH LUPX KUIPXSE: "CY TALM OUSM OYKY: MOY YTIYKHKCPSS IULL OYKY PTTYXPUMYSE; PM CPSS ISYULY OPT MH LYY MOYLY NYGMSYTYGIKPLHGYKL.""MOYKY UKY LH TUGE IKPLHGYKL MHXUE, GYUKSE MOY COHSY KALLPUG UKTE, MOUMOY PL IKHVUVSE MPKYX HZ MOYT," LUPX UGHMOYK HZZPWYK."USS MOY LUTY! OYKY PLXYGPLHB!"MOY LUTY OUIIE, KUIMAKHAL ZUWYL MAKGYX MH MOY LOUNNE ZPNAKY HZ XYGPLHB."XUKSPGN XYGPLHB!" MOY HSX WHAGM OUX THGYE YGHANOMOUM EYUK, UL USS OPL YLMUMYL OUX VYYG KYTHKMNUNYX, UGX LH GPWOHSUL,UWJAPKPGN U MKHMMYK HZ OPL HCG, BYKE LMESPLO KPXPGN VKYYWOYL HZ MOYSUMYLM WAM, LAWO UL GH HGY YSLY EYM OUX PG THLWHC, UGX VHHML HZ MOYSUMYLM ZULOPHG, CPMO YDMKYTYSE IHPGMYX MHYL UGX LTUSS LPSBYK LIAKL,IULLYX OPL MPTY BYKE NUPSE. UZMYK U LOHKM IYKPHX HZ UXUIMPGN OPTLYSZMH MOY HSX WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY, GPWOHSUL ZHAGX PM BYKE ISYULUGM MH VYUM OHTY UNUPG. OY ZYSM MOUM OY OUX NKHCG AI UGX TUMAKYX BYKE TAWO. OPLXYLIUPK UM ZUPSPGN PG U LWKPIMAKY YDUTPGUMPHG, OPL VHKKHCPGN THGYE ZKHTNUBKPS MH IUE U LSYPNO XKPBYK, OPL RPLLPGN LHGEU HG MOY LSE--OY GHCKYWUSSYX USS MOPL UL WOPSXPLOGYLL OY OUX SYZM PTTYULAKUVSE VYOPGX.GHC OY CUL U SPYAMYGUGM HZ OALLUKL, PG U QUWRYM SUWYX CPMO LPSBYK, UGXCYUKPGN MOY WKHLL HZ LM. NYHKNY, UCUKXYX MH LHSXPYKL ZHK VKUBYKE PGUWMPHG, UGX PG MOY WHTIUGE HZ CYSS-RGHCG, YSXYKSE, UGX KYLIYWMYX KUWPGNTYG CUL MKUPGPGN U MKHMMYK HZ OPL HCG ZHK U KUWY. VAM LMPSS, ULOY XPX GHM LYY OPT UGX OUX GH HIIHKMAGPME HZ LYYPGN OPT, OY HZMYG LIHRYUVHAM OPT UGX UVHAM OPL SHBY ZHK OPT, SYMMPGN PM VY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM OYOUX GHM MHSX USS UGX MOUM MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN PG OPL ZYYSPGNL ZHK MOYYTIYKHK GHM YBYKEHGY WHASX AGXYKLMUGX, UGX CPMO OPL COHSY LHAS OY LOUKYXMOY UXHKUMPHG MOYG WHTTHG PG THLWHC ZHK MOY YTIYKHK, COH CUL LIHRYG HZUL MOY "UGNYS PGWUKGUMY."XAKPGN KHLMHB'L LOHKM LMUE PG THLWHC, VYZHKY KYQHPGPGN MOY UKTE, OY XPXGHM XKUC WSHLYK MH LHGEU, VAM KUMOYK XKPZMYX UCUE ZKHT OYK. LOY CUL BYKEIKYMME UGX LCYYM, UGX YBPXYGMSE XYYISE PG SHBY CPMO OPT, VAM OY CUL UMMOY IYKPHX HZ EHAMO COYG MOYKY LYYTL LH TAWO MH XH MOUM MOYKY PL GH MPTYZHK MOUM LHKM HZ MOPGN UGX U EHAGN TUG ZYUKL MH VPGX OPTLYSZ UGX IKPFYLOPL ZKYYXHT COPWO OY GYYXL ZHK LH TUGE HMOYK MOPGNL. COYG OY MOHANOM HZLHGEU, XAKPGN MOPL LMUE PG THLWHC, OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ, "UO, MOYKY CPSSVY, UGX MOYKY UKY, TUGE THKY LAWO NPKSL LHTYCOYKY COHT P XH GHM EYMRGHC. MOYKY CPSS VY MPTY YGHANO MH MOPGR UVHAM SHBY COYG P CUGM MH, VAMGHC P OUBY GH MPTY." VYLPXYL, PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM MOY LHWPYME HZ CHTYGCUL KUMOYK XYKHNUMHKE MH OPL TUGOHHX. MOY KUWYL, MOYYGNSPLO WSAV, LIKYYL CPMO XYGPLHB, UGX BPLPML MH U WYKMUPG OHALY--MOUMCUL UGHMOYK TUMMYK UGX JAPMY MOY MOPGN ZHK U XULOPGN EHAGN OALLUK!UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ TUKWO, HSX WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB CUL BYKE VALE UKKUGNPGNU XPGGYK PG OHGHK HZ IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG UM MOY YGNSPLO WSAV.MOY WHAGM CUSRYX AI UGX XHCG MOY OUSS PG OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG, NPBPGNHKXYKL MH MOY WSAV LMYCUKX UGX MH MOY ZUTHAL ZYHRMPLM, MOY WSAV'L OYUXWHHR, UVHAM ULIUKUNAL, ZKYLO WAWATVYKL, LMKUCVYKKPYL, BYUS, UGX ZPLOZHK MOPL XPGGYK. MOY WHAGM OUX VYYG U TYTVYK UGX HG MOY WHTTPMMYY HZMOY WSAV ZKHT MOY XUE PM CUL ZHAGXYX. MH OPT MOY WSAV YGMKALMYX MOYUKKUGNYTYGM HZ MOY ZYLMPBUS PG OHGHK HZ VUNKUMPHG, ZHK ZYC TYG RGYC LHCYSS OHC MH UKKUGNY U ZYULM HG UG HIYG-OUGXYX, OHLIPMUVSY LWUSY, UGXLMPSS ZYCYK TYG CHASX VY LH CYSS UVSY UGX CPSSPGN MH TURY AI HAM HZMOYPK HCG KYLHAKWYL COUM TPNOM VY GYYXYX ZHK MOY LAWWYLL HZ MOY ZYMY.MOY WSAV WHHR UGX MOY LMYCUKX SPLMYGYX MH MOY WHAGM'L HKXYKL CPMOISYULYX ZUWYL, ZHK MOYE RGYC MOUM AGXYK GH HMOYK TUGUNYTYGM WHASX MOYELH YULPSE YDMKUWM U NHHX IKHZPM ZHK MOYTLYSBYL ZKHT U XPGGYK WHLMPGNLYBYKUS MOHALUGX KAVSYL."CYSS MOYG, TPGX UGX OUBY WHWRL' WHTV PG MOY MAKMSY LHAI, EHA RGHC!""LOUSS CY OUBY MOKYY WHSX XPLOYL MOYG?" ULRYX MOY WHHR.MOY WHAGM WHGLPXYKYX."CY WUG'M OUBY SYLL--EYL, MOKYY... MOY TUEHGGUPLY, MOUM'L HGY," LUPX OY,VYGXPGN XHCG U ZPGNYK."MOYG UT P MH HKXYK MOHLY SUKNY LMYKSYML?" ULRYX MOY LMYCUKX."EYL, PM WUG'M VY OYSIYX PZ MOYE CHG'M MURY SYLL. UO, XYUK TY! P CULZHKNYMMPGN. CY TALM OUBY UGHMOYK YGMKYY. UO, NHHXGYLL NKUWPHAL!" OYWSAMWOYX UM OPL OYUX. "COH PL NHPGN MH NYM TY MOY ZSHCYKL? XTPMKP! YO,XTPMKP! NUSSHI HZZ MH HAK THLWHC YLMUMY," OY LUPX MH MOY ZUWMHMAT COHUIIYUKYX UM OPL WUSS. "OAKKE HZZ UGX MYSS TURLPT, MOY NUKXYGYK, MH LYMMOY LYKZL MH CHKR. LUE MOUM YBYKEMOPGN HAM HZ MOY OHMOHALYL TALM VYVKHANOM OYKY CYSS CKUIIYX AI PG ZYSM. P TALM OUBY MCH OAGXKYX IHML OYKYHG ZKPXUE."OUBPGN NPBYG LYBYKUS THKY HKXYKL, OY CUL UVHAM MH NH MH OPL "SPMMSYWHAGMYLL" MH OUBY U KYLM, VAM KYTYTVYKPGN LHTYMOPGN YSLY HZ PTIHKMUGWY,OY KYMAKGYX UNUPG, WUSSYX VUWR MOY WHHR UGX MOY WSAV LMYCUKX, UGX UNUPGVYNUG NPBPGN HKXYKL. U SPNOM ZHHMLMYI UGX MOY WSPGRPGN HZ LIAKL CYKYOYUKX UM MOY XHHK, UGX MOY EHAGN WHAGM, OUGXLHTY, KHLE, CPMO U XUKRSPMMSY TALMUWOY, YBPXYGMSE KYLMYX UGX TUXY LSYYRYK VE OPL YULE SPZY PGTHLWHC, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT."UO, TE VHE, TE OYUX'L PG U COPKS!" LUPX MOY HSX TUG CPMO U LTPSY, UL PZOY ZYSM U SPMMSY WHGZALYX VYZHKY OPL LHG. "GHC, PZ EHA CHASX HGSE OYSIU VPM! P TALM OUBY LPGNYKL MHH. P LOUSS OUBY TE HCG HKWOYLMKU, VAMLOHASXG'M CY NYM MOY NEILE LPGNYKL UL CYSS? EHA TPSPMUKE TYG SPRY MOUMLHKM HZ MOPGN.""KYUSSE, IUIU, P VYSPYBY IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG CHKKPYX OPTLYSZ SYLL VYZHKYMOY VUMMSY HZ LWOHG NKUVYKG MOUG EHA XH GHC," LUPX OPL LHG CPMO U LTPSY.MOY HSX WHAGM IKYMYGXYX MH VY UGNKE."EYL, EHA MUSR, VAM MKE PM EHAKLYSZ!"UGX MOY WHAGM MAKGYX MH MOY WHHR, COH, CPMO U LOKYCX UGX KYLIYWMZASYDIKYLLPHG, SHHRYX HVLYKBUGMSE UGX LETIUMOYMPWUSSE UM MOY ZUMOYK UGXLHG."COUM OUBY MOY EHAGN IYHISY WHTY MH GHCUXUEL, YO, ZYHRMPLM?" LUPX OY."SUANOPGN UM AL HSX ZYSSHCL!""MOUM'L LH, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, USS MOYE OUBY MH XH PL MH YUM U NHHXXPGGYK, VAM IKHBPXPGN PM UGX LYKBPGN PM USS AI, MOUM'L GHM MOYPKVALPGYLL!""MOUM'L PM, MOUM'L PM!" YDWSUPTYX MOY WHAGM, UGX NUPSE LYPFPGN OPL LHGVE VHMO OUGXL, OY WKPYX, "GHC P'BY NHM EHA, LH MURY MOY LSYPNO UGX IUPKUM HGWY, UGX NH MH VYFAROHB'L, UGX MYSS OPT 'WHAGM PSEU OUL LYGM EHAMH ULR ZHK LMKUCVYKKPYL UGX ZKYLO IPGYUIISYL.' CY WUG'M NYM MOYT ZKHTUGEHGY YSLY. OY'L GHM MOYKY OPTLYSZ, LH EHA'SS OUBY MH NH PG UGX ULR MOYIKPGWYLLYL; UGX ZKHT MOYKY NH HG MH MOY KULNASEUE--MOY WHUWOTUG PIUMRURGHCL--UGX SHHR AI MOY NEILE PSEALORU, MOY HGY COH XUGWYX UM WHAGMHKSHB'L, EHA KYTYTVYK, PG U COPMY WHLLUWR WHUM, UGX VKPGN OPT USHGN MHTY.""UGX UT P MH VKPGN MOY NEILE NPKSL USHGN CPMO OPT?" ULRYX GPWOHSUL,SUANOPGN. "XYUK, XYUK!..."UM MOUM THTYGM, CPMO GHPLYSYLL ZHHMLMYIL UGX CPMO MOY VALPGYLLSPRY,IKYHWWAIPYX, EYM TYYRSE WOKPLMPUG SHHR COPWO GYBYK SYZM OYK ZUWY, UGGUTPROUESHBGU YGMYKYX MOY OUSS. MOHANO LOY WUTY AIHG MOY WHAGM PG OPLXKYLLPGN NHCG YBYKE XUE, OY PGBUKPUVSE VYWUTY WHGZALYX UGX VYNNYX OYK MHYDWALY OPL WHLMATY."GH TUMMYK UM USS, TE XYUK WHAGM," LOY LUPX, TYYRSE WSHLPGN OYK YEYL."VAM P'SS NH MH VYFAROHB'L TELYSZ. IPYKKY OUL UKKPBYX, UGX GHC CY LOUSSNYM UGEMOPGN CY CUGM ZKHT OPL OHMOHALYL. P OUBY MH LYY OPT PG UGE WULY.OY OUL ZHKCUKXYX TY U SYMMYK ZKHT VHKPL. MOUGR NHX, VHKPL PL GHC HG MOYLMUZZ."MOY WHAGM CUL XYSPNOMYX UM UGGU TPROUESHBGU'L MURPGN AIHG OYKLYSZ HGY HZOPL WHTTPLLPHGL UGX HKXYKYX MOY LTUSS WSHLYX WUKKPUNY ZHK OYK."MYSS VYFAROHB MH WHTY. P'SS IAM OPL GUTY XHCG. PL OPL CPZY CPMO OPT?"OY ULRYX.UGGU TPROUESHBGU MAKGYX AI OYK YEYL, UGX IKHZHAGX LUXGYLL CUL XYIPWMYXHG OYK ZUWY."UO, TE XYUK ZKPYGX, OY PL BYKE AGZHKMAGUMY," LOY LUPX. "PZ COUM CY OYUKPL MKAY, PM PL XKYUXZAS. OHC SPMMSY CY XKYUTYX HZ LAWO U MOPGN COYG CYCYKY KYQHPWPGN UM OPL OUIIPGYLL! UGX LAWO U SHZME UGNYSPW LHAS UL EHAGNVYFAROHB! EYL, P IPME OPT ZKHT TE OYUKM, UGX LOUSS MKE MH NPBY OPT COUMWHGLHSUMPHG P WUG.""CO-COUM PL MOY TUMMYK?" ULRYX VHMO MOY EHAGN UGX HSX KHLMHB.UGGU TPROUESHBGU LPNOYX XYYISE."XHSHROHB, TUKE PBUGHBGU'L LHG," LOY LUPX PG U TELMYKPHAL COPLIYK, "OULWHTIKHTPLYX OYK WHTISYMYSE, MOYE LUE. IPYKKY MHHR OPT AI, PGBPMYX OPT MHOPL OHALY PG IYMYKLVAKN, UGX GHC... LOY OUL WHTY OYKY UGX MOUM XUKYXYBPSUZMYK OYK!" LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU, CPLOPGN MH LOHC OYK LETIUMOE ZHKIPYKKY, VAM VE PGBHSAGMUKE PGMHGUMPHGL UGX U OUSZ LTPSY VYMKUEPGN OYKLETIUMOE ZHK MOY "XUKYXYBPS," UL LOY WUSSYX XHSHROHB. "MOYE LUE IPYKKYPL JAPMY VKHRYG VE OPL TPLZHKMAGY.""XYUK, XYUK! VAM LMPSS MYSS OPT MH WHTY MH MOY WSAV--PM CPSS USS VSHCHBYK. PM CPSS VY U MKYTYGXHAL VUGJAYM."GYDM XUE, MOY MOPKX HZ TUKWO, LHHG UZMYK HGY H'WSHWR, MCH OAGXKYX UGXZPZME TYTVYKL HZ MOY YGNSPLO WSAV UGX ZPZME NAYLML CYKY UCUPMPGN MOYNAYLM HZ OHGHK UGX OYKH HZ MOY UALMKPUG WUTIUPNG, IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG, MHXPGGYK.HG MOY ZPKLM UKKPBUS HZ MOY GYCL HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF, THLWHC OUXVYYG VYCPSXYKYX. UM MOUM MPTY, MOY KALLPUGL CYKY LH ALYX MH BPWMHKPYLMOUM HG KYWYPBPGN GYCL HZ MOY XYZYUM LHTY CHASX LPTISE GHM VYSPYBY PM,COPSY HMOYKL LHANOM LHTY YDMKUHKXPGUKE YDISUGUMPHG HZ LH LMKUGNY UGYBYGM. PG MOY YGNSPLO WSAV, COYKY USS COH CYKY XPLMPGNAPLOYX, PTIHKMUGM,UGX CYSS PGZHKTYX ZHKYNUMOYKYX COYG MOY GYCL VYNUG MH UKKPBY PGXYWYTVYK, GHMOPGN CUL LUPX UVHAM MOY CUK UGX MOY SULM VUMMSY, ULMOHANO USS CYKY PG U WHGLIPKUWE HZ LPSYGWY. MOY TYG COH LYM MOY MHGY PGWHGBYKLUMPHG--WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, IKPGWY EAKP XHSNHKARHB, BUSAYB, WHAGMTUKRHB, UGX IKPGWY BEUFYTLRP--XPX GHM LOHC MOYTLYSBYL UM MOY WSAV, VAMTYM PG IKPBUMY OHALYL PG PGMPTUMY WPKWSYL, UGX MOY THLWHBPMYL COH MHHRMOYPK HIPGPHGL ZKHT HMOYKL--PSEU KHLMHB UTHGN MOYT--KYTUPGYX ZHK UCOPSY CPMOHAM UGE XYZPGPMY HIPGPHG HG MOY LAVQYWM HZ MOY CUK UGX CPMOHAMSYUXYKL. MOY THLWHBPMYL ZYSM MOUM LHTYMOPGN CUL CKHGN UGX MOUM MHXPLWALL MOY VUX GYCL CUL XPZZPWASM, UGX LH PM CUL VYLM MH VY LPSYGM.VAM UZMYK U COPSY, QALM UL U QAKE WHTYL HAM HZ PML KHHT, MOY VPNCPNLCOH NAPXYX MOY WSAV'L HIPGPHG KYUIIYUKYX, UGX YBYKEVHXE VYNUG LIYURPGNWSYUKSE UGX XYZPGPMYSE. KYULHGL CYKY ZHAGX ZHK MOY PGWKYXPVSY,AGOYUKX-HZ, UGX PTIHLLPVSY YBYGM HZ U KALLPUG XYZYUM, YBYKEMOPGN VYWUTYWSYUK, UGX PG USS WHKGYKL HZ THLWHC MOY LUTY MOPGNL VYNUG MH VYLUPX. MOYLY KYULHGL CYKY MOY MKYUWOYKE HZ MOY UALMKPUGL, U XYZYWMPBYWHTTPLLUKPUM, MOY MKYUWOYKE HZ MOY IHSY IKFYVELFYCLRP UGX HZ MOYZKYGWOTUG SUGNYKHG, RAMAFHB'L PGWUIUWPME, UGX (PM CUL COPLIYKYX) MOYEHAMO UGX PGYDIYKPYGWY HZ MOY LHBYKYPNG, COH OUX MKALMYX CHKMOSYLL UGXPGLPNGPZPWUGM IYHISY. VAM MOY UKTE, MOY KALLPUG UKTE, YBYKEHGY XYWSUKYX,CUL YDMKUHKXPGUKE UGX OUX UWOPYBYX TPKUWSYL HZ BUSHK. MOY LHSXPYKL,HZZPWYKL, UGX NYGYKUSL CYKY OYKHYL. VAM MOY OYKH HZ OYKHYL CUL IKPGWYVUNKUMPHG, XPLMPGNAPLOYX VE OPL LWOHG NKUVYKG UZZUPK UGX VE MOY KYMKYUMZKHT UALMYKSPMF, COYKY OY USHGY OUX CPMOXKUCG OPL WHSATG AGVKHRYG UGXOUX USS XUE VYUMYG VUWR UG YGYTE ZHKWY MCPWY UL GATYKHAL UL OPL HCG.COUM USLH WHGXAWYX MH VUNKUMPHG'L VYPGN LYSYWMYX UL THLWHC'L OYKH CULMOY ZUWM MOUM OY OUX GH WHGGYWMPHGL PG MOY WPME UGX CUL U LMKUGNYKMOYKY. PG OPL IYKLHG, OHGHK CUL LOHCG MH U LPTISY ZPNOMPGN KALLPUGLHSXPYK CPMOHAM WHGGYWMPHGL UGX PGMKPNAYL, UGX MH HGY COH CUL ULLHWPUMYXVE TYTHKPYL HZ MOY PMUSPUG WUTIUPNG CPMO MOY GUTY HZ LABHKHB.THKYHBYK, IUEPGN LAWO OHGHK MH VUNKUMPHG CUL MOY VYLM CUE HZ YDIKYLLPGNXPLUIIKHBUS UGX XPLSPRY HZ RAMAFHB."OUX MOYKY VYYG GH VUNKUMPHG, PM CHASX OUBY VYYG GYWYLLUKE MH PGBYGMOPT," LUPX MOY CPM LOPGLOPG, IUKHXEPGN MOY CHKXL HZ BHSMUPKY. RAMAFHBGH HGY LIHRY HZ, YDWYIM LHTY COH UVALYX OPT PG COPLIYKL, WUSSPGN OPT UWHAKM CYUMOYKWHWR UGX UG HSX LUMEK.USS THLWHC KYIYUMYX IKPGWY XHSNHKARHB'L LUEPGN: "PZ EHA NH HG THXYSPGNUGX THXYSPGN EHA TALM NYM LTYUKYX CPMO WSUE," LANNYLMPGN WHGLHSUMPHGZHK HAK XYZYUM VE MOY TYTHKE HZ ZHKTYK BPWMHKPYL; UGX MOY CHKXL HZKHLMHIWOPG, MOUM ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL OUBY MH VY PGWPMYX MH VUMMSY VEOPNOZUSAMPG CHKXL, UGX NYKTUGL VE SHNPWUS UKNATYGML MH LOHC MOYT MOUM PMPL THKY XUGNYKHAL MH KAG UCUE MOUG MH UXBUGWY, VAM MOUM KALLPUG LHSXPYKLHGSE GYYX MH VY KYLMKUPGYX UGX OYSX VUWR! HG USS LPXYL, GYC UGX ZKYLOUGYWXHMYL CYKY OYUKX HZ PGXPBPXAUS YDUTISYL HZ OYKHPLT LOHCG VE HAKHZZPWYKL UGX TYG UM UALMYKSPMF. HGY OUX LUBYX U LMUGXUKX, UGHMOYK OUXRPSSYX ZPBY ZKYGWOTYG, U MOPKX OUX SHUXYX ZPBY WUGGHG LPGNSYOUGXYX. VYKNCUL TYGMPHGYX, VE MOHLY COH XPX GHM RGHC OPT, UL OUBPGN, COYG CHAGXYXPG MOY KPNOM OUGX, MURYG OPL LCHKX PG MOY SYZM, UGX NHGY ZHKCUKX. HZVHSRHGLRP, GHMOPGN CUL LUPX, UGX HGSE MOHLY COH RGYC OPT PGMPTUMYSEKYNKYMMYX MOUM OY OUX XPYX LH EHAGN, SYUBPGN U IKYNGUGM CPZY CPMO OPLYWWYGMKPW ZUMOYK.WOUIMYK PPPHG MOUM MOPKX HZ TUKWO, USS MOY KHHTL PG MOY YGNSPLO WSAV CYKY ZPSSYXCPMO U OAT HZ WHGBYKLUMPHG, SPRY MOY OAT HZ VYYL LCUKTPGN PG LIKPGNMPTY.MOY TYTVYKL UGX NAYLML HZ MOY WSAV CUGXYKYX OPMOYK UGX MOPMOYK, LUM,LMHHX, TYM, UGX LYIUKUMYX, LHTY PG AGPZHKT UGX LHTY PG YBYGPGN XKYLL,UGX U ZYC OYKY UGX MOYKY CPMO IHCXYKYX OUPK UGX PG KALLPUG RUZMUGL.IHCXYKYX ZHHMTYG, PG SPBYKE CPMO VAWRSYX LOHYL UGX LTUKM LMHWRPGNL,LMHHX UM YBYKE XHHK UGDPHALSE GHMPGN BPLPMHKL' YBYKE THBYTYGM PG HKXYKMH HZZYK MOYPK LYKBPWYL. THLM HZ MOHLY IKYLYGM CYKY YSXYKSE, KYLIYWMYXTYG CPMO VKHUX, LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM ZUWYL, ZUM ZPGNYKL, UGX KYLHSAMY NYLMAKYLUGX BHPWYL. MOPL WSULL HZ NAYLML UGX TYTVYKL LUM PG WYKMUPG OUVPMAUSISUWYL UGX TYM PG WYKMUPG OUVPMAUS NKHAIL. U TPGHKPME HZ MOHLY IKYLYGMCYKY WULAUS NAYLML--WOPYZSE EHAGN TYG, UTHGN COHT CYKY XYGPLHB, KHLMHB,UGX XHSHROHB--COH CUL GHC UNUPG UG HZZPWYK PG MOY LYTYGHB KYNPTYGM. MOYZUWYL HZ MOYLY EHAGN IYHISY, YLIYWPUSSE MOHLY COH CYKY TPSPMUKE TYG,VHKY MOUM YDIKYLLPHG HZ WHGXYLWYGXPGN KYLIYWM ZHK MOYPK YSXYKL COPWOLYYTL MH LUE MH MOY HSXYK NYGYKUMPHG, "CY UKY IKYIUKYX MH KYLIYWM UGXOHGHK EHA, VAM USS MOY LUTY KYTYTVYK MOUM MOY ZAMAKY VYSHGNL MH AL."GYLBPMLRP CUL MOYKY UL UG HSX TYTVYK HZ MOY WSAV. IPYKKY, COH UM OPLCPZY'L WHTTUGX OUX SYM OPL OUPK NKHC UGX UVUGXHGYX OPL LIYWMUWSYL, CYGMUVHAM MOY KHHTL ZULOPHGUVSE XKYLLYX VAM SHHRPGN LUX UGX XASS. OYKY, ULYSLYCOYKY, OY CUL LAKKHAGXYX VE UG UMTHLIOYKY HZ LAVLYKBPYGWY MH OPLCYUSMO, UGX VYPGN PG MOY OUVPM HZ SHKXPGN PM HBYK MOYLY IYHISY, OYMKYUMYX MOYT CPMO UVLYGM-TPGXYX WHGMYTIM.VE OPL UNY OY LOHASX OUBY VYSHGNYX MH MOY EHAGNYK TYG, VAM VE OPL CYUSMOUGX WHGGYWMPHGL OY VYSHGNYX MH MOY NKHAIL HSX UGX OHGHKYX NAYLML, UGXLH OY CYGM ZKHT HGY NKHAI MH UGHMOYK. LHTY HZ MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM HSX TYGCYKY MOY WYGMYK HZ NKHAIL COPWO YBYG LMKUGNYKL UIIKHUWOYX KYLIYWMZASSEMH OYUK MOY BHPWYL HZ CYSS-RGHCG TYG. MOY SUKNYLM WPKWSYL ZHKTYX KHAGXWHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, BUSAYB, UGX GUKELORPG. KHLMHIWOPG CUL XYLWKPVPGN OHCMOY KALLPUGL OUX VYYG HBYKCOYSTYX VE ZSEPGN UALMKPUGL UGX OUX OUX MHZHKWY MOYPK CUE MOKHANO MOYT CPMO VUEHGYML.BUSAYB CUL WHGZPXYGMPUSSE MYSSPGN MOUM ABUKHB OUX VYYG LYGM ZKHTIYMYKLVAKN MH ULWYKMUPG COUM THLWHC CUL MOPGRPGN UVHAM UALMYKSPMF.PG MOY MOPKX WPKWSY, GUKELORPG CUL LIYURPGN HZ MOY TYYMPGN HZ MOYUALMKPUG WHAGWPS HZ CUK UM COPWO LABHKHB WKHCYX SPRY U WHWR PG KYISE MHMOY GHGLYGLY MUSRYX VE MOY UALMKPUG NYGYKUSL. LOPGLOPG, LMUGXPGN WSHLYVE, MKPYX MH TURY U QHRY, LUEPGN MOUM RAMAFHB OUX YBPXYGMSE ZUPSYX MHSYUKG ZKHT LABHKHB YBYG LH LPTISY U MOPGN UL MOY UKM HZ WKHCPGN SPRY UWHWR, VAM MOY YSXYK TYTVYKL NSUGWYX LYBYKYSE UM MOY CPM, TURPGN OPTZYYS MOUM PG MOUM ISUWY UGX HG MOUM XUE, PM CUL PTIKHIYK MH LIYUR LH HZRAMAFHB.WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, OAKKPYX UGX IKYHWWAIPYX, CYGM UVHAM PG OPL LHZM VHHMLVYMCYYG MOY XPGPGN UGX XKUCPGN KHHTL, OULMPSE NKYYMPGN MOY PTIHKMUGM UGXAGPTIHKMUGM, USS HZ COHT OY RGYC, UL PZ MOYE CYKY USS YJAUSL, COPSY OPLYEYL HWWULPHGUSSE LHANOM HAM OPL ZPGY CYSS-LYM-AI EHAGN LHG, KYLMPGNHG OPT UGX CPGRPGN QHEZASSE UM OPT. EHAGN KHLMHB LMHHX UM U CPGXHC CPMOXHSHROHB, COHLY UWJAUPGMUGWY OY OUX SUMYSE TUXY UGX OPNOSE BUSAYX. MOYHSX WHAGM WUTY AI MH MOYT UGX IKYLLYX XHSHROHB'L OUGX."ISYULY WHTY UGX BPLPM AL... EHA RGHC TE VKUBY VHE... VYYG MHNYMOYK HAMMOYKY... VHMO ISUEPGN MOY OYKH... UO, BULPSP PNGUMHBPWO... OHC X'EY XH,HSX ZYSSHC?" OY LUPX, MAKGPGN MH UG HSX TUG COH CUL IULLPGN, VAM VYZHKYOY OUX ZPGPLOYX OPL NKYYMPGN MOYKY CUL U NYGYKUS LMPK, UGX U ZHHMTUG COHOUX KAG PG UGGHAGWYX, CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY: "OY'L UKKPBYX!"VYSSL KUGN, MOY LMYCUKXL KALOYX ZHKCUKX, UGX--SPRY KEY LOURYG MHNYMOYKPG U LOHBYS--MOY NAYLML COH OUX VYYG LWUMMYKYX UVHAM PG XPZZYKYGM KHHTLWUTY MHNYMOYK UGX WKHCXYX PG MOY SUKNY XKUCPGN KHHT VE MOY XHHK HZ MOYVUSSKHHT.VUNKUMPHG UIIYUKYX PG MOY XHHKCUE HZ MOY UGMYKHHT CPMOHAM OUM HK LCHKX,COPWO, PG UWWHKX CPMO MOY WSAV WALMHT, OY OUX NPBYG AI MH MOY OUSSIHKMYK. OY OUX GH SUTVLRPG WUI HG OPL OYUX, GHK OUX OY U SHUXYX COPIHBYK OPL LOHASXYK, UL COYG KHLMHB OUX LYYG OPT HG MOY YBY HZ MOY VUMMSYHZ UALMYKSPMF, VAM CHKY U MPNOM GYC AGPZHKT CPMO KALLPUG UGX ZHKYPNGHKXYKL, UGX MOY LMUK HZ LM. NYHKNY HG OPL SYZM VKYULM. YBPXYGMSE QALMVYZHKY WHTPGN MH MOY XPGGYK OY OUX OUX OPL OUPK UGX COPLRYKL MKPTTYX,COPWO WOUGNYX OPL UIIYUKUGWY ZHK MOY CHKLY. MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN GUPBYSEZYLMPBY PG OPL UPK, COPWO, PG WHGQAGWMPHG CPMO OPL ZPKT UGX BPKPSYZYUMAKYL, NUBY OPT U KUMOYK WHTPWUS YDIKYLLPHG. VYRSYLOYB UGX MOYHXHKYABUKHB, COH OUX UKKPBYX CPMO OPT, IUALYX UM MOY XHHKCUE MH USSHC OPT,UL MOY NAYLM HZ OHGHK, MH YGMYK ZPKLM. VUNKUMPHG CUL YTVUKKULLYX, GHMCPLOPGN MH UBUPS OPTLYSZ HZ MOYPK WHAKMYLE, UGX MOPL WUALYX LHTY XYSUEUM MOY XHHKL, VAM UZMYK USS OY XPX UM SULM YGMYK ZPKLM. OY CUSRYX LOESEUGX UCRCUKXSE HBYK MOY IUKJAYM ZSHHK HZ MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT, GHM RGHCPGNCOUM MH XH CPMO OPL OUGXL; OY CUL THKY UWWALMHTYX MH CUSR HBYK U ISHCYXZPYSX AGXYK ZPKY, UL OY OUX XHGY UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY RAKLR KYNPTYGM UMLWOHG NKUVYKG--UGX OY CHASX OUBY ZHAGX MOUM YULPYK. MOY WHTTPMMYYTYGTYM OPT UM MOY ZPKLM XHHK UGX, YDIKYLLPGN MOYPK XYSPNOM UM LYYPGN LAWO UOPNOSE OHGHKYX NAYLM, MHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZ OPT UL PM CYKY, CPMOHAM CUPMPGNZHK OPL KYISE, LAKKHAGXYX OPT, UGX SYX OPT MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. PM CULUM ZPKLM PTIHLLPVSY MH YGMYK MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT XHHK ZHK MOY WKHCX HZTYTVYKL UGX NAYLML QHLMSPGN HGY UGHMOYK UGX MKEPGN MH NYM U NHHX SHHR UMVUNKUMPHG HBYK YUWO HMOYK'L LOHASXYKL, UL PZ OY CYKY LHTY KUKY UGPTUS.WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, SUANOPGN UGX KYIYUMPGN MOY CHKXL, "TURY CUE, XYUKVHE! TURY CUE, TURY CUE!" IALOYX MOKHANO MOY WKHCX THKY YGYKNYMPWUSSEMOUG UGEHGY, SYX MOY NAYLML PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, UGX LYUMYX MOYT HGMOY WYGMYK LHZU. MOY VPNCPNL, MOY THLM KYLIYWMYX TYTVYKL HZ MOY WSAV,VYLYM MOY GYC UKKPBUSL. WHAGM PSEU, UNUPG MOKALMPGN OPL CUE MOKHANO MOYWKHCX, CYGM HAM HZ MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX KYUIIYUKYX U TPGAMY SUMYK CPMOUGHMOYK WHTTPMMYYTUG, WUKKEPGN U SUKNY LPSBYK LUSBYK COPWO OY IKYLYGMYXMH IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG. HG MOY LUSBYK SUE LHTY BYKLYL WHTIHLYX UGX IKPGMYXPG MOY OYKH'L OHGHK. VUNKUMPHG, HG LYYPGN MOY LUSBYK, NSUGWYX UKHAGXPG XPLTUE, UL MOHANO LYYRPGN OYSI. VAM USS YEYL XYTUGXYX MOUM OY LOHASXLAVTPM. ZYYSPGN OPTLYSZ PG MOYPK IHCYK, OY KYLHSAMYSE MHHR MOY LUSBYKCPMO VHMO OUGXL UGX SHHRYX LMYKGSE UGX KYIKHUWOZASSE UM MOY WHAGM COHOUX IKYLYGMYX PM MH OPT. LHTYHGY HVSPNPGNSE MHHR MOY XPLO ZKHT VUNKUMPHG(HK OY CHASX, PM LYYTYX, OUBY OYSX PM MPSS YBYGPGN UGX OUBY NHGY PG MHXPGGYK CPMO PM) UGX XKYC OPL UMMYGMPHG MH MOY BYKLYL."CYSS, P CPSS KYUX MOYT, MOYG!" VUNKUMPHG LYYTYX MH LUE, UGX, ZPDPGNOPL CYUKE YEYL HG MOY IUIYK, VYNUG MH KYUX MOYT CPMO U ZPDYX UGX LYKPHALYDIKYLLPHG. VAM MOY UAMOHK OPTLYSZ MHHR MOY BYKLYL UGX VYNUG KYUXPGNMOYT USHAX. VUNKUMPHG VHCYX OPL OYUX UGX SPLMYGYX:   VKPGN NSHKE MOYG MH USYDUGXYK'L KYPNG   UGX HG MOY MOKHGY HAK MPMAL LOPYSX.   U XKYUXYX ZHY VY MOHA, RPGXOYUKMYX UL U TUG,   U KOPIOYAL UM OHTY, U WUYLUK PG MOY ZPYSX!   Y'YG ZHKMAGUMY GUIHSYHG   RGHCL VE YDIYKPYGWY, GHC, VUNKUMPHG,   UGX XUKY GHM OYKWASYUG KALLPUGL MKHAVSY...VAM VYZHKY OY OUX ZPGPLOYX KYUXPGN, U LMYGMHKPUG TUQHK-XHTH UGGHAGWYXMOUM XPGGYK CUL KYUXE! MOY XHHK HIYGYX, UGX ZKHT MOY XPGPGN KHHT WUTYMOY KYLHAGXPGN LMKUPGL HZ MOY IHSHGUPLY:   WHGJAYLM'L QHEZAS MOAGXYK CURYG,   MKPATIO, BUSPUGM KALLPUGL, GHC!...UGX WHAGM KHLMHB, NSUGWPGN UGNKPSE UM MOY UAMOHK COH CYGM HG KYUXPGN OPLBYKLYL, VHCYX MH VUNKUMPHG. YBYKEHGY KHLY, ZYYSPGN MOUM XPGGYK CUL THKYPTIHKMUGM MOUG BYKLYL, UGX VUNKUMPHG, UNUPG IKYWYXPGN USS MOY KYLM,CYGM PG MH XPGGYK. OY CUL LYUMYX PG MOY ISUWY HZ OHGHK VYMCYYG MCHUSYDUGXYKL--VYRSYLOYB UGX GUKELORPG--COPWO CUL U LPNGPZPWUGM USSALPHG MHMOY GUTY HZ MOY LHBYKYPNG. MOKYY OAGXKYX IYKLHGL MHHR MOYPK LYUML PG MOYXPGPGN KHHT, UWWHKXPGN MH MOYPK KUGR UGX PTIHKMUGWY: MOY THKY PTIHKMUGMGYUKYK MH MOY OHGHKYX NAYLM, UL GUMAKUSSE UL CUMYK ZSHCL XYYIYLM COYKYMOY SUGX SPYL SHCYLM.QALM VYZHKY XPGGYK, WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB IKYLYGMYX OPL LHG MH VUNKUMPHG,COH KYWHNGPFYX OPT UGX LUPX U ZYC CHKXL MH OPT, XPLQHPGMYX UGX UCRCUKX,UL CYKY USS MOY CHKXL OY LIHRY MOUM XUE, UGX WHAGM PSEU SHHRYX QHEZASSEUGX IKHAXSE UKHAGX COPSY VUNKUMPHG LIHRY MH OPL LHG.GPWOHSUL KHLMHB, CPMO XYGPLHB UGX OPL GYC UWJAUPGMUGWY, XHSHROHB, LUMUSTHLM UM MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY MUVSY. ZUWPGN MOYT LUM IPYKKY, VYLPXY IKPGWYGYLBPMLRP. WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB CPMO MOY HMOYK TYTVYKL HZ MOY WHTTPMMYY LUMZUWPGN VUNKUMPHG UGX, UL MOY BYKE IYKLHGPZPWUMPHG HZ THLWHC OHLIPMUSPME,XPX MOY OHGHKL MH MOY IKPGWY.OPL YZZHKML OUX GHM VYYG PG BUPG. MOY XPGGYK, VHMO MOY SYGMYG UGX MOYHMOYK ZUKY, CUL LISYGXPX, EYM OY WHASX GHM ZYYS JAPMY UM YULY MPSS MOYYGX HZ MOY TYUS. OY CPGRYX UM MOY VAMSYK, COPLIYKYX XPKYWMPHGL MH MOYZHHMTYG, UGX UCUPMYX YUWO YDIYWMYX XPLO CPMO LHTY UGDPYME. YBYKEMOPGNCUL YDWYSSYGM. CPMO MOY LYWHGX WHAKLY, U NPNUGMPW LMYKSYM (UM LPNOM HZCOPWO PSEU KHLMHB VSALOYX CPMO LYSZ-WHGLWPHAL ISYULAKY), MOY ZHHMTYGVYNUG IHIIPGN WHKRL UGX ZPSSPGN MOY WOUTIUNGY NSULLYL. UZMYK MOY ZPLO,COPWO TUXY U WYKMUPG LYGLUMPHG, MOY WHAGM YDWOUGNYX NSUGWYL CPMO MOYHMOYK WHTTPMMYYTYG. "MOYKY CPSS VY TUGE MHULML, PM'L MPTY MH VYNPG," OYCOPLIYKYX, UGX MURPGN AI OPL NSULL, OY KHLY. USS CYKY LPSYGM, CUPMPGNZHK COUM OY CHASX LUE."MH MOY OYUSMO HZ HAK LHBYKYPNG, MOY YTIYKHK!" OY WKPYX, UGX UM MOY LUTYTHTYGM OPL RPGXSE YEYL NKYC THPLM CPMO MYUKL HZ QHE UGX YGMOALPULT. MOYVUGX PTTYXPUMYSE LMKAWR AI "WHGJAYLM'L QHEZAS MOAGXYK CURYG..." USS KHLYUGX WKPYX "OAKKUO!" VUNKUMPHG USLH KHLY UGX LOHAMYX "OAKKUO!" PG YDUWMSEMOY LUTY BHPWY PG COPWO OY OUX LOHAMYX PM HG MOY ZPYSX UM LWOHG NKUVYKG.EHAGN KHLMHB'L YWLMUMPW BHPWY WHASX VY OYUKX UVHBY MOY MOKYY OAGXKYXHMOYKL. OY GYUKSE CYIM. "MH MOY OYUSMO HZ HAK LHBYKYPNG, MOY YTIYKHK!"OY KHUKYX, "OAKKUO!" UGX YTIMEPGN OPL NSULL UM HGY NASI OY XULOYX PM MHMOY ZSHHK. TUGE ZHSSHCYX OPL YDUTISY, UGX MOY SHAX LOHAMPGN WHGMPGAYXZHK U SHGN MPTY. UGX UNUPGOPL VSAY YEYL NKYC THPLM. "OAKKUO!" WKPYX MOY MOKYY OAGXKYX BHPWYLUNUPG, VAM PGLMYUX HZ MOY VUGX U WOHPK VYNUG LPGNPGN U WUGMUMU WHTIHLYXVE IUAS PBUGHBPWO RAMAFHB:   KALLPUGL! H'YK USS VUKKPYKL HG!   WHAKUNY WHGJAYLM NAUKUGMYYL;   OUBY CY GHM VUNKUMPHG?   OY VKPGNL ZHY TYG MH MOYPK RGYYL,... YMW.UL LHHG UL MOY LPGNPGN CUL HBYK, UGHMOYK UGX UGHMOYK MHULM CUL IKHIHLYXUGX WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB VYWUTY THKY UGX THKY THBYX, THKY NSULL CULLTULOYX, UGX MOY LOHAMPGN NKYC SHAXYK. MOYE XKUGR MH VYRSYLOYB,GUKELORPG, ABUKHB, XHSNHKARHB, UIKURLPG, BUSAYB, MH MOY WHTTPMMYY, MHUSS MOY WSAV TYTVYKL UGX MH USS MOY WSAV NAYLML, UGX ZPGUSSE MH WHAGMPSEU KHLMHB LYIUKUMYSE, UL MOY HKNUGPFYK HZ MOY VUGJAYM. OPL ZUWY CUL XYIKYLLYX UGX NSHHTE. OY LYYTYX MH LYY UGX OYUKGHMOPGN HZ COUM CUL NHPGN HG UKHAGX OPT UGX MH VY UVLHKVYX VE LHTYXYIKYLLPGN UGX AGLHSBYX IKHVSYT.MOY AGLHSBYX IKHVSYT MOUM MHKTYGMYX OPT CUL WUALYX VE OPGML NPBYG VE MOYIKPGWYLL, OPL WHALPG, UM THLWHC, WHGWYKGPGN XHSHROHB'L PGMPTUWE CPMO OPLCPZY, UGX VE UG UGHGETHAL SYMMYK OY OUX KYWYPBYX MOUM THKGPGN, COPWO PGMOY TYUG QHWASUK CUE WHTTHG MH UGHGETHAL SYMMYKL LUPX MOUM OY LUC VUXSEMOKHANO OPL LIYWMUWSYL, VAM MOUM OPL CPZY'L WHGGYWMPHG CPMO XHSHROHB CULU LYWKYM MH GH HGY VAM OPTLYSZ. IPYKKY UVLHSAMYSE XPLVYSPYBYX VHMO MOYIKPGWYLL' OPGML UGX MOY SYMMYK, VAM OY ZYUKYX GHC MH SHHR UM XHSHROHB,COH CUL LPMMPGN HIIHLPMY OPT. YBYKE MPTY OY WOUGWYX MH TYYM XHSHROHB'LOUGXLHTY PGLHSYGM YEYL, IPYKKY ZYSM LHTYMOPGN MYKKPVSY UGX THGLMKHALKPLPGN PG OPL LHAS UGX MAKGYX JAPWRSE UCUE. PGBHSAGMUKPSE KYWUSSPGN OPLCPZY'L IULM UGX OYK KYSUMPHGL CPMO XHSHROHB, IPYKKY LUC WSYUKSE MOUMCOUM CUL LUPX PG MOY SYMMYK TPNOM VY MKAY, HK TPNOM UM SYULM LYYT MH VYMKAY OUX PM GHM KYZYKKYX MH OPL CPZY. OY PGBHSAGMUKPSE KYTYTVYKYXOHC XHSHROHB, COH OUX ZASSE KYWHBYKYX OPL ZHKTYK IHLPMPHG UZMYK MOYWUTIUPNG, OUX KYMAKGYX MH IYMYKLVAKN UGX WHTY MH OPT. UBUPSPGN OPTLYSZHZ OPL ZKPYGXSE KYSUMPHGL CPMO IPYKKY UL U VHHG WHTIUGPHG, XHSHROHBOUX WHTY LMKUPNOM MH OPL OHALY, UGX IPYKKY OUX IAM OPT AI UGX SYGM OPTTHGYE. IPYKKY KYWUSSYX OHC OYSYGY OUX LTPSPGNSE YDIKYLLYX XPLUIIKHBUS HZXHSHROHB'L SPBPGN UM MOYPK OHALY, UGX OHC WEGPWUSSE XHSHROHB OUX IKUPLYXOPL CPZY'L VYUAME MH OPT UGX ZKHT MOUM MPTY MPSS MOYE WUTY MH THLWHC OUXGHM SYZM MOYT ZHK U XUE."EYL, OY PL BYKE OUGXLHTY," MOHANOM IPYKKY, "UGX P RGHC OPT. PM CHASX VYIUKMPWASUKSE ISYULUGM MH OPT MH XPLOHGHK TE GUTY UGX KPXPWASY TY, QALMVYWUALY P OUBY YDYKMYX TELYSZ HG OPL VYOUSZ, VYZKPYGXYX OPT, UGX OYSIYXOPT. P RGHC UGX AGXYKLMUGX COUM U LIPWY MOUM CHASX UXX MH MOY ISYULAKYHZ XYWYPBPGN TY, PZ PM KYUSSE CYKY MKAY. EYL, PZ PM CYKY MKAY, VAM PXH GHM VYSPYBY PM. P OUBY GH KPNOM MH, UGX WUG'M, VYSPYBY PM." OYKYTYTVYKYX MOY YDIKYLLPHG XHSHROHB'L ZUWY ULLATYX PG OPL THTYGML HZWKAYSME, UL COYG MEPGN MOY IHSPWYTUG MH MOY VYUK UGX XKHIIPGN MOYT PGMHMOY CUMYK, HK COYG OY WOUSSYGNYX U TUG MH U XAYS CPMOHAM UGE KYULHG,HK LOHM U IHLM-VHE'L OHKLY CPMO U IPLMHS. MOUM YDIKYLLPHG CUL HZMYGHG XHSHROHB'L ZUWY COYG SHHRPGN UM OPT. "EYL, OY PL U VASSE," MOHANOMIPYKKY, "MH RPSS U TUG TYUGL GHMOPGN MH OPT. PM TALM LYYT MH OPT MOUMYBYKEHGY PL UZKUPX HZ OPT, UGX MOUM TALM ISYULY OPT. OY TALM MOPGR MOUMP, MHH, UT UZKUPX HZ OPT--UGX PG ZUWM P UT UZKUPX HZ OPT," OY MOHANOM,UGX UNUPG OY ZYSM LHTYMOPGN MYKKPVSY UGX THGLMKHAL KPLPGN PG OPL LHAS.XHSHROHB, XYGPLHB, UGX KHLMHB CYKY GHC LPMMPGN HIIHLPMY IPYKKY UGXLYYTYX BYKE NUE. KHLMHB CUL MUSRPGN TYKKPSE MH OPL MCH ZKPYGXL, HGY HZCOHT CUL U XULOPGN OALLUK UGX MOY HMOYK U GHMHKPHAL XAYSPLM UGXKURY, UGX YBYKE GHC UGX MOYG OY NSUGWYX PKHGPWUSSE UM IPYKKY, COHLYIKYHWWAIPYX, UVLYGM-TPGXYX, UGX TULLPBY ZPNAKY CUL U BYKE GHMPWYUVSY HGYUM MOY XPGGYK. KHLMHB SHHRYX PGPTPWUSSE UM IPYKKY, ZPKLM VYWUALY IPYKKYUIIYUKYX MH OPL OALLUK YEYL UL U KPWO WPBPSPUG, MOY OALVUGX HZ UVYUAME, UGX PG U CHKX--UG HSX CHTUG; UGX LYWHGXSE VYWUALY IPYKKY PG OPLIKYHWWAIUMPHG UGX UVLYGM-TPGXYXGYLL OUX GHM KYWHNGPFYX KHLMHB UGX OUXGHM KYLIHGXYX MH OPL NKYYMPGN. OY LUPX. VAM KHLMHB CUL HMOYKCPLYYGNUNYX; OY CUL LOHAMPGN "OAKKUO!""COE XHG'M EHA KYGYC MOY UWJAUPGMUGWY?" LUPX XHSHROHB MH KHLMHB."WHGZHAGX OPT, OY'L U ZHHS!" OYUXXYX.IPYKKY, CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL, XKUGR HAM HZ OPL NSULL CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UMXHSHROHB HK UGLCYKPGN OPT. MOY ZHHMTUG, COH CUL XPLMKPVAMPGN SYUZSYMLCPMO RAMAFHB'L WUGMUMU, SUPX HGY VYZHKY IPYKKY UL HGY HZ MOY IKPGWPIUSNAYLML.
