OY YQUWASUMYX, UGX, IALOPGNVUWR OPL WOUPK, OY KHLY ZKHT MOY MUVSY.UM MOY BYKE PGLMUGM OY XPX MOPL UGX AMMYKYX MOHLY CHKXL, IPYKKY ZYSMMOUM MOY JAYLMPHG HZ OPL CPZY'L NAPSM COPWO OUX VYYG MHKTYGMPGN OPT MOYCOHSY XUE CUL ZPGUSSE UGX PGXAVPMUVSE UGLCYKYX PG MOY UZZPKTUMPBY. OYOUMYX OYK UGX CUL ZHKYBYK LAGXYKYX ZKHT OYK. XYLIPMY XYGPLHB'L KYJAYLMMOUM OY CHASX MURY GH IUKM PG MOY TUMMYK, KHLMHB UNKYYX MH VY XHSHROHB'LLYWHGX, UGX UZMYK XPGGYK OY XPLWALLYX MOY UKKUGNYTYGML ZHK MOY XAYS CPMOGYLBPMLRP, VYFAROHB'L LYWHGX. IPYKKY CYGM OHTY, VAM KHLMHB CPMO XHSHROHBUGX XYGPLHB LMUEYX HG UM MOY WSAV MPSS SUMY, SPLMYGPGN MH MOY NEILPYLUGX HMOYK LPGNYKL."CYSS MOYG, MPSS MHTHKKHC UM LHRHSGPRP," LUPX XHSHROHB, UL OY MHHR SYUBYHZ KHLMHB PG MOY WSAV IHKWO."UGX XH EHA ZYYS JAPMY WUST?" KHLMHB ULRYX.XHSHROHB IUALYX."CYSS, EHA LYY, P'SS MYSS EHA MOY COHSY LYWKYM HZ XAYSPGN PG MCHCHKXL. PZ EHA UKY NHPGN MH ZPNOM U XAYS, UGX EHA TURY U CPSS UGX CKPMYUZZYWMPHGUMY SYMMYKL MH EHAK IUKYGML, UGX PZ EHA MOPGR EHA TUE VYRPSSYX, EHA UKY U ZHHS UGX UKY SHLM ZHK WYKMUPG. VAM NH CPMO MOY ZPKTPGMYGMPHG HZ RPSSPGN EHAK TUG UL JAPWRSE UGX LAKYSE UL IHLLPVSY, UGXMOYG USS CPSS VY KPNOM, UL HAK VYUK OAGMLTUG UM RHLMKHTU ALYX MH MYSSTY. 'YBYKEHGY ZYUKL U VYUK,' OY LUEL, 'VAM COYG EHA LYY HGY EHAK ZYUK'LUSS NHGY, UGX EHAK HGSE MOHANOM PL GHM MH SYM OPT NYM UCUE!' UGX MOUM'LOHC PM PL CPMO TY. U XYTUPG, THG WOYK." *    * MPSS MHTHKKHC, TE XYUK ZYSSHC.GYDM XUE, UM YPNOM PG MOY THKGPGN, IPYKKY UGX GYLBPMLRP XKHBY MH MOYLHRHSGPRP ZHKYLM UGX ZHAGX XHSHROHB, XYGPLHB, UGX KHLMHB USKYUXE MOYKY.IPYKKY OUX MOY UPK HZ U TUG IKYHWWAIPYX CPMO WHGLPXYKUMPHGL COPWO OUX GHWHGGYWMPHG CPMO MOY TUMMYK PG OUGX. OPL OUNNUKX ZUWY CUL EYSSHC. OY OUXYBPXYGMSE GHM LSYIM MOUM GPNOM. OY SHHRYX UVHAM XPLMKUWMYXSE UGX LWKYCYXAI OPL YEYL UL PZ XUFFSYX VE MOY LAG. OY CUL YGMPKYSE UVLHKVYX VE MCHWHGLPXYKUMPHGL: OPL CPZY'L NAPSM, HZ COPWO UZMYK OPL LSYYISYLL GPNOM OYOUX GHM MOY LSPNOMYLM XHAVM, UGX MOY NAPSMSYLLGYLL HZ XHSHROHB, COH OUXGH KYULHG MH IKYLYKBY MOY OHGHK HZ U TUG COH CUL GHMOPGN MH OPT.... "PLOHASX IYKOUIL OUBY XHGY MOY LUTY MOPGN PG OPL ISUWY," MOHANOM IPYKKY."PM'L YBYG WYKMUPG MOUM P LOHASX OUBY XHGY MOY LUTY, MOYG COE MOPL XAYS,MOPL TAKXYK? YPMOYK P LOUSS RPSS OPT, HK OY CPSS OPM TY PG MOY OYUX,HK YSVHC, HK RGYY. WUG'M P NH UCUE ZKHT OYKY, KAG UCUE, VAKE TELYSZLHTYCOYKY?" IULLYX MOKHANO OPL TPGX. VAM QALM UM THTYGML COYG LAWOMOHANOML HWWAKKYX MH OPT, OY CHASX ULR PG U IUKMPWASUKSE WUST UGXUVLYGM-TPGXYX CUE, COPWO PGLIPKYX MOY KYLIYWM HZ MOY HGSHHRYKL, "CPSS PMVY SHGN? UKY MOPGNL KYUXE?"COYG USS CUL KYUXE, MOY LUVYKL LMAWR PG MOY LGHC MH TUKR MOY VUKKPYKL,UGX MOY IPLMHSL SHUXYX, GYLBPMLRP CYGM AI MH IPYKKY."P LOHASX GHM VY XHPGN TE XAME, WHAGM," OY LUPX PG MPTPX MHGYL, "UGXLOHASX GHM QALMPZE EHAK WHGZPXYGWY UGX MOY OHGHK EHA OUBY XHGY TY PGWOHHLPGN TY ZHK EHAK LYWHGX, PZ UM MOPL NKUBY, MOPL BYKE NKUBY, THTYGM PXPX GHM MYSS EHA MOY COHSY MKAMO. P MOPGR MOYKY PL GH LAZZPWPYGM NKHAGXZHK MOPL UZZUPK, HK ZHK VSHHX MH VY LOYX HBYK PM.... EHA CYKY GHM KPNOM,GHM JAPMY PG MOY KPNOM, EHA CYKY PTIYMAHAL...""HO EYL, PM PL OHKKPVSE LMAIPX," LUPX IPYKKY."MOYG USSHC TY MH YDIKYLL EHAK KYNKYML, UGX P UT LAKY EHAK HIIHGYGMCPSS UWWYIM MOYT," LUPX GYLBPMLRP (COH SPRY MOY HMOYKL WHGWYKGYX PG MOYUZZUPK, UGX SPRY YBYKEHGY PG LPTPSUK WULYL, XPX GHM EYM VYSPYBY MOUM MOYUZZUPK OUX WHTY MH UG UWMAUS XAYS). "EHA RGHC, WHAGM, PM PL TAWO THKYOHGHKUVSY MH UXTPM HGY'L TPLMURY MOUG MH SYM TUMMYKL VYWHTY PKKYIUKUVSY.MOYKY CUL GH PGLASM HG YPMOYK LPXY. USSHC TY MH WHGBYE....""GH! COUM PL MOYKY MH MUSR UVHAM?" LUPX IPYKKY. "PM'L USS MOY LUTY....PL YBYKEMOPGN KYUXE?" OY UXXYX. "HGSE MYSS TY COYKY MH NH UGX COYKY MHLOHHM," OY LUPX CPMO UG AGGUMAKUSSE NYGMSY LTPSY.OY MHHR MOY IPLMHS PG OPL OUGX UGX VYNUG ULRPGN UVHAM MOY CHKRPGN HZ MOYMKPNNYK, UL OY OUX GHM VYZHKY OYSX U IPLMHS PG OPL OUGX--U ZUWM MOUM OYXPX GHM CPLO MH WHGZYLL."HO EYL, SPRY MOUM, P RGHC, P HGSE ZHKNHM," LUPX OY."GH UIHSHNPYL, GHGY COUMYBYK," LUPX XHSHROHB MH XYGPLHB (COH HG OPLLPXY OUX VYYG UMMYTIMPGN U KYWHGWPSPUMPHG), UGX OY USLH CYGM AI MH MOYUIIHPGMYX ISUWY.MOY LIHM WOHLYG ZHK MOY XAYS CUL LHTY YPNOME IUWYL ZKHT MOY KHUX,COYKY MOY LSYPNOL OUX VYYG SYZM, PG U LTUSS WSYUKPGN PG MOY IPGY ZHKYLMWHBYKYX CPMO TYSMPGN LGHC, MOY ZKHLM OUBPGN VYNAG MH VKYUR AI XAKPGN MOYSULM ZYC XUEL. MOY UGMUNHGPLML LMHHX ZHKME IUWYL UIUKM UM MOY ZUKMOYKYXNY HZ MOY WSYUKPGN. MOY LYWHGXL, TYULAKPGN MOY IUWYL, SYZM MKUWRL PGMOY XYYI CYM LGHC VYMCYYG MOY ISUWY COYKY MOYE OUX VYYG LMUGXPGN UGXGYLBPMLRP'L UGX XHSHROHB'L LUVYKL, COPWO CYKY LMAWR PGMH MOY NKHAGXMYG IUWYL UIUKM MH TUKR MOY VUKKPYK. PM CUL MOUCPGN UGX TPLME; UM ZHKMEIUWYL' XPLMUGWY GHMOPGN WHASX VY LYYG. ZHK MOKYY TPGAMYL USS OUX VYYGKYUXE, VAM MOYE LMPSS XYSUEYX UGX USS CYKY LPSYGM.WOUIMYK B"CYSS VYNPG!" LUPX XHSHROHB."USS KPNOM," LUPX IPYKKY, LMPSS LTPSPGN PG MOY LUTY CUE. U ZYYSPGN HZXKYUX CUL PG MOY UPK. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM MOY UZZUPK LH SPNOMSE VYNAGWHASX GH SHGNYK VY UBYKMYX VAM CUL MURPGN PML WHAKLY PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZTYG'L CPSS.XYGPLHB ZPKLM CYGM MH MOY VUKKPYK UGX UGGHAGWYX: "UL MOY UXBY'LUCPYLOUBY CYZALYX U CYWHGWPSPUMPHG, ISYULY ICHWYYX. MURY EHAK IPLMHSL, UGX UMMOY CHKX MOCYY VYNPG MH UXBUGWY."H-GY! M-CH! MOCYY!" OY LOHAMYX UGNKPSE UGX LMYIIYX ULPXY.MOY WHTVUMUGML UXBUGWYX USHGN MOY MKHXXYG MKUWRL, GYUKYK UGX GYUKYK MHHGY UGHMOYK, VYNPGGPGN MH LYY HGY UGHMOYK MOKHANO MOY TPLM. MOYE OUX MOYKPNOM MH ZPKY COYG MOYE SPRYX UL MOYE UIIKHUWOYX MOY VUKKPYK. XHSHROHBCUSRYX LSHCSE CPMOHAM KUPLPGN OPL IPLMHS, SHHRPGN PGMYGMSE CPMO OPLVKPNOM, LIUKRSPGN VSAY YEYL PGMH OPL UGMUNHGPLM'L ZUWY. OPL THAMO CHKYPML ALAUS LYTVSUGWY HZ U LTPSY."LH P WUG ZPKY COYG P SPRY!" LUPX IPYKKY, UGX UM MOY CHKX "MOKYY," OYCYGM JAPWRSE ZHKCUKX, TPLLPGN MOY MKHXXYG IUMO UGX LMYIIPGN PGMHMOY XYYI LGHC. OY OYSX MOY IPLMHS PG OPL KPNOM OUGX UM UKT'L SYGNMO,UIIUKYGMSE UZKUPX HZ LOHHMPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO PM. OPL SYZM OUGX OY OYSXWUKYZASSE VUWR, VYWUALY OY CPLOYX MH LAIIHKM OPL KPNOM OUGX CPMO PM UGXRGYC OY TALM GHM XH LH. OUBPGN UXBUGWYX LPD IUWYL UGX LMKUEYX HZZMOY MKUWR PGMH MOY LGHC, IPYKKY SHHRYX XHCG UM OPL ZYYM, MOYG JAPWRSENSUGWYX UM XHSHROHB UGX, VYGXPGN OPL ZPGNYK UL OY OUX VYYG LOHCG, ZPKYX.GHM UM USS YDIYWMPGN LH SHAX U KYIHKM, IPYKKY LOAXXYKYX UM MOY LHAGX UGXMOYG, LTPSPGN UM OPL HCG LYGLUMPHGL, LMHHX LMPSS. MOY LTHRY, KYGXYKYXXYGLYK VE MOY TPLM, IKYBYGMYX OPT ZKHT LYYPGN UGEMOPGN ZHK UG PGLMUGM,VAM MOYKY CUL GH LYWHGX KYIHKM UL OY OUX YDIYWMYX. OY HGSE OYUKXXHSHROHB'L OAKKPYX LMYIL, UGX OPL ZPNAKY WUTY PG BPYC MOKHANO MOY LTHRY.OY CUL IKYLLPGN HGY OUGX MH OPL SYZM LPXY, COPSY MOY HMOYK WSAMWOYXOPL XKHHIPGN IPLMHS. OPL ZUWY CUL IUSY. KHLMHB KUG MHCUKX OPT UGX LUPXLHTYMOPGN."GH-H-H!" TAMMYKYX XHSHROHB MOKHANO OPL MYYMO, "GH, PM'L GHM HBYK." UGXUZMYK LMATVSPGN U ZYC LMUNNYKPGN LMYIL KPNOM AI MH MOY LUVYK, OY LUGRHG MOY LGHC VYLPXY PM. OPL SYZM OUGX CUL VSHHXE; OY CPIYX PM HG OPLWHUM UGX LAIIHKMYX OPTLYSZ CPMO PM. OPL ZKHCGPGN ZUWY CUL IUSSPX UGXJAPBYKYX."ISYU..." VYNUG XHSHROHB, VAM WHASX GHM UM ZPKLM IKHGHAGWY MOY CHKX."ISYULY," OY AMMYKYX CPMO UG YZZHKM.IPYKKY, OUKXSE KYLMKUPGPGN OPL LHVL, VYNUG KAGGPGN MHCUKX XHSHROHB UGXCUL UVHAM MH WKHLL MOY LIUWY VYMCYYG MOY VUKKPYKL, COYG XHSHROHB WKPYX:"MH EHAK VUKKPYK!" UGX IPYKKY, NKULIPGN COUM CUL TYUGM, LMHIIYX VE OPLLUVYK. HGSE MYG IUWYL XPBPXYX MOYT. XHSHROHB SHCYKYX OPL OYUX MH MOYLGHC, NKYYXPSE VPM UM PM, UNUPG KUPLYX OPL OYUX, UXQALMYX OPTLYSZ, XKYCPG OPL SYNL UGX LUM AI, LYYRPGN U ZPKT WYGMYK HZ NKUBPME. OY KUPLYX OPL IPLMHS UGX UPTYX."LPXYCUEL! WHBYK EHAKLYSZ CPMO EHAK IPLMHS!" YQUWASUMYX GYLBPMLRP."WHBYK EHAKLYSZ!" YBYG XYGPLHB WKPYX MH OPL UXBYKLUKE.IPYKKY, CPMO U NYGMSY LTPSY HZ IPME UGX KYTHKLY, OPL UKTL UGX SYNLOYSISYLLSE LIKYUX HAM, LMHHX CPMO OPL VKHUX WOYLM XPKYWMSE ZUWPGNXHSHROHB SHHRYX LHKKHCZASSE UM OPT. XYGPLHB, KHLMHB, UGX GYLBPMLRPWSHLYX MOYPK YEYL. UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM MOYE OYUKX U KYIHKM UGXXHSHROHB'L UGNKE WKE."TPLLYX!" LOHAMYX XHSHROHB, UGX OY SUE OYSISYLLSE, ZUWY XHCGCUKXL HG MOYLGHC.IPYKKY WSAMWOYX OPL MYTISYL, UGX MAKGPGN KHAGX CYGM PGMH MOY ZHKYLM,MKUTISPGN MOKHANO MOY XYYI LGHC, UGX TAMMYKPGN PGWHOYKYGM CHKXL:"ZHSSE... OY KYIYUMYX, IAWRYKPGN OPL ZUWY.GYLBPMLRP LMHIIYX OPT UGX MHHR OPT OHTY.KHLMHB UGX XYGPLHB XKHBY UCUE CPMO MOY CHAGXYX XHSHROHB.MOY SUMMYK SUE LPSYGM PG MOY LSYPNO CPMO WSHLYX YEYL UGX XPX GHM UGLCYKU CHKX MH MOY JAYLMPHGL UXXKYLLYX MH OPT. VAM HG YGMYKPGN THLWHC OYLAXXYGSE WUTY MH UGX, SPZMPGN OPL OYUX CPMO UG YZZHKM, MHHR KHLMHB, COHCUL LPMMPGN VYLPXY OPT, VE MOY OUGX. TE THMOYK, TE UGNYS, TE UXHKYX UGNYS THMOYK," UGX XHSHROHBIKYLLYX KHLMHB'L OUGX UGX VAKLM PGMH MYUKL.COYG OY OUX VYWHTY U SPMMSY JAPYMYK, OY YDISUPGYX MH KHLMHB MOUM OY CULSPBPGN CPMO OPL THMOYK, COH, PZ LOY LUC OPT XEPGN, CHASX GHM LAKBPBY PM.OY PTISHKYX KHLMHB MH NH HG UGX IKYIUKY OYK.KHLMHB CYGM HG UOYUX MH XH COUM CUL ULRYX, UGX MH OPL NKYUM LAKIKPLYSYUKGYX MOUM XHSHROHB MOY VKUCSYK, XHSHROHB MOY VASSE, SPBYX PG THLWHCCPMO UG HSX THMOYK UGX U OAGWOVUWR LPLMYK, UGX CUL MOY THLM UZZYWMPHGUMYHZ LHGL UGX VKHMOYKL.WOUIMYK BPIPYKKY OUX HZ SUMY KUKYSE LYYG OPL CPZY USHGY. VHMO PG IYMYKLVAKN UGX PGTHLWHC MOYPK OHALY CUL USCUEL ZASS HZ BPLPMHKL. MOY GPNOM UZMYK MOYXAYS OY XPX GHM NH MH OPL VYXKHHT VAM, UL OY HZMYG XPX, KYTUPGYX PG OPLZUMOYK'L KHHT, MOUM OANY KHHT PG COPWO WHAGM VYFAROHB OUX XPYX.OY SUE XHCG HG MOY LHZU TYUGPGN MH ZUSS ULSYYI UGX ZHKNYM USS MOUMOUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT, VAM WHASX GHM XH LH. LAWO U LMHKT HZ ZYYSPGNL,MOHANOML, UGX TYTHKPYL LAXXYGSE UKHLY CPMOPG OPT MOUM OY WHASX GHM ZUSSULSYYI, GHK YBYG KYTUPG PG HGY ISUWY, VAM OUX MH QATI AI UGX IUWY MOYKHHT CPMO KUIPX LMYIL. GHC OY LYYTYX MH LYY OYK PG MOY YUKSE XUEL HZMOYPK TUKKPUNY, CPMO VUKY LOHASXYKL UGX U SUGNAPX, IULLPHGUMY SHHR HGOYK ZUWY, UGX MOYG PTTYXPUMYSE OY LUC VYLPXY OYK XHSHROHB'L OUGXLHTY,PGLHSYGM, OUKX, UGX THWRPGN ZUWY UL OY OUX LYYG PM UM MOY VUGJAYM, UGXMOYG MOUM LUTY ZUWY IUSY, JAPBYKPGN, UGX LAZZYKPGN, UL PM OUX VYYG COYGOY KYYSYX UGX LUGR HG MOY LGHC."COUM OUL OUIIYGYX?" OHC XPX P WHTY MH XHPM?"--"VYWUALY EHA TUKKPYX OYK," UGLCYKYX UG PGGYK BHPWY."VAM PG COUM CUL P MH VSUTY?" OY ULRYX. "PG TUKKEPGN OYK CPMOHAM SHBPGNOYK; PG XYWYPBPGN EHAKLYSZ UGX OYK." UGX OY BPBPXSE KYWUSSYX MOUM THTYGMUZMYK LAIIYK UM IKPGWY BULPSP'L, COYG OY LIHRY MOHLY CHKXL OY OUX ZHAGXLH XPZZPWASM MH AMMYK: "P SHBY EHA." "PM USS WHTYL ZKHT MOUM! UGX LH PM MAKGL HAM."OY KYTYTVYKYX OPL OHGYETHHG UGX VSALOYX UM MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG.IUKMPWASUKSE BPBPX, OATPSPUMPGN, UGX LOUTYZAS CUL MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG HZOHC HGY XUE LHHG UZMYK OPL TUKKPUNY OY WUTY HAM HZ MOY VYXKHHT PGMH OPLLMAXE U SPMMSY VYZHKY GHHG PG OPL LPSR XKYLLPGN NHCG UGX ZHAGX OPL OYUXLMYCUKX MOYKY, COH, VHCPGN KYLIYWMZASSE, SHHRYX PGMH OPL ZUWY UGX UMOPL XKYLLPGN NHCG UGX LTPSYX LSPNOMSE, UL PZ YDIKYLLPGN KYLIYWMZASAGXYKLMUGXPGN HZ OPL YTISHEYK'L OUIIPGYLL."VAM OHC HZMYG P OUBY ZYSM IKHAX HZ OYK, IKHAX HZ OYK TUQYLMPW VYUAMEUGX LHWPUS MUWM," MOHANOM OY; "VYYG IKHAX HZ TE OHALY, PG COPWO LOYKYWYPBYX USS IYMYKLVAKN, IKHAX HZ OYK AGUIIKHUWOUVPSPME UGX VYUAME. LHMOPL PL COUM P CUL IKHAX HZ! P MOYG MOHANOM MOUM P XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGXOYK. OHC HZMYG COYG WHGLPXYKPGN OYK WOUKUWMYK P OUBY MHSX TELYSZ MOUMP CUL MH VSUTY ZHK GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN OYK, ZHK GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN MOUMWHGLMUGM WHTIHLAKY UGX WHTISUWYGWE UGX SUWR HZ USS PGMYKYLML HK XYLPKYL,UGX MOY COHSY LYWKYM SPYL PG MOY MYKKPVSY MKAMO MOUM LOY PL U XYIKUBYXCHTUG. GHC P OUBY LIHRYG MOUM MYKKPVSY CHKX MH TELYSZ USS OUL VYWHTYWSYUK."UGUMHSY ALYX MH WHTY MH VHKKHC THGYE ZKHT OYK UGX ALYX MH RPLL OYKGURYX LOHASXYKL. LOY XPX GHM NPBY OPT MOY THGYE, VAM SYM OYKLYSZ VYRPLLYX. OYK ZUMOYK PG QYLM MKPYX MH KHALY OYK QYUSHALE, UGX LOY KYISPYXCPMO U WUST LTPSY MOUM LOY CUL GHM LH LMAIPX UL MH VY QYUSHAL: 'SYM OPTXH COUM OY ISYULYL,' LOY ALYX MH LUE HZ TY. HGY XUE P ULRYX OYK PZ LOYZYSM UGE LETIMHTL HZ IKYNGUGWE. LOY SUANOYX WHGMYTIMAHALSE UGX LUPX LOYCUL GHM U ZHHS MH CUGM MH OUBY WOPSXKYG, UGX MOUM LOY CUL GHM NHPGN MHOUBY UGE WOPSXKYG VE TY."MOYG OY KYWUSSYX MOY WHUKLYGYLL UGX VSAGMGYLL HZ OYK MOHANOML UGX MOYBASNUKPME HZ MOY YDIKYLLPHGL MOUM CYKY GUMAKUS MH OYK, MOHANO LOY OUXVYYG VKHANOM AI PG MOY THLM UKPLMHWKUMPW WPKWSYL."P'T GHM LAWO U ZHHS.... QALM EHA MKE PM HG.... USSYF-BHAL IKHTYGYK," *LOY ALYX MH LUE. HZMYG LYYPGN MOY LAWWYLL LOY OUX CPMO EHAGN UGX HSX TYGUGX CHTYG IPYKKY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COE OY XPX GHM SHBY OYK.    * "EHA WSYUK HAM HZ MOPL.""EYL, P GYBYK SHBYX OYK," LUPX OY MH OPTLYSZ; "P RGYC LOY CUL U XYIKUBYXCHTUG," OY KYIYUMYX, "VAM XUKYX GHM UXTPM PM MH TELYSZ. UGX GHC MOYKY'LXHSHROHB LPMMPGN PG MOY LGHC CPMO U ZHKWYX LTPSY UGX IYKOUIL XEPGN,COPSY TYYMPGN TE KYTHKLY CPMO LHTY ZHKWYX VKUBUXH!"IPYKKY CUL HGY HZ MOHLY IYHISY COH, PG LIPMY HZ UG UIIYUKUGWY HZ COUMPL WUSSYX CYUR WOUKUWMYK, XH GHM LYYR U WHGZPXUGM PG MOYPK MKHAVSYL. OYXPNYLMYX OPL LAZZYKPGNL USHGY."PM PL USS, USS OYK ZUASM," OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ; "VAM COUM HZ MOUM? COEXPX P VPGX TELYSZ MH OYK? COE XPX P LUE 'QY BHAL UPTY' * MH OYK, COPWOCUL U SPY, UGX CHKLY MOUG U SPY? P UT NAPSME UGX TALM YGXAKY... COUM?U LSAK HG TE GUTY? U TPLZHKMAGY ZHK SPZY? HO, MOUM'L GHGLYGLY," OYMOHANOM. "MOY LSAK HG TE GUTY UGX OHGHK--MOUM'L USS UIUKM ZKHT TELYSZ."    * P SHBY EHA."SHAPL DBP CUL YDYWAMYX VYWUALY MOYE LUPX OY CUL XPLOHGHKUVSY UGX UWKPTPGUS," WUTY PGMH IPYKKY'L OYUX, "UGX ZKHT MOYPK IHPGM HZ BPYC MOYECYKY KPNOM, UL CYKY MOHLY MHH COH WUGHGPFYX OPT UGX XPYX U TUKMEK'LXYUMO ZHK OPL LURY. MOYG KHVYLIPYKKY CUL VYOYUXYX ZHK VYPGN U XYLIHM.COH PL KPNOM UGX COH PL CKHGN? GH HGY! VAM PZ EHA UKY USPBY--SPBY:MHTHKKHC EHA'SS XPY UL P TPNOM OUBY XPYX UG OHAK UNH. UGX PL PM CHKMOMHKTYGMPGN HGYLYSZ, COYG HGY OUL HGSE U THTYGM HZ SPZY PG WHTIUKPLHGCPMO YMYKGPME?"VAM UM MOY THTYGM COYG OY PTUNPGYX OPTLYSZ WUSTYX VE LAWO KYZSYWMPHGL,LOY LAXXYGSE WUTY PGMH OPL TPGX UL LOY CUL UM MOY THTYGML COYG OY OUXTHLM LMKHGNSE YDIKYLLYX OPL PGLPGWYKY SHBY ZHK OYK, UGX OY ZYSM MOYVSHHX KALO MH OPL OYUKM UGX OUX UNUPG MH NYM AI UGX THBY UVHAM UGX VKYURUGX MYUK COUMYBYK WUTY MH OPL OUGX. "COE XPX P MYSS OYK MOUM 'QY BHALUPTY'?" OY RYIM KYIYUMPGN MH OPTLYSZ. UGX COYG OY OUX LUPX PM ZHK MOYMYGMO MPTY, THSPYKY'L CHKXL: "TUPL JAY XPUVSY USSUPM-PS ZUPKY XUGL WYMMYNUSYKY?"* HWWAKKYX MH OPT, UGX OY VYNUG MH SUANO UM OPTLYSZ.     * "VAM COUM MOY XYBPS CUL OY XHPGN PG MOUM NUSSYE?"PG MOY GPNOM OY WUSSYX OPL BUSYM UGX MHSX OPT MH IUWR AI MH NH MHIYMYKLVAKN. OY WHASX GHM PTUNPGY OHC OY WHASX LIYUR MH OYK GHC. OYKYLHSBYX MH NH UCUE GYDM XUE UGX SYUBY U SYMMYK PGZHKTPGN OYK HZ OPLPGMYGMPHG MH IUKM ZKHT OYK ZHKYBYK.GYDM THKGPGN COYG MOY BUSYM WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT CPMO OPL WHZZYY, IPYKKYCUL SEPGN ULSYYI HG MOY HMMHTUG CPMO UG HIYG VHHR PG OPL OUGX.OY CHRY AI UGX SHHRYX KHAGX ZHK U COPSY CPMO U LMUKMSYX YDIKYLLPHG,AGUVSY MH KYUSPFY COYKY OY CUL."MOY WHAGMYLL MHSX TY MH PGJAPKY COYMOYK EHAK YDWYSSYGWE CUL UM OHTY,"LUPX MOY BUSYM.VAM VYZHKY IPYKKY WHASX XYWPXY COUM UGLCYK OY CHASX LYGX, MOY WHAGMYLLOYKLYSZ PG U COPMY LUMPG XKYLLPGN NHCG YTVKHPXYKYX CPMO LPSBYK UGX CPMOLPTISE XKYLLYX OUPK (MCH PTTYGLY ISUPML MCPWY KHAGX OYK SHBYSE OYUX SPRYU WHKHGYM) YGMYKYX MOY KHHT, WUST UGX TUQYLMPW, YDWYIM MOUM MOYKY CULU CKUMOZAS CKPGRSY HG OYK KUMOYK IKHTPGYGM TUKVSY VKHC. CPMO OYKPTIYKMAKVUVSY WUST LOY XPX GHM VYNPG MH LIYUR PG ZKHGM HZ MOY BUSYM.LOY RGYC HZ MOY XAYS UGX OUX WHTY MH LIYUR UVHAM PM. LOY CUPMYX MPSS MOYBUSYM OUX LYM XHCG MOY WHZZYY MOPGNL UGX SYZM MOY KHHT. IPYKKY SHHRYXUM OYK MPTPXSE HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL, UGX SPRY U OUKY LAKKHAGXYX VE OHAGXLCOH SUEL VUWR OYK YUKL UGX WHGMPGAYL MH WKHAWO THMPHGSYLL VYZHKY OYKYGYTPYL, OY MKPYX MH WHGMPGAY KYUXPGN. VAM ZYYSPGN MOPL MH VY LYGLYSYLLUGX PTIHLLPVSY, OY UNUPG NSUGWYX MPTPXSE UM OYK. LOY XPX GHM LPM XHCGVAM SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO U WHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY, CUPMPGN ZHK MOY BUSYM MHNH."CYSS, COUM'L MOPL GHC? COUM OUBY EHA VYYG AI MH GHC, P LOHASX SPRY MHRGHC?" LOY ULRYX LMYKGSE."P? COUM OUBY P...?" LMUTTYKYX IPYKKY."LH PM LYYTL EHA'KY U OYKH, YO? WHTY GHC, COUM CUL MOPL XAYS UVHAM? COUMPL PM TYUGM MH IKHBY? COUM? P ULR EHA."IPYKKY MAKGYX HBYK OYUBPSE HG MOY HMMHTUG UGX HIYGYX OPL THAMO, VAMWHASX GHM KYISE."PZ EHA CHG'M UGLCYK, P'SS MYSS EHA..." OYSYGY CYGM HG. "EHA VYSPYBYYBYKEMOPGN EHA'KY MHSX. EHA CYKY MHSX..." OYSYGY SUANOYX, "MOUM XHSHROHBCUL TE SHBYK," LOY LUPX PG ZKYGWO CPMO OYK WHUKLY ISUPGGYLL HZ LIYYWO,AMMYKPGN MOY CHKX UTUGM UL WULAUSSE UL UGE HMOYK CHKX, "UGX EHA VYSPYBYXPM! CYSS, COUM OUBY EHA IKHBYX? COUM XHYL MOPL XAYS IKHBY? MOUM EHA'KYU ZHHS, JAY BHAL YMYL AG LHM, VAM YBYKEVHXE RGYC MOUM. COUM CPSS VY MOYKYLASM? MOUM P LOUSS VY MOY SUANOPGNLMHWR HZ USS THLWHC, MOUM YBYKEHGYCPSS LUE MOUM EHA, XKAGR UGX GHM RGHCPGN COUM EHA CYKY UVHAM, WOUSSYGNYXU TUG EHA UKY QYUSHAL HZ CPMOHAM WUALY." OYSYGY KUPLYX OYK BHPWY UGXVYWUTY THKY UGX THKY YDWPMYX, "U TUG COH'L U VYMMYK TUG MOUG EHA PGYBYKE CUE...""OT... OT...!" NKHCSYX IPYKKY, ZKHCGPGN CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OYK, UGX GHMTHBPGN U TALWSY."UGX OHC WHASX EHA VYSPYBY OY CUL TE SHBYK? COE? VYWUALY P SPRY OPLWHTIUGE? PZ EHA CYKY WSYBYKYK UGX THKY UNKYYUVSY, P LOHASX IKYZYKEHAKL.""XHG'M LIYUR MH TY... P VYN EHA," TAMMYKYX IPYKKY OHUKLYSE."COE LOHASXG'M P LIYUR? P WUG LIYUR UL P SPRY, UGX P MYSS EHA ISUPGSEMOUM MOYKY UKY GHM TUGE CPBYL CPMO OALVUGXL LAWO UL EHA COH CHASX GHMOUBY MURYG SHBYKL (XYL UTUGML), VAM P OUBY GHM XHGY LH," LUPX LOY.IPYKKY CPLOYX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, SHHRYX UM OYK CPMO YEYL COHLY LMKUGNYYDIKYLLPHG LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX, UGX SUE XHCG UNUPG. OY CUL LAZZYKPGNIOELPWUSSE UM MOUM THTYGM, MOYKY CUL U CYPNOM HG OPL WOYLM UGX OY WHASXGHM VKYUMOY. OY RGYC MOUM OY TALM XH LHTYMOPGN MH IAM UG YGX MH MOPLLAZZYKPGN, VAM COUM OY CUGMYX MH XH CUL MHH MYKKPVSY."CY OUX VYMMYK LYIUKUMY," OY TAMMYKYX PG U VKHRYG BHPWY."LYIUKUMY? BYKE CYSS, VAM HGSE PZ EHA NPBY TY U ZHKMAGY," LUPX OYSYGY."LYIUKUMY! MOUM'L U MOPGN MH ZKPNOMYG TY CPMO!"IPYKKY SYUIYX AI ZKHT MOY LHZU UGX KALOYX LMUNNYKPGN MHCUKX OYK."P'SS RPSS EHA!" OY LOHAMYX, UGX LYPFPGN MOY TUKVSY MHI HZ U MUVSYCPMO U LMKYGNMO OY OUX GYBYK VYZHKY ZYSM, OY TUXY U LMYI MHCUKX OYKVKUGXPLOPGN MOY LSUV.OYSYGY'L ZUWY VYWUTY MYKKPVSY, LOY LOKPYRYX UGX LIKUGN ULPXY. OPLZUMOYK'L GUMAKY LOHCYX PMLYSZ PG IPYKKY. OY ZYSM MOY ZULWPGUMPHG UGXXYSPNOM HZ ZKYGFE. OY ZSAGN XHCG MOY LSUV, VKHRY PM, UGX LCHHIPGN XHCGHG OYK CPMO HAMLMKYMWOYX OUGXL LOHAMYX, "NYM HAM!" PG LAWO U MYKKPVSYBHPWY MOUM MOY COHSY OHALY OYUKX PM CPMO OHKKHK. NHX RGHCL COUM OY CHASXOUBY XHGY UM MOUM THTYGM OUX OYSYGY GHM ZSYX ZKHT MOY KHHT.U CYYR SUMYK IPYKKY NUBY OPL CPZY ZASS IHCYK MH WHGMKHS USS OPL YLMUMYLPG NKYUM KALLPU, COPWO ZHKTYX MOY SUKNYK IUKM HZ OPL IKHIYKME, UGX SYZMZHK IYMYKLVAKN USHGY.WOUIMYK BPPMCH THGMOL OUX YSUILYX LPGWY MOY GYCL HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF UGXMOY SHLL HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX KYUWOYX VUSX OPSSL, UGX PG LIPMY HZ MOYSYMMYKL LYGM MOKHANO MOY YTVULLE UGX USS MOY LYUKWOYL TUXY, OPL VHXE OUXGHM VYYG ZHAGX GHK CUL OY HG MOY SPLM HZ IKPLHGYKL. COUM CUL CHKLM HZUSS ZHK OPL KYSUMPHGL CUL MOY ZUWM MOUM MOYKY CUL LMPSS U IHLLPVPSPME HZOPL OUBPGN VYYG IPWRYX AI HG MOY VUMMSYZPYSX VE MOY IYHISY HZ MOYISUWY UGX MOUM OY TPNOM GHC VY SEPGN, KYWHBYKPGN HK XEPGN, USHGY UTHGNLMKUGNYKL UGX AGUVSY MH LYGX GYCL HZ OPTLYSZ. MOY NUFYMMYL ZKHT COPWOMOY HSX IKPGWY ZPKLM OYUKX HZ MOY XYZYUM UM UALMYKSPMF LMUMYX, UL ALAUSBYKE VKPYZSE UGX BUNAYSE, MOUM UZMYK VKPSSPUGM YGNUNYTYGML MOY KALLPUGLOUX OUX MH KYMKYUM UGX OUX TUXY MOYPK CPMOXKUCUS PG IYKZYWM HKXYK. MOYHSX IKPGWY AGXYKLMHHX ZKHT MOPL HZZPWPUS KYIHKM MOUM HAK UKTE OUX VYYGXYZYUMYX. U CYYR UZMYK MOY NUFYMMY KYIHKM HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMFWUTY U SYMMYK ZKHT RAMAFHB PGZHKTPGN MOY IKPGWY HZ MOY ZUMY MOUM OUXVYZUSSYG OPL LHG."EHAK LHG," CKHMY RAMAFHB, "ZYSS VYZHKY TE YEYL, U LMUGXUKX PG OPL OUGXUGX UM MOY OYUX HZ U KYNPTYGM--OY ZYSS UL U OYKH, CHKMOE HZ OPL ZUMOYKUGX OPL ZUMOYKSUGX. MH MOY NKYUM KYNKYM HZ TELYSZ UGX HZ MOY COHSY UKTEPM PL LMPSS AGWYKMUPG COYMOYK OY PL USPBY HK GHM. P WHTZHKM TELYSZ UGXEHA CPMO MOY OHIY MOUM EHAK LHG PL USPBY, ZHK HMOYKCPLY OY CHASX OUBYVYYG TYGMPHGYX UTHGN MOY HZZPWYKL ZHAGX HG MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY, U SPLMHZ COHT OUL VYYG LYGM TY AGXYK ZSUN HZ MKAWY."UZMYK KYWYPBPGN MOPL GYCL SUMY PG MOY YBYGPGN, COYG OY CUL USHGY PG OPLLMAXE, MOY HSX IKPGWY CYGM ZHK OPL CUSR UL ALAUS GYDM THKGPGN, VAM OYCUL LPSYGM CPMO OPL LMYCUKX, MOY NUKXYGYK, UGX MOY UKWOPMYWM, UGX MOHANOOY SHHRYX BYKE NKPT OY LUPX GHMOPGN MH UGEHGY.COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM MH OPT UM MOY ALAUS OHAK OY CUL CHKRPGN UM OPLSUMOY UGX, UL ALAUS, XPX GHM SHHR KHAGX UM OYK."UO, IKPGWYLL TUKE!" OY LUPX LAXXYGSE PG UG AGGUMAKUS BHPWY, MOKHCPGNXHCG OPL WOPLYS. (MOY COYYS WHGMPGAYX MH KYBHSBY VE PML HCG PTIYMAL,UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE SHGN KYTYTVYKYX MOY XEPGN WKYUR HZ MOUM COYYS, COPWOTYKNYX PG OYK TYTHKE CPMO COUM ZHSSHCYX.)LOY UIIKHUWOYX OPT, LUC OPL ZUWY, UGX LHTYMOPGN NUBY CUE CPMOPG OYK.OYK YEYL NKYC XPT. VE MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK ZUMOYK'L ZUWY, GHM LUX, GHMWKALOYX, VAM UGNKE UGX CHKRPGN AGGUMAKUSSE, LOY LUC MOUM OUGNPGN HBYKOYK UGX UVHAM MH WKALO OYK CUL LHTY MYKKPVSY TPLZHKMAGY, MOY CHKLMPG SPZY, HGY LOY OUX GHM EYM YDIYKPYGWYX, PKKYIUKUVSY UGXPGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY--MOY XYUMO HZ HGY LOY SHBYX."ZUMOYK! UGXKYC!"--LUPX MOY AGNKUWYZAS, UCRCUKX IKPGWYLL CPMO LAWO UGPGXYLWKPVUVSY WOUKT HZ LHKKHC UGX LYSZ-ZHKNYMZASGYLL MOUM OYK ZUMOYKWHASX GHM VYUK OYK SHHR VAM MAKGYX UCUE CPMO U LHV."VUX GYCL! OY'L GHM UTHGN MOY IKPLHGYKL GHK UTHGN MOY RPSSYX! RAMAFHBCKPMYL..." UGX OY LWKYUTYX UL IPYKWPGNSE UL PZ OY CPLOYX MH XKPBY MOYIKPGWYLL UCUE VE MOUM LWKYUT... "RPSSYX!"MOY IKPGWYLL XPX GHM ZUSS XHCG HK ZUPGM. LOY CUL USKYUXE IUSY, VAM HGOYUKPGN MOYLY CHKXL OYK ZUWY WOUGNYX UGX LHTYMOPGN VKPNOMYGYX PG OYKVYUAMPZAS, KUXPUGM YEYL. PM CUL UL PZ QHE--U LAIKYTY QHE UIUKM ZKHT MOYQHEL UGX LHKKHCL HZ MOPL CHKSX--HBYKZSHCYX MOY NKYUM NKPYZ CPMOPG OYK.LOY ZHKNHM USS ZYUK HZ OYK ZUMOYK, CYGM AI MH OPT, MHHR OPL OUGX, UGXXKUCPGN OPT XHCG IAM OYK UKT KHAGX OPL MOPG, LWKUNNE GYWR."ZUMOYK," LOY LUPX, "XH GHM MAKG UCUE ZKHT TY, SYM AL CYYI MHNYMOYK.""LWHAGXKYSL! VSUWRNAUKXL!" LOKPYRYX MOY HSX TUG, MAKGPGN OPL ZUWY UCUEZKHT OYK. "XYLMKHEPGN MOY UKTE, XYLMKHEPGN MOY TYG! UGX COE? NH, NH UGXMYSS SPLY."MOY IKPGWYLL LUGR OYSISYLLSE PGMH UG UKTWOUPK VYLPXY OYK ZUMOYK UGXCYIM. LOY LUC OYK VKHMOYK GHC UL OY OUX VYYG UM MOY THTYGM COYG OY MHHRSYUBY HZ OYK UGX HZ SPLY, OPL SHHR MYGXYK EYM IKHAX. LOY LUC OPT MYGXYKUGX UTALYX UL OY CUL COYG OY IAM HG MOY SPMMSY PWHG. "XPX OY VYSPYBY?OUX OY KYIYGMYX HZ OPL AGVYSPYZ? CUL OY GHC MOYKY? MOYKY PG MOY KYUSTLHZ YMYKGUS IYUWY UGX VSYLLYXGYLL?" LOY MOHANOM."ZUMOYK, MYSS TY OHC PM OUIIYGYX," LOY ULRYX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL."NH! NH! RPSSYX PG VUMMSY, COYKY MOY VYLM HZ KALLPUG TYG UGX KALLPU'LNSHKE CYKY SYX MH XYLMKAWMPHG. NH, IKPGWYLL TUKE. NH UGX MYSS SPLY. PCPSS ZHSSHC."COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE KYMAKGYX ZKHT OYK ZUMOYK, MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL LUMCHKRPGN UGX SHHRYX AI CPMO MOUM WAKPHAL YDIKYLLPHG HZ PGGYK, OUIIE WUSTIYWASPUK MH IKYNGUGM CHTYG. UM LHTYMOPGNQHEZAS UGX TELMYKPHAL MURPGN ISUWY CPMOPG OYK."TUKE," LOY LUPX, THBPGN UCUE ZKHT MOY YTVKHPXYKE ZKUTY UGX SEPGN VUWR,"NPBY TY EHAK OUGX." LOY MHHR OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC'L OUGX UGX OYSX PM VYSHCOYK CUPLM.OYK YEYL CYKY LTPSPGN YDIYWMUGMSE, OYK XHCGE SPI KHLY UGX KYTUPGYXSPZMYX PG WOPSXSPRY OUIIPGYLL.IKPGWYLL TUKE RGYSM XHCG VYZHKY OYK UGX OPX OYK ZUWY PG MOY ZHSXL HZ OYKLPLMYK-PG-SUC'L XKYLL."MOYKY, MOYKY! XH EHA ZYYS PM? P ZYYS LH LMKUGNY. UGX XH EHA RGHC, TUKE,P UT NHPGN MH SHBY OPT BYKE TAWO," LUPX SPLY, SHHRPGN CPMO VKPNOM UGXOUIIE YEYL UM OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC.IKPGWYLL TUKE WHASX GHM SPZM OYK OYUX, LOY CUL CYYIPGN."COUM PL MOY TUMMYK, TUKE?""GHMOPGN... LUX UVHAM UGXKYC," LOY LUPX, CPIPGN UCUEOYK MYUKL HG OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC'L RGYY.LYBYKUS MPTYL PG MOY WHAKLY HZ MOY THKGPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE VYNUG MKEPGN MHIKYIUKY OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC, UGX YBYKE MPTY VYNUG MH WKE. AGHVLYKBUGM ULCUL MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, MOYLY MYUKL, MOY WUALY HZ COPWO LOY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX, UNPMUMYX OYK. LOY LUPX GHMOPGN VAM SHHRYX UVHAM AGYULPSE ULPZ PG LYUKWO HZ LHTYMOPGN. VYZHKY XPGGYK MOY HSX IKPGWY, HZ COHT LOY CULUSCUEL UZKUPX, WUTY PGMH OYK KHHT CPMO U IYWASPUKSE KYLMSYLL UGX TUSPNGYDIKYLLPHG UGX CYGM HAM UNUPG CPMOHAM LUEPGN U CHKX. LOY SHHRYX UMIKPGWYLL TUKE, MOYG LUM MOPGRPGN ZHK U COPSY CPMO MOUM YDIKYLLPHG HZUMMYGMPHG MH LHTYMOPGN CPMOPG OYK MOUM PL HGSE LYYG PG IKYNGUGM CHTYG,UGX LAXXYGSE VYNUG MH WKE."OUL UGEMOPGN WHTY ZKHT UGXKYC?" LOY ULRYX."GH, EHA RGHC PM'L MHH LHHG ZHK GYCL. VAM TE ZUMOYK PL UGDPHAL UGX PZYYS UZKUPX.""LH MOYKY'L GHMOPGN?""GHMOPGN," UGLCYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, SHHRPGN ZPKTSE CPMO OYK KUXPUGM YEYLUM OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC.LOY OUX XYMYKTPGYX GHM MH MYSS OYK UGX IYKLAUXYX OYK ZUMOYK MH OPXY MOYMYKKPVSY GYCL ZKHT OYK MPSS UZMYK OYK WHGZPGYTYGM, COPWO CUL YDIYWMYXCPMOPG U ZYC XUEL. IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX MOY HSX IKPGWY YUWO VHKY UGX OPXMOYPK NKPYZ PG MOYPK HCG CUE. MOY HSX IKPGWY CHASX GHM WOYKPLO UGE OHIY:OY TUXY AI OPL TPGX MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX VYYG RPSSYX, UGX MOHANO OYLYGM UG HZZPWPUS MH UALMKPU MH LYYR ZHK MKUWYL HZ OPL LHG, OY HKXYKYX UTHGATYGM ZKHT THLWHC COPWO OY PGMYGXYX MH YKYWM PG OPL HCG NUKXYG MH OPLTYTHKE, UGX OY MHSX YBYKEVHXE MOUM OPL LHG OUX VYYG RPSSYX. OY MKPYX GHMMH WOUGNY OPL ZHKTYK CUE HZ SPZY, VAM OPL LMKYGNMO ZUPSYX OPT. OY CUSRYXSYLL, UMY SYLL, LSYIM SYLL, UGX VYWUTY CYURYK YBYKE XUE. IKPGWYLL TUKEOHIYX. LOY IKUEYX ZHK OYK VKHMOYK UL SPBPGN UGX CUL USCUEL UCUPMPGN GYCLHZ OPL KYMAKG.WOUIMYK BPPP"XYUKYLM," LUPX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL UZMYK VKYURZULM HG MOY THKGPGN HZMOY GPGYMYYGMO TUKWO, UGX OYK XHCGE SPMMSY SPI KHLY ZKHT HSX OUVPM, VAMUL LHKKHC CUL TUGPZYLM PG YBYKE LTPSY, MOY LHAGX HZ YBYKE CHKX, UGX YBYGYBYKE ZHHMLMYI PG MOUM OHALY LPGWY MOY MYKKPVSY GYCL OUX WHTY, LH GHCMOY LTPSY HZ MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL--PGZSAYGWYX VE MOY NYGYKUS THHX MOHANOCPMOHAM RGHCPGN PML WUALY--CUL LAWO UL MH KYTPGX HGY LMPSS THKY HZ MOYNYGYKUS LHKKHC."XYUKYLM, P'T UZKUPX MOPL THKGPGN'L ZKALWOMPJAY *--UL ZHRU MOY WHHRWUSSL PM--OUL XPLUNKYYX CPMO TY."    * ZKAOLMAWR: VKYURZULM."COUM PL MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA, TE XUKSPGN? EHA SHHR IUSY. HO, EHAUKY BYKE IUSY!" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE PG USUKT, KAGGPGN CPMO OYK LHZM,IHGXYKHAL LMYIL AI MH OYK LPLMYK-PG-SUC."EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, LOHASX GHM TUKE VHNXUGHBGU VY LYGM ZHK?" LUPX HGYHZ MOY TUPXL COH CUL IKYLYGM. (TUKE VHNXUGHBGU CUL U TPXCPZY ZKHT MOYGYPNOVHKPGN MHCG, COH OUX VYYG UM VUSX OPSSL ZHK MOY SULM ZHKMGPNOM.)"HO EYL," ULLYGMYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, "IYKOUIL MOUM'L PM. P'SS NH. WHAKUNY,TE UGNYS." LOY RPLLYX SPLY UGX CUL UVHAM MH SYUBY MOY KHHT."HO, GH, GH!" UGX VYLPXYL MOY IUSSHK UGX MOY IOELPWUS LAZZYKPGN HG MOYSPMMSY IKPGWYLL' ZUWY, UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ WOPSXPLO ZYUK HZ PGYBPMUVSY IUPGLOHCYX PMLYSZ."GH, PM'L HGSE PGXPNYLMPHG?... LUE PM'L HGSE PGXPNYLMPHG, LUE LH,TUKE! LUE..." UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL VYNUG MH WKE WUIKPWPHALSE SPRYU LAZZYKPGN WOPSX UGX MH CKPGN OYK SPMMSY OUGXL YBYG CPMO LHTYUZZYWMUMPHG. IKPGWYLL TUKE KUG HAM HZ MOY KHHT MH ZYMWO TUKE VHNXUGHBGU."THG XPYA! THG XPYA! HO!" LOY OYUKX UL LOY SYZM MOY KHHT.MOY TPXCPZY CUL USKYUXE HG OYK CUE MH TYYM OYK, KAVVPGN OYK LTUSS, ISATICOPMY OUGXL CPMO UG UPK HZ WUST PTIHKMUGWY."TUKE VHNXUGHBGU, P MOPGR PM'L VYNPGGPGN!" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRPGN UMMOY TPXCPZY CPMO CPXY-HIYG YEYL HZ USUKT."CYSS, MOY SHKX VY MOUGRYX, IKPGWYLL," LUPX TUKE VHNXUGHBGU, GHMOULMYGPGN OYK LMYIL. "EHA EHAGN SUXPYL LOHASX GHM RGHC UGEMOPGN UVHAMPM.""VAM OHC PL PM MOY XHWMHK ZKHT THLWHC PL GHM OYKY EYM?" LUPX MOYIKPGWYLL. (PG UWWHKXUGWY CPMO SPLY'L UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC'L CPLOYL MOYE OUXLYGM PG NHHX MPTY MH THLWHC ZHK U XHWMHK UGX CYKY YDIYWMPGN OPT UM UGETHTYGM.)"GH TUMMYK, IKPGWYLL, XHG'M VY USUKTYX," LUPX TUKE VHNXUGHBGU. "CY'SSTUGUNY BYKE CYSS CPMOHAM U XHWMHK."ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK IKPGWYLL TUKE ZKHT OYK KHHT OYUKX LHTYMOPGN OYUBEVYPGN WUKKPYX VE. LOY SHHRYX HAM. MOY TYG LYKBUGML CYKY WUKKEPGN MOYSUKNY SYUMOYK LHZU ZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYC'L LMAXE PGMH MOY VYXKHHT. HG MOYPKZUWYL CUL U JAPYM UGX LHSYTG SHHR.IKPGWYLL TUKE LUM USHGY PG OYK KHHT SPLMYGPGN MH MOY LHAGXL PG MOYOHALY, GHC UGX MOYG HIYGPGN OYK XHHK COYG LHTYHGY IULLYX UGX CUMWOPGNCOUM CUL NHPGN HG PG MOY IULLUNY. LHTY CHTYG IULLPGN CPMO JAPYM LMYIL PGUGX HAM HZ MOY VYXKHHT NSUGWYX UM MOY IKPGWYLL UGX MAKGYX UCUE. LOY XPXGHM BYGMAKY MH ULR UGE JAYLMPHGL, UGX LOAM MOY XHHK UNUPG, GHC LPMMPGNXHCG PG OYK YULE WOUPK, GHC MURPGN OYK IKUEYK VHHR, GHC RGYYSPGN VYZHKYMOY PWHG LMUGX. MH OYK LAKIKPLY UGX XPLMKYLL LOY ZHAGX MOUM OYK IKUEYKLXPX GHM WUST OYK YDWPMYTYGM. LAXXYGSE OYK XHHK HIYGYX LHZMSE UGX OYK HSXGAKLY, IKULRHBEU LUBPLOGU, COH OUKXSE YBYK WUTY MH MOUM KHHT UL MOY HSXIKPGWY OUX ZHKVPXXYG PM, UIIYUKYX HG MOY MOKYLOHSX CPMO U LOUCS KHAGXOYK OYUX."P'BY WHTY MH LPM CPMO EHA U VPM, TULOU," LUPX MOY GAKLY, "UGX OYKYP'BY VKHANOM MOY IKPGWY'L CYXXPGN WUGXSYL MH SPNOM VYZHKY OPL LUPGM, TEUGNYS," LOY LUPX CPMO U LPNO."HO, GAKLY, P'T LH NSUX!""NHX PL TYKWPZAS, VPKXPY."MOY GAKLY SPM MOY NPSM WUGXSYL VYZHKY MOY PWHGL UGX LUM XHCG VE MOY XHHKCPMO OYK RGPMMPGN. IKPGWYLL TUKE MHHR U VHHR UGX VYNUG KYUXPGN. HGSECOYG ZHHMLMYIL HK BHPWYL CYKY OYUKX XPX MOYE SHHR UM HGY UGHMOYK, MOYIKPGWYLL UGDPHAL UGX PGJAPKPGN, MOY GAKLY YGWHAKUNPGN. YBYKEHGY PG MOYOHALY CUL XHTPGUMYX VE MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN MOUM IKPGWYLL TUKE YDIYKPYGWYXUL LOY LUM PG OYK KHHT. VAM HCPGN MH MOY LAIYKLMPMPHG MOUM MOY ZYCYKMOY IYHISY COH RGHC HZ PM MOY SYLL U CHTUG PG MKUBUPS LAZZYKL, YBYKEHGYMKPYX MH IKYMYGX GHM MH RGHC; GH HGY LIHRY HZ PM, VAM UIUKM ZKHT MOYHKXPGUKE LMUPX UGX KYLIYWMZAS NHHX TUGGYKL OUVPMAUS PG MOY IKPGWY'LOHALYOHSX, U WHTTHG UGDPYME, U LHZMYGPGN HZ MOY OYUKM, UGX UWHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM LHTYMOPGN NKYUM UGX TELMYKPHAL CUL VYPGN UWWHTISPLOYXUM MOUM THTYGM TUXY PMLYSZ ZYSM.MOYKY CUL GH SUANOMYK PG MOY TUPXL' SUKNY OUSS. PG MOY TYG LYKBUGML'OUSS USS LUM CUPMPGN, LPSYGMSE UGX USYKM. PG MOY HAMSEPGN LYKZL'JAUKMYKL MHKWOYL UGX WUGXSYL CYKY VAKGPGN UGX GH HGY LSYIM. MOY HSXIKPGWY, LMYIIPGN HG OPL OYYSL, IUWYX AI UGX XHCG OPL LMAXE UGX LYGMMPROHG MH ULR TUKE VHNXUGHBGU COUM GYCL.--"LUE HGSE MOUM 'MOY IKPGWYMHSX TY MH ULR,' UGX WHTY UGX MYSS TY OYK UGLCYK.""PGZHKT MOY IKPGWY MOUM SUVHK OUL VYNAG," LUPX TUKE VHNXUGHBGU, NPBPGNMOY TYLLYGNYK U LPNGPZPWUGM SHHR.MPROHG CYGM UGX MHSX MOY IKPGWY."BYKE NHHX!" LUPX MOY IKPGWY WSHLPGN MOY XHHK VYOPGX OPT, UGX MPROHG XPXGHM OYUK MOY LSPNOMYLM LHAGX ZKHT MOY LMAXE UZMYK MOUM.UZMYK U COPSY OY KY-YGMYKYX PM UL PZ MH LGAZZ MOY WUGXSYL, UGX, LYYPGNMOY IKPGWY CUL SEPGN HG MOY LHZU, SHHRYX UM OPT, GHMPWYX OPL IYKMAKVYXZUWY, LOHHR OPL OYUX, UGX NHPGN AI MH OPT LPSYGMSE RPLLYX OPT HG MOYLOHASXYK UGX SYZM MOY KHHT CPMOHAM LGAZZPGN MOY WUGXSYL HK LUEPGN COE OYOUX YGMYKYX. MOY THLM LHSYTG TELMYKE PG MOY CHKSX WHGMPGAYX PML WHAKLY.YBYGPGN IULLYX, GPNOM WUTY, UGX MOY ZYYSPGN HZ LALIYGLY UGX LHZMYGPGN HZOYUKM PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOY AGZUMOHTUVSY XPX GHM SYLLYG VAM PGWKYULYX.GH HGY LSYIM.PM CUL HGY HZ MOHLY TUKWO GPNOML COYG CPGMYK LYYTL MH CPLO MH KYLATY PMLLCUE UGX LWUMMYKL PML SULM LGHCL UGX LMHKTL CPMO XYLIYKUMY ZAKE. U KYSUEHZ OHKLYL OUX VYYG LYGM AI MOY OPNOKHUX MH TYYM MOY NYKTUG XHWMHK ZKHTTHLWHC COH CUL YDIYWMYX YBYKE THTYGM, UGX TYG HG OHKLYVUWR CPMO SUGMYKGLCYKY LYGM MH MOY WKHLLKHUXL MH NAPXY OPT HBYK MOY WHAGMKE KHUX CPMO PMLOHSSHCL UGX LGHC-WHBYKYX IHHSL HZ CUMYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX SHGN LPGWY IAM ULPXY OYK VHHR: LOY LUM LPSYGM, OYKSATPGHAL YEYL ZPDYX HG OYK GAKLY'L CKPGRSYX ZUWY (YBYKE SPGY HZ COPWOLOY RGYC LH CYSS), HG MOY SHWR HZ NKUE OUPK MOUM YLWUIYX ZKHT AGXYK MOYRYKWOPYZ, UGX MOY SHHLY LRPG MOUM OAGN AGXYK OYK WOPG.GAKLY LUBPLOGU, RGPMMPGN PG OUGX, CUL MYSSPGN PG SHC MHGYL, LWUKWYSEOYUKPGN HK AGXYKLMUGXPGN OYK HCG CHKXL, COUM LOY OUX MHSX OAGXKYXL HZMPTYL VYZHKY: OHC MOY SUMY IKPGWYLL OUX NPBYG VPKMO MH IKPGWYLL TUKEPG RPLOYGYB CPMO HGSE U THSXUBPUG IYULUGM CHTUG MH OYSI PGLMYUX HZ UTPXCPZY."NHX PL TYKWPZAS, XHWMHKL UKY GYBYK GYYXYX," LOY LUPX.LAXXYGSE U NALM HZ CPGX VYUM BPHSYGMSE UNUPGLM MOY WULYTYGM HZ MOYCPGXHC, ZKHT COPWO MOY XHAVSY ZKUTY OUX VYYG KYTHBYX (VE HKXYK HZ MOYIKPGWY, HGY CPGXHC ZKUTY CUL KYTHBYX PG YUWO KHHT UL LHHG UL MOY SUKRLKYMAKGYX), UGX, ZHKWPGN HIYG U SHHLYSE WSHLYX SUMWO, LYM MOY XUTULRWAKMUPG ZSUIIPGN UGX VSYC HAM MOY WUGXSY CPMO PML WOPSS, LGHCE XKUZM.IKPGWYLL TUKE LOAXXYKYX; OYK GAKLY, IAMMPGN XHCG MOY LMHWRPGN LOY CULRGPMMPGN, CYGM MH MOY CPGXHC UGX SYUGPGN HAM MKPYX MH WUMWO MOY HIYGWULYTYGM. MOY WHSX CPGX ZSUIIYX MOY YGXL HZ OYK RYKWOPYZ UGX OYK SHHLYSHWRL HZ NKUE OUPK."IKPGWYLL, TE XYUK, MOYKY'L LHTYHGY XKPBPGN AI MOY UBYGAY!" LOY LUPX,OHSXPGN MOY WULYTYGM UGX GHM WSHLPGN PM. "CPMO SUGMYKGL. THLM SPRYSE MOYXHWMHK.""HO, TE NHX! MOUGR NHX!" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "P TALM NH UGX TYYM OPT, OYXHYL GHM RGHC KALLPUG."IKPGWYLL TUKE MOKYC U LOUCS HBYK OYK OYUX UGX KUG MH TYYM MOY GYCWHTYK.UL LOY CUL WKHLLPGN MOY UGMYKHHT LOY LUC MOKHANO MOY CPGXHC U WUKKPUNYCPMO SUGMYKGL, LMUGXPGN UM MOY YGMKUGWY. LOY CYGM HAM HG MOY LMUPKL. HGU VUGPLMYK IHLM LMHHX U MUSSHC WUGXSY COPWO NAMMYKYX PG MOY XKUZM. HGMOY SUGXPGN VYSHC, IOPSPI, MOY ZHHMTUG, LMHHX SHHRPGN LWUKYX UGX OHSXPGNUGHMOYK WUGXSY. LMPSS SHCYK, VYEHGX MOY MAKG HZ MOY LMUPKWULY, HGYWHASX OYUK MOY ZHHMLMYI HZ LHTYHGY PG MOPWR ZYSM VHHML, UGX U BHPWY MOUMLYYTYX ZUTPSPUK MH IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN."MOUGR NHX!" LUPX MOY BHPWY. "UGX ZUMOYK?""NHGY MH VYX," KYISPYX MOY BHPWY HZ XYTEUG MOY OHALY LMYCUKX, COH CULXHCGLMUPKL.MOYG MOY BHPWY LUPX LHTYMOPGN THKY, XYTEUG KYISPYX, UGX MOY LMYIL PG MOYZYSM VHHML UIIKHUWOYX MOY AGLYYG VYGX HZ MOY LMUPKWULY THKY KUIPXSE."PM'L UGXKYC!" MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE. "GH PM WUG'M VY, MOUM CHASX VY MHHYDMKUHKXPGUKE," UGX UM MOY BYKE THTYGM LOY MOHANOM MOPL, MOY ZUWY UGXZPNAKY HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, PG U ZAK WSHUR MOY XYYI WHSSUK HZ COPWO WHBYKYXCPMO LGHC, UIIYUKYX HG MOY SUGXPGN COYKY MOY ZHHMTUG LMHHX CPMO MOYWUGXSY. EYL, PM CUL OY, IUSY, MOPG, CPMO U WOUGNYX UGX LMKUGNYSELHZMYGYX VAM UNPMUMYX YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY. OY WUTY AI MOY LMUPKL UGXYTVKUWYX OPL LPLMYK."EHA XPX GHM NYM TE SYMMYK?" OY ULRYX, UGX GHM CUPMPGN ZHK UKYISE--COPWO OY CHASX GHM OUBY KYWYPBYX, ZHK MOY IKPGWYLL CUL AGUVSY MHLIYUR--OY MAKGYX VUWR, KUIPXSE THAGMYX MOY LMUPKL UNUPG CPMO MOY XHWMHKCOH OUX YGMYKYX MOY OUSS UZMYK OPT (MOYE OUX TYM UM MOY SULM IHLMLMUMPHG), UGX UNUPG YTVKUWYX OPL LPLMYK."COUM U LMKUGNY ZUMY, TULOU XUKSPGN!" UGX OUBPGN MURYG HZZ OPL WSHUR UGXZYSM VHHML, OY CYGM MH MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL' UIUKMTYGM.WOUIMYK PDMOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL SUE LAIIHKMYX VE IPSSHCL, CPMO U COPMY WUI HG OYKOYUX (MOY IUPGL OUX QALM SYZM OYK). LMKUGXL HZ OYK VSUWR OUPK SUE KHAGXOYK PGZSUTYX UGX IYKLIPKPGN WOYYRL, OYK WOUKTPGN KHLE THAMO CPMO PMLXHCGE SPI CUL HIYG UGX LOY CUL LTPSPGN QHEZASSE. IKPGWY UGXKYC YGMYKYXUGX IUALYX ZUWPGN OYK UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY LHZU HG COPWO LOY CUL SEPGN.OYK NSPMMYKPGN YEYL, ZPSSYX CPMO WOPSXSPRY ZYUK UGX YDWPMYTYGM, KYLMYXHG OPT CPMOHAM WOUGNPGN MOYPK YDIKYLLPHG. "P SHBY EHA USS UGX OUBY XHGYGH OUKT MH UGEHGY; COE TALM P LAZZYK LH? OYSI TY!" OYK SHHR LYYTYX MHLUE. LOY LUC OYK OALVUGX, VAM XPX GHM KYUSPFY MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ OPLUIIYUKUGWY VYZHKY OYK GHC. IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM KHAGX MOY LHZU UGX RPLLYXOYK ZHKYOYUX."TE XUKSPGN!" OY LUPX--U CHKX OY OUX GYBYK ALYX MH OYK VYZHKY. "NHX PLTYKWPZAS...."LOY SHHRYX UM OPT PGJAPKPGNSE UGX CPMO WOPSXSPRY KYIKHUWO."P YDIYWMYX OYSI ZKHT EHA UGX P NYM GHGY, GHGY ZKHT EHA YPMOYK!" LUPXOYK YEYL. LOY CUL GHM LAKIKPLYX UM OPL OUBPGN WHTY; LOY XPX GHM KYUSPFYMOUM OY OUX WHTY. OPL WHTPGN OUX GHMOPGN MH XH CPMO OYK LAZZYKPGNL HKCPMO MOYPK KYSPYZ. MOY IUGNL VYNUG UNUPG UGX TUKE VHNXUGHBGU UXBPLYXIKPGWY UGXKYC MH SYUBY MOY KHHT.MOY XHWMHK YGMYKYX. IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM HAM UGX, TYYMPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE,UNUPG QHPGYX OYK. MOYE VYNUG MUSRPGN PG COPLIYKL, VAM MOYPK MUSR VKHRYHZZ UM YBYKE THTYGM. MOYE CUPMYX UGX SPLMYGYX."NH, XYUK," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE.IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM UNUPG MH OPL CPZY UGX LUM CUPMPGN PG MOY KHHT GYDMMH OYKL. U CHTUG WUTY ZKHT MOY VYXKHHT CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY UGX VYWUTYWHGZALYX COYG LOY LUC IKPGWY UGXKYC. OY WHBYKYX OPL ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGXLUGX KYTUPGYX LH ZHK LHTY TPGAMYL. IPMYHAL, OYSISYLL, UGPTUS THUGL WUTYMOKHANO MOY XHHK. IKPGWY UGXKYC NHM AI, CYGM MH MOY XHHK, UGX MKPYX MHHIYG PM. LHTYHGY CUL OHSXPGN PM LOAM."EHA WUG'M WHTY PG! EHA WUG'M!" LUPX U MYKKPZPYX BHPWY ZKHT CPMOPG.OY VYNUG IUWPGN MOY KHHT. MOY LWKYUTPGN WYULYX, UGX U ZYC THKY LYWHGXLCYGM VE. MOYG LAXXYGSE U MYKKPVSY LOKPYR--PM WHASX GHM VY OYKL, LOYWHASX GHM LWKYUT SPRY MOUM--WUTY ZKHT MOY VYXKHHT. IKPGWY UGXKYC KUG MHMOY XHHK; MOY LWKYUT WYULYX UGX OY OYUKX MOY CUPS HZ UG PGZUGM."COUM OUBY MOYE MURYG U VUVE PG MOYKY ZHK?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC PG MOYZPKLM LYWHGX. "U VUVE? COUM VUVE...? COE PL MOYKY U VUVE MOYKY? HK PLMOY VUVE VHKG?"MOYG LAXXYGSE OY KYUSPFYX MOY QHEZAS LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOUM CUPS; MYUKLWOHRYX OPT, UGX SYUGPGN OPL YSVHCL HG MOY CPGXHC LPSS VY VYNUG MH WKE,LHVVPGN SPRY U WOPSX. MOY XHHK HIYGYX. MOY XHWMHK CPMO OPL LOPKM LSYYBYLMAWRYX AI, CPMOHAM U WHUM, IUSY UGX CPMO U MKYTVSPGN QUC, WUTY HAMHZ MOY KHHT. IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX MH OPT, VAM MOY XHWMHK NUBY OPT UVYCPSXYKYX SHHR UGX IULLYX VE CPMOHAM U CHKX. U CHTUG KALOYX HAM UGXLYYPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHIIYX, OYLPMUMPGN HG MOY MOKYLOHSX. OY CYGM PGMHOPL CPZY'L KHHT. LOY CUL SEPGN XYUX, PG MOY LUTY IHLPMPHG OY OUX LYYGOYK PG ZPBY TPGAMYL VYZHKY UGX, XYLIPMY MOY ZPDYX YEYL UGX MOY IUSSHK HZMOY WOYYRL, MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG CUL HG OYK WOUKTPGN WOPSXSPRY ZUWY CPMOPML AIIYK SPI WHBYKYX CPMO MPGE VSUWR OUPK."P SHBY EHA USS, UGX OUBY XHGY GH OUKT MH UGEHGY; UGX COUM OUBY EHA XHGYMH TY?"--LUPX OYK WOUKTPGN, IUMOYMPW, XYUX ZUWY.PG U WHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT LHTYMOPGN KYX UGX MPGE NUBY U NKAGM UGX LJAYUSYXPG TUKE VHNXUGHBGU'L MKYTVSPGN COPMY OUGXL.MCH OHAKL SUMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC, LMYIIPGN LHZMSE, CYGM PGMH OPL ZUMOYK'LKHHT. MOY HSX TUG USKYUXE RGYC YBYKEMOPGN. OY CUL LMUGXPGN WSHLY MHMOY XHHK UGX UL LHHG UL PM HIYGYX OPL KHANO HSX UKTL WSHLYX SPRY U BPLYKHAGX OPL LHG'L GYWR, UGX CPMOHAM U CHKX OY VYNUG MH LHV SPRY U WOPSX.MOKYY XUEL SUMYK MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL CUL VAKPYX, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGMAI MOY LMYIL MH COYKY MOY WHZZPG LMHHX, MH NPBY OYK MOY ZUKYCYSS RPLL.UGX MOYKY PG MOY WHZZPG CUL MOY LUTY ZUWY, MOHANO CPMO WSHLYX YEYL. "UO,COUM OUBY EHA XHGY MH TY?" PM LMPSS LYYTYX MH LUE, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYCZYSM MOUM LHTYMOPGN NUBY CUE PG OPL LHAS UGX MOUM OY CUL NAPSME HZ U LPGOY WHASX GYPMOYK KYTYXE GHK ZHKNYM. OY WHASX GHM CYYI. MOY HSX TUG MHHWUTY AI UGX RPLLYX MOY CUDYG SPMMSY OUGXL MOUM SUE JAPYMSE WKHLLYX HGYHG MOY HMOYK HG OYK VKYULM, UGX MH OPT, MHH, OYK ZUWY LYYTYX MH LUE:"UO, COUM OUBY EHA XHGY MH TY, UGX COE?" UGX UM MOY LPNOM MOY HSX TUGMAKGYX UGNKPSE UCUE.UGHMOYK ZPBY XUEL IULLYX, UGX MOYG MOY EHAGN IKPGWY GPWOHSUL UGXKYYBPWOCUL VUIMPFYX. MOY CYM GAKLY LAIIHKMYX MOY WHBYKSYM CPMO OYK WOPG,COPSY MOY IKPYLM CPMO U NHHLY ZYUMOYK UGHPGMYX MOY VHE'L SPMMSY KYX UGXCKPGRSYX LHSYL UGX IUSTL.OPL NKUGXZUMOYK, COH CUL OPL NHXZUMOYK, MKYTVSPGN UGX UZKUPX HZ XKHIIPGNOPT, WUKKPYX MOY PGZUGM KHAGX MOY VUMMYKYX MPG ZHGM UGX OUGXYX OPT HBYKMH MOY NHXTHMOYK, IKPGWYLL TUKE. IKPGWY UGXKYC LUM PG UGHMOYK KHHT,ZUPGM CPMO ZYUK SYLM MOY VUVE LOHASX VY XKHCGYX PG MOY ZHGM, UGX UCUPMYXMOY MYKTPGUMPHG HZ MOY WYKYTHGE. OY SHHRYX AI QHEZASSE UM MOY VUVE COYGMOY GAKLY VKHANOM PM MH OPT UGX GHXXYX UIIKHBUS COYG LOY MHSX OPT MOUMMOY CUD CPMO MOY VUVE'L OUPK OUX GHM LAGR PG MOY ZHGM VAM OUX ZSHUMYX.WOUIMYK DKHLMHB'L LOUKY PG XHSHROHB'L XAYS CPMO VYFAROHB CUL OALOYX AI VE MOYYZZHKML HZ MOY HSX WHAGM, UGX PGLMYUX HZ VYPGN XYNKUXYX MH MOY KUGRLUL OY YDIYWMYX OY CUL UIIHPGMYX UG UXQAMUGM MH MOY NHBYKGHK NYGYKUS HZTHLWHC. UL U KYLASM OY WHASX GHM NH MH MOY WHAGMKE CPMO MOY KYLM HZ MOYZUTPSE, VAM CUL RYIM USS LATTYK PG THLWHC VE OPL GYC XAMPYL. XHSHROHBKYWHBYKYX, UGX KHLMHB VYWUTY BYKE ZKPYGXSE CPMO OPT XAKPGN OPLWHGBUSYLWYGWY. XHSHROHB SUE PSS UM OPL THMOYK'L COH SHBYX OPTIULLPHGUMYSE UGX MYGXYKSE, UGX HSX TUKE PBUGHBGU, COH OUX NKHCG ZHGX HZKHLMHB ZHK OPL ZKPYGXLOPI MH OYK ZYXEU, HZMYG MUSRYX MH OPT UVHAM OYKLHG."EYL, WHAGM," LOY CHASX LUE, "OY PL MHH GHVSY UGX IAKY-LHASYX ZHKHAK IKYLYGM, XYIKUBYX CHKSX. GH HGY GHC SHBYL BPKMAY; PM LYYTL SPRYU KYIKHUWO MH YBYKEHGY. GHC MYSS TY, WHAGM, CUL PM KPNOM, CUL PMOHGHKUVSY, HZ VYFAROHB? UGX ZYXEU, CPMO OPL GHVSY LIPKPM, SHBYX OPT UGXYBYG GHC GYBYK LUEL U CHKX UNUPGLM OPT. MOHLY IKUGRL PG IYMYKLVAKN COYGMOYE ISUEYX LHTY MKPWRL HG U IHSPWYTUG, XPXG'M MOYE XH PM MHNYMOYK?UGX MOYKY! VYFAROHB NHM HZZ LWHMZKYY, COPSY ZYXEU OUX MH VYUK MOY COHSYVAKXYG HG OPL LOHASXYKL. ZUGWE COUM OY OUX MH NH MOKHANO! PM'L MKAY OYOUL VYYG KYPGLMUMYX, VAM OHC WHASX MOYE ZUPS MH XH MOUM? P MOPGR MOYKYCYKY GHM TUGE LAWO NUSSUGM LHGL HZ MOY ZUMOYKSUGX HAM MOYKY UL OY. UGXGHC--MOPL XAYS! OUBY MOYLY IYHISY GH ZYYSPGN, HK OHGHK? RGHCPGN OPT MHVY UG HGSE LHG, MH WOUSSYGNY OPT UGX LOHHM LH LMKUPNOM! PM'L CYSSNHX OUX TYKWE HG AL. UGX COUM CUL PM ZHK? COH XHYLG'M OUBY PGMKPNAYLGHCUXUEL? COE, PZ OY CUL LH QYUSHAL, UL P LYY MOPGNL OY LOHASX OUBYLOHCG PM LHHGYK, VAM OY SYML PM NH HG ZHK THGMOL. UGX MOYG MH WUSS OPTHAM, KYWRHGPGN HG ZYXEU GHM ZPNOMPGN VYWUALY OY HCYX OPT THGYE! COUMVULYGYLL! COUM TYUGGYLL! P RGHC EHA AGXYKLMUGX ZYXEU, TE XYUK WHAGM;MOUM, VYSPYBY TY, PL COE P UT LH ZHGX HZ EHA. ZYC IYHISY XH AGXYKLMUGXOPT. OY PL LAWO U SHZME, OYUBYGSE LHAS!"XHSHROHB OPTLYSZ XAKPGN OPL WHGBUSYLWYGWY LIHRY MH KHLMHB PG U CUE GHHGY CHASX OUBY YDIYWMYX HZ OPT."P RGHC IYHISY WHGLPXYK TY U VUX TUG!" OY LUPX. "SYM MOYT! P XHG'M WUKYU LMKUC UVHAM UGEHGY VAM MOHLY P SHBY; VAM MOHLY P SHBY, P SHBY LH MOUMP CHASX NPBY TE SPZY ZHK MOYT, UGX MOY HMOYKL P'X MOKHMMSY PZ MOYELMHHX PG TE CUE. P OUBY UG UXHKYX, U IKPWYSYLL THMOYK, UGX MCH HK MOKYYZKPYGXL--EHA UTHGN MOYT--UGX UL ZHK MOY KYLM P HGSE WUKY UVHAM MOYTPG LH ZUK UL MOYE UKY OUKTZAS HK ALYZAS. UGX THLM HZ MOYT UKY OUKTZAS,YLIYWPUSSE MOY CHTYG. EYL, XYUK VHE," OY WHGMPGAYX, "P OUBY TYM SHBPGN,GHVSY, OPNO-TPGXYX TYG, VAM P OUBY GHM EYM TYM UGE CHTYG--WHAGMYLLYLHK WHHRL--COH CYKY GHM BYGUS. P OUBY GHM EYM TYM MOUM XPBPGY IAKPME UGXXYBHMPHG P SHHR ZHK PG CHTYG. PZ P ZHAGX LAWO U HGY P'X NPBY TE SPZY ZHKOYK! VAM MOHLY!..." UGX OY TUXY U NYLMAKY HZ WHGMYTIM. "UGX VYSPYBY TY,PZ P LMPSS BUSAY TE SPZY PM PL HGSE VYWUALY P LMPSS OHIY MH TYYM LAWOU XPBPGY WKYUMAKY, COH CPSS KYNYGYKUMY, IAKPZE, UGX YSYBUMY TY. VAM EHAXHG'M AGXYKLMUGX PM.""HO, EYL, P JAPMY AGXYKLMUGX," UGLCYKYX KHLMHB, COH CUL AGXYK OPL GYCZKPYGX'L PGZSAYGWY.PG MOY UAMATG MOY KHLMHBL KYMAKGYX MH THLWHC. YUKSE PG MOY CPGMYKXYGPLHB USLH WUTY VUWR UGX LMUEYX CPMO MOYT. MOY ZPKLM OUSZ HZ MOYCPGMYK HZ 1806, COPWO GPWOHSUL KHLMHB LIYGM PG THLWHC, CUL HGY HZ MOYOUIIPYLM, TYKKPYLM MPTYL ZHK OPT UGX MOY COHSY ZUTPSE. GPWOHSUL VKHANOMTUGE EHAGN TYG MH OPL IUKYGML' OHALY. BYKU CUL U OUGXLHTY NPKS HZMCYGME; LHGEU U NPKS HZ LPDMYYG CPMO USS MOY WOUKT HZ UG HIYGPGN ZSHCYK;GUMULOU, OUSZ NKHCG AI UGX OUSZ WOPSX, CUL GHC WOPSXPLOSE UTALPGN, GHCNPKSPLOSE YGWOUGMPGN.UM MOUM MPTY PG MOY KHLMHBL' OHALY MOYKY IKYBUPSYX UG UTHKHAL UMTHLIOYKYWOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ OHTYL COYKY MOYKY UKY BYKE EHAGN UGX BYKEWOUKTPGN NPKSL. YBYKE EHAGN TUG COH WUTY MH MOY OHALY--LYYPGN MOHLYPTIKYLLPHGUVSY, LTPSPGN EHAGN ZUWYL (LTPSPGN IKHVUVSE UM MOYPK HCGOUIIPGYLL), ZYYSPGN MOY YUNYK VALMSY UKHAGX OPT, UGX OYUKPGN MOY ZPMZASVAKLML HZ LHGN UGX TALPW UGX MOY PGWHGLYJAYGM VAM ZKPYGXSE IKUMMSY HZEHAGN NPKSL KYUXE ZHK UGEMOPGN UGX ZASS HZ OHIY--YDIYKPYGWYX MOYLUTY ZYYSPGN; LOUKPGN CPMO MOY EHAGN ZHSR HZ MOY KHLMHBL' OHALYOHSX UKYUXPGYLL MH ZUSS PG SHBY UGX UG YDIYWMUMPHG HZ OUIIPGYLL.UTHGN MOY EHAGN TYG PGMKHXAWYX VE KHLMHB HGY HZ MOY ZPKLM CUL XHSHROHB,COHT YBYKEHGY PG MOY OHALY SPRYX YDWYIM GUMULOU. LOY USTHLM JAUKKYSYXCPMO OYK VKHMOYK UVHAM OPT. LOY PGLPLMYX MOUM OY CUL U VUX TUG, UGXMOUM PG MOY XAYS CPMO VYFAROHB, IPYKKY CUL KPNOM UGX XHSHROHB CKHGN, UGXZAKMOYK MOUM OY CUL XPLUNKYYUVSY UGX AGGUMAKUS."MOYKY'L GHMOPGN ZHK TY MH AGXYKLMUGX," LOY WKPYX HAM CPMO KYLHSAMYLYSZ-CPSS, "OY PL CPWRYX UGX OYUKMSYLL. MOYKY GHC, P SPRY EHAK XYGPLHBMOHANO OY PL U KURY UGX USS MOUM, LMPSS P SPRY OPT; LH EHA LYY P XHAGXYKLMUGX. P XHG'M RGHC OHC MH IAM PM... CPMO MOPL HGY YBYKEMOPGN PLWUSWASUMYX, UGX P XHG'M SPRY MOUM. VAM XYGPLHB...""HO, XYGPLHB PL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM," KYISPYX GPWOHSUL, PTISEPGN MOUM YBYGXYGPLHB CUL GHMOPGN WHTIUKYX MH XHSHROHB--"EHA TALM AGXYKLMUGX COUM ULHAS MOYKY PL PG XHSHROHB, EHA LOHASX LYY OPT CPMO OPL THMOYK. COUM UOYUKM!""CYSS, P XHG'M RGHC UVHAM MOUM, VAM P UT AGWHTZHKMUVSY CPMO OPT. UGX XHEHA RGHC OY OUL ZUSSYG PG SHBY CPMO LHGEU?""COUM GHGLYGLY...""P'T WYKMUPG HZ PM; EHA'SS LYY."GUMULOU'L IKYXPWMPHG IKHBYX MKAY. XHSHROHB, COH XPX GHM ALAUSSE WUKYZHK MOY LHWPYME HZ SUXPYL, VYNUG MH WHTY HZMYG MH MOY OHALY, UGX MOYJAYLMPHG ZHK COHLY LURY OY WUTY (MOHANO GH HGY LIHRY HZ PM) CUL LHHGLYMMSYX. OY WUTY VYWUALY HZ LHGEU. UGX LHGEU, MOHANO LOY CHASX GYBYKOUBY XUKYX MH LUE LH, RGYC PM UGX VSALOYX LWUKSYM YBYKE MPTY XHSHROHBUIIYUKYX.XHSHROHB HZMYG XPGYX UM MOY KHLMHBL', GYBYK TPLLYX U IYKZHKTUGWY UMCOPWO MOYE CYKY IKYLYGM, UGX CYGM MH PHNYS'L VUSSL ZHK EHAGN IYHISYCOPWO MOY KHLMHBL USCUEL UMMYGXYX. OY CUL IHPGMYXSE UMMYGMPBY MH LHGEUUGX SHHRYX UM OYK PG LAWO U CUE MOUM GHM HGSE WHASX LOY GHM VYUK OPLNSUGWYL CPMOHAM WHSHKPGN, VAM YBYG MOY HSX WHAGMYLL UGX GUMULOU VSALOYXCOYG MOYE LUC OPL SHHRL.PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM MOPL LMKUGNY, LMKHGN TUG CUL AGXYK MOY PKKYLPLMPVSYPGZSAYGWY HZ MOY XUKR, NKUWYZAS NPKS COH SHBYX UGHMOYK.KHLMHB GHMPWYX LHTYMOPGN GYC PG XHSHROHB'L KYSUMPHGL CPMO LHGEU, VAMOY XPX GHM YDISUPG MH OPTLYSZ COUM MOYLY GYC KYSUMPHGL CYKY. "MOYE'KYUSCUEL PG SHBY CPMO LHTYHGY," OY MOHANOM HZ LHGEU UGX GUMULOU. VAM OYCUL GHM UL TAWO UM YULY CPMO LHGEU UGX XHSHROHB UL VYZHKY UGX CUL SYLLZKYJAYGMSE UM OHTY.PG MOY UAMATG HZ 1806 YBYKEVHXE OUX UNUPG VYNAG MUSRPGN HZ MOY CUK CPMOGUIHSYHG CPMO YBYG NKYUMYK CUKTMO MOUG MOY EYUK VYZHKY. HKXYKL CYKYNPBYG MH KUPLY KYWKAPML, MYG TYG PG YBYKE MOHALUGX ZHK MOY KYNASUK UKTE,UGX VYLPXYL MOPL, GPGY TYG PG YBYKE MOHALUGX ZHK MOY TPSPMPU. YBYKECOYKYVHGUIUKMY CUL UGUMOYTUMPFYX UGX PG THLWHC GHMOPGN VAM MOY WHTPGN CUKCUL MUSRYX HZ. ZHK MOY KHLMHB ZUTPSE MOY COHSY PGMYKYLM HZ MOYLYIKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK CUK SUE PG MOY ZUWM MOUM GPWOHSUL CHASX GHM OYUK HZKYTUPGPGN PG THLWHC, UGX HGSE UCUPMYX MOY MYKTPGUMPHG HZ XYGPLHB'LZAKSHANO UZMYK WOKPLMTUL MH KYMAKG CPMO OPT MH MOYPK KYNPTYGM. OPLUIIKHUWOPGN XYIUKMAKY XPX GHM IKYBYGM OPL UTALPGN OPTLYSZ, VAM KUMOYKNUBY FYLM MH OPL ISYULAKYL. OY LIYGM MOY NKYUMYK IUKM HZ OPL MPTY UCUEZKHT OHTY, UM XPGGYKL, IUKMPYL, UGX VUSSL.WOUIMYK DPHG MOY MOPKX XUE UZMYK WOKPLMTUL GPWOHSUL XPGYX UM OHTY, U MOPGN OY OUXKUKYSE XHGY HZ SUMY. PM CUL U NKUGX ZUKYCYSS XPGGYK, UL OY UGX XYGPLHBCYKY SYUBPGN MH QHPG MOYPK KYNPTYGM UZMYK YIPIOUGE. UVHAM MCYGME IYHISYCYKY IKYLYGM, PGWSAXPGN XHSHROHB UGX XYGPLHB.GYBYK OUX SHBY VYYG LH TAWO PG MOY UPK, UGX GYBYK OUX MOY UTHKHALUMTHLIOYKY TUXY PMLYSZ LH LMKHGNSE ZYSM PG MOY KHLMHBL' OHALY UL UM MOPLOHSPXUE MPTY. "LYPFY MOY THTYGML HZ OUIIPGYLL, SHBY UGX VY SHBYX! MOUMPL MOY HGSE KYUSPME PG MOY CHKSX, USS YSLY PL ZHSSE. PM PL MOY HGY MOPGNCY UKY PGMYKYLMYX PG OYKY," LUPX MOY LIPKPM HZ MOY ISUWY.GPWOHSUL, OUBPGN UL ALAUS YDOUALMYX MCH IUPKL HZ OHKLYL, CPMOHAMBPLPMPGN USS MOY ISUWYL OY TYUGM MH NH MH UGX COYKY OY OUX VYYG PGBPMYX,KYMAKGYX OHTY QALM VYZHKY XPGGYK. UL LHHG UL OY YGMYKYX OY GHMPWYX UGXZYSM MOY MYGLPHG HZ MOY UTHKHAL UPK PG MOY OHALY, UGX USLH GHMPWYX UWAKPHAL YTVUKKULLTYGM UTHGN LHTY HZ MOHLY IKYLYGM. LHGEU, XHSHROHB,UGX MOY HSX WHAGMYLL CYKY YLIYWPUSSE XPLMAKVYX, UGX MH U SYLLYK XYNKYYGUMULOU. GPWOHSUL AGXYKLMHHX MOUM LHTYMOPGN TALM OUBY OUIIYGYX VYMCYYGLHGEU UGX XHSHROHB VYZHKY XPGGYK, UGX CPMO MOY RPGXSE LYGLPMPBYGYLLGUMAKUS MH OPT CUL BYKE NYGMSY UGX CUKE CPMO MOYT VHMO UM XPGGYK. HGMOUM LUTY YBYGPGN MOYKY CUL MH VY HGY HZ MOY VUSSL MOUM PHNYS (MOYXUGWPGN TULMYK) NUBY ZHK OPL IAIPSL XAKPGN MOY OHSPXUEL."GPWOHSUL, CPSS EHA WHTY MH PHNYS'L? ISYULY XH!" LUPX GUMULOU. "OY ULRYXEHA, UGX BULPSP XTPMKPWO * PL USLH NHPGN."    * XYGPLHB."COYKY CHASX P GHM NH UM MOY WHAGMYLL' WHTTUGX!" LUPX XYGPLHB, COH UMMOY KHLMHBL' OUX QHWASUKSE ULLATYX MOY KHSY HZ GUMULOU'L RGPNOM. "P'TYBYG CYUXE MH XUGWY MOY IUL XY WOUSY.""PZ P OUBY MPTY," UGLCYKYX GPWOHSUL. "VAM P IKHTPLYX MOY UKROUKHBL; MOYEOUBY U IUKME.""UGX EHA?" OY ULRYX XHSHROHB, VAM UL LHHG UL OY OUX ULRYX MOY JAYLMPHGOY GHMPWYX MOUM PM LOHASX GHM OUBY VYYG IAM."IYKOUIL," WHSXSE UGX UGNKPSE KYISPYX XHSHROHB, NSUGWPGN UM LHGEU, UGX,LWHCSPGN, OY NUBY GPWOHSUL QALM LAWO U SHHR UL OY OUX NPBYG IPYKKY UMMOY WSAV XPGGYK."MOYKY PL LHTYMOPGN AI," MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, UGX OY CUL ZAKMOYK WHGZPKTYXPG MOPL WHGWSALPHG VE MOY ZUWM MOUM XHSHROHB SYZM PTTYXPUMYSE UZMYKXPGGYK. "OY OULIKHIHLYX MH LHGEU!"SPMMSY UL GPWOHSUL OUX HWWAIPYX OPTLYSZ CPMO LHGEU HZ SUMY, LHTYMOPGNLYYTYX MH NPBY CUE CPMOPG OPT UM MOPL GYCL. XHSHROHB CUL U LAPMUVSY UGXPG LHTY KYLIYWML U VKPSSPUGM TUMWO ZHK MOY XHCYKSYLL, HKIOUG NPKS. ZKHTMOY IHPGM HZ BPYC HZ MOY HSX WHAGMYLL UGX HZ LHWPYME PM CUL HAM HZ MOYJAYLMPHG ZHK OYK MH KYZALY OPT. LH LUPX MOY THMOYKL ULMOYE CUMWOYX MOYPK EHAGN IYHISY YDYWAMPGN MOYPK GYCSE SYUKGYX LMYIL, UGXLH LUPX MOY EHAMOL UGX TUPXYGL MOYTLYSBYL UL MOYE XUGWYX MPSS MOYE CYKYKYUXE MH XKHI, UGX LH LUPX MOY NKHCG-AI EHAGN TYG UGX CHTYG COH WUTY MHMOYLY VUSSL CPMO UG UPK HZ WHGXYLWYGLPHG UGX ZHAGX MOYT THLM YGQHEUVSY.MOUM EYUK MCH TUKKPUNYL OUX WHTY HZ MOYLY VUSSL. MOY MCH IKYMME EHAGNIKPGWYLLYL NHKWOURHB TYM LAPMHKL MOYKY UGX CYKY TUKKPYX UGX LH ZAKMOYKPGWKYULYX MOY ZUTY HZ MOYLY XUGWYL. COUM XPLMPGNAPLOYX MOYT ZKHT HMOYKLCUL MOY UVLYGWY HZ OHLM HK OHLMYLL UGX MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOY NHHX-GUMAKYXPHNYS, ZSEPGN UVHAM SPRY U ZYUMOYK UGX VHCPGN UWWHKXPGN MH MOY KASYL HZOPL UKM, UL OY WHSSYWMYX MOY MPWRYML ZKHT USS OPL BPLPMHKL. MOYKY CULMOY ZUWM MOUM HGSE MOHLY WUTY COH CPLOYX MH XUGWY UGX UTALY MOYTLYSBYLUL NPKSL HZ MOPKMYYG UGX ZHAKMYYG XH COH UKY CYUKPGN SHGN XKYLLYL ZHKMOY ZPKLM MPTY. CPMO LWUKWYSE UGE YDWYIMPHGL MOYE USS CYKY, HK LYYTYX MHVY, IKYMME--LH KUIMAKHAL CYKY MOYPK LTPSYL UGX LH LIUKRSPGN MOYPK YEYL.LHTYMPTYL MOY VYLM HZ MOY IAIPSL, HZ COHT GUMULOU, COH CUL YDWYIMPHGUSSENKUWYZAS, CUL ZPKLM, YBYG XUGWYX MOY IUL XY WOUSY, VAM UM MOPL SULM VUSSHGSE MOY YWHLLUPLY, MOY UGNSUPLY, UGX MOY TUFAKRU, COPWO CUL QALM WHTPGNPGMH ZULOPHG, CYKY XUGWYX. MOY VUGX LMKAWR AI MOY GYCSE PGMKHXAWYX TUFAKRU. GPWOHSUL WHASX GHMKYZALY PHNYS UGX ULRYX LHGEU MH XUGWY. LUPX XYGPLHB QHRPGNSE."P'SS LPGN ZHK EHA U COHSY YBYGPGN," LUPX GUMULOU."HO, MOY ZUPCE! LOY WUG XH UGEMOPGN CPMO TY!" LUPX XYGPLHB, UGX OYAGOHHRYX OPL LUVYK. OY WUTY HAM ZKHT VYOPGX MOY WOUPKL, WSULIYX OPLIUKMGYK'L OUGX ZPKTSE, MOKYC VUWR OPL OYUX, UGX UXBUGWYX OPL ZHHM,CUPMPGN ZHK MOY VYUM. HGSE HG OHKLY VUWR UGX PG MOY TUFAKRU CULXYGPLHB'L LOHKM LMUMAKY GHM GHMPWYUVSY UGX OY SHHRYX MOY ZPGY ZYSSHC OYZYSM OPTLYSZ MH VY. UM MOY KPNOM VYUM HZ MOY TALPW OY SHHRYX LPXYCUEL UMOPL IUKMGYK CPMO U TYKKE UGX MKPATIOUGM UPK, LAXXYGSE LMUTIYX CPMO HGYZHHM, VHAGXYX ZKHT MOY ZSHHK SPRY U VUSS, UGX ZSYC KHAGX MOY KHHT MURPGNOPL IUKMGYK CPMO OPT. OY NSPXYX LPSYGMSE HG HGY ZHHM OUSZ UWKHLL MOYKHHT, UGX LYYTPGN GHM MH GHMPWY MOY WOUPKL CUL XULOPGN LMKUPNOM UM MOYT,COYG LAXXYGSE, WSPGRPGN OPL LIAKL UGX LIKYUXPGN HAM OPL SYNL, OY LMHIIYXLOHKM HG OPL OYYSL, LMHHX LH U LYWHGX, LMUTIYX HG MOY LIHM WSUGRPGN OPLLIAKL, COPKSYX KUIPXSE KHAGX, UGX, LMKPRPGN OPL SYZM OYYS UNUPGLM OPLKPNOM, ZSYC KHAGX UNUPG PG U WPKWSY. GUMULOU NAYLLYX COUM OY TYUGM MHXH, UGX UVUGXHGPGN OYKLYSZ MH OPT ZHSSHCYX OPL SYUX OUKXSE RGHCPGN OHC.ZPKLM OY LIAG OYK KHAGX, OHSXPGN OYK GHC CPMO OPL SYZM, GHC CPMO OPLKPNOM OUGX, MOYG ZUSSPGN HG HGY RGYY OY MCPKSYX OYK KHAGX OPT, UGX UNUPGQATIPGN AI, XULOYX LH PTIYMAHALSE ZHKCUKX MOUM PM LYYTYX UL PZ OY CHASXKALO MOKHANO MOY COHSY LAPMY HZ KHHTL CPMOHAM XKUCPGN VKYUMO, UGX MOYGOY LAXXYGSE LMHIIYX UGX IYKZHKTYX LHTY GYC UGX AGYDIYWMYX LMYIL. COYG UMSULM, LTUKMSE COPKSPGN OPL IUKMGYK KHAGX PG ZKHGM HZ OYK WOUPK, OY XKYCAI CPMO U WSPWR HZ OPL LIAKL UGX VHCYX MH OYK, GUMULOU XPX GHM YBYG TURYOPT U WAKMLE. LOY ZPDYX OYK YEYL HG OPT PG UTUFYTYGM, LTPSPGN UL PZ LOYXPX GHM KYWHNGPFY OPT."COUM XHYL MOPL TYUG?" LOY VKHANOM HAM.USMOHANO PHNYS XPX GHM UWRGHCSYXNY MOPL MH VY MOY KYUS TUFAKRU, YBYKEHGYCUL XYSPNOMYX CPMO XYGPLHB'L LRPSS, OY CUL ULRYX UNUPG UGX UNUPG UL UIUKMGYK, UGX MOY HSX TYG VYNUG LTPSPGNSE MH MUSR UVHAM IHSUGX UGX MOYNHHX HSX XUEL. XYGPLHB, ZSALOYX UZMYK MOY TUFAKRU UGX THIIPGN OPTLYSZCPMO OPL OUGXRYKWOPYZ, LUM XHCG VE GUMULOU UGX XPX GHM SYUBY OYK ZHK MOYKYLM HZ MOY YBYGPGN.WOUIMYK DPPPZHK MCH XUEL UZMYK MOUM KHLMHB XPX GHM LYY XHSHROHB UM OPL HCG HK UMXHSHROHB'L OHTY: HG MOY MOPKX XUE OY KYWYPBYX U GHMY ZKHT OPT:UL P XH GHM PGMYGX MH VY UM EHAK OHALY UNUPG ZHK KYULHGL EHA RGHCHZ, UGX UT NHPGN MH KYQHPG TE KYNPTYGM, P UT NPBPGN U ZUKYCYSS LAIIYKMHGPNOM MH TE ZKPYGXL--WHTY MH MOY YGNSPLO OHMYS.UVHAM MYG H'WSHWR KHLMHB CYGM MH MOY YGNSPLO OHMYS LMKUPNOM ZKHT MOYMOYUMYK, COYKY OY OUX VYYG CPMO OPL ZUTPSE UGX XYGPLHB. OY CUL UM HGWYLOHCG MH MOY VYLM KHHT, COPWO XHSHROHB OUX MURYG ZHK MOUM YBYGPGN. LHTYMCYGME TYG CYKY NUMOYKYX KHAGX U MUVSY UM COPWO XHSHROHB LUM VYMCYYGMCH WUGXSYL. HG MOY MUVSY CUL U IPSY HZ NHSX UGX IUIYK THGYE, UGX OY CULRYYIPGN MOY VUGR. KHLMHB OUX GHM LYYG OPT LPGWY OPL IKHIHLUS UGX LHGEU'LKYZALUS UGX ZYSM AGWHTZHKMUVSY UM MOY MOHANOM HZ OHC MOYE CHASX TYYM.XHSHROHB'L WSYUK, WHSX NSUGWY TYM KHLMHB UL LHHG UL OY YGMYKYX MOY XHHK,UL MOHANO OY OUX SHGN YDIYWMYX OPT."PM'L U SHGN MPTY LPGWY CY TYM," OY LUPX. "MOUGRL ZHK WHTPGN. P'SS QALMZPGPLO XYUSPGN, UGX MOYG PSEALORU CPSS WHTY CPMO OPL WOHKAL.""P WUSSYX HGWY HK MCPWY UM EHAK OHALY," LUPX KHLMHB, KYXXYGPGN.XHSHROHB TUXY GH KYISE."EHA TUE IAGM," OY LUPX.KHLMHB KYWUSSYX UM MOUM THTYGM U LMKUGNY WHGBYKLUMPHG OY OUX HGWY OUXCPMO XHSHROHB. "GHGY VAM ZHHSL MKALM MH SAWR PG ISUE," XHSHROHB OUX MOYGLUPX."HK UKY EHA UZKUPX MH ISUE CPMO TY?" XHSHROHB GHC ULRYX UL PZ NAYLLPGNKHLMHB'L MOHANOM.VYGYUMO OPL LTPSY KHLMHB LUC PG OPT MOY THHX OY OUX LOHCG UM MOY WSAVXPGGYK UGX UM HMOYK MPTYL, COYG UL PZ MPKYX HZ YBYKEXUE SPZY OY OUX ZYSMU GYYX MH YLWUIY ZKHT PM VE LHTY LMKUGNY, UGX ALAUSSE WKAYS, UWMPHG.KHLMHB ZYSM PSS UM YULY. OY MKPYX, VAM ZUPSYX, MH ZPGX LHTY QHRYCPMO COPWO MH KYISE MH XHSHROHB'L CHKXL. VAM VYZHKY OY OUX MOHANOMHZ UGEMOPGN, XHSHROHB, SHHRPGN LMKUPNOM PG OPL ZUWY, LUPX LSHCSE UGXXYSPVYKUMYSE LH MOUM YBYKEHGY WHASX OYUK:"XH EHA KYTYTVYK CY OUX U MUSR UVHAM WUKXL... 'OY'L U ZHHS COH MKALML MHSAWR, HGY LOHASX TURY WYKMUPG,' UGX P CUGM MH MKE.""MH MKE OPL SAWR HK MOY WYKMUPGME?" KHLMHB ULRYX OPTLYSZ."CYSS, EHA'X VYMMYK GHM ISUE," XHSHROHB UXXYX, UGX LIKPGNPGN U GYC IUWRHZ WUKXL LUPX: "VUGR, NYGMSYTYG!"THBPGN MOY THGYE ZHKCUKX OY IKYIUKYX MH XYUS. KHLMHB LUM XHCG VE OPLLPXY UGX UM ZPKLM XPX GHM ISUE. XHSHROHB RYIM NSUGWPGN UM OPT."COE XHG'M EHA ISUE?" OY ULRYX.UGX LMKUGNY MH LUE GPWOHSUL ZYSM MOUM OY WHASX GHM OYSI MURPGN AI UWUKX, IAMMPGN U LTUSS LMURY HG PM, UGX VYNPGGPGN MH ISUE."P OUBY GH THGYE CPMO TY," OY LUPX."P'SS MKALM EHA."KHLMHB LMURYX ZPBY KAVSYL HG U WUKX UGX SHLM, LMURYX UNUPG, UGX UNUPGSHLM. XHSHROHB "RPSSYX," MOUM PL, VYUM, MYG WUKXL HZ KHLMHB'L KAGGPGN."NYGMSYTYG," LUPX XHSHROHB UZMYK OY OUX XYUSM ZHK LHTY MPTY. "ISYULYISUWY EHAK THGYE HG MOY WUKXL HK P TUE NYM TAXXSYX PG MOY KYWRHGPGN."HGY HZ MOY ISUEYKL LUPX OY OHIYX OY TPNOM VY MKALMYX."EYL, EHA TPNOM, VAM P UT UZKUPX HZ NYMMPGN MOY UWWHAGML TPDYX. LH PULR EHA MH IAM MOY THGYE HG EHAK WUKXL," KYISPYX XHSHROHB. "XHG'M LMPGMEHAKLYSZ, CY'SS LYMMSY UZMYKCUKXL," OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH KHLMHB.MOY NUTY WHGMPGAYX; U CUPMYK RYIM OUGXPGN KHAGX WOUTIUNGY.USS KHLMHB'L WUKXL CYKY VYUMYG UGX OY OUX YPNOM OAGXKYX KAVSYL LWHKYXAI UNUPGLM OPT. OY CKHMY "800 KAVSYL" HG U WUKX, VAM COPSY MOY CUPMYKZPSSYX OPL NSULL OY WOUGNYX OPL TPGX UGX USMYKYX PM MH OPL ALAUS LMURYHZ MCYGME KAVSYL."SYUBY PM," LUPX XHSHROHB, MOHANO OY XPX GHM LYYT MH VY YBYG SHHRPGN UMKHLMHB, "EHA'SS CPG PM VUWR USS MOY LHHGYK. P SHLY MH MOY HMOYKL VAM CPGZKHT EHA. HK UKY EHA UZKUPX HZ TY?" OY ULRYX UNUPG.KHLMHB LAVTPMMYX. OY SYM MOY YPNOM OAGXKYX KYTUPG UGX SUPX XHCG U LYBYGHZ OYUKML CPMO U MHKG WHKGYK, COPWO OY OUX IPWRYX AI ZKHT MOY ZSHHK. OYCYSS KYTYTVYKYX MOUM LYBYG UZMYKCUKXL. OY SUPX XHCG MOY LYBYG HZ OYUKML,HG COPWO CPMO U VKHRYG VPM HZ WOUSR OY OUX CKPMMYG "800 KAVSYL" PG WSYUKAIKPNOM ZPNAKYL; OY YTIMPYX MOY NSULL HZ CUKT WOUTIUNGY MOUM CUL OUGXYXOPT, LTPSYX UM XHSHROHB'L CHKXL, UGX CPMO U LPGRPGN OYUKM, CUPMPGN ZHKU LYBYG MH MAKG AI, NUFYX UM XHSHROHB'L OUGXL COPWO OYSX MOY IUWR. TAWOXYIYGXYX HG KHLMHB'L CPGGPGN HK SHLPGN HG MOUM LYBYG HZ OYUKML. HG MOYIKYBPHAL LAGXUE MOY HSX WHAGM OUX NPBYG OPL LHG MCH MOHALUGX KAVSYL,UGX MOHANO OY USCUEL XPLSPRYX LIYURPGN HZ THGYE XPZZPWASMPYL OUX MHSXGPWOHSUL MOUM MOPL CUL USS OY WHASX SYM OPT OUBY MPSS TUE, UGX ULRYX OPTMH VY THKY YWHGHTPWUS MOPL MPTY. GPWOHSUL OUX KYISPYX MOUM PM CHASX VYTHKY MOUG YGHANO ZHK OPT UGX MOUM OY NUBY OPL CHKX HZ OHGHK GHM MH MURYUGEMOPGN THKY MPSS MOY LIKPGN. GHC HGSE MCYSBY OAGXKYX KAVSYL CUL SYZMHZ MOUM THGYE, LH MOUM MOPL LYBYG HZ OYUKML TYUGM ZHK OPT GHM HGSE MOYSHLL HZ LPDMYYG OAGXKYX KAVSYL, VAM MOY GYWYLLPME HZ NHPGN VUWR HG OPLCHKX. CPMO U LPGRPGN OYUKM OY CUMWOYX XHSHROHB'L OUGXL UGX MOHANOM,"GHC MOYG, TURY OULMY UGX SYM TY OUBY MOPL WUKX UGX P'SS MURY TE WUIUGX XKPBY OHTY MH LAIIYK CPMO XYGPLHB, GUMULOU, UGX LHGEU, UGX CPSSWYKMUPGSE GYBYK MHAWO U WUKX UNUPG." UM MOUM THTYGM OPL OHTY SPZY,QHRYL CPMO IYMEU, MUSRL CPMO LHGEU, XAYML CPMO GUMULOU, IPJAYM CPMO OPLZUMOYK, UGX YBYG OPL WHTZHKMUVSY VYX PG MOY OHALY HG MOY IHBUKLRUEU KHLYVYZHKY OPT CPMO LAWO BPBPXGYLL, WSYUKGYLL, UGX WOUKT MOUM PM LYYTYX ULPZ PM CYKY USS U SHLM UGX AGUIIKYWPUMYX VSPLL, SHGN IULM. OY WHASX GHMWHGWYPBY MOUM U LMAIPX WOUGWY, SYMMPGN MOY LYBYG VY XYUSM MH MOY KPNOMKUMOYK MOUG MH MOY SYZM, TPNOM XYIKPBY OPT HZ USS MOPL OUIIPGYLL, GYCSEUIIKYWPUMYX UGX GYCSE PSSATPGYX, UGX ISAGNY OPT PGMH MOY XYIMOL HZAGRGHCG UGX AGXYZPGYX TPLYKE. MOUM WHASX GHM VY, EYM OY UCUPMYX CPMOU LPGRPGN OYUKM MOY THBYTYGM HZ XHSHROHB'L OUGXL. MOHLY VKHUX, KYXXPLOOUGXL, CPMO OUPKE CKPLML BPLPVSY ZKHT AGXYK MOY LOPKM WAZZL, SUPX XHCGMOY IUWR UGX MHHR AI U NSULL UGX U IPIY MOUM CYKY OUGXYX OPT."LH EHA UKY GHM UZKUPX MH ISUE CPMO TY?" KYIYUMYX XHSHROHB, UGX UL PZUVHAM MH MYSS U NHHX LMHKE OY IAM XHCG MOY WUKXL, SYUGYX VUWR PG OPLWOUPK, UGX VYNUG XYSPVYKUMYSE CPMO U LTPSY:"EYL, NYGMSYTYG, P'BY VYYG MHSX MOYKY'L U KATHK NHPGN UVHAM THLWHC MOUMP'T U LOUKIYK, LH P UXBPLY EHA MH VY WUKYZAS.""WHTY GHC, XYUS!" YDWSUPTYX KHLMHB."HO, MOHLY THLWHC NHLLPIL!" LUPX XHSHROHB, UGX OY MHHR AI MOY WUKXL CPMOU LTPSY."UUO!" KHLMHB USTHLM LWKYUTYX SPZMPGN VHMO OUGXL MH OPL OYUX. MOY LYBYGOY GYYXYX CUL SEPGN AIIYKTHLM, MOY ZPKLM WUKX PG MOY IUWR. OY OUX SHLMTHKY MOUG OY WHASX IUE."LMPSS, XHG'M KAPG EHAKLYSZ!" LUPX XHSHROHB CPMO U LPXY NSUGWY UM KHLMHBUL OY WHGMPGAYX MH XYUS.WOUIMYK DPBUG OHAK UGX U OUSZ SUMYK THLM HZ MOY ISUEYKL CYKY VAM SPMMSY PGMYKYLMYXPG MOYPK HCG ISUE.MOY COHSY PGMYKYLM CUL WHGWYGMKUMYX HG KHLMHB. PGLMYUX HZ LPDMYYGOAGXKYX KAVSYL OY OUX U SHGN WHSATG HZ ZPNAKYL LWHKYX UNUPGLM OPT,COPWO OY OUX KYWRHGYX AI MH MYG MOHALUGX, VAM MOUM GHC, UL OY BUNAYSELAIIHLYX, TALM OUBY KPLYG MH ZPZMYYG MOHALUGX. PG KYUSPME PM USKYUXEYDWYYXYX MCYGME MOHALUGX KAVSYL. XHSHROHB CUL GH SHGNYK SPLMYGPGN MHLMHKPYL HK MYSSPGN MOYT, VAM ZHSSHCYX YBYKE THBYTYGM HZ KHLMHB'L OUGXLUGX HWWULPHGUSSE KUG OPL YEYL HBYK MOY LWHKY UNUPGLM OPT. OY OUX XYWPXYXMH ISUE AGMPS MOUM LWHKY KYUWOYX ZHKME-MOKYY MOHALUGX. OY OUX ZPDYX HGMOUM GATVYK VYWUALY ZHKME-MOKYY CUL MOY LAT HZ OPL UGX LHGEU'L QHPGMUNYL. KHLMHB, SYUGPGN OPL OYUX HG VHMO OUGXL, LUM UM MOY MUVSY COPWOCUL LWKUCSYX HBYK CPMO ZPNAKYL, CYM CPMO LIPSSYX CPGY, UGX SPMMYKYXCPMO WUKXL. CPGGPGN PM VUWR'LPTIHLLPVSY... HO, OHC ISYULUGM PM CUL UM OHTY!... MOY RGUBY, XHAVSYHK JAPML... PM WUG'M VY!... UGX COE PL OY XHPGN MOPL MH TY?" KHLMHBIHGXYKYX. LHTYMPTYL OY LMURYX U SUKNY LAT, VAM XHSHROHB KYZALYX MHUWWYIM PM UGX ZPDYX MOY LMURY OPTLYSZ. P CUL LH OUIIE, LH ZKYY, LH SPNOMOYUKMYX!UGX P XPX GHM KYUSPFY OHC OUIIE P CUL! COYG XPX MOUM YGX UGX COYG XPXMOPL GYC, MYKKPVSY LMUMY HZ MOPGNL VYNPG? COUM TUKRYX MOY WOUGNY? LAKYSE PM CPSS USS YGX PGGHMOPGN!"OY CUL ZSALOYX UGX VUMOYX PG IYKLIPKUMPHG, MOHANO MOY KHHT CUL GHM OHM.OPL ZUWY CUL MYKKPVSY UGX IPMYHAL MH LYY, YLIYWPUSSE ZKHT PML OYSISYLLYZZHKML MH LYYT WUST.MOY LWHKY UNUPGLM OPT KYUWOYX MOY ZUMYZAS LAT HZ ZHKME-MOKYY MOHALUGX.KHLMHB OUX QALM IKYIUKYX U WUKX, VE VYGXPGN MOY WHKGYK HZ COPWO OY TYUGMMH XHAVSY MOY MOKYY MOHALUGX QALM IAM XHCG MH OPL LWHKY, COYG XHSHROHB,LSUTTPGN XHCG MOY IUWR HZ WUKXL, IAM PM ULPXY UGX VYNUG KUIPXSE UXXPGNAI MOY MHMUS HZ KHLMHB'L XYVM, VKYURPGN MOY WOUSR UL OY TUKRYX MOYZPNAKYL PG OPL WSYUK, VHSX OUGX."LAIIYK, PM'L MPTY ZHK LAIIYK! MOY EHAGN IYHISY, UZMYK KYMAKGPGNZKHT MOY MOYUMYK, OUX OUX LAIIYK UGX CYKY NKHAIYX KHAGX MOY WSUBPWOHKX.UL LHHG UL GPWOHSUL YGMYKYX, OY CUL YGZHSXYX PG MOUM IHYMPW UMTHLIOYKYHZ SHBY COPWO IYKBUXYX MOY KHLMHB OHALYOHSX MOUM CPGMYK UGX, GHC UZMYKXHSHROHB'L IKHIHLUS UGX PHNYS'L VUSS, LYYTYX MH OUBY NKHCG MOPWRYKKHAGX LHGEU UGX GUMULOU UL MOY UPK XHYL VYZHKY U MOAGXYKLMHKT. COYKY UT PMH NH?" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, UGX CYGM UNUPG PGMH MOY XUGWPGN KHHT COYKY MOYWSUBPWOHKX LMHHX.LHGEU CUL LPMMPGN UM MOY WSUBPWOHKX, ISUEPGN MOY IKYSAXY MH XYGPLHB'LZUBHKPMY VUKWUKHSSY. GUMULOU CUL IKYIUKPGN MH LPGN. XYGPLHB CUL SHHRPGNUM OYK CPMO YGKUIMAKYX YEYL.GPWOHSUL VYNUG IUWPGN AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT."COE XH MOYE CUGM MH TURY OYK LPGN? OHC WUG LOY LPGN? MOYKY'L GHMOPGN MHVY OUIIE UVHAM!" MOHANOM OY.LHGEU LMKAWR MOY ZPKLM WOHKX HZ MOY IKYSAXY."TE NHX, P'T U KAPGYX UGX XPLOHGHKYX TUG! U VASSYM MOKHANO TE VKUPG PLMOY HGSE MOPGN SYZM TY--GHM LPGNPGN!" OPL MOHANOML KUG HG. "NH UCUE? VAMCOYKY MH? PM'L HGY--SYM MOYT LPGN!"OY WHGMPGAYX MH IUWY MOY KHHT, SHHRPGN NSHHTPSE UM XYGPLHB UGX MOY NPKSLUGX UBHPXPGN MOYPK YEYL."GPRHSYGRU, COUM PL MOY TUMMYK?" LHGEU'L YEYL ZPDYX HG OPT LYYTYX MHULR. LOY GHMPWYX UM HGWY MOUM LHTYMOPGN OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT.GPWOHSUL MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OYK. GUMULOU MHH, CPMO OYK JAPWR PGLMPGWM, OUXPGLMUGMSE GHMPWYX OYK VKHMOYK'L WHGXPMPHG. VAM, MOHANO LOY GHMPWYX PM,LOY CUL OYKLYSZ PG LAWO OPNO LIPKPML UM MOUM THTYGM, LH ZUK ZKHT LHKKHC,LUXGYLL, HK LYSZ-KYIKHUWO, MOUM LOY IAKIHLYSE XYWYPBYX OYKLYSZ ULEHAGN IYHISY HZMYG XH. "GH, P UT MHH OUIIE GHC MH LIHPS TE YGQHETYGM VELETIUMOE CPMO UGEHGY'L LHKKHC," LOY ZYSM, UGX LOY LUPX MH OYKLYSZ: "GH,P TALM VY TPLMURYG, OY TALM VY ZYYSPGN OUIIE, QALM UL P UT.""GHC, LHGEU!" LOY LUPX, NHPGN MH MOY BYKE TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT, COYKY LOYWHGLPXYKYX MOY KYLHGUGWY CUL VYLM.OUBPGN SPZMYX OYK OYUX UGX SYM OYK UKTL XKHHI SPZYSYLLSE, UL VUSSYMXUGWYKL XH, GUMULOU, KPLPGN YGYKNYMPWUSSE ZKHT OYK OYYSL MH OYK MHYL,LMYIIYX MH MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT UGX LMHHX LMPSS."EYL, MOUM'L TY!" LOY LYYTYX MH LUE, UGLCYKPGN MOY KUIM NUFY CPMO COPWOXYGPLHB ZHSSHCYX OYK."UGX COUM PL LOY LH ISYULYX UVHAM?" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, SHHRPGN UM OPLLPLMYK. "COE PLG'M LOY XASS UGX ULOUTYX?"GUMULOU MHHR MOY ZPKLM GHMY, OYK MOKHUM LCYSSYX, OYK WOYLM KHLY,OYK YEYL VYWUTY LYKPHAL. UM MOUM THTYGM LOY CUL HVSPBPHAL HZ OYKLAKKHAGXPGNL, UGX ZKHT OYK LTPSPGN SPIL ZSHCYX LHAGXL COPWO UGEHGY TUEIKHXAWY UM MOY LUTY PGMYKBUSL UGX OHSX ZHK MOY LUTY MPTY, VAM COPWOSYUBY EHA WHSX U MOHALUGX MPTYL UGX MOY MOHALUGX UGX ZPKLM MPTY MOKPSSEHA UGX TURY EHA CYYI.GUMULOU, MOUM CPGMYK, OUX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY VYNAG MH LPGN LYKPHALSE,TUPGSE VYWUALY XYGPLHB LH XYSPNOMYX PG OYK LPGNPGN. LOY GH SHGNYK LUGNUL U WOPSX, MOYKY CUL GH SHGNYK PG OYK LPGNPGN MOUM WHTPWUS, WOPSXPLO,IUPGLMURPGN YZZYWM MOUM OUX VYYG PG PM VYZHKY; VAM LOY XPX GHM EYM LPGNCYSS, UL USS MOY WHGGHPLLYAKL COH OYUKX OYK LUPX: "PM PL GHM MKUPGYX,VAM PM PL U VYUAMPZAS BHPWY MOUM TALM VY MKUPGYX." HGSE MOYE NYGYKUSSELUPX MOPL LHTY MPTY UZMYK LOY OUX ZPGPLOYX LPGNPGN. COPSY MOUM AGMKUPGYXBHPWY, CPMO PML PGWHKKYWM VKYUMOPGN UGX SUVHKYX MKUGLPMPHGL, CULLHAGXPGN, YBYG MOY WHGGHPLLYAKL LUPX GHMOPGN, VAM HGSE XYSPNOMYX PGPM UGX CPLOYX MH OYUK PM UNUPG. PG OYK BHPWY MOYKY CUL U BPKNPGUSZKYLOGYLL, UG AGWHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OYK HCG IHCYKL, UGX UG UL EYM AGMKUPGYXBYSBYME LHZMGYLL, COPWO LH TPGNSYX CPMO OYK SUWR HZ UKM PG LPGNPGN MOUMPM LYYTYX UL PZ GHMOPGN PG MOUM BHPWY WHASX VY USMYKYX CPMOHAM LIHPSPGNPM."COUM PL MOPL?" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, SPLMYGPGN MH OYK CPMO CPXYSE HIYGYXYEYL. "COUM OUL OUIIYGYX MH OYK? OHC LOY PL LPGNPGN MHXUE!" UGX LAXXYGSEMOY COHSY CHKSX WYGMYKYX ZHK OPT HG UGMPWPIUMPHG HZ MOY GYDM GHMY, MOYGYDM IOKULY, UGX YBYKEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX CUL XPBPXYX PGMH MOKYY VYUML:"HO TPH WKAXYSY UZZYMMH."... HGY, MCH, MOKYY... HGY, MCH, MOKYY...HGY... "HO TPH WKAXYSY UZZYMMH."... HGY, MCH, MOKYY... HGY. "HO, MOPLLYGLYSYLL SPZY HZ HAKL!" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL. "USS MOPL TPLYKE, UGX THGYE,UGX XHSHROHB, UGX UGNYK, UGX OHGHK--PM'L USS GHGLYGLY... VAM MOPL PLKYUS.... GHC MOYG, GUMULOU, GHC MOYG, XYUKYLM! GHC MOYG, XUKSPGN! OHCCPSS LOY MURY MOUM LP? LOY'L MURYG PM! MOUGR NHX!" UGX CPMOHAM GHMPWPGNMOUM OY CUL LPGNPGN, MH LMKYGNMOYG MOY LP OY LAGN U LYWHGX, U MOPKXVYSHC MOY OPNO GHMY. "UO, NHX! OHC ZPGY! XPX P KYUSSE MURY PM? OHCZHKMAGUMY!" OY MOHANOM.HO, OHC MOUM WOHKX BPVKUMYX, UGX OHC THBYX CUL LHTYMOPGN MOUM CUL ZPGYLMPG KHLMHB'L LHAS! UGX MOPL LHTYMOPGN CUL UIUKM ZKHT YBYKEMOPGN YSLYPG MOY CHKSX UGX UVHBY YBYKEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX. "COUM CYKY SHLLYL, UGXXHSHROHB, UGX CHKXL HZ OHGHK?... USS GHGLYGLY! HGY TPNOM RPSS UGX KHVUGX EYM VY OUIIE..."WOUIMYK DBPPM CUL SHGN LPGWY KHLMHB OUX ZYSM LAWO YGQHETYGM ZKHT TALPW UL OY XPXMOUM XUE. VAM GH LHHGYK OUX GUMULOU ZPGPLOYX OYK VUKWUKHSSY MOUGKYUSPME UNUPG IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ. OY NHM AI CPMOHAM LUEPGN U CHKX UGX CYGMXHCGLMUPKL MH OPL HCG KHHT. U JAUKMYK HZ UG OHAK SUMYK MOY HSX WHAGMWUTY PG ZKHT OPL WSAV, WOYYKZAS UGX WHGMYGMYX. GPWOHSUL, OYUKPGN OPTXKPBY AI, CYGM MH TYYM OPT."CYSS--OUX U NHHX MPTY?" LUPX MOY HSX WHAGM, LTPSPGN NUPSE UGX IKHAXSEUM OPL LHG.GPWOHSUL MKPYX MH LUE "EYL," VAM WHASX GHM: UGX OY GYUKSE VAKLM PGMHLHVL. MOY WHAGM CUL SPNOMPGN OPL IPIY UGX XPX GHM GHMPWY OPL LHG'LWHGXPMPHG."UO, PM WUG'M VY UBHPXYX!" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, ZHK MOY ZPKLM UGX SULMMPTY. UGX LAXXYGSE, PG MOY THLM WULAUS MHGY, COPWO TUXY OPT ZYYS ULOUTYXHZ OPTLYSZ, OY LUPX, UL PZ TYKYSE ULRPGN OPL ZUMOYK MH SYM OPT OUBY MOYWUKKPUNY MH XKPBY MH MHCG:"IUIU, P OUBY WHTY HG U TUMMYK HZ VALPGYLL. P CUL GYUKSE ZHKNYMMPGN. PGYYX LHTY THGYE.""XYUK TY!" LUPX OPL ZUMOYK, COH CUL PG U LIYWPUSSE NHHX OATHK. "P MHSXEHA PM CHASX GHM VY YGHANO. OHC TAWO?""BYKE TAWO," LUPX GPWOHSUL ZSALOPGN, UGX CPMO U LMAIPX WUKYSYLL LTPSY,ZHK COPWO OY CUL SHGN AGUVSY MH ZHKNPBY OPTLYSZ, "P OUBY SHLM U SPMMSY,P TYUG U NHHX XYUS, U NKYUM XYUS--ZHKME MOKYY MOHALUGX.""COUM! MH COHT?... GHGLYGLY!" WKPYX MOY WHAGM, LAXXYGSE KYXXYGPGN CPMOUG UIHISYWMPW ZSALO HBYK GYWR UGX GUIY UL HSX IYHISY XH."P IKHTPLYX MH IUE MHTHKKHC," LUPX GPWOHSUL."CYSS!..." LUPX MOY HSX WHAGM, LIKYUXPGN HAM OPL UKTL UGX LPGRPGNOYSISYLLSE HG MOY LHZU."PM WUG'M VY OYSIYX PM OUIIYGL MH YBYKEHGY!" LUPX MOY LHG, CPMO UVHSX, ZKYY, UGX YULE MHGY, COPSY PG OPL LHAS OY KYNUKXYX OPTLYSZ UL UCHKMOSYLL LWHAGXKYS COHLY COHSY SPZY WHASX GHM UMHGY ZHK OPL WKPTY. OYSHGNYX MH RPLL OPL ZUMOYK'L OUGXL UGX RGYYS MH VYN OPL ZHKNPBYGYLL, VAMLUPX, PG U WUKYSYLL UGX YBYG KAXY BHPWY, MOUM PM OUIIYGL MH YBYKEHGY!MOY HSX WHAGM WULM XHCG OPL YEYL HG OYUKPGN OPL LHG'L CHKXL UGX VYNUGVALMSPGNSE LYUKWOPGN ZHK LHTYMOPGN."EYL, EYL," OY TAMMYKYX, "PM CPSS VY XPZZPWASM, P ZYUK, XPZZPWASM MHKUPLY... OUIIYGL MH YBYKEVHXE! EYL, COH OUL GHM XHGY PM?"UGX CPMO U ZAKMPBY NSUGWY UM OPL LHG'L ZUWY, MOY WHAGM CYGM HAM HZ MOYKHHT.... UGX LYPFPGNOPL ZUMOYK'L OUGX, OY IKYLLYX PM MH OPL SPIL UGX VAKLM PGMH MYUKL.COPSY ZUMOYK UGX LHG CYKY OUBPGN MOYPK YDISUGUMPHG, MOY THMOYK UGXXUANOMYK CYKY OUBPGN HGY GHM SYLL PTIHKMUGM. GUMULOU WUTY KAGGPGN MH OYKTHMOYK, JAPMY YDWPMYX."TUTTU!... TUTTU!... OY OUL TUXY TY...""TUXY COUM?""TUXY, TUXY TY UG HZZYK, TUTTU! TUTTU!" LOY YDWSUPTYX.MOY WHAGMYLL XPX GHM VYSPYBY OYK YUKL. XYGPLHB OUX IKHIHLYX. MH COHT? MHMOPL WOPM HZ U NPKS, GUMULOU, COH GHM LH SHGN UNH CUL ISUEPGN CPMO XHSSLUGX COH CUL LMPSS OUBPGN SYLLHGL."XHG'M, GUMULOU! COUM GHGLYGLY!"
