P UT MYSSPGN EHA MOY ZUWM," LUPX GUMULOU PGXPNGUGMSE."P WHTY MH ULR EHA COUM MH XH, UGX EHA WUSS PM 'GHGLYGLY!'"MOY WHAGMYLL LOKANNYX OYK LOHASXYKL."PZ PM PL MKAY MOUM THGLPYAK XYGPLHB OUL TUXY EHA U IKHIHLUS, MYSS OPTOY PL U ZHHS, MOUM'L USS!""GH, OY'L GHM U ZHHS!" KYISPYX GUMULOU PGXPNGUGMSE UGX LYKPHALSE."CYSS MOYG, COUM XH EHA CUGM? EHA'KY USS PG SHBY GHCUXUEL. CYSS, PZ EHAUKY PG SHBY, TUKKE OPT!" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMO U SUANO HZ UGGHEUGWY."NHHX SAWR MH EHA!""GH, TUTTU, P'T GHM PG SHBY CPMO OPT, P LAIIHLY P'T GHM PG SHBY CPMOOPT.""CYSS MOYG, MYSS OPT LH.""TUTTU, UKY EHA WKHLL? XHG'M VY WKHLL, XYUK! PL PM TE ZUASM?""GH, VAM COUM PL PM, TE XYUK? XH EHA CUGM TY MH NH UGX MYSS OPT?" LUPXMOY WHAGMYLL LTPSPGN."GH, P CPSS XH PM TELYSZ, HGSE MYSS TY COUM MH LUE. PM'L USS BYKE CYSSZHK EHA," LUPX GUMULOU, CPMO U KYLIHGLPBY LTPSY. "EHA LOHASX OUBYLYYG OHC OY LUPX PM! P RGHC OY XPX GHM TYUG MH LUE PM, VAM PM WUTY HAMUWWPXYGMSE.""CYSS, USS MOY LUTY, EHA TALM KYZALY OPT.""GH, P TALMG'M. P UT LH LHKKE ZHK OPT! OY'L LH GPWY.""CYSS MOYG, UWWYIM OPL HZZYK. PM'L OPNO MPTY ZHK EHA MH VY TUKKPYX,"UGLCYKYX MOY WHAGMYLL LOUKISE UGX LUKWULMPWUSSE."GH, TUTTU, VAM P'T LH LHKKE ZHK OPT. P XHG'M RGHC OHC P'T MH LUE PM.""UGX MOYKY'L GHMOPGN ZHK EHA MH LUE. P LOUSS LIYUR MH OPT TELYSZ," LUPXMOY WHAGMYLL, PGXPNGUGM MOUM MOYE LOHASX OUBY XUKYX MH MKYUM MOPL SPMMSYGUMULOU UL NKHCG AI."GH, GHM HG UGE UWWHAGM! P CPSS MYSS OPT TELYSZ, UGX EHA'SS SPLMYG UMMOY XHHK," UGX GUMULOU KUG UWKHLL MOY XKUCPGN KHHT MH MOY XUGWPGN OUSS,COYKY XYGPLHB CUL LPMMPGN HG MOY LUTY WOUPK VE MOY WSUBPWOHKX CPMO OPLZUWY PG OPL OUGXL.OY QATIYX AI UM MOY LHAGX HZ OYK SPNOM LMYI."GUMUSE," OY LUPX, THBPGN CPMO KUIPX LMYIL MHCUKX OYK, "XYWPXY TE ZUMY.PM PL PG EHAK OUGXL.""BULPSP XTPMKPWO, P'T LH LHKKE ZHK EHA!... GH, VAM EHA UKY LH GPWY...VAM PM CHG'M XH...GHM MOUM... VAM UL U ZKPYGX, P LOUSS USCUEL SHBY EHA."XYGPLHB VYGM HBYK OYK OUGX UGX LOY OYUKX LMKUGNY LHAGXL LOY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX. LOY RPLLYX OPL KHANO WAKSE VSUWR OYUX. UM MOPL PGLMUGM, MOYEOYUKX MOY JAPWR KALMSY HZ MOY WHAGMYLL' XKYLL. LOY WUTY AI MH MOYT."BULPSP XTPMKPWO, P MOUGR EHA ZHK MOY OHGHK," LOY LUPX, CPMO UGYTVUKKULLYX BHPWY, MOHANO PM LHAGXYX LYBYKY MH XYGPLHB--"VAM TE XUANOMYKPL LH EHAGN, UGX P MOHANOM MOUM, UL TE LHG'L ZKPYGX, EHA CHASX OUBYUXXKYLLYX EHAKLYSZ ZPKLM MH TY. PG MOUM WULY EHA CHASX GHM OUBY HVSPNYXTY MH NPBY MOPL KYZALUS.""WHAGMYLL..." LUPX XYGPLHB, CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL UGX U NAPSME ZUWY. OYMKPYX MH LUE THKY, VAM ZUSMYKYX.GUMULOU WHASX GHM KYTUPG WUST, LYYPGN OPT PG LAWO U ISPNOM. LOY VYNUG MHLHV USHAX."WHAGMYLL, P OUBY XHGY C'HGN," XYGPLHB CYGM HG PG UG AGLMYUXE BHPWY,"VAM VYSPYBY TY, P LH UXHKY EHAK XUANOMYK UGX USS EHAK ZUTPSE MOUM PCHASX NPBY TE SPZY MCPWY HBYK..." OY SHHRYX UM MOY WHAGMYLL, UGX LYYPGNOYK LYBYKY ZUWY LUPX: "CYSS, NHHX-VE, WHAGMYLL," UGX RPLLPGN OYKOUGX, OY SYZM MOY KHHT CPMO JAPWR KYLHSAMY LMKPXYL, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UMGUMULOU.GYDM XUE KHLMHB LUC XYGPLHB HZZ. OY XPX GHM CPLO MH LMUE UGHMOYK XUE PGTHLWHC. USS XYGPLHB'L THLWHC ZKPYGXL NUBY OPT U ZUKYCYSS YGMYKMUPGTYGMUM MOY NEILPYL', CPMO MOY KYLASM MOUM OY OUX GH KYWHSSYWMPHG HZ OHC OYCUL IAM PG MOY LSYPNO HK HZ MOY ZPKLM MOKYY LMUNYL HZ OPL QHAKGYE.UZMYK XYGPLHB'L XYIUKMAKY, KHLMHB LIYGM UGHMOYK ZHKMGPNOM PG THLWHC,CPMOHAM NHPGN HAM HZ MOY OHALY, CUPMPGN ZHK MOY THGYE OPL ZUMOYK WHASXGHM UM HGWY KUPLY, UGX OY LIYGM THLM HZ OPL MPTY PG MOY NPKSL' KHHT.LHGEU CUL THKY MYGXYK UGX XYBHMYX MH OPT MOUG YBYK. PM CUL UL PZ LOYCUGMYX MH LOHC OPT MOUM OPL SHLLYL CYKY UG UWOPYBYTYGM MOUM TUXY OYKSHBY OPT USS MOY THKY, VAM GPWOHSUL GHC WHGLPXYKYX OPTLYSZ AGCHKMOE HZOYK.OY ZPSSYX MOY NPKSL' USVATL CPMO BYKLYL UGX TALPW, UGX OUBPGN UM SULMLYGM XHSHROHB MOY COHSY ZHKME-MOKYY MOHALUGX KAVSYL UGX KYWYPBYX OPLKYWYPIM, OY SYZM UM MOY YGX HZ GHBYTVYK, CPMOHAM MURPGN SYUBY HZ UGE HZOPL UWJAUPGMUGWYL, MH HBYKMURY OPL KYNPTYGM COPWO CUL USKYUXE PG IHSUGX.VHHR ZPBY: 1806 - 07WOUIMYK PUZMYK OPL PGMYKBPYC CPMO OPL CPZY IPYKKY SYZM ZHK IYMYKLVAKN. UM MOYMHKFOHR IHLM LMUMPHG, YPMOYK MOYKY CYKY GH OHKLYL HK MOY IHLMTULMYKCHASX GHM LAIISE MOYT. IPYKKY CUL HVSPNYX MH CUPM. CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN,OY SUE XHCG HG MOY SYUMOYK LHZU PG ZKHGM HZ U KHAGX MUVSY, IAM OPL VPNZYYM PG MOYPK HBYKVHHML HG MOY MUVSY, UGX VYNUG MH KYZSYWM."CPSS EHA OUBY MOY IHKMTUGMYUAL VKHANOM PG? UGX U VYX NHM KYUXE, UGXMYU?" ULRYX OPL BUSYM.IPYKKY NUBY GH UGLCYK, ZHK OY GYPMOYK OYUKX GHK LUC UGEMOPGN. OY OUXVYNAG MH MOPGR HZ MOY SULM LMUMPHG UGX CUL LMPSS IHGXYKPGN HG MOY LUTYJAYLMPHG--HGY LH PTIHKMUGM MOUM OY MHHR GH GHMPWY HZ COUM CYGM HG UKHAGXOPT. GHM HGSE CUL OY PGXPZZYKYGM UL MH COYMOYK OY NHM MH IYMYKLVAKNYUKSPYK HK SUMYK, HK COYMOYK OY LYWAKYX UWWHTTHXUMPHG UM MOPL LMUMPHG,VAM WHTIUKYX MH MOY MOHANOML MOUM GHC HWWAIPYX OPT PM CUL U TUMMYK HZPGXPZZYKYGWY COYMOYK OY KYTUPGYX MOYKY ZHK U ZYC OHAKL HK ZHK MOY KYLMHZ OPL SPZY.MOY IHLMTULMYK, OPL CPZY, MOY BUSYM, UGX U IYULUGM CHTUG LYSSPGN MHKFOHRYTVKHPXYKE WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT HZZYKPGN MOYPK LYKBPWYL. CPMOHAM WOUGNPGNOPL WUKYSYLL UMMPMAXY, IPYKKY SHHRYX UM MOYT HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL AGUVSYMH AGXYKLMUGX COUM MOYE CUGMYX HK OHC MOYE WHASX NH HG SPBPGN CPMOHAMOUBPGN LHSBYX MOY IKHVSYTL MOUM LH UVLHKVYX OPT. OY OUX VYYG YGNKHLLYXVE MOY LUTY MOHANOML YBYK LPGWY MOY XUE OY KYMAKGYX ZKHT LHRHSGPRP UZMYKMOY XAYS UGX OUX LIYGM MOUM ZPKLM UNHGPFPGN, LSYYISYLL GPNOM. VAM GHC,PG MOY LHSPMAXY HZ MOY QHAKGYE, MOYE LYPFYX OPT CPMO LIYWPUS ZHKWY. GHTUMMYK COUM OY MOHANOM UVHAM, OY USCUEL KYMAKGYX MH MOYLY LUTY JAYLMPHGLCOPWO OY WHASX GHM LHSBY UGX EYM WHASX GHM WYULY MH ULR OPTLYSZ. PM CULUL PZ MOY MOKYUX HZ MOY WOPYZ LWKYC COPWO OYSX OPL SPZY MHNYMOYK CYKYLMKPIIYX, LH MOUM MOY LWKYC WHASX GHM NYM PG HK HAM, VAM CYGM HG MAKGPGNALYSYLLSE PG MOY LUTY ISUWY.MOY IHLMTULMYK WUTY PG UGX VYNUG HVLYJAPHALSE MH VYN OPL YDWYSSYGWE MHCUPM HGSE MCH OHAKL, COYG, WHTY COUM TPNOM, OY CHASX SYM OPL YDWYSSYGWEOUBY MOY WHAKPYK OHKLYL. PM CUL ISUPG MOUM OY CUL SEPGN UGX HGSE CUGMYXMH NYM THKY THGYE ZKHT MOY MKUBYSYK."PL MOPL NHHX HK VUX?" IPYKKY ULRYX OPTLYSZ. "PM PL NHHX ZHK TY, VUXZHK UGHMOYK MKUBYSYK, UGX ZHK OPTLYSZ PM'L AGUBHPXUVSY, VYWUALY OY GYYXLTHGYE ZHK ZHHX; MOY TUG LUPX UG HZZPWYK OUX HGWY NPBYG OPT U MOKULOPGNZHK SYMMPGN U IKPBUMY MKUBYSYK OUBY MOY WHAKPYK OHKLYL. VAM MOY HZZPWYKMOKULOYX OPT VYWUALY OY OUX MH NYM HG UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY. UGX P,"WHGMPGAYX IPYKKY, "LOHM XHSHROHB VYWUALY P WHGLPXYKYX TELYSZ PGQAKYX,UGX SHAPL DBP CUL YDYWAMYX VYWUALY MOYE WHGLPXYKYX OPT U WKPTPGUS, UGXU EYUK SUMYK MOYE YDYWAMYX MOHLY COH YDYWAMYX OPT--USLH ZHK LHTY KYULHG.COUM PL VUX? COUM PL NHHX? COUM LOHASX HGY SHBY UGX COUM OUMY? COUM XHYLHGY SPBY ZHK? UGX COUM UT P? COUM PL SPZY, UGX COUM PL XYUMO? COUM IHCYKNHBYKGL USS?"MOYKY CUL GH UGLCYK MH UGE HZ MOYLY JAYLMPHGL, YDWYIM HGY, UGX MOUM GHMU SHNPWUS UGLCYK UGX GHM UM USS U KYISE MH MOYT. MOY UGLCYK CUL: "EHA'SSXPY UGX USS CPSS YGX. EHA'SS XPY UGX RGHC USS, HK WYULY ULRPGN." VAMXEPGN CUL USLH XKYUXZAS.MOY MHKFOHR IYXXSYK CHTUG, PG U COPGPGN BHPWY, CYGM HG HZZYKPGN OYKCUKYL, YLIYWPUSSE U IUPK HZ NHUMLRPG LSPIIYKL. "P OUBY OAGXKYXL HZKAVSYL P XHG'M RGHC COUM MH XH CPMO, UGX LOY LMUGXL PG OYK MUMMYKYXWSHUR SHHRPGN MPTPXSE UM TY," OY MOHANOM. "UGX COUM XHYL LOY CUGM MOYTHGYE ZHK? UL PZ MOUM THGYE WHASX UXX U OUPK'L VKYUXMO MH OUIIPGYLL HKIYUWY HZ TPGX. WUG UGEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX TURY OYK HK TY SYLL U IKYEMH YBPS UGX XYUMO?--XYUMO COPWO YGXL USS UGX TALM WHTY MHXUE HKMHTHKKHC--UM UGE KUMY, PG UG PGLMUGM UL WHTIUKYX CPMO YMYKGPME." UGXUNUPG OY MCPLMYX MOY LWKYC CPMO MOY LMKPIIYX MOKYUX, UGX UNUPG PM MAKGYXALYSYLLSE PG MOY LUTY ISUWY.OPL LYKBUGM OUGXYX OPT U OUSZ-WAM GHBYS, PG MOY ZHKT HZ SYMMYKL, VETUXUTY XY LHAFU. OY VYNUG KYUXPGN UVHAM MOY LAZZYKPGNL UGX BPKMAHALLMKANNSYL HZ U WYKMUPG YTPSPY XY TUGLZYSX. "UGX COE XPX LOY KYLPLM OYKLYXAWYK COYG LOY SHBYX OPT?" OY MOHANOM. "NHX WHASX GHM OUBY IAM PGMHOYK OYUKM UG PTIASLY MOUM CUL UNUPGLM OPL CPSS. TE CPZY--UL LOY HGWYCUL--XPX GHM LMKANNSY, UGX IYKOUIL LOY CUL KPNOM. GHMOPGN OUL VYYG ZHAGXHAM, GHMOPGN XPLWHBYKYX," IPYKKY UNUPG LUPX MH OPTLYSZ. "USS CY WUG RGHCPL MOUM CY RGHC GHMOPGN. UGX MOUM'L MOY OYPNOM HZ OATUG CPLXHT."YBYKEMOPGN CPMOPG UGX UKHAGX OPT LYYTYX WHGZALYX, LYGLYSYLL, UGXKYIYSSYGM. EYM PG MOPL BYKE KYIANGUGWY MH USS OPL WPKWATLMUGWYL IPYKKYZHAGX U RPGX HZ MUGMUSPFPGN LUMPLZUWMPHG."P TURY VHSX MH ULR EHAK YDWYSSYGWE MH THBY U SPMMSY ZHK MOPLNYGMSYTUG," LUPX MOY IHLMTULMYK, YGMYKPGN MOY KHHT ZHSSHCYX VE UGHMOYKMKUBYSYK, USLH XYMUPGYX ZHK SUWR HZ OHKLYL.MOY GYCWHTYK CUL U LOHKM, SUKNY-VHGYX, EYSSHC-ZUWYX, CKPGRSYX HSXTUG, CPMO NKUE VALOE YEYVKHCL HBYKOUGNPGN VKPNOM YEYL HZ UG PGXYZPGPMYNKUEPLO WHSHK.IPYKKY MHHR OPL ZYYM HZZ MOY MUVSY, LMHHX AI, UGX SUE XHCG HG U VYX MOUMOUX VYYG NHM KYUXE ZHK OPT, NSUGWPGN GHC UGX MOYG UM MOY GYCWHTYK, COH,CPMO U NSHHTE UGX MPKYX ZUWY, CUL CYUKPSE MURPGN HZZ OPL CKUIL CPMO MOYUPX HZ OPL LYKBUGM, UGX GHM SHHRPGN UM IPYKKY. CPMO U IUPK HZ ZYSM VHHMLHG OPL MOPG VHGE SYNL, UGX RYYIPGN HG U CHKG, GUGRYYG-WHBYKYX, LOYYILRPGWHUM, MOY MKUBYSYK LUM XHCG HG MOY LHZU, SYUGYX VUWR OPL VPN OYUX CPMOPML VKHUX MYTISYL UGX WSHLY-WKHIIYX OUPK, UGX SHHRYX UM VYFAROHB. MOYLMYKG, LOKYCX, UGX IYGYMKUMPGN YDIKYLLPHG HZ MOUM SHHR LMKAWR IPYKKY. OYZYSM U CPLO MH LIYUR MH MOY LMKUGNYK, VAM VE MOY MPTY OY OUX TUXY AI OPLTPGX MH ULR OPT U JAYLMPHG UVHAM MOY KHUXL, MOY MKUBYSYK OUX WSHLYX OPLYEYL. OPL LOKPBYSYX HSX OUGXL CYKY ZHSXYX UGX HG MOY ZPGNYK HZ HGY HZMOYT IPYKKY GHMPWYX U SUKNY WULM PKHG KPGN CPMO U LYUS KYIKYLYGMPGN UXYUMO'L OYUX. MOY LMKUGNYK LUM CPMOHAM LMPKKPGN, YPMOYK KYLMPGN HK, ULPM LYYTYX MH IPYKKY, LAGR PG IKHZHAGX UGX WUST TYXPMUMPHG. OPL LYKBUGMCUL USLH U EYSSHC, CKPGRSYX HSX TUG, CPMOHAM VYUKX HK TALMUWOY,YBPXYGMSE GHM VYWUALY OY CUL LOUBYG VAM VYWUALY MOYE OUX GYBYK NKHCG.MOPL UWMPBY HSX LYKBUGM CUL AGIUWRPGN MOY MKUBYSYK'L WUGMYYG UGXIKYIUKPGN MYU. OY VKHANOM PG U VHPSPGN LUTHBUK. COYG YBYKEMOPGN CULKYUXE, MOY LMKUGNYK HIYGYX OPL YEYL, THBYX MH MOY MUVSY, ZPSSYX UMATVSYK CPMO MYU ZHK OPTLYSZ UGX HGY ZHK MOY VYUKXSYLL HSX TUG MH COHTOY IULLYX PM. IPYKKY VYNUG MH ZYYS U LYGLY HZ AGYULPGYLL, UGX MOYGYYX, YBYG MOY PGYBPMUVPSPME, HZ YGMYKPGN PGMH WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO MOPLLMKUGNYK.MOY LYKBUGM VKHANOM VUWR OPL MATVSYK MAKGYX AILPXY XHCG, * CPMO UGAGZPGPLOYX VPM HZ GPVVSYX LANUK, UGX ULRYX PZ UGEMOPGN THKY CHASX VYCUGMYX.    * MH PGXPWUMY OY XPX GHM CUGM THKY MYU."GH. NPBY TY MOY VHHR," LUPX MOY LMKUGNYK.MOY LYKBUGM OUGXYX OPT U VHHR COPWO IPYKKY MHHR MH VY U XYBHMPHGUS CHKR,UGX MOY MKUBYSYK VYWUTY UVLHKVYX PG PM. IPYKKY SHHRYX UM OPT. USS UMHGWY MOY LMKUGNYK WSHLYX MOY VHHR, IAMMPGN PG U TUKRYK, UGX UNUPG,SYUGPGN CPMO OPL UKTL HG MOY VUWR HZ MOY LHZU, LUM PG OPL ZHKTYKIHLPMPHG CPMO OPL YEYL LOAM. IPYKKY SHHRYX UM OPT UGX OUX GHM MPTYMH MAKG UCUE COYG MOY HSX TUG, HIYGPGN OPL YEYL, ZPDYX OPL LMYUXE UGXLYBYKY NUFY LMKUPNOM HG IPYKKY'L ZUWY.IPYKKY ZYSM WHGZALYX UGX CPLOYX MH UBHPX MOUM SHHR, VAM MOY VKPNOM HSXYEYL UMMKUWMYX OPT PKKYLPLMPVSE.WOUIMYK PP"P OUBY MOY ISYULAKY HZ UXXKYLLPGN WHAGM VYFAROHB, PZ P UT GHMTPLMURYG," LUPX MOY LMKUGNYK PG U XYSPVYKUMY UGX SHAX BHPWY.IPYKKY SHHRYX LPSYGMSE UGX PGJAPKPGNSE UM OPT HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL."P OUBY OYUKX HZ EHA, TE XYUK LPK," WHGMPGAYX MOY LMKUGNYK, "UGX HZ EHAKTPLZHKMAGY." OY LYYTYX MH YTIOULPFY MOY SULM CHKX, UL PZ MH LUE--"EYL,TPLZHKMAGY! WUSS PM COUM EHA ISYULY, P RGHC MOUM COUM OUIIYGYX MH EHA PGTHLWHC CUL U TPLZHKMAGY."--"P KYNKYM PM BYKE TAWO, TE XYUK LPK."IPYKKY ZSALOYX UGX, OAKKPYXSE IAMMPGN OPL SYNL XHCG ZKHT MOY VYX, VYGMZHKCUKX MHCUKX MOY HSX TUG CPMO U ZHKWYX UGX MPTPX LTPSY."P OUBY GHM KYZYKKYX MH MOPL HAM HZ WAKPHLPME, TE XYUK LPK, VAM ZHKNKYUMYK KYULHGL."OY IUALYX, OPL NUFY LMPSS HG IPYKKY, UGX THBYX ULPXY HG MOY LHZU VE CUEHZ PGBPMPGN MOY HMOYK MH MURY U LYUM VYLPXY OPT. IPYKKY ZYSM KYSAWMUGMMH YGMYK PGMH WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO MOPL HSX TUG, VAM, LAVTPMMPGN MH OPTPGBHSAGMUKPSE, WUTY AI UGX LUM XHCG VYLPXY OPT."EHA UKY AGOUIIE, TE XYUK LPK," MOY LMKUGNYK WHGMPGAYX. "EHA UKY EHAGNUGX P UT HSX. P LOHASX SPRY MH OYSI EHA UL ZUK UL SPYL PG TE IHCYK.""HO, EYL!" LUPX IPYKKY, CPMO U ZHKWYX LTPSY. "P UT BYKE NKUMYZAS MH EHA.COYKY UKY EHA MKUBYSPGN ZKHT?"MOY LMKUGNYK'L ZUWY CUL GHM NYGPUS, PM CUL YBYG WHSX UGX LYBYKY, VAMPG LIPMY HZ MOPL, VHMO MOY ZUWY UGX CHKXL HZ OPL GYC UWJAUPGMUGWY CYKYPKKYLPLMPVSE UMMKUWMPBY MH IPYKKY."VAM PZ ZHK KYULHG EHA XHG'M ZYYS PGWSPGYX MH MUSR MH TY," LUPX MOY HSXTUG, "LUE LH, TE XYUK LPK." UGX OY LAXXYGSE LTPSYX, PG UG AGYDIYWMYX UGXMYGXYKSE IUMYKGUS CUE."HO GH, GHM UM USS! HG MOY WHGMKUKE, P UT BYKE NSUX MH TURY EHAKUWJAUPGMUGWY," LUPX IPYKKY. UGX UNUPG, NSUGWPGN UM MOY LMKUGNYK'L OUGXL,OY SHHRYX THKY WSHLYSE UM MOY KPGN, CPMO PML LRASS--U TULHGPW LPNG."USSHC TY MH ULR," OY LUPX, "UKY EHA U TULHG?""EYL, P VYSHGN MH MOY VKHMOYKOHHX HZ MOY ZKYYTULHGL," LUPX MOY LMKUGNYK,SHHRPGN XYYIYK UGX XYYIYK PGMH IPYKKY'L YEYL. "UGX PG MOYPK GUTY UGX TEHCG P OHSX HAM U VKHMOYKSE OUGX MH EHA.""P UT UZKUPX," LUPX IPYKKY, LTPSPGN, UGX CUBYKPGN VYMCYYG MOY WHGZPXYGWYMOY IYKLHGUSPME HZ MOY ZKYYTULHG PGLIPKYX PG OPT UGX OPL HCG OUVPMHZ KPXPWASPGN MOY TULHGPW VYSPYZL--"P UT UZKUPX P UT BYKE ZUK ZKHTAGXYKLMUGXPGN--OHC UT P MH IAM PM?--P UT UZKUPX TE CUE HZ SHHRPGN UM MOYCHKSX PL LH HIIHLYX MH EHAKL MOUM CY LOUSS GHM AGXYKLMUGX HGY UGHMOYK.""P RGHC EHAK HAMSHHR," LUPX MOY TULHG, "UGX MOY BPYC HZ SPZY EHATYGMPHG, UGX COPWO EHA MOPGR PL MOY KYLASM HZ EHAK HCG TYGMUS YZZHKML,PL MOY HGY OYSX VE MOY TUQHKPME HZ IYHISY, UGX PL MOY PGBUKPUVSY ZKAPMHZ IKPXY, PGXHSYGWY, UGX PNGHKUGWY. EHAK BPYC HZ SPZY PL UKYNKYMMUVSY XYSALPHG.""QALM UL P TUE LAIIHLY EHA MH VY XYSAXYX," LUPX IPYKKY, CPMO U ZUPGMLTPSY."P LOHASX GYBYK XUKY MH LUE MOUM P RGHC MOY MKAMO," LUPX MOY TULHG,COHLY CHKXL LMKAWR IPYKKY THKY UGX THKY VE MOYPK IKYWPLPHG UGX ZPKTGYLL."GH HGY WUG UMMUPG MH MKAMO VE OPTLYSZ. HGSE VE SUEPGN LMHGY HG LMHGYCPMO MOY WHHIYKUMPHG HZ USS, VE MOY TPSSPHGL HZ NYGYKUMPHGL ZKHT HAKZHKYZUMOYK UXUT MH HAK HCG MPTYL, PL MOUM MYTISY KYUKYX COPWO PL MH VY UCHKMOE XCYSSPGN ISUWY HZ MOY NKYUM NHX," OY UXXYX, UGX WSHLYX OPL YEYL."P HANOM MH MYSS EHA MOUM P XH GHM VYSPYBY... XH GHM VYSPYBY PG NHX,"LUPX IPYKKY, KYNKYMZASSE UGX CPMO UG YZZHKM, ZYYSPGN PM YLLYGMPUS MHLIYUR MOY COHSY MKAMO.MOY TULHG SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM IPYKKY UGX LTPSYX UL U KPWO TUG CPMOTPSSPHGL PG OUGX TPNOM LTPSY UM U IHHK ZYSSHC COH MHSX OPT MOUM OY, IHHKTUG, OUX GHM MOY ZPBY KAVSYL MOUM CHASX TURY OPT OUIIE."EYL, EHA XH GHM RGHC OPT, TE XYUK LPK," LUPX MOY TULHG. "EHA WUGGHMRGHC OPT. EHA XH GHM RGHC OPT UGX MOUM PL COE EHA UKY AGOUIIE.""EYL, EYL, P UT AGOUIIE," ULLYGMYX IPYKKY. "VAM COUM UT P MH XH?""EHA RGHC OPT GHM, TE XYUK LPK, UGX LH EHA UKY BYKE AGOUIIE. EHA XH GHMRGHC OPT, VAM OY PL OYKY, OY PL PG TY, OY PL PG TE CHKXL, OY PL PG MOYY,UGX YBYG PG MOHLY VSULIOYTHAL CHKXL MOHA OULM QALM AMMYKYX!" IKHGHAGWYXMOY TULHG PG U LMYKG UGX MKYTASHAL BHPWY.OY IUALYX UGX LPNOYX, YBPXYGMSE MKEPGN MH WUST OPTLYSZ."PZ OY CYKY GHM," OY LUPX JAPYMSE, "EHA UGX P CHASX GHM VY LIYURPGNHZ OPT, TE XYUK LPK. HZ COUM, HZ COHT, UKY CY LIYURPGN? COHT OULM MOHAXYGPYX?" OY LAXXYGSE ULRYX CPMO YDASMPGN UALMYKPME UGX UAMOHKPME PGOPL BHPWY. "COH PGBYGMYX OPT, PZ OY XPX GHM YDPLM? COYGWY WUTY MOEWHGWYIMPHG HZ MOY YDPLMYGWY HZ LAWO UG PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY VYPGN? XPXLMMOHA, UGX COE XPX MOY COHSY CHKSX, WHGWYPBY MOY PXYU HZ MOY YDPLMYGWYHZ LAWO UG PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY VYPGN, U VYPGN USS-IHCYKZAS, YMYKGUS, UGXPGZPGPMY PG USS OPL UMMKPVAMYL?..."OY LMHIIYX UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM ZHK U SHGN MPTY.IPYKKY WHASX GHM UGX XPX GHM CPLO MH VKYUR MOPL LPSYGWY."OY YDPLML, VAM MH AGXYKLMUGX OPT PL OUKX," MOY TULHG VYNUG UNUPG,SHHRPGN GHM UM IPYKKY VAM LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OPT, UGX MAKGPGN MOY SYUBYLHZ OPL VHHR CPMO OPL HSX OUGXL COPWO ZKHT YDWPMYTYGM OY WHASX GHM RYYILMPSS. "PZ PM CYKY U TUG COHLY YDPLMYGWY MOHA XPXLM XHAVM P WHASX VKPGNOPT MH MOYY, WHASX MURY OPT VE MOY OUGX UGX LOHC OPT MH MOYY. VAM OHCWUG P, UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM THKMUS, LOHC OPL HTGPIHMYGWY, OPL PGZPGPME, UGXUSS OPL TYKWE MH HGY COH PL VSPGX, HK COH LOAML OPL YEYL MOUM OY TUE GHMLYY HK AGXYKLMUGX OPT UGX TUE GHM LYY HK AGXYKLMUGX OPL HCG BPSYGYLL UGXLPGZASGYLL?" OY IUALYX UNUPG. "COH UKM MOHA? MOHA XKYUTYLM MOUM MOHA UKMCPLY VYWUALY MOHA WHASXLM AMMYK MOHLY VSULIOYTHAL CHKXL," OY CYGMHG, CPMO U LHTVYK UGX LWHKGZAS LTPSY. "UGX MOHA UKM THKY ZHHSPLO UGXAGKYULHGUVSY MOUG U SPMMSY WOPSX, COH, ISUEPGN CPMO MOY IUKML HZ ULRPSSZASSE TUXY CUMWO, XUKYL MH LUE MOUM, UL OY XHYL GHM AGXYKLMUGXPML ALY, OY XHYL GHM VYSPYBY PG MOY TULMYK COH TUXY PM. MH RGHC OPT PLOUKX.... ZHK UNYL, ZKHT HAK ZHKYZUMOYK UXUT MH HAK HCG XUE, CY SUVHK MHUMMUPG MOUM RGHCSYXNY UGX UKY LMPSS PGZPGPMYSE ZUK ZKHT HAK UPT; VAMPG HAK SUWR HZ AGXYKLMUGXPGN CY LYY HGSE HAK CYURGYLL UGX OPLNKYUMGYLL...."IPYKKY SPLMYGYX CPMO LCYSSPGN OYUKM, NUFPGN PGMH MOY TULHG'L ZUWY CPMOLOPGPGN YEYL, GHM PGMYKKAIMPGN HK JAYLMPHGPGN OPT, VAM VYSPYBPGN CPMOOPL COHSY LHAS COUM MOY LMKUGNYK LUPX. COYMOYK OY UWWYIMYX MOY CPLYKYULHGPGN WHGMUPGYX PG MOY TULHG'L CHKXL, HK VYSPYBYX UL U WOPSXVYSPYBYL, PG MOY LIYURYK'L MHGY HZ WHGBPWMPHG UGX YUKGYLMGYLL, HK MOYMKYTHK HZ MOY LIYURYK'L BHPWY--COPWO LHTYMPTYL USTHLM VKHRY--HK MOHLYVKPSSPUGM UNYX YEYL NKHCG HSX PG MOPL WHGBPWMPHG, HK MOY WUST ZPKTGYLLUGX WYKMUPGME HZ OPL BHWUMPHG, COPWO KUXPUMYX ZKHT OPL COHSY VYPGN (UGXCOPWO LMKAWR IPYKKY YLIYWPUSSE VE WHGMKULM CPMO OPL HCG XYQYWMPHG UGXOHIYSYLLGYLL)--UM UGE KUMY, IPYKKY SHGNYX CPMO OPL COHSY LHAS MH VYSPYBYUGX OY XPX VYSPYBY, UGX ZYSM U QHEZAS LYGLY HZ WHTZHKM, KYNYGYKUMPHG,UGX KYMAKG MH SPZY."OY PL GHM MH VY UIIKYOYGXYX VE KYULHG, VAM VE SPZY," LUPX MOY TULHG."P XH GHM AGXYKLMUGX," LUPX IPYKKY, ZYYSPGN CPMO XPLTUE XHAVMLKYUCURYGPGN. OY CUL UZKUPX HZ UGE CUGM HZ WSYUKGYLL, UGE CYURGYLL, PGMOY TULHG'L UKNATYGML; OY XKYUXYX GHM MH VY UVSY MH VYSPYBY PG OPT."P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX," OY LUPX, "OHC PM PL MOUM MOY TPGX HZ TUG WUGGHMUMMUPG MOY RGHCSYXNY HZ COPWO EHA LIYUR."MOY TULHG LTPSYX CPMO OPL NYGMSY ZUMOYKSE LTPSY."MOY OPNOYLM CPLXHT UGX MKAMO UKY SPRY MOY IAKYLM SPJAPX CY TUE CPLO MHPTVPVY," OY LUPX. "WUG P KYWYPBY MOUM IAKY SPJAPX PGMH UG PTIAKY BYLLYSUGX QAXNY HZ PML IAKPME? MOY OPNOYLM CPLXHT PL HGY. MOYOPNOYLM CPLXHT OUL VAM HGY LWPYGWY--MOY LWPYGWY HZ MOY COHSY--MOYLWPYGWY YDISUPGPGN MOY COHSY WKYUMPHG UGX TUG'L ISUWY PG PM. SHHR UM EHAK SPZY, TE XYUK LPK.OHC OUBY EHA LIYGM PM? PG KPHMHAL HKNPYL UGX XYVUAWOYKE, KYWYPBPGNYBYKEMOPGN ZKHT LHWPYME UGX NPBPGN GHMOPGN PG KYMAKG. EHA OUBY VYWHTYMOY IHLLYLLHK HZ CYUSMO. MOYG EHA TUKKPYX,TE XYUK LPK--MHHR HG EHAKLYSZ KYLIHGLPVPSPME ZHK MOY NAPXUGWY HZ U EHAGNCHTUG; UGX COUM OUBY EHA XHGY? U TUG HZZYGXYX EHA UGX EHA LOHM OPT, UGX EHA LUE EHA XH GHM RGHCNHX UGX OUMY EHAK SPZY. MOYKY PL GHMOPGN LMKUGNY PG MOUM, TE XYUK LPK!"UZMYK MOYLY CHKXL, MOY TULHG, UL PZ MPKYX VE OPL SHGN XPLWHAKLY, UNUPGSYUGYX OPL UKTL HG MOY VUWR HZ MOY LHZU UGX WSHLYX OPL YEYL. IPYKKYSHHRYX UM MOUM UNYX, LMYKG, THMPHGSYLL, USTHLM SPZYSYLL ZUWY UGX THBYXOPL SPIL CPMOHAM AMMYKPGN U LHAGX. OY CPLOYX MH LUE, "EYL, U BPSY, PXSY,BPWPHAL SPZY!" VAM XUKYX GHM VKYUR MOY LPSYGWY.MOY TULHG WSYUKYX OPL MOKHUM OALRPSE, UL HSX TYG XH, UGX WUSSYX OPLLYKBUGM."OHC UVHAM MOY OHKLYL?" "CPSS EHAGHM KYLM OYKY?""GH, MYSS MOYT MH OUKGYLL.""WUG OY KYUSSE VY NHPGN UCUE SYUBPGN TY USHGY CPMOHAM OUBPGN MHSX TYUSS, UGX CPMOHAM IKHTPLPGN MH OYSI TY?" MOHANOM IPYKKY, KPLPGN CPMOXHCGWULM OYUX; UGX OY VYNUG MH IUWY MOY KHHT, NSUGWPGN HWWULPHGUSSE UMMOY TULHG. "EYL, P GYBYK MOHANOM HZ PM, VAM P OUBY SYX U WHGMYTIMPVSYUGX IKHZSPNUMY SPZY, MOHANO P XPX GHM SPRY PM UGX XPX GHM CUGM MH,"MOHANOM IPYKKY. "VAM MOPL TUG RGHCL MOY MKAMO UGX, PZ OY CPLOYX MH,WHASX XPLWSHLY PM MH TY."IPYKKY CPLOYX MH LUE MOPL MH MOY TULHG, VAM XPX GHM XUKY MH. P'T NHPGN MH IYMYKLVAKN," UGLCYKYX IPYKKY, PG U WOPSXSPRY,OYLPMUMPGN BHPWY. "P MOUGR EHA. P UNKYY CPMO USS EHA OUBY LUPX. VAM XHGHM LAIIHLY TY MH VY LH VUX. CPMO TE COHSY LHAS P CPLO MH VY COUM EHACHASX OUBY TY VY, VAM P OUBY GYBYK OUX OYSI ZKHT UGEHGY.... VAM PM PLP, UVHBY USS, COH UT MH VSUTY ZHK YBYKEMOPGN. OYSI TY, MYUWO TY, UGXIYKOUIL P TUE..."IPYKKY WHASX GHM NH HG. OY NASIYX UGX MAKGYX UCUE.MOY TULHG KYTUPGYX LPSYGM ZHK U SHGN MPTY, YBPXYGMSE WHGLPXYKPGN."OYSI WHTYL ZKHT NHX USHGY," OY LUPX, "VAM LAWO TYULAKY HZ OYSI ULHAK HKXYK WUG VYLMHC PM CPSS KYGXYK EHA, TE XYUK LPK. EHA UKY NHPGN MHIYMYKLVAKN. OUGX MOPL MH WHAGM CPSSUKLRP" (OY MHHR HAM OPL GHMYVHHR UGXCKHMY U ZYC CHKXL HG U SUKNY LOYYM HZ IUIYK ZHSXYX PG ZHAK). "USSHC TYMH NPBY EHA U IPYWY HZ UXBPWY. COYG EHA KYUWO MOY WUIPMUS, ZPKLM HZ USSXYBHMY LHTY MPTY MH LHSPMAXY UGX LYSZ-YDUTPGUMPHG UGX XH GHM KYLATY EHAKZHKTYK CUE HZ SPZY. UGX GHC P CPLO EHA U NHHX QHAKGYE, TE XYUK LPK," OYUXXYX, LYYPGN MOUM OPL LYKBUGM OUX YGMYKYX... "UGX LAWWYLL."MOY MKUBYSYK CUL QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO VUFXYYB, UL IPYKKY LUC ZKHT MOYIHLMTULMYK'L VHHR. VUFXYYB OUX VYYG HGY HZ MOY VYLM-RGHCG ZKYYTULHGL UGXTUKMPGPLML, YBYG PG GHBPRHB'L MPTY. ZHK U SHGN COPSY UZMYK OY OUX NHGY,IPYKKY XPX GHM NH MH VYX HK HKXYK OHKLYL VAM IUWYX AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT,IHGXYKPGN HBYK OPL BPWPHAL IULM, UGX CPMO U KUIMAKHAL LYGLY HZ VYNPGGPGNUGYC IPWMAKYX MH OPTLYSZ MOY VSPLLZAS, PKKYIKHUWOUVSY, BPKMAHAL ZAMAKYMOUM LYYTYX MH OPT LH YULE. PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY OUX VYYG BPWPHALHGSE VYWUALY OY OUX LHTYOHC ZHKNHMMYG OHC NHHX PM PL MH VY BPKMAHAL. GHMU MKUWY HZ OPL ZHKTYK XHAVML KYTUPGYX PG OPL LHAS. OY ZPKTSE VYSPYBYXPG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ MOY VKHMOYKOHHX HZ TYG AGPMYX PG MOY UPTHZ LAIIHKMPGN HGY UGHMOYK PG MOY IUMO HZ BPKMAY, UGX MOUM PL OHCZKYYTULHGKE IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OPT.WOUIMYK PPPHG KYUWOPGN IYMYKLVAKN IPYKKY XPX GHM SYM UGEHGY RGHC HZ OPL UKKPBUS, OYCYGM GHCOYKY UGX LIYGM COHSY XUEL PG KYUXPGN MOHTUL U RYTIPL, COHLY VHHROUX VYYG LYGM OPT VE LHTYHGY AGRGHCG. HGY MOPGN OY WHGMPGAUSSE KYUSPFYXUL OY KYUX MOUM VHHR: MOY QHE, OPMOYKMH AGRGHCG MH OPT, HZ VYSPYBPGNPG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ UMMUPGPGN IYKZYWMPHG, UGX PG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZUWMPBY VKHMOYKSE SHBY UTHGN TYG, COPWO QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO OUX KYBYUSYX MHOPT. U CYYR UZMYK OPL UKKPBUS, MOY EHAGN IHSPLO WHAGM, CPSSUKLRP, COHTIPYKKY OUX RGHCG LSPNOMSE PG IYMYKLVAKN LHWPYME, WUTY PGMH OPL KHHTHGY YBYGPGN PG MOY HZZPWPUS UGX WYKYTHGPHAL TUGGYK PG COPWO XHSHROHB'LLYWHGX OUX WUSSYX HG OPT, UGX, OUBPGN WSHLYX MOY XHHK VYOPGX OPT UGXLUMPLZPYX OPTLYSZ MOUM MOYKY CUL GHVHXE YSLY PG MOY KHHT, UXXKYLLYXIPYKKY."P OUBY WHTY MH EHA CPMO U TYLLUNY UGX UG HZZYK, WHAGM," OY LUPX CPMOHAMLPMMPGN XHCG. "U IYKLHG HZ BYKE OPNO LMUGXPGN PG HAK VKHMOYKOHHX OULTUXY UIISPWUMPHG ZHK EHA MH VY KYWYPBYX PGMH HAK HKXYK VYZHKY MOY ALAUSMYKT UGX OUL IKHIHLYX MH TY MH VY EHAK LIHGLHK. P WHGLPXYK PM ULUWKYX XAME MH ZASZPSS MOUM IYKLHG'L CPLOYL. XH EHA CPLO MH YGMYK MOYVKHMOYKOHHX HZ ZKYYTULHGL AGXYK TE LIHGLHKLOPI?"MOY WHSX, UALMYKY MHGY HZ MOPL TUG, COHT OY OUX USTHLM USCUEL VYZHKY TYMUM VUSSL, UTPUVSE LTPSPGN PG MOY LHWPYME HZ MOY THLM VKPSSPUGM CHTYG,LAKIKPLYX IPYKKY."EYL, P XH CPLO PM," LUPX OY.CPSSUKLRP VHCYX OPL OYUX."HGY THKY JAYLMPHG, WHAGM," OY LUPX, "COPWO P VYN EHA MH UGLCYK PGUSS LPGWYKPME--GHM UL U ZAMAKY TULHG VAM UL UG OHGYLM TUG: OUBY EHAKYGHAGWYX EHAK ZHKTYK WHGBPWMPHGL--XH EHA VYSPYBY PG NHX?"IPYKKY WHGLPXYKYX."EYL... EYL, P VYSPYBY PG NHX," OY LUPX."PG MOUM WULY..." VYNUG CPSSUKLRP, VAM IPYKKY PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."EYL, P XH VYSPYBY PG NHX," OY KYIYUMYX."PG MOUM WULY CY WUG NH," LUPX CPSSUKLRP. "TE WUKKPUNY PL UM EHAKLYKBPWY."CPSSUKLRP CUL LPSYGM MOKHANOHAM MOY XKPBY. MH IPYKKY'L PGJAPKPYL UL MHCOUM OY TALM XH UGX OHC OY LOHASX UGLCYK, CPSSUKLRP HGSE KYISPYX MOUMVKHMOYKL THKY CHKMOE MOUG OY CHASX MYLM OPT UGX MOUM IPYKKY OUX HGSE MHMYSS MOY MKAMO.OUBPGN YGMYKYX MOY WHAKMEUKX HZ U SUKNY OHALY COYKY MOY SHXNY OUX PMLOYUXJAUKMYKL, UGX OUBPGN ULWYGXYX U XUKR LMUPKWULY, MOYE YGMYKYX U LTUSSCYSS-SPM UGMYKHHT COYKY MOYE MHHR HZZ MOYPK WSHURL CPMOHAM MOY UPX HZU LYKBUGM. ZKHT MOYKY MOYE IULLYX PGMH UGHMOYK KHHT. U TUG PG LMKUGNYUMMPKY UIIYUKYX UM MOY XHHK. CPSSUKLRP, LMYIIPGN MHCUKX OPT, LUPXLHTYMOPGN MH OPT PG ZKYGWO PG UG AGXYKMHGY UGX MOYG CYGM AI MH U LTUSSCUKXKHVY PG COPWO IPYKKY GHMPWYX NUKTYGML LAWO UL OY OUX GYBYK LYYGVYZHKY. OUBPGN MURYG U RYKWOPYZ ZKHT MOY WAIVHUKX, CPSSUKLRP VHAGXIPYKKY'L YEYL CPMO PM UGX MPYX PM PG U RGHM VYOPGX, WUMWOPGN LHTY OUPKLIUPGZASSE PG MOY RGHM. MOYG OY XKYC OPL ZUWY XHCG, RPLLYX OPT, UGXMURPGN OPT VE MOY OUGX SYX OPT ZHKCUKX. MOY OUPKL MPYX PG MOY RGHM OAKMIPYKKY UGX MOYKY CYKY SPGYL HZ IUPG HG OPL ZUWY UGX U LOUTYZUWYX LTPSY.OPL OANY ZPNAKY, CPMO UKTL OUGNPGN XHCG UGX CPMO U IAWRYKYX, MOHANOLTPSPGN ZUWY, THBYX UZMYK CPSSUKLRP CPMO AGWYKMUPG, MPTPX LMYIL.OUBPGN SYX OPT UVHAM MYG IUWYL, CPSSUKLRP LMHIIYX."COUMYBYK OUIIYGL MH EHA," OY LUPX, "EHA TALM VYUK PM USS TUGZASSEPZ EHA OUBY ZPKTSE KYLHSBYX MH QHPG HAK VKHMOYKOHHX." (IPYKKY GHXXYXUZZPKTUMPBYSE.) "COYG EHA OYUK U RGHWR UM MOY XHHK, EHA CPSS AGWHBYKEHAK YEYL," UXXYX CPSSUKLRP. "P CPLO EHA WHAKUNY UGX LAWWYLL," UGX,IKYLLPGN IPYKKY'L OUGX, OY CYGM HAM.SYZM USHGY, IPYKKY CYGM HG LTPSPGN PG MOY LUTY CUE. HGWY HK MCPWY OYLOKANNYX OPL UGX KUPLYX OPL OUGX MH MOY RYKWOPYZ, UL PZ CPLOPGN MH MURYPM HZZ, VAM SYM PM XKHI UNUPG. MOY ZPBY TPGAMYL LIYGM CPMO OPL YEYLVUGXUNYX LYYTYX MH OPT UG OHAK. OPL UKTL ZYSM GATV, OPL SYNL USTHLM NUBYCUE, PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY CUL MPKYX HAM. OY YDIYKPYGWYX U BUKPYME HZTHLM WHTISYD LYGLUMPHGL. OY ZYSM UZKUPX HZ COUM CHASX OUIIYG MH OPT UGXLMPSS THKY UZKUPX HZ LOHCPGN OPL ZYUK. OY ZYSM WAKPHAL MH RGHC COUM CULNHPGN MH OUIIYG UGX COUM CHASX VY KYBYUSYX MH OPT; VAM THLM HZ USS, OYZYSM QHEZAS MOUM MOY THTYGM OUX WHTY COYG OY CHASX UM SULM LMUKM HG MOUMIUMO HZ KYNYGYKUMPHG UGX HG MOY UWMPBYSE BPKMAHAL SPZY HZ COPWO OY OUXVYYG XKYUTPGN LPGWY OY TYM QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO. SHAX RGHWRL CYKY OYUKX UMMOY XHHK. IPYKKY MHHR MOY VUGXUNY HZZ OPL YEYL UGX NSUGWYX UKHAGX OPT.MOY KHHT CUL PG VSUWR XUKRGYLL, HGSE U LTUSS SUTI CUL VAKGPGN PGLPXYLHTYMOPGN COPMY. IPYKKY CYGM GYUKYK UGX LUC MOUM MOY SUTI LMHHX HG UVSUWR MUVSY HG COPWO SUE UG HIYG VHHR. MOY VHHR CUL MOY NHLIYS, UGX MOYCOPMY MOPGN CPMO MOY SUTI PGLPXY CUL U OATUG LRASS CPMO PML WUBPMPYL UGXMYYMO. UZMYK KYUXPGN MOY ZPKLM CHKXL HZ MOY NHLIYS: "PG MOY VYNPGGPGNCUL MOY CHKX UGX MOY CHKX CUL CPMO NHX," IPYKKY CYGM KHAGX MOY MUVSY UGXLUC U SUKNY HIYG VHD ZPSSYX CPMO LHTYMOPGN. PM CUL U WHZZPG CPMO VHGYLPGLPXY. OY CUL GHM UM USS LAKIKPLYX VE COUM OY LUC. OHIPGN MH YGMYK HGUG YGMPKYSE GYC SPZY JAPMY AGSPRY MOY HSX HGY, OY YDIYWMYX YBYKEMOPGNMH VY AGALAUS, YBYG THKY AGALAUS MOUG COUM OY CUL LYYPGN. U LRASS, UWHZZPG, MOY NHLIYS--PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY OUX YDIYWMYX USS MOPL UGXYBYG THKY. MKEPGN MH LMPTASUMY OPL YTHMPHGL OY SHHRYX UKHAGX. "NHX,XYUMO, SHBY, MOY VKHMOYKOHHX HZ TUG," OY RYIM LUEPGN MH OPTLYSZ,ULLHWPUMPGN MOYLY CHKXL CPMO BUNAY EYM QHEZAS PXYUL. MOY XHHK HIYGYX UGXLHTYHGY WUTY PG.VE MOY XPT SPNOM, MH COPWO IPYKKY OUX USKYUXE VYWHTY UWWALMHTYX, OYLUC U KUMOYK LOHKM TUG. OUBPGN YBPXYGMSE WHTY ZKHT MOY SPNOM PGMH MOYXUKRGYLL, MOY TUG IUALYX, MOYG THBYX CPMO WUAMPHAL LMYIL MHCUKX MOYMUVSY UGX ISUWYX HG PM OPL LTUSS SYUMOYK-NSHBYX OUGXL.MOPL LOHKM TUG OUX HG U COPMY SYUMOYK UIKHG COPWO WHBYKYX OPL WOYLM UGXIUKM HZ OPL SYNL; OY OUX HG U RPGX HZ GYWRSUWY UVHBY COPWO KHLY U OPNOCOPMY KAZZSY, HAMSPGPGN OPL KUMOYK SHGN ZUWY COPWO CUL SPM AI ZKHTVYSHC."ZHK COUM OUBY EHA WHTY OPMOYK?" ULRYX MOY GYCWHTYK, MAKGPGN PG IPYKKY'LXPKYWMPHG UM U LSPNOM KALMSY TUXY VE MOY SUMMYK. "COE OUBY EHA, COH XHGHM VYSPYBY PG MOY MKAMO HZ MOY SPNOM UGX COH OUBY GHM LYYG MOY SPNOM,WHTY OYKY? COUM XH EHA LYYR ZKHT AL? CPLXHT, BPKMAY, YGSPNOMYGTYGM?"UM MOY THTYGM MOY XHHK HIYGYX UGX MOY LMKUGNYK WUTY PG, IPYKKY ZYSM ULYGLY HZ UCY UGX BYGYKUMPHG LAWO UL OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX PG OPL VHEOHHX UMWHGZYLLPHG; OY ZYSM OPTLYSZ PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ HGY LHWPUSSE U WHTISYMYLMKUGNYK, EYM GYUKYK MH OPT MOKHANO MOY VKHMOYKOHHX HZ TUG. CPMO VUMYXVKYUMO UGX VYUMPGN OYUKM OY THBYX MHCUKX MOY KOYMHK (VE COPWO GUTY MOYVKHMOYK COH IKYIUKYX U LYYRYK ZHK YGMKUGWY PGMH MOY VKHMOYKOHHX CULRGHCG). XKUCPGN GYUKYK, OY KYWHNGPFYX PG MOY KOYMHK U TUG OY RGYC,LTHSEUGPGHB, UGX PM THKMPZPYX OPT MH MOPGR MOUM MOY GYCWHTYK CUL UGUWJAUPGMUGWY--OY CPLOYX OPT LPTISE U VKHMOYK UGX U BPKMAHAL PGLMKAWMHK.ZHK U SHGN MPTY OY WHASX GHM AMMYK U CHKX, LH MOUM MOY KOYMHK OUX MHKYIYUM OPL JAYLMPHG."EYL... XYLPKY KYNYGYKUMPHG," IPYKKY AMMYKYX CPMO XPZZPWASME."BYKE CYSS," LUPX LTHSEUGPGHB, UGX CYGM HG UM HGWY: "OUBY EHA UGE PXYUHZ MOY TYUGL VE COPWO HAK OHSE HKXYK CPSS OYSI EHA MH KYUWO EHAK UPT?"LUPX OY JAPYMSE UGX JAPWRSE."P... PG KYNYGYKUMPHG," LUPX IPYKKY,CPMO U MKYTVSPGN BHPWY UGX LHTY XPZZPWASME PG AMMYKUGWY XAY MH OPLYDWPMYTYGM UGX MH VYPGN AGUWWALMHTYX MH LIYUR HZ UVLMKUWM TUMMYKL PGKALLPUG."COUM PL EHAK WHGWYIMPHG HZ ZKYYTULHGKE?""P PTUNPGY MOUM ZKYYTULHGKE PL MOY ZKUMYKGPME UGX YJAUSPME HZ TYG COHOUBY BPKMAHAL UPTL," LUPX IPYKKY, ZYYSPGN ULOUTYX HZ MOY PGUXYJAUWE HZOPL CHKXL ZHK MOY LHSYTGPME HZ MOY THTYGM, UL OY LIHRY. "P PTUNPGY...""NHHX!" LUPX MOY KOYMHK JAPWRSE, UIIUKYGMSE LUMPLZPYX CPMO MOPL UGLCYK."OUBY EHA LHANOM ZHK TYUGL HZ UMMUPGPGN EHAK UPT PG KYSPNPHG?""GH, P WHGLPXYKYX PM YKKHGYHAL UGX XPX GHM ZHSSHC PM," LUPX IPYKKY,LH LHZMSE MOUM MOY KOYMHK XPX GHM OYUK OPT UGX ULRYX OPT COUM OY CULLUEPGN. "P OUBY VYYG UG UMOYPLM," UGLCYKYX IPYKKY."EHA UKY LYYRPGN ZHK MKAMO PG HKXYK MH ZHSSHC PML SUCL PG EHAK SPZY,MOYKYZHKY EHA LYYR CPLXHT UGX BPKMAY. PL MOUM GHM LH?" LUPX MOY KOYMHK,UZMYK U THTYGM'L IUALY."EYL, EYL," ULLYGMYX IPYKKY.MOY KOYMHK WSYUKYX OPL MOKHUM, WKHLLYX OPL NSHBYX OUGXL HG OPL VKYULM,UGX VYNUG MH LIYUR."GHC P TALM XPLWSHLY MH EHA MOY WOPYZ UPT HZ HAK HKXYK," OY LUPX, "UGXPZ MOPL UPT WHPGWPXYL CPMO EHAKL, EHA TUE YGMYK HAK VKHMOYKOHHX CPMOIKHZPM. MOY ZPKLM UGX WOPYZ HVQYWM HZ HAK HKXYK, MOY ZHAGXUMPHG HG COPWOPM KYLML UGX COPWO GH OATUG IHCYK WUG XYLMKHE, PL MOY IKYLYKBUMPHG UGXOUGXPGN HG MH IHLMYKPME HZ U WYKMUPG PTIHKMUGM TELMYKE... COPWO OUL WHTYXHCG MH AL ZKHT MOY KYTHMYLM UNYL, YBYG ZKHT MOY ZPKLM TUG--U TELMYKE HGCOPWO IYKOUIL MOY ZUMY HZ TUGRPGX XYIYGXL. VAM LPGWY MOPL TELMYKE PL HZLAWO U GUMAKY MOUM GHVHXE WUG RGHC HK ALY PM AGSYLL OY VY IKYIUKYX VESHGN UGX XPSPNYGM LYSZ-IAKPZPWUMPHG, GHM YBYKEHGY WUG OHIY MH UMMUPG PMJAPWRSE. OYGWY CY OUBY U LYWHGXUKE UPT, MOUM HZ IKYIUKPGN HAK TYTVYKL ULTAWO UL IHLLPVSY MH KYZHKT MOYPK OYUKML, MH IAKPZE UGX YGSPNOMYG MOYPKTPGXL, VE TYUGL OUGXYX HG MH AL VE MKUXPMPHG ZKHT MOHLY COH OUBY LMKPBYGMH UMMUPG MOPL TELMYKE, UGX MOYKYVE MH KYGXYK MOYT WUIUVSY HZ KYWYPBPGNPM."VE IAKPZEPGN UGX KYNYGYKUMPGN HAK TYTVYKL CY MKE, MOPKXSE, MH PTIKHBYMOY COHSY OATUG KUWY, HZZYKPGN PM PG HAK TYTVYKL UG YDUTISY HZ IPYMEUGX BPKMAY, UGX MOYKYVE MKE CPMO USS HAK TPNOM MH WHTVUM MOY YBPS COPWOLCUEL MOY CHKSX. MOPGR MOPL HBYK UGX P CPSS WHTY MH EHA UNUPG.""MH WHTVUM MOY YBPS COPWO LCUEL MOY CHKSX..." IPYKKY KYIYUMYX, UGX UTYGMUS PTUNY HZ OPL ZAMAKY UWMPBPME PG MOPL XPKYWMPHG KHLY PG OPL TPGX.OY PTUNPGYX TYG LAWO UL OY OUX OPTLYSZ VYYG U ZHKMGPNOM UNH, UGX OYUXXKYLLYX UG YXPZEPGN YDOHKMUMPHG MH MOYT. OY PTUNPGYX MH OPTLYSZBPWPHAL UGX AGZHKMAGUMY IYHISY COHT OY CHASX ULLPLM VE CHKX UGX XYYX,PTUNPGYX HIIKYLLHKL COHLY BPWMPTL OY CHASX KYLWAY. HZ MOY MOKYYHVQYWML TYGMPHGYX VE MOY KOYMHK, MOPL SULM, MOUM HZ PTIKHBPGN TUGRPGX,YLIYWPUSSE UIIYUSYX MH IPYKKY. MOY PTIHKMUGM TELMYKE TYGMPHGYX VE MOYKOYMHK, MOHANO PM UKHALYX OPL WAKPHLPME, XPX GHM LYYT MH OPT YLLYGMPUS,UGX MOY LYWHGX UPT, MOUM HZ IAKPZEPGN UGX KYNYGYKUMPGN OPTLYSZ, XPX GHMTAWO PGMYKYLM OPT VYWUALY UM MOUM THTYGM OY ZYSM CPMO XYSPNOM MOUM OYCUL USKYUXE IYKZYWMSE WAKYX HZ OPL ZHKTYK ZUASML UGX CUL KYUXE ZHK USSMOUM CUL NHHX.OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK, MOY KOYMHK KYMAKGYX MH PGZHKT MOY LYYRYK HZ MOYLYBYG BPKMAYL, WHKKYLIHGXPGN MH MOY LYBYG LMYIL HZ LHSHTHG'L MYTISY,COPWO YBYKE ZKYYTULHG LOHASX WASMPBUMY PG OPTLYSZ. MOYLY BPKMAYL CYKY:1. XPLWKYMPHG, MOY RYYIPGN HZ MOY LYWKYML HZ MOY HKXYK. 2. HVYXPYGWY MHMOHLY HZ OPNOYK KUGRL PG MOY HKXYK.  3. THKUSPME.  4. SHBY HZ TUGRPGX.5. WHAKUNY. 6. NYGYKHLPME. 7. MOY SHBY HZ XYUMO."PG MOY LYBYGMO ISUWY, MKE, VE MOY ZKYJAYGM MOHANOM HZ XYUMO," MOYKOYMHK LUPX, "MH VKPGN EHAKLYSZ MH KYNUKX PM GHM UL U XKYUXYX ZHY, VAMUL U ZKPYGX MOUM ZKYYL MOY LHAS NKHCG CYUKE PG MOY SUVHKL HZ BPKMAYZKHT MOPL XPLMKYLLZAS SPZY, UGX SYUXL PM MH PML ISUWY HZ KYWHTIYGLY UGXIYUWY.""EYL, MOUM TALM VY LH," MOHANOM IPYKKY, COYG UZMYK MOYLY CHKXL MOYKOYMHK CYGM UCUE, SYUBPGN OPT MH LHSPMUKE TYXPMUMPHG. "PM TALM VY LH,VAM P UT LMPSS LH CYUR MOUM P SHBY TE SPZY, MOY TYUGPGN HZ COPWO PL HGSEGHC NKUXAUSSE HIYGPGN VYZHKY TY." VAM ZPBY HZ MOY HMOYK BPKMAYL COPWOIPYKKY KYWUSSYX, WHAGMPGN MOYT HG OPL ZPGNYKL, OY ZYSM USKYUXE PG OPLLHAS: WHAKUNY, NYGYKHLPME, THKUSPME, SHBY HZ TUGRPGX, UGX YLIYWPUSSEHVYXPYGWY--COPWO XPX GHM YBYG LYYT MH OPT U BPKMAY, VAM U QHE. (OY GHCZYSM LH NSUX MH VY ZKYY ZKHT OPL HCG SUCSYLLGYLL UGX MH LAVTPM OPL CPSSMH MOHLY COH RGYC MOY PGXAVPMUVSY MKAMO.) OY ZHKNHM COUM MOY LYBYGMOBPKMAY CUL UGX WHASX GHM KYWUSS PM.MOY MOPKX MPTY MOY KOYMHK WUTY VUWR THKY JAPWRSE UGX ULRYX IPYKKYCOYMOYK OY CUL LMPSS ZPKT PG OPL PGMYGMPHG UGX XYMYKTPGYX MH LAVTPM MHUSS MOUM CHASX VY KYJAPKYX HZ OPT."P UT KYUXE ZHK YBYKEMOPGN," LUPX IPYKKY."P TALM USLH PGZHKT EHA," LUPX MOY KOYMHK, "MOUM HAK HKXYK XYSPBYKL PMLMYUWOPGN GHM PG CHKXL HGSE VAM USLH VE HMOYK TYUGL, COPWO TUE IYKOUILOUBY U LMKHGNYK YZZYWM HG MOY LPGWYKY LYYRYK UZMYK CPLXHT UGX BPKMAYMOUG TYKY CHKXL. MOPL WOUTVYK CPMO COUM EHA LYY MOYKYPG LOHASX USKYUXEOUBY LANNYLMYX MH EHAK OYUKM, PZ PM PL LPGWYKY, THKY MOUG CHKXL WHASXXH. EHA CPSS IYKOUIL USLH LYY PG EHAK ZAKMOYK PGPMPUMPHG U SPRYTYMOHX HZ YGSPNOMYGTYGM. HAK HKXYK PTPMUMYL MOY UGWPYGM LHWPYMPYL MOUMYDISUPGYX MOYPK MYUWOPGN VE OPYKHNSEIOPWL. U OPYKHNSEIO," LUPX MOYKOYMHK, "PL UG YTVSYT HZ LHTYMOPGN GHM WHNGPFUVSY VE MOY LYGLYL VAMCOPWO IHLLYLLYL JAUSPMPYL KYLYTVSPGN MOHLY HZ MOY LETVHS."IPYKKY RGYC BYKE CYSS COUM U OPYKHNSEIO CUL, VAM XUKYX GHM LIYUR. OYSPLMYGYX MH MOY KOYMHK PG LPSYGWY, ZYYSPGN ZKHT USS OY LUPX MOUM OPLHKXYUS CUL UVHAM MH VYNPG."PZ EHA UKY KYLHSBYX, P TALM VYNPG EHAK PGPMPUMPHG," LUPX MOY KOYMHKWHTPGN WSHLYK MH IPYKKY. "PG MHRYG HZ NYGYKHLPME P ULR EHA MH NPBY TYUSS EHAK BUSAUVSYL.""VAM P OUBY GHMOPGN OYKY," KYISPYX IPYKKY, LAIIHLPGN MOUM OY CUL ULRYXMH NPBY AI USS OY IHLLYLLYX."COUM EHA OUBY CPMO EHA: CUMWO, THGYE, KPGNL...."IPYKKY JAPWRSE MHHR HAM OPL IAKLY UGX CUMWO, VAM WHASX GHM TUGUNY ZHKLHTY MPTY MH NYM MOY CYXXPGN KPGN HZZ OPL ZUM ZPGNYK. COYG MOUM OUX VYYGXHGY, MOY KOYMHK LUPX:"PG MHRYG HZ HVYXPYGWY, P ULR EHA MH AGXKYLL."IPYKKY MHHR HZZ OPL WHUM, CUPLMWHUM, UGX SYZM VHHM UWWHKXPGN MH MOYKOYMHK'L PGLMKAWMPHGL. MOY TULHG XKYC MOY LOPKM VUWR ZKHT IPYKKY'L SYZMVKYULM, UGX LMHHIPGN XHCG IASSYX AI MOY SYZM SYN HZ OPL MKHALYKL MHUVHBY MOY RGYY. IPYKKY OAKKPYXSE VYNUG MURPGN HZZ OPL KPNOM VHHM USLHUGX CUL NHPGN MH MAWR AI MOY HMOYK MKHALYK SYN MH LUBY MOPL LMKUGNYK MOYMKHAVSY, VAM MOY TULHG MHSX OPT MOUM CUL GHM GYWYLLUKE UGX NUBY OPTU LSPIIYK ZHK OPL SYZM ZHHM. CPMO U WOPSXSPRY LTPSY HZ YTVUKKULLTYGM,XHAVM, UGX LYSZ-XYKPLPHG, COPWO UIIYUKYX HG OPL ZUWY UNUPGLM OPL CPSS,IPYKKY LMHHX CPMO OPL UKTL OUGNPGN XHCG UGX SYNL UIUKM, VYZHKY OPLVKHMOYK KOYMHK, UGX UCUPMYX OPL ZAKMOYK WHTTUGXL."UGX GHC, PG MHRYG HZ WUGXHK, P ULR EHA MH KYBYUS MH TY EHAK WOPYZIULLPHG," LUPX MOY SUMMYK."TE IULLPHG! P OUBY OUX LH TUGE," KYISPYX IPYKKY."MOUM IULLPHG COPWO THKY MOUG USS HMOYKL WUALYX EHA MH CUBYK HG MOY IUMOHZ BPKMAY," LUPX MOY TULHG.IPYKKY IUALYX, LYYRPGN U KYISE."CPGY? NSAMMHGE? PXSYGYLL? SUFPGYLL? PKKPMUVPSPME? UGNYK? CHTYG?" OYCYGM HBYK OPL BPWYL PG OPL TPGX, GHM RGHCPGN MH COPWO HZ MOYT MH NPBYMOY IKY-YTPGYGWY."CHTYG," OY LUPX PG U SHC, LWUKWYSE UAXPVSY BHPWY.MOY TULHG XPX GHM THBY UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY LUPX GHMOPGN UZMYK MOPLUGLCYK. UM SULM OY THBYX AI MH IPYKKY UGX, MURPGN MOY RYKWOPYZ MOUM SUEHG MOY MUVSY, UNUPG VHAGX OPL YEYL."ZHK MOY SULM MPTY P LUE MH EHA--MAKG USS EHAK UMMYGMPHG AIHG EHAKLYSZ,IAM U VKPXSY HG EHAK LYGLYL, UGX LYYR VSYLLYXGYLL, GHM PG IULLPHG VAMPG EHAK HCG OYUKM. MOY LHAKWY HZ VSYLLYXGYLL PL GHM CPMOHAM AL VAMCPMOPG...."IPYKKY OUX USKYUXE SHGN VYYG ZYYSPGN PG OPTLYSZ MOUM KYZKYLOPGN LHAKWYHZ VSYLLYXGYLL COPWO GHC ZSHHXYX OPL OYUKM CPMO NSUX YTHMPHG.WOUIMYK PBLHHG UZMYK MOPL MOYKY WUTY PGMH MOY XUKR WOUTVYK MH ZYMWO IPYKKY, GHMMOY KOYMHK VAM IPYKKY'L LIHGLHK, CPSSUKLRP, COHT OY KYWHNGPFYX VE OPLBHPWY. MH ZKYLO JAYLMPHGL UL MH MOY ZPKTGYLL HZ OPL KYLHSAMPHG IPYKKYKYISPYX: "EYL, EYL, P UNKYY," UGX CPMO U VYUTPGN, WOPSXSPRY LTPSY, OPLZUM WOYLM AGWHBYKYX, LMYIIPGN AGYBYGSE UGX MPTPXSE PG HGY LSPIIYKYX UGXHGY VHHMYX ZHHM, OY UXBUGWYX, COPSY CPSSUKLRP OYSX U LCHKX MH OPLVUKY WOYLM. OY CUL WHGXAWMYX ZKHT MOUM KHHT USHGN IULLUNYL MOUM MAKGYXVUWRCUKXL UGX ZHKCUKXL UGX CUL UM SULM VKHANOM MH MOY XHHKL HZ MOYSHXNY. CPSSUKLRP WHANOYX, OY CUL UGLCYKYX VE MOY TULHGPW RGHWR CPMOTUSSYML, MOY XHHKL HIYGYX VYZHKY MOYT. U VULL BHPWY (IPYKKY CUL LMPSSVSPGXZHSXYX) JAYLMPHGYX OPT UL MH COH OY CUL, COYG UGX COYKY OY CULVHKG, UGX LH HG. MOYG OY CUL UNUPG SYX LHTYCOYKY LMPSS VSPGXZHSXYX,UGX UL MOYE CYGM USHGN OY CUL MHSX USSYNHKPYL HZ MOY MHPSL HZ OPLIPSNKPTUNY, HZ OHSE ZKPYGXLOPI, HZ MOY YMYKGUS UKWOPMYWM HZ MOYAGPBYKLY, UGX HZ MOY WHAKUNY CPMO COPWO OY LOHASX YGXAKY MHPSL UGXXUGNYKL. XAKPGN MOYLY CUGXYKPGNL, IPYKKY GHMPWYX MOUM OY CUL LIHRYG HZGHC UL MOY "LYYRYK," GHC UL MOY "LAZZYKYK," UGX GHC UL MOY "IHLMASUGM,"MH MOY UWWHTIUGPTYGM HZ BUKPHAL RGHWRPGNL CPMO TUSSYML UGX LCHKXL. UL OYCUL VYPGN SYX AI MH LHTY HVQYWM OY GHMPWYX U OYLPMUMPHG UGX AGWYKMUPGMEUTHGN OPL WHGXAWMHKL. OY OYUKX MOHLY UKHAGX OPT XPLIAMPGN PG COPLIYKLUGX HGY HZ MOYT PGLPLMPGN MOUM OY LOHASX VY SYX USHGN U WYKMUPG WUKIYM.UZMYK MOUM MOYE MHHR OPL KPNOM OUGX, ISUWYX PM HG LHTYMOPGN, UGX MHSXOPT MH OHSX U IUPK HZ WHTIULLYL MH OPL SYZM VKYULM CPMO MOY HMOYK OUGXUGX MH KYIYUM UZMYK LHTYHGY COH KYUX USHAX UG HUMO HZ ZPXYSPME MH MOYSUCL HZ MOY HKXYK. MOY WUGXSYL CYKY MOYG YDMPGNAPLOYX UGX LHTY LIPKPMSPNOMYX, UL IPYKKY RGYC VE MOY LTYSS, UGX OY CUL MHSX MOUM OY CHASX GHCLYY MOY SYLLYK SPNOM. MOY VUGXUNY CUL MURYG HZZ OPL YEYL UGX, VE MOYZUPGM SPNOM HZ MOY VAKGPGN LIPKPM, IPYKKY, UL PG U XKYUT, LUC LYBYKUSTYG LMUGXPGN VYZHKY OPT, CYUKPGN UIKHGL SPRY MOY KOYMHK'L UGX OHSXPGNLCHKXL PG MOYPK OUGXL IHPGMYX UM OPL VKYULM. UTHGN MOYT LMHHX U TUGCOHLY COPMY LOPKM CUL LMUPGYX CPMO VSHHX. HG LYYPGN MOPL, IPYKKY THBYXZHKCUKX CPMO OPL VKYULM MHCUKX MOY LCHKXL, TYUGPGN MOYT MH IPYKWY PM.VAM MOY LCHKXL CYKY XKUCG VUWR ZKHT OPT UGX OY CUL UM HGWY VSPGXZHSXYXUNUPG."GHC MOHA OULM LYYG MOY SYLLYK SPNOM," AMMYKYX U BHPWY. MOYG MOY WUGXSYLCYKY KYSPM UGX OY CUL MHSX MOUM OY CHASX LYY MOY ZASS SPNOM; MOY VUGXUNYCUL UNUPG KYTHBYX UGX THKY MOUG MYG BHPWYL LUPX MHNYMOYK: "LPW MKUGLPMNSHKPU TAGXP."IPYKKY NKUXAUSSE VYNUG MH KYWHBYK OPTLYSZ UGX SHHRYX UVHAM UM MOY KHHTUGX UM MOY IYHISY PG PM. KHAGX U SHGN MUVSY WHBYKYX CPMO VSUWR LUM LHTYMCYSBY TYG PG NUKTYGML SPRY MOHLY OY OUX USKYUXE LYYG. LHTY HZ MOYTIPYKKY OUX TYM PG IYMYKLVAKN LHWPYME. PG MOY IKYLPXYGM'L WOUPK LUM UEHAGN TUG OY XPX GHM RGHC, CPMO U IYWASPUK WKHLL OUGNPGN ZKHT OPL GYWR.HG OPL KPNOM LUM MOY PMUSPUG UVVY COHT IPYKKY OUX TYM UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'LMCH EYUKL VYZHKY. MOYKY CYKY USLH IKYLYGM U BYKE XPLMPGNAPLOYX XPNGPMUKEUGX U LCPLL COH OUX ZHKTYKSE VYYG MAMHK UM MOY RAKUNPGL'. USS TUPGMUPGYXU LHSYTG LPSYGWY, SPLMYGPGN MH MOY CHKXL HZ MOY IKYLPXYGM, COH OYSX UTUSSYM PG OPL OUGX. SYM PGMH MOY CUSS CUL U LMUK-LOUIYX SPNOM. UM HGYLPXY HZ MOY MUVSY CUL U LTUSS WUKIYM CPMO BUKPHAL ZPNAKYL CHKRYX AIHGPM, UM MOY HMOYK CUL LHTYMOPGN KYLYTVSPGN UG USMUK HG COPWO SUE UMYLMUTYGM UGX U LRASS. KHAGX PM LMHHX LYBYG SUKNY WUGXSYLMPWRL SPRYMOHLY ALYX PG WOAKWOYL. MCH HZ MOY VKHMOYKL SYX IPYKKY AI MH MOY USMUK,ISUWYX OPL ZYYM UM KPNOM UGNSYL, UGX VUXY OPT SPY XHCG, LUEPGN MOUM OYTALM IKHLMKUMY OPTLYSZ UM MOY NUMYL HZ MOY MYTISY."OY TALM ZPKLM KYWYPBY MOY MKHCYS," COPLIYKYX HGY HZ MOY VKHMOYKL."HO, OALO, ISYULY!" LUPX UGHMOYK.IPYKKY, IYKISYDYX, SHHRYX KHAGX CPMO OPL LOHKMLPNOMYX YEYL CPMOHAMHVYEPGN, UGX LAXXYGSE XHAVML UKHLY PG OPL TPGX. "COYKY UT P? COUM UTP XHPGN? UKYG'M MOYE SUANOPGN UM TY? LOUG'M P VY ULOUTYX MH KYTYTVYKMOPL?" VAM MOYLY XHAVML HGSE SULMYX U THTYGM. IPYKKY NSUGWYX UM MOYLYKPHAL ZUWYL HZ MOHLY UKHAGX, KYTYTVYKYX USS OY OUX USKYUXE NHGYMOKHANO, UGX KYUSPFYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM LMHI OUSZCUE. OY CUL UNOULMUM OPL OYLPMUMPHG UGX, MKEPGN MH UKHALY OPL ZHKTYK XYBHMPHGUS ZYYSPGN,IKHLMKUMYX OPTLYSZ VYZHKY MOY NUMYL HZ MOY MYTISY. UGX KYUSSE, MOYZYYSPGN HZ XYBHMPHG KYMAKGYX MH OPT YBYG THKY LMKHGNSE MOUG VYZHKY. COYGOY OUX SUPG MOYKY LHTY MPTY, OY CUL MHSX MH NYM AI, UGX U COPMY SYUMOYKUIKHG, LAWO UL MOY HMOYKL CHKY, CUL IAM HG OPT: OY CUL NPBYG U MKHCYSUGX MOKYY IUPKL HZ NSHBYL, UGX MOYG MOY NKUGX TULMYK UXXKYLLYX OPT. OYMHSX OPT MOUM OY LOHASX MKE MH XH GHMOPGN MH LMUPG MOY COPMYGYLL HZ MOUMUIKHG, COPWO LETVHSPFYX LMKYGNMO UGX IAKPME; MOYG HZ MOY AGYDISUPGYXMKHCYS, OY MHSX OPT MH MHPS CPMO PM MH WSYUGLY OPL HCG OYUKM ZKHT BPWY,UGX PGXASNYGMSE MH LTHHMO CPMO PM MOY OYUKM HZ OPL GYPNOVHK. UL MH MOYZPKLM IUPK HZ NSHBYL, U TUG'L, OY LUPX MOUM IPYKKY WHASX GHM RGHC MOYPKTYUGPGN VAM TALM RYYI MOYT. MOY LYWHGX IUPK HZ TUG'L NSHBYL OY CULMH CYUK UM MOY TYYMPGNL, UGX ZPGUSSE HZ MOY MOPKX, U IUPK HZ CHTYG'LNSHBYL, OY LUPX: "XYUK VKHMOYK, MOYLY CHTUG'L NSHBYL UKY PGMYGXYX ZHKEHA MHH. NPBY MOYT MH MOY CHTUG COHT EHA LOUSS OHGHK THLM HZ USS. MOPLNPZM CPSS VY U ISYXNY HZ EHAK IAKPME HZ OYUKM MH OYK COHT EHA LYSYWM MHVY EHAK CHKMOE OYSITYYM PG TULHGKE." UGX UZMYK U IUALY, OY UXXYX: "VAMVYCUKY, XYUK VKHMOYK, MOUM MOYLY NSHBYL XH GHM XYWR OUGXL MOUM UKYAGWSYUG." COPSY MOY NKUGX TULMYK LUPX MOYLY SULM CHKXL PM LYYTYXMH IPYKKY MOUM OY NKYC YTVUKKULLYX. IPYKKY OPTLYSZ NKYC LMPSS THKYWHGZALYX, VSALOYX SPRY U WOPSX MPSS MYUKL WUTY MH OPL YEYL, VYNUGSHHRPGN UVHAM OPT AGYULPSE, UGX UG UCRCUKX IUALY ZHSSHCYX.MOPL LPSYGWY CUL VKHRYG VE HGY HZ MOY VKYMOKYG, COH SYX IPYKKY AI MH MOYKAN UGX VYNUG KYUXPGN MH OPT ZKHT U TUGALWKPIM VHHR UG YDISUGUMPHG HZUSS MOY ZPNAKYL HG PM: MOY LAG, MOY THHG, U OUTTYK, U ISATV SPGY, UMKHCYS, U KHANO LMHGY UGX U LJAUKYX LMHGY, U IPSSUK, MOKYY CPGXHCL, UGXLH HG. MOYG U ISUWY CUL ULLPNGYX MH IPYKKY, OY CUL LOHCG MOY LPNGL HZMOY SHXNY, MHSX MOY IULLCHKX, UGX UM SULM CUL IYKTPMMYX MH LPM XHCG.MOY NKUGX TULMYK VYNUG KYUXPGN MOY LMUMAMYL. MOYE CYKY BYKE SHGN, UGXIPYKKY, ZKHT QHE, UNPMUMPHG, UGX YTVUKKULLTYGM, CUL GHM PG U LMUMY MHAGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL VYPGN KYUX. OY TUGUNYX MH ZHSSHC HGSE MOY SULM CHKXLHZ MOY LMUMAMYL UGX MOYLY KYTUPGYX PG OPL TPGX."PG HAK MYTISYL CY KYWHNGPFY GH HMOYK XPLMPGWMPHGL," KYUX MOY NKUGXTULMYK, "VAM MOHLY VYMCYYG BPKMAY UGX BPWY. VYCUKY HZ TURPGN UGEXPLMPGWMPHGL COPWO TUE PGZKPGNY YJAUSPME. ZSE MH U VKHMOYK'L UPX COHYBYKOY TUE VY, YDOHKM OPT COH NHYMO ULMKUE, KUPLY OPT MOUM ZUSSYMO, GYBYKVYUK TUSPWY HK YGTPME MHCUKX MOE VKHMOYK. VY RPGXSE UGX WHAKMYHAL.RPGXSY PG USS OYUKML MOY ZSUTY HZ BPKMAY. LOUKY MOE OUIIPGYLL CPMO MOEGYPNOVHK, UGX TUE YGBE GYBYK XPT MOY IAKPME HZ MOUM VSPLL. ZHKNPBY MOEYGYTE, XH GHM UBYGNY MOELYSZ YDWYIM VE XHPGN OPT NHHX. MOAL ZASZPSSPGNMOY OPNOYLM SUC MOHA LOUSM KYNUPG MKUWYL HZ MOY UGWPYGM XPNGPME COPWOMOHA OULM SHLM."OY ZPGPLOYX UGX, NYMMPGN AI, YTVKUWYX UGX RPLLYX IPYKKY, COH, CPMO MYUKLHZ QHE PG OPL YEYL, SHHRYX KHAGX OPT, GHM RGHCPGN OHC MH UGLCYK MOYWHGNKUMASUMPHGL UGX NKYYMPGNL ZKHT UWJAUPGMUGWYL MOUM TYM OPT HG USSLPXYL. OY UWRGHCSYXNYX GH UWJAUPGMUGWYL VAM LUC PG USS MOYLY TYG HGSEVKHMOYKL, UGX VAKGYX CPMO PTIUMPYGWY MH LYM MH CHKR CPMO MOYT.MOY NKUGX TULMYK KUIIYX CPMO OPL TUSSYM. USS MOY TULHGL LUM XHCG PGMOYPK ISUWYL, UGX HGY HZ MOYT KYUX UG YDOHKMUMPHG HG MOY GYWYLLPME HZOATPSPME.MOY NKUGX TULMYK IKHIHLYX MOUM MOY SULM XAME LOHASX VY IYKZHKTYX, UGXMOY XPLMPGNAPLOYX XPNGPMUKE COH VHKY MOY MPMSY HZ "WHSSYWMHK HZ USTL"CYGM KHAGX MH USS MOY VKHMOYKL. IPYKKY CHASX OUBY SPRYX MH LAVLWKPVY USSOY OUX, VAM ZYUKPGN MOUM PM TPNOM SHHR SPRY IKPXY LAVLWKPVYX MOY LUTYUTHAGM UL MOY HMOYKL.MOY TYYMPGN CUL UM UG YGX, UGX HG KYUWOPGN OHTY IPYKKY ZYSM UL PZ OY OUXKYMAKGYX ZKHT U SHGN QHAKGYE HG COPWO OY OUX LIYGM XHFYGL HZ EYUKL, OUXVYWHTY WHTISYMYSE WOUGNYX, UGX OUX JAPMY SYZM VYOPGX OPL ZHKTYK OUVPMLUGX CUE HZ SPZY.WOUIMYK BMOY XUE UZMYK OY OUX VYYG KYWYPBYX PGMH MOY SHXNY, IPYKKY CUL LPMMPGN UMOHTY KYUXPGN U VHHR UGX MKEPGN MH ZUMOHT MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOY LJAUKY,HGY LPXY HZ COPWO LETVHSPFYX NHX, UGHMOYK THKUS MOPGNL, U MOPKXIOELPWUS MOPGNL, UGX MOY ZHAKMO U WHTVPGUMPHG HZ MOYLY. GHC UGX MOYGOPL UMMYGMPHG CUGXYKYX ZKHT MOY VHHR UGX MOY LJAUKY UGX OY ZHKTYX PGPTUNPGUMPHG U GYC ISUG HZ SPZY. HG MOY IKYBPHAL YBYGPGN UM MOY SHXNY, OYOUX OYUKX MOUM U KATHK HZ OPL XAYS OUX KYUWOYX MOY YTIYKHK UGX MOUM PMCHASX VY CPLYK ZHK OPT MH SYUBY IYMYKLVAKN. IPYKKY IKHIHLYX NHPGN MH OPLYLMUMYL PG MOY LHAMO UGX MOYKY UMMYGXPGN MH MOY CYSZUKY HZ OPL LYKZL. OYCUL QHEZASSE ISUGGPGN MOPL GYC SPZY, COYG IKPGWY BULPSP LAXXYGSE YGMYKYXMOY KHHT."TE XYUK ZYSSHC, COUM OUBY EHA VYYG AI MH PG THLWHC? COE OUBY EHAJAUKKYSYX CPMO OYSYGY, THG WOYK? EHA UKY AGXYK U XYSALPHG," LUPXIKPGWY BULPSP, UL OY YGMYKYX. "P RGHC USS UVHAM PM, UGX P WUG MYSS EHAIHLPMPBYSE MOUM OYSYGY PL UL PGGHWYGM VYZHKY EHA UL WOKPLM CUL VYZHKYMOY QYCL."IPYKKY CUL UVHAM MH KYISE, VAM IKPGWY BULPSP PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."UGX COE XPXG'M EHA LPTISE WHTY LMKUPNOM MH TY UL MH U ZKPYGX? P RGHCUSS UVHAM PM UGX AGXYKLMUGX PM USS," OY LUPX. "EHA VYOUBYX UL VYWHTYLU TUG COH BUSAYL OPL OHGHK, IYKOUIL MHH OULMPSE, VAM CY CHG'M NH PGMHMOUM. VAM WHGLPXYK MOY IHLPMPHG PG COPWO EHA UKY ISUWPGN OYK UGX TYPG MOY YEYL HZ LHWPYME, UGX YBYG HZ MOY WHAKM," OY UXXYX, SHCYKPGN OPLBHPWY. "LOY PL SPBPGN PG THLWHC UGX EHA UKY OYKY. KYTYTVYK, XYUK VHE,"UGX OY XKYC IPYKKY'L UKT XHCGCUKXL, "PM PL LPTISE U TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGN. PYDIYWM EHA ZYYS PM LH EHAKLYSZ. SYM AL CKPMY OYK U SYMMYK UM HGWY, UGXLOY'SS WHTY OYKY UGX USS CPSS VY YDISUPGYX, HK YSLY, TE XYUK VHE, SYM TYMYSS EHA PM'L JAPMY SPRYSE EHA'SS OUBY MH LAZZYK ZHK PM."IKPGWY BULPSP NUBY IPYKKY U LPNGPZPWUGM SHHR."P RGHC ZKHT KYSPUVSY LHAKWYL MOUM MOY XHCUNYK YTIKYLL PL MURPGN U RYYGPGMYKYLM PG MOY COHSY UZZUPK. EHA RGHC LOY PL BYKE NKUWPHAL MH OYSYGY."IPYKKY MKPYX LYBYKUS MPTYL MH LIYUR, VAM, HG HGY OUGX, IKPGWY BULPSP XPXGHM SYM OPT UGX, HG MOY HMOYK, IPYKKY OPTLYSZ ZYUKYX MH VYNPG MH LIYURPG MOY MHGY HZ XYWPXYX KYZALUS UGX XPLUNKYYTYGM PG COPWO OY OUX ZPKTSEKYLHSBYX MH UGLCYK OPL ZUMOYK-PG-SUC. THKYHBYK, MOY CHKXL HZ MOY TULHGPWLMUMAMYL, "VY RPGXSE UGX WHAKMYHAL," KYWAKKYX MH OPT. OY VSPGRYX, CYGMKYX, NHM AI UGX LUM XHCG UNUPG, LMKANNSPGN CPMO OPTLYSZ MH XH COUM CULZHK OPT MOY THLM XPZZPWASM MOPGN PG SPZY--MH LUE UG AGISYULUGM MOPGNMH U TUG'L ZUWY, MH LUE COUM MOY HMOYK, COHYBYK OY TPNOM VY, XPX GHMYDIYWM. OY CUL LH ALYX MH LAVTPMMPGN MH IKPGWY BULPSP'L MHGY HZ WUKYSYLLLYSZ-ULLAKUGWY MOUM OY ZYSM OY CHASX VY AGUVSY MH CPMOLMUGX PM GHC, VAMOY USLH ZYSM MOUM HG COUM OY LUPX GHC OPL ZAMAKY XYIYGXYX--COYMOYK OYCHASX ZHSSHC MOY LUTY HSX KHUX, HK MOUM GYC IUMO LH UMMKUWMPBYSE LOHCGOPT VE MOY TULHGL, HG COPWO OY ZPKTSE VYSPYBYX OY CHASX VY KYVHKG MH UGYC SPZY."GHC, XYUK VHE," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP ISUEZASSE, "LUE 'EYL,' UGX P'SSCKPMY MH OYK TELYSZ, UGX CY CPSS RPSS MOY ZUMMYX WUSZ."VAM VYZHKY IKPGWY BULPSP OUX ZPGPLOYX OPL ISUEZAS LIYYWO, IPYKKY,CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OPT, UGX CPMO U RPGX HZ ZAKE MOUM TUXY OPT SPRY OPLZUMOYK, TAMMYKYX PG U COPLIYK:"IKPGWY, P XPX GHM ULR EHA OYKY. NH, ISYULY NH!" UGX OY QATIYX AI UGXHIYGYX MOY XHHK ZHK OPT."NH!" OY KYIYUMYX, UTUFYX UM OPTLYSZ UGX NSUX MH LYY MOY SHHR HZWHGZALPHG UGX ZYUK MOUM LOHCYX PMLYSZ HG IKPGWY BULPSP'L ZUWY."COUM'L MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA? UKY EHA PSS?""NH!" MOY JAPBYKPGN BHPWY KYIYUMYX. UGX IKPGWY BULPSP OUX MH NH CPMOHAMKYWYPBPGN UGE YDISUGUMPHG.U CYYR SUMYK, IPYKKY, OUBPGN MURYG SYUBY HZ OPL GYC ZKPYGXL, MOY TULHGL,UGX SYUBPGN SUKNY LATL HZ THGYE CPMO MOYT ZHK USTL, CYGM UCUE MH OPLYLMUMYL. OPL GYC VKYMOKYG NUBY OPT SYMMYKL MH MOY RPYB UGX HXYLLU TULHGLUGX IKHTPLYX MH CKPMY MH OPT UGX NAPXY OPT PG OPL GYC UWMPBPME.WOUIMYK BPMOY XAYS VYMCYYG IPYKKY UGX XHSHROHB CUL OALOYX AI UGX, PG LIPMY HZ MOYYTIYKHK'L LYBYKPME KYNUKXPGN XAYSL UM MOUM MPTY, GYPMOYK MOY IKPGWPIUSLGHK MOYPK LYWHGXL LAZZYKYX ZHK PM. VAM MOY LMHKE HZ MOY XAYS, WHGZPKTYXVE IPYKKY'L KAIMAKY CPMO OPL CPZY, CUL MOY MUSR HZ LHWPYME. IPYKKYCOH OUX VYYG KYNUKXYX CPMO IUMKHGPFPGN WHGXYLWYGLPHG COYG OY CUL UGPSSYNPMPTUMY LHG, UGX IYMMYX UGX YDMHSSYX COYG OY CUL MOY VYLM TUMWOPG KALLPU, OUX LAGR NKYUMSE PG MOY YLMYYT HZ LHWPYME UZMYK OPLTUKKPUNY--COYG MOY TUKKPUNYUVSY XUANOMYKL UGX MOYPK THMOYKL OUX GHMOPGNMH OHIY ZKHT OPT--YLIYWPUSSE UL OY XPX GHM RGHC OHC, UGX XPX GHM CPLO,MH WHAKM LHWPYME'L ZUBHK. UGX COYG UZMYK IPYKKY'L XYIUKMAKY OYSYGY KYMAKGYXMH IYMYKLVAKN, LOY CUL KYWYPBYX VE USS OYK UWJAUPGMUGWYL GHM HGSEWHKXPUSSE, VAM YBYG CPMO U LOUXY HZ XYZYKYGWY XAY MH OYK TPLZHKMAGY.COYG WHGBYKLUMPHG MAKGYX HG OYK OALVUGX OYSYGY ULLATYX U XPNGPZPYXYDIKYLLPHG, COPWO CPMO WOUKUWMYKPLMPW MUWM LOY OUX UWJAPKYX MOHANO LOYXPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX PML LPNGPZPWUGWY. MOY SPZY HZ HSX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP, IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGXIKPGWYLL TUKE OUX NKYUMSE WOUGNYX LPGWY 1805.PG 1806 MOY HSX IKPGWY CUL TUXY HGY HZ MOY YPNOM WHTTUGXYKL PG WOPYZMOYG UIIHPGMYX MH LAIYKBPLY MOY YGKHSSTYGM XYWKYYX MOKHANOHAM KALLPU.XYLIPMY MOY CYURGYLL HZ UNY, COPWO OUX VYWHTY IUKMPWASUKSE GHMPWYUVSYLPGWY MOY MPTY COYG OY MOHANOM OPL LHG OUX VYYG RPSSYX, OY XPX GHM MOPGRPM KPNOM MH KYZALY U XAME MH COPWO OY OUX VYYG UIIHPGMYX VE MOY YTIYKHKOPTLYSZ, UGX MOPL ZKYLO HIIHKMAGPME ZHK UWMPHG NUBY OPT GYC YGYKNEUGX LMKYGNMO. OY CUL WHGMPGAUSSE MKUBYSPGN MOKHANO MOY MOKYY IKHBPGWYLYGMKALMYX MH OPT, CUL IYXUGMPW PG MOY ZASZPSSTYGM HZ OPL XAMPYL, LYBYKYMH WKAYSME CPMO OPL LAVHKXPGUMYL, UGX CYGM PGMH YBYKEMOPGN XHCG MH MOYTPGAMYLM XYMUPSL OPTLYSZ. IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX WYULYX MURPGN SYLLHGL PGTUMOYTUMPWL ZKHT OYK ZUMOYK, UGX COYG MOY HSX IKPGWY CUL UM OHTY CYGMMH OPL LMAXE CPMO MOY CYM GAKLY UGX SPMMSY IKPGWY GPWOHSUL (UL OPLNKUGXZUMOYK WUSSYX OPT). MOY VUVE IKPGWY GPWOHSUL SPBYX CPMO OPL CYMGAKLY UGX GAKLY LUBPLOGU PG MOY SUMY IKPGWYLL' KHHTL UGX IKPGWYLL TUKELIYGM THLM HZ MOY XUE PG MOY GAKLYKE, MURPGN U THMOYK'L ISUWY MH OYKSPMMSY GYIOYC UL VYLM LOY WHASX. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, MHH, LYYTYXIULLPHGUMYSE ZHGX HZ MOY VHE, UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE HZMYG XYIKPBYX OYKLYSZMH NPBY OYK ZKPYGX MOY ISYULAKY HZ XUGXSPGN MOY SPMMSY UGNYS--UL LOYWUSSYX OYK GYIOYC--UGX ISUEPGN CPMO OPT.GYUK MOY USMUK HZ MOY WOAKWO UM VUSX OPSSL MOYKY CUL U WOUIYS HBYK MOYMHTV HZ MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL, UGX PG MOPL WOUIYS CUL U TUKVSY THGATYGMVKHANOM ZKHT PMUSE, KYIKYLYGMPGN UG UGNYS CPMO HAMLIKYUX CPGNL KYUXE MHZSE AICUKXL. MOY UGNYS'L AIIYK SPI CUL LSPNOMSE KUPLYX UL MOHANOUVHAM MH LTPSY, UGX HGWY HG WHTPGN HAM HZ MOY WOUIYS IKPGWY UGXKYC UGXIKPGWYLL TUKE UXTPMMYX MH HGY UGHMOYK MOUM MOY UGNYS'L ZUWY KYTPGXYXMOYT LMKUGNYSE HZ MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL. VAM COUM CUL LMPSS LMKUGNYK,MOHANO HZ MOPL IKPGWY UGXKYC LUPX GHMOPGN MH OPL LPLMYK, CUL MOUM PG MOYYDIKYLLPHG MOY LWASIMHK OUX OUIIYGYX MH NPBY MOY UGNYS'L ZUWY, IKPGWYUGXKYC KYUX MOY LUTY TPSX KYIKHUWO OY OUX KYUX HG MOY ZUWY HZ OPL XYUXCPZY: "UO, COE OUBY EHA XHGY MOPL MH TY?"LHHG UZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYMAKG MOY HSX IKPGWY TUXY HBYK MH OPT USUKNY YLMUMY, VHNAWOUKHBH, UVHAM MCYGME-ZPBY TPSYL ZKHT VUSX OPSSL.IUKMSE VYWUALY HZ MOY XYIKYLLPGN TYTHKPYL ULLHWPUMYX CPMO VUSX OPSSL,IUKMSE VYWUALY IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM USCUEL ZYYS YJAUS MH VYUKPGN CPMOOPL ZUMOYK'L IYWASPUKPMPYL, UGX IUKMSE VYWUALY OY GYYXYX LHSPMAXY,IKPGWY UGXKYC TUXY ALY HZ VHNAWOUKHBH, VYNUG VAPSXPGN UGX LIYGM THLM HZOPL MPTY MOYKY.UZMYK MOY UALMYKSPMF WUTIUPNG IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX ZPKTSE KYLHSBYX GHMMH WHGMPGAY OPL TPSPMUKE LYKBPWY, UGX COYG MOY CUK KYWHTTYGWYXUGX YBYKEVHXE OUX MH LYKBY, OY MHHR U IHLM AGXYK OPL ZUMOYK PG MOYKYWKAPMTYGM LH UL MH UBHPX UWMPBY LYKBPWY. MOY HSX IKPGWY UGX OPL LHGLYYTYX MH OUBY WOUGNYX KHSYL LPGWY MOY WUTIUPNG HZ 1805. MOY HSX TUG,KHALYX VE UWMPBPME, YDIYWMYX MOY VYLM KYLASML ZKHT MOY GYC WUTIUPNG,COPSY IKPGWY UGXKYC HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MURPGN GH IUKM PG MOY CUK UGXLYWKYMSE KYNKYMMPGN MOPL, LUC HGSE MOY XUKR LPXY.HG ZYVKAUKE 26, 1807, MOY HSX IKPGWY LYM HZZ HG HGY HZ OPL WPKWAPML.IKPGWY UGXKYC KYTUPGYX UM VUSX OPSSL UL ALAUS XAKPGN OPL ZUMOYK'LUVLYGWY. SPMMSY GPWOHSUL OUX VYYG AGCYSS ZHK ZHAK XUEL. MOY WHUWOTUG COHOUX XKPBYG MOY HSX IKPGWY MH MHCG KYMAKGYX VKPGNPGN IUIYKL UGX SYMMYKLZHK IKPGWY UGXKYC.GHM ZPGXPGN MOY EHAGN IKPGWY PG OPL LMAXE MOY BUSYM CYGM CPMO MOYSYMMYKL MH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L UIUKMTYGML, VAM XPX GHM ZPGX OPT MOYKY. OYCUL MHSX MOUM MOY IKPGWY OUX NHGY MH MOY GAKLYKE."PZ EHA ISYULY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, IYMKALOU OUL VKHANOM LHTY IUIYKL,"LUPX HGY HZ MOY GAKLYTUPXL MH IKPGWY UGXKYC COH CUL LPMMPGN HG U WOPSX'LSPMMSY WOUPK COPSY, ZKHCGPGN UGX CPMO MKYTVSPGN OUGXL, OY IHAKYX XKHILZKHT U TYXPWPGY VHMMSY PGMH U CPGYNSULL OUSZ ZASS HZ CUMYK."COUM PL PM?" OY LUPX WKHLLSE, UGX, OPL OUGX LOURPGN AGPGMYGMPHGUSSE,OY IHAKYX MHH TUGE XKHIL PGMH MOY NSULL. OY MOKYC MOY TPDMAKY HGMH MOYZSHHK UGX ULRYX ZHK LHTY THKY CUMYK. MOY TUPX VKHANOM PM.MOYKY CYKY PG MOY KHHT U WOPSX'L WHM, MCH VHDYL, MCH UKTWOUPKL, UMUVSY, U WOPSX'L MUVSY, UGX MOY SPMMSY WOUPK HG COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC CULLPMMPGN. MOY WAKMUPGL CYKY XKUCG, UGX U LPGNSY WUGXSY CUL VAKGPGN HG MOYMUVSY, LWKYYGYX VE U VHAGX TALPW VHHR LH MOUM MOY SPNOM XPX GHM ZUSS HGMOY WHM."TE XYUK," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, UXXKYLLPGN OYK VKHMOYK ZKHT VYLPXY MOYWHM COYKY LOY CUL LMUGXPGN, "VYMMYK CUPM U VPM... SUMYK...""HO, SYUBY HZZ, EHA USCUEL MUSR GHGLYGLY UGX RYYI IAMMPGN MOPGNLHZZ--UGX MOPL PL COUM WHTYL HZ PM!" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC PG UG YDULIYKUMYXCOPLIYK, YBPXYGMSE TYUGPGN MH CHAGX OPL LPLMYK."TE XYUK, KYUSSE... PM'L VYMMYK GHM MH CURY OPT... OY'L ULSYYI," LUPXMOY IKPGWYLL PG U MHGY HZ YGMKYUME.IKPGWY UGXKYC NHM AI UGX CYGM HG MPIMHY AI MH MOY SPMMSY VYX, CPGYNSULLPG OUGX."IYKOUIL CY'X KYUSSE VYMMYK GHM CURY OPT," OY LUPX OYLPMUMPGN."UL EHA ISYULY... KYUSSE... P MOPGR LH... VAM UL EHA ISYULY," LUPXIKPGWYLL TUKE, YBPXYGMSE PGMPTPXUMYX UGX WHGZALYX MOUM OYK HIPGPHG OUXIKYBUPSYX. LOY XKYC OYK VKHMOYK'L UMMYGMPHG MH MOY TUPX COH CUL WUSSPGNOPT PG U COPLIYK.PM CUL MOY LYWHGX GPNOM MOUM GYPMOYK HZ MOYT OUX LSYIM, CUMWOPGN MOY VHECOH CUL PG U OPNO ZYBYK. MOYLY SULM XUEL, TPLMKALMPGN MOYPK OHALYOHSXXHWMHK UGX YDIYWMPGN UGHMOYK ZHK COHT MOYE OUX LYGM MH MHCG, MOYE OUXVYYG MKEPGN ZPKLM HGY KYTYXE UGX MOYG UGHMOYK. CHKG HAM VE LSYYISYLLGYLLUGX UGDPYME MOYE MOKYC MOYPK VAKXYG HZ LHKKHC HG HGY UGHMOYK UGXKYIKHUWOYX UGX XPLIAMYX CPMO YUWO HMOYK."IYMKALOU OUL WHTY CPMO IUIYKL ZKHT EHAK ZUMOYK," COPLIYKYX MOY TUPX.IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM HAM."XYBPS MURY MOYT!" OY TAMMYKYX, UGX UZMYK SPLMYGPGN MH MOY BYKVUSPGLMKAWMPHGL OPL ZUMOYK OUX LYGM UGX MURPGN MOY WHKKYLIHGXYGWY UGX OPLZUMOYK'L SYMMYK, OY KYMAKGYX MH MOY GAKLYKE."CYSS?" OY ULRYX."LMPSS MOY LUTY. CUPM, ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY. RUKS PBUGPWO USCUEL LUEL MOUMLSYYI PL THKY PTIHKMUGM MOUG UGEMOPGN," COPLIYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO ULPNO.IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM AI MH MOY WOPSX UGX ZYSM OPT. OY CUL VAKGPGN OHM."WHGZHAGX EHA UGX EHAK RUKS PBUGPWO!" OY MHHR MOY NSULL CPMO MOY XKHILUGX UNUPG CYGM AI MH MOY WHM."UGXKYC, XHG'M!" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE.VAM OY LWHCSYX UM OYK UGNKPSE MOHANO USLH CPMO LAZZYKPGN PG OPL YEYL,UGX LMHHIYX NSULL PG OUGX HBYK MOY PGZUGM."VAM P CPLO PM," OY LUPX. "P VYN EHA--NPBY PM OPT!"IKPGWYLL TUKE LOKANNYX OYK LOHASXYKL VAM MHHR MOY NSULL LAVTPLLPBYSEUGX WUSSPGN MOY GAKLY VYNUG NPBPGN MOY TYXPWPGY. MOY WOPSX LWKYUTYXOHUKLYSE. IKPGWY UGXKYC CPGWYX UGX, WSAMWOPGN OPL OYUX, CYGM HAM UGX LUMXHCG HG U LHZU PG MOY GYDM KHHT.OY LMPSS OUX USS MOY SYMMYKL PG OPL OUGX. HIYGPGN MOYT TYWOUGPWUSSE OYVYNUG KYUXPGN. MOY HSX IKPGWY, GHC UGX MOYG ALPGN UVVKYBPUMPHGL, CKHMYPG OPL SUKNY YSHGNUMYX OUGX HG VSAY IUIYK UL ZHSSHCL:OUBY QALM MOPL THTYGM KYWYPBYX VE LIYWPUS TYLLYGNYK BYKE QHEZAS GYCL--PZPM'L GHM ZUSLY. VYGGPNLYG LYYTL MH OUBY HVMUPGYX U WHTISYMY BPWMHKEHBYK VAHGUIUKMY UM YESUA. PG IYMYKLVAKN YBYKEHGY PL KYQHPWPGN, UGXMOY KYCUKXL LYGM MH MOY UKTE UKY PGGATYKUVSY. MOHANO OY PL U NYKTUG--PWHGNKUMASUMY OPT! P WUG'M TURY HAM COUM MOY WHTTUGXYK UM RHKWOYBH--UWYKMUPG ROUGXKPRHB--PL AI MH; MPSS GHC MOY UXXPMPHGUS TYG UGX IKHBPLPHGLOUBY GHM UKKPBYX. NUSSHI HZZ MH OPT UM HGWY UGX LUE P'SS OUBY OPL OYUXHZZ PZ YBYKEMOPGN PL GHM OYKY PG U CYYR. OUBY KYWYPBYX UGHMOYK SYMMYKUVHAM MOY IKYALLPLWO-YESUA VUMMSY ZKHT IYMYGRU--OY MHHR IUKM PG PM--UGXPM'L USS MKAY. COYG TPLWOPYZ-TURYKL XHG'M TYXXSY YBYG U NYKTUG VYUMLVAHGUIUKMY. OY PL LUPX MH VY ZSYYPGN PG NKYUM XPLHKXYK. TPGX EHA NUSSHIHZZ MH RHKWOYBH CPMOHAM XYSUE UGX WUKKE HAM PGLMKAWMPHGL!IKPGWY UGXKYC LPNOYX UGX VKHRY MOY LYUS HZ UGHMOYK YGBYSHIY. PM CULU WSHLYSE CKPMMYG SYMMYK HZ MCH LOYYML ZKHT VPSPVPG. OY ZHSXYX PM AICPMOHAM KYUXPGN PM UGX KYKYUX OPL ZUMOYK'L SYMMYK, YGXPGN CPMO MOYCHKXL: "NUSSHI HZZ MH RHKWOYBH UGX WUKKE HAM PGLMKAWMPHGL!""GH, IUKXHG TY, P CHG'M NH GHC MPSS MOY WOPSX PL VYMMYK," MOHANOM OY,NHPGN MH MOY XHHK UGX SHHRPGN PGMH MOY GAKLYKE.IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LMPSS LMUGXPGN VE MOY WHM, NYGMSE KHWRPGN MOY VUVE."UO EYL, UGX COUM YSLY XPX OY LUE MOUM'L AGISYULUGM?" MOHANOM IKPGWYUGXKYC, KYWUSSPGN OPL ZUMOYK'L SYMMYK. "EYL, CY OUBY NUPGYX U BPWMHKEHBYK VHGUIUKMY, QALM COYG P'T GHM LYKBPGN. EYL, EYL, OY'L USCUEL IHRPGNZAG UM TY.... UO, CYSS! SYM OPT!" UGX OY VYNUG KYUXPGN VPSPVPG'L SYMMYKCOPWO CUL CKPMMYG PG ZKYGWO. OY KYUX CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN OUSZ HZ PM,KYUX HGSE MH ZHKNYM, PZ VAM ZHK U THTYGM, COUM OY OUX MHH SHGN VYYGMOPGRPGN HZ LH IUPGZASSE MH MOY YDWSALPHG HZ USS YSLY.WOUIMYK PDVPSPVPG CUL GHC UM UKTE OYUXJAUKMYKL PG U XPISHTUMPW WUIUWPME, UGXMOHANO OY CKHMY PG ZKYGWO UGX ALYX ZKYGWO QYLML UGX ZKYGWO PXPHTL,OY XYLWKPVYX MOY COHSY WUTIUPNG CPMO U ZYUKSYLL LYSZ-WYGLAKY UGXLYSZ-XYKPLPHG NYGAPGYSE KALLPUG. VPSPVPG CKHMY MOUM MOY HVSPNUMPHG HZXPISHTUMPW XPLWKYMPHG MHKTYGMYX OPT, UGX OY CUL OUIIE MH OUBY PG IKPGWYUGXKYC U KYSPUVSY WHKKYLIHGXYGM MH COHT OY WHASX IHAK HAM MOY VPSY OYOUX UWWATASUMYX UM MOY LPNOM HZ USS MOUM CUL VYPGN XHGY PG MOY UKTE.MOY SYMMYK CUL HSX, OUBPGN VYYG CKPMMYG VYZHKY MOY VUMMSY UMIKYALLPLWO-YESUA."LPGWY MOY XUE HZ HAK VKPSSPUGM LAWWYLL UM UALMYKSPMF," CKHMY VPSPVPG,"UL EHA RGHC, TE XYUK IKPGWY, P GYBYK SYUBY OYUXJAUKMYKL. P OUBYWYKMUPGSE UWJAPKYX U MULMY ZHK CUK, UGX PM PL QALM UL CYSS ZHK TY; COUMP OUBY LYYG XAKPGN MOYLY SULM MOKYY THGMOL PL PGWKYXPVSY."P VYNPG UV HBH. 'MOY YGYTE HZ MOY OATUG KUWY,' UL EHA RGHC, UMMUWRL MOYIKALLPUGL. MOY IKALLPUGL UKY HAK ZUPMOZAS USSPYL COH OUBY HGSE VYMKUEYXAL MOKYY MPTYL PG MOKYY EYUKL. CY MURY AI MOYPK WUALY, VAM PM MAKGL HAMMOUM 'MOY YGYTE HZ MOY OATUG KUWY' IUEL GH OYYX MH HAK ZPGY LIYYWOYLUGX PG OPL KAXY UGX LUBUNY CUE MOKHCL OPTLYSZ HG MOY IKALLPUGL CPMOHAMNPBPGN MOYT MPTY MH ZPGPLO MOY IUKUXY MOYE OUX VYNAG, UGX PG MCH MCPLMLHZ MOY OUGX OY VKYURL MOYT MH LTPMOYKYYGL UGX PGLMUSSL OPTLYSZ PG MOYIUSUWY UM IHMLXUT."'P THLM UKXYGMSE XYLPKY,' CKPMYL MOY RPGN HZ IKALLPU MH VHGUIUKMY,'MOUM EHAK TUQYLME LOHASX VY KYWYPBYX UGX MKYUMYX PG TE IUSUWY PG UTUGGYK UNKYYUVSY MH EHAKLYSZ, UGX PG LH ZUK UL WPKWATLMUGWYL USSHCYX, POUBY OULMYGYX MH MURY USS LMYIL MH MOUM YGX. TUE P OUBY LAWWYYXYX!' MOYIKALLPUG NYGYKUSL IKPXY MOYTLYSBYL HG VYPGN IHSPMY MH MOY ZKYGWO UGX SUEXHCG MOYPK UKTL UM MOY ZPKLM XYTUGX."MOY OYUX HZ MOY NUKKPLHG UM NSHNUA, CPMO MYG MOHALUGX TYG, ULRL MOYRPGN HZ IKALLPU COUM OY PL MH XH PZ OY PL LATTHGYX MH LAKKYGXYK.... USSMOPL PL UVLHSAMYSE MKAY."PG LOHKM, OHIPGN MH LYMMSY TUMMYKL VE MURPGN AI U CUKSPRY UMMPMAXY, PMMAKGL HAM MOUM CY OUBY SUGXYX HAKLYSBYL PG CUK, UGX COUM PL THKY, PGCUK HG HAK HCG ZKHGMPYKL, CPMO UGX ZHK MOY RPGN HZ IKALLPU. CY OUBYYBYKEMOPGN PG IYKZYWM HKXYK, HGSE HGY SPMMSY MOPGN PL SUWRPGN, GUTYSE,U WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. UL PM CUL WHGLPXYKYX MOUM MOY UALMYKSPMF LAWWYLLTPNOM OUBY VYYG THKY XYWPLPBY OUX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ GHM VYYG LHEHAGN, USS HAK HWMHNYGUKPUGL CYKY KYBPYCYX, UGX HZ IKHFHKHBLRPUGX RUTYGLRP MOY SUMMYK CUL IKYZYKKYX. MOY NYGYKUS WHTYL MH AL,LABHKHB-SPRY, PG U RPVPMRU, UGX PL KYWYPBYX CPMO UWWSUTUMPHGL HZ QHE UGXMKPATIO."HG MOY 4MO, MOY ZPKLM WHAKPYK UKKPBYL ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN. MOY TUPSLUKY MURYG MH MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS'L KHHT, ZHK OY SPRYL MH XH YBYKEMOPGNOPTLYSZ. P UT WUSSYX PG MH OYSI LHKM MOY SYMMYKL UGX MURY MOHLY TYUGMZHK AL. MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS SHHRL HG UGX CUPML ZHK SYMMYKL UXXKYLLYXMH OPT. CY LYUKWO, VAM GHGY UKY MH VY ZHAGX. MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS NKHCLPTIUMPYGM UGX LYML MH CHKR OPTLYSZ UGX ZPGXL SYMMYKL ZKHT MOY YTIYKHKMH WHAGM M., IKPGWY B., UGX HMOYKL. MOYG OY VAKLML PGMH HGY HZ OPL CPSXZAKPYL UGX KUNYL UM YBYKEHGY UGX YBYKEMOPGN, LYPFYL MOY SYMMYKL, HIYGLMOYT, UGX KYUXL MOHLY ZKHT MOY YTIYKHK UXXKYLLYX MH HMOYKL. 'UO! LHMOUM'L MOY CUE MOYE MKYUM TY! GH WHGZPXYGWY PG TY! UO, HKXYKYX MH RYYIUG YEY HG TY! BYKE CYSS MOYG! NYM USHGN CPMO EHA!' LH OY CKPMYL MOYZUTHAL HKXYK HZ MOY XUE MH NYGYKUS VYGGPNLYG:'P UT CHAGXYX UGX WUGGHM KPXY UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE WUGGHM WHTTUGX MOY UKTE.EHA OUBY VKHANOM EHAK UKTE WHKIL MH IASMALR, KHAMYX: OYKY PM PL YDIHLYX,UGX CPMOHAM ZAYS HK ZHKUNY, LH LHTYMOPGN TALM VY XHGY, UGX, UL EHAEHAKLYSZ KYIHKMYX MH WHAGM VADOHCXYG EYLMYKXUE, EHA TALM MOPGR HZKYMKYUMPGN MH HAK ZKHGMPYK--COPWO XH MHXUE.'"'ZKHT USS TE KPXPGN,' OY CKPMYL MH MOY YTIYKHK, 'P OUBY NHM U LUXXSYLHKY COPWO, WHTPGN UZMYK USS TE IKYBPHAL QHAKGYEL, JAPMY IKYBYGML TEKPXPGN UGX WHTTUGXPGN LH BULM UG UKTE, LH P OUBY IULLYX HG MOY WHTTUGXMH MOY NYGYKUS GYDM PG LYGPHKPME, WHAGM VADOHCXYG, OUBPGN LYGM OPT TECOHSY LMUZZ UGX USS MOUM VYSHGNL MH PM, UXBPLPGN OPT PZ MOYKY PL U SUWRHZ VKYUX, MH THBY ZUKMOYK PGMH MOY PGMYKPHK HZ IKALLPU, ZHK HGSE HGYXUE'L KUMPHG HZ VKYUX KYTUPGL, UGX PG LHTY KYNPTYGML GHGY UM USS, ULKYIHKMYX VE MOY XPBPLPHG WHTTUGXYKL, HLMYKTUGG UGX LYXTHKYMFRP, UGXUSS MOUM MOY IYULUGML OUX OUL VYYG YUMYG AI. P TELYSZ CPSS KYTUPG PGOHLIPMUS UM HLMKHSYGRU MPSS P KYWHBYK. PG KYNUKX MH COPWO P OATVSELAVTPM TE KYIHKM, CPMO MOY PGZHKTUMPHG MOUM PZ MOY UKTE KYTUPGL PG PMLIKYLYGM VPBHAUW UGHMOYK ZHKMGPNOM MOYKY CPSS GHM VY U OYUSMOE TUG SYZMPG PM VE LIKPGN."'NKUGM SYUBY MH KYMPKY MH OPL WHAGMKE LYUM MH UG HSX TUG COH PL USKYUXEPG UGE WULY XPLOHGHKYX VE VYPGN AGUVSY MH ZASZPSS MOY NKYUM UGXNSHKPHAL MULR ZHK COPWO OY CUL WOHLYG. P LOUSS UCUPM EHAK THLM NKUWPHALIYKTPLLPHG OYKY PG OHLIPMUS, MOUM P TUE GHM OUBY MH ISUE MOY IUKM HZ ULYWKYMUKE KUMOYK MOUG WHTTUGXYK PG MOY UKTE. TE KYTHBUS ZKHT MOY UKTEXHYL GHM IKHXAWY MOY LSPNOMYLM LMPK--U VSPGX TUG OUL SYZM PM. MOYKY UKYMOHALUGXL LAWO UL P PG KALLPU.'"MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS PL UGNKE CPMO MOY YTIYKHK UGX OY IAGPLOYL AL USS,PLG'M PM SHNPWUS?"MOPL PL MOY ZPKLM UWM. MOHLY MOUM ZHSSHC UKY GUMAKUSSE PGWKYULPGNSEPGMYKYLMPGN UGX YGMYKMUPGPGN. UZMYK MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS'L XYIUKMAKY PMUIIYUKL MOUM CY UKY CPMOPG LPNOM HZ MOY YGYTE UGX TALM NPBY VUMMSY.VADOHCXYG PL WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ VE LYGPHKPME, VAM NYGYKUS VYGGPNLYG XHYLGHM JAPMY LYY PM; THKY IUKMPWASUKSE UL PM PL OY UGX OPL WHKIL COH UKYCPMOPG LPNOM HZ MOY YGYTE UGX OY CPLOYL MH IKHZPM VE MOY HIIHKMAGPME MHZPNOM U VUMMSY 'HG OPL HCG OUGX' UL MOY NYKTUGL LUE. OY XHYL LH. MOPLPL MOY VUMMSY HZ IASMALR, COPWO PL WHGLPXYKYX U NKYUM BPWMHKE VAM PG TEHIPGPHG CUL GHMOPGN HZ MOY RPGX. CY WPBPSPUGL, UL EHA RGHC, OUBY U BYKEVUX CUE HZ XYWPXPGN COYMOYK U VUMMSY CUL CHG HK SHLM. MOHLY COH KYMKYUMUZMYK U VUMMSY OUBY SHLM PM PL COUM CY LUE; UGX UWWHKXPGN MH MOUM PM PLCY COH SHLM MOY VUMMSY HZ IASMALR. PG LOHKM, CY KYMKYUM UZMYK MOY VUMMSYVAM LYGX U WHAKPYK MH IYMYKLVAKN CPMO GYCL HZ U BPWMHKE, UGX NYGYKUSVYGGPNLYG, OHIPGN MH KYWYPBY ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN MOY IHLM HZ WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ UL U KYCUKX ZHK OPL BPWMHKE, XHYL GHM NPBY AI MOY WHTTUGX HZMOY UKTE MH NYGYKUS VADOHCXYG. XAKPGN MOPL PGMYKKYNGAT CY VYNPG U BYKEHKPNPGUS UGX PGMYKYLMPGN LYKPYL HZ TUGYABYKL. HAK UPT PL GH SHGNYK, ULPM LOHASX VY, MH UBHPX HK UMMUWR MOY YGYTE, VAM LHSYSE MH UBHPXNYGYKUS VADOHCXYG COH VE KPNOM HZ LYGPHKPME LOHASX VY HAK WOPYZ. LHYGYKNYMPWUSSE XH CY IAKLAY MOPL UPT MOUM UZMYK WKHLLPGN UG AGZHKXUVSYKPBYK CY VAKG MOY VKPXNYL MH LYIUKUMY HAKLYSBYL ZKHT HAK YGYTE, COH UMMOY THTYGM PL GHM VHGUIUKMY VAM VADOHCXYG. NYGYKUS VADOHCXYG CUL USS VAMUMMUWRYX UGX WUIMAKYX VE U LAIYKPHK YGYTE ZHKWY UL U KYLASM HZ HGY HZMOYLY TUGYABYKL MOUM YGUVSYX AL MH YLWUIY OPT. VADOHCXYG IAKLAYL AL--CYLWAMMSY. OY OUKXSE WKHLLYL MOY KPBYK MH HAK LPXY VYZHKY CY KYWKHLL MHMOY HMOYK. UM SULM HAK YGYTE. VADOHCXYG, WUMWOYL AL UGX UMMUWRL. VHMONYGYKUSL UKY UGNKE, UGX MOY KYLASM PL U WOUSSYGNY HG VADOHCXYG'L IUKMUGX UG YIPSYIMPW ZPM HG VYGGPNLYG'L. VAM UM MOY WKPMPWUS THTYGM MOYWHAKPYK COH WUKKPYX MOY GYCL HZ HAK BPWMHKE UM IASMALR MH IYMYKLVAKNKYMAKGL VKPGNPGN HAK UIIHPGMTYGM UL WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, UGX HAK ZPKLMZHY, VADOHCXYG, PL BUGJAPLOYX; CY WUG GHC MAKG HAK MOHANOML MH MOYLYWHGX, VHGUIUKMY. VAM UL PM MAKGL HAM, QALM UM MOUM THTYGM U MOPKXYGYTE KPLYL VYZHKY AL--GUTYSE MOY HKMOHXHD KALLPUG LHSXPYKL, SHAXSEXYTUGXPGN VKYUX, TYUM, VPLWAPML, ZHXXYK, UGX COUMGHM! MOPL NKUMPMAXY KYTPGXYX OPT HZ OHC TAWO THKY OY TPNOM XHZHK MOYLY LPTISY, RPGXSE IYHISY.MOY WOPYZ LMYCUKX, U BYKE LMAIPX VAM WAGGPGN TUG COH LUC IYKZYWMSEMOKHANO MOY GUPBY UGX PGMYSSPNYGM WHAGM UGX ISUEYX CPMO OPT UL CPMOU MHE, LYYPGN MOY YZZYWM MOYLY IKYUKKUGNYX KYWYIMPHGL OUX HG IPYKKY,IKYLLYX OPT LMPSS OUKXYK CPMO IKHHZL HZ MOY PTIHLLPVPSPME UGX UVHBY USSMOY ALYSYLLGYLL HZ ZKYYPGN MOY LYKZL, COH CYKY JAPMY OUIIE UL PM CUL.IPYKKY PG OPL LYWKYM LHAS UNKYYX CPMO MOY LMYCUKX MOUM PM CHASX VYXPZZPWASM MH PTUNPGY OUIIPYK IYHISY, UGX MOUM NHX HGSE RGYC COUM CHASXOUIIYG MH MOYT COYG MOYE CYKY ZKYY, VAM OY PGLPLMYX, MOHANO KYSAWMUGMSE,HG COUM OY MOHANOM KPNOM. MOY LMYCUKX IKHTPLYX MH XH USS PG OPL IHCYKMH WUKKE HAM MOY WHAGM'L CPLOYL, LYYPGN WSYUKSE MOUM GHM HGSE CHASX MOYWHAGM GYBYK VY UVSY MH ZPGX HAM COYMOYK USS TYULAKYL OUX VYYG MURYG ZHKMOY LUSY HZ MOY SUGX UGX ZHKYLML UGX MH KYSYULY MOYT ZKHT MOY SUGX VUGR,VAM CHASX IKHVUVSE GYBYK YBYG PGJAPKY UGX CHASX GYBYK RGHC MOUM MOYGYCSE YKYWMYX VAPSXPGNL CYKY LMUGXPGN YTIME UGX MOUM MOY LYKZL WHGMPGAYXMH NPBY PG THGYE UGX CHKR USS MOUM HMOYK IYHISY'L LYKZL NUBY--MOUM PL MHLUE, USS MOUM WHASX VY NHM HAM HZ MOYT.WOUIMYK DPKYMAKGPGN ZKHT OPL QHAKGYE MOKHANO LHAMO KALLPU PG MOY OUIIPYLM LMUMYHZ TPGX, IPYKKY WUKKPYX HAM UG PGMYGMPHG OY OUX SHGN OUX HZ BPLPMPGN OPLZKPYGX VHSRHGLRP, COHT OY OUX GHM LYYG ZHK MCH EYUKL.VHNAWOUKHBH SUE PG U ZSUM AGPGMYKYLMPGN IUKM HZ MOY WHAGMKE UTHGN ZPYSXLUGX ZHKYLML HZ ZPK UGX VPKWO, COPWO CYKY IUKMSE WAM XHCG. MOY OHALY SUEVYOPGX U GYCSE XAN IHGX ZPSSYX CPMO CUMYK MH MOY VKPGR UGX CPMO VUGRLLMPSS VUKY HZ NKULL. PM CUL UM MOY YGX HZ U BPSSUNY MOUM LMKYMWOYXUSHGN MOY OPNOKHUX PG MOY TPXLM HZ U EHAGN WHILY PG COPWO CYKY U ZYC ZPKMKYYL.MOY OHTYLMYUX WHGLPLMYX HZ U MOKYLOPGN ZSHHK, HAMOHALYL, LMUVSYL, UVUMOOHALY, U SHXNY, UGX U SUKNY VKPWR OHALY CPMO LYTPWPKWASUK ZUWUXYLMPSS PG WHAKLY HZ WHGLMKAWMPHG. KHAGX MOY OHALY CUL U NUKXYG GYCSE SUPXHAM. MOY ZYGWYL UGX NUMYL CYKY GYC UGX LHSPX; MCH ZPKY IATIL UGX UCUMYK WUKM, IUPGMYX NKYYG, LMHHX PG U LOYX; MOY IUMOL CYKY LMKUPNOM,MOY VKPXNYL CYKY LMKHGN UGX OUX OUGXKUPSL. YBYKEMOPGN VHKY UG PTIKYLL HZMPXPGYLL UGX NHHX TUGUNYTYGM. LHTY XHTYLMPW LYKZL IPYKKY TYM, PG KYISEMH PGJAPKPYL UL MH COYKY MOY IKPGWY SPBYX, IHPGMYX HAM U LTUSS GYCSEVAPSM SHXNY WSHLY MH MOY IHGX. UGMHG, U TUG COH OUX SHHRYX UZMYK IKPGWYUGXKYC PG OPL VHEOHHX, OYSIYX IPYKKY HAM HZ OPL WUKKPUNY, LUPX MOUM MOYIKPGWY CUL UM OHTY, UGX LOHCYX OPT PGMH U WSYUG SPMMSY UGMYKHHT.IPYKKY CUL LMKAWR VE MOY THXYLME HZ MOY LTUSS MOHANO WSYUG OHALY UZMYKMOY VKPSSPUGM LAKKHAGXPGNL PG COPWO OY OUX SULM TYM OPL ZKPYGX PGIYMYKLVAKN.OY JAPWRSE YGMYKYX MOY LTUSS KYWYIMPHG KHHT CPMO PML LMPSS-AGISULMYKYXCHHXYG CUSSL KYXHSYGM HZ IPGY, UGX CHASX OUBY NHGY ZUKMOYK, VAM UGMHGKUG UOYUX HG MPIMHY UGX RGHWRYX UM U XHHK."CYSS, COUM PL PM?" WUTY U LOUKI, AGISYULUGM BHPWY."U BPLPMHK," UGLCYKYX UGMHG."ULR OPT MH CUPM," UGX MOY LHAGX CUL OYUKX HZ U WOUPK VYPGN IALOYX VUWR.IPYKKY CYGM CPMO KUIPX LMYIL MH MOY XHHK UGX LAXXYGSE WUTY ZUWY MHZUWY CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH WUTY HAM ZKHCGPGN UGX SHHRPGN HSX. IPYKKYYTVKUWYX OPT UGX SPZMPGN OPL LIYWMUWSYL RPLLYX OPL ZKPYGX HG MOY WOYYRUGX SHHRYX UM OPT WSHLYSE."CYSS, P XPX GHM YDIYWM EHA, P UT BYKE NSUX," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC.IPYKKY LUPX GHMOPGN; OY SHHRYX ZPDYXSE UM OPL ZKPYGX CPMO LAKIKPLY. OYCUL LMKAWR VE MOY WOUGNY PG OPT. OPL CHKXL CYKY RPGXSE UGX MOYKY CUL ULTPSY HG OPL SPIL UGX ZUWY, VAM OPL YEYL CYKY XASS UGX SPZYSYLL UGX PGLIPMY HZ OPL YBPXYGM CPLO MH XH LH OY WHASX GHM NPBY MOYT U QHEHALUGX NSUX LIUKRSY. IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX NKHCG MOPGGYK, IUSYK, UGX THKYTUGSE-SHHRPGN, VAM COUM UTUFYX UGX YLMKUGNYX IPYKKY MPSS OY NHM ALYXMH PM CYKY OPL PGYKMPU UGX U CKPGRSY HG OPL VKHC PGXPWUMPGN IKHSHGNYXWHGWYGMKUMPHG HG LHTY HGY MOHANOM.UL PL ALAUSSE MOY WULY CPMO IYHISY TYYMPGN UZMYK U IKHSHGNYX LYIUKUMPHG,PM CUL SHGN VYZHKY MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG WHASX LYMMSY HG UGEMOPGN. MOYEIAM JAYLMPHGL UGX NUBY VKPYZ KYISPYL UVHAM MOPGNL MOYE RGYC HANOM MHVY MUSRYX HBYK UM SYGNMO. UM SULM MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG NKUXAUSSE LYMMSYX HGLHTY HZ MOY MHIPWL UM ZPKLM SPNOMSE MHAWOYX HG: MOYPK IULM SPZY, ISUGLZHK MOY ZAMAKY, IPYKKY'L QHAKGYEL UGX HWWAIUMPHGL, MOY CUK, UGX LHHG. MOY IKYHWWAIUMPHG UGX XYLIHGXYGWE COPWO IPYKKY OUX GHMPWYX PG OPLZKPYGX'L SHHR CUL GHC LMPSS THKY WSYUKSE YDIKYLLYX PG MOY LTPSY CPMOCOPWO OY SPLMYGYX MH IPYKKY, YLIYWPUSSE COYG OY LIHRY CPMO QHEZASUGPTUMPHG HZ MOY IULM HK MOY ZAMAKY. CYSS, EHA CUGM UG UKNATYGM," OY UXXYX, "WHTY HG MOYG."MOYE KHLY ZKHT MOY MUVSY UGX LUM XHCG PG MOY YGMKUGWY IHKWO COPWO LYKBYXUL U BYKUGXU."WHTY, SYM'L UKNAY MOYG," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "EHA MUSR HZ LWOHHSL," OYCYGM HG, WKHHRPGN U ZPGNYK, "YXAWUMPHG UGX LH ZHKMO; MOUM PL, EHA CUGMMH KUPLY OPT" (IHPGMPGN MH U IYULUGM COH IULLYX VE MOYT MURPGN HZZ OPLWUI) "ZKHT OPL UGPTUS WHGXPMPHG UGX UCURYG PG OPT LIPKPMAUS GYYXL, COPSYPM LYYTL MH TY MOUM UGPTUS OUIIPGYLL PL MOY HGSE OUIIPGYLL IHLLPVSY, UGXMOUM PL QALM COUM EHA CUGM MH XYIKPBY OPT HZ. P NH MH VYX UZMYK MCH PG MOY THKGPGN,MOHANOML WHTY UGX P WUG'M LSYYI VAM MHLL UVHAM MPSS XUCG, VYWUALY PMOPGR UGX WUG'M OYSI MOPGRPGN, QALM UL OY WUG'M OYSI ISHCPGN UGX THCPGN;PZ OY XPXG'M, OY CHASX NH MH MOY XKPGR LOHI HK ZUSS PSS. UGX IKPGWY UGXKYCWKHHRYX U MOPKX ZPGNYK. "UO, EYL, OHLIPMUSL, TYXPWPGY. OY OUL U ZPM,OY PL XEPGN, UGX EHA WHTY UGX VSYYX OPT UGX IUMWO OPT AI. OY CPSS XKUNUVHAM UL U WKPIISY, U VAKXYG MH YBYKEVHXE, ZHK UGHMOYK MYG EYUKL. PMCHASX VY ZUK YULPYK UGX LPTISYK ZHK OPT MH XPY. HMOYKL UKY VYPGN VHKGUGX MOYKY UKY ISYGME HZ MOYT UL PM PL. PM CHASX VY XPZZYKYGM PZ EHANKAXNYX SHLPGN U SUVHKYK--MOUM'L OHC P KYNUKX OPT--VAM EHA CUGM MH WAKYOPT ZKHT SHBY HZ OPT. UGX OY XHYL GHM CUGM MOUM. UGX VYLPXYL, COUM UGHMPHG MOUM TYXPWPGY YBYK WAKYX UGEHGY! RPSSYX MOYT, EYL!" LUPX OY,ZKHCGPGN UGNKPSE UGX MAKGPGN UCUE ZKHT IPYKKY.IKPGWY UGXKYC YDIKYLLYX OPL PXYUL LH WSYUKSE UGX XPLMPGWMSE MOUM PM CULYBPXYGM OY OUX KYZSYWMYX HG MOPL LAVQYWM THKY MOUG HGWY, UGX OY LIHRYKYUXPSE UGX KUIPXSE SPRY U TUG COH OUL GHM MUSRYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY. OPLNSUGWY VYWUTY THKY UGPTUMYX UL OPL WHGWSALPHGL VYWUTY THKY OHIYSYLL."HO, MOUM PL XKYUXZAS, XKYUXZAS!" LUPX IPYKKY. "P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX OHCHGY WUG SPBY CPMO LAWO PXYUL. P OUX LAWO THTYGML TELYSZ GHM SHGN UNH, PGTHLWHC UGX COYG MKUBYSPGN, VAM UM LAWO MPTYL P WHSSUILYX LH MOUM P XHG'MSPBY UM USS--YBYKEMOPGN LYYTL OUMYZAS MH TY... TELYSZ THLM HZ USS. MOYGP XHG'M YUM, XHG'M CULO... UGX OHC PL PM CPMO EHA?...""COE GHM CULO? MOUM PL GHM WSYUGSE," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC; "HG MOYWHGMKUKE HGY TALM MKE MH TURY HGY'L SPZY UL ISYULUGM UL IHLLPVSY. P'TUSPBY, MOUM PL GHM TE ZUASM, LH P TALM SPBY HAM TE SPZY UL VYLM P WUGCPMOHAM OAKMPGN HMOYKL.""VAM CPMO LAWO PXYUL COUM THMPBY OUBY EHA ZHK SPBPGN? HGY CHASX LPMCPMOHAM THBPGN, AGXYKMURPGN GHMOPGN....""SPZY UL PM PL SYUBYL HGY GH IYUWY. P LOHASX VY MOUGRZAS MH XH GHMOPGN,VAM OYKY HG MOY HGY OUGX MOY SHWUS GHVPSPME OUBY XHGY TY MOY OHGHK MHWOHHLY TY MH VY MOYPK TUKLOUS; PM CUL USS P WHASX XH MH NYM HAM HZ PM.MOYE WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOUM P OUBY GHM MOY GYWYLLUKE JAUSPZPWUMPHGLZHK PM--MOY RPGX HZ NHHX-GUMAKYX, ZALLE LOUSSHCGYLL GYWYLLUKE ZHK MOYIHLPMPHG. "P XPXGHM, UGX XH GHM, PG MOY SYULM WUKY UVHAM MOUM LWHAGXKYS HZ U WSYKR COHOUX LMHSYG LHTY VHHML ZKHT MOY KYWKAPML; P LOHASX YBYG OUBY VYYG BYKENSUX MH LYY OPT OUGNYX, VAM P CUL LHKKE ZHK TE ZUMOYK--MOUM UNUPG PL ZHKTELYSZ."IKPGWY UGXKYC NKYC THKY UGX THKY UGPTUMYX. OPL YEYL NSPMMYKYX ZYBYKPLOSECOPSY OY MKPYX MH IKHBY MH IPYKKY MOUM PG OPL UWMPHGL MOYKY CUL GHXYLPKY MH XH NHHX MH OPL GYPNOVHK."MOYKY GHC, EHA CPLO MH SPVYKUMY EHAK LYKZL," OY WHGMPGAYX; "MOUM PL UBYKE NHHX MOPGN, VAM GHM ZHK EHA--P XHG'M LAIIHLY EHA YBYK OUX UGEHGYZSHNNYX HK LYGM MH LPVYKPU--UGX LMPSS SYLL ZHK EHAK LYKZL. U MOHALUGX MPTYL GH! P LOUSS GYBYK UNKYY CPMO EHA," LUPXIPYKKY.WOUIMYK DPPPG MOY YBYGPGN UGXKYC UGX IPYKKY NHM PGMH MOY HIYG WUKKPUNY UGX XKHBY MHVUSX OPSSL. CY TALM SPBY, CYTALM SHBY, UGX CY TALM VYSPYBY MOUM CY SPBY GHM HGSE MHXUE HG MOPL LWKUIHZ YUKMO, VAM OUBY SPBYX UGX LOUSS SPBY ZHKYBYK, MOYKY, PG MOY COHSY,"LUPX IPYKKY, UGX OY IHPGMYX MH MOY LRE.IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHHX SYUGPGN HG MOY KUPSPGN HZ MOY KUZM SPLMYGPGN MHIPYKKY, UGX OY NUFYX CPMO OPL YEYL ZPDYX HG MOY KYX KYZSYWMPHG HZ MOYLAG NSYUTPGN HG MOY VSAY CUMYKL. MOHANO HAMCUKXSE OY WHGMPGAYX MH SPBY PG MOY LUTY HSXCUE, PGCUKXSE OY VYNUG U GYC SPZY.WOUIMYK DPPPPM CUL NYMMPGN XALR COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX IPYKKY XKHBY AI MH MOY ZKHGMYGMKUGWY HZ MOY OHALY UM VUSX OPSSL. U CHTUG, VYGM CPMO UNY, CPMO U CUSSYM HG OYK VUWR,UGX U LOHKM, SHGN-OUPKYX, EHAGN TUG PG U VSUWR NUKTYGM OUX KALOYX VUWRMH MOY NUMY HG LYYPGN MOY WUKKPUNY XKPBPGN AI. MCH CHTYG KUG HAM UZMYKMOYT, UGX USS ZHAK, SHHRPGN KHAGX UM MOY WUKKPUNY, KUG PG XPLTUE AI MOYLMYIL HZ MOY VUWR IHKWO."MOHLY UKY TUKE'L 'NHX'L ZHSR,'" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. ULRYX IPYKKY.IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX GH MPTY MH UGLCYK. MOY LYKBUGML WUTY HAM MH TYYM MOYT,UGX OY ULRYX COYKY MOY HSX IKPGWY CUL UGX COYMOYK OY CUL YDIYWMYX VUWRLHHG.MOY HSX IKPGWY OUX NHGY MH MOY MHCG UGX CUL YDIYWMYX VUWR UGE TPGAMY.IKPGWY UGXKYC SYX IPYKKY MH OPL HCG UIUKMTYGML, COPWO CYKY USCUEL RYIMPG IYKZYWM HKXYK UGX KYUXPGYLL ZHK OPT PG OPL ZUMOYK'L OHALY; OY OPTLYSZCYGM MH MOY GAKLYKE."SYM AL NH UGX LYY TE LPLMYK," OY LUPX MH IPYKKY COYG OY KYMAKGYX."P OUBY GHM ZHAGX OYK EYM, LOY PL OPXPGN GHC, LPMMPGN CPMO OYK 'NHX'LZHSR.' PM CPSS LYKBY OYK KPNOM, LOY CPSS VY WHGZALYX, VAM EHA CPSS LYYOYK 'NHX'L ZHSR.' PM'L KYUSSE BYKE WAKPHAL.""COUM UKY 'NHX'L ZHSR'?" ULRYX IPYKKY."WHTY, UGX EHA'SS LYY ZHK EHAKLYSZ."IKPGWYLL TUKE KYUSSE CUL XPLWHGWYKMYX UGX KYX IUMWOYL WUTY HG OYK ZUWYCOYG MOYE CYGM PG. PG OYK LGAN KHHT, CPMO SUTIL VAKGPGN VYZHKY MOY PWHGLMUGX, U EHAGN SUX CPMO U SHGN GHLY UGX SHGN OUPK, CYUKPGN U THGR'LWULLHWR, LUM HG MOY LHZU VYLPXY OYK, VYOPGX U LUTHBUK. QY LAPL MKYL WHGMYGMY XY BHAL BHPK," * LOY LUPXMH IPYKKY UL OY RPLLYX OYK OUGX. UZMYK YDWOUGNPGN MOY ZPKLMNKYYMPGNL, MOYE LUM XHCG.    * "XYSPNOMYX MH LYY EHA. P UT BYKE NSUX MH LYY EHA.""UO, UGX PBUGALORU PL OYKY MHH!" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, NSUGWPGN CPMO ULTPSY UM MOY EHAGN IPSNKPT."UGXKYC!" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, PTISHKPGNSE. "PS ZUAM JAY BHAL LUWOPYF JAYW'YLM AGY ZYTTY," * LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH IPYKKY."UGXKYC, UA GHT XY XPYA!" *(2) IKPGWYLL TUKE KYIYUMYX.     * "EHA TALM RGHC MOUM MOPL PL U CHTUG."     * (2) "ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY."PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC'L PKHGPWUS MHGY MHCUKX MOY IPSNKPTLUGX IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OYSISYLL UMMYTIML MH IKHMYWM MOYT CYKY MOYPKWALMHTUKE SHGN-YLMUVSPLOYX KYSUMPHGL HG MOY TUMMYK."TUPL, TU VHGGY UTPY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "BHAL XYBKPYF UA WHGMKUPKYT'YMKY KYWHGGUPLLUGMY XY WY JAY Q'YDISPJAY U IPYKKY BHMKY PGMPTPMY UBYWWY QYAGY OHTTY." *     * "VAM, TE XYUK, EHA HANOM HG MOY WHGMKUKE MH VY NKUMYZAS MH     TY ZHK YDISUPGPGN MH IPYKKY EHAK PGMPTUWE CPMO MOPL EHAGN     TUG.""KYUSSE?" LUPX IPYKKY, NUFPGN HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL CPMO WAKPHLPME UGXLYKPHALGYLL (ZHK COPWO IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LIYWPUSSE NKUMYZAS MH OPT) PGMHPBUGALORU'L ZUWY, COH, LYYPGN MOUM LOY CUL VYPGN LIHRYG UVHAM, SHHRYXKHAGX UM MOYT USS CPMO WKUZME YEYL.IKPGWYLL TUKE'L YTVUKKULLTYGM HG OYK IYHISY'L UWWHAGM CUL JAPMYAGGYWYLLUKE. MOYE CYKY GHM PG MOY SYULM UVULOYX. MOY HSX CHTUG, SHCYKPGNOYK YEYL VAM WULMPGN LPXY NSUGWYL UM MOY GYCWHTYKL, OUX MAKGYX OYK WAIAILPXY XHCG UGX ISUWYX U GPVVSYX VPM HZ LANUK VYLPXY PM, UGX LUMJAPYMSE PG OYK UKTWOUPK, MOHANO OHIPGN MH VY HZZYKYX UGHMOYK WAI HZ MYU.PBUGALORU, LPIIPGN HAM HZ OYK LUAWYK, SHHRYX CPMO LSE CHTUGPLO YEYL ZKHTAGXYK OYK VKHCL UM MOY EHAGN TYG."COYKY OUBY EHA VYYG? MH RPYB?" IKPGWY UGXKYC ULRYX MOY HSX CHTUG."P OUBY, NHHX LPK," LOY UGLCYKYX NUKKASHALSE. "QALM UM WOKPLMTULMPTY PCUL XYYTYX CHKMOE MH IUKMURY HZ MOY OHSE UGX OYUBYGSE LUWKUTYGM UM MOYLOKPGY HZ MOY LUPGM. UGX GHC P'T ZKHT RHSEUFPG, TULMYK, COYKY U NKYUMUGX CHGXYKZAS VSYLLPGN OUL VYYG KYBYUSYX.""UGX CUL PBUGALORU CPMO EHA?""P NH VE TELYSZ, VYGYZUWMHK," LUPX PBUGALORU, MKEPGN MH LIYUR PG U VULLBHPWY. "P HGSE WUTY UWKHLL IYSUNYEU PG EAROGHBH..."IYSUNYEU PGMYKKAIMYX OYK WHTIUGPHG; LOY YBPXYGMSE CPLOYX MH MYSS COUMLOY OUX LYYG."PG RHSEUFPG, TULMYK, U CHGXYKZAS VSYLLPGN OUL VYYG KYBYUSYX.""COUM PL PM? OY PL RPGX, OY PLHGY HZ NHX'L WOHLYG, OY'L U VYGYZUWMHK, OY HGWY NUBY TY MYG KAVSYL, PKYTYTVYK. COYG P CUL PG RPYB, WKUFE WEKPS LUEL MH TY (OY'L HGY HZ NHX'LHCG UGX NHYL VUKYZHHM LATTYK UGX CPGMYK), OY LUEL, 'COE UKY EHA GHMNHPGN MH MOY KPNOM ISUWY? NH MH RHSEUFPG COYKY U CHGXYK-CHKRPGN PWHG HZMOY OHSE THMOYK HZ NHX OUL VYYG KYBYUSYX.' HG OYUKPGN MOHLY CHKXL P LUPXNHHX-VE MH MOY OHSE ZHSR UGX CYGM."USS CYKY LPSYGM, HGSE MOY IPSNKPT CHTUG CYGM HG PG TYULAKYX MHGYL,XKUCPGN PG OYK VKYUMO."LH P WHTY, TULMYK, UGX MOY IYHISY LUE MH TY: 'U NKYUM VSYLLPGN OUL VYYGKYBYUSYX, OHSE HPS MKPWRSYL ZKHT MOY WOYYRL HZ HAK VSYLLYX THMOYK, MOYOHSE BPKNPG THMOYK HZ NHX'....""USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM, EHA WUG MYSS AL UZMYKCUKXL," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE,ZSALOPGN."SYM TY ULR OYK," LUPX IPYKKY. "HO,XHG'M LIYUR LH, TULMYK! MOYKY CUL U NYGYKUS COH XPX GHM VYSPYBY, UGXLUPX, 'MOY THGRL WOYUM,' UGX UL LHHG UL OY'X LUPX PM OY CYGM VSPGX. UGXOY XKYUTYX MOUM MOY OHSE BPKNPG THMOYK HZ MOY RPYB WUMUWHTVL WUTY MH OPTUGX LUPX, 'VYSPYBY PG TY UGX P CPSS TURY EHA COHSY.' LH OY VYNNYX: 'MURYTY MH OYK, MURY TY MH OYK.' PM'L MOY KYUS MKAMO P'T MYSSPGN EHA, P LUCPM TELYSZ. LH OY CUL VKHANOM, JAPMY VSPGX, LMKUPNOM MH OYK, UGX OY NHYLAI MH OYK UGX ZUSSL XHCG UGX LUEL, 'TURY TY COHSY,' LUEL OY, 'UGX P'SSNPBY MOYY COUM MOY MLUK VYLMHCYX HG TY.' P LUC PM TELYSZ, TULMYK, MOYLMUK PL ZPDYX PGMH MOY PWHG. CYSS, UGX COUM XH EHA MOPGR? OY KYWYPBYXOPL LPNOM! PM'L U LPG MH LIYUR LH. NHX CPSS IAGPLO EHA," LOY LUPXUXTHGPLOPGNSE, MAKGPGN MH IPYKKY."OHC XPX MOY LMUK NYM PGMH MOY PWHG?" IPYKKY ULRYX."UGX CUL MOY OHSE THMOYK IKHTHMYX MH MOY KUGR HZ NYGYKUS?" LOY NHM AIUGX, USTHLM WKEPGN, VYNUG MH UKKUGNY OYK CUSSYM. "PMCUL USS TE ZUASM, UGX UGXKYC CUL HGSE QHRPGN."    * "IKPGWYLL, HG TE CHKX, P XPX GHM CPLO MH HZZYGX OYK."IYSUNYEU LMHIIYX XHAVMZASSE, VAM PG IPYKKY'L ZUWY MOYKY CUL LAWO U SHHRHZ LPGWYKY IYGPMYGWY, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC NSUGWYX LH TYYRSE GHC UM OYK UGXGHC UM IPYKKY, MOUM LOY CUL NKUXAUSSE KYULLAKYX.WOUIMYK DPBMOY IPSNKPT CHTUG CUL UIIYULYX UGX, VYPGN YGWHAKUNYX MH MUSR, NUBY USHGN UWWHAGM HZ ZUMOYK UTIOPSHWOAL, COH SYX LH OHSE U SPZY MOUM OPLOUGXL LTYSSYX HZ PGWYGLY, UGX OHC HG OYK SULM BPLPM MH RPYB LHTY THGRLLOY RGYC SYM OYK OUBY MOY RYEL HZ MOY WUMUWHTVL, UGX OHC LOY, MURPGNLHTY XKPYX VKYUX CPMO OYK, OUX LIYGM MCH XUEL PG MOY WUMUWHTVL CPMO MOYLUPGML. "P'X IKUE UCOPSY MH HGY, IHGXYK UCOPSY, MOYG NH HG MH UGHMOYK.P'X LSYYI U VPM UGX MOYG UNUPG NH UGX RPLL MOY KYSPWL, UGX MOYKY CULLAWO IYUWY USS UKHAGX, LAWO VSYLLYXGYLL, MOUM HGY XHG'M CUGM MH WHTYHAM, YBYG PGMH MOY SPNOM HZ OYUBYG UNUPG."IPYKKY SPLMYGYX MH OYK UMMYGMPBYSE UGX LYKPHALSE. IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGMHAM HZ MOY KHHT, UGX MOYG, SYUBPGN "NHX'L ZHSR" MH ZPGPLO MOYPK MYU,IKPGWYLL TUKE MHHR IPYKKY PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT."EHA UKY BYKE RPGX," LOY LUPX MH OPT."HO, P KYUSSE XPX GHM TYUG MH OAKM OYK ZYYSPGNL. P AGXYKLMUGX MOYT LHCYSS UGX OUBY MOY NKYUMYLM KYLIYWM ZHK MOYT."IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRYX UM OPT LPSYGMSE UGX LTPSYX UZZYWMPHGUMYSE."P OUBY RGHCG EHA U SHGN MPTY, EHA LYY, UGX UT UL ZHGX HZ EHA UL HZ UVKHMOYK," LOY LUPX. "OHC XH EHA ZPGX UGXKYC?" LOY UXXYX OAKKPYXSE, GHMNPBPGN OPT MPTY MH KYISE MH OYK UZZYWMPHGUMY CHKXL. "P UT BYKE UGDPHALUVHAM OPT. OPL OYUSMO CUL VYMMYK PG MOY CPGMYK, VAM SULM LIKPGN OPLCHAGX KYHIYGYX UGX MOY XHWMHK LUPX OY HANOM MH NH UCUE ZHK U WAKY. UGXP UT USLH BYKE TAWO UZKUPX ZHK OPT LIPKPMAUSSE. MHXUE OY PL WOYYKZAS UGX PG NHHX LIPKPML, VAM MOUMPL MOY YZZYWM HZ EHAK BPLPM--OY PL GHM HZMYG SPRY MOUM. PZ EHA WHASXIYKLAUXY OPT MH NH UVKHUX.
