HMOYKL XHG'M GHMPWY PM, VAM P LYY PM."MHCUKX MYG H'WSHWR MOY TYG LYKBUGML KALOYX MH MOY ZKHGM XHHK, OYUKPGNMOY VYSSL HZ MOY HSX IKPGWY'L WUKKPUNY UIIKHUWOPGN. IKPGWY UGXKYC UGXIPYKKY USLH CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO."COH'L MOUM?" ULRYX MOY HSX IKPGWY, GHMPWPGN IPYKKY UL OY NHM HAM HZ MOYWUKKPUNY."UO! BYKE NSUX! RPLL TY," OY LUPX, OUBPGN SYUKGYX COH MOY EHAGN LMKUGNYKCUL.MOY HSX IKPGWY CUL PG U NHHX MYTIYK UGX BYKE NKUWPHAL MH IPYKKY.VYZHKY LAIIYK, IKPGWY UGXKYC, WHTPGN VUWR MH OPL ZUMOYK'L LMAXE, ZHAGXOPT XPLIAMPGN OHMSE CPMO OPL BPLPMHK. MOY HSX IKPGWY XPLIAMYX PMWOUZZPGNSE, VAM CPMOHAM NYMMPGN UGNKE."XKUPG MOY VSHHX ZKHT TYG'L BYPGL UGX IAM PG CUMYK PGLMYUX, MOYG MOYKYCPSS VY GH THKY CUK! HSX CHTYG'L GHGLYGLY--HSX CHTYG'L GHGLYGLY!" OYKYIYUMYX, VAM LMPSS OY IUMMYX IPYKKY UZZYWMPHGUMYSE HG MOY LOHASXYK, UGXMOYG CYGM AI MH MOY MUVSY COYKY IKPGWY UGXKYC, YBPXYGMSE GHM CPLOPGNMH QHPG PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, CUL SHHRPGN HBYK MOY IUIYKL OPL ZUMOYKOUX VKHANOM ZKHT MHCG. MOY HSX IKPGWY CYGM AI MH OPT UGX VYNUG MH MUSRVALPGYLL."MOY TUKLOUS, U WHAGM KHLMHB, OULG'M LYGM OUSZ OPL WHGMPGNYGM. OYWUTY MH MHCG UGX CUGMYX MH PGBPMY TY MH XPGGYK--P NUBY OPT U IKYMMEXPGGYK!... UGX MOYKY, SHHR UM MOPL.... CYSS, TE VHE," MOY HSX IKPGWYCYGM HG, UXXKYLLPGN OPL LHG UGX IUMMPGN IPYKKY HG MOY LOHASXYK. "U ZPGYZYSSHC--EHAK ZKPYGX--P SPRY OPT! OY LMPKL TY AI. UGHMOYK LUEL WSYBYKMOPGNL UGX HGY XHYLG'M WUKY MH SPLMYG, VAM MOPL HGY MUSRL KAVVPLO EYMLMPKL UG HSX ZYSSHC AI. CYSS, NH! NYM USHGN! IYKOUIL P'SS WHTY UGX LPMCPMO EHA UM LAIIYK. CY'SS OUBY UGHMOYK XPLIAMY. TURY ZKPYGXL CPMO TESPMMSY ZHHS, IKPGWYLL TUKE," OY LOHAMYX UZMYK IPYKKY, MOKHANO MOY XHHK.HGSE GHC, HG OPL BPLPM MH VUSX OPSSL, XPX IPYKKY ZASSE KYUSPFY MOYLMKYGNMO UGX WOUKT HZ OPL ZKPYGXLOPI CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC. MOUM WOUKT CULGHM YDIKYLLYX LH TAWO PG OPL KYSUMPHGL CPMO OPT UL CPMO USS OPL ZUTPSEUGX CPMO MOY OHALYOHSX. CPMO MOY LMYKG HSX IKPGWY UGX MOY NYGMSY, MPTPXIKPGWYLL TUKE, MOHANO OY OUX LWUKWYSE RGHCG MOYT, IPYKKY UM HGWY ZYSMSPRY UG HSX ZKPYGX. MOYE CYKY USS ZHGX HZ OPT USKYUXE. GHM HGSE IKPGWYLLTUKE, COH OUX VYYG CHG VE OPL NYGMSYGYLL CPMO MOY IPSNKPTL, NUBY OPT OYKTHLM KUXPUGM SHHRL, VAM YBYG MOY HGY-EYUK-HSX "IKPGWY GPWOHSUL" (UL OPLNKUGXZUMOYK WUSSYX OPT) LTPSYX UM IPYKKY UGX SYM OPTLYSZ VY MURYG PGOPL UKTL, UGX TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY SHHRYX UM OPTCPMO ISYULUGM LTPSYL COYG OY MUSRYX MH MOY HSX IKPGWY.MOY HSX IKPGWY WUTY PG MH LAIIYK; MOPL CUL YBPXYGMSE HG IPYKKY'LUWWHAGM. UGX XAKPGN MOY MCH XUEL HZ MOY EHAGN TUG'L BPLPM OY CULYDMKYTYSE RPGX MH OPT UGX MHSX OPT MH BPLPM MOYT UNUPG.COYG IPYKKY OUX NHGY UGX MOY TYTVYKL HZ MOY OHALYOHSX TYM MHNYMOYK, MOYEVYNUG MH YDIKYLL MOYPK HIPGPHGL HZ OPT UL IYHISY USCUEL XH UZMYK U GYCUWJAUPGMUGWY OUL SYZM, VAM UL LYSXHT OUIIYGL, GH HGY LUPX UGEMOPGN VAMCOUM CUL NHHX HZ OPT.WOUIMYK DBCOYG KYMAKGPGN ZKHT OPL SYUBY, KHLMHB ZYSM, ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY, OHCWSHLY CUL MOY VHGX MOUM AGPMYX OPT MH XYGPLHB UGX MOY COHSY KYNPTYGM.HG UIIKHUWOPGN PM, KHLMHB ZYSM UL OY OUX XHGY COYG UIIKHUWOPGN OPL OHTYPG THLWHC. COYG OY LUC MOY ZPKLM OALLUK CPMO MOY AGVAMMHGYX AGPZHKT HZOPL KYNPTYGM, COYG OY KYWHNGPFYX KYX-OUPKYX XYTYGMEYB UGX LUC MOYIPWRYM KHIYL HZ MOY KHUG OHKLYL, COYG SUBKALORU NSYYZASSE LOHAMYX MH OPLTULMYK, "MOY WHAGM OUL WHTY!" UGX XYGPLHB, COH OUX VYYG ULSYYI HG OPLVYX, KUG USS XPLOYBYSYX HAM HZ MOY TAX OAM MH YTVKUWY OPT, UGX MOYHZZPWYKL WHSSYWMYX KHAGX MH NKYYM MOY GYC UKKPBUS, KHLMHB YDIYKPYGWYXMOY LUTY ZYYSPGN UL COYG OPL THMOYK, OPL ZUMOYK, UGX OPL LPLMYK OUXYTVKUWYX OPT, UGX MYUKL HZ QHE WOHRYX OPT LH MOUM OY WHASX GHM LIYUR.MOY KYNPTYGM CUL USLH U OHTY, UGX UL AGUSMYKUVSE XYUK UGX IKYWPHAL ULOPL IUKYGML' OHALY.COYG OY OUX KYIHKMYX OPTLYSZ MH MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGM UGX OUXVYYG KYULLPNGYX MH OPL ZHKTYK LJAUXKHG, OUX VYYG HG XAME UGX OUX NHGYHAM ZHKUNPGN, COYG OY OUX UNUPG YGMYKYX PGMH USS MOY SPMMSY PGMYKYLMLHZ MOY KYNPTYGM UGX ZYSM OPTLYSZ XYIKPBYX HZ SPVYKME UGX VHAGX PG HGYGUKKHC, AGWOUGNPGN ZKUTY, OY YDIYKPYGWYX MOY LUTY LYGLY HZ IYUWY, HZTHKUS LAIIHKM, UGX MOY LUTY LYGLY HZ VYPGN UM OHTY OYKY PG OPL HCGISUWY, UL OY OUX ZYSM AGXYK MOY IUKYGMUS KHHZ. VAM OYKY CUL GHGY HZUSS MOUM MAKTHPS HZ MOY CHKSX UM SUKNY, COYKY OY XPX GHM RGHC OPL KPNOMISUWY UGX MHHR TPLMURYG XYWPLPHGL; OYKY CUL GH LHGEU CPMO COHT OY HANOM,HK HANOM GHM, MH OUBY UG YDISUGUMPHG; OYKY CUL GH IHLLPVPSPME HZ NHPGNMOYKY HK GHM NHPGN MOYKY; OYKY MOYKY CYKY GHM MCYGME-ZHAK OHAKL PG MOYXUE COPWO WHASX VY LIYGM PG LAWO U BUKPYME HZ CUEL; MOYKY CUL GHM MOUMPGGATYKUVSY WKHCX HZ IYHISY HZ COHT GHM HGY CUL GYUKYK MH OPT HK ZUKMOYKZKHT OPT MOUG UGHMOYK; MOYKY CYKY GHGY HZ MOHLY AGWYKMUPG UGX AGXYZPGYXTHGYE KYSUMPHGL CPMO OPL ZUMOYK, UGX GHMOPGN MH KYWUSS MOUM MYKKPVSYSHLL MH XHSHROHB. OYKY, PG MOY KYNPTYGM, USS CUL WSYUK UGX LPTISY.MOY COHSY CHKSX CUL XPBPXYX PGMH MCH AGYJAUS IUKML: HGY, HAK IUBSHNKUXKYNPTYGM; MOY HMOYK, USS MOY KYLM. UGX MOY KYLM CUL GH WHGWYKG HZOPL. PG MOY KYNPTYGM, YBYKEMOPGN CUL XYZPGPMY: COH CUL SPYAMYGUGM, COHWUIMUPG, COH CUL U NHHX ZYSSHC, COH U VUX HGY, UGX THLM HZ USS, COH CULU WHTKUXY. MOY WUGMYYGRYYIYK NUBY HGY WKYXPM, HGY'L IUE WUTY YBYKE ZHAKTHGMOL, MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MH MOPGR HAM HK XYWPXY, EHA OUX HGSE MH XHGHMOPGN MOUM CUL WHGLPXYKYX VUX PG MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM UGX, COYGNPBYG UG HKXYK, MH XH COUM CUL WSYUKSE, XPLMPGWMSE, UGX XYZPGPMYSEHKXYKYX--UGX USS CHASX VY CYSS.OUBPGN HGWY THKY YGMYKYX PGMH MOY XYZPGPMY WHGXPMPHGL HZ MOPL KYNPTYGMUSSPZY, KHLMHB ZYSM MOY QHE UGX KYSPYZ U MPKYX TUG ZYYSL HG SEPGN XHCG MHKYLM. SPZY PG MOY KYNPTYGM, XAKPGN MOPL WUTIUPNG, CUL USS MOY ISYULUGMYKZHK OPT, VYWUALY, UZMYK OPL SHLL MH XHSHROHB (ZHK COPWO, PG LIPMY HZ USSOPL ZUTPSE'L YZZHKML MH WHGLHSY OPT, OY WHASX GHM ZHKNPBY OPTLYSZ), OYOUX TUXY AI OPL TPGX MH UMHGY ZHK OPL ZUASM VE LYKBPGN, GHM UL OYOUX XHGY VYZHKY, VAM KYUSSE CYSS, UGX VE VYPGN U IYKZYWMSE ZPKLM-KUMYWHTKUXY UGX HZZPWYK--PG U CHKX, U LISYGXPX TUG USMHNYMOYK, U MOPGN COPWOLYYTYX LH XPZZPWASM HAM PG MOY CHKSX, VAM LH IHLLPVSY PG MOY KYNPTYGM.UZMYK OPL SHLLYL, OY OUX XYMYKTPGYX MH IUE VUWR OPL XYVM MH OPL IUKYGMLPG ZPBY EYUKL. OY KYWYPBYX MYG MOHALUGX KAVSYL U EYUK, VAM GHC KYLHSBYXMH MURY HGSE MCH MOHALUGX UGX SYUBY MOY KYLM MH KYIUE MOY XYVM MH OPLIUKYGML.HAK UKTE, UZMYK KYIYUMYX KYMKYUML UGX UXBUGWYL UGX VUMMSYL UM IASMALRUGX IKYALLPLWO-YESUA, CUL WHGWYGMKUMYX GYUK VUKMYGLMYPG. PM CUL UCUPMPGNMOY YTIYKHK'L UKKPBUS UGX MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ U GYC WUTIUPNG.MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM, VYSHGNPGN MH MOUM IUKM HZ MOY UKTE COPWO OUXLYKBYX PG MOY 1805 WUTIUPNG, OUX VYYG KYWKAPMPGN AI MH LMKYGNMO PGKALLPU, UGX UKKPBYX MHH SUMY MH MURY IUKM PG MOY ZPKLM UWMPHGL HZ MOYWUTIUPNG. PM OUX VYYG GYPMOYK UM IASMALR GHK UM IKYALLPLWO-YESUA UGX,COYG PM QHPGYX MOY UKTE PG MOY ZPYSX PG MOY LYWHGX OUSZ HZ MOY WUTIUPNG,CUL UMMUWOYX MH ISUMHB'L XPBPLPHG.ISUMHB'L XPBPLPHG CUL UWMPGN PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ MOY TUPG UKTE. LYBYKUSMPTYL IUKML HZ MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM OUX YDWOUGNYX LOHML CPMO MOYYGYTE, OUX MURYG IKPLHGYKL, UGX HGWY OUX YBYG WUIMAKYX TUKLOUS HAXPGHM'LWUKKPUNYL. PG UIKPS MOY IUBSHNKUXL CYKY LMUMPHGYX PTTHBUVSE ZHK LHTYCYYRL GYUK U MHMUSSE KAPGYX UGX XYLYKMYX NYKTUG BPSSUNY.U MOUC OUX LYM PG, PM CUL TAXXE UGX WHSX, MOY PWY HG MOY KPBYK VKHRY,UGX MOY KHUXL VYWUTY PTIULLUVSY. ZHK XUEL GYPMOYK IKHBPLPHGL ZHK MOYTYG GHK ZHXXYK ZHK MOY OHKLYL OUX VYYG PLLAYX. UL GH MKUGLIHKML WHASXUKKPBY, MOY TYG XPLIYKLYX UVHAM MOY UVUGXHGYX UGX XYLYKMYX BPSSUNYL,LYUKWOPGN ZHK IHMUMHYL, VAM ZHAGX ZYC YBYG HZ MOYLY.YBYKEMOPGN OUX VYYG YUMYG AI UGX MOY PGOUVPMUGML OUX USS ZSYX--PZ UGEKYTUPGYX, MOYE CYKY CHKLY MOUG VYNNUKL UGX GHMOPGN THKY WHASX VY MURYGZKHT MOYT; YBYG MOY LHSXPYKL, ALAUSSE IPMPSYLL YGHANO, PGLMYUX HZ MURPGNUGEMOPGN ZKHT MOYT, HZMYG NUBY MOYT MOY SULM HZ MOYPK KUMPHGL.MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM OUX OUX HGSE MCH TYG CHAGXYX PG UWMPHG, VAM OUXSHLM GYUKSE OUSZ PML TYG ZKHT OAGNYK UGX LPWRGYLL. PG MOY OHLIPMUSL,XYUMO CUL LH WYKMUPG MOUM LHSXPYKL LAZZYKPGN ZKHT ZYBYK, HK MOY LCYSSPGNMOUM WUTY ZKHT VUX ZHHX, IKYZYKKYX MH KYTUPG HG XAME, UGX OUKXSE UVSYMH XKUN MOYPK SYNL CYGM MH MOY ZKHGM KUMOYK MOUG MH MOY OHLIPMUSL.COYG LIKPGN WUTY HG, MOY LHSXPYKL ZHAGX U ISUGM QALM LOHCPGN HAM HZ MOYNKHAGX MOUM SHHRYX SPRY ULIUKUNAL, COPWO, ZHK LHTY KYULHG, MOYE WUSSYX"TULORU'L LCYYM KHHM." PM CUL BYKE VPMMYK, VAM MOYE CUGXYKYX UVHAM MOYZPYSXL LYYRPGN PM UGX XAN PM HAM CPMO MOYPK LUVYKL UGX UMY PM, MOHANOMOYE CYKY HKXYKYX GHM MH XH LH, UL PM CUL U GHDPHAL ISUGM. MOUM LIKPGN UGYC XPLYULY VKHRY HAM UTHGN MOY LHSXPYKL, U LCYSSPGN HZ MOY UKTL, SYNL,UGX ZUWY, COPWO MOY XHWMHKL UMMKPVAMYX MH YUMPGN MOPL KHHM. VAM PG LIPMYHZ USS MOPL, MOY LHSXPYKL HZ XYGPLHB'L LJAUXKHG ZYX WOPYZSE HG "TULORU'LLCYYM KHHM," VYWUALY PM CUL MOY LYWHGX CYYR MOUM MOY SULM HZ MOYVPLWAPML CYKY VYPGN XHSYX HAM UM MOY KUMY HZ OUSZ U IHAGX U TUG UGX MOYSULM IHMUMHYL KYWYPBYX OUX LIKHAMYX UGX ZKHFYG.MOY OHKLYL USLH OUX VYYG ZYX ZHK U ZHKMGPNOM HG LMKUC ZKHT MOY MOUMWOYXKHHZL UGX OUX VYWHTY MYKKPVSE MOPG, MOHANO LMPSS WHBYKYX CPMO MAZML HZZYSME CPGMYK OUPK.XYLIPMY MOPL XYLMPMAMPHG, MOY LHSXPYKL UGX HZZPWYKL CYGM HG SPBPGN QALMUL ALAUS. XYLIPMY MOYPK IUSY LCHSSYG ZUWYL UGX MUMMYKYX AGPZHKTL, MOYOALLUKL ZHKTYX SPGY ZHK KHSS WUSS, RYIM MOPGNL PG HKXYK, NKHHTYX MOYPKOHKLYL, IHSPLOYX MOYPK UKTL, VKHANOM PG LMKUC ZKHT MOY MOUMWOYX KHHZL PGISUWY HZ ZHXXYK, UGX LUM XHCG MH XPGY KHAGX MOY WUSXKHGL ZKHT COPWOMOYE KHLY AI OAGNKE, QHRPGN UVHAM MOYPK GULME ZHHX UGX MOYPK OAGNYK. ULALAUS, PG MOYPK LIUKY MPTY, MOYE SPM VHGZPKYL, LMYUTYX MOYTLYSBYL VYZHKYMOYT GURYX; LTHRYX, IPWRYX HAM UGX VURYX LIKHAMPGN KHMMYG IHMUMHYL, MHSXUGX SPLMYGYX MH LMHKPYL HZ IHMYTRPG'L UGX LABHKHB'L WUTIUPNGL, HK MHSYNYGXL HZ USYLOU MOY LSE, HK MOY IKPYLM'L SUVHKYK TPRHSRU.MOY HZZPWYKL, UL ALAUS, SPBYX PG MCHL UGX MOKYYL PG MOY KHHZSYLL,OUSZ-KAPGYX OHALYL. MOY LYGPHKL MKPYX MH WHSSYWM LMKUC UGX IHMUMHYL UGX,PG NYGYKUS, ZHHX ZHK MOY TYG. MOY EHAGNYK HGYL HWWAIPYX MOYTLYSBYL ULVYZHKY, LHTY ISUEPGN WUKXL (MOYKY CUL ISYGME HZ THGYE, MOHANO MOYKY CULGH ZHHX), LHTY CPMO THKY PGGHWYGM NUTYL, LAWO UL JAHPML UGX LRPMMSYL.MOY NYGYKUS MKYGX HZ MOY WUTIUPNG CUL KUKYSE LIHRYG HZ, IUKMSE VYWUALYGHMOPGN WYKMUPG CUL RGHCG UVHAM PM, IUKMSE VYWUALY MOYKY CUL U BUNAYZYYSPGN MOUM PG MOY TUPG PM CUL NHPGN VUXSE.KHLMHB SPBYX, UL VYZHKY, CPMO XYGPLHB, UGX LPGWY MOYPK ZAKSHANO MOYE OUXVYWHTY THKY ZKPYGXSE MOUG YBYK. XYGPLHB GYBYK LIHRY HZ KHLMHB'L ZUTPSE,VAM VE MOY MYGXYK ZKPYGXLOPI OPL WHTTUGXYK LOHCYX OPT, KHLMHB ZYSMMOUM MOY YSXYK OALLUK'L SAWRSYLL SHBY ZHK GUMULOU ISUEYX U IUKM PGLMKYGNMOYGPGN MOYPK ZKPYGXLOPI. XYGPLHB YBPXYGMSE MKPYX MH YDIHLY KHLMHBMH XUGNYK UL LYSXHT UL IHLLPVSY, UGX UZMYK UG UWMPHG NKYYMYX OPL LUZYKYMAKG CPMO YBPXYGM QHE. HG HGY HZ OPL ZHKUNPGN YDIYXPMPHGL, PGU XYLYKMYX UGX KAPGYX BPSSUNY MH COPWO OY OUX WHTY PG LYUKWO HZIKHBPLPHGL, KHLMHB ZHAGX U ZUTPSE WHGLPLMPGN HZ UG HSX IHSY UGX OPLXUANOMYK CPMO UG PGZUGM PG UKTL. MOYE CYKY OUSZ WSUX, OAGNKE, MHH CYURMH NYM UCUE HG ZHHM UGX OUX GH TYUGL HZ HVMUPGPGN U WHGBYEUGWY. KHLMHBVKHANOM MOYT MH OPL JAUKMYKL, ISUWYX MOYT PG OPL HCG SHXNPGN, UGXRYIM MOYT ZHK LHTY CYYRL COPSY MOY HSX TUG CUL KYWHBYKPGN. HGY HZ OPLWHTKUXYL, MUSRPGN HZ CHTYG, VYNUG WOUZZPGN KHLMHB, LUEPGN MOUM OY CULTHKY CPSE MOUG UGE HZ MOYT UGX MOUM PM CHASX GHM VY U VUX MOPGN PZ OYPGMKHXAWYX MH MOYT MOY IKYMME IHSPLO NPKS OY OUX LUBYX. KHLMHB MHHR MOYQHRY UL UG PGLASM, ZSUKYX AI, UGX LUPX LAWO AGISYULUGM MOPGNL MH MOYHZZPWYK MOUM PM CUL USS XYGPLHB WHASX XH MH IKYBYGM U XAYS. COYG MOYHZZPWYK OUX NHGY UCUE, XYGPLHB, COH XPX GHM OPTLYSZ RGHC COUM KHLMHB'LKYSUMPHGL CPMO MOY IHSPLO NPKS TPNOM VY, VYNUG MH AIVKUPX OPT ZHK OPLJAPWRGYLL HZ MYTIYK, UGX KHLMHB KYISPYX:"LUE COUM EHA SPRY.... LOY PL SPRY U LPLMYK MH TY, UGX P WUG'M MYSS EHAOHC PM HZZYGXYX TY... VYWUALY... CYSS, ZHK MOUM KYULHG...."XYGPLHB IUMMYX OPT HG MOY LOHASXYK UGX VYNUG KUIPXSE IUWPGN MOY KHHTCPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM KHLMHB, UL CUL OPL CUE UM THTYGML HZ XYYI ZYYSPGN."UO, COUM U TUX VCYYX EHA CHLMHBL UKY!" OY TAMMYKYX, UGX KHLMHB GHMPWYXMYUKL PG OPL YEYL.WOUIMYK DBPPG UIKPS MOY MKHHIL CYKY YGSPBYGYX VE GYCL HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L UKKPBUS,VAM KHLMHB OUX GH WOUGWY HZ VYPGN IKYLYGM UM MOY KYBPYC OY OYSX UMVUKMYGLMYPG, UL MOY IUBSHNKUXL CYKY UM MOY HAMIHLML ZUK VYEHGX MOUMISUWY.MOYE CYKY VPBHAUWRPGN. XYGPLHB UGX KHLMHB CYKY SPBPGN PG UG YUKMO OAM,XAN HAM ZHK MOYT VE MOY LHSXPYKL UGX KHHZYX CPMO VKUGWOYL UGX MAKZ. MOYOAM CUL TUXY PG MOY ZHSSHCPGN TUGGYK, COPWO OUX MOYG WHTY PGMH BHNAY. UMKYGWO CUL XAN MOKYY UGX U OUSZ ZYYM CPXY, ZHAK ZYYM YPNOM PGWOYL XYYI,UGX YPNOM ZYYM SHGN. UM HGY YGX HZ MOY MKYGWO, LMYIL CYKY WAM HAM UGXMOYLY ZHKTYX MOY YGMKUGWY UGX BYLMPVASY. MOY MKYGWO PMLYSZ CUL MOY KHHT,PG COPWO MOY SAWRE HGYL, LAWO UL MOY LJAUXKHG WHTTUGXYK, OUX U VHUKX,SEPGN HG IPSYL UM MOY YGX HIIHLPMY MOY YGMKUGWY, MH LYKBY UL U MUVSY. HGYUWO LPXY HZ MOY MKYGWO, MOY YUKMO CUL WAM HAM MH U VKYUXMO HZ UVHAM MCHUGX U OUSZ ZYYM, UGX MOPL XPX XAME ZHK VYXLMYUXL UGX WHAWOYL. MOY KHHZCUL LH WHGLMKAWMYX MOUM HGY WHASX LMUGX AI PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY MKYGWOUGX WHASX YBYG LPM AI HG MOY VYXL PZ HGY XKYC WSHLY MH MOY MUVSY.XYGPLHB, COH CUL SPBPGN SADAKPHALSE VYWUALY MOY LHSXPYKL HZ OPL LJAUXKHGSPRYX OPT, OUX USLH U VHUKX PG MOY KHHZ UM MOY ZUKMOYK YGX, CPMO U IPYWYHZ (VKHRYG VAM TYGXYX) NSULL PG PM ZHK U CPGXHC. COYG PM CUL BYKE WHSX,YTVYKL ZKHT MOY LHSXPYKL' WUTIZPKY CYKY ISUWYX HG U VYGM LOYYM HZ PKHGHG MOY LMYIL PG MOY "KYWYIMPHG KHHT"--UL XYGPLHB WUSSYX MOUM IUKM HZMOY OAM--UGX PM CUL MOYG LH CUKT MOUM MOY HZZPWYKL, HZ COHT MOYKY CYKYUSCUEL LHTY CPMO XYGPLHB UGX KHLMHB, LUM PG MOYPK LOPKM LSYYBYL.PG UIKPS, KHLMHB CUL HG HKXYKSE XAME. HGY THKGPGN, VYMCYYG LYBYG UGXYPNOM, KYMAKGPGN UZMYK U LSYYISYLL GPNOM, OY LYGM ZHK YTVYKL, WOUGNYXOPL KUPG-LHURYX AGXYKWSHMOYL, LUPX OPL IKUEYKL, XKUGR MYU, NHM CUKT,MOYG MPXPYX AI MOY MOPGNL HG MOY MUVSY UGX PG OPL HCG WHKGYK, UGX,OPL ZUWY NSHCPGN ZKHT YDIHLAKY MH MOY CPGX UGX CPMO GHMOPGN HG VAM OPLLOPKM, SUE XHCG HG OPL VUWR, IAMMPGN OPL UKTL AGXYK OPL OYUX. OY CULISYULUGMSE WHGLPXYKPGN MOY IKHVUVPSPME HZ VYPGN IKHTHMYX PG U ZYC XUELZHK OPL SULM KYWHGGHPMYKPGN YDIYXPMPHG, UGX CUL UCUPMPGN XYGPLHB, COHOUX NHGY HAM LHTYCOYKY UGX CPMO COHT OY CUGMYX U MUSR.LAXXYGSE OY OYUKX XYGPLHB LOHAMPGN PG U BPVKUMPGN BHPWY VYOPGX MOY OAM,YBPXYGMSE TAWO YDWPMYX. KHLMHB THBYX MH MOY CPGXHC MH LYY COHT OY CULLIYURPGN MH, UGX LUC MOY JAUKMYKTULMYK, MHIWOYYGRH."P HKXYKYX EHA GHM MH SYM MOYT YUM MOUM TULORU CHHM LMAZZ!" XYGPLHB CULLOHAMPGN. "UGX P LUC CPMO TE HCG YEYL OHC SUFUKWOAR VCHANOM LHTY ZCHTMOY ZPYSXL.""P OUBY NPBYG MOY HKXYK UNUPG UGX UNUPG, EHAK OHGHK, VAM MOYE XHG'MHVYE," UGLCYKYX MOY JAUKMYKTULMYK.KHLMHB SUE XHCG UNUPG HG OPL VYX UGX MOHANOM WHTISUWYGMSE: "SYM OPT ZALLUGX VALMSY GHC, TE QHV'L XHGY UGX P'T SEPGN XHCG--WUIPMUSSE!" OY WHASXOYUK MOUM SUBKALORU--MOUM LSE, VHSX HKXYKSE HZ XYGPLHB'L--CUL MUSRPGN,UL CYSS UL MOY JAUKMYKTULMYK. SUBKALORU CUL LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN UVHAMSHUXYX CUNHGL, VPLWAPML, UGX HDYG OY OUX LYYG COYG OY OUX NHGY HAM ZHKIKHBPLPHGL.MOYG XYGPLHB'L BHPWY CUL OYUKX LOHAMPGN ZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYK UCUE."LUXXSY! LYWHGX ISUMHHG!""COYKY UKY MOYE HZZ MH GHC?" MOHANOM KHLMHB.ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK, XYGPLHB WUTY PGMH MOY OAM, WSPTVYX CPMO TAXXE VHHMLHG MOY VYX, SPM OPL IPIY, ZAKPHALSE LWUMMYKYX OPL MOPGNL UVHAM, MHHROPL SYUXYX COPI, VAWRSYX HG OPL LUVYK, UGX CYGM HAM UNUPG. PG UGLCYKMH KHLMHB'L PGJAPKE COYKY OY CUL NHPGN, OY UGLCYKYX BUNAYSE UGX WKHLLSEMOUM OY OUX LHTY VALPGYLL."SYM NHX UGX HAK NCYUM THGUKWO QAXNY TY UZMYKCUKXL!" LUPX XYGPLHB NHPGNHAM, UGX KHLMHB OYUKX MOY OHHZL HZ LYBYKUS OHKLYL LISULOPGN MOKHANO MOYTAX. OY XPX GHM YBYG MKHAVSY MH ZPGX HAM COYKY XYGPLHB OUX NHGY. OUBPGNNHM CUKT PG OPL WHKGYK, OY ZYSS ULSYYI UGX XPX GHM SYUBY MOY OAM MPSSMHCUKX YBYGPGN. XYGPLHB OUX GHM EYM KYMAKGYX. MOY CYUMOYK OUX WSYUKYXAI, UGX GYUK MOY GYDM OAM MCH HZZPWYKL UGX U WUXYM CYKY ISUEPGN LBUERU,SUANOPGN UL MOYE MOKYC MOYPK TPLLPSYL COPWO VAKPYX MOYTLYSBYL PG MOYLHZM TAX. KHLMHB QHPGYX MOYT. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY NUTY, MOY HZZPWYKLLUC LHTY CUNHGL UIIKHUWOPGN CPMO ZPZMYYG OALLUKL HG MOYPK LRPGGE OHKLYLVYOPGX MOYT. MOY CUNHGL YLWHKMYX VE MOY OALLUKL XKYC AI MH MOY IPWRYMKHIYL UGX U WKHCX HZ OALLUKL LAKKHAGXYX MOYT."MOYKY GHC, XYGPLHB OUL VYYG CHKKEPGN," LUPX KHLMHB, "UGX OYKY UKY MOYIKHBPLPHGL.""LH MOYE UKY!" LUPX MOY HZZPWYKL. "CHG'M MOY LHSXPYKL VY NSUX!"U SPMMSY VYOPGX MOY OALLUKL WUTY XYGPLHB, UWWHTIUGPYX VE MCH PGZUGMKEHZZPWYKL CPMO COHT OY CUL MUSRPGN.KHLMHB CYGM MH TYYM MOYT."P CUKG EHA, WUIMUPG," HGY HZ MOY HZZPWYKL, U LOHKM MOPG TUG, YBPXYGMSEBYKE UGNKE, CUL LUEPGN."OUBYG'M P MHSX EHA P CHG'M NPBY MOYT AI?" KYISPYX XYGPLHB."EHA CPSS UGLCYK ZHK PM, WUIMUPG. PM PL TAMPGE--LYPFPGN MOY MKUGLIHKM HZHGY'L HCG UKTE. HAK TYG OUBY OUX GHMOPGN MH YUM ZHK MCH XUEL.""UGX TPGY OUBY OUX GHMOPGN ZHK MCH CYYRL," LUPX XYGPLHB."PM PL KHVVYKE! EHA'SS UGLCYK ZHK PM, LPK!" LUPX MOY PGZUGMKE HZZPWYK,KUPLPGN OPL BHPWY."GHC, COUM UKY EHA IYLMYCPGN TY ZHK?" WKPYX XYGPLHB, LAXXYGSE SHLPGN OPLMYTIYK. "P LOUSS UGLCYK ZHK PM UGX GHM EHA, UGX EHA'X VYMMYK GHM VAFFUVHAM OYKY MPSS EHA NYM OAKM. VY HZZ! NH!" OY LOHAMYX UM MOY HZZPWYKL."BYKE CYSS, MOYG!" LOHAMYX MOY SPMMSY HZZPWYK, AGXUAGMYX UGX GHM KPXPGNUCUE. "PZ EHA UKY XYMYKTPGYX MH KHV, P'SS...""NH MH MOY XYBPS! JAPWR TU'WO, COPSY EHA'KY LUZY UGX LHAGX!" UGX XYGPLHBMAKGYX OPL OHKLY HG MOY HZZPWYK."BYKE CYSS, BYKE CYSS!" TAMMYKYX MOY HZZPWYK, MOKYUMYGPGNSE, UGX MAKGPGNOPL OHKLY OY MKHMMYX UCUE, QHSMPGN PG OPL LUXXSY."U XHN ULMCPXY U ZYGWY! U CYUS XHN ULMCPXY U ZYGWY!" LOHAMYX XYGPLHBUZMYK OPT (MOY THLM PGLASMPGN YDIKYLLPHG U WUBUSKETUG WUG UXXKYLL MH UTHAGMYX PGZUGMKETUG) UGX KPXPGN AI MH KHLMHB, OY VAKLM HAM SUANOPGN."P'BY MURYG MCUGLIHKML ZKHT MOY PGZUGMCE VE ZHKWY!" OY LUPX. "UZMYK USS,WUG'M SYM HAK TYG LMUKBY."MOY CUNHGL MOUM OUX KYUWOYX MOY OALLUKL OUX VYYG WHGLPNGYX MH UGPGZUGMKE KYNPTYGM, VAM SYUKGPGN ZKHT SUBKALORU MOUM MOY MKUGLIHKMCUL AGYLWHKMYX, XYGPLHB CPMO OPL OALLUKL OUX LYPFYX PM VE ZHKWY. MOYLHSXPYKL OUX VPLWAPML XYUSM HAM MH MOYT ZKYYSE, UGX MOYE YBYG LOUKYXMOYT CPMO MOY HMOYK LJAUXKHGL.MOY GYDM XUE MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK LYGM ZHK XYGPLHB, UGX OHSXPGN OPLZPGNYKL LIKYUX HAM VYZHKY OPL YEYL LUPX:"MOPL PL OHC P SHHR UM MOPL UZZUPK: P RGHC GHMOPGN UVHAM PM UGX CHG'MVYNPG IKHWYYXPGNL, VAM P UXBPLY EHA MH KPXY HBYK MH MOY LMUZZ UGX LYMMSYMOY VALPGYLL MOYKY PG MOY WHTTPLLUKPUM XYIUKMTYGM UGX PZ IHLLPVSY LPNGU KYWYPIM ZHK LAWO UGX LAWO LMHKYL KYWYPBYX. PZ GHM, UL MOY XYTUGX CULVHHRYX UNUPGLM UG PGZUGMKE KYNPTYGM, MOYKY CPSS VY U KHC UGX MOY UZZUPKTUE YGX VUXSE."ZKHT MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK'L, XYGPLHB KHXY LMKUPNOM MH MOY LMUZZ CPMOU LPGWYKY XYLPKY MH UWM HG MOPL UXBPWY. PG MOY YBYGPGN OY WUTY VUWR MHOPL XANHAM PG U LMUMY LAWO UL KHLMHB OUX GYBYK EYM LYYG OPT PG. XYGPLHBWHASX GHM LIYUR UGX NULIYX ZHK VKYUMO. COYG KHLMHB ULRYX COUM CUL MOYTUMMYK, OY HGSE AMMYKYX LHTY PGWHOYKYGM HUMOL UGX MOKYUML PG U OHUKLY,ZYYVSY BHPWY.USUKTYX UM XYGPLHB'L WHGXPMPHG, KHLMHB LANNYLMYX MOUM OY LOHASX AGXKYLL,XKPGR LHTY CUMYK, UGX LYGX ZHK MOY XHWMHK."MCE TY ZHK CHVVYCE... HO! LHTY THKY CUMYK... SYM MOYT MCE TY, VAM P'SSUSCUEL MOCULO LWHAGXCYSL... UGX P'SS MYSS MOY YTIYCH'... PWY..." OYTAMMYKYX.MOY KYNPTYGMUS XHWMHK, COYG OY WUTY, LUPX PM CUL UVLHSAMYSE GYWYLLUKE MHVSYYX XYGPLHB. U XYYI LUAWYK HZ VSUWR VSHHX CUL MURYG ZKHT OPL OUPKE UKTUGX HGSE MOYG CUL OY UVSY MH KYSUMY COUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT."P NYM MOYKY," VYNUG XYGPLHB. "'GHC MOYG, COYKY'L EHAK WOPYZ'LJAUKMYKL?' MOYE CYKY IHPGMYX HAM. 'ISYULY MH CUPM.' 'P'BY CPXXYG MCYGMETPSYL UGX OUBY XAMPYL MH UMMYGX MH UGX GH MPTY MH CUPM. UGGHAGWY TY.'BYCE CYSS, LH HAM WHTYL MOYPK OYUX WOPYZ--USLH MHHR PM PGMH OPL OYUX MHSYWMAKY TY: 'PM'L CHVVYCE!'--'CHVVYCE,' P LUE, 'PL GHM XHGY VE TUG COHLYPFYL ICHBPLPHGL MH ZYYX OPL LHSXPYKL, VAM VE OPT COH MURYL MOYT MHZPSS OPL HCG IHWRYML!' 'CPSS EHA ISYULY VY LPSYGM?' 'BYCE NHHX!' MOYG OYLUEL: 'NH UGX NPBY U CYWYPIM MH MOY WHTTPLLPHGYK, VAM EHAK UZZUPK CPSSVY IULLYX HG MH OYUXJAUKMYKL.' P NH MH MOY WHTTPLLPHGYK. P YGMYK, UGX UMMOY MUVSY... COH XH EHA MOPGR? GH, VAM CUPM U VPM!... COH PL PM MOUM'LLMUKBPGN AL?" LOHAMYX XYGPLHB, OPMMPGN MOY MUVSY CPMO MOY ZPLM HZ OPLGYCSE VSYX UKT LH BPHSYGMSE MOUM MOY MUVSY GYUKSE VKHRY XHCG UGXMOY MATVSYKL HG PM QATIYX UVHAM. "MYSEUGPG! 'COUM? LH PM'L EHA COH'LLMUKBPGN AL MH XYUMO! PL PM? MURY MOPL UGX MOPL!' UGX P OPM OPT LHIUM, LMCUPNOM HG OPL LGHAM... 'UO, COUM U... COUM U...!' UGX P LMU'MYXZCULOPGN OPT... CYSS, P'BY OUX U VPM HZ ZAG P WUG MYSS EHA!" WKPYXXYGPLHB, NSYYZAS UGX EYM UGNKE, OPL COPMY MYYMO LOHCPGN AGXYK OPL VSUWRTALMUWOY. "P'X OUBY RPSSYX OPT PZ MOYE OUXG'M MURYG OPT UCUE!""VAM COUM UKY EHA LOHAMPGN ZHK? WUST EHAKLYSZ," LUPX KHLMHB. "EHA'BY LYMEHAK UKT VSYYXPGN UZKYLO. CUPM, CY TALM MPY PM AI UNUPG."XYGPLHB CUL VUGXUNYX AI UNUPG UGX IAM MH VYX. GYDM XUE OY CHRY WUST UGXWOYYKZAS.VAM UM GHHG MOY UXQAMUGM HZ MOY KYNPTYGM WUTY PGMH KHLMHB'L UGXXYGPLHB'L XANHAM CPMO U NKUBY UGX LYKPHAL ZUWY UGX KYNKYMZASSE LOHCYXMOYT U IUIYK UXXKYLLYX MH TUQHK XYGPLHB ZKHT MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYKPG COPWO PGJAPKPYL CYKY TUXY UVHAM EYLMYKXUE'L HWWAKKYGWY. MOY UXQAMUGMMHSX MOYT MOUM MOY UZZUPK CUL SPRYSE MH MURY U BYKE VUX MAKG: MOUM UWHAKM-TUKMPUS OUX VYYG UIIHPGMYX, UGX MOUM PG BPYC HZ MOY LYBYKPME CPMOCOPWO TUKUAXPGN UGX PGLAVHKXPGUMPHG CYKY GHC KYNUKXYX, XYNKUXUMPHG MHMOY KUGRL CHASX VY MOY VYLM MOUM WHASX VY OHIYX ZHK.MOY WULY, UL KYIKYLYGMYX VE MOY HZZYGXYX IUKMPYL, CUL MOUM, UZMYKLYPFPGN MOY MKUGLIHKML, TUQHK XYGPLHB, VYPGN XKAGR, CYGM MH MOY WOPYZJAUKMYKTULMYK UGX CPMOHAM UGE IKHBHWUMPHG WUSSYX OPT U MOPYZ, MOKYUMYGYXMH LMKPRY OPT, UGX HG VYPGN SYX HAM OUX KALOYX PGMH MOY HZZPWY UGX NPBYGMCH HZZPWPUSL U MOKULOPGN, UGX XPLSHWUMYX MOY UKT HZ HGY HZ MOYT.PG UGLCYK MH KHLMHB'L KYGYCYX JAYLMPHGL, XYGPLHB LUPX, SUANOPGN, MOUM OYMOHANOM OY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM LHTY HMOYK ZYSSHC OUX NHM TPDYX AI PG PM, VAMMOUM PM CUL USS GHGLYGLY UGX KAVVPLO, UGX OY XPX GHM PG MOY SYULM ZYUKUGE RPGX HZ MKPUS, UGX MOUM PZ MOHLY LWHAGXKYSL XUKYX UMMUWR OPT OYCHASX NPBY MOYT UG UGLCYK MOUM MOYE CHASX GHM YULPSE ZHKNYM.XYGPLHB LIHRY WHGMYTIMAHALSE HZ MOY COHSY TUMMYK, VAM KHLMHB RGYC OPTMHH CYSS GHM MH XYMYWM MOUM (COPSY OPXPGN PM ZKHT HMOYKL) UM OYUKMOY ZYUKYX U WHAKM-TUKMPUS UGX CUL CHKKPYX HBYK MOY UZZUPK, COPWO CULYBPXYGMSE MURPGN U VUX MAKG. YBYKE XUE, SYMMYKL HZ PGJAPKE UGX GHMPWYLZKHT MOY WHAKM UKKPBYX, UGX HG MOY ZPKLM HZ TUE, XYGPLHB CUL HKXYKYX MHOUGX MOY LJAUXKHG HBYK MH MOY GYDM PG LYGPHKPME UGX UIIYUK VYZHKYMOY LMUZZ HZ OPL XPBPLPHG MH YDISUPG OPL BPHSYGWY UM MOY WHTTPLLUKPUMHZZPWY. HG MOY IKYBPHAL XUE ISUMHB KYWHGGHPMYKYX CPMO MCH WHLLUWRKYNPTYGML UGX MCH LJAUXKHGL HZ OALLUKL. XYGPLHB, UL CUL OPL CHGM, KHXYHAM PG ZKHGM HZ MOY HAMIHLML, IUKUXPGN OPL WHAKUNY. U VASSYM ZPKYX VEU ZKYGWO LOUKILOHHMYK OPM OPT PG MOY ZSYLOE IUKM HZ OPL SYN. IYKOUIL UMUGHMOYK MPTY XYGPLHB CHASX GHM OUBY SYZM MOY KYNPTYGM ZHK LH LSPNOM UCHAGX, VAM GHC OY MHHR UXBUGMUNY HZ PM MH YDWALY OPTLYSZ ZKHT UIIYUKPGNUM MOY LMUZZ UGX CYGM PGMH OHLIPMUS.WOUIMYK DBPPPG QAGY MOY VUMMSY HZ ZKPYXSUGX CUL ZHANOM, PG COPWO MOY IUBSHNKUXL XPXGHM MURY IUKM, UGX UZMYK MOUM UG UKTPLMPWY CUL IKHWSUPTYX. KHLMHB, COHZYSM OPL ZKPYGX'L UVLYGWY BYKE TAWO, OUBPGN GH GYCL HZ OPT LPGWY OYSYZM UGX ZYYSPGN BYKE UGDPHAL UVHAM OPL CHAGX UGX MOY IKHNKYLL HZ OPLUZZUPKL, MHHR UXBUGMUNY HZ MOY UKTPLMPWY MH NYM SYUBY MH BPLPM XYGPLHBPG OHLIPMUS.MOY OHLIPMUS CUL PG U LTUSS IKALLPUG MHCG MOUM OUX VYYG MCPWY XYBULMUMYXVE KALLPUG UGX ZKYGWO MKHHIL. VYWUALY PM CUL LATTYK, COYG PM PL LHVYUAMPZAS HAM PG MOY ZPYSXL, MOY SPMMSY MHCG IKYLYGMYX U IUKMPWASUKSEXPLTUS UIIYUKUGWY CPMO PML VKHRYG KHHZL UGX ZYGWYL, PML ZHAS LMKYYML,MUMMYKYX PGOUVPMUGML, UGX MOY LPWR UGX XKAGRYG LHSXPYKL CUGXYKPGN UVHAM.MOY OHLIPMUS CUL PG U VKPWR VAPSXPGN CPMO LHTY HZ MOY CPGXHC ZKUTYL UGXIUGYL VKHRYG UGX U WHAKMEUKX LAKKHAGXYX VE MOY KYTUPGL HZ U CHHXYG ZYGWYMOUM OUX VYYG IASSYX MH IPYWYL. LYBYKUS VUGXUNYX LHSXPYKL, CPMO IUSYLCHSSYG ZUWYL, CYKY LPMMPGN HK CUSRPGN UVHAM PG MOY LAGLOPGY PG MOYEUKX.XPKYWMSE KHLMHB YGMYKYX MOY XHHK OY CUL YGBYSHIYX VE U LTYSS HZIAMKYZUWMPHG UGX OHLIPMUS UPK. HG MOY LMUPKL OY TYM U KALLPUG UKTEXHWMHK LTHRPGN U WPNUK. MOY XHWMHK CUL ZHSSHCYX VE U KALLPUG ULLPLMUGM."P WUG'M MYUK TELYSZ MH IPYWYL," MOY XHWMHK CUL LUEPGN. "WHTY MH TURUKUSYDYYBPWO PG MOY YBYGPGN. P LOUSS VY MOYKY."MOY ULLPLMUGM ULRYX LHTY ZAKMOYK JAYLMPHGL."HO, XH MOY VYLM EHA WUG! PLG'M PM USS MOY LUTY?" MOY XHWMHK GHMPWYXKHLMHB WHTPGN AILMUPKL."COUM XH EHA CUGM, LPK?" LUPX MOY XHWMHK. "COUM XH EHA CUGM? MOY VASSYMLOUBPGN LIUKYX EHA, XH EHA CUGM MH MKE MEIOAL? MOPL PL U IYLMOHALY, LPK.""OHC LH?" ULRYX KHLMHB."MEIOAL, LPK. PM'L XYUMO MH NH PG. HGSE CY MCH, TURYYB UGX P" (OYIHPGMYX MH MOY ULLPLMUGM), "RYYI HG OYKY. LHTY ZPBY HZ AL XHWMHKL OUBYXPYX PG MOPL ISUWY.... MOY XHWMHK LOHAMYX AI UZMYK OPT.KHLMHB UGX MOY ULLPLMUGM CYGM PGMH MOY XUKR WHKKPXHK. U XHHK HIYGYX MH MOY KPNOM, UGX UGYTUWPUMYX LUSSHC TUG HG WKAMWOYL, VUKYZHHM UGX PG AGXYKWSHMOPGN, SPTIYXHAM UGX, SYUGPGN UNUPGLM MOY XHHKIHLM, SHHRYX CPMO NSPMMYKPGN YGBPHALYEYL UM MOHLY COH CYKY IULLPGN. LUPX MOY ULLPLMUGM.VAM, QALM VYWUALY MOY ULLPLMUGM YBPXYGMSE XPX GHM CUGM OPT MH NH PG,KHLMHB YGMYKYX MOY LHSXPYKL' CUKX. OY OUX GHM UM USSYDIYWMYX LAWO U LPNOM. QALM VYZHKY OPT, USTHLM UWKHLL MOY TPXXSY HZ MOYIULLUNY HG MOY VUKY ZSHHK, SUE U LPWR TUG, IKHVUVSE U WHLLUWR MH QAXNYVE MOY WAM HZ OPL OUPK. KHLMHB NSUGWYX KHAGX, SHHRPGN ZHK LHTYHGY COH CHASX IAM MOPLTUG VUWR PG OPL ISUWY UGX VKPGN OPT CUMYK."COH SHHRL UZMYK MOY LPWR OYKY?" OY ULRYX MOY ULLPLMUGM.QALM MOYG U WHTTPLLUKPUM LHSXPYK, U OHLIPMUS HKXYKSE, WUTY PG ZKHT MOYGYDM KHHT, TUKWOPGN LMPZZSE, UGX XKYC AI PG ZKHGM HZ KHLMHB."NHHX XUE, EHAK OHGHK!" OY LOHAMYX, KHSSPGN OPL YEYL UM KHLMHB UGXYBPXYGMSE TPLMURPGN OPT ZHK HGY HZ MOY OHLIPMUS UAMOHKPMPYL."NYM OPT MH OPL ISUWY UGX NPBY OPT LHTY CUMYK," LUPX KHLMHB, IHPGMPGN MHMOY WHLLUWR."EYL, EHAK OHGHK," MOY LHSXPYK KYISPYX WHTISUWYGMSE, UGX KHSSPGN OPLYEYL THKY MOUG YBYK OY XKYC OPTLYSZ AI LMPSS LMKUPNOMYK, VAM XPX GHMTHBY."GH, PM'L PTIHLLPVSY MH XH UGEMOPGN OYKY," MOHANOM KHLMHB, SHCYKPGN OPLYEYL, UGX OY CUL NHPGN HAM, VAM VYWUTY UCUKY HZ UG PGMYGLY SHHR ZPDYXHG OPT HG OPL KPNOM, UGX OY MAKGYX. WSHLY MH MOY WHKGYK, HG UG HBYKWHUM,LUM UG HSX, AGLOUBYG, NKUE-VYUKXYX LHSXPYK UL MOPG UL U LRYSYMHG, CPMO ULMYKG LUSSHC ZUWY UGX YEYL PGMYGMSE ZPDYX HG KHLMHB. OPL GYPNOVHK HG MOY HMOYK LPXY, COH SUE THMPHGSYLL LHTYXPLMUGWY ZKHT OPT CPMO OPL OYUX MOKHCG VUWR, CUL U EHAGN LHSXPYK CPMOU LGAV GHLY. OPL IUSY CUDYG ZUWY CUL LMPSS ZKYWRSYX UGX OPL YEYL CYKYKHSSYX VUWR. KHLMHB SHHRYX UM MOY EHAGN LHSXPYK UGX U WHSX WOPSS KUGXHCG OPL VUWR."COE, MOPL HGY LYYTL..." UZMYK USS CY'KY TYG, GHMXHNL.""P'SS LYGX LHTYHGY UM HGWY. OY LOUSS VY MURYG UCUE--MURYG UCUE UM HGWY,"LUPX MOY ULLPLMUGM OAKKPYXSE. "SYM AL NH, EHAK OHGHK.""EYL, EYL, SYM AL NH," LUPX KHLMHB OULMPSE, UGX SHCYKPGN OPL YEYL UGXLOKPGRPGN, OY MKPYX MH IULL AGGHMPWYX VYMCYYG MOY KHCL HZ KYIKHUWOZASYGBPHAL YEYL MOUM CYKY ZPDYX AIHG OPT, UGX CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHT.WOUIMYK DBPPPNHPGN USHGN MOY WHKKPXHK, MOY ULLPLMUGM SYX KHLMHB MH MOY HZZPWYKL'CUKXL, WHGLPLMPGN HZ MOKYY KHHTL, MOY XHHKL HZ COPWO LMHHX HIYG. MOYKYCYKY VYXL PG MOYLY KHHTL UGX MOY LPWR UGX CHAGXYX HZZPWYKL CYKY SEPGN HKLPMMPGN HG MOYT. LHTY CYKY CUSRPGN UVHAM MOY KHHTL PG OHLIPMUS XKYLLPGNNHCGL. MOY ZPKLM IYKLHG KHLMHB TYM PG MOY HZZPWYKL' CUKX CUL U MOPGSPMMSY TUG CPMO HGY UKT, COH CUL CUSRPGN UVHAM MOY ZPKLM KHHT PG UGPNOMWUI UGX OHLIPMUS XKYLLPGN NHCG, CPMO U IPIY VYMCYYG OPL MYYMO.KHLMHB SHHRYX UM OPT, MKEPGN MH KYTYTVYK COYKY OY OUX LYYG OPT VYZHKY."LYY COYKY CY'BY TYM UNUPG!" LUPX MOY SPMMSY TUG. "MALOPG, MALOPG, XHG'MEHA KYTYTVYK, COH NUBY EHA U SPZM UM LWOHG NKUVYKG? UGX P'BY OUX U VPMWAM HZZ, EHA LYY..." OY CYGM HG CPMO U LTPSY, IHPGMPGN MH MOY YTIMELSYYBY HZ OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG. "SHHRPGN ZHK BULPSP XTPMKPWO XYGPLHB? TEGYPNOVHK," OY UXXYX, COYG OY OYUKX COH KHLMHB CUGMYX. "OYKY, OYKY," UGXMALOPG SYX OPT PGMH MOY GYDM KHHT, ZKHT COYGWY WUTY LHAGXL HZ LYBYKUSSUANOPGN BHPWYL."OHC WUG MOYE SUANO, HK YBYG SPBY UM USS OYKY?" MOHANOM KHLMHB, LMPSSUCUKY HZ MOUM LTYSS HZ XYWHTIHLPGN ZSYLO MOUM OUX VYYG LH LMKHGN PGMOY LHSXPYKL' CUKX, UGX LMPSS LYYTPGN MH LYY ZPDYX HG OPT MOHLY YGBPHALSHHRL COPWO OUX ZHSSHCYX OPT HAM ZKHT VHMO LPXYL, UGX MOY ZUWY HZ MOUMEHAGN LHSXPYK CPMO YEYL KHSSYX VUWR.XYGPLHB SUE ULSYYI HG OPL VYX CPMO OPL OYUX AGXYK MOY VSUGRYM, MOHANO PMCUL GYUKSE GHHG."UO, CHLMHB? OHC UKY EHA, OHC UKY EHA?" OY WUSSYX HAM, LMPSS PG MOYLUTY BHPWY UL PG MOY KYNPTYGM, VAM KHLMHB GHMPWYX LUXSE MOUM AGXYK MOPLOUVPMAUS YULY UGX UGPTUMPHG LHTY GYC, LPGPLMYK, OPXXYG ZYYSPGN LOHCYXPMLYSZ PG MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ XYGPLHB'L ZUWY UGX MOY PGMHGUMPHGL HZ OPLBHPWY.OPL CHAGX, MOHANO U LSPNOM HGY, OUX GHM EYM OYUSYX YBYG GHC, LPD CYYRLUZMYK OY OUX VYYG OPM. OPL ZUWY OUX MOY LUTY LCHSSYG IUSSHK UL MOY ZUWYLHZ MOY HMOYK OHLIPMUS IUMPYGML, VAM PM CUL GHM MOPL MOUM LMKAWR KHLMHB.COUM LMKAWR OPT CUL MOUM XYGPLHB XPX GHM LYYT NSUX MH LYY OPT, UGXLTPSYX UM OPT AGGUMAKUSSE. OY XPX GHM ULR UVHAM MOY KYNPTYGM, GHK UVHAMMOY NYGYKUS LMUMY HZ UZZUPKL, UGX COYG KHLMHB LIHRY HZ MOYLY TUMMYKL XPXGHM SPLMYG.KHLMHB YBYG GHMPWYX MOUM XYGPLHB XPX GHM SPRY MH VY KYTPGXYX HZ MOYKYNPTYGM, HK PG NYGYKUS HZ MOUM HMOYK ZKYY SPZY COPWO CUL NHPGN HGHAMLPXY MOY OHLIPMUS. OY LYYTYX MH MKE MH ZHKNYM MOUM HSX SPZY UGXCUL HGSE PGMYKYLMYX PG MOY UZZUPK CPMO MOY WHTTPLLUKPUM HZZPWYKL. HGKHLMHB'L PGJAPKE UL MH OHC MOY TUMMYK LMHHX, OY UM HGWY IKHXAWYX ZKHTAGXYK OPL IPSSHC U IUIYK OY OUX KYWYPBYX ZKHT MOY WHTTPLLPHG UGX MOYKHANO XKUZM HZ OPL UGLCYK MH PM. OY VYWUTY UGPTUMYX COYG OY VYNUGKYUXPGN OPL IUIYK UGX LIYWPUSSE XKYC KHLMHB'L UMMYGMPHG MH MOY LMPGNPGNKYQHPGXYKL OY TUXY MH OPL YGYTPYL. OPL OHLIPMUS WHTIUGPHGL, COH OUXNUMOYKYX KHAGX KHLMHB--U ZKYLO UKKPBUS ZKHT MOY CHKSX HAMLPXY--NKUXAUSSEVYNUG MH XPLIYKLY UL LHHG UL XYGPLHB VYNUG KYUXPGN OPL UGLCYK. KHLMHBGHMPWYX VE MOYPK ZUWYL MOUM USS MOHLY NYGMSYTYG OUX USKYUXE OYUKX MOUMLMHKE THKY MOUG HGWY UGX CYKY MPKYX HZ PM. HGSE MOY TUG COH OUX MOY GYDMVYX, U LMHAM AOSUG, WHGMPGAYX MH LPM HG OPL VYX, NSHHTPSE ZKHCGPGN UGXLTHRPGN U IPIY, UGX SPMMSY HGY-UKTYX MALOPG LMPSS SPLMYGYX, LOURPGN OPLOYUX XPLUIIKHBPGNSE. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KYUXPGN, MOY AOSUG PGMYKKAIMYXXYGPLHB."VAM COUM P LUE PL," OY LUPX, MAKGPGN MH KHLMHB, "PM CHASX VY VYLMLPTISE MH IYMPMPHG MOY YTIYKHK ZHK IUKXHG. MOYE LUE NKYUM KYCUKXL CPSSGHC VY XPLMKPVAMYX, UGX LAKYSE U IUKXHG CHASX VY NKUGMYX....""TY IYMPMPHG MOY YTIYCH'!" YDWSUPTYX XYGPLHB, PG U BHPWY MH COPWO OYMKPYX OUKX MH NPBY MOY HSX YGYKNE UGX ZPKY, VAM COPWO LHAGXYX SPRY UGYDIKYLLPHG HZ PKKPMUVSY PTIHMYGWY. "COUM ZHK? PZ P CYKY U CHVVYK P CHASXULR TYKWE, VAM P'T VYPGN WHAKM-TUKMPUSYX ZHK VCPGNPGN CHVVYKL MH VHHR.SYM MOYT MCE TY, P'T GHM UZCUPX HZ UGEHGY. P'BY LYKBYX MOY MLUK UGXTE WHAGMCE OHGHCUVSE UGX OUBY GHM LMHSYG! UGX UT P MH VY XYNCUXYX?...SPLMYG, P'T C'PMPGN MH MOYT LMCUPNOM. MOPL PL COUM P LUE: 'PZ P OUXCHVVYX MOY MCYULACE...'""PM'L WYKMUPGSE CYSS CKPMMYG," LUPX MALOPG, "VAM MOUM'L GHM MOY IHPGM,BULPSP XTPMKPWO," UGX OY USLH MAKGYX MH KHLMHB. EHA RGHC MOY UAXPMHK MHSX EHA PM CUL UVUX VALPGYLL.""CYSS, SYM PM VY VUX," LUPX XYGPLHB."MOY UAXPMHK CKHMY HAM U IYMPMPHG ZHK EHA," WHGMPGAYX MALOPG, "UGXEHA HANOM MH LPNG PM UGX ULR MOPL NYGMSYTUG MH MURY PM. GH XHAVM OY"(PGXPWUMPGN KHLMHB) "OUL WHGGYWMPHGL HG MOY LMUZZ. EHA CHG'M ZPGX UVYMMYK HIIHKMAGPME.""OUBYG'M P LUPX P'T GHM NHPGN MH NCHBYS?" XYGPLHB PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, CYGMHG KYUXPGN OPL IUIYK.KHLMHB OUX GHM MOY WHAKUNY MH IYKLAUXY XYGPLHB, MOHANO OY PGLMPGWMPBYSEZYSM MOUM MOY CUE UXBPLYX VE MALOPG UGX MOY HMOYK HZZPWYKL CUL MOYLUZYLM, UGX MOHANO OY CHASX OUBY VYYG NSUX MH VY HZ LYKBPWY MH XYGPLHB.OY RGYC OPL LMAVVHKG CPSS UGX LMKUPNOMZHKCUKX OULME MYTIYK.COYG MOY KYUXPGN HZ XYGPLHB'L BPKASYGM KYISE, COPWO MHHR THKY MOUG UGOHAK, CUL HBYK, KHLMHB LUPX GHMOPGN, UGX OY LIYGM MOY KYLM HZ MOY XUE PGU THLM XYQYWMYX LMUMY HZ TPGX UTPX XYGPLHB'L OHLIPMUS WHTKUXYL, COH OUXNUMOYKYX KHAGX OPT, MYSSPGN MOYT COUM OY RGYC UGX SPLMYGPGN MH MOYPKLMHKPYL. XYGPLHB CUL THHXPSE LPSYGM USS MOY YBYGPGN.SUMY PG MOY YBYGPGN, COYG KHLMHB CUL UVHAM MH SYUBY, OY ULRYX XYGPLHBCOYMOYK OY OUX GH WHTTPLLPHG ZHK OPT."EYL, CUPM U VPM," LUPX XYGPLHB, NSUGWPGN KHAGX UM MOY HZZPWYKL, UGXMURPGN OPL IUIYKL ZKHT AGXYK OPL IPSSHC OY CYGM MH MOY CPGXHC, COYKY OYOUX UG PGRIHM, UGX LUM XHCG MH CKPMY."PM LYYTL PM'L GH ALY RGHWRPGN HGY'L OYUX UNUPGLM U CUSS!" OY LUPX,WHTPGN ZKHT MOY CPGXHC UGX NPBPGN KHLMHB U SUKNY YGBYSHIY. PG PM CULMOY IYMPMPHG MH MOY YTIYKHK XKUCG AI VE MOY UAXPMHK, PG COPWO XYGPLHB,CPMOHAM USSAXPGN MH MOY HZZYGLYL HZ MOY WHTTPLLUKPUM HZZPWPUSL, LPTISEULRYX ZHK IUKXHG."OUGX PM PG. PM LYYTL..."OY XPX GHM ZPGPLO, VAM NUBY U IUPGZASSE AGGUMAKUS LTPSY.WOUIMYK DPDOUBPGN KYMAKGYX MH MOY KYNPTYGM UGX MHSX MOY WHTTUGXYK MOY LMUMY HZXYGPLHB'L UZZUPKL, KHLMHB KHXY MH MPSLPM CPMO MOY SYMMYK MH MOY YTIYKHK.HG MOY MOPKMYYGMO HZ QAGY MOY ZKYGWO UGX KALLPUG YTIYKHKL UKKPBYX PGMPSLPM. VHKPL XKAVYMLRHE OUX ULRYX MOY PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY HG COHT OYCUL PG UMMYGXUGWY, MH PGWSAXY OPT PG MOY LAPMY UIIHPGMYX ZHK MOY LMUE UMMPSLPM."P LOHASX SPRY MH LYY MOY NKYUM TUG," OY LUPX, USSAXPGN MH GUIHSYHG,COHT OPMOYKMH OY, SPRY YBYKEHGY YSLY, OUX USCUEL WUSSYX VAHGUIUKMY."EHA UKY LIYURPGN HZ VAHGUIUKMY?" ULRYX MOY NYGYKUS, LTPSPGN.VHKPL SHHRYX UM OPL NYGYKUS PGJAPKPGNSE UGX PTTYXPUMYSE LUC MOUM OY CULVYPGN MYLMYX."P UT LIYURPGN, IKPGWY, HZ MOY YTIYKHK GUIHSYHG," OY KYISPYX. MOYNYGYKUS IUMMYX OPT HG MOY LOHASXYK, CPMO U LTPSY."EHA CPSS NH ZUK," OY LUPX, UGX MHHR OPT MH MPSLPM CPMO OPT.VHKPL CUL UTHGN MOY ZYC IKYLYGM UM MOY GPYTYG HG MOY XUE MOY MCHYTIYKHKL TYM. OY LUC MOY KUZM, XYWHKUMYX CPMO THGHNKUTL, LUC GUIHSYHGIULL VYZHKY MOY ZKYGWO NAUKXL HG MOY ZUKMOYK VUGR HZ MOY KPBYK, LUC MOYIYGLPBY ZUWY HZ MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK UL OY LUM PG LPSYGWY PG U MUBYKGHG MOY VUGR HZ MOY GPYTYG UCUPMPGN GUIHSYHG'L UKKPBUS, LUC VHMO YTIYKHKLNYM PGMH VHUML, UGX LUC OHC GUIHSYHG--KYUWOPGN MOY KUZM ZPKLM--LMYIIYXJAPWRSE ZHKCUKX MH TYYM USYDUGXYK UGX OYSX HAM OPL OUGX MH OPT, UGX OHCMOYE VHMO KYMPKYX PGMH MOY IUBPSPHG. LPGWY OY OUX VYNAG MH THBY PG MOYOPNOYLM WPKWSYL VHKPL OUX TUXY PM OPL OUVPM MH CUMWO UMMYGMPBYSE USSMOUM CYGM HG UKHAGX OPT UGX MH GHMY PM XHCG. UM MOY MPTY HZ MOY TYYMPGNUM MPSLPM OY ULRYX MOY GUTYL HZ MOHLY COH OUX WHTY CPMO GUIHSYHG UGXUVHAM MOY AGPZHKTL MOYE CHKY, UGX SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSE MH CHKXL LIHRYGVE PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNYL. UM MOY THTYGM MOY YTIYKHKL CYGM PGMH MOYIUBPSPHG OY SHHRYX UM OPL CUMWO, UGX XPX GHM ZHKNYM MH SHHR UM PMUNUPG COYG USYDUGXYK WUTY HAM. MOY PGMYKBPYC OUX SULMYX UG OHAK UGXZPZME-MOKYY TPGAMYL. OY GHMYX MOPL XHCG MOUM LUTY YBYGPGN, UTHGN HMOYKZUWML OY ZYSM MH VY HZ OPLMHKPW PTIHKMUGWY. UL MOY YTIYKHK'L LAPMY CULU BYKE LTUSS HGY, PM CUL U TUMMYK HZ NKYUM PTIHKMUGWY, ZHK U TUG COHBUSAYX OPL LAWWYLL PG MOY LYKBPWY, MH VY UM MPSLPM HG MOY HWWULPHG HZMOPL PGMYKBPYC VYMCYYG MOY MCH YTIYKHKL, UGX OUBPGN LAWWYYXYX PG MOPL,VHKPL ZYSM MOUM OYGWYZHKMO OPL IHLPMPHG CUL ZASSE ULLAKYX. OY OUX GHMHGSE VYWHTY RGHCG, VAM IYHISY OUX NKHCG UWWALMHTYX MH OPT UGX UWWYIMYXOPT. MCPWY OY OUX YDYWAMYX WHTTPLLPHGL MH MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZ, LHMOUM MOY SUMMYK RGYC OPL ZUWY, UGX USS MOHLY UM WHAKM, ZUK ZKHTWHSX-LOHASXYKPGN OPT UL UM ZPKLM COYG MOYE WHGLPXYKYX OPT U GYCWHTYK,CHASX GHC OUBY VYYG LAKIKPLYX OUX OY VYYG UVLYGM.VHKPL SHXNYX CPMO UGHMOYK UXQAMUGM, MOY IHSPLO WHAGM FOPSPGLRP.FOPSPGLRP, U IHSY VKHANOM AI PG IUKPL, CUL KPWO, UGX IULLPHGUMYSEZHGX HZ MOY ZKYGWO, UGX USTHLM YBYKE XUE HZ MOY LMUE UM MPSLPM, ZKYGWOHZZPWYKL HZ MOY NAUKX UGX ZKHT ZKYGWO OYUXJAUKMYKL CYKY XPGPGN UGXSAGWOPGN CPMO OPT UGX VHKPL.HG MOY YBYGPGN HZ MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO HZ QAGY, WHAGM FOPSPGLRP UKKUGNYX ULAIIYK ZHK OPL ZKYGWO ZKPYGXL. MOY NAYLM HZ OHGHK CUL UG UPXY-XY-WUTI HZGUIHSYHG'L, MOYKY CYKY USLH LYBYKUS ZKYGWO HZZPWYKL HZ MOY NAUKX, UGXU IUNY HZ GUIHSYHG'L, U EHAGN SUX HZ UG HSX UKPLMHWKUMPW ZKYGWOZUTPSE. MOUM LUTY XUE, KHLMHB, IKHZPMPGN VE MOY XUKRGYLL MH UBHPX VYPGNKYWHNGPFYX PG WPBPSPUG XKYLL, WUTY MH MPSLPM UGX CYGM MH MOY SHXNPGNHWWAIPYX VE VHKPL UGX FOPSPGLRP.KHLMHB, PG WHTTHG CPMO MOY COHSY UKTE ZKHT COPWO OY WUTY, CUL ZUKZKHT OUBPGN YDIYKPYGWYX MOY WOUGNY HZ ZYYSPGN MHCUKX GUIHSYHG UGX MOYZKYGWO--COH ZKHT VYPGN ZHYL OUX LAXXYGSE VYWHTY ZKPYGXL--MOUM OUX MURYGISUWY UM OYUXJAUKMYKL UGX PG VHKPL. PG MOY UKTE, VHGUIUKMY UGX MOYZKYGWO CYKY LMPSS KYNUKXYX CPMO TPGNSYX ZYYSPGNL HZ UGNYK, WHGMYTIM,UGX ZYUK. HGSE KYWYGMSE, MUSRPGN CPMO HGY HZ ISUMHB'L WHLLUWR HZZPWYKL,KHLMHB OUX UKNAYX MOUM PZ GUIHSYHG CYKY MURYG IKPLHGYK OY CHASX VYMKYUMYX GHM UL U LHBYKYPNG, VAM UL U WKPTPGUS. JAPMY SUMYSE, OUIIYGPGNMH TYYM U CHAGXYX ZKYGWO WHSHGYS HG MOY KHUX, KHLMHB OUX TUPGMUPGYX CPMOOYUM MOUM IYUWY CUL PTIHLLPVSY VYMCYYG U SYNPMPTUMY LHBYKYPNG UGX MOYWKPTPGUS VHGUIUKMY. KHLMHB CUL MOYKYZHKY AGISYULUGMSE LMKAWR VE MOYIKYLYGWY HZ ZKYGWO HZZPWYKL PG VHKPL' SHXNPGN, XKYLLYX PG AGPZHKTL OYOUX VYYG UWWALMHTYX MH LYY ZKHT JAPMY U XPZZYKYGM IHPGM HZ BPYC ZKHTMOY HAMIHLML HZ MOY ZSUGR. KHLMHB SHHRYX ZKHCGPGNSE UM MOY ZKYGWOTYG, VHCYXKYSAWMUGMSE, UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM.FOPSPGLRP YBPXYGMSE XPX GHM KYWYPBY MOPL GYC KALLPUG IYKLHG BYKECPSSPGNSE PGMH OPL WPKWSY UGX XPX GHM LIYUR MH KHLMHB. VHKPL XPX GHMUIIYUK MH GHMPWY MOY WHGLMKUPGM MOY GYCWHTYK IKHXAWYX UGX, CPMO MOY LUTYISYULUGM WHTIHLAKY UGX MOY LUTY BYPSYX SHHR PG OPL YEYL CPMO COPWO OYOUX TYM KHLMHB, MKPYX MH YGSPBYG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG. HGY HZ MOY ZKYGWOTYG,CPMO MOY IHSPMYGYLL WOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ OPL WHAGMKETYG, UXXKYLLYX MOYHVLMPGUMYSE MUWPMAKG KHLMHB, LUEPGN MOUM MOY SUMMYK OUX IKHVUVSE WHTY MHMPSLPM MH LYY MOY YTIYKHK."GH, P WUTY HG VALPGYLL," KYISPYX KHLMHB, VKPYZSE.KHLMHB OUX VYYG HAM HZ OATHK ZKHT MOY THTYGM OY GHMPWYX MOY SHHR HZXPLLUMPLZUWMPHG HG VHKPL' ZUWY, UGX UL USCUEL OUIIYGL MH MOHLY PG U VUXOATHK, PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM YBYKEHGY KYNUKXYX OPT CPMO UBYKLPHG UGXMOUM OY CUL PG YBYKEVHXE'L CUE. OY KYUSSE CUL PG MOYPK CUE, ZHK OY USHGYMHHR GH IUKM PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG COPWO UNUPG VYWUTY NYGYKUS. MOY SHHRLMOY BPLPMHKL WULM HG OPT LYYTYX MH LUE: "UGX COUM PL OY LPMMPGN OYKYZHK?" LUPX KHLMHB, UGX KYZALPGN LAIIYK UGXKYTUPGPGN USHGY PG MOY SPMMSY KHHT, OY CUSRYX AI UGX XHCG ZHK U SHGNMPTY, OYUKPGN MOY SPNOMOYUKMYX ZKYGWO WHGBYKLUMPHG ZKHT MOY GYDM KHHT.WOUIMYK DDKHLMHB OUX WHTY MH MPSLPM MOY XUE SYULM LAPMUVSY ZHK U IYMPMPHG HGXYGPLHB'L VYOUSZ. OY WHASX GHM OPTLYSZ NH MH MOY NYGYKUS PG UMMYGXUGWYUL OY CUL PG TAZMP UGX OUX WHTY MH MPSLPM CPMOHAM IYKTPLLPHG MH XHLH, UGX VHKPL, YBYG OUX OY CPLOYX MH, WHASX GHM OUBY XHGY LH HG MOYZHSSHCPGN XUE. HG MOUM XUE, QAGY 27, MOY IKYSPTPGUKPYL HZ IYUWY CYKYLPNGYX. MOY YTIYKHKL YDWOUGNYX XYWHKUMPHGL: USYDUGXYK KYWYPBYX MOY WKHLLHZ MOY SYNPHG HZ OHGHK UGX GUIHSYHG MOY HKXYK HZ LM. UGXKYC HZ MOYZPKLM XYNKYY, UGX U XPGGYK OUX VYYG UKKUGNYX ZHK MOY YBYGPGN, NPBYG VEU VUMMUSPHG HZ MOY ZKYGWO NAUKXL MH MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR VUMMUSPHG. MOYYTIYKHKL CYKY MH VY IKYLYGM UM MOUM VUGJAYM.KHLMHB ZYSM LH PSS UM YULY UGX AGWHTZHKMUVSY CPMO VHKPL MOUM, COYG MOYSUMMYK SHHRYX PG UZMYK LAIIYK, OY IKYMYGXYX MH VY ULSYYI, UGX YUKSE GYDMTHKGPGN CYGM UCUE, UBHPXPGN VHKPL. PG OPL WPBPSPUG WSHMOYL UGX UKHAGX OUM, OY CUGXYKYX UVHAM MOY MHCG, LMUKPGN UM MOY ZKYGWO UGX MOYPKAGPZHKTL UGX UM MOY LMKYYML UGX OHALYL COYKY MOY KALLPUG UGX ZKYGWOYTIYKHKL CYKY LMUEPGN. PG U LJAUKY OY LUC MUVSYL VYPGN LYM AI UGXIKYIUKUMPHGL TUXY ZHK MOY XPGGYK; OY LUC MOY KALLPUG UGX ZKYGWO WHSHKLXKUIYX ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY HZ MOY LMKYYML, CPMO OANY THGHNKUTL U UGX G. PGMOY CPGXHCL HZ MOY OHALYL USLH ZSUNL UGX VAGMPGN CYKY XPLISUEYX."VHKPL XHYLG'M CUGM MH OYSI TY UGX P XHG'M CUGM MH ULR OPT. MOUM'LLYMMSYX," MOHANOM GPWOHSUL. "USS PL HBYK VYMCYYG AL, VAM P CHG'M SYUBYOYKY CPMOHAM OUBPGN XHGY USS P WUG ZHK XYGPLHB UGX WYKMUPGSE GHM CPMOHAMNYMMPGN OPL SYMMYK MH MOY YTIYKHK. MOY YTIYKHK!... OY PL OYKY!" MOHANOMKHLMHB, COH OUX AGWHGLWPHALSE KYMAKGYX MH MOY OHALY COYKY USYDUGXYKSHXNYX.LUXXSYX OHKLYL CYKY LMUGXPGN VYZHKY MOY OHALY UGX MOY LAPMY CYKYULLYTVSPGN, YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKPGN ZHK MOY YTIYKHK MH WHTY HAM."P TUE LYY OPT UM UGE THTYGM," MOHANOM KHLMHB. MOHANOM OY, SHHRPGN UM UG HZZPWYK COHCUL YGMYKPGN MOY OHALY MOY YTIYKHK HWWAIPYX. "UZMYK USS, IYHISY XH NHPG.... PM'L USS GHGLYGLY! P'SS NH PG UGX OUGX MOY SYMMYK MH MOY YTIYKHKTELYSZ LH TAWO MOY CHKLY ZHK XKAVYMLRHE COH XKPBYL TY MH PM!" MOPL CUE, MH MOY HZZPWYK HG XAME" (OY CUL LOHCG MOY XHHKSYUXPGN XHCGLMUPKL), "HGSE PM CHG'M VY UWWYIMYX."HG OYUKPGN MOPL PGXPZZYKYGM BHPWY, KHLMHB NKYC ZKPNOMYGYX UM COUM OYCUL XHPGN; MOY MOHANOM HZ TYYMPGN MOY YTIYKHK UM UGE THTYGM CUL LHZULWPGUMPGN UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE LH USUKTPGN MOUM OY CUL KYUXE MH KAG UCUE,VAM MOY HZZPWPUS COH OUX JAYLMPHGYX OPT HIYGYX MOY XHHK, UGX KHLMHBYGMYKYX.U LOHKM LMHAM TUG HZ UVHAM MOPKME, PG COPMY VKYYWOYL UGX OPNO VHHML UGXU VUMPLMY LOPKM MOUM OY OUX YBPXYGMSE HGSE QALM IAM HG, LMUGXPGN PG MOUMKHHT, UGX OPL BUSYM CUL VAMMHGPGN HG MH MOY VUWR HZ OPL VKYYWOYL UGYC IUPK HZ OUGXLHTY LPSR-YTVKHPXYKYX VKUWYL MOUM, ZHK LHTY KYULHG,UMMKUWMYX KHLMHB'L UMMYGMPHG. MOPL TUG CUL LIYURPGN MH LHTYHGY PG MOYUXQHPGPGN KHHT."U NHHX ZPNAKY UGX PG OYK ZPKLM VSHHT," OY CUL LUEPGN, VAM HG LYYPGNKHLMHB, OY LMHIIYX LOHKM UGX ZKHCGYX."COUM PL PM? U IYMPMPHG?""COUM PL PM?" PG MOY AGPZHKT HZMOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR KYNPTYGM--COPMY WOUTHPL-SYUMOYK VKYYWOYL UGX OPNOVHHML--UGX CYUKPGN U LMUK KHLMHB XPX GHM RGHC (PM CUL MOUM HZ MOY SYNPHGX'OHGGYAK), MOY THGUKWO WUTY HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO, IAMMPGN HG OPL NSHBYLUGX WUKKEPGN OPL OUM AGXYK OPL UKT. LMHIIPGN VYLPXY OPL OHKLY, CPMOOPL OUGX HG MOY LUXXSY, MOY YTIYKHK MAKGYX MH MOY WUBUSKE NYGYKUS UGXLUPX PG U SHAX BHPWY, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH VY OYUKX VE USS:"P WUGGHM XH PM, NYGYKUS. VYLPXY OPTLYSZ CPMO YGMOALPULT, KHLMHBKUG UZMYK OPT CPMO MOY WKHCX.WOUIMYK DDPMOY YTIYKHK KHXY MH MOY LJAUKY COYKY, ZUWPGN HGY UGHMOYK, U VUMMUSPHGHZ MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR KYNPTYGM LMHHX HG MOY KPNOM UGX U VUMMUSPHG HZ MOYZKYGWO NAUKXL PG MOYPK VYUKLRPG WUIL HG MOY SYZM.UL MOY MLUK KHXY AI MH HGY ZSUGR HZ MOY VUMMUSPHGL, COPWO IKYLYGMYXUKTL, UGHMOYK NKHAI HZ OHKLYTYG NUSSHIYX AI MH MOY HIIHLPMY ZSUGR, UGXUM MOY OYUX HZ MOYT KHLMHB KYWHNGPFYX GUIHSYHG. MOY VUMMUSPHGLLOHAMYX "OAKKUO!" UGX "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" GUIHSYHG LUPX LHTYMOPGN MHUSYDUGXYK, UGX VHMO YTIYKHKL XPLTHAGMYX UGX MHHR YUWO HMOYK'L OUGXL.GUIHSYHG'L ZUWY CHKY UG AGISYULUGM UGX UKMPZPWPUS LTPSY. PM LMKAWR OPT UL U LAKIKPLY MOUM USYDUGXYKMKYUMYX VHGUIUKMY UL UG YJAUS UGX MOUM MOY SUMMYK CUL JAPMY UM YULY CPMOMOY MLUK, UL PZ LAWO KYSUMPHGL CPMO UG YTIYKHK CYKY UG YBYKEXUE TUMMYKMH OPT.USYDUGXYK UGX GUIHSYHG, CPMO MOY SHGN MKUPG HZ MOYPK LAPMYL, UIIKHUWOYXMOY KPNOM ZSUGR HZ MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR VUMMUSPHG UGX WUTY LMKUPNOM AI MHMOY WKHCX LMUGXPGN MOYKY. MOY WKHCX AGYDIYWMYXSE ZHAGX PMLYSZ LH WSHLYMH MOY YTIYKHKL MOUM KHLMHB, LMUGXPGN PG MOY ZKHGM KHC, CUL UZKUPX OYTPNOM VY KYWHNGPFYX."LPKY, P ULR EHAK IYKTPLLPHG MH IKYLYGM MOY SYNPHG HZ OHGHK MH MOYVKUBYLM HZ EHAK LHSXPYKL," LUPX U LOUKI, IKYWPLY BHPWY, UKMPWASUMPGNYBYKE SYMMYK.MOPL CUL LUPX VE MOY AGXYKLPFYX GUIHSYHG, SHHRPGN AI LMKUPNOM PGMHUSYDUGXYK'L YEYL. USYDUGXYK SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSE MH COUM CUL LUPX MH OPTUGX, VYGXPGN OPL OYUX, LTPSYX ISYULUGMSE."MH OPT COH OUL VHKGY OPTLYSZ THLM VKUBYSE PG MOPL SULM CUK," UXXYXGUIHSYHG, UWWYGMAUMPGN YUWO LESSUVSY, UL CPMO U WHTIHLAKY UGX ULLAKUGWYYDULIYKUMPGN MH KHLMHB, OY KUG OPL YEYL HBYK MOY KALLPUG KUGRL XKUCGAI VYZHKY OPT, COH USS IKYLYGMYX UKTL CPMO MOYPK YEYL ZPDYX HG MOYPKYTIYKHK."CPSS EHAK TUQYLME USSHC TY MH WHGLASM MOY WHSHGYS?" MOHANOM KHLMHB."SUFUKYB!" MOY WHSHGYS WUSSYX, CPMO U ZKHCG, UGX SUFUKYB, MOY ZPKLMLHSXPYK PG MOY KUGR, LMYIIYX VKPLRSE ZHKCUKX."COYKY UKY EHA HZZ MH? LMHI OYKY!" MOYG OY UIIKHUWOYXSUFUKYB (COH KHSSYX OPL YEYL UGX IYKLPLMYGMSE NUFYX UM OPL HCG THGUKWO),SHHRYX KHAGX UM MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK MH PTISE MOUM COUM OY CUL GHCXHPGN CUL XHGY ZHK MOY LURY HZ OPL USSE, UGX MOY LTUSS COPMY OUGXOHSXPGN MOY HKXYK MHAWOYX HGY HZ SUFUKYB'L VAMMHGL. U MKUPGYX TPXCPZY CUL YGNUNYX ZHK VHNAWOUKHBHUM OPL YDIYGLY, UGX U IKPYLM CUL IUPX MH MYUWO KYUXPGN UGX CKPMPGN MHMOY WOPSXKYG HZ MOY IYULUGML UGX OHALYOHSX LYKZL.IKPGWY UGXKYC LIYGM OUSZ OPL MPTY UM VUSX OPSSL CPMO OPL ZUMOYK UGX OPLLHG, COH CUL LMPSS PG MOY WUKY HZ GAKLYL. MOY HMOYK OUSZ OY LIYGM PG"VHNAWOUKHBH WSHPLMYK," UL OPL ZUMOYK WUSSYX IKPGWY UGXKYC'L YLMUMY.XYLIPMY MOY PGXPZZYKYGWY MH MOY UZZUPKL HZ MOY CHKSX OY OUX YDIKYLLYXMH IPYKKY, OY XPSPNYGMSE ZHSSHCYX USS MOUM CYGM HG, KYWYPBYX TUGE VHHRL,UGX MH OPL LAKIKPLY GHMPWYX MOUM COYG OY HK OPL ZUMOYK OUX BPLPMHKLZKHT IYMYKLVAKN, MOY BYKE BHKMYD HZ SPZY, MOYLY IYHISY SUNNYX VYOPGXOPTLYSZ--COH GYBYK SYZM MOY WHAGMKE--PG RGHCSYXNY HZ COUM CUL OUIIYGPGNPG OHTY UGX ZHKYPNG UZZUPKL.VYLPXYL VYPGN HWWAIPYX CPMO OPL YLMUMYL UGX KYUXPGN U NKYUM BUKPYME HZVHHRL, IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL UM MOPL MPTY VALE CPMO U WKPMPWUS LAKBYE HZHAK SULM MCH AGZHKMAGUMY WUTIUPNGL, UGX CPMO XKUCPGN AI U IKHIHLUS ZHK UKYZHKT HZ MOY UKTE KASYL UGX KYNASUMPHGL.PG MOY LIKPGN HZ 1809 OY CYGM MH BPLPM MOY KEUFUG YLMUMYL COPWO OUX VYYGPGOYKPMYX VE OPL LHG, COHLY NAUKXPUG OY CUL.CUKTYX VE MOY LIKPGN LAGLOPGY OY LUM PG MOY WUSYWOY SHHRPGN UM MOY GYCNKULL, MOY ZPKLM SYUBYL HG MOY VPKWOYL, UGX MOY ZPKLM IAZZL HZ COPMYLIKPGN WSHAXL ZSHUMPGN UWKHLL MOY WSYUK VSAY LRE. OY CUL GHM MOPGRPGN HZUGEMOPGN, VAM SHHRYX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE UGX WOYYKZASSE ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY.MOYE WKHLLYX MOY ZYKKE COYKY OY OUX MUSRYX CPMO IPYKKY MOY EYUK VYZHKY.MOYE CYGM MOKHANO MOY TAXXE BPSSUNY, IULM MOKYLOPGN ZSHHKL UGX NKYYGZPYSXL HZ CPGMYK KEY, XHCGOPSS COYKY LGHC LMPSS SHXNYX GYUK MOY VKPXNY,AIOPSS COYKY MOY WSUE OUX VYYG SPJAYZPYX VE MOY KUPG, IULM LMKPIL HZLMAVVSY SUGX UGX VALOYL MHAWOYX CPMO NKYYG OYKY UGX MOYKY, UGX PGMH UVPKWO ZHKYLM NKHCPGN HG VHMO LPXYL HZ MOY KHUX. PG MOY ZHKYLM PM CULUSTHLM OHM, GH CPGX WHASX VY ZYSM. MOY VPKWOYL CPMO MOYPK LMPWRE NKYYGSYUBYL CYKY THMPHGSYLL, UGX SPSUW-WHSHKYX ZSHCYKL UGX MOY ZPKLM VSUXYLHZ NKYYG NKULL CYKY IALOPGN AI UGX SPZMPGN SULM EYUK'L SYUBYL. MOYWHUKLY YBYKNKYYG WHSHK HZ MOY LTUSS ZPK MKYYL LWUMMYKYX OYKY UGX MOYKYUTHGN MOY VPKWOYL CUL UG AGISYULUGM KYTPGXYK HZ CPGMYK. HG YGMYKPGN MOYZHKYLM MOY OHKLYL VYNUG MH LGHKM UGX LCYUMYX BPLPVSE.IYMYK MOY ZHHMTUG TUXY LHTY KYTUKR MH MOY WHUWOTUG; MOY SUMMYK ULLYGMYX.VAM UIIUKYGMSE MOY WHUWOTUG'L LETIUMOE CUL GHM YGHANO ZHK IYMYK, UGX OYMAKGYX HG MOY VHD MHCUKX OPL TULMYK."OHC ISYULUGM PM PL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!" OY LUPX CPMO U KYLIYWMZAS LTPSY."COUM?""PM'L ISYULUGM, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!""COUM PL OY MUSRPGN UVHAM?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC. "HO, MOY LIKPGN,P LAIIHLY," OY MOHANOM UL OY MAKGYX KHAGX. "EYL, KYUSSE YBYKEMOPGN PLNKYYG USKYUXE.... OHC YUKSE! MOY VPKWOYL UGX WOYKKE UGX USXYKL MHH UKYWHTPGN HAM.... VAM MOY HURL LOHC GH LPNG EYM. UO, OYKY PL HGY HUR!" UM MOY YXNY HZ MOY KHUX LMHHX UG HUR. IKHVUVSE MYG MPTYL MOY UNY HZMOY VPKWOYL MOUM ZHKTYX MOY ZHKYLM, PM CUL MYG MPTYL UL MOPWR UGX MCPWYUL MUSS UL MOYE. PM CUL UG YGHKTHAL MKYY, PML NPKMO MCPWY UL NKYUM UL UTUG WHASX YTVKUWY, UGX YBPXYGMSE SHGN UNH LHTY HZ PML VKUGWOYL OUX VYYGVKHRYG HZZ UGX PML VUKR LWUKKYX. CPMO PML OANY AGNUPGSE SPTVL LIKUCSPGNAGLETTYMKPWUSSE, UGX PML NGUKSYX OUGXL UGX ZPGNYKL, PM LMHHX UG UNYX,LMYKG, UGX LWHKGZAS THGLMYK UTHGN MOY LTPSPGN VPKWO MKYYL. MOPL HUR LYYTYX MH LUE. "UKY EHA GHM CYUKE HZMOUM LMAIPX, TYUGPGNSYLL, WHGLMUGMSE KYIYUMYX ZKUAX? USCUEL MOY LUTY UGXUSCUEL U ZKUAX? MOYKY PL GH LIKPGN, GH LAG, GH OUIIPGYLL! SHHR UM MOHLYWKUTIYX XYUX ZPKL, YBYK MOY LUTY, UGX UM TY MHH, LMPWRPGN HAM TE VKHRYGUGX VUKRYX ZPGNYKL QALM COYKY MOYE OUBY NKHCG, COYMOYK ZKHT TE VUWR HKTE LPXYL: UL MOYE OUBY NKHCG LH P LMUGX, UGX P XH GHM VYSPYBY PG EHAKOHIYL UGX EHAK SPYL."UL OY IULLYX MOKHANO MOY ZHKYLM IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX LYBYKUS MPTYL MHSHHR UM MOUM HUR, UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN ZKHT PM. MOPL TUKLOUS CUL WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, UGX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ TUEIKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM MH BPLPM OPT.PM CUL GHC OHM LIKPGN CYUMOYK. MOY COHSY ZHKYLM CUL USKYUXE WSHMOYX PGNKYYG. OY OYUKX TYKKE NPKSPLO WKPYL VYOPGXLHTY MKYYL HG MOY KPNOM UGX LUC U NKHAI HZ NPKSL KAGGPGN MH WKHLLMOY IUMO HZ OPL WUSYWOY. GHC NH MH LSYYI, UGX MOYKY'L UG YGX HZ PM.""EHA NH MH LSYYI, VAM P WUG'M," LUPX MOY ZPKLM BHPWY, WHTPGN GYUKYK MHMOY CPGXHC. USS KPNOM, NH, NH!"UNUPG USS CUL LPSYGM, VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC RGYC LOY CUL LMPSS LPMMPGNMOYKY. ZKHT MPTY MH MPTY OY OYUKX U LHZM KALMSY UGX UM MPTYL U LPNO."H NHX, H NHX! COUM XHYL PM TYUG?" LOY LAXXYGSE YDWSUPTYX. "MH VYX MOYG,PZ PM TALM VY!" UGX LOY LSUTTYX MOY WULYTYGM."ZHK OYK P TPNOM UL CYSS GHM YDPLM!" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC COPSY OYSPLMYGYX MH OYK BHPWY, ZHK LHTY KYULHG YDIYWMPGN EYM ZYUKPGN MOUM LOYTPNOM LUE LHTYMOPGN UVHAM OPT. "MOYKY LOY PL UNUPG! UL PZ PM CYKY HGIAKIHLY," MOHANOM OY.PG OPL LHAS MOYKY LAXXYGSE UKHLY LAWO UG AGYDIYWMYX MAKTHPS HZ EHAMOZASMOHANOML UGX OHIYL, WHGMKUKE MH MOY COHSY MYGHK HZ OPL SPZY, MOUM AGUVSYMH YDISUPG OPL WHGXPMPHG MH OPTLYSZ OY SUE XHCG UGX ZYSS ULSYYI UM HGWY.WOUIMYK PPPGYDM THKGPGN, OUBPGN MURYG SYUBY HZ GH HGY VAM MOY WHAGM, UGX GHMCUPMPGN ZHK MOY SUXPYL MH UIIYUK, IKPGWY UGXKYC LYM HZZ ZHK OHTY.PM CUL USKYUXE MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ QAGY COYG HG OPL KYMAKG QHAKGYE OY XKHBYPGMH MOY VPKWO ZHKYLM COYKY MOY NGUKSYX HSX HUR OUX TUXY LH LMKUGNY UGXTYTHKUVSY UG PTIKYLLPHG HG OPT. PG MOY ZHKYLM MOY OUKGYLL VYSSL LHAGXYXEYM THKY TAZZSYX MOUG MOYE OUX XHGY LPD CYYRL VYZHKY, ZHK GHC USS CULMOPWR, LOUXE, UGX XYGLY, UGX MOY EHAGN ZPKL XHMMYX UVHAM PG MOY ZHKYLMXPX GHM QUK HG MOY NYGYKUS VYUAME VAM, SYGXPGN MOYTLYSBYL MH MOY THHXUKHAGX, CYKY XYSPWUMYSE NKYYG CPMO ZSAZZE EHAGN LOHHML.MOY COHSY XUE OUX VYYG OHM. LHTYCOYKY U LMHKT CUL NUMOYKPGN, VAM HGSEU LTUSS WSHAX OUX LWUMMYKYX LHTY KUPGXKHIL SPNOMSE, LIKPGRSPGN MOY KHUXUGX MOY LUIIE SYUBYL. MOY SYZM LPXY HZ MOY ZHKYLM CUL XUKR PG MOY LOUXY,MOY KPNOM LPXY NSPMMYKYX PG MOY LAGSPNOM, CYM UGX LOPGE UGX LWUKWYSELCUEYX VE MOY VKYYFY. YBYKEMOPGN CUL PG VSHLLHT, MOY GPNOMPGNUSYLMKPSSYX, UGX MOYPK BHPWYL KYBYKVYKUMYX GHC GYUK, GHC ZUK UCUE."EYL, OYKY PG MOPL ZHKYLM CUL MOUM HUR CPMO COPWO P UNKYYX," MOHANOMIKPGWY UGXKYC. "VAM COYKY PL PM?" OY UNUPG CHGXYKYX, NUFPGN UM MOY SYZMLPXY HZ MOY KHUX, UGX CPMOHAM KYWHNGPFPGN PM OY SHHRYX CPMO UXTPKUMPHGUM MOY BYKE HUR OY LHANOM. MOY HSX HUR, JAPMY MKUGLZPNAKYX, LIKYUXPGNHAM U WUGHIE HZ LUIIE XUKR-NKYYG ZHSPUNY, LMHHX KUIM UGX LSPNOMSEMKYTVSPGN PG MOY KUEL HZ MOY YBYGPGN LAG. GYPMOYK NGUKSYX ZPGNYKL GHKHSX LWUKL GHK HSX XHAVML UGX LHKKHCL CYKY UGE HZ MOYT PG YBPXYGWY GHC.MOKHANO MOY OUKX WYGMAKE-HSX VUKR, YBYG COYKY MOYKY CYKY GH MCPNL,SYUBYL OUX LIKHAMYX LAWO UL HGY WHASX OUKXSE VYSPYBY MOY HSX BYMYKUGWHASX OUBY IKHXAWYX."EYL, PM PL MOY LUTY HUR," MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX USS UM HGWY OY CULLYPFYX VE UG AGKYULHGPGN LIKPGNMPTY ZYYSPGN HZ QHE UGX KYGYCUS. USS MOYVYLM THTYGML HZ OPL SPZY LAXXYGSE KHLY MH OPL TYTHKE. UALMYKSPMF CPMOMOY SHZME OYUBYGL, OPL CPZY'L XYUX KYIKHUWOZAS ZUWY, IPYKKY UM MOYZYKKE, MOUM NPKS MOKPSSYX VE MOY VYUAME HZ MOY GPNOM, UGX MOUM GPNOMPMLYSZ UGX MOY THHG, UGX.... USS MOPL KALOYX LAXXYGSE MH OPL TPGX."GH, SPZY PL GHM HBYK UM MOPKME-HGY!" IKPGWY UGXKYC LAXXYGSE XYWPXYXZPGUSSE UGX XYWPLPBYSE. "PM PL GHM YGHANO ZHK TY MH RGHC COUM P OUBY PGTY--YBYKEHGY TALM RGHC PM: IPYKKY, UGX MOUM EHAGN NPKS COH CUGMYX MHZSE UCUE PGMH MOY LRE, YBYKEHGY TALM RGHC TY, LH MOUM TE SPZY TUE GHM VYSPBYX ZHK TELYSZ USHGY COPSY HMOYKL SPBY LH UIUKM ZKHT PM, VAM LH MOUMPM TUE VY KYZSYWMYX PG MOYT USS, UGX MOYE UGX P TUE SPBY PG OUKTHGE!"HG KYUWOPGN OHTY IKPGWY UGXKYC XYWPXYX MH NH MH IYMYKLVAKN MOUM UAMATGUGX ZHAGX USS LHKML HZ KYULHGL ZHK MOPL XYWPLPHG. U COHSY LYKPYL HZLYGLPVSY UGX SHNPWUS WHGLPXYKUMPHGL LOHCPGN PM MH VY YLLYGMPUS ZHK OPTMH NH MH IYMYKLVAKN, UGX YBYG MH KY-YGMYK MOY LYKBPWY, RYIM LIKPGNPGNAI PG OPL TPGX. OY WHASX GHM GHC AGXYKLMUGX OHC OY WHASX YBYK YBYG OUBYXHAVMYX MOY GYWYLLPME HZ MURPGN UG UWMPBY LOUKY PG SPZY, QALM UL U THGMOVYZHKY OY OUX GHM AGXYKLMHHX OHC MOY PXYU HZ SYUBPGN MOY JAPYM WHAGMKEWHASX YBYK YGMYK OPL OYUX. PM GHC LYYTYX WSYUK MH OPT MOUM USS OPLYDIYKPYGWY HZ SPZY TALM VY LYGLYSYLLSE CULMYX AGSYLL OY UIISPYX PM MHLHTY RPGX HZ CHKR UGX UNUPG ISUEYX UG UWMPBY IUKM PG SPZY. OY XPX GHMYBYG KYTYTVYK OHC ZHKTYKSE, HG MOY LMKYGNMO HZ LPTPSUK CKYMWOYX SHNPWUSUKNATYGML, PM OUX LYYTYX HVBPHAL MOUM OY CHASX VY XYNKUXPGN OPTLYSZ PZOY GHC, UZMYK MOY SYLLHGL OY OUX OUX PG SPZY, USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH VYSPYBYPG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ VYPGN ALYZAS UGX PG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ OUIIPGYLLHK SHBY. GHC KYULHG LANNYLMYX JAPMY MOY HIIHLPMY. UZMYK MOUM QHAKGYEMH KEUFUG OY ZHAGX MOY WHAGMKE XASS; OPL ZHKTYK IAKLAPML GH SHGNYKPGMYKYLMYX OPT, UGX HZMYG COYG LPMMPGN USHGY PG OPL LMAXE OY NHM AI,CYGM MH MOY TPKKHK, UGX NUFYX U SHGN MPTY UM OPL HCG ZUWY. MOYG OY CHASXMAKG UCUE MH MOY IHKMKUPM HZ OPL XYUX SPLY, COH CPMO OUPK WAKSYX U SUNKYWJAY SHHRYX MYGXYKSE UGX NUPSE UM OPT HAM HZ MOY NPSM ZKUTY. LOYXPX GHM GHC LUE MOHLY ZHKTYK MYKKPVSY CHKXL MH OPT, VAM SHHRYX LPTISE,TYKKPSE, UGX PGJAPLPMPBYSE UM OPT. UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC, WKHLLPGN OPLUKTL VYOPGX OPT, SHGN IUWYX MOY KHHT, GHC ZKHCGPGN, GHC LTPSPGN, ULOY KYZSYWMYX HG MOHLY PKKUMPHGUS, PGYDIKYLLPVSY MOHANOML, LYWKYM UL UWKPTY, COPWO USMYKYX OPL COHSY SPZY UGX CYKY WHGGYWMYX CPMO IPYKKY, CPMOZUTY, CPMO MOY NPKS UM MOY CPGXHC, MOY HUR, UGX CHTUG'L VYUAME UGX SHBY.UGX PZ UGEHGY WUTY PGMH OPL KHHT UM LAWO THTYGML OY CUL IUKMPWASUKSEWHSX, LMYKG, UGX UVHBY USS AGISYULUGMSE SHNPWUS."TE XYUK," IKPGWYLL TUKE YGMYKPGN UM LAWO U THTYGM CHASX LUE, "SPMMSYGPWOHSUL WUG'M NH HAM MHXUE, PM'L BYKE WHSX.""PZ PM CYKY OHM," IKPGWY UGXKYC CHASX KYISE UM LAWO MPTYL BYKE XKESEMH OPL LPLMYK, "OY WHASX NH HAM PG OPL LTHWR, VAM UL PM PL WHSX OY TALMCYUK CUKT WSHMOYL, COPWO CYKY XYLPNGYX ZHK MOUM IAKIHLY. MOUM PL COUMZHSSHCL ZKHT MOY ZUWM MOUM PM PL WHSX; UGX GHM MOUM U WOPSX COH GYYXLZKYLO UPK LOHASX KYTUPG UM OHTY," OY CHASX UXX CPMO YDMKYTY SHNPW, ULPZ IAGPLOPGN LHTYHGY ZHK MOHLY LYWKYM PSSHNPWUS YTHMPHGL MOUM LMPKKYXCPMOPG OPT.UM LAWO THTYGML IKPGWYLL TUKE CHASX MOPGR OHC PGMYSSYWMAUS CHKR XKPYLTYG AI.WOUIMYK PBIKPGWY UGXKYC UKKPBYX PG IYMYKLVAKN PG UANALM, 1809. PM CUL MOY MPTYCOYG MOY EHAMOZAS LIYKUGLRP CUL UM MOY FYGPMO HZ OPL ZUTY UGX OPLKYZHKTL CYKY VYPGN IALOYX ZHKCUKX CPMO MOY NKYUMYLM YGYKNE. MOUM LUTYUANALM MOY YTIYKHK CUL MOKHCG ZKHT OPL WUSYWOY, PGQAKYX OPL SYN, UGXKYTUPGYX MOKYY CYYRL UM IYMYKOHZ, KYWYPBPGN LIYKUGLRP YBYKE XUE UGX GHHGY YSLY. UM MOUM MPTY MOY MCH ZUTHAL XYWKYYL CYKY VYPGN IKYIUKYX MOUMLH UNPMUMYX LHWPYME--UVHSPLOPGN WHAKM KUGRL UGX PGMKHXAWPGNYDUTPGUMPHGL MH JAUSPZE ZHK MOY NKUXYL HZ WHSSYNPUMY ULLYLLHK UGX LMUMYWHAGWPSHK--UGX GHM TYKYSE MOYLY VAM U COHSY LMUMY WHGLMPMAMPHG,PGMYGXYX MH WOUGNY MOY YDPLMPGN HKXYK HZ NHBYKGTYGM PG KALLPU: SYNUS,UXTPGPLMKUMPBY, UGX ZPGUGWPUS, ZKHT MOY WHAGWPS HZ LMUMY XHCG MH MOYXPLMKPWM MKPVAGUSL. GHC MOHLY BUNAY SPVYKUS XKYUTL CPMO COPWO MOYYTIYKHK USYDUGXYK OUX ULWYGXYX MOY MOKHGY, UGX COPWO OY OUX MKPYX MH IAMPGMH YZZYWM CPMO MOY UPX HZ OPL ULLHWPUMYL, WFUKMHKELRP, GHBHLPSMLYB,RHWOAVYE, UGX LMKHNHGHB--COHT OY OPTLYSZ PG QYLM OUX WUSSYX OPL WHTPMYXY LUSAM IAVSPW--CYKY MURPGN LOUIY UGX VYPGN KYUSPFYX.GHC USS MOYLY TYG CYKY KYISUWYX VE LIYKUGLRP HG MOY WPBPS LPXY, UGXUKURWOYYB HG MOY TPSPMUKE. LHHG UZMYK OPL UKKPBUS IKPGWY UGXKYC, UL UNYGMSYTUG HZ MOY WOUTVYK, IKYLYGMYX OPTLYSZ UM WHAKM UGX UM U SYBYY. MOYYTIYKHK, MOHANO OY TYM OPT MCPWY, XPX GHM ZUBHK OPT CPMO U LPGNSY CHKX.PM OUX USCUEL LYYTYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC VYZHKY MOUM OY CUL UGMPIUMOYMPWMH MOY YTIYKHK UGX MOUM MOY SUMMYK XPLSPRYX OPL ZUWY UGX IYKLHGUSPMENYGYKUSSE, UGX PG MOY WHSX, KYIYSSYGM NSUGWY MOY YTIYKHK NUBY OPT, OYGHC ZHAGX ZAKMOYK WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ MOPL LAKTPLY. MOY WHAKMPYKL YDISUPGYXMOY YTIYKHK'L GYNSYWM HZ OPT VE OPL TUQYLME'L XPLISYULAKY UM VHSRHGLRP'LGHM OUBPGN LYKBYX LPGWY 1805."P RGHC TELYSZ MOUM HGY WUGGHM OYSI HGY'L LETIUMOPYL UGX UGMPIUMOPYL,"MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, "LH PM CPSS GHM XH MH IKYLYGM TE IKHIHLUS ZHKMOY KYZHKT HZ MOY UKTE KYNASUMPHGL MH MOY YTIYKHK IYKLHGUSSE, VAM MOYIKHQYWM CPSS LIYUR ZHK PMLYSZ."OY TYGMPHGYX COUM OY OUX CKPMMYG MH UG HSX ZPYSX TUKLOUS, U ZKPYGX HZOPL ZUMOYK'L. MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS TUXY UG UIIHPGMTYGM MH LYY OPT, KYWYPBYXOPT NKUWPHALSE, UGX IKHTPLYX MH PGZHKT MOY YTIYKHK. U ZYC XUEL SUMYKIKPGWY UGXKYC KYWYPBYX GHMPWY MOUM OY CUL MH NH MH LYY MOY TPGPLMYK HZCUK, WHAGM UKURWOYYB.HG MOY UIIHPGMYX XUE IKPGWY UGXKYC YGMYKYX WHAGM UKURWOYYB'L CUPMPGNKHHT UM GPGY PG MOY THKGPGN.OY XPX GHM RGHC UKURWOYYB IYKLHGUSSE, OUX GYBYK LYYG OPT, UGX USS OY OUXOYUKX HZ OPT PGLIPKYX OPT CPMO VAM SPMMSY KYLIYWM ZHK MOY TUG."OY PL TPGPLMYK HZ CUK, U TUG MKALMYX VE MOY YTIYKHK, UGX P GYYX GHMWHGWYKG TELYSZ UVHAM OPL IYKLHGUS JAUSPMPYL: OY OUL VYYG WHTTPLLPHGYXMH WHGLPXYK TE IKHQYWM, LH OY USHGY WUG NYM PM UXHIMYX," MOHANOM IKPGWYUGXKYC UL OY CUPMYX UTHGN U GATVYK HZ PTIHKMUGM UGX AGPTIHKMUGM IYHISYPG WHAGM UKURWOYYB'L CUPMPGN KHHT.XAKPGN OPL LYKBPWY, WOPYZSE UL UG UXQAMUGM, IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX LYYG MOYUGMYKHHTL HZ TUGE PTIHKMUGM TYG, UGX MOY XPZZYKYGM MEIYL HZ LAWO KHHTLCYKY CYSS RGHCG MH OPT. WHAGM UKURWOYYB'L UGMYKHHT OUX JAPMY U LIYWPUSWOUKUWMYK. LHTY CUSRYX MOHANOMZASSE AI UGX XHCG,HMOYKL COPLIYKYX UGX SUANOYX. IKPGWY UGXKYC OYUKX MOY GPWRGUTY "LPSUUGXKYYBPWO" UGX MOY CHKXL, "AGWSY CPSS NPBY PM MH AL OHM," PG KYZYKYGWYMH WHAGM UKURWOYYB. HGY NYGYKUS (UG PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY), YBPXYGMSEZYYSPGN HZZYGXYX UM OUBPGN MH CUPM LH SHGN, LUM WKHLLPGN UGX AGWKHLLPGNOPL SYNL UGX LTPSPGN WHGMYTIMAHALSE MH OPTLYSZ.VAM MOY THTYGM MOY XHHK HIYGYX HGY ZYYSPGN USHGY UIIYUKYX HG USSZUWYL--MOUM HZ ZYUK. OY LOHAMYX, VHCPGN MH IKPGWYUGXKYC.WOUIMYK BCOPSY CUPMPGN ZHK MOY UGGHAGWYTYGM HZ OPL UIIHPGMTYGM MH MOY WHTTPMMYYIKPGWY UGXKYC SHHRYX AI OPL ZHKTYK UWJAUPGMUGWYL, IUKMPWASUKSE MOHLY OYRGYC MH VY PG IHCYK UGX COHLY UPX OY TPNOM GYYX. ZKHT MOY PKKPMUMPHG HZ MOY HSXYK TYG, MOY WAKPHLPME HZ MOYAGPGPMPUMYX, MOY KYLYKBY HZ MOY PGPMPUMYX, MOY OAKKE UGX IKYHWWAIUMPHGHZ YBYKEHGY, UGX MOY PGGATYKUVSY WHTTPMMYYL UGX WHTTPLLPHGL HZ COHLYYDPLMYGWY OY SYUKGYX YBYKE XUE, OY ZYSM MOUM GHC, PG 1809, OYKY PGIYMYKLVAKN U BULM WPBPS WHGZSPWM CUL PG IKYIUKUMPHG, MOY WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ HZ COPWO CUL U TELMYKPHAL IYKLHG OY XPX GHM RGHC, VAM COHCUL LAIIHLYX MH VY U TUG HZ NYGPAL--LIYKUGLRP. UGX MOPL THBYTYGM HZKYWHGLMKAWMPHG HZ COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX U BUNAY PXYU, UGX LIYKUGLRPPML WOPYZ IKHTHMYK, VYNUG MH PGMYKYLM OPT LH RYYGSE MOUM MOY JAYLMPHGHZ MOY UKTE KYNASUMPHGL JAPWRSE KYWYXYX MH U LYWHGXUKE ISUWY PG OPLWHGLWPHALGYLL.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL THLM ZUBHKUVSE ISUWYX MH LYWAKY NHHX KYWYIMPHG PG MOYOPNOYLM UGX THLM XPBYKLY IYMYKLVAKN WPKWSYL HZ MOY XUE. MOY KYZHKTPGNIUKME WHKXPUSSE CYSWHTYX UGX WHAKMYX OPT, PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY VYWUALYOY CUL KYIAMYX MH VY WSYBYK UGX BYKE CYSS KYUX, UGX LYWHGXSE VYWUALY VESPVYKUMPGN OPL LYKZL OY OUX HVMUPGYX MOY KYIAMUMPHG HZ VYPGN U SPVYKUS.MOY IUKME HZ MOY HSX UGX XPLLUMPLZPYX, COH WYGLAKYX MOY PGGHBUMPHGL,MAKGYX MH OPT YDIYWMPGN OPL LETIUMOE PG MOYPK XPLUIIKHBUS HZ MOYKYZHKTL, LPTISE VYWUALY OY CUL MOY LHG HZ OPL ZUMOYK. MOY ZYTPGPGYLHWPYME CHKSX CYSWHTYX OPT NSUXSE, VYWUALY OY CUL KPWO, XPLMPGNAPLOYX, UNHHX TUMWO, UGX USTHLM U GYCWHTYK, CPMO U OUSH HZ KHTUGWY HG UWWHAGMHZ OPL LAIIHLYX XYUMO UGX MOY MKUNPW SHLL HZ OPL CPZY. VYLPXYL MOPLMOY NYGYKUS HIPGPHG HZ USS COH OUX RGHCG OPT IKYBPHALSE CUL MOUM OY OUXNKYUMSE PTIKHBYX XAKPGN MOYLY SULM ZPBY EYUKL, OUBPGN LHZMYGYX UGX NKHCGTHKY TUGSE, SHLM OPL ZHKTYK UZZYWMUMPHG, IKPXY, UGX WHGMYTIMAHAL PKHGE,UGX UWJAPKYX MOY LYKYGPME MOUM WHTYL CPMO EYUKL. OY TUGUNYL YBYKEMOPGN. P'SS LIYUR MH OPT. OY OUL IKHTPLYX MHWHTY MOPL YBYGPGN.""COUM OUL LIYKUGLRP MH XH CPMO MOY UKTE KYNASUMPHGL?" LUPX MOY HSX TUG, SHHRPGN UM RHWOAVYE."MOYKY'L HGY MOPGN P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX," OY WHGMPGAYX. "COH CPSS ISHC MOYSUGX PZ MOYE UKY LYM ZKYY? PM PL YULE MH CKPMY SUCL, VAM XPZZPWASM MHKASY.... OY KHLY, MHHR IKPGWY UGXKYC VE MOY UKT,UGX CYGM MH TYYM U MUSS, VUSX, ZUPK TUG HZ UVHAM ZHKME CPMO U SUKNY HIYGZHKYOYUX UGX U SHGN ZUWY HZ AGALAUS UGX IYWASPUK COPMYGYLL, COH CULQALM YGMYKPGN. PM CUL LIYKUGLRP.IKPGWY UGXKYC KYWHNGPFYX OPT UM HGWY, UGX ZYSM U MOKHV CPMOPG OPT, ULOUIIYGL UM WKPMPWUS THTYGML HZ SPZY. COYMOYK PM CUL ZKHT KYLIYWM, YGBE,HK UGMPWPIUMPHG, OY XPX GHM RGHC. LIYKUGLRP'L COHSY ZPNAKY CUL HZ UIYWASPUK MEIY MOUM TUXY OPT YULPSE KYWHNGPFUVSY. PG MOY LHWPYME PG COPWOIKPGWY UGXKYC SPBYX OY OUX GYBYK LYYG UGEHGY COH MHNYMOYK CPMO UCRCUKXUGX WSATLE NYLMAKYL IHLLYLLYX LAWO WUSTGYLL UGX LYSZ-ULLAKUGWY; OYOUX GYBYK LYYG LH KYLHSAMY EYM NYGMSY UG YDIKYLLPHG UL MOUM PG MOHLYOUSZ-WSHLYX, KUMOYK OATPX YEYL, HK LH ZPKT U LTPSY MOUM YDIKYLLYXGHMOPGN; GHK OUX OY OYUKX LAWO U KYZPGYX, LTHHMO, LHZM BHPWY; UVHBY USSOY OUX GYBYK LYYG LAWO XYSPWUMY COPMYGYLL HZ ZUWY HK OUGXL--OUGXL COPWOCYKY VKHUX, VAM BYKE ISATI, LHZM, UGX COPMY. LAWO COPMYGYLL UGX LHZMGYLLIKPGWY UGXKYC OUX HGSE LYYG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ LHSXPYKL COH OUX VYYG SHGNPG OHLIPMUS. MOPL CUL LIYKUGLRP, LYWKYMUKE HZ LMUMY, KYIHKMYK MH MOYYTIYKHK UGX OPL WHTIUGPHG UM YKZAKM, COYKY OY OUX THKY MOUG HGWY TYM UGXMUSRYX CPMO GUIHSYHG.LIYKUGLRP XPX GHM LOPZM OPL YEYL ZKHT HGY ZUWY MH UGHMOYK UL IYHISYPGBHSAGMUKPSE XH HG YGMYKPGN U SUKNY WHTIUGE UGX CUL PG GH OAKKE MHLIYUR. OY LIHRY LSHCSE, CPMO ULLAKUGWY MOUM OY CHASX VY SPLMYGYX MH, UGXOY SHHRYX HGSE UM MOY IYKLHG CPMO COHT OY CUL WHGBYKLPGN.IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHSSHCYX LIYKUGLRP'L YBYKE CHKX UGX THBYTYGM CPMOIUKMPWASUK UMMYGMPHG. UL OUIIYGL MH LHTY IYHISY, YLIYWPUSSE MH TYGCOH QAXNY MOHLY GYUK MH MOYT LYBYKYSE, OY USCUEL HG TYYMPGNUGEHGY GYC--YLIYWPUSSE UGEHGY COHT, SPRY LIYKUGLRP, OY RGYC VEKYIAMUMPHG--YDIYWMYX MH XPLWHBYK PG OPT MOY IYKZYWMPHG HZ OATUGJAUSPMPYL.LIYKUGLRP MHSX RHWOAVYE OY CUL LHKKE OY OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH WHTY LHHGYKUL OY OUX VYYG XYMUPGYX UM MOY IUSUWY. OY XPX GHM LUE MOUM MOY YTIYKHKOUX RYIM OPT, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMPWYX MOPL UZZYWMUMPHG HZ THXYLME.COYG RHWOAVYE PGMKHXAWYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, LIYKUGLRP LSHCSE MAKGYX OPL YEYLMH VHSRHGLRP CPMO OPL WALMHTUKE LTPSY UGX SHHRYX UM OPT PG LPSYGWY."P UT BYKE NSUX MH TURY EHAK UWJAUPGMUGWY. P OUX OYUKX HZ EHA, ULYBYKEHGY OUL," OY LUPX UZMYK U IUALY.RHWOAVYE LUPX U ZYC CHKXL UVHAM MOY KYWYIMPHG UKURWOYYB OUX NPBYGVHSRHGLRP. LIYKUGLRP LTPSYX THKY TUKRYXSE."MOY WOUPKTUG HZ MOY WHTTPMMYY HG UKTE KYNASUMPHGL PL TE NHHX ZKPYGXTHGLPYAK TUNGPMLRP," OY LUPX, ZASSE UKMPWASUMPGN YBYKE CHKX UGXLESSUVSY, "UGX PZ EHA SPRY P WUG IAM EHA PG MHAWO CPMO OPT." OY IUALYXUM MOY ZASS LMHI. "P OHIY EHA CPSS ZPGX OPT LETIUMOYMPW UGX KYUXE MHWH-HIYKUMY PG IKHTHMPGN USS MOUM PL KYULHGUVSY."U WPKWSY LHHG ZHKTYX KHAGX LIYKUGLRP, UGX MOY HSX TUG COH OUX MUSRYXUVHAM OPL LAVHKXPGUMY IKEUGPWOGPRHB UXXKYLLYX U JAYLMPHG MH OPT.IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMOHAM QHPGPGN PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUMWOYX YBYKE THBYTYGMHZ LIYKUGLRP'L: MOPL TUG, GHM SHGN LPGWY UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM XPBPGPMELMAXYGM, COH GHC, VHSRHGLRP MOHANOM, OYSX PG OPL OUGXL--MOHLY ISATICOPMY OUGXL--MOY ZUMY HZ KALLPU. IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LMKAWR VE MOYYDMKUHKXPGUKPSE XPLXUPGZAS WHTIHLAKY CPMO COPWO LIYKUGLRP UGLCYKYXMOY HSX TUG. OY UIIYUKYX MH UXXKYLL WHGXYLWYGXPGN CHKXL MH OPT ZKHT UGPTTYULAKUVSY OYPNOM. COYG MOY HSX TUG VYNUG MH LIYUR MHH SHAX, LIYKUGLRPLTPSYX UGX LUPX OY WHASX GHM QAXNY HZ MOY UXBUGMUNY HK XPLUXBUGMUNY HZCOUM ISYULYX MOY LHBYKYPNG.OUBPGN MUSRYX ZHK U SPMMSY COPSY PG MOY NYGYKUS WPKWSY, LIYKUGLRP KHLYUGX WHTPGN AI MH IKPGWY UGXKYC MHHR OPT USHGN MH MOY HMOYK YGX HZ MOYKHHT. PM CUL WSYUK MOUM OY MOHANOM PM GYWYLLUKE MH PGMYKYLM OPTLYSZ PGVHSRHGLRP."P OUX GH WOUGWY MH MUSR CPMO EHA, IKPGWY, XAKPGN MOY UGPTUMYXWHGBYKLUMPHG PG COPWO MOUM BYGYKUVSY NYGMSYTUG PGBHSBYX TY," OY LUPXCPMO U TPSXSE WHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY, UL PZ PGMPTUMPGN VE MOUM LTPSY MOUM OYUGX IKPGWY UGXKYC AGXYKLMHHX MOY PGLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOY IYHISY CPMO COHTOY OUX QALM VYYG MUSRPGN. MOPL ZSUMMYKYX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "P OUBY RGHCG HZEHA ZHK U SHGN MPTY: ZPKLM ZKHT EHAK UWMPHG CPMO KYNUKX MH EHAK LYKZL,U ZPKLM YDUTISY, HZ COPWO PM PL BYKE XYLPKUVSY MOUM MOYKY LOHASX VY THKYPTPMUMHKL; UGX LYWHGXSE VYWUALY EHA UKY HGY HZ MOHLY NYGMSYTYG HZ MOYWOUTVYK COH OUBY GHM WHGLPXYKYX MOYTLYSBYL HZZYGXYX VE MOY GYC XYWKYYWHGWYKGPGN MOY KUGRL USSHMMYX MH WHAKMPYKL, COPWO PL WUALPGN LH TAWONHLLPI UGX MPMMSY-MUMMSY.""GH," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "TE ZUMOYK XPX GHM CPLO TY MH MURY UXBUGMUNYHZ MOY IKPBPSYNY. P VYNUG MOY LYKBPWY ZKHT MOY SHCYK NKUXY.""EHAK ZUMOYK, U TUG HZ MOY SULM WYGMAKE, YBPXYGMSE LMUGXL UVHBY HAKWHGMYTIHKUKPYL COH LH WHGXYTG MOPL TYULAKY COPWO TYKYSE KYYLMUVSPLOYLGUMAKUS QALMPWY.""P MOPGR, OHCYBYK, MOUM MOYLY WHGXYTGUMPHGL OUBY LHTY NKHAGX," KYMAKGYXIKPGWY UGXKYC, MKEPGN MH KYLPLM LIYKUGLRP'L PGZSAYGWY, HZ COPWO OY VYNUGMH VY WHGLWPHAL. OY XPX GHM SPRY MH UNKYY CPMO OPT PG YBYKEMOPGN UGXZYSM U CPLO MH WHGMKUXPWM. MOHANO OY ALAUSSE LIHRY YULPSE UGX CYSS,OY ZYSM U XPZZPWASME PG YDIKYLLPGN OPTLYSZ GHC COPSY MUSRPGN CPMOLIYKUGLRP. OY CUL MHH TAWO UVLHKVYX PG HVLYKBPGN MOY ZUTHAL TUG'LIYKLHGUSPME."NKHAGXL HZ IYKLHGUS UTVPMPHG TUEVY," LIYKUGLRP IAM PG JAPYMSE."UGX HZ LMUMY PGMYKYLM MH LHTY YDMYGM," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC."COUM XH EHA TYUG?" ULRYX LIYKUGLRP JAPYMSE, SHCYKPGN OPL YEYL."P UT UG UXTPKYK HZ THGMYLJAPYA," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, "UGX OPL PXYUMOUM SY IKPGWPIY XYL THGUKWOPYL YLM S'OHGGYAK TY IUKUPM PGWHGMYLMUVSY.WYKMUPGL XKHPML YM IKPBPSYNYL XY SU GHVSYLLY TY IUKUPLLYGM YMKY XYLTHEYGL XY LHAMYGPK WY LYGMPTYGM." *     * "MOY IKPGWPISY HZ THGUKWOPYL PL OHGHK LYYTL MH TY     PGWHGMYLMUVSY. WYKMUPG KPNOML UGX IKPBPSYNYL ZHK MOY     UKPLMHWKUWE UIIYUK MH TY U TYUGL HZ TUPGMUPGPGN MOUM     LYGMPTYGM."MOY LTPSY BUGPLOYX ZKHT LIYKUGLRP'L COPMY ZUWY, COPWO CUL TAWO PTIKHBYXVE MOY WOUGNY. IKHVUVSE IKPGWY UGXKYC'L MOHANOM PGMYKYLMYX OPT."LP BHAL YGBPLUNYF SU JAYLMPHG LHAL WY IHPGM XY BAY," * OY VYNUG,IKHGHAGWPGN ZKYGWO CPMO YBPXYGM XPZZPWASME, UGX LIYURPGN YBYG LSHCYKMOUG PG KALLPUG VAM JAPMY WUSTSE.    * "PZ EHA KYNUKX MOY JAYLMPHG ZKHT MOUM IHPGM HZ BPYC."LIYKUGLRP CYGM HG MH LUE MOUM OHGHK, S'OHGYAK, WUGGHM VY AIOYSX VEIKPBPSYNYL OUKTZAS MH MOY LYKBPWY; MOUM OHGHK, S'OHGGYAK, PL YPMOYK UGYNUMPBY WHGWYIM HZ GHM XHPGN COUM PL VSUTYCHKMOE HK PM PL U LHAKWY HZYTASUMPHG PG IAKLAPM HZ WHTTYGXUMPHG UGX KYCUKXL, COPWO KYWHNGPFY PM.OPL UKNATYGML CYKY WHGWPLY, LPTISY, UGX WSYUK."UG PGLMPMAMPHG AIOHSXPGN OHGHK, MOY LHAKWY HZ YTASUMPHG, PL HGY LPTPSUKMH MOY SYNPHG X'OHGGYAK HZ MOY NKYUM YTIYKHK GUIHSYHG, GHM OUKTZASVAM OYSIZAS MH MOY LAWWYLL HZ MOY LYKBPWY, VAM GHM U WSULL HK WHAKMIKPBPSYNY.""P XH GHM XPLIAMY MOUM, VAM PM WUGGHM VY XYGPYX MOUM WHAKM IKPBPSYNYLOUBY UMMUPGYX MOY LUTY YGX," KYMAKGYX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "YBYKE WHAKMPYKWHGLPXYKL OPTLYSZ VHAGX MH TUPGMUPG OPL IHLPMPHG CHKMOPSE.""EYM EHA XH GHM WUKY MH UBUPS EHAKLYSZ HZ MOY IKPBPSYNY, IKPGWY," LUPXLIYKUGLRP, PGXPWUMPGN VE U LTPSY MOUM OY CPLOYX MH ZPGPLO UTPUVSE UGUKNATYGM COPWO CUL YTVUKKULLPGN ZHK OPL WHTIUGPHG. "PZ EHA CPSS XHTY MOY OHGHK HZ WUSSPGN HG TY HG CYXGYLXUE," OY UXXYX, "P CPSS, UZMYKMUSRPGN CPMO TUNGPMLRP, SYM EHA RGHC COUM TUE PGMYKYLM EHA, UGX LOUSSUSLH OUBY MOY ISYULAKY HZ U THKY XYMUPSYX WOUM CPMO EHA."WSHLPGN OPL YEYL, OY VHCYX U SU ZKUGWUPLY, CPMOHAM MURPGN SYUBY, UGXMKEPGN MH UMMKUWM UL SPMMSY UMMYGMPHG UL IHLLPVSY, OY SYZM MOY KHHT.WOUIMYK BPXAKPGN MOY ZPKLM CYYRL HZ OPL LMUE PG IYMYKLVAKN IKPGWY UGXKYC ZYSM MOYCOHSY MKYGX HZ MOHANOM OY OUX ZHKTYX XAKPGN OPL SPZY HZ LYWSALPHG JAPMYHBYKLOUXHCYX VE MOY MKPZSPGN WUKYL MOUM YGNKHLLYX OPT PG MOUM WPME.HG KYMAKGPGN OHTY PG MOY YBYGPGN OY CHASX QHM XHCG PG OPL GHMYVHHR ZHAKHK ZPBY GYWYLLUKE WUSSL HK UIIHPGMTYGML ZHK WYKMUPG OHAKL. MOY TYWOUGPLTHZ SPZY, MOY UKKUGNYTYGM HZ MOY XUE LH UL MH VY PG MPTY YBYKECOYKY,UVLHKVYX MOY NKYUMYK IUKM HZ OPL BPMUS YGYKNE. OY XPX GHMOPGN, XPXGHM YBYG MOPGR HK ZPGX MPTY MH MOPGR, VAM HGSE MUSRYX, UGX MUSRYXLAWWYLLZASSE, HZ COUM OY OUX MOHANOM COPSY PG MOY WHAGMKE.OY LHTYMPTYL GHMPWYX CPMO XPLLUMPLZUWMPHG MOUM OY KYIYUMYX MOY LUTYKYTUKR HG MOY LUTY XUE PG XPZZYKYGM WPKWSYL. VAM OY CUL LH VALE ZHKCOHSY XUEL MHNYMOYK MOUM OY OUX GH MPTY MH GHMPWY MOUM OY CUL MOPGRPGNHZ GHMOPGN.UL OY OUX XHGY HG MOYPK ZPKLM TYYMPGN UM RHWOAVYE'L, LIYKUGLRP IKHXAWYXU LMKHGN PTIKYLLPHG HG IKPGWY UGXKYC HG MOY CYXGYLXUE, COYG OYKYWYPBYX OPT MYMY-U-MYMY UM OPL HCG OHALY UGX MUSRYX MH OPT SHGN UGXWHGZPXYGMPUSSE.MH VHSRHGLRP LH TUGE IYHISY UIIYUKYX WHGMYTIMPVSY UGX PGLPNGPZPWUGMWKYUMAKYL, UGX OY LH SHGNYX MH ZPGX PG LHTYHGY MOY SPBPGN PXYUS HZ MOUMIYKZYWMPHG MHCUKX COPWO OY LMKHBY, MOUM OY KYUXPSE VYSPYBYX MOUM PGLIYKUGLRP OY OUX ZHAGX MOPL PXYUS HZ U IYKZYWMSE KUMPHGUS UGX BPKMAHALTUG. OUX LIYKUGLRP LIKAGN ZKHT MOY LUTY WSULL UL OPTLYSZ UGX IHLLYLLYXMOY LUTY VKYYXPGN UGX MKUXPMPHGL, VHSRHGLRP CHASX LHHG OUBY XPLWHBYKYXOPL CYUR, OATUG, AGOYKHPW LPXYL; VAM UL PM CUL, LIYKUGLRP'L LMKUGNY UGXSHNPWUS MAKG HZ TPGX PGLIPKYX OPT CPMO KYLIYWM USS MOY THKY VYWUALY OYXPX GHM JAPMY AGXYKLMUGX OPT. THKYHBYK, LIYKUGLRP, YPMOYK VYWUALY OYUIIKYWPUMYX MOY HMOYK'L WUIUWPME HK VYWUALY OY WHGLPXYKYX PM GYWYLLUKEMH CPG OPT MH OPL LPXY, LOHCYX HZZ OPL XPLIULLPHGUMY WUST KYULHGUVSYGYLLVYZHKY IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX ZSUMMYKYX OPT CPMO MOUM LAVMSY ZSUMMYKE COPWONHYL OUGX PG OUGX CPMO LYSZ-ULLAKUGWY UGX WHGLPLML PG U MUWPM ULLATIMPHGMOUM HGY'L WHTIUGPHG PL MOY HGSE TUG VYLPXYL HGYLYSZ WUIUVSY HZAGXYKLMUGXPGN MOY ZHSSE HZ MOY KYLM HZ TUGRPGX UGX MOY KYULHGUVSYGYLLUGX IKHZAGXPME HZ HGY'L HCG PXYUL.XAKPGN MOYPK SHGN WHGBYKLUMPHG HG CYXGYLXUE YBYGPGN, LIYKUGLRP THKY MOUGHGWY KYTUKRYX: "CY KYNUKX YBYKEMOPGN MOUM PL UVHBY MOY WHTTHG SYBYS HZKHHMYX WALMHT..." HK, CPMO U LTPSY: "VAM CY CUGM MOY CHSBYL MH VY ZYXUGX MOY LOYYI MH VY LUZY..." HK: "MOYE WUGGHM AGXYKLMUGX MOPL..." UGXUSS PG U CUE MOUM LYYTYX MH LUE: "CY, EHA UGX P, AGXYKLMUGX COUM MOYEUKY UGX COH CY UKY."MOPL ZPKLM SHGN WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO LIYKUGLRP HGSE LMKYGNMOYGYX PG IKPGWYUGXKYC MOY ZYYSPGN OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX MHCUKX OPT UM MOYPK ZPKLM TYYMPGN.OY LUC PG OPT U KYTUKRUVSY, WSYUK-MOPGRPGN TUG HZ BULM PGMYSSYWM COH VEOPL YGYKNE UGX IYKLPLMYGWY OUX UMMUPGYX IHCYK, COPWO OY CUL ALPGN LHSYSEZHK MOY CYSZUKY HZ KALLPU. PG IKPGWY UGXKYC'L YEYL LIYKUGLRP CUL MOY TUGOY CHASX OPTLYSZ OUBY CPLOYX MH VY--HGY COH YDISUPGYX USS MOY ZUWML HZSPZY KYULHGUVSE, WHGLPXYKYX PTIHKMUGM HGSE COUM CUL KUMPHGUS, UGX CULWUIUVSY HZ UIISEPGN MOY LMUGXUKX HZ KYULHG MH YBYKEMOPGN. YBYKEMOPGNLYYTYX LH LPTISY UGX WSYUK PG LIYKUGLRP'L YDIHLPMPHG MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYCPGBHSAGMUKPSE UNKYYX CPMO OPT UVHAM YBYKEMOPGN. PZ OY KYISPYX UGXUKNAYX, PM CUL HGSE VYWUALY OY CPLOYX MH TUPGMUPG OPL PGXYIYGXYGWY UGXGHM LAVTPM MH LIYKUGLRP'L HIPGPHGL YGMPKYSE. YBYKEMOPGN CUL KPNOM UGXYBYKEMOPGN CUL UL PM LOHASX VY: HGSE HGY MOPGN XPLWHGWYKMYX IKPGWYUGXKYC. MOPL CUL LIYKUGLRP'L WHSX, TPKKHKSPRY SHHR, COPWO XPX GHM USSHCHGY MH IYGYMKUMY MH OPL LHAS, UGX OPL XYSPWUMY COPMY OUGXL, COPWO IKPGWYUGXKYC PGBHSAGMUKPSE CUMWOYX UL HGY XHYL CUMWO MOY OUGXL HZ MOHLY COHIHLLYLL IHCYK. MOPL TPKKHKSPRY NUFY UGX MOHLY XYSPWUMY OUGXL PKKPMUMYXIKPGWY UGXKYC, OY RGYC GHM COE. OY CUL AGISYULUGMSE LMKAWR, MHH, VE MOYYDWYLLPBY WHGMYTIM ZHK HMOYKL MOUM OY HVLYKBYX PG LIYKUGLRP, UGX VE MOYXPBYKLPME HZ SPGYL HZ UKNATYGM OY ALYX MH LAIIHKM OPL HIPGPHGL. OYTUXY ALY HZ YBYKE RPGX HZ TYGMUS XYBPWY, YDWYIM UGUSHNE, UGX IULLYX MHHVHSXSE, PM LYYTYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC, ZKHT HGY MH UGHMOYK. GHC OY CHASXMURY AI MOY IHLPMPHG HZ U IKUWMPWUS TUG UGX WHGXYTG XKYUTYKL; GHC MOUMHZ U LUMPKPLM, UGX SUANO PKHGPWUSSE UM OPL HIIHGYGML; GHC NKHC LYBYKYSESHNPWUS, HK LAXXYGSE KPLY MH MOY KYUST HZ TYMUIOELPWL. (MOPL SULMKYLHAKWY CUL HGY OY BYKE ZKYJAYGMSE YTISHEYX.) OY CHASX MKUGLZYK UJAYLMPHG MH TYMUIOELPWUS OYPNOML, IULL HG MH XYZPGPMPHGL HZ LIUWY, MPTY,UGX MOHANOM, UGX, OUBPGN XYXAWYX MOY KYZAMUMPHG OY GYYXYX, CHASX UNUPGXYLWYGX MH MOY SYBYS HZ MOY HKPNPGUS XPLWALLPHG.PG NYGYKUS MOY MKUPM HZ LIYKUGLRP'L TYGMUSPME COPWO LMKAWR IKPGWY UGXKYCTHLM CUL OPL UVLHSAMY UGX AGLOURUVSY VYSPYZ PG MOY IHCYK UGX UAMOHKPMEHZ KYULHG. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM MOY MOHANOM WHASX GYBYK HWWAK MH OPTCOPWO MH IKPGWY UGXKYC LYYTYX LH GUMAKUS, GUTYSE, MOUM PM PL UZMYK USSPTIHLLPVSY MH YDIKYLL USS HGY MOPGRL; UGX MOUM OY OUX GYBYK ZYSM MOYXHAVM, "PL GHM USS P MOPGR UGX VYSPYBY GHGLYGLY?" UGX PM CUL QALM MOPLIYWASPUKPME HZ LIYKUGLRP'L TPGX MOUM IUKMPWASUKSE UMMKUWMYX IKPGWYUGXKYC.XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM IYKPHX HZ MOYPK UWJAUPGMUGWY VHSRHGLRP ZYSM UIULLPHGUMY UXTPKUMPHG ZHK OPT LPTPSUK MH MOUM COPWO OY OUX HGWY ZYSM ZHKVHGUIUKMY. MOY ZUWM MOUM LIYKUGLRP CUL MOY LHG HZ U BPSSUNY IKPYLM, UGXMOUM LMAIPX IYHISY TPNOM TYUGSE XYLIPLY OPT HG UWWHAGM HZ OPL OATVSYHKPNPG (UL PG ZUWM TUGE XPX), WUALYX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH WOYKPLO OPLLYGMPTYGM ZHK OPT MOY THKY, UGX AGWHGLWPHALSE MH LMKYGNMOYG PM.HG MOUM ZPKLM YBYGPGN VHSRHGLRP LIYGM CPMO OPT, OUBPGN TYGMPHGYX MOYWHTTPLLPHG ZHK MOY KYBPLPHG HZ MOY WHXY HZ SUCL, LIYKUGLRP MHSX OPTLUKWULMPWUSSE MOUM MOY WHTTPLLPHG OUX YDPLMYX ZHK U OAGXKYX UGX ZPZMEEYUKL, OUX WHLM TPSSPHGL, UGX OUX XHGY GHMOPGN YDWYIM MOUM KHLYGRUTIZOUX LMAWR SUVYSL HG MOY WHKKYLIHGXPGN IUKUNKUIOL HZ MOY XPZZYKYGM WHXYL."UGX MOUM PL USS MOY LMUMY OUL ZHK MOY TPSSPHGL PM OUL LIYGM," LUPX OY."CY CUGM MH NPBY MOY LYGUMY GYC QAKPXPWUS IHCYKL, VAM CY OUBY GH SUCL.MOUM PL COE PM PL U LPG ZHK TYG SPRY EHA, IKPGWY, GHM MH LYKBY PG MOYLYMPTYL!"IKPGWY UGXKYC LUPX MOUM ZHK MOUM CHKR UG YXAWUMPHG PG QAKPLIKAXYGWY CULGYYXYX COPWO OY XPX GHM IHLLYLL."VAM GHVHXE IHLLYLLYL PM, LH COUM CHASX EHA OUBY? PM PL U BPWPHAL WPKWSYZKHT COPWO CY TALM VKYUR U CUE HAM."U CYYR SUMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL U TYTVYK HZ MOY WHTTPMMYY HG UKTEKYNASUMPHGL UGX--COUM OY OUX GHM UM USS YDIYWMYX--CUL WOUPKTUG HZ ULYWMPHG HZ MOY WHTTPMMYY ZHK MOY KYBPLPHG HZ MOY SUCL. UM LIYKUGLRP'LKYJAYLM OY MHHR MOY ZPKLM IUKM HZ MOY WPBPS WHXY MOUM CUL VYPGN XKUCG AIUGX, CPMO MOY UPX HZ MOY WHXY GUIHSYHG UGX MOY PGLMPMAMYL HZ QALMPGPUG,OY CHKRYX UM ZHKTASUMPGN MOY LYWMPHG HG IYKLHGUS KPNOML.WOUIMYK BPPGYUKSE MCH EYUKL VYZHKY MOPL, PG 1808, IPYKKY HG KYMAKGPGN MH IYMYKLVAKNUZMYK BPLPMPGN OPL YLMUMYL OUX PGBHSAGMUKPSE ZHAGX OPTLYSZ PG U SYUXPGNIHLPMPHG UTHGN MOY IYMYKLVAKN ZKYYTULHGL. OY UKKUGNYX XPGPGN UGX ZAGYKUSSHXNY TYYMPGNL, YGKHSSYX GYC TYTVYKL, UGX VALPYX OPTLYSZ AGPMPGN BUKPHALSHXNYL UGX UWJAPKPGN UAMOYGMPW WOUKMYKL. OYUXBPLYX TY GHM MH UBHPX PGMYKWHAKLY CPMO MOY IYMYKLVAKN VKHMOYKL, VAMMH MURY AI HGSE LYWHGX-NKUXY IHLML PG MOY SHXNY, MH MKE, COPSYXPBYKMPGN MOY VKHMOYKL ZKHT IKPXY, MH MAKG MOYT MHCUKX MOY MKAY IUMOLYSZ-RGHCSYXNY UGX LYSZ-IYKZYWMPGN. VYLPXYL MOPL OY UXBPLYX TY ZHKTELYSZ IYKLHGUSSE UVHBY USS MH RYYI U CUMWO HBYK TELYSZ, UGX MH MOUM YGXOY NUBY TY U GHMYVHHR, MOY HGY P UT GHC CKPMPGN PG UGX PG COPWO P CPSSPG ZAMAKY GHMY XHCG USS TE UWMPHGL.IYMYKLVAKN, 23KX GHBYTVYKP UT UNUPG SPBPGN CPMO TE CPZY. TE THMOYK-PG-SUC WUTY MH TY PG MYUKL UGXLUPX MOUM OYSYGY CUL OYKY UGX MOUM LOY PTISHKYX TY MH OYUK OYK; MOUM LOYCUL PGGHWYGM UGX AGOUIIE UM TE XYLYKMPHG, UGX TAWO THKY. P RGYC MOUM PZP HGWY SYM TELYSZ LYY OYK P LOHASX GHM OUBY LMKYGNMO MH NH HG KYZALPGNCOUM LOY CUGMYX. PG TE IYKISYDPME P XPX GHM RGHC COHLY UPX UGX UXBPWYMH LYYR. OUX TE VYGYZUWMHK VYYG OYKY OY CHASX OUBY MHSX TY COUM MH XH.P CYGM MH TE KHHT UGX KYKYUX QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO'L SYMMYKL UGX KYWUSSYXTE WHGBYKLUMPHGL CPMO OPT, UGX XYXAWYX ZKHT PM USS MOUM P HANOM GHMMH KYZALY U LAIISPUGM, UGX HANOM MH KYUWO U OYSIPGN OUGX MHYBYKEHGY--YLIYWPUSSE MH HGY LH WSHLYSE VHAGX MH TY--UGX MOUM P TALM VYUKTE WKHLL. VAM PZ P ZHKNPBY OYK ZHK MOY LURY HZ XHPGN KPNOM, MOYG SYMAGPHG CPMO OYK OUBY HGSE U LIPKPMAUS UPT. MOUM PL COUM P XYWPXYX, UGXCOUM P CKHMY MH QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO. MOY SUKNYLM HZ MOYLY CUL MOY ZKYGWO WPKWSY HZ MOYGUIHSYHGPW USSPUGWY, MOY WPKWSY HZ WHAGM KATEUGMLYB UGX WUASUPGWHAKM.PG MOPL NKHAI OYSYGY, UL LHHG UL LOY OUX LYMMSYX PG IYMYKLVAKN CPMO OYKOALVUGX, MHHR U BYKE IKHTPGYGM ISUWY. LOY CUL BPLPMYX VE MOY TYTVYKL HZMOY ZKYGWO YTVULLE UGX VE TUGE VYSHGNPGN MH MOUM WPKWSY UGX GHMYX ZHKMOYPK PGMYSSYWM UGX IHSPLOYX TUGGYKL.OYSYGY OUX VYYG UM YKZAKM XAKPGN MOY ZUTHAL TYYMPGN HZ MOY YTIYKHKLUGX OUX VKHANOM ZKHT MOYKY MOYLY WHGGYWMPHGL CPMO MOY GUIHSYHGPWGHMUVPSPMPYL. GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZOUX GHMPWYX OYK PG MOY MOYUMYK UGX LUPX HZ OYK: "W'YLM AG LAIYKVYUGPTUS." * OYK LAWWYLL UL U VYUAMPZAS UGX YSYNUGM CHTUG XPX GHM LAKIKPLYIPYKKY, ZHK LOY OUX VYWHTY YBYG OUGXLHTYK MOUG VYZHKY. COUM XPX LAKIKPLYOPT CUL MOUM XAKPGN MOYLY SULM MCH EYUKL OPL CPZY OUX LAWWYYXYX PGNUPGPGN MOY KYIAMUMPHG "X' AGY ZYTTY WOUKTUGMY, UALLP LIPKPMAYSSY JAYVYSSY." *(2) MOY XPLMPGNAPLOYX IKPGWY XY SPNGY CKHMY OYK YPNOM-IUNYSYMMYKL. VPSPVPG LUBYX AI OPL YIPNKUTL MH IKHXAWY MOYT PG WHAGMYLLVYFAROHBU'L IKYLYGWY. MH VY KYWYPBYX PG MOY WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU'L LUSHGCUL KYNUKXYX UL U XPISHTU HZ PGMYSSYWM. VAM COYMOYK VYWUALY LMAIPXPME CUL QALM COUM CULGYYXYX MH KAG LAWO U LUSHG, HK VYWUALY MOHLY COH CYKY XYWYPBYX ZHAGXISYULAKY PG MOY XYWYIMPHG, UM UGE KUMY PM KYTUPGYX AGYDIHLYX UGX OYSYGYVYFAROHBU'L KYIAMUMPHG UL U SHBYSE UGX WSYBYK CHTUG VYWUTY LH ZPKTSEYLMUVSPLOYX MOUM LOY WHASX LUE MOY YTIMPYLM UGX LMAIPXYLM MOPGNL UGXYBYKEVHXE CHASX NH PGMH KUIMAKYL HBYK YBYKE CHKX HZ OYKL UGX SHHR ZHK UIKHZHAGX TYUGPGN PG PM HZ COPWO LOY OYKLYSZ OUX GH WHGWYIMPHG.     * "MOUM'L U LAIYKV UGPTUS."     * (2) "HZ U WOUKTPGN CHTUG, UL CPMME UL LOY PL SHBYSE."IPYKKY CUL QALM MOY OALVUGX GYYXYX ZHK U VKPSSPUGM LHWPYME CHTUG.
