UZMYK TAWO YZZHKM PXKUNNYX TELYSZ AI, LH MOUM TE SYN OAGN XHCG HG HGY LPXY UGX TE VHXE HGMOY HMOYK. P SHHRYX KHAGX UGX LUC VKHMOYK U. LMUGXPGN HG MOY ZYGWY UGXIHPGMPGN TY MH U VKHUX UBYGAY UGX NUKXYG, UGX PG MOY NUKXYG CUL U SUKNYUGX VYUAMPZAS VAPSXPGN. P CHRY AI. H SHKX, NKYUM UKWOPMYWM HZ GUMAKY,OYSI TY MH MYUK ZKHT TELYSZ MOYLY XHNL--TE IULLPHGL YLIYWPUSSE MOY SULM,COPWO AGPMYL PG PMLYSZ MOY LMKYGNMO HZ USS MOY ZHKTYK HGYL, UGX UPX TYMH YGMYK MOUM MYTISY HZ BPKMAY MH U BPLPHG HZ COPWO P UMMUPGYX PG TEXKYUT.7MO XYWYTVYKP XKYUTYX MOUM QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO CUL LPMMPGN PG TE OHALY, UGX MOUM PCUL BYKE NSUX UGX CPLOYX MH YGMYKMUPG OPT. PM LYYTYX UL PZ P WOUMMYKYXPGWYLLUGMSE CPMO HMOYK IYHISY UGX LAXXYGSE KYTYTVYKYX MOUM MOPL WHASXGHM ISYULY OPT, UGX P CPLOYX MH WHTY WSHLY MH OPT UGX YTVKUWY OPT. VAMUL LHHG UL P XKYC GYUK P LUC MOUM OPL ZUWY OUX WOUGNYX UGX NKHCG EHAGN,UGX OY CUL JAPYMSE MYSSPGN TY LHTYMOPGN UVHAM MOY MYUWOPGN HZ HAK HKXYK,VAM LH LHZMSE MOUM P WHASX GHM OYUK PM. MOYG PM LYYTYX MOUM CY USS SYZMMOY KHHT UGX LHTYMOPGN LMKUGNY OUIIYGYX. CY CYKY LPMMPGN HK SEPGN HGMOY ZSHHK. OY CUL MYSSPGN TY LHTYMOPGN, UGX P CPLOYX MH LOHC OPT TELYGLPVPSPME, UGX GHM SPLMYGPGN MH COUM OY CUL LUEPGN P VYNUG IPWMAKPGNMH TELYSZ MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ TE PGGYK TUG UGX MOY NKUWY HZ NHX LUGWMPZEPGNTY. UGX MYUKL WUTY PGMH TE YEYL, UGX P CUL NSUX OY GHMPWYX MOPL. VAM OYSHHRYX UM TY CPMO BYDUMPHG UGX QATIYX AI, VKYURPGN HZZ OPL KYTUKRL. PZYSM UVULOYX UGX ULRYX COYMOYK COUM OY OUX VYYG LUEPGN XPX GHM WHGWYKGTY; VAM OY XPX GHM KYISE, NUBY TY U RPGX SHHR, UGX MOYG CY LAXXYGSEZHAGX HAKLYSBYL PG TE VYXKHHT COYKY MOYKY PL U XHAVSY VYX. OY SUE XHCGHG MOY YXNY HZ PM UGX P VAKGYX CPMO SHGNPGN MH WUKYLL OPT UGX SPY XHCGMHH. UGX OY LUPX, "MYSS TY ZKUGRSE COUM PL EHAK WOPYZ MYTIMUMPHG? XHEHA RGHC PM? P MOPGR EHA RGHC PM USKYUXE." UVULOYX VE MOPL JAYLMPHG,P KYISPYX MOUM LSHMO CUL TE WOPYZ MYTIMUMPHG. OY LOHHR OPL OYUXPGWKYXASHALSE; UGX YBYG THKY UVULOYX, P LUPX MOUM MOHANO P CUL SPBPGNCPMO TE CPZY UL OY UXBPLYX, P CUL GHM SPBPGN CPMO OYK UL OYK OALVUGX. MHMOPL OY KYISPYX MOUM HGY LOHASX GHM XYIKPBY U CPZY HZ HGY'L YTVKUWYL UGXNUBY TY MH AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOUM CUL TE XAME. VAM P KYISPYX MOUM P LOHASXVY ULOUTYX MH XH PM, UGX LAXXYGSE YBYKEMOPGN BUGPLOYX. UGX P UCHRY UGXZHAGX PG TE TPGX MOY MYDM ZKHT MOY NHLIYS: "MOY SPZY CUL MOY SPNOM HZTYG. UGX MOY SPNOM LOPGYMO PG XUKRGYLL; UGX MOY XUKRGYLL WHTIKYOYGXYX PMGHM." QHLYIO USYDYYBPWO'L ZUWY OUX SHHRYX EHAGN UGX VKPNOM. MOUM XUE PKYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHT TE VYGYZUWMHK PG COPWO OY CKHMY UVHAM "WHGQANUSXAMPYL."9MO XYWYTVYKP OUX U XKYUT ZKHT COPWO P UCHRY CPMO U MOKHVVPGN OYUKM. P LUC MOUMP CUL PG THLWHC PG TE OHALY, PG MOY VPN LPMMPGN KHHT, UGX QHLYIOUSYDYYBPWO WUTY PG ZKHT MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. P LYYTYX MH RGHC UM HGWY MOUMMOY IKHWYLL HZ KYNYGYKUMPHG OUX USKYUXE MURYG ISUWY PG OPT, UGX P KALOYXMH TYYM OPT. P YTVKUWYX OPT UGX RPLLYX OPL OUGXL, UGX OY LUPX, "OULMMOHA GHMPWYX MOUM TE ZUWY PL XPZZYKYGM?" P SHHRYX UM OPT, LMPSS OHSXPGNOPT PG TE UKTL, UGX LUC MOUM OPL ZUWY CUL EHAGN, VAM MOUM OY OUX GH OUPKHG OPL OYUX UGX OPL ZYUMAKYL CYKY JAPMY WOUGNYX. UGX P LUPX, "P LOHASXOUBY RGHCG EHA OUX P TYM EHA VE WOUGWY," UGX P MOHANOM MH TELYSZ, "UT PMYSSPGN MOY MKAMO?" UGX LAXXYGSE P LUC OPT SEPGN SPRY U XYUX VHXE; MOYGOY NKUXAUSSE KYWHBYKYX UGX CYGM CPMO TY PGMH TE LMAXE WUKKEPGN U SUKNYVHHR HZ LOYYML HZ XKUCPGN IUIYK; P LUPX, "P XKYC MOUM," UGX OY UGLCYKYXVE VHCPGN OPL OYUX. P HIYGYX MOY VHHR, UGX HG USS MOY IUNYL MOYKYCYKY YDWYSSYGM XKUCPGNL. UGX PG TE XKYUT P RGYC MOUM MOYLY XKUCPGNLKYIKYLYGMYX MOY SHBY UXBYGMAKYL HZ MOY LHAS CPMO PML VYSHBYX. UGX HGPML IUNYL P LUC U VYUAMPZAS KYIKYLYGMUMPHG HZ U TUPXYG PG MKUGLIUKYGMNUKTYGML UGX CPMO U MKUGLIUKYGM VHXE, ZSEPGN AI MH MOY WSHAXL. UGX PLYYTYX MH RGHC MOUM MOPL TUPXYG CUL GHMOPGN YSLY MOUG U KYIKYLYGMUMPHGHZ MOY LHGN HZ LHGNL. UGX SHHRPGN UM MOHLY XKUCPGNL P XKYUTYX P ZYSMMOUM P CUL XHPGN CKHGN, VAM WHASX GHM MYUK TELYSZ UCUE ZKHT MOYT. SHKX,OYSI TY! TE NHX, PZ MOE ZHKLURPGN TY PL MOE XHPGN, MOE CPSS VY XHGY; VAMPZ P UT TELYSZ MOY WUALY, MYUWO TY COUM P LOHASX XH! P LOUSS IYKPLO HZTE XYVUAWOYKE PZ MOHA AMMYKSE XYLYKMYLM TY!WOUIMYK DPMOY KHLMHBL' THGYMUKE UZZUPKL OUX GHM PTIKHBYX XAKPGN MOY MCH EYUKL MOYEOUX LIYGM PG MOY WHAGMKE.MOHANO GPWOHSUL KHLMHB OUX RYIM ZPKTSE MH OPL KYLHSAMPHG UGX CUL LMPSSLYKBPGN THXYLMSE PG UG HVLWAKY KYNPTYGM, LIYGXPGN WHTIUKUMPBYSE SPMMSY,MOY CUE HZ SPZY UM HMKUXGHY--TPMYGRU'L TUGUNYTYGM HZ UZZUPKL, PGIUKMPWASUK--CUL LAWO MOUM MOY XYVML PGYBPMUVSE PGWKYULYX YBYKE EYUK. MOYHGSE KYLHAKWY HVBPHALSE IKYLYGMPGN PMLYSZ MH MOY HSX WHAGM CUL MH UIISEZHK UG HZZPWPUS IHLM, LH OY OUX WHTY MH IYMYKLVAKN MH SHHR ZHK HGY UGXUSLH, UL OY LUPX, MH SYM MOY SULLPYL YGQHE MOYTLYSBYL ZHK MOY SULM MPTY.LHHG UZMYK MOYPK UKKPBUS PG IYMYKLVAKN VYKN IKHIHLYX MH BYKU UGX CULUWWYIMYX.MOHANO PG THLWHC MOY KHLMHBL VYSHGNYX MH MOY VYLM LHWPYME CPMOHAMMOYTLYSBYL NPBPGN PM U MOHANOM, EYM PG IYMYKLVAKN MOYPK WPKWSY HZUWJAUPGMUGWYL CUL U TPDYX UGX PGXYZPGPMY HGY. PG IYMYKLVAKN MOYE CYKYIKHBPGWPUSL, UGX MOY BYKE IYHISY MOYE OUX YGMYKMUPGYX PG THLWHC CPMOHAMPGJAPKPGN MH COUM LYM MOYE VYSHGNYX, OYKY SHHRYX XHCG HG MOYT.MOY KHLMHBL SPBYX PG MOY LUTY OHLIPMUVSY CUE PG IYMYKLVAKN UL PG THLWHC,UGX MOY THLM XPBYKLY IYHISY TYM UM MOYPK LAIIYKL. WHAGMKE GYPNOVHKL ZKHTHMKUXGHY, PTIHBYKPLOYX HSX LJAPKYL UGX MOYPK XUANOMYKL, IYKHGLRUEU UTUPX HZ OHGHK, IPYKKY VYFAROHB, UGX MOY LHG HZ MOYPK XPLMKPWM IHLMTULMYKCOH OUX HVMUPGYX U IHLM PG IYMYKLVAKN. UTHGN MOY TYG COH BYKE LHHGVYWUTY ZKYJAYGM BPLPMHKL UM MOY KHLMHBL' OHALY PG IYMYKLVAKN CYKY VHKPL,IPYKKY COHT MOY WHAGM OUX TYM PG MOY LMKYYM UGX XKUNNYX OHTY CPMOOPT, UGX VYKN COH LIYGM COHSY XUEL UM MOY KHLMHBL' UGX IUPX MOY YSXYLMXUANOMYK, WHAGMYLL BYKU, MOY UMMYGMPHGL U EHAGN TUG IUEL COYG OY PGMYGXLMH IKHIHLY.GHM PG BUPG OUX VYKN LOHCG YBYKEVHXE OPL KPNOM OUGX CHAGXYX UMUALMYKSPMF UGX OYSX U IYKZYWMSE AGGYWYLLUKE LCHKX PG OPL SYZM. OYGUKKUMYX MOUM YIPLHXY LH IYKLPLMYGMSE UGX CPMO LH PTIHKMUGM UG UPK MOUMYBYKEHGY VYSPYBYX PG MOY TYKPM UGX ALYZASGYLL HZ OPL XYYX, UGX OY OUXHVMUPGYX MCH XYWHKUMPHGL ZHK UALMYKSPMF.PG MOY ZPGGPLO CUK OY USLH TUGUNYX MH XPLMPGNAPLO OPTLYSZ. OY OUX IPWRYXAI MOY LWKUI HZ U NKYGUXY MOUM OUX RPSSYX UG UPXY-XY-WUTI LMUGXPGN GYUKMOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ UGX OUX MURYG PM MH OPL WHTTUGXYK. QALM UL OY OUXXHGY UZMYK UALMYKSPMF, OY KYSUMYX MOPL HWWAKKYGWY UM LAWO SYGNMO UGXLH PGLPLMYGMSE MOUM YBYKEHGY UNUPG VYSPYBYX PM OUX VYYG GYWYLLUKE MH XHMOPL, UGX OY KYWYPBYX MCH XYWHKUMPHGL ZHK MOY ZPGGPLO CUK USLH. PG1809 OY CUL U WUIMUPG PG MOY NAUKXL, CHKY TYXUSL, UGX OYSX LHTY LIYWPUSSAWKUMPBY IHLML PG IYMYKLVAKN.MOHANO LHTY LRYIMPWL LTPSYX COYG MHSX HZ VYKN'L TYKPML, PM WHASX GHM VYXYGPYX MOUM OY CUL U IUPGLMURPGN UGX VKUBY HZZPWYK, HG YDWYSSYGM MYKTLCPMO OPL LAIYKPHKL, UGX U THKUS EHAGN TUG CPMO U VKPSSPUGM WUKYYK VYZHKYOPT UGX UG ULLAKYX IHLPMPHG PG LHWPYME.ZHAK EYUKL VYZHKY, TYYMPGN U NYKTUG WHTKUXY PG MOY LMUSSL HZ U THLWHCMOYUMYK, VYKN OUX IHPGMYX HAM BYKU KHLMHBU MH OPT UGX OUX LUPX PGNYKTUG, "XUL LHSS TYPG CYPV CYKXYG," * UGX ZKHT MOUM THTYGM OUX TUXY AIOPL TPGX MH TUKKE OYK. GHC PG IYMYKLVAKN, OUBPGN WHGLPXYKYX MOY KHLMHBL'IHLPMPHG UGX OPL HCG, OY XYWPXYX MOUM MOY MPTY OUX WHTY MH IKHIHLY.    * "MOUM NPKS LOUSS VY TE CPZY."VYKN'L IKHIHLUS CUL UM ZPKLM KYWYPBYX CPMO U IYKISYDPME MOUM CUL GHMZSUMMYKPGN MH OPT. UM ZPKLM PM LYYTYX LMKUGNY MOUM MOY LHG HZ UG HVLWAKYSPBHGPUG NYGMSYTUG LOHASX IKHIHLY TUKKPUNY MH U WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU; VAMVYKN'L WOPYZ WOUKUWMYKPLMPW CUL LAWO U GUPBY UGX NHHX GUMAKYX YNHMPLTMOUM MOY KHLMHBL PGBHSAGMUKPSE WUTY MH MOPGR PM CHASX VY U NHHX MOPGN,LPGWY OY OPTLYSZ CUL LH ZPKTSE WHGBPGWYX MOUM PM CUL NHHX, PGXYYXYDWYSSYGM. THKYHBYK, MOY KHLMHBL' UZZUPKL CYKY LYKPHALSE YTVUKKULLYX, ULMOY LAPMHK WHASX GHM VAM RGHC; UGX UVHBY USS, BYKU CUL MCYGME-ZHAK, OUXVYYG MURYG HAM YBYKECOYKY, UGX MOHANO LOY CUL WYKMUPGSE NHHX-SHHRPGNUGX LYGLPVSY, GH HGY AI MH GHC OUX IKHIHLYX MH OYK. LH MOYE NUBY MOYPKWHGLYGM."EHA LYY," LUPX VYKN MH OPL WHTKUXY, COHT OY WUSSYX "ZKPYGX" HGSEVYWUALY OY RGYC MOUM YBYKEHGY OUL ZKPYGXL, "EHA LYY, P OUBY WHGLPXYKYXPM USS, UGX LOHASX GHM TUKKE PZ P OUX GHM MOHANOM PM USS HAM HK PZ PMCYKY PG UGE CUE AGLAPMUVSY. VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE, TE IUIU UGX TUTTUUKY GHC IKHBPXYX ZHK--P OUBY UKKUGNYX MOUM KYGM ZHK MOYT PG MOY VUSMPWIKHBPGWYL--UGX P WUG SPBY PG IYMYKLVAKN HG TE IUE, UGX CPMO OYK ZHKMAGYUGX TE NHHX TUGUNYTYGM CY WUG NYM USHGN GPWYSE. CYSS, EHACPSS VY WHTPGN," OY CUL NHPGN MH LUE, "MH XPGY," VAM WOUGNYX OPL TPGXUGX LUPX "MH MURY MYU CPMO AL," UGX JAPWRSE XHAVSPGN AI OPL MHGNAY OYVSYC U LTUSS KHAGX KPGN HZ MHVUWWH LTHRY, IYKZYWMSE YTVHXEPGN OPL XKYUTHZ OUIIPGYLL.UZMYK MOY ZPKLM ZYYSPGN HZ IYKISYDPME UKHALYX PG MOY IUKYGML VE VYKN'LIKHIHLUS, MOY OHSPXUE MHGY HZ QHEHALGYLL ALAUS UM LAWO MPTYL MHHRIHLLYLLPHG HZ MOY ZUTPSE, VAM MOY KYQHPWPGN CUL YDMYKGUS UGX PGLPGWYKY.PG MOY ZUTPSE'L ZYYSPGN MHCUKX MOPL CYXXPGN U WYKMUPG UCRCUKXGYLL UGXWHGLMKUPGM CUL YBPXYGM, UL PZ MOYE CYKY ULOUTYX HZ GHM OUBPGN SHBYX BYKULAZZPWPYGMSE UGX HZ VYPGN LH KYUXE MH NYM OYK HZZ MOYPK OUGXL. MOY HSXWHAGM ZYSM MOPL THLM. OY CHASX IKHVUVSE OUBY VYYG AGUVSY MH LMUMYMOY WUALY HZ OPL YTVUKKULLTYGM, VAM PM KYLASMYX ZKHT MOY LMUMY HZ OPLUZZUPKL. COYG OPL XUANOMYKL CYKY VHKGOY OUX ULLPNGYX MH YUWO HZ MOYT, ZHK OYK XHCKE, UG YLMUMY CPMO MOKYYOAGXKYX LYKZL; VAM HGY HZ MOYLY YLMUMYL OUX USKYUXE VYYG LHSX, UGX MOYHMOYK CUL THKMNUNYX UGX MOY PGMYKYLM LH TAWO PG UKKYUKL MOUM PM CHASXOUBY MH VY LHSX, LH MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH NPBY PM MH BYKU. GHK OUXOY UGE THGYE.VYKN OUX USKYUXE VYYG YGNUNYX U THGMO, UGX HGSE U CYYR KYTUPGYX VYZHKYMOY CYXXPGN, VAM MOY WHAGM OUX GHM EYM XYWPXYX PG OPL HCG TPGX MOYJAYLMPHG HZ MOY XHCKE, GHK LIHRYG MH OPL CPZY UVHAM PM. UM HGY MPTY MOYWHAGM MOHANOM HZ NPBPGN OYK MOY KEUFUG YLMUMY HK HZ LYSSPGN U ZHKYLM, UMUGHMOYK MPTY HZ VHKKHCPGN THGYE HG U GHMY HZ OUGX. U ZYC XUEL VYZHKYMOY CYXXPGN VYKN YGMYKYX MOY WHAGM'L LMAXE YUKSE HGY THKGPGN UGX, CPMOU ISYULUGM LTPSY, KYLIYWMZASSE ULRYX OPL ZAMAKY ZUMOYK-PG-SUC MH SYM OPTRGHC COUM BYKU'L XHCKE CHASX VY. MOY WHAGM CUL LH XPLWHGWYKMYX VE MOPLSHGN-ZHKYLYYG PGJAPKE MOUM CPMOHAM WHGLPXYKUMPHG OY NUBY MOY ZPKLM KYISEMOUM WUTY PGMH OPL OYUX. "P SPRY EHAK VYPGN VALPGYLLSPRY UVHAM PM.... PSPRY PM. VAM VYKN, LTPSPGN ISYULUGMSE, YDISUPGYX MOUM PZ OY XPX GHMRGHC ZHK WYKMUPG OHC TAWO BYKU CHASX OUBY UGX XPX GHM KYWYPBY UM SYULMIUKM HZ MOY XHCKE PG UXBUGWY, OY CHASX OUBY MH VKYUR TUMMYKL HZZ."VYWUALY, WHGLPXYK, WHAGM--PZ P USSHCYX TELYSZ MH TUKKE GHC CPMOHAMOUBPGN XYZPGPMY TYUGL MH TUPGMUPG TE CPZY, P LOHASX VY UWMPGN VUXSE...."MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG YGXYX VE MOY WHAGM, COH CPLOYX MH VY NYGYKHAL UGX MHUBHPX ZAKMOYK PTIHKMAGPME, LUEPGN MOUM OY CHASX NPBY U GHMY HZ OUGXZHK YPNOME MOHALUGX KAVSYL. VYKN LTPSYX TYYRSE, RPLLYX MOY WHAGM HG MOYLOHASXYK, UGX LUPX MOUM OY CUL BYKE NKUMYZAS, VAM MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSYZHK OPT MH UKKUGNY OPL GYC SPZY CPMOHAM KYWYPBPGN MOPKME MOHALUGX PGKYUXE THGYE. "HK UM SYULM MCYGME MOHALUGX, WHAGM," OY UXXYX, "UGX MOYG UGHMY HZ OUGX ZHK HGSE LPDME MOHALUGX.""EYL, EYL, USS KPNOM!" LUPX MOY WHAGM OAKKPYXSE. "HGSE YDWALY TY, TEXYUK ZYSSHC, P'SS NPBY EHA MCYGME MOHALUGX UGX U GHMY HZ OUGX ZHK YPNOMEMOHALUGX UL CYSS. EYL, EYL! RPLL TY."WOUIMYK DPPGUMULOU CUL LPDMYYG UGX PM CUL MOY EYUK 1809, MOY BYKE EYUK MH COPWO LOYOUX WHAGMYX HG OYK ZPGNYKL CPMO VHKPL UZMYK MOYE OUX RPLLYX ZHAK EYUKLUNH. LPGWY MOYG LOY OUX GHM LYYG OPT. VYZHKY LHGEU UGX OYK THMOYK, PZVHKPL OUIIYGYX MH VY TYGMPHGYX, LOY LIHRY JAPMY ZKYYSE HZ MOUMYIPLHXY UL HZ LHTY WOPSXPLO, SHGN-ZHKNHMMYG TUMMYK MOUM CUL GHM CHKMOTYGMPHGPGN. VAM PG MOY LYWKYM XYIMOL HZ OYK LHAS MOY JAYLMPHG COYMOYKOYK YGNUNYTYGM MH VHKPL CUL U QYLM HK UG PTIHKMUGM, VPGXPGN IKHTPLYMHKTYGMYX OYK.LPGWY VHKPL SYZM THLWHC PG 1805 MH QHPG MOY UKTE OY OUX GHM LYYG MOYKHLMHBL. OY OUX VYYG PG THLWHC LYBYKUS MPTYL, UGX OUX IULLYX GYUKHMKUXGHY, VAM OUX GYBYK VYYG MH LYY MOYT.LHTYMPTYL PM HWWAKKYX MH GUMULOU MOUM OY XPX GHM CPLO MH LYY OYK, UGXMOPL WHGQYWMAKY CUL WHGZPKTYX VE MOY LUX MHGY PG COPWO OYK YSXYKL LIHRYHZ OPT."GHCUXUEL HSX ZKPYGXL UKY GHM KYTYTVYKYX," MOY WHAGMYLL CHASX LUE COYGVHKPL CUL TYGMPHGYX.UGGU TPROUESHBGU USLH OUX HZ SUMY BPLPMYX MOYT SYLL ZKYJAYGMSE, LYYTYXMH OHSX OYKLYSZ CPMO IUKMPWASUK XPNGPME, UGX USCUEL LIHRY KUIMAKHALSEUGX NKUMYZASSE HZ MOY TYKPML HZ OYK LHG UGX MOY VKPSSPUGM WUKYYK HGCOPWO OY OUX YGMYKYX. COYG MOY KHLMHBL WUTY MH IYMYKLVAKN VHKPL WUSSYXHG MOYT.OY XKHBY MH MOYPK OHALY PG LHTY UNPMUMPHG. MOY TYTHKE HZ GUMULOU CUL OPLTHLM IHYMPW KYWHSSYWMPHG. VAM OY CYGM CPMO MOY ZPKT PGMYGMPHG HZ SYMMPGNOYK UGX OYK IUKYGML ZYYS MOUM MOY WOPSXPLO KYSUMPHGL VYMCYYG OPTLYSZ UGXGUMULOU WHASX GHM VY VPGXPGN YPMOYK HG OYK HK HG OPT. OY OUX U VKPSSPUGMIHLPMPHG PG LHWPYME MOUGRL MH OPL PGMPTUWE CPMO WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU,U VKPSSPUGM IHLPMPHG PG MOY LYKBPWY MOUGRL MH MOY IUMKHGUNY HZ UGPTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY COHLY WHTISYMY WHGZPXYGWY OY YGQHEYX, UGX OY CULVYNPGGPGN MH TURY ISUGL ZHK TUKKEPGN HGY HZ MOY KPWOYLM OYPKYLLYL PGIYMYKLVAKN, ISUGL COPWO TPNOM BYKE YULPSE VY KYUSPFYX. COYG OY YGMYKYXMOY KHLMHBL' XKUCPGN KHHT GUMULOU CUL PG OYK HCG KHHT. COYG LOY OYUKXHZ OPL UKKPBUS LOY USTHLM KUG PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, ZSALOYX UGX VYUTPGNCPMO U THKY MOUG WHKXPUS LTPSY.VHKPL KYTYTVYKYX GUMULOU PG U LOHKM XKYLL, CPMO XUKR YEYL LOPGPGN ZKHTAGXYK OYK WAKSL UGX VHPLMYKHAL, WOPSXPLO SUANOMYK, UL OY OUX RGHCG OYKZHAK EYUKL VYZHKY; UGX LH OY CUL MURYG UVUWR COYG JAPMY U XPZZYKYGMGUMULOU YGMYKYX, UGX OPL ZUWY YDIKYLLYX KUIMAKHAL ULMHGPLOTYGM. MOPLYDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY ISYULYX GUMULOU."CYSS, XH EHA KYWHNGPFY EHAK SPMMSY TUXWUI ISUETUMY?" ULRYX MOYWHAGMYLL.VHKPL RPLLYX GUMULOU'L OUGX UGX LUPX MOUM OY CUL ULMHGPLOYX UM MOYWOUGNY PG OYK."OHC OUGXLHTY EHA OUBY NKHCG!""P LOHASX MOPGR LH!" KYISPYX GUMULOU'L SUANOPGN YEYL."UGX PL IUIU HSXYK?" LOY ULRYX.GUMULOU LUM XHCG UGX, CPMOHAM QHPGPGN PG VHKPL' WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO MOYWHAGMYLL, LPSYGMSE UGX TPGAMYSE LMAXPYX OYK WOPSXOHHX'L LAPMHK. OY ZYSMMOY CYPNOM HZ MOUM KYLHSAMY UGX UZZYWMPHGUMY LWKAMPGE UGX NSUGWYX UM OYKHWWULPHGUSSE.VHKPL' AGPZHKT, LIAKL, MPY, UGX MOY CUE OPL OUPK CUL VKALOYX CYKY USSWHTTY PS ZUAM UGX PG MOY SUMYLM ZULOPHG. MOPL GUMULOU GHMPWYX UM HGWY.OY LUM KUMOYK LPXYCUEL PG MOY UKTWOUPK GYDM MH MOY WHAGMYLL, UKKUGNPGNCPMO OPL KPNOM OUGX MOY WSYUGYLM HZ NSHBYL MOUM ZPMMYX OPL SYZM OUGXSPRY U LRPG, UGX OY LIHRY CPMO U IUKMPWASUKSE KYZPGYX WHTIKYLLPHG HZ OPLSPIL UVHAM MOY UTALYTYGML HZ MOY OPNOYLM IYMYKLVAKN LHWPYME, KYWUSSPGNCPMO TPSX PKHGE HSX MPTYL PG THLWHC UGX THLWHC UWJAUPGMUGWYL. PM CULGHM UWWPXYGMUSSE, GUMULOU ZYSM, MOUM OY USSAXYX, COYG LIYURPGN HZ MOYOPNOYLM UKPLMHWKUWE, MH UG UTVULLUXHK'L VUSS OY OUX UMMYGXYX, UGX MHPGBPMUMPHGL OY OUX KYWYPBYX ZKHT G.G. UGX L.L.USS MOPL MPTY GUMULOU LUM LPSYGM, NSUGWPGN AI UM OPT ZKHT AGXYK OYKVKHCL. MOPL NUFY XPLMAKVYX UGX WHGZALYX VHKPL THKY UGX THKY. OY SHHRYXKHAGX THKY ZKYJAYGMSE MHCUKX OYK, UGX VKHRY HZZ PG COUM OY CUL LUEPGN.OY XPX GHM LMUE THKY MOUG MYG TPGAMYL, MOYG KHLY UGX MHHR OPL SYUBY. MOYLUTY PGJAPLPMPBY, WOUSSYGNPGN, UGX KUMOYK THWRPGN YEYL LMPSS SHHRYX UMOPT. UZMYK OPL ZPKLM BPLPM VHKPL LUPX MH OPTLYSZ MOUM GUMULOU UMMKUWMYXOPT QALM UL TAWO UL YBYK, VAM MOUM OY TALM GHM EPYSX MH MOUM ZYYSPGN,VYWUALY MH TUKKE OYK, U NPKS USTHLM CPMOHAM ZHKMAGY, CHASX TYUG KAPG MHOPL WUKYYK, COPSY MH KYGYC MOYPK ZHKTYK KYSUMPHGL CPMOHAM PGMYGXPGN MHTUKKE OYK CHASX VY XPLOHGHKUVSY. VHKPL TUXY AI OPL TPGX MH UBHPX TYYMPGNGUMULOU, VAM XYLIPMY MOUM KYLHSAMPHG OY WUSSYX UNUPG U ZYC XUEL SUMYKUGX VYNUG WUSSPGN HZMYG UGX LIYGXPGN COHSY XUEL UM MOY KHLMHBL'. PMLYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY HANOM MH OUBY UG YDISUGUMPHG CPMO GUMULOU UGX MYSSOYK MOUM MOY HSX MPTYL TALM VY ZHKNHMMYG, MOUM PG LIPMY HZ YBYKEMOPGN...LOY WHASX GHM VY OPL CPZY, MOUM OY OUX GH TYUGL, UGX MOYE CHASX GYBYKSYM OYK TUKKE OPT. VAM OY ZUPSYX MH XH LH UGX ZYSM UCRCUKX UVHAMYGMYKPGN HG LAWO UG YDISUGUMPHG. ZKHT XUE MH XUE OY VYWUTY THKY UGX THKYYGMUGNSYX. PM LYYTYX MH OYK THMOYK UGX LHGEU MOUM GUMULOU CUL PG SHBYCPMO VHKPL UL HZ HSX. LOY LUGN OPT OPL ZUBHKPMY LHGNL, LOHCYX OPT OYKUSVAT, TURPGN OPT CKPMY PG PM, XPX GHM USSHC OPT MH USSAXY MH MOY IULM,SYMMPGN PM VY AGXYKLMHHX OHC XYSPNOMZAS CUL MOY IKYLYGM; UGX YBYKE XUEOY CYGM UCUE PG U ZHN, CPMOHAM OUBPGN LUPX COUM OY TYUGM MH, UGX GHMRGHCPGN COUM OY CUL XHPGN HK COE OY WUTY, HK OHC PM CHASX USS YGX. OYSYZM HZZ BPLPMPGN OYSYGY UGX KYWYPBYX KYIKHUWOZAS GHMYL ZKHT OYK YBYKEXUE, UGX EYM OY WHGMPGAYX MH LIYGX COHSY XUEL CPMO MOY KHLMHBL.WOUIMYK DPPPHGY GPNOM COYG MOY HSX WHAGMYLL, PG GPNOMWUI UGX XKYLLPGN QUWRYM,CPMOHAM OYK ZUSLY WAKSL, UGX CPMO OYK IHHK SPMMSY RGHV HZ OUPK LOHCPGNAGXYK OYK COPMY WHMMHG WUI, RGYSM LPNOPGN UGX NKHUGPGN HG U KAN UGXVHCPGN MH MOY NKHAGX PG IKUEYK, OYK XHHK WKYURYX UGX GUMULOU, USLH PGU XKYLLPGN QUWRYM CPMO LSPIIYKL HG OYK VUKY ZYYM UGX OYK OUPK PGWAKSIUIYKL, KUG PG. MOY WHAGMYLL--OYK IKUEYKZAS THHX XPLIYSSYX--SHHRYXKHAGX UGX ZKHCGYX. LOY CUL ZPGPLOPGN OYK SULM IKUEYK: "WUG PM VY MOUMMOPL WHAWO CPSS VY TE NKUBY?" GUMULOU, ZSALOYX UGX YUNYK, LYYPGNOYK THMOYK PG IKUEYK, LAXXYGSE WOYWRYX OYK KALO, OUSZ LUM XHCG, UGXAGWHGLWPHALSE IAM HAM OYK MHGNAY UL PZ WOPXPGN OYKLYSZ. LYYPGN MOUMOYK THMOYK CUL LMPSS IKUEPGN LOY KUG HG MPIMHY MH MOY VYX UGX, KUIPXSELSPIIPGN HGY SPMMSY ZHHM UNUPGLM MOY HMOYK, IALOYX HZZ OYK LSPIIYKL UGXQATIYX HGMH MOY VYX MOY WHAGMYLL OUX ZYUKYX TPNOM VYWHTY OYK NKUBY. MOPLWHAWO CUL OPNO, CPMO U ZYUMOYK VYX UGX ZPBY IPSSHCL YUWO LTUSSYK MOUGMOY HGY VYSHC. GUMULOU QATIYX HG PM, LUGR PGMH MOY ZYUMOYK VYX, KHSSYXHBYK MH MOY CUSS, UGX VYNUG LGANNSPGN AI MOY VYXWSHMOYL UL LOY LYMMSYXXHCG, KUPLPGN OYK RGYYL MH OYK WOPG, RPWRPGN HAM UGX SUANOPGN USTHLMPGUAXPVSE, GHC WHBYKPGN OYKLYSZ AI OYUX UGX USS, UGX GHC IYYIPGN UM OYKTHMOYK. MOY WHAGMYLL ZPGPLOYX OYK IKUEYKL UGX WUTY MH MOY VYX CPMO ULMYKG ZUWY, VAM LYYPGN, MOUM GUMULOU'L OYUX CUL WHBYKYX, LOY LTPSYX PGOYK RPGX, CYUR CUE."GHC MOYG, GHC MOYG!" LUPX LOY."TUTTU, WUG CY OUBY U MUSR? EYL?" LUPX GUMULOU. "GHC, QALM HGY HG EHAKMOKHUM UGX UGHMOYK... MOUM'SS XH!" UGX LYPFPGN OYK THMOYK KHAGX MOYGYWR, LOY RPLLYX OYK HG MOY MOKHUM. PG OYK VYOUBPHK MH OYK THMOYKGUMULOU LYYTYX KHANO, VAM LOY CUL LH LYGLPMPBY UGX MUWMZAS MOUM OHCYBYKLOY WSULIYX OYK THMOYK LOY USCUEL TUGUNYX MH XH PM CPMOHAM OAKMPGN OYKHK TURPGN OYK ZYYS AGWHTZHKMUVSY HK XPLISYULYX."CYSS, COUM PL PM MHGPNOM?" LUPX MOY THMOYK, OUBPGN UKKUGNYX OYK IPSSHCLUGX CUPMYX AGMPS GUMULOU, UZMYK MAKGPGN HBYK U WHAISY HZ MPTYL, OUXLYMMSYX XHCG VYLPXY OYK AGXYK MOY JAPSM, LIKYUX HAM OYK UKTL, UGXULLATYX U LYKPHAL YDIKYLLPHG.MOYLY BPLPML HZ GUMULOU'L UM GPNOM VYZHKY MOY WHAGM KYMAKGYX ZKHT OPLWSAV CYKY HGY HZ MOY NKYUMYLM ISYULAKYL HZ VHMO THMOYK, UGX XUANOMYK."COUM PL PM MHGPNOM?--VAM P OUBY MH MYSS EHA..."GUMULOU IAM OYK OUGX HG OYK THMOYK'L THAMO."UVHAM VHKPL... HGY WUG KYUSSE LUE PM'L U CHGXYKZAS BHPWY!"LOY OATTYX U LWKUI ZKHT OYK ZUBHKPMY HIYKU VE WOYKAVPGP, MOKYC OYKLYSZHG OYK VYX, SUANOYX UM MOY ISYULUGM MOHANOM MOUM LOY CHASX PTTYXPUMYSEZUSS ULSYYI, WUSSYX XAGEULOU MOY TUPX MH IAM HAM MOY WUGXSY, UGX VYZHKYXAGEULOU OUX SYZM MOY KHHT OUX USKYUXE IULLYX PGMH EYM UGHMOYK OUIIPYKCHKSX HZ XKYUTL, COYKY YBYKEMOPGN CUL UL SPNOM UGX VYUAMPZAS UL PGKYUSPME, UGX YBYG THKY LH VYWUALY PM CUL XPZZYKYGM.GYDM XUE MOY WHAGMYLL WUSSYX VHKPL ULPXY UGX OUX U MUSR CPMO OPT, UZMYKCOPWO OY WYULYX WHTPGN MH MOY KHLMHBL'.WOUIMYK DPBHG MOY MOPKME-ZPKLM HZ XYWYTVYK, GYC EYUK'L YBY, 1809 - 10 UG HSXNKUGXYY HZ WUMOYKPGY'L XUE CUL NPBPGN U VUSS UGX TPXGPNOM LAIIYK. MOYXPISHTUMPW WHKIL UGX MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZ CYKY MH VY IKYLYGM.MOY NKUGXYY'L CYSS-RGHCG TUGLPHG HG MOY YGNSPLO JAUE NSPMMYKYX CPMOPGGATYKUVSY SPNOML. IHSPWY CYKY LMUMPHGYX UM MOY VKPNOMSE SPM YGMKUGWYCOPWO CUL WUKIYMYX CPMO KYX VUPFY, UGX GHM HGSE NYGXUKTYL VAM XHFYGL HZIHSPWY HZZPWYKL UGX YBYG MOY IHSPWY TULMYK OPTLYSZ LMHHX UM MOY IHKWO.WUKKPUNYL RYIM XKPBPGN UCUE UGX ZKYLO HGYL UKKPBPGN, CPMO KYX-SPBYKPYXZHHMTYG UGX ZHHMTYG PG ISATYX OUML. ZKHT MOY WUKKPUNYL YTYKNYX TYGCYUKPGN AGPZHKTL, LMUKL, UGX KPVVHGL, COPSY SUXPYL PG LUMPG UGX YKTPGYWUAMPHALSE XYLWYGXYX MOY WUKKPUNY LMYIL COPWO CYKY SYM XHCG ZHK MOYTCPMO U WSUMMYK, UGX MOYG CUSRYX OAKKPYXSE UGX GHPLYSYLLSE HBYK MOY VUPFYUM MOY YGMKUGWY.USTHLM YBYKE MPTY U GYC WUKKPUNY XKHBY AI U COPLIYK KUG MOKHANO MOYWKHCX UGX WUIL CYKY XHZZYX."MOY YTIYKHK?... GH, U TPGPLMYK.... IKPGWY... UTVULLUXHK. XHG'M EHA LYYMOY ISATYL?..." CUL COPLIYKYX UTHGN MOY WKHCX.HGY IYKLHG, VYMMYK XKYLLYX MOUG MOY KYLM, LYYTYX MH RGHC YBYKEHGY UGXTYGMPHGYX VE GUTY MOY NKYUMYLM XPNGPMUKPYL HZ MOY XUE.U MOPKX HZ MOY BPLPMHKL OUX USKYUXE UKKPBYX, VAM MOY KHLMHBL, COH CYKYMH VY IKYLYGM, CYKY LMPSS OAKKEPGN MH NYM XKYLLYX.MOYKY OUX VYYG TUGE XPLWALLPHGL UGX IKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK MOPL VUSS PG MOYKHLMHB ZUTPSE, TUGE ZYUKL MOUM MOY PGBPMUMPHG CHASX GHM UKKPBY, MOUM MOYXKYLLYL CHASX GHM VY KYUXE, HK MOUM LHTYMOPGN CHASX GHM VY UKKUGNYX ULPM LOHASX VY.TUKEU PNGUMYBGU IYKHGLRUEU, U MOPG UGX LOUSSHC TUPX HZ OHGHK UM MOYWHAKM HZ MOY XHCUNYK YTIKYLL, COH CUL U ZKPYGX UGX KYSUMPHG HZ MOYWHAGMYLL UGX IPSHMYX MOY IKHBPGWPUS KHLMHBL PG IYMYKLVAKN OPNO LHWPYME,CUL MH UWWHTIUGE MOYT MH MOY VUSS.MOYE CYKY MH WUSS ZHK OYK UM OYK OHALY PG MOY MUAKPXU NUKXYGL UM MYGH'WSHWR, VAM PM CUL USKYUXE ZPBY TPGAMYL MH MYG, UGX MOY NPKSL CYKY GHMEYM XKYLLYX.GUMULOU CUL NHPGN MH OYK ZPKLM NKUGX VUSS. LOY OUX NHM AI UM YPNOM MOUMTHKGPGN UGX OUX VYYG PG U ZYBYK HZ YDWPMYTYGM UGX UWMPBPME USS XUE. USSOYK IHCYKL LPGWY THKGPGN OUX VYYG WHGWYGMKUMYX HG YGLAKPGN MOUM MOYEUSS--LOY OYKLYSZ, TUTTU, UGX LHGEU--LOHASX VY UL CYSS XKYLLYX ULIHLLPVSY. LHGEU UGX OYK THMOYK IAM MOYTLYSBYL YGMPKYSE PG OYK OUGXL. MOYWHAGMYLL CUL MH CYUK U WSUKYM-WHSHKYX BYSBYM XKYLL, UGX MOY MCH NPKSLCOPMY NUAFY HBYK IPGR LPSR LSPIL, CPMO KHLYL HG MOYPK VHXPWYL UGX MOYPKOUPK XKYLLYX U SU NKYWJAY.YBYKEMOPGN YLLYGMPUS OUX USKYUXE VYYG XHGY; ZYYM, OUGXL, GYWRL, UGXYUKL CULOYX, IYKZATYX, UGX IHCXYKYX, UL VYZPML U VUSS; MOY HIYGCHKRLPSR LMHWRPGNL UGX COPMY LUMPG LOHYL CPMO KPVVHGL CYKY USKYUXE HG; MOYOUPKXKYLLPGN CUL USTHLM XHGY. LHGEU CUL ZPGPLOPGN XKYLLPGN UGX LH CULMOY WHAGMYLL, VAM GUMULOU, COH OUX VALMSYX UVHAM OYSIPGN MOYT USS, CULVYOPGXOUGX. LOY CUL LMPSS LPMMPGN VYZHKY U SHHRPGN-NSULL CPMO U XKYLLPGNQUWRYM MOKHCG HBYK OYK LSYGXYK LOHASXYKL. LHGEU LMHHX KYUXE XKYLLYX PGMOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT UGX, IKYLLPGN MOY OYUX HZ U IPG MPSS PM OAKM OYKXUPGME ZPGNYK, CUL ZPDPGN HG U SULM KPVVHG MOUM LJAYURYX UL MOY IPG CYGMMOKHANO PM."MOUM'L GHM MOY CUE, MOUM'L GHM MOY CUE, LHGEU!" WKPYX GUMULOU MAKGPGNOYK OYUX UGX WSAMWOPGN CPMO VHMO OUGXL UM OYK OUPK COPWO MOY TUPX COHCUL XKYLLPGN PM OUX GHM MPTY MH KYSYULY. "MOUM VHC PL GHM KPNOM. WHTYOYKY!"LHGEU LUM XHCG UGX GUMULOU IPGGYX MOY KPVVHG HG XPZZYKYGMSE."USSHC TY, TPLL! P WUG'M XH PM SPRY MOUM," LUPX MOY TUPX COH CUL OHSXPGNGUMULOU'L OUPK."HO, XYUK! CYSS MOYG, CUPM. MOUM'L KPNOM, LHGEU.""UKYG'M EHA KYUXE? PM PL GYUKSE MYG," WUTY MOY WHAGMYLL' BHPWY."XPKYWMSE! XPKYWMSE! UGX EHA, TUTTU?""P OUBY HGSE TE WUI MH IPG HG.""XHG'M XH PM CPMOHAM TY!" WUSSYX GUMULOU. "EHA CHG'M XH PM KPNOM.""VAM PM'L USKYUXE MYG."MOYE OUX XYWPXYX MH VY UM MOY VUSS VE OUSZ IULM MYG, UGX GUMULOU OUXLMPSS MH NYM XKYLLYX UGX MOYE OUX MH WUSS UM MOY MUAKPXU NUKXYGL.COYG OYK OUPK CUL XHGY, GUMULOU, PG OYK LOHKM IYMMPWHUM ZKHT AGXYK COPWOOYK XUGWPGN LOHYL LOHCYX, UGX PG OYK THMOYK'L XKYLLPGN QUWRYM, KUG AI MHLHGEU, LWKAMPGPFYX OYK, UGX MOYG KUG MH OYK THMOYK. MAKGPGN OYK THMOYK'LOYUX MOPL CUE UGX MOUM, LOY ZULMYGYX HG MOY WUI UGX, OAKKPYXSE RPLLPGNOYK NKUE OUPK, KUG VUWR MH MOY TUPXL COH CYKY MAKGPGN AI MOY OYT HZ OYKLRPKM.MOY WUALY HZ MOY XYSUE CUL GUMULOU'L LRPKM, COPWO CUL MHH SHGN. MCHTUPXL CYKY MAKGPGN AI MOY OYT UGX OAKKPYXSE VPMPGN HZZ MOY YGXL HZMOKYUX. U MOPKX CPMO IPGL PG OYK THAMO CUL KAGGPGN UVHAM VYMCYYG MOYWHAGMYLL UGX LHGEU, UGX U ZHAKMO OYSX MOY COHSY HZ MOY NHLLUTYK NUKTYGMAI OPNO HG HGY AISPZMYX OUGX."TUBKU, JAPWRYK, XUKSPGN!""NPBY TY TE MOPTVSY, TPLL, ZKHT MOYKY...""COYGYBYK CPSS EHA VY KYUXE?" ULRYX MOY WHAGM WHTPGN MH MOY XHHK. "OYKYPL LHTY LWYGM. IYKHGLRUEU TALM VY MPKYX HZ CUPMPGN.""PM'L KYUXE, TPLL," LUPX MOY TUPX, OHSXPGN AI MOY LOHKMYGYX NUAFY XKYLLCPMO MCH ZPGNYKL, UGX VSHCPGN UGX LOURPGN LHTYMOPGN HZZ PM, UL PZ VEMOPL MH YDIKYLL U WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY UPKPGYLL UGX IAKPME HZ COUM LOYOYSX.GUMULOU VYNUG IAMMPGN HG MOY XKYLL."PG U TPGAMY! PG U TPGAMY! XHG'M WHTY PG, IUIU!" LOY WKPYX MH OYK ZUMOYKUL OY HIYGYX MOY XHHK--LIYURPGN ZKHT AGXYK MOY ZPSTE LRPKM COPWO LMPSSWHBYKYX OYK COHSY ZUWY.LHGEU LSUTTYX MOY XHHK MH. U TPGAMY SUMYK MOYE SYM MOY WHAGM PG. OY CULCYUKPGN U VSAY LCUSSHC-MUPS WHUM, LOHYL UGX LMHWRPGNL, UGX CUL IYKZATYXUGX OPL OUPK IHTUXYX."HO, IUIU! OHC GPWY EHA SHHR! WOUKTPGN!" WKPYX GUMULOU, UL LOY LMHHX PGMOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT LTHHMOPGN HAM MOY ZHSXL HZ MOY NUAFY."PZ EHA ISYULY, TPLL! USSHC TY," LUPX MOY TUPX, COH HG OYK RGYYL CULIASSPGN MOY LRPKM LMKUPNOM UGX LOPZMPGN MOY IPGL ZKHT HGY LPXY HZ OYKTHAMO MH MOY HMOYK CPMO OYK MHGNAY."LUE COUM EHA SPRY," YDWSUPTYX LHGEU, PG U XYLIUPKPGN BHPWY UL LOYSHHRYX UM GUMULOU, "LUE COUM EHA SPRY, PM'L LMPSS MHH SHGN."GUMULOU LMYIIYX VUWR MH SHHR UM OYKLYSZ PG MOY IPYK NSULL. MOY XKYLL CULMHH SHGN."KYUSSE, TUXUT, PM PL GHM UM USS MHH SHGN," LUPX TUBKU, WKUCSPGN HG OYKRGYYL UZMYK OYK EHAGN SUXE."CYSS, PZ PM'L MHH SHGN CY'SS MURY PM AI... CY'SS MUWR PM AI PG HGYTPGAMY," LUPX MOY KYLHSAMY XAGEULOU MURPGN U GYYXSY MOUM CUL LMAWR HGMOY ZKHGM HZ OYK SPMMSY LOUCS UGX, LMPSS RGYYSPGN HG MOY ZSHHK, LYM MHCHKR HGWY THKY.UM MOUM THTYGM, CPMO LHZM LMYIL, MOY WHAGMYLL WUTY PG LOESE, PG OYK WUIUGX BYSBYM NHCG."HH-HH, TE VYUAME!" YDWSUPTYX MOY WHAGM, "LOY SHHRL VYMMYK MOUG UGE HZEHA!"OY CHASX OUBY YTVKUWYX OYK VAM, VSALOPGN, LOY LMYIIYX ULPXY ZYUKPGN MHVY KATISYX."TUTTU, EHAK WUI, THKY MH MOPL LPXY," LUPX GUMULOU. "P'SS UKKUGNY PM,"UGX LOY KALOYX ZHKCUKX LH MOUM MOY TUPXL COH CYKY MUWRPGN AI OYK LRPKMWHASX GHM THBY ZULM YGHANO UGX U IPYWY HZ NUAFY CUL MHKG HZZ."HO NHHXGYLL! COUM OUL OUIIYGYX? KYUSSE PM CUL GHM TE ZUASM!""GYBYK TPGX, P'SS KAG PM AI, PM CHG'M LOHC," LUPX XAGEULOU."COUM U VYUAME--U BYKE JAYYG!" LUPX MOY GAKLY UL LOY WUTY MH MOY XHHK."UGX LHGEU! MOYE UKY SHBYSE!"UM U JAUKMYK IULM MYG MOYE UM SULM NHM PGMH MOYPK WUKKPUNYL UGX LMUKMYX.VAM MOYE OUX LMPSS MH WUSS UM MOY MUAKPXU NUKXYGL.IYKHGLRUEU CUL JAPMY KYUXE. PG LIPMY HZ OYK UNY UGX ISUPGGYLL LOY OUXNHGY MOKHANO MOY LUTY IKHWYLL UL MOY KHLMHBL, VAM CPMO SYLL ZSAKKE--ZHKMH OYK PM CUL U TUMMYK HZ KHAMPGY. OYK ANSE HSX VHXE CUL CULOYX,IYKZATYX, UGX IHCXYKYX PG QALM MOY LUTY CUE. LOY OUX CULOYX VYOPGX OYKYUKL QALM UL WUKYZASSE, UGX COYG LOY YGMYKYX OYK XKUCPGN KHHT PG OYKEYSSHC XKYLL, CYUKPGN OYK VUXNY UL TUPX HZ OHGHK, OYK HSX SUXE'L TUPXCUL UL ZASS HZ KUIMAKHAL UXTPKUMPHG UL MOY KHLMHBL' LYKBUGML OUX VYYG.LOY IKUPLYX MOY KHLMHBL' MHPSYML. MOYE IKUPLYX OYK MULMY UGX MHPSYM, UGXUM YSYBYG H'WSHWR, WUKYZAS HZ MOYPK WHPZZAKYL UGX XKYLLYL, MOYE LYMMSYXMOYTLYSBYL PG MOYPK WUKKPUNYL UGX XKHBY HZZ.WOUIMYK DBGUMULOU OUX GHM OUX U THTYGM ZKYY LPGWY YUKSE THKGPGN UGX OUX GHM HGWYOUX MPTY MH MOPGR HZ COUM SUE VYZHKY OYK.PG MOY XUTI WOPSS UPK UGX WKHCXYX WSHLYGYLL HZ MOY LCUEPGN WUKKPUNY, LOYZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY BPBPXSE PTUNPGYX COUM CUL PG LMHKY ZHK OYK MOYKY UMMOY VUSS, PG MOHLY VKPNOMSE SPNOMYX KHHTL--CPMO TALPW, ZSHCYKL, XUGWYL,MOY YTIYKHK, UGX USS MOY VKPSSPUGM EHAGN IYHISY HZ IYMYKLVAKN. MOYIKHLIYWM CUL LH LISYGXPX MOUM LOY OUKXSE VYSPYBYX PM CHASX WHTY MKAY,LH HAM HZ RYYIPGN CUL PM CPMO MOY WOPSS XUKRGYLL UGX WSHLYGYLL HZ MOYWUKKPUNY. LOY AGXYKLMHHX USS MOUM UCUPMYX OYK HGSE COYG, UZMYK LMYIIPGNHBYK MOY KYX VUPFY UM MOY YGMKUGWY, LOY YGMYKYX MOY OUSS, MHHR HZZ OYKZAK WSHUR, UGX, VYLPXY LHGEU UGX PG ZKHGM HZ OYK THMOYK, THAGMYX MOYVKPNOMSE PSSATPGUMYX LMUPKL VYMCYYG MOY ZSHCYKL. HGSE MOYG XPX LOYKYTYTVYK OHC LOY TALM VYOUBY UM U VUSS, UGX MKPYX MH ULLATY MOY TUQYLMPWUPK LOY WHGLPXYKYX PGXPLIYGLUVSY ZHK U NPKS HG LAWO UG HWWULPHG. VAM,ZHKMAGUMYSE ZHK OYK, LOY ZYSM OYK YEYL NKHCPGN TPLME, LOY LUC GHMOPGNWSYUKSE, OYK IASLY VYUM U OAGXKYX MH MOY TPGAMY, UGX MOY VSHHX MOKHVVYXUM OYK OYUKM. LOY WHASX GHM ULLATY MOUM IHLY, COPWO CHASX OUBY TUXY OYKKPXPWASHAL, UGX LOY THBYX HG USTHLM ZUPGMPGN ZKHT YDWPMYTYGM UGX MKEPGNCPMO USS OYK TPNOM MH WHGWYUS PM. UGX MOPL CUL MOY BYKE UMMPMAXY MOUMVYWUTY OYK VYLM. VYZHKY UGX VYOPGX MOYT HMOYK BPLPMHKL CYKY YGMYKPGN,USLH MUSRPGN PG SHC MHGYL UGX CYUKPGN VUSS XKYLLYL. MOY TPKKHKL HG MOYSUGXPGN KYZSYWMYX SUXPYL PG COPMY, IUSY-VSAY, UGX IPGR XKYLLYL, CPMOXPUTHGXL UGX IYUKSL HG MOYPK VUKY GYWRL UGX UKTL.GUMULOU SHHRYX PG MOY TPKKHKL UGX WHASX GHM XPLMPGNAPLO OYK KYZSYWMPHGZKHT MOY HMOYKL. USS CUL VSYGXYX PGMH HGY VKPSSPUGM IKHWYLLPHG.HG YGMYKPGN MOY VUSSKHHT MOY KYNASUK OAT HZ BHPWYL, ZHHMLMYIL, UGXNKYYMPGNL XYUZYGYX GUMULOU, UGX MOY SPNOM UGX NSPMMYK XUFFSYX OYK LMPSSTHKY. MOY OHLM UGX OHLMYLL, COH OUX USKYUXE VYYG LMUGXPGN UM MOY XHHKZHK OUSZ UG OHAK KYIYUMPGN MOY LUTY CHKXL MH MOY BUKPHAL UKKPBUSL,"WOUKTY XY BHAL BHPK," * NKYYMYX MOY KHLMHBL UGX IYKHGLRUEU PG MOY LUTYTUGGYK.    * "XYSPNOMYX MH LYY EHA."MOY MCH NPKSL PG MOYPK COPMY XKYLLYL, YUWO CPMO U KHLY PG OYK VSUWROUPK, VHMO WAKMLPYX PG MOY LUTY CUE, VAM MOY OHLMYLL' YEY PGBHSAGMUKPSEKYLMYX SHGNYK HG MOY LSPT GUMULOU. LOY SHHRYX UM OYK UGX NUBY OYK USHGYU LIYWPUS LTPSY PG UXXPMPHG MH OYK ALAUS LTPSY UL OHLMYLL. SHHRPGN UMOYK LOY TUE OUBY KYWUSSYX MOY NHSXYG, PKKYWHBYKUVSY XUEL HZ OYK HCGNPKSOHHX UGX OYK HCG ZPKLM VUSS. MOY OHLM USLH ZHSSHCYX GUMULOU CPMO OPLYEYL UGX ULRYX MOY WHAGM COPWO CUL OPL XUANOMYK."WOUKTPGN!" LUPX OY, RPLLPGN MOY MPIL HZ OPL ZPGNYKL.PG MOY VUSSKHHT NAYLML LMHHX WKHCXPGN UM MOY YGMKUGWY XHHKL UCUPMPGNMOY YTIYKHK. MOY WHAGMYLL MHHR AI U IHLPMPHG PG HGY HZ MOY ZKHGM KHCL HZMOUM WKHCX. GUMULOU OYUKX UGX ZYSM MOUM LYBYKUS IYHISY CYKY ULRPGN UVHAMOYK UGX SHHRPGN UM OYK. LOY KYUSPFYX MOUM MOHLY GHMPWPGN OYK SPRYX OYK,UGX MOPL HVLYKBUMPHG OYSIYX MH WUST OYK."MOYKY UKY LHTY SPRY HAKLYSBYL UGX LHTY CHKLY," LOY MOHANOM.IYKHGLRUEU CUL IHPGMPGN HAM MH MOY WHAGMYLL MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM IYHISY UMMOY VUSS."MOUM PL MOY XAMWO UTVULLUXHK, XH EHA LYY? MOUM NKUE-OUPKYX TUG," LOYLUPX, PGXPWUMPGN UG HSX TUG CPMO U IKHZALPHG HZ LPSBYK-NKUE WAKSE OUPK,COH CUL LAKKHAGXYX VE SUXPYL SUANOPGN UM LHTYMOPGN OY LUPX."UO, OYKY LOY PL, MOY JAYYG HZ IYMYKLVAKN, WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU," LUPXIYKHGLRUEU, PGXPWUMPGN OYSYGY COH OUX QALM YGMYKYX. "OHC SHBYSE! LOYPL JAPMY YJAUS MH TUKEU UGMHGHBGU. LYY OHC MOY TYG, EHAGN UGX HSX, IUEWHAKM MH OYK. VYUAMPZAS UGX WSYBYK... MOYE LUE IKPGWY--PL JAPMY TUXUVHAM OYK. VAM LYY, MOHLY MCH, MOHANO GHM NHHX-SHHRPGN, UKY YBYG THKYKAG UZMYK."LOY IHPGMYX MH U SUXE COH CUL WKHLLPGN MOY KHHT ZHSSHCYX VE U BYKE ISUPGXUANOMYK."LOY PL U LISYGXPX TUMWO, U TPSSPHGUPKYLL," LUPX IYKHGLRUEU. "UGX SHHR,OYKY WHTY OYK LAPMHKL.""MOUM PL VYFAROHBU'L VKHMOYK, UGUMHSY RAKUNPG," LOY LUPX, PGXPWUMPGN UOUGXLHTY HZZPWYK HZ MOY OHKLY NAUKXL COH IULLYX VE MOYT CPMO OYUX YKYWM,SHHRPGN UM LHTYMOPGN HBYK MOY OYUXL HZ MOY SUXPYL. "OY'L OUGXLHTY,PLG'M OY? P OYUK MOYE CPSS TUKKE OPT MH MOUM KPWO NPKS. VAM EHAK WHALPG,XKAVYMLRHE, PL USLH BYKE UMMYGMPBY MH OYK. MOYE LUE LOY OUL TPSSPHGL. HOEYL, MOUM'L MOY ZKYGWO UTVULLUXHK OPTLYSZ!" LOY KYISPYX MH MOY WHAGMYLL'PGJAPKE UVHAM WUASUPGWHAKM. "SHHRL UL PZ OY CYKY U RPGN! USS MOY LUTY,MOY ZKYGWO UKY WOUKTPGN, BYKE WOUKTPGN. GH HGY THKY WOUKTPGN PG LHWPYME.UO, OYKY LOY PL! EYL, LOY PL LMPSS MOY THLM VYUAMPZAS HZ MOYT USS, HAKTUKEU UGMHGHBGU! UGX OHC LPTISE LOY PL XKYLLYX! SHBYSE! UGX MOUM LMHAMHGY PG LIYWMUWSYL PL MOY AGPBYKLUS ZKYYTULHG," LOY CYGM HG, PGXPWUMPGNIPYKKY. "IAM OPT VYLPXY OPL CPZY UGX OY SHHRL U KYNASUK VAZZHHG!"IPYKKY, LCUEPGN OPL LMHAM VHXE, UXBUGWYX, TURPGN CUE MOKHANO MOY WKHCXUGX GHXXPGN MH KPNOM UGX SYZM UL WULAUSSE UGX NHHX-GUMAKYXSE UL PZ OYCYKY IULLPGN MOKHANO U WKHCX UM U ZUPK. OY IALOYX MOKHANO, YBPXYGMSESHHRPGN ZHK LHTYHGY.GUMULOU SHHRYX QHEZASSE UM MOY ZUTPSPUK ZUWY HZ IPYKKY, "MOY VAZZHHG,"UL IYKHGLRUEU OUX WUSSYX OPT, UGX RGYC OY CUL SHHRPGN ZHK MOYT, UGXZHK OYK PG IUKMPWASUK. OY OUX IKHTPLYX MH VY UM MOY VUSS UGX PGMKHXAWYIUKMGYKL MH OYK.VAM VYZHKY OY KYUWOYX MOYT IPYKKY LMHIIYX VYLPXY U BYKE OUGXLHTY, XUKRTUG HZ TPXXSY OYPNOM, UGX PG U COPMY AGPZHKT, COH LMHHX VE U CPGXHCMUSRPGN MH U MUSS TUG CYUKPGN LMUKL UGX U KPVVHG. GUMULOU UM HGWYKYWHNGPFYX MOY LOHKMYK UGX EHAGNYK TUG PG MOY COPMY AGPZHKT: PM CULVHSRHGLRP, COH LYYTYX MH OYK MH OUBY NKHCG TAWO EHAGNYK, OUIIPYK, UGXVYMMYK-SHHRPGN."MOYKY'L LHTYHGY YSLY CY RGHC--VHSRHGLRP, XH EHA LYY, TUTTU?" LUPXGUMULOU, IHPGMPGN HAM IKPGWY UGXKYC. "EHA KYTYTVYK, OY LMUEYX U GPNOMCPMO AL UM HMKUXGHY.""HO, EHA RGHC OPT?" LUPX IYKHGLRUEU. "P WUG'M VYUK OPT. PS ZUPM UIKYLYGM SU ISAPY YM SY VYUA MYTIL. * OY'L MHH IKHAX ZHK UGEMOPGN. MURYLUZMYK OPL ZUMOYK. UGX OY'L OUGX PG NSHBY CPMO LIYKUGLRP, CKPMPGN LHTYIKHQYWM HK HMOYK. QALM SHHR OHC OY MKYUML MOY SUXPYL! MOYKY'L HGYMUSRPGN MH OPT UGX OY OUL MAKGYX UCUE," LOY LUPX, IHPGMPGN UM OPT. "P'XNPBY PM MH OPT PZ OY MKYUMYX TY UL OY XHYL MOHLY SUXPYL."    * "OY PL USS MOY KUNY QALM GHC."WOUIMYK DBPLAXXYGSE YBYKEVHXE LMPKKYX, VYNUG MUSRPGN, UGX IKYLLYX ZHKCUKX UGX MOYGVUWR, UGX VYMCYYG MOY MCH KHCL, COPWO LYIUKUMYX, MOY YTIYKHK YGMYKYX MHMOY LHAGXL HZ TALPW MOUM OUX PTTYXPUMYSE LMKAWR AI. VYOPGX OPT CUSRYXOPL OHLM UGX OHLMYLL. OY CUSRYX PG KUIPXSE, VHCPGN MH KPNOM UGX SYZMUL PZ UGDPHAL MH NYM MOY ZPKLM THTYGML HZ MOY KYWYIMPHG HBYK. MOY VUGXISUEYX MOY IHSHGUPLY PG BHNAY UM MOUM MPTY HG UWWHAGM HZ MOY CHKXL MOUMOUX VYYG LYM MH PM, VYNPGGPGN: "USYDUGXYK, YSPLUBYMU, USS HAK OYUKML EHAKUBPLO JAPMY..." MOY YTIYKHK IULLYX HG MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, MOY WKHCXTUXY U KALO ZHK MOY XHHKL, UGX LYBYKUS IYKLHGL CPMO YDWPMYX ZUWYLOAKKPYX MOYKY UGX VUWR UNUPG. MOYG MOY WKHCX OULMPSE KYMPKYX ZKHTMOY XKUCPGN-KHHT XHHK, UM COPWO MOY YTIYKHK KYUIIYUKYX MUSRPGN MH MOYOHLMYLL. U EHAGN TUG, SHHRPGN XPLMKUANOM, IHAGWYX XHCG HG MOY SUXPYL,ULRPGN MOYT MH THBY ULPXY. LHTY SUXPYL, CPMO ZUWYL VYMKUEPGN WHTISYMYZHKNYMZASGYLL HZ USS MOY KASYL HZ XYWHKAT, IALOYX ZHKCUKX MH MOYXYMKPTYGM HZ MOYPK MHPSYML. MOY TYG VYNUG MH WOHHLY IUKMGYKL UGX MURYMOYPK ISUWYL ZHK MOY IHSHGUPLY.YBYKEHGY THBYX VUWR, UGX MOY YTIYKHK WUTY LTPSPGN HAM HZ MOY XKUCPGNKHHT SYUXPGN OPL OHLMYLL VE MOY OUGX VAM GHM RYYIPGN MPTY MH MOYTALPW. MOY OHLM ZHSSHCYX CPMO TUKEU UGMHGHBGU GUKELORPGU; MOYG WUTYUTVULLUXHKL, TPGPLMYKL, UGX BUKPHAL NYGYKUSL, COHT IYKHGLRUEU XPSPNYGMSEGUTYX. THKY MOUG OUSZ MOY SUXPYL USKYUXE OUX IUKMGYKL UGX CYKY MURPGNAI, HK IKYIUKPGN MH MURY AI, MOYPK IHLPMPHGL ZHK MOY IHSHGUPLY. GUMULOUZYSM MOUM LOY CHASX VY SYZM CPMO OYK THMOYK UGX LHGEU UTHGN U TPGHKPMEHZ CHTYG COH WKHCXYX GYUK MOY CUSS, GHM OUBPGN VYYG PGBPMYX MH XUGWY.LOY LMHHX CPMO OYK LSYGXYK UKTL OUGNPGN XHCG, OYK LWUKWYSE XYZPGYX VHLHTKPLPGN UGX ZUSSPGN KYNASUKSE, UGX CPMO VUMYX VKYUMO UGX NSPMMYKPGN,ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL NUFYX LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OYK, YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKYX ZHK MOYOYPNOM HZ QHE HK TPLYKE. LOY CUL GHM WHGWYKGYX UVHAM MOY YTIYKHK HK UGEHZ MOHLY NKYUM IYHISY COHT IYKHGLRUEU CUL IHPGMPGN HAM--LOY OUX VAM HGYMOHANOM: "PL PM IHLLPVSY GH HGY CPSS ULR TY, MOUM P LOUSS GHM VY UTHGNMOY ZPKLM MH XUGWY? PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM GHM HGY HZ USS MOYLY TYG CPSSGHMPWY TY? MOYE XH GHM YBYG LYYT MH LYY TY, HK PZ MOYE XH MOYE SHHR ULPZ MOYE CYKY LUEPGN, 'UO, LOY'L GHM MOY HGY P'T UZMYK, LH PM'L GHM CHKMOSHHRPGN UM OYK!' GH, PM'L PTIHLLPVSY," LOY MOHANOM. "MOYE TALM RGHCOHC P SHGN MH XUGWY, OHC LISYGXPXSE P XUGWY, UGX OHC MOYE CHASX YGQHEXUGWPGN CPMO TY."MOY LMKUPGL HZ MOY IHSHGUPLY, COPWO OUX WHGMPGAYX ZHK U WHGLPXYKUVSYMPTY, OUX VYNAG MH LHAGX SPRY U LUX KYTPGPLWYGWY MH GUMULOU'L YUKL. LOYCUGMYX MH WKE. IYKHGLRUEU OUX SYZM MOYT. MOY WHAGM CUL UM MOY HMOYK YGXHZ MOY KHHT. LOY UGX MOY WHAGMYLL UGX LHGEU CYKY LMUGXPGN VE MOYTLYSBYLUL PG MOY XYIMOL HZ U ZHKYLM UTPX MOUM WKHCX HZ LMKUGNYKL, CPMO GH HGYPGMYKYLMYX PG MOYT UGX GHM CUGMYX VE UGEHGY. IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO U SUXEIULLYX VE, YBPXYGMSE GHM KYWHNGPFPGN MOYT. MOY OUGXLHTY UGUMHSY CULLTPSPGNSE MUSRPGN MH U IUKMGYK HG OPL UKT UGX SHHRYX UM GUMULOU UL HGYSHHRL UM U CUSS. VHKPL IULLYX MOYT MCPWY UGX YUWO MPTY MAKGYX UCUE. VYKNUGX OPL CPZY, COH CYKY GHM XUGWPGN, WUTY AI MH MOYT.MOPL ZUTPSE NUMOYKPGN LYYTYX OATPSPUMPGN MH GUMULOU--UL PZ MOYKY CYKYGHCOYKY YSLY ZHK MOY ZUTPSE MH MUSR VAM OYKY UM MOY VUSS. LOY XPX GHMSPLMYG MH HK SHHR UM BYKU, COH CUL MYSSPGN OYK LHTYMOPGN UVHAM OYK HCGNKYYG XKYLL.UM SULM MOY YTIYKHK LMHIIYX VYLPXY OPL SULM IUKMGYK (OY OUX XUGWYXCPMO MOKYY) UGX MOY TALPW WYULYX. U CHKKPYX UPXY-XY-WUTI KUG AI MH MOYKHLMHBL KYJAYLMPGN MOYT MH LMUGX ZUKMOYK VUWR, MOHANO UL PM CUL MOYECYKY USKYUXE WSHLY MH MOY CUSS, UGX ZKHT MOY NUSSYKE KYLHAGXYX MOYXPLMPGWM, IKYWPLY, YGMPWPGNSE KOEMOTPWUS LMKUPGL HZ U CUSMF. MOY YTIYKHKSHHRYX LTPSPGNSE XHCG MOY KHHT. U TPGAMY IULLYX VAM GH HGY OUX EYM VYNAGXUGWPGN. UG UPXY-XY-WUTI, MOY TULMYK HZ WYKYTHGPYL, CYGM AI MH WHAGMYLLVYFAROHBU UGX ULRYX OYK MH XUGWY. LOY LTPSPGNSE KUPLYX OYK OUGX UGX SUPXPM HG OPL LOHASXYK CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OPT. MOY UPXY-XY-WUTI, UG UXYIMPG OPL UKM, NKULIPGN OPL IUKMGYK ZPKTSE KHAGX OYK CUPLM, CPMO WHGZPXYGMXYSPVYKUMPHG LMUKMYX LTHHMOSE, NSPXPGN ZPKLM KHAGX MOY YXNY HZ MOYWPKWSY, MOYG UM MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT OY WUANOM OYSYGY'L SYZM OUGXUGX MAKGYX OYK, MOY HGSE LHAGX UAXPVSY, UIUKM ZKHT MOY YBYK-JAPWRYGPGNTALPW, VYPGN MOY KOEMOTPW WSPWR HZ MOY LIAKL HG OPL KUIPX, UNPSY ZYYM,COPSY UM YBYKE MOPKX VYUM OPL IUKMGYK'L BYSBYM XKYLL LIKYUX HAM UGXLYYTYX MH ZSULO UL LOY COPKSYX KHAGX. GUMULOU NUFYX UM MOYT UGX CULKYUXE MH WKE VYWUALY PM CUL GHM LOY COH CUL XUGWPGN MOUM ZPKLM MAKG HZMOY CUSMF.IKPGWY UGXKYC, PG MOY COPMY AGPZHKT HZ U WUBUSKE WHSHGYS, CYUKPGNLMHWRPGNL UGX XUGWPGN LOHYL, LMHHX SHHRPGN UGPTUMYX UGX VKPNOM PG MOYZKHGM KHC HZ MOY WPKWSY GHM ZUK ZKHT MOY KHLMHBL. VUKHG ZPKOHZZ CULMUSRPGN MH OPT UVHAM MOY ZPKLM LPMMPGN HZ MOY WHAGWPS HZ LMUMY MH VYOYSX GYDM XUE. IKPGWY UGXKYC, UL HGY WSHLYSE WHGGYWMYX CPMO LIYKUGLRPUGX IUKMPWPIUMPGN PG MOY CHKR HZ MOY SYNPLSUMPBY WHTTPLLPHG, WHASX NPBYKYSPUVSY PGZHKTUMPHG UVHAM MOUM LPMMPGN, WHGWYKGPGN COPWO BUKPHAL KATHKLCYKY WAKKYGM. VAM GHM SPLMYGPGN MH COUM ZPKOHZZ CUL LUEPGN, OY CULNUFPGN GHC UM MOY LHBYKYPNG UGX GHC UM MOY TYG PGMYGXPGN MH XUGWY COHOUX GHM EYM NUMOYKYX WHAKUNY MH YGMYK MOY WPKWSY.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL CUMWOPGN MOYLY TYG UVULOYX VE MOY YTIYKHK'L IKYLYGWY,UGX MOY CHTYG COH CYKY VKYUMOSYLLSE SHGNPGN MH VY ULRYX MH XUGWY.IPYKKY WUTY AI MH OPT UGX WUANOM OPT VE MOY UKT."EHA USCUEL XUGWY. P OUBY U IKHMYNYY, MOY EHAGN KHLMHBU, OYKY. ULR OYK,"OY LUPX."COYKY PL LOY?" ULRYX VHSRHGLRP. "YDWALY TY!" OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH MOYVUKHG, "CY CPSS ZPGPLO MOPL WHGBYKLUMPHG YSLYCOYKY--UM U VUSS HGYTALM XUGWY." OY LMYIIYX ZHKCUKX PG MOY XPKYWMPHG IPYKKY PGXPWUMYX. MOYXYLIUPKPGN, XYQYWMYX YDIKYLLPHG HZ GUMULOU'L ZUWY WUANOM OPL YEY.OY KYWHNGPFYX OYK, NAYLLYX OYK ZYYSPGNL, LUC MOUM PM CUL OYK XYVAM,KYTYTVYKYX OYK WHGBYKLUMPHG UM MOY CPGXHC, UGX CPMO UG YDIKYLLPHG HZISYULAKY HG OPL ZUWY UIIKHUWOYX WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU."USSHC TY MH PGMKHXAWY EHA MH TE XUANOMYK," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMOOYPNOMYGYX WHSHK."P OUBY MOY ISYULAKY HZ VYPGN USKYUXE UWJAUPGMYX, PZ MOY WHAGMYLLKYTYTVYKL TY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO U SHC UGX WHAKMYHAL VHC JAPMYVYSEPGN IYKHGLRUEU'L KYTUKRL UVHAM OPL KAXYGYLL, UGX UIIKHUWOPGN GUMULOUOY OYSX HAM OPL UKT MH NKULI OYK CUPLM VYZHKY OY OUX WHTISYMYX OPLPGBPMUMPHG. OY ULRYX OYK MH CUSMF. MOUM MKYTASHAL YDIKYLLPHG HGGUMULOU'L ZUWY, IKYIUKYX YPMOYK ZHK XYLIUPK HK KUIMAKY, LAXXYGSEVKPNOMYGYX PGMH U OUIIE, NKUMYZAS, WOPSXSPRY LTPSY."P OUBY SHGN VYYG CUPMPGN ZHK EHA," MOUM ZKPNOMYGYX OUIIE SPMMSY NPKSLYYTYX MH LUE VE MOY LTPSY MOUM KYISUWYX MOY MOKYUMYGYX MYUKL, UL LOYKUPLYX OYK OUGX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L LOHASXYK. MOYE CYKY MOY LYWHGX WHAISYMH YGMYK MOY WPKWSY. IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL HGY HZ MOY VYLM XUGWYKL HZ OPLXUE UGX GUMULOU XUGWYX YDJAPLPMYSE. OYK SPMMSY ZYYM PG MOYPK COPMY LUMPGXUGWPGN LOHYL XPX MOYPK CHKR LCPZMSE, SPNOMSE, UGX PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZOYKLYSZ, COPSY OYK ZUWY VYUTYX CPMO YWLMUMPW OUIIPGYLL. OYK LSYGXYK VUKYUKTL UGX GYWR CYKY GHM VYUAMPZAS--WHTIUKYX MH OYSYGY'L OYK LOHASXYKLSHHRYX MOPG UGX OYK VHLHT AGXYBYSHIYX. VAM OYSYGY LYYTYX, UL PM CYKY,OUKXYGYX VE U BUKGPLO SYZM VE MOY MOHALUGXL HZ SHHRL MOUM OUX LWUGGYXOYK IYKLHG, COPSY GUMULOU CUL SPRY U NPKS YDIHLYX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY,COH CHASX OUBY ZYSM BYKE TAWO ULOUTYX OUX LOY GHM VYYG ULLAKYX MOUM MOPLCUL UVLHSAMYSE GYWYLLUKE.IKPGWY UGXKYC SPRYX XUGWPGN, UGX CPLOPGN MH YLWUIY UL JAPWRSE ULIHLLPVSY ZKHT MOY IHSPMPWUS UGX WSYBYK MUSR COPWO YBYKEHGY UXXKYLLYXMH OPT, CPLOPGN USLH MH VKYUR AI MOY WPKWSY HZ KYLMKUPGM OY XPLSPRYX,WUALYX VE MOY YTIYKHK'L IKYLYGWY, OY XUGWYX, UGX OUX WOHLYG GUMULOUVYWUALY IPYKKY IHPGMYX OYK HAM MH OPT UGX VYWUALY LOY CUL MOY ZPKLMIKYMME NPKS COH WUANOM OPL YEY; VAM LWUKWYSE OUX OY YTVKUWYX MOUMLSYGXYK LAIISY ZPNAKY UGX ZYSM OYK LMPKKPGN LH WSHLY MH OPT UGX LTPSPGNLH GYUK OPT MOUG MOY CPGY HZ OYK WOUKT KHLY MH OPL OYUX, UGX OYZYSM OPTLYSZ KYBPBYX UGX KYQABYGUMYX COYG UZMYK SYUBPGN OYK OY LMHHXVKYUMOPGN XYYISE UGX CUMWOPGN MOY HMOYK XUGWYKL.WOUIMYK DBPPUZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC, VHKPL WUTY AI MH ULR GUMULOU ZHK U XUGWY, UGX MOYGMOY UPXY-XY-WUTI COH OUX HIYGYX MOY VUSS, UGX LYBYKUS HMOYK EHAGN TYG,LH MOUM, ZSALOYX UGX OUIIE, UGX IULLPGN HG OYK LAIYKZSAHAL IUKMGYKL MHLHGEU, LOY XPX GHM WYULY XUGWPGN USS MOY YBYGPGN. LOY GHMPWYX UGX LUCGHMOPGN HZ COUM HWWAIPYX YBYKEHGY YSLY. GHM HGSE XPX LOY ZUPS MH GHMPWYMOUM MOY YTIYKHK MUSRYX U SHGN MPTY CPMO MOY ZKYGWO UTVULLUXHK, UGX OHCIUKMPWASUKSE NKUWPHAL OY CUL MH U WYKMUPG SUXE, HK MOUM IKPGWY LH-UGX-LHUGX LH-UGX-LH XPX UGX LUPX MOPL UGX MOUM, UGX MOUM OYSYGY OUX NKYUMLAWWYLL UGX CUL OHGHKYX VE MOY LIYWPUS UMMYGMPHG HZ LH-UGX-LH, VAM LOYXPX GHM YBYG LYY MOY YTIYKHK, UGX HGSE GHMPWYX MOUM OY OUX NHGY VYWUALYMOY VUSS VYWUTY SPBYSPYK UZMYK OPL XYIUKMAKY. ZHK HGY HZ MOY TYKKEWHMPSSPHGL VYZHKY LAIIYK IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL UNUPG OYK IUKMGYK. OYKYTPGXYX OYK HZ MOYPK ZPKLM YGWHAGMYK PG MOY HMKUXGHY UBYGAY, UGX OHCLOY OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH LSYYI MOUM THHGSPNOM GPNOM, UGX MHSX OYK OHC OYOUX PGBHSAGMUKPSE HBYKOYUKX OYK. GUMULOU VSALOYX UM MOUM KYWHSSYWMPHGUGX MKPYX MH YDWALY OYKLYSZ, UL PZ MOYKY OUX VYYG LHTYMOPGN MH VYULOUTYX HZ PG COUM IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX HBYKOYUKX.SPRY USS TYG COH OUBY NKHCG AI PG LHWPYME, IKPGWY UGXKYC SPRYX TYYMPGNLHTYHGY MOYKY GHM HZ MOY WHGBYGMPHGUS LHWPYME LMUTI. UGX LAWO CULGUMULOU, CPMO OYK LAKIKPLY, OYK XYSPNOM, OYK LOEGYLL, UGX YBYG OYKTPLMURYL PG LIYURPGN ZKYGWO. CPMO OYK OY VYOUBYX CPMO LIYWPUS WUKY UGXMYGXYKGYLL, LPMMPGN VYLPXY OYK UGX MUSRPGN HZ MOY LPTISYLM UGX THLMAGPTIHKMUGM TUMMYKL; OY UXTPKYX OYK LOE NKUWY. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOYWHMPSSPHG, OUBPGN WHTISYMYX HGY HZ MOY ZPNAKYL, GUMULOU, LMPSS HAM HZVKYUMO, CUL KYMAKGPGN MH OYK LYUM COYG UGHMOYK XUGWYK WOHLY OYK. LOY CULMPKYX UGX IUGMPGN UGX YBPXYGMSE MOHANOM HZ XYWSPGPGN, VAM PTTYXPUMYSEIAM OYK OUGX NUPSE HG MOY TUG'L LOHASXYK, LTPSPGN UM IKPGWY UGXKYC."P'X VY NSUX MH LPM VYLPXY EHA UGX KYLM: P'T MPKYX; VAM EHA LYY OHC MOYERYYI ULRPGN TY, UGX P'T NSUX HZ PM, P'T OUIIE UGX P SHBY YBYKEVHXE, UGXEHA UGX P AGXYKLMUGX PM USS," UGX TAWO, TAWO THKY CUL LUPX PG OYK LTPSY.COYG OYK IUKMGYK SYZM OYK GUMULOU KUG UWKHLL MOY KHHT MH WOHHLY MCHSUXPYL ZHK MOY ZPNAKY."PZ LOY NHYL MH OYK WHALPG ZPKLM UGX MOYG MH UGHMOYK SUXE, LOY CPSS VYTE CPZY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH OPTLYSZ JAPMY MH OPL HCG LAKIKPLY, UL OYCUMWOYX OYK. LOY XPX NH ZPKLM MH OYK WHALPG."COUM KAVVPLO LHTYMPTYL YGMYKL HGY'L OYUX!" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, "VAMCOUM PL WYKMUPG PL MOUM MOUM NPKS PL LH WOUKTPGN, LH HKPNPGUS, MOUM LOYCHG'M VY XUGWPGN OYKY U THGMO VYZHKY LOY CPSS VY TUKKPYX.... LAWO ULLOY UKY KUKY OYKY," OY MOHANOM, UL GUMULOU, KYUXQALMPGN U KHLY MOUM CULLSPIIPGN HG OYK VHXPWY, LYMMSYX OYKLYSZ VYLPXY OPT.COYG MOY WHMPSSPHG CUL HBYK MOY HSX WHAGM PG OPL VSAY WHUM WUTY AI MHMOY XUGWYKL. OY PGBPMYX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH WHTY UGX LYY MOYT, UGX ULRYXOPL XUANOMYK COYMOYK LOY CUL YGQHEPGN OYKLYSZ. GUMULOU XPX GHM UGLCYK UMHGWY VAM HGSE SHHRYX AI CPMO U LTPSY MOUM LUPX KYIKHUWOZASSE: "OHC WUGEHA ULR LAWO U JAYLMPHG?""P OUBY GYBYK YGQHEYX TELYSZ LH TAWO VYZHKY!" LOY LUPX, UGX IKPGWYUGXKYC GHMPWYX OHC OYK MOPG UKTL KHLY JAPWRSE UL PZ MH YTVKUWY OYKZUMOYK UGX PGLMUGMSE XKHIIYX UNUPG. GUMULOU CUL OUIIPYK MOUG LOY OUXYBYK VYYG PG OYK SPZY. LOY CUL UM MOUM OYPNOM HZ VSPLL COYG HGY VYWHTYLWHTISYMYSE RPGX UGX NHHX UGX XHYL GHM VYSPYBY PG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZYBPS, AGOUIIPGYLL, HK LHKKHC.UM MOUM VUSS IPYKKY ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY ZYSM OATPSPUMYX VE MOY IHLPMPHGOPL CPZY HWWAIPYX PG WHAKM WPKWSYL. OY CUL NSHHTE UGX UVLYGM-TPGXYX. UXYYI ZAKKHC KUG UWKHLL OPL ZHKYOYUX, UGX LMUGXPGN VE U CPGXHC OY LMUKYXHBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL LYYPGN GH HGY.HG OYK CUE MH LAIIYK GUMULOU IULLYX OPT.IPYKKY'L NSHHTE, AGOUIIE SHHR LMKAWR OYK. LOY LMHIIYX PG ZKHGM HZ OPT.LOY CPLOYX MH OYSI OPT, MH VYLMHC HG OPT MOY LAIYKUVAGXUGWY HZ OYK HCGOUIIPGYLL."OHC XYSPNOMZAS PM PL, WHAGM!" LUPX LOY. "PLG'M PM?"IPYKKY LTPSYX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE, YBPXYGMSE GHM NKULIPGN COUM LOY LUPX."EYL, P UT BYKE NSUX," OY LUPX."OHC WUG IYHISY VY XPLLUMPLZPYX CPMO UGEMOPGN?" MOHANOM GUMULOU."YLIYWPUSSE LAWO U WUIPMUS ZYSSHC UL VYFAROHB!" PG GUMULOU'L YEYL USSMOY IYHISY UM MOY VUSS USPRY CYKY NHHX, RPGX, UGX LISYGXPX IYHISY,SHBPGN HGY UGHMOYK; GHGY HZ MOYT WUIUVSY HZ PGQAKPGN UGHMOYK--UGX LHMOYE HANOM USS MH VY OUIIE.WOUIMYK DBPPPGYDM XUE IKPGWY UGXKYC MOHANOM HZ MOY VUSS, VAM OPL TPGX XPX GHM XCYSSHG PM SHGN. "EYL, PM CUL U BYKE VKPSSPUGM VUSS," UGX MOYG... "EYL, MOUMSPMMSY KHLMHBU PL BYKE WOUKTPGN. MOYKY'L LHTYMOPGN ZKYLO, HKPNPGUS,AG-IYMYKLVAKN-SPRY UVHAM OYK MOUM XPLMPGNAPLOYL OYK." MOUM CUL USS OYMOHANOM UVHAM EYLMYKXUE'L VUSS, UGX UZMYK OPL THKGPGN MYU OY LYM MHCHKR.VAM YPMOYK ZKHT ZUMPNAY HK CUGM HZ LSYYI OY CUL PSS-XPLIHLYX ZHK CHKRUGX WHASX NYM GHMOPGN XHGY. OY RYIM WKPMPWPFPGN OPL HCG CHKR, UL OYHZMYG XPX, UGX CUL NSUX COYG OY OYUKX LHTYHGY WHTPGN.MOY BPLPMHK CUL VPMLRP, COH LYKBYX HG BUKPHAL WHTTPMMYYL, ZKYJAYGMYX USSMOY LHWPYMPYL PG IYMYKLVAKN, UGX U IULLPHGUMY XYBHMYY HZ MOY GYC PXYULUGX HZ LIYKUGLRP, UGX U XPSPNYGM IYMYKLVAKN GYCLTHGNYK--HGY HZ MOHLY TYGCOH WOHHLY MOYPK HIPGPHGL SPRY MOYPK WSHMOYL UWWHKXPGN MH MOY ZULOPHG,VAM COH ZHK MOUM BYKE KYULHG UIIYUK MH VY MOY CUKTYLM IUKMPLUGL. OUKXSEOUX OY NHM KPX HZ OPL OUM VYZHKY OY KUG PGMH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KHHT CPMO UIKYHWWAIPYX UPK UGX UM HGWY VYNUG MUSRPGN. OY OUX QALM OYUKX IUKMPWASUKLHZ MOUM THKGPGN'L LPMMPGN HZ MOY WHAGWPS HZ LMUMY HIYGYX VE MOY YTIYKHK,UGX OY LIHRY HZ PM YGMOALPULMPWUSSE. MOY YTIYKHK'L LIYYWO OUX VYYGYDMKUHKXPGUKE. PM OUX VYYG U LIYYWO LAWO UL HGSE WHGLMPMAMPHGUS THGUKWOLXYSPBYK. "MOY LHBYKYPNG ISUPGSE LUPX MOUM MOY WHAGWPS UGX LYGUMY UKYYLMUMYL HZ MOY KYUST, OY LUPX MOUM MOY NHBYKGTYGM TALM KYLM GHM HGUAMOHKPME VAM HG LYWAKY VULYL. MOY YTIYKHK LUPX MOUM MOY ZPLWUS LELMYTTALM VY KYHKNUGPFYX UGX MOY UWWHAGML IAVSPLOYX," KYWHAGMYX VPMLRP,YTIOULPFPGN WYKMUPG CHKXL UGX HIYGPGN OPL YEYL LPNGPZPWUGMSE."UO, EYL! MHXUE'L YBYGML TUKR UG YIHWO, MOY NKYUMYLM YIHWO PG HAKOPLMHKE," OY WHGWSAXYX.IKPGWY UGXKYC SPLMYGYX MH MOY UWWHAGM HZ MOY HIYGPGN HZ MOY WHAGWPS HZLMUMY, COPWO OY OUX LH PTIUMPYGMSE UCUPMYX UGX MH COPWO OY OUX UMMUWOYXLAWO PTIHKMUGWY, UGX CUL LAKIKPLYX MOUM MOPL YBYGM, GHC MOUM PM OUXMURYG ISUWY, XPX GHM UZZYWM OPT, UGX YBYG LYYTYX JAPMY PGLPNGPZPWUGM. OYSPLMYGYX CPMO JAPYM PKHGE MH VPMLRP'L YGMOALPULMPW UWWHAGM HZ PM. U BYKELPTISY MOHANOM HWWAKKYX MH OPT: "COUM XHYL PM TUMMYK MH TY HK MH VPMLRPCOUM MOY YTIYKHK CUL ISYULYX MH LUE UM MOY WHAGWPS? WUG USS MOUM TURY TYUGE OUIIPYK HK VYMMYK?"UGX MOPL LPTISY KYZSYWMPHG LAXXYGSE XYLMKHEYX USS MOY PGMYKYLM IKPGWYUGXKYC OUX ZYSM PG MOY PTIYGXPGN KYZHKTL. OY CUL NHPGN MH XPGY MOUMYBYGPGN UM LIYKUGLRP'L, "CPMO HGSE U ZYC ZKPYGXL," UL MOY OHLM OUX LUPXCOYG PGBPMPGN OPT. MOY IKHLIYWM HZ MOUM XPGGYK PG MOY PGMPTUMY OHTYWPKWSY HZ MOY TUG OY LH UXTPKYX OUX NKYUMSE PGMYKYLMYX IKPGWYUGXKYC, YLIYWPUSSE UL OY OUX GHM EYM LYYG LIYKUGLRP PG OPL XHTYLMPWLAKKHAGXPGNL, VAM GHC OY ZYSM XPLPGWSPGYX MH NH MH PM.UM MOY UIIHPGMYX OHAK, OHCYBYK, OY YGMYKYX MOY THXYLM OHALY LIYKUGLRPHCGYX PG MOY MUAKPXU NUKXYGL. PG MOY IUKJAYMYX XPGPGN KHHT MOPL LTUSSOHALY, KYTUKRUVSY ZHK PML YDMKYTY WSYUGSPGYLL (LANNYLMPGN MOUM HZ UTHGULMYKE), IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH CUL KUMOYK SUMY, ZHAGX MOY ZKPYGXSENUMOYKPGN HZ LIYKUGLRP'L PGMPTUMY UWJAUPGMUGWYL USKYUXE ULLYTVSYX UMZPBY H'WSHWR. MOYKY CYKY GH SUXPYL IKYLYGM YDWYIM LIYKUGLRP'L SPMMSYXUANOMYK (SHGN-ZUWYX SPRY OYK ZUMOYK) UGX OYK NHBYKGYLL. MOY HMOYKNAYLML CYKY NYKBUPL, TUNGPMLRP, UGX LMHSEIPG. COPSY LMPSS PG MOYUGMYKHHT IKPGWY UGXKYC OYUKX SHAX BHPWYL UGX U KPGNPGN LMUWWUMHSUANO--U SUANO LAWO UL HGY OYUKL HG MOY LMUNY. LHTYHGY--PM LHAGXYX SPRYLIYKUGLRP--CUL XPLMPGWMSE YQUWASUMPGN OU-OU-OU. IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX GYBYKVYZHKY OYUKX LIYKUGLRP'L ZUTHAL SUANO, UGX MOPL KPGNPGN, OPNO IPMWOYXSUANOMYK ZKHT U LMUMYLTUG TUXY U LMKUGNY PTIKYLLPHG HG OPT.OY YGMYKYX MOY XPGPGN KHHT. MOY COHSY WHTIUGE CYKY LMUGXPGN VYMCYYG MCHCPGXHCL UM U LTUSS MUVSY SUPX CPMO OHKL-X'HYABKYL. LIYKUGLRP, CYUKPGNU NKUE LCUSSHC-MUPS WHUM CPMO U LMUK HG MOY VKYULM, UGX YBPXYGMSE LMPSSMOY LUTY CUPLMWHUM UGX OPNO COPMY LMHWR OY OUX CHKG UM MOY TYYMPGN HZMOY WHAGWPS HZ LMUMY, LMHHX UM MOY MUVSY CPMO U VYUTPGN WHAGMYGUGWY. OPLNAYLML LAKKHAGXYX OPT. TUNGPMLRP, UXXKYLLPGN OPTLYSZ MH LIYKUGLRP, CULKYSUMPGN UG UGYWXHMY, UGX LIYKUGLRP CUL SUANOPGN PG UXBUGWY UM COUMTUNGPMLRP CUL NHPGN MH LUE. COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC YGMYKYX MOY KHHTTUNGPMLRP'L CHKXL CYKY UNUPG WKHCGYX VE SUANOMYK. LMHSEIPG NUBY U XYYIVULL NAZZUC UL OY TAGWOYX U IPYWY HZ VKYUX UGX WOYYLY. NYKBUPL SUANOYXLHZMSE CPMO U OPLLPGN WOAWRSY, UGX LIYKUGLRP PG U OPNO-IPMWOYX LMUWWUMHTUGGYK.LMPSS SUANOPGN, LIYKUGLRP OYSX HAM OPL LHZM COPMY OUGX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC."BYKE ISYULYX MH LYY EHA, IKPGWY," OY LUPX. "HGY THTYGM..." OY CYGM HG,MAKGPGN MH TUNGPMLRP UGX PGMYKKAIMPGN OPL LMHKE. "CY OUBY UNKYYX MOUMMOPL PL U XPGGYK ZHK KYWKYUMPHG, CPMO GHM U CHKX UVHAM VALPGYLL!" UGXMAKGPGN UNUPG MH MOY GUKKUMHK OY VYNUG MH SUANO UZKYLO.IKPGWY UGXKYC SHHRYX UM MOY SUANOPGN LIYKUGLRP CPMO ULMHGPLOTYGM,KYNKYM, UGX XPLPSSALPHGTYGM. PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM MOPL CUL GHMLIYKUGLRP VAM LHTYHGY YSLY. YBYKEMOPGN MOUM OUX ZHKTYKSE UIIYUKYXTELMYKPHAL UGX ZULWPGUMPGN PG LIYKUGLRP LAXXYGSE VYWUTY ISUPG UGXAGUMMKUWMPBY.UM XPGGYK MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG XPX GHM WYULY ZHK U THTYGM UGX LYYTYX MHWHGLPLM HZ MOY WHGMYGML HZ U VHHR HZ ZAGGE UGYWXHMYL. VYZHKY TUNGPMLRPOUX ZPGPLOYX OPL LMHKE LHTYHGY YSLY CUL UGDPHAL MH KYSUMY LHTYMOPGNLMPSS ZAGGPYK. THLM HZ MOY UGYWXHMYL, PZ GHM KYSUMPGN MH MOY LMUMYLYKBPWY, KYSUMYX MH IYHISY PG MOY LYKBPWY. PM LYYTYX MOUM PG MOPLWHTIUGE MOY PGLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOHLY IYHISY CUL LH XYZPGPMYSE UWWYIMYXMOUM MOY HGSE IHLLPVSY UMMPMAXY MHCUKX MOYT CUL HGY HZ NHHX OATHKYXKPXPWASY. LIYKUGLRP KYSUMYX OHC UM MOY WHAGWPS MOUM THKGPGN U XYUZXPNGPMUKE, COYG ULRYX OPL HIPGPHG, KYISPYX MOUM OY MOHANOM LH MHH.NYKBUPL NUBY U SHGN UWWHAGM HZ UG HZZPWPUS KYBPLPHG, KYTUKRUVSY ZHK MOYLMAIPXPME HZ YBYKEVHXE WHGWYKGYX. LMHSEIPG, LMAMMYKPGN, VKHRY PGMH MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG UGX VYNUG YDWPMYXSE MUSRPGN HZ MOY UVALYL MOUM YDPLMYXAGXYK MOY ZHKTYK HKXYK HZ MOPGNL--MOKYUMYGPGN MH NPBY U LYKPHAL MAKGMH MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG. TUNGPMLRP LMUKMPGN JAPFFPGN LMHSEIPG UVHAM OPLBYOYTYGWY. NYKBUPL PGMYKBYGYX CPMO U QHRY, UGX MOY MUSR KYBYKMYX MH PMLZHKTYK SPBYSE MHGY.YBPXYGMSE LIYKUGLRP SPRYX MH KYLM UZMYK OPL SUVHKL UGX ZPGX UTALYTYGMPG U WPKWSY HZ ZKPYGXL, UGX OPL NAYLML, AGXYKLMUGXPGN OPL CPLO, MKPYXMH YGSPBYG OPT UGX UTALY MOYTLYSBYL. VAM MOYPK NUPYME LYYTYX MH IKPGWYUGXKYC TPKMOSYLL UGX MPKYLHTY. LIYKUGLRP'L OPNO-IPMWOYX BHPWY LMKAWROPT AGISYULUGMSE, UGX MOY PGWYLLUGM SUANOMYK NKUMYX HG OPT SPRY U ZUSLYGHMY. IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM SUANO UGX ZYUKYX MOUM OY CHASX VY U XUTIYKHG MOY LIPKPML HZ MOY WHTIUGE, VAM GH HGY MHHR UGE GHMPWY HZ OPL VYPGNHAM HZ OUKTHGE CPMO MOY NYGYKUS THHX. MOYE USS LYYTYX BYKE NUE.OY MKPYX LYBYKUS MPTYL MH QHPG PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, VAM OPL KYTUKRL CYKYMHLLYX ULPXY YUWO MPTY SPRY U WHKR MOKHCG HAM HZ MOY CUMYK, UGX OY WHASXGHM QYLM CPMO MOYT.MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN CKHGN HK AGLYYTSE PG COUM MOYE LUPX, PM CUL CPMME UGXTPNOM OUBY VYYG ZAGGE, VAM PM SUWRYX QALM MOUM LHTYMOPGN COPWO PL MOYLUSM HZ TPKMO, UGX MOYE CYKY GHM YBYG UCUKY MOUM LAWO U MOPGN YDPLMYX.UZMYK XPGGYK LIYKUGLRP'L XUANOMYK UGX OYK NHBYKGYLL KHLY. OY IUMMYX MOYSPMMSY NPKS CPMO OPL COPMY OUGX UGX RPLLYX OYK. UGX MOUM NYLMAKY, MHH,LYYTYX AGGUMAKUS MH IKPGWY UGXKYC.MOY TYG KYTUPGYX UM MUVSY HBYK MOYPK IHKM--YGNSPLO ZULOPHG. PG MOY TPXLMHZ U WHGBYKLUMPHG MOUM CUL LMUKMYX UVHAM GUIHSYHG'L LIUGPLO UZZUPKL,COPWO MOYE USS UNKYYX PG UIIKHBPGN, IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MH YDIKYLL UWHGMKUKE HIPGPHG. LIYKUGLRP LTPSYX UGX, CPMO UG YBPXYGM CPLO MH IKYBYGMMOY WHGBYKLUMPHG ZKHT MURPGN UG AGISYULUGM WHAKLY, MHSX U LMHKE MOUM OUXGH WHGGYWMPHG CPMO MOY IKYBPHAL WHGBYKLUMPHG. ZHK U ZYC THTYGML USS CYKYLPSYGM.OUBPGN LUM LHTY MPTY UM MUVSY, LIYKUGLRP WHKRYX U VHMMSY HZ CPGY UGX,KYTUKRPGN, "GHCUXUEL NHHX CPGY KPXYL PG U WUKKPUNY UGX IUPK," IULLYX PMMH MOY LYKBUGM UGX NHM AI. USS KHLY UGX WHGMPGAPGN MH MUSR SHAXSE CYGMPGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. MCH SYMMYKL VKHANOM VE U WHAKPYK CYKY OUGXYX MHLIYKUGLRP UGX OY MHHR MOYT MH OPL LMAXE. UL LHHG UL OY OUX SYZM MOY KHHTMOY NYGYKUS TYKKPTYGM LMHIIYX UGX MOY NAYLML VYNUG MH WHGBYKLY LYGLPVSEUGX JAPYMSE CPMO HGY UGHMOYK."GHC ZHK MOY KYWPMUMPHG!" LUPX LIYKUGLRP HG KYMAKGPGN ZKHT OPL LMAXE. "UCHGXYKZAS MUSYGM!" OY LUPX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX TUNGPMLRP PTTYXPUMYSEULLATYX U IHLY UGX VYNUG KYWPMPGN LHTY OATHKHAL BYKLYL PG ZKYGWO COPWOOY OUX WHTIHLYX UVHAM BUKPHAL CYSS-RGHCG IYMYKLVAKN IYHISY. OY CULPGMYKKAIMYX LYBYKUS MPTYL VE UIISUALY. COYG MOY BYKLYL CYKY ZPGPLOYXIKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM AI MH LIYKUGLRP UGX MHHR OPL SYUBY."COYKY UKY EHA HZZ MH LH YUKSE?" ULRYX LIYKUGLRP."P IKHTPLYX MH NH MH U KYWYIMPHG."MOYE LUPX GH THKY. IKPGWY UGXKYC SHHRYX WSHLYSE PGMH MOHLY TPKKHKSPRY,PTIYGYMKUVSY YEYL, UGX ZYSM MOUM PM OUX VYYG KPXPWASHAL HZ OPT MH OUBYYDIYWMYX UGEMOPGN ZKHT LIYKUGLRP UGX ZKHT UGE HZ OPL HCG UWMPBPMPYLWHGGYWMYX CPMO OPT, HK YBYK MH OUBY UMMKPVAMYX PTIHKMUGWY MH COUMLIYKUGLRP CUL XHPGN. MOUM IKYWPLY, TPKMOSYLL SUANOMYK KUGN PG IKPGWYUGXKYC'L YUKL SHGN UZMYK OY OUX SYZM MOY OHALY.COYG OY KYUWOYX OHTY IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MOPGRPGN HZ OPL SPZY PGIYMYKLVAKN XAKPGN MOHLY SULM ZHAK THGMOL UL PZ PM CYKY LHTYMOPGN GYC. OYKYWUSSYX OPL YDYKMPHGL UGX LHSPWPMUMPHGL, UGX MOY OPLMHKE HZ OPL IKHQYWMHZ UKTE KYZHKT, COPWO OUX VYYG UWWYIMYX ZHK WHGLPXYKUMPHG UGX COPWO MOYECYKY MKEPGN MH IULL HBYK PG LPSYGWY LPTISE VYWUALY UGHMOYK, U BYKE IHHKHGY, OUX USKYUXE VYYG IKYIUKYX UGX LAVTPMMYX MH MOY YTIYKHK. OY MOHANOMHZ MOY TYYMPGNL HZ U WHTTPMMYY HZ COPWO VYKN CUL U TYTVYK. OY KYTYTVYKYXOHC WUKYZASSE UGX UM COUM SYGNMO YBYKEMOPGN KYSUMPGN MH ZHKT UGXIKHWYXAKY CUL XPLWALLYX UM MOHLY TYYMPGNL, UGX OHC LYXASHALSE UGXIKHTIMSE USS MOUM KYSUMYX MH MOY NPLM HZ MOY VALPGYLL CUL YBUXYX. OYKYWUSSYX OPL SUVHKL HG MOY SYNUS WHXY, UGX OHC IUPGLMURPGNSE OY OUXMKUGLSUMYX MOY UKMPWSYL HZ MOY KHTUG UGX ZKYGWO WHXYL PGMH KALLPUG,UGX OY ZYSM ULOUTYX HZ OPTLYSZ. MOYG OY BPBPXSE IPWMAKYX MH OPTLYSZVHNAWOUKHBH, OPL HWWAIUMPHGL PG MOY WHAGMKE, OPL QHAKGYE MH KEUFUG;OY KYTYTVYKYX MOY IYULUGML UGX XKHG MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK, UGX TYGMUSSEUIISEPGN MH MOYT MOY IYKLHGUS KPNOML OY OUX XPBPXYX PGMH IUKUNKUIOL, OYZYSM ULMHGPLOYX MOUM OY WHASX OUBY LIYGM LH TAWO MPTY HG LAWO ALYSYLLCHKR.WOUIMYK DPDGYDM XUE IKPGWY UGXKYC WUSSYX UM U ZYC OHALYL OY OUX GHM BPLPMYX VYZHKY,UGX UTHGN MOYT UM MOY KHLMHBL' CPMO COHT OY OUX KYGYCYX UWJAUPGMUGWYUM MOY VUSS. UIUKM ZKHT WHGLPXYKUMPHGL HZ IHSPMYGYLL COPWO XYTUGXYX MOYWUSS, OY CUGMYX MH LYY MOUM HKPNPGUS, YUNYK NPKS COH OUX SYZM LAWO UISYULUGM PTIKYLLPHG HG OPL TPGX, PG OYK HCG OHTY.GUMULOU CUL HGY HZ MOY ZPKLM MH TYYM OPT. LOY CUL CYUKPGN U XUKR-VSAYOHALY XKYLL PG COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC MOHANOM OYK YBYG IKYMMPYK MOUG PG OYKVUSS XKYLL. LOY UGX USS MOY KHLMHB ZUTPSE CYSWHTYX OPT UL UG HSX ZKPYGX,LPTISE UGX WHKXPUSSE. MOY COHSY ZUTPSE, COHT OY OUX ZHKTYKSE QAXNYXLYBYKYSE, GHC LYYTYX MH OPT MH WHGLPLM HZ YDWYSSYGM, LPTISY, UGX RPGXSEIYHISY. MOY HSX WHAGM'L OHLIPMUSPME UGX NHHX GUMAKY, COPWO LMKAWR HGYYLIYWPUSSE PG IYMYKLVAKN UL U ISYULUGM LAKIKPLY, CYKY LAWO MOUM IKPGWYUGXKYC WHASX GHM KYZALY MH LMUE MH XPGGYK. "EYL," OY MOHANOM, "MOYEUKY WUIPMUS IYHISY, COH HZ WHAKLY OUBY GHM MOY LSPNOMYLM PXYU COUM UMKYULAKY MOYE IHLLYLL PG GUMULOU; VAM MOYE UKY RPGXSE ZHSR UGX ZHKTMOY VYLM IHLLPVSY LYMMPGN ZHK MOPL LMKPRPGNSE IHYMPW, WOUKTPGN NPKS,HBYKZSHCPGN CPMO SPZY!"PG GUMULOU IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL WHGLWPHAL HZ U LMKUGNY CHKSX WHTISYMYSEUSPYG MH OPT UGX VKPTZAS HZ QHEL AGRGHCG MH OPT, U XPZZYKYGM CHKSX,MOUM PG MOY HMKUXGHY UBYGAY UGX UM MOY CPGXHC MOUM THHGSPNOM GPNOM OUXUSKYUXE VYNAG MH XPLWHGWYKM OPT. GHC MOPL CHKSX XPLWHGWYKMYX OPT GHSHGNYK UGX CUL GH SHGNYK USPYG MH OPT, VAM OY OPTLYSZ OUBPGN YGMYKYX PMZHAGX PG PM U GYC YGQHETYGM.UZMYK XPGGYK GUMULOU, UM IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYJAYLM, CYGM MH MOY WSUBPWOHKXUGX VYNUG LPGNPGN. IKPGWY UGXKYC LMHHX VE U CPGXHC MUSRPGN MH MOY SUXPYLUGX SPLMYGYX MH OYK. PG MOY TPXLM HZ U IOKULY OY WYULYX LIYURPGN UGXLAXXYGSE ZYSM MYUKL WOHRPGN OPT, U MOPGN OY OUX MOHANOM PTIHLLPVSY ZHKOPT. OY SHHRYX UM GUMULOU UL LOY LUGN, UGX LHTYMOPGN GYC UGX QHEZASLMPKKYX PG OPL LHAS. OY ZYSM OUIIE UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY LUX. OY OUXUVLHSAMYSE GHMOPGN MH CYYI UVHAM EYM OY CUL KYUXE MH CYYI. COUM UVHAM?OPL ZHKTYK SHBY? MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL? OPL XPLPSSALPHGTYGML?... OPL OHIYLZHK MOY ZAMAKY?... EYL UGX GH. MOY WOPYZ KYULHG CUL U LAXXYG, BPBPXLYGLY HZ MOY MYKKPVSY WHGMKULM VYMCYYG LHTYMOPGN PGZPGPMYSE NKYUM UGXPSSPTPMUVSY CPMOPG OPT UGX MOUM SPTPMYX UGX TUMYKPUS LHTYMOPGN MOUM OY,UGX YBYG LOY, CUL. MOPL WHGMKULM CYPNOYX HG UGX EYM WOYYKYX OPT COPSYLOY LUGN.UL LHHG UL GUMULOU OUX ZPGPLOYX LOY CYGM AI MH OPT UGX ULRYX OHC OYSPRYX OYK BHPWY. LOY ULRYX MOPL UGX MOYG VYWUTY WHGZALYX, ZYYSPGN MOUMLOY HANOM GHM MH OUBY ULRYX PM. OY LTPSYX, SHHRPGN UM OYK, UGX LUPX OYSPRYX OYK LPGNPGN UL OY SPRYX YBYKEMOPGN LOY XPX.IKPGWY UGXKYC SYZM MOY KHLMHBL' SUMY PG MOY YBYGPGN. OY CYGM MH VYX ZKHTOUVPM, VAM LHHG KYUSPFYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM LSYYI. OUBPGN SPM OPL WUGXSYOY LUM AI PG VYX, MOYG NHM AI, MOYG SUE XHCG UNUPG GHM UM USS MKHAVSYXVE OPL LSYYISYLLGYLL: OPL LHAS CUL UL ZKYLO UGX QHEZAS UL PZ OY OUXLMYIIYX HAM HZ U LMAZZE KHHT PGMH NHX'L HCG ZKYLO UPK. PM XPX GHM YGMYKOPL OYUX MOUM OY CUL PG SHBY CPMO GUMULOU; OY CUL GHM MOPGRPGN UVHAMOYK, VAM HGSE IPWMAKPGN OYK MH OPTLYSZ, UGX PG WHGLYJAYGWY USS SPZYUIIYUKYX PG U GYC SPNOM. "COE XH P LMKPBY, COE XH P MHPS PG MOPL GUKKHC,WHGZPGYX ZKUTY, COYG SPZY, USS SPZY CPMO USS PML QHEL, PL HIYG MH TY?"LUPX OY MH OPTLYSZ. UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY ZHK U BYKE SHGN COPSY OYVYNUG TURPGN OUIIE ISUGL ZHK MOY ZAMAKY. OY XYWPXYX MOUM OY TALM UMMYGXMH OPL LHG'L YXAWUMPHG VE ZPGXPGN U MAMHK UGX IAMMPGN MOY VHE PG OPLWOUKNY, MOYG OY HANOM MH KYMPKY ZKHT MOY LYKBPWY UGX NH UVKHUX, UGX LYYYGNSUGX, LCPMFYKSUGX UGX PMUSE. "P TALM ALY TE ZKYYXHT COPSY P ZYYS LHTAWO LMKYGNMO UGX EHAMO PG TY," OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ. "IPYKKY CUL KPNOMCOYG OY LUPX HGY TALM VYSPYBY PG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ OUIIPGYLL PG HKXYKMH VY OUIIE, UGX GHC P XH VYSPYBY PG PM. SYM MOY XYUX VAKE MOYPK XYUX,VAM COPSY HGY OUL SPZY HGY TALM SPBY UGX VY OUIIE!" MOHANOM OY.WOUIMYK DDHGY THKGPGN WHSHGYS VYKN, COHT IPYKKY RGYC UL OY RGYC YBYKEVHXE PGTHLWHC UGX IYMYKLVAKN, WUTY MH LYY OPT. VYKN UKKPBYX PG UG PTTUWASUMYVKUGX-GYC AGPZHKT, CPMO OPL OUPK IHTUXYX UGX VKALOYX ZHKCUKX HBYK OPLMYTISYL UL MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK CHKY OPL OUPK."P OUBY QALM VYYG MH LYY MOY WHAGMYLL, EHAK CPZY. AGZHKMAGUMYSE LOYWHASX GHM NKUGM TE KYJAYLM, VAM P OHIY, WHAGM, P LOUSS VY THKY ZHKMAGUMYCPMO EHA," OY LUPX CPMO U LTPSY."COUM PL PM EHA CPLO, WHSHGYS? P UT UM EHAK LYKBPWY.""P OUBY GHC JAPMY LYMMSYX PG TE GYC KHHTL, WHAGM" (VYKN LUPX MOPL CPMOIYKZYWM WHGBPWMPHG MOUM MOPL PGZHKTUMPHG WHASX GHM VAM VY UNKYYUVSY),"UGX LH P CPLO MH UKKUGNY QALM U LTUSS IUKME ZHK TE HCG UGX TE CPZY'LZKPYGXL." (OY LTPSYX LMPSS THKY ISYULUGMSE.) "P CPLOYX MH ULR MOYWHAGMYLL UGX EHA MH XH TY MOY OHGHK HZ WHTPGN MH MYU UGX MH LAIIYK."HGSE WHAGMYLL OYSYGY, WHGLPXYKPGN MOY LHWPYME HZ LAWO IYHISY UL MOYVYKNL VYGYUMO OYK, WHASX VY WKAYS YGHANO MH KYZALY LAWO UG PGBPMUMPHG.VYKN YDISUPGYX LH WSYUKSE COE OY CUGMYX MH WHSSYWM UM OPL OHALY U LTUSSVAM LYSYWM WHTIUGE, UGX COE MOPL CHASX NPBY OPT ISYULAKY, UGX COE MOHANOOY NKAXNYX LIYGXPGN THGYE HG WUKXL HK UGEMOPGN OUKTZAS, OY CUL IKYIUKYXMH KAG PGMH LHTY YDIYGLY ZHK MOY LURY HZ NHHX LHWPYME--MOUM IPYKKY WHASXGHM KYZALY, UGX IKHTPLYX MH WHTY."VAM XHG'M VY SUMY, WHAGM, PZ P TUE BYGMAKY MH ULR; UVHAM MYG TPGAMYL MHYPNOM, ISYULY. CY LOUSS TURY AI U KAVVYK. HAK NYGYKUS PL WHTPGN. OYPL BYKE NHHX MH TY. CY LOUSS OUBY LAIIYK, WHAGM. LH EHA CPSS XH TY MOYZUBHK."WHGMKUKE MH OPL OUVPM HZ VYPGN SUMY, IPYKKY HG MOUM XUE UKKPBYX UM MOYVYKNL' OHALY, GHM UM MYG VAM UM ZPZMYYG TPGAMYL MH YPNOM.OUBPGN IKYIUKYX YBYKEMOPGN GYWYLLUKE ZHK MOY IUKME, MOY VYKNL CYKY KYUXEZHK MOYPK NAYLML' UKKPBUS.PG MOYPK GYC, WSYUG, UGX SPNOM LMAXE CPMO PML LTUSS VALML UGX IPWMAKYLUGX GYC ZAKGPMAKY LUM VYKN UGX OPL CPZY. VYKN, WSHLYSE VAMMHGYX AI PGOPL GYC AGPZHKT, LUM VYLPXY OPL CPZY YDISUPGPGN MH OYK MOUM HGY USCUELWHASX UGX LOHASX VY UWJAUPGMYX CPMO IYHISY UVHBY HGY, VYWUALY HGSE MOYGXHYL HGY NYM LUMPLZUWMPHG ZKHT UWJAUPGMUGWYL."EHA WUG NYM MH RGHC LHTYMOPGN, EHA WUG ULR ZHK LHTYMOPGN. LYY OHC PTUGUNYX ZKHT TE ZPKLM IKHTHMPHG." (VYKN TYULAKYX OPL SPZY GHM VE EYUKLVAM VE IKHTHMPHGL.) "TE WHTKUXYL UKY LMPSS GHVHXPYL, COPSY P UT HGSECUPMPGN ZHK U BUWUGWE MH WHTTUGX U KYNPTYGM, UGX OUBY MOY OUIIPGYLL MHVY EHAK OALVUGX." (OY KHLY UGX RPLLYX BYKU'L OUGX, UGX HG MOY CUE MHOYK LMKUPNOMYGYX HAM U MAKGYX-AI WHKGYK HZ MOY WUKIYM.) "UGX OHC OUBY PHVMUPGYX USS MOPL? WOPYZSE VE RGHCPGN OHC MH WOHHLY TE UJAUPGMUGWYL. PMNHYL CPMOHAM LUEPGN MOUM HGY TALM VY WHGLWPYGMPHAL UGX TYMOHXPWUS."VYKN LTPSYX CPMO U LYGLY HZ OPL LAIYKPHKPME HBYK U CYUR CHTUG, UGXIUALYX, KYZSYWMPGN MOUM MOPL XYUK CPZY HZ OPL CUL UZMYK USS VAM U CYURCHTUG COH WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX USS MOUM WHGLMPMAMYL U TUG'L XPNGPME,COUM PM CUL YPG TUGG FA LYPG. * BYKU UM MOY LUTY MPTY LTPSPGN CPMO ULYGLY HZ LAIYKPHKPME HBYK OYK NHHX, WHGLWPYGMPHAL OALVUGX, COH USS MOYLUTY AGXYKLMHHX SPZY CKHGNSE, UL UWWHKXPGN MH BYKU USS TYG XPX. VYKN,QAXNPGN VE OPL CPZY, MOHANOM USS CHTYG CYUR UGX ZHHSPLO. BYKU, QAXNPGNHGSE VE OYK OALVUGX UGX NYGYKUSPFPGN ZKHT MOUM HVLYKBUMPHG, LAIIHLYXMOUM USS TYG, MOHANO MOYE AGXYKLMUGX GHMOPGN UGX UKY WHGWYPMYX UGXLYSZPLO, ULWKPVY WHTTHG LYGLY MH MOYTLYSBYL USHGY.    * MH VY U TUG.VYKN KHLY UGX YTVKUWYX OPL CPZY WUKYZASSE, LH UL GHM MH WKALO OYK SUWYZPWOA ZHK COPWO OY OUX IUPX U NHHX IKPWY, RPLLPGN OYK LMKUPNOM HG MOYSPIL."MOY HGSE MOPGN PL, CY TALMG'M OUBY WOPSXKYG MHH LHHG," OY WHGMPGAYX,ZHSSHCPGN UG AGWHGLWPHAL LYJAYGWY HZ PXYUL."EYL," UGLCYKYX BYKU, "P XHG'M UM USS CUGM MOUM. CY TALM SPBY ZHKLHWPYME.""IKPGWYLL EALAIHBU CHKY HGY YDUWMSE SPRY MOPL," LUPX VYKN, IHPGMPGN MHMOY ZPWOA CPMO U OUIIE UGX RPGXSE LTPSY.QALM MOYG WHAGM VYFAROHB CUL UGGHAGWYX. OALVUGX UGX CPZY NSUGWYX UM HGYUGHMOYK, VHMO LTPSPGN CPMO LYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG, UGX YUWO TYGMUSSE WSUPTPGNMOY OHGHK HZ MOPL BPLPM."MOPL PL COUM WHTYL HZ RGHCPGN OHC MH TURY UWJAUPGMUGWYL," MOHANOM VYKN."MOPL PL COUM WHTYL HZ RGHCPGN OHC MH WHGXAWM HGYLYSZ.""VAM ISYULY XHG'M PGMYKKAIM TY COYG P UT YGMYKMUPGPGN MOY NAYLML," LUPXBYKU, "VYWUALY P RGHC COUM PGMYKYLML YUWO HZ MOYT UGX COUM MH LUE MHXPZZYKYGM IYHISY."VYKN LTPSYX UNUPG."PM WUG'M VY OYSIYX: TYG TALM LHTYMPTYL OUBY TULWASPGY WHGBYKLUMPHG,"LUPX OY.MOYE KYWYPBYX IPYKKY PG MOYPK LTUSS, GYC XKUCPGN-KHHT, COYKY PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH LPM XHCG UGECOYKY CPMOHAM XPLMAKVPGN PML LETTYMKE,GYUMGYLL, UGX HKXYK; LH PM CUL JAPMY WHTIKYOYGLPVSY UGX GHM LMKUGNY MOUMVYKN, OUBPGN NYGYKHALSE HZZYKYX MH XPLMAKV MOY LETTYMKE HZ UG UKTWOUPKHK HZ MOY LHZU ZHK OPL XYUK NAYLM, VAM VYPGN UIIUKYGMSE IUPGZASSEAGXYWPXYX HG MOY TUMMYK OPTLYSZ, YBYGMAUSSE SYZM MOY BPLPMHK MH LYMMSYMOY JAYLMPHG HZ LYSYWMPHG. IPYKKY XPLMAKVYX MOY LETTYMKE VE THBPGN UWOUPK ZHK OPTLYSZ, UGX VYKN UGX BYKU PTTYXPUMYSE VYNUG MOYPK YBYGPGNIUKME, PGMYKKAIMPGN YUWO HMOYK PG MOYPK YZZHKML MH YGMYKMUPG MOYPKNAYLM.BYKU, OUBPGN XYWPXYX PG OYK HCG TPGX MOUM IPYKKY HANOM MH VY YGMYKMUPGYXCPMO WHGBYKLUMPHG UVHAM MOY ZKYGWO YTVULLE, UM HGWY VYNUG UWWHKXPGNSE.VYKN, OUBPGN XYWPXYX MOUM TULWASPGY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL KYJAPKYX,PGMYKKAIMYX OPL CPZY'L KYTUKRL UGX MHAWOYX HG MOY JAYLMPHG HZ MOY CUKCPMO UALMKPU, UGX AGWHGLWPHALSE QATIYX ZKHT MOY NYGYKUS LAVQYWM MHIYKLHGUS WHGLPXYKUMPHGL UL MH MOY IKHIHLUSL TUXY OPT MH MURY IUKM PG MOYUALMKPUG WUTIUPNG UGX MOY KYULHGL COE OY OUX XYWSPGYX MOYT. MOHANO MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG CUL BYKE PGWHOYKYGM UGX BYKU CUL UGNKE UM MOY PGMKALPHGHZ MOY TULWASPGY YSYTYGM, VHMO OALVUGX UGX CPZY ZYSM CPMO LUMPLZUWMPHGMOUM, YBYG PZ HGSE HGY NAYLM CUL IKYLYGM, MOYPK YBYGPGN OUX VYNAG BYKECYSS UGX CUL UL SPRY UL MCH IYUL MH YBYKE HMOYK YBYGPGN IUKME CPMO PMLMUSR, MYU, UGX SPNOMYX WUGXSYL.VYZHKY SHGN VHKPL, VYKN'L HSX WHTKUXY, UKKPBYX. MOYKY CUL U LOUXY HZWHGXYLWYGLPHG UGX IUMKHGUNY PG OPL MKYUMTYGM HZ VYKN UGX BYKU. UZMYKVHKPL WUTY U SUXE CPMO MOY WHSHGYS, MOYG MOY NYGYKUS OPTLYSZ, MOYG MOYKHLMHBL, UGX MOY IUKME VYWUTY AGJAYLMPHGUVSE YDUWMSE SPRY USS HMOYKYBYGPGN IUKMPYL. VYKN UGX BYKU WHASX GHM KYIKYLL MOYPK LTPSYL HZLUMPLZUWMPHG UM MOY LPNOM HZ USS MOPL THBYTYGM PG MOYPK XKUCPGN KHHT,UM MOY LHAGX HZ MOY XPLWHGGYWMYX MUSR, MOY KALMSPGN HZ XKYLLYL, UGX MOYVHCPGN UGX LWKUIPGN. YBYKEMOPGN CUL QALM UL YBYKEVHXE USCUEL OUL PM,YLIYWPUSSE LH MOY NYGYKUS, COH UXTPKYX MOY UIUKMTYGM, IUMMYX VYKN HG MOYLOHASXYK, UGX CPMO IUKYGMUS UAMOHKPME LAIYKPGMYGXYX MOY LYMMPGN HAM HZMOY MUVSY ZHK VHLMHG. MOY NYGYKUS LUM XHCG VE WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, COH CULGYDM MH OPTLYSZ MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM NAYLM. MOY HSX IYHISY LUM CPMO MOYHSX, MOY EHAGN CPMO MOY EHAGN, UGX MOY OHLMYLL UM MOY MYU MUVSY, HGCOPWO LMHHX YDUWMSE MOY LUTY RPGX HZ WURYL PG U LPSBYK WURY VULRYM ULMOY IUGPGL OUX UM MOYPK IUKME. YBYKEMOPGN CUL QALM UL PM CUL YBYKECOYKYYSLY.WOUIMYK DDPIPYKKY, UL HGY HZ MOY IKPGWPIUS NAYLML, OUX MH LPM XHCG MH VHLMHGCPMO WHAGM KHLMHB, MOY NYGYKUS, UGX MOY WHSHGYS. UM MOY WUKX MUVSY OYOUIIYGYX MH VY XPKYWMSE ZUWPGN GUMULOU, UGX CUL LMKAWR VE U WAKPHALWOUGNY MOUM OUX WHTY HBYK OYK LPGWY MOY VUSS. LOY CUL LPSYGM, UGX GHMHGSE SYLL IKYMME MOUG UM MOY VUSS, VAM HGSE KYXYYTYX ZKHT ISUPGGYLL VEOYK SHHR HZ NYGMSY PGXPZZYKYGWY MH YBYKEMOPGN UKHAGX."COUM'L MOY TUMMYK CPMO OYK?" MOHANOM IPYKKY, NSUGWPGN UM OYK. LOY CULLPMMPGN VE OYK LPLMYK UM MOY MYU MUVSY, UGX KYSAWMUGMSE, CPMOHAM SHHRPGNUM OPT, TUXY LHTY KYISE MH VHKPL COH LUM XHCG VYLPXY OYK. UZMYK ISUEPGNHAM U COHSY LAPM UGX MH OPL IUKMGYK'L XYSPNOM MURPGN ZPBY MKPWRL,IPYKKY, OYUKPGN NKYYMPGNL UGX MOY LMYIL HZ LHTYHGY COH OUX YGMYKYX MOYKHHT COPSY OY CUL IPWRPGN AI OPL MKPWRL, NSUGWYX UNUPG UM GUMULOU."COUM OUL OUIIYGYX MH OYK?" OY ULRYX OPTLYSZ CPMO LMPSS NKYUMYKLAKIKPLY.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LMUGXPGN VYZHKY OYK, LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OYK CPMO USHHR HZ MYGXYK LHSPWPMAXY. LOY, OUBPGN KUPLYX OYK OYUX, CUL SHHRPGN AIUM OPT, ZSALOYX UGX YBPXYGMSE MKEPGN MH TULMYK OYK KUIPX VKYUMOPGN. UGXMOY VKPNOM NSHC HZ LHTY PGGYK ZPKY MOUM OUX VYYG LAIIKYLLYX CUL UNUPGUSPNOM PG OYK. LOY CUL WHTISYMYSE MKUGLZHKTYX UGX ZKHT U ISUPG NPKS OUXUNUPG VYWHTY COUM LOY OUX VYYG UM MOY VUSS.IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM AI MH IPYKKY, UGX MOY SUMMYK GHMPWYX U GYC UGXEHAMOZAS YDIKYLLPHG PG OPL ZKPYGX'L ZUWY.IPYKKY WOUGNYX ISUWYL LYBYKUS MPTYL XAKPGN MOY NUTY, LPMMPGN GHC CPMOOPL VUWR MH GUMULOU UGX GHC ZUWPGN OYK, VAM XAKPGN MOY COHSY HZ MOY LPDKAVVYKL OY CUMWOYX OYK UGX OPL ZKPYGX."LHTYMOPGN BYKE PTIHKMUGM PL OUIIYGPGN VYMCYYG MOYT," MOHANOM IPYKKY,UGX U ZYYSPGN MOUM CUL VHMO QHEZAS UGX IUPGZAS UNPMUMYX OPT UGX TUXY OPTGYNSYWM MOY NUTY.UZMYK LPD KAVVYKL MOY NYGYKUS NHM AI, LUEPGN MOUM PM CUL GH ALY ISUEPGNSPRY MOUM, UGX IPYKKY CUL KYSYULYX. GUMULOU HG HGY LPXY CUL MUSRPGN CPMOLHGEU UGX VHKPL, UGX BYKU CPMO U LAVMSY LTPSY CUL LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN MHIKPGWY UGXKYC. IPYKKY CYGM AI MH OPL ZKPYGX UGX, ULRPGN COYMOYK MOYECYKY MUSRPGN LYWKYML, LUM XHCG VYLPXY MOYT. BYKU, OUBPGN GHMPWYX IKPGWYUGXKYC'L UMMYGMPHGL MH GUMULOU, XYWPXYX MOUM UM U IUKME, U KYUS YBYGPGNIUKME, LAVMSY USSALPHGL MH MOY MYGXYK IULLPHG CYKY UVLHSAMYSE GYWYLLUKEUGX, LYPFPGN U THTYGM COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL USHGY, VYNUG U WHGBYKLUMPHGCPMO OPT UVHAM ZYYSPGNL PG NYGYKUS UGX UVHAM OYK LPLMYK. CPMO LHPGMYSSYWMAUS U NAYLM UL LOY WHGLPXYKYX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH VY, LOY ZYSMMOUM LOY OUX MH YTISHE OYK XPISHTUMPW MUWM.COYG IPYKKY CYGM AI MH MOYT OY GHMPWYX MOUM BYKU CUL VYPGN WUKKPYX UCUEVE OYK LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX MUSR, VAM MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC LYYTYX YTVUKKULLYX, UMOPGN MOUM KUKYSE OUIIYGYX CPMO OPT."COUM XH EHA MOPGR?" BYKU CUL LUEPGN CPMO UG UKWO LTPSY. "EHA UKY LHXPLWYKGPGN, IKPGWY, UGX AGXYKLMUGX IYHISY'L WOUKUWMYKL LH CYSS UM UNSUGWY. COUM XH EHA MOPGR HZ GUMUSPY? WHASX LOY VY WHGLMUGM PG OYKUMMUWOTYGML? WHASX LOY, SPRY HMOYK CHTYG" (BYKU TYUGM OYKLYSZ), "SHBY UTUG HGWY ZHK USS UGX KYTUPG MKAY MH OPT ZHKYBYK? MOUM PL COUM P WHGLPXYKMKAY SHBY. COUM XH EHA MOPGR, IKPGWY?""P RGHC EHAK LPLMYK MHH SPMMSY," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMO U LUKWULMPWLTPSY AGXYK COPWO OY CPLOYX MH OPXY OPL YTVUKKULLTYGM, "MH VY UVSY MHLHSBY LH XYSPWUMY U JAYLMPHG, UGX MOYG P OUBY GHMPWYX MOUM MOY SYLLUMMKUWMPBY U CHTUG PL MOY THKY WHGLMUGM LOY PL SPRYSE MH VY," OY UXXYX,UGX SHHRYX AI UM IPYKKY COH CUL QALM UIIKHUWOPGN MOYT."EYL, MOUM PL MKAY, IKPGWY. PG HAK XUEL," WHGMPGAYX BYKU--TYGMPHGPGN"HAK XUEL" UL IYHISY HZ SPTPMYX PGMYSSPNYGWY UKY ZHGX HZ XHPGN,PTUNPGPGN MOUM MOYE OUBY XPLWHBYKYX UGX UIIKUPLYX MOY IYWASPUKPMPYL HZ"HAK XUEL" UGX MOUM OATUG WOUKUWMYKPLMPWL WOUGNY CPMO MOY MPTYL--"PG HAKXUEL U NPKS OUL LH TAWO ZKYYXHT MOUM MOY ISYULAKY HZ VYPGN WHAKMYX HZMYGLMPZSYL KYUS ZYYSPGN PG OYK. UGX PM TALM VY WHGZYLLYX MOUM GUMUSPY PLBYKE LALWYIMPVSY." MOPL KYMAKG MH MOY LAVQYWM HZ GUMUSPY WUALYX IKPGWYUGXKYC MH RGPM OPL VKHCL CPMO XPLWHTZHKM: OY CUL UVHAM MH KPLY, VAM BYKUWHGMPGAYX CPMO U LMPSS THKY LAVMSY LTPSY:"P MOPGR GH HGY OUL VYYG THKY WHAKMYX MOUG LOY," LOY CYGM HG, "VAM MPSSJAPMY SUMYSE LOY GYBYK WUKYX LYKPHALSE ZHK UGEHGY. GHC EHA RGHC, WHAGM,"LOY LUPX MH IPYKKY, "YBYG HAK XYUK WHALPG VHKPL, COH, VYMCYYG HAKLYSBYL,CUL BYKE ZUK NHGY PG MOY SUGX HZ MYGXYKGYLL..." (USSAXPGN MH U TUI HZSHBY TAWO PG BHNAY UM MOUM MPTY).IKPGWY UGXKYC ZKHCGYX UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM."EHA UKY ZKPYGXSE CPMO VHKPL, UKYG'M EHA?" ULRYX BYKU."EYL, P RGHC OPT...""P YDIYWM OY OUL MHSX EHA HZ OPL WOPSXPLO SHBY ZHK GUMULOU?""HO, MOYKY CUL WOPSXPLO SHBY?" SYWHALPGUNY YLM AG XUGNYKYAD BHPLPGUNY. * XHG'M EHA MOPGR LH?"    * "WHALPGOHHX PL U XUGNYKHAL GYPNOVHKOHHX.""HO, AGXHAVMYXSE!" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX CPMO LAXXYG UGX AGGUMAKUSSPBYSPGYLL OY VYNUG WOUZZPGN IPYKKY UVHAM MOY GYYX MH VY BYKE WUKYZASCPMO OPL ZPZME-EYUK-HSX THLWHC WHALPGL, UGX PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOYLYQYLMPGN KYTUKRL OY KHLY, MURPGN IPYKKY VE MOY UKT, UGX XKYC OPT ULPXY."CYSS?" ULRYX IPYKKY, LYYPGN OPL ZKPYGX'L LMKUGNY UGPTUMPHG CPMOLAKIKPLY, UGX GHMPWPGN MOY NSUGWY OY MAKGYX HG GUMULOU UL OY KHLY."P TALM... P TALM OUBY U MUSR CPMO EHA," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "EHA RGHCMOUM IUPK HZ CHTYG'L NSHBYL?" (OY KYZYKKYX MH MOY TULHGPW NSHBYL NPBYGMH U GYCSE PGPMPUMYX VKHMOYK MH IKYLYGM MH MOY CHTUG OY SHBYX.) "P...VAM GH, P CPSS MUSR MH EHA SUMYK HG," UGX CPMO U LMKUGNY SPNOM PG OPLYEYL UGX KYLMSYLLGYLL PG OPL THBYTYGML, IKPGWY UGXKYC UIIKHUWOYXGUMULOU UGX LUM XHCG VYLPXY OYK. IPYKKY LUC OHC IKPGWY UGXKYC ULRYX OYKLHTYMOPGN UGX OHC LOY ZSALOYX UL LOY KYISPYX.VAM UM MOUM THTYGM VYKN WUTY MH IPYKKY UGX VYNUG PGLPLMPGN MOUM OYLOHASX MURY IUKM PG UG UKNATYGM VYMCYYG MOY NYGYKUS UGX MOY WHSHGYS HGMOY UZZUPKL PG LIUPG.VYKN CUL LUMPLZPYX UGX OUIIE. MOY LTPSY HZ ISYULAKY GYBYK SYZM OPL ZUWY.MOY IUKME CUL BYKE LAWWYLLZAS UGX JAPMY SPRY HMOYK IUKMPYL OY OUX LYYG.YBYKEMOPGN CUL LPTPSUK: MOY SUXPYL' LAVMSY MUSR, MOY WUKXL, MOY NYGYKUSKUPLPGN OPL BHPWY UM MOY WUKX MUVSY, UGX MOY LUTHBUK UGX MOY MYU WURYL;HGSE HGY MOPGN CUL SUWRPGN MOUM OY OUX USCUEL LYYG UM MOY YBYGPGNIUKMPYL OY CPLOYX MH PTPMUMY. MOYE OUX GHM EYM OUX U SHAX WHGBYKLUMPHGUTHGN MOY TYG UGX U XPLIAMY UVHAM LHTYMOPGN PTIHKMUGM UGX WSYBYK. GHCMOY NYGYKUS OUX VYNAG LAWO U XPLWALLPHG UGX LH VYKN XKYC IPYKKY MH PM.WOUIMYK DDPPGYDM XUE, OUBPGN VYYG PGBPMYX VE MOY WHAGM, IKPGWY UGXKYC XPGYX CPMO MOYKHLMHBL UGX LIYGM MOY KYLM HZ MOY XUE MOYKY.YBYKEHGY PG MOY OHALY KYUSPFYX ZHK COHLY LURY IKPGWY UGXKYC WUTY, UGXCPMOHAM WHGWYUSPGN PM OY MKPYX MH VY CPMO GUMULOU USS XUE. GHM HGSE PGMOY LHAS HZ MOY ZKPNOMYGYX EYM OUIIE UGX YGKUIMAKYX GUMULOU, VAM PG MOYCOHSY OHALY, MOYKY CUL U ZYYSPGN HZ UCY UM LHTYMOPGN PTIHKMUGM MOUM CULVHAGX MH OUIIYG. MOY WHAGMYLL SHHRYX CPMO LUX UGX LMYKGSE LYKPHAL YEYLUM IKPGWY UGXKYC COYG OY MUSRYX MH GUMULOU UGX MPTPXSE LMUKMYX LHTYUKMPZPWPUS WHGBYKLUMPHG UVHAM MKPZSYL UL LHHG UL OY SHHRYX OYK CUE.LHGEU CUL UZKUPX MH SYUBY GUMULOU UGX UZKUPX HZ VYPGN PG MOY CUE COYGLOY CUL CPMO MOYT. GUMULOU NKYC IUSY, PG U IUGPW HZ YDIYWMUMPHG, COYGLOY KYTUPGYX USHGY CPMO OPT ZHK U THTYGM. IKPGWY UGXKYC LAKIKPLYX OYK VEOPL MPTPXPME. LOY ZYSM MOUM OY CUGMYX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN MH OYK VAM WHASXGHM VKPGN OPTLYSZ MH XH LH.PG MOY YBYGPGN, COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX SYZM, MOY WHAGMYLL CYGM AI MHGUMULOU UGX COPLIYKYX: "CYSS, COUM?""TUTTU! ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY XHG'M ULR TY UGEMOPGN GHC! HGY WUG'M MUSRUVHAM MOUM," LUPX GUMULOU.VAM USS MOY LUTY MOUM GPNOM GUMULOU, GHC UNPMUMYX UGX GHC ZKPNOMYGYX,SUE U SHGN MPTY PG OYK THMOYK'L VYX NUFPGN LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OYK. LOY MHSXOYK OHC OY OUX WHTISPTYGMYX OYK, OHC OY MHSX OYK OY CUL NHPGN UVKHUX,ULRYX OYK COYKY MOYE CYKY NHPGN MH LIYGX MOY LATTYK, UGX MOYG OHC OY OUXULRYX OYK UVHAM VHKPL."VAM LAWO U... LAWO U... GYBYK OUIIYGYX MH TY VYZHKY!" LOY LUPX. "HGSE PZYYS UZKUPX PG OPL IKYLYGWY. P UT USCUEL UZKUPX COYG P'T CPMO OPT. COUMXHYL MOUM TYUG? XHYL PM TYUG MOUM PM'L MOY KYUS MOPGN? EYL? TUTTU, UKYEHA ULSYYI?""GH, TE SHBY; P UT ZKPNOMYGYX TELYSZ," UGLCYKYX OYK THMOYK. "GHC NH!""USS MOY LUTY P LOUG'M LSYYI. COUM LPSSPGYLL, MH LSYYI! TATTE! TATTE!LAWO U MOPGN GYBYK OUIIYGYX MH TY VYZHKY," LOY LUPX, LAKIKPLYX UGXUSUKTYX UM MOY ZYYSPGN LOY CUL UCUKY HZ PG OYKLYSZ. "UGX WHASX CY YBYKOUBY MOHANOM!..."PM LYYTYX MH GUMULOU MOUM YBYG UM MOY MPTY LOY ZPKLM LUC IKPGWY UGXKYCUM HMKUXGHY LOY OUX ZUSSYG PG SHBY CPMO OPT. PM CUL UL PZ LOY ZYUKYXMOPL LMKUGNY, AGYDIYWMYX OUIIPGYLL HZ TYYMPGN UNUPG MOY BYKE TUG LOY OUXMOYG WOHLYG (LOY CUL ZPKTSE WHGBPGWYX LOY OUX XHGY LH) UGX HZ ZPGXPGNOPT, UL PM LYYTYX, GHM PGXPZZYKYGM MH OYK."UGX PM OUX MH OUIIYG MOUM OY LOHASX WHTY LIYWPUSSE MH IYMYKLVAKN COPSYCY UKY OYKY. UGX PM OUX MH OUIIYG MOUM CY LOHASX TYYM UM MOUM VUSS.PM PL ZUMY. WSYUKSE PM PL ZUMY MOUM YBYKEMOPGN SYX AI MH MOPL! USKYUXEMOYG, XPKYWMSE P LUC OPT P ZYSM LHTYMOPGN IYWASPUK.""COUM YSLY XPX OY LUE MH EHA? COUM UKY MOHLY BYKLYL? KYUX MOYT..." LUPXOYK THMOYK, MOHANOMZASSE, KYZYKKPGN MH LHTY BYKLYL IKPGWY UGXKYC OUXCKPMMYG PG GUMULOU'L USVAT."TUTTU, HGY GYYX GHM VY ULOUTYX HZ OPL VYPGN U CPXHCYK?""XHG'M, GUMULOU! IKUE MH NHX. 'TUKKPUNYL UKY TUXY PG OYUBYG,'" LUPX OYKTHMOYK."XUKSPGN TATTE, OHC P SHBY EHA! OHC OUIIE P UT!" WKPYX GUMULOU, LOYXXPGNMYUKL HZ QHE UGX YDWPMYTYGM UGX YTVKUWPGN OYK THMOYK.UM MOUM BYKE MPTY IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LPMMPGN CPMO IPYKKY UGX MYSSPGN OPTHZ OPL SHBY ZHK GUMULOU UGX OPL ZPKT KYLHSBY MH TURY OYK OPL CPZY.MOUM XUE WHAGMYLL OYSYGY OUX U KYWYIMPHG UM OYK OHALY. MOY ZKYGWOUTVULLUXHK CUL MOYKY, UGX U ZHKYPNG IKPGWY HZ MOY VSHHX COH OUX HZSUMY VYWHTY U ZKYJAYGM BPLPMHK HZ OYKL, UGX TUGE VKPSSPUGM SUXPYL UGXNYGMSYTYG. IPYKKY, COH OUX WHTY XHCGLMUPKL, CUSRYX MOKHANO MOY KHHTL UGXLMKAWR YBYKEHGY VE OPL IKYHWWAIPYX, UVLYGM-TPGXYX, UGX THKHLY UPK.LPGWY MOY VUSS OY OUX ZYSM MOY UIIKHUWO HZ U ZPM HZ GYKBHAL XYIKYLLPHGUGX OUX TUXY XYLIYKUMY YZZHKML MH WHTVUM PM. LPGWY MOY PGMPTUWE HZOPL CPZY CPMO MOY KHEUS IKPGWY, IPYKKY OUX AGYDIYWMYXSE VYYG TUXY UNYGMSYTUG HZ MOY VYXWOUTVYK, UGX ZKHT MOUM MPTY OY OUX VYNAG MH ZYYSHIIKYLLYX UGX ULOUTYX PG WHAKM LHWPYME, UGX XUKR MOHANOML HZ MOY BUGPMEHZ USS MOPGNL OATUG WUTY MH OPT HZMYGYK MOUG VYZHKY. UM MOY LUTY MPTYMOY ZYYSPGN OY OUX GHMPWYX VYMCYYG OPL IKHMYNYY GUMULOU UGX IKPGWYUGXKYC UWWYGMAUMYX OPL NSHHT VE MOY WHGMKULM VYMCYYG OPL HCG IHLPMPHGUGX OPL ZKPYGX'L. OY MKPYX YJAUSSE MH UBHPX MOPGRPGN UVHAM OPL CPZY,UGX UVHAM GUMULOU UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC; UGX UNUPG YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX MH OPTPGLPNGPZPWUGM PG WHTIUKPLHG CPMO YMYKGPME; UNUPG MOY JAYLMPHG: ZHK COUM?IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ; UGX OY ZHKWYX OPTLYSZ MH CHKR XUE UGX GPNOM UM TULHGPWSUVHKL, OHIPGN MH XKPBY UCUE MOY YBPS LIPKPM MOUM MOKYUMYGYX OPT. MHCUKXTPXGPNOM, UZMYK OY OUX SYZM MOY WHAGMYLL' UIUKMTYGML, OY CUL LPMMPGNAILMUPKL PG U LOUVVE XKYLLPGN NHCG, WHIEPGN HAM MOY HKPNPGUS MKUGLUWMPHGHZ MOY LWHMMPLO SHXNY HZ ZKYYTULHGL UM U MUVSY PG OPL SHC KHHT WSHAXECPMO MHVUWWH LTHRY, COYG LHTYHGY WUTY PG. PM CUL IKPGWY UGXKYC."UO, PM'L EHA!" LUPX IPYKKY CPMO U IKYHWWAIPYX, XPLLUMPLZPYX UPK. "UGXP, EHA LYY, UT OUKX UM PM." OY IHPGMYX MH OPL TUGALWKPIM VHHR CPMO MOUMUPK HZ YLWUIPGN ZKHT MOY PSSL HZ SPZY CPMO COPWO AGOUIIE IYHISY SHHR UMMOYPK CHKR.IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMO U VYUTPGN, YWLMUMPW YDIKYLLPHG HZ KYGYCYX SPZY HGOPL ZUWY, IUALYX PG ZKHGM HZ IPYKKY UGX, GHM GHMPWPGN OPL LUX SHHR,LTPSYX UM OPT CPMO MOY YNHMPLT HZ QHE."CYSS, XYUK OYUKM," LUPX OY, "P CUGMYX MH MYSS EHA UVHAM PM EYLMYKXUEUGX P OUBY WHTY MH XH LH MHXUE.
