P TALM MUSR UVHAM PM MH LHTYHGY.""CYSS, NH HG, NH HG. P UT BYKE NSUX," LUPX IPYKKY, UGX OPL ZUWY KYUSSEWOUGNYX, OPL VKHC VYWUTY LTHHMO, UGX OY SPLMYGYX NSUXSE MH IKPGWYUGXKYC. IKPGWY UGXKYC LYYTYX, UGX KYUSSE CUL, JAPMY U XPZZYKYGM, JAPMYU GYC TUG. COYKY CUL OPL LISYYG, OPL WHGMYTIM ZHK SPZY, OPLXPLPSSALPHGTYGM? IPYKKY CUL MOY HGSE IYKLHG MH COHT OY TUXY AI OPL TPGXMH LIYUR HIYGSE; UGX MH OPT OY MHSX USS MOUM CUL PG OPL LHAS. GHC OYVHSXSE UGX SPNOMSE TUXY ISUGL ZHK UG YDMYGXYX ZAMAKY, LUPX OY WHASX GHMLUWKPZPWY OPL HCG OUIIPGYLL MH OPL ZUMOYK'L WUIKPWY, UGX LIHRY HZ OHC OYCHASX YPMOYK TURY OPL ZUMOYK WHGLYGM MH MOPL TUKKPUNY UGX SHBY OYK, HKCHASX XH CPMOHAM OPL WHGLYGM; MOYG OY TUKBYSYX UM MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM OUXTULMYKYX OPT UL UM LHTYMOPGN LMKUGNY, UIUKM ZKHT UGX PGXYIYGXYGM HZOPTLYSZ."P LOHASX GHM OUBY VYSPYBYX UGEHGY COH MHSX TY MOUM P CUL WUIUVSY HZLAWO SHBY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "PM PL GHM UM USS MOY LUTY ZYYSPGNMOUM P RGYC PG MOY IULM. MOY COHSY CHKSX PL GHC ZHK TY XPBPXYX PGMH MCHOUSBYL: HGY OUSZ PL LOY, UGX MOYKY USS PL QHE, OHIY, SPNOM: MOYHMOYK OUSZ PL YBYKEMOPGN COYKY LOY PL GHM, UGX MOYKY PL USS NSHHT UGXXUKRGYLL....""XUKRGYLL UGX NSHHT," KYPMYKUMYX IPYKKY: "EYL, EYL, P AGXYKLMUGX MOUM.""P WUGGHM OYSI SHBPGN MOY SPNOM, PM PL GHM TE ZUASM. UGX P UT BYKEOUIIE! EHA AGXYKLMUGX TY? P RGHC EHA UKY NSUX ZHK TE LURY.""EYL, EYL," IPYKKY ULLYGMYX, SHHRPGN UM OPL ZKPYGX CPMO U MHAWOYX UGXLUX YDIKYLLPHG PG OPL YEYL. MOY VKPNOMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SHM UIIYUKYX MHOPT, MOY NSHHTPYK LYYTYX OPL HCG.WOUIMYK DDPPPIKPGWY UGXKYC GYYXYX OPL ZUMOYK'L WHGLYGM MH OPL TUKKPUNY, UGX MH HVMUPGMOPL OY LMUKMYX ZHK MOY WHAGMKE GYDM XUE.OPL ZUMOYK KYWYPBYX OPL LHG'L WHTTAGPWUMPHG CPMO YDMYKGUS WHTIHLAKY, VAMPGCUKX CKUMO. OY WHASX GHM WHTIKYOYGX OHC UGEHGY WHASX CPLO MH USMYK OPLSPZY HK PGMKHXAWY UGEMOPGN GYC PGMH PM, COYG OPL HCG SPZY CUL USKYUXEYGXPGN. "PZ HGSE MOYE CHASX SYM TY YGX TE XUEL UL P CUGM MH," MOHANOMMOY HSX TUG, "MOYG MOYE TPNOM XH UL MOYE ISYULY." CPMO OPL LHG, OHCYBYK,OY YTISHEYX MOY XPISHTUWE OY KYLYKBYX ZHK PTIHKMUGM HWWULPHGL UGX,UXHIMPGN U JAPYM MHGY, XPLWALLYX MOY COHSY TUMMYK.PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY MOY TUKKPUNY CUL GHM U VKPSSPUGM HGY UL KYNUKXLVPKMO, CYUSMO, HK KUGR. LYWHGXSE, IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL GH SHGNYK UL EHAGNUL OY OUX VYYG UGX OPL OYUSMO CUL IHHK (MOY HSX TUG SUPX LIYWPUS LMKYLLHG MOPL), COPSY LOY CUL BYKE EHAGN. MOPKXSE, OY OUX U LHG COHT PM CHASXVY U IPME MH YGMKALM MH U WOPM HZ U NPKS. "ZHAKMOSE UGX ZPGUSSE," MOYZUMOYK LUPX, SHHRPGN PKHGPWUSSE UM OPL LHG, "P VYN EHA MH IAM PM HZZ ZHKU EYUK: NH UVKHUX, MURY U WAKY, SHHR HAM UL EHA CUGMYX MH ZHK U NYKTUGMAMHK ZHK IKPGWY GPWOHSUL. MOYG PZ EHAK SHBY HK IULLPHG HK HVLMPGUWE--ULEHA ISYULY--PL LMPSS UL NKYUM, TUKKE! UGX MOUM'L TE SULM CHKX HG PM.TPGX, MOY SULM..." WHGWSAXYX MOY IKPGWY, PG U MHGY COPWO LOHCYX MOUMGHMOPGN CHASX TURY OPT USMYK OPL XYWPLPHG.IKPGWY UGXKYC LUC WSYUKSE MOUM MOY HSX TUG OHIYX MOUM OPL ZYYSPGNL, HKOPL ZPUGWYY'L, CHASX GHM LMUGX U EYUK'L MYLM, HK MOUM OY (MOY HSXIKPGWY OPTLYSZ) CHASX XPY VYZHKY MOYG, UGX OY XYWPXYX MH WHGZHKT MH OPLZUMOYK'L CPLO--MH IKHIHLY, UGX IHLMIHGY MOY CYXXPGN ZHK U EYUK.MOKYY CYYRL UZMYK MOY SULM YBYGPGN OY OUX LIYGM CPMO MOY KHLMHBL, IKPGWYUGXKYC KYMAKGYX MH IYMYKLVAKN.GYDM XUE UZMYK OYK MUSR CPMO OYK THMOYK GUMULOU YDIYWMYX VHSRHGLRP USSXUE, VAM OY XPX GHM WHTY. HG MOY LYWHGX UGX MOPKX XUE PM CUL MOY LUTY.IPYKKY XPX GHM WHTY YPMOYK UGX GUMULOU, GHM RGHCPGN MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYCOUX NHGY MH LYY OPL ZUMOYK, WHASX GHM YDISUPG OPL UVLYGWY MH OYKLYSZ.MOKYY CYYRL IULLYX PG MOPL CUE. GUMULOU OUX GH XYLPKY MH NH HAM UGECOYKYUGX CUGXYKYX ZKHT KHHT MH KHHT SPRY U LOUXHC, PXSY UGX SPLMSYLL; LOYCYIM LYWKYMSE UM GPNOM UGX XPX GHM NH MH OYK THMOYK PG MOY YBYGPGNL. LOYVSALOYX WHGMPGAUSSE UGX CUL PKKPMUVSY. PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM YBYKEVHXERGYC UVHAM OYK XPLUIIHPGMTYGM UGX CUL SUANOPGN UM OYK UGX IPMEPGN OYK.LMKHGN UL CUL OYK PGCUKX NKPYZ, MOPL CHAGX MH OYK BUGPME PGMYGLPZPYX OYKTPLYKE.HGWY LOY WUTY MH OYK THMOYK, MKPYX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, UGX LAXXYGSE VYNUGMH WKE. OYK MYUKL CYKY MOHLY HZ UG HZZYGXYX WOPSX COH XHYL GHM RGHC COEPM PL VYPGN IAGPLOYX.MOY WHAGMYLL VYNUG MH LHHMOY GUMULOU, COH UZMYK ZPKLM SPLMYGPGN MH OYKTHMOYK'L CHKXL, LAXXYGSE PGMYKKAIMYX OYK:"SYUBY HZZ, TUTTU! P XHG'M MOPGR, UGX XHG'M CUGM MH MOPGR UVHAM PM! OYQALM WUTY UGX MOYG SYZM HZZ, SYZM HZZ..."OYK BHPWY MKYTVSYX, UGX LOY UNUPG GYUKSE WKPYX, VAM KYWHBYKYX UGX CYGMHG JAPYMSE:"UGX P XHG'M UM USS CUGM MH NYM TUKKPYX. UGX P UT UZKUPX HZ OPT; P OUBYGHC VYWHTY JAPMY WUST, JAPMY WUST."MOY XUE UZMYK MOPL WHGBYKLUMPHG GUMULOU IAM HG MOY HSX XKYLL COPWOLOY RGYC OUX MOY IYWASPUK IKHIYKME HZ WHGXAWPGN MH WOYYKZASGYLL PG MOYTHKGPGNL, UGX MOUM XUE LOY KYMAKGYX MH MOY HSX CUE HZ SPZY COPWO LOY OUXUVUGXHGYX LPGWY MOY VUSS. OUBPGN ZPGPLOYX OYK THKGPGN MYU LOY CYGM MHMOY VUSSKHHT, COPWO LOY IUKMPWASUKSE SPRYX ZHK PML SHAX KYLHGUGWY, UGXVYNUG LPGNPGN OYK LHSZYNNPH. COYG LOY OUX ZPGPLOYX OYK ZPKLM YDYKWPLYLOY LMHHX LMPSS PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT UGX LUGN U TALPWUS IOKULY MOUMIUKMPWASUKSE ISYULYX OYK. LOY SPLMYGYX QHEZASSE (UL MOHANO LOY OUX GHMYDIYWMYX PM) MH MOY WOUKT HZ MOY GHMYL KYBYKVYKUMPGN, ZPSSPGN MOYCOHSY YTIME VUSSKHHT, UGX LSHCSE XEPGN UCUE; UGX USS UM HGWY LOY ZYSMWOYYKZAS. "COUM'L MOY NHHX HZ TURPGN LH TAWO HZ PM? MOPGNL UKY GPWY ULPM PL," LOY LUPX MH OYKLYSZ, UGX LOY VYNUG CUSRPGN AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT,GHM LMYIIPGN LPTISE HG MOY KYLHAGXPGN IUKJAYM VAM MKYUXPGN CPMO YUWOLMYI ZKHT MOY OYYS MH MOY MHY (LOY OUX HG U GYC UGX ZUBHKPMY IUPK HZLOHYL) UGX SPLMYGPGN MH MOY KYNASUK MUI HZ MOY OYYS UGX WKYUR HZ MOY MHYUL NSUXSE UL LOY OUX MH MOY LHAGXL HZ OYK HCG BHPWY. IULLPGN U TPKKHKLOY NSUGWYX PGMH PM. "MOYKY, MOUM'L TY!" MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK ZUWYLYYTYX MH LUE UL LOY WUANOM LPNOM HZ OYKLYSZ. "CYSS, UGX BYKE GPWY MHH!P GYYX GHVHXE."U ZHHMTUG CUGMYX MH WHTY PG MH WSYUK UCUE LHTYMOPGN PG MOY KHHT VAM LOYCHASX GHM SYM OPT, UGX OUBPGN WSHLYX MOY XHHK VYOPGX OPT WHGMPGAYX OYKCUSR. MOUM THKGPGN LOY OUX KYMAKGYX MH OYK ZUBHKPMY THHX--SHBY HZ, UGXXYSPNOM PG, OYKLYSZ. "OHC WOUKTPGN MOUM GUMULOU PL!" LOY LUPX UNUPG,LIYURPGN UL LHTY MOPKX, WHSSYWMPBY, TUSY IYKLHG. "IKYMME, U NHHX BHPWY,EHAGN, UGX PG GHVHXE'L CUE PZ HGSE MOYE SYUBY OYK PG IYUWY." VAMOHCYBYK TAWO MOYE SYZM OYK PG IYUWY LOY WHASX GHM GHC VY UM IYUWY, UGXPTTYXPUMYSE ZYSM MOPL.PG MOY OUSS MOY IHKWO XHHK HIYGYX, UGX LHTYHGY ULRYX, "UM OHTY?" UGXMOYG ZHHMLMYIL CYKY OYUKX. GUMULOU CUL SHHRPGN UM MOY TPKKHK, VAM XPXGHM LYY OYKLYSZ. LOY SPLMYGYX MH MOY LHAGXL PG MOY OUSS. COYG LOY LUCOYKLYSZ, OYK ZUWY CUL IUSY. PM CUL OY. LOY RGYC MOPL ZHK WYKMUPG, MOHANOLOY OUKXSE OYUKX OPL BHPWY MOKHANO MOY WSHLYX XHHKL.IUSY UGX UNPMUMYX, GUMULOU KUG PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT."TUTTU! VHSRHGLRP OUL WHTY!" LOY LUPX. "TUTTU, PM PL UCZAS, PM PLAGVYUKUVSY! P XHG'M CUGM... MH VY MHKTYGMYX? COUM UT P MH XH?..."VYZHKY MOY WHAGMYLL WHASX UGLCYK, IKPGWY UGXKYC YGMYKYX MOY KHHT CPMOUG UNPMUMYX UGX LYKPHAL ZUWY. UL LHHG UL OY LUC GUMULOU OPL ZUWYVKPNOMYGYX. OY RPLLYX MOY WHAGMYLL' OUGX UGX GUMULOU'L, UGX LUM XHCGVYLPXY MOY LHZU."PM PL SHGN LPGWY CY OUX MOY ISYULAKY..." VYNUG MOY WHAGMYLL, VAM IKPGWYUGXKYC PGMYKKAIMYX OYK VE UGLCYKPGN OYK PGMYGXYX JAYLMPHG, HVBPHALSE PGOULMY MH LUE COUM OY OUX MH."P OUBY GHM VYYG MH LYY EHA USS MOPL MPTY VYWUALY P OUBY VYYG UM TEZUMOYK'L. P OUX MH MUSR HBYK U BYKE PTIHKMUGM TUMMYK CPMO OPT. P HGSENHM VUWR SULM GPNOM," OY LUPX NSUGWPGN UM GUMULOU; "P CUGM MH OUBY UMUSR CPMO EHA, WHAGMYLL," OY UXXYX UZMYK U THTYGM'L IUALY.MOY WHAGMYLL SHCYKYX OYK YEYL, LPNOPGN XYYISE."P UT UM EHAK XPLIHLUS," LOY TAKTAKYX.GUMULOU RGYC MOUM LOY HANOM MH NH UCUE, VAM CUL AGUVSY MH XH LH:LHTYMOPGN NKPIIYX OYK MOKHUM, UGX KYNUKXSYLL HZ TUGGYKL LOY LMUKYXLMKUPNOM UM IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO CPXY-HIYG YEYL."UM HGWY? MOPL PGLMUGM!... GH, PM WUG'M VY!" LOY MOHANOM.UNUPG OY NSUGWYX UM OYK, UGX MOUM NSUGWY WHGBPGWYX OYK MOUM LOY CUL GHMTPLMURYG. EYL, UM HGWY, MOUM BYKE PGLMUGM, OYK ZUMY CHASX VY XYWPXYX."NH, GUMULOU! P CPSS WUSS EHA," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL PG U COPLIYK.GUMULOU NSUGWYX CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX PTISHKPGN YEYL UM IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX UMOYK THMOYK UGX CYGM HAM."P OUBY WHTY, WHAGMYLL, MH ULR ZHK EHAK XUANOMYK'L OUGX," LUPX IKPGWYUGXKYC.MOY WHAGMYLL' ZUWY ZSALOYX OHMSE, VAM LOY LUPX GHMOPGN."EHAK HZZYK..." LOY VYNUG UM SULM LYXUMYSE. OY KYTUPGYX LPSYGM, SHHRPGNPGMH OYK YEYL. "EHAK HZZYK..." (LOY NKYC WHGZALYX) "PL UNKYYUVSY MH AL,UGX P UWWYIM EHAK HZZYK. P UT NSUX. UGX TE OALVUGX... P OHIY... VAM PMCPSS XYIYGX HG OYK....""P CPSS LIYUR MH OYK COYG P OUBY EHAK WHGLYGM.... XH EHA NPBY PM MH TY?"LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC."EYL," KYISPYX MOY WHAGMYLL. LOY OYSX HAM OYK OUGX MH OPT, UGX CPMO UTPDYX ZYYSPGN HZ YLMKUGNYTYGM UGX MYGXYKGYLL IKYLLYX OYK SPIL MH OPLZHKYOYUX UL OY LMHHIYX MH RPLL OYK OUGX. LOY CPLOYX MH SHBY OPT UL ULHG, VAM ZYSM MOUM MH OYK OY CUL U LMKUGNYK UGX U MYKKPZEPGN TUG. "P UTLAKY TE OALVUGX CPSS WHGLYGM," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, "VAM EHAK ZUMOYK...""TE ZUMOYK, MH COHT P OUBY MHSX TE ISUGL, OUL TUXY PM UG YDIKYLLWHGXPMPHG HZ OPL WHGLYGM MOUM MOY CYXXPGN PL GHM MH MURY ISUWY ZHK UEYUK. UGX P CPLOYX MH MYSS EHA HZ MOUM," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC."PM PL MKAY MOUM GUMULOU PL LMPSS EHAGN, VAM--LH SHGN UL MOUM?...""PM PL AGUBHPXUVSY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO U LPNO."P CPSS LYGX OYK MH EHA," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, UGX SYZM MOY KHHT."SHKX OUBY TYKWE AIHG AL!" LOY KYIYUMYX COPSY LYYRPGN OYK XUANOMYK.LHGEU LUPX MOUM GUMULOU CUL PG OYK VYXKHHT. GUMULOU CUL LPMMPGN HGMOY VYX, IUSY UGX XKE YEYX, UGX CUL NUFPGN UM MOY PWHGL UGX COPLIYKPGNLHTYMOPGN UL LOY KUIPXSE WKHLLYX OYKLYSZ. LYYPGN OYK THMOYK LOY QATIYXAI UGX ZSYC MH OYK."CYSS, TUTTU?... CYSS?...""NH, NH MH OPT. OY PL ULRPGN ZHK EHAK OUGX," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL,WHSXSE PM LYYTYX MH GUMULOU. "NH... NH," LUPX MOY THMOYK, LUXSE UGXKYIKHUWOZASSE, CPMO U XYYI LPNO, UL OYK XUANOMYK KUG UCUE.GUMULOU GYBYK KYTYTVYKYX OHC LOY YGMYKYX MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. COYG LOY WUTYPG UGX LUC OPT LOY IUALYX. "PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM MOPL LMKUGNYK OUL GHCVYWHTY YBYKEMOPGN MH TY?" LOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE UGLCYKYX,"EYL, YBYKEMOPGN! OY USHGY PL GHC XYUKYK MH TY MOUG YBYKEMOPGN PG MOYCHKSX." IKPGWY UGXKYC WUTY AI MH OYK CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL."P OUBY SHBYX EHA ZKHT MOY BYKE ZPKLM THTYGM P LUC EHA. TUE P OHIY?"OY SHHRYX UM OYK UGX CUL LMKAWR VE MOY LYKPHAL PTIULLPHGYX YDIKYLLPHG HZOYK ZUWY. OYK ZUWY LUPX: "COE ULR? COE XHAVM COUM EHA WUGGHM VAM RGHC?COE LIYUR, COYG CHKXL WUGGHM YDIKYLL COUM HGY ZYYSL?"LOY XKYC GYUK MH OPT UGX LMHIIYX. OY MHHR OYK OUGX UGX RPLLYX PM."XH EHA SHBY TY?""EYL, EYL!" GUMULOU TAKTAKYX UL PZ PG BYDUMPHG. MOYG LOY LPNOYX SHAXSEUGX, WUMWOPGN OYK VKYUMO THKY UGX THKY JAPWRSE, VYNUG MH LHV."COUM PL PM? COUM'L MOY TUMMYK?""HO, P UT LH OUIIE!" LOY KYISPYX, LTPSYX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL, VYGM HBYKWSHLYK MH OPT, IUALYX ZHK UG PGLMUGM UL PZ ULRPGN OYKLYSZ COYMOYK LOYTPNOM, UGX MOYG RPLLYX OPT.IKPGWY UGXKYC OYSX OYK OUGXL, SHHRYX PGMH OYK YEYL, UGX XPX GHM ZPGXPG OPL OYUKM OPL ZHKTYK SHBY ZHK OYK. LHTYMOPGN PG OPT OUX LAXXYGSEWOUGNYX; MOYKY CUL GH SHGNYK MOY ZHKTYK IHYMPW UGX TELMPW WOUKT HZXYLPKY, VAM MOYKY CUL IPME ZHK OYK ZYTPGPGY UGX WOPSXPLO CYURGYLL, ZYUKUM OYK XYBHMPHG UGX MKALMZASGYLL, UGX UG HIIKYLLPBY EYM QHEZAS LYGLY HZMOY XAME MOUM GHC VHAGX OPT MH OYK ZHKYBYK. MOY IKYLYGM ZYYSPGN, MOHANOGHM LH VKPNOM UGX IHYMPW UL MOY ZHKTYK, CUL LMKHGNYK UGX THKY LYKPHAL."XPX EHAK THMOYK MYSS EHA MOUM PM WUGGHM VY ZHK U EYUK?" ULRYX IKPGWYUGXKYC, LMPSS SHHRPGN PGMH OYK YEYL."PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM P--MOY 'WOPM HZ U NPKS,' UL YBYKEVHXE WUSSYX TY,"MOHANOM GUMULOU--"PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM P UT GHC MH VY MOY CPZY UGX MOYYJAUS HZ MOPL LMKUGNY, XYUK, WSYBYK TUG COHT YBYG TE ZUMOYK SHHRL AI MH?WUG PM VY MKAY? WUG PM VY MKAY MOUM MOYKY WUG VY GH THKY ISUEPGN CPMOSPZY, MOUM GHC P UT NKHCG AI, MOUM HG TY GHC SPYL U KYLIHGLPVPSPME ZHKTE YBYKE CHKX UGX XYYX? EYL, VAM COUM XPX OY ULR TY?""GH," LOY KYISPYX, VAM LOY OUX GHM AGXYKLMHHX OPL JAYLMPHG."ZHKNPBY TY!" OY LUPX. "VAM EHA UKY LH EHAGN, UGX P OUBY USKYUXE VYYGMOKHANO LH TAWO PG SPZY. P UT UZKUPX ZHK EHA, EHA XH GHM EYM RGHCEHAKLYSZ."GUMULOU SPLMYGYX CPMO WHGWYGMKUMYX UMMYGMPHG, MKEPGN VAM ZUPSPGN MH MURYPG MOY TYUGPGN HZ OPL CHKXL."OUKX UL MOPL EYUK COPWO XYSUEL TE OUIIPGYLL CPSS VY," WHGMPGAYX IKPGWYUGXKYC, "PM CPSS NPBY EHA MPTY MH VY LAKY HZ EHAKLYSZ. P ULR EHA MHTURY TY OUIIE PG U EYUK, VAM EHA UKY ZKYY: HAK YGNUNYTYGM LOUSS KYTUPG ULYWKYM, UGX LOHASX EHA ZPGX MOUM EHA XH GHM SHBY TY, HK LOHASX EHA WHTYMH SHBY..." LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC CPMO UG AGGUMAKUS LTPSY."COE XH EHA LUE MOUM?" GUMULOU PGMYKKAIMYX OPT. "EHA RGHC MOUM ZKHT MOYBYKE XUE EHA ZPKLM WUTY MH HMKUXGHY P OUBY SHBYX EHA," LOY WKPYX, JAPMYWHGBPGWYX MOUM LOY LIHRY MOY MKAMO."PG U EYUK EHA CPSS SYUKG MH RGHC EHAKLYSZ....""U COHSY EYUK!" GUMULOU KYIYUMYX LAXXYGSE, HGSE GHC KYUSPFPGN MOUMMOY TUKKPUNY CUL MH VY IHLMIHGYX ZHK U EYUK. "VAM COE U EYUK? COE UEYUK?..."IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MH YDISUPG MH OYK MOY KYULHGL ZHK MOPL XYSUE.GUMULOU XPX GHM OYUK OPT."UGX WUG'M PM VY OYSIYX?" LOY ULRYX. IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM KYISE, VAMOPL ZUWY YDIKYLLYX MOY PTIHLLPVPSPME HZ USMYKPGN MOUM XYWPLPHG."PM'L UCZAS! HO, PM'L UCZAS! UCZAS!" GUMULOU LAXXYGSE WKPYX, UGX UNUPGVAKLM PGMH LHVL. "P LOUSS XPY, CUPMPGN U EYUK: PM'L PTIHLLPVSY, PM'LUCZAS!" LOY SHHRYX PGMH OYK SHBYK'L ZUWY UGX LUC PG PM U SHHR HZWHTTPLYKUMPHG UGX IYKISYDPME."GH, GH! P'SS XH UGEMOPGN!" LOY LUPX, LAXXYGSE WOYWRPGN OYK MYUKL. "P UTLH OUIIE."MOY ZUMOYK UGX THMOYK WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT UGX NUBY MOY VYMKHMOYX WHAISYMOYPK VSYLLPGN.ZKHT MOUM XUE IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MH ZKYJAYGM MOY KHLMHBL' UL GUMULOU'LUZZPUGWYX SHBYK.WOUIMYK DDPBGH VYMKHMOUS WYKYTHGE MHHR ISUWY UGX GUMULOU'L YGNUNYTYGM MH VHSRHGLRPCUL GHM UGGHAGWYX; IKPGWY UGXKYC PGLPLMYX HG MOUM. OY LUPX MOUM UL OYCUL KYLIHGLPVSY ZHK MOY XYSUE OY HANOM MH VYUK MOY COHSY VAKXYG HZ PM;MOUM OY OUX NPBYG OPL CHKX UGX VHAGX OPTLYSZ ZHKYBYK, VAM MOUM OY XPXGHM CPLO MH VPGX GUMULOU UGX NUBY OYK IYKZYWM ZKYYXHT. PZ UZMYK LPDTHGMOL LOY ZYSM MOUM LOY XPX GHM SHBY OPT LOY CHASX OUBY ZASS KPNOM MHKYQYWM OPT. GUMAKUSSE GYPMOYK GUMULOU GHK OYK IUKYGML CPLOYX MH OYUK HZMOPL, VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL ZPKT. OY WUTY YBYKE XUE MH MOY KHLMHBL',VAM XPX GHM VYOUBY MH GUMULOU UL UG UZZPUGWYX SHBYK: OY XPX GHM ALYMOY ZUTPSPUK MOHA, VAM LUPX EHA MH OYK, UGX RPLLYX HGSE OYK OUGX. UZMYKMOYPK YGNUNYTYGM, JAPMY XPZZYKYGM, PGMPTUMY, UGX GUMAKUS KYSUMPHGLLIKUGN AI VYMCYYG MOYT. PM CUL UL PZ MOYE OUX GHM RGHCG YUWO HMOYK MPSSGHC. VHMO SPRYX MH KYWUSS OHC MOYE OUX KYNUKXYX YUWO HMOYK COYG ULEYM MOYE CYKY GHMOPGN MH HGY UGHMOYK; MOYE ZYSM MOYTLYSBYL GHC JAPMYXPZZYKYGM VYPGNL: MOYG MOYE CYKY UKMPZPWPUS, GHC GUMAKUS UGX LPGWYKY. UMZPKLM MOY ZUTPSE ZYSM LHTY WHGLMKUPGM PG PGMYKWHAKLY CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC;OY LYYTYX U TUG ZKHT UGHMOYK CHKSX, UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY GUMULOU MKUPGYXMOY ZUTPSE MH NYM ALYX MH OPT, IKHAXSE ULLAKPGN MOYT USS MOUM OY HGSEUIIYUKYX MH VY XPZZYKYGM, VAM CUL KYUSSE QALM SPRY USS HZ MOYT, UGX MOUMLOY CUL GHM UZKUPX HZ OPT UGX GH HGY YSLY HANOM MH VY. UZMYK U ZYCXUEL MOYE NKYC UWWALMHTYX MH OPT, UGX CPMOHAM KYLMKUPGM PG OPL IKYLYGWYIAKLAYX MOYPK ALAUS CUE HZ SPZY, PG COPWO OY MHHR OPL IUKM. OY WHASXMUSR UVHAM KAKUS YWHGHTE CPMO MOY WHAGM, ZULOPHGL CPMO MOY WHAGMYLLUGX GUMULOU, UGX UVHAM USVATL UGX ZUGWECHKR CPMO LHGEU. LHTYMPTYL MOYOHALYOHSX VHMO UTHGN MOYTLYSBYL UGX PG OPL IKYLYGWY YDIKYLLYX MOYPKCHGXYK UM OHC PM OUX USS OUIIYGYX, UGX UM MOY YBPXYGM HTYGL MOYKY OUXVYYG HZ PM: IKPGWY UGXKYC'L WHTPGN MH HMKUXGHY UGX MOYPK WHTPGN MHIYMYKLVAKN, UGX MOY SPRYGYLL VYMCYYG GUMULOU UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC COPWOOYK GAKLY OUX GHMPWYX HG OPL ZPKLM BPLPM, UGX UGXKYC'L YGWHAGMYK CPMOGPWOHSUL PG 1805, UGX TUGE HMOYK PGWPXYGML VYMHRYGPGN MOUM PM OUX MH VY.PG MOY OHALY MOUM IHYMPW XASSGYLL UGX JAPYM KYPNGYX COPWO USCUELUWWHTIUGPYL MOY IKYLYGWY HZ U VYMKHMOYX WHAISY. HZMYG COYG USS LPMMPGNMHNYMOYK YBYKEHGY RYIM LPSYGM. LHTYMPTYL MOY HMOYKL CHASX NYM AI UGXNH UCUE UGX MOY WHAISY, SYZM USHGY, LMPSS KYTUPGYX LPSYGM. MOYE KUKYSELIHRY HZ MOYPK ZAMAKY SPZY. IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL UZKUPX UGX ULOUTYX MHLIYUR HZ PM. GUMULOU LOUKYX MOPL UL LOY XPX USS OPL ZYYSPGNL, COPWO LOYWHGLMUGMSE XPBPGYX. HGWY LOY VYNUG JAYLMPHGPGN OPT UVHAM OPL LHG. IKPGWYUGXKYC VSALOYX, UL OY HZMYG XPX GHC--GUMULOU IUKMPWASUKSE SPRYX PM PGOPT--UGX LUPX MOUM OPL LHG CHASX GHM SPBY CPMO MOYT."COE GHM?" ULRYX GUMULOU PG U ZKPNOMYGYX MHGY."P WUGGHM MURY OPT UCUE ZKHT OPL NKUGXZUMOYK, UGX VYLPXYL...""OHC P LOHASX OUBY SHBYX OPT!" LUPX GUMULOU, PTTYXPUMYSE NAYLLPGN OPLMOHANOM; "VAM P RGHC EHA CPLO MH UBHPX UGE IKYMYDM ZHK ZPGXPGN ZUASMCPMO AL."LHTYMPTYL MOY HSX WHAGM CHASX WHTY AI, RPLL IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX ULR OPLUXBPWY UVHAM IYMEU'L YXAWUMPHG HK GPWOHSUL' LYKBPWY. MOY HSX WHAGMYLLLPNOYX UL LOY SHHRYX UM MOYT; LHGEU CUL USCUEL NYMMPGN ZKPNOMYGYX SYLMLOY LOHASX VY PG MOY CUE UGX MKPYX MH ZPGX YDWALYL ZHK SYUBPGN MOYTUSHGY, YBYG COYG MOYE XPX GHM CPLO PM. COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC LIHRY (OYWHASX MYSS U LMHKE BYKE CYSS), GUMULOU SPLMYGYX MH OPT CPMO IKPXY; COYGLOY LIHRY LOY GHMPWYX CPMO ZYUK UGX QHE MOUM OY NUFYX UMMYGMPBYSE UGXLWKAMPGPFPGNSE UM OYK. LOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ PG IYKISYDPME: "COUM XHYL OYSHHR ZHK PG TY? OY PL MKEPGN MH XPLWHBYK LHTYMOPGN VE SHHRPGN UM TY!COUM PZ COUM OY LYYRL PG TY PL GHM MOYKY?" LHTYMPTYL LOY ZYSS PGMH HGYHZ MOY TUX, TYKKE THHXL WOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ OYK, UGX MOYG LOY IUKMPWASUKSESHBYX MH OYUK UGX LYY OHC IKPGWY UGXKYC SUANOYX. OY LYSXHT SUANOYX, VAMCOYG OY XPX OY UVUGXHGYX OPTLYSZ YGMPKYSE MH OPL SUANOMYK, UGX UZMYKLAWO U SUANO LOY USCUEL ZYSM GYUKYK MH OPT. GUMULOU CHASX OUBY VYYGWHTISYMYSE OUIIE PZ MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY LYIUKUMPHG UCUPMPGN OYK UGXXKUCPGN GYUK OUX GHM MYKKPZPYX OYK, QALM UL MOY TYKY MOHANOM HZ PM TUXYOPT MAKG IUSY UGX WHSX.HG MOY YBY HZ OPL XYIUKMAKY ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN IKPGWY UGXKYC VKHANOM CPMOOPT IPYKKY, COH OUX GHM VYYG MH MOY KHLMHBL' HGWY LPGWY MOY VUSS. IPYKKYLYYTYX XPLWHGWYKMYX UGX YTVUKKULLYX. OY CUL MUSRPGN MH MOY WHAGMYLL,UGX GUMULOU LUM XHCG VYLPXY U SPMMSY WOYLL MUVSY CPMO LHGEU, MOYKYVEPGBPMPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC MH WHTY MHH. OY XPX LH."EHA OUBY RGHCG VYFAROHB U SHGN MPTY?" OY ULRYX. "XH EHA SPRY OPT?""EYL, OY'L U XYUK, VAM BYKE UVLAKX."UGX UL ALAUS COYG LIYURPGN HZ IPYKKY, LOY VYNUG MH MYSS UGYWXHMYL HZ OPLUVLYGM-TPGXYXGYLL, LHTY HZ COPWO OUX YBYG VYYG PGBYGMYX UVHAM OPT."XH EHA RGHC P OUBY YGMKALMYX OPT CPMO HAK LYWKYM? P OUBY RGHCG OPT ZKHTWOPSXOHHX. OY OUL U OYUKM HZ NHSX. P VYN EHA, GUMUSPY," IKPGWY UGXKYCLUPX CPMO LAXXYG LYKPHALGYLL--"P UT NHPGN UCUE UGX OYUBYG RGHCL COUM TUEOUIIYG. EHA TUE WYULY MH... USS KPNOM, P RGHC P UT GHM MH LUE MOUM. HGSEMOPL, MOYG: COUMYBYK TUE OUIIYG MH EHA COYG P UT GHM OYKY...""COUM WUG OUIIYG?""COUMYBYK MKHAVSY TUE WHTY," IKPGWY UGXKYC WHGMPGAYX, "P VYN EHA,TUXYTHPLYSSY LHIOPY, COUMYBYK TUE OUIIYG, MH MAKG MH OPT USHGY ZHKUXBPWY UGX OYSI! OY PL U THLM UVLYGM-TPGXYX UGX UVLAKX ZYSSHC, VAM OYOUL U OYUKM HZ NHSX."GYPMOYK OYK ZUMOYK, GHK OYK THMOYK, GHK LHGEU, GHK IKPGWY UGXKYC OPTLYSZWHASX OUBY ZHKYLYYG OHC MOY LYIUKUMPHG ZKHT OYK SHBYK CHASX UWM HGGUMULOU. ZSALOYX UGX UNPMUMYX LOY CYGM UVHAM MOY OHALY USS MOUM XUE,XKE-YEYX, HWWAIPYX CPMO THLM MKPBPUS TUMMYKL UL PZ GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGNCOUM UCUPMYX OYK. LOY XPX GHM YBYG WKE COYG, HG MURPGN SYUBY, OY RPLLYXOYK OUGX ZHK MOY SULM MPTY. "XHG'M NH!" LOY LUPX PG U MHGY MOUM TUXY OPTCHGXYK COYMOYK OY KYUSSE HANOM GHM MH LMUE UGX COPWO OY KYTYTVYKYX SHGNUZMYKCUKXL. GHK XPX LOY WKE COYG OY CUL NHGY; VAM ZHK LYBYKUS XUEL LOYLUM PG OYK KHHT XKE-YEYX, MURPGN GH PGMYKYLM PG UGEMOPGN UGX HGSE LUEPGNGHC UGX MOYG, "HO, COE XPX OY NH UCUE?"VAM U ZHKMGPNOM UZMYK OPL XYIUKMAKY, MH MOY LAKIKPLY HZ MOHLY UKHAGXOYK, LOY KYWHBYKYX ZKHT OYK TYGMUS LPWRGYLL QALM UL LAXXYGSE UGX VYWUTYOYK HSX LYSZ UNUPG, VAM CPMO U WOUGNY PG OYK THKUS IOELPHNGHTE, UL UWOPSX NYML AI UZMYK U SHGN PSSGYLL CPMO U WOUGNYX YDIKYLLPHG HZ ZUWY.WOUIMYK DDBXAKPGN MOUM EYUK UZMYK OPL LHG'L XYIUKMAKY, IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP'LOYUSMO UGX MYTIYK VYWUTY TAWO CHKLY. OY NKYC LMPSS THKY PKKPMUVSY, UGXPM CUL IKPGWYLL TUKE COH NYGYKUSSE VHKY MOY VKAGM HZ OPL ZKYJAYGM ZPMLHZ AGIKHBHRYX UGNYK. OY LYYTYX WUKYZASSE MH LYYR HAM OYK MYGXYK LIHML LHUL MH MHKMAKY OYK TYGMUSSE UL OUKLOSE UL IHLLPVSY. IKPGWYLL TUKE OUXMCH IULLPHGL UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE MCH QHEL--OYK GYIOYC, SPMMSY GPWOHSUL, UGXKYSPNPHG--UGX MOYLY CYKY MOY ZUBHKPMY LAVQYWML HZ MOY IKPGWY'L UMMUWRLUGX KPXPWASY. COUMYBYK CUL LIHRYG HZ OY CHASX VKPGN KHAGX MH MOYLAIYKLMPMPHALGYLL HZ HSX TUPXL, HK MOY IYMMPGN UGX LIHPSPGN HZ WOPSXKYG."EHA CUGM MH TURY OPT"--SPMMSY GPWOHSUL--"PGMH UG HSX TUPX SPRYEHAKLYSZ! U IPME! IKPGWY UGXKYC CUGML U LHG UGX GHM UG HSX TUPX," OYCHASX LUE. HK, MAKGPGN MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, OY CHASX ULR OYK PGIKPGWYLL TUKE'L IKYLYGWY OHC LOY SPRYX HAK BPSSUNY IKPYLML UGX PWHGL UGXCHASX QHRY UVHAM MOYT.OY WHGMPGAUSSE OAKM IKPGWYLL TUKE'L ZYYSPGNL UGX MHKTYGMYX OYK, VAM PMWHLM OYK GH YZZHKM MH ZHKNPBY OPT. WHASX OY VY MH VSUTY MHCUKX OYK, HKWHASX OYK ZUMOYK, COHT LOY RGYC SHBYX OYK PG LIPMY HZ PM USS, VY AGQALM?UGX COUM PL QALMPWY? MOY IKPGWYLL GYBYK MOHANOM HZ MOUM IKHAX CHKX"QALMPWY." USS MOY WHTISYD SUCL HZ TUG WYGMYKYX ZHK OYK PG HGY WSYUKUGX LPTISY SUC--MOY SUC HZ SHBY UGX LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY MUANOM AL VE OPT COHSHBPGNSE LAZZYKYX ZHK TUGRPGX MOHANO OY OPTLYSZ CUL NHX. COUM OUX LOY MHXH CPMO MOY QALMPWY HK PGQALMPWY HZ HMOYK IYHISY? LOY OUX MH YGXAKY UGXSHBY, UGX MOUM LOY XPX.XAKPGN MOY CPGMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX WHTY MH VUSX OPSSL UGX OUX VYYG NUE,NYGMSY, UGX THKY UZZYWMPHGUMY MOUG IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX RGHCG OPT ZHK USHGN MPTY IULM. LOY ZYSM MOUM LHTYMOPGN OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT, VAM OY LUPXGHMOPGN MH OYK UVHAM OPL SHBY. VYZHKY OY SYZM OY OUX U SHGN MUSR CPMOOPL ZUMOYK UVHAM LHTYMOPGN, UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE GHMPWYX MOUM VYZHKY OPLXYIUKMAKY MOYE CYKY XPLLUMPLZPYX CPMO HGY UGHMOYK.LHHG UZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX NHGY, IKPGWYLL TUKE CKHMY MH OYK ZKPYGXQASPY RUKUNPGU PG IYMYKLVAKN, COHT LOY OUX XKYUTYX (UL USS NPKSL XKYUT)HZ TUKKEPGN MH OYK VKHMOYK, UGX COH CUL UM MOUM MPTY PG THAKGPGN ZHK OYKHCG VKHMOYK, RPSSYX PG MAKRYE.LHKKHC, PM LYYTL, PL HAK WHTTHG SHM, TE XYUK, MYGXYK ZKPYGX QASPY.EHAK SHLL PL LH MYKKPVSY MOUM P WUG HGSE YDISUPG PM MH TELYSZ UL ULIYWPUS IKHBPXYGWY HZ NHX COH, SHBPGN EHA, CPLOYL MH MKE EHA UGX EHAKYDWYSSYGM THMOYK. HO, TE ZKPYGX! KYSPNPHG, UGX KYSPNPHG USHGY, WUG--PCPSS GHM LUE WHTZHKM AL--VAM LUBY AL ZKHT XYLIUPK. KYSPNPHG USHGY WUGYDISUPG MH AL COUM CPMOHAM PML OYSI TUG WUGGHM WHTIKYOYGX: COE, ZHK COUMWUALY, RPGX UGX GHVSY VYPGNL UVSY MH ZPGX OUIIPGYLL PG SPZY--GHM TYKYSEOUKTPGN GH HGY VAM GYWYLLUKE MH MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ HMOYKL--UKY WUSSYX UCUEMH NHX, COPSY WKAYS, ALYSYLL, OUKTZAS IYKLHGL, HK LAWO UL UKY U VAKXYGMH MOYTLYSBYL UGX MH HMOYKL, UKY SYZM SPBPGN. MOY ZPKLM XYUMO P LUC,UGX HGY P LOUSS GYBYK ZHKNYM--MOUM HZ TE XYUK LPLMYK-PG-SUC--SYZM MOUMPTIKYLLPHG HG TY. QALM UL EHA ULR XYLMPGE COE EHAK LISYGXPX VKHMOYKOUX MH XPY, LH P ULRYX COE MOUM UGNYS SPLY, COH GHM HGSE GYBYK CKHGNYXUGEHGY, VAM PG COHLY LHAS MOYKY CYKY GYBYK UGE AGRPGX MOHANOML, OUX MHXPY. UGX COUM XH EHA MOPGR, XYUK ZKPYGX? ZPBY EYUKL OUBY IULLYX LPGWYMOYG, UGX USKYUXE P, CPMO TE IYMME AGXYKLMUGXPGN, VYNPG MH LYY WSYUKSECOE LOY OUX MH XPY, UGX PG COUM CUE MOUM XYUMO CUL VAM UG YDIKYLLPHGHZ MOY PGZPGPMY NHHXGYLL HZ MOY WKYUMHK, COHLY YBYKE UWMPHG, MOHANONYGYKUSSE PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY MH AL, PL VAM U TUGPZYLMUMPHG HZ OPL PGZPGPMYSHBY ZHK OPL WKYUMAKYL. IYKOUIL, P HZMYG MOPGR, LOY CUL MHH UGNYSPWUSSEPGGHWYGM MH OUBY MOY LMKYGNMO MH IYKZHKT USS U THMOYK'L XAMPYL. UL UEHAGN CPZY LOY CUL PKKYIKHUWOUVSY; IYKOUIL LOY WHASX GHM OUBY VYYG LHUL U THMOYK. UL PM PL, GHM HGSE OUL LOY SYZM AL, UGX IUKMPWASUKSE IKPGWYUGXKYC, CPMO MOY IAKYLM KYNKYML UGX TYTHKPYL, VAM IKHVUVSE LOY CPSSMOYKY KYWYPBY U ISUWY P XUKY GHM OHIY ZHK TELYSZ. VAM GHM MH LIYUR HZOYK USHGY, MOUM YUKSE UGX MYKKPVSY XYUMO OUL OUX MOY THLM VYGYZPWYGMPGZSAYGWY HG TY UGX HG TE VKHMOYK PG LIPMY HZ USS HAK NKPYZ. MOYG, UMMOY THTYGM HZ HAK SHLL, MOYLY MOHANOML WHASX GHM HWWAK MH TY; P LOHASXMOYG OUBY XPLTPLLYX MOYT CPMO OHKKHK, VAM GHC MOYE UKY BYKE WSYUK UGXWYKMUPG. P CKPMY USS MOPL MH EHA, XYUK ZKPYGX, HGSE MH WHGBPGWY EHAHZ MOY NHLIYS MKAMO COPWO OUL VYWHTY ZHK TY U IKPGWPISY HZ SPZY: GHMU LPGNSY OUPK HZ HAK OYUXL CPSS ZUSS CPMOHAM OPL CPSS. UGX OPL CPSS PLNHBYKGYX HGSE VE PGZPGPMY SHBY ZHK AL, UGX LH COUMYBYK VYZUSSL AL PL ZHKHAK NHHX.EHA ULR COYMOYK CY LOUSS LIYGX GYDM CPGMYK PG THLWHC. PG LIPMY HZ TECPLO MH LYY EHA, P XH GHM MOPGR LH UGX XH GHM CUGM MH XH LH. EHA CPSSVY LAKIKPLYX MH OYUK MOUM MOY KYULHG ZHK MOPL PL VAHGUIUKMY! MOY WULYPL MOPL: TE ZUMOYK'L OYUSMO PL NKHCPGN GHMPWYUVSE CHKLY, OY WUGGHM LMUGXUGE WHGMKUXPWMPHG UGX PL VYWHTPGN PKKPMUVSY. MOPL PKKPMUVPSPME PL, ULEHA RGHC, WOPYZSE XPKYWMYX MH IHSPMPWUS JAYLMPHGL. OY WUGGHM YGXAKYMOY GHMPHG MOUM VAHGUIUKMY PL GYNHMPUMPGN HG YJAUS MYKTL CPMO USS MOYLHBYKYPNGL HZ YAKHIY UGX IUKMPWASUKSE CPMO HAK HCG, MOY NKUGXLHG HZ MOYNKYUM WUMOYKPGY! UL EHA RGHC, P UT JAPMY PGXPZZYKYGM MH IHSPMPWL, VAMZKHT TE ZUMOYK'L KYTUKRL UGX OPL MUSRL CPMO TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO P RGHC USSMOUM NHYL HG PG MOY CHKSX UGX YLIYWPUSSE UVHAM MOY OHGHKL WHGZYKKYX HGVAHGUIUKMY, COH HGSE UM VUSX OPSSL PG MOY COHSY CHKSX, PM LYYTL, PL GHMUWWYIMYX UL U NKYUM TUG, LMPSS SYLL UL YTIYKHK HZ ZKUGWY. UGX TE ZUMOYKWUGGHM LMUGX MOPL. PM LYYTL MH TY MOUM PM PL WOPYZSE VYWUALY HZ OPLIHSPMPWUS BPYCL MOUM TE ZUMOYK PL KYSAWMUGM MH LIYUR HZ NHPGN MHTHLWHC; ZHK OY ZHKYLYYL MOY YGWHAGMYKL MOUM CHASX KYLASM ZKHT OPL CUEHZ YDIKYLLPGN OPL BPYCL KYNUKXSYLL HZ UGEVHXE. USS MOY VYGYZPM OY TPNOMXYKPBY ZKHT U WHAKLY HZ MKYUMTYGM OY CHASX SHLY UL U KYLASM HZ MOYXPLIAMYL UVHAM VAHGUIUKMY COPWO CHASX VY PGYBPMUVSY. PG UGE WULY PM CPSSVY XYWPXYX BYKE LOHKMSE.HAK ZUTPSE SPZY NHYL HG PG MOY HSX CUE YDWYIM ZHK TE VKHMOYK UGXKYC'LUVLYGWY. OY, UL P CKHMY EHA VYZHKY, OUL WOUGNYX BYKE TAWO HZ SUMY. UZMYKOPL LHKKHC OY HGSE MOPL EYUK JAPMY KYWHBYKYX OPL LIPKPML. OY OUL UNUPGVYWHTY UL P ALYX MH RGHC OPT COYG U WOPSX: RPGX, UZZYWMPHGUMY, CPMO MOUMOYUKM HZ NHSX MH COPWO P RGHC GH YJAUS. OY OUL KYUSPFYX, PM LYYTL MH TY,MOUM SPZY PL GHM HBYK ZHK OPT. VAM MHNYMOYK CPMO MOPL TYGMUS WOUGNYOY OUL NKHCG IOELPWUSSE TAWO CYURYK. OY OUL VYWHTY MOPGGYK UGX THKYGYKBHAL. P UT UGDPHAL UVHAM OPT UGX NSUX OY PL MURPGN MOPL MKPI UVKHUXCOPWO MOY XHWMHKL KYWHTTYGXYX SHGN UNH. P OHIY PM CPSS WAKY OPT. EHACKPMY MOUM PG IYMYKLVAKN OY PL LIHRYG HZ UL HGY HZ MOY THLM UWMPBY,WASMPBUMYX, UGX WUIUVSY HZ MOY EHAGN TYG. ZHKNPBY TE BUGPME UL UKYSUMPHG, VAM P GYBYK XHAVMYX PM. MOY NHHX OY OUL XHGY MH YBYKEVHXEOYKY, ZKHT OPL IYULUGML AI MH MOY NYGMKE, PL PGWUSWASUVSY. HG OPLUKKPBUS PG IYMYKLVAKN OY KYWYPBYX HGSE OPL XAY. P USCUEL CHGXYK UM MOYCUE KATHKL ZSE ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN MH THLWHC, YLIYWPUSSE LAWO ZUSLY HGYL ULMOUM EHA CKPMY UVHAM--P TYUG MOY KYIHKM HZ TE VKHMOYK'L VYMKHMOUS MHMOY SPMMSY KHLMHBU. P XH GHM MOPGR TE VKHMOYK CPSS YBYK TUKKE UNUPG, UGXWYKMUPGSE GHM OYK; UGX MOPL PL COE: ZPKLM, P RGHC MOUM MOHANO OY KUKYSELIYURL UVHAM MOY CPZY OY OUL SHLM, MOY NKPYZ HZ MOUM SHLL OUL NHGY MHHXYYI PG OPL OYUKM ZHK OPT YBYK MH XYWPXY MH NPBY OYK U LAWWYLLHK UGX HAKSPMMSY UGNYS U LMYITHMOYK. LYWHGXSE VYWUALY, UL ZUK UL P RGHC, MOUM NPKSPL GHM MOY RPGX HZ NPKS COH WHASX ISYULY IKPGWY UGXKYC. P XH GHM MOPGROY CHASX WOHHLY OYK ZHK U CPZY, UGX ZKUGRSE P XH GHM CPLO PM. VAM P UTKAGGPGN HG MHH SHGN UGX UT UM MOY YGX HZ TE LYWHGX LOYYM. NHHX-VEY,TE XYUK ZKPYGX. TUE NHX RYYI EHA PG OPL OHSE UGX TPNOME WUKY. TE XYUKZKPYGX, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, LYGXL EHA RPLLYL.TUKEWOUIMYK DDBPPG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY LATTYK IKPGWYLL TUKE KYWYPBYX UG AGYDIYWMYX SYMMYKZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYC PG LCPMFYKSUGX PG COPWO OY NUBY OYK LMKUGNY UGXLAKIKPLPGN GYCL. OY PGZHKTYX OYK HZ OPL YGNUNYTYGM MH GUMULOU KHLMHBU.MOY COHSY SYMMYK VKYUMOYX SHBPGN KUIMAKY ZHK OPL VYMKHMOYX UGX MYGXYKUGX WHGZPXPGN UZZYWMPHG ZHK OPL LPLMYK. OY CKHMY MOUM OY OUX GYBYK SHBYXUL OY XPX GHC UGX MOUM HGSE GHC XPX OY AGXYKLMUGX UGX RGHC COUM SPZYCUL. OY ULRYX OPL LPLMYK MH ZHKNPBY OPT ZHK GHM OUBPGN MHSX OYK HZ OPLKYLHSBY COYG OY OUX SULM BPLPMYX VUSX OPSSL, MOHANO OY OUX LIHRYG HZ PMMH OPL ZUMOYK. OY OUX GHM XHGY LH ZHK ZYUK IKPGWYLL TUKE LOHASX ULR OYKZUMOYK MH NPBY OPL WHGLYGM, PKKPMUMPGN OPT UGX OUBPGN MH VYUK MOY VKAGMHZ OPL XPLISYULAKY CPMOHAM UMMUPGPGN OYK HVQYWM. "VYLPXYL," OY CKHMY,"MOY TUMMYK CUL GHM MOYG LH XYZPGPMYSE LYMMSYX UL PM PL GHC. TE ZUMOYKMOYG PGLPLMYX HG U XYSUE HZ U EYUK UGX GHC USKYUXE LPD THGMOL, OUSZ HZMOUM IYKPHX, OUBY IULLYX, UGX TE KYLHSAMPHG PL ZPKTYK MOUG YBYK. PZ MOYXHWMHKL XPX GHM RYYI TY OYKY UM MOY LIUL P LOHASX VY VUWR PG KALLPU, VAMUL PM PL P OUBY MH IHLMIHGY TE KYMAKG ZHK MOKYY THGMOL. EHA RGHC TYUGX TE KYSUMPHGL CPMO ZUMOYK. P CUGM GHMOPGN ZKHT OPT. P OUBY VYYG UGXUSCUEL LOUSS VY PGXYIYGXYGM; VAM MH NH UNUPGLM OPL CPSS UGX UKHALY OPLUGNYK, GHC MOUM OY TUE IYKOUIL KYTUPG CPMO AL LAWO U LOHKM MPTY, CHASXXYLMKHE OUSZ TE OUIIPGYLL. P UT GHC CKPMPGN MH OPT UVHAM MOY LUTYJAYLMPHG, UGX VYN EHA MH WOHHLY U NHHX THTYGM MH OUGX OPT MOY SYMMYKUGX MH SYM TY RGHC OHC OY SHHRL UM MOY COHSY TUMMYK UGX COYMOYK MOYKY PLOHIY MOUM OY TUE WHGLYGM MH KYXAWY MOY MYKT VE ZHAK THGMOL."UZMYK SHGN OYLPMUMPHGL, XHAVML, UGX IKUEYKL, IKPGWYLL TUKE NUBY MOYSYMMYK MH OYK ZUMOYK. MOY GYDM XUE MOY HSX IKPGWY LUPX MH OYK JAPYMSE:"CKPMY UGX MYSS EHAK VKHMOYK MH CUPM MPSS P UT XYUX.... PM CHG'M VYSHGN--P LOUSS LHHG LYM OPT ZKYY."MOY IKPGWYLL CUL UVHAM MH KYISE, VAM OYK ZUMOYK CHASX GHM SYM OYK LIYURUGX, KUPLPGN OPL BHPWY THKY UGX THKY, WKPYX:"TUKKE, TUKKE, TE VHE!... U NHHX ZUTPSE!... WSYBYK IYHISY, YO? KPWO,YO? EYL, U GPWY LMYITHMOYK SPMMSY GPWOHSUL CPSS OUBY! CKPMY UGX MYSSOPT MOUM OY TUE TUKKE MHTHKKHC PZ OY SPRYL. LOY CPSS VY SPMMSY GPWOHSUL'LMYITHMOYK UGX P'SS TUKKE VHAKPYGGY!... OU, OU, OU! OY TALMG'M VYCPMOHAM U LMYITHMOYK YPMOYK! HGSE HGY MOPGN, GH THKY CHTYG UKY CUGMYXPG TE OHALY--SYM OPT TUKKE UGX SPBY VE OPTLYSZ. IYKOUIL EHA CPSS NH UGXSPBY CPMO OPT MHH?" OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH IKPGWYLL TUKE. "NH PG OYUBYGLGUTY! NH HAM PGMH MOY ZKHLM... MOY ZKHLM... MOY ZKHLM!"UZMYK MOPL HAMVAKLM MOY IKPGWY XPX GHM LIYUR UGE THKY UVHAM MOY TUMMYK.VAM KYIKYLLYX BYDUMPHG UM OPL LHG'L IHHK-LIPKPMYX VYOUBPHK ZHAGXYDIKYLLPHG PG OPL MKYUMTYGM HZ OPL XUANOMYK. MH OPL ZHKTYK IKYMYDMLZHK PKHGE U ZKYLO HGY CUL GHC UXXYX--USSALPHGL MH LMYITHMOYKL UGXUTPUVPSPMPYL MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY."COE LOHASXG'M P TUKKE OYK?" OY ULRYX OPL XUANOMYK. "LOY'SS TURY ULISYGXPX IKPGWYLL!"UGX SUMMYKSE, MH OYK LAKIKPLY UGX VYCPSXYKTYGM, IKPGWYLL TUKEGHMPWYX MOUM OYK ZUMOYK CUL KYUSSE ULLHWPUMPGN THKY UGX THKY CPMO MOYZKYGWOCHTUG. LOY CKHMY MH IKPGWY UGXKYC UVHAM MOY KYWYIMPHG HZ OPLSYMMYK, VAM WHTZHKMYX OPT CPMO OHIYL HZ KYWHGWPSPGN MOYPK ZUMOYK MH MOYPXYU.SPMMSY GPWOHSUL UGX OPL YXAWUMPHG, OYK VKHMOYK UGXKYC, UGX KYSPNPHG CYKYIKPGWYLL TUKE'L QHEL UGX WHGLHSUMPHGL; VAM VYLPXYL MOUM, LPGWY YBYKEHGYTALM OUBY IYKLHGUS OHIYL, IKPGWYLL TUKE PG MOY IKHZHAGXYLM XYIMOL HZ OYKOYUKM OUX U OPXXYG XKYUT UGX OHIY MOUM LAIISPYX MOY WOPYZ WHGLHSUMPHGHZ OYK SPZY. MOPL WHTZHKMPGN XKYUT UGX OHIY CYKY NPBYG OYK VE NHX'LZHSR--MOY OUSZ-CPMMYX UGX HMOYK IPSNKPTL COH BPLPMYX OYK CPMOHAM MOYIKPGWY'L RGHCSYXNY. MOY SHGNYK LOY SPBYX, MOY THKY YDIYKPYGWY UGXHVLYKBUMPHG LOY OUX HZ SPZY, MOY NKYUMYK CUL OYK CHGXYK UM MOYLOHKM-LPNOMYXGYLL HZ TYG COH LYYR YGQHETYGM UGX OUIIPGYLL OYKY HG YUKMO:MHPSPGN, LAZZYKPGN, LMKANNSPGN, UGX OUKTPGN HGY UGHMOYK, MH HVMUPG MOUMPTIHLLPVSY, BPLPHGUKE, LPGZAS OUIIPGYLL. IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX SHBYX OPLCPZY, LOY XPYX, VAM MOUM CUL GHM YGHANO: OY CUGMYX MH VPGX OPL OUIIPGYLLMH UGHMOYK CHTUG. OYK ZUMOYK HVQYWMYX MH MOPL VYWUALY OY CUGMYX U THKYXPLMPGNAPLOYX UGX CYUSMOPYK TUMWO ZHK UGXKYC. UGX MOYE USS LMKANNSYXUGX LAZZYKYX UGX MHKTYGMYX HGY UGHMOYK UGX PGQAKYX MOYPK LHASL, MOYPKYMYKGUS LHASL, ZHK MOY UMMUPGTYGM HZ VYGYZPML COPWO YGXAKY VAM ZHK UGPGLMUGM. GHM HGSE XH CY RGHC MOPL HAKLYSBYL, VAM WOKPLM, MOY LHG HZ NHX,WUTY XHCG MH YUKMO UGX MHSX AL MOUM MOPL SPZY PL VAM ZHK U THTYGM UGX PLU IKHVUMPHG; EYM CY WSPGN MH PM UGX MOPGR MH ZPGX OUIIPGYLL PG PM. "OHCPL PM MOUM GH HGY KYUSPFYL MOPL?" MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE. "GH HGY YDWYIMMOYLY XYLIPLYX NHX'L ZHSR COH, CUSSYM HG VUWR, WHTY MH TY VE MOY VUWRXHHK, UZKUPX HZ VYPGN LYYG VE MOY IKPGWY, GHM ZHK ZYUK HZ PSS-ALUNY VEOPT VAM ZHK ZYUK HZ WUALPGN OPT MH LPG. MH SYUBY ZUTPSE, OHTY, UGX USSMOY WUKYL HZ CHKSXSE CYSZUKY, PG HKXYK CPMOHAM WSPGNPGN MH UGEMOPGN MHCUGXYK PG OYTIYG KUNL ZKHT ISUWY MH ISUWY AGXYK UG ULLATYX GUTY, XHPGNGH HGY UGE OUKT VAM IKUEPGN ZHK USS--ZHK MOHLY COH XKPBY HGY UCUE ULCYSS UL ZHK MOHLY COH IKHMYWM HGY: OPNOYK MOUG MOUM SPZY UGX MKAMO MOYKYPL GH SPZY HK MKAMO!"MOYKY CUL HGY IPSNKPT, U JAPYM IHWRTUKRYX SPMMSY CHTUG HZ ZPZME WUSSYXMOYHXHLPU, COH ZHK HBYK MOPKME EYUKL OUX NHGY UVHAM VUKYZHHM UGX CHKGOYUBE WOUPGL. IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL IUKMPWASUKSE ZHGX HZ OYK. HGWY, COYG PGU KHHT CPMO U SUTI XPTSE SPM VYZHKY MOY PWHG MOYHXHLPU CUL MUSRPGN HZOYK SPZY, MOY MOHANOM MOUM MOYHXHLPU USHGY OUX ZHAGX MOY MKAY IUMO HZSPZY LAXXYGSE WUTY MH IKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO LAWO ZHKWY MOUM LOY KYLHSBYX MHVYWHTY U IPSNKPT OYKLYSZ. COYG MOYHXHLPU OUX NHGY MH LSYYI IKPGWYLL TUKEMOHANOM UVHAM MOPL ZHK U SHGN MPTY, UGX UM SULM TUXY AI OYK TPGX MOUM,LMKUGNY UL PM TPNOM LYYT, LOY TALM NH HG U IPSNKPTUNY. LOY XPLWSHLYXMOPL MOHANOM MH GH HGY VAM MH OYK WHGZYLLHK, ZUMOYK URPGZP, MOY THGR,UGX OY UIIKHBYX HZ OYK PGMYGMPHG. AGXYK NAPLY HZ U IKYLYGM ZHK MOYIPSNKPTL, IKPGWYLL TUKE IKYIUKYX U IPSNKPT'L WHTISYMY WHLMATY ZHKOYKLYSZ: U WHUKLY LTHWR, VULM LOHYL, U KHANO WHUM, UGX U VSUWR RYKWOPYZ.HZMYG, UIIKHUWOPGN MOY WOYLM HZ XKUCYKL WHGMUPGPGN MOPL LYWKYM MKYULAKY,IKPGWYLL TUKE IUALYX, AGWYKMUPG COYMOYK MOY MPTY OUX GHM USKYUXE WHTY MHIAM OYK IKHQYWM PGMH YDYWAMPHG.HZMYG, SPLMYGPGN MH MOY IPSNKPTL' MUSYL, LOY CUL LH LMPTASUMYX VE MOYPKLPTISY LIYYWO, TYWOUGPWUS MH MOYT VAM MH OYK LH ZASS HZ XYYI TYUGPGN,MOUM LYBYKUS MPTYL LOY CUL HG MOY IHPGM HZ UVUGXHGPGN YBYKEMOPGN UGXKAGGPGN UCUE ZKHT OHTY. PG PTUNPGUMPHG LOY USKYUXE IPWMAKYX OYKLYSZ VEMOYHXHLPU'L LPXY, XKYLLYX PG WHUKLY KUNL, CUSRPGN CPMO U LMUZZ, U CUSSYMHG OYK VUWR, USHGN MOY XALME KHUX, XPKYWMPGN OYK CUGXYKPGNL ZKHT HGYLUPGM'L LOKPGY MH UGHMOYK, ZKYY ZKHT YGBE, YUKMOSE SHBY, HK XYLPKY, UGXKYUWOPGN UM SULM MOY ISUWY COYKY MOYKY PL GH THKY LHKKHC HK LPNOPGN, VAMYMYKGUS QHE UGX VSPLL."P LOUSS WHTY MH U ISUWY UGX IKUE MOYKY, UGX VYZHKY OUBPGN MPTY MH NYMALYX MH PM HK NYMMPGN MH SHBY PM, P LOUSS NH ZUKMOYK. P CPSS NH HG MPSSTE SYNL ZUPS, UGX P'SS SPY XHCG UGX XPY LHTYCOYKY, UGX LOUSS UM SULMKYUWO MOUM YMYKGUS, JAPYM OUBYG, COYKY MOYKY PL GYPMOYK LHKKHC GHKLPNOPGN..." MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE.VAM UZMYKCUKXL, COYG LOY LUC OYK ZUMOYK UGX YLIYWPUSSE SPMMSY RHRH(GPWOHSUL), OYK KYLHSBY CYURYGYX. LOY CYIM JAPYMSE, UGX ZYSM MOUM LOYCUL U LPGGYK COH SHBYX OYK ZUMOYK UGX SPMMSY GYIOYC THKY MOUG NHX.VHHR LYBYG: 1810 - 11WOUIMYK PMOY VPVSY SYNYGX MYSSL AL MOUM MOY UVLYGWY HZ SUVHK--PXSYGYLL--CUL UWHGXPMPHG HZ MOY ZPKLM TUG'L VSYLLYXGYLL VYZHKY MOY ZUSS. ZUSSYG TUG OULKYMUPGYX U SHBY HZ PXSYGYLL, VAM MOY WAKLY CYPNOL HG MOY KUWY GHM HGSEVYWUALY CY OUBY MH LYYR HAK VKYUX PG MOY LCYUM HZ HAK VKHCL, VAM VYWUALYHAK THKUS GUMAKY PL LAWO MOUM CY WUGGHM VY VHMO PXSY UGX UM YULY. UGPGGYK BHPWY MYSSL AL CY UKY PG MOY CKHGN PZ CY UKY PXSY. PZ TUG WHASXZPGX U LMUMY PG COPWO OY ZYSM MOUM MOHANO PXSY OY CUL ZASZPSSPGN OPLXAME, OY CHASX OUBY ZHAGX HGY HZ MOY WHGXPMPHGL HZ TUG'L IKPTPMPBYVSYLLYXGYLL. UGX LAWO U LMUMY HZ HVSPNUMHKE UGX PKKYIKHUWOUVSY PXSYGYLLPL MOY SHM HZ U COHSY WSULL--MOY TPSPMUKE. MOY WOPYZ UMMKUWMPHG HZTPSPMUKE LYKBPWY OUL WHGLPLMYX UGX CPSS WHGLPLM PG MOPL WHTIASLHKE UGXPKKYIKHUWOUVSY PXSYGYLL.GPWOHSUL KHLMHB YDIYKPYGWYX MOPL VSPLLZAS WHGXPMPHG MH MOY ZASS COYG,UZMYK 1807, OY WHGMPGAYX MH LYKBY PG MOY IUBSHNKUX KYNPTYGM, PG COPWO OYUSKYUXE WHTTUGXYX MOY LJAUXKHG OY OUX MURYG HBYK ZKHT XYGPLHB.KHLMHB OUX VYWHTY U VSAZZ, NHHX-GUMAKYX ZYSSHC, COHT OPL THLWHCUWJAUPGMUGWYL CHASX OUBY WHGLPXYKYX KUMOYK VUX ZHKT, VAM COH CUL SPRYXUGX KYLIYWMYX VE OPL WHTKUXYL, LAVHKXPGUMYL, UGX LAIYKPHKL, UGX CUL CYSSWHGMYGMYX CPMO OPL SPZY. HZ SUMY, PG 1809, OY ZHAGX PG SYMMYKL ZKHT OHTYTHKY ZKYJAYGM WHTISUPGML ZKHT OPL THMOYK MOUM MOYPK UZZUPKL CYKY ZUSSPGNPGMH NKYUMYK UGX NKYUMYK XPLHKXYK, UGX MOUM PM CUL MPTY ZHK OPT MH WHTYVUWR MH NSUXXYG UGX WHTZHKM OPL HSX IUKYGML.KYUXPGN MOYLY SYMMYKL, GPWOHSUL ZYSM U XKYUX HZ MOYPK CUGMPGN MHMURY OPT UCUE ZKHT LAKKHAGXPGNL PG COPWO, IKHMYWMYX ZKHT USS MOYYGMUGNSYTYGML HZ SPZY, OY CUL SPBPGN LH WUSTSE UGX JAPYMSE. OY ZYSM MOUMLHHGYK HK SUMYK OY CHASX OUBY MH KY-YGMYK MOUM COPKSIHHS HZ SPZY, CPMOPML YTVUKKULLTYGML UGX UZZUPKL MH VY LMKUPNOMYGYX HAM, PML UWWHAGML CPMOLMYCUKXL, JAUKKYSL, UGX PGMKPNAYL, PML MPYL, LHWPYME, UGX CPMO LHGEU'LSHBY UGX OPL IKHTPLY MH OYK. PM CUL USS XKYUXZASSE XPZZPWASM UGXWHTISPWUMYX; UGX OY KYISPYX MH OPL THMOYK PG WHSX, ZHKTUS SYMMYKL PGZKYGWO, VYNPGGPGN: "TE XYUK TUTTU," UGX YGXPGN: "EHAK HVYXPYGM LHG,"COPWO LUPX GHMOPGN HZ COYG OY CHASX KYMAKG. PG 1810 OY KYWYPBYX SYMMYKLZKHT OPL IUKYGML, PG COPWO MOYE MHSX OPT HZ GUMULOU'L YGNUNYTYGM MHVHSRHGLRP, UGX MOUM MOY CYXXPGN CHASX VY PG U EYUK'L MPTY VYWUALYMOY HSX IKPGWY TUXY XPZZPWASMPYL. MOPL SYMMYK NKPYBYX UGX THKMPZPYXGPWOHSUL. PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY OY CUL LHKKE MOUM GUMULOU, ZHK COHT OYWUKYX THKY MOUG ZHK UGEHGY YSLY PG MOY ZUTPSE, LOHASX VY SHLM MH MOYOHTY; UGX LYWHGXSE, ZKHT OPL OALLUK IHPGM HZ BPYC, OY KYNKYMMYX GHM MHOUBY VYYG MOYKY MH LOHC MOUM ZYSSHC VHSRHGLRP MOUM WHGGYWMPHG CPMO OPTCUL GH LAWO NKYUM OHGHK UZMYK USS, UGX MOUM PZ OY SHBYX GUMULOU OYTPNOM XPLIYGLY CPMO IYKTPLLPHG ZKHT OPL XHMUKX ZUMOYK. ZHK U THTYGM OYOYLPMUMYX COYMOYK OY LOHASX GHM UIISE ZHK SYUBY PG HKXYK MH LYY GUMULOUVYZHKY LOY CUL TUKKPYX, VAM MOYG WUTY MOY TUGYABYKL, UGX WHGLPXYKUMPHGLUVHAM LHGEU UGX UVHAM MOY WHGZALPHG HZ MOYPK UZZUPKL, UGX GPWOHSUL UNUPGIAM PM HZZ. VAM PG MOY LIKPGN HZ MOUM EYUK, OY KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHTOPL THMOYK, CKPMMYG CPMOHAM OPL ZUMOYK'L RGHCSYXNY, UGX MOUM SYMMYKIYKLAUXYX OPT MH KYMAKG. LOY CKHMY MOUM PZ OY XPX GHM WHTY UGX MURYTUMMYKL PG OUGX, MOYPK COHSY IKHIYKME CHASX VY LHSX VE UAWMPHG UGX MOYECHASX USS OUBY MH NH VYNNPGN. MOY WHAGM CUL LH CYUR, UGX MKALMYX TPMYGRULH TAWO, UGX CUL LH NHHX-GUMAKYX, MOUM YBYKEVHXE MHHR UXBUGMUNY HZ OPTUGX MOPGNL CYKY NHPGN ZKHT VUX MH CHKLY. "ZHK NHX'L LURY, P PTISHKYEHA, WHTY UM HGWY PZ EHA XH GHM CPLO MH TURY TY UGX MOY COHSY ZUTPSECKYMWOYX," CKHMY MOY WHAGMYLL.MOPL SYMMYK MHAWOYX GPWOHSUL. OY OUX MOUM WHTTHG LYGLY HZ UTUMMYK-HZ-ZUWM TUG COPWO LOHCYX OPT COUM OY HANOM MH XH.MOY KPNOM MOPGN GHC CUL, PZ GHM MH KYMPKY ZKHT MOY LYKBPWY, UM UGE KUMYMH NH OHTY HG SYUBY. COE OY OUX MH NH OY XPX GHM RGHC; VAM UZMYK OPLUZMYK-XPGGYK GUI OY NUBY HKXYKL MH LUXXSY TUKL, UG YDMKYTYSE BPWPHALNKUE LMUSSPHG MOUM OUX GHM VYYG KPXXYG ZHK U SHGN MPTY, UGX COYGOY KYMAKGYX CPMO MOY OHKLY USS PG U SUMOYK, OY PGZHKTYX SUBKALORU(XYGPLHB'L LYKBUGM COH OUX KYTUPGYX CPMO OPT) UGX OPL WHTKUXYL COHMAKGYX AI PG MOY YBYGPGN MOUM OY CUL UIISEPGN ZHK SYUBY UGX CUL NHPGNOHTY. XPZZPWASM UGX LMKUGNY UL PM CUL ZHK OPT MH KYZSYWM MOUM OY CHASXNH UCUE CPMOHAM OUBPGN OYUKX ZKHT MOY LMUZZ--UGX MOPL PGMYKYLMYX OPTYDMKYTYSE--COYMOYK OY CUL IKHTHMYX MH U WUIMUPGWE HK CHASX KYWYPBY MOYHKXYK HZ LM. UGGY ZHK MOY SULM TUGYABYKL; LMKUGNY UL PM CUL MH MOPGRMOUM OY CHASX NH UCUE CPMOHAM OUBPGN LHSX OPL MOKYY KHUGL MH MOY IHSPLOWHAGM NHSAROHBLRP, COH CUL VUKNUPGPGN ZHK MOY OHKLYL KHLMHB OUX VYMMYXOY CHASX LYSS ZHK MCH MOHALUGX KAVSYL; PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY UL PMLYYTYX MOUM MOY VUSS MOY OALLUKL CYKY NPBPGN PG OHGHK HZ MOY IHSPLOTUXYTHPLYSSY IKFUFXFPYWRU (HAM HZ KPBUSKE MH MOY AOSUGL COH OUX NPBYGHGY PG OHGHK HZ MOYPK IHSPLO TUXYTHPLYSSY VHKFHFHCLRU) CHASX MURY ISUWYCPMOHAM OPT--OY RGYC OY TALM NH UCUE ZKHT MOPL NHHX, VKPNOM CHKSX MHLHTYCOYKY COYKY YBYKEMOPGN CUL LMAIPX UGX WHGZALYX. U CYYR SUMYK OYHVMUPGYX OPL SYUBY. OPL OALLUK WHTKUXYL--GHM HGSE MOHLY HZ OPL HCGKYNPTYGM, VAM MOY COHSY VKPNUXY--NUBY KHLMHB U XPGGYK MH COPWO MOYLAVLWKPIMPHG CUL ZPZMYYG KAVSYL U OYUX, UGX UM COPWO MOYKY CYKY MCHVUGXL UGX MCH WOHPKL HZ LPGNYKL. KHLMHB XUGWYX MOY MKYIUR CPMO TUQHKVULHB; MOY MPILE HZZPWYKL MHLLYX, YTVKUWYX, UGX XKHIIYX KHLMHB; MOYLHSXPYKL HZ MOY MOPKX LJAUXKHG MHLLYX OPT MHH, UGX LOHAMYX "OAKKUO!"UGX MOYG MOYE IAM OPT PG OPL LSYPNO UGX YLWHKMYX OPT UL ZUK UL MOY ZPKLMIHLM LMUMPHG.XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM OUSZ HZ MOY QHAKGYE--ZKHT RKYTYGWOAN MH RPYB--USSKHLMHB'L MOHANOML, UL PL ALAUS PG LAWO WULYL, CYKY VYOPGX OPT, CPMO MOYLJAUXKHG; VAM COYG OY OUX NHGY THKY MOUG OUSZCUE OY VYNUG MH ZHKNYM OPLMOKYY KHUGL UGX XHFOHEBYERH, OPL JAUKMYKTULMYK, UGX MH CHGXYK UGDPHALSEOHC MOPGNL CHASX VY UM HMKUXGHY UGX COUM OY CHASX ZPGX MOYKY. MOHANOMLHZ OHTY NKYC LMKHGNYK MOY GYUKYK OY UIIKHUWOYX PM--ZUK LMKHGNYK, ULMOHANO MOPL ZYYSPGN HZ OPL CUL LAVQYWM MH MOY SUC VE COPWO MOY ZHKWY HZUMMKUWMPHG PL PG PGBYKLY IKHIHKMPHG MH MOY LJAUKY HZ MOY XPLMUGWY. UMMOY SULM IHLM LMUMPHG VYZHKY HMKUXGHY OY NUBY MOY XKPBYK U MOKYY-KAVSYMPI, UGX HG UKKPBPGN OY KUG VKYUMOSYLLSE, SPRY U VHE, AI MOY LMYIL HZOPL OHTY.UZMYK MOY KUIMAKY HZ TYYMPGN, UGX UZMYK MOUM HXX ZYYSPGN HZ AGLUMPLZPYXYDIYWMUMPHG--MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM "YBYKEMOPGN PL QALM MOY LUTY, LH COE XPX POAKKE?"--GPWOHSUL VYNUG MH LYMMSY XHCG PG OPL HSX OHTY CHKSX. OPL ZUMOYKUGX THMOYK CYKY TAWO MOY LUTY, HGSE U SPMMSY HSXYK. COUM CUL GYC PG MOYTCUL U WYKMUPG AGYULPGYLL UGX HWWULPHGUS XPLWHKX, COPWO MOYKY ALYX GHM MHVY, UGX COPWO, UL GPWOHSUL LHHG ZHAGX HAM, CUL XAY MH MOY VUX LMUMY HZMOYPK UZZUPKL. LHGEU CUL GYUKSE MCYGME; LOY OUX LMHIIYX NKHCPGN IKYMMPYKUGX IKHTPLYX GHMOPGN THKY MOUG LOY CUL USKYUXE, VAM MOUM CUL YGHANO.LOY YDOUSYX OUIIPGYLL UGX SHBY ZKHT MOY MPTY GPWOHSUL KYMAKGYX, UGX MOYZUPMOZAS, AGUSMYKUVSY SHBY HZ MOPL NPKS OUX U NSUXXYGPGN YZZYWM HG OPT.IYMEU UGX GUMULOU LAKIKPLYX GPWOHSUL THLM. IYMEU CUL U VPN OUGXLHTYVHE HZ MOPKMYYG, TYKKE, CPMME, UGX TPLWOPYBHAL, CPMO U BHPWY MOUM CULUSKYUXE VKYURPGN. UL ZHK GUMULOU, ZHK U SHGN COPSY GPWOHSUL CHGXYKYX UGXSUANOYX COYGYBYK OY SHHRYX UM OYK."EHA'KY GHM MOY LUTY UM USS," OY LUPX."OHC? UT P ANSPYK?""HG MOY WHGMKUKE, VAM COUM XPNGPME? U IKPGWYLL!" OY COPLIYKYX MH OYK."EYL, EYL, EYL!" WKPYX GUMULOU, QHEZASSE.LOY MHSX OPT UVHAM OYK KHTUGWY CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX HZ OPL BPLPM MHHMKUXGHY UGX LOHCYX OPT OPL SULM SYMMYK."CYSS, UKY EHA NSUX?" GUMULOU ULRYX. "P UT LH MKUGJAPS UGX OUIIE GHC.""BYKE NSUX," UGLCYKYX GPWOHSUL. "OY PL UG YDWYSSYGM ZYSSHC.... UGX UKYEHA BYKE TAWO PG SHBY?""OHC LOUSS P IAM PM?" KYISPYX GUMULOU. "P CUL PG SHBY CPMO VHKPL, CPMOTE MYUWOYK, UGX CPMO XYGPLHB, VAM MOPL PL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM. P ZYYS UMIYUWY UGX LYMMSYX. P RGHC MOUM GH VYMMYK TUG MOUG OY YDPLML, UGX P UTWUST UGX WHGMYGMYX GHC. GHM UM USS UL VYZHKY."GPWOHSUL YDIKYLLYX OPL XPLUIIKHBUS HZ MOY IHLMIHGYTYGM HZ MOY TUKKPUNYZHK U EYUK; VAM GUMULOU UMMUWRYX OYK VKHMOYK CPMO YDULIYKUMPHG, IKHBPGNMH OPT MOUM PM WHASX GHM VY HMOYKCPLY, UGX MOUM PM CHASX VY U VUX MOPGNMH YGMYK U ZUTPSE UNUPGLM MOY ZUMOYK'L CPSS, UGX MOUM LOY OYKLYSZ CPLOYXPM LH."EHA XHG'M UM USS AGXYKLMUGX," LOY LUPX.GPWOHSUL CUL LPSYGM UGX UNKYYX CPMO OYK.OYK VKHMOYK HZMYG CHGXYKYX UL OY SHHRYX UM OYK. LOY XPX GHM LYYT UMUSS SPRY U NPKS PG SHBY UGX IUKMYX ZKHT OYK UZZPUGWYX OALVUGX. LOY CULYBYG-MYTIYKYX UGX WUST UGX JAPMY UL WOYYKZAS UL HZ HSX. MOPL UTUFYXGPWOHSUL UGX YBYG TUXY OPT KYNUKX VHSRHGLRP'L WHAKMLOPI LRYIMPWUSSE.OY WHASX GHM VYSPYBY MOUM OYK ZUMY CUL LYUSYX, YLIYWPUSSE UL OY OUXGHM LYYG OYK CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC. PM USCUEL LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM MOYKY CULLHTYMOPGN GHM JAPMY KPNOM UVHAM MOPL PGMYGXYX TUKKPUNY."COE MOPL XYSUE? COE GH VYMKHMOUS?" OY MOHANOM. HGWY, COYG OY OUXMHAWOYX HG MOPL MHIPW CPMO OPL THMOYK, OY XPLWHBYKYX, MH OPL LAKIKPLYUGX LHTYCOUM MH OPL LUMPLZUWMPHG, MOUM PG MOY XYIMO HZ OYK LHAS LOY MHHOUX XHAVML UVHAM MOPL TUKKPUNY."EHA LYY OY CKPMYL," LUPX LOY, LOHCPGN OYK LHG U SYMMYK HZ IKPGWYUGXKYC'L, CPMO MOUM SUMYGM NKAXNY U THMOYK USCUEL OUL PG KYNUKX MHU XUANOMYK'L ZAMAKY TUKKPYX OUIIPGYLL, "OY CKPMYL MOUM OY CHG'M WHTYVYZHKY XYWYTVYK. COUM WUG VY RYYIPGN OPT? PSSGYLL, IKHVUVSE! OPL OYUSMOPL BYKE XYSPWUMY. XHG'M MYSS GUMULOU. GPWOHSUL,CPMO U LMYKG UGX LYKPHAL UPK COPWO LOHCYX MOUM GHC CUL GH MPTY ZHKUMMYGXPGN MH MKPZSYL, CYGM IULM GUMULOU UGX IYMEU COH CYKY MKEPGN MHMYSS OPT LHTYMOPGN. OY OUX U SHHR UM USS MOY XYMUPSL HZ MOY OAGM, LYGMU IUWR HZ OHAGXL UGX OAGMLTYG HG UOYUX MH ZPGX MOY JAUKKE, THAGMYX OPLWOYLMGAM XHGYML, UGX COPLMSPGN MH OPL HCG SYULO HZ VHKFHPL, LYM HZZUWKHLL MOY MOKYLOPGN NKHAGX MH U ZPYSX SYUXPGN MH MOY HMKUXGHY CHHX.MOY HSX WHAGM'L OHKLY, U LHKKYS NYSXPGN WUSSYX BPZSEUGRU, CUL SYX VE MOYNKHHT PG UMMYGXUGWY HG OPT, COPSY MOY WHAGM OPTLYSZ CUL MH XKPBY PG ULTUSS MKUI LMKUPNOM MH U LIHM KYLYKBYX ZHK OPT.MOYE CYKY MURPGN ZPZME-ZHAK OHAGXL, CPMO LPD OAGM UMMYGXUGML UGXCOPIIYKL-PG. VYLPXYL MOY ZUTPSE, MOYKY CYKY YPNOM VHKFHP RYGGYSTYGUGX THKY MOUG ZHKME VHKFHPL, LH MOUM, CPMO MOY VHKFHPL HG MOY SYULOVYSHGNPGN MH TYTVYKL HZ MOY ZUTPSE, MOYKY CYKY UVHAM U OAGXKYX UGXMOPKME XHNL UGX MCYGME OHKLYTYG.YUWO XHN RGYC PML TULMYK UGX PML WUSS. OY RGYC TY," LUPX GUMULOU,KYZYKKPGN MH OYK ZUBHKPMY OHAGX."PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY, MKAGPSU PL GHM U 'XHN,' VAM U OUKKPYK," MOHANOMGPWOHSUL, UGX SHHRYX LMYKGSE UM OPL LPLMYK, MKEPGN MH TURY OYK ZYYS MOYXPLMUGWY MOUM HANOM MH LYIUKUMY MOYT UM MOUM THTYGM. GUMULOU AGXYKLMHHXPM."EHA TALMG'M MOPGR CY'SS VY PG UGEHGY'L CUE, AGWSY," LOY LUPX. "CY'SS NHMH HAK ISUWYL UGX CHG'M VAXNY.""U NHHX MOPGN MHH, SPMMSY WHAGMYLL," LUPX "AGWSY," "HGSE TPGX EHA XHG'MZUSS HZZ EHAK OHKLY," OY UXXYX, "VYWUALY--MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG!--EHA'BYGHMOPGN MH OHSX HG MH."MOY HULPL HZ MOY HMKUXGHY WHBYKM WUTY PG LPNOM U ZYC OAGXKYX EUKXL HZZ,MOY OAGMLTYG CYKY USKYUXE GYUKPGN PM. KHLMHB, OUBPGN ZPGUSSE LYMMSYXCPMO "AGWSY" COYKY MOYE LOHASX LYM HG MOY OHAGXL, UGX OUBPGN LOHCGGUMULOU COYKY LOY CUL MH LMUGX--U LIHM COYKY GHMOPGN WHASX IHLLPVSE KAGHAM--CYGM KHAGX UVHBY MOY KUBPGY."CYSS, GYIOYC, EHA'KY NHPGN ZHK U VPN CHSZ," LUPX "AGWSY." "TPGX UGXXHG'M SYM OYK LSPI!""MOUM'L UL TUE OUIIYG," UGLCYKYX KHLMHB. "RUKUE, OYKY!" OY LOHAMYX,UGLCYKPGN "AGWSY'L" KYTUKR VE MOPL WUSS MH OPL VHKFHP. RUKUE CUL ULOUNNE HSX XHN CPMO U OUGNPGN QHCS, ZUTHAL ZHK OUBPGN MUWRSYX U VPN CHSZAGUPXYX. MOYE USS MHHR AI MOYPK ISUWYL.MOY HSX WHAGM, RGHCPGN OPL LHG'L UKXHK PG MOY OAGM, OAKKPYX LH UL GHMMH VY SUMY, UGX MOY OAGMLTYG OUX GHM EYM KYUWOYX MOYPK ISUWYL COYG WHAGMPSEU KHLMHB, WOYYKZAS, ZSALOYX, UGX CPMO JAPBYKPGN WOYYRL, XKHBY AICPMO OPL VSUWR OHKLYL HBYK MOY CPGMYK KEY MH MOY ISUWY KYLYKBYX ZHK OPT,COYKY U CHSZ TPNOM WHTY HAM. OUBPGN LMKUPNOMYGYX OPL WHUM UGX ZULMYGYXHG OPL OAGMPGN RGPBYL UGX OHKG, OY THAGMYX OPL NHHX, LSYYR, CYSS-ZYX,UGX WHTZHKMUVSY OHKLY, BPZSEUGRU, COPWO CUL MAKGPGN NKUE, SPRY OPTLYSZ.OPL OHKLYL UGX MKUI CYKY LYGM OHTY. WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, MOHANO GHM UMOYUKM U RYYG LIHKMLTUG, RGYC MOY KASYL HZ MOY OAGM CYSS, UGX KHXY MHMOY VALOE YXNY HZ MOY KHUX COYKY OY CUL MH LMUGX, UKKUGNYX OPL KYPGL,LYMMSYX OPTLYSZ PG MOY LUXXSY, UGX, ZYYSPGN MOUM OY CUL KYUXE, SHHRYXUVHAM CPMO U LTPSY.VYLPXY OPT CUL LPTHG WOYRTUK, OPL IYKLHGUS UMMYGXUGM, UG HSX OHKLYTUGGHC LHTYCOUM LMPZZ PG MOY LUXXSY. WOYRTUK OYSX PG SYULO MOKYY ZHKTPXUVSYCHSZOHAGXL, COH OUX, OHCYBYK, NKHCG ZUM SPRY MOYPK TULMYK UGX OPL OHKLY.MCH CPLY HSX XHNL SUE XHCG AGSYULOYX. LHTY OAGXKYX IUWYL ZUKMOYK USHGNMOY YXNY HZ MOY CHHX LMHHX TPMRU, MOY WHAGM'L HMOYK NKHHT, U XUKPGNOHKLYTUG UGX RYYG KPXYK MH OHAGXL. VYZHKY MOY OAGM, VE HSX WALMHT, MOYWHAGM OUX XKAGR U LPSBYK WAIZAS HZ TASSYX VKUGXE, MURYG U LGUWR, UGXCULOYX PM XHCG CPMO OUSZ U VHMMSY HZ OPL ZUBHKPMY VHKXYUAD.OY CUL LHTYCOUM ZSALOYX CPMO MOY CPGY UGX MOY XKPBY. OPL YEYL CYKYKUMOYK THPLM UGX NSPMMYKYX THKY MOUG ALAUS, UGX UL OY LUM PG OPL LUXXSY,CKUIIYX AI PG OPL ZAK WHUM, OY SHHRYX SPRY U WOPSX MURYG HAM ZHK UGHAMPGN.MOY MOPG, OHSSHC-WOYYRYX WOYRTUK, OUBPGN NHM YBYKEMOPGN KYUXE, RYIMNSUGWPGN UM OPL TULMYK CPMO COHT OY OUX SPBYX HG MOY VYLM HZ MYKTL ZHKMOPKME EYUKL, UGX AGXYKLMUGXPGN MOY THHX OY CUL PG YDIYWMYX U ISYULUGMWOUM. U MOPKX IYKLHG KHXY AI WPKWATLIYWMSE MOKHANO MOY CHHX (PM CULISUPG MOUM OY OUX OUX U SYLLHG) UGX LMHIIYX VYOPGX MOY WHAGM. MOPLIYKLHG CUL U NKUE-VYUKXYX HSX TUG PG U CHTUG'L WSHUR, CPMO U MUSSIYURYX WUI HG OPL OYUX. OY CUL MOY VAZZHHG, COH CYGM VE U CHTUG'L GUTY,GULMULEU PBUGHBGU."CYSS, GULMULEU PBUGHBGU!" COPLIYKYX MOY WHAGM, CPGRPGN UM OPT. "PZ EHALWUKY UCUE MOY VYULM, XUGPYS'SS NPBY PM EHA!""P RGHC U MOPGN HK MCH TELYSZ!" LUPX GULMULEU PBUGHBGU."OALO!" COPLIYKYX MOY WHAGM UGX MAKGYX MH LPTHG. "OUBY EHA LYYG MOYEHAGN WHAGMYLL?" OY ULRYX. "COYKY PL LOY?""CPMO EHAGN WHAGM IYMYK, VE MOY FOUKHB KUGR NKULL," UGLCYKYX LPTHG,LTPSPGN. "MOHANO LOY'L U SUXE, LOY'L BYKE ZHGX HZ OAGMPGN.""UGX EHA'KY LAKIKPLYX UM MOY CUE LOY KPXYL, LPTHG, YO?" LUPX MOY WHAGM."LOY'L UL NHHX UL TUGE U TUG!""HZ WHAKLY! PM'L TUKBYSHAL. LH VHSX, LH YULE!""UGX GPWOHSUL? COYKY PL OY? VE MOY SEUXHB AISUGX, PLG'M OY?""EYL, LPK. OY RGHCL COYKY MH LMUGX. OY AGXYKLMUGXL MOY TUMMYK LH CYSSMOUM XUGPYS UGX P UKY HZMYG JAPMY ULMHAGXYX," LUPX LPTHG, CYSS RGHCPGNCOUM CHASX ISYULY OPL TULMYK."KPXYL CYSS, YO? UGX OHC CYSS OY SHHRL HG OPL OHKLY, YO?""U IYKZYWM IPWMAKY! OHC OY WOULYX U ZHD HAM HZ MOY KUGR NKULL VE MOYFUBUKFPGLR MOPWRYM MOY HMOYK XUE! SYUIYX U ZYUKZAS ISUWY; COUM U LPNOMCOYG MOYE KALOYX ZKHT MOY WHBYKM... MOY OHKLY CHKMO U MOHALUGX KAVSYLUGX MOY KPXYK VYEHGX USS IKPWY! EYL, HGY CHASX OUBY MH LYUKWO ZUK MHZPGX UGHMOYK UL LTUKM.""MH LYUKWO ZUK..." KYIYUMYX MOY WHAGM, YBPXYGMSE LHKKE LPTHG OUX GHMLUPX THKY. "MH LYUKWO ZUK," OY LUPX, MAKGPGN VUWR MOY LRPKM HZ OPL WHUMMH NYM UM OPL LGAZZVHD."MOY HMOYK XUE COYG OY WUTY HAM ZKHT TULL PG ZASS AGPZHKT, TPWOUYSLPXHKEWO..." LPTHG XPX GHM ZPGPLO, ZHK HG MOY LMPSS UPK OY OUXXPLMPGWMSE WUANOM MOY TALPW HZ MOY OAGM CPMO HGSE MCH HK MOKYY OHAGXLNPBPGN MHGNAY. OY VYGM XHCG OPL OYUX UGX SPLMYGYX, LOURPGN U CUKGPGNZPGNYK UM OPL TULMYK. "MOYE UKY HG MOY LWYGM HZ MOY WAVL..." OYCOPLIYKYX, "LMKUPNOM MH MOY SEUXHB AISUGXL."MOY WHAGM, ZHKNYMMPGN MH LTHHMO HAM MOY LTPSY HG OPL ZUWY, SHHRYX PGMHMOY XPLMUGWY LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OPT, XHCG MOY GUKKHC HIYG LIUWY, OHSXPGNMOY LGAZZVHD PG OPL OUGX VAM GHM MURPGN UGE. UZMYK MOY WKE HZ MOY OHAGXLWUTY MOY XYYI MHGYL HZ MOY CHSZ WUSS ZKHT XUGPYS'L OAGMPGN OHKG; MOYIUWR QHPGYX MOY ZPKLM MOKYY OHAGXL UGX MOYE WHASX VY OYUKX PG ZASS WKE,CPMO MOUM IYWASPUK SPZM PG MOY GHMY MOUM PGXPWUMYL MOUM MOYE UKY UZMYKU CHSZ. MOY COPIIYKL-PG GH SHGNYK LYM HG MOY OHAGXL, VAM WOUGNYX MH MOYWKE HZ ASEASEA, UGX UVHBY MOY HMOYKL KHLY XUGPYS'L BHPWY, GHC U XYYIVULL, GHC IPYKWPGNSE LOKPSS. OPL BHPWY LYYTYX MH ZPSS MOY COHSY CHHX UGXWUKKPYX ZUK VYEHGX HAM PGMH MOY HIYG ZPYSX.UZMYK SPLMYGPGN U ZYC THTYGML PG LPSYGWY, MOY WHAGM UGX OPL UMMYGXUGMWHGBPGWYX MOYTLYSBYL MOUM MOY OHAGXL OUX LYIUKUMYX PGMH MCH IUWRL: MOYLHAGX HZ MOY SUKNYK IUWR, YUNYKSE NPBPGN MHGNAY, VYNUG MH XPY UCUE PGMOY XPLMUGWY, MOY HMOYK IUWR KALOYX VE MOY CHHX IULM MOY WHAGM, UGX PMCUL CPMO MOPL MOUM XUGPYS'L BHPWY CUL OYUKX WUSSPGN ASEASEA. MOY LHAGXLHZ VHMO IUWRL TPGNSYX UGX VKHRY UIUKM UNUPG, VAM VHMO CYKY VYWHTPGN THKYXPLMUGM.LPTHG LPNOYX UGX LMHHIYX MH LMKUPNOMYG MOY SYULO U EHAGN VHKFHP OUXYGMUGNSYX; MOY WHAGM MHH LPNOYX UGX, GHMPWPGN MOY LGAZZVHD PG OPL OUGX,HIYGYX PM UGX MHHR U IPGWO. "VUWR!" WKPYX LPTHG MH U VHKFHP MOUM CULIALOPGN ZHKCUKX HAM HZ MOY CHHX. MOY WHAGM LMUKMYX UGX XKHIIYX MOYLGAZZVHD. GULMULEU PBUGHBGU XPLTHAGMYX MH IPWR PM AI. MOY WHAGM UGXLPTHG CYKY SHHRPGN UM OPT.MOYG, AGYDIYWMYXSE, UL HZMYG OUIIYGL, MOY LHAGX HZ MOY OAGM LAXXYGSEUIIKHUWOYX, UL PZ MOY OHAGXL PG ZASS WKE UGX XUGPYS ASEASEAPGN CYKY QALMPG ZKHGM HZ MOYT.MOY WHAGM MAKGYX UGX LUC HG OPL KPNOM TPMRU LMUKPGN UM OPT CPMO YEYLLMUKMPGN HAM HZ OPL OYUX, KUPLPGN OPL WUI UGX IHPGMPGN VYZHKY OPT MH MOYHMOYK LPXY."SHHR HAM!" OY LOHAMYX, PG U BHPWY ISUPGSE LOHCPGN MOUM OY OUX SHGNZKYMMYX MH AMMYK MOUM CHKX, UGX SYMMPGN MOY VHKFHPL LSPI OY NUSSHIYXMHCUKX MOY WHAGM.MOY WHAGM UGX LPTHG NUSSHIYX HAM HZ MOY CHHX UGX LUC HG MOYPK SYZM UCHSZ COPWO, LHZMSE LCUEPGN ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY, CUL WHTPGN UM U JAPYMSHIY ZUKMOYK MH MOY SYZM MH MOY BYKE ISUWY COYKY MOYE CYKY LMUGXPGN.MOY UGNKE VHKFHPL COPGYX UGX NYMMPGN ZKYY HZ MOY SYULO KALOYX IULM MOYOHKLYL' ZYYM UM MOY CHSZ.MOY CHSZ IUALYX, MAKGYX PML OYUBE ZHKYOYUX MHCUKX MOY XHNL UCRCUKXSE,SPRY U TUG LAZZYKPGN ZKHT MOY JAPGLE, UGX, LMPSS LSPNOMSE LCUEPGNZKHT LPXY MH LPXY, NUBY U WHAISY HZ SYUIL UGX CPMO U LCPLO HZ PML MUPSXPLUIIYUKYX PGMH MOY LRPKM HZ MOY CHHX. UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM, CPMO U WKESPRY U CUPS, ZPKLM HGY OHAGX, MOYG UGHMOYK, UGX MOYG UGHMOYK, LIKUGNOYSMYK-LRYSMYK ZKHT MOY CHHX HIIHLPMY UGX MOY COHSY IUWR KALOYX UWKHLLMOY ZPYSX MHCUKX MOY BYKE LIHM COYKY MOY CHSZ OUX XPLUIIYUKYX. MOY OUFYSVALOYL IUKMYX VYOPGX MOY OHAGXL UGX XUGPYS'L WOYLMGAM OHKLY UIIYUKYX,XUKR CPMO LCYUM. HG PML SHGN VUWR LUM XUGPYS, OAGWOYX ZHKCUKX, WUISYLL,OPL XPLOYBYSYX NKUE OUPK OUGNPGN HBYK OPL ZSALOYX, IYKLIPKPGN ZUWY."ASEASEASEA! ASEASEA!..." OY WKPYX. COYG OY WUANOM LPNOM HZ MOY WHAGMOPL YEYL ZSULOYX SPNOMGPGN."VSULM EHA!" OY LOHAMYX, OHSXPGN AI OPL COPI MOKYUMYGPGNSE UM MOY WHAGM."EHA'BY SYM MOY CHSZ NH!... COUM LIHKMLTYG!" UGX UL PZ LWHKGPGN MHLUE THKY MH MOY ZKPNOMYGYX UGX LOUTYZUWYX WHAGM, OY SULOYX MOY OYUBPGNZSUGRL HZ OPL LCYUMPGN WOYLMGAM NYSXPGN CPMO USS MOY UGNYK MOY WHAGMOUX UKHALYX UGX ZSYC HZZ UZMYK MOY OHAGXL. MOY WHAGM, SPRY U IAGPLOYXLWOHHSVHE, SHHRYX KHAGX, MKEPGN VE U LTPSY MH CPG LPTHG'L LETIUMOE ZHKOPL ISPNOM. VAM LPTHG CUL GH SHGNYK MOYKY. OY CUL NUSSHIPGN KHAGX VE MOYVALOYL COPSY MOY ZPYSX CUL WHTPGN AI HG VHMO LPXYL, USS MKEPGN MH OYUXMOY CHSZ, VAM PM BUGPLOYX PGMH MOY CHHX VYZHKY MOYE WHASX XH LH.WOUIMYK BGPWOHSUL KHLMHB TYUGCOPSY KYTUPGYX UM OPL IHLM, CUPMPGN ZHK MOY CHSZ. VEMOY CUE MOY OAGM UIIKHUWOYX UGX KYWYXYX, VE MOY WKPYL HZ MOY XHNLCOHLY GHMYL CYKY ZUTPSPUK MH OPT, VE MOY CUE MOY BHPWYL HZ MOY OAGMLTYGUIIKHUWOYX, KYWYXYX, UGX KHLY, OY KYUSPFYX COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN UM MOYWHILY. OY RGYC MOUM EHAGN UGX HSX CHSBYL CYKY MOYKY, MOUM MOY OHAGXL OUXLYIUKUMYX PGMH MCH IUWRL, MOUM LHTYCOYKY U CHSZ CUL VYPGN WOULYX, UGXMOUM LHTYMOPGN OUX NHGY CKHGN. OY YDIYWMYX MOY CHSZ MH WHTY OPL CUE UGETHTYGM. OY TUXY MOHALUGXL HZ XPZZYKYGM WHGQYWMAKYL UL MH COYKY UGXZKHT COUM LPXY MOY VYULM CHASX WHTY UGX OHC OY CHASX LYM AIHG PM. OHIYUSMYKGUMYX CPMO XYLIUPK. LYBYKUS MPTYL OY UXXKYLLYX U IKUEYK MH NHXMOUM MOY CHSZ LOHASX WHTY OPL CUE. OY IKUEYX CPMO MOUM IULLPHGUMY UGXLOUTYZUWYX ZYYSPGN CPMO COPWO TYG IKUE UM THTYGML HZ NKYUM YDWPMYTYGMUKPLPGN ZKHT MKPBPUS WUALYL. "COUM CHASX PM VY MH MOYY MH XH MOPL ZHKTY?" OY LUPX MH NHX. "P RGHC MOHA UKM NKYUM, UGX MOUM PM PL U LPG MH ULRMOPL HZ MOYY, VAM ZHK NHX'L LURY XH SYM MOY HSX CHSZ WHTY TE CUE UGXSYM RUKUE LIKPGN UM PM--PG LPNOM HZ 'AGWSY' COH PL CUMWOPGN ZKHT HBYKMOYKY--UGX LYPFY PM VE MOY MOKHUM PG U XYUMO NKPI!" U MOHALUGX MPTYLXAKPGN MOUM OUSZ-OHAK KHLMHB WULM YUNYK UGX KYLMSYLL NSUGWYL HBYK MOYYXNY HZ MOY CHHX, CPMO MOY MCH LWKUNNE HURL KPLPGN UVHBY MOY ULIYGAGXYKNKHCMO UGX MOY NASSE CPMO PML CUMYK-CHKG LPXY UGX "AGWSY'L" WUIQALM BPLPVSY UVHBY MOY VALO HG OPL KPNOM."GH, P LOUG'M OUBY LAWO SAWR," MOHANOM KHLMHB, "EYM COUM CHASXG'M PMVY CHKMO! PM PL GHM MH VY! YBYKECOYKY, UM WUKXL UGX PG CUK, P UT USCUELAGSAWRE." TYTHKPYL HZ UALMYKSPMF UGX HZ XHSHROHB ZSULOYX KUIPXSE UGXWSYUKSE MOKHANO OPL TPGX. "HGSE HGWY PG TE SPZY MH NYM UG HSX CHSZ, PCUGM HGSE MOUM!" MOHANOM OY, LMKUPGPGN YEYL UGX YUKL UGX SHHRPGN MH MOYSYZM UGX MOYG MH MOY KPNOM UGX SPLMYGPGN MH MOY LSPNOMYLM BUKPUMPHG HZGHMY PG MOY WKPYL HZ MOY XHNL.UNUPG OY SHHRYX MH MOY KPNOM UGX LUC LHTYMOPGN KAGGPGN MHCUKX OPT UWKHLLMOY XYLYKMYX ZPYSX. "GH, PM WUG'M VY!" MOHANOM KHLMHB, MURPGN U XYYIVKYUMO, UL U TUG XHYL UM MOY WHTPGN HZ LHTYMOPGN SHGN OHIYX ZHK. MOYOYPNOM HZ OUIIPGYLL CUL KYUWOYX--UGX LH LPTISE, CPMOHAM CUKGPGN, HKGHPLY, HK XPLISUE, MOUM KHLMHB WHASX GHM VYSPYBY OPL YEYL UGX KYTUPGYXPG XHAVM ZHK HBYK U LYWHGX. MOY CHSZ KUG ZHKCUKX UGX QATIYX OYUBPSE HBYKU NASSE MOUM SUE PG OYK IUMO. LOY CUL UG HSX UGPTUS CPMO U NKUE VUWR UGXVPN KYXXPLO VYSSE. LOY KUG CPMOHAM OAKKE, YBPXYGMSE ZYYSPGN LAKY MOUMGH HGY LUC OYK. KHLMHB, OHSXPGN OPL VKYUMO, SHHRYX KHAGX UM MOY VHKFHPL.MOYE LMHHX HK SUE GHM LYYPGN MOY CHSZ HK AGXYKLMUGXPGN MOY LPMAUMPHG.HSX RUKUE OUX MAKGYX OPL OYUX UGX CUL UGNKPSE LYUKWOPGN ZHK ZSYUL,VUKPGN OPL EYSSHC MYYMO UGX LGUIIPGN UM OPL OPGX SYNL."ASEASEASEA!" COPLIYKYX KHLMHB, IHAMPGN OPL SPIL. MOY VHKFHPL QATIYX AI,QYKRPGN MOY KPGNL HZ MOY SYULOYL UGX IKPWRPGN MOYPK YUKL. RUKUE ZPGPLOYXLWKUMWOPGN OPL OPGXJAUKMYKL UGX, WHWRPGN OPL YUKL, NHM AI CPMO JAPBYKPGNMUPS ZKHT COPWO MAZML HZ TUMMYX OUPK OAGN XHCG."LOUSS P SHHLY MOYT HK GHM?" GPWOHSUL ULRYX OPTLYSZ UL MOY CHSZUIIKHUWOYX OPT WHTPGN ZKHT MOY WHILY. LAXXYGSE MOY CHSZ'L COHSYIOELPHNGHTE WOUGNYX: LOY LOAXXYKYX, LYYPGN COUM LOY OUX IKHVUVSE GYBYKLYYG VYZHKY--OATUG YEYL ZPDYX AIHG OYK--UGX MAKGPGN OYK OYUX U SPMMSYMHCUKX KHLMHB, LOY IUALYX."VUWR HK ZHKCUKX? YO, GH TUMMYK, ZHKCUKX..." MOY CHSZ LYYTYX MH LUE MHOYKLYSZ, UGX LOY THBYX ZHKCUKX CPMOHAM UNUPG SHHRPGN KHAGX UGX CPMO UJAPYM, SHGN, YULE EYM KYLHSAMY SHIY."ASEASEA!" WKPYX GPWOHSUL, PG U BHPWY GHM OPL HCG, UGX HZ PML HCG UWWHKXOPL NHHX OHKLY XUKMYX OYUXSHGN XHCGOPSS, SYUIPGN HBYK NASSPYL MH OYUXHZZ MOY CHSZ, UGX MOY VHKFHPL IULLYX PM, KAGGPGN ZULMYK LMPSS. GPWOHSULXPX GHM OYUK OPL HCG WKE GHK ZYYS MOUM OY CUL NUSSHIPGN, GHK LYY MOYVHKFHPL, GHK MOY NKHAGX HBYK COPWO OY CYGM: OY LUC HGSE MOY CHSZ, COH,PGWKYULPGN OYK LIYYX, VHAGXYX HG PG MOY LUTY XPKYWMPHG USHGN MOY OHSSHC.MOY ZPKLM MH WHTY PGMH BPYC CUL TPSRU, CPMO OYK VSUWR TUKRPGNL UGXIHCYKZAS JAUKMYKL, NUPGPGN AIHG MOY CHSZ. GYUKYK UGX GYUKYK... GHC LOYCUL UOYUX HZ PM; VAM MOY CHSZ MAKGYX PML OYUX MH ZUWY OYK, UGX PGLMYUXHZ IAMMPGN HG LIYYX UL LOY ALAUSSE XPX TPSRU LAXXYGSE KUPLYX OYK MUPSUGX LMPZZYGYX OYK ZHKYSYNL."ASEASEASEASEA!" LOHAMYX GPWOHSUL.MOY KYXXPLO SEAVPT KALOYX ZHKCUKX ZKHT VYOPGX TPSRU, LIKUGN PTIYMAHALSEUM MOY CHSZ, UGX LYPFYX PM VE PML OPGXJAUKMYKL, VAM PTTYXPUMYSE QATIYXULPXY PG MYKKHK. MOY CHSZ WKHAWOYX, NGULOYX OYK MYYMO, UGX UNUPG KHLYUGX VHAGXYX ZHKCUKX, ZHSSHCYX UM MOY XPLMUGWY HZ U WHAISY HZ ZYYM VE USSMOY VHKFHPL, COH XPX GHM NYM UGE WSHLYK MH OYK."LOY'SS NYM UCUE! GH, PM'L PTIHLLPVSY!" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, LMPSS LOHAMPGNCPMO U OHUKLY BHPWY."RUKUE, ASEASEA!..." OY LOHAMYX, SHHRPGN KHAGX ZHK MOY HSX VHKFHP COHCUL GHC OPL HGSE OHIY. RUKUE, CPMO USS MOY LMKYGNMO UNY OUX SYZM OPT,LMKYMWOYX OPTLYSZ MH MOY AMTHLM UGX, CUMWOPGN MOY CHSZ, NUSSHIYX OYUBPSEULPXY MH PGMYKWYIM PM. VAM MOY JAPWRGYLL HZ MOY CHSZ'L SHIY UGX MOYVHKFHP'L LSHCYK IUWY TUXY PM ISUPG MOUM RUKUE OUX TPLWUSWASUMYX.GPWOHSUL WHASX USKYUXE LYY GHM ZUK PG ZKHGM HZ OPT MOY CHHX COYKY MOYCHSZ CHASX WYKMUPGSE YLWUIY LOHASX LOY KYUWO PM. VAM, WHTPGN MHCUKXOPT, OY LUC OHAGXL UGX U OAGMLTUG NUSSHIPGN USTHLM LMKUPNOM UM MOY CHSZ.MOYKY CUL LMPSS OHIY. U SHGN, EYSSHCPLO EHAGN VHKFHP, HGY GPWOHSUL XPXGHM RGHC, ZKHT UGHMOYK SYULO, KALOYX PTIYMAHALSE UM MOY CHSZ ZKHT PGZKHGM UGX USTHLM RGHWRYX OYK HBYK. VAM MOY CHSZ QATIYX AI THKY JAPWRSEMOUG UGEHGY WHASX OUBY YDIYWMYX UGX, NGULOPGN OYK MYYMO, ZSYC UM MOYEYSSHCPLO VHKFHP, COPWO, CPMO U IPYKWPGN EYSI, ZYSS CPMO PML OYUX HG MOYNKHAGX, VSYYXPGN ZKHT U NULO PG PML LPXY."RUKUE? HSX ZYSSHC!..." CUPSYX GPWOHSUL.MOUGRL MH MOY XYSUE WUALYX VE MOPL WKHLLPGN HZ MOY CHSZ'L IUMO, MOY HSXXHN CPMO PML ZYSMYX OUPK OUGNPGN ZKHT PML MOPNO CUL CPMOPG ZPBY IUWYL HZPM. UL PZ UCUKY HZ OYK XUGNYK, MOY CHSZ MAKGYX OYK YEYL HG RUKUE, MAWRYXOYK MUPS EYM ZAKMOYK VYMCYYG OYK SYNL, UGX PGWKYULYX OYK LIYYX. VAMOYKY GPWOHSUL HGSE LUC MOUM LHTYMOPGN OUIIYGYX MH RUKUE--MOY VHKFHP CULLAXXYGSE HG MOY CHSZ, UGX MOYE KHSSYX MHNYMOYK XHCG PGMH U NASSE QALM PGZKHGM HZ MOYT.MOUM PGLMUGM, COYG GPWOHSUL LUC MOY CHSZ LMKANNSPGN PG MOY NASSECPMO MOY XHNL, COPSY ZKHT AGXYK MOYT WHASX VY LYYG OYK NKUE OUPK UGXHAMLMKYMWOYX OPGX SYN UGX OYK ZKPNOMYGYX WOHRPGN OYUX, CPMO OYK YUKLSUPX VUWR (RUKUE CUL IPGGPGN OYK VE MOY MOKHUM), CUL MOY OUIIPYLM THTYGMHZ OPL SPZY. CPMO OPL OUGX HG OPL LUXXSYVHC, OY CUL KYUXE MH XPLTHAGMUGX LMUV MOY CHSZ, COYG LOY LAXXYGSE MOKALM OYK OYUX AI ZKHT UTHGN MOUMTULL HZ XHNL, UGX MOYG OYK ZHKYIUCL CYKY HG MOY YXNY HZ MOY NASSE. LOYWSPWRYX OYK MYYMO (RUKUE GH SHGNYK OUX OYK VE MOY MOKHUM), SYUIYX CPMOU THBYTYGM HZ OYK OPGX SYNL HAM HZ MOY NASSE, UGX OUBPGN XPLYGNUNYXOYKLYSZ ZKHT MOY XHNL, CPMO MUPS MAWRYX PG UNUPG, CYGM ZHKCUKX. RUKUE,OPL OUPK VKPLMSPGN, UGX IKHVUVSE VKAPLYX HK CHAGXYX, WSPTVYX CPMOXPZZPWASME HAM HZ MOY NASSE."HO TE NHX! COE?" GPWOHSUL WKPYX PG XYLIUPK."AGWSY'L" OAGMLTUG CUL NUSSHIPGN ZKHT MOY HMOYK LPXY UWKHLL MOY CHSZ'LIUMO UGX OPL VHKFHPL HGWY THKY LMHIIYX MOY UGPTUS'L UXBUGWY. LOY CULUNUPG OYTTYX PG.GPWOHSUL UGX OPL UMMYGXUGM, CPMO "AGWSY" UGX OPL OAGMLTUG, CYKY USSKPXPGN KHAGX MOY CHSZ, WKEPGN "ASEASEA!" LOHAMPGN UGX IKYIUKPGN MHXPLTHAGM YUWO THTYGM MOUM MOY CHSZ WKHAWOYX VUWR, UGX LMUKMPGN ZHKCUKXUNUPG YBYKE MPTY LOY LOHHR OYKLYSZ UGX THBYX MHCUKX MOY CHHX COYKY LOYCHASX VY LUZY.USKYUXE, UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOPL WOULY, XUGPYS, OYUKPGN MOY ASEASEAPGN,OUX KALOYX HAM ZKHT MOY CHHX. OY LUC RUKUE LYPFY MOY CHSZ, UGX WOYWRYXOPL OHKLY, LAIIHLPGN MOY UZZUPK MH VY HBYK. VAM COYG OY LUC MOUM MOYOHKLYTYG XPX GHM XPLTHAGM UGX MOUM MOY CHSZ LOHHR OYKLYSZ UGX KUG ZHKLUZYME, XUGPYS LYM OPL WOYLMGAM NUSSHIPGN, GHM UM MOY CHSZ VAM LMKUPNOMMHCUKX MOY CHHX, QALM UL RUKUE OUX KAG MH WAM MOY UGPTUS HZZ. UL UKYLASM HZ MOPL, OY NUSSHIYX AI MH MOY CHSZ QALM COYG LOY OUX VYYGLMHIIYX U LYWHGX MPTY VE "AGWSY'L" VHKFHPL.XUGPYS NUSSHIYX AI LPSYGMSE, OHSXPGN U GURYX XUNNYK PG OPL SYZM OUGX UGXMOKULOPGN MOY SUVHKPGN LPXYL HZ OPL WOYLMGAM OHKLY CPMO OPL COPI UL PZPM CYKY U ZSUPS.GPWOHSUL GYPMOYK LUC GHK OYUKX XUGPYS AGMPS MOY WOYLMGAM, VKYUMOPGNOYUBPSE, IUGMYX IULM OPT, UGX OY OYUKX MOY ZUSS HZ U VHXE UGX LUC XUGPYSSEPGN HG MOY CHSZ'L VUWR UTHGN MOY XHNL, MKEPGN MH LYPFY OYK VE MOYYUKL. PM CUL YBPXYGM MH MOY XHNL, MOY OAGMYKL, UGX MH MOY CHSZ OYKLYSZMOUM USS CUL GHC HBYK. MOY MYKKPZPYX CHSZ IKYLLYX VUWR OYK YUKL UGXMKPYX MH KPLY, VAM MOY VHKFHPL LMAWR MH OYK. XUGPYS KHLY U SPMMSY, MHHRU LMYI, UGX CPMO OPL COHSY CYPNOM, UL PZ SEPGN XHCG MH KYLM, ZYSS HGMOY CHSZ, LYPFPGN OYK VE MOY YUKL. GPWOHSUL CUL UVHAM MH LMUV OYK, VAMXUGPYS COPLIYKYX, "XHG'M! CY'SS NUN OYK!" UGX, WOUGNPGN OPL IHLPMPHG,LYM OPL ZHHM HG MOY CHSZ'L GYWR. U LMPWR CUL MOKALM VYMCYYG OYK QUCLUGX LOY CUL ZULMYGYX CPMO U SYULO, UL PZ VKPXSYX, OYK SYNL CYKY VHAGXMHNYMOYK, UGX XUGPYS KHSSYX OYK HBYK HGWY HK MCPWY ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY.CPMO OUIIE, YDOUALMYX ZUWYL, MOYE SUPX MOY HSX CHSZ, USPBY, HG U LOEPGNUGX LGHKMPGN OHKLY UGX, UWWHTIUGPYX VE MOY XHNL EYSIPGN UM OYK, MHHR OYKMH MOY ISUWY COYKY MOYE CYKY USS MH TYYM. MOY OHAGXL OUX RPSSYX MCH HZMOY WAVL UGX MOY VHKFHPL MOKYY. MOY OAGMLTYG ULLYTVSYX CPMO MOYPK VHHMEUGX MOYPK LMHKPYL, UGX USS WUTY MH SHHR UM MOY CHSZ, COPWO, CPMO OYKVKHUX-VKHCYX OYUX OUGNPGN XHCG UGX MOY VPMMYG LMPWR VYMCYYG OYK QUCL,NUFYX CPMO NKYUM NSULLE YEYL UM MOPL WKHCX HZ XHNL UGX TYG LAKKHAGXPGNOYK. COYG LOY CUL MHAWOYX, LOY QYKRYX OYK VHAGX SYNL UGX SHHRYX CPSXSEEYM LPTISE UM YBYKEVHXE. HSX WHAGM KHLMHB USLH KHXY AI UGX MHAWOYX MOYCHSZ."HO, COUM U ZHKTPXUVSY HGY!" LUPX OY. "U ZHKTPXUVSY HGY, YO?" OY ULRYXXUGPYS, COH CUL LMUGXPGN GYUK."EYL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," UGLCYKYX XUGPYS, JAPWRSE XHZZPGN OPL WUI.MOY WHAGM KYTYTVYKYX MOY CHSZ OY OUX SYM LSPI UGX OPL YGWHAGMYK CPMOXUGPYS."UO, VAM EHA UKY U WKALME ZYSSHC, ZKPYGX!" LUPX MOY WHAGM.ZHK LHSY KYISE XUGPYS NUBY OPT U LOE, WOPSXSPRY, TYYR, UGX UTPUVSYLTPSY.WOUIMYK BPMOY HSX WHAGM CYGM OHTY, UGX GUMULOU UGX IYMEU IKHTPLYX MH KYMAKG BYKELHHG, VAM UL PM CUL LMPSS YUKSE MOY OAGM CYGM ZUKMOYK. UM TPXXUEMOYE IAM MOY OHAGXL PGMH U KUBPGY MOPWRSE HBYKNKHCG CPMO EHAGN MKYYL.GPWOHSUL LMUGXPGN PG U ZUSSHC ZPYSX WHASX LYY USS OPL COPIL.ZUWPGN OPT SUE U ZPYSX HZ CPGMYK KEY, MOYKY OPL HCG OAGMLTUG LMHHX USHGYPG U OHSSHC VYOPGX U OUFYS VALO. MOY OHAGXL OUX LWUKWYSE VYYG SHHLYXVYZHKY GPWOHSUL OYUKX HGY OY RGYC, BHSMHKG, NPBPGN MHGNAY UM PGMYKBUSL;HMOYK OHAGXL QHPGYX PG, GHC IUALPGN UGX GHC UNUPG NPBPGN MHGNAY. UTHTYGM SUMYK OY OYUKX U WKE ZKHT MOY CHHXYX KUBPGY MOUM U ZHD OUX VYYGZHAGX, UGX MOY COHSY IUWR, QHPGPGN MHNYMOYK, KALOYX USHGN MOY KUBPGYMHCUKX MOY KEYZPYSX UGX UCUE ZKHT GPWOHSUL.OY LUC MOY COPIL PG MOYPK KYX WUIL NUSSHIPGN USHGN MOY YXNY HZ MOYKUBPGY, OY YBYG LUC MOY OHAGXL, UGX CUL YDIYWMPGN U ZHD MH LOHC PMLYSZUM UGE THTYGM HG MOY KEYZPYSX HIIHLPMY.MOY OAGMLTUG LMUGXPGN PG MOY OHSSHC THBYX UGX SHHLYX OPL VHKFHPL, UGXGPWOHSUL LUC U JAYYK, LOHKM-SYNNYX KYX ZHD CPMO U ZPGY VKALO NHPGN OUKXUWKHLL MOY ZPYSX. MOY VHKFHPL VHKY XHCG HG PM.... GHC MOYE XKYC WSHLYMH MOY ZHD COPWO VYNUG MH XHXNY VYMCYYG MOY ZPYSX PG LOUKIYK UGX LOUKIYKWAKBYL, MKUPSPGN PML VKALO, COYG LAXXYGSE U LMKUGNY COPMY VHKFHP XULOYXPG ZHSSHCYX VE U VSUWR HGY, UGX YBYKEMOPGN CUL PG WHGZALPHG; MOY VHKFHPLZHKTYX U LMUK-LOUIYX ZPNAKY, LWUKWYSE LCUEPGN MOYPK VHXPYL UGX CPMOMUPSL MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY NKHAI. MCH OAGMLTYG NUSSHIYX AIMH MOY XHNL; HGY PG U KYX WUI, MOY HMOYK, U LMKUGNYK, PG U NKYYG WHUM."COUM'L MOPL?" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL. "COYKY'L MOUM OAGMLTUG ZKHT? OY PL GHM'AGWSY'L' TUG."MOY OAGMLTYG NHM MOY ZHD, VAM LMUEYX MOYKY U SHGN MPTY CPMOHAM LMKUIIPGNPM MH MOY LUXXSY. MOYPK OHKLYL, VKPXSYX UGX CPMO OPNO LUXXSYL, LMHHXGYUK MOYT UGX MOYKY MHH MOY XHNL CYKY SEPGN. MOY OAGMLTYG CUBYX MOYPKUKTL UGX XPX LHTYMOPGN MH MOY ZHD. MOYG ZKHT MOUM LIHM WUTY MOY LHAGX HZU OHKG, CPMO MOY LPNGUS UNKYYX HG PG WULY HZ U ZPNOM."MOUM'L PSUNPG'L OAGMLTUG OUBPGN U KHC CPMO HAK PBUG," LUPX GPWOHSUL'NKHHT.GPWOHSUL LYGM MOY TUG MH WUSS GUMULOU UGX IYMEU MH OPT, UGX KHXY UM UZHHMIUWY MH MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY COPIL CYKY NYMMPGN MOY OHAGXL MHNYMOYK.LYBYKUS HZ MOY ZPYSX NUSSHIYX MH MOY LIHM COYKY MOY ZPNOM CUL NHPGN HG.GPWOHSUL XPLTHAGMYX, UGX CPMO GUMULOU UGX IYMEU, COH OUX KPXXYG AI,LMHIIYX GYUK MOY OHAGXL, CUPMPGN MH LYY OHC MOY TUMMYK CHASX YGX. HAM HZMOY VALOYL WUTY MOY OAGMLTUG COH OUX VYYG ZPNOMPGN UGX KHXY MHCUKXOPL EHAGN TULMYK, CPMO MOY ZHD MPYX MH OPL WKAIIYK. COPSY LMPSS UM UXPLMUGWY OY MHHR HZZ OPL WUI UGX MKPYX MH LIYUR KYLIYWMZASSE, VAM OY CULIUSY UGX VKYUMOSYLL UGX OPL ZUWY CUL UGNKE. HGY HZ OPL YEYL CUL VSUWR,VAM OY IKHVUVSE CUL GHM YBYG UCUKY HZ PM."COUM OUL OUIIYGYX?" ULRYX GPWOHSUL."U SPRYSE MOPGN, RPSSPGN U ZHD HAK XHNL OUX OAGMYX! UGX PM CUL TE NKUEVPMWO MOUM WUANOM PM! NH MH SUC, PGXYYX!... OY LGUMWOYL UM MOY ZHD! PNUBY OPT HGY CPMO MOY ZHD. OYKY PM PL HG TE LUXXSY! XH EHA CUGM U MULMYHZ MOPL?..." LUPX MOY OAGMLTUG, IHPGMPGN MH OPL XUNNYK UGX IKHVUVSEPTUNPGPGN OPTLYSZ LMPSS LIYURPGN MH OPL ZHY.GPWOHSUL, GHM LMHIIPGN MH MUSR MH MOY TUG, ULRYX OPL LPLMYK UGX IYMEU MHCUPM ZHK OPT UGX KHXY MH MOY LIHM COYKY MOY YGYTE'L, PSUNPG'L, OAGMPGNIUKME CUL.MOY BPWMHKPHAL OAGMLTUG KHXY HZZ MH QHPG MOY ZPYSX, UGX MOYKY,LAKKHAGXYX VE PGJAPKPGN LETIUMOPFYKL, KYWHAGMYX OPL YDISHPML.MOY ZUWML CYKY MOUM PSUNPG, CPMO COHT MOY KHLMHBL OUX U JAUKKYS UGX CYKYUM SUC, OAGMYX HBYK ISUWYL MOUM VYSHGNYX VE WALMHT MH MOY KHLMHBL, UGXOUX GHC, UL PZ IAKIHLYSE, LYGM OPL TYG MH MOY BYKE CHHXL MOY KHLMHBLCYKY OAGMPGN UGX SYM OPL TUG LGUMWO U ZHD MOYPK XHNL OUX WOULYX.GPWOHSUL, MOHANO OY OUX GYBYK LYYG PSUNPG, CPMO OPL ALAUS UVLYGWYHZ THXYKUMPHG PG QAXNTYGM, OUMYX OPT WHKXPUSSE ZKHT KYIHKML HZ OPLUKVPMKUKPGYLL UGX BPHSYGWY, UGX KYNUKXYX OPT UL OPL VPMMYKYLM ZHY. OYKHXY PG UGNKE UNPMUMPHG MHCUKX OPT, ZPKTSE NKULIPGN OPL COPI UGX ZASSEIKYIUKYX MH MURY MOY THLM KYLHSAMY UGX XYLIYKUMY LMYIL MH IAGPLO OPLYGYTE.OUKXSE OUX OY IULLYX UG UGNSY HZ MOY CHHX VYZHKY U LMHAM NYGMSYTUG PGU VYUBYK WUI WUTY KPXPGN MHCUKX OPT HG U OUGXLHTY KUBYG-VSUWR OHKLY,UWWHTIUGPYX VE MCH OAGM LYKBUGML.PGLMYUX HZ UG YGYTE, GPWOHSUL ZHAGX PG PSUNPG U LMUMYSE UGX WHAKMYHALNYGMSYTUG COH CUL IUKMPWASUKSE UGDPHAL MH TURY MOY EHAGN WHAGM'LUWJAUPGMUGWY. OUBPGN KPXXYG AI MH GPWOHSUL, PSUNPG KUPLYX OPL VYUBYKWUI UGX LUPX OY TAWO KYNKYMMYX COUM OUX HWWAKKYX UGX CHASX OUBY MOY TUGIAGPLOYX COH OUX USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH LYPFY U ZHD OAGMYX VE LHTYHGY YSLY'LVHKFHPL. OY OHIYX MH VYWHTY VYMMYK UWJAUPGMYX CPMO MOY WHAGM UGX PGBPMYXOPT MH XKUC OPL WHBYKM.GUMULOU, UZKUPX MOUM OYK VKHMOYK CHASX XH LHTYMOPGN XKYUXZAS, OUXZHSSHCYX OPT PG LHTY YDWPMYTYGM. LYYPGN MOY YGYTPYL YDWOUGNPGN ZKPYGXSENKYYMPGNL, LOY KHXY AI MH MOYT. PSUNPG SPZMYX OPL VYUBYK WUI LMPSSOPNOYK MH GUMULOU UGX LUPX, CPMO U ISYULUGM LTPSY, MOUM MOY EHAGNWHAGMYLL KYLYTVSYX XPUGU PG OYK IULLPHG ZHK MOY WOULY UL CYSS UL PG OYKVYUAME, HZ COPWO OY OUX OYUKX TAWO.MH YDIPUMY OPL OAGMLTUG'L HZZYGLY, PSUNPG IKYLLYX MOY KHLMHBL MH WHTY MHUG AISUGX HZ OPL UVHAM U TPSY UCUE COPWO OY ALAUSSE RYIM ZHK OPTLYSZ UGXCOPWO, OY LUPX, LCUKTYX CPMO OUKYL. GPWOHSUL UNKYYX, UGX MOY OAGM, GHCXHAVSYX, THBYX HG.MOY CUE MH PSPNPG'L AISUGX CUL UWKHLL MOY ZPYSXL. MOY OAGM LYKBUGML ZYSSPGMH SPGY. MOY TULMYKL KHXY MHNYMOYK. "AGWSY," KHLMHB, UGX PSUNPG RYIMLMYUSMOPSE NSUGWPGN UM HGY UGHMOYK'L XHNL, MKEPGN GHM MH VY HVLYKBYX VEMOYPK WHTIUGPHGL UGX LYUKWOPGN AGYULPSE ZHK KPBUSL MH MOYPK HCG VHKFHPL.KHLMHB CUL IUKMPWASUKSE LMKAWR VE MOY VYUAME HZ U LTUSS, IAKY-VKYX,KYX-LIHMMYX VPMWO HG PSUNPG'L SYULO, LSYGXYK VAM CPMO TALWSYL SPRYLMYYS, U XYSPWUMY TAFFSY, UGX IKHTPGYGM VSUWR YEYL. OY OUX OYUKX HZ MOYLCPZMGYLL HZ PSUNPG'L VHKFHPL, UGX PG MOUM VYUAMPZAS VPMWO LUC U KPBUSMH OPL HCG TPSRU.PG MOY TPXXSY HZ U LHVYK WHGBYKLUMPHG VYNAG VE PSUNPG UVHAM MOY EYUK'LOUKBYLM, GPWOHSUL IHPGMYX MH MOY KYX-LIHMMYX VPMWO."U ZPGY SPMMSY VPMWO, MOUM!" LUPX OY PG U WUKYSYLL MHGY. "PL LOY LCPZM?""MOUM HGY? EYL, LOY'L U NHHX XHN, NYML COUM LOY'L UZMYK," UGLCYKYXPSUNPG PGXPZZYKYGMSE, HZ MOY KYX-LIHMMYX VPMWO YKFU, ZHK COPWO, U EYUKVYZHKY, OY OUX NPBYG U GYPNOVHK MOKYY ZUTPSPYL HZ OHALY LYKZL. "LH PGEHAK IUKML, MHH, MOY OUKBYLM PL GHMOPGN MH VHULM HZ, WHAGM?" OY CYGM HG,WHGMPGAPGN MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG MOYE OUX VYNAG. UGX WHGLPXYKPGN PM IHSPMYMH KYMAKG MOY EHAGN WHAGM'L WHTISPTYGM, PSUNPG SHHRYX UM OPL VHKFHPLUGX IPWRYX HAM TPSRU COH UMMKUWMYX OPL UMMYGMPHG VE OYK VKYUXMO. "MOUMVSUWR-LIHMMYX HGY HZ EHAKL PL ZPGY--CYSS LOUIYX!" LUPX OY."EYL, LOY'L ZULM YGHANO," KYISPYX GPWOHSUL, UGX MOHANOM: "PZ HGSE UZASS-NKHCG OUKY CHASX WKHLL MOY ZPYSX GHC P'X LOHC EHA COUM LHKM HZVHKFHP LOY PL," UGX MAKGPGN MH OPL NKHHT, OY LUPX OY CHASX NPBY U KAVSYMH UGEHGY COH ZHAGX U OUKY."P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX," WHGMPGAYX PSUNPG, "OHC LHTY LIHKMLTYG WUG VY LHQYUSHAL UVHAM NUTY UGX XHNL. ZHK TELYSZ, P WUG MYSS EHA, WHAGM, P YGQHEKPXPGN PG WHTIUGE LAWO UL MOPL... COUM WHASX VY VYMMYK?" (OY UNUPGKUPLYX OPL WUI MH GUMULOU) "VAM UL ZHK WHAGMPGN LRPGL UGX COUM HGYMURYL, P XHG'M WUKY UVHAM MOUM.""HZ WHAKLY GHM!""HK VYPGN AILYM VYWUALY LHTYHGY YSLY'L VHKFHP UGX GHM TPGY WUMWOYLLHTYMOPGN. USS P WUKY UVHAM PL MH YGQHE LYYPGN MOY WOULY, PL PM GHM LH,WHAGM? ZHK P WHGLPXYK MOUM...""U-MA!" WUTY MOY SHGN-XKUCG WKE HZ HGY HZ MOY VHKFHP COPIIYKL-PG, COHOUX OUSMYX. OY LMHHX HG U RGHSS PG MOY LMAVVSY, OHSXPGN OPL COPI USHZM,UGX UNUPG KYIYUMYX OPL SHGN-XKUCG WKE, "U-MA!" (MOPL WUSS UGX MOYAISPZMYX COPI TYUGM MOUM OY LUC U LPMMPGN OUKY.)"UO, OY OUL ZHAGX HGY, P MOPGR," LUPX PSUNPG WUKYSYLLSE. "EYL, CY TALMKPXY AI.... LOUSS CY VHMO WHAKLY PM?" UGLCYKYX GPWOHSUL, LYYPGN PG YKFUUGX "AGWSY'L" KYX KANUE MCH KPBUSL OY OUX GYBYK EYM OUX U WOUGWY HZIPMMPGN UNUPGLM OPL HCG VHKFHPL. "UGX LAIIHLY MOYE HAMXH TE TPSRU UMHGWY!" OY MOHANOM UL OY KHXY CPMO "AGWSY" UGX PSUNPG MHCUKX MOY OUKY."U ZASS-NKHCG HGY?" ULRYX PSUNPG UL OY UIIKHUWOYX MOY COPI COH OUXLPNOMYX MOY OUKY--UGX GHM CPMOHAM UNPMUMPHG OY SHHRYX KHAGX UGX COPLMSYXMH YKFU."UGX EHA, TPWOUYS GPRUGHKHBPWO?" OY LUPX, UXXKYLLPGN "AGWSY."MOY SUMMYK CUL KPXPGN CPMO U LASSYG YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY."OHC WUG P QHPG PG? COE, EHA'BY NPBYG U BPSSUNY ZHK YUWO HZ EHAKVHKFHPL! MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG! EHAKL UKY CHKMO MOHALUGXL. MKE EHAKLUNUPGLM HGY UGHMOYK, EHA MCH, UGX P'SS SHHR HG!""KANUE, OYE, OYE!" OY LOHAMYX. "KANUEALORU!" OY UXXYX, PGBHSAGMUKPSE VEMOPL XPTPGAMPBY YDIKYLLPGN OPL UZZYWMPHG UGX MOY OHIYL OY ISUWYX HG MOPLKYX VHKFHP. GUMULOU LUC UGX ZYSM MOY UNPMUMPHG MOY MCH YSXYKSE TYG UGXOYK VKHMOYK CYKY MKEPGN MH WHGWYUS, UGX CUL OYKLYSZ YDWPMYX VE PM.MOY OAGMLTUG LMHHX OUSZCUE AI MOY RGHSS OHSXPGN AI OPL COPI UGX MOYNYGMSYZHSR KHXY AI MH OPT UM U ZHHMIUWY; MOY OHAGXL MOUM CYKY ZUK HZZHG MOY OHKPFHG MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT MOY OUKY, UGX MOY COPIL, VAM GHM MOYNYGMSYZHSR, USLH THBYX UCUE. USS CYKY THBPGN LSHCSE UGX LYXUMYSE."OHC PL PM IHPGMPGN?" ULRYX GPWOHSUL, KPXPGN U OAGXKYX IUWYL MHCUKX MOYCOPI COH OUX LPNOMYX MOY OUKY.VAM VYZHKY MOY COPI WHASX KYISE, MOY OUKY, LWYGMPGN MOY ZKHLM WHTPGNGYDM THKGPGN, CUL AGUVSY MH KYLM UGX SYUIYX AI. MOY IUWR HG SYULO KALOYXXHCGOPSS PG ZASS WKE UZMYK MOY OUKY, UGX ZKHT USS LPXYL MOY VHKFHPL MOUMCYKY GHM HG SYULO XUKMYX UZMYK MOY OHAGXL UGX MOY OUKY. USS MOY OAGM,COH OUX VYYG THBPGN LSHCSE, LOHAMYX, "LMHI!" WUSSPGN PG MOY OHAGXL,COPSY MOY VHKFHP COPIL, CPMO U WKE HZ "U-MA!" NUSSHIYX UWKHLL MOY ZPYSXLYMMPGN MOY VHKFHPL HG MOY OUKY. MOY MKUGJAPS PSUNPG, GPWOHSUL, GUMULOU,UGX "AGWSY" ZSYC, KYWRSYLL HZ COYKY UGX OHC MOYE CYGM, LYYPGN HGSE MOYVHKFHPL UGX MOY OUKY UGX ZYUKPGN HGSE MH SHLY LPNOM YBYG ZHK UG PGLMUGMHZ MOY WOULY. MOY OUKY MOYE OUX LMUKMYX CUL U LMKHGN UGX LCPZM HGY. COYGOY QATIYX AI OY XPX GHM KAG UM HGWY, VAM IKPWRYX OPL YUKL SPLMYGPGN MHMOY LOHAMPGN UGX MKUTISPGN MOUM KYLHAGXYX ZKHT USS LPXYL UM HGWY. OYMHHR U XHFYG VHAGXL, GHM BYKE JAPWRSE, SYMMPGN MOY VHKFHPL NUPG HG OPT,UGX, ZPGUSSE OUBPGN WOHLYG OPL XPKYWMPHG UGX KYUSPFYX OPL XUGNYK, SUPXVUWR OPL YUKL UGX KALOYX HZZ OYUXSHGN. OY OUX VYYG SEPGN PG MOY LMAVVSY,VAM PG ZKHGM HZ OPT CUL MOY UAMATG LHCPGN COYKY MOY NKHAGX CUL LHZM.MOY MCH VHKFHPL HZ MOY OAGMLTUG COH OUX LPNOMYX OPT, OUBPGN VYYG MOYGYUKYLM, CYKY MOY ZPKLM MH LYY UGX IAKLAY OPT, VAM MOYE OUX GHM NHGY ZUKVYZHKY PSUNPG'L KYX-LIHMMYX YKFU IULLYX MOYT, NHM CPMOPG U SYGNMO, ZSYCUM MOY OUKY CPMO MYKKPVSY LCPZMGYLL UPTPGN UM OPL LWAM, UGX, MOPGRPGNLOY OUX LYPFYX OPT, KHSSYX HBYK SPRY U VUSS. MOY OUKY UKWOYX OPLVUWR UGX VHAGXYX HZZ EYM THKY LCPZMSE. ZKHT VYOPGX YKFU KALOYX MOYVKHUX-OUAGWOYX, VSUWR-LIHMMYX TPSRU UGX VYNUG KUIPXSE NUPGPGN HG MOYOUKY."TPSULORU, XYUK!" KHLY GPWOHSUL' MKPATIOUGM WKE. PM SHHRYX UL PZ TPSRUCHASX PTTYXPUMYSE IHAGWY HG MOY OUKY, VAM LOY HBYKMHHR OPT UGX ZSYCIULM. MOY OUKY OUX LJAUMMYX. UNUPG MOY VYUAMPZAS YKFU KYUWOYX OPT, VAMCOYG WSHLY MH MOY OUKY'L LWAM IUALYX UL PZ TYULAKPGN MOY XPLMUGWY, LH ULGHM MH TURY U TPLMURY MOPL MPTY VAM LYPFY OPL OPGX SYN."YKFU, XUKSPGN!" PSUNPG CUPSYX PG U BHPWY AGSPRY OPL HCG. YKFU XPX GHMOYUKRYG MH OPL UIIYUS. UM MOY BYKE THTYGM COYG LOY CHASX OUBY LYPFYX OYKIKYE, MOY OUKY THBYX UGX XUKMYX USHGN MOY VUSR VYMCYYG MOY CPGMYK KEYUGX MOY LMAVVSY. UNUPG YKFU UGX TPSRU CYKY UVKYULM, KAGGPGN SPRY U IUPKHZ WUKKPUNY OHKLYL, UGX VYNUG MH HBYKMURY MOY OUKY, VAM PM CUL YULPYKZHK MOY OUKY MH KAG HG MOY VUSR UGX MOY VHKFHPL XPX GHM HBYKMURY OPT LHJAPWRSE."KANUE, KANUEALORU! MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG!" WUTY U MOPKX BHPWY QALM MOYG,UGX "AGWSY'L" KYX VHKFHP, LMKUPGPGN UGX WAKBPGN PML VUWR, WUANOM AICPMO MOY MCH ZHKYTHLM VHKFHPL, IALOYX UOYUX HZ MOYT KYNUKXSYLL HZ MOYMYKKPVSY LMKUPG, IAM HG LIYYX WSHLY MH MOY OUKY, RGHWRYX PM HZZ MOY VUSRHGMH MOY KEYZPYSX, UNUPG IAM HG LIYYX LMPSS THKY BPWPHALSE, LPGRPGN MHOPL RGYYL PG MOY TAXXE ZPYSX, UGX USS HGY WHASX LYY CUL OHC, TAXXEPGNOPL VUWR, OY KHSSYX HBYK CPMO MOY OUKY. U KPGN HZ VHKFHPL LAKKHAGXYXOPT. U THTYGM SUMYK YBYKEHGY OUX XKUCG AI KHAGX MOY WKHCX HZ XHNL. HGSEMOY XYSPNOMYX "AGWSY" XPLTHAGMYX, UGX WAM HZZ U IUX, LOURPGN MOY OUKYZHK MOY VSHHX MH XKPI HZZ, UGX UGDPHALSE NSUGWPGN KHAGX CPMO KYLMSYLLYEYL COPSY OPL UKTL UGX SYNL MCPMWOYX. OY LIHRY CPMOHAM OPTLYSZ RGHCPGNCOHT MH HK COUM UVHAM. "MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG! MOUM'L U XHN!... MOYKY,PM OUL VYUMYG MOYT USS, MOY MOHALUGX-KAVSY UL CYSS UL MOY HGY-KAVSYVHKFHPL. MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG!" LUPX OY, IUGMPGN UGX SHHRPGN CKUMOZASSEUKHAGX UL PZ OY CYKY UVALPGN LHTYHGY, UL PZ MOYE CYKY USS OPL YGYTPYLUGX OUX PGLASMYX OPT, UGX HGSE GHC OUX OY UM SULM LAWWYYXYX PGQALMPZEPGN OPTLYSZ. "EHA'BY XYLYKBYX PM, MOUM'L PM, WHTY HG!""LOY'X MPKYX OYKLYSZ HAM, LOY'X KAG PM XHCG MOKYY MPTYL VE OYKLYSZ,"LUPX GPWOHSUL, USLH GHM SPLMYGPGN MH UGEHGY UGX KYNUKXSYLL HZ COYMOYK OYCYKY OYUKX HK GHM."VAM COUM PL MOYKY PG KAGGPGN UWKHLL PM SPRY MOUM?" LUPX PSUNPG'L NKHHT."HGWY LOY OUX TPLLYX PM UGX MAKGYX PM UCUE, UGE THGNKYS WHASX MURY PM,"PSUNPG CUL LUEPGN UM MOY LUTY MPTY, VKYUMOSYLL ZKHT OPL NUSSHI UGX OPLYDWPMYTYGM. UM MOY LUTY THTYGM GUMULOU, CPMOHAM XKUCPGN VKYUMO, LWKYUTYXQHEHALSE, YWLMUMPWUSSE, UGX LH IPYKWPGNSE MOUM PM LYM YBYKEHGY'L YUKMPGNSPGN. VE MOUM LOKPYR LOY YDIKYLLYX COUM MOY HMOYKL YDIKYLLYX VE USSMUSRPGN UM HGWY, UGX PM CUL LH LMKUGNY MOUM LOY TALM OYKLYSZ OUBY VYYGULOUTYX HZ LH CPSX U WKE UGX YBYKEHGY YSLY CHASX OUBY VYYG UTUFYX UM PMUM UGE HMOYK MPTY. "AGWSY" OPTLYSZ MCPLMYX AI MOY OUKY, MOKYC PM GYUMSEUGX LTUKMSE UWKHLL OPL OHKLY'L VUWR UL PZ VE MOUM NYLMAKY OY TYUGM MHKYVARY YBYKEVHXE, UGX, CPMO UG UPK HZ GHM CPLOPGN MH LIYUR MH UGEHGY,THAGMYX OPL VUE UGX KHXY HZZ. VAM COYG PM PL, MOYG SHHR HAM!" OPL UIIYUKUGWY LYYTYX MHGPWOHSUL MH VY LUEPGN.COYG, TAWO SUMYK, "AGWSY" KHXY AI MH GPWOHSUL UGX VYNUG MUSRPGN MH OPT,OY ZYSM ZSUMMYKYX MOUM, UZMYK COUM OUX OUIIYGYX, "AGWSY" XYPNGYX MHLIYUR MH OPT.WOUIMYK BPPMHCUKX YBYGPGN PSUNPG MHHR SYUBY HZ GPWOHSUL, COH ZHAGX MOUM MOYE CYKYLH ZUK ZKHT OHTY MOUM OY UWWYIMYX "AGWSY'L" HZZYK MOUM MOY OAGMPGN IUKMELOHASX LIYGX MOY GPNOM PG OPL SPMMSY BPSSUNY HZ TPROUESHBGU."UGX PZ EHA IAM AI UM TE OHALY MOUM CPSS VY VYMMYK LMPSS. MOUM'L PM,WHTY HG!" LUPX "AGWSY." "EHA LYY PM'L XUTI CYUMOYK, UGX EHA WHASX KYLM,UGX MOY SPMMSY WHAGMYLL WHASX VY XKPBYG OHTY PG U MKUI.""AGWSY'L" HZZYK CUL UWWYIMYX. U OAGMLTUG CUL LYGM MH HMKUXGHY ZHK UMKUI, COPSY GPWOHSUL KHXY CPMO GUMULOU UGX IYMEU MH "AGWSY'L" OHALY.LHTY ZPBY TUSY XHTYLMPW LYKZL, VPN UGX SPMMSY, KALOYX HAM MH MOY ZKHGMIHKWO MH TYYM MOYPK TULMYK. U LWHKY HZ CHTYG LYKZL, HSX UGX EHAGN, ULCYSS UL WOPSXKYG, IHIIYX HAM ZKHT MOY VUWR YGMKUGWY MH OUBY U SHHR UMMOY OAGMYKL COH CYKY UKKPBPGN. MOY IKYLYGWY HZ GUMULOU--U CHTUG, U SUXE,UGX HG OHKLYVUWR--KUPLYX MOY WAKPHLPME HZ MOY LYKZL MH LAWO U XYNKYYMOUM TUGE HZ MOYT WUTY AI MH OYK, LMUKYX OYK PG MOY ZUWY, UGX AGUVULOYXVE OYK IKYLYGWY TUXY KYTUKRL UVHAM OYK UL MOHANO LOY CYKY LHTY IKHXPNEHG LOHC UGX GHM U OATUG VYPGN UVSY MH OYUK HK AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL LUPXUVHAM OYK."UKPGRU! LYY OYK RGPZY?...""PLG'M LOY U MUKMUK!""OHC PL PM EHA XPXG'M NH OYUX HBYK OYYSL?" ULRYX MOY VHSXYLM HZ USS,UXXKYLLPGN GUMULOU XPKYWMSE."AGWSY" XPLTHAGMYX UM MOY IHKWO HZ OPL SPMMSY CHHXYG OHALY COPWOLMHHX PG MOY TPXLM HZ UG HBYKNKHCG NUKXYG UGX, UZMYK U NSUGWY UM OPLKYMUPGYKL, LOHAMYX UAMOHKPMUMPBYSE MOUM MOY LAIYKZSAHAL HGYL LOHASX MURYMOYTLYSBYL HZZ UGX MOUM USS GYWYLLUKE IKYIUKUMPHGL LOHASX VY TUXY MHKYWYPBY MOY NAYLML UGX MOY BPLPMHKL.MOY LYKZL USS XPLIYKLYX. "AGWSY" SPZMYX GUMULOU HZZ OYK OHKLY UGX MURPGNOYK OUGX SYX OYK AI MOY KPWRYME CHHXYG LMYIL HZ MOY IHKWO. MOY OHALY,CPMO PML VUKY, AGISULMYKYX SHN CUSSL, CUL GHM HBYKWSYUG--PM XPX GHM LYYTMOUM MOHLY SPBPGN PG PM UPTYX UM RYYIPGN PM LIHMSYLL--VAM GYPMOYK CULPM GHMPWYUVSE GYNSYWMYX. PG MOY YGMKE MOYKY CUL U LTYSS HZ ZKYLO UIISYL,UGX CHSZ UGX ZHD LRPGL OAGN UVHAM."AGWSY" SYX MOY BPLPMHKL MOKHANO MOY UGMYKHHT PGMH U LTUSS OUSS CPMO UZHSXPGN MUVSY UGX KYX WOUPKL, MOYG PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT CPMO U KHAGXVPKWOCHHX MUVSY UGX U LHZU, UGX ZPGUSSE PGMH OPL IKPBUMY KHHT COYKYMOYKY CUL U MUMMYKYX LHZU, U CHKG WUKIYM, UGX IHKMKUPML HZ LABHKHB, HZMOY OHLM'L ZUMOYK UGX THMOYK, UGX HZ OPTLYSZ PG TPSPMUKE AGPZHKT. MOYLMAXE LTYSM LMKHGNSE HZ MHVUWWH UGX XHNL. "AGWSY" ULRYX OPL BPLPMHKLMH LPM XHCG UGX TURY MOYTLYSBYL UM OHTY, UGX MOYG CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHT.KANUE, OPL VUWR LMPSS TAXXE, WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT UGX SUE XHCG HG MOYLHZU, WSYUGPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO OPL MHGNAY UGX MYYMO. SYUXPGN ZKHT MOY LMAXECUL U IULLUNY PG COPWO U IUKMPMPHG CPMO KUNNYX WAKMUPGL WHASX VY LYYG.ZKHT VYOPGX MOPL WUTY CHTYG'L SUANOMYK UGX COPLIYKL. GUMULOU, GPWOHSUL,UGX IYMEU MHHR HZZ MOYPK CKUIL UGX LUM XHCG HG MOY LHZU. IYMEU, SYUGPGNHG OPL YSVHC, ZYSS ULSYYI UM HGWY. GUMULOU UGX GPWOHSUL CYKY LPSYGM.MOYPK ZUWYL NSHCYX, MOYE CYKY OAGNKE UGX BYKE WOYYKZAS. MOYE SHHRYXUM HGY UGHMOYK (GHC MOUM MOY OAGM CUL HBYK UGX MOYE CYKY PG MOY OHALY,GPWOHSUL GH SHGNYK WHGLPXYKYX PM GYWYLLUKE MH LOHC OPL TUGSE LAIYKPHKPMEHBYK OPL LPLMYK), GUMULOU NUBY OPT U CPGR, UGX GYPMOYK KYZKUPGYX SHGNZKHT VAKLMPGN PGMH U IYUS HZ KPGNPGN SUANOMYK YBYG VYZHKY MOYE OUX UIKYMYDM KYUXE MH UWWHAGM ZHK PM.UZMYK U COPSY "AGWSY" WUTY PG, PG U WHLLUWR WHUM, VSAY MKHALYKL, UGXLTUSS MHI VHHML.
