"LOY'L KPXXYG USS XUE SPRY U TUG, UGX PL UL ZKYLO UL YBYK!"LHHG UZMYK "AGWSY'L" KYUIIYUKUGWY MOY XHHK CUL HIYGYX, YBPXYGMSE ZKHTMOY LHAGX VE U VUKYZHHMYX NPKS, UGX U LMHAM, KHLE, NHHX-SHHRPGN CHTUGHZ UVHAM ZHKME, CPMO U XHAVSY WOPG UGX ZASS KYX SPIL, YGMYKYX WUKKEPGN USUKNY SHUXYX MKUE. UZMYKCUKXL LOY VKHANOM U ZKYLOSE KHULMYX WOPWRYG, OUT, IKYLYKBYLTUXY CPMO OHGYE, UGX IKYLYKBYL TUXY CPMO LANUK.USS MOPL CUL MOY ZKAPM HZ UGPLEU ZYXHKHBGU'L OHALYRYYIPGN, NUMOYKYX UGXIKYIUKYX VE OYK. P'T ZHGXHZ PM," LUPX "AGWSY."PM CUL MOY WALMHT ZHK TPMRU MH ISUE MOY VUSUSUERU PG MOY OAGMLTYG'L KHHTCOYG "AGWSY" KYMAKGYX ZKHT MOY WOULY. "AGWSY" CUL ZHGX HZ LAWO TALPW."OHC NHHX! KYUSSE BYKE NHHX!" WKPYX GUMULOU UM MOY XHHK UL LHHG UL MOY VUSUSUERUWYULYX. TPMRU MAGYX AI UZKYLO, UGX KYWHTTYGWYX MOKATTPGN MOY VUSUSUERUMH MOY UPK HZ TE SUXE, CPMO MKPSSL UGX BUKPUMPHGL. "AGWSY" LUMSPLMYGPGN, LSPNOMSE LTPSPGN, CPMO OPL OYUX HG HGY LPXY. MOY UPK CULKYIYUMYX U OAGXKYX MPTYL. "OYKY OY HANOM MH VAKLM HAM--MOUM'L PM, WHTYHG!--HANOM MH VAKLM HAM.""XH EHA ISUE MOYG?" P'BY NPBYG PM AI."UGPLEU ZYXHKHBGU, CPMO OYK SPNOM LMYI, CPSSPGNSE CYGM MH ZASZPSS OYKYKKUGX UGX VKHANOM VUWR MOY NAPMUK.CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM UGEHGY, "AGWSY" VSYC MOY XALM HZZ PM UGX, MUIIPGN MOYWULY CPMO OPL VHGE ZPGNYKL, MAGYX MOY NAPMUK UGX LYMMSYX OPTLYSZ PG OPLUKTWOUPK. YDWSUPTYX GPWOHSUL, UGX OY MOHANOM: "OHCWOUKTPGN MOPL GUMULOU HZ TPGY PL! P OUBY GH HMOYK ZKPYGX SPRY OYK UGXGYBYK LOUSS OUBY. COE LOHASX LOY TUKKE? CY TPNOM USCUEL XKPBY UVHAMMHNYMOYK!""COUM U XUKSPGN MOPL GPWOHSUL HZ TPGY PL!" MOHANOM GUMULOU."UO, MOYKY UKY LMPSS SPNOML PG MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT!" LOY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MHMOY CPGXHCL HZ MOY OHALY MOUM NSYUTYX PGBPMPGNSE PG MOY THPLM BYSBYMEXUKRGYLL HZ MOY GPNOM.WOUIMYK BPPPWHAGM PSEU KHLMHB OUX KYLPNGYX MOY IHLPMPHG HZ TUKLOUS HZ MOY GHVPSPMEVYWUALY PM PGBHSBYX OPT PG MHH TAWO YDIYGLY, VAM LMPSS OPL UZZUPKL XPXGHM PTIKHBY. GUMULOU UGX GPWOHSUL HZMYG GHMPWYX MOYPK IUKYGML WHGZYKKPGNMHNYMOYK UGDPHALSE UGX IKPBUMYSE UGX OYUKX LANNYLMPHGL HZ LYSSPGN MOYZPGY UGWYLMKUS KHLMHB OHALY UGX YLMUMY GYUK THLWHC. PM CUL GHM GYWYLLUKEMH YGMYKMUPG LH ZKYYSE UL COYG MOY WHAGM OUX VYYG TUKLOUS, UGX SPZY UMHMKUXGHY CUL JAPYMYK MOUG PG ZHKTYK EYUKL, VAM LMPSS MOY YGHKTHAL OHALYUGX PML SHXNYL CYKY ZASS HZ IYHISY UGX THKY MOUG MCYGME LUM XHCG MHMUVSY YBYKE XUE. MOYLY CYKY USS MOYPK HCG IYHISY COH OUX LYMMSYX XHCGPG MOY OHALY USTHLM UL TYTVYKL HZ MOY ZUTPSE, HK IYKLHGL COH CYKY, PMLYYTYX, HVSPNYX MH SPBY PG MOY WHAGM'L OHALY. LAWO CYKY XPTTSYK MOYTALPWPUG UGX OPL CPZY, BHNYS MOY XUGWPGN TULMYK UGX OPL ZUTPSE, VYSHBU,UG HSX TUPXYG SUXE, UG PGTUMY HZ MOY OHALY, UGX TUGE HMOYKL LAWO ULIYMEU'L MAMHKL, MOY NPKSL' ZHKTYK NHBYKGYLL, UGX HMOYK IYHISY COH LPTISEZHAGX PM IKYZYKUVSY UGX THKY UXBUGMUNYHAL MH SPBY PG MOY WHAGM'L OHALYMOUG UM OHTY. MOYE OUX GHM UL TUGE BPLPMHKL UL VYZHKY, VAM MOY HSXOUVPML HZ SPZY CPMOHAM COPWO MOY WHAGM UGX WHAGMYLL WHASX GHMWHGWYPBY HZ YDPLMYGWY KYTUPGYX AGWOUGNYX. MOYKY CUL LMPSS MOY OAGMPGNYLMUVSPLOTYGM COPWO GPWOHSUL OUX YBYG YGSUKNYX, MOY LUTY ZPZME OHKLYLUGX ZPZMYYG NKHHTL PG MOY LMUVSYL, MOY LUTY YDIYGLPBY IKYLYGML UGXXPGGYK IUKMPYL MH MOY COHSY XPLMKPWM HG GUTY XUEL; MOYKY CYKY LMPSS MOYWHAGM'L NUTYL HZ COPLM UGX VHLMHG, UM COPWO--LIKYUXPGN HAM OPL WUKXL LHMOUM YBYKEVHXE WHASX LYY MOYT--OY SYM OPTLYSZ VY ISAGXYKYX HZ OAGXKYXLHZ KAVSYL YBYKE XUE VE OPL GYPNOVHKL, COH SHHRYX AIHG UG HIIHKMAGPME MHISUE U KAVVYK CPMO WHAGM KHLMHB UL U THLM IKHZPMUVSY LHAKWY HZ PGWHTY.MOY WHAGM THBYX PG OPL UZZUPKL UL PG U OANY GYM, MKEPGN GHM MH VYSPYBYMOUM OY CUL YGMUGNSYX VAM VYWHTPGN THKY UGX THKY LH UM YBYKE LMYI, UGXZYYSPGN MHH ZYYVSY MH VKYUR MOY TYLOYL HK MH LYM MH CHKR WUKYZASSE UGXIUMPYGMSE MH XPLYGMUGNSY MOYT. MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMO OYK SHBPGN OYUKM, ZYSMMOUM OYK WOPSXKYG CYKY VYPGN KAPGYX, MOUM PM CUL GHM MOY WHAGM'L ZUASMZHK OY WHASX GHM OYSI VYPGN COUM OY CUL--MOUM (MOHANO OY MKPYX MHOPXY PM) OY OPTLYSZ LAZZYKYX ZKHT MOY WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OPL HCG UGX OPLWOPSXKYG'L KAPG, UGX LOY MKPYX MH ZPGX TYUGL HZ KYTYXEPGN MOY IHLPMPHG.ZKHT OYK ZYTPGPGY IHPGM HZ BPYC LOY WHASX LYY HGSE HGY LHSAMPHG, GUTYSE,ZHK GPWOHSUL MH TUKKE U KPWO OYPKYLL. LOY ZYSM MOPL MH VY MOYPK SULMOHIY UGX MOUM PZ GPWOHSUL KYZALYX MOY TUMWO LOY OUX ZHAGX ZHK OPT, LOYCHASX OUBY MH UVUGXHG MOY OHIY HZ YBYK NYMMPGN TUMMYKL KPNOM. MOPL TUMWOCUL CPMO QASPY RUKUNPGU, MOY XUANOMYK HZ YDWYSSYGM UGX BPKMAHAL IUKYGML,U NPKS MOY KHLMHBL OUX RGHCG ZKHT WOPSXOHHX, UGX COH OUX GHC VYWHTY UCYUSMOE OYPKYLL MOKHANO MOY XYUMO HZ MOY SULM HZ OYK VKHMOYKL.MOY WHAGMYLL OUX CKPMMYG XPKYWM MH QASPY'L THMOYK PG THLWHC LANNYLMPGN UTUKKPUNY VYMCYYG MOYPK WOPSXKYG UGX OUX KYWYPBYX U ZUBHKUVSY UGLCYKZKHT OYK. RUKUNPGU OUX KYISPYX MOUM ZHK OYK IUKM LOY CUL UNKYYUVSY, UGXYBYKEMOPGN XYIYGX HG OYK XUANOMYK'L PGWSPGUMPHG. LOY PGBPMYX GPWOHSUL MHWHTY MH THLWHC.LYBYKUS MPTYL MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMO MYUKL PG OYK YEYL, MHSX OYK LHG MOUMGHC VHMO OYK XUANOMYKL CYKY LYMMSYX, OYK HGSE CPLO CUL MH LYY OPTTUKKPYX. LOY LUPX LOY WHASX SPY XHCG PG OYK NKUBY IYUWYZASSE PZ MOUMCYKY UWWHTISPLOYX. MOYG LOY MHSX OPT MOUM LOY RGYC HZ U LISYGXPX NPKSUGX MKPYX MH XPLWHBYK COUM OY MOHANOM UVHAM TUKKPUNY.UM HMOYK MPTYL LOY IKUPLYX QASPY MH OPT UGX UXBPLYX OPT MH NH MH THLWHCXAKPGN MOY OHSPXUEL MH UTALY OPTLYSZ. GPWOHSUL NAYLLYX COUM OPL THMOYK'LKYTUKRL CYKY SYUXPGN MH UGX XAKPGN HGY HZ MOYLY WHGBYKLUMPHGL PGXAWYXOYK MH LIYUR JAPMY ZKUGRSE. LOY MHSX OPT MOUM OYK HGSE OHIY HZ NYMMPGNMOYPK UZZUPKL XPLYGMUGNSYX GHC SUE PG OPL TUKKEPGN QASPY RUKUNPGU."VAM, TUTTU, LAIIHLY P SHBYX U NPKS COH OUL GH ZHKMAGY, CHASX EHA YDIYWMTY MH LUWKPZPWY TE ZYYSPGNL UGX TE OHGHK ZHK MOY LURY HZ THGYE?" OYULRYX OPL THMOYK, GHM KYUSPFPGN MOY WKAYSME HZ OPL JAYLMPHG UGX HGSECPLOPGN MH LOHC OPL GHVSY-TPGXYXGYLL."GH, EHA OUBY GHM AGXYKLMHHX TY," LUPX OPL THMOYK, GHM RGHCPGN OHC MHQALMPZE OYKLYSZ. "EHA OUBY GHM AGXYKLMHHX TY, GPRHSYGRU. PM PL EHAKOUIIPGYLL P CPLO ZHK," LOY UXXYX, ZYYSPGN MOUM LOY CUL MYSSPGN UGAGMKAMO UGX CUL VYWHTPGN YGMUGNSYX. LOY VYNUG MH WKE."TUTTU, XHG'M WKE! "P CHASXLUWKPZPWY UGEMOPGN ZHK EHA--YBYG TE ZYYSPGNL."VAM MOY WHAGMYLL XPX GHM CUGM MOY JAYLMPHG IAM SPRY MOUM: LOY XPX GHMCUGM U LUWKPZPWY ZKHT OYK LHG, LOY OYKLYSZ CPLOYX MH TURY U LUWKPZPWYZHK OPT."GH, EHA OUBY GHM AGXYKLMHHX TY, XHG'M SYM AL MUSR UVHAM PM," LOYKYISPYX, CPIPGN UCUE OYK MYUKL."TUEVY P XH SHBY U IHHK NPKS," LUPX GPWOHSUL MH OPTLYSZ. "UT P MHLUWKPZPWY TE ZYYSPGNL UGX TE OHGHK ZHK THGYE? P CHGXYK OHC TUTTU WHASXLIYUR LH MH TY. VYWUALY LHGEU PL IHHK P TALM GHM SHBY OYK," OY MOHANOM,"TALM GHM KYLIHGX MH OYK ZUPMOZAS, XYBHMYX SHBY? EYM P LOHASX WYKMUPGSEVY OUIIPYK CPMO OYK MOUG CPMO LHTY XHSS-SPRY QASPY. P WUG USCUELLUWKPZPWY TE ZYYSPGNL ZHK TE ZUTPSE'L CYSZUKY," OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ,"VAM P WUG'M WHYKWY TE ZYYSPGNL. PZ P SHBY LHGEU, MOUM ZYYSPGN PL ZHK TYLMKHGNYK UGX OPNOYK MOUG USS YSLY."GPWOHSUL XPX GHM NH MH THLWHC, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL XPX GHM KYGYC MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO OPT UVHAM TUKKPUNY. LOY LUC CPMO LHKKHC, UGX LHTYMPTYLCPMO YDULIYKUMPHG, LETIMHTL HZ U NKHCPGN UMMUWOTYGM VYMCYYG OYK LHG UGXMOY IHKMPHGSYLL LHGEU. MOHANO LOY VSUTYX OYKLYSZ ZHK PM, LOY WHASXGHM KYZKUPG ZKHT NKATVSPGN UM UGX CHKKEPGN LHGEU, HZMYG IASSPGN OYKAI CPMOHAM KYULHG, UXXKYLLPGN OYK LMPZZSE UL "TE XYUK," UGX ALPGN MOYZHKTUS "EHA" PGLMYUX HZ MOY PGMPTUMY "MOHA" PG LIYURPGN MH OYK. MOYRPGXOYUKMYX WHAGMYLL CUL MOY THKY BYDYX CPMO LHGEU VYWUALY MOUM IHHK,XUKR-YEYX GPYWY HZ OYKL CUL LH TYYR, LH RPGX, LH XYBHMYXSE NKUMYZAS MHOYK VYGYZUWMHKL, UGX LH ZUPMOZASSE, AGWOUGNPGNSE, UGX AGLYSZPLOSE PGSHBY CPMO GPWOHSUL, MOUM MOYKY CYKY GH NKHAGXL ZHK ZPGXPGN ZUASM CPMOOYK.GPWOHSUL CUL LIYGXPGN MOY SULM HZ OPL SYUBY UM OHTY. U ZHAKMO SYMMYK OUXWHTY ZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYC, ZKHT KHTY, PG COPWO OY CKHMY MOUM OY CHASX OUBYVYYG HG OPL CUE VUWR MH KALLPU SHGN UNH OUX GHM OPL CHAGX AGYDIYWMYXSEKYHIYGYX PG MOY CUKT WSPTUMY, COPWO HVSPNYX OPT MH XYZYK OPL KYMAKG MPSSMOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY GYC EYUK. LOY ZYSM LHKKE ZHK OYKLYSZ:LHKKE MOUM LOY CUL VYPGN CULMYX USS MOPL MPTY UGX HZ GH ALY MHUGEHGY--COPSY LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ LH WUIUVSY HZ SHBPGN UGX VYPGN SHBYX.MOPGNL CYKY GHM WOYYKZAS PG MOY KHLMHBL' OHTY.WOUIMYK PDWOKPLMTUL WUTY UGX YDWYIM ZHK MOY WYKYTHGPUS TULL, MOY LHSYTG UGXCYUKPLHTY WOKPLMTUL WHGNKUMASUMPHGL ZKHT GYPNOVHKL UGX LYKBUGML, UGX MOYGYC XKYLLYL YBYKEHGY IAM HG, MOYKY CYKY GH LIYWPUS ZYLMPBPMPYL, MOHANOMOY WUST ZKHLM HZ MCYGME XYNKYYL KYUATAK, MOY XUFFSPGN LAGLOPGY VE XUE,UGX MOY LMUKSPNOM HZ MOY CPGMYK GPNOML LYYTYX MH WUSS ZHK LHTY LIYWPUSWYSYVKUMPHG HZ MOY LYULHG.HG MOY MOPKX XUE HZ WOKPLMTUL CYYR, UZMYK MOY TPXXUE XPGGYK, USS MOYPGTUMYL HZ MOY OHALY XPLIYKLYX MH BUKPHAL KHHTL. PM CUL MOY XASSYLM MPTYHZ MOY XUE. GPWOHSUL, COH OUX VYYG BPLPMPGN LHTY GYPNOVHKL MOUM THKGPGN,CUL ULSYYI HG MOY LPMMPGN-KHHT LHZU. MOY HSX WHAGM CUL KYLMPGN PG OPLLMAXE. LUPX GUMULOU. "PM PL GHC MHXUE,UGX PM CPSS VY MHTHKKHC, UGX USCUEL; UGX MOYKY CUL EYLMYKXUE, UGX MOYXUE VYZHKY...""GUMULOU! GHC PM'L EHAK MAKG. LPGN TY LHTYMOPGN," MOYE OYUKX MOYWHAGMYLL LUE. "COE UKY EHA LPMMPGN MOYKY SPRY WHGLIPKUMHKL?""TUTTU, P XHG'M UM USS CUGM MH," KYISPYX GUMULOU, VAM USS MOY LUTY LOYKHLY.GHGY HZ MOYT, GHM YBYG MOY TPXXSY-UNYX XPTTSYK, CUGMYX MH VKYUR HZZMOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG UGX JAPM MOUM WHKGYK PG MOY LPMMPGN KHHT, VAM GUMULOUNHM AI UGX GPWOHSUL LUM XHCG UM MOY WSUBPWOHKX. LMUGXPGN UL ALAUS PG MOYTPXXSY HZ MOY OUSS UGX WOHHLPGN MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY KYLHGUGWY CUL VYLM,GUMULOU VYNUG MH LPGN OYK THMOYK'L ZUBHKPMY LHGN.LOY OUX LUPX LOY XPX GHM CUGM MH LPGN, VAM PM CUL SHGN LPGWY LOY OUXLAGN, UGX SHGN VYZHKY LOY UNUPG LUGN, UL LOY XPX MOUM YBYGPGN. MOYWHAGM, ZKHT OPL LMAXE COYKY OY CUL MUSRPGN MH TPMYGRU, OYUKX OYK UGX,SPRY U LWOHHSVHE PG U OAKKE MH KAG HAM MH ISUE, VSAGXYKYX PG OPL MUSRCOPSY NPBPGN HKXYKL MH MOY LMYCUKX, UGX UM SULM LMHIIYX, COPSY TPMYGRULMHHX PG ZKHGM HZ OPT USLH SPLMYGPGN UGX LTPSPGN. LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, GHMKYUSPFPGN MH COHT LOY CUL LIYURPGN. OYK TUMYKGUS PGLMPGWM MHSX OYK MOUMGUMULOU OUX MHH TAWO HZ LHTYMOPGN, UGX MOUM VYWUALY HZ MOPL LOY CHASXGHM VY OUIIE. VYZHKY GUMULOU OUX ZPGPLOYX LPGNPGN, ZHAKMYYG-EYUK-HSXIYMEU KALOYX PG XYSPNOMYXSE, MH LUE MOUM LHTY TATTYKL OUX UKKPBYX.GUMULOU LMHIIYX UVKAIMSE."PXPHM!" LOY LWKYUTYX UM OYK VKHMOYK UGX, KAGGPGN MH U WOUPK, MOKYCOYKLYSZ HG PM, LHVVPGN LH BPHSYGMSE MOUM LOY WHASX GHM LMHI ZHK U SHGNMPTY."PM'L GHMOPGN, TUTTU, KYUSSE PM'L GHMOPGN; HGSE IYMEU LMUKMSYX TY," LOYLUPX, MKEPGN MH LTPSY, VAM OYK MYUKL LMPSS ZSHCYX UGX LHVL LMPSS WOHRYXOYK.MOY TATTYKL (LHTY HZ MOY OHALY LYKZL) XKYLLYX AI UL VYUKL, MAKRL,PGGRYYIYKL, UGX SUXPYL--ZKPNOMYGPGN UGX ZAGGE--VKPGNPGN PG CPMO MOYT MOYWHSX ZKHT HAMLPXY UGX U ZYYSPGN HZ NUPYME, WKHCXYX, UM ZPKLM MPTPXSE,PGMH MOY UGMYKHHT, MOYG OPXPGN VYOPGX HGY UGHMOYK MOYE IALOYX PGMHMOY VUSSKHHT COYKY, LOESE UM ZPKLM UGX MOYG THKY UGX THKY TYKKPSE UGXOYUKMPSE, MOYE LMUKMYX LPGNPGN, XUGWPGN, UGX ISUEPGN WOKPLMTUL NUTYL.MOY WHAGMYLL, COYG LOY OUX PXYGMPZPYX MOYT UGX SUANOYX UM MOYPKWHLMATYL, CYGM PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. MOY WHAGM LUM PG MOY VUSSKHHT,LTPSPGN KUXPUGMSE UGX UIISUAXPGN MOY ISUEYKL. MOY EHAGN IYHISY OUXXPLUIIYUKYX.OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK MOYKY UIIYUKYX UTHGN MOY HMOYK TATTYKL PG MOYVUSSKHHT UG HSX SUXE PG U OHHIYX LRPKM--MOPL CUL GPWOHSUL. U MAKRPLONPKS CUL IYMEU. U WSHCG CUL XPTTSYK. UG OALLUK CUL GUMULOU, UGX UWPKWULLPUG CUL LHGEU CPMO VAKGM-WHKR TALMUWOY UGX YEYVKHCL.UZMYK MOY WHGXYLWYGXPGN LAKIKPLY, GHGKYWHNGPMPHG, UGX IKUPLY, ZKHT MOHLYCOH CYKY GHM MOYTLYSBYL XKYLLYX AI, MOY EHAGN IYHISY XYWPXYX MOUM MOYPKWHLMATYL CYKY LH NHHX MOUM MOYE HANOM MH VY LOHCG YSLYCOYKY.GPWOHSUL, COH, UL MOY KHUXL CYKY PG LISYGXPX WHGXPMPHG, CUGMYX MH MURYMOYT USS ZHK U XKPBY PG OPL MKHERU, IKHIHLYX MH MURY CPMO MOYT UVHAM UXHFYG HZ MOY LYKZ TATTYKL UGX XKPBY MH "AGWSY'L.""GH, COE XPLMAKV MOY HSX ZYSSHC?" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL. "VYLPXYL, EHACHASXG'M OUBY KHHT MH MAKG KHAGX MOYKY. PZ EHA TALM NH, NH MH MOYTYSEARHBL'."TYSEARHBU CUL U CPXHC, COH, CPMO OYK ZUTPSE UGX MOYPK MAMHKL UGXNHBYKGYLLYL, SPBYX MOKYY TPSYL ZKHT MOY KHLMHBL."MOUM'L KPNOM, TE XYUK," WOPTYX PG MOY HSX WHAGM, MOHKHANOSE UKHALYX."P'SS XKYLL AI UM HGWY UGX NH CPMO MOYT. PM CUL XYWPXYX MOUM MOY WHAGM TALM GHM NH, VAM MOUMPZ SHAPLU PBUGHBGU (TUXUTY LWOHLL) CHASX NH CPMO MOYT, MOY EHAGN SUXPYLTPNOM NH MH MOY TYSEARHBL', LHGEU, NYGYKUSSE LH MPTPX UGX LOE, THKYAKNYGMSE MOUG UGEHGY VYNNPGN SHAPLU PBUGHBGU GHM MH KYZALY.LHGEU'L WHLMATY CUL MOY VYLM HZ USS. OYK TALMUWOY UGX YEYVKHCL CYKYYDMKUHKXPGUKPSE VYWHTPGN. YBYKEHGY MHSX OYK LOY SHHRYX BYKE OUGXLHTY,UGX LOY CUL PG U LIPKPMYX UGX YGYKNYMPW THHX AGALAUS CPMO OYK. LHTYPGGYK BHPWY MHSX OYK MOUM GHC HK GYBYK OYK ZUMY CHASX VY XYWPXYX, UGXPG OYK TUSY UMMPKY LOY LYYTYX JAPMY U XPZZYKYGM IYKLHG. SHAPLU PBUGHBGUWHGLYGMYX MH NH, UGX PG OUSZ UG OHAK ZHAK MKHERU LSYPNOL CPMO SUKNY UGXLTUSS VYSSL, MOYPK KAGGYKL LJAYURPGN UGX COPLMSPGN HBYK MOY ZKHFYG LGHC,XKHBY AI MH MOY IHKWO.GUMULOU CUL ZHKYTHLM PG LYMMPGN U TYKKE OHSPXUE MHGY, COPWO, IULLPGNZKHT HGY MH UGHMOYK, NKYC LMKHGNYK UGX KYUWOYX PML WSPTUD COYG MOYE USSWUTY HAM PGMH MOY ZKHLM UGX NHM PGMH MOY LSYPNOL, MUSRPGN, WUSSPGN MHHGY UGHMOYK, SUANOPGN, UGX LOHAMPGN.MCH HZ MOY MKHERUL CYKY MOY ALAUS OHALYOHSX LSYPNOL, MOY MOPKX CULMOY HSX WHAGM'L CPMO U MKHMMYK ZKHT MOY HKSHB LMAX UL LOUZM OHKLY,MOY ZHAKMO CUL GPWOHSUL' HCG CPMO U LOHKM LOUNNE VSUWR LOUZM OHKLY.GPWOHSUL, PG OPL HSX SUXE'L XKYLL HBYK COPWO OY OUX VYSMYX OPL OALLUKHBYKWHUM, LMHHX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY LSYPNO, KYPGL PG OUGX.PM CUL LH SPNOM MOUM OY WHASX LYY MOY THHGSPNOM KYZSYWMYX ZKHT MOY TYMUSOUKGYLL XPLRL UGX ZKHT MOY YEYL HZ MOY OHKLYL, COH SHHRYX KHAGX PG USUKTUM MOY GHPLE IUKME AGXYK MOY LOUXHC HZ MOY IHKWO KHHZ.GUMULOU, LHGEU, TUXUTY LWOHLL, UGX MCH TUPXL NHM PGMH GPWOHSUL' LSYPNO;XPTTSYK, OPL CPZY, UGX IYMEU, PGMH MOY HSX WHAGM'L, UGX MOY KYLM HZ MOYTATTYKL LYUMYX MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY HMOYK MCH LSYPNOL."EHA NH UOYUX, FUROUK!" LOHAMYX GPWOHSUL MH OPL ZUMOYK'L WHUWOTUG,CPLOPGN ZHK U WOUGWY MH KUWY IULM OPT.MOY HSX WHAGM'L MKHERU, CPMO XPTTSYK UGX OPL IUKME, LMUKMYX ZHKCUKX,LJAYURPGN HG PML KAGGYKL UL MOHANO ZKYYFPGN MH MOY LGHC, PML XYYI-MHGYXVYSS WSUGNPGN. VUGN, VUGN! CYGM MOYZPKLM LSYPNO HBYK U WKUXSY OHSY PG MOY LGHC HZ MOY KHUX, UGX YUWO HZMOY HMOYK LSYPNOL QHSMYX PG MOY LUTY CUE, UGX KAXYSE VKYURPGN MOYZKHLM-VHAGX LMPSSGYLL, MOY MKHERUL VYNUG MH LIYYX USHGN MOY KHUX, HGYUZMYK MOY HMOYK."U OUKY'L MKUWR, U SHM HZ MKUWRL!" KUGN HAM GUMULOU'L BHPWY MOKHANO MOYZKHLM-VHAGX UPK."OHC SPNOM PM PL, GPWOHSUL!" WUTY LHGEU'L BHPWY.GPWOHSUL NSUGWYX KHAGX UM LHGEU, UGX VYGM XHCG MH LYY OYK ZUWY WSHLYK.JAPMY U GYC, LCYYM ZUWY CPMO VSUWR YEYVKHCL UGX TALMUWOYL IYYIYX AI UMOPT ZKHT OYK LUVSY ZAKL--LH WSHLY UGX EYM LH XPLMUGM--PG MOY THHGSPNOM."MOUM ALYX MH VY LHGEU," MOHANOM OY, UGX SHHRYX UM OYK WSHLYK UGXLTPSYX."COUM PL PM, GPWOHSUL?""GHMOPGN," LUPX OY UGX MAKGYX UNUPG MH MOY OHKLYL.COYG MOYE WUTY HAM HGMH MOY VYUMYG OPNOKHUX--IHSPLOYX VE LSYPNO KAGGYKLUGX WAM AI VE KHANO-LOHX OHHZL, MOY TUKRL HZ COPWO CYKY BPLPVSY PG MOYTHHGSPNOM--MOY OHKLYL VYNUG MH MAN UM MOY KYPGL HZ MOYPK HCG UWWHKX UGXPGWKYULYX MOYPK IUWY. MOY GYUK LPXY OHKLY, UKWOPGN OPL OYUX UGX VKYURPGNPGMH U LOHKM WUGMYK, MANNYX UM OPL MKUWYL. MOY LOUZM OHKLY LCUEYX ZKHTLPXY MH LPXY, THBPGN OPL YUKL UL PZ ULRPGN: "PLG'M PM MPTY MH VYNPGGHC?" PG ZKHGM, USKYUXE ZUK UOYUX MOY XYYI VYSS HZ MOY LSYPNO KPGNPGNZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYK HZZ, MOY VSUWR OHKLYL XKPBYG VE FUROUK WHASX VYWSYUKSE LYYG UNUPGLM MOY COPMY LGHC. UGX LOHAMPGNMH OPL OHKLYL, OY VYNUG MH IULL MOY ZPKLM LSYPNO.FUROUK OYSX VUWR OPL OHKLYL UGX MAKGYX OPL ZUWY, COPWO CUL USKYUXEWHBYKYX CPMO OHUKZKHLM MH OPL YEYVKHCL.GPWOHSUL NUBY MOY OHKLYL MOY KYPG, UGX FUROUK, LMKYMWOPGN HAM OPL UKTL,WSAWRYX OPL MHGNAY UGX SYM OPL OHKLYL NH."GHC, SHHR HAM, TULMYK!" MOY OHKLYLLOHCYKYX MOY ZPGY XKE LGHC HG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOHLY PG MOY LSYPNO--VYLPXYMOYT LHAGXYX JAPWR KPGNPGN VYSSL UGX MOYE WUANOM WHGZALYX NSPTILYL HZLCPZMSE THBPGN SYNL UGX MOY LOUXHCL HZ MOY MKHERU MOYE CYKY IULLPGN.MOY COPLMSPGN LHAGX HZ MOY KAGGYKL HG MOY LGHC UGX MOY BHPWYL HZ NPKSLLOKPYRPGN CYKY OYUKX ZKHT XPZZYKYGM LPXYL.UNUPG WOYWRPGN OPL OHKLYL, GPWOHSUL SHHRYX UKHAGX OPT. LHTY BHPWYL UGLCYKYX, SUANOPGN."VAM OYKY CUL U ZUPKE ZHKYLM CPMO VSUWR THBPGN LOUXHCL, UGX U NSPMMYKHZ XPUTHGXL UGX U ZSPNOM HZ TUKVSY LMYIL UGX MOY LPSBYK KHHZL HZ ZUPKEVAPSXPGNL UGX MOY LOKPSS EYSSL HZ LHTY UGPTUSL. P RGHC VE MOY OHKLYL," KYISPYX LHTYBHPWYL.WOUIMYK DPIYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU TYSEARHBU, U VKHUXSE VAPSM, YGYKNYMPW CHTUG CYUKPGNLIYWMUWSYL, LUM PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT PG U SHHLY XKYLL, LAKKHAGXYX VEOYK XUANOMYKL COHT LOY CUL MKEPGN MH RYYI ZKHT ZYYSPGN XASS. MOYE CYKYJAPYMSE XKHIIPGN TYSMYX CUD PGMH LGHC UGX SHHRPGN UM MOY LOUXHCL MOY CUDZPNAKYL CHASX MOKHC HG MOY CUSS, COYG MOYE OYUKX MOY LMYIL UGX BHPWYL HZGYC UKKPBUSL PG MOY BYLMPVASY.OALLUKL, SUXPYL, CPMWOYL, WSHCGL, UGX VYUKL, UZMYK WSYUKPGN MOYPKMOKHUML UGX CPIPGN MOY OHUKZKHLM ZKHT MOYPK ZUWYL PG MOY BYLMPVASY,WUTY PGMH MOY VUSSKHHT COYKY WUGXSYL CYKY OAKKPYXSE SPNOMYX. MOYWSHCG--XPTTSYK--UGX MOY SUXE--GPWOHSUL--LMUKMYX U XUGWY. LAKKHAGXYX VEMOY LWKYUTPGN WOPSXKYG MOY TATTYKL, WHBYKPGN MOYPK ZUWYL UGX XPLNAPLPGNMOYPK BHPWYL, VHCYX MH MOYPK OHLMYLL UGX UKKUGNYX MOYTLYSBYL UVHAM MOYKHHT."XYUK TY! MOYKY'L GH KYWHNGPFPGN MOYT! MOY OALLUK, MOY OALLUK!QALM SPRY U VHE! UGX MOY SYNL!... P WUG'M SHHR UM OPT..." XPZZYKYGMBHPWYL CYKY LUEPGN.GUMULOU, MOY EHAGN TYSEARHBL' ZUBHKPMY, XPLUIIYUKYX CPMO MOYT PGMH MOYVUWR KHHTL COYKY U WHKR UGX BUKPHAL XKYLLPGN NHCGL UGX TUSY NUKTYGMLCYKY WUSSYX ZHK UGX KYWYPBYX ZKHT MOY ZHHMTUG VE VUKY NPKSPLO UKTL ZKHTVYOPGX MOY XHHK. MYG TPGAMYL SUMYK, USS MOY EHAGN TYSEARHBL QHPGYX MOYTATTYKL.IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU, OUBPGN NPBYG HKXYKL MH WSYUK MOY KHHTL ZHK MOYBPLPMHKL UGX UKKUGNYX UVHAM KYZKYLOTYGML ZHK MOY NYGMKE UGX MOY LYKZL,CYGM UVHAM UTHGN MOY TATTYKL CPMOHAM KYTHBPGN OYK LIYWMUWSYL, IYYKPGNPGMH MOYPK ZUWYL CPMO U LAIIKYLLYX LTPSY UGX ZUPSPGN MH KYWHNGPFY UGE HZMOYT. PM CUL GHM TYKYSE XPTTSYK UGX MOY KHLMHBL LOY ZUPSYX MH KYWHNGPFY,LOY XPX GHM YBYG KYWHNGPFY OYK HCG XUANOMYKL, HK OYK SUMY OALVUGX'L,XKYLLPGN NHCGL UGX AGPZHKTL, COPWO MOYE OUX IAM HG."UGX COH PL MOPL?" LOY ULRYX OYK NHBYKGYLL, IYYKPGN PGMH MOY ZUWY HZ OYKHCG XUANOMYK XKYLLYX AI UL U RUFUG-MUKMUK. "P LAIIHLY PM PL HGY HZ MOYKHLMHBL! CYSS, TK. OALLUK, UGX COUM KYNPTYGM XH EHA LYKBY PG?" LOY ULRYXGUMULOU. "OYKY, OUGX LHTY ZKAPM QYSSE MH MOY MAKR!" LOY HKXYKYX MOYVAMSYK COH CUL OUGXPGN MOPGNL KHAGX. "MOUM'L GHM ZHKVPXXYG VE OPL SUC."LHTYMPTYL, UL LOY SHHRYX UM MOY LMKUGNY VAM UTALPGN WUIYKL WAM VE MOYXUGWYKL, COH--OUBPGN XYWPXYX HGWY ZHK USS MOUM VYPGN XPLNAPLYX, GH HGYCHASX KYWHNGPFY MOYT--CYKY GHM UM USS LOE, IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU OPXOYK ZUWY PG OYK OUGXRYKWOPYZ, UGX OYK COHSY LMHAM VHXE LOHHR CPMOPKKYIKYLLPVSY, RPGXSE, YSXYKSE SUANOMYK."TE SPMMSY LULOU! SHHR UM LULOU!" LOY LUPX.UZMYK KALLPUG WHAGMKE XUGWYL UGX WOHKAL XUGWYL, IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU TUXYMOY LYKZL UGX NYGMKE QHPG PG HGY SUKNY WPKWSY: U KPGN, U LMKPGN, UGX ULPSBYK KAVSY CYKY ZYMWOYX UGX MOYE USS ISUEYX NUTYL MHNYMOYK.PG UG OHAK, USS MOY WHLMATYL CYKY WKATISYX UGX XPLHKXYKYX. MOY WHKRYXYEYVKHCL UGX TALMUWOYL CYKY LTYUKYX HBYK MOY IYKLIPKPGN, ZSALOYX, UGXTYKKE ZUWYL. IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU VYNUG MH KYWHNGPFY MOY TATTYKL, UXTPKYXMOYPK WSYBYKSE WHGMKPBYX WHLMATYL, UGX IUKMPWASUKSE OHC MOYE LAPMYX MOYEHAGN SUXPYL, UGX LOY MOUGRYX MOYT USS ZHK OUBPGN YGMYKMUPGYX OYK LHCYSS. MOY BPLPMHKL CYKY PGBPMYX MH LAIIYK PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, UGX MOYLYKZL OUX LHTYMOPGN LYKBYX MH MOYT PG MOY VUSSKHHT."GHC MH MYSS HGY'L ZHKMAGY PG MOY YTIME VUMOOHALY PL ZKPNOMYGPGN!" LUPXUG HSX TUPX COH SPBYX CPMO MOY TYSEARHBL, XAKPGN LAIIYK."COE?" LUPX MOY YSXYLM TYSEARHB NPKS."EHA CHASXG'M NH, PM MURYL WHAKUNY...""P'SS NH," LUPX LHGEU."MYSS COUM OUIIYGYX MH MOY EHAGN SUXE!" LUPX MOY LYWHGX TYSEARHB NPKS."CYSS," VYNUG MOY HSX TUPX, "U EHAGN SUXE HGWY CYGM HAM, MHHR U WHWR,SUPX MOY MUVSY ZHK MCH, USS IKHIYKSE, UGX LUM XHCG. UZMYK LPMMPGN UCOPSY, LOY LAXXYGSE OYUKL LHTYHGY WHTPGN... U LSYPNO XKPBYL AI CPMOOUKGYLL VYSSL; LOY OYUKL OPT WHTPGN! OY WHTYL PG, QALM PG MOY LOUIY HZ UTUG, SPRY UG HZZPWYK--WHTYL PG UGX LPML XHCG MH MUVSY CPMO OYK.""UO! UO!" LWKYUTYX GUMULOU, KHSSPGN OYK YEYL CPMO OHKKHK."EYL? UGX OHC... XPX OY LIYUR?""EYL, SPRY U TUG. YBYKEMOPGN JAPMY USS KPNOM, UGX OY VYNUG IYKLAUXPGNOYK; UGX LOY LOHASX OUBY RYIM OPT MUSRPGN MPSS WHWRWKHC, VAM LOY NHMZKPNOMYGYX, QALM NHM ZKPNOMYGYX UGX OPX OYK ZUWY PG OYK OUGXL. MOYG OYWUANOM OYK AI. PM CUL SAWRE MOY TUPXL KUG PG QALM MOYG...""GHC, COE ZKPNOMYG MOYT?" LUPX IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU."TUTTU, EHA ALYX MH MKE EHAK ZUMY EHAKLYSZ..." LUPX OYK XUANOMYK."UGX OHC XHYL HGY XH PM PG U VUKG?" PGJAPKYX LHGEU."CYSS, LUE EHA CYGM MH MOY VUKG GHC, UGX SPLMYGYX. PM XYIYGXL HG COUMEHA OYUK; OUTTYKPGN UGX RGHWRPGN--MOUM'L VUX; VAM U LHAGX HZ LOPZMPGNNKUPG PL NHHX UGX HGY LHTYMPTYL OYUKL MOUM, MHH.""TUTTU, MYSS AL COUM OUIIYGYX MH EHA PG MOY VUKG."IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU LTPSYX."HO, P'BY ZHKNHMMYG..." LOY KYISPYX. "VAM GHGY HZ EHA CHASX NH?""EYL, P CPSS; IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU, SYM TY! P'SS NH," LUPX LHGEU."CYSS, COE GHM, PZ EHA'KY GHM UZKUPX?""SHAPLU PBUGHBGU, TUE P?" ULRYX LHGEU.COYMOYK MOYE CYKY ISUEPGN MOY KPGN UGX LMKPGN NUTY HK MOY KAVSY NUTY HKMUSRPGN UL GHC, GPWOHSUL XPX GHM SYUBY LHGEU'L LPXY, UGX NUFYX UM OYKCPMO JAPMY GYC YEYL. PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM PM CUL HGSE MHXUE, MOUGRLMH MOUM VAKGM-WHKR TALMUWOY, MOUM OY OUX ZASSE SYUKGYX MH RGHC OYK. UGXKYUSSE, MOUM YBYGPGN, LHGEU CUL VKPNOMYK, THKY UGPTUMYX, UGX IKYMMPYKMOUG GPWOHSUL OUX YBYK LYYG OYK VYZHKY."LH MOUM'L COUM LOY PL SPRY; COUM U ZHHS P OUBY VYYG!" OY MOHANOM NUFPGNUM OYK LIUKRSPGN YEYL, UGX AGXYK MOY TALMUWOY U OUIIE KUIMAKHAL LTPSYXPTISYX OYK WOYYRL, U LTPSY OY OUX GYBYK LYYG VYZHKY."P'T GHM UZKUPX HZ UGEMOPGN," LUPX LHGEU. "TUE P NH UM HGWY?" LOY NHMAI.MOYE MHSX OYK COYKY MOY VUKG CUL UGX OHC LOY LOHASX LMUGX UGX SPLMYG,UGX MOYE OUGXYX OYK U ZAK WSHUR. LOY MOKYC MOPL HBYK OYK OYUX UGXLOHASXYKL UGX NSUGWYX UM GPWOHSUL."COUM U XUKSPGN MOUM NPKS PL!" MOHANOM OY. "UGX COUM OUBY P VYYGMOPGRPGN HZ MPSS GHC?"LHGEU CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IULLUNY MH NH MH MOY VUKG. GPWOHSUL CYGM OULMPSEMH MOY ZKHGM IHKWO, LUEPGN OY ZYSM MHH OHM. MOY WKHCX HZ IYHISY KYUSSEOUX TUXY MOY OHALY LMAZZE.HAMLPXY, MOYKY CUL MOY LUTY WHSX LMPSSGYLL UGX MOY LUTY THHG, VAM YBYGVKPNOMYK MOUG VYZHKY. MOY SPNOM CUL LH LMKHGN UGX MOY LGHC LIUKRSYX CPMOLH TUGE LMUKL MOUM HGY XPX GHM CPLO MH SHHR AI UM MOY LRE UGX MOY KYUSLMUKL CYKY AGGHMPWYX. MOY LRE CUL VSUWR UGX XKYUKE, COPSY MOY YUKMO CULNUE."P UT U ZHHS, U ZHHS! COUM OUBY P VYYG CUPMPGN ZHK?" MOHANOM GPWOHSUL,UGX KAGGPGN HAM ZKHT MOY IHKWO OY CYGM KHAGX MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY OHALY UGXUSHGN MOY IUMO MOUM SYX MH MOY VUWR IHKWO. OY RGYC LHGEU CHASX IULLMOUM CUE. OUSZCUE SUE LHTY LGHC-WHBYKYX IPSYL HZ ZPKYCHHX UGX UWKHLL UGXUSHGN MOYT U GYMCHKR HZ LOUXHCL ZKHT MOY VUKY HSX SPTY MKYYL ZYSS HG MOYLGHC UGX HG MOY IUMO. MOPL IUMO SYX MH MOY VUKG. MOY SHN CUSSL HZ MOYVUKG UGX PML LGHC-WHBYKYX KHHZ, MOUM SHHRYX UL PZ OYCG HAM HZ LHTYIKYWPHAL LMHGY, LIUKRSYX PG MOY THHGSPNOM. U MKYY PG MOY NUKXYG LGUIIYXCPMO MOY ZKHLM, UGX MOYG USS CUL UNUPG IYKZYWMSE LPSYGM. OPL VHLHTLYYTYX MH PGOUSY GHM UPK VAM MOY LMKYGNMO HZ YMYKGUS EHAMO UGX NSUXGYLL.ZKHT MOY VUWR IHKWO WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ ZYYM XYLWYGXPGN MOY LMYIL, MOYVHMMHT LMYI AIHG COPWO LGHC OUX ZUSSYG NUBY U KPGNPGN WKYUR UGX OY OYUKXMOY BHPWY HZ UG HSX TUPXLYKBUGM LUEPGN, "LMKUPNOM, LMKUPNOM, USHGN MOYIUMO, TPLL. HGSE, XHG'M SHHR VUWR.""P UT GHM UZKUPX," UGLCYKYX LHGEU'L BHPWY, UGX USHGN MOY IUMO MHCUKXGPWOHSUL WUTY MOY WKAGWOPGN, COPLMSPGN LHAGX HZ LHGEU'L ZYYM PG OYK MOPGLOHYL.LHGEU WUTY USHGN, CKUIIYX PG OYK WSHUR. LOY CUL HGSE U WHAISY HZ IUWYLUCUE COYG LOY LUC OPT, UGX MH OYK MHH OY CUL GHM MOY GPWOHSUL LOYOUX RGHCG UGX USCUEL LSPNOMSE ZYUKYX. OY CUL PG U CHTUG'L XKYLL, CPMOMHALSYX OUPK UGX U OUIIE LTPSY GYC MH LHGEU. LOY KUG KUIPXSE MHCUKX OPT."JAPMY XPZZYKYGM UGX EYM MOY LUTY," MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, SHHRPGN UM OYKZUWY USS SPM AI VE MOY THHGSPNOM. OY LSPIIYX OPL UKTL AGXYK MOY WSHURMOUM WHBYKYX OYK OYUX, YTVKUWYX OYK, IKYLLYX OYK MH OPT, UGX RPLLYX OYKHG MOY SPIL MOUM CHKY U TALMUWOY UGX OUX U LTYSS HZ VAKGM WHKR. LHGEURPLLYX OPT ZASS HG MOY SPIL, UGX XPLYGNUNPGN OYK SPMMSY OUGXL IKYLLYXMOYT MH OPL WOYYRL."LHGEU!... GPWOHSUL!"... CUL USS MOYE LUPX. MOYE KUG MH MOY VUKG UGXMOYG VUWR UNUPG, KY-YGMYKPGN, OY VE MOY ZKHGM UGX LOY VE MOY VUWR IHKWO.WOUIMYK DPPCOYG MOYE USS XKHBY VUWR ZKHT IYSUNYEU XUGPSHBGU'L, GUMULOU, COH USCUELLUC UGX GHMPWYX YBYKEMOPGN, UKKUGNYX MOUM LOY UGX TUXUTY LWOHLL LOHASXNH VUWR PG MOY LSYPNO CPMO XPTTSYK, UGX LHGEU CPMO GPWOHSUL UGX MOYTUPXL.HG MOY CUE VUWR GPWOHSUL XKHBY UM U LMYUXE IUWY PGLMYUX HZ KUWPGN UGXRYIM IYYKPGN VE MOUM ZUGMULMPW USS-MKUGLZHKTPGN SPNOM PGMH LHGEU'L ZUWYUGX LYUKWOPGN VYGYUMO MOY YEYVKHCL UGX TALMUWOY ZHK OPL ZHKTYK UGX OPLIKYLYGM LHGEU ZKHT COHT OY OUX KYLHSBYX GYBYK MH VY IUKMYX UNUPG. OYSHHRYX UGX KYWHNGPFPGN PG OYK VHMO MOY HSX UGX MOY GYC LHGEU, UGXVYPGN KYTPGXYX VE MOY LTYSS HZ VAKGM WHKR HZ MOY LYGLUMPHG HZ OYK RPLL,PGOUSYX MOY ZKHLME UPK CPMO U ZASS VKYULM UGX, SHHRPGN UM MOY NKHAGXZSEPGN VYGYUMO OPT UGX UM MOY LIUKRSPGN LRE, ZYSM OPTLYSZ UNUPG PGZUPKESUGX."LHGEU, PL PM CYSS CPMO MOYY?" OY ULRYX ZKHT MPTY MH MPTY."EYL!" LOY KYISPYX. "UGX CPMO MOYY?"COYG OUSZCUE OHTY GPWOHSUL OUGXYX MOY KYPGL MH MOY WHUWOTUG UGX KUG ZHKU THTYGM MH GUMULOU'L LSYPNO UGX LMHHX HG PML CPGN."GUMULOU!" P CUL VYNPGGPGN MH VY BYDYX CPMO EHA. P XPX GHMMYSS EHA, VAM EHA OUBY VYYG MKYUMPGN OYK VUXSE. COUM U OYUKM LOY OUL,GPWOHSUL! WKPYX GPWOHSUL, IYYKPGNPGMH OYK ZUWY UGX ZPGXPGN PG OPL LPLMYK MHH LHTYMOPGN GYC, AGALAUS, UGXVYCPMWOPGNSE MYGXYK MOUM OY OUX GHM LYYG PG OYK VYZHKY. P OUX U JAUKKYS CPMO TUTTU LHTY MPTY UNH UVHAM PM.TUTTU LUPX LOY CUL UGNSPGN ZHK EHA. OHC WHASX LOY LUE LAWO U MOPGN! PGYUKSE LMHKTYX UM TUTTU. P CPSS GYBYK SYM UGEHGY LUE UGEMOPGN VUX HZLHGEU, ZHK MOYKY PL GHMOPGN VAM NHHX PG OYK.""MOYG PM'L USS KPNOM?" LUPX GPWOHSUL, UNUPG LWKAMPGPFPGN MOY YDIKYLLPHGHZ OPL LPLMYK'L ZUWY MH LYY PZ LOY CUL PG YUKGYLM. MOYG OY QATIYX XHCGUGX, OPL VHHML LWKAGWOPGN MOY LGHC, KUG VUWR MH OPL LSYPNO. MOY LUTYOUIIE, LTPSPGN WPKWULLPUG, CPMO TALMUWOY UGX VYUTPGN YEYL SHHRPGN AIZKHT AGXYK U LUVSY OHHX, CUL LMPSS LPMMPGN MOYKY, UGX MOUM WPKWULLPUGCUL LHGEU, UGX MOUM LHGEU CUL WYKMUPGSE OPL ZAMAKY OUIIE UGX SHBPGNCPZY.COYG MOYE KYUWOYX OHTY UGX OUX MHSX MOYPK THMOYK OHC MOYE OUX LIYGM MOYYBYGPGN UM MOY TYSEARHBL', MOY NPKSL CYGM MH MOYPK VYXKHHT. COYG MOYEOUX AGXKYLLYX, VAM CPMOHAM CULOPGN HZZ MOY WHKR TALMUWOYL, MOYE LUM USHGN MPTY MUSRPGN HZ MOYPK OUIIPGYLL. MOYE MUSRYX HZ OHC MOYE CHASX SPBYCOYG MOYE CYKY TUKKPYX, OHC MOYPK OALVUGXL CHASX VY ZKPYGXL, UGX OHCOUIIE MOYE CHASX VY. HG GUMULOU'L MUVSY LMHHX MCH SHHRPGN NSULLYL COPWOXAGEULOU OUX IKYIUKYX VYZHKYOUGX."HGSE COYG CPSS USS MOUM VY? P UT UZKUPX GYBYK.... PM CHASX VY MHHNHHX!" LUPX GUMULOU, KPLPGN UGX NHPGN MH MOY SHHRPGN NSULLYL."LPM XHCG, GUMULOU; IYKOUIL EHA'SS LYY OPT," LUPX LHGEU.GUMULOU SPM MOY WUGXSYL, HGY HG YUWO LPXY HZ HGY HZ MOY SHHRPGN NSULLYL,UGX LUM XHCG."P LYY LHTYHGY CPMO U TALMUWOY," LUPX GUMULOU, LYYPGN OYK HCG ZUWY."EHA TALMG'M SUANO, TPLL," LUPX XAGEULOU.CPMO LHGEU'L OYSI UGX MOY TUPX'L, GUMULOU NHM MOY NSULL LOY OYSX PGMHMOY KPNOM IHLPMPHG HIIHLPMY MOY HMOYK; OYK ZUWY ULLATYX U LYKPHALYDIKYLLPHG UGX LOY LUM LPSYGM. LOY LUM U SHGN MPTY SHHRPGN UM MOYKYWYXPGN SPGY HZ WUGXSYL KYZSYWMYX PG MOY NSULLYL UGX YDIYWMPGN (ZKHTMUSYL LOY OUX OYUKX) MH LYY U WHZZPG, HK OPT, IKPGWY UGXKYC, PG MOUMSULM XPT, PGXPLMPGWMSE HAMSPGYX LJAUKY. VAM KYUXE UL LOY CUL MH MURY MOYLTUSSYLM LIYWR ZHK MOY PTUNY HZ U TUG HK HZ U WHZZPG, LOY LUC GHMOPGN.LOY VYNUG VSPGRPGN KUIPXSE UGX THBYX UCUE ZKHT MOY SHHRPGN NSULLYL."COE PL PM HMOYKL LYY MOPGNL UGX P XHG'M?" LOY LUPX. "EHA LPM XHCG GHC,LHGEU. EHA UVLHSAMYSE TALM, MHGPNOM! XH PM ZHK TY.... LOY LUC LHTYMOPGN SULM EYUK."ZHK UVHAM MOKYY TPGAMYL USS CYKY LPSYGM."HZ WHAKLY LOY CPSS!" COPLIYKYX GUMULOU, VAM XPX GHM ZPGPLO... LAXXYGSELHGEU IALOYX UCUE MOY NSULL LOY CUL OHSXPGN UGX WHBYKYX OYK YEYL CPMOOYK OUGX."HO, GUMULOU!" LOY WKPYX."XPX EHA LYY? XPX EHA? COUM CUL PM?" YDWSUPTYX GUMULOU, OHSXPGN AI MOYSHHRPGN NSULL.LHGEU OUX GHM LYYG UGEMOPGN, LOY CUL QALM CUGMPGN MH VSPGR UGX MH NYMAI COYG LOY OYUKX GUMULOU LUE, "HZ WHAKLY LOY CPSS!" LOY XPX GHM CPLO MHXPLUIIHPGM YPMOYK XAGEULOU HK GUMULOU, VAM PM CUL OUKX MH LPM LMPSS.LOY XPX GHM OYKLYSZ RGHC OHC HK COE MOY YDWSUTUMPHG YLWUIYX OYK COYG LOYWHBYKYX OYK YEYL."EHA LUC OPT?" AKNYX GUMULOU, LYPFPGN OYK OUGX."EYL. CUPM U VPM... P... LUC OPT," LHGEU WHASX GHM OYSI LUEPGN, GHM EYMRGHCPGN COHT GUMULOU TYUGM VE OPT, GPWOHSUL HK IKPGWY UGXKYC."VAM COE LOHASXG'M P LUE P LUC LHTYMOPGN? HMOYKL XH LYY! VYLPXYL COH WUGMYSS COYMOYK P LUC UGEMOPGN HK GHM?" ZSULOYX MOKHANO LHGEU'L TPGX."EYL, P LUC OPT," LOY LUPX."OHC? LMUGXPGN HK SEPGN?""GH, P LUC... UM ZPKLM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN, MOYG P LUC OPT SEPGN XHCG.""UGXKYC SEPGN? PL OY PSS?" ULRYX GUMULOU, OYK ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL ZPDYX HGOYK ZKPYGX."GH, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, HG MOY WHGMKUKE! OPL ZUWY CUL WOYYKZAS, UGX OYMAKGYX MH TY." UGX COYG LUEPGN MOPL LOY OYKLYSZ ZUGWPYX LOY OUX KYUSSELYYG COUM LOY XYLWKPVYX."CYSS, UGX MOYG, LHGEU?...""UZMYK MOUM, P WHASX GHM TURY HAM COUM MOYKY CUL; LHTYMOPGN VSAY UGXKYX...""LHGEU! COYG CPSS OY WHTY VUWR? COYG LOUSS P LYY OPT! H, NHX, OHC UZKUPXP UT ZHK OPT UGX ZHK TELYSZ UGX UVHAM YBYKEMOPGN!..." GUMULOU VYNUG, UGXCPMOHAM KYISEPGN MH LHGEU'L CHKXL HZ WHTZHKM LOY NHM PGMH VYX, UGX SHGNUZMYK OYK WUGXSY CUL HAM SUE HIYG-YEYX UGX THMPHGSYLL, NUFPGN UM MOYTHHGSPNOM MOKHANO MOY ZKHLME CPGXHCIUGYL.WOUIMYK DPPPLHHG UZMYK MOY WOKPLMTUL OHSPXUEL GPWOHSUL MHSX OPL THMOYK HZ OPL SHBYZHK LHGEU UGX HZ OPL ZPKT KYLHSBY MH TUKKE OYK. MOY WHAGMYLL, COH OUXSHGN GHMPWYX COUM CUL NHPGN HG VYMCYYG MOYT UGX CUL YDIYWMPGN MOPLXYWSUKUMPHG, SPLMYGYX MH OPT PG LPSYGWY UGX MOYG MHSX OYK LHG MOUM OYTPNOM TUKKE COHT OY ISYULYX, VAM MOUM GYPMOYK LOY GHK OPL ZUMOYK CHASXNPBY MOYPK VSYLLPGN MH LAWO U TUKKPUNY. GPWOHSUL, ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY,ZYSM MOUM OPL THMOYK CUL XPLISYULYX CPMO OPT UGX MOUM, XYLIPMY OYK SHBYZHK OPT, LOY CHASX GHM NPBY CUE. WHSXSE, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OYK LHG,LOY LYGM ZHK OYK OALVUGX UGX, COYG OY WUTY, MKPYX VKPYZSE UGX WHSXSE MHPGZHKT OPT HZ MOY ZUWML, PG OYK LHG'L IKYLYGWY, VAM AGUVSY MH KYLMKUPGOYKLYSZ LOY VAKLM PGMH MYUKL HZ BYDUMPHG UGX SYZM MOY KHHT. MOY HSXWHAGM VYNUG PKKYLHSAMYSE MH UXTHGPLO GPWOHSUL UGX VYN OPT MH UVUGXHG OPLIAKIHLY. GPWOHSUL KYISPYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM NH VUWR HG OPL CHKX, UGX OPLZUMOYK, LPNOPGN UGX YBPXYGMSE XPLWHGWYKMYX, BYKE LHHG VYWUTY LPSYGM UGXCYGM PG MH MOY WHAGMYLL. PG USS OPL YGWHAGMYKL CPMO OPL LHG, MOY WHAGMCUL USCUEL WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL HCG NAPSM MHCUKX OPT ZHK OUBPGN CULMYX MOYZUTPSE ZHKMAGY, UGX LH OY WHASX GHM VY UGNKE CPMO OPT ZHK KYZALPGN MHTUKKE UG OYPKYLL UGX WOHHLPGN MOY XHCYKSYLL LHGEU. HG MOPL HWWULPHG, OYCUL HGSE THKY BPBPXSE WHGLWPHAL HZ MOY ZUWM MOUM PZ OPL UZZUPKL OUX GHMVYYG PG XPLHKXYK, GH VYMMYK CPZY ZHK GPWOHSUL MOUG LHGEU WHASX OUBYVYYG CPLOYX ZHK, UGX MOUM GH HGY VAM OPTLYSZ CPMO OPL TPMYGRU UGXOPL AGWHTZHKMUVSY OUVPML CUL MH VSUTY ZHK MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ MOY ZUTPSEZPGUGWYL.MOY ZUMOYK UGX THMOYK XPX GHM LIYUR HZ MOY TUMMYK MH MOYPK LHG UNUPG,VAM U ZYC XUEL SUMYK MOY WHAGMYLL LYGM ZHK LHGEU UGX, CPMO U WKAYSMEGYPMOYK HZ MOYT YDIYWMYX, KYIKHUWOYX OYK GPYWY ZHK MKEPGN MH WUMWOGPWOHSUL UGX ZHK PGNKUMPMAXY. LHGEU SPLMYGYX LPSYGMSE CPMO XHCGWULM YEYLMH MOY WHAGMYLL' WKAYS CHKXL, CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM CUL KYJAPKYXHZ OYK. LOY CUL KYUXE MH LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGN ZHK OYK VYGYZUWMHKL.LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY CUL OYK THLM WOYKPLOYX PXYU VAM PG MOPL WULY LOY WHASXGHM LYY COUM LOY HANOM MH LUWKPZPWY, HK ZHK COHT. LOY WHASX GHM OYSISHBPGN MOY WHAGMYLL UGX MOY COHSY KHLMHB ZUTPSE, VAM GYPMOYK WHASX LOYOYSI SHBPGN GPWOHSUL UGX RGHCPGN MOUM OPL OUIIPGYLL XYIYGXYX HG MOUMSHBY. LOY CUL LPSYGM UGX LUX UGX XPX GHM KYISE. GPWOHSUL ZYSM MOYLPMAUMPHG MH VY PGMHSYKUVSY UGX CYGM MH OUBY UG YDISUGUMPHG CPMO OPLTHMOYK. OY ZPKLM PTISHKYX OYK MH ZHKNPBY OPT UGX LHGEU UGX WHGLYGM MHMOYPK TUKKPUNY, MOYG OY MOKYUMYGYX MOUM PZ LOY THSYLMYX LHGEU OY CHASXUM HGWY TUKKE OYK LYWKYMSE.MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMO U WHSXGYLL OYK LHG OUX GYBYK LYYG PG OYK VYZHKY,KYISPYX MOUM OY CUL HZ UNY, MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL TUKKEPGN CPMOHAM OPLZUMOYK'L WHGLYGM, UGX OY WHASX XH MOY LUTY, VAM MOUM LOY CHASX GYBYKKYWYPBY MOUM PGMKPNAYK UL OYK XUANOMYK.YDISHXPGN UM MOY CHKX PGMKPNAYK, GPWOHSUL, KUPLPGN OPL BHPWY, MHSXOPL THMOYK OY OUX GYBYK YDIYWMYX OYK MH MKE MH ZHKWY OPT MH LYSS OPLZYYSPGNL, VAM PZ MOUM CYKY LH, OY CHASX LUE ZHK MOY SULM MPTY.... VAM OYOUX GH MPTY MH AMMYK MOY XYWPLPBY CHKX COPWO MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZUWYWUALYX OPL THMOYK MH UCUPM CPMO MYKKHK, UGX COPWO CHASX IYKOUIL OUBYZHKYBYK KYTUPGYX U WKAYS TYTHKE MH MOYT VHMO. OY OUX GHM MPTY MH LUE PM,ZHK GUMULOU, CPMO U IUSY UGX LYM ZUWY, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT ZKHT MOY XHHK UMCOPWO LOY OUX VYYG SPLMYGPGN."GPWOHSUL, EHA UKY MUSRPGN GHGLYGLY! VY JAPYM, VY JAPYM, VY JAPYM, PMYSS EHA!..." LOY USTHLM LWKYUTYX, LH UL MH XKHCG OPL BHPWY."TUTTU XUKSPGN, PM'L GHM UM USS LH... TE IHHK, LCYYM XUKSPGN," LOYLUPX MH OYK THMOYK, COH WHGLWPHAL MOUM MOYE OUX VYYG HG MOY VKPGR HZU KAIMAKY NUFYX UM OYK LHG CPMO MYKKHK, VAM PG MOY HVLMPGUWE UGXYDWPMYTYGM HZ MOY WHGZSPWM WHASX GHM UGX CHASX GHM NPBY CUE."GPWOHSUL, P'SS YDISUPG MH EHA. NH UCUE! SPLMYG, TUTTU XUKSPGN," LUPXGUMULOU.OYK CHKXL CYKY PGWHOYKYGM, VAM MOYE UMMUPGYX MOY IAKIHLY UM COPWO LOYCUL UPTPGN.MOY WHAGMYLL, LHVVPGN OYUBPSE, OPX OYK ZUWY HG OYK XUANOMYK'L VKYULM,COPSY GPWOHSUL KHLY, WSAMWOPGN OPL OYUX, UGX SYZM MOY KHHT.GUMULOU LYM MH CHKR MH YZZYWM U KYWHGWPSPUMPHG, UGX LH ZUK LAWWYYXYXMOUM GPWOHSUL KYWYPBYX U IKHTPLY ZKHT OPL THMOYK MOUM LHGEU LOHASX GHMVY MKHAVSYX, COPSY OY HG OPL LPXY IKHTPLYX GHM MH AGXYKMURY UGEMOPGNCPMOHAM OPL IUKYGML' RGHCSYXNY.ZPKTSE KYLHSBYX, UZMYK IAMMPGN OPL UZZUPKL PG HKXYK PG MOY KYNPTYGM,MH KYMPKY ZKHT MOY UKTE UGX KYMAKG UGX TUKKE LHGEU, GPWOHSUL, LYKPHAL,LHKKHCZAS, UGX UM BUKPUGWY CPMO OPL IUKYGML, VAM, UL PM LYYTYX MH OPT,IULLPHGUMYSE PG SHBY, SYZM UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ QUGAUKE MH KYQHPG OPLKYNPTYGM.UZMYK GPWOHSUL OUX NHGY MOPGNL PG MOY KHLMHB OHALYOHSX CYKY THKYXYIKYLLPGN MOUG YBYK, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL ZYSS PSS ZKHT TYGMUS UNPMUMPHG.LHGEU CUL AGOUIIE UM MOY LYIUKUMPHG ZKHT GPWOHSUL UGX LMPSS THKY LH HGUWWHAGM HZ MOY OHLMPSY MHGY MOY WHAGMYLL WHASX GHM OYSI UXHIMPGN MHCUKXOYK. MOY WHAGM CUL THKY IYKMAKVYX MOUG YBYK VE MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ OPLUZZUPKL, COPWO WUSSYX ZHK LHTY XYWPLPBY UWMPHG. MOYPK MHCG OHALY UGXYLMUMY GYUK THLWHC OUX PGYBPMUVSE MH VY LHSX, UGX ZHK MOPL MOYE OUXMH NH MH THLWHC. VAM MOY WHAGMYLL' OYUSMO HVSPNYX MOYT MH XYSUE MOYPKXYIUKMAKY ZKHT XUE MH XUE.GUMULOU, COH OUX VHKGY MOY ZPKLM IYKPHX HZ LYIUKUMPHG ZKHT OYK VYMKHMOYXSPNOMSE UGX YBYG WOYYKZASSE, GHC NKYC THKY UNPMUMYX UGX PTIUMPYGM YBYKEXUE. MOY MOHANOM MOUM OYK VYLM XUEL, COPWO LOY CHASX OUBY YTISHEYXPG SHBPGN OPT, CYKY VYPGN BUPGSE CULMYX, CPMO GH UXBUGMUNY MH UGEHGY,MHKTYGMYX OYK PGWYLLUGMSE. OPL SYMMYKL ZHK MOY THLM IUKM PKKPMUMYX OYK.PM OAKM OYK MH MOPGR MOUM COPSY LOY SPBYX HGSE PG MOY MOHANOM HZ OPT, OYCUL SPBPGN U KYUS SPZY, LYYPGN GYC ISUWYL UGX GYC IYHISY MOUM PGMYKYLMYXOPT. MOY THKY PGMYKYLMPGN OPL SYMMYKL CYKY MOY THKY BYDYX LOY ZYSM.OYK SYMMYKL MH OPT, ZUK ZKHT NPBPGN OYK UGE WHTZHKM, LYYTYX MH OYK UCYUKPLHTY UGX UKMPZPWPUS HVSPNUMPHG. LOY CKHMY MH OPT ZHKTUS, THGHMHGHAL, UGX XKE SYMMYKL, MH COPWOLOY UMMUWOYX GH PTIHKMUGWY OYKLYSZ, UGX PG MOY KHANO WHIPYL HZ COPWO MOYWHAGMYLL WHKKYWMYX OYK TPLMURYL PG LIYSSPGN.MOYKY CUL LMPSS GH PTIKHBYTYGM PG MOY WHAGMYLL' OYUSMO, VAM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH XYZYK MOY QHAKGYE MH THLWHC UGE SHGNYK. GUMULOU'LMKHALLYUA OUX MH VY HKXYKYX UGX MOY OHALY LHSX. THKYHBYK, IKPGWY UGXKYCCUL YDIYWMYX PG THLWHC, COYKY HSX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP CUL LIYGXPGN MOYCPGMYK, UGX GUMULOU ZYSM LAKY OY OUX USKYUXE UKKPBYX.LH MOY WHAGMYLL KYTUPGYX PG MOY WHAGMKE, UGX MOY WHAGM, MURPGN LHGEU UGXGUMULOU CPMO OPT, CYGM MH THLWHC UM MOY YGX HZ QUGAUKE.VHHR YPNOM: 1811 - 12WOUIMYK PUZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L YGNUNYTYGM MH GUMULOU, IPYKKY CPMOHAM UGE UIIUKYGMWUALY LAXXYGSE ZYSM PM PTIHLLPVSY MH NH HG SPBPGN UL VYZHKY. PG THLWHC OY ZYSM UM IYUWY, UM OHTY, CUKT UGXXPKME UL PG UG HSX XKYLLPGN NHCG.THLWHC LHWPYME, ZKHT MOY HSX CHTYG XHCG MH MOY WOPSXKYG, KYWYPBYX IPYKKYSPRY U SHGN-YDIYWMYX NAYLM COHLY ISUWY CUL USCUEL KYUXE UCUPMPGN OPT.ZHK THLWHC LHWPYME IPYKKY CUL MOY GPWYLM, RPGXYLM, THLM PGMYSSYWMAUS,TYKKPYLM, UGX THLM TUNGUGPTHAL HZ WKUGRL, U OYYXSYLL, NYGPUS GHVSYTUG HZMOY HSX KALLPUG MEIY. OUX OY GHM LYYG MOYIHLLPVPSPME HZ, UGX IULLPHGUMYSE XYLPKYX, MOY KYNYGYKUMPHG HZ MOY LPGZASOATUG KUWY, UGX OPL HCG IKHNKYLL MH MOY OPNOYLM XYNKYY HZ IYKZYWMPHG?OUX OY GHM YLMUVSPLOYX LWOHHSL UGX OHLIPMUSL UGX SPVYKUMYX OPL LYKZL?VAM PGLMYUX HZ USS MOUM--OYKY OY CUL, MOY CYUSMOE OALVUGX HZ UGAGZUPMOZAS CPZY, U KYMPKYX NYGMSYTUG-PG-CUPMPGN, ZHGX HZ YUMPGN UGXXKPGRPGN UGX, UL OY AGVAMMHGYX OPL CUPLMWHUM, HZ UVALPGN MOY NHBYKGTYGMU VPM, U TYTVYK HZ MOY THLWHC YGNSPLO WSAV, UGX U AGPBYKLUS ZUBHKPMY PGTHLWHC LHWPYME. ZHK U SHGN MPTY OY WHASX GHM KYWHGWPSY OPTLYSZ MH MOYPXYU MOUM OY CUL HGY HZ MOHLY LUTY KYMPKYX THLWHC NYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGNOY OUX LH XYLIPLYX LYBYG EYUKL VYZHKY.LHTYMPTYL OY WHGLHSYX OPTLYSZ CPMO MOY MOHANOM MOUM OY CUL HGSE SPBPGNMOPL SPZY MYTIHKUKPSE; VAM MOYG OY CUL LOHWRYX VE MOY MOHANOM HZ OHCTUGE, SPRY OPTLYSZ, OUX YGMYKYX MOUM SPZY UGX MOUM WSAV MYTIHKUKPSE,CPMO USS MOYPK MYYMO UGX OUPK, UGX OUX HGSE SYZM PM COYG GHM U LPGNSYMHHMO HK OUPK KYTUPGYX.PG THTYGML HZ IKPXY, COYG OY MOHANOM HZ OPL IHLPMPHG PM LYYTYX MHOPT MOUM OY CUL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM UGX XPLMPGWM ZKHT MOHLY HMOYK KYMPKYXNYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGN OY OUX ZHKTYKSE XYLIPLYX: MOYE CYKY YTIME, LMAIPX,WHGMYGMYX ZYSSHCL, LUMPLZPYX CPMO MOYPK IHLPMPHG, "COPSY P UT LMPSSXPLWHGMYGMYX UGX CUGM MH XH LHTYMOPGN ZHK TUGRPGX. VAM IYKOUIL USS MOYLYWHTKUXYL HZ TPGY LMKANNSYX QALM SPRY TY UGX LHANOM LHTYMOPGN GYC, UIUMO PG SPZY HZ MOYPK HCG, UGX SPRY TY CYKY VKHANOM VE ZHKWY HZWPKWATLMUGWYL, LHWPYME, UGX KUWY--VE MOUM YSYTYGMUS ZHKWY UNUPGLM COPWOTUG PL IHCYKSYLL--MH MOY WHGXPMPHG P UT PG," LUPX OY MH OPTLYSZ PGTHTYGML HZ OATPSPME; UGX UZMYK SPBPGN LHTY MPTY PG THLWHC OY GH SHGNYKXYLIPLYX, VAM VYNUG MH NKHC ZHGX HZ, MH KYLIYWM, UGX MH IPME OPLWHTKUXYL PG XYLMPGE, UL OY IPMPYX OPTLYSZ.IPYKKY GH SHGNYK LAZZYKYX THTYGML HZ XYLIUPK, OEIHWOHGXKPU, UGX XPLNALMCPMO SPZY, VAM MOY TUSUXE MOUM OUX ZHKTYKSE ZHAGX YDIKYLLPHG PG LAWOUWAMY UMMUWRL CUL XKPBYG PGCUKXL UGX GYBYK SYZM OPT ZHK U THTYGM."COUM ZHK? COE? COUM PL NHPGN HG PG MOY CHKSX?" OY CHASX ULR OPTLYSZ PGIYKISYDPME LYBYKUS MPTYL U XUE, PGBHSAGMUKPSE VYNPGGPGN MH KYZSYWM UGYCHG MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY IOYGHTYGU HZ SPZY; VAM RGHCPGN VE YDIYKPYGWY MOUMMOYKY CYKY GH UGLCYKL MH MOYLY JAYLMPHGL OY TUXY OULMY MH MAKG UCUEZKHT MOYT, UGX MHHR AI U VHHR, HK OAKKPYX HZ MH MOY WSAV HK MH UIHSSHGGPRHSUYBPWO'L, MH YDWOUGNY MOY NHLLPI HZ MOY MHCG."OYSYGY, COH OUL GYBYK WUKYX ZHK UGEMOPGN VAM OYK HCG VHXE UGX PL HGYHZ MOY LMAIPXYLM CHTYG PG MOY CHKSX," MOHANOM IPYKKY, "PL KYNUKXYX VEIYHISY UL MOY UWTY HZ PGMYSSPNYGWY UGX KYZPGYTYGM, UGX MOYE IUE OHTUNYMH OYK. GUIHSYHG VHGUIUKMY CUL XYLIPLYX VE USS UL SHGN UL OY CUL NKYUM,VAM GHC MOUM OY OUL VYWHTY U CKYMWOYX WHTYXPUG MOY YTIYKHK ZKUGWPL CUGMLMH HZZYK OPT OPL XUANOMYK PG UG PSSYNUS TUKKPUNY. MOY LIUGPUKXL, MOKHANOMOY WUMOHSPW WSYKNE, HZZYK IKUPLY MH NHX ZHK MOYPK BPWMHKE HBYK MOYZKYGWO HG MOY ZHAKMYYGMO HZ QAGY, UGX MOY ZKYGWO, USLH MOKHANO MOYWUMOHSPW WSYKNE, HZZYK IKUPLY VYWUALY HG MOUM LUTY ZHAKMYYGMO HZ QAGYMOYE XYZYUMYX MOY LIUGPUKXL. TE VKHMOYK TULHGL LCYUK VE MOY VSHHX MOUMMOYE UKY KYUXE MH LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGN ZHK MOYPK GYPNOVHK, VAM MOYEXH GHM NPBY U KAVSY YUWO MH MOY WHSSYWMPHGL ZHK MOY IHHK, UGX MOYEPGMKPNAY, MOY ULMKUYU SHXNY UNUPGLM MOY TUGGU LYYRYKL, UGX ZALL UVHAM UGUAMOYGMPW LWHMWO WUKIYM UGX U WOUKMYK MOUM GHVHXE GYYXL, UGX MOY TYUGPGNHZ COPWO MOY BYKE TUG COH CKHMY PM XHYL GHM AGXYKLMUGX. CY USS IKHZYLLMOY WOKPLMPUG SUC HZ ZHKNPBYGYLL HZ PGQAKPYL UGX SHBY HZ HAK GYPNOVHKL,MOY SUC PG OHGHK HZ COPWO CY OUBY VAPSM PG THLWHC ZHKME MPTYL ZHKMEWOAKWOYL--VAM EYLMYKXUE U XYLYKMYK CUL RGHAMYX MH XYUMO UGX U TPGPLMYKHZ MOUM LUTY SUC HZ SHBY UGX ZHKNPBYGYLL, U IKPYLM, NUBY MOY LHSXPYK UWKHLL MH RPLL VYZHKY OPL YDYWAMPHG." LH MOHANOM IPYKKY, UGX MOY COHSY HZMOPL NYGYKUS XYWYIMPHG COPWO YBYKEHGY UWWYIML, UWWALMHTYX UL OY CUL MHPM, ULMHGPLOYX OPT YUWO MPTY UL PZ PM CYKY LHTYMOPGN GYC. "P AGXYKLMUGXMOY XYWYIMPHG UGX WHGZALPHG," OY MOHANOM, "VAM OHC UT P MH MYSS MOYTUSS MOUM P LYY? P OUBY MKPYX, UGX OUBY USCUEL ZHAGX MOUM MOYE MHH PG MOYXYIMOL HZ MOYPK LHASL AGXYKLMUGX PM UL P XH, UGX HGSE MKE GHM MH LYYPM. LH PM UIIYUKL MOUM PM TALM VY LH! VAM P--COUM PL MH VYWHTY HZTY?" MOHANOM OY. OY OUX MOY AGZHKMAGUMY WUIUWPME TUGE TYG, YLIYWPUSSEKALLPUGL, OUBY HZ LYYPGN UGX VYSPYBPGN PG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ NHHXGYLLUGX MKAMO, VAM HZ LYYPGN MOY YBPS UGX ZUSLYOHHX HZ SPZY MHH WSYUKSEMH VY UVSY MH MURY U LYKPHAL IUKM PG PM. YBYKE LIOYKY HZ CHKR CULWHGGYWMYX, PG OPL YEYL, CPMO YBPS UGX XYWYIMPHG. COUMYBYK OY MKPYX MHVY, COUMYBYK OY YGNUNYX PG, MOY YBPS UGX ZUSLYOHHX HZ PM KYIASLYX OPTUGX VSHWRYX YBYKE IUMO HZ UWMPBPME. EYM OY OUX MH SPBY UGX MH ZPGXHWWAIUMPHG. PM CUL MHH XKYUXZAS MH VY AGXYK MOY VAKXYG HZ MOYLYPGLHSAVSY IKHVSYTL, LH OY UVUGXHGYX OPTLYSZ MH UGE XPLMKUWMPHG PG HKXYKMH ZHKNYM MOYT. OY ZKYJAYGMYX YBYKE RPGX HZ LHWPYME, XKUGR TAWO, VHANOMIPWMAKYL, YGNUNYX PG VAPSXPGN, UGX UVHBY USS--KYUX.OY KYUX, UGX KYUX YBYKEMOPGN MOUM WUTY MH OUGX. HG WHTPGN OHTY, COPSYOPL BUSYML CYKY LMPSS MURPGN HZZ OPL MOPGNL, OY IPWRYX AI U VHHR UGXVYNUG MH KYUX. ZKHT KYUXPGN OY IULLYX MH LSYYIPGN, ZKHT LSYYIPGN MHNHLLPI PG XKUCPGN KHHTL HZ MOY WSAV, ZKHT NHLLPI MH WUKHALUSL UGX CHTYG;ZKHT WUKHALUSL VUWR MH NHLLPI, KYUXPGN, UGX CPGY. XKPGRPGN VYWUTY THKYUGX THKY U IOELPWUS UGX USLH U THKUS GYWYLLPME. MOHANO MOY XHWMHKLCUKGYX OPT MOUM CPMO OPL WHKIASYGWY CPGY CUL XUGNYKHAL ZHK OPT, OYXKUGR U NKYUM XYUS. OY CUL HGSE JAPMY UM YULY COYG OUBPGN IHAKYX LYBYKUSNSULLYL HZ CPGY TYWOUGPWUSSE PGMH OPL SUKNY THAMO OY ZYSM U ISYULUGMCUKTMO PG OPL VHXE, UG UTPUVPSPME MHCUKX USS OPL ZYSSHCL, UGX UKYUXPGYLL MH KYLIHGX LAIYKZPWPUSSE MH YBYKE PXYU CPMOHAM IKHVPGN PMXYYISE. HGSE UZMYK YTIMEPGN U VHMMSY HK MCH XPX OY ZYYS XPTSE MOUM MOYMYKKPVSE MUGNSYX LRYPG HZ SPZY COPWO IKYBPHALSE OUX MYKKPZPYX OPT CULGHM UL XKYUXZAS UL OY OUX MOHANOM. OY CUL USCUEL WHGLWPHAL HZ LHTYULIYWM HZ MOUM LRYPG, UL CPMO U VAFFPGN PG OPL OYUX UZMYK XPGGYK HKLAIIYK OY WOUMMYX HK SPLMYGYX MH WHGBYKLUMPHG HK KYUX. VAM AGXYK MOYPGZSAYGWY HZ CPGY OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ: "PM XHYLG'M TUMMYK. P'SS NYM PMAGKUBYSYX. P OUBY U LHSAMPHG KYUXE, VAM OUBY GH MPTY GHC--P'SS MOPGR PMUSS HAM SUMYK HG!" VAM MOY SUMYK HG GYBYK WUTY.PG MOY THKGPGN, HG UG YTIME LMHTUWO, USS MOY HSX JAYLMPHGL UIIYUKYX ULPGLHSAVSY UGX MYKKPVSY UL YBYK, UGX IPYKKY OULMPSE IPWRYX AI U VHHR, UGXPZ UGEHGY WUTY MH LYY OPT OY CUL NSUX.LHTYMPTYL OY KYTYTVYKYX OHC OY OUX OYUKX MOUM LHSXPYKL PG CUK COYGYGMKYGWOYX AGXYK MOY YGYTE'L ZPKY, PZ MOYE OUBY GHMOPGN MH XH, MKE OUKXMH ZPGX LHTY HWWAIUMPHG MOY THKY YULPSE MH VYUK MOY XUGNYK. MH IPYKKYUSS TYG LYYTYX SPRY MOHLY LHSXPYKL, LYYRPGN KYZANY ZKHT SPZY: LHTY PGUTVPMPHG, LHTY PG WUKXL, LHTY PG ZKUTPGN SUCL, LHTY PG CHTYG, LHTY PGMHEL, LHTY PG OHKLYL, LHTY PG IHSPMPWL, LHTY PG LIHKM, LHTY PG CPGY,UGX LHTY PG NHBYKGTYGMUS UZZUPKL. "GHMOPGN PL MKPBPUS, UGX GHMOPGN PLPTIHKMUGM, PM'L USS MOY LUTY--HGSE MH LUBY HGYLYSZ ZKHT PM UL VYLM HGYWUG," MOHANOM IPYKKY. "HGSE GHM MH LYY PM, MOUM XKYUXZAS PM!"WOUIMYK PPUM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ CPGMYK IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP UGX OPL XUANOMYKTHBYX MH THLWHC. UM MOUM MPTY YGMOALPULT ZHK MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK'LKYNPTY OUX CYURYGYX UGX U IUMKPHMPW UGX UGMP-ZKYGWO MYGXYGWE IKYBUPSYXMOYKY, UGX MOPL, MHNYMOYK CPMO OPL IULM UGX OPL PGMYSSYWM UGX OPLHKPNPGUSPME, UM HGWY TUXY IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP UG HVQYWM HZIUKMPWASUK KYLIYWM MH MOY THLWHBPMYL UGX MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY THLWHCHIIHLPMPHG MH MOY NHBYKGTYGM.MOY IKPGWY OUX UNYX BYKE TAWO MOUM EYUK. OY LOHCYX TUKRYX LPNGL HZLYGPSPME VE U MYGXYGWE MH ZUSS ULSYYI, ZHKNYMZASGYLL HZ JAPMY KYWYGMYBYGML, KYTYTVKUGWY HZ KYTHMY HGYL, UGX MOY WOPSXPLO BUGPME CPMO COPWOOY UWWYIMYX MOY KHSY HZ OYUX HZ MOY THLWHC HIIHLPMPHG. PG LIPMY HZ MOPLMOY HSX TUG PGLIPKYX PG USS OPL BPLPMHKL USPRY U ZYYSPGN HZ KYLIYWMZASBYGYKUMPHG--YLIYWPUSSE HZ UG YBYGPGN COYG OY WUTY PG MH MYU PG OPLHSX-ZULOPHGYX WHUM UGX IHCXYKYX CPN UGX, UKHALYX VE UGEHGY, MHSX OPLUVKAIM LMHKPYL HZ MOY IULM, HK AMMYKYX EYM THKY UVKAIM UGX LWUMOPGNWKPMPWPLTL HZ MOY IKYLYGM. ZHK MOYT USS, MOUM HSX-ZULOPHGYX OHALY CPMOPML NPNUGMPW TPKKHKL, IKY-KYBHSAMPHG ZAKGPMAKY, IHCXYKYX ZHHMTYG, UGXMOY LMYKG LOKYCX HSX TUG (OPTLYSZ U KYSPW HZ MOY IULM WYGMAKE) CPMO OPLNYGMSY XUANOMYK UGX MOY IKYMME ZKYGWOCHTUG COH CYKY KYBYKYGMSE XYBHMYXMH OPT IKYLYGMYX U TUQYLMPW UGX UNKYYUVSY LIYWMUWSY. VAM MOY BPLPMHKLXPX GHM KYZSYWM MOUM VYLPXYL MOY WHAISY HZ OHAKL XAKPGN COPWO MOYE LUCMOYPK OHLM, MOYKY CYKY USLH MCYGME-MCH OHAKL PG MOY XUE XAKPGN COPWO MOYIKPBUMY UGX PGMPTUMY SPZY HZ MOY OHALY WHGMPGAYX.SUMMYKSE MOUM IKPBUMY SPZY OUX VYWHTY BYKE MKEPGN ZHK IKPGWYLL TUKE.MOYKY PG THLWHC LOY CUL XYIKPBYX HZ OYK NKYUMYLM ISYULAKYL--MUSRL CPMOMOY IPSNKPTL UGX MOY LHSPMAXY COPWO KYZKYLOYX OYK UM VUSX OPSSL--UGX LOYOUX GHGY HZ MOY UXBUGMUNYL UGX ISYULAKYL HZ WPME SPZY. LOY XPX GHM NHHAM PGMH LHWPYME; YBYKEHGY RGYC MOUM OYK ZUMOYK CHASX GHM SYM OYK NHUGECOYKY CPMOHAM OPT, UGX OPL ZUPSPGN OYUSMO IKYBYGMYX OPL NHPGN HAMOPTLYSZ, LH MOUM LOY CUL GHM PGBPMYX MH XPGGYKL UGX YBYGPGN IUKMPYL. LOYOUX JAPMY UVUGXHGYX MOY OHIY HZ NYMMPGN TUKKPYX. LOY LUC MOY WHSXGYLLUGX TUSYBHSYGWY CPMO COPWO MOY HSX IKPGWY KYWYPBYX UGX XPLTPLLYX MOYEHAGN TYG, IHLLPVSY LAPMHKL, COH LHTYMPTYL UIIYUKYX UM MOYPK OHALY. LOYOUX GH ZKPYGXL: XAKPGN MOPL BPLPM MH THLWHC LOY OUX VYYG XPLUIIHPGMYX PGMOY MCH COH OUX VYYG GYUKYLM MH OYK. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, CPMO COHTLOY OUX GYBYK VYYG UVSY MH VY JAPMY ZKUGR, OUX GHC VYWHTY AGISYULUGM MHOYK, UGX ZHK BUKPHAL KYULHGL IKPGWYLL TUKE UBHPXYX OYK. QASPY, CPMO COHTLOY OUX WHKKYLIHGXYX ZHK MOY SULM ZPBY EYUKL, CUL PG THLWHC, VAM IKHBYXMH VY JAPMY USPYG MH OYK COYG MOYE TYM. QALM MOYG QASPY, COH VE MOYXYUMO HZ OYK VKHMOYKL OUX VYWHTY HGY HZ MOY KPWOYLM OYPKYLLYL PG THLWHC,CUL PG MOY ZASS COPKS HZ LHWPYME ISYULAKYL. LOY CUL LAKKHAGXYX VE EHAGNTYG COH, LOY ZUGWPYX, OUX LAXXYGSE SYUKGYX MH UIIKYWPUMY OYK CHKMO.QASPY CUL UM MOUM LMUNY PG MOY SPZY HZ U LHWPYME CHTUG COYG LOY ZYYSLMOUM OYK SULM WOUGWY HZ TUKKEPGN OUL WHTY UGX MOUM OYK ZUMY TALM VYXYWPXYX GHC HK GYBYK. HG MOAKLXUEL IKPGWYLL TUKE KYTYTVYKYX CPMO UTHAKGZAS LTPSY MOUM LOY GHC OUX GH HGY MH CKPMY MH, LPGWY QASPY--COHLYIKYLYGWY NUBY OYK GH ISYULAKY CUL OYKY UGX MOYE TYM YBYKE CYYR. SPRYMOY HSX YTPNKY COH XYWSPGYX MH TUKKE MOY SUXE CPMO COHT OY OUX LIYGM OPLYBYGPGNL ZHK EYUKL, LOY KYNKYMMYX QASPY'L IKYLYGWY UGX OUBPGN GH HGY MHCKPMY MH. PG THLWHC IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX GH HGY MH MUSR MH, GH HGY MH COHTMH WHGZPXY OYK LHKKHC, UGX TAWO LHKKHC ZYSS MH OYK SHM QALM MOYG. MOYMPTY ZHK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYMAKG UGX TUKKPUNY CUL UIIKHUWOPGN, VAM OPLKYJAYLM MH OYK MH IKYIUKY OPL ZUMOYK ZHK PM OUX GHM VYYG WUKKPYX HAM; PGZUWM, PM LYYTYX UL PZ TUMMYKL CYKY JAPMY OHIYSYLL, ZHK UM YBYKE TYGMPHGHZ MOY EHAGN WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU MOY HSX IKPGWY (COH UIUKM ZKHT MOUM CULALAUSSE PG U VUX MYTIYK) SHLM WHGMKHS HZ OPTLYSZ. UGHMOYK SUMYSE UXXYXLHKKHC UKHLY ZKHT MOY SYLLHGL LOY NUBY OYK LPD EYUK-HSX GYIOYC. MH OYKWHGLMYKGUMPHG LOY XYMYWMYX PG OYKLYSZ PG KYSUMPHG MH SPMMSY GPWOHSULLHTY LETIMHTL HZ OYK ZUMOYK'L PKKPMUVPSPME. OHCYBYK HZMYG LOY MHSXOYKLYSZ MOUM LOY TALM GHM NYM PKKPMUVSY COYG MYUWOPGN OYK GYIOYC, USTHLMYBYKE MPTY MOUM, IHPGMYK PG OUGX, LOY LUM XHCG MH LOHC OPT MOY ZKYGWOUSIOUVYM, LOY LH SHGNYX MH IHAK OYK HCG RGHCSYXNY JAPWRSE UGX YULPSEPGMH MOY WOPSX--COH CUL USKYUXE UZKUPX MOUM UAGMPY TPNOM UM UGE THTYGMNYM UGNKE--MOUM UM OPL LSPNOMYLM PGUMMYGMPHG LOY MKYTVSYX, VYWUTYZSALMYKYX UGX OYUMYX, KUPLYX OYK BHPWY, UGX LHTYMPTYL IASSYX OPT VE MOYUKT UGX IAM OPT PG MOY WHKGYK. OUBPGN IAM OPT PG MOY WHKGYK LOY CHASXOYKLYSZ VYNPG MH WKE HBYK OYK WKAYS, YBPS GUMAKY, UGX SPMMSY GPWOHSUL,ZHSSHCPGN OYK YDUTISY, CHASX LHV, UGX CPMOHAM IYKTPLLPHG CHASX SYUBY OPLWHKGYK, WHTY MH OYK, IASS OYK CYM OUGXL ZKHT OYK ZUWY, UGX WHTZHKMOYK. VAM COUM XPLMKYLLYX MOY IKPGWYLL THLM HZ USS CUL OYK ZUMOYK'LPKKPMUVPSPME, COPWO CUL USCUEL XPKYWMYX UNUPGLM OYK UGX OUX HZ SUMYUTHAGMYX MH WKAYSME. OUX OY ZHKWYX OYK MH IKHLMKUMY OYKLYSZ MH MOYNKHAGX USS GPNOM, OUX OY VYUMYG OYK HK TUXY OYK ZYMWO CHHX HK CUMYK, PMCHASX GYBYK OUBY YGMYKYX OYK TPGX MH MOPGR OYK IHLPMPHG OUKX; VAM MOPLSHBPGN XYLIHM--MOY THKY WKAYS VYWUALY OY SHBYX OYK UGX ZHK MOUM KYULHGMHKTYGMYX OPTLYSZ UGX OYK--RGYC OHC GHM TYKYSE MH OAKM UGX OATPSPUMYOYK XYSPVYKUMYSE, VAM MH LOHC OYK MOUM LOY CUL USCUEL MH VSUTY ZHKYBYKEMOPGN. HZ SUMY OY OUX YDOPVPMYX U GYC MKUPM MOUM MHKTYGMYX IKPGWYLLTUKE THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN YSLY; MOPL CUL OPL YBYK-PGWKYULPGN PGMPTUWE CPMOTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY. MOY PXYU MOUM UM MOY ZPKLM THTYGM HZ KYWYPBPGNMOY GYCL HZ OPL LHG'L PGMYGMPHGL OUX HWWAKKYX MH OPT PG QYLM--MOUMPZ UGXKYC NHM TUKKPYX OY OPTLYSZ CHASX TUKKE VHAKPYGGY--OUX YBPXYGMSEISYULYX OPT, UGX SUMMYKSE OY OUX IYKLPLMYGMSE, UGX UL PM LYYTYX MHIKPGWYLL TUKE TYKYSE MH HZZYGX OYK, LOHCG LIYWPUS YGXYUKTYGML MHMOY WHTIUGPHG UGX YDIKYLLYX OPL XPLLUMPLZUWMPHG CPMO OPL XUANOMYK VEXYTHGLMKUMPHGL HZ SHBY HZ VHAKPYGGY.HGY XUE PG THLWHC PG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L IKYLYGWY (LOY MOHANOM OYK ZUMOYKXPX PM IAKIHLYSE COYG LOY CUL MOYKY) MOY HSX IKPGWY RPLLYX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY'L OUGX UGX, XKUCPGN OYK MH OPT, YTVKUWYX OYK UZZYWMPHGUMYSE.IKPGWYLL TUKE ZSALOYX UGX KUG HAM HZ MOY KHHT. U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYKTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY WUTY PGMH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L KHHT LTPSPGN UGX TURPGNWOYYKZAS KYTUKRL PG OYK UNKYYUVSY BHPWY. IKPGWYLL TUKE OULMPSE CPIYXUCUE OYK MYUKL, CYGM KYLHSAMYSE AI MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, UGXYBPXYGMSE AGWHGLWPHAL HZ COUM LOY CUL XHPGN VYNUG LOHAMPGN PG UGNKEOULMY UM MOY ZKYGWOCHTUG, OYK BHPWY VKYURPGN: "PM'L OHKKPVSY, BPSY,PGOATUG, MH MURY UXBUGMUNY HZ MOY CYURGYLL..." LOY XPX GHM ZPGPLO."SYUBY TE KHHT," LOY YDWSUPTYX, UGX VAKLM PGMH LHVL.GYDM XUE MOY IKPGWY XPX GHM LUE U CHKX MH OPL XUANOMYK, VAM LOY GHMPWYXMOUM UM XPGGYK OY NUBY HKXYKL MOUM TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY LOHASX VYLYKBYX ZPKLM. UZMYK XPGGYK, COYG MOY ZHHMTUG OUGXYX WHZZYY UGX ZKHTOUVPM VYNUG CPMO MOY IKPGWYLL, MOY IKPGWY LAXXYGSE NKYC ZAKPHAL,MOKYC OPL LMPWR UM IOPSPI, UGX PGLMUGMSE NUBY PGLMKAWMPHGL MH OUBY OPTWHGLWKPIMYX ZHK MOY UKTE."OY XHYLG'M HVYE... NH!XHG'M SYM TY LYM YEYL HG EHA; VYN OYK IUKXHG!"IKPGWYLL TUKE ULRYX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L IUKXHG, UGX USLH OYKZUMOYK'L IUKXHG ZHK OYKLYSZ UGX ZHK IOPSPI MOY ZHHMTUG, COH OUX VYNNYXZHK OYK PGMYKBYGMPHG.UM LAWO THTYGML LHTYMOPGN SPRY U IKPXY HZ LUWKPZPWY NUMOYKYX PG OYKLHAS. "OY PL HSX UGX ZYYVSY, UGX P XUKY MH WHGXYTGOPT!" LOY MOHANOM UM LAWO THTYGML, CPMO U ZYYSPGN HZ KYBASLPHG UNUPGLMOYKLYSZ.WOUIMYK PPPPG 1811 MOYKY CUL SPBPGN PG THLWHC U ZKYGWO XHWMHK--TYMPBPYK--COH OUXKUIPXSE VYWHTY MOY ZULOPHG. OY CUL YGHKTHALSE MUSS, OUGXLHTY, UTPUVSYUL ZKYGWOTYG UKY, UGX CUL, UL USS THLWHC LUPX, UG YDMKUHKXPGUKPSE WSYBYKXHWMHK. OY CUL KYWYPBYX PG MOY VYLM OHALYL GHM TYKYSE UL U XHWMHK, VAMUL UG YJAUS.IKPGWY GPWOHSUL OUX USCUEL KPXPWASYX TYXPWPGY, VAM SUMMYKSE HGTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L UXBPWY OUX USSHCYX MOPL XHWMHK MH BPLPM OPT UGXOUX NKHCG UWWALMHTYX MH OPT. TYMPBPYK WUTY MH LYY MOY IKPGWY UVHAM MCPWYU CYYR.HG XYWYTVYK 6--LM. GPWOHSUL' XUE UGX MOY IKPGWY'L GUTY XUE--USS THLWHCWUTY MH MOY IKPGWY'L ZKHGM XHHK VAM OY NUBY HKXYKL MH UXTPM GH HGYUGX MH PGBPMY MH XPGGYK HGSE U LTUSS GATVYK, U SPLM HZ COHT OY NUBY MHIKPGWYLL TUKE.TYMPBPYK, COH WUTY PG MOY THKGPGN CPMO OPL ZYSPWPMUMPHGL, WHGLPXYKYXPM IKHIYK PG OPL JAUSPME HZ XHWMHK XY ZHKWYK SU WHGLPNGY, * UL OY MHSXIKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX CYGM PG MH LYY MOY IKPGWY. PM OUIIYGYX MOUM HG MOUMTHKGPGN HZ OPL GUTY XUE MOY IKPGWY CUL PG HGY HZ OPL CHKLM THHXL. OY OUXVYYG NHPGN UVHAM MOY OHALY USS MOY THKGPGN ZPGXPGN ZUASM CPMO YBYKEHGYUGX IKYMYGXPGN GHM MH AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL LUPX MH OPT UGX GHM MH VYAGXYKLMHHX OPTLYSZ. IKPGWYLL TUKE CYSS RGYC MOPL THHX HZ JAPYM UVLHKVYXJAYKASHALGYLL, COPWO NYGYKUSSE WASTPGUMYX PG U VAKLM HZ KUNY, UGX LOYCYGM UVHAM USS MOUM THKGPGN UL MOHANO ZUWPGN U WHWRYX UGX SHUXYX NAG UGXUCUPMYX MOY PGYBPMUVSY YDISHLPHG. AGMPS MOY XHWMHK'L UKKPBUS MOY THKGPGNOUX IULLYX HZZ LUZYSE. UZMYK UXTPMMPGN MOY XHWMHK, IKPGWYLL TUKE LUMXHCG CPMO U VHHR PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT GYUK MOY XHHK MOKHANO COPWO LOYWHASX OYUK USS MOUM IULLYX PG MOY LMAXE.    * MH ZHKWY MOY NAUKX.UM ZPKLM LOY OYUKX HGSE TYMPBPYK'L BHPWY, MOYG OYK ZUMOYK'L, MOYG VHMOBHPWYL VYNUG LIYURPGN UM MOY LUTY MPTY, MOY XHHK CUL ZSAGN HIYG, UGXHG MOY MOKYLOHSX UIIYUKYX MOY OUGXLHTY ZPNAKY HZ MOY MYKKPZPYX TYMPBPYKCPMO OPL LOHWR HZ VSUWR OUPK, UGX MOY IKPGWY PG OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG UGXZYF, OPL ZUWY XPLMHKMYX CPMO ZAKE UGX MOY IAIPSL HZ OPL YEYL KHSSYXXHCGCUKXL."EHA XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX?" LOHAMYX MOY IKPGWY, "VAM P XH! ZKYGWO LIE, LSUBYHZ VAHGUIUKMY, LIE, NYM HAM HZ TE OHALY! VY HZZ, P MYSS EHA..."TYMPBPYK, LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKL, CYGM AI MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY COHUM MOY LHAGX HZ LOHAMPGN OUX KAG PG ZKHT UG UXQHPGPGN KHHT."MOY IKPGWY PL GHM BYKE CYSS: VPSY UGX KALO HZ VSHHX MH MOY OYUX.RYYI WUST, P CPSS WUSS UNUPG MHTHKKHC," LUPX TYMPBPYK; UGX IAMMPGN OPLZPGNYKL MH OPL SPIL OY OULMYGYX UCUE.MOKHANO MOY LMAXE XHHK WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ LSPIIYKYX ZYYM UGX MOY WKE:"LIPYL, MKUPMHKL, MKUPMHKL YBYKECOYKY! GHM U THTYGM'L IYUWY PG TE HCGOHALY!"UZMYK TYMPBPYK'L XYIUKMAKY MOY HSX IKPGWY WUSSYX OPL XUANOMYK PG, UGXMOY COHSY CYPNOM HZ OPL CKUMO ZYSS HG OYK. LOY CUL MH VSUTY MOUM U LIEOUX VYYG UXTPMMYX. MOYG, UL PZUZKUPX LOY TPNOM ZPGX LHTY TYUGL HZ WHGLHSUMPHG, OY KYMAKGYX UGX MKEPGNMH UIIYUK WUST UXXYX: "UGX XHG'M PTUNPGY P OUBY LUPX MOPL PG U THTYGM HZUGNYK. P UT WUST. VAM OY WHASX GHMKYLMKUPG OPTLYSZ UGX CPMO MOY BPKASYGWY HZ COPWO HGSE HGY COH SHBYLPL WUIUVSY, YBPXYGMSE LAZZYKPGN OPTLYSZ, OY LOHHR OPL ZPLML UM OYK UGXLWKYUTYX:"PZ HGSE LHTY ZHHS CHASX TUKKE OYK!" MOYG OY LSUTTYX MOY XHHK, LYGM ZHKTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, UGX LAVLPXYX PGMH OPL LMAXE.UM MCH H'WSHWR MOY LPD WOHLYG NAYLML ULLYTVSYX ZHK XPGGYK.MOYLY NAYLML--MOY ZUTHAL WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, IKPGWY SHIAROPG CPMO OPLGYIOYC, NYGYKUS WOUMKHB UG HSX CUK WHTKUXY HZ MOY IKPGWY'L, UGX HZ MOYEHAGNYK NYGYKUMPHG IPYKKY UGX VHKPL XKAVYMLRHE--UCUPMYX MOY IKPGWY PGMOY XKUCPGN KHHT.VHKPL, COH OUX WHTY MH THLWHC HG SYUBY U ZYC XUEL VYZHKY, OUX VYYGUGDPHAL MH VY IKYLYGMYX MH IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP, UGX OUX WHGMKPBYXMH PGNKUMPUMY OPTLYSZ LH CYSS MOUM MOY HSX IKPGWY PG OPL WULY TUXY UGYDWYIMPHG MH MOY KASY HZ GHM KYWYPBPGN VUWOYSHKL PG OPL OHALY.MOY IKPGWY'L OHALY XPX GHM VYSHGN MH COUM PL RGHCG UL ZULOPHGUVSYLHWPYME, VAM OPL SPMMSY WPKWSY--MOHANO GHM TAWO MUSRYX UVHAM PGMHCG--CUL HGY PM CUL THKY ZSUMMYKPGN MH VY KYWYPBYX PG MOUG UGE HMOYK.VHKPL OUX KYUSPFYX MOPL MOY CYYR VYZHKY COYG MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZPG OPL IKYLYGWY PGBPMYX KHLMHIWOPG MH XPGGYK HG LM. GPWOHSUL' XUE, UGXKHLMHIWOPG OUX KYISPYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM WHTY:"HG MOUM XUE P USCUEL NH MH IUE TE XYBHMPHGL MH MOY KYSPWL HZ IKPGWYGPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP.""HO, EYL, EYL!" KYISPYX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. "OHC PL OY?..."MOY LTUSS NKHAI MOUM ULLYTVSYX VYZHKY XPGGYK PG MOY SHZME HSX-ZULOPHGYXXKUCPGN KHHT CPMO PML HSX ZAKGPMAKY KYLYTVSYX MOY LHSYTG NUMOYKPGN HZU WHAKM HZ QALMPWY. WHAGM KHLMHIWOPGUSHGY RYIM MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG NHPGN, GHC KYSUMPGN MOY SUMYLM MHCG GYCL,UGX GHC MOY SUMYLM IHSPMPWUS NHLLPI.SHIAROPG UGX MOY HSX NYGYKUS HWWULPHGUSSE MHHR IUKM PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG.IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP SPLMYGYX UL U IKYLPXPGN QAXNY KYWYPBYL U KYIHKM, HGSEGHC UGX MOYG, LPSYGMSE HK VE U VKPYZ CHKX, LOHCPGN MOUM OY MHHR OYYX HZCOUM CUL VYPGN KYIHKMYX MH OPT. MOY MHGY HZ MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL LAWO ULPGXPWUMYX MOUM GH HGY UIIKHBYX HZ COUM CUL VYPGN XHGY PG MOY IHSPMPWUSCHKSX. PGWPXYGML CYKY KYSUMYX YBPXYGMSE WHGZPKTPGN MOY HIPGPHG MOUMYBYKEMOPGN CUL NHPGN ZKHT VUX MH CHKLY, VAM COYMOYK MYSSPGN U LMHKE HKNPBPGN UG HIPGPHG MOY LIYURYK USCUEL LMHIIYX, HK CUL LMHIIYX, UM MOYIHPGM VYEHGX COPWO OPL WKPMPWPLT TPNOM MHAWO MOY LHBYKYPNG OPTLYSZ.UM XPGGYK MOY MUSR MAKGYX HG MOY SUMYLM IHSPMPWUS GYCL: GUIHSYHG'LLYPFAKY HZ MOY XARY HZ HSXYGVAKN'L MYKKPMHKE, UGX MOY KALLPUG GHMY,OHLMPSY MH GUIHSYHG, COPWO OUX VYYG LYGM MH USS MOY YAKHIYUG WHAKML."VHGUIUKMY MKYUML YAKHIY UL U IPKUMY XHYL U WUIMAKYX BYLLYS," LUPX WHAGMKHLMHIWOPG, KYIYUMPGN U IOKULY OY OUX AMMYKYX LYBYKUS MPTYL VYZHKY. "HGYHGSE CHGXYKL UM MOY SHGN-LAZZYKPGN HK VSPGXGYLL HZ MOY WKHCGYX OYUXL.GHC MOY IHIY'L MAKG OUL WHTY UGX VHGUIUKMY XHYLG'M LWKAISY MH XYIHLY MOYOYUX HZ MOY WUMOHSPW WOAKWO--EYM USS RYYI LPSYGM! "OY LOPZML MOY XARYL UVHAM UL P TPNOMTHBY TE LYKZL ZKHT VUSX OPSSL MH VHNAWOUKHBH HK TE KEUFUG YLMUMYL.""MOY XARY HZ HSXYGVAKN VYUKL OPL TPLZHKMAGYL CPMO UXTPKUVSY LMKYGNMO HZWOUKUWMYK UGX KYLPNGUMPHG," KYTUKRYX VHKPL, QHPGPGN PG KYLIYWMZASSE.OY LUPX MOPL VYWUALY HG OPL QHAKGYE ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN OY OUX OUX MOY OHGHKHZ VYPGN IKYLYGMYX MH MOY XARY. IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP NSUGWYX UM MOY EHAGNTUG UL PZ UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN PG KYISE, VAM WOUGNYX OPL TPGX,YBPXYGMSE WHGLPXYKPGN OPT MHH EHAGN."P OUBY KYUX HAK IKHMYLML UVHAM MOY HSXYGVAKN UZZUPK UGX CUL LAKIKPLYXOHC VUXSE MOY GHMY CUL CHKXYX," KYTUKRYX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG PG MOY WULAUSMHGY HZ U TUG XYUSPGN CPMO U LAVQYWM JAPMY ZUTPSPUK MH OPT.IPYKKY SHHRYX UM KHLMHIWOPG CPMO GUPBY ULMHGPLOTYGM, GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGNCOE OY LOHASX VY XPLMAKVYX VE MOY VUX WHTIHLPMPHG HZ MOY GHMY."XHYL PM TUMMYK, WHAGM, OHC MOY GHMY PL CHKXYX," OY ULRYX, "LH SHGN ULPML LAVLMUGWY PL ZHKWPVSY?""TE XYUK ZYSSHC, CPMO HAK ZPBY OAGXKYX MOHALUGX MKHHIL PM LOHASX VY YULEMH OUBY U NHHX LMESY," KYMAKGYX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG.IPYKKY GHC AGXYKLMHHX MOY WHAGM'L XPLLUMPLZUWMPHG CPMO MOY CHKXPGN HZMOY GHMY."HGY CHASX OUBY MOHANOM JAPSS XKPBYKL YGHANO OUX LIKAGN AI," KYTUKRYXMOY HSX IKPGWY.
