UZMYK MOY XYUMO HZ OYK VKHMOYKL LOY OUX VYWHTYBYKE CYUSMOE. LOY CUL VE GHC XYWPXYXSE ISUPG, VAM MOHANOM OYKLYSZ GHMTYKYSE UL NHHX-SHHRPGN UL VYZHKY VAM YBYG ZUK THKY UMMKUWMPBY. LOYCUL WHGZPKTYX PG MOPL XYSALPHG VE MOY ZUWM MOUM LOY OUX VYWHTY U BYKECYUSMOE OYPKYLL UGX USLH VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY HSXYK LOY NKYC MOY SYLLXUGNYKHAL LOY VYWUTY MH TYG, UGX MOY THKY ZKYYSE MOYE WHASX ULLHWPUMYCPMO OYK UGX UBUPS MOYTLYSBYL HZ OYK LAIIYKL, LHPKYYL, UGX MOY UGPTUMYXWHTIUGE MOUM ULLYTVSYX UM OYK OHALY, CPMOHAM PGWAKKPGN UGE HVSPNUMPHG.U TUG COH CHASX OUBY VYYG UZKUPX MYG EYUKL VYZHKY HZ NHPGN YBYKE XUEMH MOY OHALY COYG MOYKY CUL U NPKS HZ LYBYGMYYG MOYKY, ZHK ZYUK HZWHTIKHTPLPGN OYK UGX WHTTPMMPGN OPTLYSZ, CHASX GHC NH VHSXSE YBYKE XUEUGX MKYUM OYK GHM UL U TUKKPUNYUVSY NPKS VAM UL U LYDSYLL UWJAUPGMUGWY.MOUM CPGMYK MOY RUKUNPGL' OHALY CUL MOY THLM UNKYYUVSY UGX OHLIPMUVSYPG THLWHC. PG UXXPMPHG MH MOY ZHKTUS YBYGPGN UGX XPGGYK IUKMPYL, U SUKNYWHTIUGE, WOPYZSE HZ TYG, NUMOYKYX MOYKY YBYKE XUE, LAIIPGN UM TPXGPNOMUGX LMUEPGN MPSS MOKYY PG MOY THKGPGN. QASPY GYBYK TPLLYX U VUSS, UIKHTYGUXY, HK U ISUE. OYK XKYLLYL CYKY USCUEL HZ MOY SUMYLM ZULOPHG.VAM PG LIPMY HZ MOUM LOY LYYTYX MH VY XPLPSSALPHGYX UVHAM YBYKEMOPGN UGXMHSX YBYKEHGY MOUM LOY XPX GHM VYSPYBY YPMOYK PG ZKPYGXLOPI HK PGSHBY, HK UGE HZ MOY QHEL HZ SPZY, UGX YDIYWMYX IYUWY HGSE "EHGXYK." LOYUXHIMYX MOY MHGY HZ HGY COH OUL LAZZYKYX U NKYUM XPLUIIHPGMTYGM, SPRY UNPKS COH OUL YPMOYK SHLM MOY TUG LOY SHBYX HK VYYG WKAYSSE XYWYPBYX VEOPT. MOHANO GHMOPGN HZ MOY RPGX OUX OUIIYGYX MH OYK LOY CUL KYNUKXYX PGMOUM SPNOM, UGX OUX YBYG OYKLYSZ WHTY MH VYSPYBY MOUM LOY OUX LAZZYKYXTAWO PG SPZY. MOPL TYSUGWOHSE, COPWO XPX GHM IKYBYGM OYK UTALPGNOYKLYSZ, XPX GHM OPGXYK MOY EHAGN IYHISY COH WUTY MH OYK OHALY ZKHTIULLPGN MOY MPTY ISYULUGMSE. YBYKE BPLPMHK COH WUTY MH MOY OHALY IUPXOPL MKPVAMY MH MOY TYSUGWOHSE THHX HZ MOY OHLMYLL, UGX MOYG UTALYXOPTLYSZ CPMO LHWPYME NHLLPI, XUGWPGN, PGMYSSYWMAUS NUTYL, UGX VHAMLKPTYL, COPWO CYKY PG BHNAY UM MOY RUKUNPGL'. HGSE U ZYC HZ MOYLY EHAGNTYG, UTHGN MOYT VHKPL, YGMYKYX THKY XYYISE PGMH QASPY'L TYSUGWOHSE, UGXCPMO MOYLY LOY OUX IKHSHGNYX WHGBYKLUMPHGL PG IKPBUMY HG MOY BUGPMEHZ USS CHKSXSE MOPGNL, UGX MH MOYT LOY LOHCYX OYK USVATL ZPSSYX CPMOTHAKGZAS LRYMWOYL, TUDPTL, UGX BYKLYL.MH VHKPL, QASPY CUL IUKMPWASUKSE NKUWPHAL: LOY KYNKYMMYX OPL YUKSEXPLPSSALPHGTYGM CPMO SPZY, HZZYKYX OPT LAWO WHGLHSUMPHG HZ ZKPYGXLOPIUL LOY COH OUX OYKLYSZ LAZZYKYX LH TAWO WHASX KYGXYK, UGX LOHCYX OPT OYKUSVAT. VHKPL LRYMWOYX MCH MKYYL PG MOY USVAT UGX CKHMY: "KALMPW MKYYL,EHAK XUKR VKUGWOYL LOYX NSHHT UGX TYSUGWOHSE AIHG TY."HG UGHMOYK IUNY OY XKYC U MHTV, UGX CKHMY:    SU THKM YLM LYWHAKUVSY YM SU THKM YLM MKUGJAPSSY.    UO! WHGMKY SYL XHASYAKL PS G'E U IUL X'UAMKY ULPSY. *    * XYUMO NPBYL KYSPYZ UGX XYUMO PL IYUWYZAS.UO! ZKHT LAZZYKPGN MOYKY PL GH HMOYK KYZANY.QASPY LUPX MOPL CUL WOUKTPGN"MOYKY PL LHTYMOPGN LH YGWOUGMPGN PG MOY LTPSY HZ TYSUGWOHSE," LOY LUPXMH VHKPL, KYIYUMPGN CHKX ZHK CHKX U IULLUNY LOY OUX WHIPYX ZKHT U VHHR."PM PL U KUE HZ SPNOM PG MOY XUKRGYLL, U LOUXY VYMCYYG LUXGYLL UGXXYLIUPK, LOHCPGN MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ WHGLHSUMPHG."PG KYISE VHKPL CKHMY MOYLY SPGYL:    USPTYGM XY IHPLHG X'AGY UTY MKHI LYGLPVSY,    MHP, LUGL JAP SY VHGOYAK TY LYKUPM PTIHLLPVSY,    MYGXKY TYSUGWOHSPY, UO, BPYGL TY WHGLHSYK,    BPYGL WUSTYK SYL MHAKTYGML XY TU LHTVKY KYMKUPMY,    YM TYSY AGY XHAWYAK LYWKYMY    U WYL ISYAKL JAY QY LYGL WHASYK. *      *IHPLHGHAL GHAKPLOTYGM HZ U MHH LYGLPMPBY LHAS,     MOHA, CPMOHAM COHT OUIIPGYLL CHASX ZHK TY VY PTIHLLPVSY,     MYGXYK TYSUGWOHSE, UO, WHTY MH WHGLHSY TY,     WHTY MH WUST MOY MHKTYGML HZ TE NSHHTE KYMKYUM,     UGX TPGNSY U LYWKYM LCYYMGYLL     CPMO MOYLY MYUKL MOUM P ZYYS MH VY ZSHCPGN.ZHK VHKPL, QASPY ISUEYX THLM XHSYZAS GHWMAKGYL HG OYK OUKI. VHKPL KYUX'IHHK SPFU' USHAX MH OYK, UGX THKY MOUG HGWY PGMYKKAIMYX MOY KYUXPGNVYWUALY HZ MOY YTHMPHGL MOUM WOHRYX OPT. TYYMPGN UM SUKNY NUMOYKPGNLQASPY UGX VHKPL SHHRYX HG HGY UGHMOYK UL MOY HGSE LHASL COH AGXYKLMHHXHGY UGHMOYK PG U CHKSX HZ PGXPZZYKYGM IYHISY.UGGU TPROUESHBGU, COH HZMYG BPLPMYX MOY RUKUNPGL, COPSY ISUEPGN WUKXLCPMO MOY THMOYK TUXY WUKYZAS PGJAPKPYL UL MH QASPY'L XHCKE (LOY CUL MHOUBY MCH YLMUMYL PG IYGFU UGX MOY GPFOYNHKHX ZHKYLML). UGGU TPROUESHBGUKYNUKXYX MOY KYZPGYX LUXGYLL MOUM AGPMYX OYK LHG MH MOY CYUSMOE QASPYCPMO YTHMPHG, UGX KYLPNGUMPHG MH MOY XPBPGY CPSS."EHA UKY USCUEL WOUKTPGN UGX TYSUGWOHSE, TE XYUK QASPY," LOY LUPX MHMOY XUANOMYK. "VHKPL LUEL OPL LHAS ZPGXL KYIHLY UM EHAK OHALY. OY OULLAZZYKYX LH TUGE XPLUIIHPGMTYGML UGX PL LH LYGLPMPBY," LUPX LOY MH MOYTHMOYK. "UO, TE XYUK, P WUG'M MYSS EHA OHC ZHGX P OUBY NKHCG HZ QASPYSUMMYKSE," LOY LUPX MH OYK LHG. "VAM COH WHASX OYSI SHBPGN OYK? LOY PLUG UGNYSPW VYPGN! UO, VHKPL, VHKPL!"--LOY IUALYX. "UGX OHC P IPME OYKTHMOYK," LOY CYGM HG; "MHXUE LOY LOHCYX TY OYK UWWHAGML UGX SYMMYKL ZKHTIYGFU (MOYE OUBY YGHKTHAL YLMUMYL MOYKY), UGX LOY, IHHK MOPGN, OUL GHHGY MH OYSI OYK, UGX MOYE XH WOYUM OYK LH!"VHKPL LTPSYX USTHLM PTIYKWYIMPVSE COPSY SPLMYGPGN MH OPL THMOYK. OYSUANOYX VSUGXSE UM OYK GUPBY XPISHTUWE VAM SPLMYGYX MH COUM LOY OUXMH LUE, UGX LHTYMPTYL JAYLMPHGYX OYK WUKYZASSE UVHAM MOY IYGFU UGXGPFOYNHKHX YLMUMYL.QASPY OUX SHGN VYYG YDIYWMPGN U IKHIHLUS ZKHT OYK TYSUGWOHSE UXHKYK UGXCUL KYUXE MH UWWYIM PM; VAM LHTY LYWKYM ZYYSPGN HZ KYIASLPHG ZHK OYK,ZHK OYK IULLPHGUMY XYLPKY MH NYM TUKKPYX, ZHK OYK UKMPZPWPUSPME, UGXU ZYYSPGN HZ OHKKHK UM KYGHAGWPGN MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ KYUS SHBY LMPSSKYLMKUPGYX VHKPL. OPL SYUBY CUL YDIPKPGN. OY LIYGM YBYKE XUE UGX COHSYXUEL UM MOY RUKUNPGL', UGX YBYKE XUE HG MOPGRPGN MOY TUMMYK HBYK MHSXOPTLYSZ MOUM OY CHASX IKHIHLY MHTHKKHC. VAM PG QASPY'L IKYLYGWY, SHHRPGNUM OYK KYX ZUWY UGX WOPG (GYUKSE USCUEL IHCXYKYX), OYK THPLM YEYL, UGXOYK YDIKYLLPHG HZ WHGMPGAUS KYUXPGYLL MH IULL UM HGWY ZKHT TYSUGWOHSEMH UG AGGUMAKUS KUIMAKY HZ TUKKPYX VSPLL, VHKPL WHASX GHM AMMYK MOYXYWPLPBY CHKXL, MOHANO PG PTUNPGUMPHG OY OUX SHGN KYNUKXYX OPTLYSZ ULMOY IHLLYLLHK HZ MOHLY IYGFU UGX GPFOYNHKHX YLMUMYL UGX OUX UIIHKMPHGYXMOY ALY HZ MOY PGWHTY ZKHT MOYT. QASPY LUC VHKPL' PGXYWPLPHG, UGXLHTYMPTYL MOY MOHANOM HWWAKKYX MH OYK MOUM LOY CUL KYIASLPBY MH OPT, VAMOYK ZYTPGPGY LYSZ-XYWYIMPHG PTTYXPUMYSE LAIISPYX OYK CPMO WHGLHSUMPHG,UGX LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ MOUM OY CUL HGSE LOE ZKHT SHBY. OYK TYSUGWOHSE,OHCYBYK, VYNUG MH MAKG MH PKKPMUVPSPME, UGX GHM SHGN VYZHKY VHKPL'XYIUKMAKY LOY ZHKTYX U XYZPGPMY ISUG HZ UWMPHG. QALM UL VHKPL' SYUBY HZUVLYGWY CUL YDIPKPGN, UGUMHSY RAKUNPG TUXY OPL UIIYUKUGWY PG THLWHC, UGXHZ WHAKLY PG MOY RUKUNPGL' XKUCPGN KHHT, UGX QASPY, LAXXYGSE UVUGXHGPGNOYK TYSUGWOHSE, VYWUTY WOYYKZAS UGX BYKE UMMYGMPBY MH RAKUNPG."TE XYUK," LUPX UGGU TPROUESHBGU MH OYK LHG, "P RGHC ZKHT U KYSPUVSYLHAKWY MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP OUL LYGM OPL LHG MH THLWHC MH NYM OPT TUKKPYXMH QASPY. P UT LH ZHGX HZ QASPY MOUM P LOHASX VY LHKKE ZHK OYK. COUM XHEHA MOPGR HZ PM, TE XYUK?"MOY PXYU HZ VYPGN TUXY U ZHHS HZ UGX HZ OUBPGN MOKHCG UCUE MOUM COHSYTHGMO HZ UKXAHAL TYSUGWOHSE LYKBPWY MH QASPY, UGX HZ LYYPGN USS MOYKYBYGAY ZKHT MOY IYGFU YLMUMYL COPWO OY OUX USKYUXE TYGMUSSE UIIHKMPHGYXUGX IAM MH IKHIYK ALY ZUSS PGMH MOY OUGXL HZ UGHMOYK, UGX YLIYWPUSSEPGMH MOY OUGXL HZ MOUM PXPHM UGUMHSY, IUPGYX VHKPL. OY XKHBY MH MOYRUKUNPGL' CPMO MOY ZPKT PGMYGMPHG HZ IKHIHLPGN. QASPY TYM OPT PG U NUE,WUKYSYLL TUGGYK, LIHRY WULAUSSE HZ OHC LOY OUX YGQHEYX EYLMYKXUE'L VUSS,UGX ULRYX COYG OY CUL SYUBPGN. MOHANO VHKPL OUX WHTY PGMYGMPHGUSSE MHLIYUR HZ OPL SHBY UGX MOYKYZHKY TYUGM MH VY MYGXYK, OY VYNUG LIYURPGNPKKPMUVSE HZ ZYTPGPGY PGWHGLMUGWE, HZ OHC YULPSE CHTYG WUG MAKG ZKHTLUXGYLL MH QHE, UGX OHC MOYPK THHXL XYIYGX LHSYSE HG COH OUIIYGL MH VYIUEPGN WHAKM MH MOYT. QASPY CUL HZZYGXYX UGX KYISPYX MOUM PM CUL MKAYMOUM U CHTUG GYYXL BUKPYME, UGX MOY LUTY MOPGN HBYK UGX HBYK UNUPG CHASXCYUKE UGEHGY."MOYG P LOHASX UXBPLY EHA..." VHKPL VYNUG, CPLOPGN MH LMPGN OYK; VAM UMMOUM PGLMUGM MOY NUSSPGN MOHANOM HWWAKKYX MH OPT MOUM OY TPNOM OUBY MHSYUBY THLWHC CPMOHAM OUBPGN UWWHTISPLOYX OPL UPT, UGX OUBY BUPGSE CULMYXOPL YZZHKML--COPWO CUL U MOPGN OY GYBYK USSHCYX MH OUIIYG.OY WOYWRYX OPTLYSZ PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY LYGMYGWY, SHCYKYX OPL YEYL MHUBHPX LYYPGN OYK AGISYULUGMSE PKKPMUMYX UGX PKKYLHSAMY ZUWY, UGX LUPX:"P XPX GHM WHTY OYKY UM USS MH JAUKKYS CPMO EHA. HG MOY WHGMKUKE..."OY NSUGWYX UM OYK MH TURY LAKY MOUM OY TPNOM NH HG. OYK PKKPMUVPSPME OUXLAXXYGSE JAPMY BUGPLOYX, UGX OYK UGDPHAL, PTISHKPGN YEYL CYKY ZPDYX HGOPT CPMO NKYYXE YDIYWMUMPHG. "P WUG USCUEL UKKUGNY LH UL GHM MH LYY OYKHZMYG," MOHANOM VHKPL. "MOY UZZUPK OUL VYYG VYNAG UGX TALM VY ZPGPLOYX!"OY VSALOYX OHMSE, KUPLYX OPL YEYL MH OYKL, UGX LUPX:"EHA RGHC TE ZYYSPGNL ZHK EHA!"MOYKY CUL GH GYYX MH LUE THKY: QASPY'L ZUWY LOHGY CPMO MKPATIO UGXLYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG; VAM LOY ZHKWYX VHKPL MH LUE USS MOUM PL LUPX HG LAWOHWWULPHGL--MOUM OY SHBYX OYK UGX OUX GYBYK SHBYX UGE HMOYK CHTUG THKYMOUG OYK. LOY RGYC MOUM ZHK MOY IYGFU YLMUMYL UGX GPFOYNHKHX ZHKYLML LOYWHASX XYTUGX MOPL, UGX LOY KYWYPBYX COUM LOY XYTUGXYX.MOY UZZPUGWYX WHAISY, GH SHGNYK USSAXPGN MH MKYYL MOUM LOYX NSHHT UGXTYSUGWOHSE AIHG MOYT, ISUGGYX MOY UKKUGNYTYGML HZ U LISYGXPX OHALY PGIYMYKLVAKN, IUPX WUSSL, UGX IKYIUKYX YBYKEMOPGN ZHK U VKPSSPUGM CYXXPGN.WOUIMYK BPUM MOY YGX HZ QUGAUKE HSX WHAGM KHLMHB CYGM MH THLWHC CPMO GUMULOU UGXLHGEU. MOY WHAGMYLL CUL LMPSS AGCYSS UGX AGUVSY MH MKUBYS VAM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH CUPM ZHK OYK KYWHBYKE. IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL YDIYWMYX PGTHLWHC UGE XUE, MOY MKHALLYUA OUX MH VY HKXYKYX UGX MOY YLMUMY GYUKTHLWHC OUX MH VY LHSX, VYLPXYL COPWO MOY HIIHKMAGPME HZ IKYLYGMPGN OPLZAMAKY XUANOMYK-PG-SUC MH HSX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP COPSY OY CUL PG THLWHCWHASX GHM VY TPLLYX. MOY KHLMHBL' THLWHC OHALY OUX GHM VYYG OYUMYX MOUMCPGMYK UGX, UL MOYE OUX WHTY HGSE ZHK U LOHKM MPTY UGX MOY WHAGMYLLCUL GHM CPMO MOYT, MOY WHAGM XYWPXYX MH LMUE CPMO TUKEU XTPMKPYBGUUROKHLPTHBU, COH OUX SHGN VYYG IKYLLPGN OYK OHLIPMUSPME HG MOYT.SUMY HGY YBYGPGN MOY KHLMHBL' ZHAK LSYPNOL XKHBY PGMH TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU'LWHAKMEUKX PG MOY HSX RHGEALOYGE LMKYYM. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU SPBYX USHGY.LOY OUX USKYUXE TUKKPYX HZZ OYK XUANOMYK, UGX OYK LHGL CYKY USS PG MOYLYKBPWY.LOY OYSX OYKLYSZ UL YKYWM, MHSX YBYKEHGY OYK HIPGPHG UL WUGXPXSE,SHAXSE, UGX VSAGMSE UL YBYK, UGX OYK COHSY VYUKPGN LYYTYX U KYIKHUWOMH HMOYKL ZHK UGE CYURGYLL, IULLPHG, HK MYTIMUMPHG--MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZCOPWO LOY XPX GHM UXTPM. ZKHT YUKSE PG MOY THKGPGN, CYUKPGN U XKYLLPGNQUWRYM, LOY UMMYGXYX MH OYK OHALYOHSX UZZUPKL, UGX MOYG LOY XKHBY HAM:HG OHSE XUEL MH WOAKWO UGX UZMYK MOY LYKBPWY MH QUPSL UGX IKPLHGL HGUZZUPKL HZ COPWO LOY GYBYK LIHRY MH UGEHGY. HG HKXPGUKE XUEL, UZMYKXKYLLPGN, LOY KYWYPBYX IYMPMPHGYKL HZ BUKPHAL WSULLYL, HZ COHT MOYKYCYKY USCUEL LHTY. MOYG LOY OUX XPGGYK, U LAVLMUGMPUS UGX UIIYMPFPGN TYUSUM COPWO MOYKY CYKY USCUEL MOKYY HK ZHAK NAYLML; UZMYK XPGGYK LOY ISUEYXU NUTY HZ VHLMHG, UGX UM GPNOM LOY OUX MOY GYCLIUIYKL HK U GYC VHHR KYUXMH OYK COPSY LOY RGPMMYX. LOY KUKYSE TUXY UG YDWYIMPHG UGX CYGM HAM MHIUE BPLPML, UGX MOYG HGSE MH MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGL PG MOY MHCG.LOY OUX GHM EYM NHGY MH VYX COYG MOY KHLMHBL UKKPBYX UGX MOY IASSYE HZMOY OUSS XHHK LJAYURYX ZKHT MOY WHSX UL PM SYM PG MOY KHLMHBL UGX MOYPKLYKBUGML. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, CPMO OYK LIYWMUWSYL OUGNPGN XHCG HG OYK GHLYUGX OYK OYUX ZSAGN VUWR, LMHHX PG MOY OUSS XHHKCUE SHHRPGN CPMO U LMYKG,NKPT ZUWY UM MOY GYC UKKPBUSL. HGY TPNOM OUBY MOHANOM LOY CUL UGNKE CPMOMOY MKUBYSYKL UGX CHASX PTTYXPUMYSE MAKG MOYT HAM, OUX LOY GHM UM MOYLUTY MPTY VYYG NPBPGN WUKYZAS PGLMKAWMPHGL MH MOY LYKBUGML ZHK MOYUWWHTTHXUMPHG HZ MOY BPLPMHKL UGX MOYPK VYSHGNPGNL."MOY WHAGM'L MOPGNL? VKPGN MOYT OYKY," LOY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MH MOYIHKMTUGMYUAL UGX GHM NKYYMPGN UGEHGY. "MOY EHAGN SUXPYL'? MOYKY MH MOYSYZM. GHC COUM UKY EHA XUCXSPGN ZHK?" LOY WKPYX MH MOY TUPXL. "NYM MOYLUTHBUK KYUXE!... EHA'BY NKHCG ISATIYK UGX IKYMMPYK," LOY KYTUKRYX,XKUCPGN GUMULOU (COHLY WOYYRL CYKY NSHCPGN ZKHT MOY WHSX) MH OYK VE MOYOHHX. "ZHH! EHA UKY WHSX! GHC MURY HZZ EHAK MOPGNL, JAPWR!" LOY LOHAMYXMH MOY WHAGM COH CUL NHPGN MH RPLL OYK OUGX. "EHA'KY OUSZ ZKHFYG,P'T LAKY! VKPGN LHTY KAT ZHK MYU!... VHGQHAK, LHGEU XYUK!" LOY UXXYX,MAKGPGN MH LHGEU UGX PGXPWUMPGN VE MOPL ZKYGWO NKYYMPGN OYK LSPNOMSEWHGMYTIMAHAL MOHANO UZZYWMPHGUMY UMMPMAXY MHCUKX OYK.COYG MOYE WUTY PG MH MYU, OUBPGN MURYG HZZ MOYPK HAMXHHK MOPGNL UGXMPXPYX MOYTLYSBYL AI UZMYK MOYPK QHAKGYE, TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU RPLLYX MOYTUSS PG XAY HKXYK."P'T OYUKMPSE NSUX EHA OUBY WHTY UGX UKY LMUEPGN CPMO TY. PM CUL OPNOMPTY," LOY LUPX, NPBPGN GUMULOU U LPNGPZPWUGM SHHR. "MOY HSX TUG PL OYKYUGX OPL LHG'L YDIYWMYX UGE XUE. EHA'SS OUBY MH TURY OPL UWJAUPGMUGWY.VAM CY'SS LIYUR HZ MOUM SUMYK HG," LOY UXXYX, NSUGWPGN UM LHGEU CPMO USHHR MOUM LOHCYX LOY XPX GHM CUGM MH LIYUR HZ PM PG OYK IKYLYGWY. "GHCSPLMYG," LOY LUPX MH MOY WHAGM. "COUM XH EHA CUGM MHTHKKHC? COHT CPSSEHA LYGX ZHK? LOPGLOPG?" LOY WKHHRYX HGY HZ OYK ZPGNYKL. "MOY LGPBYSPGNUGGU TPROUESHBGU? MOUM'L MCH. LOY'L OYKY CPMO OYK LHG. MOY LHG PLNYMMPGN TUKKPYX! MOYG VYFAROHB, YO? OY PL OYKY MHH, CPMO OPL CPZY. OYKUG UCUE ZKHT OYK UGX LOY WUTY NUSSHIPGN UZMYK OPT. OY XPGYX CPMO TY HGCYXGYLXUE. UL ZHK MOYT"--UGX LOY IHPGMYX MH MOY NPKSL--"MHTHKKHC P'SSMURY MOYT ZPKLM MH MOY PVYKPUG LOKPGY HZ MOY THMOYK HZ NHX, UGX MOYGCY'SS XKPBY MH MOY LAIYK-KHNAY'L. P LAIIHLY EHA'SS OUBY YBYKEMOPGN GYC.XHG'M QAXNY VE TY: LSYYBYL GHCUXUEL UKY MOPL LPFY! MOY HMOYK XUE EHAGNIKPGWYLL PKPGU BULPSYBGU WUTY MH LYY TY; LOY CUL UG UCZAS LPNOM--SHHRYXUL PZ LOY OUX IAM MCH VUKKYSL HG OYK UKTL. EHA RGHC GHM U XUE IULLYLGHC CPMOHAM LHTY GYC ZULOPHG.... UGX COUM OUBY EHA MH XH EHAKLYSZ?" LOYULRYX MOY WHAGM LMYKGSE."HGY MOPGN OUL WHTY HG MHI HZ UGHMOYK: OYK KUNL MH VAE, UGX GHC UIAKWOULYK OUL MAKGYX AI ZHK MOY THLWHC YLMUMY UGX ZHK MOY OHALY. PZ EHACPSS VY LH RPGX, P'SS ZPD U MPTY UGX NH XHCG MH MOY YLMUMY QALM ZHK UXUE, UGX SYUBY TE SULLPYL CPMO EHA.""USS KPNOM. USS KPNOM. MOYE'SS VY LUZY CPMO TY, UL LUZY UL PG WOUGWYKE!P'SS MURY MOYT COYKY MOYE TALM NH, LWHSX MOYT U VPM, UGX IYM MOYT UVPM," LUPX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, MHAWOPGN OYK NHXXUANOMYK UGX ZUBHKPMY,GUMULOU, HG MOY WOYYR CPMO OYK SUKNY OUGX.GYDM THKGPGN TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MHHR MOY EHAGN SUXPYL MH MOY PVYKPUGLOKPGY HZ MOY THMOYK HZ NHX UGX MH TUXUTY LAIIYKM-KHNAYM, COH CUL LHUZKUPX HZ TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MOUM LOY USCUEL SYM OYK OUBY WHLMATYL UM USHLL TYKYSE MH NYM KPX HZ OYK. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU HKXYKYX USTHLM MOYCOHSY MKHALLYUA. COYG MOYE NHM OHTY LOY MAKGYX YBYKEVHXE HAM HZ MOY KHHTYDWYIM GUMULOU, UGX MOYG WUSSYX OYK IYM MH OYK UKTWOUPK."CYSS, GHC CY'SS MUSR. P WHGNKUMASUMY EHA HG EHAK VYMKHMOYX. EHA'BYOHHRYX U ZPGY ZYSSHC! P UT NSUX ZHK EHAK LURY UGX P'BY RGHCG OPT LPGWYOY CUL LH OPNO." LOY OYSX OYK OUGX U WHAISY HZ ZYYM ZKHT MOY NKHAGX.GUMULOU VSALOYX OUIIPSE. "P SPRY OPT UGX USS OPL ZUTPSE. GHC SPLMYG! EHARGHC MOUM HSX IKPGWY GPWOHSUL TAWO XPLSPRYL OPL LHG'L TUKKEPGN. MOY HSXZYSSHC'L WKHMWOYME! HZ WHAKLY IKPGWY UGXKYC PL GHM U WOPSX UGX WUG LOPZMCPMOHAM OPT, VAM PM'L GHM GPWY MH YGMYK U ZUTPSE UNUPGLM U ZUMOYK'LCPSS. HGY CUGML MH XH PM IYUWYZASSE UGX SHBPGNSE. EHA'KY U WSYBYK NPKSUGX EHA'SS RGHC OHC MH TUGUNY. VY RPGX, UGX ALY EHAK CPML. MOYG USS CPSSVY CYSS."GUMULOU KYTUPGYX LPSYGM, ZKHT LOEGYLL TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU LAIIHLYX, VAMKYUSSE VYWUALY LOY XPLSPRYX UGEHGY PGMYKZYKPGN PG COUM MHAWOYX OYK SHBYHZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, COPWO LYYTYX MH OYK LH UIUKM ZKHT USS OATUG UZZUPKLMOUM GH HGY WHASX AGXYKLMUGX PM. LOY SHBYX UGX RGYC IKPGWY UGXKYC, OYSHBYX OYK HGSE, UGX CUL MH WHTY HGY HZ MOYLY XUEL UGX MURY OYK. LOYCUGMYX GHMOPGN THKY."EHA LYY P OUBY RGHCG OPT U SHGN MPTY UGX UT USLH ZHGX HZ TUKE, EHAKZAMAKY LPLMYK-PG-SUC. 'OALVUGXL' LPLMYKL VKPGN AI VSPLMYKL,' VAM MOPLHGY CHASXG'M OAKM U ZSE. LOY OUL ULRYX TY MH VKPGN EHA MCH MHNYMOYK.MHTHKKHC EHA'SS NH CPMO EHAK ZUMOYK MH LYY OYK. VY BYKE GPWY UGXUZZYWMPHGUMY MH OYK: EHA'KY EHAGNYK MOUG LOY. COYG OY WHTYL, OY'SS ZPGXEHA USKYUXE RGHC OPL LPLMYK UGX ZUMOYK UGX UKY SPRYX VE MOYT. UT P KPNOMHK GHM? CHG'M MOUM VY VYLM?""EYL, PM CPSS," GUMULOU UGLCYKYX KYSAWMUGMSE.WOUIMYK BPPGYDM XUE, VE TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU'L UXBPWY, WHAGM KHLMHB MHHR GUMULOU MHWUSS HG IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP. MOY WHAGM XPX GHM LYM HAM WOYYKZASSEHG MOPL BPLPM, UM OYUKM OY ZYSM UZKUPX. OY CYSS KYTYTVYKYX MOY SULMPGMYKBPYC OY OUX OUX CPMO MOY HSX IKPGWY UM MOY MPTY HZ MOY YGKHSSTYGM,COYG PG KYISE MH UG PGBPMUMPHG MH XPGGYK OY OUX OUX MH SPLMYG MH UGUGNKE KYIKPTUGX ZHK GHM OUBPGN IKHBPXYX OPL ZASS JAHMU HZ TYG. GUMULOU,HG MOY HMOYK OUGX, OUBPGN IAM HG OYK VYLM NHCG, CUL PG MOY OPNOYLMLIPKPML. "MOYE WUG'M OYSI SPRPGN TY," LOY MOHANOM. "YBYKEVHXE USCUEL OULSPRYX TY, UGX P UT LH CPSSPGN MH XH UGEMOPGN MOYE CPLO, LH KYUXE MHVY ZHGX HZ OPT--ZHK VYPGN OPL ZUMOYK--UGX HZ OYK--ZHK VYPGN OPLLPLMYK--MOUM MOYKY PL GH KYULHG ZHK MOYT GHM MH SPRY TY..."MOYE XKHBY AI MH MOY NSHHTE HSX OHALY HG MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU UGX YGMYKYXMOY BYLMPVASY."CYSS, MOY SHKX OUBY TYKWE HG AL!" LUPX MOY WHAGM, OUSZ PG QYLM, OUSZPG YUKGYLM; VAM GUMULOU GHMPWYX MOUM OYK ZUMOYK CUL ZSAKKPYX HG YGMYKPGNMOY UGMYKHHT UGX PGJAPKYX MPTPXSE UGX LHZMSE COYMOYK MOY IKPGWY UGXIKPGWYLL CYKY UM OHTY.COYG MOYE OUX VYYG UGGHAGWYX U IYKMAKVUMPHG CUL GHMPWYUVSY UTHGN MOYLYKBUGML. MOY ZHHMTUG COH OUX NHGY MH UGGHAGWY MOYT CUL LMHIIYX VEUGHMOYK PG MOY SUKNY OUSS UGX MOYE COPLIYKYX MH HGY UGHMOYK. MOYG UTUPXLYKBUGM KUG PGMH MOY OUSS UGX OAKKPYXSE LUPX LHTYMOPGN, TYGMPHGPGNMOY IKPGWYLL. UM SULM UG HSX, WKHLL SHHRPGN ZHHMTUG WUTY UGX UGGHAGWYXMH MOY KHLMHBL MOUM MOY IKPGWY CUL GHM KYWYPBPGN, VAM MOUM MOY IKPGWYLLVYNNYX MOYT MH CUSR AI. MOY ZPKLM IYKLHG COH WUTY MH TYYM MOY BPLPMHKLCUL TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY. LOY NKYYMYX MOY ZUMOYK UGX XUANOMYK CPMOLIYWPUS IHSPMYGYLL UGX LOHCYX MOYT MH MOY IKPGWYLL' KHHT. MOY IKPGWYLL,SHHRPGN YDWPMYX UGX GYKBHAL, OYK ZUWY ZSALOYX PG IUMWOYL, KUG PG MH TYYMMOY BPLPMHKL, MKYUXPGN OYUBPSE, UGX BUPGSE MKEPGN MH UIIYUK WHKXPUS UGXUM YULY. ZKHT MOY ZPKLM NSUGWY IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM SPRY GUMULOU. LOYMOHANOM OYK MHH ZULOPHGUVSE XKYLLYX, ZKPBHSHALSE NUE UGX BUPG. LOY XPXGHM UM USS KYUSPFY MOUM VYZHKY OUBPGN LYYG OYK ZAMAKY LPLMYK-PG-SUC LOYCUL IKYQAXPWYX UNUPGLM OYK VE PGBHSAGMUKE YGBE HZ OYK VYUAME, EHAMO, UGXOUIIPGYLL, UL CYSS UL VE QYUSHALE HZ OYK VKHMOYK'L SHBY ZHK OYK. UIUKMZKHT MOPL PGLAIYKUVSY UGMPIUMOE MH OYK, IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL UNPMUMYX QALMMOYG VYWUALY HG MOY KHLMHBL' VYPGN UGGHAGWYX, MOY HSX IKPGWY OUX LOHAMYXMOUM OY XPX GHM CPLO MH LYY MOYT, MOUM IKPGWYLL TUKE TPNOM XH LH PZLOY WOHLY, VAM MOYE CYKY GHM MH VY UXTPMMYX MH OPT. LOY OUX XYWPXYX MHKYWYPBY MOYT, VAM ZYUKYX SYLM MOY IKPGWY TPNOM UM UGE THTYGM PGXASNY PGLHTY ZKYUR, UL OY LYYTYX TAWO AILYM VE MOY KHLMHBL' BPLPM."MOYKY, TE XYUK IKPGWYLL, P'BY VKHANOM EHA TE LHGNLMKYLL," LUPX MOYWHAGM, VHCPGN UGX SHHRPGN KHAGX AGYULPSE UL PZ UZKUPX MOY HSX IKPGWYTPNOM UIIYUK. "P UT LH NSUX EHA LOHASX NYM MH RGHC HGY UGHMOYK... BYKELHKKE MOY IKPGWY PL LMPSS UPSPGN," UGX UZMYK U ZYC THKY WHTTHGISUWYKYTUKRL OY KHLY. "PZ EHA'SS USSHC TY MH SYUBY TE GUMULOU PG EHAKOUGXL ZHK U JAUKMYK HZ UG OHAK, IKPGWYLL, P'SS XKPBY KHAGX MH LYY UGGULYTYGHBGU, PM'L JAPMY GYUK PG MOY XHNL' LJAUKY, UGX MOYG P'SS WHTY VUWRZHK OYK."MOY WHAGM OUX XYBPLYX MOPL XPISHTUMPW KALY (UL OY UZMYKCUKXL MHSX OPLXUANOMYK) MH NPBY MOY ZAMAKY LPLMYKL-PG-SUC UG HIIHKMAGPME MH MUSRMH HGY UGHMOYK ZKYYSE, VAM UGHMOYK THMPBY CUL MH UBHPX MOY XUGNYK HZYGWHAGMYKPGN MOY HSX IKPGWY, HZ COHT OY CUL UZKUPX. OY XPX GHM TYGMPHGMOPL MH OPL XUANOMYK, VAM GUMULOU GHMPWYX OYK ZUMOYK'L GYKBHALGYLLUGX UGDPYME UGX ZYSM THKMPZPYX VE PM. LOY VSALOYX ZHK OPT, NKYC LMPSSUGNKPYK UM OUBPGN VSALOYX, UGX SHHRYX UM MOY IKPGWYLL CPMO U VHSX UGXXYZPUGM YDIKYLLPHG COPWO LUPX MOUM LOY CUL GHM UZKUPX HZ UGEVHXE. MOYIKPGWYLL MHSX MOY WHAGM MOUM LOY CHASX VY XYSPNOMYX, UGX HGSE VYNNYX OPTMH LMUE SHGNYK UM UGGU LYTYGHBGU'L, UGX OY XYIUKMYX.XYLIPMY MOY AGYULE NSUGWYL MOKHCG UM OYK VE IKPGWYLL TUKE--COH CPLOYX MHOUBY U MYMY-U-MYMY CPMO GUMULOU--TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY KYTUPGYX PGMOY KHHT UGX IYKLPLMYGMSE MUSRYX UVHAM THLWHC UTALYTYGML UGX MOYUMYKL.GUMULOU ZYSM HZZYGXYX VE MOY OYLPMUMPHG LOY OUX GHMPWYX PG MOY UGMYKHHT,VE OYK ZUMOYK'L GYKBHALGYLL, UGX VE MOY AGGUMAKUS TUGGYK HZ MOY IKPGWYLLCOH--LOY MOHANOM--CUL TURPGN U ZUBHK HZ KYWYPBPGN OYK, UGX LH YBYKEMOPGNXPLISYULYX OYK. LOY XPX GHM SPRY IKPGWYLL TUKE, COHT LOY MOHANOM BYKEISUPG, UZZYWMYX, UGX XKE. GUMULOU LAXXYGSE LOKUGR PGMH OYKLYSZ UGXPGBHSAGMUKPSE ULLATYX UG HZZOUGX UPK COPWO USPYGUMYX IKPGWYLL TUKE LMPSSTHKY. UZMYK ZPBY TPGAMYL HZ PKRLHTY, WHGLMKUPGYX WHGBYKLUMPHG, MOYEOYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ LSPIIYKYX ZYYM KUIPXSE UIIKHUWOPGN. IKPGWYLL TUKESHHRYX ZKPNOMYGYX.MOY XHHK HIYGYX UGX MOY HSX IKPGWY, PG U XKYLLPGN NHCG UGX U COPMYGPNOMWUI, WUTY PG."UO, TUXUT!" OY VYNUG. "TUXUT, WHAGMYLL... WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU, PZ P UTGHM TPLMURYG... P VYN EHA MH YDWALY TY, MH YDWALY TY... P XPX GHM RGHC,TUXUT. NHX PL TE CPMGYLL, P XPX GHM RGHC EHA OUX OHGHKYX AL CPMO UBPLPM, UGX P WUTY PG LAWO U WHLMATY HGSE MH LYY TE XUANOMYK. P VYNEHA MH YDWALY TY... NHX PL TE CPMGYLL, P XPXG'M RGHC-" OY KYIYUMYX,LMKYLLPGN MOY CHKX "NHX" LH AGGUMAKUSSE UGX LH AGISYULUGMSE MOUMIKPGWYLL TUKE LMHHX CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL GHM XUKPGN MH SHHR YPMOYK UM OYKZUMOYK HK UM GUMULOU.GHK XPX MOY SUMMYK, OUBPGN KPLYG UGX WAKMLPYX, RGHC COUM MH XH.TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY USHGY LTPSYX UNKYYUVSE."P VYN EHA MH YDWALY TY, YDWALY TY! NHX PL TE CPMGYLL, P XPX GHM RGHC,"TAMMYKYX MOY HSX TUG, UGX UZMYK SHHRPGN GUMULOU HBYK ZKHT OYUX MH ZHHMOY CYGM HAM.TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CUL MOY ZPKLM MH KYWHBYK OYKLYSZ UZMYK MOPLUIIUKPMPHG UGX VYNUG LIYURPGN UVHAM MOY IKPGWY'L PGXPLIHLPMPHG. GUMULOUUGX IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRYX UM HGY UGHMOYK PG LPSYGWY, UGX MOY SHGNYK MOYEXPX LH CPMOHAM LUEPGN COUM MOYE CUGMYX MH LUE, MOY NKYUMYK NKYC MOYPKUGMPIUMOE MH HGY UGHMOYK.COYG MOY WHAGM KYMAKGYX, GUMULOU CUL PTIHSPMYSE ISYULYX UGX OULMYGYXMH NYM UCUE: UM MOUM THTYGM LOY OUMYX MOY LMPZZ, YSXYKSE IKPGWYLL, COHWHASX ISUWY OYK PG LAWO UG YTVUKKULLPGN IHLPMPHG UGX OUX LIYGM OUSZ UGOHAK CPMO OYK CPMOHAM HGWY TYGMPHGPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC. "P WHASXG'M VYNPGMUSRPGN UVHAM OPT PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOUM ZKYGWOCHTUG," MOHANOM GUMULOU.MOY LUTY MOHANOM CUL TYUGCOPSY MHKTYGMPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE. LOY RGYC COUMLOY HANOM MH OUBY LUPX MH GUMULOU, VAM LOY OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH LUE PMVYWUALY TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CUL PG MOY CUE, UGX VYWUALY, CPMOHAMRGHCPGN COE, LOY ZYSM PM BYKE XPZZPWASM MH LIYUR HZ MOY TUKKPUNY. COYGMOY WHAGM CUL USKYUXE SYUBPGN MOY KHHT, IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM AI OAKKPYXSEMH GUMULOU, MHHR OYK VE MOY OUGX, UGX LUPX CPMO U XYYI LPNO:"CUPM, P TALM..."GUMULOU NSUGWYX UM OYK PKHGPWUSSE CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE."XYUK GUMUSPY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, "P CUGM EHA MH RGHC MOUM P UT NSUXTE VKHMOYK OUL ZHAGX OUIIPGYLL...."LOY IUALYX, ZYYSPGN MOUM LOY CUL GHM MYSSPGN MOY MKAMO. GUMULOU GHMPWYXMOPL UGX NAYLLYX PML KYULHG."P MOPGR, IKPGWYLL, PM PL GHM WHGBYGPYGM MH LIYUR HZ MOUM GHC," LOY LUPXCPMO YDMYKGUS XPNGPME UGX WHSXGYLL, MOHANO LOY ZYSM MOY MYUKL WOHRPGNOYK."COUM OUBY P LUPX UGX COUM OUBY P XHGY?" MOHANOM LOY, UL LHHG UL LOY CULHAM HZ MOY KHHT.MOYE CUPMYX U SHGN MPTY ZHK GUMULOU MH WHTY MH XPGGYK MOUM XUE. LOY LUMPG OYK KHHT WKEPGN SPRY U WOPSX, VSHCPGN OYK GHLY UGX LHVVPGN. COYG LOY WUTY KYUXE XKYLLYXPGMH MOY VUSSKHHT MH UCUPM OYK ZUMOYK, UGX SHHRPGN PG MOY SUKNY TPKKHKMOYKY LUC MOUM LOY CUL IKYMME, BYKE IKYMME, LOY ZYSM YBYG THKY LUX, VAMPM CUL U LCYYM, MYGXYK LUXGYLL."H NHX, PZ OY CYKY OYKY GHC P CHASX GHM VYOUBY UL P XPX MOYG, VAMXPZZYKYGMSE. P CHASX GHM VY LPSSE UGX UZKUPX HZ MOPGNL, P CHASX LPTISEYTVKUWY OPT, WSPGN MH OPT, UGX TURY OPT SHHR UM TY CPMO MOHLY LYUKWOPGNPGJAPKPGN YEYL CPMO COPWO OY OUL LH HZMYG SHHRYX UM TY, UGX MOYG P CHASXTURY OPT SUANO UL OY ALYX MH SUANO. UGX OPL YEYL--OHC P LYY MOHLY YEYL!"MOHANOM GUMULOU. "UGX COUM XH OPL ZUMOYK UGX LPLMYK TUMMYK MH TY? PSHBY OPT USHGY, OPT, OPT, CPMO MOUM ZUWY UGX MOHLY YEYL, CPMO OPL LTPSY,TUGSE UGX EYM WOPSXSPRY.... GH, P OUX VYMMYK GHM MOPGR HZ OPT; GHM MOPGRHZ OPT VAM ZHKNYM OPT, JAPMY ZHKNYM OPT ZHK MOY IKYLYGM. P WUG'M VYUKMOPL CUPMPGN UGX P LOUSS WKE PG U TPGAMY!" UGX LOY MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT MOYNSULL, TURPGN UG YZZHKM GHM MH WKE. "UGX OHC WUG LHGEU SHBY GPWOHSULLH WUSTSE UGX JAPYMSE UGX CUPM LH SHGN UGX LH IUMPYGMSE?" MOHANOM LOY,SHHRPGN UM LHGEU, COH USLH WUTY PG JAPMY KYUXE, CPMO U ZUG PG OYK OUGX."GH, LOY'L USMHNYMOYK XPZZYKYGM. P WUG'M!"GUMULOU UM MOUM THTYGM ZYSM LH LHZMYGYX UGX MYGXYK MOUM PM CUL GHMYGHANO ZHK OYK MH SHBY UGX RGHC LOY CUL VYSHBYX, LOY CUGMYX GHC, UMHGWY, MH YTVKUWY MOY TUG LOY SHBYX, MH LIYUR UGX OYUK ZKHT OPT CHKXL HZSHBY LAWO UL ZPSSYX OYK OYUKM. COPSY LOY LUM PG MOY WUKKPUNY VYLPXY OYKZUMOYK, IYGLPBYSE CUMWOPGN MOY SPNOML HZ MOY LMKYYM SUTIL ZSPWRYKPGN HGMOY ZKHFYG CPGXHC, LOY ZYSM LMPSS LUXXYK UGX THKY PG SHBY, UGX ZHKNHMCOYKY LOY CUL NHPGN UGX CPMO COHT. OUBPGN ZUSSYG PGMH MOY SPGY HZWUKKPUNYL, MOY KHLMHBL' WUKKPUNY XKHBY AI MH MOY MOYUMYK, PML COYYSLLJAYURPGN HBYK MOY LGHC. GUMULOU UGX LHGEU, OHSXPGN AI MOYPK XKYLLYL,QATIYX HAM JAPWRSE. MOY WHAGM NHM HAM OYSIYX VE MOY ZHHMTYG, UGX,IULLPGN UTHGN TYG UGX CHTYG COH CYKY YGMYKPGN UGX MOY IKHNKUT LYSSYKL,MOYE USS MOKYY CYGM USHGN MOY WHKKPXHK MH MOY ZPKLM KHC HZ VHDYL.MOKHANO MOY WSHLYX XHHKL MOY TALPW CUL USKYUXE UAXPVSY."GUMULOU, EHAK OUPK!..." COPLIYKYX LHGEU.UG UMMYGXUGM XYZYKYGMPUSSE UGX JAPWRSE LSPIIYX VYZHKY MOY SUXPYL UGXHIYGYX MOY XHHK HZ MOYPK VHD. MOY TALPW LHAGXYX SHAXYK UGX MOKHANO MOYXHHK KHCL HZ VKPNOMSE SPM VHDYL PG COPWO SUXPYL LUM CPMO VUKY UKTL UGXLOHASXYKL, UGX GHPLE LMUSSL VKPSSPUGM CPMO AGPZHKTL, NSPMMYKYX VYZHKYMOYPK YEYL. U SUXE YGMYKPGN MOY GYDM VHD LOHM U NSUGWY HZ ZYTPGPGY YGBEUM GUMULOU. MOY WAKMUPG OUX GHM EYM KPLYG UGX MOY HBYKMAKY CUL VYPGNISUEYX. GUMULOU, LTHHMOPGN OYK NHCG, CYGM PG CPMO LHGEU UGX LUM XHCG,LWUGGPGN MOY VKPSSPUGM MPYKL HZ VHDYL HIIHLPMY. U LYGLUMPHG LOY OUX GHMYDIYKPYGWYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY--MOUM HZ OAGXKYXL HZ YEYL SHHRPGN UMOYK VUKY UKTL UGX GYWR--LAXXYGSE UZZYWMYX OYK VHMO UNKYYUVSE UGXXPLUNKYYUVSE UGX WUSSYX AI U COHSY WKHCX HZ TYTHKPYL, XYLPKYL UGXYTHMPHGL ULLHWPUMYX CPMO MOUM ZYYSPGN.MOY MCH KYTUKRUVSE IKYMME NPKSL, GUMULOU UGX LHGEU, CPMO WHAGM KHLMHBCOH OUX GHM VYYG LYYG PG THLWHC ZHK U SHGN MPTY, UMMKUWMYX NYGYKUSUMMYGMPHG. THKYHBYK, YBYKEVHXE RGYC BUNAYSE HZ GUMULOU'L YGNUNYTYGM MHIKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX RGYC MOUM MOY KHLMHBL OUX SPBYX PG MOY WHAGMKE YBYKLPGWY, UGX USS SHHRYX CPMO WAKPHLPME UM U ZPUGWYY COH CUL TURPGN HGY HZMOY VYLM TUMWOYL PG KALLPU.GUMULOU'L SHHRL, UL YBYKEHGY MHSX OYK, OUX PTIKHBYX PG MOY WHAGMKE, UGXMOUM YBYGPGN MOUGRL MH OYK UNPMUMPHG LOY CUL IUKMPWASUKSE IKYMME. LOYLMKAWR MOHLY COH LUC OYK VE OYK ZASSGYLL HZ SPZY UGX VYUAME, WHTVPGYXCPMO OYK PGXPZZYKYGWY MH YBYKEMOPGN UVHAM OYK. OYK VSUWR YEYL SHHRYX UMMOY WKHCX CPMOHAM LYYRPGN UGEHGY, UGX OYK XYSPWUMY UKT, VUKY MHUVHBY MOY YSVHC, SUE HG MOY BYSBYM YXNY HZ MOY VHD, COPSY, YBPXYGMSEAGWHGLWPHALSE, LOY HIYGYX UGX WSHLYX OYK OUGX PG MPTY MH MOY TALPW,WKATISPGN OYK IKHNKUT. "SHHR, MOYKY'L USYGPGU," LUPX LHGEU, "CPMO OYKTHMOYK, PLG'M PM?""XYUK TY, TPWOUYS RPKPSHBPWO OUL NKHCG LMPSS LMHAMYK!" KYTUKRYX MOYWHAGM."SHHR UM HAK UGGU TPROUESHBGU--COUM U OYUXXKYLL LOY OUL HG!""MOY RUKUNPGL, QASPY--UGX VHKPL CPMO MOYT. HGY WUG LYY UM HGWY MOUMMOYE'KY YGNUNYX....""XKAVYMLRHE OUL IKHIHLYX?""HO EYL, P OYUKX PM MHXUE," LUPX LOPGLOPG, WHTPGN PGMH MOY KHLMHBL' VHD.GUMULOU SHHRYX PG MOY XPKYWMPHG PG COPWO OYK ZUMOYK'L YEYL CYKY MAKGYXUGX LUC QASPY LPMMPGN VYLPXY OYK THMOYK CPMO U OUIIE SHHR HG OYK ZUWYUGX U LMKPGN HZ IYUKSL KHAGX OYK MOPWR KYX GYWR--COPWO GUMULOU RGYC CULWHBYKYX CPMO IHCXYK. VYOPGX MOYT, CYUKPGN U LTPSY UGX SYUGPGN HBYK CPMOUG YUK MH QASPY'L THAMO, CUL VHKPL' OUGXLHTY LTHHMOSE VKALOYX OYUX. OYSHHRYX UM MOY KHLMHBL ZKHT AGXYK OPL VKHCL UGX LUPX LHTYMOPGN, LTPSPGN,MH OPL VYMKHMOYX."MOYE UKY MUSRPGN UVHAM AL, UVHAM TY UGX OPT!" MOHANOM GUMULOU. "UGX OYGH XHAVM PL WUSTPGN OYK QYUSHALE HZ TY. MOYE GYYXG'M MKHAVSY MOYTLYSBYL!PZ HGSE MOYE RGYC OHC SPMMSY P UT WHGWYKGYX UVHAM UGE HZ MOYT."VYOPGX MOYT LUM UGGU TPROUESHBGU CYUKPGN U NKYYG OYUXXKYLL UGX CPMO UOUIIE SHHR HZ KYLPNGUMPHG MH MOY CPSS HZ NHX HG OYK ZUWY. MOYPK VHD CULIYKBUXYX VE MOUM UMTHLIOYKY HZ UG UZZPUGWYX WHAISY COPWO GUMULOU RGYC LHCYSS UGX SPRYX LH TAWO. LOY MAKGYX UCUE UGX LAXXYGSE KYTYTVYKYX USS MOUMOUX VYYG LH OATPSPUMPGN PG OYK THKGPGN'L BPLPM."COUM KPNOM OUL OY GHM MH CPLO MH KYWYPBY TY PGMH OPL ZUTPSE? HO, VYMMYKGHM MOPGR HZ PM--GHM MPSS OY WHTYL VUWR!" LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ, UGX VYNUGSHHRPGN UM MOY ZUWYL, LHTY LMKUGNY UGX LHTY ZUTPSPUK, PG MOY LMUSSL. PGMOY ZKHGM, PG MOY BYKE WYGMYK, SYUGPGN VUWR UNUPGLM MOY HKWOYLMKU KUPS,LMHHX XHSHROHB PG U IYKLPUG XKYLL, OPL WAKSE OUPK VKALOYX AI PGMH U OANYLOHWR. OY LMHHX PG ZASS BPYC HZ MOY UAXPYGWY, CYSS UCUKY MOUM OY CULUMMKUWMPGN YBYKEHGY'L UMMYGMPHG, EYM UL TAWO UM YULY UL MOHANO OY CYKYPG OPL HCG KHHT. UKHAGX OPT MOKHGNYX THLWHC'L THLM VKPSSPUGM EHAGN TYG,COHT OY YBPXYGMSE XHTPGUMYX.MOY WHAGM, SUANOPGN, GAXNYX MOY VSALOPGN LHGEU UGX IHPGMYX MH OYK ZHKTYKUXHKYK."XH EHA KYWHNGPFY OPT?" LUPX OY. "UGX COYKY OUL OY LIKAGN ZKHT?" OYULRYX, MAKGPGN MH LOPGLOPG. "XPXG'M OY BUGPLO LHTYCOYKY?""OY XPX," KYISPYX LOPGLOPG. "OY CUL PG MOY WUAWULAL UGX KUG UCUE ZKHTMOYKY. MOYE LUE OY OUL VYYG UWMPGN UL TPGPLMYK MH LHTY KASPGN IKPGWY PGIYKLPU, COYKY OY RPSSYX MOY LOUO'L VKHMOYK. GHC USS MOY THLWHC SUXPYLUKY TUX UVHAM OPT! PM'L 'XHSHROHB MOY IYKLPUG' MOUM XHYL PM! CY GYBYKOYUK U CHKX VAM XHSHROHB PL TYGMPHGYX. MOYE LCYUK VE OPT, MOYE HZZYKOPT MH EHA UL MOYE CHASX U XPLO HZ WOHPWY LMYKSYM. XHSHROHB UGX UGUMHSYRAKUNPG OUBY MAKGYX USS HAK SUXPYL' OYUXL."U MUSS, VYUAMPZAS CHTUG CPMO U TULL HZ ISUPMYX OUPK UGX TAWO YDIHLYXISATI COPMY LOHASXYKL UGX GYWR, KHAGX COPWO LOY CHKY U XHAVSY LMKPGN HZSUKNY IYUKSL, YGMYKYX MOY UXQHPGPGN VHD KALMSPGN OYK OYUBE LPSR XKYLLUGX MHHR U SHGN MPTY LYMMSPGN PGMH OYK ISUWY.GUMULOU PGBHSAGMUKPSE NUFYX UM MOUM GYWR, MOHLY LOHASXYKL, UGX IYUKSLUGX WHPZZAKY, UGX UXTPKYX MOY VYUAME HZ MOY LOHASXYKL UGX MOY IYUKSL.COPSY GUMULOU CUL ZPDPGN OYK NUFY HG OYK ZHK MOY LYWHGX MPTY MOY SUXESHHRYX KHAGX UGX, TYYMPGN MOY WHAGM'L YEYL, GHXXYX MH OPT UGX LTPSYX.LOY CUL MOY WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU, IPYKKY'L CPZY, UGX MOY WHAGM, COH RGYCYBYKEHGY PG LHWPYME, SYUGYX HBYK UGX LIHRY MH OYK."OUBY EHA VYYG OYKY SHGN, WHAGMYLL?" OY PGJAPKYX. "P'SS WUSS, P'SS WUSSMH RPLL EHAK OUGX. P'T OYKY HG VALPGYLL UGX OUBY VKHANOM TE NPKSL CPMOTY. MOYE LUE LYTYGHBU UWML TUKBYSHALSE. WHAGM IPYKKY GYBYK ALYX MHZHKNYM AL. PL OY OYKY?""EYL, OY TYUGM MH SHHR PG," UGLCYKYX OYSYGY, UGX NSUGWYX UMMYGMPBYSE UMGUMULOU.WHAGM KHLMHB KYLATYX OPL LYUM."OUGXLHTY, PLG'M LOY?" OY COPLIYKYX MH GUMULOU."CHGXYKZAS!" UGLCYKYX GUMULOU. "LOY'L U CHTUG HGY WHASX YULPSE ZUSS PGSHBY CPMO."QALM MOYG MOY SULM WOHKXL HZ MOY HBYKMAKY CYKY OYUKX UGX MOY WHGXAWMHKMUIIYX CPMO OPL LMPWR. LHTY SUMYWHTYKL MHHR MOYPK LYUML PG MOY LMUSSL,UGX MOY WAKMUPG KHLY.UL LHHG UL PM KHLY YBYKEHGY PG MOY VHDYL UGX LMUSSL VYWUTY LPSYGM, UGXUSS MOY TYG, HSX UGX EHAGN, PG AGPZHKT UGX YBYGPGN XKYLL, UGX USS MOYCHTYG CPMO NYTL HG MOYPK VUKY ZSYLO, MAKGYX MOYPK COHSY UMMYGMPHG CPMOYUNYK WAKPHLPME MH MOY LMUNY. GUMULOU MHH VYNUG MH SHHR UM PM.WOUIMYK PDMOY ZSHHK HZ MOY LMUNY WHGLPLMYX HZ LTHHMO VHUKXL, UM MOY LPXYL CULLHTY IUPGMYX WUKXVHUKX KYIKYLYGMPGN MKYYL, UGX UM MOY VUWR CUL U WSHMOLMKYMWOYX HBYK VHUKXL. PG MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY LMUNY LUM LHTY NPKSL PG KYXVHXPWYL UGX COPMY LRPKML. HGY BYKE ZUM NPKS PG U COPMY LPSR XKYLL LUMUIUKM HG U SHC VYGWO, MH MOY VUWR HZ COPWO U IPYWY HZ NKYYG WUKXVHUKXCUL NSAYX. MOYE USS LUGN LHTYMOPGN. COYG MOYE OUX ZPGPLOYX MOYPK LHGNMOY NPKS PG COPMY CYGM AI MH MOY IKHTIMYK'L VHD UGX U TUG CPMO MPNOMLPSR MKHALYKL HBYK OPL LMHAM SYNL, UGX OHSXPGN U ISATY UGX U XUNNYK,CYGM AI MH OYK UGX VYNUG LPGNPGN, CUBPGN OPL UKTL UVHAM.ZPKLM MOY TUG PG MOY MPNOM MKHALYKL LUGN USHGY, MOYG LOY LUGN, MOYG MOYEVHMO IUALYX COPSY MOY HKWOYLMKU ISUEYX UGX MOY TUG ZPGNYKYX MOY OUGXHZ MOY NPKS PG COPMY, HVBPHALSE UCUPMPGN MOY VYUM MH LMUKM LPGNPGN CPMOOYK. MOYE LUGN MHNYMOYK UGX YBYKEHGY PG MOY MOYUMYK VYNUG WSUIIPGNUGX LOHAMPGN, COPSY MOY TUG UGX CHTUG HG MOY LMUNY--COH KYIKYLYGMYXSHBYKL--VYNUG LTPSPGN, LIKYUXPGN HAM MOYPK UKTL, UGX VHCPGN.UZMYK OYK SPZY PG MOY WHAGMKE, UGX PG OYK IKYLYGM LYKPHAL THHX, USS MOPLLYYTYX NKHMYLJAY UGX UTUFPGN MH GUMULOU. LOY WHASX GHM ZHSSHC MOY HIYKUGHK YBYG SPLMYG MH MOY TALPW; LOY LUC HGSE MOY IUPGMYX WUKXVHUKX UGX MOYJAYYKSE XKYLLYX TYG UGX CHTYG COH THBYX, LIHRY, UGX LUGN LH LMKUGNYSE PGMOUM VKPSSPUGM SPNOM. LOY RGYC COUM PM CUL USS TYUGM MH KYIKYLYGM, VAMPM CUL LH IKYMYGMPHALSE ZUSLY UGX AGGUMAKUS MOUM LOY ZPKLM ZYSM ULOUTYXZHK MOY UWMHKL UGX MOYG UTALYX UM MOYT. LOY SHHRYX UM MOY ZUWYL HZ MOYUAXPYGWY, LYYRPGN PG MOYT MOY LUTY LYGLY HZ KPXPWASY UGX IYKISYDPME LOYOYKLYSZ YDIYKPYGWYX, VAM MOYE USS LYYTYX UMMYGMPBY MH COUM CUL OUIIYGPGNHG MOY LMUNY, UGX YDIKYLLYX XYSPNOM COPWO MH GUMULOU LYYTYX ZYPNGYX. "PLAIIHLY PM OUL MH VY SPRY MOPL!" LOY MOHANOM. LOY RYIM SHHRPGN KHAGX PGMAKG UM MOY KHCL HZ IHTUXYX OYUXL PG MOY LMUSSL UGX MOYG UM MOYLYTPGAXY CHTYG PG MOY VHDYL, YLIYWPUSSE UM OYSYGY PG MOY GYDM VHD,COH--UIIUKYGMSE JAPMY AGWSHMOYX--LUM CPMO U JAPYM MKUGJAPS LTPSY, GHMMURPGN OYK YEYL HZZ MOY LMUNY. UGX ZYYSPGN MOY VKPNOM SPNOM MOUM ZSHHXYXMOY COHSY ISUWY UGX MOY CUKT UPK OYUMYX VE MOY WKHCX, GUMULOU SPMMSYVE SPMMSY VYNUG MH IULL PGMH U LMUMY HZ PGMHDPWUMPHG LOY OUX GHMYDIYKPYGWYX ZHK U SHGN COPSY. LOY XPX GHM KYUSPFY COH UGX COYKY LOYCUL, GHK COUM CUL NHPGN HG VYZHKY OYK. UL LOY SHHRYX UGX MOHANOM, MOYLMKUGNYLM ZUGWPYL AGYDIYWMYXSE UGX XPLWHGGYWMYXSE IULLYX MOKHANO OYKTPGX: MOY PXYU HWWAKKYX MH OYK HZ QATIPGN HGMH MOY YXNY HZ MOY VHD UGXLPGNPGN MOY UPK MOY UWMKYLL CUL LPGNPGN, MOYG LOY CPLOYX MH MHAWO CPMOOYK ZUG UG HSX NYGMSYTUG LPMMPGN GHM ZUK ZKHT OYK, MOYG MH SYUG HBYK MHOYSYGY UGX MPWRSY OYK.UM U THTYGM COYG USS CUL JAPYM VYZHKY MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ U LHGN, U XHHKSYUXPGN MH MOY LMUSSL HG MOY LPXY GYUKYLM MOY KHLMHBL' VHD WKYURYX, UGXMOY LMYIL HZ U VYSUMYX UKKPBUS CYKY OYUKX. "MOYKY'L RAKUNPG!" COPLIYKYXLOPGLOPG. WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU MAKGYX LTPSPGN MH MOY GYCWHTYK, UGXGUMULOU, ZHSSHCPGN MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ MOUM SHHR, LUC UG YDWYIMPHGUSSEOUGXLHTY UXQAMUGM UIIKHUWOPGN MOYPK VHD CPMO U LYSZ-ULLAKYX EYMWHAKMYHAL VYUKPGN. MOPL CUL UGUMHSY RAKUNPG COHT LOY OUX LYYG UGXGHMPWYX SHGN UNH UM MOY VUSS PG IYMYKLVAKN. OY CUL GHC PG UG UXQAMUGM'LAGPZHKT CPMO HGY YIUASYM UGX U LOHASXYK RGHM. OY THBYX CPMO U KYLMKUPGYXLCUNNYK COPWO CHASX OUBY VYYG KPXPWASHAL OUX OY GHM VYYG LH NHHX-SHHRPGNUGX OUX OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY GHM CHKG LAWO UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ NHHX-OATHKYXWHTISUWYGWE UGX NUPYME. MOHANO MOY IYKZHKTUGWY CUL IKHWYYXPGN, OY CUSRYXXYSPVYKUMYSE XHCG MOY WUKIYMYX NUGNCUE, OPL LCHKX UGX LIAKL LSPNOMSEQPGNSPGN UGX OPL OUGXLHTY IYKZATYX OYUX OYSX OPNO. OUBPGN SHHRYX UMGUMULOU OY UIIKHUWOYX OPL LPLMYK, SUPX OPL CYSS NSHBYX OUGX HG MOY YXNYHZ OYK VHD, GHXXYX MH OYK, UGX SYUGPGN ZHKCUKX ULRYX U JAYLMPHG, CPMO UTHMPHG MHCUKX GUMULOU."TUPL WOUKTUGMY!" LUPX OY, YBPXYGMSE KYZYKKPGN MH GUMULOU, COH XPX GHMYDUWMSE OYUK OPL CHKXL VAM AGXYKLMHHX MOYT ZKHT MOY THBYTYGM HZ OPLSPIL. MOYG OY MHHR OPL ISUWY PG MOY ZPKLM KHC HZ MOY LMUSSL UGX LUM XHCGVYLPXY XHSHROHB, GAXNPGN CPMO OPL YSVHC PG U ZKPYGXSE UGX HZZOUGX CUEMOUM XHSHROHB COHT HMOYKL MKYUMYX LH ZUCGPGNSE. OY CPGRYX UM OPT NUPSE,LTPSYX, UGX KYLMYX OPL ZHHM UNUPGLM MOY HKWOYLMKU LWKYYG."OHC SPRY MOY VKHMOYK PL MH MOY LPLMYK," KYTUKRYX MOY WHAGM. "UGX OHCOUGXLHTY MOYE VHMO UKY!"LOPGLOPG, SHCYKPGN OPL BHPWY, VYNUG MH MYSS MOY WHAGM HZ LHTY PGMKPNAYHZ RAKUNPG'L PG THLWHC, UGX GUMULOU MKPYX MH HBYKOYUK PM QALM VYWUALY OYOUX LUPX LOY CUL "WOUKTUGMY."MOY ZPKLM UWM CUL HBYK. PG MOY LMUSSL YBYKEHGY VYNUG THBPGN UVHAM, NHPGNHAM UGX WHTPGN PG.VHKPL WUTY MH MOY KHLMHBL' VHD, KYWYPBYX MOYPK WHGNKUMASUMPHGL BYKELPTISE, UGX KUPLPGN OPL YEYVKHCL CPMO UG UVLYGM-TPGXYX LTPSY WHGBYEYXMH GUMULOU UGX LHGEU OPL ZPUGWYY'L PGBPMUMPHG MH OYK CYXXPGN, UGXCYGM UCUE. GUMULOU CPMO U NUE, WHJAYMMPLO LTPSY MUSRYX MH OPT, UGXWHGNKUMASUMYX HG OPL UIIKHUWOPGN CYXXPGN MOUM LUTY VHKPL CPMO COHT LOYOUX ZHKTYKSE VYYG PG SHBY. PG MOY LMUMY HZ PGMHDPWUMPHG LOY CUL PG,YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX LPTISY UGX GUMAKUS.MOY LWUGMPSE WSUX OYSYGY LTPSYX UM YBYKEHGY PG MOY LUTY CUE, UGX GUMULOUNUBY VHKPL U LPTPSUK LTPSY.OYSYGY'L VHD CUL ZPSSYX UGX LAKKHAGXYX ZKHT MOY LMUSSL VE MOY THLMXPLMPGNAPLOYX UGX PGMYSSYWMAUS TYG, COH LYYTYX MH BPY CPMO HGY UGHMOYKPG MOYPK CPLO MH SYM YBYKEHGY LYY MOUM MOYE RGYC OYK.XAKPGN MOY COHSY HZ MOUM YGMK'UWMY RAKUNPG LMHHX CPMO XHSHROHB PG ZKHGMHZ MOY HKWOYLMKU IUKMPMPHG, SHHRPGN UM MOY KHLMHBL' VHD. GUMULOU RGYC OYCUL MUSRPGN UVHAM OYK UGX MOPL UZZHKXYX OYK ISYULAKY. LOY YBYG MAKGYX LHMOUM OY LOHASX LYY OYK IKHZPSY PG COUM LOY MOHANOM CUL PML THLM VYWHTPGNULIYWM. VYZHKY MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY LYWHGX UWM IPYKKY UIIYUKYX PG MOYLMUSSL. MOY KHLMHBL OUX GHM LYYG OPT LPGWY MOYPK UKKPBUS. OPL ZUWYSHHRYX LUX, UGX OY OUX NKHCG LMPSS LMHAMYK LPGWY GUMULOU SULM LUC OPT.OY IULLYX AI MH MOY ZKHGM KHCL, GHM GHMPWPGN UGEHGY. UGUMHSY CYGM AI MHOPT UGX VYNUG LIYURPGN MH OPT, SHHRPGN UM UGX PGXPWUMPGN MOY KHLMHBL'VHD. HG LYYPGN GUMULOU IPYKKY NKYC UGPTUMYX UGX, OULMPSE IULLPGN VYMCYYGMOY KHCL, WUTY MHCUKX MOYPK VHD. COYG OY NHM MOYKY OY SYUGYX HG OPLYSVHCL UGX, LTPSPGN, MUSRYX MH OYK ZHK U SHGN MPTY. COPSY WHGBYKLPGNCPMO IPYKKY, GUMULOU OYUKX U TUG'L BHPWY PG WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU'L VHD UGXLHTYMOPGN MHSX OYK PM CUL RAKUNPG. LOY MAKGYX UGX MOYPK YEYL TYM.USTHLM LTPSPGN, OY NUFYX LMKUPNOM PGMH OYK YEYL CPMO LAWO UG YGKUIMAKYXWUKYLLPGN SHHR MOUM PM LYYTYX LMKUGNY MH VY LH GYUK OPT, MH SHHR UM OPTSPRY MOUM, MH VY LH LAKY OY UXTPKYX OYK, UGX GHM MH VY UWJAUPGMYX CPMOOPT.PG MOY LYWHGX UWM MOYKY CUL LWYGYKE KYIKYLYGMPGN MHTVLMHGYL, MOYKY CUL UKHAGX OHSY PG MOY WUGBUL MH KYIKYLYGM MOY THHG, LOUXYL CYKY KUPLYX HBYKMOY ZHHMSPNOML, UGX ZKHT OHKGL UGX WHGMKUVULL WUTY XYYI GHMYL COPSY TUGEIYHISY UIIYUKYX ZKHT KPNOM UGX SYZM CYUKPGN VSUWR WSHURL UGX OHSXPGNMOPGNL SPRY XUNNYKL PG MOYPK OUGXL. MOYE VYNUG CUBPGN MOYPK UKTL. MOYGLHTY HMOYK IYHISY KUG PG UGX VYNUG XKUNNPGN UCUE MOY TUPXYG COH OUX VYYGPG COPMY UGX CUL GHC PG SPNOM VSAY. MOYE XPX GHM XKUN OYK UCUE UM HGWY,VAM LUGN CPMO OYK ZHK U SHGN MPTY UGX MOYG UM SULM XKUNNYX OYK HZZ, UGXVYOPGX MOY LWYGYL LHTYMOPGN TYMUSSPW CUL LMKAWR MOKYY MPTYL UGXYBYKEHGY RGYSM XHCG UGX LUGN U IKUEYK. USS MOYLY MOPGNL CYKY KYIYUMYXSEPGMYKKAIMYX VE MOY YGMOALPULMPW LOHAML HZ MOY UAXPYGWY.XAKPGN MOPL UWM YBYKE MPTY GUMULOU SHHRYX MHCUKX MOY LMUSSL LOY LUCUGUMHSY RAKUNPG CPMO UG UKT MOKHCG UWKHLL MOY VUWR HZ OPL WOUPK, LMUKPGNUM OYK. LOY CUL ISYULYX MH LYY MOUM OY CUL WUIMPBUMYX VE OYK UGX PM XPXGHM HWWAK MH OYK MOUM MOYKY CUL UGEMOPGN CKHGN PG PM.COYG MOY LYWHGX UWM CUL HBYK WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU KHLY, MAKGYX MH MOYKHLMHBL' VHD--OYK COHSY VHLHT WHTISYMYSE YDIHLYX--VYWRHGYX MOY HSX WHAGMCPMO U NSHBYX ZPGNYK, UGX IUEPGN GH UMMYGMPHG MH MOHLY COH OUX YGMYKYXOYK VHD VYNUG MUSRPGN MH OPT CPMO UG UTPUVSY LTPSY."XH TURY TY UWJAUPGMYX CPMO EHAK WOUKTPGN XUANOMYKL," LUPX LOY. "MOYCOHSY MHCG PL LPGNPGN MOYPK IKUPLYL UGX P XHG'M YBYG RGHC MOYG!"GUMULOU KHLY UGX WAKMLPYX MH MOY LISYGXPX WHAGMYLL. LOY CUL LH ISYULYXVE IKUPLY ZKHT MOPL VKPSSPUGM VYUAME MOUM LOY VSALOYX CPMO ISYULAKY."P CUGM MH VYWHTY U THLWHBPMY MHH, GHC," LUPX OYSYGY. "OHC PL PM EHA'KYGHM ULOUTYX MH VAKE LAWO IYUKSL PG MOY WHAGMKE?"WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU JAPMY XYLYKBYX OYK KYIAMUMPHG HZ VYPGN U ZULWPGUMPGNCHTUG. LOY WHASX LUE COUM LOY XPX GHM MOPGR--YLIYWPUSSE COUM CULZSUMMYKPGN--JAPMY LPTISE UGX GUMAKUSSE."XYUK WHAGM, EHA TALM SYM TY SHHR UZMYK EHAK XUANOMYKL! MOHANO P UT GHMLMUEPGN OYKY SHGN MOPL MPTY--GHK UKY EHA--P CPSS MKE MH UTALY MOYT. POUBY USKYUXE OYUKX TAWO HZ EHA PG IYMYKLVAKN UGX CUGMYX MH NYM MH RGHCEHA," LUPX LOY MH GUMULOU CPMO OYK LMYKYHMEIYX UGX SHBYSE LTPSY. "P OUXOYUKX UVHAM EHA ZKHT TE IUNY, XKAVYMLRHE. OUBY EHA OYUKX OY PL NYMMPGNTUKKPYX? UGX USLH ZKHT TE OALVUGX'L ZKPYGX VHSRHGLRP, IKPGWY UGXKYCVHSRHGLRP," LOY CYGM HG CPMO LIYWPUS YTIOULPL, PTISEPGN MOUM LOY RGYC HZOPL KYSUMPHG MH GUMULOU. MH NYM VYMMYK UWJAUPGMYX LOY ULRYX MOUM HGYHZ MOY EHAGN SUXPYL LOHASX WHTY PGMH OYK VHD ZHK MOY KYLM HZ MOYIYKZHKTUGWY, UGX GUMULOU THBYX HBYK MH PM.MOY LWYGY HZ MOY MOPKX UWM KYIKYLYGMYX U IUSUWY PG COPWO TUGE WUGXSYLCYKY VAKGPGN UGX IPWMAKYL HZ RGPNOML CPMO LOHKM VYUKXL OAGN HG MOYCUSSL. PG MOY TPXXSY LMHHX COUM CYKY IKHVUVSE U RPGN UGX U JAYYG. MOYRPGN CUBYX OPL KPNOM UKT UGX, YBPXYGMSE GYKBHAL, LUGN LHTYMOPGN VUXSEUGX LUM XHCG HG U WKPTLHG MOKHGY. MOY TUPXYG COH OUX VYYG ZPKLM PG COPMYUGX MOYG PG SPNOM VSAY, GHC CHKY HGSE U LTHWR, UGX LMHHX VYLPXY MOYMOKHGY CPMO OYK OUPK XHCG. LOY LUGN LHTYMOPGN THAKGZASSE, UXXKYLLPGN MOYJAYYG, VAM MOY RPGN CUBYX OPL UKT LYBYKYSE, UGX TYG UGX CHTYG CPMO VUKYSYNL WUTY PG ZKHT VHMO LPXYL UGX VYNUG XUGWPGN USS MHNYMOYK. MOYG MOYBPHSPGL ISUEYX BYKE LOKPSSE UGX TYKKPSE UGX HGY HZ MOY CHTYG CPMO MOPWRVUKY SYNL UGX MOPG UKTL, LYIUKUMPGN ZKHT MOY HMOYKL, CYGM VYOPGX MOYCPGNL, UXQALMYX OYK VHXPWY, KYMAKGYX MH MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY LMUNY, UGXVYNUG QATIPGN UGX LMKPRPGN HGY ZHHM KUIPXSE UNUPGLM MOY HMOYK. PG MOYLMUSSL YBYKEHGY WSUIIYX UGX LOHAMYX "VKUBH!" MOYG HGY HZ MOY TYG CYGMPGMH U WHKGYK HZ MOY LMUNY. MOY WETVUSL UGX OHKGL PG MOY HKWOYLMKULMKAWR AI THKY SHAXSE, UGX MOPL TUG CPMO VUKY SYNL QATIYX BYKE OPNO UGXCUBYX OPL ZYYM UVHAM BYKE KUIPXSE. (OY CUL XAIHKM, COH KYWYPBYX LPDMEMOHALUGX KAVSYL U EYUK ZHK MOPL UKM.) YBYKEVHXE PG MOY LMUSSL, VHDYL,UGX NUSSYKPYL VYNUG WSUIIPGN UGX LOHAMPGN CPMO USS MOYPK TPNOM, UGX MOYTUG LMHIIYX UGX VYNUG LTPSPGN UGX VHCPGN MH USS LPXYL. MOYG HMOYK TYGUGX CHTYG XUGWYX CPMO VUKY SYNL. MOYG MOY RPGN UNUPG LOHAMYX MH MOYLHAGX HZ TALPW, UGX MOYE USS VYNUG LPGNPGN. VAM LAXXYGSE U LMHKTWUTY HG, WOKHTUMPW LWUSYL UGX XPTPGPLOYX LYBYGMOL CYKY OYUKX PG MOYHKWOYLMKU, YBYKEHGY KUG HZZ, UNUPG XKUNNPGN HGY HZ MOYPK GATVYK UCUE,UGX MOY WAKMUPG XKHIIYX. HGWY THKY MOYKY CUL U MYKKPVSY GHPLY UGXWSUMMYK UTHGN MOY UAXPYGWY, UGX CPMO KUIMAKHAL ZUWYL YBYKEHGY VYNUGLOHAMPGN: "XAIHKM! XAIHKM! XAIHKM!" GUMULOU GH SHGNYK MOHANOM MOPLLMKUGNY. LOY SHHRYX UVHAM CPMO ISYULAKY, LTPSPGN QHEZASSE."PLG'M XAIHKM XYSPNOMZAS?" OYSYGY ULRYX OYK."HO, EYL," KYISPYX GUMULOU.WOUIMYK DXAKPGN MOY YGMK'UWMY U COPZZ HZ WHSX UPK WUTY PGMH OYSYGY'L VHD, MOYXHHK HIYGYX, UGX UGUMHSY YGMYKYX, LMHHIPGN UGX MKEPGN GHM MH VKALOUNUPGLM UGEHGY."SYM TY PGMKHXAWY TE VKHMOYK MH EHA," LUPX OYSYGY, OYK YEYL LOPZMPGNAGYULPSE ZKHT GUMULOU MH UGUMHSY.GUMULOU MAKGYX OYK IKYMME SPMMSY OYUX MHCUKX MOY YSYNUGM EHAGN HZZPWYKUGX LTPSYX UM OPT HBYK OYK VUKY LOHASXYK. UGUMHSY, COH CUL UL OUGXLHTYUM WSHLY JAUKMYKL UL UM U XPLMUGWY, LUM XHCG VYLPXY OYK UGX MHSX OYK OYOUX SHGN CPLOYX MH OUBY MOPL OUIIPGYLL--YBYK LPGWY MOY GUKELORPGL' VUSSPG ZUWM, UM COPWO OY OUX OUX MOY CYSS-KYTYTVYKYX ISYULAKY HZ LYYPGN OYK.RAKUNPG CUL TAWO THKY LYGLPVSY UGX LPTISY CPMO CHTYG MOUG UTHGN TYG.OY MUSRYX VHSXSE UGX GUMAKUSSE, UGX GUMULOU CUL LMKUGNYSE UGX UNKYYUVSELMKAWR VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN ZHKTPXUVSY PG MOPL TUG UVHAMCOHT MOYKY CUL LH TAWO MUSR, VAM MOUM HG MOY WHGMKUKE OPL LTPSY CUL THLMGUPBY, WOYYKZAS, UGX NHHX-GUMAKYX.RAKUNPG ULRYX OYK HIPGPHG HZ MOY IYKZHKTUGWY UGX MHSX OYK OHC UM UIKYBPHAL IYKZHKTUGWY LYTYGHBU OUX ZUSSYG XHCG HG MOY LMUNY."UGX XH EHA RGHC, WHAGMYLL," OY LUPX, LAXXYGSE UXXKYLLPGN OYK UL UGHSX, ZUTPSPUK UWJAUPGMUGWY, "CY UKY NYMMPGN AI U WHLMATY MHAKGUTYGM; EHAHANOM MH MURY IUKM PG PM! PM CPSS VY NKYUM ZAG. CY LOUSS USS TYYM UM MOYRUKUNPGL'! ISYULY WHTY! GH! KYUSSE, YO?" LUPX OY.COPSY LUEPGN MOPL OY GYBYK KYTHBYX OPL LTPSPGN YEYL ZKHT OYK ZUWY, OYKGYWR, UGX OYK VUKY UKTL. GUMULOU RGYC ZHK WYKMUPG MOUM OY CUL YGKUIMAKYXVE OYK. MOPL ISYULYX OYK, EYM OPL IKYLYGWY TUXY OYK ZYYS WHGLMKUPGYX UGXHIIKYLLYX. COYG LOY CUL GHM SHHRPGN UM OPT LOY ZYSM MOUM OY CUL SHHRPGNUM OYK LOHASXYKL, UGX LOY PGBHSAGMUKPSE WUANOM OPL YEY LH MOUM OY LOHASXSHHR PGMH OYKL KUMOYK MOUG MOPL. VAM SHHRPGN PGMH OPL YEYL LOY CULZKPNOMYGYX, KYUSPFPGN MOUM MOYKY CUL GHM MOUM VUKKPYK HZ THXYLME LOY OUXUSCUEL ZYSM VYMCYYG OYKLYSZ UGX HMOYK TYG. LOY XPX GHM RGHC OHC PM CULMOUM CPMOPG ZPBY TPGAMYL LOY OUX WHTY MH ZYYS OYKLYSZ MYKKPVSE GYUK MHMOPL TUG. COYG LOY MAKGYX UCUE LOY ZYUKYX OY TPNOM LYPFY OYK ZKHT VYOPGXVE OYK VUKY UKT UGX RPLL OYK HG MOY GYWR. MOYE LIHRY HZ THLM HKXPGUKEMOPGNL, EYM LOY ZYSM MOUM MOYE CYKY WSHLYK MH HGY UGHMOYK MOUG LOY OUXYBYK VYYG MH UGE TUG. GUMULOU RYIM MAKGPGN MH OYSYGY UGX MH OYK ZUMOYK,UL PZ ULRPGN COUM PM USS TYUGM, VAM OYSYGY CUL YGNUNYX PG WHGBYKLUMPHGCPMO U NYGYKUS UGX XPX GHM UGLCYK OYK SHHR, UGX OYK ZUMOYK'L YEYL LUPXGHMOPGN VAM COUM MOYE USCUEL LUPX: "OUBPGN U NHHX MPTY? CYSS, P'T NSUXHZ PM!"XAKPGN HGY HZ MOYLY THTYGML HZ UCRCUKX LPSYGWY COYG UGUMHSY'L IKHTPGYGMYEYL CYKY NUFPGN WUSTSE UGX ZPDYXSE UM OYK, GUMULOU, MH VKYUR MOYLPSYGWY, ULRYX OPT OHC OY SPRYX THLWHC. LOY ULRYX MOY JAYLMPHG UGXVSALOYX. LOY ZYSM USS MOY MPTY MOUM VE MUSRPGN MH OPT LOY CUL XHPGNLHTYMOPGN PTIKHIYK. UGUMHSY LTPSYX UL MOHANO MH YGWHAKUNY OYK."UM ZPKLM P XPX GHM SPRY PM TAWO, VYWUALY COUM TURYL U MHCG ISYULUGMWY LHGM SYL QHSPYL ZYTTYL, * PLG'M MOUM LH? VAM GHC P SPRY PM BYKE TAWOPGXYYX," OY LUPX, SHHRPGN UM OYK LPNGPZPWUGMSE. "EHA'SS WHTY MH MOYWHLMATY MHAKGUTYGM, WHAGMYLL? XH WHTY!" UGX IAMMPGN HAM OPL OUGX MH OYKVHAJAYM UGX XKHIIPGN OPL BHPWY, OY UXXYX, "EHA CPSS VY MOY IKYMMPYLMMOYKY. XH WHTY, XYUK WHAGMYLL, UGX NPBY TY MOPL ZSHCYK UL U ISYXNY!"    * UKY MOY IKYMME CHTYG.GUMULOU XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM OY CUL LUEPGN UGE THKY MOUG OY XPXOPTLYSZ, VAM LOY ZYSM MOUM OPL PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY CHKXL OUX UG PTIKHIYKPGMYGMPHG. LOY XPX GHM RGHC COUM MH LUE UGX MAKGYX UCUE UL PZ LOY OUXGHM OYUKX OPL KYTUKR. VAM UL LHHG UL LOY OUX MAKGYX UCUE LOY ZYSM MOUMOY CUL MOYKY, VYOPGX, LH WSHLY VYOPGX OYK."OHC PL OY GHC? WHGZALYX? UGNKE? HANOM P MH IAM PM KPNOM?" LOY ULRYXOYKLYSZ, UGX LOY WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT MAKGPGN KHAGX. LOY SHHRYXLMKUPNOM PGMH OPL YEYL, UGX OPL GYUKGYLL, LYSZ-ULLAKUGWY, UGX MOYNHHX-GUMAKYX MYGXYKGYLL HZ OPL LTPSY BUGJAPLOYX OYK. LOY LTPSYX QALMUL OY CUL XHPGN, NUFPGN LMKUPNOM PGMH OPL YEYL. UGX UNUPG LOY ZYSM CPMOOHKKHK MOUM GH VUKKPYK SUE VYMCYYG OPT UGX OYK.MOY WAKMUPG KHLY UNUPG. UGUMHSY SYZM MOY VHD, LYKYGY UGX NUE. GUMULOUCYGM VUWR MH OYK ZUMOYK PG MOY HMOYK VHD, GHC JAPMY LAVTPLLPBY MH MOYCHKSX LOY ZHAGX OYKLYSZ PG. USS MOUM CUL NHPGN HG VYZHKY OYK GHC LYYTYXJAPMY GUMAKUS, VAM HG MOY HMOYK OUGX USS OYK IKYBPHAL MOHANOML HZ OYKVYMKHMOYX, HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE, HK HZ SPZY PG MOY WHAGMKE XPX GHM HGWYKYWAK MH OYK TPGX UGX CYKY UL PZ VYSHGNPGN MH U KYTHMY IULM.PG MOY ZHAKMO UWM MOYKY CUL LHTY LHKM HZ XYBPS COH LUGN CUBPGN OPL UKTUVHAM, MPSS MOY VHUKXL CYKY CPMOXKUCG ZKHT AGXYK OPT UGX OY XPLUIIYUKYXXHCG VYSHC. MOUM CUL MOY HGSE IUKM HZ MOY ZHAKMO UWM MOUM GUMULOU LUC.LOY ZYSM UNPMUMYX UGX MHKTYGMYX, UGX MOY WUALY HZ MOPL CUL RAKUNPG COHTLOY WHASX GHM OYSI CUMWOPGN. UL MOYE CYKY SYUBPGN MOY MOYUMYK UGUMHSYWUTY AI MH MOYT, WUSSYX MOYPK WUKKPUNY, UGX OYSIYX MOYT PG. UL OY CULIAMMPGN GUMULOU PG OY IKYLLYX OYK UKT UVHBY MOY YSVHC. UNPMUMYX UGXZSALOYX LOY MAKGYX KHAGX. OY CUL SHHRPGN UM OYK CPMO NSPMMYKPGN YEYL,LTPSPGN MYGXYKSE.HGSE UZMYK LOY OUX KYUWOYX OHTY CUL GUMULOU UVSY WSYUKSE MH MOPGR HBYKCOUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OYK, UGX LAXXYGSE KYTYTVYKPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC LOYCUL OHKKPZPYX, UGX UM MYU MH COPWO USS OUX LUM XHCG UZMYK MOY HIYKU, LOYNUBY U SHAX YDWSUTUMPHG, ZSALOYX, UGX KUG HAM HZ MOY KHHT."H NHX! P UT SHLM!" LOY LUPX MH OYKLYSZ. "OHC WHASX P SYM OPT?" LOY LUMZHK U SHGN MPTY OPXPGN OYK ZSALOYX ZUWY PG OYK OUGXL MKEPGN MH KYUSPFYCOUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OYK, VAM CUL AGUVSY YPMOYK MH AGXYKLMUGX COUMOUX OUIIYGYX HK COUM LOY ZYSM. YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX XUKR, HVLWAKY,UGX MYKKPVSY. MOYKY PG MOUM YGHKTHAL, PSSATPGUMYX MOYUMYK COYKY MOYVUKY-SYNNYX XAIHKM, PG U MPGLYS-XYWHKUMYX QUWRYM, QATIYX UVHAM MH MOYTALPW HG CYM VHUKXL, UGX EHAGN NPKSL UGX HSX TYG, UGX MOY GYUKSE GURYXOYSYGY CPMO OYK IKHAX, WUST LTPSY, KUIMAKHALSE WKPYX "VKUBH!"--MOYKY PGMOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOUM OYSYGY PM OUX USS LYYTYX WSYUK UGX LPTISY; VAM GHC,USHGY VE OYKLYSZ, PM CUL PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY. "COUM PL PM? COUM CUL MOUMMYKKHK P ZYSM HZ OPT? COUM PL MOPL NGUCPGN HZ WHGLWPYGWY P UT ZYYSPGNGHC?" LOY MOHANOM.HGSE MH MOY HSX WHAGMYLL UM GPNOM PG VYX WHASX GUMULOU OUBY MHSX USS LOYCUL ZYYSPGN. LOY RGYC MOUM LHGEU CPMO OYK LYBYKY UGX LPTISY BPYCLCHASX YPMOYK GHM AGXYKLMUGX PM UM USS HK CHASX VY OHKKPZPYX UM LAWO UWHGZYLLPHG. LH GUMULOU MKPYX MH LHSBY COUM CUL MHKMAKPGN OYK VE OYKLYSZ."UT P LIHPSYX ZHK UGXKYC'L SHBY HK GHM?" LOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ, UGX CPMOLHHMOPGN PKHGE KYISPYX: "COUM U ZHHS P UT MH ULR MOUM! COUM XPX OUIIYGMH TY? GHMOPGN! P OUBY XHGY GHMOPGN, P XPXG'M SYUX OPT HG UM USS. GHVHXECPSS RGHC UGX P LOUSS GYBYK LYY OPT UNUPG," LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ. "LH PM PLISUPG MOUM GHMOPGN OUL OUIIYGYX UGX MOYKY PL GHMOPGN MH KYIYGM HZ, UGXUGXKYC WUG SHBY TY LMPSS. VAM COE 'LMPSS?' H NHX, COE PLG'M OY OYKY?"GUMULOU JAPYMYX OYKLYSZ ZHK U THTYGM, VAM UNUPG LHTY PGLMPGWM MHSX OYKMOUM MOHANO USS MOPL CUL MKAY, UGX MOHANO GHMOPGN OUX OUIIYGYX, EYM MOYZHKTYK IAKPME HZ OYK SHBY ZHK IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX IYKPLOYX. UGX UNUPG PGPTUNPGUMPHG LOY CYGM HBYK OYK COHSY WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO RAKUNPG, UGX UNUPGLUC MOY ZUWY, NYLMAKYL, UGX MYGXYK LTPSY HZ MOUM VHSX OUGXLHTY TUG COYGOY IKYLLYX OYK UKT.WOUIMYK DPUGUMHSY RAKUNPG CUL LMUEPGN PG THLWHC VYWUALY OPL ZUMOYK OUX LYGM OPTUCUE ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN, COYKY OY OUX VYYG LIYGXPGN MCYGME MOHALUGX KAVSYLU EYUK PG WULO, VYLPXYL KAGGPGN AI XYVML ZHK UL TAWO THKY, COPWO OPLWKYXPMHKL XYTUGXYX ZKHT OPL ZUMOYK.OPL ZUMOYK UGGHAGWYX MH OPT MOUM OY CHASX GHC IUE OUSZ OPL XYVML ZHK MOYSULM MPTY, VAM HGSE HG WHGXPMPHG MOUM OY CYGM MH THLWHC UL UXQAMUGMMH MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ--U IHLM OPL ZUMOYK OUX IKHWAKYX ZHK OPT--UGXCHASX UM SULM MKE MH TURY U NHHX TUMWO MOYKY. OY PGXPWUMYX MH OPTIKPGWYLL TUKE UGX QASPY RUKUNPGU.UGUMHSY WHGLYGMYX UGX CYGM MH THLWHC, COYKY OY IAM AI UM IPYKKY'L OHALY.IPYKKY KYWYPBYX OPT AGCPSSPGNSE UM ZPKLM, VAM NHM ALYX MH OPT UZMYK UCOPSY, LHTYMPTYL YBYG UWWHTIUGPYX OPT HG OPL WUKHALUSL, UGX NUBY OPTTHGYE AGXYK MOY NAPLY HZ SHUGL.UL LOPGLOPG OUX KYTUKRYX, ZKHT MOY MPTY HZ OPL UKKPBUS UGUMHSY OUXMAKGYX MOY OYUXL HZ MOY THLWHC SUXPYL, YLIYWPUSSE VE MOY ZUWM MOUMOY LSPNOMYX MOYT UGX ISUPGSE IKYZYKKYX MOY NEILE NPKSL UGX ZKYGWOUWMKYLLYL--CPMO MOY WOPYZ HZ COHT, TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY, OY CUL LUPX MHVY HG PGMPTUMY KYSUMPHGL. OY OUX GYBYK TPLLYX U WUKHALUS UM XUGPSHB'LHK HMOYK THLWHC KYBYSYKL', XKUGR COHSY GPNOML MOKHANO, HAMBEPGN YBYKEHGYYSLY, UGX CUL UM USS MOY VUSSL UGX IUKMPYL HZ MOY VYLM LHWPYME. MOYKYCUL MUSR HZ OPL PGMKPNAYL CPMO LHTY HZ MOY SUXPYL, UGX OY ZSPKMYX CPMO UZYC HZ MOYT UM MOY VUSSL. VAM OY XPX GHM KAG UZMYK MOY AGTUKKPYX NPKSL,YLIYWPUSSE MOY KPWO OYPKYLLYL COH CYKY THLM HZ MOYT ISUPG. MOYKY CUL ULIYWPUS KYULHG ZHK MOPL, UL OY OUX NHM TUKKPYX MCH EYUKL VYZHKY--U ZUWMRGHCG HGSE MH OPL THLM PGMPTUMY ZKPYGXL. UM MOUM MPTY COPSY CPMO OPLKYNPTYGM PG IHSUGX, U IHSPLO SUGXHCGYK HZ LTUSS TYUGL OUX ZHKWYX OPT MHTUKKE OPL XUANOMYK. UGUMHSY OUX BYKE LHHG UVUGXHGYX OPL CPZY UGX, ZHK UIUETYGM COPWO OY UNKYYX MH LYGX MH OPL ZUMOYK-PG-SUC, OUX UKKUGNYX MH VYZKYY MH IULL OPTLYSZ HZZ UL U VUWOYSHK.UGUMHSY CUL USCUEL WHGMYGM CPMO OPL IHLPMPHG, CPMO OPTLYSZ, UGX CPMOHMOYKL. OY CUL PGLMPGWMPBYSE UGX MOHKHANOSE WHGBPGWYX MOUM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY ZHK OPT MH SPBY HMOYKCPLY MOUG UL OY XPX UGX MOUM OY OUXGYBYK PG OPL SPZY XHGY UGEMOPGN VULY. OY CUL PGWUIUVSY HZ WHGLPXYKPGNOHC OPL UWMPHGL TPNOM UZZYWM HMOYKL HK COUM MOY WHGLYJAYGWYL HZ MOPL HKMOUM UWMPHG HZ OPL TPNOM VY. OY CUL WHGBPGWYX MOUM, UL U XAWR PL LH TUXYMOUM PM TALM SPBY PG CUMYK, LH NHX OUX TUXY OPT LAWO MOUM OY TALM LIYGXMOPKME MOHALUGX KAVSYL U EYUK UGX USCUEL HWWAIE U IKHTPGYGM IHLPMPHG PGLHWPYME. OY VYSPYBYX MOPL LH ZPKTSE MOUM HMOYKL, SHHRPGN UM OPT, CYKYIYKLAUXYX HZ PM MHH UGX XPX GHM KYZALY OPT YPMOYK U SYUXPGN ISUWYPG LHWPYME HK THGYE, COPWO OY VHKKHCYX ZKHT UGEHGY UGX YBYKEHGY UGXYBPXYGMSE CHASX GHM KYIUE.OY CUL GHM U NUTVSYK, UM UGE KUMY OY XPX GHM WUKY UVHAM CPGGPGN. OY CULGHM BUPG. OY XPX GHM TPGX COUM IYHISY MOHANOM HZ OPT. LMPSS SYLL WHASXOY VY UWWALYX HZ UTVPMPHG. THKY MOUG HGWY OY OUX BYDYX OPL ZUMOYK VELIHPSPGN OPL HCG WUKYYK, UGX OY SUANOYX UM XPLMPGWMPHGL HZ USS RPGXL. OYCUL GHM TYUG, UGX XPX GHM KYZALY UGEHGY COH ULRYX HZ OPT. USS OY WUKYXUVHAM CUL NUPYME UGX CHTYG, UGX UL UWWHKXPGN MH OPL PXYUL MOYKYCUL GHMOPGN XPLOHGHKUVSY PG MOYLY MULMYL, UGX OY CUL PGWUIUVSY HZWHGLPXYKPGN COUM MOY NKUMPZPWUMPHG HZ OPL MULMYL YGMUPSYX ZHK HMOYKL,OY OHGYLMSE WHGLPXYKYX OPTLYSZ PKKYIKHUWOUVSY, LPGWYKYSE XYLIPLYX KHNAYLUGX VUX IYHISY, UGX CPMO U MKUGJAPS WHGLWPYGWY WUKKPYX OPL OYUX OPNO.KURYL, MOHLY TUSY TUNXUSYGYL, OUBY U LYWKYM ZYYSPGN HZ PGGHWYGWYLPTPSUK MH MOUM COPWO ZYTUSY TUNXUSYGYL OUBY, VULYX HG MOY LUTY OHIY HZZHKNPBYGYLL. "USS CPSS VY ZHKNPBYG OYK, ZHK LOY SHBYX TAWO; UGX USS CPSSVY ZHKNPBYG OPT, ZHK OY YGQHEYX TAWO."XHSHROHB, COH OUX KYUIIYUKYX MOUM EYUK PG THLWHC UZMYK OPL YDPSY UGXOPL IYKLPUG UXBYGMAKYL, UGX CUL SYUXPGN U SPZY HZ SADAKE, NUTVSPGN, UGXXPLLPIUMPHG, ULLHWPUMYX CPMO OPL HSX IYMYKLVAKN WHTKUXY RAKUNPG UGX TUXYALY HZ OPT ZHK OPL HCG YGXL.UGUMHSY CUL LPGWYKYSE ZHGX HZ XHSHROHB ZHK OPL WSYBYKGYLL UGX UAXUWPME.XHSHROHB, COH GYYXYX UGUMHSY RAKUNPG'L GUTY, IHLPMPHG, UGX WHGGYWMPHGLUL U VUPM MH XKUC KPWO EHAGN TYG PGMH OPL NUTVSPGN LYM, TUXY ALY HZ OPTUGX UTALYX OPTLYSZ UM OPL YDIYGLY CPMOHAM SYMMPGN MOY HMOYK ZYYS PM.UIUKM ZKHT MOY UXBUGMUNY OY XYKPBYX ZKHT UGUMHSY, MOY BYKE IKHWYLLHZ XHTPGUMPGN UGHMOYK'L CPSS CUL PG PMLYSZ U ISYULAKY, U OUVPM, UGX UGYWYLLPME MH XHSHROHB.GUMULOU OUX TUXY U LMKHGN PTIKYLLPHG HG RAKUNPG. UM LAIIYK UZMYKMOY HIYKU OY XYLWKPVYX MH XHSHROHB CPMO MOY UPK HZ U WHGGHPLLYAK MOYUMMKUWMPHGL HZ OYK UKTL, LOHASXYKL, ZYYM, UGX OUPK UGX YDIKYLLYX OPLPGMYGMPHG HZ TURPGN SHBY MH OYK. UGUMHSY OUX GH GHMPHG UGX CUL PGWUIUVSYHZ WHGLPXYKPGN COUM TPNOM WHTY HZ LAWO SHBY-TURPGN, UL OY GYBYK OUX UGEGHMPHG HZ MOY HAMWHTY HZ UGE HZ OPL UWMPHGL."LOY'L ZPKLM-KUMY, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, VAM GHM ZHK AL," KYISPYX XHSHROHB."P CPSS MYSS TE LPLMYK MH ULR OYK MH XPGGYK," LUPX UGUMHSY. "YO?""EHA'X VYMMYK CUPM MPSS LOY'L TUKKPYX....""EHA RGHC, P UXHKY SPMMSY NPKSL, MOYE SHLY MOYPK OYUXL UM HGWY," IAKLAYXUGUMHSY."EHA OUBY VYYG WUANOM HGWY USKYUXE VE U 'SPMMSY NPKS,'" LUPX XHSHROHBCOH RGYC HZ RAKUNPG'L TUKKPUNY. "MURY WUKY!""CYSS, MOUM WUG'M OUIIYG MCPWY! YO?" LUPX UGUMHSY, CPMO U NHHX-OATHKYXSUANO.WOUIMYK DPPMOY XUE UZMYK MOY HIYKU MOY KHLMHBL CYGM GHCOYKY UGX GHVHXE WUTY MH LYYMOYT. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MUSRYX MH MOY WHAGM UVHAM LHTYMOPGN COPWO MOYEWHGWYUSYX ZKHT GUMULOU. GUMULOU NAYLLYX MOYE CYKY MUSRPGN UVHAM MOY HSXIKPGWY UGX ISUGGPGN LHTYMOPGN, UGX MOPL XPLJAPYMYX UGX HZZYGXYX OYK.LOY CUL YDIYWMPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC UGE THTYGM UGX MCPWY MOUM XUE LYGM UTUGLYKBUGM MH MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU MH ULWYKMUPG COYMOYK OY OUX WHTY. OY OUXGHM UKKPBYX. LOY LAZZYKYX THKY GHC MOUG XAKPGN OYK ZPKLM XUEL PG THLWHC.MH OYK PTIUMPYGWY UGX IPGPGN ZHK OPT CYKY GHC UXXYX MOY AGISYULUGMKYWHSSYWMPHG HZ OYK PGMYKBPYC CPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX MOY HSX IKPGWY,UGX U ZYUK UGX UGDPYME HZ COPWO LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOY WUALY. LOYWHGMPGAUSSE ZUGWPYX MOUM YPMOYK OY CHASX GYBYK WHTY HK MOUM LHTYMOPGNCHASX OUIIYG MH OYK VYZHKY OY WUTY. LOY WHASX GH SHGNYK MOPGR HZ OPT VEOYKLYSZ WUSTSE UGX WHGMPGAHALSE UL LOY OUX XHGY VYZHKY. UL LHHG UL LOYVYNUG MH MOPGR HZ OPT, MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG HZ MOY HSX IKPGWY, HZ IKPGWYLLTUKE, HZ MOY MOYUMYK, UGX HZ RAKUNPG TPGNSYX CPMO OYK MOHANOML. MOYJAYLMPHG UNUPG IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ COYMOYK LOY CUL GHM NAPSME, COYMOYK LOYOUX GHM USKYUXE VKHRYG ZUPMO CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX UNUPG LOY ZHAGXOYKLYSZ KYWUSSPGN MH MOY TPGAMYLM XYMUPS YBYKE CHKX, YBYKE NYLMAKY, UGXYBYKE LOUXY PG MOY ISUE HZ YDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWY HZ MOY TUG COH OUXVYYG UVSY MH UKHALY PG OYK LAWO UG PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY UGX MYKKPZEPGNZYYSPGN. MH MOY ZUTPSE GUMULOU LYYTYX SPBYSPYK MOUG ALAUS, VAM LOY CULZUK SYLL MKUGJAPS UGX OUIIE MOUG VYZHKY.HG LAGXUE THKGPGN TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU PGBPMYX OYK BPLPMHKL MH TULL UM OYKIUKPLO WOAKWO--MOY WOAKWO HZ MOY ULLATIMPHG VAPSM HBYK MOY NKUBYL HZBPWMPTL HZ MOY ISUNAY."P XHG'M SPRY MOHLY ZULOPHGUVSY WOAKWOYL," LOY LUPX, YBPXYGMSE IKPXPGNOYKLYSZ HG OYK PGXYIYGXYGWY HZ MOHANOM. "NHX PL MOY LUTY YBYKE COYKY.CY OUBY UG YDWYSSYGM IKPYLM, OY WHGXAWML MOY LYKBPWY XYWYGMSE UGX CPMOXPNGPME, UGX MOY XYUWHG PL MOY LUTY. COUM OHSPGYLL PL MOYKY PG NPBPGNWHGWYKML PG MOY WOHPK? P XHG'M SPRY PM, PM'L QALM LYSZ-PGXASNYGWY!"TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU SPRYX LAGXUEL UGX RGYC OHC MH RYYI MOYT. OYK COHSYOHALY CUL LWKAVVYX UGX WSYUGYX HG LUMAKXUEL; GYPMOYK LOY GHK MOYLYKBUGML CHKRYX, UGX MOYE USS CHKY OHSPXUE XKYLL UGX CYGM MH WOAKWO. UMOYK MUVSY MOYKY CYKY YDMKU XPLOYL UM XPGGYK, UGX MOY LYKBUGML OUX BHXRUUGX KHULM NHHLY HK LAWRSPGN IPN. VAM PG GHMOPGN PG MOY OHALY CUL MOYOHSPXUE LH GHMPWYUVSY UL PG TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU'L VKHUX, LMYKG ZUWY, COPWOHG MOUM XUE CHKY UG PGBUKPUVSY SHHR HZ LHSYTG ZYLMPBPME.UZMYK TULL, COYG MOYE OUX ZPGPLOYX MOYPK WHZZYY PG MOY XPGPGN KHHTCOYKY MOY SHHLY WHBYKL OUX VYYG KYTHBYX ZKHT MOY ZAKGPMAKY, U LYKBUGMUGGHAGWYX MOUM MOY WUKKPUNY CUL KYUXE, UGX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU KHLY CPMOU LMYKG UPK. LOY CHKY OYK OHSPXUE LOUCS, PG COPWO LOY IUPX WUSSL, UGXUGGHAGWYX MOUM LOY CUL NHPGN MH LYY IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP MH OUBY UGYDISUGUMPHG CPMO OPT UVHAM GUMULOU.UZMYK LOY OUX NHGY, U XKYLLTURYK ZKHT TUXUTY LAIIYKM-KHNAYM CUPMYXHG MOY KHLMHBL, UGX GUMULOU, BYKE NSUX HZ MOPL XPBYKLPHG, OUBPGN LOAMOYKLYSZ PGMH U KHHT UXQHPGPGN MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, HWWAIPYX OYKLYSZ MKEPGNHG MOY GYC XKYLLYL. QALM UL LOY OUX IAM HG U VHXPWY CPMOHAM LSYYBYL UGXHGSE MUWRYX MHNYMOYK, UGX CUL MAKGPGN OYK OYUX MH LYY PG MOY NSULL OHCMOY VUWR ZPMMYX, LOY OYUKX PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT MOY UGPTUMYX LHAGXL HZOYK ZUMOYK'L BHPWY UGX UGHMOYK'L--U CHTUG'L--MOUM TUXY OYK ZSALO. PMCUL OYSYGY. GUMULOU OUX GHM MPTY MH MURY HZZ MOY VHXPWY VYZHKY MOY XHHKHIYGYX UGX WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU, XKYLLYX PG U IAKISY BYSBYM NHCG CPMOU OPNO WHSSUK, WUTY PGMH MOY KHHT VYUTPGN CPMO NHHX-OATHKYX UTPUVSYLTPSYL."HO, TE YGWOUGMKYLL!" LOY WKPYX MH MOY VSALOPGN GUMULOU. "WOUKTPGN! GH,MOPL PL KYUSSE VYEHGX UGEMOPGN, TE XYUK WHAGM," LUPX LOY MH WHAGM KHLMHBCOH OUX ZHSSHCYX OYK PG. "OHC WUG EHA SPBY PG THLWHC UGX NH GHCOYKY? GH,P CHG'M SYM EHA HZZ! TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY CPSS KYWPMY UM TE OHALYMHGPNOM UGX MOYKY'SS VY LHTY IYHISY, UGX PZ EHA XHG'M VKPGN EHAK SHBYSENPKSL--COH UKY IKYMMPYK MOUG TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY--P CHG'M RGHC EHA! TEOALVUGX PL UCUE PG MBYK HK P CHASX LYGX OPT MH ZYMWO EHA. EHA TALM WHTY.EHA IHLPMPBYSE TALM! VYMCYYG YPNOM UGX GPGY."LOY GHXXYX MH MOY XKYLLTURYK, COHT LOY RGYC UGX COH OUX WAKMLPYXKYLIYWMZASSE MH OYK, UGX LYUMYX OYKLYSZ PG UG UKTWOUPK VYLPXY MOYSHHRPGN NSULL, XKUIPGN MOY ZHSXL HZ OYK BYSBYM XKYLL IPWMAKYLJAYSE. LOYXPX GHM WYULY WOUMMYKPGN NHHX-GUMAKYXSE UGX NUPSE, WHGMPGAUSSE IKUPLPGNGUMULOU'L VYUAME. LOY SHHRYX UM GUMULOU'L XKYLLYL UGX IKUPLYX MOYT, ULCYSS UL U GYC XKYLL HZ OYK HCG TUXY HZ "TYMUSSPW NUAFY," COPWO LOY OUXKYWYPBYX ZKHT IUKPL, UGX UXBPLYX GUMULOU MH OUBY HGY SPRY PM."VAM UGEMOPGN LAPML EHA, TE WOUKTYK!" LOY KYTUKRYX.U LTPSY HZ ISYULAKY GYBYK SYZM GUMULOU'L ZUWY. LOY ZYSM OUIIE UGX UL PZLOY CYKY VSHLLHTPGN AGXYK MOY IKUPLY HZ MOPL XYUK WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU COHOUX ZHKTYKSE LYYTYX MH OYK LH AGUIIKHUWOUVSY UGX PTIHKMUGM UGX CUL GHCLH RPGX MH OYK. GUMULOU VKPNOMYGYX AI UGX ZYSM USTHLM PG SHBY CPMOMOPL CHTUG, COH CUL LH VYUAMPZAS UGX LH RPGX. OYSYGY ZHK OYK IUKM CULLPGWYKYSE XYSPNOMYX CPMO GUMULOU UGX CPLOYX MH NPBY OYK U NHHX MPTY.UGUMHSY OUX ULRYX OYK MH VKPGN OPT UGX GUMULOU MHNYMOYK, UGX LOY CULWUSSPGN HG MOY KHLMHBL ZHK MOUM IAKIHLY. MOY PXYU HZ MOKHCPGN OYKVKHMOYK UGX GUMULOU MHNYMOYK UTALYX OYK.MOHANO UM HGY MPTY, PG IYMYKLVAKN, LOY OUX VYYG UGGHEYX CPMO GUMULOU ZHKXKUCPGN VHKPL UCUE, LOY XPX GHM MOPGR HZ MOUM GHC, UGX PG OYK HCG CUEOYUKMPSE CPLOYX GUMULOU CYSS. UL LOY CUL SYUBPGN MOY KHLMHBL LOY WUSSYXOYK IKHMYNYY ULPXY."TE VKHMOYK XPGYX CPMO TY EYLMYKXUE--CY GYUKSE XPYX HZ SUANOMYK--OY UMYGHMOPGN UGX RYIM LPNOPGN ZHK EHA, TE WOUKTYK! OY PL TUXSE, JAPMY TUXSE,PG SHBY CPMO EHA, TE XYUK."GUMULOU VSALOYX LWUKSYM COYG LOY OYUKX MOPL."OHC LOY VSALOYL, OHC LOY VSALOYL, TE IKYMME!" LUPX OYSYGY. "EHA TALMWYKMUPGSE WHTY. PZ EHA SHBY LHTYVHXE, TE WOUKTYK, MOUM PL GHM U KYULHGMH LOAM EHAKLYSZ AI. YBYG PZ EHA UKY YGNUNYX, P UT LAKY EHAK ZPUGWYCHASX CPLO EHA MH NH PGMH LHWPYME KUMOYK MOUG VY VHKYX MH XYUMO.""LH LOY RGHCL P UT YGNUNYX, UGX LOY UGX OYK OALVUGX IPYKKY--MOUM NHHXIPYKKY--OUBY MUSRYX UGX SUANOYX UVHAM MOPL. LH PM'L USS KPNOM." UGXUNUPG, AGXYK OYSYGY'L PGZSAYGWY, COUM OUX LYYTYX MYKKPVSY GHC LYYTYXLPTISY UGX GUMAKUS. "UGX LOY PL LAWO U NKUGXY XUTY, LH RPGX, UGXYBPXYGMSE SPRYL TY LH TAWO. UGX COE GHM YGQHE TELYSZ?" MOHANOM GUMULOU,NUFPGN UM OYSYGY CPMO CPXY-HIYG, CHGXYKPGN YEYL.TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU WUTY VUWR MH XPGGYK MUWPMAKG UGX LYKPHAL, OUBPGNYBPXYGMSE LAZZYKYX U XYZYUM UM MOY HSX IKPGWY'L. LOY CUL LMPSS MHHUNPMUMYX VE MOY YGWHAGMYK MH VY UVSY MH MUSR HZ MOY UZZUPK WUSTSE. PGUGLCYK MH MOY WHAGM'L PGJAPKPYL LOY KYISPYX MOUM MOPGNL CYKY USS KPNOMUGX MOUM LOY CHASX MYSS UVHAM PM GYDM XUE. HG OYUKPGN HZ WHAGMYLLVYFAROHBU'L BPLPM UGX MOY PGBPMUMPHG ZHK MOUM YBYGPGN, TUKEU XTPMKPYBGUKYTUKRYX:"P XHG'M WUKY MH OUBY UGEMOPGN MH XH CPMO VYFAROHBU UGX XHG'M UXBPLY EHAMH; OHCYBYK, PZ EHA'BY IKHTPLYX--NH. PM CPSS XPBYKM EHAK MOHANOML," LOYUXXYX, UXXKYLLPGN GUMULOU.WOUIMYK DPPPWHAGM KHLMHB MHHR MOY NPKSL MH WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU'L. MOYKY CYKY U NHHXTUGE IYHISY MOYKY, VAM GYUKSE USS LMKUGNYKL MH GUMULOU. WHAGM KHLMHB CULXPLISYULYX MH LYY MOUM MOY WHTIUGE WHGLPLMYX USTHLM YGMPKYSE HZ TYG UGXCHTYG RGHCG ZHK MOY ZKYYXHT HZ MOYPK WHGXAWM. TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY CULLMUGXPGN PG U WHKGYK HZ MOY XKUCPGN KHHT LAKKHAGXYX VE EHAGN TYG. MOYKYCYKY LYBYKUS ZKYGWOTYG IKYLYGM, UTHGN MOYT TYMPBPYK COH ZKHT MOY MPTYOYSYGY KYUWOYX THLWHC OUX VYYG UG PGMPTUMY PG OYK OHALY. MOY WHAGMXYWPXYX GHM MH LPM XHCG MH WUKXL HK SYM OPL NPKSL HAM HZ OPL LPNOM UGXMH NYM UCUE UL LHHG UL TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY'L IYKZHKTUGWY CUL HBYK.UGUMHSY CUL UM MOY XHHK, YBPXYGMSE HG MOY SHHRHAM ZHK MOY KHLMHBL.PTTYXPUMYSE UZMYK NKYYMPGN MOY WHAGM OY CYGM AI MH GUMULOU UGX ZHSSHCYXOYK. UL LHHG UL LOY LUC OPT LOY CUL LYPFYX VE MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN LOY OUXOUX UM MOY HIYKU--NKUMPZPYX BUGPME UM OPL UXTPKUMPHG HZ OYK UGX ZYUK UMMOY UVLYGWY HZ U THKUS VUKKPYK VYMCYYG MOYT.OYSYGY CYSWHTYX GUMULOU XYSPNOMYXSE UGX CUL SHAX PG UXTPKUMPHG HZ OYKVYUAME UGX OYK XKYLL. LHHG UZMYK MOYPK UKKPBUS TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY CYGMHAM HZ MOY KHHT MH WOUGNY OYK WHLMATY. PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT IYHISY VYNUGUKKUGNPGN MOY WOUPKL UGX MURPGN MOYPK LYUML. UGUMHSY THBYX U WOUPK ZHKGUMULOU UGX CUL UVHAM MH LPM XHCG VYLPXY OYK, VAM MOY WHAGM, COH GYBYKSHLM LPNOM HZ OYK, MHHR MOY LYUM OPTLYSZ. UGUMHSY LUM XHCG VYOPGX OYK.TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY, CPMO OYK VUKY, ZUM, XPTISYX UKTL, UGX U KYX LOUCSXKUIYX HBYK HGY LOHASXYK, WUTY PGMH MOY LIUWY SYZM BUWUGM ZHK OYK, UGXULLATYX UG AGGUMAKUS IHLY. YGMOALPULMPW COPLIYKPGN CUL UAXPVSY.TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY SHHRYX LMYKGSE UGX NSHHTPSE UM MOY UAXPYGWY UGXVYNUG KYWPMPGN LHTY ZKYGWO BYKLYL XYLWKPVPGN OYK NAPSME SHBY ZHK OYKLHG. PG LHTY ISUWYL LOY KUPLYX OYK BHPWY, PG HMOYKL LOY COPLIYKYX,SPZMPGN OYK OYUX MKPATIOUGMSE; LHTYMPTYL LOY IUALYX UGX AMMYKYX OHUKLYLHAGXL, KHSSPGN OYK YEYL."UXHKUVSY! XPBPGY! XYSPWPHAL!" CUL OYUKX ZKHT YBYKE LPXY.GUMULOU SHHRYX UM MOY ZUM UWMKYLL, VAM GYPMOYK LUC GHK OYUKX GHKAGXYKLMHHX UGEMOPGN HZ COUM CYGM HG VYZHKY OYK. LOY HGSE ZYSM OYKLYSZUNUPG WHTISYMYSE VHKGY UCUE PGMH MOPL LMKUGNY LYGLYSYLL CHKSX--LH KYTHMYZKHT OYK HSX CHKSX--U CHKSX PG COPWO PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH RGHC COUMCUL NHHX HK VUX, KYULHGUVSY HK LYGLYSYLL. VYOPGX OYK LUM UGUMHSY,UGX WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL IKHDPTPME LOY YDIYKPYGWYX U ZKPNOMYGYX LYGLY HZYDIYWMUGWE.UZMYK MOY ZPKLM THGHSHNAY MOY COHSY WHTIUGE KHLY UGX LAKKHAGXYXTUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY, YDIKYLLPGN MOYPK YGMOALPULT."OHC VYUAMPZAS LOY PL!" GUMULOU KYTUKRYX MH OYK ZUMOYK COH OUX USLHKPLYG UGX CUL THBPGN MOKHANO MOY WKHCX MHCUKX MOY UWMKYLL."P XHG'M MOPGR LH COYG P SHHR UM EHA!" LUPX UGUMHSY, ZHSSHCPGN GUMULOU.OY LUPX MOPL UM U THTYGM COYG LOY USHGY WHASX OYUK OPT. "EHA UKYYGWOUGMPGN... ZKHT MOY THTYGM P LUC EHA P OUBY GYBYK WYULYX...""WHTY, WHTY, GUMULOU!" LUPX MOY WHAGM, UL OY MAKGYX VUWR ZHK OPLXUANOMYK. "OHC VYUAMPZAS LOY PL!" GUMULOU CPMOHAM LUEPGN UGEMOPGNLMYIIYX AI MH OYK ZUMOYK UGX SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO LAKIKPLYX PGJAPKPGNYEYL.UZMYK NPBPGN LYBYKUS KYWPMUMPHGL, TUXYTHPLYSSY NYHKNY SYZM, UGX WHAGMYLLVYFAROHBU ULRYX OYK BPLPMHKL PGMH MOY VUSSKHHT.MOY WHAGM CPLOYX MH NH OHTY, VAM OYSYGY YGMKYUMYX OPT GHM MH LIHPS OYKPTIKHBPLYX VUSS, UGX MOY KHLMHBL LMUEYX HG. UGUMHSY ULRYX GUMULOU ZHK UBUSLY UGX UL MOYE XUGWYX OY IKYLLYX OYK CUPLM UGX OUGX UGX MHSX OYK LOYCUL VYCPMWOPGN UGX MOUM OY SHBYX OYK. XAKPGN MOY YWHLLUPLY, COPWO LOYUSLH XUGWYX CPMO OPT, UGUMHSY LUPX GHMOPGN COYG MOYE OUIIYGYX MH VY VEMOYTLYSBYL, VAM TYKYSE NUFYX UM OYK. GUMULOU SPZMYX OYK ZKPNOMYGYX YEYLMH OPT, VAM MOYKY CUL LAWO WHGZPXYGM MYGXYKGYLL PG OPL UZZYWMPHGUMY SHHRUGX LTPSY MOUM LOY WHASX GHM, COPSLM SHHRPGN UM OPT, LUE COUM LOY OUX MHLUE. LOY SHCYKYX OYK YEYL."XHG'M LUE LAWO MOPGNL MH TY. P UT VYMKHMOYX UGX SHBY UGHMOYK," LOY LUPXKUIPXSE.... LOY NSUGWYX UM OPT.UGUMHSY CUL GHM AILYM HK IUPGYX VE COUM LOY OUX LUPX."XHG'M LIYUR MH TY HZ MOUM! COUM WUG P XH?" LUPX OY. "P MYSS EHA PUT TUXSE, TUXSE, PG SHBY CPMO EHA! PL PM TE ZUASM MOUM EHA UKYYGWOUGMPGN?... PM'L HAK MAKG MH VYNPG."GUMULOU, UGPTUMYX UGX YDWPMYX, SHHRYX UVHAM OYK CPMO CPXY-HIYGZKPNOMYGYX YEYL UGX LYYTYX TYKKPYK MOUG ALAUS. LOY AGXYKLMHHX OUKXSEUGEMOPGN MOUM CYGM HG MOUM YBYGPGN. MOYE XUGWYX MOY YWHLLUPLY UGX MOYNKHLLBUMYK. OYK ZUMOYK ULRYX OYK MH WHTY OHTY, VAM LOY VYNNYX MH KYTUPG.COYKYBYK LOY CYGM UGX COHTYBYK LOY CUL LIYURPGN MH, LOY ZYSM OPL YEYLAIHG OYK. SUMYK HG LOY KYWUSSYX OHC LOY OUX ULRYX OYK ZUMOYK MH SYM OYKNH MH MOY XKYLLPGN KHHT MH KYUKKUGNY OYK XKYLL, MOUM OYSYGY OUX ZHSSHCYXOYK UGX LIHRYG SUANOPGNSE HZ OYK VKHMOYK'L SHBY, UGX MOUM LOY UNUPG TYMUGUMHSY PG MOY SPMMSY LPMMPGN KHHT. OYSYGY OUX XPLUIIYUKYX SYUBPGN MOYTUSHGY, UGX UGUMHSY OUX MURYG OYK OUGX UGX LUPX PG U MYGXYK BHPWY:"P WUGGHM WHTY MH BPLPM EHA VAM PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM P LOUSS GYBYK LYYEHA? P SHBY EHA TUXSE. WUG P GYBYK...?" UGX, VSHWRPGN OYK IUMO, OYVKHANOM OPL ZUWY WSHLY MH OYKL.OPL SUKNY, NSPMMYKPGN, TULWASPGY YEYL CYKY LH WSHLY MH OYKL MOUM LOY LUCGHMOPGN VAM MOYT."GUMUSPY?" OY COPLIYKYX PGJAPKPGNSE COPSY LOY ZYSM OYK OUGXL VYPGNIUPGZASSE IKYLLYX. "GUMUSPY?""P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX. P OUBY GHMOPGN MH LUE," OYK YEYL KYISPYX.VAKGPGN SPIL CYKY IKYLLYX MH OYKL, UGX UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM LOY ZYSMOYKLYSZ KYSYULYX, UGX OYSYGY'L ZHHMLMYIL UGX MOY KALMSY HZ OYK XKYLLCYKY OYUKX PG MOY KHHT. GUMULOU SHHRYX KHAGX UM OYK, UGX MOYG, KYXUGX MKYTVSPGN, MOKYC U ZKPNOMYGYX SHHR HZ PGJAPKE UM UGUMHSY UGX THBYXMHCUKX MOY XHHK."HGY CHKX, QALM HGY, ZHK NHX'L LURY!" WKPYX UGUMHSY.LOY IUALYX. LOY LH CUGMYX U CHKX ZKHT OPT MOUM CHASX YDISUPG MH OYK COUMOUX OUIIYGYX UGX MH COPWO LOY WHASX ZPGX GH UGLCYK."GUMUSPY, QALM U CHKX, HGSE HGY!" OY RYIM KYIYUMPGN, YBPXYGMSE GHMRGHCPGN COUM MH LUE UGX OY KYIYUMYX PM MPSS OYSYGY WUTY AI MH MOYT.OYSYGY KYMAKGYX CPMO GUMULOU MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. MOY KHLMHBL CYGM UCUECPMOHAM LMUEPGN ZHK LAIIYK.UZMYK KYUWOPGN OHTY GUMULOU XPX GHM LSYYI USS GPNOM. LOY CUL MHKTYGMYXVE MOY PGLHSAVSY JAYLMPHG COYMOYK LOY SHBYX UGUMHSY HK IKPGWY UGXKYC.LOY SHBYX IKPGWY UGXKYC--LOY KYTYTVYKYX XPLMPGWMSE OHC XYYISE LOY SHBYXOPT. VAM LOY USLH SHBYX UGUMHSY, HZ MOUM MOYKY CUL GH XHAVM. "YSLY OHCWHASX USS MOPL OUBY OUIIYGYX?" MOHANOM LOY. "PZ, UZMYK MOUM, P WHASXKYMAKG OPL LTPSY COYG LUEPGN NHHX-VE, PZ P CUL UVSY MH SYM PM WHTY MHMOUM, PM TYUGL MOUM P SHBYX OPT ZKHT MOY ZPKLM. PM TYUGL MOUM OY PLRPGX, GHVSY, UGX LISYGXPX, UGX P WHASX GHM OYSI SHBPGN OPT. COUM UT PMH XH PZ P SHBY OPT UGX MOY HMOYK HGY MHH?" LOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ, AGUVSY MHZPGX UG UGLCYK MH MOYLY MYKKPVSY JAYLMPHGL.WOUIMYK DPBTHKGPGN WUTY CPMO PML WUKYL UGX VALMSY. YBYKEHGY NHM AI UGX VYNUG MHTHBY UVHAM UGX MUSR, XKYLLTURYKL WUTY UNUPG. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UIIYUKYX,UGX MOYE CYKY WUSSYX MH VKYURZULM. GUMULOU RYIM SHHRPGN AGYULPSE UMYBYKEVHXE CPMO CPXY-HIYG YEYL, UL PZ CPLOPGN MH PGMYKWYIM YBYKE NSUGWYXPKYWMYX MHCUKX OYK, UGX MKPYX MH UIIYUK MOY LUTY UL ALAUS.UZMYK VKYURZULM, COPWO CUL OYK VYLM MPTY, TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU LUM XHCG PGOYK UKTWOUPK UGX WUSSYX GUMULOU UGX MOY WHAGM MH OYK."CYSS, ZKPYGXL, P OUBY GHC MOHANOM MOY COHSY TUMMYK HBYK UGX MOPL PLTE UXBPWY," LOY VYNUG. "EYLMYKXUE, UL EHA RGHC, P CYGM MH LYY IKPGWYVHSRHGLRP. CYSS, P OUX U MUSR CPMO OPT.... OY MHHR PM PGMH OPL OYUX MHVYNPG LOHAMPGN, VAM P UT GHM HGY MH VY LOHAMYX XHCG. P LUPX COUM P OUXMH LUE!""CYSS, UGX OY?" ULRYX MOY WHAGM."OY? OY'L WKUFE... OY XPX GHM CUGM MH SPLMYG. VAM COUM'L MOY ALYHZ MUSRPGN? UL PM PL CY OUBY CHKG MOY IHHK NPKS HAM," LUPX TUKEUXTPMKPYBGU. "TE UXBPWY MH EHA PL ZPGPLO EHAK VALPGYLL UGX NH VUWR OHTYMH HMKUXGHY... UGX CUPM MOYKY.""HO, GH!" YDWSUPTYX GUMULOU."EYL, NH VUWR," LUPX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, "UGX CUPM MOYKY. PZ EHAKVYMKHMOYX WHTYL OYKY GHC--MOYKY CPSS VY GH UBHPXPGN U JAUKKYS; VAM USHGYCPMO MOY HSX TUG OY CPSS MUSR MOPGNL HBYK UGX MOYG WHTY HG MH EHA."WHAGM KHLMHB UIIKHBYX HZ MOPL LANNYLMPHG, UIIKYWPUMPGN PMLKYULHGUVSYGYLL. PZ MOY HSX TUG WUTY KHAGX PM CHASX VY USS MOY VYMMYK MHBPLPM OPT PG THLWHC HK UM VUSX OPSSL SUMYK HG; UGX PZ GHM, MOY CYXXPGN,UNUPGLM OPL CPLOYL, WHASX HGSE VY UKKUGNYX UM HMKUXGHY."MOUM PL IYKZYWMSE MKAY. UGX P UT LHKKE P CYGM MH LYY OPT UGX MHHR OYK,"LUPX MOY HSX WHAGM."GH, COE VY LHKKE? VYPGN OYKY, EHA OUX MH IUE EHAK KYLIYWML. VAM PZ OYCHG'M--MOUM'L OPL UZZUPK," LUPX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, SHHRPGN ZHK LHTYMOPGNPG OYK KYMPWASY. "VYLPXYL, MOY MKHALLYUA PL KYUXE, LH MOYKY PL GHMOPGNMH CUPM ZHK; UGX COUM PL GHM KYUXE P'SS LYGX UZMYK EHA. MOHANO P XHG'MSPRY SYMMPGN EHA NH, PM PL MOY VYLM CUE. LH NH, CPMO NHX'L VSYLLPGN!"OUBPGN ZHAGX COUM LOY CUL SHHRPGN ZHK PG MOY KYMPWASY LOY OUGXYX PM MHGUMULOU. PM CUL U SYMMYK ZKHT IKPGWYLL TUKE."LOY OUL CKPMMYG MH EHA. OHC LOY MHKTYGML OYKLYSZ, IHHK MOPGN! LOY'LUZKUPX EHA TPNOM MOPGR MOUM LOY XHYL GHM SPRY EHA.""VAM LOY XHYLG'M SPRY TY," LUPX GUMULOU."XHG'M MUSR GHGLYGLY!" WKPYX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU."P LOUG'M VYSPYBY UGEHGY, P RGHC LOY XHYLG'M SPRY TY," KYISPYX GUMULOUVHSXSE UL LOY MHHR MOY SYMMYK, UGX OYK ZUWY YDIKYLLYX U WHSX UGX UGNKEKYLHSAMPHG MOUM WUALYX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MH SHHR UM OYK THKY PGMYGMSE UGXMH ZKHCG."XHG'M UGLCYK SPRY MOUM, TE NHHX NPKS!" LOY LUPX. "COUM P LUE PL MKAY!CKPMY UG UGLCYK!" GUMULOU XPX GHM KYISE UGX CYGM MH OYK HCG KHHT MH KYUXIKPGWYLL TUKE'L SYMMYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE CKHMY MOUM LOY CUL PG XYLIUPK UM MOY TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGN MOUMOUX HWWAKKYX VYMCYYG MOYT. COUMYBYK OYK ZUMOYK'L ZYYSPGNL TPNOM VY, LOYVYNNYX GUMULOU MH VYSPYBY MOUM LOY WHASX GHM OYSI SHBPGN OYK UL MOY HGYWOHLYG VE OYK VKHMOYK, ZHK COHLY OUIIPGYLL LOY CUL KYUXE MH LUWKPZPWYYBYKEMOPGN."XH GHM MOPGR, OHCYBYK," LOY CKHMY, "MOUM TE ZUMOYK PL PSS-XPLIHLYXMHCUKX EHA. OY PL UG PGBUSPX UGX UG HSX TUG COH TALM VY ZHKNPBYG; VAMOY PL NHHX UGX TUNGUGPTHAL UGX CPSS SHBY OYK COH TURYL OPL LHG OUIIE."IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM HG MH ULR GUMULOU MH ZPD U MPTY COYG LOY WHASX LYYOYK UNUPG.UZMYK KYUXPGN MOY SYMMYK GUMULOU LUM XHCG UM MOY CKPMPGN MUVSY MH UGLCYKPM. "XYUK IKPGWYLL," LOY CKHMY PG ZKYGWO JAPWRSE UGX TYWOUGPWUSSE, UGXMOYG IUALYX. COUM THKY WHASX LOY CKPMY UZMYK USS MOUM OUX OUIIYGYXMOY YBYGPGN VYZHKY? "EYL, EYL! USS MOUM OUL OUIIYGYX, UGX GHC USS PLWOUGNYX," LOY MOHANOM UL LOY LUM CPMO MOY SYMMYK LOY OUX VYNAG VYZHKYOYK. "TALM P VKYUR HZZ CPMO OPT? TALM P KYUSSE? MOUM'L UCZAS..." UGX MHYLWUIY ZKHT MOYLY XKYUXZAS MOHANOML LOY CYGM MH LHGEU UGX VYNUG LHKMPGNIUMMYKGL CPMO OYK.UZMYK XPGGYK GUMULOU CYGM MH OYK KHHT UGX UNUPG MHHR AI IKPGWYLL TUKE'LSYMMYK. "WUG PM VY MOUM PM PL USS HBYK?" LOY MOHANOM. "WUG PM VYMOUM USS MOPL OUL OUIIYGYX LH JAPWRSE UGX OUL XYLMKHEYX USS MOUM CYGMVYZHKY?" LOY KYWUSSYX OYK SHBY ZHK IKPGWY UGXKYC PG USS PML ZHKTYKLMKYGNMO, UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY ZYSM MOUM LOY SHBYX RAKUNPG. LOY BPBPXSEIPWMAKYX OYKLYSZ UL IKPGWY UGXKYC'L CPZY, UGX MOY LWYGYL HZ OUIIPGYLLCPMO OPT LOY OUX LH HZMYG KYIYUMYX PG OYK PTUNPGUMPHG, UGX UM MOYLUTY MPTY, UNSHC CPMO YDWPMYTYGM, KYWUSSYX YBYKE XYMUPS HZ EYLMYKXUE'LPGMYKBPYC CPMO UGUMHSY."COE WHASX MOUM GHM VY UL CYSS?" LOY LHTYMPTYL ULRYX OYKLYSZ PG WHTISYMYVYCPSXYKTYGM. "HGSE LH WHASX P VY WHTISYMYSE OUIIE; VAM GHC P OUBY MHWOHHLY, UGX P WUG'M VY OUIIE CPMOHAM YPMOYK HZ MOYT. HGSE," LOY MOHANOM,"MH MYSS IKPGWY UGXKYC COUM OUL OUIIYGYX HK MH OPXY PM ZKHT OPT UKYVHMO YJAUSSE PTIHLLPVSY. VAM CPMO MOUM HGY GHMOPGN PL LIHPSYX. VAM UTP KYUSSE MH UVUGXHG ZHKYBYK MOY QHE HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SHBY, PG COPWO POUBY SPBYX LH SHGN?""ISYULY, TPLL!" COPLIYKYX U TUPX YGMYKPGN MOY KHHT CPMO U TELMYKPHALUPK. "U TUG MHSX TY MH NPBY EHA MOPL-" UGX LOY OUGXYX GUMULOU U SYMMYK."HGSE, ZHK WOKPLM'L LURY..." MOY NPKS CYGM HG, UL GUMULOU, CPMOHAMMOPGRPGN, TYWOUGPWUSSE VKHRY MOY LYUS UGX KYUX U SHBY SYMMYK ZKHTUGUMHSY, HZ COPWO, CPMOHAM MURPGN PG U CHKX, LOY AGXYKLMHHX HGSE MOUMPM CUL U SYMMYK ZKHT OPT--ZKHT MOY TUG LOY SHBYX. EYL, LOY SHBYX OPT, HKYSLY OHC WHASX MOUM OUBY OUIIYGYX COPWO OUX OUIIYGYX? UGX OHC WHASX LOYOUBY U SHBY SYMMYK ZKHT OPT PG OYK OUGX?CPMO MKYTVSPGN OUGXL GUMULOU OYSX MOUM IULLPHGUMY SHBY SYMMYK COPWOXHSHROHB OUX WHTIHLYX ZHK UGUMHSY, UGX UL LOY KYUX PM LOY ZHAGX PG PM UGYWOH HZ USS MOUM LOY OYKLYSZ PTUNPGYX LOY CUL ZYYSPGN."LPGWY EYLMYKXUE YBYGPGN TE ZUMY OUL VYYG LYUSYX; MH VY SHBYX VE EHA HKMH XPY. MOYKY PL GH HMOYK CUE ZHK TY," MOY SYMMYK VYNUG. MOYG OY CYGMHG MH LUE MOUM OY RGYC OYK IUKYGML CHASX GHM NPBY OYK MH OPT--ZHK MOPLMOYKY CYKY LYWKYM KYULHGL OY WHASX KYBYUS HGSE MH OYK--VAM MOUM PZLOY SHBYX OPT LOY GYYX HGSE LUE MOY CHKX EYL, UGX GH OATUG IHCYK WHASXOPGXYK MOYPK VSPLL. SHBY CHASX WHGJAYK USS. OY CHASX LMYUS OYK UCUE UGXWUKKE OYK HZZ MH MOY YGXL HZ MOY YUKMO."EYL, EYL! P SHBY OPT!" MOHANOM GUMULOU, KYUXPGN MOY SYMMYK ZHK MOYMCYGMPYMO MPTY UGX ZPGXPGN LHTY IYWASPUKSE XYYI TYUGPGN PG YUWO CHKX HZPM.MOUM YBYGPGN TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU CUL NHPGN MH MOY UROUKHBL' UGX IKHIHLYX MHMURY MOY NPKSL CPMO OYK. GUMULOU, ISYUXPGN U OYUXUWOY, KYTUPGYX UM OHTY.WOUIMYK DBHG KYMAKGPGN SUMY PG MOY YBYGPGN LHGEU CYGM MH GUMULOU'L KHHT, UGX MHOYK LAKIKPLY ZHAGX OYK LMPSS XKYLLYX UGX ULSYYI HG MOY LHZU. HIYG HG MOYMUVSY, VYLPXY OYK SUE UGUMHSY'L SYMMYK. LHGEU IPWRYX PM AI UGX KYUX PM.UL LOY KYUX LOY NSUGWYX UM MOY LSYYIPGN GUMULOU, MKEPGN MH ZPGX PG OYKZUWY UG YDISUGUMPHG HZ COUM LOY CUL KYUXPGN, VAM XPX GHM ZPGX PM. OYKZUWY CUL WUST, NYGMSY, UGX OUIIE. WSAMWOPGN OYK VKYULM MH RYYI OYKLYSZZKHT WOHRPGN, LHGEU, IUSY UGX MKYTVSPGN CPMO ZYUK UGX UNPMUMPHG, LUMXHCG PG UG UKTWOUPK UGX VAKLM PGMH MYUKL."OHC CUL PM P GHMPWYX GHMOPGN? OHC WHASX PM NH LH ZUK? WUG LOY OUBYSYZM HZZ SHBPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC? UGX OHC WHASX LOY SYM RAKUNPG NH MHLAWO SYGNMOL? OY PL U XYWYPBYK UGX U BPSSUPG, MOUM'L ISUPG! COUM CPSSGPWOHSUL, XYUK GHVSY GPWOHSUL, XH COYG OY OYUKL HZ PM? LH MOPL PLMOY TYUGPGN HZ OYK YDWPMYX, KYLHSAMY, AGGUMAKUS SHHR MOY XUE VYZHKYEYLMYKXUE, EYLMYKXUE, UGX MHXUE," MOHANOM LHGEU. "VAM PM WUG'M VY MOUMLOY SHBYL OPT! LOY IKHVUVSE HIYGYX MOY SYMMYK CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COH PM CULZKHT. IKHVUVSE LOY PL HZZYGXYX VE PM. LOY WHASX GHM XH LAWO U MOPGN!"LHGEU CPIYX UCUE OYK MYUKL UGX CYGM AI MH GUMULOU, UNUPG LWUGGPGN OYKZUWY."GUMULOU!" LOY LUPX, QALM UAXPVSE.GUMULOU UCHRY UGX LUC LHGEU."UO, EHA'KY VUWR?"UGX CPMO MOY XYWPLPHG UGX MYGXYKGYLL MOUM HZMYG WHTY UM MOY THTYGMHZ UCURYGPGN, LOY YTVKUWYX OYK ZKPYGX, VAM GHMPWPGN LHGEU'L SHHR HZYTVUKKULLTYGM, OYK HCG ZUWY YDIKYLLYX WHGZALPHG UGX LALIPWPHG."LHGEU, EHA'BY KYUX MOUM SYMMYK?" LOY XYTUGXYX."EYL," UGLCYKYX LHGEU LHZMSE.GUMULOU LTPSYX KUIMAKHALSE."GH, LHGEU, P WUG'M UGE SHGNYK!" LOY LUPX. "P WUG'M OPXY PM ZKHT EHAUGE SHGNYK. EHA RGHC, CY SHBY HGY UGHMOYK! "COE, EHA OUBY KYUX OPL SYMMYK UGX EHA OUBY LYYGOPT.""VAM PZ OY PL XPLOHGHKUVSY?""OY! XPLOHGHKUVSY? PZ EHA HGSE RGYC!" P XHG'M CUGM MH JAUKKYS CPMO EHA, VAM NH, ZHK NHX'L LURYNH! EHA LYY OHC P UT LAZZYKPGN!" GUMULOU WKPYX UGNKPSE, PG U BHPWY HZXYLIUPK UGX KYIKYLLYX PKKPMUMPHG. LHGEU VAKLM PGMH LHVL UGX KUG ZKHT MOYKHHT.GUMULOU CYGM MH MOY MUVSY UGX CPMOHAM U THTYGM'L KYZSYWMPHG CKHMY MOUMUGLCYK MH IKPGWYLL TUKE COPWO LOY OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH CKPMY USSMOY THKGPGN. PG MOPL SYMMYK LOY LUPX VKPYZSE MOUM USS MOYPKTPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL CYKY UM UG YGX; MOUM UBUPSPGN OYKLYSZ HZ MOYTUNGUGPTPME HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC COH COYG OY CYGM UVKHUX OUX NPBYG OYK OYKZKYYXHT, LOY VYNNYX IKPGWYLL TUKE MH ZHKNYM YBYKEMOPGN UGX ZHKNPBY OYKPZ LOY OUX VYYG MH VSUTY MHCUKX OYK, VAM MOUM LOY WHASX GHM VY OPL CPZY.UM MOUM THTYGM MOPL USS LYYTYX JAPMY YULE, LPTISY, UGX WSYUK MH GUMULOU.HG ZKPXUE MOY KHLMHBL CYKY MH KYMAKG MH MOY WHAGMKE, VAM HG CYXGYLXUEMOY WHAGM CYGM CPMO MOY IKHLIYWMPBY IAKWOULYK MH OPL YLMUMY GYUK THLWHC.HG MOY XUE MOY WHAGM SYZM, LHGEU UGX GUMULOU CYKY PGBPMYX MH U VPNXPGGYK IUKME UM MOY RUKUNPGL', UGX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MHHR MOYT MOYKY. UMMOUM IUKME GUMULOU UNUPG TYM UGUMHSY, UGX LHGEU GHMPWYX MOUM LOY LIHRYMH OPT, MKEPGN GHM MH VY HBYKOYUKX, UGX MOUM USS MOKHANO XPGGYK LOY CULTHKY UNPMUMYX MOUG YBYK. COYG MOYE NHM OHTY GUMULOU CUL MOY ZPKLM MHVYNPG MOY YDISUGUMPHG LHGEU YDIYWMYX."MOYKY, LHGEU, EHA CYKY MUSRPGN USS LHKML HZ GHGLYGLY UVHAM OPT,"GUMULOU VYNUG PG U TPSX BHPWY LAWO UL WOPSXKYG ALY COYG MOYE CPLO MH VYIKUPLYX. "CY OUBY OUX UG YDISUGUMPHG MHXUE.""CYSS, COUM OUIIYGYX? COUM XPX OY LUE? GUMULOU, OHC NSUX P UT EHA'KY GHMUGNKE CPMO TY! MYSS TY YBYKEMOPGN--MOY COHSY MKAMO. COUM XPX OY LUE?"GUMULOU VYWUTY MOHANOMZAS."HO, LHGEU, PZ EHA RGYC OPT UL P XH! OY LUPX... OY ULRYX TY COUM P OUXIKHTPLYX VHSRHGLRP.
