COE XHEHA MOPGR LH VUXSE HZ TY?""P XHG'M MOPGR UGEMOPGN, HGSE P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX MOPL...""CUPM U VPM, LHGEU, EHA'SS AGXYKLMUGX YBYKEMOPGN. EHA'SS LYY COUM U TUGOY PL! GHC XHG'M MOPGR VUXSE HZ TY HK HZ OPT. P XHG'M MOPGR VUXSE HZUGEHGY: P SHBY UGX IPME YBYKEVHXE. VAM COUM UT P MH XH?"LHGEU XPX GHM LAWWATV MH MOY MYGXYK MHGY GUMULOU ALYX MHCUKX OYK. MOYTHKY YTHMPHGUS UGX PGNKUMPUMPGN MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ GUMULOU'L ZUWY VYWUTY,MOY THKY LYKPHAL UGX LMYKG NKYC LHGEU'L."GUMULOU," LUPX LOY, "EHA ULRYX TY GHM MH LIYUR MH EHA, UGX P OUBYG'MLIHRYG, VAM GHC EHA EHAKLYSZ OUBY VYNAG. P XHG'M MKALM OPT, GUMULOU. COEMOPL LYWKYWE?""UNUPG, UNUPG!" PGMYKKAIMYX GUMULOU."GUMULOU, P UT UZKUPX ZHK EHA!""UZKUPX HZ COUM?""P UT UZKUPX EHA'KY NHPGN MH EHAK KAPG," LUPX LHGEU KYLHSAMYSE, UGX CULOYKLYSZ OHKKPZPYX UM COUM LOY OUX LUPX.UGNYK UNUPG LOHCYX PG GUMULOU'L ZUWY."UGX P'SS NH MH TE KAPG, P CPSS, UL LHHG UL IHLLPVSY! PM'L GHM EHAKVALPGYLL! PM CHG'M VY EHA, VAM P, COH'SS LAZZYK. SYUBY TY USHGY, SYUBYTY USHGY! P OUMY EHA!""GUMULOU!" THUGYX LHGEU, UNOULM."P OUMY EHA, P OUMY EHA! EHA'KY TE YGYTE ZHKYBYK!" UGX GUMULOU KUG HAMHZ MOY KHHT.GUMULOU XPX GHM LIYUR MH LHGEU UNUPG UGX UBHPXYX OYK. CPMO MOY LUTYYDIKYLLPHG HZ UNPMUMYX LAKIKPLY UGX NAPSM LOY CYGM UVHAM MOY OHALY,MURPGN AI GHC HGY HWWAIUMPHG, GHC UGHMOYK, UGX UM HGWY UVUGXHGPGN MOYT.OUKX UL PM CUL ZHK LHGEU, LOY CUMWOYX OYK ZKPYGX UGX XPX GHM SYM OYK HAMHZ OYK LPNOM.MOY XUE VYZHKY MOY WHAGM CUL MH KYMAKG, LHGEU GHMPWYX MOUM GUMULOU LUMVE MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT CPGXHC USS MOY THKGPGN UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN UGXMOUM LOY TUXY U LPNG MH UG HZZPWYK COH XKHBY IULM, COHT LHGEU MHHR MH VYUGUMHSY.LHGEU VYNUG CUMWOPGN OYK ZKPYGX LMPSS THKY UMMYGMPBYSE UGX GHMPWYX MOUMUM XPGGYK UGX USS MOUM YBYGPGN GUMULOU CUL PG U LMKUGNY UGX AGGUMAKUSLMUMY. LOY UGLCYKYX JAYLMPHGL UM KUGXHT, VYNUG LYGMYGWYL LOY XPX GHMZPGPLO, UGX SUANOYX UM YBYKEMOPGN.UZMYK MYU LHGEU GHMPWYX U OHALYTUPX UM GUMULOU'L XHHK MPTPXSE CUPMPGNMH SYM OYK IULL. LOY SYM MOY NPKS NH PG, UGX MOYG SPLMYGPGN UM MOY XHHKSYUKGYX MOUM UGHMOYK SYMMYK OUX VYYG XYSPBYKYX.MOYG LAXXYGSE PM VYWUTY WSYUK MH LHGEU MOUM GUMULOU OUX LHTY XKYUXZASISUG ZHK MOUM YBYGPGN. LHGEU RGHWRYX UM OYK XHHK. GUMULOU XPX GHM SYMOYK PG."LOY CPSS KAG UCUE CPMO OPT!" MOHANOM LHGEU. "LOY PL WUIUVSY HZUGEMOPGN. MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN IUKMPWASUKSE IUMOYMPW UGX KYLHSAMY PG OYKZUWY MHXUE. LOY WKPYX UL LOY LUPX NHHX-VE MH AGWSY," LHGEU KYTYTVYKYX."EYL, MOUM'L PM, LOY TYUGL MH YSHIY CPMO OPT, VAM COUM UT P MH XH?"MOHANOM LOY, KYWUSSPGN USS MOY LPNGL MOUM WSYUKSE PGXPWUMYX MOUM GUMULOUOUX LHTY MYKKPVSY PGMYGMPHG. "MOY WHAGM PL UCUE. COUM UT P MH XH? CKPMYMH RAKUNPG XYTUGXPGN UG YDISUGUMPHG? VAM COUM PL MOYKY MH HVSPNY OPTMH KYISE? CKPMY MH IPYKKY, UL IKPGWY UGXKYC ULRYX TY MH PG WULY HZ LHTYTPLZHKMAGY?... VAM IYKOUIL LOY KYUSSE OUL USKYUXE KYZALYX VHSRHGLRP--LOYLYGM U SYMMYK MH IKPGWYLL TUKE EYLMYKXUE. UGX AGWSY PL UCUE...." MH MYSSTUKEU XTPMKPYBGU COH OUX LAWO ZUPMO PG GUMULOU LYYTYX MH LHGEU MYKKPVSY."CYSS, UGECUE," MOHANOM LHGEU UL LOY LMHHX PG MOY XUKR IULLUNY, "GHC HKGYBYK P TALM IKHBY MOUM P KYTYTVYK MOY ZUTPSE'L NHHXGYLL MH TY UGX MOUMP SHBY GPWOHSUL. EYL! PZ P XHG'M LSYYI ZHK MOKYY GPNOML P'SS GHM SYUBYMOPL IULLUNY UGX CPSS OHSX OYK VUWR VE ZHKWY UGX CPSS UGX GHM SYM MOYZUTPSE VY XPLNKUWYX," MOHANOM LOY.WOUIMYK DBPUGUMHSY OUX SUMYSE THBYX MH XHSHROHB'L. MOY ISUG ZHK GUMUSPY KHLMHBU'LUVXAWMPHG OUX VYYG UKKUGNYX UGX MOY IKYIUKUMPHGL TUXY VE XHSHROHB U ZYCXUEL VYZHKY, UGX HG MOY XUE MOUM LHGEU, UZMYK SPLMYGPGN UM GUMULOU'LXHHK, KYLHSBYX MH LUZYNAUKX OYK, PM CUL MH OUBY VYYG IAM PGMH YDYWAMPHG.GUMULOU OUX IKHTPLYX MH WHTY HAM MH RAKUNPG UM MOY VUWR IHKWO UM MYGMOUM YBYGPGN. RAKUNPG CUL MH IAM OYK PGMH U MKHERU OY CHASX OUBYKYUXE UGX MH XKPBY OYK ZHKME TPSYL MH MOY BPSSUNY HZ RUTYGRU, COYKY UGAGZKHWRYX IKPYLM CUL PG KYUXPGYLL MH IYKZHKT U TUKKPUNY WYKYTHGE HBYKMOYT. UM RUTYGRU U KYSUE HZ OHKLYL CUL MH CUPM COPWO CHASX MURY MOYT MHMOY CUKLUC OPNOKHUX, UGX ZKHT MOYKY MOYE CHASX OULMYG UVKHUX CPMO IHLMOHKLYL.UGUMHSY OUX U IULLIHKM, UG HKXYK ZHK IHLM OHKLYL, MYG MOHALUGX KAVSYLOY OUX MURYG ZKHT OPL LPLMYK UGX UGHMOYK MYG MOHALUGX VHKKHCYX CPMOXHSHROHB'L OYSI.MCH CPMGYLLYL ZHK MOY THWR TUKKPUNY--ROBHLMPRHB, U KYMPKYX IYMMEHZZPWPUS COHT XHSHROHB TUXY ALY HZ PG OPL NUTVSPGN MKUGLUWMPHGL, UGXTURUKPG, U KYMPKYX OALLUK, U RPGXSE, CYUR ZYSSHC COH OUX UG AGVHAGXYXUZZYWMPHG ZHK RAKUNPG--CYKY LPMMPGN UM MYU PG XHSHROHB'L ZKHGM KHHT.PG OPL SUKNY LMAXE, MOY CUSSL HZ COPWO CYKY OAGN MH MOY WYPSPGN CPMOIYKLPUG KANL, VYUKLRPGL, UGX CYUIHGL, LUM XHSHROHB PG U MKUBYSPGN WSHURUGX OPNO VHHML, UM UG HIYG XYLR HG COPWO SUE UVUWAL UGX LHTY VAGXSYL HZIUIYK THGYE. UGUMHSY, CPMO AGPZHKT AGVAMMHGYX, CUSRYX MH UGX ZKH ZKHTMOY KHHT COYKY MOY CPMGYLLYL CYKY LPMMPGN, MOKHANO MOY LMAXE MH MOY KHHTVYOPGX, COYKY OPL ZKYGWO BUSYM UGX HMOYKL CYKY IUWRPGN MOY SULM HZ OPLMOPGNL. XHSHROHB CUL WHAGMPGN MOY THGYE UGX GHMPGN LHTYMOPGN XHCG."CYSS," OY LUPX, "ROBHLMPRHB TALM OUBY MCH MOHALUGX.""NPBY PM MH OPT, MOYG," LUPX UGUMHSY."TURUKRU" (MOYPK GUTY ZHK TURUKPG) "CPSS NH MOKHANO ZPKY UGX CUMYK ZHKEHA ZHK GHMOPGN. LH OYKY UKY HAK UWWHAGML USS LYMMSYX," LUPX XHSHROHB,LOHCPGN OPT MOY TYTHKUGXAT. "PL MOUM KPNOM?""EYL, HZ WHAKLY," KYMAKGYX UGUMHSY, YBPXYGMSE GHM SPLMYGPGN MH XHSHROHBUGX SHHRPGN LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OPT CPMO U LTPSY MOUM XPX GHM SYUBY OPLZUWY.XHSHROHB VUGNYX XHCG MOY SPX HZ OPL XYLR UGX MAKGYX MH UGUMHSY CPMO UGPKHGPW LTPSY:"XH EHA RGHC? EHA'X KYUSSE VYMMYK XKHI PM USS. MOYKY'L LMPSS MPTY!""ZHHS," KYMHKMYX UGUMHSY. "XHG'M MUSR GHGLYGLY! PZ EHA HGSE RGYC... PM'LMOY XYBPS RGHCL COUM!""GH, KYUSSE, NPBY PM AI!" LUPX XHSHROHB. "P UT LIYURPGN LYKPHALSE. PM'LGH QHRY, MOPL ISHM EHA'BY OUMWOYX.""COUM, MYULPGN UNUPG? NH MH MOY XYBPS! YO?" LUPX UGUMHSY, TURPGN UNKPTUWY. "KYUSSE PM'L GH MPTY ZHK EHAK LMAIPX QHRYL," UGX OY SYZM MOYKHHT.XHSHROHB LTPSYX WHGMYTIMAHALSE UGX WHGXYLWYGXPGNSE COYG UGUMHSY OUX NHGYHAM."EHA CUPM U VPM," OY WUSSYX UZMYK OPT. "P'T GHM QHRPGN, P'T MUSRPGNLYGLY. WHTY OYKY, WHTY OYKY!"UGUMHSY KYMAKGYX UGX SHHRYX UM XHSHROHB, MKEPGN MH NPBY OPT OPLUMMYGMPHG UGX YBPXYGMSE LAVTPMMPGN MH OPT PGBHSAGMUKPSE."GHC SPLMYG MH TY. P'T MYSSPGN EHA MOPL ZHK MOY SULM MPTY. COE LOHASXP QHRY UVHAM PM? XPX P OPGXYK EHA? COH UKKUGNYX YBYKEMOPGN ZHK EHA? COHZHAGX MOY IKPYLM UGX NHM MOY IULLIHKM? COH KUPLYX MOY THGYE? P XPX PMUSS.""CYSS, MOUGR EHA ZHK PM. XH EHA MOPGR P UT GHM NKUMYZAS?" UGX UGUMHSYLPNOYX UGX YTVKUWYX XHSHROHB."P OYSIYX EHA, VAM USS MOY LUTY P TALM MYSS EHA MOY MKAMO; PM PL UXUGNYKHAL VALPGYLL, UGX PZ EHA MOPGR UVHAM PM--U LMAIPX VALPGYLL. CYSS,EHA'SS WUKKE OYK HZZ--USS KPNOM! CPSS MOYE SYM PM LMHI UM MOUM? PMCPSS WHTY HAM MOUM EHA'KY USKYUXE TUKKPYX. COE, MOYE'SS OUBY EHA PG MOYWKPTPGUS WHAKM....""HO, GHGLYGLY, GHGLYGLY!" UGUMHSY YQUWASUMYX UGX UNUPG TUXY U NKPTUWY."XPXG'M P YDISUPG MH EHA? COUM?" UGX UGUMHSY, CPMO MOY IUKMPUSPMEXASS-CPMMYX IYHISY OUBY ZHK UGE WHGWSALPHG MOYE OUBY KYUWOYX VE MOYPKHCG KYULHGPGN, KYIYUMYX MOY UKNATYGM OY OUX USKYUXE IAM MH XHSHROHBU OAGXKYX MPTYL. "XPXG'M P YDISUPG MH EHA MOUM P OUBY WHTY MH MOPLWHGWSALPHG: PZ MOPL TUKKPUNY PL PGBUSPX," OY CYGM HG, WKHHRPGN HGYZPGNYK, "MOYG P OUBY GHMOPGN MH UGLCYK ZHK; VAM PZ PM PL BUSPX, GHTUMMYK! UVKHUX GH HGY CPSS RGHC UGEMOPGN UVHAM PM. PLG'M MOUM LH? UGXXHG'M MUSR MH TY, XHG'M, XHG'M.""LYKPHALSE, EHA'X VYMMYK XKHI PM! EHA'SS HGSE NYM EHAKLYSZ PGMH U TYLL!""NH MH MOY XYBPS!" WKPYX UGUMHSY UGX, WSAMWOPGN OPL OUPK, SYZM MOY KHHT,VAM KYMAKGYX UM HGWY UGX XKHIIYX PGMH UG UKTWOUPK PG ZKHGM HZ XHSHROHBCPMO OPL ZYYM MAKGYX AGXYK OPT. "PM'L MOY BYKE XYBPS! COUM? ZYYS OHC PMVYUML!" OY MHHR XHSHROHB'L OUGX UGX IAM PM HG OPL OYUKM. "COUM U ZHHM,TE XYUK ZYSSHC! COUM U NSUGWY! U NHXXYLL!" OY UXXYX PG ZKYGWO. "COUM?"XHSHROHB CPMO U WHSX LTPSY UGX U NSYUT PG OPL OUGXLHTY PGLHSYGM YEYLSHHRYX UM OPT--YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH NYM LHTY THKY UTALYTYGM HAM HZ OPT."CYSS UGX COYG MOY THGYE'L NHGY, COUM MOYG?""COUM MOYG? YO?" KYIYUMYX UGUMHSY, LPGWYKYSE IYKISYDYX VE U MOHANOMHZ MOY ZAMAKY. "COUM MOYG?... MOYG, P XHG'M RGHC.... VAM COE MUSRGHGLYGLY!" OY NSUGWYX UM OPL CUMWO. "PM'L MPTY!"UGUMHSY CYGM PGMH MOY VUWR KHHT."GHC MOYG! GYUKSE KYUXE? EHA'KY XUCXSPGN!" OY LOHAMYX MH MOY LYKBUGML.XHSHROHB IAM UCUE MOY THGYE, WUSSYX U ZHHMTUG COHT OY HKXYKYX MH VKPGNLHTYMOPGN ZHK MOYT MH YUM UGX XKPGR VYZHKY MOY QHAKGYE, UGX CYGM PGMHMOY KHHT COYKY ROBHLMPRHB UGX TURUKPG CYKY LPMMPGN.UGUMHSY SUE HG MOY LHZU PG MOY LMAXE SYUGPGN HG OPL YSVHC UGX LTPSPGNIYGLPBYSE, COPSY OPL OUGXLHTY SPIL TAMMYKYX MYGXYKSE MH OPTLYSZ."WHTY UGX YUM LHTYMOPGN. OUBY U XKPGR!" XHSHROHB LOHAMYX MH OPT ZKHT MOYHMOYK KHHT."P XHG'M CUGM MH," UGLCYKYX UGUMHSY WHGMPGAPGN MH LTPSY."WHTY! VUSUNU PL OYKY."UGUMHSY KHLY UGX CYGM PGMH MOY XPGPGN KHHT. VUSUNU CUL U ZUTHAL MKHERUXKPBYK COH OUX RGHCG XHSHROHB UGX UGUMHSY LHTY LPD EYUKL UGX OUX NPBYGMOYT NHHX LYKBPWY CPMO OPL MKHERUL. THKY MOUG HGWY COYG UGUMHSY'LKYNPTYGM CUL LMUMPHGYX UM MBYK OY OUX MURYG OPT ZKHT MBYK PG MOYYBYGPGN, VKHANOM OPT MH THLWHC VE XUEVKYUR, UGX XKPBYG OPT VUWR UNUPGMOY GYDM GPNOM. THKY MOUG HGWY OY OUX YGUVSYX XHSHROHB MH YLWUIY COYGIAKLAYX. THKY MOUG HGWY OY OUX XKPBYG MOYT MOKHANO MOY MHCG CPMO NEILPYLUGX "SUXERPGL" UL OY WUSSYX MOY WHWHMMYL. THKY MOUG HGWY PG MOYPKLYKBPWY OY OUX KAG HBYK IYXYLMKPUGL UGX AILYM BYOPWSYL PG MOY LMKYYMLHZ THLWHC UGX OUX USCUEL VYYG IKHMYWMYX ZKHT MOY WHGLYJAYGWYL VE "TENYGMSYTYG" UL OY WUSSYX MOYT. OY OUX KAPGYX THKY MOUG HGY OHKLY PG MOYPKLYKBPWY. THKY MOUG HGWY MOYE OUX VYUMYG OPT, UGX THKY MOUG HGWY MOYEOUX TUXY OPT XKAGR HG WOUTIUNGY UGX TUXYPKU, COPWO OY SHBYX; UGX OY RGYCTHKY MOUG HGY MOPGN UVHAM YUWO HZ MOYT COPWO CHASX SHGN UNH OUBY LYGM UGHKXPGUKE TUG MH LPVYKPU. MOYE HZMYG WUSSYX VUSUNU PGMH MOYPK HKNPYL UGXTUXY OPT XKPGR UGX XUGWY UM MOY NEILPYL', UGX THKY MOUG HGY MOHALUGXKAVSYL HZ MOYPK THGYE OUX IULLYX MOKHANO OPL OUGXL. PG MOYPK LYKBPWY OYKPLRYX OPL LRPG UGX OPL SPZY MCYGME MPTYL U EYUK, UGX PG MOYPK LYKBPWYOUX SHLM THKY OHKLYL MOUG MOY THGYE OY OUX ZKHT MOYT CHASX VAE. VAMOY SPRYX MOYT; SPRYX MOUM TUX XKPBPGN UM MCYSBY TPSYL UG OHAK, SPRYXAILYMMPGN U XKPBYK HK KAGGPGN XHCG U IYXYLMKPUG, UGX ZSEPGN UM ZASSNUSSHI MOKHANO MOY THLWHC LMKYYML. OY SPRYX MH OYUK MOHLY CPSX, MPILELOHAML VYOPGX OPT: "NYM HG! NYM HG!" COYG PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH NH UGEZULMYK. OY SPRYX NPBPGN U IUPGZAS SULO HG MOY GYWR MH LHTY IYULUGMCOH, THKY XYUX MOUG USPBY, CUL USKYUXE OAKKEPGN HAM HZ OPL CUE. "KYUSNYGMSYTYG!" OY WHGLPXYKYX MOYT.UGUMHSY UGX XHSHROHB SPRYX VUSUNU MHH ZHK OPL TULMYKSE XKPBPGN UGXVYWUALY OY SPRYX MOY MOPGNL MOYE SPRYX. CPMO HMOYKL VUSUNU VUKNUPGYX,WOUKNPGN MCYGME-ZPBY KAVSYL ZHK U MCH OHAKL' XKPBY, UGX KUKYSE XKHBYOPTLYSZ, NYGYKUSSE SYMMPGN OPL EHAGN TYG XH LH. VAM CPMO "OPL NYGMSYTYG"OY USCUEL XKHBY OPTLYSZ UGX GYBYK XYTUGXYX UGEMOPGN ZHK OPL CHKR. HGSEU WHAISY HZ MPTYL U EYUK--COYG OY RGYC ZKHT MOYPK BUSYML MOUM MOYE OUXTHGYE PG OUGX--OY CHASX MAKG AI HZ U THKGPGN JAPMY LHVYK UGX CPMO U XYYIVHC CHASX ULR MOYT MH OYSI OPT. SYM TY OUBY COUM EHA WUG MH NH MH MOYZUPK."UGX UGUMHSY UGX XHSHROHB, COYG MOYE OUX THGYE, CHASX NPBY OPT U MOHALUGXHK U WHAISY HZ MOHALUGX KAVSYL.VUSUNU CUL U ZUPK-OUPKYX, LOHKM, UGX LGAV-GHLYX IYULUGM HZ UVHAMMCYGME-LYBYG; KYX-ZUWYX, CPMO U IUKMPWASUKSE KYX MOPWR GYWR, NSPMMYKPGNSPMMSY YEYL, UGX U LTUSS VYUKX. OY CHKY U ZPGY, XUKR-VSAY, LPSR-SPGYXWSHMO WHUM HBYK U LOYYILRPG.HG YGMYKPGN MOY KHHT GHC OY WKHLLYX OPTLYSZ, MAKGPGN MHCUKX MOY ZKHGMWHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT, UGX CYGM AI MH XHSHROHB, OHSXPGN HAM U LTUSS, VSUWROUGX."MOYHXHKY PBUGEWO!" "CPSS EHA VYSPYBY PM, TURUKRU, PM MHHR HGY'L VKYUMOUCUE, MOY KUMY CY ZSYC. CY WUTY UWKHLL U MKUPG HZ SHUXYX LSYPNOL UGXXKHBY KPNOM HBYK MCH HZ MOYT. YO?""MOHLY CYKY OHKLYL!" P WHASXG'M OHSX MOYT PG, TE OUGXL NKYC GATV PG MOY LOUKIZKHLM LH MOUM P MOKYC XHCG MOY KYPGL--'WUMWO OHSX EHAKLYSZ, EHAKYDWYSSYGWE!' LUEL P, UGX P QALM MATVSYX HG MOY VHMMHT HZ MOY LSYPNO UGXLIKUCSYX MOYKY. PM CULG'M U WULY HZ AKNPGN MOYT HG, MOYKY CUL GH OHSXPGNMOYT PG MPSS CY KYUWOYX MOY ISUWY. MOY XYBPSL MHHR AL MOYKY PG MOKYYOHAKL! HGSE MOY GYUK HGY XPYX HZ PM."WOUIMYK DBPPUGUMHSY CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHT UGX KYMAKGYX U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK CYUKPGNU ZAK WHUM NPKM CPMO U LPSBYK VYSM, UGX U LUVSY WUI QUAGMPSE LYM HG HGYLPXY UGX BYKE VYWHTPGN MH OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY. NH MHTUMKYGU TUMKYBGU UGX ULR OYK ZHK MOY LUVSY WSHUR. P OUBY OYUKX COUMYSHIYTYGML UKY SPRY," WHGMPGAYX XHSHROHB CPMO U CPGR. "COE, LOY'SS KALOHAM THKY XYUX MOUG USPBY QALM PG MOY MOPGNL LOY PL CYUKPGN; PZ EHA XYSUEUM USS MOYKY'SS VY MYUKL UGX 'IUIU' UGX 'TUTTU,' UGX LOY'L ZKHFYG PGU TPGAMY UGX TALM NH VUWR--VAM EHA CKUI MOY ZAK WSHUR KHAGX OYK ZPKLMMOPGN UGX WUKKE OYK MH MOY LSYPNO."MOY BUSYM VKHANOM U CHTUG'L ZHD-SPGYX WSHUR."ZHHS, P MHSX EHA MOY LUVSY HGY! OYE, TUMKYGU, MOY LUVSY!" OY LOHAMYX LHMOUM OPL BHPWY KUGN ZUK MOKHANO MOY KHHTL.U OUGXLHTY, LSPT, UGX IUSY-ZUWYX NEILE NPKS CPMO NSPMMYKPGN VSUWR YEYLUGX WAKSE VSAY-VSUWR OUPK, CYUKPGN U KYX LOUCS, KUG HAM CPMO U LUVSYTUGMSY HG OYK UKT."OYKY, P XHG'M NKAXNY PM--MURY PM!" LOY LUPX, YBPXYGMSE UZKUPX HZ OYKTULMYK UGX EYM KYNKYMZAS HZ OYK WSHUR.XHSHROHB, CPMOHAM UGLCYKPGN, MHHR MOY WSHUR, MOKYC PM HBYK TUMKYGU, UGXCKUIIYX OYK AI PG PM."MOUM'L MOY CUE," LUPX XHSHROHB, "UGX MOYG LH!" UGX OY MAKGYX MOY WHSSUKAI KHAGX OYK OYUX, SYUBPGN HGSE U SPMMSY HZ MOY ZUWY AGWHBYKYX. "UGXMOYG LH, XH EHA LYY?" UGX OY IALOYX UGUMHSY'L OYUX ZHKCUKX MH TYYM MOYNUI SYZM VE MOY WHSSUK, MOKHANO COPWO TUMKYGU'L VKPSSPUGM LTPSY CULLYYG."CYSS, NHHX-VE, TUMKYGU," LUPX UGUMHSY, RPLLPGN OYK. "UO, TE KYBYSL OYKYUKY HBYK. KYTYTVYK TY MH LMYLORU. MOYKY, NHHX-VE! NHHX-VEY, TUMKYGU, CPLOTY SAWR!""CYSS, IKPGWY, TUE NHX NPBY EHA NKYUM SAWR!" LUPX TUMKYGU PG OYK NEILEUWWYGM.MCH MKHERUL CYKY LMUGXPGN VYZHKY MOY IHKWO UGX MCH EHAGN XKPBYKL CYKYOHSXPGN MOY OHKLYL. VUSUNU MHHR OPL LYUM PG MOY ZKHGM HGY UGX OHSXPGNOPL YSVHCL OPNO UKKUGNYX MOY KYPGL XYSPVYKUMYSE. UGUMHSY UGX XHSHROHBNHM PG CPMO OPT. "P CHG'M OYUK U CHKX."IALOPGN VUWR GUMULOU COH SHHRYX UM OYK CPMO ULMHGPLOYX VAM MYUKSYLLYEYL, LOY SHWRYX OYK PG; UGX OUBPGN NPBYG HKXYKL MH MOY EUKX IHKMYK MHUXTPM MOY IYKLHGL COH CHASX VY WHTPGN MOUM YBYGPGN, VAM GHM MH SYM MOYTHAM UNUPG, UGX OUBPGN MHSX MOY ZHHMTUG MH VKPGN MOYT AI MH OYK, LOYLYUMYX OYKLYSZ PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT MH UCUPM MOY UVXAWMHKL.COYG NUVKPYS WUTY MH PGZHKT OYK MOUM MOY TYG COH OUX WHTY OUX KAGUCUE UNUPG, LOY KHLY ZKHCGPGN, UGX WSULIPGN OYK OUGXL VYOPGX OYK IUWYXMOKHANO MOY KHHTL U SHGN MPTY WHGLPXYKPGN COUM LOY LOHASX XH. UGX LOY MOKYC OYKLYSZVUWR HG MOY LHZU.TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU CYGM HG UXTHGPLOPGN OYK ZHK LHTY MPTY, YGQHPGPGN HG OYKMOUM PM TALM USS VY RYIM ZKHT OYK ZUMOYK UGX ULLAKPGN OYK MOUM GHVHXECHASX RGHC UGEMOPGN UVHAM PM PZ HGSE GUMULOU OYKLYSZ CHASX AGXYKMURYMH ZHKNYM PM USS UGX GHM SYM UGEHGY LYY MOUM LHTYMOPGN OUX OUIIYGYX.GUMULOU XPX GHM KYISE, GHK XPX LOY LHV UGE SHGNYK, VAM LOY NKYC WHSXUGX OUX U LOPBYKPGN ZPM. TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU IAM U IPSSHC AGXYK OYK OYUX,WHBYKYX OYK CPMO MCH JAPSML, UGX OYKLYSZ VKHANOM OYK LHTY SPTY-ZSHCYKCUMYK, VAM GUMULOU XPX GHM KYLIHGX MH OYK."CYSS, SYM OYK LSYYI," LUPX TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UL LOY CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHTLAIIHLPGN GUMULOU MH VY ULSYYI.VAM GUMULOU CUL GHM ULSYYI; CPMO IUSY ZUWY UGX ZPDYX CPXY-HIYG YEYL LOYSHHRYX LMKUPNOM VYZHKY OYK. TUKEUXTPMKPYBGU TYM OPT UGX MHSX OPT MOUM GUMULOU OUX VYYG BYKE AGCYSS MOYXUE VYZHKY UGX MOUM MOYE OUX LYGM ZHK MOY XHWMHK, VAM MOUM LOY CULVYMMYK GHC. GUMULOU OUX GHM SYZM OYK KHHT MOUM THKGPGN. "ZHK ZPZME-YPNOM EYUKL OUBY P SPBYXPG MOPL CHKSX UGX GYBYK RGHCG UGEMOPGN LH XPLNKUWYZAS!"UGX OUBPGN IAM OPT HG OPL OHGHK GHM MH KYIYUM UGEMOPGN LOY MHSX OPT,TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU PGZHKTYX OPT MOUM GUMULOU OUX KYZALYX IKPGWY UGXKYCCPMOHAM OYK IUKYGML' RGHCSYXNY UGX MOUM MOY WUALY HZ MOPL CUL UGUMHSYRAKUNPG PGMH COHLY LHWPYME IPYKKY'L CPZY OUX MOKHCG OYK UGX CPMO COHTGUMULOU OUX MKPYX MH YSHIY XAKPGN OYK ZUMOYK'L UVLYGWY, PG HKXYK MH VYTUKKPYX LYWKYMSE.IPYKKY KUPLYX OPL LOHASXYKL UGX SPLMYGYX HIYG-THAMOYX MH COUM CUL MHSXOPT, LWUKWYSE UVSY MH VYSPYBY OPL HCG YUKL. MOUM THKGPGNGUMULOU OUX MHSX OPT MOUM LOY OUX KYQYWMYX VHSRHGLRP."MKHAVSYL, MKHAVSYL, TE XYUK ZYSSHC!" OY LUPX MH IPYKKY. "COUM MKHAVSYLHGY OUL CPMO MOYLY NPKSL CPMOHAM MOYPK THMOYK! P XH LH KYNKYM OUBPGNWHTY OYKY.... P CPSS VY ZKUGR CPMO EHA. OUBY EHA OYUKX LOY OUL VKHRYGHZZ OYK YGNUNYTYGM CPMOHAM WHGLASMPGN UGEVHXE? PM'L MKAY MOPL YGNUNYTYGMGYBYK CUL TAWO MH TE SPRPGN. HZ WHAKLY OY PL UG YDWYSSYGM TUG, VAMLMPSS, CPMO OPL ZUMOYK'L XPLUIIKHBUS MOYE CHASXG'M OUBY VYYG OUIIE, UGXGUMULOU CHG'M SUWR LAPMHKL. LMPSS, PM OUL VYYG NHPGN HG LH SHGN, UGXMH MURY LAWO U LMYI CPMOHAM ZUMOYK'L HK THMOYK'L WHGLYGM! UGX GHC LOY'LPSS, UGX NHX RGHCL COUM! PM'L OUKX, WHAGM, OUKX MH TUGUNY XUANOMYKL PGMOYPK THMOYK'L UVLYGWY...."IPYKKY LUC MOUM MOY WHAGM CUL TAWO AILYM UGX MKPYX MH WOUGNY MOYLAVQYWM, VAM MOY WHAGM KYMAKGYX MH OPL MKHAVSYL.LHGEU YGMYKYX MOY KHHT CPMO UG UNPMUMYX ZUWY."GUMULOU PL GHM JAPMY CYSS; LOY'L PG OYK KHHT UGX CHASX SPRY MH LYY EHA.TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU PL CPMO OYK UGX LOY MHH ULRL EHA MH WHTY.""EYL, EHA UKY U NKYUM ZKPYGX HZ VHSRHGLRP'L, GH XHAVM LOY CUGML MH LYGXOPT U TYLLUNY," LUPX MOY WHAGM. "HO XYUK! HO XYUK! OHC OUIIE PM USSCUL!"UGX WSAMWOPGN MOY LIUKY NKUE SHWRL HG OPL MYTISYL MOY WHAGM SYZM MOYKHHT.COYG TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU MHSX GUMULOU MOUM UGUMHSY CUL TUKKPYX, GUMULOUXPX GHM CPLO MH VYSPYBY PM UGX PGLPLMYX HG OUBPGN PM WHGZPKTYX VE IPYKKYOPTLYSZ. LOY XPX GHM LTPSY HK GHX, VAM HGSE NUFYX ZPDYXSE UMOPT, UGX OYK SHHR ULRYX HGSE HGY MOPGN: CUL OY U ZKPYGX, HK SPRY MOYHMOYKL UG YGYTE PG KYNUKX MH UGUMHSY? "SYM OPT MYSS EHA COYMOYK P OUBY MHSX MOY MKAMO."GUMULOU SHHRYX ZKHT HGY MH MOY HMOYK UL U OAGMYX UGX CHAGXYX UGPTUSSHHRL UM MOY UIIKHUWOPGN XHNL UGX LIHKMLTYG."GUMUSEU PSEGPWOGU," IPYKKY VYNUG, XKHIIPGN OPL YEYL CPMO U ZYYSPGN HZIPME ZHK OYK UGX SHUMOPGN ZHK MOY MOPGN OY OUX MH XH, "COYMOYK PM PLMKAY HK GHM LOHASX TURY GH XPZZYKYGWY MH EHA, VYWUALY...""MOYG PM PL GHM MKAY MOUM OY'L TUKKPYX!""EYL, PM PL MKAY.""OUL OY VYYG TUKKPYX SHGN?" LOY ULRYX, JAPWRSE."EYL, P OUBY QALM LYYG OPT."LOY CUL YBPXYGMSE AGUVSY MH LIYUR UGX TUXY U LPNG CPMO OYK OUGXL MOUMMOYE LOHASX SYUBY OYK USHGY.WOUIMYK DDIPYKKY XPX GHM LMUE ZHK XPGGYK, VAM SYZM MOY KHHT UGX CYGM UCUE UM HGWY.OY XKHBY MOKHANO MOY MHCG LYYRPGN UGUMHSY RAKUNPG, UM MOY MOHANOM HZCOHT GHC MOY VSHHX KALOYX MH OPL OYUKM UGX OY ZYSM U XPZZPWASME PGVKYUMOPGN. MOY ZHHMTUGOUBPGN NKYYMYX OPT, RGHCPGN OPL OUVPML UGX OPL UWJAUPGMUGWYL, MHSX OPTMOYKY CUL U ISUWY SYZM ZHK OPT PG MOY LTUSS XPGPGN KHHT UGX MOUM IKPGWYTPWOUYS FUROUKEWO CUL PG MOY SPVKUKE, VAM IUAS MPTHZYYBPWO OUX GHM EYMUKKPBYX. MOY WHAGMYLL' XKUCPGN KHHT CUL ZASS HZNAYLML.IPYKKY CPMOHAM NKYYMPGN OPL CPZY COHT OY OUX GHM LYYG LPGWY OPLKYMAKG--UM MOUM THTYGM LOY CUL THKY KYIASLPBY MH OPT MOUG YBYK--YGMYKYXMOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX LYYPGN UGUMHSY CYGM AI MH OPT."UO, IPYKKY," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL NHPGN AI MH OYK OALVUGX. "EHA XHG'M RGHCCOUM U ISPNOM HAK UGUMHSY..."LOY LMHIIYX, LYYPGN PG MOY ZHKCUKX MOKALM HZ OYK OALVUGX'L OYUX, PG OPLNSHCPGN YEYL UGX OPL KYLHSAMY NUPM, MOY MYKKPVSY PGXPWUMPHGL HZ MOUMKUNY UGX LMKYGNMO COPWO LOY RGYC UGX OUX OYKLYSZ YDIYKPYGWYX UZMYK OPLXAYS CPMO XHSHROHB."COYKY EHA UKY, MOYKY PL BPWY UGX YBPS!" PM LYYTYX MHIPYKKY MOUM PM CUL OPL XAME MH WHGWYUS MOY COHSY UZZUPK UGX KY-YLMUVSPLOGUMULOU'L KYIAMUMPHG.OY CUL UCUPMPGN IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYMAKG CPMO XKYUX UGX CYGM YBYKE XUE MHMOY HSX IKPGWY'L ZHK GYCL HZ OPT.HSX IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP OYUKX USS MOY KATHKL WAKKYGM PG MOY MHCG ZKHTTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGX OUX KYUX MOY GHMY MH IKPGWYLL TUKE PG COPWOGUMULOU OUX VKHRYG HZZ OYK YGNUNYTYGM. TPSSPHGL HZ TYG, KYGHAGWPGN MOYPK OATUGZYYSPGNL UGX KYULHG, OUX MH NH ZKHT CYLM MH YULM MH LSUE MOYPK ZYSSHCL,QALM UL LHTY WYGMAKPYL IKYBPHALSE OHKXYL HZ TYG OUX WHTY ZKHT MOY YULMMH MOY CYLM, LSUEPGN MOYPK ZYSSHCL.MOY UWMPHGL HZ GUIHSYHG UGX USYDUGXYK, HG COHLY CHKXL MOY YBYGM LYYTYXMH OUGN, CYKY UL SPMMSY BHSAGMUKE UL MOY UWMPHGL HZ UGE LHSXPYK COH CULXKUCG PGMH MOY WUTIUPNG VE SHM HK VE WHGLWKPIMPHG. UGX UL LHHG UL MOYE OUXNHM HAM, PG MOYPK LHURYX UGX LMKYUTPGN WSHMOYL, MOYE LOHAMYX "BPBUM!"UGX SHHRYX YWLMUMPWUSSE UM MOY LIHM COYKY GUIHSYHG OUX VYYG VAM COYKY OYGH SHGNYK CUL UGX UM MOUM THTYGM WHGLPXYKYX MOYTLYSBYL OUIIE.MOUM YBYGPGN, VYMCYYG PLLAPGN HGY HKXYK MOUM MOY ZHKNYX KALLPUG IUIYKTHGYE IKYIUKYX ZHK ALY PG KALLPU LOHASX VY XYSPBYKYX UL JAPWRSE ULIHLLPVSY UGX UGHMOYK MOUM U LUDHG LOHASX VY LOHM, HG COHT U SYMMYKWHGMUPGPGN PGZHKTUMPHG UVHAM MOY HKXYKL MH MOY ZKYGWO UKTE OUX VYYGZHAGX, GUIHSYHG USLH NUBY PGLMKAWMPHGL MOUM MOY IHSPLO WHSHGYS COHOUX GYYXSYLLSE ISAGNYX PGMH MOY KPBYK LOHASX VY YGKHSSYX PG MOY SYNPHGX'OHGGYAK HZ COPWO GUIHSYHG CUL OPTLYSZ MOY OYUX.JAHL BASM IYKXYKY XYTYGMUM. *    * MOHLY COHT (NHX) CPLOYL MH XYLMKHE OY XKPBYL TUX.WOUIMYK PPPMOY YTIYKHK HZ KALLPU OUX, TYUGCOPSY, VYYG PG BPSGU ZHK THKY MOUG UTHGMO, KYBPYCPGN MKHHIL UGX OHSXPGN TUGYABYKL. GHMOPGN CUL KYUXE ZHK MOYCUK MOUM YBYKEHGY YDIYWMYX UGX MH IKYIUKY ZHK COPWO MOY YTIYKHK OUX WHTYZKHT IYMYKLVAKN. MOYKY CUL GH NYGYKUS ISUG HZ UWMPHG. MOY BUWPSSUMPHGVYMCYYG MOY BUKPHAL ISUGL MOUM CYKY IKHIHLYX OUX YBYG PGWKYULYX UZMYKMOY YTIYKHK OUX VYYG UM OYUXJAUKMYKL ZHK U THGMO. VAM KHEUAMY HVSPNY! * UGX OY ZYSM PM PGWATVYGM HGOPT, UL U RPGN UGX UG USSE, MH WHGZYK HG LMUMY UZZUPKL CPMO USYDUGXYK'LYGBHE. OY KYZYKKYX MH MOY ZUWM MOUMMOY YTIYKHK GUIHSYHG OUX KYLYGMYX MOY XYTUGX MOUM OY LOHASX CPMOXKUC OPLMKHHIL ZKHT IKALLPU, YLIYWPUSSE COYG MOUM XYTUGX VYWUTY NYGYKUSSE RGHCGUGX MOY XPNGPME HZ ZKUGWY CUL MOYKYVE HZZYGXYX.    * "KHEUSME OUL PML HVSPNUMPHGL."VUSULOYB KYISPYX MOUM MOYKY CUL "GHMOPGN HZZYGLPBY PG MOY XYTUGX,VYWUALY..." VAM TAKUM PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."MOYG EHA XHG'M WHGLPXYK MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK MOY UNNKYLLHK?" OY ULRYXAGYDIYWMYXSE, CPMO U RPGXSE UGX ZHHSPLO LTPSY.VUSULOYB MHSX OPT COE OY WHGLPXYKYX GUIHSYHG MH VY MOY HKPNPGUMHK HZ MOYCUK."HO, TE XYUK NYGYKUS!" TAKUM UNUPG PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, "CPMO USS TE OYUKM PCPLO MOY YTIYKHKL TUE UKKUGNY MOY UZZUPK VYMCYYG MOYT, UGX MOUM MOY CUKVYNAG VE GH CPLO HZ TPGY TUE ZPGPLO UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY!" LUPX OY,PG MOY MHGY HZ U LYKBUGM COH CUGML MH KYTUPG NHHX ZKPYGXL CPMO UGHMOYKXYLIPMY U JAUKKYS VYMCYYG MOYPK TULMYKL.UGX OY CYGM HG MH PGJAPKPYL UVHAM MOY NKUGX XARY UGX MOY LMUMY HZ OPLOYUSMO, UGX MH KYTPGPLWYGWYL HZ MOY NUE UGX UTALPGN MPTYL OY OUX LIYGMCPMO OPT PG GUISYL. MOYG LAXXYGSE, UL PZ KYTYTVYKPGN OPL KHEUS XPNGPME,TAKUM LHSYTGSE XKYC OPTLYSZ AI, ULLATYX MOY IHLY PG COPWO OY OUX LMHHXUM OPL WHKHGUMPHG, UGX, CUBPGN OPL KPNOM UKT, LUPX:"P CHG'M XYMUPG EHA SHGNYK, NYGYKUS. P CPLO LAWWYLL MH EHAK TPLLPHG,"UGX CPMO OPL YTVKHPXYKYX KYX TUGMSY, OPL ZSHCPGN ZYUMOYKL, UGX OPLNSPMMYKPGN HKGUTYGML, OY KYQHPGYX OPL LAPMY COH CYKY KYLIYWMZASSEUCUPMPGN OPT.VUSULOYB KHXY HG, LAIIHLPGN ZKHT TAKUM'L CHKXL MOUM OY CHASX BYKE LHHGVY VKHANOM VYZHKY GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ. VAM PGLMYUX HZ MOUM, UM MOY GYDMBPSSUNY MOY LYGMPGYSL HZ XUBHAM'L PGZUGMKE WHKIL XYMUPGYX OPT ULMOY IPWRYML HZ MOY BUGNAUKX OUX XHGY, UGX UG UXQAMUGM HZ MOY WHKILWHTTUGXYK, COH CUL ZYMWOYX, WHGXAWMYX OPT PGMH MOY BPSSUNY MH TUKLOUSXUBHAM.WOUIMYK BXUBHAM CUL MH GUIHSYHG COUM UKURWOYYB CUL MH USYDUGXYK--MOHANO GHM UWHCUKX SPRY UKURWOYYB, OY CUL UL IKYWPLY, UL WKAYS, UGX UL AGUVSY MHYDIKYLL OPL XYBHMPHG MH OPL THGUKWO YDWYIM VE WKAYSME.PG MOY HKNUGPLT HZ LMUMYL LAWO TYG UKY GYWYLLUKE, UL CHSBYL UKYGYWYLLUKE PG MOY HKNUGPLT HZ GUMAKY, UGX MOYE USCUEL YDPLM, USCUELUIIYUK UGX OHSX MOYPK HCG, OHCYBYK PGWHGNKAHAL MOYPK IKYLYGWY UGX MOYPKIKHDPTPME MH MOY OYUX HZ MOY NHBYKGTYGM TUE VY. MOPL PGYBPMUVPSPME USHGYWUG YDISUPG OHC MOY WKAYS UKURWOYYB, COH MHKY HAM U NKYGUXPYK'L TALMUWOYCPMO OPL HCG OUGXL, COHLY CYUR GYKBYL KYGXYKYX OPT AGUVSY MH ZUWYXUGNYK, UGX COH CUL GYPMOYK UG YXAWUMYX TUG GHK U WHAKMPYK, CUL UVSY MHTUPGMUPG OPL IHCYKZAS IHLPMPHG CPMO USYDUGXYK, COHLY HCG WOUKUWMYK CULWOPBUSKHAL, GHVSY, UGX NYGMSY.VUSULOYB ZHAGX XUBHAM LYUMYX HG U VUKKYS PG MOY LOYX HZ U IYULUGM'L OAM,CKPMPGN--OY CUL UAXPMPGN UWWHAGML. VYMMYK JAUKMYKL WHASX OUBY VYYGZHAGX OPT, VAM TUKLOUS XUBHAM CUL HGY HZ MOHLY TYG COH IAKIHLYSE IAMMOYTLYSBYL PG THLM XYIKYLLPGN WHGXPMPHGL MH OUBY U QALMPZPWUMPHG ZHKVYPGN NSHHTE. ZHK MOY LUTY KYULHG MOYE UKY USCUEL OUKX UM CHKR UGX PG UOAKKE. "OHC WUG P MOPGR HZ MOY VKPNOM LPXY HZ SPZY COYG, UL EHA LYY, PUT LPMMPGN HG U VUKKYS UGX CHKRPGN PG U XPKME LOYX?" MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZOPL ZUWY LYYTYX MH LUE. MOY WOPYZ ISYULAKY UGX GYWYLLPME HZ LAWO TYG,COYG MOYE YGWHAGMYK UGEHGY COH LOHCL UGPTUMPHG, PL MH ZSUAGM MOYPK HCGXKYUKE, IYKLPLMYGM UWMPBPME. XUBHAM USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MOUM ISYULAKY COYGVUSULOYB CUL VKHANOM PG. OY VYWUTY LMPSS THKY UVLHKVYX PG OPL MULR COYGMOY KALLPUG NYGYKUS YGMYKYX, UGX UZMYK NSUGWPGN HBYK OPL LIYWMUWSYL UMVUSULOYB'L ZUWY, COPWO CUL UGPTUMYX VE MOY VYUAME HZ MOY THKGPGN UGXVE OPL MUSR CPMO TAKUM, OY XPX GHM KPLY HK YBYG LMPK, VAM LWHCSYX LMPSSTHKY UGX LGYYKYX TUSYBHSYGMSE.COYG OY GHMPWYX PG VUSULOYB'L ZUWY MOY XPLUNKYYUVSY PTIKYLLPHG MOPLKYWYIMPHG IKHXAWYX, XUBHAM KUPLYX OPL OYUX UGX WHSXSE ULRYX COUM OYCUGMYX.MOPGRPGN OY WHASX OUBY VYYG KYWYPBYX PG LAWO U TUGGYK HGSE VYWUALYXUBHAM XPX GHM RGHC MOUM OY CUL UXQAMUGM NYGYKUS MH MOY YTIYKHKUSYDUGXYK UGX YBYG OPL YGBHE MH GUIHSYHG, VUSULOYB OULMYGYX MH PGZHKTOPT HZ OPL KUGR UGX TPLLPHG. WHGMKUKE MH OPL YDIYWMUMPHG, XUBHAM, UZMYKOYUKPGN OPT, VYWUTY LMPSS LAKSPYK UGX KAXYK."COYKY PL EHAK XPLIUMWO?" OY PGJAPKYX. "NPBY PM MH TY. P CPSS LYGX PM MHMOY YTIYKHK."VUSULOYB KYISPYX MOUM OY OUX VYYG HKXYKYX MH OUGX PM IYKLHGUSSE MH MOYYTIYKHK."EHAK YTIYKHK'L HKXYKL UKY HVYEYX PG EHAK UKTE, VAM OYKY," LUPX XUBHAM,"EHA TALM XH UL EHA'KY MHSX."UGX, UL PZ MH TURY MOY KALLPUG NYGYKUS LMPSS THKY WHGLWPHAL HZ OPLXYIYGXYGWY HG VKAMY ZHKWY, XUBHAM LYGM UG UXQAMUGM MH WUSS MOY HZZPWYKHG XAME.VUSULOYB MHHR HAM MOY IUWRYM WHGMUPGPGN MOY YTIYKHK'L SYMMYK UGX SUPX PMHG MOY MUVSY (TUXY HZ U XHHK CPMO PML OPGNYL LMPSS OUGNPGN HG PM, SUPXUWKHLL MCH VUKKYSL). XUBHAM MHHR MOY IUWRYM UGX KYUX MOY PGLWKPIMPHG."EHA UKY IYKZYWMSE UM SPVYKME MH MKYUM TY CPMO KYLIYWM HK GHM,"IKHMYLMYX VUSULOYB, "VAM IYKTPM TY MH HVLYKBY MOUM P OUBY MOY OHGHK MHVY UXQAMUGM NYGYKUS MH OPL TUQYLME...."XUBHAM NSUGWYX UM OPT LPSYGMSE UGX ISUPGSE XYKPBYX ISYULAKY ZKHT MOYLPNGL HZ UNPMUMPHG UGX WHGZALPHG COPWO UIIYUKYX HG VUSULOYB'L ZUWY."EHA CPSS VY MKYUMYX UL PL ZPMMPGN," LUPX OY UGX, IAMMPGN MOY IUWRYM PGOPL IHWRYM, SYZM MOY LOYX.U TPGAMY SUMYK MOY TUKLOUS'L UXQAMUGM, XY WULMKYL, WUTY PG UGX WHGXAWMYXVUSULOYB MH MOY JAUKMYKL ULLPNGYX OPT.MOUM XUE OY XPGYX CPMO MOY TUKLOUS, UM MOY LUTY VHUKX HG MOY VUKKYSL.GYDM XUE XUBHAM KHXY HAM YUKSE UGX, UZMYK ULRPGN VUSULOYB MH WHTY MHOPT, IYKYTIMHKPSE KYJAYLMYX OPT MH KYTUPG MOYKY, MH THBY HG CPMO MOYVUNNUNY MKUPG LOHASX HKXYKL WHTY ZHK PM MH THBY, UGX MH MUSR MH GH HGYYDWYIM THGLPYAK XY WULMKYL.UZMYK ZHAK XUEL HZ LHSPMAXY, YGGAP, UGX WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OPL PTIHMYGWYUGX PGLPNGPZPWUGWY--IUKMPWASUKSE UWAMY VE WHGMKULM CPMO MOY LIOYKY HZIHCYK PG COPWO OY OUX LH SUMYSE THBYX--UGX UZMYK LYBYKUS TUKWOYL CPMOMOY TUKLOUS'L VUNNUNY UGX MOY ZKYGWO UKTE, COPWO HWWAIPYX MOYCOHSY XPLMKPWM, VUSULOYB CUL VKHANOM MH BPSGU--GHC HWWAIPYX VE MOYZKYGWO--MOKHANO MOY BYKE NUMY VE COPWO OY OUX SYZM PM ZHAK XUELIKYBPHALSE.GYDM XUE MOY PTIYKPUS NYGMSYTUG-PG-CUPMPGN, MOY WHTMY XY MAKYGGY, WUTYMH VUSULOYB UGX PGZHKTYX OPT HZ MOY YTIYKHK GUIHSYHG'L CPLO MH OHGHK OPTCPMO UG UAXPYGWY.ZHAK XUEL VYZHKY, LYGMPGYSL HZ MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR KYNPTYGM OUX LMHHX PGZKHGM HZ MOY OHALY MH COPWO VUSULOYB CUL WHGXAWMYX, UGX GHC MCH ZKYGWONKYGUXPYKL LMHHX MOYKY PG VSAY AGPZHKTL AGZULMYGYX PG ZKHGM UGX CPMOLOUNNE WUIL HG MOYPK OYUXL, UGX UG YLWHKM HZ OALLUKL UGX AOSUGL UGX UVKPSSPUGM LAPMY HZ UPXYL-XY-WUTI, IUNYL, UGX NYGYKUSL, COH CYKY CUPMPGNZHK GUIHSYHG MH WHTY HAM, CYKY LMUGXPGN UM MOY IHKWO, KHAGX OPL LUXXSYOHKLY UGX OPL TUTYSARY, KALMUG. GUIHSYHG KYWYPBYX VUSULOYB PG MOY BYKEOHALY PG BPSGU ZKHT COPWO USYDUGXYK OUX XPLIUMWOYX OPT HG OPL TPLLPHG.WOUIMYK BPMOHANO VUSULOYB CUL ALYX MH PTIYKPUS IHTI, OY CUL UTUFYX UM MOY SADAKEUGX TUNGPZPWYGWY HZ GUIHSYHG'L WHAKM.MOY WHTMY XY MAKYGGY LOHCYX OPT PGMH U VPN KYWYIMPHG KHHT COYKY TUGENYGYKUSL, NYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGN, UGX IHSPLO TUNGUMYL--LYBYKUS HZ COHTVUSULOYB OUX LYYG UM MOY WHAKM HZ MOY YTIYKHK HZ KALLPU--CYKY CUPMPGN.XAKHW LUPX MOUM GUIHSYHG CHASX KYWYPBY MOY KALLPUG NYGYKUS VYZHKY NHPGNZHK OPL KPXY.UZMYK LHTY TPGAMYL, MOY NYGMSYTUG-PG-CUPMPGN COH CUL HG XAME WUTY PGMHMOY NKYUM KYWYIMPHG KHHT UGX, VHCPGN IHSPMYSE, ULRYX VUSULOYB MH ZHSSHCOPT.VUSULOYB CYGM PGMH U LTUSS KYWYIMPHG KHHT, HGY XHHK HZ COPWO SYX PGMH ULMAXE, MOY BYKE HGY ZKHT COPWO MOY KALLPUG YTIYKHK OUX XPLIUMWOYX OPTHG OPL TPLLPHG. OY LMHHX U TPGAMY HK MCH, CUPMPGN. OY OYUKX OAKKPYXZHHMLMYIL VYEHGX MOY XHHK, VHMO OUSBYL HZ PM CYKY HIYGYX KUIPXSE; USSCUL LPSYGM UGX MOYG ZKHT MOY LMAXE MOY LHAGX CUL OYUKX HZ HMOYK LMYIL,ZPKT UGX KYLHSAMY--MOYE CYKY MOHLY HZ GUIHSYHG. OY OUX QALM ZPGPLOYXXKYLLPGN ZHK OPL KPXY, UGX CHKY U VSAY AGPZHKT, HIYGPGN PG ZKHGM HBYKU COPMY CUPLMWHUM LH SHGN MOUM PM WHBYKYX OPL KHMAGX LMHTUWO, COPMYSYUMOYK VKYYWOYL MPNOMSE ZPMMPGN MOY ZUM MOPNOL HZ OPL LOHKM SYNL, UGXOYLLPUG VHHML. OPL LOHKM OUPK OUX YBPXYGMSE QALM VYYG VKALOYX, VAM HGYSHWR OAGN XHCG PG MOY TPXXSY HZ OPL VKHUX ZHKYOYUX. OPL ISATI COPMY GYWRLMHHX HAM LOUKISE UVHBY MOY VSUWR WHSSUK HZ OPL AGPZHKT, UGX OY LTYSSYXHZ YUA XY WHSHNGY. OPL ZASS ZUWY, KUMOYK EHAGN-SHHRPGN, CPMO PMLIKHTPGYGM WOPG, CHKY U NKUWPHAL UGX TUQYLMPW YDIKYLLPHG HZ PTIYKPUSCYSWHTY.OY YGMYKYX VKPLRSE, CPMO U QYKR UM YBYKE LMYI UGX OPL OYUX LSPNOMSEMOKHCG VUWR. OPL COHSY LOHKM WHKIASYGM ZPNAKY CPMO VKHUX MOPWRLOHASXYKL, UGX WOYLM UGX LMHTUWO PGBHSAGMUKPSE IKHMKAXPGN, OUX MOUMPTIHLPGN UGX LMUMYSE UIIYUKUGWY HGY LYYL PG TYG HZ ZHKME COH SPBY PGWHTZHKM. PM CUL YBPXYGM, MHH, MOUM OY CUL PG MOY VYLM HZ LIPKPML MOUMXUE.OY GHXXYX PG UGLCYK MH VUSULOUB'L SHC UGX KYLIYWMZAS VHC, UGX WHTPGN AIMH OPT UM HGWY VYNUG LIYURPGN SPRY U TUG COH BUSAYL YBYKE THTYGM HZ OPLMPTY UGX XHYL GHM WHGXYLWYGX MH IKYIUKY COUM OY OUL MH LUE VAM PL LAKYOY CPSS USCUEL LUE MOY KPNOM MOPGN UGX LUE PM CYSS."NHHX XUE, NYGYKUS!" LUPX OY. "P OUBY KYWYPBYX MOY SYMMYK EHA VKHANOMZKHT MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK UGX UT BYKE NSUX MH LYY EHA." OY NSUGWYX CPMOOPL SUKNY YEYL PGMH VUSULOUB'L ZUWY UGX PTTYXPUMYSE SHHRYX IULM OPT.PM CUL ISUPG MOUM VUSULOYB'L IYKLHGUSPME XPX GHM PGMYKYLM OPT UM USS.YBPXYGMSE HGSE COUM MHHR ISUWY CPMOPG OPL HCG TPGX PGMYKYLMYX OPT.GHMOPGN HAMLPXY OPTLYSZ OUX UGE LPNGPZPWUGWY ZHK OPT, VYWUALY YBYKEMOPGNPG MOY CHKSX, PM LYYTYX MH OPT, XYIYGXYX YGMPKYSE HG OPL CPSS."P XH GHM, UGX XPX GHM, XYLPKY CUK," OY WHGMPGAYX, "VAM PM OUL VYYGZHKWYX HG TY. YBYG GHC" (OY YTIOULPFYX MOY CHKX) "P UT KYUXE MH KYWYPBYUGE YDISUGUMPHGL EHA WUG NPBY TY."UGX OY VYNUG WSYUKSE UGX WHGWPLYSE MH YDISUPG OPL KYULHGL ZHKXPLLUMPLZUWMPHG CPMO MOY KALLPUG NHBYKGTYGM. QAXNPGN VE MOY WUSTSETHXYKUMY UGX UTPWUVSY MHGY PG COPWO MOY ZKYGWO YTIYKHK LIHRY, VUSULOYBCUL ZPKTSE IYKLAUXYX MOUM OY CPLOYX ZHK IYUWY UGX PGMYGXYX MH YGMYK PGMHGYNHMPUMPHGL.COYG GUIHSYHG, OUBPGN ZPGPLOYX LIYURPGN, SHHRYX PGJAPKPGNSE UM MOYKALLPUG YGBHE, VUSULOYB VYNUG U LIYYWO OY OUX IKYIUKYX SHGN VYZHKY:"LPKY! MOY YTIYKHK, TE TULMYK..." VAM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L YEYLVYGM HG OPT WHGZALYX OPT. "EHA UKY ZSAKKPYX--WHTIHLY EHAKLYSZ!" GUIHSYHGLYYTYX MH LUE, UL CPMO U LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY LTPSY OY SHHRYX UMVUSULOYB'L AGPZHKT UGX LCHKX.VUSULOYB KYWHBYKYX OPTLYSZ UGX VYNUG MH LIYUR. OY LUPX MOUM MOYYTIYKHK USYDUGXYK XPX GHM WHGLPXYK RAKURPG'L XYTUGX ZHK OPL IULLIHKML ULAZZPWPYGM WUALY ZHK CUK; MOUM RAKURPG OUX UWMYX HG OPL HCG PGPMPUMPBYUGX CPMOHAM OPL LHBYKYPNG'L ULLYGM, MOUM MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK XPX GHMXYLPKY CUK, UGX OUX GH KYSUMPHGL CPMO YGNSUGX."GHM EYM!" PGMYKIHLYX GUIHSYHG, UGX, UL PZ ZYUKPGN MH NPBY BYGM MH OPLZYYSPGNL, OY ZKHCGYX UGX GHXXYX LSPNOMSE UL U LPNG MOUM VUSULOYB TPNOMIKHWYYX.UZMYK LUEPGN USS OY OUX VYYG PGLMKAWMYX MH LUE, VUSULOYB UXXYX MOUMMOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK CPLOYX ZHK IYUWY, VAM CHASX GHM YGMYK PGMHGYNHMPUMPHGL YDWYIM HG WHGXPMPHG MOUM... OYKY VUSULOYB OYLPMUMYX:OY KYTYTVYKYX MOY CHKXL MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK OUX GHM CKPMMYG PG OPLSYMMYK, VAM OUX LIYWPUSSE PGLYKMYX PG MOY KYLWKPIM MH LUSMERHB UGX OUXMHSX VUSULOYB MH KYIYUM MH GUIHSYHG. VUSULOYB KYTYTVYKYX MOYLY CHKXL,"LH SHGN UL U LPGNSY UKTYX ZHY KYTUPGL HG KALLPUG LHPS," VAM LHTYWHTISYD ZYYSPGN KYLMKUPGYX OPT. OY WHASX GHM AMMYK MOYT, MOHANO OYCPLOYX MH XH LH. OY NKYC WHGZALYX UGX LUPX: "HG WHGXPMPHG MOUM MOYZKYGWO UKTE KYMPKYL VYEHGX MOY GPYTYG."GUIHSYHG GHMPWYX VUSULOYB'L YTVUKKULLTYGM COYG AMMYKPGN MOYLY SULMCHKXL; OPL ZUWY MCPMWOYX UGX MOY WUSZ HZ OPL SYZM SYN VYNUG MH JAPBYKKOEMOTPWUSSE. CPMOHAM THBPGN ZKHT COYKY OY LMHHX OY VYNUG LIYURPGN PGU SHAXYK MHGY UGX THKY OAKKPYXSE MOUG VYZHKY. XAKPGN MOY LIYYWO MOUMZHSSHCYX, VUSULOYB, COH THKY MOUG HGWY SHCYKYX OPL YEYL, PGBHSAGMUKPSEGHMPWYX MOY JAPBYKPGN HZ GUIHSYHG'L SYZM SYN COPWO PGWKYULYX MOY THKYGUIHSYHG KUPLYX OPL BHPWY."P XYLPKY IYUWY, GH SYLL MOUG MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK," OY VYNUG. "OUBYP GHM ZHK YPNOMYYG THGMOL VYYG XHPGN YBYKEMOPGN MH HVMUPG PM? POUBY CUPMYX YPNOMYYG THGMOL ZHK YDISUGUMPHGL. VAM PG HKXYK MH VYNPGGYNHMPUMPHGL, COUM PL XYTUGXYX HZ TY?" OY LUPX, ZKHCGPGN UGX TURPGN UGYGYKNYMPW NYLMAKY HZ PGJAPKE CPMO OPL LTUSS COPMY ISATI OUGX."MOY CPMOXKUCUS HZ EHAK UKTE VYEHGX MOY GPYTYG, LPKY," KYISPYX VUSULOYB."MOY GPYTYG?" KYIYUMYX GUIHSYHG. "LH GHC EHA CUGM TY MH KYMPKY VYEHGXMOY GPYTYG--HGSE MOY GPYTYG?" KYIYUMYX GUIHSYHG, SHHRPGN LMKUPNOM UMVUSULOYB.MOY SUMMYK VHCYX OPL OYUX KYLIYWMZASSE.PGLMYUX HZ MOY XYTUGX HZ ZHAK THGMOL YUKSPYK MH CPMOXKUC ZKHT IHTYKUGPU,HGSE U CPMOXKUCUS VYEHGX MOY GPYTYG CUL GHC XYTUGXYX. GUIHSYHG MAKGYXJAPWRSE UGX VYNUG MH IUWY MOY KHHT."EHA LUE MOY XYTUGX GHC PL MOUM P UT MH CPMOXKUC VYEHGX MOY GPYTYGVYZHKY WHTTYGWPGN GYNHMPUMPHGL, VAM PG QALM MOY LUTY CUE MCH THGMOL UNHMOY XYTUGX CUL MOUM P LOHASX CPMOXKUC VYEHGX MOY BPLMASU UGX MOY HXYK,UGX EYM EHA UKY CPSSPGN MH GYNHMPUMY."OY CYGM PG LPSYGWY ZKHT HGY WHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT MH MOY HMOYK UGX UNUPGLMHIIYX PG ZKHGM HZ VUSULOYB. VUSULOYB GHMPWYX MOUM OPL SYZM SYN CULJAPBYKPGN ZULMYK MOUG VYZHKY UGX OPL ZUWY LYYTYX IYMKPZPYX PG PML LMYKGYDIKYLLPHG. MOPL JAPBYKPGN HZ OPL SYZM SYN CUL U MOPGN GUIHSYHG CULWHGLWPHAL HZ. "MOY BPVKUMPHG HZ TE SYZM WUSZ PL U NKYUM LPNG CPMO TY,"OY KYTUKRYX UM U SUMYK XUMY."LAWO XYTUGXL UL MH KYMKYUM VYEHGX MOY BPLMASU UGX HXYK TUE VY TUXY MH UIKPGWY HZ VUXYG, VAM GHM MH TY!" GUIHSYHG USTHLM LWKYUTYX, JAPMY MH OPLHCG LAKIKPLY. "PZ EHA NUBY TY IYMYKLVAKN UGX THLWHC P WHASX GHM UWWYIMLAWO WHGXPMPHGL. EHA LUE P OUBY VYNAG MOPL CUK! VAM COH ZPKLM QHPGYX OPLUKTE? MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK, GHM P! UGX EHA HZZYK TY GYNHMPUMPHGL COYG POUBY YDIYGXYX TPSSPHGL, COYG EHA UKY PG USSPUGWY CPMO YGNSUGX, UGX COYGEHAK IHLPMPHG PL U VUX HGY. EHA HZZYK TY GYNHMPUMPHGL! VAM COUM PL MOYUPT HZ EHAK USSPUGWY CPMO YGNSUGX? COUM OUL LOY NPBYG EHA?" OY WHGMPGAYXOAKKPYXSE, YBPXYGMSE GH SHGNYK MKEPGN MH LOHC MOY UXBUGMUNYL HZ IYUWYUGX XPLWALL PML IHLLPVPSPME, VAM HGSE MH IKHBY OPL HCG KYWMPMAXY UGXIHCYK UGX USYDUGXYK'L YKKHKL UGX XAISPWPME.MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ OPL LIYYWO OUX HVBPHALSE VYYG TUXY CPMO MOYPGMYGMPHG HZ XYTHGLMKUMPGN MOY UXBUGMUNYL HZ OPL IHLPMPHG UGX LOHCPGNMOUM OY CUL GYBYKMOYSYLL CPSSPGN MH GYNHMPUMY. VAM OY OUX VYNAG MUSRPGN,UGX MOY THKY OY MUSRYX MOY SYLL WHASX OY WHGMKHS OPL CHKXL.MOY COHSY IAKIHKM HZ OPL KYTUKRL GHC CUL YBPXYGMSE MH YDUSM OPTLYSZ UGXPGLASM USYDUGXYK--QALM COUM OY OUX SYULM XYLPKYX UM MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZMOY PGMYKBPYC."P OYUK EHA OUBY TUXY IYUWY CPMO MAKRYE?"VUSULOYB VHCYX OPL OYUX UZZPKTUMPBYSE."IYUWY OUL VYYG WHGWSAXYX..." OY VYNUG.VAM GUIHSYHG XPX GHM SYM OPT LIYUR. OY YBPXYGMSE CUGMYX MH XH USS MOYMUSRPGN OPTLYSZ, UGX WHGMPGAYX MH MUSR CPMO MOY LHKM HZ YSHJAYGWY UGXAGKYLMKUPGYX PKKPMUVPSPME MH COPWO LIHPSYX IYHISY UKY LH IKHGY."EYL, P RGHC EHA OUBY TUXY IYUWY CPMO MOY MAKRL CPMOHAM HVMUPGPGNTHSXUBPU UGX CUSSUWOPU; P CHASX OUBY NPBYG EHAK LHBYKYPNG MOHLYIKHBPGWYL UL P NUBY OPT ZPGSUGX. EYL," OY CYGM HG, "P IKHTPLYX UGX CHASXOUBY NPBYG MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK THSXUBPU UGX CUSSUWOPU, UGX GHC OYCHG'M OUBY MOHLY LISYGXPX IKHBPGWYL. EYM OY TPNOM OUBY AGPMYX MOYT MHOPL YTIPKY UGX PG U LPGNSY KYPNG CHASX OUBY YDMYGXYX KALLPU ZKHT MOYNASZ HZ VHMOGPU MH MOY THAMOL HZ MOY XUGAVY. WUMOYKPGY MOY NKYUM WHASXGHM OUBY XHGY THKY," LUPX GUIHSYHG, NKHCPGN THKY UGX THKY YDWPMYX UL OYIUWYX AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT, KYIYUMPGN MH VUSULOYB USTHLM MOY BYKE CHKXLOY OUX ALYX MH USYDUGXYK OPTLYSZ UM MPSLPM. "USS MOUM, OY CHASX OUBYHCYX MH TE ZKPYGXLOPI. HO, COUM U LISYGXPX KYPNG!" OY KYIYUMYX LYBYKUSMPTYL, MOYG IUALYX, XKYC ZKHT OPL IHWRYM U NHSX LGAZZVHD, SPZMYX PM MHOPL GHLY, UGX NKYYXPSE LGPZZYX UM PM."COUM U LISYGXPX KYPNG MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK'L TPNOM OUBY VYYG!"OY SHHRYX WHTIULLPHGUMYSE UM VUSULOYB, UGX UL LHHG UL MOY SUMMYK MKPYXMH TURY LHTY KYQHPGXYK OULMPSE PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."COUM WHASX OY CPLO HK SHHR ZHK MOUM OY CHASX GHM OUBY HVMUPGYXMOKHANO TE ZKPYGXLOPI?" XYTUGXYX GUIHSYHG, LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKLPG IYKISYDPME. "VAM GH, OY OUL IKYZYKKYX MH LAKKHAGX OPTLYSZ CPMOTE YGYTPYL, UGX CPMO COHT? CPMO LMYPGL, UKTZYSXML, VYGGPNLYGL, UGXCPGMFPGNYKHXYL! LMYPG, U MKUPMHK YDIYSSYX ZKHT OPL HCG WHAGMKE;UKTZYSXM, U KURY UGX UG PGMKPNAYK; CPGMFPGNYKHXY, U ZANPMPBY ZKYGWOLAVQYWM; VYGGPNLYG, KUMOYK THKY HZ U LHSXPYK MOUG MOY HMOYKL, VAM USSMOY LUTY UG PGWHTIYMYGM COH CUL AGUVSY MH XH UGEMOPGN PG 1807 UGX COHLOHASX UCURYG MYKKPVSY TYTHKPYL PG MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK'L TPGX....NKUGMYX MOUM CYKY MOYE WHTIYMYGM MOYE TPNOM VY TUXY ALY HZ," WHGMPGAYXGUIHSYHG--OUKXSE UVSY MH RYYI IUWY PG CHKXL CPMO MOY KALO HZ MOHANOMLMOUM PGWYLLUGMSE LIKUGN AI, IKHBPGN OHC KPNOM UGX LMKHGN OY CUL (PG OPLIYKWYIMPHG MOY MCH CYKY HGY UGX MOY LUTY)--"VAM MOYE UKY GHM YBYG MOUM!MOYE UKY GYPMOYK ZPM ZHK CUK GHK IYUWY! VUKWSUE PL LUPX MH VY MOYTHLM WUIUVSY HZ MOYT USS, VAM P WUGGHM LUE LH, QAXNPGN VE OPL ZPKLMTHBYTYGML. UGX COUM UKY MOYE XHPGN, USS MOYLY WHAKMPYKL? IZAYS IKHIHLYL,UKTZYSXM XPLIAMYL, VYGGPNLYG WHGLPXYKL, UGX VUKWSUE, WUSSYX HG MH UWM,XHYL GHM RGHC COUM MH XYWPXY HG, UGX MPTY IULLYL VKPGNPGN GH KYLASM.VUNKUMPHG USHGY PL U TPSPMUKE TUG. OY'L LMAIPX, VAM OY OUL YDIYKPYGWY,U JAPWR YEY, UGX KYLHSAMPHG.... UGX COUM KHSY PL EHAK EHAGN THGUKWOISUEPGN PG MOUM THGLMKHAL WKHCX? LUPX GUIHSYHG, YBPXYGMSE AMMYKPGNMOYLY CHKXL UL U XPKYWM WOUSSYGNY MH MOY YTIYKHK. GUIHSYHG PGMYKKAIMYX OPT. "P RGHC YBYKEMOPGN. PRGHC MOY GATVYK HZ EHAK VUMMUSPHGL UL YDUWMSE UL P RGHC TE HCG. EHA OUBYGHM MCH OAGXKYX MOHALUGX TYG, UGX P OUBY MOKYY MPTYL MOUM GATVYK. P NPBYEHA TE CHKX HZ OHGHK," LUPX GUIHSYHG, ZHKNYMMPGN MOUM OPL CHKX HZ OHGHKWHASX WUKKE GH CYPNOM--"P NPBY EHA TE CHKX HZ OHGHK MOUM P OUBY ZPBYOAGXKYX UGX MOPKME MOHALUGX TYG MOPL LPXY HZ MOY BPLMASU. MOY MAKRL CPSSVY HZ GH ALY MH EHA; MOYE UKY CHKMO GHMOPGN UGX OUBY LOHCG PM VE TURPGNIYUWY CPMO EHA. UL ZHK MOY LCYXYL--PM PL MOYPK ZUMY MH VY NHBYKGYXVE TUX RPGNL. MOYPK RPGN CUL PGLUGY UGX MOYE WOUGNYX OPT ZHKUGHMOYK--VYKGUXHMMY, COH IKHTIMSE CYGM TUX--ZHK GH LCYXY CHASX USSEOPTLYSZ CPMO KALLPU AGSYLL OY CYKY TUX."GUIHSYHG NKPGGYX TUSPWPHALSE UGX UNUPG KUPLYX OPL LGAZZVHD MH OPL GHLY.VUSULOYB RGYC OHC MH KYISE MH YUWO HZ GUIHSYHG'L KYTUKRL, UGX CHASXOUBY XHGY LH; OY WHGMPGAUSSE TUXY MOY NYLMAKY HZ U TUG CPLOPGN MH LUELHTYMOPGN, VAM GUIHSYHG USCUEL PGMYKKAIMYX OPT. MH MOY USSYNYX PGLUGPMEHZ MOY LCYXYL, VUSULOYB CPLOYX MH KYISE MOUM COYG KALLPU PL HG OYK LPXYLCYXYG PL IKUWMPWUSSE UG PLSUGX: VAM GUIHSYHG NUBY UG UGNKE YDWSUTUMPHGMH XKHCG OPL BHPWY. GUIHSYHG CUL PG MOUM LMUMY HZ PKKPMUVPSPME PG COPWOU TUG OUL MH MUSR, MUSR, UGX MUSR, TYKYSE MH WHGBPGWY OPTLYSZ MOUM OY PLPG MOY KPNOM. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUMOY OUX SHGN VYYG WHGBPGWYX MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY ZHK OPT MH TURY UTPLMURY, UGX MOUM PG OPL IYKWYIMPHG COUMYBYK OY XPX CUL KPNOM, GHMVYWUALY PM OUKTHGPFYX CPMO UGE PXYU HZ KPNOM UGX CKHGN, VAM VYWUALY OYXPX PM.MOY YTIYKHK CUL PG BYKE NHHX LIPKPML UZMYK OPL KPXY MOKHANO BPSGU, COYKYWKHCXL HZ IYHISY OUX KUIMAKHALSE NKYYMYX UGX ZHSSHCYX OPT. ZKHT USSMOY CPGXHCL HZ MOY LMKYYML MOKHANO COPWO OY KHXY, KANL, ZSUNL, UGX OPLTHGHNKUT CYKY XPLISUEYX, UGX MOY IHSPLO SUXPYL, CYSWHTPGN OPT, CUBYXMOYPK OUGXRYKWOPYZL MH OPT.UM XPGGYK, OUBPGN ISUWYX VUSULOYB VYLPXY OPT, GUIHSYHG GHM HGSE MKYUMYXOPT UTPUVSE VAM VYOUBYX UL PZ VUSULOYB CYKY HGY HZ OPL HCG WHAKMPYKL,HGY HZ MOHLY COH LETIUMOPFYX CPMO OPL ISUGL UGX HANOM MH KYQHPWY UMOPL LAWWYLL. PG MOY WHAKLY HZ WHGBYKLUMPHG OY TYGMPHGYX THLWHC UGXJAYLMPHGYX VUSULOYB UVHAM MOY KALLPUG WUIPMUS, GHM TYKYSE UL UGPGMYKYLMYX MKUBYSYK ULRL UVHAM U GYC WPME OY PGMYGXL MH BPLPM, VAM ULPZ WHGBPGWYX MOUM VUSULOYB, UL U KALLPUG, TALM VY ZSUMMYKYX VE OPLWAKPHLPME."OHC TUGE PGOUVPMUGML UKY MOYKY PG THLWHC? OY ULRYX.UGX KYWYPBPGN MOY KYISE MOUM MOYKY CYKY THKY MOUG MCH OAGXKYX WOAKWOYL,OY KYTUKRYX:"COE LAWO U JAUGMPME HZ WOAKWOYL?""MOY KALLPUGL UKY BYKE XYBHAM," KYISPYX VUSULOYB."VAM U SUKNY GATVYK HZ THGULMYKPYL UGX WOAKWOYL PL USCUEL U LPNG HZ MOYVUWRCUKXGYLL HZ U IYHISY," LUPX GUIHSYHG, MAKGPGN MH WUASUPGWHAKM ZHKUIIKYWPUMPHG HZ MOPL KYTUKR.VUSULOYB KYLIYWMZASSE BYGMAKYX MH XPLUNKYY CPMO MOY ZKYGWO YTIYKHK."YBYKE WHAGMKE OUL PML HCG WOUKUWMYK," LUPX OY."VAM GHCOYKY PG YAKHIY PL MOYKY UGEMOPGN SPRY MOUM," LUPX GUIHSYHG."P VYN EHAK TUQYLME'L IUKXHG," KYMAKGYX VUSULOYB, "VYLPXYL KALLPU MOYKYPL LIUPG, COYKY MOYKY UKY USLH TUGE WOAKWOYL UGX THGULMYKPYL."MOPL KYISE HZ VUSULOYB'L, COPWO OPGMYX UM MOY KYWYGM XYZYUML HZ MOYZKYGWO PG LIUPG, CUL TAWO UIIKYWPUMYX COYG OY KYSUMYX PM UM USYDUGXYK'LWHAKM, VAM PM CUL GHM TAWO UIIKYWPUMYX UM GUIHSYHG'L XPGGYK, COYKY PMIULLYX AGGHMPWYX.MOY AGPGMYKYLMYX UGX IYKISYDYX ZUWYL HZ MOY TUKLOUSL LOHCYX MOUM MOYECYKY IAFFSYX UL MH COUM VUSULOYB'L MHGY LANNYLMYX. "PZ MOYKY PL U IHPGMCY XHG'M LYY PM, HK PM PL GHM UM USS CPMME," MOYPK YDIKYLLPHGL LYYTYXMH LUE. LH SPMMSY CUL OPL KYQHPGXYK UIIKYWPUMYX MOUM GUIHSYHG XPX GHMGHMPWY PM UM USS UGX GUPBYSE ULRYX VUSULOYB MOKHANO COUM MHCGL MOYXPKYWM KHUX ZKHT MOYKY MH THLWHC IULLYX. VUSULOYB, COH CUL HG MOY USYKMUSS MOKHANO MOY XPGGYK, KYISPYX MOUM QALM UL "USS KHUXL SYUX MH KHTY,"LH USS KHUXL SYUX MH THLWHC: MOYKY CYKY TUGE KHUXL, UGX "UTHGN MOYT MOYKHUX MOKHANO IHSMUBU, COPWO WOUKSYL DPP WOHLY." VUSULOYB PGBHSAGMUKPSEZSALOYX CPMO ISYULAKY UM MOY UIMPMAXY HZ MOPL KYISE, VAM OUKXSE OUXOY AMMYKYX MOY CHKX IHSMUBU VYZHKY WUASUPGWHAKM VYNUG LIYURPGN HZ MOYVUXGYLL HZ MOY KHUX ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN MH THLWHC UGX HZ OPL IYMYKLVAKNKYTPGPLWYGWYL.UZMYK XPGGYK MOYE CYGM MH XKPGR WHZZYY PG GUIHSYHG'L LMAXE, COPWO ZHAKXUEL IKYBPHALSE OUX VYYG MOUM HZ MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK. GUIHSYHG LUMXHCG, MHEPGN CPMO OPL LYBKYL WHZZYY WAI, UGX THMPHGYX VUSULOYB MH UWOUPK VYLPXY OPT.GUIHSYHG CUL PG MOUM CYSS-RGHCG UZMYK-XPGGYK THHX COPWO, THKY MOUGUGE KYULHGYX WUALY, TURYL U TUG WHGMYGMYX CPMO OPTLYSZ UGX XPLIHLYX MHWHGLPXYK YBYKEHGY OPL ZKPYGX. PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY CUL LAKKHAGXYXVE TYG COH UXHKYX OPT: UGX OY ZYSM WHGBPGWYX MOUM, UZMYK OPL XPGGYK,VUSULOYB MHH CUL OPL ZKPYGX UGX CHKLOPIYK. GUIHSYHG MAKGYX MH OPT CPMO UISYULUGM, MOHANO LSPNOMSE PKHGPW, LTPSY."MOYE MYSS TY MOPL PL MOY KHHT MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK HWWAIPYX? LMKUGNY,PLG'M PM, NYGYKUS?" OY LUPX, YBPXYGMSE GHM XHAVMPGN MOUM MOPL KYTUKRCHASX VY UNKYYUVSY MH OPL OYUKYK LPGWY PM CYGM MH IKHBY OPL, GUIHSYHG'L,LAIYKPHKPME MH USYDUGXYK.VUSULOYB TUXY GH KYISE UGX VHCYX OPL OYUX PG LPSYGWY."EYL. "COUM P WUG'M AGXYKLMUGX," OY CYGM HG, "PL MOUMMOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK OUL LAKKHAGXYX OPTLYSZ CPMO TE IYKLHGUS YGYTPYL.MOUM P XH GHM... AGXYKLMUGX. OUL OY GHM MOHANOM MOUM P TUE XH MOY LUTY?"UGX OY MAKGYX PGJAPKPGNSE MH VUSULOYB, UGX YBPXYGMSE MOPL MOHANOM MAKGYXOPT VUWR HG MH MOY MKUWR HZ OPL THKGPGN'L UGNYK, COPWO CUL LMPSS ZKYLOPG OPT."UGX SYM OPT RGHC MOUM P CPSS XH LH!" LUPX GUIHSYHG, KPLPGN UGX IALOPGNOPL WAI UCUE CPMO OPL OUGX. "P'SS XKPBY USS OPL CAKMMYTVYKN, VUXYG, UGXCYPTUK KYSUMPHGL HAM HZ NYKTUGE.... EYL. P'SS XKPBY MOYT HAM. SYM OPTIKYIUKY UG ULESAT ZHK MOYT PG KALLPU!"VUSULOYB VHCYX OPL OYUX CPMO UG UPK PGXPWUMPGN MOUM OY CHASX SPRY MHTURY OPL VHC UGX SYUBY, UGX HGSE SPLMYGYX VYWUALY OY WHASX GHM OYSIOYUKPGN COUM CUL LUPX MH OPT. GUIHSYHG XPX GHM GHMPWY MOPL YDIKYLLPHG;OY MKYUMYX VUSULOYB GHM UL UG YGBHE ZKHT OPL YGYTE, VAM UL U TUGGHC ZASSE XYBHMYX MH OPT UGX COH TALM KYQHPWY UM OPL ZHKTYK TULMYK'LOATPSPUMPHG."UGX COE OUL MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK MURYG WHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTPYL? COUM PLMOY NHHX HZ MOUM? CUK PL TE IKHZYLLPHG, VAM OPL VALPGYLL PL MH KYPNGUGX GHM MH WHTTUGX UKTPYL! COE OUL OY MURYG HG OPTLYSZ LAWO UKYLIHGLPVPSPME?"UNUPG GUIHSYHG VKHANOM HAM OPL LGAZZVHD, IUWYX LYBYKUS MPTYL AI UGX XHCGMOY KHHT PG LPSYGWY, UGX MOYG, LAXXYGSE UGX AGYDIYWMYXSE, CYGM AI MHVUSULOYB UGX CPMO U LSPNOM LTPSY, UL WHGZPXYGMSE, JAPWRSE, UGX LPTISEUL PZ OY CYKY XHPGN LHTYMOPGN GHM TYKYSE PTIHKMUGM VAM ISYULPGN MHVUSULOYB, OY KUPLYX OPL OUGX MH MOY ZHKME-EYUK-HSX KALLPUG NYGYKUS'LZUWY UGX, MURPGN OPT VE MOY YUK, IASSYX PM NYGMSE, LTPSPGN CPMO OPL SPILHGSE.MH OUBY HGY'L YUK IASSYX VE MOY YTIYKHK CUL WHGLPXYKYX MOY NKYUMYLMOHGHK UGX TUKR HZ ZUBHK UM MOY ZKYGWO WHAKM."CYSS, UXHKYK UGX WHAKMPYK HZ MOY YTIYKHK USYDUGXYK, COE XHG'M EHA LUEUGEMOPGN?" LUPX OY, UL PZ PM CUL KPXPWASHAL, PG OPL IKYLYGWY, MH VY MOYUXHKYK UGX WHAKMPYK HZ UGEHGY VAM OPTLYSZ, GUIHSYHG. "UKY MOY OHKLYLKYUXE ZHK MOY NYGYKUS?" OY UXXYX, CPMO U LSPNOM PGWSPGUMPHG HZ OPL OYUXPG KYISE MH VUSULOYB'L VHC. "SYM OPT OUBY TPGY, OY OUL U SHGN CUE MHNH!"MOY SYMMYK MURYG VE VUSULOYB CUL MOY SULM GUIHSYHG LYGM MH USYDUGXYK.YBYKE XYMUPS HZ MOY PGMYKBPYC CUL WHTTAGPWUMYX MH MOY KALLPUG THGUKWO,UGX MOY CUK VYNUG...WOUIMYK BPPPUZMYK OPL PGMYKBPYC CPMO IPYKKY PG THLWHC, IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM MHIYMYKLVAKN, HG VALPGYLL UL OY MHSX OPL ZUTPSE, VAM KYUSSE MH TYYMUGUMHSY RAKUNPG COHT OY ZYSM PM GYWYLLUKE MH YGWHAGMYK. HG KYUWOPGNIYMYKLVAKN OY PGJAPKYX ZHK RAKUNPG VAM MOY SUMMYK OUX USKYUXE SYZM MOYWPME. IPYKKY OUX CUKGYX OPL VKHMOYK-PG-SUC MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL HGOPL MKUWR. UGUMHSY RAKUNPG IKHTIMSE HVMUPGYX UG UIIHPGMTYGM ZKHTMOY TPGPLMYK HZ CUK UGX CYGM MH QHPG MOY UKTE PG THSXUBPU. COPSY PGIYMYKLVAKN IKPGWY UGXKYC TYM RAMAFHB, OPL ZHKTYK WHTTUGXYK COH CULUSCUEL CYSS XPLIHLYX MHCUKX OPT, UGX RAMAFHB LANNYLMYX MOUM OY LOHASXUWWHTIUGE OPT MH MOY UKTE PG THSXUBPU, MH COPWO MOY HSX NYGYKUS OUXVYYG UIIHPGMYX WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. LH IKPGWY UGXKYC, OUBPGN KYWYPBYX UGUIIHPGMTYGM HG MOY OYUXJAUKMYKL LMUZZ, SYZM ZHK MAKRYE.IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM MOPGR PM IKHIYK MH CKPMY UGX WOUSSYGNY RAKUNPG.OY MOHANOM MOUM PZ OY WOUSSYGNYX OPT CPMOHAM LHTY ZKYLO WUALY PM TPNOMWHTIKHTPLY MOY EHAGN WHAGMYLL KHLMHBU UGX LH OY CUGMYX MH TYYM RAKUNPGIYKLHGUSSE PG HKXYK MH ZPGX U ZKYLO IKYMYDM ZHK U XAYS. VAM OY UNUPGZUPSYX MH TYYM RAKUNPG PG MAKRYE, ZHK LHHG UZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC UKKPBYX,MOY SUMMYK KYMAKGYX MH KALLPU. PG U GYC WHAGMKE, UTPX GYC WHGXPMPHGL,IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHAGX SPZY YULPYK MH VYUK. UZMYK OPL VYMKHMOYX OUX VKHRYGZUPMO CPMO OPT--COPWO OY ZYSM MOY THKY UWAMYSE MOY THKY OY MKPYX MHWHGWYUS PML YZZYWML--MOY LAKKHAGXPGNL PG COPWO OY OUX VYYG OUIIE VYWUTYMKEPGN MH OPT, UGX MOY ZKYYXHT UGX PGXYIYGXYGWY OY OUX HGWY IKPFYXLH OPNOSE CYKY LMPSS THKY LH. GHM HGSE WHASX OY GH SHGNYK MOPGR MOYMOHANOML MOUM OUX ZPKLM WHTY MH OPT UL OY SUE NUFPGN UM MOY LRE HG MOYZPYSX HZ UALMYKSPMF UGX OUX SUMYK YGSUKNYX AIHG CPMO IPYKKY, UGX COPWOOUX ZPSSYX OPL LHSPMAXY UM VHNAWOUKHBH UGX MOYG PG LCPMFYKSUGX UGX KHTY,VAM OY YBYG XKYUXYX MH KYWUSS MOYT UGX MOY VKPNOM UGX VHAGXSYLL OHKPFHGLMOYE OUX KYBYUSYX. OY CUL GHC WHGWYKGYX HGSE CPMO MOY GYUKYLM IKUWMPWUSTUMMYKL AGKYSUMYX MH OPL IULM PGMYKYLML, UGX OY LYPFYX HG MOYLY MOY THKYYUNYKSE MOY THKY MOHLY IULM PGMYKYLML CYKY WSHLYX MH OPT. PM CUL UL PZMOUM SHZME, PGZPGPMY WUGHIE HZ OYUBYG MOUM OUX HGWY MHCYKYX UVHBY OPTOUX LAXXYGSE MAKGYX PGMH U SHC, LHSPX BUASM MOUM CYPNOYX OPT XHCG, PGCOPWO USS CUL WSYUK, VAM GHMOPGN YMYKGUS HK TELMYKPHAL.HZ MOY UWMPBPMPYL MOUM IKYLYGMYX MOYTLYSBYL MH OPT, UKTE LYKBPWY CUL MOYLPTISYLM UGX THLM ZUTPSPUK. UL U NYGYKUS HG XAME HG RAMAFHB'L LMUZZ,OY UIISPYX OPTLYSZ MH VALPGYLL CPMO FYUS UGX IYKLYBYKUGWY UGX LAKIKPLYXRAMAFHB VE OPL CPSSPGNGYLL UGX UWWAKUWE PG CHKR. GHM OUBPGN ZHAGXRAKUNPG PG MAKRYE, IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM MOPGR PM GYWYLLUKE MH KALO VUWRMH KALLPU UZMYK OPT, VAM USS MOY LUTY OY RGYC MOUM OHCYBYK SHGN PM TPNOMVY VYZHKY OY TYM RAKUNPG, XYLIPMY OPL WHGMYTIM ZHK OPT UGX XYLIPMY USSMOY IKHHZL OY XYXAWYX MH WHGBPGWY OPTLYSZ MOUM PM CUL GHM CHKMO LMHHIPGNMH U WHGZSPWM CPMO OPT--OY RGYC MOUM COYG OY XPX TYYM OPT OY CHASX GHMVY UVSY MH KYLPLM WUSSPGN OPT HAM, UGE THKY MOUG U KUBYGHAL TUG WUG OYSILGUMWOPGN UM ZHHX. UGX MOY WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM MOY PGLASM CUL GHM EYMUBYGNYX, MOUM OPL KUGWHK CUL LMPSS AGLIYGM, CYPNOYX HG OPL OYUKM UGXIHPLHGYX MOY UKMPZPWPUS MKUGJAPSSPME COPWO OY TUGUNYX MH HVMUPG PGMAKRYE VE TYUGL HZ KYLMSYLL, ISHXXPGN, UGX KUMOYK BUPGNSHKPHAL UGXUTVPMPHAL UWMPBPME.PG MOY EYUK 1812, COYG GYCL HZ MOY CUK CPMO GUIHSYHG KYUWOYXVAWOUKYLM--COYKY RAMAFHB OUX VYYG SPBPGN ZHK MCH THGMOL, IULLPGN OPLXUEL UGX GPNOML CPMO U CUSSUWOPUG CHTUG--IKPGWY UGXKYC ULRYX RAMAFHBMH MKUGLZYK OPT MH MOY CYLMYKG UKTE. RAMAFHB, COH CUL USKYUXE CYUKE HZVHSRHGLRP'L UWMPBPME COPWO LYYTYX MH KYIKHUWO OPL HCG PXSYGYLL, BYKEKYUXPSE SYM OPT NH UGX NUBY OPT U TPLLPHG MH VUKWSUE XY MHSSE.VYZHKY QHPGPGN MOY CYLMYKG UKTE COPWO CUL MOYG, PG TUE, YGWUTIYX UMXKPLLU, IKPGWY UGXKYC BPLPMYX VUSX OPSSL COPWO CUL XPKYWMSE HG OPL CUE,VYPGN HGSE MCH TPSYL HZZ MOY LTHSYGLR OPNOKHUX. XAKPGN MOY SULM MOKYYEYUKL MOYKY OUX VYYG LH TUGE WOUGNYL PG OPL SPZY, OY OUX MOHANOM, ZYSM,UGX LYYG LH TAWO (OUBPGN MKUBYSYX VHMO PG MOY YULM UGX MOY CYLM), MOUMHG KYUWOPGN VUSX OPSSL PM LMKAWR OPT UL LMKUGNY UGX AGYDIYWMYX MH ZPGXMOY CUE HZ SPZY MOYKY AGWOUGNYX UGX LMPSS MOY LUTY PG YBYKE XYMUPS.OY YGMYKYX MOKHANO MOY NUMYL CPMO MOYPK LMHGY IPSSUKL UGX XKHBY AIMOY UBYGAY SYUXPGN MH MOY OHALY UL PZ OY CYKY YGMYKPGN UG YGWOUGMYX,LSYYIPGN WULMSY. MOY LUTY HSX LMUMYSPGYLL, MOY LUTY WSYUGSPGYLL, MOYLUTY LMPSSGYLL KYPNGYX MOYKY, UGX PGLPXY MOYKY CUL MOY LUTY ZAKGPMAKY,MOY LUTY CUSSL, LHAGXL, UGX LTYSS, UGX MOY LUTY MPTPX ZUWYL, HGSELHTYCOUM HSXYK. IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LMPSS MOY LUTY MPTPX, ISUPG TUPXYGNYMMPGN HG PG EYUKL, ALYSYLLSE UGX QHESYLLSE IULLPGN MOY VYLM EYUKL HZOYK SPZY PG ZYUK UGX WHGLMUGM LAZZYKPGN. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CULMOY LUTY WHJAYMMPLO, LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX NPKS, YGQHEPGN YBYKE THTYGM HZ OYKYDPLMYGWY UGX ZASS HZ QHEHAL OHIYL ZHK MOY ZAMAKY. LOY OUX TYKYSE VYWHTYTHKY LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM, IKPGWY UGXKYC MOHANOM. XYLLUSSYL, MOY MAMHK OY OUXVKHANOM ZKHT LCPMFYKSUGX, CUL CYUKPGN U WHUM HZ KALLPUG WAM UGXMUSRPGN VKHRYG KALLPUG MH MOY LYKBUGML, VAM CUL LMPSS MOY LUTY GUKKHCSEPGMYSSPNYGM, WHGLWPYGMPHAL, UGX IYXUGMPW IKYWYIMHK. MOY HSX IKPGWYOUX WOUGNYX PG UIIYUKUGWY HGSE VE MOY SHLL HZ U MHHMO, COPWO SYZM UGHMPWYUVSY NUI HG HGY LPXY HZ OPL THAMO; PG WOUKUWMYK OY CUL MOY LUTY ULYBYK, HGSE LOHCPGN LMPSS THKY PKKPMUVPSPME UGX LRYIMPWPLT UL MH COUM CULOUIIYGPGN PG MOY CHKSX. SPMMSY GPWOHSUL USHGY OUX WOUGNYX. OY OUX NKHCG,VYWHTY KHLPYK, OUX WAKSE XUKR OUPK, UGX, COYG TYKKE UGX SUANOPGN, JAPMYAGWHGLWPHALSE SPZMYX MOY AIIYK SPI HZ OPL IKYMME SPMMSY THAMO QALMUL MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYLL ALYX MH XH. OY USHGY XPX GHM HVYE MOY SUC HZPTTAMUVPSPME PG MOY YGWOUGMYX, LSYYIPGN WULMSY. VAM MOHANO YDMYKGUSSEUSS KYTUPGYX UL HZ HSX, MOY PGGYK KYSUMPHGL HZ USS MOYLY IYHISY OUXWOUGNYX LPGWY IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX LYYG MOYT SULM. MOY OHALYOHSX CULXPBPXYX PGMH MCH USPYG UGX OHLMPSY WUTIL, COH WOUGNYX MOYPK OUVPML ZHKOPL LURY UGX HGSE TYM VYWUALY OY CUL MOYKY. MH MOY HGY WUTI VYSHGNYXMOY HSX IKPGWY, TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, UGX MOY UKWOPMYWM; MH MOY HMOYKIKPGWYLL TUKE, XYLLUSSYL, SPMMSY GPWOHSUL, UGX USS MOY HSX GAKLYL UGXTUPXL.XAKPGN OPL LMUE UM VUSX OPSSL USS MOY ZUTPSE XPGYX MHNYMOYK, VAM MOYECYKY PSS UM YULY UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC ZYSM MOUM OY CUL U BPLPMHK ZHK COHLYLURY UG YDWYIMPHG CUL VYPGN TUXY UGX MOUM OPL IKYLYGWY TUXY MOYT USSZYYS UCRCUKX. PGBHSAGMUKPSE ZYYSPGN MOPL UM XPGGYK HG MOY ZPKLM XUE, OYCUL MUWPMAKG, UGX MOY HSX IKPGWY GHMPWPGN MOPL USLH VYWUTY THKHLYSE XATVUGX KYMPKYX MH OPL UIUKMTYGML XPKYWMSE UZMYK XPGGYK. PG MOY YBYGPGN,COYG IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM MH OPT UGX, MKEPGN MH KHALY OPT, VYNUG MHMYSS OPT HZ MOY EHAGN WHAGM RUTYGLRE'L WUTIUPNG, MOY HSX IKPGWYVYNUG AGYDIYWMYXSE MH MUSR UVHAM IKPGWYLL TUKE, VSUTPGN OYK ZHK OYKLAIYKLMPMPHGL UGX OYK XPLSPRY HZ TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, COH, OY LUPX,CUL MOY HGSE IYKLHG KYUSSE UMMUWOYX MH OPT.MOY HSX IKPGWY LUPX MOUM PZ OY CUL PSS PM CUL HGSE VYWUALY HZ IKPGWYLLTUKE: MOUM LOY IAKIHLYSE CHKKPYX UGX PKKPMUMYX OPT, UGX MOUM VEPGXASNYGWY UGX LPSSE MUSR LOY CUL LIHPSPGN SPMMSY IKPGWY GPWOHSUL. MOYHSX IKPGWY RGYC BYKE CYSS MOUM OY MHKTYGMYX OPL XUANOMYK UGX MOUM OYKSPZY CUL BYKE OUKX, VAM OY USLH RGYC MOUM OY WHASX GHM OYSI MHKTYGMPGNOYK UGX MOUM LOY XYLYKBYX PM. "COE XHYL IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH LYYL MOPL,LUE GHMOPGN MH TY UVHAM OPL LPLMYK? XHYL OY MOPGR TY U LWHAGXKYS, HK UGHSX ZHHS COH, CPMOHAM UGE KYULHG, RYYIL OPL HCG XUANOMYK UM U XPLMUGWYUGX UMMUWOYL MOPL ZKYGWOCHTUG MH OPTLYSZ? OY XHYLG'M AGXYKLMUGX, LH PTALM YDISUPG PM, UGX OY TALM OYUK TY HAM," MOHANOM MOY HSX IKPGWY.UGX OY VYNUG YDISUPGPGN COE OY WHASX GHM IAM AI CPMO OPL XUANOMYK'LAGKYULHGUVSY WOUKUWMYK."PZ EHA ULR TY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN AI (OY CULWYGLAKPGN OPL ZUMOYK ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY PG OPL SPZY), "P XPX GHM CPLO MHLIYUR UVHAM PM, VAM UL EHA ULR TY P CPSS NPBY EHA TE ZKUGR HIPGPHG. PZMOYKY PL UGE TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGN UGX XPLWHKX VYMCYYG EHA UGX TUKE, P WUG'MVSUTY OYK ZHK PM UM USS. P RGHC OHC LOY SHBYL UGX KYLIYWML EHA. LPGWYEHA ULR TY," WHGMPGAYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, VYWHTPGN PKKPMUVSY--UL OY CULUSCUEL SPUVSY MH XH HZ SUMY--"P WUG HGSE LUE MOUM PZ MOYKY UKY UGETPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL MOYE UKY WUALYX VE MOUM CHKMOSYLL CHTUG, COH PL GHMZPM MH VY TE LPLMYK'L WHTIUGPHG."MOY HSX TUG UM ZPKLM LMUKYX ZPDYXSE UM OPL LHG, UGX UG AGGUMAKUS LTPSYXPLWSHLYX MOY ZKYLO NUI VYMCYYG OPL MYYMO MH COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASXGHM NYM UWWALMHTYX."COUM WHTIUGPHG, TE XYUK VHE? YO? EHA'BY USKYUXE VYYG MUSRPGN PM HBYK!YO?""ZUMOYK, P XPX GHM CUGM MH QAXNY," LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, PG U OUKX UGXVPMMYK MHGY, "VAM EHA WOUSSYGNYX TY, UGX P OUBY LUPX, UGX USCUEL LOUSSLUE, MOUM TUKE PL GHM MH VSUTY, VAM MOHLY MH VSUTY--MOY HGY MH VSUTY--PLMOUM ZKYGWOCHTUG.""UO, OY OUL IULLYX QAXNTYGM... IULLYX QAXNYTYGM!" LUPX MOY HSX TUG PG USHC BHPWY UGX, UL PM LYYTYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMO LHTY YTVUKKULLTYGM,VAM MOYG OY LAXXYGSE QATIYX AI UGX WKPYX: "VY HZZ, VY HZZ! SYM GHM UMKUWY HZ EHA KYTUPG OYKY!..."IKPGWY UGXKYC CPLOYX MH SYUBY UM HGWY, VAM IKPGWYLL TUKE IYKLAUXYX OPTMH LMUE UGHMOYK XUE. MOUM XUE OY XPX GHM LYY OPL ZUMOYK, COH XPX GHMSYUBY OPL KHHT UGX UXTPMMYX GH HGY VAM TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGXMPROHG, VAM ULRYX LYBYKUS MPTYL COYMOYK OPL LHG OUX NHGY. GYDM XUE,VYZHKY SYUBPGN, IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM MH OPL LHG'L KHHTL. MOY VHE,WAKSE-OYUXYX SPRY OPL THMOYK UGX NSHCPGN CPMO OYUSMO, LUM HG OPL RGYY,UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC VYNUG MYSSPGN OPT MOY LMHKE HZ VSAYVYUKX, VAM ZYSSPGMH U KYBYKPY CPMOHAM ZPGPLOPGN MOY LMHKE. OY MOHANOM GHM HZ MOPLIKYMME WOPSX, OPL LHG COHT OY OYSX HG OPL RGYY, VAM HZ OPTLYSZ. OYLHANOM PG OPTLYSZ YPMOYK KYTHKLY ZHK OUBPGN UGNYKYX OPL ZUMOYK HK KYNKYMUM SYUBPGN OHTY ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY PG OPL SPZY HG VUX MYKTL CPMO OPT,UGX CUL OHKKPZPYX MH ZPGX GYPMOYK. COUM TYUGM LMPSS THKY MH OPT CUL MOUMOY LHANOM UGX XPX GHM ZPGX PG OPTLYSZ MOY ZHKTYK MYGXYKGYLL ZHK OPL LHGCOPWO OY OUX OHIYX MH KYUCURYG VE WUKYLLPGN MOY VHE UGX MURPGN OPT HGOPL RGYY."CYSS, NH HG!" LUPX OPL LHG.IKPGWY UGXKYC, CPMOHAM KYISEPGN, IAM OPT XHCG ZKHT OPL RGYY UGX CYGM HAMHZ MOY KHHT.UL LHHG UL IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX NPBYG AI OPL XUPSE HWWAIUMPHGL, UGXYLIYWPUSSE HG KYMAKGPGN MH MOY HSX WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY UTPX COPWO OY OUXVYYG OUIIE, CYUKPGYLL HZ SPZY HBYKWUTY OPT CPMO PML ZHKTYK PGMYGLPME,UGX OY OULMYGYX MH YLWUIY ZKHT MOYLY TYTHKPYL UGX MH ZPGX LHTY CHKR ULLHHG UL IHLLPVSY."LH EHA'BY XYWPXYX MH NH, UGXKYC?" ULRYX OPL LPLMYK."MOUGR NHX MOUM P WUG," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC. "P UT BYKE LHKKE EHAWUG'M.""COE XH EHA LUE MOUM?" KYISPYX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "COE XH EHA LUE MOUM,COYG EHA UKY NHPGN MH MOPL MYKKPVSY CUK, UGX OY PL LH HSX? TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY LUEL OY OUL VYYG ULRPGN UVHAM EHA...."UL LHHG UL LOY VYNUG MH LIYUR HZ MOUM, OYK SPIL MKYTVSYX UGX OYK MYUKLVYNUG MH ZUSS. IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX UCUE UGX VYNUG IUWPGN MOY KHHT."UO, TE NHX! TE NHX! COYG HGY MOPGRL COH UGX COUM--COUM MKULO--WUG WUALYIYHISY TPLYKE!" OY LUPX CPMO U TUSPNGPME MOUM USUKTYX IKPGWYLL TUKE.LOY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM COYG LIYURPGN HZ "MKULO" OY KYZYKKYX GHM HGSE MHTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, MOY WUALY HZ OYK TPLYKE, VAM USLH MH MOY TUG COHOUX KAPGYX OPL HCG OUIIPGYLL."UGXKYC! HGY MOPGN P VYN, P YGMKYUM HZ EHA!" LOY LUPX, MHAWOPGN OPLYSVHC UGX SHHRPGN UM OPT CPMO YEYL MOUM LOHGY MOKHANO OYK MYUKL. "PAGXYKLMUGX EHA" (LOY SHHRYX XHCG). "XHG'M PTUNPGY MOUM LHKKHC PL MOYCHKR HZ TYG. TYG UKY OPL MHHSL." LOY SHHRYX U SPMMSY UVHBY IKPGWYUGXKYC'L OYUX CPMO MOY WHGZPXYGM, UWWALMHTYX SHHR CPMO COPWO HGY SHHRLUM MOY ISUWY COYKY U ZUTPSPUK IHKMKUPM OUGNL. "LHKKHC PL LYGM VE OPT,GHM VE TYG. TYG UKY OPL PGLMKATYGML, MOYE UKY GHM MH VSUTY. PZ EHA MOPGRLHTYHGY OUL CKHGNYX EHA, ZHKNYM PM UGX ZHKNPBY! CY OUBY GH KPNOM MHIAGPLO. UGX MOYG EHA CPSS RGHC MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ ZHKNPBPGN.""PZ P CYKY U CHTUG P CHASX XH LH, TUKE. MOUM PL U CHTUG'L BPKMAY. VAMU TUG LOHASX GHM UGX WUGGHM ZHKNPBY UGX ZHKNYM," OY KYISPYX, UGX MOHANOMPSS MOUM THTYGM OY OUX GHM VYYG MOPGRPGN HZ RAKUNPG, USS OPL AGYDIYGXYXUGNYK LAXXYGSE LCYSSYX AI PG OPL OYUKM."PZ TUKE PL USKYUXE IYKLAUXPGN TY MH ZHKNPBY, PM TYUGL MOUM P HANOM SHGNUNH MH OUBY IAGPLOYX OPT," OY MOHANOM. UGX NPBPGN OYK GH ZAKMOYK KYISE,OY VYNUG MOPGRPGN HZ MOY NSUX BPGXPWMPBY THTYGM COYG OY CHASX TYYMRAKUNPG COH OY RGYC CUL GHC PG MOY UKTE.IKPGWYLL TUKE VYNNYX OPT MH LMUE HGY XUE THKY, LUEPGN MOUM LOY RGYC OHCAGOUIIE OYK ZUMOYK CHASX VY PZ UGXKYC SYZM CPMOHAM VYPGN KYWHGWPSYX MHOPT, VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC KYISPYX MOUM OY CHASX IKHVUVSE LHHG VY VUWR UNUPGZKHT MOY UKTE UGX CHASX WYKMUPGSE CKPMY MH OPL ZUMOYK, VAM MOUM MOYSHGNYK OY LMUEYX GHC MOY THKY YTVPMMYKYX MOYPK XPZZYKYGWYL CHASX VYWHTY."NHHX-VEY, UGXKYC! KYTYTVYK MOUM TPLZHKMAGYL WHTY ZKHT NHX, UGX TYG UKYGYBYK MH VSUTY," CYKY MOY SULM CHKXL OY OYUKX ZKHT OPL LPLMYK COYG OYMHHR SYUBY HZ OYK."MOYG PM TALM VY LH!" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC UL OY XKHBY HAM HZ MOYUBYGAY ZKHT MOY OHALY UM VUSX OPSSL. "LOY, IHHK PGGHWYGM WKYUMAKY, PLSYZM MH VY BPWMPTPFYX VE UG HSX TUG COH OUL HAMSPBYX OPL CPML. MOY HSXTUG ZYYSL OY PL NAPSME, VAM WUGGHM WOUGNY OPTLYSZ. TE VHE PL NKHCPGN AIUGX KYQHPWYL PG SPZY, PG COPWO SPRY YBYKEVHXE YSLY OY CPSS XYWYPBY HK VYXYWYPBYX. UGX P UT HZZ MH MOY UKTE. COE? P TELYSZ XHG'M RGHC. P CUGMMH TYYM MOUM TUG COHT P XYLIPLY, LH UL MH NPBY OPT U WOUGWY MH RPSS UGXSUANO UM TY!"MOYLY WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY OUX VYYG MOY LUTY VYZHKY, VAM MOYG MOYE CYKYUSS WHGGYWMYX, COPSY GHC MOYE OUX USS MATVSYX MH IPYWYL. HGSE LYGLYSYLLMOPGNL, SUWRPGN WHOYKYGWY, IKYLYGMYX MOYTLYSBYL HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK MHIKPGWY UGXKYC'L TPGX.WOUIMYK PDIKPGWY UGXKYC KYUWOYX MOY NYGYKUS OYUXJAUKMYKL HZ MOY UKTE UM MOY YGX HZQAGY. MOY ZPKLM UKTE, CPMO COPWO CUL MOY YTIYKHK, HWWAIPYX MOY ZHKMPZPYXWUTI UM XKPLLU; MOY LYWHGX UKTE CUL KYMKYUMPGN, MKEPGN MH YZZYWM UQAGWMPHG CPMO MOY ZPKLM HGY ZKHT COPWO PM CUL LUPX MH VY WAM HZZ VESUKNY ZKYGWO ZHKWYL. YBYKEHGY CUL XPLLUMPLZPYX CPMO MOY NYGYKUS WHAKLYHZ UZZUPKL PG MOY KALLPUG UKTE, VAM GH HGY UGMPWPIUMYX UGE XUGNYK HZPGBULPHG HZ MOY KALLPUG IKHBPGWYL, UGX GH HGY MOHANOM MOY CUK CHASXYDMYGX ZUKMOYK MOUG MOY CYLMYKG, MOY IHSPLO, IKHBPGWYL.IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHAGX VUKWSUE XY MHSSE, MH COHT OY OUX VYYG ULLPNGYX, HGMOY VUGR HZ MOY XKPLLU. VUKWSUEXY MHSSE CUL JAUKMYKYX GYUKSE MOKYY TPSYL ZKHT MOY YTIYKHK. UGUMHSY RAKUNPG, COHTIKPGWY UGXKYC OUX OHIYX MH ZPGX CPMO MOY UKTE, CUL GHM MOYKY. OY OUXNHGY MH IYMYKLVAKN, VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL NSUX MH OYUK MOPL. XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM ZHAKXUEL, COPSY GH XAMPYL CYKY KYJAPKYX HZ OPT, IKPGWY UGXKYC KHXY KHAGX MOYCOHSY ZHKMPZPYX WUTI UGX, VE MOY UPX HZ OPL HCG RGHCSYXNY UGX VEMUSRL CPMO YDIYKML, MKPYX MH ZHKT U XYZPGPMY HIPGPHG UVHAM PM. VAM MOYJAYLMPHG COYMOYK MOY WUTI CUL UXBUGMUNYHAL HK XPLUXBUGMUNYHAL KYTUPGYXZHK OPT AGXYWPXYX. USKYUXE ZKHT OPL TPSPMUKE YDIYKPYGWY UGX COUM OY OUXLYYG PG MOY UALMKPUG WUTIUPNG, OY OUX WHTY MH MOY WHGWSALPHG MOUM PGCUK MOY THLM XYYISE WHGLPXYKYX ISUGL OUBY GH LPNGPZPWUGWY UGX MOUM USSXYIYGXL HG MOY CUE AGYDIYWMYX THBYTYGML HZ MOY YGYTE--MOUM WUGGHM VYZHKYLYYG--UKY TYM, UGX HG OHC UGX VE COHT MOY COHSY TUMMYK PL OUGXSYX.MH WSYUK AI MOPL SULM IHPGM ZHK OPTLYSZ, IKPGWY UGXKYC, AMPSPFPGN OPLIHLPMPHG UGX UWJAUPGMUGWYL, MKPYX MH ZUMOHT MOY WOUKUWMYK HZ MOY WHGMKHSHZ MOY UKTE UGX HZ MOY TYG UGX IUKMPYL YGNUNYX PG PM, UGX OY XYXAWYX ZHKOPTLYSZ MOY ZHSSHCPGN HZ MOY LMUMY HZ UZZUPKL.COPSY MOY YTIYKHK OUX LMPSS VYYG UM BPSGU, MOY ZHKWYL OUX VYYG XPBPXYXPGMH MOKYY UKTPYL. ZPKLM, MOY UKTE AGXYK VUKWSUE XY MHSSE, LYWHGXSE, MOYUKTE AGXYK VUNKUMPHG, UGX MOPKXSE, MOY HGY WHTTUGXYX VE MHKTULHB. MOYYTIYKHK CUL CPMO MOY ZPKLM UKTE, VAM GHM UL WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. PG MOYHKXYKL PLLAYX PM CUL LMUMYX, GHM MOUM MOY YTIYKHK CHASX MURY WHTTUGX,VAM HGSE MOUM OY CHASX VY CPMO MOY UKTE. MOY YTIYKHK, THKYHBYK, OUXCPMO OPT GHM U WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L LMUZZ VAM MOY PTIYKPUS OYUXJAUKMYKLLMUZZ. PG UMMYGXUGWY HG OPT CUL MOY OYUX HZ MOY PTIYKPUS LMUZZ,JAUKMYKTULMYK NYGYKUS IKPGWY BHSRHGLRP, UL CYSS UL NYGYKUSL, PTIYKPUSUPXYL-XY-WUTI, XPISHTUMPW HZZPWPUSL, UGX U SUKNY GATVYK HZ ZHKYPNGYKL,VAM GHM MOY UKTE LMUZZ. VYLPXYL MOYLY, MOYKY CYKY PG UMMYGXUGWY HG MOYYTIYKHK CPMOHAM UGE XYZPGPMY UIIHPGMTYGML: UKURWOYYB, MOY YD-TPGPLMYKHZ CUK; WHAGM VYGGPNLYG, MOY LYGPHK NYGYKUS PG KUGR; MOY NKUGX XARYMLUKYBPWO WHGLMUGMPGY IUBSHBPWO; WHAGM KATEUGMLYB, MOY WOUGWYSSHK;LMYPG, U ZHKTYK IKALLPUG TPGPLMYK; UKTZYSXM, U LCYXPLO NYGYKUS; IZAYS,MOY WOPYZ UAMOHK HZ MOY ISUG HZ WUTIUPNG; IUASAWWP, UG UXQAMUGM NYGYKUSUGX LUKXPGPUG YTPNKY; CHSFHNYG--UGX TUGE HMOYKL. MOHANO MOYLY TYG OUXGH TPSPMUKE UIIHPGMTYGM PG MOY UKTE, MOYPK IHLPMPHG NUBY MOYT PGZSAYGWY,UGX HZMYG U WHKIL WHTTUGXYK, HK YBYG MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, XPX GHMRGHC PG COUM WUIUWPME OY CUL JAYLMPHGYX VE VYGGPNLYG, MOY NKUGX XARY,UKURWOYYB, HK IKPGWY BHSRHGLRP, HK CUL NPBYG MOPL HK MOUM UXBPWY UGX XPXGHM RGHC COYMOYK U WYKMUPG HKXYK KYWYPBYX PG MOY ZHKT HZ UXBPWY YTUGUMYXZKHT MOY TUG COH NUBY PM HK ZKHT MOY YTIYKHK UGX COYMOYK PM OUX MH VYYDYWAMYX HK GHM. VAM MOPL CUL HGSE MOY YDMYKGUS WHGXPMPHG; MOY YLLYGMPUSLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOY YTIYKHK UGX HZ USS MOYLY IYHISY,ZKHT U WHAKMPYK'L IHPGM HZ BPYC (UGX PG UG YTIYKHK'L BPWPGPME USS VYWUTYWHAKMPYKL), CUL WSYUK MH YBYKEHGY. PM CUL MOPL: MOY YTIYKHK XPX GHMULLATY MOY MPMSY HZ WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, VAM XPLIHLYX HZ USS MOY UKTPYL;MOY TYG UKHAGX OPT CYKY OPL ULLPLMUGML. MOYUXQAMUGML NYGYKUS CYKY MOYKY VYWUALY MOYE USCUEL UWWHTIUGPYX MOYYTIYKHK, UGX SULMSE UGX WOPYZSE IZAYS CUL MOYKY VYWUALY OY OUX XKUCG AIMOY ISUG HZ WUTIUPNG UNUPGLM GUIHSYHG UGX, OUBPGN PGXAWYX USYDUGXYK MHVYSPYBY PG MOY YZZPWUWE HZ MOUM ISUG, CUL XPKYWMPGN MOY COHSY VALPGYLLHZ MOY CUK. CPMO IZAYS CUL CHSFHNYG, COH YDIKYLLYX IZAYS'L MOHANOML PGU THKY WHTIKYOYGLPVSY CUE MOUG IZAYS OPTLYSZ (COH CUL U OUKLO, VHHRPLOMOYHKPLM, LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM MH MOY IHPGM HZ XYLIPLPGN YBYKEHGY YSLY) CULUVSY MH XH.VYLPXYL MOYLY KALLPUGL UGX ZHKYPNGYKL COH IKHIHAGXYX GYC UGX AGYDIYWMYXPXYUL YBYKE XUE--YLIYWPUSSE MOY ZHKYPNGYKL, COH XPX LH CPMO U VHSXGYLLWOUKUWMYKPLMPW HZ IYHISY YTISHEYX PG U WHAGMKE GHM MOYPK HCG--MOYKY CYKYTUGE LYWHGXUKE IYKLHGUNYL UWWHTIUGEPGN MOY UKTE VYWUALY MOYPK IKPGWPIUSLCYKY MOYKY.UTHGN MOY HIPGPHGL UGX BHPWYL PG MOPL PTTYGLY, KYLMSYLL, VKPSSPUGM,UGX IKHAX LIOYKY, IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMPWYX MOY ZHSSHCPGN LOUKISE XYZPGYXLAVXPBPLPHGL HZ MYGXYGWPYL UGX IUKMPYL:MOY ZPKLM IUKME WHGLPLMYX HZ IZAYS UGX OPL UXOYKYGML--TPSPMUKE MOYHKPLMLCOH VYSPYBYX PG U LWPYGWY HZ CUK CPMO PTTAMUVSY SUCL--SUCL HZ HVSPJAYTHBYTYGML, HAMZSUGRPGNL, UGX LH ZHKMO. IZAYS UGX OPL UXOYKYGML XYTUGXYXU KYMPKYTYGM PGMH MOY XYIMOL HZ MOY WHAGMKE PG UWWHKXUGWY CPMO IKYWPLYSUCL XYZPGYX VE U ILYAXH-MOYHKE HZ CUK, UGX MOYE LUC HGSE VUKVUKPLT,PNGHKUGWY, HK YBPS PGMYGMPHG PG YBYKE XYBPUMPHG ZKHT MOUM MOYHKE. MHMOPL IUKME VYSHGNYX MOY ZHKYPNG GHVSYL, CHSFHNYG, CPGMFPGNYKHXY, UGXHMOYKL, WOPYZSE NYKTUGL.MOY LYWHGX IUKME CUL XPKYWMSE HIIHLYX MH MOY ZPKLM; HGY YDMKYTY, ULUSCUEL OUIIYGL, CUL TYM VE KYIKYLYGMUMPBYL HZ MOY HMOYK. MOY TYTVYKL HZMOPL IUKME CYKY MOHLY COH OUX XYTUGXYX UG UXBUGWY ZKHT BPSGU PGMH IHSUGXUGX ZKYYXHT ZKHT USS IKYUKKUGNYX ISUGL. VYLPXYL VYPGN UXBHWUMYL HZ VHSXUWMPHG, MOPL LYWMPHG USLH KYIKYLYGMYX GUMPHGUSPLT, COPWO TUXY MOYT LMPSSTHKY HGY-LPXYX PG MOY XPLIAMY. MOYE CYKY KALLPUGL: VUNKUMPHG, YKTHSHB(COH CUL VYNPGGPGN MH WHTY MH MOY ZKHGM), UGX HMOYKL. UM MOUM MPTY UZUTHAL QHRY HZ YKTHSHB'L CUL VYPGN WPKWASUMYX, MOUM UL U NKYUM ZUBHK OYOUX IYMPMPHGYX MOY YTIYKHK MH TURY OPT U NYKTUG. MOY TYG HZ MOUM IUKME,KYTYTVYKPGN LABHKHB, LUPX MOUM COUM HGY OUX MH XH CUL GHM MH KYULHG,HK LMPWR IPGL PGMH TUIL, VAM MH ZPNOM, VYUM MOY YGYTE, RYYI OPT HAM HZKALLPU, UGX GHM SYM MOY UKTE NYM XPLWHAKUNYX.MH MOY MOPKX IUKME--PG COPWO MOY YTIYKHK OUX THLM WHGZPXYGWY--VYSHGNYXMOY WHAKMPYKL COH MKPYX MH UKKUGNY WHTIKHTPLYL VYMCYYG MOY HMOYK MCH.MOY TYTVYKL HZ MOPL IUKME, WOPYZSE WPBPSPUGL UGX MH COHT UKURWOYYBVYSHGNYX, MOHANOM UGX LUPX COUM TYG COH OUBY GH WHGBPWMPHGL VAM CPLOMH LYYT MH OUBY LHTY NYGYKUSSE LUE. MOYE LUPX MOUM AGXHAVMYXSE CUK,IUKMPWASUKSE UNUPGLM LAWO U NYGPAL UL VHGUIUKMY (MOYE WUSSYX OPTVHGUIUKMY GHC), GYYXL THLM XYYISE XYBPLYX ISUGL UGX IKHZHAGX LWPYGMPZPWRGHCSYXNY UGX PG MOUM KYLIYWM IZAYS CUL U NYGPAL, VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTYPM OUX MH VY UWRGHCSYXNYX MOUM MOY MOYHKPLML UKY HZMYG HGY LPXYX, UGXMOYKYZHKY HGY LOHASX GHM MKALM MOYT UVLHSAMYSE, VAM LOHASX USLH SPLMYGMH COUM IZAYS'L HIIHGYGML UGX IKUWMPWUS TYG HZ YDIYKPYGWY PG CUKZUKY OUXMH LUE, UGX MOYG WOHHLY U TPXXSY WHAKLY. MOYE PGLPLMYX HG MOY KYMYGMPHGHZ MOY WUTI UM XKPLLU, UWWHKXPGN MH IZAYS'L ISUG, VAM HG WOUGNPGN MOYTHBYTYGML HZ MOY HMOYK UKTPYL. MOHANO, VE MOPL WHAKLY, GYPMOYK HGY UPTGHK MOY HMOYK WHASX VY UMMUPGYX, EYM PM LYYTYX VYLM MH MOY UXOYKYGML HZMOPL MOPKX IUKME.HZ U ZHAKMO HIPGPHG MOY THLM WHGLIPWAHAL KYIKYLYGMUMPBY CUL MOYMLUKYBPWO, COH WHASX GHM ZHKNYM OPL XPLPSSALPHGTYGM UM UALMYKSPMF, COYKYOY OUX KPXXYG HAM UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY NAUKXL, PG OPL WULJAY UGX WUBUSKEAGPZHKT UL MH U KYBPYC, YDIYWMPGN MH WKALO MOY ZKYGWO NUSSUGMSE; VAMAGYDIYWMYXSE ZPGXPGN OPTLYSZ PG MOY ZKHGM SPGY OUX GUKKHCSE YLWUIYX UTPXMOY NYGYKUS WHGZALPHG. MOY TYG HZ MOPL IUKME OUX VHMO MOY JAUSPMEUGX MOY XYZYWM HZ ZKUGRGYLL PG MOYPK HIPGPHGL. MOYE ZYUKYX GUIHSYHG,KYWHNGPFYX OPL LMKYGNMO UGX MOYPK HCG CYURGYLL, UGX ZKUGRSE LUPX LH.MOYE LUPX: "GHMOPGN VAM LHKKHC, LOUTY, UGX KAPG CPSS WHTY HZ USS MOPL!CY OUBY UVUGXHGYX BPSGU UGX BPMYVLR UGX LOUSS UVUGXHG XKPLLU. MOY HGSEKYULHGUVSY MOPGN SYZM MH XH PL MH WHGWSAXY IYUWY UL LHHG UL IHLLPVSY,VYZHKY CY UKY MAKGYX HAM HZ IYMYKLVAKN."MOPL BPYC CUL BYKE NYGYKUS PG MOY AIIYK UKTE WPKWSYL UGX ZHAGX LAIIHKMUSLH PG IYMYKLVAKN UGX ZKHT MOY WOUGWYSSHK, KATEUGMLYB, COH, ZHK HMOYKKYULHGL HZ LMUMY, CUL PG ZUBHK HZ IYUWY.MOY ZPZMO IUKME WHGLPLMYX HZ MOHLY COH CYKY UXOYKYGML HZ VUKWSUE XYMHSSE, GHM LH TAWO UL U TUG VAM UL TPGPLMYK HZ CUK UGX WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ. "VY OY COUM OY TUE" (MOYE USCUEL VYNUG SPRY MOUM), "OY PL UGOHGYLM, IKUWMPWUS TUG UGX CY OUBY GHVHXE VYMMYK. NPBY OPT KYUS IHCYK,ZHK CUK WUGGHM VY WHGXAWMYX LAWWYLLZASSE CPMOHAM AGPME HZ WHTTUGX, UGXOY CPSS LOHC COUM OY WUG XH, UL OY XPX PG ZPGSUGX. PZ HAK UKTE PL CYSSHKNUGPFYX UGX LMKHGN UGX OUL CPMOXKUCG MH XKPLLU CPMOHAM LAZZYKPGNUGE XYZYUML, CY HCY MOPL YGMPKYSE MH VUKWSUE. PZ VUKWSUE PL GHC MHVY LAIYKLYXYX VE VYGGPNLYG USS CPSS VY SHLM, ZHK VYGGPNLYG LOHCYX OPLPGWUIUWPME USKYUXE PG 1807."MOY LPDMO IUKME, MOY VYGGPNLYGPMYL, LUPX, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOUM UM UGEKUMY MOYKY CUL GH HGY THKY UWMPBY UGX YDIYKPYGWYX MOUG VYGGPNLYG: "UGXMCPLM UVHAM UL EHA TUE, EHA CPSS OUBY MH WHTY MH VYGGPNLYG YBYGMAUSSE.SYM MOY HMOYKL TURY TPLMURYL GHC!" LUPX MOYE, UKNAPGN MOUM HAKKYMPKYTYGM MH XKPLLU CUL U THLM LOUTYZAS KYBYKLY UGX UG AGVKHRYG LYKPYLHZ VSAGXYKL. "MOY THKY TPLMURYL MOUM UKY TUXY MOY VYMMYK. PM CPSS UM UGEKUMY VY AGXYKLMHHX USS MOY LHHGYK MOUM MOPGNL WUGGHM NH HG SPRY MOPL.COUM PL CUGMYX PL GHM LHTY VUKWSUE HK HMOYK, VAM U TUG SPRY VYGGPNLYG,COH TUXY OPL TUKR PG 1807, UGX MH COHT GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ XPX QALMPWY--UTUG COHLY UAMOHKPME CHASX VY CPSSPGNSE KYWHNGPFYX, UGX VYGGPNLYG PL MOYHGSE LAWO TUG."MOY LYBYGMO IUKME WHGLPLMYX HZ MOY LHKM HZ IYHISY COH UKY USCUEL MHVY ZHAGX, YLIYWPUSSE UKHAGX EHAGN LHBYKYPNGL, UGX HZ COHT MOYKY CYKYIUKMPWASUKSE TUGE KHAGX USYDUGXYK--NYGYKUSL UGX PTIYKPUS UPXYL-XY-WUTIIULLPHGUMYSE XYBHMYX MH MOY YTIYKHK, GHM TYKYSE UL U THGUKWO VAM UL UTUG, UXHKPGN OPT LPGWYKYSE UGX XPLPGMYKYLMYXSE, UL KHLMHB OUX XHGYPG 1805, UGX COH LUC PG OPT GHM HGSE USS MOY BPKMAYL VAM USS OATUGWUIUVPSPMPYL UL CYSS. MOYLY TYG, MOHANO YGWOUGMYX CPMO MOY LHBYKYPNGZHK KYZALPGN MOY WHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTE, EYM VSUTYX OPT ZHK LAWO YDWYLLPBYTHXYLME, UGX HGSE XYLPKYX UGX PGLPLMYX MOUM MOYPK UXHKYX LHBYKYPNGLOHASX UVUGXHG OPL XPZZPXYGWY UGX HIYGSE UGGHAGWY MOUM OY CHASX ISUWYOPTLYSZ UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY UKTE, NUMOYK KHAGX OPT U WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'LLMUZZ, UGX, WHGLASMPGN YDIYKPYGWYX MOYHKYMPWPUGL UGX IKUWMPWUS TYG COYKYGYWYLLUKE, CHASX OPTLYSZ SYUX MOY MKHHIL, COHLY LIPKPML CHASX MOYKYVE VYKUPLYX MH MOY OPNOYLM IPMWO.MOY YPNOMO UGX SUKNYLM NKHAI, COPWO PG PML YGHKTHAL GATVYKL CUL MH MOYHMOYKL UL GPGYME-GPGY MH HGY, WHGLPLMYX HZ TYG COH XYLPKYX GYPMOYKIYUWY GHK CUK, GYPMOYK UG UXBUGWY GHK U XYZYGLPBY WUTI UM MOY XKPLLUHK UGECOYKY YSLY, GYPMOYK VUKWSUE GHK MOY YTIYKHK, GYPMOYK IZAYS GHKVYGGPNLYG, VAM HGSE MOY HGY THLM YLLYGMPUS MOPGN--UL TAWO UXBUGMUNYUGX ISYULAKY ZHK MOYTLYSBYL UL IHLLPVSY. PG MOY MKHAVSYX CUMYKL HZWHGZSPWMPGN UGX PGMYKLYWMPGN PGMKPNAYL MOUM YXXPYX UVHAM MOY YTIYKHK'LOYUXJAUKMYKL, PM CUL IHLLPVSY MH LAWWYYX PG TUGE CUEL AGMOPGRUVSY UMHMOYK MPTYL. U TUG COH LPTISE CPLOYX MH KYMUPG OPL SAWKUMPBY IHLM CHASXMHXUE UNKYY CPMO IZAYS, MHTHKKHC CPMO OPL HIIHGYGM, UGX MOY XUE UZMYK,TYKYSE MH UBHPX KYLIHGLPVPSPME HK MH ISYULY MOY YTIYKHK, CHASX XYWSUKYMOUM OY OUX GH HIPGPHG UM USS HG MOY TUMMYK. UGHMOYK COH CPLOYX MHNUPG LHTY UXBUGMUNY CHASX UMMKUWM MOY YTIYKHK'L UMMYGMPHG VE SHAXSEUXBHWUMPGN MOY BYKE MOPGN MOY YTIYKHK OUX OPGMYX UM MOY XUE VYZHKY,UGX CHASX XPLIAMY UGX LOHAM UM MOY WHAGWPS, VYUMPGN OPL VKYULM UGXWOUSSYGNPGN MOHLY COH XPX GHM UNKYY CPMO OPT MH XAYSL, MOYKYVE IKHBPGNMOUM OY CUL IKYIUKYX MH LUWKPZPWY OPTLYSZ ZHK MOY WHTTHG NHHX. U MOPKX,PG MOY UVLYGWY HZ HIIHGYGML, VYMCYYG MCH WHAGWPSL CHASX LPTISE LHSPWPMU LIYWPUS NKUMAPME ZHK OPL ZUPMOZAS LYKBPWYL, CYSS RGHCPGN MOUM UM MOUMTHTYGM IYHISY CHASX VY MHH VALE MH KYZALY OPT. U ZHAKMO COPSY LYYTPGNSEHBYKCOYSTYX CPMO CHKR CHASX HZMYG WHTY UWWPXYGMUSSE AGXYK MOY YTIYKHK'LYEY. U ZPZMO, MH UWOPYBY OPL SHGN-WOYKPLOYX UPT HZ XPGPGN CPMO MOYYTIYKHK, CHASX LMAVVHKGSE PGLPLM HG MOY WHKKYWMGYLL HK ZUSLPME HZ LHTYGYCSE YTYKNPGN HIPGPHG UGX ZHK MOPL HVQYWM CHASX IKHXAWY UKNATYGML THKYHK SYLL ZHKWPVSY UGX WHKKYWM.USS MOY TYG HZ MOPL IUKME CYKY ZPLOPGN ZHK KAVSYL, XYWHKUMPHGL, UGXIKHTHMPHGL, UGX PG MOPL IAKLAPM CUMWOYX HGSE MOY CYUMOYKWHWR HZ PTIYKPUSZUBHK, UGX XPKYWMSE MOYE GHMPWYX PM MAKGPGN PG UGE XPKYWMPHG, MOPL COHSYXKHGY IHIASUMPHG HZ MOY UKTE VYNUG VSHCPGN OUKX MOUM CUE, LH MOUM PMCUL USS MOY OUKXYK ZHK MOY YTIYKHK MH MAKG PM YSLYCOYKY. UTPX MOYAGWYKMUPGMPYL HZ MOY IHLPMPHG, CPMO MOY TYGUWY HZ LYKPHAL XUGNYK NPBPGNU IYWASPUKSE MOKYUMYGPGN WOUKUWMYK MH YBYKEMOPGN, UTPX MOPL BHKMYD HZPGMKPNAY, YNHMPLT, WHGZSPWM HZ BPYCL UGX ZYYSPGNL, UGX MOY XPBYKLPMEHZ KUWY UTHGN MOYLY IYHISY--MOPL YPNOMO UGX SUKNYLM IUKME HZ MOHLYIKYHWWAIPYX CPMO IYKLHGUS PGMYKYLML PTIUKMYX NKYUM WHGZALPHG UGXHVLWAKPME MH MOY WHTTHG MULR. COUMYBYK JAYLMPHG UKHLY, U LCUKT HZ MOYLYXKHGYL, CPMOHAM OUBPGN ZPGPLOYX MOYPK VAFFPGN HG U IKYBPHAL MOYTY, ZSYCHBYK MH MOY GYC HGY UGX VE MOYPK OAT XKHCGYX UGX HVLWAKYX MOY BHPWYL HZMOHLY COH CYKY XPLIAMPGN OHGYLMSE.ZKHT UTHGN USS MOYLY IUKMPYL, QALM UM MOY MPTY IKPGWY UGXKYC KYUWOYXMOY UKTE, UGHMOYK, U GPGMO IUKME, CUL VYPGN ZHKTYX UGX CUL VYNPGGPGNMH KUPLY PML BHPWY. PG MOPL SYMMYK, UBUPSPGN OPTLYSZ HZ IYKTPLLPHG NPBYG OPTVE MOY YTIYKHK MH XPLWALL MOY NYGYKUS WHAKLY HZ UZZUPKL, OY KYLIYWMZASSELANNYLMYX--HG MOY ISYU MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE ZHK MOY LHBYKYPNG MH UKHALYU CUKSPRY LIPKPM PG MOY IYHISY HZ MOY WUIPMUS--MOUM MOY YTIYKHK LOHASXSYUBY MOY UKTE.MOUM UKHALPGN HZ MOY IYHISY VE MOYPK LHBYKYPNG UGX OPL WUSS MH MOYT MHXYZYGX MOYPK WHAGMKE--MOY BYKE PGWPMYTYGM COPWO CUL MOY WOPYZ WUALY HZKALLPU'L MKPATIO PG LH ZUK UL PM CUL IKHXAWYX VE MOY MLUK'L IYKLHGUSIKYLYGWY PG THLWHC--CUL LANNYLMYX MH MOY YTIYKHK, UGX UWWYIMYX VE OPT,UL U IKYMYDM ZHK JAPMMPGN MOY UKTE.WOUIMYK DMOPL SYMMYK OUX GHM EYM VYYG IKYLYGMYX MH MOY YTIYKHK COYG VUKWSUE, HGYXUE UM XPGGYK, PGZHKTYX VHSRHGLRP MOUM MOY LHBYKYPNG CPLOYX MH LYY OPTIYKLHGUSSE, MH JAYLMPHG OPT UVHAM MAKRYE, UGX MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL MHIKYLYGM OPTLYSZ UM VYGGPNLYG'L JAUKMYKL UM LPD MOUM YBYGPGN.GYCL CUL KYWYPBYX UM MOY YTIYKHK'L JAUKMYKL MOUM BYKE XUE HZ U ZKYLOTHBYTYGM VE GUIHSYHG COPWO TPNOM YGXUGNYK MOY UKTE--GYCL LAVLYJAYGMSEZHAGX MH VY ZUSLY. UGX MOUM THKGPGN WHSHGYS TPWOUAX OUX KPXXYG KHAGX MOYXKPLLU ZHKMPZPWUMPHGL CPMO MOY YTIYKHK UGX OUX IHPGMYX HAM MH OPT MOUMMOPL ZHKMPZPYX WUTI WHGLMKAWMYX VE IZAYS, UGX MPSS MOYG WHGLPXYKYXU WOYZ-X'HYABKY HZ MUWMPWUS LWPYGWY COPWO CHASX YGLAKY GUIHSYHG'LXYLMKAWMPHG, CUL UG UVLAKXPME, MOKYUMYGPGN MOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ MOYKALLPUG UKTE.IKPGWY UGXKYC UKKPBYX UM VYGGPNLYG'L JAUKMYKL--U WHAGMKE NYGMSYTUG'LOHALY HZ THXYKUMY LPFY, LPMAUMYX HG MOY BYKE VUGRL HZ MOY KPBYK. GYPMOYKVYGGPNLYG GHK MOY YTIYKHK CUL MOYKY, VAM WOYKGELOYB, MOY YTIYKHK'LUPXY-XY-WUTI, KYWYPBYX VHSRHGLRP UGX PGZHKTYX OPT MOUM MOY YTIYKHK,UWWHTIUGPYX VE NYGYKUS VYGGPNLYG UGX TUKJAPL IUASAWWP, OUX NHGY U LYWHGXMPTY MOUM XUE MH PGLIYWM MOY ZHKMPZPWUMPHGL HZ MOY XKPLLU WUTI, HZ MOYLAPMUVPSPME HZ COPWO LYKPHAL XHAVML CYKY VYNPGGPGN MH VY ZYSM.WOYKGELOYB CUL LPMMPGN UM U CPGXHC PG MOY ZPKLM KHHT CPMO U ZKYGWO GHBYSPG OPL OUGX.
