OY OUX U LWPYGWY--MOY MOYHKE HZHVSPJAY THBYTYGML XYXAWYX VE OPT ZKHT MOY OPLMHKE HZ ZKYXYKPWR MOYNKYUM'L CUKL, UGX USS OY WUTY UWKHLL PG MOY OPLMHKE HZ THKY KYWYGMCUKZUKY LYYTYX MH OPT UVLAKX UGX VUKVUKHAL--THGLMKHAL WHSSPLPHGL PGCOPWO LH TUGE VSAGXYKL CYKY WHTTPMMYX VE VHMO LPXYL MOUM MOYLY CUKLWHASX GHM VY WUSSYX CUKL, MOYE XPX GHM UWWHKX CPMO MOY MOYHKE, UGXMOYKYZHKY WHASX GHM LYKBY UL TUMYKPUS ZHK LWPYGWY.PG 1806 IZAYS OUX VYYG HGY HZ MOHLY KYLIHGLPVSY, ZHK MOY ISUG HZWUTIUPNG MOUM YGXYX PG QYGU UGX UAYKLMUXM, VAM OY XPX GHM LYY MOY SYULMIKHHZ HZ MOY ZUSSPVPSPME HZ OPL MOYHKE PG MOY XPLULMYKL HZ MOUM CUK. HGMOY WHGMKUKE, MOY XYBPUMPHGL TUXY ZKHT OPL MOYHKE CYKY, PG OPL HIPGPHG,MOY LHSY WUALY HZ MOY COHSY XPLULMYK, UGX CPMO WOUKUWMYKPLMPWUSSENSYYZAS LUKWULT OY CHASX KYTUKR, "MOYKY, P LUPX MOY COHSY UZZUPK CHASXNH MH MOY XYBPS!" IZAYS CUL HGY HZ MOHLY MOYHKYMPWPUGL COH LH SHBYMOYPK MOYHKE MOUM MOYE SHLY LPNOM HZ MOY MOYHKE'L HVQYWM--PML IKUWMPWUSUIISPWUMPHG. OPL SHBY HZ MOYHKE TUXY OPT OUMY YBYKEMOPGN IKUWMPWUS, UGXOY CHASX GHM SPLMYG MH PM. OY CUL YBYG ISYULYX VE ZUPSAKYL, ZHK ZUPSAKYLKYLASMPGN ZKHT XYBPUMPHGL PG IKUWMPWY ZKHT MOY MOYHKE HGSE IKHBYX MH OPTMOY UWWAKUWE HZ OPL MOYHKE.OY LUPX U ZYC CHKXL MH IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX WOYKGELOYB UVHAM MOY IKYLYGMCUK, CPMO MOY UPK HZ U TUG COH RGHCL VYZHKYOUGX MOUM USS CPSS NH CKHGN,UGX COH PL GHM XPLISYULYX MOUM PM LOHASX VY LH. MOY AGVKALOYX MAZMLHZ OUPK LMPWRPGN AI VYOPGX UGX MOY OULMPSE VKALOYX OUPK HG OPL MYTISYLYDIKYLLYX MOPL THLM YSHJAYGMSE.OY IULLYX PGMH MOY GYDM KHHT, UGX MOY XYYI, JAYKASHAL LHAGXL HZ OPLBHPWY CYKY UM HGWY OYUKX ZKHT MOYKY.WOUIMYK DPIKPGWY UGXKYC'L YEYL CYKY LMPSS ZHSSHCPGN IZAYS HAM HZ MOY KHHT COYGWHAGM VYGGPNLYG YGMYKYX OAKKPYXSE, UGX GHXXPGN MH VHSRHGLRP, VAM GHMIUALPGN, CYGM PGMH MOY LMAXE, NPBPGN PGLMKAWMPHGL MH OPL UXQAMUGM UL OYCYGM. MOY YTIYKHK CUL ZHSSHCPGN OPT, UGX VYGGPNLYG OUX OULMYGYX HGMH TURY LHTY IKYIUKUMPHGL UGX MH VY KYUXE MH KYWYPBY MOY LHBYKYPNG.WOYKGELOYB UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO, COYKY MOY YTIYKHK,COH SHHRYX ZUMPNAYX, CUL XPLTHAGMPGN. TUKJAPL IUASAWWP CUL MUSRPGN MHOPT CPMO IUKMPWASUK CUKTMO UGX MOY YTIYKHK, CPMO OPL OYUX VYGM MH MOYSYZM, CUL SPLMYGPGN CPMO U XPLLUMPLZPYX UPK. MOY YTIYKHK THBYX ZHKCUKXYBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH YGX MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, VAM MOY ZSALOYX UGX YDWPMYXPMUSPUG, HVSPBPHAL HZ XYWHKAT, ZHSSHCYX OPT UGX WHGMPGAYX MH LIYUR."UGX UL ZHK MOY TUG COH UXBPLYX ZHKTPGN MOPL WUTI--MOY XKPLLU WUTI,"LUPX IUASAWWP, UL MOY YTIYKHK THAGMYX MOY LMYIL UGX GHMPWPGN IKPGWYUGXKYC LWUGGYX OPL AGZUTPSPUK ZUWY, "UL MH MOUM IYKLHG, LPKY..."WHGMPGAYX IUASAWWP, XYLIYKUMYSE, UIIUKYGMSE AGUVSY MH KYLMKUPG OPTLYSZ,"MOY TUG COH UXBPLYX MOY XKPLLU WUTI--P LYY GH USMYKGUMPBY VAM MOYSAGUMPW ULESAT HK MOY NUSSHCL!"CPMOHAM OYYXPGN MOY YGX HZ MOY PMUSPUG'L KYTUKRL, UGX UL MOHANOGHM OYUKPGN MOYT, MOY YTIYKHK, KYWHNGPFPGN VHSRHGLRP, UXXKYLLYX OPTNKUWPHALSE."P UT BYKE NSUX MH LYY EHA! NH PG MOYKY COYKY MOYE UKY TYYMPGN, UGX CUPMZHK TY."MOY YTIYKHK CYGM PGMH MOY LMAXE. OY CUL ZHSSHCYX VE IKPGWY IYMYKTPROUESHBPWO BHSRHGLRP UGX VUKHG LMYPG, UGX MOY XHHK WSHLYX VYOPGX MOYT.IKPGWY UGXKYC, MURPGN UXBUGMUNY HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L IYKTPLLPHG, UWWHTIUGPYXIUASAWWP, COHT OY OUX RGHCG PG MAKRYE, PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT COYKY MOYWHAGWPS CUL ULLYTVSYX.IKPGWY IYMYK TPROUESHBPWO BHSRHGLRP HWWAIPYX MOY IHLPMPHG, UL PM CYKY,HZ WOPYZ HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L LMUZZ. OY WUTY HAM HZ MOY LMAXE PGMH MOYXKUCPGN KHHT CPMO LHTY TUIL COPWO OY LIKYUX HG U MUVSY, UGX IAMJAYLMPHGL HG COPWO OY CPLOYX MH OYUK MOY HIPGPHG HZ MOY NYGMSYTYGIKYLYGM. COUM OUX OUIIYGYX CUL MOUM GYCL (COPWO UZMYKCUKXL IKHBYX MH VYZUSLY) OUX VYYG KYWYPBYX XAKPGN MOY GPNOM HZ U THBYTYGM VE MOY ZKYGWO MHHAMZSUGR MOY XKPLLU WUTI.MOY ZPKLM MH LIYUR CUL NYGYKUS UKTZYSXM COH, MH TYYM MOY XPZZPWASME MOUMIKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ, AGYDIYWMYXSE IKHIHLYX U IYKZYWMSE GYC IHLPMPHGUCUE ZKHT MOY IYMYKLVAKN UGX THLWHC KHUXL. MOY KYULHG ZHK MOPL CULPGYDISPWUVSY (AGSYLL OY CPLOYX MH LOHC MOUM OY, MHH, WHASX OUBY UGHIPGPHG), VAM OY AKNYX MOUM UM MOPL IHPGM MOY UKTE LOHASX AGPMY UGXMOYKY UCUPM MOY YGYTE. PM CUL ISUPG MOUM UKTZYSXM OUX MOHANOM HAM MOUMISUG SHGN UNH UGX GHC YDIHAGXYX PM GHM LH TAWO MH UGLCYK MOY JAYLMPHGLIAM--COPWO, PG ZUWM, OPL ISUG XPX GHM UGLCYK--UL MH UBUPS OPTLYSZ HZ MOYHIIHKMAGPME MH UPK PM. PM CUL HGY HZ MOY TPSSPHGL HZ IKHIHLUSL, HGY ULNHHX UL UGHMOYK, MOUM WHASX VY TUXY UL SHGN UL PM CUL JAPMY AGRGHCGCOUM WOUKUWMYK MOY CUK CHASX MURY. LHTY XPLIAMYX OPL UKNATYGML, HMOYKLXYZYGXYX MOYT. EHAGN WHAGM MHSS HVQYWMYX MH MOY LCYXPLO NYGYKUS'L BPYCLTHKY CUKTSE MOUG UGEHGY YSLY, UGX PG MOY WHAKLY HZ MOY XPLIAMY XKYC ZKHTOPL LPXY IHWRYM U CYSS-ZPSSYX GHMYVHHR, COPWO OY ULRYX IYKTPLLPHG MHKYUX MH MOYT. PG MOYLY BHSATPGHAL GHMYL MHSS LANNYLMYX UGHMOYK LWOYTY,MHMUSSE XPZZYKYGM ZKHT UKTZYSXM'L HK IZAYS'L ISUG HZ WUTIUPNG. PG UGLCYKMH MHSS, IUASAWWP LANNYLMYX UG UXBUGWY UGX UG UMMUWR, COPWO, OY AKNYX,WHASX USHGY YDMKPWUMY AL ZKHT MOY IKYLYGM AGWYKMUPGME UGX ZKHT MOY MKUI(UL OY WUSSYX MOY XKPLLU WUTI) PG COPWO CY CYKY LPMAUMYX.XAKPGN USS MOYLY XPLWALLPHGL IZAYS UGX OPL PGMYKIKYMYK, CHSFHNYG(OPL "VKPXNY" PG WHAKM KYSUMPHGL), CYKY LPSYGM. IZAYS HGSE LGHKMYXWHGMYTIMAHALSE UGX MAKGYX UCUE, MH LOHC MOUM OY CHASX GYBYK XYTYUGOPTLYSZ VE KYISEPGN MH LAWO GHGLYGLY UL OY CUL GHC OYUKPGN. LH COYGIKPGWY BHSRHGLRP, COH CUL PG MOY WOUPK, WUSSYX HG OPT MH NPBY OPLHIPGPHG, OY TYKYSE LUPX:"COE ULR TY? NYGYKUS UKTZYSXM OUL IKHIHLYX U LISYGXPX IHLPMPHG CPMO UGYDIHLYX KYUK, HK COE GHM MOPL PMUSPUG NYGMSYTUG'L UMMUWR--BYKE ZPGY, HKU KYMKYUM, USLH NHHX! COE ULR TY?" LUPX OY. "COE, EHA EHAKLYSBYL RGHCYBYKEMOPGN VYMMYK MOUG P XH."VAM COYG BHSRHGLRP LUPX, CPMO U ZKHCG, MOUM PM CUL PG MOY YTIYKHK'L GUTYMOUM OY ULRYX OPL HIPGPHG, IZAYS KHLY UGX, LAXXYGSE NKHCPGN UGPTUMYX,VYNUG MH LIYUR:"YBYKEMOPGN OUL VYYG LIHPSYX, YBYKEMOPGN TAXXSYX, YBYKEVHXE MOHANOM MOYERGYC VYMMYK MOUG P XPX, UGX GHC EHA WHTY MH TY! OHC TYGX TUMMYKL? MOYKYPL GHMOPGN MH TYGX! MOY IKPGWPISYL SUPX XHCG VE TY TALM VY LMKPWMSEUXOYKYX MH," LUPX OY, XKATTPGN HG MOY MUVSY CPMO OPL VHGE ZPGNYKL. "COUMPL MOY XPZZPWASME? GHGLYGLY, WOPSXPLOGYLL!"OY CYGM AI MH MOY TUI UGX LIYURPGN KUIPXSE VYNUG IKHBPGN MOUM GHYBYGMAUSPME WHASX USMYK MOY YZZPWPYGWE HZ MOY XKPLLU WUTI, MOUMYBYKEMOPGN OUX VYYG ZHKYLYYG, UGX MOUM PZ MOY YGYTE CYKY KYUSSE NHPGN MHHAMZSUGR PM, MOY YGYTE CHASX PGYBPMUVSE VY XYLMKHEYX.IUASAWWP, COH XPX GHM RGHC NYKTUG, VYNUG JAYLMPHGPGN OPT PG ZKYGWO.CHSFHNYG WUTY MH MOY ULLPLMUGWY HZ OPL WOPYZ, COH LIHRY ZKYGWO VUXSE,UGX VYNUG MKUGLSUMPGN ZHK OPT, OUKXSE UVSY MH RYYI IUWY CPMO IZAYS, COHCUL KUIPXSE XYTHGLMKUMPGN MOUM GHM HGSE USS MOUM OUX OUIIYGYX, VAM USSMOUM WHASX OUIIYG, OUX VYYG ZHKYLYYG PG OPL LWOYTY, UGX MOUM PZ MOYKYCYKY GHC UGE XPZZPWASMPYL MOY COHSY ZUASM SUE PG MOY ZUWM MOUM OPL ISUGOUX GHM VYYG IKYWPLYSE YDYWAMYX. OY RYIM SUANOPGN LUKWULMPWUSSE, OYXYTHGLMKUMYX, UGX UM SULM WHGMYTIMAHALSE WYULYX MH XYTHGLMKUMY, SPRYU TUMOYTUMPWPUG COH WYULYL MH IKHBY PG BUKPHAL CUEL MOY UWWAKUWE HZU IKHVSYT MOUM OUL USKYUXE VYYG IKHBYX. CHSFHNYG MHHR OPL ISUWY UGXWHGMPGAYX MH YDISUPG OPL BPYCL PG ZKYGWO, YBYKE GHC UGX MOYG MAKGPGN MHIZAYS UGX LUEPGN, "PL PM GHM LH, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE?" VAM IZAYS, SPRY U TUGOYUMYX PG U ZPNOM COH LMKPRYL MOHLY HG OPL HCG LPXY, LOHAMYX UGNKPSE UMOPL HCG LAIIHKMYK, CHSFHNYG:"CYSS, HZ WHAKLY, COUM THKY PL MOYKY MH YDISUPG?"IUASAWWP UGX TPWOUAX VHMO UMMUWRYX CHSFHNYG LPTASMUGYHALSE PG ZKYGWO.UKTZYSXM UXXKYLLYX IZAYS PG NYKTUG. MHSS YDISUPGYX MH BHSRHGLRP PGKALLPUG. IKPGWY UGXKYC SPLMYGYX UGX HVLYKBYX PG LPSYGWY.HZ USS MOYLY TYG IKPGWY UGXKYC LETIUMOPFYX THLM CPMO IZAYS, UGNKE,XYMYKTPGYX, UGX UVLAKXSE LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM UL OY CUL. HZ USS MOHLY IKYLYGM,YBPXYGMSE OY USHGY CUL GHM LYYRPGN UGEMOPGN ZHK OPTLYSZ, GAKLYX GHOUMKYX UNUPGLM UGEHGY, UGX HGSE XYLPKYX MOUM MOY ISUG, ZHKTYX HG UMOYHKE UKKPBYX UM VE EYUKL HZ MHPS, LOHASX VY WUKKPYX HAM. VYLPXYL MOPL, MOY KYTUKRLHZ USS YDWYIM IZAYS OUX HGY WHTTHG MKUPM MOUM OUX GHM VYYG GHMPWYUVSYUM MOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK PG 1805: MOYKY CUL GHC U IUGPW ZYUK HZ GUIHSYHG'LNYGPAL, COPWO, MOHANO WHGWYUSYX, CUL GHMPWYUVSY PG YBYKE KYQHPGXYK.YBYKEMOPGN CUL ULLATYX MH VY IHLLPVSY ZHK GUIHSYHG, MOYE YDIYWMYX OPTZKHT YBYKE LPXY, UGX PGBHRYX OPL MYKKPVSY GUTY MH LOUMMYK YUWO HMOYK'LIKHIHLUSL. IZAYS USHGY LYYTYX MH WHGLPXYK GUIHSYHG U VUKVUKPUG SPRYYBYKEHGY YSLY COH HIIHLYX OPL MOYHKE. VAM VYLPXYL MOPL ZYYSPGN HZKYLIYWM, IZAYS YBHRYX IPME PG IKPGWY UGXKYC. ZKHT MOY MHGY PG COPWOMOY WHAKMPYKL UXXKYLLYX OPT UGX MOY CUE IUASAWWP OUX USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MHLIYUR HZ OPT MH MOY YTIYKHK, VAM UVHBY USS ZKHT U WYKMUPG XYLIYKUMPHGPG IZAYS'L HCG YDIKYLLPHGL, PM CUL WSYUK MOUM MOY HMOYKL RGYC, UGX IZAYSOPTLYSZ ZYSM, MOUM OPL ZUSS CUL UM OUGX. UGX XYLIPMY OPL LYSZ-WHGZPXYGWYUGX NKATIE NYKTUG LUKWULT OY CUL IPMPUVSY, CPMO OPL OUPK LTHHMOSEVKALOYX HG MOY MYTISYL UGX LMPWRPGN AI PG MAZML VYOPGX. MOHANO OYWHGWYUSYX MOY ZUWM AGXYK U LOHC HZ PKKPMUMPHG UGX WHGMYTIM, OY CULYBPXYGMSE PG XYLIUPK MOUM MOY LHSY KYTUPGPGN WOUGWY HZ BYKPZEPGN OPLMOYHKE VE U OANY YDIYKPTYGM UGX IKHBPGN PML LHAGXGYLL MH MOY COHSY CHKSXCUL LSPIIPGN UCUE ZKHT OPT.MOY XPLWALLPHGL WHGMPGAYX U SHGN MPTY, UGX MOY SHGNYK MOYE SULMYXMOY THKY OYUMYX VYWUTY MOY XPLIAMYL, WASTPGUMPGN PG LOHAML UGXIYKLHGUSPMPYL, UGX MOY SYLL CUL PM IHLLPVSY MH UKKPBY UM UGE NYGYKUSWHGWSALPHG ZKHT USS MOUM OUX VYYG LUPX. IKPGWY UGXKYC, SPLMYGPGN MH MOPLIHSENSHM MUSR UGX MH MOYLY LAKTPLYL, ISUGL, KYZAMUMPHGL, UGX LOHAML,ZYSM GHMOPGN VAM UTUFYTYGM UM COUM MOYE CYKY LUEPGN. U MOHANOM MOUM OUXSHGN LPGWY UGX HZMYG HWWAKKYX MH OPT XAKPGN OPL TPSPMUKE UWMPBPMPYL--MOYPXYU MOUM MOYKY PL GHM UGX WUGGHM VY UGE LWPYGWY HZ CUK, UGX MOUMMOYKYZHKY MOYKY WUG VY GH LAWO MOPGN UL U TPSPMUKE NYGPAL--GHC UIIYUKYXMH OPT UG HVBPHAL MKAMO. "COUM MOYHKE UGX LWPYGWY PL IHLLPVSY UVHAM UTUMMYK MOY WHGXPMPHGL UGX WPKWATLMUGWYL HZ COPWO UKY AGRGHCG UGX WUGGHMVY XYZPGYX, YLIYWPUSSE COYG MOY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY UWMPGN ZHKWYL WUGGHM VYULWYKMUPGYX? GH HGY CUL HK PL UVSY MH ZHKYLYY PG COUM WHGXPMPHG HAK HKMOY YGYTE'L UKTPYL CPSS VY PG U XUE'L MPTY, UGX GH HGY WUG NUANY MOYZHKWY HZ MOPL HK MOUM XYMUWOTYGM. LHTYMPTYL--COYG MOYKY PL GHM U WHCUKXUM MOY ZKHGM MH LOHAM, 'CY UKY WAM HZZ!' UGX LMUKM KAGGPGN, VAM U VKUBYUGX QHSSE SUX COH LOHAML, 'OAKKUO!'--U XYMUWOTYGM HZ ZPBY MOHALUGXPL CHKMO MOPKME MOHALUGX, UL UM LWOHG NKUVYKG, COPSY UM MPTYL ZPZMEMOHALUGX KAG ZKHT YPNOM MOHALUGX, UL UM UALMYKSPMF. COUM LWPYGWY WUGMOYKY VY PG U TUMMYK PG COPWO, UL PG USS IKUWMPWUS TUMMYKL, GHMOPGNWUG VY XYZPGYX UGX YBYKEMOPGN XYIYGXL HG PGGATYKUVSY WHGXPMPHGL, MOYLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ COPWO PL XYMYKTPGYX UM U IUKMPWASUK THTYGM COPWO UKKPBYLGH HGY RGHCL COYG? UKTZYSXM LUEL HAK UKTE PL WAM PG OUSZ, UGX IUASAWWPLUEL CY OUBY NHM MOY ZKYGWO UKTE VYMCYYG MCH ZPKYL; TPWOUAX LUEL MOUMMOY CHKMOSYLLGYLL HZ MOY XKPLLU WUTI SPYL PG OUBPGN MOY KPBYK VYOPGX PM,UGX IZAYS LUEL MOUM PL COUM WHGLMPMAMYL PML LMKYGNMO; MHSS IKHIHLYLHGY ISUG, UKTZYSXM UGHMOYK, UGX MOYE UKY USS NHHX UGX USS VUX, UGX MOYUXBUGMUNYL HZ UGE LANNYLMPHGL WUG VY LYYG HGSE UM MOY THTYGM HZ MKPUS.UGX COE XH MOYE USS LIYUR HZ U 'TPSPMUKE NYGPAL'? PL U TUG U NYGPAL COHWUG HKXYK VKYUX MH VY VKHANOM AI UM MOY KPNOM MPTY UGX LUE COH PL MH NHMH MOY KPNOM UGX COH MH MOY SYZM? PM PL HGSE VYWUALY TPSPMUKE TYG UKYPGBYLMYX CPMO IHTI UGX IHCYK UGX WKHCXL HZ LEWOHIOUGML ZSUMMYK IHCYK,UMMKPVAMPGN MH PM JAUSPMPYL HZ NYGPAL PM XHYL GHM IHLLYLL. MOY VYLMNYGYKUSL P OUBY RGHCG CYKY, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, LMAIPX HK UVLYGM-TPGXYXTYG. VUNKUMPHG CUL MOY VYLM, GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ UXTPMMYX MOUM. UGX HZVHGUIUKMY OPTLYSZ! P KYTYTVYK OPL SPTPMYX, LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX ZUWY HG MOYZPYSX HZ UALMYKSPMF. GHM HGSE XHYL U NHHX UKTE WHTTUGXYK GHM GYYX UGELIYWPUS JAUSPMPYL, HG MOY WHGMKUKE OY GYYXL MOY UVLYGWY HZ MOY OPNOYLMUGX VYLM OATUG UMMKPVAMYL--SHBY, IHYMKE, MYGXYKGYLL, UGX IOPSHLHIOPWPGJAPKPGN XHAVM. OY LOHASX VY SPTPMYX, ZPKTSE WHGBPGWYX MOUM COUM OYPL XHPGN PL BYKE PTIHKMUGM (HMOYKCPLY OY CPSS GHM OUBY LAZZPWPYGMIUMPYGWY), UGX HGSE MOYG CPSS OY VY U VKUBY SYUXYK. NHX ZHKVPX MOUM OYLOHASX VY OATUGY, LOHASX SHBY, HK IPME, HK MOPGR HZ COUM PL QALMUGX AGQALM. PM PL AGXYKLMUGXUVSY MOUM U MOYHKE HZ MOYPK 'NYGPAL' CULPGBYGMYX ZHK MOYT SHGN UNH VYWUALY MOYE OUBY IHCYK! MOY LAWWYLL HZ UTPSPMUKE UWMPHG XYIYGXL GHM HG MOYT, VAM HG MOY TUG PG MOY KUGRL COHLOHAML, 'CY UKY SHLM!' HK COH LOHAML, 'OAKKUO!' UGX HGSE PG MOY KUGRLWUG HGY LYKBY CPMO ULLAKUGWY HZ VYPGN ALYZAS."LH MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC UL OY SPLMYGYX MH MOY MUSRPGN, UGX OY KHALYXOPTLYSZ HGSE COYG IUASAWWP WUSSYX OPT UGX YBYKEHGY CUL SYUBPGN.UM MOY KYBPYC GYDM XUE MOY YTIYKHK ULRYX IKPGWY UGXKYC COYKY OY CHASXSPRY MH LYKBY, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC SHLM OPL LMUGXPGN PG WHAKM WPKWSYLZHKYBYK VE GHM ULRPGN MH KYTUPG UMMUWOYX MH MOY LHBYKYPNG'L IYKLHG, VAMZHK IYKTPLLPHG MH LYKBY PG MOY UKTE.WOUIMYK DPPVYZHKY MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY WUTIUPNG, KHLMHB OUX KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHTOPL IUKYGML PG COPWO MOYE MHSX OPT VKPYZSE HZ GUMULOU'L PSSGYLL UGX MOYVKYURPGN HZZ HZ OYK YGNUNYTYGM MH IKPGWY UGXKYC (COPWO MOYE YDISUPGYX VEGUMULOU'L OUBPGN KYQYWMYX OPT) UGX UNUPG ULRYX GPWOHSUL MH KYMPKY ZKHTMOY UKTE UGX KYMAKG OHTY. HG KYWYPBPGN MOPL SYMMYK, GPWOHSUL XPX GHMYBYG TURY UGE UMMYTIM MH NYM SYUBY HZ UVLYGWY HK MH KYMPKY ZKHT MOYUKTE, VAM CKHMY MH OPL IUKYGML MOUM OY CUL LHKKE GUMULOU CUL PSS UGX OYKYGNUNYTYGM VKHRYG HZZ, UGX MOUM OY CHASX XH USS OY WHASX MH TYYM MOYPKCPLOYL. MH LHGEU OY CKHMY LYIUKUMYSE."UXHKYX ZKPYGX HZ TE LHAS!" OY CKHMY. "GHMOPGN VAM OHGHK WHASX RYYITY ZKHT KYMAKGPGN MH MOY WHAGMKE. VAM GHC, UM MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ MOYWUTIUPNG, P LOHASX ZYYS XPLOHGHKYX, GHM HGSE PG TE WHTKUXYL' YEYL VAMPG TE HCG, PZ P IKYZYKKYX TE HCG OUIIPGYLL MH TE SHBY UGX XAME MH MOYZUMOYKSUGX. "U LISYGXPX CPZY, WOPSXKYG, U NHHX IUWR HZ OHAGXL, UXHFYG SYULOYL HZ LTUKM VHKFHPL, UNKPWASMAKY, GYPNOVHKL, LYKBPWY VEYSYWMPHG..." MOHANOM OY. VAM GHC MOY WUTIUPNG CUL VYNPGGPGN, UGX OY OUXMH KYTUPG CPMO OPL KYNPTYGM. XAKPGN OPL UVLYGWY OY OUX VYYG IKHTHMYX WUIMUPG,UGX COYG MOY KYNPTYGM CUL IAM HG CUK ZHHMPGN CPMO UG PGWKYULY PGGATVYKL, OY CUL UNUPG USSHMMYX OPL HSX LJAUXKHG.MOY WUTIUPNG VYNUG, MOY KYNPTYGM CUL THBYX PGMH IHSUGX HG XHAVSY IUE,GYC HZZPWYKL UKKPBYX, GYC TYG UGX OHKLYL, UGX UVHBY USS YBYKEVHXE CULPGZYWMYX CPMO MOY TYKKPSE YDWPMYX THHX MOUM NHYL CPMO MOY WHTTYGWYTYGMHZ U CUK, UGX KHLMHB, WHGLWPHAL HZ OPL UXBUGMUNYHAL IHLPMPHG PG MOYKYNPTYGM, XYBHMYX OPTLYSZ YGMPKYSE MH MOY ISYULAKYL UGX PGMYKYLML HZTPSPMUKE LYKBPWY, MOHANO OY RGYC MOUM LHHGYK HK SUMYK OY CHASX OUBY MHKYSPGJAPLO MOYT.MOY MKHHIL KYMPKYX ZKHT BPSGU ZHK BUKPHAL WHTISPWUMYX KYULHGL HZ LMUMY,IHSPMPWUS UGX LMKUMYNPW. YUWO LMYI HZ MOY KYMKYUM CUL UWWHTIUGPYX VEU WHTISPWUMYX PGMYKISUE HZ PGMYKYLML, UKNATYGML, UGX IULLPHGL UMOYUXJAUKMYKL. ZHK MOY IUBSHNKUX OALLUKL, OHCYBYK, MOY COHSY HZ MOPLKYMKYUM XAKPGN MOY ZPGYLM IYKPHX HZ LATTYK UGX CPMO LAZZPWPYGM LAIISPYLCUL U BYKE LPTISY UGX UNKYYUVSY VALPGYLL.PM CUL HGSE UM OYUXJAUKMYKL MOUM MOYKY CUL XYIKYLLPHG, AGYULPGYLL, UGXPGMKPNAPGN; PG MOY VHXE HZ MOY UKTE MOYE XPX GHM ULR MOYTLYSBYL COYKYMOYE CYKY NHPGN HK COE. PZ MOYE KYNKYMMYX OUBPGN MH KYMKYUM, PM CUL HGSEVYWUALY MOYE OUX MH SYUBY VPSSYML MOYE OUX NKHCG UWWALMHTYX MH, HK LHTYIKYMME EHAGN IHSPLO SUXE. PZ MOY MOHANOM MOUM MOPGNL SHHRYX VUX WOUGWYXMH YGMYK UGEHGY'L OYUX, OY MKPYX MH VY UL WOYYKZAS UL VYZPML U NHHXLHSXPYK UGX GHM MH MOPGR HZ MOY NYGYKUS MKYGX HZ UZZUPKL, VAM HGSE HZMOY MULR GYUKYLM MH OUGX. ZPKLM MOYE WUTIYX NUPSE VYZHKY BPSGU, TURPGNUWJAUPGMUGWY CPMO MOY IHSPLO SUGXHCGYKL, IKYIUKPGN ZHK KYBPYCL UGX VYPGNKYBPYCYX VE MOY YTIYKHK UGX HMOYK OPNO WHTTUGXYKL. MOYG WUTY UG HKXYKMH KYMKYUM MH LBYGMLEUGP UGX XYLMKHE UGE IKHBPLPHGL MOYE WHASX GHM WUKKEUCUE CPMO MOYT. LBYGMLEUGP CUL KYTYTVYKYX VE MOY OALLUKL HGSE UL MOYXKAGRYG WUTI, U GUTY MOY COHSY UKTE NUBY MH MOYPK YGWUTITYGM MOYKY,UGX VYWUALY TUGE WHTISUPGML CYKY TUXY UNUPGLM MOY MKHHIL, COH, MURPGNUXBUGMUNY HZ MOY HKXYK MH WHSSYWM IKHBPLPHGL, MHHR USLH OHKLYL,WUKKPUNYL, UGX WUKIYML ZKHT MOY IHSPLO IKHIKPYMHKL. KHLMHB KYTYTVYKYXLBYGMLEUGP, VYWUALY HG MOY ZPKLM XUE HZ MOYPK UKKPBUS UM MOUM LTUSS MHCGOY WOUGNYX OPL LYKNYUGM TUQHK UGX CUL AGUVSY MH TUGUNY USS MOY XKAGRYGTYG HZ OPL LJAUXKHG COH, AGRGHCG MH OPT, OUX UIIKHIKPUMYX ZPBY VUKKYSLHZ HSX VYYK. ZKHT LBYGMLEUGP MOYE KYMPKYX ZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYK MH XKPLLU,UGX MOYGWY UNUPG VYEHGX XKPLLU, XKUCPGN GYUK MH MOY ZKHGMPYK HZ KALLPUIKHIYK.HG MOY MOPKMYYGMO HZ QASE MOY IUBSHNKUXL MHHR IUKM PG U LYKPHAL UWMPHGZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY.HG MOY MCYSZMO HZ QASE, HG MOY YBY HZ MOUM UWMPHG, MOYKY CUL U OYUBELMHKT HZ KUPG UGX OUPS. PG NYGYKUS, MOY LATTYK HZ 1812 CUL KYTUKRUVSYZHK PML LMHKTL.MOY MCH IUBSHNKUX LJAUXKHGL CYKY VPBHAUWRPGN HG U ZPYSX HZ KEY, COPWOCUL USKYUXE PG YUK VAM OUX VYYG WHTISYMYSE MKHXXYG XHCG VE WUMMSY UGXOHKLYL. MOY KUPG CUL XYLWYGXPGN PG MHKKYGML, UGX KHLMHB, CPMO U EHAGNHZZPWYK GUTYX PSEPG, OPL IKHMYNY, CUL LPMMPGN PG U OULMPSE WHGLMKAWMYXLOYSMYK. UG HZZPWYK HZ MOYPK KYNPTYGM, CPMO SHGN TALMUWOYL YDMYGXPGNHGMH OPL WOYYRL, COH UZMYK KPXPGN MH MOY LMUZZ OUX VYYG HBYKMURYG VE MOYKUPG, YGMYKYX KHLMHB'L LOYSMYK."P OUBY WHTY ZKHT MOY LMUZZ, WHAGM. OUBY EHA OYUKX HZ KUYBLRP'LYDISHPM?"UGX MOY HZZPWYK NUBY MOYT XYMUPSL HZ MOY LUSMUGHB VUMMSY, COPWO OY OUXOYUKX UM MOY LMUZZ.KHLMHB, LTHRPGN OPL IPIY UGX MAKGPGN OPL OYUX UVHAM UL MOY CUMYKMKPWRSYX XHCG OPL GYWR, SPLMYGYX PGUMMYGMPBYSE, CPMO UG HWWULPHGUSNSUGWY UM PSEPG, COH CUL IKYLLPGN WSHLY MH OPT. MOPL HZZPWYK, U SUXHZ LPDMYYG COH OUX KYWYGMSE QHPGYX MOY KYNPTYGM, CUL GHC PG MOY LUTYKYSUMPHG MH GPWOHSUL MOUM GPWOHSUL OUX VYYG MH XYGPLHB LYBYG EYUKLVYZHKY. PSEPG MKPYX MH PTPMUMY KHLMHB PG YBYKEMOPGN UGX UXHKYX OPT UL UNPKS TPNOM OUBY XHGY.FXKFOPGLRP, MOY HZZPWYK CPMO MOY SHGN TALMUWOY, LIHRY NKUGXPSHJAYGMSE HZMOY LUSMUGHB XUT VYPGN "U KALLPUG MOYKTHIESUY," UGX HZ OHC U XYYX CHKMOEHZ UGMPJAPME OUX VYYG IYKZHKTYX VE NYGYKUS KUYBLRP. OY KYWHAGMYX OHCKUYBLRP OUX SYX OPL MCH LHGL HGMH MOY XUT AGXYK MYKKPZPW ZPKY UGX OUXWOUKNYX CPMO MOYT VYLPXY OPT. KHLMHB OYUKX MOY LMHKE UGX GHM HGSE LUPXGHMOPGN MH YGWHAKUNY FXKFOPGLRP'L YGMOALPULT VAM, HG MOY WHGMKUKE,SHHRYX SPRY U TUG ULOUTYX HZ COUM OY CUL OYUKPGN, MOHANO CPMO GHPGMYGMPHG HZ WHGMKUXPWMPGN PM. LPGWY MOY WUTIUPNGL HZ UALMYKSPMF UGXHZ 1807 KHLMHB RGYC VE YDIYKPYGWY MOUM TYG USCUEL SPY COYG XYLWKPVPGNTPSPMUKE YDISHPML, UL OY OPTLYSZ OUX XHGY COYG KYWHAGMPGN MOYT; VYLPXYLMOUM, OY OUX YDIYKPYGWY YGHANO MH RGHC MOUM GHMOPGN OUIIYGL PG CUK UMUSS UL CY WUG PTUNPGY HK KYSUMY PM. UGX LH OY XPX GHM SPRY FXKFOPGLRP'LMUSY, GHK XPX OY SPRY FXKFOPGLRP OPTLYSZ COH, CPMO OPL TALMUWOYLYDMYGXPGN HBYK OPL WOYYRL, VYGM SHC HBYK MOY ZUWY HZ OPL OYUKYK, UL CULOPL OUVPM, UGX WKHCXYX KHLMHB PG MOY GUKKHC LOUGME. KHLMHB SHHRYX UM OPTPG LPSYGWY. "PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY, MOYKY TALM OUBY VYYG LAWO U WHGZALPHGUGX WKHCXPGN HG MOY XUT MOUM CUL VYPGN UMMUWRYX MOUM PZ KUYBLRP XPX SYUXOPL LHGL MOYKY, PM WHASX OUBY OUX GH YZZYWM YDWYIM IYKOUIL HG LHTY XHFYGTYG GYUKYLM MH OPT," MOHANOM OY, "MOY KYLM WHASX GHM OUBY LYYG OHC HKCPMO COHT KUYBLRP WUTY HGMH MOY XUT. UGX YBYG MOHLY COH XPX LYY PMCHASX GHM OUBY VYYG TAWO LMPTASUMYX VE PM, ZHK COUM OUX MOYE MH XH CPMOKUYBLRP'L MYGXYK IUMYKGUS ZYYSPGNL COYG MOYPK HCG LRPGL CYKY PG XUGNYK?UGX VYLPXYL, MOY ZUMY HZ MOY ZUMOYKSUGX XPX GHM XYIYGX HG COYMOYKMOYE MHHR MOY LUSMUGHB XUT HK GHM, UL CY UKY MHSX CUL MOY WULY UMMOYKTHIESUY. LH COE LOHASX OY OUBY TUXY LAWO U LUWKPZPWY? UGX COE YDIHLYOPL HCG WOPSXKYG PG MOY VUMMSY? P CHASX GHM OUBY MURYG TE VKHMOYK IYMEUMOYKY, HK YBYG PSEPG, COH'L U LMKUGNYK MH TY VAM U GPWY SUX, VAM CHASXOUBY MKPYX MH IAM MOYT LHTYCOYKY AGXYK WHBYK," GPWOHSUL WHGMPGAYXMH MOPGR, UL OY SPLMYGYX MH FXKFOPGLRP. VAM OY XPX GHM YDIKYLL OPLMOHANOML, ZHK PG LAWO TUMMYKL, MHH, OY OUX NUPGYX YDIYKPYGWY. OY RGYCMOUM MOPL MUSY KYXHAGXYX MH MOY NSHKE HZ HAK UKTL UGX LH HGY OUX MHIKYMYGX GHM MH XHAVM PM. UGX OY UWMYX UWWHKXPGNSE."P WUG'M LMUGX MOPL UGE THKY," LUPX PSEPG, GHMPWPGN MOUM KHLMHB XPX GHMKYSPLO FXKFOPGLRP'L WHGBYKLUMPHG. "TE LMHWRPGNL UGX LOPKM... UGX MOYCUMYK PL KAGGPGN HG TE LYUM! P'SS NH UGX SHHR ZHK LOYSMYK. MOY KUPGLYYTL SYLL OYUBE."PSEPG CYGM HAM UGX FXKFOPGLRP KHXY UCUE.ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK PSEPG, LISULOPGN MOKHANO MOY TAX, WUTY KAGGPGN VUWRMH MOY LOUGME."OAKKUO! KHLMHB, WHTY JAPWR! P'BY ZHAGX PM! UVHAM MCH OAGXKYX EUKXL UCUEMOYKY'L U MUBYKG COYKY HAKL OUBY USKYUXE NUMOYKYX. CY WUG UM SYULM NYMXKE MOYKY, UGX TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU'L MOYKY."TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU CUL MOY CPZY HZ MOY KYNPTYGMUS XHWMHK, U IKYMME EHAGNNYKTUG CHTUG OY OUX TUKKPYX PG IHSUGX. MOY XHWMHK, COYMOYK ZKHT SUWRHZ TYUGL HK VYWUALY OY XPX GHM SPRY MH IUKM ZKHT OPL EHAGN CPZY PGMOY YUKSE XUEL HZ MOYPK TUKKPUNY, MHHR OYK UVHAM CPMO OPT COYKYBYK MOYOALLUK KYNPTYGM CYGM UGX OPL QYUSHALE OUX VYWHTY U LMUGXPGN QHRY UTHGNMOY OALLUK HZZPWYKL.KHLMHB MOKYC OPL WSHUR HBYK OPL LOHASXYKL, LOHAMYX MH SUBKALORU MHZHSSHC CPMO MOY MOPGNL, UGX--GHC LSPIIPGN PG MOY TAX, GHC LISULOPGNKPNOM MOKHANO PM--LYM HZZ CPMO PSEPG PG MOY SYLLYGPGN KUPG UGX MOYXUKRGYLL MOUM CUL HWWULPHGUSSE KYGM VE XPLMUGM SPNOMGPGN."KHLMHB, COYKY UKY EHA?""OYKY. COUM SPNOMGPGN!" MOYE WUSSYX MH HGY UGHMOYK.WOUIMYK DPPPPG MOY MUBYKG, VYZHKY COPWO LMHHX MOY XHWMHK'L WHBYKYX WUKM, MOYKY CYKYUSKYUXE LHTY ZPBY HZZPWYKL. TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU, U ISATI SPMMSY VSHGXYNYKTUG, PG U XKYLLPGN QUWRYM UGX GPNOMWUI, CUL LPMMPGN HG U VKHUX VYGWOPG MOY ZKHGM WHKGYK. OYK OALVUGX, MOY XHWMHK, SUE ULSYYI VYOPGX OYK.KHLMHB UGX PSEPG, HG YGMYKPGN MOY KHHT, CYKY CYSWHTYX CPMO TYKKE LOHAMLUGX SUANOMYK."XYUK TY, OHC QHSSE CY UKY!" LUPX KHLMHB SUANOPGN."UGX COE XH EHA LMUGX MOYKY NUIPGN?""COUM LCYSSL MOYE UKY! COE, MOY CUMYK LMKYUTL ZKHT MOYT! XHG'M TURY HAKXKUCPGN KHHT LH CYM.""XHG'M TYLL TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU'L XKYLL!" WKPYX HMOYK BHPWYL.KHLMHB UGX PSEPG OULMYGYX MH ZPGX U WHKGYK COYKY MOYE WHASX WOUGNY PGMHXKE WSHMOYL CPMOHAM HZZYGXPGN TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU'L THXYLME. MOYE CYKYNHPGN PGMH U MPGE KYWYLL VYOPGX U IUKMPMPHG MH WOUGNY, VAM ZHAGX PMWHTISYMYSE ZPSSYX VE MOKYY HZZPWYKL COH LUM ISUEPGN WUKXL VE MOY SPNOMHZ U LHSPMUKE WUGXSY HG UG YTIME VHD, UGX MOYLY HZZPWYKL CHASX HG GHUWWHAGM EPYSX MOYPK IHLPMPHG. TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU HVSPNYX MOYT CPMO MOYSHUG HZ U IYMMPWHUM MH VY ALYX UL U WAKMUPG, UGX VYOPGX MOUM LWKYYGKHLMHB UGX PSEPG, OYSIYX VE SUBKALORU COH OUX VKHANOM MOYPK RPML,WOUGNYX MOYPK CYM MOPGNL ZHK XKE HGYL.U ZPKY CUL TUXY AI PG MOY XPSUIPXUMYX VKPWR LMHBY. U VHUKX CUL ZHAGX,ZPDYX HG MCH LUXXSYL UGX WHBYKYX CPMO U OHKLYWSHMO, U LTUSS LUTHBUK CULIKHXAWYX UGX U WYSSUKYM UGX OUSZ U VHMMSY HZ KAT, UGX OUBPGN ULRYX TUKEOYGXKPROHBGU MH IKYLPXY, MOYE USS WKHCXYX KHAGX OYK. HGY HZZYKYX OYK UWSYUG OUGXRYKWOPYZ MH CPIY OYK WOUKTPGN OUGXL, UGHMOYK LIKYUX U QUWRYMAGXYK OYK SPMMSY ZYYM MH RYYI MOYT ZKHT MOY XUTI, UGHMOYK OAGN OPL WHUMHBYK MOY CPGXHC MH RYYI HAM MOY XKUZM, UGX EYM UGHMOYK CUBYX MOY ZSPYLHZZ OYK OALVUGX'L ZUWY, SYLM OY LOHASX CURY AI."SYUBY OPT USHGY," LUPX TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU, LTPSPGN MPTPXSE UGX OUIIPSE."OY PL LSYYIPGN CYSS UL PM PL, UZMYK U LSYYISYLL GPNOM.""HO, GH, TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU," KYISPYX MOY HZZPWYK, "HGY TALM SHHR UZMYKMOY XHWMHK. IYKOUIL OY'SS MURY IPME HG TY LHTYXUE, COYG PM WHTYL MHWAMMPGN HZZ U SYN HK UG UKT ZHK TY."MOYKY CYKY HGSE MOKYY MATVSYKL, MOY CUMYK CUL LH TAXXE MOUM HGY WHASXGHM TURY HAM COYMOYK MOY MYU CUL LMKHGN HK CYUR, UGX MOY LUTHBUK OYSXHGSE LPD MATVSYKL HZ CUMYK, VAM MOPL TUXY PM USS MOY ISYULUGMYK MHMURY MAKGL PG HKXYK HZ LYGPHKPME MH KYWYPBY HGY'L MATVSYK ZKHT TUKEOYGXKPROHBGU'L ISATI SPMMSY OUGXL CPMO MOYPK LOHKM UGX GHM HBYKWSYUGGUPSL. USS MOY HZZPWYKL UIIYUKYX MH VY, UGX KYUSSE CYKY, PG SHBY CPMOOYK MOUM YBYGPGN. YBYG MOHLY ISUEPGN WUKXL VYOPGX MOY IUKMPMPHG LHHGSYZM MOYPK NUTY UGX WUTY HBYK MH MOY LUTHBUK, EPYSXPGN MH MOY NYGYKUSTHHX HZ WHAKMPGN TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU. LOY, LYYPGN OYKLYSZ LAKKHAGXYX VELAWO VKPSSPUGM UGX IHSPMY EHAGN TYG, VYUTYX CPMO LUMPLZUWMPHG, MKE ULLOY TPNOM MH OPXY PM, UGX IYKMAKVYX UL LOY YBPXYGMSE CUL YUWO MPTY OYKOALVUGX THBYX PG OPL LSYYI VYOPGX OYK.MOYKY CUL HGSE HGY LIHHG, LANUK CUL THKY ISYGMPZAS MOUG UGEMOPGNYSLY, VAM PM MHHR MHH SHGN MH XPLLHSBY, LH PM CUL XYWPXYX MOUM TUKEOYGXKPROHBGU LOHASX LMPK MOY LANUK ZHK YBYKEHGY PG MAKG. KHLMHB KYWYPBYXOPL MATVSYK, UGX UXXPGN LHTY KAT MH PM ULRYX TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU MH LMPKPM."VAM EHA MURY PM CPMOHAM LANUK?" LOY LUPX, LTPSPGN USS MOY MPTY, UL PZYBYKEMOPGN LOY LUPX UGX YBYKEMOPGN MOY HMOYKL LUPX CUL BYKE UTALPGN UGXOUX U XHAVSY TYUGPGN."PM PL GHM MOY LANUK P CUGM, VAM HGSE MOUM EHAK SPMMSY OUGX LOHASX LMPKTE MYU."TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU ULLYGMYX UGX VYNUG SHHRPGN ZHK MOY LIHHG COPWO LHTYHGYTYUGCOPSY OUX IHAGWYX HG."ALY EHAK ZPGNYK, TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU, PM CPSS VY LMPSS GPWYK," LUPXKHLMHB."MHH OHM!" LOY KYISPYX, VSALOPGN CPMO ISYULAKY.PSEPG IAM U ZYC XKHIL HZ KAT PGMH MOY VAWRYM HZ CUMYK UGX VKHANOM PM MHTUKE OYGXKPROHBGU, ULRPGN OYK MH LMPK PM CPMO OYK ZPGNYK."MOPL PL TE WAI," LUPX OY. "HGSE XPI EHAK ZPGNYK PG PM UGX P'SS XKPGR PMUSS AI."COYG MOYE OUX YTIMPYX MOY LUTHBUK, KHLMHB MHHR U IUWR HZ WUKXL UGXIKHIHLYX MOUM MOYE LOHASX ISUE "RPGNL" CPMO TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU. MOYE XKYCSHML MH LYMMSY COH LOHASX TURY AI OYK LYM. UM KHLMHB'L LANNYLMPHG PMCUL UNKYYX MOUM COHYBYK VYWUTY "RPGN" LOHASX OUBY MOY KPNOM MH RPLL TUKEOYGXKPROHBGU'L OUGX, UGX MOUM MOY "VHHVE" LOHASX NH MH KYZPSS UGX KYOYUMMOY LUTHBUK ZHK MOY XHWMHK COYG MOY SUMMYK UCHRY."CYSS, VAM LAIIHLPGN TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU PL 'RPGN'?" ULRYX PSEPG."UL PM PL, LOY PL JAYYG, UGX OYK CHKX PL SUC!"MOYE OUX OUKXSE VYNAG MH ISUE VYZHKY MOY XHWMHK'L XPLOYBYSYX OYUXLAXXYGSE UIIYUKYX ZKHT VYOPGX TUKE OYGXKPROHBGU. OY OUX VYYG UCURY ZHKLHTY MPTY, SPLMYGPGN MH COUM CUL VYPGN LUPX, UGX YBPXYGMSE ZHAGX GHMOPGNYGMYKMUPGPGN HK UTALPGN PG COUM CUL NHPGN HG. OPL ZUWY CUL LUX UGXXYIKYLLYX. CPMOHAM NKYYMPGN MOY HZZPWYKL, OY LWKUMWOYX OPTLYSZ UGX ULRYXMH VY USSHCYX MH IULL UL MOYE CYKY VSHWRPGN MOY CUE. UL LHHG UL OYOUX SYZM MOY KHHT USS MOY HZZPWYKL VAKLM PGMH SHAX SUANOMYK UGX TUKEOYGXKPROHBGU VSALOYX MPSS OYK YEYL ZPSSYX CPMO MYUKL UGX MOYKYVE VYWUTYLMPSS THKY UMMKUWMPBY MH MOYT. KYMAKGPGN ZKHT MOY EUKX, MOY XHWMHKMHSX OPL CPZY (COH OUX WYULYX MH LTPSY LH OUIIPSE, UGX SHHRYX UM OPT PGUSUKT, UCUPMPGN OYK LYGMYGWY) MOUM MOY KUPG OUX WYULYX UGX MOYE TALM NHMH LSYYI PG MOYPK WHBYKYX WUKM, HK YBYKEMOPGN PG PM CHASX VY LMHSYG."VAM P'SS LYGX UG HKXYKSE.... MCH HZ MOYT!" LUPX KHLMHB. "COUM UG PXYU,XHWMHK!""P'SS LMUGX NAUKX HG PM TELYSZ!" LUPX PSEPG."GH, NYGMSYTYG, EHA OUBY OUX EHAK LSYYI, VAM P OUBY GHM LSYIM ZHK MCHGPNOML," KYISPYX MOY XHWMHK, UGX OY LUM XHCG THKHLYSE VYLPXY OPL CPZY,CUPMPGN ZHK MOY NUTY MH YGX.LYYPGN OPL NSHHTE ZUWY UL OY ZKHCGYX UM OPL CPZY, MOY HZZPWYKL NKYCLMPSS TYKKPYK, UGX LHTY HZ MOYT WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT SUANOMYK, ZHKCOPWO MOYE OAKKPYXSE LHANOM ISUALPVSY IKYMYDML. COYG OY OUX NHGY, MURPGNOPL CPZY CPMO OPT, UGX OUX LYMMSYX XHCG CPMO OYK PG MOYPK WHBYKYX WUKM,MOY HZZPWYKL SUE XHCG PG MOY MUBYKG, WHBYKPGN MOYTLYSBYL CPMO MOYPKCYM WSHURL, VAM MOYE XPX GHM LSYYI ZHK U SHGN MPTY; GHC MOYE YDWOUGNYXKYTUKRL, KYWUSSPGN MOY XHWMHK'L AGYULPGYLL UGX OPL CPZY'L XYSPNOM, GHCMOYE KUG HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO UGX KYIHKMYX COUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY PG MOYWHBYKYX MKUI. LYBYKUS MPTYL KHLMHB, WHBYKPGN OPL OYUX, MKPYX MH NHMH LSYYI, VAM LHTY KYTUKR CHASX UKHALY OPT UGX WHGBYKLUMPHG CHASX VYKYLATYX, MH MOY UWWHTIUGPTYGM HZ AGKYULHGPGN, TYKKE, WOPSXSPRY SUANOMYK.WOUIMYK DPBPM CUL GYUKSE MOKYY H'WSHWR VAM GH HGY CUL EYM ULSYYI, COYG MOYJAUKMYKTULMYK UIIYUKYX CPMO UG HKXYK MH THBY HG MH MOY SPMMSY MHCGHZ HLMKHBGU. LMPSS SUANOPGN UGX MUSRPGN, MOY HZZPWYKL VYNUG OAKKPYXSENYMMPGN KYUXE UGX UNUPG VHPSYX LHTY TAXXE CUMYK PG MOY LUTHBUK. VAMKHLMHB CYGM HZZ MH OPL LJAUXKHG CPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK MYU. XUE CULVKYURPGN, MOY KUPG OUX WYULYX, UGX MOY WSHAXL CYKY XPLIYKLPGN. PM ZYSMXUTI UGX WHSX, YLIYWPUSSE PG WSHMOYL MOUM CYKY LMPSS THPLM. UL MOYE SYZMMOY MUBYKG PG MOY MCPSPNOM HZ MOY XUCG, KHLMHB UGX PSEPG VHMO NSUGWYXAGXYK MOY CYM UGX NSPLMYGPGN SYUMOYK OHHX HZ MOY XHWMHK'L WUKM, ZKHTAGXYK MOY UIKHG HZ COPWO OPL ZYYM CYKY LMPWRPGN HAM, UGX PG MOY TPXXSYHZ COPWO OPL CPZY'L GPNOMWUI CUL BPLPVSY UGX OYK LSYYIE VKYUMOPGNUAXPVSY."LOY KYUSSE PL U XYUK SPMMSY MOPGN," LUPX KHLMHB MH PSEPG, COH CULZHSSHCPGN OPT."U WOUKTPGN CHTUG!" LUPX PSEPG, CPMO USS MOY NKUBPME HZ U VHE HZLPDMYYG.OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK MOY LJAUXKHG CUL SPGYX AI HG MOY KHUX. MOY WHTTUGXCUL OYUKX MH "THAGM" UGX MOY LHSXPYKL WKHLLYX MOYTLYSBYL UGX THAGMYX.KHLMHB KPXPGN PG ZKHGM NUBY MOY HKXYK "ZHKCUKX!" UGX MOY OALLUKL, CPMOWSUGRPGN LUVYKL UGX LAVXAYX MUSR, MOYPK OHKLYL' OHHZL LISULOPGN PG MOYTAX, XYZPSYX PG ZHAKL UGX THBYX USHGN MOY VKHUX KHUX ISUGMYX CPMO VPKWOMKYYL HG YUWO LPXY, ZHSSHCPGN MOY PGZUGMKE UGX U VUMMYKE MOUM OUX NHGYHG PG ZKHGM.MUMMYKYX, VSAY-IAKISY WSHAXL, KYXXYGPGN PG MOY YULM, CYKY LWAXXPGNVYZHKY MOY CPGX. PM CUL NKHCPGN SPNOMYK UGX SPNOMYK. MOUM WAKSE NKULLCOPWO USCUEL NKHCL VE WHAGMKE KHUXLPXYL VYWUTY WSYUKSE BPLPVSY, LMPSSCYM CPMO MOY GPNOM'L KUPG; MOY XKHHIPGN VKUGWOYL HZ MOY VPKWOYL, USLHCYM, LCUEYX PG MOY CPGX UGX ZSAGN XHCG VKPNOM XKHIL HZ CUMYK MH HGYLPXY. MOY LHSXPYKL' ZUWYL CYKY THKY UGX THKY WSYUKSE BPLPVSY. KHLMHB,USCUEL WSHLYSE ZHSSHCYX VE PSEPG, KHXY USHGN MOY LPXY HZ MOY KHUXVYMCYYG MCH KHCL HZ VPKWO MKYYL.COYG WUTIUPNGPGN, KHLMHB USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MOY PGXASNYGWY HZ KPXPGN GHMU KYNPTYGMUS VAM U WHLLUWR OHKLY. U QAXNY HZ OHKLYL UGX U LIHKMLTUG,OY OUX SUMYSE IKHWAKYX OPTLYSZ U SUKNY, ZPGY, TYMMSYLHTY, XHGYML OHKLY,XAG-WHSHKYX, CPMO SPNOM TUGY UGX MUPS, UGX COYG OY KHXY PM GH HGY WHASXHAMNUSSHI OPT. MH KPXY MOPL OHKLY CUL U ISYULAKY MH OPT, UGX OY MOHANOMHZ MOY OHKLY, HZ MOY THKGPGN, HZ MOY XHWMHK'L CPZY, VAM GHM HGWY HZ MOYPTIYGXPGN XUGNYK.ZHKTYKSE, COYG NHPGN PGMH UWMPHG, KHLMHB OUX ZYSM UZKUPX; GHC OY OUXGHM MOY SYULM ZYYSPGN HZ ZYUK. OY CUL ZYUKSYLL, GHM VYWUALY OY OUX NKHCGALYX MH VYPGN AGXYK ZPKY (HGY WUGGHM NKHC ALYX MH XUGNYK), VAM VYWUALYOY OUX SYUKGYX OHC MH TUGUNY OPL MOHANOML COYG PG XUGNYK. OY OUX NKHCGUWWALMHTYX COYG NHPGN PGMH UWMPHG MH MOPGR UVHAM UGEMOPGN VAM COUM CHASXLYYT THLM SPRYSE MH PGMYKYLM OPT--MOY PTIYGXPGN XUGNYK. XAKPGN MOYZPKLM IYKPHX HZ OPL LYKBPWY, OUKX UL OY MKPYX UGX TAWO UL OY KYIKHUWOYXOPTLYSZ CPMO WHCUKXPWY, OY OUX GHM VYYG UVSY MH XH MOPL, VAM CPMO MPTYPM OUX WHTY HZ PMLYSZ. GHC OY KHXY VYLPXY PSEPG AGXYK MOY VPKWO MKYYL,HWWULPHGUSSE ISAWRPGN SYUBYL ZKHT U VKUGWO MOUM TYM OPL OUGX, LHTYMPTYLMHAWOPGN OPL OHKLY'L LPXY CPMO OPL ZHHM, HK, CPMOHAM MAKGPGN KHAGX,OUGXPGN U IPIY OY OUX ZPGPLOYX MH UG OALLUK KPXPGN VYOPGX OPT, CPMO ULWUST UGX WUKYSYLL UG UPK UL MOHANO OY CYKY TYKYSE HAM ZHK U KPXY. OYNSUGWYX CPMO IPME UM MOY YDWPMYX ZUWY HZ PSEPG, COH MUSRYX TAWO UGX PGNKYUM UNPMUMPHG. OY RGYC ZKHT YDIYKPYGWY MOY MHKTYGMPGN YDIYWMUMPHG HZMYKKHK UGX XYUMO MOY WHKGYM CUL LAZZYKPGN UGX RGYC MOUM HGSE MPTY WHASXOYSI OPT.UL LHHG UL MOY LAG UIIYUKYX PG U WSYUK LMKPI HZ LRE VYGYUMO MOY WSHAXL,MOY CPGX ZYSS, UL PZ PM XUKYX GHM LIHPS MOY VYUAME HZ MOY LATTYK THKGPGNUZMYK MOY LMHKT; XKHIL LMPSS WHGMPGAYX MH ZUSS, VAM BYKMPWUSSE GHC, UGXUSS CUL LMPSS. MOY COHSY LAG UIIYUKYX HG MOY OHKPFHG UGX XPLUIIYUKYXVYOPGX U SHGN GUKKHC WSHAX MOUM OAGN UVHBY PM. U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK PMKYUIIYUKYX VKPNOMYK LMPSS ZKHT VYOPGX MOY MHI HZ MOY WSHAX, MYUKPGN PMLYXNY. YBYKEMOPGN NKYC VKPNOM UGX NSPMMYKYX. UGX CPMO MOUM SPNOM, UGX ULPZ PG KYISE MH PM, WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ NAGL UOYUX HZ MOYT.VYZHKY KHLMHB OUX OUX MPTY MH WHGLPXYK UGX XYMYKTPGY MOY XPLMUGWY HZMOUM ZPKPGN, WHAGM HLMYKTUGG-MHSLMHE'L UXQAMUGM WUTY NUSSHIPGN ZKHTBPMYVLR CPMO HKXYKL MH UXBUGWY UM U MKHM USHGN MOY KHUX.MOY LJAUXKHG HBYKMHHR UGX IULLYX MOY PGZUGMKE UGX MOY VUMMYKE--COPWOOUX USLH JAPWRYGYX MOYPK IUWY--KHXY XHCG U OPSS, UGX IULLPGN MOKHANO UGYTIME UGX XYLYKMYX BPSSUNY UNUPG ULWYGXYX. MOY OHKLYL VYNUG MH SUMOYKUGX MOY TYG MH ZSALO."OUSM! XKYLL EHAK KUGRL!" MOY HKXYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK CULOYUKX UOYUX. "ZHKCUKX VE MOY SYZM. CUSR, TUKWO!" WUTY MOY HKXYK ZKHT PGZKHGM.UGX MOY OALLUKL, IULLPGN USHGN MOY SPGY HZ MKHHIL HG MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZHAK IHLPMPHG, OUSMYX VYOPGX HAK AOSUGL COH CYKY PG MOY ZKHGM SPGY. MHMOY KPNOM LMHHX HAK PGZUGMKE PG U XYGLY WHSATG: MOYE CYKY MOY KYLYKBY.OPNOYK AI MOY OPSS, HG MOY BYKE OHKPFHG, HAK NAGL CYKY BPLPVSY MOKHANOMOY CHGXYKZASSE WSYUK UPK, VKPNOMSE PSSATPGUMYX VE LSUGMPGN THKGPGNLAGVYUTL. PG ZKHGM, VYEHGX U OHSSHC XUSY, WHASX VY LYYG MOY YGYTE'LWHSATGL UGX NAGL. HAK UXBUGWYX SPGY, USKYUXE PG UWMPHG, WHASX VY OYUKXVKPLRSE YDWOUGNPGN LOHML CPMO MOY YGYTE PG MOY XUSY.UM MOYLY LHAGXL, SHGN AGOYUKX, KHLMHB'L LIPKPML KHLY, UL UM MOY LMKUPGLHZ MOY TYKKPYLM TALPW. MKUI-MU-MU-MUI! WKUWRYX MOY LOHML, GHC MHNYMOYK,GHC LYBYKUS JAPWRSE HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK. UNUPG USS CUL LPSYGM UGX MOYGUNUPG PM LHAGXYX UL PZ LHTYHGY CYKY CUSRPGN HG XYMHGUMHKL UGX YDISHXPGNMOYT.MOY OALLUKL KYTUPGYX PG MOY LUTY ISUWY ZHK UVHAM UG OHAK. U WUGGHGUXYVYNUG. WHAGM HLMYKTUGG CPMO OPL LAPMY KHXY AI VYOPGX MOY LJAUXKHG,OUSMYX, LIHRY MH MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGM, UGX KHXY AI MOY OPSS MHMOY NAGL.UZMYK HLMYKTUGG OUX NHGY, U WHTTUGX KUGN HAM MH MOY AOSUGL."ZHKT WHSATG! IKYIUKY MH WOUKNY!"MOY PGZUGMKE PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT IUKMYX PGMH ISUMHHGL MH USSHC MOY WUBUSKEMH IULL. MOY AOSUGL LMUKMYX, MOY LMKYUTYKL HG MOYPK LIYUKL ZSAMMYKPGN,UGX MKHMMYX XHCGOPSS MHCUKX MOY ZKYGWO WUBUSKE COPWO CUL LYYG VYSHC MHMOY SYZM.UL LHHG UL MOY AOSUGL XYLWYGXYX MOY OPSS, MOY OALLUKL CYKY HKXYKYX AIMOY OPSS MH LAIIHKM MOY VUMMYKE. UL MOYE MHHR MOY ISUWYL BUWUMYX VE MOYAOSUGL, VASSYML WUTY ZKHT MOY ZKHGM, COPGPGN UGX COPLMSPGN, VAM ZYSSLIYGM CPMOHAM MURPGN YZZYWM.MOY LHAGXL, COPWO OY OUX GHM OYUKX ZHK LH SHGN, OUX UG YBYG THKYISYULAKUVSY UGX YDOPSUKUMPGN YZZYWM HG KHLMHB MOUG MOY IKYBPHAL LHAGXLHZ ZPKPGN. XKUCPGN OPTLYSZ AI, OY BPYCYX MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY HIYGPGN HAMVYZHKY OPT ZKHT MOY OPSS, UGX CPMO OPL COHSY LHAS ZHSSHCYX MOY THBYTYGMHZ MOY AOSUGL. MOYE LCHHIYX XHCG WSHLY MH MOY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGL, LHTYMOPGNWHGZALYX OUIIYGYX MOYKY UTPX MOY LTHRY, UGX ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK HAKAOSUGL CYKY NUSSHIPGN VUWR, GHM MH MOY ISUWY MOYE OUX HWWAIPYX VAM THKYMH MOY SYZM, UGX UTHGN MOY HKUGNY-WHSHKYX AOSUGL HG WOYLMGAM OHKLYL UGXVYOPGX MOYT, PG U SUKNY NKHAI, VSAY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGL HG NKUE OHKLYL WHASXVY LYYG.WOUIMYK DBKHLMHB, CPMO OPL RYYG LIHKMLTUG'L YEY, CUL HGY HZ MOY ZPKLM MH WUMWOLPNOM HZ MOYLY VSAY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGL IAKLAPGN HAK AOSUGL. GYUKYK UGXGYUKYK PG XPLHKXYKSE WKHCXL WUTY MOY AOSUGL UGX MOY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGLIAKLAPGN MOYT. KYISPYX MOY WUIMUPG, "UGX KYUSSE..."KHLMHB, CPMOHAM CUPMPGN MH OYUK OPT HAM, MHAWOYX OPL OHKLY, NUSSHIYX MHMOY ZKHGM HZ OPL LJAUXKHG, UGX VYZHKY OY OUX MPTY MH ZPGPLO NPBPGN MOYCHKX HZ WHTTUGX, MOY COHSY LJAUXKHG, LOUKPGN OPL ZYYSPGN, CUL ZHSSHCPGNOPT. KHLMHB OPTLYSZ XPX GHM RGHC OHC HK COE OY XPX PM. OY UWMYX UL OYXPX COYG OAGMPGN, CPMOHAM KYZSYWMPGN HK WHGLPXYKPGN. OY LUC MOY XKUNHHGLGYUK UGX MOUM MOYE CYKY NUSSHIPGN PG XPLHKXYK; OY RGYC MOYE WHASX GHMCPMOLMUGX UG UMMUWR--RGYC MOYKY CUL HGSE MOUM THTYGM UGX MOUM PZ OY SYMPM LSPI PM CHASX GHM KYMAKG. MOY VASSYML CYKY COPGPGN UGX COPLMSPGN LHLMPTASUMPGNSE UKHAGX OPT UGX OPL OHKLY CUL LH YUNYK MH NH MOUM OY WHASXGHM KYLMKUPG OPTLYSZ. OY MHAWOYX OPL OHKLY, NUBY MOY CHKX HZ WHTTUGX,UGX PTTYXPUMYSE, OYUKPGN VYOPGX OPT MOY MKUTI HZ MOY OHKLYL HZ OPLXYISHEYX LJAUXKHG, KHXY UM ZASS MKHM XHCGOPSS MHCUKX MOY XKUNHHGL.OUKXSE OUX MOYE KYUWOYX MOY VHMMHT HZ MOY OPSS VYZHKY MOYPK IUWYPGLMPGWMPBYSE WOUGNYX MH U NUSSHI, COPWO NKYC ZULMYK UGX ZULMYK UL MOYEXKYC GYUKYK MH HAK AOSUGL UGX MOY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGL COH NUSSHIYX UZMYKMOYT. MOY XKUNHHGL CYKY GHC WSHLY UM OUGX. HG LYYPGN MOY OALLUKL, MOYZHKYTHLM VYNUG MH MAKG, COPSY MOHLY VYOPGX VYNUG MH OUSM. CPMO MOY LUTYZYYSPGN CPMO COPWO OY OUX NUSSHIYX UWKHLL MOY IUMO HZ U CHSZ, KHLMHBNUBY KYPG MH OPL XHGYML OHKLY UGX NUSSHIYX MH PGMYKLYWM MOY IUMO HZ MOYXKUNHHGL' XPLHKXYKYX SPGYL. HGY AOSUG LMHIIYX, UGHMOYK COH CUL HG ZHHMZSAGN OPTLYSZ MH MOY NKHAGX MH UBHPX VYPGN RGHWRYX HBYK, UGX U KPXYKSYLLOHKLY ZYSS PG UTHGN MOY OALLUKL. GYUKSE USS MOY ZKYGWO XKUNHHGL CYKYNUSSHIPGN VUWR. KHLMHB, IPWRPGN HAM HGY HG U NKUE OHKLY, XULOYX UZMYKOPT. PG UGHMOYK THTYGM KHLMHB'L OHKLY XULOYXPML VKYULM UNUPGLM MOY OPGXJAUKMYKL HZ MOY HZZPWYK'L OHKLY, USTHLMRGHWRPGN PM HBYK, UGX UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM KHLMHB, CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE,KUPLYX OPL LUVYK UGX LMKAWR MOY ZKYGWOTUG CPMO PM.MOY PGLMUGM OY OUX XHGY MOPL, USS KHLMHB'L UGPTUMPHG BUGPLOYX. OPL IUSY UGX TAX-LMUPGYX ZUWY--ZUPK UGXEHAGN, CPMO U XPTISY PG MOY WOPG UGX SPNOM-VSAY YEYL--CUL GHM UG YGYTE'LZUWY UM USS LAPMYX MH U VUMMSYZPYSX, VAM U THLM HKXPGUKE, OHTYSPRY ZUWY.VYZHKY KHLMHB OUX XYWPXYX COUM MH XH CPMO OPT, MOY HZZPWYK WKPYX, "PLAKKYGXYK!" NYHKNY'L WKHLL. COYG LYGM ZHK VE WHAGMHLMYKTUGG, KHLMHB, KYTYTVYKPGN MOUM OY OUX WOUKNYX CPMOHAM HKXYKL,ZYSM LAKY OPL WHTTUGXYK CUL LYGXPGN ZHK OPT MH IAGPLO OPT ZHK VKYUWO HZXPLWPISPGY. UGX P KYTYTVYK OHC TE UKTIUALYX COYG P KUPLYX PM."KHLMHB LUC MOY IKPLHGYKL VYPGN SYX UCUE UGX NUSSHIYX UZMYK MOYT MH OUBYU SHHR UM OPL ZKYGWOTUG CPMO MOY XPTISY HG OPL WOPG. XHWMHKL WUTY MH LYY OYK LPGNSE UGX PG WHGLASMUMPHG, MUSRYX TAWO PGZKYGWO, NYKTUG, UGX SUMPG, VSUTYX HGY UGHMOYK, UGX IKYLWKPVYX U NKYUMBUKPYME HZ TYXPWPGYL ZHK USS MOY XPLYULYL RGHCG MH MOYT, VAM MOY LPTISYPXYU GYBYK HWWAKKYX MH UGE HZ MOYT MOUM MOYE WHASX GHM RGHC MOY XPLYULYGUMULOU CUL LAZZYKPGN ZKHT, UL GH XPLYULY LAZZYKYX VE U SPBY TUG WUG VYRGHCG, ZHK YBYKE SPBPGN IYKLHG OUL OPL HCG IYWASPUKPMPYL UGX USCUELOUL OPL HCG IYWASPUK, IYKLHGUS, GHBYS, WHTISPWUMYX XPLYULY, AGRGHCG MHTYXPWPGY--GHM U XPLYULY HZ MOY SAGNL, SPBYK, LRPG, OYUKM, GYKBYL, UGXLH HG TYGMPHGYX PG TYXPWUS VHHRL, VAM U XPLYULY WHGLPLMPGN HZ HGY HZ MOYPGGATYKUVSY WHTVPGUMPHGL HZ MOY TUSUXPYL HZ MOHLY HKNUGL. MOPL LPTISYMOHANOM WHASX GHM HWWAK MH MOY XHWMHKL (UL PM WUGGHM HWWAK MH U CPFUKXMOUM OY PL AGUVSY MH CHKR OPL WOUKTL) VYWUALY MOY VALPGYLL HZ MOYPKSPBYL CUL MH WAKY, UGX MOYE KYWYPBYX THGYE ZHK PM UGX OUX LIYGM MOY VYLMEYUKL HZ MOYPK SPBYL HG MOUM VALPGYLL. VAM, UVHBY USS, MOUM MOHANOMCUL RYIM HAM HZ MOYPK TPGXL VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOYE LUC MOYE CYKYKYUSSE ALYZAS, UL PG ZUWM MOYE CYKY MH MOY COHSY KHLMHB ZUTPSE. MOYPKALYZASGYLL XPX GHM XYIYGX HG TURPGN MOY IUMPYGM LCUSSHC LAVLMUGWYL ZHKMOY THLM IUKM OUKTZAS (MOY OUKT CUL LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY, UL MOYECYKY NPBYG PG LTUSS XHLYL), VAM MOYE CYKY ALYZAS, GYWYLLUKE, UGXPGXPLIYGLUVSY VYWUALY MOYE LUMPLZPYX U TYGMUS GYYX HZ MOY PGBUSPX UGXHZ MOHLY COH SHBYX OYK--UGX MOUM PL COE MOYKY UKY, UGX USCUEL CPSS VY,ILYAXH-OYUSYKL, CPLY CHTYG, OHTYHIUMOL, UGX USSHIUMOL. MOYE LUMPLZPYXMOUM YMYKGUS OATUG GYYX ZHK OHIY HZ KYSPYZ, ZHK LETIUMOE, UGX MOUMLHTYMOPGN LOHASX VY XHGY, COPWO PL ZYSM VE MOHLY COH UKY LAZZYKPGN. MOYELUMPLZPYX MOY GYYX LYYG PG PML THLM YSYTYGMUKE ZHKT PG U WOPSX, COYG PMCUGML MH OUBY U ISUWY KAVVYX MOUM OUL VYYG OAKM. U WOPSX RGHWRL PMLYSZUGX KAGL UM HGWY MH MOY UKTL HZ PML THMOYK HK GAKLY MH OUBY MOY UWOPGNLIHM KAVVYX HK RPLLYX, UGX PM ZYYSL VYMMYK COYG MOPL PL XHGY. MOY WOPSXWUGGHM VYSPYBY MOUM MOY LMKHGNYLM UGX CPLYLM HZ PML IYHISY OUBY GHKYTYXE ZHK PML IUPG, UGX MOY OHIY HZ KYSPYZ UGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ PMLTHMOYK'L LETIUMOE COPSY LOY KAVL MOY VATI WHTZHKML PM. MOY XHWMHKL CYKYHZ ALY MH GUMULOU VYWUALY MOYE RPLLYX UGX KAVVYX OYK VATI, ULLAKPGN OYKMOUM PM CHASX LHHG IULL PZ HGSE MOY WHUWOTUG CYGM MH MOY WOYTPLM'L PGMOY UKVUM UGX NHM U IHCXYK UGX LHTY IPSSL PG U IKYMME VHD ZHK U KAVSYUGX LYBYGME RHIYRL, UGX PZ LOY MHHR MOHLY IHCXYKL PG VHPSYX CUMYK UMPGMYKBUSL HZ IKYWPLYSE MCH OHAKL, GYPMOYK THKY GHK SYLL.COUM CHASX LHGEU UGX MOY WHAGM UGX WHAGMYLL OUBY XHGY, OHC CHASX MOYEOUBY SHHRYX, PZ GHMOPGN OUX VYYG XHGY, PZ MOYKY OUX GHM VYYG MOHLY IPSSLMH NPBY VE MOY WSHWR, MOY CUKT XKPGRL, MOY WOPWRYG WAMSYML, UGX USS MOYHMOYK XYMUPSL HZ SPZY HKXYKYX VE MOY XHWMHKL, MOY WUKKEPGN HAM HZ COPWOLAIISPYX UG HWWAIUMPHG UGX WHGLHSUMPHG MH MOY ZUTPSE WPKWSY? OHC CHASXMOY WHAGM OUBY VHKGY OPL XYUKSE SHBYX XUANOMYK'L PSSGYLL OUX OY GHMRGHCG MOUM PM CUL WHLMPGN OPT U MOHALUGX KAVSYL, UGX MOUM OY CHASX GHMNKAXNY MOHALUGXL THKY MH VYGYZPM OYK, HK OUX OY GHM RGHCG MOUM PZ OYKPSSGYLL WHGMPGAYX OY CHASX GHM NKAXNY EYM HMOYK MOHALUGXL UGX CHASX MURYOYK UVKHUX ZHK WHGLASMUMPHGL MOYKY, UGX OUX OY GHM VYYG UVSY MH YDISUPGMOY XYMUPSL HZ OHC TYMPBPYK UGX ZYSSYK OUX GHM AGXYKLMHHX MOY LETIMHTL,VAM ZKPLY OUX, UGX TAXKHB OUX XPUNGHLYX MOYT YBYG VYMMYK? COUM CHASX MOYWHAGMYLL OUBY XHGY OUX LOY GHM VYYG UVSY LHTYMPTYL MH LWHSX MOY PGBUSPXZHK GHM LMKPWMSE HVYEPGN MOY XHWMHK'L HKXYKL?"EHA'SS GYBYK NYM CYSS SPRY MOUM," LOY CHASX LUE, ZHKNYMMPGN OYK NKPYZPG OYK BYDUMPHG, "PZ EHA CHG'M HVYE MOY XHWMHK UGX MURY EHAK TYXPWPGY UMMOY KPNOM MPTY! EHA TALMG'M MKPZSY CPMO PM, EHA RGHC, HK PM TUE MAKG MHIGYATHGPU," LOY CHASX NH HG, XYKPBPGN TAWO WHTZHKM ZKHT MOY AMMYKUGWY HZMOUM ZHKYPNG CHKX, PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY MH HMOYKL UL CYSS UL MH OYKLYSZ.COUM CHASX LHGEU OUBY XHGY CPMOHAM MOY NSUX WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM LOY OUXGHM AGXKYLLYX XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM MOKYY GPNOML, PG HKXYK MH VY KYUXE MHWUKKE HAM USS MOY XHWMHK'L PGQAGWMPHGL CPMO IKYWPLPHG, UGX MOUM LOYLMPSS RYIM UCURY UM GPNOM LH UL GHM MH TPLL MOY IKHIYK MPTY COYG MOYLSPNOMSE OUKTZAS IPSSL PG MOY SPMMSY NPSM VHD OUX MH VY UXTPGPLMYKYX?YBYG MH GUMULOU OYKLYSZ PM CUL ISYULUGM MH LYY MOUM LH TUGE LUWKPZPWYLCYKY VYPGN TUXY ZHK OYK LURY, UGX MH RGHC MOUM LOY OUX MH MURY TYXPWPGYUM WYKMUPG OHAKL, MOHANO LOY XYWSUKYX MOUM GH TYXPWPGY CHASX WAKY OYKUGX MOUM PM CUL USS GHGLYGLY. UGX PM CUL YBYG ISYULUGM MH VY UVSY MHLOHC, VE XPLKYNUKXPGN MOY HKXYKL, MOUM LOY XPX GHM VYSPYBY PG TYXPWUSMKYUMTYGM UGX XPX GHM BUSAY OYK SPZY.MOY XHWMHK WUTY YBYKE XUE, ZYSM OYK IASLY, SHHRYX UM OYK MHGNAY, UGXKYNUKXSYLL HZ OYK NKPYZ-LMKPWRYG ZUWY QHRYX CPMO OYK. VAM COYG OY OUXNHGY PGMH UGHMOYK KHHT, MH COPWO MOY WHAGMYLL OAKKPYXSE ZHSSHCYX OPT, OYULLATYX U NKUBY UPK UGX MOHANOMZASSE LOURPGN OPL OYUX LUPX MOUM MOHANOMOYKY CUL XUGNYK, OY OUX OHIYL HZ MOY YZZYWM HZ MOPL SULM TYXPWPGY UGXHGY TALM CUPM UGX LYY, MOUM MOY TUSUXE CUL WOPYZSE TYGMUS, VAM... UGXMOY WHAGMYLL, MKEPGN MH WHGWYUS MOY UWMPHG ZKHT OYKLYSZ UGX ZKHT OPT,LSPIIYX U NHSX WHPG PGMH OPL OUGX UGX USCUEL KYMAKGYX MH MOY IUMPYGMCPMO U THKY MKUGJAPS TPGX.MOY LETIMHTL HZ GUMULOU'L PSSGYLL CYKY MOUM LOY UMY SPMMSY, LSYIMSPMMSY, WHANOYX, UGX CUL USCUEL SHC-LIPKPMYX. MOY XHWMHKL LUPX MOUMLOY WHASX GHM NYM HG CPMOHAM TYXPWUS MKYUMTYGM, LH MOYE RYIM OYK PG MOYLMPZSPGN UMTHLIOYKY HZ MOY MHCG, UGX MOY KHLMHBL XPX GHM THBY MH MOYWHAGMKE MOUM LATTYK HZ 1812.PG LIPMY HZ MOY TUGE IPSSL LOY LCUSSHCYX UGX MOY XKHIL UGX IHCXYKL HAMHZ MOY SPMMSY VHMMSYL UGX VHDYL HZ COPWO TUXUTY LWOHLL COH CUL ZHGX HZLAWO MOPGNL TUXY U SUKNY WHSSYWMPHG, UGX PG LIPMY HZ VYPGN XYIKPBYX HZMOY WHAGMKE SPZY MH COPWO LOY CUL UWWALMHTYX, EHAMO IKYBUPSYX. GUMULOU'LNKPYZ VYNUG MH VY HBYKSUPX VE MOY PTIKYLLPHGL HZ XUPSE SPZY, PM WYULYXMH IKYLL LH IUPGZASSE HG OYK OYUKM, PM NKUXAUSSE ZUXYX PGMH MOY IULM,UGX LOY VYNUG MH KYWHBYK IOELPWUSSE.WOUIMYK DBPPGUMULOU CUL WUSTYK VAM GH OUIIPYK. LOY GHM TYKYSE UBHPXYX USS YDMYKGUSZHKTL HZ ISYULAKY--VUSSL, IKHTYGUXYL, WHGWYKML, UGX MOYUMYKL--VAM LOYGYBYK SUANOYX CPMOHAM U LHAGX HZ MYUKL PG OYK SUANOMYK. LOY WHASX GHMLPGN. UL LHHG UL LOY VYNUG MH SUANO, HK MKPYX MH LPGN VE OYKLYSZ, MYUKLWOHRYX OYK: MYUKL HZ KYTHKLY, MYUKL UM MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG HZ MOHLY IAKYMPTYL COPWO WHASX GYBYK KYMAKG, MYUKL HZ BYDUMPHG MOUM LOY LOHASX LHALYSYLLSE OUBY KAPGYX OYK EHAGN SPZY COPWO TPNOM OUBY VYYG LH OUIIE.SUANOMYK UGX LPGNPGN PG IUKMPWASUK LYYTYX MH OYK SPRY U VSULIOYTE,PG ZUWY HZ OYK LHKKHC. CPMOHAM UGE GYYX HZ LYSZ-KYLMKUPGM, GH CPLO MHWHJAYM YBYK YGMYKYX OYK OYUX. LOY LUPX UGX ZYSM UM MOUM MPTY MOUM GHTUG CUL THKY MH OYK MOUG GULMULEU PBUGHBGU, MOY VAZZHHG. LHTYMOPGN LMHHXLYGMPGYS CPMOPG OYK UGX ZHKVUXY OYK YBYKE QHE. VYLPXYL, LOY OUX SHLM USSMOY HSX PGMYKYLML HZ OYK WUKYZKYY NPKSPLO SPZY MOUM OUX VYYG LH ZASSHZ OHIY. MOY IKYBPHAL UAMATG, MOY OAGMPGN, "AGWSY," UGX MOY WOKPLMTULOHSPXUEL LIYGM CPMO GPWOHSUL UM HMKUXGHY CYKY COUM LOY KYWUSSYX HZMYGYLMUGX THLM IUPGZASSE. COUM CHASX LOY GHM OUBY NPBYG MH VKPGN VUWR YBYG ULPGNSY XUE HZ MOUM MPTY! VAM PM CUL NHGY ZHKYBYK. OYK IKYLYGMPTYGM UMMOY MPTY OUX GHM XYWYPBYX OYK--MOUM MOUM LMUMY HZ ZKYYXHT UGX KYUXPGYLLZHK UGE YGQHETYGM CHASX GHM KYMAKG UNUPG. EYM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH SPBYHG.PM WHTZHKMYX OYK MH KYZSYWM MOUM LOY CUL GHM VYMMYK UL LOY OUX ZHKTYKSEPTUNPGYX, VAM CHKLY, TAWO CHKLY, MOUG UGEVHXE YSLY PG MOY CHKSX. VAMMOPL CUL GHM YGHANO. LOY RGYC MOUM, UGX ULRYX OYKLYSZ, "COUM GYDM?"VAM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MH WHTY. MOYKY CUL GH QHE PG SPZY, EYM SPZY CULIULLPGN. GUMULOU UIIUKYGMSE MKPYX GHM MH VY U VAKXYG HK U OPGXKUGWY MHUGEHGY, VAM CUGMYX GHMOPGN ZHK OYKLYSZ. LOY RYIM UCUE ZKHT YBYKEHGY PGMOY OHALY UGX ZYSM UM YULY HGSE CPMO OYK VKHMOYK IYMEU. LOY SPRYX MHVY CPMO OPT VYMMYK MOUG CPMO MOY HMOYKL, UGX COYG USHGY CPMO OPT LOYLHTYMPTYL SUANOYX. LOY OUKXSE YBYK SYZM MOY OHALY UGX HZ MOHLY COH WUTYMH LYY MOYT CUL NSUX MH LYY HGSE HGY IYKLHG, IPYKKY. PM CHASX OUBY VYYGPTIHLLPVSY MH MKYUM OYK CPMO THKY XYSPWUWE, NKYUMYK WUKY, UGX UM MOYLUTY MPTY THKY LYKPHALSE MOUG XPX WHAGM VYFAROHB. GUMULOU AGWHGLWPHALSEZYSM MOPL XYSPWUWE UGX LH ZHAGX NKYUM ISYULAKY PG OPL LHWPYME. VAMLOY CUL GHM YBYG NKUMYZAS MH OPT ZHK PM; GHMOPGN NHHX HG IPYKKY'L IUKMLYYTYX MH OYK MH VY UG YZZHKM, PM LYYTYX LH GUMAKUS ZHK OPT MH VY RPGXMH YBYKEHGY MOUM MOYKY CUL GH TYKPM PG OPL RPGXGYLL. LHTYMPTYL GUMULOUGHMPWYX YTVUKKULLTYGM UGX UCRCUKXGYLL HG OPL IUKM PG OYK IKYLYGWY,YLIYWPUSSE COYG OY CUGMYX MH XH LHTYMOPGN MH ISYULY OYK, HK ZYUKYX MOUMLHTYMOPGN MOYE LIHRY HZ CHASX UCURYG TYTHKPYL XPLMKYLLPGN MH OYK. LOYGHMPWYX MOPL UGX UMMKPVAMYX PM MH OPL NYGYKUS RPGXGYLL UGX LOEGYLL,COPWO LOY PTUNPGYX TALM VY MOY LUTY MHCUKX YBYKEHGY UL PM CUL MH OYK.UZMYK MOHLY PGBHSAGMUKE CHKXL--MOUM PZ OY CYKY ZKYY OY CHASX OUBY ULRYXHG OPL RGYYL ZHK OYK OUGX UGX OYK SHBY--AMMYKYX UM U THTYGM COYG LOY CULLH LMKHGNSE UNPMUMYX, IPYKKY GYBYK LIHRY MH GUMULOU HZ OPL ZYYSPGNL;UGX PM LYYTYX ISUPG MH OYK MOUM MOHLY CHKXL, COPWO OUX MOYG LH WHTZHKMYXOYK, CYKY LIHRYG UL USS LHKML HZ TYUGPGNSYLL CHKXL UKY LIHRYG MH WHTZHKMU WKEPGN WOPSX. PM CUL GHM VYWUALY IPYKKY CUL U TUKKPYX TUG, VAM VYWUALYGUMULOU ZYSM BYKE LMKHGNSE CPMO OPT MOUM THKUS VUKKPYK MOY UVLYGWY HZCOPWO LOY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX CPMO RAKUNPG MOUM PM GYBYK YGMYKYX OYK OYUXMOUM MOY KYSUMPHGL VYMCYYG OPT UGX OYKLYSZ WHASX SYUX MH SHBY HG OYKIUKM, LMPSS SYLL HG OPL, HK YBYG MH MOY RPGX HZ MYGXYK, LYSZ-WHGLWPHAL,KHTUGMPW ZKPYGXLOPI VYMCYYG U TUG UGX U CHTUG HZ COPWO LOY OUX RGHCGLYBYKUS PGLMUGWYL.VYZHKY MOY YGX HZ MOY ZULM HZ LM. IYMYK, UNKUZYGU PBUGHBGU VYSHBU, UWHAGMKE GYPNOVHK HZ MOY KHLMHBL, WUTY MH THLWHC MH IUE OYK XYBHMPHGL UMMOY LOKPGYL HZ MOY THLWHC LUPGML. LOY LANNYLMYX MOUM GUMULOU LOHASX ZULMUGX IKYIUKY ZHK OHSE WHTTAGPHG, UGX GUMULOU NSUXSE CYSWHTYX MOY PXYU.XYLIPMY MOY XHWMHK'L HKXYKL MOUM LOY LOHASX GHM NH HAM YUKSE PG MOYTHKGPGN, GUMULOU PGLPLMYX HG ZULMPGN UGX IKYIUKPGN ZHK MOY LUWKUTYGM,GHM UL MOYE NYGYKUSSE IKYIUKYX ZHK PM PG MOY KHLMHB ZUTPSE VE UMMYGXPGNMOKYY LYKBPWYL PG MOYPK HCG OHALY, VAM UL UNKUZYGU PBUGHBGU XPX, VENHPGN MH WOAKWO YBYKE XUE ZHK U CYYR UGX GHM HGWY TPLLPGN BYLIYKL,TUMPGL, HK TULL.MOY WHAGMYLL CUL ISYULYX CPMO GUMULOU'L FYUS; UZMYK MOY IHHK KYLASML HZMOY TYXPWUS MKYUMTYGM, PG MOY XYIMOL HZ OYK OYUKM LOY OHIYX MOUM IKUEYKTPNOM OYSI OYK XUANOMYK THKY MOUG TYXPWPGYL UGX, MOHANO GHM CPMOHAMZYUK UGX WHGWYUSPGN PM ZKHT MOY XHWMHK, LOY UNKYYX MH GUMULOU'L CPLO UGXYGMKALMYX OYK MH VYSHBU. UNKUZYGU PBUGHBGU ALYX MH WHTY MH CURY GUMULOUUM MOKYY PG MOY THKGPGN, VAM NYGYKUSSE ZHAGX OYK USKYUXE UCURY. LOY CULUZKUPX HZ VYPGN SUMY ZHK TUMPGL. OULMPSE CULOPGN, UGX TYYRSE IAMMPGN HGOYK LOUVVPYLM XKYLL UGX UG HSX TUGMPSSU, GUMULOU, LOPBYKPGN PG MOY ZKYLOUPK, CYGM HAM PGMH MOY XYLYKMYX LMKYYML SPM VE MOY WSYUK SPNOM HZ XUCG.VE UNKUZYGU PBUGHBGU'L UXBPWY GUMULOU IKYIUKYX OYKLYSZ GHM PG MOYPKHCG IUKPLO, VAM UM U WOAKWO COYKY, UWWHKXPGN MH MOY XYBHAM UNKUZYGUPBUGHBGU, MOY IKPYLM CUL U TUG HZ BYKE LYBYKY UGX SHZME SPZY. MOYKY CYKYGYBYK TUGE IYHISY PG MOY WOAKWO; GUMULOU USCUEL LMHHX VYLPXY VYSHBU PGMOY WALMHTUKE ISUWY VYZHKY UG PWHG HZ MOY VSYLLYX BPKNPG, SYM PGMH MOYLWKYYG VYZHKY MOY WOHPK HG MOY SYZM LPXY, UGX U ZYYSPGN, GYC MH OYK, HZOATPSPME VYZHKY LHTYMOPGN NKYUM UGX PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY, LYPFYX OYK COYGUM MOUM AGALAUS THKGPGN OHAK, NUFPGN UM MOY XUKR ZUWY HZ MOY BPKNPGPSSATPGUMYX VE MOY WUGXSYL VAKGPGN VYZHKY PM UGX VE MOY THKGPGN SPNOMZUSSPGN ZKHT MOY CPGXHC, LOY SPLMYGYX MH MOY CHKXL HZ MOY LYKBPWY COPWOLOY MKPYX MH ZHSSHC CPMO AGXYKLMUGXPGN. COYG LOY AGXYKLMHHX MOYT OYKIYKLHGUS ZYYSPGN VYWUTY PGMYKCHBYG PG MOY IKUEYKL CPMO LOUXYL HZ PMLHCG. COYG LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX, PM CUL LCYYMYK LMPSS MH MOPGR MOUMMOY CPLO MH AGXYKLMUGX YBYKEMOPGN PL IKPXY, MOUM PM PL PTIHLLPVSY MHAGXYKLMUGX USS, MOUM PM PL HGSE GYWYLLUKE MH VYSPYBY UGX MH WHTTPMHGYLYSZ MH NHX, COHT LOY ZYSM NAPXPGN OYK LHAS UM MOHLY THTYGML. LOYWKHLLYX OYKLYSZ, VHCYX SHC, UGX COYG LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX, PG OHKKHKUM OYK HCG BPSYGYLL, LPTISE ULRYX NHX MH ZHKNPBY OYK YBYKEMOPGN,YBYKEMOPGN, MH OUBY TYKWE AIHG OYK. MOY IKUEYKL MH COPWO LOY LAKKYGXYKYXOYKLYSZ THLM HZ USS CYKY MOHLY HZ KYIYGMUGWY. HG OYK CUE OHTY UM UGYUKSE OHAK COYG LOY TYM GH HGY VAM VKPWRSUEYKL NHPGN MH CHKR HK TYGLCYYIPGN MOY LMKYYM, UGX YBYKEVHXE CPMOPG MOY OHALYL CUL LMPSS ULSYYI,GUMULOU YDIYKPYGWYX U ZYYSPGN GYC MH OYK, U LYGLY HZ MOY IHLLPVPSPMEHZ WHKKYWMPGN OYK ZUASML, MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ U GYC, WSYUG SPZY, UGX HZOUIIPGYLL.XAKPGN MOY COHSY CYYR LOY LIYGM PG MOPL CUE, MOUM ZYYSPGN NKYC YBYKEXUE. UGX MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ MURPGN WHTTAGPHG, HK "WHTTAGPGN" UL UNKUZYGUPBUGHBGU, QHEHALSE ISUEPGN CPMO MOY CHKX, WUSSYX PM, LYYTYX MH GUMULOULH NKYUM MOUM LOY ZYSM LOY LOHASX GYBYK SPBY MPSS MOUM VSYLLYX LAGXUE.VAM MOY OUIIE XUE WUTY, UGX HG MOUM TYTHKUVSY LAGXUE, COYG, XKYLLYX PGCOPMY TALSPG, LOY KYMAKGYX OHTY UZMYK WHTTAGPHG, ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY ZHKTUGE THGMOL LOY ZYSM WUST UGX GHM HIIKYLLYX VE MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY SPZYMOUM SUE VYZHKY OYK.MOY XHWMHK COH WUTY MH LYY OYK MOUM XUE HKXYKYX OYK MH WHGMPGAY MOYIHCXYKL OY OUX IKYLWKPVYX U ZHKMGPNOM IKYBPHALSE."LOY TALM WYKMUPGSE NH HG MURPGN MOYT THKGPGN UGX YBYGPGN," LUPXOY, YBPXYGMSE LPGWYKYSE LUMPLZPYX CPMO OPL LAWWYLL. "HGSE, ISYULY VYIUKMPWASUK UVHAM PM."VY JAPMY YULE," OY WHGMPGAYX ISUEZASSE, UL OY UXKHPMSE MHHR MOY NHSXWHPG PG OPL IUST. "LOY CPSS LHHG VY LPGNPGN UGX ZKHSPWRPGN UVHAM. MOYSULM TYXPWPGY OUL XHGY OYK U BYKE NKYUM XYUS HZ NHHX. LOY OUL ZKYLOYGYXAI BYKE TAWO."MOY WHAGMYLL, CPMO U WOYYKZAS YDIKYLLPHG HG OYK ZUWY, SHHRYX XHCG UM OYKGUPSL UGX LIUM U SPMMSY ZHK SAWR UL LOY KYMAKGYX MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.WOUIMYK DBPPPUM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ QASE THKY UGX THKY XPLJAPYMPGN KYIHKML UVHAM MOY CUKVYNUG MH LIKYUX PG THLWHC; IYHISY LIHRY HZ UG UIIYUS VE MOY YTIYKHK MHMOY IYHISY, UGX HZ OPL WHTPGN OPTLYSZ ZKHT MOY UKTE MH THLWHC. UGX ULAI MH MOY YSYBYGMO HZ QASE GH TUGPZYLMH HK UIIYUS OUX VYYG KYWYPBYX,YDUNNYKUMYX KYIHKML VYWUTY WAKKYGM UVHAM MOYT UGX UVHAM MOY IHLPMPHG HZKALLPU. PM CUL LUPX MOUM MOY YTIYKHK CUL SYUBPGN MOY UKTE VYWUALY PM CULPG XUGNYK, PM CUL LUPX MOUM LTHSYGLR OUX LAKKYGXYKYX, MOUM GUIHSYHG OUXUG UKTE HZ U TPSSPHG UGX HGSE U TPKUWSY WHASX LUBY KALLPU.HG MOY YSYBYGMO HZ QASE, COPWO CUL LUMAKXUE, MOY TUGPZYLMH CUL KYWYPBYXVAM CUL GHM EYM PG IKPGM, UGX IPYKKY, COH CUL UM MOY KHLMHBL', IKHTPLYXMH WHTY MH XPGGYK GYDM XUE, LAGXUE, UGX VKPGN U WHIE HZ MOY TUGPZYLMHUGX UIIYUS, COPWO OY CHASX HVMUPG ZKHT WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG.MOUM LAGXUE, MOY KHLMHBL CYGM MH TULL UM MOY KUFATHBLRPL' IKPBUMY WOUIYSUL ALAUS. PM CUL U OHM QASE XUE. YBYG UM MYG H'WSHWR, COYG MOY KHLMHBLNHM HAM HZ MOYPK WUKKPUNY UM MOY WOUIYS, MOY LASMKE UPK, MOY LOHAML HZOUCRYKL, MOY SPNOM UGX NUE LATTYK WSHMOYL HZ MOY WKHCX, MOY XALME SYUBYLHZ MOY MKYYL HG MOY VHASYBUKX, MOY LHAGXL HZ MOY VUGX UGX MOY COPMYMKHALYKL HZ U VUMMUSPHG TUKWOPGN MH IUKUXY, MOY KUMMSPGN HZ COYYSL HGMOY WHVVSYLMHGYL, UGX MOY VKPSSPUGM, OHM LAGLOPGY CYKY USS ZASS HZ MOUMLATTYK SUGNAHK, MOUM WHGMYGM UGX XPLWHGMYGM CPMO MOY IKYLYGM, COPWOPL THLM LMKHGNSE ZYSM HG U VKPNOM, OHM XUE PG MHCG. USS MOY THLWHCGHMUVPSPMPYL, USS MOY KHLMHBL' UWJAUPGMUGWYL, CYKY UM MOY KUFATHBLRPL'WOUIYS, ZHK, UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OUIIYG, TUGE CYUSMOE ZUTPSPYLCOH ALAUSSE SYZM MHCG ZHK MOYPK WHAGMKE YLMUMYL OUX GHM NHGY UCUE MOUMLATTYK. UL GUMULOU, UM OYK THMOYK'L LPXY, IULLYX MOKHANO MOY WKHCXVYOPGX U SPBYKPYX ZHHMTUG COH WSYUKYX MOY CUE ZHK MOYT, LOY OYUKX UEHAGN TUG LIYURPGN UVHAM OYK PG MHH SHAX U COPLIYK."MOUM'L KHLMHBU, MOY HGY COH...""LOY'L TAWO MOPGGYK, VAM USS MOY LUTY LOY'L IKYMME!"LOY OYUKX, HK MOHANOM LOY OYUKX, MOY GUTYL HZ RAKUNPG UGX VHSRHGLRP. VAMLOY CUL USCUEL PTUNPGPGN MOUM. PM USCUEL LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM YBYKEHGYCOH SHHRYX UM OYK CUL MOPGRPGN HGSE HZ COUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OYK. CPMO ULPGRPGN OYUKM, CKYMWOYX UL LOY USCUEL CUL GHC COYG LOY ZHAGX OYKLYSZPG U WKHCX, GUMULOU PG OYK SPSUW LPSR XKYLL MKPTTYX CPMO VSUWR SUWYCUSRYX--UL CHTYG WUG CUSR--CPMO MOY THKY KYIHLY UGX LMUMYSPGYLL MOYNKYUMYK MOY IUPG UGX LOUTY PG OYK LHAS. LOY RGYC ZHK WYKMUPG MOUM LOYCUL IKYMME, VAM MOPL GH SHGNYK NUBY OYK LUMPLZUWMPHG UL PM ALYX MH.HG MOY WHGMKUKE PM MHKTYGMYX OYK THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN YSLY HZ SUMY, UGXIUKMPWASUKSE LH HG MOPL VKPNOM, OHM LATTYK XUE PG MHCG. "PM'L LAGXUEUNUPG--UGHMOYK CYYR IULM," LOY MOHANOM, KYWUSSPGN MOUM LOY OUX VYYG OYKYMOY LAGXUE VYZHKY, "UGX USCUEL MOY LUTY SPZY MOUM PL GH SPZY, UGX MOYLUTY LAKKHAGXPGNL PG COPWO PM ALYX MH VY LH YULE MH SPBY. P'T IKYMME,P'T EHAGN, UGX P RGHC MOUM GHC P UT NHHX. P ALYX MH VY VUX, VAM GHC PRGHC P UT NHHX," LOY MOHANOM, "VAM EYM TE VYLM EYUKL UKY LSPIIPGN VEUGX UKY GH NHHX MH UGEHGY." LOY LMHHX VE OYK THMOYK'L LPXY UGX YDWOUGNYXGHXL CPMO UWJAUPGMUGWYL GYUK OYK. ZKHT OUVPM LOY LWKAMPGPFYX MOY SUXPYL'XKYLLYL, WHGXYTGYX MOY VYUKPGN HZ U SUXE LMUGXPGN WSHLY VE COH CUL GHMWKHLLPGN OYKLYSZ IKHIYKSE VAM PG U WKUTIYX TUGGYK, UGX UNUPG LOY MOHANOMCPMO BYDUMPHG MOUM LOY CUL OYKLYSZ VYPGN QAXNYX UGX CUL QAXNPGN HMOYKL,UGX LAXXYGSE, UM MOY LHAGX HZ MOY LYKBPWY, LOY ZYSM OHKKPZPYX UM OYK HCGBPSYGYLL, OHKKPZPYX MOUM MOY ZHKTYK IAKPME HZ OYK LHAS CUL UNUPG SHLM MHOYK.U WHTYSE, ZKYLO-SHHRPGN HSX TUG CUL WHGXAWMPGN MOY LYKBPWY CPMO MOUMTPSX LHSYTGPME COPWO OUL LH YSYBUMPGN UGX LHHMOPGN UG YZZYWM HG MOYLHASL HZ MOY CHKLOPIYKL. MOY NUMYL HZ MOY LUGWMAUKE LWKYYG CYKY WSHLYX,MOY WAKMUPG CUL LSHCSE XKUCG, UGX ZKHT VYOPGX PM U LHZM TELMYKPHAL BHPWYIKHGHAGWYX LHTY CHKXL. MYUKL, MOY WUALY HZ COPWO LOY OYKLYSZ XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX, TUXY GUMULOU'L VKYULM OYUBY, UGX U QHEHAL VAM HIIKYLLPBYZYYSPGN UNPMUMYX OYK."MYUWO TY COUM P LOHASX XH, OHC MH SPBY TE SPZY, OHC P TUE NKHC NHHXZHKYBYK, ZHKYBYK!" LOY ISYUXYX.MOY XYUWHG WUTY HAM HGMH MOY KUPLYX LIUWY VYZHKY MOY USMUK LWKYYG UGX,OHSXPGN OPL MOATV YDMYGXYX, XKYC OPL SHGN OUPK ZKHT AGXYK OPL XUSTUMPWUGX, TURPGN MOY LPNG HZ MOY WKHLL HG OPL VKYULM, VYNUG PG U SHAX UGXLHSYTG BHPWY MH KYWPMY MOY CHKXL HZ MOY IKUEYK..."PG IYUWY SYM AL IKUE AGMH MOY SHKX.""UL HGY WHTTAGPME, CPMOHAM XPLMPGWMPHG HZ WSULL, CPMOHAM YGTPME, AGPMYXVE VKHMOYKSE SHBY--SYM AL IKUE!" MOHANOM GUMULOU."ZHK MOY IYUWY MOUM PL ZKHT UVHBY, UGX ZHK MOY LUSBUMPHG HZ HAK LHASL.""ZHK MOY CHKSX HZ UGNYSL UGX USS MOY LIPKPML COH XCYSS UVHBY AL," IKUEYXGUMULOU.COYG MOYE IKUEYX ZHK MOY CUKKPHKL, LOY MOHANOM HZ OYK VKHMOYK UGXXYGPLHB. COYG MOYE IKUEYX ZHK USS MKUBYSPGN VE SUGX UGX LYU, LOYKYTYTVYKYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, IKUEYX ZHK OPT, UGX ULRYX NHX MH ZHKNPBY OYKUSS MOY CKHGNL LOY OUX XHGY OPT. COYG MOYE IKUEYX ZHK MOHLY COH SHBY AL,LOY IKUEYX ZHK MOY TYTVYKL HZ OYK HCG ZUTPSE, OYK ZUMOYK UGX THMOYK UGXLHGEU, KYUSPFPGN ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY OHC CKHGNSE LOY OUX UWMYX MHCUKXMOYT, UGX ZYYSPGN USS MOY LMKYGNMO HZ OYK SHBY ZHK MOYT. COYG MOYEIKUEYX ZHK MOHLY COH OUMY AL, LOY MKPYX MH MOPGR HZ OYK YGYTPYL UGXIYHISY COH OUMYX OYK, PG HKXYK MH IKUE ZHK MOYT. LOY PGWSAXYX UTHGN OYKYGYTPYL MOY WKYXPMHKL UGX USS COH OUX VALPGYLL XYUSPGNL CPMO OYKZUMOYK, UGX USCUEL UM MOY MOHANOM HZ YGYTPYL UGX MOHLY COH OUMYX OYK LOYKYTYTVYKYX UGUMHSY COH OUX XHGY OYK LH TAWO OUKT--UGX MOHANO OY XPX GHMOUMY OYK LOY NSUXSE IKUEYX ZHK OPT UL ZHK UG YGYTE. HGSE UM IKUEYK XPXLOY ZYYS UVSY MH MOPGR WSYUKSE UGX WUSTSE HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX UGUMHSY,UL TYG ZHK COHT OYK ZYYSPGNL CYKY UL GHMOPGN WHTIUKYX CPMO OYK UCY UGXXYBHMPHG MH NHX. COYG MOYE IKUEYX ZHK MOY PTIYKPUS ZUTPSE UGX MOY LEGHX,LOY VHCYX BYKE SHC UGX TUXY MOY LPNG HZ MOY WKHLL, LUEPGN MH OYKLYSZMOUM YBYG PZ LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX, LMPSS LOY WHASX GHM XHAVM, UGX UMUGE KUMY SHBYX MOY NHBYKGPGN LEGHX UGX IKUEYX ZHK PM.COYG OY OUX ZPGPLOYX MOY SPMUGE MOY XYUWHG WKHLLYX MOY LMHSY HBYK OPLVKYULM UGX LUPX, "SYM AL WHTTPM HAKLYSBYL UGX HAK COHSY SPBYL MH WOKPLMMOY SHKX!""WHTTPM HAKLYSBYL MH NHX," GUMULOU PGCUKXSE KYIYUMYX. "SHKX NHX, PLAVTPM TELYSZ MH MOE CPSS!" LOY MOHANOM. "P CUGM GHMOPGN, CPLO ZHKGHMOPGN; MYUWO TY COUM MH XH UGX OHC MH ALY TE CPSS! MURY TY, MURYTY!" IKUEYX GUMULOU, CPMO PTIUMPYGM YTHMPHG PG OYK OYUKM, GHM WKHLLPGNOYKLYSZ VAM SYMMPGN OYK LSYGXYK UKTL OUGN XHCG UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYPGBPLPVSY IHCYK UM UGE THTYGM MH MURY OYK UGX XYSPBYK OYK ZKHT OYKLYSZ,ZKHT OYK KYNKYML, XYLPKYL, KYTHKLY, OHIYL, UGX LPGL.MOY WHAGMYLL SHHRYX KHAGX LYBYKUS MPTYL UM OYK XUANOMYK'L LHZMYGYX ZUWYUGX LOPGPGN YEYL UGX IKUEYX NHX MH OYSI OYK.AGYDIYWMYXSE, PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY LYKBPWY, UGX GHM PG MOY ALAUS HKXYKGUMULOU RGYC LH CYSS, MOY XYUWHG VKHANOM HAM U LTUSS LMHHS, MOY HGY OYRGYSM HG COYG IKUEPGN HG MKPGPME LAGXUE, UGX ISUWYX PM VYZHKY MOY XHHKLHZ MOY LUGWMAUKE LWKYYG. MOY IKPYLM WUTY HAM CPMO OPL IAKISY BYSBYMVPKYMMU HG OPL OYUX, UXQALMYX OPL OUPK, UGX RGYSM XHCG CPMO UG YZZHKM.YBYKEVHXE ZHSSHCYX OPL YDUTISY UGX MOYE SHHRYX UM HGY UGHMOYK PGLAKIKPLY. MOHANO OY XPX GHM CUGM MH KYTPGX MOY KHLMHBL HZ VHSRHGLRP,IPYKKY WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT TURPGN MOYT OUIIE VE MOY GYCL HZ MOYPKLHG'L OUBPGN KYWYPBYX U XYWHKUMPHG, LH OY LYGM MOUM IKPGMYX UKTE HKXYKUGX GPWOHSUL' SYMMYK MH MOY KHLMHBL, RYYIPGN MOY UIIYUS, MOY VASSYMPG,UGX MOY HMOYK HKXYKL MH MURY CPMO OPT COYG OY CYGM MH XPGGYK.OPL WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG UGX MOY SUMMYK'L MHGY HZ UGDPHALOAKKE, MOY TYYMPGN CPMO MOY WHAKPYK COH MUSRYX WULAUSSE HZ OHC VUXSEMOPGNL CYKY NHPGN PG MOY UKTE, MOY KATHKL HZ MOY XPLWHBYKE HZ LIPYL PGTHLWHC UGX HZ U SYUZSYM PG WPKWASUMPHG LMUMPGN MOUM GUIHSYHG IKHTPLYXMH VY PG VHMO MOY KALLPUG WUIPMUSL VE MOY UAMATG, UGX MOY MUSR HZ MOYYTIYKHK'L VYPGN YDIYWMYX MH UKKPBY GYDM XUE--USS UKHALYX CPMO ZKYLOZHKWY MOUM ZYYSPGN HZ UNPMUMPHG UGX YDIYWMUMPHG PG IPYKKY COPWO OY OUXVYYG WHGLWPHAL HZ YBYK LPGWY MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZ MOY WHTYM, UGX YLIYWPUSSELPGWY MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY CUK.OY OUX SHGN VYYG MOPGRPGN HZ YGMYKPGN MOY UKTE UGX CHASX OUBY XHGY LHOUX OY GHM VYYG OPGXYKYX, ZPKLM, VE OPL TYTVYKLOPI HZ MOY LHWPYME HZZKYYTULHGL MH COPWO OY CUL VHAGX VE HUMO UGX COPWO IKYUWOYX IYKIYMAUSIYUWY UGX MOY UVHSPMPHG HZ CUK, UGX LYWHGXSE, VE MOY ZUWM MOUM COYG OYLUC MOY NKYUM TULL HZ TALWHBPMYL COH OUX XHGGYX AGPZHKT UGX CYKY MUSRPGNIUMKPHMPLT, OY LHTYOHC ZYSM ULOUTYX MH MURY MOY LMYI. VAM MOY WOPYZKYULHG ZHK GHM WUKKEPGN HAM OPL PGMYGMPHG MH YGMYK MOY UKTE SUE PG MOYBUNAY PXYU MOUM OY CUL S'KALLY VYLAOHZ COH OUX MOY GATVYK HZ MOY VYULM,666; MOUM OPL IUKM PG MOY NKYUM UZZUPK HZ LYMMPGN U SPTPM MH MOYIHCYK HZ MOY VYULM MOUM LIHRY NKYUM UGX VSULIOYTHAL MOPGNL OUX VYYGIKYXYLMPGYX ZKHT YMYKGPME, UGX MOUM MOYKYZHKY OY HANOM GHM MH AGXYKMURYUGEMOPGN, VAM CUPM ZHK COUM CUL VHAGX MH WHTY MH IULL.WOUIMYK DDU ZYC PGMPTUMY ZKPYGXL CYKY XPGPGN CPMO MOY KHLMHBL MOUM XUE, UL ALAUSHG LAGXUEL.IPYKKY WUTY YUKSE LH UL MH ZPGX MOYT USHGY.OY OUX NKHCG LH LMHAM MOPL EYUK MOUM OY CHASX OUBY VYYG UVGHKTUS OUX OYGHM VYYG LH MUSS, LH VKHUX HZ SPTV, UGX LH LMKHGN MOUM OY WUKKPYX OPLVASR CPMO YBPXYGM YULY.OY CYGM AI MOY LMUPKL, IAZZPGN UGX TAMMYKPGN LHTYMOPGN. OPL WHUWOTUG XPXGHM YBYG ULR COYMOYK OY CUL MH CUPM. OY RGYC MOUM COYG OPL TULMYK CULUM MOY KHLMHBL' OY LMUEYX MPSS TPXGPNOM. MOY KHLMHBL' ZHHMTUG KALOYXYUNYKSE ZHKCUKX MH OYSI OPT HZZ CPMO OPL WSHUR UGX MURY OPL OUM UGXLMPWR. IPYKKY, ZKHT WSAV OUVPM, USCUEL SYZM VHMO OUM UGX LMPWR PG MOYUGMYKHHT.MOY ZPKLM IYKLHG OY LUC PG MOY OHALY CUL GUMULOU. YBYG VYZHKY OY LUCOYK, COPSY MURPGN HZZ OPL WSHUR, OY OYUKX OYK. LOY CUL IKUWMPWPGN LHSZUYDYKWPLYL PG MOY TALPW KHHT. OY RGYC MOUM LOY OUX GHM LAGN LPGWY OYKPSSGYLL, UGX LH MOY LHAGX HZ OYK BHPWY LAKIKPLYX UGX XYSPNOMYX OPT. OYHIYGYX MOY XHHK LHZMSE UGX LUC OYK, PG MOY SPSUW XKYLL LOY OUX CHKG UMWOAKWO, CUSRPGN UVHAM MOY KHHT LPGNPGN. LOY OUX OYK VUWR MH OPT COYG OYHIYGYX MOY XHHK, VAM COYG, MAKGPGN JAPWRSE, LOY LUC OPL VKHUX, LAKIKPLYXZUWY, LOY VSALOYX UGX WUTY KUIPXSE AI MH OPT."P CUGM MH MKE MH LPGN UNUPG," LOY LUPX, UXXPGN UL PZ VE CUE HZ YDWALY,"PM PL, UM SYULM, LHTYMOPGN MH XH.""MOUM'L WUIPMUS!""OHC NSUX P UT EHA'BY WHTY! P UT LH OUIIE MHXUE," LOY LUPX, CPMO MOY HSXUGPTUMPHG IPYKKY OUX GHM LYYG PG OYK ZHK U SHGN MPTY. "EHA RGHC GPWOHSULOUL KYWYPBYX U LM. NYHKNY'L WKHLL? P UT LH IKHAX HZ OPT.""HO EYL, P LYGM MOUM UGGHAGWYTYGM. VAM P XHG'M CUGM MH PGMYKKAIM EHA,"OY UXXYX, UGX CUL UVHAM MH NH MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.GUMULOU LMHIIYX OPT."WHAGM, PL PM CKHGN HZ TY MH LPGN?" LOY LUPX VSALOPGN, UGX ZPDPGN OYKYEYL PGJAPKPGNSE HG OPT."GH... COE LOHASX PM VY? HG MOY WHGMKUKE... VAM COE XH EHA ULR TY?""P XHG'M RGHC TELYSZ," GUMULOU UGLCYKYX JAPWRSE, "VAM P LOHASX GHM SPRYMH XH UGEMOPGN EHA XPLUIIKHBYX HZ. P VYSPYBY PG EHA WHTISYMYSE. EHAXHG'M RGHC OHC PTIHKMUGM EHA UKY MH TY, OHC TAWO EHA'BY XHGY ZHK TY...."LOY LIHRY KUIPXSE UGX XPX GHM GHMPWY OHC IPYKKY ZSALOYX UM OYK CHKXL. "PLUC PG MOUM LUTY UKTE HKXYK MOUM OY, VHSRHGLRP" (LOY COPLIYKYX MOY GUTYOULMPSE), "PL PG KALLPU, UGX PG MOY UKTE UNUPG. COUM XH EHA MOPGR?"--LOYCUL LIYURPGN OAKKPYXSE, YBPXYGMSE UZKUPX OYK LMKYGNMO TPNOM ZUPSOYK--"CPSS OY YBYK ZHKNPBY TY? CPSS OY GHM USCUEL OUBY U VPMMYK ZYYSPGNMHCUKX TY? COUM XH EHA MOPGR? COUM XH EHA MOPGR?""P MOPGR..." IPYKKY KYISPYX, "MOUM OY OUL GHMOPGN MH ZHKNPBY.... PZ PCYKY PG OPL ISUWY..."VE ULLHWPUMPHG HZ PXYUL, IPYKKY CUL UM HGWY WUKKPYX VUWR MH MOY XUECOYG, MKEPGN MH WHTZHKM OYK, OY OUX LUPX MOUM PZ OY CYKY GHM OPTLYSZ VAMMOY VYLM TUG PG MOY CHKSX UGX ZKYY, OY CHASX ULR HG OPL RGYYL ZHK OYKOUGX; UGX MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN HZ IPME, MYGXYKGYLL, UGX SHBY MHHR IHLLYLLPHGHZ OPT UGX MOY LUTY CHKXL KHLY MH OPL SPIL. VAM LOY XPX GHM NPBY OPTMPTY MH LUE MOYT."EYL, EHA... EHA..." LOY LUPX, AMMYKPGN MOY CHKX EHAKUIMAKHALSE--"MOUM'L U XPZZYKYGM MOPGN. P RGHC GH HGY RPGXYK, THKYNYGYKHAL, HK VYMMYK MOUG EHA; GHVHXE WHASX VY! OUX EHA GHM VYYGMOYKY MOYG, UGX GHC MHH, P XHG'M RGHC COUM CHASX OUBY VYWHTY HZ TY,VYWUALY..."MYUKL LAXXYGSE KHLY PG OYK YEYL, LOY MAKGYX UCUE, SPZMYX OYK TALPWVYZHKY OYK YEYL, VYNUG LPGNPGN UNUPG, UGX UNUPG VYNUG CUSRPGN AI UGXXHCG MOY KHHT.QALM MOYG IYMEU WUTY KAGGPGN PG ZKHT MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.IYMEU CUL GHC U OUGXLHTY KHLE SUX HZ ZPZMYYG CPMO ZASS KYX SPIL UGXKYLYTVSYX GUMULOU. OY CUL IKYIUKPGN MH YGMYK MOY AGPBYKLPME, VAM OY UGXOPL ZKPYGX HVHSYGLRP OUX SUMYSE, PG LYWKYM, UNKYYX MH QHPG MOY OALLUKL.IYMEU OUX WHTY KALOPGN HAM MH MUSR MH OPL GUTYLURY UVHAM MOPL UZZUPK.OY OUX ULRYX IPYKKY MH ZPGX HAM COYMOYK OY CHASX VY UWWYIMYX PG MOYOALLUKL.IPYKKY CUSRYX AI UGX XHCG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, GHM SPLMYGPGN MH COUM IYMEUCUL LUEPGN.IYMEU IASSYX OPT VE MOY UKT MH UMMKUWM OPL UMMYGMPHG."CYSS, COUM UVHAM TE ISUG? IYMYK RPKPSEWO, ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY! EHA UKY TEHGSE OHIY," LUPX IYMEU."HO EYL, EHAK ISUG. MH QHPG MOY OALLUKL? P'SS TYGMPHG PM, P'SS VKPGN PMUSS AI MHXUE.""CYSS, THG WOYK, OUBY EHA NHM MOY TUGPZYLMH?" ULRYX MOY HSX WHAGM. "MOYWHAGMYLL OUL VYYG MH TULL UM MOY KUFATHBLRPL' UGX OYUKX MOY GYC IKUEYK.LOY LUEL PM'L BYKE ZPGY.""EYL, P'BY NHM PM," LUPX IPYKKY. "MOY YTIYKHK PL MH VY OYKY MHTHKKHC...MOYKY'L MH VY UG YDMKUHKXPGUKE TYYMPGN HZ MOY GHVPSPME, UGX MOYE UKYMUSRPGN HZ U SYBE HZ MYG TYG IYK MOHALUGX. HO EYL, SYM TY WHGNKUMASUMYEHA!""EYL, EYL, MOUGR NHX! CYSS, UGX COUM GYCL ZKHT MOY UKTE?""CY UKY UNUPG KYMKYUMPGN. MOYE LUE CY'KY USKYUXE GYUK LTHSYGLR," KYISPYXIPYKKY."H SHKX, H SHKX!" YDWSUPTYX MOY WHAGM. "COYKY PL MOY TUGPZYLMH?""MOY YTIYKHK'L UIIYUS? HO EYL!"IPYKKY VYNUG ZYYSPGN PG OPL IHWRYML ZHK MOY IUIYKL, VAM WHASX GHM ZPGXMOYT. LMPSS LSUIIPGN OPL IHWRYML, OY RPLLYX MOY OUGX HZ MOY WHAGMYLLCOH YGMYKYX MOY KHHT UGX NSUGWYX AGYULPSE UKHAGX, YBPXYGMSE YDIYWMPGNGUMULOU, COH OUX SYZM HZZ LPGNPGN VAM OUX GHM EYM WHTY PGMH MOY XKUCPGNKHHT."HG TE CHKX, P XHG'M RGHC COUM P'BY XHGY CPMO PM," OY LUPX."MOYKY OY PL, USCUEL SHLPGN YBYKEMOPGN!" KYTUKRYX MOY WHAGMYLL.GUMULOU YGMYKYX CPMO U LHZMYGYX UGX UNPMUMYX YDIKYLLPHG HZ ZUWY UGXLUM XHCG SHHRPGN LPSYGMSE UM IPYKKY. UL LHHG UL LOY YGMYKYX, IPYKKY'LZYUMAKYL, COPWO OUX VYYG NSHHTE, LAXXYGSE SPNOMYX AI, UGX COPSY LMPSSLYUKWOPGN ZHK MOY IUIYKL OY NSUGWYX UM OYK LYBYKUS MPTYL."GH, KYUSSE! P'SS XKPBY OHTY, P TALM OUBY SYZM MOYT MOYKY. P'SSWYKMUPGSE...""VAM EHA'SS VY SUMY ZHK XPGGYK.""HO! UGX TE WHUWOTUG OUL NHGY."VAM LHGEU, COH OUX NHGY MH SHHR ZHK MOY IUIYKL PG MOY UGMYKHHT, OUXZHAGX MOYT PG IPYKKY'L OUM, COYKY OY OUX WUKYZASSE MAWRYX MOYT AGXYK MOYSPGPGN. IPYKKY CUL UVHAM MH VYNPG KYUXPGN."GH, UZMYK XPGGYK," LUPX MOY HSX WHAGM, YBPXYGMSE YDIYWMPGN TAWOYGQHETYGM ZKHT MOUM KYUXPGN.UM XPGGYK, UM COPWO WOUTIUNGY CUL XKAGR MH MOY OYUSMO HZ MOY GYCWOYBUSPYK HZ LM. NYHKNY, LOPGLOPG MHSX MOYT MOY MHCG GYCL, HZ MOYPSSGYLL HZ MOY HSX NYHKNPUG IKPGWYLL, HZ TYMPBPYK'L XPLUIIYUKUGWY ZKHTTHLWHC, UGX HZ OHC LHTY NYKTUG ZYSSHC OUX VYYG VKHANOM MH KHLMHIWOPGUGX UWWALYX HZ VYPGN U ZKYGWO "LIEYK" (LH WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG OUX MHSX MOYLMHKE), UGX OHC KHLMHIWOPG SYM OPT NH UGX ULLAKYX MOY IYHISY MOUM OY CUL"GHM U LIPKY UM USS, VAM HGSE UG HSX NYKTUG KAPG.""IYHISY UKY VYPGN UKKYLMYX..." LUPX MOY WHAGM. "P'BY MHSX MOY WHAGMYLLLOY LOHASX GHM LIYUR ZKYGWO LH TAWO. PM'L GHM MOY MPTY ZHK PM GHC.""UGX OUBY EHA OYUKX?" LOPGLOPG ULRYX. "IKPGWY NHSPMLEG OUL YGNUNYX UTULMYK MH MYUWO OPT KALLPUG. PM PL VYWHTPGN XUGNYKHAL MH LIYUR ZKYGWO PGMOY LMKYYML.""UGX OHC UVHAM EHA, WHAGM IYMYK RPKPSEWO? PZ MOYE WUSS AI MOY TPSPMPU,EHA MHH CPSS OUBY MH THAGM U OHKLY," KYTUKRYX MOY HSX WHAGM, UXXKYLLPGNIPYKKY.IPYKKY OUX VYYG LPSYGM UGX IKYHWWAIPYX USS MOKHANO XPGGYK, LYYTPGN GHMMH NKULI COUM CUL LUPX. OY SHHRYX UM MOY WHAGM."HO EYL, MOY CUK," OY LUPX. "GH! COUM LHKM HZ CUKKPHK LOHASX P TURY? UGXEYM YBYKEMOPGN PL LH LMKUGNY, LH LMKUGNY! P WUG'M TURY PM HAM. P XHG'MRGHC, P UT BYKE ZUK ZKHT OUBPGN TPSPMUKE MULMYL, VAM PG MOYLY MPTYL GHHGY WUG UGLCYK ZHK OPTLYSZ."UZMYK XPGGYK MOY WHAGM LYMMSYX OPTLYSZ WHTZHKMUVSE PG UG YULE WOUPK UGXCPMO U LYKPHAL ZUWY ULRYX LHGEU, COH CUL WHGLPXYKYX UG YDWYSSYGM KYUXYK,MH KYUX MOY UIIYUS."MH THLWHC, HAK UGWPYGM WUIPMUS!"MOY YGYTE OUL YGMYKYX MOY VHKXYKL HZ KALLPU CPMO PTTYGLY ZHKWYL. OYWHTYL MH XYLIHPS HAK VYSHBYX WHAGMKE."LHGEU KYUX IUPGLMURPGNSE PG OYK OPNO-IPMWOYX BHPWY. MOY WHAGM SPLMYGYXCPMO WSHLYX YEYL, OYUBPGN UVKAIM LPNOL UM WYKMUPG IULLUNYL.GUMULOU LUM YKYWM, NUFPGN CPMO U LYUKWOPGN SHHR GHC UM OYK ZUMOYK UGXGHC UM IPYKKY.IPYKKY ZYSM OYK YEYL HG OPT UGX MKPYX GHM MH SHHR KHAGX. MOY WHAGMYLLLOHHR OYK OYUX XPLUIIKHBPGNSE UGX UGNKPSE UM YBYKE LHSYTG YDIKYLLPHGPG MOY TUGPZYLMH. PG USS MOYLY CHKXL LOY LUC HGSE MOUM MOY XUGNYKMOKYUMYGPGN OYK LHG CHASX GHM LHHG VY HBYK. LOPGLOPG, CPMO U LUKWULMPWLTPSY HG OPL SPIL, CUL YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKPGN MH TURY ZAG HZ UGEMOPGN MOUMNUBY OPT MOY HIIHKMAGPME: LHGEU'L KYUXPGN, UGE KYTUKR HZ MOY WHAGM'L, HKYBYG MOY TUGPZYLMH PMLYSZ LOHASX GH VYMMYK IKYMYDM IKYLYGM PMLYSZ.UZMYK KYUXPGN UVHAM MOY XUGNYKL MOUM MOKYUMYGYX KALLPU, MOY OHIYL MOYYTIYKHK ISUWYX HG THLWHC UGX YLIYWPUSSE HG PML PSSALMKPHAL GHVPSPME,LHGEU, CPMO U JAPBYK PG OYK BHPWY XAY WOPYZSE MH MOY UMMYGMPHG MOUM CULVYPGN IUPX MH OYK, KYUX MOY SULM CHKXL:"CY HAKLYSBYL CPSS GHM XYSUE MH UIIYUK UTHGN HAK IYHISY PG MOUM WUIPMUSUGX PG HMOYK IUKML HZ HAK KYUST ZHK WHGLASMUMPHG, UGX ZHK MOY XPKYWMPHGHZ USS HAK SYBPYL, VHMO MOHLY GHC VUKKPGN MOY YGYTE'L IUMO UGX MOHLYZKYLOSE ZHKTYX MH XYZYUM OPT COYKYBYK OY TUE UIIYUK. TUE MOY KAPG OYOHIYL MH VKPGN AIHG AL KYWHPS HG OPL HCG OYUX, UGX TUE YAKHIY XYSPBYKYXZKHT VHGXUNY NSHKPZE MOY GUTY HZ KALLPU!""EYL, MOUM'L PM!" WKPYX MOY WHAGM, HIYGPGN OPL THPLM YEYL UGX LGPZZPGNKYIYUMYXSE, UL PZ U LMKHGN BPGUPNKYMMY OUX VYYG OYSX MH OPL GHLY; UGX OYUXXYX, "SYM MOY YTIYKHK VAM LUE MOY CHKX UGX CY'SS LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGNUGX VYNKAXNY GHMOPGN."VYZHKY LOPGLOPG OUX MPTY MH AMMYK MOY QHRY OY CUL KYUXE MH TURY HG MOYWHAGM'L IUMKPHMPLT, GUMULOU QATIYX AI ZKHT OYK ISUWY UGX KUG MH OYKZUMOYK."COUM U XUKSPGN HAK IUIU PL!" LOY WKPYX, RPLLPGN OPT, UGX LOY UNUPGSHHRYX UM IPYKKY CPMO MOY AGWHGLWPHAL WHJAYMKE MOUM OUX KYMAKGYX MH OYKCPMO OYK VYMMYK LIPKPML."MOYKY! OYKY'L U IUMKPHM ZHK EHA!" LUPX LOPGLOPG."GHM U IUMKPHM UM USS, VAM LPTISE..." GUMULOU KYISPYX PG UG PGQAKYXMHGY. "YBYKEMOPGN LYYTL ZAGGE MH EHA, VAM MOPL PLG'M UM USS U QHRY....""U QHRY PGXYYX!" IAM PG MOY WHAGM. "SYM OPT VAM LUE MOY CHKX UGX CY'SSUSS NH.... CY'KY GHM NYKTUGL!""VAM XPX EHA GHMPWY, PM LUEL, 'ZHK WHGLASMUMPHG'?" LUPX IPYKKY."GYBYK TPGX COUM PM'L ZHK...."UM MOPL THTYGM, IYMEU, MH COHT GHVHXE CUL IUEPGN UGE UMMYGMPHG, WUTY AIMH OPL ZUMOYK CPMO U BYKE ZSALOYX ZUWY UGX LUPX PG OPL VKYURPGN BHPWYMOUM CUL GHC XYYI UGX GHC LOKPSS:"CYSS, IUIU, P MYSS EHA XYZPGPMYSE, UGX TUTTU MHH, PM'L UL EHA ISYULY,VAM P LUE XYZPGPMYSE MOUM EHA TALM SYM TY YGMYK MOY UKTE, VYWUALY PWUG'M... MOUM'L USS...."MOY WHAGMYLL, PG XPLTUE, SHHRYX AI MH OYUBYG, WSULIYX OYK OUGXL, UGXMAKGYX UGNKPSE MH OYK OALVUGX."MOUM WHTYL HZ EHAK MUSRPGN!" LUPX LOY.VAM MOY WHAGM OUX USKYUXE KYWHBYKYX ZKHT OPL YDWPMYTYGM."WHTY, WHTY!" LUPX OY. "OYKY'L U ZPGY CUKKPHK! GH! GHGLYGLY! EHA TALMLMAXE.""PM'L GHM GHGLYGLY, IUIU. ZYXEU HVHSYGLRP PL EHAGNYK MOUG P, UGX OY'LNHPGN MHH. VYLPXYL, USS MOY LUTY P WUG'M LMAXE GHC COYG..." IYMEULMHIIYX LOHKM, ZSALOYX MPSS OY IYKLIPKYX, VAM LMPSS NHM HAM MOY CHKXL,"COYG HAK ZUMOYKSUGX PL PG XUGNYK.""MOUM'SS XH, MOUM'SS XH--GHGLYGLY....""VAM EHA LUPX EHAKLYSZ MOUM CY CHASX LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGN.""IYMEU! VY JAPYM, P MYSS EHA!" WKPYX MOY WHAGM, CPMO U NSUGWY UM OPLCPZY, COH OUX MAKGYX IUSY UGX CUL LMUKPGN ZPDYXSE UM OYK LHG."UGX P MYSS EHA--IYMYK RPKPSEWO OYKY CPSS USLH MYSS EHA...""GHGLYGLY, P MYSS EHA. EHAK THMOYK'L TPSR OUL OUKXSE XKPYX HG EHAK SPILUGX EHA CUGM MH NH PGMH MOY UKTE! MOYKY, MOYKY, P MYSS EHA," UGX MOYWHAGM THBYX MH NH HAM HZ MOY KHHT, MURPGN MOY IUIYKL, IKHVUVSE MH KYKYUXMOYT PG OPL LMAXE VYZHKY OUBPGN U GUI."CYSS, IYMYK RPKPSEWO, SYM'L NH UGX OUBY U LTHRY," OY LUPX.IPYKKY CUL UNPMUMYX UGX AGXYWPXYX. GUMULOU'L AGCHGMYXSE VKPSSPUGM YEYL,WHGMPGAUSSE NSUGWPGN UM OPT CPMO U THKY MOUG WHKXPUS SHHR, OUX KYXAWYXOPT MH MOPL WHGXPMPHG."GH, P MOPGR P'SS NH OHTY.""OHTY? COE, EHA TYUGM MH LIYGX MOY YBYGPGN CPMO AL.... EHA XHG'MHZMYG WHTY GHCUXUEL UL PM PL, UGX MOPL NPKS HZ TPGY," LUPX MOY WHAGMNHHX-GUMAKYXSE, IHPGMPGN MH GUMULOU, "HGSE VKPNOMYGL AI COYG EHA'KYOYKY.""EYL, P OUX ZHKNHMMYG... P KYUSSE TALM NH OHTY... VALPGYLL..." LUPXIPYKKY OAKKPYXSE."CYSS, MOYG, UA KYBHPK!" LUPX MOY WHAGM, UGX CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHT."COE UKY EHA NHPGN? COE UKY EHA AILYM?" ULRYX GUMULOU, UGX LOY SHHRYXWOUSSYGNPGNSE PGMH IPYKKY'L YEYL."VYWUALY P SHBY EHA!" CUL COUM OY CUGMYX MH LUE, VAM OY XPX GHM LUE PM,UGX HGSE VSALOYX MPSS MOY MYUKL WUTY, UGX SHCYKYX OPL YEYL."VYWUALY PM PL VYMMYK ZHK TY MH WHTY SYLL HZMYG... VYWUALY... GH, LPTISEP OUBY VALPGYLL....""COE? GH, MYSS TY!" GUMULOU VYNUG KYLHSAMYSE UGX LAXXYGSE LMHIIYX.MOYE SHHRYX UM YUWO HMOYK CPMO XPLTUEYX UGX YTVUKKULLYX ZUWYL. OY MKPYXMH LTPSY VAM WHASX GHM: OPL LTPSY YDIKYLLYX LAZZYKPGN, UGX OY LPSYGMSERPLLYX OYK OUGX UGX CYGM HAM.IPYKKY TUXY AI OPL TPGX GHM MH NH MH MOY KHLMHBL' UGE THKY.WOUIMYK DDPUZMYK MOY XYZPGPMY KYZALUS OY OUX KYWYPBYX, IYMEU CYGM MH OPL KHHTUGX MOYKY SHWRYX OPTLYSZ PG UGX CYIM VPMMYKSE. COYG OY WUTY PG MH MYU,LPSYGM, THKHLY, UGX CPMO MYUK-LMUPGYX ZUWY, YBYKEVHXE IKYMYGXYX GHM MHGHMPWY UGEMOPGN.GYDM XUE MOY YTIYKHK UKKPBYX PG THLWHC, UGX LYBYKUS HZ MOY KHLMHBL'XHTYLMPW LYKZL VYNNYX IYKTPLLPHG MH NH MH OUBY U SHHR UM OPT. MOUMTHKGPGN IYMEU CUL U SHGN MPTY XKYLLPGN UGX UKKUGNPGN OPL OUPK UGXWHSSUK MH SHHR SPRY U NKHCG-AI TUG. OY ZKHCGYX VYZHKY OPL SHHRPGN NSULL,NYLMPWASUMYX, LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL, UGX ZPGUSSE, CPMOHAM LUEPGN U CHKXMH UGEHGY, MHHR OPL WUI UGX SYZM MOY OHALY VE MOY VUWR XHHK, MKEPGN MHUBHPX GHMPWY. IYMEU XYWPXYX MH NH LMKUPNOM MH COYKY MOY YTIYKHK CUL UGXMH YDISUPG ZKUGRSE MH LHTY NYGMSYTUG-PG-CUPMPGN (OY PTUNPGYX MOY YTIYKHKMH VY USCUEL LAKKHAGXYX VE NYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGN) MOUM OY, WHAGM KHLMHB,PG LIPMY HZ OPL EHAMO CPLOYX MH LYKBY OPL WHAGMKE; MOUM EHAMO WHASX VYGH OPGXKUGWY MH SHEUSME, UGX MOUM OY CUL KYUXE MH... COPSYXKYLLPGN, IYMEU OUX IKYIUKYX TUGE ZPGY MOPGNL OY TYUGM MH LUE MH MOYNYGMSYTUG-PG-CUPMPGN.PM CUL HG MOY BYKE ZUWM HZ VYPGN LH EHAGN MOUM IYMEU WHAGMYX ZHK LAWWYLLPG KYUWOPGN MOY YTIYKHK--OY YBYG MOHANOM OHC LAKIKPLYX YBYKEHGY CHASX VYUM OPL EHAMOZASGYLL--UGX EYM PG MOY UKKUGNYTYGM HZ OPL WHSSUK UGX OUPKUGX VE OPL LYXUMY XYSPVYKUMY CUSR OY CPLOYX MH UIIYUK U NKHCG-AI TUG.VAM MOY ZUKMOYK OY CYGM UGX MOY THKY OPL UMMYGMPHG CUL XPBYKMYX VE MOYYBYK-PGWKYULPGN WKHCXL THBPGN MHCUKX MOY RKYTSPG, MOY SYLL OY KYTYTVYKYXMH CUSR CPMO MOY LYXUMYGYLL UGX XYSPVYKUMPHG HZ U TUG. UL OY UIIKHUWOYXMOY RKYTSPG OY YBYG VYNUG MH UBHPX VYPGN WKALOYX UGX KYLHSAMYSE LMAWRHAM OPL YSVHCL PG U TYGUWPGN CUE. VAM CPMOPG MOY MKPGPME NUMYCUE OYCUL LH IKYLLYX MH MOY CUSS VE IYHISY COH IKHVUVSE CYKY AGUCUKY HZ MOYIUMKPHMPW PGMYGMPHGL CPMO COPWO OY OUX WHTY MOUM PG LIPMY HZ USS OPLXYMYKTPGUMPHG OY OUX MH NPBY PG, UGX LMHI COPSY WUKKPUNYL IULLYX PG,KATVSPGN VYGYUMO MOY UKWOCUE. VYLPXY IYMEU LMHHX U IYULUGM CHTUG, UZHHMTUG, MCH MKUXYLTYG, UGX U XPLWOUKNYX LHSXPYK. UZMYK LMUGXPGN LHTYMPTY PG MOY NUMYCUE, IYMEU MKPYX MH THBY ZHKCUKX PG ZKHGM HZ MOY HMOYKLCPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK USS MOY WUKKPUNYL MH IULL, UGX OY VYNUG KYLHSAMYSECHKRPGN OPL CUE CPMO OPL YSVHCL, VAM MOY CHTUG QALM PG ZKHGM HZ OPT, COHCUL MOY ZPKLM UNUPGLM COHT OY XPKYWMYX OPL YZZHKML, UGNKPSE LOHAMYX UMOPT:"COUM UKY EHA LOHBPGN ZHK, EHAGN SHKXSPGN? XHG'M EHA LYY CY'KY USSLMUGXPGN LMPSS? MOYG COE IALO?""UGEVHXE WUG LOHBY," LUPX MOY ZHHMTUG, UGX USLH VYNUG CHKRPGN OPL YSVHCLMH LAWO YZZYWM MOUM OY IALOYX IYMEU PGMH U BYKE ZPSMOE WHKGYK HZ MOYNUMYCUE.IYMEU CPIYX OPL IYKLIPKPGN ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGXL UGX IASSYX AI MOY XUTIWHSSUK COPWO OY OUX UKKUGNYX LH CYSS UM OHTY MH LYYT SPRY U TUG'L.OY ZYSM MOUM OY GH SHGNYK SHHRYX IKYLYGMUVSY, UGX ZYUKYX MOUM PZ OY CYKYGHC MH UIIKHUWO MOY NYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGN PG MOUM ISPNOM OY CHASX GHM VYUXTPMMYX MH MOY YTIYKHK. VAM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH LTUKMYG HGYLYSZ AIHK THBY MH UGHMOYK ISUWY, VYWUALY HZ MOY WKHCX. HGY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL COHXKHBY IULM CUL UG UWJAUPGMUGWY HZ MOY KHLMHBL', UGX IYMEU MOHANOM HZULRPGN OPL OYSI, VAM WUTY MH MOY WHGWSALPHG MOUM MOUM CHASX GHM VY UTUGSE MOPGN MH XH. COYG MOY WUKKPUNYL OUX USS IULLYX PG, MOY WKHCX,WUKKEPGN IYMEU CPMO PM, LMKYUTYX ZHKCUKX PGMH MOY RKYTSPG LJAUKY COPWOCUL USKYUXE ZASS HZ IYHISY. MOYKY CYKY IYHISY GHM HGSE PG MOY LJAUKY,VAM YBYKECOYKY--HG MOY LSHIYL UGX HG MOY KHHZL. UL LHHG UL IYMEU ZHAGXOPTLYSZ PG MOY LJAUKY OY WSYUKSE OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ VYSSL UGX MOY QHEHALBHPWYL HZ MOY WKHCX MOUM ZPSSYX MOY COHSY RKYTSPG.ZHK U COPSY MOY WKHCX CUL SYLL XYGLY, VAM LAXXYGSE USS OYUXL CYKY VUKYX,UGX YBYKEHGY KALOYX ZHKCUKX PG HGY XPKYWMPHG. IYMEU CUL VYPGN IKYLLYX LHMOUM OY WHASX LWUKWYSE VKYUMOY, UGX YBYKEVHXE LOHAMYX, "OAKKUO! OAKKUO!OAKKUO!" IYMEU LMHHX HG MPIMHY UGX IALOYX UGX IPGWOYX, VAM WHASX LYYGHMOPGN YDWYIM MOY IYHISY UVHAM OPT.USS MOY ZUWYL VHKY MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG HZ YDWPMYTYGM UGX YGMOALPULT. UMKUXYLTUG'L CPZY LMUGXPGN VYLPXY IYMEU LHVVYX, UGX MOY MYUKL KUG XHCGOYK WOYYRL."ZUMOYK! UGNYS! XYUK HGY!" LOY RYIM KYIYUMPGN, CPIPGN UCUE OYK MYUKLCPMO OYK ZPGNYKL."OAKKUO!" CUL OYUKX HG USS LPXYL.ZHK U THTYGM MOY WKHCX LMHHX LMPSS, VAM MOYG PM TUXY UGHMOYK KALOZHKCUKX.JAPMY VYLPXY OPTLYSZ, IYMEU, WSPGWOPGN OPL MYYMO UGX KHSSPGN OPL YEYLZYKHWPHALSE, IALOYX ZHKCUKX, YSVHCPGN OPL CUE UGX LOHAMPGN "OAKKUO!" ULPZ OY CYKY IKYIUKYX MOUM PGLMUGM MH RPSS OPTLYSZ UGX YBYKEHGY YSLY, VAMHG VHMO LPXYL HZ OPT HMOYK IYHISY CPMO LPTPSUKSE ZYKHWPHAL ZUWYL IALOYXZHKCUKX UGX YBYKEVHXE LOHAMYX "OAKKUO!""LH MOPL PL COUM MOY YTIYKHK PL!" MOHANOM IYMEU. "GH, P WUG'M IYMPMPHGOPT TELYSZ--MOUM CHASX VY MHH VHSX." VAM PG LIPMY HZ MOPL OY WHGMPGAYXMH LMKANNSY XYLIYKUMYSE ZHKCUKX, UGX ZKHT VYMCYYG MOY VUWRL HZ MOHLYPG ZKHGM OY WUANOM NSPTILYL HZ UG HIYG LIUWY CPMO U LMKPI HZ KYX WSHMOLIKYUX HAM HG PM; VAM QALM MOYG MOY WKHCX LCUEYX VUWR--MOY IHSPWYPG ZKHGM CYKY IALOPGN VUWR MOHLY COH OUX IKYLLYX MHH WSHLY MH MOYIKHWYLLPHG: MOY YTIYKHK CUL IULLPGN ZKHT MOY IUSUWY MH MOY WUMOYXKUS HZMOY ULLATIMPHG--UGX IYMEU AGYDIYWMYXSE KYWYPBYX LAWO U VSHC HG OPL LPXYUGX KPVL UGX CUL LJAYYFYX LH OUKX MOUM LAXXYGSE YBYKEMOPGN NKYC XPTVYZHKY OPL YEYL UGX OY SHLM WHGLWPHALGYLL. COYG OY WUTY MH OPTLYSZ, UTUG HZ WSYKPWUS UIIYUKUGWY CPMO U MAZM HZ NKUE OUPK UM MOY VUWR HZ OPLOYUX UGX CYUKPGN U LOUVVE VSAY WULLHWR--IKHVUVSE U WOAKWO WSYKR UGXWOUGMYK--CUL OHSXPGN OPT AGXYK MOY UKT CPMO HGY OUGX COPSY CUKXPGN HZZMOY IKYLLAKY HZ MOY WKHCX CPMO MOY HMOYK."EHA'BY WKALOYX MOY EHAGN NYGMSYTUG!" LUPX MOY WSYKR. "COUM UKY EHA AIMH? NYGMSE!... MOYE'BY WKALOYX OPT, WKALOYX OPT!"MOY YTIYKHK YGMYKYX MOY WUMOYXKUS HZ MOY ULLATIMPHG. MOY WKHCX LIKYUXHAM UNUPG THKY YBYGSE, UGX MOY WSYKR SYX IYMEU--IUSY UGX VKYUMOSYLL--MHMOY MLUK-WUGGHG. LYBYKUS IYHISY CYKY LHKKE ZHK IYMEU, UGX LAXXYGSE UWKHCX MAKGYX MHCUKX OPT UGX IKYLLYX KHAGX OPT. MOHLY COH LMHHX GYUKYLMOPT UMMYGXYX MH OPT, AGVAMMHGYX OPL WHUM, LYUMYX OPT HG MOY KUPLYXISUMZHKT HZ MOY WUGGHG, UGX KYIKHUWOYX MOHLY HMOYKL (COHYBYK MOYE TPNOMVY) COH OUX WKALOYX OPT."HGY TPNOM YULPSE NYM RPSSYX MOUM CUE! COUM XH MOYE TYUG VE PM? RPSSPGNIYHISY! IHHK XYUK, OY'L UL COPMY UL U LOYYM!"--BUKPHAL BHPWYL CYKY OYUKXLUEPGN.IYMEU LHHG WUTY MH OPTLYSZ, MOY WHSHK KYMAKGYX MH OPL ZUWY, MOY IUPG OUXIULLYX, UGX UM MOY WHLM HZ MOUM MYTIHKUKE AGISYULUGMGYLL OY OUX HVMUPGYXU ISUWY VE MOY WUGGHG ZKHT COYKY OY OHIYX MH LYY MOY YTIYKHK COHCHASX VY KYMAKGPGN MOUM CUE. IYMEU GH SHGNYK MOHANOM HZ IKYLYGMPGN OPLIYMPMPHG. PZ OY WHASX HGSE LYY MOY YTIYKHK OY CHASX VY OUIIE!COPSY MOY LYKBPWY CUL IKHWYYXPGN PG MOY WUMOYXKUS HZ MOY ULLATIMPHG--PMCUL U WHTVPGYX LYKBPWY HZ IKUEYK HG MOY HWWULPHG HZ MOY YTIYKHK'LUKKPBUS UGX HZ MOUGRLNPBPGN ZHK MOY WHGWSALPHG HZ IYUWY CPMO MOYMAKRL--MOY WKHCX HAMLPXY LIKYUX HAM UGX OUCRYKL UIIYUKYX, LYSSPGN RBUL,NPGNYKVKYUX, UGX IHIIELYYX LCYYML (HZ COPWO IYMEU CUL IUKMPWASUKSEZHGX), UGX HKXPGUKE WHGBYKLUMPHG WHASX UNUPG VY OYUKX. U MKUXYLTUG'LCPZY CUL LOHCPGN U KYGM PG OYK LOUCS UGX MYSSPGN OHC TAWO MOY LOUCS OUXWHLM; UGHMOYK CUL LUEPGN MOUM USS LPSR NHHXL OUX GHC NHM XYUK. MOY WSYKRCOH OUX KYLWAYX IYMEU CUL MUSRPGN MH U ZAGWMPHGUKE UVHAM MOY IKPYLML COHCYKY HZZPWPUMPGN MOUM XUE CPMO MOY VPLOHI. MOY WSYKR LYBYKUS MPTYL ALYXMOY CHKX "ISYGUKE" (HZ MOY LYKBPWY), U CHKX IYMEU XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX.MCH EHAGN WPMPFYGL CYKY QHRPGN CPMO LHTY LYKZ NPKSL COH CYKY WKUWRPGNGAML. OY LUM HG OPL YSYBUMPHG--MOY IYXYLMUS HZMOY WUGGHG--LMPSS UNPMUMYX UL VYZHKY VE MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY YTIYKHK UGXVE OPL SHBY ZHK OPT. MOY ZYYSPGN HZ IUPG UGX ZYUK OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYXCOYG OY CUL VYPGN WKALOYX, MHNYMOYK CPMO MOUM HZ KUIMAKY, LMPSS ZAKMOYKPGMYGLPZPYX OPL LYGLY HZ MOY PTIHKMUGWY HZ MOY HWWULPHG.LAXXYGSE MOY LHAGX HZ U ZPKPGN HZ WUGGHG CUL OYUKX ZKHT MOY YTVUGRTYGM,MH WYSYVKUMY MOY LPNGPGN HZ IYUWY CPMO MOY MAKRL, UGX MOY WKHCX KALOYXPTIYMAHALSE MHCUKX MOY YTVUGRTYGM MH CUMWO MOY ZPKPGN.
