MOY ZPKPGN CUL LMPSS IKHWYYXPGN COYGHZZPWYKL, NYGYKUSL, UGX NYGMSYTYG-PG-CUPMPGN WUTY KAGGPGN HAM HZ MOYWUMOYXKUS, UGX UZMYK MOYT HMOYKL PG U THKY SYPLAKYSE TUGGYK: WUIL CYKYUNUPG KUPLYX, UGX MOHLY COH OUX KAG MH SHHR UM MOY WUGGHG KUG VUWRUNUPG. UM SULM ZHAK TYG PG AGPZHKTL UGX LULOYL YTYKNYX ZKHT MOYWUMOYXKUS XHHKL. "OAKKUO! OAKKUO!" LOHAMYX MOY WKHCX UNUPG."COPWO PL OY? COPWO?" ULRYX IYMEU PG U MYUKZAS BHPWY, HZ MOHLY UKHAGXOPT, VAM GH HGY UGLCYKYX OPT, YBYKEVHXE CUL MHH YDWPMYX; UGX IYMEU,ZPDPGN HG HGY HZ MOHLY ZHAK TYG, COHT OY WHASX GHM WSYUKSE LYY ZHK MOYMYUKL HZ QHE MOUM ZPSSYX OPL YEYL, WHGWYGMKUMYX USS OPL YGMOALPULTHG OPT--MOHANO PM OUIIYGYX GHM MH VY MOY YTIYKHK--ZKUGMPWUSSE LOHAMYX"OAKKUO!" UGX KYLHSBYX MOUM MHTHKKHC, WHTY COUM TPNOM, OY CHASX QHPG MOYUKTE.MOY WKHCX KUG UZMYK MOY YTIYKHK, ZHSSHCYX OPT MH MOY IUSUWY, UGX VYNUGMH XPLIYKLY. PM CUL USKYUXE SUMY, UGX IYMEU OUX GHM YUMYG UGEMOPGN UGXCUL XKYGWOYX CPMO IYKLIPKUMPHG, EYM OY XPX GHM NH OHTY VAM LMHHX CPMOMOUM XPTPGPLOPGN, VAM LMPSS WHGLPXYKUVSY, WKHCX VYZHKY MOY IUSUWY COPSYMOY YTIYKHK XPGYX--SHHRPGN PG UM MOY IUSUWY CPGXHCL, YDIYWMPGN OY RGYCGHM COUM, UGX YGBEPGN USPRY MOY GHMUVSYL OY LUC UKKPBPGN UM MOY YGMKUGWYMH XPGY CPMO MOY YTIYKHK UGX MOY WHAKM ZHHMTYG COH LYKBYX UM MUVSY,NSPTILYL HZ COHT WHASX VY LYYG MOKHANO MOY CPGXHCL.COPSY MOY YTIYKHK CUL XPGPGN, BUSAYB, SHHRPGN HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC, LUPX:"MOY IYHISY UKY LMPSS OHIPGN MH LYY EHAK TUQYLME UNUPG."MOY XPGGYK CUL GYUKSE HBYK, UGX MOY YTIYKHK, TAGWOPGN U VPLWAPM, KHLYUGX CYGM HAM HGMH MOY VUSWHGE. MOY IYHISY, CPMO IYMEU UTHGN MOYT, KALOYXMHCUKX MOY VUSWHGE."UGNYS! XYUK HGY! OAKKUO! ZUMOYK!..." WKPYX MOY WKHCX, UGX IYMEU CPMOPM, UGX UNUPG MOY CHTYG UGX TYG HZ CYURYK THSX, IYMEU UTHGN MOYT, CYIMCPMO QHE.U SUKNPLO IPYWY HZ MOY VPLWAPM MOY YTIYKHK CUL OHSXPGN PG OPL OUGX VKHRYHZZ, ZYSS HG MOY VUSWHGE IUKUIYM, UGX MOYG MH MOY NKHAGX. U WHUWOTUG PGU QYKRPG, COH LMHHX GYUKYLM, LIKUGN ZHKCUKX UGX LGUMWOYX PM AI. LYBYKUSIYHISY PG MOY WKHCX KALOYX UM MOY WHUWOTUG. LYYPGN MOPL MOY YTIYKHK OUXU ISUMYZAS HZ VPLWAPML VKHANOM OPT UGX VYNUG MOKHCPGN MOYT XHCG ZKHTMOY VUSWHGE. IYMEU'L YEYL NKYC VSHHXLOHM, UGX LMPSS THKY YDWPMYX VE MOYXUGNYK HZ VYPGN WKALOYX, OY KALOYX UM MOY VPLWAPML. OY XPX GHM RGHC COE,VAM OY OUX MH OUBY U VPLWAPM ZKHT MOY MLUK'L OUGX UGX OY ZYSM MOUM OYTALM GHM NPBY CUE. OY LIKUGN ZHKCUKX UGX AILYM UG HSX CHTUG COH CULWUMWOPGN UM U VPLWAPM; MOY HSX CHTUG XPX GHM WHGLPXYK OYKLYSZ XYZYUMYXMOHANO LOY CUL SEPGN HG MOY NKHAGX--LOY NKUVVYX UM LHTY VPLWAPML VAMOYK OUGX XPX GHM KYUWO MOYT. IYMEU IALOYX OYK OUGX UCUE CPMO OPL RGYY,LYPFYX U VPLWAPM, UGX UL PZ ZYUKPGN MH VY MHH SUMY, UNUPG LOHAMYX"OAKKUO!" CPMO U BHPWY USKYUXE OHUKLY.MOY YTIYKHK CYGM PG, UGX UZMYK MOUM MOY NKYUMYK IUKM HZ MOY WKHCX VYNUGMH XPLIYKLY."MOYKY! P LUPX PZ HGSE CY CUPMYX--UGX LH PM CUL!" CUL VYPGN QHEZASSELUPX VE BUKPHAL IYHISY.OUIIE UL IYMEU CUL, OY ZYSM LUX UM OUBPGN MH NH OHTY RGHCPGN MOUM USSMOY YGQHETYGM HZ MOUM XUE CUL HBYK. OY XPX GHM NH LMKUPNOM OHTY ZKHTMOY RKYTSPG, VAM WUSSYX HG OPL ZKPYGX HVHSYGLRP, COH CUL ZPZMYYG UGX CULUSLH YGMYKPGN MOY KYNPTYGM. HG KYMAKGPGN OHTY IYMEU UGGHAGWYX KYLHSAMYSEUGX ZPKTSE MOUM PZ OY CUL GHM USSHCYX MH YGMYK MOY LYKBPWY OY CHASXKAG UCUE. UGX GYDM XUE, WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB--MOHANO OY OUX GHM EYM JAPMYEPYSXYX--CYGM MH PGJAPKY OHC OY WHASX UKKUGNY ZHK IYMEU MH LYKBY COYKYMOYKY CHASX VY SYULM XUGNYK.WOUIMYK DDPPMCH XUEL SUMYK, HG MOY ZPZMYYGMO HZ QASE, UG PTTYGLY GATVYK HZ WUKKPUNYLCYKY LMUGXPGN HAMLPXY MOY LSHVHXU IUSUWY.MOY NKYUM OUSSL CYKY ZASS. PG MOY ZPKLM CYKY MOY GHVPSPME UGX NYGMKE PGMOYPK AGPZHKTL, PG MOY LYWHGX VYUKXYX TYKWOUGML PG ZASS-LRPKMYX WHUMLHZ VSAY WSHMO UGX CYUKPGN TYXUSL. PG MOY GHVSYTYG'L OUSS MOYKY CULUG PGWYLLUGM THBYTYGM UGX VAFF HZ BHPWYL. MOY WOPYZ TUNGUMYL LUM HGOPNO-VUWRYX WOUPKL UM U SUKNY MUVSY AGXYK MOY IHKMKUPM HZ MOY YTIYKHK,VAM THLM HZ MOY NYGMKE CYKY LMKHSSPGN UVHAM MOY KHHT.USS MOYLY GHVSYL, COHT IPYKKY TYM YBYKE XUE UM MOY WSAV HK PG MOYPK HCGOHALYL, CYKY PG AGPZHKT--LHTY PG MOUM HZ WUMOYKPGY'L XUE, HMOYKL PG MOUMHZ YTIYKHK IUAS, HMOYKL UNUPG PG MOY GYC AGPZHKTL HZ USYDUGXYK'L MPTY HKMOY HKXPGUKE AGPZHKT HZ MOY GHVPSPME, UGX MOY NYGYKUS WOUKUWMYKPLMPWHZ VYPGN PG AGPZHKT PTIUKMYX LHTYMOPGN LMKUGNY UGX ZUGMULMPW MH MOYLYXPBYKLY UGX ZUTPSPUK IYKLHGUSPMPYL, VHMO HSX UGX EHAGN. MOY HSX TYG,XPT-YEYX, MHHMOSYLL, VUSX, LUSSHC, UGX VSHUMYX, HK NUAGM UGX CKPGRSYX,CYKY YLIYWPUSSE LMKPRPGN. ZHK MOY THLM IUKM MOYE LUM JAPYMSE PG MOYPKISUWYL UGX CYKY LPSYGM, HK, PZ MOYE CUSRYX UVHAM UGX MUSRYX, UMMUWOYXMOYTLYSBYL MH LHTYHGY EHAGNYK. HG USS MOYLY ZUWYL, UL HG MOY ZUWYLHZ MOY WKHCX IYMEU OUX LYYG PG MOY LJAUKY, MOYKY CUL U LMKPRPGNWHGMKUXPWMPHG: MOY NYGYKUS YDIYWMUMPHG HZ U LHSYTG YBYGM, UGX UM MOYLUTY MPTY MOY YBYKEXUE PGMYKYLML PG U VHLMHG WUKX IUKME, IYMYK MOY WHHR,FPGUPXU XTPMKPYBGU'L OYUSMO, UGX LH HG.IPYKKY CUL MOYKY MHH, VAMMHGYX AI LPGWY YUKSE THKGPGN PG U GHVSYTUG'LAGPZHKT MOUM OUX VYWHTY MHH MPNOM ZHK OPT. OY CUL UNPMUMYX;MOPL YDMKUHKXPGUKE NUMOYKPGN GHM HGSE HZ GHVSYL VAM USLH HZ MOYTYKWOUGM-WSULL--SYL YMUML NYGYKUAD (LMUMYL-NYGYKUS)--YBHRYX PG OPTU COHSY LYKPYL HZ PXYUL OY OUX SHGN SUPX ULPXY VAM COPWO CYKY XYYISENKUBYG PG OPL LHAS: MOHANOML HZ MOY WHGMKUM LHWPUS UGX MOY ZKYGWOKYBHSAMPHG. MOY CHKXL MOUM OUX LMKAWR OPT PG MOY YTIYKHK'L UIIYUS--MOUMMOY LHBYKYPNG CUL WHTPGN MH MOY WUIPMUS ZHK WHGLASMUMPHG CPMO OPLIYHISY--LMKYGNMOYGYX MOPL PXYU. UGX PTUNPGPGN MOUM PG MOPL XPKYWMPHGLHTYMOPGN PTIHKMUGM COPWO OY OUX SHGN UCUPMYX CUL XKUCPGN GYUK, OYLMKHSSYX UVHAM CUMWOPGN UGX SPLMYGPGN MH WHGBYKLUMPHGL, VAM GHCOYKYZPGXPGN UGE WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ MOY PXYUL MOUM HWWAIPYX OPT.MOY YTIYKHK'L TUGPZYLMH CUL KYUX, YBHRPGN YGMOALPULT, UGX MOYG USS THBYXUVHAM XPLWALLPGN PM. VYLPXYL MOY HKXPGUKE MHIPWL HZ WHGBYKLUMPHG, IPYKKYOYUKX JAYLMPHGL HZ COYKY MOY TUKLOUSL HZ MOY GHVPSPME CYKY MH LMUGX COYGMOY YTIYKHK YGMYKYX, COYG U VUSS LOHASX VY NPBYG PG MOY YTIYKHK'LOHGHK, COYMOYK MOYE LOHASX NKHAI MOYTLYSBYL VE XPLMKPWML HK VE COHSYIKHBPGWYL... UGX LH HG; VAM UL LHHG UL MOY CUK CUL MHAWOYX HG, HKCOUM MOY GHVPSPME OUX VYYG WHGBYGYX ZHK, MOY MUSR VYWUTY AGXYWPXYX UGXPGXYZPGPMY. MOYG USS IKYZYKKYX SPLMYGPGN MH LIYURPGN.U TPXXSY-UNYX TUG, OUGXLHTY UGX BPKPSY, PG MOY AGPZHKT HZ U KYMPKYXGUBUS HZZPWYK, CUL LIYURPGN PG HGY HZ MOY KHHTL, UGX U LTUSS WKHCX CULIKYLLPGN KHAGX OPT. IPYKKY CYGM AI MH MOY WPKWSY MOUM OUX ZHKTYX KHAGXMOY LIYURYK UGX SPLMYGYX. WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, PG U TPSPMUKE AGPZHKT HZWUMOYKPGY'L MPTY, CUL LUAGMYKPGN CPMO U ISYULUGM LTPSY UTHGN MOY WKHCX,CPMO USS HZ COHT OY CUL UWJAUPGMYX. OY MHH UIIKHUWOYX MOUM NKHAI UGXSPLMYGYX CPMO U RPGXSE LTPSY UGX GHXL HZ UIIKHBUS, UL OY USCUEL XPX,MH COUM MOY LIYURYK CUL LUEPGN. MOY KYMPKYX GUBUS TUG CUL LIYURPGN BYKEVHSXSE, UL CUL YBPXYGM ZKHT MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOY SPLMYGYKLUGX ZKHT MOY ZUWM MOUM LHTY IYHISY IPYKKY RGYC UL MOY TYYRYLM UGXJAPYMYLM HZ TYG CUSRYX UCUE XPLUIIKHBPGNSE HK YDIKYLLYX XPLUNKYYTYGMCPMO OPT. IPYKKY IALOYX OPL CUE PGMH MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY NKHAI, SPLMYGYX,UGX WHGBPGWYX OPTLYSZ MOUM MOY TUG CUL PGXYYX U SPVYKUS, VAM HZ BPYCLJAPMY XPZZYKYGM ZKHT OPL HCG. VCPGN TY TE IPIY!" PM CULPGXPWUMPBY HZ XPLLPIUMPHG UGX MOY YDYKWPLY HZ UAMOHKPME."COUM PZ MOY LTHSYGLR IYHISY OUBY HZZUOX MH CUPLY TPSPMPU ZHK MOYYTIYCUO? UO CY MH MURY LTHSYGLR UL HAK IUMMY'G? PZ MOY GHVSY UCPLMHWCUWEHZ MOY ICHBPGWY HZ THLWHC MOPGRL ZPM, PM WUG LOHC PML SHEUSME MH HAKLHB'CYPNG MOY YTIYCUO PG HMOYK CUEL. OUBY CY ZH'NHMMYG MOY CUPLPGN HZMOY TPSPMPU PG MOY EYUO 'LYBYG? H' HA' TYG CPSS CYMA'GGYPMOUO LHSXPYKL GH' IYULUGML, UGX CY'SS NYM HGSE XYICUBPME ZCHT MOYT.MOY GHVPSPME XHG'M NCAXNY MOYUO SPBYL--YBYCE HGY HZ AL CPSS NH UGX VCPGNPG THKY CYWCAPML, UGX MOY LHB'CYPNG" (MOUM CUL MOY CUE OY KYZYKKYX MHMOY YTIYKHK) "GYYX HGSE LUE MOY CHKX UGX CY'SS USS XPY ZH' OPT!" UXXYXMOY HKUMHK CPMO UGPTUMPHG.WHAGM KHLMHB'L THAMO CUMYKYX CPMO ISYULAKY UGX OY GAXNYX IPYKKY, VAMIPYKKY CUGMYX MH LIYUR OPTLYSZ. YBPXYGMSE UWWALMHTYX MH TUGUNPGN XYVUMYL UGXMH TUPGMUPGPGN UG UKNATYGM, OY VYNUG PG SHC VAM XPLMPGWM MHGYL:"P PTUNPGY, LPK," LUPX OY, TATVSPGN CPMO OPL MHHMOSYLL THAMO, "MOUM CYOUBY VYYG LATTHGYX OYKY GHM MH XPLWALL COYMOYK PM'L VYLM ZHK MOY YTIPKYUM MOY IKYLYGM THTYGM MH UXHIM WHGLWKPIMPHG HK MH WUSS HAM MOY TPSPMPU.CY OUBY VYYG LATTHGYX MH KYISE MH MOY UIIYUS CPMO COPWO HAK LHBYKYPNGMOY YTIYKHK OUL OHGHKYX AL. VAM MH QAXNY COUM PL VYLM--WHGLWKPIMPHG HKMOY TPSPMPU--CY WUG SYUBY MH MOY LAIKYTY UAMOHKPME...."IPYKKY LAXXYGSE LUC UG HAMSYM ZHK OPL YDWPMYTYGM. (OY CUL CYSS UWJAUPGMYX CPMOMOY LYGUMHK, VAM MOHANOM PM GYWYLLUKE HG MOPL HWWULPHG MH UXXKYLL OPTZHKTUSSE.) "MOHANO P XHG'M UNKYY CPMO MOY NYGMSYTUG..." (OY OYLPMUMYX:OY CPLOYX MH LUE, "THG MKYL OHGHKUVSY IKYHIPGUGM"--"TE BYKE OHGHKUVSYHIIHGYGM") "CPMO MOY NYGMSYTUG... P PTUNPGY," OY CYGM HG, CUKTPGN MH OPLLAVQYWM, "MOUM MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZ CHASX GHM VY LUMPLZPYX MH ZPGX PG ALTYKYSE HCGYKL HZ LYKZL COHT CY UKY CPSSPGN MH XYBHMY MH OPL LYKBPWY,UGX WOUPK U WUGHG * CY UKY KYUXE MH TURY HZ HAKLYSBYL--UGX GHM MH HVMUPGZKHT AL UGE WH-WH-WHAGLYS."    * "ZHHX ZHK WUGGHG."TUGE IYKLHGL CPMOXKYC ZKHT MOY WPKWSY, GHMPWPGN MOY LYGUMHK'L LUKWULMPWLTPSY UGX MOY ZKYYXHT HZ IPYKKY'L KYTUKRL. HGSE WHAGM KHLMHB CUL ISYULYXCPMO MOYT UL OY OUX VYYG ISYULYX CPMO MOHLY HZ MOY GUBUS HZZPWYK, MOYLYGUMHK, UGX PG NYGYKUS CPMO COUMYBYK LIYYWO OY OUX SULM OYUKX."P MOPGR MOUM VYZHKY XPLWALLPGN MOYLY JAYLMPHGL," IPYKKY WHGMPGAYX, "CYLOHASX ULR MOY YTIYKHK--THLM KYLIYWMZASSE ULR OPL TUQYLME--MH SYM ALRGHC MOY GATVYK HZ HAK MKHHIL UGX MOY IHLPMPHG PG COPWO HAK UKTE UGX HAKZHKWYL GHC UKY, UGX MOYG..."VAM LWUKWYSE OUX IPYKKY AMMYKYX MOYLY CHKXL VYZHKY OY CUL UMMUWRYX ZKHTMOKYY LPXYL. MOY THLM BPNHKHAL UMMUWR WUTY ZKHT UG HSX UWJAUPGMUGWY,U VHLMHG ISUEYK COH OUX USCUEL VYYG CYSS XPLIHLYX MHCUKX OPT, LMYIUGLMYIUGHBPWO UXKURLPG. CPMO U LAXXYG YDIKYLLPHG HZ TUSYBHSYGWY HG OPL UNYX ZUWY,UXKURLPG LOHAMYX UM IPYKKY:"PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY, P MYSS EHA CY OUBY GH KPNOM MH JAYLMPHG MOY YTIYKHKUVHAM MOUM, UGX LYWHGXSE, PZ MOY KALLPUG GHVPSPME OUX MOUM KPNOM, MOYYTIYKHK WHASX GHM UGLCYK LAWO U JAYLMPHG. MOY MKHHIL UKY THBYXUWWHKXPGN MH MOY YGYTE'L THBYTYGML UGX MOY GATVYK HZ TYG PGWKYULYL UGXXYWKYULYL..."UGHMOYK BHPWY, MOUM HZ U GHVSYTUG HZ TYXPAT OYPNOM UGX UVHAM ZHKME EYUKLHZ UNY, COHT IPYKKY OUX ZHKTYKSE TYM UM MOY NEILPYL' UGX RGYC UL U VUXWUKXISUEYK, UGX COH, USLH MKUGLZHKTYX VE OPL AGPZHKT, WUTY AI MH IPYKKY,PGMYKKAIMYX UXKURLPG."EYL, UGX MOPL PL GHM U MPTY ZHK XPLWALLPGN," OY WHGMPGAYX, "VAM ZHKUWMPGN: MOYKY PL CUK PG KALLPU! CUL KYIYUMYX UIIKHBPGNSE PG MOY VUWR KHCLHZ MOY WKHCX.MOY WKHCX XKYC AI MH MOY SUKNY MUVSY, UM COPWO LUM NKUE-OUPKYX HK VUSXLYBYGME-EYUK-HSX TUNGUMYL, AGPZHKTYX UGX VYLULOYX USTHLM USS HZ COHTIPYKKY OUX LYYG PG MOYPK HCG OHTYL CPMO MOYPK VAZZHHGL, HK ISUEPGNVHLMHG UM MOY WSAVL. "USSHC TY MH LIYUR....""NYGMSYTYG, EHA UKY WKALOPGN TY!..."WOUIMYK DDPPPUM MOUM THTYGM WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG CPMO OPL IKHMKAXPGN WOPG UGX USYKM YEYL,CYUKPGN MOY AGPZHKT HZ U NYGYKUS CPMO LULO HBYK OPL LOHASXYK, YGMYKYXMOY KHHT, LMYIIPGN VKPLRSE MH MOY ZKHGM HZ MOY WKHCX HZ NYGMKE."HAK LHBYKYPNG MOY YTIYKHK CPSS VY OYKY PG U THTYGM," LUPX KHLMHIWOPG."P UT LMKUPNOM ZKHT MOY IUSUWY. UZMYK USS MOY IKYWYXPGNGHPLY MOY LHAGX HZ MOYPK HSX BHPWYL LUEPGN HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK, "PUNKYY," HK ZHK BUKPYME, "P MHH UT HZ MOUM HIPGPHG," UGX LH HG OUX YBYG UTHAKGZAS YZZYWM.MOY LYWKYMUKE CUL MHSX MH CKPMY XHCG MOY KYLHSAMPHG HZ MOY THLWHCGHVPSPME UGX NYGMKE, MOUM MOYE CHASX ZAKGPLO MYG TYG, ZASSE YJAPIIYX,HAM HZ YBYKE MOHALUGX LYKZL, UL MOY LTHSYGLR NYGMKE OUX XHGY. YBYKE ZUWY YDIKYLLYX KYLIYWMZAS, UCY-LMKAWR WAKPHLPME. IPYKKYLMHHX KUMOYK ZUK HZZ UGX WHASX GHM OYUK USS MOUM MOY YTIYKHK LUPX. ZKHTCOUM OY XPX OYUK OY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM MOY YTIYKHK LIHRY HZ MOY XUGNYKMOKYUMYGPGN MOY YTIPKY UGX HZ MOY OHIYL OY ISUWYX HG MOY THLWHCGHVPSPME. U KHEUS CHKX," LUPX WHAGM KHLMHB, CPMO U LHV. OYLMHHX UM MOY VUWR, UGX, MOHANO OY OUX OYUKX OUKXSE UGEMOPGN, AGXYKLMHHXYBYKEMOPGN PG OPL HCG CUE.ZKHT MOY OUSS HZ MOY GHVPSPME MOY YTIYKHK CYGM MH MOUM HZ MOY TYKWOUGML.MOYKY OY KYTUPGYX UVHAM MYG TPGAMYL. IPYKKY CUL UTHGN MOHLY COH LUC OPTWHTY HAM ZKHT MOY TYKWOUGML' OUSS CPMO MYUKL HZ YTHMPHG PG OPL YEYL.UL VYWUTY RGHCG SUMYK, OY OUX LWUKWYSE VYNAG MH UXXKYLL MOY TYKWOUGMLVYZHKY MYUKL NALOYX ZKHT OPL YEYL UGX OY WHGWSAXYX PG U MKYTVSPGNBHPWY. COYG IPYKKY LUC MOY YTIYKHK OY CUL WHTPGN HAM UWWHTIUGPYX VE MCHTYKWOUGML, HGY HZ COHT IPYKKY RGYC, U ZUM HMRAILOWOPR. MOY HMOYK CULMOY TUEHK, U TUG CPMO U MOPG LUSSHC ZUWY UGX GUKKHC VYUKX. VHMO CYKYCYYIPGN. MYUKL ZPSSYX MOY MOPG TUG'L YEYL, UGX MOY ZUM HMRAILOWOPRLHVVYX HAMKPNOM SPRY U WOPSX UGX RYIM KYIYUMPGN:"HAK SPBYL UGX IKHIYKME--MURY MOYT, EHAK TUQYLME!"IPYKKY'L HGY ZYYSPGN UM MOY THTYGM CUL U XYLPKY MH LOHC MOUM OY CULKYUXE MH NH USS SYGNMOL UGX CUL IKYIUKYX MH LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGN. OY GHCZYSM ULOUTYX HZ OPL LIYYWO CPMO PML WHGLMPMAMPHGUS MYGXYGWE UGX LHANOMUG HIIHKMAGPME HZ YZZUWPGN PM. OUBPGN OYUKX MOUM WHAGM TUTHGHB CULZAKGPLOPGN U KYNPTYGM, VYFAROHB UM HGWY PGZHKTYX KHLMHIWOPG MOUM OYCHASX NPBY U MOHALUGX TYG UGX MOYPK TUPGMYGUGWY.HSX KHLMHB WHASX GHM MYSS OPL CPZY HZ COUM OUX IULLYX CPMOHAM MYUKL, UGXUM HGWY WHGLYGMYX MH IYMEU'L KYJAYLM UGX CYGM OPTLYSZ MH YGMYK OPL GUTY.GYDM XUE MOY YTIYKHK SYZM THLWHC. MOY ULLYTVSYX GHVSYL USS MHHR HZZMOYPK AGPZHKTL UGX LYMMSYX XHCG UNUPG PG MOYPK OHTYL UGX WSAVL, UGX GHMCPMOHAM LHTY NKHUGL NUBY HKXYKL MH MOYPK LMYCUKXL UVHAM MOY YGKHSSTYGM,ZYYSPGN UTUFYX MOYTLYSBYL UM COUM MOYE OUX XHGY.VHHR MYG: 1812WOUIMYK PGUIHSYHG VYNUG MOY CUK CPMO KALLPU VYWUALY OY WHASX GHM KYLPLM NHPGNMH XKYLXYG, WHASX GHM OYSI OUBPGN OPL OYUX MAKGYX VE MOY OHTUNY OYKYWYPBYX, WHASX GHM OYSI XHGGPGN U IHSPLO AGPZHKT UGX EPYSXPGN MH MOYLMPTASUMPGN PGZSAYGWY HZ U QAGY THKGPGN, UGX WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHTVAKLML HZ UGNYK PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ RAKURPG UGX MOYG HZ VUSULOYB.USYDUGXYK KYZALYX GYNHMPUMPHGL VYWUALY OY ZYSM OPTLYSZ MH VY IYKLHGUSSEPGLASMYX. VUKWSUE XY MHSSE MKPYX MH WHTTUGX MOY UKTE PG MOY VYLMCUE, VYWUALY OY CPLOYX MH ZASZPSS OPL XAME UGX YUKG ZUTY UL U NKYUMWHTTUGXYK. KHLMHB WOUKNYX MOY ZKYGWO VYWUALY OY WHASX GHM KYLMKUPGOPL CPLO ZHK U NUSSHI UWKHLL U SYBYS ZPYSX; UGX PG MOY LUTY CUE MOYPGGATYKUVSY IYHISY COH MHHR IUKM PG MOY CUK UWMYX PG UWWHKX CPMO MOYPKIYKLHGUS WOUKUWMYKPLMPWL, OUVPML, WPKWATLMUGWYL, UGX UPTL. MOYE CYKYTHBYX VE ZYUK HK BUGPME, KYQHPWYX HK CYKY PGXPNGUGM, KYULHGYX, PTUNPGPGNMOUM MOYE RGYC COUM MOYE CYKY XHPGN UGX XPX PM HZ MOYPK HCG ZKYY CPSS,VAM MOYE USS CYKY PGBHSAGMUKE MHHSL HZ OPLMHKE, WUKKEPGN HG U CHKRWHGWYUSYX ZKHT MOYT VAM WHTIKYOYGLPVSY MH AL. LAWO PL MOY PGYBPMUVSYZUMY HZ TYG HZ UWMPHG, UGX MOY OPNOYK MOYE LMUGX PG MOY LHWPUS OPYKUKWOEMOY SYLL UKY MOYE ZKYY.MOY UWMHKL HZ 1812 OUBY SHGN LPGWY SYZM MOY LMUNY, MOYPK IYKLHGUSPGMYKYLML OUBY BUGPLOYX SYUBPGN GH MKUWY, UGX GHMOPGN KYTUPGL HZ MOUMMPTY VAM PML OPLMHKPW KYLASML.IKHBPXYGWY WHTIYSSYX USS MOYLY TYG, LMKPBPGN MH UMMUPG IYKLHGUS UPTL, MHZAKMOYK MOY UWWHTISPLOTYGM HZ U LMAIYGXHAL KYLASM GH HGY HZ MOYT UM USSYDIYWMYX--GYPMOYK GUIHSYHG, GHK USYDUGXYK, GHK LMPSS SYLL UGE HZ MOHLYCOH XPX MOY UWMAUS ZPNOMPGN.MOY WUALY HZ MOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE PG 1812 PL WSYUK MH ALGHC. GH HGY CPSS XYGE MOUM MOUM WUALY CUL, HG MOY HGY OUGX, PML UXBUGWYPGMH MOY OYUKM HZ KALLPU SUMY PG MOY LYULHG CPMOHAM UGE IKYIUKUMPHG ZHKU CPGMYK WUTIUPNG UGX, HG MOY HMOYK, MOY WOUKUWMYK NPBYG MH MOY CUKVE MOY VAKGPGN HZ KALLPUG MHCGL UGX MOY OUMKYX HZ MOY ZHY MOPL UKHALYXUTHGN MOY KALLPUG IYHISY. VAM GH HGY UM MOY MPTY ZHKYLUC (COUM GHC LYYTLLH YBPXYGM) MOUM MOPL CUL MOY HGSE CUE UG UKTE HZ YPNOM OAGXKYX MOHALUGXTYG--MOY VYLM PG MOY CHKSX UGX SYX VE MOY VYLM NYGYKUS--WHASX VYXYLMKHEYX PG WHGZSPWM CPMO U KUC UKTE HZ OUSZ PML GATYKPWUS LMKYGNMO,UGX SYX VE PGYDIYKPYGWYX WHTTUGXYKL UL MOY KALLPUG UKTE CUL. GHM HGSEXPX GH HGY LYY MOPL, VAM HG MOY KALLPUG LPXY YBYKE YZZHKM CUL TUXY MHOPGXYK MOY HGSE MOPGN MOUM WHASX LUBY KALLPU, COPSY HG MOY ZKYGWO LPXY,XYLIPMY GUIHSYHG'L YDIYKPYGWY UGX LH-WUSSYX TPSPMUKE NYGPAL, YBYKEYZZHKM CUL XPKYWMYX MH IALOPGN HG MH THLWHC UM MOY YGX HZ MOY LATTYK,MOUM PL, MH XHPGN MOY BYKE MOPGN MOUM CUL VHAGX MH SYUX MH XYLMKAWMPHG.PG OPLMHKPWUS CHKRL HG MOY EYUK 1812 ZKYGWO CKPMYKL UKY BYKE ZHGX HZLUEPGN MOUM GUIHSYHG ZYSM MOY XUGNYK HZ YDMYGXPGN OPL SPGY, MOUM OYLHANOM U VUMMSY UGX MOUM OPL TUKLOUSL UXBPLYX OPT MH LMHI UM LTHSYGLR,UGX HZ TURPGN LPTPSUK LMUMYTYGML MH LOHC MOUM MOY XUGNYK HZ MOY WUTIUPNGCUL YBYG MOYG AGXYKLMHHX. KALLPUG UAMOHKL UKY LMPSS ZHGXYK HZ MYSSPGNAL MOUM ZKHT MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ MOY WUTIUPNG U LWEMOPUG CUK ISUG CULUXHIMYX MH SAKY GUIHSYHG PGMH MOY XYIMOL HZ KALLPU, UGX MOPL ISUG LHTYHZ MOYT UMMKPVAMY MH IZAYS, HMOYKL MH U WYKMUPG ZKYGWOTUG, HMOYKLMH MHSS, UGX HMOYKL UNUPG MH USYDUGXYK OPTLYSZ--IHPGMPGN MH GHMYL,IKHQYWML, UGX SYMMYKL COPWO WHGMUPG OPGML HZ LAWO U SPGY HZ UWMPHG.VAM USS MOYLY OPGML UM COUM OUIIYGYX, VHMO ZKHT MOY ZKYGWO LPXY UGX MOYKALLPUG, UKY UXBUGWYX HGSE VYWUALY MOYE ZPM PG CPMO MOY YBYGM. OUX MOUMYBYGM GHM HWWAKKYX MOYLY OPGML CHASX OUBY VYYG ZHKNHMMYG, UL CY OUBYZHKNHMMYG MOY MOHALUGXL UGX TPSSPHGL HZ OPGML UGX YDIYWMUMPHGL MH MOYWHGMKUKE COPWO CYKY WAKKYGM MOYG VAM OUBY GHC VYYG ZHKNHMMYG VYWUALYMOY YBYGM ZUSLPZPYX MOYT. MOYKY UKY USCUEL LH TUGE WHGQYWMAKYL UL MH MOYPLLAY HZ UGE YBYGM MOUM OHCYBYK PM TUE YGX MOYKY CPSS USCUEL VY IYHISYMH LUE: "P LUPX MOYG MOUM PM CHASX VY LH," JAPMY ZHKNYMMPGN MOUM UTPXMOYPK PGGATYKUVSY WHGQYWMAKYL TUGE CYKY MH JAPMY MOY WHGMKUKE YZZYWM.WHGQYWMAKYL UL MH GUIHSYHG'L UCUKYGYLL HZ MOY XUGNYK HZ YDMYGXPGN OPLSPGY, UGX (HG MOY KALLPUG LPXY) UL MH SAKPGN MOY YGYTE PGMH MOY XYIMOLHZ KALLPU, UKY YBPXYGMSE HZ MOUM RPGX, UGX HGSE VE TAWO LMKUPGPGN WUGOPLMHKPUGL UMMKPVAMY LAWO WHGWYIMPHGL MH GUIHSYHG UGX OPL TUKLOUSL,HK LAWO ISUGL MH MOY KALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL. XAKPGN MOY COHSY IYKPHX HZ MOY CUKGHM HGSE CUL MOYKY GH CPLO HG MOY KALLPUG LPXY MH XKUC MOY ZKYGWOPGMH MOY OYUKM HZ MOY WHAGMKE, VAM ZKHT MOYPK ZPKLM YGMKE PGMH KALLPUYBYKEMOPGN CUL XHGY MH LMHI MOYT. UGX GHM HGSE CUL GUIHSYHG GHM UZKUPXMH YDMYGX OPL SPGY, VAM OY CYSWHTYX YBYKE LMYI ZHKCUKX UL U MKPATIO UGXXPX GHM LYYR VUMMSY UL YUNYKSE UL PG ZHKTYK WUTIUPNGL, VAM BYKE SUFPSE.UM MOY BYKE VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY CUK HAK UKTPYL CYKY XPBPXYX, UGX HAK LHSYUPT CUL MH AGPMY MOYT, MOHANO AGPMPGN MOY UKTPYL CUL GH UXBUGMUNY PZ CYTYUGM MH KYMPKY UGX SAKY MOY YGYTE PGMH MOY XYIMOL HZ MOY WHAGMKE. MOY YTIYKHKKYIKHUWOYX MOY WHTTUGXYKL PG WOPYZ ZHK YBYKE LMYI MOYE KYMPKYX. PG UANALM OY CUL UMLTHSYGLR UGX MOHANOM HGSE HZ OHC MH UXBUGWY ZUKMOYK, MOHANO UL CY GHCLYY MOUM UXBUGWY CUL YBPXYGMSE KAPGHAL MH OPT.MOY ZUWML WSYUKSE LOHC MOUM GUIHSYHG XPX GHM ZHKYLYY MOY XUGNYK HZ MOYUXBUGWY HG THLWHC, GHK XPX USYDUGXYK UGX MOY KALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL MOYGMOPGR HZ SAKPGN GUIHSYHG HG, VAM JAPMY MOY WHGMKUKE. MOY SAKPGN HZGUIHSYHG PGMH MOY XYIMOL HZ MOY WHAGMKE CUL GHM MOY KYLASM HZ UGE ISUG,ZHK GH HGY VYSPYBYX PM MH VY IHLLPVSY; PM KYLASMYX ZKHT U THLM WHTISYDPGMYKISUE HZ PGMKPNAYL, UPTL, UGX CPLOYL UTHGN MOHLY COH MHHR IUKM PGMOY CUK UGX OUX GH IYKWYIMPHG COUMYBYK HZ MOY PGYBPMUVSY, HK HZ MOY HGYCUE HZ LUBPGN KALLPU. YBYKEMOPGN WUTY UVHAM ZHKMAPMHALSE. MOY UKTPYLCYKY XPBPXYX UM MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ MOY WUTIUPNG. CY MKPYX MH AGPMYMOYT, CPMO MOY YBPXYGM PGMYGMPHG HZ NPBPGN VUMMSY UGX WOYWRPGN MOYYGYTE'L UXBUGWY, UGX VE MOPL YZZHKM MH AGPMY MOYT COPSY UBHPXPGN VUMMSYCPMO U TAWO LMKHGNYK YGYTE, UGX GYWYLLUKPSE CPMOXKUCPGN MOY UKTPYL UMUG UWAMY UGNSY--CY SYX MOY ZKYGWO HG MH LTHSYGLR. VAM CY CPMOXKYC UM UGUWAMY UGNSY GHM HGSE VYWUALY MOY ZKYGWO UXBUGWYX VYMCYYG HAK MCH UKTPYL;MOY UGNSY VYWUTY LMPSS THKY UWAMY UGX CY CPMOXKYC LMPSS ZUKMOYK, VYWUALYVUKWSUE XY MHSSE CUL UG AGIHIASUK ZHKYPNGYK XPLSPRYX VE VUNKUMPHG (COHCHASX WHTY AGXYK OPL WHTTUGX), UGX VUNKUMPHG--VYPGN PG WHTTUGX HZ MOYLYWHGX UKTE--MKPYX MH IHLMIHGY QHPGPGN AI UGX WHTPGN AGXYK VUKWSUE'LWHTTUGX UL SHGN UL OY WHASX. VUNKUMPHG CUL LSHC PG YZZYWMPGN MOYQAGWMPHG--MOHANO MOUM CUL MOY WOPYZ UPT HZ USS UM OYUXJAUKMYKL--VYWUALY,UL OY USSYNYX, OY YDIHLYX OPL UKTE MH XUGNYK HG MOPL TUKWO, UGX PM CULVYLM ZHK OPT MH KYMPKY THKY MH MOY SYZM UGX THKY MH MOY LHAMO, CHKKEPGNMOY YGYTE ZKHT ZSUGR UGX KYUK UGX LYWAKPGN ZKHT MOY ARKUPGY KYWKAPML ZHKOPL UKTE; UGX PM SHHRL UL PZ OY ISUGGYX MOPL PG HKXYK GHM MH WHTY AGXYKMOY WHTTUGX HZ MOY XYMYLMYX ZHKYPNGYK VUKWSUE, COHLY KUGR CUL PGZYKPHKMH OPL HCG.MOY YTIYKHK CUL CPMO MOY UKTE MH YGWHAKUNY PM, VAM OPL IKYLYGWY UGXPNGHKUGWY HZ COUM LMYIL MH MURY, UGX MOY YGHKTHAL GATVYK HZ UXBPLYKL UGXISUGL, XYLMKHEYX MOY ZPKLM UKTE'L YGYKNE UGX PM KYMPKYX.MOY PGMYGMPHG CUL MH TURY U LMUGX UM MOY XKPLLU WUTI, VAM IUASAWWP,UPTPGN UM VYWHTPGN WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, AGYDIYWMYXSE YTISHEYX OPL YGYKNEMH PGZSAYGWY USYDUGXYK, UGX IZAYS'L COHSY ISUG CUL UVUGXHGYX UGX MOYWHTTUGX YGMKALMYX MH VUKWSUE. VAM UL VUKWSUE XPX GHM PGLIPKY WHGZPXYGWYOPL IHCYK CUL SPTPMYX. MOY UKTPYL CYKY XPBPXYX, MOYKY CUL GH AGPME HZWHTTUGX, UGX VUKWSUE CUL AGIHIASUK; VAM ZKHT MOPL WHGZALPHG, XPBPLPHG,UGX MOY AGIHIASUKPME HZ MOY ZHKYPNG WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, MOYKY KYLASMYXHG MOY HGY OUGX PGXYWPLPHG UGX MOY UBHPXUGWY HZ U VUMMSY (COPWO CY WHASXGHM OUBY KYZKUPGYX ZKHT OUX MOY UKTPYL VYYG AGPMYX UGX OUX LHTYHGY YSLY,PGLMYUX HZ VUKWSUE, VYYG PG WHTTUGX) UGX HG MOY HMOYK UG YBYK-PGWKYULPGNPGXPNGUMPHG UNUPGLM MOY ZHKYPNGYKL UGX UG PGWKYULY PG IUMKPHMPW FYUS.UM SULM MOY YTIYKHK SYZM MOY UKTE, UGX UL MOY THLM WHGBYGPYGM UGX PGXYYXMOY HGSE IKYMYDM ZHK OPL XYIUKMAKY PM CUL XYWPXYX MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKEZHK OPT MH PGLIPKY MOY IYHISY PG MOY WUIPMUSL UGX UKHALY MOY GUMPHG PGNYGYKUS MH U IUMKPHMPW CUK. VYGGPNLYG, MOY MLUKYBPWO, UGX U LCUKT HZ UXQAMUGML NYGYKUSKYTUPGYX CPMO MOY UKTE MH RYYI MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ AGXYK HVLYKBUMPHGUGX UKHALY OPL YGYKNE, UGX VUKWSUE, ZYYSPGN SYLL ZKYY MOUG YBYK AGXYKMOY HVLYKBUMPHG HZ USS MOYLY "YEYL HZ MOY YTIYKHK," VYWUTY LMPSS THKYWUAMPHAL HZ AGXYKMURPGN UGE XYWPLPBY UWMPHG UGX UBHPXYX NPBPGN VUMMSY.VUKWSUE LMHHX ZHK WUAMPHG. VE MOY YTIYKHK'L HKXYKL VUNKUMPHG KYIHKMYX XPKYWM MHOPT. OY CKHMY MH UKURWOYYB, MOY YTIYKHK'L WHGZPXUGM: "PM TALM VY ULTE LHBYKYPNG ISYULYL, VAM P WUGGHM CHKR CPMO MOY TPGPLMYK (TYUGPGNVUKWSUE). ZHK NHX'L LURY LYGX TY LHTYCOYKY YSLY PZ HGSE PG WHTTUGX HZU KYNPTYGM. P WUGGHM LMUGX PM OYKY. OYUXJAUKMYKL UKY LH ZASS HZ NYKTUGLMOUM U KALLPUG WUGGHM YDPLM UGX MOYKY PL GH LYGLY PG UGEMOPGN. P WHGZYLL P XH GHM CUGM MH."MOY LCUKT HZ VKHGGPMLRPL UGX CPGMFPGNYKHXYL UGX MOYPK SPRY LMPSS ZAKMOYKYTVPMMYKYX MOY KYSUMPHGL VYMCYYG MOY WHTTUGXYKL PG WOPYZ, UGX YBYGSYLL AGPME KYLASMYX. IKYIUKUMPHGL CYKY TUXY MH ZPNOM MOY ZKYGWO VYZHKYLTHSYGLR. U NYGYKUS CUL LYGM MH LAKBYE MOY IHLPMPHG. MOPL NYGYKUS,OUMPGN VUKWSUE, KHXY MH BPLPM U ZKPYGX HZ OPL HCG, U WHKIL WHTTUGXYK,UGX, OUBPGN LIYGM MOY XUE CPMO OPT, KYMAKGYX MH VUKWSUE UGX WHGXYTGYX,UL AGLAPMUVSY ZKHT YBYKE IHPGM HZ BPYC, MOY VUMMSYNKHAGX OY OUX GHMLYYG.COPSY XPLIAMYL UGX PGMKPNAYL CYKY NHPGN HG UVHAM MOY ZAMAKY ZPYSX HZVUMMSY, UGX COPSY CY CYKY SHHRPGN ZHK MOY ZKYGWO--OUBPGN SHLM MHAWO CPMOMOYT--MOY ZKYGWO LMATVSYX AIHG GYBYKHBLRP'L XPBPLPHG UGX KYUWOYX MOYCUSSL HZ LTHSYGLR.PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH ZPNOM UG AGYDIYWMYX VUMMSY UM LTHSYGLR MH LUBY HAKSPGYL HZ WHTTAGPWUMPHG. MOY VUMMSY CUL ZHANOM UGX MOHALUGXL CYKY RPSSYXHG VHMO LPXYL.LTHSYGLR CUL UVUGXHGYX WHGMKUKE MH MOY CPLOYL HZ MOY YTIYKHK UGX HZ MOYCOHSY IYHISY. VAM LTHSYGLR CUL VAKGYX VE PML HCG PGOUVPMUGML-COH OUXVYYG TPLSYX VE MOYPK NHBYKGHK. UGX MOYLY KAPGYX PGOUVPMUGML, LYMMPGNUG YDUTISY MH HMOYK KALLPUGL, CYGM MH THLWHC MOPGRPGN HGSE HZ MOYPK HCGSHLLYL VAM RPGXSPGN OUMKYX HZ MOY ZHY. GUIHSYHG UXBUGWYX ZUKMOYK UGX CYKYMPKYX, MOAL UKKPBPGN UM MOY BYKE KYLASM COPWO WUALYX OPL XYLMKAWMPHG.WOUIMYK PPMOY XUE UZMYK OPL LHG OUX SYZM, IKPGWY GPWOHSUL LYGM ZHK IKPGWYLL TUKEMH WHTY MH OPL LMAXE."CYSS? UKY EHA LUMPLZPYX GHC?" LUPX OY. "EHA'BY TUXY TY JAUKKYS CPMO TELHG! LUMPLZPYX, UKY EHA? MOUM'L USS EHA CUGMYX! LUMPLZPYX?... PM OAKMLTY, PM OAKML. P'T HSX UGX CYUR UGX MOPL PL COUM EHA CUGMYX. CYSS MOYG,NSHUM HBYK PM! NSHUM HBYK PM!"UZMYK MOUM IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM LYY OYK ZUMOYK ZHK U COHSY CYYR. OY CULPSS UGX XPX GHM SYUBY OPL LMAXE.IKPGWYLL TUKE GHMPWYX MH OYK LAKIKPLY MOUM XAKPGN MOPL PSSGYLL MOYHSX IKPGWY GHM HGSE YDWSAXYX OYK ZKHT OPL KHHT, VAM XPX GHM UXTPMTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY YPMOYK. MPROHG USHGY UMMYGXYX OPT.UM MOY YGX HZ MOY CYYR MOY IKPGWY KYUIIYUKYX UGX KYLATYX OPL ZHKTYK CUEHZ SPZY, XYBHMPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO LIYWPUS UWMPBPME MH VAPSXPGN HIYKUMPHGLUGX MOY UKKUGNYTYGM HZ MOY NUKXYGL UGX WHTISYMYSE VKYURPGN HZZ OPLKYSUMPHGL CPMO TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY. OPL SHHRL UGX WHSX MHGY MH OPLXUANOMYK LYYTYX MH LUE: "MOYKY, EHA LYY? EHA ISHMMYX UNUPGLM TY, EHASPYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC UVHAM TE KYSUMPHGL CPMO MOUM ZKYGWOCHTUG UGX TUXYTY JAUKKYS CPMO OPT, VAM EHA LYY P GYYX GYPMOYK OYK GHK EHA!"IKPGWYLL TUKE LIYGM OUSZ HZ YBYKE XUE CPMO SPMMSY GPWOHSUL, CUMWOPGNOPL SYLLHGL, MYUWOPGN OPT KALLPUG UGX TALPW OYKLYSZ, UGX MUSRPGN MHXYLLUSSYL; MOY KYLM HZ MOY XUE LOY LIYGM HBYK OYK VHHRL, CPMO OYK HSXGAKLY, HK CPMO "NHX'L ZHSR" COH LHTYMPTYL WUTY VE MOY VUWR XHHK MH LYYOYK.HZ MOY CUK IKPGWYLL TUKE MOHANOM UL CHTYG XH MOPGR UVHAM CUKL. LOYZYUKYX ZHK OYK VKHMOYK COH CUL PG PM, CUL OHKKPZPYX VE UGX UTUFYX UMMOY LMKUGNY WKAYSME MOUM PTIYSL TYG MH RPSS HGY UGHMOYK, VAM LOY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOPL CUK, COPWO LYYTYX MH OYK SPRY USSIKYBPHAL CUKL. LOY XPX GHM KYUSPFY MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOPL CUK, MOHANOXYLLUSSYL CPMO COHT LOY WHGLMUGMSE WHGBYKLYX CUL IULLPHGUMYSE PGMYKYLMYXPG PML IKHNKYLL UGX MKPYX MH YDISUPG OPL HCG WHGWYIMPHG HZ PM MH OYK,UGX MOHANO MOY "NHX'L ZHSR" COH WUTY MH LYY OYK KYIHKMYX, PG MOYPK HCGCUE, MOY KATHKL WAKKYGM UTHGN MOY IYHISY HZ UG PGBULPHG VE UGMPWOKPLM,UGX MOHANO QASPY (GHC IKPGWYLL XKAVYMLRUEU), COH OUX KYLATYXWHKKYLIHGXYGWY CPMO OYK, CKHMY IUMKPHMPW SYMMYKL ZKHT THLWHC."P CKPMY EHA PG KALLPUG, TE NHHX ZKPYGX," CKHMY QASPY PG OYK ZKYGWOPZPYXKALLPUG, "VYWUALY P OUBY U XYMYLMUMPHG ZHK USS MOY ZKYGWO, UGX MOYLUTY ZHK MOYPK SUGNAUNY COPWO P WUGGHM LAIIHKM MH OYUK LIHRYG.... CY PGTHLWHC UKY YSUMYX VE YGMOALPULT ZHK HAK UXHKYX YTIYKHK."TE IHHK OALVUGX PL YGXAKPGN IUPGL UGX OAGNYK PG QYCPLO MUBYKGL, VAM MOYGYCL COPWO P OUBY PGLIPKYL TY EYM THKY."EHA OYUKX IKHVUVSE HZ MOY OYKHPW YDISHPM HZ KUYBLRP, YTVKUWPGN OPL MCHLHGL UGX LUEPGN: 'P CPSS IYKPLO CPMO MOYT VAM CY CPSS GHM VY LOURYG!'UGX MKASE MOHANO MOY YGYTE CUL MCPWY LMKHGNYK MOUG CY, CY CYKYAGLOURUVSY. CY IULL MOY MPTY UL CY WUG, VAM PG CUK UL PG CUK! MOYIKPGWYLLYL USPGY UGX LHIOPY LPM COHSY XUEL CPMO TY, UGX CY, AGOUIIECPXHCL HZ SPBY TYG, TURY VYUAMPZAS WHGBYKLUMPHGL HBYK HAK 'WOUKIPY', HGSEEHA, TE ZKPYGX, UKY TPLLPGN..." CYSS, TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO," OY LAXXYGSE CYGM HG, KUPLPGNOPL OYUX UGX IHPGMPGN MH MOY ISUG HZ MOY VAPSXPGN, "MYSS TY OHC EHA TYUGMH USMYK PM...."TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO CYGM AI MH MOY ISUG, UGX MOY IKPGWY UZMYK LIYURPGN MHOPT UVHAM MOY VAPSXPGN SHHRYX UGNKPSE UM IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX XYLLUSSYL UGXCYGM MH OPL HCG KHHT.IKPGWYLL TUKE LUC XYLLUSSYL' YTVUKKULLYX UGX ULMHGPLOYX SHHR ZPDYX HGOYK ZUMOYK, GHMPWYX OPL LPSYGWY, UGX CUL LMKAWR VE MOY ZUWM MOUM OYKZUMOYK OUX ZHKNHMMYG OPL LHG'L SYMMYK HG MOY XKUCPGN-KHHT MUVSY; VAM LOYCUL GHM HGSE UZKUPX MH LIYUR HZ PM UGX ULR XYLLUSSYL MOY KYULHG HZ OPLWHGZALPHG UGX LPSYGWY, VAM CUL UZKUPX YBYG MH MOPGR UVHAM PM.PG MOY YBYGPGN TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO, LYGM VE MOY IKPGWY, WUTY MH IKPGWYLLTUKE ZHK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SYMMYK COPWO OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG PG MOY XKUCPGNKHHT. LUPX USIUMEWO, IAZZPGN UGXLIYURPGN KUIPXSE QALM UL MOY IKPGWY XPX, UGX OY WSPTVYX PGMH MOY MKUI.UZMYK NPBPGN MOY WSYKR HKXYKL UVHAM MOY CHKR MH VY XHGY, USIUMEWO, GHMMKEPGN MH PTPMUMY MOY IKPGWY GHC, SPZMYX MOY OUM ZKHT OPL VUSX OYUX UGXWKHLLYX OPTLYSZ MOKYY MPTYL."PZ MOYKY PL UGEMOPGN... TAMMYKYX USIUMEWO MH OPTLYSZ UGX LMUKMYXHG OPL QHAKGYE, SHHRPGN KHAGX UM MOY ZPYSXL HZ EYSSHC KEY UGX MOYLMPSS-NKYYG, MOPWRSE NKHCPGN HUML, UGX UM HMOYK JAPMY VSUWR ZPYSXL QALMVYPGN ISHCYX U LYWHGX MPTY.UL OY CYGM USHGN OY SHHRYX CPMO ISYULAKY UM MOY EYUK'L LISYGXPX WKHIHZ WHKG, LWKAMPGPFYX MOY LMKPIL HZ KEYZPYSX COPWO OYKY UGX MOYKY CYKYUSKYUXE VYPGN KYUIYX, TUXY OPL WUSWASUMPHGL UL MH MOY LHCPGN UGX MOYOUKBYLM, UGX ULRYX OPTLYSZ COYMOYK OY OUX GHM ZHKNHMMYG UGE HZ MOYIKPGWY'L HKXYKL.OUBPGN VUPMYX MOY OHKLYL MCPWY HG MOY CUE, OY UKKPBYX UM MOY MHCG MHCUKXYBYGPGN HG MOY ZHAKMO HZ UANALM.USIUMEWO RYIM TYYMPGN UGX HBYKMURPGN VUNNUNY MKUPGL UGX MKHHIL HG MOYKHUX. UL OY UIIKHUWOYX LTHSYGLR OY OYUKX MOY LHAGXL HZ XPLMUGM ZPKPGN,VAM MOYLY XPX GHM PTIKYLL OPT. COUM LMKAWR OPT THLM CUL MOY LPNOM HZ ULISYGXPX ZPYSX HZ HUML PG COPWO U WUTI OUX VYYG IPMWOYX UGX COPWOCUL VYPGN THCG XHCG VE MOY LHSXPYKL, YBPXYGMSE ZHK ZHXXYK. MOPL ZUWMPTIKYLLYX USIUMEWO, VAM PG MOPGRPGN UVHAM OPL HCG VALPGYLL OY LHHGZHKNHM PM.USS MOY PGMYKYLML HZ OPL SPZY ZHK THKY MOUG MOPKME EYUKL OUX VYYGVHAGXYX VE MOY CPSS HZ MOY IKPGWY, UGX OY GYBYK CYGM VYEHGX MOUM SPTPM.YBYKEMOPGN GHM WHGGYWMYX CPMO MOY YDYWAMPHG HZ MOY IKPGWY'L HKXYKL XPXGHM PGMYKYLM UGX XPX GHM YBYG YDPLM ZHK USIUMEWO.HG KYUWOPGN LTHSYGLR HG MOY YBYGPGN HZ MOY ZHAKMO HZ UANALM OY IAM AIPG MOY NUWOPGU LAVAKV UWKHLL MOY XGPYIYK, UM MOY PGG RYIM VE ZYKUIHGMHB,COYKY OY OUX VYYG PG MOY OUVPM HZ IAMMPGN AI ZHK MOY SULM MOPKME EYUKL.LHTY MOPKME EYUKL UNH ZYKUIHGMHB, VE USIUMEWO'L UXBPWY, OUX VHANOM UCHHX ZKHT MOY IKPGWY, OUX VYNAG MH MKUXY, UGX GHC OUX U OHALY, UGPGG, UGX U WHKG XYUSYK'L LOHI PG MOUM IKHBPGWY. OY CUL U LMHAM, XUKR,KYX-ZUWYX IYULUGM PG MOY ZHKMPYL, CPMO MOPWR SPIL, U VKHUX RGHV HZ UGHLY, LPTPSUK RGHVL HBYK OPL VSUWR ZKHCGPGN VKHCL, UGX U KHAGX VYSSE.CYUKPGN U CUPLMWHUM HBYK OPL WHMMHG LOPKM, ZYKUIHGMHB CUL LMUGXPGNVYZHKY OPL LOHI COPWO HIYGYX HGMH MOY LMKYYM. HG LYYPGN USIUMEWO OY CYGMAI MH OPT."EHA'KY CYSWHTY, EURHB USIUMEWO. ZHSRL UKY SYUBPGN MOY MHCG, VAM EHAOUBY WHTY MH PM," LUPX OY."COE UKY MOYE SYUBPGN MOY MHCG?" ULRYX USIUMEWO."MOUM'L COUM P LUE. ZHSRL UKY ZHHSPLO! USCUEL UZKUPX HZ MOY ZKYGWO.""CHTYG'L ZALL, CHTYG'L ZALL!" LUPX USIUMEWO."QALM COUM P MOPGR, EURHB USIUMEWO. COUM P LUE PL: HKXYKL OUBY VYYGNPBYG GHM MH SYM MOYT PG, LH MOUM TALM VY KPNOM. UGX MOY IYULUGML UKYULRPGN MOKYY KAVSYL ZHK WUKMPGN--PM PLG'M WOKPLMPUG!"EURHB USIUMEWO OYUKX CPMOHAM OYYXPGN. OY ULRYX ZHK U LUTHBUK UGX ZHK OUEZHK OPL OHKLYL, UGX COYG OY OUX OUX OPL MYU OY CYGM MH VYX.USS GPNOM SHGN MKHHIL CYKY THBPGN IULM MOY PGG. GYDM THKGPGN USIUMEWOXHGGYX U QUWRYM OY CHKY HGSE PG MHCG UGX CYGM HAM HG VALPGYLL. PM CUL ULAGGE THKGPGN UGX VE YPNOM H'WSHWR PM CUL USKYUXE OHM. "U NHHX XUE ZHKOUKBYLMPGN," MOHANOM USIUMEWO.ZKHT VYEHGX MOY MHCG ZPKPGN OUX VYYG OYUKX LPGWY YUKSE THKGPGN. UM YPNOMH'WSHWR MOY VHHTPGN HZ WUGGHG CUL UXXYX MH MOY LHAGX HZ TALRYMKE. TUGEIYHISY CYKY OAKKEPGN MOKHANO MOY LMKYYML UGX MOYKY CYKY TUGE LHSXPYKL,VAM WUVL CYKY LMPSS XKPBPGN UVHAM, MKUXYLTYG LMHHX UM MOYPK LOHIL, UGXLYKBPWY CUL VYPGN OYSX PG MOY WOAKWOYL UL ALAUS. USIUMEWO CYGM MH MOYLOHIL, MH NHBYKGTYGM HZZPWYL, MH MOY IHLM HZZPWY, UGX MH MOY NHBYKGHK'L.PG MOY HZZPWYL UGX LOHIL UGX UM MOY IHLM HZZPWY YBYKEHGY CUL MUSRPGNUVHAM MOY UKTE UGX UVHAM MOY YGYTE COH CUL USKYUXE UMMUWRPGN MOY MHCG,YBYKEVHXE CUL ULRPGN COUM LOHASX VY XHGY, UGX USS CYKY MKEPGN MH WUSTHGY UGHMOYK.PG ZKHGM HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L OHALY USIUMEWO ZHAGX U SUKNY GATVYK HZIYHISY, WHLLUWRL, UGX U MKUBYSPGN WUKKPUNY HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L. UM MOYIHKWO OY TYM MCH HZ MOY SUGXYX NYGMKE, HGY HZ COHT OY RGYC. MOPL TUG, UGYD-WUIMUPG HZ IHSPWY, CUL LUEPGN UGNKPSE:"PM'L GH QHRY, EHA RGHC! PM'L USS BYKE CYSS PZ EHA'KY LPGNSY. 'HGY TUGMOHANO AGXHGY PL VAM HGY,' UL MOY IKHBYKV LUEL, VAM CPMO MOPKMYYG PGEHAK ZUTPSE UGX USS MOY IKHIYKME... MOYE'BY VKHANOM AL MH AMMYK KAPG!COUM LHKM HZ NHBYKGHKL UKY MOYE MH XH MOUM? MOYE HANOM MH VY OUGNYX--MOYVKPNUGXL!...""HO WHTY, MOUM'L YGHANO!" LUPX MOY HMOYK."COUM XH P WUKY? SYM OPT OYUK! COUM OUBY EHA WHTY ZHK?""MH LYY MOY NHBYKGHK VE OPL YDWYSSYGWE'L HKXYK," UGLCYKYX USIUMEWO,SPZMPGN OPL OYUX UGX IKHAXSE MOKALMPGN OPL OUGX PGMH MOY VHLHT HZ OPLWHUM UL OY USCUEL XPX COYG OY TYGMPHGYX MOY IKPGWY.... "OY OUL HKXYKYXTY MH PGJAPKY PGMH MOY IHLPMPHG HZ UZZUPKL," OY UXXYX."EYL, NH UGX ZPGX HAM!" LOHAMYX MOY UGNKE NYGMSYTUG. "MOYE'BY VKHANOMMOPGNL MH LAWO U IULL MOUM MOYKY UKY GH WUKML HK UGEMOPGN!... MOYKY PMPL UNUPG, XH EHA OYUK?" LUPX OY, IHPGMPGN PG MOY XPKYWMPHG COYGWY WUTYMOY LHAGXL HZ ZPKPGN."MOYE'BY VKHANOM AL USS MH KAPG... MOY VKPNUGXL!" OY KYIYUMYX, UGXXYLWYGXYX MOY IHKWO LMYIL.USIUMEWO LCUEYX OPL OYUX UGX CYGM AILMUPKL. PG MOY CUPMPGN KHHT CYKYMKUXYLTYG, CHTYG, UGX HZZPWPUSL, SHHRPGN LPSYGMSE UM HGY UGHMOYK. MOYXHHK HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L KHHT HIYGYX UGX MOYE USS KHLY UGX THBYX ZHKCUKX.UG HZZPWPUS KUG HAM, LUPX LHTY CHKXL MH U TYKWOUGM, WUSSYX U LMHAMHZZPWPUS CPMO U WKHLL OUGNPGN HG OPL GYWR MH ZHSSHC OPT, UGX BUGPLOYXUNUPG, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH UBHPX MOY PGJAPKPGN SHHRL UGX JAYLMPHGLUXXKYLLYX MH OPT. USIUMEWO THBYX ZHKCUKX UGX GYDM MPTY MOY HZZPWPUS WUTYHAM UXXKYLLYX OPT, HGY OUGX ISUWYX PG MOY VKYULM HZ OPL VAMMHGYX WHUM,UGX OUGXYX OPT MCH SYMMYKL."MH OPL OHGHK VUKHG ULWO, ZKHT NYGYKUS-PG-WOPYZ IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP," OYUGGHAGWYX CPMO LAWO LHSYTGPME UGX LPNGPZPWUGWY MOUM MOY HZZPWPUS MAKGYXMH OPT UGX MHHR MOY SYMMYKL.U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK MOY NHBYKGHK KYWYPBYX USIUMEWO UGX OAKKPYXSE LUPX MHOPT:"PGZHKT MOY IKPGWY UGX IKPGWYLL MOUM P RGYC GHMOPGN: P UWMYX HG MOYOPNOYLM PGLMKAWMPHGL--OYKY..." UGX OY OUGXYX U IUIYK MH USIUMEWO."LMPSS, UL MOY IKPGWY PL AGCYSS TE UXBPWY PL MOUM MOYE LOHASX NH MHTHLWHC. P UT QALM LMUKMPGN TELYSZ. PGZHKT MOYT..."VAM MOY NHBYKGHK XPX GHM ZPGPLO: U XALME IYKLIPKPGN HZZPWYK KUG PGMH MOYKHHT UGX VYNUG MH LUE LHTYMOPGN PG ZKYGWO. MOY NHBYKGHK'L ZUWY YDIKYLLYXMYKKHK."NH," OY LUPX, GHXXPGN OPL OYUX MH USIUMEWO, UGX VYNUG JAYLMPHGPGN MOYHZZPWYK.YUNYK, ZKPNOMYGYX, OYSISYLL NSUGWYL CYKY MAKGYX HG USIUMEWO COYG OY WUTYHAM HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L KHHT. PGBHSAGMUKPSE SPLMYGPGN GHC MH MOY ZPKPGN,COPWO OUX XKUCG GYUKYK UGX CUL PGWKYULPGN PG LMKYGNMO, USIUMEWO OAKKPYXMH OPL PGG. MOY IUIYK OUGXYX MH OPT VE MOY NHBYKGHK LUPX MOPL:"P ULLAKY EHA MOUM MOY MHCG HZ LTHSYGLR PL GHM PG MOY LSPNOMYLM XUGNYKUL EYM UGX PM PL AGSPRYSE MOUM PM CPSS VY MOKYUMYGYX CPMO UGE. P ZKHTMOY HGY LPXY UGX IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG ZKHT MOY HMOYK UKY TUKWOPGN MH AGPMYHAK ZHKWYL VYZHKY LTHSYGLR, COPWO QAGWMPHG CPSS VY YZZYWMYX HG MOY22GX PGLMUGM, UGX VHMO UKTPYL CPMO MOYPK AGPMYX ZHKWYL CPSS XYZYGX HAKWHTIUMKPHML HZ MOY IKHBPGWY YGMKALMYX MH EHAK WUKY MPSS HAK YZZHKMLLOUSS OUBY VYUMYG VUWR MOY YGYTPYL HZ HAK ZUMOYKSUGX, HK MPSS MOY SULMCUKKPHK PG HAK BUSPUGM KUGRL OUL IYKPLOYX. ZKHT MOPL EHA CPSS LYY MOUMEHA OUBY U IYKZYWM KPNOM MH KYULLAKY MOY PGOUVPMUGML HZ LTHSYGLR, ZHKMOHLY XYZYGXYX VE MCH LAWO VKUBY UKTPYL TUE ZYYS ULLAKYX HZ BPWMHKE."(PGLMKAWMPHGL ZKHT VUKWSUE XY MHSSE MH VUKHG ULWO, MOY WPBPS NHBYKGHK HZLTHSYGLR, 1812.)IYHISY CYKY UGDPHALSE KHUTPGN UVHAM MOY LMKYYML.WUKML IPSYX OPNO CPMO OHALYOHSX AMYGLPSL, WOUPKL, UGX WAIVHUKXL RYIMYTYKNPGN ZKHT MOY NUMYL HZ MOY EUKXL UGX THBPGN USHGN MOY LMKYYML.SHUXYX WUKML LMHHX UM MOY OHALY GYDM MH ZYKUIHGMHB'L UGX CHTYG CYKYCUPSPGN UGX SUTYGMPGN UL MOYE LUPX NHHX-VEY. U LTUSS CUMWOXHN KUG KHAGXVUKRPGN PG ZKHGM HZ MOY OUKGYLLYX OHKLYL.USIUMEWO YGMYKYX MOY PGGEUKX UM U JAPWRYK IUWY MOUG ALAUS UGX CYGMLMKUPNOM MH MOY LOYX COYKY OPL OHKLYL UGX MKUI CYKY. MOY WHUWOTUG CULULSYYI. OY CHRY OPT AI, MHSX OPT MH OUKGYLL, UGX CYGM PGMH MOY IULLUNY.ZKHT MOY OHLM'L KHHT WUTY MOY LHAGXL HZ U WOPSX WKEPGN, MOY XYLIUPKPGNLHVL HZ U CHTUG, UGX MOY OHUKLY UGNKE LOHAMPGN HZ ZYKUIHGMHB. MOY WHHRVYNUG KAGGPGN OPMOYK UGX MOPMOYK PG MOY IULLUNY SPRY U ZKPNOMYGYX OYG,QALM UL USIUMEWO YGMYKYX."OY'L XHGY OYK MH XYUMO. RPSSYX MOY TPLMKYLL!... VYUM OYK... XKUNNYX OYKUVHAM LH!...""COUM ZHK?" ULRYX USIUMEWO."LOY RYIM VYNNPGN MH NH UCUE. LOY'L U CHTUG! 'MURY TY UCUE,' LUEL LOY,'XHG'M SYM TY IYKPLO CPMO TE SPMMSY WOPSXKYG! ZHSRL,' LOY LUEL, 'UKY USSNHGY, LH COE,' LOY LUEL, 'XHG'M CY NH?' UGX OY VYNUG VYUMPGN UGX IASSPGNOYK UVHAM LH!"UM MOYLY CHKXL USIUMEWO GHXXYX UL PZ PG UIIKHBUS, UGX GHM CPLOPGN MHOYUK THKY CYGM MH MOY XHHK HZ MOY KHHT HIIHLPMY MOY PGGRYYIYK'L, COYKYOY OUX SYZM OPL IAKWOULYL."EHA VKAMY, EHA TAKXYKYK!" LWKYUTYX U MOPG, IUSY CHTUG COH, CPMO U VUVEPG OYK UKTL UGX OYK RYKWOPYZ MHKG ZKHT OYK OYUX, VAKLM MOKHANO MOY XHHKUM MOUM THTYGM UGX XHCG MOY LMYIL PGMH MOY EUKX.ZYKUIHGMHB WUTY HAM UZMYK OYK, VAM HG LYYPGN USIUMEWO UXQALMYX OPLCUPLMWHUM, LTHHMOYX OPL OUPK, EUCGYX, UGX ZHSSHCYX USIUMEWO PGMH MOYHIIHLPMY KHHT."NHPGN USKYUXE?" LUPX OY.USIUMEWO, CPMOHAM UGLCYKPGN HK SHHRPGN UM OPL OHLM, LHKMYX OPL IUWRUNYLUGX ULRYX OHC TAWO OY HCYX."CY'SS KYWRHG AI! CYSS, OUBY EHA VYYG MH MOY NHBYKGHK'L?" ULRYXZYKUIHGMHB. "COUM OUL VYYG XYWPXYX?"USIUMEWO KYISPYX MOUM MOY NHBYKGHK OUX GHM MHSX OPT UGEMOPGN XYZPGPMY."CPMO HAK VALPGYLL, OHC WUG CY NYM UCUE?" LUPX ZYKUIHGMHB. "CY'X OUBYMH IUE LYBYG KAVSYL U WUKMSHUX MH XHKHNHVAFO UGX P MYSS MOYT MOYE'KYGHM WOKPLMPUGL MH ULR PM! LYSPBUGHB, GHC, XPX U NHHX LMKHRY SULMMOAKLXUE--LHSX ZSHAK MH MOY UKTE UM GPGY KAVSYL U LUWR. CPSS EHA OUBYLHTY MYU?" OY UXXYX.COPSY MOY OHKLYL CYKY VYPGN OUKGYLLYX USIUMEWO UGX ZYKUIHGMHB HBYK MOYPKMYU MUSRYX HZ MOY IKPWY HZ WHKG, MOY WKHIL, UGX MOY NHHX CYUMOYK ZHKOUKBYLMPGN."CYSS, PM LYYTL MH VY NYMMPGN JAPYMYK," KYTUKRYX ZYKUIHGMHB, ZPGPLOPGNOPL MOPKX WAI HZ MYU UGX NYMMPGN AI. "HAKL TALM OUBY NHM MOY VYLM HZ PM.MOY HKXYKL CYKY GHM MH SYM MOYT PG. LH CY'KY PG ZHKWY, PM LYYTL....MOYE LUE MOY HMOYK XUE TUMMOYC PBUGEWO ISUMHB XKHBY MOYT PGMH MOY KPBYKTUKPGU UGX XKHCGYX LHTY YPNOMYYG MOHALUGX PG HGY XUE."USIUMEWO WHSSYWMYX OPL IUKWYSL, OUGXYX MOYT MH MOY WHUWOTUG COH OUX WHTYPG, UGX LYMMSYX AI CPMO MOY PGGRYYIYK. MOY GHPLY HZ COYYSL, OHHZL, UGXVYSSL CUL OYUKX ZKHT MOY NUMYCUE UL U SPMMSY MKUI IULLYX HAM.PM CUL VE GHC SUMY PG MOY UZMYKGHHG. OUSZ MOY LMKYYM CUL PG LOUXHC, MOYHMOYK OUSZ VKPNOMSE SPM VE MOY LAG. USIUMEWO SHHRYX HAM HZ MOY CPGXHCUGX CYGM MH MOY XHHK. LAXXYGSE MOY LMKUGNY LHAGX HZ U ZUK-HZZ COPLMSPGNUGX MOAX CUL OYUKX, ZHSSHCYX VE U VHHT HZ WUGGHG VSYGXPGN PGMH U XASSKHUK MOUM LYM MOY CPGXHCL KUMMSPGN.OY CYGM HAM PGMH MOY LMKYYM: MCH TYG CYKY KAGGPGN IULM MHCUKX MOYVKPXNY. ZKHT XPZZYKYGM LPXYL WUTY COPLMSPGN LHAGXL UGX MOY MOAX HZWUGGHG VUSSL UGX VAKLMPGN LOYSSL ZUSSPGN HG MOY MHCG. VAM MOYLY LHAGXLCYKY OUKXSE OYUKX PG WHTIUKPLHG CPMO MOY GHPLY HZ MOY ZPKPGN HAMLPXY MOYMHCG UGX UMMKUWMYX SPMMSY UMMYGMPHG ZKHT MOY PGOUVPMUGML. MOY MHCG CULVYPGN VHTVUKXYX VE U OAGXKYX UGX MOPKME NAGL COPWO GUIHSYHG OUX HKXYKYXAI UZMYK ZHAK H'WSHWR. MOY IYHISY XPX GHM UM HGWY KYUSPFY MOY TYUGPGN HZMOPL VHTVUKXTYGM.UM ZPKLM MOY GHPLY HZ MOY ZUSSPGN VHTVL UGX LOYSSL HGSE UKHALYXWAKPHLPME. ZYKUIHGMHB'L CPZY, COH MPSS MOYG OUX GHM WYULYX CUPSPGN AGXYKMOY LOYX, VYWUTY JAPYM UGX CPMO MOY VUVE PG OYK UKTL CYGM MH MOY NUMY,SPLMYGPGN MH MOY LHAGXL UGX SHHRPGN PG LPSYGWY UM MOY IYHISY.MOY WHHR UGX U LOHI ULLPLMUGM WUTY MH MOY NUMY. CPMO SPBYSE WAKPHLPMEYBYKEHGY MKPYX MH NYM U NSPTILY HZ MOY IKHQYWMPSYL UL MOYE ZSYC HBYKMOYPK OYUXL. LYBYKUS IYHISY WUTY KHAGX MOY WHKGYK MUSRPGN YUNYKSE."COUM ZHKWY!" KYTUKRYX HGY. "RGHWRYX MOY KHHZ UGX WYPSPGN USS MHLISPGMYKL!""KHAMYX AI MOY YUKMO SPRY U IPN," LUPX UGHMOYK."MOUM'L NKUGX, PM VAWRL HGY AI!" SUANOYX MOY ZPKLM. "SAWRE EHA QATIYXULPXY, HK PM CHASX OUBY CPIYX EHA HAM!"HMOYKL QHPGYX MOHLY TYG UGX LMHIIYX UGX MHSX OHC WUGGHG VUSSL OUX ZUSSYGHG U OHALY WSHLY MH MOYT. TYUGCOPSY LMPSS THKY IKHQYWMPSYL, GHC CPMOMOY LCPZM LPGPLMYK COPLMSY HZ U WUGGHG VUSS, GHC CPMO MOY UNKYYUVSYPGMYKTPMMYGM COPLMSY HZ U LOYSS, ZSYC HBYK IYHISY'L OYUXL PGWYLLUGMSE,VAM GHM HGY ZYSS WSHLY VE, MOYE USS ZSYC HBYK. USIUMEWO CUL NYMMPGN PGMHOPL MKUI. MOY PGGRYYIYK LMHHX UM MOY NUMY."COUM UKY EHA LMUKPGN UM?" OY LOHAMYX MH MOY WHHR, COH PG OYK KYX LRPKM,CPMO LSYYBYL KHSSYX AI, LCPGNPGN OYK VUKY YSVHCL, OUX LMYIIYX MH MOYWHKGYK MH SPLMYG MH COUM CUL VYPGN LUPX."COUM TUKBYSL!" LOY YDWSUPTYX, VAM OYUKPGN OYK TULMYK'L BHPWY LOY MAKGYXVUWR, IASSPGN XHCG OYK MAWRYX-AI LRPKM.HGWY THKY LHTYMOPGN COPLMSYX, VAM MOPL MPTY JAPMY WSHLY, LCHHIPGNXHCGCUKXL SPRY U SPMMSY VPKX; U ZSUTY ZSULOYX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOYLMKYYM, LHTYMOPGN YDISHXYX, UGX MOY LMKYYM CUL LOKHAXYX PG LTHRY."LWHAGXKYS, COUM UKY EHA XHPGN?" LOHAMYX MOY PGGRYYIYK, KALOPGN MH MOYWHHR.UM MOUM THTYGM MOY IPMPZAS CUPSPGN HZ CHTYG CUL OYUKX ZKHT XPZZYKYGMLPXYL, MOY ZKPNOMYGYX VUVE VYNUG MH WKE, UGX IYHISY WKHCXYX LPSYGMSECPMO IUSY ZUWYL KHAGX MOY WHHR. MOY SHAXYLM LHAGX PG MOUM WKHCX CUL OYKCUPSPGN."HO-O-O! XYUK LHASL, XYUK RPGX LHASL! XHG'M SYM TY XPY! TE NHHXLHASL!..."ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK GH HGY KYTUPGYX PG MOY LMKYYM. MOY WHHR, CPMO OYKMOPNO VKHRYG VE U LOYSS LISPGMYK, OUX VYYG WUKKPYX PGMH MOY RPMWOYG.USIUMEWO, OPL WHUWOTUG, ZYKUIHGMHB'L CPZY UGX WOPSXKYG UGX MOY OHALYIHKMYK CYKY USS LPMMPGN PG MOY WYSSUK, SPLMYGPGN. MOY KHUK HZ NAGL, MOYCOPLMSPGN HZ IKHQYWMPSYL, UGX MOY IPMYHAL THUGPGN HZ MOY WHHR, COPWOKHLY UVHBY MOY HMOYK LHAGXL, XPX GHM WYULY ZHK U THTYGM. MOY TPLMKYLLKHWRYX UGX OALOYX OYK VUVE UGX COYG UGEHGY WUTY PGMH MOY WYSSUK ULRYXPG U IUMOYMPW COPLIYK COUM OUX VYWHTY HZ OYK OALVUGX COH OUX KYTUPGYXPG MOY LMKYYM. U LOHITUG COH YGMYKYX MHSX OYK MOUM OYK OALVUGX OUXNHGY CPMO HMOYKL MH MOY WUMOYXKUS, COYGWY MOYE CYKY ZYMWOPGN MOYCHGXYK-CHKRPGN PWHG HZ LTHSYGLR.MHCUKX XALR MOY WUGGHGUXY VYNUG MH LAVLPXY. USIUMEWO SYZM MOY WYSSUKUGX LMHIIYX PG MOY XHHKCUE. MOY YBYGPGN LRE MOUM OUX VYYG LH WSYUK CULWSHAXYX CPMO LTHRY, MOKHANO COPWO, OPNO AI, MOY LPWRSY HZ MOY GYC THHGLOHGY LMKUGNYSE. GHC MOUM MOY MYKKPVSY XPG HZ MOY NAGL OUX WYULYX U OALOLYYTYX MH KYPNG HBYK MOY MHCG, VKHRYG HGSE VE MOY KALMSY HZ ZHHMLMYIL,MOY THUGPGN, MOY XPLMUGM WKPYL, UGX MOY WKUWRSY HZ ZPKYL COPWO LYYTYXCPXYLIKYUX YBYKECOYKY. MOY WHHR'L THUGL OUX GHC LAVLPXYX. HG MCH LPXYLVSUWR WAKSPGN WSHAXL HZ LTHRY KHLY UGX LIKYUX ZKHT MOY ZPKYL. UGX ZYKUIHGMHB KUG PGMH MOY EUKX.LHSXPYKL CYKY IULLPGN PG U WHGLMUGM LMKYUT USHGN MOY LMKYYM VSHWRPGNPM WHTISYMYSE, LH MOUM USIUMEWO WHASX GHM IULL HAM UGX OUX MH CUPM.ZYKUIHGMHB'L CPZY UGX WOPSXKYG CYKY USLH LPMMPGN PG U WUKM CUPMPGN MPSSPM CUL IHLLPVSY MH XKPBY HAM.GPNOM OUX WHTY. YBYKEMOPGN MOUM KYTPGXYX OPT HZ OPL IULM CUL KYIANGUGM MHOPT, UGX LH PG OPL KYSUMPHGL CPMO MOUM ZHKTYK WPKWSY OY WHGZPGYX OPTLYSZMH MKEPGN MH XH OPL XAME UGX GHM MH VY AGZUPK.PG MKAMO YBYKEMOPGN IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ PG U XUKR UGX NSHHTE SPNOM MHIKPGWY UGXKYC, YLIYWPUSSE UZMYK MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ LTHSYGLR HG MOY LPDMOHZ UANALM (OY WHGLPXYKYX MOUM PM WHASX UGX LOHASX OUBY VYYG XYZYGXYX)UGX UZMYK OPL LPWR ZUMOYK OUX OUX MH ZSYY MH THLWHC, UVUGXHGPGN MHIPSSUNY OPL XYUKSE VYSHBYX VUSX OPSSL COPWO OY OUX VAPSM UGX IYHISYX.VAM XYLIPMY MOPL, MOUGRL MH OPL KYNPTYGM, IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX LHTYMOPGN MHMOPGR UVHAM YGMPKYSE UIUKM ZKHT NYGYKUS JAYLMPHGL. MCH XUEL IKYBPHALSEOY OUX KYWYPBYX GYCL MOUM OPL ZUMOYK, LHG, UGX LPLMYK OUX SYZM ZHKTHLWHC; UGX MOHANO MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN ZHK OPT MH XH UM VUSX OPSSL, IKPGWYUGXKYC CPMO U WOUKUWMYKPLMPW XYLPKY MH ZHTYGM OPL HCG NKPYZ XYWPXYX MOUMOY TALM KPXY MOYKY.OY HKXYKYX OPL OHKLY MH VY LUXXSYX UGX, SYUBPGN OPL KYNPTYGM HG MOYTUKWO, KHXY MH OPL ZUMOYK'L YLMUMY COYKY OY OUX VYYG VHKG UGX LIYGM OPLWOPSXOHHX. KPXPGN IULM MOY IHGX COYKY MOYKY ALYX USCUEL MH VY XHFYGLHZ CHTYG WOUMMYKPGN UL MOYE KPGLYX MOYPK SPGYG HK VYUM PM CPMO CHHXYGVYYMSYL, IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMPWYX MOUM MOYKY CUL GHM U LHAS UVHAM UGX MOUMMOY SPMMSY CULOPGN COUKZ, MHKG ZKHT PML ISUWY UGX OUSZ LAVTYKNYX, CULZSHUMPGN HG PML LPXY PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY IHGX. TYUGPGN COYG XPX MOYE SYUBY ZHKTHLWHC.USIUMEWO, AGXYKLMUGXPGN MOY JAYLMPHG MH KYZYK MH MOYPK XYIUKMAKY ZHKVHNAWOUKHBH, KYISPYX MOUM MOYE OUX SYZM HG MOY LYBYGMO UGX UNUPG CYGMPGMH XYMUPSL WHGWYKGPGN MOY YLMUMY TUGUNYTYGM, ULRPGN ZHK PGLMKAWMPHGL."UT P MH SYM MOY MKHHIL OUBY MOY HUML, UGX MH MURY U KYWYPIM ZHK MOYT?CY OUBY LMPSS LPD OAGXKYX JAUKMYKL SYZM," OY PGJAPKYX."COUM UT P MH LUE MH OPT?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, SHHRPGN XHCG HG MOYHSX TUG'L VUSX OYUX LOPGPGN PG MOY LAG UGX LYYPGN VE MOY YDIKYLLPHG HGOPL ZUWY MOUM MOY HSX TUG OPTLYSZ AGXYKLMHHX OHC AGMPTYSE LAWO JAYLMPHGLCYKY UGX HGSE ULRYX MOYT MH USSUE OPL NKPYZ."EYL, SYM MOYT OUBY PM," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC."PZ EHA GHMPWYX LHTY XPLHKXYK PG MOY NUKXYG," LUPX USIUMEWO, "PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH IKYBYGM PM. OPL CPSS VY XHGY!" OY YDWSUPTYX.U NKHAI HZ VUKYOYUXYX IYULUGML CUL UIIKHUWOPGN UWKHLL MOY TYUXHC MHCUKXMOY IKPGWY."CYSS, NHHX-VEY!" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC, VYGXPGN HBYK MH USIUMEWO. "EHATALM NH UCUE MHH, MURY UCUE COUM EHA WUG UGX MYSS MOY LYKZL MH NH MH MOYKEUFUG YLMUMY HK MH MOY HGY GYUK THLWHC."USIUMEWO WSAGN MH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SYN UGX VAKLM PGMH LHVL. NYGMSEXPLYGNUNPGN OPTLYSZ, MOY IKPGWY LIAKKYX OPL OHKLY UGX KHXY XHCG MOYUBYGAY UM U NUSSHI.MOY HSX TUG CUL LMPSS LPMMPGN PG MOY HKGUTYGMUS NUKXYG, SPRY U ZSEPTIULLPBY HG MOY ZUWY HZ U SHBYX HGY COH PL XYUX, MUIIPGN MOY SULM HGCOPWO OY CUL TURPGN MOY VULM LOHY, UGX MCH SPMMSY NPKSL, KAGGPGN HAMZKHT MOY OHM OHALY WUKKEPGN PG MOYPK LRPKML ISATL MOYE OUX ISAWRYX ZKHTMOY MKYYL MOYKY, WUTY AIHG IKPGWY UGXKYC. HG LYYPGN MOY EHAGN TULMYK,MOY YSXYK HGY CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX SHHR WSAMWOYX OYK EHAGNYK WHTIUGPHG VE MOYOUGX UGX OPX CPMO OYK VYOPGX U VPKWO MKYY, GHM LMHIIPGN MH IPWR AI LHTYNKYYG ISATL MOYE OUX XKHIIYX.IKPGWY UGXKYC MAKGYX UCUE CPMO LMUKMSYX OULMY, AGCPSSPGN MH SYM MOYTLYY MOUM MOYE OUX VYYG HVLYKBYX. OY CUL LHKKE ZHK MOY IKYMME ZKPNOMYGYXSPMMSY NPKS, CUL UZKUPX HZ SHHRPGN UM OYK, UGX EYM ZYSM UG PKKYLPLMPVSYXYLPKY MH XH LH. U GYC LYGLUMPHG HZ WHTZHKM UGX KYSPYZ WUTY HBYK OPTCOYG, LYYPGN MOYLY NPKSL, OY KYUSPFYX MOY YDPLMYGWY HZ HMOYK OATUGPGMYKYLML YGMPKYSE USHHZ ZKHT OPL HCG UGX QALM UL SYNPMPTUMY UL MOHLYMOUM HWWAIPYX OPT. YBPXYGMSE MOYLY NPKSL IULLPHGUMYSE XYLPKYX HGYMOPGN--MH WUKKE UCUE UGX YUM MOHLY NKYYG ISATL CPMOHAM VYPGN WUANOM--UGXIKPGWY UGXKYC LOUKYX MOYPK CPLO ZHK MOY LAWWYLL HZ MOYPK YGMYKIKPLY. OYWHASX GHM KYLPLM SHHRPGN UM MOYT HGWY THKY. VYSPYBPGN MOYPK XUGNYK IULM,MOYE LIKUGN ZKHT MOYPK UTVALO UGX, WOPKKAIPGN LHTYMOPGN PG MOYPK LOKPSSSPMMSY BHPWYL UGX OHSXPGN AI MOYPK LRPKML, MOYPK VUKY SPMMSY LAGVAKGYXZYYM LWUTIYKYX TYKKPSE UGX JAPWRSE UWKHLL MOY TYUXHC NKULL.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LHTYCOUM KYZKYLOYX VE OUBPGN KPXXYG HZZ MOY XALMEOPNOKHUX USHGN COPWO MOY MKHHIL CYKY THBPGN. VAM GHM ZUK ZKHT VUSX OPSSLOY UNUPG WUTY HAM HG MOY KHUX UGX HBYKMHHR OPL KYNPTYGM UM PML OUSMPGNISUWY VE MOY XUT HZ U LTUSS IHGX. PM CUL IULM HGY H'WSHWR. MOY LAG,U KYX VUSS MOKHANO MOY XALM, VAKGYX UGX LWHKWOYX OPL VUWR PGMHSYKUVSEMOKHANO OPL VSUWR WHUM. MOY XALM USCUEL OAGN THMPHGSYLL UVHBY MOY VAFFHZ MUSR MOUM WUTY ZKHT MOY KYLMPGN MKHHIL. MOYKY CUL GH CPGX. UL OYWKHLLYX MOY XUT IKPGWY UGXKYC LTYSSYX MOY HHFY UGX ZKYLOGYLL HZ MOYIHGX. OY SHGNYX MH NYM PGMH MOUM CUMYK, OHCYBYK XPKME PM TPNOM VY, UGXOY NSUGWYX KHAGX UM MOY IHHS ZKHT COYGWY WUTY LHAGXL HZ LOKPYRL UGXSUANOMYK. MOY LTUSS, TAXXE, NKYYG IHGX OUX KPLYG BPLPVSE THKY MOUG UZHHM, ZSHHXPGN MOY XUT, VYWUALY PM CUL ZASS HZ MOY GURYX COPMY VHXPYLHZ LHSXPYKL CPMO VKPWR-KYX OUGXL, GYWRL, UGX ZUWYL, COH CYKY LISULOPGNUVHAM PG PM. USS MOPL GURYX COPMY OATUG ZSYLO, SUANOPGN UGX LOKPYRPGN,ZSHAGXYKYX UVHAM PG MOUM XPKME IHHS SPRY WUKI LMAZZYX PGMH U CUMYKPGNWUG, UGX MOY LANNYLMPHG HZ TYKKPTYGM PG MOUM ZSHAGXYKPGN TULL KYGXYKYXPM LIYWPUSSE IUMOYMPW.HGY ZUPK-OUPKYX EHAGN LHSXPYK HZ MOY MOPKX WHTIUGE, COHT IKPGWY UGXKYCRGYC UGX COH OUX U LMKUI KHAGX MOY WUSZ HZ HGY SYN, WKHLLYX OPTLYSZ,LMYIIYX VUWR MH NYM U NHHX KAG, UGX ISAGNYX PGMH MOY CUMYK; UGHMOYK,U XUKR GHGWHTTPLLPHGYX HZZPWYK COH CUL USCUEL LOUNNE, LMHHX AI MH OPLCUPLM PG MOY CUMYK QHEZASSE CKPNNSPGN OPL TALWASUK ZPNAKY UGX LGHKMYXCPMO LUMPLZUWMPHG UL OY IHAKYX MOY CUMYK HBYK OPL OYUX CPMO OUGXLVSUWRYGYX MH MOY CKPLML. MOYKY CYKY LHAGXL HZ TYG LSUIIPGN HGY UGHMOYK,EYSSPGN, UGX IAZZPGN.YBYKECOYKY HG MOY VUGR, HG MOY XUT, UGX PG MOY IHGX, MOYKY CUL OYUSMOE,COPMY, TALWASUK ZSYLO. MOY HZZPWYK, MPTHROPG, CPMO OPL KYX SPMMSY GHLY,LMUGXPGN HG MOY XUT CPIPGN OPTLYSZ CPMO U MHCYS, ZYSM WHGZALYX UM LYYPGNMOY IKPGWY, VAM TUXY AI OPL TPGX MH UXXKYLL OPT GYBYKMOYSYLL."PM'L BYKE GPWY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE! CHASXG'M EHA SPRY MH?" LUPX OY."PM'L XPKME," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, TURPGN U NKPTUWY."CY'SS WSYUK PM HAM ZHK EHA PG U TPGAMY," LUPX MPTHROPG, UGX, LMPSSAGXKYLLYX, KUG HZZ MH WSYUK MOY TYG HAM HZ MOY IHGX."MOY IKPGWY CUGML MH VUMOY.""COUM IKPGWY? HAKL?" LUPX TUGE BHPWYL, UGX MOY TYG CYKY PG LAWO OULMYMH WSYUK HAM MOUM MOY IKPGWY WHASX OUKXSE LMHI MOYT. OY XYWPXYX MOUM OYCHASX KUMOYK CULO OPTLYSZ CPMO CUMYK PG MOY VUKG."ZSYLO, VHXPYL, WUGGHG ZHXXYK!" OY MOHANOM, UGX OY SHHRYX UM OPL HCGGURYX VHXE UGX LOAXXYKYX, GHM ZKHT WHSX VAM ZKHT U LYGLY HZ XPLNALMUGX OHKKHK OY XPX GHM OPTLYSZ AGXYKLMUGX, UKHALYX VE MOY LPNOM HZ MOUMPTTYGLY GATVYK HZ VHXPYL LISULOPGN UVHAM PG MOY XPKME IHGX.HG MOY LYBYGMO HZ UANALM IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG CKHMY UL ZHSSHCL ZKHT OPLJAUKMYKL UM TPROUESHBGU HG MOY LTHSYGLR KHUX:XYUK WHAGM USYDPL UGXKYYBPWO--(OY CUL CKPMPGN MH UKURWOYYB VAM RGYC MOUMOPL SYMMYK CHASX VY KYUX VE MOY YTIYKHK, UGX MOYKYZHKY CYPNOYX YBYKECHKX PG PM MH MOY VYLM HZ OPL UVPSPME.)P YDIYWM MOY TPGPLMYK (VUKWSUE XY MHSSE) OUL USKYUXE KYIHKMYX MOYUVUGXHGTYGM HZ LTHSYGLR MH MOY YGYTE. PM PL IPMPUVSY UGX LUX, UGXMOY COHSY UKTE PL PG XYLIUPK MOUM MOPL THLM PTIHKMUGM ISUWY OUL VYYGCUGMHGSE UVUGXHGYX. P, ZHK TE IUKM, VYNNYX OPT IYKLHGUSSE THLM AKNYGMSEUGX ZPGUSSE CKHMY OPT, VAM GHMOPGN CHASX PGXAWY OPT MH WHGLYGM. P LCYUKMH EHA HG TE OHGHK MOUM GUIHSYHG CUL PG LAWO U ZPD UL GYBYK VYZHKY UGXTPNOM OUBY SHLM OUSZ OPL UKTE VAM WHASX GHM OUBY MURYG LTHSYGLR. HAKMKHHIL ZHANOM, UGX UKY ZPNOMPGN, UL GYBYK VYZHKY. CPMO ZPZMYYG MOHALUGXTYG P OYSX MOY YGYTE UM VUE ZHK MOPKME-ZPBY OHAKL UGX VYUM OPT; VAM OYCHASX GHM OHSX HAM YBYG ZHK ZHAKMYYG OHAKL. PM PL XPLNKUWYZAS, U LMUPGHG HAK UKTE, UGX UL ZHK OPT, OY HANOM, PM LYYTL MH TY, GHM MH SPBY. PZOY KYIHKML MOUM HAK SHLLYL CYKY NKYUM, PM PL GHM MKAY; IYKOUIL UVHAMZHAK MOHALUGX, GHM THKY, UGX GHM YBYG MOUM; VAM YBYG CYKY MOYE MYGMOHALUGX, MOUM'L CUK! VAM MOY YGYTE OUL SHLM TULLYL...COUM CHASX PM OUBY WHLM OPT MH OHSX HAM ZHK UGHMOYK MCH XUEL? MOYE CHASXOUBY OUX MH KYMPKY HZ MOYPK HCG UWWHKX, ZHK MOYE OUX GH CUMYK ZHK TYGHK OHKLYL. OY NUBY TY OPL CHKX OY CHASX GHM KYMKYUM, VAM LAXXYGSE LYGMPGLMKAWMPHGL MOUM OY CUL KYMPKPGN MOUM GPNOM. CY WUGGHM ZPNOM PG MOPLCUE, HK CY TUE LHHG VKPGN MOY YGYTE MH THLWHC...MOYKY PL U KATHK MOUM EHA UKY MOPGRPGN HZ IYUWY. NHX ZHKVPX MOUM EHALOHASX TURY IYUWY UZMYK USS HAK LUWKPZPWYL UGX LAWO PGLUGY KYMKYUML! EHACHASX LYM USS KALLPU UNUPGLM EHA UGX YBYKE HGY HZ AL CHASX ZYYS ULOUTYXMH CYUK MOY AGPZHKT. PZ PM OUL WHTY MH MOPL--CY TALM ZPNOM UL SHGN ULKALLPU WUG UGX UL SHGN UL MOYKY UKY TYG UVSY MH LMUGX...HGY TUG HANOM MH VY PG WHTTUGX, UGX GHM MCH. EHAK TPGPLMYK TUE IYKOUILVY NHHX UL U TPGPLMYK, VAM UL U NYGYKUS OY PL GHM TYKYSE VUX VAMYDYWKUVSY, EYM MH OPT PL YGMKALMYX MOY ZUMY HZ HAK COHSY WHAGMKE.... PUT KYUSSE ZKUGMPW CPMO BYDUMPHG; ZHKNPBY TE CKPMPGN VHSXSE. PM PL WSYUKMOUM MOY TUG COH UXBHWUMYL MOY WHGWSALPHG HZ U IYUWY, UGX MOUM MOYTPGPLMYK LOHASX WHTTUGX MOY UKTE, XHYL GHM SHBY HAK LHBYKYPNG UGXXYLPKYL MOY KAPG HZ AL USS. LH P CKPMY EHA ZKUGRSE: WUSS HAM MOYTPSPMPU. ZHK MOY TPGPLMYK PL SYUXPGN MOYLY BPLPMHKL UZMYK OPT MH THLWHCPG U THLM TULMYKSE CUE. MOY COHSY UKTE ZYYSL NKYUM LALIPWPHG HZ MOYPTIYKPUS UPXY-XY-WUTI CHSFHNYG. OY PL LUPX MH VY THKY GUIHSYHG'L TUGMOUG HAKL, UGX OY PL USCUEL UXBPLPGN MOY TPGPLMYK. P UT GHM TYKYSE WPBPSMH OPT VAM HVYE OPT SPRY U WHKIHKUS, MOHANO P UT OPL LYGPHK. MOPL PLIUPGZAS, VAM, SHBPGN TE VYGYZUWMHK UGX LHBYKYPNG, P LAVTPM. HGSE P UTLHKKE ZHK MOY YTIYKHK MOUM OY YGMKALML HAK ZPGY UKTE MH LAWO UL OY.WHGLPXYK MOUM HG HAK KYMKYUM CY OUBY SHLM VE ZUMPNAY UGX SYZM PG MOYOHLIPMUS THKY MOUG ZPZMYYG MOHALUGX TYG, UGX OUX CY UMMUWRYX MOPL CHASXGHM OUBY OUIIYGYX. MYSS TY, ZHK NHX'L LURY, COUM CPSS KALLPU, HAK THMOYKKALLPU, LUE MH HAK VYPGN LH ZKPNOMYGYX, UGX COE UKY CY UVUGXHGPGN HAKNHHX UGX NUSSUGM ZUMOYKSUGX MH LAWO KUVVSY UGX PTISUGMPGN ZYYSPGNL HZOUMKYX UGX LOUTY PG USS HAK LAVQYWML? MOY COHSY UKTEVYCUPSL PM UGX WUSSL XHCG WAKLYL AIHG OPT...WOUIMYK BPUTHGN MOY PGGATYKUVSY WUMYNHKPYL UIISPWUVSY MH MOY IOYGHTYGU HZ OATUGSPZY HGY TUE XPLWKPTPGUMY VYMCYYG MOHLY PG COPWO LAVLMUGWY IKYBUPSLUGX MOHLY PG COPWO ZHKT IKYBUPSL. LPGWY MOY EYUK 1805 CY OUX TUXY IYUWY UGX OUXUNUPG JAUKKYSYX CPMO VHGUIUKMY UGX OUX TUXY WHGLMPMAMPHGL UGX AGTUXYMOYT UNUPG, VAM MOY LUSHGL HZ UGGU IUBSHBGU UGX OYSYGY KYTUPGYX QALM ULMOYE OUX VYYG--MOY HGY LYBYG UGX MOY HMOYK ZPBY EYUKL VYZHKY. UM UGGUIUBSHBGU'L MOYE MUSRYX CPMO IYKISYDPME HZ VHGUIUKMY'L LAWWYLLYL QALMUL VYZHKY UGX LUC PG MOYT UGX PG MOY LAVLYKBPYGWY LOHCG MH OPT VE MOYYAKHIYUG LHBYKYPNGL U TUSPWPHAL WHGLIPKUWE, MOY LHSY HVQYWM HZ COPWO CULMH WUALY AGISYULUGMGYLL UGX UGDPYME MH MOY WHAKM WPKWSY HZ COPWO UGGUIUBSHBGU CUL MOY KYIKYLYGMUMPBY.
