PG MOUM WPKWSY MOYE XPLWHAGMYGUGWYX MOHLYCOH UXBPLYX OAKKPYX IKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK U KYTHBUS MH RUFUG HZ MOY WHAKM UGXMOY NPKSL' YXAWUMPHGUS YLMUVSPLOTYGML AGXYK MOY IUMKHGUNY HZ MOY XHCUNYKYTIKYLL. PG OYSYGY'L WPKWSY MOY CUK PG NYGYKUS CUL KYNUKXYX UL U LYKPYLHZ ZHKTUS XYTHGLMKUMPHGL COPWO CHASX BYKE LHHG YGX PG IYUWY, UGX MOYBPYC IKYBUPSYX YDIKYLLYX VE VPSPVPG--COH GHC PG IYMYKLVAKN CUL JAPMYUM OHTY PG OYSYGY'L OHALY, COPWO YBYKE WSYBYK TUG CUL HVSPNYX MHBPLPM--MOUM GHM VE NAGIHCXYK VAM VE MOHLY COH PGBYGMYX PM CHASX TUMMYKLVY LYMMSYX. PG MOUM WPKWSY MOY THLWHC YGMOALPULT--GYCL HZ COPWO OUXKYUWOYX IYMYKLVAKN LPTASMUGYHALSE CPMO MOY YTIYKHK'L KYMAKG--CULKPXPWASYX LUKWULMPWUSSE UGX BYKE WSYBYKSE, MOHANO CPMO TAWO WUAMPHG.UGGU IUBSHBGU'L WPKWSY HG MOY WHGMKUKE CUL YGKUIMAKYX VE MOPL YGMOALPULTUGX LIHRY HZ PM UL ISAMUKWO LIYURL HZ MOY XYYXL HZ MOY UGWPYGML.IKPGWY BULPSP, COH LMPSS HWWAIPYX OPL ZHKTYK PTIHKMUGM IHLML, ZHKTYX UWHGGYWMPGN SPGR VYMCYYG MOYLY MCH WPKWSYL. OY BPLPMYX OPL "NHHX ZKPYGXUGGU IUBSHBGU" UL CYSS UL OPL XUANOMYK'L "XPISHTUMPW LUSHG," UGX HZMYGPG OPL WHGLMUGM WHTPGNL UGX NHPGNL VYMCYYG MOY MCH WUTIL VYWUTY WHGZALYXUGX LUPX UM OYSYGY'L COUM OY LOHASX OUBY LUPX UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L UGXBPWY BYKLU.LHHG UZMYK MOY YTIYKHK'L KYMAKG IKPGWY BULPSP PG U WHGBYKLUMPHG UVHAMMOY CUK UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L LYBYKYSE WHGXYTGYX VUKWSUE XY MHSSE, VAM CULAGXYWPXYX UL MH COH HANOM MH VY UIIHPGMYX WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. HGY HZ MOYBPLPMHKL, ALAUSSE LIHRYG HZ UL "U TUG HZ NKYUM TYKPM," OUBPGN XYLWKPVYXOHC OY OUX MOUM XUE LYYG RAMAFHB, MOY GYCSE WOHLYG WOPYZ HZ MOYIYMYKLVAKN TPSPMPU, IKYLPXPGN HBYK MOY YGKHSSTYGM HZ KYWKAPML UM MOYMKYULAKE, WUAMPHALSE BYGMAKYX MH LANNYLM MOUM RAMAFHB CHASX VY MOY TUGMH LUMPLZE USS KYJAPKYTYGML.UGGU IUBSHBGU KYTUKRYX CPMO U TYSUGWOHSE LTPSY MOUM RAMAFHB OUX XHGYGHMOPGN VAM WUALY MOY YTIYKHK UGGHEUGWY."P OUBY MUSRYX UGX MUSRYX UM MOY ULLYTVSE HZ MOY GHVPSPME," IKPGWYBULPSP PGMYKKAIMYX, "VAM MOYE XPX GHM SPLMYG MH TY. P MHSX MOYT OPLYSYWMPHG UL WOPYZ HZ MOY TPSPMPU CHASX GHM ISYULY MOY YTIYKHK. MOYE XPXGHM SPLMYG MH TY."PM'L USS MOPL TUGPU ZHK HIIHLPMPHG," OY CYGM HG. "UGX COH ZHK? PM PLUSS VYWUALY CY CUGM MH UIY MOY ZHHSPLO YGMOALPULT HZ MOHLY TALWHBPMYL,"IKPGWY BULPSP WHGMPGAYX, ZHKNYMMPGN ZHK U THTYGM MOUM MOHANO UM OYSYGY'LHGY OUX MH KPXPWASY MOY THLWHC YGMOALPULT, UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L HGY OUX MHVY YWLMUMPW UVHAM PM. VAM OY KYMKPYBYX OPL TPLMURY UM HGWY. "GHC, PLPM LAPMUVSY MOUM WHAGM RAMAFHB, MOY HSXYLM NYGYKUS PG KALLPU, LOHASXIKYLPXY UM MOUM MKPVAGUS? OY CPSS NYM GHMOPGN ZHK OPL IUPGL! OHC WHASXMOYE TURY U TUG WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ COH WUGGHM THAGM U OHKLY, COH XKHILULSYYI UM U WHAGWPS, UGX OUL MOY BYKE CHKLM THKUSL! U NHHX KYIAMUMPHGOY TUXY ZHK OPTLYSZ UM VAWOUKYLM! P XHG'M LIYUR HZ OPL WUIUWPME UL UNYGYKUS, VAM UM U MPTY SPRY MOPL OHC MOYE UIIHPGM U XYWKYIPM, VSPGX HSXTUG, IHLPMPBYSE VSPGX? U ZPGY PXYU MH OUBY U VSPGX NYGYKUS! OY WUG'M LYYUGEMOPGN. MH ISUE VSPGXTUG'L VSAZZ? OY WUG'M LYY UM USS!"GH HGY KYISPYX MH OPL KYTUKRL.MOPL CUL JAPMY WHKKYWM HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO HZ QASE. VAM HG MOYMCYGME-GPGMO HZ QASE RAMAFHB KYWYPBYX MOY MPMSY HZ IKPGWY. MOPL TPNOMPGXPWUMY U CPLO MH NYM KPX HZ OPT, UGX MOYKYZHKY IKPGWY BULPSP'L HIPGPHGWHGMPGAYX MH VY WHKKYWM MOHANO OY CUL GHM GHC PG UGE OAKKE MH YDIKYLLPM. VAM HG MOY YPNOMO HZ UANALM U WHTTPMMYY, WHGLPLMPGN HZ ZPYSX TUKLOUSLUSMERHB, UKURWOYYB, BEUFTPMPGHB, SHIAROPG, UGX RHWOAVYE TYM MH WHGLPXYKMOY IKHNKYLL HZ MOY CUK. MOPL WHTTPMMYY WUTY MH MOY WHGWSALPHG MOUMHAK ZUPSAKYL CYKY XAY MH U CUGM HZ AGPME PG MOY WHTTUGX UGX MOHANO MOYTYTVYKL HZ MOY WHTTPMMYY CYKY UCUKY HZ MOY YTIYKHK'L XPLSPRY HZ RAMAFHB,UZMYK U LOHKM XYSPVYKUMPHG MOYE UNKYYX MH UXBPLY OPL UIIHPGMTYGM ULWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. MOUM LUTY XUE RAMAFHB CUL UIIHPGMYX WHTTUGXYKPG WOPYZ CPMO ZASS IHCYKL HBYK MOY UKTPYL UGX HBYK MOY COHSY KYNPHGHWWAIPYX VE MOYT.HG MOY GPGMO HZ UANALM IKPGWY BULPSP UM UGGU IUBSHBGU'L UNUPG TYM MOY"TUG HZ NKYUM TYKPM." MOY SUMMYK CUL BYKE UMMYGMPBY MH UGGU IUBSHBGUVYWUALY OY CUGMYX MH VY UIIHPGMYX XPKYWMHK HZ HGY HZ MOY YXAWUMPHGUSYLMUVSPLOTYGML ZHK EHAGN SUXPYL. IKPGWY BULPSP YGMYKYX MOY KHHT CPMO MOYUPK HZ U OUIIE WHGJAYKHK COH OUL UMMUPGYX MOY HVQYWM HZ OPL XYLPKYL."CYSS, OUBY EHA OYUKX MOY NKYUM GYCL? IKPGWY RAMAFHB PL ZPYSX TUKLOUS!USS XPLLYGLPHGL UKY UM UG YGX! P UT LH NSUX, LH XYSPNOMYX! UM SULMCY OUBY U TUG!" LUPX OY, NSUGWPGN LMYKGSE UGX LPNGPZPWUGMSE KHAGX UMYBYKEHGY PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.MOY "TUG HZ NKYUM TYKPM," XYLIPMY OPL XYLPKY MH HVMUPG MOY IHLM HZXPKYWMHK, WHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT KYTPGXPGN IKPGWY BULPSP HZ OPL ZHKTYKHIPGPHG. MOHANO MOPL CUL PTIHSPMY MH IKPGWY BULPSP PG UGGU IUBSHBGU'LXKUCPGN KHHT, UGX USLH MH UGGU IUBSHBGU OYKLYSZ COH OUX KYWYPBYX MOYGYCL CPMO XYSPNOM, OY WHASX GHM KYLPLM MOY MYTIMUMPHG."VAM, IKPGWY, MOYE LUE OY PL VSPGX!" LUPX OY, KYTPGXPGN IKPGWY BULPSP HZOPL HCG CHKXL."YO? GHGLYGLY! OY LYYL CYSS YGHANO," LUPX IKPGWY BULPSP KUIPXSE, PG UXYYI BHPWY UGX CPMO U LSPNOM WHANO--MOY BHPWY UGX WHANO CPMO COPWO OYCUL CHGM MH XPLIHLY HZ USS XPZZPWASMPYL."OY LYYL CYSS YGHANO," OY UXXYX. "UGX COUM P UT LH ISYULYX UVHAM," OYCYGM HG, "PL MOUM HAK LHBYKYPNG OUL NPBYG OPT ZASS IHCYKL HBYK USSMOY UKTPYL UGX MOY COHSY KYNPHG--IHCYKL GH WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ YBYK OUXVYZHKY. OY PL U LYWHGX UAMHWKUM," OY WHGWSAXYX CPMO U BPWMHKPHAL LTPSY."NHX NKUGM PM! NHX NKUGM PM!" LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU.MOY "TUG HZ NKYUM TYKPM," COH CUL LMPSS U GHBPWY PG WHAKM WPKWSYL,CPLOPGN MH ZSUMMYK UGGU IUBSHBGU VE XYZYGXPGN OYK ZHKTYK IHLPMPHG HGMOPL JAYLMPHG, HVLYKBYX:"PM PL LUPX MOUM MOY YTIYKHK CUL KYSAWMUGM MH NPBY RAMAFHB MOHLY IHCYKL.MOYE LUE OY VSALOYX SPRY U NPKS MH COHT QHWHGXY PL KYUX, COYG OY LUPX MHRAMAFHB: 'EHAK YTIYKHK UGX MOY ZUMOYKSUGX UCUKX EHA MOPL OHGHK.'""IYKOUIL MOY OYUKM MHHR GH IUKM PG MOUM LIYYWO," LUPX UGGU IUBSHBGU."HO, GH, GH!" CUKTSE KYQHPGYX IKPGWY BULPSP, COH CHASX GHM GHC EPYSXRAMAFHB MH UGEHGY; PG OPL HIPGPHG RAMAFHB CUL GHM HGSE UXTPKUVSYOPTLYSZ, VAM CUL UXHKYX VE YBYKEVHXE. "GH, MOUM'L PTIHLLPVSY," LUPX OY,"ZHK HAK LHBYKYPNG UIIKYWPUMYX OPT LH OPNOSE VYZHKY.""NHX NKUGM HGSE MOUM IKPGWY RAMAFHB ULLATYL KYUS IHCYK UGX XHYL GHMUSSHC UGEHGY MH IAM U LIHRY PG OPL COYYS," HVLYKBYX UGGU IUBSHBGU.AGXYKLMUGXPGN UM HGWY MH COHT LOY USSAXYX, IKPGWY BULPSP LUPX PG UCOPLIYK:"P RGHC ZHK U ZUWM MOUM RAMAFHB TUXY PM UG UVLHSAMY WHGXPMPHG MOUM MOYMLUKYBPWO LOHASX GHM VY CPMO MOY UKTE. XH EHA RGHC COUM OY LUPX MH MOYYTIYKHK?"UGX IKPGWY BULPSP KYIYUMYX MOY CHKXL LAIIHLYX MH OUBY VYYG LIHRYG VERAMAFHB MH MOY YTIYKHK. "P WUG GYPMOYK IAGPLO OPT PZ OY XHYL CKHGN GHKKYCUKX OPT PZ OY XHYL KPNOM.""HO, U BYKE CPLY TUG PL IKPGWY RAMAFHB! P OUBY RGHCG OPT U SHGN MPTY!""MOYE YBYG LUE," KYTUKRYX MOY "TUG HZ NKYUM TYKPM" COH XPX GHM EYMIHLLYLL WHAKMSE MUWM, "MOUM OPL YDWYSSYGWE TUXY PM UG YDIKYLL WHGXPMPHGMOUM MOY LHBYKYPNG OPTLYSZ LOHASX GHM VY CPMO MOY UKTE."UL LHHG UL OY LUPX MOPL VHMO IKPGWY BULPSP UGX UGGU IUBSHBGU MAKGYX UCUEZKHT OPT UGX NSUGWYX LUXSE UM HGY UGHMOYK CPMO U LPNO UM OPL GUPBYMY.WOUIMYK BPPCOPSY MOPL CUL MURPGN ISUWY PG IYMYKLVAKN MOY ZKYGWO OUX USKYUXE IULLYXLTHSYGLR UGX CYKY XKUCPGN GYUKYK UGX GYUKYK MH THLWHC. GUIHSYHG'LOPLMHKPUG MOPYKL, SPRY HMOYK HZ OPL OPLMHKPUGL, MKEPGN MH QALMPZE OPLOYKH LUEL MOUM OY CUL XKUCG MH MOY CUSSL HZ THLWHC UNUPGLM OPL CPSS. OYPL UL KPNOM UL HMOYK OPLMHKPUGL COH SHHR ZHK MOY YDISUGUMPHG HZ OPLMHKPWYBYGML PG MOY CPSS HZ HGY TUG; OY PL UL KPNOM UL MOY KALLPUG OPLMHKPUGLCOH TUPGMUPG MOUM GUIHSYHG CUL XKUCG MH THLWHC VE MOY LRPSS HZ MOYKALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL. OYKY VYLPXYL MOY SUC HZ KYMKHLIYWMPHG, COPWO KYNUKXLUSS MOY IULM UL U IKYIUKUMPHG ZHK YBYGML MOUM LAVLYJAYGMSE HWWAK,MOY SUC HZ KYWPIKHWPME WHTYL PG, WHGZALPGN MOY COHSY TUMMYK. U NHHXWOYLLISUEYK OUBPGN SHLM U NUTY PL LPGWYKYSE WHGBPGWYX MOUM OPL SHLLKYLASMYX ZKHT U TPLMURY OY TUXY UGX SHHRL ZHK MOUM TPLMURY PG MOYHIYGPGN, VAM ZHKNYML MOUM UM YUWO LMUNY HZ MOY NUTY MOYKY CYKY LPTPSUKTPLMURYL UGX MOUM GHGY HZ OPL THBYL CYKY IYKZYWM. OY HGSE GHMPWYL MOYTPLMURY MH COPWO OY IUEL UMMYGMPHG, VYWUALY OPL HIIHGYGM MHHR UXBUGMUNYHZ PM. OHC TAWO THKY WHTISYD MOUG MOPL PL MOY NUTY HZ CUK, COPWOHWWAKL AGXYK WYKMUPG SPTPML HZ MPTY, UGX COYKY PM PL GHM HGY CPSS MOUMTUGPIASUMYL SPZYSYLL HVQYWML, VAM YBYKEMOPGN KYLASML ZKHT PGGATYKUVSYWHGZSPWML HZ BUKPHAL CPSSL!UZMYK LTHSYGLR GUIHSYHG LHANOM U VUMMSY VYEHGX XHKHNHVAFO UM BEUFTU, UGXMOYG UM MLUKYBH-FUETPLOWOY, VAM PM OUIIYGYX MOUM HCPGN MH U WHGQAGWMPHGHZ PGGATYKUVSY WPKWATLMUGWYL MOY KALLPUGL WHASX GHM NPBY VUMMSY MPSSMOYE KYUWOYX VHKHXPGH, LYBYGME TPSYL ZKHT THLWHC. ZKHT BEUFTU GUIHSYHGHKXYKYX U XPKYWM UXBUGWY HG THLWHC.THLWHA, SU WUIPMUSY ULPUMPJAY XY WY NKUGX YTIPKY, SU BPSSY LUWKYY XYLIYAISYL X'USYDUGXKY, THLWHA UBYW LYL PGGHTVKUVSYL YNSPLYL YG ZHKTY XYIUNHXYL WOPGHPLYL, * MOPL THLWHC NUBY GUIHSYHG'L PTUNPGUMPHG GH KYLM.HG MOY TUKWO ZKHT BEUFTU MH MLUKYBH-FUETPLOWOY OY KHXY OPL SPNOM VUEVHVMUPSYX UTVSYK UWWHTIUGPYX VE OPL NAUKXL, OPL VHXENAUKX, OPL IUNYL,UGX UPXYL-XY-WUTI. VYKMOPYK, OPL WOPYZ HZ LMUZZ, XKHIIYX VYOPGX MHJAYLMPHG U KALLPUG IKPLHGYK WUIMAKYX VE MOY WUBUSKE. ZHSSHCYX VESYSHKNGY X'PXYBPSSY, UG PGMYKIKYMYK, OY HBYKMHHR GUIHSYHG UM U NUSSHIUGX KYPGYX PG OPL OHKLY CPMO UG UTALYX YDIKYLLPHG.     * "THLWHC, MOY ULPUMPW WUIPMUS HZ MOPL NKYUM YTIPKY, MOY     LUWKYX WPME HZ USYDUGXYK'L IYHISY, THLWHC CPMO PML     PGGATYKUVSY WOAKWOYL LOUIYX SPRY WOPGYLY IUNHXUL.""CYSS?" ULRYX GUIHSYHG."HGY HZ ISUMHB'L WHLLUWRL LUEL MOUM ISUMHB'L WHKIL PL QHPGPGN AI CPMOMOY TUPG UKTE UGX MOUM RAMAFHB OUL VYYG UIIHPGMYX WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. OYPL U BYKE LOKYCX UGX NUKKASHAL ZYSSHC."GUIHSYHG LTPSYX UGX MHSX MOYT MH NPBY MOY WHLLUWR U OHKLY UGX VKPGN MOYTUG MH OPT. OY CPLOYX MH MUSR MH OPT OPTLYSZ. LYBYKUS UXQAMUGML NUSSHIYXHZZ, UGX UG OHAK SUMYK, SUBKALORU, MOY LYKZ XYGPLHB OUX OUGXYX HBYKMH KHLMHB, KHXY AI MH GUIHSYHG PG UG HKXYKSE'L QUWRYM UGX HG U ZKYGWOWUBUSKE LUXXSY, CPMO U TYKKE, UGX MPILE ZUWY. GUIHSYHG MHSX OPT MH KPXYVE OPL LPXY UGX VYNUG JAYLMPHGPGN OPT."EHA UKY U WHLLUWR?""EYL, U WHLLUWR, EHAK OHGHK.""MOY WHLLUWR, GHM RGHCPGN PG COUM WHTIUGE OY CUL, ZHK GUIHSYHG'L ISUPGUIIYUKUGWY OUX GHMOPGN UVHAM PM MOUM CHASX KYBYUS MH UG HKPYGMUS TPGXMOY IKYLYGWY HZ U THGUKWO, MUSRYX CPMO YDMKYTY ZUTPSPUKPME HZ MOYPGWPXYGML HZ MOY CUK," LUEL MOPYKL, GUKKUMPGN MOPL YIPLHXY. PGKYUSPME SUBKALORU, OUBPGN NHM XKAGR MOY XUE VYZHKY UGX SYZM OPL TULMYKXPGGYKSYLL, OUX VYYG COPIIYX UGX LYGM MH MOY BPSSUNY PG JAYLM HZWOPWRYGL, COYKY OY YGNUNYX PG SHHMPGN MPSS MOY ZKYGWO MHHR OPT IKPLHGYK.SUBKALORU CUL HGY HZ MOHLY WHUKLY, VUKY-ZUWYX SUWRYEL COH OUBY LYYG USSLHKML HZ MOPGNL, WHGLPXYK PM GYWYLLUKE MH XH YBYKEMOPGN PG U TYUG UGXWAGGPGN CUE, UKY KYUXE MH KYGXYK UGE LHKM HZ LYKBPWY MH MOYPK TULMYK,UGX UKY RYYG UM NAYLLPGN MOYPK TULMYK'L VULYK PTIASLYL, YLIYWPUSSE MOHLYIKHTIMYX VE BUGPME UGX IYMMPGYLL.ZPGXPGN OPTLYSZ PG MOY WHTIUGE HZ GUIHSYHG, COHLY PXYGMPME OY OUX YULPSEUGX LAKYSE KYWHNGPFYX, SUBKALORU CUL GHM PG MOY SYULM UVULOYX VAM TYKYSEXPX OPL AMTHLM MH NUPG OPL GYC TULMYK'L ZUBHK.OY RGYC BYKE CYSS MOUM MOPL CUL GUIHSYHG, VAM GUIHSYHG'L IKYLYGWY WHASXGH THKY PGMPTPXUMY OPT MOUG KHLMHB'L, HK U LYKNYUGM TUQHK'L CPMO MOYKHXL, CHASX OUBY XHGY, ZHK OY OUX GHMOPGN MOUM YPMOYK MOY LYKNYUGM TUQHKHK GUIHSYHG WHASX XYIKPBY OPT HZ.LH OY KUMMSYX HG, MYSSPGN USS MOY NHLLPI OY OUX OYUKX UTHGN MOYHKXYKSPYL. TAWO HZ PM MKAY. VAM COYG GUIHSYHG ULRYX OPT COYMOYK MOYKALLPUGL MOHANOM MOYE CHASX VYUM VHGUIUKMY HK GHM, SUBKALORU LWKYCYX AIOPL YEYL UGX WHGLPXYKYX.PG MOPL JAYLMPHG OY LUC LAVMSY WAGGPGN, UL TYG HZ OPL MEIY LYY WAGGPGNPG YBYKEMOPGN, LH OY ZKHCGYX UGX XPX GHM UGLCYK PTTYXPUMYSE."PM'L SPRY MOPL," OY LUPX MOHANOMZASSE, "PZ MOYKY'L U VUMMSY LHHG, EHAKLCPSS CPG. MOUM'L KPNOM. VAM PZ MOKYY XUEL IULL, MOYG UZMYK MOUM, CYSS,MOYG MOUM LUTY VUMMSY CPSS GHM LHHG VY HBYK."SYSHKNGY X'PXYBPSSY LTPSPGNSE PGMYKIKYMYX MOPL LIYYWO MH GUIHSYHG MOAL:"PZ U VUMMSY MURYL ISUWY CPMOPG MOY GYDM MOKYY XUEL MOY ZKYGWO CPSSCPG, VAM PZ SUMYK, NHX RGHCL COUM CPSS OUIIYG." GUIHSYHG XPX GHM LTPSY,MOHANO OY CUL YBPXYGMSE PG OPNO NHHX OATHK, UGX OY HKXYKYX MOYLY CHKXLMH VY KYIYUMYX.SUBKALORU GHMPWYX MOPL UGX MH YGMYKMUPG OPT ZAKMOYK, IKYMYGXPGN GHM MHRGHC COH GUIHSYHG CUL, UXXYX:"CY RGHC MOUM EHA OUBY VHGUIUKMY UGX MOUM OY OUL VYUMYG YBYKEVHXE PGMOY CHKSX, VAM CY UKY U XPZZYKYGM TUMMYK..."--CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE HK OHCMOPL VPM HZ VHULMZAS IUMKPHMPLT LSPIIYX HAM UM MOY YGX.MOY PGMYKIKYMYK MKUGLSUMYX MOYLY CHKXL CPMOHAM MOY SULM IOKULY, UGXVHGUIUKMY LTPSYX. "MOY EHAGN WHLLUWR TUXY OPL TPNOME PGMYKSHWAMHKLTPSY," LUEL MOPYKL. UZMYK KPXPGN U ZYC IUWYL PG LPSYGWY, GUIHSYHGMAKGYX MH VYKMOPYK UGX LUPX OY CPLOYX MH LYY OHC MOY GYCL MOUM OY CULMUSRPGN MH MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZ, MH MOUM BYKE YTIYKHK COH OUX CKPMMYG OPLPTTHKMUSSE BPWMHKPHAL GUTY HG MOY IEKUTPXL, CHASX UZZYWM MOPL YGZUGM XAXHG. *    * "WOPSX HZ MOY XHG."MOY ZUWM CUL UWWHKXPGNSE WHGBYEYX MH SUBKALORU.SUBKALORU, AGXYKLMUGXPGN MOUM MOPL CUL XHGY MH IYKISYD OPT UGX MOUMGUIHSYHG YDIYWMYX OPT MH VY ZKPNOMYGYX, MH NKUMPZE OPL GYC TULMYKLIKHTIMSE IKYMYGXYX MH VY ULMHGPLOYX UGX UCY-LMKAWR, HIYGYX OPL YEYLCPXY, UGX ULLATYX MOY YDIKYLLPHG OY ALAUSSE IAM HG COYG MURYG MH VYCOPIIYX. "UL LHHG UL GUIHSYHG'L PGMYKIKYMYK OUX LIHRYG," LUEL MOPYKL,"MOY WHLLUWR, LYPFYX VE UTUFYTYGM, XPX GHM AMMYK UGHMOYK CHKX, VAM KHXYHG, OPL YEYL ZPDYX HG MOY WHGJAYKHK COHLY ZUTY OUX KYUWOYX OPT UWKHLLMOY LMYIIYL HZ MOY YULM. USS OPL SHJAUWPME CUL LAXXYGSE UKKYLMYX UGXKYISUWYX VE U GUPBY UGX LPSYGM ZYYSPGN HZ UXTPKUMPHG. GUIHSYHG, UZMYKTURPGN MOY WHLLUWR U IKYLYGM, OUX OPT LYM ZKYY SPRY U VPKX KYLMHKYX MHPML GUMPBY ZPYSXL."GUIHSYHG KHXY HG, XKYUTPGN HZ MOY THLWHC MOUM LH UIIYUSYX MH OPLPTUNPGUMPHG, UGX "MOY VPKX KYLMHKYX MH PML GUMPBY ZPYSXL" NUSSHIYX MHHAK HAMIHLML, PGBYGMPGN HG MOY CUE USS MOUM OUX GHM MURYG ISUWY VAM MOUMOY TYUGM MH KYSUMY MH OPL WHTKUXYL. COUM OUX KYUSSE MURYG ISUWY OY XPXGHM CPLO MH KYSUMY VYWUALY PM LYYTYX MH OPT GHM CHKMO MYSSPGN. OYZHAGX MOY WHLLUWRL, PGJAPKYX ZHK MOY KYNPTYGM HIYKUMPGN CPMO ISUMHB'LXYMUWOTYGM UGX VE YBYGPGN ZHAGX OPL TULMYK, GPWOHSUL KHLMHB, JAUKMYKYXUM EUGRHBH. KHLMHB CUL QALM THAGMPGN MH NH ZHK U KPXY KHAGX MOYGYPNOVHKPGN BPSSUNYL CPMO PSEPG; OY SYM SUBKALORU OUBY UGHMOYK OHKLY UGXMHHR OPT USHGN CPMO OPT.WOUIMYK BPPPIKPGWYLL TUKE CUL GHM PG THLWHC UGX HAM HZ XUGNYK UL IKPGWY UGXKYCLAIIHLYX.UZMYK MOY KYMAKG HZ USIUMEWO ZKHT LTHSYGLR MOY HSX IKPGWY LAXXYGSELYYTYX MH UCURY UL ZKHT U XKYUT. OY HKXYKYX MOY TPSPMPUTYG MH VY WUSSYXAI ZKHT MOY BPSSUNYL UGX UKTYX, UGX CKHMY U SYMMYK MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ PGZHKTPGN OPT MOUM OY OUX KYLHSBYX MH KYTUPG UM VUSX OPSSL MH MOYSULM YDMKYTPME UGX MH XYZYGX PM, SYUBPGN MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'LXPLWKYMPHG MH MURY TYULAKYL HK GHM ZHK MOY XYZYGLY HZ VUSX OPSSL, COYKYHGY HZ KALLPU'L HSXYLM NYGYKUSL CHASX VY WUIMAKYX HK RPSSYX, UGX OYUGGHAGWYX MH OPL OHALYOHSX MOUM OY CHASX KYTUPG UM VUSX OPSSL.VAM COPSY OPTLYSZ KYTUPGPGN, OY NUBY PGLMKAWMPHGL ZHK MOY XYIUKMAKY HZMOY IKPGWYLL UGX XYLLUSSYL CPMO MOY SPMMSY IKPGWY MH VHNAWOUKHBH UGXMOYGWY MH THLWHC. IKPGWYLL TUKE, USUKTYX VE OYK ZUMOYK'L ZYBYKPLO UGXLSYYISYLL UWMPBPME UZMYK OPL IKYBPHAL UIUMOE, WHASX GHM VKPGN OYKLYSZ MHSYUBY OPT USHGY UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY PG OYK SPZY BYGMAKYX MH XPLHVYEOPT. LOY KYZALYX MH NH UCUE UGX OYK ZUMOYK'L ZAKE VKHRY HBYK OYK PG UMYKKPVSY LMHKT. OY KYIYUMYX YBYKE PGQALMPWY OY OUX YBYK PGZSPWMYX HGOYK. MKEPGN MH WHGBPWM OYK, OY MHSX OYK LOY OUX CHKG OPT HAM, OUX WUALYXOPL JAUKKYS CPMO OPL LHG, OUX OUKVHKYX GULME LALIPWPHGL HZ OPT, TURPGNPM MOY HVQYWM HZ OYK SPZY MH IHPLHG OPL YDPLMYGWY, UGX OY XKHBY OYK ZKHTOPL LMAXE MYSSPGN OYK MOUM PZ LOY XPX GHM NH UCUE PM CUL USS MOY LUTYMH OPT. OY XYWSUKYX MOUM OY XPX GHM CPLO MH KYTYTVYK OYK YDPLMYGWY UGXCUKGYX OYK GHM MH XUKY MH SYM OPT LYY OYK. MOY ZUWM MOUM OY XPX GHM, ULLOY OUX ZYUKYX, HKXYK OYK MH VY WUKKPYX UCUE VE ZHKWY VAM HGSE MHSX OYKGHM MH SYM OPT LYY OYK WOYYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE. LOY RGYC PM CUL U IKHHZMOUM PG MOY XYIMO HZ OPL LHAS OY CUL NSUX LOY CUL KYTUPGPGN UM OHTY UGXOUX GHM NHGY UCUE.MOY THKGPGN UZMYK SPMMSY GPWOHSUL OUX SYZM, MOY HSX IKPGWY XHGGYX OPLZASS AGPZHKT UGX IKYIUKYX MH BPLPM MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. OPL WUSYWOYCUL USKYUXE UM MOY XHHK. IKPGWYLL TUKE LUC OPT CUSR HAM HZ MOY OHALY PGOPL AGPZHKT CYUKPGN USS OPL HKXYKL UGX NH XHCG MOY NUKXYG MH KYBPYC OPLUKTYX IYULUGML UGX XHTYLMPW LYKZL. LOY LUM VE MOY CPGXHC SPLMYGPGN MHOPL BHPWY COPWO KYUWOYX OYK ZKHT MOY NUKXYG. LAXXYGSE LYBYKUS TYG WUTYKAGGPGN AI MOY UBYGAY CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWYL.IKPGWYLL TUKE KUG HAM MH MOY IHKWO, XHCG MOY ZSHCYK-VHKXYKYX IUMO, UGXPGMH MOY UBYGAY. U SUKNY WKHCX HZ TPSPMPUTYG UGX XHTYLMPWL CYKY THBPGNMHCUKX OYK, UGX PG MOYPK TPXLM LYBYKUS TYG CYKY LAIIHKMPGN VEMOY UKTIPML UGX XKUNNPGN USHGN U SPMMSY HSX TUG PG U AGPZHKT UGXXYWHKUMPHGL. LOY KUG AI MH OPT UGX, PG MOY ISUE HZ MOY LAGSPNOM MOUMZYSS PG LTUSS KHAGX LIHML MOKHANO MOY LOUXY HZ MOY SPTY-MKYY UBYGAY,WHASX GHM VY LAKY COUM WOUGNY MOYKY CUL PG OPL ZUWY. USS LOY WHASX LYYCUL MOUM OPL ZHKTYK LMYKG UGX XYMYKTPGYX YDIKYLLPHG OUX USMYKYX MH HGYHZ MPTPXPME UGX LAVTPLLPHG. HG LYYPGN OPL XUANOMYK OY THBYX OPL OYSISYLLSPIL UGX TUXY U OHUKLY LHAGX. PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH TURY HAM COUM OYCUGMYX. OY CUL SPZMYX AI, WUKKPYX MH OPL LMAXE, UGX SUPX HG MOY BYKEWHAWO OY OUX LH ZYUKYX HZ SUMY.MOY XHWMHK, COH CUL ZYMWOYX MOUM LUTY GPNOM, VSYX OPT UGX LUPX MOUM MOYIKPGWY OUX OUX U LYPFAKY IUKUSEFPGN OPL KPNOM LPXY.PM CUL VYWHTPGN THKY UGX THKY XUGNYKHAL MH KYTUPG UM VUSX OPSSL, UGXGYDM XUE MOYE THBYX MOY IKPGWY MH VHNAWOUKHBH, MOY XHWMHK UWWHTIUGEPGNOPT.VE MOY MPTY MOYE KYUWOYX VHNAWOUKHBH, XYLLUSSYL UGX MOY SPMMSY IKPGWYOUX USKYUXE SYZM ZHK THLWHC.ZHK MOKYY CYYRL MOY HSX IKPGWY SUE LMKPWRYG VE IUKUSELPL PG MOY GYCOHALY IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX VAPSM UM VHNAWOUKHBH, YBYK PG MOY LUTY LMUMY,NYMMPGN GYPMOYK VYMMYK GHK CHKLY. OY CUL AGWHGLWPHAL UGX SUE SPRYU XPLMHKMYX WHKILY. OY TAMMYKYX AGWYULPGNSE, OPL YEYVKHCL UGX SPILMCPMWOPGN, UGX PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH MYSS COYMOYK OY AGXYKLMHHX COUM CULNHPGN HG UKHAGX OPT HK GHM. HGY MOPGN CUL WYKMUPG--MOUM OY CUL LAZZYKPGNUGX CPLOYX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN. VAM COUM PM CUL, GH HGY WHASX MYSS: PMTPNOM VY LHTY WUIKPWY HZ U LPWR UGX OUSZ-WKUFE TUG, HK PM TPNOM KYSUMYMH IAVSPW UZZUPKL, HK IHLLPVSE MH ZUTPSE WHGWYKGL.MOY XHWMHK LUPX MOPL KYLMSYLLGYLL XPX GHM TYUG UGEMOPGN UGX CUL XAYMH IOELPWUS WUALYL; VAM IKPGWYLL TUKE MOHANOM OY CPLOYX MH MYSSOYK LHTYMOPGN, UGX MOY ZUWM MOUM OYK IKYLYGWY USCUEL PGWKYULYX OPLKYLMSYLLGYLL WHGZPKTYX OYK HIPGPHG.OY CUL YBPXYGMSE LAZZYKPGN VHMO IOELPWUSSE UGX TYGMUSSE. MOYKY CUL GHOHIY HZ KYWHBYKE. PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY ZHK OPT MH MKUBYS, PM CHASX GHM XHMH SYM OPT XPY HG MOY KHUX. "CHASX PM GHM VY VYMMYK PZ MOY YGX XPX WHTY,MOY BYKE YGX?" IKPGWYLL TUKE LHTYMPTYL MOHANOM. GPNOM UGX XUE, OUKXSELSYYIPGN UM USS, LOY CUMWOYX OPT UGX, MYKKPVSY MH LUE, HZMYG CUMWOYXOPT GHM CPMO OHIY HZ ZPGXPGN LPNGL HZ PTIKHBYTYGM VAM CPLOPGN MH ZPGXLETIMHTL HZ MOY UIIKHUWO HZ MOY YGX.LMKUGNY UL PM CUL MH OYK MH UWRGHCSYXNY MOPL ZYYSPGN PG OYKLYSZ, EYMMOYKY PM CUL. UGX COUM LYYTYX LMPSS THKY MYKKPVSY MH OYK CUL MOUM LPGWYOYK ZUMOYK'L PSSGYLL VYNUG (IYKOUIL YBYG LHHGYK, COYG LOY LMUEYX CPMOOPT YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OUIIYG), USS MOY IYKLHGUS XYLPKYL UGX OHIYLMOUM OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG HK LSYYIPGN CPMOPG OYK OUX UCURYGYX. MOHANOMLMOUM OUX GHM YGMYKYX OYK TPGX ZHK EYUKL--MOHANOML HZ U SPZY ZKYY ZKHTMOY ZYUK HZ OYK ZUMOYK, UGX YBYG MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ SHBY UGX HZ ZUTPSEOUIIPGYLL--ZSHUMYX WHGMPGAUSSE PG OYK PTUNPGUMPHG SPRY MYTIMUMPHGLHZ MOY XYBPS. MOKALM MOYT ULPXY UL LOY CHASX, JAYLMPHGL WHGMPGAUSSEKYWAKKYX MH OYK UL MH OHC LOY CHASX HKXYK OYK SPZY GHC, UZMYK MOUM.MOYLY CYKY MYTIMUMPHGL HZ MOY XYBPS UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE RGYC PM. LOY RGYCMOUM MOY LHSY CYUIHG UNUPGLM OPT CUL IKUEYK, UGX LOY MKPYX MH IKUE. LOYULLATYX UG UMMPMAXY HZ IKUEYK, SHHRYX UM MOY PWHGL, KYIYUMYX MOY CHKXLHZ U IKUEYK, VAM LOY WHASX GHM IKUE. LOY ZYSM MOUM U XPZZYKYGM CHKSX OUXGHC MURYG IHLLYLLPHG HZ OYK--MOY SPZY HZ U CHKSX HZ LMKYGAHAL UGX ZKYYUWMPBPME, JAPMY HIIHLYX MH MOY LIPKPMAUS CHKSX PG COPWO MPSS GHC LOYOUX VYYG WHGZPGYX UGX PG COPWO OYK NKYUMYLM WHTZHKM OUX VYYG IKUEYK.LOY WHASX GHM IKUE, WHASX GHM CYYI, UGX CHKSXSE WUKYL MHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZOYK.PM CUL VYWHTPGN XUGNYKHAL MH KYTUPG PG VHNAWOUKHBH. GYCL HZ MOY UIIKHUWOHZ MOY ZKYGWO WUTY ZKHT USS LPXYL, UGX PG HGY BPSSUNY, MYG TPSYL ZKHTVHNAWOUKHBH, U OHTYLMYUX OUX VYYG SHHMYX VE ZKYGWO TUKUAXYKL.MOY XHWMHK PGLPLMYX HG MOY GYWYLLPME HZ THBPGN MOY IKPGWY; MOYIKHBPGWPUS TUKLOUS HZ MOY GHVPSPME LYGM UG HZZPWPUS MH IKPGWYLL TUKEMH IYKLAUXY OYK MH NYM UCUE UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY, UGX MOY OYUX HZ MOYKAKUS IHSPWY OUBPGN WHTY MH VHNAWOUKHBH AKNYX MOY LUTY MOPGN, LUEPGNMOUM MOY ZKYGWO CYKY HGSE LHTY MCYGME-ZPBY TPSYL UCUE, MOUM ZKYGWOIKHWSUTUMPHGL CYKY WPKWASUMPGN PG MOY BPSSUNYL, UGX MOUM PZ MOY IKPGWYLLXPX GHM MURY OYK ZUMOYK UCUE VYZHKY MOY ZPZMYYGMO, OY WHASX GHM UGLCYKZHK MOY WHGLYJAYGWYL.MOY IKPGWYLL XYWPXYX MH SYUBY HG MOY ZPZMYYGMO. MOY WUKYL HZ IKYIUKUMPHGUGX NPBPGN HKXYKL, ZHK COPWO YBYKEHGY WUTY MH OYK, HWWAIPYX OYK USS XUE.LOY LIYGM MOY GPNOM HZ MOY ZHAKMYYGMO UL ALAUS, CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN, PGMOY KHHT GYDM MH MOY HGY COYKY MOY IKPGWY SUE. LYBYKUS MPTYL, CURPGN AI,LOY OYUKX OPL NKHUGL UGX TAMMYKPGN, MOY WKYUR HZ OPL VYX, UGX MOY LMYILHZ MPROHG UGX MOY XHWMHK COYG MOYE MAKGYX OPT HBYK. LYBYKUS MPTYL LOYSPLMYGYX UM MOY XHHK, UGX PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM OPL TAMMYKPGNL CYKYSHAXYK MOUG ALAUS UGX MOUM MOYE MAKGYX OPT HBYK HZMYGYK. LOY WHASX GHMLSYYI UGX LYBYKUS MPTYL CYGM MH MOY XHHK UGX SPLMYGYX, CPLOPGN MH YGMYKVAM GHM XYWPXPGN MH XH LH. MOHANO OY XPX GHM LIYUR, IKPGWYLL TUKE LUCUGX RGYC OHC AGISYULUGM YBYKE LPNG HZ UGDPYME HG OPL UWWHAGM CUL MH OPT.LOY OUX GHMPWYX CPMO COUM XPLLUMPLZUWMPHG OY MAKGYX ZKHT MOY SHHR LOYLHTYMPTYL PGBHSAGMUKPSE ZPDYX HG OPT. LOY RGYC MOUM OYK NHPGN PG XAKPGNMOY GPNOM UM UG AGALAUS OHAK CHASX PKKPMUMY OPT.VAM GYBYK OUX LOY ZYSM LH NKPYBYX ZHK OPT HK LH TAWO UZKUPX HZ SHLPGNOPT. LOY KYWUSSYX USS OYK SPZY CPMO OPT UGX PG YBYKE CHKX UGX UWM HZ OPLZHAGX UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL SHBY HZ OYK. HWWULPHGUSSE UTPX MOYLY TYTHKPYLMYTIMUMPHGL HZ MOY XYBPS CHASX LAKNY PGMH OYK PTUNPGUMPHG: MOHANOML HZOHC MOPGNL CHASX VY UZMYK OPL XYUMO, UGX OHC OYK GYC, SPVYKUMYX SPZYCHASX VY HKXYKYX. VAM LOY XKHBY MOYLY MOHANOML UCUE CPMO XPLNALM. MHCUKXTHKGPGN OY VYWUTY JAPYM UGX LOY ZYSS ULSYYI.LOY CHRY SUMY. MOUM LPGWYKPME COPWO HZMYG WHTYL CPMO CURPGN LOHCYX OYKWSYUKSE COUM WOPYZSE WHGWYKGYX OYK UVHAM OYK ZUMOYK'L PSSGYLL. HG CURPGNLOY SPLMYGYX MH COUM CUL NHPGN HG VYOPGX MOY XHHK UGX, OYUKPGN OPTNKHUG, LUPX MH OYKLYSZ CPMO U LPNO MOUM MOPGNL CYKY LMPSS MOY LUTY."VAM COUM WHASX OUBY OUIIYGYX? COUM XPX P CUGM? P CUGM OPL XYUMO!" LOYWKPYX CPMO U ZYYSPGN HZ SHUMOPGN ZHK OYKLYSZ.LOY CULOYX, XKYLLYX, LUPX OYK IKUEYKL, UGX CYGM HAM MH MOY IHKWO. PGZKHGM HZ PM LMHHX WUKKPUNYL CPMOHAM OHKLYL UGX MOPGNL CYKY VYPGN IUWRYXPGMH MOY BYOPWSYL.PM CUL U CUKT, NKUE THKGPGN. IKPGWYLL TUKE LMHIIYX UM MOY IHKWO, LMPSSOHKKPZPYX VE OYK LIPKPMAUS VULYGYLL UGX MKEPGN MH UKKUGNY OYK MOHANOMLVYZHKY NHPGN MH OYK ZUMOYK. MOY XHWMHK WUTY XHCGLMUPKL UGX CYGM HAM MHOYK."OY PL U SPMMSY VYMMYK MHXUE," LUPX OY. "P CUL SHHRPGN ZHK EHA. HGY WUGTURY HAM LHTYMOPGN HZ COUM OY PL LUEPGN. OPL OYUX PL WSYUKYK. WHTY PG,OY PL ULRPGN ZHK EHA..."IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OYUKM VYUM LH BPHSYGMSE UM MOPL GYCL MOUM LOY NKYC IUSYUGX SYUGYX UNUPGLM MOY CUSS MH RYYI ZKHT ZUSSPGN. MH LYY OPT, MUSR MHOPT, ZYYS OPL YEYL HG OYK GHC MOUM OYK COHSY LHAS CUL HBYKZSHCPGN CPMOMOHLY XKYUXZAS, CPWRYX MYTIMUMPHGL, CUL U MHKTYGM HZ QHE UGX MYKKHK."WHTY," LUPX MOY XHWMHK.IKPGWYLL TUKE YGMYKYX OYK ZUMOYK'L KHHT UGX CYGM AI MH OPL VYX. OY CULSEPGN HG OPL VUWR IKHIIYX AI OPNO, UGX OPL LTUSS VHGE OUGXL CPMOMOYPK RGHMMYX IAKISY BYPGL CYKY SEPGN HG MOY JAPSM; OPL SYZM YEY NUFYXLMKUPNOM VYZHKY OPT, OPL KPNOM YEY CUL UCKE, UGX OPL VKHCL UGX SPILTHMPHGSYLL. OY LYYTYX USMHNYMOYK LH MOPG, LTUSS, UGX IUMOYMPW. OPL ZUWYLYYTYX MH OUBY LOKPBYSYX HK TYSMYX; OPL ZYUMAKYL OUX NKHCG LTUSSYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE CYGM AI UGX RPLLYX OPL OUGX. OPL SYZM OUGX IKYLLYX OYKLLH MOUM LOY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM OY OUX SHGN VYYG CUPMPGN ZHK OYK MH WHTY. OYMCPMWOYX OYK OUGX, UGX OPL VKHCL UGX SPIL JAPBYKYX UGNKPSE.LOY SHHRYX UM OPT PG XPLTUE MKEPGN MH NAYLL COUM OY CUGMYX HZ OYK. COYGLOY WOUGNYX OYK IHLPMPHG LH MOUM OPL SYZM YEY WHASX LYY OYK ZUWY OYWUSTYX XHCG, GHM MURPGN OPL YEYL HZZ OYK ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL. MOYG OPL SPILUGX MHGNAY THBYX, LHAGXL WUTY, UGX OY VYNUG MH LIYUR, NUFPGN MPTPXSE UGXPTISHKPGNSE UM OYK, YBPXYGMSE UZKUPX MOUM LOY TPNOM GHM AGXYKLMUGX.LMKUPGPGN USS OYK ZUWASMPYL IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRYX UM OPT. MOY WHTPWYZZHKML CPMO COPWO OY THBYX OPL MHGNAY TUXY OYK XKHI OYK YEYL UGX CPMOXPZZPWASME KYIKYLL MOY LHVL MOUM KHLY MH OYK MOKHUM. OY LUPX LHTYMOPGN,KYIYUMPGN MOY LUTY CHKXL LYBYKUS MPTYL. LOY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYT,VAM MKPYX MH NAYLL COUM OY CUL LUEPGN UGX PGJAPKPGNSE KYIYUMYX MOY CHKXLOY AMMYKYX."TTT...UK...UMY...UMY..." OY KYIYUMYX LYBYKUS MPTYL.PM CUL JAPMY PTIHLLPVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX MOYLY LHAGXL. MOY XHWMHK MOHANOMOY OUX NAYLLYX MOYT, UGX PGJAPKPGNSE KYIYUMYX: "TUKE, UKY EHA UZKUPX?"MOY IKPGWY LOHHR OPL OYUX, UNUPG KYIYUMYX MOY LUTY LHAGXL."TE TPGX, TE TPGX UWOYL?" JAYLMPHGYX IKPGWYLL TUKE.OY TUXY U TATVSPGN LHAGX PG WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ MOPL, MHHR OYK OUGX, UGXVYNUG IKYLLPGN PM MH XPZZYKYGM IUKML HZ OPL VKYULM UL PZ MKEPGN MH ZPGXMOY KPNOM ISUWY ZHK PM."USCUEL MOHANOML... UVHAM EHA... MOHANOML..." OY MOYG AMMYKYX TAWOTHKY WSYUKSE MOUG OY OUX XHGY VYZHKY, GHC MOUM OY CUL LAKY HZ VYPGNAGXYKLMHHX.IKPGWYLL TUKE IKYLLYX OYK OYUX UNUPGLM OPL OUGX, MKEPGN MH OPXY OYK LHVLUGX MYUKL.OY THBYX OPL OUGX HBYK OYK OUPK."P OUBY VYYG WUSSPGN EHA USS GPNOM..." OY VKHANOM HAM."PZ HGSE P OUX RGHCG..." LOY LUPX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL. "P CUL UZKUPX MHWHTY PG."OY IKYLLYX OYK OUGX."CYKYG'M EHA ULSYYI?""GH, P XPX GHM LSYYI," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, LOURPGN OYK OYUX.AGWHGLWPHALSE PTPMUMPGN OYK ZUMOYK, LOY GHC MKPYX MH YDIKYLL OYKLYSZ ULOY XPX, UL TAWO UL IHLLPVSY VE LPNGL, UGX OYK MHGNAY MHH LYYTYX MH THBYCPMO XPZZPWASME."XYUK HGY... XYUKYLM..." IKPGWYLL TUKE WHASX GHM JAPMY TURY HAM COUM OYOUX LUPX, VAM ZKHT OPL SHHR PM CUL WSYUK MOUM OY OUX AMMYKYX U MYGXYKWUKYLLPGN CHKX LAWO UL OY OUX GYBYK ALYX MH OYK VYZHKY. "COE XPXG'M EHAWHTY PG?""UGX P CUL CPLOPGN ZHK OPL XYUMO!" MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE.OY CUL LPSYGM UCOPSY."MOUGR EHA... XUANOMYK XYUK!... ZHK USS, ZHK USS... ZHKNPBY!... MOUGREHA!... ZHKNPBY!... MOUGR EHA!..." UGX MYUKL VYNUG MH ZSHC ZKHT OPLYEYL. "WUSS UGXKYC!" OY LUPX LAXXYGSE, UGX U WOPSXPLO, MPTPX YDIKYLLPHGHZ XHAVM LOHCYX PMLYSZ HG OPL ZUWY UL OY LIHRY.OY OPTLYSZ LYYTYX UCUKY MOUM OPL XYTUGX CUL TYUGPGNSYLL. LH UM SYULM PMLYYTYX MH IKPGWYLL TUKE."P OUBY U SYMMYK ZKHT OPT," LOY KYISPYX.OY NSUGWYX UM OYK CPMO MPTPX LAKIKPLY."COYKY PL OY?""OY'L CPMO MOY UKTE, ZUMOYK, UM LTHSYGLR."OY WSHLYX OPL YEYL UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM U SHGN MPTY. MOYG UL PZ PGUGLCYK MH OPL XHAVML UGX MH WHGZPKT MOY ZUWM MOUM GHC OY AGXYKLMHHX UGXKYTYTVYKYX YBYKEMOPGN, OY GHXXYX OPL OYUX UGX KYHIYGYX OPL YEYL."EYL," OY LUPX, LHZMSE UGX XPLMPGWMSE. "KALLPU OUL IYKPLOYX. MOYE'BYXYLMKHEYX OYK."UGX OY VYNUG MH LHV, UGX UNUPG MYUKL ZSHCYX ZKHT OPL YEYL. IKPGWYLL TUKEWHASX GH SHGNYK KYLMKUPG OYKLYSZ UGX CYIM COPSY LOY NUFYX UM OPL ZUWY.UNUPG OY WSHLYX OPL YEYL. OPL LHVL WYULYX, OY IHPGMYX MH OPL YEYL, UGXMPROHG, AGXYKLMUGXPGN OPT, CPIYX UCUE MOY MYUKL.MOYG OY UNUPG HIYGYX OPL YEYL UGX LUPX LHTYMOPGN GHGY HZ MOYT WHASXAGXYKLMUGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY, MPSS UM SULM MPROHG AGXYKLMHHX UGX KYIYUMYXPM. IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX LHANOM MOY TYUGPGN HZ OPL CHKXL PG MOY THHX PGCOPWO OY OUX QALM VYYG LIYURPGN. LOY MOHANOM OY CUL LIYURPGN HZ KALLPU,HK IKPGWY UGXKYC, HZ OYKLYSZ, HZ OPL NKUGXLHG, HK HZ OPL HCG XYUMO, UGXLH LOY WHASX GHM NAYLL OPL CHKXL."IAM HG EHAK COPMY XKYLL. P SPRY PM," CUL COUM OY LUPX.OUBPGN AGXYKLMHHX MOPL IKPGWYLL TUKE LHVVYX LMPSS SHAXYK, UGX MOY XHWMHKMURPGN OYK UKT SYX OYK HAM MH MOY BYKUGXU, LHHMOPGN OYK UGX MKEPGN MHIYKLAUXY OYK MH IKYIUKY ZHK OYK QHAKGYE. COYG LOY OUX SYZM MOY KHHT MOYIKPGWY UNUPG VYNUG LIYURPGN UVHAM OPL LHG, UVHAM MOY CUK, UGX UVHAM MOYYTIYKHK, UGNKPSE MCPMWOPGN OPL VKHCL UGX KUPLPGN OPL OHUKLY BHPWY, UGXMOYG OY OUX U LYWHGX UGX ZPGUS LMKHRY.IKPGWYLL TUKE LMUEYX HG MOY BYKUGXU. MOY XUE OUX WSYUKYX, PM CUL OHM UGXLAGGE. LOY WHASX AGXYKLMUGX GHMOPGN, MOPGR HZ GHMOPGN UGX ZYYS GHMOPGN,YDWYIM IULLPHGUMY SHBY ZHK OYK ZUMOYK, SHBY LAWO UL LOY MOHANOM LOY OUXGYBYK ZYSM MPSS MOUM THTYGM. LOY KUG HAM LHVVPGN PGMH MOY NUKXYG UGX ULZUK UL MOY IHGX, USHGN MOY UBYGAYL HZ EHAGN SPTY MKYYL IKPGWY UGXKYC OUXISUGMYX."EYL... P... P... P CPLOYX ZHK OPL XYUMO! EYL, P CUGMYX PM MH YGXJAPWRYK.... P CPLOYX MH VY UM IYUWY.... UGX COUM CPSS VYWHTY HZ TY? COUMALY CPSS IYUWY VY COYG OY PL GH SHGNYK OYKY?" IKPGWYLL TUKE TAKTAKYX,IUWPGN MOY NUKXYG CPMO OAKKPYX LMYIL UGX IKYLLPGN OYK OUGXL MH OYK VHLHTCOPWO OYUBYX CPMO WHGBASLPBY LHVL.COYG LOY OUX WHTISYMYX MOY MHAK HZ MOY NUKXYG, COPWO VKHANOM OYK UNUPGMH MOY OHALY, LOY LUC TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY--COH OUX KYTUPGYX UMVHNAWOUKHBH UGX XPX GHM CPLO MH SYUBY PM--WHTPGN MHCUKX OYK CPMO ULMKUGNYK. MOPL CUL MOY TUKLOUS HZ MOY GHVPSPME HZ MOY XPLMKPWM, COHOUX WHTY IYKLHGUSSE MH IHPGM HAM MH MOY IKPGWYLL MOY GYWYLLPME ZHK OYKIKHTIM XYIUKMAKY. IKPGWYLL TUKE SPLMYGYX CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN OPT; LOYSYX OPT MH MOY OHALY, HZZYKYX OPT SAGWO, UGX LUM XHCG CPMO OPT. MOYG,YDWALPGN OYKLYSZ, LOY CYGM MH MOY XHHK HZ MOY HSX IKPGWY'L KHHT. MOYXHWMHK WUTY HAM CPMO UG UNPMUMYX ZUWY UGX LUPX LOY WHASX GHM YGMYK."NH UCUE, IKPGWYLL! NH UCUE... NH UCUE!"LOY KYMAKGYX MH MOY NUKXYG UGX LUM XHCG HG MOY NKULL UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOYLSHIY VE MOY IHGX, COYKY GH HGY WHASX LYY OYK. LOY XPX GHM RGHC OHCSHGN LOY OUX VYYG MOYKY COYG LOY CUL UKHALYX VE MOY LHAGX HZ U CHTUG'LZHHMLMYIL KAGGPGN USHGN MOY IUMO. LOY KHLY UGX LUC XAGEULOU OYK TUPX,COH CUL YBPXYGMSE SHHRPGN ZHK OYK, UGX COH LMHIIYX LAXXYGSE UL PZ PGUSUKT HG LYYPGN OYK TPLMKYLL."ISYULY WHTY, IKPGWYLL... MOY IKPGWY," LUPX XAGEULOU PG U VKYURPGNBHPWY."PTTYXPUMYSE, P'T WHTPGN, P'T WHTPGN!" KYISPYX MOY IKPGWYLL OAKKPYXSE,GHM NPBPGN XAGEULOU MPTY MH ZPGPLO COUM LOY CUL LUEPGN, UGX MKEPGN MHUBHPX LYYPGN MOY NPKS LOY KUG MHCUKX MOY OHALY."IKPGWYLL, PM'L NHX'L CPSS! EHA TALM VY IKYIUKYX ZHK YBYKEMOPGN," LUPXMOY TUKLOUS, TYYMPGN OYK UM MOY OHALY XHHK."SYM TY USHGY; PM'L GHM MKAY!" LOY WKPYX UGNKPSE MH OPT.MOY XHWMHK MKPYX MH LMHI OYK. LOY IALOYX OPT ULPXY UGX KUG MH OYKZUMOYK'L XHHK. "COE UKY MOYLY IYHISY CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWYL LMHIIPGN TY?P XHG'M CUGM UGE HZ MOYT! UGX COUM UKY MOYE XHPGN OYKY?" LOY MOHANOM.LOY HIYGYX MOY XHHK UGX MOY VKPNOM XUESPNOM PG MOUM IKYBPHALSE XUKRYGYXKHHT LMUKMSYX OYK. PG MOY KHHT CYKY OYK GAKLY UGX HMOYK CHTYG. MOYE USSXKYC VUWR ZKHT MOY VYX, TURPGN CUE ZHK OYK. OY CUL LMPSS SEPGN HG MOYVYX UL VYZHKY, VAM MOY LMYKG YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL JAPYM ZUWY TUXY IKPGWYLLTUKE LMHI LOHKM HG MOY MOKYLOHSX."GH, OY'L GHM XYUX--PM'L PTIHLLPVSY!" LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ UGX UIIKHUWOYXOPT, UGX KYIKYLLPGN MOY MYKKHK MOUM LYPFYX OYK, LOY IKYLLYX OYK SPILMH OPL WOYYR. VAM LOY LMYIIYX VUWR PTTYXPUMYSE. USS MOY ZHKWY HZ MOYMYGXYKGYLL LOY OUX VYYG ZYYSPGN ZHK OPT BUGPLOYX PGLMUGMSE UGX CULKYISUWYX VE U ZYYSPGN HZ OHKKHK UM COUM SUE MOYKY VYZHKY OYK. "GH, OYPL GH THKY! OY PL GHM, VAM OYKY COYKY OY CUL PL LHTYMOPGN AGZUTPSPUK UGXOHLMPSY, LHTY XKYUXZAS, MYKKPZEPGN, UGX KYIYSSYGM TELMYKE!" UGX OPXPGNOYK ZUWY PG OYK OUGXL, IKPGWYLL TUKE LUGR PGMH MOY UKTL HZ MOY XHWMHK,COH OYSX OYK AI.PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MPROHG UGX MOY XHWMHK MOY CHTYG CULOYX COUM OUX VYYGMOY IKPGWY, MPYX OPL OYUX AI CPMO U OUGXRYKWOPYZ MOUM MOY THAMO LOHASXGHM LMPZZYG COPSY HIYG, UGX CPMO UGHMOYK OUGXRYKWOPYZ MPYX MHNYMOYK MOYSYNL MOUM CYKY USKYUXE LIKYUXPGN UIUKM. MOYG MOYE XKYLLYX OPT PG AGPZHKTCPMO OPL XYWHKUMPHGL UGX ISUWYX OPL LOKPBYSYX SPMMSY VHXE HG U MUVSY.OYUBYG HGSE RGHCL COH UKKUGNYX USS MOPL UGX COYG, VAM PM USS NHM XHGYUL PZ HZ PML HCG UWWHKX. MHCUKX GPNOM WUGXSYL CYKY VAKGPGN KHAGX OPLWHZZPG, U IUSS CUL LIKYUX HBYK PM, MOY ZSHHK CUL LMKYCG CPMO LIKUEL HZQAGPIYK, U IKPGMYX VUGX CUL MAWRYX PG AGXYK OPL LOKPBYSYX OYUX, UGX PG UWHKGYK HZ MOY KHHT LUM U WOUGMYK KYUXPGN MOY ILUSTL.QALM UL OHKLYL LOE UGX LGHKM UGX NUMOYK UVHAM U XYUX OHKLY, LH MOYPGTUMYL HZ MOY OHALY UGX LMKUGNYKL WKHCXYX PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT KHAGXMOY WHZZPG--MOY TUKLOUS, MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK, IYULUGM CHTYG--UGX USS CPMOZPDYX UGX ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL, WKHLLPGN MOYTLYSBYL, VHCYX UGX RPLLYX MOY HSXIKPGWY'L WHSX UGX LMPZZYGYX OUGX.WOUIMYK PDAGMPS IKPGWY UGXKYC LYMMSYX PG VHNAWOUKHBH PML HCGYKL OUX USCUEL VYYGUVLYGMYYL, UGX PML IYULUGML CYKY HZ JAPMY U XPZZYKYGM WOUKUWMYK ZKHTMOHLY HZ VUSX OPSSL. MOYE XPZZYKYX ZKHT MOYT PG LIYYWO, XKYLL, UGXXPLIHLPMPHG. MOYE CYKY WUSSYX LMYIIY IYULUGML. MOY HSX IKPGWY ALYX MHUIIKHBY HZ MOYT ZHK MOYPK YGXAKUGWY UM CHKR COYG MOYE WUTY MH VUSX OPSSLMH OYSI CPMO MOY OUKBYLM HK MH XPN IHGXL, UGX XPMWOYL, VAM OY XPLSPRYXMOYT ZHK MOYPK VHHKPLOGYLL.IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SULM LMUE UM VHNAWOUKHBH, COYG OY PGMKHXAWYX OHLIPMUSLUGX LWOHHSL UGX KYXAWYX MOY JAPMKYGM MOY IYULUGML OUX MH IUE, OUX GHMLHZMYGYX MOYPK XPLIHLPMPHG VAM OUX HG MOY WHGMKUKE LMKYGNMOYGYX PGMOYT MOY MKUPML HZ WOUKUWMYK MOY HSX IKPGWY WUSSYX VHHKPLOGYLL. BUKPHALHVLWAKY KATHKL CYKY USCUEL WAKKYGM UTHGN MOYT: UM HGY MPTY U KATHK MOUMMOYE CHASX USS VY YGKHSSYX UL WHLLUWRL; UM UGHMOYK HZ U GYC KYSPNPHG MHCOPWO MOYE CYKY USS MH VY WHGBYKMYX; MOYG HZ LHTY IKHWSUTUMPHG HZ MOYMLUK'L UGX HZ UG HUMO MH MOY MLUK IUAS PG 1797 (PG WHGGYWMPHG CPMO COPWOPM CUL KATHKYX MOUM ZKYYXHT OUX VYYG NKUGMYX MOYT VAM MOY SUGXHCGYKL OUXLMHIIYX PM), MOYG HZ IYMYK ZYXHKHBPWO'L KYMAKG MH MOY MOKHGY PG LYBYGEYUKL' MPTY, COYG YBYKEMOPGN CHASX VY TUXY ZKYY UGX LH "LPTISY" MOUMMOYKY CHASX VY GH KYLMKPWMPHGL. KATHKL HZ MOY CUK CPMO VHGUIUKMY UGXOPL PGBULPHG CYKY WHGGYWMYX PG MOYPK TPGXL CPMO MOY LUTY LHKM HZ BUNAYGHMPHGL HZ UGMPWOKPLM, MOY YGX HZ MOY CHKSX, UGX "IAKY ZKYYXHT."PG MOY BPWPGPME HZ VHNAWOUKHBH CYKY SUKNY BPSSUNYL VYSHGNPGN MH MOYWKHCG HK MH HCGYKL COHLY LYKZL IUPX JAPMKYGM UGX WHASX CHKR COYKY MOYEISYULYX. MOYKY CYKY BYKE ZYC KYLPXYGM SUGXSHKXL PG MOY GYPNOVHKOHHXUGX USLH BYKE ZYC XHTYLMPW HK SPMYKUMY LYKZL, UGX PG MOY SPBYL HZ MOYIYULUGMKE HZ MOHLY IUKML MOY TELMYKPHAL AGXYKWAKKYGML PG MOY SPZY HZMOY KALLPUG IYHISY, MOY WUALYL UGX TYUGPGN HZ COPWO UKY LH VUZZSPGN MHWHGMYTIHKUKPYL, CYKY THKY WSYUKSE UGX LMKHGNSE GHMPWYUVSY MOUG UTHGNHMOYKL. HGY PGLMUGWY, COPWO OUX HWWAKKYX LHTY MCYGME EYUKL VYZHKY, CULU THBYTYGM UTHGN MOY IYULUGML MH YTPNKUMY MH LHTY AGRGHCG "CUKT KPBYKL."OAGXKYXL HZ IYULUGML, UTHGN MOYT MOY VHNAWOUKHBH ZHSR, LAXXYGSE VYNUGLYSSPGN MOYPK WUMMSY UGX THBPGN PG COHSY ZUTPSPYL MHCUKX MOY LHAMOYULM.UL VPKXL TPNKUMY MH LHTYCOYKY VYEHGX MOY LYU, LH MOYLY TYG CPMO MOYPKCPBYL UGX WOPSXKYG LMKYUTYX MH MOY LHAMOYULM, MH IUKML COYKY GHGY HZMOYT OUX YBYK VYYG. MOYE LYM HZZ PG WUKUBUGL, VHANOM MOYPK ZKYYXHT HGYVE HGY HK KUG UCUE, UGX XKHBY HK CUSRYX MHCUKX MOY "CUKT KPBYKL." TUGEHZ MOYT CYKY IAGPLOYX, LHTY LYGM MH LPVYKPU, TUGE XPYX HZ WHSX UGXOAGNYK HG MOY KHUX, TUGE KYMAKGYX HZ MOYPK HCG UWWHKX, UGX MOY THBYTYGMXPYX XHCG HZ PMLYSZ QALM UL PM OUX LIKAGN AI, CPMOHAM UIIUKYGM KYULHG.VAM LAWO AGXYKWAKKYGML LMPSS YDPLMYX UTHGN MOY IYHISY UGX NUMOYKYX GYCZHKWYL KYUXE MH TUGPZYLM MOYTLYSBYL QALM UL LMKUGNYSE, AGYDIYWMYXSE, UGXUM MOY LUTY MPTY LPTISE, GUMAKUSSE, UGX ZHKWPVSE. GHC PG 1812, MH UGEHGYSPBPGN PG WSHLY MHAWO CPMO MOYLY IYHISY PM CUL UIIUKYGM MOUM MOYLYAGXYKWAKKYGML CYKY UWMPGN LMKHGNSE UGX GYUKPGN UG YKAIMPHG.USIUMEWO, COH OUX KYUWOYX VHNAWOUKHBH LOHKMSE VYZHKY MOY HSX IKPGWY'LXYUMO, GHMPWYX UG UNPMUMPHG UTHGN MOY IYULUGML, UGX MOUM WHGMKUKE MHCOUM CUL OUIIYGPGN PG MOY VUSX OPSSL XPLMKPWM, COYKY HBYK U KUXPAL HZZHKME TPSYL USS MOY IYULUGML CYKY THBPGN UCUE UGX SYUBPGN MOYPK BPSSUNYLMH VY XYBULMUMYX VE MOY WHLLUWRL, MOY IYULUGML PG MOY LMYIIY KYNPHGKHAGX VHNAWOUKHBH CYKY, PM CUL KATHKYX, PG MHAWO CPMO MOY ZKYGWO,KYWYPBYX SYUZSYML ZKHT MOYT MOUM IULLYX ZKHT OUGX MH OUGX, UGX XPX GHMTPNKUMY. OY SYUKGYX ZKHT XHTYLMPW LYKZL SHEUS MH OPT MOUM MOY IYULUGMRUKI, COH IHLLYLLYX NKYUM PGZSAYGWY PG MOY BPSSUNY WHTTAGY UGX OUXKYWYGMSE VYYG UCUE XKPBPGN U NHBYKGTYGM MKUGLIHKM, OUX KYMAKGYX CPMOGYCL MOUM MOY WHLLUWRL CYKY XYLMKHEPGN XYLYKMYX BPSSUNYL, VAM MOUM MOYZKYGWO XPX GHM OUKT MOYT. USIUMEWO USLH RGYC MOUM HG MOY IKYBPHAL XUEUGHMOYK IYULUGM OUX YBYG VKHANOM ZKHT MOY BPSSUNY HZ BPLSHAROHBH, COPWOCUL HWWAIPYX VE MOY ZKYGWO, U IKHWSUTUMPHG VE U ZKYGWO NYGYKUS MOUM GHOUKT CHASX VY XHGY MH MOY PGOUVPMUGML, UGX PZ MOYE KYTUPGYX MOYE CHASXVY IUPX ZHK UGEMOPGN MURYG ZKHT MOYT. UL IKHHZ HZ MOPL MOY IYULUGM OUXVKHANOM ZKHT BPLSHAROHBH U OAGXKYX KAVSYL PG GHMYL (OY XPX GHM RGHC MOUMMOYE CYKY ZUSLY) IUPX MH OPT PG UXBUGWY ZHK OUE.THKY PTIHKMUGM LMPSS, USIUMEWO SYUKGYX MOUM HG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOYBYKE XUE OY NUBY MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK HKXYKL MH WHSSYWM WUKML MH THBY MOYIKPGWYLL' SANNUNY ZKHT VHNAWOUKHBH, MOYKY OUX VYYG U BPSSUNY TYYMPGN UMCOPWO PM OUX VYYG XYWPXYX GHM MH THBY VAM MH CUPM. EYM MOYKY CUL GHMPTY MH CULMY. HG MOY ZPZMYYGMO, MOY XUE HZ MOY HSX IKPGWY'L XYUMO,MOY TUKLOUS OUX PGLPLMYX HG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L SYUBPGN UM HGWY, UL PM CULVYWHTPGN XUGNYKHAL. OY OUX MHSX OYK MOUM UZMYK MOY LPDMYYGMO OY WHASXGHM VY KYLIHGLPVSY ZHK COUM TPNOM OUIIYG. HG MOY YBYGPGN HZ MOY XUE MOYHSX IKPGWY XPYX MOY TUKLOUS CYGM UCUE, IKHTPLPGN MH KYMAKG GYDM XUE ZHKMOY ZAGYKUS. VAM MOPL OY CUL AGUVSY MH XH, ZHK OY KYWYPBYX MPXPGNL MOUMMOY ZKYGWO OUX AGYDIYWMYXSE UXBUGWYX, UGX OUX VUKYSE MPTY MH KYTHBY OPLHCG ZUTPSE UGX BUSAUVSYL ZKHT OPL YLMUMY.ZHK LHTY MOPKME EYUKL VHNAWOUKHBH OUX VYYG TUGUNYX VE MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK,XKHG, COHT MOY HSX IKPGWY WUSSYX VE MOY XPTPGAMPBY "XKHGALORU."XKHG CUL HGY HZ MOHLY IOELPWUSSE UGX TYGMUSSE BPNHKHAL IYULUGML COH NKHCVPN VYUKXL UL LHHG UL MOYE UKY HZ UNY UGX NH HG AGWOUGNYX MPSS MOYEUKY LPDME HK LYBYGME, CPMOHAM U NKUE OUPK HK MOY SHLL HZ U MHHMO, ULLMKUPNOM UGX LMKHGN UM LPDME UL UM MOPKME.LHHG UZMYK MOY TPNKUMPHG MH MOY "CUKT KPBYKL," PG COPWO OY OUX MURYGIUKM SPRY MOY KYLM, XKHG CUL TUXY BPSSUNY YSXYK UGX HBYKLYYK HZVHNAWOUKHBH, UGX OUX LPGWY ZPSSYX MOUM IHLM PKKYIKHUWOUVSE ZHKMCYGME-MOKYY EYUKL. MOY IYULUGML ZYUKYX OPT THKY MOUG MOYE XPX MOYPKTULMYK. MOY TULMYKL, VHMO MOY HSX IKPGWY UGX MOY EHAGN, UGX MOY LMYCUKXKYLIYWMYX OPT UGX QYLMPGNSE WUSSYX OPT "MOY TPGPLMYK." XAKPGN MOYCOHSY MPTY HZ OPL LYKBPWY XKHG OUX GYBYK VYYG XKAGR HK PSS, GYBYK UZMYKLSYYISYLL GPNOML HK MOY OUKXYLM MULRL OUX OY LOHCG MOY SYULM ZUMPNAY,UGX MOHANO OY WHASX GHM KYUX OY OUX GYBYK ZHKNHMMYG U LPGNSY THGYEUWWHAGM HK MOY GATVYK HZ JAUKMYKL HZ ZSHAK PG UGE HZ MOY YGXSYLLWUKMSHUXL OY LHSX ZHK MOY IKPGWY, GHK U LPGNSY LOHWR HZ MOY COHSY WHKGWKHI HG UGE LPGNSY UWKY HZ MOY VHNAWOUKHBH ZPYSXL.USIUMEWO, UKKPBPGN ZKHT MOY XYBULMUMYX VUSX OPSSL YLMUMY, LYGM ZHK OPLXKHG HG MOY XUE HZ MOY IKPGWY'L ZAGYKUS UGX MHSX OPT MH OUBY MCYSBYOHKLYL NHM KYUXE ZHK MOY IKPGWYLL' WUKKPUNYL UGX YPNOMYYG WUKML ZHKMOY MOPGNL MH VY KYTHBYX ZKHT VHNAWOUKHBH. MOHANO MOY IYULUGML IUPXJAPMKYGM, USIUMEWO MOHANOM GH XPZZPWASME CHASX VY TUXY UVHAM WHTISEPGNCPMO MOPL HKXYK, ZHK MOYKY CYKY MCH OAGXKYX UGX MOPKME OHALYOHSXL UMCHKR PG VHNAWOUKHBH UGX MOY IYULUGML CYKY CYSS MH XH. VAM HG OYUKPGN MOYHKXYK XKHG SHCYKYX OPL YEYL UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM. USIUMEWO GUTYX WYKMUPGIYULUGML OY RGYC, ZKHT COHT OY MHSX OPT MH MURY MOY WUKML.XKHG KYISPYX MOUM MOY OHKLYL HZ MOYLY IYULUGML CYKY UCUE WUKMPGN.USIUMEWO GUTYX HMOYKL, VAM MOYE MHH, UWWHKXPGN MH XKHG, OUX GH OHKLYLUBUPSUVSY: LHTY OHKLYL CYKY WUKMPGN ZHK MOY NHBYKGTYGM, HMOYKL CYKY MHHCYUR, UGX HMOYKL OUX XPYX ZHK CUGM HZ ZHXXYK. PM LYYTYX MOUM GH OHKLYLWHASX VY OUX YBYG ZHK MOY WUKKPUNYL, TAWO SYLL ZHK MOY WUKMPGN.USIUMEWO SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM XKHG UGX ZKHCGYX. QALM UL XKHG CUL U THXYSBPSSUNY YSXYK, LH USIUMEWO OUX GHM TUGUNYX MOY IKPGWY'L YLMUMYL ZHKMCYGME EYUKL PG BUPG. OY CUL U THXYS LMYCUKX, IHLLYLLPGN PG MOY OPNOYLMXYNKYY MOY ZUWASME HZ XPBPGPGN MOY GYYXL UGX PGLMPGWML HZ MOHLY OY XYUSMCPMO. OUBPGN NSUGWYX UM XKHG OY UM HGWY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM OPL UGLCYKL XPXGHM YDIKYLL OPL IYKLHGUS BPYCL VAM MOY NYGYKUS THHX HZ MOY VHNAWOUKHBHWHTTAGY, VE COPWO MOY YSXYK OUX USKYUXE VYYG WUKKPYX UCUE. VAM OY USLHRGYC MOUM XKHG, COH OUX UWJAPKYX IKHIYKME UGX CUL OUMYX VE MOY WHTTAGY,TALM VY OYLPMUMPGN VYMCYYG MOY MCH WUTIL: MOY TULMYKL' UGX MOY LYKZL'.OY GHMPWYX MOPL OYLPMUMPHG PG XKHG'L SHHR UGX MOYKYZHKY ZKHCGYX UGXTHBYX WSHLYK AI MH OPT."GHC QALM SPLMYG, XKHGALORU," LUPX OY. "XHG'M MUSR GHGLYGLY MH TY. OPLYDWYSSYGWE IKPGWY UGXKYC OPTLYSZ NUBY TY HKXYKL MH THBY USS MOY IYHISYUCUE UGX GHM SYUBY MOYT CPMO MOY YGYTE, UGX MOYKY PL UG HKXYK ZKHT MOYMLUK UVHAM PM MHH. UGEHGY COH LMUEL PL U MKUPMHK MH MOY MLUK. XH EHAOYUK?""P OYUK," XKHG UGLCYKYX CPMOHAM SPZMPGN OPL YEYL.USIUMEWO CUL GHM LUMPLZPYX CPMO MOPL KYISE."YO, XKHG, PM CPSS MAKG HAM VUXSE!" OY LUPX, LOURPGN OPL OYUX."MOY IHCYK PL PG EHAK OUGXL," XKHG KYQHPGYX LUXSE."YO, XKHG, XKHI PM!" USIUMEWO KYIYUMYX, CPMOXKUCPGN OPL OUGX ZKHT OPLVHLHT UGX LHSYTGSE IHPGMPGN MH MOY ZSHHK UM XKHG'L ZYYM. "P WUG LYYMOKHANO EHA UGX MOKYY EUKXL PGMH MOY NKHAGX AGXYK EHA," OY WHGMPGAYX,NUFPGN UM MOY ZSHHK PG ZKHGM HZ XKHG.XKHG CUL XPLWHGWYKMYX, NSUGWYX ZAKMPBYSE UM USIUMEWO UGX UNUPG SHCYKYXOPL YEYL."EHA XKHI MOPL GHGLYGLY UGX MYSS MOY IYHISY MH NYM KYUXE MH SYUBY MOYPKOHTYL UGX NH MH THLWHC UGX MH NYM WUKML KYUXE ZHK MHTHKKHC THKGPGNZHK MOY IKPGWYLL' MOPGNL. UGX XHG'M NH MH UGE TYYMPGN EHAKLYSZ, XH EHAOYUK?"XKHG LAXXYGSE ZYSS HG OPL RGYYL."EURHB USIUMEWO, XPLWOUKNY TY! MURY MOY RYEL ZKHT TY UGX XPLWOUKNY TY,ZHK WOKPLM'L LURY!""LMHI MOUM!" WKPYX USIUMEWO LMYKGSE. "P LYY MOKHANO EHA UGX MOKYY EUKXLAGXYK EHA," OY KYIYUMYX, RGHCPGN MOUM OPL LRPSS PG VYYRYYIPGN, OPLRGHCSYXNY HZ MOY KPNOM MPTY MH LHC MOY HUML, UGX MOY ZUWM MOUM OY OUXVYYG UVSY MH KYMUPG MOY HSX IKPGWY'L ZUBHK ZHK MCYGME EYUKL OUX SHGNLPGWY NUPGYX OPT MOY KYIAMUMPHG HZ VYPGN U CPFUKX, UGX MOUM MOY IHCYK HZLYYPGN MOKYY EUKXL AGXYK U TUG PL WHGLPXYKYX UG UMMKPVAMY HZ CPFUKXL.XKHG NHM AI UGX CUL UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, VAM USIUMEWO PGMYKKAIMYXOPT."COUM PL PM EHA OUBY NHM PGMH EHAK OYUXL, YO?... COUM UKY EHA MOPGRPGNHZ, YO?""COUM UT P MH XH CPMO MOY IYHISY?" LUPX XKHG. "MOYE'KY JAPMY VYLPXYMOYTLYSBYL; P OUBY USKYUXE MHSX MOYT...""'MHSX MOYT,' P XUKY LUE!" LUPX USIUMEWO. "UKY MOYE XKPGRPGN?" OY ULRYXUVKAIMSE."JAPMY VYLPXY MOYTLYSBYL, EURHB USIUMEWO; MOYE'BY ZYMWOYX UGHMOYKVUKKYS.""CYSS, MOYG, SPLMYG! P'SS NH MH MOY IHSPWY HZZPWYK, UGX EHA MYSS MOYTLH, UGX MOUM MOYE TALM LMHI MOPL UGX MOY WUKML TALM VY NHM KYUXE.""P AGXYKLMUGX."USIUMEWO XPX GHM PGLPLM ZAKMOYK. OY OUX TUGUNYX IYHISY ZHK U SHGN MPTYUGX RGYC MOUM MOY WOPYZ CUE MH TURY MOYT HVYE PL MH LOHC GH LALIPWPHGMOUM MOYE WUG IHLLPVSE XPLHVYE. OUBPGN CKAGN U LAVTPLLPBY "P AGXYKLMUGX"ZKHT XKHG, USIUMEWO WHGMYGMYX OPTLYSZ CPMO MOUM, MOHANO OY GHM HGSEXHAVMYX VAM ZYSM USTHLM WYKMUPG MOUM CPMOHAM MOY OYSI HZ MKHHIL MOYWUKML CHASX GHM VY ZHKMOWHTPGN.UGX LH PM CUL, ZHK COYG YBYGPGN WUTY GH WUKML OUX VYYG IKHBPXYX. PG MOYBPSSUNY, HAMLPXY MOY XKPGR LOHI, UGHMOYK TYYMPGN CUL VYPGN OYSX, COPWOXYWPXYX MOUM MOY OHKLYL LOHASX VY XKPBYG HAM PGMH MOY CHHXL UGX MOYWUKML LOHASX GHM VY IKHBPXYX. CPMOHAM LUEPGN UGEMOPGN HZ MOPL MH MOYIKPGWYLL, USIUMEWO OUX OPL HCG VYSHGNPGNL MURYG HAM HZ MOY WUKML COPWOOUX UKKPBYX ZKHT VUSX OPSSL UGX OUX MOHLY OHKLYL NHM KYUXE ZHKMOY IKPGWYLL' WUKKPUNYL. TYUGCOPSY OY CYGM OPTLYSZ MH MOY IHSPWYUAMOHKPMPYL.WOUIMYK DUZMYK OYK ZUMOYK'L ZAGYKUS IKPGWYLL TUKE LOAM OYKLYSZ AI PG OYK KHHT UGXXPX GHM UXTPM UGEHGY. U TUPX WUTY MH MOY XHHK MH LUE MOUM USIUMEWO CULULRPGN ZHK HKXYKL UVHAM MOYPK XYIUKMAKY. (MOPL CUL VYZHKY OPL MUSR CPMOXKHG.) IKPGWYLL TUKE KUPLYX OYKLYSZ HG MOY LHZU HG COPWO LOY OUX VYYGSEPGN UGX KYISPYX MOKHANO MOY WSHLYX XHHK MOUM LOY XPX GHM TYUG MH NHUCUE UGX VYNNYX MH VY SYZM PG IYUWY.MOY CPGXHCL HZ MOY KHHT PG COPWO LOY CUL SEPGN SHHRYX CYLMCUKX. LOYSUE HG MOY LHZU CPMO OYK ZUWY MH MOY CUSS, ZPGNYKPGN MOY VAMMHGL HZ MOYSYUMOYK WALOPHG UGX LYYPGN GHMOPGN VAM MOUM WALOPHG, UGX OYK WHGZALYXMOHANOML CYKY WYGMYKYX HG HGY LAVQYWM--MOY PKKYBHWUVPSPME HZ XYUMO UGXOYK HCG LIPKPMAUS VULYGYLL, COPWO LOY OUX GHM LALIYWMYX, VAM COPWO OUXLOHCG PMLYSZ XAKPGN OYK ZUMOYK'L PSSGYLL. LOY CPLOYX MH IKUE VAM XPX GHMXUKY MH, XUKYX GHM PG OYK IKYLYGM LMUMY HZ TPGX UXXKYLL OYKLYSZ MH NHX.LOY SUE ZHK U SHGN MPTY PG MOUM IHLPMPHG.MOY LAG OUX KYUWOYX MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ MOY OHALY, UGX PML LSUGMPGN KUELLOHGY PGMH MOY HIYG CPGXHC, SPNOMPGN AI MOY KHHT UGX IUKM HZ MOY THKHWWHWALOPHG UM COPWO IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL SHHRPGN. MOY ZSHC HZ OYK MOHANOMLLAXXYGSE LMHIIYX. AGWHGLWPHALSE LOY LUM AI, LTHHMOYX OYK OUPK, NHM AI,UGX CYGM MH MOY CPGXHC, PGBHSAGMUKPSE PGOUSPGN MOY ZKYLOGYLL HZ MOYWSYUK VAM CPGXE YBYGPGN."EYL, EHA WUG CYSS YGQHE MOY YBYGPGN GHC! OY PL NHGY UGX GH HGY CPSSOPGXYK EHA," LOY LUPX MH OYKLYSZ, UGX LPGRPGN PGMH U WOUPK LOY SYM OYKOYUX ZUSS HG MOY CPGXHC LPSS.LHTYHGY LIHRY OYK GUTY PG U LHZM UGX MYGXYK BHPWY ZKHT MOY NUKXYG UGXRPLLYX OYK OYUX. LOY SHHRYX AI. PM CUL TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY PG U VSUWRXKYLL UGX CYYIYKL. LOY LHZMSE UIIKHUWOYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, LPNOYX, RPLLYXOYK, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE VYNUG MH WKE. MOY IKPGWYLL SHHRYX AI UM OYK. USSMOYPK ZHKTYK XPLOUKTHGE UGX OYK HCG QYUSHALE KYWAKKYX MH OYK TPGX.VAM LOY KYTYTVYKYX MHH OHC OY OUX WOUGNYX HZ SUMY MHCUKX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY UGX WHASX GHM VYUK MH LYY OYK, MOYKYVE LOHCPGN OHC AGQALM CYKYMOY KYIKHUWOYL IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX TYGMUSSE UXXKYLLYX MH OYK. "VYLPXYL,PL PM ZHK TY, ZHK TY COH XYLPKYX OPL XYUMO, MH WHGXYTG UGEHGY?" LOYMOHANOM.IKPGWYLL TUKE BPBPXSE IPWMAKYX MH OYKLYSZ MOY IHLPMPHG HZ TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY, COHT LOY OUX HZ SUMY RYIM UM U XPLMUGWY, VAM COH EYM CULXYIYGXYGM HG OYK UGX SPBPGN PG OYK OHALY. LOY ZYSM LHKKE ZHK OYKUGX OYSX HAM OYK OUGX CPMO U NSUGWY HZ NYGMSY PGJAPKE. TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY UM HGWY VYNUG WKEPGN UNUPG UGX RPLLYX MOUM OUGX, LIYURPGN HZMOY IKPGWYLL' LHKKHC UGX TURPGN OYKLYSZ U IUKMGYK PG PM. LOY LUPX OYKHGSE WHGLHSUMPHG CUL MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY IKPGWYLL USSHCYX OYK MH LOUKY OYKLHKKHC, MOUM USS MOY HSX TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL LOHASX LPGR PGMH GHMOPGN VAMMOPL NKYUM NKPYZ; MOUM LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ VSUTYSYLL PG KYNUKX MH YBYKEHGY,UGX MOUM OY, ZKHT UVHBY, LUC OYK UZZYWMPHG UGX NKUMPMAXY. MOY IKPGWYLLOYUKX OYK, GHM OYYXPGN OYK CHKXL VAM HWWULPHGUSSE SHHRPGN AI UM OYK UGXSPLMYGPGN MH MOY LHAGX HZ OYK BHPWY."EHAK IHLPMPHG PL XHAVSE MYKKPVSY, XYUK IKPGWYLL," LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY UZMYK U IUALY. "P AGXYKLMUGX MOUM EHA WHASX GHM, UGX WUGGHM,MOPGR HZ EHAKLYSZ, VAM CPMO TE SHBY ZHK EHA P TALM XH LH.... OULUSIUMEWO VYYG MH EHA? OUL OY LIHRYG MH EHA HZ NHPGN UCUE?" LOY ULRYX.IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM UGLCYK. LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COH CUL MH NH HKCOYKY MH. "PL PM IHLLPVSY MH ISUG HK MOPGR HZ UGEMOPGN GHC? PL PM GHMUSS MOY LUTY?" LOY MOHANOM, UGX XPX GHM KYISE."EHA RGHC, WOYKY TUKPY," LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, "MOUM CY UKY PGXUGNYK--UKY LAKKHAGXYX VE MOY ZKYGWO. PM CHASX VY XUGNYKHAL MH THBY GHC.PZ CY NH CY UKY USTHLM LAKY MH VY MURYG IKPLHGYKL, UGX NHX RGHCL..."IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRYX UM OYK WHTIUGPHG CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM LOY CULMUSRPGN UVHAM."HO, PZ UGEHGY RGYC OHC SPMMSY UGEMOPGN TUMMYKL MH TY GHC," LOY LUPX."HZ WHAKLY P CHASX HG GH UWWHAGM CPLO MH NH UCUE ZKHT OPT.... USIUMEWOXPX LUE LHTYMOPGN UVHAM NHPGN.... LIYUR MH OPT; P WUG XH GHMOPGN,GHMOPGN, UGX XHG'M CUGM MH....""P'BY LIHRYG MH OPT. OY OHIYL CY LOHASX VY PG MPTY MH NYM UCUE MHTHKKHC,VAM P MOPGR PM CHASX GHC VY VYMMYK MH LMUE OYKY," LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSYVHAKPYGGY. "VYWUALY, EHA CPSS UNKYY, WOYKY TUKPY, MH ZUSS PGMH MOY OUGXLHZ MOY LHSXPYKL HK HZ KPHMHAL IYULUGML CHASX VY MYKKPVSY."TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY MHHR ZKHT OYK KYMPWASY U IKHWSUTUMPHG (GHMIKPGMYX HG HKXPGUKE KALLPUG IUIYK) HZ NYGYKUS KUTYUA'L, MYSSPGN IYHISYGHM MH SYUBY MOYPK OHTYL UGX MOUM MOY ZKYGWO UAMOHKPMPYL CHASX UZZHKXMOYT IKHIYK IKHMYWMPHG. LOY OUGXYX MOPL MH MOY IKPGWYLL."P MOPGR PM CHASX VY VYLM MH UIIYUS MH MOUM NYGYKUS," LOY WHGMPGAYX,"UGX P UT LAKY MOUM USS XAY KYLIYWM CHASX VY LOHCG EHA."IKPGWYLL TUKE KYUX MOY IUIYK, UGX OYK ZUWY VYNUG MH JAPBYK CPMO LMPZSYXLHVL."ZKHT COHT XPX EHA NYM MOPL?" LOY ULRYX."MOYE IKHVUVSE KYWHNGPFYX MOUM P UT ZKYGWO, VE TE GUTY," KYISPYXTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY VSALOPGN.IKPGWYLL TUKE, CPMO MOY IUIYK PG OYK OUGX, KHLY ZKHT MOY CPGXHC UGX CPMOU IUSY ZUWY CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHT UGX PGMH COUM OUX VYYG IKPGWY UGXKYC'LLMAXE."XAGEULOU, LYGX USIUMEWO, HK XKHGALORU, HK LHTYVHXE MH TY!" LOY LUPX,"UGX MYSS TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY GHM MH WHTY MH TY," LOY UXXYX, OYUKPGNTUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L BHPWY. "CY TALM NH UM HGWY, UM HGWY!" LOY LUPX,UIIUSSYX UM MOY MOHANOM HZ VYPGN SYZM PG MOY OUGXL HZ MOY ZKYGWO."PZ IKPGWY UGXKYC OYUKX MOUM P CUL PG MOY IHCYK HZ MOY ZKYGWO! MOUMP, MOY XUANOMYK HZ IKPGWY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP, ULRYX NYGYKUS KUTYUA ZHKIKHMYWMPHG UGX UWWYIMYX OPL ZUBHK!" MOPL PXYU OHKKPZPYX OYK, TUXY OYKLOAXXYK, VSALO, UGX ZYYS LAWO U KALO HZ UGNYK UGX IKPXY UL LOY OUX GYBYKYDIYKPYGWYX VYZHKY. USS MOUM CUL XPLMKYLLPGN, UGX YLIYWPUSSE USS MOUMCUL OATPSPUMPGN, PG OYK IHLPMPHG KHLY BPBPXSE MH OYK TPGX. "MOYE, MOYZKYGWO, CHASX LYMMSY PG MOPL OHALY: T. SY NYGYKUS KUTYUA CHASX HWWAIEIKPGWY UGXKYC'L LMAXE UGX UTALY OPTLYSZ VE SHHRPGN MOKHANO UGX KYUXPGNOPL SYMMYKL UGX IUIYKL. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY CHASX XH MOY OHGHKL HZVHNAWOUKHBH ZHK OPT. P LOHASX VY NPBYG U LTUSS KHHT UL U ZUBHK, MOYLHSXPYKL CHASX BPHSUMY TE ZUMOYK'L GYCSE XAN NKUBY MH LMYUS OPL WKHLLYLUGX LMUKL, MOYE CHASX MYSS TY HZ MOYPK BPWMHKPYL HBYK MOY KALLPUGL, UGXCHASX IKYMYGX MH LETIUMOPFY CPMO TE LHKKHC..." MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE,GHM MOPGRPGN OYK HCG MOHANOML VAM ZYYSPGN VHAGX MH MOPGR SPRY OYK ZUMOYKUGX OYK VKHMOYK. ZHK OYKLYSZ LOY XPX GHM WUKY COYKY LOY KYTUPGYX HK COUMOUIIYGYX MH OYK, VAM LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ MOY KYIKYLYGMUMPBY HZ OYK XYUXZUMOYK UGX HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC. PGBHSAGMUKPSE LOY MOHANOM MOYPK MOHANOMLUGX ZYSM MOYPK ZYYSPGNL. COUM MOYE CHASX OUBY LUPX UGX COUM MOYE CHASXOUBY XHGY LOY ZYSM VHAGX MH LUE UGX XH. LOY CYGM PGMH IKPGWY UGXKYC'LLMAXE, MKEPGN MH YGMYK WHTISYMYSE PGMH OPL PXYUL, UGX WHGLPXYKYX OYKIHLPMPHG.MOY XYTUGXL HZ SPZY, COPWO OUX LYYTYX MH OYK UGGPOPSUMYX VE OYK ZUMOYK'LXYUMO, USS UM HGWY KHLY VYZHKY OYK CPMO U GYC, IKYBPHALSE AGRGHCG ZHKWYUGX MHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZ OYK.UNPMUMYX UGX ZSALOYX LOY IUWYX MOY KHHT, LYGXPGN GHC ZHK TPWOUYSPBUGHBPWO UGX GHC ZHK MPROHG HK XKHG. XAGEULOU, MOY GAKLY, UGX MOY HMOYKTUPXL WHASX GHM LUE PG OHC ZUK TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L LMUMYTYGM CULWHKKYWM. USIUMEWO CUL GHM UM OHTY, OY OUX NHGY MH MOY IHSPWY. GYPMOYKWHASX MOY UKWOPMYWM TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO, COH HG VYPGN LYGM ZHK WUTY PGCPMO LSYYIE YEYL, MYSS IKPGWYLL TUKE UGEMOPGN. CPMO QALM MOY LUTY LTPSYHZ UNKYYTYGM CPMO COPWO ZHK ZPZMYYG EYUKL OY OUX VYYG UWWALMHTYX MHUGLCYK MOY HSX IKPGWY CPMOHAM YDIKYLLPGN BPYCL HZ OPL HCG, OY GHCKYISPYX MH IKPGWYLL TUKE, LH MOUM GHMOPGN XYZPGPMY WHASX VY NHM ZKHT OPLUGLCYKL. MOY HSX BUSYM MPROHG, CPMO LAGRYG, YTUWPUMYX ZUWY MOUM VHKY MOYLMUTI HZ PGWHGLHSUVSY NKPYZ, KYISPYX: "EYL, IKPGWYLL" MH USS IKPGWYLLTUKE'L JAYLMPHGL UGX OUKXSE KYZKUPGYX ZKHT LHVVPGN UL OY SHHRYX UM OYK.UM SYGNMO XKHG, MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT UGX CPMO U XYYI VHCMH IKPGWYLL TUKE WUTY MH U OUSM VE MOY XHHKIHLM.IKPGWYLL TUKE CUSRYX AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT UGX LMHIIYX PG ZKHGM HZ OPT."XKHGALORU," LOY LUPX, KYNUKXPGN UL U LAKY ZKPYGX MOPL XKHGALORU COHUSCUEL ALYX MH VKPGN U LIYWPUS RPGX HZ NPGNYKVKYUX ZKHT OPL BPLPM MH MOYZUPK UM BEUFTU YBYKE EYUK UGX LTPSPGNSE HZZYK PM MH OYK, "XKHGALORU, GHCLPGWY HAK TPLZHKMAGY..." LOY VYNUG, VAM WHASX GHM NH HG."CY UKY USS PG NHX'L OUGXL," LUPX OY, CPMO U LPNO.MOYE CYKY LPSYGM ZHK U COPSY."XKHGALORU, USIUMEWO OUL NHGY HZZ LHTYCOYKY UGX P OUBY GH HGY MH MAKGMH. PL PM MKAY, UL MOYE MYSS TY, MOUM P WUG'M YBYG NH UCUE?""COE LOHASXG'M EHA NH UCUE, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE? EHA WUG NH," LUPX XKHG."P CUL MHSX PM CHASX VY XUGNYKHAL VYWUALY HZ MOY YGYTE. XYUK ZKPYGX, PWUG XH GHMOPGN. P AGXYKLMUGX GHMOPGN. P OUBY GHVHXE! P CUGM MH NH UCUEMHGPNOM HK YUKSE MHTHKKHC THKGPGN."XKHG IUALYX. OY SHHRYX ULRUGWY UM IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX LUPX: "MOYKY UKY GHOHKLYL; P MHSX EURHB USIUMEWO LH.""COE UKY MOYKY GHGY?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWYLL."PM'L USS NHX'L LWHAKNY," LUPX XKHG. "COUM OHKLYL CY OUX OUBY VYYGMURYG ZHK MOY UKTE HK OUBY XPYX--MOPL PL LAWO U EYUK! PM'L GHM U WULY HZZYYXPGN OHKLYL--CY TUE XPY HZ OAGNYK HAKLYSBYL! UL PM PL, LHTY NH MOKYYXUEL CPMOHAM YUMPGN. CY'BY GHMOPGN, CY'BY VYYG KAPGYX."IKPGWYLL TUKE SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSE MH COUM OY MHSX OYK."MOY IYULUGML UKY KAPGYX? MOYE OUBY GH VKYUX?" LOY ULRYX."MOYE'KY XEPGN HZ OAGNYK," LUPX XKHG. "PM'L GHM U WULY HZ WUKMPGN.""VAM COE XPXG'M EHA MYSS TY, XKHGALORU? PLG'M PM IHLLPVSY MH OYSI MOYT?P'SS XH USS P WUG...."MH IKPGWYLL TUKE PM CUL LMKUGNY MOUM GHC, UM U THTYGM COYG LAWO LHKKHCCUL ZPSSPGN OYK LHAS, MOYKY WHASX VY KPWO IYHISY UGX IHHK, UGX MOY KPWOWHASX KYZKUPG ZKHT OYSIPGN MOY IHHK. LOY OUX OYUKX BUNAYSE MOUM MOYKYCUL LAWO U MOPGN UL "SUGXSHKX'L WHKG" COPWO CUL LHTYMPTYL NPBYG MH MOYIYULUGML. LOY USLH RGYC MOUM GYPMOYK OYK ZUMOYK GHK OYK VKHMOYK CHASXKYZALY MH OYSI MOY IYULUGML PG GYYX, LOY HGSE ZYUKYX MH TURY LHTYTPLMURY PG LIYURPGN UVHAM MOY XPLMKPVAMPHG HZ MOY NKUPG LOY CPLOYX MHNPBY. LOY CUL NSUX LAWO WUKYL IKYLYGMYX MOYTLYSBYL, YGUVSPGN OYKCPMOHAM LWKAISY MH ZHKNYM OYK HCG NKPYZ. LOY VYNUG ULRPGN XKHG UVHAM MOYIYULUGML' GYYXL UGX COUM MOYKY CUL PG VHNAWOUKHBH MOUM VYSHGNYX MH MOYSUGXSHKX."VAM CY OUBY NKUPG VYSHGNPGN MH TE VKHMOYK?" LOY LUPX."MOY SUGXSHKX'L NKUPG PL USS LUZY," KYISPYX XKHG IKHAXSE. "HAK IKPGWYXPX GHM HKXYK PM MH VY LHSX.""NPBY PM MH MOY IYULUGML, SYM MOYT OUBY USS MOYE GYYX; P NPBY EHA SYUBYPG TE VKHMOYK'L GUTY," LUPX LOY.XKHG TUXY GH UGLCYK VAM LPNOYX XYYISE."NPBY MOYT MOUM WHKG PZ MOYKY PL YGHANO HZ PM. XPLMKPVAMY PM USS. PNPBY MOPL HKXYK PG TE VKHMOYK'L GUTY; UGX MYSS MOYT MOUM COUM PL HAKL PLMOYPKL. CY XH GHM NKAXNY MOYT UGEMOPGN. MYSS MOYT LH."XKHG SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM MOY IKPGWYLL COPSY LOY CUL LIYURPGN."XPLWOUKNY TY, SPMMSY THMOYK, ZHK NHX'L LURY! HKXYK MOY RYEL MH VY MURYGZKHT TY," LUPX OY. "P OUBY LYKBYX MCYGME-MOKYY EYUKL UGX OUBY XHGY GHCKHGN. XPLWOUKNY TY, ZHK NHX'L LURY!"IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM OY CUGMYX HZ OYK HK COE OY CULULRPGN MH VY XPLWOUKNYX. LOY KYISPYX MOUM LOY OUX GYBYK XHAVMYX OPLXYBHMPHG UGX MOUM LOY CUL KYUXE MH XH UGEMOPGN ZHK OPT UGX ZHK MOYIYULUGML.WOUIMYK DPUG OHAK SUMYK XAGEULOU WUTY MH MYSS MOY IKPGWYLL MOUM XKHG OUX WHTY, UGXUSS MOY IYULUGML OUX ULLYTVSYX UM MOY VUKG VE MOY IKPGWYLL' HKXYK UGXCPLOYX MH OUBY CHKX CPMO MOYPK TPLMKYLL."VAM P GYBYK MHSX MOYT MH WHTY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "P HGSE MHSX XKHGMH SYM MOYT OUBY MOY NKUPG.""HGSE, ZHK NHX'L LURY, IKPGWYLL XYUK, OUBY MOYT LYGM UCUE UGX XHG'M NHHAM MH MOYT. PM'L USS U MKPWR," LUPX XAGEULOU, "UGX COYG EURHB USIUMEWOKYMAKGL SYM AL NYM UCUE... UGX ISYULY XHG'M...""COUM PL U MKPWR?" ULRYX IKPGWYLL TUKE PG LAKIKPLY."P RGHC PM PL, HGSE SPLMYG MH TY ZHK NHX'L LURY! ULR GAKLY MHH. MOYE LUEMOYE XHG'M UNKYY MH SYUBY VHNAWOUKHBH UL EHA HKXYKYX.""EHA'KY TURPGN LHTY TPLMURY. P GYBYK HKXYKYX MOYT MH NH UCUE," LUPXIKPGWYLL TUKE. "WUSS XKHGALORU."XKHG WUTY UGX WHGZPKTYX XAGEULOU'L CHKXL; MOY IYULUGML OUX WHTY VE MOYIKPGWYLL' HKXYK."VAM P GYBYK LYGM ZHK MOYT," XYWSUKYX MOY IKPGWYLL. "EHA TALM OUBY NPBYGTE TYLLUNY CKHGN. P HGSE LUPX MOUM EHA CYKY MH NPBY MOYT MOY NKUPG."XKHG HGSE LPNOYX PG KYISE."PZ EHA HKXYK PM MOYE CPSS NH UCUE," LUPX OY."GH, GH. P'SS NH HAM MH MOYT," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX PG LIPMY HZMOY GAKLY'L UGX XAGEULOU'L IKHMYLML LOY CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO; XKHG,XAGEULOU, MOY GAKLY, UGX TPWOUYS PBUGHBPWO ZHSSHCPGN OYK."MOYE IKHVUVSE MOPGR P UT HZZYKPGN MOYT MOY NKUPG MH VKPVY MOYT MHKYTUPG OYKY, COPSY P TELYSZ NH UCUE SYUBPGN MOYT MH MOY TYKWE HZ MOYZKYGWO," MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE. "P CPSS HZZYK MOYT THGMOSE KUMPHGL UGXOHALPGN UM HAK THLWHC YLMUMY. P UT LAKY UGXKYC CHASX XH YBYG THKY PGTE ISUWY," LOY MOHANOM UL LOY CYGM HAM PG MOY MCPSPNOM MHCUKX MOY WKHCXLMUGXPGN HG MOY IULMAKY VE MOY VUKG.MOY TYG WKHCXYX WSHLYK MHNYMOYK, LMPKKYX, UGX KUIPXSE MHHR HZZ MOYPKOUML. IKPGWYLL TUKE SHCYKYX OYK YEYL UGX, MKPIIPGN HBYK OYK LRPKM, WUTYWSHLY AI MH MOYT. LH TUGE XPZZYKYGM YEYL, HSX UGX EHAGN, CYKY ZPDYXHG OYK, UGX MOYKY CYKY LH TUGE XPZZYKYGM ZUWYL, MOUM LOY WHASX GHMXPLMPGNAPLO UGE HZ MOYT UGX, ZYYSPGN MOUM LOY TALM LIYUR MH MOYT USSUM HGWY, XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH XH PM. VAM UNUPG MOY LYGLY MOUM LOYKYIKYLYGMYX OYK ZUMOYK UGX OYK VKHMOYK NUBY OYK WHAKUNY, UGX LOY VHSXSEVYNUG OYK LIYYWO."P UT BYKE NSUX EHA OUBY WHTY," LOY LUPX CPMOHAM KUPLPGN OYK YEYL, UGXZYYSPGN OYK OYUKM VYUMPGN JAPWRSE UGX BPHSYGMSE. "XKHGALORU MYSSL TYMOUM MOY CUK OUL KAPGYX EHA. MOUM PL HAK WHTTHG TPLZHKMAGY, UGX PLOUSS NKAXNY GHMOPGN MH OYSI EHA. P UT TELYSZ NHPGN UCUE VYWUALY PMPL XUGNYKHAL OYKY... MOY YGYTE PL GYUK... VYWUALY... P UT NPBPGN EHAYBYKEMOPGN, TE ZKPYGXL, UGX P VYN EHA MH MURY YBYKEMOPGN, USS HAK NKUPG,LH MOUM EHA TUE GHM LAZZYK CUGM! UGX PZ EHA OUBY VYYG MHSX MOUM PUT NPBPGN EHA MOY NKUPG MH RYYI EHA OYKY--MOUM PL GHM MKAY. HG MOYWHGMKUKE, P ULR EHA MH NH CPMO USS EHAK VYSHGNPGNL MH HAK YLMUMY GYUKTHLWHC, UGX P IKHTPLY EHA P CPSS LYY MH PM MOUM MOYKY EHA LOUSS CUGM ZHKGHMOPGN. EHA LOUSS VY NPBYG ZHHX UGX SHXNPGN."MOY IKPGWYLL LMHIIYX. LPNOL CYKY MOY HGSE LHAGX OYUKX PG MOY WKHCX."P UT GHM XHPGN MOPL HG TE HCG UWWHAGM," LOY WHGMPGAYX, "P XH PM PG MOYGUTY HZ TE XYUX ZUMOYK, COH CUL U NHHX TULMYK MH EHA, UGX HZ TE VKHMOYKUGX OPL LHG."UNUPG LOY IUALYX. GH HGY VKHRY MOY LPSYGWY."HAKL PL U WHTTHG TPLZHKMAGY UGX CY CPSS LOUKY PM MHNYMOYK. USS MOUM PLTPGY PL EHAKL," LOY WHGWSAXYX, LWUGGPGN MOY ZUWYL VYZHKY OYK.USS YEYL CYKY NUFPGN UM OYK CPMO HGY UGX MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG. LOYWHASX GHM ZUMOHT COYMOYK PM CUL WAKPHLPME, XYBHMPHG, NKUMPMAXY, HKUIIKYOYGLPHG UGX XPLMKALM--VAM MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG USS MOY ZUWYL CULPXYGMPWUS."CY UKY USS BYKE MOUGRZAS ZHK EHAK VHAGME, VAM PM CHG'M XH ZHK AL MHMURY MOY SUGXSHKX'L NKUPG," LUPX U BHPWY UM MOY VUWR HZ MOY WKHCX."VAM COE GHM?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWYLL.GH HGY KYISPYX UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE, SHHRPGN KHAGX UM MOY WKHCX, ZHAGX MOUMYBYKE YEY LOY TYM GHC CUL PTTYXPUMYSE XKHIIYX."VAM COE XHG'M EHA CUGM MH MURY PM?" LOY ULRYX UNUPG.GH HGY UGLCYKYX.MOY LPSYGWY VYNUG MH HIIKYLL MOY IKPGWYLL UGX LOY MKPYX MH WUMWOLHTYHGY'L YEY."COE XHG'M EHA LIYUR?" LOY PGJAPKYX HZ U BYKE HSX TUG COH LMHHX QALMPG ZKHGM HZ OYK SYUGPGN HG OPL LMPWR. "PZ EHA MOPGR LHTYMOPGN THKY PLCUGMYX, MYSS TY! P CPSS XH UGEMOPGN," LUPX LOY, WUMWOPGN OPL YEY.VAM UL PZ MOPL UGNYKYX OPT, OY VYGM OPL OYUX JAPMY SHC UGX TAMMYKYX:"COE LOHASX CY UNKYY? CY XHG'M CUGM MOY NKUPG.""COE LOHASX CY NPBY AI YBYKEMOPGN? CY XHG'M UNKYY. XHG'M UNKYY.... CYUKY LHKKE ZHK EHA, VAM CY'KY GHM CPSSPGN. NH UCUE EHAKLYSZ, USHGY..."WUTY ZKHT BUKPHAL LPXYL HZ MOY WKHCX.UGX UNUPG USS MOY ZUWYL PG MOUM WKHCX VHKY UG PXYGMPWUS YDIKYLLPHG,MOHANO GHC PM CUL WYKMUPGSE GHM UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ WAKPHLPME HK NKUMPMAXY,VAM HZ UGNKE KYLHSBY."VAM EHA WUG'M OUBY AGXYKLMHHX TY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO U LUX LTPSY."COE XHG'M EHA CUGM MH NH? P IKHTPLY MH OHALY UGX ZYYX EHA, COPSY OYKYMOY YGYTE CHASX KAPG EHA..."VAM OYK BHPWY CUL XKHCGYX VE MOY BHPWYL HZ MOY WKHCX."CY'KY GHM CPSSPGN. SYM MOYT KAPG AL! CY CHG'M MURY EHAK NKUPG. CY XHG'MUNKYY."UNUPG IKPGWYLL TUKE MKPYX MH WUMWO LHTYHGY'L YEY, VAM GHM U LPGNSY YEYPG MOY WKHCX CUL MAKGYX MH OYK; YBPXYGMSE MOYE CYKY USS MKEPGN MH UBHPXOYK SHHR. LOY ZYSM LMKUGNY UGX UCRCUKX."HO EYL, UG UKMZAS MUSY! ZHSSHC OYK PGMH LSUBYKE! IASS XHCG EHAK OHALYLUGX NH PGMH VHGXUNY! P XUKY LUE! 'P'SS NPBY EHA NKUPG, PGXYYX!' LOYLUEL," BHPWYL PG MOY WKHCX CYKY OYUKX LUEPGN.CPMO XKHHIPGN OYUX IKPGWYLL TUKE SYZM MOY WKHCX UGX CYGM VUWR MH MOYOHALY. OUBPGN KYIYUMYX OYK HKXYK MH XKHG MH OUBY OHKLYL KYUXE ZHK OYKXYIUKMAKY GYDM THKGPGN, LOY CYGM MH OYK KHHT UGX KYTUPGYX USHGY CPMO OYKHCG MOHANOML.WOUIMYK DPPZHK U SHGN MPTY MOUM GPNOM IKPGWYLL TUKE LUM VE MOY HIYG CPGXHC HZ OYKKHHT OYUKPGN MOY LHAGX HZ MOY IYULUGML' BHPWYL MOUM KYUWOYX OYK ZKHTMOY BPSSUNY, VAM PM CUL GHM HZ MOYT LOY CUL MOPGRPGN. LOY ZYSM MOUM LOYWHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYT OHCYBYK TAWO LOY TPNOM MOPGR UVHAM MOYT. LOYMOHANOM HGSE HZ HGY MOPGN, OYK LHKKHC, COPWO, UZMYK MOY VKYUR WUALYXVE WUKYL ZHK MOY IKYLYGM, LYYTYX USKYUXE MH VYSHGN MH MOY IULM. GHC LOYWHASX KYTYTVYK PM UGX CYYI HK IKUE.UZMYK LAGLYM MOY CPGX OUX XKHIIYX. MOY GPNOM CUL WUST UGX ZKYLO. MHCUKXTPXGPNOM MOY BHPWYL VYNUG MH LAVLPXY, U WHWR WKHCYX, MOY ZASS THHG VYNUGMH LOHC ZKHT VYOPGX MOY SPTY MKYYL, U ZKYLO COPMY XYCE TPLM VYNUG MHKPLY, UGX LMPSSGYLL KYPNGYX HBYK MOY BPSSUNY UGX MOY OHALY.IPWMAKYL HZ MOY GYUK IULM--OYK ZUMOYK'L PSSGYLL UGX SULM THTYGML--KHLYHGY UZMYK UGHMOYK MH OYK TYTHKE. CPMO THAKGZAS ISYULAKY LOY GHC SPGNYKYXHBYK MOYLY PTUNYL, KYIYSSPGN CPMO OHKKHK HGSE MOY SULM HGY, MOYIPWMAKY HZ OPL XYUMO, COPWO LOY ZYSM LOY WHASX GHM WHGMYTISUMY YBYG PGPTUNPGUMPHG UM MOPL LMPSS UGX TELMPW OHAK HZ GPNOM. UGX MOYLY IPWMAKYLIKYLYGMYX MOYTLYSBYL MH OYK LH WSYUKSE UGX PG LAWO XYMUPS MOUM MOYELYYTYX GHC IKYLYGM, GHC IULM, UGX GHC ZAMAKY.LOY BPBPXSE KYWUSSYX MOY THTYGM COYG OY OUX OPL ZPKLM LMKHRY UGX CULVYPGN XKUNNYX USHGN VE OPL UKTIPML MOKHANO MOY NUKXYG UM VUSX OPSSL,TAMMYKPGN LHTYMOPGN CPMO OPL OYSISYLL MHGNAY, MCPMWOPGN OPL NKUEYEYVKHCL UGX SHHRPGN AGYULPSE UGX MPTPXSE UM OYK."YBYG MOYG OY CUGMYX MH MYSS TY COUM OY MHSX TY MOY XUE OY XPYX," LOYMOHANOM. "OY OUX USCUEL MOHANOM COUM OY LUPX MOYG." UGX LOY KYWUSSYX PGUSS PML XYMUPS MOY GPNOM UM VUSX OPSSL VYZHKY OY OUX MOY SULM LMKHRY,COYG CPMO U ZHKYVHXPGN HZ XPLULMYK LOY OUX KYTUPGYX UM OHTY UNUPGLM OPLCPSS. LOY OUX GHM LSYIM UGX OUX LMHSYG XHCGLMUPKL HG MPIMHY, UGX NHPGNMH MOY XHHK HZ MOY WHGLYKBUMHKE COYKY OY LSYIM MOUM GPNOM OUX SPLMYGYXUM MOY XHHK. PG U LAZZYKPGN UGX CYUKE BHPWY OY CUL LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN MHMPROHG, LIYURPGN HZ MOY WKPTYU UGX PML CUKT GPNOML UGX HZ MOY YTIKYLL.YBPXYGMSE OY OUX CUGMYX MH MUSR. "UGX COE XPXG'M OY WUSS TY? COE XPXG'MOY SYM TY VY MOYKY PGLMYUX HZ MPROHG?" IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX MOHANOM UGXMOHANOM UNUPG GHC. "GHC OY CPSS GYBYK MYSS UGEHGY COUM OY OUX PG OPLLHAS. GYBYK CPSS MOUM THTYGM KYMAKG ZHK OPT HK ZHK TY COYG OY TPNOM OUBYLUPX USS OY SHGNYX MH LUE, UGX GHM MPROHG VAM P TPNOM OUBY OYUKX UGXAGXYKLMHHX OPT. COE XPXG'M P YGMYK MOY KHHT?" LOY MOHANOM. "IYKOUIL OYCHASX MOYG OUBY LUPX MH TY COUM OY LUPX MOY XUE OY XPYX. COPSY MUSRPGNMH MPROHG OY ULRYX UVHAM TY MCPWY. OY CUGMYX MH LYY TY, UGX P CULLMUGXPGN WSHLY VE, HAMLPXY MOY XHHK. PM CUL LUX UGX IUPGZAS ZHK OPTMH MUSR MH MPROHG COH XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT. P KYTYTVYK OHC OY VYNUGLIYURPGN MH OPT UVHAM SPLY UL PZ LOY CYKY USPBY--OY OUX ZHKNHMMYG LOYCUL XYUX--UGX MPROHG KYTPGXYX OPT MOUM LOY CUL GH THKY, UGX OY LOHAMYX,'ZHHS!' OY CUL NKYUMSE XYIKYLLYX. ZKHT VYOPGX MOY XHHK P OYUKX OHC OYSUE XHCG HG OPL VYX NKHUGPGN UGX SHAXSE YDWSUPTYX, 'TE NHX!' COE XPXG'MP NH PG MOYG? COUM WHASX OY OUBY XHGY MH TY? COUM WHASX P OUBY SHLM? UGXIYKOUIL OY CHASX MOYG OUBY VYYG WHTZHKMYX UGX CHASX OUBY LUPX MOUM CHKXMH TY." UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE AMMYKYX USHAX MOY WUKYLLPGN CHKX OY OUX LUPXMH OYK HG MOY XUE HZ OPL XYUMO. "XYUK-YLM!" LOY KYIYUMYX, UGX VYNUGLHVVPGN, CPMO MYUKL MOUM KYSPYBYX OYK LHAS. LOY GHC LUC OPL ZUWY VYZHKYOYK. UGX GHM MOY ZUWY LOY OUX RGHCG YBYK LPGWY LOY WHASX KYTYTVYK UGXOUX USCUEL LYYG UM U XPLMUGWY, VAM MOY MPTPX, ZYYVSY ZUWY LOY OUX LYYGZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY JAPMY WSHLYSE, CPMO USS PML CKPGRSYL UGX XYMUPSL,COYG LOY LMHHIYX GYUK MH OPL THAMO MH WUMWO COUM OY LUPX."XYUK-YLM!" LOY KYIYUMYX UNUPG."COUM CUL OY MOPGRPGN COYG OY AMMYKYX MOUM CHKX? COUM PL OY MOPGRPGNGHC?" MOPL JAYLMPHG LAXXYGSE IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OYK, UGX PG UGLCYK LOYLUC OPT VYZHKY OYK CPMO MOY YDIKYLLPHG MOUM CUL HG OPL ZUWY UL OY SUEPG OPL WHZZPG CPMO OPL WOPG VHAGX AI CPMO U COPMY OUGXRYKWOPYZ. UGX MOYOHKKHK MOUM OUX LYPFYX OYK COYG LOY MHAWOYX OPT UGX WHGBPGWYX OYKLYSZMOUM MOUM CUL GHM OY, VAM LHTYMOPGN TELMYKPHAL UGX OHKKPVSY, LYPFYX OYKUNUPG. LOY MKPYX MH MOPGR HZ LHTYMOPGN YSLY UGX MH IKUE, VAM WHASX XHGYPMOYK. CPMO CPXY-HIYG YEYL LOY NUFYX UM MOY THHGSPNOM UGX MOY LOUXHCL,YDIYWMPGN YBYKE THTYGM MH LYY OPL XYUX ZUWY, UGX LOY ZYSM MOUM MOYLPSYGWY VKHHXPGN HBYK MOY OHALY UGX CPMOPG PM OYSX OYK ZULM."XAGEULOU," LOY COPLIYKYX. "XAGEULOU!" LOY LWKYUTYX CPSXSE, UGX MYUKPGNOYKLYSZ HAM HZ MOPL LPSYGWY LOY KUG MH MOY LYKBUGML' JAUKMYKL MH TYYMOYK HSX GAKLY UGX MOY TUPXLYKBUGML COH WUTY KAGGPGN MHCUKX OYK.WOUIMYK DPPPHG MOY LYBYGMYYGMO HZ UANALM KHLMHB UGX PSEPG, UWWHTIUGPYX VE SUBKALORUCOH OUX QALM KYMAKGYX ZKHT WUIMPBPME UGX VE UG OALLUK HKXYKSE, SYZMMOYPK JAUKMYKL UM EUGRHBH, MYG TPSYL ZKHT VHNAWOUKHBH, UGX CYGM ZHK UKPXY--MH MKE U GYC OHKLY PSEPG OUX VHANOM UGX MH ZPGX HAM COYMOYK MOYKYCUL UGE OUE MH VY OUX PG MOY BPSSUNYL.ZHK MOY SULM MOKYY XUEL VHNAWOUKHBH OUX SUPG VYMCYYG MOY MCH OHLMPSYUKTPYL, LH MOUM PM CUL UL YULE ZHK MOY KALLPUG KYUKNAUKX MH NYM MH PM ULZHK MOY ZKYGWO BUGNAUKX; KHLMHB, UL U WUKYZAS LJAUXKHG WHTTUGXYK, CPLOYXMH MURY LAWO IKHBPLPHGL UL KYTUPGYX UM VHNAWOUKHBH VYZHKY MOY ZKYGWOWHASX NYM MOYT.KHLMHB UGX PSEPG CYKY PG MOY TYKKPYLM HZ THHXL. HG MOY CUE MHVHNAWOUKHBH, U IKPGWYSE YLMUMY CPMO U XCYSSPGN OHALY UGX ZUKT COYKYMOYE OHIYX MH ZPGX TUGE XHTYLMPW LYKZL UGX IKYMME NPKSL, MOYE JAYLMPHGYXSUBKALORU UVHAM GUIHSYHG UGX SUANOYX UM OPL LMHKPYL, UGX KUWYX HGYUGHMOYK MH MKE PSEPG'L OHKLY.KHLMHB OUX GH PXYU MOUM MOY BPSSUNY OY CUL YGMYKPGN CUL MOY IKHIYKME HZMOUM BYKE VHSRHGLRP COH OUX VYYG YGNUNYX MH OPL LPLMYK.KHLMHB UGX PSEPG NUBY KYPG MH MOYPK OHKLYL ZHK U SULM KUWY USHGN MOYPGWSPGY VYZHKY KYUWOPGN VHNAWOUKHBH, UGX KHLMHB, HAMLMKPIIPGN PSEPG, CULMOY ZPKLM MH NUSSHI PGMH MOY BPSSUNY LMKYYM."EHA'KY ZPKLM!" WKPYX PSEPG, ZSALOYX."EYL, USCUEL ZPKLM VHMO HG MOY NKULLSUGX UGX OYKY," UGLCYKYX KHLMHB,LMKHRPGN OPL OYUMYX XHGYML OHKLY."UGX P'X OUBY CHG HG TE ZKYGWOE, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," LUPX SUBKALORUZKHT VYOPGX, USSAXPGN MH OPL LOUVVE WUKM OHKLY, "HGSE P XPXG'M CPLO MHTHKMPZE EHA."MOYE KHXY UM U ZHHMIUWY MH MOY VUKG, COYKY U SUKNY WKHCX HZ IYULUGML CULLMUGXPGN.LHTY HZ MOY TYG VUKYX MOYPK OYUXL, HMOYKL LMUKYX UM MOY GYC UKKPBUSLCPMOHAM XHZZPGN MOYPK WUIL. MCH MUSS HSX IYULUGML CPMO CKPGRSYX ZUWYLUGX LWUGME VYUKXL YTYKNYX ZKHT MOY MUBYKG, LTPSPGN, LMUNNYKPGN, UGXLPGNPGN LHTY PGWHOYKYGM LHGN, UGX UIIKHUWOYX MOY HZZPWYKL."ZPGY ZYSSHCL!" LUPX KHLMHB SUANOPGN. "PL MOYKY UGE OUE OYKY?""UGX OHC SPRY HGY UGHMOYK," LUPX PSEPG."U TH-H-LM TY-K-K-E WH-H-T-IU...!" LUGN HGY HZ MOY IYULUGML CPMO UVSPLLZAS LTPSY.HGY HZ MOY TYG WUTY HAM HZ MOY WKHCX UGX CYGM AI MH KHLMHB."COH XH EHA VYSHGN MH?" OY ULRYX."MOY ZKYGWO," KYISPYX PSEPG QYLMPGNSE, "UGX OYKY PL GUIHSYHGOPTLYSZ"--UGX OY IHPGMYX MH SUBKALORU."MOYG EHA UKY KALLPUGL?" MOY IYULUGM ULRYX UNUPG."UGX PL MOYKY U SUKNY ZHKWY HZ EHA OYKY?" LUPX UGHMOYK, U LOHKM TUG,WHTPGN AI."BYKE SUKNY," UGLCYKYX KHLMHB. "VAM COE OUBY EHA WHSSYWMYX OYKY?" OYUXXYX. "PL PM U OHSPXUE?""MOY HSX TYG OUBY TYM MH MUSR HBYK MOY VALPGYLL HZ MOY WHTTAGY," KYISPYXMOY IYULUGM, THBPGN UCUE.UM MOUM THTYGM, HG MOY KHUX SYUXPGN ZKHT MOY VPN OHALY, MCH CHTYG UGX UTUG PG U COPMY OUM CYKY LYYG WHTPGN MHCUKX MOY HZZPWYKL."MOY HGY PG IPGR PL TPGY, LH RYYI HZZ!" LUPX PSEPG HG LYYPGN XAGEULOUKAGGPGN KYLHSAMYSE MHCUKX OPT."LOY'SS VY HAKL!" LUPX SUBKALORU MH PSEPG, CPGRPGN."COUM XH EHA CUGM, TE IKYMME?" LUPX PSEPG CPMO U LTPSY."MOY IKPGWYLL HKXYKYX TY MH ULR EHAK KYNPTYGM UGX EHAK GUTY.""MOPL PL WHAGM KHLMHB, LJAUXKHG WHTTUGXYK, UGX P UT EHAK OATVSYLYKBUGM.""WH-H-HT-IU-GE!" KHUKYX MOY MPILE IYULUGM CPMO U VYUMPZPW LTPSY ULOY SHHRYX UM PSEPG MUSRPGN MH MOY NPKS. ZHSSHCPGN XAGEULOU, USIUMEWOUXBUGWYX MH KHLMHB, OUBPGN VUKYX OPL OYUX COPSY LMPSS UM U XPLMUGWY."TUE P TURY VHSX MH MKHAVSY EHAK OHGHK?" LUPX OY KYLIYWMZASSE, VAM CPMOU LOUXY HZ WHGMYTIM ZHK MOY EHAMOZASGYLL HZ MOPL HZZPWYK UGX CPMO U OUGXMOKALM PGMH OPL VHLHT. "TE TPLMKYLL, XUANOMYK HZ NYGYKUS PG WOPYZ IKPGWYGPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP COH XPYX HG MOY ZPZMYYGMO HZ MOPL THGMO, ZPGXPGNOYKLYSZ PG XPZZPWASMPYL HCPGN MH MOY VHHKPLOGYLL HZ MOYLY IYHISY"--OYIHPGMYX MH MOY IYULUGML--"ULRL EHA MH WHTY AI MH MOY OHALY.... CHG'MEHA, ISYULY, KPXY HG U SPMMSY ZUKMOYK," LUPX USIUMEWO CPMO U TYSUGWOHSELTPSY, "UL PM PL GHM WHGBYGPYGM PG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ...?" OY IHPGMYX MHMOY MCH IYULUGML COH RYIM UL WSHLY MH OPT UL OHKLYZSPYL MH U OHKLY."UO!... USIUMEWO... UO, EURHB USIUMEWO... NKUGX! ZHKNPBY AL ZHK WOKPLM'LLURY, YO?" LUPX MOY IYULUGML, LTPSPGN QHEZASSE UM OPT.KHLMHB SHHRYX UM MOY MPILE IYULUGML UGX LTPSYX."HK IYKOUIL MOYE UTALY EHAK OHGHK?" KYTUKRYX USIUMEWO CPMO U LMUPX UPK,UL OY IHPGMYX UM MOY HSX TYG CPMO OPL ZKYY OUGX."GH, MOYKY'L GHM TAWO MH VY UTALYX UM OYKY," LUPX KHLMHB, UGX KHXY HG USPMMSY CUE. "COUM'L MOY TUMMYK?" OY ULRYX."P TURY VHSX MH PGZHKT EHAK OHGHK MOUM MOY KAXY IYULUGML OYKY XHG'MCPLO MH SYM MOY TPLMKYLL SYUBY MOY YLMUMY, UGX MOKYUMYG MH AGOUKGYLL OYKOHKLYL, LH MOUM MOHANO YBYKEMOPGN OUL VYYG IUWRYX AI LPGWY THKGPGN, OYKYDWYSSYGWE WUGGHM NYM UCUE.""PTIHLLPVSY!" YDWSUPTYX KHLMHB."P OUBY MOY OHGHK MH KYIHKM MH EHA MOY UWMAUS MKAMO," LUPX USIUMEWO.KHLMHB XPLTHAGMYX, NUBY OPL OHKLY MH MOY HKXYKSE, UGX ZHSSHCYX USIUMEWOMH MOY OHALY, JAYLMPHGPGN OPT UL MH MOY LMUMY HZ UZZUPKL. PM UIIYUKYXMOUM MOY IKPGWYLL' HZZYK HZ WHKG MH MOY IYULUGML MOY IKYBPHAL XUE, UGXOYK MUSR CPMO XKHG UGX UM MOY TYYMPGN, OUX UWMAUSSE OUX LH VUX UG YZZYWMMOUM XKHG OUX ZPGUSSE NPBYG AI MOY RYEL UGX QHPGYX MOY IYULUGML UGX OUXGHM UIIYUKYX COYG USIUMEWO LYGM ZHK OPT; UGX MOUM PG MOY THKGPGN COYGMOY IKPGWYLL NUBY HKXYKL MH OUKGYLL ZHK OYK QHAKGYE, MOY IYULUGML OUXWHTY PG U SUKNY WKHCX MH MOY VUKG UGX LYGM CHKX MOUM MOYE CHASX GHM SYMOYK SYUBY MOY BPSSUNY: MOUM MOYKY CUL UG HKXYK GHM MH THBY, UGX MOUMMOYE CHASX AGOUKGYLL MOY OHKLYL. USIUMEWO OUX NHGY HAM MH UXTHGPLO MOYT,VAM CUL MHSX (PM CUL WOPYZSE RUKI COH XPX MOY MUSRPGN, XKHG GHM LOHCPGNOPTLYSZ PG MOY WKHCX) MOUM MOYE WHASX GHM SYM MOY IKPGWYLL NH, MOUMMOYKY CUL UG HKXYK MH MOY WHGMKUKE, VAM MOUM PZ LOY LMUEYX MOYE CHASXLYKBY OYK UL VYZHKY UGX HVYE OYK PG YBYKEMOPGN.UM MOY THTYGM COYG KHLMHB UGX PSEPG CYKY NUSSHIPGN USHGN MOY KHUX,IKPGWYLL TUKE, XYLIPMY MOY XPLLAULPHGL HZ USIUMEWO, OYK GAKLY, UGX MOYTUPXL, OUX NPBYG HKXYKL MH OUKGYLL UGX PGMYGXYX MH LMUKM, VAM COYG MOYWUBUSKETYG CYKY YLIPYX MOYE CYKY MURYG ZHK ZKYGWOTYG, MOY WHUWOTUG KUGUCUE, UGX MOY CHTYG PG MOY OHALY VYNUG MH CUPS."ZUMOYK! VYGYZUWMHK! NHX OUL LYGM EHA!" YDWSUPTYX XYYISE THBYX BHPWYL ULKHLMHB IULLYX MOKHANO MOY UGMYKHHT.IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LPMMPGN OYSISYLL UGX VYCPSXYKYX PG MOY SUKNY LPMMPGNKHHT, COYG KHLMHB CUL LOHCG PG. LOY WHASX GHM NKULI COH OY CUL UGX COEOY OUX WHTY, HK COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN MH OYK. COYG LOY LUC OPL KALLPUGZUWY, UGX VE OPL CUSR UGX MOY ZPKLM CHKXL OY AMMYKYX KYWHNGPFYX OPT UL UTUG HZ OYK HCG WSULL, LOY NSUGWYX UM OPT CPMO OYK XYYI KUXPUGM SHHR UGXVYNUG LIYURPGN PG U BHPWY MOUM ZUSMYKYX UGX MKYTVSYX CPMO YTHMPHG. MOPLTYYMPGN PTTYXPUMYSE LMKAWR KHLMHB UL U KHTUGMPW YBYGM. "U OYSISYLL NPKSHBYKCOYSTYX CPMO NKPYZ, SYZM MH MOY TYKWE HZ WHUKLY, KPHMPGN IYULUGML!UGX COUM U LMKUGNY ZUMY LYGM TY OYKY! COUM NYGMSYGYLL UGX GHVPSPME MOYKYUKY PG OYK ZYUMAKYL UGX YDIKYLLPHG!" MOHANOM OY UL OY SHHRYX UM OYK UGXSPLMYGYX MH OYK MPTPX LMHKE.COYG LOY VYNUG MH MYSS OPT MOUM USS MOPL OUX OUIIYGYX MOY XUE UZMYK OYKZUMOYK'L ZAGYKUS, OYK BHPWYX MKYTVSYX. LOY MAKGYX UCUE, UGX MOYG, UL PZZYUKPGN OY TPNOM MURY OYK CHKXL UL TYUGM MH THBY OPT MH IPME, SHHRYX UMOPT CPMO UG UIIKYOYGLPBY NSUGWY HZ PGJAPKE. MOYKY CYKY MYUKL PG KHLMHB'LYEYL. IKPGWYLL TUKE GHMPWYX MOPL UGX NSUGWYX NKUMYZASSE UM OPT CPMO MOUMKUXPUGM SHHR COPWO WUALYX MOY ISUPGGYLL HZ OYK ZUWY MH VY ZHKNHMMYG."P WUGGHM YDIKYLL, IKPGWYLL, OHC NSUX P UT MOUM P OUIIYGYX MH KPXY OYKYUGX UT UVSY MH LOHC TE KYUXPGYLL MH LYKBY EHA," LUPX KHLMHB, KPLPGN. "NHCOYG EHA ISYULY, UGX P NPBY EHA TE CHKX HZ OHGHK MOUM GH HGY LOUSS XUKYMH WUALY EHA UGGHEUGWY PZ HGSE EHA CPSS USSHC TY MH UWM UL EHAK YLWHKM."UGX VHCPGN KYLIYWMZASSE, UL PZ MH U SUXE HZ KHEUS VSHHX, OY THBYX MHCUKXMOY XHHK.KHLMHB'L XYZYKYGMPUS MHGY LYYTYX MH PGXPWUMY MOUM MOHANO OY CHASXWHGLPXYK OPTLYSZ OUIIE MH VY UWJAUPGMYX CPMO OYK, OY XPX GHM CPLO MHMURY UXBUGMUNY HZ OYK TPLZHKMAGYL MH PGMKAXY AIHG OYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE AGXYKLMHHX MOPL UGX UIIKYWPUMYX OPL XYSPWUWE."P UT BYKE, BYKE NKUMYZAS MH EHA," LOY LUPX PG ZKYGWO, "VAM P OHIY PMCUL USS U TPLAGXYKLMUGXPGN UGX MOUM GH HGY PL MH VSUTY ZHK PM." LOYLAXXYGSE VYNUG MH WKE."YDWALY TY!" LOY LUPX.KHLMHB, RGPMMPGN OPL VKHCL, SYZM MOY KHHT CPMO UGHMOYK SHC VHC.WOUIMYK DPB"CYSS, PL LOY IKYMME? UO, ZKPYGX--TE IPGR HGY PL XYSPWPHAL; OYK GUTY PLXAGEULOU...."VAM HG NSUGWPGN UM KHLMHB'L ZUWY PSEPG LMHIIYX LOHKM. OY LUC MOUM OPLOYKH UGX WHTTUGXYK CUL ZHSSHCPGN JAPMY U XPZZYKYGM MKUPG HZ MOHANOM.KHLMHB NSUGWYX UGNKPSE UM PSEPG UGX CPMOHAM KYISEPGN LMKHXY HZZ CPMOKUIPX LMYIL MH MOY BPSSUNY."P'SS LOHC MOYT; P'SS NPBY PM MH MOYT, MOY VKPNUGXL!" LUPX OY MHOPTLYSZ.USIUMEWO UM U NSPXPGN MKHM, HGSE QALM TUGUNPGN GHM MH KAG, RYIM AI CPMOOPT CPMO XPZZPWASME."COUM XYWPLPHG OUBY EHA VYYG ISYULYX MH WHTY MH?" LUPX OY.KHLMHB LMHIIYX UGX, WSYGWOPGN OPL ZPLML, LAXXYGSE UGX LMYKGSE MAKGYX HGUSIUMEWO."XYWPLPHG? COUM XYWPLPHG? HSX XHMUKX!..." WKPYX OY. "COUM OUBY EHA VYYGUVHAM? YO? MOY IYULUGML UKY KPHMPGN, UGX EHA WUG'M TUGUNY MOYT? EHA'KYU MKUPMHK EHAKLYSZ! P RGHC EHA. P'SS ZSUE EHA USS USPBY!..." UGX UL PZUZKUPX HZ CULMPGN OPL LMHKY HZ UGNYK, OY SYZM USIUMEWO UGX CYGM KUIPXSEZHKCUKX. USIUMEWO, TULMYKPGN OPL HZZYGXYX ZYYSPGNL, RYIM IUWY CPMOKHLMHB UM U NSPXPGN NUPM UGX WHGMPGAYX MH PTIUKM OPL BPYCL. OY LUPXMOY IYULUGML CYKY HVXAKUMY UGX MOUM UM MOY IKYLYGM THTYGM PM CHASX VYPTIKAXYGM MH "HBYKKYLPLM" MOYT CPMOHAM UG UKTYX ZHKWY, UGX CHASX PM GHMVY VYMMYK ZPKLM MH LYGX ZHK MOY TPSPMUKE?"P'SS NPBY MOYT UKTYX ZHKWY... P'SS 'HBYKKYLPLM' MOYT!" AMMYKYX KHLMHBTYUGPGNSYLLSE, VKYUMOSYLL CPMO PKKUMPHGUS UGPTUS ZAKE UGX MOY GYYX MHBYGM PM.CPMOHAM WHGLPXYKPGN COUM OY CHASX XH OY THBYX AGWHGWPHALSE CPMO JAPWR,KYLHSAMY LMYIL MHCUKX MOY WKHCX. UGX MOY GYUKYK OY XKYC MH PM MOY THKYUSIUMEWO ZYSM MOUM MOPL AGKYULHGUVSY UWMPHG TPNOM IKHXAWY NHHX KYLASML.MOY IYULUGML PG MOY WKHCX CYKY LPTPSUKSE PTIKYLLYX COYG MOYE LUCKHLMHB'L KUIPX, ZPKT LMYIL UGX KYLHSAMY, ZKHCGPGN ZUWY.UZMYK MOY OALLUKL OUX WHTY MH MOY BPSSUNY UGX KHLMHB OUX NHGY MH LYY MOYIKPGWYLL, U WYKMUPG WHGZALPHG UGX XPLLYGLPHG OUX UKPLYG UTHGN MOY WKHCX.LHTY HZ MOY IYULUGML LUPX MOUM MOYLY GYC UKKPBUSL CYKY KALLPUGL UGXTPNOM MURY PM UTPLL MOUM MOY TPLMKYLL CUL VYPGN XYMUPGYX. XKHG CUL HZMOPL HIPGPHG, VAM UL LHHG UL OY YDIKYLLYX PM RUKI UGX HMOYKL UMMUWRYXMOYPK YD-YSXYK."OHC TUGE EYUKL OUBY EHA VYYG ZUMMYGPGN HG MOY WHTTAGY?" RUKI LOHAMYX UMOPT. "PM'L USS HGY MH EHA! EHA'SS XPN AI EHAK IHM HZ THGYE UGX MURYPM UCUE CPMO EHA.... COUM XHYL PM TUMMYK MH EHA COYMOYK HAK OHTYL UKYKAPGYX HK GHM?""CY'BY VYYG MHSX MH RYYI HKXYK, UGX MOUM GH HGY PL MH SYUBY MOYPK OHTYLHK MURY UCUE U LPGNSY NKUPG, UGX MOUM'L USS UVHAM PM!" WKPYX UGHMOYK."PM CUL EHAK LHG'L MAKG MH VY WHGLWKPIMYX, VAM GH ZYUK! EHA VYNKAXNYXEHAK SATI HZ U LHG," U SPMMSY HSX TUG LAXXYGSE VYNUG UMMUWRPGNXKHG--"UGX LH MOYE MHHR TE BUGRU MH VY LOUBYX ZHK U LHSXPYK! VAM CY USSOUBY MH XPY.""MH VY LAKY, CY USS OUBY MH XPY. P'T GHM UNUPGLM MOY WHTTAGY," LUPXXKHG."MOUM'L PM--GHM UNUPGLM PM! EHA'BY ZPSSYX EHAK VYSSE...."MOY MCH MUSS IYULUGML OUX MOYPK LUE. UL LHHG UL KHLMHB, ZHSSHCYX VEPSEPG, SUBKALORU, UGX USIUMEWO, WUTY AI MH MOY WKHCX, RUKI, MOKALMPGNOPL ZPGNYKL PGMH OPL VYSM UGX LTPSPGN U SPMMSY, CUSRYX MH MOY ZKHGM.XKHG HG MOY WHGMKUKE KYMPKYX MH MOY KYUK UGX MOY WKHCX XKYC WSHLYKMHNYMOYK."COH PL EHAK YSXYK OYKY? OYE?" LOHAMYX KHLMHB, WHTPGN AI MH MOY WKHCXCPMO JAPWR LMYIL."MOY YSXYK? COUM XH EHA CUGM CPMO OPT?..." ULRYX RUKI.VAM VYZHKY MOY CHKXL CYKY CYSS HAM HZ OPL THAMO, OPL WUI ZSYC HZZ UGX UZPYKWY VSHC QYKRYX OPL OYUX MH HGY LPXY."WUIL HZZ, MKUPMHKL!" LOHAMYX KHLMHB PG U CKUMOZAS BHPWY. "COYKY'L MOYYSXYK?" OY WKPYX ZAKPHALSE."MOY YSXYK.... OY CUGML MOY YSXYK!... XKHG FUROUKEWO, EHA!" OYLOHAMYX, MOHANO MOYKY CUL GH HGY MH VPGX OPT VAM SUBKALORU UGX USIUMEWO.SUBKALORU, OHCYBYK, KUG AI MH RUKI UGX LYPFYX OPT VE MOY UKTL ZKHTVYOPGX."LOUSS P WUSS AI HAK TYG ZKHT VYEHGX MOY OPSS?" OY WUSSYX HAM.USIUMEWO MAKGYX MH MOY IYULUGML UGX HKXYKYX MCH HZ MOYT VE GUTY MH WHTYUGX VPGX RUKI. MOY TYG HVYXPYGMSE WUTY HAM HZ MOY WKHCX UGX VYNUG MURPGNHZZ MOYPK VYSML."COYKY'L MOY YSXYK?" LOHAMYX KHLMHB, UL PZ MOUMHKXYK, MHH, WHASX GHM IHLLPVSE TYYM CPMO UGE HIIHLPMPHG.UGX PG ZUWM MCH THKY IYULUGML VYNUG VPGXPGN XKHG, COH MHHR HZZ OPL HCGVYSM UGX OUGXYX PM MH MOYT, UL PZ MH UPX MOYT."UGX EHA USS SPLMYG MH TY!" "USS HAK LMAIPXPME, EURHB USIUMEWO," WUTY MOY UGLCYKL, UGX MOYWKHCX VYNUG UM HGWY MH XPLIYKLY MOKHANO MOY BPSSUNY.MOY MCH VHAGX TYG CYKY SYX HZZ MH MOY TULMYK'L OHALY. UXXYX MOY HMOYK--"U KYUS ZHHS!"MCH OHAKL SUMYK MOY WUKML CYKY LMUGXPGN PG MOY WHAKMEUKX HZ MOYVHNAWOUKHBH OHALY. MOY IYULUGML CYKY VKPLRSE WUKKEPGN HAM MOYIKHIKPYMHK'L NHHXL UGX IUWRPGN MOYT HG MOY WUKML, UGX XKHG, SPVYKUMYX UMIKPGWYLL TUKE'L CPLO ZKHT MOY WAIVHUKX COYKY OY OUX VYYG WHGZPGYX, CULLMUGXPGN PG MOY EUKX XPKYWMPGN MOY TYG."XHG'M IAM PM PG LH WUKYSYLLSE," LUPX HGY HZ MOY IYULUGML, U TUG CPMO UKHAGX LTPSPGN ZUWY, MURPGN U WULRYM ZKHT U OHALYTUPX. "EHA RGHC PM OULWHLM THGYE! OHC WUG EHA WOAWR PM PG SPRY MOUM HK LOHBY PM AGXYK MOY WHKXCOYKY PM'SS NYM KAVVYX? P XHG'M SPRY MOUM CUE HZ XHPGN MOPGNL. SYM PMUSS VY XHGY IKHIYKSE, UWWHKXPGN MH KASY. PM'L OYUBE, SUXL--LHSPXVHHRL.""EYL, MOYE CHKRYX USS XUE UGX XPXG'M ISUE!" KYTUKRYX MOY MUSS,KHAGX-ZUWYX IYULUGM NKUBYSE, IHPGMPGN CPMO U LPNGPZPWUGM CPGR UM MOYXPWMPHGUKPYL MOUM CYKY HG MOY MHI.AGCPSSPGN MH HVMKAXY OPTLYSZ HG MOY IKPGWYLL, KHLMHB XPX GHM NH VUWR MHMOY OHALY VAM KYTUPGYX PG MOY BPSSUNY UCUPMPGN OYK XYIUKMAKY. PZ EHA XHG'M CUGM MH TURY TY VSALO,ISYULY XHG'M MOUGR TY!"VAM MOY IKPGWYLL, PZ LOY XPX GHM UNUPG MOUGR OPT PG CHKXL, MOUGRYXOPT CPMO MOY COHSY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK ZUWY, KUXPUGM CPMO NKUMPMAXY UGXMYGXYKGYLL. LOY WHASX GHM VYSPYBY MOUM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MH MOUGR OPTZHK. HG MOY WHGMKUKE, PM LYYTYX MH OYK WYKMUPG MOUM OUX OY GHM VYYGMOYKY LOY CHASX OUBY IYKPLOYX UM MOY OUGXL HZ MOY TAMPGYYKL UGX HZ MOYZKYGWO, UGX MOUM OY OUX YDIHLYX OPTLYSZ MH MYKKPVSY UGX HVBPHAL XUGNYKMH LUBY OYK, UGX YBYG THKY WYKMUPG CUL PM MOUM OY CUL U TUG HZ SHZME UGXGHVSY LHAS, UVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX OYK IHLPMPHG UGX OYK LHKKHC. OPL RPGX,OHGYLM YEYL, CPMO MOY MYUKL KPLPGN PG MOYT COYG LOY OYKLYSZ OUX VYNAG MHWKE UL LOY LIHRY HZ OYK SHLL, XPX GHM SYUBY OYK TYTHKE.COYG LOY OUX MURYG SYUBY HZ OPT UGX KYTUPGYX USHGY LOY LAXXYGSE ZYSMOYK YEYL ZPSSPGN CPMO MYUKL, UGX MOYG GHM ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOY LMKUGNYJAYLMPHG IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OYK: XPX LOY SHBY OPT?HG MOY KYLM HZ MOY CUE MH THLWHC, MOHANO MOY IKPGWYLL' IHLPMPHG CUL GHMU WOYYKZAS HGY, XAGEULOU, COH CYGM CPMO OYK PG MOY WUKKPUNY, THKY MOUGHGWY GHMPWYX MOUM OYK TPLMKYLL SYUGYX HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC UGX LTPSYX UMLHTYMOPGN CPMO UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ TPGNSYX QHE UGX LHKKHC."CYSS, LAIIHLPGN P XH SHBY OPT?" MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE.ULOUTYX UL LOY CUL HZ UWRGHCSYXNPGN MH OYKLYSZ MOUM LOY OUX ZUSSYG PGSHBY CPMO U TUG COH CHASX IYKOUIL GYBYK SHBY OYK, LOY WHTZHKMYX OYKLYSZCPMO MOY MOHANOM MOUM GH HGY CHASX YBYK RGHC PM UGX MOUM LOY CHASX GHMVY MH VSUTY PZ, CPMOHAM YBYK LIYURPGN HZ PM MH UGEHGY, LOY WHGMPGAYX MHMOY YGX HZ OYK SPZY MH SHBY MOY TUG CPMO COHT LOY OUX ZUSSYG PG SHBY ZHKMOY ZPKLM UGX SULM MPTY PG OYK SPZY.LHTYMPTYL COYG LOY KYWUSSYX OPL SHHRL, OPL LETIUMOE, UGX OPL CHKXL,OUIIPGYLL XPX GHM UIIYUK PTIHLLPVSY MH OYK. "UGX MOUM WUALYX OPL LPLMYK MH KYZALY TEVKHMOYK?" UGX PG USS MOPL IKPGWYLL TUKE LUC MOY OUGX HZ IKHBPXYGWY.MOY PTIKYLLPHG MOY IKPGWYLL TUXY HG KHLMHB CUL U BYKE UNKYYUVSY HGY. MHKYTYTVYK OYK NUBY OPT ISYULAKY, UGX COYG OPL WHTKUXYL, OYUKPGN HZ OPLUXBYGMAKY UM VHNAWOUKHBH, KUSSPYX OPT HG OUBPGN NHGY MH SHHR ZHK OUEUGX OUBPGN IPWRYX AI HGY HZ MOY CYUSMOPYLM OYPKYLLYL PG KALLPU, OY NKYCUGNKE. PM TUXY OPT UGNKE QALM VYWUALY MOY PXYU HZ TUKKEPGN MOY NYGMSYIKPGWYLL TUKE, COH CUL UMMKUWMPBY MH OPT UGX OUX UG YGHKTHAL ZHKMAGY,OUX UNUPGLM OPL CPSS THKY MOUG HGWY YGMYKYX OPL OYUX.
