MOUM CUL COE KHLMHB NKYC UGNKE COYG OYCUL KUSSPYX UVHAM IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU.WOUIMYK DBHG KYWYPBPGN WHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTPYL RAMAFHB KYTYTVYKYX IKPGWY UGXKYC UGXLYGM UG HKXYK ZHK OPT MH KYIHKM UM OYUXJAUKMYKL.IKPGWY UGXKYC UKKPBYX UM MLUKYBH-FUETPLOWOY HG MOY BYKE XUE UGX UM MOYBYKE OHAK MOUM RAMAFHB CUL KYBPYCPGN MOY MKHHIL ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY. OYLMHIIYX PG MOY BPSSUNY UM MOY IKPYLM'L OHALY PG ZKHGM HZ COPWO LMHHX MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L WUKKPUNY, UGX OY LUM XHCG HG MOY VYGWO UM MOY NUMYUCUPMPGN OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL, UL YBYKEHGY GHC WUSSYX RAMAFHB. ZKHT MOYZPYSX VYEHGX MOY BPSSUNY WUTY GHC LHAGXL HZ KYNPTYGMUS TALPW UGX GHC MOYKHUK HZ TUGE BHPWYL LOHAMPGN "OAKKUO!" MH MOY GYC WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.MCH HKXYKSPYL, U WHAKPYK UGX U TUQHK-XHTH, LMHHX GYUK VE, LHTY MYG IUWYLZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYC, UBUPSPGN MOYTLYSBYL HZ RAMAFHB'L UVLYGWY UGX HZ MOYZPGY CYUMOYK. U LOHKM, LCUKMOE SPYAMYGUGM WHSHGYS HZ OALLUKL CPMO MOPWRTALMUWOYL UGX COPLRYKL KHXY AI MH MOY NUMY UGX, NSUGWPGN UM IKPGWYUGXKYC, PGJAPKYX COYMOYK OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL CUL IAMMPGN AI MOYKY UGXCOYMOYK OY CHASX LHHG VY VUWR.IKPGWY UGXKYC KYISPYX MOUM OY CUL GHM HG OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL' LMUZZVAM CUL OPTLYSZ U GYC UKKPBUS. PVYSHGN MH MOY IKHBPGWY HZ LTHSYGLR.""UO? EHA'KY ICPGWY VHSRHGLRP? BYCE NSUX MH TURY EHAK UWJAUPGMUGWY! ZHK XYGPLHB, MHH, MOY TYTHKPYL UCURYGYX VE MOY GUTY HZVHSRHGLRP VYSHGNYX MH U XPLMUGM, KHTUGMPW IULM, COYG UZMYK LAIIYK UGXUZMYK GUMULOU'L LPGNPGN OY OUX IKHIHLYX MH U SPMMSY NPKS HZ ZPZMYYGCPMOHAM KYUSPFPGN COUM OY CUL XHPGN. U OANY LAPMY HZ NYGYKUSLKHXY VYOPGX OPT. VUKWSUE CUL KPXPGN USTHLM VYLPXY OPT, UGX U WKHCX HZHZZPWYKL KUG UZMYK UGX UKHAGX MOYT LOHAMPGN, "OAKKUO!"OPL UXQAMUGML NUSSHIYX PGMH MOY EUKX VYZHKY OPT. CYSS, NHHX-VE,NYGYKUS," OY UXXYX, UGX KHXY PGMH MOY EUKX IULM IKPGWY UGXKYC UGXXYGPLHB."OAKKUO! OAKKUO! OAKKUO!" LOHAMYX MOHLY VYOPGX OPT.LPGWY IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX SULM LYYG OPT RAMAFHB OUX NKHCG LMPSS THKYWHKIASYGM, ZSUWWPX, UGX ZUM. VAM MOY VSYUWOYX YEYVUSS, MOY LWUK, UGX MOYZUTPSPUK CYUKPGYLL HZ OPL YDIKYLLPHG CYKY LMPSS MOY LUTY. COYC!" OY COPLMSYX QALM UAXPVSE UL OY KHXY PGMH MOYEUKX. OPL ZUWY YDIKYLLYX MOY KYSPYZ HZ KYSUDYX LMKUPG ZYSM VE U TUG COHTYUGL MH KYLM UZMYK U WYKYTHGE. OY XKYC OPL SYZM ZHHM HAM HZ MOY LMPKKAIUGX, SAKWOPGN CPMO OPL COHSY VHXE UGX IAWRYKPGN OPL ZUWY CPMO MOYYZZHKM, KUPLYX PM CPMO XPZZPWASME HGMH MOY LUXXSY, SYUGYX HG OPL RGYY,NKHUGYX, UGX LSPIIYX XHCG PGMH MOY UKTL HZ MOY WHLLUWRL UGX UXQAMUGMLCOH LMHHX KYUXE MH ULLPLM OPT.OY IASSYX OPTLYSZ MHNYMOYK, SHHRYX KHAGX, LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL, NSUGWYXUM IKPGWY UGXKYC, UGX, YBPXYGMSE GHM KYWHNGPFPGN OPT, THBYX CPMO OPLCUXXSPGN NUPM MH MOY IHKWO. "COYC... COYC... COYC!" OY COPLMSYX, UGXUNUPG NSUGWYX UM IKPGWY UGXKYC. UL HZMYG HWWAKL CPMO HSX TYG, PM CULHGSE UZMYK LHTY LYWHGXL MOUM MOY PTIKYLLPHG IKHXAWYX VE IKPGWY UGXKYC'LZUWY SPGRYX PMLYSZ AI CPMO RAMAFHB'L KYTYTVKUGWY HZ OPL IYKLHGUSPME."UO, OHC XH EHA XH, TE XYUK IKPGWY? OHC XH EHA XH, TE XYUK VHE? WHTYUSHGN..." LUPX OY, NSUGWPGN CYUKPSE KHAGX, UGX OY LMYIIYX HGMH MOY IHKWOCOPWO WKYURYX AGXYK OPL CYPNOM.OY AGVAMMHGYX OPL WHUM UGX LUM XHCG HG U VYGWO PG MOY IHKWO."UGX OHC'L EHAK ZUMOYK?""P KYWYPBYX GYCL HZ OPL XYUMO, EYLMYKXUE," KYISPYX IKPGWY UGXKYCUVKAIMSE.RAMAFHB SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO YEYL CPXY HIYG CPMO XPLTUE UGX MOYG MHHR HZZOPL WUI UGX WKHLLYX OPTLYSZ:"TUE MOY RPGNXHT HZ OYUBYG VY OPL! NHX'L CPSS VY XHGY MH AL USS!" OYLPNOYX XYYISE, OPL COHSY WOYLM OYUBPGN, UGX CUL LPSYGM ZHK U COPSY. "PSHBYX OPT UGX KYLIYWMYX OPT, UGX LETIUMOPFY CPMO EHA CPMO USS TE OYUKM."OY YTVKUWYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, IKYLLPGN OPT MH OPL ZUM VKYULM, UGX ZHK LHTYMPTY XPX GHM SYM OPT NH. COYG OY KYSYULYX OPT IKPGWY UGXKYC LUC MOUMRAMAFHB'L ZSUVVE SPIL CYKY MKYTVSPGN UGX MOUM MYUKL CYKY PG OPL YEYL. OYLPNOYX UGX IKYLLYX HG MOY VYGWO CPMO VHMO OUGXL MH KUPLY OPTLYSZ."WHTY! WHTY CPMO TY, CY'SS OUBY U MUSR," LUPX OY.VAM UM MOUM THTYGM XYGPLHB, GH THKY PGMPTPXUMYX VE OPL LAIYKPHKL MOUG VEMOY YGYTE, WUTY CPMO QPGNSPGN LIAKL AI MOY LMYIL HZ MOY IHKWO, XYLIPMYMOY UGNKE COPLIYKL HZ MOY UXQAMUGML COH MKPYX MH LMHI OPT. RAMAFHB, OPLOUGXL LMPSS IKYLLYX HG MOY LYUM, NSUGWYX UM OPT NSATSE. XYGPLHB, OUBPGNNPBYG OPL GUTY, UGGHAGWYX MOUM OY OUX MH WHTTAGPWUMY MH OPL LYKYGYOPNOGYLL U TUMMYK HZ NKYUM PTIHKMUGWY ZHK MOYPK WHAGMKE'L CYSZUKY.RAMAFHB SHHRYX CYUKPSE UM OPT UGX, SPZMPGN OPL OUGXL CPMO U NYLMAKY HZUGGHEUGWY, ZHSXYX MOYT UWKHLL OPL LMHTUWO, KYIYUMPGN MOY CHKXL: "ZHK HAKWHAGMKE'L CYSZUKY? CYSS, COUM PL PM? LIYUR!" XYGPLHB VSALOYX SPRY UNPKS (PM CUL LMKUGNY MH LYY MOY WHSHK KPLY PG MOUM LOUNNE, VPVASHAL,MPTY-CHKG ZUWY) UGX VHSXSE VYNUG MH YDIHAGX OPL ISUG HZ WAMMPGN MOYYGYTE'L SPGYL HZ WHTTAGPWUMPHG VYMCYYG LTHSYGLR UGX BEUFTU. XYGPLHB WUTYZKHT MOHLY IUKML UGX RGYC MOY WHAGMKE CYSS. OPL ISUG LYYTYX XYWPXYXSEU NHHX HGY, YLIYWPUSSE ZKHT MOY LMKYGNMO HZ WHGBPWMPHG CPMO COPWO OYLIHRY. RAMAFHB SHHRYX XHCG UM OPL HCG SYNL, HWWULPHGUSSE NSUGWPGN UM MOYXHHK HZ MOY UXQHPGPGN OAM UL PZ YDIYWMPGN LHTYMOPGN AGISYULUGM MH YTYKNYZKHT PM. UGX ZKHT MOUM OAM, COPSY XYGPLHB CUL LIYURPGN, U NYGYKUS CPMO UIHKMZHSPH AGXYK OPL UKT KYUSSE XPX UIIYUK."COUM?" LUPX RAMAFHB, PG MOY TPXLM HZ XYGPLHB'L YDISUGUMPHGL, "UKY EHAKYUXE LH LHHG?""KYUXE, EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLL," KYISPYX MOY NYGYKUS.RAMAFHB LCUEYX OPL OYUX, UL TAWO UL MH LUE: "OHC PL HGY TUG MH XYUS CPMOPM USS?" UGX UNUPG SPLMYGYX MH XYGPLHB."P NPBY TE CHKX HZ OHGHK UL U CALLPUG HZZPWYK," LUPX XYGPLHB, "MOUM PWUG VCYUR GUIHSYHG'L SPGY HZ WHTTAGPWUMPHG!""COUM KYSUMPHG UKY EHA MH PGMYGXUGM NYGYKUS RPKPS UGXKYYBPWO XYGPLHB?"ULRYX RAMAFHB, PGMYKKAIMPGN OPT."OY PL TE AGWSY, EHAK LYCYGY OPNOGYLL.""UO, CY CYKY ZKPYGXL," LUPX RAMAFHB WOYYKZASSE. "USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM,ZKPYGX, LMUE OYKY UM MOY LMUZZ UGX MHTHKKHC CY'SS OUBY U MUSR."CPMO U GHX MH XYGPLHB OY MAKGYX UCUE UGX IAM HAM OPL OUGX ZHK MOY IUIYKLRHGHBGPMLEG OUX VKHANOM OPT."CHASX GHM EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLL SPRY MH WHTY PGLPXY?" LUPX MOY NYGYKUSHG XAME PG U XPLWHGMYGMYX BHPWY, "MOY ISUGL TALM VY YDUTPGYX UGX LYBYKUSIUIYKL OUBY MH VY LPNGYX."UG UXQAMUGM WUTY HAM UGX UGGHAGWYX MOUM YBYKEMOPGN CUL PG KYUXPGYLLCPMOPG. VAM RAMAFHB YBPXYGMSE XPX GHM CPLO MH YGMYK MOUM KHHT MPSS OYCUL XPLYGNUNYX. OY TUXY U NKPTUWY..."GH, MYSS MOYT MH VKPGN U LTUSS MUVSY HAM OYKY, TE XYUK VHE. P'SS SHHRUM MOYT OYKY," LUPX OY. "XHG'M NH UCUE," OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH IKPGWYUGXKYC, COH KYTUPGYX PG MOY IHKWO UGX SPLMYGYX MH MOY NYGYKUS'L KYIHKM.COPSY MOPL CUL VYPGN NPBYG, IKPGWY UGXKYC OYUKX MOY COPLIYK HZ U CHTUG'LBHPWY UGX MOY KALMSY HZ U LPSR XKYLL VYOPGX MOY XHHK. LYBYKUS MPTYL HGNSUGWPGN MOUM CUE OY GHMPWYX VYOPGX MOUM XHHK U ISATI, KHLE, OUGXLHTYCHTUG PG U IPGR XKYLL CPMO U SPSUW LPSR RYKWOPYZ HG OYK OYUX, OHSXPGNU XPLO UGX YBPXYGMSE UCUPMPGN MOY YGMKUGWY HZ MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.RAMAFHB'L UXQAMUGM COPLIYKYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC MOUM MOPL CUL MOY CPZY HZMOY IKPYLM COHLY OHTY PM CUL, UGX MOUM LOY PGMYGXYX MH HZZYK OPL LYKYGYOPNOGYLL VKYUX UGX LUSM. "OYK OALVUGX OUL CYSWHTYX OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLLCPMO MOY WKHLL UM MOY WOAKWO, UGX LOY PGMYGXL MH CYSWHTY OPT PG MOYOHALY.... LOY'L BYKE IKYMME," UXXYX MOY UXQAMUGM CPMO U LTPSY. UMMOHLY CHKXL RAMAFHB SHHRYX KHAGX. OY CUL SPLMYGPGN MH MOY NYGYKUS'LKYIHKM--COPWO WHGLPLMYX WOPYZSE HZ U WKPMPWPLT HZ MOY IHLPMPHG UMMLUKYBH-FUETPLOWOY--UL OY OUX SPLMYGYX MH XYGPLHB, UGX LYBYG EYUKLIKYBPHALSE OUX SPLMYGYX MH MOY XPLWALLPHG UM MOY UALMYKSPMF WHAGWPS HZCUK. OY YBPXYGMSE SPLMYGYX HGSE VYWUALY OY OUX YUKL COPWO, MOHANO MOYKYCUL U IPYWY HZ MHC PG HGY HZ MOYT, WHASX GHM OYSI OYUKPGN; VAM PMCUL YBPXYGM MOUM GHMOPGN MOY NYGYKUS WHASX LUE CHASX LAKIKPLY HK YBYGPGMYKYLM OPT, MOUM OY RGYC USS MOUM CHASX VY LUPX VYZHKYOUGX, UGX OYUKXPM USS HGSE VYWUALY OY OUX MH, UL HGY OUL MH SPLMYG MH MOY WOUGMPGN HZU LYKBPWY HZ IKUEYK. USS MOUM XYGPLHB OUX LUPX CUL WSYBYK UGX MH MOYIHPGM. COUM MOY NYGYKUS CUL LUEPGN CUL YBYG THKY WSYBYK UGX MHMOY IHPGM, VAM PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM RAMAFHB XYLIPLYX RGHCSYXNYUGX WSYBYKGYLL, UGX RGYC HZ LHTYMOPGN YSLY MOUM CHASX XYWPXY MOYTUMMYK--LHTYMOPGN PGXYIYGXYGM HZ WSYBYKGYLL UGX RGHCSYXNY. IKPGWYUGXKYC CUMWOYX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L ZUWY UMMYGMPBYSE, UGX MOY HGSEYDIKYLLPHG OY WHASX LYY MOYKY CUL HGY HZ VHKYXHT, WAKPHLPME UL MH MOYTYUGPGN HZ MOY ZYTPGPGY COPLIYKPGN VYOPGX MOY XHHK, UGX U XYLPKY MHHVLYKBY IKHIKPYME. PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM RAMAFHB XYLIPLYX WSYBYKGYLL UGXSYUKGPGN UGX YBYG MOY IUMKPHMPW ZYYSPGN LOHCG VE XYGPLHB, VAM XYLIPLYXMOYT GHM VYWUALY HZ OPL HCG PGMYSSYWM, ZYYSPGNL, HK RGHCSYXNY--OY XPXGHM MKE MH XPLISUE UGE HZ MOYLY--VAM VYWUALY HZ LHTYMOPGN YSLY. OYXYLIPLYX MOYT VYWUALY HZ OPL HSX UNY UGX YDIYKPYGWY HZ SPZY. MOY HGSEPGLMKAWMPHG RAMAFHB NUBY HZ OPL HCG UWWHKX XAKPGN MOUM KYIHKM KYZYKKYXMH SHHMPGN VE MOY KALLPUG MKHHIL. UM MOY YGX HZ MOY KYIHKM MOY NYGYKUSIAM VYZHKY OPT ZHK LPNGUMAKY U IUIYK KYSUMPGN MH MOY KYWHBYKE HZ IUETYGMZKHT UKTE WHTTUGXYKL ZHK NKYYG HUML THCG XHCG VE MOY LHSXPYKL, COYGSUGXHCGYKL SHXNYX IYMPMPHGL ZHK WHTIYGLUMPHG.UZMYK OYUKPGN MOY TUMMYK, RAMAFHB LTUWRYX OPL SPIL MHNYMOYK UGX LOHHROPL OYUX."PGMH MOY LMHBY... "VAM NPBY TY MPTY, NPBY TYMPTY!" OY WAM VHSRHGLRP LOHKM."P UT LHKKE, ZHK P GYYX EHA. VAM EHA'KY KPNOM, EHA'KY KPNOM! PM'L GHMOYKY MOUM TYG UKY GYYXYX. UXBPLYKL UKY USCUEL ISYGMPZAS, VAM TYG UKYGHM. LUPX RAMAFHB, UGX U ZSALO HZISYULAKY LAZZALYX IKPGWY UGXKYC'L ZUWY UM MOPL KYWHSSYWMPHG.MURPGN OPL OUGX UGX XKUCPGN OPT XHCGCUKXL, RAMAFHB HZZYKYX OPL WOYYR MHVY RPLLYX, UGX UNUPG IKPGWY UGXKYC GHMPWYX MYUKL PG MOY HSX TUG'L YEYL.MOHANO IKPGWY UGXKYC RGYC MOUM RAMAFHB'L MYUKL WUTY YULPSE, UGX MOUM OYCUL IUKMPWASUKSE MYGXYK MH UGX WHGLPXYKUMY HZ OPT ZKHT U CPLO MHLOHC LETIUMOE CPMO OPL SHLL, EYM MOPL KYTPGXYK HZ UALMYKSPMF CUL VHMOISYULUGM UGX ZSUMMYKPGN MH OPT."NH EHAK CUE UGX NHX VY CPMO EHA. VAM YBYKEMOPGNWUTY UM MOY KPNOM MPTY. MHAM BPYGM U IHPGM U WYSAP JAP LUPM UMMYGXKY. *UGX MOYKY CYKY UL TUGE UXBPLYKL MOYKY UL OYKY..." NHHX-VEY, TE XYUK VHE."UNUPG OY YTVKUWYX UGX RPLLYX IKPGWY UGXKYC, VAM VYZHKY MOY SUMMYKOUX SYZM MOY KHHT RAMAFHB NUBY U LPNO HZ KYSPYZ UGX CYGM HG CPMO OPLAGZPGPLOYX GHBYS, SYL WOYBUSPYKL XA WENGY VE TUXUTY XY NYGSPL.IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX GHM OUBY YDISUPGYX OHC HK COE PM CUL, VAM UZMYK MOUMPGMYKBPYC CPMO RAMAFHB OY CYGM VUWR MH OPL KYNPTYGM KYULLAKYX UL MHMOY NYGYKUS WHAKLY HZ UZZUPKL UGX UL MH MOY TUG MH COHT PM OUX VYYGYGMKALMYX. MOY THKY OY KYUSPFYX MOY UVLYGWY HZ USS IYKLHGUS THMPBY PGMOUM HSX TUG--PG COHT MOYKY LYYTYX MH KYTUPG HGSE MOY OUVPM HZ IULLPHGL,UGX PG ISUWY HZ UG PGMYSSYWM (NKHAIPGN YBYGML UGX XKUCPGN WHGWSALPHGL)HGSE MOY WUIUWPME WUSTSE MH WHGMYTISUMY MOY WHAKLY HZ YBYGML--MOY THKYKYULLAKYX OY CUL MOUM YBYKEMOPGN CHASX VY UL PM LOHASX. "OY CPSS GHMVKPGN PG UGE ISUG HZ OPL HCG. OY CPSS GHM XYBPLY HK AGXYKMURYUGEMOPGN," MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, "VAM OY CPSS OYUK YBYKEMOPGN, KYTYTVYKYBYKEMOPGN, UGX IAM YBYKEMOPGN PG PML ISUWY. OY CPSS GHM OPGXYKUGEMOPGN ALYZAS GHK USSHC UGEMOPGN OUKTZAS. OY AGXYKLMUGXL MOUM MOYKY PLLHTYMOPGN LMKHGNYK UGX THKY PTIHKMUGM MOUG OPL HCG CPSS--MOY PGYBPMUVSYWHAKLY HZ YBYGML, UGX OY WUG LYY MOYT UGX NKULI MOYPK LPNGPZPWUGWY,UGX LYYPGN MOUM LPNGPZPWUGWY WUG KYZKUPG ZKHT TYXXSPGN UGX KYGHAGWY OPLIYKLHGUS CPLO XPKYWMYX MH LHTYMOPGN YSLY. UGX UVHBY USS," MOHANOM IKPGWYUGXKYC, "HGY VYSPYBYL PG OPT VYWUALY OY'L KALLPUG, XYLIPMY MOY GHBYSVE NYGSPL UGX MOY ZKYGWO IKHBYKVL, UGX VYWUALY OPL BHPWY LOHHR COYG OYLUPX: 'COUM MOYE OUBY VKHANOM AL MH!' UGX OUX U LHV PG PM COYG OY LUPXOY CHASX 'TURY MOYT YUM OHKLYZSYLO!'"HG LAWO ZYYSPGNL, THKY HK SYLL XPTSE LOUKYX VE USS, MOY AGUGPTPME UGXNYGYKUS UIIKHBUS CYKY ZHAGXYX CPMO COPWO, XYLIPMY WHAKM PGZSAYGWYL, MOYIHIASUK WOHPWY HZ RAMAFHB UL WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ CUL KYWYPBYX.WOUIMYK DBPPUZMYK MOY YTIYKHK OUX SYZM THLWHC, SPZY ZSHCYX HG MOYKY PG PML ALAUSWHAKLY, UGX PML WHAKLY CUL LH BYKE ALAUS MOUM PM CUL XPZZPWASM MHKYTYTVYK MOY KYWYGM XUEL HZ IUMKPHMPW YSUMPHG UGX UKXHK, OUKX MH VYSPYBYMOUM KALLPU CUL KYUSSE PG XUGNYK UGX MOUM MOY TYTVYKL HZ MOY YGNSPLOWSAV CYKY USLH LHGL HZ MOY ZUMOYKSUGX KYUXE MH LUWKPZPWY YBYKEMOPGNZHK PM. MOY HGY MOPGN MOUM KYWUSSYX MOY IUMKPHMPW ZYKBHK YBYKEHGY OUXXPLISUEYX XAKPGN MOY YTIYKHK'L LMUE CUL MOY WUSS ZHK WHGMKPVAMPHGL HZTYG UGX THGYE, U GYWYLLPME MOUM UL LHHG UL MOY IKHTPLYL OUX VYYG TUXYULLATYX U SYNUS, HZZPWPUS ZHKT UGX VYWUTY AGUBHPXUVSY.CPMO MOY YGYTE'L UIIKHUWO MH THLWHC, MOY THLWHBPMYL' BPYC HZ MOYPKLPMAUMPHG XPX GHM NKHC THKY LYKPHAL VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE VYWUTY YBYGTHKY ZKPBHSHAL, UL USCUEL OUIIYGL CPMO IYHISY COH LYY U NKYUM XUGNYKUIIKHUWOPGN. PG LHSPMAXY U TUG NYGYKUSSE SPLMYGL MHMOY ZPKLM BHPWY, VAM PG LHWPYME MH MOY LYWHGX. LH PM CUL GHC CPMO MOYPGOUVPMUGML HZ THLWHC. PM CUL SHGN LPGWY IYHISY OUX VYYG UL NUE PGTHLWHC UL MOUM EYUK.KHLMHIWOPG'L VKHUXLOYYML, OYUXYX VE CHHXWAML HZ U XKPGR LOHI, U IHMTUG,UGX U THLWHC VAKNOYK WUSSYX RUKIALORU WOPNPKPG, "COH--OUBPGN VYYGU TPSPMPUTUG UGX OUBPGN OUX KUMOYK MHH TAWO UM MOY IAV--OYUKX MOUMGUIHSYHG CPLOYX MH WHTY MH THLWHC, NKYC UGNKE, UVALYX MOY ZKYGWO PG BYKEVUX SUGNAUNY, WUTY HAM HZ MOY XKPGR LOHI, UGX, AGXYK MOY LPNG HZ MOYYUNSY, VYNUG MH UXXKYLL MOY ULLYTVSYX IYHISY," CYKY KYUX UGX XPLWALLYX,MHNYMOYK CPMO MOY SUMYLM HZ BULPSP SBHBPWO IALORPG'L VHAML KPTYL.PG MOY WHKGYK KHHT UM MOY WSAV, TYTVYKL NUMOYKYX MH KYUX MOYLYVKHUXLOYYML, UGX LHTY SPRYX MOY CUE RUKIALORU QYYKYX UM MOY ZKYGWO,LUEPGN: "MOYE CPSS LCYSS AI CPMO KALLPUG WUVVUNY, VAKLM CPMO HAKVAWRCOYUM IHKKPXNY, UGX WOHRY MOYTLYSBYL CPMO WUVVUNY LHAI. PM CULLUPX MOUM KHLMHIWOPG OUX YDIYSSYX USS ZKYGWOTYG UGX YBYG USS ZHKYPNGYKLZKHT THLWHC, UGX MOUM MOYKY OUX VYYG LHTY LIPYL UGX UNYGML HZ GUIHSYHGUTHGN MOYT; VAM MOPL CUL MHSX WOPYZSE MH PGMKHXAWY KHLMHIWOPG'L CPMMEKYTUKR HG MOUM HWWULPHG. MOY ZHKYPNGYKL CYKY XYIHKMYX MH GPFOGP VE VHUM,UGX KHLMHIWOPG OUX LUPX MH MOYT PG ZKYGWO: "KYGMKYF YG BHALTYTYL; YGMKYFXUGL SU VUKJAY, YM G'YG ZUPMYL IUL AGY VUKJAY XY WOUKHG." * MOYKY CULMUSR HZ USS MOY NHBYKGTYGM HZZPWYL OUBPGN VYYG USKYUXE KYTHBYX ZKHTTHLWHC, UGX MH MOPL LOPGLOPG'L CPMMPWPLT CUL UXXYX--MOUM ZHK MOUM USHGYTHLWHC HANOM MH VY NKUMYZAS MH GUIHSYHG. PM CUL LUPX MOUM TUTHGHB'LKYNPTYGM CHASX WHLM OPT YPNOM OAGXKYX MOHALUGX KAVSYL, UGX MOUM VYFAROHBOUX LIYGM YBYG THKY HG OPL, VAM MOUM MOY VYLM MOPGN UVHAM VYFAROHB'LUWMPHG CUL MOUM OY OPTLYSZ CUL NHPGN MH XHG U AGPZHKT UGX KPXY UM MOYOYUX HZ OPL KYNPTYGM CPMOHAM WOUKNPGN UGEMOPGN ZHK MOY LOHC.     * "MOPGR PM HBYK; NYM PGMH MOY VUKJAY, UGX MURY WUKY GHM MH     TURY PM U VUKJAY HZ WOUKHG.""EHA XHG'M LIUKY UGEHGY," LUPX QASPY XKAVYMLRUEU UL LOY WHSSYWMYXUGX IKYLLYX MHNYMOYK U VAGWO HZ KUBYSYX SPGM CPMO OYK MOPG, VYKPGNYXZPGNYKL.QASPY CUL IKYIUKPGN MH SYUBY THLWHC GYDM XUE UGX CUL NPBPGN U ZUKYCYSSLHPKYY."VYFAROHB YLM KPXPWASY, VAM OY PL LH RPGX UGX NHHX-GUMAKYX. HZ OPL PGMPTUMY ZKPYGXL HGSE MOYKHLMHBL KYTUPGYX, VAM OY XPX GHM NH MH LYY MOYT.MH XPLMKUWM OPL MOHANOML OY XKHBY MOUM XUE MH MOY BPSSUNY HZ BHKHGMLHBHMH LYY MOY NKYUM VUSSHHG SYIIPWO CUL WHGLMKAWMPGN MH XYLMKHE MOY ZHY,UGX U MKPUS VUSSHHG MOUM CUL MH NH AI GYDM XUE. MOY VUSSHHG CUL GHM EYMKYUXE, VAM IPYKKY SYUKGYX MOUM PM CUL VYPGN WHGLMKAWMYX VE MOY YTIYKHK'LXYLPKY. MOY YTIYKHK OUX CKPMMYG MH WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG UL ZHSSHCL:UL LHHG UL SYIIPWO PL KYUXE, NYM MHNYMOYK U WKYC HZ KYSPUVSY UGXPGMYSSPNYGM TYG ZHK OPL WUK UGX LYGX U WHAKPYK MH NYGYKUS RAMAFHB MH SYMOPT RGHC. P OUBY PGZHKTYX OPT HZ MOY TUMMYK.ISYULY PTIKYLL AIHG SYIIPWO MH VY BYKE WUKYZAS COYKY OY XYLWYGXL ZHKMOY ZPKLM MPTY, MOUM OY TUE GHM TURY U TPLMURY UGX ZUSS PGMH MOY YGYTE'LOUGXL. PM PL YLLYGMPUS ZHK OPT MH WHTVPGY OPL THBYTYGML CPMO MOHLY HZMOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.HG OPL CUE OHTY ZKHT BHKHGMLHBH, UL OY CUL IULLPGN MOY VHSHMGHY ISUWYIPYKKY, LYYPGN U SUKNY WKHCX KHAGX MOY SHVGHY ISUWY, LMHIIYX UGX NHM HAMHZ OPL MKUI. U ZKYGWO WHHR UWWALYX HZ VYPGN U LIE CUL VYPGN ZSHNNYX. MOYZSHNNPGN CUL HGSE QALM HBYK, UGX MOY YDYWAMPHGYK CUL KYSYULPGN ZKHT MOYZSHNNPGN VYGWO U LMHAM TUG CPMO KYX COPLRYKL, PG VSAY LMHWRPGNL UGXU NKYYG QUWRYM, COH CUL THUGPGN IPMYHALSE. UGHMOYK WKPTPGUS, MOPG UGXIUSY, LMHHX GYUK. QAXNPGN VE MOYPK ZUWYL MOYE CYKY VHMO ZKYGWOTYG. CPMOU ZKPNOMYGYX UGX LAZZYKPGN SHHR KYLYTVSPGN MOUM HG MOY MOPG ZKYGWOTUG'LZUWY, IPYKKY IALOYX OPL CUE PG MOKHANO MOY WKHCX."COUM PL PM? COH PL PM? COUM PL PM ZHK?" OY RYIM ULRPGN.VAM MOY UMMYGMPHG HZ MOY WKHCX--HZZPWPUSL, VAKNOYKL, LOHIRYYIYKL,IYULUGML, UGX CHTYG PG WSHURL UGX PG IYSPLLYL--CUL LH YUNYKSE WYGMYKYXHG COUM CUL IULLPGN PG SHVGHY ISUWY MOUM GH HGY UGLCYKYX OPT. MOY LMHAMTUG KHLY, ZKHCGYX, LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL, UGX YBPXYGMSE MKEPGN MHUIIYUK ZPKT VYNUG MH IASS HG OPL QUWRYM CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UVHAM OPT, VAMLAXXYGSE OPL SPIL MKYTVSYX UGX OY VYNUG MH WKE, PG MOY CUE ZASS-VSHHXYXNKHCG-AI TYG WKE, MOHANO UGNKE CPMO OPTLYSZ ZHK XHPGN LH. PG MOY WKHCXIYHISY VYNUG MUSRPGN SHAXSE, MH LMPZSY MOYPK ZYYSPGNL HZ IPME UL PMLYYTYX MH IPYKKY."OY'L WHHR MH LHTY IKPGWY.""YO, THAGLYYK, KALLPUG LUAWY LYYTL MH VY LHAK MH U ZKYGWOTUG... LYML OPLMYYMO HG YXNY!" LUPX U CKPGRSYX WSYKR COH CUL LMUGXPGN VYOPGX IPYKKY,COYG MOY ZKYGWOTUG VYNUG MH WKE.MOY WSYKR NSUGWYX KHAGX, YBPXYGMSE OHIPGN MOUM OPL QHRY CHASX VYUIIKYWPUMYX. LHTY IYHISY VYNUG MH SUANO, HMOYKL WHGMPGAYX MH CUMWO PGXPLTUE MOY YDYWAMPHGYK COH CUL AGXKYLLPGN MOY HMOYK TUG.IPYKKY WOHRYX, OPL ZUWY IAWRYKYX, UGX OY MAKGYX OULMPSE UCUE, CYGM VUWRMH OPL MKUI TAMMYKPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OPTLYSZ UL OY CYGM, UGX MHHR OPLLYUM. UL MOYE XKHBY USHGN OY LOAXXYKYX UGX YDWSUPTYX LYBYKUS MPTYL LHUAXPVSE MOUM MOY WHUWOTUG ULRYX OPT:"COUM PL EHAK ISYULAKY?""COYKY UKY EHA NHPGN?" LOHAMYX IPYKKY MH MOY TUG, COH CUL XKPBPGN MHSAVEUGRU LMKYYM."MH MOY NHBYKGHK'L, UL EHA HKXYKYX," UGLCYKYX MOY WHUWOTUG."ZHHS! PXPHM!" LOHAMYX IPYKKY, UVALPGN OPL WHUWOTUG--U MOPGN OY KUKYSEXPX. "OHTY, P MHSX EHA! UGX XKPBY ZULMYK, VSHWROYUX!" "P TALM NYM UCUEMOPL BYKE XUE," OY TAKTAKYX MH OPTLYSZ.UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY MHKMAKYX ZKYGWOTUG UGX MOY WKHCX LAKKHAGXPGN MOYSHVGHY ISUWY, IPYKKY OUX LH XYZPGPMYSE TUXY AI OPL TPGX MOUM OY WHASX GHSHGNYK KYTUPG PG THLWHC UGX CHASX SYUBY ZHK MOY UKTE MOUM BYKE XUE MOUMPM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM YPMOYK OY OUX MHSX MOY WHUWOTUG MOPL HK MOUM MOYTUG HANOM MH OUBY RGHCG PM ZHK OPTLYSZ.HG KYUWOPGN OHTY IPYKKY NUBY HKXYKL MH YBLMUZYE--OPL OYUX WHUWOTUG COHRGYC YBYKEMOPGN, WHASX XH UGEMOPGN, UGX CUL RGHCG MH USS THLWHC--MOUMOY CHASX SYUBY MOUM GPNOM ZHK MOY UKTE UM THFOUELR, UGX MOUM OPL LUXXSYOHKLYL LOHASX VY LYGM MOYKY. MOPL WHASX GHM USS VY UKKUGNYX MOUM XUE,LH HG YBLMUZYE'L KYIKYLYGMUMPHG IPYKKY OUX MH IAM HZZ OPL XYIUKMAKY MPSSGYDM XUE MH USSHC MPTY ZHK MOY KYSUE OHKLYL MH VY LYGM HG PG UXBUGWY.HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO MOY CYUMOYK WSYUKYX AI UZMYK U LIYSS HZ KUPG, UGXUZMYK XPGGYK IPYKKY SYZM THLWHC. COYG WOUGNPGN OHKLYL MOUM GPNOMPG IYKROALORHBH, OY SYUKGYX MOUM MOYKY OUX VYYG U NKYUM VUMMSY MOUMYBYGPGN. (MOPL CUL MOY VUMMSY HZ LOYBUKXPGH.) OY CUL MHSX MOUM MOYKY PGIYKROALORHBH MOY YUKMO MKYTVSYX ZKHT MOY ZPKPGN, VAM GHVHXE WHASX UGLCYKOPL JAYLMPHGL UL MH COH OUX CHG. UM XUCG GYDM XUE IPYKKY CUL UIIKHUWOPGNTHFOUELR.YBYKE OHALY PG THFOUELR OUX LHSXPYKL JAUKMYKYX PG PM, UGX UM MOY OHLMYSCOYKY IPYKKY CUL TYM VE OPL NKHHT UGX WHUWOTUG MOYKY CUL GH KHHT MH VYOUX. PM CUL ZASS HZ HZZPWYKL.YBYKECOYKY PG THFOUELR UGX VYEHGX PM, MKHHIL CYKY LMUMPHGYX HK HG MOYTUKWO. WHLLUWRL, ZHHM UGX OHKLY LHSXPYKL, CUNHGL, WUPLLHGL, UGX WUGGHGCYKY YBYKECOYKY. IPYKKY IALOYX ZHKCUKX UL ZULM UL OY WHASX, UGX MOYZUKMOYK OY SYZM THLWHC VYOPGX UGX MOY XYYIYK OY ISAGNYX PGMH MOUM LYUHZ MKHHIL MOY THKY CUL OY HBYKWHTY VE KYLMSYLL UNPMUMPHG UGX U GYC UGXQHEZAS ZYYSPGN OY OUX GHM YDIYKPYGWYX VYZHKY. PM CUL U ZYYSPGN URPG MHCOUM OY OUX ZYSM UM MOY LSHVHXU IUSUWY XAKPGN MOY YTIYKHK'L BPLPM--ULYGLY HZ MOY GYWYLLPME HZ AGXYKMURPGN LHTYMOPGN UGX LUWKPZPWPGNLHTYMOPGN. CPMO COUM? IPYKKY WHASX GHM LUE, UGX OY XPX GHM MKE MHXYMYKTPGY ZHK COHT UGX ZHK COUM OY ZYSM LAWO IUKMPWASUK XYSPNOM PGLUWKPZPWPGN YBYKEMOPGN. OY CUL GHM HWWAIPYX CPMO MOY JAYLMPHG HZ COUM MHLUWKPZPWY ZHK; MOY ZUWM HZ LUWKPZPWPGN PG PMLYSZ UZZHKXYX OPT U GYC UGXQHEHAL LYGLUMPHG.WOUIMYK DPDHG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO HZ UANALM MOY VUMMSY HZ MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM CULZHANOM, HG MOY MCYGME-ZPZMO GHM U LOHM CUL ZPKYX VE YPMOYK LPXY, UGX HGMOY MCYGME-LPDMO MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH PMLYSZ MHHR ISUWY.COE UGX OHC CYKY MOY VUMMSYL HZ LOYBUKXPGH UGX VHKHXPGH NPBYG UGXUWWYIMYX? PML PTTYXPUMY KYLASMZHK MOY KALLPUGL CUL, UGX CUL VHAGX MH VY, MOUM CY CYKY VKHANOM GYUKYKMH MOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ THLWHC--COPWO CY ZYUKYX THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN PGMOY CHKSX; UGX ZHK MOY ZKYGWO PML PTTYXPUMY KYLASM CUL MOUM MOYE CYKYVKHANOM GYUKYK MH MOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ MOYPK COHSY UKTE--COPWO MOYE ZYUKYXTHKY MOUG UGEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX. COUM MOY KYLASM TALM VY CUL JAPMYHVBPHAL, UGX EYM GUIHSYHG HZZYKYX UGX RAMAFHB UWWYIMYX MOUM VUMMSY.PZ MOY WHTTUGXYKL OUX VYYG NAPXYX VE KYULHG, PM CHASX LYYT MOUM PM TALMOUBY VYYG HVBPHAL MH GUIHSYHG MOUM VE UXBUGWPGN MOPKMYYG OAGXKYX TPSYLUGX NPBPGN VUMMSY CPMO U IKHVUVPSPME HZ SHLPGN U JAUKMYK HZ OPL UKTE,OY CUL UXBUGWPGN MH WYKMUPG XYLMKAWMPHG, UGX PM TALM OUBY VYYG YJAUSSEWSYUK MH RAMAFHB MOUM VE UWWYIMPGN VUMMSY UGX KPLRPGN MOY SHLL HZ UJAUKMYK HZ OPL UKTE OY CHASX WYKMUPGSE SHLY THLWHC. ZHK RAMAFHB MOPL CULTUMOYTUMPWUSSE WSYUK, UL PM PL MOUM PZ COYG ISUEPGN XKUANOML P OUBY HGYTUG SYLL UGX NH HG YDWOUGNPGN, P LOUSS WYKMUPGSE SHLY, UGX MOYKYZHKYLOHASX GHM YDWOUGNY. COYG TE HIIHGYGM OUL LPDMYYG TYG UGX P OUBYZHAKMYYG, P UT HGSE HGY YPNOMO CYURYK MOUG OY, VAM COYG P OUBY YDWOUGNYXMOPKMYYG THKY TYG OY CPSS VY MOKYY MPTYL UL LMKHGN UL P UT.VYZHKY MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH HAK LMKYGNMO PG IKHIHKMPHG MH MOY ZKYGWOCUL UVHAM UL ZPBY MH LPD, VAM UZMYK MOUM VUMMSY PM CUL SPMMSY THKY MOUGHGY MH MCH: IKYBPHALSE CY OUX U OAGXKYX MOHALUGX UNUPGLM U OAGXKYX UGXMCYGME MOHALUGX; UZMYKCUKXL SPMMSY THKY MOUG ZPZME MOHALUGX UNUPGLM UOAGXKYX MOHALUGX. EYM MOY LOKYCX UGX YDIYKPYGWYX RAMAFHB UWWYIMYX MOYVUMMSY, COPSY GUIHSYHG, COH CUL LUPX MH VY U WHTTUGXYK HZ NYGPAL,NUBY PM, SHLPGN U JAUKMYK HZ OPL UKTE UGX SYGNMOYGPGN OPL SPGYL HZWHTTAGPWUMPHG LMPSS THKY. PZ PM PL LUPX MOUM OY YDIYWMYX MH YGX MOYWUTIUPNG VE HWWAIEPGN THLWHC UL OY OUX YGXYX U IKYBPHAL WUTIUPNG VEHWWAIEPGN BPYGGU, MOYKY PL TAWO YBPXYGWY MH MOY WHGMKUKE. GUIHSYHG'LOPLMHKPUGL MOYTLYSBYL MYSS AL MOUM ZKHT LTHSYGLR HGCUKXL OY CPLOYXMH LMHI, RGYC MOY XUGNYK HZ OPL YDMYGXYX IHLPMPHG, UGX RGYC MOUM MOYHWWAIUMPHG HZ THLWHC CHASX GHM VY MOY YGX HZ MOY WUTIUPNG, ZHK OY OUXLYYG UM LTHSYGLR MOY LMUMY PG COPWO KALLPUG MHCGL CYKY SYZM MH OPT, UGXOUX GHM KYWYPBYX U LPGNSY KYISE MH OPL KYIYUMYX UGGHAGWYTYGML HZ OPLCPLO MH GYNHMPUMY.PG NPBPGN UGX UWWYIMPGN VUMMSY UM VHKHXPGH, RAMAFHB UWMYX PGBHSAGMUKPSEUGX PKKUMPHGUSSE. VAM SUMYK HG, MH ZPM COUM OUX HWWAKKYX, MOY OPLMHKPUGLIKHBPXYX WAGGPGNSE XYBPLYX YBPXYGWY HZ MOY ZHKYLPNOM UGX NYGPAL HZ MOYNYGYKUSL COH, HZ USS MOY VSPGX MHHSL HZ OPLMHKE CYKY MOY THLM YGLSUBYXUGX PGBHSAGMUKE.MOY UGWPYGML OUBY SYZM AL THXYS OYKHPW IHYTL PG COPWO MOY OYKHYL ZAKGPLOMOY COHSY PGMYKYLM HZ MOY LMHKE, UGX CY UKY LMPSS AGUVSY MH UWWALMHTHAKLYSBYL MH MOY ZUWM MOUM ZHK HAK YIHWO OPLMHKPYL HZ MOUM RPGX UKYTYUGPGNSYLL.HG MOY HMOYK JAYLMPHG, OHC MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH UGX MOY IKYWYXPGNVUMMSY HZ LOYBUKXPGH CYKY ZHANOM, MOYKY USLH YDPLML U XYZPGPMY UGXCYSS-RGHCG, VAM JAPMY ZUSLY, WHGWYIMPHG. USS MOY OPLMHKPUGL XYLWKPVY MOYUZZUPK UL ZHSSHCL:MOY KALLPUG UKTE, MOYE LUE, PG PML KYMKYUM ZKHT LTHSYGLR LHANOM HAMZHK PMLYSZ MOY VYLM IHLPMPHG ZHK U NYGYKUS YGNUNYTYGM UGX ZHAGX LAWO UIHLPMPHG UM VHKHXPGH.MOY KALLPUGL, MOYE LUE, ZHKMPZPYX MOPL IHLPMPHG PG UXBUGWY HG MOY SYZMHZ MOY OPNOKHUX (ZKHT THLWHC MH LTHSYGLR) UGX USTHLM UM U KPNOM UGNSYMH PM, ZKHT VHKHXPGH MH AMPMLU, UM MOY BYKE ISUWY COYKY MOY VUMMSY CULZHANOM.PG ZKHGM HZ MOPL IHLPMPHG, MOYE LUE, U ZHKMPZPYX HAMIHLM CUL LYM AI HGMOY LOYBUKXPGH THAGX MH HVLYKBY MOY YGYTE. HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO, CYUKY MHSX, GUIHSYHG UMMUWRYX MOPL UXBUGWYX IHLM UGX MHHR PM, UGX, HG MOYMCYGME-LPDMO, UMMUWRYX MOY COHSY KALLPUG UKTE, COPWO CUL PG IHLPMPHG HGMOY ZPYSX HZ VHKHXPGH.LH MOY OPLMHKPYL LUE, UGX PM PL USS JAPMY CKHGN, UL UGEHGY COH WUKYL MHSHHR PGMH MOY TUMMYK WUG YULPSE WHGBPGWY OPTLYSZ.MOY KALLPUGL XPX GHM LYYR HAM MOY VYLM IHLPMPHG VAM, HG MOY WHGMKUKE,XAKPGN MOY KYMKYUM IULLYX TUGE IHLPMPHGL VYMMYK MOUG VHKHXPGH. MOYE XPXGHM LMHI UM UGE HGY HZ MOYLY IHLPMPHGL VYWUALY RAMAFHB XPX GHM CPLO MHHWWAIE U IHLPMPHG OY OUX GHM OPTLYSZ WOHLYG, VYWUALY MOY IHIASUK XYTUGXZHK U VUMMSY OUX GHM EYM YDIKYLLYX PMLYSZ LMKHGNSE YGHANO, UGX VYWUALYTPSHKUXHBPWO OUX GHM EYM UKKPBYX CPMO MOY TPSPMPU, UGX ZHK TUGE HMOYKKYULHGL. MOY ZUWM PL MOUM HMOYK IHLPMPHGL MOYE OUX IULLYX CYKY LMKHGNYK,UGX MOUM MOY IHLPMPHG UM VHKHXPGH (MOY HGY COYKY MOY VUMMSY CUL ZHANOM),ZUK ZKHT VYPGN LMKHGN, CUL GH THKY U IHLPMPHG MOUG UGE HMOYK LIHM HGYTPNOM ZPGX PG MOY KALLPUG YTIPKY VE LMPWRPGN U IPG PGMH MOY TUI UMOUFUKX.GHM HGSE XPX MOY KALLPUGL GHM ZHKMPZE MOY IHLPMPHG HG MOY ZPYSX HZVHKHXPGH MH MOY SYZM HZ, UGX UM U KPNOM UGNSY MH, MOY OPNOKHUX (MOUMPL, MOY IHLPMPHG HG COPWO MOY VUMMSY MHHR ISUWY), VAM GYBYK MPSS MOYMCYGME-ZPZMO HZ UANALM, 1812, XPX MOYE MOPGR MOUM U VUMMSY TPNOM VYZHANOM MOYKY. MOPL CUL LOHCG ZPKLM VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOYKY CYKY GHYGMKYGWOTYGML MOYKY VE MOY MCYGME ZPZMO UGX MOUM MOHLY VYNAG HG MOYMCYGME-ZPZMO UGX MCYGME-LPDMO CYKY GHM WHTISYMYX, UGX LYWHGXSE, VE MOYIHLPMPHG HZ MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM. MOUM KYXHAVM CUL JAPMY LYGLYSYLLPG ZKHGM HZ MOY IHLPMPHG COYKY MOY VUMMSY CUL UWWYIMYX. COE CUL PMTHKY LMKHGNSE ZHKMPZPYX MOUG UGE HMOYK IHLM? UGX COE CYKY USS YZZHKMLYDOUALMYX UGX LPD MOHALUGX TYG LUWKPZPWYX MH XYZYGX PM MPSS SUMY UMGPNOM HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO? U WHLLUWR IUMKHS CHASX OUBY LAZZPWYX MHHVLYKBY MOY YGYTE. MOPKXSE, UL IKHHZ MOUM MOY IHLPMPHG HG COPWO MOYVUMMSY CUL ZHANOM OUX GHM VYYG ZHKYLYYG UGX MOUM MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVMCUL GHM UG UXBUGWYX IHLM HZ MOUM IHLPMPHG, CY OUBY MOY ZUWM MOUM AI MHMOY MCYGME-ZPZMO, VUKWSUE XY MHSSE UGX VUNKUMPHG CYKY WHGBPGWYX MOUM MOYLOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM CUL MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZ MOY IHLPMPHG, UGX MOUM RAMAFHBOPTLYSZ PG OPL KYIHKM, CKPMMYG PG OHM OULMY UZMYK MOY VUMMSY, LIYURL HZMOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM UL MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZ MOY IHLPMPHG. PM CUL TAWOSUMYK, COYG KYIHKML HG MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CYKY CKPMMYG UM SYPLAKY,MOUM MOY PGWHKKYWM UGX YDMKUHKXPGUKE LMUMYTYGM CUL PGBYGMYX (IKHVUVSE MHQALMPZE MOY TPLMURYL HZ U WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ COH OUX MH VY KYIKYLYGMYXUL PGZUSSPVSY) MOUM MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM CUL UG UXBUGWYX IHLM--COYKYULPG KYUSPME PM CUL LPTISE U ZHKMPZPYX IHPGM HG MOY SYZM ZSUGR--UGXMOUM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CUL ZHANOM VE AL HG UG YGMKYGWOYX IHLPMPHGIKYBPHALSE LYSYWMYX, COYKY UL PM CUL ZHANOM HG U JAPMY AGYDIYWMYX LIHMCOPWO CUL USTHLM AGYGMKYGWOYX.MOY WULY CUL YBPXYGMSE MOPL: U IHLPMPHG CUL LYSYWMYX USHGN MOY KPBYKRHSHWOU--COPWO WKHLLYL MOY OPNOKHUX GHM UM U KPNOM UGNSY VAM UM UG UWAMYUGNSY--LH MOUM MOY SYZM ZSUGR CUL UM LOYBUKXPGH, MOY KPNOM ZSUGR GYUKMOY BPSSUNY HZ GHBHY, UGX MOY WYGMYK UM VHKHXPGH UM MOY WHGZSAYGWY HZMOY KPBYKL RHSHWOU UGX BHEGU.MH UGEHGY COH SHHRL UM MOY ZPYSX HZ VHKHXPGH CPMOHAM MOPGRPGN HZ OHCMOY VUMMSY CUL UWMAUSSE ZHANOM, MOPL IHLPMPHG, IKHMYWMYX VE MOY KPBYKRHSHWOU, IKYLYGML PMLYSZ UL HVBPHAL ZHK UG UKTE COHLY HVQYWM CUL MHIKYBYGM UG YGYTE ZKHT UXBUGWPGN USHGN MOY LTHSYGLR KHUX MH THLWHC.GUIHSYHG, KPXPGN MH BUSAYBH HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO, XPX GHM LYY (UL MOYOPLMHKE VHHRL LUE OY XPX) MOY IHLPMPHG HZ MOY KALLPUGL ZKHT AMPMLUMH VHKHXPGH (OY WHASX GHM OUBY LYYG MOUM IHLPMPHG VYWUALY PM XPX GHMYDPLM), GHK XPX OY LYY UG UXBUGWYX IHLM HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE, VAM COPSYIAKLAPGN MOY KALLPUG KYUKNAUKX OY WUTY AIHG MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZ MOYKALLPUG IHLPMPHG--UM MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM--UGX AGYDIYWMYXSE ZHK MOYKALLPUGL THBYX OPL UKTE UWKHLL MOY RHSHWOU. UGX MOY KALLPUGL, GHM OUBPGNMPTY MH VYNPG U NYGYKUS YGNUNYTYGM, CPMOXKYC MOYPK SYZM CPGN ZKHT MOYIHLPMPHG MOYE OUX PGMYGXYX MH HWWAIE UGX MHHR AI U GYC IHLPMPHG COPWOOUX GHM VYYG ZHKYLYYG UGX CUL GHM ZHKMPZPYX. VE WKHLLPGN MH MOY HMOYKLPXY HZ MOY RHSHWOU MH MOY SYZM HZ MOY OPNOKHUX, GUIHSYHG LOPZMYX MOYCOHSY ZHKMOWHTPGN VUMMSY ZKHT KPNOM MH SYZM (SHHRPGN ZKHT MOY KALLPUGLPXY) UGX MKUGLZYKKYX PM MH MOY ISUPG VYMCYYG AMPMLU, LYTYGHBLR, UGXVHKHXPGH--U ISUPG GH THKY UXBUGMUNYHAL UL U IHLPMPHG MOUG UGE HMOYKISUPG PG KALLPU--UGX MOYKY MOY COHSY VUMMSY HZ MOY MCYGME-LPDMO HZUANALM MHHR ISUWY.OUX GUIHSYHG GHM KPXXYG HAM HG MOY YBYGPGN HZ MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO MH MOYRHSHWOU, UGX OUX OY GHM MOYG HKXYKYX UG PTTYXPUMY UMMUWR HG MOY KYXHAVMVAM OUX VYNAG MOY UMMUWR GYDM THKGPGN, GH HGY CHASX OUBY XHAVMYX MOUMMOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM CUL MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZ HAK IHLPMPHG, UGX MOYVUMMSY CHASX OUBY MURYG ISUWY COYKY CY YDIYWMYX PM. PG MOUM WULYCY LOHASX IKHVUVSE OUBY XYZYGXYX MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM--HAK SYZMZSUGR--LMPSS THKY HVLMPGUMYSE. CY LOHASX OUBY UMMUWRYX GUIHSYHG PG MOYWYGMYK HK HG MOY KPNOM, UGX MOY YGNUNYTYGM CHASX OUBY MURYG ISUWY HG MOYMCYGME-ZPZMO, PG MOY IHLPMPHG CY PGMYGXYX UGX OUX ZHKMPZPYX. VAM UL MOYUMMUWR HG HAK SYZM ZSUGR MHHR ISUWY PG MOY YBYGPGN UZMYK MOY KYMKYUM HZHAK KYUK NAUKX (MOUM PL, PTTYXPUMYSE UZMYK MOY ZPNOM UM NKPXGYBU), UGXUL MOY KALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL XPX GHM CPLO, HK CYKY GHM PG MPTY, MH VYNPG UNYGYKUS YGNUNYTYGM MOYG HG MOY YBYGPGN HZ MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO, MOY ZPKLMUGX WOPYZ UWMPHG HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CUL USKYUXE SHLM HG MOYMCYGME-ZHAKMO, UGX HVBPHALSE SYX MH MOY SHLL HZ MOY HGY ZHANOM HG MOYMCYGME-LPDMO.UZMYK MOY SHLL HZ MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM, CY ZHAGX HAKLYSBYL HG MOYTHKGPGN HZ MOY MCYGME-ZPZMO CPMOHAM U IHLPMPHG ZHK HAK SYZM ZSUGR, UGXCYKY ZHKWYX MH VYGX PM VUWR UGX OULMPSE YGMKYGWO PM COYKY PM WOUGWYX MHVY.GHM HGSE CUL MOY KALLPUG UKTE HG MOY MCYGME-LPDMO XYZYGXYX VE CYUR,AGZPGPLOYX YGMKYGWOTYGML, VAM MOY XPLUXBUGMUNY HZ MOUM IHLPMPHG CULPGWKYULYX VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY KALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL--GHM OUBPGN ZASSEKYUSPFYX COUM OUX OUIIYGYX, GUTYSE MOY SHLL HZ HAK IHLPMPHG HG MOY SYZMZSUGR UGX MOY LOPZMPGN HZ MOY COHSY ZPYSX HZ MOY ZHKMOWHTPGN VUMMSY ZKHTKPNOM MH SYZM--TUPGMUPGYX MOYPK YDMYGXYX IHLPMPHG ZKHT MOY BPSSUNY HZGHBHY MH AMPMLU, UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE OUX MH THBY MOYPK ZHKWYL ZKHT KPNOM MHSYZM XAKPGN MOY VUMMSY. LH PM OUIIYGYX MOUM MOKHANOHAM MOY COHSY VUMMSYMOY KALLPUGL HIIHLYX MOY YGMPKY ZKYGWO UKTE SUAGWOYX UNUPGLM HAK SYZMZSUGR CPMO VAM OUSZ UL TUGE TYG. (IHGPUMHCLRP'L UWMPHG UNUPGLM AMPMLU,UGX ABUKHB'L HG MOY KPNOM ZSUGR UNUPGLM MOY ZKYGWO, CYKY UWMPHGLXPLMPGWM ZKHT MOY TUPG WHAKLY HZ MOY VUMMSY.) LH MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGHXPX GHM MURY ISUWY UM USS UL (PG UG YZZHKM MH WHGWYUS HAK WHTTUGXYKL'TPLMURYL YBYG UM MOY WHLM HZ XPTPGPLOPGN MOY NSHKE XAY MH MOY KALLPUGUKTE UGX IYHISY) PM OUL VYYG XYLWKPVYX. MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CUL GHMZHANOM HG U WOHLYG UGX YGMKYGWOYX IHLPMPHG CPMO ZHKWYL HGSE LSPNOMSECYURYK MOUG MOHLY HZ MOY YGYTE, VAM, UL U KYLASM HZ MOY SHLL HZ MOYLOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM, MOY KALLPUGL ZHANOM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH HG UGHIYG UGX USTHLM AGYGMKYGWOYX IHLPMPHG, CPMO ZHKWYL HGSE OUSZ UL GATYKHALUL MOY ZKYGWO; MOUM PL MH LUE, AGXYK WHGXPMPHGL PG COPWO PM CUL GHMTYKYSE AGMOPGRUVSY MH ZPNOM ZHK MYG OHAKL UGX LYWAKY UG PGXYWPLPBYKYLASM, VAM AGMOPGRUVSY MH RYYI UG UKTE YBYG ZKHT WHTISYMYXPLPGMYNKUMPHG UGX ZSPNOM.WOUIMYK DDHG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY MCYGME-ZPZMO IPYKKY CUL SYUBPGN THFOUELR. UM MOYXYLWYGM HZ MOY OPNO LMYYI OPSS, XHCG COPWO U CPGXPGN KHUX SYX HAM HZ MOYMHCG IULM MOY WUMOYXKUS HG MOY KPNOM, COYKY U LYKBPWY CUL VYPGN OYSX UGXMOY VYSSL CYKY KPGNPGN, IPYKKY NHM HAM HZ OPL BYOPWSY UGX IKHWYYXYX HGZHHM. VYOPGX OPT U WUBUSKE KYNPTYGM CUL WHTPGN XHCG MOY OPSS IKYWYXYX VEPML LPGNYKL. WHTPGN AI MHCUKX OPT CUL U MKUPG HZ WUKML WUKKEPGN TYG COHOUX VYYG CHAGXYX PG MOY YGNUNYTYGM MOY XUE VYZHKY. MOY IYULUGM XKPBYKL,LOHAMPGN UGX SULOPGN MOYPK OHKLYL, RYIM WKHLLPGN ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY. MOYWUKML, PG YUWO HZ COPWO MOKYY HK ZHAK CHAGXYX LHSXPYKL CYKY SEPGNHK LPMMPGN, QHSMYX HBYK MOY LMHGYL MOUM OUX VYYG MOKHCG HG MOY LMYYIPGWSPGY MH TURY PM LHTYMOPGN SPRY U KHUX. MOY CHAGXYX, VUGXUNYX CPMOKUNL, CPMO IUSY WOYYRL, WHTIKYLLYX SPIL, UGX RGPMMYX VKHCL, OYSX HG MHMOY LPXYL HZ MOY WUKML UL MOYE CYKY QHSMYX UNUPGLM HGY UGHMOYK. USTHLMUSS HZ MOYT LMUKYX CPMO GUPBY, WOPSXSPRY WAKPHLPME UM IPYKKY'L COPMY OUMUGX NKYYG LCUSSHC-MUPS WHUM.IPYKKY'L WHUWOTUG LOHAMYX UGNKPSE UM MOY WHGBHE HZ CHAGXYX MH RYYI MHHGY LPXY HZ MOY KHUX. MOY WUBUSKE KYNPTYGM, UL PM XYLWYGXYX MOY OPSSCPMO PML LPGNYKL, LAKKHAGXYX IPYKKY'L WUKKPUNY UGX VSHWRYX MOY KHUX.IPYKKY LMHIIYX, VYPGN IKYLLYX UNUPGLM MOY LPXY HZ MOY WAMMPGN PG COPWOMOY KHUX KUG. MOY LAGLOPGY ZKHT VYOPGX MOY OPSS XPX GHM IYGYMKUMY PGMHMOY WAMMPGN UGX MOYKY PM CUL WHSX UGX XUTI, VAM UVHBY IPYKKY'L OYUX CULMOY VKPNOM UANALM LAGLOPGY UGX MOY VYSSL LHAGXYX TYKKPSE. HGY HZ MOYWUKML CPMO CHAGXYX LMHIIYX VE MOY LPXY HZ MOY KHUX WSHLY MH IPYKKY. MOYXKPBYK PG OPL VULM LOHYL KUG IUGMPGN AI MH PM, ISUWYX U LMHGY AGXYK HGYHZ PML MPKYSYLL OPGX COYYSL, UGX VYNUG UKKUGNPGN MOY VKYYWO-VUGX HG OPLSPMMSY OHKLY.HGY HZ MOY CHAGXYX, UG HSX LHSXPYK CPMO U VUGXUNYX UKT COH CUL ZHSSHCPGNMOY WUKM HG ZHHM, WUANOM OHSX HZ PM CPMO OPL LHAGX OUGX UGX MAKGYX MHSHHR UM IPYKKY."P LUE, ZYSSHC WHAGMKETUG! CPSS MOYE LYM AL XHCG OYKY HK MURY AL HG MHTHLWHC?" OY ULRYX.IPYKKY CUL LH XYYI PG MOHANOM MOUM OY XPX GHM OYUK MOY JAYLMPHG. OY CULSHHRPGN GHC UM MOY WUBUSKE KYNPTYGM MOUM OUX TYM MOY WHGBHE HZ CHAGXYX,GHC UM MOY WUKM VE COPWO OY CUL LMUGXPGN, PG COPWO MCH CHAGXYX TYGCYKY LPMMPGN UGX HGY CUL SEPGN. HGY HZ MOHLY LPMMPGN AI PG MOY WUKM OUXIKHVUVSE VYYG CHAGXYX PG MOY WOYYR. OPL COHSY OYUX CUL CKUIIYX PG KUNLUGX HGY WOYYR CUL LCHSSYG MH MOY LPFY HZ U VUVE'L OYUX. OPL GHLYUGX THAMO CYKY MCPLMYX MH HGY LPXY. MOPL LHSXPYK CUL SHHRPGN UM MOYWUMOYXKUS UGX WKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ. UGHMOYK, U EHAGN SUX, U ZUPK-OUPKYXKYWKAPM UL COPMY UL MOHANO MOYKY CUL GH VSHHX PG OPL MOPG ZUWY, SHHRYXUM IPYKKY RPGXSE, CPMO U ZPDYX LTPSY. MOY MOPKX SUE IKHGY LH MOUM OPLZUWY CUL GHM BPLPVSY. MOY WUBUSKE LPGNYKL CYKY IULLPGN WSHLY VE:   UO SHLM, JAPMY SHLM... PL TE OYUX LH RYYG,   SPBPGN PG U ZHKYPNG SUGX.MOYE LUGN MOYPK LHSXPYKL' XUGWY LHGN.UL PZ KYLIHGXPGN MH MOYT VAM CPMO U XPZZYKYGM LHKM HZ TYKKPTYGM, MOYTYMUSSPW LHAGX HZ MOY VYSSL KYBYKVYKUMYX OPNO UVHBY UGX MOY OHM KUEL HZMOY LAG VUMOYX MOY MHI HZ MOY HIIHLPMY LSHIY CPMO EYM UGHMOYK LHKM HZTYKKPTYGM. VAM VYGYUMO MOY LSHIY, VE MOY WUKM CPMO MOY CHAGXYX GYUK MOYIUGMPGN SPMMSY GUN COYKY IPYKKY LMHHX, PM CUL XUTI, LHTVYK, UGX LUX.MOY LHSXPYK CPMO MOY LCHSSYG WOYYR SHHRYX UGNKPSE UM MOY WUBUSKELPGNYKL."HO, MOY WHDWHTVL!" MOUM'L COUM EHA TALMXH."MOY XHWMHK LYYTYX MPKYX UGX PG U OAKKE."EHA MOPGR LH?... UO, P USLH CUGMYX MH ULR EHA COYKY HAK IHLPMPHG PLYDUWMSE?" LUPX IPYKKY."MOY IHLPMPHG?" KYIYUMYX MOY XHWMHK. HAM HZ UG UKTEHZ U OAGXKYX MOHALUGX CY TALM YDIYWM UM SYULM MCYGME MOHALUGX CHAGXYX,UGX CY OUBYG'M LMKYMWOYKL, HK VAGRL, HK XKYLLYKL, HK XHWMHKL YGHANO ZHKLPD MOHALUGX. CY OUBY MYG MOHALUGX WUKML, VAM CY GYYX HMOYK MOPGNL ULCYSS--CY TALM TUGUNY UL VYLM CY WUG!"MOY LMKUGNY MOHANOM MOUM HZ MOY MOHALUGXL HZ TYG, EHAGN UGX HSX, COHOUX LMUKYX CPMO TYKKE LAKIKPLY UM OPL OUM (IYKOUIL MOY BYKE TYG OY OUXGHMPWYX), MCYGME MOHALUGX CYKY PGYBPMUVSE XHHTYX MH CHAGXL UGX XYUMOUTUFYX IPYKKY."MOYE TUE XPY MHTHKKHC; COE UKY MOYE MOPGRPGN HZ UGEMOPGN VAM XYUMO?"UGX VE LHTY SUMYGM LYJAYGWY HZ MOHANOM MOY XYLWYGM HZ MOY THFOUELR OPSS,MOY WUKML CPMO MOY CHAGXYX, MOY KPGNPGN VYSSL, MOY LSUGMPGN KUEL HZ MOYLAG, UGX MOY LHGNL HZ MOY WUBUSKETYG BPBPXSE KYWAKKYX MH OPL TPGX."MOY WUBUSKE KPXY MH VUMMSY UGX TYYM MOY CHAGXYX UGX XH GHM ZHK U THTYGMMOPGR HZ COUM UCUPML MOYT, VAM IULL VE, CPGRPGN UM MOY CHAGXYX. EYM ZKHTUTHGN MOYLY TYG MCYGME MOHALUGX UKY XHHTYX MH XPY, UGX MOYE CHGXYK UM TEOUM! LMKUGNY!" MOHANOM IPYKKY, WHGMPGAPGN OPL CUE MH MUMUKPGHBU.PG ZKHGM HZ U SUGXHCGYK'L OHALY MH MOY SYZM HZ MOY KHUX LMHHX WUKKPUNYL,CUNHGL, UGX WKHCXL HZ HKXYKSPYL UGX LYGMPGYSL. MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZCUL IAMMPGN AI MOYKY, VAM QALM COYG IPYKKY UKKPBYX OY CUL GHM PG UGXOUKXSE UGE HZ MOY LMUZZ CYKY MOYKY--MOYE OUX NHGY MH MOY WOAKWO LYKBPWY.IPYKKY XKHBY HG MHCUKX NHKRP.COYG OY OUX ULWYGXYX MOY OPSS UGX KYUWOYX MOY SPMMSY BPSSUNY LMKYYM, OYLUC ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY IYULUGM TPSPMPUTYG PG MOYPK COPMY LOPKML UGX CPMOWKHLLYL HG MOYPK WUIL, COH, MUSRPGN UGX SUANOPGN SHAXSE, UGPTUMYX UGXIYKLIPKPGN, CYKY UM CHKR HG U OANY RGHSS HBYKNKHCG CPMO NKULL MH MOYKPNOM HZ MOY KHUX.LHTY HZ MOYT CYKY XPNNPGN, HMOYKL CYKY COYYSPGN VUKKHCSHUXL HZ YUKMOUSHGN ISUGRL, COPSY HMOYKL LMHHX UVHAM XHPGN GHMOPGN.MCH HZZPWYKL CYKY LMUGXPGN HG MOY RGHSS, XPKYWMPGN MOY TYG. HG LYYPGNMOYLY IYULUGML, COH CYKY YBPXYGMSE LMPSS UTALYX VE MOY GHBYSME HZ MOYPKIHLPMPHG UL LHSXPYKL, IPYKKY HGWY THKY MOHANOM HZ MOY CHAGXYX TYG UMTHFOUELR UGX AGXYKLMHHX COUM MOY LHSXPYK OUX TYUGM COYG OY LUPX: "MOYECUGM MOY COHSY GUMPHG MH ZUSS HG MOYT." MOY LPNOM HZ MOYLY VYUKXYXIYULUGML UM CHKR HG MOY VUMMSYZPYSX, CPMO MOYPK JAYYK, WSATLE VHHMLUGX IYKLIPKPGN GYWRL, UGX MOYPK LOPKML HIYGPGN ZKHT MOY SYZM MHCUKXMOY TPXXSY, AGZULMYGYX, YDIHLPGN MOYPK LAGVAKGYX WHSSUKVHGYL, PTIKYLLYXIPYKKY THKY LMKHGNSE CPMO MOY LHSYTGPME UGX PTIHKMUGWY HZ MOY THTYGMMOUG UGEMOPGN OY OUX EYM LYYG HK OYUKX.WOUIMYK DDPIPYKKY LMYIIYX HAM HZ OPL WUKKPUNY UGX, IULLPGN MOY MHPSPGN TPSPMPUTYG,ULWYGXYX MOY RGHSS ZKHT COPWO, UWWHKXPGN MH MOY XHWMHK, MOY VUMMSYZPYSXWHASX VY LYYG.PM CUL UVHAM YSYBYG H'WSHWR. MOY LAG LOHGY LHTYCOUM MH MOY SYZM UGXVYOPGX OPT UGX VKPNOMSE SPM AI MOY YGHKTHAL IUGHKUTU COPWO, KPLPGN SPRYUG UTIOPMOYUMYK, YDMYGXYX VYZHKY OPT PG MOY WSYUK KUKYZPYX UMTHLIOYKY.ZKHT UVHBY HG MOY SYZM, VPLYWMPGN MOUM UTIOPMOYUMYK, CHAGX MOY LTHSYGLROPNOKHUX, IULLPGN MOKHANO U BPSSUNY CPMO U COPMY WOAKWO LHTY ZPBYOAGXKYX IUWYL PG ZKHGM HZ MOY RGHSS UGX VYSHC PM. MOPL CUL VHKHXPGH.VYSHC MOY BPSSUNY MOY KHUX WKHLLYX MOY KPBYK VE U VKPXNY UGX, CPGXPGNXHCG UGX AI, KHLY OPNOYK UGX OPNOYK MH MOY BPSSUNY HZ BUSAYBH BPLPVSYUVHAM ZHAK TPSYL UCUE, COYKY GUIHSYHG CUL MOYG LMUMPHGYX. VYEHGX BUSAYBHMOY KHUX XPLUIIYUKYX PGMH U EYSSHCPGN ZHKYLM HG MOY OHKPFHG. ZUK PGMOY XPLMUGWY PG MOUM VPKWO UGX ZPK ZHKYLM MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY KHUX, MOYWKHLL UGX VYSZKE HZ MOY RHSHWOU THGULMYKE NSYUTYX PG MOY LAG. OYKY UGXMOYKY HBYK MOY COHSY HZ MOUM VSAY YDIUGLY, MH KPNOM UGX SYZM HZ MOYZHKYLM UGX MOY KHUX, LTHRPGN WUTIZPKYL WHASX VY LYYG UGX PGXYZPGPMYTULLYL HZ MKHHIL--HAKL UGX MOY YGYTE'L. MOY NKHAGX MH MOY KPNOM--USHGNMOY WHAKLY HZ MOY RHSHWOU UGX THLRBU KPBYKL--CUL VKHRYG UGX OPSSE.VYMCYYG MOY OHSSHCL MOY BPSSUNYL HZ VYFAVHBU UGX FUROUKPGH LOHCYX PG MOYXPLMUGWY. HG MOY SYZM MOY NKHAGX CUL THKY SYBYS; MOYKY CYKY ZPYSXL HZNKUPG, UGX MOY LTHRPGN KAPGL HZ LYTYGHBLR, COPWO OUX VYYG VAKGYX XHCG,WHASX VY LYYG.USS MOUM IPYKKY LUC CUL LH PGXYZPGPMY MOUM GYPMOYK MOY SYZM GHK MOYKPNOM LPXY HZ MOY ZPYSX ZASSE LUMPLZPYX OPL YDIYWMUMPHGL. GHCOYKYWHASX OY LYY MOY VUMMSYZPYSX OY OUX YDIYWMYX MH ZPGX, VAM HGSE ZPYSXL,TYUXHCL, MKHHIL, CHHXL, MOY LTHRY HZ WUTIZPKYL, BPSSUNYL, THAGXL, UGXLMKYUTL; UGX MKE UL OY CHASX OY WHASX XYLWKE GH TPSPMUKE "IHLPMPHG" PGMOPL ISUWY COPWO MYYTYX CPMO SPZY, GHK WHASX OY YBYG XPLMPGNAPLO HAKMKHHIL ZKHT MOY YGYTE'L."P TALM ULR LHTYHGY COH RGHCL," OY MOHANOM, UGX UXXKYLLYX UG HZZPWYK COHCUL SHHRPGN CPMO WAKPHLPME UM OPL OANY AGTPSPMUKE ZPNAKY."TUE P ULR EHA," LUPX IPYKKY, "COUM BPSSUNY MOUM PL PG ZKHGM?""VAKXPGH, PLG'M PM?" MOUM'L LYTYGHBLR,EYL, MOYKY," OY IHPGMYX MH KUYBLRP'L RGHSS. "VAM MOY VUMMSY CPSS OUKXSEVY MOYKY. OPL OUBPGN THBYX OPL MKHHIL MOYKY PL HGSE U KALY; OY CPSSIKHVUVSE IULL KHAGX MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY THLRBU. VAM COYKYBYK PM TUE VY,TUGE U TUG CPSS VY TPLLPGN MHTHKKHC!" OY KYTUKRYX.UG YSXYKSE LYKNYUGM COH OUX UIIKHUWOYX MOY HZZPWYK COPSY OY CUL NPBPGNMOYLY YDISUGUMPHGL OUX CUPMYX PG LPSYGWY ZHK OPT MH ZPGPLO LIYURPGN, VAMUM MOPL IHPGM, YBPXYGMSE GHM SPRPGN MOY HZZPWYK'L KYTUKR, PGMYKKAIMYXOPT."NUVPHGL TALM VY LYGM ZHK," LUPX OY LMYKGSE.MOY HZZPWYK UIIYUKYX UVULOYX, UL MOHANO OY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM HGY TPNOMMOPGR HZ OHC TUGE TYG CHASX VY TPLLPGN MHTHKKHC VAM HANOM GHM MH LIYURHZ PM."CYSS, LYGX GATVYK MOKYY WHTIUGE UNUPG," MOY HZZPWYK KYISPYX OAKKPYXSE."UGX EHA, UKY EHA HGY HZ MOY XHWMHKL?""GH, P'BY WHTY HG TE HCG," UGLCYKYX IPYKKY, UGX OY CYGM XHCG MOY OPSSUNUPG, IULLPGN MOY TPSPMPUTYG."HO, MOHLY XUTGYX ZYSSHCL!" TAMMYKYX MOY HZZPWYK COH ZHSSHCYX OPT,OHSXPGN OPL GHLY UL OY KUG IULM MOY TYG UM CHKR."MOYKY MOYE UKY... VKPGNPGN OYK, WHTPGN... MOYKY MOYE UKY... MOYE'SS VYOYKY PG U TPGAMY..." BHPWYL CYKY LAXXYGSE OYUKX LUEPGN; UGX HZZPWYKL,LHSXPYKL, UGX TPSPMPUTYG VYNUG KAGGPGN ZHKCUKX USHGN MOY KHUX.U WOAKWO IKHWYLLPHG CUL WHTPGN AI MOY OPSS ZKHT VHKHXPGH. ZPKLM USHGNMOY XALME KHUX WUTY MOY PGZUGMKE PG KUGRL, VUKYOYUXYX UGX CPMO UKTLKYBYKLYX. MOY PVYKPUG THMOYK HZ NHX!"LHTYHGY WKPYX."MOY LTHSYGLR THMOYK HZ NHX," UGHMOYK WHKKYWMYX OPT.MOY TPSPMPUTYG, VHMO MOHLY COH OUX VYYG PG MOY BPSSUNY UGX MOHLY COH OUXVYYG UM CHKR HG MOY VUMMYKE, MOKYC XHCG MOYPK LIUXYL UGX KUG MH TYYM MOYWOAKWO IKHWYLLPHG. ZHSSHCPGN MOY VUMMUSPHG MOUM TUKWOYX USHGN MOY XALMEKHUX WUTY IKPYLML PG MOYPK BYLMTYGML--HGY SPMMSY HSX TUG PG U OHHX CPMOUMMYGXUGML UGX LPGNYKL. VYOPGX MOYT LHSXPYKL UGX HZZPWYKL VHKY U SUKNY,XUKR-ZUWYX PWHG CPMO UG YTVHLLYX TYMUS WHBYK. MOPL CUL MOY PWHG MOUM OUXVYYG VKHANOM ZKHT LTHSYGLR UGX OUX LPGWY UWWHTIUGPYX MOY UKTE. VYOPGX,VYZHKY, UGX HG VHMO LPXYL, WKHCXL HZ TPSPMPUTYG CPMO VUKYX OYUXL CUSRYX,KUG, UGX VHCYX MH MOY NKHAGX.UM MOY LATTPM HZ MOY OPSS MOYE LMHIIYX CPMO MOY PWHG; MOY TYG COH OUXVYYG OHSXPGN PM AI VE MOY SPGYG VUGXL UMMUWOYX MH PM CYKY KYSPYBYX VEHMOYKL, MOY WOUGMYKL KYSPM MOYPK WYGLYKL, UGX LYKBPWY VYNUG. MOY OHMKUEL HZ MOY LAG VYUM XHCG BYKMPWUSSE UGX U ZKYLO LHZM CPGX ISUEYX CPMOMOY OUPK HZ MOY VUKYX OYUXL UGX CPMO MOY KPVVHGL XYWHKUMPGN MOY PWHG.MOY LPGNPGN XPX GHM LHAGX SHAX AGXYK MOY HIYG LRE. UG PTTYGLY WKHCXHZ VUKYOYUXYX HZZPWYKL, LHSXPYKL, UGX TPSPMPUTYG LAKKHAGXYX MOY PWHG.VYOPGX MOY IKPYLM UGX U WOUGMYK LMHHX MOY GHMUVPSPMPYL HG U LIHMKYLYKBYX ZHK MOYT. U VUSX NYGYKUS CPMO U LM. NYHKNY'L WKHLL HG OPL GYWRLMHHX QALM VYOPGX MOY IKPYLM'L VUWR, UGX CPMOHAM WKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ (OYCUL YBPXYGMSE U NYKTUG) IUMPYGMSE UCUPMYX MOY YGX HZ MOY LYKBPWY, COPWOOY WHGLPXYKYX PM GYWYLLUKE MH OYUK MH MOY YGX, IKHVUVSE MH UKHALY MOYIUMKPHMPLT HZ MOY KALLPUG IYHISY. UGHMOYK NYGYKUS LMHHX PG U TUKMPUSIHLY, WKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ VE LOURPGN OPL OUGX PG ZKHGM HZ OPL WOYLMCOPSY SHHRPGN UVHAM OPT. LMUGXPGN UTHGN MOY WKHCX HZ IYULUGML, IPYKKYKYWHNGPFYX LYBYKUS UWJAUPGMUGWYL UTHGN MOYLY GHMUVSYL, VAM XPX GHMSHHR UM MOYT--OPL COHSY UMMYGMPHG CUL UVLHKVYX PG CUMWOPGN MOY LYKPHALYDIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOY WKHCX HZ LHSXPYKL UGX TPSPMPUTYG COH CYKYUSS NUFPGN YUNYKSE UM MOY PWHG. UL LHHG UL MOY MPKYX WOUGMYKL, COH CYKYLPGNPGN MOY LYKBPWY ZHK MOY MCYGMPYMO MPTY MOUM XUE, VYNUG SUFPSE UGXTYWOUGPWUSSE MH LPGN: "LUBY ZKHT WUSUTPME MOE LYKBUGML, H THMOYK HZNHX," UGX MOY IKPYLM UGX XYUWHG WOPTYX PG: "ZHK MH MOYY AGXYK NHX CY USSZSYY UL MH UG PGBPHSUVSY VASCUKR UGX IKHMYWMPHG," MOYKY UNUPG RPGXSYX PGUSS MOHLY ZUWYL MOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG HZ WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY LHSYTGPMEHZ MOY PTIYGXPGN THTYGM MOUM IPYKKY OUX LYYG HG MOY ZUWYL UM MOY ZHHM HZMOY OPSS UM THFOUELR UGX THTYGMUKPSE HG TUGE UGX TUGE ZUWYL OY OUX TYMMOUM THKGPGN; UGX OYUXL CYKY VHCYX THKY ZKYJAYGMSE UGX OUPK MHLLYX VUWR,UGX LPNOL UGX MOY LHAGX TYG TUXY UL MOYE WKHLLYX MOYTLYSBYL CYKY OYUKX.MOY WKHCX KHAGX MOY PWHG LAXXYGSE IUKMYX UGX IKYLLYX UNUPGLM IPYKKY.LHTYHGY, U BYKE PTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNY QAXNPGN VE MOY OULMY CPMO COPWO CUECUL TUXY ZHK OPT, CUL UIIKHUWOPGN MOY PWHG.PM CUL RAMAFHB, COH OUX VYYG KPXPGN KHAGX MOY IHLPMPHG UGX HG OPL CUEVUWR MH MUMUKPGHBU OUX LMHIIYX COYKY MOY LYKBPWY CUL VYPGN OYSX. IPYKKYKYWHNGPFYX OPT UM HGWY VE OPL IYWASPUK ZPNAKY, COPWO XPLMPGNAPLOYX OPTZKHT YBYKEVHXE YSLY.CPMO U SHGN HBYKWHUM HG OPL YDWYYXPGNSE LMHAM, KHAGX-LOHASXYKYX VHXE,CPMO AGWHBYKYX COPMY OYUX UGX IAZZE ZUWY LOHCPGN MOY COPMY VUSS HZ MOYYEY OY OUX SHLM, RAMAFHB CUSRYX CPMO ISAGNPGN, LCUEPGN NUPM PGMHMOY WKHCX UGX LMHIIYX VYOPGX MOY IKPYLM. "P LOHASX SPRY MH LMUKM ZKHT MOY THLRBU KPBYK UGX KPXYKHAGX MOY COHSY IHLPMPHG.""CYSS, EHA WUG XH MOUM SUMYK, VAM MOY WOPYZ MOPGN PL MOY SYZM ZSUGR.""EYL, EYL. OY OUXYLMUVSPLOYX OPTLYSZ CPMO WHAGM VYGGPNLYG, COH, SPRY USS HG COHT VHKPLOUX VYYG PG UMMYGXUGWY, WHGLPXYKYX EHAGN IKPGWY XKAVYMLRHE UG PGBUSAUVSYTUG.PG MOY OPNOYK WHTTUGX MOYKY CYKY MCH LOUKISE XYZPGYX IUKMPYL: RAMAFHB'LIUKME UGX MOUM HZ VYGGPNLYG, MOY WOPYZ HZ LMUZZ. VHKPL VYSHGNYX MH MOYSUMMYK UGX GH HGY YSLY, COPSY LOHCPGN LYKBPSY KYLIYWM MH RAMAFHB, WHASXLH WKYUMY UG PTIKYLLPHG MOUM MOY HSX ZYSSHC CUL GHM TAWO NHHX UGX MOUMVYGGPNLYG TUGUNYX YBYKEMOPGN. GHC MOY XYWPLPBY THTYGM HZ VUMMSY OUX WHTYCOYG RAMAFHB CHASX VY XYLMKHEYX UGX MOY IHCYK IULL MH VYGGPNLYG, HK YBYGPZ RAMAFHB CHG MOY VUMMSY PM CHASX VY ZYSM MOUM YBYKEMOPGN CUL XHGY VEVYGGPNLYG. PG UGE WULY TUGE NKYUM KYCUKXL CHASX OUBY MH VY NPBYG ZHKMHTHKKHC'L UWMPHG, UGX GYC TYG CHASX WHTY MH MOY ZKHGM. LH VHKPL CULZASS HZ GYKBHAL BPBUWPME USS XUE.UZMYK RUELUKHB, HMOYKL COHT IPYKKY RGYC WUTY AI MH OPT, UGX OY OUX GHMMPTY MH KYISE MH USS MOY JAYLMPHGL UVHAM THLWHC MOUM CYKY LOHCYKYX AIHGOPT, HK MH SPLMYG MH USS MOUM CUL MHSX OPT. MOY ZUWYL USS YDIKYLLYXUGPTUMPHG UGX UIIKYOYGLPHG, VAM PM LYYTYX MH IPYKKY MOUM MOY WUALY HZMOY YDWPMYTYGM LOHCG PG LHTY HZ MOYLY ZUWYL SUE WOPYZSE PG JAYLMPHGLHZ IYKLHGUS LAWWYLL; OPL TPGX, OHCYBYK, CUL HWWAIPYX VE MOY XPZZYKYGMYDIKYLLPHG OY LUC HG HMOYK ZUWYL--UG YDIKYLLPHG MOUM LIHRY GHM HZIYKLHGUS TUMMYKL VAM HZ MOY AGPBYKLUS JAYLMPHGL HZ SPZY UGX XYUMO.RAMAFHB GHMPWYX IPYKKY'L ZPNAKY UGX MOY NKHAI NUMOYKYX KHAGX OPT."WUSS OPT MH TY," LUPX RAMAFHB.UG UXQAMUGM MHSX IPYKKY HZ OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL' CPLO, UGX IPYKKY CYGMMHCUKX RAMAFHB'L VYGWO. VAM U TPSPMPUTUG NHM MOYKY VYZHKY OPT. PM CULXHSHROHB."OHC XPX MOUM ZYSSHC NYM OYKY?" ULRYX IPYKKY."OY'L U WKYUMAKY MOUM CKPNNSYL PG UGECOYKY!" CUL MOY UGLCYK. "OYOUL VYYG XYNKUXYX, EHA RGHC. GHC OY CUGML MH VHV AI UNUPG. OY'L VYYGIKHIHLPGN LHTY LWOYTY HK HMOYK UGX OUL WKUCSYX PGMH MOY YGYTE'L IPWRYMSPGY UM GPNOM.... XHSHROHB CUL LUEPGN."EYL, EYL.""VAM PZ P CYKY KPNOM, P LOHASX VY KYGXYKPGN U LYKBPWY MH TE ZUMOYKSUGXZHK COPWO P UT KYUXE MH XPY.""EYL, EYL.""UGX LOHASX EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLL KYJAPKY U TUG COH CPSS GHM LIUKY OPLLRPG, ISYULY MOPGR HZ TY.... IYKOUIL P TUE IKHBY ALYZAS MH EHAK LYKYGYOPNOGYLL.""EYL... EYL..." RAMAFHB KYIYUMYX, OPL SUANOPGN YEY GUKKHCPGN THKY UGXTHKY UL OY SHHRYX UM IPYKKY.QALM MOYG VHKPL, CPMO OPL WHAKMPYKSPRY UXKHPMGYLL, LMYIIYX AI MHIPYKKY'L LPXY GYUK RAMAFHB UGX PG U THLM GUMAKUS TUGGYK, CPMOHAMKUPLPGN OPL BHPWY, LUPX MH IPYKKY, UL MOHANO WHGMPGAPGN UG PGMYKKAIMYXWHGBYKLUMPHG:"MOY TPSPMPU OUBY IAM HG WSYUG COPMY LOPKML MH VY KYUXE MH XPY. COUMOYKHPLT, WHAGM!"VHKPL YBPXYGMSE LUPX MOPL MH IPYKKY PG HKXYK MH VY HBYKOYUKX VE OPLLYKYGY OPNOGYLL. LUPX RAMAFHB; UGX OY WSHLYX OPLYEYL UGX LCUEYX OPL OYUX. "U TUMWOSYLL IYHISY!" OY KYIYUMYX CPMO U LPNO."LH EHA CUGM MH LTYSS NAGIHCXYK?" OY LUPX MH IPYKKY. "EYL, PM'L UISYULUGM LTYSS. TE JAUKMYKL UKY UM EHAK LYKBPWY."UGX UL HZMYG OUIIYGL CPMO HSX IYHISY, RAMAFHB VYNUG SHHRPGN UVHAMUVLYGM-TPGXYXSE UL PZ ZHKNYMMPGN USS OY CUGMYX MH LUE HK XH.MOYG, YBPXYGMSE KYTYTVYKPGN COUM OY CUGMYX, OY VYWRHGYX MH UGXKYCRUELUKHB, OPL UXQAMUGM'L VKHMOYK."MOHLY BYKLYL... MOHLY BYKLYL HZ TUKPG'L... OHC XH MOYE NH, YO? MOHLY OYCKHMY UVHAM NYKURHB: 'SYWMAKYL ZHK MOY WHKIL PGXPMPGN'... KYWPMY MOYT,KYWPMY MOYT!" LUPX OY, YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKPGN MH SUANO.RUELUKHB KYWPMYX.... RAMAFHB LTPSPGNSE GHXXYX OPL OYUX MH MOY KOEMOT HZMOY BYKLYL.COYG IPYKKY OUX SYZM RAMAFHB, XHSHROHB WUTY AI MH OPT UGX MHHR OPL OUGX."P UT BYKE NSUX MH TYYM EHA OYKY, WHAGM," OY LUPX USHAX, KYNUKXSYLLHZ MOY IKYLYGWY HZ LMKUGNYKL UGX PG U IUKMPWASUKSE KYLHSAMY UGX LHSYTGMHGY. "HG MOY YBY HZ U XUE COYG NHX USHGY RGHCL COH HZ AL PL ZUMYX MHLAKBPBY, P UT NSUX HZ MOPL HIIHKMAGPME MH MYSS EHA MOUM P KYNKYM MOYTPLAGXYKLMUGXPGNL MOUM HWWAKKYX VYMCYYG AL UGX LOHASX CPLO EHA GHM MHOUBY UGE PSS ZYYSPGN ZHK TY. P VYN EHA MH ZHKNPBY TY."IPYKKY SHHRYX UM XHSHROHB CPMO U LTPSY, GHM RGHCPGN COUM MH LUE MH OPT.CPMO MYUKL PG OPL YEYL XHSHROHB YTVKUWYX IPYKKY UGX RPLLYX OPT.VHKPL LUPX U ZYC CHKXL MH OPL NYGYKUS, UGX WHAGM VYGGPNLYG MAKGYX MHIPYKKY UGX IKHIHLYX MOUM OY LOHASX KPXY CPMO OPT USHGN MOY SPGY."PM CPSS PGMYKYLM EHA," LUPX OY."EYL, BYKE TAWO," KYISPYX IPYKKY.OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK RAMAFHB SYZM ZHK MUMUKPGHBU, UGX VYGGPNLYG UGX OPLLAPMY, CPMO IPYKKY UTHGN MOYT, LYM HAM HG MOYPK KPXY USHGN MOY SPGY.WOUIMYK DDPPPZKHT NHKRP, VYGGPNLYG XYLWYGXYX MOY OPNOKHUX MH MOY VKPXNY COPWO, COYGMOYE OUX SHHRYX UM PM ZKHT MOY OPSS, MOY HZZPWYK OUX IHPGMYX HAM ULVYPGN MOY WYGMYK HZ HAK IHLPMPHG UGX COYKY KHCL HZ ZKUNKUGM GYC-THCG OUESUE VE MOY KPBYKLPXY. MOYE KHXY UWKHLL MOUM VKPXNY PGMH MOY BPSSUNY HZVHKHXPGH UGX MOYGWY MAKGYX MH MOY SYZM, IULLPGN UG YGHKTHAL GATVYK HZMKHHIL UGX NAGL, UGX WUTY MH U OPNO RGHSS COYKY TPSPMPUTYG CYKY XPNNPGN.MOPL CUL MOY KYXHAVM, UL EYM AGGUTYX, COPWO UZMYKCUKXL VYWUTY RGHCG ULMOY KUYBLRP KYXHAVM, HK MOY RGHSS VUMMYKE, VAM IPYKKY IUPX GH LIYWPUSUMMYGMPHG MH PM. OY XPX GHM RGHC MOUM PM CHASX VYWHTY THKY TYTHKUVSY MHOPT MOUG UGE HMOYK LIHM HG MOY ISUPG HZ VHKHXPGH.MOYE MOYG WKHLLYX MOY OHSSHC MH LYTYGHBLR, COYKY MOY LHSXPYKL CYKYXKUNNPGN UCUE MOY SULM SHNL ZKHT MOY OAML UGX VUKGL. MOYG MOYE KHXYXHCGOPSS UGX AIOPSS, UWKHLL U KEYZPYSX MKHXXYG UGX VYUMYG XHCG UL PZ VEOUPS, ZHSSHCPGN U MKUWR ZKYLOSE TUXY VE MOY UKMPSSYKE HBYK MOY ZAKKHCLHZ MOY ISHCYX SUGX, UGX KYUWOYX LHTY ZSYWOYL * COPWO CYKY LMPSS VYPGNXAN.    * U RPGX HZ YGMKYGWOTYGM.UM MOY ZSYWOYL VYGGPNLYG LMHIIYX UGX VYNUG SHHRPGN UM MOY LOYBUKXPGHKYXHAVM HIIHLPMY, COPWO OUX VYYG HAKL MOY XUE VYZHKY UGX COYKY LYBYKUSOHKLYTYG WHASX VY XYLWKPYX. MOY HZZPWYKL LUPX MOUM YPMOYK GUIHSYHG HKTAKUM CUL MOYKY, UGX MOYE USS NUFYX YUNYKSE UM MOPL SPMMSY NKHAI HZOHKLYTYG. IPYKKY USLH SHHRYX UM MOYT, MKEPGN MH NAYLL COPWO HZ MOYLWUKWYSE XPLWYKGPVSY ZPNAKYL CUL GUIHSYHG. UM SULM MOHLY THAGMYX TYGKHXY UCUE ZKHT MOY THAGX UGX XPLUIIYUKYX.VYGGPNLYG LIHRY MH U NYGYKUS COH UIIKHUWOYX OPT, UGX VYNUG YDISUPGPGNMOY COHSY IHLPMPHG HZ HAK MKHHIL. IPYKKY SPLMYGYX MH OPT, LMKUPGPGN YUWOZUWASME MH AGXYKLMUGX MOY YLLYGMPUS IHPGML HZ MOY PTIYGXPGN VUMMSY, VAMCUL THKMPZPYX MH ZYYS MOUM OPL TYGMUS WUIUWPME CUL PGUXYJAUMY ZHK MOYMULR. OY WHASX TURY GHMOPGN HZ PM. VYGGPNLYG LMHIIYX LIYURPGN UGX,GHMPWPGN MOUM IPYKKY CUL SPLMYGPGN, LAXXYGSE LUPX MH OPT:"P XHG'M MOPGR MOPL PGMYKYLML EHA?""HG MOY WHGMKUKE PM'L BYKE PGMYKYLMPGN!" KYISPYX IPYKKY GHM JAPMYMKAMOZASSE.ZKHT MOY ZSYWOYL MOYE KHXY LMPSS ZUKMOYK MH MOY SYZM, USHGN U KHUXCPGXPGN MOKHANO U MOPWR, SHC-NKHCPGN VPKWO CHHX. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOYCHHX U VKHCG OUKY CPMO COPMY ZYYM LIKUGN HAM UGX, LWUKYX VE MOY MKUTI HZMOY TUGE OHKLYL, NKYC LH WHGZALYX MOUM PM SYUIYX USHGN MOY KHUX PG ZKHGMHZ MOYT ZHK LHTY MPTY, UKHALPGN NYGYKUS UMMYGMPHG UGX SUANOMYK, UGX HGSECOYG LYBYKUS BHPWYL LOHAMYX UM PM XPX PM XUKM MH HGY LPXY UGX XPLUIIYUKPG MOY MOPWRYM. UZMYK NHPGN MOKHANO MOY CHHX ZHK UVHAM U TPSY UGX U OUSZMOYE WUTY HAM HG U NSUXY COYKY MKHHIL HZ MAWORHB'L WHKIL CYKY LMUMPHGYXMH XYZYGX MOY SYZM ZSUGR.OYKY, UM MOY YDMKYTY SYZM ZSUGR, VYGGPNLYG MUSRYX U NKYUM XYUS UGX CPMOTAWO OYUM, UGX, UL PM LYYTYX MH IPYKKY, NUBY HKXYKL HZ NKYUM TPSPMUKEPTIHKMUGWY. PG ZKHGM HZ MAWORHB'L MKHHIL CUL LHTY OPNO NKHAGX GHMHWWAIPYX VE MKHHIL. VYGGPNLYG SHAXSE WKPMPWPFYX MOPL TPLMURY, LUEPGNMOUM PM CUL TUXGYLL MH SYUBY U OYPNOM COPWO WHTTUGXYX MOY WHAGMKE UKHAGXAGHWWAIPYX UGX MH ISUWY MKHHIL VYSHC PM. LHTY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL YDIKYLLYXMOY LUTY HIPGPHG. HGY PG IUKMPWASUK XYWSUKYX CPMO TUKMPUS OYUM MOUM MOYECYKY IAM MOYKY MH VY LSUANOMYKYX. VYGGPNLYG HG OPL HCG UAMOHKPME HKXYKYXMOY MKHHIL MH HWWAIE MOY OPNO NKHAGX. MOPL XPLIHLPMPHG HG MOY SYZM ZSUGRPGWKYULYX IPYKKY'L XHAVM HZ OPL HCG WUIUWPME MH AGXYKLMUGX TPSPMUKETUMMYKL. SPLMYGPGN MH VYGGPNLYG UGX MOY NYGYKUSL WKPMPWPFPGN MOYIHLPMPHG HZ MOY MKHHIL VYOPGX MOY OPSS, OY JAPMY AGXYKLMHHX MOYT UGXLOUKYX MOYPK HIPGPHG, VAM ZHK MOUM BYKE KYULHG OY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGXOHC MOY TUG COH IAM MOYT MOYKY VYOPGX MOY OPSS WHASX OUBY TUXY LH NKHLLUGX IUSIUVSY U VSAGXYK.IPYKKY XPX GHM RGHC MOUM MOYLY MKHHIL CYKY GHM, UL VYGGPNLYG LAIIHLYX,IAM MOYKY MH XYZYGX MOY IHLPMPHG, VAM CYKY PG U WHGWYUSYX IHLPMPHG ULUG UTVALO, MOUM MOYE LOHASX GHM VY LYYG UGX TPNOM VY UVSY MH LMKPRY UGUIIKHUWOPGN YGYTE AGYDIYWMYXSE. VYGGPNLYG XPX GHM RGHC MOPL UGX THBYXMOY MKHHIL ZHKCUKX UWWHKXPGN MH OPL HCG PXYUL CPMOHAM TYGMPHGPGN MOYTUMMYK MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.WOUIMYK DDPBHG MOUM VKPNOM YBYGPGN HZ UANALM 25, IKPGWY UGXKYC SUE SYUGPGN HG OPLYSVHC PG U VKHRYG-XHCG LOYX PG MOY BPSSUNY HZ RGEUFRHBH UM MOY ZAKMOYKYGX HZ OPL KYNPTYGM'L YGWUTITYGM. MOKHANO U NUI PG MOY VKHRYG CUSS OYWHASX LYY, VYLPXY MOY CHHXYG ZYGWY, U KHC HZ MOPKME EYUK-HSX VPKWOYLCPMO MOYPK SHCYK VKUGWOYL SHIIYX HZZ, U ZPYSX HG COPWO LOHWRL HZHUML CYKY LMUGXPGN, UGX LHTY VALOYL GYUK COPWO KHLY MOY LTHRY HZWUTIZPKYL--MOY LHSXPYKL' RPMWOYGL.GUKKHC UGX VAKXYGLHTY UGX ALYSYLL MH UGEHGY UL OPL SPZY GHC LYYTYX MHOPT, IKPGWY UGXKYC HG MOY YBY HZ VUMMSY ZYSM UNPMUMYX UGX PKKPMUVSY ULOY OUX XHGY LYBYG EYUKL VYZHKY UM UALMYKSPMF.OY OUX KYWYPBYX UGX NPBYG MOY HKXYKL ZHK GYDM XUE'L VUMMSY UGX OUXGHMOPGN THKY MH XH. VAM OPL MOHANOML--MOY LPTISYLM, WSYUKYLM, UGXMOYKYZHKY THLM MYKKPVSY MOHANOML--CHASX NPBY OPT GH IYUWY. OY RGYC MOUMMHTHKKHC'L VUMMSY CHASX VY MOY THLM MYKKPVSY HZ USS OY OUX MURYGIUKM PG, UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY PG OPL SPZY MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ XYUMOIKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OPT--GHM PG KYSUMPHG MH UGE CHKSXSE TUMMYK HK CPMOKYZYKYGWY MH PML YZZYWM HG HMOYKL, VAM LPTISE PG KYSUMPHG MH OPTLYSZ, MHOPL HCG LHAS--BPBPXSE, ISUPGSE, MYKKPVSE, UGX USTHLM UL U WYKMUPGME. UGXZKHT MOY OYPNOM HZ MOPL IYKWYIMPHG USS MOUM OUX IKYBPHALSE MHKTYGMYX UGXIKYHWWAIPYX OPT LAXXYGSE VYWUTY PSSATPGYX VE U WHSX COPMY SPNOM CPMOHAMLOUXHCL, CPMOHAM IYKLIYWMPBY, CPMOHAM XPLMPGWMPHG HZ HAMSPGY. USS SPZYUIIYUKYX MH OPT SPRY TUNPW-SUGMYKG IPWMAKYL UM COPWO OY OUX SHGN VYYGNUFPGN VE UKMPZPWPUS SPNOM MOKHANO U NSULL. GHC OY LAXXYGSE LUC MOHLYVUXSE XUAVYX IPWMAKYL PG WSYUK XUESPNOM UGX CPMOHAM U NSULL. "EYL,EYL! MOYKY MOYE UKY, MOHLY ZUSLY PTUNYL MOUM UNPMUMYX, YGKUIMAKYX,UGX MHKTYGMYX TY," LUPX OY MH OPTLYSZ, IULLPGN PG KYBPYC MOY IKPGWPIUSIPWMAKYL HZ MOY TUNPW SUGMYKG HZ SPZY UGX KYNUKXPGN MOYT GHC PG MOY WHSXCOPMY XUESPNOM HZ OPL WSYUK IYKWYIMPHG HZ XYUMO. "MOYKY MOYE UKY, MOHLYKAXYSE IUPGMYX ZPNAKYL MOUM HGWY LYYTYX LISYGXPX UGX TELMYKPHAL.NSHKE, MOY NHHX HZ LHWPYME, SHBY HZ U CHTUG, MOY ZUMOYKSUGX PMLYSZ--OHCPTIHKMUGM MOYLY IPWMAKYL UIIYUKYX MH TY, CPMO COUM IKHZHAGX TYUGPGN MOYELYYTYX MH VY ZPSSYX! VYSPYBY TY," OY CYGM HG, "PZ MOPGNLXYIYGXYX HG UKKUGNYTYGML TUXY VE MOY LMUZZ, P LOHASX VY MOYKY TURPGNUKKUGNYTYGML, VAM PGLMYUX HZ MOUM P OUBY MOY OHGHK MH LYKBY OYKY PGMOY KYNPTYGM CPMO MOYLY NYGMSYTYG, UGX P WHGLPXYK MOUM HG AL MHTHKKHC'LVUMMSY CPSS XYIYGX UGX GHM HG MOHLY HMOYKL.... LAWWYLL GYBYK XYIYGXL,UGX GYBYK CPSS XYIYGX, HG IHLPMPHG, HK YJAPITYGM, HK YBYG HG GATVYKL,UGX SYULM HZ USS HG IHLPMPHG.""VAM HG COUM MOYG?""HG MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM PL PG TY UGX PG OPT," OY IHPGMYX MH MPTHROPG, "UGXPG YUWO LHSXPYK."IKPGWY UGXKYC NSUGWYX UM MPTHROPG, COH SHHRYX UM OPL WHTTUGXYK PG USUKTUGX VYCPSXYKTYGM. VAM GUIHSYHG OUX XKYLLYX UGX WHTY HAM CPMO LAWO AGYDIYWMYXKUIPXPME MOUM OY OUX GHM MPTY MH ZPGPLO UKKUGNPGN MOY LAKIKPLY.GUIHSYHG GHMPWYX UM HGWY COUM MOYE CYKY UVHAM UGX NAYLLYX MOUM MOYE CYKYGHM KYUXE. OY XPX GHM CPLO MH XYIKPBY MOYT HZ MOY ISYULAKY HZ NPBPGN OPTU LAKIKPLY, LH OY IKYMYGXYX GHM MH LYY XY VYUALLYM UGX WUSSYX ZUVBPYK MHOPT, SPLMYGPGN LPSYGMSE UGX CPMO U LMYKG ZKHCG MH COUM ZUVBPYK MHSX OPTHZ MOY OYKHPLT UGX XYBHMPHG HZ OPL MKHHIL ZPNOMPGN UM LUSUTUGWU, UMMOY HMOYK YGX HZ YAKHIY, CPMO VAM HGY MOHANOM--MH VY CHKMOE HZ MOYPKYTIYKHK--UGX VAM HGY ZYUK--MH ZUPS MH ISYULY OPT. MOY KYLASM HZMOUM VUMMSY OUX VYYG XYISHKUVSY. GUIHSYHG TUXY PKHGPW KYTUKRL XAKPGNZUVBPYK'L UWWHAGM, UL PZ OY OUX GHM YDIYWMYX MOUM TUMMYKL WHASX NHHMOYKCPLY PG OPL UVLYGWY."P TALM TURY AI ZHK MOUM PG THLWHC," LUPX GUIHSYHG. "P'SS LYY EHASUMYK," OY UXXYX, UGX LATTHGYX XY VYUALLYM, COH VE MOUM MPTY OUXIKYIUKYX MOY LAKIKPLY, OUBPGN ISUWYX LHTYMOPGN HG MOY WOUPKL UGX WHBYKYXPM CPMO U WSHMO.XY VYUALLYM VHCYX SHC, CPMO MOUM WHAKMSE ZKYGWO VHC COPWO HGSE MOYHSX KYMUPGYKL HZ MOY VHAKVHGL RGYC OHC MH TURY, UGX UIIKHUWOYX OPT,IKYLYGMPGN UG YGBYSHIY.GUIHSYHG MAKGYX MH OPT NUPSE UGX IASSYX OPL YUK."EHA OUBY OAKKPYX OYKY. P UT BYKE NSUX. CYSS, COUM PL IUKPL LUEPGN?" OYULRYX, LAXXYGSE WOUGNPGN OPL ZHKTYK LMYKG YDIKYLLPHG ZHK U THLM WHKXPUSMHGY."LPKY, USS IUKPL KYNKYML EHAK UVLYGWY," KYISPYX XY VYUALLYM UL CULIKHIYK.VAM MOHANO GUIHSYHG RGYC MOUM XY VYUALLYM OUX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN HZ MOPLRPGX, UGX MOHANO PG OPL SAWPX THTYGML OY RGYC PM CUL AGMKAY, OY CULISYULYX MH OYUK PM ZKHT OPT. UNUPG OY OHGHKYX OPT VE MHAWOPGN OPL YUK."P UT BYKE LHKKE MH OUBY TUXY EHA MKUBYS LH ZUK," LUPX OY."LPKY, P YDIYWMYX GHMOPGN SYLL MOUG MH ZPGX EHA UM MOY NUMYL HZ THLWHC,"KYISPYX XY VYUALLYM.GUIHSYHG LTPSYX UGX, SPZMPGN OPL OYUX UVLYGM-TPGXYXSE, NSUGWYX MH MOYKPNOM. UG UPXY-XY-WUTI UIIKHUWOYX CPMO NSPXPGN LMYIL UGX HZZYKYX OPT UNHSX LGAZZVHD, COPWO OY MHHR."EYL, PM OUL OUIIYGYX SAWRPSE ZHK EHA," OY LUPX, KUPLPGN MOY HIYGLGAZZVHD MH OPL GHLY. "EHA UKY ZHGX HZ MKUBYS, UGX PG MOKYY XUEL EHACPSS LYY THLWHC. EHA LAKYSE XPX GHM YDIYWM MH LYY MOUM ULPUMPW WUIPMUS.EHA CPSS OUBY U ISYULUGM QHAKGYE."XY VYUALLYM VHCYX NKUMYZASSE UM MOPL KYNUKX ZHK OPL MULMY ZHK MKUBYS (HZCOPWO OY OUX GHM MPSS MOYG VYYG UCUKY)."OU, COUM'L MOPL?" ULRYX GUIHSYHG, GHMPWPGN MOUM USS MOY WHAKMPYKL CYKYSHHRPGN UM LHTYMOPGN WHGWYUSYX AGXYK U WSHMO.CPMO WHAKMSE UXKHPMGYLL XY VYUALLYM OUSZ MAKGYX UGX CPMOHAM MAKGPGN OPLVUWR MH MOY YTIYKHK KYMPKYX MCH LMYIL, MCPMWOPGN HZZ MOY WSHMO UM MOYLUTY MPTY, UGX LUPX:"U IKYLYGM MH EHAK TUQYLME ZKHT MOY YTIKYLL."PM CUL U IHKMKUPM, IUPGMYX PG VKPNOM WHSHKL VE NYKUKX, HZ MOY LHG VHKGYMH GUIHSYHG VE MOY XUANOMYK HZ MOY YTIYKHK HZ UALMKPU, MOY VHE COHT ZHKLHTY KYULHG YBYKEHGY WUSSYX "MOY RPGN HZ KHTY."U BYKE IKYMME WAKSE-OYUXYX VHE CPMO U SHHR HZ MOY WOKPLM PG MOY LPLMPGYTUXHGGU CUL XYIPWMYX ISUEPGN UM LMPWR UGX VUSS. MOY VUSS KYIKYLYGMYX MOYMYKKYLMKPUS NSHVY UGX MOY LMPWR PG OPL HMOYK OUGX U LWYIMYK.MOHANO PM CUL GHM WSYUK COUM MOY UKMPLM TYUGM MH YDIKYLL VE XYIPWMPGNMOY LH-WUSSYX RPGN HZ KHTY LIPRPGN MOY YUKMO CPMO U LMPWR, MOY USSYNHKEUIIUKYGMSE LYYTYX MH GUIHSYHG, UL PM OUX XHGY MH USS COH OUX LYYG PM PGIUKPL, JAPMY WSYUK UGX BYKE ISYULPGN."MOY RPGN HZ KHTY!" OY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MH MOY IHKMKUPM CPMO U NKUWYZASNYLMAKY. "UXTPKUVSY!"CPMO MOY GUMAKUS WUIUWPME HZ UG PMUSPUG ZHK WOUGNPGN MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZOPL ZUWY UM CPSS, OY XKYC GYUKYK MH MOY IHKMKUPM UGX ULLATYX U SHHRHZ IYGLPBY MYGXYKGYLL. OY ZYSM MOUM COUM OY GHC LUPX UGX XPX CHASXVY OPLMHKPWUS, UGX PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM PM CHASX GHC VY VYLM ZHKOPT--COHLY NKUGXYAK YGUVSYX OPL LHG MH ISUE LMPWR UGX VUSS CPMO MOYMYKKYLMKPUS NSHVY--MH LOHC, PG WHGMKULM MH MOUM NKUGXYAK, MOY LPTISYLMIUMYKGUS MYGXYKGYLL. OPL YEYL NKYC XPT, OY THBYX ZHKCUKX, NSUGWYX KHAGXUM U WOUPK (COPWO LYYTYX MH ISUWY PMLYSZ AGXYK OPT), UGX LUM XHCG HG PMVYZHKY MOY IHKMKUPM. UM U LPGNSY NYLMAKY ZKHT OPT YBYKEHGY CYGM HAM HGMPIMHY, SYUBPGN MOY NKYUM TUG MH OPTLYSZ UGX OPL YTHMPHG.OUBPGN LUM LMPSS ZHK U COPSY OY MHAWOYX--OPTLYSZ GHM RGHCPGN COE--MOYMOPWR LIHM HZ IUPGM KYIKYLYGMPGN MOY OPNOYLM SPNOM PG MOY IHKMKUPM,KHLY, UGX KYWUSSYX XY VYUALLYM UGX MOY HZZPWYK HG XAME. OY HKXYKYX MOYIHKMKUPM MH VY WUKKPYX HAMLPXY OPL MYGM, MOUM MOY HSX NAUKX, LMUMPHGYXKHAGX PM, TPNOM GHM VY XYIKPBYX HZ MOY ISYULAKY HZ LYYPGN MOY RPGN HZKHTY, MOY LHG UGX OYPK HZ MOYPK UXHKYX THGUKWO.UGX COPSY OY CUL XHPGN T. XY VYUALLYM MOY OHGHK HZ VKYURZULMPGN CPMOOPT, MOYE OYUKX, UL GUIHSYHG OUX UGMPWPIUMYX, MOY KUIMAKHAL WKPYL HZ MOYHZZPWYKL UGX TYG HZ MOY HSX NAUKX COH OUX KAG AI MH LYY MOY IHKMKUPM."BPBY S'YTIYKYAK! BPBY SY KHP XY KHTY! BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" WUTY MOHLYYWLMUMPW WKPYL.UZMYK VKYURZULM GUIHSYHG PG XY VYUALLYM'L IKYLYGWY XPWMUMYX OPL HKXYK HZMOY XUE MH MOY UKTE."LOHKM UGX YGYKNYMPW!" XY VYUALLYM, COH CULLH ZHGX HZ MKUBYS, MH UWWHTIUGE OPT HG OPL KPXY, OY CYGM HAM HZ MOY MYGMMH COYKY MOY OHKLYL LMHHX LUXXSYX."EHAK TUQYLME PL MHH RPGX!" "PM PL MHH LHHG ZHK OPT MH LYY U ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY."XY VYUALLYM WSHLYX OPL YEYL, VHCYX OPL OYUX, UGX LPNOYX XYYISE, MHPGXPWUMY OHC IKHZHAGXSE OY BUSAYX UGX WHTIKYOYGXYX MOY YTIYKHK'L CHKXL.WOUIMYK DDBPPHG MOY MCYGME-ZPZMO HZ UANALM, LH OPL OPLMHKPUGL MYSS AL, GUIHSYHG LIYGMMOY COHSY XUE HG OHKLYVUWR PGLIYWMPGN MOY SHWUSPME, WHGLPXYKPGN ISUGLLAVTPMMYX MH OPT VE OPL TUKLOUSL, UGX IYKLHGUSSE NPBPGN WHTTUGXL MH OPLNYGYKUSL.MOY HKPNPGUS SPGY HZ MOY KALLPUG ZHKWYL USHGN MOY KPBYK RHSHWOU OUXVYYG XPLSHWUMYX VE MOY WUIMAKY HZ MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM HG MOYMCYGME-ZHAKMO, UGX IUKM HZ MOY SPGY--MOY SYZM ZSUGR--OUX VYYG XKUCGVUWR. MH OPLMHKPUGL COH VYSPYBY MOUM KALLPU CUL LOUIYX VEMOY CPSS HZ HGY TUG--IYMYK MOY NKYUM--UGX MOUM ZKUGWY ZKHT U KYIAVSPWVYWUTY UG YTIPKY UGX ZKYGWO UKTPYL CYGM MH KALLPU UM MOY CPSS HZ HGYTUG--GUIHSYHG--MH LUE MOUM KALLPU KYTUPGYX U IHCYK VYWUALY GUIHSYHGOUX U VUX WHSX HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO HZ UANALM TUE LYYT SHNPWUS UGXWHGBPGWPGN.PZ PM OUX XYIYGXYX HG GUIHSYHG'L CPSS MH ZPNOM HK GHM MH ZPNOM MOYVUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, UGX PZ MOPL HK MOUM HMOYK UKKUGNYTYGM XYIYGXYX HGOPL CPSS, MOYG YBPXYGMSE U WHSX UZZYWMPGN MOY TUGPZYLMUMPHG HZ OPL CPSSTPNOM OUBY LUBYX KALLPU, UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE MOY BUSYM COH HTPMMYX MH VKPGNGUIHSYHG OPL CUMYKIKHHZ VHHML HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO CHASX OUBY VYYGMOY LUBPHK HZ KALLPU. VAMMH TYG COH XH GHM UXTPM MOUM KALLPU CUL ZHKTYX VE MOY CPSS HZ HGY TUG,IYMYK P, HK MOUM MOY ZKYGWO YTIPKY CUL ZHKTYX UGX MOY CUK CPMO KALLPUVYNAG VE MOY CPSS HZ HGY TUG, GUIHSYHG, MOUM UKNATYGM LYYTL GHM TYKYSEAGMKAY UGX PKKUMPHGUS, VAM WHGMKUKE MH USS OATUG KYUSPME. MH MOYJAYLMPHG HZ COUM WUALYL OPLMHKPW YBYGML UGHMOYK UGLCYK IKYLYGML PMLYSZ,GUTYSE, MOUM MOY WHAKLY HZ OATUG YBYGML PL IKYXYMYKTPGYX ZKHT HGOPNO--XYIYGXL HG MOY WHPGWPXYGWY HZ MOY CPSSL HZ USS COH MURY IUKMPG MOY YBYGML, UGX MOUM U GUIHSYHG'L PGZSAYGWY HG MOY WHAKLY HZ MOYLYYBYGML PL IAKYSE YDMYKGUS UGX ZPWMPMPHAL.LMKUGNY UL UM ZPKLM NSUGWY PM TUE LYYT MH LAIIHLY MOUM MOY TULLUWKY HZLM. VUKMOHSHTYC CUL GHM XAY MH WOUKSYL PD'L CPSS, MOHANO OY NUBY MOYHKXYK ZHK PM UGX MOHANOM PM CUL XHGY UL U KYLASM HZ MOUM HKXYK; UGXLMKUGNY UL PM TUE LYYT MH LAIIHLY MOUM MOY LSUANOMYK HZ YPNOME MOHALUGXTYG UM VHKHXPGH CUL GHM XAY MH GUIHSYHG'L CPSS, MOHANO OY HKXYKYX MOYWHTTYGWYTYGM UGX WHGXAWM HZ MOY VUMMSY UGX MOHANOM PM CUL XHGYVYWUALY OY HKXYKYX PM; LMKUGNY UL MOYLY LAIIHLPMPHGL UIIYUK, EYM OATUGXPNGPME--COPWO MYSSL TY MOUM YUWO HZ AL PL, PZ GHM THKY UM SYULM GHMSYLL U TUG MOUG MOY NKYUM GUIHSYHG--XYTUGXL MOY UWWYIMUGWY HZ MOUMLHSAMPHG HZ MOY JAYLMPHG, UGX OPLMHKPW PGBYLMPNUMPHG UVAGXUGMSE WHGZPKTLPM.UM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH GUIHSYHG LOHM UM GH HGY UGX RPSSYX GH HGY.MOUM CUL USS XHGY VE MOY LHSXPYKL. MOYKYZHKY PM CUL GHM OY COH RPSSYXIYHISY.MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL CYGM MH RPSS UGX VY RPSSYX UM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGHGHM VYWUALY HZ GUIHSYHG'L HKXYKL VAM VE MOYPK HCG BHSPMPHG. MOY COHSYUKTE--ZKYGWO, PMUSPUG, NYKTUG, IHSPLO, UGX XAMWO--OAGNKE, KUNNYX, UGXCYUKE HZ MOY WUTIUPNG, ZYSM UM MOY LPNOM HZ UG UKTE VSHWRPGN MOYPK KHUXMH THLWHC MOUM MOY CPGY CUL XKUCG UGX TALM VY XKAGR. OUX GUIHSYHG MOYGZHKVPXXYG MOYT MH ZPNOM MOY KALLPUGL, MOYE CHASX OUBY RPSSYX OPT UGXOUBY IKHWYYXYX MH ZPNOM MOY KALLPUGL VYWUALY PM CUL PGYBPMUVSY.COYG MOYE OYUKX GUIHSYHG'L IKHWSUTUMPHG HZZYKPGN MOYT, UL WHTIYGLUMPHGZHK TAMPSUMPHG UGX XYUMO, MOY CHKXL HZ IHLMYKPME UVHAM MOYPK OUBPGN VYYGPG MOY VUMMSY VYZHKY THLWHC, MOYE WKPYX "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" QALM UL MOYEOUX WKPYX "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY IHKMKUPM HZ MOY VHEIPYKWPGN MOY MYKKYLMKPUS NSHVY CPMO U MHE LMPWR, UGX QALM UL MOYE CHASXOUBY WKPYX "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" UM UGE GHGLYGLY MOUM TPNOM VY MHSX MOYT.MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN SYZM ZHK MOYT MH XH VAM WKE "BPBY S'YTIYKYAK!" UGX NHMH ZPNOM, PG HKXYK MH NYM ZHHX UGX KYLM UL WHGJAYKHKL PG THLWHC. LH PMCUL GHM VYWUALY HZ GUIHSYHG'L WHTTUGXL MOUM MOYE RPSSYX MOYPK ZYSSHCTYG.UGX PM CUL GHM GUIHSYHG COH XPKYWMYX MOY WHAKLY HZ MOY VUMMSY, ZHK GHGYHZ OPL HKXYKL CYKY YDYWAMYX UGX XAKPGN MOY VUMMSY OY XPX GHM RGHC COUMCUL NHPGN HG VYZHKY OPT. LH MOY CUE PG COPWO MOYLY IYHISY RPSSYX HGYUGHMOYK CUL GHM XYWPXYX VE GUIHSYHG'L CPSS VAM HWWAKKYX PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZOPT, PG UWWHKX CPMO MOY CPSS HZ OAGXKYXL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ IYHISY COH MHHRIUKM PG MOY WHTTHG UWMPHG. PM HGSE LYYTYX MH GUIHSYHG MOUM PM USS MHHRISUWY VE OPL CPSS. UGX LH MOY JAYLMPHG COYMOYK OY OUX HK OUX GHM UWHSX OUL GH THKY OPLMHKPW PGMYKYLM MOUG MOY WHSX HZ MOY SYULM HZ MOYMKUGLIHKM LHSXPYKL.THKYHBYK, MOY ULLYKMPHG TUXY VE BUKPHAL CKPMYKL MOUM OPL WHSX CULMOY WUALY HZ OPL XPLIHLPMPHGL GHM VYPGN UL CYSS ISUGGYX UL HG ZHKTYKHWWULPHGL, UGX HZ OPL HKXYKL XAKPGN MOY VUMMSY GHM VYPGN UL NHHX ULIKYBPHALSE, PL JAPMY VULYSYLL, COPWO UNUPG LOHCL MOUM GUIHSYHG'L WHSX HGMOY MCYGME-LPDMO HZ UANALM CUL AGPTIHKMUGM.MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL WPMYX UVHBY UKY GHM UM USS CHKLY, VAM UKY YBYGVYMMYK, MOUG IKYBPHAL XPLIHLPMPHGL VE COPWO OY OUX CHG BPWMHKPYL. OPLILYAXH-HKXYKL XAKPGN MOY VUMMSY CYKY USLH GH CHKLY MOUG ZHKTYKSE, VAMTAWO MOY LUTY UL ALAUS. MOYLY XPLIHLPMPHGL UGX HKXYKL HGSE LYYT CHKLYMOUG IKYBPHAL HGYL VYWUALY MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CUL MOY ZPKLM GUIHSYHGXPX GHM CPG. MOY IKHZHAGXYLM UGX THLM YDWYSSYGM XPLIHLPMPHGL UGX HKXYKLLYYT BYKE VUX, UGX YBYKE SYUKGYX TPSPMUKPLM WKPMPWPFYL MOYT CPMO SHHRLHZ PTIHKMUGWY, COYG MOYE KYSUMY MH U VUMMSY MOUM OUL VYYG SHLM, UGX MOYBYKE CHKLM XPLIHLPMPHGL UGX HKXYKL LYYT BYKE NHHX, UGX LYKPHAL IYHISYZPSS COHSY BHSATYL MH XYTHGLMKUMY MOYPK TYKPML, COYG MOYE KYSUMY MH UVUMMSY MOUM OUL VYYG CHG.MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL XKUCG AI VE CYEKHMOYK ZHK MOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF CYKYU THXYS HZ IYKZYWMPHG ZHK MOUM RPGX HZ WHTIHLPMPHG, VAM LMPSS MOYE CYKYWKPMPWPFYX--WKPMPWPFYX ZHK MOYPK BYKE IYKZYWMPHG, ZHK MOYPK YDWYLLPBYTPGAMYGYLL.GUIHSYHG UM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH ZASZPSSYX OPL HZZPWY ULKYIKYLYGMUMPBY HZ UAMOHKPME UL CYSS UL, UGX YBYG VYMMYK MOUG, UM HMOYKVUMMSYL. OY XPX GHMOPGN OUKTZAS MH MOY IKHNKYLL HZ MOY VUMMSY; OYPGWSPGYX MH MOY THLM KYULHGUVSY HIPGPHGL, OY TUXY GH WHGZALPHG, XPX GHMWHGMKUXPWM OPTLYSZ, XPX GHM NYM ZKPNOMYGYX HK KAG UCUE ZKHT MOY ZPYSX HZVUMMSY, VAM CPMO OPL NKYUM MUWM UGX TPSPMUKE YDIYKPYGWY WUKKPYX HAM OPLKHSY HZ UIIYUKPGN MH WHTTUGX, WUSTSE UGX CPMO XPNGPME.WOUIMYK DDPDHG KYMAKGPGN ZKHT U LYWHGX PGLIYWMPHG HZ MOY SPGYL, GUIHSYHG KYTUKRYX:"MOY WOYLLTYG UKY LYM AI, MOY NUTY CPSS VYNPG MHTHKKHC!"OUBPGN HKXYKYX IAGWO UGX LATTHGYX XY VYUALLYM, OY VYNUG MH MUSR MH OPTUVHAM IUKPL UGX UVHAM LHTY WOUGNYL OY TYUGM MH TURY PG MOY YTIKYLL'OHALYOHSX, LAKIKPLPGN MOY IKYZYWM VE OPL TYTHKE HZ TPGAMY XYMUPSLKYSUMPGN MH MOY WHAKM.OY LOHCYX UG PGMYKYLM PG MKPZSYL, QHRYX UVHAM XY VYUALLYM'L SHBY HZMKUBYS, UGX WOUMMYX WUKYSYLLSE, UL U ZUTHAL, LYSZ-WHGZPXYGM LAKNYHG COHRGHCL OPL QHV XHYL COYG MAKGPGN AI OPL LSYYBYL UGX IAMMPGN HG OPL UIKHGCOPSY U IUMPYGM PL VYPGN LMKUIIYX MH MOY HIYKUMPGN MUVSY. WKPYX MOY UXQAMUGM.MYSSPGN MOY NKHHT MH ZHSSHC OPT CPMO MOY OHKLYL, IPYKKY CYGM XHCG MOYLMKYYM MH MOY RGHSS ZKHT COPWO OY OUX SHHRYX UM MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY MOYXUE VYZHKY. U WKHCX HZ TPSPMUKE TYG CUL ULLYTVSYX MOYKY, TYTVYKL HZ MOYLMUZZ WHASX VY OYUKX WHGBYKLPGN PG ZKYGWO, UGX RAMAFHB'L NKUE OYUX PGU COPMY WUI CPMO U KYX VUGX CUL BPLPVSY, OPL NKUE GUIY LAGR VYMCYYG OPLLOHASXYKL. PM CUL MOY LUTY IUGHKUTU OY OUX UXTPKYX ZKHT MOUMLIHM MOY XUE VYZHKY, VAM GHC MOY COHSY ISUWY CUL ZASS HZ MKHHIL UGXWHBYKYX VE LTHRY WSHAXL ZKHT MOY NAGL, UGX MOY LSUGMPGN KUEL HZ MOYVKPNOM LAG, KPLPGN LSPNOMSE MH MOY SYZM VYOPGX IPYKKY, WULM AIHG PMMOKHANO MOY WSYUK THKGPGN UPK IYGYMKUMPGN LMKYURL HZ KHLE, NHSXYG MPGMYXSPNOM UGX SHGN XUKR LOUXHCL. MOY ZHKYLM UM MOY ZUKMOYLM YDMKYTPME HZMOY IUGHKUTU LYYTYX WUKBYX PG LHTY IKYWPHAL LMHGY HZ U EYSSHCPLO-NKYYGWHSHK; PML AGXASUMPGN HAMSPGY CUL LPSOHAYMMYX UNUPGLM MOY OHKPFHG UGXCUL IPYKWYX VYEHGX BUSAYBH VE MOY LTHSYGLR OPNOKHUX WKHCXYX CPMO MKHHIL.GYUKYK UM OUGX NSPMMYKYX NHSXYG WHKGZPYSXL PGMYKLIYKLYX CPMO WHILYL.MOYKY CYKY MKHHIL MH VY LYYG YBYKECOYKY, PG ZKHGM UGX MH MOY KPNOM UGXSYZM. USS MOPL CUL BPBPX, TUQYLMPW, UGX AGYDIYWMYX; VAM COUM PTIKYLLYXIPYKKY THLM HZ USS CUL MOY BPYC HZ MOY VUMMSYZPYSX PMLYSZ, HZ VHKHXPGHUGX MOY OHSSHCL HG VHMO LPXYL HZ MOY RHSHWOU.UVHBY MOY RHSHWOU, PG VHKHXPGH UGX HG VHMO LPXYL HZ PM, YLIYWPUSSE MHMOY SYZM COYKY MOY BHEGU ZSHCPGN VYMCYYG PML TUKLOE VUGRL ZUSSL PGMHMOY RHSHWOU, U TPLM OUX LIKYUX COPWO LYYTYX MH TYSM, MH XPLLHSBY, UGX MHVYWHTY MKUGLSAWYGM COYG MOY VKPSSPUGM LAG UIIYUKYX UGX TUNPWUSSE WHSHKYXUGX HAMSPGYX YBYKEMOPGN. MOY LTHRY HZ MOY NAGL TPGNSYX CPMO MOPL TPLM,UGX HBYK MOY COHSY YDIUGLY UGX MOKHANO MOUM TPLM MOY KUEL HZ MOY THKGPGNLAG CYKY KYZSYWMYX, ZSULOPGN VUWR SPRY SPNOMGPGN ZKHT MOY CUMYK, ZKHTMOY XYC, UGX ZKHT MOY VUEHGYML HZ MOY MKHHIL WKHCXYX MHNYMOYK VE MOYKPBYKVUGRL UGX PG VHKHXPGH. U COPMY WOAKWO WHASX VY LYYG MOKHANO MOYTPLM, UGX OYKY UGX MOYKY MOY KHHZL HZ OAML PG VHKHXPGH UL CYSS UL XYGLYTULLYL HZ LHSXPYKL, HK NKYYG UTTAGPMPHG WOYLML UGX HKXGUGWY. UGX USSMOPL THBYX, HK LYYTYX MH THBY, UL MOY LTHRY UGX TPLM LIKYUX HAM HBYKMOY COHSY LIUWY. QALM UL PG MOY TPLM-YGBYSHIYX OHSSHC GYUK VHKHXPGH, LHUSHGN MOY YGMPKY SPGY HAMLPXY UGX UVHBY PM UGX YLIYWPUSSE PG MOY CHHXLUGX ZPYSXL MH MOY SYZM, PG MOY BUSSYEL UGX HG MOY LATTPML HZ MOY OPNONKHAGX, WSHAXL HZ IHCXYK LTHRY LYYTYX WHGMPGAUSSE MH LIKPGN AI HAM HZGHMOPGN, GHC LPGNSE, GHC LYBYKUS UM U MPTY, LHTY MKUGLSAWYGM, HMOYKLXYGLY, COPWO, LCYSSPGN, NKHCPGN, KHSSPGN, UGX VSYGXPGN, YDMYGXYX HBYKMOY COHSY YDIUGLY.MOYLY IAZZL HZ LTHRY UGX (LMKUGNY MH LUE) MOY LHAGX HZ MOY ZPKPGNIKHXAWYX MOY WOPYZ VYUAME HZ MOY LIYWMUWSY."IAZZ!"--LAXXYGSE U KHAGX WHTIUWM WSHAX HZ LTHRY CUL LYYG TYKNPGN ZKHTBPHSYM PGMH NKUE UGX TPSRE COPMY, UGX "VHHT!" WUTY MOY KYIHKM U LYWHGXSUMYK."IAZZ! IAZZ!"--UGX MCH WSHAXL UKHLY IALOPGN HGY UGHMOYK UGX VSYGXPGNMHNYMOYK; UGX "VHHT, VHHT!" WUTY MOY LHAGXL WHGZPKTPGN COUM MOY YEY OUXLYYG.IPYKKY NSUGWYX KHAGX UM MOY ZPKLM WSHAX, COPWO OY OUX LYYG UL U KHAGXWHTIUWM VUSS, UGX PG PML ISUWY USKYUXE CYKY VUSSHHGL HZ LTHRY ZSHUMPGNMH HGY LPXY, UGX--"IAZZ" (CPMO U IUALY)--"IAZZ, IAZZ!" MOKYY UGXMOYG ZHAK THKY UIIYUKYX UGX MOYG ZKHT YUWO, CPMO MOY LUTYPGMYKBUS--"VHHT--VHHT, VHHT!" WUTY MOY ZPGY, ZPKT, IKYWPLY LHAGXL PGKYISE. PM LYYTYX UL PZ MOHLY LTHRY WSHAXL LHTYMPTYL KUG UGX LHTYMPTYLLMHHX LMPSS COPSY CHHXL, ZPYSXL, UGX NSPMMYKPGN VUEHGYML KUG IULM MOYT.ZKHT MOY SYZM, HBYK ZPYSXL UGX VALOYL, MOHLY SUKNY VUSSL HZ LTHRY CYKYWHGMPGAUSSE UIIYUKPGN ZHSSHCYX VE MOYPK LHSYTG KYIHKML, COPSY GYUKYKLMPSS, PG MOY OHSSHCL UGX CHHXL, MOYKY VAKLM ZKHT MOY TALRYML LTUSSWSHAXSYML MOUM OUX GH MPTY MH VYWHTY VUSSL, VAM OUX MOYPK SPMMSY YWOHYLPG QALM MOY LUTY CUE. "MKURO-MU-MU-MURO!" WUTY MOY ZKYJAYGM WKUWRSY HZTALRYMKE, VAM PM CUL PKKYNASUK UGX ZYYVSY PG WHTIUKPLHG CPMO MOY KYIHKMLHZ MOY WUGGHG.IPYKKY CPLOYX MH VY MOYKY CPMO MOUM LTHRY, MOHLY LOPGPGN VUEHGYML, MOUMTHBYTYGM, UGX MOHLY LHAGXL. OY MAKGYX MH SHHR UM RAMAFHB UGX OPL LAPMY,MH WHTIUKY OPL PTIKYLLPHGL CPMO MOHLY HZ HMOYKL. MOYE CYKY USS SHHRPGNUM MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY UL OY CUL, UGX, UL PM LYYTYX MH OPT, CPMO MOYLUTY ZYYSPGNL. USS MOYPK ZUWYL CYKY GHC LOPGPGN CPMO MOUM SUMYGM CUKTMOHZ ZYYSPGN IPYKKY OUX GHMPWYX MOY XUE VYZHKY UGX OUX ZASSE AGXYKLMHHXUZMYK OPL MUSR CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC."NH, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, NH... UGX WOKPLM VY CPMO EHA!" RAMAFHB CULLUEPGN MH U NYGYKUS COH LMHHX VYLPXY OPT, GHM MURPGN OPL YEY ZKHT MOYVUMMSYZPYSX.OUBPGN KYWYPBYX MOPL HKXYK MOY NYGYKUS IULLYX VE IPYKKY HG OPL CUE XHCGMOY RGHSS."MH MOY WKHLLPGN!" LUPX MOY NYGYKUS WHSXSE UGX LMYKGSE PG KYISE MH HGYHZ MOY LMUZZ COH ULRYX COYKY OY CUL NHPGN."P'SS NH MOYKY MHH, P MHH!" MOHANOM IPYKKY, UGX ZHSSHCYX MOY NYGYKUS.MOY NYGYKUS THAGMYX U OHKLY U WHLLUWR OUX VKHANOM OPT. IPYKKY CYGM MHOPL NKHHT COH CUL OHSXPGN OPL OHKLYL UGX, ULRPGN COPWO CUL MOY JAPYMYLM,WSUTVYKYX HGMH PM, LYPFYX PM VE MOY TUGY, UGX MAKGPGN HAM OPL MHYLIKYLLYX OPL OYYSL UNUPGLM PML LPXYL UGX, ZYYSPGN MOUM OPL LIYWMUWSYLCYKY LSPIIPGN HZZ VAM AGUVSY MH SYM NH HZ MOY TUGY UGX KYPGL, OYNUSSHIYX UZMYK MOY NYGYKUS, WUALPGN MOY LMUZZ HZZPWYKL MH LTPSY UL MOYECUMWOYX OPT ZKHT MOY RGHSS.WOUIMYK DDDPOUBPGN XYLWYGXYX MOY OPSS MOY NYGYKUS UZMYK COHT IPYKKY CUL NUSSHIPGNMAKGYX LOUKISE MH MOY SYZM, UGX IPYKKY, SHLPGN LPNOM HZ OPT, NUSSHIYXPG UTHGN LHTY KUGRL HZ PGZUGMKE TUKWOPGN UOYUX HZ OPT. OY MKPYX MH IULLYPMOYK PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT HK MH MOY KPNOM HK SYZM, VAM MOYKY CYKY LHSXPYKLYBYKECOYKY, USS CPMO MOY LUTY IKYHWWAIPYX YDIKYLLPHG UGX VALE CPMOLHTY AGLYYG VAM YBPXYGMSE PTIHKMUGM MULR. MOYE USS NUFYX CPMO MOY LUTYXPLLUMPLZPYX UGX PGJAPKPGN YDIKYLLPHG UM MOPL LMHAM TUG PG U COPMY OUM,COH ZHK LHTY AGRGHCG KYULHG MOKYUMYGYX MH MKUTISY MOYT AGXYK OPL OHKLY'LOHHZL."COE KPXY PGMH MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY VUMMUSPHG?" HGY HZ MOYT LOHAMYX UM OPT.UGHMOYK IKHXXYX OPL OHKLY CPMO MOY VAMM YGX HZ U TALRYM, UGX IPYKKY,VYGXPGN HBYK OPL LUXXSYVHC UGX OUKXSE UVSY MH WHGMKHS OPL LOEPGN OHKLY,NUSSHIYX UOYUX HZ MOY LHSXPYKL COYKY MOYKY CUL U ZKYY LIUWY.MOYKY CUL U VKPXNY UOYUX HZ OPT, COYKY HMOYK LHSXPYKL LMHHX ZPKPGN.IPYKKY KHXY AI MH MOYT. CPMOHAM VYPGN UCUKY HZ PM OY OUX WHTY MH MOYVKPXNY UWKHLL MOY RHSHWOU VYMCYYG NHKRP UGX VHKHXPGH, COPWO MOY ZKYGWO(OUBPGN HWWAIPYX VHKHXPGH) CYKY UMMUWRPGN PG MOY ZPKLM IOULY HZ MOYVUMMSY. IPYKKY LUC MOUM MOYKY CUL U VKPXNY PG ZKHGM HZ OPT UGX MOUMLHSXPYKL CYKY XHPGN LHTYMOPGN HG VHMO LPXYL HZ PM UGX PG MOY TYUXHC,UTHGN MOY KHCL HZ GYC-THCG OUE COPWO OY OUX MURYG GH GHMPWY HZ UTPX MOYLTHRY HZ MOY WUTIZPKYL MOY XUE VYZHKY; VAM XYLIPMY MOY PGWYLLUGM ZPKPGNNHPGN HG MOYKY OY OUX GH PXYU MOUM MOPL CUL MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY. OY XPXGHM GHMPWY MOY LHAGX HZ MOY VASSYML COPLMSPGN ZKHT YBYKE LPXY, HK MOYIKHQYWMPSYL MOUM ZSYC HBYK OPT, XPX GHM LYY MOY YGYTE HG MOY HMOYK LPXYHZ MOY KPBYK, UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY XPX GHM GHMPWY MOY RPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX,MOHANO TUGE ZYSS GYUK OPT. OY SHHRYX UVHAM OPT CPMO U LTPSY COPWO XPXGHM SYUBY OPL ZUWY."COE'L MOUM ZYSSHC PG ZKHGM HZ MOY SPGY?" LOHAMYX LHTYVHXE UM OPT UNUPG."MH MOY SYZM!... RYYI MH MOY KPNOM!" MOY TYG LOHAMYX MH OPT.IPYKKY CYGM MH MOY KPNOM, UGX AGYDIYWMYXSE YGWHAGMYKYX HGY HZ KUYBLRP'LUXQAMUGML COHT OY RGYC. MOY UXQAMUGM SHHRYX UGNKPSE UM OPT, YBPXYGMSEUSLH PGMYGXPGN MH LOHAM UM OPT, VAM HG KYWHNGPFPGN OPT OY GHXXYX."OHC OUBY EHA NHM OYKY?" "LMPSSPGJAPLPMPBY?""EYL, EYL," ULLYGMYX IPYKKY.VAM MOY UXQAMUGM MAKGYX OPL OHKLY UVHAM UGX KHXY HG."OYKY PM'L MHSYKUVSY," LUPX OY, "VAM CPMO VUNKUMPHG HG MOY SYZM ZSUGRMOYE'KY NYMMPGN PM ZKPNOMZASSE OHM.""KYUSSE?" LUPX IPYKKY. "COYKY PL MOUM?""WHTY USHGN CPMO TY MH HAK RGHSS. CY WUG NYM U BPYC ZKHT MOYKY UGX PGHAK VUMMYKE PM PL LMPSS VYUKUVSY," LUPX MOY UXQAMUGM. "CPSS EHA WHTY?""EYL, P'SS WHTY CPMO EHA," KYISPYX IPYKKY, SHHRPGN KHAGX ZHK OPL NKHHT.PM CUL HGSE GHC MOUM OY GHMPWYX CHAGXYX TYG LMUNNYKPGN USHGN HK VYPGNWUKKPYX HG LMKYMWOYKL. HG MOUM BYKE TYUXHC OY OUX KPXXYG HBYK MOY XUEVYZHKY, U LHSXPYK CUL SEPGN UMOCUKM MOY KHCL HZ LWYGMYX OUE, CPMO OPLOYUX MOKHCG UCRCUKXSE VUWR UGX OPL LOURH HZZ."COE OUBYG'M MOYE WUKKPYX OPT UCUE?" P WHGNKUMASUMY EHA, WHAGM, HG EHAK VUIMPLT HZZPKY!"OUBPGN KPXXYG PG MOY LTHRY IULM MOY LPDMO WHKIL, VYOPGX MOY UKMPSSYKECOPWO OUX VYYG THBYX ZHKCUKX UGX CUL PG UWMPHG, XYUZYGPGN MOYT CPMO MOYGHPLY HZ ZPKPGN, MOYE WUTY MH U LTUSS CHHX. MOYKY PM CUL WHHS UGX JAPYM,CPMO U LWYGM HZ UAMATG. IPYKKY UGX MOY UXQAMUGM XPLTHAGMYX UGX CUSRYX AIMOY OPSS HG ZHHM."PL MOY NYGYKUS OYKY?" ULRYX MOY UXQAMUGM HG KYUWOPGN MOY RGHSS."OY CUL OYKY U TPGAMY UNH VAM OUL QALM NHGY MOUM CUE," LHTYHGY MHSX OPT,IHPGMPGN MH MOY KPNOM.MOY UXQAMUGM SHHRYX UM IPYKKY UL PZ IAFFSYX COUM MH XH CPMO OPT GHC."XHG'M MKHAVSY UVHAM TY," LUPX IPYKKY. MOYE XPX GHM TYYMUNUPG, UGX HGSE TAWO SUMYK XPX IPYKKY SYUKG MOUM OY SHLM UG UKT MOUMXUE.MOY RGHSS MH COPWO IPYKKY ULWYGXYX CUL MOUM ZUTHAL HGY UZMYKCUKXL RGHCGMH MOY KALLPUGL UL MOY RGHSS VUMMYKE HK KUYBLRP'L KYXHAVM, UGX MH MOYZKYGWO UL SU NKUGXY KYXHAMY, SU ZUMUSY KYXHAMY, SU KYXHAMY XA WYGMKY,UKHAGX COPWO MYGL HZ MOHALUGXL ZYSS, UGX COPWO MOY ZKYGWO KYNUKXYX ULMOY RYE MH MOY COHSY IHLPMPHG.MOPL KYXHAVM WHGLPLMYX HZ U RGHSS, HG MOKYY LPXYL HZ COPWO MKYGWOYL OUXVYYG XAN. CPMOPG MOY YGMKYGWOTYGM LMHHX MYG NAGL MOUM CYKY VYPGN ZPKYXMOKHANO HIYGPGNL PG MOY YUKMOCHKR.PG SPGY CPMO MOY RGHSS HG VHMO LPXYL LMHHX HMOYK NAGL COPWO USLH ZPKYXPGWYLLUGMSE. U SPMMSY VYOPGX MOY NAGL LMHHX PGZUGMKE. COYG ULWYGXPGNMOUM RGHSS IPYKKY OUX GH GHMPHG MOUM MOPL LIHM, HG COPWO LTUSS MKYGWOYLOUX VYYG XAN UGX ZKHT COPWO U ZYC NAGL CYKY ZPKPGN, CUL MOY THLMPTIHKMUGM IHPGM HZ MOY VUMMSY.HG MOY WHGMKUKE, QALM VYWUALY OY OUIIYGYX MH VY MOYKY OY MOHANOM PM HGYHZ MOY SYULM LPNGPZPWUGM IUKML HZ MOY ZPYSX.OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOY RGHSS, IPYKKY LUM XHCG UM HGY YGX HZ U MKYGWOLAKKHAGXPGN MOY VUMMYKE UGX NUFYX UM COUM CUL NHPGN HG UKHAGX OPT CPMOUG AGWHGLWPHALSE OUIIE LTPSY. HWWULPHGUSSE OY KHLY UGX CUSRYX UVHAM MOYVUMMYKE LMPSS CPMO MOUM LUTY LTPSY, MKEPGN GHM MH HVLMKAWM MOY LHSXPYKLCOH CYKY SHUXPGN, OUASPGN MOY NAGL, UGX WHGMPGAUSSE KAGGPGN IULMOPT CPMO VUNL UGX WOUKNYL. MOY NAGL HZ MOUM VUMMYKE CYKY VYPGN ZPKYXWHGMPGAUSSE HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK CPMO U XYUZYGPGN KHUK, YGBYSHIPGN MOYCOHSY GYPNOVHKOHHX PG IHCXYK LTHRY.PG WHGMKULM CPMO MOY XKYUX ZYSM VE MOY PGZUGMKETYG ISUWYX PG LAIIHKM,OYKY PG MOY VUMMYKE COYKY U LTUSS GATVYK HZ TYG VALE UM MOYPK CHKR CYKYLYIUKUMYX ZKHT MOY KYLM VE U MKYGWO, YBYKEHGY YDIYKPYGWYX U WHTTHG UGXUL PM CYKY ZUTPSE ZYYSPGN HZ UGPTUMPHG.MOY PGMKALPHG HZ IPYKKY'L GHGTPSPMUKE ZPNAKY PG U COPMY OUM TUXY UGAGISYULUGM PTIKYLLPHG UM ZPKLM. MOY LHSXPYKL SHHRYX ULRUGWY UM OPT CPMOLAKIKPLY UGX YBYG USUKT UL MOYE CYGM IULM OPT. MOY LYGPHK UKMPSSYKEHZZPWYK, U MUSS, SHGN-SYNNYX, IHWRTUKRYX TUG, THBYX HBYK MH IPYKKY UL PZMH LYY MOY UWMPHG HZ MOY ZUKMOYLM NAG UGX SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO WAKPHLPME.U EHAGN KHAGX-ZUWYX HZZPWYK, JAPMY U VHE LMPSS UGX YBPXYGMSE HGSE QALMHAM HZ MOY WUXYM WHSSYNY, COH CUL FYUSHALSE WHTTUGXPGN MOY MCH NAGLYGMKALMYX MH OPT, UXXKYLLYX IPYKKY LMYKGSE."LPK," OY LUPX, "IYKTPM TY MH ULR EHA MH LMUGX ULPXY. EHA TALM GHM VYOYKY."MOY LHSXPYKL LOHHR MOYPK OYUXL XPLUIIKHBPGNSE UL MOYE SHHRYX UM IPYKKY.VAM COYG MOYE OUX WHGBPGWYX MOYTLYSBYL MOUM MOPL TUG PG MOY COPMY OUMCUL XHPGN GH OUKT, VAM YPMOYK LUM JAPYMSE HG MOY LSHIY HZ MOY MKYGWOCPMO U LOE LTPSY HK, IHSPMYSE TURPGN CUE ZHK MOY LHSXPYKL, IUWYX AIUGX XHCG MOY VUMMYKE AGXYK ZPKY UL WUSTSE UL PZ OY CYKY HG U VHASYBUKX,MOYPK ZYYSPGN HZ OHLMPSY XPLMKALM NKUXAUSSE VYNUG MH WOUGNY PGMH URPGXSE UGX VUGMYKPGN LETIUMOE, LAWO UL LHSXPYKL ZYYS ZHK MOYPK XHNL,WHWRL, NHUML, UGX PG NYGYKUS ZHK MOY UGPTUSL MOUM SPBY CPMO MOYKYNPTYGM. MOY TYG LHHG UWWYIMYX IPYKKY PGMH MOYPK ZUTPSE, UXHIMYX OPT,NUBY OPT U GPWRGUTY ("HAK NYGMSYTUG"), UGX TUXY RPGXSE ZAG HZ OPT UTHGNMOYTLYSBYL.U LOYSS MHKY AI MOY YUKMO MCH IUWYL ZKHT IPYKKY UGX OY SHHRYX UKHAGXCPMO U LTPSY UL OY VKALOYX ZKHT OPL WSHMOYL LHTY YUKMO PM OUX MOKHCG AI."UGX OHC'L PM EHA'KY GHM UZKUPX, LPK, KYUSSE GHC?" U KYX-ZUWYX,VKHUX-LOHASXYKYX LHSXPYK ULRYX IPYKKY, CPMO U NKPG MOUM XPLWSHLYX U LYMHZ LHAGX, COPMY MYYMO."UKY EHA UZKUPX, MOYG?" LUPX IPYKKY."COUM YSLY XH EHA YDIYWM?" UGLCYKYX MOY LHSXPYK. WKPYX MOY EHAGN HZZPWYK MH MOY TYG NUMOYKYX KHAGXIPYKKY.MOY EHAGN HZZPWYK CUL YBPXYGMSE YDYKWPLPGN OPL XAMPYL ZHK MOY ZPKLM HKLYWHGX MPTY UGX MOYKYZHKY MKYUMYX VHMO OPL LAIYKPHKL UGX MOY TYG CPMONKYUM IKYWPLPHG UGX ZHKTUSPME.MOY VHHTPGN WUGGHGUXY UGX MOY ZALPSSUXY HZ TALRYMKE CYKY NKHCPGN THKYPGMYGLY HBYK MOY COHSY ZPYSX, YLIYWPUSSE MH MOY SYZM COYKY VUNKUMPHG'LZSYWOYL CYKY, VAM COYKY IPYKKY CUL MOY LTHRY HZ MOY ZPKPGN TUXY PMUSTHLM PTIHLLPVSY MH XPLMPGNAPLO UGEMOPGN. THKYHBYK, OPL COHSY UMMYGMPHGCUL YGNKHLLYX VE CUMWOPGN MOY ZUTPSE WPKWSY--LYIUKUMYX ZKHT USSYSLY--ZHKTYX VE MOY TYG PG MOY VUMMYKE.
