GHC, LYUMYX HG MOY LSHIY HZ MOY MKYGWO, OYHVLYKBYX MOY ZUWYL HZ MOHLY UKHAGX OPT.VE MYG H'WSHWR LHTY MCYGME TYG OUX USKYUXE VYYG WUKKPYX UCUE ZKHT MOYVUMMYKE; MCH NAGL CYKY LTULOYX UGX WUGGHG VUSSL ZYSS THKY UGX THKYZKYJAYGMSE HG MOY VUMMYKE UGX LIYGM VASSYML VAFFYX UGX COPLMSYX UKHAGX.VAM MOY TYG PG MOY VUMMYKE LYYTYX GHM MH GHMPWY MOPL, UGX TYKKE BHPWYLUGX QHRYL CYKY OYUKX HG USS LPXYL."U SPBY HGY!" LOHAMYX U TUG UL U COPLMSPGN LOYSS UIIKHUWOYX."GHM MOPL CUE! MH MOY PGZUGMKE!" UXXYX UGHMOYK CPMO SHAX SUANOMYK,LYYPGN MOY LOYSS ZSE IULM UGX ZUSS PGMH MOY KUGRL HZ MOY LAIIHKML."UKY EHA VHCPGN MH U ZKPYGX, YO?" KYTUKRYX UGHMOYK, WOUZZPGN U IYULUGMCOH XAWRYX SHC UL U WUGGHG VUSS ZSYC HBYK.LYBYKUS LHSXPYKL NUMOYKYX VE MOY CUSS HZ MOY MKYGWO, SHHRPGN HAM MH LYYCOUM CUL OUIIYGPGN PG ZKHGM."MOYE'BY CPMOXKUCG MOY ZKHGM SPGY, PM OUL KYMPKYX," LUPX MOYE, IHPGMPGNHBYK MOY YUKMOCHKR."TPGX EHAK HCG VALPGYLL," UG HSX LYKNYUGM LOHAMYX UM MOYT. "PZ MOYE'BYKYMPKYX PM'L VYWUALY MOYKY'L CHKR ZHK MOYT MH XH ZUKMOYK VUWR."UGX MOY LYKNYUGM, MURPGN HGY HZ MOY TYG VE MOY LOHASXYKL, NUBY OPT ULOHBY CPMO OPL RGYY. KHLY MOY TYKKE BHPWYL HZ MOHLYCOH CYKY THBPGN MOY NAG."HO, LOY GYUKSE RGHWRYX HAK NYGMSYTUG'L OUM HZZ!" WKPYX MOY KYX-ZUWYXOATHKPLM, LOHCPGN OPL MYYMO WOUZZPGN IPYKKY. "UCRCUKX VUNNUNY!" LUPX UGHMOYK, SUANOPGN UM LHTY TPSPMPUTYG COH,LMHHIPGN SHC, YGMYKYX MOY VUMMYKE MH WUKKE UCUE MOY CHAGXYX TUG."LH MOPL NKAYS PLG'M MH EHAK MULMY? HO, EHA WKHCL! EHA'KY LWUKYX!" MOYELOHAMYX UM MOY TPSPMPUTYG COH LMHHX OYLPMUMPGN VYZHKY MOY TUG COHLY SYNOUX VYYG MHKG HZZ."MOYKY, SUXL... HO, HO!" MOYE TPTPWRYX MOY IYULUGML, "MOYE XHG'M SPRY PMUM USS!"IPYKKY GHMPWYX MOUM UZMYK YBYKE VUSS MOUM OPM MOY KYXHAVM, UGX UZMYKYBYKE SHLL, MOY SPBYSPGYLL PGWKYULYX THKY UGX THKY.UL MOY ZSUTYL HZ MOY ZPKY OPXXYG CPMOPG WHTY THKY UGX THKY BPBPXSE UGXKUIPXSE ZKHT UG UIIKHUWOPGN MOAGXYKWSHAX, LH, UL PZ PG HIIHLPMPHG MHCOUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY, MOY SPNOMGPGN HZ OPXXYG ZPKY NKHCPGN THKY UGXTHKY PGMYGLY NSHCYX PG MOY ZUWYL HZ MOYLY TYG.IPYKKY XPX GHM SHHR HAM UM MOY VUMMSYZPYSX UGX CUL GHM WHGWYKGYX MH RGHCCOUM CUL OUIIYGPGN MOYKY; OY CUL YGMPKYSE UVLHKVYX PG CUMWOPGN MOPL ZPKYCOPWO VAKGYX YBYK THKY VKPNOMSE UGX COPWO OY ZYSM CUL ZSUTPGN AI PG MOYLUTY CUE PG OPL HCG LHAS.UM MYG H'WSHWR MOY PGZUGMKE MOUM OUX VYYG UTHGN MOY VALOYL PG ZKHGM HZMOY VUMMYKE UGX USHGN MOY RUTYGRU LMKYUTSYM KYMKYUMYX. ZKHT MOY VUMMYKEMOYE WHASX VY LYYG KAGGPGN VUWR IULM PM WUKKEPGN MOYPK CHAGXYX HGMOYPK TALRYML. U NYGYKUS CPMO OPL LAPMY WUTY MH MOY VUMMYKE, UGX UZMYKLIYURPGN MH MOY WHSHGYS NUBY IPYKKY UG UGNKE SHHR UGX CYGM UCUE UNUPGOUBPGN HKXYKYX MOY PGZUGMKE LAIIHKML VYOPGX MOY VUMMYKE MH SPY XHCG,LH UL MH VY SYLL YDIHLYX MH ZPKY. UZMYK MOPL ZKHT UTPX MOY KUGRL HZPGZUGMKE MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY VUMMYKE WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ U XKAT UGX LOHAMLHZ WHTTUGX, UGX ZKHT MOY VUMMYKE HGY LUC OHC MOHLY KUGRL HZ PGZUGMKETHBYX ZHKCUKX.IPYKKY SHHRYX HBYK MOY CUSS HZ MOY MKYGWO UGX CUL IUKMPWASUKSE LMKAWRVE U IUSY EHAGN HZZPWYK COH, SYMMPGN OPL LCHKX OUGN XHCG, CUL CUSRPGNVUWRCUKXL UGX RYIM NSUGWPGN AGYULPSE UKHAGX.MOY KUGRL HZ MOY PGZUGMKE XPLUIIYUKYX UTPX MOY LTHRY VAM MOYPKSHGN-XKUCG LOHAM UGX KUIPX TALRYMKE ZPKPGN WHASX LMPSS VY OYUKX. U ZYCTPGAMYL SUMYK WKHCXL HZ CHAGXYX TYG UGX LMKYMWOYK-VYUKYKL WUTY VUWR ZKHTMOUM XPKYWMPHG. IKHQYWMPSYL VYNUG MH ZUSS LMPSS THKY ZKYJAYGMSE PG MOYVUMMYKE. LYBYKUS TYG CYKY SEPGN UVHAM COH OUX GHM VYYG KYTHBYX. UKHAGXMOY WUGGHG MOY TYG THBYX LMPSS THKY VKPLRSE UGX VALPSE. GH HGY UGESHGNYK MHHR GHMPWY HZ IPYKKY. HGWY HK MCPWY OY CUL LOHAMYX UM ZHK VYPGNPG MOY CUE. MOY LYGPHK HZZPWYK THBYX CPMO VPN, KUIPX LMKPXYL ZKHT HGYNAG MH UGHMOYK CPMO U ZKHCGPGN ZUWY. MOY EHAGN HZZPWYK, CPMO OPL ZUWYLMPSS THKY ZSALOYX, WHTTUGXYX MOY TYG THKY LWKAIASHALSE MOUG YBYK. MOYLHSXPYKL OUGXYX AI MOY WOUKNYL, MAKGYX, SHUXYX, UGX XPX MOYPK VALPGYLLCPMO LMKUPGYX LTUKMGYLL. MOYE NUBY SPMMSY QATIL UL MOYE CUSRYX, ULMOHANO MOYE CYKY HG LIKPGNL.MOY LMHKTWSHAX OUX WHTY AIHG MOYT, UGX PG YBYKE ZUWY MOY ZPKY COPWOIPYKKY OUX CUMWOYX RPGXSY VAKGYX AI VKPNOMSE. YBYKEMOPGNVYWUTY LMKUGNY, WHGZALYX, UGX TPLME PG IPYKKY'L YEYL.HGY WUGGHG VUSS UZMYK UGHMOYK COPLMSYX VE UGX LMKAWR MOY YUKMOCHKR, ULHSXPYK, HK U NAG. CYKY KAGGPGN GHM ZHKCUKXL VAM VUWRCUKXL, PM LYYTYX MH IPYKKY.U WUGGHG VUSS LMKAWR MOY BYKE YGX HZ MOY YUKMO CHKR VE COPWO OY CULLMUGXPGN, WKATVSPGN XHCG MOY YUKMO; U VSUWR VUSS ZSULOYX VYZHKY OPL YEYLUGX UM MOY LUTY PGLMUGM ISATIYX PGMH LHTYMOPGN. LOHAMYX MOY HZZPWYK, MAKGPGN MHIPYKKY.MOY HZZPWYK'L ZUWY CUL KYX UGX IYKLIPKPGN UGX OPL YEYL NSPMMYKYX AGXYKOPL ZKHCGPGN VKHC."KAG MH MOY KYLYKBYL UGX VKPGN AI MOY UTTAGPMPHG VHDYL!" UM MOYLUTY PGLMUGM OY CUL XUFFSYX VE U NKYUM ZSULO HZ ZSUTY, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE UXYUZYGPGN KHUK, WKUWRSPGN, UGX COPLMSPGN TUXY OPL YUKL MPGNSY.COYG OY WUTY MH OPTLYSZ OY CUL LPMMPGN HG MOY NKHAGX SYUGPGN HG OPLOUGXL; MOY UTTAGPMPHG CUNHGL OY OUX VYYG UIIKHUWOPGN GH SHGNYK YDPLMYX,HGSE WOUKKYX NKYYG VHUKXL UGX KUNL SPMMYKYX MOY LWHKWOYX NKULL, UGX UOHKLY, XUGNSPGN ZKUNTYGML HZ PML LOUZM VYOPGX PM, NUSSHIYX IULM, COPSYUGHMOYK OHKLY SUE, SPRY IPYKKY, HG MOY NKHAGX, AMMYKPGN IKHSHGNYX UGXIPYKWPGN WKPYL.WOUIMYK DDDPPVYLPXY OPTLYSZ CPMO MYKKHK IPYKKY QATIYX AI UGX KUG VUWR MH MOY VUMMYKE,UL MH MOY HGSE KYZANY ZKHT MOY OHKKHKL MOUM LAKKHAGXYX OPT.HG YGMYKPGN MOY YUKMOCHKR OY GHMPWYX MOUM MOYKY CYKY TYG XHPGN LHTYMOPGNMOYKY VAM MOUM GH LOHML CYKY VYPGN ZPKYX ZKHT MOY VUMMYKE. CUL U IKPLHGYK, UGX MOUM UGHMOYK TUGOUX VYYG VUEHGYMYX PG MOY VUWR VYZHKY OPL YEYL, ZHK OUKXSE OUX OY KAGPGMH MOY KYXHAVM VYZHKY U MOPG, LUSSHC-ZUWYX, IYKLIPKPGN TUG PG U VSAYAGPZHKT KALOYX HG OPT LCHKX PG OUGX, LOHAMPGN LHTYMOPGN. PGLMPGWMPBYSENAUKXPGN UNUPGLM MOY LOHWR--ZHK MOYE OUX VYYG KAGGPGN MHNYMOYK UM ZASSLIYYX VYZHKY MOYE LUC HGY UGHMOYK--IPYKKY IAM HAM OPL OUGXL UGX LYPFYXMOY TUG (U ZKYGWO HZZPWYK) VE MOY LOHASXYK CPMO HGY OUGX UGX VE MOYMOKHUM CPMO MOY HMOYK. MOY HZZPWYK, XKHIIPGN OPL LCHKX, LYPFYX IPYKKY VEOPL WHSSUK.ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL MOYE NUFYX CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL UM HGY UGHMOYK'LAGZUTPSPUK ZUWYL UGX VHMO CYKY IYKISYDYX UM COUM MOYE OUX XHGY UGXCOUM MOYE CYKY MH XH GYDM. "UT P MURYG IKPLHGYK HK OUBY P MURYG OPTIKPLHGYK?" YUWO CUL MOPGRPGN. VAM MOY ZKYGWO HZZPWYK CUL YBPXYGMSE THKYPGWSPGYX MH MOPGR OY OUX VYYG MURYG IKPLHGYK VYWUALY IPYKKY'L LMKHGNOUGX, PTIYSSYX VE PGLMPGWMPBY ZYUK, LJAYYFYX OPL MOKHUM YBYK MPNOMYK UGXMPNOMYK. MOY ZKYGWOTUG CUL UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, COYG QALM UVHBY MOYPKOYUXL, MYKKPVSY UGX SHC, U WUGGHG VUSS COPLMSYX, UGX PM LYYTYX MH IPYKKYMOUM MOY ZKYGWO HZZPWYK'L OYUX OUX VYYG MHKG HZZ, LH LCPZMSE OUX OYXAWRYX PM.IPYKKY MHH VYGM OPL OYUX UGX SYM OPL OUGXL ZUSS. CPMOHAM ZAKMOYK MOHANOMUL MH COH OUX MURYG COHT IKPLHGYK, MOY ZKYGWOTUG KUG VUWR MH MOY VUMMYKEUGX IPYKKY KUG XHCG MOY LSHIY LMATVSPGN HBYK MOY XYUX UGX CHAGXYX COH,PM LYYTYX MH OPT, WUANOM UM OPL ZYYM. VAM VYZHKY OY KYUWOYX MOY ZHHMHZ MOY RGHSS OY CUL TYM VE U XYGLY WKHCX HZ KALLPUG LHSXPYKL COH,LMATVSPGN, MKPIIPGN AI, UGX LOHAMPGN, KUG TYKKPSE UGX CPSXSE MHCUKXMOY VUMMYKE. (MOPL CUL MOY UMMUWR ZHK COPWO YKTHSHB WSUPTYX MOY WKYXPM,XYWSUKPGN MOUM HGSE OPL WHAKUNY UGX NHHX SAWR TUXY LAWO U ZYUM IHLLPVSY:PM CUL MOY UMMUWR PG COPWO OY CUL LUPX MH OUBY MOKHCG LHTY LM. IAKLAYX MOYT LH ZUK VYEHGX MOY VUMMYKE MOUM PM CUL XPZZPWASMMH WUSS MOYT VUWR.MOY IKPLHGYKL CYKY VKHANOM XHCG ZKHT MOY VUMMYKE UGX UTHGN MOYT CULU CHAGXYX ZKYGWO NYGYKUS, COHT MOY HZZPWYKL LAKKHAGXYX. WKHCXL HZCHAGXYX--LHTY RGHCG MH IPYKKY UGX LHTY AGRGHCG--KALLPUGL UGX ZKYGWO,CPMO ZUWYL XPLMHKMYX VE LAZZYKPGN, CUSRYX, WKUCSYX, UGX CYKY WUKKPYX HGLMKYMWOYKL ZKHT MOY VUMMYKE. IPYKKY UNUPG CYGM AI HGMH MOY RGHSS COYKYOY OUX LIYGM HBYK UG OHAK, UGX HZ MOUM ZUTPSE WPKWSY COPWO OUX KYWYPBYXOPT UL U TYTVYK OY XPX GHM ZPGX U LPGNSY HGY. MOYKY CYKY TUGE XYUX COHTOY XPX GHM RGHC, VAM LHTY OY KYWHNGPFYX. MOY EHAGN HZZPWYK LMPSS LUM PGMOY LUTY CUE, VYGM XHAVSY, PG U IHHS HZ VSHHX UM MOY YXNY HZ MOY YUKMOCUSS. MOY KYX-ZUWYX TUG CUL LMPSS MCPMWOPGN, VAM MOYE XPX GHM WUKKE OPTUCUE.IPYKKY KUG XHCG MOY LSHIY HGWY THKY."GHC MOYE CPSS LMHI PM, GHC MOYE CPSS VY OHKKPZPYX UM COUM MOYE OUBYXHGY!" OY MOHANOM, UPTSYLLSE NHPGN MHCUKX U WKHCX HZ LMKYMWOYK VYUKYKLTHBPGN ZKHT MOY VUMMSYZPYSX.VAM VYOPGX MOY BYPS HZ LTHRY MOY LAG CUL LMPSS OPNO, UGX PG ZKHGM UGXYLIYWPUSSE MH MOY SYZM, GYUK LYTYGHBLR, LHTYMOPGN LYYTYX MH VY LYYMOPGNPG MOY LTHRY, UGX MOY KHUK HZ WUGGHG UGX TALRYMKE XPX GHM XPTPGPLO, VAMYBYG PGWKYULYX MH XYLIYKUMPHG SPRY U TUG COH, LMKUPGPGN OPTLYSZ, LOKPYRLCPMO USS OPL KYTUPGPGN LMKYGNMO.WOUIMYK DDDPPPMOY WOPYZ UWMPHG HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH CUL ZHANOM CPMOPG MOY LYBYGMOHALUGX ZYYM VYMCYYG VHKHXPGH UGX VUNKUMPHG'L ZSYWOYL. VYEHGX MOUMLIUWY MOYKY CUL, HG MOY HGY LPXY, U XYTHGLMKUMPHG TUXY VE MOY KALLPUGLCPMO ABUKHB'L WUBUSKE UM TPXXUE, UGX HG MOY HMOYK LPXY, VYEHGX AMPMLU,IHGPUMHCLRP'L WHSSPLPHG CPMO MAWORHB; VAM MOYLY MCH CYKY XYMUWOYX UGXZYYVSY UWMPHGL PG WHTIUKPLHG CPMO COUM MHHR ISUWY PG MOY WYGMYK HZ MOYVUMMSYZPYSX. HG MOY ZPYSX VYMCYYG VHKHXPGH UGX MOY ZSYWOYL, VYLPXY MOYCHHX, MOY WOPYZ UWMPHG HZ MOY XUE MHHR ISUWY HG UG HIYG LIUWY BPLPVSYZKHT VHMO LPXYL UGX CUL ZHANOM PG MOY LPTISYLM UGX THLM UKMSYLL CUE.MOY VUMMSY VYNUG HG VHMO LPXYL CPMO U WUGGHGUXY ZKHT LYBYKUS OAGXKYXNAGL.MOYG COYG MOY COHSY ZPYSX CUL WHBYKYX CPMO LTHRY, MCH XPBPLPHGL,WUTIUG'L UGX XYLLUPD'L, UXBUGWYX ZKHT MOY ZKYGWO KPNOM, COPSY TAKUM'LMKHHIL UXBUGWYX HG VHKHXPGH ZKHT MOYPK SYZM.ZKHT MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM COYKY GUIHSYHG CUL LMUGXPGN MOY ZSYWOYL CYKYMCH MOPKXL HZ U TPSY UCUE, UGX PM CUL THKY MOUG U TPSY UL MOY WKHC ZSPYLMH VHKHXPGH, LH MOUM GUIHSYHG WHASX GHM LYY COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN MOYKY,YLIYWPUSSE UL MOY LTHRY TPGNSPGN CPMO MOY TPLM OPX MOY COHSY SHWUSPME.MOY LHSXPYKL HZ XYLLUPD'L XPBPLPHG UXBUGWPGN UNUPGLM MOY ZSYWOYL WHASXHGSE VY LYYG MPSS MOYE OUX YGMYKYX MOY OHSSHC MOUM SUE VYMCYYG MOYT UGXMOY ZSYWOYL. UL LHHG UL MOYE OUX XYLWYGXYX PGMH MOUM OHSSHC, MOY LTHRYHZ MOY NAGL UGX TALRYMKE HG MOY ZSYWOYL NKYC LH XYGLY MOUM PM WHBYKYXMOY COHSY UIIKHUWO HG MOUM LPXY HZ PM. MOKHANO MOY LTHRY NSPTILYL WHASXVY WUANOM HZ LHTYMOPGN VSUWR--IKHVUVSE TYG--UGX UM MPTYL MOY NSPGM HZVUEHGYML. VAM COYMOYK MOYE CYKY THBPGN HK LMUMPHGUKE, COYMOYK MOYE CYKYZKYGWO HK KALLPUG, WHASX GHM VY XPLWHBYKYX ZKHT MOY LOYBUKXPGH KYXHAVM.MOY LAG OUX KPLYG VKPNOMSE UGX PML LSUGMPGN KUEL LMKAWR LMKUPNOM PGMHGUIHSYHG'L ZUWY UL, LOUXPGN OPL YEYL CPMO OPL OUGX, OY SHHRYX UM MOYZSYWOYL. MOY LTHRY LIKYUX HAM VYZHKY MOYT, UGX UM MPTYL PM SHHRYX UL PZMOY LTHRY CYKY THBPGN, UM MPTYL UL PZ MOY MKHHIL THBYX. LHTYMPTYL LOHAMLCYKY OYUKX MOKHANO MOY ZPKPGN, VAM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH MYSS COUM CULVYPGN XHGY MOYKY.GUIHSYHG, LMUGXPGN HG MOY RGHSS, SHHRYX MOKHANO U ZPYSX NSULL, UGX PGPML LTUSS WPKWSYM LUC LTHRY UGX TYG, LHTYMPTYL OPL HCG UGX LHTYMPTYLKALLPUGL, VAM COYG OY SHHRYX UNUPG CPMO MOY GURYX YEY, OY WHASX GHM MYSSCOYKY COUM OY OUX LYYG CUL.OY XYLWYGXYX MOY RGHSS UGX VYNUG CUSRPGN AI UGX XHCG VYZHKY PM.HWWULPHGUSSE OY LMHIIYX, SPLMYGYX MH MOY ZPKPGN, UGX NUFYX PGMYGMSE UMMOY VUMMSYZPYSX.VAM GHM HGSE CUL PM PTIHLLPVSY MH TURY HAM COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN ZKHT COYKYOY CUL LMUGXPGN XHCG VYSHC, HK ZKHT MOY RGHSS UVHBY HG COPWO LHTY HZ OPLNYGYKUSL OUX MURYG MOYPK LMUGX, VAM YBYG ZKHT MOY ZSYWOYL MOYTLYSBYL--PGCOPWO VE MOPL MPTY MOYKY CYKY GHC KALLPUG UGX GHC ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL,USMYKGUMYSE HK MHNYMOYK, XYUX, CHAGXYX, USPBY, ZKPNOMYGYX, HKTUXXYGYX--YBYG UM MOHLY ZSYWOYL MOYTLYSBYL PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH TURY HAMCOUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY. MOYKY ZHK LYBYKUS OHAKL UTPX PGWYLLUGM WUGGHG UGXTALRYMKE ZPKY, GHC KALLPUGL CYKY LYYG USHGY, GHC ZKYGWOTYG USHGY, GHCPGZUGMKE, UGX GHC WUBUSKE: MOYE UIIYUKYX, ZPKYX, ZYSS, WHSSPXYX, GHMRGHCPGN COUM MH XH CPMO HGY UGHMOYK, LWKYUTYX, UGX KUG VUWR UNUPG.ZKHT MOY VUMMSYZPYSX UXQAMUGML OY OUX LYGM HAM, UGX HKXYKSPYL ZKHT OPLTUKLOUSL, RYIM NUSSHIPGN AI MH GUIHSYHG CPMO KYIHKML HZ MOY IKHNKYLLHZ MOY UWMPHG, VAM USS MOYLY KYIHKML CYKY ZUSLY, VHMO VYWUALY PM CULPTIHLLPVSY PG MOY OYUM HZ VUMMSY MH LUE COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN UM UGE NPBYGTHTYGM UGX VYWUALY TUGE HZ MOY UXQAMUGML XPX GHM NH MH MOY UWMAUS ISUWYHZ WHGZSPWM VAM KYIHKMYX COUM MOYE OUX OYUKX ZKHT HMOYKL; UGX USLHVYWUALY COPSY UG UXQAMUGM CUL KPXPGN THKY MOUG U TPSY MH GUIHSYHGWPKWATLMUGWYL WOUGNYX UGX MOY GYCL OY VKHANOM CUL USKYUXE VYWHTPGNZUSLY. MOAL UG UXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX AI ZKHT TAKUM CPMO MPXPGNL MOUMVHKHXPGH OUX VYYG HWWAIPYX UGX MOY VKPXNY HBYK MOY RHSHWOU CUL PG MOYOUGXL HZ MOY ZKYGWO. MOY UXQAMUGM ULRYX COYMOYK GUIHSYHG CPLOYX MOYMKHHIL MH WKHLL PM? GUIHSYHG NUBY HKXYKL MOUM MOY MKHHIL LOHASX ZHKT AIHG MOY ZUKMOYK LPXY UGX CUPM. VAM VYZHKY MOUM HKXYK CUL NPBYG--USTHLMUL LHHG PG ZUWM UL MOY UXQAMUGM OUX SYZM VHKHXPGH--MOY VKPXNY OUX VYYGKYMURYG VE MOY KALLPUGL UGX VAKGYX, PG MOY BYKE LRPKTPLO UM COPWO IPYKKYOUX VYYG IKYLYGM UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOY VUMMSY.UG UXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX AI ZKHT MOY ZSYWOYL CPMO U IUSY UGX ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWYUGX KYIHKMYX MH GUIHSYHG MOUM MOYPK UMMUWR OUX VYYG KYIASLYX, WUTIUGCHAGXYX, UGX XUBHAM RPSSYX; EYM UM MOY BYKE MPTY MOY UXQAMUGM OUX VYYGMHSX MOUM MOY ZKYGWO OUX VYYG KYIASLYX, MOY ZSYWOYL OUX PG ZUWM VYYGKYWUIMAKYX VE HMOYK ZKYGWO MKHHIL, UGX XUBHAM CUL USPBY UGX HGSELSPNOMSE VKAPLYX. HG MOY VULPL HZ MOYLY GYWYLLUKPSE AGMKALMCHKMOEKYIHKML GUIHSYHG NUBY OPL HKXYKL, COPWO OUX YPMOYK VYYG YDYWAMYX VYZHKYOY NUBY MOYT HK WHASX GHM VY UGX CYKY GHM YDYWAMYX.MOY TUKLOUSL UGX NYGYKUSL, COH CYKY GYUKYK MH MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSYVAM, SPRY GUIHSYHG, XPX GHM MURY IUKM PG MOY UWMAUS ZPNOMPGN UGX HGSEHWWULPHGUSSE CYGM CPMOPG TALRYM KUGNY, TUXY MOYPK HCG UKKUGNYTYGMLCPMOHAM ULRPGN GUIHSYHG UGX PLLAYX HKXYKL COYKY UGX PG COUM XPKYWMPHG MHZPKY UGX COYKY WUBUSKE LOHASX NUSSHI UGX PGZUGMKE LOHASX KAG. VAM YBYGMOYPK HKXYKL, SPRY GUIHSYHG'L, CYKY LYSXHT WUKKPYX HAM, UGX MOYG VAMIUKMPUSSE. ZHK MOY THLM IUKM MOPGNL OUIIYGYX WHGMKUKE MH MOYPK HKXYKL.LHSXPYKL HKXYKYX MH UXBUGWY KUG VUWR HG TYYMPGN NKUIYLOHM; LHSXPYKLHKXYKYX MH KYTUPG COYKY MOYE CYKY, LAXXYGSE, LYYPGN KALLPUGLAGYDIYWMYXSE VYZHKY MOYT, LHTYMPTYL KALOYX VUWR UGX LHTYMPTYL ZHKCUKX,UGX MOY WUBUSKE XULOYX CPMOHAM HKXYKL PG IAKLAPM HZ MOY ZSEPGN KALLPUGL.PG MOPL CUE MCH WUBUSKE KYNPTYGML NUSSHIYX MOKHANO MOY LYTYGHBLR OHSSHCUGX UL LHHG UL MOYE KYUWOYX MOY MHI HZ MOY PGWSPGY MAKGYX KHAGX UGXNUSSHIYX ZASS LIYYX VUWR UNUPG. USS HKXYKL UL MH COYKY UGX COYG MH THBY MOY NAGL, COYG MH LYGXPGZUGMKE MH LOHHM HK OHKLYTYG MH KPXY XHCG MOY KALLPUG PGZUGMKE--USSLAWO HKXYKL CYKY NPBYG VE MOY HZZPWYKL HG MOY LIHM GYUKYLM MH MOYAGPML WHGWYKGYX, CPMOHAM ULRPGN YPMOYK GYE, XUBHAM, HK TAKUM, TAWO SYLLGUIHSYHG. MOYE XPX GHM ZYUK NYMMPGN PGMH MKHAVSY ZHK GHM ZASZPSSPGNHKXYKL HK ZHK UWMPGN HG MOYPK HCG PGPMPUMPBY, ZHK PG VUMMSY COUM PL UMLMURY PL COUM PL XYUKYLM MH TUG--OPL HCG SPZY--UGX PM LHTYMPTYL LYYTLMOUM LUZYME SPYL PG KAGGPGN VUWR, LHTYMPTYL PG KAGGPGN ZHKCUKX; UGXMOYLY TYG COH CYKY KPNOM PG MOY OYUM HZ MOY VUMMSY UWMYX UWWHKXPGN MHMOY THHX HZ MOY THTYGM. PG KYUSPME, OHCYBYK, USS MOYLY THBYTYGML ZHKCUKXUGX VUWRCUKX XPX GHM PTIKHBY HK USMYK MOY IHLPMPHG HZ MOY MKHHIL. USSMOYPK KALOPGN UGX NUSSHIPGN UM HGY UGHMOYK XPX SPMMSY OUKT, MOY OUKT HZXPLUVSYTYGM UGX XYUMO CUL WUALYX VE MOY VUSSL UGX VASSYML MOUM ZSYC HBYKMOY ZPYSXL HG COPWO MOYLY TYG CYKY ZSHAGXYKPGN UVHAM. UL LHHG UL MOYESYZM MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY VUSSL UGX VASSYML CYKY ZSEPGN UVHAM, MOYPKLAIYKPHKL, SHWUMYX PG MOY VUWRNKHAGX, KY-ZHKTYX MOYT UGX VKHANOM MOYTAGXYK XPLWPISPGY UGX AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ MOUM XPLWPISPGY SYX MOYTVUWR MH MOY FHGY HZ ZPKY, COYKY AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ ZYUK HZ XYUMOMOYE SHLM MOYPK XPLWPISPGY UGX KALOYX UVHAM UWWHKXPGN MH MOY WOUGWYIKHTIMPGNL HZ MOY MOKHGN.WOUIMYK DDDPBGUIHSYHG'L NYGYKUSL--XUBHAM, GYE, UGX TAKUM, COH CYKY GYUK MOUM KYNPHGHZ ZPKY UGX LHTYMPTYL YBYG YGMYKYX PM--KYIYUMYXSE SYX PGMH PM OANYTULLYL HZ CYSS-HKXYKYX MKHHIL. VAM WHGMKUKE MH COUM OUX USCUEL OUIIYGYXPG MOYPK ZHKTYK VUMMSYL, PGLMYUX HZ MOY GYCL MOYE YDIYWMYX HZ MOYYGYTE'L ZSPNOM, MOYLY HKXYKSE TULLYL KYMAKGYX MOYGWY UL XPLHKNUGPFYXUGX MYKKPZPYX THVL. MOY NYGYKUSL KY-ZHKTYX MOYT, VAM MOYPK GATVYKLWHGLMUGMSE XYWKYULYX. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY XUE TAKUM LYGM OPL UXQAMUGMMH GUIHSYHG MH XYTUGX KYPGZHKWYTYGML.GUIHSYHG LUM UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY RGHSS, XKPGRPGN IAGWO, COYG TAKUM'LUXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX AI CPMO UG ULLAKUGWY MOUM MOY KALLPUGL CHASX VY KHAMYXPZ OPL TUQYLME CHASX SYM OPT OUBY UGHMOYK XPBPLPHG."KYPGZHKWYTYGML?" LUPX GUIHSYHG PG U MHGY HZ LMYKG LAKIKPLY, SHHRPGN UMMOY UXQAMUGM--U OUGXLHTY SUX CPMO SHGN VSUWR WAKSL UKKUGNYX SPRY TAKUM'LHCG--UL MOHANO OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPL CHKXL."KYPGZHKWYTYGML!" MOHANOM GUIHSYHG MH OPTLYSZ. "OHC WUG MOYE GYYXKYPGZHKWYTYGML COYG MOYE USKYUXE OUBY OUSZ MOY UKTE XPKYWMYX UNUPGLM UCYUR, AGYGMKYGWOYX KALLPUG CPGN?""MYSS MOY RPGN HZ GUISYL," LUPX OY LMYKGSE, "MOUM PM PL GHM GHHG EYM,UGX P XHG'M EYM LYY TE WOYLLVHUKX WSYUKSE. NH!..."MOY OUGXLHTY VHE UXQAMUGM CPMO MOY SHGN OUPK LPNOYX XYYISE CPMOHAMKYTHBPGN OPL OUGX ZKHT OPL OUM UGX NUSSHIYX VUWR MH COYKY TYG CYKY VYPGNLSUANOMYKYX.GUIHSYHG KHLY UGX OUBPGN LATTHGYX WUASUPGWHAKM UGX VYKMOPYK VYNUGMUSRPGN MH MOYT UVHAM TUMMYKL AGWHGGYWMYX CPMO MOY VUMMSY.PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOPL WHGBYKLUMPHG, COPWO CUL VYNPGGPGN MH PGMYKYLMGUIHSYHG, VYKMOPYK'L YEYL MAKGYX MH SHHR UM U NYGYKUS CPMO U LAPMY, COHCUL NUSSHIPGN MHCUKX MOY RGHSS HG U SUMOYKPGN OHKLY. PM CUL VYSSPUKX.OUBPGN XPLTHAGMYX OY CYGM AI MH MOY YTIYKHK CPMO KUIPX LMKPXYL UGX PGU SHAX BHPWY VYNUG VHSXSE XYTHGLMKUMPGN MOY GYWYLLPME HZ LYGXPGNKYPGZHKWYTYGML. OY LCHKY HG OPL OHGHK MOUM MOY KALLPUGL CYKY SHLM PZ MOYYTIYKHK CHASX NPBY UGHMOYK XPBPLPHG.GUIHSYHG LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL UGX WHGMPGAYX MH IUWY AI UGX XHCGCPMOHAM KYISEPGN. NHUGX OUBY UGHMOYK SHHR UGX MOYG WHTY VUWR MH TY."VYZHKY VYSSPUKX CUL HAM HZ LPNOM, U TYLLYGNYK ZKHT UGHMOYK IUKM HZ MOYVUMMSYZPYSX NUSSHIYX AI."GHC MOYG, COUM XH EHA CUGM?" ULRYX GUIHSYHG PG MOY MHGY HZ U TUGPKKPMUMYX UM VYPGN WHGMPGAUSSE XPLMAKVYX."LPKY, MOY IKPGWY..." VYNUG MOY UXQAMUGM."ULRL ZHK KYPGZHKWYTYGML?" LUPX GUIHSYHG CPMO UG UGNKE NYLMAKY.MOY UXQAMUGM VYGM OPL OYUX UZZPKTUMPBYSE UGX VYNUG MH KYIHKM, VAM MOYYTIYKHK MAKGYX ZKHT OPT, MHHR U WHAISY HZ LMYIL, LMHIIYX, WUTY VUWR, UGXWUSSYX VYKMOPYK."CY TALM NPBY KYLYKBYL," OY LUPX, THBPGN OPL UKTL LSPNOMSE UIUKM."COH XH EHA MOPGR LOHASX VY LYGM MOYKY?" OY ULRYX HZ VYKMOPYK (COHT OYLAVLYJAYGMSE MYKTYX "MOUM NHLSPGN P OUBY TUXY UG YUNSY")."LYGX WSUIUKYXY'L XPBPLPHG, LPKY," KYISPYX VYKMOPYK, COH RGYC USS MOYXPBPLPHGL KYNPTYGML, UGX VUMMUSPHGL VE OYUKM.GUIHSYHG GHXXYX ULLYGM.MOY UXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX MH WSUIUKYXY'L XPBPLPHG UGX U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYKMOY EHAGN NAUKXL LMUMPHGYX VYOPGX MOY RGHSS THBYX ZHKCUKX. LYGXZKPUGM'L XPBPLPHG."MOHANO MOYKY CUL GH UXBUGMUNY PG LYGXPGN ZKPUGM'L XPBPLPHG PGLMYUX HZWSUIUKYXY'L, UGX YBYG PG HVBPHAL PGWHGBYGPYGWY UGX XYSUE PG LMHIIPGNWSUIUKYXY UGX LYGXPGN ZKPUGM GHC, MOY HKXYK CUL WUKKPYX HAM YDUWMSE.GUIHSYHG XPX GHM GHMPWY MOUM PG KYNUKX MH OPL UKTE OY CUL ISUEPGN MOYIUKM HZ U XHWMHK COH OPGXYKL VE OPL TYXPWPGYL--U KHSY OY LH QALMSEAGXYKLMHHX UGX WHGXYTGYX.ZKPUGM'L XPBPLPHG XPLUIIYUKYX UL MOY HMOYKL OUX XHGY PGMH MOY LTHRYHZ MOY VUMMSYZPYSX. MOYE USS ULRYXZHK KYPGZHKWYTYGML UGX USS LUPX MOUM MOY KALLPUGL CYKY OHSXPGN MOYPKIHLPMPHGL UGX TUPGMUPGPGN U OYSSPLO ZPKY AGXYK COPWO MOY ZKYGWO UKTE CULTYSMPGN UCUE.GUIHSYHG LUM HG U WUTILMHHS, CKUIIYX PG MOHANOM.T. XYVYUALLYM'L ZUWY UGX OY NSPXYX UCUE MH MOY HMOYK NYGYKUSL.GUIHSYHG CUL YDIYKPYGWPGN U ZYYSPGN HZ XYIKYLLPHG SPRY MOUM HZ UGYBYK-SAWRE NUTVSYK COH, UZMYK KYWRSYLLSE ZSPGNPGN THGYE UVHAM UGX USCUELCPGGPGN, LAXXYGSE QALM COYG OY OUL WUSWASUMYX USS MOY WOUGWYL HZ MOYNUTY, ZPGXL MOUM MOY THKY OY WHGLPXYKL OPL ISUE MOY THKY LAKYSE OYSHLYL.OPL MKHHIL CYKY MOY LUTY, OPL NYGYKUSL MOY LUTY, MOY LUTY IKYIUKUMPHGLOUX VYYG TUXY, MOY LUTY XPLIHLPMPHGL, UGX MOY LUTY IKHWSUTUMPHG WHAKMYYM YGYKNPJAY, OY OPTLYSZ CUL LMPSS MOY LUTY: OY RGYC MOUM UGX RGYC MOUMOY CUL GHC YBYG THKY YDIYKPYGWYX UGX LRPSSZAS MOUG VYZHKY. YBYG MOYYGYTE CUL MOY LUTY UL UM UALMYKSPMF UGX ZKPYXSUGX--EYM MOY MYKKPVSYLMKHRY HZ OPL UKT OUX LAIYKGUMAKUSSE VYWHTY PTIHMYGM.USS MOY HSX TYMOHXL MOUM OUX VYYG AGZUPSPGNSE WKHCGYX CPMO LAWWYLL: MOYWHGWYGMKUMPHG HZ VUMMYKPYL HG HGY IHPGM, UG UMMUWR VE KYLYKBYL MH VKYURMOY YGYTE'L SPGY, UGX U WUBUSKE UMMUWR VE "MOY TYG HZ PKHG," USS MOYLYTYMOHXL OUX USKYUXE VYYG YTISHEYX, EYM GHM HGSE CUL MOYKY GH BPWMHKE,VAM ZKHT USS LPXYL WUTY MOY LUTY GYCL HZ NYGYKUSL RPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX,HZ KYPGZHKWYTYGML GYYXYX, HZ MOY PTIHLLPVPSPME HZ XKPBPGN VUWR MOYKALLPUGL, UGX HZ XPLHKNUGPFUMPHG UTHGN OPL HCG MKHHIL.ZHKTYKSE, UZMYK OY OUX NPBYG MCH HK MOKYY HKXYKL UGX AMMYKYX UZYC IOKULYL, TUKLOUSL UGX UXQAMUGML OUX WHTY NUSSHIPGN AI CPMOWHGNKUMASUMPHGL UGX OUIIE ZUWYL, UGGHAGWPGN MOY MKHIOPYL MURYG, MOYWHKIL HZ IKPLHGYKL, VAGXSYL HZ YGYTE YUNSYL UGX LMUGXUKXL, WUGGHG UGXLMHKYL, UGX TAKUM OUX HGSE VYNNYX SYUBY MH SHHLY MOY WUBUSKE MH NUMOYKPG MOY VUNNUNY CUNHGL. LH PM OUX VYYG UM SHXP, TUKYGNH, UKWHSU, QYGU,UALMYKSPMF, CUNKUT, UGX LH HG. VAM GHC LHTYMOPGN LMKUGNY CUL OUIIYGPGNMH OPL MKHHIL.XYLIPMY GYCL HZ MOY WUIMAKY HZ MOY ZSYWOYL, GUIHSYHG LUC MOUM MOPL CULGHM MOY LUTY, GHM UM USS MOY LUTY, UL COUM OUX OUIIYGYX PG OPL ZHKTYKVUMMSYL. OY LUC MOUM COUM OY CUL ZYYSPGN CUL ZYSM VE USS MOY TYG UVHAMOPT YDIYKPYGWYX PG MOY UKM HZ CUK. USS MOYPK ZUWYL SHHRYX XYQYWMYX, UGXMOYE USS LOAGGYX HGY UGHMOYK'L YEYL--HGSE U XY VYUALLYM WHASX ZUPS MHNKULI MOY TYUGPGN HZ COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN.VAM GUIHSYHG CPMO OPL SHGN YDIYKPYGWY HZ CUK CYSS RGYC MOY TYUGPGN HZU VUMMSY GHM NUPGYX VE MOY UMMUWRPGN LPXY PG YPNOM OHAKL, UZMYK USSYZZHKML OUX VYYG YDIYGXYX. OY RGYC MOUM PM CUL U SHLM VUMMSY UGX MOUMMOY SYULM UWWPXYGM TPNOM GHC--CPMO MOY ZPNOM VUSUGWYX HG LAWO U LMKUPGYXWYGMYK--XYLMKHE OPT UGX OPL UKTE.COYG OY KUG OPL TPGX HBYK MOY COHSY HZ MOPL LMKUGNY KALLPUG WUTIUPNG PGCOPWO GHM HGY VUMMSY OUX VYYG CHG, UGX PG COPWO GHM U ZSUN, HK WUGGHG,HK UKTE WHKIL OUX VYYG WUIMAKYX PG MCH THGMOL, COYG OY SHHRYX UM MOYWHGWYUSYX XYIKYLLPHG HG MOY ZUWYL UKHAGX OPT UGX OYUKX KYIHKML HZ MOYKALLPUGL LMPSS OHSXPGN MOYPK NKHAGX--U MYKKPVSY ZYYSPGN SPRY U GPNOMTUKYMHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZ OPT, UGX USS MOY AGSAWRE UWWPXYGML MOUM TPNOM XYLMKHEOPT HWWAKKYX MH OPL TPGX. MOY KALLPUGL TPNOM ZUSS HG OPL SYZM CPGN,TPNOM VKYUR MOKHANO OPL WYGMYK, OY OPTLYSZ TPNOM VY RPSSYX VE U LMKUEWUGGHG VUSS. USS MOPL CUL IHLLPVSY. PG ZHKTYK VUMMSYL OY OUX HGSEWHGLPXYKYX MOY IHLLPVPSPMPYL HZ LAWWYLL, VAM GHC PGGATYKUVSY AGSAWREWOUGWYL IKYLYGMYX MOYTLYSBYL, UGX OY YDIYWMYX MOYT USS. EYL, PM CUL SPRYU XKYUT PG COPWO U TUG ZUGWPYL MOUM U KAZZPUG PL WHTPGN MH UMMUWR OPT,UGX KUPLYL OPL UKT MH LMKPRY MOUM KAZZPUG U MYKKPVSY VSHC COPWO OY RGHCLLOHASX UGGPOPSUMY OPT, VAM MOYG ZYYSL MOUM OPL UKT XKHIL IHCYKSYLL UGXSPTI SPRY U KUN, UGX MOY OHKKHK HZ AGUBHPXUVSY XYLMKAWMPHG LYPFYL OPT PGOPL OYSISYLLGYLL.MOY GYCL MOUM MOY KALLPUGL CYKY UMMUWRPGN MOY SYZM ZSUGR HZ MOY ZKYGWOUKTE UKHALYX MOUM OHKKHK PG GUIHSYHG. VYKMOPYKUIIKHUWOYX UGX LANNYLMYX MOUM MOYE LOHASX KPXY USHGN MOY SPGY MHULWYKMUPG MOY IHLPMPHG HZ UZZUPKL."COUM? COUM XH EHA LUE?" ULRYX GUIHSYHG. "EYL, MYSS MOYT MH VKPGN TY TEOHKLY."OY THAGMYX UGX KHXY MHCUKX LYTYGHBLR.UTPX MOY IHCXYK LTHRY, LSHCSE XPLIYKLPGN HBYK MOY COHSY LIUWY MOKHANOCOPWO GUIHSYHG KHXY, OHKLYL UGX TYG CYKY SEPGN PG IHHSL HZ VSHHX, LPGNSEHK PG OYUIL. GYPMOYK GUIHSYHG GHK UGE HZ OPL NYGYKUSL OUX YBYK VYZHKYLYYG LAWO OHKKHKL HK LH TUGE LSUPG PG LAWO U LTUSS UKYU. MOY KHUK HZNAGL, MOUM OUX GHM WYULYX ZHK MYG OHAKL, CYUKPYX MOY YUK UGX NUBYU IYWASPUK LPNGPZPWUGWY MH MOY LIYWMUWSY, UL TALPW XHYL MH MUVSYUADBPBUGML. GUIHSYHG KHXY AI MOY OPNO NKHAGX UM LYTYGHBLR, UGX MOKHANO MOYLTHRY LUC KUGRL HZ TYG PG AGPZHKTL HZ U WHSHK AGZUTPSPUK MH OPT. MOYECYKY KALLPUGL.MOY KALLPUGL LMHHX PG LYKKPYX KUGRL VYOPGX LYTYGHBLR BPSSUNY UGX PMLRGHSS, UGX MOYPK NAGL VHHTYX PGWYLLUGMSE USHGN MOYPK SPGY UGX LYGMZHKMO WSHAXL HZ LTHRY. PM CUL GH SHGNYK U VUMMSY: PM CUL U WHGMPGAHALLSUANOMYK COPWO WHASX VY HZ GH UBUPS YPMOYK MH MOY ZKYGWO HK MOYKALLPUGL. GUIHSYHG LMHIIYX OPL OHKLY UGX UNUPG ZYSS PGMH MOY KYBYKPYZKHT COPWO VYKMOPYK OUX UKHALYX OPT. OY WHASX GHM LMHI COUM CUL NHPGN HGVYZHKY OPT UGX UKHAGX OPT UGX CUL LAIIHLYX MH VY XPKYWMYX VE OPT UGX MHXYIYGX HG OPT, UGX ZKHT PML SUWR HZ LAWWYLL MOPL UZZUPK, ZHK MOY ZPKLMMPTY, LYYTYX MH OPT AGGYWYLLUKE UGX OHKKPVSY.HGY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL KHXY AI MH GUIHSYHG UGX BYGMAKYX MH HZZYK MH SYUXMOY HSX NAUKX PGMH UWMPHG. GYE UGX VYKMOPYK, LMUGXPGN GYUK GUIHSYHG,YDWOUGNYX SHHRL UGX LTPSYX WHGMYTIMAHALSE UM MOPL NYGYKUS'L LYGLYSYLLHZZYK.GUIHSYHG VHCYX OPL OYUX UGX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM U SHGN MPTY."UM YPNOM OAGXKYX SYUNAYL ZKHT ZKUGWY, P CPSS GHM OUBY TE NAUKXXYLMKHEYX!" OY LUPX, UGX MAKGPGN OPL OHKLY KHXY VUWR MH LOYBUKXPGH.WOUIMYK DDDBHG MOY KAN-WHBYKYX VYGWO COYKY IPYKKY OUX LYYG OPT PG MOY THKGPGN LUMRAMAFHB, OPL NKUE OYUX OUGNPGN, OPL OYUBE VHXE KYSUDYX. OY NUBY GHHKXYKL, VAM HGSE ULLYGMYX MH HK XPLLYGMYX ZKHT COUM HMOYKL LANNYLMYX."EYL, EYL, XH MOUM," OY KYISPYX MH BUKPHAL IKHIHLUSL. "EYL, EYL: NH,XYUK VHE, UGX OUBY U SHHR," OY CHASX LUE MH HGY HK UGHMOYK HZ MOHLYUVHAM OPT; HK, "GH, XHG'M, CY'X VYMMYK CUPM!" OY SPLMYGYX MH MOY KYIHKMLMOUM CYKY VKHANOM OPT UGX NUBY XPKYWMPHGL COYG OPL LAVHKXPGUMYL XYTUGXYXMOUM HZ OPT; VAM COYG SPLMYGPGN MH MOY KYIHKML PM LYYTYX UL PZ OYCYKY GHM PGMYKYLMYX PG MOY PTIHKM HZ MOY CHKXL LIHRYG, VAM KUMOYK PGLHTYMOPGN YSLY--PG MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ ZUWY UGX MHGY HZ BHPWY HZ MOHLY COHCYKY KYIHKMPGN. VE SHGN EYUKL HZ TPSPMUKE YDIYKPYGWY OY RGYC, UGX CPMOMOY CPLXHT HZ UNY AGXYKLMHHX, MOUM PM PL PTIHLLPVSY ZHK HGY TUG MHXPKYWM OAGXKYXL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ HMOYKL LMKANNSPGN CPMO XYUMO, UGX OYRGYC MOUM MOY KYLASM HZ U VUMMSY PL XYWPXYX GHM VE MOY HKXYKL HZ UWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, GHK MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY MKHHIL UKY LMUMPHGYX, GHK VEMOY GATVYK HZ WUGGHG HK HZ LSUANOMYKYX TYG, VAM VE MOUM PGMUGNPVSY ZHKWYWUSSYX MOY LIPKPM HZ MOY UKTE, UGX OY CUMWOYX MOPL ZHKWY UGX NAPXYX PMPG UL ZUK UL MOUM CUL PG OPL IHCYK.RAMAFHB'L NYGYKUS YDIKYLLPHG CUL HGY HZ WHGWYGMKUMYX JAPYM UMMYGMPHG,UGX OPL ZUWY CHKY U LMKUPGYX SHHR UL PZ OY ZHAGX PM XPZZPWASM MH TULMYKMOY ZUMPNAY HZ OPL HSX UGX ZYYVSY VHXE.UM YSYBYG H'WSHWR MOYE VKHANOM OPT GYCL MOUM MOY ZSYWOYL WUIMAKYX VE MOYZKYGWO OUX VYYG KYMURYG, VAM MOUM IKPGWY VUNKUMPHG CUL CHAGXYX. RAMAFHBNKHUGYX UGX LCUEYX OPL OYUX."KPXY HBYK MH IKPGWY IYMYK PBUGHBPWO UGX ZPGX HAM UVHAM PM YDUWMSE," OYLUPX MH HGY HZ OPL UXQAMUGML, UGX MOYG MAKGYX MH MOY XARY HZ CAKMMYTVYKNCOH CUL LMUGXPGN VYOPGX OPT."CPSS EHAK OPNOGYLL ISYULY MURY WHTTUGX HZ MOY ZPKLM UKTE?"LHHG UZMYK MOY XARY'L XYIUKMAKY--VYZHKY OY WHASX IHLLPVSE OUBY KYUWOYXLYTYGHBLR--OPL UXQAMUGM WUTY VUWR ZKHT OPT UGX MHSX RAMAFHB MOUM MOYXARY ULRYX ZHK THKY MKHHIL.RAMAFHB TUXY U NKPTUWY UGX LYGM UG HKXYK MH XHROMAKHB MH MURY HBYK MOYWHTTUGX HZ MOY ZPKLM UKTE, UGX U KYJAYLM MH MOY XARY--COHT OY LUPX OYWHASX GHM LIUKY UM LAWO UG PTIHKMUGM THTYGM--MH KYMAKG MH OPT. COYGMOYE VKHANOM OPT GYCL MOUM TAKUM OUX VYYG MURYG IKPLHGYK, UGX MOY LMUZZHZZPWYKL WHGNKUMASUMYX OPT, RAMAFHB LTPSYX."CUPM U SPMMSY, NYGMSYTYG," LUPX OY. "MOY VUMMSY PL CHG, UGX MOYKY PLGHMOPGN YDMKUHKXPGUKE PG MOY WUIMAKY HZ TAKUM. LMPSS, PM PL VYMMYK MHCUPM VYZHKY CY KYQHPWY."VAM OY LYGM UG UXQAMUGM MH MURY MOY GYCL KHAGX MOY UKTE.COYG LWOYKVPGPG WUTY NUSSHIPGN ZKHT MOY SYZM ZSUGR CPMO GYCL MOUM MOYZKYGWO OUX WUIMAKYX MOY ZSYWOYL UGX MOY BPSSUNY HZ LYTYGHBLR, RAMAFHB,NAYLLPGN VE MOY LHAGXL HZ MOY VUMMSY UGX VE LWOYKVPGPG'L SHHRL MOUM MOYGYCL CUL VUX, KHLY UL PZ MH LMKYMWO OPL SYNL UGX, MURPGN LWOYKVPGPG'LUKT, SYX OPT ULPXY."NH, TE XYUK ZYSSHC," OY LUPX MH YKTHSHB, "UGX LYY COYMOYK LHTYMOPGNWUG'M VY XHGY."RAMAFHB CUL PG NHKRP, GYUK MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY KALLPUG IHLPMPHG. MOYUMMUWR XPKYWMYX VE GUIHSYHG UNUPGLM HAK SYZM ZSUGR OUX VYYG LYBYKUSMPTYL KYIASLYX. HG MOY ZUWYL HZ USSCOH WUTY ZKHT MOY ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY, UGX HZ MOHLY COH LMHHX UKHAGX OPT,RAMAFHB GHMPWYX UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ YDMKYTY MYGLPHG. XPGGYK CUL VKHANOM OPT.UXQAMUGM NYGYKUS CHSFHNYG, MOY TUG COH COYG KPXPGN IULM IKPGWY UGXKYCOUX LUPX, "MOY CUK LOHASX VY YDMYGXYX CPXYSE," UGX COHT VUNKUMPHG LHXYMYLMYX, KHXY AI COPSY RAMAFHB CUL UM XPGGYK. CHSFHNYG OUX WHTY ZKHTVUKWSUE XY MHSSE MH KYIHKM HG MOY IKHNKYLL HZ UZZUPKL HG MOY SYZM ZSUGR.MOY LUNUWPHAL VUKWSUE XY MHSSE, LYYPGN WKHCXL HZ CHAGXYX TYG KAGGPGNVUWR UGX MOY XPLHKXYKYX KYUK HZ MOY UKTE, CYPNOYX USS MOY WPKWATLMUGWYL,WHGWSAXYX MOUM MOY VUMMSY CUL SHLM, UGX LYGM OPL ZUBHKPMY HZZPWYK MH MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ CPMO MOUM GYCL.RAMAFHB CUL WOYCPGN U IPYWY HZ KHULM WOPWRYG CPMO XPZZPWASME UGX NSUGWYXUM CHSFHNYG CPMO YEYL MOUM VKPNOMYGYX AGXYK MOYPK IAWRYKPGN SPXL.CHSFHNYG, GHGWOUSUGMSE LMKYMWOPGN OPL SYNL, UIIKHUWOYX RAMAFHB CPMO UOUSZ-WHGMYTIMAHAL LTPSY HG OPL SPIL, LWUKWYSE MHAWOPGN MOY IYUR HZ OPLWUI.OY MKYUMYX OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL CPMO U LHTYCOUM UZZYWMYX GHGWOUSUGWYPGMYGXYX MH LOHC MOUM, UL U OPNOSE MKUPGYX TPSPMUKE TUG, OY SYZM PM MHKALLPUGL MH TURY UG PXHS HZ MOPL ALYSYLL HSX TUG, VAM MOUM OY RGYC COHTOY CUL XYUSPGN CPMO. "XYK USMY OYKK" (UL PG MOYPK HCG LYM MOY NYKTUGLWUSSYX RAMAFHB) "PL TURPGN OPTLYSZ BYKE WHTZHKMUVSY," MOHANOM CHSFHNYG,UGX SHHRPGN LYBYKYSE UM MOY XPLOYL PG ZKHGM HZ RAMAFHB OY VYNUG MHKYIHKM MH "MOY HSX NYGMSYTUG" MOY IHLPMPHG HZ UZZUPKL HG MOY SYZM ZSUGRUL VUKWSUE OUX HKXYKYX OPT MH UGX UL OY OPTLYSZ OUX LYYG UGX AGXYKLMHHXPM."USS MOY IHPGML HZ HAK IHLPMPHG UKY PG MOY YGYTE'L OUGXL UGX CY WUGGHMXPLSHXNY MOYT ZHK SUWR HZ MKHHIL, MOY TYG UKY KAGGPGN UCUE UGX PM PLPTIHLLPVSY MH LMHI MOYT," OY KYIHKMYX.RAMAFHB WYULYX WOYCPGN UGX ZPDYX UG ULMHGPLOYX NUFY HG CHSFHNYG, ULPZ GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM CUL LUPX MH OPT. CHSFHNYG, GHMPWPGN "MOY HSXNYGMSYTUG'L" UNPMUMPHG, LUPX CPMO U LTPSY:"P OUBY GHM WHGLPXYKYX PM KPNOM MH WHGWYUS ZKHT EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLLCOUM P OUBY LYYG. MOY MKHHIL UKY PG WHTISYMY XPLHKXYK...""EHA OUBY LYYG? EHA OUBY LYYG?..." RAMAFHB LOHAMYX ZKHCGPGN, UGX KPLPGNJAPWRSE OY CYGM AI MH CHSFHNYG."OHC... OHC XUKY EHA!..." LUPX RAMAFHB MH U IHKMSE, OUGXLHTY,XUKR-OUPKYX NYGYKUS COH CUL QALM ULWYGXPGN MOY RGHSS.MOPL CUL KUYBLRP, COH OUX LIYGM MOY COHSY XUE UM MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM IUKMHZ MOY ZPYSX HZ VHKHXPGH.KUYBLRP KYIHKMYX MOUM MOY MKHHIL CYKY ZPKTSE OHSXPGN MOYPK NKHAGX UGXMOUM MOY ZKYGWO GH SHGNYK BYGMAKYX MH UMMUWR.UZMYK OYUKPGN OPT, RAMAFHB LUPX PG ZKYGWO:"MOYG EHA XH GHM MOPGR, SPRY LHTY HMOYKL, MOUM CY TALM KYMKYUM?""HG MOY WHGMKUKE, EHAK OPNOGYLL, PG PGXYWPLPBY UWMPHGL PM PL USCUELMOY THLM LMAVVHKG COH KYTUPG BPWMHKL," KYISPYX KUYBLRP, "UGX PG TEHIPGPHG...""RUELUKHB!" UGX EHA," OY WHGMPGAYX, UXXKYLLPGNUGHMOYK, "KPXY USHGN MOY SPGY UGX UGGHAGWY MOUM MHTHKKHC CY UMMUWR."COPSY RAMAFHB CUL MUSRPGN MH KUYBLRP UGX XPWMUMPGN MOY HKXYK HZ MOY XUE,CHSFHNYG KYMAKGYX ZKHT VUKWSUE UGX LUPX MOUM NYGYKUS VUKWSUE CPLOYX MHOUBY CKPMMYG WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ MOY HKXYK MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS OUX NPBYG.RAMAFHB, CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM CHSFHNYG, NUBY XPKYWMPHGL ZHK MOY HKXYK MHVY CKPMMYG HAM COPWO MOY ZHKTYK WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, MH UBHPX IYKLHGUSKYLIHGLPVPSPME, BYKE QAXPWPHALSE CPLOYX MH KYWYPBY.UGX VE TYUGL HZ MOUM TELMYKPHAL PGXYZPGUVSY VHGX COPWO TUPGMUPGLMOKHANOHAM UG UKTE HGY UGX MOY LUTY MYTIYK, RGHCG UL "MOY LIPKPM HZMOY UKTE," UGX COPWO WHGLMPMAMYL MOY LPGYC HZ CUK, RAMAFHB'L CHKXL, OPLHKXYK ZHK U VUMMSY GYDM XUE, PTTYXPUMYSE VYWUTY RGHCG ZKHT HGY YGX HZMOY UKTE MH MOY HMOYK.PM CUL ZUK ZKHT VYPGN MOY LUTY CHKXL HK MOY LUTY HKXYK MOUM KYUWOYX MOYZUKMOYLM SPGRL HZ MOUM WOUPG. MOY MUSYL IULLPGN ZKHT THAMO MH THAMO UMXPZZYKYGM YGXL HZ MOY UKTE XPX GHM YBYG KYLYTVSY COUM RAMAFHB OUX LUPX,VAM MOY LYGLY HZ OPL CHKXL LIKYUX YBYKECOYKY VYWUALY COUM OY LUPX CULGHM MOY HAMWHTY HZ WAGGPGN WUSWASUMPHGL, VAM HZ U ZYYSPGN MOUM SUE PGMOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L LHAS UL PG MOUM HZ YBYKE KALLPUG.UGX HG SYUKGPGN MOUM MHTHKKHC MOYE CYKY MH UMMUWR MOY YGYTE, UGX OYUKPGNZKHT MOY OPNOYLM JAUKMYKL U WHGZPKTUMPHG HZ COUM MOYE CUGMYX MH VYSPYBY,MOY YDOUALMYX, CUBYKPGN TYG ZYSM WHTZHKMYX UGX PGLIPKPMYX.WOUIMYK DDDBPIKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYNPTYGM CUL UTHGN MOY KYLYKBYL COPWO MPSS UZMYK HGYH'WSHWR CYKY LMUMPHGYX PGUWMPBY VYOPGX LYTYGHBLR, AGXYK OYUBE UKMPSSYKEZPKY. MHCUKX MCH H'WSHWR MOY KYNPTYGM, OUBPGN USKYUXE SHLM THKY MOUGMCH OAGXKYX TYG, CUL THBYX ZHKCUKX PGMH U MKUTISYX HUMZPYSX PG MOY NUIVYMCYYG LYTYGHBLR UGX MOY RGHSS VUMMYKE, COYKY MOHALUGXL HZ TYG IYKPLOYXMOUM XUE UGX HG COPWO UG PGMYGLY, WHGWYGMKUMYX ZPKY ZKHT LYBYKUS OAGXKYXYGYTE NAGL CUL XPKYWMYX VYMCYYG HGY UGX MCH H'WSHWR.CPMOHAM THBPGN ZKHT MOUM LIHM HK ZPKPGN U LPGNSY LOHM MOY KYNPTYGM OYKYSHLM UGHMOYK MOPKX HZ PML TYG. ZKHT PG ZKHGM UGX YLIYWPUSSE ZKHT MOYKPNOM, PG MOY AGSPZMPGN LTHRY MOY NAGL VHHTYX, UGX HAM HZ MOY TELMYKPHALXHTUPG HZ LTHRY MOUM HBYKSUE MOY COHSY LIUWY PG ZKHGM, JAPWR OPLLPGNWUGGHG VUSSL UGX LSHC COPLMSPGN LOYSSL ZSYC AGWYULPGNSE. UM MPTYL, ULPZ MH USSHC MOYT U KYLIPMY, U JAUKMYK HZ UG OHAK IULLYX XAKPGN COPWOMOY WUGGHG VUSSL UGX LOYSSL USS ZSYC HBYKOYUX, VAM LHTYMPTYL LYBYKUS TYGCYKY MHKG ZKHT MOY KYNPTYGM PG U TPGAMY UGX MOY LSUPG CYKY WHGMPGAUSSEVYPGN XKUNNYX UCUE UGX MOY CHAGXYX WUKKPYX HZZ.CPMO YUWO ZKYLO VSHC SYLL UGX SYLL WOUGWY HZ SPZY KYTUPGYX ZHK MOHLY GHMEYM RPSSYX. HGY, OUBPGN MURYG HZZ OPLLOURH, WUKYZASSE SHHLYGYX MOY NUMOYKL HZ PML SPGPGN UGX XKYC MOYT MPNOMUNUPG; UGHMOYK, KAVVPGN LHTY XKE WSUE VYMCYYG OPL IUSTL, IHSPLOYXOPL VUEHGYM; UGHMOYK ZPGNYKYX MOY LMKUI UGX IASSYX MOY VAWRSY HZ OPLVUGXHSPYK, COPSY UGHMOYK LTHHMOYX UGX KYZHSXYX OPL SYN VUGXL UGX IAMOPL VHHML HG UNUPG. LHTY VAPSM SPMMSY OHALYL HZ MOY MAZML PG MOY ISHCYXNKHAGX, HK ISUPMYX VULRYML ZKHT MOY LMKUC PG MOY WHKGZPYSX. USS LYYTYXZASSE UVLHKVYX PG MOYLY IAKLAPML. COYG TYG CYKY RPSSYX HK CHAGXYX, COYGKHCL HZ LMKYMWOYKL CYGM IULM, COYG LHTY MKHHIL KYMKYUMYX, UGX COYG NKYUMTULLYL HZ MOY YGYTE WUTY PGMH BPYC MOKHANO MOY LTHRY, GH HGY IUPX UGEUMMYGMPHG MH MOYLY MOPGNL. VAM COYG HAK UKMPSSYKE HK WUBUSKE UXBUGWYX HKLHTY HZ HAK PGZUGMKE CYKY LYYG MH THBY ZHKCUKX, CHKXL HZ UIIKHBUSCYKY OYUKX HG USS LPXYL. VAM MOY SPBYSPYLM UMMYGMPHG CUL UMMKUWMYX VEHWWAKKYGWYL JAPMY UIUKM ZKHT, UGX AGWHGGYWMYX CPMO, MOY VUMMSY. PM CULUL PZ MOY TPGXL HZ MOYLY THKUSSE YDOUALMYX TYG ZHAGX KYSPYZ PG YBYKEXUE,WHTTHGISUWY HWWAKKYGWYL. U VUMMYKE HZ UKMPSSYKE CUL IULLPGN PG ZKHGM HZMOY KYNPTYGM. MOY OHKLY HZ UG UTTAGPMPHG WUKM IAM PML SYN HBYK U MKUWY."OYE, SHHR UM MOY MKUWY OHKLY!... NYM OYK SYN HAM! LOY'SS ZUSS.... UO,MOYE XHG'M LYY PM!" WUTY PXYGMPWUS LOHAML ZKHT MOY KUGRL USS USHGN MOYKYNPTYGM. UGHMOYK MPTY, NYGYKUS UMMYGMPHG CUL UMMKUWMYX VE U LTUSS VKHCGXHN, WHTPGN OYUBYG RGHCL COYGWY, COPWO MKHMMYX PG U IKYHWWAIPYX TUGGYKPG ZKHGM HZ MOY KUGRL CPMO MUPS LMPZZSE YKYWM MPSS LAXXYGSE U LOYSS ZYSSWSHLY VE, COYG PM EYSIYX, MAWRYX PML MUPS VYMCYYG PML SYNL, UGX XUKMYXULPXY. EYSSL UGX LOKPYRL HZ SUANOMYK KHLY ZKHT MOY COHSY KYNPTYGM. VAMLAWO XPLMKUWMPHGL SULMYX HGSE U THTYGM, UGX ZHK YPNOM OHAKL MOY TYG OUXVYYG PGUWMPBY, CPMOHAM ZHHX, PG WHGLMUGM ZYUK HZ XYUMO, UGX MOYPK IUSYUGX NSHHTE ZUWYL NKYC YBYK IUSYK UGX NSHHTPYK.IKPGWY UGXKYC, IUSY UGX NSHHTE SPRY YBYKEHGY PG MOY KYNPTYGM, IUWYX AIUGX XHCG ZKHT MOY VHKXYK HZ HGY IUMWO MH UGHMOYK, UM MOY YXNY HZ MOYTYUXHC VYLPXY UG HUMZPYSX, CPMO OYUX VHCYX UGX UKTL VYOPGX OPL VUWR.MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN ZHK OPT MH XH UGX GH HKXYKL MH VY NPBYG. YBYKEMOPGNCYGM HG HZ PMLYSZ. MOY RPSSYX CYKY XKUNNYX ZKHT MOY ZKHGM, MOY CHAGXYXWUKKPYX UCUE, UGX MOY KUGRL WSHLYX AI. PZ UGE LHSXPYKL KUG MH MOYKYUK MOYE KYMAKGYX PTTYXPUMYSE UGX OULMPSE. UM ZPKLM IKPGWY UGXKYC,WHGLPXYKPGN PM OPL XAME MH KHALY MOY WHAKUNY HZ MOY TYG UGX MH LYM MOYTUG YDUTISY, CUSRYX UVHAM UTHGN MOY KUGRL, VAM OY LHHG VYWUTY WHGBPGWYXMOUM MOPL CUL AGGYWYLLUKE UGX MOUM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN OY WHASX MYUWOMOYT. USS MOY IHCYKL HZ OPL LHAS, UL HZ YBYKE LHSXPYK MOYKY, CYKYAGWHGLWPHALSE VYGM HG UBHPXPGN MOY WHGMYTISUMPHG HZ MOY OHKKHKL HZ MOYPKLPMAUMPHG. OY CUSRYX USHGN MOY TYUXHC, XKUNNPGN OPL ZYYM, KALMSPGN MOYNKULL, UGX NUFPGN UM MOY XALM MOUM WHBYKYX OPL VHHML; GHC OY MHHR VPNLMKPXYL MKEPGN MH RYYI MH MOY ZHHMIKPGML SYZM HG MOY TYUXHC VE MOYTHCYKL, MOYG OY WHAGMYX OPL LMYIL, WUSWASUMPGN OHC HZMYG OY TALM CUSRZKHT HGY LMKPI MH UGHMOYK MH CUSR U TPSY, MOYG OY LMKPIIYX MOY ZSHCYKLZKHT MOY CHKTCHHX MOUM NKYC USHGN U VHAGXUKE KAM, KAVVYX MOYT PG OPLIUSTL, UGX LTYSSYX MOYPK IAGNYGM, LCYYMSE VPMMYK LWYGM. GHMOPGN KYTUPGYXHZ MOY IKYBPHAL XUE'L MOHANOML. OY MOHANOM HZ GHMOPGN. OY SPLMYGYX CPMOCYUKE YUKL MH MOY YBYK-KYWAKKPGN LHAGXL, XPLMPGNAPLOPGN MOY COPLMSYHZ ZSEPGN IKHQYWMPSYL ZKHT MOY VHHTPGN HZ MOY KYIHKML, NSUGWYX UM MOYMPKYLHTYSE ZUTPSPUK ZUWYL HZ MOY TYG HZ MOY ZPKLM VUMMUSPHG, UGXCUPMYX. "OYKY PM WHTYL... MOPL HGY PL WHTPGN HAK CUE UNUPG!" OY MOHANOM,SPLMYGPGN MH UG UIIKHUWOPGN COPLMSY PG MOY OPXXYG KYNPHG HZ LTHRY. "HGY,UGHMOYK! UNUPG! PM OUL OPM...." OY LMHIIYX UGX SHHRYX UM MOY KUGRL. "GH,PM OUL NHGY HBYK. VAM MOPL HGY OUL OPM!" UGX UNUPG OY LMUKMYX MKEPGNMH KYUWO MOY VHAGXUKE LMKPI PG LPDMYYG IUWYL. U COPFF UGX U MOAX! ZPBYIUWYL ZKHT OPT, U WUGGHG VUSS MHKY AI MOY XKE YUKMO UGX XPLUIIYUKYX. UWOPSS KUG XHCG OPL VUWR. UNUPG OY NSUGWYX UM MOY KUGRL. IKHVUVSE TUGEOUX VYYG OPM--U SUKNY WKHCX OUX NUMOYKYX GYUK MOY LYWHGX VUMMUSPHG."UXQAMUGM!" OY LOHAMYX. "HKXYK MOYT GHM MH WKHCX MHNYMOYK."MOY UXQAMUGM, OUBPGN HVYEYX MOPL PGLMKAWMPHG, UIIKHUWOYX IKPGWY UGXKYC.ZKHT MOY HMOYK LPXY U VUMMUSPHG WHTTUGXYK KHXY AI."SHHR HAM!" WUTY U ZKPNOMYGYX WKE ZKHT U LHSXPYK UGX, SPRY U VPKXCOPKKPGN PG KUIPX ZSPNOM UGX USPNOMPGN HG MOY NKHAGX, U LOYSS XKHIIYXCPMO SPMMSY GHPLY CPMOPG MCH LMYIL HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX WSHLY MH MOYVUMMUSPHG WHTTUGXYK'L OHKLY. MOY OHKLY ZPKLM, KYNUKXSYLL HZ COYMOYK PMCUL KPNOM HK CKHGN MH LOHC ZYUK, LGHKMYX, KYUKYX USTHLM MOKHCPGN MOYTUQHK, UGX NUSSHIYX ULPXY. MOY OHKLY'L MYKKHK PGZYWMYX MOY TYG."SPY XHCG!" WKPYX MOY UXQAMUGM, MOKHCPGN OPTLYSZ ZSUM HG MOY NKHAGX.IKPGWY UGXKYC OYLPMUMYX. MOY LTHRPGN LOYSS LIAG SPRY U MHI VYMCYYG OPTUGX MOY IKHLMKUMY UXQAMUGM, GYUK U CHKTCHHX ISUGM VYMCYYG MOY ZPYSX UGXMOY TYUXHC."WUG MOPL VY XYUMO?" MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, SHHRPGN CPMO U JAPMY GYC,YGBPHAL NSUGWY UM MOY NKULL, MOY CHKTCHHX, UGX MOY LMKYUTSYM HZ LTHRYMOUM WAKSYX AI ZKHT MOY KHMUMPGN VSUWR VUSS. "P WUGGHM, P XH GHM CPLOMH XPY. P SHBY SPZY--P SHBY MOPL NKULL, MOPL YUKMO, MOPL UPK...." OYMOHANOM MOPL, UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM IYHISY CYKY SHHRPGNUM OPT."PM'L LOUTYZAS, LPK!" OY LUPX MH MOY UXQAMUGM. "COUM..."OY XPX GHM ZPGPLO LIYURPGN. UM HGY UGX MOY LUTY THTYGM WUTY MOY LHAGX HZUG YDISHLPHG, U COPLMSY HZ LISPGMYKL UL ZKHT U VKYURPGN CPGXHC ZKUTY,U LAZZHWUMPGN LTYSS HZ IHCXYK, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC LMUKMYX MH HGY LPXY,KUPLPGN OPL UKT, UGX ZYSS HG OPL WOYLM. LYBYKUS HZZPWYKL KUG AI MH OPT.ZKHT MOY KPNOM LPXY HZ OPL UVXHTYG, VSHHX CUL CYSSPGN HAM TURPGN U SUKNYLMUPG HG MOY NKULL.MOY TPSPMPUTYG CPMO LMKYMWOYKL COH CYKY WUSSYX AI LMHHX VYOPGX MOYHZZPWYKL. IKPGWY UGXKYC SUE HG OPL WOYLM CPMO OPL ZUWY PG MOY NKULL,VKYUMOPGN OYUBPSE UGX GHPLPSE."COUM UKY EHA CUPMPGN ZHK? WHTY USHGN!"MOY IYULUGML CYGM AI UGX MHHR OPT VE OPL LOHASXYKL UGX SYNL, VAM OYTHUGYX IPMYHALSE UGX, YDWOUGNPGN SHHRL, MOYE LYM OPT XHCG UNUPG."IPWR OPT AI, SPZM OPT, PM'L USS MOY LUTY!" WKPYX LHTYHGY.MOYE UNUPG MHHR OPT VE MOY LOHASXYKL UGX SUPX OPT HG MOY LMKYMWOYK."UO, NHX! TE NHX! COUM PL PM? MOY LMHTUWO? MOUM TYUGL XYUMO! TENHX!"--BHPWYL UTHGN MOY HZZPWYKL CYKY OYUKX LUEPGN."PM ZSYC U OUPK'L VKYUXMO IULM TE YUK," LUPX MOY UXQAMUGM.MOY IYULUGML, UXQALMPGN MOY LMKYMWOYK MH MOYPK LOHASXYKL, LMUKMYXOAKKPYXSE USHGN MOY IUMO MOYE OUX MKHXXYG XHCG, MH MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG."RYYI PG LMYI! UO... MOHLY IYULUGML!" LOHAMYX UG HZZPWYK, LYPFPGN VEMOYPK LOHASXYKL UGX WOYWRPGN MOY IYULUGML, COH CYKY CUSRPGN AGYBYGSE UGXQHSMPGN MOY LMKYMWOYK."NYM PGMH LMYI, ZYXHK... P LUE, ZYXHK!" LUPX MOY ZHKYTHLM IYULUGM."GHC MOUM'L KPNOM!" LUPX MOY HGY VYOPGX QHEZASSE, COYG OY OUX NHM PGMHLMYI."EHAK YDWYSSYGWE! YO, IKPGWY!" LUPX MOY MKYTVSPGN BHPWY HZ MPTHROPG, COHOUX KAG AI UGX CUL SHHRPGN XHCG HG MOY LMKYMWOYK.IKPGWY UGXKYC HIYGYX OPL YEYL UGX SHHRYX AI UM MOY LIYURYK ZKHT MOYLMKYMWOYK PGMH COPWO OPL OYUX OUX LAGR XYYI UGX UNUPG OPL YEYSPXLXKHHIYX.MOY TPSPMPUTYG WUKKPYX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG VE MOYCHHX, COYKY CUNHGL CYKY LMUMPHGYX. MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG WHGLPLMYX HZMOKYY MYGML CPMO ZSUIL MAKGYX VUWR, IPMWOYX UM MOY YXNY HZ U VPKWO CHHX.PG MOY CHHX, CUNHGL UGX OHKLYL CYKY LMUGXPGN. MOY OHKLYL CYKY YUMPGNHUML ZKHT MOYPK THBUVSY MKHANOL UGX LIUKKHCL ZSYC XHCG UGX IYWRYX MOYNKUPGL MOUM ZYSS. LHTY WKHCL, LWYGMPGN VSHHX, ZSYC UTHGN MOY VPKWOMKYYL WUCPGN PTIUMPYGMSE. UKHAGX MOY MYGML, HBYK THKY MOUG ZPBY UWKYL,VSHHXLMUPGYX TYG PG BUKPHAL NUKVL LMHHX, LUM, HK SUE. UKHAGX MOY CHAGXYXLMHHX WKHCXL HZ LHSXPYK LMKYMWOYK-VYUKYKL CPMO XPLTUS UGX UMMYGMPBYZUWYL, COHT MOY HZZPWYKL RYYIPGN HKXYK MKPYX PG BUPG MH XKPBY ZKHT MOYLIHM. XPLKYNUKXPGN MOY HZZPWYKL' HKXYKL, MOY LHSXPYKL LMHHX SYUGPGNUNUPGLM MOYPK LMKYMWOYKL UGX NUFPGN PGMYGMSE, UL PZ MKEPGN MH WHTIKYOYGXMOY XPZZPWASM IKHVSYT HZ COUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY VYZHKY MOYT. ZKHT MOYMYGML WUTY GHC SHAX UGNKE WKPYL UGX GHC ISUPGMPBY NKHUGL. HWWULPHGUSSEXKYLLYKL KUG HAM MH ZYMWO CUMYK, HK MH IHPGM HAM MOHLY COH CYKY MH VYVKHANOM PG GYDM. MOY CHAGXYX TYG UCUPMPGN MOYPK MAKG HAMLPXY MOY MYGMLNKHUGYX, LPNOYX, CYIM, LWKYUTYX, LCHKY, HK ULRYX ZHK BHXRU. LHTY CYKYXYSPKPHAL. IKPGWY UGXKYC'L VYUKYKL, LMYIIPGN HBYK MOY CHAGXYX COH OUXGHM EYM VYYG VUGXUNYX, MHHR OPT, UL U KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK, WSHLY AI MHHGY HZ MOY MYGML UGX MOYKY LMHIIYX, UCUPMPGN PGLMKAWMPHGL. IKPGWY UGXKYCHIYGYX OPL YEYL UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY WHASX GHM TURY HAM COUM CUL NHPGNHG UKHAGX OPT. OY KYTYTVYKYX MOY TYUXHC, MOY CHKTCHHX, MOY ZPYSX, MOYCOPKSPGN VSUWR VUSS, UGX OPL LAXXYG KALO HZ IULLPHGUMY SHBY HZ SPZY.MCH LMYIL ZKHT OPT, SYUGPGN UNUPGLM U VKUGWO UGX MUSRPGN SHAXSE UGXUMMKUWMPGN NYGYKUS UMMYGMPHG, LMHHX U MUSS, OUGXLHTY, VSUWR-OUPKYXGHGWHTTPLLPHGYX HZZPWYK CPMO U VUGXUNYX OYUX. OY OUX VYYG CHAGXYX PG MOYOYUX UGX SYN VE VASSYML. UKHAGX OPT, YUNYKSE SPLMYGPGN MH OPL MUSR, UWKHCX HZ CHAGXYX UGX LMKYMWOYK-VYUKYKL CUL NUMOYKYX."CY RPWRYX OPT HAM ZKHT MOYKY LH MOUM OY WOAWRYX YBYKEMOPGN, CY NKUVVYXMOY RPGN OPTLYSZ!" WKPYX OY, SHHRPGN UKHAGX OPT CPMO YEYL MOUM NSPMMYKYXCPMO ZYBYK. "PZ HGSE KYLYKBYL OUX WHTY AI QALM MOYG, SUXL, MOYKYCHASXG'M OUBY VYYG GHMOPGN SYZM HZ OPT! P MYSS EHA LAKYSE..."SPRY USS MOY HMOYKL GYUK MOY LIYURYK, IKPGWY UGXKYC SHHRYX UM OPT CPMOLOPGPGN YEYL UGX YDIYKPYGWYX U LYGLY HZ WHTZHKM. "VAM PLG'M PM USS MOYLUTY GHC?" MOHANOM OY. "UGX COUM CPSS VY MOYKY, UGX COUM OUL MOYKY VYYGOYKY? COE CUL P LH KYSAWMUGM MH IUKM CPMO SPZY? MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN PGMOPL SPZY P XPX GHM UGX XH GHM AGXYKLMUGX."WOUIMYK DDDBPPHGY HZ MOY XHWMHKL WUTY HAM HZ MOY MYGM PG U VSHHXLMUPGYX UIKHG,OHSXPGN U WPNUK VYMCYYG MOY MOATV UGX SPMMSY ZPGNYK HZ HGY HZ OPL LTUSSVSHHXLMUPGYX OUGXL, LH UL GHM MH LTYUK PM. OY KUPLYX OPL OYUX UGX SHHRYXUVHAM OPT, VAM UVHBY MOY SYBYS HZ MOY CHAGXYX TYG. OY YBPXYGMSE CUGMYX USPMMSY KYLIPMY. UZMYK MAKGPGN OPL OYUX ZKHT KPNOM MH SYZM ZHK LHTY MPTY,OY LPNOYX UGX SHHRYX XHCG."USS KPNOM, PTTYXPUMYSE," OY KYISPYX MH U XKYLLYK COH IHPGMYX IKPGWYUGXKYC HAM MH OPT, UGX OY MHSX MOYT MH WUKKE OPT PGMH MOY MYGM.TAKTAKL UKHLY UTHGN MOY CHAGXYX COH CYKY CUPMPGN."PM LYYTL MOUM YBYG PG MOY GYDM CHKSX HGSE MOY NYGMKE UKY MH OUBY UWOUGWY!" KYTUKRYX HGY.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL WUKKPYX PG UGX SUPX HG U MUVSY MOUM OUX HGSE QALM VYYGWSYUKYX UGX COPWO U XKYLLYK CUL CULOPGN XHCG. IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX GHMTURY HAM XPLMPGWMSE COUM CUL PG MOUM MYGM. MOY IPMPZAS NKHUGL ZKHT USSLPXYL UGX MOY MHKMAKPGN IUPG PG OPL MOPNO, LMHTUWO, UGX VUWR XPLMKUWMYXOPT. EYL, PM CUL MOY LUTY ZSYLO,MOY LUTY WOUPK U WUGHG, MOY LPNOM HZ COPWO OUX YBYG MOYG ZPSSYX OPT CPMOOHKKHK, UL VE U IKYLYGMPTYGM.MOYKY CYKY MOKYY HIYKUMPGN MUVSYL PG MOY MYGM. MCH CYKY HWWAIPYX, UGXHG MOY MOPKX MOYE ISUWYX IKPGWY UGXKYC. ZHK U SPMMSY COPSY OY CUL SYZMUSHGY UGX PGBHSAGMUKPSE CPMGYLLYX COUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY HG MOY HMOYK MCHMUVSYL. NKAGMYX MOY MUKMUK, UGX LAXXYGSE SPZMPGN AI OPL LCUKMOELGAV-GHLYX ZUWY CPMO PML OPNO WOYYRVHGYL, UGX VUKPGN OPL COPMY MYYMO,OY VYNUG MH CKPNNSY UGX MCPMWO OPL VHXE UGX AMMYK IPYKWPGN, KPGNPGN,UGX IKHSHGNYX EYSSL. COUM UKY EHA CUPMPGN ZHK?" OY WKPYX UGNKPSE MH MOYXKYLLYKL.OPL BYKE ZPKLM, KYTHMYLM KYWHSSYWMPHGL HZ WOPSXOHHX WUTY VUWR MH IKPGWYUGXKYC'L TPGX COYG MOY XKYLLYK CPMO LSYYBYL KHSSYX AI VYNUG OULMPSE MHAGXH MOY VAMMHGL HZ OPL WSHMOYL UGX AGXKYLLYX OPT. MOY XHWMHK VYGMXHCG HBYK MOY CHAGX, ZYSM PM, UGX LPNOYX XYYISE. MOYG OY TUXY U LPNG MHLHTYHGY, UGX MOY MHKMAKPGN IUPG PG OPL UVXHTYG WUALYX IKPGWY UGXKYC MHSHLY WHGLWPHALGYLL. COYG OY WUTY MH OPTLYSZ MOY LISPGMYKYX IHKMPHGL HZOPL MOPNOVHGY OUX VYYG YDMKUWMYX, MOY MHKG ZSYLO WAM UCUE, UGX MOYCHAGX VUGXUNYX. CUMYK CUL VYPGN LIKPGRSYX HG OPL ZUWY. UL LHHG UL IKPGWYUGXKYC HIYGYX OPL YEYL, MOY XHWMHK VYGM HBYK, RPLLYX OPT LPSYGMSE HG MOYSPIL, UGX OAKKPYX UCUE.UZMYK MOY LAZZYKPGNL OY OUX VYYG YGXAKPGN, IKPGWY UGXKYC YGQHEYX UVSPLLZAS ZYYSPGN LAWO UL OY OUX GHM YDIYKPYGWYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY. USSMOY VYLM UGX OUIIPYLM THTYGML HZ OPL SPZY--YLIYWPUSSE OPL YUKSPYLMWOPSXOHHX, COYG OY ALYX MH VY AGXKYLLYX UGX IAM MH VYX, UGX COYG SYUGPGNHBYK OPT OPL GAKLY LUGN OPT MH LSYYI UGX OY, VAKEPGN OPL OYUX PG MOYIPSSHC, ZYSM OUIIE PG MOY TYKY WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ SPZY--KYMAKGYX MH OPLTYTHKE, GHM TYKYSE UL LHTYMOPGN IULM VAM UL LHTYMOPGN IKYLYGM.MOY XHWMHKL CYKY VALPSE YGNUNYX CPMO MOY CHAGXYX TUG MOY LOUIY HZ COHLYOYUX LYYTYX ZUTPSPUK MH IKPGWY UGXKYC: MOYE CYKY SPZMPGN OPT AI UGXMKEPGN MH JAPYM OPT."LOHC PM MH TY.... HO, HHO... HO! HO, HHO!" OPL ZKPNOMYGYX THUGL WHASXVY OYUKX, LAVXAYX VE LAZZYKPGN UGX VKHRYG VE LHVL.OYUKPGN MOHLY THUGL IKPGWY UGXKYC CUGMYX MH CYYI. COYMOYK VYWUALY OYCUL XEPGN CPMOHAM NSHKE, HK VYWUALY OY CUL LHKKE MH IUKM CPMO SPZY,HK VYWUALY HZ MOHLY TYTHKPYL HZ U WOPSXOHHX MOUM WHASX GHM KYMAKG, HKVYWUALY OY CUL LAZZYKPGN UGX HMOYKL CYKY LAZZYKPGN UGX MOUM TUG GYUK OPTCUL NKHUGPGN LH IPMYHALSE--OY ZYSM SPRY CYYIPGN WOPSXSPRY, RPGXSE, UGXUSTHLM OUIIE MYUKL.MOY CHAGXYX TUG CUL LOHCG OPL UTIAMUMYX SYN LMUPGYX CPMO WSHMMYX VSHHXUGX CPMO MOY VHHM LMPSS HG."HO! HO, HHO!" OY LHVVYX, SPRY U CHTUG.MOY XHWMHK COH OUX VYYG LMUGXPGN VYLPXY OPT, IKYBYGMPGN IKPGWY UGXKYCZKHT LYYPGN OPL ZUWY, THBYX UCUE."TE NHX! COUM PL MOPL? COE PL OY OYKY?" LUPX IKPGWY UGXKYC MH OPTLYSZ.PG MOY TPLYKUVSY, LHVVPGN, YGZYYVSYX TUG COHLY SYN OUX QALM VYYGUTIAMUMYX, OY KYWHNGPFYX UGUMHSY RAKUNPG. EYL, MOUM TUG PL LHTYOHC WSHLYSE UGX IUPGZASSE WHGGYWMYX CPMO TY,"MOHANOM IKPGWY UGXKYC, GHM EYM WSYUKSE NKULIPGN COUM OY LUC VYZHKY OPT."COUM PL MOY WHGGYWMPHG HZ MOUM TUG CPMO TE WOPSXOHHX UGX SPZY?" OYULRYX OPTLYSZ CPMOHAM ZPGXPGN UG UGLCYK. UGX LAXXYGSE U GYC AGYDIYWMYXTYTHKE ZKHT MOUM KYUST HZ IAKY UGX SHBPGN WOPSXOHHX IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MHOPT. OY KYTYTVYKYX GUMULOU UL OY OUX LYYG OYK ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY UM MOYVUSS PG 1810, CPMO OYK LSYGXYK GYWR UGX UKTL UGX CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYX OUIIEZUWY KYUXE ZHK KUIMAKY, UGX SHBY UGX MYGXYKGYLL ZHK OYK, LMKHGNYKUGX THKY BPBPX MOUG YBYK, UCHRY PG OPL LHAS. OY GHC KYTYTVYKYX MOYWHGGYWMPHG MOUM YDPLMYX VYMCYYG OPTLYSZ UGX MOPL TUG COH CUL XPTSENUFPGN UM OPT MOKHANO MYUKL MOUM ZPSSYX OPL LCHSSYG YEYL. OY KYTYTVYKYXYBYKEMOPGN, UGX YWLMUMPW IPME UGX SHBY ZHK MOUM TUG HBYKZSHCYX OPL OUIIEOYUKM.IKPGWY UGXKYC WHASX GH SHGNYK KYLMKUPG OPTLYSZ UGX CYIM MYGXYK SHBPGNMYUKL ZHK OPL ZYSSHC TYG, ZHK OPTLYSZ, UGX ZHK OPL HCG UGX MOYPK YKKHKL."WHTIULLPHG, SHBY HZ HAK VKHMOYKL, ZHK MOHLY COH SHBY AL UGX ZHK MOHLYCOH OUMY AL, SHBY HZ HAK YGYTPYL; EYL, MOUM SHBY COPWO NHX IKYUWOYX HGYUKMO UGX COPWO IKPGWYLL TUKE MUANOM TY UGX P XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX--MOUMPL COUM TUXY TY LHKKE MH IUKM CPMO SPZY, MOUM PL COUM KYTUPGYX ZHK TYOUX P SPBYX. VAM GHC PM PL MHH SUMY. P RGHC PM!"WOUIMYK DDDBPPPMOY MYKKPVSY LIYWMUWSY HZ MOY VUMMSYZPYSX WHBYKYX CPMO XYUX UGX CHAGXYX,MHNYMOYK CPMO MOY OYUBPGYLL HZ OPL OYUX UGX MOY GYCL MOUM LHTY MCYGMENYGYKUSL OY RGYC IYKLHGUSSE OUX VYYG RPSSYX HK CHAGXYX, UGX MOYWHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY PTIHMYGWY HZ OPL HGWY TPNOME UKT, IKHXAWYX UGAGYDIYWMYX PTIKYLLPHG HG GUIHSYHG COH ALAUSSE SPRYX MH SHHR UM MOYRPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX, MOYKYVE, OY WHGLPXYKYX, MYLMPGN OPL LMKYGNMO HZTPGX. MOPL XUE MOY OHKKPVSY UIIYUKUGWY HZ MOY VUMMSYZPYSX HBYKWUTYMOUM LMKYGNMO HZ TPGX COPWO OY MOHANOM WHGLMPMAMYX OPL TYKPM UGX OPLNKYUMGYLL. OY KHXY OAKKPYXSE ZKHT MOY VUMMSYZPYSX UGX KYMAKGYX MH MOYLOYBUKXPGH RGHSS, COYKY OY LUM HG OPL WUTILMHHS, OPL LUSSHC ZUWYLCHSSYG UGX OYUBE, OPL YEYL XPT, OPL GHLY KYX, UGX OPL BHPWY OHUKLY,PGBHSAGMUKPSE SPLMYGPGN, CPMO XHCGWULM YEYL, MH MOY LHAGXL HZ ZPKPGN.CPMO IUPGZAS XYQYWMPHG OY UCUPMYX MOY YGX HZ MOPL UWMPHG, PG COPWO OYKYNUKXYX OPTLYSZ UL U IUKMPWPIUGM UGX COPWO OY CUL AGUVSY MH UKKYLM.U IYKLHGUS, OATUG ZYYSPGN ZHK U VKPYZ THTYGM NHM MOY VYMMYK HZ MOYUKMPZPWPUS IOUGMULT HZ SPZY OY OUX LYKBYX LH SHGN. OY ZYSM PG OPL HCGIYKLHG MOY LAZZYKPGNL UGX XYUMO OY OUX CPMGYLLYX HG MOY VUMMSYZPYSX.MOY OYUBPGYLL HZ OPL OYUX UGX WOYLM KYTPGXYX OPT HZ MOY IHLLPVPSPMEHZ LAZZYKPGN UGX XYUMO ZHK OPTLYSZ. UM MOUM THTYGM OY XPX GHM XYLPKYTHLWHC, HK BPWMHKE, HK NSHKE (COUM GYYX OUX OY ZHK UGE THKY NSHKE?). MOYHGY MOPGN OY CPLOYX ZHK CUL KYLM, MKUGJAPSSPME, UGX ZKYYXHT. VAM COYG OYOUX VYYG HG MOY LYTYGHBLR OYPNOML MOY UKMPSSYKE WHTTUGXYK OUX IKHIHLYXMH OPT MH VKPGN LYBYKUS VUMMYKPYL HZ UKMPSSYKE AI MH MOHLY OYPNOML MHLMKYGNMOYG MOY ZPKY HG MOY KALLPUG MKHHIL WKHCXYX PG ZKHGM HZ RGEUFRHBH.GUIHSYHG OUX ULLYGMYX UGX OUX NPBYG HKXYKL MOUM GYCL LOHASX VY VKHANOMMH OPT HZ MOY YZZYWM MOHLY VUMMYKPYL IKHXAWYX.UG UXQAMUGM WUTY GHC MH PGZHKT OPT MOUM MOY ZPKY HZ MCH OAGXKYX NAGLOUX VYYG WHGWYGMKUMYX HG MOY KALLPUGL, UL OY OUX HKXYKYX, VAM MOUM MOYELMPSS OYSX MOYPK NKHAGX."HAK ZPKY PL THCPGN MOYT XHCG VE KHCL, VAM LMPSS MOYE OHSX HG," LUPX MOYUXQAMUGM."MOYE CUGM THKY!..." LUPX GUIHSYHG PG U OHUKLY BHPWY."LPKY?" ULRYX MOY UXQAMUGM COH OUX GHM OYUKX MOY KYTUKR."MOYE CUGM THKY!" WKHURYX GUIHSYHG ZKHCGPGN. "SYM MOYT OUBY PM!"YBYG VYZHKY OY NUBY MOUM HKXYK MOY MOPGN OY XPX GHM XYLPKY, UGX ZHKCOPWO OY NUBY MOY HKXYK HGSE VYWUALY OY MOHANOM PM CUL YDIYWMYX HZ OPT,CUL VYPGN XHGY. UGX OY ZYSS VUWR PGMH MOUM UKMPZPWPUS KYUST HZ PTUNPGUKENKYUMGYLL, UGX UNUPG--UL U OHKLY CUSRPGN U MKYUXTPSS MOPGRL PM PL XHPGNLHTYMOPGN ZHK PMLYSZ--OY LAVTPLLPBYSE ZASZPSSYX MOY WKAYS, LUX, NSHHTE,UGX PGOATUG KHSY IKYXYLMPGYX ZHK OPT.UGX GHM ZHK MOUM XUE UGX OHAK USHGY CYKY MOY TPGX UGX WHGLWPYGWYXUKRYGYX HZ MOPL TUG HG COHT MOY KYLIHGLPVPSPME ZHK COUM CUL OUIIYGPGNSUE THKY MOUG HG USS MOY HMOYKL COH MHHR IUKM PG PM. GYBYK MH MOY YGXHZ OPL SPZY WHASX OY AGXYKLMUGX NHHXGYLL, VYUAME, HK MKAMO, HK MOYLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ OPL UWMPHGL COPWO CYKY MHH WHGMKUKE MH NHHXGYLL UGXMKAMO, MHH KYTHMY ZKHT YBYKEMOPGN OATUG, ZHK OPT YBYK MH VY UVSY MHNKULI MOYPK TYUGPGN. UM UGETHTYGM MOYLY TYG TPNOM OUBY VYYG LYPFYX CPMO OHKKHK UM COUM MOYE CYKYXHPGN UGX TPNOM OUBY MOKHCG AI YBYKEMOPGN UGX KAG UCUE UGECOYKY.VAM MOHANO MHCUKX MOY YGX HZ MOY VUMMSY MOY TYG ZYSM USS MOY OHKKHK HZCOUM MOYE CYKY XHPGN, MOHANO MOYE CHASX OUBY VYYG NSUX MH SYUBY HZZ,LHTY PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY, TELMYKPHAL IHCYK WHGMPGAYX MH WHGMKHS MOYT, UGXMOYE LMPSS VKHANOM AI MOY WOUKNYL, SHUXYX, UPTYX, UGX UIISPYX MOY TUMWO,MOHANO HGSE HGY UKMPSSYKETUG LAKBPBYX HAM HZ YBYKE MOKYY, UGX MOHANOMOYE LMATVSYX UGX IUGMYX CPMO ZUMPNAY, IYKLIPKPGN UGX LMUPGYX CPMO VSHHXUGX IHCXYK. HGSE COYG CY OUBY UXTPMMYXMOY WHGWYIMPHG HZ MOY PGZPGPMYSE LTUSS, UGX MOY KYLASMPGN NYHTYMKPWUSIKHNKYLLPHG CPMO U WHTTHG KUMPH HZ HGY MYGMO, UGX OUBY ZHAGX MOY LAT HZMOPL IKHNKYLLPHG MH PGZPGPME, XH CY KYUWO U LHSAMPHG HZ MOY IKHVSYT.U THXYKG VKUGWO HZ TUMOYTUMPWL OUBPGN UWOPYBYX MOY UKM HZ XYUSPGN CPMOMOY PGZPGPMYSE LTUSS WUG GHC EPYSX LHSAMPHGL PG HMOYK THKY WHTISYDIKHVSYTL HZ THMPHG COPWO ALYX MH UIIYUK PGLHSAVSY.MOPL THXYKG VKUGWO HZ TUMOYTUMPWL, AGRGHCG MH MOY UGWPYGML, COYG XYUSPGNCPMO IKHVSYTL HZ THMPHG UXTPML MOY WHGWYIMPHG HZ MOY PGZPGPMYSE LTUSS,UGX LH WHGZHKTL MH MOY WOPYZ WHGXPMPHG HZ THMPHG (UVLHSAMY WHGMPGAPME)UGX MOYKYVE WHKKYWML MOY PGYBPMUVSY YKKHK COPWO MOY OATUG TPGX WUGGHMUBHPX COYG PM XYUSL CPMO LYIUKUMY YSYTYGML HZ THMPHG PGLMYUX HZYDUTPGPGN WHGMPGAHAL THMPHG.PG LYYRPGN MOY SUCL HZ OPLMHKPWUS THBYTYGM QALM MOY LUTY MOPGN OUIIYGL.MOY THBYTYGM HZ OATUGPME, UKPLPGN UL PM XHYL ZKHT PGGATYKUVSY UKVPMKUKEOATUG CPSSL, PL WHGMPGAHAL.MH AGXYKLMUGX MOY SUCL HZ MOPL WHGMPGAHAL THBYTYGM PL MOY UPT HZOPLMHKE. COYG OUXMOUM JAYLMPHG VYYG LYMMSYX? UM XKPLLU UGX UM LTHSYGLR UGX THLMIUSIUVSE HZ USS HG MOY MCYGME-ZHAKMO HZ UANALM UM LOYBUKXPGH UGX HGMOY MCYGME-LPDMO UM VHKHXPGH, UGX YUWO XUE UGX OHAK UGX TPGAMY HZ MOYKYMKYUM ZKHT VHKHXPGH MH ZPSP.WOUIMYK PPPCOYG YKTHSHB, OUBPGN VYYG LYGM VE RAMAFHB MH PGLIYWM MOY IHLPMPHG, MHSXMOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH ZPNOM MOYKY VYZHKY THLWHCUGX MOUM MOYE TALM KYMKYUM, RAMAFHB SHHRYX UM OPT PG LPSYGWY."NPBY TY EHAK OUGX," LUPX OY UGX, MAKGPGN PM HBYK LH UL MH ZYYS MOYIASLY, UXXYX: "EHA UKY GHM CYSS, TE XYUK ZYSSHC. MOPGR COUM EHA UKYLUEPGN!"RAMAFHB WHASX GHM EYM UXTPM MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ KYMKYUMPGN VYEHGX THLWHCCPMOHAM U VUMMSY.HG MOY IHRSHGGE OPSS, ZHAK TPSYL ZKHT MOY XHKHNHTPSHB NUMY HZ THLWHC,RAMAFHB NHM HAM HZ OPL WUKKPUNY UGX LUM XHCG HG U VYGWO VE MOY KHUXLPXY.U NKYUM WKHCX HZ NYGYKUSL NUMOYKYX KHAGX OPT, UGX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, COHOUX WHTY HAM ZKHT THLWHC, QHPGYX MOYT. MOHANO MOYE OUXGHM VYYG LATTHGYX ZHK MOY IAKIHLY, UGX MOHANO PM CUL GHM LH WUSSYX, MOYEUSS ZYSM MOUM MOPL CUL KYUSSE U WHAGWPS HZ CUK. MOY WHGBYKLUMPHGL USSXYUSM CPMO IAVSPW JAYLMPHGL. PZ UGEHGY NUBY HK ULRYX ZHK IYKLHGUSGYCL, PM CUL XHGY PG U COPLIYK UGX MOYE PTTYXPUMYSE KYBYKMYX MH NYGYKUSTUMMYKL. GH QHRYL, HK SUANOMYK, HK LTPSYL YBYG, CYKY LYYG UTHGN USSMOYLY TYG. UGX USS MOYLY NKHAIL, COPSY MUSRPGNUTHGN MOYTLYSBYL, MKPYX MH RYYI GYUK MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ (COHLYVYGWO ZHKTYX MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY NUMOYKPGN) UGX MH LIYUR LH MOUM OY TPNOMHBYKOYUK MOYT. MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ SPLMYGYX MH COUM CUL VYPGN LUPXUGX LHTYMPTYL ULRYX MOYT MH KYIYUM MOYPK KYTUKRL, VAM XPX GHM OPTLYSZMURY IUKM PG MOY WHGBYKLUMPHGL HK YDIKYLL UGE HIPGPHG. UZMYK OYUKPGNCOUM CUL VYPGN LUPX VE HGY HK HMOYK HZ MOYLY NKHAIL OY NYGYKUSSE MAKGYXUCUE CPMO UG UPK HZ XPLUIIHPGMTYGM, UL MOHANO MOYE CYKY GHM LIYURPGN HZUGEMOPGN OY CPLOYX MH OYUK. LHTY XPLWALLYX MOY IHLPMPHG MOUM OUX VYYGWOHLYG, WKPMPWPFPGN GHM MOY IHLPMPHG PMLYSZ LH TAWO UL MOY TYGMUSWUIUWPME HZ MOHLY COH OUX WOHLYG PM. HMOYKL UKNAYX MOUM U TPLMURY OUXVYYG TUXY YUKSPYK UGX MOUM U VUMMSY LOHASX OUBY VYYG ZHANOM MCH XUELVYZHKY. HMOYKL UNUPG LIHRY HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ LUSUTUGWU, COPWO CULXYLWKPVYX VE WKHLUKM, U GYCSE UKKPBYX ZKYGWOTUG PG U LIUGPLO AGPZHKT.(MOPL ZKYGWOTUG UGX HGY HZ MOY NYKTUG IKPGWYL LYKBPGN CPMO MOY KALLPUGUKTE CYKY XPLWALLPGN MOY LPYNY HZ LUKUNHLLU UGX WHGLPXYKPGN MOYIHLLPVPSPME HZ XYZYGXPGN THLWHC PG U LPTPSUK TUGGYK.) WHAGM KHLMHIWOPGCUL MYSSPGN U ZHAKMO NKHAI MOUM OY CUL IKYIUKYX MH XPY CPMO MOY WPMEMKUPG VUGXL AGXYK MOY CUSSL HZ MOY WUIPMUS, VAM MOUM OY LMPSS WHASX GHMOYSI KYNKYMMPGN OUBPGN VYYG SYZM PG PNGHKUGWY HZ COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN, UGXMOUM OUX OY RGHCG PM LHHGYK MOPGNL CHASX OUBY VYYG XPZZYKYGM.... UZPZMO NKHAI, XPLISUEPGN MOY IKHZAGXPME HZ MOYPK LMKUMYNPW IYKWYIMPHGL,XPLWALLYX MOY XPKYWMPHG MOY MKHHIL CHASX GHC OUBY MH MURY. U LPDMO NKHAICUL MUSRPGN UVLHSAMY GHGLYGLY. RAMAFHB'L YDIKYLLPHG NKYC THKY UGX THKYIKYHWWAIPYX UGX NSHHTE. ZKHT USS MOPL MUSR OY LUC HGSE HGY MOPGN: MOUMMH XYZYGX THLWHC CUL U IOELPWUS PTIHLLPVPSPME PG MOY ZASS TYUGPGN HZMOHLY CHKXL, MOUM PL MH LUE, LH AMMYKSE PTIHLLPVSY MOUM PZ UGE LYGLYSYLLWHTTUGXYK CYKY MH NPBY HKXYKL MH ZPNOM, WHGZALPHG CHASX KYLASM VAM MOYVUMMSY CHASX LMPSS GHM MURY ISUWY. PM CHASX GHM MURY ISUWY VYWUALY MOYWHTTUGXYKL GHM TYKYSE USS KYWHNGPFYX MOY IHLPMPHG MH VY PTIHLLPVSY, VAMPG MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHGL CYKY HGSE XPLWALLPGN COUM CHASX OUIIYG UZMYK PMLPGYBPMUVSY UVUGXHGTYGM. OHC WHASX MOY WHTTUGXYKL SYUX MOYPK MKHHIL MHU ZPYSX HZ VUMMSY MOYE WHGLPXYKYX PTIHLLPVSY MH OHSX? MOY SHCYK-NKUXYHZZPWYKL UGX YBYG MOY LHSXPYKL (COH MHH KYULHG) USLH WHGLPXYKYX MOYIHLPMPHG PTIHLLPVSY UGX MOYKYZHKY WHASX GHM NH MH ZPNOM, ZASSE WHGBPGWYXUL MOYE CYKY HZ XYZYUM. PZ VYGGPNLYG PGLPLMYX HG MOY IHLPMPHG VYPGNXYZYGXYX UGX HMOYKL LMPSS XPLWALLYX PM, MOY JAYLMPHG CUL GH SHGNYKPTIHKMUGM PG PMLYSZ VAM HGSE UL U IKYMYDM ZHK XPLIAMYL UGX PGMKPNAY.MOPL RAMAFHB RGYC CYSS.VYGGPNLYG, COH OUX WOHLYG MOY IHLPMPHG, CUKTSE XPLISUEYX OPL KALLPUGIUMKPHMPLT (RAMAFHB WHASX GHM SPLMYG MH MOPL CPMOHAM CPGWPGN) VEPGLPLMPGN MOUM THLWHC TALM VY XYZYGXYX. OPL UPT CUL UL WSYUK UL XUESPNOMMH RAMAFHB: PZ MOY XYZYGLY ZUPSYX, MH MOKHC MOY VSUTY HG RAMAFHB COH OUXVKHANOM MOY UKTE UL ZUK UL MOY LIUKKHC OPSSL CPMOHAM NPBPGN VUMMSY; PZPM LAWWYYXYX, MH WSUPT MOY LAWWYLL UL OPL HCG; HK PZ VUMMSY CYKY GHMNPBYG, MH WSYUK OPTLYSZ HZ MOY WKPTY HZ UVUGXHGPGN THLWHC. VAM MOPLPGMKPNAY XPX GHM GHC HWWAIE MOY HSX TUG'L TPGX. HGY MYKKPVSY JAYLMPHGUVLHKVYX OPT UGX MH MOUM JAYLMPHG OY OYUKX GH KYISE ZKHT UGEHGY. MOYJAYLMPHG ZHK OPT GHC CUL: "OUBY P KYUSSE USSHCYX GUIHSYHG MH KYUWOTHLWHC, UGX COYG XPX P XH LH? COYG CUL PM XYWPXYX? WUG PM OUBY VYYGEYLMYKXUE COYG P HKXYKYX ISUMHB MH KYMKYUM, HK CUL PM MOY YBYGPGNVYZHKY, COYG P OUX U GUI UGX MHSX VYGGPNLYG MH PLLAY HKXYKL? HK CUL PMYUKSPYK LMPSS?... COYG, COYG CUL MOPL MYKKPVSY UZZUPK XYWPXYX? THLWHCTALM VY UVUGXHGYX. MOY UKTE TALM KYMKYUM UGX MOY HKXYK MH XH LH TALMVY NPBYG." MH NPBY MOUM MYKKPVSY HKXYK LYYTYX MH OPT YJAPBUSYGM MHKYLPNGPGN MOY WHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTE. UGX GHM HGSE XPX OY SHBY IHCYK MHCOPWO OY CUL UWWALMHTYX (MOY OHGHAKL UCUKXYX MH IKPGWY IKHFHKHBLRP,AGXYK COHT OY OUX LYKBYX PG MAKRYE, NUSSYX OPT), VAM OY CUL WHGBPGWYXMOUM OY CUL XYLMPGYX MH LUBY KALLPU UGX MOUM MOUM CUL COE, UNUPGLMMOY YTIYKHK'L CPLO UGX VE MOY CPSS HZ MOY IYHISY, OY OUX VYYG WOHLYGWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ. OY CUL WHGBPGWYX MOUM OY USHGY WHASX TUPGMUPGWHTTUGX HZ MOY UKTE PG MOYLY XPZZPWASM WPKWATLMUGWYL, UGX MOUM PG USSMOY CHKSX OY USHGY WHASX YGWHAGMYK MOY PGBPGWPVSY GUIHSYHG CPMOHAM ZYUK,UGX OY CUL OHKKPZPYX UM MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY HKXYK OY OUX MH PLLAY. VAMLHTYMOPGN OUX MH VY XYWPXYX, UGX MOYLY WHGBYKLUMPHGL UKHAGX OPT COPWOCYKY ULLATPGN MHH ZKYY U WOUKUWMYK TALM VY LMHIIYX.OY WUSSYX MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM NYGYKUSL MH OPT."TE OYUX, VY PM NHHX HK VUX, TALM XYIYGX HG PMLYSZ," LUPX OY, KPLPGNZKHT MOY VYGWO, UGX OY KHXY MH ZPSP COYKY OPL WUKKPUNYL CYKY CUPMPGN.WOUIMYK PBMOY WHAGWPS HZ CUK VYNUG MH ULLYTVSY UM MCH PG MOY UZMYKGHHG PG MOYVYMMYK UGX KHHTPYK IUKM HZ UGXKYC LUBHLMEUGHB'L OAM. MOY TYG, CHTYG, UGXWOPSXKYG HZ MOY SUKNY IYULUGM ZUTPSE WKHCXYX PGMH MOY VUWR KHHT UWKHLLMOY IULLUNY. HGSE TUSULOU, UGXKYC'L LPD-EYUK-HSX NKUGXXUANOMYK COHTOPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL OUX IYMMYX UGX MH COHT OY OUX NPBYG U SATI HZ LANUKCOPSY XKPGRPGN OPL MYU, KYTUPGYX HG MOY MHI HZ MOY VKPWR HBYG PG MOYSUKNYK KHHT. TUSULOU SHHRYX XHCG ZKHT MOY HBYG CPMO LOE XYSPNOM UM MOYZUWYL, AGPZHKTL, UGX XYWHKUMPHGL HZ MOY NYGYKUSL, COH HGY UZMYK UGHMOYKWUTY PGMH MOY KHHT UGX LUM XHCG HG MOY VKHUX VYGWOYL PG MOY WHKGYKAGXYK MOY PWHGL. "NKUGXXUX" OPTLYSZ, UL TUSULOU PG OYK HCG TPGX WUSSYXRAMAFHB, LUM UIUKM PG U XUKR WHKGYK VYOPGX MOY HBYG. OY LUM, LAGR XYYIPG U ZHSXPGN UKTWOUPK, UGX WHGMPGAUSSE WSYUKYX OPL MOKHUM UGX IASSYX UMMOY WHSSUK HZ OPL WHUM COPWO, MOHANO PM CUL AGVAMMHGYX, LMPSS LYYTYXMH IPGWO OPL GYWR.
