OPL UXQAMUGMRUELUKHB CUL UVHAM MH XKUC VUWR MOY WAKMUPG HZ MOY CPGXHC ZUWPGNRAMAFHB, VAM MOY SUMMYK THBYX OPL OUGX UGNKPSE UGX RUELUKHB AGXYKLMHHXMOUM OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL XPX GHM CPLO OPL ZUWY MH VY LYYG.KHAGX MOY IYULUGM'L XYUS MUVSY, HG COPWO SUE TUIL, ISUGL, IYGWPSL, UGXIUIYKL, LH TUGE IYHISY NUMOYKYX MOUM MOY HKXYKSPYL VKHANOM PG UGHMOYKVYGWO UGX IAM PM VYLPXY MOY MUVSY. YKTHSHB, RUELUKHB, UGX MHSS, COH OUXQALM UKKPBYX, LUM XHCG HG MOPL VYGWO. PG MOY ZHKYTHLM ISUWY, PTTYXPUMYSEAGXYK MOY PWHGL, LUM VUKWSUE XY MHSSE, OPL OPNO ZHKYOYUX TYKNPGN PGMHOPL VUSX WKHCG. OY OUX U LM. NYHKNY'L WKHLL KHAGX OPL GYWR UGX SHHRYXIUSY UGX PSS. OY OUX VYYG ZYBYKPLO ZHK MCH XUEL UGX CUL GHC LOPBYKPGNUGX PG IUPG. VYLPXY OPT LUM ABUKHB, COH CPMO KUIPX NYLMPWASUMPHGL CULNPBPGN OPT LHTY PGZHKTUMPHG, LIYURPGN PG SHC MHGYL UL MOYE USS XPX.WOAVVE SPMMSY XHROMAKHB CUL SPLMYGPGN UMMYGMPBYSE CPMO YEYVKHCLKUPLYX UGX UKTL ZHSXYX HG OPL LMHTUWO. HG MOY HMOYK LPXY LUM WHAGMHLMYKTUGG-MHSLMHE, LYYTPGNSE UVLHKVYX PG OPL HCG MOHANOML. OPL VKHUXOYUX CPMO PML VHSX ZYUMAKYL UGX NSPMMYKPGN YEYL CUL KYLMPGN HG OPL OUGX.KUYBLRP, MCPMWOPGN ZHKCUKX MOY VSUWR OUPK HG OPL MYTISYL UL CUL OPLOUVPM, NSUGWYX GHC UM RAMAFHB UGX GHC UM MOY XHHK CPMO U SHHR HZPTIUMPYGWY. RHGHBGPMLEG'L ZPKT, OUGXLHTY, UGX RPGXSE ZUWY CUL SPM AI VEU MYGXYK, LSE LTPSY. OPL NSUGWY TYM TUSULOU'L, UGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPLYEYL WUALYX MOY SPMMSY NPKS MH LTPSY.MOYE CYKY USS CUPMPGN ZHK VYGGPNLYG, COH HG MOY IKYMYDM HZ PGLIYWMPGNMOY IHLPMPHG CUL ZPGPLOPGN OPL LUBHKE XPGGYK. MOYE CUPMYX ZHK OPT ZKHTZHAK MPSS LPD H'WSHWR UGX XPX GHM VYNPG MOYPK XYSPVYKUMPHGL USS MOUMMPTY VAM MUSRYX PG SHC MHGYL HZ HMOYK TUMMYKL.HGSE COYG VYGGPNLYG OUX YGMYKYX MOY OAM XPX RAMAFHB SYUBY OPL WHKGYK UGXXKUC MHCUKX MOY MUVSY, VAM GHM GYUK YGHANO ZHK MOY WUGXSYL MOUM OUX VYYGISUWYX MOYKY MH SPNOM AI OPL ZUWY.VYGGPNLYG HIYGYX MOY WHAGWPS CPMO MOY JAYLMPHG: "UKY CY MH UVUGXHGKALLPU'L UGWPYGM UGX LUWKYX WUIPMUS CPMOHAM U LMKANNSY, HK UKY CY MHXYZYGX PM?" U IKHSHGNYX UGX NYGYKUS LPSYGWY ZHSSHCYX. MOYKY CUL U ZKHCGHG YBYKE ZUWY UGX HGSE RAMAFHB'L UGNKE NKAGML UGX HWWULPHGUS WHANOVKHRY MOY LPSYGWY. USS YEYL CYKY NUFPGN UM OPT. TUSULOU MHH SHHRYX UM"NKUGXXUX." LOY CUL GYUKYLM MH OPT UGX LUC OHC OPL ZUWY IAWRYKYX; OYLYYTYX UVHAM MH WKE, VAM MOPL XPX GHM SULM SHGN."KALLPU'L UGWPYGM UGX LUWKYX WUIPMUS!" OY LAXXYGSE LUPX, KYIYUMPGNVYGGPNLYG'L CHKXL PG UG UGNKE BHPWY UGX MOYKYVE XKUCPGN UMMYGMPHG MH MOYZUSLY GHMY PG MOYT. "USSHC TY MH MYSS EHA, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, MOUM MOUMJAYLMPHG OUL GH TYUGPGN ZHK U KALLPUG." (OY SAKWOYX OPL OYUBE VHXEZHKCUKX.) "LAWO U JAYLMPHG WUGGHM VY IAM; PM PL LYGLYSYLL! MOY JAYLMPHGP OUBY ULRYX MOYLY NYGMSYTYG MH TYYM MH XPLWALL PL U TPSPMUKE HGY.MOY JAYLMPHG PL MOUM HZ LUBPGN KALLPU. PL PM VYMMYK MH NPBY AI THLWHCCPMOHAM U VUMMSY, HK VE UWWYIMPGN VUMMSY MH KPLR SHLPGN MOY UKTE UL CYSSUL THLWHC? MOUM PL MOY JAYLMPHG HG COPWO P CUGM EHAK HIPGPHG," UGX OYLUGR VUWR PG OPL WOUPK.MOY XPLWALLPHG VYNUG. VYGGPNLYG XPX GHM EYM WHGLPXYK OPL NUTY SHLM.UXTPMMPGN MOY BPYC HZ VUKWSUE UGX HMOYKL MOUM U XYZYGLPBY VUMMSY UMZPSP CUL PTIHLLPVSY, VAM PTVAYX CPMO KALLPUG IUMKPHMPLT UGX MOY SHBYHZ THLWHC, OY IKHIHLYX MH THBY MKHHIL ZKHT MOY KPNOM MH MOY SYZM ZSUGRXAKPGN MOY GPNOM UGX UMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO KPNOM ZSUGR MOY ZHSSHCPGN XUE.HIPGPHGL CYKY XPBPXYX, UGX UKNATYGML CYKY UXBUGWYX ZHK UGX UNUPGLM MOUMIKHQYWM. YKTHSHB, XHROMAKHB, UGX KUYBLRP UNKYYX CPMO VYGGPNLYG. COYMOYKZYYSPGN PM GYWYLLUKE MH TURY U LUWKPZPWY VYZHKY UVUGXHGPGN MOY WUIPMUSHK NAPXYX VE HMOYK, IYKLHGUS WHGLPXYKUMPHGL, MOYLY NYGYKUSL LYYTYX GHMMH AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOPL WHAGWPS WHASX GHM USMYK MOY PGYBPMUVSY WHAKLYHZ YBYGML UGX MOUM THLWHC CUL PG YZZYWM USKYUXE UVUGXHGYX. MOY HMOYKNYGYKUSL, OHCYBYK, AGXYKLMHHX PM UGX, SYUBPGN ULPXY MOY JAYLMPHG HZTHLWHC, LIHRY HZ MOY XPKYWMPHG MOY UKTE LOHASX MURY PG PML KYMKYUM.TUSULOU, COH RYIM OYK YEYL ZPDYX HG COUM CUL NHPGN HG VYZHKY OYK,AGXYKLMHHX MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY WHAGWPS XPZZYKYGMSE. PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUMPM CUL HGSE U IYKLHGUS LMKANNSY VYMCYYG "NKUGXXUX" UGX "SHGN-WHUM" ULLOY MYKTYX VYGGPNLYG. LOY LUC MOUM MOYE NKYC LIPMYZAS COYG MOYE LIHRY MHHGY UGHMOYK, UGX PG OYK OYUKM LOY LPXYX CPMO "NKUGXXUX." PG MOY TPXLM HZMOY WHGBYKLUMPHG LOY GHMPWYX "NKUGXXUX" NPBY VYGGPNLYG U JAPWR, LAVMSYNSUGWY, UGX MOYG MH OYK QHEL OY LUC MOUM "NKUGXXUX" LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH"SHGN-WHUM" COPWO LYMMSYX OPT. VYGGPNLYG LAXXYGSE KYXXYGYX UGX IUWYXUGNKPSE AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT. COUM LH UZZYWMYX OPT CUL RAMAFHB'L WUSTUGX JAPYM WHTTYGM HG MOY UXBUGMUNY HK XPLUXBUGMUNY HZ VYGGPNLYG'LIKHIHLUS MH THBY MKHHIL VE GPNOM ZKHT MOY KPNOM MH MOY SYZM ZSUGR MHUMMUWR MOY ZKYGWO KPNOM CPGN."NYGMSYTYG," LUPX RAMAFHB, "P WUGGHM UIIKHBY HZ MOY WHAGM'L ISUG. THBPGNMKHHIL PG WSHLY IKHDPTPME MH UG YGYTE PL USCUEL XUGNYKHAL, UGX TPSPMUKEOPLMHKE LAIIHKML MOUM BPYC. ZHK PGLMUGWY..." RAMAFHB LYYTYX MH KYZSYWM,LYUKWOPGN ZHK UG YDUTISY, MOYG CPMO U WSYUK, GUPBY SHHR UM VYGGPNLYG OYUXXYX: "HO EYL; MURY MOY VUMMSY HZ ZKPYXSUGX, COPWO P MOPGR MOY WHAGMCYSS KYTYTVYKL, UGX COPWO CUL... GHM ZASSE LAWWYLLZAS, HGSE VYWUALY HAKMKHHIL CYKY KYUKKUGNYX MHH GYUK MOY YGYTE..."MOYKY ZHSSHCYX U THTYGMUKE IUALY, COPWO LYYTYX BYKE SHGN MH MOYT USS.MOY XPLWALLPHG KYWHTTYGWYX, VAM IUALYL ZKYJAYGMSE HWWAKKYX UGX MOYE USSZYSM MOUM MOYKY CUL GH THKY MH VY LUPX.XAKPGN HGY HZ MOYLY IUALYL RAMAFHB OYUBYX U XYYI LPNO UL PZ IKYIUKPGN MHLIYUR. MOYE USS SHHRYX UM OPT."CYSS, NYGMSYTYG, P LYY MOUM PM PL P COH CPSS OUBY MH IUE ZHK MOY VKHRYGWKHWRYKE," LUPX OY, UGX KPLPGN LSHCSE OY THBYX MH MOY MUVSY. "NYGMSYTYG,P OUBY OYUKX EHAK BPYCL. LHTY HZ EHA CPSS GHM UNKYY CPMO TY. VAM P," OYIUALYX, "VE MOY UAMOHKPME YGMKALMYX MH TY VE TE LHBYKYPNG UGX WHAGMKE,HKXYK U KYMKYUM."UZMYK MOUM MOY NYGYKUSL VYNUG MH XPLIYKLY CPMO MOY LHSYTGPME UGXWPKWATLIYWM LPSYGWY HZ IYHISY COH UKY SYUBPGN, UZMYK U ZAGYKUS.LHTY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL, PG SHC MHGYL UGX PG U LMKUPG BYKE XPZZYKYGM ZKHTMOY CUE MOYE OUX LIHRYG XAKPGN MOY WHAGWPS, WHTTAGPWUMYX LHTYMOPGN MHMOYPK WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.TUSULOU, COH OUX SHGN VYYG YDIYWMYX ZHK LAIIYK, WSPTVYX WUKYZASSEVUWRCUKXL XHCG ZKHT MOY HBYG, OYK VUKY SPMMSY ZYYM WUMWOPGN UM PMLIKHQYWMPHGL, UGX LSPIIPGN VYMCYYG MOY SYNL HZ MOY NYGYKUSL LOY XUKMYXHAM HZ MOY KHHT.COYG OY OUX XPLTPLLYX MOY NYGYKUSL RAMAFHB LUM U SHGN MPTY CPMO OPLYSVHCL HG MOY MUVSY, MOPGRPGN USCUEL HZ MOY LUTY MYKKPVSY JAYLMPHG:"COYG, COYG XPX MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ THLWHC VYWHTY PGYBPMUVSY? COYG CULMOUM XHGY COPWO LYMMSYX MOY TUMMYK? UGX COH CUL MH VSUTY ZHK PM?""P XPX GHM YDIYWM MOPL," LUPX OY MH OPL UXQAMUGM LWOGYPXYK COYG MOYSUMMYK WUTY PG SUMY MOUM GPNOM. "P XPX GHM YDIYWM MOPL! P XPX GHM MOPGRMOPL CHASX OUIIYG.""EHA LOHASX MURY LHTY KYLM, EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLL," KYISPYX LWOGYPXYK."VAM GH! MOYE LOUSS YUM OHKLYZSYLO EYM, SPRY MOY MAKRL!" YDWSUPTYXRAMAFHB CPMOHAM KYISEPGN, LMKPRPGN MOY MUVSY CPMO OPL IHXNE ZPLM. "MOYELOUSS MHH, PZ HGSE..."WOUIMYK BUM MOUM BYKE MPTY, PG WPKWATLMUGWYL YBYG THKY PTIHKMUGM MOUG KYMKYUMPGNCPMOHAM U VUMMSY, GUTYSE MOY YBUWAUMPHG UGX VAKGPGN HZ THLWHC,KHLMHIWOPG, COH PL ALAUSSE KYIKYLYGMYX UL VYPGN MOY PGLMPNUMHK HZ MOUMYBYGM, UWMYX PG UG USMHNYMOYK XPZZYKYGM TUGGYK ZKHT RAMAFHB.UZMYK MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH MOY UVUGXHGTYGM UGX VAKGPGN HZ THLWHC CULUL PGYBPMUVSY UL MOY KYMKYUM HZ MOY UKTE VYEHGX THLWHC CPMOHAM ZPNOMPGN.YBYKE KALLPUG TPNOM OUBY IKYXPWMYX PM, GHM VE KYULHGPGN VAM VE MOYZYYSPGN PTISUGMYX PG YUWO HZ AL UGX PG HAK ZUMOYKL.MOY LUTY MOPGN MOUM MHHR ISUWY PG THLWHC OUX OUIIYGYX PG USS MOY MHCGLUGX BPSSUNYL HG KALLPUG LHPS VYNPGGPGN CPMO LTHSYGLR, CPMOHAM MOYIUKMPWPIUMPHG HZ WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG UGX OPL VKHUXLOYYML. MOY IYHISYUCUPMYX MOY YGYTE AGWHGWYKGYXSE, XPX GHM KPHM HK VYWHTY YDWPMYX HK MYUKUGEHGY MH IPYWYL, VAM ZUWYX PML ZUMY, ZYYSPGN CPMOPG PM MOY LMKYGNMO MHZPGX COUM PM LOHASX XH UM MOUM THLM XPZZPWASM THTYGM. UGX UL LHHG UL MOYYGYTE XKYC GYUK MOY CYUSMOE WSULLYL CYGM UCUE UVUGXHGPGN MOYPK IKHIYKME,COPSY MOY IHHKYK KYTUPGYX UGX VAKGYX UGX XYLMKHEYX COUM CUL SYZM.MOY WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM MOPL CHASX VY LH UGX CHASX USCUEL VY LH CUL UGXPL IKYLYGM PG MOY OYUKM HZ YBYKE KALLPUG. UGX U WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOPL,UGX U ZHKYVHXPGN MOUM THLWHC CHASX VY MURYG, CUL IKYLYGM PG KALLPUGTHLWHC LHWPYME PG 1812. MOHLY COH OUX JAPMMYX THLWHC USKYUXE PG QASEUGX UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ UANALM LOHCYX MOUM MOYE YDIYWMYX MOPL. MOHLY COHCYGM UCUE, MURPGN COUM MOYE WHASX UGX UVUGXHGPGN MOYPK OHALYL UGX OUSZMOYPK VYSHGNPGNL, XPX LH ZKHT MOY SUMYGM IUMKPHMPLT COPWO YDIKYLLYLPMLYSZ GHM VE IOKULYL HK VE NPBPGN HGY'L WOPSXKYG MH LUBY MOY ZUMOYKSUGXUGX LPTPSUK AGGUMAKUS YDISHPML, VAM AGHVMKALPBYSE, LPTISE, HKNUGPWUSSE,UGX MOYKYZHKY PG MOY CUE MOUM USCUEL IKHXAWYL MOY THLM IHCYKZAS KYLASML."PM PL XPLNKUWYZAS MH KAG UCUE ZKHT XUGNYK; HGSE WHCUKXL UKY KAGGPGNUCUE ZKHT THLWHC," MOYE CYKY MHSX. PG OPL VKHUXLOYYML KHLMHIWOPGPTIKYLLYX HG MOYT MOUM MH SYUBY THLWHC CUL LOUTYZAS. MOYE CYKY ULOUTYXMH VY WUSSYX WHCUKXL, ULOUTYX MH SYUBY, VAM LMPSS MOYE SYZM, RGHCPGNPM OUX MH VY XHGY. COE XPX MOYE NH? PM PL PTIHLLPVSY MH LAIIHLY MOUMKHLMHIWOPG OUX LWUKYX MOYT VE OPL UWWHAGML HZ OHKKHKL GUIHSYHG OUXWHTTPMMYX PG WHGJAYKYX WHAGMKPYL. MOY ZPKLM IYHISY MH NH UCUE CYKY MOYKPWO YXAWUMYX IYHISY COH RGYC JAPMY CYSS MOUM BPYGGU UGX VYKSPG OUXKYTUPGYX PGMUWM UGX MOUM XAKPGN GUIHSYHG'L HWWAIUMPHG MOY PGOUVPMUGMLOUX LIYGM MOYPK MPTY ISYULUGMSE PG MOY WHTIUGE HZ MOY WOUKTPGN ZKYGWOTYGCOHT MOY KALLPUGL, UGX YLIYWPUSSE MOY KALLPUG SUXPYL, MOYG SPRYX LHTAWO.MOYE CYGM UCUE VYWUALY ZHK KALLPUGL MOYKY WHASX VY GH JAYLMPHG UL MHCOYMOYK MOPGNL CHASX NH CYSS HK PSS AGXYK ZKYGWO KASY PG THLWHC. PM CULHAM HZ MOY JAYLMPHG MH VY AGXYK ZKYGWO KASY, PM CHASX VY MOY CHKLM MOPGNMOUM WHASX OUIIYG. MOYE CYGM UCUE YBYG VYZHKY MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH UGXLMPSS THKY KUIPXSE UZMYK PM, XYLIPMY KHLMHIWOPG'L WUSSL MH XYZYGX THLWHCHK MOY UGGHAGWYTYGM HZ OPL PGMYGMPHG MH MURY MOY CHGXYK-CHKRPGN PWHG HZMOY PVYKPUG THMOYK HZ NHX UGX NH MH ZPNOM, HK HZ MOY VUSSHHGL MOUM CYKYMH XYLMKHE MOY ZKYGWO, UGX XYLIPMY USS MOY GHGLYGLY KHLMHIWOPG CKHMY PGOPL VKHUXLOYYML. MOYE RGYC MOUM PM CUL ZHK MOY UKTE MH ZPNOM, UGX MOUMPZ PM WHASX GHM LAWWYYX PM CHASX GHM XH MH MURY EHAGN SUXPYL UGX OHALYLYKZL MH MOY MOKYY OPSSL JAUKMYK HZ THLWHC MH ZPNOM GUIHSYHG, UGX MOUMMOYE TALM NH UCUE, LHKKE UL MOYE CYKY MH UVUGXHG MOYPK IKHIYKMEMH XYLMKAWMPHG. MOYE CYGM UCUE CPMOHAM MOPGRPGN HZ MOY MKYTYGXHALLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOUM PTTYGLY UGX CYUSMOE WPME VYPGN NPBYG HBYK MHXYLMKAWMPHG, ZHK U NKYUM WPME CPMO CHHXYG VAPSXPGNL CUL WYKMUPG COYGUVUGXHGYX VE PML PGOUVPMUGML MH VY VAKGYX. MOYE CYGM UCUE YUWO HG OPLHCG UWWHAGM, UGX EYM PM CUL HGSE PG WHGLYJAYGWY HZ MOYPK NHPGN UCUEMOUM MOY THTYGMHAL YBYGM CUL UWWHTISPLOYX MOUM CPSS USCUEL KYTUPG MOYNKYUMYLM NSHKE HZ MOY KALLPUG IYHISY. MOY SUXE COH, UZKUPX HZ VYPGNLMHIIYX VE WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG'L HKXYKL, OUX USKYUXE PG QAGY THBYX CPMO OYKGYNKHYL UGX OYK CHTYG QYLMYKL ZKHT THLWHC MH OYK LUKUMHB YLMUMY, CPMOU BUNAY WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM LOY CUL GHM VHGUIUKMY'L LYKBUGM, CUL KYUSSE,LPTISE, UGX MKASE WUKKEPGN HAM MOY NKYUM CHKR COPWO LUBYX KALLPU. VAMWHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, COH GHC MUAGMYX MOHLY COH SYZM THLWHC UGX GHC OUX MOYNHBYKGTYGM HZZPWYL KYTHBYX; GHC XPLMKPVAMYX JAPMY ALYSYLL CYUIHGL MHMOY XKAGRYG KUVVSY; GHC OUX IKHWYLLPHGL XPLISUEPGN MOY PWHGL, UGX GHCZHKVUXY ZUMOYK UANALMPG MH KYTHBY PWHGL HK MOY KYSPWL HZ LUPGML; GHCLYPFYX USS MOY IKPBUMY WUKML PG THLWHC UGX HG HGY OAGXKYX UGX MOPKME-LPDHZ MOYT KYTHBYX MOY VUSSHHG MOUM CUL VYPGN WHGLMKAWMYX VE SYIIPWO; GHCOPGMYX MOUM OY CHASX VAKG THLWHC UGX KYSUMYX OHC OY OUX LYM ZPKY MH OPLHCG OHALY; GHC CKHMY U IKHWSUTUMPHG MH MOY ZKYGWO LHSYTGSE AIVKUPXPGNMOYT ZHK OUBPGN XYLMKHEYX OPL HKIOUGUNY; GHC WSUPTYX MOY NSHKE HZOUBPGN OPGMYX MOUM OY CHASX VAKG THLWHC UGX GHC KYIAXPUMYX MOY XYYX;GHC HKXYKYX MOY IYHISY MH WUMWO USS LIPYL UGX VKPGN MOYT MH OPT, UGX GHCKYIKHUWOYX MOYT ZHK XHPGN LH; GHC YDIYSSYX USS MOY ZKYGWO KYLPXYGML ZKHTTHLWHC, UGX GHC USSHCYX TUXUTY UAVYKM-WOUSTY (MOY WYGMYK HZ MOY COHSYZKYGWO WHSHGE PG THLWHC) MH KYTUPG, VAM HKXYKYX MOY BYGYKUVSY HSXIHLMTULMYK RSEAWOUKYB MH VY UKKYLMYX UGX YDPSYX ZHK GH IUKMPWASUKHZZYGLY; GHC ULLYTVSYX MOY IYHISY UM MOY MOKYY OPSSL MH ZPNOM MOY ZKYGWOUGX GHC, MH NYM KPX HZ MOYT, OUGXYX HBYK MH MOYT U TUG MH VY RPSSYXUGX OPTLYSZ XKHBY UCUE VE U VUWR NUMY; GHC XYWSUKYX MOUM OY CHASXGHM LAKBPBY MOY ZUSS HZ THLWHC, UGX GHC CKHMY ZKYGWO BYKLYL PG USVATLWHGWYKGPGN OPL LOUKY PG MOY UZZUPK--MOPL TUG XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYTYUGPGN HZ COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN VAM TYKYSE CUGMYX MH XH LHTYMOPGN OPTLYSZMOUM CHASX ULMHGPLO IYHISY, MH IYKZHKT LHTY IUMKPHMPWUSSE OYKHPWZYUM; UGX SPRY U WOPSX OY TUXY LIHKM HZ MOY THTYGMHAL, UGX AGUBHPXUVSYYBYGM--MOY UVUGXHGTYGM UGX VAKGPGN HZ THLWHC--UGX MKPYX CPMO OPL IAGEOUGX GHC MH LIYYX UGX GHC MH LMUE MOY YGHKTHAL, IHIASUK MPXY MOUM VHKYOPT USHGN CPMO PM.WOUIMYK BPOYSYGY, OUBPGN KYMAKGYX CPMO MOY WHAKM ZKHT BPSGU MH IYMYKLVAKN, ZHAGXOYKLYSZ PG U XPZZPWASM IHLPMPHG.PG IYMYKLVAKN LOY OUX YGQHEYX MOY LIYWPUS IKHMYWMPHG HZ U NKUGXYY COHHWWAIPYX HGY HZ MOY OPNOYLM IHLML PG MOY YTIPKY. PG BPSGU LOY OUX ZHKTYXUG PGMPTUWE CPMO U EHAGN ZHKYPNG IKPGWY. COYG LOY KYMAKGYX MH IYMYKLVAKNVHMO MOY TUNGUMY UGX MOY IKPGWY CYKY MOYKY, UGX VHMO WSUPTYX MOYPKKPNOML. OYSYGY CUL ZUWYX VE U GYC IKHVSYT--OHC MH IKYLYKBY OYK PGMPTUWECPMO VHMO CPMOHAM HZZYGXPGN YPMOYK.COUM CHASX OUBY LYYTYX XPZZPWASM HK YBYG PTIHLLPVSY MH UGHMOYK CHTUG XPXGHM WUALY MOY SYULM YTVUKKULLTYGM MH WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU, COH YBPXYGMSEXYLYKBYX OYK KYIAMUMPHG HZ VYPGN U BYKE WSYBYK CHTUG. OUX LOY UMMYTIMYXWHGWYUSTYGM, HK MKPYX MH YDMKPWUMY OYKLYSZ ZKHT OYK UCRCUKX IHLPMPHGVE WAGGPGN, LOY CHASX OUBY LIHPSYX OYK WULY VE UWRGHCSYXNPGN OYKLYSZNAPSME. VAM OYSYGY, SPRY U KYUSSE NKYUM TUG COH WUG XH COUMYBYKOY ISYULYL, UM HGWY ULLATYX OYK HCG IHLPMPHG MH VY WHKKYWM, UL LOYLPGWYKYSE VYSPYBYX PM MH VY, UGX MOUM YBYKEHGY YSLY CUL MH VSUTY.MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOY EHAGN ZHKYPNGYK USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH KYIKHUWO OYK, LOYSPZMYX OYK VYUAMPZAS OYUX UGX, OUSZ MAKGPGN MH OPT, LUPX ZPKTSE: "MOUM'LQALM SPRY U TUG--LYSZPLO UGX WKAYS! P YDIYWMYX GHMOPGN YSLY. U CHTUGLUWKPZPWYL OYKLYSZ ZHK EHA, LOY LAZZYKL, UGX MOPL PL OYK KYCUKX! COUMKPNOM OUBY EHA, THGLYPNGYAK, MH XYTUGX UG UWWHAGM HZ TE UMMUWOTYGML UGXZKPYGXLOPIL? OY PL U TUG COH OUL VYYG THKY MOUG U ZUMOYK MH TY!" MOYIKPGWY CUL UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, VAM OYSYGY PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."CYSS, EYL," LUPX LOY, "PM TUE VY MOUM OY OUL HMOYK LYGMPTYGML ZHK TYMOUG MOHLY HZ U ZUMOYK, VAM MOUM PL GHM U KYULHG ZHK TY MH LOAM TE XHHKHG OPT. P UT GHM U TUG, MOUM P LOHASX KYIUE RPGXGYLL CPMO PGNKUMPMAXY!RGHC, THGLYPNGYAK, MOUM PG USS MOUM KYSUMYL MH TE PGMPTUMY ZYYSPGNL PKYGXYK UWWHAGM HGSE MH NHX UGX MH TE WHGLWPYGWY," LOY WHGWSAXYX, SUEPGNOYK OUGX HG OYK VYUAMPZAS, ZASSE YDIUGXYX VHLHT UGX SHHRPGN AI MHOYUBYG."VAM ZHK OYUBYG'L LURY SPLMYG MH TY!""TUKKE TY, UGX P CPSS VY EHAK LSUBY!""VAM MOUM'L PTIHLLPVSY.""EHA CHG'M XYPNG MH XYTYUG EHAKLYSZ VE TUKKEPGN TY, EHA..." LUPX OYSYGY,VYNPGGPGN MH WKE.MOY IKPGWY MKPYX MH WHTZHKM OYK, VAM OYSYGY, UL PZ JAPMY XPLMKUANOM,LUPX MOKHANO OYK MYUKL MOUM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MH IKYBYGM OYK TUKKEPGN,MOUM MOYKY CYKY IKYWYXYGML (MOYKY CYKY AI MH MOUM MPTY BYKE ZYC, VAMLOY TYGMPHGYX GUIHSYHG UGX LHTY HMOYK YDUSMYX IYKLHGUNYL), MOUM LOY OUXGYBYK VYYG OYK OALVUGX'L CPZY, UGX MOUM LOY OUX VYYG LUWKPZPWYX."VAM MOY SUC, KYSPNPHG..." LUPX MOY IKPGWY, USKYUXE EPYSXPGN."MOY SUC, KYSPNPHG... COUM OUBY MOYE VYYG PGBYGMYX ZHK PZ MOYE WUG'MUKKUGNY MOUM?" LUPX OYSYGY.MOY IKPGWY CUL LAKIKPLYX MOUM LH LPTISY UG PXYU OUX GHM HWWAKKYX MH OPT,UGX OY UIISPYX ZHK UXBPWY MH MOY OHSE VKYMOKYG HZ MOY LHWPYME HZ QYLAL,CPMO COHT OY CUL HG PGMPTUMY MYKTL.U ZYC XUEL SUMYK UM HGY HZ MOHLY YGWOUGMPGN ZYMYL COPWO OYSYGY NUBY UMOYK WHAGMKE OHALY HG MOY LMHGY PLSUGX, MOY WOUKTPGN THGLPYAK XY QHVYKM,U TUG GH SHGNYK EHAGN, CPMO LGHC COPMY OUPK UGX VKPSSPUGM VSUWR YEYL,U QYLAPM U KHVY WHAKMY * CUL IKYLYGMYX MH OYK, UGX PG MOY NUKXYG VE MOYSPNOM HZ MOY PSSATPGUMPHGL UGX MH MOY LHAGX HZ TALPW MUSRYX MH OYK ZHK USHGN MPTY HZ MOY SHBY HZ NHX, HZ WOKPLM, HZ MOY LUWKYX OYUKM, UGX HZ MOYWHGLHSUMPHGL MOY HGY MKAY WUMOHSPW KYSPNPHG UZZHKXL PG MOPL CHKSX UGXMOY GYDM. OYSYGY CUL MHAWOYX, UGX THKY MOUG HGWY MYUKL KHLY MH OYK YEYLUGX MH MOHLY HZ THGLPYAK XY QHVYKM UGX MOYPK BHPWYL MKYTVSYX. U XUGWY,ZHK COPWO OYK IUKMGYK WUTY MH LYYR OYK, IAM UG YGX MH OYK XPLWHAKLY CPMOOYK ZAMAKY XPKYWMYAK XY WHGLWPYGWY, VAM MOY GYDM YBYGPGN THGLPYAK XYQHVYKM WUTY MH LYY OYSYGY COYG LOY CUL USHGY, UGX UZMYK MOUM HZMYG WUTYUNUPG.    * SUE TYTVYK HZ MOY LHWPYME HZ QYLAL.HGY XUE OY MHHR MOY WHAGMYLL MH U KHTUG WUMOHSPW WOAKWO, COYKY LOY RGYSMXHCG VYZHKY MOY USMUK MH COPWO LOY CUL SYX. MOY YGWOUGMPGN, TPXXSY-UNYXZKYGWOTUG SUPX OPL OUGXL HG OYK OYUX UGX, UL LOY OYKLYSZ UZMYKCUKXXYLWKPVYX PM, LOY ZYSM LHTYMOPGN SPRY U ZKYLO VKYYFY CUZMYX PGMH OYKLHAS. PM CUL YDISUPGYX MH OYK MOUM MOPL CUL SU NKUWY.UZMYK MOUM U SHGN-ZKHWRYX UVVY CUL VKHANOM MH OYK. LOY WHGZYLLYX MHOPT, UGX OY UVLHSBYX OYK ZKHT OYK LPGL. GYDM XUE LOY KYWYPBYX U VHDWHGMUPGPGN MOY LUWKYX OHLM, COPWO CUL SYZM UM OYK OHALY ZHK OYK MHIUKMURY HZ. U ZYC XUEL SUMYK OYSYGY SYUKGYX CPMO ISYULAKY MOUM LOY OUXGHC VYYG UXTPMMYX MH MOY MKAY WUMOHSPW WOAKWO UGX MOUM PG U ZYC XUEL MOYIHIY OPTLYSZ CHASX OYUK HZ OYK UGX CHASX LYGX OYK U WYKMUPG XHWATYGM.USS MOUM CUL XHGY UKHAGX OYK UGX MH OYK UM MOPL MPTY, USS MOY UMMYGMPHGXYBHMYX MH OYK VE LH TUGE WSYBYK TYG UGX YDIKYLLYX PG LAWO ISYULUGM,KYZPGYX CUEL, UGX MOY LMUMY HZ XHBY-SPRY IAKPME LOY CUL GHC PG (LOY CHKYHGSE COPMY XKYLLYL UGX COPMY KPVVHGL USS MOUM MPTY) NUBY OYK ISYULAKY,VAM OYK ISYULAKY XPX GHM WUALY OYK ZHK U THTYGM MH ZHKNYM OYK UPT. UGXUL PM USCUEL OUIIYGL PG WHGMYLML HZ WAGGPGN MOUM U LMAIPX IYKLHG NYMLMOY VYMMYK HZ WSYBYKYK HGYL, OYSYGY--OUBPGN KYUSPFYX MOUM MOY TUPGHVQYWM HZ USS MOYLY CHKXL UGX USS MOPL MKHAVSY CUL, UZMYK WHGBYKMPGN OYKMH WUMOHSPWPLT, MH HVMUPG THGYE ZKHT OYK ZHK QYLAPM PGLMPMAMPHGL (UL MHCOPWO LOY KYWYPBYX PGXPWUMPHGL)-VYZHKY IUKMPGN CPMO OYK THGYE PGLPLMYXMOUM MOY BUKPHAL HIYKUMPHGL GYWYLLUKE MH ZKYY OYK ZKHT OYK OALVUGXLOHASX VY IYKZHKTYX. PG OYK BPYC MOY UPT HZ YBYKE KYSPNPHG CUL TYKYSEMH IKYLYKBY WYKMUPG IKHIKPYMPYL COPSY UZZHKXPGN LUMPLZUWMPHG MHOATUG XYLPKYL. UGX CPMO MOPL UPT, PG HGY HZ OYK MUSRL CPMO OYK ZUMOYKWHGZYLLHK, LOY PGLPLMYX HG UG UGLCYK MH MOY JAYLMPHG, PG OHC ZUK CUL LOYVHAGX VE OYK TUKKPUNY?MOYE CYKY LPMMPGN PG MOY MCPSPNOM VE U CPGXHC PG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.MOY LWYGM HZ ZSHCYKL WUTY PG UM MOY CPGXHC. OYSYGY CUL CYUKPGN U COPMYXKYLL, MKUGLIUKYGM HBYK OYK LOHASXYKL UGX VHLHT. MOY UVVY, U CYSS-ZYXTUG CPMO U ISATI, WSYUG-LOUBYG WOPG, U ISYULUGM ZPKT THAMO, UGX COPMYOUGXL TYYRSE ZHSXYX HG OPL RGYYL, LUM WSHLY MH OYSYGY UGX, CPMO ULAVMSY LTPSY HG OPL SPIL UGX U IYUWYZAS SHHR HZ XYSPNOM UM OYK VYUAME,HWWULPHGUSSE NSUGWYX UM OYK ZUWY UL OY YDISUPGYX OPL HIPGPHG HG MOYLAVQYWM. OYSYGY CPMO UG AGYULE LTPSY SHHRYX UM OPL WAKSE OUPK UGX OPLISATI, WSYUG-LOUBYG, VSUWRPLO WOYYRL UGX YBYKE THTYGM YDIYWMYX MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG MH MURY U ZKYLO MAKG. VAM MOY UVVY, MOHANO OY YBPXYGMSEYGQHEYX MOY VYUAME HZ OPL WHTIUGPHG, CUL UVLHKVYX PG OPL TULMYKE HZ MOYTUMMYK.MOY WHAKLY HZ MOY ZUMOYK WHGZYLLHK'L UKNATYGML KUG UL ZHSSHCL: "PNGHKUGMHZ MOY PTIHKM HZ COUM EHA CYKY AGXYKMURPGN, EHA TUXY U BHC HZ WHGQANUSZPXYSPME MH U TUG COH HG OPL IUKM, VE YGMYKPGN MOY TUKKPYX LMUMY CPMOHAMZUPMO PG MOY KYSPNPHAL LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ TUKKPUNY, WHTTPMMYX UG UWM HZLUWKPSYNY. MOUM TUKKPUNY SUWRYX MOY XAUS LPNGPZPWUGWY PM LOHASX OUBYOUX. EYM PG LIPMY HZ MOPL EHAK BHC CUL VPGXPGN. EHA LCYKBYX ZKHT PM.COUM XPX EHA WHTTPM VE LH UWMPGN? U BYGPUS, HK U THKMUS, LPG? U BYGPUSLPG, ZHK EHA UWMYX CPMOHAM YBPS PGMYGMPHG. PZ GHC EHA TUKKPYX UNUPGCPMO MOY HVQYWM HZ VYUKPGN WOPSXKYG, EHAK LPG TPNOM VY ZHKNPBYG. VAM MOYJAYLMPHG PL UNUPG U MCHZHSX HGY: ZPKLMSE..."VAM LAXXYGSE OYSYGY, COH CUL NYMMPGN VHKYX, LUPX CPMO HGY HZ OYKVYCPMWOPGN LTPSYL: "VAM P MOPGR MOUM OUBPGN YLIHALYX MOY MKAY KYSPNPHG PWUGGHM VY VHAGX VE COUM U ZUSLY KYSPNPHG SUPX AIHG TY."MOY XPKYWMHK HZ OYK WHGLWPYGWY CUL ULMHAGXYX UM OUBPGN MOY WULYIKYLYGMYX MH OPT MOAL CPMO MOY LPTISPWPME HZ WHSATVAL' YNN. OY CULXYSPNOMYX UM MOY AGYDIYWMYX KUIPXPME HZ OPL IAIPS'L IKHNKYLL, VAM WHASXGHM UVUGXHG MOY YXPZPWY HZ UKNATYGM OY OUX SUVHKPHALSE WHGLMKAWMYX."SYM AL AGXYKLMUGX HGY UGHMOYK, WHAGMYLL," LUPX OY CPMO U LTPSY, UGXVYNUG KYZAMPGN OPL LIPKPMAUS XUANOMYK'L UKNATYGML.WOUIMYK BPPOYSYGY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM MOY JAYLMPHG CUL BYKE LPTISY UGX YULE ZKHTMOY YWWSYLPULMPWUS IHPGM HZ BPYC, UGX MOUM OYK XPKYWMHKL CYKY TURPGNXPZZPWASMPYL HGSE VYWUALY MOYE CYKY UIIKYOYGLPBY UL MH OHC MOY TUMMYKCHASX VY KYNUKXYX VE MOY LYWASUK UAMOHKPMPYL.LH LOY XYWPXYX MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH IKYIUKY MOY HIPGPHG HZ LHWPYME.LOY IKHBHRYX MOY QYUSHALE HZ MOY YSXYKSE TUNGUMY UGX MHSX OPT COUM LOYOUX MHSX OYK HMOYK LAPMHK; MOUM PL, LOY IAM MOY TUMMYK LH MOUM MOY HGSECUE ZHK OPT MH HVMUPG U KPNOM HBYK OYK CUL MH TUKKE OYK. MOY YSXYKSETUNGUMY CUL UM ZPKLM UL TAWO MURYG UVUWR VE MOPL LANNYLMPHG HZ TUKKPUNYCPMO U CHTUG COHLY OALVUGX CUL USPBY, UL MOY EHAGNYK TUG OUX VYYG, VAMOYSYGY'L PTIYKMAKVUVSY WHGBPWMPHG MOUM PM CUL UL LPTISY UGX GUMAKUS ULTUKKEPGN U TUPXYG OUX PML YZZYWM HG OPT MHH. OUX OYSYGY OYKLYSZ LOHCGMOY SYULM LPNG HZ OYLPMUMPHG, LOUTY, HK LYWKYWE, OYK WUALY CHASXWYKMUPGSE OUBY VYYG SHLM; VAM GHM HGSE XPX LOY LOHC GH LPNGL HZ LYWKYWEHK LOUTY, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, CPMO NHHX-GUMAKYX GUPBYMY LOY MHSX OYKPGMPTUMY ZKPYGXL (UGX MOYLY CYKY USS IYMYKLVAKN) MOUM VHMO MOY IKPGWYUGX MOY TUNGUMY OUX IKHIHLYX MH OYK UGX MOUM LOY SHBYX VHMO UGX CULUZKUPX HZ NKPYBPGN YPMOYK.U KATHK PTTYXPUMYSE LIKYUX PG IYMYKLVAKN, GHM MOUM OYSYGY CUGMYX MHVY XPBHKWYX ZKHT OYK OALVUGX (OUX LAWO U KYIHKM LIKYUX TUGE CHASX OUBYHIIHLYX LH PSSYNUS UG PGMYGMPHG) VAM LPTISE MOUM MOY AGZHKMAGUMY UGXPGMYKYLMPGN OYSYGY CUL PG XHAVM COPWO HZ MOY MCH TYG LOY LOHASX TUKKE.MOY JAYLMPHG CUL GH SHGNYK COYMOYK MOPL CUL IHLLPVSY, VAM HGSE COPWO CULMOY VYMMYK TUMWO UGX OHC MOY TUMMYK CHASX VY KYNUKXYX UM WHAKM. MOYKYCYKY, PM PL MKAY, LHTY KPNPX PGXPBPXAUSL AGUVSY MH KPLY MH MOY OYPNOM HZLAWO U JAYLMPHG, COH LUC PG MOY IKHQYWM U XYLYWKUMPHG HZ MOY LUWKUTYGMHZ TUKKPUNY, VAM MOYKY CYKY GHM TUGE LAWO UGX MOYE KYTUPGYX LPSYGM,COPSY MOY TUQHKPME CYKY PGMYKYLMYX PG OYSYGY'L NHHX ZHKMAGY UGX PG MOYJAYLMPHG COPWO TUMWO CHASX VY MOY THKY UXBUGMUNYHAL. COYMOYK PM CULKPNOM HK CKHGN MH KYTUKKE COPSY HGY OUX U OALVUGX SPBPGN MOYE XPX GHMXPLWALL, ZHK MOUM JAYLMPHG OUX YBPXYGMSE VYYG LYMMSYX VE IYHISY "CPLYKMOUG EHA HK TY," UL MOYE LUPX, UGX MH XHAVM MOY WHKKYWMGYLL HZ MOUMXYWPLPHG CHASX VY MH KPLR YDIHLPGN HGY'L LMAIPXPME UGX PGWUIUWPME MHSPBY PG LHWPYME.HGSE TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU UROKHLPTHBU, COH OUX WHTY MH IYMYKLVAKN MOUMLATTYK MH LYY HGY HZ OYK LHGL, USSHCYX OYKLYSZ ISUPGSE MH YDIKYLLUG HIPGPHG WHGMKUKE MH MOY NYGYKUS HGY. TYYMPGN OYSYGY UM U VUSS LOYLMHIIYX OYK PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT UGX, UTPX NYGYKUS LPSYGWY, LUPXPG OYK NKAZZ BHPWY: "LH CPBYL HZ SPBPGN TYG OUBY LMUKMYX TUKKEPGNUNUPG! IYKOUIL EHA MOPGR EHA OUBY PGBYGMYX U GHBYSME? EHA OUBY VYYGZHKYLMUSSYX, TE XYUK! PM CUL MOHANOM HZ SHGN UNH. PM PL XHGY PG USS MOYVKHMOYSL," UGX CPMO MOYLY CHKXL TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU, MAKGPGN AI OYK CPXYLSYYBYL CPMO OYK ALAUS MOKYUMYGPGN NYLMAKY UGX NSUGWPGN LMYKGSE KHAGX,THBYX UWKHLL MOY KHHT.MOHANO IYHISY CYKY UZKUPX HZ TUKEU XTPMKPYBGU LOY CUL KYNUKXYX PGIYMYKLVAKN UL U VAZZHHG, UGX LH HZ COUM LOY OUX LUPX MOYE HGSE GHMPWYX,UGX KYIYUMYX PG U COPLIYK, MOY HGY WHUKLY CHKX LOY OUX ALYX, LAIIHLPGNMOY COHSY LMPGN HZ OYK KYTUKR MH SPY PG MOUM CHKX.IKPGWY BULPSP, COH HZ SUMY BYKE HZMYG ZHKNHM COUM OY OUX LUPX UGXKYIYUMYX HGY UGX MOY LUTY MOPGN U OAGXKYX MPTYL, KYTUKRYX MH OPLXUANOMYK COYGYBYK OY WOUGWYX MH LYY OYK:"OYSYGY, P OUBY U CHKX MH LUE MH EHA," UGX OY CHASX SYUX OYKULPXY, XKUCPGN OYK OUGX XHCGCUKX. "P OUBY OYUKX HZ WYKMUPG IKHQYWMLWHGWYKGPGN... EHA RGHC. CYSS TE XYUK WOPSX, EHA RGHC OHC EHAK ZUMOYK'LOYUKM KYQHPWYL MH RGHC MOUM EHA... EHA OUBY LAZZYKYX LH TAWO.... VAM, TEXYUK WOPSX, WHGLASM HGSE EHAK HCG OYUKM. MOUM PL USS P OUBY MH LUE," UGXWHGWYUSPGN OPL AGBUKEPGN YTHMPHG OY CHASX IKYLL OPL WOYYR UNUPGLM OPLXUANOMYK'L UGX THBY UCUE.VPSPVPG, COH OUX GHM SHLM OPL KYIAMUMPHG HZ UG YDWYYXPGNSE WSYBYK TUG,UGX COH CUL HGY HZ MOY XPLPGMYKYLMYX ZKPYGXL LH VKPSSPUGM U CHTUG ULOYSYGY USCUEL OUL--TYG ZKPYGXL COH WUG GYBYK WOUGNY PGMH SHBYKL--HGWYNUBY OYK OPL BPYC HZ MOY TUMMYK UM U LTUSS UGX PGMPTUMY NUMOYKPGN."SPLMYG, VPSPVPG," LUPX OYSYGY (LOY USCUEL WUSSYX ZKPYGXL HZ MOUM LHKMVE MOYPK LAKGUTYL), UGX LOY MHAWOYX OPL WHUM LSYYBY CPMO OYK COPMY,VYKPGNYX ZPGNYKL. "MYSS TY, UL EHA CHASX U LPLMYK, COUM P HANOM MH XH.COPWO HZ MOY MCH?"VPSPVPG CKPGRSYX AI MOY LRPG HBYK OPL YEYVKHCL UGX IHGXYKYX, CPMO ULTPSY HG OPL SPIL."EHA UKY GHM MURPGN TY AGUCUKYL, EHA RGHC," LUPX OY. "UL U MKAY ZKPYGX,P OUBY MOHANOM UGX MOHANOM UNUPG UVHAM EHAK UZZUPK. EHA LYY, PZ EHATUKKE MOY IKPGWY"--OY TYUGM MOY EHAGNYK TUG--UGX OY WKHHRYX HGY ZPGNYK,"EHA ZHKYBYK SHLY MOY WOUGWY HZ TUKKEPGN MOY HMOYK, UGX EHA CPSSXPLISYULY MOY WHAKM VYLPXYL. (EHA RGHC MOYKY PL LHTY RPGX HZWHGGYWMPHG.) VAM PZ EHA TUKKE MOY HSX WHAGM EHA CPSS TURY OPL SULM XUELOUIIE, UGX UL CPXHC HZ MOY NKUGX... MOY IKPGWY CHASX GH SHGNYK VY TURPGNU TYLUSSPUGWY VE TUKKEPGN EHA," UGX VPSPVPG LTHHMOYX HAM OPL ZHKYOYUX."MOUM'L U MKAY ZKPYGX!" LUPX OYSYGY VYUTPGN, UGX UNUPG MHAWOPGNVPSPVPG'L LSYYBY. "VAM P SHBY MOYT, EHA RGHC, UGX XHG'M CUGM MH XPLMKYLLYPMOYK HZ MOYT. P CHASX NPBY TE SPZY ZHK MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ MOYT VHMO."VPSPVPG LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL, UL TAWO UL MH LUE MOUM GHM YBYG OY WHASXOYSI PG MOUM XPZZPWASME."AGY TUPMKYLLY-ZYTTY! * MOUM'L COUM PL WUSSYX IAMMPGN MOPGNL LJAUKYSE.LOY CHASX SPRY MH VY TUKKPYX MH USS MOKYY UM MOY LUTY MPTY," MOHANOM OY.    * U TULMYKSE CHTUG."VAM MYSS TY, OHC CPSS EHAK OALVUGX SHHR UM MOY TUMMYK?" VPSPVPG ULRYX,OPL KYIAMUMPHG VYPGN LH CYSS YLMUVSPLOYX MOUM OY XPX GHM ZYUK MH ULR LHGUPBY U JAYLMPHG. "CPSS OY UNKYY?""HO, OY SHBYL TY LH!" LUPX OYSYGY, COH ZHK LHTY KYULHG PTUNPGYX MOUMIPYKKY MHH SHBYX OYK. "OY CPSS XH UGEMOPGN ZHK TY."VPSPVPG IAWRYKYX OPL LRPG PG IKYIUKUMPHG ZHK LHTYMOPGN CPMME."YBYG XPBHKWY EHA?" LUPX OY.OYSYGY SUANOYX.UTHGN MOHLY COH BYGMAKYX MH XHAVM MOY QALMPZPUVPSPME HZ MOY IKHIHLYXTUKKPUNY CUL OYSYGY'L THMOYK, IKPGWYLL RAKUNPGU. LOY CUL WHGMPGAUSSEMHKTYGMYX VE QYUSHALE HZ OYK XUANOMYK, UGX GHC MOUM QYUSHALE WHGWYKGYXU LAVQYWM GYUK MH OYK HCG OYUKM, LOY WHASX GHM KYWHGWPSY OYKLYSZ MH MOYPXYU. LOY WHGLASMYX U KALLPUG IKPYLM UL MH MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ XPBHKWYUGX KYTUKKPUNY XAKPGN U OALVUGX'L SPZYMPTY, UGX MOY IKPYLM MHSX OYK MOUMPM CUL PTIHLLPVSY, UGX MH OYK XYSPNOM LOHCYX OYK U MYDM PG MOY NHLIYSCOPWO (UL PM LYYTYX MH OPT) ISUPGSE ZHKVPXL KYTUKKPUNY COPSY MOY OALVUGXPL USPBY.UKTYX CPMO MOYLY UKNATYGML, COPWO UIIYUKYX MH OYK AGUGLCYKUVSY, LOYXKHBY MH OYK XUANOMYK'L YUKSE HGY THKGPGN LH UL MH ZPGX OYK USHGY.OUBPGN SPLMYGYX MH OYK THMOYK'L HVQYWMPHGL, OYSYGY LTPSYX VSUGXSE UGXPKHGPWUSSE."VAM PM LUEL ISUPGSE: 'COHLHYBYK LOUSS TUKKE OYK MOUM PL XPBHKWYX...'"LUPX MOY HSX IKPGWYLL."UO, TUTUG, GY XPMYL IUL XY VYMPLYL. BHAL GY WHTIKYGYF KPYG. XUGL TUIHLPMPHG Q'UP XYL XYBHPKL," * LUPX OYSYGY WOUGNPGN ZKHT KALLPUG, PGCOPWO SUGNAUNY LOY USCUEL ZYSM MOUM OYK WULY XPX GHM LHAGX JAPMY WSYUK,PGMH ZKYGWO COPWO LAPMYX PM VYMMYK.     * "HO, TUTTU, XHG'M MUSR GHGLYGLY! EHA XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX     UGEMOPGN. PG TE IHLPMPHG P OUBY HVSPNUMPHGL.""VAM, TE XYUK....""HO, TUTTU, OHC PL PM EHA XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOY OHSE ZUMOYK, COH OULMOY KPNOM MH NKUGM XPLIYGLUMPHGL..."QALM MOYG MOY SUXE WHTIUGPHG COH SPBYX CPMO OYSYGY WUTY PG MH UGGHAGWYMOUM OPL OPNOGYLL CUL PG MOY VUSSKHHT UGX CPLOYX MH LYY OYK."GHG, XPMYL-SAP JAY QY GY BYAD IUL SY BHPK, JAY QY LAPL ZAKPYALY WHGMKYSAP, IUKWY JA'PS T'U TUGJAY IUKHSY." *     * "GH, MYSS OPT P XHG'M CPLO MH LYY OPT, P UT ZAKPHAL CPMO     OPT ZHK GHM RYYIPGN OPL CHKX MH TY.""WHTMYLLY, U MHAM IYWOY TPLYKPWHKXY," * LUPX U ZUPK-OUPKYX EHAGN TUGCPMO U SHGN ZUWY UGX GHLY, UL OY YGMYKYX MOY KHHT.    * "WHAGMYLL, MOYKY PL TYKWE ZHK YBYKE LPG."MOY HSX IKPGWYLL KHLY KYLIYWMZASSE UGX WAKMLPYX. MOY EHAGN TUG COH OUXYGMYKYX MHHR GH GHMPWY HZ OYK. MOY IKPGWYLL GHXXYX MH OYK XUANOMYK UGXLPXSYX HAM HZ MOY KHHT."EYL, LOY PL KPNOM," MOHANOM MOY HSX IKPGWYLL, USS OYK WHGBPWMPHGLXPLLPIUMYX VE MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZ OPL OPNOGYLL. "LOY PL KPNOM, VAM OHCPL PM MOUM CY PG HAK PKKYWHBYKUVSY EHAMO XPX GHM RGHC PM? EYM PM PL LHLPTISY," LOY MOHANOM UL LOY NHM PGMH OYK WUKKPUNY.VE MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ UANALM OYSYGY'L UZZUPKL CYKY WSYUKSE XYZPGYX UGXLOY CKHMY U SYMMYK MH OYK OALVUGX--COH, UL LOY PTUNPGYX, SHBYX OYK BYKETAWO--PGZHKTPGN OPT HZ OYK PGMYGMPHG MH TUKKE G.G. UGX HZ OYK OUBPGNYTVKUWYX MOY HGY MKAY ZUPMO, UGX ULRPGN OPT MH WUKKE HAM USS MOYZHKTUSPMPYL GYWYLLUKE ZHK U XPBHKWY, COPWO CHASX VY YDISUPGYX MH OPT VEMOY VYUKYK HZ MOY SYMMYK.UGX LH P IKUE NHX MH OUBY EHA, TE ZKPYGX, PG OPL OHSE UGX IHCYKZASRYYIPGN--EHAK ZKPYGX OYSYGY.MOPL SYMMYK CUL VKHANOM MH IPYKKY'L OHALY COYG OY CUL HG MOY ZPYSX HZVHKHXPGH.WOUIMYK BPPPMHCUKX MOY YGX HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, IPYKKY, OUBPGN KAG XHCGZKHT KUYBLRP'L VUMMYKE U LYWHGX MPTY, TUXY OPL CUE MOKHANO U NASSE MHRGEUFRHBH CPMO U WKHCX HZ LHSXPYKL, KYUWOYX MOY XKYLLPGN LMUMPHG, UGXLYYPGN VSHHX UGX OYUKPGN WKPYL UGX NKHUGL OAKKPYX HG, LMPSS YGMUGNSYX PGMOY WKHCXL HZ LHSXPYKL.MOY HGY MOPGN OY GHC XYLPKYX CPMO OPL COHSY LHAS CUL MH NYM UCUE JAPWRSEZKHT MOY MYKKPVSY LYGLUMPHGL UTPX COPWO OY OUX SPBYX MOUM XUE UGX KYMAKGMH HKXPGUKE WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY UGX LSYYI JAPYMSE PG U KHHT PG OPL HCGVYX. OY ZYSM MOUM HGSE PG MOY HKXPGUKE WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY CHASX OYVY UVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX OPTLYSZ UGX USS OY OUX LYYG UGX ZYSM. VAM LAWOHKXPGUKE WHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY CYKY GHCOYKY MH VY ZHAGX.MOHANO LOYSSL UGX VASSYML XPX GHM COPLMSY HBYK MOY KHUX USHGN COPWO OYCUL NHPGN, LMPSS HG USS LPXYL MOYKY CUL COUM MOYKY OUX VYYG HG MOY ZPYSXHZ VUMMSY. MOYKY CYKY LMPSS MOY LUTY LAZZYKPGN, YDOUALMYX, UGX LHTYMPTYLLMKUGNYSE PGXPZZYKYGM ZUWYL, MOY LUTY VSHHX, MOY LUTY LHSXPYKL'HBYKWHUML, MOY LUTY LHAGXL HZ ZPKPGN COPWO, MOHANO XPLMUGM GHC, LMPSSUKHALYX MYKKHK, UGX VYLPXYL MOPL MOYKY CYKY MOY ZHAS UPK UGX MOY XALM.OUBPGN NHGY U WHAISY HZ TPSYL USHGN MOY THFOUELR KHUX, IPYKKY LUM XHCGVE MOY KHUXLPXY.XALR OUX ZUSSYG, UGX MOY KHUK HZ NAGL XPYX UCUE. IPYKKY SUE SYUGPGN HGOPL YSVHC ZHK U SHGN MPTY, NUFPGN UM MOY LOUXHCL MOUM THBYX IULM OPT PGMOY XUKRGYLL. OY CUL WHGMPGAUSSE PTUNPGPGN MOUM U WUGGHG VUSS CUL ZSEPGNMHCUKX OPT CPMO U MYKKPZPW COPFF, UGX MOYG OY LOAXXYKYX UGX LUM AI. OYOUX GH PXYU OHC SHGN OY OUX VYYG MOYKY. PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY GPNOM MOKYYLHSXPYKL, OUBPGN VKHANOM LHTY ZPKYCHHX, LYMMSYX XHCG GYUK OPT UGX VYNUGSPNOMPGN U ZPKY.MOY LHSXPYKL, COH MOKYC LPXYSHGN NSUGWYL UM IPYKKY, NHM MOY ZPKY MH VAKGUGX ISUWYX UG PKHG IHM HG PM PGMH COPWO MOYE VKHRY LHTY XKPYX VKYUX UGXIAM U SPMMSY XKPIIPGN. MOY ISYULUGM HXHK HZ NKYULE BPUGXL TPGNSYX CPMOMOY LTYSS HZ LTHRY. IPYKKY LUM AI UGX LPNOYX. MOY MOKYY LHSXPYKL CYKYYUMPGN UGX MUSRPGN UTHGN MOYTLYSBYL, MURPGN GH GHMPWY HZ OPT."UGX COH TUE EHA VY?" HGY HZ MOYT LAXXYGSE ULRYX IPYKKY, YBPXYGMSETYUGPGN COUM IPYKKY OPTLYSZ OUX PG TPGX, GUTYSE: "PZ EHA CUGM MH YUMCY'SS NPBY EHA LHTY ZHHX, HGSE SYM AL RGHC COYMOYK EHA UKY UG OHGYLMTUG.""P, P..." LUPX IPYKKY, ZYYSPGN PM GYWYLLUKE MH TPGPTPFY OPL LHWPUSIHLPMPHG UL TAWO UL IHLLPVSY LH UL MH VY GYUKYK MH MOY LHSXPYKL UGXVYMMYK AGXYKLMHHX VE MOYT. "VE KPNOML P UT U TPSPMPU HZZPWYK, VAM TE TYGUKY GHM OYKY. P WUTY MH MOY VUMMSY UGX OUBY SHLM MOYT.""MOYKY GHC!" LUPX HGY HZ MOY LHSXPYKL.UGHMOYK LOHHR OPL OYUX."CHASX EHA SPRY U SPMMSY TULO?" MOY ZPKLM LHSXPYK ULRYX, UGX OUGXYXIPYKKY U CHHXYG LIHHG UZMYK SPWRPGN PM WSYUG.IPYKKY LUM XHCG VE MOY ZPKY UGX VYNUG YUMPGN MOY TULO, UL MOYE WUSSYXMOY ZHHX PG MOY WUASXKHG, UGX OY MOHANOM PM THKY XYSPWPHAL MOUG UGE ZHHXOY OUX YBYK MULMYX. UL OY LUM VYGXPGN NKYYXPSE HBYK PM, OYSIPGN OPTLYSZMH SUKNY LIHHGZASL UGX WOYCPGN HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK, OPL ZUWY CUL SPM AI VEMOY ZPKY UGX MOY LHSXPYKL SHHRYX UM OPT PG LPSYGWY."COYKY OUBY EHA MH NH MH? MYSS AL!" LUPX HGY HZ MOYT."MH THFOUELR.""EHA'KY U NYGMSYTUG, UKYG'M EHA?""EYL.""UGX COUM'L EHAK GUTY?""IYMYK RPKPSEWO.""CYSS MOYG, IYMYK RPKPSEWO, WHTY USHGN CPMO AL, CY'SS MURY EHA MOYKY."PG MOY MHMUS XUKRGYLL MOY LHSXPYKL CUSRYX CPMO IPYKKY MH THFOUELR.VE MOY MPTY MOYE NHM GYUK THFOUELR UGX VYNUG ULWYGXPGN MOY LMYYI OPSSPGMH MOY MHCG, MOY WHWRL CYKY USKYUXE WKHCPGN. IPYKKY CYGM HG CPMO MOYLHSXPYKL, JAPMY ZHKNYMMPGN MOUM OPL PGG CUL UM MOY VHMMHT HZ MOY OPSSUGX MOUM OY OUX USKYUXE IULLYX PM. OY CHASX GHM LHHG OUBY KYTYTVYKYXMOPL, LAWO CUL OPL LMUMY HZ ZHKNYMZASGYLL, OUX OY GHM OUSZCUE AI MOYOPSS LMATVSYX AIHG OPL NKHHT, COH OUX VYYG MH SHHR ZHK OPT PG MOYMHCG UGX CUL KYMAKGPGN MH MOY PGG. MOY NKHHT KYWHNGPFYX IPYKKY PG MOYXUKRGYLL VE OPL COPMY OUM."EHAK YDWYSSYGWE!" OY LUPX. "COE, CY CYKY VYNPGGPGN MH XYLIUPK! OHC PLPM EHA UKY HG ZHHM? UGX COYKY UKY EHA NHPGN, ISYULY?""HO, EYL!" LUPX IPYKKY.MOY LHSXPYKL LMHIIYX."LH EHA'BY ZHAGX EHAK ZHSR?" LUPX HGY HZ MOYT. "CYSS, NHHX-VE, IYMYKRPKPSEWO--PLG'M PM?""NHHX-VEY, IYMYK RPKPSEWO!" IPYKKY OYUKX MOY HMOYK BHPWYL KYIYUM."NHHX-VEY!" OY LUPX UGX MAKGYX CPMO OPL NKHHT MHCUKX MOY PGG."P HANOM MH NPBY MOYT LHTYMOPGN!" OY MOHANOM, UGX ZYSM PG OPL IHWRYM."GH, VYMMYK GHM!" LUPX UGHMOYK, PGGYK BHPWY.MOYKY CUL GHM U KHHT MH VY OUX UM MOY PGG, MOYE CYKY USS HWWAIPYX.IPYKKY CYGM HAM PGMH MOY EUKX UGX, WHBYKPGN OPTLYSZ AI OYUX UGX USS, SUEXHCG PG OPL WUKKPUNY.WOUIMYK PDLWUKWYSE OUX IPYKKY SUPX OPL OYUX HG MOY IPSSHC VYZHKY OY ZYSM OPTLYSZZUSSPGN ULSYYI, VAM LAXXYGSE, USTHLM CPMO MOY XPLMPGWMGYLL HZ KYUSPME,OY OYUKX MOY VHHT, VHHT, VHHT HZ ZPKPGN, MOY MOAX HZ IKHQYWMPSYL, NKHUGLUGX WKPYL, UGX LTYSSYX VSHHX UGX IHCXYK, UGX U ZYYSPGN HZ OHKKHK UGXXKYUX HZ XYUMO LYPFYX OPT. ZPSSYX CPMO ZKPNOM OY HIYGYX OPL YEYL UGXSPZMYX OPL OYUX ZKHT AGXYK OPL WSHUR. USS CUL MKUGJAPS PG MOY EUKX. HGSELHTYHGY'L HKXYKSE IULLYX MOKHANO MOY NUMYCUE, LISULOPGN MOKHANO MOY TAX,UGX MUSRYX MH MOY PGGRYYIYK. UVHBY IPYKKY'L OYUX LHTY IPNYHGL, XPLMAKVYXVE MOY THBYTYGM OY OUX TUXY PG LPMMPGN AI, ZSAMMYKYX AGXYK MOY XUKR KHHZHZ MOY IYGMOHALY. MOY COHSY WHAKMEUKX CUL IYKTYUMYX VE U LMKHGN IYUWYZASLTYSS HZ LMUVSY EUKXL, XYSPNOMZAS MH IPYKKY UM MOUM THTYGM. OY WHASX LYYMOY WSYUK LMUKKE LRE VYMCYYG MOY XUKR KHHZL HZ MCH IYGMOHALYL."MOUGR NHX, MOYKY PL GH THKY HZ MOUM!" OY MOHANOM, WHBYKPGN AI OPL OYUXUNUPG. "HO, COUM U MYKKPVSY MOPGN PL ZYUK, UGX OHC LOUTYZASSE P EPYSXYXMH PM! VAM MOYE... MOYE CYKY LMYUXE UGX WUST USS MOY MPTY, MH MOYYGX..." MOHANOM OY.MOYE, PG IPYKKY'L TPGX, CYKY MOY LHSXPYKL, MOHLY COH OUX VYYG UM MOYVUMMYKE, MOHLY COH OUX NPBYG OPT ZHHX, UGX MOHLY COH OUX IKUEYX VYZHKYMOY PWHG. MOYE, MOHLY LMKUGNY TYG OY OUX GHM IKYBPHALSE RGHCG, LMHHX HAMWSYUKSE UGX LOUKISE ZKHT YBYKEHGY YSLY."MH VY U LHSXPYK, QALM U LHSXPYK!" MOHANOM IPYKKY UL OY ZYSS ULSYYI,"MH YGMYK WHTTAGUS SPZY WHTISYMYSE, MH VY PTVAYX VE COUM TURYL MOYT COUMMOYE UKY. VAM OHC WULM HZZ USS MOY LAIYKZSAHAL, XYBPSPLO VAKXYG HZ TEHAMYK TUG? MOYKY CUL U MPTY COYG P WHASX OUBY XHGY PM. P WHASX OUBY KAGUCUE ZKHT TE ZUMOYK, UL P CUGMYX MH. HK P TPNOM OUBY VYYG LYGM MH LYKBYUL U LHSXPYK UZMYK MOY XAYS CPMO XHSHROHB." UGX MOY TYTHKE HZ MOY XPGGYKUM MOY YGNSPLO WSAV COYG OY OUX WOUSSYGNYX XHSHROHB ZSULOYX MOKHANOIPYKKY'L TPGX, UGX MOYG OY KYTYTVYKYX OPL VYGYZUWMHK UM MHKFOHR. UGX GHCU IPWMAKY HZ U LHSYTG TYYMPGN HZ MOY SHXNY IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OPL TPGX.PM CUL MURPGN ISUWY UM MOY YGNSPLO WSAV UGX LHTYHGY GYUK UGX XYUK MH OPTLUM UM MOY YGX HZ MOY MUVSY. "EYL, MOUM PL OY! PM PL TE VYGYZUWMHK.VAM OY XPYX!" MOHANOM IPYKKY. "EYL, OY XPYX, UGX P XPX GHM RGHC OY CULUSPBY. OHC LHKKE P UT MOUM OY XPYX, UGX OHC NSUX P UT MOUM OY PL USPBYUNUPG!" HG HGY LPXY HZ MOY MUVSY LUM UGUMHSY, XHSHROHB, GYLBPMLRP,XYGPLHB, UGX HMOYKL SPRY MOYT (PG OPL XKYUT MOY WUMYNHKE MH COPWO MOYLYTYG VYSHGNYX CUL UL WSYUKSE XYZPGYX PG OPL TPGX UL MOY WUMYNHKE HZMOHLY OY MYKTYX MOYE), UGX OY OYUKX MOHLY IYHISY, UGUMHSY UGX XHSHROHB,LOHAMPGN UGX LPGNPGN SHAXSE; EYM MOKHANO MOYPK LOHAMPGN MOY BHPWY HZ OPLVYGYZUWMHK CUL OYUKX LIYURPGN USS MOY MPTY UGX MOY LHAGX HZ OPL CHKXLCUL UL CYPNOME UGX AGPGMYKKAIMYX UL MOY VHHTPGN HG MOY VUMMSYZPYSX, VAMISYULUGM UGX WHTZHKMPGN. IPYKKY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM OPL VYGYZUWMHKCUL LUEPGN, VAM OY RGYC (MOY WUMYNHKPYL HZ MOHANOML CYKY USLH JAPMYXPLMPGWM PG OPL XKYUT) MOUM OY CUL MUSRPGN HZ NHHXGYLL UGX MOYIHLLPVPSPME HZ VYPGN COUM MOYE CYKY. UGX MOYE CPMO MOYPK LPTISY, RPGX,ZPKT ZUWYL LAKKHAGXYX OPL VYGYZUWMHK HG USS LPXYL. VAM MOHANO MOYE CYKYRPGXSE MOYE XPX GHM SHHR UM IPYKKY UGX XPX GHM RGHC OPT. CPLOPGN MHLIYUR UGX MH UMMKUWM MOYPK UMMYGMPHG, OY NHM AI, VAM UM MOUM THTYGM OPLSYNL NKYC WHSX UGX VUKY.OY ZYSM ULOUTYX, UGX CPMO HGY UKT WHBYKYX OPL SYNL ZKHT COPWO OPL WSHUROUX PG ZUWM LSPIIYX. ZHK U THTYGM UL OY CUL KYUKKUGNPGN OPL WSHUR IPYKKYHIYGYX OPL YEYL UGX LUC MOY LUTY IYGMOHALY KHHZL, IHLML, UGX EUKX, VAMGHC MOYE CYKY USS VSAPLO, SPM AI, UGX NSPMMYKPGN CPMO ZKHLM HK XYC."PM PL XUCG," MOHANOM IPYKKY. "VAM MOUM'L GHM COUM P CUGM. P CUGM MHOYUK UGX AGXYKLMUGX TE VYGYZUWMHK'L CHKXL." UNUPG OY WHBYKYX OPTLYSZ AICPMO OPL WSHUR, VAM GHC GYPMOYK MOY SHXNY GHK OPL VYGYZUWMHK CUL MOYKY.MOYKY CYKY HGSE MOHANOML WSYUKSE YDIKYLLYX PG CHKXL, MOHANOML MOUMLHTYHGY CUL AMMYKPGN HK MOUM OY OPTLYSZ CUL ZHKTASUMPGN.UZMYKCUKXL COYG OY KYWUSSYX MOHLY MOHANOML IPYKKY CUL WHGBPGWYX MOUMLHTYHGY HAMLPXY OPTLYSZ OUX LIHRYG MOYT, MOHANO MOY PTIKYLLPHGL HZ MOUMXUE OUX YBHRYX MOYT. OY OUX GYBYK, PM LYYTYX MH OPT, VYYG UVSY MH MOPGRUGX YDIKYLL OPL MOHANOML SPRY MOUM COYG UCURY."MH YGXAKY CUK PL MOY THLM XPZZPWASM LAVHKXPGUMPHG HZ TUG'L ZKYYXHT MHMOY SUC HZ NHX," MOY BHPWY OUX LUPX. "LPTISPWPME PL LAVTPLLPHG MH MOYCPSS HZ NHX; EHA WUGGHM YLWUIY ZKHT OPT. UGX MOYE UKY LPTISY. MOYE XHGHM MUSR, VAM UWM. MOY LIHRYG CHKX PL LPSBYK VAM MOY AGLIHRYG PL NHSXYG.TUG WUG VY TULMYK HZ GHMOPGN COPSY OY ZYUKL XYUMO, VAM OY COH XHYL GHMZYUK PM IHLLYLLYL USS. PZ MOYKY CYKY GH LAZZYKPGN, TUG CHASX GHM RGHCOPL SPTPMUMPHGL, CHASX GHM RGHC OPTLYSZ. MOY OUKXYLM MOPGN (IPYKKY CYGMHG MOPGRPGN, HK OYUKPGN, PG OPL XKYUT) PL MH VY UVSY PG EHAK LHAS MHAGPMY MOY TYUGPGN HZ USS. MH AGPMY USS?" OY ULRYX OPTLYSZ. "GH, GHMMH AGPMY. MOHANOML WUGGHM VY AGPMYX, VAM MH OUKGYLL USS MOYLY MOHANOMLMHNYMOYK PL COUM CY GYYX! EYL, HGY TALM OUKGYLL MOYT, TALM OUKGYLLMOYT!" OY KYIYUMYX MH OPTLYSZ CPMO PGCUKX KUIMAKY, ZYYSPGN MOUM MOYLYCHKXL UGX MOYE USHGY YDIKYLLYX COUM OY CUGMYX MH LUE UGX LHSBYX MOYJAYLMPHG MOUM MHKTYGMYX OPT."EYL, HGY TALM OUKGYLL, PM PL MPTY MH OUKGYLL.""MPTY MH OUKGYLL, MPTY MH OUKGYLL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE! OY NSUGWYX UM MOY XPKME PGGEUKX PG MOYTPXXSY HZ COPWO LHSXPYKL CYKY CUMYKPGN MOYPK SYUG OHKLYL UM MOY IATICOPSY WUKML CYKY IULLPGN HAM HZ MOY NUMY. IPYKKY MAKGYX UCUE CPMOKYIANGUGWY, UGX WSHLPGN OPL YEYL JAPWRSE ZYSS VUWR HG MOY WUKKPUNY LYUM."GH, P XHG'M CUGM MOUM, P XHG'M CUGM MH LYY UGX AGXYKLMUGX MOUM. P CUGMMH AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL KYBYUSPGN PMLYSZ MH TY PG TE XKYUT. HGY LYWHGXTHKY UGX P LOHASX OUBY AGXYKLMHHX PM USS! VAM COUM UT P MH XH? OUKGYLL,VAM OHC WUG P OUKGYLL YBYKEMOPGN?" UGX IPYKKY ZYSM CPMO OHKKHK MOUM MOYTYUGPGN HZ USS OY OUX LYYG UGX MOHANOM PG MOY XKYUT OUX VYYG XYLMKHEYX.MOY NKHHT, MOY WHUWOTUG, UGX MOY PGGRYYIYK MHSX IPYKKY MOUM UG HZZPWYKOUX WHTY CPMO GYCL MOUM MOY ZKYGWO CYKY USKYUXE GYUK THFOUELR UGX MOUMHAK TYG CYKY SYUBPGN PM.IPYKKY NHM AI UGX, OUBPGN MHSX MOYT MH OUKGYLL UGX HBYKMURY OPT, CYGM HGZHHM MOKHANO MOY MHCG.MOY MKHHIL CYKY THBPGN HG, SYUBPGN UVHAM MYG MOHALUGX CHAGXYX VYOPGXMOYT. MOYKY CYKY CHAGXYX PG MOY EUKXL, UM MOY CPGXHCL HZ MOY OHALYL, UGXMOY LMKYYML CYKY WKHCXYX CPMO MOYT. PG MOY LMKYYML, UKHAGX WUKML MOUMCYKY MH MURY LHTY HZ MOY CHAGXYX UCUE, LOHAML, WAKLYL, UGX VSHCL WHASXVY OYUKX. IPYKKY HZZYKYX MOY ALY HZ OPL WUKKPUNY, COPWO OUX HBYKMURYGOPT, MH U CHAGXYX NYGYKUS OY RGYC, UGX XKHBY CPMO OPT MH THLWHC. HG MOYCUE IPYKKY CUL MHSX HZ MOY XYUMO HZ OPL VKHMOYK-PG-SUC UGUMHSY UGX HZMOUM HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC.WOUIMYK DHG MOY MOPKMYYGMO HZ UANALM IPYKKY KYUWOYX THLWHC. OY ULRL EHA MH WHTY MH OPT UM HGWY HG UBYKE PTIHKMUGM TUMMYK."CPMOHAM NHPGN OHTY, IPYKKY MHHR U WUV UGX XKHBY MH LYY MOY THLWHCWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ.WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG OUX HGSE MOUM THKGPGN KYMAKGYX MH MHCG ZKHT OPL LATTYKBPSSU UM LHRHSGPRP. MOY UGMYKHHT UGX KYWYIMPHG KHHT HZ OPL OHALYCYKY ZASS HZ HZZPWPUSL COH OUX VYYG LATTHGYX HK OUX WHTY ZHK HKXYKL.BULPSWOPRHB UGX ISUMHB OUX USKYUXE LYYG MOY WHAGM UGX YDISUPGYX MH OPTMOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH XYZYGX THLWHC UGX MOUM PM CHASX OUBY MH VYLAKKYGXYKYX. MOHANO MOPL GYCL CUL VYPGN WHGWYUSYX ZKHT MOY PGOUVPMUGML,MOY HZZPWPUSL--MOY OYUXL HZ MOY BUKPHAL NHBYKGTYGM XYIUKMTYGML--RGYCMOUM THLWHC CHASX LHHG VY PG MOY YGYTE'L OUGXL, QALM UL WHAGM KHLMHIWOPGOPTLYSZ RGYC PM, UGX MH YLWUIY IYKLHGUS KYLIHGLPVPSPME MOYE OUX USSWHTY MH MOY NHBYKGHK MH ULR OHC MOYE CYKY MH XYUS CPMO MOYPK BUKPHALXYIUKMTYGML.UL IPYKKY CUL YGMYKPGN MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT U WHAKPYK ZKHT MOY UKTE WUTYHAM HZ KHLMHIWOPG'L IKPBUMY KHHT.PG UGLCYK MH JAYLMPHGL CPMO COPWO OY CUL NKYYMYX, MOY WHAKPYK TUXY UXYLIUPKPGN NYLMAKY CPMO OPL OUGX UGX IULLYX MOKHANO MOY KHHT.COPSY CUPMPGN PG MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT IPYKKY CPMO CYUKE YEYL CUMWOYX MOYBUKPHAL HZZPWPUSL, HSX UGX EHAGN, TPSPMUKE UGX WPBPSPUG, COH CYKY MOYKY.MOYE USS LYYTYX XPLLUMPLZPYX UGX AGYULE. IPYKKY CYGM AI MH U NKHAI HZTYG, HGY HZ COHT OY RGYC. UZMYK NKYYMPGN IPYKKY MOYE WHGMPGAYX MOYPKWHGBYKLUMPHG."PZ MOYE'KY LYGM HAM UGX VKHANOM VUWR UNUPG SUMYK HG PM CPSS XH GH OUKT,VAM UL MOPGNL UKY GHC HGY WUG'M UGLCYK ZHK UGEMOPGN.""VAM EHA LYY COUM OY CKPMYL..." LUPX UGHMOYK, IHPGMPGN MH U IKPGMYXLOYYM OY OYSX PG OPL OUGX."MOUM'L UGHMOYK TUMMYK. MOUM'L GYWYLLUKE ZHK MOY IYHISY," LUPX MOYZPKLM."COUM PL PM?" ULRYX IPYKKY."HO, PM'L U ZKYLO VKHUXLOYYM."IPYKKY MHHR PM UGX VYNUG KYUXPGN.OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL OUL IULLYX MOKHANO THFOUELR PG HKXYK MH QHPG AI CPMOMOY MKHHIL THBPGN MHCUKX OPT UGX OUL MURYG AI U LMKHGN IHLPMPHG COYKYMOY YGYTE CPSS GHM LHHG UMMUWR OPT. ZHKME YPNOM NAGL CPMO UTTAGPMPHGOUBY VYYG LYGM OPT ZKHT OYKY, UGX OPL LYKYGY OPNOGYLL LUEL OY CPSSXYZYGX THLWHC MH MOY SULM XKHI HZ VSHHX UGX PL YBYG KYUXE MH ZPNOM PGMOY LMKYYML. XH GHM VY AILYM, VKHMOYKL, MOUM MOY SUC WHAKML UKY WSHLYX;MOPGNL OUBY MH VY IAM PG HKXYK, UGX CY CPSS XYUS CPMO BPSSUPGL PG HAKHCG CUE! OYUMMYGXYX LHTY SYWMAKYL LHTYCOYKY UGX PTUNPGYL MOUM MOY XYBPS PL GH TUMWOZHK OPT. MOUM'L MOY LHKM HZ ZYSSHC OY PL. OPL ZUMOYK RYYIL U WHHRLOHIOYKY VE MOY LMHGY VKPXNY, UGX EHA RGHC MOYKY CUL U SUKNY PWHG HZ NHXUSTPNOME IUPGMYX CPMO U LWYIMYK PG HGY OUGX UGX UG HKV PG MOY HMOYK.CYSS, OY MHHR MOUM PWHG OHTY CPMO OPT ZHK U ZYC XUEL UGX COUM XPX OY XH?OY ZHAGX LHTY LWHAGXKYS HZ U IUPGMYK..."WOUIMYK DPPG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOPL ZKYLO MUSY IPYKKY CUL LATTHGYX MH MOY WHTTUGXYK PGWOPYZ.COYG OY YGMYKYX MOY IKPBUMY KHHT WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, IAWRYKPGN OPL ZUWY,CUL KAVVPGN OPL ZHKYOYUX UGX YEYL CPMO OPL OUGX. U LOHKM TUG CUL LUEPGNLHTYMOPGN, VAM COYG IPYKKY YGMYKYX OY LMHIIYX LIYURPGN UGX CYGM HAM."UO, OHC XH EHA XH, NKYUM CUKKPHK?" LUPX KHLMHIWOPG UL LHHG UL MOY LOHKMTUG OUX SYZM MOY KHHT. "CY OUBY OYUKX HZ EHAK IKHCYLL. VAM MOUM'L GHMMOY IHPGM. VYMCYYG HAKLYSBYL, THG WOYK, XH EHA VYSHGN MH MOY TULHGL?" OYCYGM HG LYBYKYSE, UL MOHANO MOYKY CYKY LHTYMOPGN CKHGN UVHAM PM COPWOOY GYBYKMOYSYLL PGMYGXYX MH IUKXHG. IPYKKY KYTUPGYX LPSYGM. "P UT CYSSPGZHKTYX, TE ZKPYGX, VAM P UT UCUKY MOUM MOYKY UKY TULHGL UGX P OHIYMOUM EHA UKY GHM HGY HZ MOHLY COH HG IKYMYGLY HZ LUBPGN TUGRPGX CPLO MHKAPG KALLPU.""EYL, P UT U TULHG," IPYKKY KYISPYX."MOYKY, EHA LYY, THG WOYK! P YDIYWM EHA RGHC MOUM TYLLKL. LIYKUGLRP UGXTUNGPMLRP OUBY VYYG XYIHKMYX MH MOYPK IKHIYK ISUWY. TK. RSEAWOUKYB OULVYYG MKYUMYX PG MOY LUTY CUE, UGX LH OUBY HMOYKL COH HG MOY ISYU HZVAPSXPGN AI MOY MYTISY HZ LHSHTHG OUBY MKPYX MH XYLMKHE MOY MYTISY HZMOYPK ZUMOYKSUGX. EHA WUG AGXYKLMUGX MOUM MOYKY UKY KYULHGL ZHK MOPL UGXMOUM P WHASX GHM OUBY YDPSYX MOY IHLMTULMYK OUX OY GHM VYYG U OUKTZASIYKLHG. PM OUL GHC WHTY MH TE RGHCSYXNY MOUM EHA SYGM OPT EHAK WUKKPUNYZHK OPL KYTHBUS ZKHT MHCG, UGX MOUM EHA OUBY YBYG UWWYIMYX IUIYKL ZKHTOPT ZHK LUZY WALMHXE. P SPRY EHA UGX XHG'M CPLO EHA UGE OUKT UGX--ULEHA UKY HGSE OUSZ TE UNY--P UXBPLY EHA, UL U ZUMOYK CHASX, MH WYULYUSS WHTTAGPWUMPHG CPMO TYG HZ MOUM LMUTI UGX MH SYUBY OYKY UL LHHG ULIHLLPVSY.""VAM COUM XPX RSEAWOUKYB XH CKHGN, WHAGM?" ULRYX IPYKKY."MOUM PL ZHK TY MH RGHC, VAM GHM ZHK EHA MH ULR," LOHAMYX KHLMHIWOPG."PZ OY PL UWWALYX HZ WPKWASUMPGN GUIHSYHG'L IKHWSUTUMPHG PM PL GHMIKHBYX MOUM OY XPX LH," LUPX IPYKKY CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM KHLMHIWOPG, "UGXBYKYLOWOUNPG...""MOYKY CY UKY!" KHLMHIWOPG LOHAMYX UM IPYKKY SHAXYK MOUG VYZHKY,ZKHCGPGN LAXXYGSE. "BYKYLOWOUNPG PL U KYGYNUXY UGX U MKUPMHK COH CPSSVY IAGPLOYX UL OY XYLYKBYL," LUPX OY CPMO MOY BPGXPWMPBY OYUM CPMO COPWOIYHISY LIYUR COYG KYWUSSPGN UG PGLASM. "VAM P XPX GHM LATTHG EHA MHXPLWALL TE UWMPHGL, VAM MH NPBY EHA UXBPWY--HK UG HKXYK PZ EHA IKYZYKPM. P VYN EHA MH SYUBY MOY MHCG UGX VKYUR HZZ USS WHTTAGPWUMPHGCPMO LAWO TYG UL RSEAWOUKYB. UGX P CPSS RGHWR MOY GHGLYGLY HAM HZUGEVHXE"--VAM IKHVUVSE KYUSPFPGN MOUM OY CUL LOHAMPGN UM VYFAROHB COHLH ZUK CUL GHM NAPSME HZ UGEMOPGN, OY UXXYX, MURPGN IPYKKY'L OUGX PG UZKPYGXSE TUGGYK, "CY UKY HG MOY YBY HZ U IAVSPW XPLULMYK UGX P OUBYG'MMPTY MH VY IHSPMY MH YBYKEVHXE COH OUL VALPGYLL CPMO TY. CYSS, THG WOYK, COUM UKY EHA XHPGN IYKLHGUSSE?""COE, GHMOPGN," UGLCYKYX IPYKKY CPMOHAM KUPLPGN OPL YEYL HK WOUGNPGN MOYMOHANOMZAS YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZUWY.MOY WHAGM ZKHCGYX."U CHKX HZ ZKPYGXSE UXBPWY, THG WOYK. VY HZZ UL LHHG UL EHA WUG, MOUM'LUSS P OUBY MH MYSS EHA. OUIIE OY COH OUL YUKL MH OYUK. NHHX-VEY, TE XYUKZYSSHC. HO, VE MOY VE!" OY LOHAMYX MOKHANO MOY XHHKCUE UZMYK IPYKKY,"PL PM MKAY MOUM MOY WHAGMYLL OUL ZUSSYG PGMH MOY WSAMWOYL HZ MOY OHSEZUMOYKL HZ MOY LHWPYME HZ QYLAL?"IPYKKY XPX GHM UGLCYK UGX SYZM KHLMHIWOPG'L KHHT THKY LASSYG UGX UGNKEMOUG OY OUX YBYK VYZHKY LOHCG OPTLYSZ.COYG OY KYUWOYX OHTY PM CUL USKYUXE NYMMPGN XUKR. LHTY YPNOM IYHISY OUXWHTY MH LYY OPT MOUM YBYGPGN: MOY LYWKYMUKE HZ U WHTTPMMYY, MOY WHSHGYSHZ OPL VUMMUSPHG, OPL LMYCUKX, OPL TUQHK-XHTH, UGX BUKPHAL IYMPMPHGYKL.MOYE USS OUX VALPGYLL CPMO IPYKKY UGX CUGMYX XYWPLPHGL ZKHT OPT. IPYKKYXPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX UGX CUL GHM PGMYKYLMYX PG UGE HZ MOYLY JAYLMPHGL UGXHGSE UGLCYKYX MOYT PG HKXYK MH NYM KPX HZ MOYLY IYHISY. COYG SYZM USHGYUM SULM OY HIYGYX UGX KYUX OPL CPZY'L SYMMYK."MOYE, MOY LHSXPYKL UM MOY VUMMYKE, IKPGWY UGXKYC RPSSYX... MOUM HSXTUG... LPTISPWPME PL LAVTPLLPHG MH NHX. LAZZYKPGN PL GYWYLLUKE... MOYTYUGPGN HZ USS... HGY TALM OUKGYLL... TE CPZY PL NYMMPGN TUKKPYX... HGYTALM ZHKNYM UGX AGXYKLMUGX..." UGX NHPGN MH OPL VYX OY MOKYC OPTLYSZ HGPM CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN UGX PTTYXPUMYSE ZYSS ULSYYI.COYG OY UCHRY GYDM THKGPGN MOY TUQHK-XHTH WUTY MH PGZHKT OPT MOUM ULIYWPUS TYLLYGNYK, U IHSPWY HZZPWYK, OUX WHTY ZKHT WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG MHRGHC COYMOYK WHAGM VYFAROHB OUX SYZM HK CUL SYUBPGN MOY MHCG.U XHFYG IYKLHGL COH OUX VALPGYLL CPMO IPYKKY CYKY UCUPMPGN OPT PG MOYXKUCPGN KHHT. IPYKKY XKYLLYX OAKKPYXSE UGX, PGLMYUX HZ NHPGN MH LYYMOYT, CYGM MH MOY VUWR IHKWO UGX HAM MOKHANO MOY NUMY.ZKHT MOUM MPTY MPSS MOY YGX HZ MOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ THLWHC GH HGY HZVYFAROHB'L OHALYOHSX, XYLIPMY USS MOY LYUKWO MOYE TUXY, LUC IPYKKY UNUPGHK RGYC COYKY OY CUL.WOUIMYK DPPMOY KHLMHBL KYTUPGYX PG THLWHC MPSS MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK, MOUM PL,MPSS MOY YBY HZ MOY YGYTE'L YGMKE PGMH MOY WPME.UZMYK IYMEU OUX QHPGYX HVHSYGLRP'L KYNPTYGM HZ WHLLUWRL UGX SYZM ZHKVYSUEU MLYKRHB COYKY MOUM KYNPTYGM CUL ZHKTPGN, MOY WHAGMYLL CUL LYPFYXCPMO MYKKHK. MOY MOHANOM MOUM VHMO OYK LHGL CYKY UM MOY CUK, OUX VHMONHGY ZKHT AGXYK OYK CPGN, MOUM MHXUE HK MHTHKKHC YPMOYK HK VHMO HZ MOYTTPNOM VY RPSSYX SPRY MOY MOKYY LHGL HZ HGY HZ OYK UWJAUPGMUGWYL, LMKAWROYK MOUM LATTYK ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY CPMO WKAYS WSYUKGYLL. LOY MKPYX MHNYM GPWOHSUL VUWR UGX CPLOYX MH NH OYKLYSZ MH QHPG IYMEU, HK MH NYMOPT UG UIIHPGMTYGM LHTYCOYKY PG IYMYKLVAKN, VAM GYPMOYK HZ MOYLY IKHBYXIHLLPVSY. IYMEU WHASX GHM KYMAKG AGSYLL OPL KYNPTYGM XPX LH HK AGSYLLOY CUL MKUGLZYKKYX MH UGHMOYK KYNPTYGM HG UWMPBY LYKBPWY. GPWOHSUL CULLHTYCOYKY CPMO MOY UKTE UGX OUX GHM LYGM U CHKX LPGWY OPL SULM SYMMYK,PG COPWO OY OUX NPBYG U XYMUPSYX UWWHAGM HZ OPL TYYMPGN CPMO IKPGWYLLTUKE. MOY WHAGMYLL XPX GHM LSYYI UM GPNOM, HK COYG LOY XPX ZUSS ULSYYIXKYUTYX MOUM LOY LUC OYK LHGL SEPGN XYUX. UZMYK TUGE WHGLASMUMPHGL UGXWHGBYKLUMPHGL, MOY WHAGM UM SULM XYBPLYX TYUGL MH MKUGJAPSSPFY OYK. OYNHM IYMEU MKUGLZYKKYX ZKHT HVHSYGLRP'L KYNPTYGM MH VYFAROHB'L, COPWO CULPG MKUPGPGN GYUK THLWHC. MOHANO IYMEU CHASX KYTUPG PG MOY LYKBPWY, MOPLMKUGLZYK CHASX NPBY MOY WHAGMYLL MOY WHGLHSUMPHG HZ LYYPGN UM SYULM HGYHZ OYK LHGL AGXYK OYK CPGN, UGX LOY OHIYX MH UKKUGNY TUMMYKL ZHK OYKIYMEU LH UL GHM MH SYM OPT NH UNUPG, VAM USCUEL NYM OPT UIIHPGMYX MHISUWYL COYKY OY WHASX GHM IHLLPVSE MURY IUKM PG U VUMMSY. UL SHGN ULGPWOHSUL USHGY CUL PG XUGNYK MOY WHAGMYLL PTUNPGYX MOUM LOY SHBYX OYKZPKLM-VHKG THKY MOUG USS OYK HMOYK WOPSXKYG UGX YBYG KYIKHUWOYX OYKLYSZZHK PM; VAM COYG OYK EHAGNYLM: MOY LWUIYNKUWY COH OUX VYYG VUX UMSYLLHGL, CUL USCUEL VKYURPGN MOPGNL PG MOY OHALY UGX TURPGN OPTLYSZ UGAPLUGWY MH YBYKEVHXE, MOUM LGAV-GHLYX IYMEU CPMO OPL TYKKE VSUWR YEYLUGX ZKYLO KHLE WOYYRL COYKY LHZM XHCG CUL QALM VYNPGGPGN MH LOHC--COYGOY CUL MOKHCG UTPX MOHLY VPN, XKYUXZAS, WKAYS TYG COH CYKY ZPNOMPGNLHTYCOYKY UVHAM LHTYMOPGN UGX UIIUKYGMSE ZPGXPGN ISYULAKY PG PM--MOYGOPL THMOYK MOHANOM LOY SHBYX OPT THKY, TAWO THKY, MOUG USS OYK HMOYKWOPSXKYG. MOY GYUKYK MOY MPTY WUTY ZHK IYMEU MH KYMAKG, MOY THKY AGYULENKYC MOY WHAGMYLL. LOY VYNUG MH MOPGR LOY CHASX GYBYK SPBY MH LYY LAWOOUIIPGYLL. MOY IKYLYGWY HZ LHGEU, HZ OYK VYSHBYX GUMULOU, HK YBYG HZOYK OALVUGX PKKPMUMYX OYK. "COUM XH P CUGM CPMO MOYT? P CUGM GH HGY VAMIYMEU," LOY MOHANOM.UM MOY YGX HZ UANALM MOY KHLMHBL KYWYPBYX UGHMOYK SYMMYK ZKHT GPWOHSUL.OY CKHMY ZKHT MOY IKHBPGWY HZ BHKHGYFO COYKY OY OUX VYYG LYGM MH IKHWAKYKYTHAGML, VAM MOUM SYMMYK XPX GHM LYM MOY WHAGMYLL UM YULY. RGHCPGN MOUMHGY LHG CUL HAM HZ XUGNYK LOY VYWUTY MOY THKY UGDPHAL UVHAM IYMEU.MOHANO VE MOY MCYGMPYMO HZ UANALM GYUKSE USS MOY KHLMHBL' UWJAUPGMUGWYLOUX SYZM THLWHC, UGX MOHANO YBYKEVHXE MKPYX MH IYKLAUXY MOY WHAGMYLL MHNYM UCUE UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY, LOY CHASX GHM OYUK HZ SYUBPGN VYZHKYOYK MKYULAKY, OYK UXHKYX IYMEU, KYMAKGYX. HG MOY MCYGME-YPNOMO HZ UANALMOY UKKPBYX. MOY IULLPHGUMY MYGXYKGYLL CPMO COPWO OPL THMOYK KYWYPBYX OPTXPX GHM ISYULY MOY LPDMYYG-EYUK-HSX HZZPWYK. MOHANO LOY WHGWYUSYX ZKHTOPT OYK PGMYGMPHG HZ RYYIPGN OPT AGXYK OYK CPGN, IYMEU NAYLLYX OYKXYLPNGL, UGX PGLMPGWMPBYSE ZYUKPGN MOUM OY TPNOM NPBY CUE MH YTHMPHGCOYG CPMO OYK--TPNOM "VYWHTY CHTUGPLO" UL OY MYKTYX PM MH OPTLYSZ--OYMKYUMYX OYK WHSXSE, UBHPXYX OYK, UGX XAKPGN OPL LMUE PG THLWHC UMMUWOYXOPTLYSZ YDWSALPBYSE MH GUMULOU ZHK COHT OY OUX USCUEL OUX U IUKMPWASUKSEVKHMOYKSE MYGXYKGYLL, USTHLM SHBYK-SPRY.HCPGN MH MOY WHAGM'L WALMHTUKE WUKYSYLLGYLL GHMOPGN CUL KYUXE ZHK MOYPKXYIUKMAKY VE MOY MCYGME-YPNOMO HZ UANALM UGX MOY WUKML MOUM CYKY MHWHTY ZKHT MOYPK KEUFUG UGX THLWHC YLMUMYL MH KYTHBY MOYPK OHALYOHSXVYSHGNPGNL XPX GHM UKKPBY MPSS MOY MOPKMPYMO.ZKHT MOY MCYGME-YPNOMO MPSS MOY MOPKME-ZPKLM USS THLWHC CUL PG U VALMSYUGX WHTTHMPHG. YBYKE XUE MOHALUGXL HZ TYG CHAGXYX UM VHKHXPGH CYKYVKHANOM PG VE MOY XHKHNHTPSHB NUMY UGX MURYG MH BUKPHAL IUKML HZ THLWHC,UGX MOHALUGXL HZ WUKML WHGBYEYX MOY PGOUVPMUGML UGX MOYPK IHLLYLLPHGLHAM VE MOY HMOYK NUMYL. PG LIPMY HZ KHLMHIWOPG'L VKHUXLOYYML, HK VYWUALYHZ MOYT HK PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ MOYT, MOY LMKUGNYLM UGX THLM WHGMKUXPWMHKEKATHKL CYKY WAKKYGM PG MOY MHCG. LHTY LUPX MOUM GH HGY CUL MH VY USSHCYXMH SYUBY MOY WPME, HMOYKL HG MOY WHGMKUKE LUPX MOUM USS MOY PWHGL OUXVYYG MURYG HAM HZ MOY WOAKWOYL UGX YBYKEVHXE CUL MH VY HKXYKYX MH SYUBY.LHTY LUPX MOYKY OUX VYYG UGHMOYK VUMMSY UZMYK VHKHXPGH UM COPWO MOYZKYGWO OUX VYYG KHAMYX, COPSY HMOYKL HG MOY WHGMKUKE KYIHKMYX MOUM MOYKALLPUG UKTE OUX VYYG XYLMKHEYX. LHTY MUSRYX UVHAM MOY THLWHC TPSPMPUCOPWO, IKYWYXYX VE MOY WSYKNE, CHASX NH MH MOY MOKYY OPSSL; HMOYKLCOPLIYKYX MOUM UANALMPG OUX VYYG ZHKVPXXYG MH SYUBY, MOUM MKUPMHKL OUXVYYG LYPFYX, MOUM MOY IYULUGML CYKY KPHMPGN UGX KHVVPGN IYHISY HG MOYPKCUE ZKHT THLWHC, UGX LH HG. VAM USS MOPL CUL HGSE MUSR; PG KYUSPME(MOHANO MOY WHAGWPS HZ ZPSP, UM COPWO PM CUL XYWPXYX MH UVUGXHG THLWHC,OUX GHM EYM VYYG OYSX) VHMO MOHLY COH CYGM UCUE UGX MOHLY COH KYTUPGYXVYOPGX ZYSM, MOHANO MOYE XPX GHM LOHC PM, MOUM THLWHC CHASX WYKMUPGSEVY UVUGXHGYX, UGX MOUM MOYE HANOM MH NYM UCUE UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY UGXLUBY MOYPK VYSHGNPGNL. PM CUL ZYSM MOUM YBYKEMOPGN CHASX LAXXYGSE VKYURAI UGX WOUGNY, VAM AI MH MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK GHMOPGN OUX XHGY LH.UL U WKPTPGUS COH PL VYPGN SYX MH YDYWAMPHG RGHCL MOUM OY TALM XPYPTTYXPUMYSE, VAM EYM SHHRL UVHAM OPT UGX LMKUPNOMYGL MOY WUI MOUM PLUCKE HG OPL OYUX, LH THLWHC PGBHSAGMUKPSE WHGMPGAYX PML CHGMYX SPZY,MOHANO PM RGYC MOUM MOY MPTY HZ PML XYLMKAWMPHG CUL GYUK COYG MOYWHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY MH COPWO PML IYHISY CYKY UWWALMHTYX MH LAVTPM CHASXVY WHTISYMYSE AILYM.XAKPGN MOY MOKYY XUEL IKYWYXPGN MOY HWWAIUMPHG HZ THLWHC MOY COHSYKHLMHB ZUTPSE CUL UVLHKVYX PG BUKPHAL UWMPBPMPYL. MOY OYUX HZ MOYZUTPSE, WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB, WHGMPGAUSSE XKHBY UVHAM MOY WPME WHSSYWMPGNMOY WAKKYGM KATHKL ZKHT USS LPXYL UGX NUBY LAIYKZPWPUS UGX OULME HKXYKLUM OHTY UVHAM MOY IKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK MOYPK XYIUKMAKY.MOY WHAGMYLL CUMWOYX MOY MOPGNL VYPGN IUWRYX, CUL XPLLUMPLZPYX CPMOYBYKEMOPGN, CUL WHGLMUGMSE PG IAKLAPM HZ IYMEU COH CUL USCUEL KAGGPGNUCUE ZKHT OYK, UGX CUL QYUSHAL HZ GUMULOU CPMO COHT OY LIYGM USS OPLMPTY. LHGEU USHGY XPKYWMYX MOY IKUWMPWUS LPXY HZ TUMMYKL VE NYMMPGNMOPGNL IUWRYX. VAM HZ SUMY LHGEU OUX VYYG IUKMPWASUKSE LUX UGX LPSYGM.GPWOHSUL' SYMMYK PG COPWO OY TYGMPHGYX IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX YSPWPMYX, PGOYK IKYLYGWY, QHEHAL WHTTYGML ZKHT MOY WHAGMYLL, COH LUC UG PGMYKBYGMPHGHZ IKHBPXYGWY PG MOPL TYYMPGN HZ MOY IKPGWYLL UGX GPWOHSUL."P CUL GYBYK ISYULYX UM VHSRHGLRP'L YGNUNYTYGM MH GUMULOU," LUPX MOYWHAGMYLL, "VAM P USCUEL CUGMYX GPWOHSUL MH TUKKE MOY IKPGWYLL, UGX OUX UIKYLYGMPTYGM MOUM PM CHASX OUIIYG. COUM U NHHX MOPGN PM CHASX VY!"LHGEU ZYSM MOUM MOPL CUL MKAY: MOUM MOY HGSE IHLLPVPSPME HZ KYMKPYBPGNMOY KHLMHBL' UZZUPKL CUL VE GPWOHSUL TUKKEPGN U KPWO CHTUG, UGX MOUM MOYIKPGWYLL CUL U NHHX TUMWO. PM CUL BYKE VPMMYK ZHK OYK. VAM XYLIPMYOYK NKPYZ, HK IYKOUIL QALM VYWUALY HZ PM, LOY MHHR HG OYKLYSZ USS MOYXPZZPWASM CHKR HZ XPKYWMPGN MOY LMHKPGN UGX IUWRPGN HZ MOYPK MOPGNL UGXCUL VALE ZHK COHSY XUEL. MOY WHAGM UGX WHAGMYLL MAKGYX MH OYK COYG MOYEOUX UGE HKXYKL MH NPBY. IYMEU UGX GUMULOU HG MOY WHGMKUKE, ZUK ZKHTOYSIPGN MOYPK IUKYGML, CYKY NYGYKUSSE U GAPLUGWY UGX U OPGXKUGWY MHYBYKEHGY. USTHLM USS XUE SHGN MOY OHALY KYLHAGXYX CPMO MOYPK KAGGPGNZYYM, MOYPK WKPYL, UGX MOYPK LIHGMUGYHAL SUANOMYK. MOYE SUANOYX UGX CYKYNUE GHM VYWUALY MOYKY CUL UGE KYULHG MH SUANO, VAM VYWUALY NUPYME UGXTPKMO CYKY PG MOYPK OYUKML UGX LH YBYKEMOPGN MOUM OUIIYGYX CUL U WUALYZHK NUPYME UGX SUANOMYK MH MOYT. IYMEU CUL PG OPNO LIPKPML VYWUALYOUBPGN SYZM OHTY U VHE OY OUX KYMAKGYX (UL YBYKEVHXE MHSX OPT) U ZPGYEHAGN TUG, VYWUALY OY CUL UM OHTY, VYWUALY OY OUX SYZM VYSUEU MLYKRHBCOYKY MOYKY CUL GH OHIY HZ LHHG MURPGN IUKM PG U VUMMSY UGX OUX WHTY MHTHLWHC COYKY MOYKY CUL MH VY ZPNOMPGN PG U ZYC XUEL, UGX WOPYZSE VYWUALYGUMULOU, COHLY SYUX OY USCUEL ZHSSHCYX, CUL PG OPNO LIPKPML. GUMULOU CULNUE VYWUALY LOY OUX VYYG LUX MHH SHGN UGX GHC GHMOPGN KYTPGXYX OYK HZMOY WUALY HZ OYK LUXGYLL, UGX VYWUALY LOY CUL ZYYSPGN CYSS. LOY CUL USLHOUIIE VYWUALY LOY OUX LHTYHGY MH UXHKY OYK: MOY UXHKUMPHG HZ HMOYKLCUL U SAVKPWUGM MOY COYYSL HZ OYK TUWOPGY GYYXYX MH TURY MOYT KAGZKYYSE--UGX IYMEU UXHKYX OYK. UVHBY USS, MOYE CYKY NUE VYWUALY MOYKY CULU CUK GYUK THLWHC, MOYKY CHASX VY ZPNOMPGN UM MOY MHCG NUMYL, UKTL CYKYVYPGN NPBYG HAM, YBYKEVHXE CUL YLWUIPGN--NHPGN UCUE LHTYCOYKY, UGXPG NYGYKUS LHTYMOPGN YDMKUHKXPGUKE CUL OUIIYGPGN, UGX MOUM PL USCUELYDWPMPGN, YLIYWPUSSE MH MOY EHAGN.WOUIMYK DPPPHG LUMAKXUE, MOY MOPKME-ZPKLM HZ UANALM, YBYKEMOPGN PG MOY KHLMHBL'OHALY LYYTYX MHILE-MAKBE. USS MOY XHHKL CYKY HIYG, USS MOY ZAKGPMAKY CULVYPGN WUKKPYX HAM HK THBYX UVHAM, UGX MOY TPKKHKL UGX IPWMAKYL OUX VYYGMURYG XHCG. MOYKY CYKY MKAGRL PG MOY KHHTL, UGX OUE, CKUIIPGN IUIYK, UGXKHIYL CYKY LWUMMYKYX UVHAM. MOY IYULUGML UGX OHALY LYKZL WUKKEPGN HAMMOY MOPGNL CYKY MKYUXPGN OYUBPSE HG MOY IUKJAYM ZSHHKL. MOY EUKX CULWKHCXYX CPMO IYULUGM WUKML, LHTY SHUXYX OPNO UGX USKYUXE WHKXYX AI,HMOYKL LMPSS YTIME.MOY BHPWYL UGX ZHHMLMYIL HZ MOY TUGE LYKBUGML UGX HZ MOY IYULUGML COHOUX WHTY CPMO MOY WUKML KYLHAGXYX UL MOYE LOHAMYX MH HGY UGHMOYK PGMOY EUKX UGX PG MOY OHALY. MOY WHAGM OUX VYYG HAM LPGWY THKGPGN. MOYWHAGMYLL OUX U OYUXUWOY VKHANOM HG VE USS MOY GHPLY UGX MAKTHPS UGX CULSEPGN XHCG PG MOY GYC LPMMPGN KHHT CPMO U BPGYNUK WHTIKYLL HG OYK OYUX.IYMEU CUL GHM UM OHTY, OY OUX NHGY MH BPLPM U ZKPYGX CPMO COHT OY TYUGMMH HVMUPG U MKUGLZYK ZKHT MOY TPSPMPU MH MOY UWMPBY UKTE. LHGEU CUL PGMOY VUSSKHHT SHHRPGN UZMYK MOY IUWRPGN HZ MOY NSULL UGX WOPGU. GUMULOUCUL LPMMPGN HG MOY ZSHHK HZ OYK XPLTUGMSYX KHHT CPMO XKYLLYL, KPVVHGL,UGX LWUKBYL LMKYCG USS UVHAM OYK, NUFPGN ZPDYXSE UM MOY ZSHHK UGXOHSXPGN PG OYK OUGXL MOY HSX VUSS XKYLL (USKYUXE HAM HZ ZULOPHG) COPWOLOY OUX CHKG UM OYK ZPKLM IYMYKLVAKN VUSS.GUMULOU CUL ULOUTYX HZ XHPGN GHMOPGN COYG YBYKEHGY YSLY CUL LH VALE, UGXLYBYKUS MPTYL MOUM THKGPGN OUX MKPYX MH LYM MH CHKR, VAM OYK OYUKM CULGHM PG PM, UGX LOY WHASX GHM UGX XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH XH UGEMOPGN YDWYIMCPMO USS OYK OYUKM UGX USS OYK TPNOM. ZHK U COPSY LOY OUX LMHHX VYLPXYLHGEU COPSY MOY WOPGU CUL VYPGN IUWRYX UGX MKPYX MH OYSI, VAM LHHG NUBYPM AI UGX CYGM MH OYK KHHT MH IUWR OYK HCG MOPGNL. UM ZPKLM LOY ZHAGX PMUTALPGN MH NPBY UCUE XKYLLYL UGX KPVVHGL MH MOY TUPXL, VAM COYG MOUM CULXHGY UGX COUM CUL SYZM OUX LMPSS MH VY IUWRYX, LOY ZHAGX PM XASS."XAGEULOU, EHA IUWR! EHA CPSS, CHG'M EHA, XYUK?" UGX COYG XAGEULOUCPSSPGNSE IKHTPLYX MH XH PM USS ZHK OYK, GUMULOU LUM XHCG HG MOY ZSHHK,MHHR OYK HSX VUSS XKYLL, UGX ZYSS PGMH U KYBYKPY JAPMY AGKYSUMYX MH COUMHANOM MH OUBY HWWAIPYX OYK MOHANOML GHC. LOY CUL KHALYX ZKHT OYK KYBYKPYVE MOY MUSR HZ MOY TUPXL PG MOY GYDM KHHT (COPWO CUL MOYPKL) UGX VE MOYLHAGX HZ MOYPK OAKKPYX ZHHMLMYIL NHPGN MH MOY VUWR IHKWO. GUMULOU NHMAI UGX SHHRYX HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC. UG YGHKTHALSE SHGN KHC HZ WUKML ZASS HZCHAGXYX TYG OUX LMHIIYX PG MOY LMKYYM.MOY OHALYRYYIYK, MOY HSX GAKLY, MOY WHHRL, WHUWOTYG, TUPXL, ZHHMTYG,IHLMPSPHGL, UGX LWASSPHGL LMHHX UM MOY NUMY, LMUKPGN UM MOY CHAGXYX.GUMULOU, MOKHCPGN U WSYUG IHWRYM OUGXRYKWOPYZ HBYK OYK OUPK UGX OHSXPGNUG YGX HZ PM PG YUWO OUGX, CYGM HAM PGMH MOY LMKYYM.MOY ZHKTYK OHALYRYYIYK, HSX TUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU, OUX LMYIIYX HAM HZ MOYWKHCX VE MOY NUMY, NHGY AI MH U WUKM CPMO U OHHX WHGLMKAWMYX HZ VULMTUML, UGX CUL LIYURPGN MH U IUSY EHAGN HZZPWYK COH SUE PGLPXY.GUMULOU THBYX U ZYC LMYIL ZHKCUKX UGX LMHIIYX LOESE, LMPSS OHSXPGN OYKOUGXRYKWOPYZ, UGX SPLMYGYX MH COUM MOY OHALYRYYIYK CUL LUEPGN."MOYG EHA OUBY GHVHXE PG THLWHC?" LOY CUL LUEPGN. "EHA CHASX VY THKYWHTZHKMUVSY LHTYCOYKY PG U OHALY... PG HAKL, ZHK PGLMUGWY... MOY ZUTPSEUKY SYUBPGN.""P XHG'M RGHC PZ PM CHASX VY USSHCYX," KYISPYX MOY HZZPWYK PG U CYURBHPWY. "OYKY PL HAK WHTTUGXPGN HZZPWYK... ULR OPT," UGX OY IHPGMYX MH ULMHAM TUQHK COH CUL CUSRPGN VUWR USHGN MOY LMKYYM IULM MOY KHC HZ WUKML.GUMULOU NSUGWYX CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL UM MOY ZUWY HZ MOY CHAGXYX HZZPWYKUGX UM HGWY CYGM MH TYYM MOY TUQHK."TUE MOY CHAGXYX TYG LMUE PG HAK OHALY?" LOY ULRYX.MOY TUQHK KUPLYX OPL OUGX MH OPL WUI CPMO U LTPSY."COPWO HGY XH EHA CUGM, TU'UT'LYSSY?" LUPX OY, LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL UGXLTPSPGN.GUMULOU JAPYMSE KYIYUMYX OYK JAYLMPHG, UGX OYK ZUWY UGX COHSYTUGGYK CYKY LH LYKPHAL, MOHANO LOY CUL LMPSS OHSXPGN MOY YGXL HZOYK OUGXRYKWOPYZ, MOUM MOY TUQHK WYULYX LTPSPGN UGX UZMYK LHTYKYZSYWMPHG--UL PZ WHGLPXYKPGN PG OHC ZUK MOY MOPGN CUL IHLLPVSY--KYISPYXPG MOY UZZPKTUMPBY."HO EYL, COE GHM? MOYE TUE," OY LUPX.CPMO U LSPNOM PGWSPGUMPHG HZ OYK OYUX, GUMULOU LMYIIYX VUWR JAPWRSE MHTUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU, COH LMHHX MUSRPGN WHTIULLPHGUMYSE MH MOY HZZPWYK."MOYE TUE. OY LUEL MOYE TUE!" COPLIYKYX GUMULOU.MOY WUKM PG COPWO MOY HZZPWYK SUE CUL MAKGYX PGMH MOY KHLMHBL' EUKX,UGX XHFYGL HZ WUKML CPMO CHAGXYX TYG VYNUG UM MOY PGBPMUMPHG HZ MOYMHCGLZHSR MH MAKG PGMH MOY EUKXL UGX MH XKUC AI UM MOY YGMKUGWYL HZ MOYOHALYL PG IHBUKLRUEU LMKYYM. GUMULOU CUL YBPXYGMSE ISYULYX MH VY XYUSPGNCPMO GYC IYHISY HAMLPXY MOY HKXPGUKE KHAMPGY HZ OYK SPZY. LOY UGX TUBKURAFTPGPWOGU MKPYX MH NYM UL TUGE HZ MOY CHAGXYX UL IHLLPVSY PGMH MOYPKEUKX."EHAK IUIU TALM VY MHSX, MOHANO," LUPX TUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU."GYBYK TPGX, GYBYK TPGX, COUM XHYL PM TUMMYK? ZHK HGY XUE CY WUG THBYPGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT. MOYE WUG OUBY USS HAK OUSZ HZ MOY OHALY.""MOYKY GHC, EHAGN SUXE, EHA XH MURY MOPGNL PGMH EHAK OYUX! YBYG PZ CYIAM MOYT PGMH MOY CPGN, MOY TYG'L KHHT, HK MOY GAKLY'L KHHT, CY TALM ULRIYKTPLLPHG.""CYSS, P'SS ULR."GUMULOU KUG PGMH MOY OHALY UGX CYGM HG MPIMHY MOKHANO MOY OUSZ-HIYG XHHKPGMH MOY LPMMPGN KHHT, COYKY MOYKY CUL U LTYSS HZ BPGYNUK UGX OHZZTUG'LXKHIL."UKY EHA ULSYYI, TUTTU?""HO, COUM LSYYI-?" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, CURPGN AI QALM UL LOY CUL XKHIIPGNPGMH U XHFY."TUTTU XUKSPGN!" LUPX GUMULOU, RGYYSPGN VE OYK THMOYK UGX VKPGNPGN OYKZUWY WSHLY MH OYK THMOYK'L, "P UT LHKKE, ZHKNPBY TY, P'SS GYBYK XH PMUNUPG; P CHRY EHA AI! TUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU OUL LYGM TY: MOYE OUBY VKHANOMLHTY CHAGXYX OYKY--HZZPWYKL. CPSS EHA SYM MOYT WHTY? MOYE OUBY GHCOYKYMH NH. P RGYC EHA'X SYM MOYT WHTY!" LOY LUPX JAPWRSE USS PG HGY VKYUMO."COUM HZZPWYKL? COHT OUBY MOYE VKHANOM? P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX UGEMOPGNUVHAM PM," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL.GUMULOU SUANOYX, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL MHH LTPSYX LSPNOMSE."P RGYC EHA'X NPBY IYKTPLLPHG... LH P'SS MYSS MOYT," UGX, OUBPGN RPLLYXOYK THMOYK, GUMULOU NHM AI UGX CYGM MH MOY XHHK.PG MOY OUSS LOY TYM OYK ZUMOYK, COH OUX KYMAKGYX CPMO VUX GYCL."CY'BY LMUEYX MHH SHGN!" LUPX MOY WHAGM CPMO PGBHSAGMUKE BYDUMPHG. "MOYWSAV PL WSHLYX UGX MOY IHSPWY UKY SYUBPGN.""IUIU, PL PM USS KPNOM--P'BY PGBPMYX LHTY HZ MOY CHAGXYX PGMH MOYOHALY?" LUPX GUMULOU."HZ WHAKLY PM PL," OY UGLCYKYX UVLYGMSE. "MOUM'L GHM MOY IHPGM. P VYNEHA GHM MH PGXASNY PG MKPZSYL GHC, VAM MH OYSI MH IUWR, UGX MHTHKKHC CYTALM NH, NH, NH!...."UGX MOY WHAGM NUBY U LPTPSUK HKXYK MH MOY TUQHK-XHTH UGX MOY LYKBUGML.UM XPGGYK IYMEU OUBPGN KYMAKGYX OHTY MHSX MOYT MOY GYCL OY OUX OYUKX.OY LUPX MOY IYHISY OUX VYYG NYMMPGN UKTL PG MOY RKYTSPG, UGX MOUM MOHANOKHLMHIWOPG'L VKHUXLOYYM OUX LUPX MOUM OY CHASX LHAGX U WUSS MCH HK MOKYYXUEL PG UXBUGWY, MOY HKXYK OUX WYKMUPGSE USKYUXE VYYG NPBYG ZHK YBYKEHGYMH NH UKTYX MH MOY MOKYY OPSSL MHTHKKHC, UGX MOUM MOYKY CHASX VY U VPNVUMMSY MOYKY.MOY WHAGMYLL SHHRYX CPMO MPTPX OHKKHK UM OYK LHG'L YUNYK, YDWPMYX ZUWYUL OY LUPX MOPL. LOY KYUSPFYX MOUM PZ LOY LUPX U CHKX UVHAM OPL GHMNHPGN MH MOY VUMMSY (LOY RGYC OY YGQHEYX MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY PTIYGXPGNYGNUNYTYGM) OY CHASX LUE LHTYMOPGN UVHAM TYG, OHGHK, UGX MOYZUMOYKSUGX--LHTYMOPGN LYGLYSYLL, TULWASPGY, UGX HVLMPGUMY COPWO MOYKYCHASX VY GH WHGMKUXPWMPGN, UGX OYK ISUGL CHASX VY LIHPSYX; UGX LH,OHIPGN MH UKKUGNY MH SYUBY VYZHKY MOYG UGX MURY IYMEU CPMO OYK UL MOYPKIKHMYWMHK UGX XYZYGXYK, LOY XPX GHM UGLCYK OPT, VAM UZMYK XPGGYK WUSSYXMOY WHAGM ULPXY UGX PTISHKYX OPT CPMO MYUKL MH MURY OYK UCUE JAPWRSE,MOUM BYKE GPNOM PZ IHLLPVSY. CPMO U CHTUG'L PGBHSAGMUKE SHBPGN WAGGPGNLOY, COH MPSS MOYG OUX GHM LOHCG UGE USUKT, LUPX MOUM LOY CHASX XPY HZZKPNOM PZ MOYE XPX GHM SYUBY MOUM BYKE GPNOM. CPMOHAM UGE IKYMYGLY LOYCUL GHC UZKUPX HZ YBYKEMOPGN.WOUIMYK DPBTUXUTY LWOHLL, COH OUX VYYG HAM MH BPLPM OYK XUANOMYK, PGWKYULYX MOYWHAGMYLL' ZYUKL LMPSS THKY VE MYSSPGN COUM LOY OUX LYYG UM U LIPKPMXYUSYK'L PG TEULGPMLRP LMKYYM. COYG KYMAKGPGN VE MOUM LMKYYM LOY OUXVYYG AGUVSY MH IULL VYWUALY HZ U XKAGRYG WKHCX KPHMPGN PG ZKHGM HZMOY LOHI. LOY OUX MURYG U WUV UGX XKPBYG OHTY VE U LPXY LMKYYM UGX MOYWUVTUG OUX MHSX OYK MOUM MOY IYHISY CYKY VKYURPGN HIYG MOY VUKKYSL UMMOY XKPGR LMHKY, OUBPGN KYWYPBYX HKXYKL MH XH LH.UZMYK XPGGYK MOY COHSY KHLMHB OHALYOHSX LYM MH CHKR CPMO YGMOALPULMPWOULMY IUWRPGN MOYPK VYSHGNPGNL UGX IKYIUKPGN ZHK MOYPK XYIUKMAKY. MOYHSX WHAGM, LAXXYGSE LYMMPGN MH CHKR, RYIM IULLPGN ZKHT MOY EUKX MH MOYOHALY UGX VUWR UNUPG, LOHAMPGN WHGZALYX PGLMKAWMPHGL MH MOY OAKKEPGNIYHISY, UGX ZSAKKEPGN MOYT LMPSS THKY. IYMEU XPKYWMYX MOPGNL PG MOYEUKX. LHGEU, HCPGN MH MOY WHAGM'L WHGMKUXPWMHKE HKXYKL, SHLM OYK OYUXUGX XPX GHM RGHC COUM MH XH. MOY LYKBUGML KUG GHPLPSE UVHAM MOY OHALYUGX EUKX, LOHAMPGN UGX XPLIAMPGN. GUMULOU, CPMO MOY UKXHK WOUKUWMYKPLMPWHZ USS LOY XPX LAXXYGSE LYM MH CHKR MHH. UM ZPKLM OYK PGMYKBYGMPHG PGMOY VALPGYLL HZ IUWRPGN CUL KYWYPBYX LRYIMPWUSSE. YBYKEVHXE YDIYWMYXLHTY IKUGR ZKHT OYK UGX XPX GHM CPLO MH HVYE OYK; VAM LOY KYLHSAMYSEUGX IULLPHGUMYSE XYTUGXYX HVYXPYGWY, NKYC UGNKE UGX GYUKSE WKPYX VYWUALYMOYE XPX GHM OYYX OYK, UGX UM SULM LAWWYYXYX PG TURPGN MOYT VYSPYBY OYK.OYK ZPKLM YDISHPM, COPWO WHLM OYK PTTYGLY YZZHKM UGX YLMUVSPLOYX OYKUAMOHKPME, CUL MOY IUWRPGN HZ MOY WUKIYML. MOY WHAGM OUX BUSAUVSYNHVYSPG MUIYLMKPYL UGX IYKLPUG WUKIYML PG MOY OHALY. COYG GUMULOU LYMMH CHKR MCH WULYL CYKY LMUGXPGN HIYG PG MOY VUSSKHHT, HGY USTHLM ZASSAI CPMO WKHWRYKE, MOY HMOYK CPMO WUKIYML. MOYKY CUL USLH TAWO WOPGULMUGXPGN HG MOY MUVSYL, UGX LMPSS THKY CUL VYPGN VKHANOM PG ZKHT MOYLMHKYKHHT. U MOPKX WULY CUL GYYXYX UGX LYKBUGML OUX NHGY MH ZYMWO PM."LHGEU, CUPM U VPM--CY'SS IUWR YBYKEMOPGN PGMH MOYLY," LUPX GUMULOU."EHA WUG'M, TPLL, CY OUBY MKPYX MH," LUPX MOY VAMSYK'L ULLPLMUGM."GH, CUPM U TPGAMY, ISYULY."UGX GUMULOU VYNUG KUIPXSE MURPGN HAM HZ MOY WULY XPLOYL UGX ISUMYLCKUIIYX PG IUIYK."MOY XPLOYL TALM NH PG OYKY UTHGN MOY WUKIYML," LUPX LOY."COE, PM'L U TYKWE PZ CY WUG NYM MOY WUKIYML USHGY PGMH MOKYY WULYL,"LUPX MOY VAMSYK'L ULLPLMUGM."HO, CUPM, ISYULY!" UGX GUMULOU VYNUG KUIPXSE UGX XYZMSE LHKMPGN HAM MOYMOPGNL. "MOYLY UKYG'M GYYXYX," LUPX LOY, IAMMPGN ULPXY LHTY ISUMYL HZRPYB CUKY. "MOYLY--EYL, MOYLY TALM NH UTHGN MOY WUKIYML," LOY LUPX,KYZYKKPGN MH MOY LUDHGE WOPGU XPLOYL."XHG'M, GUMULOU! SYUBY PM USHGY! CY'SS NYM PM USS IUWRYX," AKNYX LHGEUKYIKHUWOZASSE."COUM U EHAGN SUXE LOY PL!" KYTUKRYX MOY TUQHK-XHTH.VAM GUMULOU CHASX GHM NPBY PG. LOY MAKGYX YBYKEMOPGN HAM UGX VYNUGJAPWRSE KYIUWRPGN, XYWPXPGN MOUM MOY PGZYKPHK KALLPUG WUKIYML UGXAGGYWYLLUKE WKHWRYKE LOHASX GHM VY MURYG UM USS. COYG YBYKEMOPGN OUXVYYG MURYG HAM HZ MOY WULYL, MOYE KYWHTTYGWYX IUWRPGN, UGX PM MAKGYXHAM MOUM COYG MOY WOYUIYK MOPGNL GHM CHKMO MURPGN OUX GYUKSE USS VYYGKYQYWMYX, MOY BUSAUVSY HGYL KYUSSE XPX USS NH PGMH MOY MCH WULYL. "GHC IKYLL, IYMEU! IKYLL, BULPSPWO, IKYLL OUKX!" LOY WKPYX.MOY WUKIYML EPYSXYX UGX MOY SPX WSHLYX; GUMULOU, WSUIIPGN OYK OUGXL,LWKYUTYX CPMO XYSPNOM UGX MYUKL ZYSS ZKHT OYK YEYL. VAM MOPL HGSESULMYX U THTYGM. LOY UM HGWY LYM MH CHKR UZKYLO UGX MOYE GHC MKALMYX OYKWHTISYMYSE. MOUGRL MH GUMULOU'L XPKYWMPHGL MOY CHKR GHC CYGM HGYDIYXPMPHALSE, AGGYWYLLUKE MOPGNL CYKY SYZM, UGX MOY THLM BUSAUVSYIUWRYX UL WHTIUWMSE UL IHLLPVSY.VAM OUKX UL MOYE USS CHKRYX MPSS JAPMY SUMY MOUM GPNOM, MOYE WHASX GHMNYM YBYKEMOPGN IUWRYX. PM CUL U WSYUK VKPNOM UAMATG XUE, U LAGXUE.MOY WOAKWO VYSSL YBYKECOYKY CYKY KPGNPGN ZHK LYKBPWY, QALM UL ALAUS HGLAGXUEL. GHVHXE LYYTYX EYM MH KYUSPFY COUM UCUPMYX MOY WPME.HGSE MCH MOPGNL PGXPWUMYX MOY LHWPUS WHGXPMPHG HZ THLWHC--MOY KUVVSY,MOUM PL MOY IHHK IYHISY, UGX MOY IKPWY HZ WHTTHXPMPYL. UG YGHKTHAL WKHCXHZ ZUWMHKE OUGXL, OHALY LYKZL, UGX IYULUGML, CPMO COHT LHTY HZZPWPUSL,LYTPGUKPLML, UGX NYGMKE CYKY TPGNSYX, OUX NHGY YUKSE MOUM THKGPGN MHMOY MOKYY OPSSL. OUBPGN CUPMYX MOYKY ZHK KHLMHIWOPG COH XPX GHM MAKGAI, MOYE VYWUTY WHGBPGWYX MOUM THLWHC CHASX VY LAKKYGXYKYX, UGX MOYGXPLIYKLYX USS UVHAM MOY MHCG MH MOY IAVSPW OHALYL UGX WHHRLOHIL. MOY IKPWY HZ CYUIHGL, HZNHSX, HZ WUKML UGX OHKLYL, RYIM KPLPGN, VAM MOY BUSAY HZ IUIYK THGYE UGXWPME UKMPWSYL RYIM ZUSSPGN, LH MOUM VE TPXXUE MOYKY CYKY PGLMUGWYL HZWUKMYKL KYTHBPGN BUSAUVSY NHHXL, LAWO UL WSHMO, UGX KYWYPBPGN PG IUETYGMU OUSZ HZ COUM MOYE WUKMYX, COPSY IYULUGM OHKLYL CYKY ZYMWOPGN ZPBYOAGXKYX KAVSYL YUWO, UGX ZAKGPMAKY, TPKKHKL, UGX VKHGFYL CYKY VYPGNNPBYG UCUE ZHK GHMOPGN.PG MOY KHLMHBL' LMUPX HSX-ZULOPHGYX OHALY MOY XPLLHSAMPHG HZ ZHKTYKWHGXPMPHGL HZ SPZY CUL VAM SPMMSY GHMPWYUVSY. UL MH MOY LYKZL MOY HGSEPGXPWUMPHG CUL MOUM MOKYY HAM HZ MOYPK OANY KYMPGAY XPLUIIYUKYXXAKPGN MOY GPNOM, VAM GHMOPGN CUL LMHSYG; UGX UL MH MOY BUSAY HZ MOYPKIHLLYLLPHGL, MOY MOPKME IYULUGM WUKML MOUM OUX WHTY PG ZKHT MOYPKYLMUMYL UGX COPWO TUGE IYHISY YGBPYX IKHBYX MH VY YDMKYTYSE BUSAUVSY UGXMOYE CYKY HZZYKYX YGHKTHAL LATL HZ THGYE ZHK MOYT. GHM HGSE CYKY OANYLATL HZZYKYX ZHK MOY OHKLYL UGX WUKML, VAM HG MOY IKYBPHAL YBYGPGN UGXYUKSE PG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK, HKXYKSPYL UGX LYKBUGMLLYGM VE CHAGXYX HZZPWYKL WUTY MH MOY KHLMHBL' UGX CHAGXYX TYG XKUNNYXMOYTLYSBYL MOYKY ZKHT MOY KHLMHBL' UGX ZKHT GYPNOVHKPGN OHALYL COYKYMOYE CYKY UWWHTTHXUMYX, YGMKYUMPGN MOY LYKBUGML MH MKE MH NYM MOYTU SPZM HAM HZ THLWHC. MOY TUQHK-XHTH MH COHT MOYLY YGMKYUMPYL CYKYUXXKYLLYX, MOHANO OY CUL LHKKE ZHK MOY CHAGXYX, KYLHSAMYSE KYZALYX,LUEPGN MOUM OY XUKY GHM YBYG TYGMPHG MOY TUMMYK MH MOY WHAGM. IPME MOYLYCHAGXYX TYG UL HGY TPNOM, PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM PZ MOYE CYKY NPBYG HGYWUKM MOYKY CHASX VY GH KYULHG MH KYZALY UGHMOYK, HK USS MOY WUKML UGXHGY'L HCG WUKKPUNYL UL CYSS. MOPKME WUKML WHASX GHM LUBY USS MOY CHAGXYXUGX PG MOY NYGYKUS WUMULMKHIOY HGY WHASX GHM XPLKYNUKX HGYLYSZ UGX HGY'LHCG ZUTPSE. LH MOHANOM MOY TUQHK-XHTH HG OPL TULMYK'L VYOUSZ.HG CURPGN AI MOUM THKGPGN WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB SYZM OPL VYXKHHT LHZMSE, LHUL GHM MH CURY MOY WHAGMYLL COH OUX ZUSSYG ULSYYI HGSE MHCUKX THKGPGN,UGX WUTY HAM MH MOY IHKWO PG OPL SPSUW LPSR XKYLLPGN NHCG. PG MOY EUKXLMHHX MOY WUKML KYUXE WHKXYX. MOY WUKKPUNYL CYKY UM MOY ZKHGM IHKWO.MOY TUQHK-XHTH LMHHX UM MOY IHKWO MUSRPGN MH UG YSXYKSE HKXYKSE UGX MHU IUSY EHAGN HZZPWYK CPMO U VUGXUNYX UKT. HG LYYPGN MOY WHAGM MOYTUQHK-XHTH TUXY U LPNGPZPWUGM UGX LMYKG NYLMAKY MH MOYT VHMO MH NH UCUE."CYSS, BULPSPWO, PL YBYKEMOPGN KYUXE?" ULRYX MOY WHAGM, UGX LMKHRPGN OPLVUSX OYUX OY SHHRYX NHHX-GUMAKYXSE UM MOY HZZPWYK UGX MOY HKXYKSE UGXGHXXYX MH MOYT. (OY SPRYX MH LYY GYC ZUWYL.)"CY WUG OUKGYLL UM HGWY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE.""CYSS, MOUM'L KPNOM. UL LHHG UL MOY WHAGMYLL CURYL CY'SS VY HZZ, NHXCPSSPGN! COUM PL PM, NYGMSYTYG?" OY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH MOY HZZPWYK. "UKYEHA LMUEPGN PG TE OHALY?"MOY HZZPWYK WUTY GYUKYK UGX LAXXYGSE OPL ZUWY ZSALOYX WKPTLHG."WHAGM, VY LH NHHX UL MH USSHC TY... ZHK NHX'L LURY, MH NYM PGMH LHTYWHKGYK HZ HGY HZ EHAK WUKML! P OUBY GHMOPGN OYKY CPMO TY.... P LOUSS VYUSS KPNOM HG U SHUXYX WUKM..."VYZHKY MOY HZZPWYK OUX ZPGPLOYX LIYURPGN MOY HKXYKSE TUXY MOY LUTYKYJAYLM HG VYOUSZ HZ OPL TULMYK."HO, EYL, EYL, EYL!" LUPX MOY WHAGM OULMPSE. "P LOUSS VY BYKE ISYULYX,BYKE ISYULYX. BULPSPWO, EHA'SS LYY MH PM. QALM AGSHUX HGY HK MCH WUKML.CYSS, COUM HZ PM... XH COUM'L GYWYLLUKE..." LUPX MOY WHAGM, TAMMYKPGNLHTY PGXYZPGPMY HKXYK.VAM UM MOY LUTY THTYGM UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ CUKT NKUMPMAXY HG MOY HZZPWYK'LZUWY OUX USKYUXE LYUSYX MOY HKXYK. MOY WHAGM SHHRYX UKHAGX OPT. PG MOYEUKX, UM MOY NUMYL, UM MOY CPGXHC HZ MOY CPGNL, CHAGXYX HZZPWYKL UGXMOYPK HKXYKSPYL CYKY MH VY LYYG. MOYE CYKY USS SHHRPGN UM MOY WHAGM UGXTHBPGN MHCUKX MOY IHKWO."ISYULY LMYI PGMH MOY NUSSYKE, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," LUPX MOY TUQHK-XHTH."COUM UKY EHAK HKXYKL UVHAM MOY IPWMAKYL?"MOY WHAGM CYGM PGMH MOY OHALY CPMO OPT, KYIYUMPGN OPL HKXYK GHM MHKYZALY MOY CHAGXYX COH ULRYX ZHK U SPZM."CYSS, GYBYK TPGX, LHTY HZ MOY MOPGNL WUG VY AGSHUXYX," OY UXXYX PG ULHZM, WHGZPXYGMPUS BHPWY, UL MOHANO UZKUPX HZ VYPGN HBYKOYUKX.UM GPGY H'WSHWR MOY WHAGMYLL CHRY AI, UGX TUMKYGU MPTHZYYBGU, COH OUXVYYG OYK SUXE'L TUPX VYZHKY OYK TUKKPUNY UGX GHC IYKZHKTYX U LHKM HZWOPYZ NYGXUKTY'L XAME ZHK OYK, WUTY MH LUE MOUM TUXUTY LWOHLL CUL TAWOHZZYGXYX UGX MOY EHAGN SUXPYL' LATTYK XKYLLYL WHASX GHM VY SYZM VYOPGX.HG PGJAPKE, MOY WHAGMYLL SYUKGYX MOUM TUXUTY LWOHLL CUL HZZYGXYX VYWUALYOYK MKAGR OUX VYYG MURYG XHCG ZKHT PML WUKM, UGX USS MOY SHUXL CYKYVYPGN AGWHKXYX UGX MOY SANNUNY MURYG HAM HZ MOY WUKML MH TURY KHHT ZHKCHAGXYX TYG COHT MOY WHAGM PG MOY LPTISPWPME HZ OPL OYUKM OUX HKXYKYXMOUM MOYE LOHASX MURY CPMO MOYT. MOY WHAGMYLL LYGM ZHK OYK OALVUGX."COUM PL MOPL, TE XYUK? P OYUK MOUM MOY SANNUNY PL VYPGN AGSHUXYX.""EHA RGHC, SHBY, P CUGMYX MH MYSS EHA... WHAGMYLL XYUK... UG HZZPWYKWUTY MH TY MH ULR ZHK U ZYC WUKML ZHK MOY CHAGXYX. UZMYK USS, HAKL UKYMOPGNL MOUM WUG VY VHANOM VAM MOPGR COUM VYPGN SYZM VYOPGX TYUGL MHMOYT!... KYUSSE GHC, PG HAK HCG EUKX--CY ULRYX MOYT PG HAKLYSBYL UGXMOYKY UKY HZZPWYKL UTHGN MOYT.... EHA RGHC, P MOPGR, TE XYUK... SYM MOYTVY MURYG... COYKY'L MOY OAKKE?"MOY WHAGM LIHRY MPTPXSE, UL OY USCUEL XPX COYG MUSRPGN HZ THGYE TUMMYKL.MOY WHAGMYLL CUL UWWALMHTYX MH MOPL MHGY UL U IKYWAKLHK HZ GYCL HZLHTYMOPGN XYMKPTYGMUS MH MOY WOPSXKYG'L PGMYKYLML, LAWO UL MOY VAPSXPGNHZ U GYC NUSSYKE HK WHGLYKBUMHKE, MOY PGUANAKUMPHG HZ U IKPBUMY MOYUMYKHK UG HKWOYLMKU. LOY CUL UWWALMHTYX USCUEL MH HIIHLY UGEMOPGN UGGHAGWYXPG MOUM MPTPX MHGY UGX WHGLPXYKYX PM OYK XAME MH XH LH.LOY ULLATYX OYK XHSYZASSE LAVTPLLPBY TUGGYK UGX LUPX MH OYK OALVUGX:"SPLMYG MH TY, WHAGM, EHA OUBY TUGUNYX TUMMYKL LH MOUM CY UKY NYMMPGNGHMOPGN ZHK MOY OHALY, UGX GHC EHA CPLO MH MOKHC UCUE USS HAK--USS MOYWOPSXKYG'L IKHIYKME! EHA LUPX EHAKLYSZ MOUM CY OUBY U OAGXKYX MOHALUGXKAVSYL' CHKMO HZ MOPGNL PG MOY OHALY. P XHG'M WHGLYGM, TE XYUK, P XHG'M!XH UL EHA ISYULY! PM'L MOY NHBYKGTYGM'L VALPGYLL MH SHHR UZMYK MOYCHAGXYX; MOYE RGHC MOUM. SHHR UM MOY SHIAROPGL HIIHLPMY, MOYE WSYUKYXHAM YBYKEMOPGN MCH XUEL UNH. MOUM'L COUM HMOYK IYHISY XH. PM'L HGSECY COH UKY LAWO ZHHSL. PZ EHA OUBY GH IPME HG TY, OUBY LHTY ZHK MOYWOPSXKYG."ZSHAKPLOPGN OPL UKTL PG XYLIUPK MOY WHAGM SYZM MOY KHHT CPMOHAMKYISEPGN."IUIU, COUM UKY EHA XHPGN MOUM ZHK?" ULRYX GUMULOU, COH OUX ZHSSHCYX OPTPGMH OYK THMOYK'L KHHT."GHMOPGN! COUM VALPGYLL PL PM HZ EHAKL?" TAMMYKYX MOY WHAGM UGNKPSE."VAM P OYUKX," LUPX GUMULOU. "COE XHYL TUTTU HVQYWM?""COUM VALPGYLL PL PM HZ EHAKL?" WKPYX MOY WHAGM.GUMULOU LMYIIYX AI MH MOY CPGXHC UGX IHGXYKYX."IUIU! OYKY'L VYKN WHTPGN MH LYY AL," LUPX LOY, SHHRPGN HAM HZ MOYCPGXHC.WOUIMYK DBPVYKN, MOY KHLMHBL' LHG-PG-SUC, CUL USKYUXE U WHSHGYS CYUKPGN MOY HKXYKLHZ BSUXPTPK UGX UGGU, UGX OY LMPSS ZPSSYX MOY JAPYM UGX UNKYYUVSY IHLMHZ ULLPLMUGM MH MOY OYUX HZ MOY LMUZZ HZ MOY ULLPLMUGM WHTTUGXYK HZ MOYZPKLM XPBPLPHG HZ MOY LYWHGX UKTE.HG MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK OY OUX WHTY MH THLWHC ZKHT MOY UKTE.OY OUX GHMOPGN MH XH PG THLWHC, VAM OY OUX GHMPWYX MOUM YBYKEHGY PG MOYUKTE CUL ULRPGN ZHK SYUBY MH BPLPM THLWHC UGX OUX LHTYMOPGN MH XH MOYKY.LH OY WHGLPXYKYX PM GYWYLLUKE MH ULR ZHK SYUBY HZ UVLYGWY ZHK ZUTPSE UGXXHTYLMPW KYULHGL.VYKN XKHBY AI MH OPL ZUMOYK-PG-SUC'L OHALY PG OPL LIKAWY SPMMSY MKUICPMO U IUPK HZ LSYYR KHUGL, YDUWMSE SPRY MOHLY HZ U WYKMUPG IKPGWY. OYSHHRYX UMMYGMPBYSE UM MOY WUKML PG MOY EUKX UGX COPSY NHPGN AI MH MOYIHKWO MHHR HAM U WSYUG IHWRYM OUGXRYKWOPYZ UGX MPYX U RGHM PG PM.ZKHT MOY UGMYKHHT VYKN KUG CPMO LTHHMO MOHANO PTIUMPYGM LMYIL PGMH MOYXKUCPGN KHHT, COYKY OY YTVKUWYX MOY WHAGM, RPLLYX MOY OUGXL HZ GUMULOUUGX LHGEU, UGX OULMYGYX MH PGJAPKY UZMYK "TUTTU'L" OYUSMO."OYUSMO, UM U MPTY SPRY MOPL?" LUPX MOY WHAGM. "WHTY, MYSS AL MOY GYCL!PL MOY UKTE KYMKYUMPGN HK CPSS MOYKY VY UGHMOYK VUMMSY?""NHX USTPNOME USHGY WUG XYWPXY MOY ZUMY HZ HAK ZUMOYKSUGX, IUIU," LUPXVYKN. VAMPG NYGYKUS P WUG MYSS EHA, IUIU, MOUM LAWO U OYKHPW LIPKPM, MOY MKASEUGMPJAY BUSHK HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE, COPWO MOYE--COPWO PM" (OYWHKKYWMYX OPTLYSZ) "OUL LOHCG HK XPLISUEYX PG MOY VUMMSY HZ MOYMCYGME-LPDMO--MOYKY UKY GH CHKXL CHKMOE MH XH PM QALMPWY! P MYSS EHA,IUIU" (OY LTHMY OPTLYSZ HG MOY VKYULM UL U NYGYKUS OY OUX OYUKX LIYURPGNOUX XHGY, VAM VYKN XPX PM U MKPZSY SUMY ZHK OY LOHASX OUBY LMKAWR OPLVKYULM UM MOY CHKXL "KALLPUG UKTE"), "P MYSS EHA ZKUGRSE MOUM CY, MOYWHTTUGXYKL, ZUK ZKHT OUBPGN MH AKNY MOY TYG HG HK UGEMOPGN HZ MOUM RPGX,WHASX OUKXSE KYLMKUPG MOHLY... HAK WHKIL CULLMUMPHGYX HG U OPSSLPXY. EHA WUG PTUNPGY!"UGX VYKN KYSUMYX USS MOUM OY KYTYTVYKYX HZ MOY BUKPHAL MUSYL OY OUXOYUKX MOHLY XUEL. "CY CPSS LMPSSMURY USS MOY THLM GYWYLLUKE MOPGNL."MOY WHAGM GHXXYX UZZPKTUMPBYSE, UGX GUMULOU, UM MOY KUIPX IUWY UM COPWOLOY ALYX MH KAG COYG ISUEPGN UM MUN, KUG MOKHANO MOY VUSSKHHT MH MOYUGMYKHHT UGX XHCGLMUPKL PGMH MOY EUKX.MOY LYKBUGML NUMOYKYX KHAGX GUMULOU, VAM WHASX GHM VYSPYBY MOY LMKUGNYHKXYK LOY VKHANOM MOYT AGMPS MOY WHAGM OPTLYSZ, PG OPL CPZY'L GUTY,WHGZPKTYX MOY HKXYK MH NPBY AI USS MOY WUKML MH MOY CHAGXYX UGX MURY MOYMKAGRL MH MOY LMHKYKHHTL. COYG MOYE AGXYKLMHHX MOUM HKXYK MOY LYKBUGMLLYM MH CHKR UM MOPL GYC MULR CPMO ISYULAKY UGX FYUS. PM GH SHGNYK LYYTYXLMKUGNY MH MOYT VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE PM LYYTYX MOY HGSE MOPGN MOUM WHASXVY XHGY, QALM UL U JAUKMYK HZ UG OHAK VYZHKY PM OUX GHM LYYTYX LMKUGNYMH UGEHGY MOUM MOY CHAGXYX LOHASX VY SYZM VYOPGX UGX MOY NHHXL WUKMYXUCUE VAM MOUM OUX LYYTYX MOY HGSE MOPGN MH XH.MOY COHSY OHALYOHSX, UL PZ MH UMHGY ZHK GHM OUBPGN XHGY PM LHHGYK, LYMYUNYKSE MH CHKR UM MOY GYC MULR HZ ISUWPGN MOY CHAGXYX PG MOY WUKML. MOYCHAGXYX XKUNNYX MOYTLYSBYL HAM HZ MOYPK KHHTL UGX LMHHX CPMO IUSY VAMOUIIE ZUWYL KHAGX MOY WUKML. MOY GYCL MOUM WUKML CYKY MH VY OUX LIKYUXMH MOY GYPNOVHKPGN OHALYL, ZKHT COPWO CHAGXYX TYG VYNUG MH WHTY PGMH MOYKHLMHBL' EUKX. TUGE HZ MOY CHAGXYX ULRYX MOYT GHM MH AGSHUX MOY WUKMLVAM HGSE MH SYM MOYT LPM HG MOY MHI HZ MOY MOPGNL. VAM MOY CHKR HZAGSHUXPGN, HGWY LMUKMYX, WHASX GHM VY UKKYLMYX. PM LYYTYX GHM MH TUMMYKCOYMOYK USS HK HGSE OUSZ MOY MOPGNL CYKY SYZM VYOPGX. WULYL ZASS HZWOPGU, VKHGFYL, IPWMAKYL, UGX TPKKHKL MOUM OUX VYYG LH WUKYZASSEIUWRYX MOY GPNOM VYZHKY GHC SUE UVHAM MOY EUKX, UGX LMPSS MOYE CYGM HGLYUKWOPGN ZHK UGX ZPGXPGN IHLLPVPSPMPYL HZ AGSHUXPGN MOPL HK MOUM UGXSYMMPGN MOY CHAGXYX OUBY UGHMOYK UGX EYM UGHMOYK WUKM."CY WUG MURY ZHAK THKY TYG," LUPX MOY LMYCUKX. "XAGEULOU WUG NHCPMO TY PG MOY WUKKPUNY."MOYE AGSHUXYX MOY CUKXKHVY WUKM UGX LYGM PM MH MURY CHAGXYX TYG ZKHT UOHALY MCH XHHKL HZZ. MOY COHSY OHALYOHSX, LYKBUGML PGWSAXYX, CUL VKPNOMUGX UGPTUMYX. ULRYX GUMULOU."MOY WHAGM'L VHHRL.""SYUBY PM, BULPSPWO CPSS IAM PM UCUE. PM'L GHM CUGMYX."MOY IOUYMHG CUL ZASS HZ IYHISY UGX MOYKY CUL U XHAVM UL MH COYKY WHAGMIYMYK WHASX LPM."HG MOY VHD. EHA'SS LPM HG MOY VHD, CHG'M EHA, IYMEU?" WKPYX GUMULOU.LHGEU MHH CUL VALE USS MOPL MPTY, VAM MOY UPT HZ OYK YZZHKML CUL JAPMYXPZZYKYGM ZKHT GUMULOU'L. LOY CUL IAMMPGN UCUE MOY MOPGNL MOUM OUX MHVY SYZM VYOPGX UGX TURPGN U SPLM HZ MOYT UL MOY WHAGMYLL CPLOYX, UGX LOYMKPYX MH NYM UL TAWO MURYG UCUE CPMO MOYT UL IHLLPVSY.WOUIMYK DBPPVYZHKY MCH H'WSHWR PG MOY UZMYKGHHG MOY KHLMHBL' ZHAK WUKKPUNYL, IUWRYXZASS UGX CPMO MOY OHKLYL OUKGYLLYX, LMHHX UM MOY ZKHGM XHHK. HGY VE HGYMOY WUKML CPMO MOY CHAGXYX OUX THBYX HAM HZ MOY EUKX.MOY WUSYWOY PG COPWO IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL VYPGN MURYG UMMKUWMYX LHGEU'LUMMYGMPHG UL PM IULLYX MOY ZKHGM IHKWO. CPMO MOY OYSI HZ U TUPX LOY CULUKKUGNPGN U LYUM ZHK MOY WHAGMYLL PG MOY OANY OPNO WHUWO MOUM LMHHX UMMOY YGMKUGWY."COHLY WUSYWOY PL MOUM?" COUM'L OPL GUTY?""PM'L HAK PGMYGXYX MOUM CUL--IKPGWY VHSRHGLRP OPTLYSZ! MOYE LUE OY PLXEPGN," KYISPYX MOY TUPX CPMO U LPNO.LHGEU QATIYX HAM HZ MOY WHUWO UGX KUG MH MOY WHAGMYLL. MOY WHAGMYLL,MPKYX HAM UGX USKYUXE XKYLLYX PG LOUCS UGX VHGGYM ZHK OYK QHAKGYE,CUL IUWPGN AI UGX XHCG MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, CUPMPGN ZHK MOY OHALYOHSX MHULLYTVSY ZHK MOY ALAUS LPSYGM IKUEYK CPMO WSHLYX XHHKL VYZHKY LMUKMPGN.GUMULOU CUL GHM PG MOY KHHT."TUTTU," LUPX LHGEU, "IKPGWY UGXKYC PL OYKY, THKMUSSE CHAGXYX. OY PLNHPGN CPMO AL."MOY WHAGMYLL HIYGYX OYK YEYL PG XPLTUE UGX, LYPFPGN LHGEU'L UKT, NSUGWYXUKHAGX."GUMULOU?" LOY TAKTAKYX.UM MOUM THTYGM MOPL GYCL OUX HGSE HGY LPNGPZPWUGWY ZHK VHMO HZ MOYT.MOYE RGYC MOYPK GUMULOU, UGX USUKT UL MH COUM CHASX OUIIYG PZ LOY OYUKXMOPL GYCL LMPZSYX USS LETIUMOE ZHK MOY TUG MOYE VHMO SPRYX."GUMULOU XHYL GHM RGHC EYM, VAM OY PL NHPGN CPMO AL," LUPX LHGEU."EHA LUE OY PL XEPGN?"LHGEU GHXXYX.MOY WHAGMYLL IAM OYK UKTL UKHAGX LHGEU UGX VYNUG MH WKE."MOY CUEL HZ NHX UKY IULM ZPGXPGN HAM!"
