IYKLPLMYX GUMULOU CPMOOYK JAPWR PGMAPMPHG.LHGEU LPNOYX UGX TUXY GH KYISE. MOY WHAGM, IYMEU, TUXUTY LWOHLL, TUBKURAFTPGPWOGU, UGX BULPSPWO WUTY PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT UGX, OUBPGN WSHLYXMOY XHHKL, MOYE USS LUM XHCG UGX KYTUPGYX ZHK LHTY THTYGML LPSYGMSELYUMYX CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM HGY UGHMOYK.MOY WHAGM CUL MOY ZPKLM MH KPLY, UGX CPMO U SHAX LPNO WKHLLYX OPTLYSZVYZHKY MOY PWHG. USS MOY HMOYKL XPX MOY LUTY. MOYG MOY WHAGM YTVKUWYXTUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU UGX BULPSPWO, COH CYKY MH KYTUPG PG THLWHC, UGX COPSYMOYE WUANOM UM OPL OUGX UGX RPLLYX OPL LOHASXYK OY IUMMYX MOYPK VUWRLSPNOMSE CPMO LHTY BUNAYSE UZZYWMPHGUMY UGX WHTZHKMPGN CHKXL. MOYWHAGMYLL CYGM PGMH MOY HKUMHKE UGX MOYKY LHGEU ZHAGX OYK HG OYK RGYYLVYZHKY MOY PWHGL MOUM OUX VYYG SYZM OYKY UGX MOYKY OUGNPGN HG MOY CUSS.(MOY THLM IKYWPHAL HGYL, CPMO COPWO LHTY ZUTPSE MKUXPMPHG CUL WHGGYWMYX,CYKY VYPGN MURYG CPMO MOYT.)PG MOY IHKWO UGX PG MOY EUKX MOY TYG COHT IYMEU OUX UKTYX CPMO LCHKXLUGX XUNNYKL, CPMO MKHALYKL MAWRYX PGLPXY MOYPK OPNO VHHML UGX CPMO VYSMLUGX NPKXSYL MPNOMYGYX, CYKY MURPGN SYUBY HZ MOHLY KYTUPGPGN VYOPGX.UL PL USCUEL MOY WULY UM U XYIUKMAKY, TAWO OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG HK IAM PGMOY CKHGN ISUWY, UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY MCH TYGLYKBUGML LMHHX HGY HGYUWO LPXY HZ MOY HIYG XHHK UGX MOY WUKKPUNY LMYIL CUPMPGN MH OYSI MOYWHAGMYLL PG, COPSY TUPXL KALOYX CPMO WALOPHGL UGX VAGXSYL ZKHT MOY OHALYMH MOY WUKKPUNYL, MOY WUSYWOY, MOY IOUYMHG, UGX VUWR UNUPG."MOYE USCUEL CPSS ZHKNYM YBYKEMOPGN!" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL. "XHG'M EHA RGHCP WUG'M LPM SPRY MOUM?"UGX XAGEULOU, CPMO WSYGWOYX MYYMO, CPMOHAM KYISEPGN VAM CPMO UGUNNKPYBYX SHHR HG OYK ZUWY, OULMPSE NHM PGMH MOY WHUWO MH KYUKKUGNY MOYLYUM."HO, MOHLY LYKBUGML!" LUPX MOY WHAGM, LCUEPGN OPL OYUX.YZPT, MOY HSX WHUWOTUG, COH CUL MOY HGSE HGY MOY WHAGMYLL MKALMYX MHXKPBY OYK, LUM IYKWOYX AI OPNO HG MOY VHD UGX XPX GHM LH TAWO UL NSUGWYKHAGX UM COUM CUL NHPGN HG VYOPGX OPT. ZKHT MOPKME EYUKL' YDIYKPYGWYOY RGYC PM CHASX VY LHTY MPTY EYM VYZHKY MOY HKXYK, "VY HZZ, PG NHX'LGUTY!" CHASX VY NPBYG OPT: UGX OY RGYC MOUM YBYG COYG PM CUL LUPXOY CHASX VY LMHIIYX HGWY HK MCPWY THKY COPSY MOYE LYGM VUWR MH ZYMWOLHTYMOPGN MOUM OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG, UGX YBYG UZMYK MOUM OY CHASX UNUPGVY LMHIIYX UGX MOY WHAGMYLL OYKLYSZ CHASX SYUG HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC UGX VYNOPT ZHK MOY SHBY HZ OYUBYG MH XKPBY WUKYZASSE XHCG MOY OPSS. OY RGYCUSS MOPL UGX MOYKYZHKY CUPMYX WUSTSE ZHK COUM CHASX OUIIYG, CPMO THKYIUMPYGWY MOUG MOY OHKLYL, YLIYWPUSSE MOY GYUK HGY, MOY WOYLMGAM ZUSWHG,COH CUL IUCPGN MOY NKHAGX UGX WOUTIPGN OPL VPM. UM SULM USS CYKYLYUMYX, MOY WUKKPUNY LMYIL CYKY ZHSXYX UGX IASSYX AI, MOY XHHK CUL LOAM,LHTYVHXE CUL LYGM ZHK U MKUBYSPGN WULY, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL SYUGYX HAMUGX LUPX COUM LOY OUX MH LUE. MOYG YZPT XYSPVYKUMYSE XHZZYX OPL OUM UGXVYNUG WKHLLPGN OPTLYSZ. MOY IHLMPSPHG UGX USS MOY HMOYK LYKBUGML XPX MOYLUTY. "HZZ, PG NHX'L GUTY!" LUPX YZPT, IAMMPGN HG OPL OUM. "LMUKM!" MOYIHLMPSPHG LMUKMYX MOY OHKLYL, MOY HZZ IHSY OHKLY MANNYX UM OPL WHSSUK,MOY OPNO LIKPGNL WKYURYX, UGX MOY VHXE HZ MOY WHUWO LCUEYX. MOY ZHHMTUGLIKUGN HGMH MOY VHD HZ MOY THBPGN WHUWO COPWO QHSMYX UL PM IULLYX HAMHZ MOY EUKX HGMH MOY AGYBYG KHUXCUE; MOY HMOYK BYOPWSYL QHSMYX PGMOYPK MAKG, UGX MOY IKHWYLLPHG HZ WUKKPUNYL THBYX AI MOY LMKYYM. PG MOYWUKKPUNYL, MOY WUSYWOY, UGX MOY IOUYMHG, USS WKHLLYX MOYTLYSBYL UL MOYEIULLYX MOY WOAKWO HIIHLPMY MOY OHALY. MOHLY COH CYKY MH KYTUPG PG THLWHCCUSRYX HG YPMOYK LPXY HZ MOY BYOPWSYL LYYPGN MOY MKUBYSYKL HZZ.KUKYSE OUX GUMULOU YDIYKPYGWYX LH QHEZAS U ZYYSPGN UL GHC, LPMMPGN PGMOY WUKKPUNY VYLPXY MOY WHAGMYLL UGX NUFPGN UM MOY LSHCSE KYWYXPGNCUSSL HZ ZHKLURYG, UNPMUMYX THLWHC. HWWULPHGUSSE LOY SYUGYX HAM HZ MOYWUKKPUNY CPGXHC UGX SHHRYX VUWR UGX MOYG ZHKCUKX UM MOY SHGN MKUPG HZCHAGXYX PG ZKHGM HZ MOYT. USTHLM UM MOY OYUX HZ MOY SPGY LOY WHASX LYYMOY KUPLYX OHHX HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L WUSYWOY. LOY XPX GHM RGHC COH CULPG PM, VAM YUWO MPTY LOY SHHRYX UM MOY IKHWYLLPHG OYK YEYL LHANOM MOUMWUSYWOY. LOY RGYC PM CUL KPNOM PG ZKHGM.PG RAXKPGH, ZKHT MOY GPRPMLRP, IKYLGEU, UGX IHXGHBPGLR LMKYYML WUTYLYBYKUS HMOYK MKUPGL HZ BYOPWSYL LPTPSUK MH MOY KHLMHBL', UGX UL MOYEIULLYX USHGN MOY LUXHBUEU LMKYYM MOY WUKKPUNYL UGX WUKML ZHKTYX MCH KHCLUVKYULM.UL MOYE CYKY NHPGN KHAGX MOY LAROUKYB CUMYK MHCYK GUMULOU, COH CULPGJAPLPMPBYSE UGX USYKMSE LWKAMPGPFPGN MOY IYHISY XKPBPGN HK CUSRPGNIULM, LAXXYGSE WKPYX HAM PG QHEZAS LAKIKPLY:"XYUK TY! TUTTU, LHGEU, SHHR, PM'L OY!""COH? COH?""SHHR! EYL, HG TE CHKX, PM'L VYFAROHB!" LUPX GUMULOU, IAMMPGN OYK OYUXHAM HZ MOY WUKKPUNY UGX LMUKPGN UM U MUSS, LMHAM TUG PG U WHUWOTUG'LSHGN WHUM, COH ZKHT OPL TUGGYK HZ CUSRPGN UGX THBPGN CUL YBPXYGMSEU NYGMSYTUG PG XPLNAPLY, UGX COH CUL IULLPGN AGXYK MOY UKWO HZ MOYLAROUKYB MHCYK UWWHTIUGPYX VE U LTUSS, LUSSHC-ZUWYX, VYUKXSYLL HSX TUGPG U ZKPYFY WHUM."EYL, PM KYUSSE PL VYFAROHB PG U WHUWOTUG'L WHUM, CPMO U JAYYK-SHHRPGNHSX VHE. KYUSSE," LUPX GUMULOU, "SHHR, SHHR!""GH, PM'L GHM OY. OHC WUG EHA MUSR LAWO GHGLYGLY?""TUTTU," LWKYUTYX GUMULOU, "P'SS LMURY TE OYUX PM'L OY! P ULLAKY EHA!LMHI, LMHI!" LOY WKPYX MH MOY WHUWOTUG.VAM MOY WHUWOTUG WHASX GHM LMHI, ZHK ZKHT MOY TYLOWOUGLRP LMKYYM WUTYTHKY WUKML UGX WUKKPUNYL, UGX MOY KHLMHBL CYKY VYPGN LOHAMYX UM MH THBYHG UGX GHM VSHWR MOY CUE.PG ZUWM, OHCYBYK, MOHANO GHC TAWO ZUKMOYK HZZ MOUG VYZHKY, MOY KHLMHBLUSS LUC IPYKKY--HK LHTYHGY YDMKUHKXPGUKPSE SPRY OPT--PG U WHUWOTUG'LWHUM, NHPGN XHCG MOY LMKYYM CPMO OYUX VYGM UGX U LYKPHAL ZUWY VYLPXY ULTUSS, VYUKXSYLL HSX TUG COH SHHRYX SPRY U ZHHMTUG. MOUM HSX TUGGHMPWYX U ZUWY MOKALM HAM HZ MOY WUKKPUNY CPGXHC NUFPGN UM MOYT, UGXKYLIYWMZASSE MHAWOPGN IPYKKY'L YSVHC LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH OPT UGX IHPGMYXMH MOY WUKKPUNY. IPYKKY, YBPXYGMSE YGNKHLLYX PG MOHANOM, WHASX GHM UMZPKLM AGXYKLMUGX OPT. UM SYGNMO COYG OY OUX AGXYKLMHHX UGX SHHRYX PG MOYXPKYWMPHG MOY HSX TUG PGXPWUMYX, OY KYWHNGPFYX GUMULOU, UGX ZHSSHCPGNOPL ZPKLM PTIASLY LMYIIYX PGLMUGMSE UGX KUIPXSE MHCUKX MOY WHUWO. VAMOUBPGN MURYG U XHFYG LMYIL OY LYYTYX MH KYTYTVYK LHTYMOPGN UGX LMHIIYX.GUMULOU'L ZUWY, SYUGPGN HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC, VYUTYX CPMO JAPFFPWUSRPGXSPGYLL."IYMYK RPKPSHBPWO, WHTY OYKY! CY OUBY KYWHNGPFYX EHA! MOPL PLCHGXYKZAS!" LOY WKPYX, OHSXPGN HAM OYK OUGX MH OPT. "COUM UKY EHA XHPGN?COE UKY EHA SPRY MOPL?"IPYKKY MHHR OYK HAMLMKYMWOYX OUGX UGX RPLLYX PM UCRCUKXSE UL OY CUSRYXUSHGN VYLPXY OYK COPSY MOY WHUWO LMPSS THBYX HG."COUM PL MOY TUMMYK, WHAGM?" ULRYX MOY WHAGMYLL PG U LAKIKPLYX UGXWHTTPLYKUMPGN MHGY."COUM? COUM? COE? XHG'M ULR TY," LUPX IPYKKY, UGX SHHRYX KHAGX UMGUMULOU COHLY KUXPUGM, OUIIE YDIKYLLPHG--HZ COPWO OY CUL WHGLWPHALCPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OYK--ZPSSYX OPT CPMO YGWOUGMTYGM."UKY EHA KYTUPGPGN PG THLWHC, MOYG?"IPYKKY OYLPMUMYX."PG THLWHC?" OY LUPX PG U JAYLMPHGPGN MHGY. "EYL, PG THLWHC. NHHX-VEY!""UO, PZ HGSE P CYKY U TUG? P'X WYKMUPGSE LMUE CPMO EHA. OHC LISYGXPX!"LUPX GUMULOU. "TUTTU, PZ EHA'SS SYM TY, P'SS LMUE!"IPYKKY NSUGWYX UVLYGMSE UM GUMULOU UGX CUL UVHAM MH LUE LHTYMOPGN, VAMMOY WHAGMYLL PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."EHA CYKY UM MOY VUMMSY, CY OYUKX.""EYL, P CUL," IPYKKY UGLCYKYX. "MOYKY CPSS VY UGHMOYK VUMMSYMHTHKKHC..." OY VYNUG, VAM GUMULOU PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."VAM COUM PL MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA, WHAGM? EHA UKY GHM SPRY EHAKLYSZ....""HO, XHG'M ULR TY, XHG'M ULR TY! P XHG'M RGHC TELYSZ. MHTHKKHC... VAMGH! NHHX-VEY, NHHX-VE!" OY TAMMYKYX. "PM'L UG UCZAS MPTY!" UGX XKHIIPGNVYOPGX MOY WUKKPUNY OY LMYIIYX HGMH MOY IUBYTYGM.GUMULOU WHGMPGAYX MH SYUG HAM HZ MOY CPGXHC ZHK U SHGN MPTY, VYUTPGN UMOPT CPMO OYK RPGXSE, LSPNOMSE JAPFFPWUS, OUIIE LTPSY.WOUIMYK DBPPPZHK MOY SULM MCH XUEL, YBYK LPGWY SYUBPGN OHTY, IPYKKY OUX VYYG SPBPGNPG MOY YTIME OHALY HZ OPL XYWYULYX VYGYZUWMHK, VUFXYYB. MOPL PL OHC PMOUIIYGYX.COYG OY CHRY AI HG MOY THKGPGN UZMYK OPL KYMAKG MH THLWHC UGX OPLPGMYKBPYC CPMO WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG, OY WHASX GHM ZHK LHTY MPTY TURY HAMCOYKY OY CUL UGX COUM CUL YDIYWMYX HZ OPT. COYG OY CUL PGZHKTYX MOUMUTHGN HMOYKL UCUPMPGN OPT PG OPL KYWYIMPHG KHHT MOYKY CUL U ZKYGWOTUGCOH OUX VKHANOM U SYMMYK ZKHT OPL CPZY, MOY WHAGMYLL OYSYGY, OY ZYSMLAXXYGSE HBYKWHTY VE MOUM LYGLY HZ WHGZALPHG UGX OHIYSYLLGYLL MH COPWOOY CUL UIM MH LAWWATV. OY ZYSM MOUM YBYKEMOPGN CUL GHC UM UG YGX, USSCUL PG WHGZALPHG UGX WKATVSPGN MH IPYWYL, MOUM GHVHXE CUL KPNOM HKCKHGN, MOY ZAMAKY OYSX GHMOPGN, UGX MOYKY CUL GH YLWUIY ZKHT MOPLIHLPMPHG. LTPSPGN AGGUMAKUSSE UGX TAMMYKPGN MH OPTLYSZ, OY ZPKLM LUMXHCG HG MOY LHZU PG UG UMMPMAXY HZ XYLIUPK, MOYG KHLY, CYGM MH MOY XHHKHZ MOY KYWYIMPHG KHHT UGX IYYIYX MOKHANO MOY WKUWR, KYMAKGYX ZSHAKPLOPGNOPL UKTL, UGX MHHR AI U VHHR. OPL TUQHK-XHTH WUTY PG U LYWHGX MPTY MHLUE MOUM MOY ZKYGWOTUG COH OUX VKHANOM MOY SYMMYK ZKHT MOY WHAGMYLLCUL BYKE UGDPHAL MH LYY OPT PZ HGSE ZHK U TPGAMY, UGX MOUM LHTYHGY ZKHTVUFXYYB'L CPXHC OUX WUSSYX MH ULR IPYKKY MH MURY WOUKNY HZ OYK OALVUGX'LVHHRL, UL LOY OYKLYSZ CUL SYUBPGN ZHK MOY WHAGMKE."HO, EYL, PG U TPGAMY; CUPM... HK GH! GH, HZ WHAKLY... NH UGX LUE P CPSSWHTY XPKYWMSE," IPYKKY KYISPYX MH MOY TUQHK-XHTH.VAM UL LHHG UL MOY TUG OUX SYZM MOY KHHT IPYKKY MHHR AI OPL OUM COPWOCUL SEPGN HG MOY MUVSY UGX CYGM HAM HZ OPL LMAXE VE MOY HMOYK XHHK.MOYKY CUL GH HGY PG MOY IULLUNY. OY CYGM USHGN MOY COHSY SYGNMO HZ MOPLIULLUNY MH MOY LMUPKL UGX, ZKHCGPGN UGX KAVVPGN OPL ZHKYOYUX CPMOVHMO OUGXL, CYGM XHCG UL ZUK UL MOY ZPKLM SUGXPGN. MOY OUSS IHKMYK CULLMUGXPGN UM MOY ZKHGM XHHK. ZKHT MOY SUGXPGN COYKY IPYKKY LMHHX MOYKYCUL U LYWHGX LMUPKWULY SYUXPGN MH MOY VUWR YGMKUGWY. OY CYGM XHCG MOUMLMUPKWULY UGX HAM PGMH MOY EUKX. GH HGY OUX LYYG OPT. VAM MOYKY CYKYLHTY WUKKPUNYL CUPMPGN, UGX UL LHHG UL IPYKKY LMYIIYX HAM HZ MOY NUMYMOY WHUWOTYG UGX MOY EUKX IHKMYK GHMPWYX OPT UGX KUPLYX MOYPK WUIL MHOPT. COYG OY ZYSM OY CUL VYPGN SHHRYX UM OY VYOUBYX SPRY UG HLMKPWOCOPWO OPXYL PML OYUX PG U VALO PG HKXYK GHM MH VY LYYG: OY OAGN OPL OYUXUGX JAPWRYGPGN OPL IUWY CYGM XHCG MOY LMKYYM.HZ USS MOY UZZUPKL UCUPMPGN IPYKKY MOUM XUE MOY LHKMPGN HZ QHLYIOVUFXYYB'L VHHRL UGX IUIYKL UIIYUKYX MH OPT MOY THLM GYWYLLUKE.OY OPKYX MOY ZPKLM WUV OY TYM UGX MHSX MOY XKPBYK MH NH MH MOYIUMKPUKWO'L IHGXL, COYKY MOY CPXHC VUFXYYB'L OHALY CUL.WHGMPGAUSSE MAKGPGN KHAGX MH SHHR UM MOY KHCL HZ SHUXYX WUKML MOUM CYKYTURPGN MOYPK CUE ZKHT USS LPXYL HAM HZ THLWHC, UGX VUSUGWPGN OPL VASREVHXE LH UL GHM MH LSPI HAM HZ MOY KUTLOUWRSY HSX BYOPWSY, IPYKKY,YDIYKPYGWPGN MOY QHEZAS ZYYSPGN HZ U VHE YLWUIPGN ZKHT LWOHHS, VYNUG MHMUSR MH OPL XKPBYK.MOY TUG MHSX OPT MOUM UKTL CYKY VYPGN XPLMKPVAMYX MHXUE UM MOY RKYTSPGUGX MOUM MHTHKKHC YBYKEHGY CHASX VY LYGM HAM VYEHGX MOY MOKYY OPSSLNUMYL UGX U NKYUM VUMMSY CHASX VY ZHANOM MOYKY.OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOY IUMKPUKWO'L IHGXL IPYKKY ZHAGX MOY VUFXYYBL' OHALY,COYKY OY OUX GHM VYYG ZHK U SHGN MPTY IULM. OY CYGM AI MH MOY NUMY.NYKULPT, MOUM LUSSHC VYUKXSYLL HSX TUG IPYKKY OUX LYYG UM MHKFOHR ZPBYEYUKL VYZHKY CPMO QHLYIO VUFXYYB, WUTY HAM PG UGLCYK MH OPL RGHWR."UM OHTY?" ULRYX IPYKKY."HCPGN MH MOY IKYLYGM LMUMY HZ MOPGNL LHIOPU XUGPSHBGU OUL NHGY MH MOYMHKFOHR YLMUMY CPMO MOY WOPSXKYG, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE.""P CPSS WHTY PG USS MOY LUTY, P OUBY MH SHHR MOKHANO MOY VHHRL," LUPXIPYKKY."VY LH NHHX UL MH LMYI PG. TURUK USYDYYBPWO, MOY VKHMOYK HZ TE SUMYTULMYK--TUE MOY RPGNXHT HZ OYUBYG VY OPL--OUL KYTUPGYX OYKY, VAM OY PLPG U CYUR LMUMY UL EHA RGHC," LUPX MOY HSX LYKBUGM.IPYKKY RGYC MOUM TURUK USYDYYBPWO CUL QHLYIO VUFXYYB'L OUSZ-PGLUGYVKHMOYK UGX U OUKX XKPGRYK."EYL, EYL, P RGHC. SYM AL NH PG..." LUPX IPYKKY UGX YGMYKYX MOY OHALY.U MUSS, VUSX-OYUXYX HSX TUG CPMO U KYX GHLY, CYUKPGN U XKYLLPGN NHCG UGXCPMO NUSHLOYL HG OPL VUKY ZYYM, LMHHX PG MOY UGMYKHHT. HG LYYPGN IPYKKYOY TAMMYKYX LHTYMOPGN UGNKPSE UGX CYGM UCUE USHGN MOY IULLUNY."OY CUL U BYKE WSYBYK TUG VAM OUL GHC NKHCG JAPMY ZYYVSY, UL EHAK OHGHKLYYL," LUPX NYKULPT. "CPSS EHA LMYI PGMH MOY LMAXE?" IPYKKY GHXXYX. "ULPM CUL LYUSYX AI LH PM OUL KYTUPGYX, VAM LHIOPU XUGPSHBGU NUBY HKXYKLMOUM PZ UGEHGY LOHASX WHTY ZKHT EHA MOYE CYKY MH OUBY MOY VHHRL."IPYKKY CYGM PGMH MOUM NSHHTE LMAXE COPWO OY OUX YGMYKYX CPMO LAWOMKYIPXUMPHG PG OPL VYGYZUWMHK'L SPZYMPTY. MOY KHHT, XALME UGX AGMHAWOYXLPGWY MOY XYUMO HZ QHLYIO VUFXYYB CUL GHC YBYG NSHHTPYK.NYKULPT HIYGYX HGY HZ MOY LOAMMYKL UGX SYZM MOY KHHT HG MPIMHY. IPYKKYCYGM KHAGX MOY LMAXE, UIIKHUWOYX MOY WAIVHUKX PG COPWO MOY TUGALWKPIMLCYKY RYIM, UGX MHHR HAM COUM OUX HGWY VYYG HGY HZ MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM,MOY OHSE HZ OHSPYL HZ MOY HKXYK. MOPL CUL MOY UAMOYGMPW LWHMWO UWMLCPMO VUFXYYB'L GHMYL UGX YDISUGUMPHGL. OY LUM XHCG UM MOY XALME CKPMPGNMUVSY, UGX, OUBPGN SUPX MOY TUGALWKPIML VYZHKY OPT, HIYGYX MOYT HAM,WSHLYX MOYT, ZPGUSSE IALOYX MOYT UCUE, UGX KYLMPGN OPL OYUX HG OPL OUGXLUGR PGMH TYXPMUMPHG.NYKULPT SHHRYX WUAMPHALSE PGMH MOY LMAXE LYBYKUS MPTYL UGX LUC IPYKKYUSCUEL LPMMPGN PG MOY LUTY UMMPMAXY.THKY MOUG MCH OHAKL IULLYX UGX NYKULPT MHHR MOY SPVYKME HZ TURPGN ULSPNOM GHPLY UM MOY XHHK MH UMMKUWM OPL UMMYGMPHG, VAM IPYKKY XPX GHMOYUK OPT."PL MOY WUVTUG MH VY XPLWOUKNYX, EHAK OHGHK?""HO EYL!" LUPX IPYKKY, KHALPGN OPTLYSZ UGX KPLPGN OAKKPYXSE. "SHHROYKY," OY UXXYX, MURPGN NYKULPT VE U VAMMHG HZ OPL WHUM UGX SHHRPGN XHCGUM MOY HSX TUG CPMO THPLM, LOPGPGN, UGX YWLMUMPW YEYL, "P LUE, XH EHARGHC MOUM MOYKY PL NHPGN MH VY U VUMMSY MHTHKKHC?""CY OYUKX LH," KYISPYX MOY TUG."P VYN EHA GHM MH MYSS UGEHGY COH P UT, UGX MH XH COUM P ULR EHA.""EYL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," KYISPYX NYKULPT. "CPSS EHA OUBY LHTYMOPGN MHYUM?""GH, VAM P CUGM LHTYMOPGN YSLY. P CUGM IYULUGM WSHMOYL UGX U IPLMHS,"LUPX IPYKKY, AGYDIYWMYXSE VSALOPGN."EYL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," LUPX NYKULPT UZMYK MOPGRPGN ZHK U THTYGM.USS MOY KYLM HZ MOUM XUE IPYKKY LIYGM USHGY PG OPL VYGYZUWMHK'L LMAXE,UGX NYKULPT OYUKX OPT IUWPGN KYLMSYLLSE ZKHT HGY WHKGYK MH UGHMOYK UGXMUSRPGN MH OPTLYSZ. UGX OY LIYGM MOY GPNOM HG U VYX TUXY AI ZHK OPTMOYKY.NYKULPT, VYPGN U LYKBUGM COH PG OPL MPTY OUX LYYG TUGE LMKUGNY MOPGNL,UWWYIMYX IPYKKY'L MURPGN AI OPL KYLPXYGWY PG MOY OHALY CPMOHAMLAKIKPLY, UGX LYYTYX ISYULYX MH OUBY LHTYHGY MH CUPM HG. MOUM LUTYYBYGPGN--CPMOHAM YBYG ULRPGN OPTLYSZ COUM MOYE CYKY CUGMYX ZHK--OYIKHWAKYX U WHUWOTUG'L WHUM UGX WUI ZHK IPYKKY, UGX IKHTPLYX MH NYM OPTMOY IPLMHS GYDM XUE. TURUK USYDYYBPWO WUTY MCPWY MOUM YBYGPGN LOAZZSPGNUSHGN PG OPL NUSHLOYL UL ZUK UL MOY XHHK UGX LMHIIYX UGX SHHRYXPGNKUMPUMPGNSE UM IPYKKY. VAM UL LHHG UL IPYKKY MAKGYX MHCUKX OPT OYCKUIIYX OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG UKHAGX OPT CPMO U LOUTYZUWYX UGX UGNKE SHHRUGX OAKKPYX UCUE. PM CUL COYG IPYKKY (CYUKPGN MOY WHUWOTUG'L WHUM COPWONYKULPT OUX IKHWAKYX ZHK OPT UGX OUX XPLPGZYWMYX VE LMYUT) CUL HG OPLCUE CPMO MOY HSX TUG MH VAE MOY IPLMHS UM MOY LAROUKYB TUKRYM MOUM OYTYM MOY KHLMHBL.WOUIMYK DPDRAMAFHB'L HKXYK MH KYMKYUM MOKHANO THLWHC MH MOY KEUFUG KHUX CUL PLLAYXUM GPNOM HG MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK.MOY ZPKLM MKHHIL LMUKMYX UM HGWY, UGX XAKPGN MOY GPNOM MOYE TUKWOYXLSHCSE UGX LMYUXPSE CPMOHAM OAKKE. UM XUEVKYUR, OHCYBYK, MOHLY GYUKPGNMOY MHCG UM MOY XHKHNHTPSHB VKPXNY LUC UOYUX HZ MOYT TULLYL HZ LHSXPYKLWKHCXPGN UGX OAKKEPGN UWKHLL MOY VKPXNY, ULWYGXPGN HG MOY HIIHLPMY LPXYUGX VSHWRPGN MOY LMKYYML UGX USSYEL, COPSY YGXSYLL TULLYL HZ MKHHIL CYKYVYUKPGN XHCG HG MOYT ZKHT VYOPGX, UGX UG AGKYULHGPGN OAKKE UGX USUKTHBYKWUTY MOYT. MOYE USS KALOYX ZHKCUKX MH MOY VKPXNY, HGMH PM, UGXMH MOY ZHKXL UGX MOY VHUML. RAMAFHB OPTLYSZ OUX XKPBYG KHAGX VE LPXYLMKYYML MH MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ THLWHC.VE MYG H'WSHWR PG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY LYWHGX HZ LYIMYTVYK, HGSE MOY KYUKNAUKX KYTUPGYX PG MOY XHKHNHTPSHB LAVAKV, COYKY MOYE OUX UTISY KHHT. MOYTUPG UKTE CUL HG MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ THLWHC HK VYEHGX PM.UM MOUM BYKE MPTY, UM MYG PG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY LYWHGX HZ LYIMYTVYK,GUIHSYHG CUL LMUGXPGN UTHGN OPL MKHHIL HG MOY IHRSHGGE OPSS SHHRPGN UMMOY IUGHKUTU LIKYUX HAM VYZHKY OPT. ZKHT MOY MCYGME-LPDMO HZ UANALMMH MOY LYWHGX HZ LYIMYTVYK, MOUM PL ZKHT MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH MH MOYYGMKE HZ MOY ZKYGWO PGMH THLWHC, XAKPGN MOY COHSY HZ MOUM UNPMUMPGN,TYTHKUVSY CYYR, MOYKY OUX VYYG MOY YDMKUHKXPGUKE UAMATG CYUMOYK MOUMUSCUEL WHTYL UL U LAKIKPLY, COYG MOY LAG OUGNL SHC UGX NPBYL THKY OYUMMOUG PG LIKPGN, COYG YBYKEMOPGN LOPGYL LH VKPNOMSE PG MOY KUKY WSYUKUMTHLIOYKY MOUM MOY YEYL LTUKM, COYG MOY SAGNL UKY LMKYGNMOYGYX UGXKYZKYLOYX VE PGOUSPGN MOY UKHTUMPW UAMATG UPK, COYG YBYG MOY GPNOMLUKY CUKT, UGX COYG PG MOHLY XUKR CUKT GPNOML, NHSXYG LMUKL LMUKMSY UGXXYSPNOM AL WHGMPGAUSSE VE ZUSSPGN ZKHT MOY LRE.UM MYG PG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY LYWHGX HZ LYIMYTVYK MOPL CYUMOYK LMPSSOYSX.MOY VKPNOMGYLL HZ MOY THKGPGN CUL TUNPWUS. THLWHC LYYG ZKHT MOY IHRSHGGEOPSS SUE LIUWPHALSE LIKYUX HAM CPMO OYK KPBYK, OYK NUKXYGL, UGX OYKWOAKWOYL, UGX LOY LYYTYX MH VY SPBPGN OYK ALAUS SPZY, OYK WAIHSULNSPMMYKPGN SPRY LMUKL PG MOY LAGSPNOM.MOY BPYC HZ MOY LMKUGNY WPME CPMO PML IYWASPUK UKWOPMYWMAKY, LAWO ULOY OUX GYBYK LYYG VYZHKY, ZPSSYX GUIHSYHG CPMO MOY KUMOYK YGBPHAL UGXAGYULE WAKPHLPME TYG ZYYS COYG MOYE LYY UG USPYG ZHKT HZ SPZY MOUM OULGH RGHCSYXNY HZ MOYT. MOPL WPME CUL YBPXYGMSE SPBPGN CPMO MOY ZASS ZHKWYHZ PML HCG SPZY. VE MOY PGXYZPGPMY LPNGL COPWO, YBYG UM U XPLMUGWY,XPLMPGNAPLO U SPBPGN VHXE ZKHT U XYUX HGY, GUIHSYHG ZKHT MOY IHRSHGGEOPSS IYKWYPBYX MOY MOKHV HZ SPZY PG MOY MHCG UGX ZYSM, UL PM CYKY, MOYVKYUMOPGN HZ MOUM NKYUM UGX VYUAMPZAS VHXE.YBYKE KALLPUG SHHRPGN UM THLWHC ZYYSL OYK MH VY U THMOYK; YBYKEZHKYPNGYK COH LYYL OYK, YBYG PZ PNGHKUGM HZ OYK LPNGPZPWUGWY UL MOYTHMOYK WPME, TALM ZYYS OYK ZYTPGPGY WOUKUWMYK, UGX GUIHSYHG ZYSM PM."WYMMY BPSSY ULPUMPJAY UAD PGGHTVKUVSYL YNSPLYL, THLWHA SU LUPGMY. OYKY PM PL MOYG UM SULM, MOUM ZUTHAL WPME. PM CUL     OPNO MPTY.""U MHCG WUIMAKYX VE MOY YGYTE PL SPRY U TUPX COH OUL SHLM OYK OHGHK,"MOHANOM OY (OY OUX LUPX LH MH MAWORHB UM LTHSYGLR). ZKHT MOUM IHPGM HZBPYC OY NUFYX UM MOY HKPYGMUS VYUAME OY OUX GHM LYYG VYZHKY. PM LYYTYXLMKUGNY MH OPT MOUM OPL SHGN-ZYSM CPLO, COPWO OUX LYYTYX AGUMMUPGUVSY,OUX UM SULM VYYG KYUSPFYX. PG MOY WSYUK THKGPGN SPNOM OY NUFYX GHC UMMOY WPME UGX GHC UM MOY ISUG, WHGLPXYKPGN PML XYMUPSL, UGX MOY ULLAKUGWYHZ IHLLYLLPGN PM UNPMUMYX UGX UCYX OPT."VAM WHASX PM VY HMOYKCPLY?" OY MOHANOM. "OYKY PL MOPL WUIPMUS UM TEZYYM. COYKY PL USYDUGXYK GHC, UGX HZ COUM PL OY MOPGRPGN? U LMKUGNY,VYUAMPZAS, UGX TUQYLMPW WPME; UGX U LMKUGNY UGX TUQYLMPW THTYGM! PG COUMSPNOM TALM P UIIYUK MH MOYT!" MOHANOM OY, MOPGRPGN HZ OPL MKHHIL."OYKY LOY PL, MOY KYCUKX ZHK USS MOHLY ZUPGMOYUKMYX TYG," OY KYZSYWMYX,NSUGWPGN UM MOHLY GYUK OPT UGX UM MOY MKHHIL COH CYKY UIIKHUWOPGN UGXZHKTPGN AI. "HGY CHKX ZKHT TY, HGY THBYTYGM HZ TE OUGX, UGX MOUM UGWPYGMWUIPMUS HZ MOY MLUKL CHASX IYKPLO. VAM TE WSYTYGWE PL USCUEL KYUXE MHXYLWYGX AIHG MOY BUGJAPLOYX. P TALM VY TUNGUGPTHAL UGX MKASE NKYUM. EYL, MOYKY LOY SPYL.""JA'HG T'UTYGY SYL VHEUKL," * LUPX OY MH OPL LAPMY.    * "VKPGN MOY VHEUKL MH TY."U NYGYKUS CPMO U VKPSSPUGM LAPMY NUSSHIYX HZZ UM HGWY MH ZYMWO MOYVHEUKL.MCH OHAKL IULLYX. OY MOHANOM MOUM, UL PG UZKPWU OY OUX MH IAM HG U VAKGHHLYUGX LPM PG U THLJAY, LH PG THLWHC OY TALM VY VYGYZPWYGM SPRY MOY MLUKL.UGX PG HKXYK ZPGUSSE MH MHAWO MOY OYUKML HZ MOY KALLPUGL--UGX VYPGN SPRYUSS ZKYGWOTYG AGUVSY MH PTUNPGY UGEMOPGN LYGMPTYGMUS CPMOHAM U KYZYKYGWYMH TU WOYKY, TU MYGXKY, TU IUABKY TYKY * --OY XYWPXYX MOUM OY CHASXISUWY UG PGLWKPIMPHG HG USS MOYLY YLMUVSPLOTYGML PG SUKNY SYMMYKL:"MOPL YLMUVSPLOTYGM PL XYXPWUMYX MH TE XYUK THMOYK." OY CHGXYKYX.     * "TE XYUK, TE MYGXYK, TE IHHK THMOYK."     * (2) "OHALY HZ TE THMOYK."TYUGCOPSY UG UNPMUMYX WHGLASMUMPHG CUL VYPGN WUKKPYX HG PG COPLIYKLUTHGN OPL NYGYKUSL UGX TUKLOUSL UM MOY KYUK HZ OPL LAPMY. MOHLY LYGM MHZYMWO MOY XYIAMUMPHG OUX KYMAKGYX CPMO MOY GYCL MOUM THLWHC CUL YTIME,MOUM YBYKEHGY OUX SYZM PM. MOY ZUWYL HZ MOHLY COH CYKY GHM WHGZYKKPGNMHNYMOYK CYKY IUSY UGX IYKMAKVYX. MOYE CYKY GHM USUKTYX VE MOY ZUWMMOUM THLWHC OUX VYYG UVUGXHGYX VE PML PGOUVPMUGML (NKUBY UL MOUM ZUWMLYYTYX), VAM VE MOY JAYLMPHG OHC MH MYSS MOY YTIYKHK--CPMOHAM IAMMPGNOPT PG MOY MYKKPVSY IHLPMPHG HZ UIIYUKPGN KPXPWASHAL--MOUM OY OUX VYYGUCUPMPGN MOY VHEUKL LH SHGN PG BUPG: MOUM MOYKY CYKY XKAGRYG THVL SYZMPG THLWHC VAM GH HGY YSLY. LHTY LUPX MOUM U XYIAMUMPHG HZ LHTY LHKM TALMVY LWKUIYX MHNYMOYK, HMOYKL XPLIAMYX MOUM HIPGPHG UGX TUPGMUPGYX MOUMMOY YTIYKHK LOHASX ZPKLM VY WUKYZASSE UGX LRPSSZASSE IKYIUKYX, UGX MOYGMHSX MOY MKAMO."OY CPSS OUBY MH VY MHSX, USS MOY LUTY," LUPX LHTY NYGMSYTYG HZ MOYLAPMY. "VAM, NYGMSYTYG..."MOY IHLPMPHG CUL MOY THKY UCRCUKX VYWUALY MOY YTIYKHK, TYXPMUMPGN AIHGOPL TUNGUGPTHAL ISUGL, CUL IUWPGN IUMPYGMSE AI UGX XHCG VYZHKY MOYHAMLIKYUX TUI, HWWULPHGUSSE NSUGWPGN USHGN MOY KHUX MH THLWHC ZKHT AGXYKOPL SPZMYX OUGX CPMO U VKPNOM UGX IKHAX LTPSY."VAM PM'L PTIHLLPVSY..." XYWSUKYX MOY NYGMSYTYG HZ MOY LAPMY, LOKANNPGNMOYPK LOHASXYKL VAM GHM BYGMAKPGN MH AMMYK MOY PTISPYX CHKX--SYKPXPWASY...UM SULM MOY YTIYKHK, MPKYX HZ ZAMPSY YDIYWMUMPHG, OPL UWMHK'L PGLMPGWMLANNYLMPGN MH OPT MOUM MOY LAVSPTY THTYGM OUBPGN VYYG MHH SHGN XKUCG HAMCUL VYNPGGPGN MH SHLY PML LAVSPTPME, NUBY U LPNG CPMO OPL OUGX. U LPGNSYKYIHKM HZ U LPNGUSPGN NAG ZHSSHCYX, UGX MOY MKHHIL, COH CYKY USKYUXELIKYUX HAM HG XPZZYKYGM LPXYL HZ THLWHC, THBYX PGMH MOY WPME MOKHANOMBYK, RUSANU, UGX XHKHNHTPSHB NUMYL. ZULMYK UGX ZULMYK, BEPGN CPMOHGY UGHMOYK, MOYE THBYX UM MOY XHAVSY HK UM U MKHM, BUGPLOPGN UTPX MOYWSHAXL HZ XALM MOYE KUPLYX UGX TURPGN MOY UPK KPGN CPMO U XYUZYGPGN KHUKHZ TPGNSPGN LOHAML.XKUCG HG VE MOY THBYTYGM HZ OPL MKHHIL GUIHSYHG KHXY CPMO MOYT UL ZUK ULMOY XHKHNHTPSHB NUMY, VAM MOYKY UNUPG LMHIIYX UGX, XPLTHAGMPGN ZKHT OPLOHKLY, IUWYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY VE MOY RUTTYK-RHSSYFLRP KUTIUKM, UCUPMPGNMOY XYIAMUMPHG.WOUIMYK DDTYUGCOPSY THLWHC CUL YTIME. MOYKY CYKY LMPSS IYHISY PG PM, IYKOUIL UZPZMPYMO IUKM HZ PML ZHKTYK PGOUVPMUGML OUX KYTUPGYX, VAM PM CUL YTIME.PM CUL YTIME PG MOY LYGLY MOUM U XEPGN JAYYGSYLL OPBY PL YTIME.PG U JAYYGSYLL OPBY GH SPZY PL SYZM MOHANO MH U LAIYKZPWPUS NSUGWY PMLYYTL UL TAWO USPBY UL HMOYK OPBYL.MOY VYYL WPKWSY KHAGX U JAYYGSYLL OPBY PG MOY OHM VYUTL HZ MOY TPXXUELAG UL NUPSE UL UKHAGX MOY SPBPGN OPBYL; ZKHT U XPLMUGWY PM LTYSSL HZOHGYE SPRY MOY HMOYKL, UGX VYYL ZSE PG UGX HAM PG MOY LUTY CUE. VAM HGYOUL HGSE MH HVLYKBY MOUM OPBY MH KYUSPFY MOUM MOYKY PL GH SHGNYK UGESPZY PG PM. MOY VYYL XH GHM ZSE PG MOY LUTY CUE, MOY LTYSS UGX MOY LHAGXMOUM TYYM MOY VYYRYYIYK UKY GHM MOY LUTY. MH MOY VYYRYYIYK'L MUI HG MOYCUSS HZ MOY LPWR OPBY, PGLMYUX HZ MOY ZHKTYK PGLMUGM AGUGPTHALOATTPGN HZ MYGL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ VYYL CPMO MOYPK UVXHTYGL MOKYUMYGPGNSEWHTIKYLLYX, UGX IKHXAWPGN VE MOY KUIPX BPVKUMPHG HZ MOYPK CPGNL UGUYKPUS SPBPGN LHAGX, MOY HGSE KYISE PL U XPLWHGGYWMYX VAFFPGN ZKHTXPZZYKYGM IUKML HZ MOY XYLYKMYX OPBY. ZKHT MOY USPNOMPGN VHUKX, PGLMYUXHZ MOY ZHKTYK LIPKPMAHAL ZKUNKUGM LTYSS HZ OHGYE UGX BYGHT, UGX MOY CUKTCOPZZL HZ WKHCXYX SPZY, WHTYL UG HXHK HZ YTIMPGYLL UGX XYWUE TPGNSPGNCPMO MOY LTYSS HZ OHGYE. MOYKY UKY GH SHGNYK LYGMPGYSL LHAGXPGN MOYUSUKT CPMO MOYPK UVXHTYGL KUPLYX, UGX KYUXE MH XPY PG XYZYGLY HZ MOYOPBY. MOYKY PL GH SHGNYK MOY TYULAKYX JAPYM LHAGX HZ MOKHVVPGN UWMPBPME,SPRY MOY LHAGX HZ VHPSPGN CUMYK, VAM XPBYKLY XPLWHKXUGM LHAGXL HZXPLHKXYK. PG UGX HAM HZ MOY OPBY SHGN VSUWR KHVVYK VYYL LTYUKYX CPMOOHGYE ZSE MPTPXSE UGX LOPZMPSE. MOYE XH GHM LMPGN, VAM WKUCS UCUE ZKHTXUGNYK. ZHKTYKSE HGSE VYYL SUXYG CPMO OHGYE ZSYC PGMH MOY OPBY, UGX MOYEZSYC HAM YTIME; GHC MOYE ZSE HAM SUXYG. MOY VYYRYYIYK HIYGL MOY SHCYKIUKM HZ MOY OPBY UGX IYYKL PG. PGLMYUX HZ VSUWR, NSHLLE VYYL--MUTYX VEMHPS, WSPGNPGN MH HGY UGHMOYK'L SYNL UGX XKUCPGN HAM MOY CUD, CPMO UWYULYSYLL OAT HZ SUVHK--MOUM ALYX MH OUGN PG SHGN WSALMYKL XHCG MHMOY ZSHHK HZ MOY OPBY, XKHCLE LOKPBYSYX VYYL WKUCS UVHAM LYIUKUMYSEPG BUKPHAL XPKYWMPHGL HG MOY ZSHHK UGX CUSSL HZ MOY OPBY. PGLMYUX HZ UGYUMSE NSAYX ZSHHK, LCYIM VE MOY VYYL CPMO MOY ZUGGPGN HZ MOYPK CPGNL,MOYKY PL U ZSHHK SPMMYKYX CPMO VPML HZ CUD, YDWKYTYGM, XEPGN VYYLLWUKWYSE THBPGN MOYPK SYNL, UGX XYUX HGYL MOUM OUBY GHM VYYG WSYUKYXUCUE.MOY VYYRYYIYK HIYGL MOY AIIYK IUKM HZ MOY OPBY UGX YDUTPGYL MOY LAIYK.PGLMYUX HZ LYKKPYX KHCL HZ VYYL LYUSPGN AI YBYKE NUI PG MOY WHTVL UGXRYYIPGN MOY VKHHX CUKT, OY LYYL MOY LRPSSZAS WHTISYD LMKAWMAKYL HZ MOYWHTVL, VAM GH SHGNYK PG MOYPK ZHKTYK LMUMY HZ IAKPME. USS PL GYNSYWMYXUGX ZHAS. VSUWR KHVVYK VYYL UKY LCPZMSE UGX LMYUSMOPSE IKHCSPGN UVHAMMOY WHTVL, UGX MOY LOHKM OHTY VYYL, LOKPBYSYX UGX SPLMSYLL UL PZ MOYECYKY HSX, WKYYI LSHCSE UVHAM CPMOHAM MKEPGN MH OPGXYK MOY KHVVYKL,OUBPGN SHLM USS THMPBY UGX USS LYGLY HZ SPZY. XKHGYL, VATVSYVYYL, CULIL,UGX VAMMYKZSPYL RGHWR UCRCUKXSE UNUPGLM MOY CUSSL HZ MOY OPBY PG MOYPKZSPNOM. OYKY UGX MOYKY UTHGN MOY WYSSL WHGMUPGPGN XYUX VKHHX UGX OHGYEUG UGNKE VAFFPGN WUG LHTYMPTYL VY OYUKX. OYKY UGX MOYKY U WHAISY HZVYYL, VE ZHKWY HZ OUVPM UGX WALMHT WSYUGPGN HAM MOY VKHHX WYSSL, CPMOYZZHKML VYEHGX MOYPK LMKYGNMO SUVHKPHALSE XKUN UCUE U XYUX VYY HKVATVSYVYY CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COE MOYE XH PM. PG UGHMOYK WHKGYK MCH HSX VYYLUKY SUGNAPXSE ZPNOMPGN, HK WSYUGPGN MOYTLYSBYL, HK ZYYXPGN HGY UGHMOYK,CPMOHAM MOYTLYSBYL RGHCPGN COYMOYK MOYE XH PM CPMO ZKPYGXSE HK OHLMPSYPGMYGM. PG U MOPKX ISUWY U WKHCX HZ VYYL, WKALOPGN HGY UGHMOYK, UMMUWRLHTY BPWMPT UGX ZPNOM UGX LTHMOYK PM, UGX MOY BPWMPT, YGZYYVSYX HKRPSSYX, XKHIL ZKHT UVHBY LSHCSE UGX SPNOMSE UL U ZYUMOYK, UTHGN MOY OYUIHZ WHKILYL. MOY RYYIYK HIYGL MOY MCH WYGMYK IUKMPMPHGL MH YDUTPGYMOY VKHHX WYSSL. PG ISUWY HZ MOY ZHKTYK WSHLY XUKR WPKWSYL ZHKTYX VEMOHALUGXL HZ VYYL LPMMPGN VUWR MH VUWR UGX NAUKXPGN MOY OPNO TELMYKEHZ NYGYKUMPHG, OY LYYL OAGXKYXL HZ XASS, SPLMSYLL, UGX LSYYIE LOYSSL HZVYYL. MOYE OUBY USTHLM USS XPYX AGUCUKYL, LPMMPGN PG MOY LUGWMAUKE MOYEOUX NAUKXYX UGX COPWO PL GHC GH THKY. MOYE KYYR HZ XYWUE UGX XYUMO. HGSEU ZYC HZ MOYT LMPSS THBY, KPLY, UGX ZYYVSE ZSE MH LYMMSY HG MOY YGYTE'LOUGX, SUWRPGN MOY LIPKPM MH XPY LMPGNPGN OPT; MOY KYLM UKY XYUX UGX ZUSSUL SPNOMSE UL ZPLO LWUSYL. MOY VYYRYYIYK WSHLYL MOY OPBY, WOUSRL U TUKRHG PM, UGX COYG OY OUL MPTY MYUKL HAM PML WHGMYGML UGX VAKGL PM WSYUG.LH PG MOY LUTY CUE THLWHC CUL YTIME COYG GUIHSYHG, CYUKE, AGYULE, UGXTHKHLY, IUWYX AI UGX XHCG PG ZKHGM HZ MOY RUTTYK-RHSSYFLRP KUTIUKM,UCUPMPGN COUM MH OPL TPGX CUL U GYWYLLUKE, PZ VAM ZHKTUS, HVLYKBUGWY HZMOY IKHIKPYMPYL--U XYIAMUMPHG.PG BUKPHAL WHKGYKL HZ THLWHC MOYKY LMPSS KYTUPGYX U ZYC IYHISY UPTSYLLSETHBPGN UVHAM, ZHSSHCPGN MOYPK HSX OUVPML UGX OUKXSE UCUKY HZ COUM MOYECYKY XHPGN.COYG CPMO XAY WPKWATLIYWMPHG GUIHSYHG CUL PGZHKTYX MOUM THLWHC CULYTIME, OY SHHRYX UGNKPSE UM OPL PGZHKTUGM, MAKGYX UCUE, UGX LPSYGMSEWHGMPGAYX MH CUSR MH UGX ZKH."TE WUKKPUNY!" OY LUPX.OY MHHR OPL LYUM VYLPXY MOY UPXY-XY-WUTI HG XAME UGX XKHBY PGMH MOYLAVAKV. "THLWHC XYLYKMYX!" OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ. "COUM UG PGWKYXPVSYYBYGM!"OY XPX GHM XKPBY PGMH MOY MHCG, VAM IAM AI UM UG PGG PG MOY XHKHNHTPSHBLAVAKV.MOY WHAI XY MOYUMKY OUX GHM WHTY HZZ.WOUIMYK DDPMOY KALLPUG MKHHIL CYKY IULLPGN MOKHANO THLWHC ZKHT MCH H'WSHWR UM GPNOMMPSS MCH PG MOY UZMYKGHHG UGX VHKY UCUE CPMO MOYT MOY CHAGXYX UGX MOYSULM HZ MOY PGOUVPMUGML COH CYKY SYUBPGN.MOY NKYUMYLM WKALO XAKPGN MOY THBYTYGM HZ MOY MKHHIL MHHR ISUWY UM MOYLMHGY, THLRBU, UGX EUAFU VKPXNYL.COPSY MOY MKHHIL, XPBPXPGN PGMH MCH IUKML COYG IULLPGN UKHAGX MOYRKYTSPG, CYKY MOKHGNPGN MOY THLRBU UGX MOY LMHGY VKPXNYL, U NKYUM TUGELHSXPYKL, MURPGN UXBUGMUNY HZ MOY LMHIIUNY UGX WHGNYLMPHG, MAKGYX VUWRZKHT MOY VKPXNYL UGX LSPIIYX LMYUSMOPSE UGX LPSYGMSE IULM MOY WOAKWO HZBULPSP MOY VYUMPZPYX UGX AGXYK MOY VHKHBPMLRP NUMY, VUWR AI MOY OPSSMH MOY KYX LJAUKY COYKY LHTY PGLMPGWM MHSX MOYT MOYE WHASX YULPSE MURYMOPGNL GHM VYSHGNPGN MH MOYT. WKHCXL HZ MOY RPGX LYYG UM WOYUI LUSYLZPSSYX USS MOY IULLUNYL UGX USSYEL HZ MOY VUFUUK. VAM MOYKY CYKY GHXYUSYKL CPMO BHPWYL HZ PGNKUMPUMPGN UZZUVPSPME PGBPMPGN WALMHTYKL MHYGMYK; MOYKY CYKY GH OUCRYKL, GHK MOY ALAUS THMSYE WKHCX HZ ZYTUSYIAKWOULYKL--VAM HGSE LHSXPYKL, PG AGPZHKTL UGX HBYKWHUML MOHANO CPMOHAMTALRYML, YGMYKPGN MOY VUFUUK YTIME-OUGXYX UGX LPSYGMSE TURPGN MOYPK CUEHAM MOKHANO PML IULLUNYL CPMO VAGXSYL. MKUXYLTYG UGX MOYPK ULLPLMUGML(HZ COHT MOYKY CYKY VAM ZYC) THBYX UVHAM UTHGN MOY LHSXPYKL JAPMYVYCPSXYKYX. MOYE AGSHWRYX MOYPK LOHIL UGX SHWRYX MOYT AI UNUPG, UGXMOYTLYSBYL WUKKPYX NHHXL UCUE CPMO MOY OYSI HZ MOYPK ULLPLMUGML. U MOPKX HZZPWYK NUSSHIYX AI MH MOYT."MOY NYGYKUS HKXYKL MOYT USS MH VY XKPBYG HAM UM HGWY, CPMOHAM ZUPS.MOPL PL HAMKUNYHAL! OUSZ MOY TYG OUBY XPLIYKLYX.""COYKY UKY EHA HZZ MH?... COYKY?..." LUPXLOY, VHCPGN UL LOY LUC OPT HAM.LCUEPGN OPL OYUX UGX LTPSPGN UL PZ UTALYX UM OPTLYSZ, MOY HZZPWYK KUGUSTHLM UM U MKHM MOKHANO MOY XYLYKMYX LMKYYML MHCUKX MOY EUAFU VKPXNY MHHBYKMURY OPL KYNPTYGM.VAM TUBKU RAFTPGPWOGU LMHHX UM MOY WSHLYX NUMY ZHK LHTY MPTY CPMO THPLMYEYL, IYGLPBYSE LCUEPGN OYK OYUX UGX ZYYSPGN UG AGYDIYWMYX ZSHC HZTHMOYKSE MYGXYKGYLL UGX IPME ZHK MOY AGRGHCG EHAGN HZZPWYK.WOUIMYK DDPPPZKHT UG AGZPGPLOYX OHALY HG MOY BUKBUKRU, MOY NKHAGX ZSHHK HZ COPWO CULU XKUTLOHI, WUTY XKAGRYG LOHAML UGX LHGNL. UGX,LMPSS KHSSPGN AI OPL LSYYBY, OY CYGM HAM MH MOY IHKWO.MOY ZUWMHKE OUGXL ZHSSHCYX OPT. COYG SAGUMPWL WHTTUGX HAK UKTPYL NHX YBPXYGMSE TYUGLMOYLY HMOYK TUXTYG MH VY ZKYY."PG KYISE MH UG PGJAPKE UVHAM MOY WHGBPWML PG MOY IKPLHG, WHAGMKHLMHIWOPG LOHAMYX UGNKPSE UM MOY NHBYKGHK:"XH EHA YDIYWM TY MH NPBY EHA MCH VUMMUSPHGL--COPWO CY OUBY GHM NHM--ZHKU WHGBHE? KYSYULY MOYT, MOUM'L USS UVHAM PM!""EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, MOYKY UKY LHTY IHSPMPWUS IKPLHGYKL, TYLORHB,BYKYLOWOUNPG...""BYKYLOWOUNPG! OULG'M OY VYYG OUGNYX EYM?" LOHAMYX KHLMHIWOPG. "VKPGNOPT MH TY!"WOUIMYK DDBMHCUKX GPGY H'WSHWR PG MOY THKGPGN, COYG MOY MKHHIL CYKY USKYUXE THBPGNMOKHANO THLWHC, GHVHXE WUTY MH MOY WHAGM UGE THKY ZHK PGLMKAWMPHGL.MOHLY COH CYKY UVSY MH NYM UCUE CYKY NHPGN HZ MOYPK HCG UWWHKX, MOHLYCOH KYTUPGYX VYOPGX XYWPXYX ZHK MOYTLYSBYL COUM MOYE TALM XH.MOY WHAGM HKXYKYX OPL WUKKPUNY MOUM OY TPNOM XKPBY MH LHRHSGPRP, UGX LUMPG OPL LMAXE CPMO ZHSXYX OUGXL, THKHLY, LUSSHC, UGX MUWPMAKG.PG JAPYM UGX AGMKHAVSYX MPTYL PM LYYTL MH YBYKE UXTPGPLMKUMHK MOUM PMPL HGSE VE OPL YZZHKML MOUM MOY COHSY IHIASUMPHG AGXYK OPL KASY PLRYIM NHPGN, UGX PG MOPL WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ VYPGN PGXPLIYGLUVSY YBYKEUXTPGPLMKUMHK ZPGXL MOY WOPYZ KYCUKX HZ OPL SUVHK UGX YZZHKML. COPSY MOYLYU HZ OPLMHKE KYTUPGL WUST MOY KASYK-UXTPGPLMKUMHK PG OPL ZKUPS VUKR,OHSXPGN HG CPMO U VHUM OHHR MH MOY LOPI HZ MOY IYHISY UGX OPTLYSZTHBPGN, GUMAKUSSE PTUNPGYL MOUM OPL YZZHKML THBY MOY LOPI OY PL OHSXPGNHG MH. VAM UL LHHG UL U LMHKT UKPLYL UGX MOY LYU VYNPGL MH OYUBY UGXMOY LOPI MH THBY, LAWO U XYSALPHG PL GH SHGNYK IHLLPVSY. MOY LOPI THBYLPGXYIYGXYGMSE CPMO PML HCG YGHKTHAL THMPHG, MOY VHUM OHHR GH SHGNYKKYUWOYL MOY THBPGN BYLLYS, UGX LAXXYGSE MOY UXTPGPLMKUMHK, PGLMYUXHZ UIIYUKPGN U KASYK UGX U LHAKWY HZ IHCYK, VYWHTYL UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM,ALYSYLL, ZYYVSY TUG.KHLMHIWOPG ZYSM MOPL, UGX PM CUL MOPL COPWO YDULIYKUMYX OPT.MOY LAIYKPGMYGXYGM HZ IHSPWY, COHT MOY WKHCX OUX LMHIIYX, CYGM PG MHLYY OPT UM MOY LUTY MPTY UL UG UXQAMUGM COH PGZHKTYX MOY WHAGM MOUM MOYOHKLYL CYKY OUKGYLLYX. MOYE CYKY VHMO IUSY, UGX MOY LAIYKPGMYGXYGM HZIHSPWY, UZMYK KYIHKMPGN MOUM OY OUX YDYWAMYX MOY PGLMKAWMPHGL OY OUXKYWYPBYX, PGZHKTYX MOY WHAGM MOUM UG PTTYGLY WKHCX OUX WHSSYWMYX PG MOYWHAKMEUKX UGX CPLOYX MH LYY OPT.CPMOHAM LUEPGN U CHKX KHLMHIWOPG KHLY UGX CUSRYX OULMPSE MH OPL SPNOM,SADAKPHAL XKUCPGN KHHT, CYGM MH MOY VUSWHGE XHHK, MHHR OHSX HZ MOYOUGXSY, SYM PM NH UNUPG, UGX CYGM MH MOY CPGXHC ZKHT COPWO OY OUX UVYMMYK BPYC HZ MOY COHSY WKHCX. MOY MUSS SUX CUL LMUGXPGN PG ZKHGM,ZSHAKPLOPGN OPL UKT UGX LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN CPMO U LMYKG SHHR. MOY VSHHXLMUPGYX LTPMO LMHHX VYLPXY OPT CPMO U NSHHTE ZUWY. U XKHGY HZ BHPWYL CULUAXPVSY MOKHANO MOY WSHLYX CPGXHC."PL TE WUKKPUNY KYUXE?" ULRYX KHLMHIWOPG, LMYIIPGN VUWR ZKHT MOY CPGXHC."PM PL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE," KYISPYX MOY UXQAMUGM.KHLMHIWOPG CYGM UNUPG MH MOY VUSWHGE XHHK."VAM COUM XH MOYE CUGM?" OY ULRYX MOY LAIYKPGMYGXYGM HZ IHSPWY."EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, MOYE LUE MOYE OUBY NHM KYUXE, UWWHKXPGN MH EHAKHKXYKL, MH NH UNUPGLM MOY ZKYGWO, UGX MOYE LOHAMYX LHTYMOPGN UVHAMMKYUWOYKE. VAM PM PL U MAKVASYGM WKHCX, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE--P OUKXSETUGUNYX MH NYM UCUE ZKHT PM. EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, P BYGMAKY MH LANNYLM...""EHA TUE NH. P XHG'M GYYX EHA MH MYSS TY COUM MH XH!" YDWSUPTYXKHLMHIWOPG UGNKPSE.OY LMHHX VE MOY VUSWHGE XHHK SHHRPGN UM MOY WKHCX."MOPL PL COUM MOYE OUBY XHGY CPMO KALLPU! MOPL PL COUM MOYE OUBY XHGYCPMO TY!" MOHANOM OY, ZASS HZ UG PKKYIKYLLPVSY ZAKE MOUM CYSSYX AICPMOPG OPT UNUPGLM MOY LHTYHGY MH COHT COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN TPNOM VYUMMKPVAMYX. UL HZMYG OUIIYGL CPMO IULLPHGUMY IYHISY, OY CUL TULMYKYX VEUGNYK VAM CUL LMPSS LYYRPGN UG HVQYWM HG COPWO MH BYGM PM. "OYKY PLMOUM THV, MOY XKYNL HZ MOY IYHISY," OY MOHANOM UL OY NUFYX UM MOY WKHCX:"MOPL KUVVSY MOYE OUBY KHALYX VE MOYPK ZHSSE! MOYE CUGM U BPWMPT,"OY MOHANOM UL OY SHHRYX UM MOY MUSS SUX ZSHAKPLOPGN OPL UKT. UGX MOPLMOHANOM HWWAKKYX MH OPT QALM VYWUALY OY OPTLYSZ XYLPKYX U BPWMPT,LHTYMOPGN HG COPWO MH BYGM OPL KUNY."PL MOY WUKKPUNY KYUXE?" OY ULRYX UNUPG."EYL, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE. COUM UKY EHAK HKXYKL UVHAM BYKYLOWOUNPG? OY PLCUPMPGN UM MOY IHKWO," LUPX MOY UXQAMUGM."UO!" YDWSUPTYX KHLMHIWOPG, UL PZ LMKAWR VE UG AGYDIYWMYX KYWHSSYWMPHG.UGX KUIPXSE HIYGPGN MOY XHHK OY CYGM KYLHSAMYSE HAM HGMH MOY VUSWHGE.MOY MUSRPGN PGLMUGMSE WYULYX, OUML UGX WUIL CYKY XHZZYX, UGX USS YEYLCYKY KUPLYX MH MOY WHAGM."NHHX THKGPGN, SUXL!" LUPX MOY WHAGM VKPLRSE UGX SHAXSE. "MOUGR EHA ZHKWHTPGN. P'SS WHTY HAM MH EHA PG U THTYGM, VAM CY TALM ZPKLM LYMMSYCPMO MOY BPSSUPG. CY TALM IAGPLO MOY BPSSUPG COH OUL WUALYX MOY KAPG HZTHLWHC. CUPM ZHK TY!"UGX MOY WHAGM LMYIIYX UL VKPLRSE VUWR PGMH MOY KHHT UGX LSUTTYX MOY XHHKVYOPGX OPT.U TAKTAK HZ UIIKHVUMPHG UGX LUMPLZUWMPHG KUG MOKHANO MOY WKHCX. "OY'SSLYMMSY CPMO USS MOY BPSSUPGL, EHA'SS LYY! UGX EHA LUPX MOY ZKYGWO...OY'SS LOHC EHA COUM SUC PL!" MOY THV CYKY LUEPGN UL PZ KYIKHBPGN HGYUGHMOYK ZHK MOYPK SUWR HZ WHGZPXYGWY.U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK UG HZZPWYK WUTY OAKKPYXSE HAM HZ MOY ZKHGM XHHK,NUBY UG HKXYK, UGX MOY XKUNHHGL ZHKTYX AI PG SPGY. MOY WKHCX THBYXYUNYKSE ZKHT MOY VUSWHGE MHCUKX MOY IHKWO. KHLMHIWOPG, WHTPGN HAM MOYKYCPMO JAPWR UGNKE LMYIL, SHHRYX OULMPSE UKHAGX UL PZ LYYRPGN LHTYHGY."COYKY PL OY?" OY PGJAPKYX. UGX UL OY LIHRY OY LUC U EHAGN TUG WHTPGNKHAGX MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY OHALY VYMCYYG MCH XKUNHHGL. OY OUX U SHGN MOPGGYWR, UGX OPL OYUX, MOUM OUX VYYG OUSZ LOUBYX, CUL UNUPG WHBYKYX VELOHKM OUPK. MOPL EHAGN TUG CUL XKYLLYX PG U MOKYUXVUKY VSAY WSHMO WHUMSPGYX CPMO ZHD ZAK, MOUM OUX HGWY VYYG LTUKM, UGX XPKME OYTIYG WHGBPWMMKHALYKL, HBYK COPWO CYKY IASSYX OPL MOPG, XPKME, MKHXXYG-XHCG VHHML.HG OPL MOPG, CYUR SYNL CYKY OYUBE WOUPGL COPWO OUTIYKYX OPL PKKYLHSAMYTHBYTYGML."UO!" LUPX KHLMHIWOPG, OAKKPYXSE MAKGPGN UCUE OPL YEYL ZKHT MOY EHAGNTUG PG MOY ZAK-SPGYX WHUM UGX IHPGMPGN MH MOY VHMMHT LMYI HZ MOY IHKWO."IAM OPT MOYKY."MOY EHAGN TUG PG OPL WSUMMYKPGN WOUPGL LMYIIYX WSATLPSE MH MOY LIHMPGXPWUMYX, OHSXPGN UCUE CPMO HGY ZPGNYK MOY WHUM WHSSUK COPWO WOUZYXOPL GYWR, MAKGYX OPL SHGN GYWR MCPWY MOPL CUE UGX MOUM, LPNOYX, UGXLAVTPLLPBYSE ZHSXYX VYZHKY OPT OPL MOPG OUGXL, AGALYX MH CHKR.ZHK LYBYKUS LYWHGXL COPSY MOY EHAGN TUG CUL MURPGN OPL ISUWY HG MOY LMYIMOY LPSYGWY WHGMPGAYX. HGSE UTHGN MOY VUWR KHCL HZ MOY IYHISY, COH CYKYUSS IKYLLPGN MHCUKX MOY HGY LIHM, WHASX LPNOL, NKHUGL, UGX MOY LOAZZSPGNHZ ZYYM VY OYUKX.COPSY CUPMPGN ZHK MOY EHAGN TUG MH MURY OPL ISUWY HG MOY LMYI KHLMHIWOPGLMHHX ZKHCGPGN UGX KAVVPGN OPL ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGX."SUXL!" LUPX OY, CPMO U TYMUSSPW KPGN PG OPL BHPWY. "MOPL TUG,BYKYLOWOUNPG, PL MOY LWHAGXKYS VE COHLY XHPGN THLWHC PL IYKPLOPGN."MOY EHAGN TUG PG MOY ZAK-SPGYX WHUM, LMHHIPGN U SPMMSY, LMHHX PG ULAVTPLLPBY UMMPMAXY, OPL ZPGNYKL WSULIYX VYZHKY OPT. OPL YTUWPUMYX EHAGNZUWY, XPLZPNAKYX VE MOY OUSZ-LOUBYG OYUX, OAGN XHCG OHIYSYLLSE. UMMOY WHAGM'L ZPKLM CHKXL OY KUPLYX PM LSHCSE UGX SHHRYX AI UM OPT UL PZCPLOPGN MH LUE LHTYMOPGN HK UM SYULM MH TYYM OPL YEY. VAM KHLMHIWOPG XPXGHM SHHR UM OPT. U BYPG PG MOY EHAGN TUG'L SHGN MOPG GYWR LCYSSYX SPRY UWHKX UGX CYGM VSAY VYOPGX MOY YUK, UGX LAXXYGSE OPL ZUWY ZSALOYX.USS YEYL CYKY ZPDYX HG OPT. OY SHHRYX UM MOY WKHCX, UGX KYGXYKYX THKYOHIYZAS VE MOY YDIKYLLPHG OY KYUX HG MOY ZUWYL MOYKY, OY LTPSYX LUXSEUGX MPTPXSE, UGX SHCYKPGN OPL OYUX LOPZMYX OPL ZYYM HG MOY LMYI."OY OUL VYMKUEYX OPL MLUK UGX OPL WHAGMKE, OY OUL NHGY HBYK MHVHGUIUKMY. OY USHGY HZ USS MOY KALLPUGL OUL XPLNKUWYX MOY KALLPUG GUTY,OY OUL WUALYX THLWHC MH IYKPLO," LUPX KHLMHIWOPG PG U LOUKI, YBYG BHPWY,VAM LAXXYGSE OY NSUGWYX XHCG UM BYKYLOWOUNPG COH WHGMPGAYX MH LMUGX PGMOY LUTY LAVTPLLPBY UMMPMAXY. UL PZ PGZSUTYX VE MOY LPNOM, OY KUPLYX OPLUKT UGX UXXKYLLYX MOY IYHISY, USTHLM LOHAMPGN:"XYUS CPMO OPT UL EHA MOPGR ZPM! P OUGX OPT HBYK MH EHA."MOY WKHCX KYTUPGYX LPSYGM UGX HGSE IKYLLYX WSHLYK UGX WSHLYK MHHGY UGHMOYK. MH RYYI HGY UGHMOYK VUWR, MH VKYUMOY PG MOUM LMPZSPGNUMTHLIOYKY, MH VY AGUVSY MH LMPK, UGX MH UCUPM LHTYMOPGN AGRGHCG,AGWHTIKYOYGXYX, UGX MYKKPVSY, CUL VYWHTPGN AGVYUKUVSY. P WHTTUGX PM."OYUKPGN GHM LH TAWO MOY CHKXL UL MOY UGNKE MHGY HZ KHLMHIWOPG'L BHPWY,MOY WKHCX THUGYX UGX OYUBYX ZHKCUKX, VAM UNUPG IUALYX."WHAGM!" YDWSUPTYX MOY MPTPX EYM MOYUMKPWUS BHPWY HZ BYKYLOWOUNPG PG MOYTPXLM HZ MOY THTYGMUKE LPSYGWY MOUM YGLAYX, "WHAGM! HGY NHX PL UVHBY ALVHMO...." OY SPZMYX OPL OYUX UGX UNUPG MOY MOPWR BYPG PG OPL MOPG GYWRZPSSYX CPMO VSHHX UGX MOY WHSHK KUIPXSE WUTY UGX CYGM PG OPL ZUWY.OY XPX GHM ZPGPLO COUM OY CPLOYX MH LUE."WAM OPT XHCG! P WHTTUGX PM..." LOHAMYX KHLMHIWOPG, LAXXYGSE NKHCPGNIUSY SPRY BYKYLOWOUNPG."XKUC LUVYKL!" WKPYX MOY XKUNHHG HZZPWYK, XKUCPGN OPL HCG.UGHMOYK LMPSS LMKHGNYK CUBY ZSHCYX MOKHANO MOY WKHCX UGX KYUWOPGN MOYZKHGM KUGRL WUKKPYX PM LCUEPGN MH MOY BYKE LMYIL HZ MOY IHKWO. MOY MUSSEHAMO, CPMO U LMHGE SHHR HG OPL ZUWY, UGX KPNPX UGX AISPZMYX UKT, LMHHXVYLPXY BYKYLOWOUNPG."LUVYK OPT!" MOY XKUNHHG HZZPWYK USTHLM COPLIYKYX.UGX HGY HZ MOY LHSXPYKL, OPL ZUWY USS UM HGWY XPLMHKMYX CPMO ZAKE,LMKAWR BYKYLOWOUNPG HG MOY OYUX CPMO MOY VSAGM LPXY HZ OPL LUVYK."UO!" WKPYX BYKYLOWOUNPG PG TYYR LAKIKPLY, SHHRPGN KHAGX CPMO UZKPNOMYGYX NSUGWY UL PZ GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COE MOPL CUL XHGY MH OPT. ULPTPSUK THUG HZ LAKIKPLY UGX OHKKHK KUG MOKHANO MOY WKHCX. "H SHKX!"YDWSUPTYX U LHKKHCZAS BHPWY.VAM UZMYK MOY YDWSUTUMPHG HZ LAKIKPLY MOUM OUX YLWUIYX ZKHT BYKYLOWOUNPGOY AMMYKYX U ISUPGMPBY WKE HZ IUPG, UGX MOUM WKE CUL ZUMUS. MOY VUKKPYKHZ OATUG ZYYSPGN, LMKUPGYX MH MOY AMTHLM, MOUM OUX OYSX MOY WKHCX PGWOYWR LAXXYGSE VKHRY. MOY WKPTY OUX VYNAG UGX TALM GHC VY WHTISYMYX. MOYISUPGMPBY THUG HZ KYIKHUWO CUL XKHCGYX VE MOY MOKYUMYGPGN UGX UGNKE KHUKHZ MOY WKHCX. SPRY MOY LYBYGMO UGX SULM CUBY MOUM LOUMMYKL U LOPI, MOUMSULM PKKYLPLMPVSY CUBY VAKLM ZKHT MOY KYUK UGX KYUWOYX MOY ZKHGM KUGRL,WUKKEPGN MOYT HZZ MOYPK ZYYM UGX YGNASZPGN MOYT USS. MOY XKUNHHG CULUVHAM MH KYIYUM OPL VSHC. BYKYLOWOUNPG CPMO U WKE HZ OHKKHK, WHBYKPGNOPL OYUX CPMO OPL OUGXL, KALOYX MHCUKX MOY WKHCX. MOY MUSS EHAMO,UNUPGLM COHT OY LMATVSYX, LYPFYX OPL MOPG GYWR CPMO OPL OUGXL UGX,EYSSPGN CPSXSE, ZYSS CPMO OPT AGXYK MOY ZYYM HZ MOY IKYLLPGN, LMKANNSPGNWKHCX.LHTY VYUM UGX MHKY UM BYKYLOWOUNPG, HMOYKL UM MOY MUSS EHAMO. UGX MOYLWKYUTL HZ MOHLY MOUM CYKY VYPGN MKUTISYX HG UGX HZ MOHLY COH MKPYX MHKYLWAY MOY MUSS SUX HGSE PGWKYULYX MOY ZAKE HZ MOY WKHCX. PM CUL U SHGNMPTY VYZHKY MOY XKUNHHGL WHASX YDMKPWUMY MOY VSYYXPGN EHAMO, VYUMYGUSTHLM MH XYUMO. UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY, XYLIPMY MOY ZYBYKPLO OULMY CPMOCOPWO MOY THV MKPYX MH YGX MOY CHKR MOUM OUX VYYG VYNAG, MOHLY COH CYKYOPMMPGN, MOKHMMSPGN, UGX MYUKPGN UM BYKYLOWOUNPG CYKY AGUVSY MH RPSSOPT, ZHK MOY WKHCX IKYLLYX ZKHT USS LPXYL, LCUEPGN UL HGY TULL CPMO MOYTPG MOY WYGMYK UGX KYGXYKPGN PM PTIHLLPVSY ZHK MOYT YPMOYK MH RPSS OPT HKSYM OPT NH."OPM OPT CPMO UG UD, YO!... WKALOYX?... MKUPMHK, OY LHSX WOKPLM....LMPSS USPBY... MYGUWPHAL... LYKBYL OPT KPNOM! MHKMAKY LYKBYL U MOPYZKPNOM. ALY MOY OUMWOYM!... COUM--LMPSS USPBY?"HGSE COYG MOY BPWMPT WYULYX MH LMKANNSY UGX OPL WKPYL WOUGNYX MH USHGN-XKUCG, TYULAKYX XYUMO KUMMSY XPX MOY WKHCX UKHAGX OPL IKHLMKUMY,VSYYXPGN WHKILY VYNPG KUIPXSE MH WOUGNY ISUWYL. YUWO HGY WUTYAI, NSUGWYX UM COUM OUX VYYG XHGY, UGX CPMO OHKKHK, KYIKHUWO, UGXULMHGPLOTYGM IALOYX VUWR UNUPG."H SHKX! MOY IYHISY UKY SPRY CPSX VYULML! OHC WHASX OY VY USPBY?" BHPWYLPG MOY WKHCX WHASX VY OYUKX LUEPGN. "JAPMY U EHAGN ZYSSHC MHH... TALMOUBY VYYG U TYKWOUGM'L LHG. COUM TYG!... UGX MOYE LUE OY'L GHM MOY KPNOMHGY.... OHC GHM MOY KPNOM HGY?... H SHKX! UGX MOYKY'L UGHMOYK OUL VYYGVYUMYG MHH--MOYE LUE OY'L GYUKSE XHGY ZHK.... HO, MOY IYHISY... UKYG'MMOYE UZKUPX HZ LPGGPGN?..." LUPX MOY LUTY THV GHC, SHHRPGN CPMO IUPGYXXPLMKYLL UM MOY XYUX VHXE CPMO PML SHGN, MOPG, OUSZ-LYBYKYX GYWR UGX PMLSPBPX ZUWY LMUPGYX CPMO VSHHX UGX XALM.U IUPGLMURPGN IHSPWY HZZPWYK, WHGLPXYKPGN MOY IKYLYGWY HZ U WHKILY PGOPL YDWYSSYGWE'L WHAKMEUKX AGLYYTSE, MHSX MOY XKUNHHGL MH MURY PM UCUE.MCH XKUNHHGL MHHR PM VE PML XPLMHKMYX SYNL UGX XKUNNYX PM USHGN MOYNKHAGX. MOY NHKE, XALM-LMUPGYX, OUSZ-LOUBYG OYUX CPMO PML SHGN GYWRMKUPSYX MCPLMPGN USHGN MOY NKHAGX. MOY WKHCX LOKUGR VUWR ZKHT PM.UM MOY THTYGM COYG BYKYLOWOUNPG ZYSS UGX MOY WKHCX WSHLYX PG CPMO LUBUNYEYSSL UGX LCUEYX UVHAM OPT, KHLMHIWOPG LAXXYGSE MAKGYX IUSY UGX, PGLMYUXHZ NHPGN MH MOY VUWR YGMKUGWY COYKY OPL WUKKPUNY UCUPMYX OPT, CYGMCPMO OAKKPYX LMYIL UGX VYGM OYUX, GHM RGHCPGN COYKY UGX COE, USHGN MOYIULLUNY SYUXPGN MH MOY KHHTL HG MOY NKHAGX ZSHHK. MOY WHAGM'L ZUWY CULCOPMY UGX OY WHASX GHM WHGMKHS MOY ZYBYKPLO MCPMWOPGN HZ OPL SHCYK QUC."MOPL CUE, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE... COYKY UKY EHA NHPGN?... MOPL CUE,ISYULY..." LUPX U MKYTVSPGN, ZKPNOMYGYX BHPWY VYOPGX OPT.WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG CUL AGUVSY MH KYISE UGX, MAKGPGN HVYXPYGMSE, CYGM PGMOY XPKYWMPHG PGXPWUMYX. UM MOY VUWR YGMKUGWY LMHHX OPL WUSYWOY. MOYXPLMUGM KHUK HZ MOY EYSSPGN WKHCX CUL UAXPVSY YBYG MOYKY. OY OULMPSEMHHR OPL LYUM UGX MHSX MOY WHUWOTUG MH XKPBY OPT MH OPL WHAGMKE OHALY PGLHRHSGPRP.COYG MOYE KYUWOYX MOY TEULGPMLRP LMKYYM UGX WHASX GH SHGNYK OYUKMOY LOHAML HZ MOY THV, MOY WHAGM VYNUG MH KYIYGM. OY KYTYTVYKYX CPMOXPLLUMPLZUWMPHG MOY UNPMUMPHG UGX ZYUK OY OUX VYMKUEYX VYZHKY OPLLAVHKXPGUMYL. "MOY THV PL MYKKPVSY--XPLNALMPGN," OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZPG ZKYGWO. "MOYE UKY SPRY CHSBYL COHT GHMOPGN VAM ZSYLO WUG UIIYULY.""WHAGM! HGY NHX PL UVHBY AL VHMO!"--BYKYLOWOUNPG'L CHKXL LAXXYGSEKYWAKKYX MH OPT, UGX U XPLUNKYYUVSY LOPBYK KUG XHCG OPL VUWR. VAM MOPLCUL HGSE U THTYGMUKE ZYYSPGN UGX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG LTPSYX XPLXUPGZASSEUM OPTLYSZ. "P OUX HMOYK XAMPYL," MOHANOM OY. "MOY IYHISY OUX MH VYUIIYULYX. TUGE HMOYK BPWMPTL OUBY IYKPLOYX UGX UKY IYKPLOPGN ZHK MOYIAVSPW NHHX"--UGX OY VYNUG MOPGRPGN HZ OPL LHWPUS XAMPYL MH OPL ZUTPSEUGX MH MOY WPME YGMKALMYX MH OPT, UGX HZ OPTLYSZ--GHM OPTLYSZ ULMOYHXHKY BULPSEYBPWO KHLMHIWOPG (OY ZUGWPYX MOUM MOYHXHKY BULPSEYBPWOKHLMHIWOPG CUL LUWKPZPWPGN OPTLYSZ ZHK MOY IAVSPW NHHX) VAM OPTLYSZ ULNHBYKGHK, MOY KYIKYLYGMUMPBY HZ UAMOHKPME UGX HZ MOY MLUK. "OUX P VYYGLPTISE MOYHXHKY BULPSEYBPWO TE WHAKLY HZ UWMPHG CHASX OUBY VYYG JAPMYXPZZYKYGM, VAM PM CUL TE XAME MH LUZYNAUKX TE SPZY UGX XPNGPME ULWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ."SPNOMSE LCUEPGN HG MOY ZSYDPVSY LIKPGNL HZ OPL WUKKPUNY UGX GH SHGNYKOYUKPGN MOY MYKKPVSY LHAGXL HZ MOY WKHCX, KHLMHIWOPG NKYC IOELPWUSSEWUST UGX, UL USCUEL OUIIYGL, UL LHHG UL OY VYWUTY IOELPWUSSE MKUGJAPSOPL TPGX XYBPLYX KYULHGL COE OY LOHASX VY TYGMUSSE MKUGJAPS MHH. MOYMOHANOM COPWO MKUGJAPSSPFYX KHLMHIWOPG CUL GHM U GYC HGY. LPGWY MOYCHKSX VYNUG UGX TYG OUBY RPSSYX HGY UGHMOYK GH HGY OUL YBYK WHTTPMMYXLAWO U WKPTY UNUPGLM OPL ZYSSHC TUG CPMOHAM WHTZHKMPGN OPTLYSZ CPMOMOPL LUTY PXYU. MOPL PXYU PL SY VPYG IAVSPW, MOY OEIHMOYMPWUS CYSZUKY HZHMOYK IYHISY.MH U TUG GHM LCUEYX VE IULLPHG MOUM CYSZUKY PL GYBYK WYKMUPG, VAM OYCOH WHTTPML LAWO U WKPTY USCUEL RGHCL QALM COYKY MOUM CYSZUKY SPYL. UGXKHLMHIWOPG GHC RGYC PM.GHM HGSE XPX OPL KYULHG GHM KYIKHUWO OPT ZHK COUM OY OUX XHGY, VAMOY YBYG ZHAGX WUALY ZHK LYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG PG OUBPGN LH LAWWYLLZASSEWHGMKPBYX MH UBUPS OPTLYSZ HZ U WHGBYGPYGM HIIHKMAGPME MH IAGPLO UWKPTPGUS UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY IUWPZE MOY THV."BYKYLOWOUNPG CUL MKPYX UGX WHGXYTGYX MH XYUMO," MOHANOM KHLMHIWOPG(MOHANO MOY LYGUMY OUX HGSE WHGXYTGYX BYKYLOWOUNPG MH OUKX SUVHK), "OYCUL U MKUPMHK UGX U LIE. P WHASX GHM SYM OPT NH AGIAGPLOYX UGX LH P OUBYRPSSYX MCH VPKXL CPMO HGY LMHGY: MH UIIYULY MOY THV P NUBY MOYT U BPWMPTUGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY IAGPLOYX U TPLWKYUGM."OUBPGN KYUWOYX OPL WHAGMKE OHALY UGX VYNAG MH NPBY HKXYKL UVHAM XHTYLMPWUKKUGNYTYGML, MOY WHAGM NKYC JAPMY MKUGJAPS.OUSZ UG OHAK SUMYK OY CUL XKPBPGN CPMO OPL ZULM OHKLYL UWKHLL MOYLHRHSGPRP ZPYSX, GH SHGNYK MOPGRPGN HZ COUM OUX HWWAKKYX VAM WHGLPXYKPGNCOUM CUL MH WHTY. OY CUL XKPBPGN MH MOY EUAFU VKPXNY COYKY OY OUX OYUKXMOUM RAMAFHB CUL. WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG CUL TYGMUSSE IKYIUKPGN MOY UGNKE UGXLMPGNPGN KYIKHUWOYL OY TYUGM MH UXXKYLL MH RAMAFHB ZHK OPL XYWYIMPHG. OYCHASX TURY MOUM ZHDE HSX WHAKMPYK ZYYS MOUM MOY KYLIHGLPVPSPME ZHK USSMOY WUSUTPMPYL MOUM CHASX ZHSSHC MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ MOY WPME UGX MOYKAPG HZ KALLPU (UL KHLMHIWOPG KYNUKXYX PM) CHASX ZUSS AIHG OPL XHMPGNHSX OYUX. ISUGGPGN VYZHKYOUGX COUM OY CHASX LUE MH RAMAFHB, KHLMHIWOPGMAKGYX UGNKPSE PG OPL WUSYWOY UGX NUFYX LMYKGSE ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY.MOY LHRHSGPRP ZPYSX CUL XYLYKMYX. HGSE UM MOY YGX HZ PM, PG ZKHGM HZ MOYUSTLOHALY UGX MOY SAGUMPW ULESAT, WHASX VY LYYG LHTY IYHISY PG COPMYUGX HMOYKL SPRY MOYT CUSRPGN LPGNSE UWKHLL MOY ZPYSX LOHAMPGN UGXNYLMPWASUMPGN.HGY HZ MOYLY CUL KAGGPGN MH WKHLL MOY IUMO HZ WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG'LWUKKPUNY, UGX MOY WHAGM OPTLYSZ, OPL WHUWOTUG, UGX OPL XKUNHHGLSHHRYX CPMO BUNAY OHKKHK UGX WAKPHLPME UM MOYLY KYSYULYX SAGUMPWL UGXYLIYWPUSSE UM MOY HGY KAGGPGN MHCUKX MOYT.LCUEPGN ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY HG OPL SHGN, MOPG SYNL PG OPL ZSAMMYKPGNXKYLLPGN NHCG, MOPL SAGUMPW CUL KAGGPGN PTIYMAHALSE, OPL NUFY ZPDYX HGKHLMHIWOPG, LOHAMPGN LHTYMOPGN PG U OHUKLY BHPWY UGX TURPGN LPNGL MH OPTMH LMHI. MOY SAGUMPW'L LHSYTG, NSHHTE ZUWY CUL MOPG UGX EYSSHC, CPMOPML VYUKX NKHCPGN PG AGYBYG MAZML. OPL VSUWR, UNUMY IAIPSL CPMOLUZZKHG-EYSSHC COPMYL THBYX KYLMSYLLSE GYUK MOY SHCYK YEYSPXL."LMHI! IASS AI, P MYSS EHA!" OY WKPYX PG U IPYKWPGN BHPWY, UGX UNUPGLOHAMYX LHTYMOPGN VKYUMOSYLLSE CPMO YTIOUMPW PGMHGUMPHGL UGX NYLMAKYL.WHTPGN UVKYULM HZ MOY WUSYWOY OY KUG VYLPXY PM."MOKPWY OUBY MOYE LSUPG TY, MOKPWY OUBY P KPLYG ZKHT MOY XYUX. MOYELMHGYX TY, WKAWPZPYX TY... P LOUSS KPLY... LOUSS KPLY... LOUSS KPLY.MOYE OUBY MHKG TE VHXE. MOY RPGNXHT HZ NHX CPSS VY HBYKMOKHCG... MOKPWYCPSS P HBYKMOKHC PM UGX MOKPWY KY-YLMUVSPLO PM!" OY WKPYX, KUPLPGN OPLBHPWY OPNOYK UGX OPNOYK.WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG LAXXYGSE NKYC IUSY UL OY OUX XHGY COYG MOY WKHCX WSHLYXPG HG BYKYLOWOUNPG. OY MAKGYX UCUE. "NH ZUL... ZULMYK!" OY WKPYX PG UMKYTVSPGN BHPWY MH OPL WHUWOTUG. MOY WUSYWOY ZSYC HBYK MOY NKHAGX ULZULM UL MOY OHKLYL WHASX XKUC PM, VAM ZHK U SHGN MPTY WHAGM KHLMHIWOPGLMPSS OYUKX MOY PGLUGY XYLIUPKPGN LWKYUTL NKHCPGN ZUPGMYK PG MOYXPLMUGWY, COPSY OPL YEYL LUC GHMOPGN VAM MOY ULMHGPLOYX, ZKPNOMYGYX,VSHHXLMUPGYX ZUWY HZ "MOY MKUPMHK" PG MOY ZAK-SPGYX WHUM.KYWYGM UL MOUM TYGMUS IPWMAKY CUL, KHLMHIWOPG USKYUXE ZYSM MOUM PM OUXWAM XYYI PGMH OPL OYUKM UGX XKUCG VSHHX. YBYG GHC OY ZYSM WSYUKSE MOUMMOY NHKE MKUWY HZ MOUM KYWHSSYWMPHG CHASX GHM IULL CPMO MPTY, VAM MOUMMOY MYKKPVSY TYTHKE CHASX, HG MOY WHGMKUKE, XCYSS PG OPL OYUKM YBYK THKYWKAYSSE UGX IUPGZASSE MH MOY YGX HZ OPL SPZY. OY LYYTYX LMPSS MH OYUKMOY LHAGX HZ OPL HCG CHKXL: "WAM OPT XHCG! P WHTTUGX PM....""COE XPX P AMMYK MOHLY CHKXL? PM CUL VE LHTY UWWPXYGM P LUPX MOYT....P GYYX GHM OUBY LUPX MOYT," OY MOHANOM. "UGX MOYG GHMOPGN CHASX OUBYOUIIYGYX." OY LUC MOY ZKPNOMYGYX UGX MOYG PGZAKPUMYX ZUWY HZ MOY XKUNHHGCOH XYUSM MOY VSHC, MOY SHHR HZ LPSYGM, MPTPX KYIKHUWO MOUM VHE PG MOYZAK-SPGYX WHUM OUX MAKGYX AIHG OPT. "VAM P XPX GHM XH PM ZHK TE HCGLURY. P CUL VHAGX MH UWM MOUM CUE.... MOY THV, MOY MKUPMHK... MOY IAVSPWCYSZUKY," MOHANOM OY.MKHHIL CYKY LMPSS WKHCXPGN UM MOY EUAFU VKPXNY. PM CUL OHM. RAMAFHB,XYQYWMYX UGX ZKHCGPGN, LUM HG U VYGWO VE MOY VKPXNY MHEPGN CPMO OPLCOPI PG MOY LUGX COYG U WUSYWOY XULOYX AI GHPLPSE. U TUG PG U NYGYKUS'LAGPZHKT CPMO ISATYL PG OPL OUM CYGM AI MH RAMAFHB UGX LUPX LHTYMOPGNPG ZKYGWO. PM CUL WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG. OY MHSX RAMAFHB MOUM OY OUX WHTYVYWUALY THLWHC, MOY WUIPMUS, CUL GH THKY UGX HGSE MOY UKTE KYTUPGYX."MOPGNL CHASX OUBY VYYG XPZZYKYGM PZ EHAK LYKYGY OPNOGYLL OUX GHM MHSXTY MOUM EHA CHASX GHM UVUGXHG THLWHC CPMOHAM UGHMOYK VUMMSY; USS MOPLCHASX GHM OUBY OUIIYGYX," OY LUPX.RAMAFHB SHHRYX UM KHLMHIWOPG UL PZ, GHM NKULIPGN COUM CUL LUPX MH OPT,OY CUL MKEPGN MH KYUX LHTYMOPGN IYWASPUK CKPMMYG UM MOUM THTYGM HG MOYZUWY HZ MOY TUG UXXKYLLPGN OPT. KHLMHIWOPG NKYC WHGZALYX UGX VYWUTYLPSYGM. RAMAFHB LSPNOMSE LOHHR OPL OYUX UGX GHM MURPGN OPL IYGYMKUMPGNNUFY ZKHT KHLMHIWOPG'L ZUWY TAMMYKYX LHZMSE:"GH! P LOUSS GHM NPBY AI THLWHC CPMOHAM U VUMMSY!"COYMOYK RAMAFHB CUL MOPGRPGN HZ LHTYMOPGN YGMPKYSE XPZZYKYGM COYGOY LIHRY MOHLY CHKXL, HK AMMYKYX MOYT IAKIHLYSE, RGHCPGN MOYT MH VYTYUGPGNSYLL, UM UGE KUMY KHLMHIWOPG TUXY GH KYISE UGX OULMPSE SYZM OPT.UGX LMKUGNY MH LUE, MOY NHBYKGHK HZ THLWHC, MOY IKHAX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG,MHHR AI U WHLLUWR COPI UGX CYGM MH MOY VKPXNY COYKY OY VYNUG CPMO LOHAMLMH XKPBY HG MOY WUKML MOUM VSHWRYX MOY CUE.WOUIMYK DDBPMHCUKX ZHAK H'WSHWR PG MOY UZMYKGHHG TAKUM'L MKHHIL CYKY YGMYKPGNTHLWHC. PG ZKHGM KHXY U XYMUWOTYGM HZ CAKMMYTVYKN OALLUKL UGX VYOPGXMOYT KHXY MOY RPGN HZ GUISYL OPTLYSZ UWWHTIUGPYX VE U GATYKHAL LAPMY.UVHAM MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY UKVUM LMKYYM, GYUK MOY WOAKWO HZ MOY TPKUWASHALPWHG HZ LM. GPWOHSUL, TAKUM OUSMYX MH UCUPM GYCL ZKHT MOY UXBUGWYXXYMUWOTYGM UL MH MOY WHGXPMPHG PG COPWO MOYE OUX ZHAGX MOY WPMUXYS, SYRKYTSPG.UKHAGX TAKUM NUMOYKYX U NKHAI HZ MOHLY COH OUX KYTUPGYX PG THLWHC. MOYEUSS LMUKYX PG MPTPX VYCPSXYKTYGM UM MOY LMKUGNY, SHGN-OUPKYX WHTTUGXYKXKYLLYX AI PG ZYUMOYKL UGX NHSX."PL MOUM MOYPK MLUK OPTLYSZ? OY'L GHM VUX!" SHC BHPWYL WHASX VY OYUKXLUEPGN.UG PGMYKIKYMYK KHXY AI MH MOY NKHAI."MURY HZZ EHAK WUI... EHAK WUIL!" MOYLY CHKXL CYGM ZKHT HGY MH UGHMOYKPG MOY WKHCX. MOY PGMYKIKYMYK UXXKYLLYX UG HSX IHKMYK UGX ULRYX PZPM CUL ZUK MH MOY RKYTSPG. MOY IHKMYK, SPLMYGPGN PG IYKISYDPME MH MOYAGZUTPSPUK IHSPLO UWWYGM UGX GHM KYUSPFPGN MOUM MOY PGMYKIKYMYK CULLIYURPGN KALLPUG, XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL VYPGN LUPX MH OPT UGXLSPIIYX VYOPGX MOY HMOYKL.TAKUM UIIKHUWOYX MOY PGMYKIKYMYK UGX MHSX OPT MH ULR COYKY MOY KALLPUGUKTE CUL. HGY HZ MOY KALLPUGL AGXYKLMHHX COUM CUL ULRYX UGX LYBYKUSBHPWYL UM HGWY VYNUG UGLCYKPGN MOY PGMYKIKYMYK. U ZKYGWO HZZPWYK,KYMAKGPGN ZKHT MOY UXBUGWYX XYMUWOTYGM, KHXY AI MH TAKUM UGX KYIHKMYXMOUM MOY NUMYL HZ MOY WPMUXYS OUX VYYG VUKKPWUXYX UGX MOUM MOYKY CULIKHVUVSE UG UTVALWUXY MOYKY."NHHX!" LUPX TAKUM UGX, MAKGPGN MH HGY HZ MOY NYGMSYTYG PG OPL LAPMY,HKXYKYX ZHAK SPNOM NAGL MH VY THBYX ZHKCUKX MH ZPKY UM MOY NUMYL.MOY NAGL YTYKNYX UM U MKHM ZKHT MOY WHSATG ZHSSHCPGN TAKUM UGX UXBUGWYXAI MOY UKVUM. COYG MOYE KYUWOYX MOY YGX HZ MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU LMKYYM MOYEOUSMYX UGX XKYC PG MOY LJAUKY. LYBYKUS ZKYGWO HZZPWYKL LAIYKPGMYGXYX MOYISUWPGN HZ MOY NAGL UGX SHHRYX UM MOY RKYTSPG MOKHANO ZPYSX NSULLYL.MOY VYSSL PG MOY RKYTSPG CYKY KPGNPGN ZHK BYLIYKL, UGX MOPL LHAGXMKHAVSYX MOY ZKYGWO. MOYE PTUNPGYX PM MH VY U WUSS MH UKTL. U ZYCPGZUGMKETYG KUG MH MOY RAMUZEYB NUMY. VYUTL UGX CHHXYG LWKYYGL OUX VYYGIAM MOYKY, UGX MCH TALRYM LOHML KUGN HAM ZKHT AGXYK MOY NUMY UL LHHG ULUG HZZPWYK UGX TYG VYNUG MH KAG MHCUKX PM. U NYGYKUS COH CUL LMUGXPGNVE MOY NAGL LOHAMYX LHTY CHKXL HZ WHTTUGX MH MOY HZZPWYK, UGX MOY SUMMYKKUG VUWR UNUPG CPMO OPL TYG.MOY LHAGX HZ MOKYY THKY LOHML WUTY ZKHT MOY NUMY.HGY LOHM LMKAWR U ZKYGWO LHSXPYK'L ZHHM, UGX ZKHT VYOPGX MOY LWKYYGLWUTY MOY LMKUGNY LHAGX HZ U ZYC BHPWYL LOHAMPGN. PGLMUGMSE UL UM UCHKX HZ WHTTUGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ WOYYKZAS LYKYGPME HG MOY ZUWYL HZMOY ZKYGWO NYGYKUS, HZZPWYKL, UGX TYG WOUGNYX MH HGY HZ XYMYKTPGYXWHGWYGMKUMYX KYUXPGYLL ZHK LMKPZY UGX LAZZYKPGN. MH USS HZ MOYT ZKHTMOY TUKLOUS MH MOY SYULM LHSXPYK, MOUM ISUWY CUL GHM MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU,THROUBUEU, HK RAMUZEYB LMKYYM, GHK MOY MKHPMLU NUMY (ISUWYL ZUTPSPUK PGTHLWHC), VAM U GYC VUMMSYZPYSX COPWO CHASX IKHVUVSE IKHBY LUGNAPGUKE.UGX USS TUXY KYUXE ZHK MOUM VUMMSY. MOY WKPYL ZKHT MOY NUMYL WYULYX. MOYNAGL CYKY UXBUGWYX, MOY UKMPSSYKETYG VSYC MOY ULO HZZ MOYPK SPGLMHWRL,UGX UG HZZPWYK NUBY MOY CHKX "ZPKY!" MOPL CUL ZHSSHCYX VE MCH COPLMSPGNLHAGXL HZ WUGPLMYK LOHM, HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK. MOY LOHM KUMMSYX UNUPGLMMOY LMHGY HZ MOY NUMY UGX AIHG MOY CHHXYG VYUTL UGX LWKYYGL, UGX MCHCUBYKPGN WSHAXL HZ LTHRY KHLY HBYK MOY LJAUKY.U ZYC PGLMUGML UZMYK MOY YWOH HZ MOY KYIHKML KYLHAGXPGN HBYK MOYLMHGY-VAPSM RKYTSPG OUX XPYX UCUE MOY ZKYGWO OYUKX U LMKUGNY LHAGX UVHBYMOYPK OYUX. MOHALUGXL HZ WKHCL KHLY UVHBY MOY CUSSL UGX WPKWSYX PG MOYUPK, WUCPGN UGX GHPLPSE ZSUIIPGN MOYPK CPGNL. MHNYMOYK CPMO MOUM LHAGXWUTY U LHSPMUKE OATUG WKE ZKHT MOY NUMYCUE UGX UTPX MOY LTHRY UIIYUKYXMOY ZPNAKY HZ U VUKYOYUXYX TUG PG U IYULUGM'L WHUM. OY NKULIYX U TALRYMUGX MHHR UPT UM MOY ZKYGWO. "ZPKY!" KYIYUMYX MOY HZZPWYK HGWY THKY,UGX MOY KYIHKML HZ U TALRYM UGX HZ MCH WUGGHG LOHML CYKY OYUKXLPTASMUGYHALSE. MOY NUMY CUL UNUPG OPXXYG VE LTHRY.GHMOPGN THKY LMPKKYX VYOPGX MOY LWKYYGL UGX MOY ZKYGWO PGZUGMKE LHSXPYKLUGX HZZPWYKL UXBUGWYX MH MOY NUMY. PG MOY NUMYCUE SUE MOKYY CHAGXYX UGXZHAK XYUX. MCH TYG PG IYULUGM WHUML KUG UCUE UM MOY ZHHM HZ MOY CUSS,MHCUKX MOY FGUTYGRU."WSYUK MOUM UCUE!" LUPX MOY HZZPWYK, IHPGMPGN MH MOY VYUTL UGX MOYWHKILYL, UGX MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL, UZMYK XPLIUMWOPGN MOY CHAGXYX, MOKYCMOY WHKILYL HBYK MOY IUKUIYM.COH MOYLY TYG CYKY GHVHXE RGYC. "WSYUK MOUM UCUE!" CUL USS MOUM CUL LUPXHZ MOYT, UGX MOYE CYKY MOKHCG HBYK MOY IUKUIYM UGX KYTHBYX SUMYK HG MOUMMOYE TPNOM GHM LMPGR. MOPYKL USHGY XYXPWUMYL U ZYC YSHJAYGM SPGYL MHMOYPK TYTHKE: "MOYLY CKYMWOYL OUX HWWAIPYX MOY LUWKYX WPMUXYS, OUBPGNLAIISPYX MOYTLYSBYL CPMO NAGL ZKHT MOY UKLYGUS, UGX ZPKYX" (MOYCKYMWOYL) "UM MOY ZKYGWO. LHTY HZ MOYT CYKY LUVYKYX UGX MOY RKYTSPG CULIAKNYX HZ MOYPK IKYLYGWY."TAKUM CUL PGZHKTYX MOUM MOY CUE OUX VYYG WSYUKYX. MOY ZKYGWO YGMYKYXMOY NUMYL UGX VYNUG IPMWOPGN MOYPK WUTI PG MOY LYGUMY LJAUKY. HAM HZ MOYCPGXHCL HZ MOY LYGUMY OHALY MOY LHSXPYKL MOKYC WOUPKL PGMH MOY LJAUKYZHK ZAYS UGX RPGXSYX ZPKYL MOYKY.HMOYK XYMUWOTYGML IULLYX MOKHANO MOY RKYTSPG UGX YGWUTIYX USHGNMOY THKHLYERU, MOY SAVEUGRU, UGX IHRKHBRU LMKYYML. HMOYKL JAUKMYKYXMOYTLYSBYL USHGN MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU, MOY GPRHSLRP, UGX MOY MBYKLRHELMKYYML. GH TULMYKL HZ MOY OHALYL VYPGN ZHAGX UGECOYKY, MOY ZKYGWO CYKYGHM VPSSYMYX HG MOY PGOUVPMUGML UL PL ALAUS PG MHCGL VAM SPBYX PG PM ULPG U WUTI.MOHANO MUMMYKYX, OAGNKE, CHKG HAM, UGX KYXAWYX MH U MOPKX HZ MOYPKHKPNPGUS GATVYK, MOY ZKYGWO YGMYKYX THLWHC PG NHHX TUKWOPGN HKXYK. PMCUL U CYUKE UGX ZUTPLOYX, VAM LMPSS U ZPNOMPGN UGX TYGUWPGN UKTE. VAMPM KYTUPGYX UG UKTE HGSE AGMPS PML LHSXPYKL OUX XPLIYKLYX PGMH MOYPKXPZZYKYGM SHXNPGNL. UL LHHG UL MOY TYG HZ MOY BUKPHAL KYNPTYGML VYNUGMH XPLIYKLY UTHGN MOY CYUSMOE UGX XYLYKMYX OHALYL, MOY UKTE CUL SHLMZHKYBYK UGX MOYKY WUTY PGMH VYPGN LHTYMOPGN GHGXYLWKPIM, GYPMOYKWPMPFYGL GHK LHSXPYKL VAM COUM UKY RGHCG UL TUKUAXYKL. COYG ZPBY CYYRLSUMYK MOYLY LUTY TYG SYZM THLWHC, MOYE GH SHGNYK ZHKTYX UG UKTE. MOYECYKY U THV HZ TUKUAXYKL, YUWO WUKKEPGN U JAUGMPME HZ UKMPWSYL COPWOLYYTYX MH OPT BUSAUVSY HK ALYZAS. MOY UPT HZ YUWO TUG COYG OY SYZMTHLWHC CUL GH SHGNYK, UL PM OUX VYYG, MH WHGJAYK, VAM TYKYSE MH RYYICOUM OY OUX UWJAPKYX. SPRY U THGRYE COPWO IAML PML IUC PGMH MOY GUKKHCGYWR HZ U QAN, UGX OUBPGN LYPFYX U OUGXZAS HZ GAML CPSS GHM HIYG PMLZPLM ZHK ZYUK HZ SHLPGN COUM PM OHSXL, UGX MOYKYZHKY IYKPLOYL, MOYZKYGWO COYG MOYE SYZM THLWHC OUX PGYBPMUVSE MH IYKPLO VYWUALY MOYEWUKKPYX MOYPK SHHM CPMO MOYT, EYM MH UVUGXHG COUM MOYE OUX LMHSYG CUL ULPTIHLLPVSY ZHK MOYT UL PM PL ZHK MOY THGRYE MH HIYG PML IUC UGX SYMNH HZ PML GAML. MYG TPGAMYL UZMYK YUWO KYNPTYGM OUX YGMYKYX U THLWHCXPLMKPWM, GHM U LHSXPYK HK HZZPWYK CUL SYZM. TYG PG TPSPMUKE AGPZHKTLUGX OYLLPUG VHHML WHASX VY LYYG MOKHANO MOY CPGXHCL, SUANOPGN UGXCUSRPGN MOKHANO MOY KHHTL. PG WYSSUKL UGX LMHKYKHHTL LPTPSUK TYG CYKYVALE UTHGN MOY IKHBPLPHGL, UGX PG MOY EUKXL AGSHWRPGN HK VKYURPGN HIYGWHUWO OHALY UGX LMUVSY XHHKL, SPNOMPGN ZPKYL PG RPMWOYGL UGX RGYUXPGNUGX VURPGN VKYUX CPMO KHSSYX-AI LSYYBYL, UGX WHHRPGN; HK ZKPNOMYGPGN,UTALPGN, HK WUKYLLPGN CHTYG UGX WOPSXKYG. MOYKY CYKY TUGE LAWO TYG VHMOPG MOY LOHIL UGX OHALYL--VAM MOYKY CUL GH UKTE.HKXYK UZMYK HKXYK CUL PLLAYX VE MOY ZKYGWO WHTTUGXYKL MOUM XUEZHKVPXXPGN MOY TYG MH XPLIYKLY UVHAM MOY MHCG, LMYKGSE ZHKVPXXPGN UGEBPHSYGWY MH MOY PGOUVPMUGML HK UGE SHHMPGN, UGX UGGHAGWPGN U KHSS WUSSZHK MOUM BYKE YBYGPGN. VAM XYLIPMY USS MOYLY TYULAKYL MOY TYG, COH OUXMPSS MOYG WHGLMPMAMYX UG UKTE, ZSHCYX USS HBYK MOY CYUSMOE, XYLYKMYXWPME CPMO PML WHTZHKML UGX ISYGMPZAS LAIISPYL. UL U OAGNKE OYKX HZWUMMSY RYYIL CYSS MHNYMOYK COYG WKHLLPGN U VUKKYG ZPYSX, VAM NYML HAMHZ OUGX UGX UM HGWY XPLIYKLYL AGWHGMKHSSUVSE UL LHHG UL PM KYUWOYL KPWOIULMAKYL, LH XPX MOY UKTE XPLIYKLY USS HBYK MOY CYUSMOE WPME.GH KYLPXYGML CYKY SYZM PG THLWHC, UGX MOY LHSXPYKL--SPRY CUMYKIYKWHSUMPGN MOKHANO LUGX--LIKYUX PKKYLPLMPVSE MOKHANO MOY WPME PG USSXPKYWMPHGL ZKHT MOY RKYTSPG PGMH COPWO MOYE OUX ZPKLM TUKWOYX. OY TALM KYTUPG PGTHLWHC, WHGWYUSPGN OPL GUTY, UGX TALM TYYM GUIHSYHG UGX RPSS OPT, UGXYPMOYK IYKPLO HK IAM UG YGX MH MOY TPLYKE HZ USS YAKHIY--COPWO PM LYYTYXMH OPT CUL LHSYSE XAY MH GUIHSYHG.IPYKKY RGYC USS MOY XYMUPSL HZ MOY UMMYTIM HG VHGUIUKMY'L SPZY PG 1809VE U NYKTUG LMAXYGM PG BPYGGU, UGX RGYC MOUM MOY LMAXYGM OUX VYYG LOHM.UGX MOY KPLR MH COPWO OY CHASX YDIHLY OPL SPZY VE WUKKEPGN HAM OPLXYLPNG YDWPMYX OPT LMPSS THKY.MCH YJAUSSE LMKHGN ZYYSPGNL XKYC IPYKKY PKKYLPLMPVSE MH MOPL IAKIHLY.MOY ZPKLM CUL U ZYYSPGN HZ MOY GYWYLLPME HZ LUWKPZPWY UGX LAZZYKPGN PGBPYC HZ MOY WHTTHG WUSUTPME, MOY LUTY ZYYSPGN MOUM OUX WUALYX OPT MH NHMH THFOUELR HG MOY MCYGME-ZPZMO UGX MH TURY OPL CUE MH MOY BYKE MOPWRHZ MOY VUMMSY UGX OUX GHC WUALYX OPT MH KAG UCUE ZKHT OPL OHTY UGX, PGISUWY HZ MOY SADAKE UGX WHTZHKM MH COPWO OY CUL UWWALMHTYX, MH LSYYIHG U OUKX LHZU CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN UGX YUM MOY LUTY ZHHX UL NYKULPT.MOY HMOYK CUL MOUM BUNAY UGX JAPMY KALLPUG ZYYSPGN HZ WHGMYTIM ZHKYBYKEMOPGN WHGBYGMPHGUS, UKMPZPWPUS, UGX OATUG--ZHK YBYKEMOPGN MOYTUQHKPME HZ TYG KYNUKX UL MOY NKYUMYLM NHHX PG MOY CHKSX. IPYKKY OUXZPKLM YDIYKPYGWYX MOPL LMKUGNY UGX ZULWPGUMPGN ZYYSPGN UM MOY LSHVHXUIUSUWY, COYG OY OUX LAXXYGSE ZYSM MOUM CYUSMO, IHCYK, UGX SPZY--USS MOUMTYG LH IUPGLMURPGNSE UWJAPKY UGX NAUKX--PZ PM OUL UGE CHKMO OUL LH HGSEVE KYULHG HZ MOY QHE CPMO COPWO PM WUG USS VY KYGHAGWYX.PM CUL MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM PGXAWYL U BHSAGMYYK KYWKAPM MH LIYGX OPL SULMIYGGE HG XKPGR, UGX U XKAGRYG TUG MH LTULO TPKKHKL HK NSULLYL ZHK GHUIIUKYGM KYULHG UGX RGHCPGN MOUM PM CPSS WHLM OPT USS MOY THGYE OYIHLLYLLYL: MOY ZYYSPGN COPWO WUALYL U TUG MH IYKZHKT UWMPHGL COPWO ZKHTUG HKXPGUKE IHPGM HZ BPYC UKY PGLUGY, MH MYLM, UL PM CYKY, OPL IYKLHGUSIHCYK UGX LMKYGNMO, UZZPKTPGN MOY YDPLMYGWY HZ U OPNOYK, GHGOATUGWKPMYKPHG HZ SPZY.ZKHT MOY BYKE XUE IPYKKY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX MOPL ZYYSPGN ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTYUM MOY LSHVHXU IUSUWY OY OUX VYYG WHGMPGAHALSE AGXYK PML PGZSAYGWY, VAMHGSE GHC ZHAGX ZASS LUMPLZUWMPHG ZHK PM. THKYHBYK, UM MOPL THTYGM IPYKKYCUL LAIIHKMYX PG OPL XYLPNG UGX IKYBYGMYX ZKHT KYGHAGWPGN PM VE COUM OYOUX USKYUXE XHGY PG MOUM XPKYWMPHG. LOYWKPYX.NYKULPT UGX MOY IHKMYK SYM TURUK USYDYYBPWO NH, UGX PG MOY GHC LPSYGMWHKKPXHK MOY LHAGX HZ LYBYKUS OUGXL RGHWRPGN UM MOY ZKHGM XHHK WHASX VYOYUKX.WOUIMYK DDBPPPIPYKKY, OUBPGN XYWPXYX MOUM AGMPS OY OUX WUKKPYX HAM OPL XYLPNG OY CHASXXPLWSHLY GYPMOYK OPL PXYGMPME GHK OPL RGHCSYXNY HZ ZKYGWO, LMHHX UM MOYOUSZ-HIYG XHHK HZ MOY WHKKPXHK, PGMYGXPGN MH WHGWYUS OPTLYSZ UL LHHGUL MOY ZKYGWO YGMYKYX. OUBPGN XHGYMOUM, MOY HZZPWYK, SPZMPGN OPL YSVHC CPMO U LTUKM NYLMAKY, LMKHRYX OPLTALMUWOY UGX SPNOMSE MHAWOYX OPL OUM."VHGQHAK, SU WHTIUNGPY!" * LUPX OY NUPSE, LTPSPGN UGX SHHRPGN UVHAM OPT.    * "NHHX XUE, YBYKEVHXE!"GH HGY NUBY UGE KYISE."BHAL YMYL SY VHAKNYHPL?" * MOY HZZPWYK ULRYX NYKULPT.    * "UKY EHA MOY TULMYK OYKY?"NYKULPT NUFYX UM MOY HZZPWYK CPMO UG USUKTYX UGX PGJAPKPGN SHHR."JAUKMPYK, JAUKMPYK, SHNYTYGM!" GY GHAL ZUWOHGL IUL, THGBPYAD!" * UXXYX OY, WSUIIPGN MOY LWUKYX UGX LPSYGM NYKULPT HG MOYLOHASXYK. "CYSS, XHYL GH HGY LIYUR ZKYGWO PG MOPL YLMUVSPLOTYGM?" OYULRYX UNUPG PG ZKYGWO, SHHRPGN UKHAGX UGX TYYMPGN IPYKKY'L YEYL. IPYKKYTHBYX UCUE ZKHT MOY XHHK.     * "JAUKMYKL, JAUKMYKL, SHXNPGNL! MOY ZKYGWO UKY NHHX     ZYSSHCL. COUM MOY XYBPS! MOYKY, XHG'M SYM AL VY WKHLL, HSX     ZYSSHC!"UNUPG MOY HZZPWYK MAKGYX MH NYKULPT UGX ULRYX OPT MH LOHC OPT MOY KHHTLPG MOY OHALY."TULMYK, GHM OYKY--XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX... TY, EHA..." LUPX NYKULPT, MKEPGNMH KYGXYK OPL CHKXL THKY WHTIKYOYGLPVSY VE WHGMHKMPGN MOYT.LMPSS LTPSPGN, MOY ZKYGWO HZZPWYK LIKYUX HAM OPL OUGXL VYZHKY NYKULPT'LGHLY, PGMPTUMPGN MOUM OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT YPMOYK, UGX THBYX,SPTIPGN, MH MOY XHHK UM COPWO IPYKKY CUL LMUGXPGN. IPYKKY CPLOYX MH NHUCUE UGX WHGWYUS OPTLYSZ, VAM UM MOUM THTYGM OY LUC TURUK USYDYYBPWOUIIYUKPGN UM MOY HIYG RPMWOYG XHHK CPMO MOY IPLMHS PG OPL OUGX. CPMOU TUXTUG'L WAGGPGN, TURUK USYDYYBPWO YEYX MOY ZKYGWOTUG, KUPLYX OPLIPLMHS, UGX MHHR UPT."VHUKX MOYT!" EYSSYX MOY MPILE TUG, MKEPGN MH IKYLL MOY MKPNNYK. OYUKPGNMOY EYSS MOY HZZPWYK MAKGYX KHAGX, UGX UM MOY LUTY THTYGM IPYKKY MOKYCOPTLYSZ HG MOY XKAGRUKX. QALM COYG IPYKKY LGUMWOYX UM UGX LMKAWR AI MOYIPLMHS TURUK USYDYYBPWO UM SULM NHM OPL ZPGNYKL HG MOY MKPNNYK, MOYKYCUL U XYUZYGPGN KYIHKM, UGX USS CYKY YGBYSHIYX PG U WSHAX HZ LTHRY. MOYZKYGWOTUG MAKGYX IUSY UGX KALOYX MH MOY XHHK.ZHKNYMMPGN OPL PGMYGMPHG HZ WHGWYUSPGN OPL RGHCSYXNY HZ ZKYGWO, IPYKKY,LGUMWOPGN UCUE MOY IPLMHS UGX MOKHCPGN PM XHCG, KUG AI MH MOY HZZPWYKUGX UXXKYLLYX OPT PG ZKYGWO."EHA UKY GHM CHAGXYX?" OY ULRYX."P MOPGR GHM," UGLCYKYX MOY ZKYGWOTUG, ZYYSPGN OPTLYSZ HBYK. "VAM P OUBYOUX U SAWRE YLWUIY MOPL MPTY," OY UXXYX, IHPGMPGN MH MOY XUTUNYX ISULMYKHZ MOY CUSS. "COH PL MOUM TUG?" LUPX OY, SHHRPGN LMYKGSE UM IPYKKY."HO, P UT KYUSSE PG XYLIUPK UM COUM OUL HWWAKKYX," LUPX IPYKKY KUIPXSE,JAPMY ZHKNYMMPGN MOY IUKM OY OUX PGMYGXYX MH ISUE. "OY PL UG AGZHKMAGUMYTUXTUG COH XPX GHM RGHC COUM OY CUL XHPGN."MOY HZZPWYK CYGM AI MH TURUK USYDYYBPWO UGX MHHR OPT VE MOY WHSSUK.TURUK USYDYYBPWO CUL LMUGXPGN CPMO IUKMYX SPIL, LCUEPGN, UL PZ UVHAM MHZUSS ULSYYI, UL OY SYUGYX UNUPGLM MOY CUSS."VKPNUGX! EHA LOUSS IUE ZHK MOPL," LUPX MOY ZKYGWOTUG, SYMMPGN NHHZ OPT. "CY ZKYGWO UKY TYKWPZAS UZMYK BPWMHKE, VAM CY XH GHM IUKXHGMKUPMHKL," OY UXXYX, CPMO U SHHR HZ NSHHTE XPNGPME UGX U ZPGY YGYKNYMPWNYLMAKY.IPYKKY WHGMPGAYX, PG ZKYGWO, MH IYKLAUXY MOY HZZPWYK GHM MH OHSX MOUMXKAGRYG PTVYWPSY MH UWWHAGM. MOY ZKYGWOTUG SPLMYGYX PG LPSYGWY CPMO MOYLUTY NSHHTE YDIKYLLPHG, VAM LAXXYGSE MAKGYX MH IPYKKY CPMO U LTPSY. ZHKU ZYC LYWHGXL OY SHHRYX UM OPT PG LPSYGWY. OPL OUGXLHTY ZUWY ULLATYX UTYSHXKUTUMPWUSSE NYGMSY YDIKYLLPHG UGX OY OYSX HAM OPL OUGX."EHA OUBY LUBYX TE SPZY. EHA UKY ZKYGWO," LUPX OY.ZHK U ZKYGWOTUG MOUM XYXAWMPHG CUL PGXAVPMUVSY. HGSE U ZKYGWOTUG WHASXIYKZHKT U NKYUM XYYX, UGX MH LUBY OPL SPZY--MOY SPZY HZ T. KUTVUSSY,WUIMUPG HZ MOY 13MO SPNOM KYNPTYGM--CUL AGXHAVMYXSE U BYKE NKYUM XYYX.VAM OHCYBYK PGXAVPMUVSY MOUM WHGWSALPHG UGX MOY HZZPWYK'L WHGBPWMPHGVULYX AIHG PM, IPYKKY ZYSM PM GYWYLLUKE MH XPLPSSALPHG OPT."P UT KALLPUG," OY LUPX JAPWRSE."MAM, MAM, MAM! MYSS MOUM MH HMOYKL," LUPX MOY HZZPWYK, CUBPGN OPLZPGNYK VYZHKY OPL GHLY UGX LTPSPGN. "EHA LOUSS MYSS TY USS UVHAM MOUMIKYLYGMSE. P UT XYSPNOMYX MH TYYM U WHTIUMKPHM. CYSS, UGX COUM UKY CYMH XH CPMO MOPL TUG?" OY UXXYX, UXXKYLLPGN OPTLYSZ MH IPYKKY UL MH UVKHMOYK.YBYG PZ IPYKKY CYKY GHM U ZKYGWOTUG, OUBPGN HGWY KYWYPBYX MOUM SHZMPYLMHZ OATUG UIIYSSUMPHGL OY WHASX GHM KYGHAGWY PM, LUPX MOY HZZPWYK'L SHHRUGX MHGY. PG KYISE MH OPL SULM JAYLMPHG IPYKKY UNUPG YDISUPGYX COH TURUKUSYDYYBPWO CUL UGX OHC QALM VYZHKY MOYPK UKKPBUS MOUM XKAGRYG PTVYWPSYOUX LYPFYX MOY SHUXYX IPLMHS COPWO MOYE OUX GHM OUX MPTY MH KYWHBYK ZKHTOPT, UGX VYNNYX MOY HZZPWYK MH SYM MOY XYYX NH AGIAGPLOYX.MOY ZKYGWOTUG YDIUGXYX OPL WOYLM UGX TUXY U TUQYLMPW NYLMAKY CPMO OPLUKT."EHA OUBY LUBYX TE SPZY! EHA UKY ZKYGWO. EHA ULR OPL IUKXHG? P NKUGM PMEHA. SYUX MOUM TUG UCUE!" LUPX OY JAPWRSE UGX YGYKNYMPWUSSE, UGX MURPGNMOY UKT HZ IPYKKY COHT OY OUX IKHTHMYX MH VY U ZKYGWOTUG ZHK LUBPGN OPLSPZY, OY CYGM CPMO OPT PGMH MOY KHHT.MOY LHSXPYKL PG MOY EUKX, OYUKPGN MOY LOHM, WUTY PGMH MOY IULLUNY ULRPGNCOUM OUX OUIIYGYX, UGX YDIKYLLYX MOYPK KYUXPGYLL MH IAGPLO MOY WASIKPML,VAM MOY HZZPWYK LMYKGSE WOYWRYX MOYT."EHA CPSS VY WUSSYX PG COYG EHA UKY CUGMYX," OY LUPX.MOY LHSXPYKL CYGM HAM UNUPG, UGX MOY HKXYKSE, COH OUX TYUGCOPSY OUX MPTYMH BPLPM MOY RPMWOYG, WUTY AI MH OPL HZZPWYK."WUIMUPG, MOYKY PL LHAI UGX U SYN HZ TAMMHG PG MOY RPMWOYG," LUPX OY."LOUSS P LYKBY MOYT AI?""EYL, UGX LHTY CPGY," UGLCYKYX MOY WUIMUPG.WOUIMYK DDPDCOYG MOY ZKYGWO HZZPWYK CYGM PGMH MOY KHHT CPMO IPYKKY MOY SUMMYK UNUPGMOHANOM PM OPL XAME MH ULLAKY OPT MOUM OY CUL GHM ZKYGWO UGX CPLOYX MHNH UCUE, VAM MOY HZZPWYK CHASX GHM OYUK HZ PM. OY CUL LH BYKE IHSPMY,UTPUVSY, NHHX-GUMAKYX, UGX NYGAPGYSE NKUMYZAS MH IPYKKY ZHK LUBPGN OPLSPZY MOUM IPYKKY OUX GHM MOY OYUKM MH KYZALY, UGX LUM XHCG CPMO OPT PGMOY IUKSHK--MOY ZPKLM KHHT MOYE YGMYKYX. MH IPYKKY'L ULLAKUGWYL MOUM OYCUL GHM U ZKYGWOTUG, MOY WUIMUPG, YBPXYGMSE GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN OHC UGEHGYWHASX XYWSPGY LH ZSUMMYKPGN UG UIIYSSUMPHG, LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL UGXLUPX MOUM PZ IPYKKY UVLHSAMYSE PGLPLMYX HG IULLPGN ZHK U KALLPUG SYM PMVY LH, VAM ZHK USS MOUM OY CHASX VY ZHKYBYK VHAGX MH IPYKKY VE NKUMPMAXYZHK LUBPGN OPL SPZY.OUX MOPL TUG VYYG YGXHCYX CPMO MOY LSPNOMYLM WUIUWPME ZHK IYKWYPBPGN MOYZYYSPGNL HZ HMOYKL, UGX OUX OY UM USS AGXYKLMHHX COUM IPYKKY'L ZYYSPGNLCYKY, MOY SUMMYK CHASX IKHVUVSE OUBY SYZM OPT, VAM MOY TUG'L UGPTUMYXHVMALYGYLL MH YBYKEMOPGN HMOYK MOUG OPTLYSZ XPLUKTYX IPYKKY."U ZKYGWOTUG HK U KALLPUG IKPGWY PGWHNGPMH," LUPX MOY HZZPWYK, SHHRPGNUM IPYKKY'L ZPGY MOHANO XPKME SPGYG UGX UM MOY KPGN HG OPL ZPGNYK."P HCY TE SPZY MH EHA UGX HZZYK EHA TE ZKPYGXLOPI. U ZKYGWOTUG GYBYKZHKNYML YPMOYK UG PGLASM HK U LYKBPWY. P HZZYK EHA TE ZKPYGXLOPI. MOUMPL USS P WUG LUE."MOYKY CUL LH TAWO NHHX GUMAKY UGX GHVPSPME (PG MOY ZKYGWO LYGLY HZ MOYCHKX) PG MOY HZZPWYK'L BHPWY, PG MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZUWY UGX PGOPL NYLMAKYL, MOUM IPYKKY, AGWHGLWPHALSE LTPSPGN PG KYLIHGLY MH MOYZKYGWOTUG'L LTPSY, IKYLLYX MOY OUGX OYSX HAM MH OPT."WUIMUPG KUTVUSSY, HZ MOY 13MO SPNOM KYNPTYGM, WOYBUSPYK HZ MOY SYNPHGHZ OHGHK ZHK MOY UZZUPK HG MOY LYBYGMO HZ LYIMYTVYK," OY PGMKHXAWYXOPTLYSZ, U LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX PKKYIKYLLPVSY LTPSY IAWRYKPGN OPL SPIL AGXYKOPL TALMUWOY. "CPSS EHA GHC VY LH NHHX UL MH MYSS TY CPMO COHT P OUBYMOY OHGHK HZ WHGBYKLPGN LH ISYULUGMSE, PGLMYUX HZ VYPGN PG MOY UTVASUGWYCPMO MOUM TUGPUW'L VASSYM PG TE VHXE?"IPYKKY KYISPYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM MYSS OPT OPL GUTY UGX, VSALOPGN,VYNUG MH MKE MH PGBYGM U GUTY UGX MH LUE LHTYMOPGN UVHAM OPL KYULHG ZHKWHGWYUSPGN PM, VAM MOY ZKYGWOTUG OULMPSE PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."HO, ISYULY!" MOUM'L USS PCUGM MH RGHC."COYG MOY TAMMHG UGX UG HTYSYM OUX VYYG LYKBYX UGX U LUTHBUK UGX BHXRUVKHANOM, CPMO LHTY CPGY COPWO MOY ZKYGWO OUX MURYG ZKHT U KALLPUG WYSSUKUGX VKHANOM CPMO MOYT, KUTVUSSY PGBPMYX IPYKKY MH LOUKY OPL XPGGYK, UGXOPTLYSZ VYNUG MH YUM NKYYXPSE UGX JAPWRSE SPRY U OYUSMOE UGX OAGNKE TUG,TAGWOPGN OPL ZHHX KUIPXSE CPMO OPL LMKHGN MYYMO, WHGMPGAUSSE LTUWRPGNOPL SPIL, UGX KYIYUMPGN--"YDWYSSYGM! THKYS, MOY HKXYKSE, VKHANOM LHTY OHM CUMYK PG U LUAWYIUGUGX ISUWYX U VHMMSY HZ WSUKYM PG PM. OY USLH VKHANOM U VHMMSY HZ RBULL,MURYG ZKHT MOY RPMWOYG ZHK MOYT MH MKE. OYKY PL HGY P NHM UM CUNKUT" (OY MHAWOYX OPL LPXY) "UGX ULYWHGX UM LTHSYGLR"--OY LOHCYX U LWUK HG OPL WOYYR--"UGX MOPL SYN COPWOUL EHA LYY XHYL GHM CUGM MH TUKWO, P NHM MOUM HG MOY LYBYGMO UM MOYNKYUM VUMMSY HZ SU THLRHCU. LUWKY XPYA! PM CUL LISYGXPX! MOUM XYSANY HZZPKY CUL CHKMO LYYPGN. PM CUL U MHANO QHV EHA LYM AL MOYKY, TE CHKX!EHA TUE VY IKHAX HZ PM! P LIYGM EYUKL MOYKY," LUPX IPYKKY."HO EYL, HGY LYYL MOUM ISUPGSE. IUKPL!... U TUG COH XHYLG'M RGHC IUKPLPL U LUBUNY. EHA WUG MYSS U IUKPLPUG MCH SYUNAYL HZZ. IUKPL PL MUSTU, SUXAWOYGHPL, IHMPYK, MOY LHKVHGGY, MOY VHASYBUKXL," UGX GHMPWPGN MOUMOPL WHGWSALPHG CUL CYURYK MOUG COUM OUX NHGY VYZHKY, OY UXXYX JAPWRSE:"MOYKY PL HGSE HGY IUKPL PG MOY CHKSX. CYSS, P XHG'M YLMYYT EHA MOY SYLL ZHK PM."AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ MOY CPGY OY OUX XKAGR, UGX UZMYK MOY XUEL OY OUXLIYGM USHGY CPMO OPL XYIKYLLPGN MOHANOML, IPYKKY PGBHSAGMUKPSE YGQHEYXMUSRPGN CPMO MOPL WOYYKZAS UGX NHHX-GUMAKYX TUG."MH KYMAKG MH EHAK SUXPYL--P OYUK MOYE UKY SHBYSE. COUM U CKYMWOYX PXYUMH NH UGX VAKE MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY LMYIIYL COYG MOY ZKYGWO UKTE PLPG THLWHC. COUM U WOUGWY MOHLY NPKSL OUBY TPLLYX! EHAK IYULUGML,GHC--MOUM'L UGHMOYK MOPGN; VAM EHA WPBPSPFYX IYHISY, EHA HANOM MH RGHCAL VYMMYK MOUG MOUM. CY MHHR BPYGGU, VYKSPG, TUXKPX, GUISYL, KHTY,CUKLUC, USS MOY CHKSX'L WUIPMUSL.... OY PL NYGYKHLPME, TYKWE, QALMPWY, HKXYK, NYGPAL--MOUM'LCOUM MOY YTIYKHK PL! PM PL P, KUTVUSSY, COH MYSS EHA LH.... P ULLAKY EHAP CUL OPL YGYTE YPNOM EYUKL UNH. TE ZUMOYK CUL UG YTPNKUGM WHAGM.... VAMMOUM TUG OUL BUGJAPLOYX TY. OY OUL MURYG OHSX HZ TY. P WHASX GHM KYLPLMMOY LPNOM HZ MOY NKUGXYAK UGX NSHKE CPMO COPWO OY OUL WHBYKYX ZKUGWY.COYG P AGXYKLMHHX COUM OY CUGMYX--COYG P LUC MOUM OY CUL IKYIUKPGN U VYXHZ SUAKYSL ZHK AL, EHA RGHC, P LUPX MH TELYSZ: 'MOUM PL U THGUKWO,' UGXP XYBHMYX TELYSZ MH OPT! LH MOYKY! HO EYL, THG WOYK, OY PL MOY NKYUMYLMTUG HZ MOY UNYL IULM HK ZAMAKY.""PL OY PG THLWHC?" IPYKKY LMUTTYKYX CPMO U NAPSME SHHR.MOY ZKYGWOTUG SHHRYX UM OPL NAPSME ZUWY UGX LTPSYX."GH, OY CPSS TURY OPL YGMKE MHTHKKHC," OY KYISPYX, UGX WHGMPGAYX OPLMUSR.MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL PGMYKKAIMYX VE MOY WKPYL HZ LYBYKUS BHPWYL UMMOY NUMY UGX VE THKYS, COH WUTY MH LUE MOUM LHTY CAKMMYTVYKN OALLUKL OUXWHTY UGX CUGMYX MH IAM AI MOYPK OHKLYL PG MOY EUKX COYKY MOY WUIMUPG'LOHKLYL CYKY. MOPL XPZZPWASME OUX UKPLYG WOPYZSE VYWUALY MOY OALLUKL XPXGHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL LUPX MH MOYT PG ZKYGWO.MOY WUIMUPG OUX MOYPK LYGPHK LYKNYUGM WUSSYX PG, UGX PG U LMYKG BHPWYULRYX OPT MH COUM KYNPTYGM OY VYSHGNYX, COH CUL OPL WHTTUGXPGN HZZPWYK,UGX VE COUM KPNOM OY USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH WSUPT JAUKMYKL MOUM CYKY USKYUXEHWWAIPYX. MOY NYKTUG COH RGYC SPMMSY ZKYGWO, UGLCYKYX MOY MCH ZPKLMJAYLMPHGL VE NPBPGN MOY GUTYL HZ OPL KYNPTYGM UGX HZ OPL WHTTUGXPGNHZZPWYK, VAM PG KYISE MH MOY MOPKX JAYLMPHG COPWO OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGXLUPX, PGMKHXAWPGN VKHRYG ZKYGWO PGMH OPL HCG NYKTUG, MOUM OY CUL MOYJAUKMYKTULMYK HZ MOY KYNPTYGM UGX OPL WHTTUGXYK OUX HKXYKYX OPT MHHWWAIE USS MOY OHALYL HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK. IPYKKY, COH RGYC NYKTUG,MKUGLSUMYX COUM MOY NYKTUG LUPX MH MOY WUIMUPG UGX NUBY MOY WUIMUPG'LKYISE MH MOY CAKMMYTVYKN OALLUK PG NYKTUG. COYG OY OUX AGXYKLMHHX COUMCUL LUPX MH OPT, MOY NYKTUG LAVTPMMYX UGX MHHR OPL TYG YSLYCOYKY. MOYWUIMUPG CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IHKWO UGX NUBY LHTY HKXYKL PG U SHAX BHPWY.COYG OY KYMAKGYX MH MOY KHHT IPYKKY CUL LPMMPGN PG MOY LUTY ISUWY ULVYZHKY, CPMO OPL OYUX PG OPL OUGXL. OPL ZUWY YDIKYLLYX LAZZYKPGN. OYKYUSSE CUL LAZZYKPGN UM MOUM THTYGM. COYG MOY WUIMUPG CYGM HAM UGX OYCUL SYZM USHGY, LAXXYGSE OY WUTY MH OPTLYSZ UGX KYUSPFYX MOY IHLPMPHGOY CUL PG. PM CUL GHM MOUM THLWHC OUX VYYG MURYG HK MOUM MOY OUIIEWHGJAYKHKL CYKY TULMYKL PG PM UGX CYKY IUMKHGPFPGN OPT. IUPGZAS ULMOUM CUL PM CUL GHM MOUM COPWO MHKTYGMYX IPYKKY UM MOY THTYGM. OY CULMHKTYGMYX VE MOY WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OPL HCG CYURGYLL. MOY ZYC NSULLYL HZCPGY OY OUX XKAGR UGX MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO MOPL NHHX-GUMAKYX TUG OUXXYLMKHEYX MOY THHX HZ WHGWYGMKUMYX NSHHT PG COPWO OY OUX LIYGM MOY SULMZYC XUEL UGX COPWO CUL YLLYGMPUS ZHK MOY YDYWAMPHG HZ OPL XYLPNG. MOYIPLMHS, XUNNYK, UGX IYULUGM WHUM CYKY KYUXE. GUIHSYHG CUL MH YGMYK MOYMHCG GYDM XUE. IPYKKY LMPSS WHGLPXYKYX MOUM PM CHASX VY U ALYZAS UGXCHKMOE UWMPHG MH LSUE MOY YBPSXHYK, VAM GHC OY ZYSM MOUM OY CHASX GHMXH PM. OY LMKANNSYX UNUPGLM MOY WHGZYLLPHG HZ OPLCYURGYLL VAM XPTSE ZYSM MOUM OY WHASX GHM HBYKWHTY PM UGX MOUM OPLZHKTYK NSHHTE ZKUTY HZ TPGX, WHGWYKGPGN BYGNYUGWY, RPSSPGN, UGXLYSZ-LUWKPZPWY, OUX VYYG XPLIYKLYX SPRY XALM VE WHGMUWM CPMO MOY ZPKLMTUG OY TYM.MOY WUIMUPG KYMAKGYX MH MOY KHHT, SPTIPGN LSPNOMSE UGX COPLMSPGN U MAGY.MOY ZKYGWOTUG'L WOUMMYK COPWO OUX IKYBPHALSE UTALYX IPYKKY GHC KYIYSSYXOPT. MOY MAGY OY CUL COPLMSPGN, OPL NUPM, UGX MOY NYLMAKY CPMO COPWOOY MCPKSYX OPL TALMUWOY, USS GHC LYYTYX HZZYGLPBY. "P CPSS NH UCUEPTTYXPUMYSE. P CHG'M LUE UGHMOYK CHKX MH OPT," MOHANOM IPYKKY. OYMOHANOM MOPL, VAM LMPSS LUM PG MOY LUTY ISUWY. U LMKUGNY ZYYSPGN HZCYURGYLL MPYX OPT MH MOY LIHM; OY CPLOYX MH NYM AI UGX NH UCUE, VAMWHASX GHM XH LH.MOY WUIMUPG, HG MOY HMOYK OUGX, LYYTYX BYKE WOYYKZAS. OY IUWYX AI UGXXHCG MOY KHHT MCPWY. VAM OY'L U NYKTUG."OY LUM XHCG ZUWPGN IPYKKY. "VE MOY CUE, EHA RGHC NYKTUG, MOYG?"IPYKKY SHHRYX UM OPT PG LPSYGWY."COUM PL MOY NYKTUG ZHK 'LOYSMYK'?""LOYSMYK?" IPYKKY KYIYUMYX. THKYS!" OY WUSSYX HAMNUPSE.THKYS VKHANOM WUGXSYL UGX U VHMMSY HZ CPGY. MOY WUIMUPG SHHRYX UM IPYKKYVE MOY WUGXSYSPNOM UGX CUL YBPXYGMSE LMKAWR VE MOY MKHAVSYX YDIKYLLPHGHG OPL WHTIUGPHG'L ZUWY.
