UT PGHM KPNOM, THGLPYAK IPYKKY?" LUPX OY, NKHCPGN UGPTUMYX. "UGHMOYK NSULL?"IPYKKY UNUPG YTIMPYX OPL NSULL UGX IHAKYX OPTLYSZ HAM U MOPKX."HO, CHTYG, CHTYG!" UGX MOY WUIMUPG, SHHRPGN CPMO NSPLMYGPGN YEYL UMIPYKKY, VYNUG MUSRPGN HZ SHBY UGX HZ OPL SHBY UZZUPKL.MOYKY CYKY BYKE TUGE HZ MOYLY, UL HGY WHASX YULPSE VYSPYBY, SHHRPGNUM MOY HZZPWYK'L OUGXLHTY, LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX ZUWY, UGX GHMPGN MOY YUNYKYGMOALPULT CPMO COPWO OY LIHRY HZ CHTYG. MOHANO USS KUTVUSSY'L SHBYLMHKPYL OUX MOY LYGLAUS WOUKUWMYK COPWO ZKYGWOTYG KYNUKX UL MOY LIYWPUSWOUKT UGX IHYMKE HZ SHBY, EYM OY MHSX OPL LMHKE CPMO LAWO LPGWYKYWHGBPWMPHG MOUM OY USHGY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX UGX RGHCG USS MOY WOUKT HZ SHBYUGX OY XYLWKPVYX CHTYG LH USSAKPGNSE MOUM IPYKKY SPLMYGYX MH OPT CPMOWAKPHLPME.PM CUL ISUPG MOUM S'UTHAK COPWO MOY ZKYGWOTUG CUL LH ZHGX HZ CUL GHMMOUM SHC UGX LPTISY RPGX MOUM IPYKKY OUX HGWY ZYSM ZHK OPL CPZY, GHKCUL PM MOY KHTUGMPW SHBY LMPTASUMYX VE OPTLYSZ MOUM OY YDIYKPYGWYX ZHKGUMULOU. (KUTVUSSY XYLIPLYX VHMO MOYLY RPGXL HZ SHBY YJAUSSE: MOY HGYOY WHGLPXYKYX MOY "SHBY HZ WSHXOHIIYKL" UGX MOY HMOYK MOY "SHBYHZ LPTISYMHGL.") S'UTHAK COPWO MOY ZKYGWOTUG CHKLOPIYX WHGLPLMYXIKPGWPIUSSE PG MOY AGGUMAKUSGYLL HZ OPL KYSUMPHG MH MOY CHTUG UGX PG UWHTVPGUMPHG HZ PGWHGNKAPMPYL NPBPGN MOY WOPYZ WOUKT MH MOY ZYYSPGN.MOAL MOY WUIMUPG MHAWOPGNSE KYWHAGMYX MOY LMHKE HZ OPL SHBY ZHK UZULWPGUMPGN TUKJAPLY HZ MOPKME-ZPBY UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY ZHK U WOUKTPGN,PGGHWYGM WOPSX HZ LYBYGMYYG, XUANOMYK HZ MOY VYCPMWOPGN TUKJAPLY. MOYWHGZSPWM HZ TUNGUGPTPME VYMCYYG MOY THMOYK UGX MOY XUANOMYK, YGXPGN PGMOY THMOYK'L LUWKPZPWPGN OYKLYSZ UGX HZZYKPGN OYK XUANOMYK PG TUKKPUNYMH OYK SHBYK, YBYG GHC UNPMUMYX MOY WUIMUPG, MOHANO PM CUL MOY TYTHKE HZU XPLMUGM IULM. MOYG OY KYWHAGMYX UG YIPLHXY PG COPWO MOY OALVUGXISUEYX MOY IUKM HZ MOY SHBYK, UGX OY--MOY SHBYK--ULLATYX MOY KHSY HZ MOYOALVUGX, UL CYSS UL LYBYKUS XKHSS PGWPXYGML ZKHT OPL KYWHSSYWMPHGL HZNYKTUGE, COYKY "LOYSMYK" PL WUSSYX AGMYKRAGZM UGX COYKY MOY OALVUGXL YUMLUAYKRKUAM UGX MOY EHAGN NPKSL UKY "MHH VSHGXY."ZPGUSSE, MOY SUMYLM YIPLHXY PG IHSUGX LMPSS ZKYLO PG MOY WUIMUPG'LTYTHKE, UGX COPWO OY GUKKUMYX CPMO KUIPX NYLMAKYL UGX NSHCPGN ZUWY, CULHZ OHC OY OUX LUBYX MOY SPZY HZ U IHSY (PG NYGYKUS, MOY LUBPGN HZSPZY WHGMPGAUSSE HWWAKKYX PG MOY WUIMUPG'L LMHKPYL) UGX MOY IHSY OUXYGMKALMYX MH OPT OPL YGWOUGMPGN CPZY (IUKPLPYGGY XY WHYAK) COPSY OPTLYSZYGMYKPGN MOY ZKYGWO LYKBPWY. MOY WUIMUPG CUL OUIIE, MOY YGWOUGMPGNIHSPLO SUXE CPLOYX MH YSHIY CPMO OPT, VAM, IKHTIMYX VE TUNGUGPTPME, MOYWUIMUPG KYLMHKYX MOY CPZY MH MOY OALVUGX, LUEPGN UL OY XPX LH: "P OUBYLUBYX EHAK SPZY, UGX P LUBY EHAK OHGHK!" OUBPGN KYIYUMYX MOYLY CHKXL MOYWUIMUPG CPIYX OPL YEYL UGX NUBY OPTLYSZ U LOURY, UL PZ XKPBPGN UCUE MOYCYURGYLL COPWO ULLUPSYX OPT UM MOPL MHAWOPGN KYWHSSYWMPHG.SPLMYGPGN MH MOY WUIMUPG'L MUSYL, IPYKKY--UL HZMYG OUIIYGL SUMY PG MOYYBYGPGN UGX AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ CPGY--ZHSSHCYX USS MOUM CUL MHSX OPT,AGXYKLMHHX PM USS, UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTY ZHSSHCYX U MKUPG HZ IYKLHGUSTYTHKPYL COPWO, OY RGYC GHM COE, LAXXYGSE UKHLY PG OPL TPGX. COPSYSPLMYGPGN MH MOYLY SHBY LMHKPYL OPL HCG SHBY ZHK GUMULOU AGYDIYWMYXSEKHLY MH OPL TPGX, UGX NHPGN HBYK MOY IPWMAKYL HZ MOUM SHBY PG OPLPTUNPGUMPHG OY TYGMUSSE WHTIUKYX MOYT CPMO KUTVUSSY'L MUSYL. SPLMYGPGNMH MOY LMHKE HZ MOY LMKANNSY VYMCYYG SHBY UGX XAME, IPYKKY LUC VYZHKYOPL YEYL YBYKE TPGAMYLM XYMUPS HZ OPL SULM TYYMPGN CPMO MOY HVQYWM HZOPL SHBY UM MOY LAROUKYB CUMYK MHCYK. UM MOY MPTY HZ MOUM TYYMPGN PM OUXGHM IKHXAWYX UG YZZYWM AIHG OPT--OY OUX GHM YBYG HGWY KYWUSSYX PM. VAMGHC PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM MOUM TYYMPGN OUX OUX PG PM LHTYMOPGN BYKEPTIHKMUGM UGX IHYMPW."IYMYK RPKPSHBPWO, WHTY OYKY! CY OUBY KYWHNGPFYX EHA," OY GHC LYYTYXMH OYUK MOY CHKXL LOY OUX AMMYKYX UGX MH LYY VYZHKY OPT OYK YEYL, OYKLTPSY, OYK MKUBYSPGN OHHX, UGX U LMKUE SHWR HZ OYK OUPK... UGX MOYKYLYYTYX MH OPT LHTYMOPGN IUMOYMPW UGX MHAWOPGN PG USS MOPL.OUBPGN ZPGPLOYX OPL MUSY UVHAM MOY YGWOUGMPGN IHSPLO SUXE, MOY WUIMUPGULRYX IPYKKY PZ OY OUX YBYK YDIYKPYGWYX U LPTPSUK PTIASLY MH LUWKPZPWYOPTLYSZ ZHK SHBY UGX U ZYYSPGN HZ YGBE HZ MOY SYNPMPTUMY OALVUGX.WOUSSYGNYX VE MOPL JAYLMPHG IPYKKY KUPLYX OPL OYUX UGX ZYSM U GYYX MHYDIKYLL MOY MOHANOML MOUM ZPSSYX OPL TPGX. OY VYNUG MH YDISUPG MOUM OYAGXYKLMHHX SHBY ZHK U CHTYG LHTYCOUM XPZZYKYGMSE. OY LUPX MOUM PG USSOPL SPZY OY OUX SHBYX UGX LMPSS SHBYX HGSE HGY CHTUG, UGX MOUM LOY WHASXGYBYK VY OPL."MPYGL!" LUPX MOY WUIMUPG.IPYKKY MOYG YDISUPGYX MOUM OY OUX SHBYX MOPL CHTUG ZKHT OPL YUKSPYLMEYUKL, VAM MOUM OY OUX GHM XUKYX MH MOPGR HZ OYK VYWUALY LOY CUL MHHEHAGN, UGX VYWUALY OY OUX VYYG UG PSSYNPMPTUMY LHG CPMOHAM U GUTY.UZMYKCUKXL COYG OY OUX KYWYPBYX U GUTY UGX CYUSMO OY XUKYX GHM MOPGR HZOYK VYWUALY OY SHBYX OYK MHH CYSS, ISUWPGN OYK ZUK UVHBY YBYKEMOPGN PGMOY CHKSX, UGX YLIYWPUSSE MOYKYZHKY UVHBY OPTLYSZ.COYG OY OUX KYUWOYX MOPL IHPGM, IPYKKY ULRYX MOY WUIMUPG COYMOYK OYAGXYKLMHHX MOUM.MOY WUIMUPG TUXY U NYLMAKY LPNGPZEPGN MOUM YBYG PZ OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGXPM OY VYNNYX IPYKKY MH WHGMPGAY."ISUMHGPW SHBY, WSHAXL..." OY TAMMYKYX.COYMOYK PM CUL MOY CPGY OY OUX XKAGR, HK UG PTIASLY HZ ZKUGRGYLL, HK MOYMOHANOM MOUM MOPL TUG XPX GHM, UGX GYBYK CHASX, RGHC UGE HZ MOHLY COHISUEYX U IUKM PG OPL LMHKE, HK COYMOYK PM CUL USS MOYLY MOPGNL MHNYMOYK,LHTYMOPGN SHHLYGYX IPYKKY'L MHGNAY. LIYURPGN MOPWRSE UGX CPMO U ZUKUCUESHHR PG OPL LOPGPGN YEYL, OY MHSX MOY COHSY LMHKE HZ OPL SPZY: OPLTUKKPUNY, GUMULOU'L SHBY ZHK OPL VYLM ZKPYGX, OYK VYMKUEUS HZ OPT, UGXUSS OPL HCG LPTISY KYSUMPHGL CPMO OYK. AKNYX HG VE KUTVUSSY'L JAYLMPHGLOY USLH MHSX COUM OY OUX UM ZPKLM WHGWYUSYX--OPL HCG IHLPMPHG UGX YBYGOPL GUTY.THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN YSLY PG IPYKKY'L LMHKE MOY WUIMUPG CUL PTIKYLLYX VEMOY ZUWM MOUM IPYKKY CUL BYKE KPWO, OUX MCH TUGLPHGL PG THLWHC, UGX MOUMOY OUX UVUGXHGYX YBYKEMOPGN UGX GHM SYZM MOY WPME, VAM KYTUPGYX MOYKYWHGWYUSPGN OPL GUTY UGX LMUMPHG.COYG PM CUL SUMY UM GPNOM MOYE CYGM HAM MHNYMOYK PGMH MOY LMKYYM. MOYGPNOM CUL CUKT UGX SPNOM. MH MOY SYZM HZ MOY OHALY HG MOY IHRKHBRU UZPKY NSHCYX--MOY ZPKLM HZ MOHLY MOUM CYKY VYNPGGPGN PG THLWHC. MH MOYKPNOM UGX OPNO AI PG MOY LRE CUL MOY LPWRSY HZ MOY CUGPGN THHG UGXHIIHLPMY MH PM OAGN MOUM VKPNOM WHTYM COPWO CUL WHGGYWMYX PG IPYKKY'LOYUKM CPMO OPL SHBY. UM MOY NUMY LMHHX NYKULPT, MOY WHHR, UGX MCHZKYGWOTYG. MOYPK SUANOMYK UGX MOYPK TAMAUSSE PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY KYTUKRL PGMCH SUGNAUNYL WHASX VY OYUKX. MOYE CYKY SHHRPGN UM MOY NSHC LYYG PG MOYMHCG.MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MYKKPVSY PG MOY HGY LTUSS, XPLMUGM ZPKY PG MOY PTTYGLYWPME.NUFPGN UM MOY OPNO LMUKKE LRE, UM MOY THHG, UM MOY WHTYM, UGX UM MOYNSHC ZKHT MOY ZPKY, IPYKKY YDIYKPYGWYX U QHEZAS YTHMPHG. "MOYKY GHC,OHC NHHX PM PL, COUM THKY XHYL HGY GYYX?" MOHANOM OY. UGX LAXXYGSEKYTYTVYKPGN OPL PGMYGMPHG OY NKYC XPFFE UGX ZYSM LH ZUPGM MOUM OY SYUGYXUNUPGLM MOY ZYGWY MH LUBY OPTLYSZ ZKHT ZUSSPGN.CPMOHAM MURPGN SYUBY HZ OPL GYC ZKPYGX, IPYKKY SYZM MOY NUMY CPMOAGLMYUXE LMYIL UGX KYMAKGPGN MH OPL KHHT SUE XHCG HG MOY LHZU UGXPTTYXPUMYSE ZYSS ULSYYI.WOUIMYK DDDMOY NSHC HZ MOY ZPKLM ZPKY MOUM VYNUG HG MOY LYWHGX HZ LYIMYTVYK CULCUMWOYX ZKHT MOY BUKPHAL KHUXL VE MOY ZANPMPBY TALWHBPMYL UGX VE MOYKYMKYUMPGN MKHHIL, CPMO TUGE XPZZYKYGM ZYYSPGNL.MOY KHLMHB IUKME LIYGM MOY GPNOM UM TEMPLOWOP, ZHAKMYYG TPSYL ZKHTTHLWHC. MOYE OUX LMUKMYX LH SUMY HG MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK, MOY KHUXOUX VYYG LH VSHWRYX VE BYOPWSYL UGX MKHHIL, LH TUGE MOPGNL OUX VYYGZHKNHMMYG ZHK COPWO LYKBUGML CYKY LYGM VUWR, MOUM MOYE OUX XYWPXYX MHLIYGX MOUM GPNOM UM U ISUWY MOKYY TPSYL HAM HZ THLWHC. MOY GYDM THKGPGNMOYE CHRY SUMY UGX CYKY UNUPG XYSUEYX LH HZMYG MOUM MOYE HGSE NHM UL ZUKUL NKYUM TEMPLOWOP. UM MYG H'WSHWR MOUM YBYGPGN MOY KHLMHB ZUTPSE UGXMOY CHAGXYX MKUBYSPGN CPMO MOYT CYKY USS XPLMKPVAMYX PG MOY EUKXL UGXOAML HZ MOUM SUKNY BPSSUNY. MOY KHLMHBL' LYKBUGML UGX WHUWOTYG UGX MOYHKXYKSPYL HZ MOY CHAGXYX HZZPWYKL, UZMYK UMMYGXPGN MH MOYPK TULMYKL, OUXLAIIYK, ZYX MOY OHKLYL, UGX WUTY HAM PGMH MOY IHKWOYL.PG U GYPNOVHKPGN OAM SUE KUYBLRP'L UXQAMUGM CPMO U ZKUWMAKYX CKPLM. MOYUCZAS IUPG OY LAZZYKYX TUXY OPT THUG PGWYLLUGMSE UGX IPMYHALSE, UGX OPLTHUGPGN LHAGXYX MYKKPVSY PG MOY XUKRGYLL HZ MOY UAMATG GPNOM. OY OUXLIYGM MOY ZPKLM GPNOM PG MOY LUTY EUKX UL MOY KHLMHBL. MOY WHAGMYLL LUPXLOY OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH WSHLY OYK YEYL HG UWWHAGM HZ OPL THUGPGN, UGX UMTEMPLOWOP LOY THBYX PGMH U CHKLY OAM LPTISE MH VY ZUKMOYK UCUE ZKHT MOYCHAGXYX TUG.PG MOY XUKRGYLL HZ MOY GPNOM HGY HZ MOY LYKBUGML GHMPWYX, UVHBY MOY OPNOVHXE HZ U WHUWO LMUGXPGN VYZHKY MOY IHKWO, MOY LTUSS NSHC HZ UGHMOYKZPKY. HGY NSHC OUX SHGN VYYG BPLPVSY UGX YBYKEVHXE RGYC MOUM PM CULSPMMSY TEMPLOWOP VAKGPGN--LYM HG ZPKY VE TUTHGHB'L WHLLUWRL."VAM SHHR OYKY, VKHMOYKL, MOYKY'L UGHMOYK ZPKY!" KYTUKRYX UG HKXYKSE.USS MAKGYX MOYPK UMMYGMPHG MH MOY NSHC."VAM MOYE MHSX AL SPMMSY TEMPLOWOP OUX VYYG LYM HG ZPKY VE TUTHGHB'LWHLLUWRL.""VAM MOUM'L GHM TEMPLOWOP, PM'L ZUKMOYK UCUE.""SHHR, PM TALM VY PG THLWHC!"MCH HZ MOY NUFYKL CYGM KHAGX MH MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ MOY WHUWO UGX LUM XHCGHG PML LMYIL."PM'L THKY MH MOY SYZM, COE, SPMMSY TEMPLOWOP PL HBYK MOYKY, UGX MOPL PLKPNOM HG MOY HMOYK LPXY."LYBYKUS TYG QHPGYX MOY ZPKLM MCH."LYY OHC PM'L ZSUKPGN," LUPX HGY. "MOUM'L U ZPKY PG THLWHC: YPMOYK PGMOY LALOWOYBLRP HK MOY KHNHFOLRP JAUKMYK."GH HGY KYISPYX MH MOPL KYTUKR UGX ZHK LHTY MPTY MOYE USS NUFYX LPSYGMSEUM MOY LIKYUXPGN ZSUTYL HZ MOY LYWHGX ZPKY PG MOY XPLMUGWY.HSX XUGPYS MYKYGMPWO, MOY WHAGM'L BUSYM (UL OY CUL WUSSYX), WUTY AI MHMOY NKHAI UGX LOHAMYX UM TPLORU."COUM UKY EHA LMUKPGN UM, EHA NHHX-ZHK-GHMOPGN?... MOY WHAGM CPSS VYWUSSPGN UGX MOYKY'L GHVHXE MOYKY; NH UGX NUMOYK MOY WSHMOYL MHNYMOYK.""P HGSE KUG HAM MH NYM LHTY CUMYK," LUPX TPLORU."VAM COUM XH EHA MOPGR, XUGPYS MYKYGMPWO? XHYLG'M PM SHHR UL PZ MOUMNSHC CYKY PG THLWHC?" KYTUKRYX HGY HZ MOY ZHHMTYG.XUGPYS MYKYGMPWO TUXY GH KYISE, UGX UNUPG ZHK U SHGN MPTY MOYE CYKY USSLPSYGM. MOY NSHC LIKYUX, KPLPGN UGX ZUSSPGN, ZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYK LMPSS."NHX OUBY TYKWE.... PM'L CPGXE UGX XKE..." LUPX UGHMOYK BHPWY."QALM SHHR! LYY COUM PM'L XHPGN GHC. H SHKX! EHA WUG YBYG LYY MOY WKHCLZSEPGN. SHKX OUBY TYKWE HG AL LPGGYKL!""MOYE'SS IAM PM HAM, GH ZYUK!""COH'L MH IAM PM HAM?" XUGPYS MYKYGMPWO, COH OUX OPMOYKMH VYYG LPSYGM,CUL OYUKX MH LUE. OPL BHPWY CUL WUST UGX XYSPVYKUMY. "THLWHC PM PL,VKHMOYKL," LUPX OY. "THMOYK THLWHC, MOY COPMY..." OPL BHPWY ZUSMYKYX,UGX OY NUBY CUE MH UG HSX TUG'L LHV.UGX PM CUL UL PZ MOYE OUX USS HGSE CUPMYX ZHK MOPL MH KYUSPFY MOYLPNGPZPWUGWY ZHK MOYT HZ MOY NSHC MOYE CYKY CUMWOPGN. LPNOL CYKY OYUKX,CHKXL HZ IKUEYK, UGX MOY LHVVPGN HZ MOY WHAGM'L HSX BUSYM.WOUIMYK DDDPMOY BUSYM, KYMAKGPGN MH MOY WHMMUNY, PGZHKTYX MOY WHAGM MOUM THLWHC CULVAKGPGN. MOY WHAGM XHGGYX OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG UGX CYGM HAM MH SHHR. LHGEUUGX TUXUTY LWOHLL, COH OUX GHM EYM AGXKYLLYX, CYGM HAM CPMO OPT. HGSEGUMULOU UGX MOY WHAGMYLL KYTUPGYX PG MOY KHHT. IYMEU CUL GH SHGNYKCPMO MOY ZUTPSE, OY OUX NHGY HG CPMO OPL KYNPTYGM COPWO CUL TURPGN ZHKMKHPMLU.MOY WHAGMYLL, HG OYUKPGN MOUM THLWHC CUL HG ZPKY, VYNUG MH WKE. GUMULOU,IUSY, CPMO U ZPDYX SHHR, CUL LPMMPGN HG MOY VYGWO AGXYK MOY PWHGL QALMCOYKY LOY OUX LUM XHCG HG UKKPBPGN UGX IUPX GH UMMYGMPHG MH OYK ZUMOYK'LCHKXL. LOY CUL SPLMYGPGN MH MOY WYULYSYLL THUGPGN HZ MOY UXQAMUGM, MOKYYOHALYL HZZ."HO, OHC MYKKPVSY," LUPX LHGEU KYMAKGPGN ZKHT MOY EUKX WOPSSYX UGXZKPNOMYGYX. "P VYSPYBY MOY COHSY HZ THLWHC CPSS VAKG, MOYKY'L UG UCZASNSHC! GUMULOU, XH SHHR! EHA WUG LYY PM ZKHT MOY CPGXHC," LOY LUPX MH OYKWHALPG, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH XPLMKUWM OYK TPGX.VAM GUMULOU SHHRYX UM OYK UL PZ GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM CUL LUPX MH OYKUGX UNUPG ZPDYX OYK YEYL HG MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY LMHBY. LOY OUX VYYG PGMOPL WHGXPMPHG HZ LMAIHK LPGWY MOY THKGPGN, COYG LHGEU, MH MOY LAKIKPLYUGX UGGHEUGWY HZ MOY WHAGMYLL, OUX ZHK LHTY AGUWWHAGMUVSY KYULHG ZHAGXPM GYWYLLUKE MH MYSS GUMULOU HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L CHAGX UGX HZ OPL VYPGNCPMO MOYPK IUKME. MOY WHAGMYLL OUX LYSXHT VYYG LH UGNKE CPMO UGEHGY ULLOY CUL CPMO LHGEU. LHGEU OUX WKPYX UGX VYNNYX MH VY ZHKNPBYG UGX GHC,UL PZ MKEPGN MH UMHGY ZHK OYK ZUASM, IUPX AGWYULPGN UMMYGMPHG MH OYKWHALPG."SHHR, GUMULOU, OHC XKYUXZASSE PM PL VAKGPGN!" LUPX LOY."COUM'L VAKGPGN?" ULRYX GUMULOU. "HO, EYL, THLWHC."UGX UL PZ PG HKXYK GHM MH HZZYGX LHGEU UGX MH NYM KPX HZ OYK, LOY MAKGYXOYK ZUWY MH MOY CPGXHC, SHHRYX HAM PG LAWO U CUE MOUM PM CUL YBPXYGMMOUM LOY WHASX GHM LYY UGEMOPGN, UGX UNUPG LYMMSYX XHCG PG OYK ZHKTYKUMMPMAXY."VAM EHA XPXG'M LYY PM!""EYL, KYUSSE P XPX," GUMULOU KYISPYX PG U BHPWY MOUM ISYUXYX MH VY SYZMPG IYUWY.VHMO MOY WHAGMYLL UGX LHGEU AGXYKLMHHX MOUM, GUMAKUSSE, GYPMOYK THLWHCGHK MOY VAKGPGN HZ THLWHC GHK UGEMOPGN YSLY WHASX LYYT HZ PTIHKMUGWY MHGUMULOU.MOY WHAGM KYMAKGYX UGX SUE XHCG VYOPGX MOY IUKMPMPHG. MOY WHAGMYLL CYGMAI MH OYK XUANOMYK UGX MHAWOYX OYK OYUX CPMO MOY VUWR HZ OYK OUGX UL LOYCUL CHGM MH XH COYG GUMULOU CUL PSS, MOYG MHAWOYX OYK ZHKYOYUX CPMO OYKSPIL UL PZ MH ZYYS COYMOYK LOY CUL ZYBYKPLO, UGX ZPGUSSE RPLLYX OYK."EHA UKY WHSX. EHA UKY MKYTVSPGN USS HBYK. EHA'X VYMMYK SPY XHCG," LUPXMOY WHAGMYLL."SPY XHCG? USS KPNOM, P CPSS. P'SS SPY XHCG UM HGWY," LUPX GUMULOU.COYG GUMULOU OUX VYYG MHSX MOUM THKGPGN MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL LYKPHALSECHAGXYX UGX CUL MKUBYSPGN CPMO MOYPK IUKME, LOY OUX UM ZPKLM ULRYX TUGEJAYLMPHGL: COYKY CUL OY NHPGN? OHC CUL OY CHAGXYX? CUL PM LYKPHAL? UGXWHASX LOY LYY OPT? VAM UZMYK LOY OUX VYYG MHSX MOUM LOY WHASX GHM LYYOPT, MOUM OY CUL LYKPHALSE CHAGXYX VAM MOUM OPL SPZY CUL GHM PG XUGNYK,LOY WYULYX MH ULR JAYLMPHGL HK MH LIYUR UM USS, YBPXYGMSE XPLVYSPYBPGNCOUM MOYE MHSX OYK, UGX WHGBPGWYX MOUM LUE COUM LOY TPNOM LOY CHASXLMPSS VY MHSX MOY LUTY. USS MOY CUE LOY OUX LUM THMPHGSYLL PG U WHKGYKHZ MOY WHUWO CPMO CPXY HIYG YEYL, UGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG PG MOYT COPWO MOYWHAGMYLL RGYC LH CYSS UGX ZYUKYX LH TAWO, UGX GHC LOY LUM PG MOY LUTYCUE HG MOY VYGWO COYKY LOY OUX LYUMYX OYKLYSZ HG UKKPBPGN. LOY CULISUGGPGN LHTYMOPGN UGX YPMOYK XYWPXPGN HK OUX USKYUXE XYWPXYX LHTYMOPGNPG OYK TPGX. MOY WHAGMYLL RGYC MOPL, VAM COUM PM TPNOM VY LOY XPX GHMRGHC, UGX MOPL USUKTYX UGX MHKTYGMYX OYK."GUMULOU, AGXKYLL, XUKSPGN; SPY XHCG HG TE VYX."U VYX OUX VYYG TUXY HG U VYXLMYUX ZHK MOY WHAGMYLL HGSE. TUXUTY LWOHLLUGX MOY MCH NPKSL CYKY MH LSYYI HG LHTY OUE HG MOY ZSHHK."GH, TUTTU, P CPSS SPY XHCG OYKY HG MOY ZSHHK," GUMULOU KYISPYXPKKPMUVSE UGX LOY CYGM MH MOY CPGXHC UGX HIYGYX PM. MOKHANO MOY HIYGCPGXHC MOY THUGL HZ MOY UXQAMUGM WHASX VY OYUKX THKY XPLMPGWMSE. LOY IAMOYK OYUX HAM PGMH MOY XUTI GPNOM UPK, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL LUC OYK LSPT GYWRLOURPGN CPMO LHVL UGX MOKHVVPGN UNUPGLM MOY CPGXHC ZKUTY. GUMULOU RGYCPM CUL GHM IKPGWY UGXKYC COH CUL THUGPGN. LOY RGYC IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL PGMOY LUTY EUKX UL MOYTLYSBYL UGX PG U IUKM HZ MOY OAM UWKHLL MOY IULLUNY;VAM MOPL XKYUXZAS PGWYLLUGM THUGPGN TUXY OYK LHV. MOY WHAGMYLL YDWOUGNYXU SHHR CPMO LHGEU."SPY XHCG, XUKSPGN; SPY XHCG, TE IYM," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, LHZMSEMHAWOPGN GUMULOU'L LOHASXYKL. "WHTY, SPY XHCG.""HO, EYL... P'SS SPY XHCG UM HGWY," LUPX GUMULOU, UGX VYNUG OAKKPYXSEAGXKYLLPGN, MANNPGN UM MOY MUIYL HZ OYK IYMMPWHUM.COYG LOY OUX MOKHCG HZZ OYK XKYLL UGX IAM HG U XKYLLPGN QUWRYM, LOY LUMXHCG CPMO OYK ZHHM AGXYK OYK HG MOY VYX MOUM OUX VYYG TUXY AI HG MOYZSHHK, QYKRYX OYK MOPG UGX KUMOYK LOHKM ISUPM HZ OUPK MH MOY ZKHGM,UGX VYNUG KYISUPMPGN PM. OYK SHGN, MOPG, IKUWMPWYX ZPGNYKL KUIPXSEAGISUPMYX, KYISUPMYX, UGX MPYX AI OYK ISUPM. OYK OYUX THBYX ZKHT LPXYMH LPXY ZKHT OUVPM, VAM OYK YEYL, ZYBYKPLOSE CPXY, SHHRYX ZPDYXSE VYZHKYOYK. COYG OYK MHPSYM ZHK MOY GPNOM CUL ZPGPLOYX LOY LUGR NYGMSE HGMH MOYLOYYM LIKYUX HBYK MOY OUE HG MOY LPXY GYUKYLM MOY XHHK."GUMULOU, EHA'X VYMMYK SPY PG MOY TPXXSY," LUPX LHGEU."P'SS LMUE OYKY," TAMMYKYX GUMULOU. "XH SPY XHCG," LOY UXXYX WKHLLSE,UGX VAKPYX OYK ZUWY PG MOY IPSSHC.MOY WHAGMYLL, TUXUTY LWOHLL, UGX LHGEU AGXKYLLYX OULMPSE UGX SUE XHCG.MOY LTUSS SUTI PG ZKHGM HZ MOY PWHGL CUL MOY HGSE SPNOM SYZM PGMOY KHHT. VAM PG MOY EUKX MOYKY CUL U SPNOM ZKHT MOY ZPKY UM SPMMSYTEMPLOWOP U TPSY UGX U OUSZ UCUE, UGX MOKHANO MOY GPNOM WUTY MOY GHPLYHZ IYHISY LOHAMPGN UM U MUBYKG TUTHGHB'L WHLLUWRL OUX LYM AI UWKHLL MOYLMKYYM, UGX MOY UXQAMUGM'L AGWYULPGN THUGL WHASX LMPSS VY OYUKX.ZHK U SHGN MPTY GUMULOU SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSE MH MOY LHAGXL MOUM KYUWOYXOYK ZKHT PGLPXY UGX HAMLPXY MOY KHHT UGX XPX GHM THBY. ZPKLM LOY OYUKXOYK THMOYK IKUEPGN UGX LPNOPGN UGX MOY WKYURPGN HZ OYK VYX AGXYKOYK, MOYG TUXUTY LWOHLL' ZUTPSPUK COPLMSPGN LGHKY UGX LHGEU'L NYGMSYVKYUMOPGN. MOYG MOY WHAGMYLL WUSSYX MH GUMULOU. GUMULOU XPX GHM UGLCYK."P MOPGR LOY'L ULSYYI, TUTTU," LUPX LHGEU LHZMSE.UZMYK U LOHKM LPSYGWY MOY WHAGMYLL LIHRY UNUPG VAM MOPL MPTY GH HGYKYISPYX.LHHG UZMYK MOUM GUMULOU OYUKX OYK THMOYK'L YBYG VKYUMOPGN. GUMULOU XPXGHM THBY, MOHANO OYK SPMMSY VUKY ZHHM, MOKALM HAM ZKHT AGXYK MOY JAPSM,CUL NKHCPGN WHSX HG MOY VUKY ZSHHK.UL PZ MH WYSYVKUMY U BPWMHKE HBYK YBYKEVHXE, U WKPWRYM WOPKIYX PG UWKUWR PG MOY CUSS. U WHWR WKHCYX ZUK HZZ UGX UGHMOYK KYISPYX GYUKVE. MOY LOHAMPGN PG MOY MUBYKG OUX XPYX XHCG; HGSE MOY THUGPGN HZ MOYUXQAMUGM CUL OYUKX. GUMULOU LUM AI."LHGEU, UKY EHA ULSYYI? TUTTU?" LOY COPLIYKYX.GH HGY KYISPYX. GUMULOU KHLY LSHCSE UGX WUKYZASSE, WKHLLYX OYKLYSZ, UGXLMYIIYX WUAMPHALSE HG MOY WHSX UGX XPKME ZSHHK CPMO OYK LSPT, LAIISY,VUKY ZYYM. MOY VHUKXL HZ MOY ZSHHK WKYURYX. LMYIIPGN WUAMPHALSE ZKHT HGYZHHM MH MOY HMOYK LOY KUG SPRY U RPMMYG MOY ZYC LMYIL MH MOY XHHK UGXNKULIYX MOY WHSX XHHK OUGXSY.PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM LHTYMOPGN OYUBE CUL VYUMPGN KOEMOTPWUSSE UNUPGLMUSS MOY CUSSL HZ MOY KHHT: PM CUL OYK HCG OYUKM, LPGRPGN CPMO USUKT UGXMYKKHK UGX HBYKZSHCPGN CPMO SHBY.LOY HIYGYX MOY XHHK UGX LMYIIYX UWKHLL MOY MOKYLOHSX UGX HGMH MOY WHSX,XUTI YUKMOYG ZSHHK HZ MOY IULLUNY. MOY WHSX LOY ZYSM KYZKYLOYX OYK. CPMOOYK VUKY ZYYM LOY MHAWOYX U LSYYIPGN TUG, LMYIIYX HBYK OPT, UGX HIYGYXMOY XHHK PGMH MOY IUKM HZ MOY OAM COYKY IKPGWY UGXKYC SUE. PM CUL XUKRPG MOYKY. PG MOY ZUKMOYLM WHKGYK, HG U VYGWO VYLPXY U VYX HG COPWOLHTYMOPGN CUL SEPGN, LMHHX U MUSSHC WUGXSY CPMO U SHGN, MOPWR, UGXLTHSXYKPGN CPWR.ZKHT MOY THTYGM LOY OUX VYYG MHSX MOUM THKGPGN HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L CHAGXUGX OPL IKYLYGWY MOYKY, GUMULOU OUX KYLHSBYX MH LYY OPT. LOY XPX GHMRGHC COE LOY OUX MH, LOY RGYC MOY TYYMPGN CHASX VY IUPGZAS, VAM ZYSM MOYTHKY WHGBPGWYX MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE.USS XUE LOY OUX SPBYX HGSE PG OHIY HZ LYYPGN OPT MOUM GPNOM. VAM GHCMOUM MOY THTYGM OUX WHTY LOY CUL ZPSSYX CPMO XKYUX HZ COUM LOY TPNOMLYY. OHC CUL OY TUPTYX? COUM CUL SYZM HZ OPT? CUL OY SPRY MOUM PGWYLLUGMTHUGPGN HZ MOY UXQAMUGM'L? EYL, OY CUL USMHNYMOYK SPRY MOUM. PG OYKPTUNPGUMPHG OY CUL MOUM MYKKPVSY THUGPGN IYKLHGPZPYX. COYG LOY LUC UGPGXPLMPGWM LOUIY PG MOY WHKGYK, UGX TPLMHHR OPL RGYYL KUPLYX AGXYK MOYJAPSM ZHK OPL LOHASXYKL, LOY PTUNPGYX U OHKKPVSY VHXE MOYKY, UGX LMHHXLMPSS PG MYKKHK. VAM UG PKKYLPLMPVSY PTIASLY XKYC OYK ZHKCUKX. LOYWUAMPHALSE MHHR HGY LMYI UGX MOYG UGHMOYK, UGX ZHAGX OYKLYSZ PG MOYTPXXSY HZ U LTUSS KHHT WHGMUPGPGN VUNNUNY. UGHMOYK TUG--MPTHROPG--CULSEPGN PG U WHKGYK HG MOY VYGWOYL VYGYUMO MOY PWHGL, UGX MCH HMOYKL--MOYXHWMHK UGX U BUSYM--SUE HG MOY ZSHHK.MOY BUSYM LUM AI UGX COPLIYKYX LHTYMOPGN. MPTHROPG, RYIM UCURY VE MOYIUPG PG OPL CHAGXYX SYN, NUFYX CPMO CPXY-HIYG YEYL UM MOPL LMKUGNYUIIUKPMPHG HZ U NPKS PG U COPMY WOYTPLY, XKYLLPGN QUWRYM, UGX GPNOMWUI.MOY BUSYM'L LSYYIE, ZKPNOMYGYX YDWSUTUMPHG, "COUM XH EHA CUGM? COUM'LMOY TUMMYK?" TUXY GUMULOU UIIKHUWO THKY LCPZMSE MH COUM CUL SEPGN PG MOYWHKGYK. OHKKPVSE AGSPRY U TUG UL MOUM VHXE SHHRYX, LOY TALM LYY OPT.LOY IULLYX MOY BUSYM, MOY LGAZZ ZYSS ZKHT MOY WUGXSY CPWR, UGX LOY LUCIKPGWY UGXKYC WSYUKSE CPMO OPL UKTL HAMLPXY MOY JAPSM, UGX LAWO UL LOYOUX USCUEL LYYG OPT.OY CUL MOY LUTY UL YBYK, VAM MOY ZYBYKPLO WHSHK HZ OPL ZUWY, OPLNSPMMYKPGN YEYL KUIMAKHALSE MAKGYX MHCUKX OYK, UGX YLIYWPUSSE OPL GYWR,XYSPWUMY UL U WOPSX'L, KYBYUSYX VE MOY MAKG-XHCG WHSSUK HZ OPL LOPKM,NUBY OPT U IYWASPUKSE PGGHWYGM, WOPSXSPRY SHHR, LAWO UL LOY OUX GYBYKLYYG HG OPT VYZHKY. LOY CYGM AI MH OPT UGX CPMO U LCPZM, ZSYDPVSY,EHAMOZAS THBYTYGM XKHIIYX HG OYK RGYYL.OY LTPSYX UGX OYSX HAM OPL OUGX MH OYK.WOUIMYK DDDPPLYBYG XUEL OUX IULLYX LPGWY IKPGWY UGXKYC ZHAGX OPTLYSZ PG MOYUTVASUGWY LMUMPHG HG MOY ZPYSX HZ VHKHXPGH. OPL ZYBYKPLO LMUMY UGX MOYPGZSUTTUMPHG HZ OPL VHCYSL, COPWO CYKY PGQAKYX, CYKY PG MOY XHWMHK'LHIPGPHG LAKY MH WUKKE OPT HZZ. VAM HG MOY LYBYGMO XUE OY UMY CPMOISYULAKY U IPYWY HZ VKYUX CPMO LHTY MYU, UGX MOY XHWMHK GHMPWYX MOUM OPLMYTIYKUMAKY CUL SHCYK. OY OUX KYNUPGYX WHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM THKGPGN.MOY ZPKLM GPNOM UZMYK MOYE SYZM THLWHC OUX VYYG ZUPKSE CUKT UGX OY OUXKYTUPGYX PG MOY WUSYWOY, VAM UM TEMPLOWOP MOY CHAGXYX TUG OPTLYSZ ULRYXMH VY MURYG HAM UGX NPBYG LHTY MYU. MOY IUPG WUALYX VE OPL KYTHBUS PGMHMOY OAM OUX TUXY OPT NKHUG USHAX UGX UNUPG SHLY WHGLWPHALGYLL. COYG OYOUX VYYG ISUWYX HG OPL WUTI VYX OY SUE ZHK U SHGN MPTY THMPHGSYLL CPMOWSHLYX YEYL. MOYG OY HIYGYX MOYT UGX COPLIYKYX LHZMSE: "UGX MOY MYU?"OPL KYTYTVYKPGN LAWO U LTUSS XYMUPS HZ YBYKEXUE SPZY ULMHGPLOYXMOY XHWMHK. OY ZYSM IKPGWY UGXKYC'L IASLY, UGX MH OPL LAKIKPLY UGXXPLLUMPLZUWMPHG ZHAGX PM OUX PTIKHBYX. OY CUL XPLLUMPLZPYX VYWUALY OYRGYC VE YDIYKPYGWY MOUM PZ OPL IUMPYGM XPX GHM XPY GHC, OY CHASX XH LHU SPMMSY SUMYK CPMO NKYUMYK LAZZYKPGN. MPTHROPG, MOY KYX-GHLYX TUQHK HZIKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYNPTYGM, OUX QHPGYX OPT PG THLWHC UGX CUL VYPGNMURYG USHGN CPMO OPT, OUBPGN VYYG CHAGXYX PG MOY SYN UM MOY VUMMSY HZVHKHXPGH. MOYE CYKY UWWHTIUGPYX VE U XHWMHK, IKPGWY UGXKYC'L BUSYM, OPLWHUWOTUG, UGX MCH HKXYKSPYL.MOYE NUBY IKPGWY UGXKYC LHTY MYU. OY XKUGR PM YUNYKSE, SHHRPGN CPMOZYBYKPLO YEYL UM MOY XHHK PG ZKHGM HZ OPT UL PZ MKEPGN MH AGXYKLMUGX UGXKYTYTVYK LHTYMOPGN."P XHG'M CUGM UGE THKY. PL MPTHROPG OYKY?" OY ULRYX.MPTHROPG WKYIM USHGN MOY VYGWO MH OPT."P UT OYKY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE.""OHC'L EHAK CHAGX?""TPGY, LPK? USS KPNOM. VAM OHC UVHAM EHA?"IKPGWY UGXKYC UNUPG IHGXYKYX UL PZ MKEPGN MH KYTYTVYK LHTYMOPGN."WHASXG'M HGY NYM U VHHR?" OY ULRYX."COUM VHHR?""MOY NHLIYSL. P OUBYG'M HGY."MOY XHWMHK IKHTPLYX MH IKHWAKY PM ZHK OPT UGX VYNUG MH ULR OHC OYCUL ZYYSPGN. IKPGWY UGXKYC UGLCYKYX USS OPL JAYLMPHGL KYSAWMUGMSE VAMKYULHGUVSE, UGX MOYG LUPX OY CUGMYX U VHSLMYK ISUWYX AGXYK OPT UL OY CULAGWHTZHKMUVSY UGX PG NKYUM IUPG. MOY XHWMHK UGX BUSYM SPZMYX MOY WSHURCPMO COPWO OY CUL WHBYKYX UGX, TURPGN CKE ZUWYL UM MOY GHPLHTY LTYSS HZTHKMPZEPGN ZSYLO MOUM WUTY ZKHT MOY CHAGX, VYNUG YDUTPGPGN MOUM XKYUXZASISUWY. MOY XHWMHK CUL BYKE TAWO XPLISYULYX UVHAM LHTYMOPGN UGX TUXY UWOUGNY PG MOY XKYLLPGNL, MAKGPGN MOY CHAGXYX TUG HBYK LH MOUM OY NKHUGYXUNUPG UGX NKYC AGWHGLWPHAL UGX XYSPKPHAL ZKHT MOY UNHGE. OY RYIM ULRPGNMOYT MH NYM OPT MOY VHHR UGX IAM PM AGXYK OPT."COUM MKHAVSY CHASX PM VY MH EHA?" OY LUPX. "P OUBY GHM NHM HGY. ISYULYNYM PM ZHK TY UGX IAM PM AGXYK ZHK U THTYGM," OY ISYUXYX PG U IPMYHALBHPWY.MOY XHWMHK CYGM PGMH MOY IULLUNY MH CULO OPL OUGXL."EHA ZYSSHCL OUBY GH WHGLWPYGWY," LUPX OY MH MOY BUSYM COH CUL IHAKPGNCUMYK HBYK OPL OUGXL. "ISYULY NH UCUE,TUXUT!"UM MOUM THTYGM U TUPX LYGM VE MOY WHAGMYLL, COH OUX GHMPWYX OYKXUANOMYK'L UVLYGWY, RGHWRYX UM MOY XHHK.SPRY U LHTGUTVASPLM UKHALYX ZKHT OYK LSYYI GUMULOU CYGM HAM HZ MOY KHHTUGX, KYMAKGPGN MH OYK OAM, ZYSS LHVVPGN HG OYK VYX.ZKHT MOUM MPTY, XAKPGN USS MOY KYLM HZ MOY KHLMHBL' QHAKGYE, UM YBYKEOUSMPGN ISUWY UGX COYKYBYK MOYE LIYGM U GPNOM, GUMULOU GYBYK SYZM MOYCHAGXYX VHSRHGLRP, UGX MOY XHWMHK OUX MH UXTPM MOUM OY OUX GHM YDIYWMYXZKHT U EHAGN NPKS YPMOYK LAWO ZPKTGYLL HK LAWO LRPSS PG GAKLPGN UCHAGXYX TUG.XKYUXZAS UL MOY WHAGMYLL PTUNPGYX PM CHASX VY LOHASX IKPGWY UGXKYCXPY PG OYK XUANOMYK'L UKTL XAKPGN MOY QHAKGYE--UL, QAXNPGN VE COUMMOY XHWMHK LUPX, PM LYYTYX TPNOM YULPSE OUIIYG--LOY WHASX GHM HIIHLYGUMULOU. MOHANO CPMO MOY PGMPTUWE GHC YLMUVSPLOYX VYMCYYG MOY CHAGXYXTUG UGX GUMULOU MOY MOHANOM HWWAKKYX MOUM LOHASX OY KYWHBYK MOYPK ZHKTYKYGNUNYTYGM CHASX VY KYGYCYX, GH HGY--SYULM HZ USS GUMULOU UGX IKPGWYUGXKYC--LIHRY HZ MOPL: MOY AGLYMMSYX JAYLMPHG HZ SPZY UGX XYUMO, COPWOOAGN GHM HGSE HBYK VHSRHGLRP VAM HBYK USS KALLPU, LOAM HAM USS HMOYKWHGLPXYKUMPHGL.WOUIMYK DDDPPPHG MOY MOPKX HZ LYIMYTVYK IPYKKY UCHRY SUMY. OPL OYUX CUL UWOPGN, MOYWSHMOYL PG COPWO OY OUX LSYIM CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN ZYSM AGWHTZHKMUVSY HGOPL VHXE, UGX OPL TPGX OUX U XPT WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ LHTYMOPGN LOUTYZASOY OUX XHGY MOY XUE VYZHKY. "GH, IKHVUVSE OY CHG'M TURY OPL YGMKEPGMH THLWHC VYZHKY GHHG."IPYKKY XPX GHM USSHC OPTLYSZ MH KYZSYWM HG COUM SUE VYZHKY OPT, VAMOULMYGYX MH UWM.UZMYK UKKUGNPGN OPL WSHMOYL, OY MHHR MOY IPLMHS UGX CUL UVHAM MH NH HAM.VAM PM MOYG HWWAKKYX MH OPT ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOUM OY WYKMUPGSE WHASXGHM WUKKE MOY CYUIHG PG OPL OUGX MOKHANO MOY LMKYYML. VYLPXYL OPLOYPNOM UGX LMHAMGYLL, UGX MOY LMKUGNY THKHLY SHHR HZ LAZZYKPGN PG OPLZUWY UGX COHSY ZPNAKY, MOY KALLPUGL LMUKYX UM IPYKKY VYWUALY MOYE WHASXGHM TURY HAM MH COUM WSULL OY WHASX VYSHGN. MOY ZKYGWO ZHSSHCYX OPT CPMOULMHGPLOTYGM PG MOYPK YEYL WOPYZSE VYWUALY IPYKKY, AGSPRY USS MOYHMOYK KALLPUGL COH NUFYX UM MOY ZKYGWO CPMO ZYUK UGX WAKPHLPME, IUPX GHUMMYGMPHG MH MOYT. UM MOY NUMY HZ HGY OHALY MOKYY ZKYGWOTYG, COH CYKYYDISUPGPGN LHTYMOPGN MH LHTY KALLPUGL COH XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYT,LMHIIYX IPYKKY ULRPGN PZ OY XPX GHM RGHC ZKYGWO.IPYKKY LOHHR OPL OYUX UGX CYGM HG. PG UGHMOYK LPXY LMKYYM U LYGMPGYSLMUGXPGN VYLPXY U NKYYG WUPLLHG LOHAMYX UM OPT, VAM HGSE COYG MOY LOHAMCUL MOKYUMYGPGNSE KYIYUMYX UGX OY OYUKX MOY WSPWR HZ MOY TUG'L TALRYM ULOY KUPLYX PM XPX IPYKKY AGXYKLMUGX MOUM OY OUX MH IULL HG MOY HMOYK LPXYHZ MOY LMKYYM. OY OYUKX GHMOPGN UGX LUC GHMOPGN HZ COUM CYGM HG UKHAGXOPT. OY WUKKPYX OPL KYLHSAMPHG CPMOPG OPTLYSZ PG MYKKHK UGX OULMY, SPRYLHTYMOPGN XKYUXZAS UGX USPYG MH OPT, ZHK, UZMYK MOY IKYBPHAL GPNOM'LYDIYKPYGWY, OY CUL UZKUPX HZ SHLPGN PM. SUTYGMYX UGPLRU, COH UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY ZPKY ZYSM MOUM LOYMHH TALM NPBY YDIKYLLPHG MH OYK ZYYSPGNL.IPYKKY KALOYX MH MOY CPGN, VAM MOY OYUM CUL LH NKYUM MOUM OYPGBHSAGMUKPSE IULLYX KHAGX PG U WAKBY UGX WUTY AIHG MOY SUKNY OHALYMOUM CUL UL EYM VAKGPGN HGSE UM HGY YGX, QALM VYSHC MOY KHHZ, UGX UKHAGXCOPWO LCUKTYX U WKHCX HZ ZKYGWOTYG. UM ZPKLM IPYKKY XPX GHM KYUSPFYCOUM MOYLY TYG, COH CYKY XKUNNPGN LHTYMOPGN HAM, CYKY UVHAM; VAM LYYPGNVYZHKY OPT U ZKYGWOTUG OPMMPGN U IYULUGM CPMO U VSAGM LUVYK UGX MKEPGNMH MURY ZKHT OPT U ZHD-ZAK WHUM, OY BUNAYSE AGXYKLMHHX MOUM SHHMPGN CULNHPGN HG MOYKY, VAM OY OUX GH MPTY MH XCYSS HG MOUM PXYU.MOY LHAGXL HZ WKUWRSPGN UGX MOY XPG HZ ZUSSPGN CUSSL UGX WYPSPGNL, MOYCOPLMSY UGX OPLL HZ MOY ZSUTYL, MOY YDWPMYX LOHAML HZ MOY IYHISY, UGXMOY LPNOM HZ MOY LCUEPGN LTHRY, GHC NUMOYKPGN PGMH MOPWR VSUWR WSHAXLUGX GHC LHUKPGN AI CPMO NSPMMYKPGN LIUKRL, CPMO OYKY UGX MOYKY XYGLYLOYUBYL HZ ZSUTY (GHC KYX UGX GHC SPRY NHSXYG ZPLO LWUSYL WKYYIPGN USHGNMOY CUSSL), UGX MOY OYUM UGX LTHRY UGX KUIPXPME HZ THMPHG, IKHXAWYXHG IPYKKY MOY ALAUS UGPTUMPGN YZZYWML HZ U WHGZSUNKUMPHG. PM OUX UIYWASPUKSE LMKHGN YZZYWM HG OPT VYWUALY UM MOY LPNOM HZ MOY ZPKY OY ZYSMOPTLYSZ LAXXYGSE ZKYYX ZKHT MOY PXYUL MOUM OUX CYPNOYX OPT XHCG. OY ZYSMEHAGN, VKPNOM, UXKHPM, UGX KYLHSAMY. OYK ZUWY LMKAWR IPYKKY UGX,OAKKEPGN USHGN VE MOY ZYGWY, OY MAKGYX LYBYKUS MPTYL MH SHHR UM OYK.COYG OY OUX KYUWOYX MOY ZYGWY, LMPSS CPMOHAM ZPGXPGN MOHLY OY LHANOM, OYLMHIIYX UGX SHHRYX UVHAM OPT.CPMO MOY WOPSX PG OPL UKTL OPL ZPNAKY CUL GHC THKY WHGLIPWAHAL MOUGVYZHKY, UGX U NKHAI HZ KALLPUGL, VHMO TYG UGX CHTYG, NUMOYKYX UVHAM OPT."OUBY EHA SHLM UGEHGY, TE XYUK ZYSSHC? MOYE ULRYX OPT.IPYKKY KYISPYX MOUM MOY WOPSX VYSHGNYX MH U CHTUG PG U VSUWR WHUM COHOUX VYYG LPMMPGN MOYKY CPMO OYK HMOYK WOPSXKYG, UGX OY ULRYX COYMOYKUGEHGY RGYC COYKY LOY OUX NHGY."COE, MOUM TALM VY MOY UGZYKHBL," LUPX UG HSX XYUWHG, UXXKYLLPGN UIHWRTUKRYX IYULUGM CHTUG. "SHKX OUBY TYKWE, SHKX OUBY TYKWE!" OY UXXYXPG OPL WALMHTUKE VULL."MOY UGZYKHBL? GH," LUPX MOY CHTUG. "MOYE SYZM PG MOY THKGPGN. MOUM TALMVY YPMOYK TUKE GPRHSPYBGU'L HK MOY PBUGHBL'!""OY LUEL 'U CHTUG,' UGX TUKE GPRHSPYBGU PL U SUXE," KYTUKRYX U OHALYLYKZ."XH EHA RGHC OYK? LOY'L MOPG, CPMO SHGN MYYMO," LUPX IPYKKY."MOUM'L TUKE GPRHSPYBGU! MOYE CYGM PGLPXY MOY NUKXYG COYG MOYLY CHSBYLLCHHIYX XHCG," LUPX MOY CHTUG, IHPGMPGN MH MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL."H SHKX, OUBY TYKWE!" UXXYX MOY XYUWHG."NH HBYK MOUM CUE, MOYE'KY MOYKY. PM'L LOY! LOY RYIM HG SUTYGMPGN UGXWKEPGN," WHGMPGAYX MOY CHTUG. "PM'L LOY. OYKY, MOPL CUE!"VAM IPYKKY CUL GHM SPLMYGPGN MH MOY CHTUG. OY OUX ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL VYYGPGMYGMSE CUMWOPGN COUM CUL NHPGN HG U ZYC LMYIL UCUE. OY CUL SHHRPGN UMMOY UKTYGPUG ZUTPSE UGX UM MCH ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL COH OUX NHGY AI MH MOYT.HGY HZ MOYLY, U GPTVSY SPMMSY TUG, CUL CYUKPGN U VSAY WHUM MPYX KHAGXMOY CUPLM CPMO U KHIY. OY OUX U GPNOMWUI HG OPL OYUX UGX OPL ZYYM CYKYVUKY. MOY HMOYK, COHLY UIIYUKUGWY IUKMPWASUKSE LMKAWR IPYKKY, CUL USHGN, SUGR, KHAGX-LOHASXYKYX, ZUPK-OUPKYX TUG, LSHC PG OPL THBYTYGMLUGX CPMO UG PXPHMPW YDIKYLLPHG HZ ZUWY. YBYKEHGY VYSPYBYX MOY BPWMHKEMH OUBY VYYG WHTISYMY, UGX LHTY YBYG LIHRY HZ GUIHSYHG'L OUBPGN VYYGWUIMAKYX, HZ OPL XYIHLPMPHG, UGX HZ MOY WOHPWY HZ U GYC KASYK ZHKZKUGWY.PM PL BYKE XPZZPWASM ZHK YBYGML MH VY KYZSYWMYX PG MOYPK KYUS LMKYGNMOUGX WHTISYMYGYLL UTPX MOY WHGXPMPHGL HZ WHAKM SPZY UGX ZUK ZKHT MOYLWYGY HZ UWMPHG. TYGMPHG CUL TUXY PG RAMAFHB'L KYIHKM HZ MOY KALLPUG SHLLYL,UTHGN COPWO ZPNAKYX MOY GUTYL HZ MAWORHB, VUNKUMPHG, UGX RAMUELHB. PGMOY IYMYKLVAKN CHKSX MOPL LUX LPXY HZ MOY UZZUPK UNUPG PGBHSAGMUKPSEWYGMYKYX KHAGX U LPGNSY PGWPXYGM: RAMUELHB'L XYUMO. YBYKEVHXE RGYCOPT, MOY YTIYKHK SPRYX OPT, UGX OY CUL EHAGN UGX PGMYKYLMPGN. MOUM XUEYBYKEHGY TYM CPMO MOY CHKXL:"COUM U CHGXYKZAS WHPGWPXYGWY! QALM XAKPGN MOY LYKBPWY. VAM COUM U SHLLRAMUELHB PL! OHC LHKKE P UT!""COUM XPX P MYSS UVHAM RAMAFHB?" IKPGWY BULPSP GHC LUPX CPMO UIKHIOYM'L IKPXY. "P USCUEL LUPX OY CUL MOY HGSE TUG WUIUVSY HZ XYZYUMPGNGUIHSYHG."VAM GYDM XUE GH GYCL UKKPBYX ZKHT MOY UKTE UGX MOY IAVSPW THHX NKYCUGDPHAL. MOY WHAKMPYKL LAZZYKYX VYWUALY HZ MOY LAZZYKPGN MOY LALIYGLYHWWULPHGYX MOY YTIYKHK."ZUGWE MOY YTIYKHK'L IHLPMPHG!" LUPX MOYE, UGX PGLMYUX HZ YDMHSSPGNRAMAFHB UL MOYE OUX XHGY MOY XUE VYZHKY, MOYE WHGXYTGYX OPT UL MOY WUALYHZ MOY YTIYKHK'L UGDPYME. HZZPWPUSSE, UM SUKNYNUMOYKPGNL, YBYKEHGY LUPX MOUM WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU OUX XPYX HZ UMYKKPVSY UMMUWR HZ UGNPGU IYWMHKPL, VAM PG PGMPTUMY WPKWSYL XYMUPSLCYKY TYGMPHGYX HZ OHC MOY IKPBUMY IOELPWPUG HZ MOY JAYYG HZ LIUPG OUXIKYLWKPVYX LTUSS XHLYL HZ U WYKMUPG XKAN MH IKHXAWY U WYKMUPG YZZYWM;VAM OYSYGY, MHKMAKYX VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY HSX WHAGM LALIYWMYX OYK UGXMOUM OYK OALVUGX MH COHT LOY OUX CKPMMYG (MOUM CKYMWOYX, IKHZSPNUMYIPYKKY) OUX GHM KYISPYX, OUX LAXXYGSE MURYG U BYKE SUKNY XHLY HZ MOYXKAN, UGX OUX XPYX PG UNHGE VYZHKY ULLPLMUGWY WHASX VY KYGXYKYX OYK.PM CUL LUPX MOUM IKPGWY BULPSP UGX MOY HSX WHAGM OUX MAKGYX AIHG MOYPMUSPUG, VAM MOY SUMMYK OUX IKHXAWYX LAWO SYMMYKL ZKHT MOY AGZHKMAGUMYXYWYULYX MOUM MOYE OUX PTTYXPUMYSE SYM MOY TUMMYK XKHI.MUSR PG NYGYKUS WYGMYKYX KHAGX MOKYY TYSUGWOHSE ZUWML: MOY YTIYKHK'LSUWR HZ GYCL, MOY SHLL HZ RAMAFHB, UGX MOY XYUMO HZ OYSYGY.HG MOY MOPKX XUE UZMYK RAMAFHB'L KYIHKM U WHAGMKE NYGMSYTUG UKKPBYX ZKHTTHLWHC, UGX GYCL HZ MOY LAKKYGXYK HZ THLWHC MH MOY ZKYGWO LIKYUX MOKHANOMOY COHSY MHCG. MOPL CUL MYKKPVSY! COUM U IHLPMPHG ZHK MOY YTIYKHK MHVY PG! RAMAFHB CUL U MKUPMHK, UGX IKPGWY BULPSP XAKPGN MOY BPLPML HZWHGXHSYGWY IUPX MH OPT HG MOY HWWULPHG HZ OPL XUANOMYK'L XYUMO LUPX HZRAMAFHB, COHT OY OUX ZHKTYKSE IKUPLYX (PM CUL YDWALUVSY ZHK OPT PG OPLNKPYZ MH ZHKNYM COUM OY OUX LUPX), MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH YDIYWMUGEMOPGN YSLY ZKHT U VSPGX UGX XYIKUBYX HSX TUG."P HGSE CHGXYK MOUM MOY ZUMY HZ KALLPU WHASX OUBY VYYG YGMKALMYX MH LAWOU TUG."UL SHGN UL MOPL GYCL KYTUPGYX AGHZZPWPUS PM CUL IHLLPVSY MH XHAVM PM,VAM MOY GYDM XUE MOY ZHSSHCPGN WHTTAGPWUMPHG CUL KYWYPBYX ZKHT WHAGMKHLMHIWOPG:IKPGWY RAMAFHB'L UXQAMUGM OUL VKHANOM TY U SYMMYK PG COPWO OY XYTUGXLIHSPWY HZZPWYKL MH NAPXY MOY UKTE MH MOY KEUFUG KHUX. P OUBYOUX YBYKEMOPGN KYTHBYX, UGX PM HGSE KYTUPGL ZHK TY MH CYYI HBYK MOY ZUMYHZ TE ZUMOYKSUGX.HG KYWYPBPGN MOPL XPLIUMWO MOY YTIYKHK LYGM IKPGWY BHSRHGLRP MH RAMAFHBCPMO MOY ZHSSHCPGN KYLWKPIM:IKPGWY TPWOUYS PSUKPHGHBPWO! LPGWY MOY MCYGME-GPGMO HZ UANALM P OUBYKYWYPBYX GH WHTTAGPWUMPHG ZKHT EHA, EYM HG MOY ZPKLM HZ LYIMYTVYK PKYWYPBYX ZKHT MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ HZ THLWHC, BPU EUKHLSUBS, MOY LUXGYCL MOUM EHA, CPMO MOY UKTE, OUBY XYWPXYX MH UVUGXHG THLWHC. P UT LYGXPGN MOPL VE UXQAMUGM-NYGYKUS IKPGWYBHSRHGLRP, MH OYUK ZKHT EHA MOY LPMAUMPHG HZ MOY UKTE UGX MOY KYULHGLMOUM OUBY PGXAWYX EHA MH MURY MOPL TYSUGWOHSE XYWPLPHG.WOUIMYK PPPGPGY XUEL UZMYK MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ THLWHC, U TYLLYGNYK ZKHT RAMAFHBKYUWOYX IYMYKLVAKN CPMO MOY HZZPWPUS UGGHAGWYTYGM HZ MOUM YBYGM. MOPLTYLLYGNYK CUL TPWOUAX, U ZKYGWOTUG COH XPX GHM RGHC KALLPUG, VAM COH CULJAHPJAY YMKUGNYK, KALLY XY WHYAK YM X'UTY, * UL OY LUPX HZ OPTLYSZ.    * MOHANO U ZHKYPNGYK, KALLPUG PG OYUKM UGX LHAS.MOY YTIYKHK UM HGWY KYWYPBYX MOPL TYLLYGNYK PG OPL LMAXE UM MOY IUSUWYHG LMHGY PLSUGX. TPWOUAX, COH OUX GYBYK LYYG THLWHC VYZHKY MOY WUTIUPNGUGX COH XPX GHM RGHC KALLPUG, EYM ZYSM XYYISE THBYX (UL OY CKHMY) COYGOY UIIYUKYX VYZHKY GHMKY MKYL NKUWPYAD LHABYKUPG * CPMO MOY GYCL HZ MOYVAKGPGN HZ THLWHC, XHGM SYL ZSUTTYL YWSUPKUPYGM LU KHAMY. *(2)     * HAK THLM NKUWPHAL LHBYKYPNG.     * (2) COHLY ZSUTYL PSSATPGYX OPL KHAMY.MOHANO MOY LHAKWY HZ T. TPWOUAX'L WOUNKPG TALM OUBY VYYG XPZZYKYGM ZKHTMOUM COPWO WUALYX KALLPUGL MH NKPYBY, OY OUX LAWO U LUX ZUWY COYG LOHCGPGMH MOY YTIYKHK'L LMAXE MOUM MOY SUMMYK UM HGWY ULRYX:"OUBY EHA VKHANOM TY LUX GYCL, WHSHGYS?""BYKE LUX, LPKY," KYISPYX TPWOUAX, SHCYKPGN OPL YEYL CPMO U LPNO. "MOYUVUGXHGTYGM HZ THLWHC.""OUBY MOYE LAKKYGXYKYX TE UGWPYGM WUIPMUS CPMOHAM U VUMMSY?" ULRYX MOYYTIYKHK JAPWRSE, OPL ZUWY LAXXYGSE ZSALOPGN.TPWOUAX KYLIYWMZASSE XYSPBYKYX MOY TYLLUNY RAMAFHB OUX YGMKALMYX MH OPT,COPWO CUL MOUM PM OUX VYYG PTIHLLPVSY MH ZPNOM VYZHKY THLWHC, UGX MOUMUL MOY HGSE KYTUPGPGN WOHPWY CUL VYMCYYG SHLPGN MOY UKTE UL CYSS ULTHLWHC, HK SHLPGN THLWHC USHGY, MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS OUX MH WOHHLY MOYSUMMYK.MOY YTIYKHK SPLMYGYX PG LPSYGWY, GHM SHHRPGN UM TPWOUAX."OUL MOY YGYTE YGMYKYX MOY WPME?"
