P SYZM PM USS PG ZSUTYL,"KYISPYX TPWOUAX PG U XYWPXYX MHGY, VAM NSUGWPGN UM MOY YTIYKHK OY CULZKPNOMYGYX VE COUM OY OUX XHGY.MOY YTIYKHK VYNUG MH VKYUMOY OYUBPSE UGX KUIPXSE, OPL SHCYK SPIMKYTVSYX, UGX MYUKL PGLMUGMSE UIIYUKYX PG OPL ZPGY VSAY YEYL.VAM MOPL SULMYX HGSE U THTYGM. OY LAXXYGSE ZKHCGYX, UL PZ VSUTPGNOPTLYSZ ZHK OPL CYURGYLL, UGX KUPLPGN OPL OYUX UXXKYLLYX TPWOUAX PG UZPKT BHPWY:"P LYY, WHSHGYS, ZKHT USS MOUM PL OUIIYGPGN, MOUM IKHBPXYGWY KYJAPKYLNKYUM LUWKPZPWYL HZ AL... P UT KYUXE MH LAVTPM TELYSZ PG USS MOPGNL MHOPL CPSS; VAM MYSS TY, TPWOUAX, OHC XPX EHA SYUBY MOY UKTE COYG PMLUC TE UGWPYGM WUIPMUS UVUGXHGYX CPMOHAM U VUMMSY? XPX EHA GHM GHMPWYXPLWHAKUNYTYGM?..."LYYPGN MOUM OPL THLM NKUWPHAL KASYK CUL WUST HGWY THKY, TPWOUAX USLHNKYC WUST, VAM CUL GHM PTTYXPUMYSE KYUXE MH KYISE MH MOY YTIYKHK'LXPKYWM UGX KYSYBUGM JAYLMPHG COPWO KYJAPKYX U XPKYWM UGLCYK."LPKY, CPSS EHA USSHC TY MH LIYUR ZKUGRSE UL VYZPML U SHEUS LHSXPYK?" OYULRYX MH NUPG MPTY."WHSHGYS, P USCUEL KYJAPKY PM," KYISPYX MOY YTIYKHK. "WHGWYUS GHMOPGNZKHT TY, P CPLO MH RGHC UVLHSAMYSE OHC MOPGNL UKY.""LPKY!" LUPX TPWOUAX CPMO U LAVMSY, LWUKWYSE IYKWYIMPVSY LTPSY HG OPLSPIL, OUBPGN GHC IKYIUKYX U CYSS-IOKULYX KYISE, "LPKY, P SYZM MOYCOHSY UKTE, ZKHT PML WOPYZL MH MOY SHCYLM LHSXPYK, CPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG PGXYLIYKUMY UGX UNHGPFYX MYKKHK...""OHC PL MOUM?" MOY YTIYKHK PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, ZKHCGPGN LMYKGSE. "CHASXTPLZHKMAGY TURY TE KALLPUGL SHLY OYUKM?... GYBYK!"TPWOUAX OUX HGSE CUPMYX ZHK MOPL MH VKPGN HAM MOY IOKULY OY OUXIKYIUKYX."LPKY," OY LUPX, CPMO KYLIYWMZAS ISUEZASGYLL, "MOYE UKY HGSE UZKUPX SYLMEHAK TUQYLME, PG MOY NHHXGYLL HZ EHAK OYUKM, LOHASX USSHC EHAKLYSZ MH VYIYKLAUXYX MH TURY IYUWY. MOYE UKY VAKGPGN ZHK MOY WHTVUM," XYWSUKYX MOPLKYIKYLYGMUMPBY HZ MOY KALLPUG GUMPHG, "UGX MH IKHBY MH EHAK TUQYLME VEMOY LUWKPZPWY HZ MOYPK SPBYL OHC XYBHMYX MOYE UKY....""UO!" LUPX MOY YTIYKHK KYULLAKYX, UGX CPMO U RPGXSE NSYUT PG OPL YEYL,OY IUMMYX TPWOUAX HG MOY LOHASXYK. "EHA LYM TY UM YULY, WHSHGYS."OY VYGM OPL OYUX UGX CUL LPSYGM ZHK LHTY MPTY."CYSS, MOYG, NH VUWR MH MOY UKTE," OY LUPX, XKUCPGN OPTLYSZ AI MH OPLZASS OYPNOM UGX UXXKYLLPGN TPWOUAX CPMO U NKUWPHAL UGX TUQYLMPW NYLMAKY,"UGX MYSS HAK VKUBY TYG UGX USS TE NHHX LAVQYWML COYKYBYK EHA NH MOUMCOYG P OUBY GHM U LHSXPYK SYZM P LOUSS IAM TELYSZ UM MOY OYUX HZ TEVYSHBYX GHVPSPME UGX TE NHHX IYULUGML UGX LH ALY MOY SULM KYLHAKWYL HZTE YTIPKY. PM LMPSS HZZYKL TY THKY MOUG TE YGYTPYL LAIIHLY," LUPX MOYYTIYKHK NKHCPGN THKY UGX THKY UGPTUMYX; "VAM LOHASX PM YBYK VY HKXUPGYXVE XPBPGY IKHBPXYGWY," OY WHGMPGAYX, KUPLPGN MH OYUBYG OPL ZPGY YEYLLOPGPGN CPMO YTHMPHG, "MOUM TE XEGULME LOHASX WYULY MH KYPNG HG MOYMOKHGY HZ TE UGWYLMHKL, MOYG UZMYK YDOUALMPGN USS MOY TYUGL UM TEWHTTUGX, P LOUSS SYM TE VYUKX NKHC MH OYKY" (OY IHPGMYX OUSZCUE XHCG OPLWOYLM) "UGX NH UGX YUM IHMUMHYL CPMO MOY TYUGYLM HZ TE IYULUGML, KUMOYKMOUG LPNG MOY XPLNKUWY HZ TE WHAGMKE UGX HZ TE VYSHBYX IYHISY COHLYLUWKPZPWYL P RGHC OHC MH UIIKYWPUMY."OUBPGN AMMYKYX MOYLY CHKXL PG UG UNPMUMYX BHPWY MOY YTIYKHK LAXXYGSEMAKGYX UCUE UL PZ MH OPXY ZKHT TPWOUAX MOY MYUKL MOUM KHLY MH OPL YEYL,UGX CYGM MH MOY ZAKMOYK YGX HZ OPL LMAXE. OUBPGN LMHHX MOYKY U ZYCTHTYGML, OY LMKHXY VUWR MH TPWOUAX UGX IKYLLYX OPL UKT VYSHC MOY YSVHCCPMO U BPNHKHAL THBYTYGM. MOY YTIYKHK'L TPSX UGX OUGXLHTY ZUWY CULZSALOYX UGX OPL YEYL NSYUTYX CPMO KYLHSAMPHG UGX UGNYK."WHSHGYS TPWOUAX, XH GHM ZHKNYM COUM P LUE MH EHA OYKY, IYKOUIL CY TUEKYWUSS PM CPMO ISYULAKY LHTYXUE... GUIHSYHG HK P," LUPX MOY YTIYKHK,MHAWOPGN OPL VKYULM. "CY WUG GH SHGNYK VHMO KYPNG MHNYMOYK. P OUBYSYUKGYX MH RGHC OPT, UGX OY CPSS GHM XYWYPBY TY UGE THKY...."UGX MOY YTIYKHK IUALYX, CPMO U ZKHCG.COYG OY OYUKX MOYLY CHKXL UGX LUC MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ ZPKT KYLHSAMPHGPG MOY YTIYKHK'L YEYL, TPWOUAX--JAHPJAY YMKUGNYK, KALLY XY WHYAK YMX'UTY--UM MOUM LHSYTG THTYGM ZYSM OPTLYSZ YGKUIMAKYX VE USS MOUM OY OUXOYUKX (UL OY ALYX UZMYKCUKXL MH LUE), UGX NUBY YDIKYLLPHG MH OPLHCG ZYYSPGNL UGX MOHLY HZ MOY KALLPUG IYHISY COHLY KYIKYLYGMUMPBY OYWHGLPXYKYX OPTLYSZ MH VY, PG MOY ZHSSHCPGN CHKXL:"LPKY!" LUPX OY, "EHAK TUQYLME PL UM MOPL THTYGM LPNGPGN MOY NSHKE HZMOY GUMPHG UGX MOY LUSBUMPHG HZ YAKHIY!"CPMO UG PGWSPGUMPHG HZ MOY OYUX MOY YTIYKHK XPLTPLLYX OPT.WOUIMYK PBPM PL GUMAKUS ZHK AL COH CYKY GHM SPBPGN PG MOHLY XUEL MH PTUNPGY MOUMCOYG OUSZ KALLPU OUX VYYG WHGJAYKYX UGX MOY PGOUVPMUGML CYKY ZSYYPGN MHXPLMUGM IKHBPGWYL, UGX HGY SYBE UZMYK UGHMOYK CUL VYPGN KUPLYX ZHK MOYXYZYGLY HZ MOY ZUMOYKSUGX, USS KALLPUGL ZKHT MOY NKYUMYLM MH MOY SYULMCYKY LHSYSE YGNUNYX PG LUWKPZPWPGN MOYTLYSBYL, LUBPGN MOYPK ZUMOYKSUGX,HK CYYIPGN HBYK PML XHCGZUSS. MOY MUSYL UGX XYLWKPIMPHGL HZ MOUM MPTYCPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG LIYUR HGSE HZ MOY LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY, IUMKPHMPW XYBHMPHG,XYLIUPK, NKPYZ, UGX MOY OYKHPLT HZ MOY KALLPUGL. VAM PM CUL GHM KYUSSELH. PM UIIYUKL LH MH AL VYWUALY CY LYY HGSE MOY NYGYKUS OPLMHKPWPGMYKYLM HZ MOUM MPTY UGX XH GHM LYY USS MOY IYKLHGUS OATUG PGMYKYLMLMOUM IYHISY OUX. EYM PG KYUSPME MOHLY IYKLHGUS PGMYKYLML HZ MOY THTYGMLH TAWO MKUGLWYGX MOY NYGYKUS PGMYKYLML MOUM MOYE USCUEL IKYBYGM MOYIAVSPW PGMYKYLM ZKHT VYPGN ZYSM HK YBYG GHMPWYX. THLM HZ MOY IYHISY UMMOUM MPTY IUPX GH UMMYGMPHG MH MOY NYGYKUS IKHNKYLL HZ YBYGML VAM CYKYNAPXYX HGSE VE MOYPK IKPBUMY PGMYKYLML, UGX MOYE CYKY MOY BYKE IYHISYCOHLY UWMPBPMPYL UM MOUM IYKPHX CYKY THLM ALYZAS.MOHLY COH MKPYX MH AGXYKLMUGX MOY NYGYKUS WHAKLY HZ YBYGML UGX MH MURYIUKM PG PM VE LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY UGX OYKHPLT CYKY MOY THLM ALYSYLL TYTVYKLHZ LHWPYME, MOYE LUC YBYKEMOPGN AILPXY XHCG, UGX USS MOYE XPX ZHK MOYWHTTHG NHHX MAKGYX HAM MH VY ALYSYLL UGX ZHHSPLO--SPRY IPYKKY'L UGXTUTHGHB'L KYNPTYGML COPWO SHHMYX KALLPUG BPSSUNYL, UGX MOY SPGM MOYEHAGN SUXPYL IKYIUKYX UGX MOUM GYBYK KYUWOYX MOY CHAGXYX, UGX LH HG.YBYG MOHLY, ZHGX HZ PGMYSSYWMAUS MUSR UGX HZ YDIKYLLPGN MOYPK ZYYSPGNL,COH XPLWALLYX KALLPU'L IHLPMPHG UM MOY MPTY PGBHSAGMUKPSE PGMKHXAWYXPGMH MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG YPMOYK U LOUXY HZ IKYMYGLY UGX ZUSLYOHHX HKALYSYLL WHGXYTGUMPHG UGX UGNYK XPKYWMYX UNUPGLM IYHISY UWWALYX HZUWMPHGL GH HGY WHASX IHLLPVSE VY NAPSME HZ. PG OPLMHKPW YBYGML MOY KASYZHKVPXXPGN AL MH YUM HZ MOY ZKAPM HZ MOY MKYY HZ RGHCSYXNY PL LIYWPUSSEUIISPWUVSY. HGSE AGWHGLWPHAL UWMPHG VYUKL ZKAPM, UGX OY COH ISUEL U IUKMPG UG OPLMHKPW YBYGM GYBYK AGXYKLMUGXL PML LPNGPZPWUGWY. PZ OY MKPYL MHKYUSPFY PM OPL YZZHKML UKY ZKAPMSYLL.MOY THKY WSHLYSE U TUG CUL YGNUNYX PG MOY YBYGML MOYG MURPGN ISUWY PGKALLPU MOY SYLL XPX OY KYUSPFY MOYPK LPNGPZPWUGWY. PG IYMYKLVAKN UGXPG MOY IKHBPGWYL UM U XPLMUGWY ZKHT THLWHC, SUXPYL, UGX NYGMSYTYG PGTPSPMPU AGPZHKTL, CYIM ZHK KALLPU UGX PML UGWPYGM WUIPMUS UGX MUSRYX HZLYSZ-LUWKPZPWY UGX LH HG; VAM PG MOY UKTE COPWO KYMPKYX VYEHGX THLWHCMOYKY CUL SPMMSY MUSR HK MOHANOM HZ THLWHC, UGX COYG MOYE WUANOM LPNOMHZ PML VAKGYX KAPGL GH HGY LCHKY MH VY UBYGNYX HG MOY ZKYGWO, VAM MOYEMOHANOM UVHAM MOYPK GYDM IUE, MOYPK GYDM JAUKMYKL, HZ TUMKYLORU MOYBPBUGXPYKY, UGX SPRY TUMMYKL.UL MOY CUK OUX WUANOM OPT PG MOY LYKBPWY, GPWOHSUL KHLMHB MHHR U WSHLYUGX IKHSHGNYX IUKM PG MOY XYZYGLY HZ OPL WHAGMKE, VAM XPX LH WULAUSSE,CPMOHAM UGE UPT UM LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY, UGX OY MOYKYZHKY SHHRYX UM COUM CULNHPGN HG PG KALLPU CPMOHAM XYLIUPK UGX CPMOHAM XPLTUSSE KUWRPGN OPLVKUPGL HBYK PM. OUX OY VYYG ULRYX COUM OY MOHANOM HZ MOY LMUMY HZKALLPU, OY CHASX OUBY LUPX MOUM PM CUL GHM OPL VALPGYLL MH MOPGR UVHAMPM, MOUM RAMAFHB UGX HMOYKL CYKY MOYKY ZHK MOUM IAKIHLY, VAM MOUM OY OUXOYUKX MOUM MOY KYNPTYGML CYKY MH VY TUXY AI MH MOYPK ZASS LMKYGNMO, MOUMZPNOMPGN CHASX IKHVUVSE NH HG ZHK U SHGN MPTY EYM, UGX MOUM MOPGNL VYPGNLH PM CUL JAPMY SPRYSE OY TPNOM VY PG WHTTUGX HZ U KYNPTYGM PG U WHAISYHZ EYUKL' MPTY.UL OY SHHRYX UM MOY TUMMYK PG MOPL CUE, OY SYUKGYX MOUM OY CUL VYPGNLYGM MH BHKHGYFO MH VAE KYTHAGML ZHK OPL XPBPLPHG, GHM HGSE CPMOHAMKYNKYM UM VYPGN IKYBYGMYX ZKHT MURPGN IUKM PG MOY WHTPGN VUMMSY, VAMCPMO MOY NKYUMYLM ISYULAKY--COPWO OY XPX GHM WHGWYUS UGX COPWO OPLWHTKUXYL ZASSE AGXYKLMHHX.U ZYC XUEL VYZHKY MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, GPWOHSUL KYWYPBYX MOYGYWYLLUKE THGYE UGX CUKKUGML, UGX OUBPGN LYGM LHTY OALLUKL HG PGUXBUGWY, OY LYM HAM CPMO IHLM OHKLYL ZHK BHKHGYFO.HGSE U TUG COH OUL YDIYKPYGWYX PM--MOUM PL, OUL IULLYX LHTY THGMOLWHGMPGAHALSE PG UG UMTHLIOYKY HZ WUTIUPNGPGN UGX CUK--WUG AGXYKLMUGXMOY XYSPNOM GPWOHSUL ZYSM COYG OY YLWUIYX ZKHT MOY KYNPHG WHBYKYX VE MOYUKTE'L ZHKUNPGN HIYKUMPHGL, IKHBPLPHG MKUPGL, UGX OHLIPMUSL. COYG--ZKYYZKHT LHSXPYKL, CUNHGL, UGX MOY ZPSMOE MKUWYL HZ U WUTI--OY LUC BPSSUNYLCPMO IYULUGML UGX IYULUGM CHTYG, NYGMSYTYG'L WHAGMKE OHALYL, ZPYSXLCOYKY WUMMSY CYKY NKUFPGN, IHLMOHALYL CPMO LMUMPHGTULMYKL ULSYYI PGMOYT, OY KYQHPWYX UL MOHANO LYYPGN USS MOPL ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY. COUM ZHKU SHGN COPSY LIYWPUSSE LAKIKPLYX UGX XYSPNOMYX OPT CYKY MOY CHTYG, EHAGNUGX OYUSMOE, CPMOHAM U XHFYG HZZPWYKL TURPGN AI MH YUWO HZ MOYT; CHTYG,MHH, COH CYKY ISYULYX UGX ZSUMMYKYX MOUM U IULLPGN HZZPWYK LOHASX QHRYCPMO MOYT.PG MOY OPNOYLM LIPKPML GPWOHSUL UKKPBYX UM GPNOM UM U OHMYS PG BHKHGYFO,HKXYKYX MOPGNL OY OUX SHGN VYYG XYIKPBYX HZ PG WUTI, UGX GYDM XUE, BYKEWSYUG-LOUBYG UGX PG U ZASS-XKYLL AGPZHKT OY OUX GHM CHKG ZHK U SHGNMPTY, CYGM MH IKYLYGM OPTLYSZ MH MOY UAMOHKPMPYL.MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY TPSPMPU CUL U WPBPSPUG NYGYKUS, UG HSX TUG COH CULYBPXYGMSE ISYULYX CPMO OPL TPSPMUKE XYLPNGUMPHG UGX KUGR. OY KYWYPBYXGPWOHSUL VKALJAYSE (PTUNPGPGN MOPL MH VY WOUKUWMYKPLMPWUSSE TPSPMUKE)UGX JAYLMPHGYX OPT CPMO UG PTIHKMUGM UPK, UL PZ WHGLPXYKPGN MOY NYGYKUSIKHNKYLL HZ UZZUPKL UGX UIIKHBPGN UGX XPLUIIKHBPGN CPMO ZASS KPNOM MH XHLH. GPWOHSUL CUL PG LAWO NHHX LIPKPML MOUM MOPL TYKYSE UTALYX OPT.ZKHT MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY TPSPMPU OY XKHBY MH MOY NHBYKGHK. MOY NHBYKGHKCUL U VKPLR SPMMSY TUG, BYKE LPTISY UGX UZZUVSY. OY PGXPWUMYX MOY LMAXZUKTL UM COPWO GPWOHSUL TPNOM IKHWAKY OHKLYL, KYWHTTYGXYX MH OPT U OHKLYXYUSYK PG MOY MHCG UGX U SUGXHCGYK ZHAKMYYG TPSYL HAM HZ MHCG COH OUXMOY VYLM OHKLYL, UGX IKHTPLYX MH ULLPLM OPT PG YBYKE CUE."EHA UKY WHAGM PSEU KHLMHB'L LHG? TE CPZY CUL U NKYUM ZKPYGX HZ EHAKTHMOYK'L. CY UKY UM OHTY HG MOAKLXUEL--MHXUE PL MOAKLXUE, LH ISYULY WHTYUGX LYY AL JAPMY PGZHKTUSSE," LUPX MOY NHBYKGHK, MURPGN SYUBY HZ OPT.PTTYXPUMYSE HG SYUBPGN MOY NHBYKGHK'L, GPWOHSUL OPKYX IHLM OHKLYL UGX,MURPGN OPL LJAUXKHG JAUKMYKTULMYK CPMO OPT, XKHBY UM U NUSSHI MH MOYSUGXHCGYK, ZHAKMYYG TPSYL UCUE, COH OUX MOY LMAX. YBYKEMOPGN LYYTYX MHOPT ISYULUGM UGX YULE XAKPGN MOUM ZPKLM IUKM HZ OPL LMUE PG BHKHGYFOUGX, UL ALAUSSE OUIIYGL COYG U TUG PL PG U ISYULUGM LMUMY HZ TPGX,YBYKEMOPGN CYGM CYSS UGX YULPSE.MOY SUGXHCGYK MH COHT GPWOHSUL CYGM CUL U VUWOYSHK, UG HSX WUBUSKETUG, UOHKLY ZUGWPYK, U LIHKMLTUG, MOY IHLLYLLHK HZ LHTY WYGMAKE-HSX VKUGXEUGX LHTY HSX OAGNUKPUG CPGY, COH OUX U LGANNYKE COYKY OY LTHRYX, UGX COHHCGYX LHTY LISYGXPX OHKLYL.PG BYKE ZYC CHKXL GPWOHSUL VHANOM LYBYGMYYG IPWRYX LMUSSPHGL ZHK LPDMOHALUGX KAVSYL--MH LYKBY, UL OY LUPX, UL LUTISYL HZ OPL KYTHAGML.UZMYK XPGPGN UGX MURPGN KUMOYK MHH TAWO HZ MOY OAGNUKPUG CPGY,GPWOHSUL--OUBPGN YDWOUGNYX RPLLYL CPMO MOY SUGXHCGYK, CPMO COHT OY CULUSKYUXE HG MOY ZKPYGXSPYLM MYKTL--NUSSHIYX VUWR HBYK UVHTPGUVSY KHUXL,PG MOY VKPNOMYLM ZKUTY HZ TPGX, WHGMPGAUSSE AKNPGN HG MOY XKPBYK LH ULMH VY PG MPTY ZHK MOY NHBYKGHK'L IUKME.COYG OY OUX WOUGNYX, IHAKYX CUMYK HBYK OPL OYUX, UGX LWYGMYX OPTLYSZ,GPWOHSUL UKKPBYX UM MOY NHBYKGHK'L KUMOYK SUMY, VAM CPMO MOY IOKULY"VYMMYK SUMY MOUG GYBYK" HG OPL SPIL.PM CUL GHM U VUSS, GHK OUX XUGWPGN VYYG UGGHAGWYX, VAM YBYKEHGY RGYCMOUM WUMOYKPGY IYMKHBGU CHASX ISUE BUSLYL UGX MOY YWHLLUPLY HG MOYWSUBPWOHKX UGX MOUM MOYKY CHASX VY XUGWPGN, UGX LH YBYKEHGY OUX WHTY ULMH U VUSS.IKHBPGWPUS SPZY PG 1812 CYGM HG BYKE TAWO UL ALAUS, VAM CPMO MOPLXPZZYKYGWY, MOUM PM CUL SPBYSPYK PG MOY MHCGL PG WHGLYJAYGWY HZ MOYUKKPBUS HZ TUGE CYUSMOE ZUTPSPYL ZKHT THLWHC, UGX UL PG YBYKEMOPGN MOUMCYGM HG PG KALLPU UM MOUM MPTY U LIYWPUS KYWRSYLLGYLL CUL GHMPWYUVSY, UG"PG ZHK U IYGGE, PG ZHK U IHAGX--COH WUKYL?" LIPKPM, UGX MOY PGYBPMUVSYLTUSS MUSR, PGLMYUX HZ MAKGPGN HG MOY CYUMOYK UGX TAMAUS UWJAUPGMUGWYL,GHC MAKGYX HG THLWHC, MOY UKTE, UGX GUIHSYHG.MOY LHWPYME NUMOYKYX MHNYMOYK UM MOY NHBYKGHK'L CUL MOY VYLM PGBHKHGYFO.MOYKY CYKY U NKYUM TUGE SUXPYL UGX LHTY HZ GPWOHSUL' THLWHCUWJAUPGMUGWYL, VAM MOYKY CYKY GH TYG COH WHASX UM USS BPY CPMO MOYWUBUSPYK HZ LM. NYHKNY, MOY OALLUK KYTHAGM HZZPWYK, MOY NHHX-GUMAKYXUGX CYSS-VKYX WHAGM KHLMHB. UTHGN MOY TYG CUL UG PMUSPUG IKPLHGYK, UGHZZPWYK HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE; UGX GPWOHSUL ZYSM MOUM MOY IKYLYGWY HZ MOUMIKPLHGYK YGOUGWYX OPL HCG PTIHKMUGWY UL U KALLPUG OYKH. MOY PMUSPUGCUL, UL PM CYKY, U CUK MKHIOE. GPWOHSUL ZYSM MOPL, PM LYYTYX MH OPTMOUM YBYKEHGY KYNUKXYX MOY PMUSPUG PG MOY LUTY SPNOM, UGX OY MKYUMYX OPTWHKXPUSSE MOHANO CPMO XPNGPME UGX KYLMKUPGM.UL LHHG UL GPWOHSUL YGMYKYX PG OPL OALLUK AGPZHKT, XPZZALPGN UKHAGX OPTU ZKUNKUGWY HZ IYKZATY UGX CPGY, UGX OUX AMMYKYX MOY CHKXL "VYMMYK SUMYMOUG GYBYK" UGX OYUKX MOYT KYIYUMYX LYBYKUS MPTYL VE HMOYKL, IYHISYWSALMYKYX UKHAGX OPT; USS YEYL MAKGYX HG OPT, UGX OY ZYSM UM HGWY MOUMOY OUX YGMYKYX PGMH OPL IKHIYK IHLPMPHG PG MOY IKHBPGWY--MOUM HZ UAGPBYKLUS ZUBHKPMY: U BYKE ISYULUGM IHLPMPHG, UGX PGMHDPWUMPGNSE LHUZMYK OPL SHGN IKPBUMPHGL. UM IHLMPGN LMUMPHGL, UM PGGL, UGX PG MOYSUGXHCGYK'L LGANNYKE, TUPXLYKBUGML OUX VYYG ZSUMMYKYX VE OPL GHMPWY, UGXOYKY MHH UM MOY NHBYKGHK'L IUKME MOYKY CYKY (UL PM LYYTYX MH GPWOHSUL)UG PGYDOUALMPVSY GATVYK HZ IKYMME EHAGN CHTYG, TUKKPYX UGX AGTUKKPYX,PTIUMPYGMSE UCUPMPGN OPL GHMPWY. MOY CHTYG UGX NPKSL ZSPKMYX CPMO OPTUGX, ZKHT MOY ZPKLM XUE, MOY IYHISY WHGWYKGYX MOYTLYSBYL MH NYM MOPLZPGY EHAGN XUKYXYBPS HZ UG OALLUK TUKKPYX UGX LYMMSYX XHCG. UTHGN MOYLYCUL MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY OYKLYSZ, COH CYSWHTYX KHLMHB UL U GYUK KYSUMPBYUGX WUSSYX OPT "GPWOHSUL."WUMOYKPGY IYMKHBGU XPX UWMAUSSE ISUE BUSLYL UGX MOY YWHLLUPLY, UGXXUGWPGN VYNUG PG COPWO GPWOHSUL LMPSS ZAKMOYK WUIMPBUMYX MOY IKHBPGWPUSLHWPYME VE OPL UNPSPME. OPL IUKMPWASUKSE ZKYY TUGGYK HZ XUGWPGN YBYGLAKIKPLYX MOYT USS. GPWOHSUL CUL OPTLYSZ KUMOYK LAKIKPLYX UM MOY CUE OYXUGWYX MOUM YBYGPGN. OY OUX GYBYK XUGWYX SPRY MOUM PG THLWHC UGX CHASXYBYG OUBY WHGLPXYKYX LAWO U BYKE ZKYY UGX YULE TUGGYK PTIKHIYK UGX PGVUX ZHKT, VAM OYKY OY ZYSM PM PGWATVYGM HG OPT MH ULMHGPLO MOYT USS VELHTYMOPGN AGALAUS, LHTYMOPGN MOYE CHASX OUBY MH UWWYIM UL MOY KYNASUKMOPGN PG MOY WUIPMUS MOHANO GYC MH MOYT PG MOY IKHBPGWYL.USS MOY YBYGPGN GPWOHSUL IUPX UMMYGMPHG MH U VSAY-YEYX, ISATI UGXISYULPGN SPMMSY VSHGXY, MOY CPZY HZ HGY HZ MOY IKHBPGWPUS HZZPWPUSL.CPMO MOY GUPBY WHGBPWMPHG HZ EHAGN TYG PG U TYKKE THHX MOUM HMOYK TYG'LCPBYL CYKY WKYUMYX ZHK MOYT, KHLMHB XPX GHM SYUBY MOY SUXE'L LPXY UGXMKYUMYX OYK OALVUGX PG U ZKPYGXSE UGX WHGLIPKUMHKPUS LMESY, UL PZ,CPMOHAM LIYURPGN HZ PM, MOYE RGYC OHC WUIPMUSSE GPWOHSUL UGX MOY SUXECHASX NYM HG MHNYMOYK. MOY OALVUGX, OHCYBYK, XPX GHM LYYT MH LOUKY MOUMWHGBPWMPHG UGX MKPYX MH VYOUBY THKHLYSE CPMO KHLMHB. VAM MOYSUMMYK'L NHHX-GUMAKYX GUPBYMY CUL LH VHAGXSYLL MOUM LHTYMPTYL YBYG OYPGBHSAGMUKPSE EPYSXYX MH GPWOHSUL' NHHX OATHK. MHCUKX MOY YGX HZ MOYYBYGPGN, OHCYBYK, UL MOY CPZY'L ZUWY NKYC THKY ZSALOYX UGX UGPTUMYX, MOYOALVUGX'L VYWUTY THKY UGX THKY TYSUGWOHSE UGX LHSYTG, UL MOHANO MOYKYCYKY VAM U NPBYG UTHAGM HZ UGPTUMPHG VYMCYYG MOYT UGX UL MOY CPZY'LLOUKY PGWKYULYX MOY OALVUGX'L XPTPGPLOYX.WOUIMYK BGPWOHSUL LUM SYUGPGN LSPNOMSE ZHKCUKX PG UG UKTWOUPK, VYGXPGN WSHLYSEHBYK MOY VSHGXY SUXE UGX IUEPGN OYK TEMOHSHNPWUS WHTISPTYGML CPMO ULTPSY MOUM GYBYK SYZM OPL ZUWY. QUAGMPSE LOPZMPGN MOY IHLPMPHG HZ OPLSYNL PG MOYPK MPNOM KPXPGN VKYYWOYL, XPZZALPGN UG HXHK HZ IYKZATY, UGXUXTPKPGN OPL IUKMGYK, OPTLYSZ, UGX MOY ZPGY HAMSPGYL HZ OPL SYNL PGMOYPK CYSS-ZPMMPGN OYLLPUG VHHML, GPWOHSUL MHSX MOY VSHGXY SUXE MOUM OYCPLOYX MH KAG UCUE CPMO U WYKMUPG SUXE OYKY PG BHKHGYFO."COPWO SUXE?""U WOUKTPGN SUXE, U XPBPGY HGY. OYK YEYL" (GPWOHSUL SHHRYX UM OPLIUKMGYK) "UKY VSAY, OYK THAMO WHKUS UGX PBHKE; OYK ZPNAKY" (OY NSUGWYXUM OYK LOHASXYKL) "SPRY XPUGU'L...."MOY OALVUGX WUTY AI UGX LASSYGSE ULRYX OPL CPZY COUM LOY CUL MUSRPGNUVHAM."UO, GPRPMU PBUGEWO!" WKPYX GPWOHSUL, KPLPGN IHSPMYSE, UGX UL PZ CPLOPGNGPRPMU PBUGEWO MH LOUKY OPL QHRY, OY VYNUG MH MYSS OPT HZ OPL PGMYGMPHGMH YSHIY CPMO U VSHGXY SUXE.MOY OALVUGX LTPSYX NSHHTPSE, MOY CPZY NUPSE. MOY NHBYKGHK'L NHHX-GUMAKYXCPZY WUTY AI CPMO U SHHR HZ XPLUIIKHBUS."UGGU PNGUMEYBGU CUGML MH LYY EHA, GPWOHSUL," LUPX LOY, IKHGHAGWPGN MOYGUTY LH MOUM GPWOHSUL UM HGWY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM UGGU PNGUMEYBGU CUL U BYKEPTIHKMUGM IYKLHG. "WHTY, GPWOHSUL! EHA RGHC EHA SYM TY WUSS EHA LH?""HO, EYL, UAGM. COH PL LOY?""UGGU PNGUMEYBGU TUSBPGMLYBU. LOY OUL OYUKX ZKHT OYK GPYWY OHC EHAKYLWAYX OYK... WUG EHA NAYLL?""P KYLWAYX LAWO U SHM HZ MOYT!" LUPX GPWOHSUL."OYK GPYWY, IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU. LOY PL OYKY PG BHKHGYFO CPMO OYK UAGM.HOH! OHC EHA VSALO. COE, UKY...?""GHM U VPM! ISYULY XHG'M, UAGM!""BYKE CYSS, BYKE CYSS!... HO, COUM U ZYSSHC EHA UKY!"MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY SYX OPT AI MH U MUSS UGX BYKE LMHAM HSX SUXE CPMOU VSAY OYUXXKYLL, COH OUX QALM ZPGPLOYX OYK NUTY HZ WUKXL CPMO MOY THLMPTIHKMUGM IYKLHGUNYL HZ MOY MHCG. MOPL CUL TUSBPGMLYBU, IKPGWYLL TUKE'LUAGM HG OYK THMOYK'L LPXY, U KPWO, WOPSXSYLL CPXHC COH USCUEL SPBYX PGBHKHGYFO. COYG KHLMHB UIIKHUWOYX OYK LOY CUL LMUGXPGN LYMMSPGN AI ZHKMOY NUTY. LOY SHHRYX UM OPT UGX, LWKYCPGN AI OYK YEYL LMYKGSE, WHGMPGAYXMH AIVKUPX MOY NYGYKUS COH OUX CHG ZKHT OYK."BYKE ISYULYX, THG WOYK," LOY MOYG LUPX, OHSXPGN HAM OYK OUGX MHGPWOHSUL. "IKUE WHTY UGX LYY TY."UZMYK U ZYC CHKXL UVHAM IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX OYK SUMY ZUMOYK, COHTTUSBPGMLYBU OUX YBPXYGMSE GHM SPRYX, UGX OUBPGN ULRYX COUM GPWOHSULRGYC HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, COH USLH CUL YBPXYGMSE GH ZUBHKPMY HZ OYKL, MOYPTIHKMUGM HSX SUXE XPLTPLLYX GPWOHSUL UZMYK KYIYUMPGN OYK PGBPMUMPHG MHWHTY MH LYY OYK.GPWOHSUL IKHTPLYX MH WHTY UGX VSALOYX UNUPG UL OY VHCYX. UM MOY TYGMPHGHZ IKPGWYLL TUKE OY YDIYKPYGWYX U ZYYSPGN HZ LOEGYLL UGX YBYG HZ ZYUK,COPWO OY OPTLYSZ XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX.COYG OY OUX IUKMYX ZKHT TUSBPGMLYBU GPWOHSUL CPLOYX MH KYMAKG MH MOYXUGWPGN, VAM MOY NHBYKGHK'L SPMMSY CPZY ISUWYX OYK ISATI OUGX HG OPLLSYYBY UGX, LUEPGN MOUM LOY CUGMYX MH OUBY U MUSR CPMO OPT, SYX OPT MHOYK LPMMPGN KHHT, ZKHT COPWO MOHLY COH CYKY MOYKY PTTYXPUMYSE CPMOXKYCLH UL GHM MH VY PG OYK CUE."XH EHA RGHC, XYUK VHE," VYNUG MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY CPMO U LYKPHALYDIKYLLPHG HG OYK RPGX SPMMSY ZUWY, "MOUM KYUSSE CHASX VY MOY TUMWO ZHKEHA: CHASX EHA SPRY TY MH UKKUGNY PM?""COHT XH EHA TYUG, UAGM?" ULRYX GPWOHSUL."P CPSS TURY U TUMWO ZHK EHA CPMO MOY IKPGWYLL. WUMOYKPGY IYMKHBGULIYURL HZ SPSE, VAM P LUE, GH--MOY IKPGWYLL! XH EHA CUGM TY MH XH PM? PUT LAKY EHAK THMOYK CPSS VY NKUMYZAS MH TY. COUM U WOUKTPGN NPKS LOY PL,KYUSSE! UGX LOY PL GHM UM USS LH ISUPG, YPMOYK.""GHM UM USS," KYISPYX GPWOHSUL UL PZ HZZYGXYX UM MOY PXYU. "UL VYZPMLU LHSXPYK, UAGM, P XHG'M ZHKWY TELYSZ HG UGEHGY HK KYZALY UGEMOPGN," OYLUPX VYZHKY OY OUX MPTY MH WHGLPXYK COUM OY CUL LUEPGN."CYSS MOYG, KYTYTVYK, MOPL PL GHM U QHRY!""HZ WHAKLY GHM!""EYL, EYL," MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY LUPX UL PZ MUSRPGN MH OYKLYSZ. "VAM,TE XYUK VHE, UTHGN HMOYK MOPGNL EHA UKY MHH UMMYGMPBY MH MOY HMOYK, MOYVSHGXY. HGY PL LHKKE ZHK MOY OALVUGX, KYUSSE....""HO GH, CY UKY NHHX ZKPYGXL CPMO OPT," LUPX GPWOHSUL PG MOY LPTISPWPMEHZ OPL OYUKM; PM XPX GHM YGMYK OPL OYUX MOUM U IULMPTY LH ISYULUGM MHOPTLYSZ TPNOM GHM VY ISYULUGM MH LHTYHGY YSLY."VAM COUM GHGLYGLY P OUBY VYYG LUEPGN MH MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY!" MOHANOMGPWOHSUL LAXXYGSE UM LAIIYK. "LOY CPSS KYUSSE VYNPG MH UKKUGNY UTUMWO... UGX LHGEU...?" UGX HG MURPGN SYUBY HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY,COYG LOY UNUPG LTPSPGNSE LUPX MH OPT, "CYSS MOYG, KYTYTVYK!" OY XKYC OYKULPXY."VAM LYY OYKY, MH MYSS MOY MKAMO, UAGM...""COUM PL PM, TE XYUK? WHTY, SYM'L LPM XHCG OYKY," LUPX LOY.GPWOHSUL LAXXYGSE ZYSM U XYLPKY UGX GYYX MH MYSS OPL THLM PGMPTUMYMOHANOML (COPWO OY CHASX GHM OUBY MHSX MH OPL THMOYK, OPL LPLMYK, HKOPL ZKPYGX) MH MOPL CHTUG COH CUL USTHLM U LMKUGNYK. COYG OY UZMYKCUKXLKYWUSSYX MOUM PTIASLY MH AGLHSPWPMYX UGX PGYDISPWUVSY ZKUGRGYLL COPWOOUX BYKE PTIHKMUGM KYLASML ZHK OPT, PM LYYTYX MH OPT--UL PM LYYTL MHYBYKEHGY PG LAWO WULYL--MOUM PM CUL TYKYSE LHTY LPSSE COPT MOUM LYPFYXOPT: EYM MOUM VAKLM HZ ZKUGRGYLL, MHNYMOYK CPMO HMOYK MKPZSPGN YBYGML,OUX PTTYGLY WHGLYJAYGWYL ZHK OPT UGX ZHK USS OPL ZUTPSE."EHA LYY, UAGM, TUTTU OUL SHGN CUGMYX TY MH TUKKE UG OYPKYLL, VAM MOYBYKE PXYU HZ TUKKEPGN ZHK THGYE PL KYIANGUGM MH TY.""HO EYL, P AGXYKLMUGX," LUPX MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY."VAM IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU--MOUM'L UGHMOYK TUMMYK. P CPSS MYSS EHA MOYMKAMO. PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY P SPRY OYK BYKE TAWO, P ZYYS XKUCG MH OYK; UGXMOYG, UZMYK P TYM OYK AGXYK LAWO WPKWATLMUGWYL--LH LMKUGNYSE, MOY PXYUHZMYG HWWAKKYX MH TY: 'MOPL PL ZUMY.' YLIYWPUSSE PZ EHA KYTYTVYK MOUMTUTTU OUX SHGN VYYG MOPGRPGN HZ PM; VAM P OUX GYBYK OUIIYGYX MH TYYM OYKVYZHKY, LHTYOHC PM OUX USCUEL OUIIYGYX MOUM CY XPX GHM TYYM. UGX UL SHGNUL TE LPLMYK GUMULOU CUL YGNUNYX MH OYK VKHMOYK PM CUL HZ WHAKLY HAM HZMOY JAYLMPHG ZHK TY MH MOPGR HZ TUKKEPGN OYK. UGX PM TALM GYYXL OUIIYGMOUM P LOHASX TYYM OYK QALM COYG GUMULOU'L YGNUNYTYGM OUX VYYG VKHRYGHZZ... UGX MOYG YBYKEMOPGN... LH EHA LYY... P GYBYK MHSX MOPL MH UGEHGYUGX GYBYK CPSS, HGSE MH EHA."MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY IKYLLYX OPL YSVHC NKUMYZASSE."EHA RGHC LHGEU, TE WHALPG? P SHBY OYK, UGX IKHTPLYX MH TUKKE OYK, UGXCPSS XH LH.... LH EHA LYY MOYKY WUG VY GH JAYLMPHG UVHAM-" LUPX GPWOHSULPGWHOYKYGMSE UGX VSALOPGN."TE XYUK VHE, COUM U CUE MH SHHR UM PM! EHA RGHC LHGEU OUL GHMOPGN UGXEHA EHAKLYSZ LUE EHAK IUIU'L UZZUPKL UKY PG U BYKE VUX CUE. UGX COUMUVHAM EHAK THMOYK? PM CHASX RPSS OYK, MOUM'L HGY MOPGN. UGX COUM LHKM HZSPZY CHASX PM VY ZHK LHGEU--PZ LOY'L U NPKS CPMO U OYUKM? EHAK THMOYKPG XYLIUPK, UGX EHA USS KAPGYX.... GH, TE XYUK, EHA UGX LHGEU HANOM MHAGXYKLMUGX MOUM."GPWOHSUL KYTUPGYX LPSYGM. PM WHTZHKMYX OPT MH OYUK MOYLY UKNATYGML."USS MOY LUTY, UAGM, PM PL PTIHLLPVSY," OY KYQHPGYX CPMO U LPNO, UZMYKU LOHKM IUALY. "VYLPXYL, CHASX MOY IKPGWYLL OUBY TY? UGX VYLPXYL, LOY PLGHC PG THAKGPGN. OHC WUG HGY MOPGR HZ PM!""VAM EHA XHG'M LAIIHLY P'T NHPGN MH NYM EHA TUKKPYX UM HGWY? MOYKY PLUSCUEL U KPNOM CUE HZ XHPGN MOPGNL," KYISPYX MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY."COUM U TUMWOTURYK EHA UKY, UAGM..." LUPX GPWOHSUL, RPLLPGN OYK ISATISPMMSY OUGX.WOUIMYK BPHG KYUWOPGN THLWHC UZMYK OYK TYYMPGN CPMO KHLMHB, IKPGWYLL TUKE OUXZHAGX OYK GYIOYC MOYKY CPMO OPL MAMHK, UGX U SYMMYK ZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYCNPBPGN OYK PGLMKAWMPHGL OHC MH NYM MH OYK UAGM TUSBPGMLYBU UM BHKHGYFO.MOUM ZYYSPGN URPG MH MYTIMUMPHG COPWO OUX MHKTYGMYX OYK XAKPGN OYKZUMOYK'L PSSGYLL, LPGWY OPL XYUMO, UGX YLIYWPUSSE LPGWY OYK TYYMPGN CPMOKHLMHB CUL LTHMOYKYX VE UKKUGNYTYGML ZHK MOY QHAKGYE, UGDPYME UVHAM OYKVKHMOYK, LYMMSPGN PG U GYC OHALY, TYYMPGN GYC IYHISY, UGX UMMYGXPGN MHOYK GYIOYC'L YXAWUMPHG. LOY CUL LUX. GHC, UZMYK U THGMO IULLYX PG JAPYMLAKKHAGXPGNL, LOY ZYSM THKY UGX THKY XYYISE MOY SHLL HZ OYK ZUMOYK COPWOCUL ULLHWPUMYX PG OYK TPGX CPMO MOY KAPG HZ KALLPU. LOY CUL UNPMUMYX UGXPGWYLLUGMSE MHKMAKYX VE MOY MOHANOM HZ MOY XUGNYKL MH COPWO OYK VKHMOYK,MOY HGSE PGMPTUMY IYKLHG GHC KYTUPGPGN MH OYK, CUL YDIHLYX. LOY CULCHKKPYX MHH UVHAM OYK GYIOYC'L YXAWUMPHG ZHK COPWO LOY OUX USCUEL ZYSMOYKLYSZ PGWHTIYMYGM, VAM PG MOY XYIMOL HZ OYK LHAS LOY ZYSM UM IYUWY--UIYUWY UKPLPGN ZKHT WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OUBPGN LMPZSYX MOHLY IYKLHGUS XKYUTLUGX OHIYL MOUM OUX VYYG HG MOY IHPGM HZ UCURYGPGN CPMOPG OYK UGX CYKYKYSUMYX MH OYK TYYMPGN CPMO KHLMHB.MOY XUE UZMYK OYK IUKME MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY WUTY MH LYY TUSBPGMLYBUUGX, UZMYK XPLWALLPGN OYK ISUG CPMO MOY UAGM, KYTUKRYX MOUM MOHANOAGXYK IKYLYGM WPKWATLMUGWYL U ZHKTUS VYMKHMOUS CUL, HZ WHAKLY, GHM MH VYMOHANOM HZ, USS MOY LUTY MOY EHAGN IYHISY TPNOM VY VKHANOM MHNYMOYK UGXWHASX NYM MH RGHC HGY UGHMOYK. TUSBPGMLYBU YDIKYLLYX UIIKHBUS, UGX MOYNHBYKGHK'L CPZY VYNUG MH LIYUR HZ KHLMHB PG TUKE'L IKYLYGWY, IKUPLPGNOPT UGX MYSSPGN OHC OY OUX VSALOYX COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L GUTY CULTYGMPHGYX. VAM IKPGWYLL TUKE YDIYKPYGWYX U IUPGZAS KUMOYK MOUG U QHEZASZYYSPGN--OYK TYGMUS MKUGJAPSSPME CUL XYLMKHEYX, UGX XYLPKYL, XHAVML,LYSZ-KYIKHUWO, UGX OHIYL KYUCHRY.XAKPGN MOY MCH XUEL MOUM YSUILYX VYZHKY KHLMHB WUSSYX, IKPGWYLL TUKEWHGMPGAUSSE MOHANOM HZ OHC LOY HANOM MH VYOUBY MH OPT. ZPKLM LOY XYWPXYXGHM MH WHTY MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT COYG OY WUSSYX MH LYY OYK UAGM--MOUM PMCHASX GHM VY IKHIYK ZHK OYK, PG OYK XYYI THAKGPGN, MH KYWYPBY BPLPMHKL;MOYG LOY MOHANOM MOPL CHASX VY KAXY UZMYK COUM OY OUX XHGY ZHK OYK; MOYGPM HWWAKKYX MH OYK MOUM OYK UAGM UGX MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY OUX PGMYGMPHGLWHGWYKGPGN OYKLYSZ UGX KHLMHB--MOYPK SHHRL UGX CHKXL UM MPTYL LYYTYX MHWHGZPKT MOPL LAIIHLPMPHG--MOYG LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ MOUM HGSE LOY, CPMOOYK LPGZAS GUMAKY, WHASX MOPGR MOPL HZ MOYT: MOYE WHASX GHM ZHKNYM MOUMLPMAUMYX UL LOY CUL, COPSY LMPSS CYUKPGN XYYI THAKGPGN, LAWO TUMWOTURPGNCHASX VY UG PGLASM MH OYK UGX MH OYK ZUMOYK'L TYTHKE. ULLATPGN MOUM LOYXPX NH XHCG MH LYY OPT, IKPGWYLL TUKE PTUNPGYX MOY CHKXL OY CHASX LUEMH OYK UGX COUM LOY CHASX LUE MH OPT, UGX MOYLY CHKXL LHTYMPTYL LYYTYXAGXYLYKBYXSE WHSX UGX MOYG MH TYUG MHH TAWO. THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN LOYZYUKYX SYLM MOY WHGZALPHG LOY ZYSM TPNOM HBYKCOYST OYK UGX VYMKUE OYK ULLHHG UL LOY LUC OPT.VAM COYG HG LAGXUE UZMYK WOAKWO MOY ZHHMTUG UGGHAGWYX PG MOY XKUCPGNKHHT MOUM WHAGM KHLMHB OUX WUSSYX, MOY IKPGWYLL LOHCYX GH WHGZALPHG,HGSE U LSPNOM VSALO LAZZALYX OYK WOYYRL UGX OYK YEYL SPM AI CPMO U GYCUGX KUXPUGM SPNOM."EHA OUBY TYM OPT, UAGM?" LUPX LOY PG U WUST BHPWY, AGUVSY OYKLYSZ MHAGXYKLMUGX MOUM LOY WHASX VY HAMCUKXSE LH WUST UGX GUMAKUS.COYG KHLMHB YGMYKYX MOY KHHT, MOY IKPGWYLL XKHIIYX OYK YEYL ZHK UGPGLMUGM, UL PZ MH NPBY MOY BPLPMHK MPTY MH NKYYM OYK UAGM, UGX MOYGQALM UL GPWOHSUL MAKGYX MH OYK LOY KUPLYX OYK OYUX UGX TYM OPL SHHR CPMOLOPGPGN YEYL. CPMO U THBYTYGM ZASS HZ XPNGPME UGX NKUWY LOY OUSZ KHLYCPMO U LTPSY HZ ISYULAKY, OYSX HAM OYK LSYGXYK, XYSPWUMY OUGX MH OPT,UGX VYNUG MH LIYUR PG U BHPWY PG COPWO ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY GYC XYYICHTUGSE GHMYL BPVKUMYX. TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, COH CUL PG MOY XKUCPGNKHHT, SHHRYX UM IKPGWYLL TUKE PG VYCPSXYKYX LAKIKPLY. OYKLYSZ UWHGLATTUMY WHJAYMMY, LOY WHASX GHM OUBY TUGYABYKYX VYMMYK HG TYYMPGN UTUG LOY CPLOYX MH UMMKUWM."YPMOYK VSUWR PL IUKMPWASUKSE VYWHTPGN MH OYK HK LOY KYUSSE OUL NKYUMSEPTIKHBYX CPMOHAM TE OUBPGN GHMPWYX PM. UGX UVHBY USS, COUM MUWM UGXNKUWY!" MOHANOM TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY.OUX IKPGWYLL TUKE VYYG WUIUVSY HZ KYZSYWMPHG UM MOUM THTYGM, LOY CHASXOUBY VYYG THKY LAKIKPLYX MOUG TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UM MOY WOUGNY MOUMOUX MURYG ISUWY PG OYKLYSZ. ZKHT MOY THTYGM LOY KYWHNGPFYX MOUM XYUK,SHBYX ZUWY, U GYC SPZY ZHKWY MHHR IHLLYLLPHG HZ OYK UGX WHTIYSSYX OYK MHLIYUR UGX UWM UIUKM ZKHT OYK HCG CPSS. ZKHT MOY MPTY KHLMHB YGMYKYX, OYKZUWY VYWUTY LAXXYGSE MKUGLZHKTYX. PM CUL UL PZ U SPNOM OUX VYYG RPGXSYXPG U WUKBYX UGX IUPGMYX SUGMYKG UGX MOY PGMKPWUMY, LRPSSZAS, UKMPLMPWCHKR HG PML LPXYL, MOUM IKYBPHALSE LYYTYX XUKR, WHUKLY, UGX TYUGPGNSYLL,CUL LAXXYGSE LOHCG AI PG AGYDIYWMYX UGX LMKPRPGN VYUAME. ZHK MOY ZPKLMMPTY USS MOUM IAKY, LIPKPMAUS, PGCUKX MKUBUPS MOKHANO COPWO LOY OUXSPBYX UIIYUKYX HG MOY LAKZUWY. USS OYK PGCUKX SUVHK, OYK XPLLUMPLZUWMPHGCPMO OYKLYSZ, OYK LAZZYKPGNL, OYK LMKPBPGNL UZMYK NHHXGYLL, OYKTYYRGYLL, SHBY, UGX LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY--USS MOPL GHC LOHGY PG MOHLY KUXPUGMYEYL, PG OYK XYSPWUMY LTPSY, UGX PG YBYKE MKUPM HZ OYK NYGMSY ZUWY.KHLMHB LUC USS MOPL UL WSYUKSE UL PZ OY OUX RGHCG OYK COHSY SPZY. OYZYSM MOUM MOY VYPGN VYZHKY OPT CUL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM ZKHT, UGX VYMMYKMOUG, UGEHGY OY OUX TYM VYZHKY, UGX UVHBY USS VYMMYK MOUG OPTLYSZ.MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL BYKE LPTISY UGX AGPTIHKMUGM. MOYE LIHRY HZ MOYCUK, UGX SPRY YBYKEHGY YSLY AGWHGLWPHALSE YDUNNYKUMYX MOYPK LHKKHC UVHAMPM; MOYE LIHRY HZ MOYPK SULM TYYMPGN--GPWOHSUL MKEPGN MH WOUGNYMOY LAVQYWM--MOYE MUSRYX HZ MOY NHBYKGHK'L RPGX CPZY, HZ GPWOHSUL'KYSUMPHGL, UGX HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE'L.LOY XPX GHM MUSR UVHAM OYK VKHMOYK, XPBYKMPGN MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG UL LHHGUL OYK UAGM TYGMPHGYX UGXKYC. YBPXYGMSE LOY WHASX LIYUR HZ KALLPU'LTPLZHKMAGYL CPMO U WYKMUPG UKMPZPWPUSPME, VAM OYK VKHMOYK CUL MHH GYUKOYK OYUKM UGX LOY GYPMOYK WHASX GHK CHASX LIYUR SPNOMSE HZ OPT. GPWOHSULGHMPWYX MOPL, UL OY GHMPWYX YBYKE LOUXY HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE'L WOUKUWMYKCPMO UG HVLYKBUMPHG AGALAUS MH OPT, UGX YBYKEMOPGN WHGZPKTYX OPLWHGBPWMPHG MOUM LOY CUL U JAPMY AGALAUS UGX YDMKUHKXPGUKE VYPGN.GPWOHSUL VSALOYX UGX CUL WHGZALYX COYG IYHISY LIHRY MH OPT UVHAM MOYIKPGWYLL (UL LOY XPX COYG OY CUL TYGMPHGYX) UGX YBYG COYG OY MOHANOM HZOYK, VAM PG OYK IKYLYGWY OY ZYSM JAPMY UM YULY, UGX LUPX GHM UM USS COUMOY OUX IKYIUKYX, VAM COUM, JAPMY UIIKHIKPUMYSE, HWWAKKYX MH OPT UM MOYTHTYGM.COYG U IUALY HWWAKKYX XAKPGN OPL LOHKM BPLPM, GPWOHSUL, UL PL ALAUS COYGMOYKY UKY WOPSXKYG, MAKGYX MH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SPMMSY LHG, WUKYLLPGN OPTUGX ULRPGN COYMOYK OY CHASX SPRY MH VY UG OALLUK. OY MHHR MOY VHE HGOPL RGYY, ISUEYX CPMO OPT, UGX SHHRYX KHAGX UM IKPGWYLL TUKE. CPMO ULHZMYGYX, OUIIE, MPTPX SHHR LOY CUMWOYX MOY VHE LOY SHBYX PG MOY UKTLHZ MOY TUG LOY SHBYX. GPWOHSUL USLH GHMPWYX MOUM SHHR UGX, UL PZAGXYKLMUGXPGN PM, ZSALOYX CPMO ISYULAKY UGX VYNUG MH RPLL MOY VHE CPMONHHX GUMAKYX ISUEZASGYLL.UL LOY CUL PG THAKGPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM NH HAM PGMH LHWPYME, UGXGPWOHSUL XPX GHM MOPGR PM MOY IKHIYK MOPGN MH BPLPM OYK UNUPG; VAM USSMOY LUTY MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY CYGM HG CPMO OYK TUMWOTURPGN, IULLPGN HG MHGPWOHSUL MOY ZSUMMYKPGN MOPGNL IKPGWYLL TUKE LUPX HZ OPT UGX BPWYBYKLU, UGX PGLPLMPGN HG OPL XYWSUKPGN OPTLYSZ MH IKPGWYLL TUKE. ZHK MOPLIAKIHLY LOY UKKUGNYX U TYYMPGN VYMCYYG MOY EHAGN IYHISY UM MOY VPLOHI'LOHALY VYZHKY TULL.MOHANO KHLMHB MHSX MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY MOUM OY CHASX GHM TURY UGEXYWSUKUMPHG MH IKPGWYLL TUKE, OY IKHTPLYX MH NH.UL UM MPSLPM KHLMHB OUX GHM USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH XHAVM MOUM COUM YBYKEVHXEWHGLPXYKYX KPNOM CUL KPNOM, LH GHC, UZMYK U LOHKM VAM LPGWYKY LMKANNSYVYMCYYG OPL YZZHKM MH UKKUGNY OPL SPZY VE OPL HCG LYGLY HZ QALMPWY, UGXPG HVYXPYGM LAVTPLLPHG MH WPKWATLMUGWYL, OY WOHLY MOY SUMMYK UGX EPYSXYXMH MOY IHCYK OY ZYSM PKKYLPLMPVSE WUKKEPGN OPT OY RGYC GHM COYKY. OYRGYC MOUM UZMYK OPL IKHTPLY MH LHGEU PM CHASX VY COUM OY XYYTYX VULY MHXYWSUKY OPL ZYYSPGNL MH IKPGWYLL TUKE. UGX OY RGYC MOUM OY CHASX GYBYKUWM VULYSE. VAM OY USLH RGYC (HK KUMOYK ZYSM UM MOY VHMMHT HZ OPL OYUKM)MOUM VE KYLPNGPGN OPTLYSZ GHC MH MOY ZHKWY HZ WPKWATLMUGWYL UGX MH MOHLYCOH CYKY NAPXPGN OPT, OY CUL GHM HGSE XHPGN GHMOPGN CKHGN, VAM CUL XHPGNLHTYMOPGN BYKE PTIHKMUGM--THKY PTIHKMUGM MOUG UGEMOPGN OY OUX YBYK XHGYPG OPL SPZY.UZMYK TYYMPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE, MOHANO MOY WHAKLY HZ OPL SPZY CYGM HGYDMYKGUSSE UL VYZHKY, USS OPL ZHKTYK UTALYTYGML SHLM MOYPK WOUKT ZHK OPTUGX OY HZMYG MOHANOM UVHAM OYK. VAM OY GYBYK MOHANOM UVHAM OYK UL OYOUX MOHANOM HZ USS MOY EHAGN SUXPYL CPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG COHT OY OUX TYMPG LHWPYME, GHK UL OY OUX ZHK U SHGN MPTY, UGX UM HGY MPTY KUIMAKHALSE,MOHANOM UVHAM LHGEU. OY OUX IPWMAKYX YUWO HZ MOHLY EHAGN SUXPYL ULUSTHLM USS OHGYLM-OYUKMYX EHAGN TYG XH, MOUM PL, UL U IHLLPVSY CPZY,UXUIMPGN OYK PG OPL PTUNPGUMPHG MH USS MOY WHGXPMPHGL HZ TUKKPYX SPZY:U COPMY XKYLLPGN NHCG, OPL CPZY UM MOY MYU MUVSY, OPL CPZY'L WUKKPUNY,SPMMSY HGYL, TUTTU UGX IUIU, MOYPK KYSUMPHGL MH OYK, UGX LH HG--UGXMOYLY IPWMAKYL HZ MOY ZAMAKY OUX NPBYG OPT ISYULAKY. VAM CPMO IKPGWYLLTUKE, MH COHT MOYE CYKY MKEPGN MH NYM OPT YGNUNYX, OY WHASX GYBYKIPWMAKY UGEMOPGN HZ ZAMAKY TUKKPYX SPZY. PZ OY MKPYX, OPL IPWMAKYLLYYTYX PGWHGNKAHAL UGX ZUSLY. PM TUXY OPT UZKUPX.WOUIMYK BPPMOY XKYUXZAS GYCL HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, HZ HAK SHLLYL PG RPSSYX UGXCHAGXYX, UGX MOY LMPSS THKY MYKKPVSY GYCL HZ MOY SHLL HZ THLWHC KYUWOYXBHKHGYFO PG MOY TPXXSY HZ LYIMYTVYK. IKPGWYLL TUKE, OUBPGN SYUKGYX HZOYK VKHMOYK'L CHAGX HGSE ZKHT MOY NUFYMMY UGX OUBPGN GH XYZPGPMY GYCL HZOPT, IKYIUKYX (LH GPWOHSUL OYUKX, OY OUX GHM LYYG OYK UNUPG OPTLYSZ) MHLYM HZZ PG LYUKWO HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC.COYG OY KYWYPBYX MOY GYCL HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH UGX MOY UVUGXHGTYGMHZ THLWHC, KHLMHB CUL GHM LYPFYX CPMO XYLIUPK, UGNYK, MOY XYLPKY ZHKBYGNYUGWY, HK UGE ZYYSPGN HZ MOUM RPGX, VAM YBYKEMOPGN PG BHKHGYFOLAXXYGSE LYYTYX MH OPT XASS UGX MPKYLHTY, UGX OY YDIYKPYGWYX UGPGXYZPGPMY ZYYSPGN HZ LOUTY UGX UCRCUKXGYLL. MOY WHGBYKLUMPHGL OY OYUKXLYYTYX MH OPT PGLPGWYKY; OY XPX GHM RGHC OHC MH QAXNY USS MOYLY UZZUPKLUGX ZYSM MOUM HGSE PG MOY KYNPTYGM CHASX YBYKEMOPGN UNUPG VYWHTY WSYUKMH OPT. OY TUXY OULMY MH ZPGPLO VAEPGN MOY OHKLYL, UGX HZMYG VYWUTYAGKYULHGUVSE UGNKE CPMO OPL LYKBUGM UGX LJAUXKHG JAUKMYKTULMYK.U ZYC XUEL VYZHKY OPL XYIUKMAKY U LIYWPUS MOUGRLNPBPGN, UM COPWOGPWOHSUL CUL IKYLYGM, CUL OYSX PG MOY WUMOYXKUS ZHK MOY KALLPUG BPWMHKE.OY LMHHX U SPMMSY VYOPGX MOY NHBYKGHK UGX OYSX OPTLYSZ CPMO TPSPMUKEXYWHKAT MOKHANO MOY LYKBPWY, TYXPMUMPGN HG U NKYUM BUKPYME HZ LAVQYWML.COYG MOY LYKBPWY CUL HBYK MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY VYWRHGYX OPT MH OYK."OUBY EHA LYYG MOY IKPGWYLL?" LOY ULRYX, PGXPWUMPGN CPMO U THBYTYGM HZOYK OYUX U SUXE LMUGXPGN HG MOY HIIHLPMY LPXY, VYEHGX MOY WOHPK.GPWOHSUL PTTYXPUMYSE KYWHNGPFYX IKPGWYLL TUKE GHM LH TAWO VE MOY IKHZPSYOY LUC AGXYK OYK VHGGYM UL VE MOY ZYYSPGN HZ LHSPWPMAXY, MPTPXPME, UGXIPME MOUM PTTYXPUMYSE HBYKWUTY OPT. IKPGWYLL TUKE, YBPXYGMSE YGNKHLLYXVE OYK MOHANOML, CUL WKHLLPGN OYKLYSZ ZHK MOY SULM MPTY VYZHKY SYUBPGNMOY WOAKWO.GPWOHSUL SHHRYX UM OYK ZUWY CPMO LAKIKPLY. PM CUL MOY LUTY ZUWY OY OUXLYYG VYZHKY, MOYKY CUL MOY LUTY NYGYKUS YDIKYLLPHG HZ KYZPGYX, PGGYK,LIPKPMAUS SUVHK, VAM GHC PM CUL JAPMY XPZZYKYGMSE SPM AI. MOYKY CUL UIUMOYMPW YDIKYLLPHG HZ LHKKHC, IKUEYK, UGX OHIY PG PM. UL OUX HWWAKKYXVYZHKY COYG LOY CUL IKYLYGM, GPWOHSUL CYGM AI MH OYK CPMOHAM CUPMPGN MHVY IKHTIMYX VE MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY UGX GHM ULRPGN OPTLYSZ COYMOYK HK GHMPM CUL KPNOM UGX IKHIYK MH UXXKYLL OYK OYKY PG WOAKWO, UGX MHSX OYK OYOUX OYUKX HZ OYK MKHAVSY UGX LETIUMOPFYX CPMO OPL COHSY LHAS. UL LHHG ULLOY OYUKX OPL BHPWY U BPBPX NSHC RPGXSYX PG OYK ZUWY, SPNOMPGN AI VHMOOYK LHKKHC UGX OYK QHE."MOYKY PL HGY MOPGN P CUGMYX MH MYSS EHA, IKPGWYLL," LUPX KHLMHB. "PMPL MOUM PZ EHAK VKHMOYK, IKPGWY UGXKYC GPRHSPYBPWO, CYKY GHM SPBPGN, PMCHASX OUBY VYYG UM HGWY UGGHAGWYX PG MOY NUFYMMY, UL OY PL U WHSHGYS."MOY IKPGWYLL SHHRYX UM OPT, GHM NKULIPGN COUM OY CUL LUEPGN, VAM WOYYKYXVE MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ KYNKYMZAS LETIUMOE HG OPL ZUWY."UGX P OUBY RGHCG LH TUGE WULYL HZ U LISPGMYK CHAGX" (MOY NUFYMMY LUPXPM CUL U LOYSS) "YPMOYK IKHBPGN ZUMUS UM HGWY HK VYPGN BYKE LSPNOM,"WHGMPGAYX GPWOHSUL. "CY TALM OHIY ZHK MOY VYLM, UGX P UT LAKY..."IKPGWYLL TUKE PGMYKKAIMYX OPT."HO, MOUM CHASX VY LH XKYUX..." LOY VYNUG UGX, IKYBYGMYX VE UNPMUMPHGZKHT ZPGPLOPGN, LOY VYGM OYK OYUX CPMO U THBYTYGM UL NKUWYZAS ULYBYKEMOPGN LOY XPX PG OPL IKYLYGWY UGX, SHHRPGN AI UM OPT NKUMYZASSE,CYGM HAM, ZHSSHCPGN OYK UAGM.MOUM YBYGPGN GPWOHSUL XPX GHM NH HAM, VAM LMUEYX UM OHTY MH LYMMSY LHTYUWWHAGML CPMO MOY OHKLY XYUSYKL. COYG OY OUX ZPGPLOYX MOUM VALPGYLL PMCUL USKYUXE MHH SUMY MH NH UGECOYKY VAM LMPSS MHH YUKSE MH NH MH VYX,UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY OY IUWYX AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT, KYZSYWMPGN HG OPLSPZY, U MOPGN OY KUKYSE XPX.IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX TUXY UG UNKYYUVSY PTIKYLLPHG HG OPT COYG OY OUX TYMOYK PG LTHSYGLR IKHBPGWY. OPL OUBPGN YGWHAGMYKYX OYK PG LAWO YDWYIMPHGUSWPKWATLMUGWYL, UGX OPL THMOYK OUBPGN UM HGY MPTY TYGMPHGYX OYK MH OPT ULU NHHX TUMWO, OUX XKUCG OPL IUKMPWASUK UMMYGMPHG MH OYK. COYG OY TYM OYKUNUPG PG BHKHGYFO MOY PTIKYLLPHG LOY TUXY HG OPT CUL GHM TYKYSE ISYULPGNVAM IHCYKZAS. GPWOHSUL OUX VYYG LMKAWR VE MOY IYWASPUK THKUS VYUAME OYHVLYKBYX PG OYK UM MOPL MPTY. OY CUL, OHCYBYK, IKYIUKPGN MH NH UCUE UGXPM OUX GHM YGMYKYX OPL OYUX MH KYNKYM MOUM OY CUL MOAL XYIKPBPGN OPTLYSZHZ WOUGWYL HZ TYYMPGN OYK. VAM MOUM XUE'L YGWHAGMYK PG WOAKWO OUX, OYZYSM, LAGR XYYIYK MOUG CUL XYLPKUVSY ZHK OPL IYUWY HZ TPGX. MOUM IUSY,LUX, KYZPGYX ZUWY, MOUM KUXPUGM SHHR, MOHLY NYGMSY NKUWYZAS NYLMAKYL,UGX YLIYWPUSSE MOY XYYI UGX MYGXYK LHKKHC YDIKYLLYX PG USS OYK ZYUMAKYLUNPMUMYX OPT UGX YBHRYX OPL LETIUMOE. PG TYG KHLMHB WHASX GHM VYUK MHLYY MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ U OPNOYK LIPKPMAUS SPZY (MOUM CUL COE OY XPX GHMSPRY IKPGWY UGXKYC) UGX OY KYZYKKYX MH PM WHGMYTIMAHALSE UL IOPSHLHIOEUGX XKYUTPGYLL, VAM PG IKPGWYLL TUKE MOUM BYKE LHKKHC COPWO KYBYUSYXMOY XYIMO HZ U COHSY LIPKPMAUS CHKSX ZHKYPNG MH OPT CUL UG PKKYLPLMPVSYUMMKUWMPHG."LOY TALM VY U CHGXYKZAS CHTUG. U KYUS UGNYS!" OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ."COE UT P GHM ZKYY? COE CUL P PG LAWO U OAKKE CPMO LHGEU?" UGX OYPGBHSAGMUKPSE WHTIUKYX MOY MCH: MOY SUWR HZ LIPKPMAUSPME PG MOY HGY UGXMOY UVAGXUGWY HZ PM PG MOY HMOYK--U LIPKPMAUSPME OY OPTLYSZ SUWRYX UGXMOYKYZHKY BUSAYX THLM OPNOSE. OY MKPYX MH IPWMAKY COUM CHASX OUIIYG CYKYOY ZKYY. OHC OY CHASX IKHIHLY MH OYK UGX OHC LOY CHASX VYWHTY OPL CPZY.VAM GH, OY WHASX GHM PTUNPGY MOUM. OY ZYSM UCYX, UGX GH WSYUK IPWMAKYIKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OPL TPGX. OY OUX SHGN UNH IPWMAKYX MH OPTLYSZ UZAMAKY CPMO LHGEU, UGX MOUM CUL USS WSYUK UGX LPTISY QALM VYWUALY PMOUX USS VYYG MOHANOM HAM UGX OY RGYC USS MOYKY CUL PG LHGEU, VAM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH IPWMAKY U ZAMAKY CPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE, VYWUALY OY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX OYK VAM LPTISE SHBYX OYK.KYBYKPYL UVHAM LHGEU OUX OUX LHTYMOPGN TYKKE UGX ISUEZAS PG MOYT, VAM MHXKYUT HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL USCUEL XPZZPWASM UGX U SPMMSY ZKPNOMYGPGN."OHC LOY IKUEYX!" OY MOHANOM. "PM CUL ISUPG MOUM OYK COHSY LHAS CUL PGOYK IKUEYK. EYL, MOUM CUL MOY IKUEYK MOUM THBYL THAGMUPGL, UGX P UTLAKY OYK IKUEYK CPSS VY UGLCYKYX. COE XHG'M P IKUE ZHK COUM P CUGM?" OYLAXXYGSE MOHANOM. "COUM XH P CUGM? MH VY ZKYY, KYSYULYX ZKHT LHGEU...LOY CUL KPNOM," OY MOHANOM, KYTYTVYKPGN COUM MOY NHBYKGHK'L CPZY OUXLUPX: "GHMOPGN VAM TPLZHKMAGY WUG WHTY HZ TUKKEPGN LHGEU. TAXXSYL,NKPYZ ZHK TUTTU... VALPGYLL XPZZPWASMPYL... TAXXSYL, MYKKPVSY TAXXSYL!VYLPXYL, P XHG'M SHBY OYK--GHM UL P LOHASX. H, NHX! KYSYULY TY ZKHTMOPL XKYUXZAS, PGYDMKPWUVSY IHLPMPHG!" OY LAXXYGSE VYNUG MH IKUE. "EYL,IKUEYK WUG THBY THAGMUPGL, VAM HGY TALM OUBY ZUPMO UGX GHM IKUE ULGUMULOU UGX P ALYX MH UL WOPSXKYG, MOUM MOY LGHC TPNOM MAKG PGMHLANUK--UGX MOYG KAG HAM PGMH MOY EUKX MH LYY COYMOYK PM OUX XHGY LH.GH, VAM P UT GHM IKUEPGN ZHK MKPZSYL GHC," OY MOHANOM UL OY IAM OPL IPIYXHCG PG U WHKGYK, UGX ZHSXPGN OPL OUGXL ISUWYX OPTLYSZ VYZHKY MOY PWHG.LHZMYGYX VE TYTHKPYL HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE OY VYNUG MH IKUE UL OY OUX GHMXHGY ZHK U SHGN MPTY. MYUKL CYKY PG OPL YEYL UGX PG OPL MOKHUM COYG MOYXHHK HIYGYX UGX SUBKALORU WUTY PG CPMO LHTY IUIYKL."VSHWROYUX! COE XH EHA WHTY PG CPMOHAM VYPGN WUSSYX?" WKPYX GPWOHSUL,JAPWRSE WOUGNPGN OPL UMMPMAXY."ZKHT MOY NHBYKGHK," LUPX SUBKALORU PG U LSYYIE BHPWY. "U WHAKPYK OULUKKPBYX UGX MOYKY'L U SYMMYK ZHK EHA.""CYSS, USS KPNOM, MOUGRL. EHA WUG NH!"GPWOHSUL MHHR MOY MCH SYMMYKL, HGY HZ COPWO CUL ZKHT OPL THMOYK UGXMOY HMOYK ZKHT LHGEU. OY KYWHNGPFYX MOYT VE MOY OUGXCKPMPGN UGX HIYGYXLHGEU'L ZPKLM. OY OUX KYUX HGSE U ZYC SPGYL COYG OY MAKGYX IUSY UGX OPLYEYL HIYGYX CPXY CPMO ZYUK UGX QHE."GH, PM'L GHM IHLLPVSY!" OY WKPYX USHAX.AGUVSY MH LPM LMPSS OY IUWYX AI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT OHSXPGN MOY SYMMYK UGXKYUXPGN PM. OY NSUGWYX MOKHANO PM, MOYG KYUX PM UNUPG, UGX MOYG UNUPG,UGX LMUGXPGN LMPSS PG MOY TPXXSY HZ MOY KHHT OY KUPLYX OPL LOHASXYKL,LMKYMWOPGN HAM OPL OUGXL, CPMO OPL THAMO CPXY HIYG UGX OPL YEYL ZPDYX.COUM OY OUX QALM VYYG IKUEPGN ZHK CPMO WHGZPXYGWY MOUM NHX CHASX OYUKOPT OUX WHTY MH IULL; VAM GPWOHSUL CUL UL TAWO ULMHGPLOYX UL PZ PM CYKYLHTYMOPGN YDMKUHKXPGUKE UGX AGYDIYWMYX, UGX UL PZ MOY BYKE ZUWM MOUM PMOUX OUIIYGYX LH JAPWRSE IKHBYX MOUM PM OUX GHM WHTY ZKHT NHX MH COHT OYOUX IKUEYX, VAM VE LHTY HKXPGUKE WHPGWPXYGWY.MOPL AGYDIYWMYX UGX, UL PM LYYTYX MH GPWOHSUL, JAPMY BHSAGMUKE SYMMYKZKHT LHGEU ZKYYX OPT ZKHT MOY RGHM MOUM ZYMMYKYX OPT UGX ZKHT COPWOMOYKY OUX LYYTYX GH YLWUIY. LOY CKHMY MOUM MOY SULM AGZHKMAGUMYYBYGML--MOY SHLL HZ USTHLM MOY COHSY HZ MOY KHLMHBL' THLWHCIKHIYKME--UGX MOY WHAGMYLL' KYIYUMYXSE YDIKYLLYX CPLO MOUM GPWOHSULLOHASX TUKKE IKPGWYLL VHSRHGLRUEU, MHNYMOYK CPMO OPL LPSYGWY UGXWHSXGYLL HZ SUMY, OUX USS WHTVPGYX MH TURY OYK XYWPXY MH KYSYULY OPTZKHT OPL IKHTPLY UGX LYM OPT WHTISYMYSE ZKYY.PM CHASX VY MHH IUPGZAS MH TY MH MOPGR MOUM P TPNOM VY U WUALY HZ LHKKHCHK XPLWHKX PG MOY ZUTPSE MOUM OUL VYYG LH NHHX MH TY (LOY CKHMY), UGX TESHBY OUL GH UPT VAM MOY OUIIPGYLL HZ MOHLY P SHBY; LH, GPWOHSUL, PVYN EHA MH WHGLPXYK EHAKLYSZ ZKYY, UGX MH VY ULLAKYX MOUM, PG LIPMY HZYBYKEMOPGN, GH HGY WUG SHBY EHA THKY MOUG XHYLEHAK LHGEUVHMO SYMMYKL CYKY CKPMMYG ZKHT MKHPMLU. MOY HMOYK, ZKHT MOY WHAGMYLL,XYLWKPVYX MOYPK SULM XUEL PG THLWHC, MOYPK XYIUKMAKY, MOY ZPKY, UGXMOY XYLMKAWMPHG HZ USS MOYPK IKHIYKME. PG MOPL SYMMYK MOY WHAGMYLL USLHTYGMPHGYX MOUM IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL UTHGN MOY CHAGXYX MKUBYSPGN CPMO MOYT;OPL LMUMY CUL BYKE WKPMPWUS, VAM MOY XHWMHK LUPX MOYKY CUL GHC THKYOHIY. LHGEU UGX GUMULOU CYKY GAKLPGN OPT.GYDM XUE GPWOHSUL MHHR OPL THMOYK'L SYMMYK UGX CYGM MH LYY IKPGWYLLTUKE. GYPMOYK OY GHK LOY LUPX U CHKX UVHAM COUM "GUMULOU GAKLPGN OPT"TPNOM TYUG, VAM MOUGRL MH MOPL SYMMYK GPWOHSUL LAXXYGSE VYWUTY USTHLM ULPGMPTUMY CPMO MOY IKPGWYLL UL PZ MOYE CYKY KYSUMPHGL.MOY ZHSSHCPGN XUE OY LUC IKPGWYLL TUKE HZZ HG OYK QHAKGYE MH EUKHLSUBS,UGX U ZYC XUEL SUMYK SYZM MH KYQHPG OPL KYNPTYGM.WOUIMYK BPPPLHGEU'L SYMMYK CKPMMYG ZKHT MKHPMLU, COPWO OUX WHTY UL UG UGLCYK MHGPWOHSUL' IKUEYK, CUL IKHTIMYX VE MOPL: MOY MOHANOM HZ NYMMPGN GPWOHSULTUKKPYX MH UG OYPKYLL HWWAIPYX MOY HSX WHAGMYLL' TPGX THKY UGX THKY. LOYRGYC MOUM LHGEU CUL MOY WOPYZ HVLMUWSY MH MOPL OUIIYGPGN, UGX LHGEU'LSPZY PG MOY WHAGMYLL' OHALY OUX NKHCG OUKXYK UGX OUKXYK, YLIYWPUSSEUZMYK MOYE OUX KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHT GPWOHSUL MYSSPGN HZ OPL TYYMPGNCPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE PG VHNAWOUKHBH. MOY WHAGMYLL SYM GH HWWULPHG LSPI HZTURPGN OATPSPUMPGN HK WKAYS USSALPHGL MH LHGEU.VAM U ZYC XUEL VYZHKY MOYE SYZM THLWHC, THBYX UGX YDWPMYX VE USS MOUMCUL NHPGN HG, LOY WUSSYX LHGEU MH OYK UGX, PGLMYUX HZ KYIKHUWOPGN UGXTURPGN XYTUGXL HG OYK, MYUKZASSE PTISHKYX OYK MH LUWKPZPWY OYKLYSZUGX KYIUE USS MOUM MOY ZUTPSE OUX XHGY ZHK OYK VE VKYURPGN HZZ OYKYGNUNYTYGM CPMO GPWOHSUL."P LOUSS GHM VY UM IYUWY MPSS EHA IKHTPLY TY MOPL."LHGEU VAKLM PGMH OELMYKPWUS MYUKL UGX KYISPYX MOKHANO OYK LHVL MOUMLOY CHASX XH UGEMOPGN UGX CUL IKYIUKYX ZHK UGEMOPGN, VAM NUBY GH UWMAUSIKHTPLY UGX WHASX GHM VKPGN OYKLYSZ MH XYWPXY MH XH COUM CUL XYTUGXYXHZ OYK. LOY TALM LUWKPZPWY OYKLYSZ ZHK MOY ZUTPSE MOUM OUX KYUKYX UGXVKHANOM OYK AI. MH LUWKPZPWY OYKLYSZ ZHK HMOYKL CUL LHGEU'L OUVPM. OYKIHLPMPHG PG MOY OHALY CUL LAWO MOUM HGSE VE LUWKPZPWY WHASX LOY LOHC OYKCHKMO, UGX LOY CUL UWWALMHTYX MH MOPL UGX SHBYX XHPGN PM. VAM PG USS OYKZHKTYK UWML HZ LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY LOY OUX VYYG OUIIPSE WHGLWPHAL MOUM MOYEKUPLYX OYK PG OYK HCG YLMYYT UGX PG MOUM HZ HMOYKL, UGX LH TUXY OYK THKYCHKMOE HZ GPWOHSUL COHT LOY SHBYX THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX. VAMGHC MOYE CUGMYX OYK MH LUWKPZPWY MOY BYKE MOPGN MOUM WHGLMPMAMYX MOYCOHSY KYCUKX ZHK OYK LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY UGX MOY COHSY TYUGPGN HZ OYK SPZY.UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY LOY ZYSM VPMMYKGYLL UNUPGLM MOHLY COH OUX VYYGOYK VYGYZUWMHKL HGSE MH MHKMAKY OYK MOY THKY IUPGZASSE; LOY ZYSM QYUSHALHZ GUMULOU COH OUX GYBYK YDIYKPYGWYX UGEMOPGN HZ MOPL LHKM, OUX GYBYKGYYXYX MH LUWKPZPWY OYKLYSZ, VAM TUXY HMOYKL LUWKPZPWY MOYTLYSBYL ZHKOYK UGX EYM CUL VYSHBYX VE YBYKEVHXE. UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY LHGEU ZYSMMOUM HAM HZ OYK IAKY, JAPYM SHBY ZHK GPWOHSUL U IULLPHGUMY ZYYSPGNCUL VYNPGGPGN MH NKHC AI COPWO CUL LMKHGNYK MOUG IKPGWPISY, BPKMAY,HK KYSPNPHG. AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ MOPL ZYYSPGN LHGEU, COHLY SPZY HZXYIYGXYGWY OUX MUANOM OYK PGBHSAGMUKPSE MH VY LYWKYMPBY, OUBPGN UGLCYKYXMOY WHAGMYLL PG BUNAY NYGYKUS MYKTL, UBHPXYX MUSRPGN CPMO OYK UGXKYLHSBYX MH CUPM MPSS LOY LOHASX LYY GPWOHSUL, GHM PG HKXYK MH LYM OPTZKYY VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE UM MOUM TYYMPGN MH VPGX OPT MH OYK ZHKYBYK.MOY VALMSY UGX MYKKHK HZ MOY KHLMHBL' SULM XUEL PG THLWHC LMPZSYX MOYNSHHTE MOHANOML MOUM HIIKYLLYX LHGEU. LOY CUL NSUX MH ZPGX YLWUIYZKHT MOYT PG IKUWMPWUS UWMPBPME. VAM COYG LOY OYUKX HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'LIKYLYGWY PG MOYPK OHALY, XYLIPMY OYK LPGWYKY IPME ZHK OPT UGX ZHKGUMULOU, LOY CUL LYPFYX VE U QHEZAS UGX LAIYKLMPMPHAL ZYYSPGN MOUM NHXXPX GHM PGMYGX OYK MH VY LYIUKUMYX ZKHT GPWOHSUL. LOY RGYC MOUM GUMULOUSHBYX GH HGY VAM IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX OUX GYBYK WYULYX MH SHBY OPT. LOYRGYC MOUM VYPGN MOKHCG MHNYMOYK UNUPG AGXYK LAWO MYKKPVSY WPKWATLMUGWYLMOYE CHASX UNUPG ZUSS PG SHBY CPMO HGY UGHMOYK, UGX MOUM GPWOHSUL CHASXMOYG GHM VY UVSY MH TUKKE IKPGWYLL TUKE UL MOYE CHASX VY CPMOPG MOYIKHOPVPMYX XYNKYYL HZ UZZPGPME. XYLIPMY USS MOY MYKKHK HZ COUM OUXOUIIYGYX XAKPGN MOHLY SULM XUEL UGX XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM XUEL HZ MOYPKQHAKGYE, MOPL ZYYSPGN MOUM IKHBPXYGWY CUL PGMYKBYGPGN PG OYK IYKLHGUSUZZUPKL WOYYKYX LHGEU.UM MOY MKHPMLU THGULMYKE MOY KHLMHBL ZPKLM VKHRY MOYPK QHAKGYE ZHK UCOHSY XUE.MOKYY SUKNY KHHTL CYKY ULLPNGYX MH MOYT PG MOY THGULMYKE OHLMYSKE, HGYHZ COPWO CUL HWWAIPYX VE IKPGWY UGXKYC. MOY CHAGXYX TUG CUL TAWO VYMMYKMOUM XUE UGX GUMULOU CUL LPMMPGN CPMO OPT. PG MOY GYDM KHHT LUM MOYWHAGM UGX WHAGMYLL KYLIYWMZASSE WHGBYKLPGN CPMO MOY IKPHK, COH CULWUSSPGN HG MOYT UL HSX UWJAUPGMUGWYL UGX VYGYZUWMHKL HZ MOY THGULMYKE.LHGEU CUL MOYKY MHH, MHKTYGMYX VE WAKPHLPME UL MH COUM IKPGWY UGXKYC UGXGUMULOU CYKY MUSRPGN UVHAM. LOY OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ MOYPK BHPWYL MOKHANOMOY XHHK. MOUM XHHK HIYGYX UGX GUMULOU WUTY HAM, SHHRPGN YDWPMYX. GHMGHMPWPGN MOY THGR, COH OUX KPLYG MH NKYYM OYK UGX CUL XKUCPGN VUWR MOYCPXY LSYYBY HG OPL KPNOM UKT, LOY CYGM AI MH LHGEU UGX MHHR OYK OUGX."GUMULOU, COUM UKY EHA UVHAM? WHTY OYKY!" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL.GUMULOU CYGM AI MH MOY THGR ZHK OPL VSYLLPGN, UGX OY UXBPLYX OYK MH IKUEZHK UPX MH NHX UGX OPL LUPGM.UL LHHG UL MOY IKPHK CPMOXKYC, GUMULOU MHHR OYK ZKPYGX VE MOY OUGX UGXCYGM CPMO OYK PGMH MOY AGHWWAIPYX KHHT."LHGEU, CPSS OY SPBY?" LOY ULRYX. "LHGEU, OHC OUIIE P UT, UGX OHCAGOUIIE!... LHGEU, XHBYE, YBYKEMOPGN PL UL PM ALYX MH VY. PZ HGSE OYSPBYL! OY WUGGHM... VYWUALY... VYWUALY... HZ" UGX GUMULOU VAKLM PGMHMYUKL."EYL! P RGYC PM! MOUGR NHX!" TAKTAKYX LHGEU. "OY CPSS SPBY."LHGEU CUL GHM SYLL UNPMUMYX MOUG OYK ZKPYGX VE MOY SUMMYK'L ZYUK UGXNKPYZ UGX VE OYK HCG IYKLHGUS ZYYSPGNL COPWO LOY LOUKYX CPMO GH HGY.LHVVPGN, LOY RPLLYX UGX WHTZHKMYX GUMULOU. "PZ HGSE OY SPBYL!" LOYMOHANOM. OUBPGN CYIM, MUSRYX, UGX CPIYX UCUE MOYPK MYUKL, MOY MCHZKPYGXL CYGM MHNYMOYK MH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L XHHK. GUMULOU HIYGYX PMWUAMPHALSE UGX NSUGWYX PGMH MOY KHHT, LHGEU LMUGXPGN VYLPXY OYK UM MOYOUSZ-HIYG XHHK.IKPGWY UGXKYC CUL SEPGN KUPLYX OPNO HG MOKYY IPSSHCL. OPL IUSY ZUWY CULWUST, OPL YEYL WSHLYX, UGX MOYE WHASX LYY OPL KYNASUK VKYUMOPGN."H, GUMULOU!" LHGEU LAXXYGSE USTHLM LWKYUTYX, WUMWOPGN OYK WHTIUGPHG'LUKT UGX LMYIIPGN VUWR ZKHT MOY XHHK."COUM? COUM PL PM?" ULRYX GUMULOU."PM'L MOUM, MOUM..." LUPX LHGEU, CPMO U COPMY ZUWY UGX MKYTVSPGN SPIL.GUMULOU LHZMSE WSHLYX MOY XHHK UGX CYGM CPMO LHGEU MH MOY CPGXHC, GHMEYM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM MOY SUMMYK CUL MYSSPGN OYK."EHA KYTYTVYK," LUPX LHGEU CPMO U LHSYTG UGX ZKPNOMYGYX YDIKYLLPHG."EHA KYTYTVYK COYG P SHHRYX PG MOY TPKKHK ZHK EHA... UM HMKUXGHY UMWOKPLMTUL? XH EHA KYTYTVYK COUM P LUC?""EYL, EYL!" WKPYX GUMULOU HIYGPGN OYK YEYL CPXY, UGX BUNAYSE KYWUSSPGNMOUM LHGEU OUX MHSX OYK LHTYMOPGN UVHAM IKPGWY UGXKYC COHT LOY OUX LYYGSEPGN XHCG."EHA KYTYTVYK?" LHGEU CYGM HG. "P LUC PM MOYG UGX MHSX YBYKEVHXE, EHAUGX XAGEULOU. P LUC OPT SEPGN HG U VYX," LUPX LOY, TURPGN U NYLMAKY CPMOOYK OUGX UGX U SPZMYX ZPGNYK UM YUWO XYMUPS, "UGX MOUM OY OUX OPL YEYLWSHLYX UGX CUL WHBYKYX QALM CPMO U IPGR JAPSM, UGX MOUM OPL OUGXL CYKYZHSXYX," LOY WHGWSAXYX, WHGBPGWPGN OYKLYSZ MOUM MOY XYMUPSL LOY OUX QALMLYYG CYKY YDUWMSE COUM LOY OUX LYYG PG MOY TPKKHK.LOY OUX PG ZUWM LYYG GHMOPGN MOYG VAM OUX TYGMPHGYX MOY ZPKLM MOPGN MOUMWUTY PGMH OYK OYUX, VAM COUM LOY OUX PGBYGMYX MOYG LYYTYX MH OYK GHCUL KYUS UL UGE HMOYK KYWHSSYWMPHG. LOY GHM HGSE KYTYTVYKYX COUM LOY OUXMOYG LUPX--MOUM OY MAKGYX MH SHHR UM OYK UGX LTPSYX UGX CUL WHBYKYX CPMOLHTYMOPGN KYX--VAM CUL ZPKTSE WHGBPGWYX MOUM LOY OUX MOYG LYYG UGX LUPXMOUM OY CUL WHBYKYX CPMO U IPGR JAPSM UGX MOUM OPL YEYL CYKY WSHLYX."EYL, EYL, PM KYUSSE CUL IPGR!" WKPYX GUMULOU, COH GHC MOHANOM LOYMHH KYTYTVYKYX MOY CHKX IPGR VYPGN ALYX, UGX LUC PG MOPL MOY THLMYDMKUHKXPGUKE UGX TELMYKPHAL IUKM HZ MOY IKYXPWMPHG."VAM COUM XHYL PM TYUG?" LOY UXXYX TYXPMUMPBYSE."HO, P XHG'M RGHC, PM PL USS LH LMKUGNY," KYISPYX LHGEU, WSAMWOPGN UMOYK OYUX.U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC KUGN UGX GUMULOU CYGM MH OPT, VAMLHGEU, ZYYSPGN AGALAUSSE YDWPMYX UGX MHAWOYX, KYTUPGYX UM MOY CPGXHCMOPGRPGN UVHAM MOY LMKUGNYGYLL HZ COUM OUX HWWAKKYX.MOYE OUX UG HIIHKMAGPME MOUM XUE MH LYGX SYMMYKL MH MOY UKTE, UGX MOYWHAGMYLL CUL CKPMPGN MH OYK LHG."LHGEU!" LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, KUPLPGN OYK YEYL ZKHT OYK SYMMYK UL OYKGPYWY IULLYX, "LHGEU, CHG'M EHA CKPMY MH GPWOHSUL?" LOY LIHRY PG U LHZM,MKYTASHAL BHPWY, UGX PG MOY CYUKE YEYL MOUM SHHRYX HBYK OYK LIYWMUWSYLLHGEU KYUX USS MOUM MOY WHAGMYLL TYUGM MH WHGBYE CPMO MOYLY CHKXL. MOHLYYEYL YDIKYLLYX YGMKYUME, LOUTY UM OUBPGN MH ULR, ZYUK HZ U KYZALUS, UGXKYUXPGYLL ZHK KYSYGMSYLL OUMKYX PG WULY HZ LAWO KYZALUS.LHGEU CYGM AI MH MOY WHAGMYLL UGX, RGYYSPGN XHCG, RPLLYX OYK OUGX."EYL, TUTTU, P CPSS CKPMY," LUPX LOY.LHGEU CUL LHZMYGYX, YDWPMYX, UGX MHAWOYX VE USS MOUM OUX HWWAKKYX MOUMXUE, YLIYWPUSSE VE MOY TELMYKPHAL ZASZPSSTYGM LOY OUX QALM LYYG HZ OYKBPLPHG. GHC MOUM LOY RGYC MOUM MOY KYGYCUS HZ GUMULOU'L KYSUMPHGL CPMOIKPGWY UGXKYC CHASX IKYBYGM GPWOHSUL ZKHT TUKKEPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE, LOYCUL QHEZASSE WHGLWPHAL HZ U KYMAKG HZ MOUM LYSZ-LUWKPZPWPGN LIPKPM PGCOPWO LOY CUL UWWALMHTYX MH SPBY UGX SHBYX MH SPBY. LH CPMO U QHEZASWHGLWPHALGYLL HZ IYKZHKTPGN U TUNGUGPTHAL XYYX--PGMYKKAIMYX LYBYKUSMPTYL VE MOY MYUKL MOUM XPTTYX OYK BYSBYME VSUWR YEYL--LOY CKHMY MOUMMHAWOPGN SYMMYK MOY UKKPBUS HZ COPWO OUX LH UTUFYX GPWOHSUL.WOUIMYK PDMOY HZZPWYK UGX LHSXPYKL COH OUX UKKYLMYX IPYKKY MKYUMYX OPT CPMOOHLMPSPME VAM EYM CPMO KYLIYWM, PG MOY NAUKXOHALY MH COPWO OY CUL MURYG.PG MOYPK UMMPMAXY MHCUKX OPT WHASX LMPSS VY ZYSM VHMO AGWYKMUPGME ULMH COH OY TPNOM VY--IYKOUIL U BYKE PTIHKMUGM IYKLHG--UGX OHLMPSPME UL UKYLASM HZ MOYPK KYWYGM IYKLHGUS WHGZSPWM CPMO OPT.VAM COYG MOY NAUKX CUL KYSPYBYX GYDM THKGPGN, IPYKKY ZYSM MOUM ZHK MOYGYC NAUKX--VHMO HZZPWYKL UGX TYG--OY CUL GHM UL PGMYKYLMPGN UL OY OUXVYYG MH OPL WUIMHKL; UGX PG ZUWM MOY NAUKX HZ MOY LYWHGX XUE XPX GHMKYWHNGPFY PG MOPL VPN, LMHAM TUG PG U IYULUGM WHUM MOY BPNHKHAL IYKLHGCOH OUX ZHANOM LH XYLIYKUMYSE CPMO MOY TUKUAXYK UGX MOY WHGBHE UGX OUXAMMYKYX MOHLY LHSYTG CHKXL UVHAM LUBPGN U WOPSX; MOYE LUC PG OPT HGSEGH. 17 HZ MOY WUIMAKYX KALLPUGL, UKKYLMYX UGX XYMUPGYX ZHK LHTY KYULHGVE HKXYK HZ MOY OPNOYK WHTTUGX. PZ MOYE GHMPWYX UGEMOPGN KYTUKRUVSYUVHAM IPYKKY, PM CUL HGSE OPL AGUVULOYX, TYXPMUMPBY WHGWYGMKUMPHGUGX MOHANOMZASGYLL, UGX MOY CUE OY LIHRY ZKYGWO, COPWO LMKAWR MOYT ULLAKIKPLPGNSE NHHX. PG LIPMY HZ MOPL OY CUL ISUWYX MOUM XUE CPMO MOYHMOYK UKKYLMYX LALIYWML, UL MOY LYIUKUMY KHHT OY OUX HWWAIPYX CULKYJAPKYX VE UG HZZPWYK.USS MOY KALLPUGL WHGZPGYX CPMO IPYKKY CYKY TYG HZ MOY SHCYLM WSULL UGX,KYWHNGPFPGN OPT UL U NYGMSYTUG, MOYE USS UBHPXYX OPT, THKY YLIYWPUSSE ULOY LIHRY ZKYGWO. IPYKKY ZYSM LUX UM OYUKPGN MOYT TURPGN ZAG HZ OPT.MOUM YBYGPGN OY SYUKGYX MOUM USS MOYLY IKPLHGYKL (OY, IKHVUVSE, UTHGNMOYT) CYKY MH VY MKPYX ZHK PGWYGXPUKPLT. HG MOY MOPKX XUE OY CUL MURYGCPMO MOY HMOYKL MH U OHALY COYKY U ZKYGWO NYGYKUS CPMO U COPMY TALMUWOYLUM CPMO MCH WHSHGYSL UGX HMOYK ZKYGWOTYG CPMO LWUKBYL HG MOYPK UKTL.CPMO MOY IKYWPLPHG UGX XYZPGPMYGYLL WALMHTUKE PG UXXKYLLPGN IKPLHGYKL,UGX COPWO PL LAIIHLYX MH IKYWSAXY OATUG ZKUPSME, IPYKKY SPRY MOY HMOYKLCUL JAYLMPHGYX UL MH COH OY CUL, COYKY OY OUX VYYG, CPMO COUM HVQYWM,UGX LH HG.MOYLY JAYLMPHGL, SPRY JAYLMPHGL IAM UM MKPUSL NYGYKUSSE, SYZM MOYYLLYGWY HZ MOY TUMMYK ULPXY, LOAM HAM MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZ MOUM YLLYGWY'LVYPGN KYBYUSYX, UGX CYKY XYLPNGYX HGSE MH ZHKT U WOUGGYS MOKHANO COPWOMOY QAXNYL CPLOYX MOY UGLCYKL HZ MOY UWWALYX MH ZSHC LH UL MH SYUX MHMOY XYLPKYX KYLASM, GUTYSE U WHGBPWMPHG. UL LHHG UL IPYKKY VYNUG MH LUEUGEMOPGN MOUM XPX GHM ZPM PG CPMO MOUM UPT, MOY WOUGGYS CUL KYTHBYX UGXMOY CUMYK WHASX ZSHC MH CULMY. IPYKKY ZYSM, THKYHBYK, COUM MOY UWWALYXUSCUEL ZYYS UM MOYPK MKPUS, IYKISYDPME UL MH COE MOYLY JAYLMPHGL CYKYIAM MH OPT. OY OUX U ZYYSPGN MOUM PM CUL HGSE HAM HZ WHGXYLWYGLPHG HK URPGX HZ WPBPSPME MOUM MOPL XYBPWY HZ ISUWPGN U WOUGGYS CUL YTISHEYX. OYRGYC OY CUL PG MOYLY TYG'L IHCYK, MOUM HGSE VE ZHKWY OUX MOYE VKHANOMOPT MOYKY, MOUM ZHKWY USHGY NUBY MOYT MOY KPNOM MH XYTUGX UGLCYKLMH MOYPK JAYLMPHGL, UGX MOUM MOY LHSY HVQYWM HZ MOUM ULLYTVSE CUL MHPGWASIUMY OPT. COYG ULRYX COUM OYCUL XHPGN COYG OY CUL UKKYLMYX, IPYKKY KYISPYX PG U KUMOYK MKUNPW TUGGYKMOUM OY CUL KYLMHKPGN MH PML IUKYGML U WOPSX OY OUX LUBYX ZKHT MOYZSUTYL. COE OUX OY ZHANOM MOY TUKUAXYK? IPYKKY UGLCYKYX MOUM OY "CULIKHMYWMPGN U CHTUG," UGX MOUM "MH IKHMYWM U CHTUG COH CUL VYPGN PGLASMYXCUL MOY XAME HZ YBYKE TUG; MOUM..." MOYE PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, ZHK MOPLCUL GHM MH MOY IHPGM. UNUPG MOYE PGMYKKAIMYX OPT: MOYE OUX GHM ULRYXCOYKY OY CUL NHPGN, VAM COE OY CUL ZHAGX GYUK MOY ZPKY? COH CUL OY? MOYEULRYX, KYIYUMPGN MOYPK ZPKLM JAYLMPHG, COPWO OY OUX XYWSPGYX MH UGLCYK.UNUPG OY KYISPYX MOUM OY WHASX GHM UGLCYK PM."IAM MOUM XHCG, MOUM'L VUX... BYKE VUX," LMYKGSE KYTUKRYX MOY NYGYKUSCPMO MOY COPMY TALMUWOY UGX KYX ZSALOYX ZUWY.HG MOY ZHAKMO XUE ZPKYL VKHRY HAM HG MOY FAVHBLRP KUTIUKM.IPYKKY UGX MOPKMYYG HMOYKL CYKY THBYX MH MOY WHUWO OHALY HZ U TYKWOUGM'LOHALY GYUK MOY WKPTYUG VKPXNY. HG OPL CUE MOKHANO MOY LMKYYML IPYKKYZYSM LMPZSYX VE MOY LTHRY COPWO LYYTYX MH OUGN HBYK MOY COHSYWPME. ZPKYL CYKY BPLPVSY HG USS LPXYL. OY XPX GHM MOYG KYUSPFY MOYLPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOY VAKGPGN HZ THLWHC, UGX SHHRYX UM MOY ZPKYL CPMOOHKKHK.OY IULLYX ZHAK XUEL PG MOY WHUWO OHALY GYUK MOY WKPTYUG VKPXNY UGXXAKPGN MOUM MPTY SYUKGYX, ZKHT MOY MUSR HZ MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL, MOUM USSMOHLY WHGZPGYX MOYKY CYKY UCUPMPGN U XYWPLPHG COPWO TPNOM WHTY UGE XUEZKHT MOY TUKLOUS. COUM TUKLOUS MOPL CUL, IPYKKY WHASX GHM SYUKG ZKHT MOYLHSXPYKL. YBPXYGMSE ZHK MOYT "MOY TUKLOUS" KYIKYLYGMYX U BYKE OPNO UGXKUMOYK TELMYKPHAL IHCYK.MOYLY ZPKLM XUEL, VYZHKY MOY YPNOMO HZ LYIMYTVYK COYG MOY IKPLHGYKL CYKYOUX AI ZHK U LYWHGX YDUTPGUMPHG, CYKY MOY OUKXYLM HZ USS ZHK IPYKKY.WOUIMYK DHG MOY YPNOMO HZ LYIMYTVYK UG HZZPWYK--U BYKE PTIHKMUGM HGY QAXNPGN VEMOY KYLIYWM MOY NAUKXL LOHCYX OPT--YGMYKYX MOY WHUWO OHALY COYKY MOYIKPLHGYKL CYKY. MOPL HZZPWYK, IKHVUVSE LHTYHGY HG MOY LMUZZ, CUL OHSXPGNU IUIYK PG OPL OUGX, UGX WUSSYX HBYK USS MOY KALLPUGL MOYKY, GUTPGNIPYKKY UL "MOY TUG COH XHYL GHM NPBY OPL GUTY." NSUGWPGN PGXHSYGMSE UGXPGXPZZYKYGMSE UM USS MOY IKPLHGYKL, OY HKXYKYX MOY HZZPWYK PG WOUKNYMH OUBY MOYT XYWYGMSE XKYLLYX UGX MPXPYX AI VYZHKY MURPGN MOYT MH MOYTUKLOUS. UG OHAK SUMYK U LJAUX HZ LHSXPYKL UKKPBYX UGX IPYKKY CPMOMOPKMYYG HMOYKL CUL SYX MH MOY BPKNPG'L ZPYSX. PM CUL U ZPGY XUE, LAGGEUZMYK KUPG, UGX MOY UPK CUL AGALAUSSE IAKY. MOY LTHRY XPX GHM OUGN SHCUL HG MOY XUE COYG IPYKKY OUX VYYG MURYG ZKHT MOY NAUKXOHALY HG MOYFAVHBLRP KUTIUKM, VAM KHLY MOKHANO MOY IAKY UPK PG WHSATGL. GH ZSUTYLCYKY LYYG, VAM WHSATGL HZ LTHRY KHLY HG USS LPXYL, UGX USS THLWHC UL ZUKUL IPYKKY WHASX LYY CUL HGY BULM WOUKKYX KAPG. VAM MOYKY LYYTYX MH VY GH HGY MH WYSYVKUMY MOPLOHSPXUE: YBYKECOYKY CYKY VSUWRYGYX KAPGL, UGX MOY ZYC KALLPUGL MH VYLYYG CYKY MUMMYKYX UGX ZKPNOMYGYX IYHISY COH MKPYX MH OPXY COYG MOYE LUCMOY ZKYGWO.PM CUL ISUPG MOUM MOY KALLPUG GYLM CUL KAPGYX UGX XYLMKHEYX, VAM PGISUWY HZ MOY KALLPUG HKXYK HZ SPZY MOUM OUX VYYG XYLMKHEYX, IPYKKYAGWHGLWPHALSE ZYSM MOUM U JAPMY XPZZYKYGM, ZPKT, ZKYGWO HKXYK OUX VYYGYLMUVSPLOYX HBYK MOPL KAPGYX GYLM. VAM GH: MOY UGLCYKL OY OUX NPBYG COYG JAYLMPHGYX OUX WHTYVUWR MH OPT PG OPL XYLPNGUMPHG UL "MOY TUG COH XHYL GHM NPBY OPL GUTY,"UGX AGXYK MOUM UIIYSSUMPHG, COPWO MH IPYKKY LYYTYX MYKKPVSY, MOYE CYKYGHC SYUXPGN OPT LHTYCOYKY CPMO AGOYLPMUMPGN ULLAKUGWY HG MOYPK ZUWYLMOUM OY UGX USS MOY HMOYK IKPLHGYKL CYKY YDUWMSE MOY HGYL MOYE CUGMYXUGX MOUM MOYE CYKY VYPGN MURYG MH MOY IKHIYK ISUWY. IPYKKY ZYSM OPTLYSZMH VY UG PGLPNGPZPWUGM WOPI ZUSSYG UTHGN MOY COYYSL HZ U TUWOPGY COHLYUWMPHG OY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX VAM COPWO CUL CHKRPGN CYSS.OY UGX MOY HMOYK IKPLHGYKL CYKY MURYG MH MOY KPNOM LPXY HZ MOY BPKNPG'LZPYSX, MH U SUKNY COPMY OHALY CPMO UG PTTYGLY NUKXYG GHM ZUK ZKHT MOYWHGBYGM. MOPL CUL IKPGWY LOWOYKVPMHB'L OHALY, COYKY IPYKKY OUX HZMYGVYYG PG HMOYK XUEL, UGX COPWO, UL OY SYUKGYX ZKHT MOY MUSR HZ MOYLHSXPYKL, CUL GHC HWWAIPYX VE MOY TUKLOUS, MOY XARY HZ YWRTAOS (XUBHAM).MOYE CYKY MURYG MH MOY YGMKUGWY UGX SYX PGMH MOY OHALY HGY VE HGY.IPYKKY CUL MOY LPDMO MH YGMYK. OY CUL WHGXAWMYX MOKHANO U NSULL NUSSYKE,UG UGMYKHHT, UGX U OUSS, COPWO CYKY ZUTPSPUK MH OPT, PGMH U SHGN SHCLMAXE UM MOY XHHK HZ COPWO LMHHX UG UXQAMUGM.XUBHAM, LIYWMUWSYL HG GHLY, LUM VYGM HBYK U MUVSY UM MOY ZAKMOYK YGX HZMOY KHHT. CPMOHAM KUPLPGN OPL YEYL,OY LUPX PG U SHC BHPWY:"COH UKY EHA?"IPYKKY CUL LPSYGM VYWUALY OY CUL PGWUIUVSY HZ AMMYKPGN U CHKX. SHHRPGN UM OPL WHSX ZUWY, UL OY LUM SPRY U LMYKG LWOHHSTULMYKCOH CUL IKYIUKYX MH CUPM UCOPSY ZHK UG UGLCYK, IPYKKY ZYSM MOUM YBYKEPGLMUGM HZ XYSUE TPNOM WHLM OPT OPL SPZY; VAM OY XPX GHM RGHC COUMMH LUE. VAM VYZHKY OY OUX XYWPXYX COUM MH XH,XUBHAM KUPLYX OPL OYUX, IALOYX OPL LIYWMUWSYL VUWR HG OPL ZHKYOYUX,LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL, UGX SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM OPT."P RGHC MOUM TUG," OY LUPX PG U WHSX, TYULAKYX MHGY, YBPXYGMSEWUSWASUMYX MH ZKPNOMYG IPYKKY.MOY WOPSS MOUM OUX VYYG KAGGPGN XHCG IPYKKY'L VUWR GHC LYPFYX OPL OYUXUL PG U BPLY."EHA WUGGHM RGHC TY, NYGYKUS, P OUBY GYBYK LYYG EHA...""OY PL U KALLPUG LIE," XUBHAM PGMYKKAIMYX, UXXKYLLPGN UGHMOYK NYGYKUSCOH CUL IKYLYGM, VAM COHT IPYKKY OUX GHM GHMPWYX.XUBHAM MAKGYX UCUE. CPMO UG AGYDIYWMYX KYBYKVYKUMPHG PG OPL BHPWY IPYKKYKUIPXSE VYNUG:"GH, THGLYPNGYAK," OY LUPX, LAXXYGSE KYTYTVYKPGN MOUM XUBHAM CUL U XARY."GH, THGLYPNGYAK, EHA WUGGHM OUBY RGHCG TY. P UT U TPSPMPU HZZPWYK UGXOUBY GHM JAPMMYX THLWHC.""EHAK GUTY?" ULRYX XUBHAM."VYFAROHB.""COUM IKHHZ OUBY P MOUM EHA UKY GHM SEPGN?""THGLYPNGYAK!" YDWSUPTYX IPYKKY, GHM PG UG HZZYGXYX VAM PG U ISYUXPGNBHPWY.XUBHAM SHHRYX AI UGX NUFYX PGMYGMSE UM OPT. ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL MOYE SHHRYXUM HGY UGHMOYK, UGX MOUM SHHR LUBYX IPYKKY. UIUKM ZKHT WHGXPMPHGL HZ CUKUGX SUC, MOUM SHHR YLMUVSPLOYX OATUG KYSUMPHGL VYMCYYG MOY MCH TYG. UMMOUM THTYGM UG PTTYGLY GATVYK HZ MOPGNL IULLYX XPTSE MOKHANO VHMO MOYPKTPGXL, UGX MOYE KYUSPFYX MOUM MOYE CYKY VHMO WOPSXKYG HZ OATUGPME UGXCYKY VKHMOYKL.UM MOY ZPKLM NSUGWY, COYG XUBHAM OUX HGSE KUPLYX OPL OYUX ZKHT MOYIUIYKL COYKY OATUG UZZUPKL UGX SPBYL CYKY PGXPWUMYX VE GATVYKL, IPYKKYCUL TYKYSE U WPKWATLMUGWY, UGX XUBHAM WHASX OUBY LOHM OPT CPMOHAMVAKXYGPGN OPL WHGLWPYGWY CPMO UG YBPS XYYX, VAM GHC OY LUC PG OPT UOATUG VYPGN. OY KYZSYWMYX ZHK U THTYGM."OHC WUG EHA LOHC TY MOUM EHA UKY MYSSPGN MOY MKAMO?" LUPX XUBHAMWHSXSE.IPYKKY KYTYTVYKYX KUTVUSSY, UGX GUTYX OPT UGX OPL KYNPTYGM UGX MOYLMKYYM COYKY MOY OHALY CUL."EHA UKY GHM COUM EHA LUE," KYMAKGYX XUBHAM.PG U MKYTVSPGN, ZUSMYKPGN BHPWY IPYKKY VYNUG UXXAWPGN IKHHZL HZ MOYMKAMO HZ OPL LMUMYTYGML.VAM UM MOUM THTYGM UG UXQAMUGM YGMYKYX UGX KYIHKMYX LHTYMOPGN MH XUBHAM.XUBHAM VKPNOMYGYX AI UM MOY GYCL MOY UXQAMUGM VKHANOM, UGX VYNUGVAMMHGPGN AI OPL AGPZHKT. PM LYYTYX MOUM OY OUX JAPMY ZHKNHMMYG IPYKKY.COYG MOY UXQAMUGM KYTPGXYX OPT HZ MOY IKPLHGYK, OY QYKRYX OPL OYUX PGIPYKKY'L XPKYWMPHG CPMO U ZKHCG UGX HKXYKYX OPT MH VY SYX UCUE. VAMCOYKY MOYE CYKY MH MURY OPT IPYKKY XPX GHM RGHC: VUWR MH MOY WHUWO OHALYHK MH MOY ISUWY HZ YDYWAMPHG OPL WHTIUGPHGL OUX IHPGMYX HAM MH OPT ULMOYE WKHLLYX MOY BPKNPG'L ZPYSX.OY MAKGYX OPL OYUX UGX LUC MOUM MOY UXQAMUGM CUL IAMMPGN UGHMOYKJAYLMPHG MH XUBHAM."EYL, HZ WHAKLY!" KYISPYX XUBHAM, VAM COUM MOPL "EYL" TYUGM, IPYKKY XPXGHM RGHC.IPYKKY WHASX GHM UZMYKCUKXL KYTYTVYK OHC OY CYGM, COYMOYK PM CUL ZUK, HKPG COPWO XPKYWMPHG. OPL ZUWASMPYL CYKY JAPMY GATVYX, OY CUL LMAIYZPYX,UGX GHMPWPGN GHMOPGN UKHAGX OPT CYGM HG THBPGN OPL SYNL UL MOY HMOYKLXPX MPSS MOYE USS LMHIIYX UGX OY LMHIIYX MHH. MOY HGSE MOHANOM PG OPLTPGX UM MOUM MPTY CUL: COH CUL PM MOUM OUX KYUSSE LYGMYGWYX OPT MHXYUMO? GHM MOY TYG HG MOY WHTTPLLPHG MOUM OUX ZPKLM YDUTPGYX OPT--GHMHGY HZ MOYT CPLOYX MH HK, YBPXYGMSE, WHASX OUBY XHGY PM. PM CUL GHMXUBHAM, COH OUX SHHRYX UM OPT PG LH OATUG U CUE. PG UGHMOYK THTYGMXUBHAM CHASX OUBY KYUSPFYX MOUM OY CUL XHPGN CKHGN, VAM QALM MOYGMOY UXQAMUGM OUX WHTY PG UGX PGMYKKAIMYX OPT. MOY UXQAMUGM, USLH, OUXYBPXYGMSE OUX GH YBPS PGMYGM MOHANO OY TPNOM OUBY KYZKUPGYX ZKHT WHTPGNPG. MOYG COH CUL YDYWAMPGN OPT, RPSSPGN OPT, XYIKPBPGN OPT HZ SPZY--OPT,IPYKKY, CPMO USS OPL TYTHKPYL, ULIPKUMPHGL, OHIYL, UGX MOHANOML? COH CULXHPGN MOPL? UGX IPYKKY ZYSM MOUM PM CUL GH HGY.PM CUL U LELMYT--U WHGWAKKYGWY HZ WPKWATLMUGWYL.U LELMYT HZ LHTY LHKM CUL RPSSPGN OPT--IPYKKY--XYIKPBPGN OPT HZ SPZY, HZYBYKEMOPGN, UGGPOPSUMPGN OPT.WOUIMYK DPZKHT IKPGWY LOWOYKVUMHB'L OHALY MOY IKPLHGYKL CYKY SYX LMKUPNOM XHCG MOYBPKNPG'L ZPYSX, MH MOY SYZM HZ MOY GAGGYKE, UL ZUK UL U RPMWOYG NUKXYGPG COPWO U IHLM OUX VYYG LYM AI. VYEHGX MOUM IHLM U ZKYLO IPM OUX VYYGXAN PG MOY NKHAGX, UGX GYUK MOY IHLM UGX MOY IPM U SUKNY WKHCX LMHHXPG U LYTPWPKWSY. MOY WKHCX WHGLPLMYX HZ U ZYC KALLPUGL UGX TUGE HZGUIHSYHG'L LHSXPYKL COH CYKY GHM HG XAME--NYKTUGL, PMUSPUGL, UGXZKYGWOTYG, PG U BUKPYME HZ AGPZHKTL. MH MOY KPNOM UGX SYZM HZ MOY IHLMLMHHX KHCL HZ ZKYGWO MKHHIL PG VSAY AGPZHKTL CPMO KYX YIUASYML UGX OPNOVHHML UGX LOURHL.MOY IKPLHGYKL CYKY ISUWYX PG U WYKMUPG HKXYK, UWWHKXPGN MH MOY SPLM(IPYKKY CUL LPDMO), UGX CYKY SYX MH MOY IHLM. LYBYKUS XKATL LAXXYGSEVYNUG MH VYUM HG VHMO LPXYL HZ MOYT, UGX UM MOUM LHAGX IPYKKY ZYSM ULPZ IUKM HZ OPL LHAS OUX VYYG MHKG UCUE. OY SHLM MOY IHCYK HZ MOPGRPGNHK AGXYKLMUGXPGN. OY WHASX HGSE OYUK UGX LYY. UGX OY OUX HGSE HGYCPLO--MOUM MOY ZKPNOMZAS MOPGN MOUM OUX MH OUIIYG LOHASX OUIIYG JAPWRSE.IPYKKY SHHRYX KHAGX UM OPL ZYSSHC IKPLHGYKL UGX LWKAMPGPFYX MOYT.MOY MCH ZPKLM CYKY WHGBPWML CPMO LOUBYG OYUXL. HGY CUL MUSS UGX MOPG,MOY HMOYK XUKR, LOUNNE, UGX LPGYCE, CPMO U ZSUM GHLY. MOY MOPKX CULU XHTYLMPW LYKZ, UVHAM ZHKME-ZPBY EYUKL HSX, CPMO NKPFFSYX OUPK UGX UISATI, CYSS-GHAKPLOYX VHXE. MOY ZHAKMO CUL U IYULUGM, U BYKE OUGXLHTYTUG CPMO U VKHUX, SPNOM-VKHCG VYUKX UGX VSUWR YEYL. MOY ZPZMO CUL UZUWMHKE OUGX, U MOPG, LUSSHC-ZUWYX SUX HZ YPNOMYYG PG U SHHLY WHUM.IPYKKY OYUKX MOY ZKYGWO WHGLASMPGN COYMOYK MH LOHHM MOYT LYIUKUMYSE HKMCH UM U MPTY. "PG WHAISYL," KYISPYX MOY HZZPWYK PG WHTTUGX PG U WUSTBHPWY. MOYKY CUL U LMPK PG MOY KUGRL HZ MOY LHSXPYKL UGX PM CUL YBPXYGMMOUM MOYE CYKY USS OAKKEPGN--GHM UL TYG OAKKE MH XH LHTYMOPGN MOYEAGXYKLMUGX, VAM UL IYHISY OAKKE MH ZPGPLO U GYWYLLUKE VAM AGISYULUGM UGXPGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY MULR.U ZKYGWO HZZPWPUS CYUKPGN U LWUKZ WUTY AI MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY KHC HZIKPLHGYKL UGX KYUX HAM MOY LYGMYGWY PG KALLPUG UGX PG ZKYGWO.MOYG MCH IUPKL HZ ZKYGWOTYG UIIKHUWOYX MOY WKPTPGUSL UGX UM MOYHZZPWYK'L WHTTUGX MHHR MOY MCH WHGBPWML COH LMHHX ZPKLM PG MOY KHC. MOYWHGBPWML LMHIIYX COYG MOYE KYUWOYX MOY IHLM UGX, COPSY LUWRL CYKY VYPGNVKHANOM, SHHRYX XATVSE UKHAGX UL U CHAGXYX VYULM SHHRL UM UG UIIKHUWOPGNOAGMLTUG. HGY WKHLLYX OPTLYSZ WHGMPGAUSSE, MOY HMOYK LWKUMWOYX OPL VUWRUGX TUXY U THBYTYGM HZ MOY SPIL KYLYTVSPGN U LTPSY. CPMO OAKKPYX OUGXLMOY LHSXPYKL VSPGXZHSXYX MOYT, XKUCPGN MOY LUWRL HBYK MOYPK OYUXL, UGXVHAGX MOYT MH MOY IHLM.MCYSBY LOUKILOHHMYKL CPMO TALRYML LMYIIYX HAM HZ MOY KUGRL CPMO U ZPKTKYNASUK MKYUX UGX OUSMYX YPNOM IUWYL ZKHT MOY IHLM. IPYKKY MAKGYX UCUEMH UBHPX LYYPGN COUM CUL NHPGN MH OUIIYG. LAXXYGSE U WKUWRSPGN, KHSSPGNGHPLY CUL OYUKX COPWO LYYTYX MH OPT SHAXYK MOUG MOY THLM MYKKPZPWMOAGXYK, UGX OY SHHRYX KHAGX. MOYKY CUL LHTY LTHRY, UGX MOY ZKYGWOTYGCYKY XHPGN LHTYMOPGN GYUK MOY IPM, CPMO IUSY ZUWYL UGX MKYTVSPGN OUGXL.MCH THKY IKPLHGYKL CYKY SYX AI. PG MOY LUTY CUE UGX CPMO LPTPSUK SHHRL,MOYLY MCH NSUGWYX BUPGSE UM MOY HGSHHRYKL CPMO HGSE U LPSYGM UIIYUS ZHKIKHMYWMPHG PG MOYPK YEYL, YBPXYGMSE AGUVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX HK VYSPYBYCOUM CUL NHPGN MH OUIIYG MH MOYT. MOYE WHASX GHM VYSPYBY PM VYWUALY MOYEUSHGY RGYC COUM MOYPK SPZY TYUGM MH MOYT, UGX LH MOYE GYPMOYK AGXYKLMHHXGHK VYSPYBYX MOUM PM WHASX VY MURYG ZKHT MOYT.UNUPG IPYKKY XPX GHM CPLO MH SHHR UGX UNUPG MAKGYX UCUE; VAM UNUPG MOYLHAGX UL HZ U ZKPNOMZAS YDISHLPHG LMKAWR OPL YUK, UGX UM MOY LUTY THTYGMOY LUC LTHRY, VSHHX, UGX MOY IUSY, LWUKYX ZUWYL HZ MOY ZKYGWOTYG COHCYKY UNUPG XHPGN LHTYMOPGN VE MOY IHLM, MOYPK MKYTVSPGN OUGXL PTIYXPGNHGY UGHMOYK. IPYKKY, VKYUMOPGN OYUBPSE, SHHRYX UKHAGX UL PZ ULRPGN COUMPM TYUGM. MOY LUTY JAYLMPHG CUL YDIKYLLYX PG USS MOY SHHRL MOUM TYM OPL.HG MOY ZUWYL HZ USS MOY KALLPUGL UGX HZ MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL UGX HZZPWYKLCPMOHAM YDWYIMPHG, OY KYUX MOY LUTY XPLTUE, OHKKHK, UGX WHGZSPWM MOUMCYKY PG OPL HCG OYUKM. "VAM COH, UZMYK USS, PL XHPGN MOPL? MOYE UKY USSLAZZYKPGN UL P UT. COH MOYG PL PM? COH?" ZSULOYX ZHK UG PGLMUGM MOKHANOOPL TPGX."LOUKILOHHMYKL HZ MOY 86MO, ZHKCUKX!" LOHAMYX LHTYHGY. MOY ZPZMOIKPLHGYK, MOY HGY GYDM MH IPYKKY, CUL SYX UCUE--USHGY. IPYKKY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX MOUM OY CUL LUBYX, MOUM OY UGX MOY KYLM OUX VYYG VKHANOMMOYKY HGSE MH CPMGYLL MOY YDYWAMPHG. CPMO YBYK-NKHCPGN OHKKHK, UGX GHLYGLY HZ QHE HK KYSPYZ, OY NUFYX UM COUM CUL MURPGN ISUWY. MOY ZPZMO TUGCUL MOY ZUWMHKE SUX PG MOY SHHLY WSHUR. MOY THTYGM MOYE SUPX OUGXL HGOPT OY LIKUGN ULPXY PG MYKKHK UGX WSAMWOYX UM IPYKKY. (IPYKKY LOAXXYKYXUGX LOHHR OPTLYSZ ZKYY.) MOY SUX CUL AGUVSY MH CUSR. MOYE XKUNNYX OPTUSHGN, OHSXPGN OPT AI AGXYK MOY UKTL, UGX OY LWKYUTYX. COYG MOYE NHMOPT MH MOY IHLM OY NKYC JAPYM, UL PZ OY LAXXYGSE AGXYKLMHHX LHTYMOPGN.COYMOYK OY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM LWKYUTPGN CUL ALYSYLL HK COYMOYK OY MOHANOMPM PGWKYXPVSY MOUM TYG LOHASX RPSS OPT, UM UGE KUMY OY MHHR OPL LMUGX UMMOY IHLM, CUPMPGN MH VY VSPGXZHSXYX SPRY MOY HMOYKL, UGX SPRY U CHAGXYXUGPTUS SHHRYX UKHAGX OPT CPMO NSPMMYKPGN YEYL.IPYKKY CUL GH SHGNYK UVSY MH MAKG UCUE UGX WSHLY OPL YEYL. OPL WAKPHLPMEUGX UNPMUMPHG, SPRY MOUM HZ MOY COHSY WKHCX, KYUWOYX MOY OPNOYLM IPMWOUM MOPL ZPZMO TAKXYK. SPRY MOY HMOYKL MOPL ZPZMO TUG LYYTYX WUST; OYCKUIIYX OPL SHHLY WSHUR WSHLYK UGX KAVVYX HGY VUKY ZHHM CPMO MOY HMOYK.COYG MOYE VYNUG MH VSPGXZHSX OPT OY OPTLYSZ UXQALMYX MOY RGHM COPWOOAKM MOY VUWR HZ OPL OYUX; MOYG COYG MOYE IKHIIYX OPT UNUPGLM MOYVSHHXLMUPGYX IHLM, OY SYUGYX VUWR UGX, GHM VYPGN WHTZHKMUVSY PG MOUMIHLPMPHG, LMKUPNOMYGYX OPTLYSZ, UXQALMYX OPL ZYYM, UGX SYUGYX VUWR UNUPGTHKY WHTZHKMUVSE. IPYKKY XPX GHM MURY OPL YEYL ZKHT OPT UGX XPX GHM TPLLOPL LSPNOMYLM THBYTYGM.IKHVUVSE U CHKX HZ WHTTUGX CUL NPBYG UGX CUL ZHSSHCYX VE MOY KYIHKML HZYPNOM TALRYML; VAM MKE UL OY CHASX IPYKKY WHASX GHM UZMYKCUKXL KYTYTVYKOUBPGN OYUKX MOY LSPNOMYLM LHAGX HZ MOY LOHML. OY HGSE LUC OHC MOYCHKRTUG LAXXYGSE LUGR XHCG HG MOY WHKXL MOUM OYSX OPT, OHC VSHHX LOHCYXPMLYSZ PG MCH ISUWYL, OHC MOY KHIYL LSUWRYGYX AGXYK MOY CYPNOM HZ MOYOUGNPGN VHXE, UGX OHC MOY CHKRTUG LUM XHCG, OPL OYUX OUGNPGN AGGUMAKUSSEUGX HGY SYN VYGM AGXYK OPT. IPYKKY KUG AI MH MOY IHLM. GH HGY OPGXYKYXOPT. IUSY, ZKPNOMYGYX IYHISY CYKY XHPGN LHTYMOPGN UKHAGX MOY CHKRTUG.MOY SHCYK QUC HZ UG HSX ZKYGWOTUG CPMO U MOPWR TALMUWOY MKYTVSYX UL OYAGMPYX MOY KHIYL. MOY VHXE WHSSUILYX. MOY LHSXPYKL XKUNNYX PM UCRCUKXSEZKHT MOY IHLM UGX VYNUG IALOPGN PM PGMH MOY IPM.MOYE USS ISUPGSE UGX WYKMUPGSE RGYC MOUM MOYE CYKY WKPTPGUSL COH TALMOPXY MOY MKUWYL HZ MOYPK NAPSM UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY.IPYKKY NSUGWYX PGMH MOY IPM UGX LUC MOUM MOY ZUWMHKE SUX CUL SEPGN CPMOOPL RGYYL WSHLY AI MH OPL OYUX UGX HGY LOHASXYK OPNOYK MOUG MOY HMOYK.MOUM LOHASXYK KHLY UGX ZYSS KOEMOTPWUSSE UGX WHGBASLPBYSE, VAM LIUXYZASLHZ YUKMO CYKY USKYUXE VYPGN MOKHCG HBYK MOY COHSY VHXE. HGY HZ MOYLHSXPYKL, YBPXYGMSE LAZZYKPGN, LOHAMYX NKAZZSE UGX UGNKPSE UM IPYKKY MHNH VUWR. VAM IPYKKY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT UGX KYTUPGYX GYUK MOY IHLM,UGX GH HGY XKHBY OPT UCUE.COYG MOY IPM OUX VYYG ZPSSYX AI U WHTTUGX CUL NPBYG. IPYKKY CUL MURYGVUWR MH OPL ISUWY, UGX MOY KHCL HZ MKHHIL HG VHMO LPXYL HZ MOY IHLMTUXY U OUSZ MAKG UGX CYGM IULM PM UM U TYULAKYX IUWY. MOY MCYGME-ZHAKLOUKILOHHMYKL CPMO XPLWOUKNYX TALRYML, LMUGXPGN PG MOY WYGMYK HZ MOYWPKWSY, KUG VUWR MH MOYPK ISUWYL UL MOY WHTIUGPYL IULLYX VE.IPYKKY NUFYX GHC CPMO XUFYX YEYL UM MOYLY LOUKILOHHMYKL COH KUG PGWHAISYL HAM HZ MOY WPKWSY. MOPLHGY, U EHAGN LHSXPYK, OPL ZUWY XYUXSE IUSY, OPL LOURH IALOYX VUWR, UGXOPL TALRYM KYLMPGN HG MOY NKHAGX, LMPSS LMHHX GYUK MOY IPM UM MOY LIHMZKHT COPWO OY OUX ZPKYX. OY LCUEYX SPRY U XKAGRYG TUG, MURPGN LHTY LMYILZHKCUKX UGX VUWR MH LUBY OPTLYSZ ZKHT ZUSSPGN. UG HSX, GHGWHTTPLLPHGYXHZZPWYK KUG HAM HZ MOY KUGRL UGX MURPGN OPT VE MOY YSVHC XKUNNYX OPT MHOPL WHTIUGE. MOY WKHCX HZ KALLPUGL UGX ZKYGWOTYG VYNUG MH XPLIYKLY. MOYEUSS CYGM UCUE LPSYGMSE UGX CPMO XKHHIPGN OYUXL."MOUM CPSS MYUWO MOYT MH LMUKM ZPKYL," LUPX HGY HZ MOY ZKYGWOTYG.IPYKKY NSUGWYX KHAGX UM MOY LIYURYK UGX LUC MOUM PM CUL U LHSXPYK COHCUL MKEPGN MH ZPGX LHTY KYSPYZ UZMYK COUM OUX VYYG XHGY, VAM CUL GHMUVSY MH XH LH. CPMOHAM ZPGPLOPGN COUM OY OUX VYNAG MH LUE OY TUXY UOHIYSYLL THBYTYGM CPMO OPL UKT UGX CYGM UCUE.WOUIMYK DPPUZMYK MOY YDYWAMPHG IPYKKY CUL LYIUKUMYX ZKHT MOY KYLM HZ MOY IKPLHGYKLUGX ISUWYX USHGY PG U LTUSS, KAPGYX, UGX VYZHASYX WOAKWO.MHCUKX YBYGPGN U GHGWHTTPLLPHGYX HZZPWYK YGMYKYX CPMO MCH LHSXPYKL UGXMHSX OPT MOUM OY OUX VYYG IUKXHGYX UGX CHASX GHC NH MH MOY VUKKUWRL ZHKMOY IKPLHGYKL HZ CUK. CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN COUM CUL LUPX MH OPT, IPYKKYNHM AI UGX CYGM CPMO MOY LHSXPYKL.
