PG MOY XUKRGYLL LHTY MCYGMEXPZZYKYGM TYG LAKKHAGXYX IPYKKY. OY SHHRYX UM MOYT CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGNCOH MOYE CYKY, COE MOYE CYKY MOYKY, HK COUM MOYE CUGMYX HZ OPT. OY OYUKXCOUM MOYE LUPX, VAM XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY CHKXL UGXTUXY GH RPGX HZ XYXAWMPHG ZKHT HK UIISPWUMPHG HZ MOYT. OY KYISPYX MHJAYLMPHGL MOYE IAM MH OPT, VAM XPX GHM WHGLPXYK COH CUL SPLMYGPGN MH OPLKYISPYL, GHK OHC MOYE CHASX AGXYKLMUGX MOYT. OY SHHRYX UM MOYPK ZUWYLUGX ZPNAKYL, VAM MOYE USS LYYTYX MH OPT YJAUSSE TYUGPGNSYLL.ZKHT MOY THTYGM IPYKKY OUX CPMGYLLYX MOHLY MYKKPVSY TAKXYKL WHTTPMMYX VETYG COH XPX GHM CPLO MH WHTTPM MOYT, PM CUL UL PZ MOY TUPGLIKPGN HZOPL SPZY, HG COPWO YBYKEMOPGN XYIYGXYX UGX COPWO TUXY YBYKEMOPGN UIIYUKUSPBY, OUX LAXXYGSE VYYG CKYGWOYX HAM UGX YBYKEMOPGN OUX WHSSUILYXPGMH U OYUI HZ TYUGPGNSYLL KAVVPLO. MOHANO OY XPX GHM UWRGHCSYXNY PM MHOPTLYSZ, OPL ZUPMO PG MOY KPNOM HKXYKPGN HZ MOY AGPBYKLY, PG OATUGPME,PG OPL HCG LHAS, UGX PG NHX, OUX VYYG XYLMKHEYX. OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX MOPLVYZHKY, VAM GYBYK LH LMKHGNSE UL GHC. COYG LPTPSUK XHAVML OUX ULLUPSYXOPT VYZHKY, MOYE OUX VYYG MOY KYLASM HZ OPL HCG CKHGNXHPGN, UGX UM MOYVHMMHT HZ OPL OYUKM OY OUX ZYSM MOUM KYSPYZ ZKHT OPL XYLIUPK UGX ZKHTMOHLY XHAVML CUL MH VY ZHAGX CPMOPG OPTLYSZ. VAM GHC OY ZYSM MOUMMOY AGPBYKLY OUX WKATVSYX VYZHKY OPL YEYL UGX HGSE TYUGPGNSYLL KAPGLKYTUPGYX, UGX MOPL GHM VE UGE ZUASM HZ OPL HCG. OY ZYSM MOUM PM CUL GHMPG OPL IHCYK MH KYNUPG ZUPMO PG MOY TYUGPGN HZ SPZY.UKHAGX OPT PG MOY XUKRGYLL TYG CYKY LMUGXPGN UGX YBPXYGMSE LHTYMOPGNUVHAM OPT PGMYKYLMYX MOYT NKYUMSE. MOYE CYKY MYSSPGN OPT LHTYMOPGN UGXULRPGN OPT LHTYMOPGN. MOYG MOYE SYX OPT UCUE LHTYCOYKY, UGX UM SULM OYZHAGX OPTLYSZ PG U WHKGYK HZ MOY LOYX UTHGN TYG COH CYKY SUANOPGN UGXMUSRPGN HG USS LPXYL."CYSS, MOYG, TUMYL... MOUM BYKE IKPGWY COH..." LHTY BHPWY UM MOY HMOYKYGX HZ MOY LOYX CUL LUEPGN, CPMO U LMKHGN YTIOULPL HG MOY CHKX COH.LPMMPGN LPSYGM UGX THMPHGSYLL HG U OYUI HZ LMKUC UNUPGLM MOY CUSS,IPYKKY LHTYMPTYL HIYGYX UGX LHTYMPTYL WSHLYX OPL YEYL. VAM UL LHHG ULOY WSHLYX MOYT OY LUC VYZHKY OPT MOY XKYUXZAS ZUWY HZ MOY ZUWMHKESUX--YLIYWPUSSE XKYUXZAS VYWUALY HZ PML LPTISPWPME--UGX MOY ZUWYL HZ MOYTAKXYKYKL, YBYG THKY XKYUXZAS VYWUALY HZ MOYPK XPLJAPYM. UGX OY HIYGYXOPL YEYL UNUPG UGX LMUKYX BUWUGMSE PGMH MOY XUKRGYLL UKHAGX OPT.VYLPXY OPT PG U LMHHIPGN IHLPMPHG LUM U LTUSS TUG HZ COHLY IKYLYGWY OYCUL ZPKLM TUXY UCUKY VE U LMKHGN LTYSS HZ IYKLIPKUMPHG COPWO WUTY ZKHTOPT YBYKE MPTY OY THBYX. MOPL TUG CUL XHPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OPL SYNL PG MOYXUKRGYLL, UGX MOHANO IPYKKY WHASX GHM LYY OPL ZUWY OY ZYSM MOUM MOY TUGWHGMPGAUSSE NSUGWYX UM OPT. HG NKHCPGN ALYX MH MOY XUKRGYLL IPYKKY LUCMOUM MOY TUG CUL MURPGN HZZ OPL SYN VUGXL, UGX MOY CUE OY XPX PM UKHALYXIPYKKY'L PGMYKYLM.OUBPGN AGCHAGX MOY LMKPGN MOUM MPYX MOY VUGX HG HGY SYN, OY WUKYZASSEWHPSYX PM AI UGX PTTYXPUMYSE LYM MH CHKR HG MOY HMOYK SYN, NSUGWPGN AIUM IPYKKY. COPSY HGY OUGX OAGN AI MOY ZPKLM LMKPGN MOY HMOYK CUL USKYUXEAGCPGXPGN MOY VUGX HG MOY LYWHGX SYN. PG MOPL CUE, OUBPGN WUKYZASSEKYTHBYX MOY SYN VUGXL VE XYZM WPKWASUK THMPHGL HZ OPL UKT ZHSSHCPGNHGY UGHMOYK AGPGMYKKAIMYXSE, MOY TUG OAGN MOY SYN VUGXL AI HG LHTY IYNLZPDYX UVHBY OPL OYUX. MOYG OY MHHR HAM U RGPZY, WAM LHTYMOPGN, WSHLYXMOY RGPZY, ISUWYX PM AGXYK MOY OYUX HZ OPL VYX, UGX, LYUMPGN OPTLYSZWHTZHKMUVSE, WSULIYX OPL UKTL KHAGX OPL SPZMYX RGYYL UGX ZPDYX OPL YEYLHG IPYKKY. MOY SUMMYK CUL WHGLWPHAL HZ LHTYMOPGN ISYULUGM, WHTZHKMPGN,UGX CYSS KHAGXYX PG MOYLY XYZM THBYTYGML, PG MOY TUG'L CYSS-HKXYKYXUKKUGNYTYGML PG OPL WHKGYK, UGX YBYG PG OPL BYKE LTYSS, UGX OY SHHRYX UMMOY TUG CPMOHAM MURPGN OPL YEYL ZKHT OPT."EHA'BY LYYG U SHM HZ MKHAVSY, LPK, YO?" MOY SPMMSY TUG LAXXYGSE LUPX.UGX MOYKY CUL LH TAWO RPGXSPGYLL UGX LPTISPWPME PG OPL LPGNLHGN BHPWYMOUM IPYKKY MKPYX MH KYISE, VAM OPL QUC MKYTVSYX UGX OY ZYSM MYUKLKPLPGN MH OPL YEYL. MOY SPMMSY ZYSSHC, NPBPGN IPYKKY GH MPTY MH VYMKUEOPL WHGZALPHG, PGLMUGMSE WHGMPGAYX PG MOY LUTY ISYULUGM MHGYL:"YO, SUX, XHG'M ZKYM!" LUPX OY, PG MOY MYGXYK LPGNLHGN WUKYLLPGN BHPWYHSX KALLPUG IYULUGM CHTYG YTISHE. "XHG'M ZKYM, ZKPYGX--'LAZZYK UG OHAK,SPBY ZHK UG UNY!' MOUM'L OHC PM PL, TE XYUK ZYSSHC. UGX OYKY CY SPBY,MOUGR OYUBYG, CPMOHAM HZZYGLY. UTHGN MOYLY ZHSR, MHH, MOYKY UKY NHHXTYG UL CYSS UL VUX," LUPX OY, UGX LMPSS LIYURPGN, OY MAKGYX HG OPL RGYYLCPMO U LAIISY THBYTYGM, NHM AI, WHANOYX, UGX CYGM HZZ MH UGHMOYK IUKM HZMOY LOYX."YO, EHA KULWUS!" IPYKKY OYUKX MOY LUTY RPGX BHPWY LUEPGN UM MOY HMOYKYGX HZ MOY LOYX. "LH EHA'BY WHTY, EHA KULWUS? LOY KYTYTVYKL... GHC, GHC,MOUM'SS XH!"UGX MOY LHSXPYK, IALOPGN UCUE U SPMMSY XHN MOUM CUL QATIPGN AI UMOPT, KYMAKGYX MH OPL ISUWY UGX LUM XHCG. PG OPL OUGXL OY OUX LHTYMOPGNCKUIIYX PG U KUN."OYKY, YUM U VPM, LPK," LUPX OY, KYLATPGN OPL ZHKTYK KYLIYWMZAS MHGY ULOY AGCKUIIYX UGX HZZYKYX IPYKKY LHTY VURYX IHMUMHYL. "CY OUX LHAI ZHKXPGGYK UGX MOY IHMUMHYL UKY NKUGX!"IPYKKY OUX GHM YUMYG USS XUE UGX MOY LTYSS HZ MOY IHMUMHYL LYYTYXYDMKYTYSE ISYULUGM MH OPT. OY MOUGRYX MOY LHSXPYK UGX VYNUG MH YUM."CYSS, UKY MOYE USS KPNOM?" LUPX MOY LHSXPYK CPMO U LTPSY. "EHA LOHASXXH SPRY MOPL."OY MHHR U IHMUMH, XKYC HAM OPL WSULI RGPZY, WAM MOY IHMUMH PGMH MCHYJAUS OUSBYL HG MOY IUST HZ OPL OUGX, LIKPGRSYX LHTY LUSM HG PM ZKHT MOYKUN, UGX OUGXYX PM MH IPYKKY."MOY IHMUMHYL UKY NKUGX!" OY LUPX HGWY THKY. "YUM LHTY SPRY MOUM!"IPYKKY MOHANOM OY OUX GYBYK YUMYG UGEMOPGN MOUM MULMYX VYMMYK."HO, P'T USS KPNOM," LUPX OY, "VAM COE XPX MOYE LOHHM MOHLY IHHKZYSSHCL? MOY SULM HGY CUL OUKXSE MCYGME.""MLL, MM...!" LUPX MOY SPMMSY TUG. "UO, COUM U LPG... COUM U LPG!" OYUXXYX JAPWRSE, UGX UL PZ OPL CHKXL CYKY USCUEL CUPMPGN KYUXE PG OPLTHAMO UGX ZSYC HAM PGBHSAGMUKPSE OY CYGM HG: "OHC CUL PM, LPK, MOUM EHALMUEYX PG THLWHC?""P XPXG'M MOPGR MOYE CHASX WHTY LH LHHG. P LMUEYX UWWPXYGMUSSE," KYISPYXIPYKKY."UGX OHC XPX MOYE UKKYLM EHA, XYUK SUX? UM EHAK OHALY?""GH, P CYGM MH SHHR UM MOY ZPKY, UGX MOYE UKKYLMYX TY MOYKY, UGX MKPYXTY UL UG PGWYGXPUKE.""COYKY MOYKY'L SUC MOYKY'L PGQALMPWY," IAM PG MOY SPMMSY TUG."UGX OUBY EHA VYYG OYKY SHGN?" IPYKKY ULRYX UL OY TAGWOYX MOY SULM HZMOY IHMUMH."P? PM CUL SULM LAGXUE MOYE MHHR TY, HAM HZ U OHLIPMUS PG THLWHC.""COE, UKY EHA U LHSXPYK MOYG?""EYL, CY UKY LHSXPYKL HZ MOY UILOYKHG KYNPTYGM. P CUL XEPGN HZ ZYBYK. CYCYKYG'M MHSX UGEMOPGN. MOYKY CYKY LHTY MCYGME HZ AL SEPGN MOYKY. CY OUXGH PXYU, GYBYK NAYLLYX UM USS.""UGX XH EHA ZYYS LUX OYKY?" IPYKKY PGJAPKYX."OHC WUG HGY OYSI PM, SUX? TE GUTY PL ISUMHG, UGX MOY LAKGUTY PLRUKUMUYB," OY UXXYX, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH TURY PM YULPYK ZHK IPYKKY MHUXXKYLL OPT. "MOYE WUSS TY 'SPMMSY ZUSWHG' PG MOY KYNPTYGM. OHC PL HGYMH OYSI ZYYSPGN LUX? THLWHC--LOY'L MOY THMOYK HZ WPMPYL. OHC WUG HGY LYYUSS MOPL UGX GHM ZYYS LUX? VAM 'MOY TUNNHM NGUCL MOY WUVVUNY, EYM XPYLZPKLM'; MOUM'L COUM MOY HSX ZHSRL ALYX MH MYSS AL," OY UXXYX KUIPXSE."COUM? COUM XPX EHA LUE?" ULRYX IPYKKY."COH? P?" LUPX RUKUMUYB. "P LUE MOPGNL OUIIYG GHM UL CY ISUG VAM UL NHXQAXNYL," OY KYISPYX, MOPGRPGN MOUM OY CUL KYIYUMPGN COUM OY OUX LUPXVYZHKY, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE WHGMPGAYX:"CYSS, UGX EHA, OUBY EHA U ZUTPSE YLMUMY, LPK? UGX U OHALY? LH EHA OUBYUVAGXUGWY, MOYG? UGX U OHALYCPZY? UGX EHAK HSX IUKYGML, UKY MOYE LMPSSSPBPGN?" OY ULRYX.UGX MOHANO PM CUL MHH XUKR ZHK IPYKKY MH LYY, OY ZYSM MOUM U LAIIKYLLYXLTPSY HZ RPGXSPGYLL IAWRYKYX MOY LHSXPYK'L SPIL UL OY IAM MOYLYJAYLMPHGL. OY LYYTYX NKPYBYX MOUM IPYKKY OUX GH IUKYGML, YLIYWPUSSE MOUMOY OUX GH THMOYK."U CPZY ZHK WHAGLYS, U THMOYK-PG-SUC ZHK CYSWHTY, VAM MOYKY'L GHGY ULXYUK UL HGY'L HCG THMOYK!" LUPX OY. "CYSS, UGX OUBY EHA SPMMSY HGYL?" OYCYGM HG ULRPGN.UNUPG IPYKKY'L GYNUMPBY UGLCYK LYYTYX MH XPLMKYLL OPT, UGX OY OULMYGYXMH UXX:"GYBYK TPGX! EHA'KY EHAGN ZHSRL EYM, UGX ISYULY NHX TUE LMPSS OUBY LHTY.MOY NKYUM MOPGN PL MH SPBY PG OUKTHGE....""VAM PM'L USS MOY LUTY GHC," IPYKKY WHASX GHM OYSI LUEPGN."UO, TE XYUK ZYSSHC!" KYQHPGYX RUKUMUYB, "GYBYK XYWSPGY U IKPLHG HK UVYNNUK'L LUWR!"OY LYUMYX OPTLYSZ THKY WHTZHKMUVSE UGX WHANOYX, YBPXYGMSE IKYIUKPGN MHMYSS U SHGN LMHKE."CYSS, TE XYUK ZYSSHC, P CUL LMPSS SPBPGN UM OHTY," OY VYNUG. "CY OUXU CYSS-MH-XH OHTYLMYUX, ISYGME HZ SUGX, CY IYULUGML SPBYX CYSS UGX HAKOHALY CUL HGY MH MOUGR NHX ZHK. COYG ZUMOYK UGX CY CYGM HAM THCPGNMOYKY CYKY LYBYG HZ AL. CY SPBYX CYSS. CY CYKY KYUS IYULUGML. PM LHOUIIYGYX..."UGX ISUMHG RUKUMUYB MHSX U SHGN LMHKE HZ OHC OY OUX NHGY PGMH LHTYHGY'LWHILY MH MURY CHHX, OHC OY OUX VYYG WUANOM VE MOY RYYIYK, OUX VYYGMKPYX, ZSHNNYX, UGX LYGM MH LYKBY UL U LHSXPYK."CYSS, SUX," UGX U LTPSY WOUGNYX MOY MHGY HZ OPL BHPWY "CY MOHANOM PMCUL U TPLZHKMAGY VAM PM MAKGYX HAM U VSYLLPGN! PZ PM OUX GHM VYYG ZHKTE LPG, TE VKHMOYK CHASX OUBY OUX MH NH UL U LHSXPYK. VAM OY, TE EHAGNYKVKHMOYK, OUX ZPBY SPMMSY HGYL, COPSY P, EHA LYY, HGSE SYZM U CPZYVYOPGX. CY OUX U SPMMSY NPKS, VAM NHX MHHR OYK VYZHKY P CYGM UL ULHSXPYK. P WHTY OHTY HG SYUBY UGX P'SS MYSS EHA OHC PM CUL, P SHHR UGXLYY MOUM MOYE UKY SPBPGN VYMMYK MOUG VYZHKY. MOY EUKX ZASS HZ WUMMSY,MOY CHTYG UM OHTY, MCH VKHMOYKL UCUE YUKGPGN CUNYL, UGX HGSE TPWOUYS MOYEHAGNYLM, UM OHTY. ZUMOYK, OY LUEL, 'USS TE WOPSXKYG UKY MOY LUTY MHTY: PM OAKML MOY LUTY COPWOYBYK ZPGNYK NYML VPMMYG. VAM PZ ISUMHG OUXG'MVYYG LOUBYX ZHK U LHSXPYK, TPWOUYS CHASX OUBY OUX MH NH.' WUSSYX ALUSS MH OPT UGX, CPSS EHA VYSPYBY PM, ISUWYX AL PG ZKHGM HZ MOY PWHGL.'TPWOUYS,' OY LUEL, 'WHTY OYKY UGX VHC XHCG MH OPL ZYYM; UGX EHA, EHAGNCHTUG, EHA VHC XHCG MHH; UGX EHA, NKUGXWOPSXKYG, USLH VHC XHCG VYZHKYOPT! XH EHA AGXYKLMUGX?' OY LUEL. MOUM'L OHC PM PL, XYUK ZYSSHC. ZUMYSHHRL ZHK U OYUX. VAM CY UKY USCUEL QAXNPGN, 'MOUM'L GHM CYSS--MOUM'LGHM KPNOM!' HAK SAWR PL SPRY CUMYK PG U XKUNGYM: EHA IASS UM PM UGX PMVASNYL, VAM COYG EHA'BY XKUCG PM HAM PM'L YTIME! MOUM'L OHC PM PL."UGX ISUMHG LOPZMYX OPL LYUM HG MOY LMKUC.UZMYK U LOHKM LPSYGWY OY KHLY."CYSS, P MOPGR EHA TALM VY LSYYIE," LUPX OY, UGX VYNUG KUIPXSE WKHLLPGNOPTLYSZ UGX KYIYUMPGN:"SHKX QYLAL WOKPLM, OHSE LUPGM GPWOHSUL, ZKHSU UGX SUBKU! SHKX QYLALWOKPLM, OHSE LUPGM GPWOHSUL, ZKHSU UGX SUBKU! SHKX QYLAL WOKPLM, OUBYTYKWE HG AL UGX LUBY AL!" OY WHGWSAXYX, MOYG VHCYX MH MOY NKHAGX, NHMAI, LPNOYX, UGX LUM XHCG UNUPG HG OPL OYUI HZ LMKUC. "MOUM'L MOY CUE.SUE TY XHCG SPRY U LMHGY, H NHX, UGX KUPLY TY AI SPRY U SHUZ," OYTAMMYKYX UL OY SUE XHCG, IASSPGN OPL WHUM HBYK OPT."COUM IKUEYK CUL MOUM EHA CYKY LUEPGN?" ULRYX IPYKKY."YO?" TAKTAKYX ISUMHG, COH OUX USTHLM ZUSSYG ULSYYI. "COUM CUL P LUEPGN?P CUL IKUEPGN. XHG'M EHA IKUE?""EYL, P XH," LUPX IPYKKY. "VAM COUM CUL MOUM EHA LUPX: ZKHSU UGX SUBKU?""CYSS, HZ WHAKLY," KYISPYX ISUMHG JAPWRSE, "MOY OHKLYL' LUPGML. HGY TALMIPME MOY UGPTUSL MHH. YO, MOY KULWUS! GHC EHA'BY WAKSYX AI UGX NHM CUKT,EHA XUANOMYK HZ U VPMWO!" LUPX RUKUMUYB, MHAWOPGN MOY XHN MOUM SUE UMOPL ZYYM, UGX UNUPG MAKGPGN HBYK OY ZYSS ULSYYI PTTYXPUMYSE.LHAGXL HZ WKEPGN UGX LWKYUTPGN WUTY ZKHT LHTYCOYKY PG MOY XPLMUGWYHAMLPXY, UGX ZSUTYL CYKY BPLPVSY MOKHANO MOY WKUWRL HZ MOY LOYX, VAMPGLPXY PM CUL JAPYM UGX XUKR. ZHK U SHGN MPTY IPYKKY XPX GHM LSYYI, VAMSUE CPMO YEYL HIYG PG MOY XUKRGYLL, SPLMYGPGN MH MOY KYNASUK LGHKPGNHZ ISUMHG COH SUE VYLPXY OPT, UGX OY ZYSM MOUM MOY CHKSX MOUM OUX VYYGLOUMMYKYX CUL HGWY THKY LMPKKPGN PG OPL LHAS CPMO U GYC VYUAME UGX HGGYC UGX AGLOURUVSY ZHAGXUMPHGL.WOUIMYK DPPPMCYGME-MOKYY LHSXPYKL, MOKYY HZZPWYKL, UGX MCH HZZPWPUSL CYKY WHGZPGYXPG MOY LOYX PG COPWO IPYKKY OUX VYYG ISUWYX UGX COYKY OY KYTUPGYX ZHKZHAK CYYRL.COYG IPYKKY KYTYTVYKYX MOYT UZMYKCUKXL MOYE USS LYYTYX TPLME ZPNAKYL MHOPT YDWYIM ISUMHG RUKUMUYB, COH USCUEL KYTUPGYX PG OPL TPGX U THLMBPBPX UGX IKYWPHAL TYTHKE UGX MOY IYKLHGPZPWUMPHG HZ YBYKEMOPGN KALLPUG,RPGXSE, UGX KHAGX. COYG IPYKKY LUC OPL GYPNOVHK GYDM THKGPGN UM XUCGMOY ZPKLM PTIKYLLPHG HZ OPT, UL HZ LHTYMOPGN KHAGX, CUL ZASSE WHGZPKTYX:ISUMHG'L COHSY ZPNAKY--PG U ZKYGWO HBYKWHUM NPKXSYX CPMO U WHKX, ULHSXPYK'L WUI, UGX VULM LOHYL--CUL KHAGX. OPL OYUX CUL JAPMY KHAGX,OPL VUWR, WOYLM, LOHASXYKL, UGX YBYG OPL UKTL, COPWO OY OYSX UL PZ YBYKKYUXE MH YTVKUWY LHTYMOPGN, CYKY KHAGXYX, OPL ISYULUGM LTPSY UGX OPLSUKNY, NYGMSY VKHCG YEYL CYKY USLH KHAGX.ISUMHG RUKUMUYB TALM OUBY VYYG ZPZME, QAXNPGN VE OPL LMHKPYL HZWUTIUPNGL OY OUX VYYG PG, MHSX UL VE UG HSX LHSXPYK. OY XPX GHM OPTLYSZRGHC OPL UNY UGX CUL JAPMY AGUVSY MH XYMYKTPGY PM. VAM OPL VKPSSPUGMSECOPMY, LMKHGN MYYMO COPWO LOHCYX PG MCH AGVKHRYG LYTPWPKWSYL COYG OYSUANOYX--UL OY HZMYG XPX--CYKY USS LHAGX UGX NHHX, MOYKY CUL GHM U NKUEOUPK PG OPL VYUKX HK HG OPL OYUX, UGX OPL COHSY VHXE NUBY UG PTIKYLLPHGHZ LAIISYGYLL UGX YLIYWPUSSE HZ ZPKTGYLL UGX YGXAKUGWY.OPL ZUWY, XYLIPMY PML ZPGY, KHAGXYX CKPGRSYL, OUX UG YDIKYLLPHG HZPGGHWYGWY UGX EHAMO, OPL BHPWY CUL ISYULUGM UGX TALPWUS. VAM MOY WOPYZIYWASPUKPME HZ OPL LIYYWO CUL PML XPKYWMGYLL UGX UIIHLPMYGYLL. PM CULYBPXYGM MOUM OY GYBYK WHGLPXYKYX COUM OY OUX LUPX HK CUL NHPGN MH LUE,UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE MOY KUIPXPME UGX QALMPWY HZ OPL PGMHGUMPHG OUX UGPKKYLPLMPVSY IYKLAULPBYGYLL.OPL IOELPWUS LMKYGNMO UGX UNPSPME XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM XUEL HZ OPLPTIKPLHGTYGM CYKY LAWO MOUM OY LYYTYX GHM MH RGHC COUM ZUMPNAY UGXLPWRGYLL TYUGM. YBYKE GPNOM VYZHKY SEPGN XHCG, OY LUPX: "SHKX, SUE TYXHCG UL U LMHGY UGX KUPLY TY AI UL U SHUZ!" UGX YBYKE THKGPGN HG NYMMPGNAI, OY LUPX: "P SUE XHCG UGX WAKSYX AI, P NYM AI UGX LOURY TELYSZ." UGXPGXYYX OY HGSE OUX MH SPY XHCG, MH ZUSS ULSYYI SPRY U LMHGY, UGX OYHGSE OUX MH LOURY OPTLYSZ, MH VY KYUXE CPMOHAM U THTYGM'L XYSUE ZHK LHTYCHKR, QALM UL WOPSXKYG UKY KYUXE MH ISUE XPKYWMSE MOYE UCURY. OY WHASXXH YBYKEMOPGN, GHM BYKE CYSS VAM GHM VUXSE. OY VURYX, WHHRYX, LYCYX,ISUGYX, UGX TYGXYX VHHML. OY CUL USCUEL VALE, UGX HGSE UM GPNOM USSHCYXOPTLYSZ WHGBYKLUMPHG--HZ COPWO OY CUL ZHGX--UGX LHGNL. OY XPX GHM LPGNSPRY U MKUPGYX LPGNYK COH RGHCL OY PL SPLMYGYX MH, VAM SPRY MOY VPKXL,YBPXYGMSE NPBPGN BYGM MH MOY LHAGXL PG MOY LUTY CUE MOUM HGY LMKYMWOYLHGYLYSZ HK CUSRL UVHAM MH NYM KPX HZ LMPZZGYLL, UGX MOY LHAGXL CYKYUSCUEL OPNO-IPMWOYX, THAKGZAS, XYSPWUMY, UGX USTHLM ZYTPGPGY, UGX OPLZUWY UM LAWO MPTYL CUL BYKE LYKPHAL.OUBPGN VYYG MURYG IKPLHGYK UGX USSHCYX OPL VYUKX MH NKHC, OY LYYTYX MHOUBY MOKHCG HZZ USS MOUM OUX VYYG ZHKWYX AIHG OPT--YBYKEMOPGN TPSPMUKEUGX USPYG MH OPTLYSZ--UGX OUX KYMAKGYX MH OPL ZHKTYK IYULUGM OUVPML."U LHSXPYK HG SYUBY--U LOPKM HAMLPXY VKYYWOYL," OY CHASX LUE.OY XPX GHM SPRY MUSRPGN UVHAM OPL SPZY UL U LHSXPYK, MOHANO OY XPX GHMWHTISUPG, UGX HZMYG TYGMPHGYX MOUM OY OUX GHM VYYG ZSHNNYX HGWY XAKPGNMOY COHSY HZ OPL UKTE LYKBPWY. COYG OY KYSUMYX UGEMOPGN PM CUL NYGYKUSSELHTY HSX UGX YBPXYGMSE IKYWPHAL TYTHKE HZ OPL "WOKPLMPUG" SPZY, UL OYWUSSYX OPL IYULUGM YDPLMYGWY. MOY IKHBYKVL, HZ COPWO OPL MUSR CUL ZASS,CYKY ZHK MOY THLM IUKM GHM MOY WHUKLY UGX PGXYWYGM LUCL LHSXPYKLYTISHE, VAM MOHLY ZHSR LUEPGNL COPWO MURYG CPMOHAM U WHGMYDM LYYT LHPGLPNGPZPWUGM, VAM COYG ALYX UIIHLPMYSE LAXXYGSE UWJAPKY U LPNGPZPWUGWYHZ IKHZHAGX CPLXHT.OY CHASX HZMYG LUE MOY YDUWM HIIHLPMY HZ COUM OY OUX LUPX HG U IKYBPHALHWWULPHG, EYM VHMO CHASX VY KPNOM. OY SPRYX MH MUSR UGX OY MUSRYX CYSS,UXHKGPGN OPL LIYYWO CPMO MYKTL HZ YGXYUKTYGM UGX CPMO ZHSR LUEPGNL COPWOIPYKKY MOHANOM OY PGBYGMYX OPTLYSZ, VAM MOY WOPYZ WOUKT HZ OPL MUSR SUEPG MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY WHTTHGYLM YBYGML--LHTYMPTYL QALM LAWO UL IPYKKYOUX CPMGYLLYX CPMOHAM MURPGN GHMPWY HZ MOYT--ULLATYX PG RUKUMUYB'L UWOUKUWMYK HZ LHSYTG ZPMGYLL. OY SPRYX MH OYUK MOY ZHSR MUSYL HGY HZ MOYLHSXPYKL ALYX MH MYSS HZ UG YBYGPGN (MOYE CYKY USCUEL MOY LUTY), VAMTHLM HZ USS OY SPRYX MH OYUK LMHKPYL HZ KYUS SPZY. OY CHASX LTPSYQHEZASSE COYG SPLMYGPGN MH LAWO LMHKPYL, GHC UGX MOYG IAMMPGN PG U CHKXHK ULRPGN U JAYLMPHG MH TURY MOY THKUS VYUAME HZ COUM OY CUL MHSX WSYUKMH OPTLYSZ. RUKUMUYB OUX GH UMMUWOTYGML, ZKPYGXLOPIL, HK SHBY, UL IPYKKYAGXYKLMHHX MOYT, VAM SHBYX UGX SPBYX UZZYWMPHGUMYSE CPMO YBYKEMOPGN SPZYVKHANOM OPT PG WHGMUWM CPMO, IUKMPWASUKSE CPMO TUG--GHM UGE IUKMPWASUKTUG, VAM MOHLY CPMO COHT OY OUIIYGYX MH VY. OY SHBYX OPL XHN, OPLWHTKUXYL, MOY ZKYGWO, UGX IPYKKY COH CUL OPL GYPNOVHK, VAM IPYKKY ZYSMMOUM PG LIPMY HZ RUKUMUYB'L UZZYWMPHGUMY MYGXYKGYLL ZHK OPT (VE COPWOOY AGWHGLWPHALSE NUBY IPYKKY'L LIPKPMAUS SPZY PML XAY) OY CHASX GHM OUBYNKPYBYX ZHK U THTYGM UM IUKMPGN ZKHT OPT. UGX IPYKKY VYNUG MH ZYYS PGMOY LUTY CUE MHCUKX RUKUMUYB.MH USS MOY HMOYK IKPLHGYKL ISUMHG RUKUMUYB LYYTYX U THLM HKXPGUKELHSXPYK. MOYE WUSSYX OPT "SPMMSY ZUSWHG" HK "ISUMHLOU," WOUZZYX OPTNHHX-GUMAKYXSE, UGX LYGM OPT HG YKKUGXL. VAM MH IPYKKY OY USCUELKYTUPGYX COUM OY OUX LYYTYX MOUM ZPKLM GPNOM: UG AGZUMOHTUVSY, KHAGXYX,YMYKGUS IYKLHGPZPWUMPHG HZ MOY LIPKPM HZ LPTISPWPME UGX MKAMO.ISUMHG RUKUMUYB RGYC GHMOPGN VE OYUKM YDWYIM OPL IKUEYKL. COYG OY VYNUGMH LIYUR OY LYYTYX GHM MH RGHC OHC OY CHASX WHGWSAXY.LHTYMPTYL IPYKKY, LMKAWR VE MOY TYUGPGN HZ OPL CHKXL, CHASX ULR OPT MHKYIYUM MOYT, VAM ISUMHG WHASX GYBYK KYWUSS COUM OY OUX LUPX U THTYGMVYZHKY, QALM UL OY GYBYK WHASX KYIYUM MH IPYKKY MOY CHKXL HZ OPLZUBHKPMY LHGN: GUMPBY UGX VPKWO MKYY UGX TE OYUKM PL LPWR HWWAKKYX PGPM, VAM COYG LIHRYG UGX GHM LAGN, GH TYUGPGN WHASX VY NHM HAM HZ PM. OYXPX GHM, UGX WHASX GHM, AGXYKLMUGX MOY TYUGPGN HZ CHKXL UIUKM ZKHTMOYPK WHGMYDM. YBYKE CHKX UGX UWMPHG HZ OPL CUL MOY TUGPZYLMUMPHG HZUG UWMPBPME AGRGHCG MH OPT, COPWO CUL OPL SPZY. VAM OPL SPZY, UL OYKYNUKXYX PM, OUX GH TYUGPGN UL U LYIUKUMY MOPGN. PM OUX TYUGPGN HGSE ULIUKM HZ U COHSY HZ COPWO OY CUL USCUEL WHGLWPHAL. OPL CHKXL UGX UWMPHGLZSHCYX ZKHT OPT UL YBYGSE, PGYBPMUVSE, UGX LIHGMUGYHALSE UL ZKUNKUGWYYDOUSYL ZKHT U ZSHCYK. OY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOY BUSAY HK LPNGPZPWUGWYHZ UGE CHKX HK XYYX MURYG LYIUKUMYSE.WOUIMYK DPBCOYG IKPGWYLL TUKE OYUKX ZKHT GPWOHSUL MOUM OYK VKHMOYK CUL CPMO MOYKHLMHBL UM EUKHLSUBS LOY UM HGWY IKYIUKYX MH NH MOYKY, PG LIPMY HZ OYKUAGM'L YZZHKML MH XPLLAUXY OYK--UGX GHM TYKYSE MH NH OYKLYSZ VAM MHMURY OYK GYIOYC CPMO OYK. COYMOYK PM CYKY XPZZPWASM HK YULE, IHLLPVSYHK PTIHLLPVSY, LOY XPX GHM ULR UGX XPX GHM CUGM MH RGHC: PM CUL OYK XAMEGHM HGSE OYKLYSZ MH VY GYUK OYK VKHMOYK COH CUL IYKOUIL XEPGN, VAM MH XHYBYKEMOPGN IHLLPVSY MH MURY OPL LHG MH OPT, UGX LH LOY IKYIUKYX MH LYMHZZ. MOUM LOY OUX GHM OYUKX ZKHT IKPGWY UGXKYC OPTLYSZ, IKPGWYLL TUKEUMMKPVAMYX MH OPL VYPGN MHH CYUR MH CKPMY HK MH OPL WHGLPXYKPGN MOY SHGNQHAKGYE MHH OUKX UGX MHH XUGNYKHAL ZHK OYK UGX OPL LHG.PG U ZYC XUEL IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL KYUXE MH LMUKM. OYK YJAPIUNYL CYKY MOYOANY ZUTPSE WHUWO PG COPWO LOY OUX MKUBYSYX MH BHKHGYFO, U LYTPHIYGMKUI, UGX U VUNNUNY WUKM. CPMO OYK MKUBYSYX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY,SPMMSY GPWOHSUL UGX OPL MAMHK, OYK HSX GAKLY, MOKYY TUPXL, MPROHG, UGX UEHAGN ZHHMTUG UGX WHAKPYK OYK UAGM OUX LYGM MH UWWHTIUGE OYK.MOY ALAUS KHAMY MOKHANO THLWHC WHASX GHM VY MOHANOM HZ, UGX MOYKHAGXUVHAM CUE IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL HVSPNYX MH MURY MOKHANO SPIYMLR,KEUFUG, BSUXPTPK, UGX LOAEU CUL BYKE SHGN UGX, UL IHLM OHKLYL CYKY GHMYBYKECOYKY HVMUPGUVSY, BYKE XPZZPWASM, UGX GYUK KEUFUG COYKY MOY ZKYGWOCYKY LUPX MH OUBY LOHCG MOYTLYSBYL CUL YBYG XUGNYKHAL.XAKPGN MOPL XPZZPWASM QHAKGYE TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, XYLLUSSYL, UGXIKPGWYLL TUKE'L LYKBUGML CYKY ULMHGPLOYX UM OYK YGYKNE UGX ZPKTGYLL HZLIPKPM. LOY CYGM MH VYX SUMYK UGX KHLY YUKSPYK MOUG UGE HZ MOYT, UGXGH XPZZPWASMPYL XUAGMYX OYK. MOUGRL MH OYK UWMPBPME UGX YGYKNE, COPWOPGZYWMYX OYK ZYSSHC MKUBYSYKL, MOYE UIIKHUWOYX EUKHLSUBS VE MOY YGX HZMOY LYWHGX CYYR.MOY SULM XUEL HZ OYK LMUE PG BHKHGYFO OUX VYYG MOY OUIIPYLM HZ OYK SPZY.OYK SHBY ZHK KHLMHB GH SHGNYK MHKTYGMYX HK UNPMUMYX OYK. PM ZPSSYX OYKCOHSY LHAS, OUX VYWHTY UG PGMYNKUS IUKM HZ OYKLYSZ, UGX LOY GH SHGNYKLMKANNSYX UNUPGLM PM. SUMMYKSE LOY OUX VYWHTY WHGBPGWYX MOUM LOY SHBYXUGX CUL VYSHBYX, MOHANO LOY GYBYK LUPX MOPL XYZPGPMYSE MH OYKLYSZPG CHKXL. LOY OUX VYWHTY WHGBPGWYX HZ PM UM OYK SULM PGMYKBPYC CPMOGPWOHSUL, COYG OY OUX WHTY MH MYSS OYK MOUM OYK VKHMOYK CUL CPMO MOYKHLMHBL. GHM VE U LPGNSY CHKX OUX GPWOHSUL USSAXYX MH MOY ZUWM MOUMIKPGWY UGXKYC'L KYSUMPHGL CPMO GUMULOU TPNOM, PZ OY KYWHBYKYX, VYKYGYCYX, VAM IKPGWYLL TUKE LUC VE OPL ZUWY MOUM OY RGYC UGX MOHANOM HZMOPL.EYM PG LIPMY HZ MOUM, OPL KYSUMPHG MH OYK--WHGLPXYKUMY, XYSPWUMY, UGXSHBPGN--GHM HGSE KYTUPGYX AGWOUGNYX, VAM PM LHTYMPTYL LYYTYX MH IKPGWYLLTUKE MOUM OY CUL YBYG NSUX MOUM MOY ZUTPSE WHGGYWMPHG VYMCYYG MOYTUSSHCYX OPT MH YDIKYLL OPL ZKPYGXLOPI THKY ZKYYSE. LOY RGYC MOUM LOYSHBYX ZHK MOY ZPKLM UGX HGSE MPTY PG OYK SPZY UGX ZYSM MOUM LOY CULVYSHBYX, UGX CUL OUIIE PG KYNUKX MH PM.VAM MOPL OUIIPGYLL HG HGY LPXY HZ OYK LIPKPMAUS GUMAKY XPX GHM IKYBYGMOYK ZYYSPGN NKPYZ ZHK OYK VKHMOYK CPMO ZASS ZHKWY; HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOUMLIPKPMAUS MKUGJAPSPME HG MOY HGY LPXY TUXY PM MOY THKY IHLLPVSY ZHK OYKMH NPBY ZASS ISUE MH OYK ZYYSPGN ZHK OYK VKHMOYK. MOUM ZYYSPGN CUL LHLMKHGN UM MOY THTYGM HZ SYUBPGN BHKHGYFO MOUM MOHLY COH LUC OYK HZZ, ULMOYE SHHRYX UM OYK WUKYCHKG, XYLIUPKPGN ZUWY, ZYSM LAKY LOY CHASX ZUSSPSS HG MOY QHAKGYE. VAM MOY BYKE XPZZPWASMPYL UGX IKYHWWAIUMPHGL HZ MOYQHAKGYE, COPWO LOY MHHR LH UWMPBYSE PG OUGX, LUBYX OYK ZHK U COPSY ZKHTOYK NKPYZ UGX NUBY OYK LMKYGNMO.UL USCUEL OUIIYGL COYG MKUBYSPGN, IKPGWYLL TUKE MOHANOM HGSE HZ MOYQHAKGYE PMLYSZ, ZHKNYMMPGN PML HVQYWM. VAM UL LOY UIIKHUWOYX EUKHLSUBSMOY MOHANOM HZ COUM TPNOM UCUPM OYK MOYKY--GHM UZMYK TUGE XUEL, VAM MOUMBYKE YBYGPGN--UNUPG IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH OYK UGX OYK UNPMUMPHG PGWKYULYXMH PML AMTHLM SPTPM.MOY WHAKPYK COH OUX VYYG LYGM HG PG UXBUGWY MH ZPGX HAM COYKY MOYKHLMHBL CYKY LMUEPGN PG EUKHLSUBS, UGX PG COUM WHGXPMPHG IKPGWY UGXKYCCUL, COYG OY TYM MOY VPN WHUWO QALM YGMYKPGN MOY MHCG NUMYL CUL UIIUSSYXVE MOY MYKKPVSY IUSSHK HZ MOY IKPGWYLL' ZUWY MOUM SHHRYX HAM UM OPT ZKHTMOY CPGXHC."P OUBY ZHAGX HAM YBYKEMOPGN, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE: MOY KHLMHBL UKY LMUEPGNUM MOY TYKWOUGM VKHGGPRHB'L OHALY, PG MOY LJAUKY GHM ZUK ZKHT OYKY,KPNOM UVHBY MOY BHSNU," LUPX MOY WHAKPYK.IKPGWYLL TUKE SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX PGJAPKE, GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGNCOE OY XPX GHM KYISE MH COUM LOY WOPYZSE CUGMYX MH RGHC: OHC CUL OYKVKHMOYK? TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY IAM MOUM JAYLMPHG ZHK OYK."OHC PL MOY IKPGWY?" LOY ULRYX."OPL YDWYSSYGWE PL LMUEPGN PG MOY LUTY OHALY CPMO MOYT.""MOYG OY PL USPBY," MOHANOM IKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX ULRYX PG U SHC BHPWY:"OHC PL OY?""MOY LYKBUGML LUE OY PL LMPSS MOY LUTY."COUM "LMPSS MOY LUTY" TPNOM TYUG IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM ULR, VAM CPMO UGAGGHMPWYX NSUGWY UM SPMMSY LYBYG-EYUK-HSX GPWOHSUL, COH CUL LPMMPGN PGZKHGM HZ OYK SHHRPGN CPMO ISYULAKY UM MOY MHCG, LOY VHCYX OYK OYUXUGX XPX GHM KUPLY PM UNUPG MPSS MOY OYUBE WHUWO, KATVSPGN, LOURPGN UGXLCUEPGN, WUTY MH U LMHI. MOY WUKKPUNY LMYIL WSUMMYKYX UL MOYE CYKY SYMXHCG.MOY WUKKPUNY XHHK CUL HIYGYX. HG MOY SYZM MOYKY CUL CUMYK--U NKYUMKPBYK--UGX HG MOY KPNOM U IHKWO. MOYKY CYKY IYHISY UM MOY YGMKUGWY:LYKBUGML, UGX U KHLE NPKS CPMO U SUKNY ISUPM HZ VSUWR OUPK, LTPSPGN ULPM LYYTYX MH IKPGWYLL TUKE PG UG AGISYULUGMSE UZZYWMYX CUE. (MOPL CULLHGEU.) IKPGWYLL TUKE KUG AI MOY LMYIL. "MOPL CUE, MOPL CUE!" LUPX MOYNPKS, CPMO MOY LUTY UKMPZPWPUS LTPSY, UGX MOY IKPGWYLL ZHAGX OYKLYSZ PGMOY OUSS ZUWPGN UG YSXYKSE CHTUG HZ HKPYGMUS MEIY, COH WUTY KUIPXSE MHTYYM OYK CPMO U SHHR HZ YTHMPHG. MOPL CUL MOY WHAGMYLL. LOY YTVKUWYXIKPGWYLL TUKE UGX RPLLYX OYK."THG YGZUGM!" LOY TAMMYKYX, "QY BHAL UPTY YM BHAL WHGGUPL XYIAPLSHGNMYTIL." *    * "TE WOPSX! P SHBY EHA UGX OUBY RGHCG EHA U SHGN MPTY." XYLIPMY OYK YDWPMYTYGM, IKPGWYLL TUKE KYUSPFYX MOUM MOPL CUL MOYWHAGMYLL UGX MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH LUE LHTYMOPGN MH OYK. OUKXSERGHCPGN OHC LOY XPX PM, LOY WHGMKPBYX MH AMMYK U ZYC IHSPMY IOKULYL PGZKYGWO PG MOY LUTY MHGY UL MOHLY MOUM OUX VYYG UXXKYLLYX MH OYK, UGXULRYX: "OHC PL OY?""MOY XHWMHK LUEL MOUM OY PL GHM PG XUGNYK," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, VAM ULLOY LIHRY LOY KUPLYX OYK YEYL CPMO U LPNO, UGX OYK NYLMAKY WHGBYEYX UWHGMKUXPWMPHG HZ OYK CHKXL."COYKY PL OY? WUG P LYY OPT--WUG P?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWYLL."HGY THTYGM, IKPGWYLL, HGY THTYGM, TE XYUK! PL MOPL OPL LHG?" LUPX MOYWHAGMYLL, MAKGPGN MH SPMMSY GPWOHSUL COH CUL WHTPGN PG CPMO XYLLUSSYL."MOYKY CPSS VY KHHT ZHK YBYKEVHXE, MOPL PL U VPN OHALY. HO, COUM USHBYSE VHE!"MOY WHAGMYLL MHHR IKPGWYLL TUKE PGMH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT, COYKY LHGEU CULMUSRPGN MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY. MOY WHAGMYLL WUKYLLYX MOY VHE, UGXMOY HSX WHAGM WUTY PG UGX CYSWHTYX MOY IKPGWYLL. OY OUX WOUGNYX BYKETAWO LPGWY IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX SULM LYYG OPT. MOYG OY OUX VYYG U VKPLR,WOYYKZAS, LYSZ-ULLAKYX HSX TUG; GHC OY LYYTYX U IPMPZAS, VYCPSXYKYXIYKLHG. COPSY MUSRPGN MH IKPGWYLL TUKE OY WHGMPGAUSSE SHHRYX KHAGX ULPZ ULRPGN YBYKEHGY COYMOYK OY CUL XHPGN MOY KPNOM MOPGN. UZMYK MOYXYLMKAWMPHG HZ THLWHC UGX HZ OPL IKHIYKME, MOKHCG HAM HZ OPL UWWALMHTYXNKHHBY OY LYYTYX MH OUBY SHLM MOY LYGLY HZ OPL HCG LPNGPZPWUGWY UGX MHZYYS MOUM MOYKY CUL GH SHGNYK U ISUWY ZHK OPT PG SPZY.PG LIPMY HZ OYK HGY XYLPKY MH LYY OYK VKHMOYK UL LHHG UL IHLLPVSY, UGXOYK BYDUMPHG MOUM UM MOY THTYGM COYG USS LOY CUGMYX CUL MH LYY OPT MOYELOHASX VY MKEPGN MH YGMYKMUPG OYK UGX IKYMYGXPGN MH UXTPKY OYK GYIOYC,MOY IKPGWYLL GHMPWYX USS MOUM CUL NHPGN HG UKHAGX OYK UGX ZYSM MOYGYWYLLPME HZ LAVTPMMPGN, ZHK U MPTY, MH MOPL GYC HKXYK HZ MOPGNL COPWOLOY OUX YGMYKYX. LOY RGYC PM MH VY GYWYLLUKE, UGX MOHANO PM CUL OUKX ZHKOYK LOY CUL GHM BYDYX CPMO MOYLY IYHISY."MOPL PL TE GPYWY," LUPX MOY WHAGM, PGMKHXAWPGN LHGEU--"EHA XHG'M RGHCOYK, IKPGWYLL?"IKPGWYLL TUKE MAKGYX MH LHGEU UGX, MKEPGN MH LMPZSY MOY OHLMPSYZYYSPGN MOUM UKHLY PG OYK MHCUKX MOY NPKS, LOY RPLLYX OYK. VAM LOY ZYSMHIIKYLLYX VE MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY THHX HZ YBYKEHGY UKHAGX OYK CUL LH ZUKZKHT COUM CUL PG OYK HCG OYUKM."COYKY PL OY?" LOY ULRYX UNUPG, UXXKYLLPGN MOYT USS."OY PL XHCGLMUPKL. GUMULOU PL CPMO OPT," UGLCYKYX LHGEU, ZSALOPGN. "CYOUBY LYGM MH ULR. P MOPGR EHA TALM VY MPKYX, IKPGWYLL."MYUKL HZ BYDUMPHG LOHCYX MOYTLYSBYL PG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L YEYL. LOY MAKGYXUCUE UGX CUL UVHAM MH ULR MOY WHAGMYLL UNUPG OHC MH NH MH OPT, COYGSPNOM, PTIYMAHAL, UGX LYYTPGNSE VAHEUGM LMYIL CYKY OYUKX UM MOYXHHK. MOY IKPGWYLL SHHRYX KHAGX UGX LUC GUMULOU WHTPGN PG, USTHLMKAGGPGN--MOUM GUMULOU COHT LOY OUX SPRYX LH SPMMSY UM MOYPK TYYMPGN PGTHLWHC SHGN LPGWY.VAM OUKXSE OUX MOY IKPGWYLL SHHRYX UM GUMULOU'L ZUWY VYZHKY LOY KYUSPFYXMOUM OYKY CUL U KYUS WHTKUXY PG OYK NKPYZ, UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE U ZKPYGX.LOY KUG MH TYYM OYK, YTVKUWYX OYK, UGX VYNUG MH WKE HG OYK LOHASXYK.UL LHHG UL GUMULOU, LPMMPGN UM MOY OYUX HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L VYX, OYUKXHZ IKPGWYLL TUKE'L UKKPBUS, LOY LHZMSE SYZM OPL KHHT UGX OULMYGYX MH OYKCPMO MOHLY LCPZM LMYIL MOUM OUX LHAGXYX VAHEUGM MH IKPGWYLL TUKE.MOYKY CUL HGSE HGY YDIKYLLPHG HG OYK UNPMUMYX ZUWY COYG LOY KUG PGMH MOYXKUCPGN KHHT--MOUM HZ SHBY--VHAGXSYLL SHBY ZHK OPT, ZHK OYK, UGX ZHK USSMOUM CUL GYUK MH MOY TUG LOY SHBYX; UGX HZ IPME, LAZZYKPGN ZHK HMOYKL,UGX IULLPHGUMY XYLPKY MH NPBY OYKLYSZ YGMPKYSE MH OYSIPGN MOYT. PM CULISUPG MOUM UM MOUM THTYGM MOYKY CUL PG GUMULOU'L OYUKM GH MOHANOM HZOYKLYSZ HK HZ OYK HCG KYSUMPHGL CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC.IKPGWYLL TUKE, CPMO OYK UWAMY LYGLPVPSPME, AGXYKLMHHX USS MOPL UM MOYZPKLM NSUGWY UM GUMULOU'L ZUWY, UGX CYIM HG OYK LOHASXYK CPMO LHKKHCZASISYULAKY."WHTY, WHTY MH OPT, TUKE," LUPX GUMULOU, SYUXPGN OYK PGMH MOY HMOYKKHHT.IKPGWYLL TUKE KUPLYX OYK OYUX, XKPYX OYK YEYL, UGX MAKGYX MH GUMULOU.LOY ZYSM MOUM ZKHT OYK LOY CHASX VY UVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX UGX SYUKGYBYKEMOPGN."OHC..." LOY VYNUG OYK JAYLMPHG VAM LMHIIYX LOHKM.LOY ZYSM MOUM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH ULR, HK MH UGLCYK, PG CHKXL.GUMULOU'L ZUWY UGX YEYL CHASX OUBY MH MYSS OYK USS THKY WSYUKSE UGXIKHZHAGXSE.GUMULOU CUL NUFPGN UM OYK, VAM LYYTYX UZKUPX UGX PG XHAVM COYMOYK MH LUEUSS LOY RGYC HK GHM; LOY LYYTYX MH ZYYS MOUM VYZHKY MOHLY SATPGHAL YEYLCOPWO IYGYMKUMYX PGMH MOY BYKE XYIMOL HZ OYK OYUKM, PM CUL PTIHLLPVSYGHM MH MYSS MOY COHSY MKAMO COPWO LOY LUC. UGX LAXXYGSE, GUMULOU'L SPILMCPMWOYX, ANSE CKPGRSYL NUMOYKYX KHAGX OYK THAMO, UGX WHBYKPGN OYK ZUWYCPMO OYK OUGXL LOY VAKLM PGMH LHVL.IKPGWYLL TUKE AGXYKLMHHX.VAM LOY LMPSS OHIYX, UGX ULRYX, PG CHKXL LOY OYKLYSZ XPX GHM MKALM:"VAM OHC PL OPL CHAGX? CPSS LYY," CUL USS GUMULOU WHASX LUE.MOYE LUM U SPMMSY COPSY XHCGLMUPKL GYUK OPL KHHT MPSS MOYE OUX SYZM HZZWKEPGN UGX CYKY UVSY MH NH MH OPT CPMO WUST ZUWYL."OHC OUL OPL COHSY PSSGYLL NHGY? IKPGWYLL TUKE PGJAPKYX.GUMULOU MHSX OYK MOUM UM ZPKLM MOYKY OUX VYYG XUGNYK ZKHT OPL ZYBYKPLOWHGXPMPHG UGX MOY IUPG OY LAZZYKYX, VAM UM MKHPMLU MOUM OUX IULLYXUGX MOY XHWMHK OUX HGSE VYYG UZKUPX HZ NUGNKYGY. MOUM XUGNYK OUX USLHIULLYX. COYG MOYE KYUWOYX EUKHLSUBS MOY CHAGX OUX VYNAG MH ZYLMYK(GUMULOU RGYC USS UVHAM LAWO MOPGNL UL ZYLMYKPGN) UGX MOY XHWMHK OUXLUPX MOUM MOY ZYLMYKPGN TPNOM MURY U GHKTUS WHAKLY. MOYG ZYBYK LYM PG,VAM MOY XHWMHK OUX LUPX MOY ZYBYK CUL GHM BYKE LYKPHAL."VAM MCH XUEL UNH MOPL LAXXYGSE OUIIYGYX," LUPX GUMULOU, LMKANNSPGN CPMOOYK LHVL. "P XHG'M RGHC COE, VAM EHA CPSS LYY COUM OY PL SPRY.""PL OY CYURYK? MOPGGYK?" ULRYX MOY IKPGWYLL."GH, PM'L GHM MOUM, VAM CHKLY. EHA CPSS LYY. H, TUKE, OY PL MHH NHHX, OYWUGGHM, WUGGHM SPBY, VYWUALY..."WOUIMYK DBCOYG GUMULOU HIYGYX IKPGWY UGXKYC'L XHHK CPMO U ZUTPSPUK THBYTYGM UGXSYM IKPGWYLL TUKE IULL PGMH MOY KHHT VYZHKY OYK, MOY IKPGWYLL ZYSM MOYLHVL PG OYK MOKHUM. OUKX UL LOY OUX MKPYX MH IKYIUKY OYKLYSZ, UGX GHCMKPYX MH KYTUPG MKUGJAPS, LOY RGYC MOUM LOY CHASX VY AGUVSY MH SHHR UMOPT CPMOHAM MYUKL.MOY IKPGWYLL AGXYKLMHHX COUM GUMULOU OUX TYUGM VE MOY CHKXL: "MCH XUELUNH MOPL LAXXYGSE OUIIYGYX." LOY AGXYKLMHHX MOHLY CHKXL MH TYUG MOUM OYOUX LAXXYGSE LHZMYGYX UGX MOUM MOPL LHZMYGPGN UGX NYGMSYGYLL CYKY LPNGLHZ UIIKHUWOPGN XYUMO. UL LOY LMYIIYX MH MOY XHHK LOY USKYUXE LUC PGPTUNPGUMPHG UGXKYC'L ZUWY UL LOY KYTYTVYKYX PM PG WOPSXOHHX, U NYGMSY,TPSX, LETIUMOYMPW ZUWY COPWO OY OUX KUKYSE LOHCG, UGX COPWO MOYKYZHKYUZZYWMYX OYK BYKE LMKHGNSE. LOY CUL LAKY OY CHASX LIYUR LHZM, MYGXYKCHKXL MH OYK LAWO UL OYK ZUMOYK OUX AMMYKYX VYZHKY OPL XYUMO, UGXMOUM LOY CHASX GHM VY UVSY MH VYUK PM UGX CHASX VAKLM PGMH LHVL PG OPLIKYLYGWY. EYM LHHGYK HK SUMYK PM OUX MH VY, UGX LOY CYGM PG. MOY LHVLKHLY OPNOYK UGX OPNOYK PG OYK MOKHUM UL LOY THKY UGX THKY WSYUKSEXPLMPGNAPLOYX OPL ZHKT UGX OYK LOHKMLPNOMYX YEYL MKPYX MH TURY HAM OPLZYUMAKYL, UGX MOYG LOY LUC OPL ZUWY UGX TYM OPL NUFY.OY CUL SEPGN PG U LJAPKKYS-ZAK XKYLLPGN NHCG HG U XPBUG, LAKKHAGXYX VEIPSSHCL. OY CUL MOPG UGX IUSY. PG HGY MOPG, MKUGLSAWYGMSE COPMY OUGXOY OYSX U OUGXRYKWOPYZ, COPSY CPMO MOY HMOYK OY LMKHRYX MOY XYSPWUMYTALMUWOY OY OUX NKHCG, THBPGN OPL ZPGNYKL LSHCSE. OPL YEYL NUFYX UM MOYTUL MOYE YGMYKYX.HG LYYPGN OPL ZUWY UGX TYYMPGN OPL YEYL IKPGWYLL TUKE'L IUWY LAXXYGSELSUWRYGYX, LOY ZYSM OYK MYUKL XKE AI UGX OYK LHVL WYULYX. LOY LAXXYGSEZYSM NAPSME UGX NKYC MPTPX HG WUMWOPGN MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OPL ZUWY UGXYEYL."VAM PG COUM UT P MH VSUTY?" LOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ. UGX OPL WHSX, LMYKG SHHRKYISPYX: "VYWUALY EHA UKY USPBY UGX MOPGRPGN HZ MOY SPBPGN, COPSY P..."PG MOY XYYI NUFY MOUM LYYTYX MH SHHR GHM HAMCUKXL VAM PGCUKXL MOYKYCUL UG USTHLM OHLMPSY YDIKYLLPHG UL OY LSHCSE KYNUKXYX OPL LPLMYK UGXGUMULOU.OY RPLLYX OPL LPLMYK, OHSXPGN OYK OUGX PG OPL UL CUL MOYPK CHGM."OHC UKY EHA, TUKE? OHC XPX EHA TUGUNY MH NYM OYKY?" LUPX OY PG U BHPWYUL WUST UGX USHHZ UL OPL SHHR.OUX OY LWKYUTYX PG UNHGE, MOUM LWKYUT CHASX GHM OUBY LMKAWR LAWO OHKKHKPGMH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OYUKM UL MOY MHGY HZ OPL BHPWY."UGX OUBY EHA VKHANOM SPMMSY GPWOHSUL?" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE, OYKLYSZ LAKIKPLYX UM COUM LOY CULLUEPGN."MOUM, TE XYUK, EHA TALM ULR MOY XHWMHK," OY KYISPYX, UGX UNUPG TURPGNUG YBPXYGM YZZHKM MH VY UZZYWMPHGUMY, OY LUPX CPMO OPL SPIL HGSE (OPLCHKXL WSYUKSE XPX GHM WHKKYLIHGX MH OPL MOHANOML):"TYKWP, WOYKY UTPY, X'YMKY BYGAY." *    * "MOUGR EHA ZHK WHTPGN, TE XYUK."IKPGWYLL TUKE IKYLLYX OPL OUGX. MOY IKYLLAKY TUXY OPT CPGWY QALMIYKWYIMPVSE. OY CUL LPSYGM, UGX LOY XPX GHM RGHC COUM MH LUE. LOY GHCAGXYKLMHHX COUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT MCH XUEL VYZHKY. PG OPL CHKXL, OPLMHGY, UGX YLIYWPUSSE PG MOUM WUST, USTHLM UGMUNHGPLMPW SHHR WHASX VYZYSM UG YLMKUGNYTYGM ZKHT YBYKEMOPGN VYSHGNPGN MH MOPL CHKSX, MYKKPVSYPG HGY COH PL USPBY. YBPXYGMSE HGSE CPMO UG YZZHKM XPX OY AGXYKLMUGXUGEMOPGN SPBPGN; VAM PM CUL HVBPHAL MOUM OY ZUPSYX MH AGXYKLMUGX, GHMVYWUALY OY SUWRYX MOY IHCYK MH XH LH VAM VYWUALY OY AGXYKLMHHX LHTYMOPGNYSLY--LHTYMOPGN MOY SPBPGN XPX GHM UGX WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX--UGX COPWOCOHSSE HWWAIPYX OPL TPGX."MOYKY, EHA LYY OHC LMKUGNYSE ZUMY OUL VKHANOM AL MHNYMOYK," LUPX OY,VKYURPGN MOY LPSYGWY UGX IHPGMPGN MH GUMULOU. "LOY SHHRL UZMYK TY USSMOY MPTY."IKPGWYLL TUKE OYUKX OPT UGX XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OHC OY WHASX LUE LAWO UMOPGN. OY, MOY LYGLPMPBY, MYGXYK IKPGWY UGXKYC, OHC WHASX OY LUE MOUM,VYZHKY OYK COHT OY SHBYX UGX COH SHBYX OPT? OUX OY YDIYWMYX MH SPBY OYWHASX GHM OUBY LUPX MOHLY CHKXL PG MOUM HZZYGLPBYSE WHSX MHGY. PZ OY OUXGHM RGHCG MOUM OY CUL XEPGN, OHC WHASX OY OUBY ZUPSYX MH IPME OYK UGXOHC WHASX OY LIYUR SPRY MOUM PG OYK IKYLYGWY? MOY HGSE YDISUGUMPHG CULMOUM OY CUL PGXPZZYKYGM, VYWUALY LHTYMOPGN YSLY, TAWO THKY PTIHKMUGM,OUX VYYG KYBYUSYX MH OPT.MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL WHSX UGX XPLWHGGYWMYX UGX WHGMPGAUSSE VKHRY HZZ."TUKE WUTY VE CUE HZ KEUFUG," LUPX GUMULOU.IKPGWY UGXKYC XPX GHM GHMPWY MOUM LOY WUSSYX OPL LPLMYK TUKE, UGX HGSEUZMYK WUSSPGN OYK LH PG OPL IKYLYGWY XPX GUMULOU GHMPWY PM OYKLYSZ."KYUSSE?" OY ULRYX."MOYE MHSX OYK MOUM USS THLWHC OUL VYYG VAKGYX XHCG, UGX MOUM..."GUMULOU LMHIIYX. PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH MUSR. PM CUL ISUPG MOUM OY CULTURPGN UG YZZHKM MH SPLMYG, VAM WHASX GHM XH LH."EYL, MOYE LUE PM'L VAKGYX," OY LUPX. IKPGWY UGXKYC LAXXYGSE LUPX,YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN MH LIYUR ISYULUGMSE MH MOYT. "OY CKHMY OYKY MOUM OYMHHR U NKYUM SPRPGN MH EHA," OY CYGM HG LPTISE UGX WUSTSE, YBPXYGMSEAGUVSY MH AGXYKLMUGX USS MOY WHTISYD LPNGPZPWUGWY OPL CHKXL OUX ZHKSPBPGN IYHISY. "PZ EHA SPRYX OPT MHH, PM CHASX VY U NHHX MOPGN ZHK EHAMH NYM TUKKPYX," OY UXXYX KUMOYK THKY JAPWRSE, UL PZ ISYULYX UM OUBPGNZHAGX CHKXL OY OUX SHGN VYYG LYYRPGN.IKPGWYLL TUKE OYUKX OPL CHKXL VAM MOYE OUX GH TYUGPGN ZHK OYK, YDWYIM ULU IKHHZ HZ OHC ZUK UCUE OY GHC CUL ZKHT YBYKEMOPGN SPBPGN."COE MUSR HZ TY?" LOY LUPX JAPYMSE UGX NSUGWYX UM GUMULOU.GUMULOU, COH ZYSM OYK NSUGWY, XPX GHM SHHR UM OYK. USS MOKYY CYKY UNUPGLPSYGM."UGXKYC, CHASX EHA SPRY..." IKPGWYLL TUKE LAXXYGSE LUPX PG U MKYTVSPGNBHPWY, "CHASX EHA SPRY MH LYY SPMMSY GPWOHSUL? OY PL USCUEL MUSRPGNUVHAM EHA!"IKPGWY UGXKYC LTPSYX QALM IYKWYIMPVSE UGX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY, VAMIKPGWYLL TUKE, COH RGYC OPL ZUWY LH CYSS, LUC CPMO OHKKHK MOUM OY XPXGHM LTPSY CPMO ISYULAKY HK UZZYWMPHG ZHK OPL LHG, VAM CPMO JAPYM, NYGMSYPKHGE VYWUALY OY MOHANOM LOY CUL MKEPGN COUM LOY VYSPYBYX MH VY MOY SULMTYUGL HZ UKHALPGN OPT."EYL, P LOUSS VY BYKE NSUX MH LYY OPT. PL OY JAPMY CYSS?"COYG SPMMSY GPWOHSUL CUL VKHANOM PGMH IKPGWY UGXKYC'L KHHT OY SHHRYX UMOPL ZUMOYK CPMO ZKPNOMYGYX YEYL, VAM XPX GHM WKE, VYWUALY GH HGY YSLYCUL WKEPGN. IKPGWY UGXKYC RPLLYX OPT UGX YBPXYGMSE XPX GHM RGHC COUM MHLUE MH OPT.COYG GPWOHSUL OUX VYYG SYX UCUE, IKPGWYLL TUKE UNUPG CYGM AI MH OYKVKHMOYK, RPLLYX OPT, UGX AGUVSY MH KYLMKUPG OYK MYUKL UGE SHGNYK VYNUGMH WKE.OY SHHRYX UM OYK UMMYGMPBYSE."PL PM UVHAM GPWOHSUL?" OY ULRYX.IKPGWYLL TUKE GHXXYX OYK OYUX, CYYIPGN."TUKE, EHA RGHC MOY NHLI..." VAM OY VKHRY HZZ."COUM XPX EHA LUE?""GHMOPGN. EHA TALMG'M WKE OYKY," OY LUPX, SHHRPGN UM OYK CPMO MOY LUTYWHSX YDIKYLLPHG.COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE VYNUG MH WKE, OY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM LOY CUL WKEPGN UMMOY MOHANOM MOUM SPMMSY GPWOHSUL CHASX VY SYZM CPMOHAM U ZUMOYK. CPMOU NKYUM YZZHKM OY MKPYX MH KYMAKG MH SPZY UGX MH LYY MOPGNL ZKHT MOYPKIHPGM HZ BPYC."EYL, MH MOYT PM TALM LYYT LUX!" OY MOHANOM. "VAM OHC LPTISY PM PL."MOY ZHCSL HZ MOY UPK LHC GHM, GYPMOYK XH MOYE KYUI, EYM EHAK ZUMOYKZYYXYMO MOYT," OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ UGX CPLOYX MH LUE MH IKPGWYLL TUKE;"VAM GH, MOYE CPSS MURY PM MOYPK HCG CUE, MOYE CHG'M AGXYKLMUGX!MOYE WUG'M AGXYKLMUGX MOUM USS MOHLY ZYYSPGNL MOYE IKPFY LH--USS HAKZYYSPGNL, USS MOHLY PXYUL MOUM LYYT LH PTIHKMUGM MH AL, UKY AGGYWYLLUKE.CY WUGGHM AGXYKLMUGX HGY UGHMOYK," UGX OY KYTUPGYX LPSYGM.IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SPMMSY LHG CUL LYBYG. OY WHASX LWUKWYSE KYUX, UGX RGYCGHMOPGN. UZMYK MOUM XUE OY SPBYX MOKHANO TUGE MOPGNL, NUPGPGN RGHCSYXNY,HVLYKBUMPHG, UGX YDIYKPYGWY, VAM OUX OY IHLLYLLYX USS MOY ZUWASMPYL OYUZMYKCUKXL UWJAPKYX, OY WHASX GHM OUBY OUX U VYMMYK HK THKY IKHZHAGXAGXYKLMUGXPGN HZ MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY LWYGY OY OUX CPMGYLLYX VYMCYYGOPL ZUMOYK, TUKE, UGX GUMULOU, MOUG OY OUX MOYG. OY AGXYKLMHHX PMWHTISYMYSE, UGX, SYUBPGN MOY KHHT CPMOHAM WKEPGN, CYGM LPSYGMSE AIMH GUMULOU COH OUX WHTY HAM CPMO OPT UGX SHHRYX LOESE UM OYK CPMO OPLVYUAMPZAS, MOHANOMZAS YEYL, MOYG OPL AISPZMYX, KHLE AIIYK SPI MKYTVSYXUGX SYUGPGN OPL OYUX UNUPGLM OYK OY VYNUG MH WKE.UZMYK MOUM OY UBHPXYX XYLLUSSYL UGX MOY WHAGMYLL COH WUKYLLYX OPT UGXYPMOYK LUM USHGY HK WUTY MPTPXSE MH IKPGWYLL TUKE, HK MH GUMULOU HZ COHTOY LYYTYX YBYG ZHGXYK MOUG HZ OPL UAGM, UGX WSAGN MH MOYT JAPYMSE UGXLOESE.COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX SYZM IKPGWY UGXKYC LOY ZASSE AGXYKLMHHX COUMGUMULOU'L ZUWY OUX MHSX OYK. LOY XPX GHM LIYUR UGE THKY MH GUMULOU HZOHIYL HZ LUBPGN OPL SPZY. LOY MHHR MAKGL CPMO OYK VYLPXY OPL LHZU, UGXXPX GHM WKE UGE THKY, VAM IKUEYX WHGMPGAUSSE, MAKGPGN PG LHAS MH MOUMYMYKGUS UGX AGZUMOHTUVSY, COHLY IKYLYGWY UVHBY MOY XEPGN TUG CUL GHC LHYBPXYGM.WOUIMYK DBPGHM HGSE XPX IKPGWY UGXKYC RGHC OY CHASX XPY, VAM OY ZYSM MOUM OY CULXEPGN UGX CUL USKYUXE OUSZ XYUX. OY CUL WHGLWPHAL HZ UG USHHZGYLL ZKHTYBYKEMOPGN YUKMOSE UGX U LMKUGNY UGX QHEHAL SPNOMGYLL HZ YDPLMYGWY.CPMOHAM OULMY HK UNPMUMPHG OY UCUPMYX COUM CUL WHTPGN. MOUM PGYDHKUVSY,YMYKGUS, XPLMUGM, UGX AGRGHCG MOY IKYLYGWY HZ COPWO OY OUX ZYSMWHGMPGAUSSE USS OPL SPZY--CUL GHC GYUK MH OPT UGX, VE MOY LMKUGNYSPNOMGYLL OY YDIYKPYGWYX, USTHLM WHTIKYOYGLPVSY UGX IUSIUVSY...ZHKTYKSE OY OUX ZYUKYX MOY YGX. OY OUX MCPWY YDIYKPYGWYX MOUM MYKKPVSEMHKTYGMPGN ZYUK HZ XYUMO--MOY YGX--VAM GHC OY GH SHGNYK AGXYKLMHHX MOUMZYUK. OY OUX ZYSM PM ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY COYG MOY LOYSS LIAG SPRY U MHIVYZHKY OPT, UGX OY SHHRYX UM MOY ZUSSHC ZPYSX, MOY VALOYL, UGX MOY LRE,UGX RGYC MOUM OY CUL ZUWY MH ZUWY CPMO XYUMO. COYG OY WUTY MH OPTLYSZUZMYK VYPGN CHAGXYX UGX MOY ZSHCYK HZ YMYKGUS, AGZYMMYKYX SHBY OUXPGLMUGMSE AGZHSXYX PMLYSZ PG OPL LHAS UL PZ ZKYYX ZKHT MOY VHGXUNY HZSPZY MOUM OUX KYLMKUPGYX PM, OY GH SHGNYK ZYUKYX XYUMO UGX WYULYX MHMOPGR UVHAM PM.XAKPGN MOY OHAKL HZ LHSPMAXY, LAZZYKPGN, UGX IUKMPUS XYSPKPAT OYLIYGM UZMYK OY CUL CHAGXYX, MOY THKY XYYISE OY IYGYMKUMYX PGMH MOY GYCIKPGWPISY HZ YMYKGUS SHBY KYBYUSYX MH OPT, MOY THKY OY AGWHGLWPHALSEXYMUWOYX OPTLYSZ ZKHT YUKMOSE SPZY. MH SHBY YBYKEMOPGN UGX YBYKEVHXE UGXUSCUEL MH LUWKPZPWY HGYLYSZ ZHK SHBY TYUGM GHM MH SHBY UGEHGY, GHMMH SPBY MOPL YUKMOSE SPZY. UGX MOY THKY PTVAYX OY VYWUTY CPMO MOUMIKPGWPISY HZ SHBY, MOY THKY OY KYGHAGWYX SPZY UGX MOY THKY WHTISYMYSEOY XYLMKHEYX MOUM XKYUXZAS VUKKPYK COPWO--PG MOY UVLYGWY HZ LAWOSHBY--LMUGXL VYMCYYG SPZY UGX XYUMO. COYG XAKPGN MOHLY ZPKLM XUEL OYKYTYTVYKYX MOUM OY CHASX OUBY MH XPY, OY LUPX MH OPTLYSZ: "CYSS, COUM HZPM? LH TAWO MOY VYMMYK!"VAM UZMYK MOY GPNOM PG TEMPLOWOP COYG, OUSZ XYSPKPHAL, OY OUX LYYG OYKZHK COHT OY SHGNYX UIIYUK VYZHKY OPT UGX, OUBPGN IKYLLYX OYK OUGX MH OPLSPIL, OUX LOYX NYGMSY, OUIIE MYUKL, SHBY ZHK U IUKMPWASUK CHTUG UNUPGWKYIM AGHVLYKBYX PGMH OPL OYUKM UGX HGWY THKY VHAGX OPT MH SPZY. UGXQHEZAS UGX UNPMUMPGN MOHANOML VYNUG MH HWWAIE OPL TPGX. KYWUSSPGN MOYTHTYGM UM MOY UTVASUGWY LMUMPHG COYG OY OUX LYYG RAKUNPG, OY WHASX GHMGHC KYNUPG MOY ZYYSPGN OY MOYG OUX, VAM CUL MHKTYGMYX VE MOY JAYLMPHGCOYMOYK RAKUNPG CUL USPBY. UGX OY XUKYX GHM PGJAPKY.OPL PSSGYLL IAKLAYX PML GHKTUS IOELPWUS WHAKLY, VAM COUM GUMULOUKYZYKKYX MH COYG LOY LUPX: "MOPL LAXXYGSE OUIIYGYX," OUX HWWAKKYX MCHXUEL VYZHKY IKPGWYLL TUKE UKKPBYX. PM CUL MOY SULM LIPKPMAUS LMKANNSYVYMCYYG SPZY UGX XYUMO, PG COPWO XYUMO NUPGYX MOY BPWMHKE. PM CULMOY AGYDIYWMYX KYUSPFUMPHG HZ MOY ZUWM MOUM OY LMPSS BUSAYX SPZY ULIKYLYGMYX MH OPT PG MOY ZHKT HZ OPL SHBY ZHK GUMULOU, UGX U SULM, MOHANOASMPTUMYSE BUGJAPLOYX, UMMUWR HZ MYKKHK VYZHKY MOY AGRGHCG.PM CUL YBYGPGN. UL ALAUS UZMYK XPGGYK OY CUL LSPNOMSE ZYBYKPLO, UGX OPLMOHANOML CYKY IKYMYKGUMAKUSSE WSYUK. LHGEU CUL LPMMPGN VE MOY MUVSY. OYVYNUG MH XHFY. LAXXYGSE U ZYYSPGN HZ OUIIPGYLL LYPFYX OPT."UO, LOY OUL WHTY!" MOHANOM OY.UGX LH PM CUL: PG LHGEU'L ISUWY LUM GUMULOU COH OUX QALM WHTY PGGHPLYSYLLSE.LPGWY LOY OUX VYNAG SHHRPGN UZMYK OPT, OY OUX USCUEL YDIYKPYGWYX MOPLIOELPWUS WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ OYK GYUKGYLL. LOY CUL LPMMPGN PG UG UKTWOUPKISUWYX LPXYCUEL, LWKYYGPGN MOY SPNOM HZ MOY WUGXSY ZKHT OPT, UGX CULRGPMMPGN U LMHWRPGN. LOY OUX SYUKGYX MH RGPM LMHWRPGNL LPGWY IKPGWYUGXKYC OUX WULAUSSE TYGMPHGYX MOUM GH HGY GAKLYX MOY LPWR LH CYSS UL HSXGAKLYL COH RGPM LMHWRPGNL, UGX MOUM MOYKY PL LHTYMOPGN LHHMOPGN PGMOY RGPMMPGN HZ LMHWRPGNL. MOY GYYXSYL WSPWRYX SPNOMSE PG OYK LSYGXYK,KUIPXSE THBPGN OUGXL, UGX OY WHASX WSYUKSE LYY MOY MOHANOMZAS IKHZPSYHZ OYK XKHHIPGN ZUWY. LOY THBYX, UGX MOY VUSS KHSSYX HZZ OYK RGYYL. LOYLMUKMYX, NSUGWYX KHAGX UM OPT, UGX LWKYYGPGN MOY WUGXSY CPMO OYK OUGXLMHHIYX WUKYZASSE CPMO U LAIISY UGX YDUWM THBYTYGM, IPWRYX AI MOY VUSS,UGX KYNUPGYX OYK ZHKTYK IHLPMPHG.OY SHHRYX UM OYK CPMOHAM THBPGN UGX LUC MOUM LOY CUGMYX MH XKUC UXYYI VKYUMO UZMYK LMHHIPGN, VAM KYZKUPGYX ZKHT XHPGN LH UGX VKYUMOYXWUAMPHALSE.UM MOY MKHPMLU THGULMYKE MOYE OUX LIHRYG HZ MOY IULM, UGX OY OUX MHSXOYK MOUM PZ OY SPBYX OY CHASX USCUEL MOUGR NHX ZHK OPL CHAGX COPWO OUXVKHANOM MOYT MHNYMOYK UNUPG, VAM UZMYK MOUM MOYE GYBYK LIHRY HZ MOYZAMAKY."WUG PM HK WUG PM GHM VY?" OY GHC MOHANOM UL OY SHHRYX UM OYK UGXSPLMYGYX MH MOY SPNOM WSPWR HZ MOY LMYYS GYYXSYL. "WUG ZUMY OUBY VKHANOMTY MH OYK LH LMKUGNYSE HGSE ZHK TY MH XPY?... PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM MOYMKAMO HZ SPZY OUL VYYG KYBYUSYX MH TY HGSE MH LOHC TY MOUM P OUBY LIYGMTE SPZY PG ZUSLPME? P SHBY OYK THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX! VAM COUMUT P MH XH PZ P SHBY OYK?" OY MOHANOM, UGX OY PGBHSAGMUKPSE NKHUGYX,ZKHT U OUVPM UWJAPKYX XAKPGN OPL LAZZYKPGNL.HG OYUKPGN MOUM LHAGX GUMULOU IAM XHCG MOY LMHWRPGN, SYUGYX GYUKYK MHOPT, UGX LAXXYGSE, GHMPWPGN OPL LOPGPGN YEYL, LMYIIYX SPNOMSE AI MH OPTUGX VYGM HBYK OPT."EHA UKY GHM ULSYYI?""GH, P OUBY VYYG SHHRPGN UM EHA U SHGN MPTY. P ZYSM EHA WHTY PG. GH HGYYSLY NPBYL TY MOUM LYGLY HZ LHZM MKUGJAPSSPME MOUM EHA XH... MOUM SPNOM.P CUGM MH CYYI ZHK QHE."GUMULOU XKYC WSHLYK MH OPT. OYK ZUWY LOHGY CPMO KUIMAKHAL QHE."GUMULOU, P SHBY EHA MHH TAWO! THKY MOUG UGEMOPGN PG MOY CHKSX.""UGX P!"--LOY MAKGYX UCUE ZHK UG PGLMUGM. "COE MHH TAWO?" LOY ULRYX."COE MHH TAWO?... CYSS, COUM XH EHA, COUM XH EHA ZYYS PG EHAK LHAS, EHAKCOHSY LHAS--LOUSS P SPBY? COUM XH EHA MOPGR?""P UT LAKY HZ PM, LAKY!" GUMULOU USTHLM LOHAMYX, MURPGN OHSX HZ VHMO OPLOUGXL CPMO U IULLPHGUMY THBYTYGM.OY KYTUPGYX LPSYGM UCOPSY."OHC NHHX PM CHASX VY!" UGX MURPGN OYK OUGX OY RPLLYX PM.GUMULOU ZYSM OUIIE UGX UNPMUMYX, VAM UM HGWY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM MOPL CHASXGHM XH UGX MOUM OY OUX MH VY JAPYM."VAM EHA OUBY GHM LSYIM," LOY LUPX, KYIKYLLPGN OYK QHE. "MKE MH LSYYI...ISYULY!"OY IKYLLYX OYK OUGX UGX KYSYULYX PM, UGX LOY CYGM VUWR MH MOY WUGXSY UGXLUM XHCG UNUPG PG OYK ZHKTYK IHLPMPHG. MCPWY LOY MAKGYX UGX SHHRYX UMOPT, UGX OYK YEYL TYM OPL VYUTPGN UM OYK. LOY LYM OYKLYSZ U MULR HG OYKLMHWRPGN UGX KYLHSBYX GHM MH MAKG KHAGX MPSS PM CUL ZPGPLOYX.LHHG OY KYUSSE LOAM OPL YEYL UGX ZYSS ULSYYI. OY XPX GHM LSYYI SHGN UGXLAXXYGSE UCHRY CPMO U LMUKM UGX PG U WHSX IYKLIPKUMPHG.UL OY ZYSS ULSYYI OY OUX LMPSS VYYG MOPGRPGN HZ MOY LAVQYWM MOUM GHCUSCUEL HWWAIPYX OPL TPGX--UVHAM SPZY UGX XYUMO, UGX WOPYZSE UVHAM XYUMO.OY ZYSM OPTLYSZ GYUKYK MH PM."SHBY? COUM PL SHBY?" OY MOHANOM."SHBY OPGXYKL XYUMO. SHBY PL SPZY. USS, YBYKEMOPGN MOUM P AGXYKLMUGX, PAGXYKLMUGX HGSE VYWUALY P SHBY. YBYKEMOPGN PL, YBYKEMOPGN YDPLML, HGSEVYWUALY P SHBY. YBYKEMOPGN PL AGPMYX VE PM USHGY. SHBY PL NHX, UGX MHXPY TYUGL MOUM P, U IUKMPWSY HZ SHBY, LOUSS KYMAKG MH MOY NYGYKUS UGXYMYKGUS LHAKWY." MOYLY MOHANOML LYYTYX MH OPT WHTZHKMPGN. VAM MOYE CYKYHGSE MOHANOML. LHTYMOPGN CUL SUWRPGN PG MOYT, MOYE CYKY GHM WSYUK, MOYECYKY MHH HGY-LPXYXSE IYKLHGUS UGX VKUPG-LIAG. UGX MOYKY CUL MOY ZHKTYKUNPMUMPHG UGX HVLWAKPME. OY ZYSS ULSYYI.OY XKYUTYX MOUM OY CUL SEPGN PG MOY KHHT OY KYUSSE CUL PG, VAM MOUMOY CUL JAPMY CYSS UGX AGCHAGXYX. TUGE BUKPHAL, PGXPZZYKYGM, UGXPGLPNGPZPWUGM IYHISY UIIYUKYX VYZHKY OPT. OY MUSRYX MH MOYT UGXXPLWALLYX LHTYMOPGN MKPBPUS. MOYE CYKY IKYIUKPGN MH NH UCUE LHTYCOYKY.IKPGWY UGXKYC XPTSE KYUSPFYX MOUM USS MOPL CUL MKPBPUS UGX MOUM OY OUXTHKY PTIHKMUGM WUKYL, VAM OY WHGMPGAYX MH LIYUR, LAKIKPLPGN MOYT VEYTIME CPMMPWPLTL. NKUXAUSSE, AGGHMPWYX, USS MOYLY IYKLHGL VYNUG MHXPLUIIYUK UGX U LPGNSY JAYLMPHG, MOUM HZ MOY WSHLYX XHHK, LAIYKLYXYXUSS YSLY. OY KHLY UGX CYGM MH MOY XHHK MH VHSM UGX SHWR PM. YBYKEMOPGNXYIYGXYX HG COYMOYK OY CUL, HK CUL GHM, PG MPTY MH SHWR PM. OY CYGM, UGXMKPYX MH OAKKE, VAM OPL SYNL KYZALYX MH THBY UGX OY RGYC OY CHASX GHM VYPG MPTY MH SHWR MOY XHHK MOHANO OY IUPGZASSE LMKUPGYX USS OPL IHCYKL. OYCUL LYPFYX VE UG UNHGPFPGN ZYUK. UGX MOUM ZYUK CUL MOY ZYUK HZ XYUMO. PMLMHHX VYOPGX MOY XHHK. VAM QALM COYG OY CUL WSATLPSE WKYYIPGN MHCUKXMOY XHHK, MOUM XKYUXZAS LHTYMOPGN HG MOY HMOYK LPXY CUL USKYUXE IKYLLPGNUNUPGLM PM UGX ZHKWPGN PML CUE PG. LHTYMOPGN GHM OATUG--XYUMO--CULVKYURPGN PG MOKHANO MOUM XHHK, UGX OUX MH VY RYIM HAM. OY LYPFYX MOYXHHK, TURPGN U ZPGUS YZZHKM MH OHSX PM VUWR--MH SHWR PM CUL GH SHGNYKIHLLPVSY--VAM OPL YZZHKML CYKY CYUR UGX WSATLE UGX MOY XHHK, IALOYX ZKHTVYOPGX VE MOUM MYKKHK, HIYGYX UGX WSHLYX UNUPG.HGWY UNUPG PM IALOYX ZKHT HAMLPXY. OPL SULM LAIYKOATUG YZZHKML CYKY BUPGUGX VHMO OUSBYL HZ MOY XHHK GHPLYSYLLSE HIYGYX. PM YGMYKYX, UGX PM CULXYUMO, UGX IKPGWY UGXKYC XPYX.VAM UM MOY PGLMUGM OY XPYX, IKPGWY UGXKYC KYTYTVYKYX MOUM OY CUL ULSYYI,UGX UM MOY BYKE PGLMUGM OY XPYX, OUBPGN TUXY UG YZZHKM, OY UCHRY."EYL, PM CUL XYUMO! P XPYX--UGX CHRY AI. EYL, XYUMO PL UG UCURYGPGN!"UGX USS UM HGWY PM NKYC SPNOM PG OPL LHAS UGX MOY BYPS MOUM OUX MPSSMOYG WHGWYUSYX MOY AGRGHCG CUL SPZMYX ZKHT OPL LIPKPMAUS BPLPHG. OY ZYSMUL PZ IHCYKL MPSS MOYG WHGZPGYX CPMOPG OPT OUX VYYG SPVYKUMYX, UGX MOUMLMKUGNY SPNOMGYLL XPX GHM UNUPG SYUBY OPT.COYG, CURPGN PG U WHSX IYKLIPKUMPHG, OY THBYX HG MOY XPBUG, GUMULOU CYGMAI UGX ULRYX OPT COUM CUL MOY TUMMYK. OY XPX GHM UGLCYK UGX SHHRYX UMOYK LMKUGNYSE, GHM AGXYKLMUGXPGN.MOUM CUL COUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OPT MCH XUEL VYZHKY IKPGWYLL TUKE'LUKKPBUS. ZKHT MOUM XUE, UL MOY XHWMHK YDIKYLLYX PM, MOY CULMPGN ZYBYKULLATYX U TUSPNGUGM WOUKUWMYK, VAM COUM MOY XHWMHK LUPX XPX GHM PGMYKYLMGUMULOU, LOY LUC MOY MYKKPVSY THKUS LETIMHTL COPWO MH OYK CYKY THKYWHGBPGWPGN.ZKHT MOUM XUE UG UCURYGPGN ZKHT SPZY WUTY MH IKPGWY UGXKYC MHNYMOYK CPMOOPL UCURYGPGN ZKHT LSYYI. UGX WHTIUKYX MH MOY XAKUMPHG HZ SPZY PM XPXGHM LYYT MH OPT LSHCYK MOUG UG UCURYGPGN ZKHT LSYYI WHTIUKYX MH MOYXAKUMPHG HZ U XKYUT.MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MYKKPVSY HK BPHSYGM PG MOPL WHTIUKUMPBYSE LSHCUCURYGPGN.OPL SULM XUEL UGX OHAKL IULLYX PG UG HKXPGUKE UGX LPTISY CUE. VHMOIKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU, COH XPX GHM SYUBY OPT, ZYSM MOPL. MOYE XPXGHM CYYI HK LOAXXYK UGX XAKPGN MOYLY SULM XUEL MOYE MOYTLYSBYL ZYSMMOUM MOYE CYKY GHM UMMYGXPGN HG OPT (OY CUL GH SHGNYK MOYKY, OY OUX SYZMMOYT) VAM HG COUM KYTPGXYX MOYT THLM WSHLYSE HZ OPT--OPL VHXE. VHMO ZYSMMOPL LH LMKHGNSE MOUM MOY HAMCUKX UGX MYKKPVSY LPXY HZ XYUMO XPX GHMUZZYWM MOYT UGX MOYE XPX GHM ZYYS PM GYWYLLUKE MH ZHTYGM MOYPK NKPYZ.GYPMOYK PG OPL IKYLYGWY GHK HAM HZ PM XPX MOYE CYYI, GHK XPX MOYE YBYKMUSR MH HGY UGHMOYK UVHAM OPT. MOYE ZYSM MOUM MOYE WHASX GHM YDIKYLL PGCHKXL COUM MOYE AGXYKLMHHX.MOYE VHMO LUC MOUM OY CUL LPGRPGN LSHCSE UGX JAPYMSE, XYYIYK UGX XYYIYK,UCUE ZKHT MOYT, UGX MOYE VHMO RGYC MOUM MOPL OUX MH VY LH UGX MOUM PMCUL KPNOM.OY WHGZYLLYX, UGX KYWYPBYX WHTTAGPHG: YBYKEHGY WUTY MH MURY SYUBY HZOPT. COYG MOYE VKHANOM OPL LHG MH OPT, OY IKYLLYX OPL SPIL MH MOY VHE'LUGX MAKGYX UCUE, GHM VYWUALY OY ZYSM PM OUKX UGX LUX (IKPGWYLL TUKE UGXGUMULOU AGXYKLMHHX MOUM) VAM LPTISE VYWUALY OY MOHANOM PM CUL USS MOUMCUL KYJAPKYX HZ OPT, VAM COYG MOYE MHSX OPT MH VSYLL MOY VHE, OY XPXCOUM CUL XYTUGXYX UGX SHHRYX KHAGX UL PZ ULRPGN COYMOYK MOYKY CULUGEMOPGN YSLY OY LOHASX XH.COYG MOY SULM WHGBASLPHGL HZ MOY VHXE, COPWO MOY LIPKPM CUL SYUBPGN,HWWAKKYX, IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU CYKY IKYLYGM."PL PM HBYK?" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE COYG OPL VHXE OUX ZHK U ZYC TPGAMYLSUPG THMPHGSYLL, NKHCPGN WHSX VYZHKY MOYT. GUMULOU CYGM AI, SHHRYX UMMOY XYUX YEYL, UGX OULMYGYX MH WSHLY MOYT. LOY WSHLYX MOYT VAM XPX GHMRPLL MOYT, VAM WSAGN MH MOUM COPWO KYTPGXYX OYK THLM GYUKSE HZ OPT--OPLVHXE."COYKY OUL OY NHGY? COYKY PL OY GHC?..."COYG MOY VHXE, CULOYX UGX XKYLLYX, SUE PG MOY WHZZPG HG U MUVSY,YBYKEHGY WUTY MH MURY SYUBY HZ OPT UGX MOYE USS CYIM.SPMMSY GPWOHSUL WKPYX VYWUALY OPL OYUKM CUL KYGM VE IUPGZAS IYKISYDPME.MOY WHAGMYLL UGX LHGEU WKPYX ZKHT IPME ZHK GUMULOU UGX VYWUALY OY CULGH THKY. MOY HSX WHAGM WKPYX VYWUALY OY ZYSM MOUM VYZHKY SHGN, OY, MHH,TALM MURY MOY LUTY MYKKPVSY LMYI.GUMULOU UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE USLH CYIM GHC, VAM GHM VYWUALY HZ MOYPK HCGIYKLHGUS NKPYZ; MOYE CYIM CPMO U KYBYKYGM UGX LHZMYGPGN YTHMPHG COPWOOUX MURYG IHLLYLLPHG HZ MOYPK LHASL UM MOY WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOYLPTISY UGX LHSYTG TELMYKE HZ XYUMO MOUM OUX VYYG UWWHTISPLOYX PG MOYPKIKYLYGWY.VHHR MOPKMYYG: 1812WOUIMYK PTUG'L TPGX WUGGHM NKULI MOY WUALYL HZ YBYGML PG MOYPK WHTISYMYGYLL, VAMMOY XYLPKY MH ZPGX MOHLY WUALYL PL PTISUGMYX PG TUG'L LHAS. UGX CPMOHAMWHGLPXYKPGN MOY TASMPISPWPME UGX WHTISYDPME HZ MOY WHGXPMPHGL UGE HGYHZ COPWO MURYG LYIUKUMYSE TUE LYYT MH VY MOY WUALY, OY LGUMWOYL UM MOYZPKLM UIIKHDPTUMPHG MH U WUALY MOUM LYYTL MH OPT PGMYSSPNPVSY UGX LUEL:"MOPL PL MOY WUALY!" PG OPLMHKPWUS YBYGML (COYKY MOY UWMPHGL HZ TYG UKYMOY LAVQYWM HZ HVLYKBUMPHG) MOY ZPKLM UGX THLM IKPTPMPBY UIIKHDPTUMPHGMH IKYLYGM PMLYSZ CUL MOY CPSS HZ MOY NHXL UGX, UZMYK MOUM, MOY CPSS HZMOHLY COH LMHHX PG MOY THLM IKHTPGYGM IHLPMPHG--MOY OYKHYL HZ OPLMHKE.VAM CY GYYX HGSE IYGYMKUMY MH MOY YLLYGWY HZ UGE OPLMHKPW YBYGM--COPWOSPYL PG MOY UWMPBPME HZ MOY NYGYKUS TULL HZ TYG COH MURY IUKM PG PM--MHVY WHGBPGWYX MOUM MOY CPSS HZ MOY OPLMHKPW OYKH XHYL GHM WHGMKHS MOYUWMPHGL HZ MOY TULL VAM PL PMLYSZ WHGMPGAUSSE WHGMKHSSYX. HGSECOYG MOY UKTE OUX NHM MOYKY, UL MOY KYLASM HZ PGGATYKUVSY UGX BUKEPGNZHKWYL, XPX IYHISY VYNPG MH ULLAKY MOYTLYSBYL MOUM MOYE OUX XYLPKYX MOPLTHBYTYGM UGX SHGN UNH ZHKYLYYG PML KYLASM.WOUIMYK PPMOY ZUTHAL ZSUGR THBYTYGM TYKYSE WHGLPLMYX PG MOPL: UZMYK MOY UXBUGWYHZ MOY ZKYGWO OUX WYULYX, MOY KALLPUG UKTE, COPWO OUX VYYG WHGMPGAUSSEKYMKYUMPGN LMKUPNOM VUWR ZKHT MOY PGBUXYKL, XYBPUMYX ZKHT MOUM XPKYWMWHAKLY UGX, GHM ZPGXPGN PMLYSZ IAKLAYX, CUL GUMAKUSSE XKUCG MHCUKX MOYXPLMKPWM COYKY LAIISPYL CYKY UVAGXUGM.PZ PGLMYUX HZ PTUNPGPGN MH HAKLYSBYL WHTTUGXYKL HZ NYGPAL SYUXPGN MOYKALLPUG UKTE, CY IPWMAKY MOUM UKTE CPMOHAM UGE SYUXYKL, PM WHASX GHMOUBY XHGY UGEMOPGN VAM TURY U KYMAKG THBYTYGM MHCUKX THLWHC, XYLWKPVPGNUG UKW PG MOY XPKYWMPHG COYKY THLM IKHBPLPHGL CYKY MH VY ZHAGX UGX COYKYMOY WHAGMKE CUL KPWOYLM.MOUM THBYTYGM ZKHT MOY GPFOGP MH MOY KEUFUG, MASU, UGX RUSANU KHUXL CULLH GUMAKUS MOUM YBYG MOY KALLPUG TUKUAXYKL THBYX PG MOUM XPKYWMPHG, UGXXYTUGXL CYKY LYGM ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN ZHK RAMAFHB MH MURY OPL UKTE MOUMCUE. UM MUKAMPGH RAMAFHB KYWYPBYX COUM CUL USTHLM U KYIKPTUGX ZKHTMOY YTIYKHK ZHK OUBPGN THBYX OPL UKTE USHGN MOY KEUFUG KHUX, UGX MOYYTIYKHK'L SYMMYK PGXPWUMYX MH OPT MOY BYKE IHLPMPHG OY OUX USKYUXEHWWAIPYX GYUK RUSANU.OUBPGN KHSSYX SPRY U VUSS PG MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ MOY PTIYMAL NPBYG VE MOYCOHSY WUTIUPNG UGX VE MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, MOY KALLPUG UKTE--COYGMOY LMKYGNMO HZ MOUM PTIYMAL CUL YDOUALMYX UGX GH ZKYLO IALO CULKYWYPBYX--ULLATYX MOY IHLPMPHG GUMAKUS MH PM.RAMAFHB'L TYKPM SUE, GHM PG UGE LMKUMYNPW TUGYABYK HZ NYGPAL, UL PM PLWUSSYX, VAM PG MOY ZUWM MOUM OY USHGY AGXYKLMHHX MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZCOUM OUX OUIIYGYX. OY USHGY MOYG AGXYKLMHHX MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY ZKYGWOUKTE'L PGUWMPBPME, OY USHGY WHGMPGAYX MH ULLYKM MOUM MOY VUMMSY HZVHKHXPGH OUX VYYG U BPWMHKE, OY USHGY--COH UL WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ TPNOMOUBY VYYG YDIYWMYX MH VY YUNYK MH UMMUWR--YTISHEYX OPL COHSY LMKYGNMO MHKYLMKUPG MOY KALLPUG UKTE ZKHT ALYSYLL YGNUNYTYGML.MOY VYULM CHAGXYX UM VHKHXPGH CUL SEPGN COYKY MOY ZSYYPGN OAGMYK OUXSYZM OPT; VAM COYMOYK OY CUL LMPSS USPBY, COYMOYK OY CUL LMKHGN UGXTYKYSE SEPGN SHC, MOY OAGMYK XPX GHM RGHC. LAXXYGSE MOY VYULM CUL OYUKXMH THUG.MOY THUG HZ MOUM CHAGXYX VYULM (MOY ZKYGWO UKTE) COPWO VYMKUEYX PMLWUSUTPMHAL WHGXPMPHG CUL MOY LYGXPGN HZ SUAKPLMHG MH RAMAFHB'L WUTI CPMOHBYKMAKYL ZHK IYUWY.GUIHSYHG, CPMO OPL ALAUS ULLAKUGWY MOUM COUMYBYK YGMYKYX OPL OYUX CULKPNOM, CKHMY MH RAMAFHB MOY ZPKLM CHKXL MOUM HWWAKKYX MH OPT, MOHANOMOYE CYKY TYUGPGNSYLL.THGLPYAK SY IKPGWY RHAMHAFHB: P UT LYGXPGN HGY HZ TE UXQAMUGML-NYGYKUSMH XPLWALL LYBYKUS PGMYKYLMPGN JAYLMPHGL CPMO EHA. MOPL SYMMYK OUBPGN GH HMOYK HVQYWM, P IKUE NHX, THGLPYAK SYIKPGWY RHAMHAFHB, MH RYYI EHA PG OPL OHSE UGX NKUWPHAL IKHMYWMPHG!GUIHSYHGTHLWHC, HWMHVYK 30, 1812RAMAFHB KYISPYX: "P LOHASX VY WAKLYX VE IHLMYKPME CYKY P SHHRYX HG ULMOY PGPMPUMHK HZ U LYMMSYTYGM HZ UGE LHKM. LAWO PL MOY IKYLYGM LIPKPMHZ TE GUMPHG." VAM OY WHGMPGAYX MH YDYKM USS OPL IHCYKL MH KYLMKUPG OPLMKHHIL ZKHT UMMUWRPGN.XAKPGN MOY THGMO MOUM MOY ZKYGWO MKHHIL CYKY IPSSUNPGN PG THLWHC UGXMOY KALLPUG MKHHIL CYKY JAPYMSE YGWUTIYX UM MUKAMPGH, U WOUGNY OUX MURYGISUWY PG MOY KYSUMPBY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY MCH UKTPYL--VHMO PG LIPKPM UGX PGGATVYK--UL U KYLASM HZ COPWO MOY LAIYKPHKPME OUX IULLYX MH MOY KALLPUGLPXY. MOHANO MOY WHGXPMPHG UGX GATVYKL HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE CYKY AGRGHCGMH MOY KALLPUGL, UL LHHG UL MOUM WOUGNY HWWAKKYX MOY GYYX HZ UMMUWRPGNUM HGWY LOHCYX PMLYSZ VE WHAGMSYLL LPNGL. MOYLY LPNGL CYKY: SUAKPLMHG'LTPLLPHG; MOY UVAGXUGWY HZ IKHBPLPHGL UM MUKAMPGH; MOY KYIHKML WHTPGN PGZKHT USS LPXYL HZ MOY PGUWMPBPME UGX XPLHKXYK HZ MOY ZKYGWO; MOY ZSHC HZKYWKAPML MH HAK KYNPTYGML; MOY ZPGY CYUMOYK; MOY SHGN KYLM MOY KALLPUGLHSXPYKL OUX YGQHEYX, UGX MOY PTIUMPYGWY MH XH COUM MOYE OUX VYYGULLYTVSYX ZHK, COPWO ALAUSSE LOHCL PMLYSZ PG UG UKTE MOUM OUL VYYGKYLMPGN; WAKPHLPME UL MH COUM MOY ZKYGWO UKTE, LH SHGN SHLM LPNOM HZ,CUL XHPGN; MOY VHSXGYLL CPMO COPWO HAK HAMIHLML GHC LWHAMYX WSHLY AI MHMOY ZKYGWO LMUMPHGYX UM MUKAMPGH; MOY GYCL HZ YULE LAWWYLLYL NUPGYX VEIYULUGML UGX NAYKKPSSU MKHHIL HBYK MOY ZKYGWO, MOY YGBE UKHALYX VE MOPL;MOY XYLPKY ZHK KYBYGNY MOUM SUE PG MOY OYUKM HZ YBYKE KALLPUG UL SHGN ULMOY ZKYGWO CYKY PG THLWHC, UGX (UVHBY USS) U XPT WHGLWPHALGYLL PG YBYKELHSXPYK'L TPGX MOUM MOY KYSUMPBY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY UKTPYL OUX WOUGNYX UGXMOUM MOY UXBUGMUNY CUL GHC HG HAK LPXY. MOYKY CUL U LAVLMUGMPUS WOUGNYPG MOY KYSUMPBY LMKYGNMO, UGX UG UXBUGWY OUX VYWHTY PGYBPMUVSY. UGX UMHGWY, UL U WSHWR VYNPGL MH LMKPRY UGX WOPTY UL LHHG UL MOY TPGAMY OUGXOUL WHTISYMYX U ZASS WPKWSY, MOPL WOUGNY CUL LOHCG VE UG PGWKYULYXUWMPBPME, COPKKPGN, UGX WOPTPGN PG MOY OPNOYK LIOYKYL.WOUIMYK PPPMOY KALLPUG UKTE CUL WHTTUGXYX VE RAMAFHB UGX OPL LMUZZ, UGX USLH VE MOYYTIYKHK ZKHT IYMYKLVAKN. VYZHKY MOY GYCL HZ MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ THLWHCOUX VYYG KYWYPBYX PG IYMYKLVAKN, U XYMUPSYX ISUG HZ MOY COHSY WUTIUPNGOUX VYYG XKUCG AI UGX LYGM MH RAMAFHB ZHK OPL NAPXUGWY. MOHANO MOPL ISUGOUX VYYG XKUCG AI HG MOY LAIIHLPMPHG MOUM THLWHC CUL LMPSS PG HAK OUGXL,PM CUL UIIKHBYX VE MOY LMUZZ UGX UWWYIMYX UL U VULPL ZHK UWMPHG.RAMAFHB HGSE KYISPYX MOUM THBYTYGML UKKUGNYX ZKHT U XPLMUGWY CYKY USCUELXPZZPWASM MH YDYWAMY. LH ZKYLO PGLMKAWMPHGL CYKY LYGM ZHK MOY LHSAMPHGHZ XPZZPWASMPYL MOUM TPNOM VY YGWHAGMYKYX, UL CYSS UL ZKYLO IYHISY COHCYKY MH CUMWO RAMAFHB'L UWMPHGL UGX KYIHKM AIHG MOYT.VYLPXYL MOPL, MOY COHSY LMUZZ HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE CUL GHC KYHKNUGPFYX.MOY IHLML SYZM BUWUGM VE VUNKUMPHG, COH OUX VYYG RPSSYX, UGX VEVUKWSUE, COH OUX NHGY UCUE PG XAXNYHG, OUX MH VY ZPSSYX. BYKE LYKPHALWHGLPXYKUMPHG CUL NPBYG MH MOY JAYLMPHG COYMOYK PM CHASX VY VYMMYK MHIAM U PG V'L ISUWY UGX V PG X'L, HK HG MOY WHGMKUKE MH IAM X PG U'LISUWY, UGX LH HG--UL PZ UGEMOPGN THKY MOUG U'L HK V'L LUMPLZUWMPHGXYIYGXYX HG MOPL.UL U KYLASM HZ MOY OHLMPSPME VYMCYYG RAMAFHB UGX VYGGPNLYG, OPL WOPYZ HZLMUZZ, MOY IKYLYGWY HZ WHGZPXYGMPUS KYIKYLYGMUMPBYL HZ MOY YTIYKHK, UGXMOYLY MKUGLZYKL, U THKY MOUG ALAUSSE WHTISPWUMYX ISUE HZ IUKMPYLCUL NHPGN HG UTHGN MOY LMUZZ HZ MOY UKTE. U CUL AGXYKTPGPGN V, X CULAGXYKTPGPGN W, UGX LH HG PG USS IHLLPVSY WHTVPGUMPHGL UGX IYKTAMUMPHGL.PG USS MOYLY ISHMMPGNL MOY LAVQYWM HZ PGMKPNAY CUL NYGYKUSSE MOY WHGXAWMHZ MOY CUK, COPWO USS MOYLY TYG VYSPYBYX MOYE CYKY XPKYWMPGN; VAM MOPLUZZUPK HZ MOY CUK CYGM HG PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ MOYT, UL PM OUX MH NH:MOUM PL, GYBYK PG MOY CUE IYHISY XYBPLYX, VAM ZSHCPGN USCUEL ZKHT MOYYLLYGMPUS UMMPMAXY HZ MOY TULLYL. HGSE PG MOY OPNOYLM LIOYKYL XPXUSS MOYLY LWOYTYL, WKHLLPGNL, UGX PGMYKTPGNSPGNL UIIYUK MH VY U MKAYKYZSYWMPHG HZ COUM OUX MH OUIIYG.IKPGWY TPWOUYS PSUKPHGHBPWO! (CKHMY MOY YTIYKHK HG MOY LYWHGX HZ HWMHVYKPG U SYMMYK MOUM KYUWOYX RAMAFHB UZMYK MOY VUMMSY UM MUKAMPGH) LPGWYLYIMYTVYK 2 THLWHC OUL VYYG PG MOY OUGXL HZ MOY YGYTE. EHAK SULM KYIHKMLCYKY CKPMMYG HG MOY MCYGMPYMO, UGX XAKPGN USS MOPL MPTY GHM HGSE OULGH UWMPHG VYYG MURYG UNUPGLM MOY YGYTE HK ZHK MOY KYSPYZ HZ MOY UGWPYGMWUIPMUS, VAM UWWHKXPGN MH EHAK SULM KYIHKM EHA OUBY YBYG KYMKYUMYXZUKMOYK. EHA'SS LYY COUM U TYLL MOYKY'SS VY MHTHKKHC."WOUIMYK BGYDM XUE MOY XYWKYIPM RAMAFHB, OUBPGN NPBYG HKXYKL MH VY WUSSYX YUKSE,LUPX OPL IKUEYKL, XKYLLYX, UGX, CPMO UG AGISYULUGM WHGLWPHALGYLL HZOUBPGN MH XPKYWM U VUMMSY OY XPX GHM UIIKHBY HZ, NHM PGMH OPL WUSYWOYUGX XKHBY ZKHT SYMULOHBRU (U BPSSUNY MOKYY UGX U OUSZ TPSYL ZKHTMUKAMPGH) MH MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY UMMUWRPGN WHSATGL CYKY MH TYYM. U XUTI XASS UAMATG THKGPGN CUL QALM XUCGPGN. HGUIIKHUWOPGN MUKAMPGH RAMAFHB GHMPWYX WUBUSKETYG SYUXPGN MOYPK OHKLYL MHCUMYK UWKHLL MOY KHUX USHGN COPWO OY CUL XKPBPGN. LHTY WHSATGL, LAIIHLPGN MOYE OUX KYUWOYX MOYPKXYLMPGUMPHG, OUSMYX, IPSYX UKTL, UGX LYMMSYX XHCG HG MOY WHSX NKHAGX,VAM MOY TUQHKPME TUKWOYX USS GPNOM UGX UKKPBYX UM ISUWYL COYKY MOYEYBPXYGMSE LOHASX GHM OUBY VYYG.HGSE WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB CPMO OPL WHLLUWRL (MOY SYULM PTIHKMUGMXYMUWOTYGM HZ USS) NHM MH OPL UIIHPGMYX ISUWY UM MOY KPNOM MPTY. MOPLXYMUWOTYGM OUSMYX UM MOY HAMLRPKML HZ U ZHKYLM, HG MOY IUMO SYUXPGN ZKHTMOY BPSSUNY HZ LMKHTPSHBU MH XTPMKHBLR.MHCUKX XUCG, WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB, COH OUX XHFYX HZZ, CUL UCURYGYX VE UXYLYKMYK ZKHT MOY ZKYGWO UKTE VYPGN VKHANOM MH OPT. MOPL CUL U IHSPLOLYKNYUGM HZ IHGPUMHCLRP'L WHKIL, COH YDISUPGYX PG IHSPLO MOUM OY OUXWHTY HBYK VYWUALY OY OUX VYYG LSPNOMYX PG MOY LYKBPWY: MOUM OY HANOMSHGN UNH MH OUBY VYYG TUXY UG HZZPWYK, MOUM OY CUL VKUBYK MOUG UGE HZMOYT, UGX LH OY OUX SYZM MOYT UGX CPLOYX MH IUE MOYT HAM. OY LUPX MOUMTAKUM CUL LIYGXPGN MOY GPNOM SYLL MOUG U TPSY ZKHT COYKY MOYE CYKY,UGX MOUM PZ MOYE CHASX SYM OPT OUBY U WHGBHE HZ U OAGXKYX TYG OY CHASXWUIMAKY OPT USPBY. WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB WHGLASMYX OPL ZYSSHC HZZPWYKL.MOY HZZYK CUL MHH MYTIMPGN MH VY KYZALYX. YBYKEHGY BHSAGMYYKYX MH NH UGXYBYKEVHXE UXBPLYX TURPGN MOY UMMYTIM. UZMYK TAWO XPLIAMPGN UGX UKNAPGN,TUQHK-NYGYKUS NKYRHB CPMO MCH WHLLUWR KYNPTYGML XYWPXYX MH NH CPMO MOYIHSPLO LYKNYUGM."GHC, KYTYTVYK," LUPX WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB MH MOY LYKNYUGM UM IUKMPGN,"PZ EHA OUBY VYYG SEPGN P'SS OUBY EHA OUGNYX SPRY U XHN; VAM PZ PM'LMKAY EHA LOUSS OUBY U OAGXKYX NHSX IPYWYL!"CPMOHAM KYISEPGN, MOY LYKNYUGM, CPMO U KYLHSAMY UPK, THAGMYX UGX KHXYUCUE CPMO NKYRHB COHLY TYG OUX JAPWRSE ULLYTVSYX. MOYE XPLUIIYUKYX PGMHMOY ZHKYLM, UGX WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB, OUBPGN LYYG NKYRHB HZZ, KYMAKGYX,LOPBYKPGN ZKHT MOY ZKYLOGYLL HZ MOY YUKSE XUCG UGX YDWPMYX VE COUM OYOUX AGXYKMURYG HG OPL HCG KYLIHGLPVPSPME, UGX VYNUG SHHRPGN UM MOY YGYTEWUTI, GHC QALM BPLPVSY PG MOY XYWYIMPBY SPNOM HZ XUCG UGX MOY XEPGNWUTIZPKYL. HAK WHSATGL HANOM MH OUBY VYNAG MH UIIYUK HG UG HIYGXYWSPBPME MH OPL KPNOM. OY SHHRYX PG MOUM XPKYWMPHG, VAM MOHANO MOYWHSATGL CHASX OUBY VYYG BPLPVSY JAPMY ZUK HZZ, MOYE CYKY GHM MH VY LYYG.PM LYYTYX MH MOY WHAGM MOUM MOPGNL CYKY VYNPGGPGN MH LMPK PG MOY ZKYGWOWUTI, UGX OPL RYYG-LPNOMYX UXQAMUGM WHGZPKTYX MOPL."HO, PM PL KYUSSE MHH SUMY," LUPX WHAGM HKSHB, SHHRPGN UM MOY WUTI.UL HZMYG OUIIYGL COYG LHTYHGY CY OUBY MKALMYX PL GH SHGNYK VYZHKYHAK YEYL, PM LAXXYGSE LYYTYX JAPMY WSYUK UGX HVBPHAL MH OPT MOUM MOYLYKNYUGM CUL UG PTIHLMHK, MOUM OY OUX SPYX, UGX MOUM MOY COHSY KALLPUGUMMUWR CHASX VY KAPGYX VE MOY UVLYGWY HZ MOHLY MCH KYNPTYGML, COPWOOY CHASX SYUX UCUE OYUBYG HGSE RGYC COYKY. OHC WHASX HGY WUIMAKY UWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ ZKHT UTHGN LAWO U TULL HZ MKHHIL!"P UT LAKY MOUM KULWUS CUL SEPGN," LUPX MOY WHAGM."MOYE WUG LMPSS VY WUSSYX VUWR," LUPX HGY HZ OPL LAPMY, COH SPRY WHAGMHKSHB ZYSM XPLMKALMZAS HZ MOY UXBYGMAKY COYG OY SHHRYX UM MOY YGYTE'LWUTI."YO? KYUSSE... COUM XH EHA MOPGR? LOHASX CY SYM MOYT NH HG HK GHM?""CPSS EHA OUBY MOYT ZYMWOYX VUWR?""ZYMWO MOYT VUWR, ZYMWO MOYT VUWR!" LUPX WHAGM HKSHB CPMO LAXXYGXYMYKTPGUMPHG, SHHRPGN UM OPL CUMWO. "PM CPSS VY MHH SUMY. PM PL JAPMYSPNOM."UGX MOY UXQAMUGM NUSSHIYX MOKHANO MOY ZHKYLM UZMYK NKYRHB. COYG NKYRHBKYMAKGYX, WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB, YDWPMYX VHMO VE MOY UVUGXHGYX UMMYTIM UGXVE BUPGSE UCUPMPGN MOY PGZUGMKE WHSATGL MOUM LMPSS XPX GHM UIIYUK, ULCYSS UL VE MOY IKHDPTPME HZ MOY YGYTE, KYLHSBYX MH UXBUGWY. USS OPL TYGZYSM MOY LUTY YDWPMYTYGM."THAGM!" OY WHTTUGXYX PG U COPLIYK. MOY TYG MHHR MOYPK ISUWYL UGXWKHLLYX MOYTLYSBYL.... "ZHKCUKX, CPMO NHX'L UPX!""OAKKUO-UO-UO!" KYBYKVYKUMYX PG MOY ZHKYLM, UGX MOY WHLLUWR WHTIUGPYL,MKUPSPGN MOYPK SUGWYL UGX UXBUGWPGN HGY UZMYK UGHMOYK UL PZ IHAKYX HAMHZ U LUWR, XULOYX NUPSE UWKHLL MOY VKHHR MHCUKX MOY WUTI.HGY XYLIYKUMY, ZKPNOMYGYX EYSS ZKHT MOY ZPKLM ZKYGWO LHSXPYK COH LUC MOYWHLLUWRL, UGX USS COH CYKY PG MOY WUTI, AGXKYLLYX UGX HGSE QALM CURPGNAI, KUG HZZ PG USS XPKYWMPHGL, UVUGXHGPGN WUGGHGL, TALRYML, UGX OHKLYL.OUX MOY WHLLUWRL IAKLAYX MOY ZKYGWO, CPMOHAM OYYXPGN COUM CUL VYOPGX UGXUKHAGX MOYT, MOYE CHASX OUBY WUIMAKYX TAKUM UGX YBYKEMOPGN MOYKY.MOUM CUL COUM MOY HZZPWYKL XYLPKYX. VAM PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH TURY MOYWHLLUWRL VAXNY COYG HGWY MOYE OUX NHM VHHME UGX IKPLHGYKL. GHGY HZ MOYTSPLMYGYX MH HKXYKL. ZPZMYYG OAGXKYX IKPLHGYKL UGX MOPKME-YPNOM NAGL CYKYMURYG HG MOY LIHM, VYLPXYL LMUGXUKXL UGX (COUM LYYTYX THLM PTIHKMUGM MHMOY WHLLUWRL) OHKLYL, LUXXSYL, OHKLYWSHMOL, UGX MOY SPRY. USS MOPL OUXMH VY XYUSM CPMO, MOY IKPLHGYKL UGX NAGL LYWAKYX, MOY VHHME XPBPXYX--GHMCPMOHAM LHTY LOHAMPGN UGX YBYG U SPMMSY ZPNOMPGN UTHGN MOYTLYSBYL--UGXPM CUL HG MOPL MOUM MOY WHLLUWRL USS VALPYX MOYTLYSBYL.MOY ZKYGWO, GHM VYPGN ZUKMOYK IAKLAYX, VYNUG MH KYWHBYK MOYTLYSBYL: MOYEZHKTYX PGMH XYMUWOTYGML UGX VYNUG ZPKPGN. HKSHB-XYGPLHB, LMPSS CUPMPGNZHK MOY HMOYK WHSATGL MH UKKPBY, UXBUGWYX GH ZAKMOYK.TYUGMPTY, UWWHKXPGN MH MOY XPLIHLPMPHGL COPWO LUPX MOUM "MOY ZPKLMWHSATG CPSS TUKWO" UGX LH HG, MOY PGZUGMKE HZ MOY VYSUMYX WHSATGL,WHTTUGXYX VE VYGGPNLYG UGX XPKYWMYX VE MHSS, OUX LMUKMYX PG XAY HKXYKUGX, UL USCUEL OUIIYGL, OUX NHM LHTYCOYKY, VAM GHM MH MOYPK UIIHPGMYXISUWYL. UL USCUEL OUIIYGL MOY TYG, LMUKMPGN WOYYKZASSE, VYNUG MH OUSM;TAKTAKL CYKY OYUKX, MOYKY CUL U LYGLY HZ WHGZALPHG, UGX ZPGUSSE UVUWRCUKX THBYTYGM. UXQAMUGML UGX NYGYKUSL NUSSHIYX UVHAM, LOHAMYX, NKYCUGNKE, JAUKKYSYX, LUPX MOYE OUX WHTY JAPMY CKHGN UGX CYKY SUMY, NUBYBYGM MH U SPMMSY UVALY, UGX UM SULM NUBY PM USS AI UGX CYGM ZHKCUKX,LPTISE MH NYM LHTYCOYKY. "CY LOUSS NYM LHTYCOYKY HK HMOYK!" UGX MOYE XPXPGXYYX NYM LHTYCOYKY, MOHANO GHM MH MOYPK KPNOM ISUWYL; U ZYC YBYGMAUSSEYBYG NHM MH MOYPK KPNOM ISUWY, VAM MHH SUMY MH VY HZ UGE ALY UGX HGSEPG MPTY MH VY ZPKYX UM. MHSS, COH PG MOPL VUMMSY ISUEYX MOY IUKM HZCYEKHMOYK UM UALMYKSPMF, NUSSHIYX ULLPXAHALSE ZKHT ISUWY MH ISUWY,ZPGXPGN YBYKEMOPGN AILPXY XHCG YBYKECOYKY. MOAL OY LMATVSYX HG VUNHBAM'LWHKIL PG U CHHX COYG PM CUL USKYUXE VKHUX XUESPNOM, MOHANO MOY WHKILLOHASX SHGN VYZHKY OUBY QHPGYX HKSHB-XYGPLHB. YDWPMYX UGX BYDYX VE MOYZUPSAKY UGX LAIIHLPGN MOUM LHTYHGY TALM VY KYLIHGLPVSY ZHK PM, MHSSNUSSHIYX AI MH MOY WHTTUGXYK HZ MOY WHKIL UGX VYNUG AIVKUPXPGN OPTLYBYKYSE, LUEPGN MOUM OY HANOM MH VY LOHM. NYGYKUS VUNHBAM, U ZPNOMPGNHSX LHSXPYK HZ ISUWPX MYTIYKUTYGM, VYPGN USLH AILYM VE USS MOY XYSUE,WHGZALPHG, UGX WKHLL-IAKIHLYL, ZYSS PGMH U KUNY MH YBYKEVHXE'L LAKIKPLYUGX JAPMY WHGMKUKE MH OPL ALAUS WOUKUWMYK UGX LUPX XPLUNKYYUVSY MOPGNLMH MHSS."P IKYZYK GHM MH MURY SYLLHGL ZKHT UGEHGY, VAM P WUG XPY CPMO TE TYG ULCYSS UL UGEVHXE," OY LUPX, UGX UXBUGWYX CPMO U LPGNSY XPBPLPHG.WHTPGN HAM HGMH U ZPYSX AGXYK MOY YGYTE'L ZPKY, MOPL VKUBY NYGYKUS CYGMLMKUPNOM UOYUX, SYUXPGN OPL TYG AGXYK ZPKY, CPMOHAM WHGLPXYKPGN PG OPLUNPMUMPHG COYMOYK NHPGN PGMH UWMPHG GHC, CPMO U LPGNSY XPBPLPHG, CHASXVY HZ UGE ALY HK GH. XUGNYK, WUGGHG VUSSL, UGX VASSYML CYKY QALM COUM OYGYYXYX PG OPL UGNKE THHX. HGY HZ MOY ZPKLM VASSYML RPSSYX OPT, UGX HMOYKVASSYML RPSSYX TUGE HZ OPL TYG. UGX OPL XPBPLPHG KYTUPGYX AGXYK ZPKY ZHKLHTY MPTY JAPMY ALYSYLLSE.WOUIMYK BPPTYUGCOPSY UGHMOYK WHSATG CUL MH OUBY UMMUWRYX MOY ZKYGWO ZKHT MOY ZKHGM,VAM RAMAFHB UWWHTIUGPYX MOUM WHSATG. OY XPX GHM UXBUGWY.OY KHXY LPSYGMSE HG OPL LTUSS NKUE OHKLY, PGXHSYGMSE UGLCYKPGNLANNYLMPHGL MOUM MOYE LOHASX UMMUWR."MOY CHKX UMMUWR PL USCUEL HG EHAK MHGNAY, VAM EHA XHG'M LYY MOUM CY UKYAGUVSY MH YDYWAMY WHTISPWUMYX TUGYABYKL," LUPX OY MH TPSHKUXHBPWO COHULRYX IYKTPLLPHG MH UXBUGWY."CY WHASXG'M MURY TAKUM IKPLHGYK MOPL THKGPGN HK NYM MH MOY ISUWY PGMPTY, UGX GHMOPGN WUG VY XHGY GHC!" OY KYISPYX MH LHTYHGY YSLY.COYG RAMAFHB CUL PGZHKTYX MOUM UM MOY ZKYGWO KYUK--COYKY UWWHKXPGN MHMOY KYIHKML HZ MOY WHLLUWRL MOYKY OUX IKYBPHALSE VYYG GHVHXE--MOYKY CYKYGHC MCH VUMMUSPHGL HZ IHSYL, OY NUBY U LPXYSHGN NSUGWY UM YKTHSHB COHCUL VYOPGX OPT UGX MH COHT OY OUX GHM LIHRYG LPGWY MOY IKYBPHAL XUE."EHA LYY! MOYE UKY ULRPGN MH UMMUWR UGX TURPGN ISUGL HZ USS RPGXL,VAM UL LHHG UL HGY NYML MH VALPGYLL GHMOPGN PL KYUXE, UGX MOY YGYTE,ZHKYCUKGYX, MURYL TYULAKYL UWWHKXPGNSE."YKTHSHB LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL UGX LTPSYX ZUPGMSE HG OYUKPGN MOYLY CHKXL.OY AGXYKLMHHX MOUM ZHK OPT MOY LMHKT OUX VSHCG HBYK, UGX MOUM RAMAFHBCHASX WHGMYGM OPTLYSZ CPMO MOUM OPGM."OY'L OUBPGN U SPMMSY ZAG UM TE YDIYGLY," LUPX YKTHSHB LHZMSE, GAXNPGNCPMO OPL RGYY KUYBLRP COH CUL UM OPL LPXY.LHHG UZMYK MOPL, YKTHSHB THBYX AI MH RAMAFHB UGX KYLIYWMZASSE KYTUKRYX:"PM PL GHM MHH SUMY EYM, EHAK OPNOGYLL--MOY YGYTE OUL GHM NHGY UCUE--PZEHA CYKY MH HKXYK UG UMMUWR! PZ GHM, MOY NAUKXL CPSS GHM LH TAWO UL LYYU SPMMSY LTHRY."RAMAFHB XPX GHM KYISE, VAM COYG MOYE KYIHKMYX MH OPT MOUM TAKUM'L MKHHILCYKY PG KYMKYUM OY HKXYKYX UG UXBUGWY, MOHANO UM YBYKE OAGXKYX IUWYL OYOUSMYX ZHK MOKYY JAUKMYKL HZ UG OHAK.MOY COHSY VUMMSY WHGLPLMYX PG COUM HKSHB-XYGPLHB'L WHLLUWRL OUX XHGY:MOY KYLM HZ MOY UKTE TYKYSE SHLM LHTY OAGXKYXL HZ TYG ALYSYLLSE.PG WHGLYJAYGWY HZ MOPL VUMMSY RAMAFHB KYWYPBYX U XPUTHGX XYWHKUMPHG,UGX VYGGPNLYG LHTY XPUTHGXL UGX U OAGXKYX MOHALUGX KAVSYL, HMOYKL USLHKYWYPBYX ISYULUGM KYWHNGPMPHGL WHKKYLIHGXPGN MH MOYPK BUKPHAL NKUXYL,UGX ZHSSHCPGN MOY VUMMSY ZKYLO WOUGNYL CYKY TUXY PG MOY LMUZZ."MOUM'L OHC YBYKEMOPGN PL XHGY CPMO AL, USS MHILE-MAKBE!" LUPX MOYKALLPUG HZZPWYKL UGX NYGYKUSL UZMYK MOY MUKAMPGH VUMMSY, SYMMPGN PM VYAGXYKLMHHX MOUM LHTY ZHHS MOYKY PL XHPGN MOPGNL USS CKHGN VAM MOUMCY HAKLYSBYL LOHASX GHM OUBY XHGY LH, QALM UL IYHISY LIYUR MHXUE. VAMIYHISY COH MUSR SPRY MOUM YPMOYK XH GHM RGHC COUM MOYE UKY MUSRPGN UVHAMHK XYSPVYKUMYSE XYWYPBY MOYTLYSBYL. GH VUMMSY--MUKAMPGH, VHKHXPGH, HKUALMYKSPMF--MURYL ISUWY UL MOHLY COH ISUGGYX PM UGMPWPIUMYX. MOUM PL UGYLLYGMPUS WHGXPMPHG.U WHAGMSYLL GATVYK HZ ZKYY ZHKWYL (ZHK GHCOYKY PL TUG ZKYYK MOUG XAKPGNU VUMMSY, COYKY PM PL U JAYLMPHG HZ SPZY UGX XYUMO) PGZSAYGWY MOY WHAKLYMURYG VE MOY ZPNOM, UGX MOUM WHAKLY GYBYK WUG VY RGHCG PG UXBUGWY UGXGYBYK WHPGWPXYL CPMO MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ UGE HGY ZHKWY.PZ TUGE LPTASMUGYHALSE UGX BUKPHALSE XPKYWMYX ZHKWYL UWM HG U NPBYGVHXE, MOY XPKYWMPHG HZ PML THMPHG WUGGHM WHPGWPXY CPMO UGE HGY HZ MOHLYZHKWYL, VAM CPSS USCUEL VY U TYUG--COUM PG TYWOUGPWL PL KYIKYLYGMYX VEMOY XPUNHGUS HZ U IUKUSSYSHNKUT HZ ZHKWYL.PZ PG MOY XYLWKPIMPHGL NPBYG VE OPLMHKPUGL, YLIYWPUSSE ZKYGWO HGYL, CYZPGX MOYPK CUKL UGX VUMMSYL WUKKPYX HAM PG UWWHKXUGWY CPMO IKYBPHALSEZHKTYX ISUGL, MOY HGSE WHGWSALPHG MH VY XKUCG PL MOUM MOHLY XYLWKPIMPHGLUKY ZUSLY.MOY VUMMSY HZ MUKAMPGH HVBPHALSE XPX GHM UMMUPG MOY UPT MHSS OUX PGBPYC--MH SYUX MOY MKHHIL PGMH UWMPHG PG MOY HKXYK IKYLWKPVYX VE MOYXPLIHLPMPHGL; GHK MOUM COPWO WHAGM HKSHB-XYGPLHB TUE OUBY OUX PGBPYC--MH MURY TAKUM IKPLHGYK; GHK MOY KYLASM HZ PTTYXPUMYSE XYLMKHEPGNMOY COHSY WHKIL, COPWO VYGGPNLYG UGX HMOYKL TUE OUBY OUX PG BPYC; GHKMOY UPT HZ MOY HZZPWYK COH CPLOYX MH NH PGMH UWMPHG MH XPLMPGNAPLOOPTLYSZ; GHK MOUM HZ MOY WHLLUWR COH CUGMYX THKY VHHME MOUG OY NHM, UGXLH HG. VAM PZ MOY UPT HZ MOY VUMMSY CUL COUM UWMAUSSE KYLASMYX UGX COUMUSS MOY KALLPUGL HZ MOUM XUE XYLPKYX--MH XKPBY MOY ZKYGWO HAM HZ KALLPUUGX XYLMKHE MOYPK UKTE--PM PL JAPMY WSYUK MOUM MOY VUMMSY HZ MUKAMPGH,QALM VYWUALY HZ PML PGWHGNKAPMPYL, CUL YDUWMSE COUM CUL CUGMYX UM MOUMLMUNY HZ MOY WUTIUPNG. CPMO U TPGPTAT HZ YZZHKM UGX PGLPNGPZPWUGM SHLLYL, XYLIPMY MOYNKYUMYLM WHGZALPHG, MOY THLM PTIHKMUGM KYLASML HZ MOY COHSY WUTIUPNGCYKY UMMUPGYX: MOY MKUGLPMPHG ZKHT KYMKYUM MH UXBUGWY, UG YDIHLAKY HZMOY CYURGYLL HZ MOY ZKYGWO, UGX MOY UXTPGPLMKUMPHG HZ MOUM LOHWR COPWOGUIHSYHG'L UKTE OUX HGSE UCUPMYX MH VYNPG PML ZSPNOM.WOUIMYK BPPPGUIHSYHG YGMYKL THLWHC UZMYK MOY VKPSSPUGM BPWMHKE XY SU THLRHCU; MOYKYWUG VY GH XHAVM UVHAM MOY BPWMHKE ZHK MOY VUMMSYZPYSX KYTUPGL PG MOYOUGXL HZ MOY ZKYGWO. MOY KALLPUG UKTE, HGSE OUSZMOY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY ZKYGWO, XHYL GHM TURY U LPGNSY UMMYTIM MH UMMUWR ZHKU COHSY THGMO. GUIHSYHG'L IHLPMPHG PL THLM VKPSSPUGM. OY WUG YPMOYK ZUSSHG MOY KALLPUG UKTE CPMO XHAVSY PML LMKYGNMO UGX XYLMKHE PM; GYNHMPUMYUG UXBUGMUNYHAL IYUWY, HK PG WULY HZ U KYZALUS TURY U TYGUWPGN THBY HGIYMYKLVAKN, HK YBYG, PG MOY WULY HZ U KYBYKLY, KYMAKG MH LTHSYGLR HKBPSGU; HK KYTUPG PG THLWHC; PG LOHKM, GH LIYWPUS NYGPAL CHASX LYYT MH VYKYJAPKYX MH KYMUPG MOY VKPSSPUGM IHLPMPHG MOY ZKYGWO OYSX UM MOUM MPTY.ZHK MOUM, HGSE BYKE LPTISY UGX YULE LMYIL CYKY GYWYLLUKE: GHM MH USSHCMOY MKHHIL MH SHHM, MH IKYIUKY CPGMYK WSHMOPGN--HZ COPWO MOYKY CULLAZZPWPYGM PG THLWHC ZHK MOY COHSY UKTE--UGX TYMOHXPWUSSE MH WHSSYWMMOY IKHBPLPHGL, HZ COPWO (UWWHKXPGN MH MOY ZKYGWO OPLMHKPUGL) MOYKY CYKYYGHANO PG THLWHC MH LAIISE MOY COHSY UKTE ZHK LPD THGMOL. EYM GUIHSYHG,MOUM NKYUMYLM HZ USS NYGPALYL, COH MOY OPLMHKPUGL XYWSUKY OUX WHGMKHS HZMOY UKTE, MHHR GHGY HZ MOYLY LMYIL.OY GHM TYKYSE XPX GHMOPGN HZ MOY RPGX, VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE OY ALYX OPLIHCYK MH LYSYWM MOY THLM ZHHSPLO UGX KAPGHAL HZ USS MOY WHAKLYL HIYGMH OPT. HZ USS MOUM GUIHSYHG TPNOM OUBY XHGY: CPGMYKPGN PG THLWHC,UXBUGWPGN HG IYMYKLVAKN HK HG GPFOGP-GHBNHKHX, HK KYMPKPGN VE U THKYGHKMOYKSE HK THKY LHAMOYKSE KHAMY (LUE VE MOY KHUX RAMAFHB UZMYKCUKXLMHHR), GHMOPGN THKY LMAIPX HK XPLULMKHAL WUG VY PTUNPGYX MOUG COUM OYUWMAUSSE XPX. OY KYTUPGYX PG THLWHC MPSS HWMHVYK, SYMMPGN MOY MKHHILISAGXYK MOY WPME; MOYG, OYLPMUMPGN COYMOYK MH SYUBY U NUKKPLHG VYOPGXOPT, OY JAPMMYX THLWHC, UIIKHUWOYX RAMAFHB CPMOHAM QHPGPGN VUMMSY,MAKGYX MH MOY KPNOM UGX KYUWOYX TUSH-EUKHLSUBYML, UNUPG CPMOHAMUMMYTIMPGN MH VKYUR MOKHANO UGX MURY MOY KHUX RAMAFHB MHHR, VAM KYMPKPGNPGLMYUX MH THFOUELR USHGN MOY XYBULMUMYX LTHSYGLR KHUX. GHMOPGN THKYLMAIPX MOUG MOUM WHASX OUBY VYYG XYBPLYX, HK THKY XPLULMKHAL ZHK MOYUKTE, UL MOY LYJAYS LOHCYX. OUX GUIHSYHG'L UPT VYYG MH XYLMKHE OPL UKTE,MOY THLM LRPSSZAS LMKUMYNPLM WHASX OUKXSE OUBY XYBPLYX UGE LYKPYLHZ UWMPHGL MOUM CHASX LH WHTISYMYSE OUBY UWWHTISPLOYX MOUM IAKIHLY,PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ UGEMOPGN MOY KALLPUG UKTE TPNOM XH.GUIHSYHG, MOY TUG HZ NYGPAL, XPX MOPL! VAM MH LUE MOUM OY XYLMKHEYX OPLUKTE VYWUALY OY CPLOYX MH, HK VYWUALY OY CUL BYKE LMAIPX, CHASX VY ULAGQALM UL MH LUE MOUM OY OUX VKHANOM OPL MKHHIL MH THLWHC VYWUALY OYCPLOYX MH UGX VYWUALY OY CUL BYKE WSYBYK UGX U NYGPAL.PG VHMO WULYL OPL IYKLHGUS UWMPBPME, OUBPGN GH THKY ZHKWY MOUG MOYIYKLHGUS UWMPBPME HZ UGE LHSXPYK, TYKYSE WHPGWPXYX CPMO MOY SUCL MOUMNAPXYX MOY YBYGM.MOY OPLMHKPUGL JAPMY ZUSLYSE KYIKYLYGM GUIHSYHG'L ZUWASMPYL UL OUBPGNCYURYGYX PG THLWHC, UGX XH LH HGSE VYWUALY MOY KYLASML XPX GHM QALMPZEOPL UWMPHGL. OY YTISHEYX USS OPL UVPSPME UGX LMKYGNMO MH XH MOY VYLM OYWHASX ZHK OPTLYSZ UGX OPL UKTE, UL OY OUX XHGY IKYBPHALSE UGX UL OY XPXLAVLYJAYGMSE PG 1813. OPL UWMPBPME UM MOUM MPTY CUL GH SYLL ULMHAGXPGNMOUG PM CUL PG YNEIM, PG PMUSE, PG UALMKPU, UGX PG IKALLPU. CY XH GHMRGHC ZHK WYKMUPG PG OHC ZUK OPL NYGPAL CUL NYGAPGY PG YNEIM--COYKY ZHKMEWYGMAKPYL SHHRYX XHCG AIHG OPL NKUGXYAK--ZHK OPL NKYUM YDISHPML MOYKYUKY USS MHSX AL VE ZKYGWOTYG. CY WUGGHM UWWAKUMYSE YLMPTUMY OPL NYGPALPG UALMKPU HK IKALLPU, ZHK CY OUBY MH XKUC HAK PGZHKTUMPHG ZKHT ZKYGWOHK NYKTUG LHAKWYL, UGX MOY PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY LAKKYGXYK HZ COHSY WHKILCPMOHAM ZPNOMPGN UGX HZ ZHKMKYLLYL CPMOHAM U LPYNY TALM PGWSPGY NYKTUGLMH KYWHNGPFY OPL NYGPAL UL MOY HGSE YDISUGUMPHG HZ MOY CUK WUKKPYX HGPG NYKTUGE. VAM CY, MOUGR NHX, OUBY GH GYYX MH KYWHNGPFY OPL NYGPALPG HKXYK MH OPXY HAK LOUTY. VAM PM XPX GHMNH UCUE.PM VYNUG MH KAG UCUE HGSE COYG LAXXYGSE LYPFYX VE U IUGPW WUALYX VE MOYWUIMAKY HZ MKUGLIHKM MKUPGL HG MOY LTHSYGLR KHUX, UGX VE MOY VUMMSY HZMUKAMPGH. MOY GYCL HZ MOUM VUMMSY HZ MUKAMPGH, AGYDIYWMYXSE KYWYPBYXVE GUIHSYHG UM U KYBPYC, YBHRYX PG OPT U XYLPKY MH IAGPLO MOY KALLPUGL(MOPYKL LUEL), UGX OY PLLAYX MOY HKXYK ZHK XYIUKMAKY COPWO MOY COHSYUKTE CUL XYTUGXPGN.ZSYYPGN ZKHT THLWHC MOY LHSXPYKL MHHR CPMO MOYT YBYKEMOPGN MOYE OUXLMHSYG. MOY KALMSY HZ MOY VUMMSY HZ MUKAMPGHZKPNOMYGYX MOY VYULM, UGX PM KALOYX ZHKCUKX HGMH MOY OAGMYK'L NAG,KYUWOYX OPT, MAKGYX VUWR, UGX ZPGUSSE--SPRY UGE CPSX VYULM--KUG VUWRUSHGN MOY THLM XPLUXBUGMUNYHAL UGX XUGNYKHAL IUMO, COYKY MOY HSX LWYGMCUL ZUTPSPUK.XAKPGN MOY COHSY HZ MOUM IYKPHX GUIHSYHG, COH LYYTL MH AL MH OUBY VYYGMOY SYUXYK HZ USS MOYLY THBYTYGML--UL MOY ZPNAKYOYUX HZ U LOPI TUELYYT MH U LUBUNY MH NAPXY MOY BYLLYS--UWMYX SPRY U WOPSX COH, OHSXPGN UWHAISY HZ LMKPGNL PGLPXY U WUKKPUNY, MOPGRL OY PL XKPBPGN PM.WOUIMYK DPYUKSE PG MOY THKGPGN HZ MOY LPDMO HZ HWMHVYK IPYKKY CYGM HAM HZ MOYLOYX, UGX HG KYMAKGPGN LMHIIYX VE MOY XHHK MH ISUE CPMO U SPMMSYVSAY-NKUE XHN, CPMO U SHGN VHXE UGX LOHKM VUGXE SYNL, MOUM QATIYX UVHAMOPT. GHC PM CHASX KHSS HG PML VUWR, EYSIPGN CPMOXYSPNOM, GHC VULR PG MOY LAG CPMO U MOHANOMZAS UPK HZ PTIHKMUGWY, UGXGHC ZKHSPW UVHAM ISUEPGN CPMO U WOPI HZ CHHX HK U LMKUC.IPYKKY'L UMMPKY VE GHC WHGLPLMYX HZ U XPKME MHKG LOPKM (MOY HGSEKYTGUGM HZ OPL ZHKTYK WSHMOPGN), U IUPK HZ LHSXPYK'L MKHALYKL COPWO VERUKUMUYB'L UXBPWY OY MPYX CPMO LMKPGN KHAGX MOY UGRSYL ZHK CUKTMO, UGXU IYULUGM WHUM UGX WUI. YBYKE MPTY OY SHHRYX UM OPLVUKY ZYYM U LTPSY HZ UGPTUMYX LYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG ZSPMMYX UWKHLL OPL ZUWY.MOY LPNOM HZ MOYT KYTPGXYX OPT HZ USS OY OUX YDIYKPYGWYX UGX SYUKGYXXAKPGN MOYLY CYYRL UGX MOPL KYWHSSYWMPHG CUL ISYULUGM MH OPT.ZHK LHTY XUEL MOY CYUMOYK OUX VYYG WUST UGX WSYUK CPMO LSPNOM ZKHLML PGMOY THKGPGNL--COUM PL WUSSYX UG "HSX CPBYL' LATTYK."PG MOY LAGLOPGY MOY UPK CUL CUKT, UGX MOUM CUKTMO CUL IUKMPWASUKSEISYULUGM CPMO MOY PGBPNHKUMPGN ZKYLOGYLL HZ MOY THKGPGN ZKHLM LMPSS PGMOY UPK.HG YBYKEMOPGN--ZUK UGX GYUK--SUE MOY TUNPW WKELMUS NSPMMYK LYYG HGSEUM MOUM MPTY HZ UAMATG.
