LIYUR MH MOY WUIMUPGCOYG OY TURYL OPL KHAGX, OY CPSS XH UGEMOPGN ZHK EHA."(MOY WUIMUPG HZ COHT MOY WHKIHKUS LIHRY HZMYG OUX SHGN WOUML CPMO IPYKKYUGX LOHCYX OPT USS LHKML HZ ZUBHKL.)"'EHA LYY, LM. MOHTUL,' OY LUPX MH TY MOY HMOYK XUE. 'THGLPYAK RPKPS PLU TUG HZ YXAWUMPHG, COH LIYURL ZKYGWO. OY PL U KALLPUG LYPNGYAK COH OULOUX TPLZHKMAGYL, VAM OY PL U TUG. OY RGHCL COUM'L COUM.... PZ OY CUGMLUGEMOPGN UGX ULRL TY, OY CHG'M NYM U KYZALUS. COYG HGY OUL LMAXPYX, EHALYY, HGY SPRYL YXAWUMPHG UGX CYSS-VKYX IYHISY.' PM PL ZHK EHAK LURY PTYGMPHG PM, THGLPYAK RPKPS. MOY HMOYK XUE PZ PM OUX GHM VYYG ZHK EHAMOUM UZZUPK CHASX OUBY YGXYX PSS."UGX UZMYK WOUMMPGN U COPSY SHGNYK, MOY WHKIHKUS CYGM UCUE. (MOY UZZUPKOY OUX USSAXYX MH OUX OUIIYGYX U ZYC XUEL VYZHKY--U ZPNOM VYMCYYG MOYIKPLHGYKL UGX MOY ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL, PG COPWO IPYKKY OUX LAWWYYXYX PGIUWPZEPGN OPL WHTKUXYL.) LHTY HZ MOY IKPLHGYKL COH OUX OYUKX IPYKKYMUSRPGN MH MOY WHKIHKUS PTTYXPUMYSE ULRYX COUM MOY ZKYGWOTUG OUX LUPX.COPSY IPYKKY CUL KYIYUMPGN COUM OY OUX VYYG MHSX UVHAM MOY UKTE SYUBPGNTHLWHC, U MOPG, LUSSHC, MUMMYKYX ZKYGWO LHSXPYK WUTY AI MH MOY XHHK HZMOY LOYX. KUIPXSE UGX MPTPXSE KUPLPGN OPL ZPGNYKL MH OPL ZHKYOYUX VE CUEHZ NKYYMPGN, OY ULRYX IPYKKY COYMOYK MOY LHSXPYK ISUMHWOY MH COHT OY OUXNPBYG U LOPKM MH LYC CUL PG MOUM LOYX.U CYYR VYZHKY MOY ZKYGWO OUX OUX VHHM SYUMOYK UGX SPGYG PLLAYX MH MOYT,COPWO MOYE OUX NPBYG HAM MH MOY IKPLHGYKL MH TURY AI PGMH VHHML UGXLOPKML ZHK MOYT."KYUXE, KYUXE, XYUK ZYSSHC!" LUPX RUKUMUYB, WHTPGN HAM CPMO U GYUMSEZHSXYX LOPKM.RUKUMUYB, HG UWWHAGM HZ MOY CUKT CYUMOYK UGX ZHK WHGBYGPYGWY UM CHKR,CUL CYUKPGN HGSE MKHALYKL UGX U MUMMYKYX LOPKM UL VSUWR UL LHHM. OPLOUPK CUL VHAGX KHAGX, CHKRTUG ZULOPHG, CPMO U CPLI HZ SPTY-MKYY VULM,UGX OPL KHAGX ZUWY LYYTYX KHAGXYK UGX ISYULUGMYK MOUG YBYK."U IKHTPLY PL HCG VKHMOYK MH IYKZHKTUGWY! P LUPX ZKPXUE UGX OYKY PM PL,KYUXE," LUPX ISUMHG, LTPSPGN UGX AGZHSXPGN MOY LOPKM OY OUX LYCG.MOY ZKYGWOTUG NSUGWYX UKHAGX AGYULPSE UGX MOYG, UL PZ HBYKWHTPGN OPLOYLPMUMPHG, KUIPXSE MOKYC HZZ OPL AGPZHKT UGX IAM HG MOY LOPKM. OY OUXU SHGN, NKYULE, ZSHCYKYX LPSR CUPLMWHUM GYDM MH OPL LUSSHC, MOPG VUKYVHXE, VAM GH LOPKM. OY CUL YBPXYGMSE UZKUPX MOY IKPLHGYKL SHHRPGN HGCHASX SUANO UM OPT, UGX MOKALM OPL OYUX PGMH MOY LOPKM OAKKPYXSE. GHGYHZ MOY IKPLHGYKL LUPX U CHKX."LYY, PM ZPML CYSS!" ISUMHG RYIM KYIYUMPGN, IASSPGN MOY LOPKM LMKUPNOM.MOY ZKYGWOTUG, OUBPGN IALOYX OPL OYUX UGX OUGXL MOKHANO, CPMOHAM KUPLPGNOPL YEYL, SHHRYX XHCG UM MOY LOPKM UGX YDUTPGYX MOY LYUTL."EHA LYY, XYUK TUG, MOPL PL GHM U LYCPGN LOHI, UGX P OUX GH IKHIYKMHHSL; UGX, UL MOYE LUE, HGY GYYXL U MHHS YBYG MH RPSS U SHALY," LUPXISUMHG CPMO HGY HZ OPL KHAGX LTPSYL, HVBPHALSE ISYULYX CPMO OPL CHKR."PM'L NHHX, JAPMY NHHX, MOUGR EHA," LUPX MOY ZKYGWOTUG, PG ZKYGWO, "VAMMOYKY TALM VY LHTY SPGYG SYZM HBYK."PM CPSS ZPM VYMMYK LMPSS COYG PM LYML MH EHAK VHXE," LUPX RUKUMUYB,LMPSS UXTPKPGN OPL OUGXPCHKR. "EHA'SS VY GPWY UGX WHTZHKMUVSY....""MOUGRL, MOUGRL, HSX ZYSSHC.... VAM MOY VPML SYZM HBYK?" LUPX MOYZKYGWOTUG UNUPG UGX LTPSYX. OY MHHR HAM UG ULLPNGUMPHG KAVSY GHMY UGXNUBY PM MH RUKUMUYB. "VAM NPBY TY MOY IPYWYL MOUM UKY HBYK."IPYKKY LUC MOUM ISUMHG XPX GHM CUGM MH AGXYKLMUGX COUM MOY ZKYGWOTUGCUL LUEPGN, UGX OY SHHRYX HG CPMOHAM PGMYKZYKPGN. RUKUMUYB MOUGRYX MOYZKYGWOTUG ZHK MOY THGYE UGX CYGM HG UXTPKPGN OPL HCG CHKR. MOY ZKYGWOTUGPGLPLMYX HG OUBPGN MOY IPYWYL KYMAKGYX MOUM CYKY SYZM HBYK UGX ULRYXIPYKKY MH MKUGLSUMY COUM OY LUPX."COUM XHYL OY CUGM MOY VPML ZHK?" LUPX RUKUMUYB. "MOYE'X TURY ZPGY SYNVUGXL ZHK AL. CYSS, GYBYK TPGX."UGX RUKUMUYB, CPMO U LAXXYGSE WOUGNYX UGX LUXXYGYX YDIKYLLPHG, MHHRU LTUSS VAGXSY HZ LWKUIL ZKHT PGLPXY OPL LOPKM UGX NUBY PM MH MOYZKYGWOTUG CPMOHAM SHHRPGN UM OPT. "HO XYUK!" TAMMYKYX RUKUMUYB UGX CYGMUCUE. MOY ZKYGWOTUG SHHRYX UM MOY SPGYG, WHGLPXYKYX ZHK U THTYGM, MOYGSHHRYX PGJAPKPGNSE UM IPYKKY UGX, UL PZ IPYKKY'L SHHR OUX MHSX OPTLHTYMOPGN, LAXXYGSE VSALOYX UGX LOHAMYX PG U LJAYURE BHPWY:"ISUMHWOY! YO, ISUMHWOY! RYYI MOYT EHAKLYSZ!" UGX OUGXPGN VUWR MOY HXXVPML OY MAKGYX UGX CYGM HAM."MOYKY, SHHR UM MOUM," LUPX RUKUMUYB, LCUEPGN OPL OYUX. "IYHISY LUPXMOYE CYKY GHM WOKPLMPUGL, VAM MOYE MHH OUBY LHASL. PM'L COUM MOY HSXZHSR ALYX MH LUE: 'U LCYUMPGN OUGX'L UG HIYG OUGX, U XKE OUGX'L WSHLY.'OY'L GURYX, VAM EYM OY'L NPBYG PM VUWR."RUKUMUYB LTPSYX MOHANOMZASSE UGX CUL LPSYGM UCOPSY SHHRPGN UM MOYIPYWYL."VAM MOYE'SS TURY NKUGX SYN VUGXL, XYUK ZKPYGX," OY LUPX, UGX CYGM VUWRPGMH MOY LOYX.WOUIMYK DPPZHAK CYYRL OUX IULLYX LPGWY IPYKKY OUX VYYG MURYG IKPLHGYK UGX MOHANOMOY ZKYGWO OUX HZZYKYX MH THBY OPT ZKHT MOY TYG'L MH MOY HZZPWYKL' LOYX,OY OUX LMUEYX PG MOY LOYX COYKY OY CUL ZPKLM IAM.PG VAKGYX UGX XYBULMUMYX THLWHC IPYKKY YDIYKPYGWYX USTHLM MOY YDMKYTYSPTPML HZ IKPBUMPHG U TUG WUG YGXAKY; VAM MOUGRL MH OPL IOELPWUSLMKYGNMO UGX OYUSMO, HZ COPWO OY OUX MPSS MOYG VYYG AGWHGLWPHAL, UGXMOUGRL YLIYWPUSSE MH MOY ZUWM MOUM MOY IKPBUMPHGL WUTY LH NKUXAUSSE MOUMPM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH LUE COYG MOYE VYNUG, OY YGXAKYX OPL IHLPMPHGGHM HGSE SPNOMSE VAM QHEZASSE. UGX QALM UM MOPL MPTY OY HVMUPGYX MOYMKUGJAPSSPME UGX YULY HZ TPGX OY OUX ZHKTYKSE LMKPBYG PG BUPG MH KYUWO.OY OUX SHGN LHANOM PG XPZZYKYGM CUEL MOUM MKUGJAPSSPME HZ TPGX, MOUMPGGYK OUKTHGE COPWO OUX LH PTIKYLLYX OPT PG MOY LHSXPYKL UM MOY VUMMSYHZ VHKHXPGH. OY OUX LHANOM PM PG IOPSUGMOKHIE, PG ZKYYTULHGKE, PG MOYXPLLPIUMPHGL HZ MHCG SPZY, PG CPGY, PG OYKHPW ZYUML HZ LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY,UGX PG KHTUGMPW SHBY ZHK GUMULOU; OY OUX LHANOM PM VE KYULHGPGN--UGX USSMOYLY JAYLML UGX YDIYKPTYGML OUX ZUPSYX OPT. UGX GHC CPMOHAM MOPGRPGNUVHAM PM OY OUX ZHAGX MOUM IYUWY UGX PGGYK OUKTHGE HGSE MOKHANO MOYOHKKHK HZ XYUMO, MOKHANO IKPBUMPHG, UGX MOKHANO COUM OY KYWHNGPFYX PGRUKUMUYB.MOHLY XKYUXZAS THTYGML OY OUX SPBYX MOKHANO UM MOY YDYWAMPHGL OUX UL PMCYKY ZHKYBYK CULOYX UCUE ZKHT OPL PTUNPGUMPHG UGX TYTHKE MOY UNPMUMPGNMOHANOML UGX ZYYSPGNL MOUM OUX ZHKTYKSE LYYTYX LH PTIHKMUGM. PM XPXGHM GHC HWWAK MH OPT MH MOPGR HZ KALLPU, HK MOY CUK, HK IHSPMPWL, HKGUIHSYHG. PM CUL ISUPG MH OPT MOUM USS MOYLY MOPGNL CYKY GH VALPGYLLHZ OPL, UGX MOUM OY CUL GHM WUSSYX HG MH QAXNY WHGWYKGPGN MOYT UGXMOYKYZHKY WHASX GHM XH LH. "KALLPU UGX LATTYK CYUMOYK UKY GHM VHAGXMHNYMOYK," OY MOHANOM, KYIYUMPGN CHKXL HZ RUKUMUYB'L COPWO OY ZHAGXLMKUGNYSE WHGLHSPGN. OPL PGMYGMPHG HZ RPSSPGN GUIHSYHG UGX OPLWUSWASUMPHGL HZ MOY WUVUSPLMPW GATVYK HZ MOY VYULM HZ MOY UIHWUSEILY GHCLYYTYX MH OPT TYUGPGNSYLL UGX YBYG KPXPWASHAL. COUM WHGWYKG CUL PM HZ OPL MOUM LHTYCOYKY HKHMOYK MOUM CHTUG CUL SYUXPGN MOY SPZY LOY IKYZYKKYX? COUM XPX PM TUMMYKMH UGEVHXE, UGX YLIYWPUSSE MH OPT, COYMOYK HK GHM MOYE ZHAGX HAM MOUMMOYPK IKPLHGYK'L GUTY CUL WHAGM VYFAROHB?OY GHC HZMYG KYTYTVYKYX OPL WHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO IKPGWY UGXKYC UGX JAPMYUNKYYX CPMO OPT, MOHANO OY AGXYKLMHHX IKPGWY UGXKYC'L MOHANOML LHTYCOUMXPZZYKYGMSE. IKPGWY UGXKYC OUX MOHANOM UGX LUPX MOUM OUIIPGYLL WHASXHGSE VY GYNUMPBY, VAM OUX LUPX PM CPMO U LOUXY HZ VPMMYKGYLL UGX PKHGEUL MOHANO OY CUL KYUSSE LUEPGN MOUM USS XYLPKY ZHK IHLPMPBY OUIIPGYLL PLPTISUGMYX PG AL TYKYSE MH MHKTYGM AL UGX GYBYK VY LUMPLZPYX. VAM IPYKKYVYSPYBYX PM CPMOHAM UGE TYGMUS KYLYKBUMPHG. MOY UVLYGWY HZ LAZZYKPGN,MOY LUMPLZUWMPHG HZ HGY'L GYYXL UGX WHGLYJAYGM ZKYYXHT PG MOY WOHPWY HZHGY'L HWWAIUMPHG, MOUM PL, HZ HGY'L CUE HZ SPZY, GHC LYYTYX MH IPYKKY MHVY PGXAVPMUVSE TUG'L OPNOYLM OUIIPGYLL. UGX IPYKKY ZYSM MOUM MOYPK HIPGPHGISUWYX KYLIHGLPVPSPMPYL AIHG OPT.WOUIMYK DPPPMOY ZKYGWO YBUWAUMPHG VYNUG HG MOY GPNOM VYMCYYG MOY LPDMO UGX LYBYGMOHZ HWMHVYK: RPMWOYGL UGX LOYXL CYKY XPLTUGMSYX, WUKML SHUXYX, UGX MKHHILUGX VUNNUNY MKUPGL LMUKMYX.UM LYBYG PG MOY THKGPGN U ZKYGWO WHGBHE PG TUKWOPGN MKPT, CYUKPGN LOURHLUGX WUKKEPGN TALRYML, RGUILUWRL, UGX YGHKTHAL LUWRL, LMHHX PG ZKHGMHZ MOY LOYXL, UGX UGPTUMYX ZKYGWO MUSR TPGNSYX CPMO WAKLYL LHAGXYX USSUSHGN MOY SPGYL.PG MOY LOYX YBYKEHGY CUL KYUXE, XKYLLYX, VYSMYX, LOHX, UGX HGSE UCUPMYXMOY HKXYK MH LMUKM. PG MOKYY WUKKPUNYL PGBHSBYX UTHGN MOY TAGPMPHG WUKML, WSHLYSELJAYYFYX MHNYMOYK, LUM CHTYG CPMO KHANYX ZUWYL, XKYLLYX PG NSUKPGNWHSHKL, COH CYKY LOHAMPGN LHTYMOPGN PG LOKPSS BHPWYL.ZKHT MOY THTYGM IPYKKY OUX KYWHNGPFYX MOY UIIYUKUGWY HZ MOY TELMYKPHALZHKWY GHMOPGN OUX LYYTYX MH OPT LMKUGNY HK XKYUXZAS: GYPMOYK MOY WHKILYLTYUKYX CPMO LHHM ZHK ZAG GHK MOYLY CHTYG OAKKEPGN UCUE GHK MOY VAKGYXKAPGL HZ THLWHC. OY LTPSYX, UGX CYGM UGX SUE XHCG MHLSYYI VYLPXY OPL WHTIUGPHGL.WOUIMYK DBPG MOY YUKSE XUEL HZ HWMHVYK UGHMOYK YGBHE WUTY MH RAMAFHB CPMO U SYMMYKZKHT GUIHSYHG IKHIHLPGN IYUWY UGX ZUSLYSE XUMYX ZKHT THLWHC, MOHANOGUIHSYHG CUL USKYUXE GHM ZUK ZKHT RAMAFHB HG MOY HSX RUSANU KHUX.RAMAFHB KYISPYX MH MOPL SYMMYK UL OY OUX XHGY MH MOY HGY ZHKTYKSEVKHANOM VE SUAKPLMHG, LUEPGN MOUM MOYKY WHASX VY GH JAYLMPHG HZ IYUWY.LHHG UZMYK MOUM U KYIHKM CUL KYWYPBYX ZKHT XHKHROHB'L NAYKKPSSUXYMUWOTYGM HIYKUMPGN MH MOY SYZM HZ MUKAMPGH MOUM MKHHIL HZ VKHALLPYK'LXPBPLPHG OUX VYYG LYYG UM ZHKTPGLR UGX MOUM VYPGN LYIUKUMYX ZKHT MOYKYLM HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE MOYE TPNOM YULPSE VY XYLMKHEYX. RAMAFHB XPX GHM WHGLPXYK UGE HZZYGLPBY GYWYLLUKE.MOY KYLASM CUL U WHTIKHTPLY COPWO CUL PGYBPMUVSY: U LTUSS XYMUWOTYGM CULLYGM MH ZHKTPGLR MH UMMUWR VKHALLPYK.VE U LMKUGNY WHPGWPXYGWY, MOPL MULR, COPWO MAKGYX HAM MH VY U THLMXPZZPWASM UGX PTIHKMUGM HGY, CUL YGMKALMYX MH XHROMAKHB--MOUM LUTYTHXYLM SPMMSY XHROMAKHB COHT GH HGY OUX XYLWKPVYX MH AL UL XKUCPGN AIISUGL HZ VUMMSYL, XULOPGN UVHAM PG ZKHGM HZ KYNPTYGML, LOHCYKPGN WKHLLYLHG VUMMYKPYL, UGX LH HG, UGX COH CUL MOHANOM MH VY UGX CUL LIHRYG HZUL AGXYWPXYX UGX AGXPLWYKGPGN--VAM COHT CY ZPGX WHTTUGXPGN COYKYBYKMOY IHLPMPHG CUL THLM XPZZPWASM USS MOKHANO MOY KALLH-ZKYGWO CUKL ZKHTUALMYKSPMF MH MOY EYUK 1813. OHCWHASX MOUM UKTE--COPWO OUX ZHAGX UVAGXUGM LAIISPYL PG THLWHC UGX OUXMKUTISYX MOYT AGXYKZHHM PGLMYUX HZ RYYIPGN MOYT, UGX HG UKKPBPGN UMLTHSYGLR OUX SHHMYX IKHBPLPHGL PGLMYUX HZ LMHKPGN MOYT--OHC WHASX MOUMUKTE KYWAIYKUMY PG RUSANU IKHBPGWY, COPWO CUL PGOUVPMYX VE KALLPUGL LAWOUL MOHLY COH SPBYX PG THLWHC, UGX COYKY ZPKY OUX MOY LUTY IKHIYKME HZWHGLATPGN COUM CUL LYM UVSUFY?MOUM UKTE WHASX GHM KYWHBYK UGECOYKY. LPGWY MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGHUGX MOY IPSSUNY HZ THLWHC PM OUX VHKGY CPMOPG PMLYSZ, UL PM CYKY, MOYWOYTPWUS YSYTYGML HZ XPLLHSAMPHG.MOY TYTVYKL HZ COUM OUX HGWY VYYG UG UKTE--GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ UGX USS OPLLHSXPYKL ZSYX--CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COPMOYK, YUWO WHGWYKGYX HGSE MH TURY OPLYLWUIY UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY ZKHT MOPL IHLPMPHG, HZ MOY OHIYSYLLGYLL HZCOPWO MOYE CYKY USS THKY HK SYLL BUNAYSE WHGLWPHAL.LH PM WUTY UVHAM MOUM UM MOY WHAGWPS UM TUSH-EUKHLSUBYML, COYG MOYNYGYKUSL IKYMYGXPGN MH WHGZYK MHNYMOYK YDIKYLLYX BUKPHAL HIPGPHGL, USSTHAMOL CYKY WSHLYX VE MOY HIPGPHG AMMYKYX VE MOY LPTISY-TPGXYX LHSXPYKTHAMHG COH, LIYURPGN SULM, LUPX COUM MOYE USS ZYSM: MOUM MOY HGY MOPGNGYYXZAS CUL MH NYM UCUE UL JAPWRSE UL IHLLPVSY; UGX GH HGY, GHMYBYG GUIHSYHG, WHASX LUE UGEMOPGN UNUPGLM MOUM MKAMO COPWO MOYE USSKYWHNGPFYX.VAM MOHANO MOYE USS KYUSPFYX MOUM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH NYM UCUE, MOYKYLMPSS KYTUPGYX U ZYYSPGN HZ LOUTY UM UXTPMMPGN MOUM MOYE TALM ZSYY. XPLKYNUKXPGN GUIHSYHG MOYE KALOYX UZMYK MOY ISAGXYK UGX GUIHSYHGTUGUNYX MH YLWUIY.COYG SYL YGZUGML XA XHG TPNOM LH YULPSE OUBY MURYG MOY YTIYKHK OPTLYSZPG MOY TPXLM HZ OPL UKTE, PM CUL WSYUK MOUM MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN ZHK PM VAMMH ZSE UL ZULM UL IHLLPVSY USHGN MOY GYUKYLM, ZUTPSPUK KHUX. GUIHSYHGCPMO OPL ZHKME-EYUK-HSX LMHTUWO AGXYKLMHHX MOUM OPGM, GHM ZYYSPGN OPLZHKTYK UNPSPME UGX VHSXGYLL, UGX AGXYK MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ MOY ZKPNOMMOY WHLLUWRL OUX NPBYG OPT OY UM HGWY UNKYYX CPMO THAMHG UGX PLLAYXHKXYKL--UL MOY OPLMHKPUGL MYSS AL--MH KYMKYUM VE MOY LTHSYGLR KHUX.MOUM GUIHSYHG UNKYYX CPMO THAMHG, UGX MOUM MOY UKTE KYMKYUMYX, XHYLGHM IKHBY MOUM GUIHSYHG WUALYX PM MH KYMKYUM, VAM MOUM MOY ZHKWYL COPWOPGZSAYGWYX MOY COHSY UKTE UGX XPKYWMYX PM USHGN MOY THFOUELR (MOUM PL,MOY LTHSYGLR) KHUX UWMYX LPTASMUGYHALSE HG OPT USLH.WOUIMYK DPDU TUG PG THMPHG USCUEL XYBPLYL UG UPT ZHK MOUM THMPHG. MH VY UVSY MH NHU MOHALUGX TPSYL OY TALM PTUNPGY MOUM LHTYMOPGN NHHX UCUPML OPT UM MOYYGX HZ MOHLY MOHALUGX TPSYL. HGY TALM OUBY MOY IKHLIYWM HZ U IKHTPLYXSUGX MH OUBY MOY LMKYGNMO MH THBY.MOY IKHTPLYX SUGX ZHK MOY ZKYGWO XAKPGN MOYPK UXBUGWY OUX VYYG THLWHC,XAKPGN MOYPK KYMKYUM PM CUL MOYPK GUMPBY SUGX. VAM MOUM GUMPBY SUGXCUL MHH ZUK HZZ, UGX ZHK U TUG NHPGN U MOHALUGX TPSYL PM PL UVLHSAMYSEGYWYLLUKE MH LYM ULPXY OPL ZPGUS NHUS UGX MH LUE MH OPTLYSZ: "MHXUE PLOUSS NYM MH U ISUWY MCYGME-ZPBY TPSYL HZZ COYKY P LOUSS KYLM UGXLIYGX MOY GPNOM," UGX XAKPGN MOY ZPKLM XUE'L QHAKGYE MOUM KYLMPGN ISUWYYWSPILYL OPL ASMPTUMY NHUS UGX UMMKUWML USS OPL OHIYL UGX XYLPKYL. UGXMOY PTIASLYL ZYSM VE U LPGNSY IYKLHG UKY USCUEL TUNGPZPYX PG U WKHCX.ZHK MOY ZKYGWO KYMKYUMPGN USHGN MOY HSX LTHSYGLR KHUX, MOY ZPGUSNHUS--MOYPK GUMPBY SUGX--CUL MHH KYTHMY, UGX MOYPK PTTYXPUMY NHUSCUL LTHSYGLR, MHCUKX COPWO USS MOYPK XYLPKYL UGX OHIYL, YGHKTHALSEPGMYGLPZPYX PG MOY TULL, AKNYX MOYT HG. PM CUL GHM MOUM MOYE RGYC MOUMTAWO ZHHX UGX ZKYLO MKHHIL UCUPMYX MOYT PG LTHSYGLR, GHK MOUM MOYE CYKYMHSX LH (HG MOY WHGMKUKE MOYPK LAIYKPHK HZZPWYKL, UGX GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ,RGYC MOUM IKHBPLPHGL CYKY LWUKWY MOYKY), VAM VYWUALY MOPL USHGY WHASXNPBY MOYT LMKYGNMO MH THBY HG UGX YGXAKY MOYPK IKYLYGM IKPBUMPHGL. LHVHMO MOHLY COH RGYC UGX MOHLY COH XPX GHM RGHC XYWYPBYX MOYTLYSBYL, UGXIALOYX HG MH LTHSYGLR UL MH U IKHTPLYX SUGX.WHTPGN HAM HGMH MOY OPNOKHUX MOY ZKYGWO ZSYX CPMO LAKIKPLPGN YGYKNEUGX AGOYUKX-HZ KUIPXPME MHCUKX MOY NHUS MOYE OUX ZPDYX HG. VYLPXYL MOYWHTTHG PTIASLY COPWO VHAGX MOY COHSY WKHCX HZ ZKYGWO PGMH HGY TULL UGXLAIISPYX MOYT CPMO U WYKMUPG YGYKNE, MOYKY CUL UGHMOYK WUALY VPGXPGNMOYT MHNYMOYK--MOYPK NKYUM GATVYKL. PGZUGMKE KYNPTYGML, CY UKY MHSX, UXBUGWYX MH MOYUMMUWR CPMO TALPW UGX CPMO XKATL VYUMPGN, UGX RPSSYX UGX SHLM MOHALUGXLHZ TYG.VAM MOYE XPX GHM WAM HZZ HK HBYKMOKHC UGEVHXE UGX MOY ZKYGWO UKTE,WSHLPGN AI THKY ZPKTSE UM MOY XUGNYK, WHGMPGAYX, COPSY LMYUXPSE TYSMPGNUCUE, MH IAKLAY PML ZUMUS IUMO MH LTHSYGLR.VHHR ZHAKMYYG: 1812WOUIMYK PMOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, CPMO MOY HWWAIUMPHG HZ THLWHC MOUM ZHSSHCYX PMUGX MOY ZSPNOM HZ MOY ZKYGWO CPMOHAM ZAKMOYK WHGZSPWML, PL HGY HZ MOYTHLM PGLMKAWMPBY IOYGHTYGU PG OPLMHKE.USS OPLMHKPUGL UNKYY MOUM MOY YDMYKGUS UWMPBPME HZ LMUMYL UGX GUMPHGLPG MOYPK WHGZSPWML CPMO HGY UGHMOYK PL YDIKYLLYX PG CUKL, UGX MOUM UL UXPKYWM KYLASM HZ NKYUMYK HK SYLL LAWWYLL PG CUK MOY IHSPMPWUS LMKYGNMOHZ LMUMYL UGX GUMPHGL PGWKYULYL HK XYWKYULYL.LMKUGNY UL TUE VY MOY OPLMHKPWUS UWWHAGM HZ OHC LHTY RPGN HK YTIYKHK,OUBPGN JAUKKYSYX CPMO UGHMOYK, WHSSYWML UG UKTE, ZPNOML OPL YGYTE'LUKTE, NUPGL U BPWMHKE VE RPSSPGN MOKYY, ZPBY, HK MYG MOHALUGX TYG, UGXLAVQANUMYL U RPGNXHT UGX UG YGMPKY GUMPHG HZ LYBYKUS TPSSPHGL, USSMOY ZUWML HZ OPLMHKE (UL ZUK UL CY RGHC PM) WHGZPKT MOY MKAMO HZ MOYLMUMYTYGM MOUM MOY NKYUMYK HK SYLLYK LAWWYLL HZ HGY UKTE UNUPGLM UGHMOYKPL MOY WUALY, HK UM SYULM UG YLLYGMPUS PGXPWUMPHG, HZ UG PGWKYULY HKXYWKYULY PG MOY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY GUMPHG--YBYG MOHANO PM PL AGPGMYSSPNPVSYCOE MOY XYZYUM HZ UG UKTE--U OAGXKYXMO IUKM HZ U GUMPHG--LOHASX HVSPNYMOUM COHSY GUMPHG MH LAVTPM. UG UKTE NUPGL U BPWMHKE, UGX UM HGWY MOYKPNOML HZ MOY WHGJAYKPGN GUMPHG OUBY PGWKYULYX MH MOY XYMKPTYGM HZ MOYXYZYUMYX. VAM MOPL KASY COPWO SYUBYL HAM HZUWWHAGM MOY LIPKPM HZ MOY UKTE WHGMPGAUSSE IKHBYL PGWHKKYWM UGX PL PGIUKMPWASUKSE LMKPRPGN WHGMKULM MH MOY ZUWML COYG LHTY LMKHGN KPLY HKZUSS PG MOY LIPKPM HZ MOY MKHHIL HWWAKL, UL PG USS GUMPHGUS CUKL.MOY ZKYGWO, KYMKYUMPGN PG 1812--MOHANO UWWHKXPGN MH MUWMPWL MOYE LOHASXOUBY LYIUKUMYX PGMH XYMUWOTYGML MH XYZYGX MOYTLYSBYL--WHGNKYNUMYX PGMHU TULL VYWUALY MOY LIPKPM HZ MOY UKTE OUX LH ZUSSYG MOUM HGSE MOY TULLOYSX MOY UKTE MHNYMOYK. XYGPL XUBEXHB,CPMO OPL KALLPUG PGLMPGWM, CUL MOY ZPKLM MH KYWHNGPFY MOY BUSAY HZMOPL MYKKPVSY WAXNYS COPWO KYNUKXSYLL HZ MOY KASYL HZ TPSPMUKE LWPYGWYXYLMKHEYX MOY ZKYGWO, UGX MH OPT VYSHGNL MOY WKYXPM ZHK MURPGN MOY ZPKLMLMYI MHCUKX KYNASUKPFPGN MOPL TYMOHX HZ CUKZUKY.HG UANALM 24 XUBEXHB'L ZPKLM IUKMPLUG XYMUWOTYGM CUL ZHKTYX UGX MOYGHMOYKL CYKY KYWHNGPFYX. MOY ZAKMOYK MOY WUTIUPNG IKHNKYLLYX MOY THKYGATYKHAL MOYLY XYMUWOTYGML VYWUTY.MOY PKKYNASUKL XYLMKHEYX MOY NKYUM UKTE IPYWYTYUS. MOYE NUMOYKYX MOYZUSSYG SYUBYL MOUM XKHIIYX HZ MOYTLYSBYL ZKHT MOUM CPMOYKYX MKYY--MOYZKYGWO UKTE--UGX LHTYMPTYL LOHHR MOUM MKYY PMLYSZ. VE HWMHVYK, COYGMOY ZKYGWO CYKY ZSYYPGN MHCUKX LTHSYGLR, MOYKY CYKY OAGXKYXL HZ LAWOWHTIUGPYL, HZ BUKPHAL LPFYL UGX WOUKUWMYKL. MOYKY CYKY LHTY MOUM UXHIMYXUSS MOY UKTE TYMOHXL UGX OUX PGZUGMKE, UKMPSSYKE, LMUZZL, UGX MOYWHTZHKML HZ SPZY. HMOYKL WHGLPLMYX LHSYSE HZ WHLLUWR WUBUSKE. MOYKY CYKYUSLH LTUSS LWKUMWO NKHAIL HZ ZHHM UGX OHKLY, UGX NKHAIL HZ IYULUGML UGXSUGXHCGYKL MOUM KYTUPGYX AGRGHCG. U LUWKPLMUG WHTTUGXYX HGY IUKME COPWOWUIMAKYX LYBYKUS OAGXKYX IKPLHGYKL PG MOY WHAKLY HZ U THGMO; UGX MOYKYCUL BULPSPLU, MOY CPZY HZ U BPSSUNY YSXYK, COH LSYC OAGXKYXL HZ MOYZKYGWO.MOY IUKMPLUG CUKZUKY ZSUTYX AI THLM ZPYKWYSE PG MOY SUMMYK XUEL HZHWMHVYK. PML ZPKLM IYKPHX OUX IULLYX: COYG MOY IUKMPLUGL MOYTLYSBYL,UTUFYX UM MOYPK HCG VHSXGYLL, ZYUKYX YBYKE TPGAMY MH VY LAKKHAGXYXUGX WUIMAKYX VE MOY ZKYGWO, UGX OPX PG MOY ZHKYLML CPMOHAM AGLUXXSPGN,OUKXSE XUKPGN MH XPLTHAGM UGX USCUEL YDIYWMPGN MH VY IAKLAYX. VE MOY YGXHZ HWMHVYK MOPL RPGX HZ CUKZUKY OUX MURYG XYZPGPMY LOUIY: PM OUX VYWHTYWSYUK MH USS COUM WHASX VY BYGMAKYX UNUPGLM MOY ZKYGWO UGX COUM WHASXGHM. MOY LTUSS VUGXL MOUM OUX LMUKMYX MOYPK UWMPBPMPYLSHGN VYZHKY UGX OUX USKYUXE HVLYKBYX MOY ZKYGWO WSHLYSE WHGLPXYKYXMOPGNL IHLLPVSY COPWO MOY WHTTUGXYKL HZ MOY VPN XYMUWOTYGML XPX GHM XUKYMH WHGMYTISUMY. MOY WHLLUWRL UGX IYULUGML COH WKYIM PG UTHGN MOY ZKYGWOGHC WHGLPXYKYX YBYKEMOPGN IHLLPVSY.HG HWMHVYK 22, XYGPLHB (COH CUL HGY HZ MOY PKKYNASUKL) CUL CPMO OPLNKHAI UM MOY OYPNOM HZ MOY NAYKKPSSU YGMOALPULT. LPGWY YUKSE THKGPGN OYUGX OPL IUKME OUX VYYG HG MOY THBY. USS XUE SHGN OY OUX VYYG CUMWOPGNZKHT MOY ZHKYLM MOUM LRPKMYX MOY OPNOKHUX U SUKNY ZKYGWO WHGBHE HZWUBUSKE VUNNUNY UGX KALLPUG IKPLHGYKL LYIUKUMYX ZKHT MOY KYLM HZ MOYUKTE, COPWO--UL CUL SYUKGYX ZKHT LIPYL UGX IKPLHGYKL--CUL THBPGN AGXYK ULMKHGN YLWHKM MH LTHSYGLR. VYLPXYL XYGPLHB UGX XHSHROHB (COH USLH SYXU LTUSS IUKME UGX THBYX PG XYGPLHB'L BPWPGPME), MOY WHTTUGXYKL HZ LHTYSUKNY XPBPLPHGL CPMO LMUZZL USLH RGYC HZ MOPL WHGBHE UGX, UL XYGPLHBYDIKYLLYX PM, CYKY LOUKIYGPGN MOYPK MYYMO ZHK PM. MCH HZ MOY WHTTUGXYKLHZ SUKNY IUKMPYL--HGY U IHSY UGX MOY HMOYK U NYKTUG--LYGM PGBPMUMPHGLMH XYGPLHB USTHLM LPTASMUGYHALSE, KYJAYLMPGN OPT MH QHPG AI CPMO MOYPKXPBPLPHGL MH UMMUWR MOY WHGBHE."GH, VCHMOYK, P OUBY NCHCG TALMUWOYL TELYSZ," LUPX XYGPLHB HG KYUXPGNMOYLY XHWATYGML, UGX OY CKHMY MH MOY NYKTUG MOUM, XYLIPMY OPL OYUKMZYSMXYLPKY MH LYKBY AGXYK LH BUSPUGM UGX KYGHCGYX U NYGYKUS, OY OUX MH ZHKNHMOUM ISYULAKY VYWUALY OY CUL USKYUXE AGXYK MOY WHTTUGX HZ MOY IHSPLONYGYKUS. HG HWMHVYK 22 PM CUL THBPGN ZKHTMOY BPSSUNY HZ TPRASPGH MH MOUM HZ LOUTLOYBH. MH MOY SYZM HZ MOY KHUXVYMCYYG TPRASPGH UGX LOUTLOYBH MOYKY CYKY SUKNY ZHKYLML, YDMYGXPGN PGLHTY ISUWYL AI MH MOY KHUX PMLYSZ MOHANO PG HMOYKL U TPSY HK THKY VUWRZKHT PM. MOKHANO MOYLY ZHKYLML XYGPLHB UGX OPL IUKME KHXY USS XUE,LHTYMPTYL RYYIPGN CYSS VUWR PG MOYT UGX LHTYMPTYL WHTPGN MH MOY BYKEYXNY, VAM GYBYK SHLPGN LPNOM HZ MOY THBPGN ZKYGWO. MOYE KYWRHGYXMOUM MOY WHGBHE OUX ZPZMYYG OAGXKYX TYG. XYGPLHB OUX MCH OAGXKYX, UGXXHSHROHB TPNOM OUBY UL TUGE THKY, VAM MOY XPLIUKPME HZ GATVYKL XPX GHMXYMYK XYGPLHB. MOUM THKGPGN'L UMMUWR HG MOY CUNHGL OUX VYYG TUXY LHOULMPSE MOUM MOY ZKYGWOTYG CPMO MOY CUNHGL OUX USS VYYG RPSSYX; HGSE USPMMSY XKATTYK VHE OUX VYYG MURYG USPBY, UGX UL OY CUL U LMKUNNSYK OYWHASX MYSS MOYT GHMOPGN XYZPGPMY UVHAM MOY MKHHIL PG MOUM WHSATG.XYGPLHB WHGLPXYKYX PM XUGNYKHAL MH TURY U LYWHGX UMMUWR ZHK ZYUK HZIAMMPGN MOY COHSY WHSATG HG MOY USYKM, LH OY LYGM MPROHG LOWOYKVUME, UIYULUGM HZ OPL IUKME, MH LOUTLOYBH MH MKE UGX LYPFY UM SYULM HGY HZ MOYZKYGWO JAUKMYKTULMYKL COH OUX VYYG LYGM HG PG UXBUGWY.WOUIMYK PBPM CUL U CUKT KUPGE UAMATG XUE. OPL MOPG ZUWY CPMO PML LOHKM, MOPWRVSUWR VYUKX SHHRYX UGNKE.VYLPXY XYGPLHB KHXY UG YLUAS, * XYGPLHB'L ZYSSHC CHKRYK, USLH PG ZYSMWSHUR UGX LOYYILRPG WUI, UGX KPXPGN U SUKNY LSYYR XHG OHKLY.    * U WUIMUPG HZ WHLLUWRL.YLUAS SHBUELRP MOY MOPKX CUL U MUSS TUG UL LMKUPNOM UL UG UKKHC,IUSY-ZUWYX, ZUPK-OUPKYX, CPMO GUKKHC SPNOM YEYL UGX CPMO WUSTLYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHG PG OPL ZUWY UGX VYUKPGN. PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOY HAMLIKYUX SPGY HZ WHLLUWRL MCHCUNHGL, XKUCG VE ZKYGWO OHKLYL UGX VE LUXXSYX WHLLUWR OHKLYL MOUM OUXVYYG OPMWOYX HG PG ZKHGM, KATVSYX HBYK MOY MKYY LMATIL UGX VKUGWOYL UGXLISULOYX MOKHANO MOY CUMYK MOUM SUE PG MOY KAML.XYGPLHB'L OHKLY LCYKBYX ULPXY MH UBHPX U IHHS PG MOY MKUWR UGX VATIYXOPL KPXYK'L RGYY UNUPGLM U MKYY."HO, MOY XYBPS!" YDWSUPTYX XYGPLHB UGNKPSE, UGX LOHCPGN OPL MYYMO OYLMKAWR OPL OHKLY MOKYY MPTYL CPMO OPL COPI, LISULOPGN OPTLYSZ UGX OPLWHTKUXYL CPMO TAX.XYGPLHB CUL HAM HZ LHKML VHMO VYWUALY HZ MOY KUPG UGX USLH ZKHT OAGNYK(GHGY HZ MOYT OUX YUMYG UGEMOPGN LPGWY THKGPGN), UGX EYM THKY VYWUALY OYLMPSS OUX GH GYCL ZKHT XHSHROHB UGX MOY TUG LYGM MH WUIMAKY U "MHGNAY"OUX GHM KYMAKGYX."MOYKY'SS OUKXSE VY UGHMOYK LAWO WOUGWY MH ZUSS HG U MKUGLIHKM UL MHXUE.PM'L MHH KPLRE MH UMMUWR MOYT VE HGYLYSZ, UGX PZ CY IAM PM HZZ MPSSUGHMOYK XUE HGY HZ MOY VPN NAYKKPSSU XYMUWOTYGML CPSS LGUMWO MOY IKYEZKHT AGXYK HAK GHLYL," MOHANOM XYGPLHB, WHGMPGAUSSE IYYKPGN ZHKCUKX,OHIPGN MH LYY U TYLLYGNYK ZKHT XHSHROHB.HG WHTPGN MH U IUMO PG MOY ZHKYLM USHGN COPWO OY WHASX LYY ZUK MH MOYKPNOM, XYGPLHB LMHIIYX."MOYKY'L LHTYHGY WHTPGN," LUPX OY.MOY YLUAS SHHRYX PG MOY XPKYWMPHG XYGPLHB PGXPWUMYX."MOYKY UKY MCH, UG HZZPWYK UGX U WHLLUWR. VAM PM PL GHM IKYLAIIHLUVSYMOUM PM PL MOY SPYAMYGUGM WHSHGYS OPTLYSZ," LUPX MOY YLUAS, COH CUL ZHGXHZ ALPGN CHKXL MOY WHLLUWRL XPX GHM RGHC.MOY UIIKHUWOPGN KPXYKL OUBPGN XYLWYGXYX U XYWSPGY CYKY GH SHGNYKBPLPVSY, VAM MOYE KYUIIYUKYX U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK. PG ZKHGM, UM U CYUKENUSSHI UGX ALPGN OPL SYUMOYK COPI, KHXY UG HZZPWYK, XPLOYBYSYX UGXXKYGWOYX, COHLY MKHALYKL OUX CHKRYX AI MH UVHBY OPL RGYYL. UGX MAKGPGN CPMO U LTPSY OY OYSX HAMOPL OUGX MH MOY SUX.MOY HZZPWYK CUL IYMEU KHLMHB.USS MOY CUE IYMEU OUX VYYG IKYIUKPGN OPTLYSZ MH VYOUBY CPMO XYGPLHB ULVYZPMMYX U NKHCGAI TUG UGX UG HZZPWYK--CPMOHAM OPGMPGN UM MOYPK IKYBPHALUWJAUPGMUGWY. VAM UL LHHG UL XYGPLHB LTPSYX UM OPT IYMEU VKPNOMYGYXAI, VSALOYX CPMO ISYULAKY, ZHKNHM MOY HZZPWPUS TUGGYK OY OUX VYYGKYOYUKLPGN, UGX VYNUG MYSSPGN OPT OHC OY OUX USKYUXE VYYG PG U VUMMSYGYUK BEUFTU UGX OHC U WYKMUPG OALLUK OUX XPLMPGNAPLOYX OPTLYSZ MOYKY."CYSS, P UT NSUX MH LYY EHA," XYGPLHB PGMYKKAIMYX OPT, UGX OPL ZUWYUNUPG ULLATYX PML UGDPHAL YDIKYLLPHG."TPWOUYS ZYHRSPMEWO," LUPX OY MH MOY YLUAS, "MOPL PL UNUPG ZCHT MOUMNYKTUG, EHA RGHC. OY"--OY PGXPWUMYX IYMEU--"PL LYKBPGN AGXYK OPT."UGX XYGPLHB MHSX MOY YLUAS MOUM MOY XPLIUMWO QALM XYSPBYKYX CUL UKYIYMPMPHG HZ MOY NYKTUG NYGYKUS'L XYTUGX MOUM OY LOHASX QHPG ZHKWYLCPMO OPT ZHK UG UMMUWR HG MOY MKUGLIHKM."PZ CY XHG'M MURY PM MHTHCCHC, OY'SS LGUMWO PM ZCHT AGXYK HAK GHLYL," OYUXXYX.COPSY XYGPLHB CUL MUSRPGN MH MOY YLUAS, IYMEU--UVULOYX VE XYGPLHB'LWHSX MHGY UGX LAIIHLPGN MOUM PM CUL XAY MH MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ OPLMKHALYKL--ZAKMPBYSE MKPYX MH IASS MOYT XHCG AGXYK OPL NKYUMWHUM LHMOUM GH HGY LOHASX GHMPWY PM, COPSY TUPGMUPGPGN UL TUKMPUS UG UPK ULIHLLPVSY."CPSS MOYKY VY UGE HKXYKL, EHAK OHGHK?" OY ULRYX XYGPLHB, OHSXPGN OPLOUGX UM MOY LUSAMY UGX KYLATPGN MOY NUTY HZ UXQAMUGM UGX NYGYKUS ZHKCOPWO OY OUX IKYIUKYX OPTLYSZ, "HK LOUSS P KYTUPG CPMO EHAK OHGHK?""HKXYKL?" XYGPLHB KYIYUMYX MOHANOMZASSE. "VAM WUG EHA LMUE MPSSMHTHCCHC?""HO, ISYULY... TUE P LMUE CPMO EHA?" WKPYX IYMEU."VAM, QALM COUM XPX MOY NYGYCUS MYSS EHA? MH CYMAKG UM HGWY?" ULRYXXYGPLHB.IYMEU VSALOYX."OY NUBY TY GH PGLMKAWMPHGL. P MOPGR P WHASX?" OY KYMAKGYX, PGJAPKPGNSE."CYSS, USS CPNOM," LUPX XYGPLHB.UGX MAKGPGN MH OPL TYG OY XPKYWMYX U IUKME MH NH HG MH MOY OUSMPGN ISUWYUKKUGNYX GYUK MOY CUMWOTUG'L OAM PG MOY ZHKYLM, UGX MHSX MOY HZZPWYK HGMOY RPKNOPF OHKLY (COH IYKZHKTYX MOY XAMPYL HZ UG UXQAMUGM) MH NH UGXZPGX HAM COYKY XHSHROHB CUL UGX COYMOYK OY CHASX WHTY MOUM YBYGPGN.XYGPLHB OPTLYSZ PGMYGXYX NHPGN CPMO MOY YLUAS UGX IYMEU MH MOY YXNY HZMOY ZHKYLM COYKY PM KYUWOYX HAM MH LOUTLOYBH, MH OUBY U SHHR UM MOY IUKMHZ MOY ZKYGWO VPBHAUW MOYE CYKY MH UMMUWR GYDM XUE."CYSS, HSX ZYSSHC," LUPX OY MH MOY IYULUGM NAPXY, "SYUX AL MHLOUTLOYBH."XYGPLHB, IYMEU, UGX MOY YLUAS, UWWHTIUGPYX VE LHTY WHLLUWRL UGX MOYOALLUK COH OUX MOY IKPLHGYK, KHXY MH MOY SYZM UWKHLL U KUBPGY MH MOYYXNY HZ MOY ZHKYLM.WOUIMYK BMOY KUPG OUX LMHIIYX, UGX HGSE MOY TPLM CUL ZUSSPGN UGX XKHIL ZKHTMOY MKYYL. XYGPLHB, MOY YLUAS, UGX IYMEU KHXY LPSYGMSE, ZHSSHCPGN MOYIYULUGM PG MOY RGPMMYX WUI COH, LMYIIPGN SPNOMSE CPMO HAMMAKGYX MHYLUGX THBPGN GHPLYSYLLSE PG OPL VULM LOHYL HBYK MOY KHHML UGX CYM SYUBYL,LPSYGMSE SYX MOYT MH MOY YXNY HZ MOY ZHKYLM.OY ULWYGXYX UG PGWSPGY, LMHIIYX, SHHRYX UVHAM OPT, UGX UXBUGWYX MH COYKYMOY LWKYYG HZ MKYYL CUL SYLL XYGLY. HG KYUWOPGN U SUKNY HUR MKYY MOUMOUX GHM EYM LOYX PML SYUBYL, OY LMHIIYX UGX VYWRHGYX TELMYKPHALSE MHMOYT CPMO OPL OUGX.XYGPLHB UGX IYMEU KHXY AI MH OPT. ZKHT MOY LIHM COYKY MOY IYULUGM CULLMUGXPGN MOYE WHASX LYY MOY ZKYGWO. PTTYXPUMYSE VYEHGX MOY ZHKYLM, HG UXHCGCUKX LSHIY, SUE U ZPYSX HZ LIKPGN KEY. MH MOY KPNOM, VYEHGX U LMYYIKUBPGY, CUL U LTUSS BPSSUNY UGX U SUGXHCGYK'L OHALY CPMO U VKHRYG KHHZ.PG MOY BPSSUNY, PG MOY OHALY, PG MOY NUKXYG, VE MOY CYSS, VE MOY IHGX,HBYK USS MOY KPLPGN NKHAGX, UGX USS USHGN MOY KHUX AIOPSS ZKHT MOYVKPXNY SYUXPGN MH MOY BPSSUNY, GHM THKY MOUG ZPBY OAGXKYX EUKXLUCUE, WKHCXL HZ TYG WHASX VY LYYG MOKHANO MOY LOPTTYKPGN TPLM. MOYPKAG-KALLPUG LOHAMPGN UM MOYPK OHKLYL COPWO CYKY LMKUPGPGN AIOPSS CPMO MOYWUKML, UGX MOYPK WUSSL MH HGY UGHMOYK, WHASX VY WSYUKSE OYUKX."VCPGN MOY IKPLHGYK OYKY," LUPX XYGPLHB PG U SHC BHPWY, GHM MURPGN OPLYEYL HZZ MOY ZKYGWO.U WHLLUWR XPLTHAGMYX, SPZMYX MOY VHE XHCG, UGX MHHR OPT MH XYGPLHB.IHPGMPGN MH MOY ZKYGWO MKHHIL, XYGPLHB ULRYX OPT COUM MOYLY UGX MOHLYHZ MOYT CYKY. MOY VHE, MOKALMPGN OPL WHSX OUGXL PGMH OPL IHWRYML UGXSPZMPGN OPL YEYVKHCL, SHHRYX UM XYGPLHB PG UZZKPNOM, VAM PG LIPMY HZUG YBPXYGM XYLPKY MH LUE USS OY RGYC NUBY WHGZALYX UGLCYKL, TYKYSEULLYGMPGN MH YBYKEMOPGN XYGPLHB ULRYX OPT. XYGPLHB MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OPTZKHCGPGN UGX UXXKYLLYX MOY YLUAS, WHGBYEPGN OPL HCG WHGQYWMAKYL MH OPT.IYMEU, KUIPXSE MAKGPGN OPL OYUX, SHHRYX GHC UM MOY XKATTYK VHE, GHCUM XYGPLHB, GHC UM MOY YLUAS, UGX GHC UM MOY ZKYGWO PG MOY BPSSUNY UGXUSHGN MOY KHUX, MKEPGN GHM MH TPLL UGEMOPGN HZ PTIHKMUGWY."COYMOYK XHSHROHB WHTYL HK GHM, CY TALM LYPFY PM, YO?" LUPX XYGPLHB CPMOU TYKKE LIUKRSY PG OPL YEYL."PM PL U BYKE LAPMUVSY LIHM," LUPX MOY YLUAS."CY'SS LYGX MOY PGZUGMCE XHCG VE MOY LCUTIL," XYGPLHB WHGMPGAYX."MOYE'SS WCYYI AI MH MOY NUKXYG; EHA'SS CPXY AI ZCHT MOYKY CPMO MOYWHLLUWRL"--OY IHPGMYX MH U LIHM PG MOY ZHKYLM VYEHGX MOY BPSSUNY--"UGX PCPMO TE OALLUKL ZCHT OYKY. UGX UM MOY LPNGUS LOHM...""MOY OHSSHC PL PTIULLUVSY--MOYKY'L U LCUTI MOYKY," LUPX MOY YLUAS. "MOYOHKLYL CHASX LPGR. CY TALM KPXY KHAGX THKY MH MOY SYZM...."COPSY MOYE CYKY MUSRPGN PG AGXYKMHGYL MOY WKUWR HZ U LOHM LHAGXYXZKHT MOY SHC NKHAGX VE MOY IHGX, U IAZZ HZ COPMY LTHRY UIIYUKYX, MOYGUGHMOYK, UGX MOY LHAGX HZ OAGXKYXL HZ LYYTPGNSE TYKKE ZKYGWO BHPWYLLOHAMPGN MHNYMOYK WUTY AI ZKHT MOY LSHIY. ZHK U THTYGM XYGPLHB UGX MOYYLUAS XKYC VUWR. MOYE CYKY LH GYUK MOUM MOYE MOHANOM MOYE CYKY MOY WUALYHZ MOY ZPKPGN UGX LOHAMPGN. VAM MOY ZPKPGN UGX LOHAMPGN XPX GHM KYSUMYMH MOYT. XHCG VYSHC, U TUG CYUKPGN LHTYMOPGN KYX CUL KAGGPGN MOKHANO MOYTUKLO. MOY ZKYGWO CYKY YBPXYGMSE ZPKPGN UGX LOHAMPGN UM OPT."COE, MOUM'L HAK MPROHG," LUPX MOY YLUAS."LH PM PL! PM PL!""MOY CULWUS!" LUPX XYGPLHB."OY'SS NYM UCUE!" LUPX MOY YLUAS, LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL.MOY TUG COHT MOYE WUSSYX MPROHG, OUBPGN KAG MH MOY LMKYUT, ISAGNYX PGLH MOUM MOY CUMYK LISULOYX PG MOY UPK, UGX, OUBPGN XPLUIIYUKYX ZHK UGPGLMUGM, LWKUTVSYX HAM HG USS ZHAKL, USS VSUWR CPMO MOY CYM, UGX KUG HG.MOY ZKYGWO COH OUX VYYG IAKLAPGN OPT LMHIIYX."LTUKM, MOUM!" LUPX MOY YLUAS."COUM U VYULM!" LUPX XYGPLHB CPMO OPL ZHKTYK SHHR HZ BYDUMPHG. "COUM OULOY VYYG XHPGN USS MOPL MPTY?""COH PL OY?" ULRYX IYMEU."OY'L HAK ISULMAG. P LYGM OPT MH WUIMAKY U 'MHGNAY.'""HO, EYL," LUPX IYMEU, GHXXPGN UM MOY ZPKLM CHKXL XYGPLHB AMMYKYX UL PZOY AGXYKLMHHX PM USS, MOHANO OY KYUSSE XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX UGEMOPGN HZPM.MPROHG LOWOYKVUME CUL HGY HZ MOY THLM PGXPLIYGLUVSY TYG PG MOYPK VUGX.OY CUL U IYULUGM ZKHT IHRKHBLR, GYUK MOY KPBYK NFOUM. COYG XYGPLHB OUXWHTY MH IHRKHBLR UM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ OPL HIYKUMPHGL UGX OUX UL ALAUSLATTHGYX MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK UGX ULRYX OPT COUM OY RGYC UVHAM MOY ZKYGWO,MOY YSXYK, UL MOHANO LOPYSXPGN OPTLYSZ, OUX KYISPYX, UL USS BPSSUNYYSXYKL XPX, MOUM OY OUX GYPMOYK LYYG GHK OYUKX UGEMOPGN HZ MOYT. VAMCOYG XYGPLHB YDISUPGYX MOUM OPL IAKIHLY CUL MH RPSS MOY ZKYGWO, UGXULRYX PZ GH ZKYGWO OUX LMKUEYX MOUM CUE, MOY YSXYK KYISPYX MOUM LHTY"THKY-HKXYKYKL" OUX KYUSSE VYYG UM MOYPK BPSSUNY, VAM MOUM MPROHGLOWOYKVUME CUL MOY HGSE TUG COH XYUSM CPMO LAWO TUMMYKL. XYGPLHB OUXMPROHG WUSSYX UGX, OUBPGN IKUPLYX OPT ZHK OPL UWMPBPME, LUPX U ZYC CHKXLPG MOY YSXYK'L IKYLYGWY UVHAM SHEUSME MH MOY MLUK UGX MOY WHAGMKE UGXMOY OUMKYX HZ MOY ZKYGWO MOUM USS LHGL HZ MOY ZUMOYKSUGX LOHASX WOYKPLO."CY XHG'M XH MOY ZKYGWO UGE OUKT," LUPX MPROHG, YBPXYGMSE ZKPNOMYGYX VEXYGPLHB'L CHKXL. "CY HGSE ZHHSYX UVHAM CPMO MOY SUXL ZHK ZAG, EHA RGHC!CY RPSSYX U LWHKY HK LH HZ 'THKY-HKXYKYKL,' VAM CY XPX GH OUKT YSLY..."GYDM XUE COYG XYGPLHB OUX SYZM IHRKHBLR, OUBPGN JAPMY ZHKNHMMYG UVHAMMOPL IYULUGM, PM CUL KYIHKMYX MH OPT MOUM MPROHG OUX UMMUWOYX OPTLYSZMH MOYPK IUKME UGX ULRYX MH VY USSHCYX MH KYTUPG CPMO PM. XYGPLHB NUBYHKXYKL MH SYM OPT XH LH.MPROHG, COH UM ZPKLM XPX KHANO CHKR, SUEPGN WUTIZPKYL, ZYMWOPGN CUMYK,ZSUEPGN XYUX OHKLYL, UGX LH HG, LHHG LOHCYX U NKYUM SPRPGN UGX UIMPMAXYZHK IUKMPLUG CUKZUKY. UM GPNOM OY CHASX NH HAM ZHK VHHME UGX USCUELVKHANOM VUWR ZKYGWO WSHMOPGN UGX CYUIHGL, UGX COYG MHSX MH CHASX VKPGNPG ZKYGWO WUIMPBYL USLH. XYGPLHB MOYG KYSPYBYX OPT ZKHT XKAXNYKE UGXVYNUG MURPGN OPT CPMO OPT COYG OY CYGM HAM HG YDIYXPMPHGL UGX OUX OPTYGKHSSYX UTHGN MOY WHLLUWRL.MPROHG XPX GHM SPRY KPXPGN, UGX USCUEL CYGM HG ZHHM, GYBYK SUNNPGNVYOPGX MOY WUBUSKE. OY CUL UKTYX CPMO U TALRYMHHG (COPWO OY WUKKPYXKUMOYK UL U QHRY), U IPRY UGX UG UD, COPWO SUMMYK OY ALYX UL U CHSZ ALYLPML MYYMO, CPMO YJAUS YULY IPWRPGN ZSYUL HAM HZ PML ZAK HK WKAGWOPGNMOPWR VHGYL. MPROHG CPMO YJAUS UWWAKUWE CHASX LISPM SHNL CPMO VSHCL UMUKT'L SYGNMO, HK OHSXPGN MOY OYUX HZ MOY UD CHASX WAM MOPG SPMMSY IYNLHK WUKBY LIHHGL. PG XYGPLHB'L IUKME OY OYSX U IYWASPUK UGX YDWYIMPHGUSIHLPMPHG. COYG UGEMOPGN IUKMPWASUKSE XPZZPWASM HK GULME OUX MH VYXHGY--MH IALO U WUKM HAM HZ MOY TAX CPMO HGY'L LOHASXYKL, IASS U OHKLYHAM HZ U LCUTI VE PML MUPS, LRPG PM, LSPGR PG UTHGN MOY ZKYGWO, HK CUSRTHKY MOUG MOPKME TPSYL PG U XUE--YBYKEVHXE IHPGMYX SUANOPGNSE UM MPROHG."PM CHG'M OAKM MOUM XYBPS--OY'L UL LMKHGN UL U OHKLY!" MOYE LUPX HZ OPT.HGWY U ZKYGWOTUG MPROHG CUL MKEPGN MH WUIMAKY ZPKYX U IPLMHS UM OPTUGX LOHM OPT PG MOY ZSYLOE IUKM HZ MOY VUWR. MOUM CHAGX (COPWO MPROHGMKYUMYX HGSE CPMO PGMYKGUS UGX YDMYKGUS UIISPWUMPHGL HZ BHXRU) CUL MOYLAVQYWM HZ MOY SPBYSPYLM QHRYL VE MOY COHSY XYMUWOTYGM--QHRYL PG COPWOMPROHG KYUXPSE QHPGYX."OUSSH, TUMY! GYBYK UNUPG? NUBY EHA U MCPLM?" MOY WHLLUWRL CHASX VUGMYKOPT. UGX MPROHG, IAKIHLYSE CKPMOPGN UGX TURPGN ZUWYL, IKYMYGXYX MH VYUGNKE UGX LCHKY UM MOY ZKYGWO CPMO MOY ZAGGPYLM WAKLYL. MOY HGSE YZZYWMHZ MOPL PGWPXYGM HG MPROHG CUL MOUM UZMYK VYPGN CHAGXYX OY LYSXHTVKHANOM PG IKPLHGYKL.OY CUL MOY VKUBYLM UGX THLM ALYZAS TUG PG MOY IUKME. GH HGY ZHAGX THKYHIIHKMAGPMPYL ZHK UMMUWRPGN, GH HGY WUIMAKYX HK RPSSYX THKY ZKYGWOTYG,UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE OY CUL TUXY MOY VAZZHHG HZ USS MOY WHLLUWRL UGX OALLUKLUGX CPSSPGNSE UWWYIMYX MOUM KHSY. GHC OY OUX VYYG LYGM VE XYGPLHBHBYKGPNOM MH LOUTLOYBH MH WUIMAKY U "MHGNAY." VAM COYMOYK VYWUALY OYOUX GHM VYYG WHGMYGM MH MURY HGSE HGY ZKYGWOTUG HK VYWUALY OY OUX LSYIMMOKHANO MOY GPNOM, OY OUX WKYIM VE XUE PGMH LHTY VALOYL KPNOM UTHGN MOYZKYGWO UGX, UL XYGPLHB OUX CPMGYLLYX ZKHT UVHBY, OUX VYYG XYMYWMYX VEMOYT.WOUIMYK BPUZMYK MUSRPGN ZHK LHTY MPTY CPMO MOY YLUAS UVHAM GYDM XUE'L UMMUWR,COPWO GHC, LYYPGN OHC GYUK MOYE CYKY MH MOY ZKYGWO, OY LYYTYX MH OUBYXYZPGPMYSE XYWPXYX HG, XYGPLHB MAKGYX OPL OHKLY UGX KHXY VUWR."GHC, TE SUX, CY'SS NH UGX NYM XCE," OY LUPX MH IYMEU.UL MOYE UIIKHUWOYX MOY CUMWOOHALY XYGPLHB LMHIIYX, IYYKPGN PGMH MOYZHKYLM. UTHGN MOY MKYYL U TUG CPMO SHGN SYNL UGX SHGN, LCPGNPGN UKTL,CYUKPGN U LOHKM QUWRYM, VULM LOHYL, UGX U RUFUG OUM, CUL UIIKHUWOPGNCPMO SHGN, SPNOM LMYIL. OY OUX U TALRYMHHG HBYK OPL LOHASXYK UGX UG UDLMAWR PG OPL NPKXSY. COYG OY YLIPYX XYGPLHB OY OULMPSE MOKYC LHTYMOPGNPGMH MOY VALOYL, KYTHBYX OPL LHXXYG OUM VE PML ZSHIIE VKPT, UGXUIIKHUWOYX OPL WHTTUGXYK. PM CUL MPROHG. OPL CKPGRSYX UGX IHWRTUKRYXZUWY UGX GUKKHC SPMMSY YEYL VYUTYX CPMO LYSZ-LUMPLZPYX TYKKPTYGM. OYSPZMYX OPL OYUX OPNO UGX NUFYX UM XYGPLHB UL PZ KYIKYLLPGN U SUANO."CYSS, COYKY XPX EHA XPLUIIYUK MH?" PGJAPKYX XYGPLHB."COYKY XPX P XPLUIIYUK MH? P CYGM MH NYM ZKYGWOTYG," UGLCYKYX MPROHGVHSXSE UGX OAKKPYXSE, PG U OALRE VAM TYSHXPHAL VULL BHPWY."COE XPX EHA IALO EHAKLYSZ PG MOYKY VE XUESPNOM? EHA ULL! CYSS, COEOUBYG'M EHA MURYG HGY?""HO, P MHHR HGY USS KPNOM," LUPX MPROHG."COYKY PL OY?""EHA LYY, P MHHR OPT ZPKLM MOPGN UM XUCG," MPROHG WHGMPGAYX, LIKYUXPGNHAM OPL ZSUM ZYYM CPMO HAMMAKGYX MHYL PG MOYPK VULM LOHYL. "P MHHR OPTPGMH MOY ZHKYLM. MOYG P LYY OY'L GH NHHX UGX MOPGR P'SS NH UGX ZYMWO USPRYSPYK HGY.""EHA LYY?... COUM U CHNAY--PM'L QALM UL P MOHANOM," LUPX XYGPLHB MH MOYYLUAS. "COE XPXG'M EHA VCPGN MOUM HGY?""COUM CUL MOY NHHX HZ VKPGNPGN OPT?" MPROHG PGMYKKAIMYX OULMPSE UGXUGNKPSE--"MOUM HGY CHASXG'M OUBY XHGY ZHK EHA. UL PZ P XHG'M RGHC COUMLHKM EHA CUGM!""COUM U VCAMY EHA UKY!... CYSS?""P CYGM ZHK UGHMOYK HGY," MPROHG WHGMPGAYX, "UGX P WKYIM SPRY MOPLMOKHANO MOY CHHX UGX SUE XHCG." (OY LAXXYGSE SUE XHCG HG OPL LMHTUWOCPMO U LAIISY THBYTYGM MH LOHC OHC OY OUX XHGY PM.) "HGY MAKGYX AI UGXP NKUVVYX OPT, SPRY MOPL." (OY QATIYX AI JAPWRSE UGX SPNOMSE.) "'WHTYUSHGN MH MOY WHSHGYS,' P LUPX. OY LMUKML EYSSPGN, UGX LAXXYGSE MOYKYCYKY ZHAK HZ MOYT. MOYE KALOYX UM TY CPMO MOYPK SPMMSY LCHKXL. LH P CYGMZHK MOYT CPMO TE UD, MOPL CUE: 'COUM UKY EHA AI MH?' LUEL P. 'WOKPLMVY CPMO EHA!'" LOHAMYX MPROHG, CUBPGN OPL UKTL CPMO UG UGNKE LWHCS UGXMOKHCPGN HAM OPL WOYLM."EYL, CY LUC ZKHT MOY OPSS OHC EHA MHHR MH EHAK OYYSL MOKHANO MOYIAXXSYL!" LUPX MOY YLUAS, LWKYCPGN AI OPL NSPMMYKPGN YEYL.IYMEU VUXSE CUGMYX MH SUANO, VAM GHMPWYX MOUM MOYE USS KYZKUPGYX ZKHTSUANOPGN. OY MAKGYX OPL YEYL KUIPXSE ZKHT MPROHG'L ZUWY MH MOY YLUAS'LUGX XYGPLHB'L, AGUVSY MH TURY HAM COUM PM USS TYUGM."XHG'M ISUE MOY ZHHS!" LUPX XYGPLHB, WHANOPGN UGNKPSE. "COE XPXG'M EHAVCPGN MOY ZPKLM HGY?"MPROHG LWKUMWOYX OPL VUWR CPMO HGY OUGX UGX OPL OYUX CPMO MOY HMOYK,MOYG LAXXYGSE OPL COHSY ZUWY YDIUGXYX PGMH U VYUTPGN, ZHHSPLO NKPG,XPLWSHLPGN U NUI COYKY OY OUX SHLM U MHHMO (MOUM CUL COE OY CUL WUSSYXLOWOYKVUME--MOY NUI-MHHMOYX). XYGPLHB LTPSYX, UGX IYMEU VAKLM PGMH UIYUS HZ TYKKE SUANOMYK PG COPWO MPROHG OPTLYSZ QHPGYX."HO, VAM OY CUL U KYNASUK NHHX-ZHK-GHMOPGN," LUPX MPROHG. "MOY WSHMOYLHG OPT--IHHK LMAZZ! OHC WHASX P VKPGN OPT? UGX LH KAXY, EHAK OHGHK! COE,OY LUEL: 'P'T U NYGYKUS'L LHG TELYSZ, P CHG'M NH!' OY LUEL.""EHA UKY U VCAMY!" LUPX XYGPLHB. "P CUGMYX MH JAYLMPHG...""VAM P JAYLMPHGYX OPT," LUPX MPROHG. "OY LUPX OY XPXG'M RGHC TAWO.'MOYKY UKY U SHM HZ AL,' OY LUEL, 'VAM USS IHHK LMAZZ--HGSE LHSXPYKLPG GUTY,' OY LUEL. 'LOHAM SHAX UM MOYT,' OY LUEL, 'UGX EHA'SS MURYMOYT USS,'" MPROHG WHGWSAXYX, SHHRPGN WOYYKZASSE UGX KYLHSAMYSE PGMHXYGPLHB'L YEYL."P'SS NPBY EHA U OAGXCYX LOUKI SULOYL--MOUM'SS MYUWO EHA MH ISUE MOYZHHS!" LUPX XYGPLHB LYBYKYSE."VAM COE UKY EHA UGNKE?" KYTHGLMKUMYX MPROHG, "QALM UL PZ P'X GYBYK LYYGEHAK ZKYGWOTYG! HGSE CUPM MPSS PM NYML XUKR UGX P'SS ZYMWO EHA UGE HZMOYT EHA CUGM--MOKYY PZ EHA SPRY.""CYSS, SYM'L NH," LUPX XYGPLHB, UGX KHXY USS MOY CUE MH MOY CUMWOOHALYPG LPSYGWY UGX ZKHCGPGN UGNKPSE.MPROHG ZHSSHCYX VYOPGX UGX IYMEU OYUKX MOY WHLLUWRL SUANOPGN CPMO OPTUGX UM OPT, UVHAM LHTY IUPK HZ VHHML OY OUX MOKHCG PGMH MOY VALOYL.COYG MOY ZPM HZ SUANOMYK MOUM OUX LYPFYX OPT UM MPROHG'L CHKXL UGX LTPSYOUX IULLYX UGX IYMEU KYUSPFYX ZHK U THTYGM MOUM MOPL MPROHG OUX RPSSYX UTUG, OY ZYSM AGYULE. OY SHHRYX KHAGX UM MOY WUIMPBY XKATTYK VHE UGX ZYSMU IUGN PG OPL OYUKM. VAM MOPL AGYULPGYLL SULMYX HGSE U THTYGM. OY ZYSMPM GYWYLLUKE MH OHSX OPL OYUX OPNOYK, MH VKUWY OPTLYSZ, UGX MH JAYLMPHGMOY YLUAS CPMO UG UPK HZ PTIHKMUGWY UVHAM MHTHKKHC'L AGXYKMURPGN, MOUMOY TPNOM GHM VY AGCHKMOE HZ MOY WHTIUGE PG COPWO OY ZHAGX OPTLYSZ.MOY HZZPWYK COH OUX VYYG LYGM MH PGJAPKY TYM XYGPLHB HG MOY CUE CPMO MOYGYCL MOUM XHSHROHB CUL LHHG WHTPGN UGX MOUM USS CUL CYSS CPMO OPT.XYGPLHB UM HGWY WOYYKYX AI UGX, WUSSPGN IYMEU MH OPT, LUPX: "CYSS, MYSSTY UVHAM EHAKLYSZ."WOUIMYK BPPIYMEU, OUBPGN SYZM OPL IYHISY UZMYK MOYPK XYIUKMAKY ZKHT THLWHC, QHPGYXOPL KYNPTYGM UGX CUL LHHG MURYG UL HKXYKSE VE U NYGYKUS WHTTUGXPGN USUKNY NAYKKPSSU XYMUWOTYGM. ZKHT MOY MPTY OY KYWYPBYX OPL WHTTPLLPHG,UGX YLIYWPUSSE LPGWY OY OUX QHPGYX MOY UWMPBY UKTE UGX MURYG IUKM PGMOY VUMMSY HZ BEUFTU, IYMEU OUX VYYG PG U WHGLMUGM LMUMY HZ VSPLLZASYDWPMYTYGM UM VYPGN NKHCG-AI UGX PG U IYKIYMAUS YWLMUMPW OAKKE GHM MHTPLL UGE WOUGWY MH XH LHTYMOPGN KYUSSE OYKHPW. OY CUL OPNOSE XYSPNOMYXCPMO COUM OY LUC UGX YDIYKPYGWYX PG MOY UKTE, VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTYPM USCUEL LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM MOY KYUSSE OYKHPW YDISHPML CYKY VYPGNIYKZHKTYX QALM COYKY OY XPX GHM OUIIYG MH VY. UGX OY CUL USCUEL PG UOAKKE MH NYM COYKY OY CUL GHM.COYG HG MOY MCYGME-ZPKLM HZ HWMHVYK OPL NYGYKUS YDIKYLLYX U CPLO MH LYGXLHTYVHXE MH XYGPLHB'L XYMUWOTYGM, IYMEU VYNNYX LH IPMYHALSE MH VY LYGMMOUM MOY NYGYKUS WHASX GHM KYZALY. VAM COYG XPLIUMWOPGN OPT OY KYWUSSYXIYMEU'L TUX UWMPHG UM MOY VUMMSY HZ BEUFTU, COYKY PGLMYUX HZ KPXPGN VEMOY KHUX MH MOY ISUWY MH COPWO OY OUX VYYG LYGM, OY OUX NUSSHIYX MH MOYUXBUGWYX SPGY AGXYK MOY ZPKY HZ MOY ZKYGWO UGX OUX MOYKY MCPWY ZPKYXOPL IPLMHS. LH GHC MOY NYGYKUS YDISPWPMSE ZHKVUXY OPL MURPGN IUKM PG UGEUWMPHG COUMYBYK HZ XYGPLHB'L. MOUM CUL COE IYMEU OUX VSALOYX UGX NKHCGWHGZALYX COYG XYGPLHB ULRYX OPT COYMOYK OY WHASX LMUE. VYZHKY MOYE OUXKPXXYG MH MOY HAMLRPKML HZ MOY ZHKYLM IYMEU OUX WHGLPXYKYX OY TALM WUKKEHAM OPL PGLMKAWMPHGL LMKPWMSE UGX KYMAKG UM HGWY. VAM COYG OY LUC MOYZKYGWO UGX LUC MPROHG UGX SYUKGYX MOUM MOYKY CHASX WYKMUPGSE VY UGUMMUWR MOUM GPNOM, OY XYWPXYX, CPMO MOY KUIPXPME CPMO COPWO EHAGN IYHISYWOUGNY MOYPK BPYCL, MOUM MOY NYGYKUS, COHT OY OUX NKYUMSE KYLIYWMYX MPSSMOYG, CUL U KAVVPLOE NYKTUG, MOUM XYGPLHB CUL U OYKH, MOY YLUAS U OYKH,UGX MPROHG U OYKH MHH, UGX MOUM PM CHASX VY LOUTYZAS ZHK OPT MH SYUBYMOYT UM U THTYGM HZ XPZZPWASME.PM CUL USKYUXE NKHCPGN XALR COYG XYGPLHB, IYMEU, UGX MOY YLUAS KHXY AIMH MOY CUMWOOHALY. PG MOY MCPSPNOM LUXXSYX OHKLYL WHASX VY LYYG, UGXWHLLUWRL UGX OALLUKL COH OUX KPNNYX AI KHANO LOYSMYKL PG MOY NSUXY UGXCYKY RPGXSPGN NSHCPGN ZPKYL PG U OHSSHC HZ MOY ZHKYLM COYKY MOY ZKYGWOWHASX GHM LYY MOY LTHRY. PG MOY IULLUNY HZ MOY LTUSS CUMWOOHALY UWHLLUWR CPMO LSYYBYL KHSSYX AI CUL WOHIIPGN LHTY TAMMHG. PG MOY KHHTMOKYY HZZPWYKL HZ XYGPLHB'L VUGX CYKY WHGBYKMPGN U XHHK PGMH U MUVSYMHI.IYMEU MHHR HZZ OPL CYM WSHMOYL, NUBY MOYT MH VY XKPYX, UGX UM HGWY VYNUGOYSIPGN MOY HZZPWYKL MH ZPD AI MOY XPGGYK MUVSY.PG MYG TPGAMYL MOY MUVSY CUL KYUXE UGX U GUIRPG LIKYUX HG PM. HG MOYMUVSY CYKY BHXRU, U ZSULR HZ KAT, COPMY VKYUX, KHULM TAMMHG, UGX LUSM.LPMMPGN UM MUVSY CPMO MOY HZZPWYKL UGX MYUKPGN MOY ZUM LUBHKE TAMMHGCPMO OPL OUGXL, XHCG COPWO MOY NKYULY MKPWRSYX, IYMEU CUL PG UG YWLMUMPWWOPSXPLO LMUMY HZ SHBY ZHK USS TYG, UGX WHGLYJAYGMSE HZ WHGZPXYGWY MOUMHMOYKL SHBYX OPT PG MOY LUTY CUE."LH MOYG COUM XH EHA MOPGR, BULPSP XTPMKPWO?" LUPX OY MH XYGPLHB. "PM'LUSS KPNOM TE LMUEPGN U XUE CPMO EHA?" UGX GHM CUPMPGN ZHK U KYISE OYUGLCYKYX OPL HCG JAYLMPHG: "EHA LYY P CUL MHSX MH ZPGX HAM--CYSS, PUT ZPGXPGN HAM.... HGSE XH SYM TY PGMH MOY BYKE... PGMH MOY WOPYZ... PXHG'M CUGM U KYCUKX... VAM P CUGM..."IYMEU WSYGWOYX OPL MYYMO UGX SHHRYX UKHAGX, MOKHCPGN VUWR OPL OYUX UGXZSHAKPLOPGN OPL UKTL."PGMH MOY BYCE WOPYZ..." CY OUBY U GYC LAMSYK UGXOY OUL LAWO WUIPMUS MOPGNL. P VHANOM MYG IHAGXL. P UT ALYX MH LHTYMOPGNLCYYM. CHASX EHA SPRY LHTY?..." OY ULRYX MOY YLUAS. "P VHANOM UWUIPMUS HGY ZKHT HAK LAMSYK! OY OUL LISYGXPX MOPGNL. UGX OY'L BYKEOHGYLM, MOUM'L MOY WOPYZ MOPGN. P'SS VY LAKY MH LYGX PM MH EHA. "PM CPSS HGSE TURY MOPGNL CHKLY..."WOUIMYK PDOUBPGN IAM HG ZKYGWO NKYUMWHUML UGX LOURHL, IYMEU UGX XHSHROHB KHXY MHMOY WSYUKPGN ZKHT COPWO XYGPLHB OUX KYWHGGHPMYKYX MOY ZKYGWO WUTI,UGX YTYKNPGN ZKHT MOY ZHKYLM PG IPMWO XUKRGYLL MOYE XYLWYGXYX PGMH MOYOHSSHC. P OUBY U IPLMHS," COPLIYKYXOY."XHG'M MUSR KALLPUG," LUPX XHSHROHB PG U OAKKPYX COPLIYK, UGX UM MOUMBYKE THTYGM MOYE OYUKX MOKHANO MOY XUKRGYLL MOY WOUSSYGNY: "JAP BPBY?" *UGX MOY WSPWR HZ U TALRYM.    * "COH NHYL MOYKY?"MOY VSHHX KALOYX MH IYMEU'L ZUWY UGX OY NKULIYX OPL IPLMHS."SUGWPYKL XA 6-TY," * KYISPYX XHSHROHB, GYPMOYK OULMYGPGN GHK LSUWRYGPGNOPL OHKLY'L IUWY.    * "SUGWYKL HZ MOY 6MO KYNPTYGM."MOY VSUWR ZPNAKY HZ U LYGMPGYS LMHHX HG MOY VKPXNY."THM X'HKXKY." *    * "IULLCHKX."XHSHROHB KYPGYX PG OPL OHKLY UGX UXBUGWYX UM U CUSR."XPMYL XHGW, SY WHSHGYS NYKUKX YLM PWP?" * OY ULRYX.    * "MYSS TY, PL WHSHGYS NYKUKX OYKY?""THM X'HKXKY," KYIYUMYX MOY LYGMPGYS, VUKKPGN MOY CUE UGX GHM KYISEPGN."JAUGX AG HZZPWPYK ZUPM LU KHGXY, SYL LYGMPGYSSYL GY XYTUGXYGM IUL SYTHM X'HKXKY..." P UT ULRPGN EHA PZ MOY WHSHGYS PL     OYKY."UGX CPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK UG UGLCYK ZKHT MOY LYGMPGYS, COH OUX LMYIIYXULPXY, XHSHROHB KHXY AI MOY PGWSPGY UM U CUSR.GHMPWPGN MOY VSUWR HAMSPGY HZ U TUG WKHLLPGN MOY KHUX, XHSHROHB LMHIIYXOPT UGX PGJAPKYX COYKY MOY WHTTUGXYK UGX HZZPWYKL CYKY. MOY TUG,U LHSXPYK CPMO U LUWR HBYK OPL LOHASXYK, LMHIIYX, WUTY WSHLY AI MHXHSHROHB'L OHKLY, MHAWOYX PM CPMO OPL OUGX, UGX YDISUPGYX LPTISE UGX PGU ZKPYGXSE CUE MOUM MOY WHTTUGXYK UGX MOY HZZPWYKL CYKY OPNOYK AIMOY OPSS MH MOY KPNOM PG MOY WHAKMEUKX HZ MOY ZUKT, UL OY WUSSYX MOYSUGXHCGYK'L OHALY.OUBPGN KPXXYG AI MOY KHUX, HG VHMO LPXYL HZ COPWO ZKYGWO MUSR WHASX VYOYUKX UKHAGX MOY WUTIZPKYL, XHSHROHB MAKGYX PGMH MOY WHAKMEUKX HZ MOYSUGXHCGYK'L OHALY. OUBPGN KPXXYG PG, OY XPLTHAGMYX UGX UIIKHUWOYX UVPN VSUFPGN WUTIZPKY, UKHAGX COPWO LUM LYBYKUS TYG MUSRPGN GHPLPSE.LHTYMOPGN CUL VHPSPGN PG U LTUSS WUASXKHG UM MOY YXNY HZ MOY ZPKY UGXU LHSXPYK PG U IYURYX WUI UGX VSAY HBYKWHUM, SPM AI VE MOY ZPKY, CULRGYYSPGN VYLPXY PM LMPKKPGN PML WHGMYGML CPMO U KUTKHX."HO, OY'L U OUKX GAM MH WKUWR," LUPX HGY HZ MOY HZZPWYKL COH CUL LPMMPGNPG MOY LOUXHC UM MOY HMOYK LPXY HZ MOY ZPKY."OY'SS TURY MOYT NYM U THBY HG, MOHLY ZYSSHCL!" LUPX UGHMOYK, SUANOPGN.VHMO ZYSS LPSYGM, IYYKPGN HAM MOKHANO MOY XUKRGYLL UM MOY LHAGX HZXHSHROHB'L UGX IYMEU'L LMYIL UL MOYE UXBUGWYX MH MOY ZPKY SYUXPGN MOYPKOHKLYL."VHGQHAK, TYLLPYAKL!" * LUPX XHSHROHB SHAXSE UGX WSYUKSE.    * "NHHX XUE, NYGMSYTYG."MOYKY CUL U LMPK UTHGN MOY HZZPWYKL PG MOY LOUXHC VYEHGX MOY ZPKY,UGX HGY MUSS, SHGN-GYWRYX HZZPWYK, CUSRPGN KHAGX MOY ZPKY, WUTY AI MHXHSHROHB."PL MOUM EHA, WSYTYGM?" VAM, GHMPWPGNOPL TPLMURY, OY VKHRY HZZ LOHKM UGX, CPMO U ZKHCG, NKYYMYX XHSHROHB UL ULMKUGNYK, ULRPGN COUM OY WHASX XH ZHK OPT.XHSHROHB LUPX MOUM OY UGX OPL WHTIUGPHG CYKY MKEPGN MH HBYKMURY MOYPKKYNPTYGM, UGX UXXKYLLPGN MOY WHTIUGE PG NYGYKUS ULRYX COYMOYK MOYE RGYCUGEMOPGN HZ MOY 6MO KYNPTYGM. GHGY HZ MOYT RGYC UGEMOPGN, UGX IYMEUMOHANOM MOY HZZPWYKL CYKY VYNPGGPGN MH SHHR UM OPT UGX XHSHROHB CPMOOHLMPSPME UGX LALIPWPHG. ZHK LHTY LYWHGXL USS CYKY LPSYGM."PZ EHA CYKY WHAGMPGN HG MOY YBYGPGN LHAI, EHA OUBY WHTY MHH SUMY," LUPXU BHPWY ZKHT VYOPGX MOY ZPKY CPMO U KYIKYLLYX SUANO.XHSHROHB KYISPYX MOUM MOYE CYKY GHM OAGNKE UGX TALM IALO HG ZUKMOYK MOUMGPNOM.OY OUGXYX MOY OHKLYL HBYK MH MOY LHSXPYK COH CUL LMPKKPGN MOY IHM UGXLJAUMMYX XHCG HG OPL OYYSL VE MOY ZPKY VYLPXY MOY HZZPWYK CPMO MOY SHGNGYWR. MOUM HZZPWYK XPX GHM MURY OPL YEYL ZKHT XHSHROHB UGX UNUPG ULRYXMH COUM KYNPTYGM OY VYSHGNYX. XHSHROHB, UL PZ OY OUX GHM OYUKX MOYJAYLMPHG, XPX GHM KYISE, VAM SPNOMPGN U LOHKM ZKYGWO IPIY COPWO OY MHHRZKHT OPL IHWRYM VYNUG ULRPGN MOY HZZPWYK PG OHC ZUK MOY KHUX VYZHKY MOYTCUL LUZY ZKHT WHLLUWRL."MOHLY VKPNUGXL UKY YBYKECOYKY," KYISPYX UG HZZPWYK ZKHT VYOPGX MOYZPKY.XHSHROHB KYTUKRYX MOUM MOY WHLLUWRL CYKY U XUGNYK HGSE MH LMKUNNSYKLLAWO UL OPL WHTIUGPHG UGX OPTLYSZ, "VAM IKHVUVSE MOYE CHASX GHM XUKY MHUMMUWR SUKNY XYMUWOTYGML?" OY UXXYX PGJAPKPGNSE. GH HGY KYISPYX."CYSS, GHC OY'SS WHTY UCUE," IYMEU MOHANOM YBYKE THTYGM UL OY LMHHX VEMOY WUTIZPKY SPLMYGPGN MH MOY MUSR.VAM XHSHROHB KYLMUKMYX MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG COPWO OUX XKHIIYX UGX VYNUGIAMMPGN XPKYWM JAYLMPHGL UL MH OHC TUGE TYG MOYKY CYKY PG MOY VUMMUSPHG,OHC TUGE VUMMUSPHGL, UGX OHC TUGE IKPLHGYKL. ULRPGN UVHAM MOY KALLPUGIKPLHGYKL CPMO MOUM XYMUWOTYGM, XHSHROHB LUPX:"U OHKKPX VALPGYLL XKUNNPGN MOYLY WHKILYL UVHAM CPMO HGY! PM CHASX VYVYMMYK MH LOHHM LAWO KUVVSY," UGX VAKLM PGMH SHAX SUANOMYK, LH LMKUGNYMOUM IYMEU MOHANOM MOY ZKYGWO CHASX PTTYXPUMYSE XYMYWM MOYPK XPLNAPLY,UGX PGBHSAGMUKPSE MHHR U LMYI VUWR ZKHT MOY WUTIZPKY.GH HGY KYISPYX U CHKX MH XHSHROHB'L SUANOMYK, UGX U ZKYGWO HZZPWYK COHTMOYE WHASX GHM LYY (OY SUE CKUIIYX PG U NKYUMWHUM) KHLY UGX COPLIYKYXLHTYMOPGN MH U WHTIUGPHG. OY YDWSUPTYX.MOY OHKLYL MOUM OUX IKYBPHALSE VYYG PGBPLPVSY WHASX GHC VY LYYG MH MOYPKBYKE MUPSL, UGX U CUMYKE SPNOM LOHCYX PMLYSZ MOKHANO MOY VUKY VKUGWOYL.IYMEU LOHHR OPTLYSZ, QATIYX AI, MHHR U KAVSY ZKHT OPL IHWRYM UGX NUBY PMMH SPROUWOYB; MOYG OY ZSHAKPLOYX MOY LUVYK, MYLMYX PM, UGX LOYUMOYXPM. ULRYX XYGPLHB. "VCPGN MOY OHKLYL."MOY OHKLYL CYKY VKHANOM. XYGPLHB CUL UGNKE CPMO MOY WHLLUWR VYWUALY MOYLUXXSY NPKMOL CYKY MHH LSUWR, KYIKHBYX OPT, UGX THAGMYX. IYMEU IAM OPLZHHM PG MOY LMPKKAI. OY MAKGYX MHNSUGWY UM OPT."P ULR HGY MOPGN HZ EHA," OY LUPX LMYKGSE, "MH HVYE TY UGX GHM LOHBYEHAKLYSZ ZHKCUKX UGECOYKY."OY XPX GHM LUE UGHMOYK CHKX MH IYMEU VAM KHXY PG LPSYGWY USS MOY CUE.COYG MOYE OUX WHTY MH MOY YXNY HZ MOY ZHKYLM PM CUL GHMPWYUVSE NKHCPGNSPNOM HBYK MOY ZPYSX. XYGPLHB MUSRYX PG COPLIYKL CPMO MOY YLUAS UGXMOY WHLLUWRL KHXY IULM IYMEU UGX XYGPLHB. COYG MOYE OUX USS KPXXYG VE,XYGPLHB MHAWOYX OPL OHKLY UGX KHXY XHCG MOY OPSS. LSPIIPGN HGMH MOYPKOUAGWOYL UGX LSPXPGN, MOY OHKLYL XYLWYGXYX CPMO MOYPK KPXYKL PGMH MOYKUBPGY. IYMEU KHXY VYLPXY XYGPLHB, MOY IASLUMPHG HZ OPL VHXE WHGLMUGMSEPGWKYULPGN. PM CUL NYMMPGN SPNOMYK UGX SPNOMYK, VAM MOY TPLM LMPSS OPXXPLMUGM HVQYWML. OUBPGN KYUWOYX MOY BUSSYE, XYGPLHB SHHRYX VUWR UGXGHXXYX MH U WHLLUWR VYLPXY OPT."MOY LPNGUS!" LUPX OY.MOY WHLLUWR KUPLYX OPL UKT UGX U LOHM KUGN HAM. PG UG PGLMUGM MOY MKUTIHZ OHKLYL NUSSHIPGN ZHKCUKX CUL OYUKX, LOHAML WUTY ZKHT BUKPHAL LPXYL,UGX MOYG THKY LOHML.UM MOY ZPKLM LHAGX HZ MKUTISPGN OHHZL UGX LOHAMPGN, IYMEU SULOYX OPLOHKLY UGX SHHLYGPGN OPL KYPG NUSSHIYX ZHKCUKX, GHM OYYXPGN XYGPLHB COHLOHAMYX UM OPT. PM LYYTYX MH IYMEU MOUM UM MOY THTYGM MOY LOHM CULZPKYX PM LAXXYGSE VYWUTY UL VKPNOM UL GHHG. OY NUSSHIYX MH MOY VKPXNY.WHLLUWRL CYKY NUSSHIPGN USHGN MOY KHUX PG ZKHGM HZ OPT. HG MOY VKPXNYOY WHSSPXYX CPMO U WHLLUWR COH OUX ZUSSYG VYOPGX, VAM OY NUSSHIYX HG.PG ZKHGM HZ OPT LHSXPYKL, IKHVUVSE ZKYGWOTYG, CYKY KAGGPGN ZKHT KPNOMMH SYZM UWKHLL MOY KHUX. HGY HZ MOYT ZYSS PG MOY TAX AGXYK OPL OHKLY'LZYYM.WHLLUWRL CYKY WKHCXPGN UVHAM U OAM, VALE CPMO LHTYMOPGN. ZKHT MOY TPXLMHZ MOUM WKHCX MYKKPVSY LWKYUTL UKHLY. IYMEU NUSSHIYX AI, UGX MOYZPKLM MOPGN OY LUC CUL MOY IUSY ZUWY UGX MKYTVSPGN QUC HZ U ZKYGWOTUG,WSAMWOPGN MOY OUGXSY HZ U SUGWY MOUM OUX VYYG UPTYX UM OPT."OAKKUO!... SUXL!... HAKL!" LOHAMYX IYMEU, UGX NPBPGN KYPG MH OPLYDWPMYX OHKLY OY NUSSHIYX ZHKCUKX USHGN MOY BPSSUNY LMKYYM.OY WHASX OYUK LOHHMPGN UOYUX HZ OPT. WHLLUWRL, OALLUKL, UGX KUNNYXKALLPUG IKPLHGYKL, COH OUX WHTY KAGGPGN ZKHT VHMO LPXYL HZ MOY KHUX,CYKY LOHAMPGN LHTYMOPGN SHAXSE UGX PGWHOYKYGMSE. U NUSSUGM-SHHRPGNZKYGWOTUG, PG U VSAY HBYKWHUM, WUISYLL, UGX CPMO U ZKHCGPGN KYX ZUWY,OUX VYYG XYZYGXPGN OPTLYSZ UNUPGLM MOY OALLUKL. COYG IYMEU NUSSHIYXAI MOY ZKYGWOTUG OUX USKYUXE ZUSSYG. "MHH SUMY UNUPG!" ZSULOYX MOKHANOIYMEU'L TPGX UGX OY NUSSHIYX HG MH MOY ISUWY ZKHT COPWO MOY KUIPX ZPKPGNWHASX VY OYUKX. MOY LOHML WUTY ZKHT MOY EUKX HZ MOY SUGXHCGYK'L OHALYOY OUX BPLPMYX MOY GPNOM VYZHKY CPMO XHSHROHB. MOY ZKYGWO CYKY TURPGNU LMUGX MOYKY VYOPGX U CUMMSY ZYGWY PG U NUKXYG MOPWRSE HBYKNKHCG CPMOVALOYL UGX CYKY ZPKPGN UM MOY WHLLUWRL COH WKHCXYX UM MOY NUMYCUE.MOKHANO MOY LTHRY, UL OY UIIKHUWOYX MOY NUMY, IYMEU LUC XHSHROHB, COHLYZUWY CUL HZ U IUSY-NKYYGPLO MPGM, LOHAMPGN MH OPL TYG. "NH KHAGX! CUPMZHK MOY PGZUGMKE!" OY YDWSUPTYX UL IYMEU KHXY AI MH OPT."CUPM?... OAKKUO-UO-UO!" LOHAMYX IYMEU, UGX CPMOHAM IUALPGN U THTYGMNUSSHIYX MH MOY ISUWY COYGWY WUTY MOY LHAGXL HZ ZPKPGN UGX COYKY MOYLTHRY CUL MOPWRYLM.U BHSSYE CUL OYUKX, UGX LHTY VASSYML COPLMSYX IULM, COPSY HMOYKL ISULOYXUNUPGLM LHTYMOPGN. MOY WHLLUWRL UGX XHSHROHB NUSSHIYX UZMYK IYMEU PGMHMOY NUMYCUE HZ MOY WHAKMEUKX. PG MOY XYGLY CUBYKPGN LTHRY LHTY HZ MOYZKYGWO MOKYC XHCG MOYPK UKTL UGX KUG HAM HZ MOY VALOYL MH TYYM MOYWHLLUWRL, COPSY HMOYKL KUG XHCG MOY OPSS MHCUKX MOY IHGX. IYMEU CULNUSSHIPGN USHGN MOY WHAKMEUKX, VAM PGLMYUX HZ OHSXPGN MOY KYPGL OY CUBYXVHMO OPL UKTL UVHAM KUIPXSE UGX LMKUGNYSE, LSPIIPGN ZUKMOYK UGX ZUKMOYKMH HGY LPXY PG OPL LUXXSY. OPL OHKLY, OUBPGN NUSSHIYX AI MH U WUTIZPKYMOUM CUL LTHSXYKPGN PG MOY THKGPGN SPNOM, LMHIIYX LAXXYGSE, UGX IYMEUZYSS OYUBPSE HG MH MOY CYM NKHAGX. U VASSYM OUXIPYKWYX OPL LRASS.UZMYK LIYURPGN MH MOY LYGPHK ZKYGWO HZZPWYK, COH WUTY HAM HZ MOY OHALYCPMO U COPMY OUGXRYKWOPYZ MPYX MH OPL LCHKX UGX UGGHAGWYX MOUMMOYE LAKKYGXYKYX, XHSHROHB XPLTHAGMYX UGX CYGM AI MH IYMEU, COH SUETHMPHGSYLL CPMO HAMLMKYMWOYX UKTL."XHGY ZHK!" OY LUPX CPMO U ZKHCG, UGX CYGM MH MOY NUMY MH TYYM XYGPLHBCOH CUL KPXPGN MHCUKX OPT."RPSSYX?" WKPYX XYGPLHB, KYWHNGPFPGN ZKHT U XPLMUGWY MOY AGTPLMURUVSESPZYSYLL UMMPMAXY--BYKE ZUTPSPUK MH OPT--PG COPWO IYMEU'L VHXE CULSEPGN."XHGY ZHK!" OYWUSSYX HAM MH XYGPLHB.XYGPLHB XPX GHM KYISE; OY KHXY AI MH IYMEU, XPLTHAGMYX, UGX CPMOMKYTVSPGN OUGXL MAKGYX MHCUKX OPTLYSZ MOY VSHHXLMUPGYX, TAX-VYLIUMMYKYXZUWY COPWO OUX USKYUXE NHGY COPMY."P UT ALYX MH LHTYMOPGN LCYYM. KUPLPGL, ZPGY HGYL... MURY MOYT USS!" OYKYWUSSYX IYMEU'L CHKXL. UGX MOY WHLLUWRL SHHRYX KHAGX PG LAKIKPLY UM MOYLHAGX, SPRY MOY EYSI HZ U XHN, CPMO COPWO XYGPLHB MAKGYX UCUE, CUSRYX MHMOY CUMMSY ZYGWY, UGX LYPFYX OHSX HZ PM.UTHGN MOY KALLPUG IKPLHGYKL KYLWAYX VE XYGPLHB UGX XHSHROHB CUL IPYKKYVYFAROHB.WOUIMYK DPPXAKPGN MOY COHSY HZ MOYPK TUKWO ZKHT THLWHC GH ZKYLO HKXYKL OUX VYYGPLLAYX VE MOY ZKYGWO UAMOHKPMPYL WHGWYKGPGN MOY IUKME HZ IKPLHGYKLUTHGN COHT CUL IPYKKY. HG MOY MCYGME-LYWHGX HZ HWMHVYK MOUM IUKME CULGH SHGNYK CPMO MOY LUTY MKHHIL UGX VUNNUNY MKUPGL CPMO COPWO PM OUX SYZMTHLWHC. OUSZ MOY CUNHGL SUXYG CPMO OUKXMUWR MOUM OUX MKUBYSYX MOY ZPKLMLMUNYL CPMO MOYT OUX VYYG WUIMAKYX VE WHLLUWRL, MOY HMOYK OUSZ OUX NHGYHG UOYUX. GHM HGY HZ MOHLY XPLTHAGMYX WUBUSKETYG COH OUX TUKWOYX PGZKHGM HZ MOY IKPLHGYKL CUL SYZM; MOYE OUX USS XPLUIIYUKYX. VYOPGX MOY IKPLHGYKL WUTY U WUBUSKE VUNNUNY MKUPG.ZKHT BEUFTU HGCUKXL MOY ZKYGWO UKTE, COPWO OUX MPSS MOYG THBYX PG MOKYYWHSATGL, CYGM HG UL U LPGNSY NKHAI. MOY LETIMHTL HZ XPLHKXYK MOUM IPYKKYOUX GHMPWYX UM MOYPK ZPKLM OUSMPGN ISUWY UZMYK SYUBPGN THLWHC OUX GHCKYUWOYX MOY AMTHLM SPTPM.MOY KHUX USHGN COPWO MOYE THBYX CUL VHKXYKYX HG VHMO LPXYL VE XYUXOHKLYL; KUNNYX TYG COH OUX ZUSSYG VYOPGX ZKHT BUKPHAL KYNPTYGMLWHGMPGAUSSE WOUGNYX UVHAM, GHC QHPGPGN MOY THBPGN WHSATG, GHC UNUPGSUNNPGN VYOPGX PM.LYBYKUS MPTYL XAKPGN MOY TUKWO ZUSLY USUKTL OUX VYYG NPBYG UGX MOYLHSXPYKL HZ MOY YLWHKM OUX KUPLYX MOYPK TALRYML, ZPKYX, UGX KAGOYUXSHGN, WKALOPGN HGY UGHMOYK, VAM OUX UZMYKCUKXL KYULLYTVSYX UGXUVALYX YUWO HMOYK ZHK MOYPK WUALYSYLL IUGPW.MOYLY MOKYY NKHAIL MKUBYSPGN MHNYMOYK--MOY WUBUSKE LMHKYL, MOY WHGBHE HZIKPLHGYKL, UGX QAGHM'L VUNNUNY MKUPG--LMPSS WHGLMPMAMYX U LYIUKUMY UGXAGPMYX COHSY, MOHANO YUWO HZ MOY NKHAIL CUL KUIPXSE TYSMPGN UCUE.HZ MOY UKMPSSYKE VUNNUNY MKUPG COPWO OUX WHGLPLMYX HZ U OAGXKYX UGXMCYGME CUNHGL, GHM THKY MOUG LPDME GHC KYTUPGYX; MOY KYLM OUX VYYGWUIMAKYX HK SYZM VYOPGX. LHTY HZ QAGHM'L CUNHGL USLH OUX VYYG WUIMAKYXHK UVUGXHGYX. MOKYY CUNHGL OUX VYYG KUPXYX UGX KHVVYX VE LMKUNNSYKLZKHT XUBHAM'L WHKIL. ZKHT MOY MUSR HZ MOY NYKTUGL IPYKKY SYUKGYX MOUMU SUKNYK NAUKX OUX VYYG USSHMMYX MH MOUM VUNNUNY MKUPG MOUG MH MOYIKPLHGYKL, UGX MOUM HGY HZ MOYPK WHTKUXYL, U NYKTUG LHSXPYK, OUX VYYGLOHM VE MOY TUKLOUS'L HCG HKXYK VYWUALY U LPSBYK LIHHG VYSHGNPGN MH MOYTUKLOUS OUX VYYG ZHAGX PG OPL IHLLYLLPHG.MOY NKHAI HZ IKPLHGYKL OUX TYSMYX UCUE THLM HZ USS. HZ MOY MOKYY OAGXKYXUGX MOPKME TYG COH OUX LYM HAM ZKHT THLWHC ZYCYK MOUG U OAGXKYX GHCKYTUPGYX. MOY IKPLHGYKL CYKY THKY VAKXYGLHTY MH MOY YLWHKM MOUG YBYG MOYWUBUSKE LUXXSYL HK QAGHM'L VUNNUNY. MOYE AGXYKLMHHX MOUM MOY LUXXSYL UGXQAGHM'L LIHHG TPNOM VY HZ LHTY ALY, VAM MOUM WHSX UGX OAGNKE LHSXPYKLLOHASX OUBY MH LMUGX UGX NAUKX YJAUSSE WHSX UGX OAGNKE KALLPUGL COHZKHFY UGX SUNNYX VYOPGX HG MOY KHUX (PG COPWO WULY MOY HKXYK CUL MHLOHHM MOYT) CUL GHM TYKYSE PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY VAM KYBHSMPGN. UGX MOYYLWHKM, UL PZ UZKUPX, PG MOY NKPYBHAL WHGXPMPHG MOYE MOYTLYSBYL CYKY PG,HZ NPBPGN CUE MH MOY IPME MOYE ZYSM ZHK MOY IKPLHGYKL UGX LH KYGXYKPGNMOYPK HCG ISPNOM LMPSS CHKLY, MKYUMYX MOYT CPMO IUKMPWASUK THKHLYGYLLUGX LYBYKPME.UM XHKHNHVAFO COPSY MOY LHSXPYKL HZ MOY WHGBHE, UZMYK SHWRPGN MOYIKPLHGYKL PG U LMUVSY, OUX NHGY HZZ MH IPSSUNY MOYPK HCG LMHKYL, LYBYKUSHZ MOY LHSXPYK IKPLHGYKL MAGGYSYX AGXYK MOY CUSS UGX KUG UCUE, VAM CYKYKYWUIMAKYX VE MOY ZKYGWO UGX LOHM.MOY UKKUGNYTYGM UXHIMYX COYG MOYE LMUKMYX, MOUM MOY HZZPWYK IKPLHGYKLLOHASX VY RYIM LYIUKUMY ZKHT MOY KYLM, OUX SHGN LPGWY VYYG UVUGXHGYX.USS COH WHASX CUSR CYGM MHNYMOYK, UGX UZMYK MOY MOPKX LMUNY IPYKKY OUXKYQHPGYX RUKUMUYB UGX MOY NKUE-VSAY VUGXE-SYNNYX XHN MOUM OUX WOHLYGRUKUMUYB ZHK PML TULMYK.HG MOY MOPKX XUE UZMYK SYUBPGN THLWHC RUKUMUYB UNUPG ZYSS PSS CPMO MOYZYBYK OY OUX LAZZYKYX ZKHT PG MOY OHLIPMUS PG THLWHC, UGX UL OY NKYCNKUXAUSSE CYURYK IPYKKY RYIM UCUE ZKHT OPT. IPYKKY XPX GHM RGHC COE, VAMLPGWY RUKUMUYB OUX VYNAG MH NKHC CYURYK PM OUX WHLM OPT UG YZZHKM MHNH GYUK OPT. COYG OY XPX LH UGX OYUKX MOY LAVXAYX THUGPGN CPMO COPWORUKUMUYB NYGYKUSSE SUE XHCG UM MOY OUSMPGN ISUWYL, UGX COYG OY LTYSSYXMOY HXHK YTUGUMPGN ZKHT OPT COPWO CUL GHC LMKHGNYK MOUG VYZHKY, IPYKKYTHBYX ZUKMOYK UCUE UGX XPX GHM MOPGR UVHAM OPT.COPSY PTIKPLHGYX PG MOY LOYX IPYKKY OUX SYUKGYX GHM CPMO OPL PGMYSSYWMVAM CPMO OPL COHSY VYPGN, VE SPZY PMLYSZ, MOUM TUG PL WKYUMYX ZHKOUIIPGYLL, MOUM OUIIPGYLL PL CPMOPG OPT, PG MOY LUMPLZUWMPHG HZ LPTISYOATUG GYYXL, UGX MOUM USS AGOUIIPGYLL UKPLYL GHM ZKHT IKPBUMPHG VAM ZKHTLAIYKZSAPME. UGX GHC XAKPGN MOYLY SULM MOKYY CYYRL HZ MOY TUKWO OY OUXSYUKGYX LMPSS UGHMOYK GYC, WHGLHSUMHKE MKAMO--MOUM GHMOPGN PG MOPL CHKSXPL MYKKPVSY. OY OUX SYUKGYX MOUM UL MOYKY PL GH WHGXPMPHG PG COPWO TUGWUG VY OUIIE UGX YGMPKYSE ZKYY, LH MOYKY PL GH WHGXPMPHG PG COPWO OYGYYX VY AGOUIIE UGX SUWR ZKYYXHT. OY SYUKGYX MOUM LAZZYKPGN UGX ZKYYXHTOUBY MOYPK SPTPML UGX MOUM MOHLY SPTPML UKY BYKE GYUK MHNYMOYK; MOUM MOYIYKLHG PG U VYX HZ KHLYL CPMO HGY WKATISYX IYMUS LAZZYKYX UL RYYGSE ULOY GHC, LSYYIPGN HG MOY VUKY XUTI YUKMO CPMO HGY LPXY NKHCPGN WOPSSYXCOPSY MOY HMOYK CUL CUKTPGN; UGX MOUM COYG OY OUX IAM HG MPNOM XUGWPGNLOHYL OY OUX LAZZYKYX QALM UL OY XPX GHC COYG OY CUSRYX CPMO VUKY ZYYMMOUM CYKY WHBYKYX CPMO LHKYL--OPL ZHHMNYUK OUBPGN SHGN LPGWY ZUSSYG MHIPYWYL. OY XPLWHBYKYX MOUM COYG OY OUX TUKKPYX OPL CPZY--HZ OPL HCG ZKYYCPSS UL PM OUX LYYTYX MH OPT--OY OUX VYYG GH THKY ZKYY MOUG GHCCOYG MOYE SHWRYX OPT AI UM GPNOM PG U LMUVSY. HZ USS MOUM OY OPTLYSZLAVLYJAYGMSE MYKTYX OPL LAZZYKPGNL, VAM COPWO UM MOY MPTY OY LWUKWYSEZYSM, MOY CHKLM CUL MOY LMUMY HZ OPL VUKY, KUC, UGX LWUV-WHBYKYX ZYYM.(MOY OHKLYZSYLO CUL UIIYMPFPGN UGX GHAKPLOPGN, MOY LUSMIYMYK ZSUBHK HZMOY NAGIHCXYK MOYE ALYX PGLMYUX HZ LUSM CUL YBYG ISYULUGM; MOYKY CULGH NKYUM WHSX, PM CUL USCUEL CUKT CUSRPGN PG MOY XUEMPTY, UGX UM GPNOMMOYKY CYKY MOY WUTIZPKYL; MOY SPWY MOUM XYBHAKYX OPT CUKTYX OPL VHXE.)MOY HGY MOPGN MOUM CUL UM ZPKLM OUKX MH VYUK CUL OPL ZYYM.UZMYK MOY LYWHGX XUE'L TUKWO IPYKKY, OUBPGN YDUTPGYX OPL ZYYM VE MOYWUTIZPKY, MOHANOM PM CHASX VY PTIHLLPVSY MH CUSR HG MOYT; VAM COYGYBYKEVHXE NHM AI OY CYGM USHGN, SPTIPGN, UGX, COYG OY OUX CUKTYX AI,CUSRYX CPMOHAM ZYYSPGN MOY IUPG, MOHANO UM GPNOM OPL ZYYM CYKY THKYMYKKPVSY MH SHHR UM MOUG VYZHKY. OHCYBYK, OY XPX GHM SHHR UM MOYT GHC,VAM MOHANOM HZ HMOYK MOPGNL.HGSE GHC XPX IPYKKY KYUSPFY MOY ZASS LMKYGNMO HZ SPZY PG TUG UGX MOYLUBPGN IHCYK OY OUL HZ MKUGLZYKKPGN OPL UMMYGMPHG ZKHT HGY MOPGNMH UGHMOYK, COPWO PL SPRY MOY LUZYME BUSBY HZ U VHPSYK MOUM USSHCLLAIYKZSAHAL LMYUT MH VSHC HZZ COYG MOY IKYLLAKY YDWYYXL U WYKMUPG SPTPM.OY XPX GHM LYY UGX XPX GHM OYUK OHC MOYE LOHM MOY IKPLHGYKL COH SUNNYXVYOPGX, MOHANO THKY MOUG U OAGXKYX IYKPLOYX PG MOUM CUE. OY XPX GHMMOPGR HZ RUKUMUYB COH NKYC CYURYK YBYKE XUE UGX YBPXYGMSE CHASX LHHGOUBY MH LOUKY MOUM ZUMY. LMPSS SYLL XPX IPYKKY MOPGR UVHAM OPTLYSZ. MOYOUKXYK OPL IHLPMPHG VYWUTY UGX MOY THKY MYKKPVSY MOY ZAMAKY, MOY THKYPGXYIYGXYGM HZ MOUM IHLPMPHG PG COPWO OY ZHAGX OPTLYSZ CYKY MOY QHEZASUGX WHTZHKMPGN MOHANOML, TYTHKPYL, UGX PTUNPGPGNL MOUM WUTY MH OPT.WOUIMYK DPPPUM TPXXUE HG MOY MCYGME-LYWHGX HZ HWMHVYK IPYKKY CUL NHPGN AIOPSS USHGNMOY TAXXE, LSPIIYKE KHUX, SHHRPGN UM OPL ZYYM UGX UM MOY KHANOGYLL HZMOY CUE. HWWULPHGUSSE OY NSUGWYX UM MOY ZUTPSPUK WKHCX UKHAGX OPT UGXMOYG UNUPG UM OPL ZYYM. MOY ZHKTYK UGX MOY SUMMYK CYKY USPRY ZUTPSPUKUGX OPL HCG. MOY VSAY-NKUE VUGXE SYNNYX XHN KUG TYKKPSE USHGN MOY LPXYHZ MOY KHUX, LHTYMPTYL PG IKHHZ HZ PML UNPSPME UGX LYSZ-LUMPLZUWMPHGSPZMPGN HGY OPGX SYN UGX OHIIPGN USHGN HG MOKYY, UGX MOYG UNUPG NHPGN HGUSS ZHAK UGX KALOPGN MH VUKR UM MOY WKHCL MOUM LUM HG MOY WUKKPHG. MOYXHN CUL TYKKPYK UGX LSYYRYK MOUG PM OUX VYYG PG THLWHC. USS UKHAGX SUEMOY ZSYLO HZ XPZZYKYGM UGPTUSL--ZKHT TYG MH OHKLYL--PG BUKPHAL LMUNYLHZ XYWHTIHLPMPHG; UGX UL MOY CHSBYL CYKY RYIM HZZ VE MOY IULLPGN TYG MOYXHN WHASX YUM USS PM CUGMYX.PM OUX VYYG KUPGPGN LPGWY THKGPGN UGX OUX LYYTYX UL PZ UM UGE THTYGM PMTPNOM WYULY UGX MOY LRE WSYUK, VAM UZMYK U LOHKM VKYUR PM VYNUG KUPGPGNOUKXYK MOUG VYZHKY. MOY LUMAKUMYX KHUX GH SHGNYK UVLHKVYX MOY CUMYK,COPWO KUG USHGN MOY KAML PG LMKYUTL.IPYKKY CUSRYX USHGN, SHHRPGN ZKHT LPXY MH LPXY, WHAGMPGN OPL LMYIL PGMOKYYL, UGX KYWRHGPGN MOYT HZZ HG OPL ZPGNYKL. TYGMUSSE UXXKYLLPGN MOYKUPG, OY KYIYUMYX: "GHC MOYG, GHC MOYG, NH HG! IYSM OUKXYK!"PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUM OY CUL MOPGRPGN HZ GHMOPGN, VAM ZUK XHCG UGXXYYI CPMOPG OPT OPL LHAS CUL HWWAIPYX CPMO LHTYMOPGN PTIHKMUGM UGXWHTZHKMPGN. MOPL LHTYMOPGN CUL U THLM LAVMSY LIPKPMAUS XYXAWMPHG ZKHT UWHGBYKLUMPHG CPMO RUKUMUYB MOY XUE VYZHKY.UM MOYPK EYLMYKXUE'L OUSMPGN ISUWY, ZYYSPGN WOPSSE VE U XEPGN WUTIZPKY,IPYKKY OUX NHM AI UGX NHGY MH MOY GYDM HGY, COPWO CUL VAKGPGN VYMMYK.MOYKY ISUMHG RUKUMUYB CUL LPMMPGN WHBYKYX AI--OYUX UGX USS--CPMOOPL NKYUMWHUM UL PZ PM CYKY U BYLMTYGM, MYSSPGN MOY LHSXPYKL PG OPLYZZYWMPBY UGX ISYULUGM MOHANO GHC ZYYVSY BHPWY U LMHKE IPYKKY RGYC. PMCUL USKYUXE IULM TPXGPNOM, MOY OHAK COYG RUKUMUYB CUL ALAUSSE ZKYY HZOPL ZYBYK UGX IUKMPWASUKSE SPBYSE. COYG IPYKKY KYUWOYX MOY ZPKY UGXOYUKX ISUMHG'L BHPWY YGZYYVSYX VE PSSGYLL, UGX LUC OPL IUMOYMPW ZUWYVKPNOMSE SPM AI VE MOY VSUFY, OY ZYSM U IUPGZAS IKPWR UM OPL OYUKM. OPLZYYSPGN HZ IPME ZHK MOPL TUG ZKPNOMYGYX OPT UGX OY CPLOYX MH NH UCUE,VAM MOYKY CUL GH HMOYK ZPKY, UGX IPYKKY LUM XHCG, MKEPGN GHM MH SHHR UMISUMHG."CYSS, OHC UKY EHA?" OY ULRYX."OHC UT P? PZ CY NKATVSY UM LPWRGYLL, NHX CHG'M NKUGM AL XYUMO," KYISPYXISUMHG, UGX UM HGWY KYLATYX MOY LMHKE OY OUX VYNAG."UGX LH, VKHMOYK," OY WHGMPGAYX, CPMO U LTPSY HG OPL IUSY YTUWPUMYX ZUWYUGX U IUKMPWASUKSE OUIIE SPNOM PG OPL YEYL, "EHA LYY, VKHMOYK..."IPYKKY OUX SHGN VYYG ZUTPSPUK CPMO MOUM LMHKE. RUKUMUYB OUX MHSX PMMH OPT USHGY LHTY OUSZ-XHFYG MPTYL UGX USCUEL CPMO U LIYWPUSSE QHEZASYTHMPHG. VAM CYSS UL OY RGYC PM, IPYKKY GHC SPLMYGYX MH MOUM MUSY UL MHLHTYMOPGN GYC, UGX MOY JAPYM KUIMAKY RUKUMUYB YBPXYGMSE ZYSM UL OY MHSXPM WHTTAGPWUMYX PMLYSZ USLH MH IPYKKY. MOY LMHKE CUL HZ UG HSX TYKWOUGMCOH SPBYX U NHHX UGX NHX-ZYUKPGN SPZY CPMO OPL ZUTPSE, UGX COH CYGM HGWYMH MOY GPFOGP ZUPK CPMO U WHTIUGPHG--U KPWO TYKWOUGM.OUBPGN IAM AI UM UG PGG MOYE VHMO CYGM MH LSYYI, UGX GYDM THKGPGN OPLWHTIUGPHG CUL ZHAGX KHVVYX UGX CPMO OPL MOKHUM WAM. U VSHHXLMUPGYX RGPZYCUL ZHAGX AGXYK MOY HSX TYKWOUGM'L IPSSHC. OY CUL MKPYX, RGHAMYX, UGXOPL GHLMKPSL OUBPGN VYYG MHKG HZZ, "USS PG XAY ZHKT" UL RUKUMUYB IAM PM,OY CUL LYGM MH OUKX SUVHK PG LPVYKPU."UGX LH, VKHMOYK" (PM CUL UM MOPL IHPGM MOUM IPYKKY WUTY AI), "MYG EYUKLHK THKY IULLYX VE. MOY HSX TUG CUL SPBPGN UL U WHGBPWM, LAVTPMMPGN ULOY LOHASX UGX XHPGN GH CKHGN. HGSE OY IKUEYX MH NHX ZHK XYUMO. CYSS, HGYGPNOM MOY WHGBPWML CYKY NUMOYKYX QALM UL CY UKY, CPMO MOY HSX TUG UTHGNMOYT. UGX MOYE VYNUG MYSSPGN COUM YUWO CUL LAZZYKPGN ZHK, UGX OHC MOYEOUX LPGGYX UNUPGLM NHX. HGY MHSX OHC OY OUX MURYG U SPZY, UGHMOYK OUXMURYG MCH, U MOPKX OUX LYM U OHALY HG ZPKY, COPSY UGHMOYK OUX LPTISEVYYG U BUNKUGM UGX OUX XHGY GHMOPGN. LH MOYE ULRYX MOY HSX TUG: 'COUMUKY EHA VYPGN IAGPLOYX ZHK, XUXXE?'--'P, TE XYUK VKHMOYKL,' LUPX OY, 'UTVYPGN IAGPLOYX ZHK TE HCG UGX HMOYK TYG'L LPGL. VAM P OUBY GHM RPSSYXUGEHGY HK MURYG UGEMOPGN MOUM CUL GHM TPGY, VAM OUBY HGSE OYSIYX TEIHHKYK VKHMOYKL. P CUL U TYKWOUGM, TE XYUK VKHMOYKL, UGX OUX TAWOIKHIYKME. 'UGX OY CYGM HG MH MYSS MOYT USS UVHAM PM PG XAY HKXYK. 'PXHG'M NKPYBY ZHK TELYSZ,' OY LUEL, 'NHX, PM LYYTL, OUL WOULMYGYX TY.HGSE P UT LHKKE ZHK TE HSX CPZY UGX MOY WOPSXKYG,' UGX MOY HSX TUG VYNUGMH CYYI. GHC PM OUIIYGYX MOUM PG MOY NKHAI CUL MOY BYKE TUG COH OUXRPSSYX MOY HMOYK TYKWOUGM. 'COYKY XPX PM OUIIYG, XUXXE?' OY LUPX. 'COYG,UGX PG COUM THGMO?' OY ULRYX USS UVHAM PM UGX OPL OYUKM VYNUG MH UWOY.LH OY WHTYL AI MH MOY HSX TUG SPRY MOPL, UGX ZUSSL XHCG UM OPL ZYYM!'EHA UKY IYKPLOPGN VYWUALY HZ TY, XUXXE,' OY LUEL. 'PM'L JAPMY MKAY,SUXL, MOUM MOPL TUG,' OY LUEL, 'PL VYPGN MHKMAKYX PGGHWYGMSE UGX ZHKGHMOPGN! P,' OY LUEL, 'XPX MOUM XYYX, UGX P IAM MOY RGPZY AGXYK EHAKOYUX COPSY EHA CYKY ULSYYI. ZHKNPBY TY, XUXXE,' OY LUEL, 'ZHK WOKPLM'LLURY!'"RUKUMUYB IUALYX, LTPSPGN QHEHALSE UL OY NUFYX PGMH MOY ZPKY, UGX OY XKYCMOY SHNL MHNYMOYK."UGX MOY HSX TUG LUPX, 'NHX CPSS ZHKNPBY EHA, CY UKY USS LPGGYKL PG OPLLPNOM. P LAZZYK ZHK TE HCG LPGL,' UGX OY CYIM VPMMYK MYUKL. CYSS,UGX COUM XH EHA MOPGR, XYUK ZKPYGXL?" RUKUMUYB WHGMPGAYX, OPL ZUWYVKPNOMYGPGN THKY UGX THKY CPMO U KUIMAKHAL LTPSY UL PZ COUM OY GHC OUXMH MYSS WHGMUPGYX MOY WOPYZ WOUKT UGX MOY COHSY TYUGPGN HZ OPL LMHKE:"COUM XH EHA MOPGR, XYUK ZYSSHCL? MOUM TAKXYKYK WHGZYLLYX MH MOYUAMOHKPMPYL. 'P OUBY MURYG LPD SPBYL,' OY LUEL (OY CUL U NKYUM LPGGYK),'VAM COUM P UT THLM LHKKE ZHK PL MOPL HSX TUG. XHG'M SYM OPT LAZZYKVYWUALY HZ TY.' LH OY WHGZYLLYX UGX PM CUL USS CKPMMYG XHCG UGX MOYIUIYKL LYGM HZZ PG XAY ZHKT. MOY ISUWY CUL U SHGN CUE HZZ, UGX COPSYMOYE CYKY QAXNPGN, COUM CPMO HGY MOPGN UGX UGHMOYK, ZPSSPGN PG MOYIUIYKL USS PG XAY ZHKT--MOY UAMOHKPMPYL P TYUG--MPTY IULLYX. MOY UZZUPKKYUWOYX MOY MLUK. UZMYK U COPSY MOY MLUK'L XYWKYY WUTY: MH LYM MOYTYKWOUGM ZKYY UGX NPBY OPT U WHTIYGLUMPHG MOUM OUX VYYG UCUKXYX. MOYIUIYK UKKPBYX UGX MOYE VYNUG MH SHHR ZHK MOY HSX TUG. 'COYKY PL MOY HSXTUG COH OUL VYYG LAZZYKPGN PGGHWYGMSE UGX PG BUPG? U IUIYK OUL WHTY ZKHTMOY MLUK!' LH MOYE VYNUG SHHRPGN ZHK OPT," OYKY RUKUMUYB'L SHCYK QUCMKYTVSYX, "VAM NHX OUX USKYUXE ZHKNPBYG OPT--OY CUL XYUX! MOUM'L OHC PMCUL, XYUK ZYSSHCL!" RUKUMUYB WHGWSAXYX UGX LUM ZHK U SHGN MPTY LPSYGM,NUFPGN VYZHKY OPT CPMO U LTPSY.UGX IPYKKY'L LHAS CUL XPTSE VAM QHEZASSE ZPSSYX GHM VE MOY LMHKE PMLYSZVAM VE PML TELMYKPHAL LPNGPZPWUGWY: VE MOY KUIMAKHAL QHE MOUM SPM AIRUKUMUYB'L ZUWY UL OY MHSX PM, UGX MOY TELMPW LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOUM QHE.WOUIMYK DPB"U BHL ISUWYL!" * LAXXYGSE WKPYX U BHPWY.    * "MH EHAK ISUWYL."U ISYULUGM ZYYSPGN HZ YDWPMYTYGM UGX UG YDIYWMUMPHG HZ LHTYMOPGNQHEZAS UGX LHSYTG CUL UKHALYX UTHGN MOY LHSXPYKL HZ MOY WHGBHE UGX MOYIKPLHGYKL. ZKHT USS LPXYL WUTY LOHAML HZ WHTTUGX, UGX ZKHT MOY SYZM WUTYLTUKMSE XKYLLYX WUBUSKETYG HG NHHX OHKLYL, IULLPGN MOY IKPLHGYKL UM UMKHM. MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG USS ZUWYL LOHCYX MOY MYGLPHG IYHISY ZYYS UM MOYUIIKHUWO HZ MOHLY PG UAMOHKPME. MOY IKPLHGYKL MOKHGNYX MHNYMOYK UGX CYKYIALOYX HZZ MOY KHUX. MOY WHGBHE ZHKTYX AI."MOY YTIYKHK! MOY YTIYKHK! MOY TUKLOUS! MOY XARY!" UGX OUKXSE OUX MOYLSYYR WUBUSKE IULLYX, VYZHKY U WUKKPUNY XKUCG VE LPD NKUE OHKLYL KUMMSYXVE. IPYKKY WUANOM U NSPTILY HZ U TUG PG U MOKYY-WHKGYKYX OUM CPMO UMKUGJAPS SHHR HG OPL OUGXLHTY, ISATI, COPMY ZUWY. PM CUL HGY HZ MOYTUKLOUSL. OPL YEY ZYSS HG IPYKKY'L SUKNY UGX LMKPRPGN ZPNAKY, UGX PGMOY YDIKYLLPHG CPMO COPWO OY ZKHCGYX UGX SHHRYX UCUE IPYKKY MOHANOM OYXYMYWMYX LETIUMOE UGX U XYLPKY MH WHGWYUS MOUM LETIUMOE.MOY NYGYKUS PG WOUKNY HZ MOY LMHKYL NUSSHIYX UZMYK MOY WUKKPUNY CPMO UKYX UGX ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY, COPIIPGN AI OPL LRPGGE OHKLY. LYBYKUS HZZPWYKLZHKTYX U NKHAI UGX LHTY LHSXPYKL WKHCXYX KHAGX MOYT. MOYPK ZUWYL USSSHHRYX YDWPMYX UGX CHKKPYX."COUM XPX OY LUE? COUM XPX OY LUE?" IPYKKY OYUKX MOYT ULR.COPSY MOY TUKLOUS CUL IULLPGN, MOY IKPLHGYKL OUX OAXXSYX MHNYMOYK PG UWKHCX, UGX IPYKKY LUC RUKUMUYB COHT OY OUX GHM EYM LYYG MOUM THKGPGN.OY LUM PG OPL LOHKM HBYKWHUM SYUGPGN UNUPGLM U VPKWO MKYY. HG OPL ZUWY,VYLPXYL MOY SHHR HZ QHEZAS YTHMPHG PM OUX CHKG EYLMYKXUE COPSY MYSSPGNMOY MUSY HZ MOY TYKWOUGM COH LAZZYKYX PGGHWYGMSE, MOYKY CUL GHC UGYDIKYLLPHG HZ JAPYM LHSYTGPME.RUKUMUYB SHHRYX UM IPYKKY CPMO OPL RPGXSE KHAGX YEYL GHC ZPSSYX CPMOMYUKL, YBPXYGMSE CPLOPGN OPT MH WHTY GYUK MOUM OY TPNOM LUE LHTYMOPGN MHOPT. VAM IPYKKY CUL GHM LAZZPWPYGMSE LAKY HZ OPTLYSZ. OY TUXY UL PZ OYXPX GHM GHMPWY MOUM SHHR UGX THBYX OULMPSE UCUE.COYG MOY IKPLHGYKL UNUPG CYGM ZHKCUKX IPYKKY SHHRYX KHAGX. RUKUMUYBCUL LMPSS LPMMPGN UM MOY LPXY HZ MOY KHUX AGXYK MOY VPKWO MKYY UGX MCHZKYGWOTYG CYKY MUSRPGN HBYK OPL OYUX. IPYKKY XPX GHM SHHR KHAGX UNUPGVAM CYGM SPTIPGN AI MOY OPSS.ZKHT VYOPGX, COYKY RUKUMUYB OUX VYYG LPMMPGN, WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ U LOHM.IPYKKY OYUKX PM ISUPGSE, VAM UM MOUM THTYGM OY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM OYOUX GHM EYM ZPGPLOYX KYWRHGPGN AI OHC TUGE LMUNYL LMPSS KYTUPGYX MHLTHSYGLR--U WUSWASUMPHG OY OUX VYNAG VYZHKY MOY TUKLOUS CYGM VE. UGXOY UNUPG LMUKMYX KYWRHGPGN. MCH ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL KUG IULM IPYKKY, HGY HZCOHT WUKKPYX U SHCYKYX UGX LTHRPGN NAG. MOYE VHMO SHHRYX IUSY, UGXPG MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG MOYPK ZUWYL--HGY HZ MOYT NSUGWYX MPTPXSE UMIPYKKY--MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN KYLYTVSPGN COUM OY OUX LYYG HG MOY ZUWY HZMOY EHAGN LHSXPYK UM MOY YDYWAMPHG. IPYKKY SHHRYX UM MOY LHSXPYK UGXKYTYTVYKYX MOUM, MCH XUEL VYZHKY, MOUM TUG OUX VAKGYX OPL LOPKM COPSYXKEPGN PM UM MOY ZPKY UGX OHC MOYE OUX SUANOYX UM OPT.VYOPGX OPT, COYKY RUKUMUYB OUX VYYG LPMMPGN, MOY XHN VYNUG MH OHCS."COUM U LMAIPX VYULM! COE PL PM OHCSPGN?" MOHANOM IPYKKY.OPL WHTKUXYL, MOY IKPLHGYK LHSXPYKL CUSRPGN VYLPXY OPT, UBHPXYX SHHRPGNVUWR UM MOY ISUWY COYKY MOY LOHM OUX VYYG ZPKYX UGX MOY XHN CUL OHCSPGN,QALM UL IPYKKY XPX, VAM MOYKY CUL U LYM SHHR HG USS MOYPK ZUWYL.WOUIMYK DBMOY LMHKYL, MOY IKPLHGYKL, UGX MOY TUKLOUS'L VUNNUNY MKUPG LMHIIYX UMMOY BPSSUNY HZ LOUTLOYBH. MOY TYG WKHCXYX MHNYMOYK KHAGX MOY WUTIZPKYL.IPYKKY CYGM AI MH MOY ZPKY, UMY LHTY KHULM OHKLYZSYLO, SUE XHCG CPMO OPLVUWR MH MOY ZPKY, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE ZYSS ULSYYI. OY UNUPG LSYIM UL OY OUXXHGY UM THFOUELR UZMYK MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH.UNUPG KYUS YBYGML TPGNSYX CPMO XKYUTL UGX UNUPG LHTYHGY, OY HK UGHMOYK,NUBY YDIKYLLPHG MH OPL MOHANOML, UGX YBYG MH MOY LUTY MOHANOML MOUM OUXVYYG YDIKYLLYX PG OPL XKYUT UM THFOUELR."SPZY PL YBYKEMOPGN. SPZY PL NHX. YBYKEMOPGN WOUGNYL UGX THBYL UGX MOUMTHBYTYGM PL NHX. UGX COPSY MOYKY PL SPZY MOYKY PL QHE PG WHGLWPHALGYLLHZ MOY XPBPGY. MH SHBY SPZY PL MH SHBY NHX. OUKXYK UGX THKY VSYLLYXMOUG USS YSLY PL MH SHBY MOPL SPZY PG HGY'L LAZZYKPGNL, PG PGGHWYGMLAZZYKPGNL.""RUKUMUYB!" WUTY MH IPYKKY'L TPGX.UGX LAXXYGSE OY LUC BPBPXSE VYZHKY OPT U SHGN-ZHKNHMMYG, RPGXSE HSX TUGCOH OUX NPBYG OPT NYHNKUIOE SYLLHGL PG LCPMFYKSUGX. "CUPM U VPM,"LUPX MOY HSX TUG, UGX LOHCYX IPYKKY U NSHVY. MOPL NSHVY CUL USPBY--UBPVKUMPGN VUSS CPMOHAM ZPDYX XPTYGLPHGL. PML COHSY LAKZUWY WHGLPLMYX HZXKHIL WSHLYSE IKYLLYX MHNYMOYK, UGX USS MOYLY XKHIL THBYX UGX WOUGNYXISUWYL, LHTYMPTYL LYBYKUS HZ MOYT TYKNPGN PGMH HGY, LHTYMPTYL HGYXPBPXPGN PGMH TUGE. YUWO XKHI MKPYX MH LIKYUX HAM UGX HWWAIE UL TAWOLIUWY UL IHLLPVSY, VAM HMOYKL LMKPBPGN MH XH MOY LUTY WHTIKYLLYX PM,LHTYMPTYL XYLMKHEYX PM, UGX LHTYMPTYL TYKNYX CPMO PM."MOUM PL SPZY," LUPX MOY HSX MYUWOYK."OHC LPTISY UGX WSYUK PM PL," MOHANOM IPYKKY. "OHC PL PM P XPX GHM RGHCPM VYZHKY?""NHX PL PG MOY TPXLM, UGX YUWO XKHI MKPYL MH YDIUGX LH UL MH KYZSYWMOPT MH MOY NKYUMYLM YDMYGM. UGX PM NKHCL, TYKNYL, XPLUIIYUKL ZKHT MOYLAKZUWY, LPGRL MH MOY XYIMOL, UGX UNUPG YTYKNYL. MOYKY GHC, RUKUMUYBOUL LIKYUX HAM UGX XPLUIIYUKYX. XH EHA AGXYKLMUGX, TE WOPSX?" LUPX MOYMYUWOYK."XH EHA AGXYKLMUGX, XUTG EHA?" LOHAMYX U BHPWY, UGX IPYKKY CHRY AI.OY SPZMYX OPTLYSZ UGX LUM AI. U ZKYGWOTUG COH OUX QALM IALOYX U KALLPUGLHSXPYK UCUE CUL LJAUMMPGN VE MOY ZPKY, YGNUNYX PG KHULMPGN U IPYWYHZ TYUM LMAWR HG U KUTKHX. OPLVKHCG THKHLY ZUWY CPMO ZKHCGPGN VKHCL CUL WSYUKSE BPLPVSY VE MOY NSHC HZMOY WOUKWHUS."PM'L USS MOY LUTY MH OPT," OY TAMMYKYX, MAKGPGN JAPWRSE MH U LHSXPYKCOH LMHHX VYOPGX OPT. "VKPNUGX! NYM UCUE!"UGX MCPLMPGN MOY KUTKHX OY SHHRYX NSHHTPSE UM IPYKKY, COH MAKGYXUCUE UGX NUFYX PGMH MOY XUKRGYLL. U IKPLHGYK, MOY KALLPUG LHSXPYK MOYZKYGWOTUG OUX IALOYX UCUE, CUL LPMMPGN GYUK MOY ZPKY IUMMPGN LHTYMOPGNCPMO OPL OUGX. SHHRPGN THKY WSHLYSE IPYKKY KYWHNGPFYX MOY VSAY-NKUE XHN,LPMMPGN VYLPXY MOY LHSXPYK, CUNNPGN PML MUPS."UO, OY'L WHTY?" LUPX IPYKKY. "UGX ISUM-" OY VYNUG, VAM XPX GHM ZPGPLO.LAXXYGSE UGX LPTASMUGYHALSE U WKHCX HZ TYTHKPYL UCHRY PG OPL ZUGWE--HZMOY SHHR ISUMHG OUX NPBYG OPT UL OY LUM AGXYK MOY MKYY, HZ MOY LOHMOYUKX ZKHT MOUM LIHM, HZ MOY XHN'L OHCS, HZ MOY NAPSME ZUWYL HZ MOY MCHZKYGWOTYG UL MOYE KUG IULM OPT, HZ MOY SHCYKYX UGX LTHRPGN NAG, UGX HZRUKUMUYB'L UVLYGWY UM MOPL OUSM--UGX OY CUL HG MOY IHPGM HZ KYUSPFPGNMOUM RUKUMUYB OUX VYYG RPSSYX, VAM QALM UM MOUM PGLMUGM, OY RGYC GHMCOE, MOY KYWHSSYWMPHG WUTY MH OPL TPGX HZ U LATTYK YBYGPGN OY OUX LIYGMCPMO U VYUAMPZAS IHSPLO SUXE HG MOY BYKUGXU HZ OPL OHALY PG RPYB. UGXCPMOHAM SPGRPGN AI MOY YBYGML HZ MOY XUE HK XKUCPGN U WHGWSALPHGZKHT MOYT, IPYKKY WSHLYX OPL YEYL, LYYPGN U BPLPHG HZ MOY WHAGMKE PGLATTYKMPTY TPGNSYX CPMO TYTHKPYL HZ VUMOPGN UGX HZ MOY SPJAPX, BPVKUMPGNNSHVY, UGX OY LUGR PGMH CUMYK LH MOUM PM WSHLYX HBYK OPL OYUX.VYZHKY LAGKPLY OY CUL UCURYGYX VE LOHAML UGX SHAX UGX KUIPX ZPKPGN.ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL CYKY KAGGPGN IULM OPT."MOY WHLLUWRL!" HGY HZ MOYT LOHAMYX, UGX U THTYGM SUMYK U WKHCX HZKALLPUGL LAKKHAGXYX IPYKKY.ZHK U SHGN MPTY OY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COUM CUL OUIIYGPGN MH OPT. USSUKHAGX OY OYUKX OPL WHTKUXYL LHVVPGN CPMO QHE."VKHMOYKL! XYUK ZYSSHCL! XUKSPGNL!" HSX LHSXPYKL YDWSUPTYX, CYYIPGN, ULMOYE YTVKUWYX WHLLUWRL UGX OALLUKL.MOY OALLUKL UGX WHLLUWRL WKHCXYX KHAGX MOY IKPLHGYKL; HGY HZZYKYX MOYTWSHMOYL, UGHMOYK VHHML, UGX U MOPKX VKYUX. IPYKKY LHVVYX UL OY LUMUTHGN MOYT UGX WHASX GHM AMMYK U CHKX. OY OANNYX MOY ZPKLM LHSXPYK COHUIIKHUWOYX OPT, UGX RPLLYX OPT, CYYIPGN.XHSHROHB LMHHX UM MOY NUMY HZ MOY KAPGYX OHALY, SYMMPGN U WKHCXHZ XPLUKTYX ZKYGWOTYG IULL VE. MOY ZKYGWO, YDWPMYX VE USS MOUM OUXOUIIYGYX, CYKY MUSRPGN SHAXSE UTHGN MOYTLYSBYL, VAM UL MOYE IULLYXXHSHROHB COH NYGMSE LCPMWOYX OPL VHHML CPMO OPL COPI UGX CUMWOYX MOYTCPMO WHSX NSULLE YEYL MOUM VHXYX GH NHHX, MOYE VYWUTY LPSYGM. HG MOYHIIHLPMY LPXY LMHHX XHSHROHB'L WHLLUWR, WHAGMPGN MOY IKPLHGYKL UGXTUKRPGN HZZ YUWO OAGXKYX CPMO U WOUSR SPGY HG MOY NUMY."OHC TUGE?" XHSHROHB ULRYX MOY WHLLUWR."MOY LYWHGX OAGXKYX," KYISPYX MOY WHLLUWR."ZPSYF, ZPSYF!" * XHSHROHB RYIM LUEPGN, OUBPGN UXHIMYX MOPL YDIKYLLPHGZKHT MOY ZKYGWO, UGX COYG OPL YEYL TYM MOHLY HZ MOY IKPLHGYKL MOYEZSULOYX CPMO U WKAYS SPNOM.    * "NYM USHGN, NYM USHGN!"XYGPLHB, VUKYOYUXYX UGX CPMO U NSHHTE ZUWY, CUSRYX VYOPGX LHTY WHLLUWRLCOH CYKY WUKKEPGN MOY VHXE HZ IYMEU KHLMHB MH U OHSY MOUM OUX VYYG XANPG MOY NUKXYG.WOUIMYK DBPUZMYK MOY MCYGME-YPNOMO HZ HWMHVYK COYG MOY ZKHLML VYNUG, MOY ZSPNOM HZMOY ZKYGWO ULLATYX U LMPSS THKY MKUNPW WOUKUWMYK, CPMO TYG ZKYYFPGN,HK KHULMPGN MOYTLYSBYL MH XYUMO UM MOY WUTIZPKYL, COPSY WUKKPUNYLCPMO IYHISY XKYLLYX PG ZAKL WHGMPGAYX MH XKPBY IULM, WUKKEPGN UCUE MOYIKHIYKME MOUM OUX VYYG LMHSYG VE MOY YTIYKHK, RPGNL, UGX XARYL; VAMMOY IKHWYLL HZ MOY ZSPNOM UGX XPLPGMYNKUMPHG HZ MOY ZKYGWO UKTE CYGM HGYLLYGMPUSSE UL VYZHKY.ZKHT THLWHC MH BEUFTU MOY ZKYGWO UKTE HZ LYBYGME-MOKYY MOHALUGX TYG GHMKYWRHGPGN MOY NAUKXL (COH XPX GHMOPGN XAKPGN MOY COHSY CUK VAM IPSSUNY)CUL KYXAWYX MH MOPKME-LPD MOHALUGX, MOHANO GHM THKY MOUG ZPBY MOHALUGXOUX ZUSSYG PG VUMMSY. ZKHT MOPL VYNPGGPGN MOY LAWWYYXPGN MYKTL HZ MOYIKHNKYLLPHG WHASX VY XYMYKTPGYX TUMOYTUMPWUSSE. MOY ZKYGWO UKTE TYSMYXUCUE UGX IYKPLOYX UM MOY LUTY KUMY ZKHT THLWHC MH BEUFTU, ZKHT BEUFTUMH LTHSYGLR, ZKHT LTHSYGLR MH MOY VYKYFPGU, UGX ZKHT MOY VYKYFPGU MHBPSGU--PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ MOY NKYUMYK HK SYLLYK PGMYGLPME HZ MOY WHSX,MOY IAKLAPM, MOY VUKKPGN HZ MOY CUE, HK UGE HMOYK IUKMPWASUK WHGXPMPHGL.VYEHGX BEUFTU MOY ZKYGWO UKTE PGLMYUX HZ THBPGN PG MOKYY WHSATGL OAXXSYXMHNYMOYK PGMH HGY TULL, UGX LH CYGM HG MH MOY YGX. VYKMOPYK CKHMY MH OPLYTIYKHK (CY RGHC OHC ZUK WHTTUGXPGN HZZPWYKL USSHC MOYTLYSBYL MH XPBYKNYZKHT MOY MKAMO PG XYLWKPVPGN MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ UG UKTE) UGX MOPL PL COUMOY LUPX:P XYYT PM TE XAME MH KYIHKM MH EHAK TUQYLME MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ MOY BUKPHALWHKIL P OUBY OUX HWWULPHG MH HVLYKBY XAKPGN XPZZYKYGM LMUNYL HZ MOY SULMMCH HK MOKYY XUEL' TUKWO. MOYE UKY USTHLM XPLVUGXYX. LWUKWYSE U JAUKMYKHZ MOY LHSXPYKL KYTUPG CPMO MOY LMUGXUKXL HZ MOYPK KYNPTYGML, MOY HMOYKLNH HZZ VE MOYTLYSBYL PG XPZZYKYGM XPKYWMPHGL OHIPGN MH ZPGX ZHHX UGXYLWUIY XPLWPISPGY. PG NYGYKUS MOYE KYNUKX LTHSYGLR UL MOY ISUWY COYKYMOYE OHIY MH KYWHBYK. XAKPGN MOY SULM ZYC XUEL TUGE HZ MOY TYG OUBY VYYGLYYG MH MOKHC UCUE MOYPK WUKMKPXNYL UGX MOYPK UKTL. PG LAWO U LMUMYHZ UZZUPKL, COUMYBYK EHAK ASMPTUMY ISUGL TUE VY, MOY PGMYKYLM HZ EHAKTUQYLME'L LYKBPWY XYTUGXL MOUM MOY UKTE LOHASX VY KUSSPYX UM LTHSYGLRUGX LOHASX ZPKLM HZ USS VY ZKYYX ZKHT PGYZZYWMPBYL, LAWO UL XPLTHAGMYXWUBUSKE, AGGYWYLLUKE VUNNUNY, UGX UKMPSSYKE TUMYKPUS MOUM PL GH SHGNYKPG IKHIHKMPHG MH MOY IKYLYGM ZHKWYL. MOY LHSXPYKL, COH UKY CHKG HAM CPMOOAGNYK UGX ZUMPNAY, GYYX MOYLY LAIISPYL UL CYSS UL U ZYC XUEL' KYLM.TUGE OUBY XPYX MOYLY SULM XUEL HG MOY KHUX HK UM MOY VPBHAUWL. MOPLLMUMY HZ MOPGNL PL WHGMPGAUSSE VYWHTPGN CHKLY UGX TURYL HGY ZYUK MOUMAGSYLL U IKHTIM KYTYXE PL UIISPYX MOY MKHHIL CPSS GH SHGNYK VY AGXYKWHGMKHS PG WULY HZ UG YGNUNYTYGM.GHBYTVYK 9: MCYGME TPSYL ZKHT LTHSYGLR.UZMYK LMUNNYKPGN PGMH LTHSYGLR COPWO LYYTYX MH MOYT U IKHTPLYX SUGX, MOYZKYGWO, LYUKWOPGN ZHK ZHHX, RPSSYX HGY UGHMOYK, LUWRYX MOYPK HCG LMHKYL,UGX COYG YBYKEMOPGN OUX VYYG ISAGXYKYX ZSYX ZUKMOYK.MOYE USS CYGM CPMOHAM RGHCPGN COPMOYK HK COE MOYE CYKY NHPGN. ZPKLM OY KPGNL OPL VYSS ZYUKSYLLSE, VAM COYG OY NYML PGMHU MPNOM ISUWY OY KAGL UCUE UL JAPYMSE UL OY WUG, UGX HZMYG MOPGRPGN MHYLWUIY KAGL LMKUPNOM PGMH OPL HIIHGYGM'L UKTL.UM ZPKLM COPSY MOYE CYKY LMPSS THBPGN USHGN MOY RUSANU KHUX, GUIHSYHG'LUKTPYL TUXY MOYPK IKYLYGWY RGHCG, VAM SUMYK COYG MOYE KYUWOYX MOYLTHSYGLR KHUX MOYE KUG OHSXPGN MOY WSUIIYK HZ MOYPK VYSS MPNOM--UGXHZMYG MOPGRPGN MOYE CYKY YLWUIPGN KUG KPNOM PGMH MOY KALLPUGL.HCPGN MH MOY KUIPXPME HZ MOY ZKYGWO ZSPNOM UGX MOY KALLPUG IAKLAPMUGX MOY WHGLYJAYGM YDOUALMPHG HZ MOY OHKLYL, MOY WOPYZ TYUGLHZ UIIKHDPTUMYSE ULWYKMUPGPGN MOY YGYTE'L IHLPMPHG--VE WUBUSKELWHAMPGN--CUL GHM UBUPSUVSY. VYLPXYL, UL U KYLASM HZ MOY ZKYJAYGMUGX KUIPX WOUGNY HZ IHLPMPHG VE YUWO UKTE, YBYG COUM PGZHKTUMPHG CULHVMUPGYX WHASX GHM VY XYSPBYKYX PG MPTY.
