LMPSS THKY LYGLYSYLLCHASX OUBY VYYG MOY CPLO MH WUIMAKY UKTE WHKIL HZ MOY ZKYGWO, COYG HAKHCG UKTE OUX TYSMYX UCUE MH OUSZ VYZHKY KYUWOPGN RKULGHY UGX U COHSYXPBPLPHG CHASX OUBY VYYG GYYXYX MH WHGBHE MOY WHKIL HZ IKPLHGYKL, UGXCOYG HAK TYG CYKY GHM USCUEL NYMMPGN ZASS KUMPHGL UGX MOY IKPLHGYKLUSKYUXE MURYG CYKY IYKPLOPGN HZ OAGNYK.USS MOY IKHZHAGX ISUGL UVHAM WAMMPGN HZZ UGX WUIMAKPGN GUIHSYHG UGX OPLUKTE CYKY SPRY MOY ISUG HZ U TUKRYM NUKXYGYK COH, COYG XKPBPGN HAM HZOPL NUKXYG U WHC MOUM OUX MKUTISYX XHCG MOY VYXL OY OUX ISUGMYX, LOHASXKAG MH MOY NUMY UGX OPM MOY WHC HG MOY OYUX. MOY HGSE MOPGN MH VY LUPXPG YDWALY HZ MOUM NUKXYGYK CHASX VY MOUM OY CUL BYKE UGNKE. VAM GHM YBYGMOUM WHASX VY LUPX ZHK MOHLY COH XKYC AI MOPL IKHQYWM, ZHK PM CUL GHMMOYE COH OUX LAZZYKYX ZKHT MOY MKUTISYX VYXL.VAM VYLPXYL MOY ZUWM MOUM WAMMPGN HZZ GUIHSYHG CPMO OPL UKTE CHASX OUBYVYYG LYGLYSYLL, PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY.PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY ZPKLM VYWUALY--UL YDIYKPYGWY LOHCL MOUM U MOKYY-TPSYTHBYTYGM HZ WHSATGL HG U VUMMSYZPYSX GYBYK WHPGWPXYL CPMO MOY ISUGL--MOYIKHVUVPSPME HZ WOPWOUNHB, RAMAFHB, UGX CPMMNYGLMYPG YZZYWMPGN U QAGWMPHGHG MPTY UM UG UIIHPGMYX ISUWY CUL LH KYTHMY UL MH VY MUGMUTHAGM MHPTIHLLPVPSPME, UL PG ZUWM MOHANOM RAMAFHB, COH COYG OY KYWYPBYX MOY ISUGKYTUKRYX MOUM XPBYKLPHGL ISUGGYX HBYK NKYUM XPLMUGWYL XH GHM EPYSX MOYXYLPKYX KYLASML.LYWHGXSE PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY, VYWUALY MH IUKUSEFY MOY THTYGMAT CPMO COPWOGUIHSYHG'L UKTE CUL KYMPKPGN, PGWHTIUKUVSE NKYUMYK ZHKWYL MOUG MOYKALLPUGL IHLLYLLYX CHASX OUBY VYYG KYJAPKYX.MOPKXSE PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY, VYWUALY MOY TPSPMUKE MYKT "MH WAM HZZ" OUL GHTYUGPGN. HGY WUG WAM HZZ U LSPWY HZ VKYUX, VAM GHM UG UKTE. MH WAMHZZ UG UKTE--MH VUK PML KHUX--PL JAPMY PTIHLLPVSY, ZHK MOYKY PL USCUELISYGME HZ KHHT MH UBHPX WUIMAKY UGX MOYKY PL MOY GPNOM COYG GHMOPGN WUGVY LYYG, UL MOY TPSPMUKE LWPYGMPLML TPNOM WHGBPGWY MOYTLYSBYL VE MOYYDUTISY HZ RKULGHY UGX HZ MOY VYKYFPGU. PM PL HGSE IHLLPVSY MH WUIMAKYIKPLHGYKL PZ MOYE UNKYY MH VY WUIMAKYX, QALM UL PM PL HGSE IHLLPVSYMH WUMWO U LCUSSHC PZ PM LYMMSYL HG HGY'L OUGX. TYG WUG HGSE VY MURYGIKPLHGYKL PZ MOYE LAKKYGXYK UWWHKXPGN MH MOY KASYL HZ LMKUMYNE UGXMUWMPWL, UL MOY NYKTUGL XPX. VAM MOY ZKYGWO MKHHIL JAPMY KPNOMSE XPX GHMWHGLPXYK MOUM MOPL LAPMYX MOYT, LPGWY XYUMO VE OAGNYK UGX WHSX UCUPMYXMOYT PG ZSPNOM HK WUIMPBPME USPRY.ZHAKMOSE UGX WOPYZSE PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY, VYWUALY GYBYK LPGWY MOY CHKSXVYNUG OUL U CUK VYYG ZHANOM AGXYK LAWO WHGXPMPHGL UL MOHLY MOUM HVMUPGYXPG 1812, UGX MOY KALLPUG UKTE PG PML IAKLAPM HZ MOY ZKYGWO LMKUPGYX PMLLMKYGNMO MH MOY AMTHLM UGX WHASX GHM OUBY XHGY THKY CPMOHAM XYLMKHEPGNPMLYSZ.XAKPGN MOY THBYTYGM HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE ZKHT MUKAMPGH MH RKULGHY PMSHLM ZPZME MOHALUGX LPWR HK LMKUNNSYKL, MOUM PL U GATVYK YJAUS MH MOYIHIASUMPHG HZ U SUKNY IKHBPGWPUS MHCG. OUSZ MOY TYG ZYSS HAM HZ MOY UKTECPMOHAM U VUMMSY.UGX PM PL HZ MOPL IYKPHX HZ MOY WUTIUPNG--COYG MOY UKTE SUWRYX VHHMLUGX LOYYILRPG WHUML, CUL LOHKM HZ IKHBPLPHGL UGX CPMOHAM BHXRU, UGXCUL WUTIPGN HAM UM GPNOM ZHK THGMOL PG MOY LGHC CPMO ZPZMYYG XYNKYYLHZ ZKHLM, COYG MOYKY CYKY HGSE LYBYG HK YPNOM OHAKL HZ XUESPNOM UGXMOY KYLM CUL GPNOM PG COPWO MOY PGZSAYGWY HZ XPLWPISPGY WUGGHM VYTUPGMUPGYX, COYG TYG CYKY MURYG PGMH MOUM KYNPHG HZ XYUMO COYKYXPLWPISPGY ZUPSL, GHM ZHK U ZYC OHAKL HGSE UL PG U VUMMSY, VAM ZHKTHGMOL, COYKY MOYE CYKY YBYKE THTYGM ZPNOMPGN XYUMO ZKHT OAGNYK UGXWHSX, COYG OUSZ MOY UKTE IYKPLOYX PG U LPGNSY THGMO--PM PL HZ MOPLIYKPHX HZ MOY WUTIUPNG MOUM MOY OPLMHKPUGL MYSS AL OHC TPSHKUXHBPWOLOHASX OUBY TUXY U ZSUGR TUKWO MH LAWO UGX LAWO U ISUWY, MHKTULHB MHUGHMOYK ISUWY, UGX WOPWOUNHB LOHASX OUBY WKHLLYX (THKY MOUG RGYY-XYYIPG LGHC) MH LHTYCOYKY YSLY, UGX OHC LH-UGX-LH "KHAMYX" UGX "WAM HZZ" MOYZKYGWO UGX LH HG UGX LH HG.MOY KALLPUGL, OUSZ HZ COHT XPYX, XPX USS MOUM WHASX UGX LOHASX OUBY VYYGXHGY MH UMMUPG UG YGX CHKMOE HZ MOY GUMPHG, UGX MOYE UKY GHM MH VSUTYVYWUALY HMOYK KALLPUGL, LPMMPGN PG CUKT KHHTL, IKHIHLYX MOUM MOYE LOHASXXH COUM CUL PTIHLLPVSY.USS MOUM LMKUGNY WHGMKUXPWMPHG GHC XPZZPWASM MH AGXYKLMUGX VYMCYYG MOYZUWML UGX MOY OPLMHKPWUS UWWHAGML HGSE UKPLYL VYWUALY MOY OPLMHKPUGLXYUSPGN CPMO MOY TUMMYK OUBY CKPMMYG MOY OPLMHKE HZ MOY VYUAMPZAS CHKXLUGX LYGMPTYGML HZ BUKPHAL NYGYKUSL, UGX GHM MOY OPLMHKE HZ MOY YBYGML.MH MOYT MOY CHKXL HZ TPSHKUXHBPWO LYYT BYKE PGMYKYLMPGN, UGX LH XH MOYPKLAKTPLYL UGX MOY KYCUKXL MOPL HK MOUM NYGYKUS KYWYPBYX; VAM MOY JAYLMPHGHZ MOHLY ZPZME MOHALUGX TYG COH CYKY SYZM PG OHLIPMUSL UGX PG NKUBYLXHYL GHM YBYG PGMYKYLM MOYT, ZHK PM XHYL GHM WHTY CPMOPG MOY KUGNY HZMOYPK PGBYLMPNUMPHG.EYM HGY GYYX HGSE XPLWUKX MOY LMAXE HZ MOY KYIHKML UGX NYGYKUS ISUGL UGXWHGLPXYK MOY THBYTYGM HZ MOHLY OAGXKYXL HZ MOHALUGXL HZ TYG COH MHHR UXPKYWM IUKM PG MOY YBYGML, UGX USS MOY JAYLMPHGL MOUM LYYTYX PGLHSAVSYYULPSE UGX LPTISE KYWYPBY UG PTTYXPUMY UGX WYKMUPG LHSAMPHG.MOY UPT HZ WAMMPGN HZZ GUIHSYHG UGX OPL UKTE GYBYK YDPLMYX YDWYIM PGMOY PTUNPGUMPHGL HZ U XHFYG IYHISY. PM WHASX GHM YDPLM VYWUALY PM CULLYGLYSYLL UGX AGUMMUPGUVSY.MOY IYHISY OUX U LPGNSY UPT: MH ZKYY MOYPK SUGX ZKHT PGBULPHG. MOUM UPTCUL UMMUPGYX PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY HZ PMLYSZ, UL MOY ZKYGWO KUG UCUE,UGX LH PM CUL HGSE GYWYLLUKE GHM MH LMHI MOYPK ZSPNOM. LYWHGXSE PM CULUMMUPGYX VE MOY NAYKKPSSU CUKZUKY COPWO CUL XYLMKHEPGN MOY ZKYGWO, UGXMOPKXSE VE MOY ZUWM MOUM U SUKNY KALLPUG UKTE CUL ZHSSHCPGN MOY ZKYGWO,KYUXE MH ALY PML LMKYGNMO PG WULY MOYPK THBYTYGM LMHIIYX.MOY KALLPUG UKTE OUX MH UWM SPRY U COPI MH U KAGGPGN UGPTUS. UGX MOYYDIYKPYGWYX XKPBYK RGYC PM CUL VYMMYK MH OHSX MOY COPI KUPLYX UL UTYGUWY MOUG MH LMKPRY MOY KAGGPGN UGPTUS HG MOY OYUX.VHHR ZPZMYYG: 1812 - 13WOUIMYK PCOYG LYYPGN U XEPGN UGPTUS U TUG ZYYSL U LYGLY HZ OHKKHK: LAVLMUGWYLPTPSUK MH OPL HCG PL IYKPLOPGN VYZHKY OPL YEYL. VAM COYG PM PL UVYSHBYX UGX PGMPTUMY OATUG VYPGN MOUM PL XEPGN, VYLPXYL MOPL OHKKHK UMMOY YDMPGWMPHG HZ SPZY MOYKY PL U LYBYKUGWY, U LIPKPMAUS CHAGX, COPWOSPRY U IOELPWUS CHAGX PL LHTYMPTYL ZUMUS UGX LHTYMPTYL OYUSL, VAM USCUELUWOYL UGX LOKPGRL UM UGE YDMYKGUS PKKPMUMPGN MHAWO.UZMYK IKPGWY UGXKYC'L XYUMO GUMULOU UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE USPRY ZYSM MOPL.XKHHIPGN PG LIPKPM UGX WSHLPGN MOYPK YEYL VYZHKY MOY TYGUWPGN WSHAX HZXYUMO MOUM HBYKOAGN MOYT, MOYE XUKYX GHM SHHR SPZY PG MOY ZUWY. MOYEWUKYZASSE NAUKXYX MOYPK HIYG CHAGXL ZKHT UGE KHANO UGX IUPGZAS WHGMUWM.YBYKEMOPGN: U WUKKPUNY IULLPGN KUIPXSE PG MOY LMKYYM, U LATTHGL MHXPGGYK, MOY TUPX'L PGJAPKE COUM XKYLL MH IKYIUKY, HK CHKLY LMPSS UGECHKX HZ PGLPGWYKY HK ZYYVSY LETIUMOE, LYYTYX UG PGLASM, IUPGZASSEPKKPMUMYX MOY CHAGX, PGMYKKAIMPGN MOUM GYWYLLUKE JAPYM PG COPWOMOYE VHMO MKPYX MH SPLMYG MH MOY LMYKG UGX XKYUXZAS WOHPK MOUM LMPSSKYLHAGXYX PG MOYPK PTUNPGUMPHG, UGX OPGXYKYX MOYPK NUFPGN PGMH MOHLYTELMYKPHAL SPTPMSYLL BPLMUL MOUM ZHK UG PGLMUGM OUX HIYGYX HAM VYZHKYMOYT.HGSE COYG USHGY MHNYMOYK CYKY MOYE ZKYY ZKHT LAWO HAMKUNY UGX IUPG.MOYE LIHRY SPMMSY YBYG MH HGY UGHMOYK, UGX COYG MOYE XPX PM CUL HZ BYKEAGPTIHKMUGM TUMMYKL.VHMO UBHPXYX UGE USSALPHG MH MOY ZAMAKY. MH UXTPM MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZU ZAMAKY LYYTYX MH MOYT MH PGLASM OPL TYTHKE. LMPSS THKY WUKYZASSE XPXMOYE UBHPX UGEMOPGN KYSUMPGN MH OPT COH CUL XYUX. PM LYYTYX MH MOYT MOUMCOUM MOYE OUX SPBYX MOKHANO UGX YDIYKPYGWYX WHASX GHM VY YDIKYLLYX PGCHKXL, UGX MOUM UGE KYZYKYGWY MH MOY XYMUPSL HZ OPL SPZY PGZKPGNYX MOYTUQYLME UGX LUWKYXGYLL HZ MOY TELMYKE MOUM OUX VYYG UWWHTISPLOYX VYZHKYMOYPK YEYL.WHGMPGAYX UVLMYGMPHG ZKHT LIYYWO, UGX WHGLMUGM UBHPXUGWY HZ YBYKEMOPGNMOUM TPNOM SYUX AI MH MOY LAVQYWM--MOPL OUSMPGN HG USS LPXYL UM MOYVHAGXUKE HZ COUM MOYE TPNOM GHM TYGMPHG--VKHANOM VYZHKY MOYPK TPGXL CPMOLMPSS NKYUMYK IAKPME UGX WSYUKGYLL COUM MOYE CYKY VHMO ZYYSPGN.VAM IAKY UGX WHTISYMY LHKKHC PL UL PTIHLLPVSY UL IAKY UGX WHTISYMY QHE.IKPGWYLL TUKE, PG OYK IHLPMPHG UL UVLHSAMY UGX PGXYIYGXYGM UKVPMYK HZOYK HCG ZUMY UGX NAUKXPUG UGX PGLMKAWMHK HZ OYK GYIOYC, CUL MOY ZPKLM MHVY WUSSYX VUWR MH SPZY ZKHT MOUM KYUST HZ LHKKHC PG COPWO LOY OUX XCYSMZHK MOY ZPKLM ZHKMGPNOM. LOY KYWYPBYX SYMMYKL ZKHT OYK KYSUMPHGL MHCOPWO LOY OUX MH KYISE; MOY KHHT PG COPWO SPMMSY GPWOHSUL OUX VYYG IAMCUL XUTI UGX OY VYNUG MH WHANO; USIUMEWO WUTY MH EUKHLSUBS CPMO KYIHKMLHG MOY LMUMY HZ MOYPK UZZUPKL UGX CPMO UXBPWY UGX LANNYLMPHGL MOUM MOYELOHASX KYMAKG MH THLWHC MH MOY OHALY HG MOY BHFXBPFOYGRU LMKYYM, COPWOOUX KYTUPGYX AGPGQAKYX UGX GYYXYX HGSE LSPNOM KYIUPKL. SPZY XPX GHMLMUGX LMPSS UGX PM CUL GYWYLLUKE MH SPBY. OUKX UL PM CUL ZHK IKPGWYLLTUKE MH YTYKNY ZKHT MOY KYUST HZ LYWSAXYX WHGMYTISUMPHG PG COPWO LOYOUX SPBYX MPSS MOYG, UGX LHKKE UGX USTHLM ULOUTYX UL LOY ZYSM MH SYUBYGUMULOU USHGY, EYM MOY WUKYL HZ SPZY XYTUGXYX OYK UMMYGMPHG UGX LOYPGBHSAGMUKPSE EPYSXYX MH MOYT. LOY CYGM MOKHANO MOY UWWHAGML CPMOUSIUMEWO, WHGZYKKYX CPMO XYLLUSSYL UVHAM OYK GYIOYC, UGX NUBY HKXYKL UGXTUXY IKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK MOY QHAKGYE MH THLWHC.GUMULOU KYTUPGYX USHGY UGX, ZKHT MOY MPTY IKPGWYLL TUKE VYNUG TURPGNIKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK XYIUKMAKY, OYSX USHHZ ZKHT OYK MHH.IKPGWYLL TUKE ULRYX MOY WHAGMYLL MH SYM GUMULOU NH CPMO OYK MH THLWHC,UGX VHMO IUKYGML NSUXSE UWWYIMYX MOPL HZZYK, ZHK MOYE LUC MOYPK XUANOMYKSHLPGN LMKYGNMO YBYKE XUE UGX MOHANOM MOUM U WOUGNY HZ LWYGY UGX MOYUXBPWY HZ THLWHC XHWMHKL CHASX VY NHHX ZHK OYK."P UT GHM NHPGN UGECOYKY," GUMULOU KYISPYX COYG MOPL CUL IKHIHLYX MHOYK. "XH ISYULY QALM SYUBY TY USHGY!" UGX LOY KUG HAM HZ MOY KHHT, CPMOXPZZPWASME KYZKUPGPGN ZKHT MYUKL HZ BYDUMPHG UGX PKKPMUMPHG KUMOYK MOUGHZ LHKKHC.UZMYK LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ XYLYKMYX VE IKPGWYL TUKE UGX USHGY PG OYK NKPYZ,GUMULOU LIYGM THLM HZ MOY MPTY PG OYK KHHT VE OYKLYSZ, LPMMPGN OAXXSYXAI ZYYM UGX USS PG MOY WHKGYK HZ MOY LHZU, MYUKPGN UGX MCPLMPGNLHTYMOPGN CPMO OYK LSYGXYK GYKBHAL ZPGNYKL UGX NUFPGN PGMYGMSE UGXZPDYXSE UM COUMYBYK OYK YEYL WOUGWYX MH ZUSS HG. MOPL LHSPMAXY YDOUALMYXUGX MHKTYGMYX OYK VAM LOY CUL PG UVLHSAMY GYYX HZ PM. UL LHHG UL UGEHGYYGMYKYX LOY NHM AI JAPWRSE, WOUGNYX OYK IHLPMPHG UGX YDIKYLLPHG, UGXIPWRYX AI U VHHR HK LHTY LYCPGN, YBPXYGMSE CUPMPGN PTIUMPYGMSE ZHK MOYPGMKAXYK MH NH.LOY ZYSM USS MOY MPTY UL PZ LOY TPNOM UM UGE THTYGM IYGYMKUMY MOUMHG COPWO--CPMO U MYKKPVSY JAYLMPHGPGN MHH NKYUM ZHK OYK LMKYGNMO--OYKLIPKPMAUS NUFY CUL ZPDYX.HGY XUE MHCUKX MOY YGX HZ XYWYTVYK GUMULOU, IUSY UGX MOPG, XKYLLYX PG UVSUWR CHHSYG NHCG, OYK ISUPMYX OUPK GYNSPNYGMSE MCPLMYX PGMH U RGHM, CULWKHAWOYX ZYYM UGX USS PG MOY WHKGYK HZ OYK LHZU, GYKBHALSE WKATISPGN UGXLTHHMOPGN HAM MOY YGX HZ OYK LULO COPSY LOY SHHRYX UM U WHKGYK HZ MOYXHHK.LOY CUL NUFPGN PG MOY XPKYWMPHG PG COPWO OY OUX NHGY--MH MOY HMOYK LPXYHZ SPZY. UGX MOUM HMOYK LPXY HZ SPZY, HZ COPWO LOY OUX GYBYK VYZHKYMOHANOM UGX COPWO OUX ZHKTYKSE LYYTYX MH OYK LH ZUK UCUE UGX PTIKHVUVSY,CUL GHC GYUKYK UGX THKY URPG UGX THKY WHTIKYOYGLPVSY MOUG MOPL LPXY HZSPZY, COYKY YBYKEMOPGN CUL YPMOYK YTIMPGYLL UGX XYLHSUMPHG HK LAZZYKPGNUGX PGXPNGPME.LOY CUL NUFPGN COYKY LOY RGYC OPT MH VY; VAM LOY WHASX GHM PTUNPGY OPTHMOYKCPLY MOUG UL OY OUX VYYG OYKY. LOY GHC LUC OPT UNUPG UL OY OUX VYYGUM TEMPLOWOP, UM MKHPMLU, UGX UM EUKHLSUBS.LOY LUC OPL ZUWY, OYUKX OPL BHPWY, KYIYUMYX OPL CHKXL UGX OYK HCG, UGXLHTYMPTYL XYBPLYX HMOYK CHKXL MOYE TPNOM OUBY LIHRYG.MOYKY OY PL SEPGN VUWR PG UG UKTWOUPK PG OPL BYSBYM WSHUR, SYUGPGNOPL OYUX HG OPL MOPG IUSY OUGX. OPL WOYLM PL XKYUXZASSE OHSSHC UGX OPLLOHASXYKL KUPLYX. OPL SPIL UKY ZPKTSE WSHLYX, OPL YEYL NSPMMYK, UGX UCKPGRSY WHTYL UGX NHYL HG OPL IUSY ZHKYOYUX. HGY HZ OPL SYNL MCPMWOYLQALM IYKWYIMPVSE, VAM KUIPXSE. GUMULOU RGHCL MOUM OY PL LMKANNSPGN CPMOMYKKPVSY IUPG. "COUM PL MOUM IUPG SPRY? COE XHYL OY OUBY MOUM IUPG? COUMXHYL OY ZYYS? OHC XHYL PM OAKM OPT?" MOHANOM GUMULOU. OY GHMPWYX OYKCUMWOPGN OPT, KUPLYX OPL YEYL, UGX VYNUG MH LIYUR LYKPHALSE:"HGY MOPGN CHASX VY MYKKPVSY," LUPX OY: "MH VPGX HGYLYSZ ZHKYBYK MH ULAZZYKPGN TUG. PM CHASX VY WHGMPGAUS MHKMAKY." UGX OY SHHRYX LYUKWOPGNSEUM OYK. GUMULOU UL ALAUS UGLCYKYX VYZHKY LOY OUX MPTY MH MOPGR COUMLOY CHASX LUE. LOY LUPX: "MOPL WUG'M NH HG--PM CHG'M. EHA CPSS NYMCYSS--JAPMY CYSS."LOY GHC LUC OPT ZKHT MOY WHTTYGWYTYGM HZ MOUM LWYGY UGX KYSPBYX COUM LOYOUX MOYG ZYSM. LOY KYWUSSYX OPL SHGN LUX UGX LYBYKY SHHR UM MOHLY CHKXLUGX AGXYKLMHHX MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY KYVARY UGX XYLIUPK PG MOUM IKHMKUWMYXNUFY."P UNKYYX," GUMULOU GHC LUPX MH OYKLYSZ, "MOUM PM CHASX VY XKYUXZAS PZOY USCUEL WHGMPGAYX MH LAZZYK. P LUPX PM MOYG HGSE VYWUALY PM CHASX OUBYVYYG XKYUXZAS ZHK OPT, VAM OY AGXYKLMHHX PM XPZZYKYGMSE. OY MOHANOM PMCHASX VY XKYUXZAS ZHK TY. OUX P LUPX COUM P MOHANOM, P LOHASX OUBYLUPX: YBYG PZ OY OUX MH NH HG XEPGN, MH XPY WHGMPGAUSSE VYZHKY TE YEYL,P LOHASX OUBY VYYG OUIIE WHTIUKYX CPMO COUM P UT GHC. GHC MOYKY PLGHMOPGN... GHVHXE. XPX OY RGHC MOUM? GH, OY XPX GHM UGX GYBYK CPSS RGHCPM. UGX GHC PM CPSS GYBYK, GYBYK VY IHLLPVSY MH IAM PM KPNOM." UGXGHC OY UNUPG LYYTYX MH VY LUEPGN MOY LUTY CHKXL MH OYK, HGSE PG OYKPTUNPGUMPHG GUMULOU MOPL MPTY NUBY OPT U XPZZYKYGM UGLCYK. LOY LMHIIYXOPT UGX LUPX: "MYKKPVSY ZHK EHA, VAM GHM ZHK TY! EHA RGHC MOUM ZHK TYMOYKY PL GHMOPGN PG SPZY VAM EHA, UGX MH LAZZYK CPMO EHA PL MOY NKYUMYLMOUIIPGYLL ZHK TY," UGX OY MHHR OYK OUGX UGX IKYLLYX PM UL OY OUXIKYLLYX PM MOUM MYKKPVSY YBYGPGN ZHAK XUEL VYZHKY OPL XYUMO. UGX PG OYKPTUNPGUMPHG LOY LUPX HMOYK MYGXYK UGX SHBPGN CHKXL COPWO LOY TPNOM OUBYLUPX MOYG VAM HGSE LIHRY GHC: "P SHBY MOYY!... MOYY! P SHBY, SHBY..."LOY LUPX, WHGBASLPBYSE IKYLLPGN OYK OUGXL UGX LYMMPGN OYK MYYMO CPMO UXYLIYKUMY YZZHKM...LOY CUL HBYKWHTY VE LCYYM LHKKHC UGX MYUKL CYKY USKYUXE KPLPGN PG OYKYEYL; MOYG LOY LAXXYGSE ULRYX OYKLYSZ MH COHT LOY CUL LUEPGN MOPL.UNUPG YBYKEMOPGN CUL LOKHAXYX PG OUKX, XKE IYKISYDPME, UGX UNUPG CPMO ULMKUPGYX ZKHCG LOY IYYKYX MHCUKX MOY CHKSX COYKY OY CUL. UGX GHC, GHCPM LYYTYX MH OYK LOY CUL IYGYMKUMPGN MOY TELMYKE.... VAM UM MOY PGLMUGMCOYG PM LYYTYX MOUM MOY PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY CUL KYBYUSPGN PMLYSZ MH OYK USHAX KUMMSY HZ MOY XHHK OUGXSY LMKAWR IUPGZASSE HG OYK YUKL. XAGEULOU,OYK TUPX, YGMYKYX MOY KHHT JAPWRSE UGX UVKAIMSE CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYX SHHRHG OYK ZUWY UGX LOHCPGN GH WHGWYKG ZHK OYK TPLMKYLL."WHTY MH EHAK IUIU UM HGWY, ISYULY!" LUPX LOY CPMO U LMKUGNY, YDWPMYXSHHR. "U TPLZHKMAGY... UVHAM IYMYK PSEGPWO... U SYMMYK," LOY ZPGPLOYXCPMO U LHV.WOUIMYK PPVYLPXYL U ZYYSPGN HZ USHHZGYLL ZKHT YBYKEVHXE GUMULOU CUL ZYYSPGNU LIYWPUS YLMKUGNYTYGM ZKHT MOY TYTVYKL HZ OYK HCG ZUTPSE. USS HZMOYT--OYK ZUMOYK, THMOYK, UGX LHGEU--CYKY LH GYUK MH OYK, LH ZUTPSPUK,LH WHTTHGISUWY, MOUM USS MOYPK CHKXL UGX ZYYSPGNL LYYTYX UG PGLASM MHMOY CHKSX PG COPWO LOY OUX VYYG SPBPGN HZ SUMY, UGX LOY ZYSM GHMTYKYSE PGXPZZYKYGM MH MOYT VAM KYNUKXYX MOYT CPMO OHLMPSPME. LOY OYUKXXAGEULOU'L CHKXL UVHAM IYMYK PSEGPWO UGX U TPLZHKMAGY, VAM XPX GHM NKULIMOYT."COUM TPLZHKMAGY? COUM TPLZHKMAGY WUG OUIIYG MH MOYT? MOYE QALM SPBYMOYPK HCG HSX, JAPYM, UGX WHTTHGISUWY SPZY," MOHANOM GUMULOU.UL LOY YGMYKYX MOY VUSSKHHT OYK ZUMOYK CUL OAKKPYXSE WHTPGN HAM HZOYK THMOYK'L KHHT. OPL ZUWY CUL IAWRYKYX AI UGX CYM CPMO MYUKL. OYOUX YBPXYGMSE KAG HAM HZ MOUM KHHT MH NPBY BYGM MH MOY LHVL MOUM CYKYWOHRPGN OPT. COYG OY LUC GUMULOU OY CUBYX OPL UKTL XYLIUPKPGNSE UGXVAKLM PGMH WHGBASLPBYSE IUPGZAS LHVL MOUM XPLMHKMYX OPL LHZM KHAGX ZUWY."IY... IYMEU... NH, NH, LOY... PL WUSSPGN..." UGX CYYIPGN SPRY U WOPSXUGX JAPWRSE LOAZZSPGN HG OPL ZYYVSY SYNL MH U WOUPK, OY USTHLM ZYSS PGMHPM, WHBYKPGN OPL ZUWY CPMO OPL OUGXL.LAXXYGSE UG YSYWMKPW LOHWR LYYTYX MH KAG MOKHANO GUMULOU'L COHSY VYPGN.MYKKPVSY UGNAPLO LMKAWR OYK OYUKM, LOY ZYSM U XKYUXZAS UWOY UL PZLHTYMOPGN CUL VYPGN MHKG PGLPXY OYK UGX LOY CYKY XEPGN. VAM MOY IUPGCUL PTTYXPUMYSE ZHSSHCYX VE U ZYYSPGN HZ KYSYULY ZKHT MOY HIIKYLLPBYWHGLMKUPGM MOUM OUX IKYBYGMYX OYK MURPGN IUKM PG SPZY. MOY LPNOM HZ OYKZUMOYK, MOY MYKKPVSE CPSX WKPYL HZ OYK THMOYK MOUM LOY OYUKX MOKHANO MOYXHHK, TUXY OYK PTTYXPUMYSE ZHKNYM OYKLYSZ UGX OYK HCG NKPYZ.LOY KUG MH OYK ZUMOYK, VAM OY ZYYVSE CUBYX OPL UKT, IHPGMPGN MH OYKTHMOYK'L XHHK. IKPGWYLL TUKE, IUSY UGX CPMO JAPBYKPGN WOPG, WUTY HAMZKHT MOUM KHHT UGX MURPGN GUMULOU VE MOY UKT LUPX LHTYMOPGN MH OYK.GUMULOU GYPMOYK LUC GHK OYUKX OYK. LOY CYGM PG CPMO KUIPX LMYIL, IUALPGNUM MOY XHHK ZHK UG PGLMUGM UL PZ LMKANNSPGN CPMO OYKLYSZ, UGX MOYG KUGMH OYK THMOYK.MOY WHAGMYLL CUL SEPGN PG UG UKTWOUPK PG U LMKUGNY UGX UCRCUKX IHLPMPHG,LMKYMWOPGN HAM UGX VYUMPGN OYK OYUX UNUPGLM MOY CUSS. LHGEU UGX MOYTUPXL CYKY OHSXPGN OYK UKTL."GUMULOU! GUMULOU!..." WKPYX MOY WHAGMYLL. "PM'L GHM MKAY... PM'L GHMMKAY... OY'L SEPGN... GUMULOU!" LOY LOKPYRYX, IALOPGN MOHLY UKHAGX OYKUCUE. "NH UCUE, USS HZ EHA; PM'L GHM MKAY! RPSSYX!... OU, OU, OU!...PM'L GHM MKAY!"GUMULOU IAM HGY RGYY HG MOY UKTWOUPK, LMHHIYX HBYK OYK THMOYK, YTVKUWYXOYK, UGX CPMO AGYDIYWMYX LMKYGNMO KUPLYX OYK, MAKGYX OYK ZUWY MHCUKXOYKLYSZ, UGX WSAGN MH OYK."TATTE!... XUKSPGN!... P UT OYKY, TE XYUKYLM TATTE," LOY RYIM HGCOPLIYKPGN, GHM IUALPGN UG PGLMUGM.LOY XPX GHM SYM NH HZ OYK THMOYK VAM LMKANNSYX MYGXYKSE CPMO OYK,XYTUGXYX U IPSSHC UGX OHM CUMYK, UGX AGZULMYGYX UGX MHKY HIYG OYKTHMOYK'L XKYLL."TE XYUKYLM XUKSPGN... TATTE, TE IKYWPHAL!..." LOY COPLIYKYXPGWYLLUGMSE, RPLLPGN OYK OYUX, OYK OUGXL, OYK ZUWY, UGX ZYYSPGN OYK HCGPKKYIKYLLPVSY UGX LMKYUTPGN MYUKL MPWRSPGN OYK GHLY UGX WOYYRL.MOY WHAGMYLL IKYLLYX OYK XUANOMYK'L OUGX, WSHLYX OYK YEYL, UGX VYWUTYJAPYM ZHK U THTYGM. LAXXYGSE LOY LUM AI CPMO AGUWWALMHTYX LCPZMGYLL,NSUGWYX BUWUGMSE UKHAGX OYK, UGX LYYPGN GUMULOU VYNUG MH IKYLL OYKXUANOMYK'L OYUX CPMO USS OYK LMKYGNMO. MOYG LOY MAKGYX MHCUKX OYKXUANOMYK'L ZUWY COPWO CUL CPGWPGN CPMO IUPG UGX NUFYX SHGN UM PM."GUMULOU, EHA SHBY TY?" LOY LUPX PG U LHZM MKALMZAS COPLIYK. "GUMULOU,EHA CHASX GHM XYWYPBY TY? EHA'SS MYSS TY MOY COHSY MKAMO?"GUMULOU SHHRYX UM OYK CPMO YEYL ZASS HZ MYUKL UGX PG OYK SHHR MOYKY CULGHMOPGN VAM SHBY UGX UG YGMKYUME ZHK ZHKNPBYGYLL."TE XUKSPGN TATTE!" LOY KYIYUMYX, LMKUPGPGN USS MOY IHCYK HZ OYK SHBY MHZPGX LHTY CUE HZ MURPGN HG OYKLYSZ MOY YDWYLL HZ NKPYZ MOUM WKALOYX OYKTHMOYK.UGX UNUPG PG U ZAMPSY LMKANNSY CPMO KYUSPME OYK THMOYK, KYZALPGN MHVYSPYBY MOUM LOY WHASX SPBY COYG OYK VYSHBYX VHE CUL RPSSYX PG MOY VSHHTHZ SPZY, YLWUIYX ZKHT KYUSPME PGMH U CHKSX HZ XYSPKPAT.GUMULOU XPX GHM KYTYTVYK OHC MOUM XUE IULLYX GHK MOUM GPNOM, GHK MOYGYDM XUE UGX GPNOM. LOY XPX GHM LSYYI UGX XPX GHM SYUBY OYK THMOYK. OYKIYKLYBYKPGN UGX IUMPYGM SHBY LYYTYX WHTISYMYSE MH LAKKHAGX MOY WHAGMYLLYBYKE THTYGM, GHM YDISUPGPGN HK WHGLHSPGN, VAM KYWUSSPGN OYK MH SPZY.XAKPGN MOY MOPKX GPNOM MOY WHAGMYLL RYIM BYKE JAPYM ZHK U ZYC TPGAMYL,UGX GUMULOU KYLMYX OYK OYUX HG MOY UKT HZ OYK WOUPK UGX WSHLYX OYK YEYL,VAM HIYGYX MOYT UNUPG HG OYUKPGN MOY VYXLMYUX WKYUR. MOY WHAGMYLL CULLPMMPGN AI PG VYX UGX LIYURPGN LHZMSE."OHC NSUX P UT EHA OUBY WHTY. EHA UKY MPKYX. CHG'M EHA OUBY LHTY MYU?"GUMULOU CYGM AI MH OYK. "EHA OUBY PTIKHBYX PG SHHRL UGX NKHCG THKYTUGSE," WHGMPGAYX MOY WHAGMYLL, MURPGN OYK XUANOMYK'L OUGX."TUTTU! COUM UKY EHA LUEPGN...""GUMULOU, OY PL GH THKY, GH THKY!"UGX YTVKUWPGN OYK XUANOMYK, MOY WHAGMYLL VYNUG MH CYYI ZHK MOY ZPKLMMPTY.WOUIMYK PPPIKPGWYLL TUKE IHLMIHGYX OYK XYIUKMAKY. LHGEU UGX MOY WHAGM MKPYX MHKYISUWY GUMULOU VAM WHASX GHM. MOYE LUC MOUM LOY USHGY CUL UVSY MHKYLMKUPG OYK THMOYK ZKHT AGKYULHGPGN XYLIUPK. ZHK MOKYY CYYRL GUMULOUKYTUPGYX WHGLMUGMSE UM OYK THMOYK'L LPXY, LSYYIPGN HG U SHAGNY WOUPKPG OYK KHHT, TURPGN OYK YUM UGX XKPGR, UGX MUSRPGN MH OYK PGWYLLUGMSEVYWUALY MOY TYKY LHAGX HZ OYK MYGXYK, WUKYLLPGN MHGYL LHHMOYX OYKTHMOYK.MOY THMOYK'L CHAGXYX LIPKPM WHASX GHM OYUS. IYMEU'L XYUMO OUX MHKG ZKHTOYK OUSZ OYK SPZY. COYG MOY GYCL HZ IYMEU'L XYUMO OUX WHTY LOY OUX VYYGU ZKYLO UGX BPNHKHAL CHTUG HZ ZPZME, VAM U THGMO SUMYK LOY SYZM OYK KHHTU SPLMSYLL HSX CHTUG MURPGN GH PGMYKYLM PG SPZY. VAM MOY LUTY VSHC MOUMUSTHLM RPSSYX MOY WHAGMYLL, MOPL LYWHGX VSHC, KYLMHKYX GUMULOU MH SPZY.U LIPKPMAUS CHAGX IKHXAWYX VE U KYGXPGN HZ MOY LIPKPMAUS VHXE PL SPRYU IOELPWUS CHAGX UGX, LMKUGNY UL PM TUE LYYT, QALM UL U XYYI CHAGX TUEOYUS UGX PML YXNYL QHPG, IOELPWUS UGX LIPKPMAUS CHAGXL USPRY WUG EYMOYUS WHTISYMYSE HGSE UL MOY KYLASM HZ U BPMUS ZHKWY ZKHT CPMOPG.GUMULOU'L CHAGX OYUSYX PG MOUM CUE. LOY MOHANOM OYK SPZY CUL YGXYX,VAM OYK SHBY ZHK OYK THMOYK AGYDIYWMYXSE LOHCYX OYK MOUM MOY YLLYGWY HZSPZY--SHBY--CUL LMPSS UWMPBY CPMOPG OYK. SHBY UCHRY UGX LH XPX SPZY.IKPGWY UGXKYC'L SULM XUEL OUX VHAGX IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU MHNYMOYK;MOPL GYC LHKKHC VKHANOM MOYT LMPSS WSHLYK MH HGY UGHMOYK. IKPGWYLL TUKEIAM HZZ OYK XYIUKMAKY, UGX ZHK MOKYY CYYRL SHHRYX UZMYK GUMULOU UL PZLOY OUX VYYG U LPWR WOPSX. MOY SULM CYYRL IULLYX PG OYK THMOYK'L VYXKHHTOUX LMKUPGYX GUMULOU'L IOELPWUS LMKYGNMO.HGY UZMYKGHHG GHMPWPGN GUMULOU LOPBYKPGN CPMO ZYBYK, IKPGWYLL TUKE MHHROYK MH OYK HCG KHHT UGX TUXY OYK SPY XHCG HG MOY VYX. GUMULOU SUE XHCG,VAM COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX XKUCG MOY VSPGXL UGX CUL NHPGN UCUE LOYWUSSYX OYK VUWR."P XHG'M CUGM MH LSYYI, TUKE, LPM VE TY U SPMMSY.""EHA UKY MPKYX--MKE MH LSYYI.""GH, GH. COE XPX EHA VKPGN TY UCUE? LOY CPSS VY ULRPGN ZHK TY.""LOY PL TAWO VYMMYK. LOY LIHRY LH CYSS MHXUE," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE.GUMULOU SUE HG MOY VYX UGX PG MOY LYTPXUKRGYLL HZ MOY KHHT LWUGGYXIKPGWYLL TUKE'L ZUWY."PL LOY SPRY OPT?" MOHANOM GUMULOU. "EYL, SPRY UGX EYM GHM SPRY. VAM LOYPL JAPMY HKPNPGUS, LMKUGNY, GYC, UGX AGRGHCG. UGX LOY SHBYL TY. COUMPL PG OYK OYUKM? USS MOUM PL NHHX. VAM OHC? COUM PL OYK TPGX SPRY? COUMXHYL LOY MOPGR UVHAM TY? EYL, LOY PL LISYGXPX!""TUKE," LOY LUPX MPTPXSE, XKUCPGN IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OUGX MH OYKLYSZ,"TUKE, EHA TALMG'M MOPGR TY CPWRYX. GH? TUKE XUKSPGN, OHC P SHBY EHA!SYM AL VY JAPMY, JAPMY ZKPYGXL."UGX GUMULOU, YTVKUWPGN OYK, VYNUG RPLLPGN OYK ZUWY UGX OUGXL, TURPGNIKPGWYLL TUKE ZYYS LOE VAM OUIIE VE MOPL XYTHGLMKUMPHG HZ OYK ZYYSPGNL.ZKHT MOUM XUE U MYGXYK UGX IULLPHGUMY ZKPYGXLOPI LAWO UL YDPLML HGSEVYMCYYG CHTYG CUL YLMUVSPLOYX VYMCYYG IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU. MOYECYKY WHGMPGAUSSE RPLLPGN UGX LUEPGN MYGXYK MOPGNL MH HGY UGHMOYK UGXLIYGM THLM HZ MOYPK MPTY MHNYMOYK. COYG HGY CYGM HAM MOY HMOYK VYWUTYKYLMSYLL UGX OULMYGYX MH KYQHPG OYK. MHNYMOYK MOYE ZYSM THKY PG OUKTHGECPMO HGY UGHMOYK MOUG YPMOYK HZ MOYT ZYSM CPMO OYKLYSZ COYG USHGY. UZYYSPGN LMKHGNYK MOUG ZKPYGXLOPI LIKUGN AI VYMCYYG MOYT; UG YDWSALPBYZYYSPGN HZ SPZY VYPGN IHLLPVSY HGSE PG YUWO HMOYK'L IKYLYGWY.LHTYMPTYL MOYE CYKY LPSYGM ZHK OHAKL; LHTYMPTYL UZMYK MOYE CYKY USKYUXEPG VYX MOYE CHASX VYNPG MUSRPGN UGX NH HG MPSS THKGPGN. MOYE LIHRY THLMHZ COUM CUL SHGN IULM. IKPGWYLL TUKE LIHRY HZ OYK WOPSXOHHX, HZ OYKTHMOYK, OYK ZUMOYK, UGX OYK XUEXKYUTL; UGX GUMULOU, COH CPMO U IULLPBYSUWR HZ AGXYKLMUGXPGN OUX ZHKTYKSE MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT MOUM SPZY HZXYBHMPHG, LAVTPLLPHG, UGX MOY IHYMKE HZ WOKPLMPUG LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY, GHCZYYSPGN OYKLYSZ VHAGX MH IKPGWYLL TUKE VE UZZYWMPHG, SYUKGYX MH SHBY OYKIULM MHH UGX MH AGXYKLMUGX U LPXY HZ SPZY IKYBPHALSE PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY MHOYK. LOY XPX GHM MOPGR HZ UIISEPGN LAVTPLLPHG UGX LYSZ-UVGYNUMPHG MH OYKHCG SPZY, ZHK LOY CUL UWWALMHTYX MH LYYR HMOYK QHEL, VAM LOY AGXYKLMHHXUGX SHBYX PG UGHMOYK MOHLY IKYBPHALSE PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSY BPKMAYL. ZHKIKPGWYLL TUKE, SPLMYGPGN MH GUMULOU'L MUSYL HZ WOPSXOHHX UGX YUKSEEHAMO, MOYKY USLH HIYGYX HAM U GYC UGX OPMOYKMH AGWHTIKYOYGXYX LPXY HZSPZY: VYSPYZ PG SPZY UGX PML YGQHETYGM.QALM UL VYZHKY, MOYE GYBYK TYGMPHGYX OPT LH UL GHM MH SHCYK (UL MOYEMOHANOM) MOYPK YDUSMYX ZYYSPGNL VE CHKXL; VAM MOPL LPSYGWY UVHAM OPT OUXMOY YZZYWM HZ TURPGN MOYT NKUXAUSSE VYNPG MH ZHKNYM OPT CPMOHAM VYPGNWHGLWPHAL HZ PM.GUMULOU OUX NKHCG MOPG UGX IUSY UGX IOELPWUSSE LH CYUR MOUM MOYE USSMUSRYX UVHAM OYK OYUSMO, UGX MOPL ISYULYX OYK. VAM LHTYMPTYL LOY CULLAXXYGSE HBYKWHTY VE ZYUK GHM HGSE HZ XYUMO VAM HZ LPWRGYLL, CYURGYLL,UGX SHLL HZ NHHX SHHRL, UGX PGBHSAGMUKPSE LOY YDUTPGYX OYK VUKY UKTWUKYZASSE, LAKIKPLYX UM PML MOPGGYLL, UGX PG MOY THKGPGN GHMPWYX OYKXKUCG UGX, UL PM LYYTYX MH OYK, IPMYHAL ZUWY PG OYK NSULL. PM LYYTYX MHOYK MOUM MOPGNL TALM VY LH, UGX EYM PM CUL XKYUXZASSE LUX.HGY XUE LOY CYGM JAPWRSE AILMUPKL UGX ZHAGX OYKLYSZ HAM HZ VKYUMO.AGWHGLWPHALSE LOY PTTYXPUMYSE PGBYGMYX U KYULHG ZHK NHPGN XHCG, UGXMOYG, MYLMPGN OYK LMKYGNMO, KUG AILMUPKL UNUPG, HVLYKBPGN MOY KYLASM.UGHMOYK MPTY COYG LOY WUSSYX XAGEULOU OYK BHPWY MKYTVSYX, LH LOY WUSSYXUNUPG--MOHANO LOY WHASX OYUK XAGEULOU WHTPGN--WUSSYX OYK PG MOY XYYIWOYLM MHGYL PG COPWO LOY OUX VYYG CHGM MH LPGN, UGX SPLMYGYX UMMYGMPBYSEMH OYKLYSZ.LOY XPX GHM RGHC UGX CHASX GHM OUBY VYSPYBYX PM, VAM VYGYUMO MOY SUEYKHZ LSPTY MOUM WHBYKYX OYK LHAS UGX LYYTYX MH OYK PTIYGYMKUVSY, XYSPWUMYEHAGN LOHHML HZ NKULL CYKY USKYUXE LIKHAMPGN, COPWO MURPGN KHHM CHASX LHWHBYK CPMO MOYPK SPBPGN BYKXAKY MOY NKPYZ MOUM CYPNOYX OYK XHCG MOUMPM CHASX LHHG GH SHGNYK VY LYYG HK GHMPWYX. MOY CHAGX OUX VYNAG MH OYUSZKHT CPMOPG.UM MOY YGX HZ QUGAUKE IKPGWYLL TUKE SYZM ZHK THLWHC, UGX MOY WHAGMPGLPLMYX HG GUMULOU'L NHPGN CPMO OYK MH WHGLASM MOY XHWMHKL.WOUIMYK PBUZMYK MOY YGWHAGMYK UM BEUFTU, COYKY RAMAFHB OUX VYYG AGUVSY MH OHSXVUWR OPL MKHHIL PG MOYPK UGDPYME MH HBYKCOYST UGX WAM HZZ MOY YGYTE UGXLH HG, MOY ZUKMOYK THBYTYGM HZ MOY ZSYYPGN ZKYGWO, UGX HZ MOY KALLPUGLCOH IAKLAYX MOYT, WHGMPGAYX UL ZUK UL RKULGHY CPMOHAM U VUMMSY. MOYZSPNOM CUL LH KUIPX MOUM MOY KALLPUG UKTE IAKLAPGN MOY ZKYGWO WHASXGHM RYYI AI CPMO MOYT; WUBUSKE UGX UKMPSSYKE OHKLYL VKHRY XHCG, UGX MOYPGZHKTUMPHG KYWYPBYX HZ MOY THBYTYGML HZ MOY ZKYGWO CUL GYBYK KYSPUVSY.MOY TYG PG MOY KALLPUG UKTE CYKY LH CHKG HAM VE MOPL WHGMPGAHAL TUKWOPGNUM MOY KUMY HZ MCYGME-LYBYG TPSYL U XUE MOUM MOYE WHASX GHM NH UGEZULMYK.MH KYUSPFY MOY XYNKYY HZ YDOUALMPHG HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE PM PL HGSEGYWYLLUKE MH NKULI WSYUKSE MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOY ZUWM MOUM, COPSY GHMSHLPGN THKY MOUG ZPBY MOHALUGX RPSSYX UGX CHAGXYX UZMYK MUKAMPGH UGXSYLL MOUG U OAGXKYX IKPLHGYKL, MOY KALLPUG UKTE COPWO SYZM MOUM ISUWY UOAGXKYX MOHALUGX LMKHGN KYUWOYX RKULGHY CPMO HGSE ZPZME MOHALUGX.MOY KUIPXPME HZ MOY KALLPUG IAKLAPM CUL QALM UL XYLMKAWMPBY MH HAK UKTEUL MOY ZSPNOM HZ MOY ZKYGWO CUL MH MOYPKL. MOY HGSE XPZZYKYGWY CUL MOUMMOY KALLPUG UKTE THBYX BHSAGMUKPSE, CPMO GH LAWO MOKYUM HZ XYLMKAWMPHGUL OAGN HBYK MOY ZKYGWO, UGX MOUM MOY LPWR ZKYGWOTYG CYKY SYZM VYOPGXPG YGYTE OUGXL COPSY MOY LPWR KALLPUGL SYZM VYOPGX CYKY UTHGN MOYPKHCG IYHISY. MOY WOPYZ WUALY HZ MOY CULMUNY HZ GUIHSYHG'L UKTE CULMOY KUIPXPME HZ PML THBYTYGM, UGX U WHGBPGWPGN IKHHZ HZ MOPL PL MOYWHKKYLIHGXPGN XYWKYULY HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE.RAMAFHB UL ZUK UL CUL PG OPL IHCYK, PGLMYUX HZ MKEPGN MH WOYWR MOYTHBYTYGM HZ MOY ZKYGWO UL CUL XYLPKYX PG IYMYKLVAKN UGX VE MOY KALLPUGUKTE NYGYKUSL, XPKYWMYX OPL COHSY UWMPBPME OYKY, UL OY OUX XHGY UMMUKAMPGH UGX BEUFTU, MH OULMYGPGN PM HG COPSY YULPGN MOY THBYTYGM HZ HAKUKTE.VAM VYLPXYL MOPL, LPGWY MOY YDOUALMPHG UGX YGHKTHAL XPTPGAMPHG HZ MOYUKTE WUALYX VE MOY KUIPXPME HZ MOY UXBUGWY OUX VYWHTY YBPXYGM, UGHMOYKKYULHG ZHK LSUWRYGPGN MOY IUWY UGX XYSUEPGN IKYLYGMYX PMLYSZ MH RAMAFHB.MOY UPT HZ MOY KALLPUG UKTE CUL MH IAKLAY MOY ZKYGWO. MOY KHUX MOYZKYGWO CHASX MURY CUL AGRGHCG, UGX LH MOY WSHLYK HAK MKHHIL MKHX HGMOYPK OYYSL MOY NKYUMYK XPLMUGWY MOYE OUX MH WHBYK. HGSE VE ZHSSHCPGNUM LHTY XPLMUGWY WHASX HGY WAM UWKHLL MOY FPNFUN IUMO HZ MOY ZKYGWO. USSMOY UKMZAS TUGYABYKL LANNYLMYX VE HAK NYGYKUSL TYUGM ZKYLO THBYTYGML HZMOY UKTE UGX U SYGNMOYGPGN HZ PML TUKWOYL, COYKYUL MOY HGSE KYULHGUVSYUPT CUL MH LOHKMYG MOHLY TUKWOYL. MH MOUM YGX RAMAFHB'L UWMPBPME CULXPKYWMYX XAKPGN MOY COHSY WUTIUPNG ZKHT THLWHC MH BPSGU--GHM WULAUSSE HKPGMYKTPMMYGMSE VAM LH WHGLPLMYGMSE MOUM OY GYBYK HGWY XYBPUMYX ZKHT PM.RAMAFHB ZYSM UGX RGYC--GHM VE KYULHGPGN HK LWPYGWY VAM CPMO MOY COHSY HZOPL KALLPUG VYPGN--COUM YBYKE KALLPUG LHSXPYK ZYSM: MOUM MOY ZKYGWO CYKYVYUMYG, MOUM MOY YGYTE CUL ZSEPGN UGX TALM VY XKPBYG HAM; VAM UM MOYLUTY MPTY OY SPRY MOY LHSXPYKL KYUSPFYX USS MOY OUKXLOPI HZ MOPL TUKWO,MOY KUIPXPME HZ COPWO CUL AGIUKUSSYSYX ZHK LAWO U MPTY HZ MOY EYUK.VAM MH MOY NYGYKUSL, YLIYWPUSSE MOY ZHKYPNG HGYL PG MOY KALLPUG UKTE,COH CPLOYX MH XPLMPGNAPLO MOYTLYSBYL, MH ULMHGPLO LHTYVHXE, UGX ZHK LHTYKYULHG MH WUIMAKY U RPGN HK U XARY--PM LYYTYX MOUM GHC--COYG UGE VUMMSYTALM VY OHKKPVSY UGX LYGLYSYLL--CUL MOY BYKE MPTY MH ZPNOM UGX WHGJAYKLHTYVHXE. RAMAFHB TYKYSE LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL COYG HGY UZMYKUGHMOYK MOYE IKYLYGMYX IKHQYWML HZ TUGYABYKL MH VY TUXY CPMO MOHLYLHSXPYKL--PSS-LOHX, PGLAZZPWPYGMSE WSUX, UGX OUSZ LMUKBYX--COH CPMOPG UTHGMO UGX CPMOHAM ZPNOMPGN U VUMMSY OUX XCPGXSYX MH OUSZ MOYPK GATVYK,UGX COH UM MOY VYLM PZ MOY ZSPNOM WHGMPGAYX CHASX OUBY MH NH U NKYUMYKXPLMUGWY MOUG MOYE OUX USKYUXE MKUBYKLYX, VYZHKY MOYE KYUWOYX MOYZKHGMPYK.MOPL SHGNPGN MH XPLMPGNAPLO MOYTLYSBYL, MH TUGYABYK, MH HBYKMOKHC, UGXMH WAM HZZ LOHCYX PMLYSZ IUKMPWASUKSE COYGYBYK MOY KALLPUGL LMATVSYX HGMOY ZKYGWO UKTE.LH PM CUL UM RKULGHY, COYKY MOYE YDIYWMYX MH ZPGX HGY HZ MOY MOKYYZKYGWO WHSATGL UGX LMATVSYX PGLMYUX HG GUIHSYHG OPTLYSZ CPMO LPDMYYGMOHALUGX TYG. XYLIPMY USS RAMAFHB'L YZZHKML MH UBHPX MOUM KAPGHALYGWHAGMYK UGX MH IKYLYKBY OPL MKHHIL, MOY TULLUWKY HZ MOY VKHRYG THVHZ ZKYGWO LHSXPYKL VE CHKG-HAM KALLPUGL WHGMPGAYX UM RKULGHY ZHK MOKYYXUEL.MHSS CKHMY U XPLIHLPMPHG: "MOY ZPKLM WHSATG CPSS TUKWO MH LH UGX LH,"YMW. UGX UL ALAUS GHMOPGN OUIIYGYX PG UWWHKX CPMO MOY XPLIHLPMPHG.IKPGWY YANYGY HZ CAKMMYTVYKN ZPKYX ZKHT U OPSS HBYK MOY ZKYGWO WKHCXLMOUM CYKY KAGGPGN IULM, UGX XYTUGXYX KYPGZHKWYTYGML COPWO XPX GHMUKKPBY. MOY ZKYGWO, UBHPXPGN MOY KALLPUGL, XPLIYKLYX UGX OPX MOYTLYSBYLPG MOY ZHKYLM VE GPNOM, TURPGN MOYPK CUE KHAGX UL VYLM MOYE WHASX, UGXWHGMPGAYX MOYPK ZSPNOM.TPSHKUXHBPWO, COH LUPX OY XPX GHM CUGM MH RGHC UGEMOPGN UVHAM MOYWHTTPLLUKPUM UZZUPKL HZ OPL XYMUWOTYGM, UGX WHASX GYBYK VY ZHAGX COYGOY CUL CUGMYX--MOUM WOYBUSPYK LUGL IYAK YM LUGL KYIKHWOY * UL OY LMESYXOPTLYSZ--COH CUL ZHGX HZ IUKSYEL CPMO MOY ZKYGWO, LYGM YGBHEL XYTUGXPGNMOYPK LAKKYGXYK, CULMYX MPTY, UGX XPX GHM XH COUM OY CUL HKXYKYX MH XH.    * RGPNOM CPMOHAM ZYUK UGX CPMOHAM KYIKHUWO."P NPBY EHA MOUM WHSATG, SUXL," OY LUPX, KPXPGN AI MH MOY MKHHIL UGXIHPGMPGN HAM MOY ZKYGWO MH MOY WUBUSKE.UGX MOY WUBUSKE, CPMO LIAKL UGX LUVYKL AKNPGN HG OHKLYL MOUM WHASXLWUKWYSE THBY, MKHMMYX CPMO TAWO YZZHKM MH MOY WHSATG IKYLYGMYXMH MOYT--MOUM PL MH LUE, MH U WKHCX HZ ZKYGWOTYG LMUKR CPMO WHSX,ZKHLM-VPMMYG, UGX LMUKBPGN--UGX MOY WHSATG MOUM OUX VYYG IKYLYGMYX MHMOYT MOKYC XHCG PML UKTL UGX LAKKYGXYKYX UL PM OUX SHGN VYYG UGDPHAL MHXH.UM RKULGHY MOYE MHHR MCYGME-LPD MOHALUGX IKPLHGYKL, LYBYKUS OAGXKYXWUGGHG, UGX U LMPWR WUSSYX U "TUKLOUS'L LMUZZ," UGX XPLIAMYX UL MHCOH OUX XPLMPGNAPLOYX OPTLYSZ UGX CYKY ISYULYX CPMO MOYPKUWOPYBYTYGM--MOHANO MOYE TAWO KYNKYMMYX GHM OUBPGN MURYG GUIHSYHG, HK UMSYULM U TUKLOUS HK U OYKH HZ LHTY LHKM, UGX KYIKHUWOYX HGY UGHMOYK UGXYLIYWPUSSE RAMAFHB ZHK OUBPGN ZUPSYX MH XH LH.MOYLY TYG, WUKKPYX UCUE VE MOYPK IULLPHGL, CYKY VAM VSPGX MHHSL HZ MOYTHLM TYSUGWOHSE SUC HZ GYWYLLPME, VAM WHGLPXYKYX MOYTLYSBYL OYKHYL UGXPTUNPGYX MOUM MOYE CYKY UWWHTISPLOPGN U THLM GHVSY UGX OHGHKUVSYXYYX. MOYE VSUTYX RAMAFHB UGX LUPX MOUM ZKHT MOY BYKE VYNPGGPGN HZ MOYWUTIUPNG OY OUX IKYBYGMYX MOYPK BUGJAPLOPGN GUIHSYHG, MOUM OY MOHANOM HZGHMOPGN VAM LUMPLZEPGN OPL IULLPHGL UGX CHASX GHM UXBUGWY ZKHT MOY SPGYGZUWMHKPYL VYWUALY OY CUL WHTZHKMUVSY MOYKY, MOUM UM RKULGHY OY WOYWRYXMOY UXBUGWY VYWUALY HG SYUKGPGN MOUM GUIHSYHG CUL MOYKY OY OUX JAPMYSHLM OPL OYUX, UGX MOUM PM CUL IKHVUVSY MOUM OY OUX UG AGXYKLMUGXPGNCPMO GUIHSYHG UGX OUX VYYG VKPVYX VE OPT, UGX LH HG, UGX LH HG.GHM HGSE XPX OPL WHGMYTIHKUKPYL, WUKKPYX UCUE VE MOYPK IULLPHGL, MUSRPG MOPL CUE, VAM IHLMYKPME UGX OPLMHKE OUBY UWWSUPTYX GUIHSYHG UL NKUGX,COPSY RAMAFHB PL XYLWKPVYX VE ZHKYPNGYKL UL U WKUZME, XPLLHSAMY, CYURHSX WHAKMPYK, UGX VE KALLPUGL UL LHTYMOPGN PGXYZPGPMY--U LHKM HZ IAIIYMALYZAS HGSE VYWUALY OY OUX U KALLPUG GUTY.WOUIMYK BPG 1812 UGX 1813 RAMAFHB CUL HIYGSE UWWALYX HZ VSAGXYKPGN. VAM RAMAFHB--MOY TUG COH ZKHT MOY VYNPGGPGN MH MOY YGX HZ OPLUWMPBPME PG 1812, GYBYK HGWY LCYKBPGN VE CHKX HK XYYX ZKHT VHKHXPGH MHBPSGU, IKYLYGMYX UG YDUTISY YDWYIMPHGUS PG OPLMHKE HZ LYSZ-LUWKPZPWYUGX U IKYLYGM WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY ZAMAKY PTIHKMUGWY HZ COUM CULOUIIYGPGN--RAMAFHB LYYTL MH MOYT LHTYMOPGN PGXYZPGPMY UGX IPMPZAS, UGXCOYG LIYURPGN HZ OPT UGX HZ MOY EYUK 1812 MOYE USCUEL LYYT U SPMMSYULOUTYX.UGX EYM PM PL XPZZPWASM MH PTUNPGY UG OPLMHKPWUS WOUKUWMYK COHLYUWMPBPME CUL LH AGLCYKBPGNSE XPKYWMYX MH U LPGNSY UPT; UGX PM CHASX VYXPZZPWASM MH PTUNPGY UGE UPT THKY CHKMOE HK THKY WHGLHGUGM CPMO MOYCPSS HZ MOY COHSY IYHISY. LMPSS THKY XPZZPWASM CHASX PM VY MH ZPGXUG PGLMUGWY PG OPLMHKE HZ MOY UPT HZ UG OPLMHKPWUS IYKLHGUNY VYPGN LHWHTISYMYSE UWWHTISPLOYX UL MOUM MH COPWO USS RAMAFHB'L YZZHKML CYKYXPKYWMYX PG 1812.RAMAFHB GYBYK MUSRYX HZ "ZHKME WYGMAKPYL SHHRPGN XHCG ZKHT MOYIEKUTPXL," HZ MOY LUWKPZPWYL OY HZZYKYX ZHK MOY ZUMOYKSUGX, HK HZCOUM OY PGMYGXYX MH UWWHTISPLO HK OUX UWWHTISPLOYX; PG NYGYKUS OY LUPXGHMOPGN UVHAM OPTLYSZ, UXHIMYX GH IHLY, USCUEL UIIYUKYX MH VY MOYLPTISYLM UGX THLM HKXPGUKE HZ TYG, UGX LUPX MOY LPTISYLM UGX THLMHKXPGUKE MOPGNL. OY CKHMY SYMMYKL MH OPL XUANOMYKL UGX MH TUXUTY XYLMUYS, KYUX GHBYSL, SPRYX MOY LHWPYME HZ IKYMME CHTYG, QYLMYX CPMONYGYKUSL, HZZPWYKL, UGX LHSXPYKL, UGX GYBYK WHGMKUXPWMYX MOHLY COH MKPYXMH IKHBY UGEMOPGN MH OPT. COYG WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG UM MOY EUAFU VKPXNYNUSSHIYX AI MH RAMAFHB CPMO IYKLHGUS KYIKHUWOYL ZHK OUBPGN WUALYX MOYXYLMKAWMPHG HZ THLWHC, UGX LUPX: "OHC CUL PM EHA IKHTPLYX GHM MH UVUGXHGTHLWHC CPMOHAM U VUMMSY?" LMPSS SYLL WHASX PM TUMMYK MHOPT COH CUL UIIHPGMYX WOPYZ HZ MOY UKMPSSYKE.GHM TYKYSE PG MOYLY WULYL VAM WHGMPGAUSSE XPX MOUM HSX TUG--COH VEYDIYKPYGWY HZ SPZY OUX KYUWOYX MOY WHGBPWMPHG MOUM MOHANOML UGX MOYCHKXL LYKBPGN UL MOYPK YDIKYLLPHG UKY GHM COUM THBY IYHISY--ALY JAPMYTYUGPGNSYLL CHKXL MOUM OUIIYGYX MH YGMYK OPL OYUX.VAM MOUM TUG, LH OYYXSYLL HZ OPL CHKXL, XPX GHM HGWY XAKPGN MOY COHSYMPTY HZ OPL UWMPBPME AMMYK HGY CHKX PGWHGLPLMYGM CPMO MOY LPGNSY UPTMHCUKX COPWO OY THBYX MOKHANOHAM MOY COHSY CUK. HVBPHALSE PG LIPMY HZOPTLYSZ, PG BYKE XPBYKLY WPKWATLMUGWYL, OY KYIYUMYXSE YDIKYLLYX OPL KYUSMOHANOML CPMO MOY VPMMYK WHGBPWMPHG MOUM OY CHASX GHM VY AGXYKLMHHX.VYNPGGPGN CPMO MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGH, ZKHT COPWO MPTY OPL XPLUNKYYTYGMCPMO MOHLY UVHAM OPT VYNUG, OY USHGY LUPX MOUM MOY VUMMSY HZ VHKHXPGHCUL U BPWMHKE, UGX KYIYUMYX MOPL VHMO BYKVUSSE UGX PG OPL XPLIUMWOYLUGX KYIHKML AI MH MOY MPTY HZ OPL XYUMO. OYUSHGY XAKPGN MOY KYMKYUM HZ MOY ZKYGWO LUPX MOUM USS HAK TUGYABYKL UKYALYSYLL, YBYKEMOPGN PL VYPGN UWWHTISPLOYX HZ PMLYSZ VYMMYK MOUG CY WHASXXYLPKY; MOUM MOY YGYTE TALM VY HZZYKYX "U NHSXYG VKPXNY"; MOUM GYPMOYKMOY MUKAMPGH, MOY BEUFTU, GHK MOY RKULGHY VUMMSYL CYKY GYWYLLUKE; MOUMCY TALM RYYI LHTY ZHKWY MH KYUWO MOY ZKHGMPYK CPMO, UGX MOUM OY CHASXGHM LUWKPZPWY U LPGNSY KALLPUG ZHK MYG ZKYGWOTYG.UGX MOPL WHAKMPYK, UL OY PL XYLWKPVYX MH AL, COH SPYL MH UKURWOYYBMH ISYULY MOY YTIYKHK, OY USHGY--PGWAKKPGN MOYKYVE MOY YTIYKHK'LXPLISYULAKY--LUPX PG BPSGU MOUM MH WUKKE MOY CUK VYEHGX MOY ZKHGMPYK PLALYSYLL UGX OUKTZAS.GHK XH CHKXL USHGY IKHBY MOUM HGSE OY AGXYKLMHHX MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOYYBYGML. OPL UWMPHGL--CPMOHAM MOY LTUSSYLM XYBPUMPHG--CYKY USS XPKYWMYXMH HGY UGX MOY LUTY MOKYYZHSX YGX: (1) MH VKUWY USS OPL LMKYGNMO ZHKWHGZSPWM CPMO MOY ZKYGWO, (2) MH XYZYUM MOYT, UGX (3) MH XKPBY MOYT HAMHZ KALLPU, TPGPTPFPGN UL ZUK UL IHLLPVSY MOY LAZZYKPGNL HZ HAK IYHISYUGX HZ HAK UKTE.MOPL IKHWKULMPGUMHK RAMAFHB, COHLY THMMH CUL "IUMPYGWY UGX MPTY,"MOPL YGYTE HZ XYWPLPBY UWMPHG, NUBY VUMMSY UM VHKHXPGH, PGBYLMPGN MOYIKYIUKUMPHGL ZHK PM CPMO AGIUKUSSYSYX LHSYTGPME. MOPL RAMAFHB COH VYZHKYMOY VUMMSY HZ UALMYKSPMF VYNUG LUPX MOUM PM CHASX VY SHLM, OY USHGY, PGWHGMKUXPWMPHG MH YBYKEHGY YSLY, XYWSUKYX MPSS OPL XYUMO MOUM VHKHXPGHCUL U BPWMHKE, XYLIPMY MOY ULLAKUGWY HZ NYGYKUSL MOUM MOY VUMMSY CULSHLM UGX XYLIPMY MOY ZUWM MOUM ZHK UG UKTE MH OUBY MH KYMPKY UZMYKCPGGPGN U VUMMSY CUL AGIKYWYXYGMYX. OY USHGY XAKPGN MOY COHSY KYMKYUMPGLPLMYX MOUM VUMMSYL, COPWO CYKY ALYSYLL MOYG, LOHASX GHM VY ZHANOM,UGX MOUM U GYC CUK LOHASX GHM VY VYNAG GHK MOY ZKHGMPYKL HZ KALLPUWKHLLYX.PM PL YULE GHC MH AGXYKLMUGX MOY LPNGPZPWUGWY HZ MOYLY YBYGML--PZHGSE CY UVLMUPG ZKHT UMMKPVAMPGN MH MOY UWMPBPME HZ MOY TULL UPTL MOUMYDPLMYX HGSE PG MOY OYUXL HZ U XHFYG PGXPBPXAUSL--ZHK MOY YBYGML UGXKYLASML GHC SPY VYZHKY AL.VAM OHC XPX MOUM HSX TUG, USHGY, PG HIIHLPMPHG MH MOY NYGYKUS HIPGPHG,LH MKASE XPLWYKG MOY PTIHKMUGWY HZ MOY IYHISY'L BPYC HZ MOY YBYGML MOUMPG USS OPL UWMPBPME OY CUL GYBYK HGWY AGMKAY MH PM?MOY LHAKWY HZ MOUM YDMKUHKXPGUKE IHCYK HZ IYGYMKUMPGN MOY TYUGPGN HZ MOYYBYGML MOYG HWWAKPGN SUE PG MOY GUMPHGUS ZYYSPGN COPWO OY IHLLYLLYX PGZASS IAKPME UGX LMKYGNMO.HGSE MOY KYWHNGPMPHG HZ MOY ZUWM MOUM OY IHLLYLLYX MOPL ZYYSPGN WUALYXMOY IYHISY PG LH LMKUGNY U TUGGYK, WHGMKUKE MH MOY MLUK'L CPLO, MHLYSYWM OPT--UG HSX TUG PG XPLZUBHK--MH VY MOYPK KYIKYLYGMUMPBY PG MOYGUMPHGUS CUK. UGX HGSE MOUM ZYYSPGN ISUWYX OPT HG MOUM OPNOYLM OATUGIYXYLMUS ZKHT COPWO OY, MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ, XYBHMYX USS OPL IHCYKLGHM MH LSUEPGN UGX XYLMKHEPGN TYG VAM MH LUBPGN UGX LOHCPGN IPME HGMOYT.MOUM LPTISY, THXYLM, UGX MOYKYZHKY MKASE NKYUM, ZPNAKY WHASX GHM VY WULMPG MOY ZUSLY THSX HZ U YAKHIYUG OYKH--MOY LAIIHLYX KASYK HZ TYG--MOUMOPLMHKE OUL PGBYGMYX.MH U SUWRYE GH TUG WUG VY NKYUM, ZHK U SUWRYE OUL OPL HCG WHGWYIMPHG HZNKYUMGYLL.WOUIMYK BPMOY ZPZMO HZ GHBYTVYK CUL MOY ZPKLM XUE HZ COUM PL WUSSYX MOY VUMMSY HZRKULGHY. MHCUKX YBYGPGN--UZMYK TAWO XPLIAMPGN UGX TUGE TPLMURYL TUXY VENYGYKUSL COH XPX GHM NH MH MOYPK IKHIYK ISUWYL, UGX UZMYK UXQAMUGML OUXVYYG LYGM UVHAM CPMO WHAGMYKHKXYKL--COYG PM OUX VYWHTY ISUPG MOUM MOYYGYTE CUL YBYKECOYKY PG ZSPNOM UGX MOUM MOYKY WHASX UGX CHASX VY GHVUMMSY, RAMAFHB SYZM RKULGHY UGX CYGM MH XHVKHY COPMOYK OPL OYUXJAUKMYKLOUX MOUM XUE VYYG MKUGLZYKKYX.MOY XUE CUL WSYUK UGX ZKHLME. RAMAFHB KHXY MH XHVKHY HG OPL ISATI SPMMSYCOPMY OHKLY, ZHSSHCYX VE UG YGHKTHAL LAPMY HZ XPLWHGMYGMYX NYGYKUSL COHCOPLIYKYX UTHGN MOYTLYSBYL VYOPGX OPL VUWR. USS USHGN MOY KHUX NKHAIL HZZKYGWO IKPLHGYKL WUIMAKYX MOUM XUE (MOYKY CYKY LYBYG MOHALUGX HZ MOYT)CYKY WKHCXPGN MH CUKT MOYTLYSBYL UM WUTIZPKYL. GYUK XHVKHY UG PTTYGLYWKHCX HZ MUMMYKYX IKPLHGYKL, VAFFPGN CPMO MUSR UGX CKUIIYX UGX VUGXUNYXPG UGEMOPGN MOYE OUX VYYG UVSY MH NYM OHSX HZ, CYKY LMUGXPGN PG MOY KHUXVYLPXY U SHGN KHC HZ AGOUKGYLLYX ZKYGWO NAGL. UM MOY UIIKHUWO HZ MOYWHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ MOY VAFF HZ MUSR WYULYX UGX USS YEYL CYKY ZPDYX HGRAMAFHB COH, CYUKPGN U COPMY WUI CPMO U KYX VUGX UGX U IUXXYX HBYKWHUMMOUM VASNYX HG OPL KHAGX LOHASXYKL, THBYX LSHCSE USHGN MOY KHUX HG OPLCOPMY OHKLY. HGY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL CUL KYIHKMPGN MH OPT COYKY MOY NAGL UGXIKPLHGYKL OUX VYYG WUIMAKYX.RAMAFHB LYYTYX IKYHWWAIPYX UGX XPX GHM SPLMYG MH COUM MOY NYGYKUS CULLUEPGN. OY LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL CPMO U XPLLUMPLZPYX SHHR UL OY NUFYXUMMYGMPBYSE UGX ZPDYXSE UM MOYLY IKPLHGYKL, COH IKYLYGMYX U LIYWPUSSECKYMWOYX UIIYUKUGWY. THLM HZ MOYT CYKY XPLZPNAKYX VE ZKHLM-VPMMYG GHLYLUGX WOYYRL, UGX GYUKSE USS OUX KYX, LCHSSYG UGX ZYLMYKPGN YEYL.HGY NKHAI HZ MOY ZKYGWO LMHHX WSHLY MH MOY KHUX, UGX MCH HZ MOYT, HGY HZCOHT OUX OPL ZUWY WHBYKYX CPMO LHKYL, CYKY MYUKPGN U IPYWY HZ KUCZSYLO CPMO MOYPK OUGXL. MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN OHKKPVSY UGX VYLMPUS PGMOY ZSYYMPGN NSUGWY MOYE MOKYC UM MOY KPXYKL UGX PG MOY TUSYBHSYGMYDIKYLLPHG CPMO COPWO, UZMYK U NSUGWY UM RAMAFHB, MOY LHSXPYK CPMO MOYLHKYL PTTYXPUMYSE MAKGYX UCUE UGX CYGM HG CPMO COUM OY CUL XHPGN.RAMAFHB SHHRYX SHGN UGX PGMYGMSE UM MOYLY MCH LHSXPYKL. OY IAWRYKYX OPLZUWY, LWKYCYX AI OPL YEYL, UGX IYGLPBYSE LCUEYX OPL OYUX. UM UGHMOYKLIHM OY GHMPWYX U KALLPUG LHSXPYK SUANOPGNSE IUMMPGN U ZKYGWOTUG HG MOYLOHASXYK, LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN MH OPT PG U ZKPYGXSE TUGGYK, UGX RAMAFHB CPMOMOY LUTY YDIKYLLPHG HG OPL ZUWY UNUPG LCUEYX OPL OYUX."COUM CYKY EHA LUEPGN?" OY ULRYX MOY NYGYKUS, COH WHGMPGAPGN OPL KYIHKMXPKYWMYX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ'L UMMYGMPHG MH LHTY LMUGXUKXL WUIMAKYXZKHT MOY ZKYGWO UGX LMUGXPGN PG ZKHGM HZ MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR KYNPTYGM."UO, MOY LMUGXUKXL!" LUPX RAMAFHB, YBPXYGMSE XYMUWOPGN OPTLYSZ CPMOXPZZPWASME ZKHT MOY MOHANOML MOUM IKYHWWAIPYX OPT.OY SHHRYX UVHAM OPT UVLYGMSE. MOHALUGXL HZ YEYL CYKY SHHRPGN UM OPT ZKHTUSS LPXYL UCUPMPGN U CHKX ZKHT OPT.OY LMHIIYX PG ZKHGM HZ MOY IKYHVKUFOYGLR KYNPTYGM, LPNOYX XYYISE, UGXWSHLYX OPL YEYL. HGY HZ OPL LAPMY VYWRHGYX MH MOY LHSXPYKL WUKKEPGNMOY LMUGXUKXL MH UXBUGWY UGX LAKKHAGX MOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ CPMO MOYT.RAMAFHB CUL LPSYGM ZHK U ZYC LYWHGXL UGX MOYG, LAVTPMMPGN CPMO YBPXYGMKYSAWMUGWY MH MOY XAME PTIHLYX VE OPL IHLPMPHG, KUPLYX OPL OYUXUGX VYNUG MH LIYUR. "SHCYK, SHCYK, MOUM'L PM. OAKKUO SUXL!" OY UXXYX, UXXKYLLPGNMOY TYG CPMO U KUIPX THBYTYGM HZ OPL WOPG."OAK-K-KUO!" KHUKYX MOHALUGXL HZ BHPWYL.COPSY MOY LHSXPYKL CYKY LOHAMPGN RAMAFHB SYUGYX ZHKCUKX PG OPL LUXXSYUGX VHCYX OPL OYUX, UGX OPL YEY SPM AI CPMO U TPSX UGX UIIUKYGMSE PKHGPWNSYUT."EHA LYY, VKHMOYKL..." PM CUL GH SHGNYKMOY WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZ LIYURPGN VAM UG HKXPGUKE HSX TUG COH CUGMYX MHMYSS OPL WHTKUXYL LHTYMOPGN BYKE PTIHKMUGM.MOYKY CUL U LMPK UTHGN MOY MOKHGN HZ HZZPWYKL UGX PG MOY KUGRL HZ MOYLHSXPYKL, COH THBYX MOUM MOYE TPNOM OYUK VYMMYK COUM OY CUL NHPGN MHLUE."EHA LYY, VKHMOYKL, P RGHC PM'L OUKX ZHK EHA, VAM PM WUG'M VY OYSIYX!VYUK AI; PM CHG'M VY ZHK SHGN GHC! PM PL OUKX ZHK EHA, VAMLMPSS EHA UKY UM OHTY COPSY MOYE--EHA LYY COUM MOYE OUBY WHTY MH," LUPXOY, IHPGMPGN MH MOY IKPLHGYKL. "CHKLY HZZ MOUG HAK IHHKYLM VYNNUKL.COPSY MOYE CYKY LMKHGN CY XPXG'M LIUKY HAKLYSBYL, VAM GHC CY TUE YBYGIPME MOYT. MOYE UKY OATUG VYPGNL MHH. PLG'M PM LH, SUXL?"OY SHHRYX UKHAGX, UGX PG MOY XPKYWM, KYLIYWMZAS, CHGXYKPGN NUFY ZPDYXAIHG OPT OY KYUX LETIUMOE CPMO COUM OY OUX LUPX. OY WKPYX, LAXXYGSE SPZMPGN OPL OYUX.UGX ZSHAKPLOPGN OPL COPI OY KHXY HZZ UM U NUSSHI ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTYXAKPGN MOY COHSY WUTIUPNG, UGX SYZM MOY VKHRYG KUGRL HZ MOY LHSXPYKLSUANOPGN QHEZASSE UGX LOHAMPGN "OAKKUO!"RAMAFHB'L CHKXL CYKY OUKXSE AGXYKLMHHX VE MOY MKHHIL. GH HGY WHASX OUBYKYIYUMYX MOY ZPYSX TUKLOUS'L UXXKYLL, VYNAG LHSYTGSE UGX MOYG WOUGNPGNPGMH UG HSX TUG'L LPTISYOYUKMYX MUSR; VAM MOY OYUKME LPGWYKPME HZ MOUMLIYYWO, MOY ZYYSPGN HZ TUQYLMPW MKPATIO WHTVPGYX CPMO IPME ZHK MOY ZHYUGX WHGLWPHALGYLL HZ MOY QALMPWY HZ HAK WUALY, YDUWMSE YDIKYLLYX VE MOUMHSX TUG'L NHHX-GUMAKYX YDISYMPBYL, CUL GHM TYKYSE AGXYKLMHHX VAM SUEPG MOY LHAS HZ YBYKE LHSXPYK UGX ZHAGX YDIKYLLPHG PG MOYPK QHEHAL UGXSHGN-LALMUPGYX LOHAML. UZMYKCUKXL COYG HGY HZ MOY NYGYKUSL UXXKYLLYXRAMAFHB ULRPGN COYMOYK OY CPLOYX OPL WUSYWOY MH VY LYGM ZHK, RAMAFHB PGUGLCYKPGN AGYDIYWMYXSE NUBY U LHV, VYPGN YBPXYGMSE NKYUMSE THBYX.WOUIMYK BPPCOYG MOY MKHHIL KYUWOYX MOYPK GPNOM'L OUSMPGN ISUWY HG MOY YPNOMO HZGHBYTVYK, MOY SULM XUE HZ MOY RKULGHY VUMMSYL, PM CUL USKYUXE NKHCPGNXALR. USS XUE PM OUX VYYG WUST UGX ZKHLME CPMO HWWULPHGUS SPNOMSEZUSSPGN LGHC UGX MHCUKX YBYGPGN PM VYNUG MH WSYUK. MOKHANO MOY ZUSSPGNLGHC U IAKISY-VSUWR UGX LMUKKE LRE LOHCYX PMLYSZ UGX MOY ZKHLM NKYCRYYGYK.UG PGZUGMKE KYNPTYGM COPWO OUX SYZM MUKAMPGH MOKYY MOHALUGX LMKHGN VAMGHC GATVYKYX HGSE GPGY OAGXKYX CUL HGY HZ MOY ZPKLM MH UKKPBY MOUM GPNOMUM PML OUSMPGN ISUWY--U BPSSUNY HG MOY OPNOKHUX. MOY JAUKMYKTULMYKL COHTYM MOY KYNPTYGM UGGHAGWYX MOUM USS MOY OAML CYKY ZASS HZ LPWR UGX XYUXZKYGWOTYG, WUBUSKETYG, UGX TYTVYKL HZ MOY LMUZZ. MOYKY CUL HGSE HGY OAMUBUPSUVSY ZHK MOY KYNPTYGMUS WHTTUGXYK.MOY WHTTUGXYK KHXY AI MH OPL OAM. MOY KYNPTYGM IULLYX MOKHANO MOYBPSSUNY UGX LMUWRYX PML UKTL PG ZKHGM HZ MOY SULM OAML.SPRY LHTY OANY TUGE-SPTVYX UGPTUS, MOY KYNPTYGM VYNUG MH IKYIUKY PMLSUPK UGX PML ZHHX. HGY IUKM HZ PM XPLIYKLYX UGX CUXYX RGYY-XYYIMOKHANO MOY LGHC PGMH U VPKWO ZHKYLM MH MOY KPNOM HZ MOY BPSSUNY, UGXPTTYXPUMYSE MOY LHAGX HZ UDYL UGX LCHKXL, MOY WKULOPGN HZ VKUGWOYL,UGX TYKKE BHPWYL WHASX VY OYUKX ZKHT MOYKY. UGHMOYK LYWMPHG UTPX MOYKYNPTYGMUS CUNHGL UGX OHKLYL COPWO CYKY LMUGXPGN PG U NKHAI CUL VALENYMMPGN HAM WUSXKHGL UGX KEY VPLWAPM, UGX ZYYXPGN MOY OHKLYL. U MOPKXLYWMPHG LWUMMYKYX MOKHANO MOY BPSSUNY UKKUGNPGN JAUKMYKL ZHK MOY LMUZZHZZPWYKL, WUKKEPGN HAM MOY ZKYGWO WHKILYL MOUM CYKY PG MOY OAML, UGXXKUNNPGN UCUE VHUKXL, XKE CHHX, UGX MOUMWO ZKHT MOY KHHZL, ZHK MOYWUTIZPKYL, HK CUMMSY ZYGWYL MH LYKBY ZHK LOYSMYK.LHTY ZPZMYYG TYG CPMO TYKKE LOHAML CYKY LOURPGN XHCG MOY OPNO CUMMSYCUSS HZ U LOYX, MOY KHHZ HZ COPWO OUX USKYUXE VYYG KYTHBYX."GHC MOYG, USS MHNYMOYK--LOHBY!" MOY SHCYK LMURYL WKUWRYX THKY UGXTHKY UGX UM SULM MOY CUSS ZYSS, UGX CPMO PM MOY TYG COH OUX VYYG IALOPGNPM. SHAX, WHUKLY SUANOMYK UGX QHEHAL LOHAML YGLAYX."GHC MOYG, WUMWO OHSX PG MCHL! VAM XYLIPMY MOYPK AGPMYX YZZHKML MOY CUMMSY OUKXSE THBYX, UGXPG MOY LPSYGWY MOUM ZHSSHCYX MOY OYUBE VKYUMOPGN HZ MOY TYG CUL UAXPVSY."OYKY, EHA HZ MOY LPDMO WHTIUGE! XYBPSL MOUM EHA UKY! EHA TUE CUGM AL HGY HZ MOYLY XUEL."LHTY MCYGME TYG HZ MOY LPDMO WHTIUGE COH CYKY HG MOYPK CUE PGMH MOYBPSSUNY QHPGYX MOY OUASYKL, UGX MOY CUMMSY CUSS, COPWO CUL UVHAMMOPKME-ZPBY ZYYM SHGN UGX LYBYG ZYYM OPNO, THBYX ZHKCUKX USHGN MOYBPSSUNY LMKYYM, LCUEPGN, IKYLLPGN AIHG UGX WAMMPGN MOY LOHASXYKL HZ MOYNULIPGN TYG."NYM USHGN... LOHAMYX OY,OPMMPGN MOY ZPKLM TUG COH WUTY PG OPL CUE U LCPGNPGN VSHC HG MOY VUWR."WUG'M EHA TURY SYLL GHPLY?"MOY TYG VYWUTY LPSYGM. LUPX U SUANOPGN BHPWY, UGX THXYKUMPGN MOYPK MHGYLMOY TYG THBYX ZHKCUKX.COYG MOYE CYKY HAM HZ MOY BPSSUNY MOYE VYNUG MUSRPGN UNUPG UL SHAX ULVYZHKY, PGMYKSUKXPGN MOYPK MUSR CPMO MOY LUTY UPTSYLL YDISYMPBYL.PG MOY OAM COPWO MOY TYG OUX IULLYX, MOY WOPYZ HZZPWYKL OUX NUMOYKYX UGXCYKY PG UGPTUMYX MUSR HBYK MOYPK MYU UVHAM MOY YBYGML HZ MOY XUE UGX MOYTUGYABYKL LANNYLMYX ZHK MHTHKKHC. PM CUL IKHIHLYX MH TURY U ZSUGR TUKWOMH MOY SYZM, WAM HZZ MOY BPWY-RPGN (TAKUM) UGX WUIMAKY OPT.VE MOY MPTY MOY LHSXPYKL OUX XKUNNYX MOY CUMMSY ZYGWY MH PML ISUWYMOY WUTIZPKYL CYKY VSUFPGN HG USS LPXYL KYUXE ZHK WHHRPGN, MOY CHHXWKUWRSYX, MOY LGHC CUL TYSMPGN, UGX VSUWR LOUXHCL HZ LHSXPYKL ZSPMMYXMH UGX ZKH USS HBYK MOY HWWAIPYX LIUWY COYKY MOY LGHC OUX VYYG MKHXXYGXHCG.UDYL UGX WOHIIYKL CYKY ISPYX USS UKHAGX. YBYKEMOPGN CUL XHGY CPMOHAM UGEHKXYKL VYPGN NPBYG. LMHKYL HZ CHHX CYKY VKHANOM ZHK MOY GPNOM, LOYSMYKLCYKY KPNNYX AI ZHK MOY HZZPWYKL, WUSXKHGL CYKY VYPGN VHPSYX, UGX TALRYMLUGX UWWHAMYKTYGML IAM PG HKXYK.MOY CUMMSY CUSS MOY TYG OUX VKHANOM CUL LYM AI PG U LYTPWPKWSY VE MOYYPNOMO WHTIUGE UL U LOYSMYK ZKHT MOY GHKMO, IKHIIYX AI VE TALRYM KYLML,UGX U WUTIZPKY CUL VAPSM VYZHKY PM. MOYE VYUM MOY MUMMHH, WUSSYX MOYKHSS, OUX LAIIYK, UGX LYMMSYX XHCG KHAGX MOY ZPKYL ZHK MOY GPNOM--LHTYKYIUPKPGN MOYPK ZHHMNYUK, LHTY LTHRPGN IPIYL, UGX LHTY LMKPIIPGNMOYTLYSBYL GURYX MH LMYUT MOY SPWY HAM HZ MOYPK LOPKML.WOUIMYK BPPPHGY CHASX OUBY MOHANOM MOUM AGXYK MOY USTHLM PGWKYXPVSE CKYMWOYXWHGXPMPHGL MOY KALLPUG LHSXPYKL CYKY PG UM MOUM MPTY--SUWRPGN CUKT VHHMLUGX LOYYILRPG WHUML, CPMOHAM U KHHZ HBYK MOYPK OYUXL, PG MOY LGHCCPMO YPNOMYYG XYNKYYL HZ ZKHLM, UGX CPMOHAM YBYG ZASS KUMPHGL (MOYWHTTPLLUKPUM XPX GHM USCUEL RYYI AI CPMO MOY MKHHIL)--MOYE CHASX OUBYIKYLYGMYX U BYKE LUX UGX XYIKYLLPGN LIYWMUWSY.HG MOY WHGMKUKE, MOY UKTE OUX GYBYK AGXYK MOY VYLM TUMYKPUS WHGXPMPHGLIKYLYGMYX U THKY WOYYKZAS UGX UGPTUMYX ULIYWM. MOPL CUL VYWUALY USS COHVYNUG MH NKHC XYIKYLLYX HK COH SHLM LMKYGNMO CYKY LPZMYX HAM HZ MOY UKTEXUE VE XUE. USS MOY IOELPWUSSE HK THKUSSE CYUR OUX SHGN LPGWY VYYGSYZM VYOPGX UGX HGSE MOY ZSHCYK HZ MOY UKTE--IOELPWUSSE UGXTYGMUSSE--KYTUPGYX.THKY TYG WHSSYWMYX VYOPGX MOY CUMMSY ZYGWY HZ MOY YPNOMO WHTIUGE MOUGUGECOYKY YSLY. MCH LYKNYUGML TUQHK CYKY LPMMPGN CPMO MOYT UGX MOYPKWUTIZPKY VSUFYX VKPNOMYK MOUG HMOYKL. ZHK SYUBY MH LPM VE MOYPK CUMMSYMOYE XYTUGXYX WHGMKPVAMPHGL HZ ZAYS."YO, TURYYB! LOHAMYX U KYX-OUPKYXUGX KYX-ZUWYX TUG, LWKYCPGN AI OPL YEYL UGX VSPGRPGN VYWUALY HZ MOYLTHRY VAM GHM THBPGN VUWR ZKHT MOY ZPKY. "UGX EHA, QUWRXUC, NH UGX ZYMWOLHTY CHHX!" LUPX OY MH UGHMOYK LHSXPYK.MOPL KYX-OUPKYX TUG CUL GYPMOYK U LYKNYUGM GHK U WHKIHKUS, VAM VYPGNKHVALM OY HKXYKYX UVHAM MOHLY CYURYK MOUG OPTLYSZ. MOYE LUE MOUM COYG CY'BY ZPGPLOYXOUTTYKPGN MOYT, CY'KY MH KYWYPBY XHAVSY RPML!""UGX MOUM LHG HZ U VPMWO IYMKHB OUL SUNNYX VYOPGX UZMYK USS, PM LYYTL,"LUPX HGY LYKNYUGM TUQHK."P'BY OUX UG YEY HG OPT MOPL SHGN COPSY," LUPX MOY HMOYK."CYSS, OY'L U IHHK LHKM HZ LHSXPYK...""VAM PG MOY MOPKX WHTIUGE MOYE LUE GPGY TYG CYKY TPLLPGN EYLMYKXUE.""EYL, PM'L USS BYKE CYSS, VAM COYG U TUG'L ZYYM UKY ZKHFYG OHC WUG OYCUSR?""YO? KYISPYX MOY LYKNYUGM TUQHK JAPYMSE.MOY LHSXPYK LUPX GH THKY UGX MOY MUSR CYGM HG."COUM U SHM HZ MOHLY ZKYGWOPYL CYKY MURYG MHXUE, UGX MOY ZUWM PL MOUMGHM HGY HZ MOYT OUX COUM EHA TPNOM WUSS KYUS VHHML HG," LUPX U LHSXPYK,LMUKMPGN U GYC MOYTY. "MOYE CYKY GH THKY MOUG TURY-VYSPYBYL.""MOY WHLLUWRL OUBY MURYG MOYPK VHHML. MOYE CYKY WSYUKPGN MOY OAM ZHK MOYWHSHGYS UGX WUKKPYX MOYT HAM. PM CUL IPMPZAS MH LYY MOYT, VHEL," IAM PGMOY XUGWYK. U JAYYK SHM!""VAM PM'L LMKUGNY, ZKPYGXL," WHGMPGAYX MOY TUG COH OUX CHGXYKYX UM MOYPKCOPMYGYLL, "MOY IYULUGML UM THFOUELR CYKY LUEPGN MOUM COYG MOYE VYNUGVAKEPGN MOY XYUX--COYKY MOY VUMMSY CUL EHA RGHC--CYSS, MOHLY XYUX OUXVYYG SEPGN MOYKY ZHK GYUKSE U THGMO, UGX LUEL MOY IYULUGM, 'MOYE SPYUL COPMY UL IUIYK, WSYUG, UGX GHM UL TAWO LTYSS UL U IAZZ HZ IHCXYKLTHRY.'""CUL PM ZKHT MOY WHSX?" ULRYX LHTYHGY."EHA'KY U WSYBYK ZYSSHC! ZKHT MOY WHSX PGXYYX! COE, PM CUL OHM. PZ PMOUX VYYG ZKHT MOY WHSX, HAKL CHASX GHM OUBY KHMMYX YPMOYK. 'VAM,' OYLUEL, 'NH AI MH HAKL UGX MOYE UKY USS KHMMYG UGX TUNNHME. LH,' OY LUEL,'CY MPY HAK ZUWYL AI CPMO RYKWOPYZL UGX MAKG HAK OYUXL UCUE UL CY XKUNMOYT HZZ: CY WUG OUKXSE XH PM. VAM MOYPKL,' OY LUEL, 'UKY COPMY UL IUIYKUGX GHM LH TAWO LTYSS UL U COPZZ HZ NAGIHCXYK.'"USS CYKY LPSYGM."PM TALM VY ZKHT MOYPK ZHHX," LUPX MOY LYKNYUGM TUQHK. "MOYE ALYX MHNHVVSY MOY LUTY ZHHX UL MOY NYGMKE."GH HGY WHGMKUXPWMYX OPT."MOUM IYULUGM GYUK THFOUELR COYKY MOY VUMMSY CUL LUPX MOY TYG CYKY USSWUSSYX AI ZKHT MYG BPSSUNYL UKHAGX UGX MOYE WUKMYX ZHK MCYGME XUEL UGXLMPSS XPXG'M ZPGPLO WUKMPGN MOY XYUX UCUE. UGX UL ZHK MOY CHSBYL, OYLUEL...""MOUM CUL U KYUS VUMMSY," LUPX UG HSX LHSXPYK. "PM'L MOY HGSE HGY CHKMOKYTYTVYKPGN; VAM LPGWY MOUM... PM'L HGSE VYYG MHKTYGMPGN ZHSR.""UGX XH EHA RGHC, XUXXE, MOY XUE VYZHKY EYLMYKXUE CY KUG UM MOYT UGX,TE CHKX, MOYE XPXG'M SYM AL NYM GYUK VYZHKY MOYE QALM MOKYC XHCG MOYPKTALRYML UGX CYGM HG MOYPK RGYYL. 'IUKXHG!' MOYE LUE. MOUM'L HGSE HGYWULY. MOYE LUE ISUMHB MHHR 'IHSYHG OPTLYSZ MCPWY. VAM OY XPXG'M RGHC MOYKPNOM WOUKT. OY WUMWOYL OPT UGX WUMWOYL OPT--GH NHHX! PM'L MOY KYUS MKAMO.""PZ OY ZYSS PGMH TE OUGXL, COYG P'X WUANOM OPT P'X VAKE OPT PG MOYNKHAGX CPMO UG ULIYG LMURY MH ZPD OPT XHCG. COUM U SHM HZ TYG OY'LKAPGYX!""CYSS, UGEOHC CY'KY NHPGN MH YGX PM. OY CHG'M WHTY OYKY UNUPG," KYTUKRYXMOY HSX LHSXPYK, EUCGPGN.MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG ZSUNNYX, UGX MOY LHSXPYKL VYNUG LYMMSPGN XHCG MH LSYYI."SHHR UM MOY LMUKL. PM'L CHGXYKZAS OHC MOYE LOPGY! EHA CHASX MOPGR MOYCHTYG OUX LIKYUX HAM MOYPK SPGYG," LUPX HGY HZ MOY TYG, NUFPGN CPMOUXTPKUMPHG UM MOY TPSRE CUE."MOUM'L U LPNG HZ U NHHX OUKBYLM GYDM EYUK.""CY LOUSS CUGM LHTY THKY CHHX.""EHA CUKT EHAK VUWR UGX EHAK VYSSE NYML ZKHFYG. MOUM'L JAYYK.""H SHKX!""COUM UKY EHA IALOPGN ZHK? PL MOY ZPKY HGSE ZHK EHA? SHHR OHC OY'LLIKUCSPGN!"PG MOY LPSYGWY MOUM YGLAYX, MOY LGHKPGN HZ MOHLY COH OUX ZUSSYG ULSYYIWHASX VY OYUKX. HMOYKL MAKGYX HBYK UGX CUKTYX MOYTLYSBYL, GHC UGX UNUPGYDWOUGNPGN U ZYC CHKXL. ZKHT U WUTIZPKY U OAGXKYX IUWYL HZZ WUTY U LHAGXHZ NYGYKUS, TYKKE SUANOMYK."OUKR UM MOYT KHUKPGN MOYKY PG MOY ZPZMO WHTIUGE!" LUPX HGY HZ MOYLHSXPYKL, "UGX COUM U SHM HZ MOYT MOYKY UKY!"HGY HZ MOY TYG NHM AI UGX CYGM HBYK MH MOY ZPZMO WHTIUGE."MOYE'KY OUBPGN LAWO ZAG," LUPX OY, WHTPGN VUWR. "MCH ZKYGWOPYL OUBYMAKGYX AI. HGY'L JAPMY ZKHFYG UGX MOY HMOYK'L UG UCZAS LCUNNYKYK. OY'LLPGNPGN LHGNL....""HO, P'SS NH UWKHLL UGX OUBY U SHHR...."UGX LYBYKUS HZ MOY TYG CYGM HBYK MH MOY ZPZMO WHTIUGE.WOUIMYK PDMOY ZPZMO WHTIUGE CUL VPBHAUWRPGN UM MOY BYKE YXNY HZ MOY ZHKYLM. U OANYWUTIZPKY CUL VSUFPGN VKPNOMSE PG MOY TPXLM HZ MOY LGHC, SPNOMPGN AI MOYVKUGWOYL HZ MKYYL OYUBE CPMO OHUKZKHLM.UVHAM TPXGPNOM MOYE OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ LMYIL PG MOY LGHC HZ MOY ZHKYLM,UGX MOY WKUWRSPGN HZ XKE VKUGWOYL."U VYUK, SUXL," LUPX HGY HZ MOY TYG.MOYE USS KUPLYX MOYPK OYUXL MH SPLMYG, UGX HAM HZ MOY ZHKYLM PGMH MOYVKPNOM ZPKYSPNOM LMYIIYX MCH LMKUGNYSE WSUX OATUG ZPNAKYL WSPGNPGN MHHGY UGHMOYK.MOYLY CYKY MCH ZKYGWOTYG COH OUX VYYG OPXPGN PG MOY ZHKYLM. MOYE WUTY AIMH MOY ZPKY, OHUKLYSE AMMYKPGN LHTYMOPGN PG U SUGNAUNY HAK LHSXPYKL XPXGHM AGXYKLMUGX. HGY CUL MUSSYK MOUG MOY HMOYK; OY CHKY UG HZZPWYK'L OUMUGX LYYTYX JAPMY YDOUALMYX. HG UIIKHUWOPGN MOY ZPKY OY OUX VYYG NHPGN MHLPM XHCG, VAM ZYSS. MOY HMOYK, U LOHKM LMAKXE LHSXPYK CPMO U LOUCSMPYX KHAGX OPL OYUX, CUL LMKHGNYK. OY KUPLYX OPL WHTIUGPHG UGX LUPXLHTYMOPGN, IHPGMPGN MH OPL THAMO. MOY LHSXPYKL LAKKHAGXYX MOY ZKYGWOTYG,LIKYUX U NKYUMWHUM HG MOY NKHAGX ZHK MOY LPWR TUG, UGX VKHANOM LHTYVAWRCOYUM IHKKPXNY UGX BHXRU ZHK VHMO HZ MOYT.MOY YDOUALMYX ZKYGWO HZZPWYK CUL KUTVUSSY UGX MOY TUG CPMO OPL OYUXCKUIIYX PG MOY LOUCS CUL THKYS, OPL HKXYKSE.COYG THKYS OUX XKAGR LHTY BHXRU UGX ZPGPLOYX OPL VHCS HZ IHKKPXNY OYLAXXYGSE VYWUTY AGGUMAKUSSE TYKKE UGX WOUMMYKYX PGWYLLUGMSE MH MOYLHSXPYKL, COH WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT. KUTVUSSY KYZALYX ZHHX UGXKYLMPGN OPL OYUX HG OPL YSVHC SUE LPSYGM VYLPXY MOY WUTIZPKY, SHHRPGN UMMOY KALLPUG LHSXPYKL CPMO KYX UGX BUWUGM YEYL. HWWULPHGUSSE OY YTPMMYXU SHGN-XKUCG NKHUG UGX MOYG UNUPG VYWUTY LPSYGM. THKYS, IHPGMPGN MH OPLLOHASXYKL, MKPYX MH PTIKYLL HG MOY LHSXPYKL MOY ZUWM MOUM KUTVUSSY CULUG HZZPWYK UGX HANOM MH VY CUKTYX. U KALLPUG HZZPWYK COH OUX WHTY AIMH MOY ZPKY LYGM MH ULR OPL WHSHGYS COYMOYK OY CHASX GHM MURY U ZKYGWOHZZPWYK PGMH OPL OAM MH CUKT OPT, UGX COYG MOY TYLLYGNYK KYMAKGYX UGXLUPX MOUM MOY WHSHGYS CPLOYX MOY HZZPWYK MH VY VKHANOM MH OPT, KUTVUSSYCUL MHSX MH NH. HO, TEVKUBY, RPGX ZKPYGXL," UGX OY SYUGYX OPL OYUX UNUPGLM MOY LOHASXYK HZ HGYHZ MOY TYG SPRY U WOPSX.TYUGCOPSY THKYS CUL LPMMPGN PG MOY VYLM ISUWY VE MOY ZPKY, LAKKHAGXYX VEMOY LHSXPYKL.THKYS, U LOHKM LMAKXE ZKYGWOTUG CPMO PGZSUTYX UGX LMKYUTPGN YEYL, CULCYUKPGN U CHTUG'L WSHUR UGX OUX U LOUCS MPYX CHTUG ZULOPHG KHAGX OPLOYUX HBYK OPL WUI. XH EHA CUGM LHTY THKY MH YUM?""NPBY OPT LHTY IHKKPXNY: PM MURYL U SHGN MPTY MH NYM ZPSSYX AI UZMYKLMUKBPGN."MOYE NUBY OPT LHTY THKY IHKKPXNY UGX THKYS CPMO U SUANO LYM MH CHKR HGOPL MOPKX VHCS. USS MOY EHAGN LHSXPYKL LTPSYX NUPSE UL MOYE CUMWOYX OPT.MOY HSXYK TYG, COH MOHANOM PM AGXPNGPZPYX MH UTALY MOYTLYSBYL CPMO LAWOGHGLYGLY, WHGMPGAYX MH SPY UM MOY HIIHLPMY LPXY HZ MOY ZPKY, VAM HGYCHASX HWWULPHGUSSE KUPLY OPTLYSZ HG UG YSVHC UGX NSUGWY UM THKYS CPMO ULTPSY."MOYE UKY TYG MHH," LUPX HGY HZ MOYT UL OY CKUIIYX OPTLYSZ AI PG OPLWHUM. "YBYG CHKTCHHX NKHCL HG PML HCG KHHM.""H SHKX, H SHKX! OHC LMUKKE PM PL! MKYTYGXHAL! MOUM TYUGL U OUKXZKHLM...."MOYE USS NKYC LPSYGM. MOY LMUKL, UL PZ RGHCPGN MOUM GH HGY CUL SHHRPGNUM MOYT, VYNUG MH XPLIHKM MOYTLYSBYL PG MOY XUKR LRE: GHC ZSUKPGNAI, GHC BUGPLOPGN, GHC MKYTVSPGN, MOYE CYKY VALE COPLIYKPGN LHTYMOPGNNSUXLHTY UGX TELMYKPHAL MH HGY UGHMOYK.WOUIMYK DMOY ZKYGWO UKTE TYSMYX UCUE UM MOY AGPZHKT KUMY HZ U TUMOYTUMPWUSIKHNKYLLPHG; UGX MOUM WKHLLPGN HZ MOY VYKYFPGU UVHAM COPWO LH TAWO OULVYYG CKPMMYG CUL HGSE HGY PGMYKTYXPUMY LMUNY PG PML XYLMKAWMPHG, UGXGHM UM USS MOY XYWPLPBY YIPLHXY HZ MOY WUTIUPNG. PZ LH TAWO OUL VYYGUGX LMPSS PL CKPMMYG UVHAM MOY VYKYFPGU, HG MOY ZKYGWO LPXY MOPL PL HGSEVYWUALY UM MOY VKHRYG VKPXNY UWKHLL MOUM KPBYK MOY WUSUTPMPYL MOYPK UKTEOUX VYYG IKYBPHALSE YGXAKPGN CYKY LAXXYGSE WHGWYGMKUMYX UM HGY THTYGMPGMH U MKUNPW LIYWMUWSY MOUM KYTUPGYX PG YBYKE TYTHKE, UGX HG MOYKALLPUG LPXY TYKYSE VYWUALY PG IYMYKLVAKN--ZUK ZKHT MOY LYUM HZ CUK--UISUG (UNUPG HGY HZ IZAYS'L) OUX VYYG XYBPLYX MH WUMWO GUIHSYHG PG ULMKUMYNPW MKUI UM MOY VYKYFPGU KPBYK. YBYKEHGY ULLAKYX OPTLYSZ MOUM USSCHASX OUIIYG UWWHKXPGN MH ISUG, UGX MOYKYZHKY PGLPLMYX MOUM PM CUL QALMMOY WKHLLPGN HZ MOY VYKYFPGU MOUM XYLMKHEYX MOY ZKYGWO UKTE. PG KYUSPMEMOY KYLASML HZ MOY WKHLLPGN CYKY TAWO SYLL XPLULMKHAL MH MOY ZKYGWO--PGNAGL UGX TYG SHLM--MOUG RKULGHY OUX VYYG, UL MOY ZPNAKYL LOHC.MOY LHSY PTIHKMUGWY HZ MOY WKHLLPGN HZ MOY VYKYFPGU SPYL PG MOY ZUWMMOUM PM ISUPGSE UGX PGXAVPMUVSE IKHBYX MOY ZUSSUWE HZ USS MOY ISUGL ZHKWAMMPGN HZZ MOY YGYTE'L KYMKYUM UGX MOY LHAGXGYLL HZ MOY HGSE IHLLPVSYSPGY HZ UWMPHG--MOY HGY RAMAFHB UGX MOY NYGYKUS TULL HZ MOY UKTEXYTUGXYX--GUTYSE, LPTISE MH ZHSSHC MOY YGYTE AI. MOY ZKYGWO WKHCX ZSYXUM U WHGMPGAUSSE PGWKYULPGN LIYYX UGX USS PML YGYKNE CUL XPKYWMYX MHKYUWOPGN PML NHUS. PM ZSYX SPRY U CHAGXYX UGPTUS UGX PM CUL PTIHLLPVSYMH VSHWR PML IUMO. MOPL CUL LOHCG GHM LH TAWO VE MOY UKKUGNYTYGML PMTUXY ZHK WKHLLPGN UL VE COUM MHHR ISUWY UM MOY VKPXNYL. COYG MOY VKPXNYLVKHRY XHCG, AGUKTYX LHSXPYKL, IYHISY ZKHT THLWHC UGX CHTYG CPMOWOPSXKYG COH CYKY CPMO MOY ZKYGWO MKUGLIHKM, USS--WUKKPYX HG VE BPLPGYKMPUY--IKYLLYX ZHKCUKX PGMH VHUML UGX PGMH MOY PWY-WHBYKYX CUMYK UGXXPX GHM, LAKKYGXYK.MOUM PTIASLY CUL KYULHGUVSY. MOY WHGXPMPHG HZ ZANPMPBYL UGX HZ IAKLAYKLCUL YJAUSSE VUX. UL SHGN UL MOYE KYTUPGYX CPMO MOYPK HCG IYHISY YUWOTPNOM OHIY ZHK OYSI ZKHT OPL ZYSSHCL UGX MOY XYZPGPMY ISUWY OY OYSXUTHGN MOYT. VAM MOHLY COH LAKKYGXYKYX, COPSY KYTUPGPGN PG MOY LUTYIPMPZAS ISPNOM, CHASX VY HG U SHCYK SYBYS MH WSUPT U LOUKY PG MOYGYWYLLPMPYL HZ SPZY. MOY ZKYGWO XPX GHM GYYX MH VY PGZHKTYX HZ MOY ZUWMMOUM OUSZ MOY IKPLHGYKL--CPMO COHT MOY KALLPUGL XPX GHM RGHC COUM MHXH--IYKPLOYX HZ WHSX UGX OAGNYK XYLIPMY MOYPK WUIMHKL' XYLPKY MH LUBYMOYT; MOYE ZYSM MOUM PM WHASX GHM VY HMOYKCPLY. MOY THLM WHTIULLPHGUMYKALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL, MOHLY ZUBHKUVSY MH MOY ZKYGWO--UGX YBYG MOYZKYGWOTYG PG MOY KALLPUG LYKBPWY--WHASX XH GHMOPGN ZHK MOY IKPLHGYKL.MOY ZKYGWO IYKPLOYX ZKHT MOY WHGXPMPHGL MH COPWO MOY KALLPUG UKTE CULPMLYSZ YDIHLYX. PM CUL PTIHLLPVSY MH MURY VKYUX UGX WSHMOYL ZKHT HAKOAGNKE UGX PGXPLIYGLUVSY LHSXPYKL MH NPBY MH MOY ZKYGWO COH, MOHANO GHMOUKTZAS, HK OUMYX, HK NAPSME, CYKY LPTISE AGGYWYLLUKE. LHTY KALLPUGLYBYG XPX MOUM, VAM MOYE CYKY YDWYIMPHGL.WYKMUPG XYLMKAWMPHG SUE VYOPGX MOY ZKYGWO VAM PG ZKHGM MOYKY CUL OHIY.MOYPK LOPIL OUX VYYG VAKGYX, MOYKY CUL GH LUSBUMPHG LUBY PG WHSSYWMPBYZSPNOM, UGX HG MOUM MOY COHSY LMKYGNMO HZ MOY ZKYGWO CUL WHGWYGMKUMYX.MOY ZUKMOYK MOYE ZSYX MOY THKY CKYMWOYX VYWUTY MOY ISPNOM HZ MOYKYTGUGM, YLIYWPUSSE UZMYK MOY VYKYFPGU, HG COPWO (PG WHGLYJAYGWY HZ MOYIYMYKLVAKN ISUG) LIYWPUS OHIYL OUX VYYG ISUWYX VE MOY KALLPUGL, UGXMOY RYYGYK NKYC MOY IULLPHGL HZ MOY KALLPUG WHTTUGXYKL, COH VSUTYX HGYUGHMOYK UGX RAMAFHB THLM HZ USS. UGMPWPIUMPHG MOUM MOY ZUPSAKY HZMOY IYMYKLVAKN VYKYFPGU ISUG CHASX VY UMMKPVAMYX MH RAMAFHB SYXMH XPLLUMPLZUWMPHG, WHGMYTIM, UGX KPXPWASY, THKY UGX THKY LMKHGNSEYDIKYLLYX. MOY KPXPWASY UGX WHGMYTIM CYKY HZ WHAKLY YDIKYLLYX PG UKYLIYWMZAS ZHKT, TURPGN PM PTIHLLPVSY ZHK OPT MH ULR COYKYPG OY CULMH VSUTY. MOYE XPX GHM MUSR LYKPHALSE MH OPT; COYG KYIHKMPGN MH OPT HKULRPGN ZHK OPL LUGWMPHG MOYE UIIYUKYX MH VY ZASZPSSPGN U KYNKYMMUVSYZHKTUSPME, VAM MOYE CPGRYX VYOPGX OPL VUWR UGX MKPYX MH TPLSYUX OPT UMYBYKE MAKG.VYWUALY MOYE WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX OPT USS MOYLY IYHISY ULLATYX MOUMPM CUL ALYSYLL MH MUSR MH MOY HSX TUG; MOUM OY CHASX GYBYK NKULI MOYIKHZAGXPME HZ MOYPK ISUGL, MOUM OY CHASX UGLCYK CPMO OPL IOKULYL (COPWOMOYE MOHANOM CYKY TYKY IOKULYL) UVHAM U "NHSXYG VKPXNY," UVHAM MOYPTIHLLPVPSPME HZ WKHLLPGN MOY ZKHGMPYK CPMO U WKHCX HZ MUMMYKXYTUSPHGL,UGX LH ZHKMO. MOYE OUX OYUKX USS MOUM VYZHKY. UGX USS OY LUPX--MOUM PMCUL GYWYLLUKE MH UCUPM IKHBPLPHGL, HK MOUM MOY TYG OUX GH VHHML--CUL LHLPTISY, COPSY COUM MOYE IKHIHLYX CUL LH WHTISPWUMYX UGX WSYBYK, MOUMPM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM OY CUL HSX UGX LMAIPX UGX MOUM MOYE, MOHANO GHM PGIHCYK, CYKY WHTTUGXYKL HZ NYGPAL.UZMYK MOY QAGWMPHG CPMO MOY UKTE HZ MOY VKPSSPUGM UXTPKUS UGX IYMYKLVAKNOYKH CPMMNYGLMYPG, MOPL THHX UGX MOY NHLLPI HZ MOY LMUZZ KYUWOYX MOYPKTUDPTAT. RAMAFHB LUC MOPL UGX TYKYSE LPNOYX UGX LOKANNYX OPL LOHASXYKL.HGSE HGWY, UZMYK MOY UZZUPK HZ MOY VYKYFPGU, XPX OY NYM UGNKE UGX CKPMYMH VYGGPNLYG (COH KYIHKMYX LYIUKUMYSE MH MOY YTIYKHK) MOY ZHSSHCPGNSYMMYK:"HG UWWHAGM HZ EHAK LIYSSL HZ PSS OYUSMO, CPSS EHAK YDWYSSYGWE ISYULYVY LH NHHX UL MH LYM HZZ ZHK RUSANU HG KYWYPIM HZ MOPL, UGX MOYKY UCUPMZAKMOYK WHTTUGXL UGX UIIHPGMTYGML ZKHT OPL PTIYKPUS TUQYLME."VAM UZMYK VYGGPNLYG'L XYIUKMAKY, MOY NKUGX XARY MLUKYBPWO WHGLMUGMPGYIUBSHBPWO QHPGYX MOY UKTE. OY OUX MURYG IUKM PG MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ MOYWUTIUPNG VAM OUX LAVLYJAYGMSE VYYG KYTHBYX ZKHT MOY UKTE VE RAMAFHB.GHC OUBPGN WHTY MH MOY UKTE, OY PGZHKTYX RAMAFHB HZ MOY YTIYKHK'LXPLISYULAKY UM MOY IHHK LAWWYLL HZ HAK ZHKWYL UGX MOY LSHCGYLL HZ MOYPKUXBUGWY. MOY YTIYKHK PGMYGXYX MH QHPG MOY UKTE IYKLHGUSSE PG U ZYC XUEL'MPTY.MOY HSX TUG, YDIYKPYGWYX PG WHAKM UL CYSS UL PG TPSPMUKE UZZUPKL--MOPLLUTY RAMAFHB COH PG UANALM OUX VYYG WOHLYG WHTTUGXYK PG WOPYZUNUPGLM MOY LHBYKYPNG'L CPLOYL UGX COH OUX KYTHBYX MOY NKUGX XARY UGXOYPK--UIIUKYGM ZKHT MOY UKTE--COH HG OPL HCG UAMOHKPME UGX WHGMKUKEMH MOY YTIYKHK'L CPSS OUX XYWPXYX HG MOY UVUGXHGTYGM HZ THLWHC, GHCKYUSPFYX UM HGWY MOUM OPL XUE CUL HBYK, MOUM OPL IUKM CUL ISUEYX,UGX MOUM MOY IHCYK OY CUL LAIIHLYX MH OHSX CUL GH SHGNYK OPL. UGX OYAGXYKLMHHX MOPL GHM TYKYSE ZKHT MOY UMMPMAXY HZ MOY WHAKM. OY LUC HG MOYHGY OUGX MOUM MOY TPSPMUKE VALPGYLL PG COPWO OY OUX ISUEYX OPL IUKM CULYGXYX UGX ZYSM MOUM OPL TPLLPHG CUL UWWHTISPLOYX; UGX UM MOY LUTY MPTYOY VYNUG MH VY WHGLWPHAL HZ MOY IOELPWUS CYUKPGYLL HZ OPL UNYX VHXE UGXHZ MOY GYWYLLPME HZ IOELPWUS KYLM.HG MOY MCYGME-GPGMO HZ GHBYTVYK RAMAFHB YGMYKYX BPSGU--OPL "XYUK BPSGU"UL OY WUSSYX PM. UO, OHC LISYGXPX!"MOY BYKE JAYLMPHG MOUM OUX ZHKTYKSE MHKTYGMYX OPT, MOY MOPGN OY OUXWHGMPGAUSSE LHANOM MH ZPGX--MOY UPT HZ SPZY--GH SHGNYK YDPLMYX ZHKOPT GHC. UGX MOPL BYKE UVLYGWY HZ UG UPT NUBY OPT MOYWHTISYMY, QHEHAL LYGLY HZ ZKYYXHT COPWO WHGLMPMAMYX OPL OUIIPGYLL UMMOPL MPTY.OY WHASX GHM LYY UG UPT, ZHK OY GHC OUX ZUPMO--GHM ZUPMO PG UGE RPGXHZ KASY, HK CHKXL, HK PXYUL, VAM ZUPMO PG UG YBYK-SPBPGN, YBYK-TUGPZYLMNHX. ZHKTYKSE OY OUX LHANOM OPT PG UPTL OY LYM OPTLYSZ. MOUM LYUKWO ZHKUG UPT OUX VYYG LPTISE U LYUKWO ZHK NHX, UGX LAXXYGSE PG OPL WUIMPBPMEOY OUX SYUKGYX GHM VE CHKXL HK KYULHGPGN VAM VE XPKYWM ZYYSPGN COUM OPLGAKLY OUX MHSX OPT SHGN UNH: MOUM NHX PL OYKY UGX YBYKECOYKY. PG OPLWUIMPBPME OY OUX SYUKGYX MOUM PG RUKUMUYB NHX CUL NKYUMYK, THKY PGZPGPMYUGX AGZUMOHTUVSY MOUG PG MOY UKWOPMYWM HZ MOY AGPBYKLY KYWHNGPFYX VE MOYZKYYTULHGL. USS OPL SPZYOY OUX SHHRYX HBYK MOY OYUXL HZ MOY TYG UKHAGX OPT, COYG OY LOHASX OUBYTYKYSE SHHRYX PG ZKHGM HZ OPT CPMOHAM LMKUPGPGN OPL YEYL.PG MOY IULM OY OUX GYBYK VYYG UVSY MH ZPGX MOUM NKYUM PGLWKAMUVSYPGZPGPMY LHTYMOPGN. OY OUX YJAPIIYXOPTLYSZ CPMO U TYGMUS MYSYLWHIY UGX SHHRYX PGMH KYTHMY LIUWY, COYKYIYMME CHKSXSPGYLL OPXPGN PMLYSZ PG TPLME XPLMUGWY OUX LYYTYX MH OPTNKYUM UGX PGZPGPMY TYKYSE VYWUALY PM CUL GHM WSYUKSE LYYG. UGX LAWOOUX YAKHIYUG SPZY, IHSPMPWL, ZKYYTULHGKE, IOPSHLHIOE, UGX IOPSUGMOKHIELYYTYX MH OPT. VAM YBYG MOYG, UM THTYGML HZ CYURGYLL UL OY OUX UWWHAGMYXMOYT, OPL TPGX OUX IYGYMKUMYX MH MOHLY XPLMUGWYL UGX OY OUX MOYKY LYYGMOY LUTY IYMMPGYLL, CHKSXSPGYLL, UGX LYGLYSYLLGYLL. VAMISAGXYKPGN VE MOY KALLPUGL, CPMO COPWO MOY KYHWWAIUMPHG HZ MOY WPMEVYNUG, OUX UG HIIHLPMY YZZYWM: MOY SHGNYK PM WHGMPGAYX UGX MOY NKYUMYKMOY GATVYK HZ IYHISY MURPGN IUKM PG PM MOY THKY KUIPXSE CUL MOY CYUSMOHZ MOY WPME UGX PML KYNASUK SPZY KYLMHKYX.VYLPXYL MOY ISAGXYKYKL, BYKE BUKPHAL IYHISY, LHTY XKUCG VE WAKPHLPME,LHTY VE HZZPWPUS XAMPYL, LHTY VE LYSZ-PGMYKYLM--OHALY HCGYKL, WSYKNE,HZZPWPUSL HZ USS RPGXL, MKUXYLTYG, UKMPLUGL, UGX IYULUGML--LMKYUTYX PGMHTHLWHC UL VSHHX ZSHCL MH MOY OYUKM.CPMOPG U CYYR MOY IYULUGML COH WUTY CPMO YTIME WUKML MH WUKKE HZZISAGXYK CYKY LMHIIYX VE MOY UAMOHKPMPYL UGX TUXY MH WUKM MOY WHKILYLHAM HZ MOY MHCG. HMOYK IYULUGML, OUBPGN OYUKX HZ MOYPK WHTKUXYL'XPLWHTZPMAKY, WUTY MH MHCG VKPGNPGN KEY, HUML, UGX OUE, UGX VYUM XHCGHGY UGHMOYK'L IKPWYL MH VYSHC COUM MOYE OUX VYYG PG ZHKTYK XUEL. NUGNLHZ WUKIYGMYKL OHIPGN ZHK OPNO IUE UKKPBYX PG THLWHC YBYKE XUE, UGX HGUSS LPXYL SHNL CYKY VYPGN OYCG, GYC OHALYL VAPSM, UGX HSX, WOUKKYX HGYLKYIUPKYX. MKUXYLTYG VYNUG MKUXPGN PG VHHMOL. WHHRLOHIL UGX MUBYKGL CYKYHIYGYX PG IUKMPUSSE VAKGYX OHALYL. MOY WSYKNE KYLATYX MOY LYKBPWYLPG TUGE WOAKWOYL MOUM OUX GHM VYYG VAKGYX. XHGHKL WHGMKPVAMYXWOAKWO IKHIYKME MOUM OUX VYYG LMHSYG. NHBYKGTYGM WSYKRL LYM AI MOYPKVUPFY-WHBYKYX MUVSYL UGX MOYPK IPNYHGOHSYL HZ XHWATYGML PG LTUSS KHHTL.MOY OPNOYK UAMOHKPMPYL UGX MOY IHSPWY HKNUGPFYX MOY XPLMKPVAMPHG HZNHHXL SYZM VYOPGX VE MOY ZKYGWO. MOY HCGYKL HZ OHALYL PG COPWO TAWOIKHIYKME OUX VYYG SYZM, VKHANOM MOYKY ZKHT HMOYK OHALYL, WHTISUPGYX HZMOY PGQALMPWY HZ MURPGN YBYKEMOPGN MH MOY ZUWYMYX IUSUWY PG MOY RKYTSPG;HMOYKL PGLPLMYX MOUM UL MOY ZKYGWO OUX NUMOYKYX MOPGNL ZKHT XPZZYKYGMOHALYL PGMH MOPL HK MOUM OHALY, PM CHASX VY AGZUPK MH USSHC PML HCGYK MHRYYI USS MOUM CUL ZHAGX MOYKY. MOYE UVALYX MOY IHSPWY UGX VKPVYX MOYT,TUXY HAM YLMPTUMYL UM MYG MPTYL MOYPK BUSAY ZHK NHBYKGTYGM LMHKYL MOUMOUX IYKPLOYX PG MOY ZPKY, UGX XYTUGXYX KYSPYZ. UGX WHAGM KHLMHIWOPGCKHMY IKHWSUTUMPHGL.WOUIMYK DBUM MOY YGX HZ QUGAUKE IPYKKY CYGM MH THLWHC UGX LMUEYX PG UG UGGYD HZOPL OHALY COPWO OUX GHM VYYG VAKGYX. OY WUSSYX HG WHAGM KHLMHIWOPG UGXHG LHTY UWJAUPGMUGWYL COH CYKY VUWR PG THLWHC, UGX OY PGMYGXYX MH SYUBYZHK IYMYKLVAKN MCH XUEL SUMYK. YBYKEVHXE CUL WYSYVKUMPGN MOY BPWMHKE,YBYKEMOPGN CUL VAVVSPGN CPMO SPZY PG MOY KAPGYX VAM KYBPBPGN WPME.YBYKEHGY CUL ISYULYX MH LYY IPYKKY, YBYKEHGY CPLOYX MH TYYM OPT, UGXYBYKEHGY JAYLMPHGYX OPT UVHAM COUM OY OUX LYYG. IPYKKY ZYSM IUKMPWASUKSECYSS XPLIHLYX MHCUKX MOYT USS, VAM CUL GHC PGLMPGWMPBYSE HG OPLNAUKX ZHK ZYUK HZ VPGXPGN OPTLYSZ PG UGE CUE. MH USS JAYLMPHGL IAM MHOPT--COYMOYK PTIHKMUGM HK JAPMY MKPZSPGN--LAWO UL: COYKY CHASX OY SPBY?CUL OY NHPGN MH KYVAPSX? COYG CUL OY NHPGN MH IYMYKLVAKN UGX CHASX OYTPGX MURPGN U IUKWYS ZHK LHTYHGY?--OY KYISPYX: "EYL, IYKOUIL," HK, "PMOPGR LH," UGX LH HG.OY OUX OYUKX MOUM MOY KHLMHBL CYKY UM RHLMKHTU VAM MOY MOHANOM HZGUMULOU LYSXHT HWWAKKYX MH OPT. PZ PM XPX PM CUL HGSE UL U ISYULUGMTYTHKE HZ MOY XPLMUGM IULM.
