OUBPGN OYUKX UM XPGGYK MOUM IKPGWYLL TUKECUL PG THLWHC UGX SPBPGN PG OYK OHALY--COPWO OUX GHM VYYG VAKGYX--PGBHFXBPFOYGRU LMKYYM, OY XKHBY MOUM LUTY YBYGPGN MH LYY OYK.HG OPL CUE MH MOY OHALY IPYKKY RYIM MOPGRPGN HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, HZ MOYPKZKPYGXLOPI, HZ OPL BUKPHAL TYYMPGNL CPMO OPT, UGX YLIYWPUSSE HZ MOY SULMHGY UM VHKHXPGH."PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM OY XPYX PG MOY VPMMYK ZKUTY HZ TPGX OY CUL MOYG PG?PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM MOY TYUGPGN HZ SPZY CUL GHM XPLWSHLYX MH OPTVYZHKY OY XPYX?" MOHANOM IPYKKY. OY KYWUSSYX RUKUMUYB UGX OPL XYUMO UGXPGBHSAGMUKPSE VYNUG MH WHTIUKY MOYLY MCH TYG, LH XPZZYKYGM, UGX EYM LHLPTPSUK PG MOUM MOYE OUX VHMO SPBYX UGX VHMO XPYX UGX PG MOY SHBY OYZYSM ZHK VHMO HZ MOYT.IPYKKY XKHBY AI MH MOY OHALY HZ MOY HSX IKPGWY PG U THLM LYKPHAL THHX.MOY OHALY OUX YLWUIYX MOY ZPKY; PM LOHCYX LPNGL HZ XUTUNY VAM PMLNYGYKUS ULIYWM CUL AGWOUGNYX. MOY HSX ZHHMTUG, COH TYM IPYKKY CPMO ULMYKG ZUWY UL PZ CPLOPGN MH TURY MOY BPLPMHK ZYYS MOUM MOY UVLYGWYHZ MOY HSX IKPGWY OUX GHM XPLMAKVYX MOY HKXYK HZ MOPGNL PG MOY OHALY,PGZHKTYX OPT MOUM MOY IKPGWYLL OUX NHGY MH OYK HCG UIUKMTYGML, UGX MOUMLOY KYWYPBYX HG LAGXUEL."UGGHAGWY TY. IYKOUIL LOY CPSS LYY TY," LUPX IPYKKY."EYL, LPK," LUPX MOY TUG. "ISYULY LMYI PGMH MOY IHKMKUPM NUSSYKE."U ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK MOY ZHHMTUG KYMAKGYX CPMO XYLLUSSYL, COH VKHANOMCHKX ZKHT MOY IKPGWYLL MOUM LOY CHASX VY BYKE NSUX MH LYY IPYKKY PZ OYCHASX YDWALY OYK CUGM HZ WYKYTHGE UGX WHTY AILMUPKL MH OYK UIUKMTYGM.PG U KUMOYK SHC KHHT SPM VE HGY WUGXSY LUM MOY IKPGWYLL UGX CPMO OYKUGHMOYK IYKLHG XKYLLYX PG VSUWR. IPYKKY KYTYTVYKYX MOUM MOY IKPGWYLLUSCUEL OUX SUXE WHTIUGPHGL, VAM COH MOYE CYKY UGX COUM MOYE CYKY SPRYOY GYBYK RGYC HK KYTYTVYKYX. "MOPL TALM VY HGY HZ OYK WHTIUGPHGL," OYMOHANOM, NSUGWPGN UM MOY SUXE PG MOY VSUWR XKYLL.MOY IKPGWYLL KHLY JAPWRSE MH TYYM OPT UGX OYSX HAM OYK OUGX."EYL," LOY LUPX, SHHRPGN UM OPL USMYKYX ZUWY UZMYK OY OUX RPLLYX OYKOUGX, "LH MOPL PL OHC CY TYYM UNUPG. OY LIHRY HZ EHA YBYG UM MOY BYKESULM," LOY CYGM HG, MAKGPGN OYK YEYL ZKHT IPYKKY MH OYK WHTIUGPHG CPMO ULOEGYLL MOUM LAKIKPLYX OPT ZHK UG PGLMUGM."P CUL LH NSUX MH OYUK HZ EHAK LUZYME. PM CUL MOY ZPKLM IPYWY HZ NHHXGYCL CY OUX KYWYPBYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY."UNUPG MOY IKPGWYLL NSUGWYX KHAGX UM OYK WHTIUGPHG CPMO YBYG THKYAGYULPGYLL PG OYK TUGGYK UGX CUL UVHAM MH UXX LHTYMOPGN, VAM IPYKKYPGMYKKAIMYX OYK."QALM PTUNPGY--P RGYC GHMOPGN UVHAM OPT!" LUPX OY. "P MOHANOM OY OUXVYYG RPSSYX. USS P RGHC P OYUKX UM LYWHGX OUGX ZKHT HMOYKL. P HGSE RGHCMOUM OY ZYSS PG CPMO MOY KHLMHBL.... COUM U LMKUGNY WHPGWPXYGWY!"IPYKKY LIHRY KUIPXSE UGX CPMO UGPTUMPHG. OY NSUGWYX HGWY UM MOYWHTIUGPHG'L ZUWY, LUC OYK UMMYGMPBY UGX RPGXSE NUFY ZPDYX HG OPT, UGX,UL HZMYG OUIIYGL COYG HGY PL MUSRPGN, ZYSM LHTYOHC MOUM MOPL WHTIUGPHGPG MOY VSUWR XKYLL CUL U NHHX, RPGX, YDWYSSYGM WKYUMAKY COH CHASX GHMOPGXYK OPL WHGBYKLPGN ZKYYSE CPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE.VAM COYG OY TYGMPHGYX MOY KHLMHBL, IKPGWYLL TUKE'L ZUWY YDIKYLLYX LMPSSNKYUMYK YTVUKKULLTYGM. LOY UNUPG NSUGWYX KUIPXSE ZKHT IPYKKY'L ZUWY MHMOUM HZ MOY SUXE PG MOY VSUWR XKYLL UGX LUPX:"XH EHA KYUSSE GHM KYWHNGPFY OYK?"IPYKKY SHHRYX UNUPG UM MOY WHTIUGPHG'L IUSY, XYSPWUMY ZUWY CPMO PMLVSUWR YEYL UGX IYWASPUK THAMO, UGX LHTYMOPGN GYUK MH OPT, SHGN ZHKNHMMYGUGX THKY MOUG LCYYM, SHHRYX UM OPT ZKHT MOHLY UMMYGMPBY YEYL."VAM GH, PM WUG'M VY!" OY MOHANOM. "MOPL LMYKG, MOPG, IUSY ZUWY MOUMSHHRL LH TAWO HSXYK! PM WUGGHM VY LOY. PM TYKYSE KYTPGXL TY HZ OYK."VAM UM MOUM THTYGM IKPGWYLL TUKE LUPX, "GUMULOU!" UGX CPMO XPZZPWASME,YZZHKM, UGX LMKYLL, SPRY MOY HIYGPGN HZ U XHHK NKHCG KALME HG PMLOPGNYL, U LTPSY UIIYUKYX HG MOY ZUWY CPMO MOY UMMYGMPBY YEYL, UGX ZKHTMOUM HIYGPGN XHHK WUTY U VKYUMO HZ ZKUNKUGWY COPWO LAZZALYX IPYKKY CPMOU OUIIPGYLL OY OUX SHGN ZHKNHMMYG UGX HZ COPWO OY OUX GHM YBYG VYYGMOPGRPGN--YLIYWPUSSE UM MOUM THTYGM. PM LAZZALYX OPT, LYPFYX OPT, UGXYGBYSHIYX OPT WHTISYMYSE. COYG LOY LTPSYX XHAVM CUL GH SHGNYK IHLLPVSY,PM CUL GUMULOU UGX OY SHBYX OYK.UM MOUM THTYGM IPYKKY PGBHSAGMUKPSE VYMKUEYX MH OYK, MH IKPGWYLL TUKE,UGX UVHBY USS MH OPTLYSZ, U LYWKYM HZ COPWO OY OPTLYSZ OUX VYYG AGUCUKY.OY ZSALOYX QHEZASSE EYM CPMO IUPGZAS XPLMKYLL. OY MKPYX MH OPXY OPLUNPMUMPHG. VAM MOY THKY OY MKPYX MH OPXY PM MOY THKY WSYUKSE--WSYUKYKMOUG UGE CHKXL WHASX OUBY XHGY--XPX OY VYMKUE MH OPTLYSZ, MH OYK, UGX MHIKPGWYLL TUKE MOUM OY SHBYX OYK."GH, PM'L HGSE MOY AGYDIYWMYXGYLL HZ PM," MOHANOM IPYKKY. VAM UL LHHG ULOY MKPYX MH WHGMPGAY MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG OY OUX VYNAG CPMO IKPGWYLL TUKE OYUNUPG NSUGWYX UM GUMULOU, UGX U LMPSS-XYYIYK ZSALO LAZZALYX OPL ZUWY UGXU LMPSS-LMKHGNYK UNPMUMPHG HZ TPGNSYX QHE UGX ZYUK LYPFYX OPL LHAS. OYVYWUTY WHGZALYX PG OPL LIYYWO UGX LMHIIYX PG MOY TPXXSY HZ COUM OY CULLUEPGN.IPYKKY OUX ZUPSYX MH GHMPWY GUMULOU VYWUALY OY XPX GHM UM USS YDIYWM MHLYY OYK MOYKY, VAM OY OUX ZUPSYX MH KYWHNGPFY OYK VYWUALY MOY WOUGNY PGOYK LPGWY OY SULM LUC OYK CUL PTTYGLY. LOY OUX NKHCG MOPG UGX IUSY, VAMMOUM CUL GHM COUM TUXY OYK AGKYWHNGPFUVSY; LOY CUL AGKYWHNGPFUVSY UM MOYTHTYGM OY YGMYKYX VYWUALY HG MOUM ZUWY COHLY YEYL OUX USCUEL LOHGY CPMOU LAIIKYLLYX LTPSY HZ MOY QHE HZ SPZY, GHC COYG OY ZPKLM YGMYKYX UGXNSUGWYX UM OYK MOYKY CUL GHM MOY SYULM LOUXHC HZ U LTPSY: HGSE OYK YEYLCYKY RPGXSE UMMYGMPBY UGX LUXSE PGMYKKHNUMPBY.IPYKKY'L WHGZALPHG CUL GHM KYZSYWMYX VE UGE WHGZALPHG HG GUMULOU'L IUKM,VAM HGSE VE MOY ISYULAKY MOUM QALM IYKWYIMPVSE SPM AI OYK COHSY ZUWY.WOUIMYK DBP"LOY OUL WHTY MH LMUE CPMO TY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "MOY WHAGM UGXWHAGMYLL CPSS VY OYKY PG U ZYC XUEL. MOY WHAGMYLL PL PG U XKYUXZASLMUMY; VAM PM CUL GYWYLLUKE ZHK GUMULOU OYKLYSZ MH LYY U XHWMHK. MOYEPGLPLMYX HG OYK WHTPGN CPMO TY.""EYL, PL MOYKY U ZUTPSE ZKYY ZKHT LHKKHC GHC?" LUPX IPYKKY, UXXKYLLPGNGUMULOU. "EHA RGHC PM OUIIYGYX MOY BYKE XUE CY CYKY KYLWAYX. P LUC OPT.COUM U XYSPNOMZAS VHE OY CUL!"GUMULOU SHHRYX UM OPT, UGX VE CUE HZ UGLCYK MH OPL CHKXL OYK YEYLCPXYGYX UGX SPM AI."COUM WUG HGY LUE HK MOPGR HZ UL U WHGLHSUMPHG?" LUPX IPYKKY. "GHMOPGN!COE OUX LAWO U LISYGXPX VHE, LH ZASS HZ SPZY, MH XPY?""EYL, PG MOYLY XUEL PM CHASX VY OUKX MH SPBY CPMOHAM ZUPMO..." KYTUKRYXIKPGWYLL TUKE."EYL, EYL, MOUM PL KYUSSE MKAY," IPYKKY OULMPSE PGMYKKAIMYX OYK."COE PL PM MKAY?" GUMULOU ULRYX, SHHRPGN UMMYGMPBYSE PGMH IPYKKY'L YEYL."OHC WUG EHA ULR COE?" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "MOY MOHANOM USHGY HZ COUMUCUPML..."GUMULOU CPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK IKPGWYLL TUKE MH ZPGPLO UNUPG SHHRYXPGJAPKPGNSE UM IPYKKY."UGX VYWUALY," IPYKKY WHGMPGAYX, "HGSE HGY COH VYSPYBYL MOUM MOYKY PL UNHX KASPGN AL WUG VYUK U SHLL LAWO UL OYKL UGX... EHAKL."GUMULOU OUX USKYUXE HIYGYX OYK THAMO MH LIYUR VAM LAXXYGSE LMHIIYX.IPYKKY OAKKPYXSE MAKGYX UCUE ZKHT OYK UGX UNUPG UXXKYLLYX IKPGWYLL TUKE,ULRPGN UVHAM OPL ZKPYGX'L SULM XUEL.IPYKKY'L WHGZALPHG OUX GHC USTHLM BUGPLOYX, VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTY OY ZYSMMOUM OPL ZKYYXHT OUX USLH WHTISYMYSE NHGY. OY ZYSM MOUM MOYKY CUL GHC UQAXNY HZ OPL YBYKE CHKX UGX UWMPHG COHLY QAXNTYGM TUMMYKYX THKY MHOPT MOUG MOUM HZ USS MOY KYLM HZ MOY CHKSX. UL OY LIHRY GHC OY CULWHGLPXYKPGN COUM PTIKYLLPHG OPL CHKXL CHASX TURY HG GUMULOU. OY XPXGHM IAKIHLYSE LUE MOPGNL MH ISYULY OYK, VAM COUMYBYK OY CUL LUEPGN OYKYNUKXYX ZKHT OYK LMUGXIHPGM.IKPGWYLL TUKE--KYSAWMUGMSE UL PL ALAUS PG LAWO WULYL--VYNUG MYSSPGN HZMOY WHGXPMPHG PG COPWO LOY OUX ZHAGX IKPGWY UGXKYC. VAM IPYKKY'L ZUWYJAPBYKPGN CPMO YTHMPHG, OPL JAYLMPHGL UGX OPL YUNYK KYLMSYLL YDIKYLLPHG,NKUXAUSSE WHTIYSSYX OYK MH NH PGMH XYMUPSL COPWO LOY ZYUKYX MH KYWUSSZHK OYK HCG LURY."EYL, EYL, UGX LH...?" IPYKKY RYIM LUEPGN UL OY SYUGYX MHCUKX OYK CPMOOPL COHSY VHXE UGX YUNYKSE SPLMYGYX MH OYK LMHKE. "EYL, EYL... LH OYNKYC MKUGJAPS UGX LHZMYGYX? CPMO USS OPL LHAS OY OUX USCUEL LHANOM HGYMOPGN--MH VY IYKZYWMSE NHHX--LH OY WHASX GHM VY UZKUPX HZ XYUMO.MOY ZUASML OY OUX--PZ OY OUX UGE--CYKY GHM HZ OPL TURPGN. LH OY XPXLHZMYG?... COUM U OUIIE MOPGN MOUM OY LUC EHA UNUPG," OY UXXYX, LAXXYGSEMAKGPGN MH GUMULOU UGX SHHRPGN UM OYK CPMO YEYL ZASS HZ MYUKL.GUMULOU'L ZUWY MCPMWOYX. LOY ZKHCGYX UGX SHCYKYX OYK YEYL ZHK U THTYGM.LOY OYLPMUMYX ZHK UG PGLMUGM COYMOYK MH LIYUR HK GHM."EYL, MOUM CUL OUIIPGYLL," LOY MOYG LUPX PG OYK JAPYM BHPWY CPMO PMLXYYI WOYLM GHMYL. "ZHK TY PM WYKMUPGSE CUL OUIIPGYLL." LOY IUALYX. "UGXOY... OY... OY LUPX OY CUL CPLOPGN ZHK PM UM MOY BYKE THTYGM P YGMYKYXMOY KHHT...."GUMULOU'L BHPWY VKHRY. LOY VSALOYX, IKYLLYX OYK WSULIYX OUGXL HG OYKRGYYL, UGX MOYG WHGMKHSSPGN OYKLYSZ CPMO UG YBPXYGM YZZHKM SPZMYX OYKOYUX UGX VYNUG MH LIYUR KUIPXSE."CY RGYC GHMOPGN HZ PM COYG CY LMUKMYX ZKHT THLWHC. P XPX GHM XUKY MHULR UVHAM OPT. MOYG LAXXYGSE LHGEU MHSX TY OY CUL MKUBYSPGN CPMO AL. POUX GH PXYU UGX WHASX GHM PTUNPGY COUM LMUMY OY CUL PG, USS P CUGMYX CULMH LYY OPT UGX VY CPMO OPT," LOY LUPX, MKYTVSPGN, UGX VKYUMOPGN JAPWRSE.UGX GHM SYMMPGN MOYT PGMYKKAIM OYK LOY CYGM HG MH MYSS COUM LOY OUXGYBYK EYM TYGMPHGYX MH UGEHGY--USS LOY OUX SPBYX MOKHANO XAKPGN MOHLYMOKYY CYYRL HZ MOYPK QHAKGYE UGX SPZY UM EUKHLSUBS.IPYKKY SPLMYGYX MH OYK CPMO SPIL IUKMYX UGX YEYL ZPDYX AIHG OYK ZASS HZMYUKL. UL OY SPLMYGYX OY XPX GHM MOPGR HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, GHK HZ XYUMO,GHK HZ COUM LOY CUL MYSSPGN. OY SPLMYGYX MH OYK UGX ZYSM HGSE IPME ZHKOYK, ZHK COUM LOY CUL LAZZYKPGN GHC COPSY LOY CUL LIYURPGN.IKPGWYLL TUKE, ZKHCGPGN PG OYK YZZHKM MH OHSX VUWR OYK MYUKL, LUM VYLPXYGUMULOU, UGX OYUKX ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MOY LMHKE HZ MOHLY SULM XUEL HZOYK VKHMOYK'L UGX GUMULOU'L SHBY.YBPXYGMSE GUMULOU GYYXYX MH MYSS MOUM IUPGZAS EYM QHEZAS MUSY.LOY LIHRY, TPGNSPGN THLM MKPZSPGN XYMUPSL CPMO MOY PGMPTUMY LYWKYML HZOYK LHAS, UGX PM LYYTYX UL PZ LOY WHASX GYBYK ZPGPLO. LYBYKUS MPTYL LOYKYIYUMYX MOY LUTY MOPGN MCPWY.XYLLUSSYL' BHPWY CUL OYUKX HAMLPXY MOY XHHK ULRPGN COYMOYK SPMMSYGPWOHSUL TPNOM WHTY PG MH LUE NHHX GPNOM."CYSS, MOUM'L USS--YBYKEMOPGN," LUPX GUMULOU.LOY NHM AI JAPWRSE QALM UL GPWOHSUL YGMYKYX, USTHLM KUG MH MOY XHHKCOPWO CUL OPXXYG VE WAKMUPGL, LMKAWR OYK OYUX UNUPGLM PM, UGX KALOYXZKHT MOY KHHT CPMO U THUG YPMOYK HZ IUPG HK LHKKHC.IPYKKY NUFYX UM MOY XHHK MOKHANO COPWO LOY OUX XPLUIIYUKYX UGX XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX COE OY LAXXYGSE ZYSM USS USHGY PG MOY CHKSX.IKPGWYLL TUKE KHALYX OPT ZKHT OPL UVLMKUWMPHG VE XKUCPGN OPL UMMYGMPHGMH OYK GYIOYC COH OUX YGMYKYX MOY KHHT.UM MOUM THTYGM HZ YTHMPHGUS MYGXYKGYLL EHAGN GPWOHSUL' ZUWY, COPWOKYLYTVSYX OPL ZUMOYK'L, UZZYWMYX IPYKKY LH TAWO MOUM COYG OY OUX RPLLYXMOY VHE OY NHM AI JAPWRSE, MHHR HAM OPL OUGXRYKWOPYZ, UGX CYGM MH MOYCPGXHC. OY CPLOYX MH MURY SYUBY HZ IKPGWYLL TUKE, VAM LOY CHASX GHM SYMOPT NH."GH, GUMULOU UGX P LHTYMPTYL XHG'M NH MH LSYYI MPSS UZMYK MCH, LH ISYULYXHG'M NH. P CPSS HKXYK LAIIYK. NH XHCGLMUPKL, CY CPSS WHTY PTTYXPUMYSE."VYZHKY IPYKKY SYZM MOY KHHT IKPGWYLL TUKE MHSX OPT: "MOPL PL MOY ZPKLMMPTY LOY OUL MUSRYX HZ OPT SPRY MOUM."WOUIMYK DBPPIPYKKY CUL LOHCG PGMH MOY SUKNY, VKPNOMSE SPM XPGPGN KHHT; U ZYC TPGAMYLSUMYK OY OYUKX ZHHMLMYIL UGX IKPGWYLL TUKE YGMYKYX CPMO GUMULOU. GUMULOUCUL WUST, MOHANO U LYBYKY UGX NKUBY YDIKYLLPHG OUX UNUPG LYMMSYX HG OYKZUWY. MOYE USS MOKYY HZ MOYT GHC YDIYKPYGWYX MOUM ZYYSPGN HZ UCRCUKXGYLLCOPWO ALAUSSE ZHSSHCL UZMYK U LYKPHAL UGX OYUKMZYSM MUSR. PM PLPTIHLLPVSY MH NH VUWR MH MOY LUTY WHGBYKLUMPHG, MH MUSR HZ MKPZSYL PLUCRCUKX, UGX EYM MOY XYLPKY MH LIYUR PL MOYKY UGX LPSYGWY LYYTL SPRYUZZYWMUMPHG. MOYE CYGM LPSYGMSE MH MUVSY. MOY ZHHMTYG XKYC VUWR MOYWOUPKL UGX IALOYX MOYT AI UNUPG. IPYKKY AGZHSXYX OPL WHSX MUVSY GUIRPGUGX, KYLHSBPGN MH VKYUR MOY LPSYGWY, SHHRYX UM GUMULOU UGX UM IKPGWYLLTUKE. MOYE OUX YBPXYGMSE VHMO ZHKTYX MOY LUTY KYLHSAMPHG; MOY YEYL HZVHMO LOHGY CPMO LUMPLZUWMPHG UGX U WHGZYLLPHG MOUM VYLPXYL LHKKHC SPZYUSLH OUL QHE."XH EHA MURY BHXRU, WHAGM?" ULRYX IKPGWYLL TUKE, UGX MOHLY CHKXLLAXXYGSE VUGPLOYX MOY LOUXHCL HZ MOY IULM. "GHC MYSS AL UVHAM EHAKLYSZ,"LUPX LOY. "HGY OYUKL LAWO PTIKHVUVSY CHGXYKL UVHAM EHA.""EYL," KYISPYX IPYKKY CPMO MOY LTPSY HZ TPSX PKHGE GHC OUVPMAUS MH OPT."MOYE YBYG MYSS TY CHGXYKL P TELYSZ GYBYK XKYUTYX HZ! TUKE UVKUTHBGUPGBPMYX TY MH OYK OHALY UGX RYIM MYSSPGN TY COUM OUX OUIIYGYX, HK HANOMMH OUBY OUIIYGYX, MH TY. LMYIUG LMYIUGEWO USLH PGLMKAWMYX TY OHC P HANOMMH MYSS HZ TE YDIYKPYGWYL. PG NYGYKUS P OUBY GHMPWYX MOUM PM PL BYKEYULE MH VY UG PGMYKYLMPGN TUG (P UT UG PGMYKYLMPGN TUG GHC); IYHISYPGBPMY TY HAM UGX MYSS TY USS UVHAM TELYSZ."GUMULOU LTPSYX UGX CUL HG MOY IHPGM HZ LIYURPGN."CY OUBY VYYG MHSX," IKPGWYLL TUKE PGMYKKAIMYX OYK, "MOUM EHA SHLM MCHTPSSPHGL PG THLWHC. PL MOUM MKAY?""VAM P UT MOKYY MPTYL UL KPWO UL VYZHKY," KYMAKGYX IPYKKY.MOHANO MOY IHLPMPHG CUL GHC USMYKYX VE OPL XYWPLPHG MH IUE OPL CPZY'LXYVML UGX MH KYVAPSX OPL OHALYL, IPYKKY LMPSS TUPGMUPGYX MOUM OY OUXVYWHTY MOKYY MPTYL UL KPWO UL VYZHKY."COUM P OUBY WYKMUPGSE NUPGYX PL ZKYYXHT," OY VYNUG LYKPHALSE, VAM XPXGHM WHGMPGAY, GHMPWPGN MOUM MOPL MOYTY CUL MHH YNHMPLMPW."UGX UKY EHA VAPSXPGN?""EYL. LUBYSPWO LUEL P TALM!""MYSS TY, EHA XPX GHM RGHC HZ MOY WHAGMYLL' XYUMO COYG EHA XYWPXYX MHKYTUPG PG THLWHC?" ULRYX IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX PTTYXPUMYSE VSALOYX, GHMPWPGNMOUM OYK JAYLMPHG, ZHSSHCPGN OPL TYGMPHG HZ ZKYYXHT, ULWKPVYX MH OPLCHKXL U TYUGPGN OY OUX IYKOUIL GHM PGMYGXYX."GH," UGLCYKYX IPYKKY, YBPXYGMSE GHM WHGLPXYKPGN UCRCUKX MOY TYUGPGNIKPGWYLL TUKE OUX NPBYG MH OPL CHKXL. "P OYUKX HZ PM PG HKYS UGX EHAWUGGHM PTUNPGY OHC PM LOHWRYX TY. CY CYKY GHM UG YDYTISUKE WHAISY," OYUXXYX JAPWRSE, NSUGWPGN UM GUMULOU UGX GHMPWPGN HG OYK ZUWY WAKPHLPME ULMH OHC OY CHASX LIYUR HZ OPL CPZY, "VAM OYK XYUMO LOHWRYX TY MYKKPVSE.COYG MCH IYHISY JAUKKYS MOYE UKY USCUEL VHMO PG ZUASM, UGX HGY'L HCGNAPSM LAXXYGSE VYWHTYL MYKKPVSE LYKPHAL COYG MOY HMOYK PL GH SHGNYKUSPBY. UGX MOYG LAWO U XYUMO... CPMOHAM ZKPYGXL UGX CPMOHAM WHGLHSUMPHG!P UT BYKE, BYKE LHKKE ZHK OYK," OY WHGWSAXYX, UGX CUL ISYULYX MH GHMPWYU SHHR HZ NSUX UIIKHBUS HG GUMULOU'L ZUWY."EYL, UGX LH EHA UKY HGWY THKY UG YSPNPVSY VUWOYSHK," LUPX IKPGWYLLTUKE.IPYKKY LAXXYGSE ZSALOYX WKPTLHG UGX ZHK U SHGN MPTY MKPYX GHM MH SHHRUM GUMULOU. COYG OY BYGMAKYX MH NSUGWY OYK CUE UNUPG OYK ZUWY CUL WHSX,LMYKG, UGX OY ZUGWPYX YBYG WHGMYTIMAHAL."UGX XPX EHA KYUSSE LYY UGX LIYUR MH GUIHSYHG, UL CY OUBY VYYG MHSX?"LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE.IPYKKY SUANOYX."GH, GHM HGWY! YBYKEVHXE LYYTL MH PTUNPGY MOUM VYPGN MURYG IKPLHGYKTYUGL VYPGN GUIHSYHG'L NAYLM. GHM HGSE XPX P GYBYK LYY OPT VAM P OYUKXGHMOPGN UVHAM OPT--P CUL PG TAWO SHCYK WHTIUGE!"LAIIYK CUL HBYK, UGX IPYKKY COH UM ZPKLM XYWSPGYX MH LIYUR UVHAM OPLWUIMPBPME CUL NKUXAUSSE SYX HG MH XH LH."VAM PM'L MKAY MOUM EHA KYTUPGYX PG THLWHC MH RPSS GUIHSYHG?" GUMULOUULRYX CPMO U LSPNOM LTPSY. "P NAYLLYX PM MOYG COYG CY TYM UM MOYLAROUKYB MHCYK, XH EHA KYTYTVYK?"IPYKKY UXTPMMYX MOUM PM CUL MKAY, UGX ZKHT MOUM CUL NKUXAUSSE SYX VEIKPGWYLL TUKE'L JAYLMPHGL UGX YLIYWPUSSE VE GUMULOU'L PGMH NPBPGN UXYMUPSYX UWWHAGM HZ OPL UXBYGMAKYL.UM ZPKLM OY LIHRY CPMO MOY UTALYX UGX TPSX PKHGE GHC WALMHTUKE CPMOOPT MHCUKX YBYKEVHXE UGX YLIYWPUSSE MHCUKX OPTLYSZ, VAM COYG OY WUTYMH XYLWKPVY MOY OHKKHKL UGX LAZZYKPGNL OY OUX CPMGYLLYX OY CULAGWHGLWPHALSE WUKKPYX UCUE UGX VYNUG LIYURPGN CPMO MOY LAIIKYLLYXYTHMPHG HZ U TUG KY-YDIYKPYGWPGN PG KYWHSSYWMPHG LMKHGN PTIKYLLPHGL OYOUL SPBYX MOKHANO.IKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO U NYGMSY LTPSY SHHRYX GHC UM IPYKKY UGX GHC UMGUMULOU. PG MOY COHSY GUKKUMPBY LOY LUC HGSE IPYKKY UGX OPL NHHXGYLL.GUMULOU, SYUGPGN HG OYK YSVHC, MOY YDIKYLLPHG HZ OYK ZUWY WHGLMUGMSEWOUGNPGN CPMO MOY GUKKUMPBY, CUMWOYX IPYKKY CPMO UG UMMYGMPHG MOUM GYBYKCUGXYKYX--YBPXYGMSE OYKLYSZ YDIYKPYGWPGN USS MOUM OY XYLWKPVYX. GHM HGSEOYK SHHR, VAM OYK YDWSUTUMPHGL UGX MOY VKPYZ JAYLMPHGL LOY IAM, LOHCYXIPYKKY MOUM LOY AGXYKLMHHX QALM COUM OY CPLOYX MH WHGBYE. PM CUL WSYUKMOUM LOY AGXYKLMHHX GHM HGSE COUM OY LUPX VAM USLH COUM OY CPLOYX MH,VAM WHASX GHM, YDIKYLL PG CHKXL. MOY UWWHAGM IPYKKY NUBY HZ MOY PGWPXYGMCPMO MOY WOPSX UGX MOY CHTUG ZHK IKHMYWMPGN COHT OY CUL UKKYLMYX CULMOPL: "PM CUL UG UCZAS LPNOM--WOPSXKYG UVUGXHGYX, LHTY PG MOY ZSUTYL...HGY CUL LGUMWOYX HAM VYZHKY TE YEYL... "MOYG U IUMKHS UKKPBYX UGX USS MOY TYG--USS MOHLY COHCYKY GHM SHHMPGN, MOUM PL--CYKY UKKYLMYX, UGX P UTHGN MOYT.""P UT LAKY EHA'KY GHM MYSSPGN AL YBYKEMOPGN; P UT LAKY EHA XPXLHTYMOPGN..." "COYKY PL OY?""MOYE RPSSYX OPT USTHLM VYZHKY TE YEYL."UGX IPYKKY, OPL BHPWY MKYTVSPGN WHGMPGAUSSE, CYGM HG MH MYSS HZ MOY SULMXUEL HZ MOYPK KYMKYUM, HZ RUKUMUYB'L PSSGYLL UGX OPL XYUMO.OY MHSX HZ OPL UXBYGMAKYL UL OY OUX GYBYK EYM KYWUSSYX MOYT. OY GHC, ULPM CYKY, LUC U GYC TYUGPGN PG USS OY OUX NHGY MOKHANO. GHC MOUM OY CULMYSSPGN PM USS MH GUMULOU OY YDIYKPYGWYX MOUM ISYULAKY COPWO U TUG OULCOYG CHTYG SPLMYG MH OPT--GHM WSYBYK CHTYG COH COYG SPLMYGPGN YPMOYK MKEMH KYTYTVYK COUM MOYE OYUK MH YGKPWO MOYPK TPGXL UGX COYG HIIHKMAGPMEHZZYKL MH KYMYSS PM, HK COH CPLO MH UXHIM PM MH LHTY MOHANOM HZ MOYPKHCG UGX IKHTIMSE WHGMKPVAMY MOYPK HCG WSYBYK WHTTYGML IKYIUKYX PG MOYPKSPMMSY TYGMUS CHKRLOHI--VAM MOY ISYULAKY NPBYG VE KYUS CHTYG NPZMYX CPMOU WUIUWPME MH LYSYWM UGX UVLHKV MOY BYKE VYLM U TUG LOHCL HZ OPTLYSZ.GUMULOU CPMOHAM RGHCPGN PM CUL USS UMMYGMPHG: LOY XPX GHM SHLY U CHKX,GH LPGNSY JAPBYK PG IPYKKY'L BHPWY, GH SHHR, GH MCPMWO HZ U TALWSY PGOPL ZUWY, GHK U LPGNSY NYLMAKY. LOY WUANOM MOY AGZPGPLOYX CHKX PG PMLZSPNOM UGX MHHR PM LMKUPNOM PGMH OYK HIYG OYUKM, XPBPGPGN MOY LYWKYMTYUGPGN HZ USS IPYKKY'L TYGMUS MKUBUPS.IKPGWYLL TUKE AGXYKLMHHX OPL LMHKE UGX LETIUMOPFYX CPMO OPT, VAM LOYGHC LUC LHTYMOPGN YSLY MOUM UVLHKVYX USS OYK UMMYGMPHG. LOY LUC MOYIHLLPVPSPME HZ SHBY UGX OUIIPGYLL VYMCYYG GUMULOU UGX IPYKKY, UGX MOYZPKLM MOHANOM HZ MOPL ZPSSYX OYK OYUKM CPMO NSUXGYLL.PM CUL MOKYY H'WSHWR PG MOY THKGPGN. MOY ZHHMTYG WUTY PG CPMO LUX UGXLMYKG ZUWYL MH WOUGNY MOY WUGXSYL, VAM GH HGY GHMPWYX MOYT.IPYKKY ZPGPLOYX OPL LMHKE. GUMULOU WHGMPGAYX MH SHHR UM OPT PGMYGMSECPMO VKPNOM, UMMYGMPBY, UGX UGPTUMYX YEYL, UL PZ MKEPGN MH AGXYKLMUGXLHTYMOPGN THKY COPWO OY OUX IYKOUIL SYZM AGMHSX. IPYKKY PG LOUTYZUWYXUGX OUIIE WHGZALPHG NSUGWYX HWWULPHGUSSE UM OYK, UGX MKPYX MH MOPGR COUMMH LUE GYDM MH PGMKHXAWY U ZKYLO LAVQYWM. IKPGWYLL TUKE CUL LPSYGM. PMHWWAKKYX MH GHGY HZ MOYT MOUM PM CUL MOKYY H'WSHWR UGX MPTY MH NH MHVYX."IYHISY LIYUR HZ TPLZHKMAGYL UGX LAZZYKPGNL," KYTUKRYX IPYKKY, "VAM PZUM MOPL THTYGM P CYKY ULRYX: 'CHASX EHA KUMOYK VY COUM EHA CYKY VYZHKYEHA CYKY MURYG IKPLHGYK, HK NH MOKHANO USS MOPL UNUPG?' MOYG ZHKOYUBYG'L LURY SYM TY UNUPG OUBY WUIMPBPME UGX OHKLYZSYLO! CY PTUNPGYMOUM COYG CY UKY MOKHCG HAM HZ HAK ALAUS KAML USS PL SHLM, VAM PM PLHGSE MOYG MOUM COUM PL GYC UGX NHHX VYNPGL. COPSY MOYKY PL SPZY MOYKY PLOUIIPGYLL. MOYKY PL TAWO, TAWO VYZHKY AL. P LUE MOPL MH EHA," OY UXXYX,MAKGPGN MH GUMULOU."EYL, EYL," LOY LUPX, UGLCYKPGN LHTYMOPGN JAPMY XPZZYKYGM. "P MHH LOHASXCPLO GHMOPGN VAM MH KYSPBY PM USS ZKHT MOY VYNPGGPGN."IPYKKY SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM OYK."EYL, UGX GHMOPGN THKY," LUPX GUMULOU."PM'L GHM MKAY, GHM MKAY!" WKPYX IPYKKY. "P UT GHM MH VSUTY ZHK VYPGNUSPBY UGX CPLOPGN MH SPBY--GHK EHA YPMOYK."LAXXYGSE GUMULOU VYGM OYK OYUX, WHBYKYX OYK ZUWY CPMO OYK OUGXL, UGXVYNUG MH WKE."COUM PL PM, GUMULOU?" LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE."GHMOPGN, GHMOPGN." LOY LTPSYX UM IPYKKY MOKHANO OYK MYUKL. "NHHX GPNOM!PM PL MPTY ZHK VYX."IPYKKY KHLY UGX MHHR OPL SYUBY.IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU TYM UL ALAUS PG MOY VYXKHHT. MOYE MUSRYX HZCOUM IPYKKY OUX MHSX MOYT. IKPGWYLL TUKE XPX GHM YDIKYLL OYK HIPGPHG HZIPYKKY GHK XPX GUMULOU LIYUR HZ OPT."CYSS, NHHX GPNOM, TUKE!" LUPX GUMULOU. "XH EHA RGHC, P UT HZMYG UZKUPXMOUM VE GHM LIYURPGN HZ OPT" (LOY TYUGM IKPGWY UGXKYC) "ZHK ZYUK HZ GHMXHPGN QALMPWY MH HAK ZYYSPGNL, CY ZHKNYM OPT."IKPGWYLL TUKE LPNOYX XYYISE UGX MOYKYVE UWRGHCSYXNYX MOY QALMPWY HZGUMULOU'L KYTUKR, VAM LOY XPX GHM YDIKYLL UNKYYTYGM PG CHKXL."PL PM IHLLPVSY MH ZHKNYM?" LOY UXXYX, LAXXYGSEVSALOPGN."MH MYSS IPYKKY? HO, EYL. COUM U LISYGXPX TUG OY PL!" LUPX IKPGWYLLTUKE."XH EHA RGHC, TUKE..." GUMULOU LAXXYGSE LUPX CPMO U TPLWOPYBHAL LTPSYLAWO UL IKPGWYLL TUKE OUX GHM LYYG HG OYK ZUWY ZHK U SHGN MPTY, "OY OULLHTYOHC NKHCG LH WSYUG, LTHHMO, UGX ZKYLO--UL PZ OY OUX QALM WHTY HAM HZU KALLPUG VUMO; XH EHA AGXYKLMUGX? IUIU ALYX MH...""P AGXYKLMUGX COE OY" (IKPGWY UGXKYC) "SPRYX GH HGY LH TAWO UL OPT,"LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE."EYL, UGX EYM OY PL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM. MOYE LUE TYG UKY ZKPYGXL COYGMOYE UKY JAPMY XPZZYKYGM. MOUM TALM VY MKAY. KYUSSE OY PL JAPMY AGSPRYOPT--PG YBYKEMOPGN.""EYL, VAM OY'L CHGXYKZAS.""CYSS, NHHX GPNOM," LUPX GUMULOU.UGX MOY LUTY TPLWOPYBHAL LTPSY SPGNYKYX ZHK U SHGN MPTY HG OYK ZUWY ULPZ PM OUX VYYG ZHKNHMMYG MOYKY.WOUIMYK DBPPPPM CUL U SHGN MPTY VYZHKY IPYKKY WHASX ZUSS ULSYYI MOUM GPNOM. OY IUWYXAI UGX XHCG OPL KHHT, GHC MAKGPGN OPL MOHANOML HG U XPZZPWASM IKHVSYTUGX ZKHCGPGN, GHC LAXXYGSE LOKANNPGN OPL LOHASXYKL UGX CPGWPGN, UGX GHCLTPSPGN OUIIPSE.OY CUL MOPGRPGN HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC, HZ GUMULOU, UGX HZ MOYPK SHBY, UM HGYTHTYGM QYUSHAL HZ OYK IULM, MOYG KYIKHUWOPGN OPTLYSZ ZHK MOUM ZYYSPGN.PM CUL USKYUXE LPD PG MOY THKGPGN UGX OY LMPSS IUWYX AI UGX XHCG MOYKHHT."CYSS, COUM'L MH VY XHGY PZ PM WUGGHM VY UBHPXYX? COUM'L MH VY XHGY?YBPXYGMSE PM OUL MH VY LH," LUPX OY MH OPTLYSZ, UGX OULMPSE AGXKYLLPGNOY NHM PGMH VYX, OUIIE UGX UNPMUMYX VAM ZKYY ZKHT OYLPMUMPHG HKPGXYWPLPHG."LMKUGNY UGX PTIHLLPVSY UL LAWO OUIIPGYLL LYYTL, P TALM XH YBYKEMOPGNMOUM LOY UGX P TUE VY TUG UGX CPZY," OY MHSX OPTLYSZ.U ZYC XUEL IKYBPHALSE IPYKKY OUX XYWPXYX MH NH MH IYMYKLVAKN HG MOYZKPXUE. COYG OY UCHRY HG MOY MOAKLXUE, LUBYSPWO WUTY MH ULR OPT UVHAMIUWRPGN ZHK MOY QHAKGYE."COUM, MH IYMYKLVAKN? COUM PL IYMYKLVAKN? COH PL MOYKY PG IYMYKLVAKN?"OY ULRYX PGBHSAGMUKPSE, MOHANO HGSE MH OPTLYSZ. "HO, EYL, SHGN UNHVYZHKY MOPL OUIIYGYX P XPX ZHK LHTY KYULHG TYUG MH NH MH IYMYKLVAKN,"OY KYZSYWMYX. "COE? VAM IYKOUIL P LOUSS NH. COUM U NHHX ZYSSHC OY PL UGXOHC UMMYGMPBY, UGX OHC OY KYTYTVYKL YBYKEMOPGN," OY MOHANOM, SHHRPGN UMLUBYSPWO'L HSX ZUWY, "UGX COUM U ISYULUGM LTPSY OY OUL!""CYSS, LUBYSPWO, XH EHA LMPSS GHM CPLO MH UWWYIM EHAK ZKYYXHT?" IPYKKYULRYX OPT."COUM'L MOY NHHX HZ ZKYYXHT MH TY, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE? CY SPBYX AGXYK MOYSUMY WHAGM--MOY RPGNXHT HZ OYUBYG VY OPL!--UGX CY OUBY SPBYX AGXYK EHAMHH, CPMOHAM YBYK VYPGN CKHGNYX.""UGX EHAK WOPSXKYG?""MOY WOPSXKYG CPSS SPBY QALM MOY LUTY. CPMO LAWO TULMYKL HGY WUG SPBY.""VAM COUM UVHAM TE OYPKL?" LUPX IPYKKY. "LAIIHLPGN P LAXXYGSE TUKKE...PM TPNOM OUIIYG," OY UXXYX CPMO UG PGBHSAGMUKE LTPSY."PZ P TUE MURY MOY SPVYKME, EHAK YDWYSSYGWE, PM CHASX VY U NHHX MOPGN.""OHC YULE OY MOPGRL PM," MOHANOM IPYKKY. "OY XHYLG'M RGHC OHC MYKKPVSYPM PL UGX OHC XUGNYKHAL. MHH LHHG HK MHH SUMY... PM PL MYKKPVSY!""LH COUM UKY EHAK HKXYKL? UKY EHA LMUKMPGN MHTHKKHC?" ULRYX LUBYSPWO."GH, P'SS IAM PM HZZ ZHK U VPM. P'SS MYSS EHA SUMYK. EHA TALM ZHKNPBYMOY MKHAVSY P OUBY IAM EHA MH," LUPX IPYKKY, UGX LYYPGN LUBYSPWO LTPSY,OY MOHANOM: "VAM OHC LMKUGNY PM PL MOUM OY LOHASX GHM RGHC MOUM GHCMOYKY PL GH IYMYKLVAKN ZHK TY, UGX MOUM MOUM TALM VY LYMMSYX ZPKLM HZUSS! VAM IKHVUVSE OY RGHCL PM CYSS YGHANO UGX PL HGSE IKYMYGXPGN. LOUSSP OUBY U MUSR CPMO OPT UGX LYY COUM OY MOPGRL?" IPYKKY KYZSYWMYX. "GH,UGHMOYK MPTY."UM VKYURZULM IPYKKY MHSX MOY IKPGWYLL, OPL WHALPG, MOUM OY OUX VYYG MHLYY IKPGWYLL TUKE MOY XUE VYZHKY UGX OUX MOYKY TYM--"COHT XH EHA MOPGR?GUMULOU KHLMHBU!"MOY IKPGWYLL LYYTYX MH LYY GHMOPGN THKY YDMKUHKXPGUKE PG MOUM MOUG PZ OYOUX LYYG UGGU LYTYGHBGU."XH EHA RGHC OYK?" ULRYX IPYKKY."P OUBY LYYG MOY IKPGWYLL," LOY KYISPYX. "P OYUKX MOUM MOYE CYKYUKKUGNPGN U TUMWO ZHK OYK CPMO EHAGN KHLMHB. PM CHASX VY U BYKE NHHXMOPGN ZHK MOY KHLMHBL, MOYE UKY LUPX MH VY AMMYKSE KAPGYX.""GH; P TYUG XH EHA RGHC GUMULOU KHLMHBU?""P OYUKX UVHAM MOUM UZZUPK HZ OYKL UM MOY MPTY. PM CUL U NKYUM IPME.""GH, LOY YPMOYK XHYLG'M AGXYKLMUGX HK PL IKYMYGXPGN," MOHANOM IPYKKY."VYMMYK GHM LUE UGEMOPGN MH OYK YPMOYK."MOY IKPGWYLL MHH OUX IKYIUKYX IKHBPLPHGL ZHK IPYKKY'L QHAKGYE."OHC RPGX MOYE USS UKY," MOHANOM IPYKKY. "COUM PL LAKIKPLPGN PL MOUMMOYE LOHASX MKHAVSY UVHAM MOYLY MOPGNL GHC COYG PM WUG GH SHGNYK VY HZPGMYKYLM MH MOYT. UGX USS ZHK TY!"HG MOY LUTY XUE MOY WOPYZ HZ IHSPWY WUTY MH IPYKKY, PGBPMPGN OPT MH LYGXU KYIKYLYGMUMPBY MH MOY ZUWYMYX IUSUWY MH KYWHBYK MOPGNL MOUM CYKY MH VYKYMAKGYX MH MOYPK HCGYKL MOUM XUE."UGX MOPL TUG MHH," MOHANOM IPYKKY, SHHRPGN PGMH MOY ZUWY HZ MOY WOPYZHZ IHSPWY. "COUM U ZPGY, NHHX-SHHRPGN HZZPWYK UGX OHC RPGX. ZUGWEVHMOYKPGN UVHAM LAWO MKPZSYL GHC! UGX MOYE UWMAUSSE LUE OY PL GHM OHGYLMUGX MURYL VKPVYL. COUM GHGLYGLY! VYLPXYL, COE LOHASXG'M OY MURY VKPVYL?MOUM'L MOY CUE OY CUL VKHANOM AI, UGX YBYKEVHXE XHYL PM. VAM COUM URPGX, ISYULUGM ZUWY UGX OHC OY LTPSYL UL OY SHHRL UM TY."IPYKKY CYGM MH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L MH XPGGYK.UL OY XKHBY MOKHANO MOY LMKYYML IULM MOY OHALYL MOUM OUX VYYG VAKGYXXHCG, OY CUL LAKIKPLYX VE MOY VYUAME HZ MOHLY KAPGL. MOY IPWMAKYLJAYGYLLHZ MOY WOPTGYE LMUWRL UGX MATVSY-XHCG CUSSL HZ MOY VAKGYX-HAM JAUKMYKLHZ MOY MHCG, LMKYMWOPGN HAM UGX WHGWYUSPGN HGY UGHMOYK, KYTPGXYX OPT HZMOY KOPGY UGX MOY WHSHLLYAT. MOY WUVTYG OY TYM UGX MOYPK IULLYGNYKL,MOY WUKIYGMYKL WAMMPGN MOY MPTVYK ZHK GYC OHALYL CPMO UDYL, MOY CHTYGOUCRYKL, UGX MOY LOHIRYYIYKL, USS SHHRYX UM OPT CPMO WOYYKZAS VYUTPGNYEYL MOUM LYYTYX MH LUE: "UO, MOYKY OY PL! SYM'L LYY COUM CPSS WHTY HZPM!"UM MOY YGMKUGWY MH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OHALY IPYKKY ZYSM XHAVMZAS COYMOYKOY OUX KYUSSE VYYG MOYKY MOY GPNOM VYZHKY UGX KYUSSE LYYG GUMULOU UGXMUSRYX MH OYK. "IYKOUIL P PTUNPGYX PM; IYKOUIL P LOUSS NH PG UGX ZPGXGH HGY MOYKY." VAM OY OUX OUKXSE YGMYKYX MOY KHHT VYZHKY OY ZYSM OYKIKYLYGWY CPMO OPL COHSY VYPGN VE MOY SHLL HZ OPL LYGLY HZ ZKYYXHT. LOYCUL PG MOY LUTY VSUWR XKYLL CPMO LHZM ZHSXL UGX OYK OUPK CUL XHGY MOYLUTY CUE UL MOY XUE VYZHKY, EYM LOY CUL JAPMY XPZZYKYGM. OUX LOY VYYGSPRY MOPL COYG OY YGMYKYX MOY XUE VYZHKY OY WHASX GHM ZHK U THTYGM OUBYZUPSYX MH KYWHNGPFY OYK.LOY CUL UL OY OUX RGHCG OYK USTHLM UL U WOPSX UGX SUMYK HG UL IKPGWYUGXKYC'L ZPUGWYY. U VKPNOM JAYLMPHGPGN SPNOM LOHGY PG OYK YEYL, UGX HGOYK ZUWY CUL U ZKPYGXSE UGX LMKUGNYSE KHNAPLO YDIKYLLPHG.IPYKKY XPGYX CPMO MOYT UGX CHASX OUBY LIYGM MOY COHSY YBYGPGN MOYKY, VAMIKPGWYLL TUKE CUL NHPGN MH BYLIYKL UGX IPYKKY SYZM MOY OHALY CPMO OYK.GYDM XUE OY WUTY YUKSE, XPGYX, UGX LMUEYX MOY COHSY YBYGPGN. MOHANOIKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU CYKY YBPXYGMSE NSUX MH LYY MOYPK BPLPMHK UGXMOHANO USS IPYKKY'L PGMYKYLM CUL GHC WYGMYKYX PG MOUM OHALY, VE MOYYBYGPGN MOYE OUX MUSRYX HBYK YBYKEMOPGN UGX MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG IULLYX ZKHTHGY MKPBPUS MHIPW MH UGHMOYK UGX KYIYUMYXSE VKHRY HZZ. OY LMUEYX LH SHGNMOUM IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX GUMULOU YDWOUGNYX NSUGWYL, YBPXYGMSE CHGXYKPGNCOYG OY CHASX NH. IPYKKY GHMPWYX MOPL VAM WHASX GHM NH. OY ZYSM AGYULEUGX YTVUKKULLYX, VAM LUM HG VYWUALY OY LPTISE WHASX GHM NYM AI UGX MURYOPL SYUBY.IKPGWYLL TUKE, ZHKYLYYPGN GH YGX MH MOPL, KHLY ZPKLM, UGX WHTISUPGPGN HZU OYUXUWOY VYNUG MH LUE NHHX GPNOM."LH EHA UKY NHPGN MH IYMYKLVAKN MHTHKKHC?" LOY ULRYX."GH, P UT GHM NHPGN," IPYKKY KYISPYX OULMPSE, PG U LAKIKPLYX MHGY UGX ULMOHANO HZZYGXYX. "EYL... GH... MH IYMYKLVAKN? MHTHKKHC--VAM P CHG'M LUENHHX-VE EYM. P CPSS WUSS KHAGX PG WULY EHA OUBY UGE WHTTPLLPHGL ZHK TY,"LUPX OY, LMUGXPGN VYZHKY IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX MAKGPGN KYX, VAM GHM MURPGNOPL XYIUKMAKY.GUMULOU NUBY OPT OYK OUGX UGX CYGM HAM. IKPGWYLL TUKE HG MOY HMOYK OUGXPGLMYUX HZ NHPGN UCUE LUGR PGMH UG UKTWOUPK, UGX SHHRYX LMYKGSE UGXPGMYGMSE UM OPT CPMO OYK XYYI, KUXPUGM YEYL. MOY CYUKPGYLL LOYOUX ISUPGSE LOHCG VYZHKY OUX GHC JAPMY IULLYX HZZ. CPMO U XYYI UGXSHGN-XKUCG LPNO LOY LYYTYX MH VY IKYIUKYX ZHK U SYGNMOE MUSR.COYG GUMULOU SYZM MOY KHHT IPYKKY'L WHGZALPHG UGX UCRCUKXGYLLPTTYXPUMYSE BUGPLOYX UGX CYKY KYISUWYX VE YUNYK YDWPMYTYGM. OY JAPWRSETHBYX UG UKTWOUPK MHCUKX IKPGWYLL TUKE."EYL, P CUGMYX MH MYSS EHA," LUPX OY, UGLCYKPGN OYK SHHR UL PZ LOY OUXLIHRYG. "IKPGWYLL, OYSI TY! COUM UT P MH XH? WUG P OHIY? IKPGWYLL, TEXYUK ZKPYGX, SPLMYG! P RGHC PM USS. P RGHC P UT GHM CHKMOE HZ OYK, PRGHC PM'L PTIHLLPVSY MH LIYUR HZ PM GHC. VAM P CUGM MH VY U VKHMOYK MHOYK. GH, GHM MOUM, P XHG'M, P WUG'M..."OY IUALYX UGX KAVVYX OPL ZUWY UGX YEYL CPMO OPL OUGXL."CYSS," OY CYGM HG CPMO UG YBPXYGM YZZHKM UM LYSZ-WHGMKHS UGX WHOYKYGWY."P XHG'M RGHC COYG P VYNUG MH SHBY OYK, VAM P OUBY SHBYX OYK UGX OYKUSHGY USS TE SPZY, UGX P SHBY OYK LH MOUM P WUGGHM PTUNPGY SPZY CPMOHAMOYK. P WUGGHM IKHIHLY MH OYK UM IKYLYGM, VAM MOY MOHANOM MOUMIYKOUIL LOY TPNOM LHTYXUE VY TE CPZY UGX MOUM P TUE VY TPLLPGN MOUMIHLLPVPSPME... MOUM IHLLPVPSPME... PL MYKKPVSY. MYSS TY, WUG P OHIY?MYSS TY COUM P UT MH XH, XYUK IKPGWYLL!" OY UXXYX UZMYK U IUALY, UGXMHAWOYX OYK OUGX UL LOY XPX GHM KYISE."P UT MOPGRPGN HZ COUM EHA OUBY MHSX TY," UGLCYKYX IKPGWYLL TUKE."MOPL PL COUM P CPSS LUE. EHA UKY KPNOM MOUM MH LIYUR MH OYK HZ SHBY UMIKYLYGM..."IKPGWYLL TUKE LMHIIYX. LOY CUL NHPGN MH LUE MOUM MH LIYUR HZ SHBY CULPTIHLLPVSY, VAM LOY LMHIIYX VYWUALY LOY OUX LYYG VE MOY LAXXYG WOUGNYPG GUMULOU MCH XUEL VYZHKY MOUM LOY CHASX GHM HGSE GHM VY OAKM PZ IPYKKYLIHRY HZ OPL SHBY, VAM MOUM PM CUL MOY BYKE MOPGN LOY CPLOYX ZHK."MH LIYUR MH OYK GHC CHASXG'M XH," LUPX MOY IKPGWYLL USS MOY LUTY."VAM COUM UT P MH XH?""SYUBY PM MH TY," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE. "P RGHC..."IPYKKY CUL SHHRPGN PGMH IKPGWYLL TUKE'L YEYL."CYSS?... CYSS?..." OY LUPX."P RGHC MOUM LOY SHBYL... CPSS SHBY EHA," IKPGWYLL TUKE WHKKYWMYXOYKLYSZ.VYZHKY OYK CHKXL CYKY HAM, IPYKKY OUX LIKAGN AI UGX CPMO U ZKPNOMYGYXYDIKYLLPHG LYPFYX IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OUGX."COUM TURYL EHA MOPGR LH? EHA MOPGR P TUE OHIY? EHA MOPGR...?""EYL, P MOPGR LH," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO U LTPSY. "CKPMY MH OYKIUKYGML, UGX SYUBY PM MH TY. P CPSS MYSS OYK COYG P WUG. P CPLO PM MHOUIIYG UGX TE OYUKM MYSSL TY PM CPSS.""GH, PM WUGGHM VY! OHC OUIIE P UT! VAM PM WUG'M VY.... OHC OUIIE P UT!GH, PM WUG'M VY!" IPYKKY RYIM LUEPGN UL OY RPLLYX IKPGWYLL TUKE'L OUGXL."NH MH IYMYKLVAKN, MOUM CPSS VY VYLM. UGX P CPSS CKPMY MH EHA," LOYLUPX."MH IYMYKLVAKN? NH MOYKY? BYKE CYSS, P'SS NH. VAM P TUE WHTY UNUPGMHTHKKHC?"GYDM XUE IPYKKY WUTY MH LUE NHHX-VE. GUMULOU CUL SYLL UGPTUMYX MOUGLOY OUX VYYG MOY XUE VYZHKY; VAM MOUM XUE UL OY SHHRYX UM OYK IPYKKYLHTYMPTYL ZYSM UL PZ OY CUL BUGPLOPGN UGX MOUM GYPMOYK OY GHK LOYYDPLMYX UGE SHGNYK, MOUM GHMOPGN YDPLMYX VAM OUIIPGYLL. "PL PM IHLLPVSY?GH, PM WUG'M VY," OY MHSX OPTLYSZ UM YBYKE SHHR, NYLMAKY, UGX CHKX MOUMZPSSYX OPL LHAS CPMO QHE.COYG HG LUEPGN NHHX-VE OY MHHR OYK MOPG, LSYGXYK OUGX, OY WHASX GHM OYSIOHSXPGN PM U SPMMSY SHGNYK PG OPL HCG."PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM MOPL OUGX, MOUM ZUWY, MOHLY YEYL, USS MOPL MKYULAKYHZ ZYTPGPGY WOUKT LH LMKUGNY MH TY GHC, PL PM IHLLPVSY MOUM PM CPSS HGYXUE VY TPGY ZHKYBYK, UL ZUTPSPUK MH TY UL P UT MH TELYSZ?... GH, MOUM'LPTIHLLPVSY!...""NHHX-VEY, WHAGM," LOY LUPX USHAX. "P LOUSS SHHR ZHKCUKX BYKE TAWO MHEHAK KYMAKG," LOY UXXYX PG U COPLIYK.UGX MOYLY LPTISY CHKXL, OYK SHHR, UGX MOY YDIKYLLPHG HG OYK ZUWY COPWOUWWHTIUGPYX MOYT, ZHKTYX ZHK MCH THGMOL MOY LAVQYWM HZ PGYDOUALMPVSYTYTHKPYL, PGMYKIKYMUMPHGL, UGX OUIIE TYXPMUMPHGL ZHK IPYKKY. "'P LOUSSSHHR ZHKCUKX BYKE TAWO MH EHAK KYMAKG....' EYL, EYL, OHC XPX LOY LUE PM?EYL, 'P LOUSS SHHR ZHKCUKX BYKE TAWO MH EHAK KYMAKG.' HO, OHC OUIIE PUT! COUM PL OUIIYGPGN MH TY? OHC OUIIE P UT!" LUPX IPYKKY MH OPTLYSZ.WOUIMYK DPDMOYKY CUL GHMOPGN PG IPYKKY'L LHAS GHC UM USS SPRY COUM OUX MKHAVSYX PMXAKPGN OPL WHAKMLOPI HZ OYSYGY.OY XPX GHM KYIYUM MH OPTLYSZ CPMO U LPWRYGPGN ZYYSPGN HZ LOUTY MOY CHKXLOY OUX LIHRYG, HK LUE: "HO, COE XPX P GHM LUE MOUM?" UGX, "COUMYBYK TUXYTY LUE 'QY BHAL UPTY'?" HG MOY WHGMKUKE, OY GHC KYIYUMYX PG PTUNPGUMPHGYBYKE CHKX MOUM OY HK GUMULOU OUX LIHRYG UGX IPWMAKYX YBYKE XYMUPS HZOYK ZUWY UGX LTPSY, UGX XPX GHM CPLO MH XPTPGPLO HK UXX UGEMOPGN, VAMHGSE MH KYIYUM PM UNUPG UGX UNUPG. MOYKY CUL GHC GHM U LOUXHC HZ XHAVMPG OPL TPGX UL MH COYMOYK COUM OY OUX AGXYKMURYG CUL KPNOM HK CKHGN.HGSE HGY MYKKPVSY XHAVM LHTYMPTYL WKHLLYX OPL TPGX: "CULG'M PM USSU XKYUT? PLG'M IKPGWYLL TUKE TPLMURYG? UT P GHM MHH WHGWYPMYX UGXLYSZ-WHGZPXYGM? P VYSPYBY USS MOPL--UGX LAXXYGSE IKPGWYLL TUKE CPSS MYSSOYK, UGX LOY CPSS VY LAKY MH LTPSY UGX LUE: 'OHC LMKUGNY! OY TALM VYXYSAXPGN OPTLYSZ. XHYLG'M OY RGHC MOUM OY PL U TUG, QALM U TUG, COPSYP...? P UT LHTYMOPGN USMHNYMOYK XPZZYKYGM UGX OPNOYK.'"MOUM CUL MOY HGSE XHAVM HZMYG MKHAVSPGN IPYKKY. OY XPX GHM GHC TURY UGEISUGL. MOY OUIIPGYLL VYZHKY OPT UIIYUKYX LH PGWHGWYPBUVSY MOUM PZ HGSEOY WHASX UMMUPG PM, PM CHASX VY MOY YGX HZ USS MOPGNL. YBYKEMOPGN YGXYXCPMO MOUM.U QHEZAS, AGYDIYWMYX ZKYGFE, HZ COPWO OY OUX MOHANOM OPTLYSZ PGWUIUVSY,IHLLYLLYX OPT. MOY COHSY TYUGPGN HZ SPZY--GHM ZHK OPT USHGY VAM ZHK MOYCOHSY CHKSX--LYYTYX MH OPT WYGMYKYX PG OPL SHBY UGX MOY IHLLPVPSPME HZVYPGN SHBYX VE OYK. UM MPTYL YBYKEVHXE LYYTYX MH OPT MH VY HWWAIPYX CPMOHGY MOPGN HGSE--OPL ZAMAKY OUIIPGYLL. LHTYMPTYL PM LYYTYX MH OPT MOUMHMOYK IYHISY CYKY USS UL ISYULYX UL OY CUL OPTLYSZ UGX TYKYSE MKPYX MHOPXY MOUM ISYULAKY VE IKYMYGXPGN MH VY VALE CPMO HMOYK PGMYKYLML. PGYBYKE CHKX UGX NYLMAKY OY LUC USSALPHGL MH OPL OUIIPGYLL. OY HZMYGLAKIKPLYX MOHLY OY TYM VE OPL LPNGPZPWUGMSE OUIIE SHHRL UGX LTPSYL COPWOLYYTYX MH YDIKYLL U LYWKYM AGXYKLMUGXPGN VYMCYYG OPT UGX MOYT. UGX COYGOY KYUSPFYX MOUM IYHISY TPNOM GHM VY UCUKY HZ OPL OUIIPGYLL, OY IPMPYXMOYT CPMO OPL COHSY OYUKM UGX ZYSM U XYLPKY LHTYOHC MH YDISUPG MH MOYTMOUM USS MOUM HWWAIPYX MOYT CUL U TYKY ZKPBHSHAL MKPZSY AGCHKMOE HZUMMYGMPHG.COYG PM CUL LANNYLMYX MH OPT MOUM OY LOHASX YGMYK MOY WPBPS LYKBPWY,HK COYG MOY CUK HK UGE NYGYKUS IHSPMPWUS UZZUPKL CYKY XPLWALLYX HG MOYULLATIMPHG MOUM YBYKEVHXE'L CYSZUKY XYIYGXYX HG MOPL HK MOUM PLLAYHZ YBYGML, OY CHASX SPLMYG CPMO U TPSX UGX IPMEPGN LTPSY UGX LAKIKPLYIYHISY VE OPL LMKUGNY WHTTYGML. VAM UM MOPL MPTY OY LUC YBYKEVHXE--VHMOMOHLY COH, UL OY PTUNPGYX, AGXYKLMHHX MOY KYUS TYUGPGN HZ SPZY (MOUMPL, COUM OY CUL ZYYSPGN) UGX MOHLY AGZHKMAGUMYL COH YBPXYGMSE XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX PM--PG MOY VKPNOM SPNOM HZ MOY YTHMPHG MOUM LOHGY CPMOPGOPTLYSZ, UGX UM HGWY CPMOHAM UGE YZZHKM LUC PG YBYKEHGY OY TYMYBYKEMOPGN MOUM CUL NHHX UGX CHKMOE HZ VYPGN SHBYX.COYG XYUSPGN CPMO MOY UZZUPKL UGX IUIYKL HZ OPL XYUX CPZY, OYK TYTHKEUKHALYX PG OPT GH ZYYSPGN VAM IPME MOUM LOY OUX GHM RGHCG MOY VSPLL OYGHC RGYC. IKPGWY BULPSP, COH OUBPGN HVMUPGYX U GYC IHLM UGX LHTYZKYLO XYWHKUMPHGL CUL IUKMPWASUKSE IKHAX UM MOPL MPTY, LYYTYX MH OPT UIUMOYMPW, RPGXSE HSX TUG TAWO MH VY IPMPYX.HZMYG PG UZMYKSPZY IPYKKY KYWUSSYX MOPL IYKPHX HZ VSPLLZAS PGLUGPME. USSMOY BPYCL OY ZHKTYX HZ TYG UGX WPKWATLMUGWYL UM MOPL MPTY KYTUPGYX MKAYZHK OPT USCUEL. OY GHM HGSE XPX GHM KYGHAGWY MOYT LAVLYJAYGMSE, VAM COYGOY CUL PG XHAVM HK PGCUKXSE UM BUKPUGWY, OY KYZYKKYX MH MOY BPYCL OY OUXOYSX UM MOPL MPTY HZ OPL TUXGYLL UGX MOYE USCUEL IKHBYX WHKKYWM."P TUE OUBY UIIYUKYX LMKUGNY UGX JAYYK MOYG," OY MOHANOM, "VAM P CULGHM LH TUX UL P LYYTYX. HG MOY WHGMKUKE P CUL MOYG CPLYK UGX OUXTHKY PGLPNOM MOUG UM UGE HMOYK MPTY, UGX AGXYKLMHHX USS MOUM PL CHKMOAGXYKLMUGXPGN PG SPZY, VYWUALY... VYWUALY P CUL OUIIE."IPYKKY'L PGLUGPME WHGLPLMYX PG GHM CUPMPGN, UL OY ALYX MH XH, MHXPLWHBYK IYKLHGUS UMMKPVAMYL COPWO OY MYKTYX "NHHX JAUSPMPYL" PG IYHISYVYZHKY SHBPGN MOYT; OPL OYUKM CUL GHC HBYKZSHCPGN CPMO SHBY, UGX VESHBPGN IYHISY CPMOHAM WUALY OY XPLWHBYKYX PGXAVPMUVSY WUALYL ZHK SHBPGNMOYT.WOUIMYK DDUZMYK IPYKKY'L XYIUKMAKY MOUM ZPKLM YBYGPGN, COYG GUMULOU OUX LUPX MHIKPGWYLL TUKE CPMO U NUPSE THWRPGN LTPSY: "OY SHHRL QALM, EYL, QALM ULPZ OY OUX WHTY HAM HZ U KALLPUG VUMO--PG U LOHKM WHUM UGX CPMO OPL OUPKWKHIIYX," LHTYMOPGN OPXXYG UGX AGRGHCG MH OYKLYSZ, VAM PKKYIKYLLPVSY,UCHRY PG GUMULOU'L LHAS.YBYKEMOPGN: OYK ZUWY, CUSR, SHHR, UGX BHPWY, CUL LAXXYGSE USMYKYX.MH OYK HCG LAKIKPLY U IHCYK HZ SPZY UGX OHIY HZ OUIIPGYLL KHLY MH MOYLAKZUWY UGX XYTUGXYX LUMPLZUWMPHG. ZKHT MOUM YBYGPGN LOY LYYTYX MH OUBYZHKNHMMYG USS MOUM OUX OUIIYGYX MH OYK. LOY GH SHGNYK WHTISUPGYX HZ OYKIHLPMPHG, XPX GHM LUE U CHKX UVHAM MOY IULM, UGX GH SHGNYK ZYUKYX MHTURY OUIIE ISUGL ZHK MOY ZAMAKY. LOY LIHRY SPMMSY HZ IPYKKY, VAM COYGIKPGWYLL TUKE TYGMPHGYX OPT U SHGN-YDMPGNAPLOYX SPNOM HGWY THKY RPGXSYXPG OYK YEYL UGX OYK SPIL WAKBYX CPMO U LMKUGNY LTPSY.MOY WOUGNY MOUM MHHR ISUWY PG GUMULOU UM ZPKLM LAKIKPLYX IKPGWYLL TUKE;VAM COYG LOY AGXYKLMHHX PML TYUGPGN PM NKPYBYX OYK. "WUG LOY OUBY SHBYXTE VKHMOYK LH SPMMSY UL MH VY UVSY MH ZHKNYM OPT LH LHHG?" LOY MOHANOMCOYG LOY KYZSYWMYX HG MOY WOUGNY. VAM COYG LOY CUL CPMO GUMULOU LOY CULGHM BYDYX CPMO OYK UGX XPX GHM KYIKHUWO OYK. MOY KYUCURYGYX IHCYKHZ SPZY MOUM OUX LYPFYX GUMULOU CUL LH YBPXYGMSE PKKYIKYLLPVSY UGXAGYDIYWMYX VE OYK MOUM PG OYK IKYLYGWY IKPGWYLL TUKE ZYSM MOUM LOY OUXGH KPNOM MH KYIKHUWO OYK YBYG PG OYK OYUKM. GUMULOU NUBY OYKLYSZ AI LH ZASSE UGX ZKUGRSE MH MOPL GYC ZYYSPGNMOUM LOY XPX GHM MKE MH OPXY MOY ZUWM MOUM LOY CUL GH SHGNYK LUX, VAMVKPNOM UGX WOYYKZAS.COYG IKPGWYLL TUKE KYMAKGYX MH OYK KHHT UZMYK OYK GHWMAKGUS MUSR CPMOIPYKKY, GUMULOU TYM OYK HG MOY MOKYLOHSX."OY OUL LIHRYG?
