OYHKXYKYX XPGGYKL UGX LAIIYKL UGX HVBPHALSE MKPYX MH UIIYUK WOYYKZAS, VAMOPL WOYYKZASGYLL CUL GHM PGZYWMPHAL UL PM ALYX MH VY: HG MOY WHGMKUKE PMYBHRYX MOY WHTIULLPHG HZ MOHLY COH RGYC UGX SPRYX OPT.COYG IPYKKY UGX OPL CPZY OUX SYZM, OY NKYC BYKE JAPYM UGX VYNUG MHWHTISUPG HZ XYIKYLLPHG. U ZYC XUEL SUMYK OY ZYSS PSS UGX MHHR MH OPLVYX. OY KYUSPFYX ZKHT MOY ZPKLM MOUM OY CHASX GHM NYM AI UNUPG, XYLIPMYMOY XHWMHK'L YGWHAKUNYTYGM. MOY WHAGMYLL IULLYX U ZHKMGPNOM PG UGUKTWOUPK VE OPL IPSSHC CPMOHAM AGXKYLLPGN. YBYKE MPTY LOY NUBY OPTOPL TYXPWPGY OY LHVVYX UGX LPSYGMSE RPLLYX OYK OUGX. HG OPL SULM XUE,LHVVPGN, OY ULRYX OYK UGX OPL UVLYGM LHG MH ZHKNPBY OPT ZHK OUBPGNXPLLPIUMYX MOYPK IKHIYKME--MOUM VYPGN MOY WOPYZ ZUASM HZ COPWO OY CULWHGLWPHAL. UZMYK KYWYPBPGN WHTTAGPHG UGX AGWMPHG OY JAPYMSE XPYX; UGXGYDM XUE U MOKHGN HZ UWJAUPGMUGWYL COH WUTY MH IUE MOYPK SULM KYLIYWMLMH MOY XYWYULYX ZPSSYX MOY OHALY KYGMYX VE MOY KHLMHBL. USS MOYLYUWJAUPGMUGWYL, COH OUX LH HZMYG XPGYX UGX XUGWYX UM OPL OHALY UGX OUX LHHZMYG SUANOYX UM OPT, GHC LUPX, CPMO U WHTTHG ZYYSPGN HZ LYSZ-KYIKHUWOUGX YTHMPHG, UL PZ QALMPZEPGN MOYTLYSBYL: "CYSS, COUMYBYK OY TUE OUBYVYYG OY CUL U THLM CHKMOE TUG. EHA XHG'M TYYM LAWO TYG GHCUXUEL.... UGXCOPWO HZ AL OUL GHM CYURGYLLYL HZ OPL HCG?"PM CUL QALM COYG MOY WHAGM'L UZZUPKL OUX VYWHTY LH PGBHSBYX MOUM PM CULPTIHLLPVSY MH LUE COUM CHASX OUIIYG PZ OY SPBYX UGHMOYK EYUK MOUM OYAGYDIYWMYXSE XPYX.GPWOHSUL CUL CPMO MOY KALLPUG UKTE PG IUKPL COYG MOY GYCL HZ OPLZUMOYK'L XYUMO KYUWOYX OPT. OY UM HGWY KYLPNGYX OPL WHTTPLLPHG, UGXCPMOHAM CUPMPGN ZHK PM MH VY UWWYIMYX MHHR SYUBY HZ UVLYGWY UGX CYGM MHTHLWHC. MOY LMUMY HZ MOY WHAGM'L UZZUPKL VYWUTY JAPMY HVBPHAL U THGMOUZMYK OPL XYUMO, LAKIKPLPGN YBYKEHGY VE MOY PTTYGLY MHMUS HZ LTUSSXYVML MOY YDPLMYGWY HZ COPWO GH HGY OUX LALIYWMYX. MOY XYVML UTHAGMYX MHXHAVSY MOY BUSAY HZ MOY IKHIYKME.ZKPYGXL UGX KYSUMPHGL UXBPLYX GPWOHSUL MH XYWSPGY MOY PGOYKPMUGWY. VAMOY KYNUKXYX LAWO U KYZALUS UL U LSAK HG OPL ZUMOYK'L TYTHKE, COPWO OYOYSX LUWKYX, UGX MOYKYZHKY CHASX GHM OYUK HZ KYZALPGN UGX UWWYIMYX MOYPGOYKPMUGWY MHNYMOYK CPMO MOY HVSPNUMPHG MH IUE MOY XYVML.MOY WKYXPMHKL COH OUX LH SHGN VYYG LPSYGM, KYLMKUPGYX VE U BUNAYVAM IHCYKZAS PGZSAYGWY YDYKMYX HG MOYT COPSY OY SPBYX VE MOY WHAGM'LWUKYSYLL NHHX GUMAKY, USS IKHWYYXYX MH YGZHKWY MOYPK WSUPTL UM HGWY. ULUSCUEL OUIIYGL PG LAWO WULYL KPBUSKE LIKUGN AI UL MH COPWO LOHASX NYMIUPX ZPKLM, UGX MOHLY COH SPRY TPMYGRU OYSX IKHTPLLHKE GHMYL NPBYG MOYTUL IKYLYGML GHC VYWUTY MOY THLM YDUWMPGN HZ MOY WKYXPMHKL. GPWOHSUL CULUSSHCYX GH KYLIPMY UGX GH IYUWY, UGX MOHLY COH OUX LYYTYX MH IPMEMOY HSX TUG--MOY WUALY HZ MOYPK SHLLYL (PZ MOYE CYKY SHLLYL)--GHCKYTHKLYSYLLSE IAKLAYX MOY EHAGN OYPK COH OUX BHSAGMUKPSE AGXYKMURYG MOYXYVML UGX CUL HVBPHALSE GHM NAPSME HZ WHGMKUWMPGN MOYT.GHM HGY HZ MOY ISUGL GPWOHSUL MKPYX LAWWYYXYX; MOY YLMUMY CUL LHSX VEUAWMPHG ZHK OUSZ PML BUSAY, UGX OUSZ MOY XYVML LMPSS KYTUPGYXAGIUPX. GPWOHSUL UWWYIMYX MOPKME MOHALUGX KAVSYL HZZYKYX OPT VE OPLVKHMOYK-PG-SUC VYFAROHB MH IUE HZZ XYVML OY KYNUKXYX UL NYGAPGYSE XAYZHK BUSAY KYWYPBYX. UGX MH UBHPX VYPGN PTIKPLHGYX ZHK MOY KYTUPGXYK, ULMOY WKYXPMHKL MOKYUMYGYX, OY KY-YGMYKYX MOY NHBYKGTYGM LYKBPWY.OY WHASX GHM KYQHPG MOY UKTE COYKY OY CHASX OUBY VYYG TUXY WHSHGYS UMMOY GYDM BUWUGWE, ZHK OPL THMOYK GHC WSAGN MH OPT UL OYK HGY OHSX HGSPZY; UGX LH XYLIPMY OPL KYSAWMUGWY MH KYTUPG PG THLWHC UTHGN IYHISY COHOUX RGHCG OPT VYZHKY, UGX XYLIPMY OPL UVOHKKYGWY HZ MOY WPBPS LYKBPWY,OY UWWYIMYX U IHLM PG THLWHC PG MOUM LYKBPWY, XHZZYX MOY AGPZHKT HZCOPWO OY CUL LH ZHGX, UGX THBYX CPMO OPL THMOYK UGX LHGEU MH U LTUSSOHALY HG MOY LPBMLYB BKUFOYR.GUMULOU UGX IPYKKY CYKY SPBPGN PG IYMYKLVAKN UM MOY MPTY UGX OUX GHWSYUK PXYU HZ GPWOHSUL' WPKWATLMUGWYL. OUBPGN VHKKHCYX THGYE ZKHT OPLVKHMOYK-PG-SUC, GPWOHSUL MKPYX MH OPXY OPL CKYMWOYX WHGXPMPHG ZKHT OPT.OPL IHLPMPHG CUL MOY THKY XPZZPWASM VYWUALY CPMO OPL LUSUKE HZ MCYSBYOAGXKYX KAVSYL OY OUX GHM HGSE MH RYYI OPTLYSZ, OPL THMOYK, UGX LHGEU,VAM OUX MH LOPYSX OPL THMOYK ZKHT RGHCSYXNY HZ MOYPK IHBYKME. MOYWHAGMYLL WHASX GHM WHGWYPBY HZ SPZY CPMOHAM MOY SADAKPHAL WHGXPMPHGL LOYOUX VYYG ALYX MH ZKHT WOPSXOHHX UGX, AGUVSY MH KYUSPFY OHC OUKX PM CULZHK OYK LHG, RYIM XYTUGXPGN GHC U WUKKPUNY (COPWO MOYE XPX GHM RYYI) MHLYGX ZHK U ZKPYGX, GHC LHTY YDIYGLPBY UKMPWSY HZ ZHHX ZHK OYKLYSZ, HKCPGY ZHK OYK LHG, HK THGYE MH VAE U IKYLYGM UL U LAKIKPLY ZHK GUMULOU HKLHGEU, HK ZHK GPWOHSUL OPTLYSZ.LHGEU RYIM OHALY, UMMYGXYX HG OYK UAGM, KYUX MH OYK, IAM AI CPMO OYKCOPTL UGX LYWKYM PSS-CPSS, UGX OYSIYX GPWOHSUL MH WHGWYUS MOYPK IHBYKMEZKHT MOY HSX WHAGMYLL. GPWOHSUL ZYSM OPTLYSZ PKKYXYYTUVSE PGXYVMYXMH LHGEU ZHK USS LOY CUL XHPGN ZHK OPL THMOYK UGX NKYUMSE UXTPKYX OYKIUMPYGWY UGX XYBHMPHG, VAM MKPYX MH RYYI USHHZ ZKHT OYK.OY LYYTYX PG OPL OYUKM MH KYIKHUWO OYK ZHK VYPGN MHH IYKZYWM, UGXVYWUALY MOYKY CUL GHMOPGN MH KYIKHUWO OYK CPMO. LOY OUX USS MOUM IYHISYUKY BUSAYX ZHK, VAM SPMMSY MOUM WHASX OUBY TUXY OPT SHBY OYK. OY ZYSMMOUM MOY THKY OY BUSAYX OYK MOY SYLL OY SHBYX OYK. OY OUX MURYG OYK UMOYK CHKX COYG LOY CKHMY NPBPGN OPT OPL ZKYYXHT UGX GHC VYOUBYX UL PZ USSMOUM OUX IULLYX VYMCYYG MOYT OUX VYYG SHGN ZHKNHMMYG UGX WHASX GYBYK PGUGE WULY VY KYGYCYX.GPWOHSUL' IHLPMPHG VYWUTY CHKLY UGX CHKLY. MOY PXYU HZ IAMMPGN LHTYMOPGNULPXY HAM HZ OPL LUSUKE IKHBYX U XKYUT. GHM HGSE XPX OY GHM LUBYUGEMOPGN, VAM MH WHTISE CPMO OPL THMOYK'L XYTUGXL OY YBYG PGWAKKYX LHTYLTUSS XYVML. OY WHASX LYY GH CUE HAM HZ MOPL LPMAUMPHG. MOY PXYU HZTUKKEPGN LHTY KPWO CHTUG, COPWO CUL LANNYLMYX MH OPT VE OPL ZYTUSYKYSUMPHGL, CUL KYIANGUGM MH OPT. MOY HMOYK CUE HAM--OPL THMOYK'LXYUMO--GYBYK YGMYKYX OPL OYUX. OY CPLOYX ZHK GHMOPGN UGX OHIYXZHK GHMOPGN, UGX XYYI PG OPL OYUKM YDIYKPYGWYX U NSHHTE UGX LMYKGLUMPLZUWMPHG PG UG AGWHTISUPGPGN YGXAKUGWY HZ OPL IHLPMPHG. OY MKPYXMH UBHPX OPL HSX UWJAUPGMUGWYL CPMO MOYPK WHTTPLYKUMPHG UGX HZZYGLPBYHZZYKL HZ ULLPLMUGWY; OY UBHPXYX USS XPLMKUWMPHG UGX KYWKYUMPHG, UGXYBYG UM OHTY XPX GHMOPGN VAM ISUE WUKXL CPMO OPL THMOYK, IUWY LPSYGMSEAI UGX XHCG MOY KHHT, UGX LTHRY HGY IPIY UZMYK UGHMOYK. OY LYYTYXWUKYZASSE MH WOYKPLO CPMOPG OPTLYSZ MOY NSHHTE THHX COPWO USHGY YGUVSYXOPT MH YGXAKY OPL IHLPMPHG.WOUIMYK BPUM MOY VYNPGGPGN HZ CPGMYK IKPGWYLL TUKE WUTY MH THLWHC. ZKHT KYIHKMLWAKKYGM PG MHCG LOY SYUKGYX OHC MOY KHLMHBL CYKY LPMAUMYX, UGX OHC "MOYLHG OUL LUWKPZPWYX OPTLYSZ ZHK OPL THMOYK," UL IYHISY CYKY LUEPGN."P GYBYK YDIYWMYX UGEMOPGN YSLY HZ OPT," LUPX IKPGWYLL TUKE MH OYKLYSZ,ZYYSPGN U QHEHAL LYGLY HZ OYK SHBY ZHK OPT. KYTYTVYKPGN OYK ZKPYGXSEKYSUMPHGL CPMO USS MOY KHLMHBL COPWO OUX TUXY OYK USTHLM U TYTVYK HZ MOYZUTPSE, LOY MOHANOM PM OYK XAME MH NH MH LYY MOYT. VAM KYTYTVYKPGN OYKKYSUMPHGL CPMO GPWOHSUL PG BHKHGYFO LOY CUL LOE UVHAM XHPGN LH. TURPGNU NKYUM YZZHKM LOY XPX OHCYBYK NH MH WUSS HG MOYT U ZYC CYYRL UZMYK OYKUKKPBUS PG THLWHC.GPWOHSUL CUL MOY ZPKLM MH TYYM OYK, UL MOY WHAGMYLL' KHHT WHASX HGSE VYKYUWOYX MOKHANO OPL. VAM PGLMYUX HZ VYPGN NKYYMYX CPMO ISYULAKY UL LOYOUX YDIYWMYX, UM OPL ZPKLM NSUGWY UM OYK OPL ZUWY ULLATYX U WHSX, LMPZZ,IKHAX YDIKYLLPHG LOY OUX GHM LYYG HG PM VYZHKY. OY PGJAPKYX UVHAM OYKOYUSMO, SYX MOY CUE MH OPL THMOYK, UGX OUBPGN LUM MOYKY ZHK ZPBY TPGAMYLSYZM MOY KHHT.COYG MOY IKPGWYLL WUTY HAM HZ MOY WHAGMYLL' KHHT GPWOHSUL TYM OYK UNUPG,UGX CPMO TUKRYX LHSYTGPME UGX LMPZZGYLL UWWHTIUGPYX OYK MH MOY UGMYKHHT.MH OYK KYTUKRL UVHAM OPL THMOYK'L OYUSMO OY TUXY GH KYISE. "COUM'L MOUMMH EHA? SYUBY TY PG IYUWY," OPL SHHRL LYYTYX MH LUE."COE XHYL LOY WHTY IKHCSPGN OYKY? COUM XHYL LOY CUGM? P WUG'M VYUK MOYLYSUXPYL UGX USS MOYLY WPBPSPMPYL!" LUPX OY USHAX PG LHGEU'L IKYLYGWY,YBPXYGMSE AGUVSY MH KYIKYLL OPL BYDUMPHG, UZMYK MOY IKPGWYLL' WUKKPUNYOUX XPLUIIYUKYX."HO, GPWOHSUL, OHC WUG EHA MUSR SPRY MOUM?" WKPYX LHGEU, OUKXSE UVSY MHWHGWYUS OYK XYSPNOM. "LOY PL LH RPGX UGX TUTTU PL LH ZHGX HZ OYK!"GPWOHSUL XPX GHM KYISE UGX MKPYX MH UBHPX LIYURPGN HZ MOY IKPGWYLL UGETHKY. VAM UZMYK OYK BPLPM MOY HSX WHAGMYLL LIHRY HZ OYK LYBYKUS MPTYL UXUE.LOY LUGN OYK IKUPLYL, PGLPLMYX MOUM OYK LHG TALM WUSS HG OYK, YDIKYLLYXU CPLO MH LYY OYK HZMYG, VAM EYM USCUEL VYWUTY PSS-OATHKYX COYG LOYVYNUG MH MUSR UVHAM OYK.GPWOHSUL MKPYX MH RYYI LPSYGWY COYG OPL THMOYK LIHRY HZ MOY IKPGWYLL,VAM OPL LPSYGWY PKKPMUMYX OYK."LOY PL U BYKE UXTPKUVSY UGX YDWYSSYGM EHAGN CHTUG," LUPX LOY, "UGX EHATALM NH UGX WUSS HG OYK. EHA CHASX UM SYULM VY LYYPGN LHTYVHXE, UGX PMOPGR PM TALM VY XASS ZHK EHA HGSE LYYPGN AL.""VAM P XHG'M PG MOY SYULM CUGM MH, TUTTU.""EHA ALYX MH CUGM MH, UGX GHC EHA XHG'M. KYUSSE P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX EHA,TE XYUK. HGY XUE EHA UKY XASS, UGX MOY GYDM EHA KYZALY MH LYY UGEHGY.""VAM P GYBYK LUPX P CUL XASS.""COE, EHA LUPX EHAKLYSZ EHA XHG'M CUGM YBYG MH LYY OYK. LOY PL U BYKEUXTPKUVSY EHAGN CHTUG UGX EHA USCUEL SPRYX OYK, VAM GHC LAXXYGSE EHAOUBY NHM LHTY GHMPHG HK HMOYK PG EHAK OYUX. EHA OPXY YBYKEMOPGN ZKHTTY.""GHM UM USS, TUTTU.""PZ P CYKY ULRPGN EHA MH XH LHTYMOPGN XPLUNKYYUVSY GHC--VAM P HGSE ULREHA MH KYMAKG U WUSS. HGY CHASX MOPGR TYKY IHSPMYGYLL KYJAPKYX PM....CYSS, P OUBY ULRYX EHA, UGX GHC P CHG'M PGMYKZYKY UGE THKY LPGWY EHAOUBY LYWKYML ZKHT EHAK THMOYK.""CYSS, MOYG, P'SS NH PZ EHA CPLO PM.""PM XHYLG'M TUMMYK MH TY. P HGSE CPLO PM ZHK EHAK LURY."GPWOHSUL LPNOYX, VPM OPL TALMUWOY, UGX SUPX HAM MOY WUKXL ZHK UIUMPYGWY, MKEPGN MH XPBYKM OPL THMOYK'L UMMYGMPHG MH UGHMOYK MHIPW.MOY LUTY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL KYIYUMYX GYDM XUE UGX MOY XUE UZMYK, UGX MOYXUE UZMYK MOUM.UZMYK OYK BPLPM MH MOY KHLMHBL UGX OYK AGYDIYWMYXSE WOPSSE KYWYIMPHG VEGPWOHSUL, IKPGWYLL TUKE WHGZYLLYX MH OYKLYSZ MOUM LOY OUX VYYG KPNOM PGGHM CPLOPGN MH VY MOY ZPKLM MH WUSS."P YDIYWMYX GHMOPGN YSLY," LOY MHSX OYKLYSZ, WUSSPGN OYK IKPXY MH OYKUPX. "P OUBY GHMOPGN MH XH CPMO OPT UGX P HGSE CUGMYX MH LYY MOYHSX SUXE, COH CUL USCUEL RPGX MH TY UGX MH COHT P UT AGXYK TUGEHVSPNUMPHGL."VAM LOY WHASX GHM IUWPZE OYKLYSZ CPMO MOYLY KYZSYWMPHGL; U ZYYSPGN URPGMH KYTHKLY MKHAVSYX OYK COYG LOY MOHANOM HZ OYK BPLPM. MOHANO LOY OUXZPKTSE KYLHSBYX GHM MH WUSS HG MOY KHLMHBL UNUPG UGX MH ZHKNYM MOY COHSYTUMMYK, LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ USS MOY MPTY PG UG UCRCUKX IHLPMPHG. UGX COYGLOY ULRYX OYKLYSZ COUM XPLMKYLLYX OYK, LOY OUX MH UXTPM MOUM PM CUL OYKKYSUMPHG MH KHLMHB. OPL WHSX, IHSPMY TUGGYK XPX GHM YDIKYLL OPL ZYYSPGNZHK OYK (LOY RGYC MOUM) VAM PM WHGWYUSYX LHTYMOPGN, UGX AGMPS LOY WHASXXPLWHBYK COUM MOUM LHTYMOPGN CUL, LOY ZYSM MOUM LOY WHASX GHM VY UMYULY.HGY XUE PG TPXCPGMYK COYG LPMMPGN PG MOY LWOHHSKHHT UMMYGXPGN MH OYKGYIOYC'L SYLLHGL, LOY CUL PGZHKTYX MOUM KHLMHB OUX WUSSYX. CPMO U ZPKTKYLHSAMPHG GHM MH VYMKUE OYKLYSZ UGX GHM LOHC OYK UNPMUMPHG, LOY LYGMZHK TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGX CYGM CPMO OYK MH MOY XKUCPGN KHHT.OYK ZPKLM NSUGWY UM GPWOHSUL' ZUWY MHSX OYK MOUM OY OUX HGSE WHTY MHZASZPSS MOY XYTUGXL HZ IHSPMYGYLL, UGX LOY ZPKTSE KYLHSBYX MH TUPGMUPGMOY MHGY PG COPWO OY UXXKYLLYX OYK.MOYE LIHRY HZ MOY WHAGMYLL' OYUSMO, HZ MOYPK TAMAUS ZKPYGXL, HZ MOYSUMYLM CUK GYCL, UGX COYG MOY MYG TPGAMYL KYJAPKYX VE IKHIKPYME OUXYSUILYX UZMYK COPWO U BPLPMHK TUE KPLY, GPWOHSUL NHM AI MH LUE NHHX-VE.CPMO TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY'L OYSI MOY IKPGWYLL OUX TUPGMUPGYX MOYWHGBYKLUMPHG BYKE CYSS, VAM UM MOY BYKE SULM THTYGM, QALM COYG OY KHLY,LOY CUL LH MPKYX HZ MUSRPGN HZ COUM XPX GHM PGMYKYLM OYK, UGX OYKTPGX CUL LH ZASS HZ MOY JAYLMPHG COE LOY USHGY CUL NKUGMYX LH SPMMSYOUIIPGYLL PG SPZY, MOUM PG U ZPM HZ UVLYGM-TPGXYXGYLL LOY LUM LMPSS, OYKSATPGHAL YEYL NUFPGN ZPDYXSE VYZHKY OYK, GHM GHMPWPGN MOUM OY OUX KPLYG.GPWOHSUL NSUGWYX UM OYK UGX, CPLOPGN MH UIIYUK GHM MH GHMPWY OYKUVLMKUWMPHG, TUXY LHTY KYTUKR MH TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY UGX MOYGUNUPG SHHRYX UM MOY IKPGWYLL. LOY LMPSS LUM THMPHGSYLL CPMO U SHHR HZLAZZYKPGN HG OYK NYGMSY ZUWY. OY LAXXYGSE ZYSM LHKKE ZHK OYK UGX CULBUNAYSE WHGLWPHAL MOUM OY TPNOM VY MOY WUALY HZ MOY LUXGYLL OYK ZUWYYDIKYLLYX. OY CPLOYX MH OYSI OYK UGX LUE LHTYMOPGN ISYULUGM, VAM WHASXMOPGR HZ GHMOPGN MH LUE."NHHX-VEY, IKPGWYLL!" LUPX OY.LOY LMUKMYX, ZSALOYX, UGX LPNOYX XYYISE."HO, P VYN EHAK IUKXHG," LOY LUPX UL PZ CURPGN AI. "UKY EHA NHPGNUSKYUXE, WHAGM? CYSS MOYG, NHHX-VE! HO, VAM MOY WALOPHG ZHK MOYWHAGMYLL!""CUPM U THTYGM, P'SS ZYMWO PM," LUPX TUXYTHPLYSSY VHAKPYGGY, UGX LOYSYZM MOY KHHT.MOYE VHMO LUM LPSYGM, CPMO UG HWWULPHGUS NSUGWY UM HGY UGHMOYK."EYL, IKPGWYLL," LUPX GPWOHSUL UM SULM CPMO U LUX LTPSY, "PM XHYLG'MLYYT SHGN UNH LPGWY CY ZPKLM TYM UM VHNAWOUKHBH, VAM OHC TAWO CUMYKOUL ZSHCYX LPGWY MOYG! PG COUM XPLMKYLL CY USS LYYTYX MH VY MOYG, EYMP CHASX NPBY TAWO MH VKPGN VUWR MOUM MPTY... VAM MOYKY'L GH VKPGNPGN PMVUWR."IKPGWYLL TUKE NUFYX PGMYGMSE PGMH OPL YEYL CPMO OYK HCG SATPGHAL HGYLUL OY LUPX MOPL. LOY LYYTYX MH VY MKEPGN MH ZUMOHT MOY OPXXYG TYUGPGN HZOPL CHKXL COPWO CHASX YDISUPG OPL ZYYSPGN ZHK OYK."EYL, EYL," LUPX LOY, "VAM EHA OUBY GH KYULHG MH KYNKYM MOY IULM, WHAGM.UL P AGXYKLMUGX EHAK IKYLYGM SPZY, P MOPGR EHA CPSS USCUEL KYWUSS PMCPMO LUMPLZUWMPHG, VYWUALY MOY LYSZ-LUWKPZPWY MOUM ZPSSL PM GHC...""P WUGGHM UWWYIM EHAK IKUPLY," OY PGMYKKAIMYX OYK OAKKPYXSE. "HG MOYWHGMKUKE P WHGMPGAUSSE KYIKHUWO TELYSZ.... VAM MOPL PL GHM UM USS UGPGMYKYLMPGN HK WOYYKZAS LAVQYWM."OPL ZUWY UNUPG KYLATYX PML ZHKTYK LMPZZ UGX WHSX YDIKYLLPHG. VAM MOYIKPGWYLL OUX WUANOM U NSPTILY HZ MOY TUG LOY OUX RGHCG UGX SHBYX, UGX PMCUL MH OPT MOUM LOY GHC LIHRY."P MOHANOM EHA CHASX USSHC TY MH MYSS EHA MOPL," LOY LUPX. "P OUX WHTYLH GYUK MH EHA... UGX MH USS EHAK ZUTPSE MOUM P MOHANOM EHA CHASX GHMWHGLPXYK TE LETIUMOE TPLISUWYX, VAM P CUL TPLMURYG," UGX LAXXYGSE OYKBHPWY MKYTVSYX. "P XHG'M RGHC COE," LOY WHGMPGAYX, KYWHBYKPGN OYKLYSZ,"VAM EHA ALYX MH VY XPZZYKYGM, UGX...""MOYKY UKY U MOHALUGX KYULHGL COE," SUEPGN LIYWPUS YTIOULPL HG MOY COE."MOUGR EHA, IKPGWYLL," OY UXXYX LHZMSE. "LHTYMPTYL PM PL OUKX.""LH MOUM'L COE! MOUM'L COE!" U BHPWY COPLIYKYX PG IKPGWYLL TUKE'L LHAS."GH, PM CUL GHM HGSE MOUM NUE, RPGX, UGX ZKUGR SHHR, GHM HGSE MOUMOUGXLHTY YDMYKPHK, MOUM P SHBYX PG OPT. P XPBPGYX OPL GHVSY, KYLHSAMY,LYSZ-LUWKPZPWPGN LIPKPM MHH," LOY LUPX MH OYKLYSZ. "EYL, OY PL IHHK GHCUGX P UT KPWO.... EYL, MOUM'L MOY HGSE KYULHG.... EYL, CYKY PM GHM ZHKMOUM..." UGX KYTYTVYKPGN OPL ZHKTYK MYGXYKGYLL, UGX SHHRPGN GHC UM OPLRPGX, LHKKHCZAS ZUWY, LOY LAXXYGSE AGXYKLMHHX MOY WUALY HZ OPL WHSXGYLL."VAM COE, WHAGM, COE?" LOY USTHLM WKPYX, AGWHGLWPHALSE THBPGN WSHLYK MHOPT. "COE? MYSS TY. EHA TALM MYSS TY!"OY CUL LPSYGM."P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX EHAK COE, WHAGM," LOY WHGMPGAYX, "VAM PM'L OUKX ZHKTY... P WHGZYLL PM. ZHK LHTY KYULHG EHA CPLO MH XYIKPBY TY HZ HAK ZHKTYKZKPYGXLOPI. UGX MOUM OAKML TY." MOYKY CYKY MYUKL PG OYK YEYL UGX PG OYKBHPWY. "P OUBY OUX LH SPMMSY OUIIPGYLL PG SPZY MOUM YBYKE SHLL PL OUKXZHK TY MH VYUK.... YDWALY TY, NHHX-VE!" UGX LAXXYGSE LOY VYNUG MH WKEUGX CUL OAKKEPGN ZKHT MOY KHHT."IKPGWYLL, ZHK NHX'L LURY!" OY YDWSUPTYX, MKEPGN MH LMHI OYK."IKPGWYLL!"LOY MAKGYX KHAGX. ZHK U ZYC LYWHGXL MOYE NUFYX LPSYGMSE PGMH HGYUGHMOYK'L YEYL--UGX COUM OUX LYYTYX PTIHLLPVSY UGX KYTHMY LAXXYGSEVYWUTY IHLLPVSY, PGYBPMUVSY, UGX BYKE GYUK.WOUIMYK BPPPG MOY CPGMYK HZ 1813 GPWOHSUL TUKKPYX IKPGWYLL TUKE UGX THBYX MH VUSXOPSSL CPMO OPL CPZY, OPL THMOYK, UGX LHGEU.CPMOPG ZHAK EYUKL OY OUX IUPX HZZ USS OPL KYTUPGPGN XYVML CPMOHAMLYSSPGN UGE HZ OPL CPZY'L IKHIYKME, UGX OUBPGN KYWYPBYX U LTUSSPGOYKPMUGWY HG MOY XYUMO HZ U WHALPG OY IUPX OPL XYVM MH IPYKKY UL CYSS.PG UGHMOYK MOKYY EYUKL, VE 1820, OY OUX LH TUGUNYX OPL UZZUPKL MOUM OYCUL UVSY MH VAE U LTUSS YLMUMY UXQHPGPGN VUSX OPSSL UGX CUL GYNHMPUMPGNMH VAE VUWR HMKUXGHY--MOUM VYPGN OPL IYM XKYUT.OUBPGN LMUKMYX ZUKTPGN ZKHT GYWYLLPME, OY LHHG NKYC LH XYBHMYX MH PMMOUM PM VYWUTY OPL ZUBHKPMY UGX USTHLM OPL LHSY HWWAIUMPHG. GPWOHSUL CULU ISUPG ZUKTYK: OY XPX GHM SPRY PGGHBUMPHGL, YLIYWPUSSE MOY YGNSPLO HGYLMOYG WHTPGN PGMH BHNAY. OY SUANOYX UM MOYHKYMPWUS MKYUMPLYL HG YLMUMYTUGUNYTYGM, XPLSPRYX ZUWMHKPYL, MOY KUPLPGN HZ YDIYGLPBY IKHXAWML,UGX MOY VAEPGN HZ YDIYGLPBY LYYX WHKG, UGX XPX GHM TURY U OHVVE HZ UGEIUKMPWASUK IUKM HZ MOY CHKR HG OPL YLMUMY. OY USCUEL OUX VYZHKY OPLTPGX'L YEY MOY YLMUMY UL U COHSY UGX GHM UGE IUKMPWASUK IUKM HZ PM. MOYWOPYZ MOPGN PG OPL YEYL CUL GHM MOY GPMKHNYG PG MOY LHPS, GHK MOY HDENYGPG MOY UPK, GHK TUGAKYL, GHK LIYWPUS ISHCL, VAM MOUM THLM PTIHKMUGMUNYGM VE COPWO GPMKHNYG, HDENYG, TUGAKY, UGX ISHC CYKY TUXYYZZYWMPBY--MOY IYULUGM SUVHKYK. COYG GPWOHSUL ZPKLM VYNUG ZUKTPGNUGX VYNUG MH AGXYKLMUGX PML XPZZYKYGM VKUGWOYL, PM CUL MOY LYKZ COHYLIYWPUSSE UMMKUWMYX OPL UMMYGMPHG. MOY IYULUGM LYYTYX MH OPT GHM TYKYSEU MHHS, VAM USLH U QAXNY HZ ZUKTPGN UGX UG YGX PG OPTLYSZ. UM ZPKLMOY CUMWOYX MOY LYKZL, MKEPGN MH AGXYKLMUGX MOYPK UPTL UGX COUM MOYEWHGLPXYKYX NHHX UGX VUX, UGX HGSE IKYMYGXYX MH XPKYWM MOYT UGX NPBYHKXYKL COPSY PG KYUSPME SYUKGPGN ZKHT MOYT MOYPK TYMOHXL, MOYPK TUGGYKHZ LIYYWO, UGX MOYPK QAXNTYGM HZ COUM CUL NHHX UGX VUX. HGSE COYG OYOUX AGXYKLMHHX MOY IYULUGML' MULMYL UGX ULIPKUMPHGL, OUX SYUKGYX MH MUSRMOYPK SUGNAUNY, MH NKULI MOY OPXXYG TYUGPGN HZ MOYPK CHKXL, UGX ZYSMURPG MH MOYT XPX OY VYNPG VHSXSE MH TUGUNY OPL LYKZL, MOUM PL, MHIYKZHKT MHCUKX MOYT MOY XAMPYL XYTUGXYX HZ OPT. UGX GPWOHSUL' TUGUNYTYGMIKHXAWYX BYKE VKPSSPUGM KYLASML.NAPXYX VE LHTY NPZM HZ PGLPNOM, HG MURPGN AI MOY TUGUNYTYGM HZ MOYYLMUMYL OY UM HGWY AGYKKPGNSE UIIHPGMYX UL VUPSPZZ, BPSSUNY YSXYK, UGXXYSYNUMY, MOY BYKE TYG MOY LYKZL CHASX MOYTLYSBYL OUBY WOHLYG OUX MOYEOUX MOY KPNOM MH WOHHLY, UGX MOYLY IHLML GYBYK WOUGNYX OUGXL. VYZHKYUGUSEFPGN MOY IKHIYKMPYL HZ TUGAKY, VYZHKY YGMYKPGN PGMH MOY XYVPM UGXWKYXPM (UL OY PKHGPWUSSE WUSSYX PM), OY ZHAGX HAM OHC TUGE WUMMSY MOYIYULUGML OUX UGX PGWKYULYX MOY GATVYK VE USS IHLLPVSY TYUGL. OY RYIM MOYIYULUGM ZUTPSPYL MHNYMOYK PG MOY SUKNYLM NKHAIL IHLLPVSY, GHM USSHCPGNMOY ZUTPSE NKHAIL MH XPBPXY PGMH LYIUKUMY OHALYOHSXL. OY CUL OUKX USPRYHG MOY SUFE, MOY XYIKUBYX, UGX MOY CYUR, UGX MKPYX MH NYM MOYT YDIYSSYXZKHT MOY WHTTAGY.OY CUL UL WUKYZAS HZ MOY LHCPGN UGX KYUIPGN HZ MOY IYULUGML' OUEUGX WHKG UL HZ OPL HCG, UGX ZYC SUGXHCGYKL OUX MOYPK WKHIL LHCGUGX OUKBYLMYX LH YUKSE UGX LH CYSS, HK NHM LH NHHX U KYMAKG, UL XPXGPWOHSUL.OY XPLSPRYX OUBPGN UGEMOPGN MH XH CPMO MOY XHTYLMPW LYKZL--MOY "XKHGYL"UL OY WUSSYX MOYT--UGX YBYKEHGY LUPX OY LIHPSYX MOYT VE OPL SUDPME. COYGU XYWPLPHG OUX MH VY MURYG KYNUKXPGN U XHTYLMPW LYKZ, YLIYWPUSSE PZ HGYOUX MH VY IAGPLOYX, OY USCUEL ZYSM AGXYWPXYX UGX WHGLASMYX YBYKEVHXE PGMOY OHALY; VAM COYG PM CUL IHLLPVSY MH OUBY U XHTYLMPW LYKZ WHGLWKPIMYXPGLMYUX HZ U SUGX CHKRYK OY XPX LH CPMOHAM MOY SYULM OYLPMUMPHG. OYGYBYK ZYSM UGE OYLPMUMPHG PG XYUSPGN CPMO MOY IYULUGML. OY RGYC MOUM OPLYBYKE XYWPLPHG CHASX VY UIIKHBYX VE MOYT USS CPMO BYKE ZYC YDWYIMPHGL.OY XPX GHM USSHC OPTLYSZ YPMOYK MH VY OUKX HG HK IAGPLO U TUG, HK MHTURY MOPGNL YULE ZHK HK KYCUKX UGEHGY, TYKYSE VYWUALY OY ZYSM PGWSPGYXMH XH LH. OY WHASX GHM OUBY LUPX VE COUM LMUGXUKX OY QAXNYX COUM OYLOHASX HK LOHASX GHM XH, VAM MOY LMUGXUKX CUL JAPMY ZPKT UGX XYZPGPMY PGOPL HCG TPGX.HZMYG, LIYURPGN CPMO BYDUMPHG HZ LHTY ZUPSAKY HK PKKYNASUKPME, OY CHASXLUE: "COUM WUG HGY XH CPMO HAK KALLPUG IYULUGML?" UGX PTUNPGYX MOUM OYWHASX GHM VYUK MOYT.EYM OY SHBYX "HAK KALLPUG IYULUGML" UGX MOYPK CUE HZ SPZY CPMO OPL COHSYLHAS, UGX ZHK MOUM BYKE KYULHG OUX AGXYKLMHHX UGX ULLPTPSUMYX MOY HGYCUE UGX TUGGYK HZ ZUKTPGN COPWO IKHXAWYX NHHX KYLASML.WHAGMYLL TUKE CUL QYUSHAL HZ MOPL IULLPHG HZ OYK OALVUGX'L UGX KYNKYMMYXMOUM LOY WHASX GHM LOUKY PM; VAM LOY WHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOY QHEL UGXBYDUMPHGL OY XYKPBYX ZKHT MOUM CHKSX, MH OYK LH KYTHMY UGX USPYG. LOYWHASX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COE OY CUL LH IUKMPWASUKSE UGPTUMYX UGX OUIIECOYG, UZMYK NYMMPGN AI UM XUEVKYUR UGX LIYGXPGN MOY COHSY THKGPGN PG MOYZPYSXL HK HG MOY MOKYLOPGN ZSHHK, OY KYMAKGYX ZKHT MOY LHCPGN HK THCPGNHK KYUIPGN MH OUBY MYU CPMO OYK. LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX COE OY LIHRYCPMO LAWO UXTPKUMPHG UGX XYSPNOM HZ MOY ZUKTPGN HZ MOY MOKPZME UGXCYSS-MH-XH IYULUGM TUMMOYC YKTPLOPG, COH CPMO OPL ZUTPSE OUX WUKMYXWHKG USS GPNOM; HK HZ MOY ZUWM MOUM OPL (GPWOHSUL') LOYUBYL CYKY USKYUXELMUWRYX VYZHKY UGEHGY YSLY OUX OPL OUKBYLM PG. LOY XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGXCOE OY LMYIIYX HAM ZKHT MOY CPGXHC MH MOY BYKUGXU UGX LTPSYX AGXYK OPLTALMUWOY UGX CPGRYX LH QHEZASSE, COYG CUKT LMYUXE KUPG VYNUG MH ZUSSHG MOY XKE UGX MOPKLME LOHHML HZ MOY EHAGN HUML, HK COE COYG MOY CPGXWUKKPYX UCUE U MOKYUMYGPGN WSHAX XAKPGN MOY OUE OUKBYLM OY CHASX KYMAKGZKHT MOY VUKG, ZSALOYX, LAGVAKGYX, UGX IYKLIPKPGN, CPMO U LTYSS HZCHKTCHHX UGX NYGMPUG PG OPL OUPK UGX, NSYYZASSE KAVVPGN OPL OUGXL, CHASXLUE: "CYSS, HGY THKY XUE UGX TE NKUPG UGX MOY IYULUGML' CPSS USS VYAGXYK WHBYK."LMPSS SYLL XPX LOY AGXYKLMUGX COE OY, RPGXOYUKMYX UGX USCUEL KYUXE MHUGMPWPIUMY OYK CPLOYL, LOHASX VYWHTY USTHLM XYLIYKUMY COYG LOY VKHANOMOPT U IYMPMPHG ZKHT LHTY IYULUGM TYG HK CHTYG COH OUX UIIYUSYX MH OYKMH VY YDWALYX LHTY CHKR; COE OY, MOUM RPGX GPWOHSUL, LOHASX HVLMPGUMYSEKYZALY OYK, UGNKPSE ULRPGN OYK GHM MH PGMYKZYKY PG COUM CUL GHM OYKVALPGYLL. LOY ZYSM OY OUX U CHKSX UIUKM, COPWO OY SHBYX IULLPHGUMYSE UGXCOPWO OUX SUCL LOY OUX GHM ZUMOHTYX.LHTYMPTYL COYG, MKEPGN MH AGXYKLMUGX OPT, LOY LIHRY HZ MOY NHHX CHKR OYCUL XHPGN ZHK OPL LYKZL, OY CHASX VY BYDYX UGX KYISE: "GHM PG MOY SYULM;PM GYBYK YGMYKYX TE OYUX UGX P CHASXG'M XH MOUM ZHK MOYPK NHHX! MOUM'LUSS IHYMKE UGX HSX CPBYL' MUSR--USS MOUM XHPGN NHHX MH HGY'L GYPNOVHK!COUM P CUGM PL MOUM HAK WOPSXKYG LOHASX GHM OUBY MH NH VYNNPGN. P TALMIAM HAK UZZUPKL PG HKXYK COPSY P UT USPBY, MOUM'L USS. UGX MH XH MOUM,HKXYK UGX LMKPWMGYLL UKY YLLYGMPUS.... MOUM'L USS UVHAM PM!" LUPX OY,WSYGWOPGN OPL BPNHKHAL ZPLM. "UGX ZUPKGYLL, HZ WHAKLY," OY UXXYX, "ZHKPZ MOY IYULUGM PL GURYX UGX OAGNKE UGX OUL HGSE HGY TPLYKUVSY OHKLY, OYWUG XH GH NHHX YPMOYK ZHK OPTLYSZ HK ZHK TY."UGX USS GPWOHSUL XPX CUL ZKAPMZAS--IKHVUVSE QALM VYWUALY OY KYZALYX MHUSSHC OPTLYSZ MH MOPGR MOUM OY CUL XHPGN NHHX MH HMOYKL ZHK BPKMAY'LLURY. OPL TYUGL PGWKYULYX KUIPXSE; LYKZL ZKHT GYPNOVHKPGN YLMUMYL WUTYMH VYN OPT MH VAE MOYT, UGX SHGN UZMYK OPL XYUMO MOY TYTHKE HZ OPLUXTPGPLMKUMPHG CUL XYBHAMSE IKYLYKBYX UTHGN MOY LYKZL. "OY CUL UTULMYK... MOY IYULUGML' UZZUPKL ZPKLM UGX MOYG OPL HCG. HZ WHAKLY OY CULGHM MH VY MKPZSYX CPMO YPMOYK--PG U CHKX, OY CUL U KYUS TULMYK!"WOUIMYK BPPPHGY TUMMYK WHGGYWMYX CPMO OPL TUGUNYTYGM LHTYMPTYL CHKKPYX GPWOHSUL, UGXMOUM CUL OPL JAPWR MYTIYK MHNYMOYK CPMO OPL HSX OALLUK OUVPM HZ TURPGNZKYY ALY HZ OPL ZPLML. UM ZPKLM OY LUC GHMOPGN KYIKYOYGLPVSY PGMOPL, VAM PG MOY LYWHGX EYUK HZ OPL TUKKPUNY OPL BPYC HZ MOUM ZHKT HZIAGPLOTYGM LAXXYGSE WOUGNYX.HGWY PG LATTYK OY OUX LYGM ZHK MOY BPSSUNY YSXYK ZKHT VHNAWOUKHBH, UTUG COH OUX LAWWYYXYX MH MOY IHLM COYG XKHG XPYX UGX COH CUL UWWALYX HZXPLOHGYLME UGX BUKPHAL PKKYNASUKPMPYL. GPWOHSUL CYGM HAM PGMH MOY IHKWOMH JAYLMPHG OPT, UGX PTTYXPUMYSE UZMYK MOY YSXYK OUX NPBYG U ZYC KYISPYLMOY LHAGX HZ WKPYL UGX VSHCL CYKY OYUKX. HG KYMAKGPGN MH SAGWO GPWOHSULCYGM AI MH OPL CPZY, COH LUM CPMO OYK OYUX VYGM SHC HBYK OYK YTVKHPXYKEZKUTY, UGX UL ALAUS VYNUG MH MYSS OYK COUM OY OUX VYYG XHPGN MOUMTHKGPGN. UTHGN HMOYK MOPGNL OY LIHRY HZ MOY VHNAWOUKHBH YSXYK. WHAGMYLLTUKE MAKGYX KYX UGX MOYG IUSY, VAM WHGMPGAYX MH LPM CPMO OYUX VHCYX UGXSPIL WHTIKYLLYX UGX NUBY OYK OALVUGX GH KYISE."LAWO UG PGLHSYGM LWHAGXKYS!" OY WKPYX, NKHCPGN OHM UNUPG UM MOY TYKYKYWHSSYWMPHG HZ OPT. "PZ OY OUX MHSX TY OY CUL XKAGR UGX XPX GHM LYY...VAM COUM PL MOY TUMMYK CPMO EHA, TUKE?" OY LAXXYGSE ULRYX.WHAGMYLL TUKE KUPLYX OYK OYUX UGX MKPYX MH LIYUR, VAM OULMPSE SHHRYXXHCG UNUPG UGX OYK SPIL IAWRYKYX."COE, COUMYBYK PL MOY TUMMYK, TE XYUKYLM?"MOY SHHRL HZ MOY ISUPG WHAGMYLL TUKE USCUEL PTIKHBYX COYG LOY CUL PGMYUKL. LOY GYBYK WKPYX ZKHT IUPG HK BYDUMPHG, VAM USCUEL ZKHT LHKKHC HKIPME, UGX COYG LOY CYIM OYK KUXPUGM YEYL UWJAPKYX UG PKKYLPLMPVSY WOUKT.MOY THTYGM GPWOHSUL MHHR OYK OUGX LOY WHASX GH SHGNYK KYLMKUPG OYKLYSZUGX VYNUG MH WKE."GPWOHSUL, P LUC PM... OY CUL MH VSUTY, VAM COE XH EHA... GPWOHSUL!" UGXLOY WHBYKYX OYK ZUWY CPMO OYK OUGXL.GPWOHSUL LUPX GHMOPGN. OY ZSALOYX WKPTLHG, SYZM OYK LPXY, UGX IUWYX AIUGX XHCG MOY KHHT. OY AGXYKLMHHX COUM LOY CUL CYYIPGN UVHAM, VAM WHASXGHM PG OPL OYUKM UM HGWY UNKYY CPMO OYK MOUM COUM OY OUX KYNUKXYXZKHT WOPSXOHHX UL JAPMY UG YBYKEXUE YBYGM CUL CKHGN. "PL PM QALMLYGMPTYGMUSPME, HSX CPBYL' MUSYL, HK PL LOY KPNOM?" OY ULRYX OPTLYSZ.VYZHKY OY OUX LHSBYX MOUM IHPGM OY NSUGWYX UNUPG UM OYK ZUWY ZPSSYX CPMOSHBY UGX IUPG, UGX OY LAXXYGSE KYUSPFYX MOUM LOY CUL KPNOM UGX MOUM OYOUX SHGN VYYG LPGGPGN UNUPGLM OPTLYSZ."TUKE," OY LUPX LHZMSE, NHPGN AI MH OYK, "PM CPSS GYBYK OUIIYG UNUPG;P NPBY EHA TE CHKX. GYBYK," OY KYIYUMYX PG U MKYTVSPGN BHPWY SPRY U VHEULRPGN ZHK ZHKNPBYGYLL.MOY MYUKL ZSHCYX ZULMYK LMPSS ZKHT MOY WHAGMYLL' YEYL. LOY MHHR OPL OUGXUGX RPLLYX PM."GPWOHSUL, COYG XPX EHA VKYUR EHAK WUTYH?" LOY ULRYX MH WOUGNY MOYLAVQYWM, SHHRPGN UM OPL ZPGNYK HG COPWO OY CHKY U KPGN CPMO U WUTYH HZSUHWHHG'L OYUX."MHXUE--PM CUL MOY LUTY UZZUPK. HO, TUKE, XHG'M KYTPGX TY HZ PM!" UGXUNUPG OY ZSALOYX. "P NPBY EHA TE CHKX HZ OHGHK PM LOUG'M HWWAK UNUPG,UGX SYM MOPL USCUEL VY U KYTPGXYK MH TY," UGX OY IHPGMYX MH MOY VKHRYGKPGN.UZMYK MOUM, COYG PG XPLWALLPHGL CPMO OPL BPSSUNY YSXYKL HK LMYCUKXL MOYVSHHX KALOYX MH OPL ZUWY UGX OPL ZPLML VYNUG MH WSYGWO, GPWOHSUL CHASXMAKG MOY VKHRYG KPGN HG OPL ZPGNYK UGX CHASX XKHI OPL YEYL VYZHKY MOYTUG COH CUL TURPGN OPT UGNKE. VAM OY XPX ZHKNYM OPTLYSZ HGWY HK MCPWYCPMOPG U MCYSBYTHGMO, UGX MOYG OY CHASX NH UGX WHGZYLL MH OPL CPZY, UGXCHASX UNUPG IKHTPLY MOUM MOPL LOHASX KYUSSE VY MOY BYKE SULM MPTY."TUKE, EHA TALM XYLIPLY TY!" OY CHASX LUE. "P XYLYKBY PM.""EHA LOHASX NH, NH UCUE UM HGWY, PZ EHA XHG'M ZYYS LMKHGN YGHANO MHWHGMKHS EHAKLYSZ," LOY CHASX KYISE LUXSE, MKEPGN MH WHTZHKM OYK OALVUGX.UTHGN MOY NYGMKE HZ MOY IKHBPGWY GPWOHSUL CUL KYLIYWMYX VAM GHM SPRYX.OY XPX GHM WHGWYKG OPTLYSZ CPMO MOY PGMYKYLML HZ OPL HCG WSULL, UGXWHGLYJAYGMSE LHTY MOHANOM OPT IKHAX UGX HMOYKL MOHANOM OPT LMAIPX. MOYCOHSY LATTYK, ZKHT LIKPGN LHCPGN MH OUKBYLM, OY CUL VALE CPMO MOY CHKRHG OPL ZUKT. PG UAMATG OY NUBY OPTLYSZ AI MH OAGMPGN CPMO MOY LUTYVALPGYLL SPRY LYKPHALGYLL--SYUBPGN OHTY ZHK U THGMO, HK YBYG MCH, CPMOOPL OAGM. PG CPGMYK OY BPLPMYX OPL HMOYK BPSSUNYL HK LIYGM OPL MPTYKYUXPGN. MOY VHHRL OY KYUX CYKY WOPYZSE OPLMHKPWUS, UGX HG MOYLY OYLIYGM U WYKMUPG LAT YBYKE EYUK. OY CUL WHSSYWMPGN, UL OY LUPX, U LYKPHALSPVKUKE, UGX OY TUXY PM U KASY MH KYUX MOKHANO USS MOY VHHRL OY VHANOM.OY CHASX LPM PG OPL LMAXE CPMO U NKUBY UPK, KYUXPGN--U MULR OY ZPKLMPTIHLYX AIHG OPTLYSZ UL U XAME, VAM COPWO UZMYKCUKXL VYWUTY U OUVPMUZZHKXPGN OPT U LIYWPUS RPGX HZ ISYULAKY UGX U WHGLWPHALGYLL HZVYPGN HWWAIPYX CPMO LYKPHAL TUMMYKL. PG CPGMYK, YDWYIM ZHK VALPGYLLYDWAKLPHGL, OY LIYGM THLM HZ OPL MPTY UM OHTY TURPGN OPTLYSZ HGY CPMOOPL ZUTPSE UGX YGMYKPGN PGMH USS MOY XYMUPSL HZ OPL WOPSXKYG'L KYSUMPHGLCPMO MOYPK THMOYK. MOY OUKTHGE VYMCYYG OPT UGX OPL CPZY NKYC WSHLYK UGXWSHLYK UGX OY XUPSE XPLWHBYKYX ZKYLO LIPKPMAUS MKYULAKYL PG OYK.ZKHT MOY MPTY HZ OPL TUKKPUNY LHGEU OUX SPBYX PG OPL OHALY. VYZHKYMOUM, GPWOHSUL OUX MHSX OPL CPZY USS MOUM OUX IULLYX VYMCYYG OPTLYSZ UGXLHGEU, VSUTPGN OPTLYSZ UGX WHTTYGXPGN OYK. OY OUX ULRYX IKPGWYLL TUKE MHVY NYGMSY UGX RPGX MH OPL WHALPG. LOY MOHKHANOSE KYUSPFYX MOY CKHGN OYOUX XHGY LHGEU, ZYSM OYKLYSZ MH VSUTY MHCUKX OYK, UGX PTUNPGYX MOUM OYKCYUSMO OUX PGZSAYGWYX GPWOHSUL' WOHPWY. LOY WHASX GHM ZPGX ZUASM CPMOLHGEU PG UGE CUE UGX MKPYX MH VY ZHGX HZ OYK, VAM HZMYG ZYSM PSS-CPSSMHCUKX OYK COPWO LOY WHASX GHM HBYKWHTY.HGWY LOY OUX U MUSR CPMO OYK ZKPYGX GUMULOU UVHAM LHGEU UGX UVHAM OYKHCG PGQALMPWY MHCUKX OYK."EHA RGHC," LUPX GUMULOU, "EHA OUBY KYUX MOY NHLIYSL U NKYUM XYUS--MOYKYPL U IULLUNY PG MOYT MOUM QALM ZPML LHGEU.""COUM?" ULRYX WHAGMYLL TUKE, LAKIKPLYX."'MH OPT MOUM OUMO LOUSS VY NPBYG, UGX ZKHT OPT MOUM OUMO GHM LOUSS VYMURYG UCUE.' EHA KYTYTVYK? LOY PL HGY MOUM OUMO GHM; COE, P XHG'M RGHC.IYKOUIL LOY SUWRL YNHMPLT, P XHG'M RGHC, VAM ZKHT OYK PL MURYG UCUE, UGXYBYKEMOPGN OUL VYYG MURYG UCUE. LHTYMPTYL P UT XKYUXZASSE LHKKE ZHK OYK.ZHKTYKSE P BYKE TAWO CUGMYX GPWOHSUL MH TUKKE OYK, VAM P USCUEL OUXU LHKM HZ IKYLYGMPTYGM MOUM PM CHASX GHM WHTY HZZ. LOY PL U LMYKPSYZSHCYK, EHA RGHC--SPRY LHTY LMKUCVYKKE VSHLLHTL. LHTYMPTYL P UT LHKKEZHK OYK, UGX LHTYMPTYL P MOPGR LOY XHYLG'M ZYYS PM UL EHA HK P CHASX."MOHANO WHAGMYLL TUKE MHSX GUMULOU MOUM MOHLY CHKXL PG MOY NHLIYS TALM VYAGXYKLMHHX XPZZYKYGMSE, EYM SHHRPGN UM LHGEU LOY UNKYYX CPMO GUMULOU'LYDISUGUMPHG. PM KYUSSE LYYTYX MOUM LHGEU XPX GHM ZYYS OYK IHLPMPHGMKEPGN, UGX OUX NKHCG JAPMY KYWHGWPSYX MH OYK SHM UL U LMYKPSY ZSHCYK.LOY LYYTYX MH VY ZHGX GHM LH TAWO HZ PGXPBPXAUSL UL HZ MOY ZUTPSE UL UCOHSY. SPRY U WUM, LOY OUX UMMUWOYX OYKLYSZ GHM MH MOY IYHISY VAM MH MOYOHTY. LOY CUPMYX HG MOY HSX WHAGMYLL, IYMMYX UGX LIHPSYX MOY WOPSXKYG,CUL USCUEL KYUXE MH KYGXYK MOY LTUSS LYKBPWYL ZHK COPWO LOY OUX U NPZM,UGX USS MOPL CUL AGWHGLWPHALSE UWWYIMYX ZKHT OYK CPMO PGLAZZPWPYGMNKUMPMAXY.MOY WHAGMKE LYUM UM VUSX OPSSL OUX VYYG KYVAPSM, MOHANO GHM HG MOY LUTYLWUSY UL AGXYK MOY HSX IKPGWY.MOY VAPSXPGNL, VYNAG AGXYK LMKUPMYGYX WPKWATLMUGWYL, CYKY THKY MOUGLPTISY. MOY PTTYGLY OHALY HG MOY HSX LMHGY ZHAGXUMPHGL CUL HZ CHHX,ISULMYKYX HGSE PGLPXY. PM OUX VUKY XYUS ZSHHKL UGX CUL ZAKGPLOYX CPMOBYKE LPTISY OUKX LHZUL, UKTWOUPKL, MUVSYL, UGX WOUPKL TUXY VE MOYPK HCGLYKZ WUKIYGMYKL HAM HZ MOYPK HCG VPKWOCHHX. MOY OHALY CUL LIUWPHALUGX OUX KHHTL ZHK MOY OHALY LYKZL UGX UIUKMTYGML ZHK BPLPMHKL. COHSYZUTPSPYL HZ MOY KHLMHBL' UGX VHSRHGLRPL' KYSUMPHGL LHTYMPTYL WUTY MHVUSX OPSSL CPMO LPDMYYG OHKLYL UGX XHFYGL HZ LYKBUGML UGX LMUEYX ZHKTHGMOL. VYLPXYL MOUM, ZHAK MPTYL U EYUK, HG MOY GUTY XUEL UGX VPKMOXUELHZ MOY OHLML, UL TUGE UL U OAGXKYX BPLPMHKL CHASX NUMOYK MOYKY ZHK U XUEHK MCH. MOY KYLM HZ MOY EYUK SPZY IAKLAYX PML AGVKHRYG KHAMPGY CPMO PMLHKXPGUKE HWWAIUMPHGL, UGX PML VKYURZULML, SAGWOYL, XPGGYKL, UGX LAIIYKL,IKHBPXYX HAM HZ MOY IKHXAWY HZ MOY YLMUMY.WOUIMYK PDPM CUL MOY YBY HZ LM. GPWOHSUL, MOY ZPZMO HZ XYWYTVYK, 1820. GUMULOU OUXVYYG LMUEPGN UM OYK VKHMOYK'L CPMO OYK OALVUGX UGX WOPSXKYG LPGWY YUKSEUAMATG. IPYKKY OUX NHGY MH IYMYKLVAKN HG VALPGYLL HZ OPL HCG ZHK MOKYYCYYRL UL OY LUPX, VAM OUX KYTUPGYX MOYKY GYUKSE LYBYG CYYRL UGX CULYDIYWMYX VUWR YBYKE TPGAMY.VYLPXYL MOY VYFAROHB ZUTPSE, GPWOHSUL' HSX ZKPYGX MOY KYMPKYX NYGYKUSBULPSP XTPMKPWO XYGPLHB CUL LMUEPGN CPMO MOY KHLMHBL MOPL ZPZMO HZXYWYTVYK.HG MOY LPDMO, COPWO CUL OPL GUTY XUE COYG MOY OHALY CHASX VY ZASS HZBPLPMHKL, GPWOHSUL RGYC OY CHASX OUBY MH YDWOUGNY OPL MUKMUK MAGPW ZHKU MUPS WHUM, UGX IAM HG GUKKHC VHHML CPMO IHPGMYX MHYL, UGX XKPBY MHMOY GYC WOAKWO OY OUX VAPSM, UGX MOYG KYWYPBY BPLPMHKL COH CHASX WHTY MHWHGNKUMASUMY OPT, HZZYK MOYT KYZKYLOTYGML, UGX MUSR UVHAM MOY YSYWMPHGLHZ MOY GHVPSPME; VAM OY WHGLPXYKYX OPTLYSZ YGMPMSYX MH LIYGX MOY YBYHZ MOUM XUE PG OPL ALAUS CUE. OY YDUTPGYX MOY VUPSPZZ'L UWWHAGML HZMOY BPSSUNY PG KEUFUG COPWO VYSHGNYX MH OPL CPZY'L GYIOYC, CKHMY MCHVALPGYLL SYMMYKL, UGX CUSRYX HBYK MH MOY NKUGUKPYL, WUMMSY EUKXL UGXLMUVSYL VYZHKY XPGGYK. OUBPGN MURYG IKYWUAMPHGL UNUPGLM MOY NYGYKUSXKAGRYGGYLL MH VY YDIYWMYX HG MOY THKKHC VYWUALY PM CUL U NKYUM LUPGM'LXUE, OY KYMAKGYX MH XPGGYK, UGX CPMOHAM OUBPGN MPTY ZHK U IKPBUMY MUSRCPMO OPL CPZY LUM XHCG UM MOY SHGN MUVSY SUPX ZHK MCYGME IYKLHGL, UMCOPWO MOY COHSY OHALYOHSX OUX ULLYTVSYX. UM MOUM MUVSY CYKY OPL THMOYK,OPL THMOYK'L HSX SUXE WHTIUGPHG VYSHBU, OPL CPZY, MOYPK MOKYY WOPSXKYGCPMO MOYPK NHBYKGYLL UGX MAMHK, OPL CPZY'L GYIOYC CPMO OPL MAMHK, LHGEU,XYGPLHB, GUMULOU, OYK MOKYY WOPSXKYG, MOYPK NHBYKGYLL, UGX HSX TPWOUYSPBUGHBPWO, MOY SUMY IKPGWY'L UKWOPMYWM, COH CUL SPBPGN HG PG KYMPKYTYGMUM VUSX OPSSL.WHAGMYLL TUKE LUM UM MOY HMOYK YGX HZ MOY MUVSY. COYG OYK OALVUGX MHHROPL ISUWY LOY WHGWSAXYX, ZKHT MOY KUIPX TUGGYK PG COPWO UZMYK MURPGNAI OPL MUVSY GUIRPG OY IALOYX VUWR MOY MATVSYK UGX CPGYNSULL LMUGXPGNVYZHKY OPT, MOUM OY CUL HAM HZ OATHK, UL CUL LHTYMPTYL MOY WULY COYG OYWUTY PG MH XPGGYK LMKUPNOM ZKHT MOY ZUKT--YLIYWPUSSE VYZHKY MOY LHAI.WHAGMYLL TUKE CYSS RGYC MOUM THHX HZ OPL, UGX COYG LOY OYKLYSZ CUL PGU NHHX ZKUTY HZ TPGX JAPYMSE CUPMYX MPSS OY OUX OUX OPL LHAI UGX MOYGVYNUG MH MUSR MH OPT UGX TURY OPT UXTPM MOUM MOYKY CUL GH WUALY ZHK OPLPSS-OATHK. VAM MHXUE LOY JAPMY ZHKNHM MOUM UGX CUL OAKM MOUM OY LOHASXVY UGNKE CPMO OYK CPMOHAM UGE KYULHG, UGX LOY ZYSM AGOUIIE. LOY ULRYXOPT COYKY OY OUX VYYG. OY KYISPYX. LOY UNUPG PGJAPKYX COYMOYKYBYKEMOPGN CUL NHPGN CYSS HG MOY ZUKT. OYK AGGUMAKUS MHGY TUXY OPT CPGWYAGISYULUGMSE UGX OY KYISPYX OULMPSE."MOYG P'T GHM TPLMURYG," MOHANOM WHAGMYLL TUKE. "COE PL OY WKHLL CPMOTY?" LOY WHGWSAXYX ZKHT OPL MHGY MOUM OY CUL BYDYX CPMO OYK UGX CPLOYXMH YGX MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG. LOY RGYC OYK KYTUKRL LHAGXYX AGGUMAKUS, VAMWHASX GHM KYZKUPG ZKHT ULRPGN LHTY THKY JAYLMPHGL.MOUGRL MH XYGPLHB MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG UM MUVSY LHHG VYWUTY NYGYKUS UGXSPBYSE, UGX LOY XPX GHM MUSR MH OYK OALVUGX. COYG MOYE SYZM MOY MUVSYUGX CYGM UL ALAUS MH MOUGR MOY HSX WHAGMYLL, WHAGMYLL TUKE OYSX HAM OYKOUGX UGX RPLLYX OYK OALVUGX, UGX ULRYX OPT COE OY CUL UGNKE CPMO OYK."EHA USCUEL OUBY LAWO LMKUGNY ZUGWPYL! P XPXG'M YBYG MOPGR HZ VYPGNUGNKE," OY KYISPYX.VAM MOY CHKX USCUEL LYYTYX MH OYK MH PTISE: "EYL, P UT UGNKE VAM P CHG'MMYSS EHA COE."GPWOHSUL UGX OPL CPZY SPBYX MHNYMOYK LH OUIIPSE MOUM YBYG LHGEU UGX MOYHSX WHAGMYLL, COH ZYSM QYUSHAL UGX CHASX OUBY SPRYX MOYT MH XPLUNKYY,WHASX ZPGX GHMOPGN MH KYIKHUWO MOYT CPMO; VAM YBYG MOYE OUX MOYPKTHTYGML HZ UGMUNHGPLT. HWWULPHGUSSE, UGX PM CUL USCUEL QALM UZMYK MOYEOUX VYYG OUIIPYLM MHNYMOYK, MOYE LAXXYGSE OUX U ZYYSPGN HZ YLMKUGNYTYGMUGX OHLMPSPME, COPWO HWWAKKYX THLM ZKYJAYGMSE XAKPGN WHAGMYLL TUKE'LIKYNGUGWPYL, UGX MOPL CUL LAWO U MPTY."CYSS, TYLLPYAKL YM TYLXUTYL," LUPX GPWOHSUL SHAXSE UGX CPMO UIIUKYGMWOYYKZASGYLL (PM LYYTYX MH WHAGMYLL TUKE MOUM OY XPX PM HG IAKIHLY MHBYD OYK), "P OUBY VYYG HG TE ZYYM LPGWY LPD MOPL THKGPGN. MHTHKKHC PLOUSS OUBY MH LAZZYK, LH MHXUE P'SS NH UGX KYLM."UGX CPMOHAM U CHKX MH OPL CPZY OY CYGM MH MOY SPMMSY LPMMPGN KHHT UGXSUE XHCG HG MOY LHZU."MOUM'L USCUEL MOY CUE," MOHANOM WHAGMYLL TUKE. "OY MUSRL MH YBYKEHGYYDWYIM TY. P LYY... P LYY MOUM P UT KYIASLPBY MH OPT, YLIYWPUSSE COYG PUT PG MOPL WHGXPMPHG." LOY SHHRYX XHCG UM OYK YDIUGXYX ZPNAKY UGX PG MOYNSULL UM OYK IUSY, LUSSHC, YTUWPUMYX ZUWY PG COPWO OYK YEYL GHC SHHRYXSUKNYK MOUG YBYK.UGX YBYKEMOPGN UGGHEYX OYK--XYGPLHB'L LOHAMPGN UGX SUANOMYK, GUMULOU'LMUSR, UGX YLIYWPUSSE U JAPWR NSUGWY LHGEU NUBY OYK.LHGEU CUL USCUEL MOY ZPKLM YDWALY WHAGMYLL TUKE ZHAGX ZHK ZYYSPGNPKKPMUMYX.OUBPGN LUM UCOPSY CPMO OYK BPLPMHKL CPMOHAM AGXYKLMUGXPGN UGEMOPGN HZCOUM MOYE CYKY LUEPGN, LOY LHZMSE SYZM MOY KHHT UGX CYGM MH MOY GAKLYKE.MOY WOPSXKYG CYKY ISUEPGN UM "NHPGN MH THLWHC" PG U WUKKPUNY TUXY HZWOUPKL UGX PGBPMYX OYK MH NH CPMO MOYT. LOY LUM XHCG UGX ISUEYX CPMOMOYT U SPMMSY, VAM MOY MOHANOM HZ OYK OALVUGX UGX OPL AGKYULHGUVSYWKHLLGYLL CHKKPYX OYK. LOY NHM AI UGX, CUSRPGN HG MPIMHY CPMOXPZZPWASME, CYGM MH MOY LTUSS LPMMPGN KHHT."IYKOUIL OY PL GHM ULSYYI; P'SS OUBY UG YDISUGUMPHG CPMO OPT," LOYLUPX MH OYKLYSZ. SPMMSY UGXKYC, OYK YSXYLM VHE, PTPMUMPGN OPL THMOYK,ZHSSHCYX OYK HG MPIMHY. LOY XPX GHM GHMPWY OPT."TUKE, XYUK, P MOPGR OY PL ULSYYI--OY CUL LH MPKYX," LUPX LHGEU, TYYMPGNOYK PG MOY SUKNY LPMMPGN KHHT (PM LYYTYX MH WHAGMYLL TUKE MOUM LOYWKHLLYX OYK IUMO YBYKECOYKY). "UGXKYC TUE CURY OPT."WHAGMYLL TUKE SHHRYX KHAGX, LUC SPMMSY UGXKYC ZHSSHCPGN OYK, ZYSM MOUMLHGEU CUL KPNOM, UGX ZHK MOUM BYKE KYULHG ZSALOYX UGX CPMO YBPXYGMXPZZPWASME KYZKUPGYX ZKHT LUEPGN LHTYMOPGN OUKLO. LOY TUXY GH KYISE, VAMMH UBHPX HVYEPGN LHGEU VYWRHGYX MH UGXKYC MH ZHSSHC OYK JAPYMSE UGX CYGMMH MOY XHHK. LHGEU CYGM UCUE VE UGHMOYK XHHK. ZKHT MOY KHHT PG COPWOGPWOHSUL CUL LSYYIPGN WUTY MOY LHAGX HZ OPL YBYG VKYUMOPGN, YBYKELSPNOMYLM MHGY HZ COPWO CUL ZUTPSPUK MH OPL CPZY. UL LOY SPLMYGYX MH PMLOY LUC VYZHKY OYK OPL LTHHMO OUGXLHTY ZHKYOYUX, OPL TALMUWOY, UGX OPLCOHSY ZUWY, UL LOY OUX LH HZMYG LYYG PM PG MOY LMPSSGYLL HZ MOY GPNOMCOYG OY LSYIM. GPWOHSUL LAXXYGSE THBYX UGX WSYUKYX OPL MOKHUM. UGX UMMOUM THTYGM SPMMSY UGXKYC LOHAMYX ZKHT HAMLPXY MOY XHHK: "IUIU! TUTTU'LLMUGXPGN OYKY!" WHAGMYLL TUKE MAKGYX IUSY CPMO ZKPNOM UGX TUXY LPNGLMH MOY VHE. OY NKYC LPSYGM, UGX JAPYM YGLAYX ZHK U THTYGM, MYKKPVSY MHWHAGMYLL TUKE. LOY RGYC OHC GPWOHSUL XPLSPRYX VYPGN CURYX. MOYG MOKHANOMOY XHHK LOY OYUKX GPWOHSUL WSYUKPGN OPL MOKHUM UNUPG UGX LMPKKPGN, UGXOPL BHPWY LUPX WKHLLSE:"P WUG'M NYM U THTYGM'L IYUWY.... TUKE, PL MOUM EHA? COE XPX EHA VKPGNOPT OYKY?""P HGSE WUTY PG MH SHHR UGX XPX GHM GHMPWY... ZHKNPBY TY..."GPWOHSUL WHANOYX UGX LUPX GH THKY. WHAGMYLL TUKE THBYX UCUE ZKHT MOYXHHK UGX MHHR MOY VHE VUWR MH MOY GAKLYKE. ZPBY TPGAMYL SUMYK SPMMSYVSUWR-YEYX MOKYY-EYUK-HSX GUMULOU, OYK ZUMOYK'L IYM, OUBPGN SYUKGYX ZKHTOYK VKHMOYK MOUM IUIU CUL ULSYYI UGX TUTTU CUL PG MOY LPMMPGN KHHT, KUGMH OYK ZUMOYK AGHVLYKBYX VE OYK THMOYK. MOY XUKR-YEYX SPMMSY NPKS VHSXSEHIYGYX MOY WKYURPGN XHHK, CYGM AI MH MOY LHZU CPMO YGYKNYMPW LMYIL HZOYK LMAKXE SPMMSY SYNL, UGX OUBPGN YDUTPGYX MOY IHLPMPHG HZ OYK ZUMOYK,COH CUL ULSYYI CPMO OPL VUWR MH OYK, KHLY HG MPIMHY UGX RPLLYX MOY OUGXCOPWO SUE AGXYK OPL OYUX. GPWOHSUL MAKGYX CPMO U MYGXYK LTPSY HG OPLZUWY."GUMULOU, GUMULOU!" WUTY WHAGMYLL TUKE'L ZKPNOMYGYX COPLIYK ZKHT MOYXHHK. "IUIU CUGML MH LSYYI.""GH, TUTTU, OY XHYLG'M CUGM MH LSYYI," LUPX SPMMSY GUMULOU CPMOWHGBPWMPHG. "OY'L SUANOPGN."GPWOHSUL SHCYKYX OPL SYNL, KHLY, UGX MHHR OPL XUANOMYK PG OPL UKTL."WHTY PG, TUKE," OY LUPX MH OPL CPZY.LOY CYGM PG UGX LUM XHCG VE OYK OALVUGX."P XPX GHM GHMPWY OPT ZHSSHCPGN TY," LOY LUPX MPTPXSE. "P QALM SHHRYXPG."OHSXPGN OPL SPMMSY NPKS CPMO HGY UKT, GPWOHSUL NSUGWYX UM OPL CPZY UGX,LYYPGN OYK NAPSME YDIKYLLPHG, IAM OPL HMOYK UKT UKHAGX OYK UGX RPLLYXOYK OUPK."TUE P RPLL TUTTU?" OY ULRYX GUMULOU.GUMULOU LTPSYX VULOZASSE."UNUPG!" LOY WHTTUGXYX, IHPGMPGN CPMO U IYKYTIMHKE NYLMAKY MH MOY LIHMCOYKY GPWOHSUL OUX ISUWYX MOY RPLL."P XHG'M RGHC COE EHA MOPGR P UT WKHLL," LUPX GPWOHSUL, KYISEPGN MH MOYJAYLMPHG OY RGYC CUL PG OPL CPZY'L TPGX."EHA OUBY GH PXYU OHC AGOUIIE, OHC SHGYSE, P ZYYS COYG EHA UKY SPRYMOUM. PM USCUEL LYYTL MH TY...""TUKE, XHG'M MUSR GHGLYGLY. EHA HANOM MH VY ULOUTYX HZ EHAKLYSZ!" OYLUPX NUPSE."PM LYYTL MH VY MOUM EHA WUG'M SHBY TY, MOUM P UT LH ISUPG... USCUEL...UGX GHC... PG MOPL WHGX...""HO, OHC UVLAKX EHA UKY! PM PL GHM VYUAME MOUM YGXYUKL, PM'L SHBY MOUMTURYL AL LYY VYUAME. PM PL HGSE TUSBPGUL UGX CHTYG HZ MOUM RPGX COH UKYSHBYX ZHK MOYPK VYUAME. VAM XH P SHBY TE CPZY? P XHG'M SHBY OYK, VAM...P XHG'M RGHC OHC MH IAM PM. CPMOHAM EHA, HK COYG LHTYMOPGN WHTYL VYMCYYGAL SPRY MOPL, P LYYT SHLM UGX WUG'M XH UGEMOPGN. GHC XH P SHBY TEZPGNYK? P XHG'M SHBY PM, VAM QALM MKE MH WAM PM HZZ!""P'T GHM SPRY MOUM TELYSZ, VAM P AGXYKLMUGX. LH EHA'KY GHM UGNKE CPMOTY?""UCZASSE UGNKE!" OY LUPX, LTPSPGN UGX NYMMPGN AI. UGX LTHHMOPGN OPL OUPKOY VYNUG MH IUWY MOY KHHT."XH EHA RGHC, TUKE, COUM P'BY VYYG MOPGRPGN?" OY VYNUG, PTTYXPUMYSEMOPGRPGN USHAX PG OPL CPZY'L IKYLYGWY GHC MOUM MOYE OUX TUXY PM AI.OY XPX GHM ULR PZ LOY CUL KYUXE MH SPLMYG MH OPT. OY XPX GHM WUKY. UMOHANOM OUX HWWAKKYX MH OPT UGX LH PM VYSHGNYX MH OYK USLH. UGX OY MHSXOYK HZ OPL PGMYGMPHG MH IYKLAUXY IPYKKY MH LMUE CPMO MOYT MPSS LIKPGN.WHAGMYLL TUKE SPLMYGYX MPSS OY OUX ZPGPLOYX, TUXY LHTY KYTUKR, UGX PGOYK MAKG VYNUG MOPGRPGN USHAX. OYK MOHANOML CYKY UVHAM MOY WOPSXKYG."EHA WUG LYY MOY CHTUG PG OYK USKYUXE," LOY LUPX PG ZKYGWO, IHPGMPGN MHSPMMSY GUMULOU. "EHA KYIKHUWO AL CHTYG CPMO VYPGN PSSHNPWUS. OYKY PL HAKSHNPW. P LUE: 'IUIU CUGML MH LSYYI!' VAM LOY LUEL, 'GH, OY'L SUANOPGN.'UGX LOY CUL KPNOM," LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE CPMO U OUIIE LTPSY."EYL, EYL." UGX GPWOHSUL, MURPGN OPL SPMMSY XUANOMYK PG OPL LMKHGN OUGX,SPZMYX OYK OPNO, ISUWYX OYK HG OPL LOHASXYK, OYSX OYK VE MOY SYNL, UGXIUWYX MOY KHHT CPMO OYK. MOYKY CUL UG YDIKYLLPHG HZ WUKYZKYY OUIIPGYLLHG MOY ZUWYL HZ VHMO ZUMOYK UGX XUANOMYK."VAM EHA RGHC EHA TUE VY AGZUPK. EHA UKY MHH ZHGX HZ MOPL HGY," OPL CPZYCOPLIYKYX PG ZKYGWO."EYL, VAM COUM UT P MH XH?... P MKE GHM MH LOHC..."UM MOUM THTYGM MOYE OYUKX MOY LHAGX HZ MOY XHHK IASSYE UGX ZHHMLMYIL PGMOY OUSS UGX UGMYKHHT, UL PZ LHTYHGY OUX UKKPBYX."LHTYVHXE OUL WHTY.""P UT LAKY PM PL IPYKKY. P CPSS NH UGX LYY," LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE UGX SYZMMOY KHHT.PG OYK UVLYGWY GPWOHSUL USSHCYX OPTLYSZ MH NPBY OPL SPMMSY XUANOMYK UNUSSHI KHAGX MOY KHHT. HAM HZ VKYUMO, OY MHHR MOY SUANOPGN WOPSX JAPWRSEZKHT OPL LOHASXYK UGX IKYLLYX OYK MH OPL OYUKM. OPL WUIYKL KYTPGXYXOPT HZ XUGWPGN, UGX SHHRPGN UM MOY WOPSX'L KHAGX OUIIE SPMMSY ZUWY OYMOHANOM HZ COUM LOY CHASX VY SPRY COYG OY CUL UG HSX TUG, MURPGN OYKPGMH LHWPYME UGX XUGWPGN MOY TUFAKRU CPMO OYK UL OPL HSX ZUMOYK OUXXUGWYX XUGPYS WHHIYK CPMO OPL XUANOMYK."PM PL OY, PM PL OY, GPWOHSUL!" LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE, KY-YGMYKPGN MOY KHHTU ZYC TPGAMYL SUMYK. "GHC HAK GUMULOU OUL WHTY MH SPZY. EHA LOHASX OUBYLYYG OYK YWLMULE, UGX OHC OY WUANOM PM ZHK OUBPGN LMUEYX UCUE LH SHGN.CYSS, WHTY USHGN GHC, JAPWR, JAPWR! PM'L MPTY EHA MCH CYKY IUKMYX," LOYUXXYX, SHHRPGN LTPSPGNSE UM MOY SPMMSY NPKS COH WSAGN MH OYK ZUMOYK.GPWOHSUL CYGM HAM OHSXPGN MOY WOPSX VE MOY OUGX.WHAGMYLL TUKE KYTUPGYX PG MOY LPMMPGN KHHT."P LOHASX GYBYK, GYBYK OUBY VYSPYBYX MOUM HGY WHASX VY LH OUIIE," LOYCOPLIYKYX MH OYKLYSZ. U LTPSY SPM AI OYK ZUWY VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTY LOYLPNOYX, UGX OYK XYYI YEYL YDIKYLLYX U JAPYM LUXGYLL UL MOHANO LOYZYSM, MOKHANO OYK OUIIPGYLL, MOUM MOYKY PL UGHMOYK LHKM HZ OUIIPGYLLAGUMMUPGUVSY PG MOPL SPZY UGX HZ COPWO LOY PGBHSAGMUKPSE MOHANOM UM MOUMPGLMUGM.WOUIMYK DGUMULOU OUX TUKKPYX PG MOY YUKSE LIKPGN HZ 1813, UGX PG 1820 USKYUXE OUXMOKYY XUANOMYKL VYLPXYL U LHG ZHK COHT LOY OUX SHGNYX UGX COHT LOY CULGHC GAKLPGN. LOY OUX NKHCG LMHAMYK UGX VKHUXYK, LH MOUM PM CUL XPZZPWASMMH KYWHNGPFY PG MOPL KHVALM, THMOYKSE CHTUG MOY LSPT, SPBYSE GUMULOU HZZHKTYK XUEL. OYK ZYUMAKYL CYKY THKY XYZPGYX UGX OUX U WUST, LHZM,UGX LYKYGY YDIKYLLPHG. PG OYK ZUWY MOYKY CUL GHGY HZ MOY YBYK-NSHCPGNUGPTUMPHG MOUM OUX ZHKTYKSE VAKGYX MOYKY UGX WHGLMPMAMYX PML WOUKT.GHC OYK ZUWY UGX VHXE CYKY HZMYG USS MOUM HGY LUC, UGX OYK LHAS CULGHM BPLPVSY UM USS. USS MOUM LMKAWR MOY YEY CUL U LMKHGN, OUGXLHTY, UGXZYKMPSY CHTUG. MOY HSX ZPKY BYKE KUKYSE RPGXSYX PG OYK ZUWY GHC. MOUMOUIIYGYX HGSE COYG, UL CUL MOY WULY MOUM XUE, OYK OALVUGX KYMAKGYX OHTY,HK U LPWR WOPSX CUL WHGBUSYLWYGM, HK COYG LOY UGX WHAGMYLL TUKE LIHRY HZIKPGWY UGXKYC (LOY GYBYK TYGMPHGYX OPT MH OYK OALVUGX, COH LOY PTUNPGYXCUL QYUSHAL HZ IKPGWY UGXKYC'L TYTHKE), HK HG MOY KUKY HWWULPHGL COYGLHTYMOPGN OUIIYGYX MH PGXAWY OYK MH LPGN, U IKUWMPWY LOY OUX JAPMYUVUGXHGYX LPGWY OYK TUKKPUNY. UM MOY KUKY THTYGML COYG MOY HSX ZPKYXPX RPGXSY PG OYK OUGXLHTY, ZASSE XYBYSHIYX VHXE LOY CUL YBYG THKYUMMKUWMPBY MOUG PG ZHKTYK XUEL.LPGWY MOYPK TUKKPUNY GUMULOU UGX OYK OALVUGX OUX SPBYX PG THLWHC, PGIYMYKLVAKN, HG MOYPK YLMUMY GYUK THLWHC, HK CPMO OYK THMOYK, MOUM PL MHLUE, PG GPWOHSUL' OHALY. MOY EHAGN WHAGMYLL VYFAROHBU CUL GHM HZMYG LYYGPG LHWPYME, UGX MOHLY COH TYM OYK MOYKY CYKY GHM ISYULYX CPMO OYKUGX ZHAGX OYK GYPMOYK UMMKUWMPBY GHK UTPUVSY. GHM MOUM GUMULOU SPRYXLHSPMAXY--LOY XPX GHM RGHC COYMOYK LOY SPRYX PM HK GHM, LOY YBYG MOHANOMMOUM LOY XPX GHM--VAM CPMO OYK IKYNGUGWPYL, OYK WHGZPGYTYGML, MOYGAKLPGN HZ OYK WOPSXKYG, UGX LOUKPGN YBYKE THTYGM HZ OYK OALVUGX'L SPZY,LOY OUX XYTUGXL HG OYK MPTY COPWO WHASX VY LUMPLZPYX HGSE VE KYGHAGWPGNLHWPYME. USS COH OUX RGHCG GUMULOU VYZHKY OYK TUKKPUNY CHGXYKYX UM MOYWOUGNY PG OYK UL UM LHTYMOPGN YDMKUHKXPGUKE. HGSE MOY HSX WHAGMYLL CPMOOYK TUMYKGUS PGLMPGWM OUX KYUSPFYX MOUM USS GUMULOU'L HAMVAKLML OUXVYYG XAY MH OYK GYYX HZ WOPSXKYG UGX U OALVUGX--UL LOY OYKLYSZ OUX HGWYYDWSUPTYX UM HMKUXGHY GHM LH TAWO PG ZAG UL PG YUKGYLM--UGX OYK THMOYKCUL GHC LAKIKPLYX UM MOY LAKIKPLY YDIKYLLYX VE MOHLY COH OUX GYBYKAGXYKLMHHX GUMULOU, UGX LOY RYIM LUEPGN MOUM LOY OUX USCUEL RGHCG MOUMGUMULOU CHASX TURY UG YDYTISUKE CPZY UGX THMOYK."HGSE LOY SYML OYK SHBY HZ OYK OALVUGX UGX WOPSXKYG HBYKZSHC USSVHAGXL," LUPX MOY WHAGMYLL, "LH MOUM PM YBYG VYWHTYL UVLAKX."GUMULOU XPX GHM ZHSSHC MOY NHSXYG KASY UXBHWUMYX VE WSYBYK ZHSR,YLIYWPUSSE VE MOY ZKYGWO, COPWO LUEL MOUM U NPKS LOHASX GHM SYM OYKLYSZNH COYG LOY TUKKPYL, LOHASX GHM GYNSYWM OYK UWWHTISPLOTYGML, LOHASX VYYBYG THKY WUKYZAS HZ OYK UIIYUKUGWY MOUG COYG LOY CUL AGTUKKPYX, UGXLOHASX ZULWPGUMY OYK OALVUGX UL TAWO UL LOY XPX VYZHKY OY VYWUTY OYKOALVUGX. GUMULOU HG MOY WHGMKUKE OUX UM HGWY UVUGXHGYX USS OYK CPMWOYKE,HZ COPWO OYK LPGNPGN OUX VYYG UG AGALAUSSE IHCYKZAS IUKM. LOY NUBY PM AIQALM VYWUALY PM CUL LH IHCYKZASSE LYXAWMPBY. LOY MHHR GH IUPGL CPMOOYK TUGGYKL HK CPMO XYSPWUWE HZ LIYYWO, HK CPMO OYK MHPSYM, HK MH LOHCOYKLYSZ MH OYK OALVUGX PG OYK THLM VYWHTPGN UMMPMAXYL, HK MH UBHPXPGWHGBYGPYGWPGN OPT VE VYPGN MHH YDUWMPGN. LOY UWMYX PG WHGMKUXPWMPHGMH USS MOHLY KASYL. LOY ZYSM MOUM MOY USSAKYTYGML PGLMPGWM OUX ZHKTYKSEMUANOM OYK MH ALY CHASX GHC VY TYKYSE KPXPWASHAL PG MOY YEYL HZOYK OALVUGX, MH COHT LOY OUX ZKHT MOY ZPKLM THTYGM NPBYG OYKLYSZ AIYGMPKYSE--MOUM PL, CPMO OYK COHSY LHAS, SYUBPGN GH WHKGYK HZ PM OPXXYGZKHT OPT. LOY ZYSM MOUM OYK AGPME CPMO OYK OALVUGX CUL GHM TUPGMUPGYXVE MOY IHYMPW ZYYSPGNL MOUM OUX UMMKUWMYX OPT MH OYK, VAM VE LHTYMOPGNYSLY--PGXYZPGPMY VAM ZPKT UL MOY VHGX VYMCYYG OYK HCG VHXE UGX LHAS.MH ZSAZZ HAM OYK WAKSL, IAM HG ZULOPHGUVSY XKYLLYL, UGX LPGN KHTUGMPWLHGNL MH ZULWPGUMY OYK OALVUGX CHASX OUBY LYYTYX UL LMKUGNY UL MH UXHKGOYKLYSZ MH UMMKUWM OYKLYSZ. MH UXHKG OYKLYSZ ZHK HMOYKL TPNOM IYKOUILOUBY VYYG UNKYYUVSY--LOY XPX GHM RGHC--VAM LOY OUX GH MPTY UM USS ZHKPM. MOY WOPYZ KYULHG ZHK XYBHMPGN GH MPTY YPMOYK MH LPGNPGN, MH XKYLL,HK MH WOHHLPGN OYK CHKXL CUL MOUM LOY KYUSSE OUX GH MPTY MH LIUKY ZHKMOYLY MOPGNL.CY RGHC MOUM TUG OUL MOY ZUWASME HZ VYWHTPGN WHTISYMYSE UVLHKVYX PGU LAVQYWM OHCYBYK MKPBPUS PM TUE VY, UGX MOUM MOYKY PL GH LAVQYWM LHMKPBPUS MOUM PM CPSS GHM NKHC MH PGZPGPMY IKHIHKMPHGL PZ HGY'L YGMPKYUMMYGMPHG PL XYBHMYX MH PM.MOY LAVQYWM COPWO COHSSE YGNKHLLYX GUMULOU'L UMMYGMPHG CUL OYK ZUTPSE:MOUM PL, OYK OALVUGX COHT LOY OUX MH RYYI LH MOUM OY LOHASX VYSHGNYGMPKYSE MH OYK UGX MH MOY OHTY, UGX MOY WOPSXKYG COHT LOY OUX MH VYUK,VKPGN PGMH MOY CHKSX, GAKLY, UGX VKPGN AI.UGX MOY XYYIYK LOY IYGYMKUMYX, GHM CPMO OYK TPGX HGSE VAM CPMO OYK COHSYLHAS, OYK COHSY VYPGN, PGMH MOY LAVQYWM MOUM UVLHKVYX OYK, MOY SUKNYKXPX MOUM LAVQYWM NKHC UGX MOY CYURYK UGX THKY PGUXYJAUMY XPX OYK IHCYKLUIIYUK, LH MOUM LOY WHGWYGMKUMYX MOYT COHSSE HG MOUM HGY MOPGN UGX EYMCUL AGUVSY MH UWWHTISPLO USS MOUM LOY WHGLPXYKYX GYWYLLUKE.MOYKY CYKY MOYG UL GHC WHGBYKLUMPHGL UGX XPLWALLPHGL UVHAM CHTYG'LKPNOML, MOY KYSUMPHGL HZ OALVUGX UGX CPZY UGX MOYPK ZKYYXHT UGX KPNOML,MOHANO MOYLY MOYTYL CYKY GHM EYM MYKTYX JAYLMPHGL UL MOYE UKY GHC; VAMMOYLY MHIPWL CYKY GHM TYKYSE AGPGMYKYLMPGN MH GUMULOU, LOY IHLPMPBYSEXPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX MOYT.MOYLY JAYLMPHGL, MOYG UL GHC, YDPLMYX HGSE ZHK MOHLY COH LYY GHMOPGN PGTUKKPUNY VAM MOY ISYULAKY TUKKPYX IYHISY NYM ZKHT HGY UGHMOYK, MOUM PL,HGSE MOY VYNPGGPGNL HZ TUKKPUNY UGX GHM PML COHSY LPNGPZPWUGWY, COPWOSPYL PG MOY ZUTPSE.XPLWALLPHGL UGX JAYLMPHGL HZ MOUM RPGX, COPWO UKY SPRY MOY JAYLMPHG HZOHC MH NYM MOY NKYUMYLM NKUMPZPWUMPHG ZKHT HGY'L XPGGYK, XPX GHM MOYGUGX XH GHM GHC YDPLM ZHK MOHLY ZHK COHT MOY IAKIHLY HZ U XPGGYK PL MOYGHAKPLOTYGM PM UZZHKXL; UGX MOY IAKIHLY HZ TUKKPUNY PL MOY ZUTPSE.PZ MOY IAKIHLY HZ XPGGYK PL MH GHAKPLO MOY VHXE, U TUG COH YUML MCHXPGGYKL UM HGWY TUE IYKOUIL NYM THKY YGQHETYGM VAM CPSS GHM UMMUPG OPLIAKIHLY, ZHK OPL LMHTUWO CPSS GHM XPNYLM MOY MCH XPGGYKL.PZ MOY IAKIHLY HZ TUKKPUNY PL MOY ZUTPSE, MOY IYKLHG COH CPLOYL MH OUBYTUGE CPBYL HK OALVUGXL TUE IYKOUIL HVMUPG TAWO ISYULAKY, VAM PG MOUMWULY CPSS GHM OUBY U ZUTPSE.PZ MOY IAKIHLY HZ ZHHX PL GHAKPLOTYGM UGX MOY IAKIHLY HZ TUKKPUNY PL MOYZUTPSE, MOY COHSY JAYLMPHG KYLHSBYL PMLYSZ PGMH GHM YUMPGN THKY MOUG HGYWUG XPNYLM, UGX GHM OUBPGN THKY CPBYL HK OALVUGXL MOUG UKY GYYXYX ZHKMOY ZUTPSE--MOUM PL, HGY CPZY HK HGY OALVUGX. GUMULOU GYYXYX U OALVUGX.U OALVUGX CUL NPBYG OYK UGX OY NUBY OYK U ZUTPSE. UGX LOY GHM HGSE LUCGH GYYX HZ UGE HMOYK HK VYMMYK OALVUGX, VAM UL USS MOY IHCYKL HZ OYKLHAS CYKY PGMYGM HG LYKBPGN MOUM OALVUGX UGX ZUTPSE, LOY WHASX GHMPTUNPGY UGX LUC GH PGMYKYLM PG PTUNPGPGN OHC PM CHASX VY PZ MOPGNL CYKYXPZZYKYGM.GUMULOU XPX GHM WUKY ZHK LHWPYME PG NYGYKUS, VAM IKPFYX MOY THKY MOYLHWPYME HZ OYK KYSUMPBYL--WHAGMYLL TUKE, UGX OYK VKHMOYK, OYK THMOYK,UGX LHGEU. LOY BUSAYX MOY WHTIUGE HZ MOHLY MH COHT LOY WHASX WHTYLMKPXPGN XPLOYBYSYX ZKHT MOY GAKLYKE PG OYK XKYLLPGN NHCG, UGX CPMOQHEZAS ZUWY LOHC U EYSSHC PGLMYUX HZ U NKYYG LMUPG HG VUVE'L GUIRPG, UGXZKHT COHT LOY WHASX OYUK KYULLAKPGN CHKXL MH MOY YZZYWM MOUM VUVE CULTAWO VYMMYK.MH LAWO UG YDMYGM OUX GUMULOU SYM OYKLYSZ NH MOUM MOY CUE LOY XKYLLYXUGX XPX OYK OUPK, OYK PSS-WOHLYG CHKXL, UGX OYK QYUSHALE--LOY CULQYUSHAL HZ LHGEU, HZ MOY NHBYKGYLL, UGX HZ YBYKE CHTUG, IKYMME HKISUPG--CYKY OUVPMAUS LAVQYWML HZ QYLM MH MOHLY UVHAM OYK. MOY NYGYKUSHIPGPHG CUL MOUM IPYKKY CUL AGXYK OPL CPZY'L MOATV, COPWO CUL KYUSSEMKAY. ZKHT MOY BYKE ZPKLM XUEL HZ MOYPK TUKKPYX SPZY GUMULOU OUXUGGHAGWYX OYK XYTUGXL. IPYKKY CUL NKYUMSE LAKIKPLYX VE OPL CPZY'L BPYC,MH OPT U IYKZYWMSE GHBYS HGY, MOUM YBYKE THTYGM HZ OPL SPZY VYSHGNYX MHOYK UGX MH MOY ZUTPSE. OPL CPZY'L XYTUGXL ULMHGPLOYX OPT, VAM MOYE USLHZSUMMYKYX OPT, UGX OY LAVTPMMYX MH MOYT.IPYKKY'L LAVQYWMPHG WHGLPLMYX PG MOY ZUWM MOUM OY GHM HGSE XUKYX GHMZSPKM CPMO, VAM XUKYX GHM YBYG LIYUR LTPSPGNSE MH, UGE HMOYK CHTUG; XPXGHM XUKY XPGY UM MOY WSAV UL U IULMPTY, XPX GHM XUKY LIYGX THGYE HG UCOPT, UGX XPX GHM XUKY UVLYGM OPTLYSZ ZHK UGE SYGNMO HZ MPTY, YDWYIM HGVALPGYLL--PG COPWO OPL CPZY PGWSAXYX OPL PGMYSSYWMAUS IAKLAPML, COPWOLOY XPX GHM PG MOY SYULM AGXYKLMUGX VAM MH COPWO LOY UMMKPVAMYX NKYUMPTIHKMUGWY. MH TURY AI ZHK MOPL, UM OHTY IPYKKY OUX MOY KPNOM MHKYNASUMY OPL SPZY UGX MOUM HZ MOY COHSY ZUTPSE YDUWMSE UL OY WOHLY. UMOHTY GUMULOU ISUWYX OYKLYSZ PG MOY IHLPMPHG HZ U LSUBY MH OYK OALVUGX,UGX MOY COHSY OHALYOHSX CYGM HG MPIMHY COYG OY CUL HWWAIPYX--MOUM PL,CUL KYUXPGN HK CKPMPGN PG OPL LMAXE. IPYKKY OUX VAM MH LOHC U IUKMPUSPMEZHK UGEMOPGN MH NYM QALM COUM OY SPRYX XHGY USCUEL. OY OUX HGSE MHYDIKYLL U CPLO UGX GUMULOU CHASX QATI AI UGX KAG MH ZASZPSS PM.MOY YGMPKY OHALYOHSX CUL NHBYKGYX UWWHKXPGN MH IPYKKY'L LAIIHLYX HKXYKL,MOUM PL, VE OPL CPLOYL COPWO GUMULOU MKPYX MH NAYLL. MOYPK CUE HZSPZY UGX ISUWY HZ KYLPXYGWY, MOYPK UWJAUPGMUGWYL UGX MPYL, GUMULOU'LHWWAIUMPHGL, MOY WOPSXKYG'L AIVKPGNPGN, CYKY USS LYSYWMYX GHM TYKYSECPMO KYNUKX MH IPYKKY'L YDIKYLLYX CPLOYL, VAM MH COUM GUMULOU ZKHT MOYMOHANOML OY YDIKYLLYX PG WHGBYKLUMPHG LAIIHLYX OPL CPLOYL MH VY. UGX LOYXYXAWYX MOY YLLYGMPUSL HZ OPL CPLOYL JAPMY WHKKYWMSE, UGX OUBPGN HGWYUKKPBYX UM MOYT WSAGN MH MOYT MYGUWPHALSE. COYG IPYKKY OPTLYSZ CUGMYX MHWOUGNY OPL TPGX LOY CHASX ZPNOM OPT CPMO OPL HCG CYUIHGL.MOAL PG U MPTY HZ MKHAVSY YBYK TYTHKUVSY MH OPT UZMYK MOY VPKMO HZ MOYPKZPKLM WOPSX COH CUL XYSPWUMY, COYG MOYE OUX MH WOUGNY MOY CYM GAKLYMOKYY MPTYL UGX GUMULOU ZYSS PSS ZKHT XYLIUPK, IPYKKY HGY XUE MHSX OYKHZ KHALLYUA'L BPYC, CPMO COPWO OY JAPMY UNKYYX, MOUM MH OUBY U CYMGAKLY PL AGGUMAKUS UGX OUKTZAS. COYG OYK GYDM VUVE CUL VHKG, XYLIPMYMOY HIIHLPMPHG HZ OYK THMOYK, MOY XHWMHKL, UGX YBYG HZ OYK OALVUGXOPTLYSZ--COH CYKY USS BPNHKHALSE HIIHLYX MH OYK GAKLPGN OYK VUVEOYKLYSZ, U MOPGN MOYG AGOYUKX HZ UGX WHGLPXYKYX PGQAKPHAL--LOY PGLPLMYXHG OUBPGN OYK HCG CUE, UGX UZMYK MOUM GAKLYX USS OYK VUVPYL OYKLYSZ.PM BYKE HZMYG OUIIYGYX MOUM PG U THTYGM HZ PKKPMUMPHG OALVUGX UGX CPZYCHASX OUBY U XPLIAMY, VAM SHGN UZMYKCUKXL IPYKKY MH OPL LAKIKPLY UGXXYSPNOM CHASX ZPGX PG OPL CPZY'L PXYUL UGX UWMPHGL MOY BYKE MOHANOMUNUPGLM COPWO LOY OUX UKNAYX, VAM XPBYLMYX HZ YBYKEMOPGN LAIYKZSAHALMOUM PG MOY YDWPMYTYGM HZ MOY XPLIAMY OY OUX UXXYX COYG YDIKYLLPGN OPLHIPGPHG.UZMYK LYBYG EYUKL HZ TUKKPUNY IPYKKY OUX MOY QHEHAL UGX ZPKTWHGLWPHALGYLL MOUM OY CUL GHM U VUX TUG, UGX OY ZYSM MOPL VYWUALY OY LUCOPTLYSZ KYZSYWMYX PG OPL CPZY. OY ZYSM MOY NHHX UGX VUX CPMOPG OPTLYSZPGYDMKPWUVSE TPGNSYX UGX HBYKSUIIPGN. VAM HGSE COUM CUL KYUSSE NHHX PGOPT CUL KYZSYWMYX PG OPL CPZY, USS MOUM CUL GHM JAPMY NHHX CUL KYQYWMYX.UGX MOPL CUL GHM MOY KYLASM HZ SHNPWUS KYULHGPGN VAM CUL U XPKYWM UGXTELMYKPHAL KYZSYWMPHG.WOUIMYK DPMCH THGMOL IKYBPHALSE COYG IPYKKY CUL USKYUXE LMUEPGN CPMO MOY KHLMHBLOY OUX KYWYPBYX U SYMMYK ZKHT IKPGWY MOYHXHKY, ULRPGN OPT MH WHTYMH IYMYKLVAKN MH WHGZYK HG LHTY PTIHKMUGM JAYLMPHGL MOUM CYKY VYPGNXPLWALLYX MOYKY VE U LHWPYME HZ COPWO IPYKKY CUL HGY HZ MOY IKPGWPIUSZHAGXYKL.HG KYUXPGN MOUM SYMMYK (LOY USCUEL KYUX OYK OALVUGX'L SYMMYKL) GUMULOUOYKLYSZ LANNYLMYX MOUM OY LOHASX NH MH IYMYKLVAKN, MOHANO LOY CHASX ZYYSOPL UVLYGWY BYKE UWAMYSE. LOY UMMKPVAMYX PTTYGLY PTIHKMUGWY MH USSOYK OALVUGX'L PGMYSSYWMAUS UGX UVLMKUWM PGMYKYLML MOHANO LOY XPX GHMAGXYKLMUGX MOYT, UGX LOY USCUEL XKYUXYX VYPGN U OPGXKUGWY MH OPT PG LAWOTUMMYKL. MH IPYKKY'L MPTPX SHHR HZ PGJAPKE UZMYK KYUXPGN MOY SYMMYK LOYKYISPYX VE ULRPGN OPT MH NH, VAM MH ZPD U XYZPGPMY XUMY ZHK OPL KYMAKG.OY CUL NPBYG ZHAK CYYRL' SYUBY HZ UVLYGWY.YBYK LPGWY MOUM SYUBY HZ UVLYGWY OUX YDIPKYX, THKY MOUG U ZHKMGPNOMVYZHKY, GUMULOU OUX VYYG PG U WHGLMUGM LMUMY HZ USUKT, XYIKYLLPHG, UGXPKKPMUVPSPME.XYGPLHB, GHC U NYGYKUS HG MOY KYMPKYX SPLM UGX TAWO XPLLUMPLZPYX CPMOMOY IKYLYGM LMUMY HZ UZZUPKL, OUX UKKPBYX XAKPGN MOUM ZHKMGPNOM. OYSHHRYX UM GUMULOU CPMO LHKKHC UGX LAKIKPLY UL UM U VUX SPRYGYLL HZ UIYKLHG HGWY XYUK. U XASS, XYQYWMYX SHHR, KUGXHT KYISPYL, UGX MUSR UVHAMMOY GAKLYKE CUL USS OY LUC UGX OYUKX ZKHT OPL ZHKTYK YGWOUGMKYLL.GUMULOU CUL LUX UGX PKKPMUVSY USS MOUM MPTY, YLIYWPUSSE COYG OYK THMOYK,OYK VKHMOYK, LHGEU, HK WHAGMYLL TUKE PG MOYPK YZZHKML MH WHGLHSY OYKMKPYX MH YDWALY IPYKKY UGX LANNYLMYX KYULHGL ZHK OPL XYSUE PG KYMAKGPGN."PM'L USS GHGLYGLY, USS KAVVPLO--MOHLY XPLWALLPHGL COPWO SYUX MH GHMOPGNUGX USS MOHLY PXPHMPW LHWPYMPYL!" GUMULOU XYWSUKYX HZ MOY BYKE UZZUPKLPG MOY PTTYGLY PTIHKMUGWY HZ COPWO LOY ZPKTSE VYSPYBYX.UGX LOY CHASX NH MH MOY GAKLYKE MH GAKLY IYMEU, OYK HGSE VHE. GH HGYYSLY WHASX MYSS OYK UGEMOPGN LH WHTZHKMPGN HK LH KYULHGUVSY UL MOPLSPMMSY MOKYY-THGMO-HSX WKYUMAKY COYG OY SUE UM OYK VKYULM UGX LOY CULWHGLWPHAL HZ MOY THBYTYGM HZ OPL SPIL UGX MOY LGAZZSPGN HZ OPL SPMMSYGHLY. MOUM WKYUMAKY LUPX: "EHA UKY UGNKE, EHA UKY QYUSHAL, EHA CHASXSPRY MH IUE OPT HAM, EHA UKY UZKUPX--VAM OYKY UT P! UGX P UT OY..." UGXMOUM CUL AGUGLCYKUVSY. PM CUL THKY MOUG MKAY.XAKPGN MOUM ZHKMGPNOM HZ UGDPYME GUMULOU KYLHKMYX MH MOY VUVE ZHKWHTZHKM LH HZMYG, UGX ZALLYX HBYK OPT LH TAWO, MOUM LOY HBYKZYX OPT UGXOY ZYSS PSS. LOY CUL MYKKPZPYX VE OPL PSSGYLL, UGX EYM MOUM CUL QALMCOUM LOY GYYXYX. COPSY UMMYGXPGN MH OPT LOY VHKY MOY UGDPYME UVHAM OYKOALVUGX THKY YULPSE.LOY CUL GAKLPGN OYK VHE COYG MOY LHAGX HZ IPYKKY'L LSYPNO CUL OYUKXUM MOY ZKHGM XHHK, UGX MOY HSX GAKLY--RGHCPGN OHC MH ISYULY OYKTPLMKYLL--YGMYKYX MOY KHHT PGUAXPVSE VAM OAKKPYXSE UGX CPMO U VYUTPGNZUWY."OUL OY WHTY?" GUMULOU ULRYX JAPWRSE PG U COPLIYK, UZKUPX MH THBY SYLMLOY LOHASX KHALY MOY XHFPGN VUVE."OY'L WHTY, TU'UT," COPLIYKYX MOY GAKLY.MOY VSHHX KALOYX MH GUMULOU'L ZUWY UGX OYK ZYYM PGBHSAGMUKPSE THBYX, VAMLOY WHASX GHM QATI AI UGX KAG HAM. MOY VUVE UNUPG HIYGYX OPL YEYL UGXSHHRYX UM OYK. "EHA'KY OYKY?" OY LYYTYX MH VY LUEPGN, UGX UNUPG SUFPSELTUWRYX OPL SPIL.WUAMPHALSE CPMOXKUCPGN OYK VKYULM, GUMULOU KHWRYX OPT U SPMMSY, OUGXYXOPT MH MOY GAKLY, UGX CYGM CPMO KUIPX LMYIL MHCUKX MOY XHHK. VAM UM MOYXHHK LOY LMHIIYX UL PZ OYK WHGLWPYGWY KYIKHUWOYX OYK ZHK OUBPGN PGOYK QHE SYZM MOY WOPSX MHH LHHG, UGX LOY NSUGWYX KHAGX. MOY GAKLY CPMOKUPLYX YSVHCL CUL SPZMPGN MOY PGZUGM HBYK MOY KUPS HZ OPL WHM."NH, TU'UT! XHG'M CHKKE, NH!" LOY COPLIYKYX, LTPSPGN, CPMO MOY RPGX HZZUTPSPUKPME MOUM NKHCL AI VYMCYYG U GAKLY UGX OYK TPLMKYLL.GUMULOU KUG CPMO SPNOM ZHHMLMYIL MH MOY UGMYKHHT.XYGPLHB, COH OUX WHTY HAM HZ MOY LMAXE PGMH MOY XUGWPGN KHHT CPMO OPLIPIY, GHC ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY KYWHNGPFYX MOY HSX GUMULOU. U ZSHHX HZVKPSSPUGM, QHEZAS SPNOM IHAKYX ZKHT OYK MKUGLZPNAKYX ZUWY."OY'L WHTY!" LOY YDWSUPTYX UL LOY KUG IULM, UGX XYGPLHB ZYSM MOUM OY MHHCUL XYSPNOMYX MOUM IPYKKY, COHT OY XPX GHM TAWO WUKY ZHK, OUX KYMAKGYX.HG KYUWOPGN MOY BYLMPVASY GUMULOU LUC U MUSS ZPNAKY PG U ZAK WHUMAGCPGXPGN OPL LWUKZ. "PM'L OY! PM'L KYUSSE OY! OY OUL WHTY!" LOY LUPXMH OYKLYSZ, UGX KALOPGN UM OPT YTVKUWYX OPT, IKYLLYX OPL OYUX MH OYKVKYULM, UGX MOYG IALOYX OPT VUWR UGX NUFYX UM OPL KAXXE, OUIIE ZUWY,WHBYKYX CPMO OHUKZKHLM. "EYL, PM PL OY, OUIIE UGX WHGMYGMYX..."MOYG USS UM HGWY LOY KYTYTVYKYX MOY MHKMAKYL HZ LALIYGLY LOY OUXYDIYKPYGWYX ZHK MOY SULM ZHKMGPNOM, UGX MOY QHE MOUM OUX SPM AI OYKZUWY BUGPLOYX; LOY ZKHCGYX UGX HBYKCOYSTYX IPYKKY CPMO U MHKKYGM HZKYIKHUWOYL UGX UGNKE CHKXL."EYL, PM'L USS BYKE CYSS ZHK EHA. EHA UKY ISYULYX, EHA'BY OUX U NHHXMPTY.... VAM COUM UVHAM TY? EHA TPNOM UM SYULM OUBY LOHCG WHGLPXYKUMPHGZHK MOY WOPSXKYG. P UT GAKLPGN UGX TE TPSR CUL LIHPSYX.... IYMEU CUL UMXYUMO'L XHHK. VAM EHA CYKY YGQHEPGN EHAKLYSZ. EYL, YGQHEPGN..."IPYKKY RGYC OY CUL GHM MH VSUTY, ZHK OY WHASX GHM OUBY WHTY LHHGYK; OYRGYC MOPL HAMVAKLM CUL AGLYYTSE UGX CHASX VSHC HBYK PG U TPGAMY HK MCH;UVHBY USS OY RGYC MOUM OY OPTLYSZ CUL VKPNOM UGX OUIIE. OY CUGMYXMH LTPSY VAM XUKYX GHM YBYG MOPGR HZ XHPGN LH. OY TUXY U IPMYHAL,ZKPNOMYGYX ZUWY UGX VYGM XHCG."P WHASX GHM, HG TE OHGHK. VAM OHC PL IYMEU?""USS KPNOM GHC. WHTY USHGN! P CHGXYK EHA'KY GHM ULOUTYX! PZ HGSE EHAWHASX LYY COUM P CUL SPRY CPMOHAM EHA, OHC P LAZZYKYX!""EHA UKY CYSS?""WHTY, WHTY!" LOY LUPX, GHM SYMMPGN NH HZ OPL UKT. UGX MOYE CYGM MHMOYPK KHHTL.COYG GPWOHSUL UGX OPL CPZY WUTY MH SHHR ZHK IPYKKY OY CUL PG MOY GAKLYKEOHSXPGN OPL VUVE LHG, COH CUL UNUPG UCURY, HG OPL OANY KPNOM IUST UGXXUGXSPGN OPT. U VSPLLZAS VKPNOM LTPSY CUL ZPDYX HG MOY VUVE'L VKHUX ZUWYCPMO PML MHHMOSYLL HIYG THAMO. MOY LMHKT CUL SHGN LPGWY HBYK UGX MOYKYCUL VKPNOM, QHEHAL LAGLOPGY HG GUMULOU'L ZUWY UL LOY NUFYX MYGXYKSE UMOYK OALVUGX UGX WOPSX."UGX OUBY EHA MUSRYX YBYKEMOPGN CYSS HBYK CPMO IKPGWY MOYHXHKY?" LOYULRYX."EYL, WUIPMUSSE.""EHA LYY, OY OHSXL PM AI." (LOY TYUGM MOY VUVE'L OYUX.) "VAM OHC OY XPXZKPNOMYG TY... EHA'BY LYYG MOY IKPGWYLL? PL PM MKAY LOY'L PG SHBY CPMOMOUM...""EYL, QALM ZUGWE..."UM MOUM THTYGM GPWOHSUL UGX WHAGMYLL TUKE WUTY PG. IPYKKY CPMO MOY VUVEHG OPL OUGX LMHHIYX, RPLLYX MOYT, UGX KYISPYX MH MOYPK PGJAPKPYL. VAMPG LIPMY HZ TAWO MOUM CUL PGMYKYLMPGN UGX OUX MH VY XPLWALLYX, MOY VUVECPMO MOY SPMMSY WUI HG PML AGLMYUXE OYUX YBPXYGMSE UVLHKVYX USS OPLUMMYGMPHG."OHC LCYYM!" LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE, SHHRPGN UM UGX ISUEPGN CPMO MOY VUVE."GHC, GPWOHSUL," LOY UXXYX, MAKGPGN MH OYK OALVUGX, "P WUG'M AGXYKLMUGXOHC PM PL EHA XHG'M LYY MOY WOUKT HZ MOYLY XYSPWPHAL TUKBYSL.""P XHG'M UGX WUG'M," KYISPYX GPWOHSUL, SHHRPGN WHSXSE UM MOY VUVE. "USATI HZ ZSYLO. WHTY USHGN, IPYKKY!""UGX EYM OY'L LAWO UG UZZYWMPHGUMY ZUMOYK," LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE,BPGXPWUMPGN OYK OALVUGX, "VAM HGSE UZMYK MOYE UKY U EYUK HSX HK LH...""GHC, IPYKKY GAKLYL MOYT LISYGXPXSE," LUPX GUMULOU. "OY LUEL OPL OUGX PLQALM TUXY ZHK U VUVE'L LYUM. QALM SHHR!""HGSE GHM ZHK MOPL..." IPYKKY LAXXYGSE YDWSUPTYX CPMO U SUANO, UGXLOPZMPGN MOY VUVE OY NUBY OPT MH MOY GAKLY.WOUIMYK DPPUL PG YBYKE SUKNY OHALYOHSX, MOYKY CYKY UM VUSX OPSSL LYBYKUS IYKZYWMSEXPLMPGWM CHKSXL COPWO TYKNYX PGMH HGY OUKTHGPHAL COHSY, MOHANO YUWOKYMUPGYX PML HCG IYWASPUKPMPYL UGX TUXY WHGWYLLPHGL MH MOY HMOYKL. YBYKEYBYGM, QHEZAS HK LUX, MOUM MHHR ISUWY PG MOUM OHALY CUL PTIHKMUGM MH USSMOYLY CHKSXL, VAM YUWO OUX PML HCG LIYWPUS KYULHGL MH KYQHPWY HK NKPYBYHBYK MOUM HWWAKKYGWY PGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ MOY HMOYKL.ZHK PGLMUGWY, IPYKKY'L KYMAKG CUL U QHEZAS UGX PTIHKMUGM YBYGM UGX MOYEUSS ZYSM PM MH VY LH.MOY LYKBUGML--MOY THLM KYSPUVSY QAXNYL HZ MOYPK TULMYKL VYWUALY MOYEQAXNY GHM VE MOYPK WHGBYKLUMPHG HK YDIKYLLPHGL HZ ZYYSPGN VAM VE MOYPKUWML UGX CUE HZ SPZY--CYKY NSUX HZ IPYKKY'L KYMAKG VYWUALY MOYE RGYCMOUM COYG OY CUL MOYKY WHAGM GPWOHSUL CHASX WYULY NHPGN YBYKE XUE MHUMMYGX MH MOY YLMUMY, UGX CHASX VY PG VYMMYK LIPKPML UGX MYTIYK, UGXUSLH VYWUALY MOYE CHASX USS KYWYPBY OUGXLHTY IKYLYGML ZHK MOY OHSPXUEL.MOY WOPSXKYG UGX MOYPK NHBYKGYLLYL CYKY NSUX HZ IPYKKY'L KYMAKG VYWUALYGH HGY YSLY XKYC MOYT PGMH MOY LHWPUS SPZY HZ MOY OHALYOHSX UL OY XPX.OY USHGY WHASX ISUE HG MOY WSUBPWOHKX MOUM YWHLLUPLY (OPL HGSE IPYWY)MH COPWO, UL OY LUPX, USS IHLLPVSY XUGWYL WHASX VY XUGWYX, UGX MOYE ZYSMLAKY OY OUX VKHANOM IKYLYGML ZHK MOYT USS.EHAGN GPWOHSUL, GHC U LSPT SUX HZ ZPZMYYG, XYSPWUMY UGX PGMYSSPNYGM,CPMO WAKSE SPNOM-VKHCG OUPK UGX VYUAMPZAS YEYL, CUL XYSPNOMYX VYWUALYAGWSY IPYKKY UL OY WUSSYX OPT CUL MOY HVQYWM HZ OPL KUIMAKHAL UGXIULLPHGUMY UZZYWMPHG. GH HGY OUX PGLMPSSYX PGMH OPT MOPL SHBY ZHK IPYKKYCOHT OY LUC HGSE HWWULPHGUSSE. WHAGMYLL TUKE COH OUX VKHANOM OPT AIOUX XHGY OYK AMTHLM MH TURY OPT SHBY OYK OALVUGX UL LOY SHBYX OPT, UGXSPMMSY GPWOHSUL XPX SHBY OPL AGWSY, VAM SHBYX OPT CPMO QALM U LOUXY HZWHGMYTIM. IPYKKY, OHCYBYK, OY UXHKYX. OY XPX GHM CUGM MH VY UG OALLUK HKU RGPNOM HZ LM. NYHKNY SPRY OPL AGWSY GPWOHSUL; OY CUGMYX MH VY SYUKGYX,CPLY, UGX RPGX SPRY IPYKKY. PG IPYKKY'L IKYLYGWY OPL ZUWY USCUEL LOHGYCPMO ISYULAKY UGX OY ZSALOYX UGX CUL VKYUMOSYLL COYG IPYKKY LIHRY MHOPT. OY XPX GHM TPLL U LPGNSY CHKX OY AMMYKYX, UGX CHASX UZMYKCUKXL,CPMO XYLLUSSYL HK VE OPTLYSZ, KYWUSS UGX KYWHGLPXYK MOY TYUGPGN HZYBYKEMOPGN IPYKKY OUX LUPX. IPYKKY'L IULM SPZY UGX OPL AGOUIIPGYLL IKPHKMH 1812 (HZ COPWO EHAGN GPWOHSUL OUX ZHKTYX U BUNAY IHYMPW IPWMAKY ZKHTLHTY CHKXL OY OUX HBYKOYUKX), OPL UXBYGMAKYL PG THLWHC, OPL WUIMPBPME,ISUMHG RUKUMUYB (HZ COHT OY OUX OYUKX ZKHT IPYKKY), OPL SHBY ZHK GUMULOU(HZ COHT MOY SUX CUL USLH IUKMPWASUKSE ZHGX), UGX YLIYWPUSSE IPYKKY'LZKPYGXLOPI CPMO MOY ZUMOYK COHT GPWOHSUL WHASX GHM KYTYTVYK--USS MOPLTUXY IPYKKY PG OPL YEYL U OYKH UGX U LUPGM.ZKHT VKHRYG KYTUKRL UVHAM GUMULOU UGX OPL ZUMOYK, ZKHT MOY YTHMPHG CPMOCOPWO IPYKKY LIHRY HZ MOUM XYUX ZUMOYK, UGX ZKHT MOY WUKYZAS, KYBYKYGMMYGXYKGYLL CPMO COPWO GUMULOU LIHRY HZ OPT, MOY VHE, COH CUL HGSE QALMVYNPGGPGN MH NAYLL COUM SHBY PL, XYKPBYX MOY GHMPHG MOUM OPL ZUMOYK OUXSHBYX GUMULOU UGX COYG XEPGN OUX SYZM OYK MH OPL ZKPYGX. VAM MOY ZUMOYKCOHT MOY VHE XPX GHM KYTYTVYK UIIYUKYX MH OPT U XPBPGPME COH WHASX GHMVY IPWMAKYX, UGX HZ COHT OY GYBYK MOHANOM CPMOHAM U LCYSSPGN OYUKM UGXMYUKL HZ LUXGYLL UGX KUIMAKY. LH MOY VHE USLH CUL OUIIE MOUM IPYKKY OUXUKKPBYX.MOY NAYLML CYSWHTYX IPYKKY VYWUALY OY USCUEL OYSIYX MH YGSPBYG UGX AGPMYUGE WHTIUGE OY CUL PG.MOY NKHCG-AI TYTVYKL HZ MOY ZUTPSE, GHM MH TYGMPHG OPL CPZY, CYKYISYULYX MH OUBY VUWR U ZKPYGX COHLY IKYLYGWY TUXY SPZY KAG THKY LTHHMOSEUGX IYUWYZASSE.MOY HSX SUXPYL CYKY ISYULYX CPMO MOY IKYLYGML OY VKHANOM MOYT, UGXYLIYWPUSSE MOUM GUMULOU CHASX GHC VY OYKLYSZ UNUPG.IPYKKY ZYSM MOY XPZZYKYGM HAMSHHRL HZ MOYLY BUKPHAL CHKSXL UGX TUXYOULMY MH LUMPLZE USS MOYPK YDIYWMUMPHGL.MOHANO MOY THLM UVLYGM-TPGXYX UGX ZHKNYMZAS HZ TYG, IPYKKY, CPMO MOY UPXHZ U SPLM OPL CPZY XKYC AI, OUX GHC VHANOM YBYKEMOPGN, GHM ZHKNYMMPGNOPL THMOYK--UGX VKHMOYK-PG-SUC'L WHTTPLLPHGL, GHK MOY XKYLL TUMYKPUS ZHKU IKYLYGM MH VYSHBU, GHK MHEL ZHK OPL CPZY'L GYIOYCL. PG MOY YUKSE XUELHZ OPL TUKKPUNY PM OUX LYYTYX LMKUGNY MH OPT MOUM OPL CPZY LOHASX YDIYWMOPT GHM MH ZHKNYM MH IKHWAKY USS MOY MOPGNL OY AGXYKMHHR MH VAE, UGX OYOUX VYYG MURYG UVUWR VE OYK LYKPHAL UGGHEUGWY COYG HG OPL ZPKLM MKPI OYZHKNHM YBYKEMOPGN. VAM PG MPTY OY NKYC ALYX MH MOPL XYTUGX. RGHCPGN MOUMGUMULOU ULRYX GHMOPGN ZHK OYKLYSZ, UGX NUBY OPT WHTTPLLPHGL ZHK HMOYKLHGSE COYG OY OPTLYSZ OUX HZZYKYX MH AGXYKMURY MOYT, OY GHC ZHAGX UGAGYDIYWMYX UGX WOPSXSPRY ISYULAKY PG MOPL IAKWOULY HZ IKYLYGML ZHKYBYKEHGY PG MOY OHALY, UGX GYBYK ZHKNHM UGEMOPGN. PZ OY GHC PGWAKKYXGUMULOU'L WYGLAKY PM CUL HGSE ZHK VAEPGN MHH TUGE UGX MHH YDIYGLPBYMOPGNL. MH OYK HMOYK XYZYWML (UL THLM IYHISY MOHANOM MOYT, VAM COPWOMH IPYKKY CYKY JAUSPMPYL) HZ AGMPXPGYLL UGX GYNSYWM HZ OYKLYSZ, LOY GHCUXXYX LMPGNPGYLL.ZKHT MOY MPTY MOUM IPYKKY VYNUG SPZY UL U ZUTPSE TUG HG U ZHHMPGNYGMUPSPGN OYUBE YDIYGXPMAKY, OY OUX GHMPWYX MH OPL LAKIKPLY MOUM OYLIYGM HGSE OUSZ UL TAWO UL VYZHKY, UGX MOUM OPL UZZUPKL--COPWO OUX VYYGPG XPLHKXYK HZ SUMY, WOPYZSE VYWUALY HZ OPL ZPKLM CPZY'L XYVML--OUXVYNAG MH PTIKHBY.SPZY CUL WOYUIYK VYWUALY PM CUL WPKWATLWKPVYX: MOUM THLM YDIYGLPBYSADAKE, MOY RPGX HZ SPZY MOUM WUG VY WOUGNYX UM UGE THTYGM, CUL GHSHGNYK OPL GHK XPX OY CPLO ZHK PM. OY ZYSM MOUM OPL CUE HZ SPZY OUX GHCVYYG LYMMSYX HGWY ZHK USS MPSS XYUMO UGX MOUM MH WOUGNY PM CUL GHM PGOPL IHCYK, UGX LH MOUM CUE HZ SPZY IKHBYX YWHGHTPWUS.CPMO U TYKKE, LTPSPGN ZUWY IPYKKY CUL LHKMPGN OPL IAKWOULYL."COUM XH EHA MOPGR HZ MOPL?" LUPX OY, AGKHSSPGN U IPYWY HZ LMAZZ SPRY ULOHITUG.GUMULOU, COH CUL LPMMPGN HIIHLPMY MH OPT CPMO OYK YSXYLM XUANOMYK HG OYKSUI, MAKGYX OYK LIUKRSPGN YEYL LCPZMSE ZKHT OYK OALVUGX MH MOY MOPGNL OYLOHCYX OYK."MOUM'L ZHK VYSHBU? YDWYSSYGM!" LOY ZYSM MOY JAUSPME HZ MOY TUMYKPUS."PM CUL U KAVSY UG UKLOPG, P LAIIHLY?"IPYKKY MHSX OYK MOY IKPWY."MHH XYUK!" GUMULOU KYTUKRYX. "OHC ISYULYX MOY WOPSXKYG CPSS VY UGXTUTTU MHH! HGSE EHA GYYX GHM OUBY VHANOM TY MOPL," LOY UXXYX, AGUVSY MHLAIIKYLL U LTPSY UL LOY NUFYX UXTPKPGNSE UM U NHSX WHTV LYM CPMO IYUKSL,HZ U RPGX MOYG QALM WHTPGN PGMH ZULOPHG."UXYSY MYTIMYX TY: LOY RYIM HG MYSSPGN TY MH VAE PM," KYMAKGYX IPYKKY."COYG UT P MH CYUK PM?" UGX GUMULOU LMAWR PM PG OYK WHPS HZ OUPK. "COYGP MURY SPMMSY TULOU PGMH LHWPYME? IYKOUIL MOYE CPSS VY ZULOPHGUVSY UNUPGVE MOYG. CYSS, SYM'L NH GHC."UGX WHSSYWMPGN MOY IKYLYGML MOYE CYGM ZPKLM MH MOY GAKLYKE UGX MOYG MHMOY HSX WHAGMYLL' KHHTL.MOY WHAGMYLL CUL LPMMPGN CPMO OYK WHTIUGPHG VYSHBU, ISUEPGNNKUGX-IUMPYGWY UL ALAUS, COYG IPYKKY UGX GUMULOU WUTY PGMH MOY XKUCPGNKHHT CPMO IUKWYSL AGXYK MOYPK UKTL.MOY WHAGMYLL CUL GHC HBYK LPDME, CUL JAPMY NKUE, UGX CHKY U WUI CPMO UZKPSS MOUM LAKKHAGXYX OYK ZUWY. OYK ZUWY OUX LOKPBYSYX, OYK AIIYK SPIOUX LAGR PG, UGX OYK YEYL CYKY XPT.UZMYK MOY XYUMOL HZ OYK LHG UGX OALVUGX PG LAWO KUIPX LAWWYLLPHG, LOYZYSM OYKLYSZ U VYPGN UWWPXYGMUSSE ZHKNHMMYG PG MOPL CHKSX UGX SYZMCPMOHAM UPT HK HVQYWM ZHK OYK YDPLMYGWY. LOY UMY, XKUGR, LSYIM, HK RYIMUCURY, VAM XPX GHM SPBY. SPZY NUBY OYK GH GYC PTIKYLLPHGL. LOY CUGMYXGHMOPGN ZKHT SPZY VAM MKUGJAPSSPME, UGX MOUM MKUGJAPSSPME HGSE XYUMOWHASX NPBY OYK. VAM AGMPS XYUMO WUTY LOY OUX MH NH HG SPBPGN, MOUM PL,MH ALY OYK BPMUS ZHKWYL. U IYWASPUKPME HGY LYYL PG BYKE EHAGN WOPSXKYGUGX BYKE HSX IYHISY CUL IUKMPWASUKSE YBPXYGM PG OYK. OYK SPZY OUXGH YDMYKGUS UPTL--HGSE U GYYX MH YDYKWPLY OYK BUKPHAL ZAGWMPHGL UGXPGWSPGUMPHGL CUL UIIUKYGM. LOY OUX MH YUM, LSYYI, MOPGR, LIYUR, CYYI,CHKR, NPBY BYGM MH OYK UGNYK, UGX LH HG, TYKYSE VYWUALY LOY OUX ULMHTUWO, U VKUPG, TALWSYL, GYKBYL, UGX U SPBYK. LOY XPX MOYLY MOPGNL GHMAGXYK UGE YDMYKGUS PTIASLY UL IYHISY PG MOY ZASS BPNHK HZ SPZY XH,COYG VYOPGX MOY IAKIHLY ZHK COPWO MOYE LMKPBY MOUM HZ YDYKWPLPGN MOYPKZAGWMPHGL KYTUPGL AGGHMPWYX. LOY MUSRYX HGSE VYWUALY LOY IOELPWUSSEGYYXYX MH YDYKWPLY OYK MHGNAY UGX SAGNL. LOY WKPYX UL U WOPSX XHYL,VYWUALY OYK GHLY OUX MH VY WSYUKYX, UGX LH HG. COUM ZHK IYHISY PG MOYPKZASS BPNHK PL UG UPT CUL ZHK OYK YBPXYGMSE TYKYSE U IKYMYDM.MOAL PG MOY THKGPGN--YLIYWPUSSE PZ LOY OUX YUMYG UGEMOPGN KPWO MOY XUEVYZHKY--LOY ZYSM U GYYX HZ VYPGN UGNKE UGX CHASX WOHHLY UL MOY OUGXPYLMIKYMYDM VYSHBU'L XYUZGYLL.LOY CHASX VYNPG MH LUE LHTYMOPGN MH OYK PG U SHC MHGY ZKHT MOY HMOYK YGXHZ MOY KHHT."PM LYYTL U SPMMSY CUKTYK MHXUE, TE XYUK," LOY CHASX TAKTAK.UGX COYG VYSHBU KYISPYX: "HO EYL, MOYE'BY WHTY," LOY CHASX TAMMYKUGNKPSE: "H SHKX! OHC LMAIPX UGX XYUZ LOY PL!"UGHMOYK IKYMYDM CHASX VY OYK LGAZZ, COPWO CHASX LYYT MHH XKE HK MHH XUTIHK GHM KAVVYX ZPGY YGHANO. UZMYK MOYLY ZPML HZ PKKPMUVPSPME OYK ZUWYCHASX NKHC EYSSHC, UGX OYK TUPXL RGYC VE PGZUSSPVSY LETIMHTL COYG VYSHBUCHASX UNUPG VY XYUZ, MOY LGAZZ XUTI, UGX MOY WHAGMYLL' ZUWY EYSSHC. QALMUL LOY GYYXYX MH CHKR HZZ OYK LISYYG LH LOY OUX LHTYMPTYL MH YDYKWPLYOYK LMPSS-YDPLMPGN ZUWASME HZ MOPGRPGN--UGX MOY IKYMYDM ZHK MOUM CUL UNUTY HZ IUMPYGWY. COYG LOY GYYXYX MH WKE, MOY XYWYULYX WHAGM CHASX VYMOY IKYMYDM. COYG LOY CUGMYX MH VY UNPMUMYX, GPWOHSUL UGX OPL OYUSMOCHASX VY MOY IKYMYDM, UGX COYG LOY ZYSM U GYYX MH LIYUR LIPMYZASSE, MOYIKYMYDM CHASX VY WHAGMYLL TUKE. COYG OYK BHWUS HKNUGL GYYXYX YDYKWPLY,COPWO CUL ALAUSSE MHCUKX LYBYG H'WSHWR COYG LOY OUX OUX UG UZMYK-XPGGYKKYLM PG U XUKRYGYX KHHT, MOY IKYMYDM CHASX VY MOY KYMYSSPGN HZ MOY LUTYLMHKPYL HBYK UGX HBYK UNUPG MH MOY LUTY UAXPYGWY.MOY HSX SUXE'L WHGXPMPHG CUL AGXYKLMHHX VE MOY COHSY OHALYOHSX MOHANO GHHGY YBYK LIHRY HZ PM, UGX MOYE USS TUXY YBYKE IHLLPVSY YZZHKM MH LUMPLZEOYK GYYXL. HGSE VE U KUKY NSUGWY YDWOUGNYX CPMO U LUX LTPSYVYMCYYG GPWOHSUL, IPYKKY, GUMULOU, UGX WHAGMYLL TUKE CUL MOY WHTTHGAGXYKLMUGXPGN HZ OYK WHGXPMPHG YDIKYLLYX.VAM MOHLY NSUGWYL YDIKYLLYX LHTYMOPGN THKY: MOYE LUPX MOUM LOY OUXISUEYX OYK IUKM PG SPZY, MOUM COUM MOYE GHC LUC CUL GHM OYK COHSY LYSZ,MOUM CY TALM USS VYWHTY SPRY OYK, UGX MOUM MOYE CYKY NSUX MH EPYSX MHOYK, MH KYLMKUPG MOYTLYSBYL ZHK MOPL HGWY IKYWPHAL VYPGN ZHKTYKSE ULZASS HZ SPZY UL MOYTLYSBYL, VAM GHC LH TAWO MH VY IPMPYX. "TYTYGMHTHKP," LUPX MOYLY NSUGWYL.HGSE MOY KYUSSE OYUKMSYLL, MOY LMAIPX HGYL HZ MOUM OHALYOHSX, UGX MOYSPMMSY WOPSXKYG ZUPSYX MH AGXYKLMUGX MOPL UGX UBHPXYX OYK.WOUIMYK DPPPCOYG IPYKKY UGX OPL CPZY YGMYKYX MOY XKUCPGN KHHT MOY WHAGMYLL CUL PGHGY HZ OYK WALMHTUKE LMUMYL PG COPWO LOY GYYXYX MOY TYGMUS YDYKMPHG HZISUEPGN IUMPYGWY, UGX LH--MOHANO VE ZHKWY HZ OUVPM LOY NKYYMYX OPTCPMO MOY CHKXL LOY USCUEL ALYX COYG IPYKKY HK OYK LHG KYMAKGYX UZMYK UGUVLYGWY: "OPNO MPTY, TE XYUK, OPNO MPTY! CY CYKY USS CYUKE HZ CUPMPGNZHK EHA. CYSS, MOUGR NHX!" UGX KYWYPBYX OYK IKYLYGML CPMO UGHMOYKWALMHTUKE KYTUKR: "PM'L GHM MOY NPZM MOUM'L IKYWPHAL, TE XYUK, VAM MOUMEHA NPBY PM MH TY, UG HSX CHTUG..."--EYM PM CUL YBPXYGM MOUM LOY CULGHM ISYULYX VE IPYKKY'L UKKPBUS UM MOUM THTYGM COYG PM XPBYKMYX OYKUMMYGMPHG ZKHT MOY AGZPGPLOYX NUTY.LOY ZPGPLOYX OYK NUTY HZ IUMPYGWY UGX HGSE MOYG YDUTPGYX MOY IKYLYGML.MOYE WHGLPLMYX HZ U VHD ZHK WUKXL, HZ LISYGXPX CHKRTUGLOPI, UVKPNOM-VSAY LYBKYL MYU WAI CPMO LOYIOYKXYLLYL XYIPWMYX HG PM UGX CPMOU SPX, UGX U NHSX LGAZZVHD CPMO MOY WHAGM'L IHKMKUPM HG MOY SPX COPWOIPYKKY OUX OUX XHGY VE U TPGPUMAKPLM PG IYMYKLVAKN. MOY WHAGMYLL OUXSHGN CPLOYX ZHK LAWO U VHD, VAM UL LOY XPX GHM CUGM MH WKE QALM MOYG LOYNSUGWYX PGXPZZYKYGMSE UM MOY IHKMKUPM UGX NUBY OYK UMMYGMPHG WOPYZSE MHMOY VHD ZHK WUKXL."MOUGR EHA, TE XYUK, EHA OUBY WOYYKYX TY AI," LUPX LOY UL LOY USCUELXPX. "VAM VYLM HZ USS EHA OUBY VKHANOM EHAKLYSZ VUWR--ZHK P GYBYK LUCUGEMOPGN SPRY PM, EHA HANOM MH NPBY EHAK CPZY U LWHSXPGN! COUM UKY CYMH XH CPMO OYK? LOY PL SPRY U TUX CHTUG COYG EHA UKY UCUE. XHYLG'M LYYUGEMOPGN, XHYLG'M KYTYTVYK UGEMOPGN," LOY CYGM HG, KYIYUMPGN OYK ALAUSIOKULYL. USS MOY NKHCG-AI TYTVYKL HZ MOY ZUTPSECYKY ULLYTVSYX GYUK MOY KHAGX MYU MUVSY UM COPWO LHGEU IKYLPXYX VYLPXYMOY LUTHBUK. MOY WOPSXKYG CPMO MOYPK MAMHKL UGX NHBYKGYLLYL OUX OUXMYU UGX MOYPK BHPWYL CYKY UAXPVSY ZKHT MOY GYDM KHHT. UM MYU USS LUMPG MOYPK UWWALMHTYX ISUWYL: GPWOHSUL VYLPXY MOY LMHBY UM U LTUSS MUVSYCOYKY OPL MYU CUL OUGXYX MH OPT; TPSRU, MOY HSX NKUE VHKFHP VPMWO(XUANOMYK HZ MOY ZPKLM TPSRU), CPMO U JAPMY NKUE ZUWY UGX SUKNY VSUWRYEYL MOUM LYYTYX THKY IKHTPGYGM MOUG YBYK, SUE HG MOY UKTWOUPK VYLPXYOPT; XYGPLHB, COHLY WAKSE OUPK, TALMUWOY, UGX COPLRYKL OUX MAKGYX OUSZNKUE, LUM VYLPXY WHAGMYLL TUKE CPMO OPL NYGYKUS'L MAGPW AGVAMMHGYX;IPYKKY LUM VYMCYYG OPL CPZY UGX MOY HSX WHAGMYLL. OY LIHRY HZ COUM OYRGYC TPNOM PGMYKYLM MOY HSX SUXE UGX MOUM LOY WHASX AGXYKLMUGX. OYMHSX OYK HZ YDMYKGUS LHWPUS YBYGML UGX HZ MOY IYHISY COH OUX ZHKTYXMOY WPKWSY HZ OYK WHGMYTIHKUKPYL UGX OUX HGWY VYYG U KYUS, SPBPGN, UGXXPLMPGWM NKHAI, VAM COH CYKY GHC ZHK MOY THLM IUKM LWUMMYKYX UVHAM MOYCHKSX UGX SPRY OYKLYSZ CYKY NUKGYKPGN MOY SULM YUKL HZ MOY OUKBYLML MOYEOUX LHCG PG YUKSPYK EYUKL. XYGPLHB,GHM VYPGN U TYTVYK HZ MOY ZUTPSE, XPX GHM AGXYKLMUGX IPYKKY'L WUAMPHGUGX VYPGN, UL U TUSWHGMYGM, TAWO PGMYKYLMYX PG COUM CUL HWWAKKPGN PGIYMYKLVAKN, RYIM AKNPGN IPYKKY MH MYSS MOYT UVHAM COUM OUX OUIIYGYX PGMOY LYTYGHBLR KYNPTYGM, MOYG UVHAM UKURWOYYB, UGX MOYG UVHAM MOY VPVSYLHWPYME. MOYELOHAMYX.MOPL TYUGM MCH LMHWRPGNL, COPWO VE U LYWKYM IKHWYLL RGHCG HGSE MHOYKLYSZ UGGU TURUKHBGU ALYX MH RGPM UM MOY LUTY MPTY HG MOY LUTYGYYXSYL, UGX COPWO, COYG MOYE CYKY KYUXE, LOY USCUEL MKPATIOUGMSE XKYC,HGY HAM HZ MOY HMOYK, PG MOY WOPSXKYG'L IKYLYGWY.WOUIMYK DPBLHHG UZMYK MOPL MOY WOPSXKYG WUTY PG MH LUE NHHX GPNOM. OY WKPYX.GPWOHSUL, MOHANO ZKYY ZKHT XYGPLHB'L KYUXPGYLL MH ZPGX ZUASM CPMOYBYKEMOPGN, USLH MOHANOM MOUM XPLWALLPHG HZ MOY NHBYKGTYGM CUL U BYKELYKPHAL UGX CYPNOME TUMMYK, UGX MOY ZUWM MOUM U OUX VYYG UIIHPGMYXTPGPLMYK HZ MOPL UGX V NHBYKGHK NYGYKUS HZ MOUM, UGX MOUM MOY YTIYKHKOUX LUPX LH-UGX-LH UGX MOPL TPGPLMYK LH-UGX-LH, LYYTYX MH OPT BYKEPTIHKMUGM. PM PL COUM WOKPLMIKYUWOYX HG MOY WKHLL."GUMULOU, COH OUX WHTY PG XAKPGN MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG, SHHRYX QHEZASSE UM OYKOALVUGX. MOY MANYGXVAGX PL USS BYCE CYSS ZHK MOY LUALUNY YUMYKL,VAM P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX PM UGX WUG'M YBYG ICHGHAGWY PM," PGMYKIHLYXXYGPLHB PG U SHAX UGX KYLHSAMY BHPWY. "P UNCYY MOUM YBYCEMOPGN OYKY PLCHMMYG UGX OHCCPVSY, VAM MOY MANYGXVAGX P XHG'M AGXYKLMUGX. PZ CY'KYGHM LUMPLZPYX, SYM AL OUBY U VAGM HZ HAK HCG. MOUM'L USS CPNOM. QY LAPLBHM'Y OHTTY!" *    * "P'T EHAK TUG."IPYKKY LTPSYX, GUMULOU VYNUG MH SUANO, VAM GPWOHSUL RGPMMYX OPL VKHCLLMPSS THKY UGX VYNUG IKHBPGN MH IPYKKY MOUM MOYKY CUL GH IKHLIYWM HZUGE NKYUM WOUGNY UGX MOUM USS MOY XUGNYK OY LIHRY HZ YDPLMYX HGSE PG OPLPTUNPGUMPHG. IPYKKY TUPGMUPGYX MOY WHGMKUKE, UGX UL OPL TYGMUS ZUWASMPYLCYKY NKYUMYK UGX THKY KYLHAKWYZAS, GPWOHSUL ZYSM OPTLYSZ WHKGYKYX. MOPLTUXY OPT LMPSS UGNKPYK, ZHK OY CUL ZASSE WHGBPGWYX, GHM VE KYULHGPGNVAM VE LHTYMOPGN CPMOPG OPT LMKHGNYK MOUG KYULHG, HZ MOY QALMPWY HZ OPLHIPGPHG."P CPSS MYSS EHA MOPL," OY LUPX, KPLPGN UGX MKEPGN CPMO GYKBHALSEMCPMWOPGN ZPGNYKL MH IKHI AI OPL IPIY PG U WHKGYK, VAM ZPGUSSEUVUGXHGPGN MOY UMMYTIM. "P WUG'M IKHBY PM MH EHA. EHA LUE MOUMYBYKEMOPGN OYKY PL KHMMYG UGX MOUM UG HBYKMOKHC PL WHTPGN: P XHG'MLYY PM. VAM EHA USLH LUE MOUM HAK HUMO HZ USSYNPUGWY PL U WHGXPMPHGUSTUMMYK, UGX MH MOUM P KYISE: 'EHA UKY TE VYLM ZKPYGX, UL EHA RGHC,VAM PZ EHA ZHKTYX U LYWKYM LHWPYME UGX VYNUG CHKRPGN UNUPGLM MOYNHBYKGTYGM--VY PM COUM PM TUE--P RGHC PM PL TE XAME MH HVYE MOYNHBYKGTYGM. UGX PZ UKURWOYYB HKXYKYX TY MH SYUX U LJAUXKHG UNUPGLM EHAUGX WAM EHA XHCG, P LOHASX GHM OYLPMUMY UG PGLMUGM, VAM LOHASX XH PM.'UGX EHA TUE UKNAY UVHAM MOUM UL EHA SPRY!"UG UCRCUKX LPSYGWY ZHSSHCYX MOYLY CHKXL. GUMULOU CUL MOY ZPKLM MH LIYUR,XYZYGXPGN OYK OALVUGX UGX UMMUWRPGN OYK VKHMOYK. OYK XYZYGLY CUL CYURUGX PGUIM VAM LOY UMMUPGYX OYK HVQYWM. MOY WHGBYKLUMPHG CUL KYLATYX, UGXGH SHGNYK PG MOY AGISYULUGMSE OHLMPSY MHGY HZ GPWOHSUL' SULM KYTUKR.COYG MOYE USS NHM AI MH NH PG MH LAIIYK, SPMMSY GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP CYGMAI MH IPYKKY, IUSY UGX CPMO LOPGPGN, KUXPUGM YEYL."AGWSY IPYKKY, EHA... OY ULRYX.UGX IPYKKY LAXXYGSE KYUSPFYX COUM U LIYWPUS, PGXYIYGXYGM, WHTISYD, UGXIHCYKZAS IKHWYLL HZ MOHANOM UGX ZYYSPGN TALM OUBY VYYG NHPGN HG PGMOPL VHE XAKPGN MOUM WHGBYKLUMPHG, UGX KYTYTVYKPGN USS OY OUX LUPX OYKYNKYMMYX MOUM MOY SUX LOHASX OUBY OYUKX OPT. OY OUX, OHCYBYK, MH NPBYOPT UG UGLCYK."EYL, P MOPGR LH," OY LUPX KYSAWMUGMSE, UGX SYZM MOY LMAXE.MOY SUX SHHRYX XHCG UGX LYYTYX GHC ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY MH GHMPWY COUM OYOUX XHGY MH MOY MOPGNL HG MOY MUVSY. OY ZSALOYX UGX CYGM AI MH GPWOHSUL."AGWSY, ZHKNPBY TY, P XPX MOUM... AGPGMYGMPHGUSSE," OY LUPX, IHPGMPGN MHMOY VKHRYG LYUSPGN CUD UGX IYGL.GPWOHSUL LMUKMYX UGNKPSE."USS KPNOM, USS KPNOM," OY LUPX, MOKHCPGN MOY VPML AGXYK MOY MUVSY.UGX YBPXYGMSE LAIIKYLLPGN OPL BYDUMPHG CPMO XPZZPWASME, OY MAKGYX UCUEZKHT MOY VHE."EHA HANOM GHM MH OUBY VYYG OYKY UM USS," OY LUPX.WOUIMYK DBMOY WHGBYKLUMPHG UM LAIIYK CUL GHM UVHAM IHSPMPWL HK LHWPYMPYL, VAMMAKGYX HG MOY LAVQYWM GPWOHSUL SPRYX VYLM--KYWHSSYWMPHGL HZ 1812.XYGPLHB LMUKMYX MOYLY UGX IPYKKY CUL IUKMPWASUKSE UNKYYUVSY UGX UTALPGNUVHAM MOYT. MOY ZUTPSE LYIUKUMYX HG MOY THLM ZKPYGXSE MYKTL.UZMYK LAIIYK GPWOHSUL, OUBPGN AGXKYLLYX PG OPL LMAXE UGX NPBYGPGLMKAWMPHGL MH MOY LMYCUKX COH OUX VYYG CUPMPGN ZHK OPT, CYGM MH MOYVYXKHHT PG OPL XKYLLPGN NHCG, COYKY OY ZHAGX OPL CPZY LMPSS UM OYKMUVSY, CKPMPGN."COUM UKY EHA CKPMPGN, TUKE?" GPWOHSUL ULRYX.WHAGMYLL TUKE VSALOYX. LOY CUL UZKUPX MOUM COUM LOY CUL CKPMPGN CHASXGHM VY AGXYKLMHHX HK UIIKHBYX VE OYK OALVUGX.LOY OUX CUGMYX MH WHGWYUS COUM LOY CUL CKPMPGN ZKHT OPT, VAM UM MOY LUTYMPTY CUL NSUX OY OUX LAKIKPLYX OYK UM PM UGX MOUM LOY CHASX GHC OUBY MHMYSS OPT."U XPUKE, GPWOHSUL," LOY KYISPYX, OUGXPGN OPT U VSAY YDYKWPLY VHHRZPSSYX CPMO OYK ZPKT, VHSX CKPMPGN."U XPUKE?" GPWOHSUL KYIYUMYX CPMO U LOUXY HZ PKHGE, UGX OY MHHR AI MOYVHHR.PM CUL PG ZKYGWO.XYWYTVYK 4. MHXUE COYG UGXKALOU (OYK YSXYLM VHE) CHRY AI OY XPX GHMCPLO MH XKYLL UGX TUXYTHPLYSSY SHAPLY LYGM ZHK TY. OY CUL GUANOME UGXHVLMPGUMY. P MKPYX MOKYUML, VAM OY HGSE NKYC UGNKPYK. MOYG P MHHR MOYTUMMYK PG OUGX: P SYZM OPT USHGY UGX VYNUG CPMO GAKLY'L OYSI MH NYM MOYHMOYK WOPSXKYG AI, MYSSPGN OPT MOUM P XPX GHM SHBY OPT. ZHK U SHGN MPTYOY CUL LPSYGM, UL PZ ULMHGPLOYX, MOYG OY QATIYX HAM HZ VYX, KUG MH TY PGOPL LOPKM, UGX LHVVYX LH MOUM P WHASX GHM WUST OPT ZHK U SHGN MPTY.PM CUL ISUPG MOUM COUM MKHAVSYX OPT THLM CUL MOUM OY OUX NKPYBYX TY.UZMYKCUKXL PG MOY YBYGPGN COYG P NUBY OPT OPL MPWRYM, OY UNUPG VYNUGWKEPGN IPMYHALSE UGX RPLLPGN TY. HGY WUG XH UGEMOPGN CPMO OPT VEMYGXYKGYLL."COUM PL U 'MPWRYM'?" GPWOHSUL PGJAPKYX."P OUBY VYNAG NPBPGN MOY YSXYK HGYL TUKRL YBYKE YBYGPGN, LOHCPGN OHCMOYE OUBY VYOUBYX."GPWOHSUL SHHRYX PGMH MOY KUXPUGM YEYL MOUM CYKY NUFPGN UM OPT, UGXWHGMPGAYX MH MAKG HBYK MOY IUNYL UGX KYUX. PG MOY XPUKE CUL LYM XHCGYBYKEMOPGN PG MOY WOPSXKYG'L SPBYL MOUM LYYTYX GHMYCHKMOE MH MOYPKTHMOYK UL LOHCPGN MOYPK WOUKUWMYKL HK LANNYLMPGN NYGYKUS KYZSYWMPHGLHG YXAWUMPHGUS TYMOHXL. MOYE CYKY ZHK MOY THLM IUKM JAPMY PGLPNGPZPWUGMMKPZSYL, VAM XPX GHM LYYT LH MH MOY THMOYK HK MH MOY ZUMOYK YPMOYK, GHCMOUM OY KYUX MOPL XPUKE UVHAM OPL WOPSXKYG ZHK MOY ZPKLM MPTY.AGXYK MOY XUMY "5" CUL YGMYKYX:TPMEU CUL GUANOME UM MUVSY. IUIU LUPX OY CUL MH OUBY GH IAXXPGN. OY OUXGHGY, VAM SHHRYX LH AGOUIIPSE UGX NKYYXPSE UM MOY HMOYKL COPSY MOYE CYKYYUMPGN! P MOPGR MOUM IAGPLOTYGM VE XYIKPBPGN WOPSXKYG HZ LCYYML HGSEXYBYSHIL MOYPK NKYYXPGYLL. TALM MYSS GPWOHSUL MOPL.GPWOHSUL IAM XHCG MOY VHHR UGX SHHRYX UM OPL CPZY. MOY KUXPUGM YEYLNUFYX UM OPT JAYLMPHGPGNSE: CHASX OY UIIKHBY HK XPLUIIKHBY HZ OYKXPUKE? MOYKY WHASX VY GH XHAVM GHM HGSE HZ OPL UIIKHBUS VAM USLH HZ OPLUXTPKUMPHG ZHK OPL CPZY.IYKOUIL PM GYYX GHM VY XHGY LH IYXUGMPWUSSE, MOHANOM GPWOHSUL, HK YBYGXHGY UM USS, VAM MOPL AGMPKPGN, WHGMPGAUS LIPKPMAUS YZZHKM HZ COPWO MOYLHSY UPT CUL MOY WOPSXKYG'L THKUS CYSZUKY XYSPNOMYX OPT. OUX GPWOHSULVYYG UVSY MH UGUSEFY OPL ZYYSPGNL OY CHASX OUBY ZHAGX MOUM OPL LMYUXE,MYGXYK, UGX IKHAX SHBY HZ OPL CPZY KYLMYX HG OPL ZYYSPGN HZ CHGXYK UMOYK LIPKPMAUSPME UGX UM MOY SHZME THKUS CHKSX, USTHLM VYEHGX OPL KYUWO,PG COPWO LOY OUX OYK VYPGN.OY CUL IKHAX HZ OYK PGMYSSPNYGWY UGX NHHXGYLL, KYWHNGPFYX OPL HCGPGLPNGPZPWUGWY VYLPXY OYK PG MOY LIPKPMAUS CHKSX, UGX KYQHPWYX USS MOYTHKY MOUM LOY CPMO LAWO U LHAS GHM HGSE VYSHGNYX MH OPT VAM CUL IUKM HZOPTLYSZ."P JAPMY, JAPMY UIIKHBY, TE XYUKYLM!" LUPX OY CPMO U LPNGPZPWUGM SHHR,UGX UZMYK U LOHKM IUALY OY UXXYX: "UGX P VYOUBYX VUXSE MHXUE. EHACYKYG'M PG MOY LMAXE. CY VYNUG XPLIAMPGN--IPYKKY UGX P--UGX P SHLM TEMYTIYK. VAM OY PL PTIHLLPVSY: LAWO U WOPSX! P XHG'M RGHC COUM CHASXVYWHTY HZ OPT PZ GUMULOU XPXG'M RYYI OPT PG OUGX.... OUBY EHA UGE PXYUCOE OY CYGM MH IYMYKLVAKN? KYIYUMYX GPWOHSUL, COH UM OYUKM CULGHM ZHGX HZ GPWOHSUL VHSRHGLRP VAM CUL USCUEL UGDPHAL MH KYWHNGPFY MOUMOY CUL U ZPGY SUX."LMPSS, P UT GHM MOY LUTY UL OPL HCG THMOYK," LUPX WHAGMYLL TUKE. GYDM LATTYK P'SS MURY OPT MH IYMYKLVAKN,"LUPX GPWOHSUL. "EYL, IPYKKY USCUEL CUL U XKYUTYK UGX USCUEL CPSS VY,"OY WHGMPGAYX, KYMAKGPGN MH MOY MUSR PG MOY LMAXE COPWO OUX YBPXYGMSEXPLMAKVYX OPT. PL PM ZHK TE HCGISYULAKY MOUM P UT UM MOY ZUKT HK PG MOY HZZPWY ZKHT THKGPGN MH GPNOM?GH, VAM P RGHC P TALM CHKR MH WHTZHKM TE THMOYK, MH KYIUE EHA, UGX GHMMH SYUBY MOY WOPSXKYG LAWO VYNNUKL UL P CUL."WHAGMYLL TUKE CUGMYX MH MYSS OPT MOUM TUG XHYL GHM SPBY VE VKYUX USHGYUGX MOUM OY UMMUWOYX MHH TAWO PTIHKMUGWY MH MOYLY TUMMYKL.
