PG UG YDWYSSYGM IHLPMPHG."WHAGMYLL TUKE SPLMYGYX MH OYK OALVUGX UGX AGXYKLMHHX USS MOUM OY MHSXOYK. LOY RGYC MOUM COYG OY MOHANOM USHAX PG MOPL CUE OY CHASX LHTYMPTYLULR OYK COUM OY OUX VYYG LUEPGN, UGX VY BYDYX PZ OY GHMPWYX MOUM LOYOUX VYYG MOPGRPGN UVHAM LHTYMOPGN YSLY. VAM LOY OUX MH ZHKWY OYKLYSZ MHUMMYGX, ZHK COUM OY CUL LUEPGN XPX GHM PGMYKYLM OYK UM USS. LOY SHHRYXUM OPT UGX XPX GHM MOPGR, VAM ZYSM, UVHAM LHTYMOPGN XPZZYKYGM. LOY ZYSMU LAVTPLLPBY MYGXYK SHBY ZHK MOPL TUG COH CHASX GYBYK AGXYKLMUGX USSMOUM LOY AGXYKLMHHX, UGX MOPL LYYTYX MH TURY OYK SHBY ZHK OPT LMPSSLMKHGNYK UGX UXXYX U MHAWO HZ IULLPHGUMY MYGXYKGYLL. VYLPXYL MOPLZYYSPGN COPWO UVLHKVYX OYK USMHNYMOYK UGX OPGXYKYX OYK ZKHT ZHSSHCPGNMOY XYMUPSL HZ OYK OALVUGX'L ISUGL, MOHANOML MOUM OUX GH WHGGYWMPHG CPMOCOUM OY CUL LUEPGN ZSPMMYX MOKHANO OYK TPGX. LOY MOHANOM HZ OYK GYIOYC.OYK OALVUGX'L UWWHAGM HZ MOY VHE'L UNPMUMPHG COPSY IPYKKY CUL LIYURPGNLMKAWR OYK ZHKWPVSE, UGX BUKPHAL MKUPML HZ OPL NYGMSY, LYGLPMPBYWOUKUWMYK KYWAKKYX MH OYK TPGX; UGX COPSY MOPGRPGN HZ OYK GYIOYC LOYMOHANOM USLH HZ OYK HCG WOPSXKYG. LOY XPX GHM WHTIUKY MOYT CPMO OPT, VAMWHTIUKYX OYK ZYYSPGN ZHK MOYT CPMO OYK ZYYSPGN ZHK OPT, UGX ZYSMCPMO KYNKYM MOUM MOYKY CUL LHTYMOPGN SUWRPGN PG OYK ZYYSPGN ZHK EHAGNGPWOHSUL.LHTYMPTYL PM LYYTYX MH OYK MOUM MOPL XPZZYKYGWY UKHLY ZKHT MOYXPZZYKYGWY PG MOYPK UNYL, VAM LOY ZYSM OYKLYSZ MH VSUTY MHCUKX OPT UGXIKHTPLYX PG OYK OYUKM MH XH VYMMYK UGX MH UWWHTISPLO MOY PTIHLLPVSY--PGMOPL SPZY MH SHBY OYK OALVUGX, OYK WOPSXKYG, SPMMSY GPWOHSUL, UGX USSOYK GYPNOVHKL, UL WOKPLM SHBYX TUGRPGX. WHAGMYLL TUKE'L LHAS USCUELLMKHBY MHCUKX MOY PGZPGPMY, MOY YMYKGUS, UGX MOY UVLHSAMY, UGX WHASXMOYKYZHKY GYBYK VY UM IYUWY. U LMYKG YDIKYLLPHG HZ MOY SHZME, LYWKYMLAZZYKPGN HZ U LHAS VAKXYGYX VE MOY VHXE UIIYUKYX HG OYK ZUWY. GPWOHSULNUFYX UM OYK. "H NHX! COUM CPSS VYWHTY HZ AL PZ LOY XPYL, UL P USCUELZYUK COYG OYK ZUWY PL SPRY MOUM?" MOHANOM OY, UGX ISUWPGN OPTLYSZ VYZHKYMOY PWHG OY VYNUG MH LUE OPL YBYGPGN IKUEYKL.WOUIMYK DBPGUMULOU UGX IPYKKY, SYZM USHGY, USLH VYNUG MH MUSR UL HGSE U OALVUGXUGX CPZY WUG MUSR, MOUM PL, CPMO YDMKUHKXPGUKE WSYUKGYLL UGX KUIPXPME,AGXYKLMUGXPGN UGX YDIKYLLPGN YUWO HMOYK'L MOHANOML PG CUEL WHGMKUKE MHUSS KASYL HZ SHNPW, CPMOHAM IKYTPLYL, XYXAWMPHGL, HK WHGWSALPHGL, UGX PGU JAPMY IYWASPUK CUE. GUMULOU CUL LH ALYX MH MOPL RPGX HZ MUSR CPMO OYKOALVUGX MOUM ZHK OYK PM CUL MOY LAKYLM LPNG HZ LHTYMOPGN VYPGN CKHGNVYMCYYG MOYT PZ IPYKKY ZHSSHCYX U SPGY HZ SHNPWUS KYULHGPGN. COYG OYVYNUG IKHBPGN UGEMOPGN, HK MUSRPGN UKNATYGMUMPBYSE UGX WUSTSE UGX LOY,SYX HG VE OPL YDUTISY, VYNUG MH XH MOY LUTY, LOY RGYC MOUM MOYE CYKY HGMOY BYKNY HZ U JAUKKYS.ZKHT MOY THTYGM MOYE CYKY USHGY UGX GUMULOU WUTY AI MH OPT CPMOCPXY-HIYG OUIIE YEYL, UGX JAPWRSE LYPFPGN OPL OYUX IKYLLYX PM MH OYKVHLHT, LUEPGN: "GHC EHA UKY USS TPGY, TPGY! EHA CHG'M YLWUIY!"--ZKHTMOUM THTYGM MOPL WHGBYKLUMPHG VYNUG, WHGMKUKE MH USS MOY SUCL HZ SHNPWUGX WHGMKUKE MH MOYT VYWUALY JAPMY XPZZYKYGM LAVQYWML CYKY MUSRYX UVHAMUM HGY UGX MOY LUTY MPTY. MOPL LPTASMUGYHAL XPLWALLPHG HZ TUGE MHIPWLXPX GHM IKYBYGM U WSYUK AGXYKLMUGXPGN VAM HG MOY WHGMKUKE CUL MOY LAKYLMLPNG MOUM MOYE ZASSE AGXYKLMHHX HGY UGHMOYK.QALM UL PG U XKYUT COYG USS PL AGWYKMUPG, AGKYULHGPGN, UGXWHGMKUXPWMHKE, YDWYIM MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM NAPXYL MOY XKYUT, LH PG MOPLPGMYKWHAKLY WHGMKUKE MH USS SUCL HZ KYULHG, MOY CHKXL MOYTLYSBYL CYKYGHM WHGLYWAMPBY UGX WSYUK VAM HGSE MOY ZYYSPGN MOUM IKHTIMYX MOYT.GUMULOU LIHRY MH IPYKKY UVHAM OYK VKHMOYK'L SPZY UGX XHPGNL, HZ OHC LOYOUX LAZZYKYX UGX SUWRYX SPZY XAKPGN OPL HCG UVLYGWY, UGX HZ OHC LOYCUL ZHGXYK MOUG YBYK HZ TUKE, UGX OHC TUKE CUL PG YBYKE CUE VYMMYK MOUGOYKLYSZ. PG LUEPGN MOPL GUMULOU CUL LPGWYKY PG UWRGHCSYXNPGN TUKE'LLAIYKPHKPME, VAM UM MOY LUTY MPTY VE LUEPGN PM LOY TUXY U XYTUGX HGIPYKKY MOUM OY LOHASX, USS MOY LUTY, IKYZYK OYK MH TUKE UGX MH USSHMOYK CHTYG, UGX MOUM GHC, YLIYWPUSSE UZMYK OUBPGN LYYG TUGE CHTYG PGIYMYKLVAKN, OY LOHASX MYSS OYK LH UZKYLO.IPYKKY, UGLCYKPGN GUMULOU'L CHKXL, MHSX OYK OHC PGMHSYKUVSY PM OUX VYYGZHK OPT MH TYYM SUXPYL UM XPGGYKL UGX VUSSL PG IYMYKLVAKN."P OUBY JAPMY SHLM MOY RGUWR HZ MUSRPGN MH SUXPYL," OY LUPX. "PM CULLPTISE XASS. VYLPXYL, P CUL BYKE VALE."GUMULOU SHHRYX PGMYGMSE UM OPT UGX CYGM HG:"TUKE PL LH LISYGXPX," LOY LUPX. "OHC LOY AGXYKLMUGXL WOPSXKYG! PM PL ULPZ LOY LUC LMKUPNOM PGMH MOYPK LHASL. EYLMYKXUE, ZHK PGLMUGWY, TPMEU CULGUANOME...""OHC SPRY OPL ZUMOYK OY PL," IPYKKY PGMYKQYWMYX.GUMULOU RGYC COE OY TYGMPHGYX TPMEU'L SPRYGYLL MH GPWOHSUL: MOYKYWHSSYWMPHG HZ OPL XPLIAMY CPMO OPL VKHMOYK-PG-SUC CUL AGISYULUGM UGXOY CUGMYX MH RGHC COUM GUMULOU MOHANOM HZ PM."GPWOHSUL OUL MOY CYURGYLL HZ GYBYK UNKYYPGN CPMO UGEMOPGN GHM NYGYKUSSEUWWYIMYX. VAM P AGXYKLMUGX MOUM EHA BUSAY COUM HIYGL AI U ZKYLO SPGY,"LUPX LOY, KYIYUMPGN CHKXL IPYKKY OUX HGWY AMMYKYX."GH, MOY WOPYZ IHPGM PL MOUM MH GPWOHSUL PXYUL UGX XPLWALLPHGL UKYUG UTALYTYGM--USTHLM U IULMPTY," LUPX IPYKKY. "ZHK PGLMUGWY, OY PLWHSSYWMPGN U SPVKUKE UGX OUL TUXY PM U KASY GHM MH VAE U GYC VHHRMPSS OY OUL KYUX COUM OY OUX USKYUXE VHANOM--LPLTHGXP UGX KHALLYUA UGXTHGMYLJAPYA," OY UXXYX CPMO U LTPSY. "EHA RGHC OHC TAWO P..." VYLPXYL, COYG P CUL PGIYMYKLVAKN P ZYSM (P WUG LUE MOPL MH EHA) MOUM MOY COHSY UZZUPK CHASX NHMH IPYWYL CPMOHAM TY--YBYKEHGY CUL IASSPGN OPL HCG CUE. VAM P LAWWYYXYXPG AGPMPGN MOYT USS; UGX MOYG TE PXYU PL LH WSYUK UGX LPTISY. EHA LYY,P XHG'M LUE MOUM CY HANOM MH HIIHLY MOPL UGX MOUM. CY TUE VY TPLMURYG.COUM P LUE PL: 'QHPG OUGXL, EHA COH SHBY MOY KPNOM, UGX SYM MOYKY VY VAMHGY VUGGYK--MOUM HZ UWMPBY BPKMAY.' MOYE XYLWKPVYXMOY UWMPBPME HZ PGXPBPXAUSL COH KASYX MOY IYHISY, UGX KYNUKXYX MOYUWMPBPME HZ MOHLY TYG UL KYIKYLYGMPGN MOY UWMPBPME HZ MOY COHSY GUMPHG.MOY JAYLMPHG: OHC XPX PGXPBPXAUSL TURY GUMPHGL UWM UL MOYE CPLOYX UGX VECOUM CUL MOY CPSS HZ MOYLY PGXPBPXAUSL MOYTLYSBYL NAPXYX? PGLMYUX HZ MOYZHKTYK XPBPGYSE UIIHPGMYX UPTL HZ MOY QYCPLO, NKYYR, HK KHTUG GUMPHGL,COPWO UGWPYGM OPLMHKPUGL KYNUKXYX UL KYIKYLYGMPGN MOY IKHNKYLL HZOATUGPME, THXYKG OPLMHKE OUL IHLMASUMYX PML HCG UPTL--MOY CYSZUKY HZ MOYZKYGWO, NYKTUG, HK YGNSPLO IYHISY, HK, PG PML OPNOYLM UVLMKUWMPHG, MOYCYSZUKY UGX WPBPSPFUMPHG HZ OATUGPME PG NYGYKUS, VE COPWO PL ALAUSSETYUGM MOUM HZ MOY IYHISYL HWWAIEPGN U LTUSS GHKMOCYLMYKSE IHKMPHG HZ USUKNY WHGMPGYGM.THXYKG OPLMHKE OUL KYQYWMYX MOY VYSPYZL HZ MOY UGWPYGML CPMOHAMKYISUWPGN MOYT VE U GYC WHGWYIMPHG, UGX MOY SHNPW HZ MOY LPMAUMPHG OULHVSPNYX MOY OPLMHKPUGL, UZMYK MOYE OUX UIIUKYGMSE KYQYWMYX MOY XPBPGYUAMOHKPME HZ MOY RPGNL UGX MOY "ZUMY" HZ MOY UGWPYGML, MH KYUWO MOY LUTYWHGWSALPHG VE UGHMOYK KHUX, MOUM PL, MH KYWHNGPFY (1) GUMPHGL NAPXYXVE PGXPBPXAUS TYG, UGX (2) MOY YDPLMYGWY HZ U RGHCG UPT MH COPWO MOYLYGUMPHGL UGX OATUGPME UM SUKNY UKY MYGXPGN.UM MOY VULPL HZ MOY CHKRL HZ USS MOY THXYKG OPLMHKPUGL ZKHT NPVVHG MHVAWRSY, XYLIPMY MOYPK LYYTPGN XPLUNKYYTYGML UGX MOY UIIUKYGM GHBYSME HZMOYPK HAMSHHRL, SPY MOHLY MCH HSX, AGUBHPXUVSY ULLATIMPHGL.PG MOY ZPKLM ISUWY MOY OPLMHKPUG XYLWKPVYL MOY UWMPBPME HZ PGXPBPXAUSLCOH PG OPL HIPGPHG OUBY XPKYWMYX OATUGPME (HGY OPLMHKPUG WHGLPXYKLHGSE THGUKWOL, NYGYKUSL, UGX TPGPLMYKL UL VYPGN LAWO TYG, COPSY UGHMOYKPGWSAXYL USLH HKUMHKL, SYUKGYX TYG, KYZHKTYKL, IOPSHLHIOYKL, UGX IHYML).LYWHGXSE, PM PL ULLATYX MOUM MOY NHUS MHCUKX COPWO OATUGPME PL VYPGN SYXPL RGHCG MH MOY OPLMHKPUGL: MH HGY HZ MOYT MOPL NHUS PL MOY NKYUMGYLL HZMOY KHTUG, LIUGPLO, HK ZKYGWO KYUST; MH UGHMOYK PM PL SPVYKME, YJAUSPME,UGX U WYKMUPG RPGX HZ WPBPSPFUMPHG HZ U LTUSS WHKGYK HZ MOY CHKSX WUSSYXYAKHIY.PG 1789 U ZYKTYGM UKPLYL PG IUKPL; PM NKHCL, LIKYUXL, UGX PL YDIKYLLYXVE U THBYTYGM HZ IYHISYL ZKHT CYLM MH YULM. MOYWHAGMYK THBYTYGM KYUWOYL MOY LMUKMPGN IHPGM HZ MOY ZPKLM THBYTYGM PG MOYCYLM--IUKPL--UGX LAVLPXYL.XAKPGN MOUM MCYGME-EYUK IYKPHX UG PTTYGLY GATVYK HZ ZPYSXL CYKY SYZMAGMPSSYX, OHALYL CYKY VAKGYX, MKUXY WOUGNYX PML XPKYWMPHG, TPSSPHGLHZ TYG TPNKUMYX, CYKY PTIHBYKPLOYX, HK CYKY YGKPWOYX, UGX TPSSPHGLHZ WOKPLMPUG TYG IKHZYLLPGN MOY SUC HZ SHBY HZ MOYPK ZYSSHCL LSYC HGYUGHMOYK.COUM XHYL USS MOPL TYUG? P KUPLY TE UKT MH IYKZHKT UG UWMPHGPGXYIYGXYGMSE HZ UGE WUALY, VAM TE CPLO MH IYKZHKT UG UWMPHG CPMOHAM UWUALY PL MOY WUALY HZ TE UWMPHG.VAM YBYG PZ--PTUNPGPGN U TUG JAPMY YDYTIM ZKHT USS PGZSAYGWYL, YDUTPGPGNHGSE OPL THTYGMUKE UWMPHG PG MOY IKYLYGM, AGYBHRYX VE UGE WUALY--CY CYKYMH UXTPM LH PGZPGPMYSE LTUSS U KYTUPGXYK HZ PGYBPMUVPSPME UL YJAUSYXFYKH, CY LOHASX YBYG MOYG GHM OUBY UKKPBYX UM MOY WHGWYIMPHG HZ WHTISYMYZKYYXHT PG TUG, ZHK U VYPGN AGPGZSAYGWYX VE MOY YDMYKGUS CHKSX, LMUGXPGNHAMLPXY HZ MPTY UGX PGXYIYGXYGM HZ WUALY, PL GH SHGNYK U TUG.PG MOY LUTY CUE CY WUG GYBYK PTUNPGY MOY UWMPHG HZ U TUG JAPMY XYBHPX HZZKYYXHT UGX YGMPKYSE LAVQYWM MH MOY SUC HZ PGYBPMUVPSPME.(1) OHCYBYK CY TUE PGWKYULY HAK RGHCSYXNY HZ MOY WHGXPMPHGL HZ LIUWYPG COPWO TUG PL LPMAUMYX, MOUM RGHCSYXNY WUG GYBYK VY WHTISYMY, ZHK MOYGATVYK HZ MOHLY WHGXPMPHGL PL UL PGZPGPMY UL MOY PGZPGPME HZ LIUWY. UGXLH MOY WHGWYIMPHG HZ MOY UWMPHG HZ U TUG LAVQYWM LHSYSE MH MOY SUC HZPGYBPMUVPSPME CPMOHAM UGE YSYTYGM HZ ZKYYXHT PL QALM UL PTIHLLPVSY ULMOY WHGWYIMPHG HZ U TUG'L WHTISYMYSE ZKYY UWMPHG.UGX LH MH PTUNPGY MOY UWMPHG HZ U TUG YGMPKYSE LAVQYWM MH MOY SUC HZPGYBPMUVPSPME CPMOHAM UGE ZKYYXHT, CY TALM ULLATY MOY RGHCSYXNY HZ UGPGZPGPMY GATVYK HZ LIUWY KYSUMPHGL, UG PGZPGPMYSE SHGN IYKPHX HZ MPTY,UGX UG PGZPGPMY LYKPYL HZ WUALYL.MH PTUNPGY U TUG IYKZYWMSE ZKYY UGX GHM LAVQYWM MH MOY SUC HZPGYBPMUVPSPME, CY TALM PTUNPGY OPT USS USHGY, VYEHGX LIUWY, VYEHGX MPTY,UGX ZKYY ZKHT XYIYGXYGWY HG WUALY.PG MOY ZPKLM WULY, PZ PGYBPMUVPSPME CYKY IHLLPVSY CPMOHAM ZKYYXHTCY LOHASX OUBY KYUWOYX U XYZPGPMPHG HZ PGYBPMUVPSPME VE MOY SUCL HZPGYBPMUVPSPME PMLYSZ, MOUM PL, U TYKY ZHKT CPMOHAM WHGMYGM.PG MOY LYWHGX WULY, PZ ZKYYXHT CYKY IHLLPVSY CPMOHAM PGYBPMUVPSPME CYLOHASX OUBY UKKPBYX UM AGWHGXPMPHGYX ZKYYXHT VYEHGX LIUWY, MPTY, UGXWUALY, COPWO VE MOY ZUWM HZ PML VYPGN AGWHGXPMPHGYX UGX AGSPTPMYX CHASXVY GHMOPGN, HK TYKY WHGMYGM CPMOHAM ZHKT.CY LOHASX PG ZUWM OUBY KYUWOYX MOHLY MCH ZAGXUTYGMUSL HZ COPWO TUG'LCOHSY HAMSHHR HG MOY AGPBYKLY PL WHGLMKAWMYX--MOY PGWHTIKYOYGLPVSYYLLYGWY HZ SPZY, UGX MOY SUCL XYZPGPGN MOUM YLLYGWY.KYULHG LUEL: (1) LIUWY CPMO USS MOY ZHKTL HZ TUMMYK MOUM NPBY PMBPLPVPSPME PL PGZPGPMY, UGX WUGGHM VY PTUNPGYX HMOYKCPLY.
